1_1_1_Ekuqalekeni uThixo wadala amazulu nehlabathi.
1_1_2_Ke ehlabathini kwakusenyanyeni, kuselubala; kwakumnyama phezu kwamanzi enzonzobila. UMoya kaThixo wafukama phezu kwamanzi lawo.
1_1_3_Wathi uThixo, Makubekho ukukhanya. Kwabakho ke ukukhanya.
1_1_4_Wakubona ke uThixo ukukhanya ukuba kulungile, wahlula uThixo phakathi kokukhanya nobumnyama.
1_1_5_Wathi uThixo ukukhanya yimini, wathi ubumnyama bubusuku.  Kwahlwa, kwasa: yangumhla wokuqala.
1_1_6_Wathi uThixo, Makubekho isibhakabhaka phakathi kwawo amanzi,  sibe ngumahlulo wokwahlula amanzi kumanzi.
1_1_7_Wasenza uThixo isibhakabhaka, wawahlula amanzi angaphantsi kwesibhakabhaka kuwo amanzi angaphezu kwesibhakabhaka. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_8_Wathi uThixo isibhakabhaka ngamazulu. Kwahlwa, kwasa:  yangumhla wesibini.
1_1_9_Wathi uThixo, Amanzi angaphantsi kwamazulu makahlanganiselwe ndaweni-nye, kubonakale okomileyo. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_10_Wathi uThixo okomileyo ngumhlaba, wathi intlanganisela yamanzi ziilwandle. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile.
1_1_11_Wathi uThixo, Umhlaba mawuphume uhlaza, imifuno evelisa imbewu, imithi yeziqhamo, eyenza iziqhamo ngohlobo lwayo,  embewu ikuyo, emhlabeni. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_12_Umhlaba waphuma uhlaza, nemifuno evelisa imbewu ngohlobo lwayo, nemithi eyenza iziqhamo, embewu ikuyo, ngohlobo lwayo.  Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile.
1_1_13_Kwahlwa kwasa: yangumhla wesithathu.
1_1_14_Wathi uThixo, Makubekho izikhanyiso esibhakabhakeni samazulu, zibe ngumahlulo wokwahlula imini kubusuku; zibe zezemiqondiso, zibe zezamaxesha amisiweyo, zibe zezemihla neminyaka;
1_1_15_mazibe zizikhanyiso esibhakabhakeni samazulu, zikhanyise ehlabathini. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_16_Wenza uThixo izikhanyiso ezikhulu zazibini, esona sikhulu isikhanyiso ukuba silawule imini, esona sincinane isikhanyiso ukuba silawule ubusuku; wenza neenkwenkwezi.
1_1_17_Wazibeka uThixo esibhakabhakeni samazulu, ukuba zikhanyise ehlabathini, zilawule imini nobusuku,
1_1_18_zahlule ukukhanya kubumnyama. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile.
1_1_19_Kwahlwa, kwasa: yangumhla wesine.
1_1_20_Wathi uThixo, Amanzi la makanyakazele inyakanyaka,  imiphefumlo ephilileyo; zithi neentaka ziphaphazele ehlabathini, esibhakabhakeni sezulu.
1_1_21_Wadala uThixo oominenga mikhulu, nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo enambuzelayo, awanyakazela ngayo amanzi ngohlobo lwayo, neentaka zonke ezinamaphiko ngohlobo lwazo. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile.
1_1_22_Wazisikelela uThixo, esithi, Qhamani, nande, niwazalise amanzi aselwandle; zithi iintaka zande ehlabathini.
1_1_23_Kwahlwa, kwasa: yangumhla wesihlanu.
1_1_24_Wathi uThixo, Umhlaba mawuphume imiphefumlo ephilileyo ngohlobo lwayo: izinto ezizitho zine, nezinambuzane, nezinto eziphilileyo zomhlaba ngohlobo lwazo. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_25_Wenza uThixo izinto eziphilileyo zomhlaba ngohlobo lwazo,  nezinto ezizitho zine ngohlobo lwazo, nazo zonke izinambuzane zomhlaba ngohlobo lwazo. Wabona uThixo ukuba kulungile.
1_1_26_Wathi uThixo, Masenze umntu ngokomfanekiselo wethu ngokufana nathi. Mababe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle,  nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezintweni ezizitho zine, nasemhlabeni wonke, nasezinambuzaneni zonke ezinambuzela emhlabeni.
1_1_27_Wamdala ke uThixo umntu ngokomfanekiselo wakhe; wamdala ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo; wadala indoda nenkazana.
1_1_28_Wabasikelela uThixo, wathi kubo uThixo, Qhamani, nande,  niwuzalise umhlaba niweyise; nibe nobukhosi ezintlanzini zolwandle, nasezintakeni zezulu, nasezintweni zonke eziphilileyo ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni.
1_1_29_Wathi uThixo, Yabonani, ndininikile yonke imifuno evelisa imbewu, esemhlabeni wonke, nayo yonke imithi eneziqhamo zemithi evelisa imbewu: yoba kukudla kuni.
1_1_30_Nezinto zonke eziphilileyo zomhlaba, neentaka zonke zezulu,  nezinambuzane zonke ezisemhlabeni, ezinomphefumlo ophilileyo,  ndizinike yonke imifuno eluhlaza ukuba ibe kukudla. Kwaba njalo.
1_1_31_Wakubona uThixo konke akwenzileyo, nanko, kulungile kunene.  Kwahlwa, kwasa: yangumhla wesithandathu.
1_2_1_Agqitywa ke amazulu nehlabathi, nawo wonke umkhosi wezo zinto.
1_2_2_Wawugqiba ke uThixo ngomhla wesixhenxe umsebenzi wakhe awawenzayo; waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe awawenzayo.
1_2_3_Wawusikelela uThixo umhla wesixhenxe, wawungcwalisa; ngokuba waphumla ngawo kuwo wonke umsebenzi wakhe awawudalayo uThixo,  wawenza.
1_2_4_Yiyo le ke inzala yamazulu nehlabathi ekudalweni kwezo zinto, mini wenza uYehova uThixo ihlabathi namazulu,
1_2_5_onke amatyholo asendle engekaveli emhlabeni, nayo yonke imifuno yasendle ingekantshuli; kuba uYehova uThixo ebengekanisi mvula emhlabeni; kwaye kungekho mntu wokuwusebenza umhlaba.
1_2_6_Kwaye kunyuka inkungu iphuma ehlabathini, yawunyakamisa wonke umhlaba.
1_2_7_UYehova uThixo wambumba umntu ngothuli lwasemhlabeni,  waphefumlela emathatheni akhe impefumlo yobomi; umntu ke waba ngumphefumlo ophilileyo.
1_2_8_UYehova uThixo watyala umyezo e-Eden ngasempumalanga;  wambeka khona umntu abembumbile.
1_2_9_UYehova uThixo wantshulisa emhlabeni yonke imithi enqwenelekayo ngokukhangeleka, nelungele ukudliwa; nomthi wobomi emyezweni phakathi, nomthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi.
1_2_10_Kwaphuma umlambo e-Eden wokuwunyakamisa umyezo; wahluka apho, waba ziimbaxa ezine.
1_2_11_Igama lowokuqala yiPishon; nguwo lowo ujikeleze lonke ilizwe laseHavila, apho ikhona igolide.
1_2_12_Igolide yelo lizwe intle, ikhona ibhedolaki nelitye lebherilo.
1_2_13_Igama lowesibini umlambo yiGihon; nguwo lowo ujikeleze lonke ilizwe lakwaKushi.
1_2_14_Igama lowesithathu umlambo yiHidekele; nguwo lowo uya phambi kwelakwa-Asiriya. Owesine umlambo ngumEfrati.
1_2_15_UYehova uThixo wamthabatha umntu, wambeka emyezweni we-Eden, ukuba awusebenze, awugcine.
1_2_16_UYehova uThixo wamwisela umthetho umntu, esithi, Yonke imithi yomyezo ungayidla uyidle;
1_2_17_ke wona umthi wokwazi okulungileyo nokubi uze ungawudli;  kuba mhlana uthe wawudla, uya kufa.
1_2_18_Wathi uYehova uThixo, Akulungile ukuba umntu abe yedwa,  ndiya kumenzela umncedi onguwabo.
1_2_19_UYehova uThixo wabumba ngomhlaba zonke izinto eziphilileyo zasendle, nazo zonke iintaka zezulu, wazisa kuye uAdam ukubona ukuba wothini na ukuzibiza, ukuze oko azibize ngako uAdam zonke izinto eziphilileyo, ibe ligama lazo elo.
1_2_20_Wazithiya amagama uAdam zonke izinto ezizitho zine,  neentaka zasezulwini, nazo zonke izinto eziphilileyo zasendle;  ke uAdam akafunyanelwanga mncedi unguwabo.
1_2_21_UYehova uThixo wawisa ubuthongo obukhulu phezu koAdam,  walala. Wathabatha lwalunye ezimbanjeni zakhe, wavingca ngenyama esikhundleni salo.
1_2_22_UYehova uThixo walwakha ubambo abeluthabathe kuAdam, lwaba ngumfazi; wamzisa kuAdam.
1_2_23_Wathi uAdam, Eli ke ngoku lithambo lasemathanjeni am,  yinyama yasenyameni yam; lo yena ukubizwa kothiwa ngumfazi,  ngokuba ethatyathwe endodeni.
1_2_24_Ngenxa yoko indoda yomshiya uyise nonina, inamathele kumkayo, babe nyama-nye ke.
1_2_25_Baye bobabini behamba ze, umntu lowo nomkakhe,  bengenazintloni.
1_3_1_Ke kaloku inyoka yaye inobuqhophololo ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto eziphilileyo zasendle, abezenzile uYehova uThixo. Yathi kumfazi Utshilo na okunene uThixo ukuthi, Ze ningadli kuyo yonke imithi yomyezo?
1_3_2_Wathi umfazi kwinyoka, Eziqhameni zemithi yomyezo singadla;
1_3_3_ke eziqhameni zomthi osemyezweni phakathi, uthe uThixo, Ze ningadli kuzo; ze ningazichukumisi, hleze nife.
1_3_4_Yathi inyoka kumfazi, Anisayi kufa:
1_3_5_kuba esazi uThixo ukuba, mhlana nithe nadla kuzo, oqabuka amehlo enu, nibe njengoThixo, nazi okulungileyo nokubi.
1_3_6_Wabona umfazi ukuba umthi ulungele ukudliwa, nokuba uyakhanukeka emehlweni, ingumthi onqwenelekela ukuqiqisa,  wathabatha eziqhameni zawo, wadla; wanika nendoda yakhe inaye,  yadla.
1_3_7_Aqabuka amehlo abo bobabini, bazi ukuba bahamba ze; bathunga amagqabi omkhiwane, bazenzela imibhinqo.
1_3_8_Basiva isandi sikaYehova uThixo, ehamba emyezweni empepheni yasemini; basuka bazimela uAdam nomkakhe ebusweni bukaYehova uThixo, phakathi kwemithi yomyezo.
1_3_9_UYehova uThixo wambiza uAdam, wathi kuye, Uphi na?
1_3_10_Wathi yena, Ndive isandi sakho emyezweni, ndasuka ndoyika,  ngokuba ndihamba ze; ndazimela.
1_3_11_Wathi, Uxelelwe ngubani na, ukuba uhamba ze? Udlile na kuwo umthi, endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Uze ungadli kuwo?
1_3_12_Wathi uAdam, Umfazi owandinikayo ukuba abe nam, nguye ondinikileyo kuwo umthi, ndadla ke.
1_3_13_Wathi uYehova uThixo kumfazi, Yintoni na le nto uyenzileyo?  Wathi umfazi, Inyoka indilukuhlile, ndadla ke.
1_3_14_Wathi uYehova uThixo kwinyoka, Ngokuba uyenzile le nto,  uqalekisiwe wena ngaphezu kwezinto zonke ezizitho zine, neento zonke eziphilileyo zasendle; uya kuhamba ngesisu, udle uthuli,  yonke imihla yobomi bakho.
1_3_15_Ndiya kumisa ubutshaba phakathi kwakho nomfazi, naphakathi kwembewu yakho nembewu yakhe; yona iya kukutyumza intloko, wena uya kuyityumza isithende.
1_3_16_Wathi kumfazi, Ndiya kukwandisa kakhulu ukubulaleka kwakho ekumitheni, uzale abantwana unembulaleko; inkanuko yakho ibe sendodeni yakho, ikulawule yona.
1_3_17_KuAdam wathi, Ngokuba uphulaphule izwi lomkakho, wadla kuwo umthi endakuwisela umthetho ngawo, ndathi, Uze ungadli kuwo,  uqalekisiwe umhlaba ngenxa yakho; uya kudla kuwo ubulaleka,  yonke imihla yobomi bakho.
1_3_18_Uya kukuntshulela imithana enameva neenkunzane, udle umfuno wasendle.
1_3_19_Uya kudla ukudla kokubila kobuso bakho, ude ubuyele emhlabeni kobuso bakho, ude ubuyele emhlabeni, kuba uthatyathwe kuwo; ngokuba uluthuli, uya kubuyela kwaseluthulini.
1_3_20_UAdam walibiza igama lomkakhe ngokuthi nguEva, ngokuba yena engunina wabaphilileyo bonke.
1_3_21_UYehova uThixo wabenzela iingubo zezintsu uAdam nomkakhe,  wabambathisa.
1_3_22_Wathi uYehova uThixo, Yabonani, umntu usuke waba njengomnye wethu, ukwazi okulungileyo nokubi; hleze ke olule isandla sakhe, athabathe nakuwo umthi wobomi, adle, aphile ngonaphakade:
1_3_23_uYehova uThixo wamndulula emyezweni we-Eden, ukuba asebenze umhlaba abethatyathwe kuwo.
1_3_24_Wamgxotha ke umntu; wamisa ngasempumalanga kuwo umyezo we-Eden iikerubhi, nelangatye lekrele elijikajikayo lokugcina indlela eya emthini wobomi.
1_4_1_Ke kaloku uAdam wamazi uEva umkakhe; wamitha wazala uKayin,  wathi, Ndizuze indoda ngoYehova.
1_4_2_Waphinda wazala umninawa wakhe, uAbheli; uAbheli waba ngumalusi wezimvu, uKayin waba ngumsebenzi womhlaba.
1_4_3_Kwathi ekupheleni kwamihla ithile, uKayin wathabatha eziqhameni zomhlaba, wazisa umnikelo kuYehova.
1_4_4_UAbheli wazisa naye, ethabathe kumazibulo ezimvu zakhe,  kwezinamanqatha. Waza uYehova wambheka uAbheli nomnikelo wakhe.
1_4_5_Akambheka uKayin nomnikelo wakhe. Waqumba kunene uKayin,  basangana ubuso bakhe.
1_4_6_Wathi uYehova kuKayin, Yini na ukuba uqumbe, yini na ukuba busangane ubuso bakhe?
1_4_7_Ukuba uthe walungisa, abuyi kuswabuluka ubuso yini na? Ukuba uthe akwalungisa, isono sibuthumile ngasesangweni, singxamele wena; ke wena, silawule.
1_4_8_Wathetha uKayin noAbheli umninawa wakhe, kwathi besendle,  wesuka uKayin wamvunukela uAbheli umninawa wakhe, wambulala.
1_4_9_Wathi uYehova kuKayin, Uphi na uAbheli, umninawa wakho?  Wathi yena, Andazi; ndingumgcini womninawa wam, yini na?
1_4_10_Wathi, Wenze ntoni na? Izwi legazi lomninawa wakho liyakhala emhlabeni kum.
1_4_11_Ngoko uqalekisiwe emhlabeni, owakhamise umlomo wawo ukuba ulithabathe igazi lomninawa wakho esandleni sakho.
1_4_12_Xenikweni uwusebenzayo umhlaba, awusayi kuphinda ukunike amandla awo; uya kubhadula uphalaphale ehlabathini.
1_4_13_Wathi uKayin kuYehova, ityala lam likhulu ngokungenakuthwalwa.
1_4_14_Yabona, undigxdothile namhla phezu komhlaba; ndiya kusithela nasebusweni bakho, ndibhadule ndiphalaphale ehlabathini bathi bonke abantu abandifumanayo bandibulale.
1_4_15_Wathi uYehova kuye, xa kunjalo, bonke ababulala uKayin kophindezelwa kubo kasixhenxe. UYehova wammisela uKayin umqondiso, ukuze bonke abamfumanayo bangamsiki.
1_4_16_Waphuma uKayin, wemka ebusweni bukaYehova; wahlala ezweni lakwaKuphalaphala phambi kwe-Eden.
1_4_17_UKayin wamazi umkakhe, wamitha, wazala uEnoki. Wakha umzi,  wawuthiya loo mzi ngegama lonyana wakhe uEnoki.
1_4_18_UEnoki wazalelwa uIradi; uIradi wazala uMehuyaheli;  uMehuyaheli wazala uMetusaheli; uMetusaheli wazala uLameki.
1_4_19_ULameki wazeka abafazi ababini; igama lomnye belinguAda,  igama lowesibini belinguZila.
1_4_20_UAda wazala uYabhali yena waba nguyise wabahlala ezintenteni, nabafuyileyo.
1_4_21_Igama lomninawa wakhe belinguYubhali; yena waba nguyise wabo bonke abaphatha uhadi nogwali.
1_4_22_UZila uthe naye wazala uTubhalekayin, obekhanda yonke impahla enobukhali yobhedu nesinyithi; udade woTubhalekayin ebenguNahama.
1_4_23_Wathi uLameki kubafazi bakhe, ada noZila, liveni ilizwi lam. Bafazi bakaLameki, phulaphulani intetho yam. Sendibulele indoda ngenxa yenxeba lam, nendodana ngenxa yomvumbo wam.
1_4_24_Xa uKayin aya kuphindezelwa kasixhenxe, Yena uLameki uya kuphindezelwa kamashumi osixhenxe anesixhenxe.
1_4_25_UAdam wabuya wamazi umkakhe, wazala unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguSete, kuba wathi, UThixo undimisele enye imbewu esikhundleni sika-Abheli owabulawa nguKayin.
1_4_26_USete naye wazalelwa unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguEnoshe.  Kwaqalwa oko ukunqulwa igama likaYehova.
1_5_1_Yiyo le incwadi yenzala ka-Adam. Mhlana uThixo wamdala umntu, wamenza ngokufana noThixo.
1_5_2_Wadala indoda nenkazana, wabasikelela, wabathiya igama elinguAdam, mhlana wabadala.
1_5_3_UAdam wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu, wazala unyana ngokufana naye, ngokomfanekiso wakhe, wamthiya igama elinguSete.
1_5_4_Imihla ka-Adam emveni kokuzala kwakhe uSete yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asibhozo; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_5_Iyonke imihla ka-Adam, awahlala ngayo, yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba anamanci mathathu; wafa ke.
1_5_6_USete wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinaminyaka mihlanu, wazala uEnoshe.
1_5_7_USete wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uEnoshe iminyaka emakhulu asibhozo aneminyaka esixhenxe; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_8_Iyonke imihla kaSete yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba anashumi-nye linamibini; wafa ke.
1_5_9_UEnoshe wahlala iminyaka emashumi asithoba, wazala uKenan.
1_5_10_UEnoshe wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uKenan iminyaka emakhulu asibhozo anashumi-nye linamihlanu; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_11_Iyonke imihla kaEnoshe yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba anamihlanu; wafa ke.
1_5_12_UKenan wahlala iminyaka emashumi asixhenxe, wazala uMahalaleli.
1_5_13_UKenan wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uMahalaleli iminyaka emakhulu asibhozo anamanci mane: wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_14_Iyonke imihla kaKenan yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba,  aneminyaka elishumi; wafa ke.
1_5_15_UMahalaleli wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathandathu anamihlanu, wazala uYerede.
1_5_16_UMahalaleli wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uYerede iminyaka emakhulu asibhozo anamanci mathathu; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_17_Iyonke imihla kaMahalaleli yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asibhozo anamanci asithoba anamihlanu; wafa ke.
1_5_18_UYerede wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathandathu anamibini, wazala uEnoki.
1_5_19_UYerede wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uEnoki iminyaka emakhulu asibhozo; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_20_Iyonke imihla kaYerede yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba anamanci mathandathu anamihlanu, anamibini; wafa ke.
1_5_21_UEnoki wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathandathu anamihlanu,  wazala uMethusela.
1_5_22_UEnoki wahamba noThixo, emveni kokuzala kwakhe uMethusela,  iminyaka emakhulu mathathu; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_23_Iyonke imihla kaEnoki yaba yiminyaka emakhulu mathathu,  anamanci mathandathu anamihlanu.
1_5_24_UEnoki wahamba noThixo; akabakho, ngokuba uThixo wamthabatha.
1_5_25_UMethusela wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci asibhozo anesixhenxe, wazala uLameki.
1_5_26_UMethusela wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uLameki iminyaka emakhulu asixhenxe anamanci asibhozo anamibini; wazala oonyana eneentombi.
1_5_27_Iyonke imihla kaMethusela yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba,  anamanci mathandathu anesithoba; wafa ke.
1_5_28_ULameki wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci asibhozo anamibini; wazala unyana.
1_5_29_Wamthiya igama elinguNowa, esithi, Lo uya kusithuthuzela emsebenzini wethu, nasekubulalekeni kwezandla zethu, ngenxa yomhlaba awawuqalekisayo uYehova.
1_5_30_ULameki wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uNowa iminyaka emakulu mahlanu anamanci asithoba anamihlanu; wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_5_31_Iyonke imihla kaLameki yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asixhenxe anesixhenxe; wafa ke.
1_5_32_Ke uNowa ebeminyaka imakhulu mahlanu ezelwe; uNowa wazala ooShem noHam noYafete.
1_6_1_Kuthe bakuqala ukwanda abantu ehlabathini, bakuzalelwa iintombi,
1_6_2_bazibona oonyana bakaThixo iintombi zabantu ukuba zintle,  bazeka abafazi kuzo zonke abazinyulayo.
1_6_3_Wathi uYehova, UMoya wam akayi kulawula ebantwini ngonaphakade; ekulahlekeni kwabo bayinyama; imihla yabo iya kuba yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mabini.
1_6_4_Kwakukho iingxilimbela ehlabathini ngaloo mihla; kananjalo emveni koko, xeshikweni oonyana bakaThixo bangenayo kuzo iintombi zabantu, zabazalela abantwana. Aba baba ngamagorha ababekho kwasephakadeni, amadoda adumileyo.
1_6_5_Wabona uThixo ukuba ububi babantu bandile ehlabathini, konke ukuyila kweengcinga zentliziyo yabo kubububi bodwa imihla yonke.
1_6_6_Wazohlwaya uYehova, ngokuba emenzile umntu ehlabathini,  kwaba buhlungu kuye entliziyweni.
1_6_7_Wathi uYehova, Ndiya kumcima umntu endimdalileyo, angabikho ehlabathini, kuthabathele emntwini kuse ezinkomeni, kuse ezinambuzaneni, kuse ezintakeni zezulu, ngokuba ndizohlwaya ngokuba ndizenzile ezo zinto.
1_6_8_UNowa yena wababalwa nguYehova.
1_6_9_Yiyo le ke inzala kaNowa. UNowa waye eyindoda elilungisa,  egqibeleleyo, ezizukulwaneni zakhe. UNowa wahamba noThixo.
1_6_10_UNowa wazala oonyana abathathu: uShem noHam noYafete.
1_6_11_Ihlabathi lalonakele ebusweni bukaThixo; ihlabathi lalizele lugonyamelo.
1_6_12_UThixo walikhangela ihlabathi, nalo, lonakele! Ngokuba yonke inyama ibiyonakalisile indlela yayo ehlabathini.
1_6_13_Wathi uThixo kuNowa, Isiphelo senyama yonke sifikile phambi kwam; ngokuba ihlabathi lizele lugonyamelo oluphuma kubo;  yabona ke, ndiya kubonakalisa, bona ndawonye nehlabathi.
1_6_14_Zenzele ke umkhombe ngemithi yegofere, uwenze izindlu umkhombe, uwuqabe ngaphakathi nangaphandle ngebhitumene.
1_6_15_Wenjenje ukuwenza: bube ngamakhulu omathathu eekubhite ubude bomkhombe, namashumi omathathu eekubhite ububanzi bawo,  namashumi omathathu eekubhite ukuphakama kwawo.
1_6_16_Wenze ikroba emkhombeni, ukuligqiba kwakho kube yikubhite enye, ithabathela phezulu; umnyango womkhombe uwumise ecaleni lawo; wenze izindlu zodidi lwaphantsi, nolwesibini,  nolwesithathu.
1_6_17_Mna ke, uyabona, ndihlisa unogumbe wamanzi ehlabathini,  wokonakalisa yonke inyama enomoya wokuphila kuyo, ephantsi kwamazulu; konke okusehlabathini kuya kuphuma umphefumlo;
1_6_18_ndiwumise umnqophiso wam nawe, ungene emkhombeni wena,  noonyana bakho, nomkakho, nabafazi boonyana bakho, ndawonye nawe.
1_6_19_Kwizinto zonke eziphilileyo, kwinyama yonke, uze ungenise emkhombeni ngambini kuzo zonke, ukuze zisindiswe nawe, ibe yinkunzi nemazi;
1_6_20_kwiintaka ngohlobo lwazo, kwiinkomo ngohlobo lwazo, kuzo zonke izinambuzane zomhlaba ngohlobo lwazo, zibe ngambini kuzo zonke, eziya kungena kuwe, ukuba zisindiswe.
1_6_21_Wena ke, uthabathele kuwe ekudleni konke okudliwayo,  uhlanganisele kuwe kube kukudla kuwe nakuzo.
1_6_22_Wenza uNowa konke uThixo abemwisele umthetho ngako, wenza njengoko.
1_7_1_Wathi uYehova kuNowa, Ngena, wena nendlu yakho yonke,  emkhombeni, ngokuba ndibona wena ilungisa phambi kwam kwesi sizukulwana.
1_7_2_Kwizinto zonke ezizitho zine ezihlambulukileyo, thabathela kuwe ngasixhenxe, ngasixhenxe, inkunzi nemazi yayo; kwizinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi thabatha ngambini, inkunzi nemazi yayo;
1_7_3_nakwiintaka zezulu ngasixhenxe, ngasixhenxe, inkunzi nemazi,  ukuze imbewu igcinakale ehlabathini lonke.
1_7_4_Kuba zisesixhenxe iintsuku, ndize ndinise imvula ehlabathini iimini zibe mashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane, ndiyicime into yonke emiyo endayenzayo, ingabikho phezu kwehlabathi.
1_7_5_Wenza uNowa konke uYehova awamwisela umthetho ngako.
1_7_6_UNowa waye eminyaka imakhulu mathandathu ezelwe, wabakho unogumbe wamanzi ehlabathini.
1_7_7_Wangena uNowa emkhombeni, enoonyana bakhe, nomkakhe,  nabafazi boonyana bakhe, ndawonye naye, ngenxa yamanzi onogumbe.
1_7_8_Kuzo izinto ezizitho zine ezihlambulukileyo, nakuzo izinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi, nakuzo iintaka, nakuzo zonke izinto ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni,
1_7_9_kwangena ngambini, ngambini, kuNowa emkhombeni, inkunzi nemazi, njengoko uThixo abemwisele umthetho uNowa.
1_7_10_Kwathi emva kweentsuku ezisixhenxe, amanzi onogumbe abakho ehlabathini.
1_7_11_Ngomnyaka wamakhulu omathandathu wokudla ubomi kukaNowa,  ngenyanga yesibini, ngosuku lweshumi elinesixhenxe enyangeni leyo, kanye ngayo loo mini, yagqabhuka yonke imithombo yamanzi enzonzobila enkulu, iingcango zezulu zavuleka.
1_7_12_Wabakho umvumbi wemvula ehlabathini iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mani.
1_7_13_Wangena emkhombeni kwangaloo mini uNowa, noShem noHam noYafete, oonyana bakaNowa, nomkaNowa, nabafazi bobathathu boonyana bakhe, ndawonye naye.
1_7_14_Bona, neento zonke eziphilileyo ngohlobo lwazo, nezinto zonke ezizitho zine ngohlobo lwazo, nezinambuzane zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni ngohlobo lwazo, neentaka zonke ngohlobo lwazo, iinto zonke eziphaphazelayo, ezinamaphiko,
1_7_15_zangena kuNowa emkhombeni, ngambini, ngambini, kwinyama yonke enomoya wokuphila kuyo.
1_7_16_Zangena iinkunzi neemazi kwinyama yonke; zangena njengoko uThixo abemwisele umthetho. UYehova wamvalela ngaphakathi.
1_7_17_Yaba ngunogumbe imihla emashumi mane ehlabathini, enyuka amanzi, awufukula umkhombe, wafunquleka emhlabeni.
1_7_18_Aba namandla amanzi, enyuka kunene ehlabathini, wahamba umkhombe phezu kwamanzi.
1_7_19_Aba namandla amanzi kunene kakhulu ehlabathini,  zagutyungelwa zonke iintaba eziphakamileyo kakhulu, eziphantsi kwamazulu onke.
1_7_20_Aba namandla amanzi, ada aba ziikubhite ezilishumi elinantlanu, ethabathela phezulu; zagutyungelwa ke iintaba.
1_7_21_Yaphuma umphefumlo yonke inyama enambuzelayo emhlabeni,  kwiintaka, nakwizinto ezizitho zine, nakwizinto eziphilileyo,  nakwinyakanyaka yonke enyakazelayo emhlabeni, nabantu bonke.
1_7_22_Iinto zonke ezikuphefumla komoya wokuphila kusemathatheni azo, kwiinto zonke ezisemhlabeni owomileyo, zafa.
1_7_23_Zabhujiswa ke izinto zonke ezimiyo, eziphezu komhlaba,  kwathabathela emntwini kwesa ezintweni ezizitho zine,  nasezinambuzaneni, nasezintakeni zezulu; zabhujiswa azabakho ehlabathini; kwasala uNowa yedwa, nababenaye emkhombeni.
1_7_24_Aba namandla amanzi ehlabathini imihla elikhulu elinamanci mahlanu.
1_8_1_UThixo wamkhumbula uNowa, neento zonke eziphilileyo, nezinto zonke ezizitho zine ezazinaye emkhombeni; uThixo wahambisa umoya ehlabathini, awutha amanzi.
1_8_2_Yavingcwa imithombo yamanzi enzonzobila neengcango zezulu,  wathintelwa umvumbi wezulu.
1_8_3_Abuya amanzi emhlabeni, amana ebuya, awutha amanzi ekupheleni kwemihla elikhulu elinamanci mahlanu.
1_8_4_Umkhombe wazimisa ngenyanga yesixhenxe, ngosuku lweshumi elinesixhenxe enyangeni leyo, phezu kweentaba zaseArarati.
1_8_5_Amanzi amana ewutha, kwada kwayinyanga yeshumi; ngeyeshumi ke, ngosuku lokuqala enyangeni leyo, zabonakala iincopho zeentaba.
1_8_6_Kwathi, ekupheleni kwemihla emashumi mane, wayivula uNowa ifestile yomkhombe abeyenzile;
1_8_7_wathuma ihlungulu, laphuma lamana lizulazula, ada atsha amanzi ehlabathini.
1_8_8_Wasusa ihobe, ukuze abone ukuba amanzi awuthile na phezu kwehlabathi.
1_8_9_Ihobe alifumananga ndawo yakuphumza nentende yethupha lalo,  labuyela kuye emkhombeni, ngokuba amanzi abephezu kwehlabathi lonke; wolula isandla sakhe, walithabatha, walingenisa kuye emkhombeni.
1_8_10_Walinda eminye imihla esixhenxe, waphinda walisusa ihobe emkhombeni.
1_8_11_Leza kuye ihobe ngexesha langokuhlwa; nanko, kukho igqabi lomnquma elisandula ukukhiwa emlonyeni walo; wazi uNowa, ukuba ehlile amanzi ehlabathini.
1_8_12_Walinda eminye imihla ekwasixhenxe, walisusa ihobe;  aliphindanga libuyele kuye kanjalo.
1_8_13_Kwathi, ngomnyaka wamakhulu omathandathu anamnye,  ngolokuqala enyangeni yokuqala, amanzi atsha ehlabathini; uNowa walususa uphahla lomkhombe; wakhangela, nango umhlaba womile.
1_8_14_Ngenyanga yesibini, ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesixhenxe enyangeni leyo, woma kwaphela umhlaba.
1_8_15_Wathetha uThixo kuNowa, esithi,
1_8_16_Phuma emkhombeni, wena nomkakho, noonyana bakho, nabafazi boonyana bakho, ndawonye nawe.
1_8_17_Zonke izinto eziphilileyo ezikuwe, kwinyama yonke,  ezintakeni, nasezintweni ezizitho zine, nasezinambuzaneni zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni, phuma nazo, zizalise ihlabathi,  ziqhame, zande ehlabathini.
1_8_18_Waphuma ke uNowa, noonyana bakhe, nomkakhe, nabafazi boonyana bakhe, ndawonye naye.
1_8_19_Zonke izinto eziphilileyo, zonke izinambuzane, neentaka zonke, iinto zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni, ngeentlobo zazo,  zaphuma emkhombeni.
1_8_20_UNowa wamakhela uYehova isibingelelo, wathabatha kwizinto zonke ezizitho zine ezihlambulukileyo, nakwiintaka zonke ezihlambulukileyo, wanyusa amadini anyukayo esibingelelweni eso.
1_8_21_UThixo weva ivumba elithozamisayo, wathi uYehova entliziyweni yakhe, Andisayi kuphinda ndilitshabhise ihlabathi ngenxa yomntu, ngokuba ukuyila kwentliziyo yomntu kubi kwasebutsheni bakhe; andisayi kuphinda ndizibhubhise zonke izinto eziphilileyo, njengoko ndenze ngako.
1_8_22_Kuthabathela apha, ngayo yonke imihla yehlabathi, akuyi kuphela ukuhlwayela nokuvuna, ukubanda nobushushu, ihlobo nobusika, imini nobusuku.
1_9_1_UThixo wamsikelela uNowa noonyana bakhe, wathi kubo,  Qhamani, nande, nizalise ihlabathi.
1_9_2_Ukoyikeka kwenu, nokuqhiphula kwenu umbilini, makube phezu kwezinto zonke eziphilileyo zomhlaba, naphezu kweentaka zonke zezulu, nakwiinto zonke ezinambuzelayo emhlabeni, nakwiintlanzi zonke zolwandle; zona zinikelwe esandleni senu.
1_9_3_Zonke izinambuzane eziphilileyo mazibe kukudla kuni;  njengomfuno oluhlaza, ndininikile oko konke.
1_9_4_Yinyama yodwa enomphefumlo wayo, enegazi layo, eningasayi kuyidla.
1_9_5_Ligazi lenu lodwa, imiphefumlo yenu ke, endiya kulibiza;  esandleni sezinto zonke eziphilileyo ndiya kulibiza,  nasesandleni somntu; esandleni salowo ungumzalwana wakhe, ndiya kuwubiza umphefumlo womntu.
1_9_6_Ophalaza igazi lomntu, igazi lakhe lophalazwa ngumntu,  ngokuba umntu wenziwa ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo.
1_9_7_Nina ke, qhamani nande, nilizalise ihlabathi, nande kulo.
1_9_8_Watsho uThixo kuNowa, nakoonyana bakhe ndawonye naye,  ukuthi,
1_9_9_Yabonani, mna ndiyawumisa umnqophiso wam nani, nembewu yenu emva kwenu,
1_9_10_nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo ekuni, kwiintaka,  nakwizinto ezizitho zine, nakwizinto zonke eziphilileyo zehlabathi ezikuni; kwiinto zonke eziphume emkhombeni,  ezizizinto zonke eziphilileyo zehlabathi.
1_9_11_Ndiwumise umnqophiso wam nani, ukuba ingabi sanqunyulwa yonke inyama ngamanzi onogumbe, kungabi sabakho nogumbe wokulonakalisa ihlabathi.
1_9_12_Wathi uThixo, Nguwo lo umqondiso womnqophiso endiwubekayo phakathi kwam nani, nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo ekuni,  kuse kwizizukulwana zasephakadeni:
1_9_13_umnyama wam ndiwubeke efini, ukuba ube ngumqondiso womnqophiso ophakathi kwam nehlabathi.
1_9_14_Kothi, ndakuwusibekelisa ngelifu umhlaba, ubonakale umnyama lowo efini;
1_9_15_ndiwukhumbule umnqophiso wam ophakathi kwam nani, nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo enyameni yonke, angabi sabakho amanzi onogumbe okonakalisa inyama yonke.
1_9_16_Umnyama woba semafini ke, ndiwukhangele, ndikhumbule umnqophiso ongunaphakade phakathi koThixo nayo yonke imiphefumlo ephilileyo, enyameni yonke esehlabathini.
1_9_17_Wathi uThixo kuNowa, Nguwo lowo umqondiso womnqophiso endiwumisileyo phakathi kwam nayo yonke inyama esehlabathini.
1_9_18_Ke kaloku oonyana bakaNowa, abaphuma emkhombeni,  babengooShem, noHam, noYafete; uHam ke nguyise kaKanan.
1_9_19_Aba bathathu ngoonyana bakaNowa; balizaza ihlabathi lonke.
1_9_20_UNowa wathi, engumlimi womhlaba, waqala watyala isidiliya.
1_9_21_Wasela iwayini, wanxila, wazihluba phakathi kwentente yakhe.
1_9_22_UHam, uyise kaKanan, wabubona ubuze bukayise, waxelela abakhuluwa bakhe bobabini ngaphandle.
1_9_23_UShem noYafete bathabatha ingubo, bayibeka emagxeni abo bobabini, baya ngomva, babugubungela ubuze bukayise.
1_9_24_Wavuka uNowa ewayinini yakhe, wakwazi akwenzileyo unyana wakhe omnci kuye.
1_9_25_Wathi, Makaqalekiswe uKanan, Abe sisicaka sezicaka kubazalwana bakhe.
1_9_26_Wathi, Makabongwe uYehova uThixo kaShem, UKanan abe sisicaka kubo.
1_9_27_UThixo makamvulele uYafete, Ahlale ezintenteni zikaShem,  UKanan abe sisicaka kubo.
1_9_28_Wahlala uNowa emveni konogumbe iminyaka emakhulu mthathu anamanci mahlanu.
1_9_29_Yonke imihla kaNowa yaba yiminyaka emakhulu asithoba anamanci mahlanu; wafa ke.
1_10_1_Yiyo le ke inzala yoonyana bakaNowa: uShem, noHam,  noYafete. Bazalelwa oonyana emveni konogumbe.
1_10_2_Oonyana bakaYafete nguGomere, noMagogi, noMadayi, noYavan,  noTubhali, noMesheki, noTirasi.
1_10_3_Oonyana bakaGomere nguAshekenazi, noRifati, noTogarma.
1_10_4_Oonyana bakaYavan nguElisha, noTarshishe, ngamaKiti namaDodan.
1_10_5_Zadabuka kubo abo iziqithi zeentlanga emazweni, lwaolo ngokolwimi lwalo, ngokwesizwe salo ezintlangeni zazo.
1_10_6_Oonyana bakaHam nguKushi, noMitserayim, noPuti, noKanan.
1_10_7_Oonyana bakaKushi nguSebha, noHavila, noSebheta, noRama,  noSabheteka; oonyana bakaRama nguShebha noDedan.
1_10_8_UKushi wazala uNimrodi; yena waqala waba ligorha ehlabathini.
1_10_9_Yena waba ligorha lezingela phambi koYehova; ngenxa yoko kwathiwa, NjengoNimrodi, igorha lezingela phambi koYehova.
1_10_10_Ukuqala kobukumkani bakhe yiBhabheli, ne-Ereki, neAkadi,  neKalene, ezweni leShinare.
1_10_11_Kulo elo zwe waphuma waya kwelaseAsiriya, wikha iNineve neRehobhotire nomzi weKala,
1_10_12_neRezen, phakathi kweNineve neKala; nguloo mzi mkhulu ke lowo.
1_10_13_UMitzerayim wazala amaLudi, nama-Anam, namaLehabhi,  namaNafetuyi,
1_10_14_namaPatrusi, namaKaseluyi, apho kwaphuma khona amaFilisti namaKafetori.
1_10_15_UKanan wazala uTsidon, owamazi bulo wakhe, noHeti,
1_10_16_namaYebhusi, nama-Amori, namaGirgashi,
1_10_17_namaHivi, nama-Areki, namaSin,
1_10_18_nama-Arvadi, namaTsemari, namaHamati; emveni koko zaphangalala izizwe zamaKanan.
1_10_19_Umda wamaKanan wathabathela eTsidon, wasinga eGerare, wasa eGaza; wasinga eSodom, neGomora, neAdama, neTsebhoyim, wasa eLasha.
1_10_20_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaHam, ngokwezizwe zabo, ngokweelwimi zabo, emazweni abo, ezintlangeni zabo.
1_10_21_UShem wazalelwa naye; unguyise wabo bonke oonyana bakaEbhere, ungumzalwana omkhulu kaYafete.
1_10_22_Oonyana bakaShem nguElam, noAsuri, noArpakishadi, noLudi,  noAram.
1_10_23_Oonyana baka-Aram ngu-Utse, noHuli, noGetere, noMashi.
1_10_24_UArpakishadi wazala uShela, uShela wazala uEbhere.
1_10_25_UEbhere wazalelwa oonyana bababini; igama lomnye belinguPelege, ngokuba ngemihla yakhe bahlukahluka abemi behlabathi; igama lomninawa wakhe belinguYoketan.
1_10_26_UYoketan wazala uAlemodadi, noShelefe, noHatsaremavete,  noYera,
1_10_27_noHadoram, noUzali, noDikela,
1_10_28_no-Obhali, noAbhimayeli, noShebha,
1_10_29_no-Ofire, noHavila, noYobhabhi; bonke abo bangoonyana bakaYoketan.
1_10_30_Ukuma kwabo kwathabathela eMesha, kwasinga eZefara, intaba yasempumalanga.
1_10_31_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaShem ngokwezizwe zabo, ngokweelwimi zabo, emazweni abo, ngokweentlanga zabo.
1_10_32_Zizo ezo izizwe zoonyana bakaNowa, ngokweenzalo zabo,  ezintlangeni zabo; zadabuka kubo abo iintlanga ehlabathini emveni konogumbe.
1_11_1_Ke kaloku lonke ihlabathi libe lintetho-nye, limazwi manye.
1_11_2_Kwathi, ekundulukeni kwabo besinga empumalanga, bafumana ithafa ezweni laseShinare; bahlala khona. Bathi abanye kwabanye, Yizani, senze izitena, sizitshise kunene.
1_11_3_Baba nezitena endaweni yamatye, nebhitumene endaweni yodaka.
1_11_4_Bathi, Yizani, sizakhele umzi, nepoma lenqaba elincopho isemazulwini; sizenzele igama, hleze sichithakalele ehlabathini lonke.
1_11_5_UYehova wehla, eza kukhangela umzi lowo, nenqaba leyo inde,  bayakhayo oonyana boluntu.
1_11_6_Wathi uYehova, Yabona, abantu banye, bantetho-nye bonke bephela; yingqalo ke le yokwenza kwabo; kaloku abayi kunqatyelwa nto bayinkqangiyeleyo ukuyenza.
1_11_7_Yizani, sihle, sidube khona apho intetho yabo, ngokokuze bangevani ngentetho.
1_11_8_UYehova wabachithachitha kwalapho ehlabathini lonke; bayeka ukuwakha loo mzi.
1_11_9_Ngenxa yoko kwathiwa igama lawo yiBhabheli; ngokuba uYehova wayiduba khona apho intetho yehlabathi lonke, wabachithachitha kwalapho uYehova ehlabathini lonke.
1_11_10_Yiyo le ke inzala kaShem: uShem ubeminyaka ilikhulu ezelwe, wazala uArpakishadi, iminyaka emibini emveni konogumbe.
1_11_11_UShem wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uArpakishadi iminyaka emakhulu mahlanu, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_12_UArpakishadi wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu anamihlanu, wazala uShela.
1_11_13_UArpakishadi wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uShela iminyaka emakhulu mane anamathathu, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_14_UShela wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu, wazala uEbhere.
1_11_15_UShela wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uEbhere iminyaka emakhulu mane anamithathu, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_16_UEbhere wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu anamine, wazala uPelege.
1_11_17_UEbhere wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uPelege iminyaka emakhulu mane anamanci mathathu, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_18_UPelege wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu, wazala uRehu.
1_11_19_UPelege wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uRehu iminyaka emakhulu mabini anesithoba, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_20_URehu wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu anamibini, wazala uSerugi.
1_11_21_URehu wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uSerugi iminyaka emakhulu mabini anesixhenxe, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_22_USerugi wahlala iminyaka emashumi mathathu, wazala uNahore.
1_11_23_USerugi wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uNahore iminyaka emakhulu mabini, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_24_UNahore wahlala iminyaka emashumi mabini anesithoba,  wazala uTera.
1_11_25_UNahore wahlala emveni kokuzala kwakhe uTera iminyaka elikhulu elinashumi-nye linesithoba, wazala oonyana neentombi.
1_11_26_UTera wahlala iminyaka emashumi asixhenxe, wazala uAbram,  noNahore, noHaran.
1_11_27_Yiyo le ke inzala kaTera: uTera wazala uAbram, noNahore,  noHaran; uHaran wazala uLote.
1_11_28_Wafa uHaran esekho uTera uyise, ezweni lokuzalwa kwakhe,  eUre yamaKaledi.
1_11_29_UAbram noNahore bazeka abafazi; igama lomka-Abram lalinguSarayi; igama lomkaNahore lalinguMilka, intombi kaHaran,  usoMilka, usoYiska.
1_11_30_USarayi ebengazali, engenamntwana.
1_11_31_UTera wamthabatha uAbram, unyana wakhe, noLote unyana kaHaran, unyana wonyana wakhe, noSarayi umolokazana wakhe,  umka-Abram unyana wakhe, baphuma nabo eUre yamaKaledi, besiya ezweni lakwaKanan; bafika kwelakwaHaran, bahlala khona.
1_11_32_Imihla kaTera yaba yiminyaka emakhulu mabini anamihlanu;  wafa uTera kwelakwaHaran.
1_12_1_Ke kaloku uYehova wathi kuAbram, Hamba, umke ezweni lakowenu, kwelokuzalwa kwakho, nasendlwini kayihlo, uye ezweni endokubonisa lona;
1_12_2_ndikwenze uhlanga olukhulu, ndikusikelele, ndilikhulise igama lakho, ube yintsikelelo;
1_12_3_ndibasikelele abakusikelelayo, ndimtshabhise okuqalekisayo;  zisikeleleke ngawe zonke izizwe zehlabathi.
1_12_4_Wahamba uAbram njengoko wathethayo uYehova kuye; wahamba naye uLote. UAbram ubeminyaka imashumi asixhenxe anamihlanti ezelwe, ukuphuma kwakhe kwelakwaHaran.
1_12_5_UAbram wathabatha uSarayi umkakhe, noLote unyana womninawa wakhe, nengqwebo yabo yonke ababeyiqwebile, nabantu ababebafumene kwelakwaHaran; baphuma ke besiya ezweni lakwaKanan, bafika ke ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_12_6_UAbram wacanda ilizwe, wada waya kwindawo enoShekem, wada waya eMokini kaMore. AmaKanan abekho ngelo xesha kulo ilizwe.
1_12_7_UYehova wabonakala kuAbram, wathi, Imbewu yakho ndiya kuyinika eli lizwe. Wamakhela khona isibingelelo uYehova,  owabonakalayo kuye.
1_12_8_Wesuka khona waya entabeni ngasempumalanga, eBheteli,  wayitwabulula intente yakhe, iBheteli ingasentshonalanga, iAyi ingasempumalanga; wamakhela khona isibingelelo uYehova, wanqula igama likaYehova.
1_12_9_Wanduluka uAbram, ehamba encothula, esinga kwelasezantsi.
1_12_10_Kwabakho indlala ezweni. Wehla uAbraham waya eYiputa,  ukuze aphambukele khona; ngokuba indlala ibinzima elizweni.
1_12_11_Kwathi, akusondela ukuba angene eYiputa, wathi kuSarayi umkakhe, Uyabona ke, ndiyazi ukuba ungumfazi omhle imbonakalo.
1_12_12_Kothi ke, akukubona amaYiputa, athi, Ngumkakhe lo;  andibulale, akuyeke wena udle ubomi.
1_12_13_Uze uthi, ungudade wethu wena; ukuze kulunge kum ngenxa yakho, umphefumlo wam udle ubomi ngenxa enawe.
1_12_14_Kwathi, akufika uAbram eYiputa, ambona amaYiputa umfazi ukuba uyinzwakazi.
1_12_15_Bambona abathetheli bakaFaro, bamdumisa kuFaro; umfazi wasiwa endlwini kaFaro.
1_12_16_Wamphatha ngokulungileyo uAbram ngenxa yakhe; wanempahla emfutshane, neenkomo, namaesile, nabakhonzi, nabakhonzazana,  neemazi zamaesile, neenkamela.
1_12_17_UYehova wambetha uFaro nendlu yakhe ngezibetho ezikhulu ngenxa kaSarayi, umka-Abram.
1_12_18_UFaro wambiza uAbram wathi, Yintoni na le uyenzileyo kum?  Yini na ukuba ungandixeleli ukuba ngumkakho?
1_12_19_Yini na ukuba uthi, ngudade wenu? Ndamthabatha ukuba abe ngumfazi wam. Ngoku ke nanko unikakho, mthabathe uhambe.
1_12_20_UFaro wawawisela umthetho amadoda ngaye; amkhapha yena nomkakhe, nezinto zakhe zonke.
1_13_1_Wenyuka uAbram, ephuma eYiputa, yena nomkakhe, neento zakhe zonke, enoLote, esinga kwelasezantsi.
1_13_2_UAbram waye esisityebi kunene ngemfuyo, nangesilivere,  nangegolide.
1_13_3_Wahamba encothula, esuka kwelasezantsi, wafika eBheteli,  kuloo ndawo yayikhona intente yakhe matanci, phakathi kweBheteli neAyi,
1_13_4_endaweni yesibingelelo awasenzayo khona ekuqaleni. UAbram walinqula khona igama likaYehova.
1_13_5_Naye uLote, obehamba noAbram, waye enempahla emfutshane,  neenkomo, neentente.
1_13_6_Ilizwe elo alaba nakubathwala, ukuba bahlale ndawonye;  ngokuba impahla yabo yayininzi, ababa nakuhlala ndawonye.
1_13_7_Kwabakho ukubambana phakathi kwabalusi bemfuyo ka-Abram nabalusi bemfuyo kaLote. Ngelo xesha ilizwe lalimiwe ngamaKanan namaPerizi.
1_13_8_UAbram wathi kuLote, Makungabikho mbambano kaloku phakathi kwam nawe, naphakathi kwabalusi bam nabalusi bakho; ngokuba singamadoda azalanayo.
1_13_9_Aliphambi kwakho na ilizwe lonke? Khawahluke kum; ukuba uya ekhohlo, ndoya ekunene, ukuba uya ekunene, ndoya ekhohlo.
1_13_10_ULote waphakamisa amehlo akhe, wawukhangela wonke ummandla waseYordan, ngokuba ubunamanzi wonke, engekayonakalisi uYehova iSodom neGomora, unjengomyezo kaYehova, unjengelizwe laseYiputa, usingise eTsohare.
1_13_11_ULote wawunyula wonke ummandla waseYordan; wanduluka uLote waya ngasempumalanga; bahlukana ke.
1_13_12_UAbram wahlala ezweni lakwaKanan; uLote wahlala emizini yaloo mmandla, wayisondezela eSodom intente yakhe.
1_13_13_Ke kaloku amadoda aseSodom ayengabenzi bobubi, engaboni abakhulu kuYehova.
1_13_14_Wathi uYehova kuAbram, emveni kokuba uLote ahlukane naye,  Khawuwaphakamise amehlo akho ukuloo ndawo ukuyo, ubhekise entla, nasezantsi, nasempumalanga, nasentshonalanga;
1_13_15_ngokuba lonke ilizwe olibonayo ndiya kulinika wena,  nembewu yakho, kude kuse ephakadeni;
1_13_16_ndiyenze imbewu yakho ibe njengothuli lomhlaba, angathi ubani enako ukulubala uthuli lomhlaba, ayibale nembewu yakho.
1_13_17_Suka, ulihambe ilizwe ngobude balo nangobubanzi balo;  ngokuba ndiya kulinika wena.
1_13_18_Wancothula uAbram intente yakhe, waya wahlala ngaseMiokini kaMamre eseHebron, wakhela khona uYehova isibingelelo.
1_14_1_Kwathi ngemihla ka-Amrafele ukumkani waseShinare, noAriyoki ukumkani wase-Elazare, noKedorlahomere ukumkani wakwaElam,  noTidali ukumkani wamaGoyi,
1_14_2_benza imfazwe noBhera ukumkani waseSodom, noBhirsha ukumkani waseGomora, noShinabhi ukumkani waseAdama,  noShemebhere ukumkani waseTsebhoyim, nokumkani waseBhela,  eyiTsohare.
1_14_3_Bonke abo baqukana entilini yaseSidim, eluLwandle lweTyuwa.
1_14_4_Iminyaka elishumi elinamibini bakhonza uKedorlahomere,  bathi ngomnyaka weshumi elinantathu bagwilika.
1_14_5_Ngomnyaka weshumi elinamine weza uKedorlahomere nookumkani ababanaye, bawatshabalalisa amaRafa eAshtaroti-karnayim,  namaZuzi eHam, namaEma ethafeni laseKiriyatayim,
1_14_6_namaHori entabeni yawo yakwaSehire, kwasa kwiElparan,  engasentlango.
1_14_7_Bajika, beza e-En-mishpati eyiKadeshe, balitshabalalisa lonke ilizwe lakwa-Amaleki, nama-Amori abehleli eHatsetson-tamare.
1_14_8_Waphuma ukumkani waseSodom, nokumkani waseGomora, nokumkani waseAdama, nokumkani waseTsebhoyim, nokumkani waseBhela,  eyiTsohare, bakha uluhlu lokulwa nabo entilini yaseSidim;
1_14_9_noKedorlahomere ukumkani wakwaElam, noTidali ukumkani wamaGoyi, noAmrafele ukumkani waseShinare, noAriyoki ukumkani wase-Elazare: ookumkani abahlanu balwa nabane.
1_14_10_Ke intili yaseSidim yaye iyimingxuma yodwa yebhitumene;  basaba ookumkani, owaseSodom, nowaseGomora, beyela khona,  amasalela asabela entabeni.
1_14_11_Bayithabatha yonke impahla yaseSodom, neGomora, nako konke ukudla kwabo, bemka.
1_14_12_Bamthabatha noLote, nempahla yakhe, unyana womninawa ka-Abram, bemka; kuba wayehleli eSodom.
1_14_13_Wafika osindileyo, waxelela uAbram, umHebhere; yena ebehleli eMiokini kaMamre umAmori, umzalwana kaEshkoli,  nomzalwana ka-Anere; bona ke bebengamanqophisana noAbram.
1_14_14_Weva ke uAbram, ukuba uthinjiwe umzalwana wakhe,  wawaphalaza amadoda akhe aqeqeshiweyo, azalelwe endlwini yakhe,  angamakhulu mathathu aneshumi elinesibhozo, wasukela, waya kufika kwaDan.
1_14_15_Wawahlulahlula, wabawela ebusuku, yena nabakhonzi bakho,  wabagxotha, wabasukela wasa eHobha, engasekhohlo kweDamasko.
1_14_16_Wazibuyisa zonke iimpahla, kwanoLote unizalwana wakhe,  wazibuyisa neempahla zakhe, kwanabafazi nabantu.
1_14_17_Waphuma ukumkani waseSodom, esiya kumkhawulela ekubuyeni kwakhe ekutshabalaliseni uKedorlahomere, nookumkani ebabenaye,  entilini yeShave, eyintili yookumkani.
1_14_18_UMelkitsedeke, ukumkani waseSalem, waphuma enesonka newayini, ubengumbingeleli kaThixo Osenyangweni.
1_14_19_Wamsikelela wathi, Makasikelelwe uAbram nguThixo Osenyangweni, uMninimazulu nehlabathi!
1_14_20_Makabongwe uThixo Osenyangweni obanikeleyo ababandezeli bakho esandleni sakho. UAbram wamnika isishumi seento zonke.
1_14_21_Wathi ukumkani waseSodom, kuAbram, Ndinike abantu,  uthabathe impahla.
1_14_22_Wathi uAbram kukumkani waseSodom, Isandla sam ndisiphakamisele kuYehova uThixo Osenyangweni, uMninimazulu nehlabathi,
1_14_23_ukuba andiyi kuthabatha nosinga, nokuba ngumtya wembadada,  ukuba andiyi kuthabatha kuko konke okwakho; ukuze ungatsho ukuthi, Mna nidimtyebisile uAbram.
1_14_24_Makungabikho nto iyeyam, kuphela ibe yile nto idliweyo ngabafana, nesabelo samadoda abehamba nam, uAnere, noEshkoli,  noMamre; wona makasithabathe isabelo sawo.
1_15_1_Emveni kwezo zinto, lafika ilizwe likaYehova kuAbram ngombono, lisithi, Musa ukoyika, Abram; ndiyingweletshetshe yakho, umvuzo wakho omkhulu kunene.
1_15_2_Wathi uAbram, Nkosi yam, Yehova, wondinika ntoni na?  Ndihamba ndingenamntwana; indlamafa yendlu yam ngulo Eliyezere waseDamasko.
1_15_3_Wathi uAbram, Yabona, akundinikanga mbewu; yabona, umntu ongowendlu yam uya kuba yindlamafa yam.
1_15_4_Nalo ilizwi likaYehova lifika kuye, lisithi, Akayi kuba yindlamafa yakho lo; ngoya kuphuma ezibilini zakhe, yena oya kuba yindlamafa yakho.
1_15_5_Wamsa phandle, wathi, Khawubheke phezulu ezulwini, uzibale iinkwenkwezi, ukuba unokuzibala; wathi kuye, Iya kuba njalo ke imbewu yakho.
1_15_6_Wakholwa kuYehova; oko wakubalela ebulungiseni kuye.
1_15_7_Wathi kuye, NdinguYehova owakukhuphayo eUre yamaKaledi,  ukuba ndikunike eli lizwe, ulidle ilifa.
1_15_8_Wathi yena, Nkosi Yehova, ndiya kwazi ngantoni na, ukuba ndiya kulidla ilifa?
1_15_9_Wathi kuye, Ndithabathele ithokazi eliminyaka mithathu,  nemazi yebhokhwe eminyaka mithathu, nenkunzi yemvu eminyaka mithathu, nehobe, negobo levukuthu.
1_15_10_Wamthabathela ke zonke ezo zinto, wazicanda kubini,  wazibeka izahlulo, esinye sakhangelana nesinye; ke zona iintaka akazicanda.
1_15_11_Ehla amaxhalanga phezu kwezidumbu, wawaphekuza uAbram.
1_15_12_Kwathi, xa litshonayo ilanga, efikelwe uAbram bubuthongo obukhulu, wabo na efikelwa kukothuka nabubumnyama obukhulu.
1_15_13_Wathi kuAbram, Yazi ke, ukuba imbewu yakho iya kuba ngumphambukeli ezweni elingelayo, ibakhonze abo, bayicinezele,  iminyaka emakhulu mane.
1_15_14_Kananjalo uhlanga eya kulukhonza ndiya kulugweba; emveni koko iya kuphuma ineempahla ezininzi.
1_15_15_Ke wena uya kuya kooyihlo unoxolo; ungcwatywe uyingwevu enkulu.
1_15_16_Kwesesine isizukulwana iya kubuyela apha, kuba ubugwenxa bama-Amori abukazaliseki.
1_15_17_Kwathi, lakuba litshonile ilanga, kwakuba sithokothoko,  wabona kukho; iziko eliqhumayo, elinelangatye elidangazelayo,  elacanda phakathi kwezo zahlulo.
1_15_18_Ngaloo mini ke uYehova wenza umnqophiso noAbram, wathi,  Imbewu yakho ndiyinike eli lizwe, lithabathele emlanjeni waseYiputa, lise emlanjeni omkhulu, emlanjeni ongumEfrati:
1_15_19_amaKeni, namaKinazi, namaKadimon,
1_15_20_namaHeti, namaPerizi, namaRafa,
1_15_21_nama-Amori, namaKanan, namaGirigashi, namaYebhusi.
1_16_1_Ke kaloku uSarayi umka-Abram ubengamzaleli mntwana. Waye enomkhonzazana ongumYiputazana, ogama belinguHagare.
1_16_2_Wathi uSarayi kuAbram, Yabona, uYehova undivingcile ukuba ndingazali; khawungene kumkhonzazana wam lo, mhlawumbi ndingakheka ngaye. Waliphulaphula uAbram izwi likaSarayi.
1_16_3_Wathi uSarayi, umka-Abram, wamthabatha uHagare umYiputazana, umkhonzazana wakhe, emveni kokuba uAbram wayehleli iminyaka elishumi ezweni lakwaKanan, wamnika uAbram indoda yakhe ukuba abe ngumkakhe.
1_16_4_Wamngena ke uHagare, wamitha; akubona ukuba umithi,  inkosikazi yakhe yacukucezeka emehlweni akhe.
1_16_5_Wathi uSarayi kuAbram, Ukoniwa kwam makube phezu kwakho;  umkhonzazana wam ndimnike mna esifubeni sakho; uthe akubona ukuba umithi, ndacukucezeka emehlweni akhe; uYehova makagwebe phakathi kwam nawe.
1_16_6_Wathi uAbram kuSarayi, Yabona, umkhonzazana wakho asesandleni sakho; yenza kuye okulungileyo emehlweni akho.  USarayi wamcinezela, wabaleka wemka ebusweni bakhe.
1_16_7_Ke kaloku isithunywa sikaYehova samfumana ngasemthonjeni wamanzi entlango, ngasemthonjeni osendleleni eya eShure.
1_16_8_Sathi, Hagare, mkhonzazana kaSarayi, uvela phi na, usiya phi na? Wathi, Ndibaleke ndemka ebusweni bukaSarayi, inkosikazi yam.
1_16_9_Sathi isithunywa sikaYehova kuye, Buyela kwinkosikazi yakho, uzithobe phantsi kwesandla sayo.
1_16_10_Sathi isithunywa sikaYehova kuye, Ndiya kuyandisa kakhulu imbewu yakho, ingabalwa ngenxa yobuninzi.
1_16_11_Sathi isithunywa sikaYehova kuye, Yabona umithi; uya kuzala unyana, umthiye igama elinguIshmayeli, ngokuba uYehova uzivile iintsizi zakho.
1_16_12_Yena uya kuba ngumntu onjenge-esile lasendle ukundweba;  isandla sakhe siya kuchasana nabantu bonke, isandla sabantu bonke sichasane naye; ahlale ebusweni babazalwana bakhe bonke.
1_16_13_Walibiza igama likaYehova, obethetha naye, wathi,  UnguThixo ozibonakalisayo. Ngokuba wathi, Ndisabona na nalapha,  emveni kokuba ndimbonile?
1_16_14_Ngenxa yoko walithiya elo qula igama lokuthi liQula likaPhila-ebonile; nalo phakathi kweKadeshe neBherede.
1_16_15_UHagare wamzalela uAbram unyana; uAbram ukumthiya igama unyana wakhe, lowo abemzalele yena uHagare, wathi nguIshmayeli.
1_16_16_UAbram ubeminyaka imashumi asibhozo anamithandathu ezelwe,  oko uHagare wamzalelayo uAbram uIshmayeli.
1_17_1_Kwathi, uAbram akuba minyaka imashumi asithoba anesithoba ezelwe, uYehova wabonakala kuAbram, wathi kuye, NdinguThixo uSomandla; hamba phambi kwam ube ngogqibeleleyo.
1_17_2_Ndiya kuwubeka umnqophiso wam phakathi kwam nawe,  ndikwandise kakhulu kunene.
1_17_3_Wawa uAbram ngobuso bakhe.
1_17_4_UThixo wathetha naye, esithi, Mna, yabona, umnqophiso wam unawe; uya kuba nguyise wengxokolo yeentlanga.
1_17_5_Kananjalo akusayi kuthiwa igama lakho nguAbram; igama lakho liya kuba nguAbraham, ngokuba ndikwenze uyise wengxokolo yeentlanga;
1_17_6_ndiya kukuqha misa kakhulu kunene, ndikwenze iintlanga,  kuphume ookumkani kuwe;
1_17_7_ndiwumise umnqophiso wam phakathi kwam nawe, naphakathi kwembewu yakho emva kwakho kwizizukulwana zayo, ube ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade, wokuba ndibe nguThixo kuwe,  nakwimbewu yakho emva kwakho;
1_17_8_ndilinike wena nembewu yakho emva kwakho ilizwe lokuphambukela kwakho, lonke ilizwe eli lakwaKanan, ukuba libe yinto yenu ngonaphakade, ndibe nguThixo wabo.
1_17_9_Wathi uThixo kuAbraham, Wena ke, umnqophiso wam wowugcina,  nembewu yakho emva kwakho kwizizukulwana zabo.
1_17_10_Nguwo lo umnqophiso wam eniya kuwugcina phakathi kwam nani, nembewu yakho emva kwakho: wokuba yonke into eyindoda kuni yaluswe; naluswe inyama yokwaluswa;
1_17_11_oko kube ngumqondiso womnqophiso ophakathi kwam nani.
1_17_12_Unyana omihla isibhozo makaluswe kuni, yonke into eyindoda kwizizukulwana zenu, ezelwe endlwini, nezuzwe ngemali kubani wolunye uhlanga, ongengowembewu yakho yena.
1_17_13_Makaluswe ozelwe endlwini yakho, nozuzwe ngemali yakho;  umnqophiso wam enyameni yenu uya kuba ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade.
1_17_14_Into eyindoda engalukileyo, enyama yokwaluswa ingaluswanga, loo mphefumlo mawunqanyulwe, ungabikho ebantwini bakowawo; uwaphule umnqophiso wam.
1_17_15_Wathi uThixo kuAbraham, USarayi umkakho akuyi kumbiza ngegama lokuba nguSarayi; igama lakhe loba nguSara.
1_17_16_Ndiya kumsikelela; kananjalo ndikunike unyana ngaye,  ndimsikelele, abe ziintlanga, kuphume ookumkani bezizwe kuye.
1_17_17_UAbraham wawa ngobuso bakhe, wahleka, wathi entliziyweni yakhe, Azi umntu ominyaka ilikhulu wozalelwa na? Azi uSara,  intokazi eminyaka imashumi asithoba, angazala na?
1_17_18_Wathi uAbraham kuThixo, Wanga uIshmayeli angadla ubomi phambi kwakho!
1_17_19_Wathi uThixo, Ewe, uSara umkakho uya kukuzalela unyana,  umbize ngegama lokuba nguIsake; ndiwumise umnqophiso wam naye,  ube ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade kwimbewu yakhe emva kwakhe.
1_17_20_Ngokusingisele kuIshmayeli ndikuvile; uyabona,  ndimsikelele, ndimqhamisile, ndimandisile kakhulu kunene. Uya kuzala izikhulu ezilishumi elinazibini, ndimenze uhlanga olukhulu.
1_17_21_Umnqophiso wam wona ndowumisa noIsake, oya kumzalelwa nguSara ngeli xesha nyakenye.
1_17_22_Wagqiba ukuthetha naye. Wenyuka uThixo esuka kuAbraham.
1_17_23_UAbraham wamthabatha uIshmayeli unyana wakhe, nabo bonke abazalelwe endlwini yakhe, nabo bonke abazuzwe ngemali yakhe,  yonke into eyindoda phakathi kwabantu bendlu ka-Abraham,  wayalusa inyama yokwaluswa kwangaloo mini, njengoko abethethile uThixo kuye.
1_17_24_UAbraham ebeminyaka imashumi asithoba anesithoba ezelwe,  ukwaluswa kwenyama yokwaluswa.
1_17_25_UIshmayeli, unyana wakhe, ebeminyaka ilishumi elinamithathu ezelwe, ukwaluswa kwenyama yokwaluswa.
1_17_26_Kwangaloo mini waluswa uAbraham, noIshmayeli unyana wakhe.
1_17_27_Nawo onke amadoda endlu yakhe, azalelwe endlwini yakhe,  nazuzwe ngemali kubani wolunye uhlanga, aluswa kunye naye.
1_18_1_UYehova wabonakala kuye eMiokini kaMamre, ehleli emnyango wentente, ekufudumaleni kwemini.
1_18_2_Wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wabona, nango amadoda amathathu emi ngakuye. Wabona, wagidima, eya kuwa khawulela, esuka emnyango wentente.
1_18_3_Waqubuda emhlabeni, wathi, Nkosi yam, ukuba kaloku ndibabalwe nguwe, musa ukudlula umke kumkhonzi wakho.
1_18_4_Makhe kuthatyathwe intwana yamanzi, nihlambe iinyawo zenu,  ningqengqe phantsi komthi lo;
1_18_5_ndithabathe iqhekeza lesonka, nixhase iintliziyo zenu;  kamva nodlula; kuba nize kudlula ngenxa yoko kumkhonzi wenu.  Athi, Yenza ngoko uthethe ngako.
1_18_6_Wakhawuleza uAbraham, waya ententeni kuSara, wathi,  Khawuleza, uxovule iiseha ezintathu zomgubo ocoliweyo, wenze amaqebengwana ezonka.
1_18_7_Wagidima waya ezinkomeni uAbraham, wathabatha ithole lenkomo, lithambile, lilungile, wanika umfana, wakhawuleza ukulilungisa.
1_18_8_Wathabatha amasi, nobisi, nethole lenkomo abelilungisile,  wabeka phambi kwawo, wema ngakuwo phantsi komthi lowo, adla.
1_18_9_Athi kuye, Uphi na uSara umkakho?
1_18_10_Wathi, Nanko ententeni. Yathi, Ndiya kubuyela kuwe,  lakubuya eli xesha; yabona, uSara umkakho uya kuba nonyana.  Weva uSara esemnyango wentente, wona esemva kwayo.
1_18_11_Ke kaloku uAbraham noSara babesebaluphele, sebekhulile;  kusekunqamkile kuSara okwendlela yabafazi.
1_18_12_USara wahleka ngaphakathi kwakhe, esithi, Emveni kokuba ndihagele, ndisaya kuyolelwa na, nenkosi yam yaluphele nje?
1_18_13_Wathi uYehova kuAbraham, Yini na ukuba uSara ahleke,  esithi, Kuhleliwe nje ndiya kuzala na ndaluphele nje mna?
1_18_14_Kukho nto ingamnqabelayo na uYehova? Ngexesha elimisiweyo ndiya kubuyela kuwe, lakubuya eli xesha, uSara abe nonyana.
1_18_15_Wakhanyela uSara, esithi, Andihlekanga; kuba ebesoyika.  Wathi yena, Hayi, uhlekile.
1_18_16_Asuka ke amadoda lawo ondela eSodom; uAbraham ehamba nawo,  ewaphelekelela.
1_18_17_Wathi uYehova, Ndomfihlela na uAbraham into endiza kuyenza?
1_18_18_Kanti uAbraham uya kuthi abe luhlanga olukhulu,  olunamandla, zisikeleleke ngaye iintlanga zonke zehlabathi.
1_18_19_Kuba ndaze yena, ukuze abawisele umthetho abantwana bakhe,  nendlu yakhe emva kwakhe, bagcine indlela kaYehova, benze ubulungisa nokusesikweni, ukuze uYehova amenzele uAbraham into ayithethileyo kuye.
1_18_20_Wathi uYehova, Isikhalo saseSodom neGomora sisikhulu nje,  nesono sayo sinzima kunene nje,
1_18_21_ndiya kukha ndihle, ndikhangele ukuba baphelelisile na ngokwesikhalo sayo esifikileyo kum; ukuba akunjalo, ndazi.
1_18_22_Ajika apho amadoda lawo, asinga eSodom; ke yena uAbraham wayesemi phambi koYehova.
1_18_23_Wasondela uAbraham, wathi, Ungade ubhebhethe olilungisa kunye nongendawo yini na?
1_18_24_Hi, kwakho amashumi amahlanu amalungisa phakathi komzi;  ungade uyibhebhethe, ungayixoleli, loo ndawo yini na, ngenxa yamalungisa amashumi mahlanu akuyo?
1_18_25_Makube lee kuwe ukwenza ngokwendawo enjalo ukubulala olilungisa kunye nongendawo, ilungisa libe njengongendawo;  makube lee kuwe. Umgwebi wehlabathi lonke akayi kwenza okusesikweni yini na?
1_18_26_Wathi uYehova, Ukuba ndithe ndafumana eSodom amalungisa amashumi mahlanu phakathi komzi, ndoyixolela yonke loo ndawo ngenxa yawo.
1_18_27_Waphendula uAbraham, wathi, Khawubone, sendide ndathetha eNkosini, ndiluthuli nothuthu.
1_18_28_Hi ke, kwasweleka isihlanu kumalungisa amashumi mahlanu,  wowonakalisa ngenxa yesihlanu yini na wonke umzi? Yathi, Andiyi kuwonakalisa, ukuba ndithe ndafumana khona amashumi omane anesihlanu.
1_18_29_Waphinda kanjalo wathetha kuye, wathi, Hi ke, kwafunyanwa khona amashumi omane? Yathi, Andiyi kukwenza ngenxa yamashumi omane.
1_18_30_Wathi, Mayingabi namsindo iNkosi, khe ndithethe. Hi ke,  kwafunyanwa khona amashumi omathathu? Yathi, Andiyi kukwenza,  ukuba ndithe ndafumana khona amashumi omathathu.
1_18_31_Wathi, Khawubone, sendide ndathetha eNkosini. Hi ke,  kwafunyanwa khona amashumi omabini? Yathi, Andiyi kuwonakalisa ngenxa yamashumi omabini.
1_18_32_Wathi, Mayingabi namsindo iNkosi, khendithethe esi sihlandlo sodwa. Hi ke, kwafunyanwa khona ishumi elinye? Yathi,  Andiyi kuwonakalisa ngenxa yeshumi elinye.
1_18_33_Wemka uYehova, akugqiba ukuthetha kuAbraham; uAbraham wabuyela endaweni yakhe.
1_19_1_Zafika izithunywa ezo zozibini eSodom ngokuhlwa, uLote ehleli esangweni leSodom. ULote wazibona, wesuka waya kuzikhawulela, waqubuda ngobuso emhlabeni.
1_19_2_Wathi, Khanibone, zinkosi zam! Khaniphambukele endlwini yomkhonzi wenu, nilale, nihlambe iinyawo zenu, nivuke kusasa,  nihambe indlela yenu. Zathi, Hayi, solala esitratweni.
1_19_3_Wazijoka kunene, zaphambukela kuye, zangena endlwini yakhe;  wazenzela isidlo, woja nezonka ezingenagwele, zadla.
1_19_4_Ke kaloku, zingekalali, amadoda aloo mzi, amadoda aseSodom,  ayirhawula indlu, ethabathela kumfana esa kwixhego, bonke abantu bevela nasekupheleni kwawo.
1_19_5_Bambiza uLote, bathi kuye, Aphi na amadoda angene kuwe ngobu busuku? Wakhuphele kuthi, siwazi.
1_19_6_Waphuma uLote waya kubo emnyango, waluvala ucango emva kwakhe,
1_19_7_wathi, Musani ukwenza into embi, bazalwana.
1_19_8_Khanibone, ndineentombi ezimbini ezingazani nandoda;  mandikhuphele zona kuni, nenze kuzo ngoko kulungileyo emehlweni enu. Ke kula madoda musani ukwenza nto, kuba angene ngenxa yoko emthunzini wophahla lwam.
1_19_9_Bathi, Khwelela; batsho bathi, Lo wezayo ngokuphambukela uhlala egweba; ngoku sokuphatha kakubi wena kunawo. Besuka indulumbane phezu kwendoda uLote, basondela, beza kuluqhekeza ucango.
1_19_10_Amadoda lawo asolula isandla sawo, amngenisa uLote kuwo endlwini, aluvala ucango.
1_19_11_Awabetha ngobumfama amadoda abesemnyango wendlu,  ethabathela kwencinane esa kwenkulu, azidinisa ke ukufuna umnyango.
1_19_12_Athi amadoda lawo kuLote, Usenabani na apha? Umyeni,  noonyana bakho, neentombi zakho, nabo bonke onabo kulo mzi,  bakhuphe kule ndawo;
1_19_13_ngokuba siya kuyonakalisa le ndawo, ngokuba sikhulu isikhalo sabo ebusweni bukaYehova. UYehova usithume ukuba siyonakalise.
1_19_14_Waphuma, uLote, wathetha kubayeni beentombi zakhe, abaya kuzeka iintombi zakhe, wathi, Sukani, niphume kule ndawo;  ngokuba uYehova uya kuwonakalisa lo mzi. Usuke waba njengohlekisayo emehlweni abayeni beentombi zakhe.
1_19_15_Izithunywa zamngxamisa uLote ngesifingo, zathi, Vuka,  thabatha umkakho, neentombi zakho zombini, aba banokufumaneka,  hleze ubhebhethwe ngobugwenxa balo mzi.
1_19_16_Wazilazila; amadoda abamba isandla sakhe, nesandla somkakhe, nesandla seentombi zakhe zombini; uYehova emvela,  amkhupha, amyeka ngaphandle komzi.
1_19_17_Akuba emkhuphele phandle, athi, Zisindise ngenxa yomphefumlo wakho. Musa ukubheka emva kwakho, musa ukuma kuwo wonke lo mmandla; zisindise ngokuya entabeni, hleze ubhebhethwe.
1_19_18_Wathi kuwo uLote, Hayi, Nkosi yam.
1_19_19_Khawubone, umkhonzi wakho umbabale. Uyikhulisile inceba yakho ondenzeleyo, ukuba uwusindise umphefumlo wam; mna ke andinako ukuzisindisa ngokuya entabeni, hleze ndinanyathelwe bububi, ndife.
1_19_20_Khawubone, lo mzi ukufuphi, ukuba kubalekelwe kuwo,  mncinane; ndanga ndingazisindisa ngokuya kuwo (awumncinane na?), usinde umphefumlo wam.
1_19_21_Wathi kuye, Yabona, ndikunonelele nangale nto, ukuba ndingawubhukuqi lo mzi uthethe ngawo.
1_19_22_Khawuleza, zisindise ngokuya khona, kuba andinakwenza nto ude ufike khona. Ngenxa yoko igama laloo mzi kwathiwa yiTsohare.
1_19_23_Ilanga lalise liphumile phezu kwehlabathi, ukufika kukaLote eTsohare.
1_19_24_Wanisa ke uYehova phezu kweSodom neGomora isulfure nomlilo ophuma kuYehova emazulwini;
1_19_25_wayibhukuqa loo mizi, nawo wonke loo mmandla, nabo, bonke abemi baloo mizi, nesihlumo somhlaba.
1_19_26_Kodwa umkakhe, esemva kwakhe, wakhangela ngasemva, waba yintsika yetyuwa.
1_19_27_UAbraham wavuka kusasa, waya kuloo ndawo wayemi kuyo ebusweni bukaYehova.
1_19_28_Wondela eSodom neGomora, nakulo lonke ilizwe laloo mmandla. Wakhangela; nango unyuka umsi welo zwe, njengomsi weziko lemfutho.
1_19_29_Kwathi, xenikweni uThixo wayonakalisayo imizi yaloo mmandla, uThixo wamkhumbula uAbraham, wamkhupha uLote phakathi kobhukuqo olo, ekuyibhukuqeni imizi leyo abehleli kuyo uLote.
1_19_30_Wenyuka uLote ephuma eTsohare, wahlala entabeni,  eneentombi zakhe zombini, kuba ebesoyika ukuhlala eTsohare;  wahlala emqolombeni, yena neentombi zakhe zombini.
1_19_31_Yathi eyamazibulo kwencinane, Ubawo waluphele; akukho ndoda ezweni apha yokusingena ngokwendlela yehlabathi lonke;
1_19_32_yiza, simseze ubawo iwayini, silale naye, sigcine imbewu ngobawo.
1_19_33_Zamseza ke uyise iwayini ngobo busuku; yangena eyamazibulo, yalala noyise; akayazanga yena ukulala kwayo nokuvuka kwayo.
1_19_34_Kwathi ngengomso, yathi eyamazibulo kwencinane, Yabona,  ndilele nobawo phezolo; masimseze iwayini nangobu busuku,  ungene, ulale naye, ukuba sigcine imbewu ngobawo.
1_19_35_Zamseza ke uyise iwayini nangobo busuku, yasuka, encinane yalala naye; akayazanga yena ukulala kwayo nokuvuka kwayo.
1_19_36_Zamitha zombini iintombi zikaLote ngoyise.
1_19_37_Eyamazibulo yazala unyana, yambiza ngegama elinguMowabhi;  yena nguyise wamaMowabhi unanamhla.
1_19_38_Nencinane yazala unyana, yambiza ngegama elinguBhenami;  yena nguyise wonyana baka-Amon unanamhla.
1_20_1_Ke kaloku uAbraham wanduluka apho, waya ezweni lasezantsi,  wahlala phakathi kweKadeshe neShure, waphambukela eGerare.
1_20_2_Wathi uAbraham ngoSara umkakhe, Ngudade wethu. UAbhimeleki ukumkani waseGerare wathuma, wamthabatha uSara.
1_20_3_Weza uThixo kuAbhimeleki ngephupha ebusuku, wathi kuye,  Uyabona, ufile ngenxa yomfazi omthabathileyo; ngumkamntu.
1_20_4_Ke uAbhimeleki ubengasondelanga kuye; wathi, Nkosi,  nolunobulungisa uhlanga wolubulala, yini na?
1_20_5_Akatshongo na yena kum ukuthi, Ngudade wethu, naye ngokwakhe wathi, Ngumnakwethu? Le nto ndiyenze ngentliziyo yam igqibelele, nangezandla zam zimsulwa.
1_20_6_Wathi uThixo kuye ngephupha, Nam ndiyazi ukuba uyenze le nto ngentliziyo yakho igqibelele. Ndakunqanda nam, ukuba ungoni kum; ngenxa yoko andikuvumelanga ukuba umchukumise.
1_20_7_Ngoko mbuyise umfazi wale ndoda, ngokuba ingumprofeti;  yokuthandazela ukuba uphile; ukuba uthe akwambuyisa, yazi ukuba uya kufa, wena nabo bonke onabo.
1_20_8_Wavuka kwakusasa uAbhimeleki, wababiza bonke abakhonzi bakhe, wawathetha onke la mazwi ezindlebeni zabo. Oyika kakhulu loo madoda.
1_20_9_UAbhimeleki wambiza uAbraham, wathi kuye, Yintoni na le nto uyenzileyo kuthi? Ndikone ngantoni na, ukuba mna nobukumkani bam isono esingaka? Wenze kum izenzo ezingezakwenziwa.
1_20_10_Wathi uAbhimeleki kuAbraham, Ubone ntoni na, ukuba uyenze le nto?
1_20_11_Wathi uAbraham, Ndithe, akukho kanye ukoyika uThixo kule ndawo; baya kundibulala ngenxa yomkam.
1_20_12_Okwenene ngudade wethu; yintombi kabawo, kodwa akantombi kama, waba ngumkam ke.
1_20_13_Kwathi, uThixo akundiphambukisa, andikhuphe endlwini kabawo, ndathi kuye, Nantsi inceba owondenzela yona: ezindaweni zonke esofika kuzo, uze uthi ngam, Ngumnakwethu.
1_20_14_UAbhimeleki wathabatha impahla emfutshane, neenkomo,  nabakhonzi, nabakhonzazana, wanika uAbraham; wambuyisela uSara umkakhe kuye.
1_20_15_Wathi uAbhimeleki, Nali ilizwe lam, liphambi kwakho; hlala apho kulungileyo emehlweni akho.
1_20_16_Wathi kuSara, Yabona, umnakwenu ndimnike iwaka lesilivere;  yabona, sisigqubuthelo samehlo kuwe, ngokusingisele kubo bonke aba nawe; naphakathi kwabo bonke ugwetyelwe.
1_20_17_Wathandaza uAbraham kuThixo; uThixo wamphilisa uAbhimeleki, nomkakhe, nabakhonzazana bakhe, bazala.
1_20_18_Ngokuba uYehova ubezivingcile kanye, zonke izizalo endlwini ka-Abhimeleki, ngenxa kaSara, umka-Abraham.
1_21_1_Ke kaloku uYehova wamvelela uSara njengoko ebetshilo;  uYehova wamenzela uSara njengoko abekuthethile.
1_21_2_Wamitha ke uSara, wamzalela uAbraham unyana ekwaluphaleni kwakhe, ngexesha elimisiweyo abelithethile uThixo kuye.
1_21_3_UAbraham wamthiya loo nyana wakho abemzalelwe, awamzalayo uSara, igama elinguIsake.
1_21_4_UAbraham wamalusa uIsake unyana wakhe, akuba ntsuku zisibhozo ezelwe, njengoko uThixo abemwisele umthetho.
1_21_5_UAbraham ube eminyaka ilikhulu, ukuzalelwa kwakhe uIsake unyana wakhe.
1_21_6_Wathi uSara, Undihlekisile uThixo; bonke abakuvayo oku baya kuhleka nam.
1_21_7_Wathi, Ngubani na obengatsholo kuAbraham ukuthi, uSara wanyisa abantwana? Ngokuba ndimzalele unyana ekwaluphaleni kwakhe.
1_21_8_Wakhula umntwana, walunyulwa; uAbraham wenza isidlo esikhulu mhlana walunyulwayo uIsake.
1_21_9_USara wambona unyana kaHagare umYiputazana, awamzalela uAbraham, ehlekisa.
1_21_10_Wathi kuAbraham, Mgxothe umkhonzazana nonyana wakhe; kuba unyana walo mkhonzazana akayi kulidla ilifa ndawonye nonyana wam uIsake.
1_21_11_Lalibi kunene elo zwi emehlweni ka-Abraham ngenxa yonyana wakhe.
1_21_12_Wathi uThixo kuAbraham, Malingabi libi emehlweni akho ngenxa yenkwenkwe, nangenxa yomkhonzazana wakho. Entweni yonke ayithethileyo uSara kuwe, phulaphula izwi lakhe, ngokuba iya kuba ngoIsake lo imbewu kuwe.
1_21_13_Kananjalo unyana womkhonzazana ndiya kumenza uhlanga,  ngokuba eyimbewu yakho.
1_21_14_Wavuka kusasa uAbraham, wathabatha isonka nentsuba yamanzi, wanika uHagare, ebeka emagxeni akhe, nenkwenkwe,  wamndulula. Wemka ke, wandwendwela entlango yaseBher-shebha.
1_21_15_Aphela amanzi entsubeni, wayiphosa inkwenkwe phantsi kwetyholo.
1_21_16_Waya wahlala phantsi malunga nayo, umgama ongangowokutola ngotolo; kuba wathi, Mandingakuboni ukufa kwenkwenkwe. Wahlala phantsi malunga nayo ke, waphakamisa izwi lakhe, walila.
1_21_17_Waliva uThixo ilizwi lenkwenkwe. Samemeza isithunywa sikaThixo kuHagare sisemazulwini, sathi kuye, Unantoni na,  Hagare? Musa ukoyika, ngokuba uThixo ulivile ilizwi lenkwenkwe apho ikhona.
1_21_18_Suka ume, uyithabathe inkwenkwe, uyibambe ngesandla; kuba ndiya kuyenza uhlanga olukhulu.
1_21_19_UThixo wawavula amehlo akhe, wabona iqula lamanzi; waya wayizalisa intsuba ngamanzi, wayiseza inkwenkwe.
1_21_20_UThixo waba nenkwenkwe leyo; yakhula, yahlala entlango,  yaba yintoli yakukhula, yahlala entlango yaseParan;
1_21_21_unina wayithabathela umfazi ezweni laseYiputa.
1_21_22_Kwathi ngelo xesha, wathetha uAbhimeleki, noFikolo umthetheli womkhosi wakhe, kuAbraham, esithi, UThixo unawe entweni yonke osukuba uyenza.
1_21_23_Ngoko ndifungele uThixo apha, ukuba akuyi kundixokisa mna,  noonyana bam, nenzalo yam; wothi ngokwenceba endiyenzileyo kuwe, wenze kum, nakwilizwe ophambukele kulo.
1_21_24_Wathi uAbraham, Mna ndofunga.
1_21_25_UAbraham wamohlwaya uAbhimeleki ngenxa yequla lamanzi elalihluthwe ngabakhonzi baka-Abhimeleki.
1_21_26_Wathi uAbhimeleki, Bendingazi ukuba yenziwe ngubani na le nto; nawe ube ungandixelelanga; nam bendingayivanga, ndiyiva namhla.
1_21_27_UAbraham wathabatha impahla emfutshane, neenkomo, wanika uAbhimeleki, benza umnqophiso bobabini.
1_21_28_UAbraham wamisa amathokazi ezimvu asixhenxe omhlambi, aba wodwa.
1_21_29_Wathi uAbhimeleki kuAbraham, Ayintoni na la mathokazi ezimvu asixhenxe uwamisileyo odwa?
1_21_30_Wathi, La mathokazi ezimvu asixhenxe wowathabatha esandleni sam, abe bubungqina bam bokuba ndilimbile eli qula.
1_21_31_Ngenxa yoko kwathiwa loo ndawo yiBher-shebha; ngokuba kulapho bafungayo bobabini.
1_21_32_Benza ke umnqophiso eBher-shebha. Wesuka uAbhimeleki,  noFikolo umthetheli womkhosi wakhe, babuyela ezweni lamaFilisti.
1_21_33_UAbraham watyala umtamariske eBher-shebha, walinqula khona igama likaYehova uThixo ongunaphakade.
1_21_34_UAbraham waye engumphambukeli ezweni lamaFilisti imihla emininzi.
1_22_1_Kwathi emveni kwezo nto, uThixo wamvavanya uAbraham, wathi kuye, Abraham; wathi yena, Ndilapha.
1_22_2_Wathi, Khawuthabathe unyana wakho, emnye kuwe, omthandayo,  uIsake, uhambe uye ezweni laseMoriya, umnyuse khona abe lidini elinyukayo phezu kwentaba endokuxelela yona.
1_22_3_Wavuka uAbraham kusasa, walibopha iesile lakhe, wathabatha amabini kumadodana akhe, noIsake unyana wakhe, wacanda iinkuni zedini elinyukayo, wesuka waya endaweni abemxelele yona uThixo.
1_22_4_Ngomhla wesithathu uAbraham wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe,  wayibona loo ndawo ikude.
1_22_5_Wathi uAbraham kumadodana akhe, Hlalani nina apha ne-esile;  mna nomfana lo soya phaya, sinqule, sibuye size kuni.
1_22_6_Wazithabatha uAbraham iinkuni zedini elinyukayo, wazibeka phezu koIsake unyana wakhe, waphatha umlilo ngesandla,  nesitshetshe, bahamba bobabini ndawonye.
1_22_7_Watsho uIsake kuAbraham uyise ukuthi, Bawo. Wathi yena,  Ndilapha, nyana wam. Wathi, Nangu umlilo neenkuni; iphi na ke imvu yedini elinyukayo?
1_22_8_Wathi uAbraham, UThixo wozibonela imvu yedini elinyukayo,  nyana wam. Bahamba bobabini ndawonye.
1_22_9_Bafika endaweni abemxelele yona uThixo, wakha khona uAbraham isibingelelo, wazicwangcisa iinkuni, wambopha uIsake unyana wakhe, wambeka esibingelelweni phezu kweenkuni.
1_22_10_Wasolula uAbraham isandla sakhe, wathabatha isitshetshe,  ukuba amsike unyana wakhe.
1_22_11_Samemeza kuye isithunywa sikaYehova sisemazulwini, sathi,  Abraham, Abraham.
1_22_12_Wathi, Ndilapha. Sathi, Musa ukusisa isandla sakho kumfana, musa ukumenza nto, kuba ndiyazi ngoku ukuba uyamoyika uThixo; akunqabanga nonyana akho kum, emnye kuwe.
1_22_13_UAbraham waphakamisa amehlo akhe, wakhangela, nantso inkunzi yegusha ngasemva, ibambeke ngeempondo etyholweni; waya uAbraham, wayithabatha inkunzi yegusha, wayinyusa ukuba ibe lidini elinyukayo esikhundleni sonyana wakhe.
1_22_14_UAbraham wathi igama laloo ndawo linguYehova ozibonelayo ekuthiwa nanamhla, Entabeni abonakala kuyo uYehova.
1_22_15_Samemeza isithunywa sikaYehova kuAbraham okwesibini sisemazulwini sathi,
1_22_16_Ndizifungile, utsho uYehova, ngenxa enokuba uyenzile le nto, akwanqaba nonyana wakho, emnye kuwe:
1_22_17_ukuba ndiya kukusikelela ndikusikelele; ndiya kuyandisa ndiyandise imbewu yakho njengeenkwenkwezi zezulu,  nanjengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle; imbewu yakho ilidle ilifa isango leentshaba zayo;
1_22_18_zisikelelwe ngembewu yakho zonke untlanga zehlabathi,  ngenxa enokuba uliphulaphule ilizwi lam.
1_22_19_Wabuyela uAbraham kumadodana akhe, besuka baya bendawonye eBher-shebha, wahlala uAbraham eBher-shebha.
1_22_20_Kwathi emva kwezi zinto, kwaxelwa kuAbraham kwathiwa,  Yabona, uMilka ukwazele naye kuNahore, umninawa wakho,  abantwana:
1_22_21_u-Utse owamazibulo akhe, noBhuzi umninawa wakhe,  noKemuweli uyise ka-Aram,
1_22_22_noKesede, noHazo, noPildashe, noYidelafu, noBhetuweli
1_22_23_(uBhetuweli ke wazala uRebheka); abo bosibhozo uMilka wamzalela uNahore, umninawa ka-Abraham.
1_22_24_Ishweshwe lakhe, eligama linguRehuma, lazala nalo uTebha,  noGaham, noTahashe, noMahaka.
1_23_1_Ke kaloku ukudla ubomi kukaSara kwaba yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mabini aneminyaka esixhenxe; yiyo iminyaka yokudla ubomi kukaSara.
1_23_2_Wafa ke uSara eKiriyati ka-Arbha, eyiHebron, ezweni lakwaKanan. UAbraham waya kumbambazelela uSara nokumlilela.
1_23_3_Wesuka uAbraham ebusweni bomfikazi lowo,
1_23_4_wathetha koonyana bakaHeti, esithi, Ndingumphambukeli,  ndilundwendwe kuni; ndinikeni ndibe nendawo yam yokungcwaba phakathi kwenu, ukuze ndimngcwabe umfikazi, angabikho phambi kwam.
1_23_5_Bamphendula uAbraham oonyana bakaHeti, bathi kuye, Sive,  nkosi yam!
1_23_6_Usisikhulu sakwaThixo phakathi kwethu; kwelona linyulekayo kumangcwaba ethu, mngcwabe umfikazi lowo; akukho bani kuthi uya kwala nengcwaba lakhe, ukuba ungamngcwabi umfikazi lowo.
1_23_7_Wesuka uAbraham, waqubuda kubantu belizwe elo, koonyana bakaHeti abo.
1_23_8_Wathetha nabo esithi, Ukuba kusemphefumlweni wenu, ukuba ndimngcwabe umfikazi, angabikho phambi kwam, ndiveni,  nindibongozele kuEfron, unyana kaTsohare,
1_23_9_ukuba andinike umqolomba waseMakapela, lowo anawo,  osekupheleni kwentsimi yakhe, andinike wona ngemali ezalisekileyo; ube yindawo yam yokungcwaba phakathi kwenu.
1_23_10_UEfron wayehleli phakathi koonyana bakaHeti; uEfron umHeti wamphendula uAbraham ezindlebeni zoonyana bakaHeti, zabo bonke abangenayo ngesango lomzi wakhe, esithi, Hayi, nkosi yam,  ndive!
1_23_11_Intsimi leyo ndiyakunika, nomqolomba okuyo ndiyakunika;  emehlweni oonyana babantu bakowethu ndiyakunika; ngcwaba umfikizi loo.
1_23_12_Waqubuda uAbraham phambi kwabantu belizwe elo.
1_23_13_Wathetha kuEfron ezindlebeni zabantu belizwe elo, wathi,  Wanga ungandiva; ndikunika imali ngentsimi; yithabathe kum,  ndingcwabe umfikazi khona.
1_23_14_UEfron wamphendula uAbraham, wathi kuye,
1_23_15_Nkosi yam, ndive! Umhlaba ngoweeshekele zesilivere ezimakhulu mane. Yintoni na loo nto phakathi kwam nawe? Ngcwaba ke umfikazi lowo.
1_23_16_UAbraham wamphulaphula uEfron; uAbraham wamlinganisela uEfron isilivere leyo, abethethe ngayo ezindlebeni zoonyana bakaHeti, amakhulu omane eeshekele zesilivere evunywayo ngumrhwebi.
1_23_17_Yaqiniseka ke intsimi kaEfron eseMakapela ephambi kowakwaMamre, intsimi leyo nomqolomba okuyo, nemithi yonke esentsimini, ekuyo yonke imilimandlela ngeenxa zonke.
1_23_18_Yaba yinzuzo kuAbraham emehlweni oonyana bakaHeti, kubo bonke abangenayo ngesango lomzi wakhe.
1_23_19_Emveni koko uAbraham wamngcwaba uSara umkakhe emqolombeni wentsimi yaseMakapela phambi kowakwaMamre, kowaseHebron leyo,  ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_23_20_Yaqiniseka ke intsimi leyo nomqolomba okuyo kuAbraham,  ukuze abe nendawo yakhe yokungcwaba, ngoonyana bakaHeti.
1_24_1_Ke kaloku uAbraham ebaluphele, eselekhulile ebudaleni;  uYehova waye emsikelele ke uAbraham ezintweni zonke.
1_24_2_Wathi uAbraham kumkhonzi wakhe, oyena mkhulu endlwini yakhe, obelawula zonke izinto abenazo, Khawubeke isandla sakho phantsi kwethanga lam,
1_24_3_ndikufungise uYehova uThixo wamazulu, uThixo wehlabathi,  ukuba akuyi kumzekela unyana wam umfazi ezintombini zamaKanan,  endihleli phakathi kwawo;
1_24_4_ukuba woya ezweni lakowethu, nakwelokuzalwa kwam, umzekele unyana wam uIsake umfazi.
1_24_5_Wathi umkhonzi kuye, Hi ke, ayavuma inkazana ukundilandela ukuza kweli lizwe, ndombuyisela na unyana wakho kwelo zwe waphuma kulo wena?
1_24_6_Wathi uAbraham kuye, Zilumkele ungambuyiseli unyana wam khona.
1_24_7_UYehova, uThixo wamazulu, owandithabathayo endlwini kabawo,  ezweni lokuzalwa kwam, owathethayo kum, owandifungelayo esithi,  Imbewu yakho ndiya kuyinika eli lizwe, yena wosithuma isithunywa sakhe phambi kwakho, umzekele umfazi unyana wam khona.
1_24_8_Ukuba ke inkazana leyo ithe ayavuma ukukulandela, woba ukhululekile kwesi sifungo sam; kodwa uze ungambuyiseli unyana wam khona.
1_24_9_Wasibeka umkhonzi isandla sakhe ngaphantsi kwethanga lika-Abraham inkosi yakhe, wamfungela loo nto.
1_24_10_Umkhonzi wathabatha unkamela ezilishumi kwunkamela zenkosi yakhe, wemka enezinto zonke ezilungileyo zenkosi yakhe esandleni sakhe, wesuka waya kwa-Aram, phakathi kweMilambo,  emzini kaNahore.
1_24_11_Waziguqisa iinkamela ngaphandle komzi, ngasequleni lamanzi, ngexa langokuhlwa, ngexa lokuphuma kwabakhi bamanzi.
1_24_12_Wathi, Yehova, Thixo wenkosi yam uAbraham,  mawundithamsanqele namhla, uyenzele inkosi yam uAbraham inceba.
1_24_13_Yabona, ndimi ngasemthonjeni wamanzi; untombi zabantu balo mzi ziyaphuma, ziza kukha amanzi.
1_24_14_Ke intombi endothi kuyo, Khawuthobe umphanda wakho ndisele; ize ithi, Sela, neenkamela zakho ndoziseza nazo:  mayibe yiyo oyimisele umkhonzi wakho uIsake; ndazi mna ngoko,  ukuba uyenzele inkosi yam inceba.
1_24_15_Kwathi, ingekagqibi ukuthetha, gqi uRebheka esiza, lowo wazalwayo nguBhetuweli, unyana kaMilka, umkaNahore, umninawa ka-Abraham, enomphanda wakhe egxalabeni lakhe.
1_24_16_Intombi leyo ibe intle kunene imbonakalo, intombi eyintombi, engaziwanga ndoda; yehla, yeza emthonjeni,  yawuzalisa umphanda wayo, yenyuka.
1_24_17_Wagidima umkhonzi waya kuyikhawulela, wathi, Ndiphe ndisele intwana yamanzi emphandeni wakho.
1_24_18_Yathi, Sela, nkosi yam. Yakhawuleza, yawuhlisela esandleni umphanda wayo, yamseza.
1_24_19_Yakugqiba ukumseza, yathi, Neenkamela zakho ndiya kuzikhelela, zide zigqibe ukusela.
1_24_20_Yakhawuleza, yawugalela umphanda wayo emkhombeni wokuseza,  yagidima yaya kukha futhi equleni, yazikhelela zonke unkamela zakhe.
1_24_21_Indoda leyo yee nqa yiyo, ithe cwaka, ukuze yazi ukuba uYehova uyiphumelelisile indlela yayo, akayiphumelelisanga,  kusini na.
1_24_22_Kwathi, iinkamela zigqibile ukusela, indoda leyo yathabatha ijikazi lempumlo legolide, elisisiqingatha seshekele ubunzima balo, nezacholo zozibini zokufakwa ezandleni,  eziziishekele ezilishumi zegolide ubunzima bazo; yathi,  Uyintombi kabani na wena?
1_24_23_Khawundixelele; kukho ndawo na yokulala endlwini kayihlo?
1_24_24_Yathi kuye, Ndiyintombi kaBhetuweli, unyana kaMika,  awamzalela uNahore.
1_24_25_Yathi kuye, Sinawo umququ kwaneendiza ezaneleyo, nendawo yokulala.
1_24_26_Yathoba indoda leyo, yaqubuda kuYehova.
1_24_27_Yathi, Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo wenkosi yam uAbraham,  ongayiyekelelanga inceba yakhe nenyaniso yakhe, imke enkosini yam: uthe ndisendleleni, uYehova wandikhokelela endlwini yabazalwana benkosi yam.
1_24_28_Yakhawuleza intombi leyo, yaxelela indlu kanina ngokwala mazwi.
1_24_29_URebheka waye enomnakwabo, ogama linguLabhan waya endodeni leyo ngaphandle emthonjeni.
1_24_30_Ke kwathi, akulibona ijikazi lempumlo, nezacholo ezandleni zodade wabo, wathi, akuweva amazwi kaRebheka udade wabo,  esithi, Yenjenje indoda le ukuthetha kum: waya kuyo indoda,  nantso imi ngasezinkameleni ngasemthonjeni.
1_24_31_Wathi, Yiza, wena usikelelweyo nguYehova; umeleni na ngaphandle? Mna ndiyilungisile indlu nendawo yeenkamela.
1_24_32_Yangena indoda leyo endlwini, wazikhulula iinkamela zayo;  iinkamela wazinika umququ neendiza, wayinika amanzi okuhlamba iinyawo zayo, neenyawo zamadoda abenayo.
1_24_33_Kwabekwa ukudla phambi kwayo. Yathi yona, Andiyi kudla,  ndide ndilithethe ilizwi lam. Wathi, Thetha.
1_24_34_Yathi, Ndingumkhonzi ka-Abraham.
1_24_35_UYehova uyisikelele kunene inkosi yam; wayikhulisa,  wayinika imphahla emfutshane, neenkomo, nesilivere, negolide,  nabakhonzi, nabakhonzazana, neenkamela, namaesile.
1_24_36_Ke uSara, umfazi wankosi yam, wayizalela inkosi yam unyana, emveni kokuba iseyaluphele. Imnike zonke izinto enazo.
1_24_37_Yandifungisa ke inkosi yam, isithi, Unyana wam uze ungamzekeli umfazi ezintombini zamaKanan, endihleli ezweni lawo mna.
1_24_38_Suka uye endlwini kabawo emizalwaneni yakowethu, umzekele unyana wam umfazi.
1_24_39_Ndathi enkosini yam, Hi ke ayandilandela inkazana leyo?
1_24_40_Yathi kum, UYehova, endihamba phambi kwakhe, wosithuma isithunywa sakhe siye nawe, ayenze ibe nempumelelo indlela yakho, umzekele unyana wam umfazi emizalwaneni yakowethu,  nasendlwini kabawo;
1_24_41_wandule ukuba msulwa esifungweni sam xa ufikileyo emizalwaneni yakowethu; ukuba abathanga bakunike, woba msulwa esifungweni sam.
1_24_42_Ndifikile ke namhlanje emthonjeni, ndathi, Yehova, Thixo wenkosi yam uAbraham, ukuba kaloku uyenze yanempumelelo indlela yam endihamba ngayo,
1_24_43_yabona, ndimi ngasemthonjeni wamanzi; ke intombi ephuma isiza kukha, ndithi kuyo, Khawundiphe ndisele intwana yamanzi emphandeni wakho;
1_24_44_ithi kum, Sela wena, neenkamela zakho ndozikhelela nazo:  mayibe yiyo engumfazi uYehova ammiseleyo unyana wenkosi yam.
1_24_45_Ndingekagqibi mna ukuthetha entliziyweni yam, gqi uRebheka, esiza enomphanda egxalabeni lakhe, wehla waya emthonjeni, wakha; ndathi kuye, Khawundiphe ndisele.
1_24_46_Wakhawuleza, wawuhlisa umphanda wakhe kuye, wathi, Sela,  neenkamela zakho ndoziseza. Ndasela ke, waziseza neenkamela.
1_24_47_Ndambuza ndathi, Uyintombi kabani na? Wathi, Ndiyintombi kaBhetuweli, unyana kaNahore, lowo wamzalelwa nguMilka.  Ndamfaka ke ijikazi lempumlo ethatheni lakhe, nezacholo ezandleni zakhe.
1_24_48_Ndathoba, ndamnqula uYehova, ndambonga uYehova, uThixo wenkosi yam uAbraham, ondikhokeleyo endleleni eyinyaniso, ukuba ndimzekele unyana wakhe intombi yomzalwana wenkosi yam.
1_24_49_Ngoku ke, ukuba niyayenzela inceba nenyaniso inkosi yam,  ndixeleleni; ukuba anenjenjalo, ndixeleleni; ukuze ndibheke ekunene, nokuba kusekhohlo.
1_24_50_Waphendula uLabhan noBhetuweli, bathi, Le nto iphuma kuYehova; asinakuthetha nto kuwe, nokuba yembi nokuba yelungileyo.
1_24_51_Nanko uRebheka phambi kwakho. Mthabathe, uhambe, abe ngumfazi wonyana wenkosi yakho, njengoko akuthethileyo uYehova.
1_24_52_Kwathi, akuweva umkhonzi ka-Abraham amazwi abo, waqubuda emhlabeni kuYehova.
1_24_53_Umkhonzi wavelisa impahla yesilivere, nempahla yegolide,  nezambatho, wanika uRebheka; wanika umnakwabo nonina izinto ezinconywayo.
1_24_54_Badla, basela, yena namadoda abenaye, balala, bavuka kusasa, wathi, Ndindululeni ndiye enkosini yam.
1_24_55_Wathi umnakwabo nonina, Makhe ihlale intombi nathi iintsuku nokuba zilishumi, ihambe ke emveni koko.
1_24_56_Wathi kubo, Musani ukundibambezela; uYehova uyenze yanempumelelo indlela yam; ndindululeni ndiye enkosini yam.
1_24_57_Bathi, Masiyibize intombi, sive ngomlomo wayo.
1_24_58_Bambiza uRebheka, bathi kuye, Uya kuhamba na nale ndoda?  Wathi, Ndohamba.
1_24_59_Bamndulula ke uRebheka udade wabo, nomanyisikazi wakhe,  nomkhonzi ka-Abraham, namadoda abenaye.
1_24_60_Bamsikelela uRebheka, bathi kuye, Ungudade wethu; yiba ngamawaka-waka, imbewu yakho ilidle ilifa isango labo bayithiyayo.
1_24_61_Wesuka uRebheka nomthinjana wakhe, bakhwela ezinkameleni,  balandela emva kwendoda leyo. Umkhonzi wamthabatha ke uRebheka,  wemka.
1_24_62_Ke kaloku uIsake weza ngendlela evela equleni likaPhila-ebonile; kuba ebemi ezweni lasezantsi.
1_24_63_Waphuma uIsake, waya kucamngca entsimini, xa kuhlwayo;  wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wabona nanzo iinkamela zisiza.
1_24_64_URebheka wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wambona uIsake,  waziphosa phantsi, wehla enkameleni.
