1_24_65_Wathi kumkhonzi, Ngubani na laa mfo uhambayo entsimini,  esiza kusikhawulela? Wathi umkhonzi, Yinkosi yam. Wathabatha ke isigqubuthelo, wazigqubuthela.
1_24_66_Umkhonzi wamxelela uIsake izinto zonke abezenzile.
1_24_67_UIsake wamsa ententeni kaSara unina, wamzeka uRebheka,  waba ngumkakhe; wamthanda. UIsake wathuthuzeleka ke ngenxa yonina.
1_25_1_Wabuya uAbraham wazeka umfazi; igama lakhe lalinguKetura.
1_25_2_Wamzalela uZimran, noYokeshan, noMedan, noMidiyan,  noIshibhaki, noShuwa.
1_25_3_UYokeshan wazala uShebha noDedan; oonyana bakaDedan bebengama-Asiriya, namaLetushi, namaLehum.
1_25_4_Oonyana bakaMidiyan nguEfa, noEfere, noEnoki, noAbhida,  noElidaha. Bonke abo ngoonyana bakaKetura.
1_25_5_UAbraham wazinika uIsake zonke izinto abenazo.
1_25_6_Ke oonyana bamashweshwe, abenawo uAbraham, wabanika izipho uAbraham; wabandulula, bemka kuIsake unyana wakhe, esekho,  basinga empumalanga, ezweni lasempumalanga.
1_25_7_Yiyo le imihla yeminyaka yokudla ubomi kuka-Abraham awayidlayo; yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci asixhenxe aneminyaka emihlanu.
1_25_8_UAbraham waphuma umphefumlo, wafa, eyingwevu enkulu,  aluphele, ephele ebudaleni; wahlanganiselwa kwabakowabo.
1_25_9_OoIsake noIshmayeli, oonyana bakhe, bamngcwaba emqolombeni waseMakapela, entsimini kaEfron unyana kaTsohare, umHeti,  phambi kowakwaMamre,
1_25_10_entsimini leyo wayithengayo uAbraham kooyana bakaHeti.  Ungcwatyelwe khona uAbraham, noSara umkakhe.
1_25_11_Kwathi, emveni kokufa kuka-Abraham, uThixo wamsikelela uIsake unyana wakhe; uIsake wahlala ngasequleni likaPhila-ebonile.
1_25_12_Yiyo le ke inzala kaIshmayeli, unyana ka-Abraham, awathi uHagare umYiputazana, umkhonzazana kaSara, wamzalela uAbraham.
1_25_13_Ngawo la amagama oonyana bakaIshmayeli, ngamagama abo ngokwenzala yabo: owamazibulo kaIshmayeli nguNebhayoti,  noKedare, noAdebhele, noMibhesam,
1_25_14_noMishma, noDuma, noMasa;
1_25_15_uHadade, noTema, noYeture, noNafishi, noKedema.
1_25_16_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaIshmayeli, ngawo lawo amagama abo ngemizi yabo, nangeengqili zabo, izikulu ezilishumi elinazibini ngokwezizwe zazo.
1_25_17_Yiyo le iminyaka yokudla ubomi kukaIshmayeli: iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu, aneminyaka esixhenxe. Waphuma umphefumlo, wafa, wahlanganiselwa kwabakowabo.
1_25_18_Bema bethabathela eHavila besa eShure, phambi kweYiputa,  ukusinga kwelakwa-Asiriya. Wazihlalisa ebusweni babo bonke abazalwana bakhe.
1_25_19_Yiyo le ke inzala kaIsake, unyana ka-Abraham. UAbraham wazala uIsake.
1_25_20_UIsake waye eminyaka ingamashumi omane ezelwe, ukuzeka kwakhe uRebheka, intombi kaBhetuweli, umAram wasePadan-aram,  udade boLabhan umAram, ukuba abe ngumkakhe.
1_25_21_Wathandaza uIsake kuYehova mayela nomkakhe, ngokuba ebengazali. Wathandazeka uYehova, wamitha uRebheka umkakhe.
1_25_22_Batyahalana abantwana embilini wakhe, wathi, Ukuba unjalo,  yini na ukuba ndibe nje? Waya kubuza kuYehova.
1_25_23_Wathi uYehova kuye, Zimbini iintlanga esizalweni sakho;  Kuya kwahluka zizwe zibini esiswini sakho, Esinye somelele ngaphezu kwesinye; Omkhulu uya kukhonza omnci.
1_25_24_Yazaliseka ke imihla yakhe yokuzala, nanko, ingamawele esizalweni sakhe.
1_25_25_Laphuma elokuqala lingqombela, lonke liphela njengengubo exhonti; balithiya igama elinguEsawu.
1_25_26_Emveni koko kwaphuma umninawa walo, isandla sakhe sibambe isithende sikaEsawu, wamthiya igama elinguYakobi. UIsake wayeminyaka imashumi mathandathu ezelwe, ukuzalwa kwabo.
1_25_27_Akhula ke amakhwenkwe; uEsawu waba lizingela, indoda yasendle; uYakobi waba yindoda egqibeleleyo, ihleli ezintenteni.
1_25_28_UIsake wathanda uEsawu, ngokuba inyamakazi ibimnandi emlonyeni wakhe; ke yena uRebheka wathanda uYakobi.
1_25_29_UYakobi wayepheke ukudla; wafika uEsawu evela ezindle,  etyhafile.
1_25_30_Wathi uEsawu kuYakobi, Khawundiphe ndiginye kwinto engqombela, loo nto ingqombela, kuba ndityhafile; ngenxa yoko kwathiwa igama lakhe nguEdom.
1_25_31_Wathi uYakobi, Thengisa namhlanje ngobuzibulo bakho kum.
1_25_32_Wathi uEsawu, Yabona, ndiza kufa; buyintoni na kum ubuzibulo?
1_25_33_Wathi uYakobi, Ndifungele namhlanje. Wamfungela;  wathengisa ke ngobuzibulo bakhe kuYakobi.
1_25_34_UYakobi wamnika uEsawu isonka neentlumayo eziphekiweyo;  wadla, wasela, wesuka wemka; wabudela ke uEsawu ubuzibulo bakhe.
1_26_1_Kwabakho indlala ezweni, ngaphandle kweyokuqala indlala,  eyayikho ngemihla ka-Abraham; waya uIsake kuAbhimeleki,  ukumkani wamaFilisti, eGerare.
1_26_2_UYehova wabonakala kuye, wathi, Musa ukuhla uye eYiputa;  ima ezweni endiya kukuxelela lona.
1_26_3_Phambukela kweli zwe. Ndoba nawe, ndikusikelele; kuba ndiya kuwanika wena nembewu yakho onke la mazwe, ndisimise isifungo endasifungayo kuAbraham uyihlo;
1_26_4_ndiyandise imbewu yakho njengeenkwenkwezi zezulu, ndiyinike imbewu yakho onke la mazwe, zisikelelwe ngembewu yakho zonke iintlanga zehlabathi;
1_26_5_ngenxa enokuba uAbraham waliphulaphulayo izwi lam,  wasigcina isigxina sam, nemithetho yam, nemimiselo yam,  nemiyalelo yam.
1_26_6_Wahlala uIsake eGerare.
1_26_7_Abuza amadoda aloo ndawo ngomkakhe. Wathi, Ngudade wethu;  kuba ebesoyika ukuthi, Ngumkam; hleze ambulale amadoda ale ndawo ngenxa kaRebheka, ngokuba ebemhle imbonakalo.
1_26_8_Kwathi, akubon ukuba ulibele umzuzu khona, wondela uAbhimeleki, ukumkani wamaFilisti, ngefestile; wakhangela,  nanko, uIsake edlala noRebheka umkakhe.
1_26_9_UAbhimeleki wambiza uIsake, wathi, Yabona, inene ngumkakho lo; ungathini na ukuthi, Ngudade wethu? Wathi uIsake kuye,  Bendisithi, hleze ndife ngenxa yakhe.
1_26_10_Wathi uAbhimeleki, Yini na ukuba wenze le nto kuthi?  Othile ebantwini ebengathi alale nomkakho, ube usizisele ityala.
1_26_11_UAbhimeleki wawisela bonke abantu umthetho wokuthi, Lowo uyichukumisayo le ndoda nomkayo wobulawa afe.
1_26_12_UIsake wahlwayela kwelo zwe, wazuza ngaloo mnyaka imilinganiso elikhulu; uYehova wamsikelela.
1_26_13_Yaba nkulu indoda leyo, yaya ikhula ngokukhula, yada yaba nkulu kunene.
1_26_14_Yaba nemfuyo yempahla emfutshane, nemfuyo yeenkomo,  nabakhonzi abaninzi; ayimonela amaFilisti.
1_26_15_Onke amaqula, ababewambile abakhonzi bakayise ngemihla ka-Abraham uyise, awavingca amaFilisti, awadibelela ngomhlaba.
1_26_16_Wathi uAbhimeleki kuIsake, Mka kuthi, ngokuba usuke waba namandla amakhulu kunathi.
1_26_17_UIsake wemka ke apho, wamisa iintente esihlanjeni saseGerare, wahlala khona.
1_26_18_Wabuya uIsake wawamba amaqula amanzi, ababewambile ngemihla ka-Abraham uyise, abevingciwe ngamaFilisti emveni kokufa kuka-Abraham; wawabiza ngamagama abewabize ngawo uyise.
1_26_19_Bemba abakhonzi bakaIsake esihlanjeni eso, bafumana khona iqula lamanzi aphilileyo.
1_26_20_Abalusi baseGerare babambana nabalusi bakaIsake, besithi,  Ngawethu la manzi; wathi igama lequla elo yiEseke, kuba babezamana naye.
1_26_21_Bemba elinye iqula, babambana nangalo, wathi igama lalo yiSitena.
1_26_22_Wesuka khona wemba elinye iqula; ababambananga ngalo,  wathi igama lalo yiRehobhoti. Wathi, Inene, ngoku uYehova usenzele indawo ebanzi, ukuze siqhame ezweni apha.
1_26_23_Wenyuka wemka khona, waya eBher-shebha.
1_26_24_UYehova wabonakala kuye ngobo busuku, wathi, NdinguThixo ka-Abraham uyihlo. Musa ukoyika, kuba ndinawe; ndiya kukusikelela, ndiyandise imbewu yakho, ngenxa ka-Abraham,  umkhonzi wam.
1_26_25_Wakha khona isibingelelo, wanqula igama likaYehova,  wayimisa khona intente yakhe; abakhonzi bakaIsake bemba khona iqula.
1_26_26_Ke kaloku uAbhimeleki weza kuye ephuma eGerare, noAhuzati,  isihlobo sakhe, noFikolo, umthetheli womkhosi wakhe.
1_26_27_Wathi uIsake kubo, Nizeleni na kum, nandithiyayo nje,  nandindulula kuni?
1_26_28_Bathi, Sibone kakuhle ukuba uYehova unawe; sathi,  makubekho isifungo phakathi kwethu nawe, senze umnqophiso nawe,
1_26_29_wokuba ungasenzeli bubi, njengokuba singakusunduzanga,  njengokuba sikwenzele okulungileyo kodwa, sakundulula unoxolo;  ngoku usikelelwe nguYehova.
1_26_30_Wabenzela isidlo, badla, basela. Bavuka kusasa,  bafungelana;
1_26_31_uIsake wabandulula, bemka kuye benoxolo.
1_26_32_Kwathi ngaloo mini, bafika abakhonzi bakaIsake, bamxelela indawo yequla ababelimbile, bathi kuye, Siwafumene amanzi.
1_26_33_Wathi liyiShibha; ngenxa yoko igama laloo mzi liyiBher-shebha unanamhla.
1_26_34_Ke kaloku uEsawu, akuba minyaka imashumi mane ezelwe,  wazeka umfazi, uYuditi intombi kaBheri, umHeti, noBhasemati intombi kaElon, umHeti;
1_26_35_babacaphukisa ooIsake noRebheka.
1_27_1_Kwathi, akwaluphala uIsake, amehlo akhe enorhatyazo ukuba angaboni, wambiza uEsawu, unyana wakhe omkhulu, wathi kuye,  Nyana wam. Wathi yena kuye, Ndilapha.
1_27_2_Wathi, Khawubone, ndaluphele, andiyazi imini yokufa kwam.
1_27_3_Khawuthabathe ngoku iintonga zakho, umphongolo wakho,  nesaphetha sakho, uye ezindle, undizingelele inyamakazi;
1_27_4_undenzele ukudla okunencasa, njengoko ndikuthandayo,  ukuzise kum, ndidle; ukuze umphefumlo wam ukusikelele ndingekafi.
1_27_5_Ke kaloku uRebheka wayesiva ukuba uIsake uthetha kuEsawu unyana wakhe. UEsawu waya kuzingela inyamakazi ezindle, ukuba ayizise.
1_27_6_URebheka wathetha kuYakobi, unyana wakhe, wathi, Yabona,  ndive uyihlo ethetha kuEsawu umkhuluwa wakho, esithi,
1_27_7_Ndizisele inyamakazi, undenzele ukudla okunencasa, ndidle,  ndikusikelele phambi koYehova ndingekafi.
1_27_8_Ngoko ke, nyana wam, liphulaphule izwi lam ngento endikuwisela umthetho ngayo.
1_27_9_Khawuhambe uye emhlambini, undithabathele khona amatakane amabini ebhokhwe alungileyo, ndenzele uyihlo ukudla okunencasa,  njengoko akuthandayo;
1_27_10_ukuse kuyihlo, adle, ukuze akusikelele engekafi.
1_27_11_Wathi uYakobi kuRebheka unina, Yabona, uEsawu umkhuluwa wam yindoda exhonti, mna ndiyindoda egudileyo.
1_27_12_Mhlawumbi ubawo wondiva, ndibe njengomgculeli emehlweni akhe, ndizizisele intshwabulelo, ndingaziziseli intsikelelo.
1_27_13_Wathi unina kuye, Makube phezu kwam ukushwatyulelwa kwakho, nyana wam; phulaphula izwi lam wena, uye undithabathele.
1_27_14_Waya wawathabatha, wawazisa kunina; unina wenza ukudla okunencasa, njengoko akuthandayo uyise.
1_27_15_URebheka wathabatha iingubo zikaEsawu, unyana wakhe omkhulu, ezinqwenelekayo ezibe zikuye endlwini, wamambathisa uYakobi unyana wakhe omnci.
1_27_16_Izintsu zamatakane lawo ebhokhwe wambathisa ngazo izandla zakhe, nendawo egudileyo yentamo yakhe;
1_27_17_wabeka esandleni sikaYakobi unyana wakhe ukudla okunencasa, nesonka abesenzile.
1_27_18_Weza kuyise, wathi, Bawo! Wathi yena, Ndilapha. Ungubani na, nyana wam?
1_27_19_Wathi uYakobi kuyise, NdinguEsawu, amazibulo akho; ndenze njengoko wathetha ngako kum; khawuvuke ke, uhlale, udle inyamakazi yam, ukuze umphefumlo wakho undisikelele.
1_27_20_Wathi uIsake kunyana wakhe, Kutheni na le nto ukhawulezileyo ukuyifumana nyana wam? Wathi yena, uYehova uThixo wakho undithamsanqelisile.
1_27_21_Wathi uIsake kuYakobi, Khawusondele, ndikuve, nyana wam,  ukuba unguye na kanye unyana wam uEsawu, akunguye, kusini na?
1_27_22_Wasondela uYakobi kuIsake uyise, wamva, wathi, Ilizwi lona lilizwi likaYakobi, kodwa izandla zizandla zikaEsawu.
1_27_23_Akamnakana ke, kuba izandla zakhe zaba noboya,  njengezandla zikaEsawu umkhuluwa wakhe; wamsikelela ke.
1_27_24_Wathi, Wena lo ungunyana wam uEsawu na? Wathi yena,  Ndinguye.
1_27_25_Wathi, Sondeza kum ndidle inyamakazi yonyana wam, ukuze umphefumlo wam ukusikelele. Wayisondeza kuye, wadla, wamzisela newayini, wasela.
1_27_26_Wathi uyise uIsake kuye, Khawusondele undange, nyana wam.
1_27_27_Wasondela, wamanga; waliva ivumba leengubo zakhe,  wamsikelela wathi, Yabona, ivumba lonyana wam linjengevumba lelizwe elisikelelwe nguYehova.
1_27_28_Ngamana uThixo wakunika kuwo umbethe wezulu, Nakuko ukuchuma komhlaba, Nentabalala yengqolowa, newayini entsha;
1_27_29_Izizwe mazikukhonze, Izizwe ziqubude kuwe. Yiba yinkosi kubazalwana bakho, Baqubude kuwe oonyana bakanyoko; Uqalekisiwe okuqalekisayo, Usikelelwe okusikelelayo.
1_27_30_Kwathi, akubon ukuba ugqibile uIsake ukumsikelela uYakobi ebusweni bukaIsake uyise, wangena uEsawu, umkhuluwa wakhe,  evela ekuzingeleni kwakhe.
1_27_31_Naye wenza ukudla okunencasa, wazisa kuyise, wathi kuyise,  Makavuke ubawo adle inyamakazi yonyana wakhe, ukuze umphefumlo wakho undisikelele.
1_27_32_Wathi uIsake uyise kuye, Ungubani na? Wathi, Ndingunyana wakho uEsawu, amazibulo akho.
1_27_33_UIsake wagubha ngokugubha okukhulu kunene, wathi, Ngubani na lo phofu uzingele inyamakazi, wayizisa kum, ndadla entweni yonke, ungekafiki wena, ndamsikelela? Wosikeleleka ke.
1_27_34_Akuweva uEsawu amazwi kayise, wakhala ngesikhalo esikhulu,  esikrakra kunene, wathi kuyise, Ndisikelele nam, bawo.
1_27_35_Wathi yena, Kufike umninawa wakho ngenkohliso,  wayithabatha intsikelelo yakho.
1_27_36_Wathi, Kungokuba igama lakhe kusithiwa nguYakobi na, le nto andigweqe ezi zihlandlo zozibini? Wathabatha ubuzibulo bam;  nanku ngoku, ethabathe nentsikelelo yam. Wathi, Akundibekelanga ntsikelelo yam. Wathi, Akundibekelanga ntsikelelo na mna?
1_27_37_Waphendula uIsake, wathi kuEsawu, Yabona, ndimmisile waba yinkosi yakho, nabo bonke abazalwana bakhe ndibanike yena, baba ngabakhonzi; ndamxhasa ngengqolowa nangewayini entsha. Yintoni na kaloku endingakwenzela yona, nyana wam?
1_27_38_Wathi uEsawu kuyise, Inye na le ntsikelelo unayo, bawo?  Ndisikelele nam, bawo. Waliphakamisa uEsawu izwi lakhe, walila.
1_27_39_Waphendula uIsake uyise, wathi kuye, Yabona, ikhaya lakho liya kuba lee nokuchuma komhlaba, Lee nombethe wezulu ovela phezulu.
1_27_40_Uya kuphila ngekrele lakho, umkhonze umninawa wakho; Kuthi wakudlokova, Uyaphule idyokhwe yakhe, isuke entanyeni yakho.
1_27_41_UEsawu wamzonda uYakobi ngenxa yentsikelelo awamsikelela ngayo uyise; uEsawu wathi entliziyweni yakhe, Iya kusondela imihla yesijwili sikabawo, ndimbulale ke uYakobi umninawa wam.
1_27_42_Wawaxelelwa uRebheka amazwi kaEsawu, unyana wakhe omkhulu,  wathumela, wambiza uYakobi, unyana wakhe omnci, wathi kuye,  Yabona, uEsawu, umkhuluwa wakho, uzithuthuzela ngawe ngokukubulala.
1_27_43_Ngoko ke, nyana wam, phulaphula izwi lam, usuke ubalekele kuLabhan, umnakwethu, kwaHaran;
1_27_44_uhlale naye iintsuku ezithile, bude bubuye ubushushu bomkhuluwa wakho,
1_27_45_ude umsindo womkhuluwa wakho ubuye kuwe, ayilibale into oyenzileyo kuye; ndithumele ke, ndikuphuthume khona. Yini na ukuba ndihluthwe nina nobabini ngamini-nye?
1_27_46_Ke kaloku uRebheka wathi kuIsake, Ndikruqukile bubomi bam ngenxa yeentombi zakwaHeti. Ukuba uYakobi uthe wazeka umfazi ezintombini zakwaHeti, ezinjengezi ntombi zeli lizwe, boba yintoni na kum obu bomi?
1_28_1_UIsake wambiza uYakobi, wamsikelela, wamwisela umthetho,  wathi kuye, Uze ungazeki mfazi ezintombini zakwaKanan.
1_28_2_Suka uye ePadan-aram, endlwini kaBhetuweli unyokokhulu,  uzeke khona umfazi ezintombini zikaLabhan, unyokolume.
1_28_3_Ngamana uThixo uSomandla wakusikelela, wakuqhamisa,  wakwandisa, ukuze ube sisikhungu sezizwe;
1_28_4_akunike intsikelelo ka-Abraham, wena nembewu yakho ndawonye nawe, ukuze ulidle ilifa ilizwe lokuphambukela kwakho, elo uThixo walinika uAbraham.
1_28_5_UIsake wamndulula ke uYakobi; waya ePadan-aram, kuLabhan unyana kaBhetuweli umAram, umnakwabo boRebheka, unina booYakobi noEsawu.
1_28_6_UEsawu wabona ukuba uIsake umsikelele uYakobi, wamndulula ukuba aye ePadan-aram, azeke khona umfazi; ekumsikeleleni kwakhe wamwisela umthetho wokuthi, Uze ungazeki mfazi ezintombini zakwaKanan;
1_28_7_noYakobi umphulaphule uyise nonina, waya ePadan-aram.
1_28_8_Wabona uEsawu ukuba iintombi zakwaKanan azifunwa nguIsake uyise;
1_28_9_wasuka waya uEsawu kuIshmayeli, wazeka uMahalati, intombi kaIshmayeli, unyana ka-Abraham, udade boNebhayoti, phezu kwabafazi bakhe, wangumkakhe.
1_28_10_Waphuma ke uYakobi eBher-shebha, waya kwaHaran.
1_28_11_Wathi qatha ndaweni ithile, walala khona, kuba belithshonile ilanga. Wathabatha kumatye aloo ndawo, wabeka phantsi kwentloko yakhe, walala kuloo ndawo.
1_28_12_Waphupha ebona ileli imisiwe emhlabeni, intloko yayo iye yafika emazulwini; nanzo izithunywa zikaThixo zinyuka, zisihla ngayo;
1_28_13_nanko uYehova emi phezu kwayo, wathi, NdinguYehova, uThixo ka-Abraham uyihlo, uThixo kaIsake. Ilizwe elo ulele kulo, ndiya kulinika wena, nembewu yakho;
1_28_14_imbewu yakho ibe njengothuli lomhlaba, uphangalale, usinge entshonalanga, nasempumalanga, nasentla, nasezantsi,  zisikelelwe ngawe nangembewu yakho zonke izizwe zehlabathi.
1_28_15_Yabona, ndinawe; ndiya kukugcina naphi apho uya khona,  ndikubuyisele kulo mhlaba; ngokuba andiyi kukushiya, nidide ndikwenze oko ndikuthethileyo kuwe.
1_28_16_Wavuka uYakobi ebuthongweni bakhe, wathi, Kunjenje ke,  uYehova ukho kule ndawo, kanti mna bendingazi.
1_28_17_Woyika, wathi, Asikuko nokuba iyoyikeka le ndawo; yindlu kaThixo le, ayinto yimbi; lisango lamazulu eli.
1_28_18_Wavuka uYakobi kwakusasa, walithabatha ilitye abelibeke phantsi kwentloko yakhe, walimisa lasisimiso, wathulula ioli phezu kwalo.
1_28_19_Wathi igama laloo ndawo yiBheteli, nangona beliyiLuzi,  igama laloo mzi ekuqaleni.
1_28_20_Wabhambathisa ngesibhambathiso uYakobi, esithi, Ukuba uThixo uthe waba nam, wandigcina kuyo le ndlela ndiyihambayo,  wandinika isonka ndadla, neengubo ndambatha,
1_28_21_ndabuyela endlwini kabawo ndinoxolo: uYehova woba nguThixo wam,
1_28_22_neli litye ndilimisileyo lasisimiso loba yindlu kaThixo;  neento zonke othe wandinika, ndokunika isishumi sazo.
1_29_1_Wesuka uYakobi, waya ezweni labasempumalanga.
1_29_2_Wakhangela, wabona iqula ezweni, nantso ikhona imihlambi emithathu yempahla emfutshane, ibuthile ngakulo; kuba imihlambi yayisezwa kwelo qula. Kukho ilitye elikhulu emlonyeni wequla.
1_29_3_Yabe ihlanganiselwa khona yonke imihlambi, baliqengqe ilitye, balisuse emlonyeni wequla, bayiseze impahla emfutshane,  balibuyisele ilitye elo emlonyeni wequla endaweni yalo.
1_29_4_UYakobi wathi kubo, Bazalwana bam, nivela phi na? Bathi bona, Sivela kwaHaran.
1_29_5_Wathi kubo, Niyamazi na uLabhan, unyana kaNahore? Bathi,  Siyamazi.
1_29_6_Wathi kubo, Usaphilile na? Bathi, Usaphilile; nanku noRakeli, intombi yakhe, esiza nempahla emfutshane.
1_29_7_Wathi, Yabonani, kusesemini enkulu, asilixa lakuhlanganisa impahla; yisezeni impahla emfutshane, niye kwalusa.
1_29_8_Bathi, Asinako, ide ihlanganiswe yonke imihlambi, liqengqwe ilitye, lisuke emlonyeni wequla, siyiseze ke impahla emfutshane.
1_29_9_Ke kaloku esathetha nabo, wafika uRakeli nempahla emfutshane kayise; kuba ubeyalusa.
1_29_10_Kwathi, uYakobi akumbona uRakeli intombi kaLabhan,  uninalume, nempahla emfutshane kaLabhan uninalume, wasondela uYakobi, waliqengqa ilitye lesuka emlonyeni wequla, wayiseza impahla emfutshane kaLabhan uninalume.
1_29_11_UYakobi wamanga uRakeli, waliphakamisa izwi lakhe,  wasitsho isililo.
1_29_12_UYakobi wamxelela uRakeli ukuba ungumzalwana kayise,  nokuba ungunyana kaRebheka. Wagidima yena waxelela uyise.
1_29_13_Kwathi, uLabhan akuluva udaba lukaYakobi, unyana wodade wabo, wagidima waya kumkhawulela, wamwola, wamanga, wamngenisa endlwini yakhe. Yena wambalisela uLabhan ngezo ndawo zonke.
1_29_14_Wathi uLabhan kuye, Okunene ulithambo lam, uyinyama yam.  Wahlala naye inyanga iphela.
1_29_15_Wathi uLabhan kuYakobi, Kungokuba ungumzalwana wam na, le nto undikhonza negelize? Ndixelele umvuzo wakho.
1_29_16_Ke kaloku uLabhan waye eneentombi ezimbini; igama lenkulu lalinguLeya, igama lenci lalinguRakeli.
1_29_17_Ke uLeya wayenechaphothi; uRakeli wayemhle isiqu, emhle imbonakalo.
1_29_18_UYakobi ubemthanda uRakeli, wathi, Ndokukhonza iminyaka esixhenxe egenxa kaRakeli, intombi yakho enci.
1_29_19_Wathi uLabhan Kulungile ukuba ndimnike wena, kunokuba ndimnike enye indoda; hlala nam ke.
1_29_20_UYakobi wakhonza ke iminyaka esixhenxe ngenxa kaRakeli;  yanga yimihla embalwa emehlweni akhe, ngenxa yokumthanda kwakhe.
1_29_21_Wathi uYakobi kuLabhan, Ndinike umkam, kuba izalisekile imihla yam, ukuba ndimngene.
1_29_22_Wawahlanganisa uLabhan onke amadoda aloo ndawo, wenza umsitho.
1_29_23_Kwathi ngokuhlwa, wathabatha uLeya intombi yakhe,  wamngenisa kuye; wamngena ke yena.
1_29_24_Intombi yakhe uLeya, uLabhan wayinika uZilipa,  umkhonzazana wakhe, ukuba abe ngumkhonzazana wayo.
1_29_25_Kwathi kusasa, kwabonakala inguLeya. Wathi kuLabhan,  Yintoni na le nto uyenzileyo kum? Andikukhonze ngenxa undikhohlise?
1_29_26_Wathi uLabhan, Akwenjiwa njalo kowethu, ukuthi kwendiswe enci phambi kweyamazibulo.
1_29_27_Zalisa iveki yale, waleke eminye iminyaka esixhenxe;  sokunika naleyo ngenkonzo oya kundikhonza ngayo.
1_29_28_Wenjenjalo uYakobi, wayizalisa iveki yale. Wamnika ke uRakeli intombi yakhe, yangumkakhe.
1_29_29_Intombi yakhe uRakeli, uLabhan wayinika uBhiliha,  umkhonzazana wakhe, ukuba abe ngumkhonzazana wayo.
1_29_30_Wamngena uRakeli, wamthanda uRakeli phezu koLeya. Wakhonza ke, waleka eminye iminyaka esixhenxe.
1_29_31_UYehova wabona ukuba uLeya uthiyiwe, wasivula isizalo sakhe; ke uRakeli ebengazali.
1_29_32_Wamitha ke uLeya wazala unyana, wamthiya igama elinguRubhen, ngokuba ebesithi, UYehova uzibonile iintsizi zam;  inene, iya kundithanda ngoku indoda yam.
1_29_33_Wabuya wamitha, wazala unyana; wathi, UYehova uvile ukuba ndithiyiwe, wandinika nalo; wamthiya igama elinguSimon.
1_29_34_Wabuya wamitha, wazala unyana; wathi, Khona ngoku, iya kunamathela kum indoda yam, kuba ndiyizalele oonyana abathathu;  ngenxa yoko wamthiya igama elinguLevi.
1_29_35_Wabuya wamitha, wazala unyana; wathi, Okwesi sihlandlo ndiya kumdumisa uYehova; ngenxa yonke wamthiya igama elinguYuda. Wanqamka ukuzala.
1_30_1_Ke kaloku akubona uRakeli ukuba akamzaleli mntwana uYakobi,  uRakeli wammonela udade wabo, wathi kuYakobi, Ndinike abantwana; ukuba akundiniki, ndofa.
1_30_2_Wavutha umsindo kaYakobi ngakuRakeli, wathi,  Ndisesikhundleni sikaThixo na, okuvimbileyo isiqhamo sesizalo?
1_30_3_Wathi yena, Nantso impelesi yam uBhiliha; yingene, izalele emadolweni am, ndakheke nam ngayo.
1_30_4_Wamnika ke uBhiliha, umkhonzazana wakhe, ukuba abe ngumfazi; uYakobi wamngena.
1_30_5_Wamitha uBhiliha, wamzalela uYakobi unyana.
1_30_6_Wathi uRhakeli, UThixo undigwebele, kananjalo uliphulaphule izwi lam, wandinika unyana; ngenxa yoko wamthiya igama elinguDan.
1_30_7_Wabuya wamitha uBhiliha, umkhonzazana kaRakeli, wamzalela uYakobi unyana wesibini.
1_30_8_Wathi uRakeli, Ndizamene nodade wethu imizamo kaThixo,  kananjalo ndeyisa; wamthiya igama elinguNafetali.
1_30_9_Ke kaloku wabona uLeya ukuba unqamkile ukuzala, wathabatha uZilipa, umkhonzazana wakhe, wamnika uYakobi ukuba abe ngumfazi.
1_30_10_UZilipa, umkhonzazana kaLeya, wamzalela uYakobi unyana.
1_30_11_Wathi uLeya, Lithamsanqa! Wamthiya igama elinguGadi.
1_30_12_UZilipa, umkhonzazana kaLeya, wamzalela uYakobi unyana wesibini.
1_30_13_Wathi uLeya, Ndiva uyolo, ngokuba iintombi ziya kuthi ndinoyolo. Wamthiya igama elinguAshere.
1_30_14_Waya uRubhen ngemihla yovuno lwengqolowa, wafumana amathuma endle, wawazisa kuLeya unina. Wathi uRakeli kuLeya,  Khawundiphe emathumeni onyana wakho lawo.
1_30_15_Wathi kuye, Yinto encinane na ukuyithabatha indoda yam,  ubuye uthabathe namathuma onyana wam? Wathi uRakeli, Ngako oko mayilale nawe ngobu busuku, ngenxa yamathuma onyana wakho lawo.
1_30_16_Wafika uYakobi evela ezindle ngokuhlwa, waphuma uLeya esiya kumkhawulela, wathi, Uze undingene, kuba ndikuqeshile ngamathuma onyana wam. Walala ke naye ngobo busuku.
1_30_17_UThixo wamphulaphula uLeya; wamitha, wamzalela uYakobi unyana wesihlanu.
1_30_18_Wathi uLeya, UThixo undinikile umvuzo wam, ngenxa yokuba indoda yam ndiyinike umkhonzazana wam.
1_30_19_Wamthiya igama elinguIsakare. Wabuya wamitha uLeya,  wamzalela uYakobi unyana wesithandathu.
1_30_20_Wathi uLeya, UThixo undiphe isipho esilungileyo; okwesi sihlandlo indoda yam iya kuhlala nam, kuba ndiyizalele oonyana abathandathu. Wamthiya igama elinguZebhulon.
1_30_21_Emveni koko wazala intombi, wayithiya igama elinguDina.
1_30_22_Ke kaloku uThixo wamkhumbula uRakeli uThixo wamphulaphula,  wasivula isizalo sakhe.
1_30_23_Wamitha, wazala unyana, wathi, UThixo ukususile ukungcikivwa kwam.
1_30_24_Wamthiya igama elinguYosefu, wathi, UYehova makongezelele omnye unyana.
1_30_25_Kwathi, xa uRakeli ebemzele uYosefu, wathi uYakobi kuLabhan, Ndindulule ndiye endaweni yakowethu, ezweni lakowethu.
1_30_26_Ndinike abafazi bam nabantwana bam, endikukhonze ngenxa yabo, ndihambe; kuba wena uyayazi inkonzo yam endikukhonze ngayo.
1_30_27_Wathi uLabhan kuye, Ukuba kaloku ndibabalwe nguwe, hlala;  ndihlabe ukuthi uYehova undisikelele ngenxa yakho.
1_30_28_Wathi, Ndimisele kakuhle umvuzo wakho ondifaneleyo,  ndikunike.
1_30_29_Wathi kuye, Uyalwazi nawe uhlobo lokukukhonza kwam,  nohlobo lokuhlala kwempahla yakho nam.
1_30_30_Kuba obunayo ndingekafiki yabe imbalwa, ngoku izazekile yaninzi; uYehova ukusikelele apho unyawo lwam luthe lwanyathela; kaloku ndiya kuyisebenzela nini na mna eyam indlu?
1_30_31_Wathi, Ndikunike ntoni na? Wathi uYakobi, Akuyi kundinika nento le; ukuba uthe wandenzela le ndawo, ndobuya ndiyaluse impahla yakho emfutshane, ndiyigcine.
1_30_32_Ndiya kucanda phakathi kwayo yonke impahla yakho emfutshane namhlanje, ndihambe ndikhetha kuyo zonke iingusha ezinala, nezirhwexu, neegusha zonke ezimnyama phakathi kwamatakane, nazo zonke ezirhwexu nezinala phakathi kweebhokhwe, zibe ngumvuzo wam;
1_30_33_bundingqinele ke ubulungisa bam ngexesha elizayo, xa uthe weza kumvuzo wam ophambi kwakho: zonke ezingenala,  nezingerhwexu phakathi kweebhokhwe, nezingemnyama phakathi kweegusha, zoba zezibiweyo ezo, xa zithe zakum.
1_30_34_Wathi uLabhan, Yabona, makube ngokwelizwi lakho elo.
1_30_35_Wazikhetha ngaloo mhla iinkunzi zeebhokhwe ezinemizila,  nezirhwexu, nazo zonke iimazi zeebhokwe ezinakazi,  nezirhwexukazi, zonke ezinobumhlophe, nazo zonke ezimnyama phakathi kwamatakane, wazinikela esandleni soonyana bakhe.
1_30_36_Wamisa uhambo lweemini ezintathu phakathi kwabo noYakobi;  uYakobi walusa eseleyo ke impahla emfutshane kaLabhan.
1_30_37_Ke kaloku uYakobi wathabatha iintonga zompopulari omhlophe ezimanzi, nezom-amangile, nezompleyini, wachuba iindawo ezimhlophe kuzo, exwebula buvele ubumhlophe obusezintongeni ezo.
1_30_38_Wazimisa iintonga abezichubile emijelweni, emikhumbini yamanzi, apho impahla emfutshane ibiza kusela khona, phambi kwempahla emfutshane, ukuba iphathane xa iza kusela.
1_30_39_Yaphathana ke impahla emfutshane phambi kweentonga ezo,  yazala impahla emfutshane enemizila, nerhwexu, nenala.
1_30_40_Wawahlula uYakobi amatakane lawo, wabukhangelisa ubuso bempahla emfutshane malunga nenemizila, nemnyama, yonke empahleni emfutshane kaLabhan; wayibeka yodwa eyakhe imihlambi,  akayibeka empahleni emfutshane kaLabhan.
1_30_41_Kwathi, xa iphathanayo eyomeleleyo empahleni emfutshane,  uYakobi wazibeka iintonga phambi kwempahla emfutshane emijelweni, ukuze iphathane phakathi kweentonga.
1_30_42_Xa ityhafileyo impahla emfutshane, akazibekanga; yathi ke etyhafileyo yaba yekaLabhan, eyomeleleyo yaba yekaYakobi.
1_30_43_Yanda indoda leyo kakhulu kunene, Yanda indoda leyo kakhulu kunene, yaba nempahla emfutshane enizi, nabakhonzazana,  nabakhonzi, neenkamela, namaesile.
1_31_1_Ke kaloku waweva amazwi oonyana bakaLabhan, besithi,  UYakobi uzithabathile zonke izinto abenazo ubawo; ubenze ngezinto zikabawo obu butyebi bakhe bonke.
1_31_2_Wabubona uYakobi ubuso bukaLabhan, nabo bungenjengezolo nezolo elinye kuye.
1_31_3_UYehova wathi kuYakobi, Buyela ezweni likayihlo,  kwelokuzalwa kwakho; ndoba nawe.
1_31_4_UYakobi wathumela, wabiza uRakeli noLeya, ukuba beze endle empahleni yakhe emfutshane.
1_31_5_Wathi kubo, Ndiyabubona ubuso bukayihlo, ukuba abunjengezolo nezolo elinye kum; ke uThixo kabawo ubenam.
1_31_6_Niyazi nina, ukuba uyihlo ndimkhonze ngamandla am onke;
1_31_7_ke uyihlo undidephisele, wawuguqula umvuzo wam kalishumi;  kodwa uThixo akamvumelanga ukuba andenze into embi.
1_31_8_Xa athe, Enala yoba ngumvuzo wakho isuke yonke impahla emfutshane yazala enala; xa athe, Enemizila yoba ngumvuzo wakho, isuke yonke impahla emfutshane yazala enemizila.
1_31_9_Wayihlutha uThixo imfuyo kayihlo, wandinika.
1_31_10_Kwathi, ngexesha lokuphathana kwempahla emfutshane,  ndawaphakamisa amehlo am, ndabona ephupheni, nanzo iinkunzi ezikhwelayo empahleni emfutshane zinemizila, zinala,  zinomchokose.
1_31_11_Sathi isithunywa sikaThixo kum ephupheni, Yakobi; ndathi,  Ndilapha.
1_31_12_Sathi, Khawuphakamise amehlo akho, ubone; zonke iinkunzi ezikhwelayo empahleni emfutshane zinemizila, zinala,  zinomchokose; kuba ndizibonile zonke izinto azenzayo uLabhan kuwe.
1_31_13_NdinguThixo waseBheteli, apho wasithambisa khona isimiso,  apho wabhambathisa ngesibhambathiso kum. Suka ngoko, uphume kweli lizwe, ubuyele ezweni lokuzalwa kwakho.
1_31_14_Baphendula uRakeli noLeya, bathi kuye, Sisenasabelo nalifa lini na endlwini kabawo?
1_31_15_Akuthiwa singabasemzini kuye yini na? Kuba uthengise ngathi, wamana eyidla nemali yethu.
1_31_16_Ngoko kuze bonke ubutyebi abuhluthileyo uThixo kubawo,  bube bobethu, noboonyana bethu, kaloku ke konke akuthethileyo uThixo kuwe kwenze.
1_31_17_Wesuka uYakobi wabakhwelisa oonyana bakhe, nabafazi bakhe,  ezinkameleni.
1_31_18_Waqhuba yonke impahla yakhe, nayo yonke ingqwebo yakhe abeyiqwebile, impahla abeyifuyile, abeyiqwebile ePadan-aram,  ukuze aye kuIsake uyise ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_31_19_ULabhan ubeye kucheba impahla yakhe emfutshane; uRakeli wayiba imilonde-khaya ebiyekayise.
1_31_20_UYakobi wamlalanisa uLabhan umAram, ekubeni engamxelelanga ukuba uyabaleka.
1_31_21_Wabaleke ke, yena nako konke abenako; wesuka, wawuwela uMlambo, wabubhekisa ubuso bakhe entabeni yaseGiliyadi.
1_31_22_Waxelelwa uLabhan ngomhla wesithathu ukuba uYakobi ubalekile.
1_31_23_Wathabatha abazalwana bakhe, wamphuthuma uhambo lwemihla esixhenxe; bafumanana entabeni yaseGiliyadi.
1_31_24_Weza uThixo kuLabhan umAram ephupheni ebusuku, wathi kuye,  Zilumkele, ungathethi nto kuYakobi, nokuba yelungileyo nokuba yembi.
1_31_25_ULabhan wafika kuYakobi. Ke kaloku uYakobi ubeyigxumekile intente yakhe entabeni; uLabhan nabazalwana bakhe bagxumeka entabeni yaseGiliyadi.
1_31_26_Wathi uLabhan kuYakobi, Wenza ntoni na ukundilalanisa,  uziqhube iintombi zam njengabathinjwe ngekrele?
1_31_27_Yini na ukuba uzimele, ubaleke, undilalanise,  ungandixeleli? Ngendiba ndokundulule ngemivuyo, nangeengoma,  nangengqongqo, nangohadi.
1_31_28_Yini na ukuba ungandivumeli ndibange oonyana bam neentombi zam? Kaloku wenze ngobudenge.
1_31_29_Kusemandleni esandla sam ukunenza ububi; ke uThixo kayihlo uthethe nam phezolo, esithi, Zilumkele, ungathethi nto noYakobi, nokuba yelungileyo nokuba yembi.
1_31_30_Ngoku umkileyo nje, ngokuba walangazelela kakhulu indlu kayihlo, uzibeleni na zona izithixo zam?
1_31_31_Waphendula uYakobi wathi kuLabhan, Bendisoyika, kuba bendisithi, Hleze uzixhakamfule kum iintombi zakho.
1_31_32_Osukuba uzifumana kuye izithixo zakho, makangadli bomi.  Phambi kwabazalwana bethu fanisa into yakho enam, uyithabathe.  Wayengazi uYakobi ukuba uRakeli uzibile.
1_31_33_Wangena uLabhan ententeni kaYakobi, nasententeni kaLeya,  nasententeni yeempelesi zombini; akazifumana. Waphuma ententeni kaLeya, wangena ententeni kaRakeli.
1_31_34_Ke kaloku uRakeli ebeyithabathile imilonde-khaya, wayifaka phakathi kwesali yenkamela, wahlala phezu kwayo. ULabhan wayiphuthaphutha yonke intente, akayifumana.
1_31_35_Wathi kuyise, Mawungabi namsindo, nkosi yam, kuba ndingenako ukusuka phambi kwakho, ngokuba ndihleli phezu kwengca. Wagquthagqutha, akayifumana imilonde-khaya.
1_31_36_Wavutha umsindo kaYakobi, wabambana noLabhan. Waphendula uYakobi, wathi kuLabhan, Luyintoni na ukreqo lwam, siyintoni na isono sam, ukuba undisukele ngokushushu nje?
1_31_37_Uziphuthaphuthile zonke iimpahla zam; ufumene ntoni na yazo zonke iimpahla zendlu yakho? Yibeke apha phambi kwabazalwana bam, nabazalwana bakho, bahlule phakathi kwethu sobabini.
1_31_38_Le minyaka imashumi mabini bendinawe; iimazi zakho zeegusha, neemazi zebhokhwe aziphunzanga, neenkunzi zempahla yakho emfutshane andizidlanga.
1_31_39_Into eqwengiweyo andiyizisanga kuwe, ndayimisela ngokwam;  wayibiza esandleni sam nokuba ibiwe emini, nokuba ibiwe ebusuku.
1_31_40_Emini ndadliwa bubushushu, ebusuku yingqele; ubuthongo bam bemka emehlweni am.
1_31_41_Kwaba njalo kum le minyaka imashumi mabini endlwini yakho;  ndakukhonza iminyaka elishumi elinamine ngenxa yeentombi zakho zombini, iminyaka emithandathu ngenxa yempahla yakho emfuthsane; uwuguqule kalishumi umvuzo wam.
1_31_42_Koko uThixo kabawo, uThixo ka-Abraham, Ohlonelwa nguIsake,  waba nam, inene unge undindulule ndilambatha ngoku. UThixo uzibonile iintsizi zam nokuxelenga kwezandla zam, wakohlwaya phezolo.
1_31_43_ULabhan waphendula wathi kuYakobi, Iintombi ziintombi zam,  oonyana ngoonyana bam, impahla emfutshane yimpahla yam, neento zonke ozibonayo zezam. Ndinakwenza ntoni na namhla ezintombini zam ezi, nakoonyana azo ezibazeleyo?
1_31_44_Yiza ngoku, senze umnqophiso, mna nawe, ube lingqina phakathi kwam nawe.
1_31_45_UYakobi wathabatha ilitye, waliphakamisa lasisimiso.
1_31_46_Wathi uYakobi kubazalwana bakhe, Cholani amatye.  Bathabatha amatye, benza imfumba, badla khona phezu kwaloo mfumba.
1_31_47_Wathi ukuyibiza uLabhan yiYegarsahaduta, uYakobi wathi ukuyibiza yiGaledi.
1_31_48_Wathi uLabhan, Le mfumba ilingqina phakathi kwam nawe namhla, ngenxa yoko yathiywa igama eliyiGaledi;
1_31_49_neliyiMizpa, ngokuba wathi Makobonisele uYehova phakathi kwam nawe, sakuba sisithelene;
1_31_50_ukuba uthe wazicinezela iintombi zam, nokuba uthe wazeka abafazi phezu kweentombi zam, akukho bani unathi. Khangela,  uThixo ulingqina phakathi kwam nawe.
1_31_51_ULabhan wathi kuYakobi, Yabona le mfumba, yabona esi simiso ndisiphakamisileyo phakathi kwam nawe;
1_31_52_ingqina yile mfumba, ingqina sesi simiso, ukuba andiyi kugqitha mna kule mfumba ndiye kuwe, ukuba akuyi kugqitha wena kule mfumba nakwesi simiso uze kum, senzane ububi.
1_31_53_UThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaNahore, uThixo woyise wabo,  makagwebe phakathi kwethu. UYakobi wafunga Ohlomelwa nguyise uIsake.
1_31_54_UYakobi wabingelela umbingelelo entabeni apho, wabiza abazalwana bakhe, ukuba badle isonka. Badla ke isonka, balala entabeni apho.
1_31_55_Wavuka uLabhan kusasa, wabanga oonyana bakhe, neentombi zakhe, wabasikelela; wemka ke uLabhan, wabuyela ekhayeni lakhe.
1_32_1_UYakobi wahamba ngendlela yakhe; zaqubisana naye izithunywa zikaThixo.
1_32_2_Wathi uYakobi akuzibona, Ngumkhosi kaThixo lo; wathi igama laloo ndawo yiMahanayim.
1_32_3_Ke kaloku uYakobi wathuma abathunywa phambi kwakhe, baya kuEsawu, umkhuluwa wakhe, ezweni lakwaSehire, emhlabeni wakwaEdom.
1_32_4_Wabawisela umthetho esithi, Nothi ukuthetha enkosini yam uEsawu, Utsho umkhonzi wakho uYakobi ukuthi,  Bendingumphambukeli kuLabhan, ndalibala khona kwada kwangoku;
1_32_5_ndineenkomo namaesile, nempahla emfutshane, nabakhonzi,  nabakhonzazana; ndithumele ukuxelela inkosi yam, ukuze indibabale.
1_32_6_Abathunywa babuyela kuYakobi besithi, Sifikile kumkhuluwa wakho uEsawu, naye uyeza kukukhawulela, enamadoda angamakhulu omane.
1_32_7_Woyika kunene uYakobi, wabandezeleka, wabahlula abantu ababenaye, nempahla emfutshane, neenkomo, neenkamela; iimfuduka zambini.
1_32_8_Wathi, Ukuba uEsawu uthe wafika kwenye imfuduka,  wayichitha, yosinda imfuduka eseleyo.
1_32_9_Wathi uYakobi, Thixo kabawo uAbraham, Thixo kabawo uIsake,  Yehova, uthe kum, Buyela ezweni lakowenu, kwelokuzalwa kwakho;  ndokuphatha kakuhle.
1_32_10_Andiyilingene inceba yonke, nenyaniso yonke oyenzileyo kumkhonzi wakho; kuba ndayiwela le Yordan, ndinentonga yam yodwa, kodwa ngoku ndimfuduka mbini.
1_32_11_Khawundihlangule esandleni somkhuluwa wam, esandleni sikaEsawu; ngokuba ndiyamoyika, hleze afike andibulale, unina ndawonye nabantwana.
1_32_12_Wawuthe wena, Inene, ndiya kukuphatha kakuhle, imbewu yakho nidyenze ibe njengentlabathi yolwandle, engenakubalwa ngenxa yobuninzi.
1_32_13_Ke kaloku yena walala khona ngobo busuku. Wathabatha entweni esifike kuyo isandla sakhe, yangumnikelo kuEsawu,  umkhuluwa wakhe;
1_32_14_iimazi zeebhokhwe ezimakhulu mabini, neenkunzi zeebhokhwe ezimashumi mabini, neemazi neegusha ezimakhulu mabini,  neenkunzi zeegusha ezimashumi mabini,
1_32_15_neenkamela ezisengwayo ezimashumi mathathu, ezinamathole azo, neemazi zeenkomo ezimashumi mane, neenkunzi zeenkomo ezilishumi, neemazi zamaesile ezimashumi mabini, namaxhamxwa alishumi.
1_32_16_Wazinikela esandleni sabakhonzi bakhe, walowo umhlambi wawodwa. Wathi kubakhonzi bakhe, Welani phambi kwam, nibeke isithuba phakathi komhlambi nomhlambi.
1_32_17_Owokuqala wamwisela umthetho, wathi, Xa athe uEsawu umkhuluwa wam waqubisana nawe, wakubuza ngokuthi, Ungokabani na? Uya phi na? Zezikabani na ezi zinto ziphambi kwakho?
1_32_18_wothi, Zezomkhonzi wakho uYakobi: ngumnikelo othunyelwe inkosi yam uEsawu; nanku ke naye ngasemva kwethu.
1_32_19_Nowesibini, nowesithathu wamwisela umthetho, nabo bonke ababeyilandela imihlambi, esithi, Nothetha ngolo hlobo kuEsawu,  nakufumanana naye.
1_32_20_Kananjalo nothi, Nanko mkhonzi wakho uYakobi engasemva kwethu. Kuba wathi, Mandibucamagushe ubuso bakhe ngomnikelo ohamba phambi kwam, emveni koko ndibubone ubuso bakhe;  mhlawumbi wondibuka.
1_32_21_Umnikelo lowo wahamba phambi kwakhe; ke yena walala ngobo busuku emfudukeni.
1_32_22_Wavuka ngobo busuku, wathabatha abafazi bakhe bobabini,  nabakhonzanzana bakhe bobabini noonyana bakhe abalishumi elinamnye, waliwela izibuko le Yabhoki.
1_32_23_Wabathabatha ke, wabaweza emfuleni lowo, waziweza zonke izinto abenazo.
1_32_24_UYakobi wasala yedwa; kwazamana indoda naye kwada kwathi qhiphu ukusa.
1_32_25_Yakubona ukuba ayimeyisi, yachukumisa usikrobana womlenze wakhe, wancothuka usikrobana womlenze kaYakobi ngokuzamana nayo.
1_32_26_Yathi, Ndindulule ndihambe, kuba kuyasa. Wathi yena,  Andiyi kukundulula umke, ukuba akuthanga undisikelele.
1_32_27_Yathi kuye, Ngubani na igama lakho? Wathi, NdinguYakobi.
1_32_28_Yathi, Igama lakho akusayi kuba sathiwa nguYakobi; kuya kuthiwa unguSirayeli, ngokuba ulwe noThixo nabantu, weyisa.
1_32_29_Wabuza uYakobi wathi, Ndixelele igama lakho. Yathi,  Ulibuzelani na igama lam? Yamsikelela khona.
1_32_30_UYakobi wayithiya loo ndawo igama eliyiPeniyeli; kuba wathi, Ndibonene noThixo, wahlangulwa umphefumlo wam.
1_32_31_Lathi chapha ilanga, akudlula ePeniweli, ejingxela ngomlenze wakhe.
1_32_32_Ngenxa yoko oonyana bakaSirayeli abawudli umsipha kasikrobana ophezu kosikrobana womlenze, nanamhla; ngokuba yachukumisa usikrobana womlenze kaYakobi emsipheni kasikrobana.
1_33_1_Wawaphakamisa uYakobi amehlo akhe, wabona, nanko uEsawu esiza, enamadoda amakhulu mane. Abantwana wabahlulahlula, baba kuLeya, nakuRakeli, nakubakhonzazana bobabini.
1_33_2_Wababeka abakhonzazana nabantwana babo phambili, uLeya nabantwana bakhe emva kwabo, uRakeli noYosefu emva kanye.
1_33_3_Ke yena wagqithela phambi kwabo, waqubuda emhlabeni kasixhenxe, wada wasondela kumkhuluwa wakhe.
1_33_4_Wagidima uEsawu emkhawulela, wamwola, wawa entanyeni yakhe,  wamanga; basitsho isililo.
1_33_5_Wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wababona abafazi nabantwana,  wathi, Ngoobani na aba banawe? Wathi yena, Ngabantwana, athe uThixo wabababala umkhonzi wakho.
1_33_6_Basondela abakhonzazana, bona nabantwana babo, baqubuda.
1_33_7_Wasondela noLeya nabantwana bakhe, baqubuda; emveni koko wasondela uYosefu noRakeli, baqubuda.
1_33_8_Wathi, Iyintoni na yonke le mfuduka yakho endiqubisene nayo? Wathi, Yeyokuba ndibabalwe emehlweni enkosi yam.
1_33_9_Wathi uEsawu, Ndanele, mninawa; makube kokwakho okwakho.
1_33_10_Wathi uYakobi, Hayi, makungabi njalo. Ukuba kaloku ndibabalwe emehlweni akho, thabatha umnikelo wam lo esandleni sam; kuba ngenxa yoko ndibubonile ubuso bakho, ndanga ndibona ubuso bukaThixo, ndalikholo kuwe.
1_33_11_Khawuyithabathe intsikelelo yam ezisiweyo kuwe, ngokuba uThixo undibabale, kuba ndineento zonke. Wamjoka, wayithabatha.
1_33_12_Wathi uEsawu, Masinduluke, sihambe; ndohamba phambi kwakho.
1_33_13_Wathi kuye, Inkosi yam iyazi ukuba abantwana bathambile,  nempahla emfutshane, neenkomo ezanyisayo ziphezu kwam; yothi iqhutywe kakhulu imini enye, ife yonke impahla emfutshane.
1_33_14_Inkosi yam mayikhe igqithele phambi komkhonzi wayo ndihambise kuhle ngokuhamba kwempahla ephambi kwam,  nangokuhamba kwabantwana, ndide ndifike enkosini yam kwaSehire.
1_33_15_Wathi uEsawu, Makhe ndiyishiye kuwe inxenye yabantu abanam. Wathi yena, Ngani na? Mandibabalwe emehlweni enkosi yam.
1_33_16_Wabuya ngaloo mhla uEsawu ngendlela yakhe, esiya kwaSehire.
1_33_17_UYakobi wanduluka, waya eSukoti, wazakhela indlu, iinkomo zakhe wazibiyela iintlantsi; ngenxa yoko kwathiwa igama laloo ndawo yiSukoti.
1_33_18_Wafika uYakobi enoxolo emzini kaShekem, osezweni lakwaKanan, ekuveleni kwakhe ePadan-aram; wamisa iintente phambi komzi.
1_33_19_Wathenga isiziba somhlaba, apho wayitwabulula khona intente yakhe, esandleni soonyana bakaHamore usoShekem,  ngekhulu lemali.
1_33_20_Wamisa khona isibingelelo, wathi ukusithiya nguThixo,  uThixo kaSirayeli.
1_34_1_Ke kaloku uDina, intombi kaLeya, leyo wayizalela uYakobi,  waphuma waya kubona iintombi zelo zwe.
1_34_2_UShekem, unyana kaHamore umHivi, isikhulu selizwe, sambona,  samthabatha, salala naye, samona.
1_34_3_Umphefumlo wakhe wanamathela kuDina intombi kaYakobi;  wayithanda intombi leyo, wathetha kakuhle nentombi.
1_34_4_UShekem wathetha kuHamore uyise wathi, Ndizekele le ntombi ibe ngumfazi.
1_34_5_Weva uYakobi ukuba umenze inqambi uDina, intombi yakhe. Ke oonyana bakhe baye besempahleni yakhe endle; wathi tu ke uYakobi, bada bafika.
1_34_6_Waphuma uHamore, uyise kaShekem, eza kuthetha noYakobi.
1_34_7_Bafika oonyana akaYakobi evela kwalusa. Bakuyiva le nto aba bahlungu amadoda lawo, avutha kunene ngumsindo, ngokuba wenza ubudenge kwaSirayeli ngokulala nentombi kaYakobi, into leyo engeyakwenziwa.
1_34_8_Wathetha uHamore nabo, esithi, uShekem, unyana wam,  umphefumlo wakhe uthene nca nentombi yakowenu; khanimnike ibe ngumkakhe;
1_34_9_nendiselane nathi, nisinike iintombi zenu, nizeke iintombi zethu;
1_34_10_nahlale nathi, ilizwe libe phambi kwenu; hlalani nirhwebe kulo, niqiniseke ukuma kulo.
1_34_11_Wathi uShekem kuyise wayo, nakubanakwayo, Mandibabalwe emehlweni enu, nento eniyithethayo kum ndoninika.
1_34_12_Yandisani kunene ikhazi phezu kwam, nesipho; ndoninika njengoko nithethayo kum; ndinikeni ke intombi leyo ibe ngumfazi.
1_34_13_Oonyana bakaYakobi babaphendla ooShekem noHamore uyise ngenkohliso, bathetha nabo, ngokuba ebemenze inqambi uDina,  udade wabo.
1_34_14_Bathi kubo, Asinakuyenza le nto, yokuba udade wethu simnike indoda engalukanga; kuba loo nto ibe ingaba sisingcikivo kuthi.
1_34_15_Sovumelana nani ngale ndawo yodwa, ukuba nithe naba njengathi, ngokuthi yaluke kuni yonke into eyindoda.
1_34_16_Soninika ke iintombi zethu, sizeke iintombi zenu, sihlale nani, sibe bantu banye.
1_34_17_Ukuba nithe anasiphulaphula ngokuthi naluke, soyithabatha intombi yethu, simke.
1_34_18_Alunga amazwi abo emehlweni kaHamore, nasemehlweni kaShekem, unyana kaHamore.
1_34_19_Akalibala umfana ukuyenza loo nto, uba ubethabathekile yintombi kaYakobi; ubezukile yena ngaphezu kwayo yonke indlu kayise.
1_34_20_Weza uHamore noShekem, unyana wakhe, esangweni lomzi wabo,  bathetha kumadoda omzi, bathi,
1_34_21_La madoda ayavana nathi; makahlale ezweni apha, arhwebe kulo; ilizwe eli, yabonani, libanzi ngeenxa zombini phambi kwawo; sozizeka iintombi zawo zibe ngabafazi, siwanike iintombi zethu.
1_34_22_Ke ovumelana nathi ngale ndawo yodwa amadoda lawo,  ukuhlala nathi, sibe bantu banye, yakwaluka kuthi yonke into eyinoda, njengokuba alukile wona.
1_34_23_Imfuyo yawo, nengqwebo yawo, nawo onke amaqegu awo,  akasayi kuba ngawethu na? Siya kuthi kodwa sivumelane nawo,  ukuba ahlale nathi.
1_34_24_Bamphulaphula ke uHamore noShekem unyana wakhe, bonke abaphuma ngesango omzi wabo. Yaluswa yonke into eyindoda, bonke abaphuma ngesango lomzi wabo.
1_34_25_Kwathi ngomhla wesithathu, bakuba buhlungu, besuka oonyana ababini bakaYakobi, uSimon noLevi, abanakwabo boDina,  bathabatha walowo ikrele lakhe, bawufikela loo mzi ungakhumbulele nto, babulala yonke into eyindoda.
1_34_26_Babulala noHamore, noShekem unyana wakhe, ngohlangothi lwekrele, bamthabatha uDina endlwini kaShekem, baphuma.
1_34_27_Oonyana bakaYakobi babafikela ababuleweyo, bawuphanga umzi, ngokuba bebemenze inqambi udade wabo.
1_34_28_Impahla yabo emfutshane, neenkomo zabo, namaesile abo,  neento zonke ezibe ziphakathi komzi, nezibe zisendle,  bazithabatha;
1_34_29_nobutyebi babo bonke, nabantwana babo bonke, nabafazi babo, babathimba, baphanga neento zonke ebe zisendlwini.
1_34_30_UYakobi wathi kuSimon nakuLevi, Nindihlisele ishwangusha,  ukuze ndinuke phakathi kwabemi belizwe eli, phakathi kwamaKanan, naphakathi kwamaPerizi; ndibantu bambalwa nje mna,  baya kundihlanganyela, bandibulale, nditshatyalaliswe mna,  nendlu yam.
1_34_31_Bathi bona, udade wethu angaphathwa njengehenyukazi yini na?
1_35_1_Ke kaloku wathi uThixo kuYakobi, Suka uye eBheteli, uhlale khona, wenze khona isibingelelo kuThixo, owabonakalayo kuwe ekubalekeni kwakho ebusweni bukaEsawu, umkhuluwa wakho.
1_35_2_Wathi ke uYakobi kwindlu yakhe, nakubo bonke ababenaye,  Susani izithixo zasemzini eziphakathi kwenu, nina nizihlambulule, ninxibe ngubo zimbi;
1_35_3_sisuke, sinyuke siye eBheteli, senze khona isibingelelo kuThixo, owandiphendula ngomhla wokubandezeleka kwam, obe nam endleleni endandihamba ngayo.
1_35_4_Bazinika uYakobi zonke izithixo zasemzini ebezisesandleni sabo, namajikazi abesezindlebeni zabo; uYakobi wazimbela phantsi komoki obungakwaShekem.
1_35_5_Banduluka; uqhiphulo-mbilini ngoThixo lwaba phezu kwemizi ngeenxa zonke kubo, ayabasukela oonyana bakaYakobi.
1_35_6_Wafika uYakobi eLuzi, esezweni lakwaKanan, ekwayiBheteli;  yena nabo bonke abantu ababenaye.
1_35_7_Wakha khona isibingelelo, wathi loo ndawo ukuyibiza nguThixo waseBheteli; kuba kulapho uThixo wazityhilayo kuye,  ekubalekeni kwakhe ebusweni bomkhuluwa wakhe.
1_35_8_Wafa uDebhora, umanyisikazi kaRebheka, angcwatywa ngasezantsi kweBheteli, phantsi kom-oki; kwathiwa igama layo nguMoki wokuLila.
1_35_9_UThixo wabuya wabonakala kuYakobi ekuveleni kwakhe ePadan-aram, wamsikelela.
1_35_10_Wathi uThixo kuye, Igama lakho nguYakobi; akuyi kuba sathiwa igama lakho nguYakobi, kuya kuthiwa igama lakho nguSirayeli; wamthiya ke igama elinguSirayeli.
1_35_11_Wathi uThixo kuye, NdinguThixo uSomandla. Qhama, wande;  uhlanga nesikhungu seentlanga siya kuvela kuwe, nookumkani baphume esinqeni sakho.
1_35_12_Ilizwe endalinika uAbraham noIsake ndilinike wena;  ndilinike imbewu yakho emva kwakho ilizwe elo.
1_35_13_Wenyuka uThixo, wemka kuye kuloo ndawo abethethe naye kuyo.
1_35_14_UYakobi wamisa isimiso kuloo ndawo abethethe naye kuyo,  isimiso samatye; wathulula phezu kwaso umnikelo othululwayo,  wagalela neoli phezu kwaso.
1_35_15_UYakobi wathi igama laloo ndawo, uThixo abethethe naye kuyo, yiBheteli.
1_35_16_Banduluka eBheteli. Kwathi, kusemganyana ukuba kufikwe e-Efrata, wazala uRakeli, kwaba nzima ukuzala kwakhe.
1_35_17_Kwathi, kwakuba nzima ukuzala kwakhe, wathi umzalisikazi kuye, Musa ukoyika, kuba nalo ngunyana wakho.
1_35_18_Kwathi ekupumeni komphefumlo wakhe, kuba wafayo, wathi nguBhenoni igama lakhe; ke yena uyise wathi nguBhenjamin.
1_35_19_Wafa ke uRakeli, wangcwatyelwa endleleni yase-Efrata eyiBhetelehem.
1_35_20_UYakobi wamisa isimiso phezu kwengcwaba lakhe; sisimiso sengcwaba likaRakeli nanamhla.
1_35_21_USirayeli wayincothula intente yakhe, waya wayitwabulula ngaphaya kweMigdoli-edere.
1_35_22_Kwathi, ekuhlaleni kukaSirayeli kwelo zwe, waya uRubhen,  wamlala uBhiliha, ishweshwe likayise; weva ke uSirayeli.  Oonyana bakaYakobi babelishumi elinababini.
1_35_23_Oonyana bakaLeya nguRubhen, owamazibulo kuYakobi, noSimon,  noLevi, noYuda, noIsakare, noZebhulon.
1_35_24_Oonyana bakaRakeli nguYosefu noBhenjamin.
1_35_25_Oonyana bakaBhiliha, umkhonzazana kaRakeli, nguDan noNafetali.
1_35_26_Oonyana bakaZilipa, umkhonzazana kaLeya, nguGadi noAshere.  Ngabo abo oonyana bakaYakobi, awabazalelwa ePadan-aram.
1_35_27_UYakobi waya kuIsake uyise kwaMamre, eKiriyati ka-Arbha,  eHebron, apho babengabaphambukeli khona uAbraham noIsake.
1_35_28_Imihla kaIsake yaba yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci asibhozo.
1_35_29_UIsake waphuma umphefumlo, wafa, wahlanganiselwa kwabakowabo, aluphele, ephelele ebudaleni. Bamngcwaba ooEsawu noYakobi, oonyana bakhe.
1_36_1_Yiyo le ke inzala kaEsawu, onguEdom.
1_36_2_UEsawu wabazeka abafazi bakhe ezintombini zakwaKanan: uAda,  intombi kaElon umHeti, oAholibhama, intombi ka-Ana, intombi kaTsibheyon umHivi;
1_36_3_wazeka noBhasemati, intombi kaIshmayeli, udade boNebhayoti.
1_36_4_UAda wamzalela uEsawu uElifazi: uBhasemati wazala uRehuweli.
1_36_5_UAholibhama wazala uYehushe, noYalam, noKora. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaEsawu, awabazalelwayo ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_36_6_UEsawu wabathabatha abafazi bakhe, noonyana bakhe,  neentombi zakhe, nabendlu yakhe yonke, nemfuyo yakhe, namaqegu akhe onke, nengqwebo yakhe yonke abeyiqebile ezweni lakwaKanan,  waya kwelinye ilizwe, emka ngenxa kaYakobi umninawa wakhe.
1_36_7_Kuba ingqwebo yabo ibininzi, ukuze bangabi nakuhlala ndawonye; nelizwe lokuphambukela kwabo libe lingenakubathwala,  ngenxa yemfuyo yabo.
1_36_8_Wahlala uEsawu entabeni yakwaSehire. UEsawu ke lowo nguEdom.
1_36_9_Yiyo le ke inzala kaEsawu, uyise wamaEdom, entabeni yakwaSehire.
1_36_10_Ngawo la ke amagama oonyana bakaEsawu: nguElifazi, unyana ka-Ada, umkaEsawu; nguRehuweli, unyana kaBhasemati, umkaEsawu.
1_36_11_Oonyana bakaElifazi nguTeman, no-Omare, noTsefo, noGatam,  noKenazi.
1_36_12_UTimna ebelishweshwe likaElifazi, unyana kaEsawu,  wamzalela uElifazi uAmaleki;
1_36_13_ngabo abo oonyana baka-Ada, umkaEsawu. Ngabo aba oonyana bakaRehuweli: uNahati, noZera, noShama, noMiza. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaBhasemati, umkaEsawu.
1_36_14_Ngabo aba oonyana baka-Aholibhama, intombi ka-Ana, intombi kaTsibheyon, umkaEsawu: wamzalela uEsawu uYehushe, noYalam,  noKora.
1_36_15_Zizo ezi izikhulu zoonyana bakaEsawu: oonyana bakaElifazi,  owamazibulo kuEsawu, sisikhulu esinguTeman, isikhulu esingeOmare, isikhulu esinguTsefo, isikhulu esinguKenazi,  isikhulu esinguKora, isikhulu esinguGatam, isikhulu esinguAmaleki.
1_36_16_Zizo ezo izikhulu zakwaElifazi ezweni lakwaEdom; ngabo abo oonyana baka-Ada.
1_36_17_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaRehuweli, unyana kaEsawu: sisikhulu esinguNahati, isikhulu esinguZera, isikhulu esinguShama,  isikhulu esinguMiza; zizo ezo izikhulu zakwaRehuweli ezweni lakwaEdom; ngabo abo oonyana bakaBhasemati, umkaEsawu.
1_36_18_Ngabo aba oonyana baka-Aholibhama, umkaEsawu: sisikhulu esinguYehushe, isikhulu esinguYalam, isikhulu esinguKora; zizo ezo izikhulu zakwa-Aholibhama, intombi ka-Ana, umkaEsawu.
1_36_19_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaEsawu, zizo ezo izikhulu; nguEdom ke lowo.
1_36_20_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaSehire umHori, ababemi kwelo zwe:  uLotan, noShobhali,
1_36_21_noTsibheyon, oAna, noDishon noEtsere, noDishan; zizo ezo izikhulu zamaHori, oonyana bakaSehire, ezweni lakwaEdom.
1_36_22_Oonyana bakaLotan babengamaHori, noHemam; udade boLotan nguTimna.
1_36_23_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaShobhali: nguAlevan, noManahati,  noEbhali, noShefo, no-Onam.
1_36_24_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaTsibheyon: nguAya noAna. Ngulo Ana wayifumanayo imithombo eshushu entlango, esalusa amaesile kaTsibheyon uyise.
1_36_25_Ngabo aba oonyana baka-Ana: NguDishon; uAholibhama wayeyintombi ka-Ana: nguDishon; uAholibhama wayeyintombi ka-Ana.
1_36_26_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaDishon: nguHemdan, noEshbhan,  noItran, noKeran.
1_36_27_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaEtsere:
1_36_28_nguBhilehan, noZavan, noAkan. Ngabo aba oonyana bakaDishan: ngu-Utse noAran.
1_36_29_Zizo ezi izikhulu zamaHori: isikhulu esinguLotan, isikhulu esinguShobhali, isikhulu esinguTsibheyon, isikhulu esinguAna,  isikhulu esinguDishon,
1_36_30_isikhulu esinguEtsere, isikhulu esinguDishan; zizo ezo izikhulu zamaHori, ngokwezikhulu zabo ezweni lakwaSehire.
1_36_31_Ngabo aba ookumkani ababelawula ezweni lakwaEdom,  kungekabikho kumkani unobukumkani kubo oonyana bakaSirayeli:
1_36_32_uBhela, unyana kaBhehore, walawula kwaEdom; igama lomzi wakhe yiDinabha.
1_36_33_Wafa uBhela, wathi uYobhabhi, unyana kaZera waseBhotsera,  walawula esikhundleni sakhe.
1_36_34_Wafa uYobhabhi, wathi uHusham, wasezweni lamaTeman,  walawula esikhundleni sakhe.
1_36_35_Wafa uHusham, wathi uHadadi, unyana kaBhedadi,  owawatshabalalisayo amaMidiyan emhlabeni wamaMowabhi, walawula esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomzi wakhe yiAviti.
1_36_36_Wafa uHadadi, wathi uSamla waseMasereka walawula esikhundleni sakhe.
1_36_37_Wafa uSamla, wathi uSawule, waseRehobhoti yoMlambo,  walawula esikhundleni sakhe.
1_36_38_Wafa uSawule, wathi uBhahali-hanan, unyana ka-Akebhore,  walawula esikhundleni sakhe.
1_36_39_Wafa uBhahali-hanan, unyana ka-Akebhore, wathi uHadare walawula esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomzi wakhe yiPawu; igama lomkakhe nguMehetabheli, intombi kaMatrede, intombi kaMezahabhi.
1_36_40_Ngawo la amagama ezikhulu zakwaEsawu ngokwezizwe zazo,  ngokweendawo zazo, ngamagama azo: isikhulu esinguTimna,  isikhulu esinguAleva, isikhulu esinguYetete,
1_36_41_isikhulu esinguAholibhama, isikhulu esinguEla, isikhulu esinguPinon,
1_36_42_isikhulu esinguKenazi, isikhulu esinguTeman, isikhulu esinguMibhetsare,
1_36_43_isikhulu esinguMagediyeli, isikhulu esinguIram. Zizo ezo izikhulu zakwaEdom, ngokwamakhaya azo, ezweni lokuma kwazo.  NguEsawu ke lowo uyise wamaEdom.
1_37_1_Ke kaloku uYakobi wahlala ezweni lokuphambukela kukayise,  ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_37_2_Yiyo le ke inzala kaYakobi. UYosefu, engominyaka ilishumi linesixhenxe ezelwe, wayesalusa impahla emfutshane ndawonye nabakhuluwa bakhe; yena ke, engumfana, wayenoonyana bakaBhiliha, noonyana bakaZilipa, abafazi bakayise. UYosefu wazisa udaba lwabo olubi kuyise.
1_37_3_USirayeli wayemthanda uYosefu ngaphezu kwabo bonke oonyana bakhe, ngokuba ebengunyana wokwaluphala kwakhe; yena wamenzela ke ingubo ende enemikhono.
1_37_4_Abakhuluwa bakhe babona ukuba uyise umthanda ngaphezu kwabo bonke, bamthiya, ababa nakuthetha naye bexolile.
1_37_5_UYosefu waphupha iphupha, wabaxelela abakhuluwa bakhe;  kwaba kukhona bamthiyayo.
1_37_6_Wathi kubo, Khanilive eli phupha ndiliphuphileyo.
1_37_7_Yabonani, besibopha izithungu entsimini phakathi; saza isithungu sam sesuka sema; zaza izithungu zenu zasingqonga,  zaqubuda kwisithungu sam.
1_37_8_Abakhuluwa bakhe bathi kuye, Yinene na ukuba uya kuba ngukumkani phezu kwethu? Yinene na ukuba uya kusilawula? Kwaba kukhona bamtiyayo ngenxa yamaphupha akhe, nangenxa yamazwi akhe.
1_37_9_Wabuya waphupha elinye iphupha, walixela kubakhuluwa bakhe,  wathi, Yabonani, ndibuye ndaphupha iphupha; ndiphuphe ilanga nenyanga neenkwenkwezi ezilushumi elinanye ziqubuda kum.
1_37_10_Wakuxela kuyise, nakubakhuluwa bakhe. Uyise wamkhalimela,  wathi kuye, Liphupha lini na eli uliphuphileyo? Mna, nonyoko,  nabakhuluwa bakho, soza size kuqubuda kuwe na emhlabeni?
1_37_11_Abakhuluwa bakhe bammonela, ke yena uyise waligcina eli lizwi.
1_37_12_Ke kaloku abakhuluwa bakhe baya kwalusa impahla emfutshane kayise kwaShekem.
1_37_13_USirayeli wathi kuYosefu, Abakhuluwa bakho abalusi eShekem na? Yiza, ndikuthume kubo.
1_37_14_Wathi yena kuye, Ndilapha. Wathi kuye, Khawuye kukhangela ukuphila kwabakhuluwa bakho, nokuphila kwempahla emfutshane;  ubuye uze kundixelela. Wamthuma ke, emsusa entilini yaseHebron,  waya eShekem.
1_37_15_Wafunyanwa ngumfo, ebhadula endle; umfo lowo wambuza wathi, Ufuna ntoni na?
1_37_16_Wathi, Ndifuna abakhuluwa bam; khawundixelele apho balusa khona.
1_37_17_Wathi umfo, Bandulukile apha, kuba khendeva besithi,  Masiye eDotan. UYosefu wabalandela abakhuluwa bakhe, wabafumana eDotan.
1_37_18_Bambona ke esekude, engekasondeli kubo, benza iyelenqe lokumbulala.
1_37_19_Bathetha omnye komnye besithi, Nanko lo mphuphi esiza.
1_37_20_Yizani ke ngoko, simbulale, simphose komnye wemihadi,  sithi, Udliwe lirhamncwa, size sibone ukuba amaphupha akhe oba yintoni na.
1_37_21_Weva uRubhen, wamhlangula esandleni sabo; wathi,  Masingambulali afe.
1_37_22_Wathi uRhubhen kubo, Musani ukuphalaza gazi; mphoseni kulo mhadi usentlango; musani ukumsa sandla. Watsho, ukuze amhlangule esandleni sabo, ambuyisele kuyise.
1_37_23_Kwathi akufika uYosefu kubakhuluwa bakhe, bamhluba uYosefu ingubo yakhe, ingubo ende enemikhono abenayo;
1_37_24_bamthabatha, bamphosa emhadini; umhadi lowo ube uze,  kungekho manzi kuwo.
1_37_25_Bahlala phantsi, badla isonka; baphakamisa amehlo abo,  bakhangela, nango umkhoko wamaIshmayeli uvela eGiliyadi,  uneenkamela zithwele intlaka emhlophe, namafutha aqholiweyo,  nentlaka emnandi, besihla nazo besiya eYiputa.
1_37_26_UYuda wathi kubazalwana bakhe, Yinzuzoni na ukuthi simbulale umninawa wethu, sifihle igazi lakhe?
1_37_27_Yizani sithengise ngaye kumaIshmayeli; isandla sethu masingabi phezu kwakhe, ngokuba ngumzalwana wethu, yinyama yethu. Bamphulaphula abazalwana bakhe.
1_37_28_Adlula amaMidiyan lawo angabarhwebi; bamrhola, bamkhupha uYosefu emhadini, bathengisa ngoYosefu kumaIshmayeli ngeesilivere ezimashumi mabini; amsa uYosefu eYiputa.
1_37_29_Wabuyela uRubhen emhadini. Yini? UYosefu akakho emhadini;  wazidrazula iingubo zakhe.
1_37_30_Wabuyela kubaninawa bakhe, wathi, Umfana akakho; mna ke ndosuka ndiye ngaphi na?
1_37_31_Bayithabatha ingubo kaYosefu, baxhela inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti, bayithi nkxu ingubo egazini.
1_37_32_Bayithumela ingubo ende enemikhono ekhaya, bayisa kuyise,  bathi, Siyichole; khawufanise, ukuba yingubo yonyana wakho,  asiyiyo, sini na?
1_37_33_Wayifanisa, wathi, Yingubo yonyana wam; udliwe lirhamncwa;  inene, uqwengiwe uYosefu.
1_37_34_UYakobi wazikrazula iingubo zakhe, wabeka ezirhwexayo esinqeni sakhe, wamenzela isijwili unyana wakhe imihla emininzi.
1_37_35_Besuka bonke oonyana bakhe nazo zonke iintombi zakhe, beza kumthuthuzela; akavuma kuthuthuzelwa, wathi, Ndiya kuhla ndiye kunyana wam kwelabafileyo, ndisenza isijwili. Uyise wamlilela ke.
1_37_36_AmaMidiyan aya athengisa ngaya eYiputa kuPotifare, umbusi wakwaFaro, umthetheli wabasiki.
1_38_1_Kwathi ngelo xesha, wehla uYuda, esuka kubazalwana bakhe,  waya wayimisa intente yakhe ngakwindoda yaseAdulam, egama linguHira.
1_38_2_UYuda wabona khona intombi yendoda engumKanan, egama linguShuwa; wayizeka, wayingena.
1_38_3_Yamitha, yazala unyana; wathi igama lakhe nguEre.
1_38_4_Yabuya yamitha, yazala unyana; yathi igama lakhe nguOnan.
1_38_5_Yabuya yaphinda yamitha, yazala unyana; yathi igama lakhe nguShela; wayeseKezibhi ukumzala kwakhe.
1_38_6_UYuda wamzekela uEre, amazibulo akhe, umfazi ogama linguTamare.
1_38_7_Ke uEre, amazibulo kaYuda, ubeneentlondi ezimbi emehlweni kaYehova; waza uYehova wambulala.
1_38_8_UYuda wathi kuOnan, Yiya kumfazi womkhuluwa wakho, umngene,  umvelisele imbewu umkhuluwa wakho.
1_38_9_Wayesazi uOnan ukuba imbewu ayiyi kuba yeyakhe; wathi, xa sukuba esiya kumfazi womkhuluwa wakhe, wayiphalazela emhlabeni ukuze angamniki mbewu umkhuluwa wakhe.
1_38_10_Kwaba kubi emehlweni kaYehova oko wakwenzayo; ngoko wambulala naye.
1_38_11_Wathi uYuda kuTamare, umolokazana wakhe, Hlala ungumhlolokazi endlwini kayihlo, ade akhule uShela, unyana wam;  kuba wathi, Hleze afe naye, njengabakhuluwa bakhe. Wemka uTamare, waya kuhlala endlwini kayise.
1_38_12_Zakuba ninzi iintsuku, yafa intombi kaShuwa, umkaYuda Akuthuthuzeleka uYuda, wenyuka waya kubachebi bempahla yakhe emfutshane, yena noHira, isihlobo sakhe saseAdulam, kwaTimna.
1_38_13_Waxelelwa uTamare kwathiwa, Nanko uyihlozala, enyuka esiya kucheba impahla yakhe emfutshane kwaTimna.
1_38_14_Wazisusa iingubo zobuhlolokazi bakhe, wazigqubuthela ngesigqubuthelo, wazithi wambu, wahlala phantsi esangweni le-Enayim, engasendleleni eya kwaTimna; kuba ubebona ukuba ukhulile uShela, akasiwa noko kuye ukuba abe ngumkakhe.
1_38_15_UYuda wambona, waba ulihenyukazi, kuba ebegqubuthele ubuso.
1_38_16_Wathi gu bucala, waya kuye endleleni wathi, Khawuze,  ndikungene; kuba ubengazi ukuba ngumolokazana wakhe. Wathi,  Wondinika ntoni na, ukuze ndikuvumele ukuba undingene?
1_38_17_Wathi, Mna ndothumela ndithabathe itakane lebhokwe elisempahleni emfutshane. Wathi, Ewe, ukuba uthe wandinika isibambiso, ude ulithumele kum.
1_38_18_Wathi, Ndikunike sibambiso sini na? Wathi yena, Umsesane wakho, nesidanga sakho, nomsimelelo wakho osesandleni sakho.  Wamnika ke, wamngena, wamitha yena ngaye.
1_38_19_Wesuka wemka, wasisusa isigqubuthelo sakhe, wambatha iingubo zobuhlolokazi bakhe.
1_38_20_UYuda walithumela itakane lebhokhwe ngesandla sesihlobo sakhe saseAdulam, ukuze samkele isibambiso esandleni senkazana leyo; asiyifumananga ke.
1_38_21_Sabuza kubantu baloo ndawo, sathi, Liphi na ingawukazi ebe lise-Enayim ngasendleleni? Bathi, Akubangakho ngawukazi apha.
1_38_22_Sabuyela kuYuda sathi, Andilifumananga; nabo abantu baloo ndawo bathe, Akubangakho ngawukazi apha.
1_38_23_Wathi uYuda, Malizithabathe, hleze sidelwe. Yabona,  ndithumele eli takane, ke wena akulifumananga.
1_38_24_Kwathi, emva kweenyanga ezintathu, waxelelwa uYuda kwathiwa, UTamare, umolokazana wakho, uhenyuzile; kananjalo,  yabona, umithi ngokuhenyuza oko. UYuda wathi, Mkhupheni atshiswe.
1_38_25_Akukhutshwa, wathumela yena kuyisezala, wathi, Ndimithiswe yindoda ezizezayo ezi zinto; wathi, Khawufanise ukuba ngokabani na lo msesane, nesi sidanga, nalo msimelelo.
1_38_26_Wazifanisa uYuda, wathi, Ulilungisa kunam; wenze kuba ndingamnikanga uShela, unyana wam. Akabanga sabuya amazi.
1_38_27_Kwathi, ngexesha lokuzala kwakhe, nanku ingamawele esizalweni sakhe.
1_38_28_Kwathi, ekuzaleni kwakhe, kwavela isandla; wathabatha umzalisikazi, wabopha esandleni salo usinga olubomvu, esithi,  Eli laphuma kuqala.
1_38_29_Kuthe ke, lakusibuyisa isandla salo, nanko kuphuma umzalwana walo. Wathi, Yini na ukuba uzityhobozele? Wathiywa ke igama lokuba nguPeretse.
1_38_30_Kwathi emva koko, kwaphuma umzalwana walo, obenosinga olubomvu esandleni sakhe; wathiywa igama lokuba nguZera.
1_39_1_Ke kaloku uYosefu wahliswa wasiwa eYiputa. UPotifare,  umbusi wakwaFaro, umthetheli wabasiki, umYiputa, wamthenga kumaIshmayeli, abemhlisele khona.
1_39_2_UYehova waba naye uYosefu, waba yindoda enempumelelo; waba sendlwini yenkosi yakhe, umYiputa lowo.
1_39_3_Yabona inkosi yakhe ukuba uYehova unaye, ukuba zonke izinto abezenza, uYehova ubezenza zibe nempumelelo esandleni sakhe.
1_39_4_UYosefu wababalwa emehlweni ayo, wayilungiselela; yamenza umveleli wendlu yayo, neento zonke ebinazo yazinikela esandleni sakhe.
1_39_5_Kwathi, ukususela ekubeni yamenza umveleli wendlu yayo neento zonke ebinazo, wayisikelela uYehova indlu yomYiputa lowo ngenxa kaYosefu. Yabakho intsikelelo kaYehova ezintweni zonke ebinazo, endlwini nasezindle.
1_39_6_Zonke izinto ebinazo yaziyekela esandleni sikaYosefu,  ayakhathalela nanye into ebikuye, ingesiso isonka esidlayo. Ke uYosefu ebemhle isiqu, emhle imbonakalo.
1_39_7_Kwathi emveni kwezi zinto, umfazi wenkosi yakhe waphosa amehlo akhe kuYosefu, wathi, Ndilale.
1_39_8_Wamangala, wathi kumka-nkosi yakhe, Yabona, inkosi yam ayikhathalele nto ikum isendlwini, nezinto zonke enazo izinikele esandleni sam.
1_39_9_Akukho bani mkhulu kum kule ndlu; ayinqabisanga nento le kum, nguwe wedwa, ngokokuba ungumkayo; ndingathini na ke ukwenza obu bubi bukhulu kangaka, ndone kuThixo?
1_39_10_Kwathi, nakuba ebethetha kuYosefu imihla ngemihla,  akamphulaphula yena ukuba alale ecaleni lakhe, nokuthi abe naye.
1_39_11_Kwathi kuloo mihla, wangena endlwini eya kusebenza umsebenzi wakhe; kwaye kungekho nanye yakumadoda endlu endlwini apho.
1_39_12_Wambamba ngengubo wathi, Ndilale. Wayishiya ingubo yakhe esandleni sakhe, wabaleka, waphumela phandle.
1_39_13_Kwathi, akubona ukuba uyishiyile ingubo yakhe esandleni sakhe, ubalekele phandle,
1_39_14_wabiza amadoda endlu yakhe, wathetha kuwo, esithi,  Khangelani, usizisele indoda engumHebhere, ukuba idlale ngathi;  izile kum, isiza kundilala, ndakhala ngezwi elikhulu;
1_39_15_yathi, yakuva ndiphakamisa izwi, ndikhala, yayishiya ingubo yayo ecaleni lam, yabaleka, yaphumela phandle.
1_39_16_Wayibeka phantsi ingubo yayo ecaleni lakhe, yada yafika inkosi yakhe endlwini yayo.
1_39_17_Wathetha kuyo ngokwaloo mazwi esithi, Size kum isicaka esingumHebhere, esi usizisele sona, ukuba sidlale ngam;
1_39_18_kuthe, ndakuliphakamisa izwi lam, ndikhala, sayishiya ingubo yaso ecaleni lam, sabalekela phandle.
1_39_19_Ithe, yakuweva inkosi yakhe amazwi omkayo awawathethayo kuyo, esithi, Senjenje isicaka sakho kum, wavutha umsindo wayo.
1_39_20_Inkosi kaYosefu yamthabatha, yamfaka entolongweni, kuloo ndawo apho amakhonkxwa okumkani abekhonkxwa khona, waba sentolongweni apho ke.
1_39_21_UYehova ubenoYosefu, wamthobela inceba, wenza ukuba athandwe ngumphathi wentolongo.
1_39_22_Umphathi wentolongo wawanikela kuYosefu onke amakhonkxwa asentolongweni, ukuze zonke izinto ezisukuba zisenziwa khona,  abe nguye ozenzayo.
1_39_23_Umphathi wentolongo akakhathalelanga nto isesandleni sakhe, ngenxa yokuba uYehova ubenaye; zonke izinto ebesakuzenza, uYehova ubeziphumelelisa.
1_40_1_Kwathi emveni kwezi zinto, umngcamli wokumkani waseYiputa,  nomoji wezonka zakhe, bayona inkosi yabo, ukumkani waseYiputa.
1_40_2_UFaro waba noburhalarhume kubo ababusi bakhe bobabini,  umphathi wabangcamli nomphathi waboji bezonka.
1_40_3_Wabanikela elugcinweni, endlwini yomthetheli wabasiki entolongweni, endaweni abekhonkxelwe kuyo uYosefu.
1_40_4_Umthetheli wabasiki wamenza uYosefu umveleli wabo,  wabalungiselela; baba nomzuzu beselugcinweni.
1_40_5_Baphupha iphupha bobabini; elowo waphupha iphupha lakhe ngabusuku bunye, elowo ngokokutyhilwa kwephupha lakhe,  umngcamli nomoji wezonka bokumkani waseYiputa, ababekhonkxiwe entolongweni.
1_40_6_UYosefu wangena kubo kwakusa, wabakhangela, wafika bematshekile.
1_40_7_Wababuza ababusi bakwaFaro, ababenaye elugcinweni endlwini yenkosi yakhe, esithi, Kutheni na ukuba ubuso benu bube bubi namhlanje?
1_40_8_Bathi kuye, Siphuphe iphupha; akukho ulityhilayo. UYosefu wathi kubo, Izityhilo asizezikaThixo na? Khanindixelele iphupha elo.
1_40_9_Umphathi wabangcamli wamxelela uYosefu iphupha lakhe, wathi kuye, Ephupheni lam ndibone umdiliya uphambi kwam;
1_40_10_emdiliyeni apho amasebe emathathu, wangathi wona uphuma amathupha, wadubula iintyantyambo zawo, izihloko zawo zavuthwa zaziidiliya;
1_40_11_indebe kaFaro isesandleni sam; ndizithabathe iidiliya,  ndizifaxange endebeni kaFaro, ndiyinikele indebe esandleni sikaFaro.
1_40_12_UYosefu wathi kuye, Siso esi isityhilo salo: amasebe amathathu lawo yimihla emithathu;
1_40_13_kusele imihla emithathu, aze uFaro ayiphakamise intloko yakho, akubuyisele endaweni yakho, uyinikele indebe kaFaro esandleni sakhe ngokwesiko langaphambili, oko ubungumngcamli wakhe.
1_40_14_Uze undikhumbule ke, wakulungelwa, undenzele inceba,  undikhankanye kuFaro, undikhuphe kule ndlu;
1_40_15_ngokuba inene ndabiwa ezweni lamaHebhere, nalapha andenzanga nto, ukuba bandifake emhadini lo.
1_40_16_Umphathi waboji-zonka wabona ukuba isityhilo eso silungile, wathi kuYosefu, Nam ndiphuphile; ndibone iingobozi ezintathu zezonka ezimhlophe ezisentlokweni yam;
1_40_17_engobozini ephezulu kukho izidlo ngezidlo zonke zikaFaro ezingumsebenzi womoji-zonka, iintaka zisidla kweyona ngobozi iphezulu entlokweni yam.
1_40_18_Waphendula uYosefu wathi, Siso esi isityhilo salo:  iingobozi ezintathu ezo yimihla emithathu;
1_40_19_kusele imihla emithathu, aze uFaro ayiphakamise intloko yakho, isuke kuwe, akuxhome emthini, ziyidle iintaka inyama yakho iphele.
1_40_20_Kwathi ngomhla wasithathu, umhla wokuzalwa kukaFaro,  wabenzela isidlo bonke abakhonzi bakhe, wayiphakamisa intloko yomphathi wabangcamli, nentloko yomphathi waboji bezonka phakathi kwabakhonzi bakhe.
1_40_21_Wambuyisela umphathi wabangcamli kubungcamli bakhe;  wayinikela indebe esandleni sikaFaro.
1_40_22_Ke yena umphathi waboji bezonka wamxhoma, njengoko uYosefu wabatyhilelayo.
1_40_23_Umphathi wabangcamli akamkhumbulanga uYosefu, wamlibala.
1_41_1_Kwathi, ekupheleni kweminyaka emibini ezeleyo, uFaro waphupha emi phezu komlambo;
1_41_2_nanko kunyuka, kuphuma emlanjeni, amathokazi asixhenxe amahle, etyebile, esidla engcotyeni;
1_41_3_nanko kunyuka, kuphuma emlanjeni, amanye amathokazi asixhenxe emva kwawo, emabi, enqinile; ema ecaleni lamanye amathokazi lawo elunxwemeni lomlambo;
1_41_4_asuka amathokazi amabi, anqinileyo, awadla amathokazi asixhenxe amahle, atyebileyo. Waphaphama uFaro.
1_41_5_Walala waphupha okwesibini. Wabona izikhwebu ezisixhenxe ziphuma mcingeni mnye, zityebile, zilungile.
1_41_6_Nanzo izikhwebu ezisixhenxe ezingcakacileyo, ezitshileyo lulophu lwasempumalanga, ziphuma emva kwazo;
1_41_7_zesuka izikhwebu ezingcakacileyo zaziginya izikhwebu zosixhenxe ezityebileyo, ezichumileyo. Wavuka uFaro, O,  liphupha!
1_41_8_Kwathi kusasa, umoya wakhe wangqunga; wathumela, wazibiza zonke izazi zaseYiputa, izilumko zonke zakhona. UFaro wazixelela iphupha lakhe; akwabakho bani kuzo unokuwatyhila kuFaro.
1_41_9_Wathetha umphathi wabangcamli kuFaro, esithi,  Ndiyasikhumbula namhlanje isono sam.
1_41_10_UFaro wayenoburhalarhume kubakhonzi bakhe, wandinikela elugcinweni endlwini yomthetheli wabasiki, mna lo, nomphathi waboji bezonka.
1_41_11_Saphupha iphupha ngabusuku bunye, mna naye; walowo waphupha ngokutyhilwa kwephupha lakhe.
1_41_12_Kwakukho kuthi umfana ongumHebhere isicaka somthetheli wabasiki, sasixelela, sasityhilela amaphupha ethu, samtyhilela elowo ngokwephupha lakhe.
1_41_13_Kwathi, ngokoko sisityhileleyo, kwaba njalo; mna wandibuyisela endaweni yam, omnye lowo wamxhoma.
1_41_14_UFaro wathumela, wambiza uYosefu. Bamgidimisa ukumkhupha emhadini; wazicheba, wanxiba ngubo zimbi, weza kuFaro.
1_41_15_Wathi uFaro kuYosefu, Ndiphuphe iphupha, akukho bani unokulityhila; mna ndive kusithiwa ngawe, uyaliva iphupha ulityhile.
1_41_16_UYosefu wamphendula uFaro, esithi, Akunam; uThixo uya kuphendula into yokumsindisa uFaro.
1_41_17_UFaro wathetha kuYosefu, wathi, Ephupheni lam, yabona,  bendimi elunxwemeni lomlambo;
1_41_18_nanko kunyuka, kuphuma emlanjeni, amathokazi asixhenxe etyebile, emahle, esidla engcotyeni;
1_41_19_nanko, kunyuka kuphuma amanye amathokazi asixhenxe emva kwawo, ebhityile, emabi kakhulu, engamarhoqorhoqo, endingazanga ndibone anjalo kulo lonke ilizwe laseYiputa, ukuba mabi kwawo;
1_41_20_amathokazi angamarhoqorhoqo, amabi, awadla awokuqala amathokazi asixhenxe atyebileyo;
1_41_21_angena embilinini wawo akwazeka ukuba angenile embilinini wawo; imbonakalo yawo yambi, njengasekuqaleni. Ndaphaphama.
1_41_22_Ndabona ephupheni lam, izikhwebu ezisixhenxe ziphuma micingeni mnye, zichumile, zilungile;
1_41_23_nanzo, izikhwebu ezisixhenxe zishwabene, zingcakacile,  zitshile lulophu lwasempumalanga, zihluma emva kwazo.
1_41_24_Zesuka izikhwebu ezingcakacileyo, zaziginya izikhwebu ezisixhenxe ezilungileyo. Ndathetha nezazi; akukho bani kuzo undixelelayo.
1_41_25_UYosefu wathi uFaro, Iphupha likaFaro linye; uThixo umxelele uFaro oko aya kukwenza.
1_41_26_Amathokazi asixhenxe alungileyo yiminyaka esixhenxe;  izikhwebu ezisixhenxe ezilungileyo yiminyaka esixhenxe; iphupha eli linye.
1_41_27_Amathokazi asixhenxe angamarhoqorhoqo, amabi, anyukileyo aphuma emva kwalawo, yiminyaka esixhenxe; nezikhwebu ezisixhenxe ezinqinileyo, ezitshileyo lulophu lwasempumalanga,  ziya kuba yiminyaka esixhenxe yendlala.
1_41_28_Lelo lizwi ndilithethileyo kuFaro lokuthi: oko aya kukwenza uThixo ukubonisile kuFaro.
1_41_29_Yabona, kuza iminyaka esixhenxe yendyebo enkulu ezweni lonke laseYiputa;
1_41_30_ze kuvele iminyaka esixhenxe yendlala emva kwaleyo,  ilityalwe yonke indyebo ezweni laseYiputa, indlala iligqibe ilizwe;
1_41_31_ingaziwa indyebo elizweni, ngenxa yaloo iya kubakho emva kwayo, kuba iya kuba nzima kunene.
1_41_32_Ukuphindwa kabini kwephupha elo kuFaro kukuqiniswa kwayo le ndawo nguThixo; uya kukhawuleza uThixo ukuyenza.
1_41_33_Ngoko uFaro makakhangele indoda eyingqondi, esisilumko,  ayimise phezu kwelizwe laseYiputa.
1_41_34_Makenze le nto uFaro, alimisele abaveleli ilizwe,  athabathe isihlanu selizwe laseYiputa ngeminyaka yosixhenxe yendyebo.
1_41_35_Mababuthe konke ukudla kwaloo minyaka ilungileyo izayo,  bafumbe ingqolowa phantsi kwesandla sikaFaro, ibe kukudla emizini, bayigcine;
1_41_36_oko kudla kube yinto ebekelwe ilizwe iminyaka yosixhenxe yendlala, eya kubakho ezweni laseYiputa, lingatshabalali ilizwe yindlala.
1_41_37_Lalunga elo zwi emehlweni kaFaro nasemehlweni abo bonke abakhonzi bakhe.
1_41_38_UFaro wathi kubakhonzi bakhe, Sinokumfumana na umntu onje,  onoMoya kaThixo?
1_41_39_UFaro wathi kuYosefu, Ekubeni uThixo ekwazisile konke oku,  akukho bani uyingqondi, usisilumko, njengawe.
1_41_40_Uya kuba phezu kwendlu yam wena, bawuthobele umlomo wakho bonke abantu bam; kusetroneni yodwa endiya kuba mkhulu kuwe.
1_41_41_UFaro wathi kuYosefu, Khangela, ndikumise phezu kwalo lonke ilizwe laseYiputa.
1_41_42_Wawukhulula uFaro umsesane wakhe esandleni sakhe, wawufaka esandleni sikaYosefu, wamambathisa iingubo zelinen ecikizekileyo, wanxiba umxokelelwane wegolide entanyeni yakhe.
1_41_43_Wamkhwelisa enqwelweni yesibini abenayo, kwamenyezwa phambi kwakhe, kwathiwa, Guqani! Wammisa phezu kwalo lonke ilizwe laseYiputa.
1_41_44_Wathi uFaro kuYosefu, NdinguFaro; ngaphandle kwakho,  akukho bani uya kuphakamisa sandla sakhe, nalunyawo lwakhe,  ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
1_41_45_UFaro wamthiya uYosefu igama lokuba nguTsafenati-paneha,  wamnika uAzenati, intombi kaPotifera, umbingeleli waseOn, ukuba abe ngumkakhe. Waphuma uYosefu, walihamba ilizwe laseYiputa.
1_41_46_UYosefu wayeminyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, ukuma kwakhe phambi koFaro, ukumkani waseYiputa; waphuma uYosefu ebusweni bukaFaro, walicanda lonke ilizwe laseYiputa.
1_41_47_Umhlaba wavelisa ngendiphane ngeminyaka esixhenxe yendyebo.
1_41_48_Wakubutha konke ukudla kweminyaka esixhenxe ebikho ezweni laseYiputa, wakubeka ukudla kuyo imizi; ukudla kwamasimi abewungqongile umzi, wakubeka phakathi kwawo.
1_41_49_UYosefu wayifumba ingqolowa yanjengentlabathi yolwandle,  yaninzi kunene, wada wayeka ukubala, kuba ibingenakubalwa.
1_41_50_UYosefu wazala oonyana bababini, wabazalelwa nguAzenati,  intombi kaPotifera, umbingeleli waseOn, ingekafiki iminyaka yendlala.
1_41_51_UYosefu wamthiya owamazibulo igama elinguManase; ngokuba wathi, UThixo undenze ndakulibala konke ukwaphuka kwam, nayo yonke indlu kabawo.
1_41_52_Owesibini wamthiya igama elinguEfrayim; ngokuba wathi,  UThixo undiqhamisile ezweni leentsizi zam.
1_41_53_Yaphela ke iminyaka yosixhenxe yendyebo ebisezweni laseYiputa.
1_41_54_Yaqala ukufika iminyaka yosixhenxe yendlala, njengoko wayekuthethile uYosefu. Yabakho indlala kumazwe onke; ke ezweni lonke laseYiputa kwakukho isonka.
1_41_55_Lonke ilizwe laseYiputa laba nendlala; abantu bakhalela isonka kuFaro; wathi uFaro kuwo onke amaYiputa, Yiyani kuYosefu; athe wakuthetha kuni nize nikwenze.
1_41_56_Indlala yaba sezweni lonke; uYosefu wazivula zonke izindlu ezinokudla, wathengisa ngengqolowa kumaYiputa; kuba indlala yaba namandla ezweni laseYiputa.
1_41_57_Lesuka ilizwe liphela, leza kuthenga ingqolowa kuYosefu eYiputa, kuba indlala ibinamandla kulo lonke.
1_42_1_Wabona uYakobi ukuba kukho ingqolowa eYiputa, wathi uYakobi koonyana bakhe, Yini na ukuba nikhangelane?
1_42_2_Wathi, Yabonani, ndivile ukuba kukho ingqolowa eYiputa;  yihlani niye khona, nisithengele ingqolowa, siphile, singafi.
1_42_3_Behla abakhuluwa bakaYosefu abalishumi, beya kuthenga ingqolowa eYiputa.
1_42_4_Kodwa uBhenjamin, umninawa kaYosefu, uYakobi akamthumanga nabakhuluwa bakhe; kuba wathi, hleze ahlelwe yingozi.
1_42_5_Oonyana bakaSirayeli beza kuthenga ingqolowa phakathi kwabo bezayo; kuba indlala ibikho ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_42_6_UYosefu wayengumlawuli welizwe elo; yena wayethengisa ngengqolowa kubo bonke abantu belizwe elo; bafika ke abakhuluwa bakaYosefu, baqubuda kuye ngobuso emhlabeni.
1_42_7_UYosefu wababona abakhuluwa bakhe, wabazi, wazenza ongabaziyo, wathetha nabo kalukhuni, wathi kubo, Nivela phi na?  Bathi, Sivela ezweni lakwaKanan, size kuthenga ukudla.
1_42_8_UYosefu wabazi abakhuluwa bakhe; ke bona abamnakananga.
1_42_9_Wawakhumbula uYosefu amaphupha abewaphuphile ngabo, wathi kubo, Niziintlola nina; nize kubona ubuze belizwe eli.
1_42_10_Bathi kuye, Hayi, nkosi; abakhonzi bakho baze kuthenga ukudla.
1_42_11_Sonke siphela singoonyana bamfo mnye; siyalungisa,  abakhonzi bakho abazizo iintlola.
1_42_12_Wathi kubo, Hayi, nize kubona ubuze belizwe eli.
1_42_13_Bathi, Abakhonzi bakho balishumi elinababini; siyazalana,  singoonyana bamfo mnye ezweni lakwaKanan. UYabona, omncinane ukubawo namhla, omnye akakho.
1_42_14_Wathi uYosefu kubo, Yile nto bendiyithetha kuni, ndisithi,  Niziintlola.
1_42_15_Niya kucikidwa ngale ndawo: ehleli nje uFaro, anisayi kuphuma apha, ukuba akathanga eze apha umninawa wenu omncinane.
1_42_16_Thumani omnye kuni apha, aphuthume umninawa wenu,  nikhonkxwe nina; acikidwe amazwi enu ukuba ninenyaniso na;  ukuba akubanga njalo, ehleli nje uFaro, inene noba niziintlola.
1_42_17_Wabanikela bonke elugcinweni imihla yamithathu.
1_42_18_UYosefu wathi kubo ngomhla wesithathu, Yenzani oku,  niphile; kuba ndiyamoyika uThixo.
1_42_19_Ukuba ninyanisile, omnye umzalwana kuni apha makakhonkxwe endlwini yokugcinwa kwenu, nihambe nina, niyise ingqolowa ngenxa yendlala yezindlu zenu.
1_42_20_Umninawa wenu omncinane nimzise kum; okholeka ke amazwi enu, ningafi.
1_42_21_Benjenjalo ke. Bathetha omnye komnye besithi, Inyaniso,  sinetyala ngenxa yomninawa wethu, sabe sikubona nje ukubandezeleka komphefumlo wakhe, oko abetarhuzisa kuthi,  asamphulaphula; kungenxa yoko le nto kusifikeleyo oku kubandezeleka.
1_42_22_Wabaphendulu uRubhen esithi, Ndabe ndingatsho na kuni ukuthi, Musani ukumona umfana? Anaphulaphula; yabonani ke,  igazi lakhe liyabizwa.
1_42_23_Babengazi bona ukuba uYosefu uyeva, kuba kwakumi umkhumshi phakathi kwabo.
1_42_24_Wathi guququ, walila; wabuya weza kubo, wathetha nabo,  wamthabatha uSimon kubo, wamkhonkxa bekhangele.
1_42_25_Wawisa umthetho uYosefu wokuba zizaliswe iingxowa zabo ngengqolowa, imali yabo ibuyiselwe kulowo nalowo engxoweni yakhe, banikwe nomphako wendlela; kwenjiwa njalo ke kubo.
1_42_26_Bawabopha ingqolowa amaesile abo, bemka ke apho.
1_42_27_Uthe ke omnye akuyivula ingxowa yakhe, ukuba aphe iesile lakhe iindiza apho balalisa khona, wayibona imali yakhe,  esemlonyeni wengxowa yakhe.
1_42_28_Wathi kubazalwana bakhe, Ibuyisiwe imali yam; nantsi ikho nokubakho engxoweni yam. Baphela amandla, bakhangelana begubha,  bathi, Yintoni na le ayenzileyo uThixo kuthi?
1_42_29_Bafika kuYakobi uyise ezweni lakwaKanan, bamxelela yonke into ebahleleyo, besithi,
1_42_30_Indoda, inkosi yelo zwe, yathetha nathi kalukhuni, yathi siziintlola zelo zwe.
1_42_31_Sathi kuyo, Sinyanisile;
1_42_32_asizizo iintlola, singabazalwana abalishumi elinababini,  oonyana bakabawo; omnye akakho, omncinane ukubawo namhla,  ezweni lakwaKanan.
1_42_33_Indoda leyo, inkosi yelo zwe, yathi kuthi, Ndiya kwazi ngale ndawo ukuba ninyanisile: shiyani abe mnye umzalwana wenu kum apha, niphathele izindlu zenu ukudla ngenxa yendlala,  nihambe;
1_42_34_nimzise umninawa wenu omncinane kum, ndize ndazi ukuba ninyanisile, anizizo iintlola; ndimnikele kuni umzalwana wenu,  nirhwebe ezweni apha.
1_42_35_Kwathi, bakukhuphela iingxowa zabo, babona isiqhuma semali salowo nalowo engxoweni yakhe; bakuzibona iziqhuma zabo zemali boyika, bona noyise.
1_42_36_Wathi kubo uYakobi uyise, Nindihluthe abantwana; uYosefu akakho, uSimon akakho, niza kuthabatha noBhenjamin; zikhwele kum zonke ezo zinto.
1_42_37_Wathi uRubhen kuyise, Babulale bobabini oonyana bam, ukuba andithanga ndimzise kuwe; mnikele esandleni sam, ndombuyisela kuwe mna.
1_42_38_Wathi yena, Unyana wam akasayi kuhla nani; ngokuba ufile umkhuluwa wakhe, yena usele yedwa. Ukuba uthe wahlelwa yingozi endleleni eniyihambayo, izimvi zam nozithobela kwelabafileyo ndinesingqala.
1_43_1_Indlala yayinzima kwelo zwe.
1_43_2_Kwathi, bakuba begqibile ukuyidla ingqolowa ababeze nayo bevela eYiputa, wathi uyise kubo, Buyani niye kusithengela intwana yokudla.
1_43_3_Wathi uYuda kuye, Indoda leyo yaqononondisa kuthi, yathi,  Aniyi kububona ubuso bam, engabangakho nani umninawa wenu.
1_43_4_Ukuba uthe wamthuma umninawa wethu nathi, sohla siye kukuthengela ukudla.
1_43_5_Ukuba akuthanga umthume, asiyi kuhla; kuba indoda leyo yathi kuthi, Aniyi kububona ubuso bam, engabangakho nani umninawa wenu.
1_43_6_USirayeli wathi, Yini na ukuba nindenzele ububi, niyixelele indoda leyo ukuthi, nisenomninawa?
1_43_7_Bathi, Indoda leyo yabuza kunene ngathi nangemizalwana yethu, isithi, Usaphilile na uyihlo? Nisenomninawa na?  Sayixelela ngokwaloo mazwi. Besisazi yini na ukuba ibiya kuthi,  Yihlani nomninawa wenu?
1_43_8_UYuda wathi kuSirayeli uyise, Mthume nam umfana, sisuke sihambe, siphile, singafi thina, nawe, nabantwana bethu.
