1_43_9_Mna ndiya kummela, wombiza esandleni sam; ukuba andithanga ndimzise kuwe, ndimbeke phambi kwakho, mandibe netyala kuwe yonke imihla yam.
1_43_10_Kuba, ukuba besingazilazilanga, inene ngesiba ngoku sesibuye okwesibini.
1_43_11_USirayeli uyise wathi kubo, Ukuba kunjalo okunene, yenzani ke oku: thabathani kwezinconywayo izinto zelizwe eli, nizifake ezingxoweni zenu, nihle niyisele indoda leyo umnikelo: intwana yamafutha aqholiweyo, nentwana yencindi yobusi, nentlaka emhlophe, nentlaka emnandi, neenkozo zepistasi, neeamangile.
1_43_12_Phathani enye imali esandleni senu; naloo mali yabuyiswayo emlonyeni weengxowa zenu, buyani nayo esandleni senu; mhlawumbi sisiphosiso.
1_43_13_Nomninawa wenu mthabatheni, ninduluke, nibuyele kwindoda leyo.
1_43_14_Ngamana uThixo uSomandla waniphatha ngemfesane phambi kwendoda leyo, ukuba inikhululele omnye umzalwana wenu lowo noBhenjamin. Mna, ukuba ndihluthiwe abantwana, ndihluthiwe.
1_43_15_Amadoda lawo awuthabatha loo mnikelo, neemali zombini aziphatha esandleni sawo, noBhenjamin, asuka ehla aya eYiputa,  ema phambi koYosefu.
1_43_16_UYosefu wambona uBhenjamin enabo, wathi kumphathi wendlu yakhe, Wangenise loo madoda endlwini, uxhele, ulungise; kuba la madoda aya kudla nam emini enkulu.
1_43_17_Indoda leyo yenza njengoko watshoyo uYosefu; indoda yawangenisa amadoda endlwini kaYosefu.
1_43_18_Amadoda oyika, ngokuba engeniswe endlwini kaYosefu, athi,  Kungenxa yemali eyayibuyiselwe ezingxoweni zethu ekuqaleni, le nto singeniswe apha; ukuze agaleleke phezu kwethu, asiwele,  asithabathe sibe ngamakhoboka, kwanamaesile ethu.
1_43_19_Asondela kuloo ndoda iphethe indlu kaYosefu, athetha nayo emnyango wendlu, athi, Tarhu, nkosi!
1_43_20_Sehla okunene ekuqaleni, sisiza kuthenga ukudla.
1_43_21_Kwathi, sakufika endaweni yokulalisa, sazivula iingxowa zethu, kwavela imali yalowo nalowo emlonyeni wengxowa yakhe,  imali yethu ngomlinganiso wayo. Sibuye nayo ke siyiphethe.
1_43_22_Nenye imali sihle seza nayo esandleni sethu, ukuba sithenge ukudla; asimazi oyifakileyo imali ezingxoweni zethu.
1_43_23_Yathi, Xolani, musani ukoyika; uThixo wenu, uThixo kayihlo, uninikile ubutyebi ezingxoweni zenu; imali yenu ndayamkela. Yabakhuphela uSimon.
1_43_24_Indoda leyo yawangenisa amadoda endlwini kaYosefu,  yawanika amanzi, ahlamba iinyawo zawo; yawapha iindiza amaesile awo.
1_43_25_Umnikelo lowo awulungisela ukufika kukaYosefu emini enkulu; kuba ebeve kusithiwa aya kudla isonka khona.
1_43_26_Wangena uYosefu endlwini; amzisela endlwini umnikelo obusesandleni sawo, aqubuda kuye emhlabeni.
1_43_27_Wawabuza ukuphila kwawo, wathi, Uyihlo usaphilile na,  ixhego enanithethe ngalo? Usadla ubomi na?
1_43_28_Athi, Usaphilile ubawo umkhonzi wakho, usadla ubomi.  Bathoba baqubuda.
1_43_29_Wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wambona uBhenjamin umninawa wakhe, umntwana kanina, wathi, Nguye na lo umninawa wenu omncinane, enibe nithetha ngaye kum? Wathi, Ngamana uThixo wakubabala, nyana wam.
1_43_30_Wakhawuleza uYosefu; kuba wasikwa yimfesane ngenxa yomninawa wakhe, wafuna indawo angalilela kuyo, wangena engontsini, walila khona.
1_43_31_Waza wahlamba ubuso bakhe, waphuma ezibambile, wathi,  Bekani isonka.
1_43_32_Bambekela yedwa, bababekela bodwa bona, bawabekela odwa amaYiputa abesidla naye; kuba amaYiputa akanakudla sonka namaHebhere; kuba lisikizi elo kumaYiputa.
1_43_33_Bhalala phantsi phambi kwakhe, owamazibulo ngokobuzibulo bakhe, omncinane ngokobuncinane bakhe. Amadoda akhangelana ethe manga.
1_43_34_Aselwa izabelo ezisuka phambi kwakhe; ke isabelo sikaBhenjamin saba sikhulu kahlanu kwizabelo zabo bonke bephela. Basela, baba mnandi benaye.
1_44_1_Wamwisela umthetho umphathi wendlu, esithi, Zizalise iingxowa zala madoda ngokudla, njengoko zinako ukukhongozela,  uyibeke imali yalowo nalowo emlonyeni wengxowa yakhe;
1_44_2_uyibeke indebe yam, indebe yesilivere, emlonyeni wengxowa yomncinane, nemali yengqolowa yakhe. Wenza ke ngokwelizwi likaYosefu abelithethile.
1_44_3_Kwakuthi qhiphu ukusa, andululwa loo madoda, wona namaesile awo.
1_44_4_Akubona ukuba aphumile emzini, engekayi kude, wathi uYosefu kumphathi wendlu yakhe, Suka, uwasukele laa madoda;  wakuwafumana uze uthi kuwo, Yini na ukuba niphindezele okulungileyo ngokubi?
1_44_5_Le nto asiyile na inkosi yam isela ngayo, ihlabe nezihlabo ngayo? Yinto embi le nto niyenzileyo.
1_44_6_Wawafumana, wathetha kuwo loo mazwi.
1_44_7_Athi kuye, Yini na ukuba inkosi yam ithethe ngokwaloo mazwi? Makube lee kubakhonzi bakho ukwenza ngokwelo lizwi.
1_44_8_Uyabona, imali esayifumanayo emlonyeni weengxowa zethu,  sayibuyisela kuwe, sivela ezweni lakwaKanan. Singathini na ke ukuba endlwini yenkosi yakho isilivere nokuba yigolide?
1_44_9_Osukuba ifunyenwe kuye phakathi kwabakhonzi bakhe, makafe;  kananjalo thina sibe ngamakhoboka enkosini yam.
1_44_10_Wathi, Makube njengokwamazwi enu; ke ngoko osukuba ifunyenwe kuye, woba sisicaka sam, ke nina noba msulwa.
1_44_11_Bakhawuleza, bathula elowo ingxowa yakhe, bayibeka emhlabeni, bavula elowo ingxowa yakhe.
1_44_12_Wagquthagqutha, eqalela komkhulu, egqibela komncinane;  yafunyanwa indebe engxoweni kaBhenjamin.
1_44_13_Bazikrazula iingubo zabo, babopha elowo iesile lakhe,  babuyela kuloo mzi.
1_44_14_Wafika uYuda nabazalwana bakhe endlwini kaYosefu;  ubesekhona yena. Bawa phambi kwakhe emhlabeni.
1_44_15_UYosefu wathi kubo, Sisenzo sini na esi nisenzileyo?  Beningazi na ukuba indoda enjengam nje ibingahlaba izihlabo?
1_44_16_UYuda wathi, Siya kuthini na enkosini yam? Siya kuthetha ntoni na? Siya kuzihlamba njani na? UThixo ubufumene ubugwenxa babakhonzi bakho; yabona, singabakhonzi benkosi yam, thina aba,  nalowa indebe ifunyenwe esandleni sakhe.
1_44_17_Wathi, Makube lee kum ukwenza loo nto; indoda efunyenwe esandleni sayo indebe, yiyo eya kuba sisicaka kum; ke nina nyukani nixolile, niye kuyihlo.
1_44_18_UYuda wasondela kuye, wathi, Tarhu, nkosi yam! Makhe athethe ilizwi umkhonzi wakho ezindlebeni zinkosi yam;  mawungavuthi umsindo wakho ngakumkhonzi wakho, ngokuba ungangoFaro wena.
1_44_19_Yababuza inkosi yam abakhonzi bayo, isithi, Ninoyihlo na?  Ninomninawa na?
1_44_20_Sathi thina enkosini yam, Sinobawo ixhego, nomntwana wobuxhego bakhe omncinane; umkhuluwa wakhe wafa, yena usele yedwa kunina, uyise uyamthanda.
1_44_21_Wathi ke wena kubakhonzi bakho, Yihlani naye eze kum,  ndiwamise amehlo am kuye.
1_44_22_Sathi thina kwinkosi yam, Umfana lowo akanako ukumshiya uyise; emshiyile, uyise angafa.
1_44_23_Wathi wena kubakhonzi bakho, Ukuba umninawa wenu omncinane akathanga ehle nani, aniyi kubuya nibubone ubuso bam.
1_44_24_Kwathi, xenikweni senyukayo saya kumkhonzi wakho ongubawo,  samxelela amazwi enkosi yam.
1_44_25_Wathi ubawo, Buyani niye kusithengela intwana yokudla.
1_44_26_Sathi, Asinakuhla. Ukuba umninawa wethu omncinane unathi,  sohla; kuba asinakububona ubuso bendoda leyo, engenathi umninawa wethu omncinane.
1_44_27_Wathi ubawo umkhonzi wakho kuthi, Niyazi nina, ukuba umkam wandizalela oonyana ababini.
1_44_28_Omnye waphuma kum, ndathi, Inene, uqwengiwe; andimbonanga unangoku.
1_44_29_Nimthabatha nje nalo ebusweni bam, ethe wahlelwa yingozi,  nozihlisela izimvi zam zinobubi kwelabafileyo.
1_44_30_Ngoko ke, ukuba ndithe ndafike kubawo umkhonzi wakho,  engenathi umfana (umphefumlo wakhe ubotshwe nomphefumlo wakhe nje),
1_44_31_kothi, akubona ukuba akakho umfana, afe, nabakhonzi bakho bahlise izimvi zomkhonzi wakho ubawo enesingqala, ziye kwelabafileyo.
1_44_32_Kuba umkhonzi wakho lo wammela umfana lowo kubawo,  ndisithi, Ukuba andithanga ndimzise kuwe, ndoba netyala kubawo yonke imihla yam.
1_44_33_Ngoko makahlale umkhonzi wakho lo esikhundleni somfana,  ndibe likhoboka enkosini yam mna; umfana anyuke nabakhuluwa bakhe.
1_44_34_Kuba ndingathini na ukunyuka ndiye kubawo, engenam umfana?  hleze ndibubone ububi obomfumana ubawo.
1_45_1_UYosefu akabanga nakuzibamba phambi kwabo bonke ababemi ngakuye. Wadanduluka wathi, Khuphani bonke abantu, bemke kum.  Akwabakho mntu umi ngakuye ekuzaziseni kukaYosefu kubazalwana bakhe.
1_45_2_Wasibeka isililo; eva amaYiputa, yeva nendlu kaFaro.
1_45_3_Wathi uYosefu kubazalwana bakhe, NdinguYosefu; usaphilile na ubawo? Ababa nako ukumphendula abazalwana bakhe; kuba bakhwankqiswa phambi kwakhe.
1_45_4_Wathi, uYosefu kubazalwana bakhe, Khanisondele kum apha.  Basondela. Wathi, NdinguYosefu, umzalwana wenu, enathengisayo ngaye eYiputa.
1_45_5_Ngoko musani ukuba buhlungu, ningaziqumbeli, ukuba nathengisa ngam apha; kuba uThixo wandithuma phambi kwenu ukuze ndisindise abantu.
1_45_6_Kuba ngoku iminyaka mibini indlala ikho phakathi kwelizwe;  isemihlanu iminyaka ezayo, ekungayi kubakho kulima nakuvuna ngayo.
1_45_7_UThixo undithume phambi kwenu, ukuba ndinimisele amasalela ezweni, ukuba ndisindise ubomi benu, ibe kukusinda okukhulu.
1_45_8_Ngoko ke asinini abandithume apha, nguThixo; wandenza uyise kuFaro, nenkosi phezu kwayo yonke indlu yakhe, nomlawuli ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
1_45_9_Khawulezani, ninyuke niye kubawo, nithi kuye, Utsho unyana wakho uYosefu ukuthi, UThixo undenze inkosi kuyo yonke iYiputa;  yihla uze kum, musa ukulibala.
1_45_10_Wohlala ezweni laseGoshen, ube kufuphi kum, wena, noonyana bakho, noonyana boonyana bakho, nempahla yakho emfutshane,  neenkomo zakho, nezinto zonke onazo;
1_45_11_ndikondle khona, kuba isaya kuba mihlanu iminyaka yendlala; hleze uhlwempuzeke wena, nendlu yakho, nento yonke onayo.
1_45_12_Yabonani, amehlo enu ayabona, namehlo omninawa wam uBhenjamin, ukuba ngumlomo wam lo uthethayo kuni.
1_45_13_Nize nimxelele ubawo lonke uzuko lwam eYiputa, nezinto zonke enizibonileyo, nikhawuleze nihle nobawo, eze apha.
1_45_14_Wawa entanyeni kaBhenjamin, umninawa wakhe, walila;  uBhenjamin walila entanyeni yakhe.
1_45_15_Wabanga bonke abazalwana bakhe, walila phezu kwabo. Emveni koko, abazalwana bakhe bathetha naye.
1_45_16_Lavakala izwi endlwini kaFaro, lisithi, Bafikele abazalwana bakaYosefu. Kwalunga oko emehlweni kaFaro,  nasemehlweni abakhonzi bakhe.
1_45_17_Wathi uFaro kuYosefu, Yithi kubazalwana bakho, Yenzani oku: bophani amaqegu enu, nihambe niye ezweni lakwaKanan,
1_45_18_nithabathe uyihlo nezindlu zenu, nise kum apha. Ndoninika izinto ezilungileyo zelizwe laseYiputa, nidle ukutyeba kwelizwe.
1_45_19_Wena ke uwiselwe umthetho, yenzani oku; bathabatheleni abantwana benu, nabafazi benu, iinqwelo ezweni laseYiputa,  nithwale uyihlo, nize.
1_45_20_Iliso lenu malingabi nanceba empahleni yenu, kuba zonke izinto ezilungileyo zelizwe lonke laseYiputa zezenu.
1_45_21_Benjenjalo ke oonyana bakaSirayeli. UYosefu wabanika iinqwelo ngokomthetho kaFaro; wabanika nomphako wendlela.
1_45_22_Wabanika bonke elowo iingubo zokukhululana. Wamnika uBhenjamin iisilivere ezimakhulu mathathu, neengubo ezintlanu zokukhululana.
1_45_23_Kuyise wathumela ezilolu hlobo: amaesile alishumi, ethwele izinto ezilungileyo zaseYiputa, neemazi zamaesile ezilishumi,  zithwele ingqolowa, nesonka, nomphako kayise wendlela.
1_45_24_Wabandulula ke abazalwana bakhe, bahamba; wathi kubo, Ize ningaxabani endleleni.
1_45_25_Benyuka, bemke ke eYiputa, bafika ezweni lakwaKanan kuYakobi uyise.
1_45_26_Bamxelela besithi, UYosefu usahleli; ewe, ungumphathi welizwe lonke laseYiputa. Yaqoba intliziyo yakhe, kuba ebengakholwa ngabo.
1_45_27_Bawathetha kuye onke amazwi kaYosefu, abewathethile kubo.  Wazibona iinqwelo abezithumele uYosefu, ukuba zimthwale; waza waphila umoya kaYakobi uyise.
1_45_28_Wathi uSirayeli, Kwanele. UYosefu unyana wam usahleli.  Ndiya kuya ndimbone, ndingekafi.
1_46_1_Wanduluka ke uSirayeli neento zonke abenazo, wafika eBher-shebha, wabingelela imibingelelo kuThixo kayise uIsake.
1_46_2_Wathetha uThixo kuSirayeli emibonweni yobusuku, wathi,  Yakobi, Yakobi! Wathi yena, Ndilapha.
1_46_3_Wathi, NdinguThixo, uThixo wooyihlo, musa ukoyika ukuhla uye eYiputa; kuba ndiya kukwenza uhlanga olukhulu khona.
1_46_4_Mna ndiya kuhla ndiye nawe eYiputa, ndinyuke nokunyuka nawe; uYosefu asibeke isandla sakhe phezu kwamehlo akho.
1_46_5_Wesuka uYakobi eBher-shebha; oonyana bakaSirayeli bamthwala uYakobi uyise, nabantwana babo, nabafazi babo, ngeenqwelo ebezithunyelwe nguFaro ukuba zimthwale.
1_46_6_Bayithabatha imfuyo yabo, nengqwebo yabo ababeyiqwebile ezweni lakwaKanan, bafika eYiputa uYakobi nembewu yakhe yonke,  ndawonye naye;
1_46_7_oonyana bakhe, noonyana boonyana bakhe ndawonye naye,  iintombi zakhe, neentombi zoonyana bakhe, nembewu yakhe yonke,  weza nayo eYiputa.
1_46_8_Ngawo la amagama oonyana bakaSirayeli abafikayo eYiputa,  uYakobi noonyana bakhe: amazibulo kaYakobi nguRubhen.
1_46_9_Oonyana bakaRubhen nguHanoki, noFalu, noHetseron, noKarmi.
1_46_10_Oonyana bakaSimon, nguYemuweli, noYamin, no-Ohadi,  noYakin, noTsohare, noSawule, unyana womKananekazi.
1_46_11_Oonyana bakaLevi nguGershon, noKehati, noMerari.
1_46_12_Oonyana bakaYuda nguEre, no-Onan, noShela, noPeretse,  noZera; ke ooEre no-Onan bafela ezweni lakwaKanan. Oonyana bakaPeretse nguHetseron noHamuli.
1_46_13_Oonyana bakaIsakare nguTola, noPuwa, noYobhi, noShimron.
1_46_14_Oonyana bakaZebhulon nguZerede, noEloni, noYaleli.
1_46_15_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaLeya, awabazalela uYakobi ePadan-aram, noDina intombi yakhe; yonke imiphefumlo yoonyana bakhe neyeentombi zakhe ingamashumi omathathu anamithathu.
1_46_16_Oonyana bakaGadi nguTsifiyon, noHagi, noShuni, noEtsebhon,  noEri, noArodi, noAreli.
1_46_17_Oonyana baka-Ashere nguImna, noIshwa, noIshvi, noBheriya,  noSera udade wabo; oonyana bakaBheriya nguEbhere noMalekiyeli.
1_46_18_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaZilipa, awathi uLabhan wamnika uLeya intombi yakhe; abo wabazalela uYakobi, imiphefumlo elishumi elinamithandathu.
1_46_19_Oonyana bakaRakeli, umkaYakobi, nguYosefu noBhenjamin.
1_46_20_Wazala ke uYosefu ezweni laseYiputa, uManase, noEfrayim,  awamzalela bona uAzenati, intombi kaPotifera, umbingeleli waseOn.
1_46_21_Oonyana bakaBhenjamin nguBhela, noBhekere, noAshbhele,  noGera, noNahaman, noEhi, noRoshe, noMupim, noHupim, noArdi.
1_46_22_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaRakeli, abazalelwa uYakobi; iyonke yimiphefumlo elishumi elinamine.
1_46_23_Oonyana bakaDan nguHushim.
1_46_24_Oonyana bakaNafetali nguYatseli, noGuni, noYetsere,  noShilem.
1_46_25_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaBhiliha, awathi uLabhan wamnika uRakeli intombi yakhe; abo wabazalela uYakobi, iyonke yimiphefumlo esixhenxe.
1_46_26_Iyonke imiphefumlo eyaya noYakobi eYiputa, eyaphuma esinqeni sakhe, ngaphandle kwabafazi boonyana bakaYakobi,  iyonke yimiphefumlo emashumi mathandathu anamithandathu.
1_46_27_Oonyana bakaYosefu awabazalelwa eYiputa yimiphefumlo emibini. Iyonke imiphefumlo yendlu kaYakobi eyaya eYiputa ibimashumi asixhenxe.
1_46_28_Wasusa uYuda ukuba amandulele aye kuYosefu, ambonise indlela eya eGoshen; bafika ke ezweni laseGoshen.
1_46_29_UYosefu wayibopha inqwelo yakhe, wenyuka waya kumkhawulela uSirayeli uyise eGoshen. Bathe bakubonana, wawa entanyeni yakhe, walila umzuzu omkhulu entanyeni yakhe.
1_46_30_Wathi uSirayeli kuYosefu, Ndibubonile nje ubuso bakho,  ukuba usahleli, mandife ngoku.
1_46_31_Wathi uYosefu kubazalwana bakhe nakwindlu kayise, Ndiya kunyuka ndiye kubika kuFaro, ndithi kuye, Abazalwana bam nendlu kabawo, ababesezweni lakwaKanan, bafikile;
1_46_32_kunjalo nje la madoda ngabalusi bempahla emfutshane, kuba ngabafuyi; impahla yawo emfutshane, neenkomo zawo, neento zonke ananzo, aze nazo.
1_46_33_Xa athe wanibiza uFaro, wathi, Uyintoni na umsebenzi wenu?  nothi,
1_46_34_Abakhonzi bakho ngabafuyi bempahla kwasebuncinaneni bethu unangoku, thina aba noobawo bethu; ukuze nime ezweni laseGoshen, kuba bonke abalusi bempahla emfutshane balisikizi kumaYiputa.
1_47_1_UYosefu waya kumbikela uFaro, wathi, Ufikile ubawo nabazalwana bam, nempahla yabo emfutshane, neenkomo zabo,  neento zonke abanazo, bevela ezweni lakwaKanan; nabo besezweni laseGoshen.
1_47_2_Wakhetha kubo abazalwana bakhe amadoda amahlanu, wawamisa phambi koFaro.
1_47_3_Wathi uFaro kubazalwana bakhe, Uyintoni na umsebenzi wenu?  Bathi kuFaro, Abakhonzi bakho ngabafuyi bempahla emfutshane,  thina aba kwanoobawo bethu.
1_47_4_Babuya bathi kuFaro, Siphambukele kweli lizwe, kuba akukho tyani bampahla imfutshane abanayo abakhonzi bakho, kuba inzima indlala ezweni lakwaKanan; ngoko ke mabakhe bahlale ezweni laseGoshen abakhonzi bakho.
1_47_5_Wathetha uFaro kuYosefu, wathi, Uyihlo nabazalwana bakho bafikile kuwe.
1_47_6_Ilizwe laseYiputa liphambi kwakho: uyihlo nabazalwana bakho bahlalise kweyona ndawo intle yelizwe; mabahlale ezweni laseGoshen. Ukuba uyazi ukuba kukho kuwo amadoda aziinkunkqele emsebenzini, wamise abe ngabaphathi bemfuyo endinayo.
1_47_7_UYosefu wamngenisa uYakobi uyise, wammisa phambi koFaro.  UYakobi wamsikelela uFaro.
1_47_8_UFaro wathi kuYakobi, Mingaphi na iminyaka yobudala bakho?
1_47_9_Wathi uYakobi kuFaro, Imihla yeminyaka yokuba lundwendwe kwam emhlabeni yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu; imbalwa,  imibi, imihla yeminyaka yobudala bam; ayifikanga emihleni yeminyaka yobudala boobawo, emihleni yokuba lundwendwe kwabo emhlabeni.
1_47_10_UYakobi wamsikela ke uFaro; waphuma, wemka ebusweni bukaFaro.
1_47_11_UYosefu wambeka uyise nabazalwana bakhe ezweni laseYiputa,  wabanika indawo yokuma kweyona ndawo intle yelizwe, ezweni laseRameses, ngokomthetho kaFaro.
1_47_12_UYosefu wamondla uyise, nabazalwana bakhe, nendlu yonke kayise, ngesonka, ngangokuswela kosapho lwabo.
1_47_13_Bekungekho kudla kulo lonke ilizwe; kuba ibinzima kunene indlala; ilizwe laseYiputa nelizwe lakwaKanan laphelelwa ngamandla ngenxa yendlala.
1_47_14_Wayihlanganisa uYosefu yonke imali eyafunyanwayo ezweni laseYiputa nasezweni lakwaKanan, yengqolowa ababeyithenga;  wayingenisa uYosefu imali endlwini kaFaro.
1_47_15_Yaphela imali ezweni laseYiputa nasezweni lakwaKanan. Onke amaYiputa eza kuYosefu, esithi, Sinike ukudla. Yini na ukuba sife phambi kwakho, kuba imali iphelile.
1_47_16_Wathi uYosefu, Rholani imfuyo yenu; ndoninika ngemfuyo yenu, ukuba imali iphelile.
1_47_17_Ayizisa imfuyo yawo kuYosefu; uYosefu wawanika ukudla ngamahashe, nangemfuyo eyimpahla emfutshane, nangemfuyo eziinkomo, nangamaesile; wawapha ukudla endaweni yayo yonke imfuyo yawo ngaloo mnyaka.
1_47_18_Waphela ke loo mnyaka. Eza kuye ngomnyaka wesibini, athi kuye, Asinakukufihla enkosini yam, ukuba imali nemfuyo eziinkomo iphelele enkosini yam; akusalanga nto kuthi phambi kwenkosi yam, yimizimba yethu nimihlaba yethu yodwa kuphela.
1_47_19_Yini na ukuba sife phambi kwakho, thina aba nomhlaba wethu. Sithenge thina nomhlaba wethu ngokudla, ukuze thina nomhlaba wethu sibe ngabakhonzi bakaFaro. Sinike imbewu, ukuze siphile, singafi, kube senkangala.
1_47_20_UYosefu wawuthengela uFaro wonke umhlaba waseYiputa; kuba amaYiputa athengisa elowo ngentsimi yakhe, kuba indlala yabe inzima phezu kwawo; umhlaba ke waba ngokaFaro.
1_47_21_Abantu wabafudusela emizini, kwathabathela ekupheleni komnye umda waseYiputa kwesa ekupheleni komnye.
1_47_22_Ngumhlaba wababingeleli wodwa angawuthenganga; kuba ababingeleli babenesabelo abasimiselweyo esivela kuFaro,  besidla isabelo eso simiselweyo, babesinikwe nguFaro; ngenxa yoko bona abathengisanga ngomhlaba wabo.
1_47_23_Wathi uYosefu ebantwini, Yabonani, namhla nina nomhlaba wenu ndinithengele uFaro; nantsi ke imbewu yenu, hlwayelani umhlaba.
1_47_24_Nothi kwinto eniyizuzileyo, nimnike uFaro esesihlanu isahlulo, ezine izahlulo zibe zezenu, zibe yimbewu yentsimi,  nezokudliwa nini nangabasezindlwini zenu, nezokudliwa lusapho lwenu.
1_47_25_Bathi, Usisindisile; mayisibabale inkosi yam, soba ngabakhonzi kuFaro.
1_47_26_UYosefu wayimisa loo nto yaba ngummiselo unanamhla phezu komhlaba waseYiputa, ukuba esesihlanu isahlulo sibe sesikaFaro;  ngumhlaba wababingeleli wodwa ongabanga ngokaFaro.
1_47_27_Wahlala uSirayeli ezweni laseYiputa, ezweni laseGoshen;  baqiniseka ukuma khona, baqhama, banda kunene.
1_47_28_UYakobi wadla ubomi ezweni laseYiputa iminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe; imihla kaYakobi, iminyaka yobudala bakhe, yaba yiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci amane, aneminyaka esixhenxe.
1_47_29_Yasondela imihla kaSirayeli yokuba afe; wabiza unyana wakhe uYosefu, wathi kuye, Ukuba kaloku ndibabalwe nguwe,  khawubeke isandla sakho phantsi kwethanga lam, undenzele inceba nenyaniso. Uze ungakhe undingcwabe eYiputa.
1_47_30_Ke ndiya kulala koobawo; uze undisuse eYiputa, undingcwabe engcwabeni labo. Wathi ke yena, Ndiya kwenza ngokwelizwi lakho.
1_47_31_Wathi, Funga; wafunga ke. Waqubuda uSirayeli phezu kwentloko yesingqengqelo.
1_48_1_Kwathi emveni kwezi zinto, kwathiwa kuYosefu, Uyabona,  uyihlo uyafa. Wathabatha oonyana bakhe bobabini, uManase noEfrayim, bahamba naye.
1_48_2_Waxelelwa uYakobi kwathiwa, Nanku unyana wakho uYosefu esiza kuwe. Wazomeleza uSirayeli, wavuka, wahlala esingqengqelweni.
1_48_3_UYakobi wathi uYosefu, uThixo uSomandla wabonakala kum ndiseLuzi, ezweni lakwaKanan, wandisikelela.
1_48_4_Wathi kum, Yabona, ndiya kukuqhamisa, ndikwandise,  ndikwenze isikhungu sezizwe; eli lizwe ndilinike imbewu yakho emva kwakho, libe lelakho ngonaphakade.
1_48_5_Ngako oko oonyana bakho ababini, owabazalelwayo ezweni laseYiputa, ndingekafiki kuwe eYiputa, ngabam; uEfrayim noManase baya kuba ngabam; njengoRubhen noSimon.
1_48_6_Ke othe wabazala emva kwabo, baya kuba ngabakho; baya kubizwa ngokwegama labazalwana babo elifeni labo.
1_48_7_Ekumkeni kwam mna ePadan, ndafelwa nguRakeli ezweni lakwaKanan endleleni, ndakubona ukuba ndimganyana ukuze kufikwe e-Efrata; ndamngcwabela khona endleleni yase-Efrata eyiBhetelehem.
1_48_8_USirayeli wababona oonyana bakaYosefu, wathi, Ngoobani na aba?
1_48_9_Wathi uYosefu kuyise, Ngoonyana bam endibaphiwe nguThixo apha. Wathi yena, Khawubasondeze kum, ndibasikelele.
1_48_10_Ke amehlo kaSirayeli ayeselenorhatyazo kukwaluphala,  engasaboni. Wabasondeza ke kuye, wabanga, wabawola.
1_48_11_USirayeli wathi uYosefu, Ukubona ubuso bakho bendingasakucingi; nanku uThixo endibonise nembewu yakho.
1_48_12_UYosefu wabakhupha phakathi kwamadolo akhe, waqubuda ngobuso bakhe emhlabeni.
1_48_13_UYosefu wabathabatha bobabini, uEfrayim ngesokunene kwesasekhohlo sikaSirayeli, noManase ngesokhohlo kwesokunene sikaSirayeli, wabasondeza kuye.
1_48_14_USirayeli wasolula esokunene sakhe, wasibeka entloko kuEfrayim engomncinane, nesokhohlo sakhe entloko kuManase,  ezenjenjalo izandla zakhe ngengqiqo; ngokuba uManase ebengowamazibulo.
1_48_15_Wamsikelela uYosefu, wathi, Ngamana uThixo, abahamba phambi kwakhe oobawo uAbraham noIsake, owandondla kwasekuveleni kwam kwada kwanamhla, osisithunywa esindikhululeyo ebubini bonke,
1_48_16_angabasikelela abafana, lithi igama lam negama loobawo libizwe phezu kwabo, uAbraham noIsake, bande, babe baninzi ehlabathini.
1_48_17_Wabona uYosefu ukuba uyise usibeke isandla sakhe sokunene entloko kuEfrayim, kwakubi emehlweni akhe; wasibamba isandla sikayise wasishenxisa entlokweni kaEfrayim, esisa entlokweni kaManase.
1_48_18_Wathi uYosefu kuyise, Makungabi njalo, bawo, kuba ngulo owamazibulo; beka esokunene entlokweni yakhe.
1_48_19_Akavuma uyise, wathi, Ndiyazi, nyana wam, ndiyazi; naye uya kuba sisizwe, naye uya kuba mkhulu; kodwa umninawa wakhe uya kuba mkhulu kuye, nembewu yakhe ibe ziintlanga ezininzi.
1_48_20_Wabasikelela ngaloo mini, esithi, Ngawe uya kusikelela uSirayeli, esithi, Ngamana uThixo wakwenza njengoEfrayim nanjengoManase. Wambeka ke uEfrayim phambi koManase.
1_48_21_USirayeli wathi kuYosefu, Yabona, ndiza kufa; uThixo uya kuba nani, anibuyisele ezweni looyihlo.
1_48_22_Mna ndikunike isiqwenga somhlaba ngaphezu kwabazalwana bakho, eso ndasithimbayo esandleni sama-Amori, ngekrele lam nangesaphetha sam.
1_49_1_Wababiza ke uYakobi oonyana bakhe, wathi, Zihlanganiseni,  ndinixelele okuya kunihlela ngemihla yokugqibela.
1_49_2_Qukanani, niphulaphule, nyana bakaYakobi, Niphulaphule uSirayeli uyihlo.
1_49_3_Rubhen, wena mazibulo am, mandla am, ngqalo yokuqina kwam,  Ncamisa yokuphakama, ncamisa yegunya,
1_49_4_Uxhaphazelayo njengamanzi, akusayi kuba ncamisa kunje; Kuba wenyukayo waya esililini sikayihlo, Wangcolisa oko, wenyuka waya emandlalweni wam.
1_49_5_USimon noLevi ngabazalwana; Ziintonga zokugonyamela izikhali zabo.
1_49_6_Egquguleni labo uze ungangeni umphefumlo wam, Nesikhungu sabo lungazibandakanyi uzuko lwam; Kuba ngomsindo wabo babulala amadoda, Ngokuzithandela kwabo bazinqumla imisipha iinkomo.
1_49_7_Uqalekisiwe umsindo wabo, ngokuba unobungcwangu:  Ukuphuphuma kwabo umsindo, ngokuba unzima. Ndiya kubachithachitha kwaYakobi, Ndibaphangalalise kwaSirayeli.
1_49_8_Yuda, abazalwana bakho baya kukudumisa, Isandla sakho sibe sentanyeni yeentshaba zakho; Baya kuqubuda kuwe oonyana bakayihlo.
1_49_9_Lithole lengonyama uYuda; Usuke ekuqwengeni, nyana wam,  Waguqa, wabuthuma njengengonyama, Njengengonyamakazi; ngubani na oya kumvusa?
1_49_10_Intonga ayiyi kumka kuYuda, Intonga yommisi-mthetho ayiyi kumka phakathi kweenyawo zakhe, Ade afike uShilo, Zimlulamele izizwe.
1_49_11_Ngukhuleka emdiliyeni imazi yakhe ye-esile, Ukhuleka kowohlobo inkonyana yakhe ye-esile; uhlamba ngewayini isambatho sakhe, Ngegazi lediliya ingubo yakhe;
1_49_12_Umehlo abomvu yiwayini, Umazinyo amhlophe ngamasi.
1_49_13_UZebhulon uya kuma ngasezibukweni lolwandle,
1_49_14_Ewe, ngasezibukweni leenqanawa, Icala lakhe lisingise eTsidon. UIsakare yinyathi ye-esile, Ulala phakathi kweentlanti.
1_49_15_Wakubona ukuphumla ukuba kulungile, Nelizwe ukuba limnandi; Igxalaba lakhe walithobela ukuthwala, waba ngumsebenzi ofakwa uviko.
1_49_16_UDan uya kugweba phakathi kwabantu bakowabo, Njengezinye izizwe zakwaSirayeli.
1_49_17_UDan makabe yinyoka ngasendleleni, Irhamba ngasemendweni,  Eliluma izithende zehashe, Awe ngomva olikhweleyo.
1_49_18_Usindiso lwakho, Yehova, ndiluthembile.
1_49_19_UGadi ungenelwa ngamatutu, Ke yena uwangenela ezithendeni.
1_49_20_KuAshere kuphuma amafutha, isonka sakhe eso; Yena unika izinto eziyolisa ookumkani.
1_49_21_UNafetali yimazi yexhama ekhululweyo, ukhupha amazwi amahle.
1_49_22_NguGatya lomthi oqhamayo uYosefu, UGatya lomthi oqhamayo ngasemthonjeni, Omasebe aqabele eludongeni.
1_49_23_UBamcubunga bamtola, Bamchasa abatoli;
1_49_24_USihlala sithe nkqi isaphetha sakhe, UMikhono yezandla zakhe inokusityeda, Ngezandla zembalasane kaYakobi, Khona apho akhoyo umalusi, ilitye likaSirayeli;
1_49_25_NgoThixo wooyihloakuncede, NgoSomandlaakusikelele,  Ibe ziintsikelelo zamazulu ezivela phezulu, Iintsikelelo zamanzi enzonzobila alele ezantsi, Iintsikelelo zamabele,  nezesizalo.
1_49_26_Iintsikelelo zikayihlo Zizigqithile iintsikelelo zomawokhulu, Zasa nasemdeni weentaba zanini; Mazibe sentloko kuYosefu, Ebuchotsheni bobalulweyo kubazalwana bakhe!
1_49_27_UBhenjamin yingcuka eqwengayo; Kusasa uya kudla okuphangiweyo, Ngokuhlwa uya kwaba okuthinjiweyo.
1_49_28_Bonke aba zizizwe zakwaSirayeli ezilishumi elinazibini;  yiyo leyo into awayithethayo kubo uyise, wabasikelela; elowo ngokwentsikelelo yakhe wabasikelela.
1_49_29_Wabawisela umthetho, wathi kubo, Ndiza kuhlanganiselwa kwabakowethu; ndingcwabeni noobawo emqolombeni osentsimini kaEfron umHiti,
1_49_30_emqolombeni osentsimini yaseMakapela, ophambi kowakwaMamre, ezweni lakwaKanan, awawuthengayo uAbraham ndawonye nentsimi kuEfron umHiti, ukuba abe nendawo eyiyeyakhe yokungcwaba.
1_49_31_Bamngcwaba khona apho uAbraham noSara umkakhe; bamngcwaba khona apho uIsake noRebheka umkakhe; ndamngcwaba khona apho uLeya.
1_49_32_Yathengwa intsimi leyo nomqolomba okuyo koonyana bakaHeti.
1_49_33_Wagqiba ke uYakobi ukuyolela oonyana bakhe, wazifinyezela esingqengqelweni iinyawo zakhe, waphuma umphefumlo,  wahlanganiselwa kwabakowabo.
1_50_1_Wawa uYosefu phezu kobuso bukayise, walila phezu kwakhe,  wamanga.
1_50_2_UYosefu wabawisela umthetho abakhonzi bakhe, amagqirha,  ukuba amqhole uyise; amagqirha amqhola ke uSirayeli.
1_50_3_Bamzalisela imihla emashumi mane, kuba bebesenjenjalo ukuyizalisa imihla yabaqholiweyo; amaYiputa amlilela imihla emashumi asixhenxe.
1_50_4_Yadlula ke imihla yokulilelwa kwakhe, uYosefu wathetha kwindlu kaFaro, wathi, Ukuba kaloku niyandibabala, khanithethe ezindlebeni zikaFaro, nithi,
1_50_5_Ubawo wandifungisa esithi, Yabona, ndiza kufa; engcwabeni lam endizimbeleyo ezweni lakwaKanan, wondingcwabela khona apho.  Ngoko makhe ndinyuke ndiye kumngcwaba ubawo; ndobuya ndibuye.
1_50_6_Wathi uFaro, Nyuka uye kumngcwaba uyihlo ngoko akufungise ngako.
1_50_7_Wenyuka ke uYosefu waya kumngcwaba uyise; benyuka naye bonke abakhonzi bakaFaro, amadoda amakhulu endlu yakhe, amadoda amakhulu onke ezwe laseYiputa;
1_50_8_nendlu kaYosefu yonke, nabazalwana bakhe, nendlu kayise.  Kwasala iintsapho zabo zodwa, nempahla yabo emfutshane,  neenkomo zabo, ezweni laseGoshen.
1_50_9_Kwenyuka naye iinqwelo, nabamahashe, yaba ngumkhosi omkhulu kunene.
1_50_10_Bafika esandeni sika-Atadi esiphesheya kweYordan,  bambambazela izifuba, batsho khona ngesililo esikhulu, esinzima kunene; bamenzela uyise isijwili imihla esixhenxe.
1_50_11_Basibona abemi belo zwe, amaKanan, isijwili esandeni sika-Atadi, bathi, Sikhulu esi sijwili kumaYiputa; ngenxa yoko kwathiwa igama laso yiAbhele-mitserayim, ephesheya kweYordan.
1_50_12_Oonyana bakhe benza ke kuye njengokuyolela kwakhe.
1_50_13_Bamthwala oonyana bakhe, bamsa ezweni lakwaKanan,  bamngcwaba emqolombeni wentsimi yaseMakapela, awawuthengayo uAbraham ndawonye nentsimi, ukuba ube yindawo eyiyeyakhe yokungcwaba, kuEfron umHiti phambi kowakwaMamre.
1_50_14_UYosefu wabuyela eYiputa ke, yena nabazalwana bakhe, nabo bonke abenyuka naye beya kumngcwaba uyise, emva kokungcwaba kwakhe uyise.
1_50_15_Ke kaloku abakhuluwa bakaYosefu babona ukuba uyise wabo ufile, bathi, Azi uYosefu uya kusitshutshisa na, abubuyisele kanye na kuthi bonke ububi esimenzele bona?
1_50_16_Bathumela kuYosefu, besithi, Uyihlo wayolela phambi kokufa kwakhe, wathi,
1_50_17_Notsho kuYosefu ukuthi, Khawuluxolele ukreqo lwabakhuluwa bakho, nesono sabo sokuba bekwenze into embi; ngoko khawuluxolele ukreqo lwabakhozi boThixo wooyihlo. Walila uYosefu ekuthetheni kwabo kuye.
1_50_18_Baya nabakhuluwa bakhe, baziphosa phantsi phambi kwakhe,  bathi, Yabona, singabakhonzi bakho.
1_50_19_Wathi uYosefu kubo, Musani ukoyika; ndisesikhundleni sikaThixo yini na?
1_50_20_Nina nacinga ububi ngam; ke yena uThixo wacinga okulungileyo, ukuze kuthi, njengoko kwenzekileyo namhla,  kusinde abantu abaninzi.
1_50_21_Ngoko musani ukoyika; ndonondla nina, nentsapho yenu.  Wabathuthuzela ke, wathetha kakuhle nabo.
1_50_22_UYosefu wena eYiputa, yena nendlu kayise. UYosefu wahlala iminyaka elikhulu elinashumi-nye.
1_50_23_UYosefu wabona oonyana besesithathu isizukulwana sikaEfrayim, kwanoonyana bakaMakire, unyana kaManase,  ababezalelwe emadolweni kaYosefu.
1_50_24_Wathi uYosefu kubakhuluwa bakhe, Ndiza kufa; uThixo okunene uya kunivelela, aninyuse, niphume kweli lizwe, niye ezweni abelifungele uAbraham, noIsake, noYakobi.
1_50_25_UYosefu wabafungisa oonyana bakaSirayeli, esithi, UThixo okunene eya kunivelela nje, nowanyusa amathambo am, emke apha.
1_50_26_Wafa ke uYosefu engominyaka ilikhulu linashumi-nye;  bamqhola; wafakwa etyeyeni eYiputa.
2_1_1_Ngawo la ke amagama oonyana bakaSirayeli, ababefike eYiputa noYakobi; beza elowo nendlu yakhe:
2_1_2_uRubhen, uSimon, uLevi noYuda;
2_1_3_uIsakare, uZebhulon noBhenjamin;
2_1_4_uDan noNafetali, uGadi noAshere.
2_1_5_Iyonke imiphefumlo eyaphumayo esinqeni sikaYakobi yayiyimiphefumlo emashumi asixhenxe; uYosefu yena ubeseleseYiputa.
2_1_6_Wafa ke uYosefu nabazalwana bakhe bonke, neso sizukulwana sonke.
2_1_7_Oonyana bakaSirayeli baqhama, banyakazela, banda, baba namandla kakhulu kunene; lazala ilizwe ngabo.
2_1_8_Kwavela ukumkani omtsha phezu kweYiputa, owayengamazi uYosefu.
2_1_9_Wathi ebantwini bakhe, Yabonani, abantu oonyana bakaSirayeli baninzi, banamandla kunathi.
2_1_10_Yizani sibalumkise, hleze bande; bathi, xenikweni kuthe kwehla imfazwe, bathelele nabo kwiintshaba zethu, balwe nathi,  banyuke baphume ezweni.
2_1_11_Bamisa ke phezu kwabo abathetheli bokubafaka uviko, ukuze babacinezele ngemithwalo yabo. Bamakhela ke uFaro imizi enoovimba, iPitom neRameses.
2_1_12_Okukhona babacinezelayo, kokukhona bandayo, kokukhona baphangalalayo; bakruquka ngabo oonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_1_13_AmaYiputa ke abakhonzisa oonyana bakaSirayeli ngokutyumzayo;
2_1_14_abenza bakrakra ubomi babo ngomsebenzi olukhuni, ngodaka nangezitena, nangeentlobo zonke zomsebenzi wasendle; yonke imisebenzi abasetyenziswa yona yayiyetyumzayo.
2_1_15_Ke kaloku ukumkani waseYiputa wathetha kubazalisikazi abangamaHebherekazi, igama lomnye linguShifra, igama lomnye linguPuwa;
2_1_16_wathi, Ekuzaliseni kwenu amaHebherekazi, khangelani xa azalayo: ukuba ithe yayinkwenkwe, noyibulala; ukuba ithe yayintombi, yodla ubomi.
2_1_17_Abazalisikazi boyika uThixo, abenza ngoko wathetha ngako kubo ukumkani waseYiputa, bawasindisa amakhwenkwe.
2_1_18_Wababiza ukumkani waseYiputa abazalisikazi, wathi kubo,  Kungani na ukuba nenze le nto yokuwasindisa amakhwenkwe?
2_1_19_Bathi abazalisikazi kuFaro, AmaHebherekazi akanjengabafazi bamaYiputa, kuba omelele; azala engekangeni kuwo umzalisikazi.
2_1_20_Ngoko uThixo wabenzela okulungileyo abazalisikazi. Banda abantu, banamandla kakhulu.
2_1_21_Kwathi, kuba abazalisikazi babemoyika uThixo, wazisikelela izindlu zabo.
2_1_22_UFaro wabawisela umthetho abantu bakhe bonke, wathi, Bonke oonyana abathe bazalwa, baphoseni emlanjeni; ke zonke iintombi zisindiseni.
2_2_1_Kwaphuma umfo wendlu kaLevi, wazeka intombi yakwaLevi.
2_2_2_Wamitha umfazi lowo, wazala unyana; wambona ukuba mhle,  wamfihla iinyanga ezintathu.
2_2_3_Wathi, akuba engasenako ukumfihla, wamthabathela umkhombe wemikhanzi, wawutyabeka ngebhitumene netywina, wamfaka kuwo umntwana, wawubeka engcotyeni, elunxwemeni lomlambo.
2_2_4_Udade wabo wema mgama, ukuze ayazi into eya kwenzeka kuye.
2_2_5_Yehla ke intombi kaFaro, isiya kuqubha emlanjeni; baye abakhonzazana bayo behamba ngasecaleni lomlambo. Yabona umkhombe engcotyeni phakathi, yathuma umkhonzazana wayo, ukuba aye kuwuthabatha.
2_2_6_Yawunqika, yambona umntwana; nantso inkwenkwana ilila. Yaba nofefe ngayo, yathi, Ngumntwana wamaHebhere lo.
2_2_7_Wathi udade wabo kwintombi kaFaro, Ndiye kukubizela na umfazi wamaHebhere onokwanyisa, akwanyisele umntwana?
2_2_8_Yathi intombi kaFaro kuye, Yiya. Yaya ke intombi leyo,  yabiza unina womntwana.
2_2_9_Yathi intombi kaFaro kuye, Thabatha lo mntwana, umanyise;  ndokunika umvuzo wakho mna. Umfazi lowo wamthabatha umntwana,  wamanyisa.
2_2_10_Wakhula umntwana, wamsa ke kwintombi kaFaro, waba ngunyana wayo. Yamthiya igama elinguMoses, yathi, Ndamrhola emanzini.
2_2_11_Kwathi ke ngaloo mihla, akukhula uMoses, waphuma waya kubazalwana bakhe, ekhangela imithwalo yabo. Wabona umYiputa ebetha umHebhere wakubazalwana bakhe.
2_2_12_Wabhekabheka, wathi akuba engaboni mntu, wamthi qwaka umYiputa, wamselela entlabathini.
2_2_13_Waphuma ngemini yesibini; wabona amaHebhere emabini entlalana; wathi kowone omnye, Yini na ukuba umbethe ummelwane wakho?
2_2_14_Wathi yena, Umiswe ngubani na ukuba ube ngumthetheli nomgwebi phezu kwethu? Uza kundibulala na nam, usitsho nje,  njengokuba umbulele umYiputa? Woyika uMoses, wathi, Mayibe le nto iyaziwa.
2_2_15_UFaro wayiva le nto, wafuna ukumbulala uMoses. Wabaleka uMoses, wemka kwaFaro, waya kuma ezweni lakwaMidiyan, wahlala phantsi ngasequleni.
2_2_16_Ke kaloku umbingeleli wakwaMidiyan wayeneentombi ezisixhenxe; zeza kukha amanzi, zayizalisa imikhumbi ukuba ziseze impahla emfutshane kayise.
2_2_17_Bafika abalusi, bazigxotha. Wesuka uMoses wazinceda,  wayiseza impahla yazo emfutshane.
2_2_18_Zakufika kuRehuweli uyise, wathi, Nitheni na namhlanje ukuhle nifike?
2_2_19_Zathi, Sihlangulwe ngumYiputa esandleni sabalusi; kunjalo wasikhelela amanzi, wayiseza impahla emfutshane.
2_2_20_Wathi ezintombini zakhe, Uphi na? Nimshiyeleni na umntu lowo? Mbizeni, adle isonka.
2_2_21_Wakholwa uMoses kukuhlala naloo ndoda. Yamnika uMoses uTsipora, intombi yayo.
2_2_22_Yazala unyana, wamthiya igama elinguGershom, kuba ubesithi,  Ndingumphambukeli ezweni lolunye uhlanga.
2_2_23_Kwathi emva kwaloo mihla mininzi wafa ukumkani waseYiputa.  Bancwina oonyana bakaSirayeli ngenxa yomsebenzi, bakhala;  kwenyuka ukuzibika kwabo, kwaya kuThixo, ngenxa yomsebenzi.
2_2_24_Wakuva uThixo ukugula kwabo, wawukhumbula uThixo umnqophiso wakhe noAbraham, noIsake, noYakobi.
2_2_25_UThixo wababona oonyana bakaSirayeli, wabazi uThixo.
2_3_1_Ke kaloku uMoses wayesalusa impahla emfutshane kaYitro,  uyise womkakhe, umbingeleli wakwaMidiyan, wayiqhubela ele kwentlango, wafika entabeni kaThixo eHorebhe.
2_3_2_Kwabonakala isithunywa sikaYehova kuye, siselangatyeni lomlilo, etyholweni phakathi, wakhangela, wabona ityholo lisitsha ngumlilo, noko lingade litshe liphele.
2_3_3_Wathi uMoses, Makhe ndityeke, ndiye kubona lo mbono mkhulu;  ukuba kutheni na ukuba ityholo lingatshi liphele.
2_3_4_Wabona uYehova, ukuba utyekile esiza kubona; uThixo wabiza esetyholweni phakathi, wathi kuye, Moses, Moses. Wathi yena,  Ndilapha.
2_3_5_Wathi, Musa ukusondela apha. Khulula iimbadada zakho ezo ezinyaweni zakho, kuba loo ndawo umi kuyo ingumhlaba ongcwele.
2_3_6_Wathi, NdinguThixo kayihlo, uThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake, uThixo kaYakobi. Wabusithelisa uMoses ubuso bakhe,  kuba ebesoyika ukukhangela kuThixo.
2_3_7_Wathi uYehova, Ndizibonile okunene iintsizi zabantu bam abaseYiputa, nokukhala kwabo ndikuvile, ngenxa yabo babaqhuba kalukhuni; kuba ndiyawazi umvandedwa wabo.
2_3_8_Ndihlile ke; ndize kubahlangula esandleni samaYiputa,  ndibanyuse baphume kwelo lizwe, baye ezweni elilungileyo,  elibanzi, ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi, endaweni yamaKanan,  namaHiti, nama-Amori, namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi.
2_3_9_Ngoku ke naku ukukhala koonyana bakaSirayeli, kufikile kum;  kananjalo ndikubonile ukuxina abaxine ngako amaYiputa.
2_3_10_Hamba ngoku, ndikuthume kuFaro, ubakhuphe eYiputa abantu bam, oonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_3_11_Wathi uMoses kuThixo, Ndingubani na ukuba ndingade ndiye kuFaro, ukuba ndibakhuphe eYiputa oonyana bakaSirayeli?
2_3_12_Wathi, Ndiya kuba nawe. Nangu umqondiso wokuba ndikuthumile mna: ekubakhupheni kwakho abantu eYiputa, niya kumkhonza uThixo kule ntaba.
2_3_13_Wathi uMoses kuThixo, Uyabona, ukuba ndiya koonyana bakaSirayeli, ndithi kubo, UThixo wooyihlo undithumile kuni,  baze bathi kum, Ngubani na igama lakhe? ndothini na kubo?
2_3_14_Wathi uThixo kuMoses, Ndinguye eNdinguye. Wathi, Wotsho koonyana bakaSirayeli ukuthi, uNdinguye undithumile kuni.
2_3_15_Waphinda wathi uThixo kuMoses, Wothi koonyana bakaSirayeli,  UYehova, uThixo wooyihlo, uThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake,  uThixo kaYakobi, undithumile kuni: ligama lam elo ngonaphakade,  sisikhumbuzo sam eso kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
2_3_16_Yiya uhlanganise amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli, uthi kuwo,  UYehova, uThixo wooyihlo, uThixo ka-Abraham, kaIsake kaYakobi,  ubonakele kum, wathi, Ndinivelele nina, naloo nto niyenziweyo eYiputa.
2_3_17_Ndathi, Ndiya kuninyusa niphume ezintsizini zaseYiputa,  niye ezweni lamaKanan, namaHiti, nama-Amori, namaPerizi,  namaHivi, namaYebhusi, ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi.
2_3_18_Boliphulaphula ilizwi lakho; uze uye ke wena namadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli kukumkani waseYiputa, nithi kuye, UYehova uThixo wamaHebhere uhlangene nathi; ngoku makhe sihambe entlango uhambo lweentsuku ezintathu, sibingelele kuYehova uThixo wethu.
2_3_19_Ke mna ndiyazi, ukuba ukumkani waseYiputa akayi kunivumela ukuba nihambe, nokuba sekungesandla esithe nkqi.
2_3_20_Ndiya kusolula isandla sam, ndiyibethe iYiputa ngemisebenzi yam yonke ebalulekileyo, endiya kuyenza phakathi kwayo, andule ke ukunindulula.
2_3_21_Aba bantu ndiya kubababala phambi kwamaYiputa; kuthi, xa nithe nemka, ningemki nize.
2_3_22_Intokazi iya kucela kwengummelwane wayo,  nakwengumphambukeli endlwini yayo, impahla yesilivere, nempahla yegolide, neengubo, nizinxibe oonyana benu neentombi zenu,  niwaphange amaYiputa.
2_4_1_Waphendula uMoses wathi, Uyabona, abayi kukholwa ndim, abayi kuliphulaphula izwi lam; kuba baya kuthi, UYehova akabonakalanga kuwe.
2_4_2_Wathi uYehova kuye, Yintoni na loo nto isesandleni sakho?  Wathi, Yintonga.
2_4_3_Wathi, Yiphose emhlabeni. Wayiphosa emhlabeni, yasuka yaba yinyoka; wayibaleka uMoses.
2_4_4_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Solule isandla sakho, uyibambe ngomsila; (wasolula isandla sakhe, wayibamba, yasuka yaba yintonga esandleni sakhe);
2_4_5_ukuze bakholwe ukuba uYehova, uThixo wooyise, uThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake, uThixo kaYakobi, ubonakele kuwe.
2_4_6_Waphinda uYehova wathi kuye, Khawusifake isandla sakho esifubeni sakho. Wasifaka isandla sakhe esifubeni sakhe.  Akusirhola isandla sakhe, naso sineqhenqa, simhlophe njengekhephu.
2_4_7_Wathi, Sibuyisele isandla sakho esifubeni sakho.  Wasibuyisela isandla sakhe esifubeni; wasirhola esifubeni sakhe, naso sibuye saba njengenyama yakhe.
2_4_8_Kothi, ukuba abathanga bakholwe nguwe, abaliphulaphula izwi lowokuqala umqondiso, bakholwe lilizwi lomqondiso wamva.
2_4_9_Kothi, ukuba abathanga bakholwe nayile miqondiso mibini,  abaliphulaphula nezwi lakho, uthabathe amanzi omlambo,  uwaphalazele emhlabeni owomileyo; osuka amanzi owathabathileyo emlanjeni abe ligazi emhlabeni owomileyo.
2_4_10_Wathi uMoses kuYehova, Camagu, Nkosi yam! Andindoda imazwi maninzi nanini na, oko wathethayo kumkhonzi wakho lo; kuba ndingokuthetha kunzima, ndikwanzima nolwimi.
2_4_11_Wathi uYehova kuye, Ngubani na obeke umlomo emntwini?  Ngubani na owenze isidenge, nesithulu, nobonayo, nemfama?  Asindim na, mna Yehova?
2_4_12_Ngoko ke hamba, ndoba nomlomo wakho mna, ndikubonise into oya kuyithetha.
2_4_13_Wathi yena, Camagu, Nkosi yam! Khawuthume ngesandla salowo womthuma.
2_4_14_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kuMoses, wathi, Akanguye na umkhuluwa wakho uAron umLevi? Ndiyazi ukuba yena uyakwazi ukuthetha. Kananjalo nanko yena ephuma eza kukukhawulela;  wokubona, avuye entliziyweni yakhe.
2_4_15_Wothetha kuye, ubeke amazwi emlonyeni wakhe; mna ndoba nomlomo wakho nomlomo wakhe, ndinibonise into eniya kuyenza.
2_4_16_Yena wokuthethela ebantwini, athi yena abe ngumlomo kuwe,  uthi wena ube nguthixo kuye.
2_4_17_Ke le ntonga yiphathe ngesandla sakho; uya kwenza ngayo imiqondiso leyo.
2_4_18_Wahamba ke uMoses, wabuyela kuYitro, uyise womkakhe, wathi kuye, Makhe ndihambe, ndibuyele kubazalwana bam abaseYiputa,  ndibone ukuba basahleli na. Wathi uYitro kuMoses, Hamba ngoxolo.
2_4_19_UYehova wathi kuMoses kwaMidiyan, Hamba ubuyele eYiputa;  kuba afile onke amadoda abezonda ubomi bakho.
2_4_20_UMoses wathabatha umkakhe noonyana bakhe, wabakhwelisa e-esileni, wabuyela ezweni laseYiputa; wayiphatha uMoses intonga kaThixo ngesandla sakhe.
2_4_21_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Ekuhambeni kwakho ubuyela eYiputa,  uze ukhangele ukuba uzenze phambi koFaro zonke izimanga,  endizibeke esandleni sakho. Ke mna ndiya kuyenza lukhuni intliziyo yakhe, angabandululi abantu.
2_4_22_Wothi kuFaro, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Unyana wam wamazibulo nguSirayeli;
2_4_23_ndithi kuwe, Mndulule unyana wam lowo, andikhonze; walile nje ukumndulula, uyabona, ndombulala unyana wakho, amazibulo akho.
2_4_24_Kwathi, endleleni apho balalisa khona, uYehova wamhlangabeza, wafuna ukumbulala.
2_4_25_UTsipora wathabatha intshengece, wanqumla inyama yokwaluswa yonyana wakhe, wayiphosa ezinyaweni zakhe, wathi, Ungumyeni wamagazi kum.
2_4_26_Wamyeka ke. Watsho oko ukuthi, Ungumyeni wamagazi, ngenxa yolwaluko.
2_4_27_Wathi uYehova kuAron, Hamba uye kukhawulela uMoses entlango. Waya ke, wamhlangabeza entabeni kaThixo, wamanga.
2_4_28_UMoses wamxelela uAron onke amazwi kaYehova abemthume wona,  nemiqondiso yonke abemwisele umthetho ngayo.
2_4_29_Wahamba uMoses noAron, bawahlanganisa onke amadoda amakhulu oonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_4_30_Wawathetha uAron onke amazwi abewathethile uYehova kuMoses,  wayenza nemiqondiso phambi kwabantu.
2_4_31_Bakholwa abantu, beva ukuba uYehova ubavelele oonyana bakaSirayeli wazibona iintsizi zabo, bathoba baqubuda.
2_5_1_Emveni koko beza ooMoses noAron, bathi kuFaro, Utsho uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam,  bandenzele umthendeleko entlango.
2_5_2_Wathi uFaro, Ngubani na uYehova, ukuba ndiphulaphule izwi lakhe, lokuba ndindulule uSirayeli? Andimazi uYehova, kananjalo andiyi kumndulula uSirayeli.
2_5_3_Bathi ke, UThixo wamaHebhere uhlangene nathi; makhe sihambe entlango uhambo lweentsuku ezintathu, sibingelele kuYehova uThixo wethu, hleze asiqwele ngendyikitya yokufa nangekrele.
2_5_4_Wathi ukumkani waseYiputa kubo, Yini na, nina Moses noAron,  ukuba nibakhulule abantu emisebenzini yabo? Yiyani emithwalweni yenu.
2_5_5_Wathi uFaro, Yabonani, baninzi abantu belizwe ngoku, ke nina niyabaphumza emithwalweni yabo.
2_5_6_UFaro wabawisela umthetho abaphathi nabaqhubi-kalukhuni babantu ngaloo mini, esithi,
2_5_7_Ize ningabi sabanika abantu umququ wokwenza izitena,  njengokwangaphambili; mabaye ngokwabo, bazibuthele umququ;
2_5_8_nenani ababelenza njengokwangaphambili, bamiseleni lona; ize ningalinciphisi, kuba bayahiliza; kuko le nto bakhalayo,  besithi, Masiye kubingelela kuThixo wethu.
2_5_9_Mawube nzima umsebenzi phezu kwamadoda, asebenze wona,  angaphulaphuli amazwi obuxoki.
2_5_10_Baphuma ke abaphathi nabaqhubi-kalukhuni babantu, bathetha ebantwini bathi, Utsho uFaro ukuthi, Andiyi kuninika mququ;
2_5_11_yiyani nina, nizithabathele umququ apho ningawufumana khona; kuba akuyi kuncitshiswa nto emsebenzini wenu.
2_5_12_Baphalazeka abantu ezweni lonke laseYiputa, babutha iindiza endaweni yomququ.
2_5_13_Abaqhubi-kalukhuni babantu babangxamisa, besithi,  Yisebenzeni imisebenzi yenu, into yemini ngangemini yayo,  ngangokuya naninomququ.
2_5_14_Babethwa ke abaphathi boonyana bakaSirayeli, ababemiswe phezu kwabo ngabaqhubi-kalukhuni babantu bakaFaro, kusithiwa,  Kungathuba lini na, ukuba ningagqibi ukwenza izitena enizimiselweyo izolo nanamhla, njengokwangaphambili?
2_5_15_Baya abaphathi boonyana bakaSirayeli, bakhala kuFaro,  besithi, Yini na ukuba wenjenje kubakhonzi bakho?
2_5_16_Abakhonzi bakho aba abanikwa mququ; kuthiwa ke kuthi,  Yenzani izitena. Yabona, abakhonzi bakho aba bayabethwa, kanti kona abantu bakho abo.
2_5_17_Wathi, Kuhiliza nina; niyahiliza, kuko le nto nithi, Masiye sibingelele kuYehova.
2_5_18_Yiyani ke ngoku, nisebenze; aniyi kunikwa mququ; ke lona inani lezitena niya kulirhola.
2_5_19_Babona abaphathi boonyana bakaSirayeli ukuba basebubini,  kusithiwa nje, Aniyi kunciphisa nto eziteneni zenu, kwinto yemini ngangemini yayo.
2_5_20_Baqubisana noMoses noAron, beza kubo ekuphumeni kwabo kuFaro.
2_5_21_Bathi kubo, UYehova makanikhangele, agwebe; ekubeni nilinukisile ivumba lethu phambi koFaro, naphambi kwabakhonzi bakhe, ukuba kubekwe ikrele lokusibulala esandleni sabo.
2_5_22_Wabuyela kuYehova uMoses, esithi, Nkosi yam, yini na ukuba ubaphathe kakubi aba bantu? Yini na le nto uthume mna?
2_5_23_Kususela koko ndangenayo kuFaro, ndithetha egameni lakho,  yena ubaphethe kakubi aba bantu; akubahlangulanga nokubahlangula abantu bakho.
2_6_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Uya kukubona ngoku endiya kukwenza kuFaro, kuba uya kubandulula, abagxothe ezweni lakhe ngesandla esithe nkqi.
2_6_2_Wathetha uThixo kuMoses, wathi kuye, NdinguYehova:
2_6_3_ndabonakala kuAbraham nakuIsake nakuYakobi ngelokuba nguThixo uSomandla; ke ngegama lam lokuba nguYehova andazekanga kubo.
2_6_4_Kananjalo ndawumisa nabo umnqophiso wam wokuba ndibanike ilizwe lakwaKanan, ilizwe lokuphambukela kwabo abaphambukela kulo.
2_6_5_Kananjalo ndikuvile mna ukugula koonyana bakaSirayeli abakhonziswayo ngamaYiputa, ndawukhumbula umnqophiso wam.
2_6_6_Yithi ngoko koonyana bakaSirayeli, ndinguYehova: ndiya kunikhupha phantsi kwemithwalo yamaYiputa, ndinihlangule enkonzweni yawo, ndinihlawulele, ndinikhulule ngengalo eyolukileyo, nangezigwebo ezikhulu;
2_6_7_ndinithabathe nibe ngabantu bam, ndibe nguThixo wenu; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova uThixo wenu, onikhuphayo phantsi kwemithwalo yamaYiputa;
2_6_8_ndiningenise ezweni endaphakamisa isandla sam ngalo, ukuba ndilinike uAbraham noIsake noYakobi; ndiya kulinika nina, libe lilifa: ndinguYehova.
2_6_9_Watsho ke uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli; abamphulaphulanga uMoses, ngenxa yokukhathazeka, nangenxa yomsebenzi onzima.
2_6_10_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi,
2_6_11_Yiya uthethe kuFaro ukumkani waseYiputa, abandulule oonyana bakaSirayeli, baphume ezweni lakhe.
2_6_12_UMoses wathetha phambi koYehova, wathi, Yabona, oonyana bakaSirayeli abandiphulaphulanga; wothini na ke uFaro ukundiphulaphula, ndingomlomo ungalukanga nje?
2_6_13_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, wabawisela umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, nakuFaro ukumkani waseYiputa, ukuba babakhuphe oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni laseYiputa.
2_6_14_Zizo ezi iintloko zezindlu zooyise: oonyana bakaRubhen,  amazibulo kaSirayeli, nguHanoki, noFalu, nguHetseron, noKarmi;  yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaRubhen.
2_6_15_Oonyana bakaSimon nguYemuweli, noYamin, no-Ohadi, noYakin,  noTsohare, noSawule, unyana womKananekazi; yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaSimon.
2_6_16_Ngawo la amagama oonyana bakaLevi ngenzala yabo: uGershon,  noKehati, noMerari. Iminyaka yobudala bukaLevi yayiyiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu anesixhenxe.
2_6_17_Oonyana bakaGershon nguLibheni, noShimehi, ngokwemizalwane yabo.
2_6_18_Oonyana bakaKehati nguAmram, noItsare, noHebron, noUziyeli.  Iminyaka yobudala bukaKehati yayiyiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu anamithathu.
2_6_19_Oonyana bakaMerari nguMaheli, noMushi; yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaLevi ngenzala yabo.
2_6_20_UAmram wazeka uYokebhede, udade boyise, wangumkakhe;  wamzalela uAron noMoses. Iminyaka yobudala buka-Amram yayiyiminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mathathu anesixhenxe.
2_6_21_Oonyana bakaItsare nguKora, noNefege, noZikri.
2_6_22_Oonyana bakaUziyeli nguMishaheli, noElitsafan, noZitri.
2_6_23_UAron wazeka uElishebha intombi ka-Aminadabhi, udade boNashon, wangumkakhe; wamzalela uNadabhi, noAbhihu, noElazare,  noItamare.
2_6_24_Oonyana bakaKora nguAzire, noElikana, noAbhiyazafu; yiyo leyo imizalwane yamaKora.
2_6_25_UElazare, unyana ka-Aron, wazeka umfazi ezintombini zikaPutiyeli; wamzalela uPinehasi. Zizo ezo iintloko zezindlu zooyise zabaLevi, ngokwemizalwane yabo.
2_6_26_Ngulaa Aron noMoses, wathi kubo uYehova, Bakhupheni oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni laseYiputa ngokwemikhosi yabo.
2_6_27_Ngabo abo bathethayo kuFaro ukumkani waseYiputa, ukuba abakhuphe oonyana bakaSirayeli eYiputa; ngabo Moses noAron.
2_6_28_Kwathi, mhlana wathethayo uYehova kuMoses ezweni laseYiputa,
2_6_29_wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi, NdinguYehova; thetha kuFaro, ukumkani waseYiputa, zonke izinto endizithethayo kuwe.
2_6_30_Wathi uMoses phambi koYehova, Yabona, ndingomlomo ungalukanga; wothini na uFaro ukundiphulaphula?
2_7_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Khangela, ndikwenze uthixo kuFaro; ke uAron umkhuluwa wakho woba ngumprofeti wakho.
2_7_2_Wena wothetha zonke izinto endikuwisele umthetho ngazo; ke uAron umkhuluwa wakho wothetha kuFaro, aze abandulule oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni lakhe.
2_7_3_Ke mna ndiya kuyiqaqadekisa intliziyo kaFaro, ndiyandise imiqondiso yam nezimanga zam ezweni laseYiputa.
2_7_4_Akayi kuniphulaphula uFaro. Ke mna iYiputa ndiya kuyisa isandla, ndiyikhuphe imikhosi yam, abantu bam oonyana bakaSirayeli, ezweni laseYiputa ngezigwebo ezikhulu;
2_7_5_azi amaYiputa, ekusoluleni kwam isandla sam phezu kweYiputa,  ukuba ndinguYehova; ndibakhuphe oonyana bakaSirayeli phakathi kwawo.
2_7_6_Wenza ke uMoses noAron; ngoko uYehova wabawisela umthetho ngako, benjenjalo.
2_7_7_UMoses ubeminyaka imashumi asibhozo ezelwe, noAron ubeminyaka imashumi asibhozo anamithathu ezelwe, ukuthetha kwabo kuFaro.
2_7_8_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, wathi,
2_7_9_Xa athe uFaro wathetha kuni, esithi, Ndiboniseni isimanga,  wothi wena kuAron, Thabatha intonga yakho, uyiphose phambi koFaro; yoba yinyoka.
2_7_10_Wangena uMoses noAron kuFaro; benza njengoko uYehova wabawisela umthetho, uAron wayiphosa intonga yakhe phambi koFaro, naphambi kwabakhonzi bakhe, yaba yinyoka.
2_7_11_Naye uFaro wazibiza izilumko nabakhafuli; zenjenjalo nezazi ezo zaseYiputa, ngobugqi bazo.
2_7_12_Elowo waphosa phantsi intonga yakhe, yaba yinyoka; yasuka intonga ka-Aron yaziginya iintonga zabo.
2_7_13_Yaba lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro; akabaphulaphula, njengoko wayetshilo uYehova.
2_7_14_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Intliziyo kaFaro iqaqadekile,  akavumi ukubandulula abantu.
2_7_15_Yiya kuFaro kusasa, nanko ephuma esiya emanzini. Uze ume elunxwemeni lomlambo malunga naye; intonga eyaguqukayo yaba yinyoka yiphathe esandleni.
2_7_16_Uze uthi kuye, UYehova, uThixo wamaHebhere, undithume kuwe,  esithi, Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza entlango; yabona ke, akuphulaphulanga unangoku.
2_7_17_Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Uya kwazi ngale nto ke ukuba ndinguYehova. Yabona, ndiya kubetha ngentonga esesandleni sam emanzini omlambo, aguqulwe abe ligazi,
2_7_18_zife iintlanzi ezisemlanjeni, unuke umlambo, amaYiputa abe nesicaphucaphu akuwasela amanzi omlambo.
2_7_19_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yithi kuAron, Thabatha intonga yakho, wolule isandla sakho phezu kwamanzi aseYiputa, phezu kwemilambo yabo, naphezu kwemijelo yabo, naphezu kwamachibi abo, naphezu kweentlangano zonke zamanzi abo; abe ligazi, ibe ligazi ezweni lonke laseYiputa, nasemiphandeni yemithi neyamatye.
2_7_20_OoMoses noAron benza njengoko uYehova wabawisela umthetho;  wayiphakamisa intonga, wawabetha amanzi omlambo phambi koFaro,  naphambi kwabakhonzi bakhe; aza aguquka onke amanzi omlambo,  aba ligazi.
2_7_21_Zafa iintlanzi ezisemlanjeni, wanuka umlambo, akaba nako amaYiputa ukuwasela amanzi omlambo; laba ligazi ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_7_22_Zenjenjalo ke nezazi zaseYiputa ngobugqi bazo, Yaba lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, akabaphulaphula, njengoko wayetshilo uYehova.
2_7_23_Wajika uFaro, waya endlwini yakhe, akayibekela ntliziyo nale nto.
2_7_24_Onke amaYiputa emba amanzi okusela ngeenxa zonke emlanjeni;  kuba ebengenakuwasela amanzi omlambo.
2_7_25_Kwazaliseka isixhenxe seentsuku emveni kokuwubetha kwakhe uYehova umlambo.
2_8_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yiya kuFaro, uthi kuye, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza.
2_8_2_Ke ukuba uthe akwavuma ukubandulula, uyabona, ndoyibetha yonke imida yakho ngamasele;
2_8_3_umlambo unyakazele amasele, anyuke, angene endlwini yakho,  nasesililini sakho, naphezu kwesingqengqelo sakho, nasendlwini yabakhonzi bakho, nasebantwini bakho, nasezimbizeni zakho,  nasemikhumbini yakho yentlama;
2_8_4_anyuke amasele lawo, eze nakuwe, nakubantu bakho,  nakubakhonzi bakho bonke.
2_8_5_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yithi kuAron, Yolula isandla sakho eso sinentonga yakho phezu kwemilambo, naphezu kwemijelo,  naphezu kwamachibi, unyuse amasele phezu kwelizwe laseYiputa.
2_8_6_Wasolula ke uAron isandla sakhe phezu kwamanzi aseYiputa;  enyuka amasele, aligubungela ilizwe laseYiputa.
2_8_7_Zenjenjalo nezazi ngobugqi bazo, zawanyusa amasele phezu kwelizwe laseYiputa.
2_8_8_UFaro wabiza uMoses noAron, wathi, Mthandazeni uYehova,  awasuse amasele kum nasebantwini bam; ndobandulula abantu, baye kubingelela kuYehova.
2_8_9_Wathi uMoses kuFaro, Zizukise ngokundimisela ixesha lokuba ndikuthandazele nini na, wena nabakhonzi bakho, nabantu bakho,  anqunyulwe amasele kuwe nakwindlu yakho, asale emlanjeni wodwa.
2_8_10_Wathi yena, Ngomso. Wathi ke, Makube ngokwelizwi lakho,  ukuze wazi ukuba akukho unjengoYehova uThixo wethu;
2_8_11_asuke amasele kuwe, nakwizindlu zakho, nakubakhonzi bakho,  nakubantu bakho; asale emlanjeni wodwa.
2_8_12_Baphuma ke ooMoses noAron kuFaro; wadanduluka uMoses kuYehova ngendawo yamasele abewabeke phezu koFaro.
2_8_13_Wenza uYehova ngokwelizwi likaMoses. Afa amasele ezindlwini, nasezintendelezweni, nasemasimini.
2_8_14_Bawahlanganisa aziimfumba ngeemfumba; lanuka ilizwe.
2_8_15_Uthe ke uFaro akuba nethuba lokuphefumla, wayenza lukhuni intliziyo yakhe, akabaphulaphula, njengoko watshoyo uYehova.
2_8_16_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yithi kuAron, Yolula intonga yakho,  ulubethe uthuli lwelizwe lube ziingcongconi ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_8_17_Benjenjalo. Wasolula uAron isandla sakhe eso sinentonga yakhe, walubetha uthuli lwelizwe, lwaba ziingcongconi ebantwini nasezinkomeni. Lonke uthuli lwelizwe lwaba ziingcongconi ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_8_18_Zenjenjalo nezazi ngobugqi bazo, ukuba zivelise iingcongconi, azaba nako. Kwakho iingcongconi ebantwini nasezinkomeni.
2_8_19_Zathi izazi kuFaro, Ngumnwe kaThixo. Yaba lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, akabaphulaphula, njengoko watshoyo uYehova.
2_8_20_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Vuka kusasa ngomso, ume phambi koFaro, nanko ephuma esiya emanzini; uthi kuye, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza.
2_8_21_Okanye ukuba uthe akwabandulula abantu bam, yabona,  ndithuma izibawu kuwe, nakubakhonzi bakho, nakubantu bakho,  nasezindlwini zakho, zizale izindlu zamaYiputa zizibawu,  nomhlaba akuwo;
2_8_22_ndilibalule ngaloo mini lona ilizwe laseGoshen, abemi kulo abantu bam, kungabikho zibawu khona, ukuze wazi ukuba ndinguYehova phakathi kwelizwe;
2_8_23_ndimise inkululo phakathi kwabantu bam nabantu bakho; lo mqondiso uya kubakho ngomso.
2_8_24_Wenjenjalo uYehova. Kweza izibawu ezininzi endlwini kaFaro,  nasezindlwini zabakhonzi bakhe, nasezweni lonke laseYiputa;  lonakala ilizwe zizibawu.
2_8_25_UFaro wabiza uMoses na-Aron, wathi, Yiyani nibingelele kuThixo wenu kweli lizwe.
2_8_26_Wathi uMoses, Akulungisile ukwenjenjalo; kuba soba sibingelela amasikizi amaYiputa kuYehova uThixo wethu. Ukuba sithe sabingelela into engamasikizi kumaYiputa phambi kwawo,  osixuluba ngamatye.
2_8_27_Siya kuhamba uhambo lweentsuku ezintathu entlango,  sibingelele kuYehova uThixo wethu, njengoko wothi asiyalele.
2_8_28_Wathi uFaro, Ndiya kunindulula nina, niye kubingelela kuYehova uThixo wenu entlango, kodwa ize ningahambi niye kude;  ndithandazeleni.
2_8_29_Wathi uMoses, Yabona, ndiya kuphuma kuwe, ndithandaze kuYehova, zimke izibawu kuFaro, nakubakhonzi bakhe, nakubantu bakhe ngomso, kodwa makangaphindi uFaro akhohlise ngokungabandululi abantu, baye kubingelela kuYehova.
2_8_30_Wemka uMoses, wathandaza kuYehova.
2_8_31_Wenza uYehova ngokwelizwi likaMoses, wazisusa izibawu kuFaro, nakubakhonzi bakhe, nakubantu bakhe; akwasala nasinye.
2_8_32_UFaro wayiqaqadekisa intliziyo yakhe, nangesi sihlandlo,  akabandulula abantu.
2_9_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yiya kuFaro, uthethe naye, uthi,  Utsho uYehova uThixo wamaHebhere, ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam,  baye kundikhonza.
2_9_2_Okanye ukuba uthe akwavuma ukubandulula,
2_9_3_waba usababambile, yabona, isandla sikaYehova soba semfuyweni yakho esendle, emahasheni, emaesileni, ezinkameleni,  ezinkomeni, nasempahleni emfutshane, senze indyikitya yokufa enzima kunene;
2_9_4_uYehova ayibalule imfuyo yamaSirayeli kwimfuyo yamaYiputa:  akuyi kufa nto kuyo yonke eyoonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_9_5_UYehova umise ixesha elithile, wathi, Ngomso uYehova uya kuyenza le nto kweli lizwe.
2_9_6_Wayenza ke uYehova le nto ngengomso. Yafa yonke imfuyo yamaYiputa; ke kweyoonyana bakaSirayeli imfuyo akufanga nanye.
2_9_7_UFaro wasusa umntu. O, kweyamaSirayeli imfuyo akufanga nokuba ibe nye. Yaqaqadeka intliziyo kaFaro, akabandulula abantu.
2_9_8_Wathi uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, Thabathani uthuthu lweziko,  nizalise izandla zozibini, uMoses aluphose phezulu esibhakabhakeni phambi koFaro,
2_9_9_lube luthuli ezweni lonke laseYiputa, lube ngamathumba athe qwele ngamaqhakuva ebantwini, nasezinkomeni, ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_9_10_Baluthabatha ke uthuthu lweziko, bema phambi koFaro; uMoses waluphosa phezulu esibhakabhakeni, lwaba ngamathumba athe qwele ngamaqhakuva ebantwini nasezinkomeni.
2_9_11_Azaba nako izazi ukuma phambi koMoses ngenxa yamathumba;  kuba amathumba abakho kwizazi nakumaYiputa onke.
2_9_12_UYehova wayenza lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, akabaphulaphula,  njengoko watshoyo uYehova kuMoses.
2_9_13_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Vuka kusasa, ume phambi koFaro, uthi kuye, Utsho uYehova uThixo wamaHebhere, ukuthi, Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza.
2_9_14_Kuba ngesi sihlandlo ndithuma zonke izibetho zam entliziyweni yakho, nakubakhonzi bakho, nakubantu bakho, ukuze wazi ukuba akukho unjengam ehlabathini lonke.
2_9_15_Kuba ngoku, ukuba bendithe ndasolula isandla sam,  ndakubetha wena nabantu bakho ngendyikitya yokufa, ngewuthe shwaka akwabakho ehlabathini.
2_9_16_Noko ke ndikumisele eli thuba lokuba ndiwabonakalalise amandla am kuwe, laziswe igama lam ehlabathini lonke.
2_9_17_Unangoku usazenza udonga kubantu bam, akubandululi.
2_9_18_Yabona, eli xa ngomso ndiya kunisa isichotho esinzima kunene, ekungazanga kubekho singangaso eYiputa, kususela kwimini eyasekwayo kude kube ngoku.
2_9_19_Thumela ngoku, ukhawuleze, uhlanganise imfuyo yakho, neento zakho zonke onazo ezindle; bonke abantu neenkomo ezifunyenwe endle zingahlanganiselwanga ekhaya, zohlelwa sisichotho, zife.
2_9_20_Owaloyikayo ilizwi likaYehova kubakhonzi bakaFaro,  wabasabisela ezindlwini abakhonzi bakhe nemfuyo yakhe.
2_9_21_Ongalibekelanga ntliziyo ilizwi likaYehova, wabayeka abakhonzi bakhe nemfuyo yakhe endle.
2_9_22_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yolulela isandla sakho ezulwini,  kubekho isichotho ezweni lonke laseYiputa phezu kwabantu,  naphezu kweenkomo, naphezu kwemifuno yonke yasendle, ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_9_23_UMoses wayolulela intonga yakhe ezulwini; uYehova wathoba indudumo nesichotho, nomlilo wehla weza emhlabeni. UYehova walinisela isichotho ilizwe laseYiputa.
2_9_24_Kwabakho ke isichotho, nomlilo obophene phakathi kwesichotho, sinzima kunene, ekungazanga kubekho singangaso ezweni lonke lamaYiputa, kususela oko aba luhlanga.
2_9_25_Isichotho sayibetha yonke into esendle ezweni lonke laseYiputa, kwathabathela emntwini kwesa enkomeni; sayibetha isichotho yonke imifuno yasendle, sayaphula yonke imithi yasendle.
2_9_26_Kodwa ezweni laseGoshen, apho babekhona oonyana bakaSirayeli, akubangakho sichotho.
2_9_27_Wathuma uFaro, wabiza uMoses noAron, wathi kubo, Ndonile okwesi sihlandlo. UYehova ulilungisa, ke mna nabantu bam asindawo.
2_9_28_Thandazani kuYehova; kwanele ukubakho kweendudumo zikaThixo nesichotho; ndonindulula ningabi sahlala.
2_9_29_UMoses wathi kuye, Ekuphumeni kwam phakathi komzi,  ndozolulela kuYehova izandla zam, ziyeke iindudumo, nesichotho singabi sabakho, ukuze wazi ukuba umhlaba lo ngokaYehova.
2_9_30_Ke wena nabakhonzi bakho, ndiyazi ukuba aniyi kwandula nimoyike uYehova uThixo.
2_9_31_Yabhuqwa iflakisi nerhasi, kuba irhasi ibiselidubule,  neflakisi ibiselityatyambile.
2_9_32_Ke yona ingqolowa nespelete ayibhuqwanga; kuba ibisencinane.
2_9_33_Waphuma uMoses phakathi komzi, wemka kuFaro, wazolulela izandla zakhe kuYehova, zayeka iindudumo nesichotho, yathula imvula emhlabeni.
2_9_34_Wabona uFaro ukuba iphelile imvula nesichotho neendudumo,  waphinda wona, wayiqaqadekisa intliziyo yakhe, yena nabakhonzi bakhe.
2_9_35_Yaba lukhuni ke intliziyo kaFaro, akabandulula oonyana bakaSirayeli, njengoko watshoyo uYehova ngoMoses.
2_10_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yiya kuFaro; kuba mna ndiyiqaqadekisile intliziyo yakhe, nentliziyo yabakhonzi bakhe,  ukuze ndibonakalalise le miqondiso yam phakathi kwalo ilizwe;
2_10_2_ukuze ubalise, ezindlebeni zonyana wakho nezonyana wonyana wakho, izenzo ezincamisileyo endizenzileyo kumaYiputa,  nemiqondiso yam endiyibonakalalisileyo phakathi kwawo, ukuze nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
2_10_3_Waya uMoses noAron kuFaro, bathi kuye, Utsho uYehova,  uThixo wamaHebhere, ukuthi, Kunini na ungavumi ukuzithoba phambi kwam? Bandulule abantu bam, baye kundikhonza.
2_10_4_Okanye ukuba uthe akwavuma ukubandulula abantu bam,  uyabona, ngomso ndozisa iinkumbi emideni yakho;
2_10_5_zibugubungele ubuso belizwe, lingabi nakubonwa ilizwe,  zidle intsalela esindileyo, enisalele esichothweni, zidle yonke imithi enihlumelayo endle;
2_10_6_zizalise izindlu zakho, nezindlu zabakhonzi bakho bonke,  nezindlu zamaYiputa onke: iinkumbi ezingabonwanga ngooyihlo noonyokokhulu, kususela kwiimini ababekho ngazo emhlabeni,  unanamhla. Wajika, waphuma kuFaro.
2_10_7_Bathi abakhonzi bakaFaro kuye, Koda kube nini na, lo engumgibe kuthi? Bandulule abantu, baye kukhonza uYehova uThixo wabo. Akukazi na, kuhleliwe nje, ukuba iYiputa iza kutshabalala?
2_10_8_Baza ooMoses noAron babuyiselwa kwakuFaro; wathi kubo,  Hambani, niye kukhonza uYehova uThixo wenu; kuhamba oobani noobani ke?
2_10_9_Wathi uMoses, Siya kuhamba nolutsha neengwevu zakowethu,  sihambe noonyana bethu neentombi zethu, nempahla yethu emfutshane neenkomo zethu; kuba kuthi ngumthendeleko kaYehova.
2_10_10_Wathi kubo, Makube njalo kambe; uYehova makabe nani,  njengokuba ndinindulula nina nentsapho yenu. Khangelani, kukho ububi phambi kwenu.
2_10_11_Makungabi njalo; makuhambe nina bangamadoda, niye kukhonza uYehova; kuba nibe nifuna oko. Bagxothwa, baphuma ebusweni bukaFaro.
2_10_12_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yolula isandla sakho phezu kwelizwe laseYiputa, kuze iinkumbi, zinyuke kulo ilizwe laseYiputa,  ziyidle yonke imifuno yelizwe eli, yonke into eshiywe sisichotho.
2_10_13_Wayolula uMoses intonga yakhe phezu kwelizwe laseYiputa,  uYehova waqhuba umoya wasempumalanga kwelo lizwe yonke loo mini nobusuku bonke; kwakusa, umoya wasempumalanga wazithwala iinkumbi.
2_10_14_Zenyuka iinkumbi kulo lonke ilizwe laseYiputa; zeza zahlala emideni yonke yaseYiputa, zininzi kunene; ekungazanga phambi kwazo kubekho zinkumbi zingako, kwabe emva kwazo kungasayi kubakho zinjalo.
2_10_15_Zabugubungela ubuso belizwe lonke, laba mnyama ilizwe;  zayidla yonke imifuno yelizwe neziqhamo zonke zemithi,  ezazishiywe sisichotho; akwasala nanye into eluhlaza emthini nasemifunweni yasendle, ezweni lonke laseYiputa.
2_10_16_Wakhawuleza uFaro wabiza uMoses noAron, wathi, Ndonile kuYehova uThixo wenu nakuni.
2_10_17_Kaloku khanisixolele isono sam okwesi sihlandlo sodwa,  nithandaze kuYehova uThixo wenu, akususe kum oku kufa kodwa.
2_10_18_Waphuma kuFaro, wathandaza kuYehova.
2_10_19_UYehova wawuguqula umoya, waba ngowasentshonalanga onamandla kunene, wazithwala iinkumbi, wazidiba eLwandle oluBomvu; akwasala nanye inkumbi, emideni yonke yaseYiputa.
2_10_20_Wayenza lukhuni uYehova intliziyo kaFaro, akabandulula oonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_10_21_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yolulela isandla sakho ezulwini,  kubekho ubumnyama ezweni laseYiputa, ubumnyama obungqingqwa.
2_10_22_Wasolulela uMoses isandla sakhe ezulwini; kwabakho ubumnyama obusithokothoko ezweni lonke laseYiputa imihla emithathu.
2_10_23_Ababonana; akwasuka bani endaweni yakhe imihla emithathu;  ke kubo bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli kwabakho ukukhanya emakhayeni abo.
2_10_24_UFaro wabiza uMoses, wathi, Hambani niye kukhonza uYehova;  kodwa impahla yenu emfutshane neenkomo zenu mazisale; nayo intsapho yenu yohamba nani.
2_10_25_Wathi uMoses, Wena uze usinike imibingelelo namadini anyukayo ezandleni zethu, sibingelele kuYehova uThixo wethu;
2_10_26_nemfuyo yethu ihambe nathi; akuyi kusala nophuphu olunye;  kuba sothabatha kuyo ukukhonza uYehova uThixo wethu; kuba thina asazi ukuba somkhonza ngantoni na uYehova, side sifike khona.
2_10_27_UYehova wayenza lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, akavuma ukubandulula.
2_10_28_Wathi uFaro kuye, Hamba umke kum, uze uzigcine, ungaphindi ububone ubuso bam; kuba mhlana ububonileyo ubuso bam uya kufa.
2_10_29_Wathi uMoses, Utyaphile utsho; andisayi kuphinda ndibubone ubuso bakho.
2_11_1_UYehova wathi kuMoses, Ndisaya kufikisa sibetho sinye phezu koFaro naphezu kweYiputa, emveni koko wonindulula nimke apha;  xa anindulula kuphele, uya kunigxotha kanye, nimke apha.
2_11_2_Khawuthethe ezindlebeni zabantu, ithi inkazana icele kummelwane wayo, indoda icele kummelwane wayo, iimpahla zesilivere neempahla zegolide.
2_11_3_UYehova wabababala abantu emehlweni amaYiputa. Kananjalo indoda leyo inguMoses yayinkulu kunene ezweni laseYiputa kubakhonzi bakaFaro nasebantwini.
2_11_4_Wathi uMoses, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Xa kuphakathi kobusuku,  ndiya kuphuma ndihambe phakathi kweYiputa,
2_11_5_afe onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, ethabathela kumazibulo kaFaro, ohleliyo etroneni yakhe, ese kumazibulo omkhonzazana osemva kwamatye okusila, namazibulo onke eenkomo;
2_11_6_kubekho isikhalo esikhulu ezweni lonke laseYiputa,  ekungazanga kubekho sinjalo, kwaye kungayi kuphinda kubekho sinjalo.
2_11_7_Ke kubo bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli, akukho nja iya kubavungamela, kuthabathela emntwini kuse ezinkomeni; ukuze nazi ukuba uYehova uyawahlula amaYiputa kumaSirayeli;
2_11_8_behle bonke abakhonzi bakho abo, beze kum, baqubude kum,  besithi, Phuma wena nabantu bonke abakulandelayo; ndiphume ke emveni koko. Waza waphuma kuFaro, evutha ngumsindo.
2_11_9_UYehova wathi kuMoses, Akayi kuniphulaphula uFaro, ukuze zande izimanga zam ezweni laseYiputa.
2_11_10_UMoses noAron bazenza ke ezi zimanga zonke phambi koFaro;  uYehova wayenza lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, akabandulula oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni lakhe.
2_12_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron ezweni laseYiputa, wathi,
2_12_2_Le nyanga kuni iyintloko yeenyanga; kuni yeyokuqala ezinyangeni zomnyaka.
2_12_3_Thethani kwibandla lonke lakwaSirayeli, nithi, Ngolweshumi usuku kule nyanga elowo makazithabathele ixhwane, ngokwenzindlu zooyise, ixhwane ngendlu.
2_12_4_Ukuba ithe indlu yancinane exhwaneni, makathabathe ixhwane yena enommelwane wakhe okufuphi nendlu yakhe, ngokwenani labantu; elowo ngangokokudla kwakhe nombalela exhwaneni.
2_12_5_Ixhwane lenu malibe liduna eligqibeleleyo, elimnyaka mnye;  nolithabatha ezigusheni nokuba kusezibhokhweni.
2_12_6_Nize niligcine kude kube lusuku lweshumi elinesine lwale nyanga, silixhele ke sonke isikhungu sebandla lakwaSirayeli lakutshona ilanga;
2_12_7_bacaphule egazini, baliqabe emigubasini yomibini nasemqadini wezindlu eliya kudlelwa kuzo ngabo;
2_12_8_bayidle inyama ngobo busuku, yosiwe ngomlilo, inezonka ezingenagwele, bayidle nemithana ekrakra.
2_12_9_Musani ukudla ndawo ikrwada kuyo, nandawo ikuphekwa iphekwe ngamanzi; mayosiwe ngomlilo: intloko yalo namanqina alo nezibilini zalo.
2_12_10_Nize ningasalisi ndawo yalo kude kuse; okuseleyo kulo kwada kwasa nokutshisa ngomlilo.
2_12_11_Nize nenjenje ukulidla; nodla nibhinqile, nineembadada ezinyaweni zenu, ninentonga esandleni senu, nilidle buphuthuphuthu: leyo yipasika kuYehova.
2_12_12_Ndiya kucanda ezweni laseYiputa ngobu busuku, ndibethe onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, ndithabathele emntwini ndise enkomeni, ndenze izigwebo koothixo bonke baseYiputa, mna Yehova.
2_12_13_Igazi elo loba ngumqondiso kuni ezindlwini enikuzo.  Ndolibona igazi, ndigqithe kuni, singabikho kuni isibetho esonakalisayo, ekulibetheni kwam ilizwe laseYiputa.
2_12_14_Le mini yoba sisikhumbuzo kuni, niyenze umthendeleko kuYehova; ezizukulwaneni zenu niyenze ummiselo ongunaphakade.
2_12_15_Nodla izonka ezingenagwele iintsuku zibe sixhenxe;  kwangosuku lokuqala nolisusa igwele ezindlwini zenu; kuba bonke abadla isonka esinegwele, kususela kolokuqala kude kube lusuku lwesixhenxe, bonqanyulwa bangabikho kwaSirayeli.
2_12_16_Ngomhla wokuqala kobakho intlanganiso engcwele, nangomhla wesixhenxe kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni. Akuyi kwenziwa msebenzi ngawo, ingengulowo wokudla komntu; nguwo wodwa eningazenzelayo.
2_12_17_Nize nigcine umthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele; kuba kanye ngayo loo mini ndayikhupha imikhosi yenu ezweni laseYiputa; niwugcine loo mhla kwizizukulwana zenu, ube ngummiselo ongunaphakade.
2_12_18_Ngeyokuqala inyanga, ngosuku lweshumi elinesine enyangeni leyo, ngokuhlwa, nodla izonka ezingenagwele, kude kuse kusuku lwamashumi omabini analunye lwenyanga leyo, ngokuhlwa.
2_12_19_Ze kungafunyanwa gwele ezindlwini zenu iintsuku ezisixhenxe; kuba bonke abadla into enegwele bonqanyulwa bangabikho ebandleni lakwaSirayeli, nokuba ngumphambukeli,  nokuba ngozalelwe kuloo ndawo.
2_12_20_Yonke into enegwele nize ningayidli; emakhayeni enu onke nodla izonka ezingenagwele.
2_12_21_Wawabiza uMoses onke amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli, wathi kuwo, Hambani niye, nizithabathele ixhwane ngokwemizalwane yenu, nixhele ipasika.
2_12_22_Nithabathe isipha sehisope, nisithi nkxu egazini elisengqayini, niqabe emqadini nasemigubasini yomibini ngegazi elisengqayini; ke kuni ze kungaphumi mntu emnyango wendlu yakhe kude kuse.
2_12_23_UYehova uya kucanda, awabulale amaYiputa. Akulibona igazi emqadini nasemigubasini yomibini, wogqitha uYehova emnyango,  angamvumeli umonakalisi ukuba angene ezindlwini zenu, abulale.
2_12_24_Woligcina elo zwi libe ngummiselo kuwe, nakoonyana bakho kude kuse ephakadeni.
2_12_25_Nothi, nakufika ezweni aya kuninika uYehova, njengoko watshoyo, niyigcine le nkonzo.
2_12_26_Kothi, xa bathe oonyana benu kuni, Iyintoni na le nkonzo kuni?
2_12_27_nithi ke, Ngumbingelelo wepasika kuYehova, owagqitha ezindlwini zoonyana bakaSirayeli eYiputa; ekubulaleni kwakhe amaYiputa, wazihlangula izindlu zethu.
2_12_28_Bathoba abantu, baqubuda. Bahamba oonyana bakaSirayeli,  baya kwenza; njengoko uYehova wabawisela umthetho uMoses noAron, benjenjalo.
2_12_29_Kwathi ke phakathi kobusuku, uYehova wawabulala onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, kwathabathela kowamazibulo kaFaro ohleliyo etroneni yakhe, kwasa kowamazibulo omthinjwa osentolongweni engumhadi, namazibulo onke eenkomo.
2_12_30_Wavuka uFaro ebusuku, yena nabakhonzi bakhe bonke,  namaYiputa onke; kwabakho isikhalo esikhulu eYiputa; kuba akubangakho ndlu ingenamntu ufileyo.
2_12_31_Wabiza uMoses noAron ebusuku, wathi, Sukani niphume phakathi kwabantu bam, nina aba noonyana bakaSirayeli, nihambe niye kumkhonza uYehova, njengokutsho kwenu;
2_12_32_nempahla yenu emfutshane neenkomo zenu zithabatheni,  njengoko natshoyo, nihambe; nam nindisikelele.
2_12_33_AmaYiputa ajokisa ukubandulula abantu ngobungxamo kwelo zwe; kuba abesithi, Sonke sesifile.
2_12_34_Abantu bayithabatha intlama yabo ingekabi nagwele,  imikhumbi yabo yokuxovulela isongelwe ezingutyeni zabo,  ibotshelelwe emagxeni abo.
2_12_35_Oonyana bakaSirayeli benza ngokwelizwi likaMoses; bacela kumaYiputa iimpahla zesilivere, neempahla zegolide, neengubo.
2_12_36_UYehova wabababala abantu phambi kwamaYiputa, abenza ukuba bacele. Bawaphanga ke amaYiputa.
2_12_37_Banduluka ke oonyana bakaSirayeli eRameses, baya eSukoti,  amadoda eenyawo engathi akumakhulu omathandathu amawaka,  ngaphandle kosapho.
2_12_38_Kwenyuka ke nabo inkitha engumxube, nempahla emfutshane,  neenkomo, imfuyo eninzi kunene.
2_12_39_Bosa amaqebengwana angenagwele entlama, ababephume nayo eYiputa, kuba ibingenagwele; kuba bagxothwa eYiputa ababa nakulibala, kananjalo babengazenzelanga mphako.
2_12_40_Ke ukuhlala koonyana bakaSirayeli, abakuhlalayo eYiputa,  yiminyaka emakhulu mane aneminyaka emanci mathathu.
2_12_41_Ekupheleni kweminyaka emakhulu mane, aneminyaka emanci mathathu, kwathi, kanye ngayo loo mini, yaphuma yonke imikhosi kaYehova ezweni laseYiputa.
2_12_42_Bubusuku obo bokugcina kukaYehova, kuba wabakhupha ezweni laseYiputa. Bubusuku bukaYehova obo bokugcinwa ngoonyana bakaSirayeli bonke, ezizukulwaneni zabo.
2_12_43_Wathi uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, Ummiselo wepasika ngulo:  Bonke oonyana bolunye uhlanga abasayi kudla kuyo.
2_12_44_Onke amakhoboka, abantu abazuzwe ngemali, uze uwaluse,  andule ke ukudla kuyo.
2_12_45_Olundwendwe nongumqeshwa akasayi kudla kuyo.
2_12_46_Yodlelwa ndlwini-nye; akusayi kusa nto yaloo nyama ngaphandle kwendlu, anisayi kwaphula thambo layo.
2_12_47_Lonke ibandla lakwaSirayeli loyenza loo nto.
2_12_48_Xa athe owasemzini waphambukela kuwe, wenza ipasika kuYehova, mayaluswe yonke into eyindoda kuye, andule ke ukusondela, ayenze, abe njengozalelwe kwelo zwe; bonke abangaluswanga abasayi kudla kuyo.
2_12_49_Woba mnye umyalelo, kozalelwe kwelo zwe, nakowasemzini ophambukele phakathi kwenu.
2_12_50_Benza ke bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli; njengoko uYehova wabawisela umthetho uMoses noAron, benjenjalo.
2_12_51_Kwathi, ngayo kanye loo mini, uYehova wabakhupha oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni laseYiputa ngokwemikhosi yabo.
2_13_1_UYehova wathetha kuMoses, wathi,
2_13_2_Ndingcwalisele onke amazibulo, yonke into evula isizalo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, kumntu nakwinkomo; yeyam.
2_13_3_Wathi uMoses ebantwini, Yikhumbuleni le mini niphume ngayo eYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka; kuba uYehova unikhuphe kule ndawo ngesithe nkqi isandla; ize ke kungadliwa nto inegwele.
2_13_4_Lo ngumhla eniphume ngawo ngenyanga enguAbhibhi.
2_13_5_Kothi, xa uYehova anifikisileyo ezweni lamaKanan, lamaHiti,  lama-Amori, lamaHivi, lamaYebhusi, awalifungela ooyihlo ukubanika, izwe elibaleka amasi nobusi, ukhonze ngale nkonzo kule nyanga:
2_13_6_nidle izonka ezingenagwele iintsuku ezisixhenxe; ke usuku lwesixhenxe lungumthendeleko kuYehova;
2_13_7_izonka ezingenagwele zodliwa iintsuku ezisixhenxe;  kungabonwa kuwe nto inegwele, kungabonwa gwele kuwe emideni yakho yonke.
2_13_8_Uze umxelele unyana wakho ngaloo mini, uthi, Ndikwenza oku ngenxa yoko uYehova wakwenzayo kum ekuphumeni kwam eYiputa;
2_13_9_kuze kube ngumqondiso kuwe osesandleni sakho, ube sisikhumbuzo phakathi kwamehlo akho, ukuze umyalelo kaYehova ube semlonyeni wakho; kuba uYehova ukukhuphe eYiputa ngesithe nkqi isandla.
2_13_10_Uze uwugcine lo mmiselo ngexesha lawo elimisiweyo imihla kamihla.
2_13_11_Kothi, xa akufikisileyo uYehova ezweni lamaKanan, njengoko wafungayo kuwe nakooyihlo, wakunika lona,
2_13_12_uyidlulisele kuYehova yonke into evula isizalo, into yonke elizibulo lenkomo, oya kuba nayo; amaduna oba ngakaYehova.
2_13_13_Into yonke elizibulo le-esile woyikhulula ngokuyimisela ngexhwane; ke ukuba uthe akwayikhulula ngokuyimisela, woyaphula ilungu lentamo. Yonke into elizibulo lomntu koonyana bakho,  nayo woyikhulula ngokuyimisela.
2_13_14_Kothi, xa unyana wakho akubuzayo ngexesha elizayo, esithi,  Yintoni na le nto? uze uthi kuye, UYehova wasikhupha eYiputa,  endlwini yobukhoboka, ngesithe nkqi isandla;
2_13_15_kwathi, xa uFaro wayelukhuni ukusindulula, uYehova wawabulala onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, ethabathela kwizibulo lomntu, wesa kwizibulo lenkomo; kungenxa yoko, le nto ndibingelela kuYehova yonke into evula isizalo eliduna,  ndiyikhulule ngokuyimisela yonke into elizibulo koonyana bam;
2_13_16_ibe ngumqondiso esandleni sakho, ibe sisikhumbuzo phakathi kwamehlo akho, kuba uYehova wasikhupha eYiputa ngesithe nkqi isandla.
2_13_17_Kwathi, akubandulula uFaro abantu, uThixo akabakhokela ngendlela yelizwe lamaFilisti, nakuba ibimfutshane yona: kuba wathi uThixo, hleze abantu bazohlwaye bakubona imfazwe,  babuyele eYiputa.
2_13_18_UThixo wabazungulezisa abantu ngendlela yentlango yoLwandle oluBomvu. Banyuka bexhobile oonyana bakaSirayeli,  bevela ezweni laseYiputa.
2_13_19_UMoses wawathabatha wahamba nawo amathambo kaYosefu; kuba wayebafungisile nokubafungisa oonyana bakaSirayeli, esithi,  UThixo uya kunivelela okunene; nize niwanyuse amathambo am,  emke nani kule ndawo.
2_13_20_Banduluka eSukoti, balalisa e-Etam, enyeleni yentlango.
2_13_21_UYehova wahamba phambi kwabo ngomqulu welifu emini,  ebakhokela ngendlela; ngomqulu womlilo ebusuku, ebakhanyisela,  ukuze bahambe imini nobusuku.
2_13_22_Awusukanga umqulu welifu emini, nomqulu womlilo ebusuku,  phambi kwabantu.
2_14_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi,
2_14_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli ukuba bajike, bamise iintente phambi kwePi-hahiroti, phakathi kweMigdoli nolwandle, phambi kweBhahali-tsefon, malunga nayo, nimise ngaselwandle.
2_14_3_Uya kuthi uFaro ngoonyana bakaSirayeli, Badidekile ezweni,  intlango ibavingcele.
2_14_4_Ndoyenza lukhuni intliziyo kaFaro, abasukele, ndizukiseke ngoFaro nangempi yakhe yonke, azi amaYiputa ukuba ndinguYehova.  Benjenjalo ke.
2_14_5_Waxelelwa ukumkani waseYiputa, ukuba abantu babalekile;  yaba yeyimbi intliziyo kaFaro neyabakhonzi bakhe kubantu,  bathi, Siyenzele ntoni na le nto, yokusuka simndulule uSirayeli ekusikhonzeni?
2_14_6_Wayibopha inqwelo yakhe yokulwa, wabathabatha abantu bakhe,  bahamba naye.
2_14_7_Wathabatha amakhulu omathandathu eenqwelo zokulwa ezikhethiweyo, neenqwelo zonke zokulwa zaseYiputa,  nabaphathi-mikhosi phezu kwazo zonke ziphela.
2_14_8_UYehova wayenza lukhuni ke intliziyo kaFaro ukumkani waseYiputa, wabasukela oonyana bakaSirayeli, baye oonyana bakaSirayeli bephume ngesandla esiphakamileyo.
2_14_9_AmaYiputa abasukela, enamahashe onke eenqwelo zokulwa kaFaro, nakhwelwayo akhe, nempi yakhe, afika kubo bemise iintente ngaselwandle, ngasePi-hahiroti phambi kweBhahali-tsefon.
2_14_10_Wasondela uFaro. Bawaphakamisa amehlo abo oonyana bakaSirayeli, nango amaYiputa efake emva kwabo. Boyika kunene,  bakhala oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova.
2_14_11_Bathi kuMoses, kungokuba bekungekho mangcwaba na eYiputa,  le nto usithabathileyo ukuba sifele entlango apha? Yini na ukuba usenze into enje, usikhuphe eYiputa?
2_14_12_Asililo na eli ilizwi ebesilithetha kuwe eYiputa, sisithi,  Siyeke, siwakhonze amaYiputa? Kuba kube kusilungele kanye ukuba sikhonze amaYiputa, kunokuba sifele entlango apha.
