2_14_13_Wathi uMoses ebantwini, Musani ukoyika; misani, nilubone usindiso lukaYehova aya kunenzela lona namhla; kuba amaYiputa lawo niwabonileyo namhlanje, anisayi kuphinda niwabone naphakade.
2_14_14_UYehova uya kunilwela, ke nina niya kuthi cwaka.
2_14_15_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yini na ukuba ukhale kum? Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, banduluke.
2_14_16_Ke wena, phakamisa intonga yakho, wolule isandla sakho phezu kolwandle, ulwahlule, bahambe oonyana bakaSirayeli phakathi kolwandle, emhlabeni owomileyo.
2_14_17_Mna ke, yabona, ndiya kuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zamaYiputa, angene emva kwabo, ndizukiseke ngoFaro, nangempi yakhe yonke, ngeenqwelo zakhe zokulwa, nangabamahashe bakhe;
2_14_18_azi amaYiputa ukuba ndinguYehova, ekuzukisekeni kwam ngoFaro nangeenqwelo zakhe zokulwa nangabamahashe bakhe.
2_14_19_Sesuka isithunywa sikaThixo, esibe sihamba phambi kwemfuduka yamaSirayeli, sahamba emva kwayo. Wesuka umqulu welifu phambi kwayo, wema emva kwayo;
2_14_20_wathi zinzi phakathi kwempi yamaYiputa, nemfuduka yamaSirayeli. Kwabakho ilifu nobumnyama kumaYiputa,  labukhanyisela ubusuku kumaSirayeli; akasondelana ubusuku bonke.
2_14_21_UMoses wasolula isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, walumkisa uYehova ulwandle ngomoya wasempumalanga onamandla, bonke obo busuku, walwenza umhlaba owomileyo ulwandle, ahlulelana amanzi.
2_14_22_Bangena oonyana bakaSirayeli elwandle phakathi,  kowomileyo; asuka amanzi aba ludonga ngasekunene nangasekhohlo.
2_14_23_Asukela amaYiputa, angena emva kwabo elwandle phakathi,  enamahashe onke kaFaro, neenqwelo zakhe zokulwa, nabamahashe bakhe.
2_14_24_Kwathi ngomlindo wokusa, uYehova waqondela empini yamaYiputa esemqulwini womlilo nelifu; wayidubaduba impi yamaYiputa.
2_14_25_Wayidonyula imilenze yeenqwelo zawo zokulwa, aziqhuba nzima. Athi amaYiputa, Masisabe phambi kwamaSirayeli, kuba uYehova uyawalwela, esilwa namaYiputa.
2_14_26_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yolula isandla sakho phezu kolwandle, amanzi abuyele phezu kwamaYiputa, phezu kweenqwelo zawo zokulwa, naphezu kwabamahashe bawo.
2_14_27_Wasolula uMoses isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, ulwandle lwabuyela ebumeni balo, ukuthi qhiphu kokusa; asaba amaYiputa asinga kulo. UYehova wawavuthululela amaYiputa phakathi elwandle.
2_14_28_Abuya amanzi, azigubungela iingqwelo zokulwa, nabamahashe,  nempi yonke kaFaro eyayingene emva kwawo elwandle; akwasala noko amnye kuwo.
2_14_29_Bona oonyana bakaSirayeli bahamba emhlabeni owomileyo phakathi elwandle; asuka amanzi aba ludonga ngasekunene nangasekhohlo.
2_14_30_Wawasindisa uYehova ngaloo mini amaSirayeli esandleni samaYiputa; amaSirayeli awabona amaYiputa efile elunxwemeni lolwandle.
2_14_31_Asibona amaSirayeli isandla esikhulu asibonakalalisileyo uYehova kumaYiputa. Bamoyika, abantu uYehova, bakholwa nguYehova, nanguMoses umkhonzi wakhe.
2_15_1_Waza uMoses wahlabela le ngoma kuYehova, enoonyana bakaSirayeli, batsho ukuthi: Ndiya kuhlabela kuYehova, kuba enobungangamsha obukhulu, Ihashe nomkhweli walo ulizulumbele elwandle.
2_15_2_Uqhayiya lam, ungoma yam nguYehova; Waba lusindiso kum.  UloThixo wam endimzukisayo, UThixo kabawo endimphakamisayo.
2_15_3_UYehova yindoda elwayo, UYehova ligama lakhe.
2_15_4_Iinqwelo zokulwa zikaFaro nempi yakhe waziphosa elwandle;  Abahleliweyo kubaphathi-mikhosi bakhe batshoniswe eLwandle oluBomvu.
2_15_5_Amanzi enzonzobila abagubungele. Behlela ezinzulwini njengelitye.
2_15_6_Isandla sakho sokunene, Yehova, sivethe amandla; Isandla sakho sokunene, Yehova, sivikiva utshaba.
2_15_7_Ngobukhulu bobungangamsha bakho ubagungxule abachasi bakho;  Ukhupha ukuvutha kwakho, kubadle bona njengeendiza.
2_15_8_Ngokufutha kwamathatha akho afunjwa amanzi, Yema njengemfumba imiqukuqela. Ajiya amanzi enzonzobila embilinini yolwandle.
2_15_9_Lwathi utshaba, Ndiyasukela, ndiyafumana, Ndaba ixhoba,  umxhelo wam uyazanelisa kubo; Ndirhola ikrele lam, siya kubagqogqa isandla sam.
2_15_10_Wafutha ngomoya wakho, lwabagubungela ulwandle;  Bazulumbeka njengelothe emanzini angangamsha.
2_15_11_Ngubani na onjengawe phakathi koothixo, Yehova? Ngubani na onjengawe, wena uvethe ubungcwele, Woyikekayo ezindumisweni,  wenzayo ngokubalulekileyo?
2_15_12_Wolula isandla sakho sokunene, Umhlaba uyabaginya.
2_15_13_Uyabakhokela ngenceba yakho abantu aba ubahlawuleleyo,  ubakhululeyo. Ngoqilima lwakho ubathundezela ekhayeni lakho elingcwele.
2_15_14_Zivile izizwe, ziyangqunga, Abemi baseFilisti babanjwe kukuzibhijabhija,
2_15_15_Zaza zakhwankqa izikhulu zakwaEdom; Iinjengele zakwaMowabhi zabanjwa kukuthuthumela, Batha amandla bonke abemi belakwaKanan.
2_15_16_Bawelwa kukudenga nakukunkwantya, Ngenxa yobukhulu bengalo yakho bathi cwaka njengelitye, Bade badlule abantu bakho,  Yehova, Bade badlule abo bantu ubazuzileyo.
2_15_17_Uya kubangenisa, ubatyale entabeni yelifa lakho, Endaweni oyenzele ukuba uhlale kuyo, Yehova, Engcweleni eziyilungisileyo izandla zakho.
2_15_18_UYehova uya kuba ngukumkani ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
2_15_19_Kuba langena elwandle ihashe likaFaro nenqwelo yakhe yokulwa, nabamahashe bakhe. UYehova wawabuyisela phezu kwabo amanzi olwandle; ke bona oonyana bakaSirayeli bahamba kowomileyo, phakathi elwandle.
2_15_20_UMiriyam umprofetikazi, udade boAron, wathabatha ingqongqo ngesandla sakhe; aphuma onke amankazana emva kwakhe,  eneengqongqo engqungqa.
2_15_21_Wawaphendula uMiriyam wathi, Vumani kuYehova, kuba enobungangamsha obukhulu; Ihashe nomkhweli walo ulizulumbele elwandle.
2_15_22_UMoses wawandulula amaSirayeli, emka eLwandle oluBomvu,  aphuma aya entlango yaseShure; ahamba iintsuku zantathu entlango, akafumana manzi.
2_15_23_Afika eMara, akaba nakuwasela amanzi aseMara, kuba ayekrakra; ngenxa yoko igama laloo ndawo kwathiwa yiMara.
2_15_24_Abantu bamkrokrela uMoses, besithi, Siya kusela ntoni na?  Wadanduluka kuYehova.
2_15_25_UYehova wambonisa umthi; wawuphosa emanzini, aba mnandi amanzi. Khona apho wabamisela ummiselo nesiko, khona apho wabavavanya.
2_15_26_Wathi, Ukuba uthe waliphulaphula izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, wenza okuthe tye phambi kwakhe, wayibekela indlebe imithetho yakhe, wayigcina yonke imimiselo yakhe: andiyi kubeka nasinye isifo phezu kwakho endisibekileyo phezu kwamaYiputa;  kuba ndinguYehova, igqirha lakho.
2_15_27_Bafika e-Elim, apho kwaye kukho imithombo yamanzi elishumi elinamibini, nemithi yesundu engamashumi osixhenxe, bazimisa iintente khona ngasemanzini.
2_16_1_Lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli landuluka e-Elim,  lafika entlango yaseSin, ephakathi kwe-Elim, neSinayi, ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu lwenyanga yesibini yokuphuma kwabo ezweni laseYiputa.
2_16_2_Labakrokrela ooMoses noAron lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli entlango apho.
2_16_3_Bathi oonyana bakaSirayeli kubo, Akwaba besife sisandla sikaYehova ezweni laseYiputa, xa sasihleli ngasezimbizeni zenyama, sisidla isonka sada sahlutha; ngokuba nisikhuphele kule ntlango, ukuze nisibhubhise sonke esi sikhungu ngendlala.
2_16_4_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Uyabona, ndiya kuninisela isonka sivela ezulwini; baphume abantu, babuthe isabelo semini esilingene imini, ukuze ndibalinge ukuba bohamba ngomyalelo wam, abayi kuhamba ngawo, kusini na.
2_16_5_Kothi ngemini yesithandathu, balungise oko bakuzisileyo;  koba ngumlinganiselo ophindwe kabini kunoko bathe bakubutha imihla ngemihla.
2_16_6_Wathi uMoses noAron koonyana bakaSirayeli bonke, Ngokuhlwa niya kwazi ukuba nguYehova owanikhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa;
2_16_7_kusasa niya kububona ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, ekubeni ekuvile ukumkrokrela kwenu uYehova. Thina besingoobani na ukuba nisikrokrele?
2_16_8_Wathi uMoses, Niya kububona ekuthini uYehova aninike inyama ngokuhlwa, nidle isonka kusasa, nihluthe; ekubeni uYehova ekuvile ukukrokra kwenu enimkrokrela ngako. Ke thina singoobani na? Anikrokreli thina, nikrokrela uYehova.
2_16_9_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Yithi kwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, Sondelani phambi koYehova; kuba ukuvile ukukrokra kwenu.
2_16_10_Ke kaloku, xa wayethetha uAron kwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, bakhangela entlango, nabo ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova bubonakala efini.
2_16_11_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi,
2_16_12_Ndikuvile ukukrokra koonyana bakaSirayeli. Thetha nabo uthi, Lakutshona ilanga nodla inyama, kusasa nohlutha sisonka;  nazi ukuba ndinguYehova uThixo wenu.
2_16_13_Kwathi ngokuhlwa zenyuka izagwityi, zayigubungela iminquba yonke; kusasa kwabakho umbethe olele ngeenxa zonke eminqubeni.
2_16_14_Wenyuka umbethe obulele, nanko kukho phezu komhlaba entlango intwana apha ecolekileyo, ejiyileyo, encinanana njengeqabaka emhlabeni.
2_16_15_Bayibona oonyana bakaSirayeli, bathi omnye komnye,  Yintoni? Kuba babengazi ukuba yintoni na. Wathi uMoses kubo,  Sesi sonka aninika sona uYehova, ukuba sibe kukudla.
2_16_16_Le yiloo nto wawisa umthetho ngayo uYehova, wathi, Buthani yona, elowo ngangokudla kwakhe, ihomere ngentloko yomntu,  ngokwenani labantu, elowo athabathele abasententeni yakhe.
2_16_17_Benjenjalo oonyana bakaSirayeli; babutha omnye kakhulu,  omnye kancinane.
2_16_18_Balinganisela ngehomere; akagqithisa obuthe kakhulu;  akasilela obuthe kancinane; babutha elowo ngangokudla kwakhe.
2_16_19_Wathi kubo uMoses, Umntu makangabeki mbeko.
2_16_20_Abamphulaphulanga uMoses. Inxenye yayibeka umbeko; yabola,  yaba neempethu, yanuka. UMoses waba noburhalarhume kubo.
2_16_21_Bayibutha imiso ngemiso, elowo ngangokudla kwakhe; lathi lakufudumala ilanga yanyibilika.
2_16_22_Kwathi ngemini yesithandathu, babutha isonka semihla emibini, iihomere ezimbini mntwini mnye. Zangena zonke izikhulu zebandla, zamxelela uMoses.
2_16_23_Wathi kuzo, Yiyo loo nto ayithethileyo uYehova, Ngomso luphumlo; yisabatha engcwele kuYehova; yosani enikosayo,  phekani enikuphekayo, zibekeleni yonke into eseleyo, igcinwe kude kuse.
2_16_24_Bayibeka ke kwada kwasa, njengoko uMoses wabawisela umthetho; ayanuka, akwabakho mpethu kuyo.
2_16_25_Wathi uMoses Yidleni namhla; kuba namhla yisabatha kuYehova; namhla aniyi kuyifumana endle.
2_16_26_Noyibutha imihla emithandathu; ngomhla wesixhenxe yisabatha; ayi kubakho ngawo.
2_16_27_Kuthe ngomhla wesixhenxe, kwaphuma inxenye yabantu, yaya kubutha, ayafumana nto.
2_16_28_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Kuya kuda kube nini na, ningavumi ukuyigcina imithetho yam nemiyalelo yam?
2_16_29_Niyabona ke, uYehova uninike isabatha; kungenxa yoko athe ngomhla wesithandathu waninika isonka semihla emibini. Hlalani elowo endaweni yakhe; makungaphumi mntu endaweni yakhe ngomhla wesixhenxe.
2_16_30_Baye bephumla ke abantu ngomhla wesixhenxe.
2_16_31_Indlu kaSirayeli yathi igama lale nto yimana.  Yayinjengembewu yekoriyandire, imhlophe, isongo sayo sinjengezonkana ezinobusi.
2_16_32_Wathi uMoses, Nantsi into awise umthetho ngayo uYehova:  zalisani ihomere ngayo, igcinelwe izizukulwana zenu, ukuze zisibone isonka endinidlise sona entlango, ekunikhupheni ezweni laseYiputa.
2_16_33_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Thabatha isitya sibe sinye, ugalele ihomere kuso sizale yimana, uyibeke phambi koYehova, igcinelwe izizukulwana zenu;
2_16_34_igcinwe njengoko uYehova wamwisela uMoses umthetho ngako.  Wayibeka uAron phambi kwesingqino, ukuba igcinwe.
2_16_35_Bayidla oonyana bakaSirayeli imana iminyaka emashumi mane,  bada bafika ezweni elimiweyo; bayidla imana bada bafika emdeni welizwe lakwaKanan
2_16_36_Ke ihomere isisahlulo seshumi se-efa.
2_17_1_Landuluka lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli entlango yaseSin ngokweehambo zabo, ngelizwi likaYehova; bazimisa iintente eRefidim. Akwabakho manzi okuselwa ngabantu.
2_17_2_Babambana abantu noMoses, bathi, Sinike amanzi, sisele.  Wathi uMoses kubo, Yini na ukuba nibambane nam? Yini na ukuba nimlinge uYehova?
2_17_3_Banxanelwa amanzi apho abantu; abantu bamkrokrela uMoses,  bathi, Yini na ukuba usinyuse siphume eYiputa, nosapho lwethu,  nemfuyo yethu, uze kusibhubhisa ngenxano?
2_17_4_UMoses wadanduluka kuYehova, esithi, Ndiya kubathini na aba bantu? Sekukancinane ukuba bandixulube ngamatye.
2_17_5_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Gqithela phambi kwabantu, uthabathe amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli abe nawe; uthi nentonga yakho,  owawubetha ngayo umlambo, uyiphathe esandleni sakho, uhambe.
2_17_6_Yabona, ndiya kuma phambi kwakho khona, phezu kweliwa eHorebhe; uze ulibethe iliwa; kophuma amanzi kulo, basele abantu. Wenjenjalo ke uMoses phambi kwawo amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli.
2_17_7_Wathi igama laloo ndawo yiMasa neMeribha, ngenxa yokubambana koonyana bakaSirayeli, nangenxa yokumlinga kwabo uYehova, besithi, UYehova ukho na phakathi kwethu, akakho,  kusini na?
2_17_8_UAmaleki weza, walwa noSirayeli eRefidim.
2_17_9_Wathi uMoses kuYoshuwa, Sihlelele amadoda; uze wena uphume ulwe noAmaleki; mna ngomso ndiya kuma encotsheni yenduli,  intonga kaThixo isesandleni sam. Wenza uYoshuwa njengoko wathethayo uMoses kuye, walwa noAmaleki;
2_17_10_bona ooMoses na-Aron noHure benyuka baya encotsheni yenduli.
2_17_11_Kwathi, xa aziphakamisileyo uMoses izandla, kweyisa uSirayeli; kwathi xa azihlisileyo izandla, kweyisa uAmaleki.
2_17_12_Izandla zikaMoses zadinwa. Bathabatha ilitye, balibeka phantsi kwakhe, wahlala kulo; bathi ooAron noHure bazixhasa izandla zakhe, omnye engapha, nomnye engaphaya. Zazimaseka izandla zakhe, lada ilanga latshona.
2_17_13_UYoshuwa wamchitha uAmaleki nabantu bakowabo ngohlangothi lwekrele.
2_17_14_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Kubhale oku kube sisikhumbuzo encwadini, ukuthethe ezindlebeni zikaYoshuwa; ngokuba ndiya kusicima impela isikhumbuzo sika-Amaleki phantsi kwamazulu.
2_17_15_UMoses wakha isibingelelo, wathi igama laso nguYehova-ibhanile-yam.
2_17_16_Wathi, Isandla siphakanyiselwe etroneni kaYehova, ukuba uYehova uya kulwa imfazwe noAmaleki isizukulwana ngesizukulwana.
2_18_1_UYitro, umbingeleli wakwaMidiyan, uyise womkaMoses, wayiva yonke into uThixo abeyenzele uMoses, namaSirayeli abantu bakhe,  ukuba uYehova uwakhuphile amaSirayeli eYiputa.
2_18_2_UYitro, uyise womkaMoses, wamthabatha uTsipora, umkaMoses,  emveni kokuba ebemndulule,
2_18_3_noonyana bakhe bobabini; igama lomnye lalinguGershom, kuba wathi, Bendingumphambukeli ezweni lolunye uhlanga; igama lomnye lalinguEliyezere,
2_18_4_kuba wathi, UThixo kabawo ubengumncedi wam, wandihlangula ekreleni likaFaro.
2_18_5_UYitro, uyise womkaMoses, weza ke noonyana bakhe nomkakhe,  kuMoses entlango, apho wayemise khona intente, entabeni kaThixo.
2_18_6_Wathi kuMoses, Mna Yitro, unguyihlo, ndize kuwe,  ndinomkakho enoonyana bakhe bobabini.
2_18_7_Waphuma uMoses, waya kumkhawulela uyise womkakhe, waqubuda,  wamanga; babuzana impilo, bangena ententeni.
2_18_8_UMoses wambalisela uyise womkakhe yonke into uYehova abeyenzile kuFaro nakumaYiputa ngenxa kaSirayeli; nenkxamleko yonke abayifumanayo endleleni, nokuhlangulwa kwabo nguYehova.
2_18_9_Wavuya uYitro akukuva konke ukulunga abekwenzile uYehova kuSirayeli, ngokumhlangula esandleni samaYiputa.
2_18_10_Wathi uYitro, Makabongwe uYehova owanihlangulayo esandleni samaYiputa, nasesandleni sikaDaro; owabahlangulayo abantu,  baphuma phantsi kwesandla samaYiputa.
2_18_11_Ngoku ndiyazi ukuba uYehova mkhulu koothixo bonke; ewe,  kwakuloo nto amaYiputa abewakhukhumalele ngayo amaSirayeli.
2_18_12_UYitro, uyise womkaMoses, wamthabathela uThixo idini elinyukayo nemibingelelo; weza uAron namadoda amakhulu onke akwaSirayeli, esiza kudla isonka noyise womkaMoses phambi koThixo.
2_18_13_Kwathi ngengomso, uMoses wahlala wathetha amatyala abantu;  abantu baxhontela kuMoses, kususela kusasa kwada kwangokuhlwa.
2_18_14_Wayibona uyise womkaMoses yonke into abeyenza ebantwini,  wathi, Iyintoni na le nto uyenzayo ebantwini? Kungani na, le nto uhlala wedwa, bathi bona bonke abantu baxhontele kuwe,  kususela kusasa kude kuhlwe?
2_18_15_Wathi uMoses kuyise womkakhe, Kungokuba abantu besiza kum ukuba ndibacelele icebo kuThixo;
2_18_16_xa banendawo, beza kum ukuba ndigwebe phakathi komntu nommelwane wakhe, ndibazise imimiselo kaThixo nemiyalelo yakhe.
2_18_17_Wathi uyise womkaMoses kuye,
2_18_18_Ayilungile le nto uyenzayo. Uya kuzigqiba uphele amandla,  naba bantu unabo; kuba lo msebenzi unzima kuwe, akunakuwenza wedwa.
2_18_19_Phulaphula ngoko izwi lam, ndikuphe iqhinga; uThixo woba nawe. Wena yiba ngumlomo wabantu kuThixo, uzise izinto zabo kuThixo;
2_18_20_ubafundise imimiselo nemiyalelo, ubazise indlela abaya kuhamba ngayo, nomsebenzi abaya kuwenza.
2_18_21_Uze uzikhangelele ebantwini bonke amadoda anobunkunkqele ekuthetheni amatyala, amoyikayo uThixo, amadoda anyanisileyo,  ayithiyileyo inzuzo embi, uwamise phezu kwabo, abe ngabathetheli-waka, nabathetheli-khulu, nabathetheli bamashumi ngamahlanu, nabathetheli bamashumi ngamanye;
2_18_22_bathethe amatyala abantu ngamaxesha onke; zithi izinto zonke ezinkulu bazizise kuwe; zonke ezincinane bazigwebe bona,  ukuze kube lula kuwe, bakuthwalise.
2_18_23_Ukuba uthe wayenza loo nto, waza wakuwisela umthetho uThixo, woba nako ukuma, bathi naba bantu bonke bafike endaweni yabo benoxolo.
2_18_24_UMoses waliphulaphula izwi loyise womkakhe, wayenza into yonke abeyithethile.
2_18_25_UMoses wanyula amadoda anobunkunkqele ekuthetheni amatyala kuwo onke amaSirayeli, wawenza iintloko phezu kwabantu, aba ngabathetheli-waka, nabathetheli-khulu, nabathetheli bamashumi ngamahlanu, nabathetheli bamashumi ngamanye.
2_18_26_Bathetha amatyala abantu ngamaxesha onke; izinto ezinqabileyo bazizisa kuMoses, zonke ezincinane bazigweba bona.
2_18_27_UMoses wamndulula uyise womkakhe, waya elizweni lakowabo.
2_19_1_Ngenyanga yesithathu emveni kokuphuma koonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni laseYiputa, ngayo loo mini, bafika entlango yaseSinayi.
2_19_2_Banduluka eRefidim, bafika entlango yaseSinayi, balalisa entlango; amisa iintente apho amaSirayeli malunga nentaba.
2_19_3_UMoses wenyuka waya kuThixo, uYehova wadanduluka kuye esentabeni apho, wathi, Yitsho kwindlu kaYakobi, uxelele oonyana bakaSirayeli ukuthi,
2_19_4_Nina niyibonile into endiyenzileyo kumaYiputa, ukuba ndanithwala ngamaphiko okhozi, ndanizisa kum.
2_19_5_Ngoku ke, ukuba nithe naliphulaphula okunene izwi lam,  nawugcina umnqophiso wam, noba yinqobo kum kwizizwe zonke, kuba ihlabathi lonke lelam;
2_19_6_nibe bubukumkani bababingeleli kum, nohlanga olungcwele.  Ngawo lawo amazwi oya kuwathetha koonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_19_7_Weza uMoses, wawabiza amadoda amakhulu abantu, wabeka phambi kwawo onke amazwi uYehova awamwisela umthetho ngawo.
2_19_8_Baphendula bonke abantu ngamxhelo mnye, bathi, Konke akuthethileyo uYehova sokwenza. UMoses wayixelela uYehova intetho yabantu.
2_19_9_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yabona, ndiyeza kuwe ndiselifini elingqingqwa, ukuze beve abantu ekuthetheni kwam nawe, bakholwe kuwe ngonaphakade. Wawaxela ke uMoses amazwi abantu kuYehova.
2_19_10_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yiya ebantwini, ubangcwalise namhla nangomso, bazihlambe iingubo zabo, balunge ngomhla wesithathu;
2_19_11_kuba ngomhla wesithathu uya kuhla uYehova phezu kwentaba yeSinayi, emehlweni abantu bonke;
2_19_12_ubamisele abantu imida ngeenxa zonke, uthi kubo, Zigcineni ningenyukeli entabeni, ningawachukumisi amazantsi ayo; osukuba eyichukumisa intaba wobulawa afe.
2_19_13_Makungafiki sandla kuye; makaxulutywe ngamatye mpela, athi mhlawumbi atolwe nokutolwa; nokuba yinto ezizitho zine, nokuba ngumntu, akayi kuphila. Sakolula isandi sesigodlo ukuhlokoma,  banganyuka entabeni bona.
2_19_14_Wehla uMoses entabeni, waya ebantwini, wabangcwalisa abantu; bazihlamba iingubo zabo.
2_19_15_Wathi ebantwini, Ize nizilungiselele umhla wesithathu,  ningasondeli ebafazini.
2_19_16_Kwathi ngomhla wesithathu, kwakusa, kwabakho iindudumo,  nemibane, nelifu elinzima phezu kwentaba, nesandi sesigodlo esomeleleyo kunene; bagubha bonke abantu abaseminqubeni.
2_19_17_UMoses wabakhupha abantu eminqubeni, baya kumkhawulela uThixo; bema emazantsi entaba.
2_19_18_Intaba yeSinayi yaba ngumsi yonke iphela, kuba uYehova wehla phezu kwayo esemlilweni. Umsi wayo wenyuka njengomsi weziko lemfutho; yanyikima kunene yonke intaba.
2_19_19_Kwabakho isandi sesigodlo esaya sisomelela kakhulu;  wathetha uMoses, uThixo wamphendula ngesandi.
2_19_20_Wehla ke uYehova phezu kwentaba yeSinayi, encotsheni yentaba; uYehova wambizela uMoses encotsheni yentaba leyo;  wenyuka ke uMoses.
2_19_21_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yihla, ubaqononondise abantu, hleze batyhobozele kuYehova, bakhangele, kwenzakale into eninzi kubo.
2_19_22_Kananjalo ababingeleleli abasondelayo kuYehova,  mabazingcwalise, hleze uYehova ababhubhise.
2_19_23_Wathi uMoses kuYehova, Abantu abanakunyuka, baye entabeni yeSinayi; kuba wena wasiqononondisa wathi, Yimisele imida intaba, uyingcwalise.
2_19_24_Wathi uYehova kuye, Hamba uhle, uze unyuke wena ninoAron;  ke ababingeleli nabantu mabangatyhobozi benyuke beze kuYehova,  hleze ababhubhise.
2_19_25_Wehla ke uMoses, waya ebantwini, watsho kubo.
2_20_1_UThixo wawathetha ke onke la mazwi, wathi:
2_20_2_NdinguYehova, uThixo wakho, owakukhupha ezweni laseYiputa,  endlwini yobukhoboka.
2_20_3_Uze ungabi nathixo bambi ngaphandle kwam.
2_20_4_Uze ungazenzeli umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nokuba ngowayiphi na into emilise esezulwini phezulu, nesemhlabeni phantsi,  nesemanzini aphantsi komhlaba.
2_20_5_Uze ungaqubudi kwezo nto, ungazikhonzi: kuba mna, Yehova Thixo wakho, ndinguThixo onekhwele, ndibuvelela ubugwenxa booyise koonyana, kwesesithathu nakwesesine isizukulwana sabandithiyileyo;
2_20_6_ndiwenzela inceba amawaka abandithandayo, abayigcinayo imithetho yam.
2_20_7_Uze ungafumane ulibize igama likaYehova uThixo wakho; kuba uYehova akayi kumenza omsulwa ofumana alibize igama lakhe.
2_20_8_Khumbula umhla wesabatha, ukuba uwungcwalise.
2_20_9_Wosebenza imihla emithandathu, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho;
2_20_10_ke wona umhla wesixhenxe uyisabatha kaYehova uThixo wakho.  Uze ungenzi namnye umsebenzi ngawo, wena, nonyana wakho,  nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho, nezinto zakho ezizitho zine, nowasemzini osemasangweni akho:
2_20_11_kuba ngemihla emithandathu uYehova wenza izulu, nomhlaba,  nolwandle, neento zonke ezikwezo zinto, waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe; ngenxa yoko uYehova wawusikelela umhla wesabatha,  wawungcwalisa.
2_20_12_Beka uyihlo nonyoko, ukuze yolulwe imihla yakho emhlabeni akunika wona uYehova uThixo wakho.
2_20_13_Uze ungabulali.
2_20_14_Uze ungakrexezi.
2_20_15_Uze ungebi.
2_20_16_Uze ungangqini ubungqina obubuxoki ngommelwane wakho.
2_20_17_Uze ungawunqweneli umzi wommelwane wakho. Uze ungamnqweneli umfazi wommelwane wakho, nesicaka sakhe,  nesicakakazi sakhe, nenkomo yakhe, ne-esile lakhe, nanye into eyeyommelwane wakho.
2_20_18_Bonke abantu bazibona iindudumo nemibane, nesandi sesigodlo, nentaba ingumsi. Abantu babona ke bangcangacazela,  bamela kude.
2_20_19_Bathi kuMoses, Thetha wena nathi, siya kuva; makangathethi nathi uThixo, hleze sife.
2_20_20_Wathi uMoses ebantwini, Musani ukoyika; kuba uThixo uze kunilinga, ukuba kubekho ukumoyika ebusweni benu, ukuze ningoni.
2_20_21_Abantu bamela kude; wasondela uMoses esithokothokweni abekuso uThixo.
2_20_22_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Wotsho koonyana bakaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Nibonile nina, ukuba ndithethe nani ndisemazulwini.
2_20_23_Ize ningenzi oothixo bokunxulumana nam, ningazenzeli oothixo besilivere, noothixo begolide.
2_20_24_Uze undenzele isibingelelo somhlaba, ubingelele phezu kwaso amadini akho anyukayo, nemibingelelo yakho yoxolo,  impahla yakho emfutshane neenkomo zakho. Ndoza kuwe ndikusikelele ezindaweni zonke endomisa kuzo isikhumbuzo segama lam.
2_20_25_Ke ukuba uthe wandenzela isibingelelo samatye, uze ungasakhi ngamatye aqingqiweyo; okanye ukuba uthe wayiphakamisa intlabo yakho phezu kwaso, woba usihlambele.
2_20_26_Uze ungenyuki ngezinyuko esibingelelweni sam, ukuze bungatyhileki ubuze bakho kuso.
2_21_1_Ngawo la amasiko oya kuwabeka phambi kwabo:
2_21_2_Xa uthe wazuza ikhoboka elingumHebhere, lokhonza iminyaka ibe mithandathu; lithi kowesixhenxe liphume likhululekile,  lingahlawulelwanga.
2_21_3_Ukuba lithe leza lodwa, lophuma lodwa; ukuba belithe leza liyindoda enomfazi, umkalo wophuma nalo.
2_21_4_Ukuba ke inkosi yalo ithe yalizekela umfazi, walizalela oonyana, nokuba ziintombi: umfazi lowo nabantwana balo boba ngabenkosi yalo, liphume lona lodwa.
2_21_5_Ukuba lithe eli khoboka, Ndiyayithanda inkosi yam, nomkam,  nabantwana bam, andiyi kuphuma ndikhululekile:
2_21_6_inkosi yalo leyo yolisondeza kuThixo, ilisondeze elucangweni, nokuba kusemgubasini, ilithumbuse indlebe ngenyatyhowa inkosi yalo, liyikhonze ngonaphakade.
2_21_7_Xa ke umntu athe wathengisa ngentombi yakhe, yaba likhobokazana, mayingaphumi ngokokuphuma kwamakhoboka lawo.
2_21_8_Ke ukuba ithe ayayikholisa inkosi yayo, ebizimisele yona,  yoyivumela ukuba ikhululwe ngentlawulelo; ke ayiyi kuba nagunya lakuthengisa ngayo kubantu bolunye uhlanga, ukuba iyitshinizele.
2_21_9_Ukuba ithe yayimisela unyana wayo, yothi iyenze ngokwesiko leentombi zonke.
2_21_10_Ukuba ithe yamzekela omnye umfazi, mayingakunciphisi ukudla kwayo, nezambatho zayo, nokubalelwa kwayo.
2_21_11_Ukuba ayithanga izenze ezo zinto zontathu, mayiphume ingahlawulelwanga mali.
2_21_12_Othe wabetha umntu wafa, naye wobulawa afe.
2_21_13_Ke lowo ubengenanzondo, yanguThixo omqubisanise nesandla sakhe, ndokumisela indawo aya kusabela kuyo.
2_21_14_Xa ke umntu athe wagabadela ngakummelwane wakhe, wambulala ngobuqhophololo: uze umsuse nasesibingelelweni sam, afe.
2_21_15_Othe wabetha uyise, nokuba ngunina, wobulawa afe.
2_21_16_Othe weba umntu, nokuba uthengise ngaye, nokuba ufunyenwe esandleni sakhe, wobulawa afe.
2_21_17_Othe watshabhisa uyise, nokuba ngunina, wobulawa afe.
2_21_18_Xa athe abambana amadoda, yaza enye yambetha ummelwane wakhe ngelitye, nokuba kungengqindi, akafa, wesuka walala ngendlu:
2_21_19_ukuba uthe wavuka, wahamba phandle esimelela: mayingabi natyala leyo yambethayo, kodwa yomnika indleko yexesha lakhe,  imphilise aphile.
2_21_20_Xa athe umntu wabetha isicaka sakhe, nokuba sisicakakazi sakhe ngentonga, safa ngesandla sakhe: sophindezelwa ngenene.
2_21_21_Kodwa ukuba sithe sahlala, asafa, usuku nokuba ziintsuku:  makungaphindezelwa; kuba siyimali yakhe.
2_21_22_Xa athe amadoda abambana ngezihlwitha, agila umfazi emithi, waphuma isisu, akwenzakala nto noko: makahlawuliswe ngenene umfo lowo, njengoko iya kubeka phezu kwakhe indoda yaloo mfazi, arhole ngokwelizwi labahluli.
2_21_23_Ukuba uthe wenzakala, uze urhole umphefumlo ngomphefumlo,
2_21_24_iliso ngeliso, izinyo ngezinyo, isandla ngesandla, unyawo ngonyawo,
2_21_25_ukutshiswa ngokutshiswa, inxeba ngenxeba, umvumbo ngomvumbo.
2_21_26_Xa athe umntu wasibetha esweni isicaka sakhe, nokuba uthe wasibetha esweni isicakakazi sakhe, latyhaphaka: makasindulule sikhululekile ngenxa yeliso laso.
2_21_27_Ukuba uthe wakhumla izinyo lesicaka sakhe, nokuba lelesicakakazi sakhe: makasindulule sikhululekile ngenxa yezinyo laso.
2_21_28_Ke xa inkomo ithe yahlaba indoda, nokuba yinkazana, yafa:  loo nkomo mayigityiselwe ngamatye, ingadliwa inyama yayo;  umnininkomo woba msulwa.
2_21_29_Ke ukuba inkomo leyo ibihlaba kakade, waza waziswa umniniyo, akayigcina noko, yaza yabulala indoda, nokuba yinkazana: mayigityiselwe ngamatye inkomo leyo, kananjalo nomniniyo makabulawe.
2_21_30_Ukuba uthe wamiselwa intlawulo yokuzicamagushela,  makayirhole akhulule umphefumlo wakhe, ngako konke akumiselweyo.
2_21_31_Nokuba ihlabe unyana, nokuba ihlabe intombi, makwenziwe kuye ngelo siko.
2_21_32_Ukuba inkomo yakhe ithe yahlaba isicaka, nokuba sisicakakazi, makarholele inkosi yaso iishekele zesilivere ezimashumi mathathu, inkomo yona igityiselwe ngamatye.
2_21_33_Xa umntu athe wavula umhadi, naxa umntu athe wemba umhadi,  akawuvingca, kweyela inkomo, nokuba liesile, kuwo:
2_21_34_umninimhadi woyimisela, ambuyisele umniniyo ngemali, leyo ifileyo ibe yeyakhe.
2_21_35_Xa ithe inkomo yomntu yahlaba inkomo yommelwane wakhe,  yafa, mabathengise ngenkomo leyo iphilileyo, bayahlule imali yayo; kananjalo mabayahlule leyo ifileyo.
2_21_36_Ukuba kwakusazeka ukuba inkomo leyo ibihlaba kakade,  akayigcina umniniyo: makayimisele inkomo ngenkomo, leyo ifileyo ibe yeyakhe.
2_22_1_Xa umntu athe weba inkomo, nokuba yigusha, wayixhela,  mhlawumbi wathengisa ngayo: makadliwe iinkomo zibe ntlanu ngenkomo leyo, izimvu zibe ne ngemvu leyo.
2_22_2_Ukuba isela lithe lafunyanwa ligqobha indlu, labethwa lafa,  akukho tyala lagazi kulowo.
2_22_3_Ukuba liphunyelwe lilanga, lobakho ityala legazi kulowo.  Loo nto maliyimisele ngokuzeleyo; ukuba alinanto, makuthengiswe ngalo ngenxa yobusela balo.
2_22_4_Ukuba ithe yafunyanwa isesandleni salo, okanye iphilile,  loo nto ibiweyo, nokuba yinkomo, nokuba liesile, nokuba yigusha, maliyibuyise nganto mbini.
2_22_5_Xa umntu athe wadlisa intsimi, nokuba sisidiliya, wavulela iinkomo zakhe, zayidla intsimi yomnye: makamisele ngeyona nto intle yentsimi yakhe, nangeyona nto intle yesidiliya sakhe.
2_22_6_Xa kuthe kwatsha umlilo, wafumanana neentango, watshisa izitha zengqolowa, nokuba yemiyo, nokuba yintsimi: lowo uwutshisileyo makazimisele ezo zinto.
2_22_7_Xa athe umntu wanikela ummelwane wakhe imali, nokuba yimpahla, ukuba ayigcine, yaza yabiwa endlwini yaloo mntu:  ukuba lithe lafunyanwa isela elo, maliyibuyekeze kabini.
2_22_8_Ukuba lithe alafunyanwa isela: umninindlu makasondezwe kuThixo, afunge ukuba akayiphathanga impahla yommelwane wakhe lowo.
2_22_9_Ngenxa yezinto zonke zokona, ngenxa yenkomo, ye-esile,  yegusha, yengubo, nangenxa yezinto zonke ezidakileyo,  ezifaniswayo: loo ndawo yabo bobabini yoya phambi koThixo; othe wagwetywa nguThixo, wombuyekeza kabini ummelwane wakhe.
2_22_10_Xa athe umntu wanika ummelwane wakhe iesile, nokuba yinkomo, nokuba yigusha, nokuba yiyiphi into ezitho zine, ukuba ayigcine; yaza yafa, mhlawumbi yaphuka, mhlawumbi yathinjwa,  kungaboni bani:
2_22_11_makubekho ukufunga uYehova phakathi kwabo bobabini, ukuba akayiphathanga impahla yommelwane wakhe; makamkele oko umniniyo, loo mntu angayimiseli.
2_22_12_Ukuba ibiwe yabiwa ikuye, woyimisela kumniniyo.
2_22_13_Ukuba iqwengiwe, woyizisa ibe lingqina; makangayimiseli into eqwengiweyo.
2_22_14_Xa athe umntu waboleka inkomo kummelwane wakhe, yaza yaphuka, mhlawumbi yafa, engekho umniniyo, makayimisele.
2_22_15_Ukuba ithe yenzakala ekho umniniyo, makangayimiseli; ukuba ibithe yaqeshwa, ibe ihambele ingqesho yayo.
2_22_16_Xa athe umntu warhwebesha intombi engaganiweyo, walala nayo, woyilobola ibe ngumkakhe.
2_22_17_Ukuba uyise wayo walile kanye ukumnika, makarhole imali njengekhazi lazo iintombi.
2_22_18_Umkhafulikazi uze ungamyeki adle ubomi.
2_22_19_Bonke abathe balala inkomo, mababulawe bafe.
2_22_20_Obingelela kuthixo ongenguye uYehova yedwa, makasingelwe phantsi.
2_22_21_Umphambukeli uze ungamxinzeleli phantsi, ungamxini; kuba naningabaphambukeli nani ezweni laseYiputa.
2_22_22_Yonke into engumhlolokazi nenkedama uze ungayicinezeli.
2_22_23_Ukuba uthe wabacinezela nangayiphi na indlela, bakhala kum, ndokuva ukukhala kwabo;
2_22_24_uvuthe umsindo wam, ndinibulale ngekrele; babe ngabahlolokazi abafazi benu, babe ziinkedama abantwana benu.
2_22_25_Ukuba uthe wababoleka imali abantu bam abaziintsizana abanawe, uze ungabi kubo njengomboleki-mali: uze ungababizi nzala.
2_22_26_Ukuba ummelwane wakho ubambise ngengubo yakhe kuwe,  woyibuyisela kuye lingekatshoni ilanga;
2_22_27_kuba yona ikukuphela kwesigubungelo anaso, yingubo yakhe yomzimba wakhe; wolala ngantoni ke? Kothi, xa athe wakhala kum,  ndive; kuba ndinenceba.
2_22_28_UThixo uze ungamtshabhisi, nesikhulu ebantwini bakowenu uze ungasiqalekisi.
2_22_29_Indyebo yakho nencindi yemithi yakho, uze ungalibali ukundinika. Oonyana bakho bamazibulo uze undinike.
2_22_30_Uze wenjenjalo ngenkomo yakho, nangempahla yakho emfutshane: mayibe kunina iintsuku ezisixhenxe, uthi ngosuku lwesibhozo undinike.
2_22_31_Noba ngabantu abangcwele kum; inyama yento eqwengiweyo endle nize ningayidli; noyiphosa ezinjeni.
2_23_1_Uze ungathuthi ludaba lukhohlakeleyo: uze ungancedisani nongendawo, ukuba ube lingqina logonyamelo.
2_23_2_Uze ungalandeli isininzi ukuya kwenza izinto ezimbi;  ungathi ukungqina kwimbambano ekhoyo, ujike ulandele isininzi,  uyijike inyaniso.
2_23_3_Uze ungasicengi isisweli ekubambaneni kwaso nomnye.
2_23_4_Xa uthe waqubisana nenkomo yotshaba lwakho, nokuba liesile lalo, lilahleka: wolibuyisela kulo.
2_23_5_Xa uthe walibona iesile lokuthiyileyo lisadalele phantsi komthwalo walo, musa ukumyekela; likhulule umkhululise.
2_23_6_Uze ungasijiki isigwebo sehlwempu lakho ekubambaneni kwalo nomnye.
2_23_7_Zikhwelelise kude entweni ebubuxoki; musa ukumbulala omsulwa nolilungisa: kuba andiyi kumgwebela ongendawo.
2_23_8_Uze ungamkeli sicengo; kuba isicengo esi siyabamfamekisa ababonayo, siphenula imicimbi yamalungisa.
2_23_9_Uze ungamxini umphambukeli; niyawazi nina umphefumlo womphambukeli, kuba naningabaphambukeli nani ezweni laseYiputa.
2_23_10_Wowuhlwayela umhlaba wakho iminyaka emithandathu, ubuthe iziqhamo zawo;
2_23_11_ke ngowesixhenxe wowuyeka ulale, adle amahlwempu abantu bakowenu, okuseleyo kuwo kudliwe ziinyamakazi; wenjenjalo ngesidiliya sakho, nangesinquma sakho.
2_23_12_Wowusebenza umsebenzi wakho imihla emithandathu, uphumle ngomhla wesixhenxe; iphumle inkomo yakho ne-esile lakho, akhe aphefumle unyana wesicakakazi sakho nomphambukeli.
2_23_13_Zonke izinto endizithethileyo kuni, zigcineni; igama lathixo bambi uze ungalikhankanyi, lingaviwa emlonyeni wakho.
2_23_14_Wondenzela umthendeleko kathathu ngomnyaka.
2_23_15_Umthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele uze uwugcine, udle izonka ezingenagwele imihla esixhenxe, njengoko ndakuwiselayo umthetho, ngexesha elimisiweyo lenyanga enguAbhibhi; kuba waphuma ngayo eYiputa; makungabonakali bani phambi kwam engaphethe lutho;
2_23_16_nomthendeleko wexa lokuvuna, wentlahlela yemisebenzi yakho yokuhlwayela entsimini; nomthendeleko wokuhlanganisa,  osekupheleni komnyaka, ekuhlanganiseni kwakho imisebenzi yakho entsimini.
2_23_17_Izihlandlo ezithathu ngomnyaka, mayibonakale yonke into eyindoda yakowenu phambi kweNkosi uYehova.
2_23_18_Uze ungalibingeleli phezu kwento enegwele igazi lombingelelo wam; nenqatha lomthendeleko wam malingabi ngumbeko.
2_23_19_Ingqalo yentlahlela yomhlaba wakho uze uyizise endlwini kaYehova uThixo wakho. Uze ungalipheki itakane ngobisi lonina.
2_23_20_Uyabona, ndithuma isithunywa phambi kwakho, ukuba sikugcine endleleni, sikufikise endaweni endiyilungisileyo.
2_23_21_Silumkele, uliphulaphule izwi laso. Musa ukusiphikisa;  kuba asiyi kuluxolela ukreqo lwenu; kuba igama lam likuso.
2_23_22_Ke ukuba uthe waliva ilizwi laso, wenza konke endikuthethayo, ndoba lutshaba kwiintshaba zakho,  ndibabandezele ababandezeli bakho.
2_23_23_Kuba isithunywa sam sohamba phambi kwakho, sikufikise kuma-Amori, namaHiti, namaPerizi, namaKanan, namaHivi,  namaYebhusi; ndiwabethe athi shwaka.
2_23_24_Uze ungabanquli oothixo babo, ungabakhonzi, ungenzi ngokwemisebenzi yabo; uze uzigungxule, uziqhekeze nokuziqhekeza izimiso zabo zamatye.
2_23_25_Nize nikhonze uYehova uThixo wenu, asisikelele isonka sakho, namanzi akho; ndisisuse isifo phakathi kwakho.
2_23_26_Akuyi kubakho kuphunza nakudlola ezweni lakho; inani lemihla yakho ndolizalisa.
2_23_27_Ndiya kuzithuma phambi kwakho izothuso zam, ndibadubadube bonke abantu oya kufika kubo, iintshaba zakho zonke ndizenze zikunikele ikhosi;
2_23_28_ndithume oonomeva phambi kwakho, bawagxothe amaHivi,  namaKanan, namaHiti, asuke phambi kwakho.
2_23_29_Andiyi kuwagxotha phambi kwakho ngamnyaka mnye, hleze ilizwe kube senkangala kulo, ande amarhamncwa asendle phezu kwakho.
2_23_30_Ndiya kumana ukuwagxotha kancinane phambi kwakho, ude wande, ulidle ilifa ilizwe.
2_23_31_Ndoyimisa imida yakho, ithabathele kuLwandle oluBomvu ise kulwandle lwamaFilisti; ithabathele entlango, ise kuwo uMlambo;  kuba abemi belo lizwe ndiya kubanikela esandleni sakho,  ubagxothe phambi kwakho.
2_23_32_Uze unganqophisani nabo, kwanoothixo babo;
2_23_33_ize bangemi kwelo zwe lakho, hleze bakwenze undone. Xa uthe wabakhonza oothixo babo, inene, oko koba ngumgibe kuwe.
2_24_1_Wathi ke kuMoses, Nyuka uye kuYehova, wena noAron,  uNadabhi, noAbhihu, namashumi asixhenxe kumadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli, ninqule nikude;
2_24_2_kusondele uMoses yedwa kuYehova; bangasondeli bona, nabantu bangenyuki naye.
2_24_3_Waya uMoses, wabaxelela abantu onke amazwi kaYehova,  namasiko onke. Baphendula bonke abantu ngazwi-nye, bathi, Onke amazwi awathethileyo uYehova sowenza.
2_24_4_Wawabhala uMoses onke amazwi kaYehova, wavuka kusasa, wakha isibingelelo emazantsi entaba, nezimiso zamatye zalishumi elinazibini, ngokwezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini zakwaSirayeli.
2_24_5_Wathuma abafana bakoonyana bakwaSirayeli, banyusa amadini anyukayo, babingelela imibingelelo yoxolo, iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo kuYehova.
2_24_6_UMoses wathabatha isiqingatha segazi, wasigalela ezidendelekweni, esinye isiqingatha segazi wasitshiza esibingelelweni.
2_24_7_Wathabatha incwadi yomnqophiso, wayilesa ezindlebeni zabantu; bathi bona, Yonke into ayithethileyo uYehova soyenza siyive.
2_24_8_Walithabatha uMoses igazi, wabatshiza abantu ngalo, wathi,  Nalo igazi lomnqophiso awenzayo uYehova nani ngala mazwi onke.
2_24_9_Wenyuka uMoses noAron, uNadabhi noAbhihu, namashumi osixhenxe kumadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli.
2_24_10_Bambona uThixo wamaSirayeli; phantsi kweenyawo zakhe kwaye kunjengento eyenziwe ngesafire eqaqambileyo, njengenkqu yezulu lisile.
2_24_11_Amanene oonyana bakaSirayeli akawasanga sandla. Ambona ke uThixo, adla, asela.
2_24_12_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Nyuka uze kum entabeni, ube khona,  ndikunike amacwecwe amatye enomyalelo nomthetho, endiwubhalele ukuze bayalwe ngawo.
2_24_13_Wesuka uMoses noYoshuwa, umlungiseleli wakhe, wenyuka ke uMoses waya entabeni kaThixo.
2_24_14_Wathi kumadoda amakhulu, Hlalani, nisilinde apho, side sibuye, size kuni. Yabonani, uAron noHure banani; onendawo yokumangala makasondele kubo.
2_24_15_Wenyuka ke uMoses waya entabeni; ilifu layigubungela intaba.
2_24_16_Ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova bahlala phezu kwentaba yeSinayi;  ilifu layigubungela iintsuku ezintandathu; wamemeza kuMoses ngosuku lwesixhenxe phakathi efini.
2_24_17_Ke ukubonakala kobuqaqawuli bukaYehova, emehlweni oonyana bakaSirayeli, kwaye kunjengomlilo otshayo encotsheni yentaba.
2_24_18_Wangena uMoses phakathi efini, wenyuka ke intaba uMoses;  waba sentabeni apho iimini ezimashumi mane, nobusuku obumashumi mane.
2_25_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi, Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, bandizisele umrhumo.
2_25_2_Nowuthabatha umrhumo wam ebantwini bonke abanikela ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo.
2_25_3_Nguwo lo ke umrhumo eniya kuwuthabatha kubo: igolide,  nesilivere, nobhedu;
2_25_4_nento emsi nemfusa nebomwu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, noboya beebhokhwe;
2_25_5_nezintsu zeenkunzi zezimvu, zenziwe zayingqombela,  nezikhumba zamahlengezi;
2_25_6_nemingampunzi, ioli yesikhanyiso, ubulawu beoli yentambiso,  nobesiqhumiso esiqholiweyo;
2_25_7_amatye ebherilo, namatye okufakwe e-efodini, nawobengo;
2_25_8_bandenzele indawo engcwele, ndihlale phakathi kwabo.
2_25_9_Njengako konke endikubonisa kona: ngokomfanekiso womnquba,  nomfanekiso weempahla zawo zonke, ize nenjenjalo ukuwenza.
2_25_10_Mabenze ityeya yomngampunzi. Ubude bayo mabube ziikubhite zombini ezinesiqingatha, ububanzi bayo bube yikubhite enesiqingatha, ukuphakama kwayo kube yikubhite enesiqingatha;
2_25_11_uyaleke ngegolide ecocekileyo, uyaleke ngaphakathi nangaphandle, uze uyithi jize ngesithsaba segolide;
2_25_12_woyityhidela amakhonkco egolide abe mane, uwafake emilenzeni yayo yomine, amakhonkco abe mabini ngeli icala,  amakhonkco abe mabini ngelinya icala;
2_25_13_wenze izibonda ngomngampunzi, uzaleke ngegolide,
2_25_14_uzifake izibonda ezo emakhonkcweni asemacaleni etyeya,  ithwalwe ngazo ityeya leyo.
2_25_15_Zoba semakhonkcweni etyeya izibonda ezo; maze zingarholwa kuyo.
2_25_16_Isingqino, endiya kukunika sona, uze usibeke etyeyeni.
2_25_17_Uze wenze isihlalo sokucamagusha ngegolide ecocekileyo.  Ubude baso mabube ziikubhite ezimbini ezinesiqingatha, ububanzi baso bube yikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_25_18_Uze wenze iikerubhi zibe mbini ngegolide; ukuzenza wozikhanda, zivele eziphelweni zozibini zesihlalo sokucamagusha;
2_25_19_wenze ikerubhi ibe nye ivele esiphelweni seli icala, enye ikerubhi ivele esiphelweni seliya, esihlalweni sokucamagusha;  wozenza iikerubhi zivele eziphelweni zaso zozibini.
2_25_20_Maze iikerubhi ziwolule amaphiko phezulu, zisisithelise ngamaphiko azo isihlalo sokucamagusha, ubuso bazo bukhangelane,  bubheke esihlalweni sokucamagusha ubuso beekerubhi ezo.
2_25_21_Uze usibeke isihlalo sokucamagusha phezu kwetyeya; ufake etyeyeni isingqino endiya kukunika sona.
2_25_22_Ndiya kuhlangana nawe khona, ndithethe nawe ndisesihlalweni sokucamagusha, phakathi kweekerubhi zombini eziphezu kwetyeya yesingqino, ngeento zonke endiya kukuwisela umthetho ngazo koonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_25_23_Uze wenze netafile ngomngampunzi. Ubude bayo boba ziikubhite ezimbini, ububanzi bayo bube yikubhite, ukuphakama kwayo kube yikubhite enesiqingatha;
2_25_24_uyaleke ngegolide ecocekileyo, uyenzele isithsaba segolide esithi jize.
2_25_25_Uze uyenzele udini olungangobubanzi besandla ngeenxa zonke, ulwenzele udini lwayo isithsaba segolide esithe jize.
2_25_26_Woyenzela amakhonkco egolide abe mane, uwafake amakhonkco omane ezimbombeni zone ezisemilenzeni yayo yomine.
2_25_27_Oba kufuphi nokuhlangana kodini amakhonkco lawo, abe ziindawo zokufaka izibonda zokuyithwala itafile;
2_25_28_uzenze izibonda ezo ngomngampunzi, uzaleke ngegolide,  ithwalwe ngazo itafile.
2_25_29_Uze wenze izitya zayo, neenkamba zayo, neendebe zayo,  nemicephe yayo ekuya kuthungwa ngayo; uzenze ngegolide ecocekileyo;
2_25_30_ubeke etafileni izonka zokubonisa, phambi kwam ngamaxesha onke.
2_25_31_Uze wenze nesiphatho sezibane ngegolide ecocekileyo.  Ukusenza, wosikhanda isiphatho eso: isikhondo saso, nesibili saso, neendebe zaso, namaqhina aso, neentyantyambo zaso zivele kwakuso;
2_25_32_amasebe amathandathu avele emacaleni aso; amasebe amathathu esiphatho avele kweli icala laso, amasebe amathathu esiphatho avele kweliya icala laso.
2_25_33_Zoba ntathu iindebe ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile,  zinamaqhina neentyantyambo, kweli isebe; neendebe ezintathu ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile, zibe zinamaqhina neentyantyambo, kweliya isebe; makube njalo kumasebe omathandathu avela esiphathweni eso.
2_25_34_Zoba ne iindebe esiphathweni, ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile, zinamaqhina aso neentyantyambo zaso;
2_25_35_ibe liqhina phantsi kwamasebe omabini livele kuso, ibe liqhina phantsi kwamasebe amabini livele kuso, ibe liqhina phantsi kwamasebe amabini livele kuso, abe ngawamasebe amathandathu avelayo esiphathweni eso.
2_25_36_Amaqhina awo, namalungu awo avele kuso, sonke siphela masibe ngumkhando omnye wegolide ecocekileyo.
2_25_37_Uze wenze izibane zaso zibe sixhenxe, uzimise izibane zaso, zikhanyisele icala elikhangelene nomphambili waso.
2_25_38_Nozenza izifinyiso zaso, neengcedevu zaso, ngegolide ecocekileyo.
2_25_39_Nosenza ngetalente yegolide ecocekileyo, sona nezo mpahla zonke.
2_25_40_Khangela ke, uzenze ngokomfuziselo wazo, owawubona entabeni.
2_26_1_Ke umnquba uze uwenze ngeshumi lamalengalenga elinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, nangemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu.  Wowenzela iikerubhi umsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka.
2_26_2_Ubude belengalenga lilinye boba ziikubhite ezimashumi mabini anesibhozo, ububanzi belengalenga lilinye bube ziikubhite ezine; onke amalengalenga alingane.
2_26_3_Amalengalenga amahlanu ohlanganiswa, elinye nelinye;  namalengalenga amahlanu ohlanganiswa, elinye nelinye.
2_26_4_Uze wenze amasango emisonto emsi emphethweni welinye ilengalenga, ekupheleni, ekuhlanganeni; wenjenjalo emphethweni welengalenga lokugqibela, ekuhlanganeni kwelesibini.
2_26_5_Wowenza amasango abe mashumi mahlanu kwelinye ilengalenga;  wenze amasango abe mashumi mahlanu ekupheleni kwelengalenga elisekuhlanganeni kwelesibini, ukuze amasango alungelelane elinye nelinye;
2_26_6_wenze amagwegwe egolide abe mashumi mahlanu, uwahlanganise amalengalenga, elinye nelinye, ngamagwegwe lawo, ube mnquba mnye.
2_26_7_Uze wenze amalengalenga ngoboya beebhokhwe abe yintente phezu komnquba, uwenze amalengalenga lawo abe lishumi elinalinye.
2_26_8_Ubude belengalenga lilinye boba ziikubhite ezimashumi mathathu; ububanzi belengalenga lilinye boba ziikubhite ezine;  loo malengalenga alishumi elinalinye olingana.
2_26_9_Wowahlanganisa odwa amalengalenga amahlanu, namalengalenga amathandathu odwa; elesithandathu ilengalenga uliphinde phambi kwentente ngaphambili;
2_26_10_wenze amasango abe mashumi mahlanu emphethweni welengalenga elo lokugqibela, ekuhlanganeni namasango, abe mashumi mahlanu emphethweni welesibini ilengalenga elihlanganiswe nelinye.
2_26_11_Uze wenze amagwegwe obhedu abe mashumi mahlanu, uwafake amagwegwe awo emasangweni, uyihlanganise intente ibe nye.
2_26_12_Ke ukwanekwa kwendawo egqithiseleyo emalengalengeni entente, sothi isiqingatha selengalenga eligqithiseleyo sanekwe kwelasemva icala lomnquba;
2_26_13_ithi ikubhite ngapha nekubhite ngapho, endaweni egqithiseleyo ebudeni bamalengalenga entente, yanekwe emacaleni omnquba ngapha nangapho, iwugubungele.
2_26_14_Intente uze uyenzele isigubungelo ngezintsu zeenkunzi zezimvu, ezenziwe zayingqombela, nesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi ngaphezulu kweso.
2_26_15_Umnquba uze uwenzele iiplanga ngomngampunzi, zime.
2_26_16_Ubude beplanga boba ziikubhite ezilishumi, ububanzi beplanga inye bube yikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_26_17_Iplanga inye yoba neempondlo ezimbini, zihlangene olunye nolunye; wenjenjalo eziplangeni zonke zomnquba.
2_26_18_Umnquba uze uwenzele iiplanga, zibe mashumi mabini iiplanga ngecala lasezantsi ngasezantsi;
2_26_19_wenze iziseko zesilivere, zibe mashumi mane phantsi kweeplanga ezimashumi mabini: zibe zibini iziseko, phantsi kweplanga inye, zeempondlo zayo zombini; zibe zibini iziseko,  phantsi kweplanga inye, zeempondlo zayo zombini.
2_26_20_Ezecala lesibini lomnquba ngelasentla icala zoba mashumi mabini iiplanga;
2_26_21_neziseko zazo zesilivere zibe mashumi mane; iziseko zibe zibini phantsi kweplanga inye; zibe zibini iziseko phantsi kweplanga inye.
2_26_22_Ezomva womnquba ngasentshonalanga wozenza zibe ntandathu iiplanga.
2_26_23_Iiplanga ezimbini uze uzenze iimbombo zomnquba emaphundwini omabini;
2_26_24_zibe ngamawele, zithabathele ezantsi ukuhlangana; zibe nto-nye kude kuse entloko, ziye khonkcweni linye. Koba njalo kuwo omabini, abe ngaweembombo zombini.
2_26_25_Zoba ziiplanga ezisibhozo neziseko zazo zesilivere, zibe ziziseko ezilishumi elinazithandathu: zibe zibini iziseko phantsi kweplanga inye, zibe zibini iziseko phantsi kweplanga inye.
2_26_26_Maze wenze imivalo ngomngampunzi: ibe mihlanu eziplangeni zelinye icala lomnquba,
2_26_27_ibe mihlanu imivalo eziplangeni zelesibini icala lomnquba,  ibe mihlanu imivalo eziplangeni zecala lomnquba, emaphundwini ngasentshonalanga.
2_26_28_Umvalo othi gabhu phakathi eziplangeni ezo mawuvale, usuka ekupheleni uye ekupheleni.
2_26_29_Uze uzaleke iiplanga ngegolide; amakhonkco azo uwenze ngegolide, abe ziindawo zemivalo; ke imivalo uyaleke ngegolide.
2_26_30_Uwumise umnquba ngokwesiko lawo olibonileyo entabeni.
2_26_31_Uze wenze umkhusane ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu,  nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo: wowenzela iikerubhi,  umsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka.
2_26_32_Uze uwuxhome ezintsikeni ezine zomngampunzi ezalekwe ngegolide, emagwegweni azo egolide, zime phezu kweziseko zozine zesilivere;
2_26_33_wowuxhoma umkhusane emakhonkcweni, ityeya yesingqino uyingenise khona, ngaphaya komkhusane, ukuze umkhusane unahlulele ingcwele kwingcwele kangcwele.
2_26_34_Uze usibeke isihlalo sokucamagusha phezu kwetyeya yesingqino, kwingcwele kangcwele;
2_26_35_uyimise itafile nganeno komkhusane, usimise nesiphatho sesibane malunga netafile, ngecala lomnquba langasezantsi; ke itafile uyibeke ngecala langasentla.
2_26_36_Umnyango wentente uze uwenzele isisitheliso, ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo,  umsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki.
2_26_37_Isisitheliso eso uze usenzele iintsika zibe ntlanu ngomngampunzi, uzaleke ngegolide; amagwegwe azo abe ngawegolide; uzityhidele iziseko zobhedu zibe zihlanu.
2_27_1_Uze usenze isibingelelo ngomngampunzi. Ubude baso boba ziikubhite ezintlanu, ububanzi baso bube ziikubhite ezintlanu,  sibe mbombo ne isibingelelo; ukuphakama kwaso kube ziikubhite ezintathu.
2_27_2_Uze wenze iimpondo zaso ezimbombeni zaso zone, zivele kuso iimpondo zaso; usaleke ngobhedu.
2_27_3_Uze wenze neenkamba zaso zokuwola uthuthu lwaso,  nemihlakulwana yaso, nezitya zaso zokutshiza, neefolokhwe zaso,  neengcedevu zaso zamalahle; zonke iimpahla zaso uzenze ngobhedu.
2_27_4_Wosenzela uthango, umsebenzi ongumnatha ngobhedu; wenze emnatheni lowo amakhonkco abe mane ngobhedu eziphelweni zalo zozine;
2_27_5_ulubeke phantsi kongqameko olujikeleze isibingelelo,  luthabathele ezantsi, lungumnatha, luthi gabhu phakathi esibingelelweni.
2_27_6_Uze usenzele izibonda isibingelelo, izibonda zomngampunzi,  uzaleke ngobhedu;
2_27_7_zifakwe izibonda zaso emakhonkcweni, zibe semacaleni omabini esibingelelo izibonda ezo ekuthwalweni kwaso.
2_27_8_Wosenza ngeeplanga, sibe holoholo. Njengoko waboniswa ngako entabeni, mabenjenjalo.
2_27_9_Uze uyenze intendelezo yomnquba kwelasezantsi icala ngasezantsi, ibe ngamawunduwundu entendelezo elinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo; ubude becala lilinye boba ziikubhite ezilikhulu;
2_27_10_iintsika zayo ezimashumi mabini, neziseko zazo ezimashumi mabini, zibe zezobhedu; amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo ibe yeyesilivere.
2_27_11_Kananjalo ngecala lasentla, ebudeni makubekho amawunduwundu aziikubhite ezilikhulu ubude bawo, neentsika zalo ezimashumi mabini, neziseko zaso ezimashumi mabini, izezobhedu;  amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo ibe yeyesilivere.
2_27_12_Ububanzi bentendelezo ngecala lasentshonalanga boba ngamawunduwundu aziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu. Iintsika zawo zoba lishumi, neziseko zazo zibe lishumi.
2_27_13_Ububanzi bentendelezo ngecala lempumalanga ngasempumalanga boba ziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu.
2_27_14_Amawunduwundu ngelinye icala lesango oba ziikubhite ezilishumi elinantlanu, iintsika zawo zibe ntathu, neziseko zazo zibe zithathu;
2_27_15_amawunduwundu ngelinye icala lesango abe ziikubhite ezilishumi elinantlanu; iintsika zawo zibe ntathu, neziseko zazo zibe zithathu.
2_27_16_Esangweni lentendelezo soba sisisitheliso seekubhite ezimashumi mabini semisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, umsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki.  Iintsika zazo zoba ne, neziseko zaso zibe zine.
2_27_17_Zonke iintsika zentendelezo eziyijikelezileyo zoba neminqiwu yesilivere; amagwegwe ayo abe ngawesilivere, neziseko zazo zibe zezobhedu.
2_27_18_Ubude bentendelezo boba ziikubhite ezilikhulu; ububanzi buhambe buba ngamashumi omahlanu, amashumi omahlanu; ukuphakama kube ziikubhite ezintlanu zelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo;  iziseko zazo zibe zezobhedu.
2_27_19_Zonke iimpahla zomnquba, ekusetyenzweni kwawo konke,  nezikhonkwane zawo zonke, nezikhonkwane zonke zentendelezo,  zoba zezobhedu.
2_27_20_Oonyana bakaSirayeli maze ubawisele umthetho wokuba bakuzisele ioli eqaqambileyo yemingquma engqushiweyo,  yesikhanyiso, ukuba bamise isibane samaxesha onke,
2_27_21_ententeni yokuhlangana, nganeno komkhusane ophambi kwesingqino. UAron noonyana bakhe bosilungisa, kuthabathele ngokuhlwa kude kuse, phambi koYehova; ibe ngummiselo onganuphakade kwizizukulwana zabo, ngenxa yoonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_28_1_Wena ke sondeza kuwe uAron umkhuluwa wakho, enoonyana bakhe, umthabathe phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli abe ngumbingeleli kum: uAron, noNadabhi, noAbhihu, noElazare,  noItamare, oonyana baka-Aron;
2_28_2_uAron, umkhuluwa wakho, umenzele izambatho ezingcwele, zibe zezozuko nezokuhomba.
2_28_3_Uze uthethe wena kubo bonke abantliziyo zilumkileyo,  endibazalise ngomoya wobulumko, bazenze izambatho zika-Aron zokumngcwalisa, abe ngumbingeleli kum.
2_28_4_Zizo ke ezi izambatho abaya kuzenza: ubengo, ne-efodi,  nengubo yokwaleka, nengubo yangaphantsi elukwe ngokwesindlwane,  nonkontsho, nombhinqo; bamenzele ke izambatho ezingcwele uAron,  umkhuluwa wakho, noonyana bakhe, abe ngumbingeleli kum.
2_28_5_Bothabatha bona igolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu,  nelinen ecikizekileyo.
2_28_6_Maze bayenze iefodi ngegolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, umsebenzi ke lowo wengcibi yokuluka.
2_28_7_Yoba neziziba ezibini zamagxa, zokuyixakatha emiphethweni yayo yomibini, ixakathwe ke.
2_28_8_Nombhinqo ophezu kwayo, wokuyinxiba iefodi, mawube njengokusetyenzwa kwayo, uphume kuyo, ngegolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo.
2_28_9_Uze uthabathe amatye ebherilo abe mabini, ukrole kuwo amagama oonyana bakaSirayeli;
2_28_10_amagama amathandathu abo oba kwelinye ilitye, namagama amathandathu amanye abe kwelesibini ilitye, ngokweenzala zabo.
2_28_11_Wowakrola amatye omabini, ngokomsebenzi womkroli wamatye,  ngokrolo lomsesane wokutywina, ngokwamagama oonyana bakaSirayeli, uwabhijele ngomluko wegolide.
2_28_12_Uze uwabeke amatye omabini ezizibeni zamagxa ze-efodi, abe ngamatye esikhumbuzo koonyana bakaSirayeli; awathwale uAron amagama abo phambi koYehova ezizibeni zamagxa akhe omabini, abe sisikhumbuzo.
2_28_13_Uze wenze nemiluko yegolide;
2_28_14_neentsontelo ezimbini zegolide ecocekileyo, uzenze zithi shinyi, zibe ngumsebenzi osontiweyo, uzifake iintsontelo ezo zisontiweyo emilukweni yegolide.
2_28_15_Uze ulwenze ubengo lwesigwebo, umsebenzi ke lowo wengcibi yokuluka, ulwenze njengokwenziwa kwe-efodi, ulwenze ngegolide,  nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo,  ephothiweyo.
2_28_16_Loba mbombo-ne, luphindwe: ubude balo bube kukolulwa kweminwe, ububanzi balo bube kukolulwa kweminwe.
2_28_17_Uze ufake kulo imifakwa yamatye, imikrozo emine yamatye;  ibe lukrozo lwesardiyo, netopazi, nesmarado, lukrozo lokuqala ke olo;
2_28_18_ukrozo lwesibini lube yirubhi, nesafire, nekalikedo;
2_28_19_ukrozo lwesithathu lube yihakinto, neagati, neametiste;
2_28_20_ukrozo lwesine lube yikrizolite, nebherilo, neyaspisi; ibe ngumluko wegolide ekufakweni kwawo;
2_28_21_amatye lawo abe umgokwamagama oonyana bakaSirayeli, abe lishumi elinamabini ngokwamagama abo; abe nokrolo lomsesane wokutywina, lithi elo libe negama lalo ngokwamagama ezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini.
2_28_22_Uze wenze elubengweni iintsontelo ezithe shinyi, umsebenzi ke lowo osontiweyo ngegolide ecocekileyo;
2_28_23_wenze elubengweni amakhonkco abe mabini ngegolide, uwafake loo makhonkco mabini emancamini omabini obengo;
2_28_24_uzifake iintsontelo zombini zegolide esontiweyo,  emakhonkcweni amabini asemancamini obengo;
2_28_25_namancam omabini eentsontelo zombini uwafake emilukweni yomibini, uwafake ezizibeni zamagxa e-efodi, phambili kuyo.
2_28_26_Uze wenze amakhonkco amabini ngegolide, uwafake emancamini omabini obengo, emphethweni walo okwicala elikhangelene ne-efodi, elibheke ngaphakathi;
2_28_27_wenze amanye amakhonkco amabini ngegolide, uwafake ezizibeni zozibini zamagxa e-efodi ngaphantsi, mayela nomphambili wayo, kufuphi nokuhlangana kwayo, entla kombhinqo we-efodi;
2_28_28_ulunxibelele ubengo ngamakhonkco alo emakhonkcweni e-efodi ngentsontelo yemisonto emsi, lube sentla kombhinqo we-efodi,  ukuze lungasuki ubengo kuyo iefodi.
2_28_29_Wowathwala uAron amagama oonyana bakaSirayeli elubengweni lwesigwebo phezu kwentliziyo yakhe, ekungeneni kwakhe engcweleni, luhlale lusisikhumbuzo phambi koYehova.
2_28_30_Uze ufake elubengweni lwesigwebo iiUrim neeTumim, zibe phezu kwentliziyo ka-Aron ekungeneni kwakhe phambi koYehova,  ahlale ethwele uAron isigwebo soonyana bakaSirayeli phezu kwentliziyo yakhe phambi koYehova.
2_28_31_Ingubo yokwaleka ye-efodi maze uyenze yonke ngemisonto emsi.
2_28_32_Umqala wamantla ayo woba sesazulwini sayo, umqala ube nomphetho owujikelezileyo, ongumsebenzi womluki, ube njengomqala wesigcina-sifuba kuyo, ukuze ingakrazuki.
2_28_33_Uze wenze emqukumbelweni wayo ngasezantsi iirharnate ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, zizunguleze emqukumbelweni wayo; namankenteza egolide phakathi kwazo, azunguleze.
2_28_34_Kobakho inkenteza legolide nerharnate, inkenteza legolide nerharnate, emqukumbelweni wengubo yokwaleka, kuzunguleze;
2_28_35_ayinxibe uAron, ukuba alungiselele; sivakale isandi sayo ekungeneni kwakhe engcweleni phambi koYehova, nasekuphumeni kwakhe, ukuze angafi.
2_28_36_Uze wenze imbasa ngegolide ecocekileyo, ukrole kuyo ngokrolo lomsesane wokutywina, uthi, ingcwele kuYehova;
2_28_37_uyifake umtya wemisonto emsi, inxitywe elunkontshweni.  Yoba ngaphambili elunkontshweni,
2_28_38_ibe sebunzi kuAron, ukuze abuthwale uAron ubungwenxa bezinto ezingcwele, abazingcwalisayo oonyana bakaSirayeli eminikelweni yabo yonke engcwele; ihlale isebunzi kuye, ukuze zibakholekise zona phambi koYehova.
2_28_39_Uze uyiluke ingubo yangaphantsi ngelinen ecikizekileyo,  unkontsho ulwenze ngelinen ecikizekileyo, uwenze nombhinqo ngokomsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki.
2_28_40_Wobenzela oonyana baka-Aron iingubo zangaphantsi, ubenzele umbhinqo; ubenzele neminqwazi, ibe yeyozuko neyokuhomba;
2_28_41_uzinxibe kuAron umkhuluwa wakho, nakoonyana bakhe benaye,  ubathambise, ubamisele, ubangcwalise, babe ngababingeleli kum.
2_28_42_Wobenzela iibhulukhwe zelinen emhlophe zokufihla ubuze babo, zithabathele esinqeni zise emathangeni;
2_28_43_bazinxibe uAron noonyana bakhe ekungeneni kwabo emnqubeni wokuhlangana, nasekusondeleni kwabo esibingelelweni, besiza kulungiselela engcweleni, bangathwali ubugwenxa bafe: ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade kuye, nakwimbewu yakhe emva kwakhe.
2_29_1_Yiyo le into owoyenza kubo yokubangcwalisa, ukuba babe ngababingeleli kum: Thabatha inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo,  neenkunzi zezimvu ezigqibeleleyo zibe mbini;
2_29_2_nesonka esingenagwele, nemiqhathane engenagwele egalelwe ioli, nezonkana ezisicaba, ezingenagwele, zithanjiswe ngeoli:  uzenze ngomgubo ocoliweyo.
2_29_3_Wozibeka ngobozini-nye, uzisondeze ngengobozi leyo,  kwanenkunzi entsha yenkomo, neenkunzi zezimvu zombini.
2_29_4_UAron noonyana bakhe uze ubasondeze emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, ubahlambe ngamanzi;
2_29_5_uzithabathe izambatho, umnxibe uAron ingubo engaphantsi,  nengubo yokwaleka ye-efodi, ne-efodi, nobengo, umbhinqise ngombhinqo we-efodi;
2_29_6_umbeke unkontsho entlokweni yakhe, ubeke isithsaba esingcwele elunkontshweni olo.
2_29_7_Uze uthabathe ioli yentambiso, uyithululele entlokweni yakhe, umthambise.
2_29_8_Oonyana bakhe ke wobasondeza, ubanxibe iingubo zangaphantsi;
2_29_9_ubabhinqise umbhinqo, uAron noonyana bakhe, ubanxibe iminqwazi, bube bobabo ububingeleli, bube ngummiselo ongunaphakade; ubamisele uAron noonyana bakhe.
2_29_10_Uze uyisondeze inkunzi entsha phambi kwentente yokuhlangana, uAron noonyana bakhe bacinezele ngezandla zabo entlokweni yenkunzi entsha.
2_29_11_Woyixhela inkunzi entsha phambi koYehova emnyango wentente yokuhlangana,
2_29_12_ucaphule egazini lenkunzi entsha, uliqabe ezimpondweni zesibingelelo ngomnwe wakho; lonke igazi uliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo;
2_29_13_uthabathe wonke umhlehlo ogubungele izibilini, nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, uqhumisele ngazo esibingelelweni.
2_29_14_Yona inyama yenkunzi entsha, nesikhumba sayo, nomswane wayo, wozitshisa ezo zinto ngomlilo, ngaphandle kweminquba yenu. Lidini lesono elo.
2_29_15_Woyithabatha enye inkunzi yemvu leyo, uAron noonyana bakhe bacinezele ngezandla zabo entlokweni yenkunzi yemvu leyo.
2_29_16_Uze uyixhele inkunzi yemvu, ulithabathe igazi layo,  ulitshize esibingelelweni, ujikelezise.
2_29_17_Woyityatya inkunzi yemvu, uzihlambe izibilini zayo neentungo zayo, uzibeke phezu kweenyama zayo, naphezu kwentloko yayo;
2_29_18_uqhumisele ngenkunzi yemvu iphela esibingelelweni. Elo lidini elinyukayo kuYehova, livumba elithozamisayo, kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova.
2_29_19_Uze uyithabathe eyesibini inkunzi yemvu, uAron noonyana bakhe bacinezele ngezandla zabo entlokweni yenkunzi yemvu leyo.
2_29_20_Woyixhela inkunzi yemvu, ucaphule egazini layo, uliqabe esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene ka-Aron, nasesithinzini sendlebe yasekunene yoonyana bakhe, nasesithupheni sesandla sabo sokunene, nakubhontsi wonyawo lwabo lwasekunene, ulitshize igazi esibingelelweni, ujikelezise;
2_29_21_ucaphule egazini eliphezu kwesibingelelo, naseolini yentambiso, ulifefe kuAron, nasezambathweni zakhe, nakoonyana bakhe, nasezambathweni zoonyana bakhe ndawonye naye,  bangcwaliswe ke, yena nezambatho zakhe, noonyana bakhe,  nezambatho zoonyana bakhe ndawonye naye.
2_29_22_Uze uthabathe enkunzini yemvu amanqatha, nomsila,  nomhlehlo ogubungele izibilini, nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi,  nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, nomlenze wasekunene; kuba yinkunzi yemvu yokumisela;
2_29_23_nentendana yesonka, nomqhathane ogalelwe ioli ube mnye,  nesonkana esisicaba sibe sinye, engobozini yezonka ezingenagwele eziphambi koYehova.
2_29_24_Wozibeka zonke ezo zinto ezandleni zika-Aron, nasezandleni zoonyana bakhe, uzitshangatshangise, zibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova;
2_29_25_uzithabathe ezandleni zabo, uqhumisele ngazo esibingelelweni, phezu kwedini elinyukayo, zibe livumba elithozamisayo phambi koYehova. Oko kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova.
2_29_26_Uze uthabathe incum yenkunzi yemvu yokumisela uAron,  uyitshangatshangise ibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova,  sibe sisabelo sakho eso.
2_29_27_Woyingcwalisa incum yomtshangatshangiso otshangatshangisiweyo, nomlenze womrhumo orhunyiweyo, enkunzini yemvu yokumisela uAron noonyana bakhe;
2_29_28_ibe yeka-Aron noonyana bakhe; ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade, iphuma koonyana bakaSirayeli, kuba ingumrhumo.  Woba ngumrhumo ophuma koonyana bakaSirayeli emibingelelweni yabo yoxolo, umrhumo wabo kuYehova.
2_29_29_Izambatho ezingcwele ezikuAron zoba zezoonyana bakhe emva kwakhe, bathanjiswe ngeoli bezambethe, bamiselwe kuzo.
2_29_30_Lowo ungumbingeleli esikhundleni sakhe, koonyana bakhe,  wozambatha imihla esixhenxe ekungeneni kwakhe ententeni yokuhlangana, ukuba alungiselele engcweleni.
2_29_31_Inkunzi yemvu yokumisela uze uyithabathe, uyipheke inyama yayo endaweni engcwele;
2_29_32_bayidle ooAron noonyana bakhe inyama yenkunzi yemvu,  kwanesonka esisengobozini, emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
2_29_33_Ezo zinto, bekucanyagushwe ngazo, ukubamisela nokubangcwalisa, mabazidle; owasemzini makangazidli, kuba zingcwele.
2_29_34_Ukuba kuthe kwasala nto enyameni yokumisela nasezonkeni,  kwada kwasa, uze uyitshise ngomlilo loo nto iseleyo; ingadliwa,  kuba ingcwele.
2_29_35_Uze wenjenje kuAron nakoonyana bakhe ngokweento zonke endikuwisele umthetho ngazo; wobamisela iintsuku zibe sixhenxe.
2_29_36_Uze wenze idini lesono ngenkunzi entsha imini ngemini,  ukuze kucanyagushwe; isibingelelo usihlambulule isono ekusicamagusheleni kwakho, usithambise, singcwaliswe.
2_29_37_Imihla yoba sixhenxe isibingelelo usicamagushela,  usingcwalise, sibe sisibingelelo esiyingcwele kangcwele. Zonke izinto ezisichukumisayo isibingelelo eso zoba ngcwele.
2_29_38_Yiyo ke le into oya kuyibingelela esibingelelweni:  ziimvana ezimnyaka mnye zibe mbini, imini ngemini amaxesha onke.
2_29_39_Enye imvana woyibingelela kusasa, eyesibini imvana uyibingelele lakutshona ilanga.
2_29_40_Kwimvana yokuqala uze wenze isahlulo seshumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli engqushiweyo esisahlulo sesine sehin, ndawonye nomnikelo othululwayo osisahlulo sesine sehin yewayini.
2_29_41_Eyesibini imvana woyibingelela lakutshona ilanga, uyenze ngokomnikelo wokudla wakusasa, nangokomnikelo walo othululwayo,  ibe livumba elithozamisayo, ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova.
2_29_42_Elo loba lidini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke kwizizukulwana zenu, emnyango wentente yokuhlangana phambi koYehova, apho ndiya kuhlangana nani khona, ndithethe nawe.
2_29_43_Khona apho ndohlangana noonyana bakaSirayeli, bangcwaliswe ngobuqaqawuli bam;
2_29_44_ndiyingcwalise intente yokuhlangana nesibingelelo, noAron noonyana bakhe ndibangcwalise, babe ngababingeleli bam.
2_29_45_Ndohlala phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, ndibe nguThixo wabo;
2_29_46_bazi ukuba ndinguYehova uThixo wabo, owabakhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, ukuba ndihlale phakathi kwabo: ndinguYehova uThixo wabo.
2_30_1_Uze wenze isibingelelo sokuqhumisela ngesiqhumiso, usenze ngomngampunzi.
2_30_2_Ubude baso boba yikubhite, ububanzi baso bube yikubhite,  sibe mbombo-ne; ukuphakama kwaso kube ziikubhite ezimbini,  ziphume kuso iimpondo zaso.
2_30_3_Umphezulu waso wowaleka ngegolide ecocekileyo, namacala aso ngeenxa zonke, neempondo zaso; usithi jize ngesithsaba segolide.
2_30_4_Uze usenzele amakhonkco abe mabini ngegolide phantsi kwesithsaba saso, ezimbombeni zaso ezimbini, emacaleni aso omabini, abe ziindawo zezibonda, sithwalwe ngazo;
2_30_5_uzenze izibonda ngomngampunzi, uzaleke ngegolide.
2_30_6_Uze usibeke nganeno komkhusane ongasetyeyeni yesingqino,  phambi kwesihlalo sokucamagusha esiphezu kwesingqino, apho ndiya kuhlangana nawe khona.
2_30_7_Woqhumisela kuso uAron ngesiqhumiso esimnandi, imiso ngemiso. Woqhumisela ngaso ekulungiseni kwakhe izibane;
2_30_8_ekuzimiseni uAron izibane, lakutshona ilanga, ahlale eqhumisela ngesiqhumiso phambi koYehova, kwizizukulwana zenu.
2_30_9_Kuso nize ninganyusi siqhumiso esingesesikweni, nadini linyukayo, namnikelo wakudla; namnikelo uthululwayo ningawuthululeli kuso.
2_30_10_UAron makacamagushele iimpondo zaso kube kanye ngomnyaka;  ngegazi ledini lesono lokucamagusha, kube kanye ngomnyaka;  asicamagushele kuse kwizizukulwana zenu: siyingcwele kangcwele kuYehova.
2_30_11_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
2_30_12_Xa ulithabathayo inani loonyana bakaSirayeli, ngokubalelwa kwabo encwadini yomlibo wokuzalwa, mabanikele elowo imali yokucamagushela umphefumlo wakhe kuYehova ekubabaleni; ukuze kungabikho sibetho kubo ekubabaleni.
2_30_13_Nantsi loo nto: bonke abagqithela kwababaliweyo mabanike isiqingatha seshekele ngokweshekele yengcwele (ishekele leyo iziigera ezimashumi mabini); isiqingatha seshekele leyo yoba ngumrhumo kuYehova.
2_30_14_Bonke abagqithela kwababaliweyo, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, benyusa, mabamnike uYehova umrhumo.
2_30_15_Isityebi asiyi kugqithisa, nosweleyo akayi kubetha nganeno kwesiqingatha seshekele, ukumnika umrhumo uYehova,  ukucamagushela imiphefumlo yenu.
2_30_16_Uze uyithabathe imali yokucamagusha koonyana bakaSirayeli,  uyinikele enkonzweni yentente yokuhlangana; ukuze ibe sisikhumbuzo koonyana bakaSirayeli, phambi koYehova,  ukucamagushela imiphefumlo yenu.
2_30_17_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses esithi,
2_30_18_Yenza uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela ngobhedu, noseko lwalo ngobhedu, kuhlanjelwe kulo; ulubeke phakathi kwentente yokuhlangana nesibingelelo, ugalele amanzi kulo;
2_30_19_bahlambele kulo uAron noonyana bakhe izandla zabo neenyawo zabo.
2_30_20_Ekungeneni kwabo ententeni yokuhlangana bohlamba ngamanzi,  bangafi; nasekusondeleni kwabo esibingelelweni, besiza kulungiselela nokuqhumisela ngokudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova;
2_30_21_bohlamba ke izandla zabo neenyawo zabo, ukuze bangafi; ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade kubo, kuye lo, nakwimbewu yakhe kwizizukulwana zabo.
2_30_22_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses esithi,
2_30_23_Thabathela kuwe ubulawu bohlobo: imore, ezivuzelayo ngokwayo, engamakhulu amahlanu eeshekele; isinamon enobulawu ibe sisiqingatha soko, amakhulu abe mabini anamanci mahlanu;  nekalamo evumba limnandi, amakhulu abe mabini anamanci mahlanu;
2_30_24_nekasiya, amakhula abe mahlanu ngokweshekele yengcwele;  neoli yeminquma ibe yihin;
2_30_25_uyenze ibe yioli engcwele yokuthambisa, isiqholo sokuqhola, umsebenzi womqholi, ibe yioli engcwele yokuthambisa.
2_30_26_Uze uthambise ngayo intente yokuhlangana, netyeya yesingqino,
2_30_27_netafile nempahla yayo yonke, nesiphatho sezibane nempahla yaso, nesibingelelo sokuqhumisela,
2_30_28_nesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo neempahla zaso zonke,  nohehema lwesitya sokuhlambela, noseko lwalo;
2_30_29_uzingcwalise zibe yingcwele kangcwele. Zonke izinto ezizichukumisayo zoba ngcwele.
2_30_30_UAron noonyana bakhe uze ubathambise, ubangcwalise, babe ngababingeleli kum.
2_30_31_Wothetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Yoba yioli engcwele yokuthambisa kum le, kwizizukulwana zenu.
2_30_32_Ize ingagalelwa nyameni yamntu; uze ungenzi enjengayo ngomlinganiso wayo; ingcwele yona, mayibe ngcwele kuni.
2_30_33_Umntu osukuba eqhola enjengayo, nosukuba ethabatha kuyo ayinike ongengowakuni, wonqanyulwa, angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
2_30_34_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Zithabathele ubulawu, istorakis,  neonike, negalebhana; ubulawu obo bube nentlaka emhlophe engangxengelelweyo, ibe yimilinganiso elinganayo;
2_30_35_wenze ngabo isiqhumiso esiqholiweyo, umsebenzi womqholi,  sigalelwe ityuwa, sihlambulukile, singcwele.
2_30_36_Woyisila inxenye yazo icoleke, ucaphule, ubeke phambi kwesingqino ententeni yokuhlangana, apho ndiya kuhlangana nawe khona; yoba yingcwele kangcwele kuni.
2_30_37_Isiqhumiso eso, oya kusenza ngokomlinganiso waso, ize ningazenzeli okwenu; kuwe soba yingcwele kuYehova.
2_30_38_Umntu osukuba enze esinjengaso, ukuba asijoje,  wonqanyulwa, angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
2_31_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses esithi,
2_31_2_Khangela, ndibize ngegama uBhetsaleli unyana kaUri, unyana kaHuri, wesizwe sakwaYuda;
2_31_3_ndamzalisa ngomoya kaThixo, ngobulumko, nangokuqonda,  nangokwazi, nangobungcibi bamashishini onke;
2_31_4_ukuba athelekelele, ayile, asebenze ngegolide nangesilivere nangobhedu,
2_31_5_nangokukrola amatye, awafake, nangokukrola imithi, asebenze amashishini onke.
2_31_6_Yabona, mna ndimkhuphe kunye noAholiyabhi unyana ka-Ahisamaki, wesizwe sakwaDan; nasezintliziyweni zabo bonke abalumkileyo entliziyweni ndibeke ubulumko, ukuza bazenze zonke izinto endikuwisele umthetho ngazo:
2_31_7_intente yokuhlangana, netyeya yesingqino, nesihlalo sokucamagusha esiphezu kwayo, nempahla yonke yentente,
2_31_8_netafile nempahla yayo, nesiphatho sezibane esicocekileyo,  nempahla yaso yonke, nesibingelelo sokuqhumisela,
2_31_9_nesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo nempahla yaso yonke,  nohehema lwesitya sokuhlambela, noseko lwalo;
2_31_10_nezambatho zokubusa, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aron umbingeleli, nezambatho zoonyana bakhe zokwenzelelela;
2_31_11_neoli yokuthambisa, nesiqhumiso esimnandi sengcwele; benze njengako konke endikuwisele umthetho ngako.
2_31_12_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses esithi,
2_31_13_Wena, thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli uthi, Inene, iisabatha zam zigcineni; kuba zingumqondiso phakathi kwam nani kwizizukulwana zenu, ukuze nazi ukuba ndinguYehova oningcwalisayo;
2_31_14_niyigcine isabatha, kuba ingcwele kuni. Lowo uyihlambelayo wobulawa afe; kuba bonke abo basebenza umsebenzi ngayo, loo miphefumlo yonqanyulwa, ingabikho ebantwini bakowayo.
2_31_15_Imihla emithandathu wosebenza umsebenzi ngayo, ke umhla wesixhenxe yisabatha kasabatha, ingcwele kuYehova; bonke abo basebenza umsebenzi ngomhla wesabatha, bobulawa bafe.
2_31_16_Oonyana bakaSirayeli mabayigcine ke isabatha, bayenze isabatha kwizizukulwana zabo: ingumnqophiso ongunaphakade.
2_31_17_Phakathi kwam noonyana bakaSirayeli, ngumqondiso ongunaphakade; kuba imihla emithandathu uYehova wenza izulu nomhlaba, waphumla ngomhla wesixhenxe, waphefumla.
2_31_18_Akukhova ukuthetha naye entabeni yaseSinayi, wamnika uMoses amacwecwe amabini esingqino, amacwecwe amatye, ebhalwe ngomnwe kaThixo.
2_32_1_Ke babona abantu ukuba uMoses ulibele, akehli entabeni;  bababizela ndawonye abantu kuAron, bathi kuye, Sukume, usenzele uthixo oya kuhamba phambi kwethu; kuba lo Moses, le ndoda yasinyusayo ezweni laseYiputa, asazi ukuba uhlelwe yintoni na.
2_32_2_Wathi uAron kubo, Qhawulani amajikazi egolide,  asezindlebeni zabafazi benu, noonyana benu, neentombi zenu,  niwazise kum.
2_32_3_Bawaqhawula ke abantu bonke amajikazi egolide abesezindlebeni zabo, bawazisa kuAron.
2_32_4_Wawathabatha ezandleni zabo, wayikrola igolide ngentlabo,  wayenza ithole elityhidiweyo. Bathi, Nanko uthixo wakho,  Sirayeli, okunyusileyo ezweni laseYiputa!
2_32_5_Wabona uAron, wakha isibingelelo phambi kwalo; wadanduluka uAron wathi, Ngumthendeleko kuYehova ngomso.
2_32_6_Bavuka kusasa ngengomso, banyusa amadini anyukayo,  basondeza imibingelelo yoxolo; bahlala phantsi abantu, badla basela, besuka bema, badlala.
2_32_7_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Hamba uhle; kuba abantu bakho,  owabanyusayo ezweni laseYiputa, bonakalisile;
2_32_8_batyeke msinya endleleni endabawisela umthetho ngayo;  bazenzele ithole elityhidiweyo, balinqula, babingelela kulo,  bathi, Nanko uthixo wakho, Sirayeli, okunyusileyo ezweni laseYiputa.
2_32_9_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Ndibakhangele aba bantu; uyabona,  ngabantu abantamo ilukhuni.
2_32_10_Kaloku ndiyeke, uvuthe umsindo wam kubo, ndibadle, ndenze wena uhlanga olukhulu.
2_32_11_UMoses wambongoza uYehova uThixo wakhe, wathi, Yini na,  Yehova, ukuba uvuthe umsindo wakho kubantu bakho, obakhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa ngamandla amakhulu, nangesandla esithe nkqi?
2_32_12_Yini na ukuba amaYiputa atsho ukuthi, Wabakhuphela ububi,  ukuze ababulalele ezintabeni, abagqibele bemke emhlabeni? Buya ekuvutheni komsindo wakho, uzohlwaye ngobubi obo ngenxa yabantu bakho.
2_32_13_Khumbula uAbraham noIsake noSirayeli, abakhonzi bakho,  owazifunga ngokwakho kubo, wathi kubo, Ndiya kuyandisa imbewu yenu ibe njengeenkwenkwezi zezulu, neli lizwe lonke ndithethileyo ngalo, ndiya kulinika imbewu yenu, ilidle ilifa ngonaphakade.
2_32_14_Wazohlwaya ke uYehova ngobubi abethe uya kubenza ebantwini bakhe.
2_32_15_Wajika uMoses, wehla entabeni, enamacwecwe omabini esingqino esandleni sakhe, amacwecwe lawo ebhalwe ngamacala omabini, ebhalwe ngapha nangapha.
2_32_16_Amacwecwe lawo ebengumsebenzi kaThixo, nombhalo lowo ubungumbhalo kaThixo ukroliwe emacwecweni.
2_32_17_Waliva uYoshuwa izwi labantu ekudumeni kwabo, wathi kuMoses, Lilizwi lemfazwe eminqubeni.
2_32_18_Wathi yena, Asilizwi lakuduma kwabeyisayo, asilizwi lakukhala kwabeyiswayo; lilizwi labahlabelayo nabavumayo,  endilivayo mna.
2_32_19_Kwathi, xa asondelayo eminqubeni, walibona ithole nomdudo.  Wavutha umsindo kaMoses, wawalahla amacwecwe, wawaqhekeza emazantsi entaba.
2_32_20_Walithabatha ithole ababelenzile, walitshisa ngomlilo,  walisila lada lacoleka, waligcwayela emanzini, waseza oonyana bakaSirayeli.
2_32_21_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Benze ntoni na aba bantu kuwe, ukuba ubazisele isono esikhulu kangaka?
2_32_22_Wathi uAron, Umsindo wenkosi yam mawungavuthi. Wena uyabazi aba bantu, ukuba banobubi.
2_32_23_Bathi kum, Senzele uthixo oya kuhamba phambi kwethu; kuba lo Moses, le ndoda yasinyusayo ezweni laseYiputa, asazi ukuba uhlelwe yintoni na.
2_32_24_Ndathi kubo, Ubani onegolide makayiqhawule; bandinika ke.  Ndayiphosa emlilweni kwaphuma eli thole.
2_32_25_Wababona uMoses abantu, ukuba baqhawule umkhala (kuba uAron ebebaqhawulisile umkhala, ukuba babe yintlekisa phakathi kwabo bachasene nabo);
2_32_26_wema uMoses ekungeneni eminqubeni, wathi, OngakuYehova makeze kum apha. Bantontelana kuye bonke oonyana bakaLevi.
2_32_27_Wathi kubo, Utsho uYehova uThixo wakwaSirayeli, ukuthi,  Mabanxibe elowo ikrele lakhe ethangeni lakhe, bathunge bephuma emasangweni eminquba, babulale elowo umzalwana wakhe, elowo uwabo, elowo ummelwane wakhe.
2_32_28_Benza oonyana bakaLevi ngokwelizwi likaMoses; kwawa ebantwini loo mini ngathi ngamawaka omathathu amadoda.
2_32_29_Wathi uMoses, Zimiseleni namhla kuYehova, ukuba umntu achase unyana wakhe nomzalwana wakhe, ithotywe namhla intsikelelo phezu kwenu.
2_32_30_Kwathi ngengomso, uMoses wathi ebantwini, Nonile nina,  nenza isono esikhulu; ndiya kunyuka ngoku ndiye kuYehova;  mhlawumbi ndingacamagusha ngenxa yesono senu.
2_32_31_UMoses wabuya waya kuYehova, wathi, Yoo! Aba bantu bonile,  benza isono esikhulu, bazenzela uthixo ngegolide.
2_32_32_Khawusixolele ngoko isono sabo; ukuba akunakuba njalo,  wose undicima encwadini yakho oyibhalileyo.
2_32_33_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Ubani osukuba onile kum, ndiya kucima yena encwadini yam.
2_32_34_Ke ngoko hamba ubalathise abantu, baye kuloo ndawo ndathethayo ngayo kuwe. Yabona, isithunywa sam sohamba phambi kwakho; ke mini ndivelelayo, ndiya kusivelela isono sabo kubo.
2_32_35_Ke uYehova wababulala abantu ngenxa yokuba belenzile ithole elo walenzayo uAron.
2_33_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Hamba unyuke, umke apha, wena nabantu obanyusileyo ezweni laseYiputa, uye kulo ilizwe endalifungela uAbraham noIsake noYakobi, ndisithi, Ndiya kulinika imbewu yakho.
2_33_2_Ndothuma phambi kwakho isithunywa, ndiwagxothe amaKanan,  nama-Amori, namaHeti, namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi;
2_33_3_niye ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi; ke andisayi kunyuka phakathi kwenu nina; kuba ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni, hleze ndiniphelise endleleni.
2_33_4_Baliva ke abantu elo lizwi libi, benza isijwili; akwabakho mntu uzinxibayo izivatho zakhe.
2_33_5_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yithi koonyana bakaSirayeli,  Ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni; ndingathi, ndinyuke phakathi kwenu, ndiniphelise ngephanyazo. Ke ngoko, zikhululeni izivatho zenu, ndize ndazi endokwenza kuni.
2_33_6_Bazijaca oonyana bakaSirayeli izivatho zabo, beqalela entabeni yaseHorebhe.
2_33_7_Wayithabatha uMoses intente, wayitwabululela ngaphandle kweminquba, kude neminquba, wathi yintente yokuhlangana. Kwathi ke, bonke abamfunayo uYehova baphuma, baya ententeni leyo yokuhlangana ingaphandle kweminquba.
2_33_8_Kwathi, xa uMoses aphumayo esiya ententeni leyo, besuka bema bonke abantu, walowo wema emnyango wentente yakhe,  wakhangela kuMoses, wada waya kungena ententeni leyo.
2_33_9_Kwathi, xa uMoses wangenayo ententeni leyo, wehla umqulu welifu, wema emnyango wentente leyo; wathetha yena noMoses.
2_33_10_Bawubona abantu bonke umqulu welifu, umi emnyango wentente leyo; besuka bema bonke abantu, baza baqubuda, elowo esemnyango wentente yakhe.
2_33_11_UYehova wathetha kuMoses, bekhangelene ebusweni,  njengomntu ethetha nomhlobo wakhe, wabuyela kwaseminqubeni; ke umlungiseleli wakhe, uYoshuwa unyana kaNun, umfana, akasukanga yena ententeni leyo.
2_33_12_Wathi uMoses kuYehova, Uyabona, uthi kum, Nyusa aba bantu;  ke wena akundazisanga lowo uya kundithuma naye; kanti ke uthe,  Ndikwazile ngegama, kananjalo ndikubabale.
2_33_13_Ngoko ukuba undibabale, khawundazise indlela yakho, ukuze ndikwazi, ukuze undibabale, ukhumbule ukuba olu hlanga lungabantu bakho.
2_33_14_Wathi, Ubuso bam bohamba nawe, ndikunike ukuphumla.
2_33_15_Wathi kuye, Ukuba ubuso bakho abuhambi nathi, musa ukusinyusa, simke apha.
2_33_16_Kuya kwaziwa kwaziwe ngantoni na khona, ukuba undibabale mna nabantu bakho? Akungokuthi na uhambe nathi, sibaluleke thina, mna nabantu bakho, ebantwini bonke abaphezu komhlaba?
2_33_17_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Nale nto uyithethileyo ndiya kuyenza; kuba ndikubabale, ndikwazile ngegama.
2_33_18_Wathi yena, Khawundibonise ubuqaqawuli bakho.
2_33_19_Wathi, Ndiya kukudlulisa konke ukulunga kwam ebusweni bakho, ndivakalise igama likaYehova phambi kwakho, ndibabale endimbabalayo, ndisikwe yimfesane kondosikwa yimfesane ngaye.
2_33_20_Wathi, Akunakububona ubuso bam; kuba akukho mntu undibona aphile.
2_33_21_Wathi uYehova, Nantsi ke indawo ngakum; uze ume phezu kweliwa;
2_33_22_kuthi, ekudluleni kobuqaqawuli bam, ndikubeke emqhokrweni weliwa, ndikugubungele ngesandla sam, ndide ndidlule;
2_33_23_ndize ndisuse isandla sam, uwubone umva wam. Ke bona ubuso bam abuyi kubonwa.
2_34_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Ziqingqele amacwecwe amatye abe mabini, njengawokuqala, ndiwabhale emacwecweni lawo amazwi abesemacwecweni okuqala owawaqhekezayo;
2_34_2_ulunge kusasa, unyuke kusasa, uye entabeni yaseSinayi, ume ngakum khona encotsheni yentaba.
2_34_3_Kuze kunganyuki mntu nawe, kuze kungabonwa mntu kuyo yonke intaba, kuze kungadli mpahla imfutshane nankomo, isingise entabeni leyo.
2_34_4_Wawaqingqa amacwecwe amatye amabini, njengawokuqala. Wavuka uMoses kusasa, wenyuka waya entabeni yaseSinayi, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho ngako, waphatha esandleni sakhe amacwecwe amatye omabini.
2_34_5_Wehla uYehova esefini, wema khona naye, wavakalisa igama likaYehova.
2_34_6_UYehova wadlula ebusweni bakhe, wavakalisa esithi, UYehova,  uYehova, uThixo onemfesane, onobabalo, ozeka kade umsindo,  omninzi ngenceba nenyaniso;
2_34_7_olondolozela amawaka inceba, oxolela ubugwenxa, nokreqo,  nesono; ongakhe amenze msulwa onetyala, obuvelelayo ubugwenxa booyise koonyana, nakoonyana boonyana kwesesithathu nakwesesine isizukulwana!
2_34_8_Wakhawuleza uMoses, wathoba emhlabeni, waqubuda kuye.
2_34_9_Wathi, Ukuba undibabale, Nkosi yam, mayihambe phakathi kwethu iNkosi yam; kuba bengabantu abantamo ilukhuni. Xolela ubugwenxa bethu nesono sethu, usenze ilifa lakho.
