2_34_10_Wathi, Yabona, ndenza umnqophiso; ndiya kwenza imisebenzi ebalulekileyo, engazanga idalwe ehlabathini lonke nasezintlangeni zonke, phambi kwabantu bonke bakowenu; bonke abantu ophakathi kwabo wena bowubona umsebenzi kaYehova;  ngokuba yinto eyoyikekayo eniya kuyenza kuwe.
2_34_11_Kugcine oko ndikuwisela umthetho ngako namhla. Yabona,  ndigxotha ebusweni bakho ama-Amori, namaKanan, namaHeti,  namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi.
2_34_12_Zigcine, hleze wenze umnqophiso nabemi belo zwe ungena kulo; hleze babe ngumgibe phakathi kwakho.
2_34_13_Nozidiliza izibingelelo zabo, niziqhekeze izimiso zabo zamatye, nibagawule ooAshera babo.
2_34_14_Kuba akusayi kungqula thixo wumbi; kuba uYehova nguKhwele,  igama lakhe, nguThixo onekhwele;
2_34_15_hleze wenze umnqophiso nabemi belo zwe, baze bahenyuze ngokulandela oothixo babo, babingelele koothixo babo, bakubize udle umbingelelo wabo;
2_34_16_uzekele oonyana bakho ezintombini zabo, zize iintombi zabo zihenyuze ngokulandela oothixo babo, zibenyuzise noonyana bakho, ngokubalandelisa oothixo babo.
2_34_17_Uze ungazenzeli oothixo abatyhidiweyo.
2_34_18_Umthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele uze uwugcine. Iintsuku ezisixhenxe wodla izonka ezingenagwele, njengoko ndakuwisela umthetho, ngexesha elimisiweyo lenyanga enguAbhibhi; kuba waphuma eYiputa ngenyanga enguAbhibhi.
2_34_19_Yonke into evula isizalo yeyam, nemfuyo yakho yonke evula isizalo engamaduna, nokuba yinkomo, nokuba yimvu;
2_34_20_ke lona izibulo le-esile wolikhulula ngokulimisela ngexhwane; ukuba akuthanga ulikhulule ngokulimisela, wolaphula intamo. Bonke oonyana bakho bamazibulo uze ubakhulule ngokubamisela; mabangabonakali phambi kwam bengaphethe lutho.
2_34_21_Wosebenza imihla emithandathu; ke ngomhla wesixhenxe uze uphumle, uphumle ekulimeni nasekuvuneni.
2_34_22_Uze uwenze umthendeleko weeveki, wentlahlela yokuvunwa kwengqolowa; nomthendeleko wokuhlanganisela ukutya emakhaya ekupheleni komnyaka.
2_34_23_Izihlandlo ezithathu ngomnyaka, yonke into engamadoda yakowenu yobonakala ebusweni beNkosi uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli.
2_34_24_Kuba ndiya kuzigqogqa iintlanga phambi kwakho, ndiwenze banzi umda wakho, linganqwenelwa nangubani ilizwe lakho,  ekunyukeni kwakho usiya kubonakala ebusweni bukaYehova uThixo wakho, izihlandlo ezithathu ngomnyaka.
2_34_25_Igazi lombingelelo wam uze ungalibingeleli phezu kwento enegwele; nombingelelo womthendeleko wepasika uze ungahlali kude kuse.
2_34_26_Ingqalo yentlahlela yomhlaba wakho uze uyise endlwini kaYehova uThixo wakho. Uze ungalipheki itakane ngobisi lukanina.
2_34_27_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Wabhale la mazwi; kuba ndenze ngokuthetha kwala mazwi umnqophiso nawe noSirayeli.
2_34_28_Waye ekhona ke enoYehova iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane; akadla sonka, akasela manzi. Wawabhala emacwecweni amazwi omnqophiso, la mazwi alishumi.
2_34_29_Kwathi, ekuhleni kukaMoses entabeni yaseSinayi, amacwecwe omabini esingqino esesandleni sikaMoses ekuhleni kwakhe entabeni, akazi uMoses, ukuba ulusu lobuso bakhe belukhazimla ekuthetheni kwakhe naye.
2_34_30_UAron noonyana bonke bakaSirayeli bambona uMoses. Yini?  Ulusu lobuso bakhe luyakhazimla; boyika ukusondela kuye.
2_34_31_Wababiza uMoses, babuyela kuye uAron nezikhulu zonke zebandla, wathetha nazo uMoses.
2_34_32_Emveni koko basondela bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli,  wabawisela umthetho wako konke abekuthethile uYehova kuye entabeni yaseSinayi.
2_34_33_Wagqiba uMoses ukuthetha nabo, wabeka isigqubuthelo ebusweni bakhe.
2_34_34_Ekungeneni kukaMoses phambi koYehova, esiya kuthetha naye,  wasisusa isigqubuthelo, wada waphuma. Waphuma, wathetha koonyana bakaSirayeli oko abemwisele umthetho ngako.
2_34_35_Babubona oonyana bakaSirayeli ubuso bukaMoses, ukuba ulusu lobuso bukaMoses luyakhazimla. Wabuya wasibeka uMoses isigqubuthelo ebusweni bakhe, wada wangena, waya kuthetha naye.
2_35_1_Walibizela ndawonye uMoses lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli, wathi kubo, Zizo ezi iindawo uYehova aniwisele umthetho ngazo, ukuba nizenze.
2_35_2_Wosebenza imihla emithandathu; ke umhla wesixhenxe woba yingcwele kuni, isabatha kasabatha kuYehova; bonke abenza umsebenzi ngayo bobulawa.
2_35_3_Ize ningaphembi mlilo ezindlwini zenu zonke ngomhla wesabatha.
2_35_4_Wathetha uMoses kwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli,  wathi, Yiyo le indawo ayiwisele umthetho uYehova:
2_35_5_uthi, Thabathani phakathi kwenu, nise umrhumo kuYehova;  bonke abantliziyo zibaqhubayo mabazise umrhumo kaYehova:  igolide, nesilivere, nobhedu;
2_35_6_nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo,  noboya beebhokhwe;
2_35_7_nezintsu zeenkunzi zezimvu, zenziwe zayingqombela,  nezikhumba zamahlengezi; nemingampunzi;
2_35_8_neoli yesiphatho sezibane, nobulawu beoli yokuthambisa,  nobesiqhumiso esimnandi;
2_35_9_namatye ebherilo, namatye okufakwa e-efodini naselubengweni.
2_35_10_Bonke benentliziyo elumkileyo kuni mabeze, benze zonke izinto uYehova awise umthetho ngazo:
2_35_11_umnquba nentente yawo, nesigubungelo sayo, amagwegwe ayo,  neeplanga zayo, nemivalo yayo, neentsika zayo, neziseko zayo;
2_35_12_ityeya nezibonda zayo, isihlalo sokucamagusha, nomkhusane wokusithelisa;
2_35_13_itafile nezibonda zayo, neempahla zayo zonke, nezonka zokubonisa;
2_35_14_isiphatho sezibane zokukhanyisa, nempahla yaso, nezibane zaso, neoli yokukhanyisa;
2_35_15_isibingelelo sokuqhumisela nezibonda zaso, neoli yokuthambisa, nesiqhumiso esimnandi, nesisitheliso somnyango emnyango womnquba;
2_35_16_isibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, nothango lwaso lobhedu,  nezibonda zaso, neempahla zaso zonke; nohehema lwesitya sokuhlambela, noseko lwalo;
2_35_17_amawunduwundu entendelezo, neentsika zayo, neziseko zayo,  nesisitheliso somnyango wentendelezo;
2_35_18_izikhonkwane zomnquba, nezikhonkwane zentendelezo,  nezintya zazo;
2_35_19_izambatho zokubusa, zokulungiselela engcweleni, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aron umbingeleli, nezambatho zoonyana bakhe zokwenzelelela.
2_35_20_Lemka ke lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli phambi koMoses.
2_35_21_Beza bonke abantu abantliziyo yabavuselelayo, abo bonke bamoya wabaqhubayo, bawuzisa umrhumo kaYehova emsebenzini wentente yokuhlangana, nasenkonzweni yayo yonke,  nasezambathweni ezingcwele.
2_35_22_Beza, amadoda kwanabafazi, bonke abantliziyo zibaqhubayo,  bezisa izacholo, namajikazi, nemisesane, nezidanga, yonke impahla yegolide; bonke abantu ababetshangatshangise kuYehova umtshangatshangiso wegolide, bawuzisa.
2_35_23_Bonke abantu abafunyanwa benemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu,  nelinen ecikizekileyo, noboya bebhokhwe, nezintsu zeenkunzi zezimvu zenziwe zayingqombela, nezikhumba zamahlengezi,  bazizisa.
2_35_24_Bonke abarhuma umrhumo wesilivere, nowobhedu, bawuzisa umrhumo kaYehova; bonke abafunyanwa benemingampunzi yomsebenzi wonke wenkonzo, bayizisa.
2_35_25_Bonke abafazi abantliziyo zilumkileyo basonta ngezandla zabo, bazizisa ezo nto zisontiweyo; imisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo.
2_35_26_Abafazi bonke, abantliziyo yabavuselelayo ngobulumko,  basonta uboya beebhokhwe.
2_35_27_Izikhulu zazisa amatye ebherilo, namatye okufakwa e-efodini naselubengweni, nobulawu,
2_35_28_neoli yesiphatho sezibane, neyamafutha okuthambisa,  neyesiqhumiso esimnandi.
2_35_29_Oonyana bakaSirayeli bazisa ke kuYehova umnikelo wokuqhutywa yintliziyo; nawo onke amadoda nabafazi bonke bantliziyo zabaqhubayo ukuyizisela yonke imisebenzi awawisa umthetho uYehova ngesandla sikaMoses, ukuba yenziwe.
2_35_30_Wathi uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli, Khangelani, UYehova umbize ngegama uBhetsaleli, unyana kaUri, unyana kaHuri,  wesizwe sakwaYuda.
2_35_31_Umzalisile ngoMoya kaThixo, ngobulumko, nangengqondo,  nangokwazi, nangobungcibi bamashishini onke,
2_35_32_ukuba athelekelele, ayile, asebenze ngegolide nangesilivere nangobhedu;
2_35_33_nangokukrola amatye, awafake; nangokukrola imithi,  asebenze imisebenzi yonke ngentelekelelo.
2_35_34_Ubeke entliziyweni yakhe ukuyala, yena ke kwanoAholiyabhi unyana ka-Ahisamaki, wesizwe sakwaDan.
2_35_35_Ubazalise ngobulumko bentliziyo, ukuba benze umsebenzi wonke wokukrola, nowokuluka, ukuluka imfakamfele, ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, neyomluki, babe ngabenzi bomsebenzi wonke, nabathelekeleli bokuyila.
2_36_1_Bosebenza ke ooBhetsaleli noAholiyabhi namadoda onke antliziyo zilumkileyo, awanikeleyo uYehova ubulumko nengqondo,  ukuba akwazi ukusebenza yonke imisebenzi yenkonzo yengcwele,  nento yonke abewise umthetho ngayo uYehova.
2_36_2_UMoses wabiza ooBhetsaleli noAholiyabhi namadoda onke antliziyo zilumkileyo, antliziyo uYehova wazinikayo ubulumko,  onke antliziyo yawavuselelayo ukusondela emsebenzini, ukuba awenze.
2_36_3_Bathabatha, ebusweni bukaMoses, yonke imirhumo ababeyizisile oonyana bakaSirayeli emsebenzini wenkonzo yengcwele ukuba yenziwe. Baye bona bezisa kuye imiso ngemiso iminikelo yokuqhutywa yintliziyo.
2_36_4_Zeza ke zonke izilumko ezibe ziyisebenza yonke imisebenzi yengcwele, saseso savela emsebenzini waso esibe siwusebenza;
2_36_5_zatsho kuMoses ukuthi, Abantu bazisa ngaphezulu kakhulu kokwanele ukusetyenzwa komsebenzi, awise umthetho ngawo uYehova ukuba wenziwe.
2_36_6_Wawisa umthetho uMoses, ukuba kuhanjiswe ilizwi eminqubeni,  lisithi, Amadoda nabafazi mabangabi senza mpahla yamrhumo wengcwele. Bapheza ke abantu ukuzisa.
2_36_7_Impahla yazanela izinto zonke, emisebenzini yonke,  ukubabayenze, yada yasala.
2_36_8_Bonke abantliziyo zilungileyo, phakathi kwabenza imisebenzi, bawenza umnquba, amalengalenga aba lishumi,  ngelinen ecikizekileyo ephothiweyo, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, benza iikerubhi, umsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka.
2_36_9_Ubude belengalenga lilinye baba ziikubhite ezimashumi mabini anesibhozo, ububanzi belengalenga lilinye baba ziikubhite ezine, amalengalenga alingana onke.
2_36_10_Bahlanganisa amalengalenga amahlanu, elinye nelinye;  bahlanganisa amalengalenga amahlanu, elinye nelinye.
2_36_11_Benza amasango ngemisonto emsi emphethweni welinye ilengalenga, ekupheleni ekuhlanganeni; benjenjalo emphethweni welengalenga lokugqibela, ekuhlanganeni kwelesibini.
2_36_12_Benza amasango aba mashumi mahlanu kwelinye ilengalenga,  benza namasango aba mashumi mahlanu ekupheleni kwelengalenga elisekuhlanganeni kwelesibini; amasango alungelelana, elinye nelinye.
2_36_13_Benza amagwegwe egolide aba mashumi mahlanu;  bawahlanganisa amalengalenga, elinye nelinye, ngamagwegwe lawo,  waba mnquba mnye.
2_36_14_Benza amalengalenga ngoboya beebhokhwe, aba yintente phezu komnquba; bawenza amalengalenga alishumi elinalinye.
2_36_15_Ubude belengalenga lilinye baba ziikubhite ezimashumi mathathu, ububanzi belengalenga lilinye baba ziikubhite ezine;  loo malengalenga alishumi elinalinye alingana.
2_36_16_Bawahlanganisa amalengalenga amahlanu odwa, namalengalenga omathandathu odwa.
2_36_17_Benza amasango amashumi mahlanu emphethweni welengalenga eli lokugqibela ekuhlanganeni, benza namasango amashumi mahlanu emphethweni welesibini ilengalenga, elihlanganiswe nelinye.
2_36_18_Benza amagwegwe obhedu amashumi mahlanu, ukuba ihlanganiswe intente, ibe nye.
2_36_19_Bayenzela intente isigubungelo ngezintsu zeekunzi zezimvu,  zenziwe zayingqombela, nesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi ngaphezulu kweso.
2_36_20_Umnquba bawenzela iiplanga ngomngampunzi, zema.
2_36_21_Ubude beplanga baba ziikubhite ezilishumi, ububanzi beplanga inye baba yikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_36_22_Iplanga inye yaneempondlo ezimbini, zahlangana olunye nolunye; benjenjalo eziplangeni zonke zomnquba.
2_36_23_Bazenza ke iiplanga zomnquba; zamashumi mabini iiplanga ngecala lasezantsi ngasezantsi.
2_36_24_Benza iziseko zesilivere zamashumi mane phantsi kweeplanga ezimashumi mabini; zazibini iziseko zeempondlo zayo zombini,  phantsi kweplanga inye; zazibini iziseko zeempondlo zayo zombini, phantsi kweplanga inye.
2_36_25_Ezecala lesibini lomnquba, ngelasentla icala, benza iiplanga ezimashumi mabini,
2_36_26_neziseko zazo zesilivere zamashumi mane: iziseko zazibini phantsi kweplanga inye, zazibini iziseko phantsi kweplanga inye.
2_36_27_Ezomva womnquba ngasentshonalanga bazenza zantandathu iiplanga.
2_36_28_Iiplanga ezimbini bazenza iimbombo zomnquba ngamacala,  emaphundwini omabini,
2_36_29_zangamawele, zithabathela ezantsi ukuhlangana, zaba nto-nye kwada kwasa entloko, zaya khonkcweni linye; benjenjalo kuwo omabini angaweembombo zombini.
2_36_30_Zaba ziiplanga ezisibhozo; neziseko zazo zesilivere zaziziseko ezilishumi elinazithandathu: zazibini iziseko,  zazibini iziseko, phantsi kweplanga inye.
2_36_31_Benza imivalo ngomngampunzi; yamihlanu eziplangeni zelinye icala lomnquba,
2_36_32_yamihlanu imivalo eziplangeni zelesibini icala lomnquba;  yamihlanu imivalo eziplangeni zomnquba ephundwini,  ngasentshonalanga.
2_36_33_Benza umvalo othe gabhu phakathi eziplangeni ezo, wavala,  usuka ekupheleni waya ekupheleni.
2_36_34_Bazaleka iiplanga ngegolide; amakhonkco azo bawenza ngegolide, azindawo zemivalo; ke imivalo bayaleka ngegolide.
2_36_35_Benza umkhusane ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo; bawenzela iikerubhi, umsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka ke lowo.
2_36_36_Bawenzela iintsika ezine zomngampunzi ezalekwe ngegolide,  namagwegwe azo egolide; bazityhidela iziseko zozine zesilivere.
2_36_37_Umnyango wentente bawenzela isisitheliso ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, umsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki;
2_36_38_neentsika zaso zantlanu, namagwegwe azo, bazaleka iintloko zazo neminqiwu yazo ngegolide, neziseko zazo zozihlanu zazezobhedu.
2_37_1_UBhetsaleli wayenza ityeya ngomngampunzi. Ubude bayo baba ziikubhite zombini ezinesiqingatha, ububanzi bayo baba yikubhite enesiqingatha, ukuphakama kwayo kwayikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_37_2_Wayaleka ngegolide ecocekileyo ngaphakathi nangaphandle,  wayithi jize ngesithsaba segolide.
2_37_3_Wayityhidela amakhonkco egolide amane, emilenzeni yayo yomine: amakhonkco amabini ngeli icala, amakhonco amabini ngeliya icala.
2_37_4_Wenza izibonda ngomngampunzi, wazaleka ngegolide;
2_37_5_wazifaka izibonda ezo emakhonkcweni asemacaleni etyeya,  ukuba ithwalwe ngazo.
2_37_6_Wenza isihlalo sokucamagusha ngegolide ecocekileyo. Ubude baso baba ziikubhite ezimbini ezinesiqingatha, ububanzi baso baba yikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_37_7_Wenza iikerubhi zambini ngegolide, ukuzenza wazikhanda;  zavela eziphelweni zozibini zesihlalo sokucamagusha:
2_37_8_enye ikerubhi ivele esiphelweni esi, enye ikerubhi ivele esiphelweni esiya. Wazenza iikerubhi esihlalweni sokucamagusha,  zavela eziphelweni zaso zozibini.
2_37_9_Iikerubhi zolula amaphiko phezulu, zasisithelisa ngamaphiko azo isihlalo sokucamagusha; ubuso bazo bakhangelana, babheka esihlalweni sokucamagusha ubuso beekerubhi.
2_37_10_Wenza netafile ngomngampunzi; ubude bayo baba ziikubhite ezimbini, ububanzi bayo baba yikubhite, ukuphakama kwayo kwaba yikubhite enesiqingatha.
2_37_11_Wayaleka ngegolide ecocekileyo, wayithi jize ngesithsaba segolide.
2_37_12_Wayenzela ngeenxa zonke udini olungangobubanzi besandla,  udini lwayo waluthi jize ngesithsaba segolide.
2_37_13_Wayityhidela amakhonkco egolide amane, wawafaka amakhonkco ezimbombeni zone ezisemilenzeni yayo yomine.
2_37_14_Aba kufuphi nokuhlangana kodini amakhonkco lawo, aba ziindawo zokufaka izibonda zokuyithwala itafile.
2_37_15_Wenza izibonda ezo ngomngampunzi, wazaleka ngegolide,  ukuba ithwalwe ngazo itafile.
2_37_16_Wenza impahla ephezu kwetafile, izikotile zayo, nemicephe yayo, neenkamba zayo, neendebe zayo ekwakuthululwa ngazo,  wazenza ngegolide ecocekileyo.
2_37_17_Wenza nesiphatho sezibane ngegolide ecocekileyo. Ukusenza wasikhanda isiphatho eso, nesikhondo saso, nesibili saso,  neendebe zaso, namaqhina aso, neentyantyambo zaso, zivele kwakuso.
2_37_18_Amasebe amathandathu avela emacaleni aso: amasebe amathathu esiphatho avela kweli icala laso, amasebe amathathu esiphatho avela kweliya icala laso.
2_37_19_Zaba ntathu iindebe ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile kweli isebe, zineqhina nentyantyambo; neendebe ezintathu ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile zaba kweliya isebe, zineqhina nentyantyambo. Kwaba njalo kumasebe omathandathu avela esiphathweni eso.
2_37_20_Zaba ne iindebe esiphathweni ezifana neentyantyambo zeamangile, zinamaqhina aso neentyantyambo zaso.
2_37_21_Yaba liqhina phantsi kwamasebe amabini livela kuso,  yaliqhina phantsi kwamasebe amabini livela kuso, yaliqhina phantsi kwamasebe amabini livela kuso, angawamasebe amathandathu avela kuso.
2_37_22_Amaqhina awo namalungu awo avela kuso sonke, saba ngumkhando wamnye wegolide ecocekileyo.
2_37_23_Wenza izibane zaso zasixhenxe, nezifinyiso zaso,  neengcedevu zaso, ngegolide ecocekileyo.
2_37_24_Wasenza ngetalente yegolide ecocekileyo, neempahla zaso zonke.
2_37_25_Wenza nesibingelelo sokuqhumisela ngomngampunzi. Ubude baso baba yikubhite, ububanzi baso baba yikubhite, saba mbombo-ne; ukuphakama kwaso kwaziikubhite ezimbini; zaphuma kuso iimpondo zaso.
2_37_26_Wasaleka ngegolide ecocekileyo umphezulu waso, namacala aso ngeenxa zonke, neempondo zaso, wasithi jize ngesithsaba segolide.
2_37_27_Wasenzela amakhonkco amabini ngegolide, phantsi kwesithsaba saso ezimbombeni zaso ezimbini, emacaleni aso omabini, aziindawo zezibonda ukuba sithwalwe ngazo.
2_37_28_Wazenza izibonda ngomngampunzi, wazaleka ngegolide.
2_37_29_Wenza neoli engcwele yokuthambisa, nesiqhumiso esimnandi esingangxengelelweyo, umsebenzi womqholi ke lowo.
2_38_1_Wasenza nesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo ngomngampunzi:  ubude baso baba ziikubhite ezintlanu, ububanzi baso baba ziikubhite ezintlanu, sambombo-ne; ukuphakama kwaso kwaziikubhite ezintathu.
2_38_2_Wenza iimpondo zaso ezimbombeni zaso, zaphuma kuso iimpondo zaso, wasaleka ngobhedu.
2_38_3_Wazenza zonke iimpahla zesibingelelo eso: iinkamba,  nemihlakulwana, nezitya zokutshiza, neefolokhwe, neengcedevu;  zonke iimpahla zaso wazenza ngobhedu.
2_38_4_Isibingelelo wasenzela uthango, umsebenzi ongumnatha,  ngobhedu, phantsi kongqameko olujikelezileyo, lwathabathela ezantsi, lwathi gabhu phakathi.
2_38_5_Wawatyhida amakhonkco amane eziphelweni zozine zothango lobhedu, aba ziindawo zezibonda.
2_38_6_Wenza izibonda ngomngampunzi, wazaleka ngobhedu.
2_38_7_Wazifaka izibonda emakhonkcweni, emacaleni esibingelelo,  ukuba sithwalwe ngazo; wasenza ngeeplanga saholoholo.
2_38_8_Wenza uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela ngobhedu, noseko lwalo ngobhedu, nezipili zabafazi, ababekhonza emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
2_38_9_Wenza intendelezo kwelasezantsi icala, ngasezantsi, yaba ngamawunduwundu entendelezo, elinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo,  iikubhite ezilikhulu.
2_38_10_Iintsika zawo zaba mashumi mabini, neziseko zazo zaba mashumi mabini, zazezobhedu; amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo yayeyesilivere.
2_38_11_Ngecala lasentla amawunduwundu aziikubhite ezilikhulu;  iintsika zawo ezimashumi mabini, neziseko zazo ezimashumi mabini, zazezobhedu; amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo yayeyesilivere.
2_38_12_Ngecala lasentshonalanga amawunduwundu aziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu; iintsika zawo zalishumi, neziseko zazo zalishumi; amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo yayeyesilivere.
2_38_13_Ngecala lempumalanga ngasempumalanga aziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu.
2_38_14_Amawunduwundu asingisa kwelinye icala lesango aziikubhite ezilishumi elinantlanu; iintsika zawo zantathu, neziseko zazo zazithathu.
2_38_15_Ngelinye icala lesango lentendelezo, ngapha nangapha, aba ngamawunduwundu eekubhite ezilishumi elinantlanu; iintsika zawo zantathu, neziseko zazo zazithathu.
2_38_16_Onke amawunduwundu entendelezo ajikelezileyo aba ngawelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo.
2_38_17_Iziseko zeentsika zazezobhedu; amagwegwe eentsika neminqiwu yazo yayeyesilivere, nokwalekwa kwamantloko azo kwayisilivere; iminqiwu yeentsika zonke zentendelezo yayeyesilivere.
2_38_18_Isitheliso sesango lentendelezo sasingumsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki, ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo; ubude baba ziikubhite ezimashumi mabini, ukuphakama ebubanzini kwaba ziikubhite ezintlanu;  kwalungelelana namawunduwundu entendelezo.
2_38_19_Iintsika zawo zone neziseko zazo zozine zaba zezobhedu;  amagwegwe azo aba ngawesilivere, nokwalekwa kwamantloko azo neminqiwu yazo kwayisilivere.
2_38_20_Zonke izikhonkwane zomnquba nezentendelezo ejikelezileyo zazezobhedu.
2_38_21_Ngawo la amanani ezinto zomnquba, zomnquba wesingqino,  abebalwa ngomlomo kaMoses ngenkonzo yabaLevi, ngesandla sikaItamare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli.
2_38_22_UBhetsaleli, unyana kaUri, unyana kaHuri, wesizwe sakwaYuda, wakwenza konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngako uMoses.
2_38_23_Waye noAholiyabhi unyana ka-Ahisamaki, wesizwe sakwaDan,  engumkroli, ingcibi, umluki weemfakamfele ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo.
2_38_24_Ke yonke igolide ekwakusetyenzwa ngayo umsebenzi emisebenzini yonke yengcwele, igolide yomtshangatshangiso, yaye iziitalente ezimashumi mabini anesithoba, neeshekele ezimakhulu asixhenxe anamanci mathathu, ngokweshekele yengcwele.
2_38_25_Ke isilivere yabo babalwayo bebandla yaba likhulu leetalente neeshekele eziliwaka elinamakhulu asixhenxe anamanci asixhenxe anantlanu, ngokweshekele yengcwele.
2_38_26_Yaba yibheka ngentloko yomntu (isiqingatha seshekele leyo,  ngokweshekele yengcwele), kubo bonke abagqithelayo kwabo babalwayo; bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe,  nangaphezulu, kubo abangamawaka angamakhulu omathandathu anamawaka amathathu, anamakhulu amahlanu anamanci mahlanu.
2_38_27_Ngeetalente zesilivere ezilikhulu kwatyhidwa iziseko zengcwele neziseko zomkhusane; yalikhulu leziseko kwikhulu leetalente, yayitalente kwisiseko.
2_38_28_Ngeeshekele eziliwaka elinamakhulu asixhenxe anamanci asixhenxe anantlanu, wenza amagwegwe eentsika, wawaleka amantloko azo, wenza iminqiwu.
2_38_29_Ubhedu olungumtshangatshangiso lwaye luziitalente ezingamashumi osixhenxe, neeshekele ezingamawaka amabini anamakhulu mane.
2_38_30_Wenza ngalo iziseko zomnyango wentente yokuhlangana,  nesibingelelo sobhedu, nothango lwaso lobhedu, nempahla yonke yesibingelelo;
2_38_31_neziseko zentendelezo ejikelezileyo, neziseko zesango lentendelezo, nezikhonkwane zonke zomnquba, nezikhonkwane zonke zentendelezo ejikelezileyo.
2_39_1_Ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu benza izambatho zokubusa,  zokulungiselela engcweleni; benza nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aron, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_2_Iefodi wayenza ngegolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu,  nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo.
2_39_3_Bayikhanda igolide yaba zizixwexwe ezicekethekileyo,  bancwela imityana, ukuze bayixube emisontweni emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, umsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka ke lowo.
2_39_4_Iefodi bayenzela iziziba zamagxa zokuyixakatha, yaxakathwa emiphethweni yomibini;
2_39_5_nombhinqo ophezu kwayo wokuyinxiba iefodi, ophuma kuyo,  wawunjengokusetyenzwa kwayo; bawenza ngegolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_6_Benza amatye ebherilo, abhijelwe ngomluko wegolide, akrolwa ngokukrolwa kwemisesane yokutywina, ngokwamagama oonyana bakaSirayeli;
2_39_7_wawabeka ezizibeni zamagxa ze-efodi, aba ngamatye esikhumbuzo koonyana bakaSirayeli, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_8_Walwenza ubengo, lwaba ngumsebenzi wengcibi yokuluka,  njengokwenziwa kwe-efodi, ngegolide, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ecikizekileyo.
2_39_9_Lwaba mbombo-ne, lwaphindwa, balwenza ubengo; ubuda balo baba ngangokolulwa kweminwe, ububanzi balo baba ngangokolulwa kweminwe luphindiwe.
2_39_10_Bafaka kulo imikrozo yamine yamatye; ukrozo lwesardiyo,  netopazi, nesmarado, lwaba lukrozo lokuqala olo;
2_39_11_ukrozo lwesibini lwaba yirubhi, nesafire, nekalikedo;
2_39_12_ukrozo lwesithathu lwaba yihakinto, neagati, neametiste;
2_39_13_ukrozo lwesine lwaba yikrizolite, nebherilo, neyaspisi;  abhijelwa ngomluko wegolide ezimfakweni zawo.
2_39_14_Amatye lawo amiswa ngokwamagama oonyana bakaSirayeli abalishumi elinababini, ngokwamagama abo; aba nokrolo lomsesane wokutywina, lathi elo laba negama lalo, ngokwezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini.
2_39_15_Benza elubengweni intsontelo ethe shinyi, umsebenzi osontiweyo ngegolide ecocekileyo.
2_39_16_Benza imiluko yamibini ngegolide, namakhonkco amabini ngegolide, bawafaka loo makhonkco mabini emancamini omabini obengo.
2_39_17_Bazifaka iintsontelo zombini zegolide emakhonkcweni omabini asemancamini obengo;
2_39_18_namancam omabini eentsontelo zombini bawafaka emilukweni yomibini, bayifaka ezizibeni zamagxa ze-efodi, ngaphambili.
2_39_19_Benza amakhonkco amabini ngegolide, bawafaka emancamini omabini obengo, emphethweni walo okwicala elikhangelene ne-efodi, elibheke ngaphakathi.
2_39_20_Benza amanye amakhonkco amabini ngegolide, bawafaka ezizibeni zamagxa zozibini ze-efodi ngaphantsi, mayela nomphambili wayo, kufuphi nokuhlangana kwayo, entla kombhinqo we-efodi.
2_39_21_Balunxibelela ubengo ngamakhonkco alo, emakhonkcweni e-efodini, ngentsontelo yemisonto emsi, lwaba sentla kombhinqo we-efodi, ukuze lungasuki ubengo kuyo iefodi, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_22_Benza ingubo yokwaleka ye-efodi, umsebenzi womluki, yonke ngemisonto emsi.
2_39_23_Umqala wengubo yokwaleka waba sesazulwini sayo,  njengomqala wesigcina-sifuba; waba nomphetho owujikelezileyo umqala, ukuze ungakrazuki.
2_39_24_Benza emqukumbelweni wengubo yokwaleka iirharnate ngemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, nelinen ephothiweyo.
2_39_25_Benza namankenteza egolide ecocekileyo, bawabeka amankenteza phakathi kweerharnate emqukumbelweni wengubo yokwaleka, kwazunguleza phakathi kweerharnate:
2_39_26_yaba linkenteza nerharnate, inkenteza nerharnate,  emqukumbelweni wengubo yokwaleka, kwazunguleza; ukuba kulungiselelwe njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_27_Benza iingubo zangaphantsi ngelinen ecikizekileyo,  umsebenzi womluki, ukuba zibe zezika-Aron noonyana bakhe;
2_39_28_nonkontsho, ngelinen ecikizekileyo; neminqwazi yokuhomba,  ngelinen ecikizekileyo; neebhulukhwe, ngelinen ecikizekileyo,  ephothiweyo, emhlophe;
2_39_29_nombhinqo, ngelinen ecikizekileyo, ephothiweyo, nemisonto emsi nemfusa nebomvu, umsebenzi oyimfakamfele womluki, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_30_Benza nembasa, isithsaba esingcwele segolide ecocekileyo,  babhala phezu kwayo umbhalo ngokrolo lomsesane wokutywina,  othi, ingcwele kuYehova.
2_39_31_Bayifaka umtya wemisonto emsi, yanxitywa elunkontshweni phezulu, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_39_32_Wagqitywa ke wonke umsebenzi womnquba wentente yokuhlangana. Benza oonyana bakaSirayeli njengako konke uYehova ebemwisele umthetho ngako uMoses, benjenjalo.
2_39_33_Bawuzisa umnquba kuMoses: intente nempahla yayo yonke,  amakhonkco ayo, neeplanga zayo, nemivalo yayo, neentsika zayo,  neziseko zayo;
2_39_34_nesigubungelo sezintsu zeenkunzi zezimvu, zenziwe zayingqombela, nesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi,  nomkhusane osithelisayo;
2_39_35_netyeya yesingqino, nezibonda zayo, nesihlalo sokucamagusha;
2_39_36_netafile, neempahla zayo zonke, nezonka zokubonisa;
2_39_37_nesiphatho sezibane esihle, nezibane zaso, izibane ezicwangcisiweyo, nempahla yaso yonke, neoli yokukhanyisa;
2_39_38_nesibingelelo segolide, neoli yokuthambisa, nesiqhumiso esimnandi, nesisitheliso sokusithelisa umnyango wentente;
2_39_39_nesibingelelo sobhedu, nothango lwaso lobhedu, izibonda zaso, nempahla yaso yonke; uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela noseko lwalo;
2_39_40_namawunduwundu entendelezo, neentsika zayo, neziseko zayo,  nesisitheliso sesango lentendelezo, nemitya yayo, nezikhonkwane zayo, nempahla yonke yenkonzo yomnquba, yentente yokuhlangana;
2_39_41_nezambatho zokubusa, zokulungiselela engcweleni;  nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aron umbingeleli, nezambatho zoonyana bakhe zokwenzelelela.
2_39_42_Njengako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho uMoses,  bawenjalo oonyana bakaSirayeli wonke umsebenzi.
2_39_43_Wawukhangela uMoses wonke umsebenzi, nango ke bewenzile;  njengoko uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngako, bawenjenjalo.  Wabasikelela ke uMoses.
2_40_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses wathi, Ngenyanga yokuqala,  ngolokuqala usuku enyangeni leyo,
2_40_2_uze uwumise umnquba wentente yokuhlangana; ubeke khona ityeya yesingqino,
2_40_3_uyisithelise ityeya ngomkhusane;
2_40_4_ungenise itafile, uzicwangcise izinto zayo ezicwangciswayo;  ungenise isiphatho sezibane, uzimise izibane zaso;
2_40_5_usimise isibingelelo segolide sokuqhumisela phambi kwetyeya yesingqino, usixhome isisitheliso somnyango emnqubeni;
2_40_6_usimise isibingelelo sedini elinyukayo phambi komnyango womnquba wentente yokuhlangana;
2_40_7_ulumise uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela phakathi kwentente yokuhlangana nesibingelelo, ugalele amanzi kulo.
2_40_8_Uze uyimise intendelezo ijikeleze, usixhome isisitheliso sesango lentendelezo.
2_40_9_Uze uthabathe ioli yokuthambisa, uthambise umnquba neento zonke ezikuwo, uwungcwalise nempahla yawo yonke, ube yingcwele;
2_40_10_uthambise isibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, nempahla yaso yonke, usingcwalise isibingelelo, sibe sisibingelelo esiyingcwele kangcwele;
2_40_11_uthambise uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela, noseko lwalo,  ulungcwalise.
2_40_12_Uze usondeze uAron noonyana bakhe emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, ubahlambe ngamanzi;
2_40_13_umnxibe uAron izambatho ezingcwele, umthambise,  umngcwalise, ukuze abe ngumbingeleli kum.
2_40_14_Wosondeza oonyana bakhe, ubanxibe iingubo zangaphantsi;
2_40_15_ubathambise njengoko wamthambisayo uyise, ukuze babe ngababingeleli kum; kuthi ukuthanjiswa kwabo kube kokobubingeleli obungunaphakade kubo, kwizizukulwana zabo.
2_40_16_Wenza ke uMoses; njengako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngako, wenjenjalo.
2_40_17_Kwathi, ngenyanga yokuqala ngomnyaka wesibini, ngolokuqala enyangeni leyo, wamiswa umnquba.
2_40_18_Wawumisa ke uMoses umnquba, wazibeka iziseko zawo,  wazimisa iiplanga zawo, wayifaka imivalo yawo, wazimisa iintsika zawo.
2_40_19_Wayaneka intente phezu komnquba, wabeka isigubungelo sentente phezu kwayo phezulu, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
2_40_20_Wasithabatha isingqino, wasibeka etyeyeni, wazifaka izibonda etyeyeni, wasibeka isihlalo sokucamagusha phezu kwetyeya phezulu.
2_40_21_Wayingenisa ityeya emnqubeni, wawuxhoma umkhusane osithelisayo, wayisithelisa ityeya yesingqino, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
2_40_22_Wayibeka itafile ententeni yokuhlangana, ngecala lomnquba elingasentla, nganeno komkhusane;
2_40_23_wacwangcisa phezu kwayo ukucwangciswa kwezonka phambi koYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_40_24_Wasimisa isiphatho sezibane ententeni yokuhlangana,  sakhangelana netafile ngecala lomnquba elingasezantsi;
2_40_25_wazimisa izibane phambi koYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_40_26_Wasibeka isibingelelo segolide ententeni yokuhlangana,  phambi komkhusane.
2_40_27_Waqhumisela phezu kwaso ngesiqhumiso esimnandi, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_40_28_Wasixhoma isisitheliso somnyango emnqubeni.
2_40_29_Wasibeka isibingelelo sedini elinyukayo emnyango womnquba wentente yokuhlangana; wanyusa kuso idini elinyukayo, nomnikelo wokudla, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_40_30_Walubeka uhehema lwesitya sokuhlambela phakathi kwentente yokuhlangana nesibingelelo eso, wagalela amanzi okuhlamba kulo.
2_40_31_Bazihlamba ooMoses noAron noonyana bakhe izandla zabo neenyawo zabo khona.
2_40_32_Ekungeneni kwabo ententeni yokuhlangana, nasekusondeleni kwabo esibingelelweni, bahlamba, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
2_40_33_Wayimisa intendelezo ejikeleza umnquba lo nesibingelelo esi, wasixhoma isisitheliso sesango lentendelezo. Wawugqiba ke uMoses umsebenzi.
2_40_34_Ilifu layigubungela intente yokuhlangana, ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova bawuzalisa umnquba.
2_40_35_UMoses akaba nakungena ententeni yokuhlangana, ngokuba ilifu lahlala phezu kwayo, ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova bawuzalisa umnquba.
2_40_36_Belisithi lakunyuswa lisuswe ilifu emnqubeni, banduluke oonyana bakaSirayeli, benjenjalo ekundulukeni kwabo konke.
2_40_37_Ke xa ilifu belingekanyuswa, bebenganduluki kude kube yimini yokunyuswa kwalo;
2_40_38_kuba ilifu likaYehova beliba phezu komnquba emini, umlilo ube phezu kwawo ebusuku, phambi kwendlu yonke kaSirayeli,  ekundulukeni kwabo konke.
3_1_1_UYehova wambiza uMoses, wathetha kuye ententeni yokuhlangana, esithi,
3_1_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa umntu kuni asondeza kuYehova umsondezo wasezintweni ezizitho zine,  nowusondeza loo msondezo wenu niwuthabatha ezinkomeni nasempahleni emfutshane.
3_1_3_Ukuba umsondezo wakhe ulidini elinyukayo lasezinkomeni,  wosondeza inkomo eliduna eligqibeleleyo emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, alisondeze ukuba limkholekise phambi koYehova.
3_1_4_Wocinezela ngesandla sakhe phezu kwentloko yedini elo linyukayo, limkholekise, limcamagushele;
3_1_5_alixhele ithole elo lenkomo phambi koYehova. Oonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli, bolisondeza igazi balitshize,  bajikelezise esibingelelweni esisemnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_1_6_Makalihlinze indini elinyukayo, alityatye;
3_1_7_oonyana baka-Aron umbingeleli babeke umlilo phezu kwesibingelelo, bacwangcise iinkuni phezu komlilo;
3_1_8_bazicwangcise oonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli, iinyama ezo,  nentloko, nenqatha, phezu kweenkuni eziphezu komlilo ophezu kwesibingelelo.
3_1_9_Ke zona izibilini zalo, neentungo zalo mazihlanjwe ngamanzi,  aqhumisele ngezo nto zonke umbingeleli esibingelelweni. Lidini elinyukayo, kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_1_10_Ukuba umsondezo wakhe ngowasempahleni emfutshane, nokuba kusezigusheni, nokuba kusezibhokhweni, ulidini elinyukayo,  wosondeza iduna eligqibeleleyo;
3_1_11_alixhelele ecaleni lesibingelelo ngasentla phambi koYehova;  bathi oonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli, balitshize igazi lalo bajikelezise esibingelelweni;
3_1_12_alityatye, kwanentloko yalo nenqatha lalo, azicwangcise ezo nto umbingeleli phezu kweenkuni eziphezu komlilo ophezu kwesibingelelo;
3_1_13_azihlambe izibilini neentungo ngamanzi, azisondeze umbingeleli zonke ezo nto, aqhumisele ngazo esibingelelweni.  Lidini elinyukayo, kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_1_14_Ke ukuba umsondezo wakhe kuYehova ulidini elinyukayo lasezintakeni, wowusondeza umsondezo wakhe, ethabatha kumahobe,  nokuba kukumagobo amavukuthu.
3_1_15_Wolisondeza umbingeleli esibingelelweni, aliqhawule intloko, aqhumisele ngalo esibingelelweni, igazi lalo likhanyelwe ecaleni lesibingelelo.
3_1_16_Aze asuse indlelo yalo kunye nento ephakathi kwalo,  azilahlele ecaleni lesibingelelo elingasempumalanga, ezaleni;
3_1_17_alicande emaphikweni alo, engawahluli kanye, aqhumisele ngalo umbingeleli esibingelelweni, phezu kweenkuni eziphezu komlilo. Lidini elinyukayo, kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_2_1_Ke xa ubani asondeza umsondezo ongumnikelo wokudla kuYehova,  umsondezo wakhe lowo woba ngumgubo ocoliweyo, agalele ioli phezu kwawo, abeke intlaka emhlophe phezu kwawo.
3_2_2_Wowuzisa koonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli, aze umbingeleli asube kuwo, azalise isandla sakhe emgubeni ocoliweyo naseolini apho, kunye nentlaka emhlophe yawo yonke, aqhumisele umbingeleli esibingelelweni ngesikhumbuzo sawo. Kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_2_3_Okuseleyo komnikelo wokudla koba kokuka-Aron noonyana bakhe;  iyingcwele kangcwele yasekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova leyo.
3_2_4_Xa usondeza umsondezo ongumnikelo wokudla okosiweyo ezikweni lezonka, woba yimiqhathane engenagwele yomgubo ocoliweyo,  egalelwe ioli, nezonkana ezisicaba ezingenagwele, ezithanjiswe ioli.
3_2_5_Ke ukuba umsondezo wakho ungumnikelo wokudla okungepani,  woba ngumgubo ocoliweyo ongenagwele, ugalelwe ioli.
3_2_6_Wowuqhekeza ube ngamaqhekeza, ugalele ioli phezu kwawo:  ngumnikelo wokudla ke lowo.
3_2_7_Ke ukuba umsondezo wakho ungumnikelo wokudla okuphekiweyo ngembiza, mawenziwe ngomgubo ocoliweyo, oneoli.
3_2_8_Uze uwuzise umnikelo wokudla owenziweyo ngezo nto kuYehova,  uwusondeze kumbingeleli, awuse esibingelelweni;
3_2_9_asuse umbingeleli emnikelweni wokudla isikhumbuzo sawo,  aqhumisele ngaso esibingelelweni. Kukudla kwasemlilweni,  livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_2_10_Okuseleyo komnikelo wokudla koba kokuka-Aron noonyana bakhe; iyingcwele kangcwele yasekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova.
3_2_11_Yonke iminikelo yokudla eniya kuyisondeza kuYehova,  mayingenziwa ngagwele; kuba igwele lonke, nobusi bonke, aniyi kuqhumisela ngezo nto zibe kukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova.
3_2_12_Ningazisondeza kuYehova zibe ngumsondezo wokuqala;  mazinganyuswa esibingelelweni, ukuba zibe livumba elithozamisayo.
3_2_13_Yonke imisondezo eyiminikelo yakho yokudla woyigalela ityuwa; uze umgavumi ukuba isweleke ityuwa yomnqophiso woThixo wakho eminikelweni yakho yokudla. Imisondezo yakho yonke woyisondeza inetyuwa.
3_2_14_Ukuba usondeza umnikelo wokudla wentlahlela kuYehova,  oyinto esizilwayo ehle yavuthwa, wosondeza ikhweba, umnikelo wokudla wentlahlela yakho.
3_2_15_Uze uyibeke ioli phezu kwalo, ubeke nentlaka emhlophe phezu kwalo; ngumnikelo wokudla ke lowo.
3_2_16_Woqhumisela umbingeleli ngesikhumbuzo sawo kuloo nto yawo isizilwayo, nakwioli yawo, kunye nentlaka emhlophe yawo yonke.  Kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova oko.
3_3_1_Ke ukuba umsondezo wakhe ungumbingelelo woxolo: ukuba uwusondeza ungowasezinkomeni, nokuba yeliduna, nokuba yelithokazi, wolisondeza ligqibelele phambi koYehova.
3_3_2_Maze acinezele entlokweni yomsondezo wakhe ngesandla sakhe,  awuxhelele emnyango wentente yokuhlangana; oonyana baka-Aron,  ababingeleli, balitshize igazi bajikelezise esibingelelweni;
3_3_3_asondeze ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, ethabathe embingelelweni woxolo; umhlehlo ogubungele izibilini,  namanqatha onke asezibilinini, nezintso zombini,
3_3_4_nenqatha lazo, nelisemihlubulweni, nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, ewususa ngasezintsweni.
3_3_5_Boqhumiselangezo nto oonyana baka-Aron esibingelelweni phezu kwedini elinyukayo, eliphezu kweenkuni eziphezu komlilo.  Kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova elo.
3_3_6_Ukuba umsondezo wakhe ngowasempahleni emfutshane,  ungumbingelelo woxolo kuYehova, nokuba yeliduna, nokuba yelithokazi, wolisondeza ligqibelele.
3_3_7_Ukuba itakane elo lisondezwayo lingumsondezo wakhe,  wolisondeza phambi koYehova,
3_3_8_acinezele phezu kwentloko yomsondezo wakhe ngesandla sakhe,  awuxhelele phambi kwentente yokuhlangana; oonyana baka-Aron balitshize igazi, bajikelezise esibingelelweni.
3_3_9_Wosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, ethabathe embingelelweni woxolo inqatha lawo, umsila uphela ewunqamla kuntlahlahlungulu, nomhlehlo ogubungele izibilini, namanqatha onke asezibilinini,
3_3_10_nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, nelisemihlubulweni,  nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, ewususa ngasezintsweni.
3_3_11_Woqhumisela ngezo nto umbingeleli esibingelelweni. Kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova oko.
3_3_12_Ke ukuba umsondezo wakhe uyibhokhwe, woyisondeza phambi koYehova,
3_3_13_acinezele ngesandla sakhe phezu kwentloko yayo, ayixhelele phambi kwentente yokuhlangana; oonyana baka-Aron balitshize igazi layo, bajikelezise esibingelelweni.
3_3_14_Wosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, ethabathe emsondezweni wakhe umhlehlo ogubungele izibilini, namanqatha onke asezibilinini, nezintso zombini,
3_3_15_nenqatha lazo, nelisemihlubulweni, nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, ewususa ngasezintsweni.
3_3_16_Woqhumisela ngezo nto umbingeleli esibingelelweni. Kukudla kwasemlilweni, livumba elithozamisayo.
3_3_17_Onke amanqatha ngakaYehova. Ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu, emakhayeni enu onke, ukuba ningadli nqatha nagazi.
3_4_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi
3_4_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Xa athe ubani wona ngokulahlekana nomthetho kaYehova, nokuba nguwuphi na, wezinto ezingezakwenziwa, wenza enye kuzo:
3_4_3_ukuba umbingeleli othanjisiweyo uthe wona, bazeka ityala abantu: wosondeza kuYehova ngenxa yesono sakhe one ngaso inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo eligqibeleleyo, libe lidini lesono.
3_4_4_Woyizisa inkunzi entsha emnyango wentente yokuhlangana phambi koYehova, acinezele ngesandla sakhe phezu kwentloko yenkunzi entsha, ayixhelele inkunzi entsha phambi koYehova.
3_4_5_Umbingeleli othanjisiweyo wocaphula egazini lenkunzi entsha,
3_4_6_alizise ententeni yokuhlangana; awuthi nkxu umbingeleli umnwe wakhe egazini, afefe ngenxalenye yelo gazi izihlandlo zosixhenxe phambi koYehova, phambi komkhusane wengcwele;
3_4_7_ayidyobhe umbingeleli inxalenye yegazi ezimpondweni zesibingelelo sesiqhumiso esimnandi esiphambi koYehova,  esisententeni yokuhlangana; ke lonke igazi lenkunzi entsha aliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo,  esisemnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_4_8_Amanqatha onke enkunzi entsha yedini lesono maze awasuse kulo: umhlehlo ogubungele izibilini, namanqatha onke asezibilinini, nezintso zombini,
3_4_9_nenqathalazo, nelisemihlubulweni, nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, ewususa ngasezintsweni,
3_4_10_njengoko asuswayo enkomeni yombingelelo woxolo. Woqhumisela ngawo umbingeleli esibingelelweni sedini elinyukayo.
3_4_11_Ke isikhumba senkunzi entsha, nenyama yayo yonke, kunye nentloko yayo, kunye neentungo zayo, nezibilini zayo, nomswane wayo,
3_4_12_yonke inkunzi entsha, woyikhuphela ngaphandle kweminquba,  ayise endaweni emhlophe, apho kuphalazwa khona uthuthu,  ayitshise phezu kweenkuni ngomlilo, itshiswe apho kuphalazwa khona uthuthu.
3_4_13_Ke ukuba lonke ibandla lakwaSirayeli lithe lalahleka,  yafihlakala loo nto emehlweni esikhungu, benza into kumthetho kaYehova nokuba nguwuphi na, wento engeyakwenziwa, bazeka ityala,
3_4_14_saza saziwa isono abone ngaso: isikhungu sosondeza inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, libe lidini lesono, balizise phambi kwentente yokuhlangana.
3_4_15_Ocinezela amadoda amakhulu ebandla ngezandla zawo phezu kwentloko yenkunzi entsha leyo, phambi koYehova, ayixhelele inkunzi entsha phambi koYehova.
3_4_16_Umbingeleli othanjisiweyo woyizisa inxalenye yegazi lenkunzi entsha ententeni yokuhlangana;
3_4_17_awuthi nkxu umbingeleli umnwe wakhe egazini, afefe izihlandlo zosixhenxe phambi koYehova, phambi komkhusane;
3_4_18_inxalenye yegazi ayidyobhe ezimpondweni zesibingelelo esiphambi koYehova, esisententeni yokuhlangana, igazi lonke aliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo,  esisemnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_4_19_Wowasusa amanqatha onke kulo, aqhumisele ngawo esibingelelweni.
3_4_20_Makenze kule nkunzi intsha njengoko wenza kwinkunzi entsha yedini lesono, enjenjalo nakule, umbingeleli abacamagushele;  boxolelwa ke.
3_4_21_Woyikhuphela inkunzi entsha ngaphandle kweminquba,  ayitshise njengoko wayitshisayo inkunzi entsha yokuqala. Lidini lesono lesikhungu elo.
3_4_22_Xa kuthe kona isikhulu, senza into ngokulahlekana nomthetho kaYehova uThixo waso, nokuba nguwuphi na, wento engeyakwenziwa,  sazeka ityala;
3_4_23_ukuba sithe satyhilwa kuso isono saso esone ngaso: sozisa umsondezo waso, ixhonti lebhokhwe eliliduna eligqibeleleyo.
3_4_24_Socinezela ngesandla saso phezu kwentloko yebhokhwe exhonti, siyixhelele apho kuxhelelwa khona idini elinyukayo phambi koYehova. Lidini lesono ke elo.
3_4_25_Umbingeleli wocaphula egazini ledini lesono ngomnwe wakhe,  alidyobhe ezimpondweni zesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, igazi lalo aliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo;
3_4_26_aqhumisele ngamanqatha alo onke esibingelelweni,  njengamanqatha ombingelelo woxolo, umbingeleli asicamagushele ngesono saso; soxolelwa ke.
3_4_27_Ukuba ubani othile wasebantwini balo ilizwe uthe wona ngokulahleka, ngokwenza into kumthetho kaYehova, nokuba nguwuphi na, wento engeyakwenziwa, wazeka ityala;
3_4_28_ukuba sithe satyhilwa kuye isono sakhe one ngaso: wozisa umsondezo wakhe, ixhonti elilithokazi lebhokhwe,  eligqibeleleyo, ngenxa yesono sakhe one ngaso.
3_4_29_Wocinezela ngesandla sakhe phezu kwentloko yedini lesono,  alixhelele idini lesono endaweni yedini elinyukayo.
3_4_30_Umbingeleli wocaphula egazini lalo ngomnwe wakhe, alidyobhe ezimpondweni zesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, igazi lalo lonke aliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo.
3_4_31_Wowasusa onke amanqatha alo, njengoko asuswayo amanqatha ombingelelo woxolo, aqhumisele ngawo umbingeleli esibingelelweni, libe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova;  umbingeleli amcamagushele; woxolelwa ke.
3_4_32_Ukuba ke umsondezo wakhe wedini lesono uyimvana, wozisa ithokazi eligqibeleleyo;
3_4_33_acinezele ngesandla sakhe phezu kwentloko yedini lesono,  alixhelele idini lesono apho kuxhelelwa khona idini elinyukayo.
3_4_34_Umbingeleli wocaphula egazini ledini lesono ngomnwe wakhe,  alidyobhe ezimpondweni zesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, igazi lalo lonke aliphalazele esisekweni sesibingelelo.
3_4_35_Maze awasuse onke amanqatha alo, njengoko asuswayo amanqatha emvana kumbingelelo woxolo, aqhumisele ngawo umbingeleli esibingelelweni, phezu kokudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova, umbingeleli amcamagushele ngesono sakhe one ngaso;  woxolelwa ke.
3_5_1_Ke ubani xa athe wona ngokuthi, elivile izwi lesifungo sokuzishwabulela, elingqina ke, nokuba ubonile, nokuba uyazi,  angaxeli: wobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe.
3_5_2_Ubani osukuba echukumisa into yonke eyinqambi, nokuba sisidumbu sezinto eziphilileyo eziziinqambi, nokuba sisidumbu sezinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi, nokuba sisidumbu sesinambuzane esiyinqambi, engakwazi oko: uyinqambi, uzeke ityala.
3_5_3_Xa athe wachukumisa ubuqambi bomntu, ubunqambi bakhe bonke ayinqambi ngabo, engakwazi oko, waza wabuya wakwazi oko: uzeke ityala.
3_5_4_Xa ke ubani athe wafunga, waphololoza ngomlomo wakhe,  esithi, uya kwenza into, nokuba imbi, nokuba ilungile,  ezintweni zonke athe waziphololoza umntu ngesifungo, engakwazi oko, waza wabuya wakwazi oko: uzeke ityala nangayiphi kwezo nto.
3_5_5_Kothi ke, xa athe wazeka ityala nangayiphi kwezo nto,  ayivume into one ngayo;
3_5_6_alizise idini letyala lakhe kuYehova, ngenxa yesono sakhe one ngaso, azise ithokazi lasempahleni emfutshane, imvanazana nokuba litakanekazi lebhokhwe exhonti, libe lidini lesono, aze umbingeleli amcamagushele ngesono sakhe.
3_5_7_Ukuba ke isandla sakhe sithe asaba nakuyifumana into elingana netakane, wozisa kuYehova idini letyala lakhe one ngalo, amahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo evukuthu abe mabini,  elinye libe lidini lesono, elinye libe lidini elinyukayo.
3_5_8_Wowazisa kumbingeleli, asondeze eledini lesono kuqala,  aliqhawule intloko ngasentanyeni, angalahluli kanye;
3_5_9_afefe ngenxalenye yegazi ledini lesono ecaleni lesibingelelo, eliseleyo igazi likhanyelwe esisekweni sesibingelelo. Lidini lesono ke elo.
3_5_10_Elesibini maze alenze idini elinyukayo ngokwesiko,  umbingeleli amcamagushele ngesono sakhe one ngaso; woxolelwa ke.
3_5_11_Ukuba ke isandla sakhe sithe asaba nakuwafumana amahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo evukuthu amabini, wozisa umsondezo wakhe lowo wonileyo, ube sisahlulo seshumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo, ube lidini lesono, angabeki oli phezu kwawo,  angabeki ntlaka imhlophe phezu kwawo; kuba lidini lesono elo.
3_5_12_Wowuzisa kumbingeleli, umbingeleli asube kuwo, sizale isandla sakhe, aqhumisele ngesikhumbuzo salo esibingelelweni,  phezu kokudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova. Lidini lesono ke elo.
3_5_13_Umbingeleli womcamagushela ngesono sakhe one ngaso,  nangayiphi kwezo nto; woxolelwa ke. Oseleyo woba ngowombingeleli, njengomnikelo wokudla.
3_5_14_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_5_15_Xa ubani athe wameneza, wona ezintweni ezingcwele zikaYehova ngokulahleka, wozisa idini letyala lakhe kuYehova,  inkunzi yemvu egqibeleleyo yasempahleni emfutshane,  iyeyeeshekele zesilivere ngokweshekele yengcwele ngokulinganisela kwakho, ibe lidini letyala.
3_5_16_Nento one kuyo ezintweni ezingcwele, makayimisele, ongeze isahlulo sesihlanu phezu kwayo, ayinike umbingeleli; umbingele amcamagushele ngenkunzi yemvu yedini letyala; woxolelwa ke.
3_5_17_Nokuba ubani uthe wona, wenza into kumthetho kaYehova,  nokuba nguwuphi na, wento engeyakwenziwa, engazi: uzeke ityala,  ubuthwele ubugwenxa bakhe.
3_5_18_Wozisa kumbingeleli inkunzi yemvu egqibeleleyo yasempahleni emfutshane, ngokulinganisela kwakho, ibe lidini letyala;  umbingeleli amcamagushele ngokulahleka kwakhe alahleke ngako,  engazi; woxolelwa ke.
3_5_19_Lidini letyala ke elo; unetyala okunene kuYehova.
3_6_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_6_2_Xa ubani athe wona ngokumeneza, emeneza kuYehova,  wayikhanyela kummelwane wakhe into ebibekwe kuye, nokuba yinto esisibambiso, nokuba yinto exhakamfulweyo, nokuba umcudisile ummelwane wakhe,
3_6_3_nokuba ufumene into ebidukile wayikhanyela, wafunga ubuxoki ezintweni zonke azenzileyo, esona ngazo:
3_6_4_wothi, xa athe wona, wazeka ityala, ayibuyise loo nto ixhakamfulweyo, abeyixhakamfule, nento ecudisiweyo,  abeyicudisile, nento ebekiweyo, ebibekiwe kuye, nento ebidukile wayifumana,
3_6_5_nento yonke abeyifungele ubuxoki. Woyibuyekeza ngangenani layo, ongeze phezu kwalo isahlulo sesihlanu salo, ayinike osukuba engumniniyo ngomhla wedini lakhe letyala.
3_6_6_Wolizisa idini letyala lakhe kuYehova, kumbingeleli, inkunzi yemvu egqibeleleyo yasempahleni emfutshane, ngokulinganisela kwakho, ibe lidini letyala.
3_6_7_Umbingeleli womcamagushela phambi koYehova, axolelwe ke ezintweni zonke azenzileyo, wazeka ityala ngazo.
3_6_8_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_6_9_Wisela uAron noonyana bakhe umthetho, uthi, Nguwo lo umyalelo wedini elinyukayo: lona idini elinyukayo lotsha eziko phezu kwesibingelelo ubusuku bonke kude kuse, nomlilo wesibingelelo uhlale usitsha kulo.
3_6_10_Umbingeleli makambathe ingubo yakhe yelinen emhlophe,  ambathe nebhulukhwe yelinen emhlophe enyameni yakhe, asuse uthuthu lomlilo odle idini elinyukayo phezu kwesibingelelo,  alubeke ecaleni lesibingelelo;
3_6_11_ahlube iingubo zakhe ezo, ambathe ngubo zimbi, aphume nothuthu, aye nalo ngaphandle kweminquba, endaweni emhlophe.
3_6_12_Ke umlilo ophezu kwesibingelelo mawuhlale usitsha kuso,  ungacimi; umbingeleli abase iinkuni phezu kwawo imiso ngemiso,  acwangcise phezu kwawo idini elinyukayo, aqhumisele phezu kwalo ngamanqatha ombingelelo woxolo.
3_6_13_Umlilo wohlala usitsha esibingelelweni, ungacimi.
3_6_14_Nguwo lo umyalelo womnikelo wokudla: oonyana baka-Aron mabawusondeze phambi koYehova, phambi kwesibingelelo;
3_6_15_asube kuwo, azalise isandla emgubeni ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, naseolini yawo, nasentlakeni emhlophe yonke ephezu komnikelo wokudla, aqhumisele ngezo nto esibingelelweni.  Livumba elithozamisayo, sisikhumbuzo sawo kuYehova eso.
3_6_16_Okuse leyo kuwo kodliwa nguAron noonyana bakhe, kudliwe kungenagwele endaweni engcwele, bakudle entendelezweni yentente yokuhlangana.
3_6_17_Makungosiwa okunegwele; sisabelo sabo endibanike sona ekudleni kwasemlilweni; yingcwele kangcwele, njengedini lesono,  nanjengedini letyala.
3_6_18_Yonke into eyindoda phakathi koonyana baka-Aron yowudla.  Ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu wasekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova: bonke abasukuba bezichukumisa ezo nto boba ngcwele.
3_6_19_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_6_20_Nguwo lo umsondezo ka-Aron noonyana bakhe, abowusondeza kuYehova ngomhla wokuthanjiswa kwakhe: isahlulo seshumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo, ube ngumnikelo wokudla wamaxesha onke, ube sisiqingatha kusasa, ube sisiqingatha ngokuhlwa;
3_6_21_wenziwe ngeoli epanini, uwuzise ukroqiwe, uwusondeze ungamaqhekeza ngokomnikelo wokudla wamaqhekeza, ube livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
3_6_22_Umbingeleli othanjisiweyo esikhundleni sakhe wowenza koonyana bakhe. Ngummiselo ongunaphakade kuYehova:  koqhunyiselwa ngawo uphela;
3_6_23_wonke umnikelo wokudla wombingeleli kuqhunyiselwe ngawo uphela, ungadliwa.
3_6_24_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_6_25_Thetha kuAron nakoonyana bakhe, uthi, Nguwo lo umyalelo wedini lesono: apho kuxhelelwa khona idini elinyukayo,  loxhelelwa khona idini lesono phambi koYehova; liyingcwele kangcwele lona.
3_6_26_Umbingeleli olenzayo idini lesono wolidla; lodliwa endaweni engcwele, entendelezweni yentente yokuhlangana.
3_6_27_Bonke abasukuba bechukumisa inyama yalo boba ngcwele;  nabasukuba bechaphazela iingubo ngegazi lalo, boyihlamba loo nto ichatshazelweyo endaweni engcwele.
3_6_28_Ke yona impahla yodongwe eliphekwe ngayo mayiqhekezwe;  ukuba lithe laphekwa ngempahla yobhedu, yoguxwa, ixukuxwe ngamanzi.
3_6_29_Yonke into eyindoda phakathi kwababingeleli yolidla:  liyingcwele kangcwele lona.
3_6_30_Ke lonke idini lesono, ekuziswe inxalenye yegazi lalo ententeni yokuhlangana, ukuba kucanyagushwe engcweleni,  malingadliwa, malitshiswe ngomlilo.
3_7_1_Nguwo lo umyalelo wedini letyala: liyingcwele kangcwele lona.
3_7_2_Apho kuxhelelwa khona idini elinyukayo, loxhelelwa khona idini letyala, negazi lalo litshizwe lijikelezise esibingelelweni.
3_7_3_Wosondeza onke amanqatha alo akulo, umsila, nomhlehlo ogubungela izibilini,
3_7_4_nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, nelisemihlubulweni,  nomhlehlo ophezu kwesibindi, ewususa ngasezintsweni; aqhumisele ngezo nto umbingeleli esibingelelweni.
3_7_5_Kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, lidini letyala ke elo.
3_7_6_Yonke into eyindoda phakathi kwababingeleli yolidla; lodliwa endaweni engcwele; liyingcwele kangcwele lona.
3_7_7_Njengoko linjalo idini lesono, linjalo idini letyala: mnye umyalelo kuwo omabini; umbingeleli ocamagusha ngalo, loba lelakhe.
3_7_8_Umbingeleli osondeza idini elinyukayo lomntu, isikhumba sedini elinyukayo alisondezayo soba sesombingeleli.
3_7_9_Nomnikelo wonke wokudla owosiwa ezikweni lezonka, nawo wonke owenzelwa epanini nasembizeni, woba ngowombingeleli owusondezayo.
3_7_10_Ke umnikelo wonke wokudla ogalelwe ioli, nowomileyo, woba ngowoonyana bonke baka-Aron, omnye abe njengomnye.
3_7_11_Nguwo lo umyalelo wombingelelo woxolo, aya kuwusondeza kuYehova.
3_7_12_Ukuba uthe wasondeza ngenxa yombulelo, wosondeza phezu kombingelelo wombulelo imiqhathane engenagwele egalelwe ioli,  nezonkana ezisicaba ezingenagwele, zithanjiswe ioli, nomgubo ocoliweyo, okroqiweyo, oyimiqhathane egalelwe ioli.
3_7_13_Kunye nemiqhathane yesonka esingenagwele, wosondeza umsondezo wakhe phezu kombingelelo wakhe wombulelo ongowoxolo;
3_7_14_asondeze ube mnye othatyathwe emsondezweni wonke, ube ngumrhumo kuYehova, ube ngowombingeleli olitshizayo igazi lombingelelo woxolo.
3_7_15_Nenyama yombingelelo wakhe wombulelo ongowoxolo yodliwa ngomhla wokusondeza kwakhe, kungashiywa nento kuyo kude kuse.
3_7_16_Ke ukuba umbingelelo womsondezo wakhe uthe waba ngowesibhambathiso, nokuba ngowokuqhutywa yintliziyo, wodliwa ngomhla wokusondeza kwakhe umbingelelo wakhe; okuseleyo kuwo kudliwe ngengomso.
3_7_17_Ke okuseleyo enyameni yombingelelo kwada kwangumhla wesithathu makutshiswe ngomlilo.
3_7_18_Ukuba kuthe kwadliwa, nokuba yintwana le yenyama yombingelelo wakhe woxolo, ngomhla wesithathu, awusayi kumkholekisa owusondezayo, awusayi kubalelwa kuye; woba yimbozisa. Ubani odlayo kuwo wobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe.
3_7_19_Nenyama efike entweni yonke eyinqambi mayingadliwa;  yotshiswa ngomlilo. Ke yona inyama, bonke abahlambulukileyo boyidla inyama;
3_7_20_ubani osukuba esidla inyama yombingelelo woxolo ongokaYehova, enobunqambi bakhe, loo mntu wonqanyulwa,  angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
3_7_21_Xa athe ubani wachukumisa into eyinqambi, nokuba bubunqambi bomntu, nokuba bubunqambi bezinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi,  nokuba yinto yonke enezothe eyinqambi, waza wadla inyama yombingelelo woxolo ongokaYehova, wonqanyulwa loo mntu,  angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
3_7_22_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_7_23_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Ize ningadli nqatha lankomo, namvu, nabhokhwe.
3_7_24_Inqatha lento ezifeleyo, nenqatha lento eqwengiweyo,  ningasebenza ngalo emisebenzini yonke; ke ukulidla ningalidli.
3_7_25_Kuba bonke abalidlayo inqatha lezinto ezizitho zine,  abazisondezileyo zaba kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, loo mntu ulidlayo wonqanyulwa, angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
3_7_26_Ize ningadli gazi emakhayeni enu onke, nelantaka, nelazinto zizizitho zine.
3_7_27_Wonke ubani osukuba esidla nto iligazi, loo mntu wonqanyulwa, angabikho ebantwini bakowabo.
3_7_28_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_7_29_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Lowo usondeza umbingelelo wakhe woxolo kuYehova, ukuwuzisa umsondezo wakhe kuYehova, wowuthabatha kumbingelelo wakhe woxolo lowo.
3_7_30_Izandla zakhe zokuzisa ukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova:  inqatha eliphezu kwencum wolizisa kunye nencum, ukuba litshangatshangiswe libe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova.
3_7_31_Umbingeleli woqhumisela ngenqatha elo esibingelelweni; ke yona incum ibe yeka-Aron neyoonyana bakhe;
3_7_32_umlenze wasekunene niwunike umbingeleli, ube ngumrhumo kumbingeleli emibingelelweni yenu yoxolo.
3_7_33_Lowo phakathi koonyana baka-Aron, usondeza igazi lombingelelo woxolo nenqatha, umlenze wasekunene woba ngowakhe,  ube sisabelo sakhe.
3_7_34_Kuba incum yomtshangatshangiso, nomlenze womrhumo,  ndiwuthabathile koonyana bakaSirayeli emibingelelweni yabo yoxolo; ndiwunike uAron umbingeleli, noonyana bakhe, ukuba ube ngummiselo ongunaphakade koonyana bakaSirayeli.
3_7_35_Ezo nto ngumxhesho ka-Aron, nomxhesho woonyana bakhe,  ekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova, ngomhla awabasondezayo ukuba babe ngababingeleli kuYehova;
3_7_36_awawisa umthetho uYehova, ngomhla wokubathambisa kwakhe,  ukuba bawunikwe ngoonyana bakaSirayeli; ube ngummiselo ongunaphakade lowo ezizukulwaneni zabo.
3_7_37_Nguwo lowo umyalelo wedini elinyukayo, nowomnikelo wokudla,  nowedini lesono, nowedini letyala, nowokumisela, nowombingelelo woxolo,
3_7_38_awamwisela umthetho ngawo uYehova uMoses, entabeni yaseSinayi, ngomhla wokubawisela kwakhe umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba basondeze imisondezo yabo kuYehova,  entlango yaseSinayi.
3_8_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_8_2_Thabatha ooAron noonyana bakhe kunye naye, nezambatho ezo,  neoli yokuthambisa, nenkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono,  neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini, nengobozi yezonka ezingenagwele;
3_8_3_ulibizele ndawonye lonke ibandla emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_8_4_Wenza uMoses ngoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho ngako;  walibizela ndawonye ibandla emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_8_5_Wathi uMoses kwibandla, Yiyo le into awise umthetho ngayo uYehova ukuba yenziwe.
3_8_6_UMoses wabasondeza ke ooAron noonyana bakhe, wabahlamba ngamanzi.
3_8_7_Wamnxiba ingubo yangaphantsi, wambhinqisa umbhinqo,  wamambathisa ngengubo yokwaleka, wamnxiba iefodi, wambhinqisa umbhinqo we-efodi, wayibhinqa ngawo;
3_8_8_wamnxiba ubengo; elubengweni wafaka iiUrim neeTumim;
3_8_9_wamfaka unkontsho entloko; elunkontshweni ngaphambili wabeka imbasa yegolide, isithsaba esingcwele, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
3_8_10_Wayithabatha uMoses ioli yokuthambisa, wawuthambisa umnquba neento zonke ezikuwo, wazingcwalisa;
3_8_11_wafefa ngenxalenye yayo esibingelelweni izihlandlo zosixhenxe, wasithambisa isibingelelo nempahla yaso yonke,  nohehema lwesitya sokuhlambela, noseko lwalo, ukuba zingcwaliswe ezo zinto.
3_8_12_Wagalela inxalenye yeoli yokuthambisa kuAron entloko,  wamthambisa ukuba angcwaliswe.
3_8_13_UMoses wabasondeza oonyana baka-Aron, wabanxiba iingubo zangaphantsi, wababhinqisa umbhinqo, wababopha iminqwazi,  njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_8_14_Wasondeza inkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono, bacinezela ooAron noonyana bakhe ngezandla zabo phezu kwentloko yenkunzi entsha yedini lesono.
3_8_15_Yaxhelwa ke; walithabatha uMoses igazi, walidyobha wajikelezisa ezimpondweni zesibingelelo ngomnwe wakhe,  isibingelelo wasihlambulula sona, waliphalazela igazi esisekweni sesibingelelo, wasingcwalisa, ukuba asicamagushele.
3_8_16_Wawathabatha onke amanqatha asezibilinini, nomhlehlo wesibindi, nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, waqhumisela ngezo zinto uMoses esibingelelweni.
3_8_17_Ke inkunzi entsha yenkomo, nesikhumba sayo, nenyama yayo,  nomswane wayo, wayitshisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kweminquba,  njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_8_18_Wayisondeza inkunzi yemvu yedini elinyukayo; bacinezela ooAron noonyana bakhe ngezandla zabophezu kwentloko yenkunzi yemvu.
3_8_19_Yaxhelwa ke; uMoses walitshiza igazi, wajikelezisa esibingelelweni;
3_8_20_inkunzi yemvu wayityatya; waqhumisela uMoses ngentloko,  nenyama, nenqatha.
3_8_21_Wazihlamba izibilini neentungo ngamanzi, waqhumisela uMoses ngenkunzi yemvu iphela esibingelelweni. Lidini elinyukayo elo lokuba livumba elithozamisayo; kukudla kwasemlilweni oko kuYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_8_22_Wayisondeza neyesibini inkunzi yemvu, inkunzi yemvu yokumisela; bacinezela ooAron noonyana bakhe ngezandla zabo phezu kwentloko yenkunzi yemvu.
3_8_23_Yaxhelwa ke; wacaphula uMoses egazini layo, walidyobha esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene ka-Aron, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakubhontsi wonyawo lwakhe lwasekunene.
3_8_24_Wasondeza oonyana baka-Aron, uMoses wadyobha inxalenye yegazi esithinzini sendlebe yabo yasekunene, nasesithupheni sesandla sabo sokunene, nakubhontsi wonyawo lwabo lwasekunene.  UMoses walitshiza igazi, wajikelezisa esibingelelweni.
3_8_25_Walithabatha inqatha, nomsila, namanqatha onke asezibilinini, nomhlehlo wesibindi, nezintso zombini, nenqatha lazo, nomlenze wasekunene;
3_8_26_engobozini yezonka ezingenagwele, ephambi koYehova,  wathabatha umqhathane ongenagwele wamnye, nomqhathane wesonka esineoli wamnye, nesonkana esisicaba sasinye, wabeka phezu kwamanqatha naphezu komlenze wasekunene.
3_8_27_Wazibeka zonke ezo zinto ezandleni zika-Aron, nasezandleni zoonyana bakhe, wazitshangatshangisa, zaba ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova.
3_8_28_Wazithabatha uMoses ezandleni zabo, waqhumisela ngazo esibingelelweni, phezu kwedini elinyukayo: zaba lumiselo, laba livumba elithozamisayo, kwaba kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova oko.
3_8_29_Wayithabatha uMoses incum, wayitshangatshangisa, yaba ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova; inkunzi yemvu yomiselo yasisabelo sikaMoses, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_8_30_Wacaphula uMoses eolini yokuthambisa, nasegazini elisesibingelelweni, wafefa kuAron nasezambathweni zakhe,  nakoonyana bakhe, nasezambathweni zoonyana bakhe kunye naye,  wamngcwalisa uAron nezambatho zakhe, noonyana bakhe nezambatho zoonyana bakhe kunye naye.
3_8_31_Wathi uMoses kooAron noonyana bakhe, Yiphekeni inyama emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, niyidle khona apho, nesonka esisengobozini yomiselo, njengoko ndawisayo umthetho, ndisithi,  OoAron noonyana bakhe boyidla.
3_8_32_Into eseleyo yenyama neyesonka noyitshisa ngomlilo.
3_8_33_Ize ningaphumi emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, imihla esixhenxe, kude kube ngumhla wokuzaliseka kwemihla yokumiselwa kwenu; kuba bonimisela imihla esixhenxe.
3_8_34_Njengoko kwenziwe ngako namhla, uYehova uwise umthetho ukuba kwenjiwe njalo ukunicamagushela.
3_8_35_Nohlala emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, imini nobusuku,  imihla esixhenxe, nigcine isigxina sikaYehova, ukuze ningafi;  kuba ndiwiselwe umthetho ngokunjalo.
3_8_36_Benza ooAron noonyana bakhe zonke izinto abewise umthetho ngazo uYehova ngesandla sikaMoses.
3_9_1_Kwathi ngomhla wesibhozo, uMoses wabiza uAron noonyana bakhe, namodada amakhulu akwaSirayeli.
3_9_2_Wathi kuAron, Zithabathele ithole, inkonyana yenkomo, ibe lidini lesono, nenkunzi yemvu ibe lidini elinyukayo, ezo zinto zigqibelele, uzisondeze phambi koYehova;
3_9_3_uthethe koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Thabathani inkunzi exhonti yebhokhwe, ibe lidini lesono; nethole nemvana ezimnyaka mnye, ezigqibeleleyo, zibe lidini elinyukayo;
3_9_4_nenkomo nenkunzi yemvu, zibe ngumbingelelo woxolo wokubingelelwa phambi koYehova; nomnikelo wokudla ogalelwe ioli: ngokuba namhla uYehova uya kubonakala kuni.
3_9_5_Bakuthabatha oko uMoses wawisa umthetho ngako, bakuzisa phambi kwentente yokuhlangana; lasondela lonke ibandla, lema phambi koYehova.
3_9_6_Wathi uMoses, Lilo eli ilizwi uYehova awise umthetho ngalo ukuba nilenze: bobonakala ke ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova kuni.
3_9_7_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Sondela esibingelelweni, wenze idini lakho lesono, nedini lakho elinyukayo, uzicamagushele okwakho nokwabantu; wenze umsondezo wabantu, ubacamagushele, njengoko uYehova wawisayo umthetho.
3_9_8_Wasondela ke uAron esibingelelweni, walixhela ithole ledini lesono elilelakhe.
3_9_9_Balisondeza oonyana baka-Aron igazi kuye, wawuthi nkxu umnwe wakhe egazini, walidyobha ezimpondweni zesibingelelo,  waliphalazela igazi esisekweni sesibingelelo.
3_9_10_Ke inqatha, nezintso, nomhlehlo osesibindini, edinini lesono, waqhumisela ngezo zinto esibingelelweni, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_9_11_Ke inyama nesikhumba wazitshisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kweminquba.
3_9_12_Walixhela idini elinyukayo, oonyana baka-Aron balizisa kuye igazi; walitshiza wajikelezisa esibingelelweni.
3_9_13_Balizisa kuye nedini elinyukayo ngeenyama zalo, nentloko yalo; waqhumisela ngezo nto esibingelelweni.
3_9_14_Wazihlamba izibilini neentungo, waqhumisela ngezo zinto phezu kwedini elinyukayo esibingelelweni.
3_9_15_Wasondeza umsondezo wabantu, wathabatha ibhokhwe yedini lesono eyeyabantu, wayixhela, wenza idini lesono njengelokuqala.
3_9_16_Wasondeza nedini elinyukayo, walenza ngokwesiko.
3_9_17_Wawusondeza umnikelo wokudla, wazalisa isandla sakhe ngawo,  waqhumisela ngawo esibingelelweni, ngaphezu kwedini elinyukayo lakusasa.
3_9_18_Wayixhela inkomo nenkunzi yemvu yombingelelo woxolo ongowabantu, balizisa oonyana baka-Aron igazi kuye, walitshiza,  wajikelezisa esibingelelweni;
3_9_19_namanqatha enkomo nawenkunzi yemvu, nomsila wayo,  nomhlehlo, nezi ntso, nomhlehlo wesibindi.
3_9_20_Bawabeka loo manqatha phezu kwazo iincum, waqhumisela ngamanqatha esibingelelweni.
3_9_21_Ke iincum ezo, nomlenze lowo wasekunene,  wazitshangatshangisa uAron zaba ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova, njengoko wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
3_9_22_UAron waziphakamisela ebantwini izandla zakhe,  wabasikelela; wehla ke ekulenzeni idini lesono, nedini elinyukayo, nombingelelo woxolo.
3_9_23_Bangena ooMoses noAron ententeni yokuhlangana; baphuma ke babasikelela abantu: babonakala ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova kubo bonke abantu.
3_9_24_Kwaphuma umlilo ebusweni bukaYehova, walidla idini elinyukayo, namanqatha aphezu kwesibingelelo; babona bonke abantu, baduma, bawa ngobuso.
3_10_1_Ke kaloku oonyana baka-Aron abangooNadabhi noAbhihu bathabatha elowo ugcedevu lwakhe, babeka umlilo kulo, babeka phezu kwawo isiqhumiso, basondeza phambi koYehova umlilo ongesesikweni, abengabawiselanga mthetho ngawo.
3_10_2_Kwaphuma umlilo ebusweni bukaYehova, wabadla; bafa phambi koYehova.
3_10_3_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Yilaa nto wayithethayo uYehova, wathi,  Ndozingcwalisela abasondela kum, ndizizukise ebusweni babantu bonke; wathi cwaka uAron.
3_10_4_UMoses wabiza uMishayeli noElitsafan, oonyana bakaUziyeli,  uyisekazi ka-Aron, wathi kubo, Sondelani nibathwale abazalwana benu, nibasuse phambi kwengcwele, nibase ngaphandle kweminquba.
3_10_5_Basondela ke, babathwalela ngaphandle kweminquba,  beneengubo zabo zangaphantsi, njengoko watshoyo uMoses.
3_10_6_Wathi uMoses kuAron, nakuElazare, nakuItamare, oonyana bakhe, Musani ukuziyeka ziyakazele iinwele zenu, ningazikrazuli iingubo zenu, ukuze ningafi, nokuze umsindo ungalifikeli ibandla lonke; abazalwana benu, yonke indlu kaSira yeli,  bangakulilela bona ukutshisa akutshisileyo uYehova.
3_10_7_Ize ningaphumi emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, hleze nife;  kuba ioli yokuthambisa kaYehova iphezu kwenu. Benza ke ngokwelizwi likaMoses.
3_10_8_Wathetha uYehova kuAron, esithi,
3_10_9_Musa ukusela wayini nasiselo sinxilisayo, wena noonyana bakho kunye nawe, ekungeneni kwenu ententeni yokuhlangana,  ukuze ningafi. Ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu ke lowo;
3_10_10_ukuze kwahlulwe okungcwele kokuhlambelayo, nokuyinqambi kokuhlambulukileyo;
3_10_11_nokuze bayalwe oonyana bakaSirayeli ngemimiselo yonke awayithethayo uYehova kubo ngoMoses.
3_10_12_Wathetha uMoses kuAron, nakuElazare nakuItamare, oonyana bakhe abaselayo, wathi, Thabathani umnikelo wokudla oseleyo ekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova, niwudle ungenagwele ecaleni lesibingelelo; kuba uyingcwele kangcwele lowo.
3_10_13_Nize niwudle endaweni engcwele, kuba umiselwe wena,  umiselwe oonyana bakho, ekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova; kuba ndiwiselwe umthetho ngokunjalo.
3_10_14_Ke incum yomtshangatshangiso nomlenze womrhumo, ezo nto nozidla endaweni emhlophe, wena noonyana bakho neentombi zakho kunye nawe; kuba zimiselwe wena, zimiselwe oonyana bakho;  zenizinikiweyo emibingelelweni yoxolo yoonyana bakaSirayeli.
3_10_15_Umlenze womrhumo nencum yomtshangatshangiso yoziswa nokudla kwasemlilweni kwamanqatha, ukuba itshangatshangiswe ibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova, ibe ngowakho noonyana bakho kunye nawe; ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade, njengoko uYehova wawisayo umthetho.
3_10_16_Ibhokhwe yedini lesono wayifuna kunene uMoses. Yini?  Itshisiwe. Waba noburhalarhume ngakuElazare noItamare, oonyana baka-Aron abaseleyo, esithi,
3_10_17_Kutheni na le nto ningalidlanga idini lesono endaweni engcwele? Kuba liyingcwele kangcwele; uninike lona ukuze nibuthwale ubugwenxa bebandla, ukuze nilicamagushele phambi koYehova.
3_10_18_Yabonani, alingeniswanga igazi lalo engcweleni phakathi;  ninge nilidlile okunene engcweleni, njengoko ndawisa umthetho.
3_10_19_Wathetha uAron kuMoses, esithi, Yabona, namhlanje basondeze idini labo lesono, nedini labo elinyukayo phambi koYehova; ndahlelwa zezi zinto. Ukuba bendilidlile idini lesono namhla bekuya kulunga yini na emehlweni kaYehova?
3_10_20_Weva uMoses; kwalunga emehlweni akhe.
3_11_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses na kuAron, esithi kubo,
3_11_2_Thethani koonyana bakaSirayeli, nithi, Zizo ezi izinto eziphilileyo enodla zona ezintweni zonke ezizitho zine ezisehlabathini:
3_11_3_zonke izinto ezithiwe gqiphu uphuphu, ezimpuphu zicandwe kubini, ezetyisa umtyiso, ezintweni ezizitho zine, nozidla ezo.
3_11_4_Zezi zodwa eningayi kuzidla kwezetyisa umtyiso,  nakwezithiwe gqiphu uphuphu: inkamela, ngokuba ityisa umtyiso,  ke ayiluthe gqiphu uphuphu, iyinqambi kuni;
3_11_5_nembila, ngokuba ityisa umtyiso, ke ayiluthe gqiphu uphuphu, iyinqambi kuni;
3_11_6_nomvundla, ngokuba utyisa umtyiso, ke awuluthe gqiphu uphuphu, uyinqambi kuni;
3_11_7_nehagu, ngokuba iluthe gqiphu uphuphu, ke ilucande kubini uphuphu, yabe ingawutyisi umtyiso, iyinqambi kuni.
3_11_8_Inyama yezo nto ize ningayidli, nesidumbu sazo ningasichukumisi; ziziinqambi kuni.
3_11_9_Ezintweni zonke ezisemanzini nozidla ezi: zonke izinto ezinamaphiko namaxolo emanzini, ezilwandleni nasemilanjeni,  nozidla zona.
3_11_10_Ke zonke izinto ezingenamaphiko namaxolo ezilwandleni nasemilanjeni, enyakanyakeni yonke esemanzini, nasezintweni eziphilileyo ezisemanzini,
3_11_11_zoba nezothe kuni, zibe nezothe kuni. Nize ningayidli inyama yazo; nezidumbu zazo zibe nezothe kuni.
3_11_12_Zonke izinto ezingenamaphiko namaxolo emanzini zoba nezothe kuni.
3_11_13_Zezi ezintakeni ezoba nezothe kuni; zezingadliwa,  zinezothe zona: ixhalanga,
3_11_14_nosilwangangubo, nonomakhwezana; noontloyiya ngohlobo lwabo;
3_11_15_nehlungulu lonke ngohlobo lwalo;
3_11_16_nenciniba, nesihuluhulu, nengabangaba, nentambanane ngohlobo lwayo;
3_11_17_nesikhova, nogwidi, nefubesi,
3_11_18_nenkuku yamanzi, nengcwangube, nenkqo;
3_11_19_nengwamza, nokhwalimanzi ngohlobo lwakhe, nobhobhoyi,  nelulwane.
3_11_20_Yonke inyakanyaka enamaphiko, ehamba ngazitho zine, yoba nezothe kuni.
3_11_21_Zezi zodwa enozidla kwinyakanyaka yonke enamaphiko, ehamba ngazitho zine, enemilenze yomibini entla kweenyawo zayo, yokuba itshakace ngayo emhlabeni;
3_11_22_zezi ke kuzo enozidla: inkumbi ngohlobo lwayo, nesibotho ngohlobo lwaso, nomqhathu ngohlobo lwawo, nomcikwane ngohlobo lwawo.
3_11_23_Ke yonke inyakanyaka enamaphiko, enazitho zine, yoba nezothe kuni.
3_11_24_Ngenxa yayo noba ziinqambi; abachukumisa isidumbu sayo boba ziinqambi, bahlwise;
3_11_25_bonke abasusa nto yesidumbu sayo, bohlamba iingubo zabo,  babe ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_11_26_Yonke into ezitho zine eluthe gqiphu uphuphu, ukulucanda ingalucandi kubini, ingatyisi mtyiso, iyinqambi kuni; bonke abayichukumisayo boba ziinqambi.
3_11_27_Neento zonke ezihamba ngamathupha azo, ezintweni zonke eziphilileyo ezihamba ngazitho zine, ziziinqambi kuni; bonke abasichukumisayo isidumbu sazo, boba ziinqambi bahlwise.
3_11_28_Lowo ususa isidumbu sazo, wohlamba iingubo zakhe, abe yinqambi ahlwise; ziinqambi zona kuni.
3_11_29_Zezi ezoba ziinqambi kuni enyakanyakeni enyakazela emhlabeni: igala, nempuku, noxam ngohlobo lwakhe;
3_11_30_nentulo, necilishe, norhoqotyeni, noqebeyi, nolovane.
3_11_31_Zezo eziziinqambi kuni enyakanyakeni yonke; bonke abazichukumisayo ezifileyo kuzo, boba ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_11_32_Izinto zonke ezithe zawelwa yenye yazo ifile, zoba ziinqambi: nokuba ziimpahla zonke zemithi, nokuba ziingubo,  nokuba zizikhumba, nokuba ziinqambi, zihlwise; zize zihlambuluke ke.
3_11_33_limpahla zonke zomdongwe, ethe yeyela kuzo enye yazo, zoba ziinqambi zonke izinto eziphakathi kwazo; noziqhekeza ke.
3_11_34_Konke ukudla okudliwayo, okufikiweyo ngamanzi akwezo mpahla, koba yinqambi; nento yonke eselwayo ngezo mpahla zonke,  yoba yinqambi.
3_11_35_Into yonke ethe yawelwa nayindawoni na yesidumbu sazo,  yoba yinqambi; nokuba liziko lezonka, nokuba ngungxawu, ize yaphulwe; iyinqambi, yoba yinqambi kuni.
3_11_36_Kodwa umthombo nequla elinentlanganisela yamanzi lohlambuluka; osichukumisayo isidumbu sazo woba yinqambi.
3_11_37_Xa kuthe kwawa nandawoni yesidumbu sazo embewini yonke ehlwayelwayo, eza kuhlwayelwa, yohlambuluka yona.
3_11_38_Xa kuthe kwagalelwa amanzi embewini, kwawa nandawoni yesidumbu sazo phezu kwayo, yoba yinqambi kuni.
3_11_39_Xa kuthe kwafa nto izitho zine idliwayo nini, lowo usichukumisayo isidumbu sayo woba yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_11_40_Lowo udlayo esidumbini sayo, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, abe yinqambi, ahlwise; nalowo ususa isidumbu sayo, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, abe yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_11_41_Yonke inyakanyaka enyakazela emhlabeni inezothe;  mayingadliwa.
3_11_42_Zonke izinto ezihamba ngesisu, neento zonke ezihamba nganyawo-ne, kude kuse kwiinto zonke ezineenyawo ezininzi,  enyakanyakeni yonke enyakazelayo emhlabeni, ize ningazidli;  ngokuba zinezothe.
3_11_43_Musani ukuyenza imiphefumlo yenu ibe nezothe ngenyakanyaka yonke enyakazelayo, ize ningazenzi inqambi ngayo, nibe yinqambi ngayo.
3_11_44_Ngokuba ndinguYehova uThixo wenu, ze nizingcwalise nibe ngcwele; ngokuba ndiyiNgcwele; ize ningayenzi iinqambi imiphefumlo yenu ngenyakanyaka yonke enambuzelayo emhlabeni.
3_11_45_Ngokuba ndinguYehova oninyuse ezweni laseYiputa, ukuba ndibe nguThixo wenu; ize nibe ngcwele, ngokuba ndiyiNgcwele.
3_11_46_Nguwo lowo umyalelo weento ezizitho zine, neentaka,  nemiphefumlo yonke ephilileyo enambuzelayo emanzini,  nemiphefumlo yonke enyakazelayo emhlabeni;
3_11_47_woyahlula eyinqambi kwehlambulukileyo, nento ephilileyo edliwayo kwinto ephilileyo engadliwayo.
3_12_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_12_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Umfazi, xa athe wathabatha, wazala inkwenkwe, woba yinqambi imihla esixhenxe;  njengemihla yokungcola komzi wakhe woba yinqambi.
3_12_3_Ngomhla wesibhozo iya kwaluswa inyama yokwaluswa;
3_12_4_aze ahlale egazini lokuhlanjululwa kwakhe iintsuku ezimashumi mathathu anantsuku-ntathu; angazichukumisi zonke izinto ezingcwele, angangeni engcweleni, zide zizaliseke iintsuku zokuhlanjululwa kwakhe.
3_12_5_Ke ukuba uthe wazala intombi, woba yinqambi iiveki ezimbini, njengasekungcoleni kwakhe; ahlale phezu kwegazi lokuhlanjululwa kwakhe iintsuku ezimashumi mathandathu anantsuku ntandathu.
3_12_6_Ekuzalisekeni kweentsuku zokuhlanjululwa kwakhe ngonyana,  nokuba kungentombi, wozisa imvana emnyaka mnye ibe lidini elinyukayo, negobo levukuthu nokuba lihobe, libe lidini lesono,  emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, kuye umbingeleli;
3_12_7_alisondeze yena phambi koYehova, emcamagushele, aze ahlambuluke ke ethombeni legazi lakhe. Nguwo lowo umyalelo wozeleyo inkwenkwe nokuba yintombi.
3_12_8_Ke ukuba isandla sakhe sithe asaba nakufumana nto ilingana nemvana, wothabatha amahobe abe mabini, nokuba ngamagobo evukuthu abe mabini, elinye libe leledini elinyukayo, elinye libe leledini lesono, umbingeleli amcamagushele, aze ahlambuluke ke.
3_13_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses na kuAron, esithi,
3_13_2_Umntu xa kuthe kwakho eluswini lwenyama yakhe ukufukuka,  nokuba kukujaduka, nokuba litshatshazi, laba sisibetho seqhenqa eluswini lwenyama yakhe, woziswa kuAron umbingeleli, nokuba kukomnye woonyana bakhe ababingeleli.
3_13_3_Wosikhangela umbingeleli isebetho eluswini lwenyama yakhe;  ukuba luthe unwele esibethweni lwasuka lwaba mhlophe,  sabonakala isibetho sithe gangqa eluswini lwenyama yakhe:  sisibetho seqhenqa eso; womkhangela umbingeleli, athi uyinqambi.
3_13_4_Ukuba itshatshazi lithe lamhlophe eluswini lwenyama yakhe,  alabonakala lithe gangqa eluswini, alwasuka lwaba mhlophe unwele lwalo, umbingeleli womvalela onesibetho imihla esixhenxe;
3_13_5_umbingeleli amkhangele ngomhla wesixhenxe; O! isibetho simi emehlweni akhe, asiqhenqethi isibetho eluswini; wophinda umbingeleli amvalele imihla esixhenxe.
3_13_6_Umbingeleli wophinda amkhangele ngomhla wesixhenxe; O!  isibetho sibunile, asiqhenqethi isibetho eluswini; umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile: kukujaduka oko. Wozihlamba iingubo zakhe;  aze ahlambuluke ke.
3_13_7_Ukuba ukujaduka kuthe kwaqhenqetha kakhulu eluswini, emva kokubonakala kwakhe kumbingeleli ngenxa yokuhlanjululwa kwakhe,  wophinda abonakale kumbingeleli;
3_13_8_umbingeleli akhangele, O! ukujaduka kuqhenqethile eluswini;  umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi: liqhenqa ke elo.
3_13_9_Isibetho seqhenqa, xa sithe sabakho emntwini, woziswa kumbingeleli;
3_13_10_akhangele umbingeleli, O! ukufukuka kumhlophe eluswini,  kulwenze unwele lwaba mhlophe, kukho inyama ekrwada, ehleliyo ekufukukeni apho:
3_13_11_liqhenqa elidala eli eluswini lwenyama yakhe; umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi; angamvaleli, ngokuba uyinqambi.
3_13_12_Ke ukuba iqhenqa lithe qwele kakhulu eluswini, iqhenqa lalugubungela lonke ulusu lonesibetho, lathabathela entloko lesa ezinyaweni, ngokubona konke kwamehlo ombingeleli,
3_13_13_umbingeleli wokhangela; O! liyigubungele yonke inyama yakhe iqhenqa; wothi uhlambulukile onesibetho; usuke waba mhlophe wonke ephela, uhlambulukile.
3_13_14_Ke ngomhla ebonakeleyo kuye inyama ekrwada, uyinqambi.
3_13_15_Aze ayikhangele umbingeleli inyama ekrwada, athi uyinqambi; inyama ekrwada iyinqambi: liqhenqa ke elo.
3_13_16_Naxa ithe yabuya inyama ekrwada, yasuka yaba mhlophe, woza kumbingeleli;
3_13_17_umbingeleli amkhangele, O! sisuke isibetho saba mhlophe,  umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile onesibetho; uhlambulukile ke yena.
3_13_18_Ke inyama, xa kuthe kwakho kuyo eluswini lwayo ithumba,  laphola;
3_13_19_kwabakho endaweni yethumba ukufukuka okumhlophe, nokuba litshatshazi elifuna ukuba yingqombela, wobonakala kumbingeleli;
3_13_20_akhangele umbingeleli, O! libonakala lithe gangqa eluswini, unwele lwalo lusuke lwamhlophe; umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi: sisibetho seqhenqa eso, sithe qwele ethumbeni.
3_13_21_Ukuba umbingeleli uthe wakhangela, O! akukho lunwele lumhlophe kulo, alithe gangqa eluswini libunile, umbingeleli womvalela imihla esixhenxe.
3_13_22_Ke ukuba lithe laqhenqetha kakhulu eluswini, umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi: sisibetho eso.
3_13_23_Ke ukuba itshatshazi lithe lema endaweni yalo,  alaqhenqetha: kukuqulungana kwethumba oko; umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile.
3_13_24_Ke inyama, xa kuthe kwakho eluswini lwayo umtshiso womlilo, kwathi ukuphola komtshiso kwaba litshatshazi elifuna ukuba yingqombela, nokuba limhlophe kanye,
3_13_25_walikhangela umbingeleli itshatshazi, O! lusuke lwamhlophe unwele etshatshazini, libonakala lithe gangqa eluswini:  liqhenqa ke elo; lithe qwele emtshisweni. Umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi: sisibetho seqhenqa ke eso.
3_13_26_Ukuba uthe wakhangela umbingeleli, O! akukho lunwele lumhlophe etshatshazini, alithe gangqa eluswini, libunile:  umbingeleli womvalela imihla esixhenxe;
3_13_27_akhangele umbingeleli ngomhla wesixhenxe; ukuba lithe laqhenqetha kakhulu eluswini, umbingeleli wothi uyinqambi:  sisibetho seqhenqa ke eso.
3_13_28_Ke ukuba itshatshazi lithe lema endaweni yalo,  alaqhenqetha eluswini, lisuke labuna: kukufukuka komtshiso oko.  Umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile; kuba kukuqulungana komtshiso oko.
3_13_29_Xa kuthe kwakho isibetho kwindoda nenkazana entloko,  nokuba kusesilevini;
3_13_30_wasikhangela umbingeleli isibetho, O! sithe gangqa eluswini ukubonakala kwaso, kukho unwele kuso olulubhelu olomileyo, umbingeleli wothi iyinqambi: kukudlathuka kweenwele oko, liqhenqa lasentloko, nokuba lelasesilevini elo.
