3_13_31_Xa athe umbingeleli wasikhangela isibetho sokudlathuka kweenwele, O! asithe gangqa eluswini ukubonakala kwaso,  kungekho lunwele lulubhelu kuso, umbingeleli womvalela onesibetho sokudlathuka kweenwele imihla esixhenxe.
3_13_32_Umbingeleli xa athe wamkhangela onesibetho ngomhla wesixhenxe, O! ukudlathuka akuqhenqethanga, akwabakho lunwele lulubhelu kuye, ukubonakala kokudlathuka kungathanga gangqa eluswini,
3_13_33_wozicheba, kodwa angayichebi indawo edlathukileyo; aphinde umbingeleli amvalele imihla esixhenxe onendawo edlathukileyo.
3_13_34_Umbingeleli akukukhangela ngomhla wesixhenxe ukudlathuka,  O! ukudlathuka akuqhenqethanga eluswini, ukubonakala kwako kungathanga gangqa eluswini, umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile.  Wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, ahlambuluke ke.
3_13_35_Ukuba ukudlathuka kuthe kwaqhenqetha kakhulu eluswini emveni kokuhlanjululwa kwakhe,
3_13_36_wakukhangela umbingeleli, O! ukudlathuka kuqhenqethile eluswini, umbingeleli akasayi kuba saphicotha lunwele lulubhelu: uyinqambi yena.
3_13_37_Ukuba kusuke kwema ukudlathuka emehlweni akhe, kwakhula unwele olumnyama kuko, kupholile ukudlathuka, uhlambulukile;  umbingeleli wothi uhlambulukile.
3_13_38_Xa kuthe kwakho kwindoda nakwinkazana eluswini lwenyama yayo amatshatshazi, amatshatshazi amhlophe,
3_13_39_wakhangela umbingeleli, O! amatshatshazi eluswini lwenyama yabo akanabumhlophe: litshanda elo, lithe qwele eluswini;  uhlambulukile.
3_13_40_Indoda xa ithe intloko yayo yaguda: yinkqayi leyo,  uhlambulukile.
3_13_41_Ukuba ithe yaguda intloko yayo, yathabathela ecaleni lobuso bayo: yimpandla leyo, uhlambulukile.
3_13_42_Xa kuthe kwakho enkqayini, nokuba kusempandleni, isibetho esimhlophe sayingqombela: liqhenqa elo elithe qwele enkqayini yakhe, nokuba kusempandleni yakhe.
3_13_43_Umbingeleli womkhangela, O! ukufukuka kweso sibetho kumhlophe, kwayingqombela, enkqayini yakhe nokuba kusempandleni yakhe, ngokubonakala kweqhenqa lolusu lwenyama:
3_13_44_yindoda eneqhenqa leyo, iyinqambi. Umbingeleli wothi iyinqambi kuphele; isibetho sayo sisentlokweni yayo.
3_13_45_Lowo uneqhenqa, lowo sikuye isibetho, zokrazulwa iingubo zakhe, ziyekwe iinwele ziyakazele, azigqubuthele iindevu,  adanduluke, esithi, Ndiyinqambi, ndiyinqambi!
3_13_46_Yonke imihla esikhoyo kuye isibetho, woba yinqambi kuphele, ahlale yedwa ngaphandle kweminquba, ukuhlala kwakhe.
3_13_47_Ingubo xa sithe sabakho kuyo isibetho seqhenqa, engutyeni yoboya nasengutyeni yelinen,
3_13_48_naselusingeni lokoluka, naselusingeni lokuluka, lwelinen noloboya, nasesikhumbeni, nasezintweni zonke ezenziwe ngesikhumba;
3_13_49_ukuba isibetho eso siba buhlazarha, nokuba siba yingqombela engutyeni, nasesikhumbeni, naselusingeni lokoluka,  naselusingeni lokuluka, nasemphaleni yonke yesikhumba:  sisibetho seqhenqa eso. Soboniswa umbingeleli,
3_13_50_asikhangele umbingeleli isibetho, ayivalele into enesibetho imihla esixhenxe;
3_13_51_ayikhangele loo nto inesibetho ngomhla wesixhenxe. Xa sithe saqhenqetha isibetho engutyeni, naselusingeni lokoluka,  naselusingeni lokuluka, nasesikhumbeni, ezintweni zonke ezenziwe ngesikhumba: liqhenqa elisenza mandundu isibetho.  Yinqambi ke leyo.
3_13_52_Woyitshisa ingubo, nosinga lokoluka, nosinga lokuluka,  noboya, nelinen, nempahla yonke yesikhumba esikhoyo kuyo isibetho: ngokuba liqhenqa elimandundu; yotshiswa loo mpahla ngomlilo.
3_13_53_Ukuba umbingeleli uthe wakhangela, O! isibetho asiqhenqethanga engutyeni, naselusingeni lokoluka,  naselusingeni lokuluka, nasempahleni yonke yesikhumba:
3_13_54_wowisa umthetho umbingeleli, ihlanjwe loo nto sikuyo isibetho, aphinde ayivalele imihla esixhenxe;
3_13_55_asikhangele umbingeleli isibetho emveni kokuhlanjwa, O!  isibetho asiguqukanga ukubonakala kwaso, asiqhenqethanga isibetho: yinqambi loo nto; yotshiswa ngomlilo. Yinkrombonca ngaphakathi nangaphandle.
3_13_56_Ke ukuba uthe wakhangela umbingeleli, O! isibetho sibunile emveni kokuhlanjwa kwaso: wosikrazula, asikhuphe engutyeni,  nasesikhumbeni, naselusingeni lokoluka, naselusingeni lokuluka.
3_13_57_Ukuba sithe sabuya sabonakala engutyeni, naselusingeni lokoluka, naselusingeni lokuluka, nasempahleni yonke yesikhumba: kukuthi qwele kwaso oko; woyitshisa ngomlilo loo nto sikuyo isibetho.
3_13_58_Ingubo, nosinga lokoluka, nosinga lokuluka, nempahla yonke yesikhumba ehlanjiweyo, ukuba sithe isibetho semka kuyo,  yophindwa ihlanjwe, ihlambuluke ke.
3_13_59_Nguwo lowo ke umyalelo wesibetho seqhenqa engutyeni yoboya neyelinen, naselusingeni lokoluka, naselusingeni lokuluka,  nasempahleni yonke yesikhumba, wokuthi zihlambulukile,  nowokuthi ziziinqambi.
3_14_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_14_2_Lo woba ngumyalelo woneqheneqa, ngomhla wokuhlanjululwa kwakhe:
3_14_3_Woziswa kumbingeleli, aphume umbingeleli aye ngaphandle kweminquba, akhangele umbingeleli, O! isibetho seqhenqa siphilisiwe, semka koneqhenqa;
3_14_4_awise umthetho umbingeleli, ukuba lowo uzihlambululayo athatyathelwe iintaka ezimbini eziphilileyo, ezihlambulukileyo,  nomsedare, noboya obubomvu, nehisope.
3_14_5_Wowisa umthetho umbingeleli, enye intaka empahleni yomdongwe ixhelelwe phezu kwamanzi aphilileyo;
3_14_6_ayithabathe intaka ephilileyo, nomsedare, noboya obubomvu,  nehisope, azithi nkxu, ndawonye nentaka ephilileyo, egazini lentaka exhelelwe phezu kwamanzi aphilileyo;
3_14_7_amfefe lowo uza kuhlanjululwa eqhenqeni lakhe izihlandlo zibe sixhenxe, athi uhlambulukile, ayindulule intaka ephilileyo iye ezindle.
3_14_8_Lowo uzihlambululayo wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, achebe zonke iinwele zakhe, ahlambe emanzini, ahlambuluke ke. Emveni koko wongena eminqubeni, ahlale ngaphandle kwentente yakhe imihla esixhenxe;
3_14_9_kuthi ngomhla wesixhenxe, achebe zonke iinwele zakhe entloko, nasesilevini sakhe, nasemashiyini akhe, azichebe zonke iinwele zakhe, azihlambe iingubo zakhe, ahlambe umzimba wakhe emanzini, ahlambuluke ke.
3_14_10_Ngomhla wesibhozo wothabatha iimvana ezimbini ezigqibeleleyo, nemvanazana emnyaka mnye egqibeleleyo ibe nye,  nezahlulo ezithathu zesishumi zomgubo ocoliweyo, ube ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli, neloge yeoli ibe nye;
3_14_11_umbingeleli ohlambululayo ayimise indoda ezihlambululayo,  nezo zinto, phambi koYehova emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
3_14_12_Woyithabatha umbingeleli enye imvana, ayisondeze ibe lidini letyala, neloge yeoli, azitshangatshangise zibe ngumtshangatshangiso ezo nto phambi koYehova;
3_14_13_ayixhelele imvana apho kuxhelelwa khona idini lesono nedini elinyukayo, endaweni engcwele; kuba, njengokuba lilelombingeleli idini lesono, likwanjalo idini letyala:  liyingcwele kangcwele.
3_14_14_Wocaphula umbingeleli egazini ledini letyala, adyobhe umbingeleli esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene yalowo uzihlambululayo, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene,  nakubhontsi wonyawo lwakhe lwasekunene.
3_14_15_Aze acaphule umbingeleli elogeni yeoli, ayigalele esandleni sombingeleli sasekhohlo;
3_14_16_awuthi nkxu umbingeleli umnwe wakhe wasekunene eolini esesandleni sakhe sasekhohlo, afefe inxalenye yeoli ngomnwe wakhe izihlandlo ezisixhenxe phambi koYehova.
3_14_17_Inxalenye yeoli ese leyo esesandleni sakhe, umbingeleli woyidyobha esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene yalowo uzihlambululayo, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sasekunene,  nakubhontsi wonyawo lwakhe lwasekunene, phezu kwegazi ledini letyala.
3_14_18_Eseleyo ioli esesandleni sombingeleli aze ayigalele entloko kulowo uzihlambululayo, umbingeleli amcamagushele ke phambi koYehova.
3_14_19_Umbingeleli wolenza idini lesono, amcamagushele lowo uzihlambululayo ngenxa yobunqambi bakhe; emveni koko alixhele idini elinyukayo,
3_14_20_alinyuse umbingeleli idini elinyukayo, nomnikelo wokudla,  esibingelelweni, umbingeleli amcamagushele. Wohlambuluka ke.
3_14_21_Ukuba uthe waba sisweli, nesandla sakhe asaba nakukufumana oko, wothabatha imvana ibe nye, ibe lidini letyala lokutshangatshangisa, amcamagushele, nesahlulo seshumi somgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli, sibe sinye, ube ngumnikelo wokudla,  neloge yeoli;
3_14_22_namahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo amabini evukuthu,  esinokuwafumana isandla sakhe, elinye libe lidini lesono,  elinye libe lidini elinyukayo.
3_14_23_Maze awazise ngomhla wesibhozo kumbingeleli, ukuba ahlanjululwe emnyango wentente yokuhlangana phambi koYehova.
3_14_24_Umbingeleli woyithabatha imvana elidini letyala, neloge yeoli, ezo nto umbingeleli azitshangatshangise zibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova;
3_14_25_ayixhele imvana yedini letyala; acaphule umbingeleli egazini ledini letyala, alidyobhe esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene yalowo uzihlambululayo, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sasekunene, nakubhontsi wonyawo lwakhe lwasekunene.
3_14_26_Inxalenye yeoli woyigalela umbingeleli esandleni sombinge leli sasekhohlo,
3_14_27_umbingeleli afefe ngomnwe wakhe wasekunene inxalenye yeoli esesandleni sakhe sasekhohlo, izihlandlo zibe sixhenxe phambi koYehova;
3_14_28_umbingeleli adyobhe inxalenye yeoli esesandleni sakhe esithinzini sendlebe yasekunene yalowo uzihlambululayo,  nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sasekunene, nakubhontsi wonyawo lwakhe lwasekunene, phezu kwendawo enegazi ledini letyala.
3_14_29_Eseleyo ioli esesandleni sombingeleli woyigalela entloko kulowo uzihlambululayo, amcamagushele phambi koYehova.
3_14_30_Wolinikela elinye ihobe, nokuba lelinye igobo levukuthu,  esinokulifumana isandla sakhe,
3_14_31_oko sinokukufumana isandla sakhe; elinye libe lidini lesono, elinye libe lidini elinyukayo, ndawonye nomnikelo wokudla, umbingeleli amcamagushele lowo uzihlambululayo phambi koYehova.
3_14_32_Nguwo lowo umyalelo walowo sikhoyo kuye isibetho seqhenqa,  osandla singabanga nakufumana nto angahlanjululwa ngayo.
3_14_33_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
3_14_34_Xa nithe nafika ezweni lakwaKanan, endininika lona ukuba libe lelenu, ndasibeka isibetho seqhenqa endlwini yelizwe elo lilelenu,
3_14_35_makeze umninindlu amxelele umbingeleli, esithi, Kubonakala kum ngathi kukho isibetho endlwini.
3_14_36_Wowisa umthetho umbingeleli, ukuba bayikhuphe impahla endlwini, engekangeni umbingeleli ukuba asikhangele isibetho,  ukuze ingabi yinqambi yonke into esendlwini; emveni koko wongena umbingeleli ukuba ayikhangele indlu.
3_14_37_Akusikhangela isibetho, O! isibetho sisezindongeni zendlu,  sizizifanya ezibuhlazarha, nokuba zifuna ukuba ngqombela,  ukubonakala kwazo zithe gangqa eludongeni:
3_14_38_wophuma umbingeleli endlwini, aye emnyango wendlu, ayivale indlu imihla esixhenxe.
3_14_39_Wobuya umbingeleli ngomhla wesixhenxe akhangele, O!  siqhenqethile isibetho ezindongeni zendlu;
3_14_40_aze awise umthetho umbingeleli, ukuba arholwe amatye esikuwo isibetho eso, aphoswe ngaphandle komzi endaweni eyinqambi;
3_14_41_ayiphale indlu ngaphakathi ngeenxa zonke, bawuphose umhlaba abawuphalileyo ngaphandle komzi endaweni eyinqambi;
3_14_42_bathabathe matye wambi, bawafake endaweni yaloo matye,  kuthatyathwe olunye udaka, ityatyekwe indlu.
3_14_43_Ukuba sithe sabuya isibetho sathi qwele endlwini, emveni kokurholwa kwamatye, nasemveni kokuphalwa kwendlu, nasemveni kokutyatyekwa kwayo,
3_14_44_wongena umbingeleli, akhangele, O! siqhenqethile isibetho endlwini: liqhenqa elimandundu endlwini, iyinqambi ke.
3_14_45_Yodilizwa indlu namatye ayo, nemithi yayo, nodaka lonke lwendlu, zikhutshelwe ngaphandle komzi ezo zinto, ziye kulahlelwa endaweni eyinqambi.
3_14_46_Lowo ungenayo endlwini, yonke imihla yokuvalwa kwayo, woba yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_14_47_Lowo ulele kuloo ndlu, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe; nalowo udlele kuloo ndlu, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe.
3_14_48_Ukuba umbingeleli uthe wangena, wakhangela, O! isibetho asiqhenqethanga endlwini emveni kokutyatyekwa kwendlu,  umbingeleli wothi ihlambulukile indlu, ngokuba isibetho siphilisiwe.
3_14_49_Wothabatha into yokuhlambulula indlu: iintaka zibe mbini,  nomsedare, noboya obubomvu, nehisope.
3_14_50_Maze ayixhelele enye intaka empahleni yomdongwe phezu kwamanzi aphilileyo; awuthabathe umsedare, nehisope, noboya obubomvu, nentaka ephilileyo, azithi nkxu egazini lentaka exheliweyo, nasemanzini aphilileyo,
3_14_51_ayifefe indlu izihlandlo zibe sixhenxe;
3_14_52_ayihlambulule indlu ngegazi lentaka leyo, nangamanzi aphilileyo, nangentaka ephilileyo, nangomsedare, nangehisope,  nangoboya obubomvu.
3_14_53_Woyindulula intaka ephilileyo iye ngaphandle komzi, iye ezindle, ayicamagushele indlu; yohlambuluka ke.
3_14_54_Nguwo lowo umyalelo osingisele kuzo zonke izibetho zeqhenqa nakuko ukudlathuka kweenwele,
3_14_55_nakulo iqhenqa lengubo, nelendlu,
3_14_56_nakuko ukufukuka, nakuyo injaduko, nakulo itshatshazi,
3_14_57_aboyalwa ngawo ngemini yento eyinqambi, nangemini yento ehlambulukileyo. Nguwo lowo umyalelo weqhenqa.
3_15_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
3_15_2_Thethani koonyana bakaSirayeli, nithi kubo, Indoda ngendoda, xa ithe yanobhobhozo oluphuma enyameni yayo,  iyinqambi ngobhobhozo lwayo olo.
3_15_3_Boba bobu ubunqambi bayo ekubhobhozeni kwayo; nokuba inyama yayo iyachiza ukubhobhoza kwayo, nokuba inyama iyakuvingca ukubhobhoza kwayo, bubunqambi bayo obo.
3_15_4_Sonke isilili alala kuso lowo ubhobhozayo soba yinqambi,  nempahla yonke ahlala kuyo yoba yinqambi.
3_15_5_Indoda esukuba isichukumisa isilili salowo, yozihlamba iingubo zayo, ihlambe emanzini, ibe yinqambi, ihlwise.
3_15_6_Lowo uhlala phezu kwempahla abehleli kuyo obhobhozayo,  wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, ahlambe emanzini, abe yinqambi,  ahlwise.
3_15_7_Lowo uwuchukumisayo umzimba wobhobhozayo, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, ahlambe emanzini, abe yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_15_8_Xa athe obhobhozayo wamtshicela ohlambulukileyo, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, ahlambe emanzini, abe yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_15_9_Zonke iinqwelo asukuba ekhwela kuzo obhobhozayo zoba ziinqambi.
3_15_10_Bonke abo bachukumisa nantoni ibiphantsi kwakhe, boba ziinqambi, bahlwise; lowo uyithwalayo, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, ahlambe emanzini, abe yinqambi, ahlwise.
3_15_11_Bonke abasukuba bemchukumisa obhobhozayo, bangazigaleli amanzi izandla zabo, bozihlamba iingubo zabo, bahlambe emanzini, babe ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_15_12_Impahla yomdongwe abeyichukumisile obhobhozayo yoqhekezwa;  yonke impahla yomthi yoxukuxwa ngamanzi.
3_15_13_Xa athe wahlambuluka obhobhozayo ekubhobhozeni kwakhe,  wozibalela imihla esixhenxe yokuhlanjululwa kwakhe, azihlambe iingubo zakhe, awuhlambe umzimba wakhe emanzini aphilileyo;  wohlambuluka ke.
3_15_14_Ngomhla wesibhozo wozithabathela amahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo amabini evukuthu, eze phambi koYehova emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, awanike umbingeleli;
3_15_15_awanikele umbingeleli, elinye libe lidini lesono, elinye libe lidini elinyukayo; umbingeleli amcamagushele phambi koYehova ngenxa yokubhobhoza kwakhe.
3_15_16_Indoda xa ithe yancola, yowuhlamba wonke umzimba wayo emanzini, ibe yinqambi, ihlwise.
3_15_17_Neengubo zonke, nezikhumba zonke ezinoncolo, zohlanjwa ngamanzi, zibe ziinqambi, zihlwise.
3_15_18_Ke umfazi ethe indoda yamlala, bohlamba ngamanzi, babe ziinqambi bahlwise bobabini.
3_15_19_Umfazi xa athe wampompoza, kwaba ligazi ukumpompoza kwakhe enyameni yakhe, woba sekungcoleni kwakhe imihla esixhenxe;  bonke abo bamchukumisayo boba ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_15_20_Yonke into asukuba elala phezu kwayo ekungcoleni kwakhe,  yoba yinqambi; nento yonke asukuba ehlala phezu kwayo, yoba yinqambi.
3_15_21_Bonke abo bachukumisa isilili sakhe bozihlamba iingubo zabo, bahlambe emanzini, babe ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_15_22_Bonke abo bachukumisa nantoni yempahla ahlala phezu kwayo,  bozihlamba iingubo zabo, bahlambe emanzini, babe ziinqambi,  bahlwise.
3_15_23_Nokuba lisesililini, nokuba lisempahleni ahlala kuyo,  ekulichukumiseni kwabo boba ziinqambi, bahlwise.
3_15_24_Ukuba indoda ithe yalala naye, kwafikelela kuyo ukungcola kwakhe, yoba yinqambi imihla esixhenxe, nesilili sonke elele kuso soba yinqambi.
3_15_25_Umfazi xa athe wampompoza ukumpompoza kwegazi lakhe imihla emininzi, ingelilo ixesha lokungcola kwakhe, naxa lithe lampompoza ngaphezu kwelokungcola kwakhe: yonke imihla yokumpompoza kobunqambi bakhe yoba njengemihla yokungcola kwakhe, abe yinqambi yena.
3_15_26_Zonke izilili athe walala kuzo, yonke imihla yokumpompoza kwakhe, zoba njengesilili sokungcola kwakhe kuye; zonke iimpahla athe wahlala kuzo, zoba ziinqambi njengobunqambi bokungcola kwakhe.
3_15_27_Bonke abo bazichukumisayo ezo nto, boba ziinqambi;  bazihlambe iingubo zabo, bahlambe emanzini, babe ziinqambi,  bahlwise.
3_15_28_Ukuba uthe wahlambuluka ekumpompozeni kwakhe, wozibalela imihla esixhenxe emveni koko, ahlambuluke ke;
3_15_29_ngomhla wesibhozo azithabathele amahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo amabini evukuthu, awazise kumbingeleli emnyango wentente yokuhlangana,
3_15_30_awanikele umbingeleli, elinye libe lidini lesono, elinye libe lidini elinyukayo. Umbingeleli womcamagushela phambi koYehova ngenxa yokumpompoza kobunqambi bakhe.
3_15_31_Nize nibakhwelelise ke oonyana bakaSirayeli ebunqambini babo; bangafeli ebunqambini babo, ngokuwenza inqambi umnquba wam ophakathi kwabo.
3_15_32_Nguwo lowo umyalelo walowo ubhobhozayo, nowoncolayo waba yinqambi ngaloo nto;
3_15_33_nowalowo unomzi wokungcola kwakhe, nowalowo umpompoza ukumpompoza kwakhe, nokuba yindoda, nokuba ngumfazi, nokuba yindoda elele nomfazi oyinqambi.
3_16_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses emveni kokufa koonyana ababini baka-Aron, ekusondeleni kwabo phambi koYehova, baza bafa.
3_16_2_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Thetha kuAron umkhuluwa wakho,  angangeni ngamaxesha onke engcweleni ngaphaya komkhusane,  phambi kwesihlalo sokucamagusha esiphezu kwetyeya, ukuze angafi; kuba ndiya kubonakala efini phezu kwesihlalo sokucamagusha.
3_16_3_Wongena uAron engcweleni enezi zinto: enenkunzi entsha,  elithole lenkomo, ibe lidini lesono; nenkunzi yemvu, ibe lidini elinyukayo.
3_16_4_Uya kwambatha ingubo engcwele yangaphantsi yelinen emhlophe, ibekho nebhulukhwe yelinen emhlophe emzimbeni wakhe,  abhinqiswe ngombhinqo welinen emhlophe, ajikele unkontsho lwelinen emhlophe: ziingubo ezingcwele ezo. Wowuhlamba umzimba wakhe emanzini, azinxibe ke.
3_16_5_Wothabatha ebandleni loonyana bakaSirayeli iinkunzi zeebhokhwe ezixhonti zibe mbini, zibe lidini lesono, nenkunzi yemvu enye ibe lidini elinyukayo.
3_16_6_Woyisondeza uAron inkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono elilelakhe, azicamagushele okwakhe nokwendlu yakhe.
3_16_7_Wozithabatha iinkunzi zeebhokhwe zombini, azimise phambi koYehova, emnyango wentente yokuhlangana;
3_16_8_enze amaqashiso uAron phezu kweenkunzi zeebhokhwe zombini:  elinye iqashiso libe lelikaYehova, elinye iqashiso libe lelika-Azazele.
3_16_9_Maze ayisondeze uAron inkunzi yebhokhwe eliphume nayo iqashiso likaYehova, ayenze idini lesono;
3_16_10_ke yona inkunzi yebhokhwe eliphume nayo iqashiso lika-Azazele, makayimise iphilile phambi koYehova,  ayicamagushele, ayithumele kuAzazele entlango.
3_16_11_Makayisondeze uAron inkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono elilelakhe, azicamagushele okwakhe nokwendlu yakhe, ayixhele inkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono elilelakhe.
3_16_12_Makathabathe ugcedevu luzele ngamahlahle omlilo esibingelelweni, esisebusweni bukaYehova, azalise izandla zakhe ngesiqhumiso esimnandi esicolekileyo, asingenise ngaphaya komkhusane;
3_16_13_asibeke isiqhumiso phezu komlilo phambi koYehova, ukuze ilifu lesiqhumiso lisisibekele isihlalo sokucamagusha esiphezu kwesingqino, ukuze angafi.
3_16_14_Wocaphula egazini lenkunzi entsha yenkomo, alifefe ngomnwe wakhe esihlalweni sokucamagusha ngasempumalanga, nangaphambili kwesihlalo sokucamagusha, afefe ngenxalenye yegazi izihlandlo ezisixhenxe ngomnwe wakhe.
3_16_15_Woyixhela inkunzi yebhokhwe yedini lesono eyeyabantu,  alise igazi layo ngaphaya komkhusane, alenze igazi layo njengoko walenzayo igazi lenkunzi entsha yenkomo, alifefe esihlalweni sokucamagusha nangaphambili kwesihlalo sokucamagusha;
3_16_16_ayicamagushele ingcwele ngenxa yobunqambi boonyana bakaSirayeli, nangenxa yezikreqo zabo ngokubhekisele ezonweni zabo zonke; enjenjalo kwintente yokuhlangana ehleliyo nabo phakathi kobunqambi babo.
3_16_17_Makungabikho mntu ententeni yokuhlangana, ekungeneni kwakhe ukuya kucamagusha engcweleni, kude kube sekuphumeni kwakhe. Makazicamagushele okwakhe, nokwendlu yakhe,  nokwesikhungu sonke samaSirayeli.
3_16_18_Wophuma aye esibingelelweni esiphambi koYehova,  asicamagushele, acaphule egazini lenkunzi entsha yenkomo,  nasegazini lenkunzi yebhokhwe, alidyobhe ajikelezise ezimpondweni zesibingelelo;
3_16_19_asifefe ngenxalenye yegazi ngomnwe wakhe izihlandlo ezisixhenxe, asihlambulule, asingcwalise, ebunqambini boonyana bakaSirayeli;
3_16_20_agqibe ukuyicamagushela ingcwele nentente yokuhlangana,  nesibingelelo. Woyisondeza inkunzi yebhokhwe ephilileyo,
3_16_21_acinezele uAron ngezandla zakhe zozibini entlokweni yenkunzi yebhokhwe ephilileyo, abuvume phezu kwayo bonke ubugwenxa boonyana bakaSirayeli, nezikreqo zabo zonke ngokubhekisele ezonweni zabo zonke, azibeke ke phezu kwentloko yenkunzi leyo yebhokhwe, ayithumele entlango ngendoda ezilungisele oko.
3_16_22_Inkunzi leyo yebhokhwe yobuthwala ke phezu kwayo bonke ubugwenxa babo, iye ezweni eliqhiwukileyo; ayikhulule inkunzi yebhokhwe leyo entlango apho.
3_16_23_UAron wongena ententeni yokuhlangana, azihlube iingubo zelinen emhlophe, abezambethe ukungena kwakhe engcweleni,  azishiye khona;
3_16_24_awuhlambe umzimba wakhe ngamanzi endaweni engcwele, anxibe iingubo zakhe, aphume, enze idini lakhe elinyukayo, nedini elinyukayo labantu, azicamagushele okwakhe nokwabantu;
3_16_25_aqhumisele ngenqatha ledini lesono esibingelelweni.
3_16_26_Lowa wayikhululela kuAzazele inkunzi yebhokhwe, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, awuhlambe umzimba wakhe emanzini, emveni koko angene eminqubeni.
3_16_27_Ke yona inkunzi entsha yenkomo yedini lesono, nenkunzi yebhokhwe yedini lesono, ezigazi langeniswa ukuba licamagushe engcweleni, zokhutshelwa ngaphandle kweminquba, zitshiswe ngomlilo izikhumba zazo, nenyama yazo, nomswane wazo.
3_16_28_Lowo uzitshisayo wozihlamba iingubo zakhe, awuhlambe umzimba wakhe emanzini, emveni koko angene eminqubeni.
3_16_29_Koba ngummiselo ongunaphakade kuni, ukuthi: Ngenyanga yesixhenxe, ngolweshumi enyangeni leyo, niyithobe imiphefumlo yenu, ningenzi namnye umsebenzi, nokuba ngozalelwe ekhaya,  nokuba ngumphambukeli ophambukele kuni,
3_16_30_kuba ngaloo mhla uya kunicamagushela, ukuba anihlambulule,  nihlambuluke ezonweni zenu zonke phambi koYehova.
3_16_31_Yisabatha kasabatha kuni; noyithoba imiphefumlo yenu:  ngummiselo ke ongunaphakade.
3_16_32_Wocamagusha ke umbingeleli, lowo uya kuthanjiswa, amiselwe ukuba abe ngumbingeleli esikhundleni sikayise; azinxibe iingubo zelinen emhlophe, iingubo ezingcwele;
3_16_33_ayicamagushele ingcwele kangcwele, nentente yokuhlangana,  asicamagushele isibingelelo, abacamagushele ababingeleli,  nabantu bonke besikhungu.
3_16_34_Lowo woba ngummiselo ongunaphakade kuni wokubacamagushela oonyana bakaSirayeli ngenxa yezono zabo zonke, kube kanye ngomnyaka. Wenza ke njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_17_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_17_2_Thetha kuAron nakoonyana bakhe, nokoonyana bonke bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Lilo eli ilizwi uYehova awise umthetho ngalo, lokuthi:
3_17_3_Umntu ngomntu wendlu kaSirayeli osukuba exhela inkomo,  nemvu, nebhokhwe, eminqubeni, nosukuba eyixhelela ngaphandle kweminquba,
3_17_4_angayizisi emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, ukuba isondezwe ibe ngumsondezo kuYehova phambi komnquba kaYehova: igazi lobalelwa kuloo mntu; aphalaze igazi; wonqanyulwa loo mntu,  angabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowabo;
3_17_5_ukuze oonyana bakaSirayeli bayizise imibingelelo yabo abayibingelelayo ezindle, bayizise kuYehova emnyango wentente yokuhlangana kumbingeleli, bayibingelele ibe yimibingelelo yoxolo kuYehova.
3_17_6_Umbigeleli wolitshiza igazi layo esibingelelweni sikaYehova, emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, aqhumisele ngenqatha, libe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
3_17_7_Mabangabi sayibingelela imibingelelo yabo kwizithixo ezimaxhonti, abahenyuza ngokuzilandela. Lowo woba ngummiselo ongunaphakade kubo ezizukulwaneni zabo.
3_17_8_Wothi kubo, Umntu ngomntu wendlu kaSirayeli,  nowakubaphambukeli abaphambukele phakathi kwenu, osukuba enyusa idini elinyukayo, nokuba ngumbingelelo,
3_17_9_angalizisi emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, ukuba alinikele kuYehova: wonqanyulwa loo mntu, angabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowabo.
3_17_10_Umntu ngomntu wendlu kaSirayeli, nowakubaphambukeli abaphambukele phakathi kwenu, osukuba esidla yonke into eligazi: ndowuchasa umphefumlo odle igazi, ndiwunqamle,  ungabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowawo.
3_17_11_Kuba umphefumlo wenyama usegazini wona. Mna ndaninika lona esibingelelweni, ukuba kucanyagushelwe imiphefumlo yenu; kuba igazi eli licamagusha ngomphefumlo.
3_17_12_Ngenxa yoko ndithe koonyana bakaSirayeli, Makungabikho namnye umphefumlo kuni odla igazi; nomphambukeli ophambukele phakathi kwenu makangalidli igazi.
3_17_13_Umntu ngomntu koonyana bakaSirayeli, nomphambukeli ophambukele phakathi kwenu, osukuba ezingela inyamakazi, nokuba yintaka edliwayo, woliphalaza igazi layo, aliselele ngomhlaba.
3_17_14_Kuba umphefumlo wenyama yonke, igazi layo eli ngumphefumlo wayo. Ndathi ke koonyana bakaSirayeli, Ize ningadli gazi lanyama nokuba yiyiphi; ngokuba umphefumlo wenyama yonke ligazilayo. Bonke abalidlayo bonqanyulwa.
3_17_15_Wonke ubani osukuba esidla into ezifeleyo, neqwengiweyo,  engozalelwe ekhaya nomphambukeli, wozihlamba iingubo zakhe,  ahlambe emanzini, abe yinqambi, ahlwise; wohlambuluka ke.
3_17_16_Ukuba akathanga azihlambe, akawuhlamba umzimba wakhe,  wobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe.
3_18_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_18_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, NdinguYehova,  uThixo wenu.
3_18_3_Ize ningenzi ngokokwenza kwelizwe laseYiputa, enibe nihleli kulo; ize ningenzi ngokokwenza kwelizwe lakwaKanan, endinisa kulo, ningahambi ngokwemimiselo yabo.
3_18_4_Ze nenze amasiko am, nigcine imimiselo yam, nihambe ngayo.  NdinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_18_5_Nogcina imimiselo yam, namasiko am awothi umntu ozenzayo ezo nto aphile ngazo: ndinguYehova.
3_18_6_Umntu ngomntu aze angasondeli nakwinye inyama yenyama yakhe, ukuba atyhile ubuze bayo: ndinguYehova.
3_18_7_Ubuze bukayihlo, ubuze bonyoko, uze ungabutyhili: ngunyoko lowo; uze ungabutyhili ubuze bakhe.
3_18_8_Ubuze bomkayihlo uze ungabutyhili: bubuze bukayihlo obo.
3_18_9_Ubuze bodade wenu, intombi kayihlo, nokuba yintombi kanyoko, izalelwe ekhaya, nokuba izalelwe emzini, uze ungabutyhili ubuze bayo.
3_18_10_Ubuze bentombi yonyana wakho, nobentombi yentombi yakho,  uze ungabutyhili ubuze bayo; ngokuba ibubuze bakho.
3_18_11_Ubuze bentombi yomkayihlo ezalwa nguyihlo, ingudade wenu,  uze ungabutyhili ubuze bayo.
3_18_12_Ubuze bodade boyihlo uze ungabutyhili: yinyama yoyihlo leyo.
3_18_13_Ubuze bonyokokazi uze ungabutyhili: kuba yinyama yonyoko leyo.
3_18_14_Ubuze boyihlokazi uze ungabutyhili, ungasondeli kumkakhe:  ngunyokokazi lowo.
3_18_15_Ubuze bomolokazana wakho uze ungabutyhili: ngumka nyana wakho lowo; uze ungabutyhili ubuze bakhe.
3_18_16_Ubuze bomfazi womntakayihlo uze ungabutyhili: bubuze bomntakayihlo obo.
3_18_17_Ubuze bomfazi nentombi yakhe uze ungabutyhili; intombi yonyana wakhe, nentombi yentombi yakhe, uze ungayizeki, ukuba ubutyhile ubuze bayo: yinyama yakhe leyo; ngamanyala lawo.
3_18_18_Umfazi uze ungamzekeli phezu kodade wabo, ukuba ubandezele, ukuba ubutyhile ubuze bakhe phezu kwakhe, ekudleni kwakhe ubomi.
3_18_19_Uze ungasondeli emfazini, esekungcoleni kobunqambi bakhe,  ukuba ubutyhile ubuze bakhe.
3_18_20_Uze ungamlali umfazi wommelwane, ukuba uzenze inqambi ngaye.
3_18_21_Embewini yakho uze unganikeli na mnye, ukuba acandiselwe uMoleki; ungalihlambeli igama loThixo wakho; ndinguYehova.
3_18_22_Uze ungayilali into eyindoda njengokuba kulalwa umfazi:  ngamasikizi lawo.
3_18_23_Uze ungalali nanye into ezitho zine, ukuba uzenze inqambi ngayo; inkazana mayingazimisi phambi kwento ezitho zine, ukuze izekwe yiyo: kukuzingcolisa oko.
3_18_24_Musani ukuzenza iinqambi ngezo nto zonke; kuba zenziwa iinqambi ngezo nto zonke iintlanga endizigxothayo ebusweni benu.
3_18_25_Lenziwe inqambi nelizwe elo; ndiyabuvelela ubugwenxa babo phezu kwabo, nelizwe liyabahlanza abemi balo.
3_18_26_Ize niyigcine imimiselo yam namasiko am nina, ningenzi nalinye kuloo masikizi, kwaozalelwe ekhaya, nomphambukeli ophambukele phakathi kwenu.
3_18_27_Kuba onke loo masikizi bawenzile abantu belo zwe abaphambi kwenu, lenziwa inqambi ilizwe;
3_18_28_ukuze linganihlanzi ilizwe ngokulenza kwenu inqambi,  njengoko liluhlanzileyo uhlanga oluphambi kwenu.
3_18_29_Ngokuba bonke abasukuba besenza nalinye kuloo masikizi,  imiphefumlo elenzayo yonqanyulwa, ingabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowayo.
3_18_30_Ngoko ke ize nisigcine isigxina sam, ningenzi namnye ummiselo olisikizi owenziwa phambi kwenu, ningazenzi iinqambi ngawo: ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_19_2_Thetha kwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo,  Yibani ngcwele; kuba ndiyiNgcwele mna, Yehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_3_Yoyikani elowo unina noyise; nizigcine iisabatha zam:  ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_4_Musani ukubheka kwiinto ezingeni; ningazenzeli izithixo ezityhidiweyo: ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_5_Xa nibingelela kuYehova umbingelelo woxolo, nobingelela ukuze unikholekise.
3_19_6_Wodliwa ngomhla wokubingelela kwenu nangengomso; okuseleyo kwada kwangumhla wesithathu kotshiswa ngomlilo.
3_19_7_Ukuba kuthe kwadliwa nokudliwa ngomhla wesithathu,  kuyimbozisa; akuyi kukholekisa.
3_19_8_Ke okudlayo, wobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe; ngokuba eyihlambele ingcwele kaYehova; loo mphefumlo wonqanyulwa,  ungabikho ebantwini bakowawo.
3_19_9_Ekuvuneni kwenu isivuno selizwe lenu, uze ungawavuni ugqibelele amacala entsimi yakho, ungabhikici lubhikico lokuvuna kwakho.
3_19_10_Uze ungasicholi isidiliya sakho; nento evuthulukileyo yomdiliya wakho uze ungayibhikici; woyishiyela olusizana nomphambukeli: ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_11_Ize ningebi; ize ningakhanyeli into niyazi; ize ningaxokisani.
3_19_12_Ize ningalifungi igama lam nixoka; ungalihlambeli igama loThixo wakho: ndinguYehova.
3_19_13_Uze ungamcudisi ummelwane wakho, uze ungaxhakamfuli;  umvuzo womqeshwa uze ungalali kuwe kude kuse.
3_19_14_Uze ungasitshabhisi isithulu; uze ungabeki sikhubekiso phambi kwemfama; uze umoyike uThixo wakho: ndinguYehova.
3_19_15_Ze ningenzi bugqwetha ekugwebeni; unganoneleli nomntu osweleyo, ungabeki buso basikhulu; womgweba ngobulungisa ummelwane wakho.
3_19_16_Uze ungahambi uyintlebi phakathi kwabantu bakowenu; uze ungalizondi igazi lommelwane wakho: ndinguYehova.
3_19_17_Uze ungamthiyi umzalwana wakho entliziyweni yakho; kanye womohlwaya ummelwane wakho, ungazithwalisi sono ngenxa yakhe.
3_19_18_Uze ungaphindezeli; uze ungabi nanqala koonyana babantu bakowenu; uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako;  ndinguYehova.
3_19_19_Ize niyigcine imimiselo yam. Iinkomo zakho uze ungazizekisi kwiintlobo ezimbini; uze ungayihlwayeli intsimi yakho iintlobo ezimbini zembewu; nengubo yeentlobo ezimbini engumxube ize ingezi phezu kwakho.
3_19_20_Xa indoda ithe yayilala inkazana, ilikhobokazana eliganelwe indoda, lingakhululwanga ngokuhlawulelwa,  lingaphiwanga nenkululeko: bobethwa; bangabulawa, ngokuba belingakhululekile.
3_19_21_Yolizisa idini letyala layo kuYehova emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, inkunzi yemvu, ibe lidini letyala;
3_19_22_ayicamagushele umbingeleli ngenkunzi leyo yemvu yedini letyala phambi koYehova ngenxa yesono sayo, eyone ngaso.  Yosixolelwa ke isono sayo, eyone ngaso.
3_19_23_Xa nifikileyo ezweni elo, natyala yonke imithi edliwayo,  nothi iziqhamo zayo zikukungaluki; zoba zezingalukanga kuni iminyaka emithathu, ize zingadliwa.
3_19_24_Ngowesine umnyaka, zonke iziqhamo zayo zoba ngumnikelo ongcwele wendumiso kuYehova.
3_19_25_Ngomnyaka wesihlanu nozidla iziqhamo zayo, ukuze zinongezele ungeniselo lwayo: ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_26_Ize ningadli nto inegazi. Ize ningahlabi sihlabo; ize ningabi ngamatola.
3_19_27_Ze ningazichebi nizizungeleze iintlontlo zentloko yenu;  ungaloni udini lweendevu zakho.
3_19_28_Ize ningazicenti inyama yenu ngenxa yomfi, ningenzi mbhalo wamvambo kuni: ndinguYehova.
3_19_29_Musa ukuyihlambela intombi yakho, uyenze ihenyu, ukuze ilizwe lingahenyuzi, lingazali ilizwe ngamanyala.
3_19_30_Gcinani iisabatha zam, niyoyike ingcwele yam:  ndinguYehova.
3_19_31_Musani ukubheka kwabanemishologu; musani ukubafuna oosiyazi, ukuze nenziwe inqambi ngabo: ndinguYehova uThixo wenu.
3_19_32_Suka ume ebusweni bengwevu, ububeke ubuso bexhego, umoyike uThixo wakho: ndinguYehova.
3_19_33_Xa umphambukeli aphambukela kuni ezweni lenu, ize ningambandezeli.
3_19_34_Kuni woba njengozalelwe phakathi kwenu ekhaya,  umphambukeli ophambukele kuni; uze umthande ngoko uzithanda ngako; ngokuba nibe ningabaphambukeli ezweni laseYiputa:  ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_19_35_Ize ningenzi bugqwetha ekugwebeni nasekulinganiseni ubude,  nobunzima, nokuzala kwento.
3_19_36_Noba nezikali zobulungisa, namatye obulungisa, ne-efa yobulungisa, nehin yobulungisa. NdinguYehova, uThixo wenu,  onikhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa.
3_19_37_Ize niyigcine imimiselo yam yonke, namasiko am onke,  niwenze: ndinguYehova.
3_20_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_20_2_Yithi koonyana bakaSirayeli: Umntu ngomntu, koonyana bakaSirayeli, nakubaphambukeli abaphambukele kwaSirayeli, othe wayinika uMoleki imbewu yakhe, wobulawa afe; abantu belizwe eli ize bamxulube ngamatye.
3_20_3_Ke mna ndiya kumchasa loo mntu, ndimnqamle, angabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowabo; ngokuba uyinike uMoleki imbewu yakhe, ukuze ayenze inqambi ingcwele yam, alihlambele igama lam elingcwele.
3_20_4_Ukuba abantu belizwe elo bathe bawafihla ukuwafihla oku amehlo abo kuloo mntu, ekuyinikeni kwakhe uMoleki imbewu yakhe,  abambulala:
3_20_5_mna ndomchasa loo mntu nemizalwane yakhe, ndimnqamle, nabo bonke abahenyuza ngokumlandela, behenyuzela ukumlandela uMoleki, bangabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowabo.
3_20_6_Loo mphefumlo uthe wabheka kwabanemishologu, nakoosiyazi,  uhenyuza ngokubalandela; ndowuchasa loo mphefumlo, ndiwunqamla,  ungabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowawo.
3_20_7_Ize nizingcwalise nibe ngcwele, ngokuba ndinguYehova,  uThixo wenu.
3_20_8_Ize niyigcine imimiselo yam niyenze: ndinguYehova oningcwalisayo.
3_20_9_Umntu ngomntu, xa athe watshabhisa uyise nonina, wobulawa afe; utshabhise uyise nonina; amagazi akhe makabe phezu kwakhe.
3_20_10_Indoda esukuba ikrexeza umkamntu, ikrexeze umfazi wommelwane wakhe, wobulawa afe umkrexezi lowo,  kwanomkrexezikazi.
3_20_11_Indoda esukuba imlala umkayise, ityhile ubuze bukayise;  mababulawe bafe bobabini, amagazi abo makabe phezu kwabo.
3_20_12_Indoda esukuba imlala umolokazana wayo, mababulawe bafe bobabini; bazingcolisile; amagazi abo makabe phezu kwabo.
3_20_13_Indoda esukuba iyilala indoda njengokuba kulalwa umfazi,  abo benze amasikizi: mababulawa bafe bobabini; amagazi abo makabe phezu kwabo.
3_20_14_Indoda esukuba izeka inkazana nonina, ngamanyala lawo;  mabatshiswe ngomlilo, kwayona nabo, kungabikho manyala phakathi kwenu.
3_20_15_Indoda esukuba ilala into ezitho zine, mayibulawe ife;  naloo nto izitho zine niyibulale.
3_20_16_Inkazana esukuba isondela entweni ezitho zine, nokuba yiyiphi na, ukuba izekwe yiyo, mayibulawe inkazana leyo; naloo nto izitho zine mayibulawe ife; amagazi azo makabe phezu kwazo.
3_20_17_Indoda esukuba izeka udade wayo, intombi kayise, nokuba yintombi kanina, yabubona ubuze bakhe, wabubona yena ubuze bayo, benze ubugqwirha; bonqanyulwa emehlweni oonyana babantu bakowabo; ityhile ubuze bodade wayo; yobuthwala ubugwenxa bayo.
3_20_18_Indoda esukuba imlala umfazi enomzi yabutyhila ubuze bakhe, yalenza laba ze ithende lakhe, naye walityhila ithende lamagazi akhe: bonqanyulwa bobabini, bangabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowabo.
3_20_19_Ubuze bonyokokazi nobodada boyihlo uza ungabutyhili,  ngokuba uyenza ibe ze inyama yakhe; bobuthwala ubugwenxa babo.
3_20_20_Indoda esukuba imlala umkayisekazi, yabutyhila ubuze boyisekazi: bosithwala isono sabo, bafe bengenamntwana.
3_20_21_Indoda esukuba izeka umfazi womntakayise, yinto engcolileyo leyo: ityhila ubuze bomntakayise; abayi kuba namntwana.
3_20_22_Ize niyigcina imimiselo yam yonke, namasiko am onke,  niwenze, ukuze linganihlanzi ilizwe elo ndinisa kulo ukuba nihlale kulo.
3_20_23_Ize ningahambi emimiselweni yohlanga olo ndilugxothayo ebusweni benu; ngokuba bazenzile zonke ezo nto, ndakruquka ngabo.
3_20_24_Ndathi ke kuni, Nina niya kulidla ilifa ilizwe labo;  ndininikila mna ukuba libe lilifa kuni, ilizwe elibaleka amasi nobusi. NdinguYehova, uThixo wenu, onahluleyo kwezinya izizwe.
3_20_25_Ize niyahlule into ezitho zine ehlambulukileyo kweyinqambi, nentaka eyinqambi kwehlambulukileyo, ningayenzi imiphefumlo yenu ibe nezothe ngento ezitho zine, nangentaka,  nangento yonka enambuzelayo emhlabeni, endinahluleyo nayo kuba iyinqambi.
3_20_26_Ize nibe ngcwele kum, ngokuba ndiyiNgcwele, mna Yehova;  ndanahlula kwezinye izizwe, ukuba nibe ngabam.
3_20_27_Indoda nenkazana xa bathe baneshologu, baba ngoosiyazi,  mababulawe bafe. Boxulutywa ngamatye, amagazi abo abe phezu kwabo.
3_21_1_Wathi uYehova kuMoses. Yitsho kubabingeleli, oonyana baka-Aron, ukuthi, Ze kungabikho uzenza inqambi ngenxa yomfi phakathi kwabantu bakowabo.
3_21_2_Kungaba ngenxa yenyama yakhe ekufuphi kuya yodwa: unina noyisa, nonyana wakhe, nentombi, yakhe, nomzalwana wakhe.
3_21_3_Nodade wabo oseyintombi, leyo ikufuphi kuya, ingenandoda,  angazenza inqambi ngenxa yayo.
3_21_4_Engumninimzi nje, makangazenzi inqambi phakathi kwabantu bakowabo, ukuba azihlambele.
3_21_5_Ize bangenzi mpandla entlokweni yabo, bangaliguyi icala leendevu zabo, bangayicenti inyama yabo.
3_21_6_Mababe ngcwela kuThixo wabo, bangalihlambeli igama loThixo wabo; kuba besondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova, ukudla koThixo wabo; mababe ngcwele.
3_21_7_Makangazeki mfazi ulihenyukazi, nohlanjelwayo; angazeki mfazi waliweyo yindoda yakhe; ngokuba ungcwele kuThixo wakhe.
3_21_8_Uze umngcwalise ke; kuba esondeza ukudla koThixo wakho;  woba ngcwele kuwe, ngokuba ndingcwele, mna Yehova uningcwalisayo.
3_21_9_Intombi yendoda engumbingeleli, xa ithe yazihlambela ngokuhenyuza, ihlambela uyise; yotshiswa ngomlilo.
3_21_10_Umbingeleli omkhulu phakathi kwabazalwana bakhe,  obegalelwe ioli yokuthambisa entloko, omiselweyo ukuze azambatha izambatho, makangaziyeki ziyakazele iinwele zakhe,  angazikrazuli lingubo zakhe;
3_21_11_angayi nakumntu ofileyo, angazenzi inqambi nangenxa kayise, nangenxa kanina.
3_21_12_Makangaphumi engcweleni, angayihlambeli ingcwele yoThixo wakhe; ngokuba ukwahlula kweoli yokuthambisa yoThixo wakhe kuphezu kwakhe: ndinguYehova.
3_21_13_Makazeke umfazi osebuntombini bakhe.
3_21_14_Umhlolokazi, nowaliweyo, nohlanjelweyo olihenyukazi, abo makangabazeki; wozeka intombi yodwa yasebantwini bakowabo, ibe ngumfazi;
3_21_15_angayihlambeli imbewu yakhe phakathi kwabantu bakowabo;  ngokuba ndinguYehova omngcwalisayo.
3_21_16_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_21_17_Thetha kuAron, uthi, Indoda phakathi kwembewu yakho ezizukulwaneni zabo, esukuba inesiphako, mayingasondeli isondeze ukudla koThixo wayo.
3_21_18_Ze kungasondeli nanye indoda, xa sukuba inesiphako: indoda eyimfama, nesiqhwala, nelinyaziweyo ebusweni, nesilima,
3_21_19_nendoda eyaphuke unyawo, neyaphuke isandla;
3_21_20_nenofundo, nengcungcuthekileyo, nenomlanga, nenokhwekhwe,  nenesitshanguba, netyumke isende.
3_21_21_Ze kungasondeli nanye indoda enesiphako, yembewu ka-Aron umbingeleli, isondeze ukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova;  inesiphako; mayingasondeli, isondeze ukudla koThixo wayo.
3_21_22_Ingakudla ukudla koThixo wayo kwezinto eziziingcwala kangcwele, kwanazingcwela.
3_21_23_Kodwa mayingezi emkhusaneni, ingasondeli nasesibingelelweni, ngokuba inesiphako; ukuze ingayihlambeli ingcwela yam; ngokuba ndinguYehova obangcwalisayo.
3_21_24_Wakuthetha ke oko uMoses kuAron noonyana bakhe, noonyana bonke bakaSirayeli.
3_22_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_22_2_Thetha kuAron nakoonyana bakhe, bazahlule ezintweni ezingcwele zoonyana bakaSirayeli, bangalihlambeli igama lam elingcwele ezintweni abazingcwalisayo kum: ndinguYehova.
3_22_3_Yithi kubo, Ezizukulwaneni zenu, bonke abantu abangabembewu yenu, abasukuba besondela ezintweni ezingcwale,  abazingcwalisayo oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova, benobunqambi babo, loo miphefumlo yonqanyulwa, ingabikho ebusweni bam:  ndinguYehova.
3_22_4_Umntu ngomntu ongowembewu ka-Aron, oneqhenqa, nobhobhozayo,  makangazidli izinto ezingcwele, ade ahlambuluke. Nalowo umchukumisayo wonke ubani oyinqambi ngofileyo, nendoda esukuba incola;
3_22_5_nomntu osukuba echukumisa yonke into enyakazelayo,  eyinqambi kuya, nokuba ngumntu oyinqambi kuye ebunqambini bakhe bonke:
3_22_6_umphefumlo osukuba uyichukumisa into enjalo, woba yinqambi,  uhlwise; lowo makangadli ezintweni ezingcwele. Ke makawuhlambe umzimba wakhe emanzini;
3_22_7_lakutshona ilanga, wothi ehlambulukile adle emveni koko ezintweni ezingcwele; ngokuba kukudla kwakhe.
3_22_8_Into ezifeleyo neqwengiweyo makangayidli, azenze inqambi ngayo: ndinguYehova.
3_22_9_Ize basigcine isigxina sam, bangazithwalisi isono, bafe ngaso, ngokuba besihlambele sona: ndinguYehova obangcwalisayo.
3_22_10_Wonke ongengowakuni aze angadli nto ingcwele; olundwendwe lombingeleli, nomqeshwa, aze angadli nto ingcwele.
3_22_11_Umbingeleli xa athe wathenga umntu, waba yintengo yemali yakhe, makadle kuyo lowo, kwanozelelwe endlwini yakhe; abo bodla ukudla kwakhe.
3_22_12_Intombi yombingeleli, xa ithe yendela kwindoda engeyeyakuni, yona mayingadli emrhumeni weento ezingcwele.
3_22_13_Intombi yombingeleli, xa ithe yangumhlolokazi, nokuba ithe yaliwa, ingazalanga, yabuyela endlwini kayise, yokudla ukudla kukayise njengasebutsheni bayo. Wonke ongengowakuni makangadli kuko.
3_22_14_Umntu othe wayidla into engcwele ngokulahleka, makongeze isihlanu sayo kuyo, ayinike umbingeleli into engcwele.
3_22_15_Ize bangazihlambeli izinto ezingcwele zoonyana bakaSirayeli, ezo bazirhumela uYehova,
3_22_16_babathwalise ubugwenxa betyala ekudleni kwabo izinto zabo ezingcwele: ngokuba ndinguYehova obangcwalisayo.
3_22_17_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_22_18_Thetha kuAron nakoonyana bakhe, nakoonyana bonke bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Umntu ngomntu wendlu kaSirayeli,  nowakubaphambukeli abakwaSirayeli, osukuba esondeza umsondezo wakhe ngokubhekisele kwizibhambathiso zabo zonke,  nangokubhekisele kwimibingelelo yabo yonke yokuqhutywa yintliziyo, asukuba ewusondeza kuYehova, ukuba ube lidini elinyukayo:
3_22_19_wothi, ukuze unikholekise, ube liduna eligqibeleleyo lasezinkomeni, nokuba lelasezigusheni, nelasezibhokhweni.
3_22_20_Izinto zonke ezinesiphako ize ningazisondezi, ngokuba azisayi kunikholekisa.
3_22_21_Umntu, xa athe wasondeza umbingelelo woxolo kuYehova,  ukuba ube ngowesibhambathiso esibalulekileyo, nokuba ube ngowokuqhutywa yintliziyo, oziinkomo noyimpahla emfutshane: uze ube ngogqibeleleyo ukuze ukholeke, uze ungabi nasiphako nasiphi.
3_22_22_Eziziimfama, ezaphukileyo, ezilinyaziweyo, ezinokhwekhwe,  ezinesitshanguba, ize ningazisondezi ezo kuYehova, ninganikeli ngazo ukudla kwasemlilweni esibingelelweni kuYehova.
3_22_23_Inkomo negusha enendawo eyolukileyo, neshwabeneyo,  ungayenza umbingelelo wokuqhutywa yintliziyo; ke ayiyi kukholekisa ukuba ingowesibhambathiso.
3_22_24_Into emasende atyunyuziweyo, nakhandiweyo, naqhiwulweyo,  nanqunyulweyo, ize ningayisondezi kuYehova. Ezweni lenu ze ningenjenjalo.
3_22_25_Nasesandleni sowolunye uhlanga ize ningamkeli nisondeze ukudla koThixo wenu kwezo nto, nakuziphi; ngokuba ukonakala kwazo kukuzo, isiphako sikuzo; aziyi kunikholekisa.
3_22_26_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_22_27_Inkomo, negusha, nebhokhwe, xa izalwayo, yoba mihla isixhenxe phantsi konina. Kuthabathela kusuku lwesibhozo nangasemva kwalo, iya kukholekisa, ibe ngumsondezo wasemlilweni kuYehova.
3_22_28_Inkomo, nokuba yigusha, ize ningayixheli ngamini-nye netakane layo.
3_22_29_Xa nithe nawubingelela umbingelelo wombulelo kuYehova,  nowubingelela ukuba unikholekise.
3_22_30_Wodliwa kwangaloo mhla, ningashiyi nto kuwo kude kuse:  ndinguYehova.
3_22_31_Ize niyigcine imithetho yam, niyenze: ndinguYehova.
3_22_32_Ize ningalihlambeli igama lam elingcwele; ndongcwaliswa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli: ndinguYehova oningcwalisayo,
3_22_33_onikhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa, ukuze ndibe nguThixo wenu: ndinguYehova.
3_23_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_23_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Amaxesha amisiweyo kaYehova, eniya kuwavakalisa ukuba abe ziintlanganiso ezingcwele, ngawo la amaxesha am amisiweyo.
3_23_3_Wosebenza imihla emithandathu; ke umhla wesixhenxe uyisabatha kasabatha, yintlanganiso engcwele. Ze ningenzi namnye umsebenzi ngawo: yisabatha kaYehova emakhayeni enu onke.
3_23_4_Ngawo la amaxesha amisiweyo kaYehova, iintlanganiso ezingcwele, eniya kuzivakalisa ngamaxesha azo amisiweyo ngenyanga yokuqala,
3_23_5_ngolweshumi elinesine enyangeni leyo, lakutshona ilanga,  yipasika kaYehova.
3_23_6_Ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu enyangeni leyo ngumthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele kaYehova; iintsuku ezisixhenxe nodla izonka ezingenagwele.
3_23_7_Ngosuku lokuqala noba nentlanganiso engcwele; ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
3_23_8_Nosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova iintsuku ezisixhenxe; ngosuku lwesixhenxe yintlanganiso engcwele; ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
3_23_9_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_23_10_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo: Xa nithe nafika kulo ilizwe endininika lona, navuna isivuno salo, nozisa kumbingeleli isinde lokuqala lesivuno senu,
3_23_11_alitshangatshangise isinde phambi koYehova; ukuze linikholekise, alitshangatshangise umbingeleli ngengomso emva kwesabatha;
3_23_12_ize ninikele, ngomhla wokulitshangatshangisa kwenu isinde,  imvana egqibeleleyo emnyaka mnye, ibe lidini elinyukayo kuYehova;
3_23_13_nomnikelo walo wokudla ube zizahlulo ezibini zesishumi se-efa zomgubo ocoliweyo, ogalelwe ioli. Kukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, livumba elithozamisayo; nomnikelo walo othululwayo wewayini woba sisahlulo sesine sehin.
3_23_14_Ize ningadli sonka, nakhweba, nangqolowa intsha, ide ibe yinkqu yayo loo mini, nizisa ngayo umsondezo kaThixo wenu:  ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu, emakhayeni enu onke.
3_23_15_Ize nizibalele iisabatha ezisixhenxe ezigqibeleleyo,  nithabathela kwingomso emva kwesabatha, ngomhla wokuzisa kwenu isinde lokutshangatshangisa,
3_23_16_kude kube lingomso emva kwesabatha yesixhenxe; nobala imihla emashumi mahlanu, nisondeze umnikelo wokudla omtsha kuYehova.
3_23_17_Emakhayeni enu ize nirhole nizise izonka zokutshangatshangisa zibe zibini, zezahlulo ezibini zesishumi zomgubo ocoliweyo, zosiwe zinegwele, zibe ziintlahlela kuYehova.
3_23_18_Ndawonye nezonka ezo ize nisondeze iimvana ezigqibeleleyo ezisixhenxe, ezimnyaka mnye, nenkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo,  ibe nye, neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini, zibe lidini elinyukayo kuYehova, neminikelo yazo yokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo;  kukudla kwasemlilweni, kwevumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
3_23_19_Ize ninikele inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono, neemvana ezimbini ezimnyaka mnye zibe ngumbingelelo woxolo.
3_23_20_Wozitshangatshangisa umbingeleli ezo zinto, ndawonye nezonka eziziintlahlela, zibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova, ndawonye neemvana ezimbini; zibe ngcwele kuYehova ngenxa yombingeleli.
3_23_21_Nize nimeme ngenkqu yayo loo mini, ukuba kubekho intlanganiso engcwele kuni; ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.  Ngummiselo ongunaphakade emakhayeni enu onke ezizukulwaneni zenu.
3_23_22_Ekuvuneni kwenu isivuno selizwe lenu, uze ungaligqibi icala lentsimi yakho ekuvuneni kwakho, ungalubhikici ubhikico lwesivuno sakho; woshiyela olusizana nomphambukeli:  ndinguYehova uThixo.
3_23_23_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_23_24_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Ngenyanga yesixhenxe,  ngolokuqala enyangeni leyo, noba nesabatha, isikhumbuzo sokumema ngesigodlo intlanganiso engcwele.
3_23_25_Ize ningenzi namnye umsebenzi wakukhonza; nosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova.
3_23_26_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_23_27_Kodwa ngolweshumi kule nyanga yesixhenxe, ngomhla wokucamagusha, yoba yintlanganiso engcwele kuni, niyithobe imiphefumlo yenu; nisondeze ukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova.
3_23_28_Ize ningenzi namnye umsebenzi ngenkqu yayo loo mini, kuba ngumhla wokucamagusha, wokunicamagushela phambi koYehova uThixo wenu.
3_23_29_Kuba wonke umphefumlo, osukuba ungazithobi ngenkqu yayo loo mini, wonqanyulwa, ungabikho ebantwini bakowawo.
3_23_30_Wonke umphefumlo, osukuba usenza namnye umsebenzi ngenkqu yayo loo mini, ndowutshabalalisa loo mphefumlo, ungabikho phakathi kwabantu bako wawo.
3_23_31_Ize ningenzi namnye umsebenzi. Ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezi zukulwaneni zenu, emakhayeni enu onke.
3_23_32_Yisabatha kasabatha kuni; noyithoba imiphefumlo yenu.  Ngolwe sithoba enyangeni leyo, ngokuhlwa, kuthabathele ekuhlweni kuse ekuhlweni, nophumla ngesabatha yenu.
3_23_33_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_23_34_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu kule nyanga yesixhenxe, ngumthendeleko weminquba iintsuku ezisixhenxe kuYehova.
3_23_35_Ngosuku lokuqala yintlanganiso engcwele; ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
3_23_36_Iintsuku ezisixhenxe nosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova; ngosoku lwesibhozo yoba yintlanganiso engcwele kuni,  nisondeze ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova. Yingqungquthela; ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
3_23_37_Ngawo lawo amaxesha amisiweyo kaYehova, enowavakalisa abe ziintlanganiso ezingcwele, okusondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova: idini elinyukayo, nomnikelo wokudla, umbingelelo neminikelo ethululwayo, into yemini ngangemini yayo;
3_23_38_ngaphandle kweesabatha zikaYehova, nangaphandle kweminikelo yenu, nangaphandle kwezibhambathiso zenu zonke,  nangaphandle kweminikelo yenu yonke yokuqhutywa yintliziyo,  enimnikayo uYehova.
3_23_39_Kodwa ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu enyangeni yesixhenxe,  ekuhlanganiseni kwenu ungeniselo lwelizwe, ize nenze umthendeleko kaYehova iintsuku ezisixhenxe; ngomhla wokuqala yisabatha, nangomhla wesibhozo yisabatha.
3_23_40_Ize nizithabathele ngomhla wokuqala amahlamvu emithi okuhombisa, amagqabi amasundu, namasebe emithi ethe shinyi,  nemingculuba yasemlanjeni; nigcobe phambi koYehova uThixo wenu iintsuku ezisixhenxe.
3_23_41_Lo mthendeleko nowenzela uYehova iintsuku ezisixhenxe ngomnyaka.
3_23_42_Ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu: niwenze umthendeleko ngenyanga yesixhenxe. Nohlala eminqubeni iintsuku ezisixhenxe; bonke abazalelwe kwaSirayeli bohlala eminqubeni;
3_23_43_ukuze zazi izizukulwana zenu, ukuba ndabahlalisa oonyana bakaSirayeli eminqubeni, ekubakhupheni kwam ezweni laseYiputa:  ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_23_44_UMoses wabaxelela oonyana bakaSirayeli amaxesha lawo amisiweyo kaYehova.
3_24_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_24_2_Bawisele umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, bathabathe bazise kuwe ioli eqaqambileyo yeminquma engqushiweyo yesikhanyiso,  ukuba kumiswe isibane samaxesha onke.
3_24_3_Nganeno komkhusane wesingqino, ententeni yokuhlangana,  wohlala ezicwangcisa uAron izibane phambi koYehova,  kuthabathela ngokuhlwa kuzise ekuseni: ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu.
3_24_4_Wohlala ezicwangcisa izibane esiphathweni sezibane esicocekileyo phambi koYehova.
3_24_5_Uze uthabathe umgubo ocoliweyo, uwose ube yimiqhathane elishumi elinamibini, umqhathane omnye ube zizahlulo ezibini zesishumi.
3_24_6_Uze uyikrozise ngemikrozo emibini, ibe mithandathu mkrozweni mnye, etafileni ecocekileyo ephambi koYehova;
3_24_7_ubeke intlaka emhlophe eqaqambileyo phezu komkrozo ngamnye,  ibe sisikhumbuzo sesonka, ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova.
3_24_8_Wohlala eyicwangcisa phambi koYehova ngemihla yonke yesabatha, ivela koonyana bakaSirayeli: ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade.
3_24_9_Yoba yeka-Aron noonyana bakhe, bayidle endaweni engcwele;  kuba yingcwele kangcwele kuye, ivela ekudleni kwasemlilweni kukaYehova: ngummiselo ongunaphakade.
3_24_10_Ke kaloku kwaphuma unyana womSirayelikazi phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli; waye engunyana womYiputa. Lo nyana womSirayelikazi nomfo wakwaSirayeli bantlalana eminqubeni,
3_24_11_unyana womSirayelikazi lowo walithuka iGama, watshabhisa.  Bamzisa kuMoses (igama lonina lalinguShelomiti, intombi kaDibri, wesizwe sakwaDan).
3_24_12_Bamfaka elugcinweni, bade babahlulele loo nto ngokomlomo kaYehova.
3_24_13_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_24_14_Mkhupheni lowo utshabhisileyo, abe ngaphandle kweminquba;  bonke abo bamvileyo bacinezele ngezandla zabo entlokweni yakhe,  limxulube ngamatye lonke ibandla.
3_24_15_Uze uthethe koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Umntu ngomntu, xa athe wamtshabhisa uThixo wakhe, wosithwala isono sakhe.
3_24_16_Olithukayo igama likaYehova makabulawe afe. Lonke ibandla lomxuluba okunene ngamatye, kwanomphambukeli, kwanozalelwe ekhaya; ekulithukeni kwakhe iGama makabulawe.
3_24_17_Umntu othe wabetha umntu wafa, nokuba nguwuphi, makabulawe afe.
3_24_18_Obethe inkomo yafa, woyimisela; umphefumlo ngomphefumlo.
3_24_19_Umntu xa athe wamlimaza ummelwane wakhe, njengoko enze ngako, makwenziwe ngako kuye:
3_24_20_ukwaphulwa ngokwaphulwa, iliso ngeliso, izinyo ngezinyo.  Njengoko amlimazileyo umntu, makwenziwe ngoko kuye.
3_24_21_Obethe inkomo yafa, woyimisela; ke obethe umntu wafa makabulawe.
3_24_22_Masibe sinye isigwebo senu kumphambukeli nakozalelwe ekhaya; ngokuba ndinguYehova uThixo wenu.
3_24_23_Wathetha uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli; bamkhuphela phandle kweminquba lowo utshabhisileyo, bamxuluba ngamatye. Benza oonyana bakaSirayeli njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
3_25_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses entabeni yaseSinayi, esithi,
3_25_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nafika kulo ilizwe endininika lona, ilizwe elo ke lophumla isabatha kuYehova.
3_25_3_Woyihlwayela iminyaka emithandathu intsimi yakho, usithene isidiliya sakho iminyaka emithandathu, uhlanganise ungeniselo lwaso;
3_25_4_ke umnyaka wesixhenxe woba yisabatha yesabatha kulo ilizwe,  isabatha kuYehova. Uze ungayihlwayeli intsimi yakho,  ungasitheni isidiliya sakho;
3_25_5_ungawuvuni ummilela wokuvuna kwakho, neediliya zesidiliya sakho esingathenwanga uze ungazisiki. Woba ngumnyaka wesabatha kulo ilizwe.
3_25_6_Isabatha yalo ilizwe yoba kukudla kuni, kuwe nakwisicaka sakho, nakwisicakakazi sakho, nakumqeshwa wakho, nakolundwendwe kuwe, nakophambukele kuwe,
3_25_7_nakwiinkomo zakho, nakwiinyamakazi ezisezweni lakho; lonke ungeniselo lwalo loba kukudla.
3_25_8_Uze uzibalele iisabatha ezisixhenxe zeminyaka, iminyaka esixhenxe ibe zizihlandlo ezisixhenxe, ize imihla yeesabatha ezisixhenxe zeminyaka ibe yiminyaka emashumi mane aneminyaka esithoba kuwe;
3_25_9_usihambise isigodlo sokumema ngenyanga yesixhenxe,  ngolweshumi enyangeni leyo; ngomhla wokucamagusha nosihambisa isigodlo ezweni lenu lonke;
3_25_10_umnyaka niwungcwalise, umnyaka wamashumi omahlanu,  nivakalise inkululeko ezweni kubemi balo bonke. Woba ngowentlokoma kuni, nibuvele elowo emizalwaneni yakhe.
3_25_11_Umnyaka woba ngowentlokoma kuni, umnyaka wamashumi omahlanu, ukuba ningahlwayeli, ningawuvuni ummilela,  ningasisiki isidiliya esingathenwanga.
3_25_12_Ngokuba le ntlokoma yoba ngcwele kuni; noludla luvela entsimini ungeniselo lwayo.
3_25_13_Ngalo mnyaka wentlokoma nobuyela elowo elifeni lakhe.
3_25_14_Xa nithe nathengisa ngento ethengisayo kummelwane wenu,  naxa uthe wathenga esandleni sommelwane wakho, musani ukubandezelana.
3_25_15_Wothenga wena kummelwane wakho ngokwenani leminyaka emva komnyaka wentlokoma; wothengisa yena kuwe ngokwenani leminyaka yongeniselo.
3_25_16_Ngokobuninzi beminyaka wolandisa ixabiso layo,  nangokobuncinane beminyaka wolinciphisa ixabiso layo; ngokuba ethengisa kuwe ngenani longeniselo.
3_25_17_Ize ningabandezelani; uze umoyike uThixo wakho, ngokuba ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_25_18_Ize niyenze imimiselo yam, niwagcine amasiko am, niwenze.  Nohlala kulo ilizwe nikholosile;
3_25_19_ilizwe livelise iziqhamo zalo, nidle nihluthe, nihlale nikholosile kulo.
3_25_20_Xa nithe, Sodla ntoni na ngomnyaka wesixhenxe? nanku singahlwayeli, singahlanganisi lungeniselo lwethu:
3_25_21_ndoyiwisela umthetho intsikelelo yam ibe kuni ngomnyaka wesithandathu, iluvelise ungeniselo lweminyaka emithathu.
3_25_22_Nohlwayela ngomnyaka wesibhozo, nidle amahasa kude kube ngumnyaka wesithoba; nodla amahasa lude lufike ungeniselo lwawo.
3_25_23_Ilizwe ze kungathengiswa ngalo, libhange, kuba ilizwe lelam; ngokuba ningabaphambukeli neendwendwe kum;
3_25_24_ezweni ke lonke lelifa lenu, ilizwe nolirholela intlawulelo.
3_25_25_Xa athe umzalwana wakho wanzonza, wathengisa ngento yelifa lakhe, makeze owalamana naye ofanele ukumkhulula, ayikhulule ngokuyihlawulela loo nto wathengisa ngayo umzalwana wakhe.
3_25_26_Umntu xa angenabani wokumkhulula, sibe sinokufikelela isandla sakhe sifumane okulingene ukuzikhululela ngentlawulelo:
3_25_27_wobala iminyaka yokuthengisa kwakhe, abuyisele okugqithiseleyo kuloo mntu wathengisa kuye, abuyele elifeni lakhe.
3_25_28_Ukuba isandla sakhe asinakufumana okulingene ukubuyisela kuye loo nto wathengisa ngayo, yohlala esandleni salowo uyithengileyo, kude kube ngumnyaka wentlokoma. Yophuma ngowentlokoma, abuyele elifeni lakhe.
3_25_29_Umntu xa athe wathengisa ngendlu yokuhlala, isemzini onodonga, yoba nokukhululwa ngentlawulelo ude uphele umnyaka wokuthengiswa kwayo; yoba ziintsuku ezithile isenokukhululwa ngentlawulelo.
3_25_30_Ukuba ithe ayakhululwa ngentlawulelo, wada wazaliseka waphela umnyaka, yoqiniselwa kuphele indlu esemzini onodonga,  kulowo wayithengayo ezizukulwaneni zakhe; ayi kuphuma ngomnyaka wentlokoma.
3_25_31_Ke izindlu zemizana, engabiyelwe ngeendonga, zobalelwa ekuthini ngamasimi alo ilizwe: zoba nokukhululwa ngentlawulelo zona, ziphume ngomnyaka wentlokoma.
3_25_32_Ke imizi yabaLevi, izindlu zemizi yelifa labo, zoba nokukhululwa ngentlawulelo nanini kubaLevi.
3_25_33_Ethe yathengwa kubaLevi, indlu ekuthengiswe ngayo emzini welifa lakhe, yophuma ngomnyaka wentlokoma; ngokuba izindlu zemizi yabaLevi zililifa labo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
3_25_34_Ilizwe ledlelo lemizi yabo makungathengiswa ngalo, ngokuba lilifa elingunaphakade kubo.
3_25_35_Xa athe umzalwana wakho wanzonza, isandla sakhe solukela kuwe, somomeleza, aphile nawe engumphambukeli, elundwendwe kuwe.
3_25_36_Musa ukuthabatha nzala kuye, nalwando lwemboleko; uze woyike uThixo wakho, aphile umzalwana wakho kuwe.
3_25_37_Imali yakho uze ungamniki ngenxa yenzala, ungamniki ukudla kwakho ngenxa yolwando lwemboleko:
3_25_38_ndinguYehova uThixo wenu, onikhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa,  ukuze ndinike ilizwe lakwaKanan, ndibe nguThixo kuni.
3_25_39_Xa athe umzalwana wakho wanzonza ekuwe, wazithengisa kuwe,  uze ungamkhonzisi ngokukhonza kwekhoboka.
3_25_40_Woba njengomqeshwa, njengolundwendwe kuwe; wokukhonza kude kube ngumnyaka wentlokoma;
3_25_41_aphume kuwe enabantwana bakhe, abuyele emizalwaneni yakhe,  abuyele elifeni likayise;
3_25_42_ngokuba ngabakhonzi bam abo, endibakhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa. Makungathengiswa ngabo ngokuthengiswa kwekhoboka.
3_25_43_Uze ungamphathi ngokutyumzayo; uze woyike uThixo wakho.
3_25_44_Ikhoboka lakho nekhobokazana lakho, la akuwe, oba ngabasezintlangeni eziningqongileyo; nothenga kuzo ikhoboka nekhobokazana.
3_25_45_Kanjalo koonyana babaziindwendwe kuni, abaphambukele kuni,  nothenga kubo, nasemizalwaneni yabo ekuni, abayizalele ezweni lenu; babe lilifa kuni.
3_25_46_Nobenza babe lilifa koonyana benu emva kwenu, ukuba babathabathe babe lilifa, nibakhonzise ngonaphakade. Ke bona abazalwana benu, oonyana bakaSirayeli, mabangaphathani ngokutyumzayo.
3_25_47_Xa sithe isandla somphambukeli nolundwendwe kuwe satyeba ekuwe, umzalwana wakho wanzonza ekuye, wazithengisa kumphambukeli olundwendwe kuwe, nakumlibo womzalwana womphambukeli:
3_25_48_woba nokukhululwa ngentlawulelo emva kokuzithengisa kwakhe. Omnye kubazalwana bakhe womkhulula ngentlawulelo;
3_25_49_nokuba nguyisekazi, nokuba ngunyana kayisekazi, womkhulula ngentlawulelo; nokuba ngowenyama yenyama yakhe emizalwaneni yakhe, womkhulula ngentlawulelo; nokuba isandla sakhe sithe satyeba, wozikhulula ngokwakhe ngentlawulelo.
3_25_50_Wobalelana nowamthengayo, athabathele emnyakeni wokuthengiswa kwakhe kuye, ase emnyakeni wentlokoma, ithi imali yokuthengiswa kwakhe ime ngokwenani leminyaka abekuye,  ngokwemihla yomqeshwa.
3_25_51_Ukuba isemininzi iminyaka, woyibuyisa kwimali yokuthengwa kwakhe, ibe ngangayo intlawulelo yokukhululwa kwakhe.
3_25_52_Ukuba kuthe kwasala iminyaka embalwa, ukuze kube ngumnyaka wentlokoma, wobala ngokweminyaka yakhe, abuyise intlawulelo yokukhululwa kwakhe.
3_25_53_Woba njengomqeshwa umnyaka ngomnyaka kuye; aze angamphathi ngokutyumzayo emehlweni akho.
3_25_54_Ukuba uthe, akakhululwa ngentlawulelo ngabo abo, wophuma ngomnyaka wentlokoma, yena enabantwana bakhe.
3_25_55_Ngokuba kum oonyana bakaSirayeli ngabakhonzi;  bangabakhonzi bam endibakhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa.  NdinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_26_1_Ize ningazenzeli izinto ezingeni, nomfanekiso oqingqiweyo,  ningaziphakamiseli isimiso samatye, ningagxumeki ilitye elingumfanekiso ezweni lenu, ukuba niqubude kulo; ngokuba ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
3_26_2_Ize nizigcine iisabatha zam, niyoyike ingcwele yam:  ndinguYehova.
3_26_3_Ukuba nithe nahamba emimiselweni yam, nayigcina imithetho yam, nayenza,
3_26_4_ndoninika iziphango zenu ngexesha lazo; ilizwe lininike indyebo yalo, nemithi yentsimi ivelise iziqhamo zayo;
3_26_5_nento eniyibhulileyo ifikele ekuvunweni kweediliya,  ukuvunwa kweediliya kufikelele ekuhlwayeleni, nidle isonka senu, nihluthe, nihlale ezweni lenu nikholosile.
3_26_6_Ndoninika uxolo ezweni elo, nilale; kungabikho bani unigubhisayo, ndilisuse irhamncwa ezweni elo, ikrele lingahambi ezweni lenu;
3_26_7_nizisukele iintshaba zenu, zeyele ekreleni phambi kwenu.
3_26_8_Nibahlanu, nosukela ikhulu; nilikhulu, nosukela amawaka alishumi, zeyele ekreleni iintshaba zenu phambi kwenu.
3_26_9_Ndonibeka, ndiniqhamise, ndinandise, ndiwumise umnqophiso wam nani, nidle amahasa,
3_26_10_nikhuphe amahasa endaweni yokudla okutsha;
3_26_11_ndiwumise umnquba wam phakathi kwenu, ningadimalelwa ngumphefumlo wam.
3_26_12_Ndohamba phakathi kwenu, ndibe nguThixo wenu, nina nibe ngabantu bam.
3_26_13_NdinguYehova uThixo wenu, onikhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa,  ukuba ningabi ngamakhoboka awo; ndazaphula iidyokhwe zenu,  ndanihambisa nathi nkqo.
3_26_14_Ukuba nithe anandiphulaphula, anayenza le mithetho yonke;
3_26_15_ukuba nithe nayicekisa imimiselo yam; ukuba uthe umphefumlo wenu wadimala ngamasiko am, ukuze ningayenzi imithetho yam yonke, nesuka nawaphula umnqophiso wam:
3_26_16_nam ndiya kwenza oku kuni: ndiya kunivelela ngento ekhwankqisayo, ngesifo sephepha, nangecesina ephelisa amehlo,  eyethisa umphefumlo; nifumane nihlwayele imbewu yenu, idliwe ziintshaba zenu.
3_26_17_Ndonichasa nina, ukuze nibethwe phambi kweentshaba zenu,  baninyathele abanithiyayo, nisabe kungekho unisukelayo.
3_26_18_Ukuba nithe anandiphulaphula noko kungako, ndokongeza ukunithethisa kasixhenxe ngenxa yezono zenu.
3_26_19_Ndolaphula iqhayiya lamandla enu; izulu lenu ndilenze libe njengesinyithi, ilizwe lenu libe njengobhedu;
3_26_20_agqitywe ngelize amandla enu, ilizwe lenu lingayivelisi indyebo yalo, nemithi yelizwe ingazivelisi iziqhamo zayo.
3_26_21_Ukuba nithe nahamba ngokundichasa, anavuma ukundiphulaphula, ndosongeza kuni isibetho kasixhenxe ngokwezono zenu;
3_26_22_ndinithumele amarhamncwa, awonihlutha abantwana benu,  aqwenge neenkomo zenu, anenze nibe mbalwa, neendlela zenu zingahanjwa.
3_26_23_Ukuba nithe anavuma ukuthethiswa ndim noko kungako,  nahamba ngokundichasa,
3_26_24_nam ndohamba ngokunichasa, nam ndinibethe kasixhenxe ngenxa yezono zenu.
3_26_25_Ndonizisela ikrele eliyiphindezelayo impindezelo yomnqophiso. Nokuba nihlanganisene emizini yenu, ndothuma indyikitya yokufa phakathi kwenu, ninikelwe esandleni sotshaba.
3_26_26_Ekuwaphuleni kwam umsimelelo osisonka senu, abafazi abalishumi bososela zikweni-nye isonka senu, basibuyise isonka senu besilinganisile, nidle ningahluthi.
3_26_27_Ukuba nithe anandiphulaphula noko kungako, nahamba ngokundichasa,
3_26_28_ndohamba ngokunichasa ngokushushu, ndinithethise nam kasixhenxe ngenxa yezono zenu;
3_26_29_nidle inyama yoonyana benu, nidle nenyama yeentombi zenu.
3_26_30_Ndozitshabalalisa iziganga zenu, ndizigawule iintsika zenu zelanga, ndiziphose izidumbu zenu phezu kwezidumbu zezigodo ezizizithixo zenu; umphefumlo wam udimale nini.
3_26_31_Imizi yenu ndoyenza amanxuwa, ndizenze kube senkangala iingcwele zenu, ndingalivi ivumba lenu lokuthozamisa;
3_26_32_ilizwe ndilenze mna kube senkangala, iintshaba zenu ezimiyo kulo zimangaliswe lilo.
3_26_33_Ndonichithachitha phakathi kweentlanga, ndirhole ikrele lam emva kwenu, ilizwe lenu kube senkangala, imizi yenu ibe ngamanxuwa.
3_26_34_Liya kwandula ukwaneliswa ziisabatha zalo ilizwe, yonke imihla ekusenkangala ngayo, nina ke nisezweni leentshaba zenu.  Liya kwandula ukuphumla ilizwe, laneliswe ziisabatha zalo.
3_26_35_Yonke imihla ekusenkangala ngayo lophumla; oko lingakuphumlanga ngeesabatha zenu ekulihlaleni kwenu.
3_26_36_Abaseleyo kuni, ndongenisa inyungu ezintliziyweni zabo emazweni eentshaba zabo; bagxothwe kukurhashaza kwegqabi eliphetshethwayo, basabe ngathi basaba ikrele, bawe kungekho ubasukelayo;
3_26_37_bakhubeke omnye komnye njengaphambi kwekrele, kungekho ubasukelayo. Anisayi kuba nakumisa phambi kweentshaba zenu.
3_26_38_Nobhubha phakathi kweentlanga, ilizwe leentshaba zenu linidle.
3_26_39_Abaseleyo kuni bongcungcutheka ebugwenxeni babo emazweni eentshaba zenu, nasebugwenxeni booyise, bangcungcutheke benabo.
3_26_40_Ukuba ke bathe babuvuma ubugwenxa babo nobugwenxa booyise ngenxa yokumeneza kwabo, abameneze ngako kum, nangenxa yokuhamba ngokundichasa,
3_26_41_endathi nam ndahamba ngokubachasa, ndabasa ezweni leentshaba zabokanye ukuba zithe zathobeka iintliziyo zabo ezingalukanga; ukuba bathe bandula ukwaneliswa bubugwenxa babo:
3_26_42_ndowukhumbula umnqophiso wam noYakobi, kwanomnqophiso wam noIsake, kwanomnqophiso wam noAbraham; nelizwe ndilikhumbule.
3_26_43_Nelizwe liya kushiywa ngabo laneliswe ziisabatha zalo, xa kuthe kwasenkangala, ababakho kulo; baneliswe bona bubugwenxa babo ngenxa enokuba bawacekisayo amasiko am, nomphefumlo wabo wadimala yimimiselo yam.
3_26_44_Kanti ke noko kude kwanjalo, baba sezweni leentshaba zabo,  andibacekisele; andidimele ngabo ukuba ndibagqibe, ndaphule umnqophiso wam nabo; kuba ndinguYehova, uThixo wabo.
3_26_45_Ndonikhumbulela umnqophiso wam namanyange endiwakhuphe ezweni laseYiputa phambi kweentlanga, ukuba ndibe nguThixo kubo; ndinguYehova.
3_26_46_Yiyo leyo imimiselo, namasiko, nemiyalelo, awayenzayo uYehova phakathi kwakhe noonyana bakaSirayeli, entabeni yaseSinayi, ngesandla sikaMoses.
3_27_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
3_27_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa athe umntu wenza isibhambathiso esibalulekileyo, imiphefumlo yoba yekaYehova ngokulinganisela kwakho.
3_27_3_Ke, ukulinganisela kwakho, oyindoda makuthabathele kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, kuse kominyaka imashumi mathandathu ezelwe: ukulinganisela kwakho makube ziishekele zesilivere ezimashumi mahlanu zengcwele.
3_27_4_Ke ukuba yinkazana, ukulinganisela kwakho makube ziishekele ezimashumi mathathu.
3_27_5_Ukuba kuthabathele kumntwana ominyaka mihlanu, kwesa kumntwana ominyaka imashumi mabini, ukulinganisela kwakho oyindoda makube ziishekele ezimashumi mabini; oyinkazana,  makube ziishekele ezishumi-nye.
3_27_6_Ukuba kuthabathele kumntwana onyanga-nye, kwesa kumntwana ominyaka mihlanu, ukulinganisela kwakho oyindoda makube ziishekele zesilivere ezintlanu; ukulinganisela kwakho oyinkazana makube ziishekele zesilivere ezintathu.
3_27_7_Ukuba kuthabathele kominyaka imashumi mathandathu ezelwe kwenyusa, ukuba uyindoda, ukulinganisela kwakho makube ziishekele ezilishumi elinesihlanu; oyinkazana, makube ziishekele ezishumi-nye.
3_27_8_Ke ukuba uthe wanzonza kunokulinganisela kwakho, makamiswe phambi kombingeleli, umbingeleli amlinganisele; ngento esinokuyifumana isandla salowo ubhambathisileyo, umbingeleli amlinganisele.
3_27_9_Ukuba yinkomo leyo, kusondezwa yona ukuba ibe ngumsondezo kuYehova, yonke into enjalo enikelwa kuYehova mayibe ngcwele.
3_27_10_Ize ingaguqulwa, ize ingananwa, elungileyo ngembi, embi ngelungileyo; ukuba uthe wanana ukwanana oku inkomo ngenkomo,  mayibe ngcwele yona, kwanaleyo kwananwe ngayo.
3_27_11_Ke ukuba yinto ezitho zine eyinqambi, nokuba yiyiphi,  ekungasondezwa msondezo wayo kuYehova, into leyo izitho zine mayimiswe phambi kombingeleli,
3_27_12_umbingeleli ayilinganisele, abethe phakathi kwelungileyo nembi; yoba njengokulinganisela kwakho, wena mbingeleli.
3_27_13_Ukuba uthe wayikhulula okunene ngentlawulelo, makongeze isahlulo sesihlanu sayo kuko oko kulinganisela kwakho.
3_27_14_Xa athe umntu wayingcwalisa indlu yakhe ukuba ibe ngcwele kuYehova, umbingeleli makayilinganisele, abethe phakathi kwelungileyo nembi njengoko umbingeleli ayilinganiseleyo,  yoqiniseka ngokunjalo.
3_27_15_Ukuba lowo wayingcwalisayo uthe wayikhulula ngentlawulelo indlu yakhe, makongeze isahlulo sesihlanu sesilivere yokulinganisela kwakho kuko oko, ibe yeyakhe.
3_27_16_Ukuba umntu uthe wangcwalisa kuYehova inxalenye yentsimi yelifa lakhe, ukulinganisela kwakho makube ngokwembewu yayo,  ihomere yembewu yerhasi ngeeshekele zesilivere ezimashumi mahlanu.
3_27_17_Ukuba uthe wayingcwalisa intsimi yakhe, ethabathe emnyakeni wentlokoma, mayiqiniseke ngokulinganisela kwakho.
3_27_18_Ukuba uthe wayingcwalisa intsimi yakhe emva kowentlokoma,  umbingeleli makambalele imali ngokweminyaka esaseleyo, kuse emnyakeni wentlokoma, iphungulwe kweyokulinganisela kwakho.
3_27_19_Ukuba lowo wayingcwalisayo uthe wayikhulula okunene ngentlawulelo intsimi, makongeze isahlulo sesihlanu semali yokulinganisela kwakho kuko oko, iqiniseke kuye.
3_27_20_Ukuba uthe akayikhulula ngentlawulelo intsimi, nokuba uthe wathengisa ngentsimi leyo komnye umntu, mayingabi sakhululwa ngentlawulelo.
3_27_21_Loo ntsimi yoba ngcwele kuYehova, ekuphumeni kwayo kuloo mntu ngomnyaka wentlokoma, njengentsimi eyahlulelwe ukuba ibe lilifa lombingeleli.
3_27_22_Ukuba uthe wangcwaliswa kuYehova intsimi yentengo yakhe,  ingentsimi yelifa lakhe,
3_27_23_umbingeleli makambalele inani lokulinganisela kwakho, kuse emnyakeni wentlokoma, anike ukulinganisela kwakho ngaloo mhla,  kube njengento engcwele kuYehova.
3_27_24_Ngomnyaka wentlokoma intsimi mayibuyele kulowo yathengwa kuye, kulowo belilelakhe ilifa lomhlaba.
3_27_25_Konke ukulinganisela kwakho makube ngeshekele yengcwele;  ishekele yoba ziigera ezimashumi mabini.
3_27_26_Ngamazibulo odwa ezintweni ezizitho zine, azityulelwa kuYehova, angayi kungcwaliswa mntu, nokuba yinkomo, nokuba yimvu; ngakaYehova.
3_27_27_Ukuba ngawezinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi, makamiselwe ngokulinganisela kwakho, kongezwe isahlulo sesihlanu sayo kuko oko; ke ukuba athe akakhululwa ngentlawulelo, makuthengiswe ngawo ngokulinganisela kwakho.
3_27_28_Kodwa yonke into esingelwe phantsi, asukuba umntu eyisingela kuYehova entweni yonke anayo, nokuba ngumntu, nokuba yinto ezizitho zine, nokuba yintsimi yelifa lakhe,  makungathengiswa ngayo, mayingakhululwa nangentlawulelo. Yonke into esingelwe phantsi yingcwele kangcwele kuYehova.
3_27_29_Yonke into esingelwe phantsi ethe yasingelwa phantsi ingumntu, mayingakhululwa nangokumiselwa; mayibulawe ife.
3_27_30_Sonke isishumi somhlaba, sembewu yomhlaba, seziqhamo zomthi, sesikaYehova; singcwele kuYehova.
3_27_31_Ukuba uthe umntu wasikhulula okunene ngentlawulelo isishumi sakhe, makongeze kuso isahlulo sesihlanu saso.
3_27_32_Sonke isishumi seenkomo, nasempahleni emfutshane, yonke into ethubeleza phantsi kwentonga, eyeshumi mayibe ngcwele kuYehova.
3_27_33_Makangagocagoci phakathi kwelungileyo nembi, angayanani;  ukuba uthe wayanana ukuyanana oku, mayibe ngcwele yona, naleyo kwananwe ngayo mayingakhululwa ngentlawulelo.
3_27_34_Yiyo leyo imithetho uYehova wayiwisela uMoses ngenxa yoonyana bakaSirayeli, entabeni yaseSinayi.
4_1_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses entlango yaseSinayi, ententeni yokuhlangana, ngolokuqala usuku lwenyanga yesibini, ngomnyaka wesibini wokuphuma kwabo ezweni laseYiputa, esithi,
4_1_2_Thabathani inani lebandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli,  ngokwemizalwane yabo ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama yonke into eyindoda, ngokwentloko yayo.
4_1_3_Nothabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe ninyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi kwaSirayeli; nibabale emlibeni ngokwemikhosi yabo, wena noAron;
4_1_4_kubekho nani indoda esizweni ngasinye, indoda eyintloko yendlu kayise.
4_1_5_Ngawo la amagama amadoda aya kuma nani: kwaRubhen: uElitsure unyana kaShediyure;
4_1_6_kwaSimon: uShelumiyeli unyana kaTsurishadayi;
4_1_7_kwaYuda: uNashon unyana ka-Aminadabhi;
4_1_8_kwaIsakare: uNathaniyeli unyana kaTsuhare;
4_1_9_kwaZebhulon: uEliyabhi unyana kaHelon;
4_1_10_koonyana bakaYosefu: kwaEfrayim: uElishama unyana ka-Amihudi; kwaManase: uGamaliyeli unyana kaPedatsure;
4_1_11_kwaBhenjamin: uAbhidan unyana kaGidiyoni;
4_1_12_kwaDan: uAhiyezere unyana ka-Amishadayi;
4_1_13_kwa-Ashere: uPagiyeli unyana kaOkran;
4_1_14_kwaGadi: uEliyasafu unyana kaDehuweli;
4_1_15_kwaNafetali: uAhira unyana kaEnan.
4_1_16_Ngabo abo babizwe libandla, abazizikhulu zezizwe zooyise,  abaziintloko zamawaka akwaSirayeli bona.
4_1_17_OoMoses noAron bawathabatha loo madoda ahleliweyo ngamagama.
4_1_18_Balibizela ndawonye lonke ibandla ngolokuqala usuku lwenyanga yesibini, ukuba baxele ukuzalwa kwabo ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, ngokweentloko zabo.
4_1_19_Njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses, wababala entlango yaseSinayi.
4_1_20_Koonyana bakaRubhen, owamazibulo kaSirayeli, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama,  ngokweentloko zabo, yonke into eyindoda ethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, inyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_21_abalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaRubhen, baba ngamashumi amane anamathandathu amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_1_22_Koonyana bakaSimon, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ababalwa kubo ngenani lamagama,  ngokweentloko zabo, yonke into eyindoda ethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, inyuse, bonke baphuma umkhosi;
4_1_23_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaSimon, baba ngamashumi amahlanu anesithoba amawaka, anamakhulu mathathu.
4_1_24_Koonyana bakaGadi, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_25_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaGadi, baba ngamashumi amane anamahlanu amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu, anamanci mahlanu.
4_1_26_Koonyana bakaYuda, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_27_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaYuda, baba ngamashumi asixhenxe anamane amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu.
4_1_28_Koonyana bakaIsakare, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_29_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaIsakare, baba ngamashumi amahlanu anamane amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_1_30_Koonyana bakaZebhulon, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_31_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaZebhulon, baba ngamashumi amahlanu anesixhenxe amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_1_32_Koonyana bakaYosefu: koonyana bakaEfrayim: inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise ngenani lamagama,  bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_33_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaEfrayim, baba ngamashumi amane amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_1_34_Koonyana bakaManase, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_35_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaManase, baba ngamashumi amathathu anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu mabini.
4_1_36_Koonyana bakaBhenjamin, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwenzindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_37_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaBhenjamin, baba ngamashumi amathathu anamahlanu amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_1_38_Koonyana bakaDan, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_39_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaDan, baba ngamashumi amathandathu anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu asixhenxe.
4_1_40_Koonyana baka-Ashere, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke baphuma umkhosi:
4_1_41_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwa-Ashere, baba ngamashumi amane analinye amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_1_42_Koonyana bakaNafetali, inzala yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngenani lamagama, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi:
4_1_43_ababalwayo kubo besizwe sakwaNafetali, baba ngamashumi amahlanu anamathathu amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_1_44_Ngabo abo babalwayo, babalwayo nguMoses, noAron, nezikhulu zakwaSirayeli ezilishumi elinazibini, iyileyo indoda ibalelwa indlu kayise.
4_1_45_Bonke ababalwayo boonyana bakaSirayeli ngokwezindlu zooyise, bathabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe,  banyuse, bonke abaphuma umkhosi kwaSirayeli:
4_1_46_bonke ababalwayo baba ngamakhulu amathandathu amawaka,  anamawaka mathathu, anamakhulu mahlanu, anamanci mahlanu.
4_1_47_Ke bona abaLevi, ngokwesizwe sezindlu zooyise,  ababalelwanga phakathi kwabo.
4_1_48_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_1_49_Kodwa sona isizwe sakwaLevi uze ungasibali; ungalithabathi inani laso phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_1_50_Wena ke abaLevi uze ubenze bavelele umnquba wesingqino nempahla yawo yonke, nento yonke ekuwo, bawuthwale umnquba nempahla yawo yonke, balungiselele kuwo, bamise iintente zabo ngeenxa zonke emnqubeni.
4_1_51_Ekundulukeni komnquba wowiswa ngabaLevi; ekumisweni komnquba wophakanyiswa ngabaLevi; owasemzini osondelayo kuwo makabulawe.
4_1_52_Oonyana bakaSirayeli bomisa elowo intente yakhe eminqubeni yakowabo, elowo ebhanileni yakowabo, ngokwemikhosi yabo.
4_1_53_AbaLevi bona bozimisa ezabo ngeenxa zonke emnqubeni wesingqino, ukuze kungezi burhalarhume phezu kwebandla loonyana bakaSirayeli, basigcine abaLevi isigxina somnquba wesingqino.
4_1_54_Benza ke oonyana bakaSirayeli; njengako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho uMoses, benjenjalo.
4_2_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_2_2_Elowo koonyana bakaSirayeli woyimisa intente yakhe ngakwibhanile yakowabo, eziqondisweni zezindlu zooyise, bamise malunga nentente yokuhlangana ngeenxa zonke.
4_2_3_Abomisa phambili ngasempumalanga boba ngabebhanile yakwaYuda ngokwemikhosi yabo; inkulu yoonyana bakaYuda nguNashon, unyana ka-Aminadabhi;
4_2_4_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi osixhenxe anesine amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu.
4_2_5_Abomisa ngakuye yoba sisizwe sakwaIsakare; inkulu yoonyana bakaIsakare nguNathaniyeli, unyana kaTsuhare;
4_2_6_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omahlanu anamane amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_2_7_Ize kulandele isizwe sakwaZebhulon; inkulu yoonyana bakaZebhulon nguEliyabhi, unyana kaHelon;
4_2_8_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omahlanu anesixhenxe amawaka, anamakhulumane.
4_2_9_Bonke ke ababalelwa eminqubeni yakwaYuda likhulu lamawaka,  anamanci osibhozo amawaka, anesithandathu samawaka, anamakhulu mane, ngokwemikhosi yabo. Bonduluka kuqala bona.
4_2_10_Ibhanile yeminquba yakwaRubhen yoba ngasezantsi ngokwemikhosi yabo; inkulu yoonyana bakaRubhen nguElitsure,  unyana kaShedeyure;
4_2_11_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kuye, ngamashumi omane anesithandathu samawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_2_12_Abomisa ngakuye yoba sisizwe sakwaSimon; inkulu yoonyana bakaSimon nguShelumiyeli, unyana kaTsurishadayi;
4_2_13_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omahlanu anesithoba amawaka, anamakhulu mathathu.
4_2_14_Ize kulandele isizwe sakwaGadi; inkulu yoonyana bakaGadi nguEliyasafu, unyana kaRehuweli;
4_2_15_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omane anesihlanu amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu, anamanci mahlanu.
