4_2_16_Bonke ke ababalelwa eminqubeni yakwaRubhen likhulu lamawaka, elinamanci mahlanu amawaka, anawakanye, linamakhulu mane, anamanci mahlanu, ngokwemikhosi yabo. Bonduluka beyeyesibini.
4_2_17_Yoncothulwa intente yokuhlangana, ineminquba yabaLevi phakathi kweminye iminquba; njengoko bamisa ngako, bonduluka ngako, elowo endaweni yakhe ngokwebhanile yakowabo.
4_2_18_Ibhanile yeminquba yakwaEfrayim yoba ngasentshonalanga,  ngokwemikhosi yabo; inkulu yoonyana bakaEfrayim nguElishama,  unyana ka-Amihude;
4_2_19_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omane amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_2_20_Ngakuye ibe sisizwe sakwaManase; inkulu yoonyana bakaManase nguGamaliyeli, unyana kaPedatsure;
4_2_21_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omathathu anesibini amawaka, anamakhulu mabini.
4_2_22_Kuze kulandele isizwe sakwaBhenjamin; inkulu yoonyana bakaBhenjamin nguAbhidan, unyana kaGidiyoni;
4_2_23_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omathathu anesihlanu amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_2_24_Bonke ke ababalelwa eminqubeni yakwaEfrayim likhulu lamawaka, anesibhozo samawaka anakhulu-nye, ngokwemikhosi yabo.  Bonduluka beyeyesithathu.
4_2_25_Ibhanile yeminquba yakwaDan yoba ngasentla, ngokwemikhosi yabo; inkulu yoonyana bakaDan nguAhiyezere, unyana ka-Amishadayi;
4_2_26_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omathandathu anesibini amawaka, anamakhulu asixhenxe.
4_2_27_Abomisa ngakuye yoba sisizwe sakwa-Ashere, inkulu yoonyana baka-Ashere nguPagiyeli, unyana kaOkran;
4_2_28_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omane amawaka, anawaka-nye, linamakhulu mahlanu.
4_2_29_Ize kulandele isizwe sakwaNafetali; inkulu yoonyana bakaNafetali nguAhira, unyana kaEnan;
4_2_30_umkhosi wakhe, abo babalwayo kubo, ngamashumi omahlanu anesithathu samawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_2_31_Bonke ke ababalelwa eminqubeni yakwaDan likhulu lamawaka,  anamanci omahlanu anesixhenxe samawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu.  Bonduluka bengabokugqibela, ngokweebhanile zabo.
4_2_32_Ngabo ke abo babalwayo koonyana bakaSirayeli, ngokwezindlu zooyise; bonke ababalelwa eminqubeni ngokwemikhosi yabo ngamakhulu omathandathu amawaka, anesithathu samawaka,  anamakhulu mahlanu, anamanci mahlanu.
4_2_33_Ke abaLevi ababalelwanga phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli,  njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_2_34_Benza ke oonyana bakaSirayeli; njengako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho uMoses, benjenjalo ukumisa iintente ngokweebhanile zakowabo; benjenjalo ukunduluka, elowo ngokomzalwane wakhe, ngokwezindlu zooyise.
4_3_1_Yiyo le inzala ka-Aron noMoses, mini uYehova wathethayo noMoses entabeni yaseSinayi.
4_3_2_Ngawo la amagama oonyana baka-Aron: owamazibulo nguNadabhi,  noAbhihu, uElazare, noItamare.
4_3_3_Ngawo lawo amagama oonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli abathanjiswayo, bamiselwa ukuba babe ngababingeleli.
4_3_4_Bafa ooNadabhi noAbhihu phambi koYehova, ekusondezeni kwabo umlilo ongesesikweni phambi koYehova, entlango yaseSinayi;  ababa nanyana bona. Baba ngababingeleli ooElazare noItamare ebusweni buka-Aron uyise.
4_3_5_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_3_6_Sisondeze isizwe sakwaLevi, usimise phambi koAron umbingeleli, ukuba balungiselele kuye.
4_3_7_Bosigcina isigxina sakhe nesigxina sebandla lonke phambi kwentente yokuhlangana, ukuba basebenze umsebenzi womnquba;
4_3_8_bazigcine iimpahla zonke zentente yokuhlangana, nesigxina soonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba basebenze umsebenzi womnquba.
4_3_9_Womnika abaLevi uAron noonyana bakhe, abanikwe banikwa ngoonyana bakaSirayeli;
4_3_10_ooAron noonyana bakhe ubenze bavelele babugcine ububingeleli babo. Owasemzini osondelayo makabulawe.
4_3_11_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_3_12_Uyabona, mna ndibathabathile abaLevi phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, esikhundleni samazibulo onke avula isizalo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, baba ngabam abaLevi;
4_3_13_kuba onke amazibulo ngawam, mini ndawabethayo onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, ndazingcwalisela onke amazibulo kwaSirayeli, ethabathela emntwini esa enkomeni. Oba ngawam, mna Yehova.
4_3_14_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses entlango yaseSinayi, esithi,
4_3_15_Babale oonyana bakaLevi ngokwezindlu zooyise,  ngokwemizalwane yabo; yonke into eyindoda, ethabathela kunyana onyanganye inyuse, woyibala.
4_3_16_Wababala ke uMoses ngokomlomo kaYehova, njengoko wamwiselayo umthetho.
4_3_17_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaLevi ngamagama abo: nguGershon noKehati noNerari.
4_3_18_Ngawo la amagama oonyana bakaGershon ngokwemizalwane yabo:  nguLibheni noShimehi.
4_3_19_Oonyana bakaKehati ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguAmram noItsare,  nguHebron noUziyeli.
4_3_20_Oonyana bakaMerari ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguMaheli noMushi.  Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaLevi ngokwezindlu zooyise.
4_3_21_KwaGershon ngumzalwane wakwaLibheni, nomzalwane wakwaShimehi; yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaGershon.
4_3_22_Ababalwayo kubo ngenani lawo, yonke into eyindoda ethabathela kunyana onyanga-nye inyuse, ababalwayo kubo:  ngamawaka asixhenxe, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_3_23_Imizalwane yakwaGershon yomisa intente ngasemva komnquba ngasentshonalanga.
4_3_24_Inkulu yendlu yooyise kwaGershon nguEliyasafu, unyana kaLayeli.
4_3_25_Isigxina soonyana bakaGershon ententeni yokuhlangana soba ngumnquba, nentente, nesigubungelo sayo, nesisitheliso somnyango wentente yokuhlangana,
4_3_26_namawunduwundu entendelezo, nesisitheliso somnyango wentendelezo esemnqubeni nasesibingelelweni ngeenxa zonke,  nezintya zawo emsebenzini wawo wonke.
4_3_27_KwaKehati ngumzalwane wakwa-Amram, nomzalwane wakwaItsare,  nomzalwane wakwaHebron, nomzalwane wakwa-Aziyeli; yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaKehati.
4_3_28_Ngenani, into yonke eyindoda, ethabathela kunyana onyanganye yenyusa: ngamawaka osibhozo, anamakhulu mathandathu,  egcine isigxina sengcwele.
4_3_29_Imizalwane yoonyana bakaKehati yomisa intente ngecala lomnquba elingasezantsi.
4_3_30_Inkulu yendlu yooyise ngokwemizalwane yakwaKehati nguElitsafan, unyana kaUziyeli.
4_3_31_Isigxina sabo yityeya, netafile, nesiphatho sezibane,  nezibingelelo, neempahla zengcwele abalungiselela ngazo,  nesisitheliso, nomsebenzi wawo wonke.
4_3_32_Inkulu yezikhulu zakwaLevi nguElazare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli, umveleli wabagcina isigxina sengcwele.
4_3_33_KwaMerari ngumzalwane wakwaMaheli, nomzalwane wakwaMushi;  yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaMerari.
4_3_34_Ababalwayo kubo ngenani lawo, yonke into eyindoda,  ethabathela kunyana onyanga-nye inyuse: ngamawaka amathandathu,  anamakhulu mabini.
4_3_35_Inkulu yendlu yooyise ngokwemizalwane yakwaMerari nguTsuriyeli, unyana ka-Abhihayili; yomisa iintente ngecala lomnquba elingasentla.
4_3_36_Isigxina soonyana bakaMerari kukugcina iiplanga zomnquba nemivalo yawo, neentsika zawo, neziseko zawo, neempahla zawo zonke, nomsebenzi wawo wonke,
4_3_37_neentsika zentendelezo ngeenxa zonke, neziseko zazo,  nezikhonkwane zazo, nezintya zazo.
4_3_38_Abomisa iintente phambi komnquba ngasempumalanga, phambi kwentente yokuhlangana, nguMoses, noAron, noonyana bakhe,  abagcina isigxina sengcwele, ngokwesigxina soonyana bakaSirayeli. Owasemzini osondelayo makabulawe.
4_3_39_Bonke ke ababalwayo bakwaLevi, ababalwayo nguMoses noAron ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngokwemizalwane yabo, yonke into eyindoda,  ethabathela kunyana onyanga-nye inyuse: ngamashumi amabini anamabini amawaka.
4_3_40_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Wabale onke amazibulo ento eyindoda koonyana bakaSirayeli, ethabathela kunyana onyanga-nye anyuse,  uthabathe inani lamagama awo.
4_3_41_Wondithabathela mna Yehova abaLevi, esikhundleni samazibulo onke aphakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli; neenkomo zabaLevi esikhundleni samazibulo onke ezinkomeni zoonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_3_42_Wawabala ke uMoses onke amazibulo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho;
4_3_43_onke amazibulo ento eyindoda ngenani lamagama, ethabathela kunyana onyanga-nye anyuse, ngokubalwa kwawo, aba ngamashumi amabini anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu mabini, anamanci asixhenxe anesithathu.
4_3_44_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_3_45_Thabatha abaLevi esikhundleni samazibulo onke, phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, neenkomo zabaLevi, esikhundleni seenkomo zabo, babe ngabam abaLevi, mna Yehova.
4_3_46_Ke amakhulu amabini, anamanci asixhenxe anamathathu aza kukhululwa ngokumiselwa, kumazibulo oonyana bakaSirayeli,  agqithiseleyo kubaLevi.
4_3_47_Uze uthabathe iishekele zibe ntlanu ngentloko yomntu,  uthabathe ngokweshekele yengcwele (ishekele leyo iziigera ezimashumi mabini);
4_3_48_umnike uAron noonyana bakhe loo mali yabakhululwe ngokumiselwa, abagqithiseleyo kubo.
4_3_49_Wayithabatha ke uMoses loo mali yokukhululwa kwabo bagqithiseleyo kwabakhululwe ngabaLevi ngokumiselwa;
4_3_50_wayithabatha kumazibulo oonyana bakaSirayeli imali, iliwaka elinamakhulu mathathu, anamanci amathandathu anesihlanu,  ngokweshekele yengcwele.
4_3_51_UMoses wayinika uAron noonyana bakhe imali leyo yenkululo,  ngokomlomo kaYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_4_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_4_2_Libale inani loonyana bakaKehati abaphakathi koonyana bakaLevi ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_3_uthabathele kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, unyuse, use kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe: labo bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, ukuba benze umsebenzi ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_4_4_Nguwo lo umsebenzi woonyana bakaKehati ententeni yokuhlangana wengcwele kangcwele:
4_4_5_ekundulukeni komkhosi eminqubeni bongena ooAron noonyana bakhe, bawuthule umkhusane osisisitheliso, bayigubungele ngawo ityeya yesingqino.
4_4_6_Bobeka phezu kwawo isigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi batwabulule ngaphezulu ingubo ebala limsi liphela, bazifake izibonda zawo.
4_4_7_Ize batwabulule ingubo ebala limsi phezu kwetafile yezonka zokubonisa, babeke phezu kwayo izitya, neenkamba, namathunga,  neendebe zokuthululwa, nezonka zamaxhesha onke, zibe phezu kwayo.
4_4_8_Botwabulula phezu kwazo ingubo ebomvu, bagubungele ngesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi, bafake izibonda zayo.
4_4_9_Bothabatha ingubo ebala limsi, bagubungele isiphatho sezikhanyiso nezibane zaso, nezifinyiso zaso, neenkamba zaso,  nazo zonke izitya zeoli zaso abasilungiselela ngazo;
4_4_10_basibeke nempahla yaso yonke esigubungelweni sezikhumba zamahlengezi, basibeke ethaleni.
4_4_11_Ize batwabulule phezu kwesibingelelo segolide ingubo ebala limsi, bayigubungele ngesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi,  bafake izibonda zaso.
4_4_12_Bothabatha yonke impahla yokulungiselela, abalungiselela ngayo engcweleni, bayibeke engutyeni ebalalimsi, bayigubungele ngesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi, bayibeke ethaleni.
4_4_13_Boluwola uthuthu lwesibingelelo, batwabulule phezu kwaso ingubo emfusa;
4_4_14_bazibeke phezu kwayo zonke iimpahla zaso, abalungiselela ngazo kuso: iingcedevu zamalahle, neefolokhwe, nemihlakulwana,  nezitya zokutshiza, zonke iimpahla zesibingelelo, batwabulule phezu kwazo isigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi, bafake izibonda zaso;
4_4_15_bagqibe ooAron noonyana bakhe ukuyigubungela ingcwele nempahla yonke yengcwele ekundulukeni komkhosi eminqubeni.  Emveni koko ke boza kuthwala oonyana bakaKehati;  bangayichukumisi ingcwele, hleze bafe. Nguwo lowo umthwalo woonyana bakaKehati ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_4_16_Isigxina sikaElazare, unyana ka-Aron, umbingeleli,  kukugcina ioli yesikhanyiso, nesiqhumiso esimnandi, nomnikelo wokudla wamaxesha onke, neoli yokuthambisa, uvelelo lomnquba wonke nento yonke ekuwo engcweleni, nasezimpahleni zayo.
4_4_17_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_4_18_Musani ukusinqumla isizwe esingumzalwana wakwaKehati phakathi kwabaLevi.
4_4_19_Yenzani le nto kubo, ukuba baphile, bangafi ekusondeleni kwabo engcweleni kangcwele: bongena ooAron noonyana bakhe,  babamise elowo emsebenzini wakhe nasemthwalweni wakhe;
4_4_20_bangangeni bakhangele ingcwele, nangephanyazo eli, hleze bafe.
4_4_21_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_4_22_Libale inani loonyana bakaGershon nabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise, ngokwemizalwane yabo,
4_4_23_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, banyuse,  base kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe; wobabala bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, ukuba basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_4_24_Nguwo lo umsebenzi wemizalwane yakwaGershon wokusebenza nokuthwala:
4_4_25_bothwala amalengalenga omnquba, nentente yokuhlangana,  isigubungelo sayo, nesigubungelo sezikhumba zamahlengezi esiphezu kwaso ngaphezulu, nesisitheliso somnyango wentente yokuhlangana,
4_4_26_namawunduwundu entendelezo, nesisitheliso sokungena kwesango lentendelezo, esemnqubeni nasesibingelelweni ngeenxa zonke, nezintya zawo, nempahla yonke yomsebenzi wabo, nento yonke eyenzelwe ukuba basebenze ngayo.
4_4_27_Woba ngokomlomo ka-Aron noonyana bakhe wonke umsebenzi woonyana bakaGershon, ekuthwaleni kwabo konke nasekusebenzeni kwabo konke, nibenze bavelele bakugcine konke ukuthwala kwabo.
4_4_28_Nguwo lowo umsebenzi wemizalwane yoonyana bakaGershon ententeni yokuhlangana. Isigxina sabo soba sesandleni sikaItamare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli.
4_4_29_Oonyana bakaMerari wobabala ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_30_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, banyuse,  base kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe; nobabala bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_4_31_Siso esi isigxina sokuthwala kwabo, ekusebenzeni kwabo konke ententeni yokuhlangana: iiplanga zomnquba, nemivalo yawo,  neentsika zawo, neziseko zawo, neentsika zentendelezo ngeenxa zonke,
4_4_32_neziseko zazo, nezikhonkwane zazo, nezintya zazo,  ngokwempahla yazo yonke, nangokomsebenzi wazo wonke; nizibhale ngamagama iimpahla zesigxina sokuthwala kwabo.
4_4_33_Nguwo lowo umsebenzi wemizalwane yoonyana bakaMerari,  ngokomsebenzi wabo wonke ententeni yokuhlangana, esandleni sikaItamare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli.
4_4_34_OoMoses noAron nezikhulu zebandla bababala ke oonyana bakaKehati ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_35_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, banyuse,  base kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe; bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, ukuba basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_4_36_Ababalwayo kubo ngokwemizalwane yabo baba ngamawaka amabini anamakhulu asixhenxe, anamanci mahlanu.
4_4_37_Ngabo abo ababalwayo kwimizalwane yakwaKehati; bonke abo basebenzayo ententeni yokuhlangana, awababalayo uMoses noAron ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngesandla sikaMoses.
4_4_38_Ababalwayo koonyana bakaGershon ngokwemizalwane yabo,  ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_39_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, banyuse,  base kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe, bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, ukuba basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana,
4_4_40_ababalwayo kubo ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,  baba ngamawaka amabini, anamakhulu mathandathu, anamanci mathathu.
4_4_41_Ngabo abo ababalwayo kwimizalwane yoonyana bakaGershon,  bonke abo basebenzayo ententeni yokuhlangana, awababalayo uMoses noAron ngokomlomo kaYehova.
4_4_42_Ababalwayo kwimizalwane yoonyana bakaMerari,  ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_43_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe, banyuse,  base kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe, bonke abeza kuphuma umkhosi, ukuba basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana,
4_4_44_ababalwayo kubo ngokwemizalwane yabo, baba ngamawaka amathathu, anamakhulu mabini.
4_4_45_Ngabo abo babalwayo kwimizalwane yoonyana bakaMerari,  awababalayo uMoses noAron ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngesandla sikaMoses.
4_4_46_Bonke ke ababalwayo, awababalayo uMoses noAron nezikhulu zakwaSirayeli, kubaLevi ngokwemizalwane yabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,
4_4_47_bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mathathu ezelwe banyuse,  basekominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe, bonke abo baza kusebenza imisebenzi ngemisebenzi, nomsebenzi wokuthwala ententeni yokuhlangana,
4_4_48_ababalwayo kubo, baba ngamawaka asibhozo, anamakhulu mahlanu, anamanci asibhozo.
4_4_49_Babenza bavelela ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngesandla sikaMoses,  elowo emsebenzini wakhe, nasemthwalweni wakhe, nasezintweni awozivelela, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_5_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_5_2_Bawisele umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, babakhuphe eminqubeni bonke abaneqhenqa, nabo bonke ababhobhozayo, nabo bonke abaziinqambi ngofileyo;
4_5_3_oyindoda noyinkazana, nobakhuphela phandle kweminquba,  bangayenzi inqambi iminquba yabo, endihleli phakathi kwayo.
4_5_4_Benjenjalo ke oonyana bakaSirayeli, babakhuphela phandle kweminquba; njengoko uYehova wathethayo kuMoses, benjenjalo oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_5_5_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_5_6_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Indoda nokuba yinkazana,  xa bathe benza isono kwizono zonke zoluntu, ngokuthi bameneze kuYehova, yazeka ityala ke loo miphefumlo,
4_5_7_mabasixele isono sabo abasenzileyo, owonileyo alihlambe ityala lakhe ngangenani lalo, ongeze isahlulo salo sesihlanu kulo, anike lowo anetyala kuye.
4_5_8_Ukuba umntu lowo uthe akaba namzalwana kungahlawulwa kuye ukuhlamba ityala, ityala elo malihlawulelwe uYehova,  kumbingeleli, ngaphandle kwenkunzi yemvu yokucamagusha, aya kucanyagushelwa ngayo.
4_5_9_Wonke umrhumo weento zonke ezingcwele zoonyana bakaSirayeli,  abawusondezayo kumbingeleli, wobangowakhe.
4_5_10_Elowo izinto zakhe ezingcwele zoba zezakhe; elowo into ayinike umbingeleli, yoba yeyakhe.
4_5_11_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_5_12_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Indoda ngendoda,  xa athe umkayo wanxaxha, wayimenezelela,
4_5_13_kwalala enye indoda naye, kwafihlakala emehlweni endoda yakhe, kwasithela, wazenza inqambi yena, akaba nangqina,  akabanjwa;
4_5_14_yafikelwa ngumoya wobukhwele, yamkhweletela umkayo,  eyinqambi yena; nokuba yafikelwa ngumoya wobukhwele,  yamkhweletela umkayo engeyiyo inqambi:
4_5_15_indoda leyo mayimzise umkayo kumbingeleli, iwuzise umsondezo wakhe ngenxa yakhe, isahlulo seshumi se-efa yomgubo werhasi, ingagaleli oli phezu kwawo, ingabeki ntlaka imhlophe phezu kwawo; kuba ngumnikelo wokudla wobukhwele, ngumnikelo wokudla wenkumbuzo, okhumbuza ubugwenxa obo.
4_5_16_Umbingeleli womsondeza, ammise phambi koYehova,
4_5_17_athabathe umbingeleli amanzi angcwele ngomphanda, athabathe umbingeleli naseluthulini olusemgangathweni womnquba, alugalele emanzini lawo.
4_5_18_Umbingeleli wommisa ke umfazi phambi koYehova, amcombulule iinwele loo mfazi, awubeke ezandleni zakhe umnikelo wokudla wenkumbuzo, umnikelo wokudla wobukhwele lowo, abe esesandleni sombingeleli amanzi obukrakra esiqalekiso;
4_5_19_umbingeleli amfungise, athi kumfazi, Ukuba akuthanga kulale ndoda nawe, nokuba akuthanga unxaxhele ebunqambini, unendoda yakho, yiba msulwa kula manzi obukrakra esiqalekiso.
4_5_20_Ke wena, xa uthe wanxaxha, unendoda yakho, xa uthe wazenza inqambi, walalwa yenye indoda engeyiyo indoda yakho:
4_5_21_umbingeli womfungisa umfazi lowo isifungo sokuzishwabulela, athi umbingeleli kumfazi, UYehova makakwenze isishwabulo, nesithuko phakathi kwabantu bakowenu, ngokuthi uYehova alintshwenyise ithanga lakho, asidumbise isisu sakho;
4_5_22_angene la manzi esiqalekiso embilinini wakho, akudumbise isisu, akuntshwenyise ithanga. Wothi loo mfazi, Amen, amen.
4_5_23_Makazibhale ezo zishwabulo umbingeleli encwadini, azicime ngaloo manzi obukrakra,
4_5_24_amseze umfazi amanzi obukrakra esiqalekiso, angene kuye amanzi esiqalekiso abe bubukrakra.
4_5_25_Wowuthabatha umbingeleli esandleni somfazi umnikelo wokudla wobukhwele, awutshangatshangise umnikelo wokudla phambi koYehova, amsondeze esibingelelweni;
4_5_26_asube umbingeleli emnikelweni wokudla isikhumbuzo sawo,  aqhumisele ngaso esibingelelweni, emveni koko amseze umfazi amanzi lawo.
4_5_27_Emsezile amanzi lawo, kothi ukuba ubezenze inqambi,  wayimenezela indoda yakhe, angene kuye amanzi esiqalekiso abe bubukrakra, sidumbe isisu sakhe, lintshwenye ithanga lakhe, lo mfazi abe sisishwabulo phakathi kwabantu bakowabo.
4_5_28_Ke ukuba lo mfazi ubengathanga azenze nqambi, uhlambulukile yena; woba msulwa, amithe.
4_5_29_Nguwo lowo umyalelo wobukhwele bokunxaxha komfazi enendoda yakhe, wazenza inqambi;
4_5_30_nokuba indoda ithe yafikelwa ngumoya wobukhwele,  yamkhweletela umkayo, yammisa umfazi phambi koYehova,  umbingeleli wawenza kuye wonke lo myalelo.
4_5_31_Yoba msulwa ke indoda yakhe kobo bugwenxa, loo mfazi abuthwale obo bugwenxa bakhe.
4_6_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_6_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Indoda, nokuba yinkazana, xa ithe yazibalulela esibhambathisweni,  esibhambathisweni sozahlulileyo, ezahlulela kuYehova,
4_6_3_wozahlula ewayinini nakwisiselo esinxilisayo, angaseli viniga yawayini, naviniga yasiselo sinxilisayo, angaseli nancindi yazidiliya, angadli zidiliya zimanzi nadiliya zomileyo;
4_6_4_yonke imihla yokuzahlula kwakhe aze angadli nto yenziweyo ngomdiliya, ethabathela ezinkozweni ese exolweni.
4_6_5_Yonke imihla yesibhambathiso sokuzahlula kwakhe, isitshetshe masingahambi entlokweni yakhe; ide izaliseke imihla azahlulele kuYehova, woba ngcwele, aziyeke iinwele zentloko yakhe, zihlume ziyakazele.
4_6_6_Yonke imihla yokuzahlulela kwakhe kuYehova, aze angasondeli kofileyo;
4_6_7_angazenzi nqambi ngoyise nangonina, ngomzalwana wakhe nangodade wabo, ekufeni kwabo; ngokuba imbasa yoThixo wakhe iphezu kwentloko yakhe.
4_6_8_Yonke imihla yokuzahlula kwakhe ungcwele kuYehova.
4_6_9_Xa kuthe kwafa ubani ngakuye ngephanyazo ngesiquphe, wayenza inqambi intloko yokuzahlula kwakhe, woyicheba intloko yakhe ngomhla wokuhlanjululwa kwakhe, ayichebe ngomhla wesixhenxe.
4_6_10_Ngomhla wesibhozo maze azise amahobe amabini, nokuba ngamagobo amabini evukuthu, kumbingeleli emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
4_6_11_Umbingeleli wolenza elinye libe lidini lesono, elinye libe lidini elinyukayo, amcamagushele, ngokokuba wonile ngofileyo;  ayingcwalise intloko yakhe ngaloo mhla.
4_6_12_Woyahlulela kuYehova imihla yokuzahlula kwakhe, azise imvana emnyaka mnye, ibe lidini letyala. Ke imihla yangaphambili ize ingabalwa, ngokuba kwaba yinqambi ukuzahlula kwakhe.
4_6_13_Nguwo lo umyalelo wozahluleyo: Ngemini yokuzaliseka kwemihla yokuzahlula kwakhe, woziswa emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
4_6_14_Aze asondeze umsondezo wakhe kuYehova, imvana emnyaka mnye egqibeleleyo, ibe nye, ibe lidini elinyukayo; nemvanazana emnyaka mnye egqibeleleyo, ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono; nenkunzi yemvu egqibeleleyo, ibe nye, ibe ngumbingelelo woxolo;
4_6_15_nengobozi yemiqhathane engenagwele yomgubo ocoliweyo,  ugalelwe ioli; nezonkana ezisicaba ezingenagwele, zithanjiswe ioli; neminikelo yawo yokudla, neminikelo yawo ethululwayo.
4_6_16_Wosondeza ke umbingeleli phambi koYehova, enze idini lakhe lesono nedini lakhe elinyukayo;
4_6_17_inkunzi yemvu ayenze umbingelelo woxolo kuYehova, kunye nengobozi yezonka ezingenagwele; awenze umbingeleli umnikelo wakhe wokudla, nomnikelo wakhe othululwayo.
4_6_18_Womcheba ozahluleyo intloko yokuzahlula kwakhe emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, athabathe iinwele zentloko yokuzahlula kwakhe, azifake emlilweni ongaphantsi kombingelelo woxolo.
4_6_19_Wowuthabatha umbingeleli umkhono ophekiweyo wenkunzi yemvu,  nomqhathane ongenagwele ube mnye engobozini, nesonkana esisicaba esingenagwele sibe sinye, azibeke ezandleni zozahluleyo, emva kokuyicheba intloko yokuzahlula kwakhe;
4_6_20_azitshangatshangise umbingeleli, zibe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova. Zingcwele ezo kumbingeleli, kunye nencum yedini lokutshangatshangisa, kunye nomlenze womrhumo. Emveni koko ozahluleyo angayisela iwayini.
4_6_21_Nguwo lowo umyalelo wozahluleyo, obhambathisa umsondezo wakhe kuYehova ngenxa yokuzahlula kwakhe, ngaphandle koko sinokufikelela kuko isandla sakhe; ngokwesibhambathiso sakhe abesibhambathisile, makenjenjalo ngokomyalelo wokuzahlula kwakhe.
4_6_22_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_6_23_Thetha kuAron nakoonyana bakhe, uthi, Ize nenjenje ukubasikelela oonyana bakaSirayeli, nithi kubo,
4_6_24_Makakusikelele uYehova, akugcine;
4_6_25_Makabukhanyise uYehova ubusobakhe kuwe, akubabale;
4_6_26_Makabuphakamisele uYehova ubuso bakhe kuwe, akunike uxolo.
4_6_27_Mabalibeke ke igama lam phezu koonyana bakaSirayeli; mna ndiya kubasikelela.
4_7_1_Kwathi, mini uMoses wagqiba ukuwumisa umnquba,  nokuwuthambisa nokuwungcwalisa wona, nempahla yawo yonke,  nokusithambisa nokusingcwalisa isibingelelo neempahla zaso zonke,
4_7_2_izikhulu zakwaSirayeli eziziintloko zeendlu zooyise,  ezizizikhulu zezizwe ezibe zisongamela ababalwayo, zasondeza iminikelo.
4_7_3_Zawuzisa umnikelo wazo phambi koYehova, iinqwelo ezinophahla zantandathu, neenkomo zalishumi elinambini: yayinqwelo kwizikhulu ezibini, yayinkomo kwisikhulu esinye; zazisondeza phambi komnquba.
4_7_4_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_7_5_Zithabathe kuzo zibe zezokusebenza umsebenzi wentente yokuhlangana, uzinike abaLevi, elowo ngokomsebenzi wakhe.
4_7_6_Wazithabatha ke uMoses iinqwelo neenkomo, wazinika abaLevi.
4_7_7_Ezimbini iinqwelo neenkomo ezine wazinika oonyana bakaGershon ngokomsebenzi wabo;
4_7_8_ezine iinqwelo neenkomo ezisibhozo wazinika oonyana bakaMerari ngokomsebenzi wabo, esandleni sikaItamare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli.
4_7_9_Ke oonyana bakaKehati akabanikanga nto, ngokuba umsebenzi wengcwele obuphezu kwabo bebewuthwala ngegxalaba bona.
4_7_10_Zasondeza izikhulu iminikelo yokusungulwa kwesibingelelo mini sathanjiswa, zawusondeza izikhulu umnikelo wazo phambi kwesibingelelo.
4_7_11_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Soba sinye isikhulu ngemini, soba sinye isikhulu ngemini, ukusondeza umsondezo waso, ukusisungula isibingelelo.
4_7_12_Owawusondezayo umsondezo wakhe ngemini yokuqala waba nguNashon unyana ka-Aminadabhi, wesizwe sakwaYuda.
4_7_13_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_14_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_15_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_16_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_17_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaNashon, unyana ka-Aminadabhi.
4_7_18_Ngemini yesibini kwasondeza uNataniyeli unyana kaTsuhare,  inkulu yakwaIsakare.
4_7_19_Wasondeza umsondezo wakhe, waba sisitya esinye sesilivere,  bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_20_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_21_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo.
4_7_22_Yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_23_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaNataniyeli, unyana kaTsuhare.
4_7_24_Ngemini yesithathu kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaZebhulon,  uEliyabhi, unyana kaHelon.
4_7_25_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele, ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_26_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_27_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_28_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_29_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaEliyabhi, unyana kaHelon.
4_7_30_Ngemini yesine kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaRubhen,  uElitsure unyana kaShedeyure.
4_7_31_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_32_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_33_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_34_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_35_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaElitsure, unyana kaShedeyure.
4_7_36_Ngemini yesihlanu kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaSimon,  uShelumiyeli, unyana kaTsurishadayi.
4_7_37_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_38_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_39_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_40_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_41_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaShelumiyeli, unyana kaTsurishadayi.
4_7_42_Ngemini yesithandathu kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaGadi,  uEliyasafu, unyana kaDehuweli.
4_7_43_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_44_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_45_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_46_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_47_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaEliyasafu, unyana kaDehuweli.
4_7_48_Ngemini yesixhenxe kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaEfrayim,  uElishama unyana ka-Amihudi.
4_7_49_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere, esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_50_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso; yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo,
4_7_51_yanye inkunzi yemvu, yanye imvana emnyaka mnye zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_52_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_53_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaElishama, unyana ka-Amihudi.
4_7_54_Ngemini yesibhozo kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaManase,  uGamaliyeli, unyana kaPedatsure.
4_7_55_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere, esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_56_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_57_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_58_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_59_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaGamaliyeli, unyana kaPedatsure.
4_7_60_Ngemini yesithoba kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaBhenjamin,  uAbhidan unyana kaGidiyoni.
4_7_61_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere, esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_62_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_63_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_64_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_65_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo ka-Abhidan, unyana kaGidiyoni.
4_7_66_Ngemini yeshumi kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaDan,  uAhiyezere, unyana ka-Amishadayi.
4_7_67_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere, esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_68_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_69_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_70_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_71_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo ka-Ahiyezere, unyana ka-Amishadayi.
4_7_72_Ngemini yeshumi elinanye kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana baka-Ashere, uPagiyeli unyana kaOkran.
4_7_73_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_74_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi, luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_75_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_76_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_77_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo kaPagiyeli, unyana kaOkran.
4_7_78_Ngemini yeshumi elinambini kwasondeza inkulu yoonyana bakaNafetali, UAhira, unyana kaEnana.
4_7_79_Umsondezo wakhe waba sisitya esinye sesilivere, bulikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele ubunzima baso; sasinye isitya sokutshiza sesilivere, esiziishekele ezimashumi asixhenxe ngokweshekele yengcwele, zozibini zizele ngumgubo ocoliweyo womnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli;
4_7_80_lwalunye ukhamba lwegolide oluziishekele ezilishumi luzele sisiqhumiso;
4_7_81_yanye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, yanye inkunzi yemvu,  yanye imvana emnyaka mnye, zizezedini elinyukayo ke ezo;
4_7_82_yanye inkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yedini lesono;
4_7_83_ezombingelelo woxolo zambini iinkomo, zantlanu iinkunzi zezimvu, zantlanu iibhokhwe, zantlanu iimvana ezimnyaka mnye.  Nguwo lowo umsondezo ka-Ahira, unyana kaEnan.
4_7_84_Kuko oko ukusungulwa kwesibingelelo, mini sathanjiswa zizikhulu zakwaSirayeli. Zaba lishumi elinazibini izitya zesilivere, zalishumi elinazibini izitya zokutshiza zesilivere,  zalishumi elinambini iinkamba zegolide.
4_7_85_Salikhulu elinamanci mathathu eeshekele isitya sesilivere sisinye, sangamashumi osixhenxe eeshekele isitya sokutshiza sisinye; iyonke isilivere yezo mpahla yaba ngamawaka amabini,  anamakhulu mane, ngokweshekele yengcwele.
4_7_86_Zaba lishumi elinambini iinkamba zegolide, zizele sisiqhumiso, zalishumi iishekele kukhamba lulunye ngokweshekele yengcwele; iyonke igolide yeenkamba yaba likhulu elinamanci mabini.
4_7_87_Zizonke iinkomo zedini elinyukayo zaba ziinkunzi ezintsha ezilishumi elinambini, neenkunzi zezimvu zabalishumi elinambini, neemvana ezimnyaka mnye zaba lishumi elinambini,  neminikelo yazo yokudla; neenkunzi zeebhokhwe ezixhonti zedini lesono zaba lishumi elinambini.
4_7_88_Zonke iinkomo zombingelelo woxolo zaye zingamashumi omabini anane, iinkunzi ezintsha, neenkunzi zezimvu zaba ngamashumi omathandathu, neebhokhwe zaba ngamashumi omathandathu, neemvana ezimnyaka mnye zaba ngamashumi omathandathu. Kuko oko ukusungulwa kwesibingelelo, emveni kokuthanjiswa kwaso.
4_7_89_Ke ekungeneni kukaMoses ententeni yokuhlangana, ukuba athethe naye, weva izwi lithetha kuye, livela esihlalweni sokucamagusha esiphezu kwetyeya yesingqino, phakathi kweekerubhi zombini; wathetha ke yena kuye.
4_8_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_8_2_Thetha kuAron, uthi kuye, Ekuzimiseni kwakho izibane,  mazikhanyise zibhekise phambili, phambi kwesiphatho sezibane,  izibane zosixhenxe.
4_8_3_Wenjenjalo uAron; wazimisa izibane zaso zabhekisa phambili,  phambi kwesiphatho sezibane, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_8_4_Kuko oku ukusetyenzwa kwesiphatho; saba yigolide ekhandiweyo, kwasa esikhondweni saso, kwasa ezintyantyambeni zaso, ingumkhando wona; ngokomfuziselo uYehova awambonisa wona uMoses wasenjenjalo isiphatho.
4_8_5_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_8_6_Thabatha abaLevi phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli,  ubahlambulule.
4_8_7_Wenjenje ke ukubahlambulula; bafefe ngamanzi esono,  bahambise isitshetshe sokunquthula enyameni yabo yonke,  bahlambe iingubo zabo, bahlambuluke.
4_8_8_Baze bathabathe inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, nomnikelo wayo wokudla, umgubo ocoliweyo ugalelwe ioli; uthabathe eyesibini inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo yedini lesono.
4_8_9_Wobasondeza abaLevi phambi kwentente yokuhlangana, ubizele ndawonye lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli;
4_8_10_ubasondeze abaLevi phambi koYehova, bacinezele oonyana bakaSirayeli ngezandla zabophezu kwabaLevi;
4_8_11_abatshangatshangise uAron abaLevi, babe ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova, ovela koonyana bakaSirayeli; babe ngabokusebenza umsebenzi kaYehova.
4_8_12_AbaLevi bocinezela ngezandla zabo phezu kweentloko zeenkunzi ezintsha ezo; enye uyenze idini lesono, enye idini elinyukayo kuYehova, ukucamagushela abaLevi.
4_8_13_Uze ubamise ke abaLevi phambi koAron naphambi koonyana bakhe, ubatshangatshangise, babe ngumtshangatshangiso kuYehova;
4_8_14_ubahlule abaLevi koonyana bakaSirayeli, babe ngabam abaLevi.
4_8_15_Emveni koko bongena abaLevi, basebenze ententeni yokuhlangana; ubahlambulule ke, ubatshangatshangise, babe ngumtshangatshangiso.
4_8_16_Ngokuba ndibanikiwe ndabanikwa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, ndabathabathela kum esikhundleni sabo bonke abavula isizalo, amazibulo onke koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_8_17_Ngokuba ngawam onke amazibulo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, ebantwini nasezinkomeni; mini ndawabetha onke amazibulo ezweni laseYiputa, ndawangcwalisela kum.
4_8_18_Ndathabatha abaLevi esikhundleni samazibulo onke, phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_8_19_AbaLevi ke ndibanike ndabanika uAron noonyana bakhe phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba basebenze umsebenzi woonyana bakaSirayeli ententeni yokuhlangana, babacamagushele oonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuzekungabikho sibetho phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli ekusondeleni koonyana bakaSirayeli engcweleni.
4_8_20_Benza ke ooMoses noAron nebandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli kubaLevi; ngako konke uYehova awamwisela umthetho uMoses ngabo abaLevi, benjenjalo kubo oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_8_21_Bazihlambulula isono abaLevi, bahlamba iingubo zabo; uAron wabatshangatshangisa, baba ngumtshangatshangiso phambi koYehova; uAron wabacamagushela ukuba bahlambuluke.
4_8_22_Emveni koko bangena abaLevi, ukuba basebenze umsebenzi wabo ententeni yokuhlangana, phambi koAron naphambi koonyana bakhe.  Njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses ngabaLevi,  benjenjalo kubo.
4_8_23_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_8_24_Nantsi indawo eyeyabaLevi: bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini anesihlanu ezelwe, banyuse, mabeze kuphuma umkhosi wokusebenza ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_8_25_Bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mahlanu ezelwe, bobuya ekuphumeni umkhosi wokusebenza, bangabi sasebenza.
4_8_26_Ke mabasebelungiselela abazalwana babo ententeni yokuhlangana, ngokuthi bagcine isigxina, bangasebenzi msebenzi.  Uya kwenjenjalo kubaLevi ezigxineni zabo.
4_9_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses entlango yaseSinayi, ngomnyaka wesibini wokuphuma kwabo ezweni laseYiputa, ngenyanga yokuqala,  esithi,
4_9_2_Oonyana bakaSirayeli mabayenze ipasika ngexesha layo elimisiweyo.
4_9_3_Noyenza ngomhla weshumi elinesine kuloo nyanga, lakutshona ilanga, ngexesha layo elimisiweyo. Noyenza ngokwemimiselo yayo yonke, nangokwamasiko ayo onke.
4_9_4_Wathetha ke uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba bayenze ipasika.
4_9_5_Bayenza ke ipasika ngenyanga yokuqala, ngomhla weshumi elinesine, lakutshona ilanga, entlango yaseSinayi. Njengako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho uMoses, benjenjalo oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_9_6_Ke kwakukho amadoda awayethe azenza iinqambi ngomntu ofileyo, akaba nako ukuyenza ipasika ngaloo mhla. Asondela phambi koMoses naphambi koAron ngaloo mhla;
4_9_7_athi loo madoda kuye, Siziinqambi ngomntu ofileyo; sivalelwa ngani na, ukuba singasondezi umsondezo kaYehova ngexesha lawo elimisiweyo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli?
4_9_8_Wathi uMoses kuwo, Yimani, khe ndive ukuba uYehova wowisa mtetho mni nangani.
4_9_9_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_9_10_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Umntu ngomntu, xa athe wayinqambi ngofileyo, mhlawumbi waseluhambeni ehambele kude,  engowakuni, nokuba ngowezizukulwana zenu, woyenza ipasika kuYehova.
4_9_11_Boyenza ngenyanga yesibini, ngomhla weshumi elinesine,  lakutshona ilanga, kunye nezonka ezingenagwele bayidle inemithana ekrakra;
4_9_12_bangasalisi nto kuyo kude kuse, bangaphuli thambo layo.  Boyenza ngokommiselo wonke wepasika.
4_9_13_Ke umntu lowo uhlambulukileyo yena, ungekhona eluhambeni,  ethe wayeka ukuyenza ipasika, loo mphefumlo wonqanyulwa,  ungabikho ebantwini bakowawo; ngokuba akawusondezanga umsondezo kaYehova ngexesha lawo elimisiweyo. Loo mntu wosithwala isono sakhe.
4_9_14_Umphambukeli, xa athe waphambukela kuni, woyenza ipasika kuYehova; ngokommiselo wepasika nangokwesiko layo woyenjenjalo;  ummiselo woba mnye kuni, nakumphambukeli, nakozalelwe kulo ilizwe.
4_9_15_Ngomhla wokumiswa komnquba, ilifu lawusibekela umnquba wentente yesingqino; ngokuhlwa lanjengembonakalo yomlilo phezu komnquba, kwada kwasa.
4_9_16_Kwahlala kunjalo; ilifu lawusibekela emini, laba yimbonakalo yomlilo ebusuku.
4_9_17_Kube kusithi, linganyuka ilifu lisuke phezu kwentente,  emveni koko banduluke oonyana bakaSirayeli; kuthi endaweni elithe zinzi kuyo ilifu, bamise iintente khona oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_9_18_Ngokomlomo kaYehova banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli,  ngokomlomo kaYehova bamisa; yonke imihla elathi zinzi ngayo ilifu phezu komnquba, bamisa.
4_9_19_Lakolula ilifu imihla emininzi lihleli phezu komnquba,  basigcina isigxina sikaYehova oonyana bakaSirayeli, abanduluka.
4_9_20_Kwathi, lakubakho ilifu phezu komnquba nokuba yimihla embalwa, basigcina isigxina sikaYehova, abanduluka. Ngokomlomo kaYehova bamisa, ngokomlomo kaYehova banduluka.
4_9_21_Kube kusithi lakubakho ilifu ngokuhlwa kude kuse,  lakunyuswa ke ilifu kwakusa, banduluke; nokubabekusemini,  nokuba bekusebusuku, lakunyuswa ilifu, banduluka.
4_9_22_Nokuba yimihla emibini, nokuba yinyanga, nokuba yimihla ethile ukolula kwelifu phezu komnquba, ukuthi zinzi kwalo phezu kwawo, bamisa oonyana bakaSirayeli, abanduluka; ekunyukeni kwalo ke banduluka.
4_9_23_Ngokomlomo kaYehova bamisa, ngokomlomo kaYehova banduluka.  Basigcina isigxina sikaYehova ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngesandla sikaMoses.
4_10_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_10_2_Zenzele amaxilongo esilivere ekhandiweyo, abe mabini, abe ngawokubiza ibandla, nokundulula iminquba.
4_10_3_Kwakuvuthelwa ixilongo kuqutshwa, lozihlanganisela kuwe lonke ibandla emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
4_10_4_Ukuba kuthe kwavuthelwa ixilongo, kwaqutshwa ngakanye,  zozihlanganisela kuwe izikhulu, iintloko zamawaka akwaSirayeli.
4_10_5_Nakuvuthela nolule, yonduluka iminquba emise iintente ngasempumalanga.
4_10_6_Nakuvuthela nolule okwesibini, yonduluka iminquba emise ngasezantsi; bovuthela bolule ukuba induluke.
4_10_7_Ekusibizeleni ndawonye isikhungu, novuthela niquphe,  ningavutheli nolule.
4_10_8_Bovuthela ngamaxilongo oonyana baka-Aron ababingeleli, ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade kunikwi zizukulwana zenu.
4_10_9_Xa nithe naya kulwa ezweni lenu nombandezeli onibandezelayo, navuthela ngamaxilongo nolula, nokhunjulwa phambi koYehova uThixo wenu, nisindiswe ezintshabeni zenu.
4_10_10_Ngomhla wovuyo lwenu, nangamaxesha enu amisiweyo,  nasekuthwaseni kweenyanga zenu, novuthela niquphe ngamaxilongo phezu kwamadini enu anyukayo, naphezu kwemibingelelo yenu yoxolo, ibe sisikhumbuzo senu phambi koThixo wenu: ndinguYehova uThixo wenu.
4_10_11_Kwathi ngomnyaka wesibini, ngenyanga yesibini,  ngolwamashumi omabini enyangeni leyo, lenyuswa lemka ilifu phezu komnquba wesingqino.
4_10_12_Banduluka ke oonyana bakaSirayeli ngokweehambo zabo entlango yaseSinayi; lathi zinzi ilifu entlango yaseParan.
4_10_13_Banduluka ekuqaleni ngokomlomo kaYehova, ngesandla sikaMoses.
4_10_14_Kuqala ke kwanduluka ibhanile yeminquba yoonyana bakaYuda,  ngokwemikhosi yabo; inguNashon, unyana ka-Aminadabhi,
4_10_15_phezu komkhosi wakhe; phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaIsakare inguNataniyeli, unyana kaTsuhare;
4_10_16_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaZebhulon inguEliyabhi,  unyana kaElon.
4_10_17_Wawiswa umnquba; banduluka ke oonyana bakaGershon noonyana bakaMerari, bewuthwele umnquba.
4_10_18_Yanduluka ibhanile yeminquba yoonyana bakaRubhen ngokwemikhosi yabo; phezu komkhosi wakhe inguElitsure, unyana kaShedeyure;
4_10_19_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaSimon inguShelumiyeli,  unyana kaTsurishadayi;
4_10_20_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaGadi inguEliyasafu,  unyana kaDehuweli.
4_10_21_Anduluka amaKehati, ethwele ingcwele. Babesithi ke abaya bawumise umnquba engekafiki wona.
4_10_22_Yanduluka ibhanile yeminquba yoonyana bakaEfrayim,  ngokwemikhosi yabo; phezu komkhosi wakhe inguElishama, unyana ka-Amihude;
4_10_23_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaManase inguGamaliyeli,  unyana kaPedatsure;
4_10_24_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaBhenjamin inguAbhidan,  unyana kaGidiyoni.
4_10_25_Yanduluka ibhanile yeminquba yonyana bakaDan, umqoshelisi weminquba yonke ngokwemikhosi yayo; phezu komkhosi wakhe inguAhiyezere, unyana ka-Amishadayi;
4_10_26_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana baka-Ashere inguPagiyeli,  unyana kaOkran;
4_10_27_phezu komkhosi wesizwe soonyana bakaNafetali inguAhira,  unyana kaEnana.
4_10_28_Kuko oko ukunduluka koonyana bakaSirayeli; banduluka ke ngokwemikhosi yabo.
4_10_29_Wathi uMoses kuHobhabhi, unyana kaRehuweli, umMidiyan,  uyise womkaMoses, Thina siyanduluka; siya endaweni athe uYehova, Ndiya kuninika yona. Hamba nathi, sokwenzela okulungileyo; ngokuba uYehova uthethe okulungileyo ngoSirayeli.
4_10_30_Wathi yena kuye, Andiyi kuhamba; ndiya kuya ezweni lakowethu, kwelokuzalwa kwam.
4_10_31_Wathi, Musa ukusishiya kaloku, ngenxa enokuba nguwe owaziyo apho singalalisa khona entlango; yibangamehlo ethu.
4_10_32_Kothi, xa uthe wahamba nathi, kothi oko kulunga uYehova asenzela kona, sikwenzele kona nawe.
4_10_33_Banduluka ke entabeni kaYehova uhambo lwemihla emithathu,  ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova ihamba phambi kwabo uhambo lwemihla emithathu, ukubahlolela indawo abangalalisa kuyo.
4_10_34_Ilifu likaYehova laba phezu kwabo emini, ekundulukeni kwabo eminqubeni.
4_10_35_Kube kusakuthi ekundulukeni kwetyeya, athi uMoses, Vuka,  Yehova; zichithachithe iintshaba zakho, basabe phambi kwakho abakuthiyayo:
4_10_36_kuthi ekulaliseni kwawo athi, Buyela, Yehova, kumawaka amawaka akwaSirayeli.
4_11_1_Abantu babenjengabakhalazela ububi ezindlebeni zikaYehova.  Weva uYehova, wavutha umsindo wakhe, watsha umlilo kaYehova phakathi kwabo, wadla esiphelweni seminquba.
4_11_2_Bakhala abantu kuMoses; wathandaza uMoses kuYehova, wadamba umlilo.
4_11_3_Wathi igama laloo ndawo yiTabhera: ngokuba watsha umlilo kaYehova phakathi kwabo.
4_11_4_Indibandiba ephakathi kwabo yakhanuka ikhanukile; babuya balila oonyana bakaSirayeli, bathi, Ngubanina oya kusinika inyama sidle.
4_11_5_Sikhumbula iintlanzi esibe sizidla eYiputa ngelize,  kwaneekomkomere, neevatala, neelike, namatswele, nekinofile.
4_11_6_Kungoku umphefumlo wethu womile; akukho nento, yile mana yodwa emehlweni ethu.
4_11_7_Imana leyo ibinjengeenkozo zekoriyandire; ukubonakala kwayo bekunjengokubonakala kwebhedolaki.
4_11_8_Babesithi saa abantu, bayibuthe, bayisile ematyeni, okunye bayingqushe ngezingqusho, bayipheke ngeembiza, benze amaqebengwana ngayo; isongo sayo saye sinjengesongo sesonkana esigalelwe ioli.
4_11_9_Ukuhla kombethe eminqubeni ebusuku, ibisithi ihle nayo imana kuyo.
4_11_10_Wabeva uMoses abantu belila ngokwemizalwane yabo, elowo emnyango wentente yakhe. Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kunene;  kwakubi nasemehlweni kaMoses.
4_11_11_Wathi uMoses kuYehova, Yinina ukuba umphathe kakubi,  umkhonzi wakho lo? Yini na ukuba ndingababalwa nguwe, usuke uwubeke umthwalo waba bantu bonke phezu kwam?
4_11_12_Ndim na obakhawuleyo aba bantu bonke? Ndim na obazeleyo,  ukuba uthi kum, Bathwale ngesifuba sakho, njengomondli ethwele umntwana owanyayo, ndibase emhlabeni owawufungela ooyise?
4_11_13_Ndoyizuza phi na inyama, ndibanike bonke aba bantu?  Ngokuba balila kum, besithi, Sinike inyama sidle.
4_11_14_Andinako mna ukubathwala aba bantu ndedwa, ngokuba kunzima oko kum.
4_11_15_Ukuba undenjenjalo, sewundibulala kanye, ukuba undibabale;  mandingabuboni ububi bam.
4_11_16_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Hlanganisela kumamadoda abe ngamashumi osixhenxe kumadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli, owaziyo ukuba ngamadoda amakhulu abantu, ababhali babo; uwazise ententeni yokuhlangana, eme khona nawe.
4_11_17_Ndiya kuhla, ndithethe nawe khona, ndicaphule kumoya okuwe, ndibeke kuwo, awuthwale nawe umthwalo wabantu aba,  ungawuthwali wedwa wena.
4_11_18_Yithi ebantwini, Zingcwaliseleni ingomso, nodla inyama;  kuba nililile ezindlebeni zikaYehova, nisithi, Ngubani na oya kusinika inyama sidle; ngokuba kwakumnandi kuthi eYiputa.  UYehova uya kuninika ke inyama nidle.
4_11_19_Aniyi kuyidla mhla mnye, namihla mibini, namihla mihlanu,  namihla ilishumi, namihla imashumi mabini;
4_11_20_nodla inyanga iphela, ide iphume ngeempumlo zenu, ibe lubhokra kuni; ngenxa enokuba nimcekisile uYehova ophakathi kwenu, nalila phambi kwakhe, nisithi, Saphumelani na eYiputa?
4_11_21_Wathi uMoses, Ngumqikela ongamakhulu omathandathu amawaka abantu endiphakathi kwabo; ke uthi wena. Ndiya kubanika inyama,  badle inyanga iphela.
4_11_22_Impahla emfutshane neenkomo ziya kuxhelelwa bona na,  zibalingane? Ziya kuhlanganiselwa bona nazonke iintlanzi zolwandle, zibalingane?
4_11_23_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Isandla sikaYehova sifutshane na?  Ngoku uya kubona ukuba ilizwi lam liya kwenzeka, aliyi kwenzeka, kusini na.
4_11_24_Waphuma uMoses, wawathetha ebantwini amazwi kaYehova,  wawahlanganisa amadoda amashumi osixhenxe kumadoda amakhulu abantu, wawamisa aba sisangqa ententeni.
4_11_25_Wehla uYehova ngelifu, wathetha kuye, wacaphula kumoya okuye, wawubeka kumadoda amakhulu angamashumi osixhenxe;  kwathi, xa wahlalayo umoya phezu kwawo, aprofeta, akaphinda kodwa.
4_11_26_Ke kaloku kwasala amadoda amabini eminqubeni, igama lenye linguElidade, igama leyesibini linguMedade; wahlala umoya phezu kwawo; aba kwababhalwayo wona, kodwa akaphumanga aye ententeni;  aprofeta eminqubeni.
4_11_27_Kwagidima umfana, waxelela uMoses, wathi, OoElidade noMedade bayaprofeta eminqubeni phaya.
4_11_28_Waphendula uYoshuwa unyana kaNun, umlungiseleli kaMoses,  wakwabanyuliweyo bakhe, wathi, Nkosi yam, Moses, bathintele.
4_11_29_Wathi uMoses kuye, Unekhwele ngenxa yam na? Akwaba bonke abantu bakaYehova babengabaprofeti, waba uYehova ubeke uMoya wakhe kubo!
4_11_30_Wabuya uMoses, waya eminqubeni, yena namadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli.
4_11_31_Kwesuka umoya kuYehova, waguqula izagwityi elwandle,  wazithi saa eminqubeni, zaba ngangohambo lwemini ngapha, zaba ngangohambo lwemini ngapha, zajikeleza iminquba;  zangangeekubhite zombini, ukuphakama phezu komhlaba.
4_11_32_Besuka ke abantu yonke loo mini, bonke ubusuku, yonke imini yengomso, bazibutha izagwityi. Owabutha kancinane wabutha iihomere ezilishumi; bamana ukuzaneka, bajikelezisa eminqubeni.
4_11_33_Yathi inyama leyo isesemazinyweni abo, ingekahlafunwa,  wavutha umsindo kaYehova kubo abantu, wababetha uYehova abantu ngesibetho esikhulu kunene.
4_11_34_Kwathiwa igama laloo ndawo yiKibroti-hatahava; ngokuba bangcwatyelwa khona abantu abakhanukayo.
4_11_35_Banduluka abantu eKibroti-hatahava, baya eHatseroti, baba seHatseroti.
4_12_1_Bathetha ooMiriyam noAron ngoMoses ngenxa yendawo yenkazana engumKushikazi abeyizekile: ngokuba wayezeke inkazana engumKushikazi.
4_12_2_Bathi, UYehova uthethe ngoMoses yedwa yini na? Akathethanga nangathi na? Weva uYehova.
4_12_3_Ke indoda le inguMoses ibilulamile kunene kunabantu bonke abasemhlabeni.
4_12_4_Wathetha uYehova ngesiquphe kuMoses, nakuAron, nakuMiriyam,  esithi, Phumani nina nobathathu, nize ententeni yokuhlangana;  baphuma bobathathu.
4_12_5_Wehla uYehova ngomqulu welifu, wema emnyango wentente,  wabiza ooAron noMiriyam; baphuma bobabini.
4_12_6_Wathi, Khanive amazwi am. Ukuba nithe nanomprofeti kaYehova, ndozazisa kuye ngombono, ndithethe kuye ephupheni.
4_12_7_Akanjalo umkhonzi wam uMoses; unyanisekile yena endlwini yam yonke.
4_12_8_Ndiya kuthetha naye umlomo kumlomo, ngokubonakalayo,  kungabi ngantsonkotha; asikhangele yena isimilo sikaYehova.  Yini na ukuba ningoyiki ukuthetha ngomkhonzi wam uMoses?
4_12_9_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kubo, wemka yena.
4_12_10_Lemka ilifu ententeni; yini le? uMiriyam uneqhenqa njengekhephu. Wabheka uAron kuMiriyam; yini? uneqhenqa.
4_12_11_Wathi uAron kuMoses, Tarhu, nkosi yam; musa ukusibeka tyala ngesono esisenzileyo ngokumatha, sonangaso.
4_12_12_Makangaseleba njengofileyo, othi ekuphumeni kwakhe esizalweni sonina abe seledlekile isiqingatha senyama yakhe.
4_12_13_Wakhala uMoses kuYehova, esithi, Thixo, ndiyakukhunga,  khawumphilise.
4_12_14_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Ukuba uyise ubetshice ukutshica oku ebusweni bakhe, ubengayi kuva ihlazo na iintsuku ezisixhenxe?  Makavalelwe imihla ibe sixhenxe ngaphandle kweminquba, emveni koko amkelwe.
4_12_15_Wavalelwa ke uMiriyam ngaphandle kweminquba imihla esixhenxe. Abanduluka abantu, wada wamkelwa uMiriyam.
4_12_16_Emveni koko banduluka abantu eHatseroti, bamisa entlango yaseParan.
4_13_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi, Thumela amadoda, aye kuhlola ilizwe lakwaKanan, endibanike lona oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_13_2_Wothumela indoda ibe nye kwisizwe sooyise, iyileyo ibe yeyinkulu kuso.
4_13_3_Wawathuma ke uMoses, esentlango yaseParan, ngokomlomo kaYehova, onke loo madoda, eziintloko zoonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_13_4_Ngawo la amagama awo: kwisizwe sakwaRubhen, ibinguShamuwa,  unyana kaZakure;
4_13_5_kwisizwe sakwaSimon, ibinguShafati, unyana kaHori;
4_13_6_kwisizwe sakwaYuda, ibinguKalebhi, unyana kaYefune;
4_13_7_kwisizwe sakwaIsakare, ibinguIgali, unyana kaYosefu;
4_13_8_kwisizwe sakwaEfrayim, ibinguHosheya, unyana kaNun;
4_13_9_kwisizwe sakwaBhenjamin, ibinguPalti, unyana kaRafu;
4_13_10_kwisizwe sakwaZebhulon, ibinguGadiyeli, unyana kaSodi;
4_13_11_kwisizwe sakwaYosefu, esisisizwe sakwaManase, ibinguGadi,  unyana kaSusi;
4_13_12_kwisizwe sakwaDan, ibinguAmiyeli, unyana kaGemali;
4_13_13_kwisizwe sakwa-Ashere, ibinguSeture, unyana kaMikayeli;
4_13_14_kwisizwe sakwaNafetali, ibinguNabhi, unyana kaVofesi;
4_13_15_kwisizwe sakwaGadi, ibinguGehuweli, unyana kaMaki.
4_13_16_Ngawo lawo amagama amadoda awawathumayo uMoses, ukuba aye kuhlola ilizwe. UMoses wathi uHosheya, unyana kaNun,  nguYoshuwa.
4_13_17_Wawathuma ke uMoses, ukuba aye kuhlola ilizwe lakwaKanan,  wathi kuwo, Nyukani nina ngasezantsi, ngale ndlela;
4_13_18_nyukani niye entabeni, nilikhangele ilizwe ukuba linjani na, nabantu abemi kulo, ukubabomelele, bangamaphakuphaku,  kusini na; bambalwa, baninzi, kusini na;
4_13_19_ukuba linjani na ilizwe abemi kulo, lihle, libi, kusini na; ukuba injani na imizi abemi kuyo, baseminqubeni,  basezinqabeni, kusini na;
4_13_20_ukuba linjani na ilizwe elo, liyachuma, alichumi, kusini na; linemithi, alinayo, kusini na. Yomelelani, nize neziqhamo zelo zwe. Loo mihla yabe iyimihla yentlahlela yeediliya.
4_13_21_Enyuka ke, alihlola ilizwe, ethabathela entlango yaseTsin,  esa eRehobhi, ekuyeni eHamati.
4_13_22_Enyuka ngezantsi, afike eHebron; babekhona ooAhiman,  noSheshayi, noTalemayi, abenzalo ka-Anaki. Ke owaseHebron wawusewakhiwe iminyaka esixhenxe, ingekakhiwa iTsohan eYiputa.
4_13_23_Afika esihlanjeni sakwaEshekoli, anqumla khona isebe linesihloko seediliya sisinye, asithwala ngesibonda emabini;  nakwiirharnate, nakumakhiwane enjenjalo.
4_13_24_Loo ndawo kwathiwa sisihlambo sakwaEshekoli, ngenxa yesihloko eso basinqumla khona oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_13_25_Abuya ekulihloleni ilizwe ekupheleni kweentsuku ezimashumi mane.
4_13_26_Eza afika kuMoses, nakuAron, nakwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, entlango yaseParan eKadeshe; azisa ilizwi kubo,  nakwibandla lonke, ababonisa neziqhamo zelizwe elo.
4_13_27_Abaxelela athi, Safika kwelo zwe wasithuma kulo; inene,  libaleka amasi nobusi; nazi neziqhamo zalo.
4_13_28_Kodwa banamandla abantu, abemi kwelo zwe; imizi inqatyisiwe, imikhulu kunene; kananjalo sibone abenzalo ka-Anaki khona.
4_13_29_Kumi ama-Amaleki ezweni lasezantsi; amaHeti namaYebhusi nama-Amori emi ezintabeni; amaKanan emingaselwandle nangecala laseYordan.
4_13_30_Wabazolisa uKalebhi abantu phambi koMoses, wathi,  Masinyuke kwangoku, silihluthe; ngokuba siyakuleyisa kakade.
4_13_31_Ke amadoda abenyuke naye athi, Asinako ukunyuka siye kwabo bantu; ngokuba bomelele kunathi.
4_13_32_Ahambisa udaba olubi ngelo zwe abelihlolile koonyana bakaSirayeli, esithi, Ilizwe esacanda kulo silihlola, lilizwe elibadlayo abemi balo; abantu bonke esababonayo kulo babengabafo abade.
4_13_33_Sazibona khona iingxilimbela, oonyana baka-Anaki basezingxilimbeleni; sesuka emehlweni ethu saba njengemicikwane, sanjalo nasemehlweni abo.
4_14_1_Lonke ibandla laliphakamisa lalikhupha ilizwi lalo, balila abantu ungobo busuku.
4_14_2_Bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli babakrokrela ooMoses noAron;  lathi kubo lonke ibandla, Akwaba besifele ezweni laseYiputa!  Akwaba besifele nakule ntlango!
4_14_3_Yini na ukuba uYehova asizise kweli lizwe ukuze siwelikrele, abafazi nabantwana bethu babe lixhoba?  Akusilungele na kanye ukuba sibuyele eYiputa?
4_14_4_Batshono ukuthi, Masizimisele umphathi, sibuyele eYiputa.
4_14_5_Bawa ooMoses noAron ngobuso babo phambi kwesikhungu sonke sebandla loonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_14_6_UYoshuwa unyana kaNun, noKalebhi unyana kaYefune,  ababekwababelihlolile ilizwe, bazikrazula iingubo zabo.
4_14_7_Bathi kwibandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, Ilizwe esacanda kulo silihlola, lilizwe elihle kakhulu kunene.
4_14_8_Ukuba uYehova usinonelele, wosisa kwelo zwe, asinike;  lilizwe elibaleka amasi nobusi.
4_14_9_Kodwa musani ukugwilika kuYehova, musani ukuboyika abantu belo zwe nina; kuba bakukudla kwethu. Umkile umthunzi wabo kubo, uYehova unathi; musani ukoyika.
4_14_10_Ke lathi lonke ibandla mabaxulutywe ngamatye. Babonakala ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova ententeni yokuhlangana kubo bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_14_11_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Kuya kuda kube nini na bendigiba aba bantu? Kuya kuda kube nini nabengakholwa kum, kwimiqondiso yonke endiyenzileyo phakathi kwabo?
4_14_12_Ndiya kubabetha ngendyikitya yokufa, ndibagqogqe; wena ndikwenze uhlanga olukhulu olunamandla kunabo.
4_14_13_Wathi uMoses kuYehova, AmaYiputa avile ukuba ubanyusile ngamandla akho aba bantu phakathi kwawo;
4_14_14_abaxelele nokubaxelela abemi beli lizwe. Bavile nabo ukuba wena, Yehova, uphakathi kwaba bantu. Ubonakala iliso kwiliso,  wena Yehova, nelifu lakho limi phezu kwabo; uhamba phambi kwabo emqulwini welifu emini, emqulwini womlilo ebusuku.
4_14_15_Ukuba uthe wababulala aba bantu njengandoda-nye, zotsho iintlanga eziluvileyo udaba lwakho, ukuthi,
4_14_16_Kungenxa enokuba uYehova ebengenako ukubasa abobantu ezweni abebafungele lona, le nto abasikileyo entlango.
4_14_17_Kaloku amandla eNkosi makabe makhulu, njengoko wathethayo wena, wathi,
4_14_18_UYehova uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ngenceba, uxolela ubugwenxa nesikreqo, engeze amenze msulwa onetyala; uvelela ubugwenxa booyise koonyana kwesesithathu nakwesesine isizukulwana.
4_14_19_Buxolele, ndiyakukhunga, ubugwenxa baba bantu ngokobukhulu benceba yakho, njengoko ubuxoleleyo ubugwenxa baba bantu,  uthabathele eYiputa wezisa apha.
4_14_20_Wathi uYehova, Ndibaxolele ngokwelizwi lakho.
4_14_21_Noko, ndihleli nje, buya kulizalisa ihlabathi lonke ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova.
4_14_22_Amadoda onke abubonileyo ubuqaqawuli bam, nemiqondiso yam endayenzayo eYiputa nasentlango, andilingileyo ezi zihlandlo zilishumi, akaliphulaphula izwi lam,
4_14_23_wona akasayi kulibona ilizwe endalifungela ooyise; bonke abandigibileyo abasayi kulibona.
4_14_24_Ke yena umkhonzi wam uKalebhi, ngenxa enokuba ebenamoya wumbi, wakholisa ukundilandela, ndiyakumfikisa ezweni ebeye kulo, lihluthwe yimbewu yakhe.
4_14_25_Ke ama-Amaleki namaKanan emi entilini. Jikani ngomso,  ninduluke, nisinge entlango ngendlela eya eLwandle oluBomvu.
4_14_26_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_14_27_Kuya kuda kube nini na ndilithwele eli bandla lingendawo,  lona elilindikrokrelayo? Izikrokro zoonyana bakaSirayeli abandikrokrela ngazo ndizivile.
4_14_28_Yithi kubo, Ndihleli nje, utsho uYehova, inene, njengoko nithethileyo ezindlebeni zam, ndiya kwenjenjalo kuni.
4_14_29_Izidumbu zenu ziya kuwa kule ntlango; nabo bonke ababalwayo kuni ngokwenani lenu lonke, bethabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, banyuse, nina nindikrokreleyo,
4_14_30_aniyi kungena ezweni endaliphakamisela isandla sam ukuba ndinihlalise kulo, ingenguKalebhi unyana kaYefune, noYoshuwa unyana kaNun.
4_14_31_Ke usapho lwenu, ebe nisithi luya kuba lixhoba, ndiya kulungenisa lona, lulazi ilizwe enilicekisileyo.
4_14_32_Nina, izidumbu zenu ziya kuwa kule ntlango;
4_14_33_oonyana benu babe ngabalusi entlango iminyaka emashumi mane, bathwale ukuhenyuza kwenu, zide ziphele izidumbu zenu entlango.
4_14_34_Ngokwenani lemihla enalihlola ngayo ilizwe, imihla emashumi mane, umhla ube ngumnyaka, niyakubuthwala ubugwenxa benu iminyaka emashumi mane, nikwazi ukunishiya kwam.
4_14_35_Mna Yehova ndithethile; inene, le nto ndiya kuyenza kweli bandla lonke lingendawo, kwaba bahlangene ngam; baya kuphela kule ntlango, bafele kuyo.
4_14_36_Ke amadoda la abewathumile uMoses, ukuba alihlole ilizwe,  aza abuya akrokrisa lonke ibandla ngaye, ngokuhambisa udaba olubi ngalo ilizwe,
4_14_37_wona loo madoda abehambise udaba olubi ngelizwe elo, afa sisibetho eso phambi koYehova.
4_14_38_Kwasala uYoshuwa unyana kaNun, noKalebhi unyana kaYefune,  kuloo madoda abeye kulihlola ilizwe.
4_14_39_Wawathetha uMoses la mazwi kubo bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli; benza isijwili esikhulu abantu.
4_14_40_Bavuka kusasa, baya encotsheni yentaba, besithi, Sikho,  siyakunyuka siyekuloo ndawo ayithethileyo uYehova; ngokuba sonile.
4_14_41_Wathi uMoses, Yini na, le nto niwugqithayo umlomo kaYehova? Le nto ayiyi kuphumelela.
4_14_42_Musani ukunyuka, kuba uYehova akakho phakathi kwenu;  ningagxothwa ziintshaba zenu.
4_14_43_Ngokuba ama-Amaleki namaKanan akhona phambi kwenu, niya kuwa likrele; ngenxa yokuba nibuyile ekumlandeleni uYehova,  akayi kuba nani uYehova.
4_14_44_Bagxalathelana, benyuka baya encotsheni yentaba; ke yona ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova noMoses ayiphumanga phakathi kweminquba.
4_14_45_Ehla ama-Amaleki namaKanan abehleli kuloo ntaba,  abaxabela, abaqoba kwasa eHorma.
4_15_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_15_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nafika ezweni lokuhlala kwenu endininika lona,
4_15_3_nenza ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova, idini elinyukayo,  nokuba ngumbingelelo wesibhambathiso esibalulekileyo, nokuba ngowokuqhutywa yintliziyo, nokuba ngowamaxesha enu amisiweyo,  nisenza ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova, nithabatha kwiinkomo,  nokuba nithabatha kwimpahla emfutshane:
4_15_4_lowo uwusondezayo umsondezo wakhe kuYehova, wosondeza umnikelo wokudla osisahlulo seshumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo,  ugalelwe isahlulo sesine sehin yeoli;
4_15_5_nesahlulo sesine sehin yewayini yomnikelo othululwayo,  usenze ndawonye nedini elinyukayo; nokuba ngumbingelelo, ube ngowamvana-nye.
4_15_6_Nokuba ngowenkunzi yegusha, wowenza umnikelo wokudla ube zizahlulo ezibini zesishumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli esisahlulo sesithathu sehin;
4_15_7_newayini yomnikelo othululwayo, isahlulo sesithathu sehin,  uyisondeze ibe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
4_15_8_Xa uthe wenza ithole lenkomo idini elinyukayo, nokuba ngumbingelelo wesibhambathiso esibalulekileyo, nokuba ngowoxolo kuYehova:
4_15_9_wosondeza ndawonye nethole lenkomo umnikelo wokudla, ube zizahlulo ezithathu zesishumi se-efa yomgubo ocoliweyo,  ugalelwe ioli esisiqinqatha sehin.
4_15_10_Woyisondeza newayini ibe yeyomnikelo othululwayo,  esisiqingatha sehin: ukudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova;
4_15_11_kwenjiwe njalo kwinkomo enye, nokuba kukwinkunzi yemvu enye, nokuba kukwitakane legusha elinye, nelebhokhwe elinye.
4_15_12_Ngangenani enithe nalenza, niya kwenjenjalo kuyo inye,  kube ngangenani lazo.
4_15_13_Bonke abo bazalelwe kuloo ndawo baya kwenjenjalo kwezo zinto ekusondezeni kwabo ukudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
4_15_14_Xa athe waphambukela kuni umphambukeli, nokuba ngophakathi kwenu ezizukulwaneni zenu, wenza ukudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova: njengoko nenza ngako nina, uya kwenza ngakonaye.
4_15_15_Ngokubhekisele kuso isikhungu, woba mnye ummiselo kuni,  nakumphambukeli ophambukele kuni, ummiselo ongunaphakade kwizizukulwana zenu. Njengoko ninjalo nina, woba njalo umphambukeli phambi koYehova.
4_15_16_Umyalelo woba mnye, nesiko loba linye kuni,  nakumphambukeli ophambukele kuni.
4_15_17_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_15_18_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Ekufikeni kwenu ezweni elondinisa kulo,
4_15_19_kothi ekudleni kwenu isonka selizwe, nirhumele uYehova umrhumo.
4_15_20_Norhuma umrhumo womgrayo wenu wokuqala, wenziwe umqhathane; njengomrhumo wesanda, nowenjenjalo ukuwurhuma.
4_15_21_Kuwo umgrayo wenu wokuqala, nomnika uYehova umrhumo ezizukulwaneni zenu.
4_15_22_Xa nithe nalahleka, anayenza le mithetho yonke ayithethileyo uYehova kuMoses,
4_15_23_zonke izinto uYehova aniwisele umthetho ngazo ngesandla sikaMoses, kususela kumhla uYehova awawisa umthetho, nasemva koko ezizukulwaneni zenu:
4_15_24_kothi, ukuba kuthe kwenzeka into ngokulahleka, ingabonwa libandla, ibandla lonke lenze inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo,  libe linye, ibe lidini elinyukayo, ibe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova, ndawonye nomnikelo walo wokudla, nomnikelo walo othululwayo, ngokwesiko; nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye,  ibe lidini lesono;
4_15_25_alicamagushele umbingeleli lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli. Boxolelwa ke, ngokuba ibikukulahleka oku;  bawuzisile bona umsondezo wabo, ukudla kwasemlilweni kuYehova,  nedini labo lesono phambi koYehova ngenxa yokulahleka kwabo.
4_15_26_Loxolelwa ke lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli,  nomphambukeli ophambukele phakathi kwenu, ngokuba kubahlele oku abantu bonke ngokulahleka.
4_15_27_Ukuba ubani uthe wona ngokulahleka, wosondeza ibhokhwe elithokazi elimnyaka mnye, ibe lidini lesono;
4_15_28_umbingeleli acamagushele umphefumlo olahlekayo ngokona kwawo, ngokulahleka kwawo phambi koYehova. Akuwucamagushela,  woxolelwa ke.
4_15_29_Kozalwayo phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, nakumphambukeli ophambukele phakathi kwenu, woba mnye umyalelo kuni,  ngokusingisele kowenza ngokulahleka.
4_15_30_Ke yena owenza ngesandla esiphakamileyo kwabazalelwe kuloo ndawo nakubaphambukeli, yena uyamnyelisa uYehova; loo mphefumlo ke wonqanyulwa, ungabikho phakathi kwabantu bakowawo.
4_15_31_Ngokuba ulidelile ilizwi likaYehova, uwaphule nomyalelo wakhe; loo mphefumlo wonqanyulwa kanye, ubugwenxa buphezu kwawo.
4_15_32_Kwathi, oonyana bakaSirayeli besentlango, bafumana umntu etheza iinkuni ngomhla wesabatha.
4_15_33_Abo bamfumanayo etheza iinkuni, bamsondeza kuMoses nakuAron nakwibandla lonke;
4_15_34_bamfaka elugcinweni, kuba bekungekamiswa okuya kwenziwa kuye.
4_15_35_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Makabulawe afe loo mntu, limxulube ibandla lonke ngamatye, ngaphandle kweminquba.
4_15_36_Lonke ibandla lamkhuphela ngaphandle kweminquba, lamxuluba ke ngamatye. Wafa, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_15_37_Wathi uYehova kuMoses,
4_15_38_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, mabenze iintshinga emasondweni eengubo zabo, kwizizukulwana zabo,  bafake entshingeni yesondo intsontelo ebala limsi.
4_15_39_Mayibe yintshinga kuni; nithi, nakuyibona, niyikhumbule yonke imithetho kaYehova, niyenze, ningabhaduli nilandele intliziyo yenu, namehlo enu, enibe nihenyuza ngokulandela wona;
4_15_40_ukuze niyikhumbule niyenze yonke imithetho yam, nibe ngcwele kuThixo wenu.
4_15_41_NdinguYehova uThixo wenu, onikhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa,  ukuba ndibe nguThixo kuni: ndinguYehova, uThixo wenu.
4_16_1_Ke kaloku uKora, unyana kaItsare, unyana kaKehati, unyana kaLevi, noDatan noAbhiram oonyana bakaEliyabhi, no-On unyana kaPelete, oonyana bakaRubhen,
4_16_2_bathabatha amadoda angamakhulu amabini, anamanci mahlanu,  akoonyana bakaSirayeli, izikhulu zebandla ezanyulwa yintlanganiso, amadoda anodumo; bavukelana noMoses.
4_16_3_Babizelana ndawonye ngoMoses nangoAron, bathi kubo,  Nisenanele nina, ngokuba lingcwele lonke ibandla, bonke bephela; uYehova uphakathi kwabo. Yini na ukuba niziphakamise phezu kwesikhungu sikaYehova?
4_16_4_Weva uMoses, wawa ngobuso.
4_16_5_Wathetha kuKora nakwibandla lakhe lonke, esithi, Ngomso uYehova uya kwazisa ongowakhe, ongcwele, amsondeze kuye, lowo amnyulileyo womsondeza kuye.
4_16_6_Yenzani oku: zithabatheleni iingcedevu, wena Kora nebandla lakho lonke,
4_16_7_nibeke umlilo kuzo, nibeke isiqhumiso phezu kwazo phambi koYehova ngomso. Kothi, umntu athe uYehova wamnyula abe ngcwele yena; senanele nina, nyana bakaLevi.
4_16_8_Wathi uMoses kuKora, Khanive, nina nyana bakaLevi.
4_16_9_Yinto encinane na kuni, ukuba uThixo kaSirayeli anahlule kwibandla lakwaSirayeli, anisondeze kuye, ukubanisebenze umsebenzi womnquba kaYehova, nime phambi kwebandla,  nilungiselele kubo,
4_16_10_ekusondezile nje wena nabazalwana bakho bonke, oonyana bakaLevi ndawonye nawe? Nifuna kwanobubingeleli na?
4_16_11_Ninani na, wena nebandla lakho lonke, le nto nihlangana ngoYehova? Ke uAron uyintoni na yena, ukuba nimkrokrele?
4_16_12_Wathuma uMoses, wabiza uDatan noAbhiram oonyana bakaEliyabhi. Bathi, Asiyi kunyuka size.
4_16_13_Yinto encinane na le yokuba usinyuse ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi, uze kusibulala apha entlango, le nto uhlala uzenze umphathi phezu kwethu?
4_16_14_Kananjalo akusingenisanga ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi,  akusinikanga lifa lamasimi nazidiliya; uya kuwakrukra na amehlo ala madoda? Asiyi kunyuka size.
4_16_15_Wavutha kunene umsindo kaMoses, wathi kuYehova, Musa ukuwubheka umnikelo wabo wokudla. Andithabathanga ne-esile elinye kubo, andiphathanga kakubi namnye wabo.
4_16_16_Wathi uMoses kuKora, Wena nebandla lakho lonke, ze nibe phambi koYehova, wena nabo noAron, ngomso;
4_16_17_nithabathe elowo ugcedevu lwakhe, nibeke isiqhumiso phezu kwazo, nisondeze phambi koYehova, elowo abe nogcedevu lwakhe,  iingcedevu ezimakhulu mabini anamanci mahlanu; nawe noAron elowo abenogcedevu lwakhe.
4_16_18_Bathabatha ke elowo ugcedevu lwakhe, babeka umlilo kuzo,  babeka isiqhumiso phezu kwazo, bema emnyango wentente yokuhlangana noMoses noAron.
4_16_19_UKora walibizela ndawonye ngabo ibandla lonke emnyango wentente yokuhlangana. Babonakala ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova kwibandla lonke.
4_16_20_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_16_21_Zahluleni kweli bandla; ndiya kubagqibela ngephanyazo.
4_16_22_Bawa ngobuso, bathi, Thixo, Thixo woomoya benyama yonke,  kone umntu wamnye nje, unoburhalarhume kwibandla lonke na?
4_16_23_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_16_24_Thetha kwibandla, uthi, Sukani nimke ngeenxa zonke emzini kaKora noDatan noAbhiram.
4_16_25_Wesuka uMoses, waya kuDatan noAbhiram; amlandela amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli.
4_16_26_Wathetha kwibandla esithi, Mkani ezintenteni zala madoda angendawo, ningachukumisi nto iyeyawo, hleze niphetshethwe ngezono zawo zonke.
4_16_27_Benyuka ke, bemka emzini kaKora noDatan noAbhiram ngeenxa zonke. OoDatan noAbhiram bema emnyango weentente zabo, nabafazi babo, noonyana babo, neentsatshana zabo.
4_16_28_Wathi uMoses, Niya kwazi ngale nto, ukuba uYehova undithumele ukwenza yonke le misebenzi; ngokuba asiyantliziyo yam.
4_16_29_Ukuba aba bathe bafa ngokufa kwabantu bonke, nokuba bathe bavelelwa ngokuvelelwa kwabantu bonke, woba uYehova akandithumanga.
4_16_30_Ke ukuba uYehova uthe wenza isimanga, umhlaba wakhamisa umlomo wawo, wabaginya, nento yonke abanayo, behla besaphilile baya kwelabafileyo, noqonda ngoko ukuba la madoda amgibile uYehova.
4_16_31_Kwathi, ukugqiba kwakhe ukuwathetha onke la mazwi,  wacandeka umhlaba obuphantsi kwabo;
4_16_32_umhlaba wawuvula umlomo wawo, wabaginya, nezindlu zabo,  nabantu bonke bakaKora, nempahla yabo yonke.
4_16_33_Behla bona besaphilile, nento yonke abanayo, baya kwelabafileyo, umhlaba wabaselela, batshabalala, ababakho phakathi kwesikhungu.
4_16_34_Onke amaSirayeli abebangqongile abalekiswa sisithonga sesikhalo sabo; ngokuba abesithi, Hleze umhlaba usiginye nathi.
4_16_35_Kwaphuma umlilo kuYehova, wawadla amadoda angamakhulu amabini anamanci mahlanu, asondeza isiqhumiso.
4_16_36_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_16_37_Yitsho kuElazare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli, azichole iingcedevu eluvundwini, wena uwuchithachithele kude umlilo,  ngokuba zingcwele.
4_16_38_Iingcedevu zabo bonayo ngakwimiphefumlo yabo, ize nizenze izixwexwe ezicekethekileyo zokwaleka isibingelelo; ngokuba bazisondeza phambi koYehova zangcwaliswa. Zoba ngumqondiso koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_16_39_Wazithabatha ke uElazare umbingeleli iingcedevu zobhedu,  ababezisondezile abo batshiswayo, zakhandwa, zaba zezokwaleka isibingelelo.
4_16_40_Yaba sisikhumbuzo eso koonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuze kungasondeli ndoda yasemzini, ingengowembewu ka-Aron,  iqhumisele ngesiqhumiso phambi koYehova, ukuze ingabi njengoKora nanjengebandla lakhe, njengoko uYehova wathethayo kuye ngoMoses.
4_16_41_Lamkrokrela uMoses noAron ngengomso lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli, lisithi, Nina nibabulele abantu bakaYehova.
4_16_42_Kwathi ekubizelweni ndawonye kwebandla ngoMoses nangoAron,  babheka ententeni yokuhlangana. Nalo ilifu liyisibekele babonakala ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova.
4_16_43_Beza ooMoses noAron phambi kwentente yokuhlangana.
4_16_44_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_16_45_Sukani phakathi kweli bandla, ndiligqibele ngephanyazo.  Bawa ngobuso.
4_16_46_Wathi uMoses kuAron, Luthabathe ugcedevu, ubeke umlilo phezu kwalo ovela esibingelelweni, ubeke isiqhumiso, ukhawuleze uye ebandleni, ubacamagushele; kuba kuphume uburhalarhume ebusweni bukaYehova, siqalile isibetho.
4_16_47_Wathabatha ke uAron njengoko uMoses wathethayo, wabalekela phakathi kwesikhungu; naso isibetho siqalile ebantwini. Wabeka isiqhumiso, wabacamagushela abantu.
4_16_48_Wema phakathi kwabafileyo nabahleliyo; sathintelwa ke isibetho.
4_16_49_Abo bafayo sisibetho baba lishumi elinesine lamawaka anamakhulu asixhenxe, ngaphandle kwabafayo ngendawo yakwaKora.
4_16_50_Wabuyela uAron kuMoses emnyango wentente yokuhlangana;  isibetho sathintelwa ke.
4_17_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_17_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthabathe kubo iintonga:  intonga ngokwendlu yooyise, kwiinkulu zabo zonke ngokwezindlu zooyise, iintonga ezilishumi elinambini, ubhale igama lalowo nalowo entongeni yakhe.
4_17_3_Wobhala igama lika-Aron entongeni yakwaLevi; kuba yoba nye intonga yentloko yendlu yooyise.
4_17_4_Uze uzibeke ententeni yokuhlangana phambi kwesingqino, apho ndihlangana nani khona.
4_17_5_Kothi indoda endinyule yona, intonga yayo idubule;  ndikuphelise phambi kwam ukukrokra koonyana bakaSirayeli,  ababenikrokrela ngako.
4_17_6_Wathetha ke uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli; zonke iinkulu zabo zamnika iintonga nganye, intonga yanye kwinkulu,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, zalishumi elinambini iintonga. Intonga ka-Aron yabe iphakathi kweentonga zazo.
4_17_7_Wazibeka uMoses iintonga phambi koYehova, ententeni yesingqino.
4_17_8_Kwathi ngengomso, wangena uMoses ententeni yesingqino;  nantso intonga ka-Aron, wendlu kaLevi, idubule yaphuma amathupha, yatyatyamba iintyantyambo, zavuthwa iiamangile.
4_17_9_Waphuma uMoses neentonga zonke, evela kuYehova weza nazo koonyana bonke bakaSirayeli. Bakhangela, bathabatha elowo intonga yakhe.
4_17_10_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Yibuyisele intonga ka-Aron phambi kwesingqino igcinwe, ukuba ibe ngumqondiso kwabaneenkani,  ukuphelise ukukrokra kwabo phambi kwam, bangafi.
4_17_11_Wenza ke uMoses; njengoko uYehova abemwisele umthetho,  wenjenjalo.
4_17_12_Bathetha oonyana bakaSirayeli kuMoses, bathi, Yabona,  siyabhubha, siyaphela, siyaphela sonke.
4_17_13_Bonke abasondelayo, abasondela emnqubeni kaYehova, baya kufa. Siya kubhubha sigqibele na?
4_18_1_Wathi uYehova kuAron, Wena noonyana bakho, nendlu kayihlo ndawonyenawe, nobuthwala ubugwenxa obenziwe kwindawo engcwele;  wena noonyana bakho ndawonye nawe nobuthwala ubugwenxa bobubingeleli benu.
4_18_2_Kananjalo abazalwana bakho, isizwe sakwaLevi, isizwe sikayihlo, wobasondeza nawe, banamathele kuwe, balungiselele wena; wena ke, noonyana bakho ndawonye nawe, phambi kwentente yesingqino.
4_18_3_Bogcina isigxina sakho nesigxina sentente yonke; kodwa empahleni yengcwele nasesibingelelweni mabangasondeli, ukuze bangafi bona aba kwanani.
4_18_4_Bonamathela kuwe, bagcine isigxina sentente yokuhlangana emsebenzini wonke wayo intente; ke owase unzini aze angasondeli kuni.
4_18_5_Nize nigcine isigxina sengcwele nesigxina sesibingelo,  kungabuyi kubhekho burhalarhume phezu koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_18_6_Mna ke, yabona, ndibathabathile abazalwana benu, abaLevi,  phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli; nibanikiwe bangumnikelo kuYehova wokusebenza umsebenzi wentente yokuhlangana.
4_18_7_Ke wena noonyana bakho ndawonye nawe, nobugcina ububingeleli benu ezintweni zonke zesibingelelo, nangaphaya komkhusane; nisebenze umsebenzi. Ndininika ububingeleli ukuba bube ngumsebenzi eniwunikiweyo. Owasemzini osondelayo uya kubulawa.
4_18_8_Wathetha uYehova kuAron, esithi, Yabona, mna ndikunika isigxina semirhumo yam, ezintweni zonke ezingcwele zoonyana bakaSirayeli; ndisinika wena noonyana bakho sibe ngumxhesho,  sibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade.
4_18_9_Yile into eyoba yeyakho ezintweni eziyingcwele kangcwele,  ekudleni kwasemlilweni: yonke imisondezo yabo, eminikelweni yabo yokudla, nasemadinini abo onke esono, nasemadinini abo onke etyala, abayibuyisela kum, yoba ziinto eziyingcwele kangcwele kuwe nakoonyana bakho.
4_18_10_Nozidla engcweleni kangcwele; yonke into eyindoda yozidla;  zoba ngcwele kuwe.
4_18_11_Yile into eyoba yeyakho: umrhumo wesipho sabo emitshangatshangisweni yonke yoonyana bakaSirayeli ndiwunika wena, noonyana bakho, neentombi zakho ndawonye nawe, ube ngummiselo ongunaphakade. Bonke abahlambulukileyo endlwini yakho bowudla.
4_18_12_Konke ukutyeba kweoli, konke ukutyeba kwewayini entsha,  nokwengqolowa, ulibo lwezo zinto baya kuzinika uYehova,  ndikunika lona.
4_18_13_Iintlahlela zeento zonke ezisezweni labo, abazizisa kuYehova, zoba zezakho; bonke abahlambulukileyo endlwini yakho bozidla.
4_18_14_Zonke izinto ezisingelwe phantsi kwaSirayeli zoba zezakho.
4_18_15_Zonke izinto ezivula isizalo kwinyama yonke, abaya kuzisondeza kuYehova, ebantwini nasezinkomeni, zoba zezakho.  Kodwa wona amazibulo abantu wowakhulula ngokuwamisela;  amazibulo ezinto ezizitho zine eziziinqambi wowakhulula ngokuwamisela.
4_18_16_Ukukhululwa komntu ke womkhulula ngokummisela, uthabathela kumntwana onyanga-nye, ngokulinganisela kwakho isilivere yeeshekele ezintlanu ngokweshekele yengcwele, eziigera ezimashumi mabini.
4_18_17_Kodwa amazibulo eenkomo, namazibulo ezimvu, namazibulo eebhokhwe, akuyi kuwakhulula ngokuwamisela. Angcwele wona;  igazi lawo wolitshiza esibingelelweni, uqhumisele ngamanqatha awo; kukudla kwasemlilweni ke oko, livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova.
4_18_18_Inyama yawo yoba yeyakho; njengencum yomtshangatshangiso,  nanjengomlenze wasekunene, yoba yeyakho.
