4_18_19_Yonke imirhumo engcwele, abayirhumela uYehova oonyana bakaSirayeli, ndiyinika wena, noonyana bakho, neentombi zakho ndawonye nawe, ibe ngummiselo ongunaphakade; ingumnqophiso wetyuwa ongunaphakade phambi koYehova, kuwe nakwimbewu yakho ndawonye nawe.
4_18_20_Wathi uYehova kuAron, Ezweni labo akuyi kuba nalifa, akuyi kuba nasabelo phakathi kwabo; ndisisabelo sakho nelifa lakho phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_18_21_Uyabona, oonyana bakaLevi ndibanika zonke izishumi kwaSirayeli, ukuba zibe lilifa, ngenxa yomsebenzi wabo abasebenza wona, umsebenzi wentente yokuhlangana;
4_18_22_bangaphindi oonyana bakaSirayeli basondele ententeni yokuhlangana, hleze bathwale isono bafe.
4_18_23_Ke bona abaLevi bosebenza umsebenzi wentente yokuhlangana,  babuthwale ubugwenxa babo; ngummiselo ongunaphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu. Abayi kuba nalifa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_18_24_Ngokuba isishumi soonyana bakaSirayeli, abasirhumela uYehova umrhumo, ndisinika abaLevi sibe lilifa. Ngenxa yoko ndithe kubo, Mabangabi nalifa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_18_25_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_18_26_Thetha kubaLevi, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nasithabatha koonyana bakaSirayeli isishumi endininika sona, esiphuma kubo sililifa lenu, norhuma ngaso umrhumo kaYehova, ngesishumi sesishumi.
4_18_27_Wothi umrhumo wenu ubalelwe kuni uyingqolowa yasesandeni,  uyinzaliseko yasesixovulelweni.
4_18_28_Ngokunjalo nani norhuma umrhumo kaYehova ngezishumi zenu zonke enizithabathayo koonyana bakaSirayeli, nimnika uAron umbingeleli kuzo umrhumo kaYehova.
4_18_29_Eminikelweni yonke eniyinikiweyo, norhuma imirhumo yonke kaYehova; ekutyebeni kwayo konke norhuma into yakhe eyingcwele ivela kuyo.
4_18_30_Uze uthi ke kubo, Ekurhumeni kwenu ukutyeba kwayo,  kobalelwa kubaLevi, ilungeniselo lwesanda, ilungeniselo lwesixovulelo.
4_18_31_Nokudla oko ezindaweni zonke, nina nezindlu zenu; kuba ngumvuzo wenu ngenxa yomsebenzi wenu ententeni yokuhlangana.
4_18_32_Anisayi kuzithwalisa zono ngenxa yoko ekurhumeni kwenu ukutyeba kwayo okukuyo; anisayi kuzihlambela izinto ezingcwele zoonyana bakaSirayeli; anisayi kufa.
4_19_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, esithi,
4_19_2_Nguwo lo ummiselo womyalelo awumisileyo uYehova, esithi,  Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, bakuzisele ithokazi elibomvu eligqibeleleyo, elingenasiphako, ekungabekwanga dyokhwe kulo;
4_19_3_nilinike uElazare umbingeleli, alise ngaphandle kweminquba,  lixhelelwe phambi kwakhe.
4_19_4_Wocaphula ke uElazare umbingeleli egazini lalo ngomnwe wakhe, alifefe ngaphambili ententeni yokuhlangana izihlandlo ezisixhenxe;
4_19_5_litshiswe ithokazi phambi kwakhe, sitshiswe isikhumba salo,  nenyama yalo, negazi lalo, ndawonye nomswane walo.
4_19_6_Umbingeleli wothabatha ke umsedare, nehisope, nosinga olubomvu, aziphose ezo nto phakathi kokutsha kwethokazi;
4_19_7_ahlambe iingubo zakhe umbingeleli, ahlambe umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, angene emveni koko eminqubeni, abe yinqambi umbingeleli kude kuhlwe.
4_19_8_Lowo ulitshisileyo makazihlambe iingubo zakhe ngamanzi,  ahlambe umzimba ngamanzi, abe yinqambi kude kuhlwe.
4_19_9_Indoda ehlambulukileyo yoluwola uthuthu lwethokazi, ilubeke ngaphandle kweminquba endaweni emhlophe, lugcinelwe ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli, lube lolwamanzi okuhlamba ukungcola:  lidini lesono eli.
4_19_10_Oluwolayo uthuthu lwethokazi wazihlamba iingubo zakhe, abe yinqambi kude kuhlwe; kube ngummiselo ongunaphakade koonyana bakaSirayeli, nakowolunye uhlanga oluphambukele phakathi kwabo.
4_19_11_Ochukumisa ofileyo kuzo izidumbu zabantu, woba yinqambi iintsuku ezisixhenxe.
4_19_12_Wothi ngomhla wesithathu nangomhla wesixhenxe azihlambulule isono, ahlambululeke ke. Ukuba ke akathanga azihlambulule isono ngomhla wesithathu nangomhla wesixhenxe akayi kuba uhlambulukile.
4_19_13_Bonke abo bachukumisa ofileyo, isidumbu somntu,  bangazihlambululi isono, bawenza inqambi umnquba kaYehova.  Wonqunyulwa ungabikho kwaSirayeli loo mphefumlo; ngokuba engatshizwanga ngamanzi okuhlamba ukungcola phezu kwakhe, woba yinqambi; ubunqambi bakhe busekuye.
4_19_14_Nguwo lo umyalelo xa athe umntu wafela ententeni; bonke abo bangena ententeni, nabo bonke abasukuba besesententeni,  boba ziinqambi iintsuku ezisixhenxe.
4_19_15_Zonke izitya ezivulekileyo, ezingenasiciko sibotshiweyo,  ziziinqambi.
4_19_16_Bonke abasukuba bemchukumisa emaphandleni obulewe ngekrele, nokuba ngofele khona, nokuba lithambo lomntu, nokuba lingcwaba: bona boba ziinqambi iintsuku ezisixhenxe.
4_19_17_Bomcaphulela oyinqambi eluthuthwini lokutsha kwedini lesono, kubekwe phezu kwalo amanzi aphilileyo ngesitya;
4_19_18_indoda ehlambulukileyo ithabathe ihisope, iyithi nkxu emanzini, ifefe intente, neempahla zonke, nabantu ababekuyo,  nalowo uchukumise ithambo, nobuleweyo, nofileyo, nokuba ke kusengcwabeni.
4_19_19_Wofefa ohlambulukileyo koyinqambi ngomhla wesithathu nangomhla wesixhenxe, amhlambulule ke isono ngomhla wesixhenxe,  azihlambe iingubo zakhe, ahlambe umzimba ngamanzi; wohlambuluka ke ngokuhlwa.
4_19_20_Ke umntu osukuba eyinqambi, angazihlambululi isono, loo mphefumlo mawunqunyulwe phakathi kwesikhungu; ngokuba uyenze inqambi ingcwele kaYehova, akatshizwa ngamanzi okuhlamba ukungcola; uyinqambi.
4_19_21_Woba ngummiselo ongunaphakade kubo: okokuba ofefa ngamanzi okuhlamba ukungcola, makazihlambe iingubo zakhe; nalowo uchukumisa amanzi okuhlamba ukungcola woba yinqambi kude kuhlwe.
4_19_22_Yonke into asukuba eyichukumisa oyinqambi yoba yinqambi;  nomphefumlo omchukumisayo woba yinqambi kude kuhlwe.
4_20_1_Bafika oonyana bakaSirayeli, lonke ibandla, entlango yaseTsin ngenyanga yokuqala; bahlala abantu eKadeshe. Wafela khona uMiriyam, wangcwatyelwa khona.
4_20_2_Lalingenamanzi ibandla.
4_20_3_Babizelana ndawonye ngoMoses nangoAron, babambana abantu noMoses, bathi, Akwaba sibe siphume umphefumlo oko abazalwana bethu baphuma umphefumlo phambi koYehova!
4_20_4_Yini na ukuba nisingenise isikhungu sikaYehova kule ntlango, sifele kuyo, thina neenkomo zethu?
4_20_5_Yini na ukuba nisinyuse eYiputa, nisizise kule ndawo imbi kangaka? Asindawo yambewu, namakhiwane, namidiliya,  nazirharnate, tu namanzi okusela!
4_20_6_Besuka ooMoses noAron ebusweni besikhungu, baya emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, bawa ngobuso. Babonakala ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova kubo.
4_20_7_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_20_8_Yithabathe intonga, ulibizele ndawonye ibandla, wena noAron umkhuluwa wakho, nithethe engxondorheni phambi kwabo, inike amanzi ayo, ubakhuphele amanzi engxondorheni apho, uliseze ibandla neenkomo zalo.
4_20_9_Wayithabatha ke uMoses intonga ebusweni bukaYehova,  njengoko wawiswayo umthetho.
4_20_10_Wasibizela ndawonye uMoses noAron isikhungu phambi kwengxondorha leyo, wathi kubo, Khanive, nina baneenkani.  Sinikhuphele amanzi kule ngxondorha na?
4_20_11_Wasiphakamisa uMoses isandla sakhe, wayibetha ingxondorha ngentonga yakhe izihlandlo zazibini; aphuma amanzi amaninzi,  lasela ibandla neenkomo zalo.
4_20_12_Wathi uYehova kuMoses nakuAron, Ngokokuba ningakholwanga kum, ukuba nindingcwalise emehlweni oonyana bakaSirayeli, ngoko aniyi kusingenisa esi sikhungu ezweni endibanika lona.
4_20_13_Ngawo lawo amanzi aseMeribha, ababambana ngawo oonyana bakaSirayeli noYehova, waza wazingcwalisela bona.
4_20_14_UMoses wasusa izigidimi eKadeshe, zaya kuthi kukumkani wakwaEdom, Utsho umzalwana wakho uSirayeli ukuthi, Wena uyakwazi konke ukuxhamleka esafumanana nako.
4_20_15_Behla oobawo, baya eYiputa, sahlala eYiputa imihla emininzi. Asiphatha kakubi amaYiputa, thina noobawo bethu;
4_20_16_sakhala kuYehova, waliva ilizwi lethu; wathuma isithunywa,  sasikhupha eYiputa. Nanku ke siseKadeshe, umzi osekupheleni komda wakho.
4_20_17_Makhe sicande ezweni lakho. Asiyi kucanda masimini nasezidiliyeni. Asiyi kusela manzi amaqula. Sohamba ngomendo wenkosi; asiyi kuthi gu bucala siye ekunene nasekhohlo side sicande emdeni wakho.
4_20_18_Wathi uEdom kuye, Uze ungacandi kum, hleze ndiphume ndinekrele, ndikuhlangabeze.
4_20_19_Bathi oonyana bakaSirayeli kuye, Sonyuka ngomendo. Ukuba sithe sasela amanzi akho, mna nemfuyo yam, ndokuhlawulela.  Akukho nto, ndocanda nje kodwa, ndihamba ngeenyawo.
4_20_20_Wathi, Uze ungacandi. Watsho waphuma uEdom, wamhlangabeza enento eninzi yabantu, enesandla esithe nkqi.
4_20_21_Wala uEdom ukumvumela uSirayeli ukuba acande emdeni wakhe.  Wajika ke uSirayeli, wemka kuye.
4_20_22_Banduluka eKadeshe beza oonyana bakaSirayeli, ibandla lonke, entabeni yeHore.
4_20_23_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuAron entabeni yeHore, emdeni welizwe lakwaEdom, wathi,
4_20_24_UAron makahlanganiselwe kwabakowabo; ngokuba akayi kungena ezweni endilinika oonyana bakaSirayeli, ngenxa yokuba nawuphikisayo umlomo wam emanzini embambano.
4_20_25_Thabatha uAron noElazare unyana wakhe, ubanyuse entabeni yeHore;
4_20_26_umhlube uAron iingubo zakhe, uzambathise uElazare unyana wakhe. UAron wohlanganiselwa kwabakowabo, afele khona.
4_20_27_Wenza uMoses njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho;  benyuka entabeni yeHore phambi kwebandla lonke.
4_20_28_UMoses wamhluba uAron iingubo zakhe, wazambathisa uElazare unyana wakhe. Wafela khona uAron encotsheni yentaba. Wehla uMoses noElazare entabeni.
4_20_29_Lakubona lonke ibandla ukuba uAron uphume umphefumlo,  bamlilela uAron imihla emashumi mathathu, yonke indlu yakwaSirayeli.
4_21_1_Weva umKanan, ukumkani waseAradi, obehleli kwelasezantsi,  ukuba ayeza amaSirayeli ngendlela yeentlola, walwa namaSirayeli, wathimba abantu kuwo.
4_21_2_Abhambathisa amaSirayeli isibhambathiso kuYehova, athi,  Ukuba uthe wabanikela inene aba bantu esandleni sam,  ndoyisingela phantsi imizi yabo.
4_21_3_Waliva uYehova ilizwi lamaSirayeli, wamnikela umKanan lowo kuwo, wasingelwa phantsi nemizi yakhe. Kwathiwa igama laloo ndawo yiHorma.
4_21_4_Banduluka entabeni yeHore ngendlela yoLwandle oluBomvu,  ukuba bajikele ilizwe lakwaEdom; bakhathazeka abantu endleleni.
4_21_5_Bathetha abantu ngoThixo nangoMoses, bathi, Yini na ukuba nisinyuse eYiputa, size kufela entlango? Ngokuba tu isonka, tu namanzi; umphefumlo wethu ukruqukile sesi sonka sinkatshunkatshu.
4_21_6_UYehova wathuma iinyoka ezinobuhlungu ebantwini, zabaluma abantu; kwafa abantu abaninzi bakwaSirayeli.
4_21_7_Beza abantu kuMoses, bathi, Sonile, ngokuba sithethe ngoYehova nangawe; thandaza kuYehova, azisuse kuthi iinyoka ezo. Wabathandazela ke uMoses abantu.
4_21_8_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Zenzele inyoka enobuhlungu, uyixhome esibondeni eside; kothi, bonke abobalunyiweyo, bakukhangela kuyo, baphile.
4_21_9_Wenza ke uMoses inyoka yobhedu, wayixhoma esibondeni eside;  kwathi, yakuba ithe inyoka yamluma umntu, waza wabheka enyokeni yobhedu, waphila.
4_21_10_Banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli, baya bamisa iintente eObhoti.
4_21_11_Banduluka eObhoti, baya bamisa eIye-abharim, entlango ephambi kwelakwaMowabhi, ngasekuphumeni kwelanga.
4_21_12_Banduluka khona, baya bamisa esihlanjeni saseZerede.
4_21_13_Banduluka khona, baya bamisa phesheya kweArnon,  esentlango, ephuma emdeni wama-Amori; kuba iArnon ngumda wakwaMowabhi, ophakathi kwamaMowabhi nama-Amori.
4_21_14_Ngenxa yoko, kuthiwa encwadini yeemfazwe zikaYehova:  IVahebhi wayithabatha esiza ngesaqhwithi, Nezibhaxa zaseArnon,
4_21_15_Namathambeka ezibhaxa, Olukela ekhayeni laseAri, Ayame umda wakwaMowabhi.
4_21_16_Banduluka khona, baye eBhere; elo lelo qula wathi ngalo uYehova kuMoses, Hlanganisa abantu, ndibanike amanzi.
4_21_17_Oko ahlaba amaSirayeli le ngoma: Nyuka, qula; vumani kulo,
4_21_18_Kwiqula elambiwa ngabathetheli, Lagonjwa ngamanene abantu,  Ngentonga yommisi-mthetho, ngemisimelelo yawo. Banduluka entlango, baya eMatana.
4_21_19_Banduluka eMatana, baya eNahaliyeli. Banduluka eNahaliyeli, baya eBhamoti.
4_21_20_Banduluka eBhamoti, baya esihlanjeni esisemhlabeni wakwaMowabhi, baya encotsheni yePisga, ekhangele enkangala.
4_21_21_AmaSirayeli athuma izigidimi kuSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori,  esithi, Mandicande ezweni lakho;
4_21_22_asiyi kuthi gu bucala, siye emasimini nasezidiliyeni;  asiyi kusela manzi equla; siya kubamba ngomendo wenkosi, side sicande emdeni wakho.
4_21_23_Akawavumela uSihon amaSirayeli ukuba acande emdeni wakhe.  USihon wahlanganisa bonke abantu bakhe, waphuma waya kuwahlangabeza amaSirayeli entlango, wafika eYatsa, walwa namaSirayeli.
4_21_24_AmaSirayeli amxabela ngohlangothi lwekrele, alihlutha ilizwe lakhe, athabathela eArnon, esa eYabhoki, esa koonyana baka-Amon; ngokuba umda woonyana baka-Amon ubuliqele.
4_21_25_AmaSirayeli ayithabatha yonke le mizi, ahlala amaSirayeli emizini yonke yama-Amori, eHeshbhon nasemagxamesini ayo.
4_21_26_Kuba iHeshbhon ngumzi wakwaSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori,  owalwa nokumkani wakwaMowabhi wangaphambili, walihlutha lonke ilizwe lakhe kuye, kwesa eArnon.
4_21_27_Ngenxa yoko babesithi abenzi bemizekeliso: Yizani eHeshbhon, mawakhiwe uzinziswe umzi wakwaSihon;
4_21_28_Ngokuba kuphume umlilo eHeshbhon, Ilangatye emzini wakwaSihon; Wayidla iAri yakwaMowabhi, Abaninimimango baseArnon.
4_21_29_Yeha wena, Mowabhi! Nidakile, bantu bakwaKemoshe,  Ubanikele oonyana bakhe baba ngabasabi, lintombi zakhe uzinikele ekuthinjweni, KuSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori.
4_21_30_Sibatolile; idakile iHeshbhon, kwesa eDibhon;  Sababhangazisa, kwesa eNofa, Yangumlilo, kwesa eMedebha.
4_21_31_Ahlala amaSirayeli ezweni lama-Amori.
4_21_32_Wathuma uMoses ukuba iye kuhlolwa iYazere; bawathimba amagxamesi ayo, bawagqogqa ama-Amori abekhona.
4_21_33_Bajika, benyuka ngendlela yaseBhashan. Waphuma uOgi,  ukumkani waseBhashan, waya kubahlangabeza, yena nabantu bakhe bonke, ukuba kuliwee-Edreyi.
4_21_34_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Musa ukumoyika; ngokuba ndimnikele esandleni sakho, nabantu bakhe bonke, nelizwe lakhe, ukuba wenze kuye njengoko wenzayo kuSihon, unkumkani wama-Amori,  owayehleli eHeshbhon.
4_21_35_Bambulala yena noonyana bakhe, nabantu bakhe bonke, kwada akwasala usindileyo; balihlutha ilizwe lakhe.
4_22_1_Banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli, baya bamisa ezinkqantsoni zakwaMowabhi phesheya kweYordan, malunga neYeriko.
4_22_2_Wakubona uBhalaki, unyana kaTsipore, konke abekwenzile uSirayeli kuma-Amori.
4_22_3_UMowabhi wanxunguphala kakhulu ngabantu, ngokuba bebaninzi;  wakruquka uMowabhi ngoonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_22_4_Wathi uMowabhi kumadoda amakhulu akwaMidiyan, Ngoku esi sikhungu siya kukukhotha konke okungeenxa zonke kuthi, njengoko inkomo ilukhothayo uhlaza lwasendle. Ke uBhalaki, unyana kaTsipore, ubengukumkani wamaMowabhi ngelo xesha.
4_22_5_Wathuma abathunywa kuBhileham, unyana kaBhehore, ePehore,  esemlanjeni welizwe loonyana babantu bakowabo, ukuba bambize bathi, Yabona, kuphume abantu eYiputa; nabo bebugubungele ubuso belizwe, behleli malungana nam.
4_22_6_Khawuze ke, undiqalekisele aba bantu, ngokuba banamandla kunam; mhlawumbi ndingaba nako ukubabulala, ndibagxothe kweli lizwe; ngokuba ndiyazi ukuba omsikelelayo usikelelwe,  omqalekisayo uqalekisiwe.
4_22_7_Ahamba ke amadoda amakhulu akwaMowabhi, namadoda amakhulu akwaMidiyan, eneenkozo zokuvumisa ezandleni zawo, aya kuBhileham, athetha kuye amazwi kaBhalaki.
4_22_8_Wathi kuwo, Lalani apha ngobu busuku; ndoninika ilizwi,  njengoko uYehova aya kuthetha kum. Bahlala ke abathetheli abo bakwaMowabhi noBhileham.
4_22_9_Wafika uThixo kuBhileham, wathi, Angoobani na la madoda anawe apha?
4_22_10_Wathi uBhileham kuThixo, UBhalaki unyana kaTsipore,  ukumkani wamaMowabhi, uthumele kum, esithi,
4_22_11_Yabona, kuphume abantu eYiputa, babugubungela ubuso belizwe; yiza ke undiqalekisele bona, mhlawumbi ndingaba nako ukulwanabo, ndibagxothe.
4_22_12_Wathi uThixo kuBhileham, Uze ungahambi nawo,  ungabaqalekisi abo bantu, kuba basikelelwe.
4_22_13_Wavuka uBhileham kusasa, wathi kubathetheli bakaBhalaki,  Yiyani ezweni lenu; ngokuba uYehova uyala ukundivumela ndihambe nani.
4_22_14_Besuka ke abathetheli bakwaMowabhi, baya kuBhalaki, bathi,  Walile uBhileham ukuza nathi.
4_22_15_Waphinda uBhalaki, wathuma abathetheli bebaninzi,  bebekekile kunabo.
4_22_16_Bafika ke kuBhileham, bathi kuye, Utsho uBhalaki, unyana kaTsipore, ukuthi, Musa ukukha unqandwe nto ukuza kum;
4_22_17_kuba ukukuzukisa kona ndiya kukuzukisa kunene, ndikwenze konke ondixelela kona; khawuze undiqalekisele aba bantu.
4_22_18_Waphendula uBhileham, wathi kubakhonzi bakaBhalaki,  Angafanelana uBhalaki endinika indlu yakhe izele yisilivere negolide, andinako ukuwugqitha umlomo kaYehova, uThixo wam,  ndenze okuncinane nokuba kokukhulu.
4_22_19_Khanihlale apha ke nani ngobu busuku, udide ndiyazi into aya kuyongeza uYehova, ayithethe kum.
4_22_20_Wafika uThixo kuBhileham ebusuku, wathi kuye, Ukuba la madoda afike kuwe eza kukubiza, suka uhambe nawo; ke ilizwi endolithetha kuwe, uze wenze lona lodwa.
4_22_21_Wavuka uBhileham kusasa, wayibopha imazi yakhe ye-esile,  wahamba nabathetheli abo bakwaMowabhi.
4_22_22_Wavutha umsindo kaThixo, ngokuba wahambayo. Sema isithunywa sikaYehova endleleni ukuba simchase. Wayekhwele e-esileni lakhe, enamadodana akwakhe omabini.
4_22_23_Iesile lasibona isithunywa sikaYehova simi endleleni,  sirhole ikrele laso ngesandla saso, lathi gu bucala iesile endleleni, laya entsimini. UBhileham walibetha iesile,  elisongela endleleni.
4_22_24_Sema isithunywa sikaYehova engxingweni yezidiliya,  iludonga ngapha, iludonga ngapha.
4_22_25_Iesile lasibona isithunywa sikaYehova, lagudla udonga,  lalugudla unyawo lukaBhileham ngodonga; waphinda walibetha.
4_22_26_Saphinda sagqitha isithunywa sikaYehova, sema endaweni exineneyo, apho bekungekho ndlela yakucezela ekunene nasekhohlo.
4_22_27_Iesile lasibona isithunywa sikaYehova, lasadalala phantsi koBhileham. Wavutha umsindo kaBhileham, walibetha iesile ngentonga.
4_22_28_Wawuvula ke uYehova umlomo we-esile, lathi kuBhileham,  Ndikwenze ntoni na, ukuba undibethe lamaxesha mathathu?
4_22_29_Wathi uBhileham kwiesile, Kungokuba ufekethe ngam; akwaba bendiphethe ikrele ngesandla sam; inene, ngendikubulele ngoku!
4_22_30_Lathi iesile kuBhileham, Andililo iesile lakho na okhwela kulo, kuseloko wabakhoyo unanamhla? Ndiqhelile na ukwenjenje kuwe? Wathi, Hayi.
4_22_31_Wawavula uYehova amehlo kaBhileham, wasibona isithunywa sikaYehova simi endleleni, sirhole ikrele lasongesandla saso.  Wathoba waqubuda ngobuso bakhe.
4_22_32_Sathi kuye isithunywa sikaYehova, Ulibethele ntoni na iesile lakho la maxesha mathathu? Yabona, kuphume mna ukuza kukuchasa; ngokuba ekuboneni kwam le ndlela iseyelisela.
4_22_33_Landibona iesile, lacezela phaya kum la maxesha omathathu;  koko lacezela phaya ngenxa yam, okanye ngendikubulele ngoku wena, ndalisindisa lona.
4_22_34_Wathi uBhileham kwisithunywa sikaYehova, Ndonile, kuba bendingazi ukuba wena uze kundimela endleleni; ngoku, ukuba kubi emehlweni akho, ndobuya.
4_22_35_Sathi isithunywa sikaYehova kuBhileham, Hamba namadoda lawo; ke ilizwi endolithetha kuwe, uze uthethe lona lodwa.  Wahamba ke uBhileham nabathetheli bakaBhalaki.
4_22_36_Weva uBhalaki ukuba uBhileham uyeza. Waphuma waya kumhlangabeza emzini wakwaMowabhi osemdeni waseArnon,  ekupheleni komda.
4_22_37_Wathi uBhalaki kuBhileham, Andikuthumelanga na ndiqinisile ukuba ndikubize? Yini na ukuba ungezi kum? Ndihleli nje,  andinako na ukukuzukisa?
4_22_38_Wathi uBhileham kuBhalaki, Uyabona, ndifikile kuwe;  ndinako na ke ngoku ukuthetha into eyiyo? Ilizwi alibekayo uThixo emlonyeni wam, ndiya kuthetha lona.
4_22_39_Wahamba uBhileham noBhalaki, bafika eKiriyati-hutsoti.
4_22_40_Wabingelela uBhalaki iinkomo nempahla emfutshane,  wathumela kuBhileham nakubathetheli ababenaye.
4_22_41_Kwathi ngomso, uBhalaki wamthabatha uBhileham, wamnyusa wamsa ezigangeni zikaBhahali. Wabona khona wada wesa ekupheleni kwabantu.
4_23_1_Wathi uBhileham kuBhalaki, Ndakhele apha izibingelelo zibe sixhenxe, undimisele apha iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe sixhenxe, neenkunzi zezimvu zibe sixhenxe.
4_23_2_Wenza ke uBhalaki njengoko wathethayo uBhileham. Bathi ooBhalaki noBhileham benyusa kwisibingelelo ngesibingelelo inkunzi entsha yenkomo nenkunzi yemvu.
4_23_3_Wathi uBhileham kuBhalaki, Yima wena ngasedinini lakho elinyukayo, ndihambe mna; mhlawumbi uYehova woza kundihlangabeza, nelizwi asukuba endibonisa lona ndokuxelela ke. Waya eluqhayini.
4_23_4_UThixo waqubisana noBhileham; wathi yena kuye, Ndilungise izibingelelo zasixhenxe, ndanyusa inkunzi entsha yenkomo nenkunzi yemvu kwisibingelelo ngesibingelelo.
4_23_5_UYehova wabeka ilizwi emlonyeni kaBhileham, wathi, Buya uye kuBhalaki, wenjenje ukuthetha.
4_23_6_Wabuya waya ke kuye. Nanko emi ngasedinini lakhe elinyukayo, yena nabathetheli bonke bakwaMowabhi.
4_23_7_Wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi, UBhalaki ukumkani wamaMowabhi undithabathe kwa-Aram, Ezintabeni zasempumalanga,  esithi, Yiza undiqalekisele uYakobi; Yiza ubhavumele uSirayeli.
4_23_8_Ndothini na ukuqalekisa angamqalekisiyo uThixo? Ndothini na ukubhavumela angambhavumeliyo uYehova?
4_23_9_Ngokuba, ndisencotsheni yamawa, ndiyambona; Ndisezindulini,  ndibonisela yena. Yabona, ngabantu abahlala bodwa, Ababalelwa phakathi kwazo iintlanga.
4_23_10_Ngubani na ongalubalayo uthuli lwakwaYakobi, Nesahlulo sesine sakwaSirayeli ngokwenani? Umphefumlo wam mawufe ukufa kwabathe tye, Ukuphela kwam kube njengokwabo!
4_23_11_Wathi uBhalaki kuBhileham, Yintoni na le nto undenze yona?  Ndikuthabathele ukuba uziqalekise iintshaba zam, nanku amana ukuzisikelela.
4_23_12_Waphendula yena, wathi, Oko akubekileyo uYehova emlonyeni wam, mandingakugcini na, ndikuthethe?
4_23_13_Wathi uBhalaki kuye, Khawuze siye ndaweni yimbi, apho uya kubabona; wobona isiphelo sabo sodwa, ungababoni bonke bephela;  undiqalekiseleke bona apho.
4_23_14_Wamsa emhlabeni wababoniseli, encotsheni yePisga, wakha izibingelelo ezisixhenxe; wenyusa inkunzi entsha yenkomo,  nenkunzi yemvu, kwisibingelelo ngesibingelelo.
4_23_15_Wathi kuBhalaki, Yenjenje ukuma ngasedinini lakho elinyukayo, ndenjenje mna ukuhlangabeza uYehova.
4_23_16_UYehova waqubisana noBhileham, wabeka ilizwi emlonyeni wakhe, wathi, Buya uye kuBhalaki, wenjenje ukuthetha.
4_23_17_Wafika ke kuye; nanko emi ngasedinini lakhe elinyukayo,  nabathetheli bakwaMowabhi benaye; wathi uBhalaki kuye, Uthethe ntoni na uYehova?
4_23_18_Wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi, Suka ume, Bhalaki uve;  Ndibekele indlebe, nyana kaTsipore.
4_23_19_UThixo akamntu ukuba athethe amanga, Akanyana waluntu ukuba azohlwaye. Etshilo nje yena, akayi kwenza na? Ethethile nje, akayi kufeza na?
4_23_20_Yabona, ndamkele ukusikelela; Usikelele, ke andinakukubuyisa.
4_23_21_Akaboni butshinga kuYakobi, Akaboni bubi kuSirayeli.  UYehova uThixo wakhe unaye, Ukuduma kokumkani kuphakathi kwakhe.
4_23_22_UThixo umkhupha eYiputa; Amendu akhe anjengawenqu.
4_23_23_Akukho zihlabo ngoYakobi, Akukho kuvumisa ngoSirayeli.  Ngexesha elililo, kuthethwa kuYakobi nakuSirayeli Into ayenzayo uThixo.
4_23_24_Yabona, abantu besuka njengengonyamakazi; Baziphakamisa njengengonyam induna. Abalali phantsi, bade badle okuqwengiweyo, Basele igazi labahlatyiweyo.
4_23_25_Wathi uBhalaki kuBhileham, Uze ungabi sabaqalekisa, uze ungabi sabasikelela.
4_23_26_Waphendula uBhileham wathi kuBhalaki, Bendingathethanga na kuwe ndathi, Konke akuthethayo uYehova ndiya kwenza kona?
4_23_27_Wathi uBhalaki kuBhileham, Khawuze ndikuse ndaweni yimbi;  mhlawumbi kolunga emehlweni kaThixo, ukuba undiqalekisele ke bona khona.
4_23_28_UBhalaki wamsa ke uBhileham encotsheni yePehore, ekhangele enkangala.
4_23_29_Wathi uBhileham kuBhalaki, Ndakhele apha izibingelelo zibe sixhenxe, undimisele apha iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe sixhenxe, neenkunzi zezimvu zibe sixhenxe.
4_23_30_Wenza ke uBhalaki njengoko wathethayo uBhileham, wenyusa kwisibingelelo ngesibingelelo inkunzi entsha yenkomo nenkunzi yemvu.
4_24_1_Wabona uBhileham, ukuba kuhle emehlweni kaYehova ukumsikelela uSirayeli, akaya kuhlangabeza zihlabo ngokwezinye izihlandlo, wabubhekisa ubuso bakhe entlango.
4_24_2_Waphakamisa amehlo akhe uBhileham, wawabona amaSirayeli ehleli ngokwezizwe zawo, uMoya kaThixo wamfikela.
4_24_3_Wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi, Utsho uBhileham unyana kaBhehore, Itsho indoda ecinywe amehlo;
4_24_4_Utsho ova ukuthetha kukaThixo, Owubonayo umbono woSomandla,  Esiwa phantsi, etyhilwe amehlo.
4_24_5_Azizintle ngako iintente zakho, Yakobi! Neminquba yakho,  Sirayeli!
4_24_6_Zitwabulukile njengezihlambo, Njengamasimi aphezu komlambo,  Njengemihlaba etyelwe nguYehova, Njengemisedare ephezu kwamanzi.
4_24_7_Aya kumpompoza amanzi emiphandeni yakhe, Imbewu yakhe ingasemanzini amaninzi. Ukumkani wakhe makabe ngaphezulu koAgagi, Buziphakamise ubukumkani bakhe.
4_24_8_UThixo umkhupha eYiputa. Amendu akhe anjengawenqu. Uya kuzidla iintlanga, ababandezeli bakhe, Awakhukhuze amathambo abo, Abaphaluse ngeentolo zakhe.
4_24_9_Waguqa, wabuthuma njengengonyama, Njengengonyamakazi;  ngubani na owomvusa? Mabasikelelwe abakusikelelayo,  Baqalekiswe abakuqalekisayo.
4_24_10_Wavutha umsindo kaBhalaki kuBhileham, wazityhwakraza izandla zakhe, wathi uBhalaki kuBhileham, Ndikubizele ukuba uziqalekise iintshaba zam; nanku, umana ukuzisikelela ezi zihlandlo zozithathu.
4_24_11_Khwelela ngokunje, uye endaweni yakho. Bendithe ndokuzukisa kakhulu; yabona uYehova ukuvimbile uzuko.
4_24_12_Wathi uBhileham kuBhalaki, Bendingathethanga na nakubathunywa bakho owabathumela kum ndisithi,
4_24_13_Angafanelana uBhalaki endinika indlu yakhe izele yisilivere negolide, andingekhe ndiwugqithe umlomo kaYehova,  ndenze okulungileyo nokuba kokubi okuphuma entliziyweni yam;  oko akuthethayo uYehova, ndiya kwenza kona.
4_24_14_Kaloku yabona, ndiyahamba, ndiya ebantwini bakowethu. Yiza ndikutyele into abaya kuyenza aba bantu kubantu bakho ngemihla yokugqibela.
4_24_15_Wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi, Utsho uBhileham unyana kaBhehore, Itsho indoda ecinywe amehlo.
4_24_16_Utsho ova ukuthetha kukaThixo, Wakwazi ukwazi kOsenyangweni; Obona umbono woSomandla, Esiwaphantsi, etyhilwe amehlo:
4_24_17_Ndiyayibona, kungekhona ngoku, Ndiyikhangele, ingekufuphi.  Inkwenkwezi iphuma kwaYakobi; Intonga ivela kwaSirayeli,  Iwaphaluse amaMowabhi emacaleni omabini, Ibagombe bonke abengxolo;
4_24_18_UEdom abe lilifa, Abe lilifa uSehire, iintshaba zakhe;  USirayeli yena avelise amandla.
4_24_19_Makehle ophuma kwaYakobi, Atshabalalise abaseleyo emizini.
4_24_20_Wawabona ama-Amaleki, wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi,  Ingqalo yeentlanga nguAmaleki; Isiphelo sakhe sikukutshabalala.
4_24_21_Wawabona amaKeni, wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi,  Liqinile ikhaya lakho; Indlu yakho imiswe eweni.
4_24_22_Kuba uKayin angatshayelwa yini na, Ade uAsiriya akuthimbe?
4_24_23_Wasusela ngomzekeliso wakhe, wathi, Yeha! Azi ngubani na oya kubudla ubomi, akukumisa oko uThixo?
4_24_24_Iinqanawa zivela elunxwemeni lwamaKiti. Ziyamcinezela uAsiriya, ziyamcinezela uEbhere, Naye woda atshabalale.
4_24_25_Wesuka ke uBhileham wahamba, wabuyela endaweni yakhe; naye uBhalaki wahamba ngendlela yakhe.
4_25_1_AmaSirayeli ahlala eShitim. Baqala abantu bahenyuza neentombi zakwaMowabhi.
4_25_2_Zababizela abantu emibingelelweni yoothixo bazo; badla abantu, banqula oothixo bazo.
4_25_3_AmaSirayeli azibandakanya ke noBhahali-pehore. Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli.
4_25_4_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Thabatha bonke abaziintloko zabantu,  ubabethelele abanetyala emnqamlezweni kuYehova phambi kwelanga,  kubuyiswe ukuvutha komsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli.
4_25_5_Wathi uMoses kubagwebi bakwaSirayeli, Bulalani elowo abantu bakhe, abazibandakanyileyo noBhahali-pehore.
4_25_6_Kwabonakala ke indoda yakoonyana bakaSirayeli, ifika isondeza kubazalwana bayo umMidiyanekazi emehlweni kaMoses,  nasemehlweni ebandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli, ababelila emnyango wentente yokuhlangana.
4_25_7_Wabona uPinehasi, unyana kaElazare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli, wesuka phakathi kwebandla, wathabatha umkhonto ngesandla sakhe.
4_25_8_Wayilandela indoda engumSirayeli, waya egumbini, wabahlaba amahlanza bobabini, indoda engumSirayeli, nenkazana leyo esiswini sayo. Sathintelwa ke isibetho koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_25_9_Abafayo ngesibetho baba ngamawaka amashumi amabini anamane.
4_25_10_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_25_11_UPinehasi, unyana kaElazare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli,  ububuyisile ubushushu bam koonyana bakaSirayeli, ekukhweleteni kwakhe njengekhwele lam phakathi kwabo, ukuze ndingabagqibi oonyana bakaSirayeli ngekhwele lam.
4_25_12_Yithi ngoko, Yabona, ndimnika umnqophiso wam woxolo,
4_25_13_ube ngumnqophiso wobubingeleli obungunaphakade, kuye nakwimbewu yakhe emva kwakhe, ngenxa enokuba ebenekhwele ngoThixo wakhe, wabacamagushela oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_25_14_Igama lendoda engumSirayeli, leyo yahlatywayo, yahlatywa nomMidiyanekazi, ibinguZimri unyana kaSalu, inkulu yendlu yooyise kwaSimon.
4_25_15_Igama lenkazana leyo yahlatywayo ingumMidiyanekazi,  belinguKozibhi, intombi kaTsure, obeyintloko yezizwe zendlu yooyise kwaMidiyan.
4_25_16_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_25_17_Wabandezeleni amaMidiyan niwaxabele;
4_25_18_ngokuba wona anibandezele ngamayelenqe awo abewenzile kuni, ngenxa yendawo kaPehore, nangenxa yendawo kaKozibhi,  intombi yenkulu yakwaMidiyan, udade wabo, owahlatywa ngomhla wesibetho ngenxa yendawo kaPehore.
4_26_1_Kwathi emva kwesibetho eso, wathetha uYehova kuMoses nakuElazare, unyana ka-Aron umbingeleli, wathi,
4_26_2_Balani inani lebandla lonke loonyana bakaSirayeli,  nithabathele kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, ninyuse,  ngokwezindlu zooyise, bonke abaphuma umkhosi kwaSirayeli.
4_26_3_UMoses noElazare umbingeleli bathetha nabo ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi ngaseYordan, malunga neYeriko, besithi,
4_26_4_Thabathelani kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe, ninyuse,  njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
4_26_5_Oonyana bakaSirayeli abaphumayo ezweni lamaYiputa babengaba: kwaRubhen amazibulo kaSirayeli: oonyana bakaRubhen:  nguHanoki ozala amaHanoki; nguPalu ozala amaPalu;
4_26_6_nguHetseron ozala amaHetseron; nguKarmi ozala amaKarmi.
4_26_7_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yamaRubhen; ababalwayo kuyo babengamashumi amane anamathathu amawaka, anamakhulu asixhenxe,  anamanci mathathu.
4_26_8_Oonyana bakaPalu nguEliyabhi.
4_26_9_Oonyana bakaEliyabhi nguNemuweli noDatan noAbhiram. Nguloo Datan noAbhiram babizwayo libandla, baphikisana noMoses noAron ebandleni likaKora, ekuphikisaneni kwabo noYehova;
4_26_10_waza umhlaba wawuvula umlomo wawo, wabaginya noKora ekufenikwelo bandla, ekudleni komlilo amadoda angamakhulu omabini, anamanci mahlanu, aba ngumqondiso.
4_26_11_Ke oonyana bakaKora abafanga.
4_26_12_Oonyana bakaSimon ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguNemuweli ozala amaNemuweli; nguYamin ozala amaYamin; nguYakin ozala amaYakin;
4_26_13_nguZera ozala amaZera; nguSawule ozala amaSawule.
4_26_14_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yamaSimon: amashumi amabini anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu mabini.
4_26_15_Oonyana bakaGadi ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguTsefon ozala amaTsefon; nguHagi ozala amaHagi; nguShuni ozala amaShuni;
4_26_16_nguOzeni ozala amaOzeni; nguEri ozala amaEri;
4_26_17_nguArodi ozala ama-Arodi; nguAreli ozala ama-Areli.
4_26_18_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yoonyana bakaGadi, ngokwababalwayo kubo: amashumi omane amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_26_19_Oonyana bakaYuda nguEre no-Onan; bafa ooEre no-Onan ezweni lakwaKanan.
4_26_20_Oonyana bakaYuda ngokwemizalwane yabo babengaba: nguShela ozala amaShela; nguPeretse ozala amaPeretse; nguZera ozala amaZera.
4_26_21_Oonyana bakaPeretse babengaba: nguHetseron ozala amaHetseron; nguHamuli ozala amaHamuli.
4_26_22_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaYuda, ngokwababalwayo kubo:  amashumi asixhenxe anamathandathu amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_26_23_Oonyana bakaIsakare ngokwemizalwane yabo; nguTola ozala amaTola; nguPuwa ozala amaPuwa;
4_26_24_nguYashubhi ozala amaYashubhi; nguShimron ozala amaShimron.
4_26_25_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaIsakare, ngokwababalwayo kubo:  anashumi amathandathu anamane amawaka, anamakhulu mathathu.
4_26_26_Oonyana bakaZebhulon ngokwemizalwane yabo; nguSerede ozala amaSerede; nguElon ozala amaElon; nguYaleli ozala amaYaleli.
4_26_27_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yamaZebhulon, ngokwababalwayo kubo:  amashumi amathandathu amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_26_28_Oonyana bakaYosefu ngokwemizalwane yabo nguManase noEfrayim.
4_26_29_Oonyana bakaManase: nguMakire ozala amaMakire; uMakire wazala uGiliyadi; nguGiliyadi ozala amaGiliyadi.
4_26_30_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaGiliyadi: nguIyezere ozala amaIyezere; nguHeleki ozala amaHeleki;
4_26_31_nguAseriyeli ozala ama-Aseriyeli; nguShekem ozala amaShekem; nguShemida ozala amaShemida;
4_26_32_nguHefere ozala amaHefere.
4_26_33_Ke uTselofehadi, unyana kaHefere, ebengenanyana; waye eneentombi zodwa. Amagama eentombi zikaTselofehadi nguMala,  noNoha, noHogela, noMilka, noTirtsa.
4_26_34_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaManase, ngokwababalwayo kubo:  amashumi amahlanu anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu asixhenxe.
4_26_35_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaEfrayim ngokwemizalwane yabo:  nguShutela ozala amaShutela; nguBhekere ozala amaBhekere;  nguTahan ozala amaTahan.
4_26_36_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaShutela: nguEran ozala amaEran.
4_26_37_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yoonyana bakaEfrayim, ngokwababalwayo kubo; amashumi omathathu anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.  Ngabo abo oonyana bakaYosefu ngokwemizalwane yabo.
4_26_38_Oonyana bakaBhenjamin ngokwemizalwane yabo; nguBhela ozala amaBhela; nguAshebhele ozala ama-Ashebhele; nguAhiram ozala ama-Ahiram;
4_26_39_nguShefufam ozala amaShefufam; nguHufam ozala amaHufam.
4_26_40_Oonyana bakaBhela nguArdi noNahaman; nguArdi ozala ama-Ardi; nguNahaman ozala amaNahaman.
4_26_41_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaBhenjamin ngokwemizalwane yabo;  ababalwayo kubo ngamashumi amane anamahlanu amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu.
4_26_42_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaDan ngokwemizalwane yabo; nguShuham ozala amaShuham. Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaDan ngokwemizalwane yabo.
4_26_43_Yonke imizalwane yamaShuham, ngokwababalwayo kubo,  ngamashumi omathandathu anamane amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_26_44_Oonyana baka-Ashere ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguImna ozaa amaImna; nguIshwi ozala amaIshwi; nguBheriya ozala amaBheriya.
4_26_45_Koonyana bakaBheriya: nguHebhere ozala amaHebhere;  nguMalekiyeli ozaa amaMalekiyeli.
4_26_46_Igama lentombi ka-Ashere nguSara.
4_26_47_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yoonyana baka-Ashere, ngokwababalwayo kubo: ngamashumi omahlanu anamathathu amawaka, anamakhulu mane.
4_26_48_Oonyana bakaNafetali ngokwemizalwane yabo: nguGatseli ozala amaGatseli; nguGuni ozala amaGuni;
4_26_49_nguYetsere ozala amaYetsere; nguShilem ozala amaShilem.
4_26_50_Yiyo leyo imizalwane yakwaNafetali ngokwemizalwane yabo;  ababaliweyo kubo ngamashumi omane anamahlanu amawaka,  anamakhulu mane.
4_26_51_Ngabo abo ababalwayo koonyana bakaSirayeli: ngamakhulu omathandathu amawaka anawaka-nye, anamakhulu asixhenxe,  anamanci mathathu.
4_26_52_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_26_53_Malabelwe ezo zizwe ilizwe, libe lilifa lazo ngenani lamagama.
4_26_54_Esininzi wolenza lininzi ilifa laso, esincinane wolenza lincinane ilifa laso; eso sinikwe ilifa ngokwababalwayo kuso.
4_26_55_Kodwa ilizwe malabiwe ngeqashiso, balidle ilifa ngokwamagama ezizwe zooyise;
4_26_56_labiwe ilifa lazo ngokweqashiso, phakathi kwesininzi nesincinane.
4_26_57_Ngabo aba ababalwayo kubaLevi ngokwemizalwane yabo;  nguGershon ozala amaGershon; nguKehati ozala amaKehati;  nguMerari ozala amaMerari.
4_26_58_Yiyo le imizalwane yabaLevi: ngumzalwane wamaLibheni,  ngumzalwane wamaHebron, ngumzalwane wamaMaheli, ngumzalwane wamaMushi, ngumzalwane wamaKora. UKehati wazala uAmram.
4_26_59_Igama lomka-Amram nguYokebhede, intombi kaLevi, eyazalelwa uLevi eYiputa; yamzalela uAmram ooAron noMoses, noMiriyam udade wabo.
4_26_60_UAron wazalelwa uNadabhi, noAbhihu, noElazare, noItamare.
4_26_61_Bafa ooNadabhi noAbhihu ekusondezeni kwabo umlilo ongesesikweni phambi koYehova.
4_26_62_Ababalwayo kubo baba ngamashumi omabini anamathathu amawaka, yonke into eyindoda, bethabathela kumntwana onyanga-nye benyusa; kuba bebengabalwanga phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli; ngokuba bebengenalifa phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_26_63_Ngabo abo babalwayo nguMoses noElazare umbingeleli,  ababebabala oonyana bakaSirayeli ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi ngaseYordan, malunga neYeriko.
4_26_64_Ke kwabo kube kungasekho mntu wababebalwe ngooMoses noAron umbingeleli, abababalayo oonyana bakaSirayeli entlango yeSinayi.
4_26_65_Ngokuba uYehova ebethe kubo, Mabafele bona entlango kanye.  Akwasala namnye ke kubo, ingenguKalebhi unyana kaYefune,  noYoshuwa unyana kaNun.
4_27_1_Zasondela iintombi zikaTselofehadi, unyana kaHefere, unyana kaGiliyadi, unyana kaMakire, unyana kaManase, zomzalwane kaManase, unyana kaYosefu. Ngawo ke la amagama eentombi zakhe ezo: uMala, noNoha, noHogela, noMilka, noTirtsa.
4_27_2_Zema phambi koMoses naphambi koElazare umbingeleli,  naphambi kwezikhulu zebandla lonke emnyango wentente yokuhlangana, zathi,
4_27_3_Ubawo wafela entlango; yena wayengekho phakathi kwebandla labahlanganayo ngoYehova ebandleni likaKora; ngokuba wafa ngesakhe isono, engabanga nanyana.
4_27_4_Yini na ke ukuba igama likabawo licinywe phakathi kwemizalwane yakhe, kuba engenanyana? Sinike ilifa phakathi kwabazalwana bakabawo.
4_27_5_UMoses wasibeka isimangalo sazo phambi koYehova.
4_27_6_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses wathi,
4_27_7_Iintombi zikaTselofehadi zilungisile ukuthetha; wozinika ilifa phakathi kwabazalwana bakayise, ulihambisele kuzo ilifa likayise;
4_27_8_uthethe koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Xa ithe yafa indoda,  ingenanyana, nolihambisela ilifa layo kwintombi yayo.
4_27_9_Ke ukuba ithe ayaba nantombi, nolinika abazalwana bayo ilifa layo.
4_27_10_Ukuba ithe ayaba nabazalwana, nolinika abazalwana bakayise ilifa layo.
4_27_11_Ukuba uyise uthe akaba nabazalwana, ilifa layo nolinika umzalwana wayo okufuphi kuyo emizalwaneni yayo, alidle ilifa.  Woba ngummiselo ke wokugweba lowo koonyana bakaSirayeli,  njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_27_12_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Nyuka uye kule ntaba yeAbharim,  ulikhangele ilizwe endilinike oonyana bakaSirayeli,  ulikhangele;
4_27_13_uhlanganiselwe kwabakowenu nawe, njengokuba wahlanganiselwayo kubo uAron, umkhuluwa wakho;
4_27_14_njengokuba nawuphikisayo umlomo wam entlango yeTsin,  embambanweni yebandla, endaweni yokundingcwalisa emanzini emehlweni abo. Lawo ngamanzi embambano aseKadeshe, entlango yeTsin.
4_27_15_Wathetha uMoses kuYehova, esithi,
4_27_16_UYehova, uThixo woomoya benyama yonke, makamise indoda yokuvelela ibandla;
4_27_17_eya kuphuma phambi kwabo, ingene phambi kwabo, ibakhuphe,  ibangenise; lingabi njengezimvu ezingenamalusi ibandla likaYehova.
4_27_18_Wathi uYehova kuMoses, Zithabathele uYoshuwa, unyana kaNun, indoda okuyo umoya, ucinezele ngesandla sakho phezu kwakhe,
4_27_19_ummise phambi koElazare umbingeleli, naphambi kwebandla lonke, umwisele umthetho emehlweni abo;
4_27_20_uthabathe kwindili yakho, ubeke phezu kwakhe, ukuze limve lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_27_21_Maze eme phambi koElazare umbingeleli, yena ambuzele ukugweba kweeUrim phambi koYehova, baphume ngokomlomo wakhe,  bangene ngokomlomo wakhe, yena noonyana bonke bakaSirayeli ndawonye naye, nebandla lonke.
4_27_22_Wenza ke uMoses njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho.  Wamthabatha uYoshuwa, wammisa phambi koElazare umbingeleli,  naphambi kwebandla lonke;
4_27_23_wacinezela ngezandla zakhe phezu kwakhe, wamwisela umthetho, njengoko uYehova wathethayo ngoMoses.
4_28_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_28_2_Bawisele umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo,  Umsondezo wam, isonka sam sokudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kum, nokugcina ukuwusondeza kum ngexesha lawo elimisiweyo.
4_28_3_Uze uthi kubo, Kuko oku ukudla kwasemlilweni enokusondeza kuYehova: iimvana ezimbini ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo,  zemini ngemini, zedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke;
4_28_4_enye imvana woyenza kusasa, eyesibini uyenze lakutshona ilanga;
4_28_5_nesahlulo seshumi se-efa somgubo ocoliweyo woba ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli engqushiweyo, esisahlulo sesine sehin.
4_28_6_Lidini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, elamiselwa entabeni yeSinayi ukuba libe livumba elithozamisayo, ukudla kwasemlilweni ke oko kuYehova;
4_28_7_nomnikelo walo othululwayo woba sisahlulo sesine sehin kwimvana yokuqala. Wowuthululela engcweleni umnikelo othululwayo, usisiselo esinamandla kuYehova.
4_28_8_Eyesibini imvana woyenza lakutshona ilanga. Woyenza ngokomnikelo wokudla wakusasa, nangokomnikelo walo othululwayo,  ukudla kwasemlilweni ivumba elithozamisayo ke elo kuYehova.
4_28_9_Ke ngomhla wesabatha, nosondeza iimvana ezimbini ezimnyaka mnye, ezigqibeleleyo, nezahlulo zeshumi zibe zibini zomgubo ocoliweyo, ube ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli, nomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_28_10_Lidini elinyukayo ke elo lesabatha ngesabatha, ndawonye nedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_28_11_Ekuthwaseni kweenyanga zenu nosondeza kuYehova idini elinyukayo, iinkunzi ezintsha zibe mbini, amathole eenkomo,  nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye, neemvana ezigqibeleleyo ezimnyaka mnye zibe sixhenxe;
4_28_12_nezahlulo zeshumi zomgubo ocoliweyo zibe zithathu, ube ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli, kuyo inkunzi entsha enye yenkomo; nezahlulo zeshumi zomgubo ocoliweyo zibe zibini, ube ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli, kuyo inkunzi enye yemvu;
4_28_13_nesahlulo seshumi somgubo ocoliweyo ngasinye, ube ngumnikelo wokudla, ugalelwe ioli, kuyo imvana enye. Lidini elinyukayo, livumba elithozamisayo, kukudla kwasemlilweni ke oko kuYehova;
4_28_14_neminikelo yazo ethululwayo yoba sisiqingatha sehin kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo, nesahlulo sesithathu sehin kuyo inkunzi yemvu, nesahlulo sesine sehin yewayini kwimvana. Lilo elo idini elinyukayo lenyanga ngenyanga ezinyangeni zomnyaka.
4_28_15_Nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yoba nye, ibe lidini lesono kuYehova; nolenza ndawonye nedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke nomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_28_16_Ngenyanga yokuqala, ngosuku lweshumi elinesine enyangeni leyo, yipasika kuYehova.
4_28_17_Ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu waloo nyanga ngumthendeleko.  Iintsuku ezisixhenxe kodliwa izonka ezingenagwele.
4_28_18_Ngomhla wokuqala kobakho intlanganiso engcwele. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
4_28_19_Nosondeza ukudla kwasemlilweni, idini elinyukayo kuYehova:  iinkunzi ezintsha zibe mbini, amathole eenkomo; nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye, zibe sixhenxe; zoba zezigqibeleleyo kuni.
4_28_20_Nowenza umnikelo wazo wokudla womgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli, izahlulo zeshumi zibe zithathu kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo, nezahlulo zeshumi zibe zibini kuyo inkunzi yemvu.
4_28_21_Wosenza isahlulo seshumi ngasinye kuyo imvana enye, kuzo iimvana ezisixhenxe.
4_28_22_Nenkunzi yebhokhwe yoba nye, ibe lidini lesono lokunicamagushela nina.
4_28_23_Nowenza wona ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lakusasa,  elileledini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke.
4_28_24_Niya kwenjenjalo imihla yonke, ngaloo mihla isixhenxe,  isonka sokudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova,  nenze ndawonye nedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_28_25_Ngomhla wesixhenxe kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
4_28_26_Ngomhla wokushwama, ekuwusondezeni kwenu umnikelo wokudla okutsha kuYehova, emthendelekweni wenu weeveki, kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
4_28_27_Nosondeza idini elinyukayo libe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova: iinkunzi ezintsha zibe mbini, amathole eenkomo;  nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye;
4_28_28_neemvana ezimnyaka mnye zibe sixhenxe: nomnikelo wazo wokudla womgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli, izahlulo zeshumi zibe zithathu kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo inye,
4_28_29_nezahlulo zeshumi zibe zibini kuyo inkunzi yemvu inye,  nesahlulo seshumi ngasinye kuyo imvana enye, kuzo iimvana ezisixhenxe.
4_28_30_Nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti yoba nye, yokunicamagushela.
4_28_31_Ezo nto nozenza ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla (zoba zezigqibeleleyo kuni),  neminikelo yazo ethululwayo.
4_29_1_Ngenyanga yesixhenxe, ngolokuqala enyangeni leyo, kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.  Yoba ngumhla wokumema ngezigodlo kuni.
4_29_2_Ize nenze idini elinyukayo, libe livumba elithozamisayo kuYehova; ibe nye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo, nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye, neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo, zibe sixhenxe;
4_29_3_nomnikelo wazowokudla womgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli,  izahlulo zeshumi zibe zithathu kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo,  nezalululo zeshumi zibe zibini kuyo inkunzi yemvu,
4_29_4_nesahlulo seshumi sibe sinye kuyo imvana enye, kuzo iimvana ezisixhenxe;
4_29_5_nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono lokunicamagushela:
4_29_6_ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lenyanga, nomnikelo walo wokudla, nedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walowokudla, neminikelo yawo ethululwayo, ngokwesiko lawo; libe livumba elithozamisayo, ukudla, kwasemlilweni ke oko kuYehova.
4_29_7_Ngolweshumi lwaloo nyanga yesixhenxe, kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni, niyithobe imiphefumlo yenu. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza;
4_29_8_nosondeza idini elinyukayo kuYehova, ivumba elithozamisayo;  ibe nye inkunzi entsha, ithole lenkomo; nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye;  neemvana ezimnyaka mnye zibe sixhenxe; zoba zezigqibeleleyo kuni;
4_29_9_nomnikelo wazo wokudla womgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli,  izahlulo zeshumi zibe zithathu kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo,  nezahlulo zeshumi zibe zibini kuyo inkunzi yemvu inye,
4_29_10_nesahlulo seshumi ngasinye kuyo imvana inye, kuzo iimvana ezisixhenxe;
4_29_11_nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye, ibelidini lesono:  ngaphandle kwedini lesono lokucamagusha, nedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla, kwaneminikelo yawo ethululwayo.
4_29_12_Ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu lwenyanga yesixhenxe,  kobakho intlanganiso engcwele kuni. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza. Niya kwenza umthendeleko kuYehova iintsuku ezisixhenxe.
4_29_13_Nize nisondeze idini elinyukayo, ukudla kwasemlilweni,  ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova: zibe lishumi elinantathu iinkunzi ezintsha, amathole eenkomo; neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye zibe lishumi elinane; zoba zezigqibeleleyo;
4_29_14_nomnikelo wazo wokudla womgubo ocoliweyo, ugalelwe ioli,  izahlulo zeshumi zibe zithathu kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo inye, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo ezilishumi elinantathu,  nezahlulo zeshumi zibe zibini kwinkunzi yemvu inye, kuzo iinkunzi zezimvu ezimbini,
4_29_15_nesahlulo seshumi ngasinye kuyo imvana inye kuzo iimvana ezilishumi elinane;
4_29_16_nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono;  ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla, kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_17_Ngosuku lwesibini nosondeza zibe lishumi elinambini iinkunzi ezintsha, amathole eenkomo; neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo, zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_18_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo ngokwesiko;
4_29_19_nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono;  ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla, kwaneminikelo yazo ethululwayo.
4_29_20_Ngosuku lwesithathu nosondeza iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe lishumi elinanye; neenkunzi zezimvu zibembini; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_21_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko;
4_29_22_nenkunzi yebhokhwe ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono: ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla,  kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_23_Ngosuku lwesine nosondeza iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe lishumi, neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini, neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_24_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko;
4_29_25_nenkunzi yebhokhwe exhonti ibe nye; ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla, kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_26_Ngosuku lwesihlanu nosondeza iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe sithoba, neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini, neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_27_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko;
4_29_28_nenkunzi yebhokhwe ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono; ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla,  kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_29_Ngosuku lwesithandathu nosondeza iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe sibhozo: neenkunzi zezimvu zibembini; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_30_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko;
4_29_31_nenkunzi yebhokhwe ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono; ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla,  kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_32_Ngosuku lwesixhenxe nosondeza iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibesixhenxe; neenkunzi zezimvu zibe mbini; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe lishumi elinane;
4_29_33_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuzo iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo, nakuzo iinkunzi zezimvu, nakuzo iimvana, ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko lazo;
4_29_34_nenkunzi yebhokhwe ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono: ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla,  kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_35_Ngosuku lwesibhozo yoba yingqungquthela kuni. Ize ningenzi msebenzi wakukhonza.
4_29_36_Nosondeza idini elinyukayo, ukudla kwasemlilweni, ivumba elithozamisayo kuYehova; inkunzi entsha yenkomo ibe nye;  nenkunzi yemvu ibe nye; neemvana ezimnyaka mnye ezigqibeleleyo zibe sixhenxe;
4_29_37_nomnikelo wazo wokudla, neminikelo yazo ethululwayo, kuyo inkunzi entsha yenkomo, nakuyo inkunzi yemvu, nakuzo iimvana,  ngangenani lazo, ngokwesiko;
4_29_38_nenkunzi yebhokhwe ibe nye, ibe lidini lesono: ngaphandle kwedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke, nomnikelo walo wokudla,  kwanomnikelo walo othululwayo.
4_29_39_Loo madini nowenza kuYehova ngamaxesha enu amisiweyo,  ngaphandle kwezibhambathiso zenu, nemibingelelo yenu yokuqhutywa yintliziyo, emadinini enu anyukayo, naseminikelweni yenu yokudla, naseminikelweni yenu ethululwayo,  nasemibingelelweni yenu yoxolo.
4_29_40_UMoses wabaxelela oonyana bakaSirayeli ngokwezinto zonke,  uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngazo uMoses.
4_30_1_Wathetha uMoses kwiintloko zezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli,  esithi, Lilo eli ilizwi awise umthetho ngalo uYehova:
4_30_2_Xa athe umntu wabhambathisa isibhambathiso kuYehova, nokuba ufunge isifungo sokuwubopha umphefumlo wakhe ngokuzikhanyeza,  makangalihlambeli ilizwi lakhe; makenze ngokwento yonke ephume emlonyeni wakhe.
4_30_3_Xa ithe inkazana yabhambathisa isibhambathiso kuYehova,  nokuba ithe yazibopha ngokuzikhanyeza, isendlwini kayise,  isebuncinaneni bayo;
4_30_4_wasiva uyise isibhambathiso sayo nokuzikhanyeza kwayo,  ebophe ngako umphefumlo wayo, wathi cwaka uyise kuyo: mazime zonke izibhambathiso zayo; nokuzikhanyeza kwayo konke, ebophe umphefumlo wayo ngako, makume.
4_30_5_Ukuba uthe uyise wayithiba ngomhla wokuziva kwakhe izibhambathiso zayo zonke, nokuzikhanyeza kwayo, ebophe umphefumlo wayo ngako, akuyi kuma; uYehova woyixolela, ngokuba eyithibile uyise.
4_30_6_Ke ukuba ithe yenda inesibhambathiso, nokuba inokuphololoza komlomo wayo, ebophe umphefumlo wayongako,
4_30_7_yeva indoda, yathi cwaka kuyo ngomhla wokuva kwayo, mazime izibhambathiso zayo; nokuzikhanyeza kwayo, ebophe umphefumlo wayo ngako, makume.
4_30_8_Ukuba indoda yayo ithe yayithiba ngomhla wokuva kwayo,  yasaphula isibhambathiso sayo esiphezu kwayo, nokuphololoza komlomo wayo, ebophe umphefumlo wayo ngako: uYehova woyixolela.
4_30_9_Isibhambathiso somhlolokazi nesowaliweyo, yonke into abophe umphefumlo wakhe ngayo, mayime phezu kwakhe.
4_30_10_Ukuba umfazi uthe wenza isibhambathiso esendlwini yendoda yakhe, nokuba uthe wabopha umphefumlo wakhe ngokuzikhanyeza ngesifungo,
4_30_11_yeva indoda yakhe, yathi cwaka kuye, ayamthiba, mazime zonke izibhambathiso zakhe; makume ukuzikhanyeza kwakhe, abophe ngako umphefumlo wakhe.
4_30_12_Ukuba ithe indoda yakhe yakwaphula mpela ngomhla wokuva kwayo, yonke into ephume emlonyeni wakhe ngezibhambathiso zakhe, nangokuzikhanyeza komphefumlo wakhe, mayingemi; indoda yakhe iyaphule, uYehova womxolela.
4_30_13_Zonke izibhambathiso, nezifungo zonke zokuzikhanyeza,  zokuthoba umphefumlo, indoda yakhe ingazimisa, indoda yakhe ingazaphula.
4_30_14_Ukuba indoda yakhe ithe cwaka, yathi tu kuye imihla ngemihla, iyazimisa zonke izibhambathiso zakhe, nokuzikhanyeza kwakhe konke okuphezu kwakhe iya kukumisa; ngokuba yathi cwaka kuye ngomhla wokuva kwayo.
4_30_15_Ukuba ithe yakwaphula mpela emva kokuva kwayo, yobuthwala ubugwenxa bakhe.
4_30_16_Yiyo leyo imimiselo, uYehova awamwisela umthetho ngayo uMoses, phakathi kwendoda nomkayo, phakathi koyise nentombi yakhe, isebuncinaneni bayo, isendlwini kayise.
4_31_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_31_2_Baphindezele kumaMidiyan oonyana bakaSirayeli, ngento awayenza kubo; emveni koko wohlanganiselwa ebantwini bakowenu.
4_31_3_Wathetha ke uMoses ebantwini, esithi, Makuxhobe amadoda kuni, aphume umkhosi aye kumaMidiyan, enze impindezelo kaYehova kumaMidiyan;
4_31_4_iwaka esizweni, iwaka esizweni, ezizweni zonke zakwaSirayeli, nowathuma aphume umkhosi.
4_31_5_Kwakhutshwa ke emawakeni akwaSirayeli iwaka esizweni, iwaka esizweni, alishumi elinamabini amawaka, exhobele ukuphuma umkhosi.
4_31_6_Wawathuma uMoses, yaliwaka esizweni, ukuba aphume umkhosi;  wona enoPinehasi, unyana kaElazare umbingeleli, aphume umkhosi eneempahla ezingcwele, namaxilongo okuhlaba umkhosi esandleni sakhe.
4_31_7_Aphuma ke umkhosi, aya kumaMidiyan, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses, ayibulala yonke into eyindoda.
4_31_8_Ababulala ookumkani bamaMidiyan ndawonye nababuleweyo babo,  uEvi, noRekem, noTsure, noHure, noRebha, ookumkani abahlanu bamaMidiyan; noBhileham, unyana kaBhehore, ambulala ngekrele.
4_31_9_Oonyana bakaSirayeli babathimba abafazi bakwaMidiyan,  neentsapho zabo; namaqegu abo onke, nemfuyo yabo yonke,  nobutyebi babo bonke babuphanga.
4_31_10_Bayitshisa ngomlilo imizi yabo yonke ezindaweni zokuhlala kwabo, neengqili zabo zonke;
4_31_11_bawathabatha onke amaxhoba nezinto zonke eziphangiweyo,  awabantu naweenkomo.
4_31_12_Babazisa abathinjiweyo, namaxhoba, nempahla ephangiweyo,  kuMoses nakuElazare umbingeleli, nakwibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli eminqubeni, ezinkqantoshini zakwaMowabhi,  ezingaseYordan malunga neYeriko.
4_31_13_Baphuma ooMoses noElazare umbingeleli nezikhulu zonke zebandla, baya kubakhawulela ngaphandle kweminquba.
4_31_14_UMoses wanoburhalarhume kubo abaveleli bomkhosi,  abathetheli-waka nabathetheli-khulu, ababevela emkhosini waloo mfazwe.
4_31_15_Wathi uMoses kubo, Niwasindisile na onke amankazana?
4_31_16_Yabonani, ngawo la athi ngelizwi likaBhileham amenezisa oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova ngenxa kaPehore, kwabakho isibetho ebandleni likaYehova.
4_31_17_Yibulaleni ngoko yonke into eyindoda ezintsatsheni;  namankazana onke ayazileyo indoda ngokulala nayo wabulaleni.
4_31_18_Ke zonke iintsapho emankazaneni ezingalalanga nandoda,  zisindiseni.
4_31_19_Ke nina misani iintente ngaphandle kweminquba iintsuku ezisixhenxe. Bonke ababulele umntu, bonke abachukumise obuleweyo, nozihlambulula isono ngomhla wesithathu nangomhla wesixhenxe, nina nabo nibathimbileyo.
4_31_20_Neengubo zonke, neempahla zonke zezikhumba, neento zonke ezenziwe ngoboya bebhokhwe, neempahla zonke zomthi,  nozihlambulula.
4_31_21_Wathi uElazare umbingeleli kumadoda omkhosi abeye kuloo mfazwe, Nguwo lowo ummiselo womyalelo uYehova ammiseleyo uMoses.
4_31_22_Kodwa igolide, nesilivere, nobhedu, nesinyithi, netin,  nelothe,
4_31_23_yonke into enokumelana nomlilo, noyicandisa emlilweni,  ihlambuluke, kodwa ke ihlanjululwe ngamanzi okuhlamba ukungcola. Ke yonke into engenako ukumelana nomlilo,  noyicandisa emanzini.
4_31_24_Ize nihlambe iingubo zenu ngomhla wesixhenxe; nohlambuluka ke, ningene emveni koko eminqubeni.
4_31_25_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, wathi,
4_31_26_Bala inani lamaxhoba athinjiweyo, awabantu naweenkomo,  wenanoElazare umbingeleli, neentloko zezindlu zooyise zebandla.
4_31_27_Uze uwahlule kubini amaxhoba, phakathi kwabayilwileyo imfazwe baphuma umkhosi, nebandla lonke:
4_31_28_urhumele uYehova inani kumadoda okulwa aphume umkhosi,  umphefumlo ube mnye emakhulwini amahlanu, kubo abantu, nakuzo iinkomo, nakuwo amaesile, nakuyo impahla emfutshane.
4_31_29_Nothabatha esiqingatheni sabo, unike uElazare umbingeleli,  ibe ngumrhumo kaYehova.
4_31_30_Esiqingatheni soonyana bakaSirayeli wothabatha ibe nye,  ekhethiweyo emashumini amahlanu kubo abantu, nakuzo iinkomo,  nakuwo amaesile, nakuyo impahla emfutshane, nakuwo amaqegu onke, unike abaLevi abagcina isigxina somnquba kaYehova.
4_31_31_Wenza ke uMoses noElazare umbingeleli njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
4_31_32_Ke amaxhoba, amasalela ezinto eziphangiweyo,  ababeziphangile abantu bomkhosi, aba ngamakhulu omathandathu amawaka, anamanci asixhenxe amawaka, anesihlanu samawaka empahla emfutshane;
4_31_33_ngamashumi osixhenxe amawaka, anesibini samawaka eenkomo;
4_31_34_ngamashumi omathandathu amawaka, anawaka-nye amaesile;
4_31_35_neziqu zabantu emankazaneni angalalanga nandoda, zonke iziqu ngamashumi omathathu anesibini samawaka.
4_31_36_Isiqingatha, isabelo sabaphuma umkhosi ngokwenani, saba yimpahla emfutshane engamakhulu omathathu amawaka, anamanci mathathu amawaka, anesixhenxe samawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu;
4_31_37_inani likaYehova empahleni emfutshane, ngamakhulu omathandathu, anamanci asixhenxe anantlanu.
4_31_38_Iinkomo, ngamashumi omathathu amawaka, anesithandathu samawaka; kuzo, inani likaYehova ngamashumi osixhenxe anambini.
4_31_39_Amaesile, ngamashumi omathandathu amawaka, anamakhulu omahlanu; kuwo, inani likaYehova ngamashumi omathandathu ananye.
4_31_40_Iziqu zabantu, lishumi elinesithandathu lamawaka; kuzo,  inani likaYehova, iziqu zabantu, ngamashumi omathathu anazibini.
4_31_41_UMoses inani elo walinika uElazare umbingeleli, ukuba libe ngumrhumo kaYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
4_31_42_Isiqingatha soonyana bakaSirayeli, awasahlulayo uMoses kweyamadoda abephume umkhosi,
4_31_43_isiqingatha esisesebandla, empahleni emfutshane, saba ngamakhulu omathathu amawaka, anamancimathathu amawaka,  anesixhenxe samawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu.
4_31_44_Iinkomo, ngamashumi omathathu amawaka, anesithandathu samawaka;
4_31_45_amaesile, ngamashumi omathathu amawaka, anamakhulu mahlanu;
4_31_46_iziqu zabantu, lishumi elinesithandathu lamawaka.
4_31_47_Wacaphula uMoses esiqingatheni soonyana bakaSirayeli into ekhethiweyo, yanye emashumini omahlanu ebantwini,  nasezinkomeni, wazinika abaLevi, abagcina isigxina somnquba kaYehova, njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses.
4_31_48_Basondela kuMoses abaveleli ababengabamawaka omkhosi,  abathetheli-waka nabathetheli-khulu,
4_31_49_bathi kuMoses, Abakhonzi bakho balibalile inani lamadoda okulwa, abesezandleni zethu; akukho nanye indoda engekhoyo kuthi.
4_31_50_Sisondeze umsondezo kaYehova, elowo ngokufumana kwakhe,  impahla yegolide imixhaka, nezacholo, nemisesane yokutywina,  namajikazi, nezidanga, ukuba siyicamagushele imiphefumlo yethu phambi koYehova.
4_31_51_Wayithabatha uMoses noElazare umbingeleli igolide kubo,  yonke impahla esetyenziweyo.
4_31_52_Yonke igolide yomrhumo ababeyirhumele uYehova yaba ziishekele ezilishumi elinesithandathu lamawaka, anamakhulu osixhenxe, anamanci mahlanu, evela kubathetheli-waka, evela kubathetheli-khulu.
4_31_53_Wona amadoda abephume umkhosi abezithimbele.
4_31_54_Wayithabatha uMoses noElazare umbingeleli igolide kubathetheli-waka nakubathetheli-khulu, bayingenisa ententeni yokuhlangana. Yaba sisikhumbuzo soonyana bakaSirayeli phambi koYehova.
4_32_1_Oonyana bakaRubhen noonyana bakaGadi baye benemfuyo eninzi,  inkulu kunene. Balibona ilizwe laseYazere nelizwe laseGiliyadi,  nantso loo ndawo iyindawo yemfuyo.
4_32_2_Beza oonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen, bathetha kuMoses nakuElazare umbingeleli, nakwizikhulu zebandla, bathi,
4_32_3_IAtaroti, neDibhon, neYazare, neNimra, neHeshbhon,  ne-Elale, neSebham, neNebho, neBhehon,
4_32_4_ilizwe awalibethayo uYehova phambi kwebandla lakwaSirayeli,  lilizwe lemfuyo; ke abakhonzi bakho banemfuyo.
4_32_5_Bathi, Ukuba usibabale, abakhonzi bakho mabanikwe elo zwe,  ukuba libe lelabo; ungasiwezi iYordan.
4_32_6_Wathi uMoses koonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen, Baye emfazweni abazalwana benu, nihlale apha na nina?
4_32_7_Yini na ukuba nizityhafise iintliziyo zoonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba bangaweleli ezweni abanika lona uYehova?
4_32_8_Benjenjalo ooyihlo ekubasuseni kwam eKadeshe-bharneha,  ukuba balikhangele ilizwe.
4_32_9_Benyuka bada baya esihlanjeni sakwaEshkoli, balibona ilizwe, bazityhafisa iintliziyo zoonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba bangayi ezweni abanikayo uYehova.
4_32_10_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova ngaloo mhla, wafunga, wathi,
4_32_11_Ndobona ukuba okha awubone amadoda anyukayo eYiputa,  athabathela kominyaka imashumi mabini ezelwe enyusa, umhlaba endawufungela uAbraham noIsake noYakobi, kuba engakuzalisanga ukundilandela;
4_32_12_ingenguKalebhi unyana kaYefune, umKenazi, noYoshuwa,  unyana kaNun; ngokuba bekuzalisile ukumlandela uYehova bona.
4_32_13_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli, wawabhadulisa entlango iminyaka emashumi mane, sada sagqitywa sonke isizukulwana, esaye senze ububi emehlweni kaYehova.
4_32_14_Nanku nisuke nema esikhundleni sooyihlo, nikukwanda kwamadoda awonayo, ukongeza ngakumbi ekuvutheni komsindo kaYehova kwaSirayeli.
4_32_15_Xa nithe nabuya ekumlandeleni, wophinda kanjalo abasalise entlango nibonakalise ke aba bantu bonke.
4_32_16_Basondela kuye bathi, Izibaya zempahla emfutshane siya kuzibiyela imfuyo yethu apha, imizi siyakhele usapho lwethu.
4_32_17_Ke thina siya kukhawuleza sixhobe, sihambe phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli, side sibaseendaweni yabo; usapho lwethu luhlale emizini enqatyisiweyo, ngenxa yabemi balo ilizwe.
4_32_18_Asiyi kubuyela ezindlwini zethu, bade oonyana bakaSirayeli balizuze ilifa, elowo ilifa lakhe.
4_32_19_Kuba asiyi kudla lifa nabo phesheya kweYordan nangaphaya,  xa ilifa lethu silizuze nganeno kweYordan ngasempumalanga.
4_32_20_Wathi uMoses kubo, Ukuba nithe nalenza elo lizwi, ukuba nithe naxhobela imfazwe phambi koYehova,
4_32_21_bayiwela iYordan bonke abaxhobileyo kuni, behamba phambi koYehova, bada bazigqogqa iintshaba zabo phambi kwabo,
4_32_22_leyiswa ilizwe phambi koYehova, nabuya emveni koko: noba msulwa ke kuYehova nakuSirayeli, eli lizwe libe lelenu phambi koYehova.
4_32_23_Ke ukuba anithanga nenjenjalo, yabonani, noba nonile kuYehova, nazi ukuba isono senu siya kunifumana.
4_32_24_Zakheleni imizi iintsapho zenu, nezibaya zempahla yenu emfutshane, niyenze le nto iphumileyo emlonyeni wenu.
4_32_25_Bathetha oonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen, bathi,  Abakhonzi bakho baya kwenza njengoko inkosi yethu iwise umthetho.
4_32_26_Abantwana bethu, nabafazi bethu, nemfuyo yethu, namaqegu ethu onke, oba khona emizini yaseGiliyadi.
4_32_27_Ke abakhonzi bakho baya kuwela, bonke abomkhosi bexhobele imfazwe phambi koYehova, njengoko inkosi yethu itshoyo.
4_32_28_UMoses wamwisela umthetho ngabo uElazare umbingeleli,  noYoshuwa unyana kaNun, neentloko zezindlu zooyise zezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_32_29_Wathi uMoses kubo, Ukuba oonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen bathe bawela nani eYordan, bonke bexhobele imfazwe phambi koYehova, laza leyiswa ilizwe phambi kwenu, nobanika ilizwe laseGiliyadi, ukuba libe lelabo.
4_32_30_Ke ukuba abathanga bawele bexhobile nani, boba nelifa phakathi kwenu ezweni lakwaKanan.
4_32_31_Baphendula oonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen, bathi,  Oko akuthethileyo uYehova kubakhonzi bakho, baya kukwenza.
4_32_32_Thina siya kuwela sixhobile phambi koYehova, siye ezweni lakwaKanan, ukuze ibe yeyethu inzuzo yelifa lethu nganeno kweYordan.
4_32_33_UMoses wabanika oonyana bakaGadi noonyana bakaRubhen nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, unyana kaYosefu, ubukumkani bukaSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, nobukumkani bukaOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, ilizwe elo ngokwemizi yalo nemida yalo, imizi yelizwe elo ngeenxa zonke.
4_32_34_Bayakha oonyana bakaGadi iDibhon, neAtaroti, neArohere,
4_32_35_neAtaroti-shofan, neYazere, neYogebheha,
4_32_36_neBhete-nimra, neBhete-haran, imizi enqatyisiweyo,  nezibaya zempahla emfutshane.
4_32_37_Oonyana bakaRubhen bayakha iHeshbhon, ne-Elale,  neKiriyatayim,
4_32_38_neNebho, neBhahali-mehon (iguqulwe amagama ayo),  neSibhema; bayibiza ngamagama wambi imizi abayakhayo.
4_32_39_Baya oonyana bakaMakire, unyana kaManase, eGiliyadi;  bayithimba, bawagqogqa ama-Amori abekuyo.
4_32_40_UMoses wamnika elaseGiliyadi uMakire, unyana kaManase,  wahlala kulo.
4_32_41_UYahire unyana kaManase waya wazithimba iilali zakhona,  wathi yiHavoti-yahire.
4_32_42_UNobha wayawayithimba iKenati namagxamesi ayo, wathi igama layo yiNobha.
4_33_1_Zizo ezi iimfuduka zoonyana bakaSirayeli, abaphumayo ezweni laseYiputa ngokwemikhosi yabo, ngesandla sikaMoses noAron.
4_33_2_UMoses wakubhala ukuphuma kwabo ngokweemfuduka zabo,  ngokomlomo kaYehova. Zizo ke ezi iimfuduka zabo ngokuphuma kwabo:
4_33_3_Banduluka eRameses ngenyanga yokuqala, ngosuku lweshumi elinesihlanu lwenyanga yokuqala; ngengomso emva kwepasika,  baphuma oonyana bakaSirayeli ngesandla esiphakamileyo,  emehlweni amaYiputa onke.
4_33_4_AmaYiputa ayengcwaba abo wababethayo uYehova kuwo, bonke abamazibulo; nasezithixweni zabo uYehova wenza izigwebo.
4_33_5_Banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli eRameses, bamisa iintente eSukoti.
4_33_6_Banduluka eSukoti, bamisa e-Etam, esesiphelweni sentlango.
4_33_7_Banduluka e-Etam, babuyela ngasePihahiroti, ephambi kweBhahali-tsefon, bamisa phambi kweMigidoli.
4_33_8_Banduluka phambi kweHahiroti, baluwela ulwandle, baya entlango; bahamba uhambo lweemini ezintathu entlango ye-Etam,  bamisa eMara.
4_33_9_Banduluka eMara, bafika e-Elim; kwakukho e-Elim apho imithombo yamanzi elishumi elinamibini, nemithi yesundu engamashumi asixhenxe, bamisa khona.
4_33_10_Banduluka e-Elim, bamisa ngaseLwandle oluBomvu.
4_33_11_Banduluka eLwandle oluBomvu, bamisa entlango yeSin.
4_33_12_Banduluka entlango yeSin, bamisa eDofeka.
4_33_13_Banduluka eDofeka, bamisa eAlushe.
4_33_14_Banduluka eAlushe, bamisa eRefidim, apho kwakungekho manzi okuba abantu basele.
4_33_15_Banduluka eRefidim, bamisa entlango yeSinayi.
4_33_16_Banduluka entlango yeSinayi, bamisa eKibroti-hatahava.
4_33_17_Banduluka eKibroti-hatahava, bamisa eHatseroti.
4_33_18_Banduluka eHatseroti, bamisa eRitema.
4_33_19_Banduluka eRitema, bamisa eRimon-peretse.
4_33_20_Banduluka eRimon-peretse, bamisa eLibhena.
4_33_21_Banduluka eLibhena, bamisa eRisa.
4_33_22_Banduluka eRisa, bamisa eKehelata.
4_33_23_Banduluka eKehelata, bamisa entabeni yeShefere.
4_33_24_Banduluka entabeni yeShefere, bamisa eHarada.
4_33_25_Banduluka eHarada, bamisa eMakeloti.
4_33_26_Banduluka eMakeloti, bamisa eTahati.
4_33_27_Banduluka eTahati, bamisa eTara.
4_33_28_Banduluka eTara, bamisa eMiteka.
4_33_29_Banduluka eMiteka, bamisa eHashemona.
4_33_30_Banduluka eHashemona, bamisa eMoseroti.
4_33_31_Banduluka eMoseroti, bamisa eBhene-yahakan.
4_33_32_Banduluka eBhene-yahakan, bamisa emqolombeni waseGidegadi.
4_33_33_Banduluka emqolombeni waseGidegadi, bamisa eYotebhata.
4_33_34_Banduluka eYotebhata, bamisa eAbrona.
4_33_35_Banduluka eAbrona, bamisa e-Etsiyon-gebhere.
4_33_36_Banduluka e-Etsiyon-gebhere, bamisa entlango yeTsin eyiKadeshe.
4_33_37_Banduluka eKadeshe, bamisa entabeni yeHore, esiphelweni selizwe lwakwaEdom.
4_33_38_Wenyuka uAron, umbingeleli, waya entabeni yeHore ngokomlomo kaYehova, wafela khona ngomnyaka wamashumi amane wokuphuma koonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni lamaYiputa, ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngolokuqala enyangeni leyo.
4_33_39_UAron wayeminyaka ilikhulu linamanci mabini anamithathu ezelwe, ekufeni kwakhe entabeni yeHore.
4_33_40_Weva umKanan, ukumkani waseAradi, owayehleli kwelisezantsi ezweni lakwaKanan ukuba bafikile oonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_33_41_Banduluka entabeni yeHore, bamisa eTsalimona.
4_33_42_Banduluka eTsalimona, bamisa ePunon.
4_33_43_Banduluka ePunon, bamisa eObhoti.
4_33_44_Banduluka eObhoti, bamisa eIye-abharim, emdeni wakwaMowabhi.
4_33_45_Banduluka eIyim, bamisa eDibhon yakwaGadi.
4_33_46_Banduluka eDibhon yakwaGadi, bamisa eAlimon-dihlatayim.
4_33_47_Banduluka eAlimon-dihlatayim, bamisa ezintabeni zeAbharim phambi kweNebho.
4_33_48_Banduluka ezintabeni zeAbharim, bamisa ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi, ngaseYordan malunga neYeriko,
4_33_49_Bamisa ngaseYordan, bethabathela kwiBhete-yeshimoti, besa kwiAbhele-shitim ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi.
4_33_50_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi,  ngaseYordan malunga neYeriko, esithi,
4_33_51_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nayiwela iYordan, nangena ezweni lakwaKanan,
4_33_52_nobagqogqa bonke abemi belo zwe phambi kwenu, niwachithe onke amatye angumfanekiso, nemifanekiso yabo yonke etyhidiweyo niyichithe, nazo zonke iziganga zabo nizitshabalalise;
4_33_53_nilihluthe ilizwe, nihlale kulo; kuba ndininikile ilizwe eli, ukuba nime kulo.
4_33_54_Nize nilabe ilizwe ngamaqashiso ngokwemizalwane yenu.  Omninzi nolenza lininzi ilifa lawo, omncinane nilenze lincinane ilifa lawo; ingulowo ube sendaweni elothiliwe kuyo iqashiso lawo. Nolidla ilifa ngokwezizwe zooyihlo.
4_33_55_Ukuba anithanga nibagqogqe abemi belizwe phambi kwenu,  kothi abo nibasalisileyo babengameva emehlweni enu, neemviko emacaleni enu, banibandezele ezweni enihleli kulo.
4_33_56_Kothi, njengoko ndagqibayo ukwenza kubo, ndenze ngako nakuni.
4_34_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_34_2_Bawisele oonyana bakaSirayeli umthetho, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nangena ezweni lakwaKanan (lilo eli ilizwe eliya kuwela kuni libe lilifa, ilizwe lakwaKanan ngokwemida yalo),
4_34_3_icala lenu lasezantsi lothabathela entlango yeTsin,  ngasemacaleni akwaEdom; nomda wenu wasezantsi wothabathela esiphelweni soLwandle lweTyuwa ngasempumalanga;
4_34_4_umda wenu ujikele ezantsi, uye ekunyukeni kweAkrabhim,  udlule uye eTsin, nokuphuma kwawo usinge ezantsi eKadeshe-bharneha; uphume uye eHatsare-adare, udlule uye eAtsemon;
4_34_5_umda ujikele eAtsemon, uye emlanjaneni waseYiputa; ukuphuma kwawo usinge elwandle.
4_34_6_Umda wenu wasentshonalanga woba lulwandle olukhulu,  nommandla walo; lowo woba ngumda wenu wasentshonalanga.
4_34_7_Woba ngulo umda wenu wangasentla: nothabathela elwandle olukhulu, nizisikele intaba yeHore;
4_34_8_nithabathele entabeni yeHore, nisike niye eHamati; ukuphuma komda, uye eTsedada;
4_34_9_uphume umda uyeeZifron; ukuphuma kwawo ume eHatsare-enan.  Ngumda wenu wangasentla ke lowo.
4_34_10_Nozisikela umda wasempumalanga, nithabathele eHatsare-enan, nise eShefam;
4_34_11_uhle umda eShefam, uyeeRibhela, ngasempumalanga eAyin;  uhle umda uthane nqiphu negxalaba loLwandle lwaseKinerete ngasempumalanga;
4_34_12_umda uhle iYordan; ukuphuma kwawo kume ngoLwandle lweTyuwa. Loba lilizwe lenu elo, ngokwemida yalo ngeenxa zonke.
4_34_13_UMoses wabawisela umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli, esithi,  Lilo elo ilizwe enolabelwa ngeqashiso, awise umthetho ngalo uYehova wokuba linikwe izizwe ezisithoba ezinesiqingatha sesizwe.
4_34_14_Ngokuba isizwe soonyana bakaRubhen ngokwezindlu zooyise,  nesizwe soonyana bakaGadi ngokwezindlu zooyise, nesiqingatha sesizwe sikaManase, sisesilizuzile ilifa laso.
4_34_15_Izizwe ezibini nesiqingatha sesizwe zilizuzile ilifa lazo nganeno kweYordan, malunga neYeriko ngasempumalanga phambili.
4_34_16_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_34_17_Ngawo la amagama amadoda aya kunabela ilizwe ukuba libe lilifa: uElazare umbingeleli, noYoshuwa unyana kaNun.
4_34_18_Nothabatha isikhulu sibe sinye, isikhulu sibe sinye esizweni, nilabe ilizwe ukuba libe lilifa.
4_34_19_Ngawo la amagama aloo madoda: esizweni sakwaYuda,  nguKalebhi unyana kaYefune;
4_34_20_esizweni soonyana bakaSimon, nguShemuweli unyana ka-Amihude;
4_34_21_esizweni sakwaBhenjamin, nguElidade unyana kaKiselon;
4_34_22_esizweni soonyana bakaDan, sisikhulu esinguBhuki unyana kaYogeli;
4_34_23_koonyana bakaYosefu, esizweni soonyana bakaManase,  sisikhulu esinguHaniyeli, unyana kaEfodi;
4_34_24_esizweni soonyana bakaEfrayim, sisikhulu esinguKemuweli,  unyana kaShifitan;
4_34_25_esizweni soonyana bakaZebhulon, sisikhulu esinguElitsafan,  unyana kaParnaki;
4_34_26_esizweni soonyana bakaIsakare, sisikhulu esinguPalatiyeli,  unyana ka-Azan;
4_34_27_esizweni soonyana baka-Ashere, sisikhulu esinguAhihudi,  unyana kaShelomi;
4_34_28_esizweni soonyana bakaNafetali, sisikhulu esinguPedayeli,  unyana ka-Amihude.
4_34_29_Ngabo abo, awabawiselayo umthetho uYehova wokuba bababele ilifa oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni lakwaKanan.
4_35_1_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses ezinkqantsoni zakwaMowabhi ngaseYordan, malunga neYeriko, esithi,
4_35_2_Bawisele oonyana bakaSirayeli umthetho, ukuba babanike abaLevi elifeni lenzuzo yabo imizi yokubabahlale kuyo, nibanike abaLevi namadlelo ngasemizini yabo ngeenxa zonke.
4_35_3_Imizi yabo yoba yeyokuhlala, amadlelo ayo abe ngaweenkomo zabo, nempahla yabo, nento yabo yonke ephilileyo.
4_35_4_Amadlelo emizi enobanika abaLevi othabathela eludongeni lomzi ase ngaphandle, abe ziikubhite eziliwaka ngeenxa zonke;
4_35_5_nilinganise nithabathela ngaphandle komzi, icala lasempumalanga libe ziikubhite ezingamawaka amabini, icala langasezantsi libe ziikubhite ezingamawaka amabini, icala lasentshonalanga libe ziikubhite ezingamawaka amabini, icala langasentla libe ziikubhite ezingamawaka amabini, umzi ubesesazulwini. Lawo oba ngamadlelo emizi yabo.
4_35_6_Imizi eniya kuyinika abaLevi yoba nemizi emithandathu yokusabela, enobanika ukuba abalekele kuyo umbulali, kuleyo nongeze imizi engamashumi amane anambini.
4_35_7_Yonke imizi enobanika yona abaLevi yoba yimizi engamashumi amane anesibhozo, anamadlelo ayo.
4_35_8_Imizi enobanika enzuzweni yoonyana bakaSirayeli noyenza mininzi kwesininzi, niyenze mincinane kwesincinane; eso isizwe,  ngokomlinganiso welifa laso esiya kulidla, sobanika abaLevi emizini yaso.
4_35_9_Wathetha uYehova kuMoses, esithi,
4_35_10_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi kubo, Xa nithe nayiwela iYordan, nafika ezweni lakwaKanan,
4_35_11_nozihlelela imizi ibe yimizi yenu yokusabela, abalekele kuyo umbulali obulele umntu ngengozi.
4_35_12_Yoba yimizi yenu yokusaba kumphindezeli, angafi umbulali,  ade eme phambi kwebandla, lithethwe ityala lakhe.
4_35_13_Ke imizi enobanika yoba yimizi yenu yokusabela emithandathu.
4_35_14_Nganeno kweYordan nobanika imizi emithathu; ezweni lakwaKanan nobanika imizi emithathu, ibe yimiziyokusabela.
4_35_15_Loo mizi mithandathu yoba yeyokusabela koonyana bakaSirayeli, nakumphambukeli, nakundwendwe oluphakathi kwenu,  babalekele kuyo bonke ababulele umntu ngengozi.
4_35_16_Ukuba ubani uthe wambetha umntu ngentsimbi, wafa,  ungumbulali; wobulawa afe umbulali lowo.
4_35_17_Ukuba uthe wambetha ngelitye elisesandleni, angafayo ngalo, wafa, ungumbulali; makabulawe afe umbulali lowo.
4_35_18_Nokuba uthe wambetha ngento engumthi osesandleni, angafayo ngayo, wafa, ungumbulali; makabulawe afe umbulali lowo.
4_35_19_Umphindezeli wegazi wombulala ngokwakhe umbulali lowo;  akuqubisana naye wombulala ngokwakhe.
4_35_20_Ukuba uthe wamtyhala ngokumthiya, nokuba umgibisele emzonda, wafa;
4_35_21_nokuba uthe wambetha ngesandla sakhe ngobutshaba, wafa:  makabulawe afe lowo umbethileyo; ungumbulali yena. Umphindezeli wegazi wombulala umbulali lowo akuqubisana naye.
4_35_22_Ukuba uthe wamqubula wamtyhala, engenabutshaba, nokuba umgibisele ngempahla nokuba nangayiphi na into, engamzondi,
4_35_23_nokuba lilitye angafayo ngalo, engamboni, amwisele ngalo,  engenabutshaba naye, engafuni kumenza nto imbi:
4_35_24_liya kwahlula ibandla phakathi kobethileyo nomphindezeli wegazi, ngokwezo zigwebo;
4_35_25_limhlangule ibandla umbulali esandleni somphindezeli wegazi, limbuvisele ibandla emzini wokusabela kwakhe,  abebalekele kuwo, ahlale kuwo ade afe umbingeleli omkhulu othanjisiweyo ngeoli engcwele.
4_35_26_Ukuba umbulali uthe waphuma ngaphandle komda womzi wokusabela kwakhe abebalekele kuwo,
4_35_27_umphindezeli wegazi wamfumana engaphandle komda womzi wokusabela kwakhe, umphindezeli wegazi wambulala umbulali lowo,  akayi kuba natyala lagazi lowo.
4_35_28_Kuba ange ehleli emzini wokusabela kwakhe, kwada kwafa umbingeleli omkhulu. Ke emveni kukufa kombingeleli omkhulu,  umbulali wobuyela emhlabeni wenzuzo yakhe.
4_35_29_Ezo zinto zoba ngummiselo wokugweba kuni kwizizukulwana zenu emakhayeni enu onke.
4_35_30_Bonke ababulele umntu, makabulawe umbulali lowo ngomlomo wamangqina; kodwa ingqina lilinye aliyikungqina ngomntu afe.
4_35_31_Ize ningathabathi lucamagusho ngenxa yomphefumlo wobulali osukuba engongendawo, engowokufa; makabulawe afe.
4_35_32_Ize ningathabathi lucamagusho ngenxa yobalekele emzini wokusabela kwakhe, ukuba abuye eze kuhlala emhlabeni wakhe, ade afe umbingeleli.
4_35_33_Ize ningalihlambeli ilizwe enikulo, kuba ligazi elihlambela ilizwe. Ilizwe ke alinakucanyagushelwa ngenxa yegazi eliphalaziweyo kulo, kungengagazi lowaliphalazayo.
4_35_34_Nize ningalenzi nqambi ke ilizwe enihleli kulo, endihleli kulo; kuba mna, Yehova, ndihleli phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
4_36_1_Kwasondela iintloko zezindlu zooyise ngokwemizalwane yoonyana bakaGiliyadi, unyana kaMakire, unyana kaManase,  wasemizalwaneni yoonyana bakaYosefu, bathetha phambi koMoses naphambi kwezikhulu, iintloko zezindlu zooyise zoonyana bakaSirayeli,
4_36_2_bathi, UYehova wayiwisela umthetho inkosi yethu, ukuba ibanike ilizwe ngamaqashiso oonyana bakaSirayeli, ukuba libe lilifa. Inkosi yethu ke yawiselwa umthetho nguYehova, ukuba ilifa likaTselofehadi, umzalwana wethu, ilinike iintombi zakhe.
4_36_3_Ke ukuba zithe zaba ngabafazi bothile koonyana bezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli, loncitshiswa ilifa loobawo lilifa lazo,  longezelelwe kwilifa lesizwe eziya kuba kuso, lincitshiswe iqashiso lelifa lethu.
4_36_4_Ukuba uthe wafika umnyaka wakuhlokomisa ngesigodlo koonyana bakaSirayeli, losuka longezelelwe ilifalazo kwilifa lezizwe eziya kuba kuso, lincitshiswe ilifa lesizwe soobawo lilifa lazo.
4_36_5_Wabawisela ke uMoses umthetho oonyana bakaSirayeli ngokomlomo kaYehova, esithi, Isizwe soonyana bakaYosefu silungisile ukuthetha.
4_36_6_Lilo eli ilizwi alenze umthetho uYehova ezintombini zikaTselofehadi: uthi, Mazendele kulowo zimthandileyo, kodwa mazendele emzalwaneni wesizwe sikayise;
4_36_7_ukuze lingashenxi ilifa loonyana bakaSirayeli, lisuke kwesinye isizwe, liye kwesinye isizwe. Ngokuba baya kunamathela oonyana bakaSirayeli elowo elifeni lesizwe sooyise.
4_36_8_Zonke iintombi ezinelifa ezizweni zoonyana bakaSirayeli ziya kwendela kothile emzalwaneni wesizwe sooyise, ukuze oonyana bakaSirayeli babe nalo elowo ilifa looyise;
4_36_9_ukuze lingashenxi ilifa esizweni, liyesizweni simbi, kuba izizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli ziya kunamathela eso elifeni laso.
4_36_10_Njengoko uYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses, zenjenjalo iintombi zikaTselofehadi.
4_36_11_UMala, noTirtsa, noHogela, noMilka, noNoha, iintombi zikaTselofehadi, zendela koonyana babazalwana bakayise;
4_36_12_zendela emizalwaneni yoonyana bakaManase, unyana kaYosefu;  ilifa lazo laba sesizweni somzalwana kayise.
4_36_13_Yiyo leyo imithetho namasiko awawawisayo uYehova ngesandla sikaMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli, ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi,  ngaseYordan malunga neYeriko.
5_1_1_Ngawo la ke amazwi, awawathethayo uMoses kumaSirayeli onke phesheya kweYordan entlango, eArabha, malungana noLwandle oluBomvu, phakathi kweParan, neTofele, neLabhan, neHatseroti,  neDizahabhi.
5_1_2_Ziintsuku ezilishumi elinalunye ukusuka eHorebhe ngendlela yentaba yakwaSehire, ukuya eKadeshe-bharneha.
5_1_3_Ngomnyaka wamashumi omane, ngenyanga yeshumi elinanye,  ngolokuqala enyangeni leyo, wathetha uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli ngako konke uYehova abemwisele umthetho ngako kubo.
5_1_4_Emveni kokumbulala kwakhe uSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, obemi eHeshbhon, no-Ogi ukumkani waseBhashan, obemi eAshtaroti nase-Edreyi,
5_1_5_phesheya kweYordan ezweni lakwaMowabhi, waqala uMoses ukubaqononondisa lo myalelo, esithi:
5_1_6_UYehova uThixo wethu wathetha kuthi eHorebhe, wathi, Kukade nihleli kule ntaba.
5_1_7_Jikani ninduluke, niye entabeni yama-Amori, nakubo bonke abamelene nayo, eArabha, ezintabeni, nasesihlanjeni,  nakwelasezantsi, nangaselwandle, ezweni lamaKanan,  naseLebhanon, nide nise kuwo umlambo omkhulu, umlambo ongumEfrati.
