5_1_8_Khangelani, ndinisikele ilizwe. Ngenani, nakhe kwelo zwe wafungayo uYehova kooyihlo, ooAbraham noIsake noYakobi, ukuba wolinika bona, nembewu yabo emva kwabo.
5_1_9_Ndathi kuni ngelo xesha, Andinakunithwala ndedwa.
5_1_10_UYehova uThixo wenu unandisile; nanku namhla ningangeenkwenkwezi zezulu ukuba baninzi kwenu.
5_1_11_UYehova uThixo wooyihlo makalongeze inani lenu kaliwaka kunoko lingako, anisikelele njengoko wathethayo kuni.
5_1_12_Ndingathini na ukubuthwala ndedwa ubunzima benu, nomthwalo wenu, nembambano yenu?
5_1_13_Zikhangeleleni amadoda alumkileyo, aziingqondi, aziwayo,  ngokwezizwe zakomawenu, ndiwamise abe ziintloko zenu.
5_1_14_Nandiphendula nathi, Ilizwi olithethileyo lilungile ukuba silenze.
5_1_15_Ndabathabatha ke abaziintloko zezizwe zakowenu, amadoda alumkileyo, aziwayo, ndawamisa aba ziintloko phezu kwenu:  abathetheli-waka, nabathetheli-makhulu, nabathetheli-mashumi ngamahlanu, nabathetheli-mashumi ngamanye, nabaphathi,  ngokwezizwe zakomawenu.
5_1_16_Ndabawisela umthetho abaphathi benu ngelo xesha, ndathi,  Noyilamla into ephakathi kwabazalwana benu, nigwebe ngobulungisa phakathi komntu nomzalwana wakhe, nowasemzini okuye.
5_1_17_Ize ningakhethi buso ekugwebeni kwenu; ize nimphulaphule omncinane njengomkhulu, ninganxunguphaliswa bubuso bomntu;  ngokuba ukugweba oku kokukaYehova. Indawo eninqabeleyo noyizisa kum, ndiyive.
5_1_18_Ndaniwisela umthetho ngelo xesha ngezinto zonke enozenza.
5_1_19_Sanduluka eHorebhe, sayihamba yonke laa ntlango inkulu,  yoyikekayo nayibonayo, sihamba ngendlela yentaba yama-Amori,  njengoko uYehova uThixo wethu wasiyalelayo, sada seza eKadeshe-bharneha.
5_1_20_Ndathi ke kuni, Nifikile entabeni yama-Amori, awasinikayo uYehova, uThixo wethu.
5_1_21_Khangela, uYehova uThixo wakho ulinikele kuwe ilizwe elo:  nyuka wakhe kulo, njengoko wathethayo uYehova uThixo wooyihlo kuwe. Musa ukoyika, ungakwantyi nokunkwantya.
5_1_22_Nasondela ke kum nina aba nonke, nathi, Masisuse amadoda,  asandulele, asihlolele ilizwe elo, asizisele ilizwi lendlela esonyuka ngayo, nemizi esofika kuyo.
5_1_23_Lalunga ke elo zwi emehlweni am, ndathabatha kuni amadoda alishumi elinamabini, indoda yanye esizweni.
5_1_24_Ajika ke, enyuka aya entabeni, ada afika esihlanjeni sakwaEshkoli, asihlola.
5_1_25_Athabatha isiqhamo selo zwe ngesandla sawo, asiphathela,  asizisela ilizwi, athi, Lilizwe elihle asinikayo uYehova uThixo wethu.
5_1_26_Kanti noko anivumanga kunyuka, nawuphikisa umlomo kaYehova uThixo wenu.
5_1_27_Nakrokra ezintenteni zenu, nathi, Wasikhupha kuba esithiyile uYehova ezweni laseYiputa, ukuze asinikele esandleni sama-Amori, asitshabalalise.
5_1_28_Siya kunyukela phi na? Abazalwana bethu bazinyibilikisile iintliziyo zethu, besithi, Abantu bakhulu, bade kunathi; imizi mikhulu, inqatyisiwe yada yesa ezulwini; kananjalo noonyana baka-Anaki sibabone khona.
5_1_29_Ndathi ke kuni, Ize ningangcangcazeli, ningaboyiki.
5_1_30_NguYehova uThixo wenu, ohamba phambi kwenu. Yena wonilwela,  njengako konke awanenzelayo eYiputa emehlweni enu;
5_1_31_nasentlango, apho wakubonayo ukukuthwala kukaYehova uThixo wakho, njengomntu ethwele unyana wakhe, ngendlela yonke enahamba ngayo, nada naza kufika kule ndawo.
5_1_32_Kanti ke nakwelo zwi anikholwanga nguYehova uThixo wenu,
5_1_33_ohamba phambi kwenu endleleni, ukuba anihlolele indawo yokumisa iintente zenu, ngomlilo ebusuku; anibonise indlela enohamba ngayo, ngelifu emini.
5_1_34_Waliva uYehova ilizwi lokuthetha kwenu, wanoburhalarhume,  wafunga, esithi,
5_1_35_Akukho ndoda, kula madoda esi sizukulwana singendawo, iya kukha ilibone ilizwe elihle, elo ndafungayo ukuba ndolinika ooyihlo,
5_1_36_ingenguKalebhi unyana kaYefune; wolibona yena. Ndiya kumnika ilizwe awanyathela phezu kwalo, yena noonyana bakhe,  ngenxa enokuba emlandele kwaphela uYehova.
5_1_37_Kanjalo uYehova wandifuthela nam ngenxa yenu, wathi, Nawe lo akuyi kungena khona.
5_1_38_UYoshuwa unyana kaNun, oma phambi kwakho, nguye owongena khona; momeleze, ngokuba yena wowadlisa ilifa elo amaSirayeli.
5_1_39_Ke iintsatshana zenu, enibe nisithi zoba lixhoba,  nabantwana benu abangakwaziyo namhla okulungileyo nokubi, bona bongena khona; ndolinika bona beme kulo.
5_1_40_Ke nina jikani, ninduluke niye entlango ngendlela eya eLwandle oluBomvu.
5_1_41_Naphendula, nathi kum, Sonile kuYehova; sonyuka thina,  silwe njengako konke asiyalele ngako uYehova uThixo wethu.  Naxhoba ke elowo impahla yakhe yokulwa, nenza buphuthuphuthu ukunyuka intaba.
5_1_42_Wathi uYehova kum, Yithi kubo, Ize ningenyuki, ize ningalwi; kuba andikhona phakathi kwenu; hleze nigxothwe ziintshaba zenu.
5_1_43_Ndathetha kuni, anaphulaphula; nawuphikisa umlomo kaYehova,  nagxalathelana ukunyuka intaba.
5_1_44_Aphuma ke ama-Amori ami kuloo ntaba, anihlangabeza,  anichitha, axelisa iinyosi, anibetha kwaSehire, ada esa eHorma.
5_1_45_Nabuya ke nalila phambi koYehova; akaliphulaphula uYehova izwi lenu, akanibekela ndlebe.
5_1_46_Ngoko ke nahlala eKadeshe imihla emininzi, njengaloo mihla nayihlalayo apho.
5_2_1_Sanduluka, sabheka entlango ngendlela eya eLwandle oluBomvu,  njengoko uYehova wathetha kum, sayijikeleza intaba yakwaSehire imihla emininzi.
5_2_2_Wathetha uYehova kum, wathi,
5_2_3_Kukade niyijikeleza le ntaba; bhekani ngasentla,
5_2_4_ubawisele abantu umthetho uthi, Niya kugqitha nje emdeni wabazalwana benu, oonyana bakaEsawu, abemi kwaSehire. Baya kunoyika, ize nizilumkele ke kunene.
5_2_5_Ize ningabambani nabo; kuba ezweni labo andiyi kuninika nendawo engangokunyathela kwentende yonyawo; ngokuba ndimnikile uEsawu intaba yakwaSehire ukuba ayime.
5_2_6_Ukudla nokuthenga kubo ngemali, nidle; namanzi nowemba kubo ngemali, nisele.
5_2_7_Kuba uYehova, uThixo wakho, ukusikelele emsebenzini wonke wesandla sakho. Uyakwazi ukuyihamba kwakho le ntlango inkulu;  le minyaka imashumi mane uYehova uThixo wakho unawe,  akuswelanga nto.
5_2_8_Segqitha ke kubazalwana bethu, oonyana bakaEsawu, abemiyo kwaSehire, saphambuka endleleni yeArabha, e-Elati nase-Etsiyon-gebhere. Sajika ke, sadlula ngendlela yentlango yakwaMowabhi.
5_2_9_Wathi uYehova kum, Uze ungawabandezeli amaMowabhi, uze ungabambani nawo ulwe nawo; kuba andiyi kukunika nto yelizwe lawo uyihluthe; kuba iAre ndiyinike oonyana bakaLote, ukuba bayime.
5_2_10_AmaEma ayemi kulo kudala, engabantu abakhulu, abaninzi,  abade njengama-Anaki.
5_2_11_Bekusithiwa ngamaRafa nawo, njengama-Anaki; ke amaMowabhi athi ngamaEma.
5_2_12_NakwaSehire bekumi amaHori kudala; koko oonyana bakaEsawu bawagqogqa, bawatshabalalisa ebusweni babo, bahlala esikhundleni sawo, njengoko akwenzayo amaSirayeli ezweni lelifa lawo, abelinikwe nguYehova.
5_2_13_Ndathi ke, Ndulukani ngoku, niwele umlanjana weZerede;  sawuwela ke umlanjana weZerede.
5_2_14_Imihla yokuhamba kwethu, sisuka eKadeshe-bharneha side siwele umlanjana weZerede, yaba yiminyaka emashumi mathathu anesibhozo; sada saphela sonke eso sizukulwana samadoda okulwa phakathi komkhosi, njengoko uYehova wawafungelayo.
5_2_15_Saye kananjalo isandla sikaYehova siphezu kwawo, ukuba adutywadutywe phakathi komkhosi ade agqitywe.
5_2_16_Kwathi, xenikweni onke amadoda okulwa ayegqityiwe, afa phakathi kwabantu,
5_2_17_wathetha uYehova kum, esithi,
5_2_18_Namhla uya kugqitha emdeni wakwaMowabhi oyiAre,
5_2_19_usondele malungana noonyana baka-Amon. Uze ungababandezeli,  uze ungabambani nabo; kuba ezweni loonyana baka-Amon andiyi kukunika ndawo yakuma; ngokuba ndilinike oonyana bakaLote ukuba limiwe ngabo.
5_2_20_Bekusithiwa lilizwe lamaRafa nalo. Bekumi amaRafa khona kudala; ama-Amon athi ngamaZamzum;
5_2_21_engabantu abakhulu, abaninzi, abade njengama-Anaki. UYehova wabatshabalalisa ebusweni babo; babagqogqa, bema esikhundleni sabo;
5_2_22_njengoko wabenzelayo oonyana bakaEsawu abemiyo kwaSehire,  wawatshabalalisa amaHori ebusweni babo, bawagqogqa, bema esikhundleni sawo unanamhla.
5_2_23_Nama-Avi ayemi emizaneni, ada esa eGaza; amaKafetori,  awaphumayo kwelamaKafetori, awatshabalalisa, ema esikhundleni sawo.
5_2_24_Sukani ninduluke, niwele umlanjana oyiArnon. Yabona,  ndimnikele esandleni sakho uSihon ukumkani waseHeshbhon,  umAmori, nelizwe lakhe. Qala ukulihlutha, ubambane naye, ulwe naye.
5_2_25_Ngale mini ndiya kuqala ukubeka ukunkwantya ngawe nokoyikeka kwakho phezu kwabantu abaphantsi kwezulu lonke,  abaya kuluva udaba lwakho bagungqe, bazibhijabhije ngenxa enawe.
5_2_26_Ndasusa abathunywa entlango yeKedemoti, baya kuSihon ukumkani waseHeshbhon, benamazwi oxolo okuthi, Ndiyeke ndicande ezweni lakho.
5_2_27_Ndohamba ngendlela le yodwa; andiyi kuthi gu bucala ndiye ekunene nasekhohlo.
5_2_28_Ukudla wondithengela ngemali ndidle, namanzi wondinika ngemali ndisele, ndihambe nje kodwa ngeenyawo;
5_2_29_njengoko benza ngako kum oonyana bakaEsawu abemiyo kwaSehire, namaMowabhi abemiyo eAre; ndide ndiwele iYordan,  ndiye ezweni asinikayo uYehova uThixo wethu.
5_2_30_Akavuma uSihon ukumkani weHeshbhon, ukuba sicande kuye,  ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho wamqinisa isibindi, wayenza ingqoshomba intliziyo yakhe, ukuze amnikele esandleni sakho,  njengokuba kunjalo namhla.
5_2_31_Wathi uYehova kum, Yabona, ndiqalile ukumnikela kuwe uSihon nelizwe lakhe; qala ukulihlutha, ulidle ilifa ilizwe lakhe.
5_2_32_Waphuma ke uSihon wasihlangabeza, yena nabantu bakhe bonke,  eza kulwa eYatsa.
5_2_33_UYehova uThixo wethu wamnikela kuthi; sambulala, yena noonyana bakhe, nabantu bakhe bonke.
5_2_34_Sayithimba yonke imizi yakhe ngelo xesha, sawasingela phantsi amadoda emizi yonke, nabafazi, nabantwana; asasalisa namnye usindayo.
5_2_35_Ziinkomo zodwa esazithimbelayo, namaxhoba emizi esayithimbayo.
5_2_36_Sathabathela eArohere, eseludinini lomlanjana oyiArnon,  emzini osesihlanjeni, sada sesa eGiliyadi, akwabakho mzi usinqabelayo; konke wakunikela kuthi uYehova uThixo wethu.
5_2_37_Lilizwe loonyana baka-Amon lodwa, eningasondelanga kulo:  lonke icala lomlanjana oyiYabhoki, nemizi yasezintabeni, nento yonke awawisa umthetho ngayo uYehova uThixo wethu.
5_3_1_Sajika, senyuka ngendlela yaseBhashan; waphuma uOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, wasihlangabeza yena nabantu bakhe bonke, ukuba kuliwe e-Edreyi.
5_3_2_Wathi uYehova kum, Musa ukumoyika; ngokuba ndimnikele esandleni sakho, nabantu bakhe bonke, nelizwe lakhe; uya kwenza kuye njengoko wenza ngako kuSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, obemi eHeshbhon.
5_3_3_UYehova uThixo wethu wamnikela ke ezandleni zethu uOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, nabantu bakhe bonke; sambulala, kwada akwabakho namnye usindayo.
5_3_4_Sayithimba yonke imizi yakhe ngelo xesha, akwabakho mzi singawuthabathanga kubo; imizi yaba mashumi mathandathu, wonke ummandla waseArgobhi, ubukumkani bukaOgi eBhashan.
5_3_5_Yonke loo mizi ibinqatyiswe ngodonga oluphakamileyo,  namasango, nemivalo; iyodwa imizi yabasemaphandleni, eyabe imininzi kunene.
5_3_6_Sayisingela phantsi, njengoko senzayo kuSihon ukumkani waseHeshbhon; sasingela phantsi amadoda emizi yonke, nabafazi,  nabantwana.
5_3_7_Ke zona iinkomo zonke namaxhoba aloo mizi sazithimbela.
5_3_8_Salithabatha ke ngelo xesha ilizwe esandleni sookumkani bobabini bama-Amori, elingaphonoshono kweYordan, lisusela kumlanjana oyiArnon, lada lesa entabeni yeHermon
5_3_9_(amaTsidon athi iHermon leyo yiSiriyon, ke ama-Amori athi yiSenire),
5_3_10_yonke imizi yehewu, neyelaseGiliyadi lonke, neBhashan yonke, kwada kwesa eSaleka ne-Edreyi, imizi yobukumkani bukaOgi eBhashan.
5_3_11_Ngokuba nguOgi yedwa, ukumkani waseBhashan, impunde eyayisele kumaRafa. Nantso ikoyi yakhe, ikoyi yentsimbi;  asiyiyo na leya iseRabha yakoonyana baka-Amon? Iziikubhite ezisithoba ubude bayo, iziikubhite ezine ububanzi bayo,  ngokwekubhite yabantu.
5_3_12_Elo lizwe salihlutha ngelo xesha, sithabathela eArohere ekumlanjana oyiArnon; nesiqingatha sentaba yeGiliyadi, nemizi yayo ndayinika amaRubhen namaGadi.
5_3_13_Amasalela aseGiliyadi naweBhashan yonke, ubukumkani bukaOgi, ndawanika isiqingatha sesizwe sikaManase; wonke ummandla weArgobhi neBhashan yonke, leyo bekusithiwa lilizwe lamaRafa.
5_3_14_UYahire, unyana kaManase, wathabatha wonke ummandla weArgobhi, wada wesa emdeni wamaGeshuri namaMahakati, wawubiza ngegama lakhe, wathi iBhashan yiHavoti-yahire, unanamhla.
5_3_15_UMakire ndamnika elaseGiliyadi.
5_3_16_AmaRubhen namaGadi ndawanika, ndithabathela kwelaseGiliyadi, ndada ke ndesa kumlanjana oyiArnon,  empholokhohlweni wesihlambo, naloo mmandla waso, ndada ndesa naseYabhoki emlanjaneni, emdeni woonyana baka-Amon;
5_3_17_neArabha, neYordan nommandla wayo, ndithabathela eKinerete,  ndada ndesa elwandle lweArabha, uLwandle lweTyuwa, phantsi kwamaxandeka ePisga ngasempumalanga.
5_3_18_Ndaniwisela umthetho ngelo xesha, ndisithi, UYehova uThixo wenu uninike eli lizwe ukuba nilihluthe. Welani nixhobile phambi kwabazalwana benu, oonyana bakaSirayeli, nonke nina bafo banobukroti.
5_3_19_Kodwa abafazi benu, nabantwana benu, nemfuyo yenu (ndiyazi ukuba ninemfuyo eninzi), mabahlale emizini yenu endininike yona;
5_3_20_ade uYehova abaphumze abazalwana benu njengani, balime nabo ilizwe elo abanika lona uYehova uThixo wenu phesheya kweYordan;  nibuyele ke elowo elifeni lakhe endininike lona.
5_3_21_UYoshuwa ndamwisela umthetho ngelo xesha, ndisithi, Amehlo akho akubonile konke oku akwenzileyo uYehova uThixo wenu kwaba kumkani bobabini; uya kwenjenjalo ke uYehova kwizikumkani zonke owelela kuzo.
5_3_22_Ize ningaboyiki; ngokuba uYehova uThixo wenu nguye onilwelayo.
5_3_23_Ndatarhuzisa kuYehova ngelo xesha, ndisithi,
5_3_24_Nkosi yam, Yehova, uqalile ukumbonisa umkhonzi wakho ubukhulu bakho, nesandla sakho esithe nkqi; ngokuba nguwuphi na uthixo emazulwini nasehlabathini, ongenza ngokwezenzo zakho,  nangokwemisebenzi yakho yobugorha?
5_3_25_Makhe ndiwele kaloku, ndilibone ilizwe elo lihle,  liphesheya kweYordan, loo ntaba intle, neLebhanon.
5_3_26_Wandiphuphumela uYehova ngomsindo ngenxa yenu,  akandiphulaphula; wathi uYehova kum, Yanela, musa ukuba saphinda uthethe kum ngale ndawo.
5_3_27_Nyuka uye encotsheni yePisga, uphose amehlo akho entshonalanga, nasentla, nasezantsi, nasempumalanga,  ulikhangele ngamehlo; ngokuba akuyi kuyiwela le Yordan.
5_3_28_UYoshuwa mwisele umthetho, umomeleze, umkhaliphise; ngokuba yena uya kuwela yena phambi kwaba bantu; yena uya kubadlisa ilifa, elilelo lizwe uya kulibona.
5_3_29_Sahlala ke esihlanjeni malungana neBhete-pehore.
5_4_1_Kaloku ke, Sirayeli, yiphulaphule imimiselo namasiko endinifundisa wona, ukuba niwenze; ukuze niphile, ningene,  nilime ilizwe aninikayo uYehova uThixo wooyihlo.
5_4_2_Ize ningongezi ezwini endiniwisela umthetho ngalo, ize ninganciphisi nto kulo, ukuze niyigcine imithetho kaYehova uThixo wenu, endiniwisela yona.
5_4_3_Amehlo enu akubonile oko wakwenzayo uYehova kuBhahali-pehore; ngokuba bonke abo babemlandela uBhahali-pehore, uYehova uThixo wakho ubatshabalalisile phakathi kwakho.
5_4_4_Ke nina nanamathelayo kuYehova uThixo wenu, niphilile nonke namhla.
5_4_5_Yabonani, ndinifundise imimiselo namasiko, njengoko ndawiselwa umthetho nguYehova uThixo wam, ukuze nenze ngokunjalo phakathi kwelizwe eningena kulo, ukuba nilime.
5_4_6_Yigcineni ke niyenze; ngokuba oku bubulumko benu, nengqondo yenu, emehlweni abantu abaya kuyiva yonke le mimiselo; bathi,  Olu hlanga lukhulu ngabantu abalumkileyo, abanengqondo bodwa.
5_4_7_Ngokuba luluphi na uhlanga olukhulu, oluthixo usondeleyo kulo, njengoYehova uThixo wethu, ekumbizeni kwethu konke?
5_4_8_Luluphi na uhlanga olukhulu olunemimiselo namasiko anobulungisa, njengalo myalelo wonke ndiwubekayo phambi kwenu namhla?
5_4_9_Kodwa zigcine, uwugcine umphefumlo wakho kunene, hleze uzilibale izinto azibonileyo amehlo akho; hleze zimke entliziyweni yakho yonke imihla yokuphila kwakho. Uze uzazise oonyana bakho, noonyana boonyana bakho;
5_4_10_ngokukodwa umhla owema ngawo phambi koYehova uThixo wakho eHorebhe, akuthi uYehova kum, babizele ndawonye kum abantu,  ndibavise amazwi am, ukuze bafunde ukundoyika yonke imihla abaphila ngayo emhlabeni, bafundise noonyana babo.
5_4_11_Nasondela, nema phantsi kwentaba, intaba isitsha ngumlilo wada wesa esazulwini sezulu, ibubumnyama bamafu nesithokothoko.
5_4_12_Wathetha uYehova kuni ephakathi komlilo; nasiva isandisa mazwi, anabona mbonakalo, yaba sisandi sodwa.
5_4_13_Wanixelela umnqophiso wakhe, awaniwisela umthetho ngawo ukuba niwenze, amazwi alishumi; wawabhala emacwecweni amabini amatye.
5_4_14_Wandiwisela umthetho uYehova ngelo xesha, ukuba ndinifundise imimiselo namasiko, ukuba niwenze elizweni eniwelela kulo ukuba nilime.
5_4_15_Zigcineni kunene ngenxa yemiphefumlo yenu, ngokuba anibonanga mbonakalo yanto, mini wathetha uYehova kuni eHorebhe phakathi komlilo;
5_4_16_hleze nizonakalise, nizenzele umfanekiso oqingqiweyo,  imbonakalo yento efana nokuba yiyiphi: into emilise okwendoda nokwenkazana,
5_4_17_into emilise okwento yonke ezitho zine esemhlabeni, into emilise okwentaka yonke enamaphiko, ephaphazela esibhakabhakeni,
5_4_18_into emilise okwesinambuzane sonke esisemhlabeni, into emilise okweentlanzi zonke ezisemanzini phantsi komhlaba;
5_4_19_hleze uwaphakamisele ezulwini amehlo akho, ubone ilanga nenyanga neenkwenkwezi, wonke umkhosi wasezulwini, uwexulwe,  uzinqule, uzikhonze, ezo uYehova uThixo wakho azabele izizwe zonke phantsi kwezulu lonke.
5_4_20_Ke nina unithabathile uYehova, wanikhupha kwiziko lesinyithi eYiputa, ukuba nibe ngabantu abalilifa kuye,  njengoko ninjalo namhla.
5_4_21_Phezu koko uYehova wandifuthela ngenxa yamazwi enu, wafunga ukuba andiyi kuyiwela iYordan, andiyi kungena ezweni elihle akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba libe lilifa;
5_4_22_kuba ndiya kufela kweli lizwe, andiyiweli iYordan. Ke nina niya kuwela, nilime elo lizwe lihle.
5_4_23_Zigcineni, hleze niwulibale umnqophiso kaYehova uThixo wenu, awawenzayo nani, nizenzele umfanekiso oqingqiweyo,  imbonakalo yezinto zonke awakuwisela umthetho ngazo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_4_24_Ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho ungumlilo odlayo, unguThixo onekhwele.
5_4_25_Xa uthe wazala abantwana nabantwana babantwana, kwada kwaba kudala nihleli kwelo zwe, nazonakalisa, nenza umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, imbonakalo yento nokuba yiyiphi, nenza okubi emehlweni kaYehova uThixo wenu, namqumbisa:
5_4_26_ndingqinisisa amazulu nehlabathi namhla ngani, ukuba nodaka mpela kamsinya, ningabikho kwelo zwe, niwela iYordan nisiya kulo ukuba nilime; anisayi kuyolula imihla yenu kulo,  notshabalala kube kanye.
5_4_27_Woniphangalalisa uYehova phakathi kwezizwe, nisale nibantu bambalwa ezintlangeni, apho uYehova aya kuni qhubela khona;
5_4_28_nikhonze khona oothixo abangumsebenzi wezandla zomntu,  imithi namatye, abangaboniyo, abangeviyo, abangadliyo,  abangajojiyo;
5_4_29_eningathi nimfune khona uYehova uThixo wenu, nimfumane, xa nithe naquqela kuye ngentliziyo yenu yonke, nangomphefumlo wenu wonke.
5_4_30_Ekubandezelekeni kwenu, zakunifumana zonke ezi zinto,  ekupheleleni kwemihla, nobuyela kuYehova uThixo wenu,  niliphulaphule ilizwi lakhe.
5_4_31_Ngokuba nguThixo onemfesane uYehova uThixo wakho; akayi kukuyekela, akayi kukonakalisa, akayi kuwulibala umnqophiso wooyihlo awabafungelayo.
5_4_32_Kuba khawubuze emihleni yamandulo, eyayikho ngaphambi kwakho, kususela kumhla uThixo awadala ngawo umntu ehlabathini,  uthabathele esiphelweni sezulu, ude use esiphelweni sezulu,  ukuba khe kwakho na into enjengale nto ukuba nkulu, ukuba khe kwaviwa into enjengale na?
5_4_33_Bakha baliva na abantu izwi loThixo ethetha phakathi komlilo, njengoko walivayo wena, baphila noko?
5_4_34_Okanye kukho thixo wakha walinga na ukuya kuzithabathela uhlanga phakathi kohlanga ngezilingo, nangemiqondiso,  nangezimanga, nangemfazwe, nangesandla esithe nkqi, nangengalo eyolukileyo, nangokoyikeka okukhulu, njengako konke akwenzileyo kuni uYehova uThixo wenu eYiputa, emehlweni akho?
5_4_35_Waboniswa wena, ukuze wazi ukuba uYehova nguye uThixo;  akukho wumbi, nguye yedwa.
5_4_36_Wakuvisa izwi lakhe liphuma emazulwini, ukuba akuqeqeshe,  nasemhlabeni wakubonisa umlilo wakhe omkhulu, waweva namazwi akhe phakathi komlilo.
5_4_37_Wabathandayo nje ooyihlo, wayinyula nembewu yabo emva kwabo, wakukhupha eYiputa ngobukho bakhe, ngamandla akhe amakhulu;
5_4_38_ukuba agqogqe iintlanga ezinkulu ezomeleleyo kunawe,  zingabikho ebusweni bakho; ukuba akungenise, akunike ilizwe lazo libe lilifa, njengoko kunjalo namhla.
5_4_39_Yazi ke namhla, ukunyamekele ngentliziyo yakho, ukuba uYehova nguye uThixo emazulwini phezulu, nasehlabathini phantsi; akukho wumbi;
5_4_40_uyigcine imimiselo yakhe, nemithetho yakhe, endikumisela yona namhla, ukuba kulunge kuwe, nakoonyana bakho emva kwakho,  ukuze uyolule imihla yakho emhlabeni, lowo akunika wona uYehova uThixo wakho imihla yonke.
5_4_41_Waza uMoses wahlula imizi yamithathu ngaphonoshono kweYordan ngasempumalanga, ukuba asabele khona umbulali
5_4_42_obulele ummelwane wakhe ngengozi, ebengamthiyile ngaphambili; asabele ke komnye waloo mizi, aphile:
5_4_43_iBhetsere, entlango ezweni lehewu kumaRubhen; iRamoti,  kwelaseGiliyadi kumaGadi; iGolan, eBhashan kumaManase.
5_4_44_Nguwo lo umyalelo awawubekayo uMoses phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
5_4_45_Zizo ezi izingqino nemimiselo namasiko awawathethayo uMoses koonyana bakaSirayeli, ekuphumeni kwabo eYiputa,
5_4_46_ngaphonoshono kweYordan, emfuleni omalunga neBhete-pehore,  ezweni lakwaSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori, obemi eHeshbhon,  abambulalayo ooMoses noonyana bakaSirayeli ekuphumeni kwabo eYiputa;
5_4_47_balihlutha ilizwe lakhe, nelizwe likaOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, ookumkani ababini bama-Amori ababengaphonoshono kweYordan ngasempumalanga;
5_4_48_bathabathela eArohere, engaseludinini lomlanjana oyiArnon,  bada besa entabeni yeSiyon eyiHermon,
5_4_49_neArabha yonke ngaphonoshono kweYordan ngasempumalanga,  bada besa elwandle lwaseArabha, ngapha ntsi kwamaxandeka asePisga.
5_5_1_Wawabiza uMoses amaSirayeli onke, wathi kuwo, Yivani,  maSirayeli, imimiselo namasiko endiwathethayo ezindlebeni zenu namhla, ukuze niwafunde, nigcine ukuwenza.
5_5_2_UYehova uThixo wethu wenza umnqophiso nathi eHorebhe.
5_5_3_UYehova akawenzanga noobawo bethu lomnqophiso; wawenza nathi aba sikhoyo sonke siphela, siphilile namhlanje.
5_5_4_UYehova wathetha kuni, ekhangelene nani entabeni phakathi komlilo.
5_5_5_Ndema phakathi koYehova nani ngelo xesha, ukuze ndinixelele ilizwi likaYehova; ngokuba nibe nisoyika umlilo, ananyuka niye entabeni. Wathi:
5_5_6_NdinguYehova uThixo wakho, owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa,  endlwini yobukhoboka.
5_5_7_Uze ungabi nathixo bambi ngaphandle kwam.
5_5_8_Uze ungazenzeli umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nokuba ngowayiphi na into emilise esezulwini phezulu, nesemhlabeni phantsi,  nesemanzini aphantsi komhlaba.
5_5_9_Uze ungazinquli ezo nto, uze ungazikhonzi; kuba mna Yehova,  Thixo wakho, ndinguThixo onekhwele, ndibuvelela ubugwenxa booyise koonyana nakwesesithathu nakwesesine isizukulwana sabandithiyileyo;
5_5_10_ndiwenzela inceba amawaka abandithandayo, abayigcinayo imithetho yam.
5_5_11_Uze ungafumane ulibize igama likaYehova uThixo wakho, kuba uYehova akayikumenza omsulwa, ofumana alibize igama lakhe.
5_5_12_Gcina umhla wesabatha, ukuba wungcwalise, njengoko wakuwisela umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_5_13_Wosebenza imihla emithandathu, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho;
5_5_14_ke wona umhla wesixhenxe uyisabatha kaYehova uThixo wakho.  Uze ungenzi namnye umsebenzi, wena, nonyana wakho, nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho, nenkomo yakho,  ne-esile lakho, neento zakho zonke ezizitho zine, nowasemzini osemasangweni akho, ukuze siphumle isicaka sakho nesicakakazi sakho, njengawe;
5_5_15_ukhumbule ukuba ube ulikhoboka ezweni laseYiputa,  wakukhupha khona uYehova uThixo wakho ngesandla esithe nkqi,  nangengalo eyolukileyo; ngenxa yoko ukuwisele umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uwugcine umhla wesabatha.
5_5_16_Beka uyihlo nonyoko, njengoko akuwisele umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuze yolulwe imihla yakho, nokuze kulunge kuwe emhlabeni akunika wona uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_5_17_Uze ungabulali.
5_5_18_Uze ungakrexezi.
5_5_19_Uze ungebi.
5_5_20_Uze ungangqini ubungqina obubuxoki ngommelwane wakho.
5_5_21_Uze unganqweneli umfazi wommelwane wakho; uze unganqweneli indlu yommelwane wakho, nentsimi yakhe, nesicaka sakhe,  nesicakakazi sakhe, nenkomo yakhe, ne-esile lakhe, nanye into eyeyommelwane wakho.
5_5_22_Loo mazwi wawathetha uYehova ebandleni lenu lonke entabeni leyo, phakathi komlilo, efini asesithokothokweni, ngezwi elikhulu, akongeza; wawabhala emacwecweni amatye amabini,  wawanika mna.
5_5_23_Kwathi, nakuliva ilizwi phakathi kobumnyama, intaba isitsha ngumlilo, nasondela kum, zonke iintloko zezizwe zakowenu,  namadoda amakhulu akowenu;
5_5_24_nathi, Yabona, uYehova uThixo wethu usibonisile ubuqaqawuli bakhe nobukhulu bakhe, nelizwi lakhe silivile phakathi komlilo.  Namhla sibonile ukuba uYehova nomntu, aphile noko.
5_5_25_Ngoko yini na ukuba sife? Ngokuba lo mlilomkulu uya kusidla; ukuba sithe saphinda saliva ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wethu, sofa.
5_5_26_Kuba ngubani na enyameni yonke, owakha waliva ilizwi likaThixo ohleliyo, ethetha phakathi komlilo, njengathi,  waphila noko?
5_5_27_Sondela wena, uve konke okuthethwa nguYehova uThixo wethu,  ukuthethe wena kuthi; konke aya kukuthetha uYehova uThixo wethu kuwe, sokuva sikwenze.
5_5_28_Waliva ke uYehova izwi lokuthetha kwenu ekuthetheni kwenu kum; wathi uYehova kum, Ndilivile izwi lokuthetha kwaba bantu abakuthethileyo kuwe; bakulungisile konke abakuthethileyo.
5_5_29_Akwaba bebenale ntliziyo yokundoyika, nokuyigcina imithetho yam yonke, imihla yonke, ukuze kulunge kubo noonyana babo ngonaphakade!
5_5_30_Yiya, uthi kubo, Buyelani ezintenteni zenu.
5_5_31_Ke wena, yima apha ngakum, ndiyithethe kuwe yonke imithetho nemimiselo namasiko, owobafundisa wona, bawenze ezweni elo ndibanika lona, ukuba balime.
5_5_32_Nize nizigcine ukuba nenze njengoko uYehova uThixo wenu waniwisela umthetho, ningatyekeli ekunene nasekhohlo.
5_5_33_Hambani ngeendlela zonke awaniwisela umthetho ngazo uYehova uThixo wenu, ukuze niphile; kulunge kuni, niyolule imihla ezweni eloniya kulima.
5_6_1_Nguwo lo umthetho, imimiselo ke kwanamasiko, awaniwiselayo uYehova uThixo wenu, ukuba niwufundiswe, niwenze ezweni elo niwelela kulo ukuba nilime;
5_6_2_ukuze umoyike uYehova uThixo wakho, uyigcine yonke imimiselo yakhe nemithetho yakhe endikuwiselayo, wena nonyana wakho,  nonyana wonyana wakho, yonke imihla yobomi bakho, ukuze yolulwe imihla yakho.
5_6_3_Yiva ke, Sirayeli, ugcine ukwenza, ukuze kulunge kuwe, ukuze nande kunene ezweni elibaleka amasi nobusi, njengokuba uYehova,  uThixo wooyihlo, akuthethileyo kuwe.
5_6_4_Yiva, Sirayeli: uYehova uThixo wethu nguYehova mnye.
5_6_5_Uze umthande uYehova uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho yonke,  nangomphefumlo wakho wonke, nangamandla akho onke.
5_6_6_La mazwi ndikuwisela umthetho ngawo namhlanje, aze abe sentliziyweni yakho.
5_6_7_Uze uwatsolise koonyana bakho, uthethe ngawo ekuhlaleni kwakho endlwini yakho, nasekuhambeni kwakho ngendlela,  nasekulaleni kwakho, nasekuvukeni kwakho;
5_6_8_uwabophe esandleni sakho abe ngumqondiso, abe zizikhumbuzo phakathi kwamehlo akho;
5_6_9_uwabhale emigubasini yendlu yakho, nasemasangweni akho.
5_6_10_Kothi, xa athe wakungenisa uYehova uThixo wakho kulo ilizwe abelifungele ooyihlo, ooAbraham noIsake noYakobi, ukuba akunike: imizi emikhulu, emihle, ongayakhanga;
5_6_11_nezindlu ezizele zizinto zonke ezintle, ongazizalisanga;  namaqula ambiweyo, ongawambanga; nezidiliya nezinquma,  ongazityalanga; wadla wahlutha:
5_6_12_uzigcine, hleze umlibale uYehova okukhuphileyo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka.
5_6_13_UYehova uThixo wakho uze umoyike, umkhonze, ufunge igama lakhe.
5_6_14_Nize ningalandeli thixo bambi koothixo bezizwe eziningqongileyo;
5_6_15_ngokuba nguThixo onekhwele, uYehova uThixo wakho phakathi kwakho; hleze umsindo kaYehova uThixo wakho uvuthe ngakuwe,  ukutshabalalise, ungabikho ehlabathini.
5_6_16_Nize ningamlingi uYehova uThixo wenu, njengoko namlingayo eMasa.
5_6_17_Nize niyigcine niyigcinile imithetho kaYehova uThixo wenu,  nezingqino zakhe, nemimiselo yakhe, awakuwiselayo; wenze okuthe tye,
5_6_18_okulungileyo emehlweni kaYehova; ukuze kulunge kuwe, ungene ulime ilizwe elihle, awalifungela ooyihlo uYehova,
5_6_19_ukuba azigxothe iintshaba zakho zonke ebusweni bakho,  njengoko wathethayo uYehova.
5_6_20_Xa athe unyana wakho wakubuza ngomso, esithi, Zezani na ezi zingqino nemimiselo namasiko, aniwiseleyo uYehova uThixo wethu?
5_6_21_wothi kunyana wakho, Sibe singamakhoboka kaFaro eYiputa;  wasikhupha uYehova eYiputa ngesandla esithe nkqi;
5_6_22_uYehova wenza eYiputa imiqondiso nezimanga ezikhulu, ezibi,  kuFaro, nasendlwini yakhe yonke, emehlweni ethu;
5_6_23_wasikhupha khona, ukuze asingenise, ukuba asinike ilizwe elo abelifungele oobawo.
5_6_24_Wasiwisela umthetho uYehova, ukuba siyenze le mimiselo yonke, ukuba simoyike uYehova uThixo wethu, kulunge kuthi yonke imihla, silondolozelwe ebomini, njengoko kunjalo namhla.
5_6_25_Koba bubulungisa kuthi, xa sithe sagcina ukuwenza wonke lo mthetho phambi koYehova uThixo wethu, njengoko wasiwiselayo umthetho.
5_7_1_Xa athe uYehova uThixo wakho wakungenisa kulo ilizwe, oya kulo ukuba ulime, wanyothula iintlanga ezininzi ebusweni bakho,  amaHeti, namaGirgashi, nama-Amori, namaKanan, namaPerizi,  namaHivi, namaYebhusi, iintlanga ezisixhenxe, zizininzi,  zinamandla kunawe,
5_7_2_wazinikela kuwe uYehova uThixo wakho: uze uzixabele,  uzisingele phantsi kuphele; ungenzi mnqophiso nazo,  ungazisizeli.
5_7_3_Uze ungendiselani nazo, intombi yakho ungayiniki unyana wakhe, intombi yakhe ungayizekeli unyana wakho;
5_7_4_kuba yomtyekisa unyana wakho angandilandeli, bakhonze thixo bambi, uvuthe umsindo kaYehova kuni, akutshabalalise kamsinya.
5_7_5_Ke yenjani nje kuzo: zidilizeni izibingelelo zazo,  nizichithe izimiso zazo, nibaxakaxe ooAshera bazo, niyitshise ngomlilo imifanekiso yazo eqingqiweyo.
5_7_6_Ngokuba ningabantu abangcwele kuYehova uThixo wakho;  uninyule uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba nibe ngabantu abayinqobo kuye, kunabantu bonke abaphezu komhlaba.
5_7_7_Akungabuninzi benu kunezinye izizwe zonke, le nto athene nca nani uYehova, waninyula; kuba nimbalwa kunezinye izizwe zonke.
5_7_8_Kungokunithanda kukaYehova, kungokusigcina kwakhe isifungo abesifungele ooyihlo, le nto anikhuphe ngesandla esithe nkqi uYehova, wanikhulula ngentlawulelo endlwini yobukhoboka,  esandleni sikaFaro, ukumkani waseYiputa.
5_7_9_Yazi ke, ukuba uYehova uThixo wakho nguye uThixo, uThixo wenyaniso, obagcinela umnqophiso nenceba abamthandayo,  abayigcinayo imithetho yakhe, ase ewakeni lesizukulwana;
5_7_10_obabuyekezayo abamthiyayo ebusweni babo, ukuba abashabalalise. Akalibali ukumbuyekeza omthiyayo; uya kumbuyekeza ebusweni bakhe.
5_7_11_Wugcine ke umthetho, nemimiselo, namasiko, endikuwisela wona namhla, ukuba uwenze.
5_7_12_Kothi ke ngenxa enokuba nithe naweva la mabango, nawagcina,  nawenza, akugcinele umnqophiso nenceba uYehova uThixo wakho,  awawufunga kooyihlo;
5_7_13_akuthande, akusikelele, akwandise, asikelele nesiqhamo sesizalo sakho, neziqhamo zomhlaba wakho, ingqolowa yakho,  newayini yakho entsha, neoli yakho, nenkonyana yenkomo yakho,  netakane lempahla yakho emfutshane, emhlabeni lowo wawufungela ooyihlo ukuba wokunika.
5_7_14_Wosikeleleka ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke; akusayi kubakho nto ingazaliyo, nokuba yindoda nokuba ngumfazi kuwe; nasezinkomeni zakho ayisayi kubakho.
5_7_15_UYehova wosusa zonke izifo kuwe; nobulwelwe bonke obubi baseYiputa, obo ubaziyo, akayi kububeka kuwe; uya kububeka kubo bonke abakuthiyayo.
5_7_16_Uze uzidle zonke izizwe ezo akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho;  iliso lakho lingabi nanceba kuzo, ungabakhonzi oothixo bazo;  ngokuba ngumgibe lowo kuwe.
5_7_17_Xa uthe entliziyweni yakho, Ezi ntlanga zininzi kunam,  ndinokuthini na ukuzigqogqa?
5_7_18_uze ungazoyiki. Khumbula kakuhle awakwenzayo uYehova uThixo wakho kuFaro nakumaYiputa onke;
5_7_19_izilingo ezikhulu azibonileyo amehlo akho, nemiqondiso,  nezimanga, nesandla esithe nkqi, nengalo eyolukileyo,  awakukhupha ngazo uYehova uThixo wakho. Uya kwenjenjalo uYehova uThixo wakho kuzo zonke izizwe ozoyikayo.
5_7_20_Ngaphezu koko, uYehova uThixo wakho uya kuthuma oonomeva kuzo, zide ezo ziselayo, zizisithelisayo ebusweni bakho,  zibhubhe.
5_7_21_Uze ungangcangcazeli ebusweni bazo; ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho phakathi kwakho nguThixo omkhulu, owoyikekayo.
5_7_22_UYehova uThixo wakho uya kuzinyothula ezi ntlanga ebusweni bakho, kancinane, kancinane. Akuyi kuba nako ukuziphelisa kamsinya, hleze ande akongamele amarhamncwa asendle.
5_7_23_UYehova uThixo wakho wozinikela kuwe. azidungadunge ngodungadungo olukhulu, zide zitshatyalaliswe;
5_7_24_abanikele ookumkani bazo esandleni sakho, ulicime igama labo phantsi kwezulu. Akuyi kuma mntu ebusweni bakho, ude uzitshabalalise zona.
5_7_25_Imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yoothixo bazo woyitshisa ngomlilo;  uze ungayinqweneli isilivere negolide ekuzo, ungayithabatheli kuwe, ibe ngumgibe; ngokuba lisikizi kuYehova uThixo wakho.
5_7_26_Uze ungalingenisi isikizi endlwini yakho, ukuze ungabi yinto yokusingelwa phantsi njengalo. Ize ibe nezothe, ibe linyala kuwe, ibe lisikizi kuwe, ngokuba yinto yokusingelwa phantsi.
5_8_1_Wonke umthetho endikuwiselayo namhla, ize nizigcine ngokwenu ukuba niwenze, ukuze niphile, nande, ningene nilime ilizwe elo walifungela ooyihlo uYehova.
5_8_2_Uze uyikhumbule yonke indlela akuhambise ngayo uYehova uThixo wakho, le minyaka imashumi mane entlango, ukuze akuthobe, akulinge, akwazi okusentliziyweni yakho, ukuba woyigcina imithetho yakhe, akuyi kuyigcina, kusini na.
5_8_3_Wakuthoba, wakulambisa, wakudlisa imana, into obungayazi,  ababengayazi nooyihlo; ukuze akwazise ukuba akaphili ngasonka sodwa umntu; umntu lo yena uphila ngento yonke ephuma emlonyeni kaYehova.
5_8_4_Ingubo yakho ayonakalanga bubudala ikushiye, nonyawo lwakho aludumbanga, le minyaka imashumi mane.
5_8_5_Uze wazi ngentliziyo yakho, ukuba njengoko umntu amqeqeshayo unyana wakhe, uYehova uThixo wakho uyakuqeqesha wena;
5_8_6_uyigcine ke imithetho kaYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uhambe ngeendlela zakhe, umoyike.
5_8_7_Kuba uYehova uThixo wakho ukungenisa ezweni elihle; ezweni lemilanjana yamanzi, lemithombo namanzi enzonzobila, aphuma ezihlanjeni nasezintabeni;
5_8_8_ezweni lengqolowa, nerhasi, neediliya, nemikhiwane,  neerharnate; ezweni leminquma yeoli, nobusi;
5_8_9_ezweni ongayi kudla sonka kulo uyimbedlenge, ongayi kuswela nanye into kulo; ezweni elimatye asinyithi, elintaba womba ubhedu kuzo;
5_8_10_udle, uhluthe, umbonge uYehova uThixo wakho ngenxa yelizwe elihle akunike lona.
5_8_11_Zigcine, hleze umlibale uYehova uThixo wakho ngokungayigcini imithetho yakhe, namasiko akhe, nemimiselo yakhe, endikumiselayo namhla;
5_8_12_hleze uthi, wakudla uhluthe, wakhe izindlu ezintle, uhlale kuzo;
5_8_13_zande iinkomo zakho, nempahla yakho emfutshane, yande kuwe isilivere negolide, yande yonke into onayo:
5_8_14_isuke iphakame intliziyo yakho, umlibale uYehova uThixo wakho, owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka;
5_8_15_owakuhambisayo entlango enkulu eyoyikekayo, eneenyoka ezinobuhlungu, noonomadudwane, nebalelelwe lilanga,  engenamanzi; owakuvelisela amanzi eweni leqhwitha;
5_8_16_owakudlisa imana entlango, into ababengayazi ooyihlo, ukuze akuthobe, akulinge, ukuba akwenzele okulungileyo ekupheleni kwakho;
5_8_17_uze uthi ke entliziyweni yakho, Ngamandla am nokuqina kwesandla sam okundizuzise obu butyebi.
5_8_18_Uze umkhumbule uYehova uThixo wakho, ngokuba nguye okunika amandla okuzuza ubutyebi; ukuze awumise umnqophiso wakhe abewufungele ooyihlo, njengoko kunjalo namhla.
5_8_19_Kothi, ukuba uthe wamlibala uYehova uThixo wakho, walandela thixo bambi, wabakhonza, wabanqula, ndiyaningqinela namhla,  ukuba nobhubha kanye.
5_8_20_Njengeentlanga uYehova azenze zadaka ebusweni benu, nodaka ngokunjalo, ngenxa enokuba ningaliphulaphulanga izwi likaYehova uThixo wenu.
5_9_1_Yiva, Sirayeli! Uyayiwela namhla iYordan, usiya kuzihlutha iintlanga ezinkulu, ezinamandla kunawe, imizi emikhulu,  enqatyiswe yesa ezulwini;
5_9_2_abantu abakhulu, abade, oonyana baka-Anaki, obaziyo wena,  obavileyo wena kusithiwa ngabo, Ngubani na onokuma phambi koonyana baka-Anaki?
5_9_3_Yazi ke namhla, ukuba uYehova uThixo wakho nguye owela phambi kwakho, engumlilo odlayo. Wobatshabalalisa, wobathoba phambi kwakho; ubagqogqe, ubacime kamsinya, njengoko wathethayo kuwe uYehova.
5_9_4_Uze ungatsho entliziyweni yakho ekubagxotheni kukaYehova uThixo wakho ebusweni bakho, ukuthi, Kungobulungisa bam andingenisileyo uYehova, ukuba ndilime eli lizwe. Kungokungabi ndawo kwezo ntlanga, le nto uYehova azigqogqayo zingabikho ebusweni bakho.
5_9_5_Akungabulungisa bakho, nokuthi tye kwentliziyo yakho, le nto ungenayo ulime ilizwe lazo: kuba kungokungabi ndawo kwezo ntlanga, le nto uYehova, uThixo wakho, azigqogqayo zingabikho ebusweni bakho, ukuze alimise ilizwi elo uYehova abelifungele ooyihlo, ooAbraham noIsake noYakobi.
5_9_6_Yazi ke, ukuba akungabulungisa bakho, le nto uYehova, uThixo wakho, akunikayo eli lizwe lihle ukuba ulime; ngokuba ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni.
5_9_7_Khumbula, musa ukulibala ukumqumbisa kwakho uYehova, uThixo wakho, entlango; kususela kwimini owaphumayo ezweni laseYiputa,  wada wangena kule ndawo, naba neenkani kuYehova.
5_9_8_NaseHorebhe namqumbisa uYehova, wanifuthela uYehova ukuba anitshabalalise.
5_9_9_Oko ndandinyuke ndaya entabeni ukuya kuthabatha amacwecwe amatye, amacwecwe omnqophiso abewenza uYehova nani, ndahlala iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane entabeni,  ndingadli sonka, ndingaseli manzi.
5_9_10_Wandinika uYehova amacwecwe amabini amatye, ebhalwe ngomnwe kaThixo, kubhalwe kuwo ngokwamazwi onke abewathethile uYehova nani entabeni, phakathi komlilo ngomhla wesikhungu.
5_9_11_Kwathi, ekupheleni kweemini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane, uYehova wandinika amacwecwe amabini amatye,  amacwecwe omnqophiso.
5_9_12_Wathi uYehova kum, Suka uhle apha kamsinya; ngokuba bonakalisile abantu bakho obakhuphileyo eYiputa; batyeka kamsinya endleleni leyo ndibawisele umthetho ngayo, bazenzela umfanekiso otyhidiweyo.
5_9_13_Wathi uYehova kum, Ndibabonile aba bantu; yabona, ngabantu abantamo ilukhuni;
5_9_14_ndiyeke, ndibatshabalalise, ndilicime igama labo phantsi kwamazulu, ndikwenze wena uhlanga olunamandla, oluninzi kunabo.
5_9_15_Ndajika ke ndehla entabeni, intaba isitsha ngumlilo,  amacwecwe omabini omnqophiso esezandleni zam zozibini.
5_9_16_Ndakhangela, ndabona ukuba nonile kuYehova uThixo wenu,  nazenzela ithole elingumtyhido, natyeka kamsinya endleleni leyo waniwisela umthetho ngayo uYehova.
5_9_17_Ndawathabatha amacwecwe omabini, ndawalahla ezandleni zam zozibini, ndawaqhekeza emehlweni enu.
5_9_18_Ndawa phantsi phambi koYehova, njengokokuqala, iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane; ndingadli sonka,  ndingaseli manzi, ngenxa yezono zenu zonke, enone ngazo ukwenza okubi emehlweni kaYehova, ukuba nimqumbise;
5_9_19_kuba bendinxunguphele ngumsindo nobushushu abenoburhalarhume ngabo uYehova kuni, ukuba anitshabalalise. Ke uYehova wandiva nangeso silulandlo.
5_9_20_UYehova wamfuthela kunene uAron, ukuba amtshabalalise;  ndamthandazela noAron lowo ngelo xesha.
5_9_21_Isono senu enisenzileyo, ithole elo, ndalithabatha ndalitshisa ngomlilo, ndaliqoba, ndalisila ngokucokisekileyo,  lada lacoleka laluthuli, ndaluphosa uthuli lwalo emlanjaneni obusihla entabeni.
5_9_22_NaseTabhera, naseMasa, naseKibroti-hatahava, nibe nimqumbisa uYehova.
5_9_23_Nasekunisuseni kukaYehova eKadeshe-bharneha, esithi,  Nyukani, nilime ilizwe elo ndininikileyo, nawuphikisa umlomo kaYehova uThixo wenu, anakholwa nguye, analiphulaphula izwi lakhe.
5_9_24_Naba neenkani kuYehova, kususela kwimini endanazi ngayo.
5_9_25_Ndawa ke phantsi phambi koYehova, ezo mini zimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane, endawayo phantsi; kuba uYehova wathi uya kunitshabalalisa.
5_9_26_Ndathandaza ke kuYehova, ndathi, Nkosi yam, Yehova, musa ukubatshabalalisa abantu bakho, ilifa lakho, obakhululeyo ngobukhulu bakho, obakhuphileyo eYiputa ngesandla esithe nkqi.
5_9_27_Khumbula abakhonzi bakho, ooAbraham noIsake noYakobi. Musa ukukhangela ekugogotyeni kwaba bantu, nakokungendawo kwabo,  nasesonweni sabo; hleze lithi ilizwe osikhuphe kulo,
5_9_28_Kungokuba ebengenako uYehova ukubangenisa kulo ilizwe abethethe ngalo kubo; kungokuba ebebathiya, le nto wakhuphayo,  ukuze ababulalele entlango.
5_9_29_Ke ngabantu bakho nelifa lakho, obakhuphileyo ngamandla akho amakhulu, nangengalo yakho eyolukileyo.
5_10_1_Ngelo xesha wathi uYehova kum, Ziqingqele amacwecwe amatye abe mabini, njengawokuqala, unyuke uze kum entabeni, uzenzele ityeya yomthi;
5_10_2_ndiwabhale emacwecweni lawo amazwi abekwawokuqala amacwecwe, lawo wawaqhekezayo; uwabeke etyeyeni.
5_10_3_Ndenza ke ityeya ngomngampunzi, ndaqingqa amacwecwe amatye amabini, njengawokuqala; ndenyuka ndaya entabeni, ndinawo amacwecwe amabini esandleni sam.
5_10_4_Wawabhala ke emacwecweni ngokombhalo wokuqala amazwi alishumi, abewathethile uYehova kuni entabeni, phakathi komlilo, ngomhla wesikhungu; uYehova wandinika wona.
5_10_5_Ndajika ke, ndehla entabeni, ndawabeka amacwecwe etyeyeni endayenzayo. Akhona, njengoko uYehova wandiwisela umthetho ngako.
5_10_6_Banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli eBheroti-bhene-yahakan, baya eMosera. Wafa apho uAron, wangcwatyelwa khona; uElazare unyana wakhe waba ngumbingeleli esikhundleni sakhe.
5_10_7_Banduluka khona, baya eGudegoda; banduluka eGudegoda, baya eYotebhata, ilizwe elinemilanjana yamanzi.
5_10_8_Ngelo xesha uYehova wasahlula isizwe sakwaLevi, ukuba sithwale ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova, nokuba sime phambi koYehova silungiselele, sisikelele egameni lakhe unanamhla.
5_10_9_Ngenxa yoko uLevi akanasabelo nalifa ndawonye nabazalwana bakhe; nguYehova ilifa lakhe, njengoko wathethayo uYehova uThixo wakho kuye.
5_10_10_Ndema ke mna entabeni, njengemihla yokuqala, iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane; wandiva uYehova nangeso sihlandlo; uYehova akathanda ukukonakalisa.
5_10_11_Wathi uYehova kum, Suka ume, uhambe phambi kwabantu,  bangene balime ilizwe elo, ndafungayo kooyise ukuba ndobanika.
5_10_12_Kaloku ke, Sirayeli, uYehova uThixo wakho ubiza ntoni na kuwe, kungekuko ukumoyika uYehova uThixo wakho, uhambe ngeendlela zakhe zonke, umthande, umkhonze uYehova uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho yonke, nangomphefumlo wakho wonke;
5_10_13_ugcine imithetho kaYehova, nemimiselo yakhe,  endikumiselayo namhla ukuba kulunge kuwe?
5_10_14_Yabona lelikaYehova uThixo wakho izulu, nezulu lamazulu,  nehlabathi, neento zonke ezikhona.
5_10_15_UYehova wathana nca nooyihlo bodwa, ukuba abathande;  wanyula imbewu yabo emva kwabo, nina ke, ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke, njengoko kunjalo namhla.
5_10_16_Yalusani ke inyama yentliziyo yenu, ningabi saba ngabantamo ilukhuni.
5_10_17_Kuba uYehova uThixo wenu nguThixo woothixo yena, nguNkosi kankosi, nguThixo omkhulu, oligorha, owoyikekayo, ongakhethi buso, ongamkeli sicengo;
5_10_18_ogwebela inkedama nomhlolokazi, othanda owasemzini, amnike ukudla, amnike nengubo.
5_10_19_Mthandeni owasemzini; kuba nibe ningabasemzini ezweni laseYiputa.
5_10_20_Uze umoyike uYehova uThixo wakho, umkhonze, unamathele kuye, ufunge igama lakhe.
5_10_21_Yindumiso yakho, nguThixo wakho, okwenzele ezi zinto zinkulu zoyikekayo, azibonileyo amehlo akho.
5_10_22_Behla beyimiphefumlo emashumi asixhenxe ooyihlo ukuya eYiputa; ke ngoku uYehova, uThixo wakho, unenze nanjengeenkwenkwezi zezulu, ukuba baninzi kwenu.
5_11_1_Ngoko ke uze umthande uYehova uThixo wakho, ugcine isigxina sakhe, nemimiselo yakhe, namasiko akhe, nemithetho yakhe,  imihla yonke.
5_11_2_Yazini ke namhla; ngokuba andithethi noonyana benu abangakwazanga, abangakubonanga ukuqeqesha kukaYehova uThixo wenu, ubukhulu bakhe, nesandla sakhe esithe nkqi, nengalo yakhe eyolukileyo,
5_11_3_nemiqondiso yakhe, nezenzo zakhe abezenzile phakathi kweYiputa kuFaro ukumkani waseYiputa, nakwilizwe lakhe lonke;
5_11_4_noko wakwenzayo empini yamaYiputa, emahasheni ayo,  nasezingqwelweni zayo zokulwa; oko wahambisa amanzi oLwandle oluBomvu phezu kwayo, ekunisukeleni kwayo, wayicima uYehova unanamhla;
5_11_5_noko wakwenzayo kuni entlango, nada nafika kulendawo;
5_11_6_noko wakwenzayo kooDatan noAbhiram, oonyana bakaEliyabhi unyana kaRubhen; ukuba umhlaba wakhamisa umlomo wawo,  wabaginya, nezindlu zabo, neentente zabo, nento yonke ephilileyo eyabalandelayo, ababakho phakathi kwamaSirayeli onke.
5_11_7_Ngokuba amehlo enu azibonile zonke izenzo zikaYehova ezikhulu awazenzayo.
5_11_8_Ize niwugcine wonke umthetho endiniwiselayo namhla, ukuze nomelele, ningene nilime ilizwe elo niwelela kulo, ukuba nilihluthe;
5_11_9_ukuze niyolule imihla yenu emhlabeni lowo abewufungele ooyihlo uYehova, ukuba wowunika bona nembewu yabo, ilizwe elibaleka amasi nobusi.
5_11_10_Kuba ilizwe elo uya kulo, usiya kulihlutha, alinjengelizwe laseYiputa, elo naphuma kulo, apho wayihlwayelayo imbewu yakho,  waza wayinkcenkcesha ngonyawo lwakho, njengomyezo wemifuno.
5_11_11_Ke lona ilizwe eniwelela kulo, nisiya kulihlutha, lilizwe leentaba nezihlambo, elisela amanzi emvula yezulu;
5_11_12_lilizwe alikhathaleleyo uYehova uThixo wakho, ahlala ekulo amehlo kaYehova uThixo wakho, ethabathela ekuqaleni komnyaka,  ade ase ekupheleni komnyaka.
5_11_13_Kothi, ukuba nithe nayiphulaphula ngenyameko imithetho yam endiniwise layo namhla, yokuba nimthande uYehova uThixo wenu,  nimkhonze ngentliziyo yenu yonke, nangomphefumlo wenu wonke:
5_11_14_ndininike imvula yelizwe lenu ngexesha layo, ethambisayo nevuthisayo, uhlanganise ingqolowa yakho, newayini yakho entsha, neoli yakho;
5_11_15_ndizinike utyani iinkomo zakho, emadlelweni akho, udle uhluthe.
5_11_16_Zigcineni, hleze ikhohliseke intliziyo yenu, nityeke,  nikhonze thixo bambi, nibanqule,
5_11_17_uvuthe umsindo kaYehova kuni, alivingce izulu kungabikho mvula, umhlaba ungayivelisi indyebo yawo, nibhubhe kamsinya,  ningabikho ezweni elihle, aninika lona uYehova.
5_11_18_La mazwi am nize niwabekele intliziyo yenu nomphefumlo wenu niwabophe esandleni senu, abe ngumqondiso, abe zizikhumbuzo phakathi kwamehlo enu;
5_11_19_niwafundise oonyana benu, uthethe ngawo ekuhlaleni kwakho endlwini yakho, nasekuhambeni kwakho ngendlela, nasekulaleni kwakho, nasekuvukeni kwakho;
5_11_20_uwabhale emigubasini yendlu yakho, nasemasangweni akho:
5_11_21_ukuze yande imihla yenu, nemihla yoonyana benu, emhlabeni lowo abewufungele ooyihlo uYehova, ukuba wobanika njengemihla yamazulu phezu kwehlabathi.
5_11_22_Kuba, ukuba nithe nawugcina ngenyameko lo mthetho wonke ndiniwiselayo ukuba niwenze, nimthande uYehova uThixo wenu,  nihambe ngeendlela zakhe zonke, ninamathele kuye;
5_11_23_wozigqogqa uYehova ezo ntlanga zonke phambi kwenu,  nigqogqe iintlanga ezinkulu, ezinamandla kunani.
5_11_24_Indawo yonke, enyathelwa yintende yonyawo lwenu, yoba yeyenu; kuthabathela entlango, naseLebhanon, nasemlanjeni,  emlanjeni ongumEfrati, kuse elwandle lwasentshonalanga, ingumda wenu.
5_11_25_Akukho mntu uya kuma phambi kwenu; ukunkwantya nini,  nokoyika nina, wokubeka uYehova uThixo wenu ezweni lonke enilinyatheleyo, njengoko wathethayo kuni.
5_11_26_Yabonani, ndibeka phambi kwenu namhla intsikelelo nesiqalekiso:
5_11_27_intsikelelo, ukuba nithe nayiphulaphula imithetho kaYehova uThixo wenu, endiniwiselayo namhla;
5_11_28_isiqalekiso, ukuba nithe anayiphulaphula imithetho kaYehova uThixo wenu, nesuka natyeka endleleni leyo ndiniwisele umthetho ngayo namhla, nalandela thixo bambi eningabazanga.
5_11_29_Kothi, xa athe uYehova, uThixo wakho, wakungenisa kulo ilizwe oya kulo, usiya kulima, uyikhuphele intsikelelo phezu kwentaba yeGerizim, nesiqalekiso phezu kwentaba ye-Ebhali.
5_11_30_Ezo ntaba aziphesheya kweYordan na, ngaphaya kwendlela eya entshonalanga, ezweni lamaKanan, amiyo eArabha, malungana neGilgali, ecaleni leMioki kaMore?
5_11_31_Kuba niya kuwela iYordan, nisiya kulihlutha ilizwe elo aninikayo uYehova uThixo wenu, nilihluthe ke nime kulo.
5_11_32_Gcinani, niyenze yonke imimiselo namasiko endiwabekayo phambi kwenu namhla.
5_12_1_Yiyo le imimiselo namasiko, enowagcina ukuba niwenze ezweni elo, akunika lona uYehova uThixo wooyihlo, ukuba ulime yonke imihla enidla ngayo ubomi emhlabeni.
5_12_2_Zichitheni kuphele zonke iindawo, apho iintlanga enizigqogqayo zabakhonzela khona oothixo bazo, ezintabeni eziphakamileyo, nasezindulini, naphantsi kwemithi yonke eluhlaza;
5_12_3_nizidilize izibingelelo zazo, niziqhekeze izimiso zazo zamatye, nibatshise ngomlilo ooAshera bazo, niyixakaxe imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yoothixo bazo, nilicime igama lazo kule ndawo.
5_12_4_Ize ke ningenjenjalo kuYehova uThixo wenu.
5_12_5_Endaweni leyo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wenu ezizweni zenu zonke, ukuba alimise khona igama lakhe, ukuba ahlale khona, ize niquqele khona, niye khona.
5_12_6_Nowasa khona amadini enu anyukayo, nemibingelelo yenu,  nezishumi zenu, nomrhumo wesandla senu, nezibhambathiso zenu,  nemibinge yenu emfutshane;
5_12_7_nidle khona phambi koYehova uThixo wenu, nivuye entweni yonke enisa isandla senu kuyo, nina nezindlu zenu,  akusikeleleyo kuyo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_12_8_Ize ningenzi ngokwezinto zonke esizenzayo apha namhla,  elowo esenza okuthe tye emehlweni akhe;
5_12_9_kuba okwangoku anikangeni ekuphumleni oko, naselifeni elo,  aninikayo uYehova uThixo wenu.
5_12_10_Ke noyiwela iYordan, nihlale ezweni elo, uYehova uThixo wenu aya kunidlisa ilifa kulo, aniphumze ezintshabeni zenu zonke ngeenxa zonke, nihlale nikholosile.
5_12_11_Kothi ke kubekho indawo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wenu,  alihlalise khona igama lakhe, nizizise khona izinto zonke endiniwisela umthetho ngazo; amadini enu anyukayo,  nemibingelelo yenu, nezishumi zenu, nomrhumo wesandla senu,  nezibhambathiso zenu zonke ezinyuliweyo, enibhambathisa ngazo kuYehova;
5_12_12_nivuye phambi koYehova uThixo wenu, nina noonyana benu,  neentombi zenu, nezicaka zenu, nezicakakazi zenu, nomLevi osemasangweni enu, ngokuba akanasabelo nalifa nani.
5_12_13_Zigcine, amadini akho anyukayo ungawanyusi ezindaweni zonke ozibonayo.
5_12_14_Ke endaweni leyo aya kuyinyula uYehova, kwesinye sezizwe sakowenu, wowanyusa khona amadini akho anyukayo, ukwenze khona konke endikuwisela umthetho ngako.
5_12_15_Noko ke, ngokunqwena konke komphefumlo wakho, ungaxhela uyidle inyama, ngokwentsikelelo kaYehova uThixo wakho akunikileyo, emasangweni akho onke; oyinqambi nohlambulukileyo bangayidla into enjengebhadi nenjengexhama.
5_12_16_Ligazi lodwa eningasayi kulidla woliphalazela emhlabeni njengamanzi.
5_12_17_Akunakusidlela emasangweni akho isishumi sengqolowa yakho,  nesewayini yakho entsha, neseoli yakho, namazibulo eenkomo zakho nawempahla yakho emfutshane, nezibhambathiso zakho zonke obhambathisa ngazo, nemibingelelo yakho yokuqhutywa yintliziyo,  nomrhumo wesandla sakho.
5_12_18_Zona uze uzidlele phambi koYehova uThixo wakho, endaweni leyo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wakho, wena ke, nonyana wakho, nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho,  nomLevi osemasangweni akho; uvuye phambi koYehova uThixo wakho ezintweni zonke osa isandla sakho kuzo.
5_12_19_Zigcine, ungamlibali umLevi, yonke imihla yokuphila kwakho emhlabeni wakho.
5_12_20_Xa athe uYehova uThixo wakho wawenza banzi umda wakho,  njengoko abethethe ngako kuwe, uthi, Ndiya kudla inyama,  ngokuba umphefumlo wakho unqwenela ukuyidla inyama: ungayidla inyama ngokungqwena konke komphefumlo wakho.
5_12_21_Xa ithe yamgama kuwe indawo leyo, aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba alimise kuyo igama lakhe: woxhela ezinkomeni zakho, nasempahleni yakho emfutshane, akunikileyo uYehova, njengoko ndakuwisela umthetho ngako, udle emasangweni akho ngokunqwena konke komphefumlo wakho.
5_12_22_Kanye njengokuba lidliwa ibhadi nexhama, uya kwenjenjalo ukuyidla; oyinqambi nohlambulukileyo bofana ukuyidla.
5_12_23_Kodwa qina ungalidli igazi, kuba igazi ngumphefumlo; uze ungawudli ke umphefumlo kunye nenyama.
5_12_24_Uze ungalidli; woliphalazela emhlabeni njengamanzi.
5_12_25_Uze ungalidli; ukuze kulunge kuwe, nakoonyana bakho emva kwakho, xa uthe wakwenza okuthe tye emehlweni kaYehova.
5_12_26_Zizinto zakho ezingcwele zodwa ezilunge kuwe,  nezibhambathiso zakho, owozithabatha uzise endaweni leyo aya kuyinyula uYehova;
5_12_27_wenze amadini akho anyukayo, inyama negazi,  esibingelelweni sikaYehova uThixo wakho; igazi lemibingelelo yakho uligalele esibingelelweni sikaYehova uThixo wakho, uyidle inyama yona.
5_12_28_Gcina uwaphulaphule la mazwi onke, ndikuwisela umthetho ngawo, ukuze kulunge kuwe nakoonyana bakho emva kwakho, kude kuse ephakadeni, xa uthe wenza okulungileyo nokuthe tye emehlweni kaYehova uThixo wakho.
5_12_29_Xa athe uYehova uThixo wakho wazinqumla phambi kwakho iintlanga, apho uya kuzigqogqa khona, wazigqogqa ke, wahlala ezweni lazo:
5_12_30_zigcine, hleze uthiyelwe uzilandele, emveni kokutshatyalaliswa kwazo phambi kwakho; hleze uquqele koothixo bazo, uthi, Zibe zisithini na ezi ntlanga ukubakhonza oothixo bazo? Ndiya kwenjenjalo nam.
5_12_31_Uze ungenjenjalo kuYehova uThixo wakho; kuba yonke into elisikizi kuYehova, ayithiyileyo, ziyenzile koothixo bazo;  ngokuba kwanoonyana bazo neentombi zazo zizitshise emlilweni koothixo bazo.
5_12_32_Into yonke endisukuba ndiniwisele umthetho ngayo, ize nigcine ukuyenza; uze ungongezi kuyo unganciphisi nto.
5_13_1_Xa kuthe kwavela phakathi kwakho umprofeti nomphuphi wamaphupha, wakunika imiqondiso nezimanga,
5_13_2_yabakho ke imiqondiso nezimanga azithethileyo kuwe, esithi,  Masilandele thixo bambi ongabaziyo, sibakhonze:
5_13_3_uze ungawaphulaphuli amazwi aloo mprofeti naloo mphuphi wamaphupha; ngokuba kusukuba enilinga uYehova uThixo wenu,  ukuze azi ukuba niyamthanda na uYehova uThixo wenu ngentliziyo yenu yonke, nangomphefumlo wenu wonke.
5_13_4_Nize nilandele uYehova uThixo wenu, noyike yena, nigcine imithetho yakhe, niphulaphule ilizwi lakhe, nikhonze yena,  ninamathele kuye.
5_13_5_Ke loo mprofeti naloo mphuphi wamaphupha makabulawe; kuba ethethe elokutyeka kuYehova uThixo wenu, owanikhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, wanikhulula ngentlawulelo endlwini yobukhoboka;  ukuba akuwexule endleleni, akuwisele umthetho ngayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba uhambe ngayo. Uze ubutshayele ke ububi,  bungabikho phakathi kwakho.
5_13_6_Xa athe umzalwana wakho, umntakanyoko, nonyana wakho,  nentombi yakho, nomfazi wesifuba sakho, nommelwane wakho onjengomphefumlo wakho kuwe, wakuhenda ngasese, esithi, Masiye kukhonza thixo bambi ongabazanga, wena nooyihlo;
5_13_7_koothixo bezizwe eziningqongileyo, ezikufuphi kuwe, nokuba zezikude nawe, ezithabathele esiphelweni sehlabathi, zada zesa esiphelweni sehlabathi:
5_13_8_uze ungavumelani naye, ungamphulaphuli; lingabi nanceba iliso lakho kuye, ungamcongi, ungamfihli; uze umbulale afe.
5_13_9_Kofika esakho isandla kuye kuqala ukuba simbulale, kwandule ukufika esabantu bonke isandla emva koko,
5_13_10_umxulube ngamatye afe; ngokuba efune ukukuwexula kuYehova uThixo wakho, owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka;
5_13_11_eve onke amaSirayeli, oyike, angaphindi enze ububi obunjengobo phakathi kwakho.
5_13_12_Xa uthe weva komnye umzi wemizi yakowenu, akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba uhlale kuwo, kusithiwa,
5_13_13_Kuphume amadoda angamatshijolo phakathi kwakho, awexula abemi bomzi wawo, esithi, Hambani, siyekukhonza thixo bambi,  eningabaziyo:
5_13_14_wophengulula, ugocagoce, ubuzise, ucokise; O! iyinyaniso,  iqinisekile le nto, lenzekile eli sikizi phakathi kwakho:
5_13_15_uze ubabulale kuthi tu abemi baloo mzi ngohlangothi lwekrele, uwusingele phantsi, nento yonke ekuwo, kwanenkomo yawo, ngohlangothi lwekrele.
5_13_16_Wowabuthela onke amaxhoba awo esazulwini sendawo yawo yembutho, uwutshise ngomlilo loo mzi namaxhoba awo onke, ube lidini elipheleleyo kuYehova uThixo wakho, ube ngumwewe ongunaphakade, ungabi sakhiwa.
5_13_17_Esandleni sakho makunganamatheli nento le kwezi zinto zisingelwe phantsi; ukuze abuye uYehova ekuvutheni komsindo wakhe, abe nemfesane kuwe, asikwe yimfesane ngawe, akwandise,  njengoko wabafungelayo ooyihlo;
5_13_18_xa uthe waliphulaphula izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba uyigcine yonke imithetho yakhe endikuwiselayo namhla. ukuba ukwenze okuthe tye emehlweni kaYehova uThixo wakho.
5_14_1_Ningoonyana kuYehova uThixo wenu; ize ningazicenti,  ningenzi mpandla phezu kwamehlo enu ngenxa yomfi;
5_14_2_ngokuba ningabantu abangcwele kuYehova uThixo wenu; uYehova uninyulele ukuba nibe ngabantu abayinqobo kuye, ezizweni zonke eziphezu komhlaba.
5_14_3_Uze ungadli nanye into elisikizi.
5_14_4_Zizo ezi izinto ezizitho zine enozidla:
5_14_5_inkomo, imvu, imbuzi, ixhama, nebhadi, nelinqa,  netshabangqa, nenqu, neula, negogo.
5_14_6_Yonke into ezitho zine ethiwe gqiphu uphuphu, ezimpuphu zicandwe zacandwa kubini, etyisa umtyiso, ezintweni ezizitho zine, noyidla yona.
5_14_7_Zezi zodwa eningayi kuzidla kwezetyisa umtyiso,  nakwezithiwe gqiphu uphuphu: inkamela, nembila, nomvundla;  ngokuba zetyisa umtyiso, ke aziluthe gqiphu uphuphu,  ziziinqambi ke kuni;
5_14_8_nehagu, ngokuba iluthe gqiphu uphuphu, phofu ingetyisi,  iyinqambi kuni. Inyama yazo ize ningayidli, nesidumbu sazo ningasichukumisi.
5_14_9_Ezintweni zonke ezisemanzini nozidla: zonke izinto ezinamaphiko namaxolo nozidla.
5_14_10_Ke zonke izinto ezingenamaphiko namaxolo ize ningazidli;  ziziinqambi kuni.
5_14_11_Zonke iintaka ezihlambulukileyo nozidla.
5_14_12_Eningayi kuzidla zezi: ixhalanga, nosilwangangubo,  nonomakhwezana,
5_14_13_nesangxa, noontloyiya ngohlobo lwabo;
5_14_14_nehlungulu lonke ngohlobo lwalo;
5_14_15_nenciniba, nesihuluhulu, nengabangaba, nentambane ngohlobo lwayo;
5_14_16_nesikhova, nefubesi, nenkuku yamanzi;
5_14_17_nengcwangube, nenkqo, nogwidi;
5_14_18_nengwamza, nokhwalimanzi ngohlobo lwakhe, nobhobhoyi,  nelulwane.
5_14_19_Yonke inyakanyaka enamphiko iyinqambi kuni; ize ningayidli.
5_14_20_Zonke iintaka ezihlambulukileyo ningazidla.
5_14_21_Ize ningayidli yonke into ezifeleyo; ungamnika owasemzini osemasangweni akho, adle; ungathengisa ngayo kowolunye uhlanga;  ngokuba ningabantu abangcwele kuYehova uThixo wenu. Uze ungalipheki itakane ngobisi lonina.
5_14_22_Uze unikele isishumi songeniselo lonke lwembewu yakho ephuma entsimini, iminyaka ngeminyaka;
5_14_23_udle phambi koYehova uThixo wakho endaweni leyo aya kuyinyulela ukuhlalisa igama lakhe kuyo, esishumini sengqolowa yakho, nesewayini yakho entsha, neseoli yakho, namazibulo eenkomo zakho, nawempahla yakho emfutshane; ukuze ufunde ukumoyika uYehova uThixo wakho yonke imihla.
5_14_24_Xa indlela ithe yande kuwe, naxa uthe wakhohlwa ukusisa sona, ngokuba ikude kuwe indawo leyo uYehova uThixo wakho aya kuyinyulela ukulimisa kuyo igama lakhe, naxa athe wakusikelela uYehova uThixo wakho:
5_14_25_wosanana ngemali, uyibophe imali esandleni sakho, uye endaweni leyo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wakho,
5_14_26_uyanane imali ngeento zonke osukuba uzinqwenela umphefumlo wakho, ngeenkomo, nangempahla emfutshane, nangewayini,  nangesiselo esinamandla, nangeento zonke ozibizayo umphefumlo wakho; udle khona phambi koYehova uThixo wakho, uvuye wena nendlu yakho.
5_14_27_NomLevi osemasangweni akho uze ungamlibali, ngokuba akanasabelo nalifa ndawonye nawe.
5_14_28_Ekupheleni kweminyaka emithathu, wokhupha sonke isishumi songeniselo lwakho lwaloo mnyaka, ulufumbe emasangweni akho;
5_14_29_eze umLevi, ngokuba engenasabelo nalifa ndawonye nawe,  nowasemzini, nenkedama, nomhlolokazi osemasangweni akho, badle bahluthe; ukuze akusikelele uYehova uThixo wakho emsebenzini wonke wesandla sakho owusebenzayo.
5_15_1_Ekupheleni kweminyaka esixhenxe, uze wenze uyekelelo.
5_15_2_Nali ke isiko loyekelelo: Bonke ababoleki ababoleke ngesandla sabo, mabayiyekelele into abayiboleke ummelwane wabo,  bangammemi ummelwane wabo ongumzalwana wabo; ngokuba kumenyezwe uyekelelo lukaYehova.
5_15_3_Ungammema owolunye uhlanga; ke into eyiyeyakho ekumzalwana wakho soyiyekelela isandla sakho.
5_15_4_Kodwa ke ze kungabikho hlwempu kuwe; ngokuba uYehova wokusikelela kakhulu ezweni elo, akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba libe lilifa, ulime;
5_15_5_ukuba uthe kodwa waliphulaphula ngenyameko izwi likaYehova uThixo wakho, wagcina ukuwenza wonke lo mthetho ndikuwiselayo namhla.
5_15_6_Ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho ukusikelele, njengoko wathethayo kuwe; woboleka iintlanga ezininzi ngezibambiso, ke wena akuyi kuboleka kuzo ngazibambiso. Wolawula iintlanga ezininzi, ke zona aziyi kukulawula.
5_15_7_Xa kuthe kwakho ihlwempu kuwe ebazalwaneni bakho, nokuba kukuliphi kumasango akho, ezweni lakho akunikayo uYehova,  uThixo wakho, uze ungayenzi ingqoshomba intliziyo yakho,  usivale isandla sakho kumzalwana wakho olihlwempu.
5_15_8_Uze usivule kakhulu isandla sakho kuye, umboleke into elingene ukuswela kwakhe aswele ngako.
5_15_9_Uze uzigcine kungabikho butshijolo entliziyweni yakho,  uthi, Usondele umnyaka wesixhenxe, umnyaka woyekelelo; libe libi iliso lakho ngakumzalwana wakho olihlwempu, ungamniki nto;  aze akhale ngawe kuYehova, ube nesono.
5_15_10_Uze umnike, ingabi mbi intliziyo yakho ekumnikeni kwakho;  ngokuba ngenxa yale ndawo wokusikelela uYehova uThixo wakho emsebenzini wakho wonke, nasezintweni zonke osa isandla sakho kuzo.
5_15_11_Kuba alisayi kuza lingabikho ihlwempu phakathi kwelizwe elo; ngenxa yoko ndikuwisela umthetho, ndisithi, Sivule kakhulu isandla sakho kumzalwana wakho olusizana, olihlwempu lakho ezweni lakho.
5_15_12_Xa athe wazithengisa kuwe umzalwana wakho, umHebhere nokuba ngumHebherekazi, wakukhonza iminyaka emithandathu,  womndulula ngomnyaka wesixhenxe ekhululekile kuwe.
5_15_13_Xa uthe wamndulula ekhululekile kuwe, uze ungamndululi elambatha.
5_15_14_Wompha umphe empahleni yakho emfutshane, nasesandeni sakho, nasesixovulelweni sakho; umnike into akusikelele ngayo uYehova uThixo wakho;
5_15_15_ukhumbule ukuba ube ulikhoboka ezweni laseYiputa,  wakukhulula uYehova uThixo wakho; ngenxa yoko ndikuwisela umthetho ngale nto namhla.
5_15_16_Kothi, xa athe kuwe, Andimki kuwe; ngokuba ekuthanda wena nendlu yakho, ngokuba kulungile kuye ekuwe nje:
5_15_17_uthabathe ke inyatyhowa, umhlabe ngayo endlebeni iye kuma elucangweni, abe sisicaka kuwe ngonaphakade. Nakwisicakakazi sakho uze wenjenjalo.
5_15_18_Makunganqabi emehlweni akho ukumndulula kwakho ekhululekile kuwe; ngokuba kuwe unjengomqeshwa okuqeshwa kubini, ekukhonze iminyaka emithandathu nje: wokusikelela uYehova uThixo wakho ezintweni zonke ozenzayo.
5_15_19_Onke amazibulo athe azalwa ziinkomo zakho nayimpahla yakho emfutshane angamaduna, wowangcwalisa kuYehova uThixo wakho. Uze ungawasebenzisi amazibulo eenkomo zakho, ungawachebi amazibulo empahla yakho emfutshane.
5_15_20_Wowadlela phambi koYehova uThixo wakho iminyaka ngeminyaka, kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova, wena nendlu yakho.
5_15_21_Xa athe aba nesiphako, aziziqhwala, aziimfama, onke anesiphako esibi, uze ungawabingeleli kuYehova uThixo wakho.
5_15_22_Wowadlela emasangweni akho; oyinqambi nohlambulukileyo bofana ukuyidla into enjengebhadi nenjengexhama.
5_15_23_Ligazi lawo lodwa eningayi kulidla; woliphalazela emhlabeni njengamanzi.
5_16_1_Yigcine inyanga enguAbhibhi, wenze ipasika kuYehova uThixo wakho; ngokuba wakukhupha ngenyanga enguAbhibhi uYehova uThixo wakho eYiputa ebusuku.
5_16_2_Uze ubingelele ipasika kuYehova uThixo wakho, impahla emfutshane neenkomo, kuloo ndawo uYehova aya kuyinyulela ukuba alibeke kuyo igama lakhe.
5_16_3_Uze ungadli nto inegwele kunye nayo; imihla yoba sixhenxe usidla izonka ezingenagwele kunye nayo, isonka seentsizi,  ngokuba waphuma buphuthuphuthu ezweni laseYiputa; ukuze uwukhumbule umhla wokuphuma kwakho ezweni laseYiputa yonke imihla yokudla kwakho ubomi.
5_16_4_Kuze kungabonwa gwele emideni yakho yonke imihla esixhenxe;  ze kungabikho ntwana yanyama, oyibingelelayo ngokuhlwa ngosuku lokuqala, eba ngumbeko kude kuse.
5_16_5_Akunako ukuyibingelela ipasika kulimbi isango, emasangweni akho akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho;
5_16_6_ke kuloo ndawo uYehova uThixo wakho aya kuyinyulela ukulibeka kuyo igama lakhe, woyibingelela apho ipasika,  ngokuhlwa, ukutshona kwelanga, ngexesha owaphuma ngalo eYiputa;
5_16_7_uyose, uyidle, kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wakho; ubuye kusasa, uye ezintenteni zakho.
5_16_8_Wodla izonka ezingenagwele imihla emithandathu; ke ngomhla wesixhenxe yingqungquthela kaYehova uThixo wakho; uze ungenzi namnye umsebenzi.
5_16_9_Uze uzibalele iiveki ezisixhenxe. Woqala ukuzibalela iiveki ezisixhenxe uthabathela ekulifakeni irhengqa engqoloweni ingekavunwa;
5_16_10_wenze umthendeleko weeveki kuYehova uThixo wakho ngokomlinganiso wombingelelo wokuqhutywa yintliziyo wesandla sakho, uwunike njengokusikelelwa kwakho nguYehova uThixo wakho;
5_16_11_uvuye phambi koYehova uThixo wakho, wena, nonyana wakho,  nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho, nomLevi ose. masangweni akho, nomphambukeli, nenkedama, nomhlolokazi ophakathi kwenu, kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyulela ukulibeka kuyo igama lakhe uYehova, uThixo wakho.
5_16_12_Uze ukhumbule ukuba ube ulikhoboka eYiputa, uyigcine uyenze le mimiselo.
5_16_13_Uze uzenzele umthendeleko weminquba imihla esixhenxe,  wakukhova ukubutha okusesandeni sakho, nasesixovulelweni sakho;
5_16_14_uvuye emthendelekweni wakho, wena, nonyana wakho, nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho, nomLevi,  nomphambukeli, nenkedama, nomhlolokazi osemasangweni akho.
5_16_15_Imihla yoba sixhenxe usenza umthendeleko kuYehova uThixo wakho, kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova; ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho uya kukusikela elungeniselweni lwakho lonke,  nasemisebenzini yonke yezandla zakho, ube nokuvuya kuphele.
5_16_16_Izihlandlo ezithathu ngomnyaka mayibonakale into yonke eyindoda ebusweni bukaYehova uThixo wakho, kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula; ngomthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele,  nangomthendeleko weeveki, nangomthendeleko weminquba.  Makangabonakali ke engaphethe lutho ebusweni bukaYehova;
5_16_17_elowo abonakale ngokupha kwesandla sakhe, ngokwentsikelelo kaYehova uThixo wakho akunikileyo.
5_16_18_Wozimisela abagwebi nababhali emasangweni akho onke akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho, ngokwezizwe zakho, bagwebe abantu ngogwebo olulungileyo.
5_16_19_Uze ungasijiki isigwebo, ungakhethi buso, ungamkeli sicengo; kuba isicengo esi simfamekisa amehlo ezilumko,  siphenule iindawo zamalungisa.
5_16_20_Ubulungisa, ubulungisa obu, uze ubuphuthume, ukuze uphile,  ulihluthe ilizwe elo akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_16_21_Uze ungazigxumekeli Ashera wemithi, nokuba yiyiphi,  ecaleni lesibingelelo sikaYehova uThixo wakho, ozenzela sona;
5_16_22_ungazimiseli simiso selitye, into ayithiyileyo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_17_1_Uze ungabingeleli kuYehova uThixo wakho nkomo nagusha inasiphako, nandawo imbi nokuba yiyiphi; ngokuba oko kulisikizi kuYehova uThixo wakho.
5_17_2_Xa kuthe kwafunyanwa phakathi kwenu, nakuliphi isango emasangweni akho akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho, indoda nokuba yinkazana eyenze okubi emehlweni kaYehova uThixo wakho ngokugqitha umnqophiso wakhe;
5_17_3_yaya, yakhonza thixo bambi, yazinqula, ilanga, nenyanga,  nomkhosi wonke wasezulwini, into endingawisanga mthetho ngayo;
5_17_4_waxelelwa ke, weva, wabuza wacokisa, wafumana iyinyaniso,  iqinisekile le nto, lenzekile eli sikizi kwaSirayeli:
5_17_5_woyikhupha loo ndoda, nokuba yiloo nkazana, iyenzileyo loo nto imbi, emasangweni akho, loo ndoda nokuba yiloo nkazana uyixulube ngamatye, ife.
5_17_6_Ofanele ukufa wobulawa ngomlomo wamangqina amabini, nokuba ngamangqina amathathu; makangabulawa ngomlomo wangqina linye.
5_17_7_Kofika kuqala kuye isandla samangqina ukumbulala, kufike isandla sabantu bonke emveni koko; ubutshayele ke ububi,  bungabikho phakathi kwakho.
5_17_8_Xa ithe yakunqabela indawo ekugwebeni phakathi kwegazi negazi, phakathi kwetyala netyala, phakathi kobetho nobetho,  iziindawo ekubanjwene ngazo emasangweni akho: wosuka unyuke uye kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova uThixo wakho;
5_17_9_uye kubabingeleli abaLevi, nakumgwebi oya kubakho ngaloo mihla, ubuze, bakuxelele ilizwi lokugweba.
5_17_10_Uze wenze ngokwentetho yelizwi abokuxelela lona, bekuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova; ugcine ukwenza ngako konke abaya kukuyala ngako.
5_17_11_Ngokwentetho yomyalelo abaya kukuyala ngayo,  nangokwesigwebo abaya kusithetha kuwe, uze wenze, ungatyeki kulo ilizwi abaya kukuxelela, uye ekunene nasekhohlo.
5_17_12_Indoda leyo ethe yenza ngokukhukhumala, ingamphulaphuli umbingeleli omiyo, olungiselela khona kuYehova uThixo wakho,  nomgwebi lowo: mayife loo ndoda; ubutshayele ke ububi,  bungabikho kwaSirayeli;
5_17_13_bova ke bonke abantu, boyike, bangabi sakhukhumala.
5_17_14_Xa uthe wafika kulo ilizwe akunika lona uYehova uThixo wakho, walihlutha, wema kulo, wathi, Ndiyakuzimisela ukumkani njengeentlanga zonke ezindijikelezileyo:
5_17_15_wozimisela ukumkani aya kumnyula uYehova uThixo wakho,  uzimisele ukumkani wakubazalwana bakho. Akungekhe uzimisele ndoda yolunye uhlanga, engengumzalwana wakho.
5_17_16_Kodwa makangazandiseli mahashe, angababuyiseli abantu eYiputa ukuze andise amahashe; ngokuba uYehova wathi kuni, Ize ningabi saphinda nibuye ngaloo ndlela.
5_17_17_Makangazandiseli bafazi, ize ityeke intliziyo yakhe;  angazandiseli kakhulu silivere nagolide.
5_17_18_Wothi, xenikweni athe wahlala etroneni yobukumkani bakhe,  azibhalele impinda yombhalo yalo myalelo encwadini, ethabatha kwephambi kwababingeleli abaLevi.
5_17_19_Yoba ngakuye alese kuyo imihla yonke yobomi bakhe, ukuze afunde ukumoyika uYehova uThixo wakho, nokuwagcina onke amazwi alo myalelo nale mimiselo, ukuba awenze;
5_17_20_ukuba ingaphakami intliziyo yakhe phezu kwabazalwana bakhe, angatyeki emthethweni, aye ekunene nasekhohlo; ukuze ayolule imihla ebukumkanini bakhe, yena noonyana bakhe phakathi kwamaSirayeli.
5_18_1_Ababingeleli, abaLevi, sonke isizwe sabaLevi, mabangabi nasabelo nalifa kunye namaSirayeli; bodla ukudla kwasemlilweni ke kukaYehova, nelifa lakhe.
5_18_2_Mabangabi nalifa phakathi kwabazalwana babo; nguYehova ilifa labo, njengoko wathethayo kubo.
5_18_3_Soba sesi ke isilunga sababingeleli, esiphuma ebantwini,  esiphuma kwababingelela imibingelelo, nokuba yinkomo, nokuba yigusha: bomnika umbingeleli umkhono, nemihlathi, neswili.
5_18_4_Womnika ulibo lwengqolowa yakho, nolwewayini yakho entsha,  nolweoli yakho; noboya bokuqala bomchebo wempahla yakho emfutshane.
5_18_5_Ngokuba uYehova uThixo wakho wamnyula ezizweni zakho zonke,  ukuba eme alungiselele egameni likaYehova, yena noonyana bakhe,  yonke imihla.
5_18_6_Xa athe weza umLevi ephuma nakuliphi isango emasangweni akho, kuwo onke amaSirayeli, apho aphambukele khona, weza ngokunqwena konke komphefumlo wakhe kuloo ndawo aya kuyinyula uYehova,
5_18_7_walungiselela egameni likaYehova uThixo wakhe,  njengabazalwana bakhe bonke abaLevi, abamiyo khona phambi koYehova:
5_18_8_wodla isabelo njengabanye; ibe yodwa yona intengiso yakhe ngezinto zezindlu zooyise.
5_18_9_Xa uthe wafika kulo ilizwe akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho,  uze ungafundi ukwenza amasikizi ezo ntlanga.
5_18_10_Maze kungafunyanwa namnye kuwe ucandisa unyana wakhe nentombi yakhe emlilweni, novumisayo, nolitola, nohlaba izihlabo, nokhafulayo,
5_18_11_nobopha ngomabophe, nobuza koneshologu, nosiyazi, noquqela kwabafileyo.
5_18_12_Kuba balisikizi kuYehova bonke abenza ezo zinto; kungenxa yaloo masikizi, le nto uYehova uThixo wakho azigqogqayo zingabikho ebusweni bakho.
5_18_13_Uze ugqibelele ukuba noYehova uThixo wakho.
5_18_14_Kuba ezintlanga uzigqogqayo zaphulaphula amatola nabavumisi; ke wena akakunikanga okunjalo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_18_15_UYehova uThixo wakho uya kunivelisela umprofeti ophuma phakathi kwenu, kubazalwana benu, onjengam: ize niphulaphule yena;
5_18_16_njengako konke owakucelayo kuYehova uThixo wakho, eHorebhe ngomhla wesikhungu, usithi, Mandingaphindi ndilive ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wam, nalo mlilo mkhulu mandingabi sawubona,  ukuze ndingafi.
5_18_17_Wathi ke uYehova kum, balungisile ukutsho;
5_18_18_ndiya kubavelisela umprofeti ephuma phakathi kwabazalwana babo, onjengawe; ndiwabeke amazwi am emlonyeni wakhe, athethe kubo konke endiya kubawisela umthetho ngako.
5_18_19_Kothi ke, kulowo uthe akaliphulaphula ilizwi lam, aya kulithetha egameni lam, mna ndiyibuze loo nto kuloo mntu.
5_18_20_Kodwa umprofeti yena othe wakhukhumala, wathetha ilizwi egameni lam, endingamwiselanga mthetho ukuba alithethe, nothe wathetha egameni lathixo bambi: loo mprofeti makafe.
5_18_21_Xa ke uthe entliziyweni yakho, Sothini na ukulazi ilizwi angalithethanga uYehova?
5_18_22_ilizwi, athe walithetha umprofeti egameni likaYehova,  alabakho, alehla: lelo ilizwi angalithethanga uYehova. Uthethe ngokukhukhumala umprofeti lowo; uze unganxunguphaliswa nguye.
5_19_1_Xa athe uYehova uThixo wakho wazinqumla iintlanga ezo akunika ilizwe lazo uYehova uThixo wakho, wazigqogqa wena,  wahlala emizini yazo nasezindlwini zazo:
5_19_2_wozahlulela imizi emithathu phakathi kwelizwe lakho,  akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba ulime;
5_19_3_uzilungisele indlela, uwahlule ube zahlulo zithathu umda welizwe lakho, aya kukudlisa ilifa lalo uYehova uThixo wakho,  ukuze bonke ababulali basabele khona.
5_19_4_Lilo eli isiko awophathwa ngalo umbulali, othe wasabela khona ukuba asinde: Othe wambulala ummelwane wakhe ngengozi,  ebengamthiyile ngaphambili;
5_19_5_waya nommelwane wakhe ehlathini, esiya kugawula imithi,  isandla sakhe sajiwula izembe, enqumla imithi, yaphunyuka intsimbi emphinini, yabetha kummelwane wakhe, wafa: lowo wosabela komnye umzi kuloo mizi, asinde;
5_19_6_hleze umphindezeli wegazi amsukele umbulali lowo, kuba ishushu intliziyo yakhe, amfumane ngokuba nde kwendlela,  ambulale afe; engafanele kufa, kuba ebengamthiyile ngaphambili.
5_19_7_Ngenxa yoko ndikuwisela umthetho, ndisithi, Wozahlulela imizi emithathu.
5_19_8_Ke ukuba uYehova uThixo wakho uthe wawenza banzi umda wakho, njengoko wafungayo kooyihlo, wakunika lonke elo zwe,  awathi wobanika lona ooyihlo;
5_19_9_xa uthe wawugcina ukuba uwenze, lo mthetho wonke ndikuwisela wona namhla, ukuba umthande uYehova uThixo wakho,  uhambe ngeendlela zakhe imihla yonke; usaya kuyongeza imizi ibe mithathu kule mithathu;
5_19_10_ukuze kungaphalazwa gazi lingenatyala phakathi kwelizwe lakho, akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba libe lilifa,  amagazi abe phezu kwakho.
5_19_11_Xa athe umntu wamthiya ummelwane wakhe, wamlalela,  wamvunukela, wambulala, wafa; wasabela komnye umzi kuloo mizi;
5_19_12_amadoda amakhulu omzi wakhe othumela, amthabathe khona,  amnikele esandleni somphindezeli wegazi, ambulale, afe.
5_19_13_Ze lingabi nanceba iliso lakho kuye; wolitshayela ke igazi elingenatyala, lingabikho kwaSirayeli, kulunge kuwe.
5_19_14_Uze ungawushenxisi umlimandlela wommelwane wakho,  abawumisayo abamandulo elifeni lakho, oya kulidla ezweni elo akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba ulime.
5_19_15_Ze kungesuki kume ngqina linye ngomntu ngenxa yobugwenxa,  nokuba bubuphi na, nangenxa yesono nokuba sisiphi, esonweni nokuba sisiphi one ngaso; lize limiswe ilizwi ngomlomo wamangqina amabini, nokuba kungomlomo wamangqina amathathu.
5_19_16_Xa kuthe kwema ingqina elifumana limbopha umntu, ukuba lingqine okutyekileyo ngaye,
5_19_17_loo madoda mabini abambeneyo oma phambi koYehova, phambi kwababingeleli nabagwebi abaya kubakho ngaloo mihla bancine abagwebi.
5_19_18_Ukuba ke ingqina lilingqina lobuxoki, lingqine ubuxoki ngomzalwana walo,
5_19_19_ize nenze kulo, njengoko belicinga ukwenza ngako kumzalwana walo; nibutshayele ke ububi, bungabikho phakathi kwenu.
5_19_20_Bova abanye, boyike, kungabi saphindwa kwenziwe ngokwale ndawo imbi phakathi kwenu.
5_19_21_Ze lingabi nanceba iliso lakho: umphefumlo wobuyiselwa ngomphefumlo, iliso ngeliso, izinyo ngezinyo, isandla ngesandla, unyawo ngonyawo.
5_20_1_Xa uthe waphuma waya kulwa neentshaba zakho, waza wabona amahashe neenqwelo zokulwa, abantu abaninzi kunawe, uze ungaboyiki; ngokuba unawe uYehova uThixo wakho, owakunyusayo ezweni laseYiputa.
5_20_2_Kothi ke, xenikweni nithe nasondela ekulweni, afike umbingeleli, athethe ebantwini, athi kubo, Yiva, Sirayeli!
5_20_3_Nisondele namhla ekulweni neentshaba zenu; mayingathambi intliziyo yenu, musani ukoyika, musani ukuphakuzela, musani ukungcangcazela ebusweni bazo;
5_20_4_ngokuba uYehova uThixo wenu uhamba nani, ukuba anilwele kwiintshaba zenu, anisindise.
5_20_5_Ababhali bothetha ebantwini, bathi, Ngubani na umntu owakhe indlu entsha, akayisungula? Makahambe abuyele endlwini yakhe,  hleze afe emfazweni, isungulwe mntu wumbi.
5_20_6_Ngubani na umntu otyele isidiliya, akadla kuso? Makahambe abuyele endlwini yakhe, hleze afe emfazweni, sidliwe mntu wumbi.
5_20_7_Ngubani na umntu ogane umfazi, akamzeka? Makahambe abuyele endlwini yakhe, hleze afe emfazweni, azekwe mntu wumbi.
5_20_8_Boqokela ababhali bathethe ebantwini, bathi, Ngubani na umntu owoyikayo, ontliziyo ithambileyo? Makahambe abuyele endlwini yakhe, inganyibiliki intliziyo yabazalwana bakhe,  njengentliziyo yakhe.
5_20_9_Kothi bakugqiba ababhali ukuthetha ebantwini, bamise abathetheli bemikhosi bokukhokela abantu.
5_20_10_Xa uthe wasondela emzini, usiya kulwa nawo, womemeza uxolo kuwo;
5_20_11_kuthi, ukuba uthe wakuphendula ngoxolo wakuvulela, bonke abantu abafunyenwe kuwo babe ngabafakwa uviko, bakukhonze.
5_20_12_Ke ukuba uthe awaxola nawe, wesuka wenza imfazwe nawe,  wowungqinga wena.
5_20_13_Ukuba uthe uYehova uThixo wakho wawunikela esandleni sakho, woyibulala yonke into eyindoda kuwo ngohlangothi lwekrele;
5_20_14_kodwa abafazi, nabantwana, neenkomo, neento zonke ezithe zabakho kuloo mzi, amaxhoba awo onke, wowathimbela kuwe, uwadle amaxhoba eentshaba zakho akunikileyo uYehova uThixo wakho.
5_20_15_Uya kwenjenjalo kuyo yonke imizi ekude kakhulu kuwe,  engeyiyo yona imizi yezi ntlanga.
5_20_16_Kodwa emizini yezi zizwe akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba ibe lilifa, uze ungasindisi nanye into ephefumlayo.
5_20_17_Wowasingela phantsi kanye amaHeti, nama-Amori, namaKanan,  namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi, njengoko wakuwiselayo umthetho uYehova uThixo wakho;
5_20_18_ukuze banganifundisi ukwenza amasikizi abo onke abawenze koothixo babo; none kuYehova uThixo wenu.
5_20_19_Xa nithe ke nenza iintsuku niwungqingile umzi, nisilwa nawo ukuba niwuhluthe, uze ungayonakalisi imithi yawo ngokuyixabela ngezembe; kuba uya kudla kuyo. Uze ungayigawuli;  kuba umthi wasendle ungumntu na, ukuba ungqingwe nguwe?
5_20_20_Ngumthi owaziyo ukuba asimthi udliwayo wodwa owowonakalisa, uwugawule, wakhe izinto zokungqinga umzi olwa nawo, ude uwe.
5_21_1_Xa kuthe kwafunyanwa obuleweyo kuwo umhlaba akunikayo uYehova uThixo wakho ukuba uwume, equngquluzile endle, akwaziwa ukuba ubulewe ngubani na:
5_21_2_ophuma amadoda amakhulu akowenu, nabagwebi bakowenu,  alinganise, asingise emizini emjikelezileyo lowo ubuleweyo.
5_21_3_Kothi ke, umzi osondeleyo kobuleweyo, amadoda amakhulu aloo mzi athabathe ithokazi lenkomo, elingasetyenziswanga,  elingatsalanga ngadyokhwe;
5_21_4_ahle amadoda amakhulu nethokazi, aye emfuleni ohlala unamanzi, ongalinywanga, ongahlwayelwanga, alaphule intamo ithokazi emfuleni apho.
5_21_5_Bofika ababingeleli, oonyana bakaLevi; ngokuba unyule bona uYehova uThixo wakho, ukuba balungiselele kuye, basikelele egameni likaYehova; kume ngokomlomo wabo ukubambana konke,  nokubetha konke.
5_21_6_Onke amadoda amakhulu aloo mzi usondeleyo kobuleweyo ozihlamba izandla zawo phezu kwethokazi, elaphulwe intamo emfuleni apho;
5_21_7_aphendule, athi, Izandla zethu aziliphalazanga eli gazi,  namehlo ethu akabonanga;
5_21_8_camagu, Yehova, kubantu bakho amaSirayeli owawakhululayo;  musa ukubeka igazi elingenatyala phakathi kwabantu bakho amaSirayeli. Bolicanyagushelwa ke igazi.
5_21_9_Wolitshayela ke wena igazi elingenatyala, lingabikho phakathi kwakho, xa uthe wenza okuthe tye emehlweni kaYehova.
5_21_10_Xa uthe waphuma, waya kulwa neentshaba zakho, wazinikela uYehova uThixo wakho esandleni sakho, wathimba abathinjwa kuzo,
5_21_11_wabona phakathi kwabathinjwa intokazi emzimba mhle,  wathana nca nayo, wayizeka yaba ngumkakho:
5_21_12_woyingenisa phakathi endlwini yakho, ichebe intloko yayo,  inqumle iinzipho zayo,
5_21_13_iyisuse kuyo ingubo yokuthinjwa kwayo, ihlale endlwini yakho, imlilele uyise nonina inyanga iphela. Emveni koko woyingena, ube yindoda yayo, yona ibe ngumkakho.
5_21_14_Kothi ukuba uthe akwayinanza, uyindulule iye ekuthandeni kwayo; ungakhe uthengise ngayo ngemali, ungayiphathi kakubi,  uyonile nje.
5_21_15_Xa ithe indoda yanabafazi ababini, omnye ethandwa, omnye ethiyiwe, bayizalela oonyana, lowo uthandwayo nalowo uthiyiweyo; ke unyana wamazibulo waba ngowothiyiweyo:
5_21_16_kothi mini ibabela ilifa lento enayo oonyana bayo, ingabi nako ukumenza owamazibulo unyana wothandwayo, phambi konyana wothiyiweyo ongowamazibulo;
