6_8_16_Bahlatyelwa umkhosi bonke abantu abakuloo mzi ukuba babasukele. Bamsukela ke uYoshuwa, baqhiwukana nomzi wabo.
6_8_17_Akwasala nanye indoda eAyi naseBheteli, ingaphumanga iwalandele amaSirayeli; bawushiya umzi uvulekile, bawasukela amaSirayeli.
6_8_18_Wathi uYehova kuYoshuwa, wolule umkhonto osesandleni sakho ngakwiAyi; kuba ndiya kuyinikela esandleni sakho. Wawolula ke uYoshuwa umkhonto osesandleni sakhe ngakuwo umzi.
6_8_19_Besuka abalaleli ngokukhawuleza endaweni yabo, bagidima;  akusolula isandla sakhe, bangena kuloo mzi, bawuthimba,  bangxama, bawufaka isikhuni.
6_8_20_Abheka emva kwawo amadoda aseAyi, abona, nango umsi womzi unyuka usiya ezulwini; akaba namandla okusabela ngapha nangapha; bathi abantu ababesabele entlango, babaguqukela ababasukelayo.
6_8_21_UYoshuwa namaSirayeli onke abona ukuba abalaleli bawuthimbile umzi, nokuba umsi womzi uyenyuka, babuya ke bawabulala amadoda aseAyi.
6_8_22_Baphuma abaya kuloo mzi, beza kubakhawulela; aba phakathi kwabakwaSirayeli, abanye abangapha, abanye bangapha; bawabulala ke kwada akwasala usabileyo, nosindileyo.
6_8_23_Bambamba ehleli ukumkani waseAyi, bamsondeza kuYoshuwa.
6_8_24_Kwathi, xa amaSirayeli abegqibile ukubabulala bonke abemi baseAyi ezweni, entlango apho abebasukele khona, naxa babewile bonke ngohlangothi lwekrele bada bagqitywa, amaSirayeli onke abuyela eAyi, ayibulala ngohlangothi lwekrele.
6_8_25_Kwathi, bonke abawayo ngaloo mini, bethabathela kwindoda besisa kumfazi, bangamawaka alishumi elinamabini, bonke abantu baseAyi.
6_8_26_Akasibuyisanga uYoshuwa isandla sakhe, awolule umkhonto ngaso, bada batshatyalaliswa bonke abemi baseAyi.
6_8_27_Kodwa iinkomo namaxhoba aloo mzi azithimbela amaSirayeli ngokwelizwi likaYehova, abemwisele umthetho ngalo uYoshuwa.
6_8_28_Wayitshisa ke uYoshuwa iAyi, wayenza umwewe ingunaphakade,  inxowa unanamhla.
6_8_29_Wamxhoma emthini ukumkani waseAyi kwada kwalixesha langokuhlwa; lakutshona ilanga, wawisa umthetho uYoshuwa ukuba basithule isidumbu sakhe emthini; basiphosa esithubeni sesango lomzi, bamisa phezu kwaso imfumba enkulu yamatye; ikhona unanamhla.
6_8_30_Waza uYoshuwa wamakhela uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli isibingelelo entabeni ye-Ebhali, njengolo uMoses,
6_8_31_umkhonzi kaYehova, wabawiselayo oonyana bakaSirayeli umthetho, njengoko kubahliweyo encwadini yomyalelo kaMoses:  isibingelelo samatye awonke esingasetyenzwanga ngantsimbi.  Banyusa phezu kwaso amadini anyukayo kuYehova, babingelela imibingelelo yoxolo.
6_8_32_Wabhala khona ematyeni, wawuphinda ukuwubhala umyalelo kaMoses, awawubhalayo phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli.
6_8_33_Onke amaSirayeli, namadoda awo amakhulu, nababhali,  nabagwebi bawo, ema ngapha nangapha kwetyeya, phambi kwababingeleli abangabaLevi, abathwele ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova, owasemzini enjengozalwayo; esinye isiqingatha sabo simalunga nentaba yeGerizim, esinye isiqingatha sabo simalunga nentaba ye-Ebhali; njengoko uMoses umkhomzi kaYehova wawisayo umthetho ngenxa engaphambili, ukuba basikelelwe abantu bakwaSirayeli.
6_8_34_Emveni koko wawalesa onke amazwi omyalelo, iintsikelelo neziqalekiso, ngako konke okubhaliweyo encwadini yomyalelo.
6_8_35_Akwabakho nalinye ilizwi kuwo onke amazwi abewise uMoses umthetho ngawo, angalilesanga uYoshuwa phambi kwebandla lonke lamaSirayeli, nabafazi, nabantwana, nowasemzini ohamba phakathi kwawo.
6_9_1_Kwathi, bakuva bonke ookumkani abanganeno kweYordan ezintabeni, nasezihlanjeni, nangaselwandle lonke olukhulu,  kwasingisa eLebhanon, amaHeti, nama-Amori, namaKanan,  namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi,
6_9_2_babuthelana ndawonye, ukuba balwe ngamxhelo mnye noYoshuwa namaSirayeli.
6_9_3_Ke abemi baseGibheyon beva oko akwenzileyo uYoshuwa kwiYeriko, nakwiAyi,
6_9_4_benza nabo ngobuqhophololo. Baya bazenza izigidimi, babeka iingxowa ezonakeleyo emaesileni abo, neentsuba zewayini ezonakeleyo, ezikrazukileyo, ezibotshiweyo,
6_9_5_neembadada ezonakeleyo, ezixoliweyo, ezinyaweni zabo;  bambatha neengubo ezonakeleyo; nesonka sonke somphako wabo besomile, besingundile kunene.
6_9_6_Beza kuYoshuwa emkhosini eGiligali, bathi kuye nakumadoda akwaSirayeli, Sivela ezweni elikude; simiseleni ngoko umnqophiso.
6_9_7_Athi amadoda akwaSirayeli kumaHivi lawo, Hi, kanti nikwahleli phakathi kwethu; sothini na ukunimisela umnqophisi?
6_9_8_Bathi kuYoshuwa, Singabakhonzi bakho. Wathi uYoshuwa kubo,  Ningoobani na, nivela phi na?
6_9_9_Bathi kuye, Bavela kwelikude kakhulu ilizwe abakhonzi bakho,  ngenxa yegama likaYehova uThixo wakho; kuba siluvile udumo lwakhe, nento yonke awayenzayo eYiputa;
6_9_10_nento yonke awayenzayo kookumkani bobabini bama-Amori,  ababephesheya kweYordan, kuSihon ukumkani waseHeshbhon, nakuOgi ukumkani waseBhashan obeseAshtaroti.
6_9_11_Atsho kuthi amadoda amakhulu, nabemi bonke belizwe lakowethu, ukuthi, Phathani ezandleni zenu umphako wendlela,  niye kuwakhawulela, nithi kuwo, Singabakhonzi benu; simiseleni ngoko umnqophiso.
6_9_12_Esi sisonka sethu sasenza umphako wethu sishushu ezindlwini zethu, ngomhla wokuphuma kwethu ekhaya ukuza kuni; ngoku nasi somile, singundile;
6_9_13_iintsuba ezi zewayini sazizalisa zisentsha; nanzi zikrazukile; nanzi neengubo zethu, neembadada zethu, zonakele ngobude bendlela.
6_9_14_Acaphula ke amadoda emphakweni wabo, akabuza cebo emlonyeni kaYehova.
6_9_15_Wenza uxolo nabo uYoshuwa, wabamisela umnqophiso wokubasindisa; zabafungela nezikhulu zalo ibandla.
6_9_16_Kwathi, ekupheleni kwemihla emithathu emveni kokuba bebamisele umnqophiso, beva ukuba bakufuphi kubo, nokuba bahleli kwaphakathi kwabo.
6_9_17_Banduluka oonyana bakaSirayeli, bafika emizini yabo ngomhla wesithathu. Imizi yabo yiGibheyon, neKefira, neBheroti,  neKiriyati-yeharim.
6_9_18_Oonyana bakaSirayeli abababulala, ngokuba izikhulu zebandla zibe zifunge uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli kubo. Lazikrokrela izikhulu lonke ibandla.
6_9_19_Zathi zonke izikhulu kwibandla lonke, Thina sifunge uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli kubo, ke ngoko asinakubachukumisa.
6_9_20_Masenjenje kubo: masibasindise, kungabikho burhalarhume phezu kwethu ngenxa yesifungo esabafungela sona.
6_9_21_Zathi izikhulu kubo, Mabadle ubomi; mababe ngabathezi beenkuni nabakhi bamanzi bebandla lonke; njengoko zathethayo izikhulu kubo.
6_9_22_Wababiza ke uYoshuwa, wathetha kubo, esithi,  Nisikhohliseleni na, nisithi, Simgama kakhulu kuni; kanti nihleli kwaphakathi kwethu?
6_9_23_Niqalekisiwe ngoko; kuni akuyi kunqumka bakhonzi, bathezi beenkuni, bakhi bamanzi bendlu kaThixo wam.
6_9_24_Baphendula bathi kuYoshuwa, Baxelelwa ngokuqinisekileyo abakhonzi bakho. okokuba uYehova uThixo wakho wamwisela uMoses umkhonzi wakhe umthetho, ukuba uya kuninika lonke ilizwe,  nokuba uya kubatshabalalisa bonke abemi belizwe ebusweni benu;  sayoyikela kunene ke imiphefumlo yethu ebusweni benu, senza le nto ke.
6_9_25_Kalokunje nanku sisesandleni sakho; yenza njengoko kulungileyo, njengoko kuthe tye emehlweni akho ukwenza kuthi.
6_9_26_Wenjenjalo ke kubo, wabahlangula esandleni soonyana bakaSirayeli, abababulala.
6_9_27_UYoshuwa wabenza ngaloo mini abathezi beenkuni nabakhi bamanzi, ebandleni nasesibingelelweni sikaYehova, unanamhla,  kuloo ndawo athe wayinyula.
6_10_1_Kwathi, akuva uAdoni-tsedeki, ukumkani wasiYerusalem, ukuba uYoshuwa uyithimbile iAyi, wayitshabalalisa; njengoko wenza ngako kwiYeriko nokumkani wayo, wenjenjalo kwiAyi nokumkani wayo; nokuba abemi baseGibheyon benze uxolo namaSirayeli, baba phakathi kwawo:
6_10_2_boyika kunene, kuba ngumzi omkhulu iGibheyon, njengomnye wemizi yobukumkani, ngokuba inkulu kuneAyi, namadoda ayo onke angamagorha.
6_10_3_Wesuka uAdoni-tsedeki ukumkani waseYerusalem, wathumela kuHoham ukumkani waseHebron, nakuPiram ukumkani waseYarmuti,  nakuYafiya ukumkani waseLakishe, nakuDebhiri ukumkani wase-Eglon, esithi,
6_10_4_Nyukani nize kum, nindincede, siyixabele iGibheyon; kuba yenze uxolo noYoshuwa noonyana bakaSirayeli.
6_10_5_Bahlangana ke, benyuka ookumkani abo bama-Amori bobahlanu,  ukumkani waseYerusalem, nokumkani waseHebron, nokumkani waseYarmuti, nokumkani waseLakishe, nokumkani wase-Eglon, bona nemikhosi yabo yonke, bayingqinga iGibheyon, balwa nayo.
6_10_6_Athumela ke amadoda aseGibheyon kuYoshuwa emkhosini eGiligali, esithi, Musa ukusiyekelela isandla sakho kubakhonzi bakho; nyuka uze kuthi ngokukhawuleza, usisindise, usincede;  ngokuba bebuthelene phezu kwethu bonke ookumkani bama-Amori abemiyo ezintabeni.
6_10_7_Wenyuka ke uYoshuwa, esuka eGiligali, yena nabantu bonke bokulwa bendawonye naye, namagorha onke anobukroti.
6_10_8_Wathi uYehova kuYoshuwa, Musa ukuboyika; kuba ndibanikele esandleni sakho; akuyi kuma ndoda kubo phambi kwakho.
6_10_9_Wafika uYoshuwa kubo ngebhaqo; wenyuka bonke ubusuku, evela eGiligali.
6_10_10_UYehova wabadubaduba phambi kwamaSirayeli, ababulala ngobulawo olukhulu eGibheyon; abasukela ngendlela enyuka iye eBhete-horon, ababulala kwada kwesa eAzeka, kwada kwesa naseMakeda.
6_10_11_Kwathi, ekusabeni kwabo phambi kwamaSirayeli,  besethambekeni laseBhete-horon, uYehova wabathobela amatye amakhulu ezulwini, kwada kwesa eAzeka, bafa. Babaninzi abafa ngamatye esichotho, kunababulawayo ngoonyana bakaSirayeli ngekrele.
6_10_12_Waza wathetha uYoshuwa kuYehova, mhlana uYehova wawanikela ama-Amori koonyana bakaSirayeli, wathi emehlweni amaSirayeli:  Langa, nqumama eGibheyon, Nawe nyanga, entilini yeAyalon.
6_10_13_Lathi nqumama ke ilanga, yema inyanga, Lwada uhlanga lwaziphindezelela ezintshabeni zalo. Oku akubhalwanga na eNcwadini yOthe Tye? Lema ke ilanga esazulwini sezulu,  alangxama ukutshona, yangathi yimini iphela.
6_10_14_Akuzanga kubekho mini injengaleyo, phambi kwayo nangasemva kwayo, ngokokude uYehova aliphulaphule izwi lomntu; ngokuba uYehova wawalwela amaSirayeli.
6_10_15_Wabuya uYoshuwa, enamaSirayeli onke, waya eminqubeni eGiligali.
6_10_16_Basaba abo kumkani bahlanu, bazimela emqolombeni eMakeda.
6_10_17_Kwaxelwa kuYoshuwa, kwathiwa, Sibafumene ookumkani bobahlanu, bezimele emqolombeni eMakeda.
6_10_18_Wathi uYoshuwa, Qengqelani amatye amakhulu emlonyeni womqolomba, nimise amadoda phezu kwawo ukuba abalinde.
6_10_19_Ke nina musani ukuma; zisukeleni iintshaba zenu, niwubethe umqosheliso wazo. Musani ukuwuvumela ungene emizini yawo, kuba uYehova uThixo wenu uwunikele esandleni senu.
6_10_20_Kwathi, akugqiba uYoshuwa noonyana bakaSirayeli ukuzibulala kakhulu kunene zada zagqitywa, zathi eziseleyo kuzo, zaya kungena emizini enqatyisiweyo.
6_10_21_Babuye ke bonke abantu, baya emkhosini kuYoshuwa eMakeda ngoxolo; akwabakho nja ibavungamelayo oonyana bakaSirayeli,  kwanabani.
6_10_22_Wathi uYoshuwa, Vulani umlomo womqolomba, nibakhuphe emqolombeni abaa kumkani bobahlanu, beze kum.
6_10_23_Benjenjalo ke; babakhupha emqolombeni, beza kuye abo kumkani bobahlanu, ukumkani waseYerusalem, nokumkani waseHebron, nokumkani waseYarmuti, nokumkani waseLakishe,  nokumkani nokumkani wase-Eglon.
6_10_24_Kwathi, bakubakhupha, babasa kuYoshuwa abo kumkani;  wawabiza uYoshuwa onke amadoda akwaSirayeli, wathi kubaphathi bamadoda okulwa ababehambe naye, Sondelani, nibanyathele entanyeni aba kumkani. Basondela ke, babanyathela ezintanyeni zabo.
6_10_25_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo, Musani ukoyika, musani ukuqhiphuka umbilini: yomelelani, nikhaliphe, ngokuba uYehova uya kwenjenjalo kwiintshaba zenu zonke enilwa nazo.
6_10_26_Wabaxabela ke uYoshuwa, emveni koko wababulala, wabaxhoma emithini emihlanu; baxhonywa emithini apho kwada kwahlwa.
6_10_27_Kwathi ngexesha lokutshona kwelanga, uYoshuwa wawisa umthetho, babathula emithini, babaphosa emqolombeni ababezimele kuwo, babeka amatye amakhulu emlonyeni womqolomba, asekhoyo namhlanje.
6_10_28_UYoshuwa wayithimba neMakeda ngaloo mini, wayixabela ngohlangothi lwekreke, nokumkani wayo, wabatshabalalisa kwanabantu bonke abakuyo; akasalisa namnye usindileyo. Wenza kukumkani waseMakeda njengoko wenza ngako kukumkani waseYeriko.
6_10_29_Wagqitha uYoshuwa enamaSirayeli onke eMakeda, waya eLibhena, walwa neLibhena.
6_10_30_Wayinikela kananjalo uYehova esandleni samaSirayeli,  nokumkani wayo, wayixabela ngohlangothi lwekrele, kwanabantu bonke abakuyo; akasalisa kuyo namnye usindileyo. Wenza kukumkani wayo njengoko wenza ngako kukumkani waseYeriko.
6_10_31_Wagqitha uYoshuwa eLibhena, enamaSirayeli onke, waya eLakishe, wayingqinga, walwa nayo.
6_10_32_UYehova wayinikela iLakishe esandleni samaSirayeli,  ayithimba ngomhla wesibini, ayixabela ngohlangothi lwekrele,  kwanabantu bonke abakuyo, njengako konke awakwenzayo kwiLibhena.
6_10_33_Waza wenyuka uHoram, ukumkani waseGezere, waya kuyinceda iLakishe. UYoshuwa wambulala yena nabantu bakhe, kwada akwasala namnye kuye usindileyo.
6_10_34_Wegqitha uYoshuwa eLakishe, enamaSirayeli onke, aya e-Eglon, ayingqinga, alwa nayo.
6_10_35_Ayithimba ngaloo mhla, ayixabela ngohlangothi lwekrele,  kwanabantu bonke abakuyo; wayitshabalalisa ngaloo mhla,  njengako konke awakwenzayo kwiLakishe.
6_10_36_Wenyuka uYoshuwa esuka e-Eglon, waya eHebron,  enamaSirayeli onke, alwa nayo,
6_10_37_ayithimba, ayixabela ngohlangothi lwekrele, nokumkani wayo, nemizi yayo yonke, nabantu bonke abakuyo; akwasala namnye usindileyo, njengako konke awakwenzayo kwiEglon; watshabalalisa kwanabantu bonke abakuyo.
6_10_38_Wabuya ke uYoshuwa enamaSirayeli onke, weza eDebhiri,  walwa nayo.
6_10_39_Wayithimba, nokumkani wayo, nemizi yayo yonke, ayixabela ngohlangothi lwekrele. Ayitshabalalisa kwanabantu bonke abakuyo; akwasala namnye usindileyo; njengoko wakwenzayo kwiHebron, wenjenjalo kweDebhiri, nakukumkani wayo; njengoko wakwenzayo kwiLibhena, nakukumkani wayo.
6_10_40_Walibulala ke uYoshuwa lonke ilizwe leentaba, nelasezantsi nelezihlambo, nelamaxandeka, nabo bonke ookumkani balo;  akwasala namnye usindileyo. Watshabalalisa konke okuphefumlayo,  njengoko wawisa umthetho uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli.
6_10_41_Wababulala uYoshuwa, wathabathela eKadeshe-bharneha, wesa eGaza, nelizwe lonke laseGoshen, wesa eGibheyon.
6_10_42_Wabathimba uYoshuwa bonke abo kumkani, nelizwe labo,  ngasihlandlo sinye, ngokuba uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli ebewalwela amaSirayeli.
6_10_43_Wabuya uYoshuwa enamaSirayeli onke, weza eminqubeni eGiligali.
6_11_1_Kwathi, akukuva oko uYabhin ukumkani waseHatsore, wathuma kuYobhabhi ukumkani waseMadon, nakukumkani waseShimron,  nakukumkani waseAkeshafi,
6_11_2_nakookumkani abangasentla ezintabeni, naseArabha ngasezantsi kweKineroti, nasezihlanjeni, nasezindulini zaseDore engasentshonalanga,
6_11_3_kumaKanan empumalanga nasentshonalanga, nakuma-Amori,  nakumaHeti, nakumaPerizi, nakumaYebhusi ezintabeni, nakumaHivi aphantsi kweHermon ezweni leMizpa.
6_11_4_Baphuma ke bona benemikhosi yabo yonke, abantu abaninzi njengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle ukuba baninzi,  namahashe, neenqwelo zokulwa, into eninzi kunene.
6_11_5_Bavumelana ke abo kumkani bonke; beza bamisa ndawonye emanzini aseMerom, ukuba balwe namaSirayeli.
6_11_6_Wathi uYehova kuYoshuwa, Musa ukoyika ngenxa yabo; ngokuba ngomso eli xa ndiya kubanikela bonke bephela, behlatyiwe,  emandleni amaSirayeli, uwanqumle imisipha amahashe abo,  uzitshise ngomlilo iinqwelo zabo zokulwa.
6_11_7_Waya ke uYoshuwa, enabantu bonke bokulwa, wabafikela ngebhaqo emanzini aseMerom, babawela.
6_11_8_UYehova wabanikela esandleni samaSirayeli, ababulala,  abasukela kwesa eTsidon enkulu, kwesa eMiserefoti-mayim, kwesa ethafeni laseMizpa empumalanga; ababulala kwada akwasala namnye kubo usindiliyo.
6_11_9_Wenza ke uYoshuwa kubo njengoko wathethayo uYehova kuye;  amahashe abo wawanqumla imisipha, iinqwelo zabo zokulwa wazitshisa ngomlilo.
6_11_10_Wabuya uYoshuwa ngelo xesha, wayithimba iHatsore,  wambulala ukumkani wayo ngekrele, kuba iHatsore ngenxa engaphambili ibe iyintloko yezo zikumkani zonke.
6_11_11_Ababulala bonke abantu abakuyo ngohlangothi lwekrele,  ayitshabalalisa; akwasala namnye uphefumlayo; ayitshisa iHatsore ngomlilo.
6_11_12_Yonke imizi yabo kumkani, nabo kumkani bayo bonke,  wabathimba uYoshuwa; wababulala ngohlangothi lwekrele,  wabatshabalalisa, njengoko uMoses umkhonzi kaYehova wawisayo umthetho.
6_11_13_Kodwa yonke imizi emi emimangweni yayo amaSirayeli akayitshisanga; yaba yiHatsore yodwa awayitshisayo uYoshuwa.
6_11_14_Onke amaxhoba aloo mizi neenkomo bazithimbela oonyana bakaSirayeli; kodwa bababulala bonke abantu ngohlangothi lwekrele, bada babatshabalalisa, abasalisa namnye uphefumlayo.
6_11_15_Njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses umkhonzi wakhe, wenjenjalo uMoses ukumwisela umthetho uYoshuwa.  Wenjenjalo ke uYoshuwa; akasusa nalinye ilizwi kuko konke uYehova awamwisela uMoses umthetho ngako.
6_11_16_Walithabatha ke uYoshuwa lonke elo zwe leentaba,  nelasezantsi lonke, nelizwe laseGoshen lonke, nelezihlambo,  nele-Arabha, neentaba zakwaSirayeli, nezihlambo zazo;
6_11_17_elithabathela ezintabeni ezimkhuthuka, ezinyuka ziye kwaSehire, lesa eBhahali-gadi, ethafeni laseLebhanon, phantsi kwentaba yeHermon. Bonke ookumkani bawo wabathimba, wabaxabela,  wababulala.
6_11_18_Yaba mininzi ke imihla esenza imfazwe uYoshuwa nabo kumkani bonke.
6_11_19_Akubangakho mzi wazinikelayo ngoxolo koonyana bakaSirayeli, ingengamaHivi abemi baseGibheyon; yonke bayithabatha ngokulwa.
6_11_20_Ngokuba kwavela kuYehova ukuziqinisa iintliziyo zabo,  ukuba bawahlangabeze amaSirayeli ngemfazwe, ukuze abatshabalalise, ukuze kungabikho kubabalwa kwabo, ukuze ke abatshabalalise, njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo umthetho uMoses.
6_11_21_Wafika uYoshuwa ngelo xesha, wawanqumla ama-Anaki ezintabeni, eHebron, eDebhiri, eAnabhi, ezintabeni zonke zakwaYuda, ezintabeni zonke zakwaSirayeli; uYoshuwa wawatshabalalisa kunye nemizi yawo.
6_11_22_Akwasala ma-Anaki ezweni loonyana bakaSirayeli, kuphela kwasala eGaza, naseGati, naseAshode.
6_11_23_Walithabatha ke uYoshuwa lonke ilizwe, njengako konke awakuthethayo uYehova kuMoses; walinika uYoshuwa lalilifa lamaSirayeli, ngokweentlantlu zawo, ngokwezizwe zawo. Lazola ke ilizwe, akwabakho mfazwe.
6_12_1_Ngabo ke aba ookumkani belizwe, ababulawayo ngoonyana bakaSirayeli, balihlutha ilizwe labo phesheya kweYordan ngasempumalanga, bethabathela emlanjaneni oyiArnon, besa entabeni yeHermon, neArabha yonke ngasempumalanga:
6_12_2_nguSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, obehleli eHeshbhon, elawula ethabathela eArohere engasemlanjaneni oyiArnon, naphakathi kwesihlambo, nasesiqingatheni seGiliyadi, wesa emlanjaneni oyiYabhoki, engumda woonyana baka-Amon;
6_12_3_neArabha, wesa elwandle lwaseKidneroti ngasempumalanga,  wesa elwandle lweArabha, uLwandle lweTyuwa ngasempumalanga,  ngendlela yeBhete-yeshimoti; nasezantsi, phantsi kwamaxandeka asePisga.
6_12_4_Bahlutha necala likaOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, owayesele kumaRafa, obehleli eAshtaroti nase-Edreyi,
6_12_5_elawula entabeni yeHermon naseSaleka, nakwiBhashan yonke,  wesa emdeni wamaGeshuri, namaMahakati, nesiqingatha seGiliyadi,  umda kaSihon ukumkani waseHeshbhon.
6_12_6_UMoses, umkhonzi kaYehova, noonyana bakaSirayeli bababulala abo. UMoses, umkhonzi kaYehova, walinika lamiwa ngamaRubhen,  nangamaGadi, nesiqingatha sesiwe sakwaManase.
6_12_7_Ngabo aba ookumkani belizwe, awababulalayo uYoshuwa noonyana bakaSirayeli nganeno kwaYordan ngasentshonalanga,  ethabathela eBhahali-gadi entilini yeLebhanon, wesa ezintabeni ezimkhuthuka, ezinyukayo ziye kwaSehire; uYoshuwa walinika izizwe zakwaSirayeli, zema kulo ngokweentlantlu zazo,
6_12_8_ezintabeni, nasezihlanjeni, naseArabha, nasemaxandekeni,  nasentlango, nakwelasezantsi: amaHeti, nama-Amori, namaKanan,  namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi:
6_12_9_ngukumkani waseYeriko, emnye; ngukumkani waseAyi, engecala leBheteli, emnye;
6_12_10_ngukumkani waseYerusalem, emnye; ngekumkani waseHebron,  emnye;
6_12_11_ngukumkani waseYarmuti, emnye; ngukumkani waseLakishe,  emnye;
6_12_12_ngukumkani wase-Eglon, emnye; ngukumkani waseGezera,  emnye;
6_12_13_ngukumkani waseDebhiri emnye; ngukumkani waseGedere,  emnye;
6_12_14_ngukumkani waseHorma, emnye;
6_12_15_ngukumkani waseArade, emnye; ngukumkani waseLibhena,  emnye; ngukumkani waseAdulam, emnye;
6_12_16_ngukumkani waseMakeda, emnye; ngukumkani waseBheteli,  emnye;
6_12_17_ngukumkani waseTapuwa, emnye; ngukumkani waweHefere,  emnye;
6_12_18_ngukumkani waseAfeki, emnye; ngekumkani waseLasharon,  emnye;
6_12_19_ngukumkani waseMadon, emnye; ngukumkani waseHatsore,  emnye;
6_12_20_ngukumkani waseShimron-merom, emnye; ngukumkani waseAkeshafi, emnye;
6_12_21_ngukumkani waseTahanaki, emnye; ngukumkani waseMegido,  emnye;
6_12_22_ngukumkani waseKedeshe, emnye; ngukumkani waseYokeneham eKarmele, emnye;
6_12_23_ngukumkani waseDore ezindulini zeDore, emnye; ngukumkani wamaGoyi eGiligali, emnye;
6_12_24_ngukumkani waseTirtsa, emnye. Bonke ookumkani abo ngamashumi omathathu anamnye.
6_13_1_Ke kaloku uYoshuwa wayeseleyinoda enkulu, eselekhulile;  wathi uYehova kuye, Wena useluyindoda enkulu, uselukhulile; ke ilizwi elisaseleyo lokuhluthwa liselininzi kunene.
6_13_2_Lilo eli ilizwe elisaseleyo: yonke imimandla yamaFilisti,  neyamaGeshuri onke,
6_13_3_ithabathela eShihore ephambi kweYiputa, ise emdeni wase-Ekron ngasentla ebalelwa kwakumaKanan; eyezikhulu zozihlanu zamaFilisti: eyabaseGaza, neyabaseAshdode,  neyabaseAshkelon, neyabaseGati, neyabase-Ekron, neyabaseAvi ngasezantsi;
6_13_4_lonke ilizwe lamaKanan, nomqolomba ongowamaTsidon, lise eAfeka, lise emdeni wama-Amori;
6_13_5_nelizwe lamaGebhali, neLebhanon yonke ngasempumalanga,  lithabathela eBhahali-gadi phantsi kwentaba yeHermon, ude uye eHamati;
6_13_6_bonke abemi beentaba, kuthabathela eLebhanon kuse eMisrefoti-mayim, onke amaTsidon; endiya kubagqogqa phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli. Wothi ke wena ulabele amaSirayeli ngeqashiso ukuba libe lilifa, njengoko ndakuwiselayo umthetho.
6_13_7_Ke ngoko labe eli lizwe libe lilifa kwezizwe ezisithoba,  nakwesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase,
6_13_8_esilifa inxenye yaso salizuza kunye namaRubhen namaGadi,  awawanikayo uMoses phesheya kweYordan ngasempumalanga, njengoko abemnikile uMoses umkhonzi kaYehova:
6_13_9_lithabathela eArohere, engasemlanjeni oyiArnon, nomzi ophakathi kwesihlambo eso, nehewu lonke laseMedebha, lise eDibhon;
6_13_10_nemizi yonke kaSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, obephethe ubukumkani eHeshbhon, lise emdeni woonyana baka-Amon;
6_13_11_nelaseGiliyadi, nomda wamaGeshuri, namaMahakati, nentaba yonke yeHermon, neBhashan yonke kuse eSaleka;
6_13_12_bonke ubukukumkani bukaOgi eBhashan, obephethe ubukumkani eAshtaroti, nase-Edreyi, ngowayesele kumasalela amaRafa.  Wawabetha uMoses wawagqogqa.
6_13_13_Noko ke oonyana bakaSirayeli abawagqogqanga amaGeshuri,  namaMahakati; ahleli amaGeshuri namaMahakati phakathi kwamaSirayeli unanamhla.
6_13_14_Sisizwe sakwaLevi sodwa angasinikanga lifa; ukudla kwasemlilweni kukaYehova uThixo wamaSirayeli lilifa laso,  njengoko wathethayo kuso.
6_13_15_UMoses wasinika ilifa isizwe soonyana bakaRubhen ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_13_16_Umda wabo wathabathela eArohere, ngasemlanjaneni oyiArnon,  nomzi ophakathi kwesihlambo, nehewu lonke elingaseMedebha;
6_13_17_iHeshbhon nemizi yayo yonke esehewu; iDibhon,  neBhamoti-bhahali, neBhete-bhahali-mehon,
6_13_18_neYatsa, neKedemoti, neMafahati,
6_13_19_neKiriyatayim, neSibhema, neTserete-shahare entabeni yentili;
6_13_20_neBhete-pehore, namaxandeka asePisga, neBhete-yeshimoti,
6_13_21_nemizi yonke yehewu, nobukumkani bonke bukaSihon ukumkani wama-Amori, obephethe ubukumkani eHeshbhon, owabulawayo nguMoses kunye nezikhulu zakwaMidiyan: ooEvi, noRekem, noTsure,  noHure, noRebha, iinkosana zikaSihon ezihleli kwelo zwe.
6_13_22_NoBhileham unyana kaBhehore, itola, bambulala oonyana bakaSirayeli ngekrele, phakathi kwabahlatyiweyo ngabo.
6_13_23_Umda woonyana bakaRubhen waba yiYordan nommandla wayo.  Lilo elo ilifa loonyana bakaRubhen ngokwemizalwane yabo, imizi yabo nemizana yabo.
6_13_24_UMoses isizwe sakwaGadi, oonyana bakaGadi, wabanika ilifa ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_13_25_Umda wabo waba yiYazere, nemizi yonke yaseGiliyadi,  nesiqingatha selizwe loonyana baka-Amon, wesa eArohere, ephambi kweRabha;
6_13_26_wathabathela eHeshbhon, wesa eRamatimitsepe, neBhetonim;  wathabathela eMahanayim, wesa emdeni weLidebhiri; nasentilini:
6_13_27_iBhete-haram, neBhete-nimra, neSuloti, neTsafon, amasalela obukumkani bukaSihon ukumkani weHeshbhon, iYordan nommandla wayo, wesa ekupheleni kolwandle lwaseKinerete, phesheya kweYordan ngasempumalanga.
6_13_28_Lilo elo ilifa loonyana bakaGadi ngokwemizalwane yabo,  imizi yabo, nemizana yabo.
6_13_29_UMoses wasinika ilifa isiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase.  Laba lelesiqingatha sesizwe soonyana bakaManase ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_13_30_Umda wabo wathabathela eMahanayim: iBhashan yonke, bonke ubukumkani bukaOgi ukumkani waseBhashan, nemizana yonke yakwaYahire eseBhashan, imizi emashumi mathandathu.
6_13_31_Nesiqingatha saseGiliyadi, neAshtaroti, ne-Edreyi, imizi yobukumkani bakaMakire, unyana kaManase, isiqingatha soonyana bakaMakire ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_13_32_Ngawo lawo amafa awawabayo uMoses ezinkqantosini zakwaMowabhi phesheya kweYordan, malunga neYeriko ngasempumalanga.
6_13_33_Ke isizwe sakwaLevi uMoses asasinikanga lifa. NguYehova uThixo kaSirayeli ilifa laso, njengoko wathethayo kuso.
6_14_1_Ngawo ke la amafa abawabelwayo oonyana bakaSirayeli ezweni lakwaKanan, abawabelwa nguElazare umbingeleli, noYoshuwa unyana kaNun, neentloko zezindlu zooyise zezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli,
6_14_2_ngeqashiso lelifa labo, njengoko uYehova wawisa umthetho ngesandla sikaMoses, elezizwe ezisithoba ezinesiqingatha sesizwe.
6_14_3_Kuba uMoses ebezinikile ilifa izizwe ezibini nesiqingatha sesizwe, phesheya kweYordan; ke abaLevi akabanikanga lifa phakathi kwazo.
6_14_4_Ngokuba oonyana bakaYosefu babezizizwe ezibini, uManase noEfrayim; ke abaLevi ababanikanga sabelo ezweni elo, babanika kuphela imizi yokuhlala, namadlelo ayo emfuyo yabo nempahla yabo.
6_14_5_Njengoko uYehova wamwiselayo uMoses umthetho, benjenjalo oonyana bakaSirayeli, balaba ilizwe.
6_14_6_Basondela oonyana bakaYuda kuYoshuwa eGiligali. Wathi uKalebhi unyana kaYefune, umKenazi, kuye, Uyalazi wena ilizwi awalithethayo uYehova kuMoses umntu kaThixo, ngenxa yam nangenxa yakho, eKadeshe-bharneha.
6_14_7_Ndandiminyaka imashumi mane ndizelwe, ekususweni kwam nguMoses umkhonzi kaYehova, eKadeshe-bharneha, ukuba ndeye kulihlola ilizwe; ndambuyisela ilizwi njengoko bekusentliziyweni yam.
6_14_8_Abazalwana bam, abanyukayo nam, bayinyibilikisa intliziyo yabantu; ke mna ndakuzalisa ukumlandela uYehova uThixo wam.
6_14_9_Wafunga ke uMoses ngaloo mini, esithi, Inene, ilizwe elinyathelwe lunyawo lwakho loba lilifa lakho, neloonyana bakho, kude kuse ephakadeni, ngokuba ukuzalisile ukumlandela uYehova uThixo wam.
6_14_10_Khangela ke ngoko, uYehova undisindisile njengoko watshoyo, le minyaka imashumi mane anamihlanu, kususela koko walithethayo uYehova elo lizwi kuMoses, oko amaSirayeli abehamba entlango; yabona ke, ngoku namhla ndiminyaka imashumi asibhozo anamihlanu ndizelwe.
6_14_11_Ndisomelele nanamhla, kwanjengamini wandithumayo uMoses;  njengoko ayenjalo amandla am oko, asenjalo nangoku amandla am okulwa, kwa-awokuphuma nawokubuya.
6_14_12_Ke ngoko ndinike ezo ntaba wathetha zona uYehova ngaloo mini; ngokuba weva wena ngaloo mini ukuba ama-Anaki akhona,  imizi yawo mikhulu, inqatyisiwe. Mhlawumbi uYehova woba nam,  ndiwagqogqe ke, njengoko watshoyo uYehova.
6_14_13_UYoshuwa wamsikelela, wamnika iHebron uKalebhi unyana kaYefune, ukuba ibe lilifa.
6_14_14_Ngenxa yoko iHebron yaba lilifa likaKalebhi unyana kaYefune, umKenazi, unanamhla; ngenxa enokuba wazalisayo ukumlandela uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli.
6_14_15_Igama laseHebron ngenxa engaphambili laliyiKiriyati ka-Arbha, umntu omkhulu phakathi kwama-Anaki ke. Lazola ilizwe akwabakho mfazwe.
6_15_1_Ke kaloku iqashiso lwesizwe soonyana bakaYuda,  ngokwemizalwane yabo, lasinga emdeni wakwaEdom, entlango yeTsin ngasezantsi, ekupheleni komzantsi.
6_15_2_Umda wabo wasezantsi wathabathela ekupheleni koLwandle lweTyuwa, encamini ebheka ezantsi.
6_15_3_Waphuma, wasinga ngezantsi ekunyukeni kweAkrabhim, wegqitha waya eTsin, wenyuka waya ngasezantsi kweKadeshe-bharneha,  wegqitha waya eHetseron, wenyuka waya eAdare, wajika waya eKarka;
6_15_4_wegqitha waya eAtsemon, wema ngomlanjana waseYiputa, ukuma komda wema ngolwandle. Nguwo lowo umda wenu wangasezantsi.
6_15_5_Umda wasempumalanga luLwandle lweTyuwa, use ekupheleni kweYordan. Umda wecala langasentla wathabathela encamini yolwandle, ekupheleni kweYordan;
6_15_6_wenyuka umda waya eBhete-hogela, wegqitha waya emantla eBhete-arabha, wajika umda waya etyeni likaBhohan unyana kaRubhen.
6_15_7_Wenyuka umda waya eDebhiri, uvela entilini yeAkore, wabheka entla eGiligali, malunga nokunyuka kweAdumin ngasezantsi komlanjana; wegqitha apho waya emanzini ase-En-shemeshe, ukuma kwawo wema nge-En-rogele.
6_15_8_Wenyuka umda ngomfula woonyana bakaHinom, waya egxalabeni lowamaYebhusi ngasezantsi: yiYerusalem ke leyo; wenyuka umda waya encotsheni yentaba ephambi komfula wakwaHinom,  ngasentshonalanga, osekuphekeni kwentili yamaRafa ngasentla.
6_15_9_Wahlaba umda, wathabathela encotsheni yentaba, waya emthonjeni wamanzi aseNefetowa, waphuma waya emizini yasentabeni kaEfron, wahlaba waya eBhahala: yiKiriyati-yeharim ke leyo.
6_15_10_Wajika umda eBhahala ngasentshonalanga, waya entabeni yakwaSehire, wegqitha waya egxalabeni leHar-yeharim ngasentla:  yiKesalon ke leyo; wehla waya eBhete-shemeshe, wegqitha waya eTimna.
6_15_11_Waphuma umda waya egxalabeni le-Ekron ngasentla, wahlaba umda waya eShikron, wegqitha waya entabeni yeBhahala, wema ngeYabheneli umda waya wema ngolwandle.
6_15_12_Umda wasentshonalanga lulwandle olukhulu nommandla walo.  Nguwo lowo umda woonyana bakaYuda ngeenxa zonke,  ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_15_13_UKalebhi unyana kaYefune wamnika isabelo phakathi koonyana bakaYuda, ngokutsho kukaYehova kuYoshuwa: umzi ka-Arbha uyise ka-Anaki ngowaseHebron ke lowo,
6_15_14_Wabagqogqa apho uKalebhi oonyana bobathathu baka-Anaki,  uSheshayi noAhiman noTalemayi, inzalo ka-Anaki.
6_15_15_Wenyuka khona waya kubemi baseDebhiri; igama leDebhiri laliyiKiriyati-sefere ngenxa engaphambili.
6_15_16_Wathi uKalebhi, Othe wayibulala iKiriyati-sefere,  wayithimba, ndomnika intombi yam, uAkesa, ibe ngumkakhe.
6_15_17_Wayithimba uOteniyeli unyana kaKenazi, umzalwana kaKalebhi; wamnika ke intombi yakhe, uAkesa, yangumkakhe.
6_15_18_Kwathi ekuzeni kwayo, yamvuselela ukuba acele umhlaba kuyise wayo; yehla e-esileni layo. Wathi uKalebhi kuyo, Yintoni na?
6_15_19_Yathi, Ndinike into, ngokuba undinike umhlaba ongenamanzi;  ndinike nemithombo yamanzi. Wayinika ke imithombo yasentla,  nemithombo yasezantsi.
6_15_20_Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaYuda ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_15_21_Imizi ethabathele ekupheleni kwesizwe soonyana bakaYuda,  yesa emdeni wakwaEdom ezantsi, yabe iyiKabhetseli, ne-Edere,  neYagure,
6_15_22_neKina, neDimona, neAdada,
6_15_23_neKedeshe, neHatsore, neItenan,
6_15_24_iZifi, neTelem, neBhehaloti,
6_15_25_neHatsore-hadata, neKeriyoti-hetseron (yiHatsore ke leyo);
6_15_26_iAmam, neShema, neMolada,
6_15_27_neHatsare-gada, neHeshmon, neBhete-palete,
6_15_28_neHatsare-shuwale, neBher-shebha, neBhiziyoteya;
6_15_29_iBhahala, neIyim, ne-Etsem,
6_15_30_ne-Elitoladi, neKezili, neHorma,
6_15_31_neTsikelage, neMademana, neSanesana,
6_15_32_neLebhawoti, neShilehim, neAyin, neRimon: yonke loo mizi imashumi mabini anesithoba nemizana yayo.
6_15_33_Esihlanjeni: yiEshtawoli, neTsora, neAshna,
6_15_34_neZanowa, ne-En-ganim, iTapuwa, ne-Enam;
6_15_35_iYarmuti, neAdulam, iSoko, neAzeka,
6_15_36_neShaharim, neAditayim, neGedera, neGederotayim: imizi elishumi elinamine inemizana yayo.
6_15_37_ITsenan, neHadasha, neMigedali yakwaGadi,
6_15_38_neDilan, neMizpa, neYoketeli;
6_15_39_iLakishe, neBhitsekati, ne-Eglon,
6_15_40_neKabhon, neLamasi, neKitilishe,
6_15_41_neGederoti, iBhete-dagon, neNahama, neMakeda: imizi elishumi elinamithandathu inemizana yayo.
6_15_42_ILibhena, ne-Etere neAshan,
6_15_43_neIfeta, neAshna, neNetsibhi,
6_15_44_neKehila, neAkezibhi, neMaresha: imizi esithoba inemizana yayo.
6_15_45_IEkron, namagxamesi ayo, nemizana yayo;
6_15_46_kwathabathela e-Ekron ngasentshonaganga, yonke esecaleni leAshdode, nemizana yayo.
6_15_47_IAshdode, namagxamesi ayo, nemizana yayo; iGaza namagxamesi ayo, nemizana yayo, kwesa kumlanjana weYiputa,  nolwandle olukhulu, nommandla walo.
6_15_48_Esezintabeni: yiShamire, neYatire, neSoko,
6_15_49_neDana, neKiriyati-sana (yiDebhiri ke leyo);
6_15_50_neAnabhi, ne-Eshtemo, neAnim,
6_15_51_neGoshen, neHolon, neGilo: imizi elishumi elinamnye,  inemizana yayo.
6_15_52_IArabhi, neDuma, ne-Eshan,
6_15_53_neYanim, neBhete-tapuwa, neAfeka,
6_15_54_neHumta, neKiriyati ka-Arbha (yiHebron ke leyo);  neTsihore: imizi esithoba inemizana yayo.
6_15_55_IMahon, iKarmele, neZifi, neYuta,
6_15_56_neYizereli, neYokedam, neZanowa;
6_15_57_iKayin, iGibheha, neTimna: imizi elishumi inemizana yayo.
6_15_58_IHalehule, iBhete-tsure, neGedore,
6_15_59_neMaharati, neBhete-anoti, ne-Elitekon: imizi emithandathu inemizana yayo.
6_15_60_IKiriyati-bhahali (yiKiriyati-yeharim ke leyo) neRabha:  imizi emibini inemizana yayo.
6_15_61_Esentlango yiBhete-arabha, iMidin, neSekaka,
6_15_62_neNibheshan, noMzi weTyuwa, ne-Engedi: imizi emithandathu inemizana yayo.
6_15_63_Ke amaYebhusi, abengabemi baseYerusalem, ababanga nako ukuwagqogqa oonyana bakaYuda; ahlala amaYebhusi noonyana bakaYuda eYerusalem nanamhla.
6_16_1_Laphuma iqashiso noonyana bakaYosefu, lathabathela eYordan malunga neYeriko ngasemanzini aseYeriko ngasempumalanga,  kwintlango enyuka eYeriko, eya ezintabeni ngaseBheteli.
6_16_2_Waphuma umda eBheteli, wasinga eLuzi, wegqitha waya emdeni wama-Arki eAtaroti; wehla waya entshonalanga emdeni wamaYafeleli,
6_16_3_wesa emdeni weBhete-horon yasezantsi, wesa eGezere; ukuma kwawo waya wema ngolwandle.
6_16_4_Balabelwa ke ilifa labo oonyana bakaYosefu, uManase noEfrayim.
6_16_5_Umda woonyana bakaEfrayim wenjenje: umda welifa labo ngasempumalanga wayiAtaroti-adare, wesa eBhete-horon engasentla;
6_16_6_waphuma umda waya elwandle, eMikemetati ngasentla; wajika umda waya empumalanga eTahanati-shilo, wegqitha khona ngasempumalanga eYanowa;
6_16_7_wehla eYanowa waya eAtaroti, naseNaharati, weza eYeriko,  wema ngeYordan;
6_16_8_umda wesuka eTapuwa waya entshonalanga, eMlanjaneni weeNgcongolo; nokuma kwawo waya wema ngolwandle. Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaEfrayim ngokwemizalwane yabo;
6_16_9_nemizi leyo yahlulelwa oonyana bakaEfrayim yayiphakathi kwelifa loonyana bakaManase; yonke imizi yayinemizana yayo.
6_16_10_Abawagqogqanga amaKanan abemi eGezere. Ema amaKanan phakathi kwamaEfrayim unanamhla, akhonza efakwa uviko.
6_17_1_Saba neqashiso naso isizwe sakwaManase; ngokuba ngowamazibulo kuYosefu. Laba noMakire, owamazibulo kuManase,  laba noyise kaGiliyadi; laba naye elaseGiliyadi nelaseBhashan,
6_17_2_kuba ebeyindoda yokulwa; laba nabanye oonyana bakaManase ngokwemizalwane yabo; laba noonyana baka-Abhihezere, noonyana bakaHeleki, noonyana baka-Aseriyeli, noonyana bakaShekem,  noonyana bakaHefere, noonyana bakaShemida; ngabo abo abantwana abangamadoda bakaManase, unyana kaYosefu, ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_17_3_Ke uTselofehade, unyana kaHefere, unyana kaGiliyadi, unyana kaMakire, unyana kaManase, ebengenanyana; ebeneentombi zodwa.  Ngawo la amagama eentombi zakhe: uMala, noNoha, noHogela,  neMilka, noTirtsa.
6_17_4_Zasondela phambi koElazare umbingeleli, naphambi koYoshuwa unyana kaNun, naphambi kwezikhulu, zathi, UYehova wamwisela umthetho uMoses, ukuba asinike ilifa phakathi kwabazalwana bethu. Wazinika ke ngokomlomo kaYehova ilifa phakathi kwabazalwana bakayise.
6_17_5_Zaba lishumi ke izabelo kuManase, ngaphandle kwelizwe laseGiliyadi, neBhashan ephesheya kweYordan;
6_17_6_ngokuba iintombi zikaManase zabelwa ilifa phakathi koonyana bakhe; lathi nelizwe laseGiliyadi laba lelabanye oonyana bakaManase.
6_17_7_Umda kaManase wathabathela kwa-Ashere, waya eMikemetati ephambi kowakwaShekem; wahamba umda ngasekunene, waya kubemi base-En-tapuwa.
6_17_8_UManase waba nelizwe laseTapuwa; ke iTapuwa, ngasemdeni wakwaManase, yaba yeyonyana bakaEfrayim.
6_17_9_Wehla umda waya eMlanjaneni weeNgcongolo, ezantsi komlanjana. Le mizi ilunge kuEfrayim yaba phakathi kwemizi kaManase: nommandla wakwaManase wawungasentla komlanjana; ukuma kwawo waya wema ngolwandle.
6_17_10_Ngasezantsi laba lelikaEfrayim, ngasentla laba lelikaManase; ulwandle lwaba ngumda wakhe. Baqubisana noAshere ngasentla, baqubisana noIsakare ngasempumalanga.
6_17_11_KwaIsakare nakwa-Ashere uManase waba neBhete-shehan namagxamesi ayo, neIbleyam namagxamesi ayo, nabemi baseDore namagxamesi ayo, nabemi base-Endore namagxamesi ayo, nabemi baseTahanaki namagxamesi ayo, nabemi baseMegido namagxamesi ayo, ummandla onduli zintathu.
6_17_12_Babengenako oonyana bakaManase akuyihlutha loo mizi;  amaKanan akuphikela ukuma lwelo zwe.
6_17_13_Kwathi, bakomelela oonyana bakaSirayeli, bawafaka uviko amaKanan, abawagqogqa kuphele.
6_17_14_Bathetha oonyana bakaYosefu noYoshuwa, besithi, Yini na ukuba usinike ilifa laqashiso linye, nasabelo sinye, singabantu abaninzi nje, esisikelele nje uYehova kangakanana unangoku?
6_17_15_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo, Ukuba ningabantu abaninzi, nyukani niye emahlathini, nizihlahlele ezweni lamaPerizi nelamaRafa, xa kuxineneyo kuni ezintabeni zakwaEfrayim.
6_17_16_Bathi oonyana bakaYosefu, Ilizwe eli leentaba alisilingene; ke ziinqwelo zesinyithi kumaKanan onke amiyo ezweni lamathafa aseBhete-shehan namagxamesi ayo,  kwanasemathafeni aseYizereli.
6_17_17_Wathi uYoshuwa kwindlu kaYosefu, kuEfrayim nakuManase,  Ningabantu abaninzi, ninamandla amakhulu; aliyi kuba linye iqashiso lenu;
6_17_18_kuba eleentaba liya kuba lelenu, ngokuba lingamahlathi.  Nowa hlahla, iinyele zawo zibe zezenu; kuba niya kuwagqogqa amaKanan, nakuba eneenqwelo zesinyithi, nakuba omelele.
6_18_1_Labizelwa ndawonye lonke ibandla lakwaSirayeli eShilo;  bayimisa khona intente yokuhlangana. Leyiseka ilizwe phambi kwabo.
6_18_2_Kwasala phakathi koonyana bakaSirayeli izizwe ezisixhenxe,  ezingabelwanga lifa lazo.
6_18_3_Wathi uYoshuwa koonyana bakaSirayeli, Koda kube nini na nikunqena ukuya kulihlutha elo zwe aninike lona uYehova uThixo wooyihlo?
6_18_4_Khuphani amadoda abe mathathu esizweni ngesizwe,  ndiwathume, asuke acande ezweni, alibhale ngokwamafa azo, aze abuyele kum,
6_18_5_alabe libe zizabelo ezisixhenxe; uYuda eme emdeni wakhe ngasezantsi, indlu kaYosefu ime emdeni wayo ngasentla.
6_18_6_Nina ke nilibhale ilizwe lezabelo ezo zisixhenxe, niyizise ingxelo kum apha, ndiniwisele amaqashiso phambi koYehova uThixo wethu apha.
6_18_7_Kuba abaLevi abanasabelo phakathi kwenu, kuba ilifa labo bububingeleli bukaYehova; ke uGadi noRubhen nesiqingatha sesizwe sikaManase basebelithabathile ilifa labo awabanika lona uMoses, umkhonzi kaYehova, phesheya kweYordan ngasempumalanga.
6_18_8_Asuka ke amadoda lawo ahamba. UYoshuwa wabawisela umthetho abo bahambayo beya kulibhala ilizwe, esithi, Yiyani, nilihambe ilizwe, nilibhale, nize nibuyele kum, ndiniwisele amaqashiso phambi koYehova eShilo apha.
6_18_9_Aya ke amadoda lawo, acanda ezweni apho, alibhala ngokwemizi, ngokwezabelo ezi sixhenxe encwadini; eza ke kuYoshuwa eminqubeni eShilo.
6_18_10_Waza uYoshuwa wawawisela amaqashiso eShilo phambi koYehova; uYoshuwa wababela ilizwe oonyana bakaSirayeli khona ngokweentlantlu zabo.
6_18_11_Kwavela iqashiso lesizwe soonyana bakaBhenjamin ngokwemizalwane yabo; umda weqashiso labo waphuma phakathi koonyana bakaYuda noonyana bakaYosefu.
6_18_12_Umda wabo ngasecaleni lasentla wathabathela eYordan,  wenyuka waya egxalabeni laseYeriko ngasentla, wenyuka waya ezintabeni ngasentshonalanga; ukuma kwawo, waya wema ngentlango yaseBhetaven;
6_18_13_wegqitha umda khona, waya eLuzi, egxalabeni leLuzi ngasezantsi (yiBheteli ke leyo); wehla umda waya eAtaroti-adare, ngasezintabeni ezingasezantsi kweBhete-horon yasezantsi.
6_18_14_Wahlaba umda, wajika waya ecaleni lasentshonalanga ngasezantsi, usuka entabeni ephambi kweBhete-horon ngasezantsi;  ukuma kwawo, waya wema ngeKiriyati-bhahali (yiKiriyati-yeharim ke leyo), umzi woonyana bakaYuda. Lilo elo icala lasentshonalanga.
6_18_15_Icala lasezantsi lathabathela ekupheleni kweKiriyati-yeharim; waphuma umda entshonalanga, waphuma waya emthonjeni wamanzi aseNefetowa.
6_18_16_Wehla umda waya ekupheleni kwentaba ephambi komfula woonyana kaHinom, osentilini yamaRafa ngasentla; wehla ngomfula wakwaHinom, waya egxalabeni lamaYebhusi ngasezantsi, wehla waya e-En-rogele;
6_18_17_wahlaba uvela entla, waphuma waya e-En-shemeshe, waphuma waya eGeliloti, emalunga nokunyuka kweAdumim; wehla waya etyeni likaBhohan, unyana kaRubhen;
6_18_18_wegqitha waya egxalabeni elimalunga neArabha entla, wehla waya eArabha;
6_18_19_wegqitha umda waya egxalabeni laseBhete-hogela entla;  ukuma komda, waya wema ngechweba loLwandle lweTyuwa, ekupheleni kweYordan ngasezantsi; nguwo lowo umda wasezantsi.
6_18_20_IYordan ibe ingumda walo ngecala lasempumalanga. Lilo elo ilifa loonyana bakaBhenjamin ngokwemida yalo ngeenxa zonke,  ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_18_21_Ke imizi yesizwe soonyana bakaBhenjamin, ngokwemizalwane yabo, ibe iyiYeriko, neBhete-hogela, nentili yaseKetsitse,
6_18_22_neBhete-arabha, neTsemarayim, neBheteli,
6_18_23_neAvim, nePara, neOfra,
6_18_24_neKefar-amoni, neOfeni, neGabha: imizi elishumi elinamibini inemizana yayo;
6_18_25_iGibheyon, neRama, neBheheroti,
6_18_26_neMizpa, neKefira, neMotsa,
6_18_27_neRekem, neIrpeli, neTarala,
6_18_28_neTsela, ne-Elefe, nowamaYebhusi (yiYerusalem ke leyo);  neGibheha, neKiriyati: imizi elishumi elinamibini inemizana yayo. Lilo ke elo ilifa loonyana bakaBhenjamin ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_1_Lavela iqashiso lesibini noSimon, nesizwe soonyana bakaSimon, ngokwemizalwane yabo. Ilifa labo laba phakathi kwelifa loonyana bakaYuda.
6_19_2_Elifeni labo baba neBher-sheba, neShebha, neMulada,
6_19_3_neHatsere-shuwali, neBhala, neAtsem,
6_19_4_ne-Eletoladi, neBhetuli, neHorma,
6_19_5_neTsikelage, neBhete-markabhoti, neHatsar-susa,
6_19_6_neBhete-lebhawoti, neSharuhen: imizi elishumi elinamithathu inemizana yayo;
6_19_7_iAyin, neRimon, ne-Etere, neAshan; imizi emine inemizana yayo,
6_19_8_nemizana yonke ejikeleze loo mizi, kwesa eBhahalatibhere (yiRama yelasezantsi ke leyo). Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaSimon ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_9_Laba sesabelweni soonyana bakaYuda ilifa loonyana bakaSimon; ngokuba isabelo soonyana bakaYuda sabagqitha.  Oonyana bakaSimon babelwa ilifa phakathi kwelifa labo.
6_19_10_Lavela iqashiso lesithathu noonyana bakaZebhulon,  ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_11_Umda welifa labo wesa eSaridi, wenyuka umda wabo wasinga entshonalanga, wesa eMarala, wafikelela eDabhesheti, wahlangana nomlanjana okhangelene neYokeneham;
6_19_12_wabuya eSaridi, wasinga empumalanga ngecala eliphuma ilanga, waya emdeni weKiseloti-tabhore, waphuma waya eDabherati, wenyuka waya eYafiya.
6_19_13_Wegqitha khona, wasinga empumalanga ngecala eliphuma ilanga, waya eGati-hefere, e-Eti-katsin; waphuma waya eRimon,  ehlaba iye eNeha.
6_19_14_Umda wayizunguleza ngasentla, waya eHanaton; ukuma kwawo,  wema ngomfula waseIfeta-eli;
6_19_15_neKatati, neNahalali, neShimron, neIdala, neBhetelehem:  imizi elishumi elinamibini inemizana yayo.
6_19_16_Lilo elo ilifa loonyana bakaZebhulon ngokwemizalwane yabo,  loo mizi nemizana yayo.
6_19_17_Iqashiso lesine lavela noIsakare, noonyana bakaIsakare ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_18_Umda wabo wasinga kwiYizereli, neKesuloti, neShunem,
6_19_19_neHafarayim, neShihon, neAnaharati,
6_19_20_neRabhiti, neKishiyon, neAbhetse,
6_19_21_neRemeti, ne-En-ganim, ne-En-hada, neBhete-patsetse.
6_19_22_Umda wafikelela eTabhore, naseShahatsima,  naseBhete-shemeshe, ukuma komda wabo, waya wema ngeYordan imizi elishumi elinamithandathu enimizana yayo.
6_19_23_Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaIsakare ngokwemizalwane yabo, loo mizi nemizana yayo.
6_19_24_Lavela iqashiso lesihlanu nesizwe soonyana baka-Ashere ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_25_Umda wabo waba yiHelekati, neHali, neBheten, neAkeshafi,
6_19_26_neAlameleki, neAmadi, neMishali; wafikelela eKarmele ngasentshonalanga, neShihore-libhenati.
6_19_27_Wabuya, wasinga ngecala eliphuma ilanga eBhete-dagon,  wafikelela kwelakwaZebhulon, nakumfula waseIfeta-eli, ngasentla kweBhete-emeki, neNehiyeli; waphuma waya eKabhuli ngasekhohlo;
6_19_28_neHebron, neRehobhi, neHamon, neKana, wesa eTsidon enkulu.
6_19_29_Wabuya umda waya eRama, wesa emzini onqatyisiweyo oyiTire,  wabuya umda waya eHosa; ukuma kwawo, waya wema ngolwandle,  ngasesabelweni sika-Akezibhe;
6_19_30_neUma, neAfeki, neRehobhi: imizi emashumi mabini anamibini inemizana yayo.
6_19_31_Lilo elo ilifa loonyana baka-Ashere ngokwemizalwane yabo,  loo mizi nemizana yayo.
6_19_32_Lavela iqashiso lesithandathu noonyana bakaNafetali,  ileloonyana bakaNafetali ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_33_Umda wabo wathabathela eHelefe, eMiokini yaseTsahanayim,  neAdami-nekebhe, neYabheneli, wesa eLakum; nokuma kwawo, wema ngeYordan;
6_19_34_wabuya umda, wasinga entshonalanga eAzenoti-tabhore,  waphuma khona waya eHukoki, wafikelela kwelakwaZebhulon ngasezantsi, wafikelela kwelakwa-Ashere ngasentshonalanga,  nelakwaYuda eYordan ngasempumalanga.
6_19_35_Imizi enqatyisiweyo yaba yiTsidim, neTsere, neHamati,  neRakati, neKinerete,
6_19_36_neAdama, neRama, neHatsore,
6_19_37_neKedeshe, ne-Edreyi, ne-En-hatsore,
6_19_38_neIron, neMigdali-eli, neHorem, neBhete-anati,  neBhete-shemeshe: imizi elishumi elinesithoba inemizana yayo.
6_19_39_Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaNafetali,  ngokwemizalwane yabo, loo mizi nemizana yayo.
6_19_40_Lavela iqashiso lesixhenxe nesizwe soonyana bakaDan ngokwemizalwane yabo.
6_19_41_Umda welifa labo waba yiTsora, ne-Eshtawoli,  neIre-shemeshe,
6_19_42_neShahalabhin, neAyalon, neItela,
6_19_43_ne-Elon, neTimnata, ne-Ekron,
6_19_44_ne-Eleteke, neGibheton, neBhahalata,
6_19_45_neYehudi, neBhene-bheraki, neGati-rimon,
6_19_46_neMeyarkon, neRakon, kunye nomda omalunga neYafo.
6_19_47_Umda woonyana bakaDan wema ngayo. Benyuka ke oonyana bakaDan, baya kulwa neLeshem, bayithimba, bayibulala ngohlangothi lwekrele, bayihlutha, bema kuyo, bathi ukuyibiza iLeshem kukwaDan, ngegama likaDan uyise.
6_19_48_Lilo elo ilifa lesizwe soonyana bakaDan ngokwemizalwane yabo, loo mizi inemizana yayo.
6_19_49_Bagqiba ke ukulaba ilizwe ngokwemida yabo. Oonyana bakaSirayeli bamnika uYoshuwa, unyana kaNun, ilifa phakathi kwabo.
6_19_50_Ngokomlomo kaYehova bamnika umzi awawubizayo,  iTimnati-sera, ekweleentaba lakwaEfrayim. Wawakha loo mzi,  wahlala kuwo.
6_19_51_Ngawo lawo amafa abawabayo ooElazare umbingeleli,  noYoshuwa unyana kaNun, neentloko zezindlu zooyise ezizweni zoonyana bakaSirayeli, ngamaqashiso eShilo, phambi koYehova,  emnyango wentente yokuhlangana. Bagqiba ke ukulaba ilizwe.
6_20_1_Wathetha uYehova kuYoshuwa, esithi,
6_20_2_Thetha koonyana bakaSirayeli, uthi, Zimiseleni imizi yokusabela, endathetha ngayo kuni ngoMoses;
6_20_3_ukuba abalekele kuyo umbulali obulele umntu ngengozi engazi, ibe ziindawo zenu enobalekela kuzo ukusaba umphindezeleli wegazi;
6_20_4_abalekele komnye waloo mizi, eme ekungeneni kwesango lomzi,  awathethe ezindlebeni zamadoda amakhulu aloo mzi amazwi akhe;  amamkelele kuloo mzi, abe kuwo, amnike indawo, ukuba ahlale nawo.
6_20_5_Othi, xenikweni umphindezeleli wegazi amsukelayo,  angamnikeli umbulali esandleni sakhe, ngokuba wambulala ummelwane wakhe engazi, ebengamthiyile ngaphambili.
6_20_6_Wohlala kuloo mzi ade eme phambi kwebandla, lithethwe ityala lakhe, ade afe umbingeleli omkhulu oya kubakho ngezo mini, andule umbulali ukubuyela emzini wakowabo, nasendlwini yakhe, emzini abebaleke ekuwo.
6_20_7_Bangcwalisa ke iKedeshe eGalili, ekweleentaba lakwaNafetali; nelakwaShekem kweleentaba lakwaEfrayim;  neKiriyati ka-Arbha, ngowaseHebron ke lowo, kweleentaba lakwaYuda.
6_20_8_Naphesheya kweYordan, malunga neYeriko ngasempumalanga,  bamisa iBhetsere entlango, ethafeni, esizweni sakwaRubhen;  neRamoti kwelaseGiliyadi, esizweni sakwaGadi; neGolan eBhashan,  esizweni sakwaManase.
6_20_9_Yiyo leyo imizi eyamiselwa bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli,  nowasemzini ophambukele phakathi kwabo, ukuba babalekele kuyo bonke abantu ababulele umntu ngengozi, ukuba bangafi sisandla somphindezeleli wegazi, bade beme phambi kwebandla.
6_21_1_Zasondela iintloko zezindlu zooyise zakwaLevi kuElazare umbingeleli, nakuYoshuwa unyana kaNun, nakwiintloko zezindlu zooyise zezizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli;
6_21_2_zathetha kubo eShilo ezweni lakwaKanan, zisithi, UYehova wawisa umthetho ngesandla sikaMoses, ukuba sinikwe imizi yokuhlala, namadlelo ayo eenkomo zethu.
6_21_3_Oonyana bakaSirayeli babanika abaLevi elifeni labo,  ngokomlomo kaYehova, le mizi namadlelo ayo.
6_21_4_Laphuma iqashiso nemizalwane yamaKehati; yaba yeyoonyana baka-Aron umbingeleli abangabaLevi, esizweni sakwaYuda,  nasesizweni sakwaSimon, nasesizweni sakwaBhenjamin, imizi elishumi elinamithathu ngeqashiso elo.
6_21_5_Abanye oonyana bakaKehati bafumana ngeqashiso imizi elishumi emizalwaneni yesizwe sakwaEfrayim, nasesizweni sakwaDan, nasesiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase.
6_21_6_Oonyana bakaGershon bafumana ngeqashiso imizi elishumi elinamithathu emizalwaneni yesizwe sakwaIsakare, nasesizweni sakwa-Ashere, nasesizweni sakwaNafetali, nasesiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase eBhashan.
6_21_7_Oonyana bakaMerari, ngokwemizalwane yabo, bafumana imizi elishumi elinamibini esizweni sakwaRubhen, nasesizweni sakwaGadi, nasesizweni sakwaZebhulon.
6_21_8_Oonyana bakaSirayeli babanika abaLevi ngeqashiso loo mizi namadlelo ayo, njengoko uYehova wawisayo umthetho ngesandla sikaMoses.
6_21_9_Babanika esizweni soonyana bakaYuda, nasesizweni soonyana bakaSimon, yona le mizi ibizwa ngegama layo;
6_21_10_yaba yeyoonyana baka-Aron emizalwaneni yamaKehati,  koonyana bakaLevi; ngokuba laba lelabo iqashiso lokuqala.
6_21_11_Babanika umzi ka-Arbha, uyise ka-Anaki (ngowaseHebron ke lowo), ezintabeni zakwaYuda, namadlelo ayo ngeenxa zonke.
6_21_12_Ke amasimi aloo mzi, nemizana yawo, bawanika uKalebhi unyana kaYefune ukuba abe ngawakhe.
6_21_13_Oonyana baka-Aron umbingeleli babanika owaseHebron nedlelo lawo, umzi ke wokusabela umbulali, neLibhena nedlelo layo,
6_21_14_neYatire nedlelo layo, ne-Eshtemowa nedlelo layo,
6_21_15_neHolon nedlelo layo, neDebhiri nedlelo layo,
6_21_16_neAyin nedlelo layo, neYuta nedlelo layo, neBhete-shemeshe nedlelo layo: imizi esithoba kwezo zizwe zibini.
6_21_17_Nasesizweni sakwaBhenjamin: iGibheyon nedlelo layo,  neGebha nedlelo layo,
6_21_18_neAnatoti nedlelo layo, neAlemon nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_19_Iyonke imizi yoonyana baka-Aron, ababingeleli, yabayimizi elishumi elinamithathu inamadlelo ayo.
6_21_20_Imizalwane yoonyana bakaKehati, yabaLevi abaseleyo koonyana bakaKehati, yafumana imizi yeqashiso layo esizweni sakwaEfrayim.
6_21_21_Babanika owakwaShekem nedlelo lawo, okweleentaba lakwaEfrayim, umzi ke wokusabela umbulali, neGezere nedlelo layo,
6_21_22_neKibhetsayim nedlelo layo, neBhete-horon nedlelo layo:  imizi emine.
6_21_23_Esizweni sakwaDan, iEleteke nedlelo layo, neGibheton nedlelo layo,
6_21_24_neAyalon nedlelo layo, neGati-rimon nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_25_Esiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase, iTahanaki nedlelo layo,  neGati-rimon nedlelo layo: imizi emibini.
6_21_26_Iyonke imizi yaba lishumi namadlelo ayo, ngokwemizalwane yoonyana bakaKehati abaseleyo.
6_21_27_Babanika oonyana bakaGershon emizalwaneni yabaLevi,  esiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase, iGolan eBhashan nedlelo layo, umzi ke wokusabela umbulali, neBheheshtera nedlelo layo:  imizi emibini.
6_21_28_Esizweni sakwaIsakare, iKishon nedlelo layo, neDabherati nedlelo layo,
6_21_29_neYarmuti nedlelo layo, ne-En-ganim nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_30_Esizweni sakwa-Ashere, iMishali nedlelo layo, neAbhedon nedlelo layo;
6_21_31_neHelekati nedlelo layo, neRehobhi nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_32_Esizweni sakwaNafetali, iKedeshe kwelaseGalili nedlelo layo, umzi ke wokusabela umbulali; iHamoti-dore nedlelo layo,  iKartan nedlelo layo: imizi emithathu.
6_21_33_Iyonke imizi yamaGershon, ngokwemizalwane yakhe, yaba yimizi elishumi elinamithathu inamadlelo ayo.
6_21_34_Bayinika imizalwane yoonyana bakaMerari, yabaLevi abaseleyo, esizweni sakwaZebhulon, iYokeneham nedlelo layo,  neKarta nedlelo layo,
6_21_35_neDimna nedlelo layo, neNahalali nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_36_Esizweni sakwaRubhen, iBhetsere nedlelo layo, neYahatsa nedlelo layo,
6_21_37_neKedemoti nedlelo layo, neMefahati nedlelo layo: imizi emine.
6_21_38_Esizweni sakwaGadi, iRamoti kwelaseGiliyadi nedlelo layo,  umzi ke wokusabela umbulali; neMahanayim nedlelo layo,
6_21_39_neHeshbhon nedlelo layo, neYazere nedlelo layo: iyonke loo mizi mine.
6_21_40_Iyonke imizi yoonyana bakaMerari ngokwemizalwane yabo eseleyo, emizalwaneni yabaLevi, iqashiso labo laba yimizi elishumi elinamibini.
6_21_41_Iyonke imizi yabaLevi phakathi kwelifa loonyana bakaSirayeli yaba yimizi engamashumi mane anesibhozo,  inamadlelo ayo.
6_21_42_Yonke loo mizi ngaminye yaba nedlelo layo ngeenxa zonke;  kwaba njalo kuloo mizi yonke.
6_21_43_UYehova wawanika ke amaSirayeli lonke ilizwe abelifungele ooyise ukuba wobanika; alihlutha ahlala kulo.
6_21_44_UYehova wawaphumza ngeenxa zonke, njengako konke awabafungelayo ooyise; akwabakho mntu ezintshabeni zawo zonke umayo phambi kwawo. Zonke iintshaba zawo uYehova wazinikela esandleni sawo.
6_21_45_Akuwanga zwi phantsi, emazwini onke alungileyo awawathethayo uYehova kwindlu kaSirayeli; enzeka onke.
6_22_1_Wandula uYoshuwa ukuwabiza amaRubhen, namaGadi,  nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, wathi kuwo,
6_22_2_Nikugcinile konke, uMoses umkhonzi kaYehova abeniwisele ngako umthetho, naliphulaphula izwi lam ezintweni zonke endiniwisele umthetho ngazo.
6_22_3_Anibashiyanga abazalwana benu ezi mini zininzi unanamhla;  ke nisigcinile isigxina somthetho kaYehova uThixo wenu.
6_22_4_Kaloku uYehova, uThixo wenu, ubaphumzile abazalwana benu,  njengoko wathethayo kubo. Kaloku ke jikani, niye ezintenteni zenu, ezweni lelifa lenu, abeninike lona uMoses, umkhonzi kaYehova, phesheya kweYordan.
6_22_5_Kodwa gcinani kunene ukuba niwenze umthetho nomyalelo awaniwiselayo uMoses, umkhonzi kaYehova, wokuba nimthande uYehova uThixo wenu, nihambe ngeendlela zakhe zonke, niyigcine imithetho yakhe, ninamathele kuye, nimkhonze ngentliziyo yenu yonke, nangomphefumlo wenu wonke.
6_22_6_Wabasikelela uYoshuwa, wabandulula; baya ezintenteni zabo.
6_22_7_UMoses ebesinikile ilifa isiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase eBhashan; esinye isiqingatha saso uYoshuwa wasinika kunye nabazalwana baso nganeno kweYordan, ngasentshonalanga.  Kananjalo xenikweni uYoshuwa wasindululela ezintenteni zaso,  wasisikelela naso.
6_22_8_Wathi kuso, Buyelani ezintenteni zenu, ninobutyebi obukhulu, ninengqwebo eninzi kunene, nesilivere, negolide,  nobhedu, nesinyiti, neengubo ezininzi kunene. Yabelanani nabazalwana benu ngamaxhoba eentshaba zenu.
6_22_9_Babuya ke oonyana bakaRubhen, noonyana bakaGadi,  nesiqingatha sesizwe soonyana bakaManase, besuka koonyana bakaSirayeli eShilo esezweni lakwaKanan, ukuba baye ezweni laseGiliyadi, ezweni lelifa labo, ababelizuzile ngokomlomo kaYehova ngesandla sikaMoses.
6_22_10_Bafika emimandleni yaseYordan, esezweni lakwaKanan.  Oonyana bakaRubhen, noonyana bakaGadi, nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase bakha khona isibingelelo ngaseYordan, isibingelelo esikhulu, esibonakalayo.
6_22_11_Beva ke oonyana bakaSirayeli, kusithiwa, Yabonani, oonyana bakaRubhen, noonyana bakaGadi, nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase,  bakhe isibingelelo malunga nelizwe lakwaKanan, emimandleni yaseYordan, ngecala elingaphesheya koonyana bakaSirayeli.
6_22_12_Beva ke oonyana bakaSirayeli, balibizela ndawonye lonke ibandla loonyana bakaSirayeli eShilo, ukuba kunyukwe kuyiwe kubo, kuliwe nabo.
6_22_13_Oonyana bakaSirayeli bathuma uPinehasi, unyana kaElazare umbingeleli, koonyana bakaRubhen, nakoonyana bakaGadi,  nakwisiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase,
6_22_14_elizweni laseGiliyadi, enezikhulu ezilishumi, sasinye isikhulu, sasinye isikhulu endlwini yooyise ezizweni zonke zakwaSirayeli, zingamadoda aziintloko zezindlu zooyise emawakeni akwaSirayeli.
6_22_15_Baya ke koonyana bakaRubhen, nakoonyana bakaGadi,  nakwisiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, ezweni laseGiliyadi;
6_22_16_bathetha kubo, besithi, Litsho lonke ibandla likaYehova,  ukuthi, Bubumenemene buni na obu nimeneza ngabo kuThixo kaSirayeli, nibuya nje namhla ekumlandeleni uYehova,  ngokuzakhela isibingelelo, ukuba nigwilike kuYehova namhla?
6_22_17_Yinto encinane na kuthi ubugwenxa bukaPehore,  esingekazihlambululi kubo unanamhla, saza isibetho saba sebandleni likaYehova,
6_22_18_nina nibuya nje namhla ekumlandeleni uYehova? Kothi,  nigwilike kuYehova nina namhla, ngomso abe noburhalarhume yena kwibandla lonke lakwaSirayeli.
6_22_19_Inene, ukuba nithi liyinqambi ilizwe lelifa lenu, welani nize ezweni lelifa likaYehova, apho umnquba kaYehova ukhona,  nime phakathi kwethu. Ke musani ukugwilika kuYehova, musani ukugwilika kuthi ngokuzakhela isibingelelo esingesiso isibingelelo sikaYehova uThixo wethu.
6_22_20_Akamenezanga yini na uAkan, unyana kaZera, ngobumenemene entweni esingelwe phantsi, kwaza kwabakho uburhalarhume phezu kwebandla lonke lamaSirayeli? Loo mntu mnye akatshabalalanga yedwa ngobugwenxa bakhe.
6_22_21_Baphendula oonyana bakaRubhen, noonyana bakaGadi,  nesiqingatha sesizwe soonyana bakaManase, bathetha neentloko zamawaka akwaSirayeli, bathi,
6_22_22_UThixo, uThixo uYehova, uThixo, uThixo uYehova, uyazi,  amaSirayeli ayakwazi, ukuba oko kwenziwe ngokugwilika na,  nangokumeneza kuYehova.
6_22_23_Uze ungasisindisi namhlanje, ukuba sizakhele isibingelelo sokusibuyisa ekulandeleni uYehova, nokuba sinyusa phezu kwaso idini elinyukayo, nomnikelo wokudla, nokuba senzele phezu kwaso imibingelelo yoxolo: uYehova ngokwakhe makakubuze oko.
6_22_24_Inene, siyenze le nto ngesithukuthezi, ngethuba lokuthi,  Ngexesha elizayo bothi oonyana benu koonyana bethu, Yintoni na enani noYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli?
6_22_25_UYehova umise umda oyiYordan phakathi kwethu nani, nyana bakaRubhen, nyana bakaGadi; aninasabelo kuYehova nina: oonyana benu benze ukuba oonyana bethu bayeke ukumoyika uYehova.
6_22_26_Sithe ke, Makhe sizenzele, sizakhele isibingelelo,  singesadini linyukayo, singesambingelelo;
6_22_27_sibe lingqina phakathi kwethu nani, naphakathi kwezizukulwana zethu emva kwethu, ukuba sisebenze umsebenzi kaYehova phambi kwakhe ngamadini ethu anyukayo,  nangemibingelelo yethu, nangemibingelelo yethu yoxolo; ukuze bangatsho oonyana benu ngexesha elizayo koonyana bethu, ukuthi,  Aninasabelo kuYehova nina.
6_22_28_Sathi ke, Kothi, xa bathe batsho kuthi, nakwizizukulwana zethu ngexesha elizayo, sibe nako ukuthi Khangelani imfano yesibingelelo sikaYehova abayenzayo oobawo, ingeyadini linyukayo, ingeyambingelelo, ilingqina phakathi kwethu nani.
6_22_29_Makube le kuthi ngenxa yakhe ukuba sigwilike kuYehova,  sibuye namhla ekumlandeleni uYehova, silakhele isibingelelo idini elinyukayo, nomnikelo wokudla, nombingelelo, esingesiso isibingelelo sikaYehova uThixo wethu, esiphambi komnquba wakhe.
6_22_30_Amazwi abawathethayo oonyana bakaRubhen, noonyana bakaGadi, noonyana bakaManase, waweva uPinehasi umbingeleli,  nezikhulu zebandla, neentloko zamawaka akwaSirayeli ezazinaye,  alunga emehlweni abo.
6_22_31_Wathi ke uPinehasi unyana kaElazare, umbingeleli, koonyana bakaRubhen, nakoonyana bakaGadi, nakoonyana bakaManase, Namhla siyazi ukuba uYehova uphakathi kwethu, ngokuba ningabenzanga obo bumenemene kuYehova. Ngale nto nibahlangule oonyana bakaSirayeli esandleni sikaYehova.
6_22_32_Wabuya ke uPinehasi unyana kaElazare, umbingeleli,  nezikhulu ezo, koonyana bakaRubhen, nakoonyana bakaGadi, ezweni laseGiliyadi; beza ezweni lakwaKanan, koonyana bakaSirayeli,  bebabuyisela ilizwi.
6_22_33_Ilizwi elo lalunga emehlweni oonyana bakaSirayeli. Oonyana bakaSirayeli bambonga uThixo, ababa sathetha ngokunyuka baye kubo ngobumpi, balitshabalalise ilizwe abahleli kulo oonyana bakaRubhen noonyana bakaGadi.
6_22_34_Oonyana bakaRubhen noonyana bakaGadi basibiza isibingelelo ngokuthi, Lingqina phakathi kwethu ukuba uYehova unguye uThixo.
6_23_1_Kwathi, kwakuba yimihla emininzi, emveni kokuba uYehova ewaphumzile amaSirayeli ezintshabeni zawo zonke ngeenxa zonke,  uYoshuwa eseleyindoda enkulu, ekhulile,
6_23_2_wawabiza uYoshuwa onke amaSirayeli, amadoda awo amakhulu,  neentloko zawo, nabagwebi bawo, nababhali bawo, wathi kubo, Mna ndisendimdala, ndikhulile.
6_23_3_Nina nikubonile konke abekwenzile uYehova uThixo wenu kwezo ntlanga zonke ngenxa yenu; ngokuba uYehova uThixo wenu nguye onilweleyo.
6_23_4_Khangelani, ndinabele ngamaqashiso nezi ntlanga zisaseleyo,  ukuba zibe lilifa lezizwe zenu, zithabathela eYordan, kunye neentlanga zonke endizinqumleyo, zesa kulwandle olukhulu ngasekutshoneni kwelanga.
6_23_5_NguYehova uThixo wenu oya kuzigxotha ebusweni benu,  azigqogqe phambi kwenu, nilihluthe ilizwe lazo, njengoko wathethayo kuni uYehova uThixo wenu.
6_23_6_Yomelelani kunene, ukuze nigcine nenze konke okubhaliweyo encwadini yomyalelo kaMoses, ukuze ningasuki kuwo, nityekele ekunene nasekhohlo;
6_23_7_ukuze ningadibani nezi ntlanga ziseleyo, ezi ke zinani,  ningalikhankanyi igama loothixo bazo, ningabafungi,  ningabakhonzi, ningabanquli.
6_23_8_Ize ninamathele kuYehova uThixo wenu, njengoko nikwenzileyo unanamhla.
6_23_9_UYehova wazigqogqa ebusweni benu iintlanga ezinkulu,  ezinamandla; ke nina akumanga mntu phambi kwenu unanamhla;
6_23_10_indoda inye kuni isukele iwaka; ngokuba uYehova uThixo wenu nguye onilwelayo, njengoko wakuthethayo kuni.
6_23_11_Zigcineni kunene ngenxa yemiphefumlo yenu, ukuba nimthande uYehova uThixo wenu.
6_23_12_Kuba ukuba nithe nabuya, nabuya nanamathela kumaqongqolo ezi ntlanga ziseleyo, ezi ke zinani, nendiselana nazo, nadibana nazo, zadibana nani:
6_23_13_yazini kakuhle ukuba uYehova, uThixo wenu, akayi kuphinda azigqogqe ezi ntlanga phambi kwenu. Zoba zizibatha nemigibe kuni, neziniya emacaleni enu, noviko emehlweni enu, nide nicinywe kulo mhlaba ulungileyo, aninikileyo uYehova uThixo wenu.
6_23_14_Namhla ndihamba ngendlela yoluntu lonke. Niyazi ngentliziyo yenu yonke, nangomphefumlo wenu wonke, ukuba akuwanga phantsi nalinye ilizwi emazwini onke alungileyo,  abewathethile uYehova uThixo wenu ngani; onke enzekile kuni;  akuwanga phantsi nalinye ilizwi kuwo.
6_23_15_Kothi, njengoko lenzekayo kuni lonke ilizwi elilungileyo,  abelithethile uYehova uThixo wenu kuni, enjenjalo ukulenza kuni lonke ilizwi elibi, ade anitshabalalise kulo mhlaba ulungileyo,  aninikileyo uYehova uThixo wenu.
6_23_16_Ekuwugqitheni umnqophiso kaYehova uThixo wenu, aniwisele wona, naya nakhonza thixo bambi, nabanqula, wovutha umsindo kaYehova kuni, nicinywe kamsinya emhlabeni olungileyo aninikileyo.
6_24_1_Wazihlanganisa uYoshuwa zonke izizwe zakwaSirayeli kwaShekem, wawabiza amadoda amakhulu amaSirayeli, neentloko zawo, nabagwebi bawo, nababhali bawo; bazimisa phambi koThixo.
6_24_2_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo bonke abantu, Utsho uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli, ukuthi, Ooyihlo babehleli phesheya koMlambo kususela kwaphakade, ooTera, uyise ka-Abraham, uyise kaNahore;  babekhonza thixo bambi.
6_24_3_Ndamthabatha uyihlo uAbraham phesheya koMlambo, ndamhambisa ezweni lonke lakwaKanan, ndayandisa imbewu yakhe, ndamnika uIsake.
6_24_4_UIsake ndamnika uYakobi noEsawu; uEsawu ndamnika iintaba zakwaSehire, ukuba azime; ke uYakobi, noonyana bakhe behla baya eYiputa.
6_24_5_Ndathuma uMoses noAron, ndayihlisela izibetho iYiputa,  njengoko ndenzayo phakathi kwayo; emveni koko ndanikhupha.
6_24_6_Ndabakhupha ooyihlo eYiputa, nafika elwandle; amaYiputa abasukela ooyihlo ngeenqwelo zokulwa nangabamahashe, beza kuLwandle oluBomvu.
6_24_7_Bakhala kuYehova; wabeka isithokothoko phakathi kwenu namaYiputa, wawazisela ulwandle, wawagubungela; amehlo enu akubona oko ndakwenzayo eYiputa. Nahlala entlango imihla emininzi.
6_24_8_Ndaningenisa ezweni lama-Amori, abehleli phesheya kweYordan, alwa nani; ndawanikela esandleni senu, nalihlutha ilizwe lawo; ndawatshabalalisa phambi kwenu.
6_24_9_Wesuka uBhalaki unyana kaTsipore, ukumkani wakwaMowabhi,  walwa namaSirayeli; wathuma, wabiza uBhileham unyana kaBhehore,  ukuba aniqalekise.
6_24_10_Andavuma ukumphulaphula uBhileham; wanisikelela, akayeka,  ndanihlangula esandleni sakhe.
6_24_11_Nayiwela iYordan, nafika eYeriko; balwa nani abemi baseYeriko, ama-Amori, namaPerizi, namaKanan, namaHeti,  namaGirgashi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi, ndabanikela esandleni senu.
6_24_12_Ndathuma oonomeva phambi kwenu, babagxotha phambi kwenu ookumkani ababini bama-Amori, kungengakrele lakho,  kungengasaphetha sakho.
6_24_13_Ndaninika ilizwe eningaxhamlekanga ngalo, nemizi eningayakhanga, nahlala ke kuyo; nezidiliya, nezinquma eningazityalanga niyazidla ke.
6_24_14_Moyikeni ke ngoko uYehova, nimkhonze ngokugqibeleleyo,  nangenyaniso. Susani oothixo, ababekhonza bona ooyihlo phesheya koMlambo, naseYiputa, nimkhonze ke uYehova.
6_24_15_Ke ukuba kubi emehlweni enu ukumkhonza uYehova,  zinyuleleni namhla oyena niya kumkhonza; nokuba ngoothixo ababekhonza bona ooyihlo, ababephesheya koMlambo, nokuba ngoothixo bama-Amori, enihleli ezweni lawo. Ke mna nendlu yam siya kukhonza uYehova.
6_24_16_Baphendula abantu, bathi, Makube le kuthi ukumshiya uYehova, sikhonze thixo bambi.
6_24_17_Kuba uYehova, uThixo wethu, nguye osinyusileyo thina noobawo bethu ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka;  owayenzela emehlweni ethu loo miqondiso mikhulu, wasigcina endleleni yonke esahamba ngayo, nasezizweni zonke esacanda phakathi kwazo.
6_24_18_Waza wazigxotha uYehova zonke izizwe, nama-Amori abehleli kwelo zwe phambi kwethu. Nathi siya kukhonza uYehova; kuba nguThixo wethu.
6_24_19_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo abantu, Aninakumkhonza uYehova;  ngokuba nguThixo oyingcwele, nguThixo onekhwele; akayi kuzithwala izikreqo zenu, nezono zenu.
6_24_20_Xa nithe namshiya uYehova, nakhonza oothixo bolunye uhlanga, wojika anenzele ububi anigqibele emveni kokuba enenzele okuhle.
6_24_21_Bathi abantu kuYoshuwa, Hayi, siya kukhonza uYehova thina.
6_24_22_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo abantu, Ningamangqina ngakuni, ukuba nina nizinyulele uYehova ukuba nimkhonze. Bathi, Singamangqina.
6_24_23_Wathi, basuseni ngoko oothixo bolunye uhlanga abaphakathi kwenu, nimthobele ngeentliziyo zenu uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli.
6_24_24_Bathi abantu kuYoshuwa, Siya kukhonza uYehova uThixo wethu, siliphulaphule ilizwi lakhe.
6_24_25_UYoshuwa wenza ke umnqophiso nabantu ngaloo mhla;  wabamisela imimiselo namasiko kwaShekem.
6_24_26_Wawabhala uYoshuwa la mazwi encwadini yomyalelo kaThixo,  wathabatha ilitye elikhulu, walimisa khona phantsi komoki osendaweni engcwele kaYehova.
6_24_27_Wathi uYoshuwa kubo bonke abantu, Yabonani, eli litye liya kuba lingqina ngathi; ngokuba liwavile lona onke amazwi kaYehova, awathethileyo nathi; libe lingqina ngani, hleze nimkhanyele uThixo wenu.
6_24_28_Wabandulula ke uYoshuwa abantu; elowo waya elifeni lakhe.
6_24_29_Kwathi emveni koko, wafa uYoshuwa unyana kaNun, umkhonzi kaYehova, eminyaka ilikhulu elinashumi-nye ezelwe.
6_24_30_Bamngcwabela emdeni welifa lakhe, eTimnati-sera,  kweleentaba lakwaEfrayim, entla kwentaba yaseGahashe.
6_24_31_AmaSirayeli amkhonza uYehova yonke imihla kaYoshuwa,  nemihla yonke yamadoda amakhulu awasalayo kuYoshuwa, abewazi wonke umsebenzi kaYehova abewenzele amaSirayeli.
6_24_32_Amathambo kaYosefu, ababenyuke nawo eYiputa oonyana bakaSirayeli, bawangcwabela kwaShekem, kwisiziba somhlaba awasithengayo uYakobi koonyana bakaHamore, usoShekem, ngekhulu lesilivere; saba lilifa loonyana bakaYosefu.
6_24_33_NoElazare unyana ka-Aron wafa; bamngcwabela endulini kaPinehasi, unyana wakhe, awayinikwayo kweleentaba lakwaEfrayim.
7_1_1_Kwathi emva kokufa kukaYoshuwa, babuza oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova, besithi, Ngubani na oya kusiqalela ukunyuka aye kumaKanan, alwe nawo?
7_1_2_Wathi uYehova, Konyuka uYuda: yabonani, ndilinikele ilizwe esandleni sakhe.
7_1_3_Wathi uYuda kuSimon umkhuluwa wakhe, Nyuka nam, siye eqashisweni lam silwe namaKanan; nam ndoya nawe eqashisweni lakho. USimon wahamba naye ke.
7_1_4_Wenyuka ke uYuda; uYehova wawanikela amaKanan namaPerizi esandleni sabo. Bawabulala eBhezeki amadoda angamawaka alishumi.
7_1_5_UAdoni waseBhezeki bamfumana eBhezeki, balwa naye,  bawabulala amaKanan namaPerizi.
7_1_6_Wasaba uAdoni waseBhezeki; bamsukela, bambamba, bamnqumla oozithupha noobhontsi.
7_1_7_Wathi uAdoni waseBhezeki, Ookumkani abamashumi asixhenxe babechola phantsi kwetafile yam, benqunyulwe oozithupha noobhontsi; njengoko ndenza ngako, wenjenjalo uThixo ukubuyekeza kum. Bamsa eYerusalem, wafela khona.
7_1_8_Ke kaloku oonyana bakaYuda balwa neYerusalem, bayithimba,  bayibulala ngohlangothi lwekrele, bathi umzi bawufaka umlilo.
7_1_9_Behla emveni koko oonyana bakaYuda, baya kulwa namaKanan abehleli kweleentaba, nakwelasezantsi, nakweleentlambo.
7_1_10_Waya uYuda kumaKanan abehleli eHebron; igama leHebron ngenxa engaphambili beliyiKiriyati ka-Arbha; babulala uSheshayi, noAhiman, noTalemayi.
7_1_11_Wesuka khona waya kubemi baseDebhiri; igama leDebhiri ngenxa engaphambili beliyiKiriyati-sefere.
7_1_12_Wathi uKalebhi, Othe wayingenela iKiriyati-sefere,  wayithimba, ndomnika intombi yam, uAkesa, ibe ngumkakhe.
7_1_13_Wayithimba uOteniyeli unyana kaKenazi, umninawa kaKalebhi;  wamnika ke intombi yakhe, uAkesa, yangumkakhe.
7_1_14_Kwathi ekuzeni kwayo, yamvuselela ukuba acele umhlaba kuyise wayo; yehla e-esileni layo. Wathi uKalebhi kuyo, Yintoni na?
7_1_15_Yathi kuye, Ndinike into, ngokuba undinike umhlaba ongenamanzi; ndinike nemithombo yamanzi. UKalebhi wayinika ke imithombo yasentla nemithombo yasezantsi.
7_1_16_Oonyana bomKeni, uyise womkaMoses, benyuka eMzini wamaSundu noonyana bakaYuda, baya kwintlango yakwaYuda, engasezantsi kweArade, baya bahlala nabantu abo.
7_1_17_Waya uYuda noSimon umkhuluwa wakhe, bawabulala amaKanan abehleli eTsefati, bayitshabalalisa. Kwathiwa igama laloo mzi yiHorma.
7_1_18_UYuda wayithimba iGaza nommandla wayo, neAshkelon nommandla wayo, ne-Ekron nommandla wayo.
7_1_19_UYehova waye enoYuda, wabagqogqa abeentaba; kodwa ebengenako ukubagqogqa abemi bentili, ngokuba baye beneenqwelo zesinyithi.
7_1_20_Bamnika uKalebhi umzi waseHebron, njengoko wathethayo uMoses; wabagqogqa apho oonyana bobathathu baka-Anaki.
7_1_21_Ke amaYebhusi, abehleli eYerusalem, abawagqogqanga oonyana bakaBhenjamin. Ahleli amaYebhusi noonyana bakaBhenjamin eYerusalem unanamhla.
7_1_22_Indlu kaYosefu yenyuka nayo, yaya kuyingenela iBheteli;  uYehova waye enayo.
7_1_23_Indlu kaYosefu yayihlola iBheteli; ke igama laloo mzi ngenxa engaphambili beliyiLuzi.
7_1_24_Iintlola ezo zambona umntu ephuma kuloo mzi, zathi kuye,  Khawusibonise ithuba lokungena kulo mzi; sokwenzela inceba.
7_1_25_Wazibonisa ithuba lokungena kuloo mzi; zawubulala umzi ngohlangothi lwekrele; bamndulula loo mntu nemizalwane yakhe yonke.
7_1_26_Waya loo mntu ezweni lamaHeti, wakha umzi, wathi igama lawo yiLuzi; ligama lawo unanamhla.
7_1_27_UManase akayigqogqanga iBhete-shehan namagxamesi ayo,  neTahanaki namagxamesi ayo, nabemi baseDore namagxamesi ayo,  nabemi baseIhlam namagxamesi ayo, nabemi baseMegido namagxamesi ayo; ke amaKanan aphikela ukuhlala kwelo zwe.
7_1_28_Kwathi, akomelela amaSirayeli, awafaka uviko amaKanan,  akawagqogqa awagqibe.
7_1_29_UEfrayim akawagqogqanga amaKanan abemi eGezere; ahlala amaKanan phakathi kwakhe eGezere.
7_1_30_UZebhulon akabagqogqanga abemi baseKitron nabemi baseNahaloli; ahlala amaKanan phakathi kwakhe, afakwa uviko.
7_1_31_UAshere akabagqogqanga abemi baseAko, nabemi baseTsidon,  neAhalabhi, neAkezibhi, neHelebha, neAfiki, neRehobhi.
7_1_32_Ama-Ashere ahlala phakathi kwamaKanan abemi kwelo zwe;  ngokuba akawagqogqanga.
7_1_33_UNafetali akabagqogqanga abemi baseBhete-shemeshe, nabemi baseBhete-anati; wahlala phakathi kwamaKanan abemi kwelo zwe.  Abemi baseBhete-shemeshe nabaseBhete-anati bafakwa uviko nguye.
7_1_34_Ama-Amori abaxinela kweleentaba oonyana bakaDan; ngokuba akabavumelanga ukuba behle beze entilini.
7_1_35_Ama-Amori aphikela ukuhlala eHarheres, naseAyalon,  naseShahalebhim. Isandla sendlu kaYosefu saba nzima, afakwa uviko.
7_1_36_Umda wama-Amori wathabathela eqhineni leAkrabhim,  engxondorheni, wenyusa.
7_2_1_Kwenyuka isithunywa sikaYehova eGiligali, saya eBhokim,  sathi, Ndaninyusa eYiputa, ndanizisa kwelo zwe ndafunga kooyihlo ngalo, ndathi, Andiyi kuwaphula umnqophiso wam nani naphakade;
7_2_2_ke nina nize ningenzi mnqophiso nabemi beli lizwe; nize nizidilize izibingelelo zabo. Aniliphulaphulanga ke izwi lam.  Yintoni na le niyenzileyo?
7_2_3_Kananjalo ndathi, Andiyi kubagqogqa phambi kwenu, ukuze babe ziimviko emacaleni enu, oothixo babo babe ngumgibe kuni.
7_2_4_Kwathi, sakuwathetha isithunywa sikaYehova la mazwi kubo bonke oonyana bakaSirayeli, basuka abantu baliphakamisa izwi labo, balila.
7_2_5_Bayibiza loo ndawo ngokuthi, yiBhokim; babingelela apho kuYehova.
7_2_6_Ke kaloku okuya uYoshuwa wabandululayo abantu, baya oonyana bakaSirayeli elowo elifeni lakhe, ukuba balime ilizwe.
7_2_7_Abantu bamkhonza uYehova yonke imihla kaYoshuwa, nemihla yonke yamadoda amakhulu awasalelayo kuYoshuwa, abewubonile wonke umsebenzi omkhulu kaYehova, abewenzele amaSirayeli.
7_2_8_Wafa ke uYoshuwa unyana kaNun, umkhonzi kaYehova, eminyaka ilikhulu elinashumi-nye ezelwe.
7_2_9_Bamngcwabela emdeni welifa lakhe, eTimnata-heres,  kweleentaba lakwaEfrayim, entla kwentaba yaseGahashe.
7_2_10_Sakuba neso sizukulwana sonke sihlanganiselwe kooyise,  kwavela sizukulwana simbi emva kwaso, esibe singamazi uYehova,  kwanomsebenzi abewenzele amaSirayeli.
7_2_11_Oonyana bakaSirayeli benza ububi emehlweni kaYehova,  bakhonza ooBhahali.
7_2_12_Bamlahla uYehova, uThixo wooyise, owabakhuphayo ezweni lamaYiputa; balandela thixo bambi koothixo bezizwe ezibajikelezileyo, babanqula, bamqumbisa uYehova.
7_2_13_Bamlahla ke uYehova, bakhonza uBhahali noAshtaroti.
7_2_14_Wavutha ke umsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli, wawanikela esandleni sabaphangi, bawaphanga. Wathengisa ngawo, wawanikela esandleni seentshaba zawo ngeenxa zonke; akaba saba nakuma phambi kweentshaba zawo.
7_2_15_Athi akuphuma esiya naphi, sasuka isandla sikaYehova sawachasa ngobubi, njengoko wakuthethayo uYehova, njengoko wawafungelayo; abandezeleka kunene.
7_2_16_UYehova wavelisa abagwebi; bawasindisa esandleni sabaphangi bawo.
7_2_17_Akabaphulaphula nabagwebi bawo, asuka ahenyuza ngokulandela thixo bambi, abanqula, atyeka kamsinya endleleni ababehamba ngayo ooyise, yokuphulaphula imithetho kaYehova. Akenjanga njalo ke wona.
7_2_18_Naxa uYehova wawavelisela abagwebi, uYehova waba nomgwebi lowo, wawasindisa esandleni seentshaba zawo yonke imihla yomgwebi lowo; ngokuba uYehova wazohlwaya ngenxa yokuncwina kwawo, phambi kwabaxini bawo, ababandezeli bawo.
7_2_19_Kwathi, akufa umgwebi lowo, abuya onakalisa ngaphezu kooyise, alandela thixo bambi ngokubakhonza nangokubanqula;  akaziyeka iintlondi zawo nendlela yokuba lukhuni kwawo.
7_2_20_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli; wathi, Ngenxa enokuba olu hlanga luwugqithile umnqophiso wam endawumisela ooyise, alwaliphulaphula ilizwi lam:
7_2_21_nam andiyi kuphinda ndithi phambi kwabo ndigqogqe mntu wezi ntlanga, wazishiyayo uYoshuwa ekufeni kwakhe;
7_2_22_ukuze ndiwalinge ngazo amaSirayeli, ukuba oyigcina na indlela kaYehova, ahambe ngayo, njengoko bayigcinayo ooyise,  akayi kuyigcina, kusini na?
7_2_23_Waziyeka ke uYehova ezo ntlanga, akazigqogqa kamsinya,  akazinikela esandleni sikaYoshuwa.
7_3_1_Zizo ke ezi iintlanga awaziyekayo uYehova, ukuze awalinge ngazo amaSirayeli, lawo angazazanga iimfazwe zonke zakwaKanan;
7_3_2_ukuze kodwa azazi izizukulwana zoonyana bakaSirayeli ngokuzifundisa imfazwe, zona ezo zanga phambili zazingazazi:
7_3_3_izikhulu zozihlanu zamaFilisti, namaKanan onke, namaTsidon,  namaHivi ahleli ezintabeni zeLebhanon, ethabathela ezintabeni zeBhahali-hermon, ese ekuyeni eHamati.
7_3_4_Abo ke babengabokulinga amaSirayeli, ukuze kwazeke ukuba oyiphulaphula na imithetho kaYehova, awayiwisela ooyise ngesandla sikaMoses.
7_3_5_Bahlala ke oonyana bakaSirayeli phakathi kwamaKanan,  namaHeti, nama-Amori, namaPerizi, namaHivi, namaYebhusi.
7_3_6_Bazizeka iintombi zawo zaba ngabafazi babo, bendisa iintombi zabo koonyana bawo, bakhonza oothixo bawo.
7_3_7_Oonyana bakaSirayeli benza ububi emehlweni kaYehova,  bamlibala uYehova uThixo wabo, bakhonza ooBhahali nooAshera.
7_3_8_Wavutha ke umsindo kaYehova kumaSirayeli, wathengisa ngawo,  wawanikela esandleni sikaKushan-rishatayim, ukumkani wakwa-Aram phakathi kweMilambo; bamkhonza ke oonyana bakaSirayeli uKushan-rishatayim iminyaka esibhozo.
7_3_9_Bakhala oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova; wabavelisela uYehova oonyana bakaSirayeli umsindisi owabasindisayo, onguOteniyeli,  unyana kaKenazi, umninawa kaKalebhi.
7_3_10_Wafikelwa nguMoya kaYehova, wawalawula amaSirayeli, waphuma waya kulwa. UYehova wamnikela esandleni sakhe uKushan-rishatayim, ukumkani wakwa-Aram; isandla sakhe saba namandla phezu koKushan-rishatayim.
7_3_11_Lazola ke ilizwe iminyaka emashumi mane. Wafa uOteniyeli unyana kaKenazi.
7_3_12_Ke kaloku oonyana bakaSirayeli baphinda benza ububi emehlweni kaYehova; uYehova wamomeleza uEglon ukumkani wakwaMowabhi, ukuba awachase amaSirayeli, ngenxa yokuba enze ububi emehlweni kaYehova.
7_3_13_Wabahlanganisela kuye oonyana baka-Amon nama-Amaleki, waya wawabulala amaSirayeli, wawuhlutha uMzi wamaSundu.
7_3_14_Oonyana bakaSirayeli bamkhonza uEglon, ukumkani wakwaMowabhi, iminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo.
7_3_15_Bakhala oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova; wabavelisela umsindisi onguEhude, unyana kaGera, umBhenjamin, umfo olinxele.  Bathumela oonyana bakaSirayeli ngesandla sakhe umnikelo kuEglon, ukumkani wakwaMowabhi.
7_3_16_UEhude wazenzela ikrele elintlangothi mbini, liyikubhite ubude balo, walinxiba phantsi kwengubo yakhe ethangeni lakhe lokunene.
7_3_17_Wawusondeza umnikelo kuEglon ukumkani wamaMowabhi: ke uEglon ebengumfo onengxeba.
7_3_18_Kwathi, akugqiba ukuwusondeza umnikelo, wabandulula abantu ababewuthwele umnikelo lowo.
7_3_19_Wabuya yena emifanekisweni eqingqiweyo eseGiligali, wathi,  Ndinelizwi lasentsithelweni nawe, kumkani. Wathi, Yithini tu.  Baphuma bemka kuye bonke ababemi ngakuye.
7_3_20_Weza uEhude kuye, ehleli egumbini eliphezulu elinempepho,  elibe lilelakhe yedwa. Wathi uEhude, Ndinelizwi likaThixo eliza kuwe; wesuka esihlalweni.
7_3_21_UEhude wasolula isandla sakhe sokhohlo, walithabatha ikrele ethangeni lakhe lokunene, walifaka esiswini sakhe.
7_3_22_Watsho sangena nesiphatho, salandela intsimbi; inqatha layivingcela intsimbi, ngokuba akalirholanga ikrele esiswini sakhe; laphuma phakathi kweempundu.
7_3_23_Waphuma uEhude waya evarandeni, wazivala iingcango zegumbi elo liphezulu, wamvalela, wazitshixa.
7_3_24_Ephumile ke yena, bangena abakhonzi, babona iingcango zegumbi eliphezulu zivaliwe; bathi, Fanel ukuba ugubungela iinyawo zakhe egumbini lempepho.
7_3_25_Baphongoma bada baneentloni; nanko kungavuli mntu ezingcangweni zegumbi eliphezulu; bathabatha isitshixo, bavula:  nantsi inkosi yabo iwe phantsi ifile.
7_3_26_UEhude wasaba, besazilazila bona; wagqitha emifanekisweni eqingqiweyo, wasaba, waya eSehira.
7_3_27_Kwathi, ukufika kwakhe, wavuthela ngesigodlo ekweleentaba lakwaEfrayim; behla naye oonyana bakaSirayeli kweleentaba,  ephambi kwabo yena.
7_3_28_Wathi kubo, Ndilandeleni, ngokuba uYehova uzinikele iintshaba zenu, amaMowabhi, esandleni senu. Bamlandela ke,  bawavingca amazibuko aseYordan angakwaMowabhi, abavuma ukuba kuwele mntu.
7_3_29_Babulala amaMowabhi ngelo xesha, amadoda angathi angamawaka alishumi, onke etyebile, onke engamadoda anobukroti; akwasinda nanye indoda.
7_3_30_Athotywa ke amaMowabhi loo mini aba phantsi kwesandla samaSirayeli; lazola ilizwe iminyaka emashumi asibhozo.
7_3_31_Emveni kwakhe yaba nguShamgare, unyana ka-Anati, owabulala kumaFilisti amadoda angamakhulu amathandathu ngoviko lweenkomo,  wawasindisa naye amaSirayeli.
7_4_1_Baphinda oonyana bakaSirayeli benza ububi emehlweni kaYehova, akuba efile uEhude.
7_4_2_UYehova wathengisa ngabo, wabanikela esandleni sikaYabhin,  ukumkani wakwaKanan, obephethe ubukumkani eHatsore,  omthetheli-mkhosi ebenguSisera, ohleli eHarosheti yeentlanga.
7_4_3_Bakhala oonyana bakaSirayeli kuYehova; ngokuba ebeneenqwelo zesinyithi ezingamakhulu asithoba; wabaxina ke oonyana bakaSirayeli ngamandla iminyaka emashumi mabini.
7_4_4_Ke kaloku uDebhora, umprofetikazi, umkaLapidoti, ebewalawula amaSirayeli ngelo xesha.
7_4_5_Wayehleli phantsi komthi wesundu kaDebhora, phakathi kweRama neBheteli, kweleentaba lakwaEfrayim. Benyuka baya kuye oonyana bakaSirayeli ukuba athethe amatyala.
