13_1_46_Wafa uHusham; uHadadi unyana kaBhedadi, owaxabela amaMidiyan emhlabeni wakwaMowabhi, waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomzi wakhe beliyiAviti.
13_1_47_Wafa uHadadi; uSamla waseMasereka waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe.
13_1_48_Wafa uSamla; uSawule, waseRehobhoti yoMlambo, waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe.
13_1_49_Wafa uSawule; uBhahali-hanan, unyana ka-Akebhore, waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe.
13_1_50_Wafa uBhahali-hanan; uHadadi waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomzi wakhe beliyiPahi; igama lomkakhe belinguMehetabheli, intombi kaMatrede, intombi kaMezahabhi.
13_1_51_Wafa uHadadi. Izikhulu zakwaEdom zezi: isikhulu esinguTimna, isikhulu esinguAliya, isikhulu esinguYetete,
13_1_52_isikhulu esinguAholibhama, isikhulu esinguEla, isikhulu esinguPinon,
13_1_53_isikhulu esinguKenazi, isikhulu esinguTeman, isikhulu esinguMibhetsare,
13_1_54_isikhulu esinguMagediyeli, isikhulu esinguIram. Zizo ezo izikhulu zakwaEdom.
13_2_1_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaSirayeli: nguRubhen, noSimon, noLevi,  noYuda, noIsakare, noZebhulon,
13_2_2_noDan, noYosefu, noBhenjamin, noNafetali, noGadi, noAshere.
13_2_3_Oonyana bakaYuda nguEre, no-Onan, noShela. Abo bathathu wabazalelwa yintombi kaShuwa, umKananekazi. Ke uEre, amazibulo kaYuda, ebenobubi emehlweni kaYehova; wambulala.
13_2_4_UTamare, umolokazana wakhe, wamzalela uPeretse noZera.  Bebonke oonyana bakaYuda bahlanu.
13_2_5_Oonyana bakaPeretse nguHetseron, noHamuli.
13_2_6_Oonyana bakaZera nguZimri, noEtan, noHaman, noKalekole,  noDara; bebonke bahlanu.
13_2_7_Oonyana bakaKarmi nguAkare, owawahlisela ishwangusha amaSirayeli, wenza ubumenemene entweni esingelwe phantsi.
13_2_8_Oonyana bakaEtan nguAzariya.
13_2_9_Oonyana bakaHetseron awabazalelwayo: nguYerameli, noRam,  noKelubhayi.
13_2_10_URam wazala uAminadabhi; uAminadabhi wazala uNashon, inkulu yoonyana bakaYuda.
13_2_11_UNashon wazala uSalima;
13_2_12_uSalima wazala uBhohazi; uBhohazi wazala uObhede; uObhede wazala uYese.
13_2_13_UYese wazala uEliyabhi, amazibulo akhe, noAbhinadabhi owesibini, noShama owesithathu,
13_2_14_noNataniyeli owesine, noRadayi owesihlanu,
13_2_15_no-Otsem owesithandathu, noDavide owesixhenxe.
13_2_16_Oodade babo baye bengooTseruya noAbhigali. Oonyana bakaTseruya nguAbhishayi, noYowabhi, noAsaheli; bathathu.
13_2_17_UAbhigali wazala uAmasa; uyise ka-Amasa ebenguYetere,  umIshmayeli.
13_2_18_UKalebhi, unyana kaHetseron, wazala ngoAzubha umkakhe nangoYerihoti. Ngabo aba oonyana bakhe: uYeshere, noShobhabhi,  noArdon.
13_2_19_Wafa uAzubha; uKalebhi wazeka uEfrata; wamzalela uHuri.
13_2_20_UHuri wazala u-Uri, u-Uri wazala uBhetsaleli.
13_2_21_Emveni koko wayingena uHetseron intombi kaMakire, uyise kaGiliyadi, wayizeka eminyaka imashumi mathandathu ezelwe;  yamzalela uSegubhi.
13_2_22_USegubhi wazala uYahire; wayenemizi engamashumi amabini anamithathu ezweni laseGiliyadi.
13_2_23_UGeshuri noAram bathabatha kubo iHavoti-yahire, neKenati,  namagxamesi ayo: imizi engamashumi omathandathu. Bonke aba babengoonyana bakaMakire, uyise kaGiliyadi.
13_2_24_Emva kokufa kukaHetseron kwaKalebhi yakwaEfrata,  umkaHetseron, uAbhiya, wamzalela uAsuri, uyise ozala amaTekowa.
13_2_25_Oonyana bakaYerameli, amazibulo kaHetseron, babengooRam amazibulo akhe, noBhuna, no-Oren, no-Otsem, noAhiya.
13_2_26_UYerameli ebenomnye umfazi, igama lakhe linguAtara;  ubengunina kaOnam.
13_2_27_Oonyana bakaRam, amazibulo kaYerameli, babenguMahatse,  noYamin, noEkere.
13_2_28_Oonyana bakaOnam babenguShamayi, noYada. Oonyana bakaShamayi nguNadabhi, noAbhishure.
13_2_29_Igama lomka-Abhishure nguAbhihayili; wamzalela uAbhan,  noMolidi.
13_2_30_Oonyana bakaNadabhi nguSelede, noApayim; wafa uSelede engazalanga.
13_2_31_Oonyana baka-Apayim nguIshi. Oonyana bakaIshi nguSheshan.  Oonyana bakaSheshan nguAlayi.
13_2_32_Oonyana bakaYada, umninawa kaShamayi, nguYetere noYonatan.  Wafa uYetere engazalanga.
13_2_33_Oonyana bakaYonatan nguPelete noZaza. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaYerameli.
13_2_34_USheshan ebengenanyana; ibiziintombi zodwa. USheshan ebenomkhonzi ongumYiputa; igama lakhe belinguYar-ha.
13_2_35_USheshan wamnika uYar-ha umkhonzi wakhe intombi yakhe,  ukuba ibe ngumfazi; yamzalela uAtayi.
13_2_36_UAtayi wazala uNatan; uNatan wazala uZabhadi.
13_2_37_UZabhadi wazala uEfelali; uEfelali wazala uObhede;
13_2_38_uObhede wazala uYehu; uYehu wazala uAzariya;
13_2_39_uAzariya wazala uHeletse; uHeletse wazala uElasa;
13_2_40_uElasa wazala uSisamayi; uSisamayi wazala uShalum;
13_2_41_uShalum wazala uYekamiya; uYekamiya wazala uElishama.
13_2_42_Oonyana bakaKalebhi, umkhuluwa kaYerameli, nguMesha amazibulo akhe, obenguyise wabaseZifi, noonyana bakaMaresha,  uyise kaHebron.
13_2_43_Oonyana bakaHebron nguKora, noTapuwa, noRekem, noShema.
13_2_44_UShema wazala uRaham, uyise kaYorkeham; uRekem wazala uShamayi.
13_2_45_Unyana kaShamayi nguMahon; uMahon nguyise wabaseBhete-tsure.
13_2_46_UEfa, ishweshwe likaKalebhi, wazala uHaran, noMotsa,  noGazeze; uHaran wazala uGazeze.
13_2_47_Oonyana bakaYadayi nguRegem, noYotam noGeshan, noPelete,  noEfa, noShahafe.
13_2_48_UMahaka, ishweshwe likaKalebhi, wazala uShebhere,  noTir-hana;
13_2_49_wazala noShahafe, uyise wabaseMademana, noSheva uyise wabaseMakebhena, noyise wabaseGibheha; intombi kaKalebhi ibinguAkesa.
13_2_50_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaKalebhi: ngoonyana bakaHuri,  amazibulo kaEfrata; uShobhali ozala amaKiriyati-yeharim;
13_2_51_uSalima, uyise wabaseBhetelehem; uHarefe, uyise wabaseBhete-gadere.
13_2_52_UShobhali, uyise wabaseKiriyati-yeharim, ebenoonyana:  uHarowe, noHatsihamenukoti.
13_2_53_Imizalwane yaseKiriyati-yeharim ngamaItri, namaPuti,  namaShumati, namaMisherayi. Baphuma kuyo abaseTsorati,  namaEshtawoli.
13_2_54_Oonyana bakaSalima ngabaseBhetelehem, nabaseNetofa,  abaseAteroti yendlu kaYowabhi, nabaseHazi-hamanati,  nabaseTsora.
13_2_55_Imizalwane yababhali, abemi baseYabhetse, ngabaseTira,  ngabaseShemiha, ngabaseSuka. La ngamaKeni avela kuHamati, uyise wabendlu kaRekabhi.
13_3_1_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaDavide, awabazalelwayo eHebron:  owamazibulo ibinguAmnon ka-Ahinowam waseYizereli; owesibini nguDaniyeli ka-Abhigali waseKarmele;
13_3_2_owesithathu nguAbhisalom unyana kaMahaka, intombi kaTalemayi, ukumkani waseGeshuri; owesine nguAdoniya unyana kaHagiti;
13_3_3_owesihlanu nguShefatiya ngoAbhitali; owesithandathu nguItram ngoEgela umkakhe.
13_3_4_Abo bathandathu wabazalelwa eHebron; waba ngukumkani khona iminyaka esixhenxe neenyanga ezintandathu. Waba neminyaka emashumi mathathu anamithathu engukumkani eYerusalem.
13_3_5_Ngabo aba awabazalelwayo eYerusalem: nguShimeha,  noShobhabhi, noNatan, noSolomon, bobane, ngoBhateshuwa intombika-Amiyeli;
13_3_6_nguIbhehare, noElishama, noElifelete,
13_3_7_noNoga, noNefege, noYafiya,
13_3_8_noElishama, noEliyada, noElifelete; basithoba.
13_3_9_Bebonke oonyana bakaDavide ngabo abo, bengabalwa oonyana bamashweshwe; nodade wabo ibinguTamare.
13_3_10_Unyana kaSolomon ibinguRehabheham; nguAbhiya unyana wakhe;  nguAsa unyana wakhe; nguYoshafate unyana wakhe;
13_3_11_nguYoram unyana wakhe; nguAhaziya unyana wakhe; nguYowashe unyana wakhe;
13_3_12_nguAmatsiya unyana wakhe; nguAzariya unyana wakhe; nguYotam unyana wakhe;
13_3_13_nguAhazi unyana wakhe; nguHezekiya unyana wakhe; nguManase unyana wakhe;
13_3_14_nguAmon unyana wakhe; nguYosiya unyana wakhe.
13_3_15_Oonyana bakaYosiya nguYohanan, amazibulo akhe, nguYoyakim owesibini, nguZedekiya owesithathu, nguShalum owesine.
13_3_16_Oonyana bakaYoyakim nguYekoniya unyana wakhe; nguZedekiya unyana wakhe.
13_3_17_Oonyana bakaYekoniya nguAsire, nguShelatiyeli unyana wakhe,
13_3_18_noMalekiram, noPedaya, noShenatsare, noYekamiya, noHoshama,  noNedabhiya.
13_3_19_Oonyana bakaPedaya ngooZerubhabheli noShimehi. Oonyana bakaZerubhabheli ngooMeshulam, noHananiya, benoShelomiti udade wabo;
13_3_20_noHashubha, no-Oheli, noBherekiya, noHasadiya,  noYushabhi-hesede; bahlanu.
13_3_21_Oonyana bakaHananiya ngooPelatiya noYesaya; oonyana bakaRefaya; oonyana baka-Arnan; oonyana bakaObhadiya; oonyana bakaShekaniya.
13_3_22_Oonyana bakaShekaniya nguShemaya; oonyana bakaShemaya ngooHatushe, noIgali, noBhariya, noNeyariya, noShafati;  bathandathu.
13_3_23_Oonyana bakaNeyariya ngooEliyohenayi, noHezekiya,  noAzerikam; bathuthu.
13_3_24_Oonyana bakaEliyohenayi ngooHodaya, noEliyashibhi,  noPelaya, noAkubhi, noYohanan, noDelaya, noAnani; basixhenxe.
13_4_1_Oonyana bakaYuda nguPeretse, noHetseron, noKarmi, noHuri,  noShobhali.
13_4_2_URehaya, unyana kaShobhali, wazala uYahati; uYahati wazala uAhumayi noLahadi. Yiyo le imizalwane yabaseTsora.
13_4_3_Yiyo le eyazala amaEtam: nguYezereli, noIshma, noIdebhashe;  igama lodade wabo belinguHatseleleponi;
13_4_4_noPenuweli ozala amaGedore, noEzere ozala amaHusha. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaHuri, amazibulo kaEfrata, ozala amaBhetelehem.
13_4_5_UAshuri, ozala amaTekowa, ebena bafazi ababini, uHela noNahara.
13_4_6_UNahara wamzalela uAhuzam, noHefere, namaTemeni,  namaHahashtari. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaNahara.
13_4_7_Oonyana bakaHela nguTserete, noYetsohare, noEtenan.
13_4_8_UKotsi wazala uAnubhi, noTsobhebha; nemizalwane ka-Aharele,  unyana kaHarum.
13_4_9_Ke kaloku uYabhetse ebezukile kunabazalwana bakhe. Unina wamthiya igama lokuba nguYabhetse, esithi, Ndimzele ngokubulaleka.
13_4_10_UYabhetse wamnqula uThixo wakwaSirayeli, wathi, Ngamana wandisikelela, wawandisa ummandla wam, isandla sakho saba nam,  wandithintela ebubini, ukuze ndingabulaleki. UThixo wamenzela loo nto wayicelayo.
13_4_11_UKelubhi, umkhuluwa kaShuwa, wazala uMehire, onguyise kaEshton.
13_4_12_UEshton wazala indlu kaRafa, noPaseha, noTehina, ozala umzi kaNahashe. Ngawo lawo amadoda akwaReka.
13_4_13_Oonyana bakaKenazi: uOteniyeli noSeraya; oonyana bakaOteniyeli nguHatati noMehonotayi.
13_4_14_UMehonotayi wazala uOfera; uSeraya wazala uYowabhi, ozala ooGeharashim, ngokuba bebeziingcibi.
13_4_15_Oonyana bakaKalebhi, unyana kaYefune, ngooIru, noEla,  noNaham; oonyana bakaEla; nabakaKenazi.
13_4_16_Oonyana bakaYehaleleli ngooZifi noZifa, ngooTireya noAsareli.
13_4_17_Oonyana bakaEzera nguYetere, noMerede, noEfere, noYalon.  Wazala uMiriyam, noShamayi, noIshbha, ozala amaEshtemowa.
13_4_18_Umkakhe uYehudiya wazala uYerede, ozala amaGedore;  noHebhere, ozala amaSoko; noYekutiyeli, ozala amaZanowa. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaBhitya, intombi kaFaro, awayizekayo uMerede.
13_4_19_Oonyana bomkakhe uHodiya, udade boNaham: ngozala amaKehila,  umGarmi; nozala amaEshtemowa, umMahaka.
13_4_20_Oonyana bakaShimon ngooAmnon noRina, ngooBhen-hanan noTilon. Oonyana bakaIshi ngooZohete noBhen-zohete.
13_4_21_Oonyana bakaShela, unyana kaYuda, ngooEre ozala amaLeka,  noLada ozala amaMaresha, nemizalwane yendlu yabasebenza ilinen ecikizekileyo, yendlu ka-Ashbheya;
13_4_22_noYokim, namadoda aseKozebha, noYowashe, noSarafe (aba bazizikhulu kwaMowabhi), noYashubhi-lehem. Ke ezo zinto zezakudala.
13_4_23_Ngabo abo ababumbi nabemi baseNetayim neGedera; bahlala khona nokumkani emsebenzini wakhe.
13_4_24_Oonyana bakaSimon nguNemuweli, noYamin, noYaribhi, nguZera noSawule,
13_4_25_nguShalum unyana wakhe, nguMibhesam unyana wakhe, nguMishma unyana wakhe.
13_4_26_Oonyana bakaMishma nguHamuweli unyana wakhe, nguZakure unyana wakhe, nguShimehi unyana wakhe.
13_4_27_UShimehi ubenoonyana abalishumi elinabathandathu, neentombi ezintandathu; abazalwana bakhe ababanga nabantwana baninzi;  wonke umzalwane wabo awandanga njengonyana bakaYuda.
13_4_28_Bahlala eBher-shebha, naseMolada, naseHatsare-shuwali,
13_4_29_naseBhileha, nase-Etsem, naseToladi,
13_4_30_naseBhetuweli, naseHorma, naseTsikelage,
13_4_31_naseBhete-markabhoti, naseHatsarsusim, naseBhete-bhiri,  naseShaharayim. Yabiyiyo leyo imizi yabo, wada uDavide waba ngukumkani.
13_4_32_Nemizi yabo yiEtam neAyin, yiRimon neToken neAshan: izixeko ezihlanu;
13_4_33_nemizana yonke ebeyiyiphahlile loo mizi, kwesa kwaBhahali.  Zizo ezo iindawo zokuhlala kwabo, benokubhalelwa emilibeni yokuzalwa kwabo.
13_4_34_UMeshobhabhi, noYamleki, noYosha unyana ka-Amatsiya,
13_4_35_noYoweli, noYehu unyana kaYoshibhiya, unyana kaSeraya,  unyana ka-Asiyeli,
13_4_36_noEliyohenayi, noYahakobha, noYeshohaya, noAsaya,  noAdiyeli, noYesimiyeli, noBhenaya;
13_4_37_noZiza unyana kaShifi, unyana ka-Alon, unyana kaYedaya,  unyana kaShimri, unyana kaShemaya:
13_4_38_abo bakhankanyiweyo ngamagama ababezizikhulu emizalwaneni yabo. Izindlu zooyise zanaba kunene.
13_4_39_Baya entshonalanga kweGedore, bezisa empumalanga komfula,  beyifunela utyani impahla yabo emfutshane.
13_4_40_Bafumana utyani bukhulile, bubuhle; ilizwe libanzi ngeenxa zombini, lizolile, lonwabile; ngokuba abakaHam babemi khona kudala.
13_4_41_Beza abo babhaliweyo amagama ngemihla kaHezekiya ukumkani wakwaYuda, bazixhaxha iintente zabo, bawasingela phantsi namaMehun abawafumana khona, unanamhla. Bahlala ezikhundleni zabo; ngokuba bekukho utyani bempahla yabo emfutshane khona.
13_4_42_Kwaphuma kubo, koonyana bakaSimon abo, kwaya entabeni yaseSehire, amadoda angamakhulu amahlanu, ephethwe ngooPelatiya, noNehariya, noRefaya, noUziyeli, oonyana bakaIshi.
13_4_43_Baxabela amaqongqolo ama-Amaleki abesindile; bahlala khona unanamhla.
13_5_1_Oonyana bakaRubhen, amazibulo kaSirayeli (ngokuba ibinguye owamazibulo; ke ngokuwuhlambela kwakhe umandlalo kayise,  ubuzibulo bakhe banikwa oonyana bakaYosefu unyana kaSirayeli,  akaba nakubhalwa emilibeni yokuzalwa ukuba ngowamazibulo;
13_5_2_ngokuba uYuda waba ligorha phakathi kwabazalwana bakhe,  yaphuma kuye inganga; ke bona ubuzibulo bebubobukaYosefu):
13_5_3_oonyana bakaRubhen, amazibulo kaSirayeli, nguEnoki, noFalu,  nguHetseron, noKarmi.
13_5_4_Oonyana bakaYoweli nguShemaya unyana wakhe, nguGogi unyana wakhe, nguShimehi unyana wakhe,
13_5_5_nguMika unyana wakhe, nguRehaya unyana wakhe, nguBhahali unyana wakhe,
13_5_6_nguBhehera unyana wakhe, owafuduswa nguTigelate-pilenezere,  ukumkani waseAsiriya; nguye obesisikhulu samaRubhen.
13_5_7_Abazalwana bakhe, elowo ngokwemizalwane yakhe, ekubhalweni emilibeni yokuzalwa ngokweenzala zabo: iintloko ibingooYehiyeli noZekariya,
13_5_8_noBhela unyana ka-Azazi, unyana kaShema, unyana kaYoweli,  obehleli eArohere, wesa eNebho naseBhahali-mehon.
13_5_9_Wahlala ngasempumalanga, wesa entlango ethabathela emlanjeni ongumEfrati; ngokuba imfuyo yabo yayandile ezweni laseGiliyadi.
13_5_10_Ngemihla kaSawule benza imfazwe namaHagari; awela esandleni sabo. Bahlala ezintenteni zawo, ngecala lasempumalanga lonke laseGiliyadi.
13_5_11_Ke kaloku oonyana bakaGadi bahlala malungana nabo ezweni laseBhashan, besa eSaleka;
13_5_12_nguYoweli intloko, noShafam onganeno, noYanayi, noShafati eBhashan.
13_5_13_Nabazalwana babo bendlu yooyise ngooMikayeli, noMeshulam,  noShebha, noYorayi, noYakan, noZiya, noEbhere; basixhenxe abo.
13_5_14_Ngabo aba oonyana baka-Abhihayili, unyana kaHuri, unyana kaYarowa, unyana kaGiliyadi, unyana kaMikayeli, unyana kaYeshishayi, unyana kaYado, unyana kaBhuzi:
13_5_15_uAhi unyana ka-Abhediyeli, unyana kaGuni, intloko yendlu yooyise.
13_5_16_Bahlala eGiliyadi naseBhashan, nasemagxamesini ayo,  nasemadlelweni onke aseSharon, kwesa ekupheleni kwawo.
13_5_17_Bonke abo babhalwa emilibeni yokuzalwa ngemihla kaYotam ukumkani wakwaYuda, nangemihla kaYarobheham ukumkani wakwaSirayeli.
13_5_18_Oonyana bakaRubhen, namaGadi, nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, kumakroti, amadoda anokuphatha ingweletshetshe nekrele, nokugoba isaphetha, afundiswe ukulwa, ngamashumi amane anesine amawaka, anamakhulu asixhenxe, anamanci amathandathu,  abephuma umkhosi.
13_5_19_Benza imfazwe namaHagari, noYeture, noNafishe, noNodabhi.
13_5_20_Bancediswa kuwo, amaHagari anikelwa esandleni sabo, nabo bonke abebenawo. Ngokuba balila kuThixo ekulweni, wathandazeka ngabo; ngokuba babekholose ngaye.
13_5_21_Bayithimba imfuyo yawo, iinkamela zawo amashumi omahlanu amawaka, nempahla emfutshane amakhulu omabini anamanci mahlanu amawaka, namaesile amawaka amabini, abantu belikhulu lamawaka.
13_5_22_Ngokuba kwawa babaninzi ababuleweyo; ngokuba yayiphuma kuThixo imfazwe leyo. Bahlala ezikhundleni zabo, bada bathinjwa.
13_5_23_Ke kaloku oonyana besiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase bahlala kwelo zwe; bathabathela eBhashan, besa eBhahali-hermon,  naseSenire, nasentabeni yeHermon, ukuba baninzi kwabo.
13_5_24_Zizo ezi iintloko zezindlu zooyise: noEfere, noIshi,  noEliyeli, noAzeriyeli, noYeremiya, noHodaviya, noYadiyeli,  amadoda angamagorha anobukroti, amadoda anegama, iintloko zezindlu zooyise.
13_5_25_Bameneza kuThixo wooyise, bahenyuza ngokulandela oothixo bezizwe zelo zwe, awazitshabalalisayo uThixo phambi kwabo.
13_5_26_UThixo kaSirayeli wawuxhokonxa umoya kaPuli, ukumkani waseAsiriya, nomoya kaTigelate-pilenezere, ukumkani waseAsiriya, wawafudusa amaRubhen, namaGadi, nesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, wabasa eHala, naseHabhore, naseHara,  nasemlanjeni oyiGozan, unanamhla.
13_6_1_Oonyana bakaLevi nguGershon, noKehati, noMerari.
13_6_2_Oonyana bakaKehati nguAmram, noItsare, noHebron, noUziyeli.
13_6_3_Abantwana baka-Amram ngooAron, noMoses, noMiriyam. Oonyana baka-Aron ngooNadabhi, noAbhihu, nguElazare, noItamare.
13_6_4_UElazare wazala uPinehasi, uPinehasi wazala uAbhishuwa;
13_6_5_uAbhishuwa wazala uBhuki; uBhuki wazala u-Uzi;
13_6_6_u-Uzi wazala uZeraya; uZeraya wazala uMerayoti;
13_6_7_uMerayoti wazala uAmariya; uAmariya wazala uAhitobhi;
13_6_8_uAhitobhi wazala uTsadoki; uTsadoki wazala uAhimahatse;
13_6_9_uAhimahatse wazala uAzariya; uAzariya wazala uYohanan;
13_6_10_uYohanan wazala uAzariya, (yena ke ebengumbingeleli endlwini awayakhayo uSolomon eYerusalem);
13_6_11_uAzariya wazala uAmariya; uAmariya wazala uAhitubhi;
13_6_12_uAhitubhi wazala uTsadoki uTsadoki wazala uShalum;
13_6_13_uShalum wazala uHilekiya; uHilekiya wazala uAzariya;
13_6_14_uAzariya wazala uSeraya; uSeraya wazala uYotsadaki;
13_6_15_uYotsadaki wahamba, akuwafudusa uYehova amaYuda neYerusalem ngoNebhukadenetsare.
13_6_16_Oonyana bakaLevi nguGershom, noKehati, noMerari.
13_6_17_Ngawo la amagama oonyana bakaGershom: nguLibheni noShimehi.
13_6_18_Oonyana bakaKehati nguAmram, noItsare, noHebron, noUziyeli.
13_6_19_Oonyana bakaMerari nguMaheli noMushi. Yiyo ke leyo imizalwane kaLevi, ngokwezindlu zooyise.
13_6_20_KuGershom: nguLibheni unyana wakhe, nguYahati unyana wakhe,  nguZima unyana wakhe,
13_6_21_nguYowa unyana wakhe, nguIdo unyana wakhe, nguZera unyana wakhe, nguYehatrayi unyana wakhe.
13_6_22_Oonyana bakaKehati nguAminadabhi unyana wakhe, nguKora unyana wakhe, nguAsire unyana wakhe,
13_6_23_nguElikana unyana wakhe, noEbhiyasefu unyana wakhe, noAsire unyana wakhe,
13_6_24_nguTahati unyana wakhe, ngu-Uriyeli unyana wakhe, ngu-Uziya unyana wakhe, nguSawule unyana wakhe.
13_6_25_Oonyana bakaElikana nguAmasayi noAhimoti.
13_6_26_KuElikana: oonyana bakaElikana nguTsofayi unyana wakhe,  noNahati unyana wakhe,
13_6_27_nguEliyabhi unyana wakhe, nguYoram unyana wakhe, nguElikana unyana wakhe.
13_6_28_Oonyana bakaSamuweli nguVashni amazibulo akhe, noAbhiya.
13_6_29_Oonyana bakaMerari nguMaheli, nguLibheni unyana wakhe,  nguShimehi unyana wakhe, ngu-Uza unyana wakhe,
13_6_30_nguShimeha unyana wakhe, nguHagiya unyana wakhe, nguAsaya unyana wakhe.
13_6_31_Aba ngabo wabaphathisayo uDavide ingoma endlwini kaYehova,  kususela koko yaphumlayo ityeya.
13_6_32_Balungiselela ngengoma phambi komnquba oyintente yokuhlangana, wada uSolomon wayakha indlu kaYehova eYerusalem;  bema ngokwesiko labo enkonzweni yabo.
13_6_33_Aba ngabo bema noonyana babo. Kubo oonyana bakaKehati nguHeman imvumi, unyana kaYoweli, unyana kaShemuweli,
13_6_34_unyana kaElikana, unyana kaYeroham, unyana kaEliyeli,  unyana kaToha,
13_6_35_unyana kaTsufi, unyana kaElikana, unyana kaMahati, unyana ka-Amasayi,
13_6_36_unyana kaElikana, unyana kaYoweli, unyana ka-Azariya,  unyana kaZefaniya,
13_6_37_unyana kaTahati, unyana ka-Asire, unyana ka-Abhiyasefu,  unyana kaKora,
13_6_38_unyana kaItsare, unyana kaKehati, unyana kaLevi, unyana kaSirayeli.
13_6_39_Ke umzalwana wakhe uAsafu wema ngasekunene kwakhe: uAsafu unyana kaBherekiya, unyana kaShimeha,
13_6_40_unyana kaMikayeli, unyana kaBhahaseya, unyana kaMalekiya,
13_6_41_unyana kaEteni, unyana kaZera, unyana ka-Adaya,
13_6_42_unyana kaEtan, unyana kaZima, unyana kaShimehi,
13_6_43_unyana kaYahati, unyana kaGershom, unyana kaLevi.
13_6_44_Abazalwana babo, oonyana bakaMerari, bema ngasekhohlo:  uEtan unyana kaKishi, unyana ka-Abhedi, unyana kaMuluki,
13_6_45_unyana kaHashabhiya, unyana ka-Amatsiya, unyana kaHilekiya,
13_6_46_unyana ka-Amtsi, unyana kaBhani, unyana kaShemere,
13_6_47_unyana kaMaheli, unyana kaMushi, unyana kaMerari, unyana kaLevi.
13_6_48_Abazalwana babo, abaLevi, babemiselwe umsebenzi wonke womnquba wendlu kaThixo.
13_6_49_Ke uAron noonyana bakhe babeqhumisela esibingelelweni sedini elinyukayo, nasesibingelelweni sesiqhumiso,  bengabomsebenzi wonke wengcwele kangcwele, bacamagushele amaSirayeli, ngokoko konke wawisa umthetho ngako uMoses,  umkhonzi kaThixo.
13_6_50_Ngabo aba oonyana baka-Aron: nguElazare unyana wakhe,  nguPinehasi unyana wakhe, nguAbhishuwa unyana wakhe,
13_6_51_nguBhuki unyana wakhe, ngu-Uzi unyana wakhe, nguZeraya unyana wakhe,
13_6_52_nguMerayoti unyana wakhe, nguAmariya unyana wakhe,  nguAhitubhi unyana wakhe,
13_6_53_nguTsadoki unyana wakhe, nguAhimahatse unyana wakhe.
13_6_54_Ngawo la amakhaya abo ngokweengqili zabo, emideni yabo,  ezoonyana baka-Aron, ngokwemizalwane kaKehati; ngokuba laba lelabo iqashiso:
13_6_55_babanika owaseHebron ezweni lakwaYuda, namadlelo awo ngeenxa zonke;
13_6_56_ke wona amasimi omzi lowo nemizana yawo bawanika uKalebhi,  unyana kaYefune.
13_6_57_Babanika oonyana baka-Aron imizi yokusabela: owaseHebron,  neLibhena namadlelo ayo, neYatire, ne-Eshtemowa; namadlelo ayo,
13_6_58_neHilen namadlelo ayo, neDebhire namadlelo ayo,
13_6_59_neAshan namadlelo ayo, neBhete-shemeshe namadlelo ayo.
13_6_60_Esizweni sakwaBhenjamin: iGebha namadlelo ayo, neAlemete namadlelo ayo, neAnatoti namadlelo ayo. Yonke imizi yabo ngokwemizalwane yabo yabe iyimizi elishumi elinamithathu.
13_6_61_Oonyana bakaKehati abaseleyo banikwa emzalwaneni wesizwe sakwaEfrayim, nasesizweni sakwaDan, nasesiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase, ngeqashiso imizi elishumi.
13_6_62_Oonyana bakaGershom ngokwemizalwane yabo banikwa esizweni sakwaIsakare, nasesizweni sakwa-Ashere, nasesizweni sakwaNafetali, nasesizweni sakwaManase eBhashan, imizi yalishumi elinamithathu.
13_6_63_Oonyana bakaMerari ngokwemizalwane yabo banikwa esizweni sakwaRubhen, nasesizweni sakwaGadi, nasesizweni sakwaZebhulon,  ngeqashiso imizi elishumi elinamibini.
13_6_64_Oonyana bakaSirayeli babanika abaLevi imizi namadlelo ayo.
13_6_65_Babanika ngeqashiso esizweni soonyana bakaYuda, nasesizweni soonyana bakaSimon, nasesizweni soonyana bakaBhenjamin, yona le mizi ibiziweyo ngamagama ayo.
13_6_66_Ke emizalwaneni yoonyana bakaKehati kwabakho imizi yemida yabo esizweni sakwaEfrayim.
13_6_67_Babanika imizi yokusabela: owakwaShekem namadlelo awo ezintabeni zakwaEfrayim, neGezere namadlelo ayo,
13_6_68_neYokemeham namadlelo ayo, neBhete-horon namadlelo ayo;
13_6_69_neAyalon namadlelo ayo, neGati-rimon namadlelo ayo;
13_6_70_nasesiqingatheni sesizwe sakwaManase: iAnere namadlelo ayo,  neBhileham namadlelo ayo, ngokomzalwane woonyana bakaKehati abaseleyo.
13_6_71_Oonyana bakaGershom banikwa emzalwaneni wesiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase: iGolan yaseBhashan namadlelo ayo,  neAshtaroti namadlelo ayo;
13_6_72_nasesizweni sakwaIsakare: iKedeshe namadlelo ayo,  neDabherati namadlelo ayo,
13_6_73_neRamoti namadlelo ayo, neAnem namadlelo ayo;
13_6_74_nasesizweni sakwa-Ashere: iMashale namadlelo ayo, neAbhedon namadlelo ayo,
13_6_75_neHukoki namadlelo ayo, neRehobhi namadlelo ayo;
13_6_76_nasesizweni sakwaNafetali: iKedeshe yaseGalili namadlelo ayo, neHamon namadlelo ayo, neKiriyatayim namadlelo ayo.
13_6_77_Abaseleyo kubaLevi koonyana bakaMerari banikwa esizweni sakwaZebhulon: iRimono namadlelo ayo, neTabhore namadlelo ayo;
13_6_78_naphesheya kweYordan ngaseYeriko, ngasempumalanga kweYordan esizweni sakwaRubhen: iBhetsere esentlango namadlelo ayo,  neYatsa namandlelo ayo,
13_6_79_neKedemoti namadlelo ayo, neMefahata namadlelo ayo;
13_6_80_nasesizweni sakwaGadi: iRamoti yaseGiliyadi namadlelo ayo,  neMahanayim namadlelo ayo,
13_6_81_neHeshbhon namadlelo ayo, neYazere namadlelo ayo.
13_7_1_Oonyana bakaIsakare nguTola, noPuwa, noYashubhi, noShimron;  babebane.
13_7_2_Oonyana bakaTola ngu-Uzi, noRefaya, noYeriyeli, noYamayi,  noIbhesam, noSamuweli, iintloko zezindlu zooyise zikaTola;  amagorha anobukroti, ngokweenzala zawo. Inani lawo ngemihla kaDavide laba ngamashumi amabini anamabini amawaka, anamakhulu amathandathu.
13_7_3_Oonyana bakaUzi nguIzerahiya. Noonyana bakaIzerahiya nguMikayeli, no-Obhadiya, noYoweli, noIshiya; babebahlanu,  beziintloko bonke.
13_7_4_Ndawonye nabo ngokweenzala zabo, ngokwezindlu zooyise,  kwakukho izimpi zomkhosi wokulwa, amashumi amathathu anamathandathu amawaka; ngokuba babenabafazi noonyana abaninzi.
13_7_5_Abazalwana babo, ngokwemizalwane yonke yakwaIsakare,  amagorha anobukroti, baye bengamashumi asibhozo anesixhenxe amawaka, ukubhalwa kwabo emilibeni yabo yokuzalwa bebonke.
13_7_6_Oonyana bakaBhenjamin nguBhela, noBhekere, noYedihayeli;  bebebathathu.
13_7_7_Oonyana bakaBhela nguEtsebhon, noUzi, noUziyeli, noYerimoti,  noIri; baye bebahlanu, iintloko zezindlu zooyise, amagorha anobukroti; ngokubhalwa kwabo emilibeni yokuzalwa babengamashumi amabini anamabini amawaka, anamanci mathathu anesine.
13_7_8_Oonyana bakaBhekere nguZemira, noYowashe, noEliyezere,  noEliyohenayi, no-Omri, noYeremoti, noAbhiya, noAnatoti,  noAlamete; bonke abo ngoonyana bakaBhekere;
13_7_9_ngokubhalwa kwabo emilibeni yokuzalwa ngokweenzala zabo zeentloko zezindlu zooyise, amagorha anobukroti, babengamashumi amabini amawaka, anamakhulu amabini.
13_7_10_Oonyana bakaYedihayeli nguBhilehan. Oonyana bakaBhilehan nguYehushe, noBhenjamin, noEhudi, noKenahana, noZetan,  noTarshishe, noAhishahare.
13_7_11_Bonke abo babengoonyana bakaYedihayeli, ngokweentloko zezindlu zooyise, amagorha anobukroti, alishumi elinesixhenxe lamawaka, anamakhulu mabini, aphuma umkhosi aye kulwa.
13_7_12_OoShupim noHupim ngoonyana bakaIre; ooHushim ngoonyana baka-Ahere.
13_7_13_Oonyana bakaNafetali nguYatsiyeli, noGuni, noYetsere,  noShalum, oonyana bakaBhiliha.
13_7_14_Oonyana bakaManase nguAsheriyeli, awamzalelwayo. Ishweshwe lakhe, umAramikazi, lazala uMakire, uyise kaGiliyadi.
13_7_15_UMakire wazeka udade booHupim noShupim; igama lodade wabo belinguMahaka; igama lowesibini belinguTselofehadi; ke uTselofehadi ubeneentombi.
13_7_16_UMahaka umkaMakire wazala unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguPereshe; igama lomninawa wakhe belinguShereshe; oonyana bakhe ngu-Ulam noRekem.
13_7_17_Oonyana bakaUlam nguBhedan. Ngabo abo oonyana bakaGiliyadi,  unyana kaMakire, unyana kaManase.
13_7_18_Udade wabo, uHamolekete, wazala uIshodi, noAbhihezere,  noMahala.
13_7_19_Oonyana bakaShemida babengooAhiyan, noShekem, noLiki,  noAniyam.
13_7_20_Oonyana bakaEfrayim nguShutela, noBherede unyana wakhe,  noTahati, unyana wakhe, noEliyada unyana wakhe, noTahati unyana wakhe,
13_7_21_noZabhadi unyana wakhe, noShutela unyana wakhe, noEzere,  noEladi; abababulalayo abantu bakwaGati, ababezalelwe kwelo zwe; ngokuba babehle beza kuthabatha imihlambi yabo.
13_7_22_Wenza isijwili uEfrayim, uyise, imihla emininzi, beza kumkhuza abazalwana bakhe.
13_7_23_Wamngena umfazi wakhe; wakhawula, wazala unyana, wathi igama lakhe nguBheriya; ngokuba bekuhle ububi endlwini yakhe.
13_7_24_Intombi yakhe ibinguShera; yayakha iBhete-horon,  eyasezantsi neyasentla, neUzen-shera.
13_7_25_URefa ebengunyana wakhe, noReshefe; uTela ngunyana wakhe,  noTahan unyana wakhe,
13_7_26_uLadan unyana wakhe, uAmihudi unyana wakhe, uElishama unyana wakhe,
13_7_27_uNun unyana wakhe, uYoshuwa unyana wakhe.
13_7_28_Ke kaloku ilifa labo, namakhaya abo, yiBheteli namagxamesi ayo; ngasempumalanga yiNaharan; ngasentshonalanga yiGezere namagxamesi ayo, nowakwaShekem namagxamesi awo, kwesa eGaza namagxamesi ayo.
13_7_29_Esezandleni zoonyana bakaManase yiBhete-shehan namagxamesi ayo, yiTahanaki namagxamesi ayo, yiMegido namagxamesi ayo,  yiDore namagxamesi ayo. Kulapho kwakumi oonyana bakaYosefu,  unyana kaSirayeli.
13_7_30_Oonyana baka-Ashere nguImna, noIshwa, noIshevi, noBheriya,  noSera udade wabo.
13_7_31_Oonyana bakaBheriya nguHebhere, noMalekiyeli, onguyise kaBhirzaviti.
13_7_32_UHebhere wazala uYafelete, noShomere, noHotam, noShuwa udade wabo.
13_7_33_Oonyana bakaYafelete nguPasaki, noBhimhali, noAshevati.  Ngabo abo oonyana bakaYafelete.
13_7_34_Oonyana bakaShemere nguAhi, noRoga, noYehubha, noAram.
13_7_35_Oonyana bakaHelem umzalwana wakhe nguTsofa, noImna,  noSheleshe, noAmali.
13_7_36_Oonyana bakaTsofa nguSuwa, noHarenefere, noShuwali,  noBheri, noImra,
13_7_37_nguBhetsere noHodi, noShama, noShilesha, noItran,  noBhehera.
13_7_38_Oonyana bakaYetere nguYefune, noPisepa, noAra.
13_7_39_Oonyana bakaUla nguAra, noHaniyeli, noRitsiya.
13_7_40_Bonke abo babengoonyana baka-Ashere: iintloko zezindlu zooyise, amagorha ahleliweyo anobukroti, iintloko zezikhulu.  Ukubhalwa kwabo emilibeni yokuzalwa kwasemkhosini, ukuba balwe,  babengamadoda angamashumi omabini anamathandathu amawaka, inani lawo.
13_8_1_UBhenjamin wazala uBhela amazi bulo akhe, noAshebhele owesibini, noAhara owesithathu,
13_8_2_uNoha owesine, noRafa owesihlanu.
13_8_3_Oonyana bakaBhela babengooAdare, noGera, noAbhihudi,
13_8_4_noAbhishuwa, noNahaman, noAhowa,
13_8_5_noGera, noShefufan, noHuram.
13_8_6_Ngabo abo oonyana bakaEhudi, abo baziintloko zezindlu zooyise kubemi baseGebha; babafudusela eManahati:
13_8_7_nguNahaman, noAhiya, noGera, owabafudusayo; uEhudi wazala u-Uza noAhihudi.
13_8_8_UShaharayim wazala emhlabeni wakwaMowabhi emveni kokubandulula wakhe ooHushim noBhahara, abafazi bakhe;
13_8_9_wazala ngoHodeshe umkakhe: uYobhabhi, noTsibheya, noMesha,  noMalekom,
13_8_10_noYehutse, noShakiya, noMirma. Ngabo abo oonyana bakhe,  iintloko zezindlu zooyise.
13_8_11_NgoHushim wazala uAbhitubhi noEliphahali.
13_8_12_Oonyana bakaElipahali: nguEbhere, noMisham, noShemere,  owayakhayo iOno, neLodi namagxamesi ayo.
13_8_13_NgooBheriya noShema abaziintloko zezindlu zooyise kubemi baseAyalon, abagxotha abemi baseGati.
13_8_14_OoAhiyo, noShashaki, noYeremoti,
13_8_15_noZebhadiya, noAradi, noEdere,
13_8_16_noMikayeli, noIshpa, noYoha babengoonyana bakaBheriya.
13_8_17_OoZebhadiya, noMeshulam, noHizeki, noHebhere,
13_8_18_noIshmerayi, noYeziliya, noYobhabi babengoonyana bakaElepahali.
13_8_19_OoYakim, noZikri, noZabhedi.
13_8_20_noElihenayi, noTsiletayi, noEliyeli,
13_8_21_noAdaya, noBheraya, noShimrati babengoonyana bakaShimehi.
13_8_22_OoIshpan, noEbhere, noEliyeli,
13_8_23_noAbhedon, noZikri, noHanan,
13_8_24_noHananiya, noElam, noAntotiya,
13_8_25_noIfediya, noPenuweli babengoonyana bakaShashaki.
13_8_26_OoShamesherayi, noShehariya, noAtaliya,
13_8_27_noYareshiya, noEliya, noZikri babengoonyana bakaYeroham.
13_8_28_Zizo ezo iintloko zezindlu zooyise ngokweenzala zazo;  ziintloko ke ezo; ezo zahlala eYerusalem.
13_8_29_EGibheyon kwahlala ozala amaGibheyon, uYehiyeli; igama lomkakhe belinguMahaka.
13_8_30_NguAbhedon unyana wakhe wamazibulo, noTsure, noKishe,  noBhahali, noNadabhi,
13_8_31_noGedore, noAhiyo, noZekere.
13_8_32_UMikeloti wazala uShimeha. Nabo bahlala eYerusalem nabazalwana babo, malungana nabazalwana babo.
13_8_33_UNere wazala uKishe; uKishe wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala uYonatan, noMalekishuwa, noAbhinadabhi, noEshbhahali.
13_8_34_Unyana kaYonatan nguMeribhi-bhahali; uMeribhi-bhahali wazala uMika.
13_8_35_Oonyana bakaMika nguPiton, noMeleki, noTareya, noAhazi.
13_8_36_UAhazi wazala uYehowada; uYehowada wazala uAlemete,  noAzemavete, noZimri; uZimri wazala uMotsa;
13_8_37_uMotsa wazala uBhineha. NguRafa unyana wakhe, nguElehasa unyana wakhe, nguAtsele unyana wakhe.
13_8_38_UAtsele ebenoonyana abathandathu; ngawo la amagama abo;  nguAzerikam, nguBhokeru, noIshmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obhadiya,  noHanan. Bonke abo babengoonyana baka-Atsele.
13_8_39_Oonyana bakaEsheki, umzalwana wakhe, ngu-Ulam amazibulo akhe, nguYehushe owesibini, nguElifelete owesithathu.
13_8_40_Oonyana bakaUlam babengamadoda angamagorha anobukroti,  abagoba isaphetha; babenoonyana abaninzi, noonyana boonyana,  ikhulu elinamanci mahlanu. Bonke abo babengaboonyana bakaBhenjamin.
13_9_1_Onke ke amaSirayeli abhalwa emilibeni yokuzalwa: nango ke ebhaliwe encwadini yookumkani bakwaSirayeli. AmaYuda athinjwa,  asiwa eBhabheli ngenxa yokumeneza kwawo.
13_9_2_Abemi bokuqala, ababesemafeni abo emizini yabo,  babengamaSirayeli, ababingeleli, nabaLevi, nabasebenza etempileni.
13_9_3_EYerusalem kwahlala aboonyana bakaYuda, naboonyana bakaBhenjamin, naboonyana booEfrayim noManase:
13_9_4_ngu-Utayi, unyana ka-Amihudi, unyana kaOmri, unyana kaImri,  unyana kaBhani, koonyana bakaPeretse, unyana kaYuda.
13_9_5_NakumaShilo: nguAzaya amazibulo akhe, noonyana bakhe.
13_9_6_Koonyana bakaZera nguYehuweli nabazalwana bakhe: amakhulu amathandathu anamanci asithoba.
13_9_7_Koonyana bakaBhenjamin: nguSalu unyana kaMeshulam, unyana kaHodafiya, unyana kaHasenuwa,
13_9_8_noIbheneya unyana kaYeroham, noEla unyana kaUzi, unyana kaMikri, noMeshulam unyana kaShefatiya, unyana kaRehuweli,  unyana kaIbheniya;
13_9_9_nabazalwana babo ngokweenzala zabo: amakhulu asithoba anamanci mahlanu anabathandathu. Onke loo madoda abeziintloko zezindlu zooyise ezindlwini zooyise.
13_9_10_Kubabingeleli: nguYedaya, noYehoyaribhi, noYakin,
13_9_11_noAzariya, unyana kaHilekiya, unyana kaMeshulam, unyana kaTsadoki, unyana kaMerayoti, unyana ka-Ahitubhi, inganga yendlu kaThixo;
13_9_12_noAdaya, unyana kaYeroham, unyana kaPashure, unyana kaMalekiya; noMahasayi unyana ka-Adiyeli, unyana kaYazera,  unyana kaMeshulam, unyana; kaMeshilemiti, unyana kaImere;
13_9_13_nabazalwana babo, iintloko zezindlu zooyise, iwaka elinamakhulu asixhenxe, anamanci mathandathu amagorha anobukroti ekuwusebenzeni umsebenzi wendlu kaThixo.
13_9_14_KubaLevi: nguShemaya, unyana kaHashubhi, unyana ka-Azerikam, unyana kaHashabhiya koonyana bakaMerari;
13_9_15_nguBhakebhakare, noHereshe, noGalali; noMataniya unyana kaMika, unyana kaZikri, unyana ka-Asafu;
13_9_16_no-Obhadiya, unyana kaShemaya, unyana kaGalali, unyana kaYedutun; noBherekiya unyana ka-Asa, unyana kaElikana,  obehleli emizaneni yamaNetofa.
13_9_17_Abamasango: nguShalum, noAkubhi, noTalemon, noAhiman,  nabazalwana babo; intloko inguShalum;
13_9_18_kude kwaba namhla esesangweni lokumkani empumalanga. Ngabo abo abamasango eminqubeni yoonyana bakaLevi.
13_9_19_UShalum, unyana kaKore, unyana kaEbhiyasafu, unyana kaKora,  nabazalwana bakhe ngokwendlu yooyise, amaKora, ayephethe umsebenzi wenkonzo, engabagcini beminyango yentente. Nooyise bawo babephethe iminquba kaYehova, begcina isango.
13_9_20_UPinehasi, unyana kaElazare, waye eyinganga yabo ngenxa engaphambili; uYehova wayenaye.
13_9_21_UZekariya unyana kaMeshelemiya wayengowesango ekungeneni kwentente yokuhlangana.
13_9_22_Bonke bephela, behleliwe ukuba babe ngabagcini bamasango,  babengamakhulu amabini, anashumi-nye linababini. Bona babebhalwe emilibeni yabo yokuzalwa emizaneni yabo. Bona bamiswa nguDavide noSamuweli imboni, ngokunyaniseka kwabo.
13_9_23_Bona abo noonyana babo babesemasangweni endlu kaYehova,  endlu yentente, ngokokugcina.
13_9_24_Babekho abamasango ngamacala omane, ngasempumalanga,  ngasentshonalanga, ngasentla, nangasezantsi.
13_9_25_Abazalwana babo emizaneni yabo babengabokuza ngomhla wesixhenxe amaxesha ngamaxesha kunye nabo.
13_9_26_Ngokuba abaLevi abo, abaphathi abakhulu abane ababengabamasango, babephethe amagumbi nobuncwane bendlu kaThixo benyanisile.
13_9_27_Ukulala, babeyijikeleza indlu kaThixo; ngokuba ukugcina bekukokwabo, kunabo ukuyivula imiso ngemiso.
13_9_28_Kubo bekukho abaphethe iimpahla zenkonzo; ngokuba babezingenisa ngenani, bazikhuphe ngenani.
13_9_29_Kubo bekukho abamiselwe phezu kwempahla, naphezu kwempahla yonke engcwele, naphezu komgubo ocoliweyo, newayini, neoli,  nentlaka emhlophe, nobulawu.
13_9_30_Koonyana bababingeleli bekukho abacola ubuqholo bobulawu.
13_9_31_UMatitiya, omnye wakubaLevi, obengowamazibulo kaShalum umKora, ubephethe enyanisekile umsebenzi wokosa ngeepani.
13_9_32_Koonyana bakaKehati, kubazalwana babo, bekukho ababephethe izonka ezikroziswayo, ukuzilungisa iisabatha ngeesabatha.
13_9_33_Zizo ezo iimvumi, iintloko zezindlu zooyise zabaLevi, ezibe zihleli emagumbini zikhululekile; ngokuba beziphethe umsebenzi imini nobusuku.
13_9_34_Zizo ezo iintloko zezindlu zooyise zabaLevi, ziziintloko ngokweenzala zazo, ezo zahlala eYerusalem.
13_9_35_EGibheyon kwakuhleli ozala amaGibheyon, uYehiyeli; igama lomkakhe belinguMahaka.
13_9_36_Unyana wakhe wamazibulo nguAbhedon, yanguTsure, noKishe,  noBhahali, noNere, noNadabhi,
13_9_37_noGedore, noAhiyo, noZekariya, noMikeloti.
13_9_38_UMikeloti wazala uShimeham. Kwanabo bahlala nabazalwana babo eYerusalem, malunga nabazalwana babo.
13_9_39_UNere wazala uKishe; uKishe wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala uYonatan, noMalekishuwa, noAbhinadabhi, noEshbhahali.
13_9_40_Unyana kaYonatan nguMeribhi-bhahali; uMeribhi-bhahali wazala uMika.
13_9_41_Oonyana bakaMika nguPiton, noMeleki, noTareya, noAhazi.
13_9_42_UAhazi wazala uYara; uYara wazala uAlemete, noAzemavete,  noZimri; uZimri wazala uMotsa.
13_9_43_UMotsa wazala uBhineha, noRefaya unyana wakhe, uElehasa unyana wakhe, uAtsele unyana wakhe.
13_9_44_UAtsele ubenoonyana abathandathu; ngawo la amagama abo:  nguAzerikam, noBhokeru, noIshmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obhadiya,  noHanan. Ngabo abo oonyana baka-Atsele.
13_10_1_Ke kaloku amaFilisti alwa namaSirayeli; asaba amadoda akwaSirayeli phambi kwamaFilisti, awa engxwelerhiwe ezintabeni zaseGilibhowa.
13_10_2_AmaFilisti athana mbende noSawule noonyana bakhe.  AmaFilisti ambulala uYonatan, noAbhinadabhi, noMalekishuwa,  oonyana bakaSawule.
13_10_3_Yanzima imfazwe kuSawule. Bamfumana abatoli, wathuthumela ngenxa yabatoli.
13_10_4_Wathi uSawule kumphathi weentonga zakhe, Rhola ikrele lakho, undihlabe ngalo, hleze beze aba bangalukileyo, bafekethe ngam. Akavuma umphathi weentonga zakhe, ngokuba ubesoyika kakhulu. Walithabatha uSawule ikrele, waziwisa phezu kwalo.
13_10_5_Uthe umphathi weentonga zakhe, akubona ukuba ufile uSawule,  waziwisa naye phezu kwekrele lakhe, wafa.
13_10_6_Wafa ke uSawule, noonyana bakhe abathathu, nendlu yakhe yonke; bafa kunye.
13_10_7_Athi onke amadoda akwaSirayeli abesentilini leyo, akubona ukuba kusatyiwe, ukuba ufile uSawule noonyana bakhe, ayilahla imizi yawo, asaba; eza ke amaFilisti, ahlala kuyo.
13_10_8_Kwathi ngengomso, amaFilisti eza kubhunyula ababuleweyo,  amfumana uSawule noonyana bakhe bewile ezintabeni zaseGilibhowa.
13_10_9_Ambhunyula, ayisusa intloko yakhe neentonga zakhe, athumela ezweni lamaFilisti ngeenxa zonke, ukuba aluxele olu daba lumnandi kwizithixo zabo nasebantwini.
13_10_10_Azibeka iintonga zakhe endlwini yezithixo zawo, ukakayi lwakhe alubethelela endlwini kaDagon.
13_10_11_Beva bonke abaseYabheshe yaseGiliyadi konke awakwenzayo amaFilisti kuSawule,
13_10_12_esuka onke amadoda anobukroti, asithwala isidumbu sikaSawule nezidumbu zoonyana bakhe, azizisa eYabheshe.  Awangcwaba amathambo abo phantsi komterebhinti eYabheshe, azila ukudla imihla yasixhenxe.
13_10_13_Wafa ke uSawule ngokumeneza kwakhe, awameneza ngako kuYehova, ezwini likaYehova angaligcinanga; kwanangokubuzisa kwakhe koneshologu, ngokuquqela kuye,
13_10_14_akaquqela kuYehova; wambulala ke, wabuguqulela ubukumkani kuDavide unyana kaYese.
13_11_1_Abuthelana ke onke amaSirayeli kuDavide eHebron, athi,  Uyabona, silithambo lakho, siyinyama yakho;
13_11_2_kwangaphambili, oko uSawule ebengukumkani, ibinguwe obuphuma ungena namaSirayeli; wathi uYehova uThixo wakho kuwe,  Wena uya kubalusa abantu bam amaSirayeli; wena uya kuba yinganga yabantu bam amaSirayeli.
13_11_3_Afika onke amadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli kukumkani eHebron,  wenza umnqophiso nawo uDavide eHebron, phambi koYehova;  amthambisa uDavide ukuba abe ngukumkani kumaSirayeli,  ngokwelizwi likaYehova ngesandla sikaSamuweli.
13_11_4_Wahamba uDavide namaSirayeli onke, waya eYerusalem (yiYebhusi ke leyo), apho abekhona amaYebhusi, abemi belo zwe.
13_11_5_Bathi abemi beYebhusi kuDavide, Akusayi kungena apha.  Wayithimba uDavide imboniselo yeZiyon (ngumzi kaDavide ke lowo).
13_11_6_Wathi uDavide, Owaxabele amaYebhusi kwasentloko, woba yintloko nomthetheli. Wenyuka kwasentloko uYowabhi unyana kaTseruya, waba yintloko ke.
13_11_7_UDavide wahlala emboniselweni apho; ngenxa yoko bathi ngumzi kaDavide.
13_11_8_Wawakha umzi, wajikelezisa ngeenxa zonke, wathabathela eMilo, wajikelezisa. UYowabhi wawasindisa amaqongqolo aloo mzi.
13_11_9_UDavide waya eba mkhulu ngokuba mkhulu; uYehova wemikhosi ubenaye.
13_11_10_Zizo ezi iintloko zamagorha abekuDavide, esomelezana naye ebukumkanini bakhe kunye namaSirayeli onke, ukuba amenze ukumkani, ngokwelizwi likaYehova kumaSirayeli.
13_11_11_Lilo eli inani lamagorha kaDavide: nguYashobheham unyana kaHakimoni, intloko yabaphathi-mikhosi. Yena wathi rhuthu intshuntshe yakhe kumakhulu amathathu, awahlatywayo ngasihlandlo sinye.
13_11_12_Emva kwakhe nguElazare unyana kaDodo, umAhowa,  owayengomnye kumagorha amathathu.
13_11_13_Yena wayenoDavide ePas-damim; amaFilisti ayebuthelene khona ukuba alwe. Kwakukho khona isiqwenga somhlaba, sinerhasi ichumile; basaba abantu ebusweni bamaFilisti.
13_11_14_Wesuka yena wamisa esazulwini sesiqwenga eso, wasithimba,  yena wawabulala amaFilisti; uYehova wenza ke usindiso olukhulu.
13_11_15_Kwehla isithathu sabaziintloko emashumini amathathu, saya kuDavide eweni, emqolombeni waseAdulam; yaye impi yamaFilisti imise iintente entilini yamaRafa.
13_11_16_UDavide oko ubesemboniselweni apho; ikampu yamaFilisti oko ibiseBhetelehem.
13_11_17_Wanqwena uDavide wathi, Akwaba, bethu, bendingasezwa amanzi equla laseBhetelehem elisesangweni!
13_11_18_Atyhudisa empini yamaFilisti amadoda amathathu lawo, akha amanzi equleni laseBhetelehem elisesangweni, awathwala awazisa kuDavide. Akavuma ke uDavide ukuwasela; wawathululela phantsi,  phambi koYehova,
13_11_19_wathi, Makube lee kum, Thixo wam, ukwenza oko. Igazi lala madoda, eliyimiphefumlo yawo, ndolisela yini na? ngokuba awazisa encame imiphefumlo yawo. Akavuma ke ukuwasela. Enza ezo zinto amagorha lawo mathathu.
13_11_20_UAbhishayi, umninawa kaYowabhi, yena waye eyintloko yamathathu. Yena wathi rhuthu intshuntshe yakhe kumakhulu amathathu, wabinza. Waba negama ke kulawo mathathu.
13_11_21_Kulawo mathathu wayezukile kunamabini, waba ngumthetheli wawo ke; akafika kodwa kulawa mathathu.
13_11_22_UBhenaya unyana kaYoyada, unyana wendoda enobukroti yaseKabhetseli, ezenzo zininzi, yena wabulala iingwanyalala ezimbini zakwaMowabhi; yena wehla, wabulala ingonyama emhadini phakathi, mhla ngekhephu.
13_11_23_Yena wabulala indoda engumYiputa, indoda enewonga,  ekubhite zintlanu; umYiputa lowo ephethe intshuntshe enjengomthi wabaluki beengubo. Wehla ke waya kuyo ephethe intonga, wayihlutha intshuntshe esandleni somYiputa lowo,  wambulala kwangentshuntshe yakhe.
13_11_24_Wenza ezo zinto uBhenaya unyana kaYoyada; waba negama ke kwisithathu eso samagorha.
13_11_25_Yabona, wayezukile yena kunamashumi amathathu lawo; kodwa akafika kwamathathu lawa. UDavide wammisa ephakathini lakhe.
13_11_26_Amagorha anobukroti ayengooAsaheli, umninawa kaYowabhi;  uElihanan, unyana kaDodo, waseBhetelehem;
13_11_27_uShamoti waseHarodi; uHeletse umPelon;
13_11_28_uIra unyana kaIkeshe, waseTekowa; uAbhihezere waseAnatoti;
13_11_29_uSibhekayi umHusha; uIlayi umAhowa;
13_11_30_uMaharayi waseNetofa; uHelede unyana kaBhahana,  waseNetofa;
13_11_31_uItayi unyana kaRibhayi, waseGibheha yoonyana bakaBhenjamin; uBhenaya wasePiraton;
13_11_32_uHurayi wasezihlanjeni zaseGahashe; uAbhiyeli waseArabha;
13_11_33_uAzemavete waseBhaharum; uEliyabha waseShahalebhon;
13_11_34_uBhene-hashem waseGizon; uYonatan unyana kaShage,  umHarari;
13_11_35_uAhiyam unyana kaSakare, umHarari; uElifali unyana kaUre;
13_11_36_uHefere umMekera; uAhiya umPelon;
13_11_37_uHetsero waseKarmele; uNaharayi unyana kaEsebhayi;
13_11_38_uYoweli umzalwana kaNatan; uMibhehare unyana kaHagri;
13_11_39_uTseleke umAmon; uNaharayi waseBheroti, umphathi weentonga zikaYowabhi unyana kaTseruya;
13_11_40_uIra umItri; uGarebhe umItri;
13_11_41_u-Uriya umHeti; uZabhadi unyana ka-Alayi;
13_11_42_uAdina unyana kaShiza, umRubhen, intloko yamaRubhen,  enamashumi amathathu;
13_11_43_uHanan unyana kaMahaka; noYoshafati waseMeten;
13_11_44_u-Uziya waseAshterati; uShama noYehiyeli, oonyana bakaHotam waseArahere;
13_11_45_uYedihayeli unyana kaShimri, noYoha umzalwana wakhe,  umTitsi;
13_11_46_uEliyeli umMahavi; noYeribhayi noYoshafiya, oonyana bakaElinaham; noItema umMowabhi;
13_11_47_uEliyeli, no-Obhedi, noYahasiyeli waseMetsobhaya.
13_12_1_Naba, abeza kuDavide eTsikelage, esavingcelekile ngenxa kaSawule unyana kaKishe; bona bekumagorha, bencedisa emfazweni,
13_12_2_bexhobe izaphetha, besawula ngamatye ngesokunene nangesokhohlo isandla, betola ngeentolo, bengabakubazalwana bakaSawule, bengabakumaBhenjamin.
13_12_3_Intloko ibinguAhiyezere noYowashe, oonyana bakaShemaha waseGibheha; noYeziyeli noPelete, oonyana baka-Azemavete;  noBheraka, noYehu waseAnatoti;
13_12_4_noIshmaya waseGibheyon, igorha kula mashumi mathathu,  elaliphethe amashumi amathathu; noYeremiya, noYahaziyeli,  noYohanan, noYozabhadi waseGedere;
13_12_5_uEluzayi, noYerimoti, noBhehaliya, noShemariya, noShefatiya umHarufi;
13_12_6_uElikana, noYeshiya, noAzarele, noYohezere, noYashobheham,  amaKora;
13_12_7_noYohela noZebhadiya oonyana bakaYeroham waseGedore.
13_12_8_KumaGadi awazahlulela ukuya kuDavide emboniselweni, asinga entlango, ngamadoda anobukroti, amadoda omkhosi okulwa, exhobe ikhaka nomkhonto; ubuso bawo bunjengobengonyama, enjengamabhadi asezintabeni ukukhawuleza kwawo.
13_12_9_NguEzere owokuqala; nguObhadiya owesibini; nguEliyabhi owesithathu;
13_12_10_nguMishemana owesine; nguYeremiya owesihlanu;
13_12_11_nguAtayi owesithandathu; nguEliyeli owesixhenxe;
13_12_12_nguYohanan owesibhozo; nguElizabhadi owesithoba;
13_12_13_nguYeremiya oweshumi; nguMakebhanayi oweshumi elinanye.
13_12_14_Abo, koonyana bakaGadi, ibiziintloko zomkhosi. Emnye kubo engomncinane ubelilingene ikhulu; omkhulu kubo ubelilingene iwaka.
13_12_15_Ngabo abo bayiwelayo iYordan ngenyanga yokuqala, izele,  ihamba phezu kweendonga zayo; bagxotha bonke abasezintilini empumalanga nasentshonalanga.
13_12_16_Kwaya aboonyana bakaBhenjamin bakaYuda emboniselweni kuDavide.
13_12_17_Waphuma uDavide, waya kubakhawulela, wathi kubo, Ukuba niza kum ninoxolo, ukuba nindincede, intliziyo yam yoba nye neyenu; ke ukuba nize kundikhohlisa, nindinikele kubabandezeli bam, kungekho lugonyamelo esandleni sam, wobona uThixo woobawo bethu, ohlwaye.
13_12_18_Umoya wamthi gqubuthu uAmasayi, intloko yabaphathi-mikhosi, wathi, Singabakho, Davide; singakuwe, nyana kaYese. Uxolo, uxolo lube kuwe, uxolo lube kubancedi bakho;  ngokuba uya kunceda uThixo wakho. Wabamkela ke uDavide,  wabamisa baziintloko zamaqela.
13_12_19_KumaManase kwabakho abaphambela kuDavide, ekuyeni kwakhe namaFilisti ukuba kuliwe noSawule, baza abawanceda; ngokuba zacebisana zamndulula izikhulu zamaFilisti, zisithi, Wophambela kuSawule inkosi yakhe, senzakale ke.
13_12_20_Ekuyeni kwakhe eTsikelage, wathelelwa ngabakwaManase,  uAdena, noYozabhadi, noYedihayeli, noMikayeli, noYozabhadi,  noElihu, noTsiletayi, iintloko zamawaka akwaManase.
13_12_21_Bona bancedisana noDavide kuloo matutu; ngokuba babengamagorha anobukroti bonke, babengabathetheli emkhosini.
13_12_22_Ngokuba ngelo xesha babesiya iimini ngeemini kuDavide ukumnceda, yada yangumkhosi omkhulu, njengomkhosi kaThixo.
13_12_23_Ngawo la amanani eentloko ezaxhobela imfazwe, zeza kuDavide eHebron, ukuba buguqulelwe kuye ubukumkani bukaSawule,  ngokomlomo kaYehova.
13_12_24_Oonyana bakaYuda ababephethe amakhaka nezikhali ngamawaka amathandathu anamakhulu asibhozo, exhobele imfazwe.
13_12_25_Koonyana bakaSimon, amagorha angamakroti emfazweni ngamawaka asixhenxe anekhulu.
13_12_26_Koonyana bakaLevi ngamawaka amane, anamakhulu mathandathu.
13_12_27_Ke uYehoyada waye eyinganga yama-Aron; wayenamawaka amathathu anamakhulu asixhenxe.
13_12_28_Utsadoki, indodana eligorha elinobukroti, nendlu kayise,  ngabathetheli abamashumi mabini anababini.
13_12_29_Koonyana bakaBhenjamin, abazalwana bakaSawule, ngamawaka amathathu; kwada kwaba ngoku uninzi lwabo lugcina isigxina sendlu kaSawule.
13_12_30_Koonyana bakaEfrayim ngamawaka amashumi mabini, anamakhulu asibhozo amagorha anobukroti, amadoda anegama ezindlwini zooyise.
13_12_31_Kwisiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase lishumi elinesibhozo lamawaka, ababalulwa ngamagama, ukuba baye kumenza ukumkani uDavide.
13_12_32_Koonyana bakaIsakare, abawaziyo abawaqondayo amaxesha,  ukwazela ange ekwenza amaSirayeli, babengamakhulu amabini,  iintloko zabo. Bonke abazalwana babo benza ngokomlomo wabo.
13_12_33_KwaZebhulon, abaphuma umkhosi, abaxhobela ukulwa,  beneentonga zonke zemfazwe, ngamashumi omahlanu amawaka,  behlohla uluhlu, bengenazintliziyo zimbaxa.
13_12_34_KwaNafetali, yaba ngabathetheli abaliwaka, benamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe amawaka, aphethe amakhaka neentshuntshe.
13_12_35_KwaDan, abaxhobele imfazwe yangamashumi amabini anesibhozo amawaka, anamakhulu mathandathu.
13_12_36_Kwa-Ashere, abaphuma umkhosi, bexhobele ukulwa,  yangamashumi omane amawaka.
13_12_37_Phesheya kweYordan, kwaRubhen nakwaGadi, nakwisiqingatha sesizwe sakwaManase, beneentonga zonke zomkhosi wokulwa,  yalikhulu elinamanci mabini amawaka.
13_12_38_Onke loo madoda okulwa ahlohla uluhlu, aya enentliziyo ephelelisekileyo eHebron, ukuba amenze ukumkani uDavide kumaSirayeli onke. Kananjalo namanye amaSirayeli onke ayenantliziyo-nye yokumenza ukumkani uDavide.
13_12_39_AyenoDavide apho iintsuku ezintathu, esidla esela; ngokuba abazalwana bawo baye bewalungiselele.
13_12_40_Kananjalo abakufuphi nabo, kwada kwesa kwaIsakare,  nakwaZebhulon, nakwaNafetali, bazisa izonka ngamaesile,  nangeenkamela, nangoondlebende, nangamaqegu, ukudla okungumgubo, nezicumba zamakhiwane nezeerasintyisi, newayini,  neoli, neenkomo, nempahla emfutshane, into eninzi; ngokuba bekuvuywa kwaSirayeli.
13_13_1_Wacebisana uDavide nabathetheli bamawaka nabamakhulu,  iinganga zonke.
13_13_2_Wathi uDavide kwibandla lonke lakwaSirayeli, Ukuba kulungile kuni, ukuba kuvela kuYehova uThixo wethu, masiphange,  sithumele kubazalwana bethu abaseleyo emazweni onke akwaSirayeli, kunye nabo ke sithumele kubabingeleli nabaLevi abasemizini yamadlelo abo, ukuba babuthelane kuthi;
13_13_3_siyiguqulele kuthi ityeya kaThixo wethu; ngokuba asibuzisanga kuyo ngeemini zikaSawule.
13_13_4_Lathi lonke ibandla, Makwenjiwe njalo; ngokuba lalilungile elo zwi emehlweni abantu bonke.
13_13_5_Wawabizela ndawonye ke uDavide onke amaSirayeli,  wathabathela eShihore yaseYiputa, wada wasa ekungeneni eHamati,  ukuba ayithabathe ityeya kaThixo eKiriyati-yeharim.
13_13_6_Wenyuka uDavide namaSirayeli onke, waya eBhahala,  eyiKiriyati-yeharim eyakwaYuda, ukuba ayinyuse apho ityeya kaThixo onguYehova, onguHleli-ezikerubhini, igama lokunqulwa kwakhe.
13_13_7_Bayikhwelisa ityeya kaThixo enqwelweni entsha, ukuphuma endlwini ka-Abhinadabhi; u-Uza noAhiyo bayiqhuba inqwelo.
13_13_8_UDavide namaSirayeli onke baqamba phambi koYehova ngamandla onke, ngeengoma, nangeehadi, nangemirhubhe, nangeengqongqo,  nangamacangci nangamaxilongo.
13_13_9_Baya bafika esandeni sikaKidon; u-Uza wasa isandla sakhe,  wayibamba ityeya; ngokuba iinkomo beziyigungqisa.
13_13_10_Wavutha umsindo kaYehova ku-Uza, wambetha ngenxa enokuba wasa isandla sakhe etyeyeni; wafela khona phambi koThixo.
13_13_11_Kwavutha umsindo kuDavide, ngokuba uYehova emtyhobozele ngotyhobozo u-Uza; wathi loo ndawo yiPeretse-uza, unanamhla.
13_13_12_UDavide wamoyika uThixo ngaloo mini, wathi, Ndothini na ukuyizisa kum ityeya kaThixo?
13_13_13_UDavide akayisa kuye ityeya emzini kaDavide; wayisonga,  wayiphambukisela endlwini kaObhedi-edom waseGati.
13_13_14_Yahlala ityeya kaThixo emzini kaObhedi-edom, endlwini yakhe, iinyanga zantathu. UYehova wayisikelela ke indlu kaObhedi-edom, nento yonke anayo.
13_14_1_Ke kaloku uHiram, ukumkani waseTire, wathuma abathunywa kuDavide, nemisedare, neengcibi zeendonga, neengcibi zemithi,  ukumakhela indlu.
13_14_2_Wazi uDavide ukuba uYehova umqinisile waba ngukumkani wamaSirayeli; baphakanyiselwa phezulu ubukumkani bakhe ngenxa yabantu bakhe amaSirayeli.
13_14_3_UDavide wabuya wazeka abanye abafazi eYerusalem; uDavide wabuya wazala abanye oonyana neentombi.
13_14_4_Ngawo la amagama abantwana awabazuzayo eYerusalem:  uShamuwa, noShobhabhi, noNatan, noSolomon,
13_14_5_noIbhehare, noElishuwa, noElipelete,
13_14_6_noNoga, noNefege, noYafiya,
13_14_7_noElishama, noBheleyada, noElifelete.
13_14_8_Athi ke amaFilisti, akuva ukuba uthanjiswe uDavide, waba ngukumkani kumaSirayeli onke, enyuka onke amaFilisti, aya kumfuna uDavide. Weva uDavide, waphuma waya kuwahlangabeza.
13_14_9_AmaFilisti eza athi dwe entilini yamaRafa.
13_14_10_Wabuza uDavide kuThixo, wathi, Ndinyuke na ndiye kumaFilisti? Wowanikela na esandleni sam? Wathi uYehova kuye,  Nyuka, ndowanikela esandleni sakho.
13_14_11_Benyuka baya eBhahali-peratsim, wawabulalela khona uDavide. Wathi uDavide, UThixo uzityhobozele iintshaba zam ngesandla sam, njengokutyhoboza kwamanzi; ngenxa yoko bathi igama laloo ndawo yiBhahali-peratsim.
13_14_12_Azishiya apho izithixo zawo; wathi uDavide mazitshiswe ngomlilo.
13_14_13_Abuya aphinda amaFilisti, athi dwe entilini leyo. Wabuya wabuza uDavide kuThixo.
13_14_14_Wathi uThixo kuye, Uze ungenyuki uwasukele; jika umke kuwo, ufike kuwo malunga nemithi yemibhaka;
13_14_15_kuthi, ekuveni kwakho isandi sokuhamba emantloko emithi yemibhaka, wandule ukuphuma ulwe; ngokuba uphumile uThixo phambi kwakho, ukuba awuxabele umkhosi wamaFilisti.
13_14_16_Wenza uDavide njengoko uThixo wamwisela umthetho ngako;  bawuxabela umkhosi wamaFilisti, bathabathela eGibheyon, besa naseGezere.
13_14_17_Lwaphuma lwagqiba ilizwe udumo lukaDavide; uYehova wazenza zonke iintlanga ukuba zinkwantye nguye.
13_15_1_UDavide wazenzela izindlu emzini kaDavide; wayilungiselela indawo ityeya kaThixo, wayimisela intente.
13_15_2_Waza uDavide wathi, Mayingathwalwa ityeya kaThixo ngabangebaLevi; ngokuba unyule bona uYehova ukuba bayithwale ityeya kaThixo, bamlungiselele ngonaphakade.
13_15_3_UDavide wawabizela ndawonye onke amaSirayeli eYerusalem,  ukuze ityeya kaYehova inyuswe, isiwe endaweni yayo abeyilungisele yona.
13_15_4_Wabahlanganisa uDavide oonyana baka-Aron nabaLevi.
13_15_5_Koonyana bakaKehati yangu-Uriyeli umthetheli, nabazalwana bakhe, belikhulu elinamanci mabini.
13_15_6_Koonyana bakaMerari yanguAsaya umthetheli, nabazalwana bakhe, bengamakhulu amabini anamanci mabini.
13_15_7_Koonyana bakaGershom yanguYoweli umthetheli, nabazalwana bakhe, belikhulu elinamanci mathathu.
13_15_8_Koonyana bakaElitsafan yanguShemaya umthetheli, nabazalwana bakhe, bengamakhulu amabini.
13_15_9_Koonyana bakaHebron yanguEliyeli umthetheli, nabazalwana bakhe, bengamashumi asibhozo.
13_15_10_Koonyana bakaUziyeli yanguAminadabhi umthetheli,  nabazalwana bakhe, belikhulu elinashumi-nye linababini.
13_15_11_UDavide wabiza ooTsadoki noAbhiyatare ababingeleli,  nabaLevi ooUriyeli, noAsaya, noYoweli, noShemaya, noEliyeli,  noAminadabhi.
13_15_12_Wathi kubo, Niziintloko zezindlu zooyihlo kubaLevi;  zingcwaliseni nina nabazalwana benu, ninyuse ityeya kaYehova uThixo kaSirayeli, ize apho ndiyilungiselele khona;
13_15_13_ngokuba, yabingenini nje enayinyusayo kwasekuqaleni,  wasityhobozela uYehova uThixo wethu, ngokuba singamfunanga ngokwesiko.
13_15_14_Bazingcwalisa ke ababingeleli nabaLevi, ukuba bayinyuse ityeya kaYehova uThixo kaSirayeli.
13_15_15_Bayithwala oonyana bakaLevi ityeya kaThixo, njengoko abemwisele umthetho uMoses ngokwelizwi likaYehova, emagxeni abo, ngezibonda ezikuwo.
13_15_16_Wathi uDavide kubathetheli babaLevi, mabamise abazalwana babo babe ziimvumi, beneempahla zokuvuma: imirhubhe, neehadi,  namacangci akhenkcezayo, kuphakanyiswe ngesandi sovuyo.
13_15_17_AbaLevi bamisa ke uHeman unyana kaYoweli, nakubazalwana bakhe uSafu unyana kaBherekiya, nakoonyana bakaMerari,  abazalwana babo, uEtan unyana kaKushaya,
13_15_18_benabazalwana babo bolwesibini udidi: yanguZekariya,  noBhen, noYahaziyeli, noShemiramoti, noYehiyeli, noUni,  noEliyabhi, noBhenaya, noMahazeya, noMatitiya, noElifelehu,  noMikeneya, oo-Obhedi-edom, noYehiyeli, abamasango.
13_15_19_Iimvumi, ooHeman, noAsafu, noEtan, baba ngabokuvakalisa ngamacangci obhedu;
13_15_20_ooZekariya, noHaziyeli, noShemiramoti, noYehiyeli, noUni,  noEliyabhi, noMagaseya, noBhenaya, ngemirhubhe, ngeleentombi ilizwi;
13_15_21_ooMatitiya, noElifelehu, noMikeneha, no-Obhedi-edom,  noYehiyeli, noAzaziya ngeehadi, ngelamadoda ilizwi, ukuba bahlabele.
13_15_22_UKenaniya, umthetheli wabaLevi ekuthwaleni, wafundisa ukuthwala; ngokuba ebenengqondo yoko.
13_15_23_OoBherekiya noElikana babengabamasango etyeya.
13_15_24_OoShebhaniya, noYehoshafati, noNataniyeli, noAmasayi,  noZekariya, noBhenaya, noEliyezere, ababingeleli,  babengabokuvuthela ngamaxilongo phambi kwetyeya kaThixo,  Oo-Obhedi-edom noYehiya babengabamasango etyeya.
13_15_25_Kwathi ke ooDavide, namadoda amakulu akwaSirayeli,  nabathetheli bamawaka, baya kuyinyusa ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova endlwini kaObhedi-edom, bevuya.
13_15_26_Kwathi, ekubancedeni kukaThixo abaLevi, bayithwala ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova, babingelela iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zasixhenxe, neenkunzi zeegusha zasixhenxe.
13_15_27_Wayambethe ingubo yokwaleka yelinen ecikizekileyo uDavide,  nabaLevi bonke ababethwele ityeya, neemvumi, noKenaniya umphathi wabathwali; ke uDavide wayebhinqe iefodi yelinen emhlophe.
13_15_28_AmaSirayeli onke abeyinyusa ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova eduma, enesandi sezigodlo, nesamaxilongo, nesamacangci,  evakalisa ngemirhubhe nangeehadi.
13_15_29_Kwathi ke ekufikeni kwetyeya yomnqophiso kaYehova emzini kaDavide, walunguza ngefestile uMikali, intombi kaSawule,  wabona ukumkani uDavide esina, eqamba, wamcekisa entliziyweni yakhe.
13_16_1_Bayingenisa ityeya kaThixo, bayimisa esazulwini sentente abeyimisele yona uDavide; basondeza amadini anyukayo,  nemibingelelo yoxolo, phambi koThixo.
13_16_2_Wagqiba ke uDavide ukunyusa amadini anyukayo, nemibingelelo yoxolo, wabasikelela abantu egameni likaYehova.
13_16_3_Wababela bonke abantu bakwaSirayeli, ethabathela kwindoda wesa nakumfazi; elowo wamnika intenda yesonka, nomlinganiso wewayini, nesicumba seerasintyisi.
13_16_4_Wamisa phambi kwetyeya kaYehova abalungiseleli kubaLevi,  ukuba bakhumbuze, babulele, badumise uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli.
13_16_5_YanguAsafu intloko, yanguZekariya emva kwakhe, noYehiyeli,  noShemiramoti, noYehiyeli, noMatitiya, noEliyabhi, noBhenaya,  no-Obhedi-edom, noYahaziyeli, ngeempahla zemirhubhe nangeehadi;  uAsafu wenza isandi ngamacangci.
13_16_6_OoBhenaya noYahaziyeli ababingeleli benza isandi ngamaxilongo ngamaxesha onke, phambi kwetyeya yomnqophiso kaThixo.
13_16_7_Waza ngaloo mini uDavide wabamisela kuqala ooAsafu nabazalwana bakhe ukubulela kuYehova:
13_16_8_Bulelani kuYehova, nqulani igama lakhe, Yazisani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezincamisileyo.
13_16_9_Vumani kuye, mbetheleni uhadi, Xoxani ngemisebenzi yakhe yonke ebalulekileyo.
13_16_10_Qhayisani ngegama lakhe elingcwele, Mayivuye intliziyo yabamngxameleyo uYehova.
13_16_11_Mfuneni uYehova namandla akhe, Ngxamelani ubuso bakhe ngamaxesha onke.
13_16_12_Khumbulani imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo, awayenzayo,  Izimanga zakhe nezigwebo zomlomo wakhe,
13_16_13_Mbewu kaSirayeli, yomkhonzi wakhe, Nyana bakaYakobi,  banyulwa bakhe.
13_16_14_NguYehova, nguThixo wethu yena; Zisehlabathini lonke izigwebo zakhe.
13_16_15_Khumbulani ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe, Ilizwi awalimisela izizukulwana eziliwaka,
13_16_16_Awanqophisana ngalo noAbraham; Nokufunga kwakhe kuIsake;
13_16_17_Nokumisa kwakhe ukuba kube ngummiselo kuYakobi, Kube ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade kuSirayeli;
13_16_18_Esithi, Ndikunika ilizwe lakwaKanan, Libe licandelo lelifa lenu,
13_16_19_Nisengamadoda ambalwa, Nibancinane, ningabaphambukeli kulo.
13_16_20_Bahamba besuka kolunye uhlanga, baye kolunye uhlanga;  Besuka kobunye ubukumkani, baye kwabanye abantu.
13_16_21_Akavumela mntu ukuba abacudise, Wohlwaya ookumkani ngenxa yabo,
13_16_22_Esithi, Musani ukubachukumisa abathanjiswa bam, Musani ukubaphatha kakubi abaprofeti bam.
13_16_23_Vumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi, Shumayelani iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakhe iimini ngeemini.
13_16_24_Balisani ezintlangeni zonke uzuko lwakhe, Balisani ezizweni zonke imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo.
13_16_25_Ngokuba mkhulu uYehova, engowokudunyiswa kunene; Uyoyikeka ngaphezu koothixo bonke,
13_16_26_Ngokuba bonke oothixo bezizwe abanto zanto; UYehova yena wenza amazulu.
13_16_27_Yindili nobungangamela phambi kwakhe, Ngamandla novuyo endaweni yakhe engcwele.
13_16_28_Mnikeni uYehova, nina mizalwane yezizwe, Mnikeni uYehova uzuko namandla.
13_16_29_Mnikeni uYehova uzuko lwegama lakhe; Zisani umnikelo, nime phambi kwakhe; Mnquleni uYehova, nivethe ezingcwele.
13_16_30_Thuthumelani phambi kwakhe, nonke hlabathi; Elimiweyo liya kuzinza ngoko, lingashukumi.
13_16_31_Malivuye izulu, ligcobe ihlabathi, Makuthiwe ezintlangeni,  UYehova ngukumkani.
13_16_32_Malugqume ulwandle nokuzala kwalo; Malidlamke ilizwe,  nento yonke ekulo,
13_16_33_Ize imemelele imithi yehlathi phambi koYehova; Ngokuba esiza kuligweba ihlabathi.
13_16_34_Bulelani kuYehova ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
13_16_35_Yithini, Sisindise, Thixo osisindisayo, Usibuthe,  usihlangule ezintlangeni, Ukuze sibulele igama lakho elingcwele, Sizingce ngendumiso yakho.
13_16_36_Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, Kususela kwaphakade, kude kuse ephakadeni! Bathi ke bonke abantu, Amen,  bamdumisa uYehova.
13_16_37_Wabashiya apho phambi kwetyeya yomnqophiso kaYehova ooAsafu nabazalwana bakhe, ukuba balugiselele phambi kwetyeya ngamaxesha onke, ngokwento yemini ngangemini yayo;
13_16_38_noo-Obhedi-edom nabazalwana babo, bemashumi mathandathu anesibhozo; uObhedi-edom, unyana kaYedutun, noHosa bengabamasango.
13_16_39_UTsadoki umbingeleli, nabazalwana bakhe abangababingeleli,  babephambi komnquba kaYehova esigangeni esiseGibheyon,
13_16_40_ukuba banyuse amadini anyukayo kuYehova esibingelelweni sedini elinyukayo amaxesha onke, kusasa nangokuhlwa, njengako konke okubhaliweyo emyalelweni kaYehova, awawumisela amaSirayeli.
13_16_41_Babenabo ooHeman noYedutun, nabanye abanyulwa, abo babekhankanywe ngamagama, ukuba babulele kuYehova, ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;
13_16_42_benooHeman noYedutun, benamaxilongo, namacangci, abo benza isandi beneempahla zokuvuma zikaThixo; oonyana bakaYedutun bengabamasango.
13_16_43_Bahamba bonke abantu, elowo waya endlwini yakhe; wabuya ke uDavide, weza kusikelela indlu yakhe.
13_17_1_Ke kaloku kwathi, xa ahleliyo uDavide endlwini yakhe, wathi uDavide kuNatan umprofeti, Uyabona, mna ndihleli endlwini yemisedare; ke yona ityeya yomnqophiso kaYehova iphantsi kwamalengalenga.
13_17_2_Wathi uNatan kuDavide, Konke okusentliziyweni yakho,  kwenze, ngokuba uThixo unawe.
13_17_3_Kwathi ngobo busuku lafika ilizwi likaThixo kuNatan,  lisithi,
13_17_4_Hamba uye kuthi kuDavide umkhonzi wam, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Wena akusayi kundakhela ndlu yakuhlala.
13_17_5_Ngokuba andihlalanga ndlwini, kususela kulaa mini ndawanyusayo ngayo amaSirayeli, unanamhla; ke ndisuka ententeni ndiye ententeni, ndisuke emnqubeni ndiye emnqubeni.
13_17_6_Ekuhambeni konke, endakuhamba-hambayo namaSirayeli onke,  khe ndathetha izwi na nakumnye kubagwebi bakwaSirayeli,  endabawisela umthetho wokwalusa abantu bam, lokuthi, Yini na ukuba ningandakheli ndlu yamisedare?
13_17_7_Ke ngoko wotsho kuDavide umkhonzi wam, ukuthi, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ukuthi, Ndakuthabatha edlelweni mna,  ekulandeleni impahla emfutshane, ukuba ube yinganga yabantu bam amaSirayeli.
13_17_8_Ndaba nawe kuko konke owahamba kuko, ndazinqumla zonke iintshaba zakho ebusweni bakho, ndakwenzela igama njengegama labakhulu abasehlabathini.
13_17_9_Ndiya kubamisela indawo abantu bam amaSirayeli, ndibatyale,  beme emanxuweni abo, bangabi sagungqa; oonyana bobutshijolo bangabuyi babonakalise, njengamhla mnene;
13_17_10_kususela kulaa mini ndabamisela abantu bam amaSirayeli abagwebi, ndazithoba zonke iintshaba zakho. Ke ndiyakuxelela ukuba uYehova uya kukwakhela indlu.
13_17_11_Kothi, xa ithe yazaliseka imihla yakho yokuba uye kooyihlo, ndiyipha kamise emva kwakho imbewu yakhe, eya kuvela koonyana bakho, ndibuzi nzise ukukumkani bakhe.
13_17_12_Nguye oya kundakhela indlu, ndiyizinzise itrone yakhe,  kude kuse ephakadeni.
13_17_13_Mna ndiya kuba nguyise kuye, yena abe ngunyana kum. Inceba yam andiyi kuyisusa kuye, njengoko ndayisusayo kowayengaphambi kwakho.
13_17_14_Ndiya kummisa endlwini yam, nasebukumkanini bam, kude kuse ephakadeni; itrone yakhe iya kuzinza kude kuse ephakadeni.
13_17_15_Njengaloo mazwi onke, njengaloo mbono wonke, wenjenjalo uNatan ukuthetha kuDavide.
13_17_16_Waya ukumkani uDavide, wahlala phambi koYehova, wathi,  Ndingubani na, Yehova Thixo, iyintoni na indlu yam, ukuba ude undizise nalapha?
13_17_17_Kuncinane oko ke emehlweni akho, Thixo; uthethe nangendlu yomkhonzi wakho wasingisa mgama; wandikhangela, wandenza umntu,  wandinyusa, Yehova Thixo.
13_17_18_Usaya kongeza ntoni na uDavide, ukuthetha kuwe ngokusingisele ekuzukisweni komkhonzi wakho lo? Wena uyamazi umkhonzi wakho lo.
13_17_19_Yehova, ubenze ngenxa yomkhonzi wakho, nangokwentliziyo yakho, bonke obo bukhulu, ukwazisa ezi zenzo zonke zikhulu kangaka.
13_17_20_Yehova, akukho unjengawe; akukho Thixo ngaphaya kwakho,  njengoko konke sikuvileyo ngeendlebe zethu.
13_17_21_Luluphi na uhlanga ehlabathini apha, olunjengabantu bakho amaSirayeli; awaya kuzikhululela lona uThixo, ukuba lube ngabantu, ukuba akumisele igama ngezenzo ezikhulu nezoyikekayo,  ngokugxotha iintlanga phambi kwabantu bakho owabakhululayo eYiputa?
13_17_22_Wabenza abantu bakho amaSirayeli baba ngabantu kuwe, kude kuse ephakadeni; wena, Yehova, waba nguThixo kubo.
13_17_23_Kaloku, Yehova, ilizwi olithethileyo ngomkhonzi wakho,  nangendlu yakhe, malibe yinyaniso kude kuse ephakadeni, wenze njengoko uthethileyo;
13_17_24_libe yinyaniso, likhule igama lakho kude kuse ephakadeni,  kusithiwa, UYehova wemikhosi, uThixo wamaSirayeli, nguThixo kuSirayeli; indlu kaDavide, umkhonzi wakho, iqinile phambi kwakho.
13_17_25_Ngokuba wena, Thixo wam, ukutyhilile ezindlebeni zomkhonzi wakho, ukuba uya kumakhela indlu. Ngenxa yoko umkhonzi wakhe ufumene intliziyo yokuthandaza phambi kwakho.
13_17_26_Kaloku, Yehova, unguye uThixo wena; uzithethile ke ngomkhonzi wakho ezi zinto zilungileyo.
13_17_27_Kaloku makukholeke kuwe ukuyisikelela indlu yomkhonzi wakho, ukuba ihlale ihleli phambi kwakho ngonaphakade; ngokuba wena, Yehova, uyisikelele into, yosikeleleka ke ngonaphakade.
13_18_1_Kwathi emveni kokuba njalo, uDavide wawaxabela amaFilisti,  waweyisa; wayithabatha iGati namagxamesi ayo esandleni samaFilisti.
13_18_2_Wawaxabela amaMowabhi; amaMowabhi aba ngabakhonzi kuDavide,  azisa iminikelo.
13_18_3_UDavide wamxabela uHadarezere, ukumkani weTsobha, eHamati,  ekuyeni kwakhe ukuwamisa amandla akhe emlanjeni ongumEfrati.
13_18_4_UDavide wazithimbela iwaka leenqwelo zokulwa, namawaka asixhenxe abamahashe, namashumi omabini amawaka angumqikela.  UDavide wawanqumla imisipha onke amahashe eenqwelo zokulwa,  washiya kuwo aweenqwelo alikhulu.
13_18_5_Ke ama-Aram aseDamasko eza kunceda uHadarezere ukumkani weTsobha. UDavide wabulala kuma-Aram amashumi amabini anamabini amawaka amadoda.
13_18_6_UDavide wamisa ikampu kwa-Aram-damasko. Ama-Aram aba ngabakhonzi kuDavide, azisa iminikelo. UYehova wamsindisa uDavide ezindaweni zonke awahamba kuzo.
13_18_7_Wawathabatha uDavide amakhaka egolide abekubakhonzi bakaHadarezere, wawazisa eYerusalem;
13_18_8_naseTibhati naseKun, imizi kaHadarezere, uDavide wathabatha ubhedu oluninzi kunene, olo uSolomon wenza ngalo ulwandle lobhedu, neentsika, nempahla yobhedu.
13_18_9_Weva ke uTohu ukumkani waseHamati, ukuba uDavide uyixabele yonke impi kaHadarezere ukumkani waseTsobha,
13_18_10_wathuma uHadoram, unyana wakhe, kukumkani uDavide, ukuba ambuze ukuphila kwakhe, amsikelele, ngenxa yokuba ebelwile noHadarezere, wameyisa (ngokuba uTohu wayengumfo obesilwa noHadarezere). Waye uHadoram lowo ephethe neempahla zonke zegolide, nezesilivere, nezobhedu.
13_18_11_Ukumkani uDavide wazingcwalisela kuYehova kananjalo ezo,  kunye nesilivere negolide abeyithabathile ezintlangeni zonke,  kumaEdom, nakumaMowabhi, nakoonyana baka-Amon, nakumaFilisti,  nakuma-Amaleki.
13_18_12_UAbhishayi unyana kaTseruya wawabulala amaEdom angamawaka alishumi linesibhozo eSihlanjeni seTyuwa.
13_18_13_Wamisa ikampu kwelamaEdom; aba ngabakhonzi kuDavide onke amaEdom. UYehova wamsindisa uDavide ezindaweni zonke awahamba kuzo.
13_18_14_Waye engukumkani ke uDavide kumaSirayeli onke; waye uDavide esenza okusesikweni nobulungisa ebantwini bakhe bonke.
13_18_15_Ke uYowabhi unyana kaTseruya wayephethe umkhosi;  noYehoshafati unyana ka-Ahiludi wayengumkhumbuzi wezinto zakomkhulu.
13_18_16_UTsadoki unyana ka-Ahitubhi, noAbhimeleki unyana ka-Abhiyatare, babengababingeleli; uShavesha wayengumbhali.
13_18_17_UBhenaya unyana kaYoyada ubephethe abancinithi nezigidimi.  Oonyana bakaDavide babeyingalo yokunene kukumkani.
13_19_1_Kwathi emva koko, wafa uNahashe, ukumkani woonyana baka-Amon; waba ngukumkani unyana wakhe esikhundleni sakhe.
13_19_2_Wathi ke uDavide, Mandimenzele inceba uHanun unyana kaNahashe, njengokuba noyise wandenzela inceba. Wathumela uDavide abathunywa bokumkhuza ngaye uyise. Beza ke abakhonzi bakaDavide ezweni loonyana baka-Amon kuHanun, ukuba bamkhuze.
13_19_3_Bathi abathetheli boonyana baka-Amon kuHanun, Ucinga ukuba uDavide uzukisa uyihlo na emehlweni akho, ngokuba ethume abakhuzi kuwe? Abakhonzi bakhe abeze kuwe na ukuze baligocagoce, balibhukuqe, balihlole ilizwe?
13_19_4_Wabathabatha uHanun abakhonzi bakaDavide, wabaguya,  wazicanda phakathi iingubo zawo ezinde, wada waya kuma ngemisekela; wabandulula ke.
13_19_5_Bahamba, bamxelela uDavide okwenziwe kuloo madoda.  Wathumela bawakhawulela; ngokuba amadoda lawo ayehlazisiwe kunene. Wathi ukumkani, Hlalani eYeriko zide zihlume iindevu zenu, nandule ukubuya ke.
13_19_6_Babona oonyana baka-Amon, ukuba bazinukisile kuDavide,  bathumela ke ooHanun noonyana baka-Amon kwa-Aram ephakathi kweMilambo, nakwa-Aram-mahaka, naseTsobha, iwakaleetalente zesilivere, ukuba baqeshe iinqwelo zokulwa nabamahashe.
13_19_7_Baziqeshela amashumi amathathu anamabini amawaka eenqwelo zokulwa, nokumkani waseMahaka, nabantu bakhe; beza ke bamisa iintente phambi kweMedebha. Oonyana baka-Amon bahlanganisana,  bephuma emizini yabo, beza kulwa.
13_19_8_Weva uDavide, wathuma uYowabhi, enomkhosi wonke wamagorha.
13_19_9_Baphuma oonyana baka-Amon, bakha izintlu zokulwa ekungeneni komzi, ookumkani ababezile bebodwa endle.
13_19_10_Wabona uYowabhi ukuba imfazwe ibheke kuye, ngaphambili nangasemva; wanyula emadodeni onke ahleliweyo kwaSirayeli,  wakha uluhlu malunga nama-Aram.
13_19_11_Abanye abantu wabanikela esandleni sika-Abhishayi,  umninawa wakhe; bakha uluhlu malunga noonyana baka-Amon.
13_19_12_Wathi, Ukuba ama-Aram athe andeyisa, wondisiza; ukuba bathe oonyana baka-Amon bakweyisa,
13_19_13_ndokusiza Yomelela, somelele ngenxa yabantu bakowethu,  nangenxa yemizi yoThixo wethu; uYehova uya kwenza oko kulungileyo emehlweni akhe.
13_19_14_Wafika uYowabhi nabantu ababenaye, wema phambi kwama-Aram,  eza kulwa; asaba ebusweni bakhe.
13_19_15_Babona oonyana baka-Amon ukuba asabile ama-Aram, basaba nabo ebusweni buka-Abhishayi umninawa wakhe, bangena ekhaya.
13_19_16_Waya uYowabhi eYerusalem. Abona ama-Aram ukuba agxothiwe phambi kwamaSirayeli, athuma izigidimi, awarhola ama-Aram abephesheya koMlambo, uShofaki, umthetheli womkhosi kaHadarezere, ephambi kwawo.
13_19_17_Kwaxelwa kuDavide; wahlanganisa amaSirayeli onke, wayiwela iYordan, waya kuwo, wakha uluhlu ukuba alwe nawo. UDavide walwakha uluhlu, esiya kuwahlangabeza ama-Aram ukuba alwe nawo;  alwa ke naye.
13_19_18_Asaba ama-Aram ebusweni bamaSirayeli; uDavide wabulala kuma-Aram amawaka asixhene abeenqwelo zokulwa, namashumi amane amawaka amadoda angumqikela, wabulala noShofaki, umthetheli womkhosi.
13_19_19_Babona abakhonzi bakaHadarezere ukuba bagxothiwe phambi kwamaSirayeli, baxolisana noDavide, bamkhonza. Akavuma ama-Aram ukuba sabasiza oonyana baka-Amon.
13_20_1_Kwathi ukuvela komnyaka, ngexesha lokuphuma kookumkani,  uYowabhi wayeyiphethe impi ephuma umkhosi; walonakalisa ilizwe loonyana baka-Amon, wafika wayingqinga iRabha. UDavide yena wahlala eYerusalem. UYowabhi ke wayichitha iRabha,  wayitshabalalisa.
13_20_2_UDavide wasithabatha isithsaba sokumkani wabo entlokweni yakhe, wasifumana siyitalente yegolide ubunzima baso, sinamatye anqabileyo; sabekwa entlokweni kaDavide. Waphuma namaxhoba aloo mzi amaninzi kunene.
13_20_3_Ke abantu ababekhona wabarhola, wabasika ngeesarha,  nangezisizilo zesinyithi, nangeempahla ezibukhali zesinyithi.  Wenjenjalo uDavide kwimizi yonke yoonyana baka-Amon. Wabuya ke uDavide nabantu bonke, waya eYerusalem.
13_20_4_Kwathi emva koko, kwaliwa namaFilisti eGezere; wesuka uSibhekayi umHusha wambulala uSipayi, obe engowoonyana bakaRafa; oyiswa ke.
13_20_5_Kwabuya kwaliwa namaFilisti. UElihanan unyana kaYahire wambulala uLami, umzalwana kaGoliyati waseGati, oluthi lwentshuntshe yakhe lwalungangomthi wabaluki.
13_20_6_Kwabuya kwaliwa eGati. Kwakho ndoda iyingxilimbela, eminwe neenzwane zazingamashumi amabini anane; imithandathu sandleni sinye, zintandathu lunyaweni lunye; nayo ibizalwa nguRafa.
13_20_7_Yawangcikiva amaSirayeli; wayibulala uYonatan, unyana kaShimeha umkhuluwa kaDavide.
13_20_8_Abo bazalwa nguRafa eGati; bawa ngesandla sikaDavide,  nangesandla sabakhonzi bakhe.
13_21_1_Ke kaloku uSathana wesukela phezulu kumaSirayeli,  waxhokonxa uDavide ukuba awabale amaSirayeli.
13_21_2_Wathi ke uDavide kuYowabhi nakubathetheli babantu, Khaniye,  niwabale amaSirayeli, nithabathela eBher-shebha, nide nise kwaDan, nilizise kum, ndilazi inani lawo.
13_21_3_Wathi uYowabhi, UYehova makalongezelele inani labantu bakhe izihlandlo ezilikhulu, kunoko bangako; kodwa, nkosi yam,  kumkani, abangabakhonzi benkosi yam bonke, yini na? Iyifunelani na le nto inkosi yam? Yini na ukuba iwazekise ityala amaSirayeli?
13_21_4_Laqinisela ilizwi lokumkani kuYowabhi. Waphuma ke uYowabhi,  wahambahamba kumaSirayeli onke, weza eYerusalem.
13_21_5_UYowabhi wamnika ke uDavide inani lokubalwa kwabantu.  AmaSirayeli onke aba sisigidi esinye esinamawaka alikhulu samadoda aphatha ikrele; namaYuda angamakhulu amane anamanci asixhenxe amawaka amadoda aphatha ikrele.
13_21_6_Ke abaLevi namaBhenjamin akawabalanga phakathi kwawo;  ngokuba ilizwi lokumkani laye lilisikizi kuYowabhi.
13_21_7_Kwaba kubi emehlweni kaThixo ngenxa yale nto; wawohlwaya ke amaSirayeli.
13_21_8_Wathi uDavide kuThixo, Ndonile kunene ngale nto ndiyenzileyo; kaloku khawubukhwelelise ubugwenxa bomkhonzi wakho; ngokuba ndenze ubudenge obukhulu.
13_21_9_Wathetha uYehova kuGadi, imboni kaDavide, esithi,
13_21_10_Yiya uthethe kuDavide, uthi, Utsho uYehova ukuthi,  Ndikubekela izinto ezintathu; zinyulele ibe nye kuzo, ndiyenze kuwe.
13_21_11_Waya ke uGadi kuDavide, wathi kuye, Utsho uYehova ukuthi,  Zityumbele;
13_21_12_nokuba yiminyaka emithathu yendlala; nokuba ziinyanga ezintathu ugxothwa ziintshaba zakho, nekrele leentshaba zakho likufikela; nokuba yimihla emithathu yekrele likaYehova,  nendyikitya yokufa ezweni, isithunywa sikaYehova sisonakalisa emimandleni yonke yakwaSirayeli. Kaloku ke, yenza ilizwi endolibuyisela kondithumileyo.
13_21_13_Wathi uDavide kuGadi, Ndididekile kunene; masendisiwa esandleni sikaYehova, ngokuba ininzi imfesane yakhe;  mandingaweli esandleni somntu.
13_21_14_UYehova wathoba ke indyikitya yokufa kwaSirayeli; kwawa amashumi asixhenxe amawaka amadoda kwaSirayeli.
13_21_15_UThixo wathuma isithunywa eYerusalem, ukuba siyitshabalalise. Sakubona ukuba siyatshabalalisa, wabona uYehova, wazohlwaya ngenxa yobubi obo; wathi kwisithunywa eso sitshabalalisayo, Kwanele, sithobe kaloku isandla sakho. Ke kaloku isithunywa sikaYehova sema esandeni sikaOrnan umYebhusi.
13_21_16_UDavide wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe, wabona isithunywa sikaYehova simi phakathi komhlaba nezulu, sithe rhuthu ikrele laso ngesandla, lolulelwe phezu kweYerusalem. UDavide namadoda amakhulu, bezigubungele ngeengubo ezirhwexayo, bawa phantsi ngobuso.
13_21_17_Wathi uDavide kuThixo, Asindim yini na othe mababalwe abantu? Yaba ndim ke owonileyo, ndenza ububi ukwenza oko; ke ezi zimvu zenze ntoni na zona? Yehova Thixo wam, isandla sakho masifikele mna, nendlu kabawo, singabi kubantu bakho, ukuba babulawe.
13_21_18_Sathi isithunywa sikaYehova kuGadi, Makatsho kuDavide,  enyuke uDavide, amisele uYehova isibingelelo esandeni sikaOrnan umYebhusi.
13_21_19_Wenyuka uDavide ngelizwi likaGadi, awalithethayo egameni likaYehova.
13_21_20_Wathi guququ uOrnan, wasibona isithunywa; oonyana bakhe abane ababenaye bazimela; ke uOrnan wayebhula ingqolowa.
13_21_21_Xa uDavide wayesiza kuOrnan, uOrnan wabheka wabona uDavide, waphuma esandeni, waqubuda kuDavide, ebhekise ubuso bakhe emhlabeni.
13_21_22_Wathi uDavide kuOrnan, Ndinike le ndawo yesanda,  ndimakhele uYehova khona isibingelo; wondinika ngenani elizeleyo, sithintelwe isibetho ebantwini.
13_21_23_Wathi uOrnan kuDavide, Yithabathele kuwe, inkosi yam ukumkani yenze okulungileyo emehlweni ayo; khangela, ndikunika iinkomo ezi ukuba zibe ngamadini anyukayo, nempahla yokubhula ibe ziinkuni, nengqolowa ukuba ibe ngumnikelo wokudla;  ndikunika konke oko.
13_21_24_Wathi ukumkani uDavide kuOrnan, Hayi; ndiya kusithenga ngexabiso elizalisekileyo; ngokuba andiyi kumthabathela nto iyeyakho uYehova, ndinyuse amadini anyukayo endiwazuze ngelize.
13_21_25_UDavide wamnika uOrnan ngaloo ndawo iishekele zegolide ezibunzima bumakhulu mathandathu.
13_21_26_Wakhela apho ke uDavide isibingelelo kuYehova, wanyusa amadini anyukayo nemibingelelo yoxolo, wanqula uYehova; waza yena wamphendula ngomlilo ovela ezulwini, phezu kwesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo.
13_21_27_Wathetha uYehova kwisithunywa, salibuyisela esingxobeni ikrele laso.
13_21_28_Ngelo xesha, akubona uDavide ukuba uYehova umphendule esandeni sikaOrnan umYebhusi, wamana ebingelela khona.
13_21_29_Ke umnquba kaYehova, awa wenzayo uMoses entlango,  nesibingelelo sedini elinyukayo, bezisesigangeni eGibheyon ngelo xesha.
13_21_30_UDavide ubengenakuya phambi kwawo amquqele uThixo; ngokuba ubesoyika ikrele lesithunywa sikaYehova.
13_22_1_Wathi uDavide, Yiyo le indlu kaYehova uThixo; siso esi isibingelelo sedini elinyukayo sikaSirayeli.
13_22_2_Wathi uDavide, mabawomele kuye abasemzini abasezweni lakwaSirayeli; wamisa abaqingqi bokuqingqa amatye axholiweyo,  okwakha indlu kaThixo.
13_22_3_UDavide walungisa isinyithi sasininzi sezikhonkwane zeengcango zamasango nesezibandakanyiso; nobhedu lwaluninzi,  alwaba nakulinganiswa;
13_22_4_nemisedare engenakubalwa; ngokuba abaseTsidon nabaseTire bazisa imisedare yamininzi kuDavide.
13_22_5_Wathi uDavide, USolomon unyana wam mncinane, uthambile; ke indlu eza kwakhelwa uYehova yeyokukhulisa, inyuse igama lakhe nodumo lwakhe emazweni onke; ngoko ke ndokha ndimlungiselele.  Walungisa ke kakhulu uDavide phambi kokufa kwakhe.
13_22_6_Wambiza uSolomon unyana wakhe, wamwisela umthetho wokuba amakhele uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, indlu.
13_22_7_Wathi uDavide kuSolomon, Nyana wam, ndandisithi entliziyweni yam, ndiya kulakhela igama likaYehova uThixo wam indlu.
13_22_8_Ke lafika kum ilizwi likaYehova, lisithi, Uphalaze igazi lalininzi, wenza iimfazwe ezinkulu; akuyi kulakhela ndlu igama lam, ngokuba uphalaze igazi elininzi ehlabathini phambi kwam.
13_22_9_Yabona, uya kuzalelwa unyana; yena uya kuba yindoda yoxolo;  ndiya kumphumza ezintshabeni zakhe zonke ngeenxa zonke; ngokuba liya kuba nguSolomon igama lakhe, ndiwanike uxolo nokuzola amaSirayeli ngeemini zakhe.
13_22_10_Nguye oya kulakhela igama lam indlu. Yena uya kuba ngunyana kum, mna ndibe nguyise kuye, ndiyizinzise itrone yobukumkani bakhe kumaSirayeli, kude kuse ephakadeni.
13_22_11_Kaloku, nyana wam, uYehova makabe nawe, ube nempumelelo,  uyakhe indlu kaYehova uThixo wakho, njengoko akuthethileyo ngawe.
13_22_12_Kodwa ke uYehova makakunike ukuqiqa nokuqonda, akuwisele umthetho ngamaSirayeli, ukuba uwugcine umyalelo kaYehova uThixo wakho.
