16_9_27_Wabanikela ezandleni zababandezeli babo, bababandezela.  Ngexesha lokubandezelwa kwabo bakhala kuwe; wena weva usemazulwini, wabanika abasindisi ngokweemfesane zakho ezinkulu, babasindisa ezandleni zababandezeli babo.
16_9_28_Bakuba nokuphumla, babuya benza okubi phambi kwakho,  wabashiya ezandleni zeentshaba zabo, zabanyathela. Babuya bakhala kuwe; wena weva usemazulwini, wabahlangula ngokweemfesane zakho amaxesha amaninzi.
16_9_29_Wangqina ngabo, ukuba ubabuyisele emyalelweni wakho; ke bona bakhukhumala, abayiphulaphula imithetho yakho; amasiko akho bona kuwo, awothi umntu owenzayo aphile ngawo; bamangala negxalaba, bazenza lukhuni iintamo zabo, abaphulaphula.
16_9_30_Wabathwala iminyaka emininzi, wangqina ngabo ngoMoya wakho,  ngabaprofeti bakho; abakubekela ndlebe; wabanikela ke ezandleni zezizwe zamazwe.
16_9_31_Ke ngeemfesane zakho ezinkulu akubagqibanga kuphele,  akubashiyanga; ngokuba unguThixo onobabalo, nemfesane.
16_9_32_Kaloku, Thixo wethu, Thixo omkhulu, oligorha, owoyikekayo,  ogcina umnqophiso nenceba, mayingabi ncinane phambi kwakho yonke indiniso esiyifumeneyo thina, nookumkani bethu,  nabathetheli bethu, nababingeleli bethu, nabaprofeti bethu,  noobawo, nabantu bakho bonke, kususela kwimihla yookumkani baseAsiriya, kude kube yile mini.
16_9_33_Ulilungisa entweni yonke esifikeleyo; ngokuba wena wenze inyaniso, ke thina senze okungendawo.
16_9_34_Ookumkani bethu, nabathetheli bethu, nababingeleli bethu,  noobawo, abawenzanga umyalelo wakho, abazibazanga iindlebe emithethweni yakho, nasezingqinweni zakho, owangqina ngazo ngabo.
16_9_35_Bona, ebukumkanini babo, ekulungeni kwakho okukhulu owabanikayo, ezweni elibanzi, elityebileyo, owabanikayo,  abakukhonzanga, ababuyanga ezenzweni zabo ezibi.
16_9_36_Yabona, singabakhonzi namhla; nelizwe owalinika oobawo,  ukuba sidle iziqhamo zalo nokulunga kwalo, nanku singabakhonzi kulo.
16_9_37_Ungeniselo lwalo lilwandisela ookumkani, owabamisa phezu kwethu ngenxa yezono zethu; bayayilawula imizimba yethu neenkomo zethu, ngokuzithandela kwabo; sisembandezelweni enkulu.
16_9_38_Ngezo zinto zonke senza umnqophiso wenene, sawubhala;  bawutywina abathetheli bethu, nabaLevi bethu, nababingeleli bethu.
16_10_1_Abo ke bawutywinayo: nguNehemiya irhuluneli, unyana kaHakaliya, noZedekiya,
16_10_2_noSeraya, noAzariya, noYeremiya,
16_10_3_noPashure, noAmariya, noMalekiya,
16_10_4_noHatushe, noShebhaniya, noMaluki,
16_10_5_noHarim, noMeremoti, no-Obhadiya,
16_10_6_noDaniyeli, noGineton, noBharuki,
16_10_7_noMeshulam, noAbhiya, noMiyamin,
16_10_8_noMahazeya, noBhilegayi, noShemaya; abo ngababingeleli.
16_10_9_AbaLevi: nguYeshuwa unyana ka-Azaniya, noBhinwi koonyana bakaHenadade, noKademiyeli.
16_10_10_Nabazalwana babo: nguShebhaniya, noHodiya, noKelita,  noPelaya, noHanan,
16_10_11_noMika, noRehobhi, noHashabhiya,
16_10_12_noZakure, noSherebhiya, noShebhaniya,
16_10_13_noHodiya, noBhani, noBheninu.
16_10_14_Iintloko zabantu: nguParoshe, noPahati wakwaMowabhi,  noElam, noZatu, noBhani,
16_10_15_noBhuni, noAzegadi, noBhebhayi,
16_10_16_noAdoniya, noBhigvayi, noAdin,
16_10_17_noAtere, noHezekiya, noAzure,
16_10_18_noHodiya, noHashum, noBhetsayi,
16_10_19_noHarifi, noAnatoti, noNebhayi,
16_10_20_noMagepihashe, noMeshulam, noHezire,
16_10_21_noMeshezabheli, noTsadoki, noYaduwa,
16_10_22_noPelatiya, noHanan, noAnaya,
16_10_23_noHosheya, noHananiya, noHashubhi,
16_10_24_noHaloheshe, noPileha, noShobheki,
16_10_25_noRehum, noHashabena, noMahaseya,
16_10_26_noAhiya, noHanan, noAnan,
16_10_27_noMaluki, noHarim, noBhahana.
16_10_28_Abanye abantu, ababingeleli, nabaLevi, nabamasango,  neemvumi, nabakhonzi betempile, nabo bonke ababezahlule kwizizwe zamazwe, beza emyalelweni kaThixo; abafazi babo,  noonyana babo, neentombi zabo, bonke abasebenokwazi nokuqonda.
16_10_29_Babambelela kubazalwana babo, iingangamsha zabo, bangena esiqalekisweni nasesifungweni sokuhamba ngomyalelo kaThixo,  owawiswa ngesandla sikaMoses umkhonzi kaThixo, nokuyigcina nokuyenza yonke imithetho kaYehova iNkosi yethu, namasiko akhe,  nemimiselo yakhe:
16_10_30_singazendiseli iintombi zethu kwizizwe zeli lizwe,  singabazekeli oonyana bethu iintombi zazo;
16_10_31_sithi izizwe zeli lizwe ezizisa izinto zentengo,  nengqolowa, nokuba yiyiphi, ngemini yesabatha, zithengisa,  singathengi kuzo ngesabatha nangomhla ongcwele; siwuyeke ulale umnyaka wesixhenxe, nento ebolekiweyo sisandla nokuba sesikabani.
16_10_32_Sizimisele imithetho yokubeka phezu kwethu isahlulo sesithathu seshekele ngomnyaka, ngenxa yenkonzo yendlu kaThixo wethu:
16_10_33_ngenxa yezonka ezicwangcisiweyo, nomnikelo wokudla wamaxesha onke, nangenxa yedini elinyukayo lamaxesha onke,  nelesabatha, nelokuthwasa kwenyanga, nangenxa yamaxesha amisiweyo, nangenxa yezinto ezingcwele, nangenxa yamadini ezono okucamagushela amaSirayeli, nomsebenzi wonke wendlu kaThixo wethu.
16_10_34_Sibawisele amaqashiso ngomsondezo weenkuni ababingeleli,  nabaLevi, nabantu, ukuba ziziswe endlwini kaThixo wethu,  ngokwezindlu zethu zooyise, ngamaxesha amisiweyo, iminyaka ngeminyaka, ukuba zibaswe esibingelelweni sikaYehova uThixo wethu, ngoko kubhaliweyo emyalelweni;
16_10_35_sizise iintlahlela zomhlaba wethu, neentlahlela zeziqhamo zonke zemithi yonke, iminyaka ngeminyaka, endlwini kaYehova;
16_10_36_nabamazibulo koonyana bethu nawemfuyo yethu, ngoko kubhaliweyo emyalelweni, namazibulo eenkomo zethu, nawempahla emfutshane, siwazise endlwini kaThixo wethu, kubabingeleli abalungiselelayo endlwini kaThixo wethu;
16_10_37_neentlahlela zemigrayo yethu, nemirhumo yethu, neziqhamo zemithi yonke, iwayini entsha, neoli, sizizise kubabingeleli emagumbini endlu kaThixo wethu; nezishumi zemihlaba yethu kubaLevi; bona abaLevi bazamkele izishumi emizini yonke esilima kuyo.
16_10_38_Umbingeleli unyana ka-Aron aze abekho nabaLevi,  ekuzamkeleni kwabaLevi izishumi; bazinyuse abaLevi izishumi zezishumi ezo, bazizise endlwini kaThixo wethu, emagumbini endlu yobuncwane;
16_10_39_ngokuba oonyana bakaSirayeli noonyana bakaLevi baya kuzisa umrhumo wengqolowa, newayini entsha, neoli, emagumbini apho zikhona iimpahla ezingcwele, nababingeleli abalungiselelayo,  nabamasango, neemvumi; indlu kaThixo wethu singayishiyi.
16_11_1_Bahlala abathetheli babantu eYerusalem; abanye abantu bawisa amaqashiso, ukuba kungeniswe abe mnye kwabalishumi,  ahlale eYerusalem kuwo umzi ongcwele, nezinye izahlulo ezisithoba zihlale kweminye imizi.
16_11_2_Abantu bawasikelela amadoda onke aqhutywa yintliziyo ukuba ahlale eYerusalem.
16_11_3_Zizo ezi iintloko zelizwe lakwaYuda, ezahlala eYerusalem;  ke emizini yakwaYuda, yaba ngulowo wahlala elifeni lakhe,  emizini yabo, ingamaSirayeli, nababingeleli, nabaLevi,  nabakhonzi betempile, noonyana babakhonzi bakaSolomon.
16_11_4_EYerusalem kwahlala ezoonyana bakaYuda, nezoonyana bakaBhenjamin. Koonyana bakaYuda: yanguAtaya, unyana kaUziya,  unyana kaZekariya, unyana ka-Amariya, unyana kaShefatiya,  unyana kaMahalaleli koonyana bakaPeretse;
16_11_5_noMahaseya, unyana kaBharuki, unyana kaKoli-hoze, unyana kaHazaya, unyana ka-Adaya, unyana kaYoyaribhi, unyana kaZekariya, unyana womSheloni.
16_11_6_Bonke oonyana bakaPeretse, ababehlala eYerusalem,  ibingamakhulu amane, anamanci mathandathu anesibhozo, amadoda anobukroti.
16_11_7_Ngabo aba oonyana bakaBhenjamin: ibinguSalu, unyana kaMeshulam, unyana kaYohedi, unyana kaPedaya, unyana kaKolaya,  unyana kaMahaseya, unyana kaItiyeli, unyana kaYesaya.
16_11_8_Emva kwakhe ibinguGabhayi-salayi, enamakhulu asithoba,  anamanci mabini anesibhozo;
16_11_9_noYoweli unyana kaZikri, umphathi kubo, noYuda unyana kaSenwa, engowesibini kubaphathi bomzi.
16_11_10_Kubabingeleli: ibinguYedaya unyana kaYoyaribhi, noYakin,
16_11_11_noSeraya, unyana kaHilekiya, unyana kaMeshulam, unyana kaTsadoki, unyana kaMerayoti, unyana ka-Ahitubhi, inganga yendlu kaThixo,
16_11_12_nabazalwana babo ababesenza umsebenzi wendlu, bengamakhulu asibhozo, anamanci mabini anababini; noAdaya unyana kaYeroham,  unyana kaPelaleya, unyana ka-Amtsi, unyana kaZekariya, unyana kaPashure, unyana kaMalekiya,
16_11_13_nabazalwana bakhe, iintloko zezindlu zooyise, bengamakhulu amabini, anamanci mane anababini; noAmashesayi, unyana ka-Azareli, unyana ka-Azayi, unyana kaMeshilemoti, unyana kaImere;
16_11_14_nabazalwana babo, amagorha anobukroti, belikhulu elinamanci mabini anesibhozo; umphathi kubo ibinguZabhediyeli unyana kaGedolim.
16_11_15_KubaLevi: ibinguShemaya unyana kaHashubhi, unyana ka-Azarikam, unyana kaHashabhiya, unyana kaBhuni,
16_11_16_noShabhetayi, noYozabhadi, ababephethe umsebenzi ongaphandle wendlu kaThixo, kwiintloko zabaLevi;
16_11_17_noMataniya unyana kaMika, unyana kaZabhedi, unyana ka-Asafu, obengumhlabeli wezokudumisa emthandazweni,  noBhakebhukiya, obengowesibini kubazalwana bakhe, noAbheda,  unyana kaShamuwa, unyana kaGalali, unyana kaYedutun.
16_11_18_Bebonke abaLevi emzini ongcwele babengamakhulu amabini,  anamanci asibhozo anabane.
16_11_19_Abamasango: ibinguAkubhi, noTalemon, nabazalwana babo abagcina amasango, belikhulu elinamanci asixhenxe anababini.
16_11_20_Amanye amaSirayeli, nababingeleli, nabaLevi, babekweminye imizi yonke yakwaYuda, elowo eselifeni lakhe.
16_11_21_Ke abakhonzi betempile babehlala eOfele; abakhonzi abo betempile babephethwe nguTsiha noGishpa.
16_11_22_Umphathi wabaLevi eYerusalem ibingu-Uzi unyana kaBhani,  unyana kaHashabhiya, unyana kaMataniya, unyana kaMika koonyana baka-Asafu, iimvumi, malunga nomsebenzi wendlu kaThixo.
16_11_23_Ngokuba umthetho wokumkani ubuphezu kwabo, nomnqophiso wenene ubuphezu keemvumi malunga nento yemini ngangemini yayo.
16_11_24_UPetaya unyana kaMeshezabheli, koonyana bakaZera, unyana kaYuda, ubesisandla sokumkani ezintweni zonke zabantu.
16_11_25_Emizini nasemaphandleni ayo kwahlala inxenye yoonyana bakaYuda eKiriyati ka-Arbha namagxamesi ayo, naseDibhon namagxamesi ayo, naseKabhetseli nemizi yayo,
16_11_26_naseYeshuwa, naseMolada, naseBhete-palete,
16_11_27_naseHatsore-shuwali, naseBher-shebha namagxamesi ayo,
16_11_28_naseTsikelage, naseMekona namagxamesi ayo,
16_11_29_nase-Enrimon, naseTsora, naseYarmuti,
16_11_30_naseZanowa, naseAdulam namagxamesi ayo, naseLakishe,  nasemaphandleni ayo, naseAzeka namagxamesi ayo. Bahlala ke,  bathabathela eBher-shebha besa emfuleni wakwaHinom.
16_11_31_Oonyana bakaBhenjamin bathabathela eGebha, besa eMikimas,  naseAya, naseBheteli namagxamesi ayo,
16_11_32_naseAnatoti, naseNobhi, naseAnaniya,
16_11_33_naseHatsore, naseRama, naseGitayim,
16_11_34_naseHadidi, naseTsebhoyim, naseNebhalati,
16_11_35_naseLode, naseOno emfuleni weengcibi.
16_11_36_NakubaLevi kwaphuma amaqela kwaYuda, eza kwaBhenjamin.
16_12_1_Ngabo aba ababingeleli nabaLevi, abenyuka noZerubhabheli unyana kaShelatiyeli, noYeshuwa: ibinguSeraya, noYeremiya,  noEzra,
16_12_2_noAmariya, noMaluki, noHatushe,
16_12_3_noShekaniya, noRehum, noMeremoti,
16_12_4_noIdo, noGinetohi, noAbhiya,
16_12_5_noMiyamin, noMahadiya, noBhilega,
16_12_6_noShemaya, noYoyaribhi, noYedaya,
16_12_7_noSalu, noAmoki, noHilekiya, noYedaya. Abo ibiziintloko zababingeleli nabazalwana babo, emihleni kaYeshuwa.
16_12_8_AbaLevi: ibinguYeshuwa, noBhinwi, noKademiyeli,  noSherebhiya, noYuda, noMataniya obephethe imibulelo, yena nabazalwana bakhe;
16_12_9_noBhakebhukiya, noUni; abazalwana babo babemalunga nabo besezigxineni.
16_12_10_Ke uYeshuwa wazala uYoyakim; uYoyakim wazala uEliyashibhi;  uEliyashibhi wazala uYoyada;
16_12_11_uYoyada wazala uYonatan; uYonatan wazala uYaduwa.
16_12_12_Ke emihleni kaYoyakim bekukho ababingeleli abaziintloko zezindlu zooyise: okaSeraya inguMeraya; okaYeremiya inguHananiya;
16_12_13_okaEzra inguMeshulam; oka-Amariya inguYohanan;
16_12_14_okaMeliku inguYonatan; okaShebhaniya inguYosefu;
16_12_15_okaHarim inguAdena; okaMerayoti inguHelekayi;
16_12_16_okaIdo inguZekariya; okaGineton inguMeshulam;
16_12_17_oka-Abhiya inguZikri; okaMinyamin, okaMowadiya inguPiletayi;
16_12_18_okaBhilega inguShamuwa; okaShemaya inguYonatan;
16_12_19_okaYoyaribhi inguMatenayi; okaYedaya ingu-Uzi;
16_12_20_okaSalayi inguKalayi; oka-Amoki inguEbhere;
16_12_21_okaHilekiya inguHashabhiya; okaYedaya inguNataniyeli.
16_12_22_Malunga nabaLevi, ngemihla kaEliyashibhi, noYoyada,  noYohanan, noYaduwa, kwabhalwa iintloko zezindlu zooyise;  nezababingeleli, ebukumkanini bukaDariyo umPersi.
16_12_23_Oonyana bakaLevi, iintloko zezindlu zooyise, babebhalwa encwadini yemicimbi yemihla, kwada kweza nasemihleni kaYohanan unyana kaEliyashibhi.
16_12_24_Ke iintloko zabaLevi: ibinguHashabhiya, noSherebhiya,  noYeshuwa unyana kaKademiyeli, nabazalwana babo malungana nabo,  ukuba badumise, babulele, ngokomthetho kaDavide umfo wakwaThixo, iqela lilunge neqela;
16_12_25_inguMataniya, noBhakebhukiya, no-Obhadiya, noMeshulam,  noTalemon, noAkubhi babengabamasango, begcina isigxina koovimba bamasango.
16_12_26_Abo babekho emihleni kaYoyakim unyana kaYeshuwa, unyana kaYotsadaki, nasemihleni kaNehemiya ibamba, noEzra umbingeleli,  umbhali.
16_12_27_Ke kaloku ekusungulweni kodonga lweYerusalem kwafunwa abaLevi ezindaweni zabo zonke, ukuba baziswe eYerusalem, ukuba ukusungulwa kwalo kwenziwe ngovuyo, nangemibulelo, nangeengoma,  nangamacangci, nangemirhubhe, nangeehadi.
16_12_28_Bahlanganisana oonyana beemvumi, bevela kuloo mmandla ujikeleze iYerusalem, nasemizini yamaNetofa;
16_12_29_naseBhete yaseGiligali, nasemihlabeni yaseGebha,  neAzemavete; ngokuba iimvumi zazizakhele imizi ejikeleze iYerusalem.
16_12_30_Bazihlambulula ababingeleli nabaLevi, bahlambulula abantu,  namasango, nodonga olo.
16_12_31_Ndabanyusa abathetheli bakwaYuda phezu kodonga, ndamisa amaqela amakhulu amabini okubulela, enza imityino, elinye lasinga ekunene phezu kodonga esangweni lenkunkuma.
16_12_32_Emva kwalo kwahamba uHoshaya nesiqingatha sabathetheli bakwaYuda,
16_12_33_noAzariya, noEzra, noMeshulam,
16_12_34_noYuda, noBhenjamin, noShemaya, noYeremiya.
16_12_35_Koonyana bababingeleli benamaxilongo yayinguZekariya unyana kaYonatan, unyana kaShemaya, unyana kaMataniya, unyana kaMikaya, unyana kaZakure, unyana ka-Asafu;
16_12_36_nabazalwana bakhe: ooShemaya, noAzareli, noMilalayi,  noGilalayi, noMahayi, noNataniyeli, noYuda, noHanani,  beneempahla zokuvuma zikaDavide umfo wakwaThixo; ke uEzra umbhali ebephambi kwabo.
16_12_37_Basinga esangweni lomthombo, bathi ngqo, benyuka ngezinyuko zomzi kaDavide, ekunyukeni kodonga bayongamela indlu kaDavide, besa esangweni lamanzi ngasempumalanga.
16_12_38_Iqela lesibini lokubulela elahamba malunga nelo,  ndingasemva kwalo, ndinesinye isiqingatha sabantu, lahamba phezu kodonga, layongamela inqaba ende yamaziko, lesa eludongeni olubanzi;
16_12_39_lasongamela isango lakwaEfrayim, nesango lodonga oludala,  nesango leentlanzi, nenqaba ende kaHananeli, nenqaba ende kaHameha, lada leza esangweni lempahla emfutshane, bamisa esangweni lentolongo.
16_12_40_Ema ke omabini amaqela okubulela endlwini kaThixo, mna ndinesiqingatha sabaphathi;
16_12_41_nababingeleli, ooEliyakim, noMahaseya, noMinyamin,  noMikaya, noEliyohenayi, noZekariya, noHananiya, benamaxilongo;
16_12_42_noMahaseya, noShemaya, noEleyazare, noUzi, noYohanan,  noMalekiya, noElam, noEzere. Iimvumi zavuma kakhulu, uYezeraya engumphathi wazo.
16_12_43_Babingelela ngaloo mini imibingelelo emikhulu, bavuya;  ngokuba uThixo ubebavuyisile ngovuyo olukhulu. Kananjalo abafazi nabantwana bavuya; kwavakala ukuvuya kweYerusalem namgama.
16_12_44_Ngaloo mini kwamiswa amadoda okuphatha amagumbi okubangoovimba bemirhumo, neentlahlela, nezishumi, ukuba zifunjwe kuwo, ngokwemihlaba yemizi, izabelo ezimiselwe ababingeleli nabaLevi ngomyalelo; ngokuba amaYuda abevuya ngababingeleli nangabaLevi abemiyo.
16_12_45_Basigcina isigxina sikaThixo wabo, nesigxina sentlambululo; zenjenjalo iimvumi nabamasango, ngokomthetho kaDavide, noSolomon unyana wakhe;
16_12_46_ngokuba ngemihla kaDavide, kwakudala, uAsafu ubeyintloko yeemvumi, neyokudumisa uThixo, neyokubulela kuye.
16_12_47_Onke amaSirayeli, ngemihla kaZerubhabheli nangemihla kaNehemiya, abe ezinika iimvumi nabamasango izabelo, into yemini ngangemini yayo, engcwalisela abaLevi, abaLevi bengcwalisela oonyana baka-Aron.
16_13_1_Ngaloo mini kwaleswa encwadini kaMoses ezindlebeni zabantu;  kwafunyanwa kubhaliwe kuyo ukuthi, Ama-Amon namaMowabhi makangangeni ebandleni likaThixo naphakade;
16_13_2_ngokuba engabakhawulelanga oonyana bakaSirayeli enesonka namanzi; esuka abaqeshela uBhileham, ukuba abaqalekise; ke uThixo wethu wayiguqula ingqalekiso yaba yintsikelelo.
16_13_3_Kwathi bakuva umyalelo lowo, bawahlula wonke umxube kumaSirayeli.
16_13_4_Ke kaloku phambi koko, uEliyashibhi umbingeleli, obemiswe phezu kwamagumbi endlu kaThixo wethu, wazalamanisa noTobhiya,
16_13_5_wamenzela igumbi elikhulu, apho bekufudula kubekwa khona umnikelo wokudla, nentlaka emhlophe, nempahla, nezishumi zengqolowa, nezewayini entsha, nezeoli, ezibe zimiselwe abaLevi neemvumi nabamasango; nemirhumo yababingeleli.
16_13_6_Ekwenzekeni oko konke bendingekho eYerusalem; ngokuba,  ngomnyaka wamashumi amathathu anesibini ka-Artashashta ukumkani waseBhabheli, ndaya kukumkani ekupheleni kwemihla, ndacela kukumkani ukuba ndibuye.
16_13_7_Ndafika ke eYerusalem, ndabugqala ububi abebenzile uEliyashibhi ngenxa kaTobhiya, ngokumenzela kwakhe igumbi ezintendelezweni zendlu kaThixo.
16_13_8_Kwaba kubi kum kakhulu; ndazilahlela phandle zonke iimpahla zendlu kaTobhiya ngaphandle kwegumbi.
16_13_9_Ndatsho, bawahlambulula amagumbi; ndazibuyisela khona iimpahla zendlu kaThixo, umnikelo wokudla, nentlaka emhlophe.
16_13_10_Ndazi ukuba izabelo zabaLevi abazinikwanga; ngokuba abaLevi neemvumi, ababesebenza umsebenzi, babebalekele elowo emhlabeni wakhe.
16_13_11_Ndabambana nabaphathi, ndathi, Yini na ukuba indlu kaThixo ishiywe nje? Ndababutha, ndabamisa esikhundleni sabo.
16_13_12_Aza onke amaYuda azisa izishumi zengqolowa, nezewayini entsha, nezeoli, koovimba.
16_13_13_Ndamisa phezu koovimba uShelemiya umbingeleli, noTsadoki umbhali, noPedaya kubaLevi; naphantsi kwezandla zabo yanguHanan unyana kaZakure, unyana kaMataniya; ngokuba bekusithiwa banyanisekile; bamiselwa ukwabela abazalwana babo.
16_13_14_Ndikhumbule, Thixo wam, ngenxa yoko; musa ukuzicima iinceba zam, endizenzileyo endlwini kaThixo wam, nasezigxineni zayo.
16_13_15_Ngaloo mihla ndabona kwaYuda abaxovula ezixovulelweni zewayini ngesabatha, nabathutha amasinde, abathwalisa amaesile;  kwanewayini, neediliya, namakhiwane, nemithwalo yonke, beyizisa eYerusalem ngemini yesabatha; ndaqononondisa ngaloo mini bathengisa ngokudla ngayo.
16_13_16_Kwakuhleli khona nabaseTire, bezise iintlanzi neento zonke zentengiso; bethengisa ngesabatha koonyana bakaYuda eYerusalem.
16_13_17_Ndabambana nabanumzana bakwaYuda, ndathi kubo, Yintoni na le nto imbi kangaka niyenzayo, niwuhlambelayo umhla wesabatha?
16_13_18_Babengenjenalo na ooyihlo, waza uThixo wethu wasifikisela thina nalo mzi bonke obo bubi? Ke nina nongeza ukuvutha komsindo kuSirayeli, niyihlambela nje isabatha.
16_13_19_Bekusithi, kwakuba lungcwalazi phakathi kwamasango aseYerusalem phambi kwesabatha, ndithi mazivalwe iingcango;  ndithi mazingavulwa ide igqithe isabatha. Ndamisa inxenye yamadodana akwam emasangweni, ukuze kungangeniswa mthwalo ngemini yesabatha.
16_13_20_Abarhwebi, nabathengisa ngeento zonke zentengiso, babelala ngaphandle kweYerusalem kanye nokuba kukabini.
16_13_21_Ndaqononondisa kubo, ndathi kubo, Yini na ukuba nilale phambi kodonga? Ukuba nithe naphinda, ndonisa isandla. Kususela kwelo xesha ababanga seza ngesabetha.
16_13_22_Ndathi kubaLevi mabazihlambulule, beze bagcine amasango,  ukuze kungcwaliswe umhla wesabatha. Ndikhumbulele nangale nto,  Thixo wam, ube nenceba kum ngokobuninzi benceba yakho.
16_13_23_Kananjalo ngaloo mihla ndawabona amaYuda abezeke abafazi abangama-Ashdodekazi, nama-Amonikazi, namaMowabhikazi,
16_13_24_oonyana babo inxenye bethetha ngesiAshdode, bengenakuqonda ukuthetha ngesiYuda, bethetha ngokwentetho yezizwe ngezizwe.
16_13_25_Ndabambana nawo, ndawatshabhisa, ndabetha amadoda kuwo,  ndawadlathula iinwele, ndawafungisa uThixo ngokuthi, Inene,  iintombi zenu aniyi kuzendisela koonyana babo, neentombi zabo aniyi kuzizekela oonyana benu, aniyi kuzizeka nani ngokwenu.
16_13_26_Wayengone ngenxa yabo yini na uSolomon, ukumkani wamaSirayeli? Ezintlangeni ezininzi kwakungekho kumkani unjengaye: ubethandwa nguThixo wakhe, uThixo wamnika ukuba ngukumkani wamaSirayeli onke; naye lowo bamonisa abafazi bezinye iintlanga.
16_13_27_Makuvakale ngani na, ukuba nenze bonke obu bubi bukhulu,  bokwenza ubumenemene kuThixo wethu, ngokuzeka abafazi bezinye iintlanga?
16_13_28_Ke kaloku koonyana bakaYoyada, unyana kaEliyashibhi,  umbingeleli omkhulu, bekukho kubo ongumyeni kwaSanebhalati waseHoron; ndamgxotha ke kum.
16_13_29_Bakhumbule, Thixo wam, ngenxa yokuhlambela kwabo ububingeleli, nomnqophiso wobubingeleli, nowobuLevi.
16_13_30_Ndawahlambuluka ke ezintweni zonke zezinye iintlanga,  ndazimisa izigxina zababingeleli nezabaLevi, zomntu ngomntu emsebenzini wakhe,
16_13_31_nezomsondezo weenkuni ngamaxesha amisiweyo,  nezeentlahlela. Ndikhumbulele okulungileyo, Thixo wam.
17_1_1_Ke kaloku kwathi ngemihla ka-Ahaswerosi (lo Ahaswerosi ke ubengukumkani, ethabathela eIndiya, wezisa kwaKushi: kumazwe alikhulu elinamanci mabini anesixhenxe),
17_1_2_ngaloo mihla, xa wayehleli ukumkani uAhaswerosi etroneni yobukumkani bakhe, eseShushan komkhulu,
17_1_3_ngomnyaka wesithathu wobukumkani bakhe, wabenzela isidlo bonke abathetheli bakhe nabakhonzi bakhe; xa impi yamaPersi neyamaMedi, amawaba nabathetheli bamazwe, bebephambi kwakhe;
17_1_4_akubon ukuba ubonisa abantu ubutyebi obuzukileyo bobukumkani bakhe, nesihombo esinqabileyo sobukhulu bakhe imihla emininzi, imihla elikhulu elinamanci asibhozo.
17_1_5_Ekuzalisekeni kwaloo mihla, ukumkani wabenzela isidlo bonke abantu abafumaneka eShushan komkhulu, kwathabathela kwabakhulu,  kwesa kwabancinane, imihla yasixhenxe, entendelezweni yomyezo wendlu yokumkani.
17_1_6_Amalengalenga ayengawelinen emhlophe, necikizekileyo, nemsi,  ebotshwe ngeentsontelo zelinen ecikizekileyo nemfusa kumakhonkco esilivere, nakwiintsika zemarmore emhlophe;  izingqengqelo izezegolide nezesilivere, phezu kombekelelo wamatye aluhlaza, namhlophe, naziiperile, namnyama.
17_1_7_Kwaye kuselwa ngeempahla zegolide, ziziimpahla ngeempahla;  ininzi iwayini yakomkhulu ngokwamandla okumkani.
17_1_8_Ukusela kwaye kungokomthetho kungekho unyanzelayo: kuba wenjenjalo ukumkani ukumisela zonke izikhulu zendlu yakhe,  ukuba enze elowo nalowo ngokuzithandela kwakhe.
17_1_9_Kananjalo uVashti ukumkanikazi wenzela abafazi isidlo endlwini yakomkhulu, ebiyekakumkani uAhaswerosi.
17_1_10_Ngomhla wesixhenxe, xa intliziyo yokumkani yayimnandi yiwayini, wabayalela ooMehuman, noBhizeta, noHarbhona,  noBhigeta, noAbhageta, noZetare, noKarkasi, ababusi abasixhenxe abalungiselelayo ebusweni bokumkani, wathi,
17_1_11_mabamzise uVashti ukumkanikazi phambi kokumkani enonkontsho lobukumkanikazi, ukuba abonise abantu nabathetheli ubuhle bakhe; ngokuba ebeyinzwakazi, imbonakalo yakhe.
17_1_12_Akavumanga ukumkanikazi uVashti ukuza ngelizwi lokumkani ngababusi abo.
17_1_13_Waba noburhalarhume obukhulu ukumkani, bavutha ubushushu bakhe kuye.
17_1_14_Wathi ke ukumkani kwizilumko eziwaziyo amaxesha (ngokuba ibisenjiwa njalo into yokumkani phambi kwabo bonke abawaziyo umthetho nesiko; ababekufuphi kuye, ooKarshena, noShetare,  noAdemata, noTarshishe, noMeres, noMarsena, noMemukan,  abathetheli abasixhenxe bamaPersi namaMedi, ababebubona ubuso bokumkani, ababehlala ezihlalweni zobukhulu ebukumkanini),  wathi,
17_1_15_Ngokomthetho angenziwa ntoni na ukumkanikazi uVashti,  ngenxa yokuba engalenzanga ilizwi lokumkani uAhaswerosi ngababusi?
17_1_16_Wathi uMemukan phambi kokumkani nabathetheli, UVashti ukumkanikazi akaphosise kukumkani yedwa; uphosise nakubathetheli bonke, nakwizizwe zonke ezisemazweni onke okumkani uAhaswerosi.
17_1_17_Kuba le ndawo yokumkanikazi iya kuphuma, ifikelele kubafazi bonke, adeleke amadoda abo emehlweni abo, xa kuthiwa, Ukumkani uAhaswerosi wathi makeziswe uVashti ukumkanikazi phambi kwakhe,  akeza.
17_1_18_Kananjalo amakhosikazi asePersi naseMedi ayivayo le nto yokumkanikazi, aya kuyixela kwanamhlanje kubathetheli bonke bokumkani, kwande ke ukudela noburhalarhume.
17_1_19_Ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani, makuphume ilizwi lokumkani ebusweni bakhe, libhalwe emithethweni yamaPersi namaMedi, ukuze lingatshitshi, lokuba uVashti angabi seza phambi kokumkani uAhaswerosi, ukumkani abunikele ubukumkanikazi bakhe kuwabo olungileyo kunaye.
17_1_20_Wothi ke wakuvakala umthetho wokumkani, aya kuwenza ebukumkanini bakhe bonke (ngokuba bukhulu), bonke abafazi bawabeke amadoda abo, kuthabathele kwenkulu, kuse kwencinane.
17_1_21_Ilizwi elo lalunga emehlweni okumkani nabathetheli. Wenza ke ukumkani ngokwelizwi likaMemukan.
17_1_22_Wathumela iincwadi emazweni onke kakumkani, kwilizwe ngelizwe, njengokubhala kwalo, kwizizwe ngezizwe ngokweentetho zazo, okokuba amadoda onke alawule ezindlwini zawo, athethe ngentetho yakowawo.
17_2_1_Emva kwezi zinto, bakudamba ubushushu bokumkani uAhaswerosi,  wamkhumbula uVashti, noko abekwenzile, noko bekugqitywe ngaye.
17_2_2_Athi amadodana akwakumkani abelungiselela kuye, Ukumkani makafunelwe iintombi eziseziintombi, ezimbonakalo intle.
17_2_3_Ukumkani makayalele abaphathi emazweni onke obukumkani bakhe, bahlanganise zonke iintombi eziseziintombi, ezimbonakalo intle, bazizise eShushan komkhulu, endlwini yabafazi, phantsi kwesandla sikaHegayi, ithenwa lokumkani, umgcini wabafazi,  zinikwe izinto zokuthambisa.
17_2_4_Ize ithi intombi ethe yalunga emehlweni okumkani, ibe ngukumkanikazi esikhundleni sikaVashti. Lalunga elo lizwi emehlweni okumkani; wenjenjalo ke.
17_2_5_Kwakukho ke eShushan komkhulu indoda engumYuda, egama linguMordekayi, unyana kaYahire, unyana kaShimehi, unyana kaKishe, indoda engumBhenjamin;
17_2_6_eyayithinjiwe eYerusalem nabathinjwa, ababethinjwe noYekoniya ukumkani wakwaYuda, owathinjwa nguNebhukadenetsare,  ukumkani waseBhabheli.
17_2_7_Yaye ingumondli kaHadasa (nguEstere ke lowo), intombi kayisekazi; ngokuba ebengenayise nanina. Intombi leyo yayimile kakuhle, intle nasebusweni. Emva kokufa kukayise nonina,  uMordekayi wayithabatha yaba yintombi yakhe.
17_2_8_Kwathi ekuvakaleni kwelizwi lokumkani nomthetho wakhe,  ekuhlanganisweni kweentombi ezininzi eShushan komkhulu, phantsi kwesandla sika Hegayi, wasiwa noEstere endlwini yokumkani,  phantsi kwesandla sikaHegayi, umgcini wabafazi.
17_2_9_Yamkholisa intombi leyo, wayenzela ububele, wakhawuleza,  wayinika izinto zayo zokuthambisa, nezabelo zayo, wayinika neentombi ezisixhenxe ezihleliweyo, ezivela endlwini yokumkani;  wayibeka yona nomthinjana wayo kweyona ndawo intle kwindlu yabafazi.
17_2_10_UEstere ubengabaxelanga abantu bakowabo nemizalwane yakhe;  kuba uMordekayi wayemwisele umthetho wokuba angabaxeli.
17_2_11_UMordekayi waye mana ukuhamba imihla ngemihla yonke phambi kwentendelezo yendlu yabafazi, ukuba akwazi ukuphila kukaEstere, nokwenziwayo kuye.
17_2_12_Ke kaloku ekufikeni kwexesha lentombi ngentombi lokuya kukumkani uAhaswerosi, ekupheleni kokwenziwa kwesiko labafazi iinyanga ezilishumi elinambini (kuba bekunjalo ukuzaliseka kwemihla yokuthanjiswa kwazo; iinyanga ezintandathu bekusenziwa ngeoli yemore, ezinye iinyanga ezintandathu ngobulawu nangeento zokuthambisa abafazi),
17_2_13_ngelo xesha ke ibe isithi intombi ukuya kukumkani, kuthi konke ebikunqwenela ikunikwe, ihambe nako, iphuma endlwini yabafazi ukuya endlwini yokumkani.
17_2_14_Ibisakuya ngokuhlwa, ngengomso ibuyele kweyesibini indlu yabafazi, ephantsi kogcino lukaShahashgazi, ithenwa lokumkani,  umgcini wamashweshwe. Ibingabi saya kukumkani, engayinanzanga ukumkani, ayibize ngegama.
17_2_15_Ekufikeni kwexesha likaEstere, intombi ka-Abhihayili,  uyisekazi kaMordekayi, obeyithabathe ukuba ibe yintombi yakhe,  lokuba aye kukumkani, akafunanga nto ingaxelwanga nguHegayi ithenwa lokumkani, umgcini wabafazi. UEstere wababalwa ngabo bonke abambonayo.
17_2_16_Wasiwa ke uEstere kukumkani uAhaswerosi, endlwini yakhe yobukumkani, ngenyanga yeshumi (leyo yinyanga enguTebhete),  ngomnyaka wesixhenxe wobukumkani bakhe.
17_2_17_Ukumkani wamthanda uEstere ngaphezu kwabafazi bonke;  wambabala, wamenzela inceba ngaphezu kweentombi zonke;  unkontsho lobukumkanikazi walubeka entlokweni yakhe, wamenza ukumkanikazi esikhundleni sikaVashti.
17_2_18_Ukumkani wabenzela isidlo esikhulu abathetheli bakhe nabakhonzi bakhe, isidlo sikaEstere; wawaphumza amazwe, wapha izipho ngokwamandla okumkani.
17_2_19_Ke kaloku ekuhlanganisweni kweentombi okwesibini, ubehleli uMordekayi esangweni lokumkani.
17_2_20_UEstere ubengayixelanga imizalwane yakhe nabantu bakowabo,  njengoko uMordekayi wayemmisele; ngokuba ilizwi likaMordekayi ubelenza uEstere, njengokuba wayesondliwa nguye.
17_2_21_Ngaloo mihla kwathi, uMordekayi ehleli esangweni lokumkani,  baba noburhalarhume uBhigetan noTereshe, amathenwa amabini okumkani, abagcini bomnyango, bafuna ukumsa izandla ukumkani uAhaswerosi.
17_2_22_Yaziwa loo nto nguMordekayi, waxelela uEstere ukumkanikazi;  uEstere waxelela ukumkani egameni likaMordekayi.
17_2_23_Yancinwa loo nto, yafunyanwa; baxhonywa bobabini emthini.  Yabhalwa loo nto encwadini yemicimbi yemihla phambi kokumkani.
17_3_1_Emveni kwezo zinto, ukumkani uAhaswerosi wamenza mkhulu uHaman unyana kaHamedata, umAgagi; wamphakamisa, wasimisa isihlalo sakhe ngaphezu kwabathetheli bonke ababenaye.
17_3_2_Bonke abakhonzi bokumkani, ababesesangweni lokumkani,  babeguqa, baqubude kuHaman; kuba wenjenjalo ukumkani ukuwisa umthetho ngaye; ke yena uMordekayi akaguqa, akaqubuda kuye.
17_3_3_Abakhonzi bokumkani, ababesesangweni lokumkani, bathi kuMordekayi, Yini na ukuba uwugqithe umthetho wokumkani?
17_3_4_Kwathi ke, bakumana ukutsho kuye imihla ngemihla,  engaphulaphuli kubo, bamxelela uHaman, ukukhangela ukuba aya kuma na amazwi kaMordekayi. Kuba ubebaxelele ukuba yena ungumYuda.
17_3_5_Wabona uHaman ukuba uMordekayi akaguqi, akaqubudi kuye;  wasuka uHaman wazala ngumsindo.
17_3_6_Wakucekisa ukuba amse izandla uMordekayi yedwa; kuba ubebaxelelwe abantu bakuloMordekayi; wangxamela ke uHaman ukuwatshabalalisa onke amaYuda abesebukumkanini bonke buka-Ahaswerosi, abantu bakuloMordekayi.
17_3_7_Ngenyanga yokuqala (yinyanga enguNisan ke leyo), ngomnyaka weshumi elinesibini wokumkani uAhaswerosi, kwawiswa iPuri (liqashiso ke elo) phambi koHaman, imini ngemini, inyanga ngenyanga, yada yaba yeyeshumi elinesibini; yinyanga enguAdare ke leyo.
17_3_8_Wathi uHaman kukumkani uAhaswerosi, Kukho abantu abathile abathe saa, abangene phakathi kwezizwe emazweni onke obukumkani bakho; nemithetho yabo yahlukile kweyabantu bonke, abayenzi imithetho yokumkani; akufanelekile kukumkani ukubayeka.
17_3_9_Ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani, makubhalwe batshatyalaliswe.  Ndolinganisela ezandleni zabawenzayo loo msebenzi wokumkani amawaka alishumi eetalente zesilivere, ukuba ziziswe ebutyebini bokumkani.
17_3_10_Ukumkani wawukhulula umsesane wakhe esandleni sakhe,  wawunika uHaman unyana kaHamedata, umAgagi, umbandezeli wamaYuda.
17_3_11_Wathi ukumkani kuHaman, Uyinikiwe isilivere leyo, nabantu abo; makwenziwe kubo ngoko kulungileyo emehlweni akho.
17_3_12_Kwabizwa ke ababhali bokumkani ngenyanga yokuqala, ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu kuyo. Kwabhalwa ngokomthetho wonke kaHaman, kwiirhuluneli zokumkani, nakumabamba abephethe amazwe ngamazwe, nakubathetheli babantu ngabantu, kumazwe ngamazwe ngokokubhala kwawo, kubantu ngabantu ngokweentetho zabo.  Kwabhalwa egameni lokumkani uAhaswerosi, kwatywinwa ngomsesane wokumkani.
17_3_13_Zathunyelwa iincwadi ngezigidimi kumazwe onke okumkani,  ukuba kutshatyalaliswe, kubulawe, kusingelwe phantsi onke amaYuda, kuthabathele kumfana, kuse kwindoda enkulu, iintsana nabafazi, ngamini-nye, ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu wenyanga yeshumi elinesibini (yinyanga enguAdare ke leyo); kuphangwe amaxhoba awo.
17_3_14_Intetho yencwadi leyo, yokuze awiselwe umthetho onke amazwe ngamazwe, yaya yathunyelwa kwizizwe zonke, ukuba zihlale ziwulungiselelwe loo mhla.
17_3_15_Izigidimi zaphuma zingxamile ngelizwi lokumkani; umthetho lowo wawiswa eShushan komkhulu. Ke ukumkani noHaman bahlala phantsi, basela; wona umzi waseShushan wadideka.
17_4_1_Ke kaloku uMordekayi wakwazi konke oko kwenziweyo.  Wazikrazula uMordekayi iingubo zakhe, wambatha ezirhwexayo nothuthu, waphuma waya phakathi komzi, wakhala ngesikhalo esikhulu, esikrakra.
17_4_2_Wafika phambi kwesango lokumkani; kuba bekungangeni mntu esangweni lokumkani ambethe ezirhwexayo.
17_4_3_Kuwo onke amazwe ngamazwe, kwindawo elithe lafika kuyo ilizwi lokumkani nomthetho wakhe, yaba sisijwili esikhulu kumaYuda, nokuzila ukudla, nokulila, nokumbambazela. Abaninzi bandlala iingubo ezirhwexayo nothuthu.
17_4_4_Zeza ke iimpelesi zikaEstere namathenwa akwakhe, amxelela.  Wamana ezibhijabhija ukumkanikazi, ebuhlungu, wathumela iingubo zokumambesa uMordekayi, zisuswe kuye ezirhwexayo; akazamkela.
17_4_5_UEstere wabiza uHataki wakumathenwa okumkani, obemiswe ukuba amlungisele, wamwisela umthetho kuMordekayi, ukuba azi ukuba kutheni na, kungani na.
17_4_6_Waphuma uHataki, waya kuMordekayi endaweni yembutho yomzi,  ebiphambi kwesango lokumkani.
17_4_7_UMordekayi wamxelela konke okumhleleyo, wamcacisela inani lemali, abethe uHaman, uya kulilinganisela ebutyebini bokumkani ngenxa yamaYuda, ukuba atshatyalaliswe.
17_4_8_Wamnika nencwadi leyo yomthetho obuwiswe eShushan wokuwatshabalalisa, ukuze ayibonise uEstere, amxelele, amwisele umthetho wokuba aye kukumkani, atarhuzise kuye, athandazele abantu bakowabo ebusweni bakhe.
17_4_9_Weza uHataki, wamxelela uEstere amazwi kaMordekayi.
17_4_10_Wathetha uEstere kuHataki, wamwisela umthetho kuMordekayi,  esithi,
17_4_11_Bonke abakhonzi bokumkani, nabantu bamazwe okumkani, bayazi ukuba umntu, noyindoda noyinkazana, othe waya kukumkani entendelezweni engaphakathi, engabizwanga, mnye umthetho wakhe,  ngowokuba abulawe; ngulowo yedwa, athe ukumkani wamolulela intonga yakhe yegolide, owothi aphile; ke mna andibizwanga ukuba ndiye kukumkani le mihla imashumi mathathu.
17_4_12_Bamxelela ke uMordekayi amazwi kaEstere.
17_4_13_Wathi uMordekayi ukumphendula uEstere, Musa ukuthi emphefumlweni wakho, uya kusinda wena endlwini yokumkani ngaphezu kwamaYuda onke.
17_4_14_Ngokuba xa uthe wahlala wathi tu ngeli xesha, ukuphefumla nokuhlangulwa kowavelela amaYuda kwenye indawo; ke wena nendlu yoyihlo nitshatyalaliswe. Ngubani na owaziyo, hi kanti ungene ebukumkanini ngenxa yexesha elinje?
17_4_15_Wathi uEstere ukumphendula uMordekayi,
17_4_16_Yiya uwahlanganise onke amaYuda anokufumaneka eShushan,  nizile ukudla ngenxa yam. Musani ukudla, musani ukusela,  imihla ibe mithathu, ubusuku nemini. Mna kananjalo neempelesi zam siya kwenjenjalo ukuzila ukudla; ndenjenjalo ukuya kukumkani ngokungesesikweni, nditshabalale ukuba ndiyatshabalala.
17_4_17_UMordekayi wegqitha, wenza ngako konke uEstere abemwisele umthetho ngako.
17_5_1_Kwathi ngomhla wesithathu, uEstere wambatha ezobukumkanikazi, wema entendelezweni engaphakathi yendlu yokumkani, malungana nendlu yokumkani. Waye ukumkani ehleli etroneni yobukumkani bakhe endlwini yobukumkani, malunga nomnyango wendlu.
17_5_2_Kwathi, ukumkani akumbona uEstere ukumkanikazi emi entendelezweni, wambabala; ukumkani wayolulela kuEstere intonga yegolide ebisesandleni sakhe. Wasondela ke uEstere, waphatha encamini yentonga leyo.
17_5_3_Wathi ukumkani kuye, Unandawoni na, kumkanikazi Estere?  Ufuna ntoni na? woyinikwa kude kube sesiqingatheni sobukumkani.
17_5_4_Wathi uEstere, Ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani, makeze ukumkani noHaman namhla esidlweni endimenzele sona.
17_5_5_Wathi ukumkani, Mngxamiseni uHaman, ukuba enze ngokwelizwi likaEstere. Weza ukumkani noHaman esidlweni abesenzile uEstere.
17_5_6_Wathi ukumkani kuEstere esidlweni sewayini, Ucela ntoni na?  woyinikwa; ufuna ntoni na? woyenzelwa kude kube sesiqingatheni sobukumkani.
17_5_7_Waphendula uEstere, wathi, Kuko oku ukucela kwam nokuthandaza kwam:
17_5_8_ukuba ndithe ndababalwa ngukumkani, ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani ukundinika endikucelayo, nokundenzela ukuthandaza kwam, makeze ukumkani noHaman esidlweni, endiya kubenzela sona,  ndenze ngomso ngokwelizwi lokumkani.
17_5_9_Waphuma uHaman ngaloo mini evuya, enentliziyo echwayithileyo. Ke uthe uHaman, akumbona uMordekayi esangweni lokumkani, engavuki, engashukumi phambi kwakhe, uHaman wazala ngumsindo ngoMordekayi.
17_5_10_Ke uHaman wazibamba, waya endlwini yakhe; wathumela wabiza izithandane zakhe, noZereshe umkakhe.
17_5_11_UHaman wababalisela ubuqaqawuli bobutyebi bakhe, nobuninzi boonyana bakhe, nako konke ukwenziwa mkhulu kwakhe ngukumkani,  nokuphakanyiswa kwakhe phezu kwabathetheli babakhonzi bokumkani.
17_5_12_Wathi uHaman, Ngaphezu koko, uEstere ukumkanikazi akangenisanga bani nokumkani esidlweni abesenzile, yaba ndim ndedwa; kananjalo ngomso undimemele kuye nokumkani.
17_5_13_Ukanti konke oko akundanelisi, wonke ugama endimbonayo uMordekayi umYuda esahleli esangweni lokumkani.
17_5_14_Wathi uZereshe umkakhe nezithandane zakhe zonke kuye,  Mabenze umthi ube ziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu ubude bawo,  uthethe kusasa kukumkani, bamxhome uMordekayi kuwo; uye ke nokumkani esidlweni uvuya. Lalunga elo lizwi kuHaman; wawenza umthi lowo.
17_6_1_Ngobo busuku, bemka ababakho ubuthongo kukumkani; wathi maziziswe iincwadi zezikhumbuzo zemicimbi yemihla; zamana zileswa phambi kokumkani.
17_6_2_Kwafunyanwa kubhaliwe okokuba uMordekayi wabaxela ooBhigetan noTereshe, amathenwa amabini okumkani, abagcini bomnyango,  ababefuna ukumsa izandla ukumkani uAhaswerosi.
17_6_3_Wathi ukumkani, Wenzelwe mbekoni na, nabukhulu buni na uMordekayi ngenxa yoko? Athi amadodana akwakumkani,  abelungiselela kuye, Akenzelwanga nto.
17_6_4_Wathi ukumkani, Ngubani na osentendelezweni? Ke kaloku uHaman ubengene entendelezweni engaphandle yendlu yokumkani,  esiza kuthi kukumkani, makaxhonywe uMordekayi emthini,  abemlungisele wona.
17_6_5_Athi amadodana akwakumkani kuye, Nankuya uHaman emi entendelezweni. Wathi ukumkani, Makangene.
17_6_6_Wangena ke uHaman. Wathi ukumkani kuye, Makwenziwe ntoni na kwindoda, athanda ukuyibeka embekweni ukumkani? Wathi uHaman entliziyweni yakhe, Ukumkani angathanda ukubeka bani na embekweni, agqithe mna?
17_6_7_Wathi uHaman kukumkani, Indoda athandayo ukuyibeka embekweni ukumkani,
17_6_8_mabazise isambatho sobukumkani, ambatha sona ukumkani,  nehashe akhwela kulo ukumkani, lubekwe entlokweni yayo unkontsho lobukumkani;
17_6_9_basinikele isambatho eso nehashe elo esandleni somthetheli wakumawaba okumkani, baya mbathise indoda leyo athanda ukuyibeka embekweni ukumkani, bayikhwelise ehasheni elo, icande ezitratweni zomzi, badanduluke phambi kwayo, bathi, Kwenjiwa nje, kwindoda athanda ukuyibeka embekweni ukumkani.
17_6_10_Wathi ukumkani kuHaman, Ngxama uthabathe isambatho eso nehashe elo, njengoko ukuthethileyo, wenjenjalo kuMordekayi umYuda, ohleli esangweni lokumkani. Makungawi phantsi nalinye ilizwi kuko konke okuthethileyo.
17_6_11_UHaman wasithabatha isambatho eso nehashe elo, wamambathisa uMordekayi, wamkhwelisa, wamcandisa ezitratweni zomzi,  wadanduluka phambi kwakhe ngokuthi, Kwenjiwa nje kwindoda athanda ukuyibeka embekweni ukumkani.
17_6_12_Wabuya uMordekayi, weza esangweni lokumkani; ke uHaman wangxama waya endlwini yakhe, ethe matshamatsha, egqubuthele intloko.
17_6_13_UHaman wamcacisela uZereshe umkakhe, nezithandane zakhe zonke, konke okumhleleyo. Zathi kuye izilumko zakhe noZereshe umkakhe, Ukuba ngowembewu yamaYuda uMordekayi lo, uqalileyo ukuwa phambi kwakhe, akunakumthini; ke wowa uwile phambi kwakhe.
17_6_14_Bathe besathetha naye, kwafika amathenwa okumkani,  bangxamisa ukumsa uHaman esidlweni abesenzile uEstere.
17_7_1_Ukumkani noHaman beza kusela noEstere ukumkanikazi.
17_7_2_Wathi ukumkani kuEstere nangomhla wesibini, besesidlweni sewayini, Ucela ntoni na, Estere, kumkanikazi? woyinikwa; ufuna ntoni na? woyenzelwa kude kube sesiqingatheni sobukumkani.
17_7_3_Waphendula uEstere ukumkanikazi, wathi, Ukuba ndithe ndababalwa nguwe, kumkani, ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani,  mandinikwe ubomi bam ngokucela kwam, nabantu bakowethu ngokuthandaza kwam.
17_7_4_Kuba kuthengisiwe ngathi, mna nabantu bakowethu, ukuze sitshatyalaliswe, sibulawe, sisingelwe phantsi. Ukuba bekuthengiswe ngathi ukuba sibe ngamakhoboka namakhobokazana,  ndinge ndithe cwaka; ngokuba umbandezeli lowo ubengeyibuyiseli inkxwaleko yokumkani.
17_7_5_Waza ukumkani uAhaswerosi wathi kuEstere ukumkanikazi,  Ngubani na lowo? uphi na yena lowo, uzalise intliziyo yakhe ukwenjenjalo?
17_7_6_Wathi uEstere, Indoda engumbandezeli, elutshaba, ngulo Haman ungendawo. Wadandatheka ke uHaman ebusweni bokumkani nokumkanikazi.
17_7_7_Wesuka ke ukumkani enomsindo esidlweni sewayini, waya emyezweni wendlu. Ke uHaman wema, ebuthandazela ubomi bakhe kuEstere ukumkanikazi; kuba ebebona ukuba ukumkani ugqibe kwelobubi kuye.
17_7_8_Ukumkani wabuya emyezweni wendlu, wangena endlwini yesidlo sewayini, uHaman ewe phezu kwesingqengqelo abekuso uEstere.  Wathi ukumkani, Angade ukumkanikazi agonyamelwe enam, endlwini apha na? Liyathi ukuphuma elo lizwi emlonyeni wokumkani, baya bagqubuthela ubuso bukaHaman.
17_7_9_Wathi uHarbhona, elinye lakumathenwa abemi phambi kokumkani,  Nanguya umthi, uHaman abewenzele uMordekayi, owathetha okulungileyo ngokumkani, umi endlwini kaHaman; ubude bawo buziikubhite ezimashumi mahlanu. Wathi ukumkani, Mxhomeni kuwo.
17_7_10_Bamxhoma ke uHaman emthini lowo, abewulungisele uMordekayi.  Wadamba ke umsindo wokumkani.
17_8_1_Ngaloo mini, ukumkani uAhaswerosi wamnika uEstere ukumkanikazi indlu kaHaman, umbandezeli wamaYuda. UMordekayi weza phambi kokumkani; kuba uEstere ubeyixelile into abeyiyo kuye.
17_8_2_Ukumkani wakhulula umsesane wakhe, abewuthabathe kuHaman,  wanika uMordekayi. UEstere wammisa uMordekayi phezu kwendlu kaHaman.
17_8_3_Waphinda uEstere, wathetha phambi kokumkani, ewe phambi kweenyawo zakhe, elila etarhuzisa kuye, ukuba abutshitshise ububi bukaHaman umAgagi, nengcinga yakhe abeyicingile ngamaYuda.
17_8_4_Waza ukumkani wayolulela kuEstere intonga yegolide; wavuka uEstere, wema phambi kokumkani.
17_8_5_Wathi, Ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani, ukuba ndithe ndababalwa nguye, yafaneleka le nto phambi kokumkani, nam ndalunga emehlweni akhe: makubhalwe zibuye iincwadi zengcinga kaHaman unyana kaHamedata, umAgagi, awazibhalela ukuwatshabalalisa amaYuda asemazweni onke kakumkani.
17_8_6_Kuba ndingathini na ukuba nako ukububonela ububi obuya kubazela abantu bakowethu? Ndingathini na ukuba nako ukukubona ukutshatyalaliswa kwemizalwane yam?
17_8_7_Wathi ukumkani uAhaswerosi kuEstere ukumkanikazi,  nakuMordekayi umYuda, Yabonani, indlu kaHaman ndiyinike uEstere; yena ngokwakhe bamxhoma emthini, ngenxa yokuba wasa isandla sakhe kumaYuda.
17_8_8_Ngoko ke, nina bhalani ngamaYuda ngoko kulungileyo emehlweni enu egameni lokumkani, nitywine ngomsesane wokumkani; kuba incwadi ebhalwe egameni lokumkani, yatywinwa ngomsesane wokumkani, akukho unokuyibuyisa.
17_8_9_Babizwa ke ababhali bokumkani ngelo xesha ngenyanga yesithathu (yinyanga enguSivan ke leyo), ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesithathu kuyo; kwabhalwa ngako konke awawisa umthetho ngako uMordekayi, kumaYuda, nakwiirhuluneli,  nakumabamba, nakubathetheli bamazwe, athabathela eIndiya eza kwaKushi, amazwe alikhulu elinamanci mabini anesixhenxe,  kwilizwe ngelizwe njengokubhala kwalo, kubantu ngabantu ngokwentetho yabo, nakumaYuda ngokokubhala kwawo nangokwentetho yawo.
17_8_10_Kwabhalwa egameni lokumkani uAhaswerosi, kwatywinwa ngomsesane wokumkani; kwathunywa iincwadi ngezigidimi ezisemahasheni, ezikhwele kwiimbaleki zakomkhulu, kumankonyana esihashe sakomkhulu.
17_8_11_Kwabhalwa kwathiwa, ukumkani uwavumele amaYuda, akwimizi ngemizi yonke, ukuba abizelane ndawonye, akhusele ubomi bawo,  atshabalalise, abulale, asingele phantsi yonke impi yabantu neyelizwe eliwabandezelayo, abantwana nabafazi, aphange amaxhoba abo,
17_8_12_ngamini-nye, emazweni onke kakumkani uAhaswerosi, ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu wenyanga yeshumi elinesibini (yinyanga enguAdare ke leyo).
17_8_13_Incwadi leyo, ukuze awiselwe umthetho onke amazwe ngamazwe,  yathunyelwa kwizizwe zonke, ukuze amaYuda ahlale selezilungiselele loo mhla, ukuziphindezelela ezintshabeni zawo.
17_8_14_Izigidimi zakhwela kwiimbaleki zakomkhulu, nakwisihashe sakomkhulu, zaphuma zingxanyisiwe lilizwi lokumkani. Umthetho lowo wawiswa eShushan komkhulu.
17_8_15_Ke kaloku uMordekayi waphuma ebusweni bokumkani,  enesambatho sobukumkani selinen emsi emhlophe, nesithsaba esikhulu segolide, nengubo yokwaleka yelinen ecikizekileyo emfusa. Umzi waseShushan wagcoba wavuya.
17_8_16_KumaYuda kwabakho ukukhanya, nokuvuya, nemihlali, nembeko.
17_8_17_Nakumazwe ngamazwe onke, nakwimizi ngemizi yonke, elathi lafika kuyo ilizwi lokumkani nomthetho wakhe, yaba yimivuyo nemihlali kumaYuda, isidlo nomhla wokuchwayitha. Abaninzi ezizweni zelizwe baba ngamaYuda; ngokuba bafikelwa kukunkwantya ngamaYuda.
17_9_1_Ke kaloku ngenyanga yeshumi elinesibini (yinyanga enguAdare ke leyo), ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu kuyo, ekwakuthe kwafika ukwenziwa kwelizwi lokumkani nomthetho wakhe, ngomhla ebezilindele iintshaba zamaYuda ukuwaphatha ngegunya,  kwaguqulwa oko, amaYuda aba ngawo aziphatha iintshaba zawo ngegunya.
17_9_2_Abizelana ndawonye amaYuda emizini yawo, emazweni onke kakumkani uAhaswerosi, ukuba abase isandla abo babefuna ukuwenza okubi; akwema mntu ebusweni bawo, ngokuba izizwe zonke zafikelwa kukunkwantya.
17_9_3_Bonke abathetheli bamazwe, neerhuluneli, namabamba,  nabasebenzi bokumkani, bawanceda amaYuda; ngokuba babengenelwe kukoyika uMordekayi.
17_9_4_Kuba uMordekayi ebemkhulu endlwini yokumkani, udaba lwakhe lwaya emazweni onke; kuba indoda leyo inguMordekayi yaya iba nkulu ngokuba nkulu.
17_9_5_Azoyisa ke amaYuda ezo ntshaba zawo zonke ngekrele,  nangokubulala, nangokutshabalalisa, enza ngokuzithandela kwabo babewathiyile.
17_9_6_EShushan komkhulu amaYuda abulala, atshabalalisa, amakhulu amahlanu amadoda.
17_9_7_UParshandata, noDalefon, noAspata,
17_9_8_noPorata, noAdaliya, noAridata,
17_9_9_noParmashta, noArisayi, noAridayi, noVayezata,
17_9_10_oonyana abalishumi bakaHaman unyana kaHamedata, umbandezeli wamaYuda, ababulala; ke amaxhoba akawachukumisanga.
17_9_11_Ngaloo mini inani lababulawelwa eShushan komkhulu laziswa phambi kokumkani.
17_9_12_Wathi ukumkani kuEstere ukumkanikazi, EShushan komkhulu amaYuda abulele atshabalalisa amakhulu amahlanu amadoda,  noonyana abalishumi bakaHaman; kwamanye amazwe okumkani kobeka phi na? Ucela ntoni na? woyinikwa; usafuna ntoni na?  woyenzelwa.
17_9_13_Wathi uEstere, Ukuba kuthe kwalunga kukumkani, makanikwe amaYuda aseShushan nangomso ukwenza ngokomthetho wale mini;  noonyana abalishumi bakaHaman mabaxhonywe emthini.
17_9_14_Wathi ukumkani, Makwenjiwe njalo. Kwawiswa ke umthetho eShushan, kwaxhonywa oonyana abalishumi bakaHaman.
17_9_15_Abizelana ndawonye amaYuda aseShushan nangomhla weshumi elinesine wenyanga enguAdare, abulala eShushan amakhulu amathathu amadoda; amaxhoba akawachukumisanga.
17_9_16_Ke namanye amaYuda abesemazweni okumkani abizelana ndawonye, akhusela ubomi bawo, aphumla ezintshabeni zawo,  abulala kwabo babewathiyile amashumi asixhenxe anesihlanu amawaka; amaxhoba akawachukumisanga.
17_9_17_Kwenzeka oku ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu wenyanga enguAdare; aphumla ngomhla weshumi elinesine kuyo, awenza umhla wesidlo nowokuvuya.
17_9_18_Ke amaYuda aseShushan abizelana ndawonye ngomhla weshumi elinesithathu kuyo, nangomhla weshumi elinesine kuyo, aphumla ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu kuyo, awenza umhla wesidlo nowokuvuya.
17_9_19_Ngenxa yoko amaYuda asemaphandleni, abehlala emizini esemaphandleni, awenza umhla weshumi elinesine wenyanga enguAdare, ukuba ube ngowovuyo nowesidlo, umhla wokuchwayitha nowokuthumelana izabelo.
17_9_20_UMordekayi wazibhala ezo nto, wathumela iincwadi kumaYuda onke, abesemazweni onke kakumkani uAhaswerosi, akufuphi kwanakude;
17_9_21_ewamisela ukuba awugcine umhla weshumi elinesine wenyanga enguAdare, nomhla weshumi elinesihlanu kuyo, iminyaka ngeminyaka yonke,
17_9_22_njengokuba iyimihla awaphumla ngayo amaYuda ezintshabeni zawo; iyinyanga esaguqulwa ngawo isingqala saba luvuyo,  isijwili saba ngumhla wokuchwayitha; ayenze yona ibe yimihla yesidlo, nomvuyo, neyokuthumelana izabelo, neyokupha amahlwempu izipho.
17_9_23_Aza amaYuda azimisela ukwenza njengoko abeqalile,  nanjengoko uMordekayi ebewabhalele;
17_9_24_ngokuba uHaman unyana kaHamedata, umAgagi, umbandezeli wamaYuda onke, wayewacingele ukuwatshabalalisa amaYuda, wawisa iPuri (iqashiso ke elo), ukuba awadubadube, awatshabalalise.
17_9_25_Ekufikeni kwaloo nto phambi kokumkani, wathi ngencwadi mayibuyiselwe entlokweni yakhe ingcinga yakhe embi,  abeyicingele amaYuda, bamxhome yena noonyana bakhe emthini.
17_9_26_Ngenxa yoko bathi loo mihla yiPuri, beyibiza ngegama leqashiso. Ngenxa yoko, ngenxa yamazwi onke aloo ncwadi,  nangenxa yawakubonayo kuloo nto, nangenxa yawahlelwa kukho,
17_9_27_amaYuda akumisa, akuthabathela kuwo, nakwimbewu yawo,  nakubo bonke abathelela kuwo, ngokuze kungatshitshi, ukuthi ayimise loo mihla yomibini ngokwesibhalo esibhalwe ngayo,  nangokumiswa kwexesha layo, iminyaka ngeminyaka yonke;
17_9_28_ikhunjulwe loo mihla, yenziwe kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana zonke, kwimizalwane ngemizalwane, kumazwe ngamazwe, kwimizi ngemizi; ingatshitshi loo mihla yePuri phakathi kwamaYuda,  ukukhunjulwa kwayo kungapheli embewini yawo.
17_9_29_Babhala ke ooEstere ukumkanikazi, intombi ka-Abhihayili,  noMordekayi umYuda, bamisa ngokuqinileyo konke, le ncwadi yesibini yePuri.
17_9_30_Wathumela iincwadi kumaYuda onke, emazweni alikhulu elinamanci mabini anesixhenxe obukumkani buka-Ahaswerosi,  amazwi oxolo nenyaniso,
17_9_31_okumisa loo mihla yePuri ngamaxesha ayo amisiweyo, ngoko bamisa ngako ooMordekayi umYuda noEstere ukumkanikazi, nangoko amaYuda azimisela ngako okwawo, nembewu yawo, amazwi okuzila ukudla nokukhala kwawo.
17_9_32_Ilizwi likaEstere lazimisa izinto zaloo Puri, labhalwa encwadini.
17_10_1_Ukumkani uAhaswerosi walirhafisa ilizwe neziqithi zolwandle.
17_10_2_Konke ukwenza kokuqina kwakhe, nobugorha bakhe, nengxelo yobukhulu bukaMordekayi, awenziwa mkhulu ngabo ngukumkani,  azibhalwanga na ezo zinto encwadini yemicimbi yemihla yookumkani bamaMedi namaPersi?
17_10_3_Kuba uMordekayi umYuda ebenganeno kokumkani uAhaswerosi,  emkhulu kumaYuda, ekholekile kuninzi lwabazalwana bakhe,  ebafunela abantu bakowabo okulungileyo, ethetha uxolo kwimbewu yonke yakowabo.
18_1_1_Kwabe kukho indoda ezweni lakwaUtse, egama libe linguYobhi.
18_1_2_Yaye loo ndoda igqibelele, ithe tye, imoyika uThixo, ityeka ebubini. Yazalelwa oonyana abasixhenxe neentombi ezintathu.
18_1_3_Imfuyo yayo yayingamawaka asixhenxe empahla emfutshane,  namawaka amathathu eenkamela, namakhulu amahlanu ezibini zeenkomo, namakhulu amahlanu eemazi zamaesile, nabakhonzi abaninzi kunene; yaba nkulu ke loo ndoda kubo bonke oonyana belasempumalanga.
18_1_4_Oonyana bakhe babeqhele ukuya kwenza isidlo endlwini yalowo ibiyimini yakhe; bathumele bameme oodade babo bobathathu, ukuba badle basele nabo.
18_1_5_Kwathi, yakuba izungulezile imihla yesidlo, wathumela uYobhi, wabangcwalisa, wavuka kusasa, wanyusa amadini anyukayo ngokwenani labo bonke bephela; kuba uYobhi ebesithi, Mhlawumbi oonyana bam bangaba bonile, bamlahla uThixo entliziyweni yabo.  Ubesenjenjalo ke uYobhi loo mihla yonke.
18_1_6_Kwathi ngamhla uthile, oonyana bakaThixo beza kuzimisa phambi koYehova, weza noSathana phakathi kwabo.
18_1_7_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Uvela phi na? USathana wamphendula uYehova, wathi, Ekutyhutyha-tyhutyheni ehlabathini,  nasekuhamba-hambeni kulo.
18_1_8_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Umgqalile na kodwa umkhonzi wam uYobhi: ukuba akukho unjengaye ehlabathini, indoda egqibeleleyo, ethe tye, emoyikayo uThixo, etyekayo ebubini?
18_1_9_USathana wamphendula uYehova, wathi, UYobhi lo ufumana emoyikela ilize na uThixo?
18_1_10_Akuthanga na wena wambiyela wamjikeleza, wayijikeleza indlu yakhe; wayijikeleza into yonke anayo ngeenxa zonke;  wawusikelela umsebenzi wezandla zakhe, imfuyo yakhe yaligqiba ilizwe?
18_1_11_Kodwa ke khawuse isandla sakho ngoku, uchukumise into yonke anayo, ukuba akayi kukulahla na nawe lo, akwenze oko ebusweni bakho.
18_1_12_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Yabona, konke anako kusesandleni sakho; ke kuye ngokwakhe musa ukusa sandla sakho. Waphuma ke uSathana, wemka ebusweni bukaYehova.
18_1_13_Kwathi ngamhla uthile, oonyana bakhe neentombi zakhe babesidla, besela iwayini, endlwini yomkhuluwa wabo omkhulu.
18_1_14_Kweza umthunywa kuYobhi, wathi, Iinkomo bezilima, namaesile ebesidla ecaleni lazo;
18_1_15_agaleleka amaShebha, azithimba, ababulala abafana ngohlangothi lwekrele, kwasinda mna ndedwa, ukuza kukuxelela.
18_1_16_Esathetha lo, kwafika omnye, wathi, Umlilo kaThixo uwe ezulwini, wayitshisa impahla emfutshane nabafana, wabadla;  kwasinda mna ndedwa, ukuza kukuxelela.
18_1_17_Esathetha lo, kwafika omnye wathi, AmaKaledi amisa amaqela amathathu azingenela iinkamela, azithimba, ababulala abafana ngohlangothi lwekrele; kwasinda mna ndedwa, ukuza kukuxelela.
18_1_18_Esathetha lo, kwafika omnye, wathi, Oonyana bakho neentombi zakho babesidla, besela iwayini endlwini yomkhuluwa wabo omkhulu;
18_1_19_nanko kuvela umoya omkhulu ngasentlango, wabetha ezimbombeni zone zendlu, yabawela abafana abo, bafa; kwasinda mna ndedwa, ukuza kukuxelela.
18_1_20_Wesuka uYobhi, wayikrazula ingubo yakhe yokwaleka,  wayicheba intloko yakhe, wawa emhlabeni, waqubuda.
18_1_21_Wathi, Ndaphuma ndize esizalweni sikama, ndiya kubuyela khona ndikwaze: uYehova wanika, ikwanguYehova othabathileyo;  igama likaYehova malibongwe.
18_1_22_Kuko konke oko akonanga uYobhi, akamsola nokumsola uThixo.
18_2_1_Kwathi ngamhla uthile, oonyana bakaThixo beza kuzimisa phambi koYehova; weza noSathana phakathi kwabo, ukuba azimise phambi koYehova.
18_2_2_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Uvela phi na? USathana wamphendula uYehova, wathi, Ekutyhutyha-tyhutyheni ehlabathini,  nasekuhamba-hambeni kulo.
18_2_3_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Umgqalile na kodwa umkhonzi wam uYobhi, ukuba akukho unjengaye ehlabathini, indoda egqibeleleyo, ethe tye, emoyikayo uThixo, etyekayo ebubini:  esabambeleleyo ekugqibeleleni kwayo, noko undixhokonxele kuyo ukubandiyiginyele ilize?
18_2_4_USathana wamphendula uYehova, wathi, Ulusu ngenxa yolusu;  konke anako umntu wokunika ngenxa yomphefumlo wakhe.
18_2_5_Kodwa ke khawuse isandla sakho ngoku, uchukumise emathanjeni akhe nasenyameni yakhe, ukuba akayi kukulahla na nawe lo,  akwenze oko ebusweni bakho.
18_2_6_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, Nanko esesandleni sakho; kuphela wogcina umphefumlo wakhe.
18_2_7_Waphuma ke uSathana, wemka ebusweni bukaYehova; wambetha uYobhi ngamathumba amabi, wathabathela entendeni yonyawo lwakhe, wesa elukakayini lwakhe.
18_2_8_Wathabatha ukhamba ukuba azikhuhle ngalo, ehleli eluthuthwini.
18_2_9_Wathi umkakhe kuye, Usabambelele na ekugqibeleleni kwakho?  Mlahle uThixo, ufe.
18_2_10_Wathi yena kuye, Uthetha njengesidengekazi. Siya kwamkela okulungileyo kuThixo, singamkeli nokubi, yini na? Kuko konke oko akonanga uYobhi ngomlomo wakhe.
18_2_11_Ke kaloku izihlobo ezithathu zikaYobhi zabuva bonke obo bubi bumfikeleyo, zeza, saeso sivela endaweni yaso: uElifazi wakwaTeman, noBhiledadi wakwaShuwa, noTsofare waseNahama.  Banqophisana ukuba beze, bamkhuze, bamthuthuzele.
18_2_12_Baphakamisa amehlo abo besekude, abamazi; baphakamisa izwi labo, balila; bakrazula elowo ingubo yakhe yokwaleka,  bazigalela ngothuli entloko, beluphosa phezulu ezulwini.
18_2_13_Bahlala naye emhlabeni apho iimini zasixhenxe nobusuku bazo; kungekho namnye uthetha naye, kuba babebona ukuba umvandedwa wakhe mkhulu kakhulu.
18_3_1_Emveni koko uYobhi wawuvula umlomo wakhe, wayiqalekisa imini yakhe.
18_3_2_Wasusela uYobhi, wathi,
18_3_3_Mayidake imini endazalwa ngayo, Nobusuku ekwathiwa,  Kukhawulwe indoda.
18_3_4_Loo mini mayibe bubumnyama, Angayinyamekeli uThixo phezulu,  Kungayibengezeli ukukhanya.
18_3_5_Mayikhululwe ngentlawulelo bubumnyama nethunzi lokufa,  Makulale amafu phezu kwayo; Mayidandathekiswe kokungcolisa imini.
18_3_6_Obo busuku-masibubambe isithokothoko; Mabungavuyi phakathi kwemihla yomnyaka; Mabungangeni enanini leenyanga.
18_3_7_Yabona, obo busuku mabube ludlolo; Makungezi kumemelela kubo,
18_3_8_Mababuqalekise abaqalekisi bemihla, Abaxhobele ukuxhokonxa ileviyatan.
18_3_9_Mazibe mnyama iinkwenkwezi zomso wabo obomvu; Mabulinde ukufika kokukhanya, kungabikho; Bungaziboni iinkophe zesifingo;
18_3_10_Ngokuba bungazivalanga iingcango zesizalo esandizalayo,  Bungabusithelisanga ububi emehlweni am.
18_3_11_Ibe iyini na ukuba ndingafeli embilinini, Ndingaphumi umphefumlo ndisavela esizalweni?
18_3_12_Kube kungani na ukuba amadolo andihlangabeze? Ibe iyini na ukuba andihlangabeze amabele, ukuze ndiwanye?
18_3_13_Kuba ngoku ngendiba ndilele, ndazola; Ngendiba ndalala ubuthongo, ndandula ukuphumla
18_3_14_Nokumkani namaphakathi elizwe, Abo bazakhelayo amanxuwa;
18_3_15_Nabathetheli abanegolide, Abazizalisayo izindlu zabo ngesilivere.
18_3_16_Ngendiba andikho, njengemvambilini eselelweyo;  Njengabantwana abangabonanga kukhanya.
18_3_17_Kuba apho, abangendawo bakuyekile ukugungqa; Khona apho bayaphumla abaphelelwe ngamandla.
18_3_18_Abakhonkxiweyo bonwabile ndaweni-nye; Abasaliva izwi lomqhubi.
18_3_19_Omncinane nomkhulu-khona bayalingana; Ikhoboka likhululekile enkosini yalo.
18_3_20_Yini na ukuba abasebubini abanike ukukhanya, Nabamphefumlo ukrakra abanike ubomi?
18_3_21_Abalinde ukufa, kusuke kungabikho; buselelweyo;
18_3_22_Abavuya bade bagcobe, Babe nemihlali, xa bathe bafumanana nengcwaba?
18_3_23_Ukuba ukukhanya akunike umfo ondlela isitheleyo, Obiyelweyo nguThixo ngeenxa zonke?
18_3_24_Kuba endaweni yesonka sam kuza ukugcuma, Kuphalazeka njengamanzi ukubhonga kwam.
18_3_25_Kuba ndinkwantya kokunkwantyisayo, kwaza kwandifikela, Into endinxunguphala yiyo indizele.
18_3_26_Ndathi, ndingachulumachanga ndingazolanga, ndingaphumlanga,  Kweza ke ukugungqa.
18_4_1_Wasusela uElifazi wakwaTeman, wathi,
18_4_2_Kungakudinisa na, kwakulingwa ukubhekiswa ilizwi kuwe?  Engubani na onako ukuzibamba angathethi?
18_4_3_Yabona, uthethise abaninzi, Wazomeleza izandla eziwileyo;
18_4_4_Ukuthetha kwakho kwabaphakamisa abakhubekayo, Wawaqinisa amadolo agevegeve.
18_4_5_Kungokunje into ize kuwe, wadinwa; Ifike kuwe,  wakhwankqiswa.
18_4_6_Ukoyika kwakho uThixo asiyinqolonci yakho na? Ithemba lakho alikukugqibelela kweendlela zakho na?
18_4_7_Khawukhumbule, ngubani na owakha wadaka, emsulwa? Kuphi na apho ke bathi shwaka khona abathe tye?
18_4_8_Ngokubona endibone ngako, abalima inkohlakalo, Nabahlwayela ububi, bavuna kwabona.
18_4_9_Badaka ngokuphefumla kukaThixo, Baphela ngumoya womsindo wakhe.
18_4_10_Ukugquma kwengonyama, nelizwi lebhavumayo, Namazinyo eengonyama ezintsha ancothukile.
18_4_11_Ingonyama iyatshabalala ngokuswela into yokuqwenga;  Amathole engonyamakazi achithakele.
18_4_12_Ndicothelwe lilizwi, Indlebe yam yakuthabatha ukusebeza kwalo.
18_4_13_Ezingcingangcingeni zasemibonisweni yobusuku, Bakusindwa abantu bubuthongo obukhulu,
18_4_14_Kwandikhawulela ukunkwantya nokuthuthumela, Kwawankwantyisa amathambo am amaninzi.
18_4_15_Kwathi phe umoya ebusweni bam, Yaba namanwele inyama yam.
18_4_16_Wema, andayinakana imbonakalo yawo; Kwakho isimilo esithile phambi kwamehlo am; Ndeva izwi elisebezayo, lisithi,
18_4_17_Umntu ulilungisa na ngaphezu koThixo? Uhlambululekile na umfo ngaphezu koMenzi wakhe?
18_4_18_Yabona, akakholwa ngabakhonzi bakhe, Nezithunywa zakhe uthi zingabaphosisi;
18_4_19_Bangabeka phi na ke abahlala ezindlwini zodaka, Abasiseko siseluthulini, Abatyunyuzwa njengamanundu?
18_4_20_Kusa kuhlwe, beqotywa; Badake kuphele, kungekho ugqalayo.
18_4_21_Abathi na, xa luthe lwancothulwa kubo uthambo lwentente,  Bafe bengalumkanga?
18_5_1_Khawubize kambe, ukuba ukho na owokuphendula. Uya kubheka kuwuphi na kwabangcwele?
18_5_2_Kuba ingqumbo iyambulala osisimathane, Nekhwele liyambulala osisiyatha.
18_5_3_Ndimbonile mna osisimathane emila; Ndaza ndalishwabulela ngesiquphe ikhaya lakhe.
18_5_4_Bakude nosindiso abantwana bakhe, Batyunyuzwa esangweni bengenamhlanguli;
18_5_5_Ekubeni abalambileyo besidla uvuno lwakhe, Balurhole naseluthangweni lwesiphingo; Abanxaniweyo bazonda ubutyebi babo.
18_5_6_Kuba inkohlakalo ayiphumi eluthulini, Nobubi abuntshuli emhlabeni;
18_5_7_Hayi, umntu uzalelwa ububi, Njengokuba iintlantsi zinyuka ukubaleka kwazo.
18_5_8_Ke mna bendiya kusingisa kuThixo, Indawo yam ndiyibhekise kuThixo,
18_5_9_Owenza izinto ezinkulu ezingenakugocwagocwa, Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo engenakubalwa;
18_5_10_Ulonika imvula phezu kobuso bomhlaba, Ase amanzi phezu kwamaphandle,
18_5_11_Ukuba abathobekileyo abamise ezindaweni eziphakamileyo,  Abanezimnyama zokuzila banyukele elusindisweni.
18_5_12_Utshitshisa iingcinga zabo banobuqhophololo, Zingenzi nto izimasekileyo izandla zabo.
18_5_13_Ubambisa izilumko kubuqhophololo bazo, Iqhinga labanobuqokolo lingxamiseke ke.
18_5_14_Emini baqubisana nobumnyama, Baphuthaphuthe kwemaqanda,  ngathi kusebusuku.
18_5_15_Usindisa ihlwempu ekreleni, emlonyeni wabo, Nasesandleni sowomeleleyo.
18_5_16_Kubekho ke ithemba kosweleyo, Ubugqwetha buwuvale umlomo wabo.
18_5_17_Yabona, unoyolo mntu owohlwaywa nguThixo! Musa ke ukukucekisa ukuthethisa kukaSomandla!
18_5_18_Kuba wenza buhlungu, abophe; Uyaphalusa, ziphilise izandla zakhe.
18_5_19_Ezimbandezelweni ezintandathu uya kukuhlangula,  Nakwezisixhenxe akuyi kuchukunyiswa bububi;
18_5_20_Endlaleni ukukhulula ekufeni Emfazweni ukukhulula ekuxatyelweni ngekrele,
18_5_21_Eziniyeni yolwimi uzinyezwe, Ungoyiki imbuqo, yakufika.
18_5_22_Imbuqo nendlala uya kuyihleka, Nerhamncwa lasendle ungaloyiki.
18_5_23_Kuba unqophisene namatye asendle, Amarhamncwa asendle axolelene nawe;
18_5_24_Uya kwazi ukuba uxolo yintente yakho, Ulivelele ikhaya lakho, ungaphosani nanto;
18_5_25_Uyazi ukuba ininzi imbewu yakho, Nenzala yakho injengomfuno wehlabathi.
18_5_26_Uya kungena engcwabeni womelele, Njengokungeniswa kwesithungu ngexesha laso.
18_5_27_Bona, oku sikugocagocile, kunjalo; Kuve, ukwazi wena ngokwakho.
18_6_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_6_2_Akwaba bekulinganiswe nokulinganiswa ukukhathazeka kwam,  Kwabekwa esikalini ukweyela kwam ndawonye nako!
18_6_3_Kuba ngoku bekuya kuba nzima ngaphezu kwentlabathi yolwandle; Kungenxa yoko le nto amazwi am angawokubhuda.
18_6_4_Kuba iintolo zoSomandla zimi kum, Ezibuhlungu bazo buwufincayo umoya wam; Izidandathekiso zikaThixo zindakhele uluhlu lokulwa.
18_6_5_Iesile lasendle likhe lilile na liseluhlazeni? Iyalila na inkomo isekutyeni kwayo?
18_6_6_Iyadliwa na into ejavujavu, ingenatyuwa? Sikho na isongo kwintlaka yeqanda?
18_6_7_Eyona nto walayo ukuyiphatha umphefumlo wam, Leyo yeyona ikukudla kwam okukruqulayo.
18_6_8_Akwaba bendingazuza isicelo sam, UThixo andiphe endikulindelayo;
18_6_9_Kukholeke kuThixo ukundityumza, Asivulele isandla sakhe,  andinqumle!
18_6_10_Ibiya kuhlala ikho intuthuzelo yam; Bendiya kuxhina kwezo ntlungu zingacongiyo; Kuba andiwakhanyelanga amazwi oyiNgcwele.
18_6_11_Ayintoni na amandla am, ukuba ndingade ndithembe? Siyintoni na isiphelo sam, ukuba ndingade ndibe nokuzeka kade?
18_6_12_Angamandla amatye na amandla am? Inyama yam ilubhedu na?
18_6_13_Akuphelile yini na kum ukuncedakala, Ukuzimaseka kwabhejethwa kwakanye?
18_6_14_Akuhlaziswa oqotyiweyo ngummelwane wakhe, Uya kulahla ukumoyika uSomandla.
18_6_15_Abazalwana bam banginizile njengomlanjana, Njengomphantsi wemilanjana etshayo,
18_6_16_Emdaka ngumkhenkce, Elizifihla kuyo ikhephu.
18_6_17_Ekufikeni kokufudumala iyabhanga; Lakubalela ithi qoko,  ingabikho ezindaweni zayo.
18_6_18_Iyajikajika imendo yokuhamba kwayo, Inyuka iye enyanyeni,  idake.
18_6_19_Imikhoko yakwaTema yabheka, Imiqodi yakwaShebha yathemba yona;
18_6_20_Yadana, kuba ibikholosile; Yafika khona, yaneentloni.
18_6_21_Kuba ngoku nisuke naba yinto engento, Nibone ukuqhiphuka umbilini, noyika.
18_6_22_Khe ndatsho na ukuthi, Etheni kum? Ndipheni emandleni enu?
18_6_23_Nindisindise esandleni sombandezeli, Nindikhulule esandleni sengqwangangqwili?
18_6_24_Ndiyaleni, ndothi cwaka; Nindiqondise ukulahleka kwam.
18_6_25_Asikuko nokuba ayahlaba amazwi athe tye! Ke ukohlwaya kwenu kohlwaya ntoni na?
18_6_26_Niba ninokohlwaya ukuthetha oku na? Angumoya amazwi omntu oncamileyo.
18_6_27_Ke nangenkedama ningaqashisa, Nirhwebe ngommelwane wenu.
18_6_28_Makukholeke kuni ngoku, nibheke kum, Kuba okunene ebusweni benu andiyi kuthetha amanga.
18_6_29_Khanibuye, makungabikho bugqwetha, Niphinde nibuye;  ubulungisa bam bukule nto.
18_6_30_Bukho na ubugqwetha elulwimini lwam? Ikhuhlangubo lam alingekuqondi na ukweyelisela?
18_7_1_Akaphume mkhosi na ehlabathini umntu? Ayinjengemihla yomqeshwa na imihla yakhe?
18_7_2_Njengesicaka esibe sizonda umthunzi, Njengomqeshwa olinde umvuzo wakhe?
18_7_3_Ndenjenjalo ukwamkeliswa iinyanga ezinenkohliso, Ndabalelwa nobusuku bobubi.
18_7_4_Ndakuba ndilele phantsi, ndithi, Ndiya kuvuka nini na?  Ukuhlwa kolukile, Ndidikiwe kukuqikaqikeka kude kuse.
18_7_5_Inyama yam yambeswe iimpethu namagada omhlaba; Ulusu lwam lungamaqhula, lubhiqiza.
18_7_6_Imihla yam ikhawuleza ngaphezu komkhonjana womluki, Iphela kungekho themba.
18_7_7_Khumbula ukuba bungumoya ubomi bam; Iliso lam aliyi kubuya likubone okulungileyo.
18_7_8_Aliyi kuba sandalama iliso londibonileyo; Amehlo akho ekum,  ndingabikho.
18_7_9_Liphelile ilifu, limkile; Unjalo ohla aye kwelabafileyo,  akenyuki.
18_7_10_Akabi sabuyela endlwini yakhe, Ingabi samazi indawo yakhe.
18_7_11_Nam andiyi kuwubamba umlomo wam; Ndiya kuthetha ekubandezelweni komoya wam, Ndikhalaze ebukrakreni bomphefumlo wam.
18_7_12_Ndilulwandle na, ndiyingwenya na, Ukuba undimisele umlindo?
18_7_13_Xa bendisithi, Wondithuthuzela umandlalo wam,  Sondithwalisisa inkalazo yam isingqengqelo sam:
18_7_14_Wesuka wena wandoyikisa ngamaphupha, Wandidandathekisa emibonweni,
18_7_15_Wada umphefumlo wam wanyula ukukrwitshwa; Wanyula ukufa ngaphezu kwamathambo la.
18_7_16_Ndikruqukile; andingi ndingadla bomi ngonaphakade; Ndiyeke,  kuba ingumphunga imihla yam.
18_7_17_Uyintoni na umntu lo, le nto umkhulisayo, Le nto uyisingise kuye intliziyo yakho,
18_7_18_Umvelele imiso yonke Umcikide imizuzu yonke?
18_7_19_Kunini na ungawasusi amehlo kum, Ungandiyeki, khe ndiginye amathe?
18_7_20_Ndithe ndona, ndingakwenza ntoni na? Wena mlindi woluntu,  Yini na ukuba undenze itekeni, Ndibe ngumthwalo kum?
18_7_21_Yini na ukuba ungasixoleli isikreqo sam, ungabudlulisi ubugwenxa bam? Kuba kaloku ndiya kuzilalisa eluthulini;  Wondondela kakhulu, ndingabikho.
18_8_1_Wasusela uBhiledadi wakwaShuwa, wathi,
18_8_2_Kunini na uthetha izinto ezinje? Engumoya omkhulu amazwi omlomo wakho?
18_8_3_UThixo angakwenza gwenxa na okusesikweni? USomandla angabenza gwenxa na ubulungisa?
18_8_4_Ukuba abantwana bakho bathe bamona yena, Wabanikela esandleni sesikreqo sabo;
18_8_5_Ukuba uthe wamfuna ngenkuthalo uThixo wena, Watarhuzisa kuSomandla;
18_8_6_Ukuba uthe wacoceka, wathi tye wena, Okunene, wovuka ngoku ngenxa yakho, Alisikelele ikhaya lobulungisa bakho;
18_8_7_Kuthi ukuqala kwakho kube kuyinto encinane, Ukuphuma kwakho kube kukhulu kakhulu.
18_8_8_Kuba khawubuze kwisizukulwana saphambili; Uxunele ekugocagoceni kooyise baso:
18_8_9_Kuba singabezolo thina, asinakwazi; Ngokuba isisithunzi imihla yethu ehlabathini.
18_8_10_Abayi kukuyala na abo, bathethe kuwe. Barhole amazwi entliziyweni yabo? bathi,
18_8_11_Iyakhula na imikhanzi, kungekho mgxobhozo? Iyahluma na ingcobo, kungekho manzi?
18_8_12_Iseluhlaza, ingekaphiwa, Yoyiphangela ingca yonke ngokoma.
18_8_13_Unjalo umendo wabo bonke abamlibalayo uThixo, Nethemba lomkhohlisi liyadaka;
18_8_14_Ngokuba ukugasa kwakhe kuyanqunyulwa; Yindlu yesigcawu ukukholosa kwakhe.
18_8_15_Wayama ngendlu yakhe, ingemi; Ubambelela kuyo, ingahlali.
18_8_16_Uluhlaza phambi kwelanga, Namagatya akhe ayaqabela eludongeni lwentsimi yakhe;
18_8_17_Iingcambu zakhe zijijene emweweni, Utyhudisa ezingcambeni zamatye.
18_8_18_Ukuba uthe wamginya endaweni yakhe, Yomkhanyela ithi,  Andikubonanga.
18_8_19_Yabona, yiyo le imihlali yendlela yakhe, Ize eluthulini kuntshule abanye.
18_8_20_Yabona, uThixo akamcekisi ogqibeleleyo, Akababambi ngesandla abenzi bobubi.
18_8_21_Uya kuwuzalisa umlomo wakho ngokuhleka, Nemilebe yomlomo wakho ngokuduma:
18_8_22_Abakuthiyayo baya kwambatha ukudana, Ingabi sabakho intente yabangendawo,
18_9_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_9_2_Okwenene, ndiyazi ukuba kunjalo; Ke angathini na umntu lo ukuba lilungisa phambi koThixo?
18_9_3_Ukuba uthe yena wafuna ukubambana naye, Ubengemphenduli namnye umbuzo kweliwaka.
18_9_4_Ulumkile ngentliziyo, ukhaliphile ngamandla: Ngubani na okha agogotye kuye, aze asinde?
18_9_5_Uloshenxisa iintaba zingazi, Ukuba azibhukuqe ngomsindo wakhe;
18_9_6_Ulogungqisa ihlabathi, lisuke endaweni yalo, Zididizele iintsika zalo;
18_9_7_Ulothetha elangeni lingaphumi, Azitywine, azivingce,  iinkwenkwezi ngeenxa zonke;
18_9_8_Ulotwabulula ixulu eyedwa, Anyathele emimangweni yolwandle;
18_9_9_Ulowenza iinkwenkwezi zeBhere, namaKroza, nesiLimela,  Neengontsi zasezantsi.
18_9_10_Ulowenza izinto ezinkulu ezingenakugocwagocwa, Nemisebenzi ebalulekileyo engenakubalwa.
18_9_11_Yabona, udlula phezu kwam, ndingamboni; Uthi phe,  ndingamqondi,
18_9_12_Yabona, exwila, ngubani na ongamnqandayo? Ngubani na ongathi kuye, Wenza ntoni na?
18_9_13_UThixo akawunqandi umsindo wakhe; Bayasibekeka phantsi kwakhe abancedi bakaRahabhi.
18_9_14_Ndingathini na ke mna ukumphendula, Ndiwakhethe amazwi am okuphendula kuye?
18_9_15_Nokuba bendililungisa mna, bendingemphenduli;  Ndingatarhuzisa kuphela kumgwebi wam.
18_9_16_Ukuba bendithe ndabiza, wandiphendula, Bendingekholwa ukuba ulibekele indlebe ilizwi lam;
18_9_17_Kanye ubeya kundityumza ngoqhwithela, Awandise amanxeba am ngelize,
18_9_18_Angandiphi nokuba ndiphefumle; Ke ubeya kundihluthisa ngobukrakra.
18_9_19_Ukuba yinto yamandla ekhalipha, uthi, Ndim okhoyo! Ukuba yinto yomgwebo, uthi, Ngubani na oya kundimema?
18_9_20_Ukuba bendithe ndalilungisa, umlomo wam ubuya kundigweba;  Ukuba bendithe ndagqibelela, ubeya kundenza umjibilizi.
18_9_21_Ndigqibelele; andiwukhathalele umphefumlo wam;  Ndiyabucekisa ubomi bam.
18_9_22_Kunye oko; ngenxa yoko ndithi, Ogqibeleleyo nongendawo uyabatshabalalisa.
18_9_23_Ukuba iziniya ithe yabulala ngesiquphe, Uya kugculela ukuqotywa kwabamsulwa.
18_9_24_Ihlabathi linikelwe esandleni sabangendawo; Uyabugqubuthela ubuso babagwebi balo. Ukuba kanti akunjalo, kwenziwe ngubani na ke?
18_9_25_Imihla yam ikhawuleze ngaphezu kwesigidimi; Ibalekile,  ayibonanga kulungileyo;
18_9_26_Ithe phe njengemikhombe yeengcongolo, Njengokhozi luxwila ixhoba.
18_9_27_Ndakuthi, Ndiya kuyilibala inkalazo yam, Ndibuyeke ubuso bam, ndincumeze,
18_9_28_Ndisuka ndinxunguphale ziimbulaleko zam zonke, Ndazi ukuba akuyi kuthi ndimsulwa.
18_9_29_Kuthiwa ndingongendawo mna; Yini na le nto ndifumana ndizixhamla?
18_9_30_Nokuba bendithe ndazihlamba ngamanzi ekhephu,  Ndazihlambulula izandla zam ngesepha,
18_9_31_Ubuya kundithi gxwa emhadini, Ndibe lisikizi nakwiingubo zam.
18_9_32_Kuba akamntu yena, njengam nje, ukuba ndimphendule, Siye ndawonye ematyaleni.
18_9_33_Akukho mahluli phakathi kwethu, Wokubeka isandla sakhe phezu kwethu sobabini.
18_9_34_Makayisuse intonga yakhe kum, Isothuso sakhe masingandidandathekisi:
18_9_35_Ndothetha ke ndingamoyiki; Kuba andivi kunjalo mna eluvalweni lwam.
18_10_1_Umphefumlo wam udimele bubomi bam; Ngoko ndiya kuyivulela inkalazo yam phakathi kwam; Ndithethe, ukrakra umphefumlo wam;
18_10_2_Ndithi kuThixo, Musa ukundigweba; Ndazise ukuba ubambene nam ngani na?
18_10_3_Kulungile na kuwe ukuba ucudise, Ukuba ucekise ukuxelenga kwezandla zakho, Ulibengezelele iqhinga labangendawo?
18_10_4_Unamehlo enyama na? Ubona ngokubona komntu na?
18_10_5_Injengemihla yomntu na imihla yakho, Iminyaka yakho injengemihla yomfo na:
18_10_6_Ukuba nje ubufune ubugwenxa bam, Usingxoke isono sam,
18_10_7_Usazi nje ukuba andingongendawo, Nokuba akukho unokuhlangula esandleni sakho?
18_10_8_Izandla zakho zindiyilile, zandenza Ndonke, ngeenxa zonke;  uyandiginya noko.
18_10_9_Khawukhumbule, ukuba undenze ngokodongwe; Ke undibuyisa undise eluthulini!
18_10_10_Akundithululanga na njengamasi, Wandivuthisa njengengqaka?
18_10_11_Wandambesa ngolusu nenyama, Wandiphingela ngamathambo nemisipha.
18_10_12_Undenzele ubomi nenceba, Nokuvelela kwakho kwawugcina umoya wam.
18_10_13_Ezi zinto ke wazigusha entliziyweni yakho; Ndiyazi ukuba ubunale ndawo yokuthi:
18_10_14_Ukuba ndithe ndona, wondibamba undilinde, Ungandenzi msulwa ebugwenxeni bam.
18_10_15_Ukuba ndithe ndabangongendawo, athi ke mna! Ukuba ndithe ndaba lilungisa, ndingayiphakamisi intloko yam: Ndihluthi kukucukucezwa, Nakukubona iintsizi zam.
18_10_16_Nokuba ithe yaziphakamisa intloko yam, wondizingela njengengonyama, Ubuye wenze ngokubalulekileyo kum;
18_10_17_Uhlaziye amangqina akho phambi kwam; Uyandise ingqumbo yakho kum, Ibe kukukhululana kwemikhosi eza kum.
18_10_18_Ibiyini na ke ukuba undikhuphe esizalweni? Ngendaphuma umphefumlo, andabonwa liso,
18_10_19_Ndanga andibangakho, Ngendasuswa esizalweni, ndasiwa engcwabeni.
18_10_20_Ayimbalwa na imihla yam? Makayeke, Adede kum, ndikhe ndincumeze kancinane,
18_10_21_Phambi kokuba ndihambe, ndingabi sabuya, Ndiye ezweni lobumnyama nelethunzi lokufa,
18_10_22_Ezweni elisongelwe bubumnyama njengesithokothoko, Lethunzi lokufa nelesidubedube, Elinkazimlo injengesithokothoko.
18_11_1_Wasusela uTsofare waseNahama, wathi,
18_11_2_Le nto ininzi yamazwi ayikuphendulwa na, Indoda elipholopholo igwetyelwe na?
18_11_3_Ukuphololoza kwakho kuya kubetha athi tu na amadoda, Ukuba ugculele, kungabikho ukuhlazayo?
18_11_4_Uthi, Iqaqambile imfundiso yam, Ndinyulu emehlweni akho.
18_11_5_Kodwa akaba uThixo ubethetha, Avule umlomo wakhe kuwe;
18_11_6_Akuxelele iimfihlakalo zobulumko, Ukuba buphindeke kabini,  bayinto ezimasekileyo; Ubuya kwazi ke ukuba uThixo wenze ukuba ubulibale ubugwenxa bakho.
18_11_7_Unokufikelela na ezingontsingontsini zikaThixo?  Unokufikelela na ekufezekeni kukaSomandla?
18_11_8_Kuphakame ngokwamazulu; unokwenza ntoni na? Kunzulu kunelabafileyo; unokwazi ntoni na?
18_11_9_Kukude kunehlabathi ukulinganiswa kwako, Kubanzi kunolwandle.
18_11_10_Ukuba uthe phe yena, wavingcela, Wamemela ematyaleni,  ngubani na onokumnqanda?
18_11_11_Kuba yena uyabazi abantu abakhohlakeleyo, Uyabubona ubutshinga engaqondelanga.
18_11_12_Nomntu onjengesidenge angaba nokuqonda, Nethole le-esile lasendle lingaba nokuzalwa lingumntu.
18_11_13_Ukuba uthe wena wabhekisa intliziyo yakho kuye, Wazolulela izandla zakho kuye:
18_11_14_Ukuba kuthe kwakho inkohlakalo esandleni sakho, yise kude,  Ungabuhlalisi ubugqwetha ezintenteni zakho;
18_11_15_Okunene, uya kwandula ukubuphakamisa ubuso bakho bungenasisihla, Uthi bhuxe, ungoyiki.
18_11_16_Kuba wokulibala ukwaphuka kwakho, Ukukhumbule njengamanzi adluleyo;
18_11_17_Ukudla kwakho ubomi kuvuke, kuqaqambe ngaphezu kwemini enkulu; Nakuba kusongelwe emnyameni, kokhanya njengokusa.
18_11_18_Wokholosa, ngokuba sekukho ithemba, Uhlole, ulale phantsi enkolosekweni;
18_11_19_Ubuthume, kungekho wothusayo, Bakuncekelele abaninzi.
18_11_20_Ke wona amehlo abangendawo ophelelwa; Idake kubo indawo yokusabela, Ithemba labo libe kukuphuma umphefumlo.
18_12_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_12_2_Kambe, nini abantu; Buya kufa nani ubulumko.
18_12_3_Nam ke ndinentliziyo njengani; Andiwi nganeno kwenu.  Ngubani na ongazaziyo izinto ezinjalo?
18_12_4_Ndiyintlekisa kummelwane mna, Endibe ndingonqula uThixo,  andiphendule; Uyintlekisa olilungisa, ogqibeleleyo.
18_12_5_Onelishwa yinto yokudelwa ngokwamabhongo abonwabileyo;  Kulungiselwe abanyawo zikhubekayo.
18_12_6_Kukho ukuchulumacha ezintenteni zababhuqi; Bakholosile abamqumbisayo uThixo, Abafumbatha uThixo esandleni sabo.
18_12_7_Kodwa khawubuze ezinkomeni, zokuyala; Nasezintakeni zezulu,  zokuxelela;
18_12_8_Thetha nomhlaba, wokuyala; Zokubalisela neentlanzi zolwandle.
18_12_9_Ngubani na ongaziyo ngezo zinto zonke, Ukuba sisandla sikaYehova esikwenzileyo oko?
18_12_10_Usesandleni sakhe umphefumlo wezinto zonke eziphilileyo,  Nomoya wenyama yonke eyiyeyomntu.
18_12_11_Indlebe ayiyi kukucikida na ukuthetha, Nekhuhlangubo likuve ukudla?
18_12_12_Emaxhegweni kusebulumkweni, Ebudeni bemihla kusengqondweni,
18_12_13_Bukuye ubulumko nobugorha, Lelakhe icebo nengqondo.
18_12_14_Yabona, ugungxula, kungakhiwa. Uyamvalela umntu,  kungavulwa,
18_12_15_Yabona, uyawavala amanzi, atshe; Uyawavulela, aliphethule ilizwe.
18_12_16_Anaye amandla nozimaso; Ngowakhe odungudelayo nodungudelisayo.
18_12_17_Umkisa amaphakathi ebhunyulwe, Abagezise nabagwebi.
18_12_18_Ukhulula imbophelelo yookumkani, Abophe umbhinqo emanqeni abo.
18_12_19_Umkisa ababingeleli bebhunyulwe, Abazizimakade abaphenule.
18_12_20_Ususa intetho kwabanyanisekileyo, Ayithabathe imvo kumadoda amakhulu.
18_12_21_Uphalazela amanene ngendelo, Acombulule uqhwemesha lwabaziingqwemla.
18_12_22_Utyhila iinzulu zasebumnyameni, Alikhuphele emhlotsheni ithunzi lokufa.
18_12_23_Ukhulisa iintlanga, azitshabalalise; Uziphangalalisa iintlanga azifuduse.
18_12_24_Ususa ingqondo kwiintloko zabantu balo ilizwe,  Azibhadulise enyanyeni engenandlela.
18_12_25_Ziphamza emnyameni kungekho kukhanya, Azibhadulise njengamanxila.
18_13_1_Yabona, konke oko likubonile iliso lam, Yakuva indlebe yam,  yakuqonda.
18_13_2_Njengoko nazi ngako, ndiyazi nam; Andiwi nganeno kwenu.
18_13_3_Kodwa mna ndinga ndingathetha kuSomandla, Ndifuna ukuzihlamba kuThixo.
18_13_4_Kodwa ke nina ningabadyobha ngobuxoki, Ningamagqirha angento nonke niphela.
18_13_5_Anaba benithe tu kanye; Nibe niya kuba nilumkile.
18_13_6_Khaniphulaphule ke ukuzihlamba kwam, Ukuphika komlomo wam nikubazele indlebe.
18_13_7_UThixo niya kumthethelela ngobugqwetha na, Nimthethelele ngenkohliso na?
18_13_8_Niya kumnonelela na, Niphikele uThixo na?
18_13_9_Kolunga na xa athe wanigocagoca? Ninokumgculela na,  njengokuba enokugculelwa umntu?
18_13_10_Wonohlwaya inene, Ukuba nithe ngasese nanonelela umntu.
18_13_11_Ubungangamela bakhe abuyi kunidandathekisa na, Kuniwele ukunkwantyisa kwakhe?
18_13_12_Izikhumbuzo zenu yimizekeliso yothuthu; Iingqolo zenu zoba ziingqolo zodaka.
18_13_13_Yithini tu! Ndiyekeni, ukuze ndithethe, Kundihlele okundihlelayo.
18_13_14_Kungani na ukuba ndiyiphathe inyama yam ngamenyo am,  Umphefumlo wam ndiwubeke ezandleni zam?
18_13_15_Yabona, nokuba uthe wandibulala, ndolindela kuye; Kodwa ndozihlamba iindlela zam ebusweni bakhe.
18_13_16_Kwaoko koba lusindiso kum: Okuba intshembenxa ingayi kuza ebusweni bakhe.
18_13_17_Yivani, nikuve ukuthetha kwam, Nengxelo yam, ngeendlebe zenu.
18_13_18_Khanibone, ndilicacisile ityala lam; Ndiyazi ukuba ndiya kugwetyelwa mna.
18_13_19_Ngubani na ke ongabambana nam? Kuba bendiya kuthi tu kaloku, ndiphume umphefumlo.
18_13_20_Kodwa izinto ezimbini musa ukuzenza kum, Ndize ndingazisithelisi ebusweni bakho:
18_13_21_Isandla sakho sise kude kum, Nesothuso sakho singandidandathekisi.
18_13_22_Biza ke, ndisabele mna; Mhlawumbi ndithethe, undiphendule.
18_13_23_Zingaphi na izenzo ezigwenxa, nezono zam? Ndazise isikreqo sam, nesono sam.
18_13_24_Yini na ukuba ubusithelise ubuso bakho, Ube ndilutshaba kuwe?
18_13_25_Uya kungcangcazelisa ugxothe igqabi eliphetshethwayo na,  Usukele umququ owomileyo na?
18_13_26_Ngokuba uzibhalela kum izinto ezikrakra, Undidlisa ilifa lezenzo ezigwenxa zobutsha bam;
18_13_27_Uzifaka esitokisini iinyawo zam, Uwugqala wonke umendo wam; Uzikrwelela umda ojikelezayo izithende zeenyawo zam:
18_13_28_Mna lo, uhageleyo njengevithi, Njengengubo edliwe ngamanundu.
18_14_1_Umntu, into ezelwe ngumfazi, Imihla yakhe mifutshane, izele ziinkathazo.
18_14_2_Uphuma njengentyantyambo, abune; Ubaleka njengethunzi,  angemi.
18_14_3_Onjalo umvelela ngeliso lakho, Undimise mna ematyaleni phambi kwakho?
18_14_4_Akwaba bekukho ohlambulukileyo ophume koyinqambi! Akukho nokuba abe mnye.
18_14_5_Imisiwe nje imihla yakhe, Liyaziwa nguwe inani leenyanga zakhe; Umenzele ke umda wakhe ongenakugqithwa.
18_14_6_Susa amehlo akho kuye, aphumle, Ade akholiswe njengomqeshwa yimini yakhe.
18_14_7_Kuba kukho ithemba emthini; Ukuba uthe wagawulwa, wobuya uhlume, Igatya lawo lingapheli.
18_14_8_Ukuba ithe yaba ndala ingcambu yawo emhlabeni, Safa isibili sawo eluthulini:
18_14_9_Ngevumba lamanzi wodubula, Wenze amasebe njengesithodlana.
18_14_10_Ke yena umfo ufa angquleke; Umntu uphuma umphefumlo; abe phi na ke?
18_14_11_Amanzi aselwandle ayemka; Umlambo uyatsha, wome:
