18_14_12_Umntu ulala phantsi ke, angavuki; Lide izulu lingabikho,  bangaqabuki, Bangavuswa ebuthongweni babo.
18_14_13_Akwaba ubungandigushayo kwelabafileyo, Undisithelise ude ubuye umsindo wakho; Undimisele umda, undikhumbule ke!
18_14_14_Ukuba uthe umfo wafa, wophila na? Yonke imihla yokuphuma kwam umkhosi, bendinga ndingalinda, Kude kufike ukukhululwa kwam.
18_14_15_Ubungabizayo ke, ndisabele mna, Uwulangazele umsebenzi wezandla zakho.
18_14_16_Kuba ngoku uyawabala amabanga am, Akuzigcinile ngenxa yesono sam.
18_14_17_Sitywiniwe savingcelwa engxoweni isikreqo sam; Wahlomela ebugwenxeni bam.
18_14_18_Kodwa intaba, isiwa, iyagubeka; Iliwa liyashenxa endaweni yalo;
18_14_19_Amanzi ayawadla amatye; Iziphango zawo ziyalukhukulisa uthuli lomhlaba; Ithemba lomntu uyalidakisa ke.
18_14_20_Uthi gaga phezu kwakhe kuphele, emke; Uguqula ubuso bakhe,  umgxothe.
18_14_21_Bayazuka abantwana bakhe, angazi yena; Baba ziimbedlenge,  angagqali yena.
18_14_22_Kuye yedwa ibuhlungu inyama yakhe, Umphefumlo wakhe uyalila ngaphakathi.
18_15_1_Wasusela uElifazi wakwaTeman, wathi,
18_15_2_Isilumko siphendula ngokwazi okungumoya na, Sizalise umbilini waso ngolophu lwasempumalanga na?
18_15_3_Khe sohlwaye ngentetho engancediyo na, Nangokukhuluma okungasizi lutho na?
18_15_4_Phezu koko wena utshitshise ukoyika uThixo, Wanciphisa ukuthelekelela phambi koThixo;
18_15_5_Ngokuba ubugwenxa bakho bufundisa umlomo wakho, Unyule ulwimi lwabanobuqhophololo.
18_15_6_Ngumlomo wakho okugwebayo, asindim; Ngumlomo wakho okuphendulayo.
18_15_7_Nguwe na owazalwa kuqala, waba ngumntu? Waveliswa ngenimba ngaphambi kweenduli?
18_15_8_Wawukho na egquguleni likaThixo? Wabutsalela kuwe na ubulumko obo?
18_15_9_Wazi ntoni na, esingayaziyo thina? Uqonde ntoni na,  engekhoyo nathi kuthi?
18_15_10_Kunje thina siziingwevu namaxhego, Amadala nakuyihlo ngokuzalwa.
18_15_11_Zincinane na kuwe iintuthuzelo zikaThixo, Nelizwi elithethe kuhle nawe?
18_15_12_Imka nantoni na intliziyo yakho? Aphanyazela ntoni na emehlo akho,
18_15_13_Le nto ukuguqulela kuThixo ukufutha kwakho, Ukhuphe ukuthetha emlonyeni wakho?
18_15_14_Uyintoni na umntu, ukuba aqaqambe? Abe lilungisa ozelwe ngumfazi?
18_15_15_Yabona, nabangcwele bakhe akakholwa ngabo, Nezulu aliqaqambile emehlweni akhe.
18_15_16_Ubeke phi na olisikizi, oyimbozisa; Umntu lo, usela ubugqwetha njengamanzi?
18_15_17_Ndokuxelela, ndiphulaphule; Endikubonileyo ndikubalisele;
18_15_18_Okwaxelwa zizilumko, Kuvela kooyise, zaza azakufihla.
18_15_19_Lanikwa zona zodwa ilizwe, Akwangena wasemzini phakathi kwazo.
18_15_20_Yonke imihla yakhe, ongendawo uyazibhijabhija; Inani leminyaka liqwetyelwe ingqwangangqwili.
18_15_21_Kumi ilizwi lokunkwantyisa ezindlebeni zakhe, Eluxolweni uyamfikela umbhuqi.
18_15_22_Akakholwa ukuba uya kubuya emnyameni; Ke yena uqwetyelwe ikrele.
18_15_23_Uphalaphalela ukutya, esithi, Kuphi na? Uyazi ukuba ulungiselwe imini yobumnyama ecaleni kwakhe.
18_15_24_Udandathekiswa yimbandezelo nayingcutheko; Ithi gaga phezu kwakhe, njengokumkani olungiselwe isiphendu sokulwa.
18_15_25_Ngokuba esolulele kuThixo isandla sakhe, Wazenza igorha kuSomandla:
18_15_26_Wamgila, eyolule intamo, Ngamaqhubu angqingqwa eengweletshetshe zakhe;
18_15_27_Ngokuba egubungele ubuso bakhe ngamanqatha akhe, Watyeba wanamanqatha emihlubulweni yakhe.
18_15_28_Wema imizi engamanxuwa, Nezindlu ezingezakuhlalwa,  Ezamiselwa ukuba zibe yimiwewe.
18_15_29_Akayi kuba sisityebi, abuyi kuma ubutyebi bakhe; Inzuzo yakhe ayiyi kunaba emhlabeni.
18_15_30_Akayi kusinda ebumnyameni; Igatya lakhe liya komiswa ngedangatye; Emke ngokufutha komlomo wakhe.
18_15_31_Okhohliswayo makangathembeli kumampunge; Kuba inkohlakalo iya kuba lulwanano lwakhe.
18_15_32_Kozaliseka oko ingekabi yimini yakhe, Isebe lakhe lesundu lingabi luhlaza.
18_15_33_Wowisa njengomdiliya uwisa iidiliya zawo ezikrwada;  Avuthulule njengomnquma intyantyambo yawo.
18_15_34_Kuba ibandla leentshembenxa liya kuba njengento embatshileyo, Umlilo uzitshise iintente zokucenga.
18_15_35_Bakhawula ububi, bazale ubutshinga, Umbilini wabo usebenze inkohliso.
18_16_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_16_2_Ndive izinto ezininzi ezinjengezo; Ningabathuthuzeli abayindinisa, nonke niphela.
18_16_3_Aphelile na amazwi angumoya? Uxhokonxwa yintoni na, ukuba uphendule?
18_16_4_Nam ndibe ndingathethayo njengani. Ukuba umphefumlo wenu ubusendaweni yomphefumlo wam. Ndibe ndinganiqukela ukuthetha,  Ndinihlunguzele intloko;
18_16_5_Ndibe ndinganikhaliphisa ngomlomo wam, Nokukhuza komlomo wam kulunqande usizi lwenu.
18_16_6_Nokuba ndithe ndathetha, awunqandwa umvandedwa wam; Nokuba ndithe ndayeka, kumka ntoni na kum?
18_16_7_Hayi, ngoku undidinisile; Uliphanzisile lonke ibandla lam.
18_16_8_Undintshwenyisile, kwaba lingqina oko; Kwandimela ukubhitya kwam, Kwaphendula ebusweni bam.
18_16_9_Umsindo wakhe wandiqwenga, wanditshutshisa; Uditshixizele amenyo akhe; Engumbandezeli wam, uwenze abukhali amehlo akhe kum.
18_16_10_Bandakhamele umlomo; Ngengcikivo bandibetha ezidleleni;  Bonke bayathelelana ukundichasa.
18_16_11_UThixo wandinikela kumakhwenkwe, Wandijulela ezandleni zabangendawo.
18_16_12_Ndibi ndichulumacha, wandivithavitha, Wandibamba ngentamo,  wandihlekeza, Wandimisa ndaba yitekeni kuye.
18_16_13_Bandirhawula abatoli bakhe, Wazityanda izintso zam,  engenalufefe, Wayiphalazela emhlabeni inyongo yam.
18_16_14_Wandenza iinduma ngeenduma, Wandigila njengegorha.
18_16_15_Ndathungela iingubo ezirhwexayo enkwaneni yolusu lwam,  Ndalugquba ngothuli uphondo lwam.
18_16_16_Ubuso bam bubomvu kunene kukulila, Phezu kweenkophe zam lithunzi lokufa;
18_16_17_Nakuba kungekho kugonyamela ezandleni zam, Uqaqambile umthandazo wam.
18_16_18_Mhlaba, musa ukuliselela igazi lam, Kungabi nasikhundla ukuhlahlamba kwam.
18_16_19_Nangoku, yabona, lisemazulwini ingqina lam; Ondivumelayo usezindaweni eziphezulu.
18_16_20_Abandigxekayo ngabethu aba; Iliso lam liyengezela kuThixo,
18_16_21_Ukuba alungisele umfo kuThixo, Ahlule phakathi komntu nommelwane wakhe.
18_16_22_Kuba iminyaka embalwa iza kudlula, Ndihambe ke umendo endingayi kubuya ngawo.
18_17_1_Umoya wam wonakele, imihla yam icinyiwe, Into yam ngamangcwaba.
18_17_2_Inene ndiyinto abadlala ngayo, Neliso lam lilibele ziinkani zabo.
18_17_3_Khawubeke into, undimele; Ngubani na yena oya kubambana nam ngesandla?
18_17_4_Ngokuba intliziyo yabo uyifihlele ukuqiqa; Ngenxa yoko akuyi kubaphakamisa.
18_17_5_Unikela abahlobo ukuba babe ngamaxhoba, Amehlo abantwana bakhe aze aphelelwe.
18_17_6_Undimise ndaba ngumzekeliso ezizweni; Ndaba ngotshicelwa ebusweni.
18_17_7_Laza lanorhatyazo iliso lam kukukhathazeka; Amalungu am aba njengesithunzi onke ephela.
18_17_8_Bamangaliswa abathe tye yile nto; Omsulwa uyazixhokonxa ngenxa yentshembenxa.
18_17_9_Ke olilungisa ubambe indlela yakhe, Ozandla zihlambulukileyo uya ekhalipha.
18_17_10_Kodwa nina nonke, buyani, khanize; Andiyi kufumana silumko phakathi kwenu.
18_17_11_Imihla yam idlule, zijaciwe izigqibo zam, Amafa entliziyo yam.
18_17_12_Bathi ubusuku yimini; Ukukhanya kusondele, xa kuza kuba mnyama.
18_17_13_Ukuba ndithe ndathemba, ndithembe elabafileyo, indlu yam;  Ndandlala umandlalo wam emnyameni;
18_17_14_Ukuba ndithe kukubola, Ungubawo; Ndathi kwimpethu, Unguma,  ungudade wethu:
18_17_15_Liphi na ke ngoku ithemba lam? Ithemba lam, ngubani na owolibona?
18_17_16_Liya kuhla liye emivalweni yelabafileyo, Xa siphumla kunye eluthulini.
18_18_1_Waphendula uBhiledadi wakwaShuwa, wathi,
18_18_2_Kunini na nikuzingela ukuthetha? Qondani, sothetha emveni koku.
18_18_3_Yini na ukuba kuthiwe sinjengeenkomo, Sibe ziinqambi emehlweni akho?
18_18_4_Wena uziqwengayo ngomsindo wakho, Liya kushiywa ihlabathi ngenxa yakho, lingamiwa na? Likhwelele iliwa endaweni yalo?
18_18_5_Noko nokukhanya oku kongendawo kuya kucinywa, Lingabi mhlophe ilangatye lomlilo wakhe.
18_18_6_Ukukhanya kuya kwenziwa mnyama ententeni yakhe, Nesibane sakhe sicinywe phezu kwakhe.
18_18_7_Ukunyantsula kwakhe kuya kuxinwa, Limphose phantsi kwaelakhe iqhinga.
18_18_8_Kuba uqhutyelwe emnatheni ziinyawo zakhe, Uhamba phezu kwesibatha.
18_18_9_Umgibe umbambisa ngesithende, Limbambise isango.
18_18_10_Lufihliwe emhlabeni ulutya lwakhe, Ukuthiwa hlasi kwakhe kusengqushwini.
18_18_11_Uyadandathekiswa ngeenxa zonke kukukhwankqisa,  Kumbhebhethe, kuthane mbende naye.
18_18_12_Amandla akhe aya kuphela kukulamba, Ukusindeka kulungiselwe ukujingxela kwakhe.
18_18_13_Kudla iziqendu zolusu lwakhe; Udla iziqendu zakhe owamazibulo wokufa.
18_18_14_Iyancothuka ententeni yakhe inkoloseko yakhe, Ahanjiselwe kukumkani wokukhwankqisa.
18_18_15_Kuhleli ententeni yakhe izinto zasemzini; Kugcwayelwa isulfure ekhayeni lakhe.
18_18_16_Ngaphantsi ziya koma iingcambu zakhe, Ngaphezulu abune amasebe akhe.
18_18_17_Isikhumbuzo sakhe siya kudaka ehlabathini, Angabi nagama nasemaphandleni.
18_18_18_Baya kumtyhala ekukhanyeni, aye ebumnyameni, Aphekuzwe kwelimiweyo.
18_18_19_Akayi kuba nanyana nanzala ebantwini bakowabo, Kungabikho usindileyo emizini yakhe.
18_18_20_Bomangaliswa yimini yakhe abahleli entshonalanga,  Nabasempumalanga babanjwe kukuba namanwele.
18_18_21_Inene, injalo iminquba yabanobugqwetha, Injalo indawo yongamaziyo uThixo.
18_19_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_19_2_Kunini na nisenza isingqala kumphefumlo wam, Nindityumza ngokuthetha?
18_19_3_Ezi zihlandlo zilishumi nindihlazile; Anidanile,  niyandikhwankqisa.
18_19_4_Khona ke ndithe okunene ndalahleka, Kuhleli nam ukulahleka kwam.
18_19_5_Ukuba okunene nithe nazikhulisa kum, Nandohlwaya ngengcikivo yam:
18_19_6_Yazini ngoko, ukuba nguThixo ondigobileyo, Wandirhawula ngomnatha wakhe.
18_19_7_Yabona, ndiyakhala, ndithi, Ndagonyamelwa! kungasatyelwa;  Ndiyazibika, kungabikho kulungisa.
18_19_8_Uyibiyile indlela yam, akwabakho ukugqitha; Ezingqushwini zam wamisa ubumnyama.
18_19_9_Undihlube uzuko lwam, Wasusa isithsaba sentloko yam.
18_19_10_Undidilizile ngeenxa zonke, ndemka; Walincothula njengomthi ithemba lam.
18_19_11_Uwuvuthise ngakum umsindo wakhe, Wandibalela ekuthini ndingowababandezeli bakhe.
18_19_12_Zeza kunye izimpi zakhe, Zandifumbela indlela yazo,  Zayizunguleza ngeenxa zonke intente yam.
18_19_13_Abazalwana bam ubase kude kum, Abandaziyo sebengabasemzini kanye kum.
18_19_14_Izalamane zam zindishiyile, Nabazana nam bandilibele.
18_19_15_Abahlala endlwini yam, nabakhonzazana bam, Bandibalele ekuthini ndingowasemzini, Ndingowolunye uhlanga emehlweni abo.
18_19_16_Ndibiza umkhonzi wam, angasabeli; Ndimbongoze ngomlomo wam.
18_19_17_Umoya wam umkruqule umkam; Ndiyanuka kubantwana besizalo esandizalayo.
18_19_18_Namakhwenkwe ayandicekisa; Ndakusuka, asuka athethe ngam.
18_19_19_Ndilisikizi kumakholwane am, Nabendibathanda bandiguqukele.
18_19_20_Amathambo am atshele eluswini lwam nasenyameni yam;  Ndisinde macebetshu.
18_19_21_Tarhuni, tarhuni, zihlobo zam; Kuba isandla sikaThixo sindiphethe.
18_19_22_Yini na ukuba nindisukele njengoThixo, Ninganeli yinyama yam?
18_19_23_Akwaba ngoku ebebhalwa amazwi am! Akwaba ebekrolwe encwadini!
18_19_24_Ngentlabo yesinyithi, atyhidwe ngelothe, Axholelwe eweni nanini!
18_19_25_Ke mna ndiyazi ukuba umhlawuleli wam uhleli;  Engowokuphela, uya kusuka eme phezu kothuli lwehlabathi.
18_19_26_Emveni kokuba ulusu lwam ludlavulwe lwanje, Ingasekho inyama yam, ndiya kumbona uThixo,
18_19_27_Endiya kuzibonela mna ngokwam; Amehlo am ambone, ingabi wumbi. Ziyaphelelwa izintso zam ngaphakathi kwam.
18_19_28_Ukuba nithi, Simsukela ngani na? Ingcambu yaloo nto ifunyenwe kum:
18_19_29_Nxunguphalani likrele; Kuba ubushushu, bubo ubugwenxa obufanele ikrele, Ukuze nazi ukuba kukho umgwebo.
18_20_1_Wasusela uTsofare waseNahama, wathi,
18_20_2_Ngako oko iingcingangcinga zam ezi ziyandiphendula, Ngenxa yokuthabatheka kwam ngaphakathi kwam.
18_20_3_Ukuthethisa okundihlazayo ndiyakuva, Ke umoya uyandiphendula engqondweni yam.
18_20_4_Oku uyakwazi na kambe kwanini, Kususela koko lwabekwayo uluntu ehlabathini:
18_20_5_Ukuba ukumemelela kwabangendawo kufutshane, Ukuvuya kweentshembenxa kokwephanyazo?
18_20_6_Nokuba kuthe kwenyuka kwaya ezulwini ukuphakama kwakhe,  Intloko yakhe wayifikisa emafini:
18_20_7_Njengelindle lakhe uya kudaka kuphele, Abambonayo bathi,  Uphi na?
18_20_8_Uya kuphaphazela emke njengephupha, angafunyanwa, Aphekuzwe njengombono wobusuku.
18_20_9_Iliso elikhe lambona, aliyi kuphinda; Indawo yakhe ayisayi kumalama.
18_20_10_Abantwana bakhe baya kungxengxezela abasweleyo, Izandla zakhe zibuyise imfuyo yakhe.
18_20_11_Amathambo akhe ebezele bubutsha; Bolaliswa phantsi naye eluthulini.
18_20_12_Nokuba ububi bebunencasa emlonyeni wakhe, Wabugusha phantsi kolwimi lwakhe,
18_20_13_Wabuconga akabuyeka, Wabuthintela ekhuhlangubeni lakhe;
18_20_14_Isonka sakhe sibhuqukile emathunjini akhe, Yinyongo yamaphimpi embilinini wakhe.
18_20_15_Uginye ubutyebi, wabuhlanza; Uyabukhupha esiswini sakhe uThixo.
18_20_16_Womungunya ubuhlungu bamaphimpi, Lumbulale ulwimi lwenyushu.
18_20_17_Akayi kubona mijelo, Milambo, zihlambo zobusi namasi.
18_20_18_Ebuyisa awakuxelengayo, akakuginyi; Angavuyi ngangobutyebi aburhwebileyo.
18_20_19_Kuba wabathi viki, wabalahla, abasweleyo; Waxhakamfula indlu, angayakhanga.
18_20_20_Kuba engalwazanga uxolo esiswini sakhe, Akayi kusinda nezinto zakhe ezinqwenelekayo.
18_20_21_Bekungekho nto isindayo emqaleni wakhe; Ngenxa yoku, aziyi kuhlala izinto zakhe ezilungileyo.
18_20_22_Ekuzalisekeni kokumaneleyo ubandezelekile, Izandla zonke zabangento ziyamfikela.
18_20_23_Kothi, ukuze sizaliswe isisu sakhe, UThixo athumele kuye ukuvutha komsindo wakhe, Awunise phezu kwakhe enyameni yakhe.
18_20_24_Ebaleka isikrweqe sesinyithi, Lomphumela utolo lwesaphetha sobhedu.
18_20_25_Lurholiwe, lwaphuma emzimbeni, Nenyembe ebengezelayo enyongweni yakhe; Uyemka, izothuso ziphezu kwakhe.
18_20_26_Ubumnyama bonke bubekelwe iingqwebo zakhe; Udliwa ngumlilo ongavuthelwanga; Ugqibe okusindileyo ententeni yakhe.
18_20_27_Izulu lobutyhila ubugwenxa bakhe, Nehlabathi lisukele phezulu kuye.
18_20_28_Iya kufuduswa indyebo yendlu yakhe, Ikhukuliswe ngomhla womsindo wakhe.
18_20_29_Siso eso isabelo somntu ongendawo, sivela kuThixo, Nelifa alimiselweyo yena nguThixo.
18_21_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_21_2_Yivani, nikuve ukuthetha kwam; Kube ziintuthuzelo zenu oku.
18_21_3_Ndithwaleni, ndithethe nam; Nigculele emva kwamazwi am.
18_21_4_Mna, inkalazo yam isemntwini yini na? Khona bekungani ukuba ungazekaneki umoya wam?
18_21_5_Bhekani kum, nimangaliswe; Bekani isandla emlonyeni.
18_21_6_Okunene, ndakukhumbula, ndisuka ndikhwankqiswe, Nenyama yam ibanjwe kukududuzela.
18_21_7_Yini na ukuba abangendawo badle ubomi, Babe badala,  kananjalo bomelele, babe namandla?
18_21_8_Imbewu yabo iqinile phambi kwabo, inabo; Nabaphume embilinini wabo basemehlweni abo.
18_21_9_Izindlu zabo zinoxolo, kungekho kunkwantya, Nentonga kaThixo ayibafikeli.
18_21_10_Inkunzi yabo iyazeka ingahlohleli; Imazi yabo iyazala ingaphunzi.
18_21_11_Bayawakhuphela njengomhlambi amakhwenkwe abo, Nabantwana babo bayadloba.
18_21_12_Baphakamisa ilizwi benengqongqo nohadi, Bavuye lilizwi logwali.
18_21_13_Bayayigqiba imihla yabo ngokuchwayitha, Behle ngephanyazo ukuya kwelabafileyo.
18_21_14_Bathi kuThixo, Suka kuthi, Asikunanzile ukuzazi iindlela zakho.
18_21_15_Uyini na uSomandla, ukuba simkhonze? Kusinceda ntoni na ukumjoka?
18_21_16_Yabona, azisesandleni sabo izinto zabo ezilungileyo;  Iqhinga labangendawo malibe lee kum.
18_21_17_Kukangaphi na ke isibane sabangendawo sicinywa? Kubafikela ukusindeka kwabo? Ababele uThixo izintya ngomsindo wakhe?
18_21_18_Babe njengengca enqunqiweyo phambi komoya, Njengomququ ohlaselwa sisaqhwithi?
18_21_19_Nithi, UThixo ububekela abantwana babo ubutshinga babo.  Makabuphindezele kubo ngokwabo, bazi bona;
18_21_20_Makayibone inkxwaleko yabo amehlo abo, Babusele ubushushu boSomandla.
18_21_21_Ngokuba bayinanze ngani bona indlu yabo emva kwabo,  Lakuqhitshulwa inani leenyanga zabo?
18_21_22_Uya kufundiswa ukwazi uThixo na, Lowo ugweba abaphezulu?
18_21_23_Omnye ufa emandleni okwakhe ukuphila, Onwabile kanye,  echulumachile.
18_21_24_Iimvaba zakhe zizele ngamasi, Nomongo wamathambo akhe utyebile.
18_21_25_Omnye ufa ukrakra umphefumlo wakhe, Engadlanga zinto zilungileyo.
18_21_26_Balala ndawonye eluthulini, Iimpethu ziyabagubungela bobabini.
18_21_27_Yabona, ndiyazazi iingcinga zenu, Namayelenqe enindigonyamela ngawo.
18_21_28_Xa nithi, Iphi na indlu yesibhovubhovu? Iphi na intente ebalulekileyo yabangendawo?
18_21_29_Anibuzanga na kwabadlula ngendlela? Imiqondiso yabo ninako na ukuyikhanyela?
18_21_30_Ukuba ngemini yokusindeka wanqandwa ongendawo, Ngemini yokuphuphuma umsindo wemkiswa?
18_21_31_Ngubani na ongaxela ebusweni bakhe indlela yakhe? Enze into yena, ngubani na oya kuphindezela kuye?
18_21_32_Usiwa emangcwabeni yena, Alinde esigangeni.
18_21_33_Anencasa kuye amagada esihlambo; Emva kwakhe kulandela lonke uluntu, Nangaphambi kwakhe belungenakubalwa.
18_21_34_Ningathini na ke ukundithuthuzela ngeento ezingento,  limpendulo zenu zisele zibubumenemene nje?
18_22_1_Wasusela uElifazi wakwaTeman, wathi,
18_22_2_Umfo unokumnceda na uThixo? Hayi bo! Uzinceda ngokwakhe oqiqayo.
18_22_3_Kumnandi na kuSomandla, xa ulilungisa? Kuyinzuzo na kuye,  ukuba uyazigqibelelisa iindlela zakho?
18_22_4_Uya kukohlwaya na ngenxa yokoyika kwakho uThixo, Aye nawe ematyaleni?
18_22_5_Ububi bakho abubukhulu na? Ubugwenxa bakho asibobungaphele ndawo na?
18_22_6_Kuba ububambise umzalwana wakho ngelize, Ububahluba abaze iingubo.
18_22_7_Ubungamsezi manzi otyhafileyo, Olambileyo ubumwimba ukutya.
18_22_8_Ke indoda enengalo, belilelayo ilizwe; Obekekileyo ubehlala kulo.
18_22_9_Abahlolokazi ububandulula belambatha, Neengalo zeenkedama ubuzityumza.
18_22_10_Ngenxa yoko imigibe ikujikelezile, Ukhwankqiswe ngesiquphe kukunkwantyiswa.
18_22_11_Khona akububoni na ubumnyama, Nobuninzi bamanzi akugubungelayo?
18_22_12_UThixo ukuphakama kwakhe asikokwamazulu yini na? Bona ke intloko yazo iinkwenkwezi, ukuba phezulu kwayo!
18_22_13_Uthi ke wena, Wazi ntoni na uThixo? Unokugweba na,  engaphaya kobumnyama bamafu?
18_22_14_Amafu amsithile, akaboni; Uzihambela okwakhe esazingeni samazulu.
18_22_15_Umendo wasephakadeni uya kuwugcina na, Abawunyatheleyo abantu abanobutshinga?
18_22_16_Abashwabene lingekabi lixesha; Lwanyibilika, lwangumsinga useko lwabo,
18_22_17_Ababesithi kuThixo, Suka kuthi; Angabenza ntoni na uSomandla?
18_22_18_Kanti ebenguye ozalisa izindlu zabo ngezinto ezilungileyo.  Iqhinga labangendawo malibe lee kum.
18_22_19_Aya kubona oko amalungisa, avuye; Omsulwa uyabagculela,  esithi,
18_22_20_Inene, abasukele phezulu kum bathe shwaka, Wakudla umlilo ukuphuphuma kwabo.
18_22_21_Khawenze ubuhlobo naye, ube noxolo; Ngaloo nto wozelwa kokulungileyo.
18_22_22_Khawamkele umyalelo emlonyeni wakhe, Ubeke iintetho zakhe entliziyweni yakho.
18_22_23_Ukuba uthe wabuyela kuSomandla, uya kwakhiwa. Ukuba uthe wabubeka kude ubugqwetha ezintenteni zakho,
18_22_24_Walibeka eluthulini ilitye legolide, Wayibeka eluhlalwini lwemilanjana neyakwaOfire:
18_22_25_USomandla woba lilitye legolide kuwe, Nesilivere ebengezelayo kakhulu.
18_22_26_Ngokuba uya kwandula ukuziyolisa ngoSomandla,  Ubuphakamisele kuThixo ubuso bakho.
18_22_27_Wothandaza kuye, eve, Uzizalise izibhambathiso zakho;
18_22_28_Usongele into, ifezeke kuwe; Ezindleleni zakho kukhanye,  kube mhlophe.
18_22_29_Xa zithe zehla, wothi, Phezulu! Amsindise omehlo aqondele phantsi.
18_22_30_Uya kusindisa nongemsulwa, Asizwe bubunyulu bezandla zakho.
18_23_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_23_2_Nanamhlanje inkalazo yam ineenkani, Isandla sam sinzima phezu kokugcuma kwam.
18_23_3_Yoo! Andaba bendisazi apho ndingamfumana khona, Ndize esihlalweni sakhe!
18_23_4_Bendiya kulicacisa phambi kwakhe ityala lam, Ndiwuzalise umlomo wam ngeziganeko.
18_23_5_Andaba bendikwazi ukuthetha abeya kundiphendula ngako,  Ndiyiqonde into abeya kuyithetha kum.
18_23_6_Wobambana nam ngamandla amakhulu na? Hayi! Kodwa ke wondigqala.
18_23_7_Oko othe tye ubeya kubonisana naye, Ndisinde kumgwebi wam,  kuphele.
18_23_8_Yabona, ndisinga phambili, angabikho; Nangasemva,  ndingamnakani;
18_23_9_Ngasekhohlo, ekusebenzeni kwakhe, ndingamalami; Xa atyekela ngasekunene, ndingamboni.
18_23_10_Kuba uyayazi indlela enam; Endicikidile, bendiya kuphuma njengegolide.
18_23_11_Unyawo lwam lubambe umkhondo wakhe, Ndayigcina indlela yakhe, andathi gu bucala.
18_23_12_Emthethweni wemilebe yomlomo wakhe andisukanga;  Ndiwabekile amazwi omlomo wakhe kunowam ummiselo.
18_23_13_Ke yena umi ndaweni-nye, ngubani na ongambuyisayo?  Umphefumlo wakhe ukhanukile, uya kwenza oko.
18_23_14_Kuba uya kukufeza oko ndikumiselweyo; Zininzi ke izinto ezinje kuye.
18_23_15_Ngenxa yoko ndikhwankqiswe ebusweni bakhe. Ndakukugqala,  ndisuka ndinkwantye nguye.
18_23_16_UThixo uyiqobisile intliziyo yam. USomandla undikhwankqisile.
18_23_17_Kuba andibhangiswanga ngenxa yobumnyama, Nangenxa yobuso bam obugutyungelwe sisithokothoko.
18_24_1_Yini na ukuba kungabekwa maxesha nguSomandla? Yini na ukuba abamaziyo bangaziboni iimini zakhe?
18_24_2_Kushenxiswa imilimandlela; Kuphangwa imihlambi, yaluswe.
18_24_3_Kuqhutywa kumkiwe ne-esile lenkedama, Kubanjiswe ngenkomo yomhlolokazi.
18_24_4_Kugilwa amahlwempu endleleni, Bazimele ndawonye abaziintsizana belizwe.
18_24_5_Khangela, njengamaesile asendle entlango, Baphuma ngomsebenzi wabo, befuna kwakusasa into yokudla; Inkqantosi sisonka sabantwana kubo.
18_24_6_Esisimini bavuna ukutya kwabo, Babhikice esidiliyeni songendawo.
18_24_7_Balala ze bengenangubo, Abananto yokuzigubungela engqeleni,
18_24_8_Bayanetha sisiphango seentaba; Bancathama ngeliwa,  bengenandawo yakuzimela.
18_24_9_Kuhluthwa ebeleni iinkedama, Koniwe abaziintsizana.
18_24_10_Bahamba ze, bengenangubo; Bathwala izithungu, belambile.
18_24_11_Phakathi kweendonga zabaya bakhama ioli, Baxovula ezixovulelweni zewayini, benxaniwe noko.
18_24_12_Emizini kugula amadoda, Nomphefumlo wabangxwelerhiweyo uyakhala; Kanti uThixo akathi bubuhilihili.
18_24_13_Ngabo abo bagwilika ekukhanyeni; Abanakwazana neendlela zako, Abahlali ezingqushwini zako.
18_24_14_Kusathi qhiphu ukusa, kuvuka isihange, Sibulale iintsizana namahlwempu; Ebusuku sibe njengesela.
18_24_15_Iliso lomkrexezi ligcine ungcwalazi; Uthi, Akukho liso liya kundalama, Anxibe isigqubuthelo ebusweni.
18_24_16_Bagqobhoza izindlu emnyameni; Emini bayazivalela, Abazani nokukhanya.
18_24_17_Ngokuba ubumnyama obuthe shinyi bukukuza kokusa kubo bonke; Ngokuba bazana nokhwankqiso lobumnyama obuthe shinyi.
18_24_18_Bayakhawuleza phezu kwamanzi; Sitshabhisiwe isabelo sabo ehlabathini; Abasasingi endleleni yesidiliya.
18_24_19_Amanzi ekhephu ahluthwa ngumqwebedu nakukubalela; Aboni bahluthwa lelabafileyo.
18_24_20_Sibalibele isizalo; iimpethu ziyabamunya, Ababi sakhunjulwa; Baphulwe ke njengomthi ubugqwetha.
18_24_21_Bamphanga kakubi oludlolo, ongazalanga; Abangamenzelanga okulungileyo umhlolokazi.
18_24_22_Wolula imihla yeembalasane ngamandla akhe, Ziphakame bezise zibuncamile ubomi.
18_24_23_Uzinika inkoloseko, zayame, Amehlo akhe abe phezu kweendlela zazo,
18_24_24_Ziphakame: kube mzuzwana zingabikho. Zithe ngqu, zibuthiwe njengabanye bonke, Zinqanyulwe njengesikhwebu sengqolowa.
18_24_25_Ukuba kanti akunjalo, ngubani na owondenza othetha amanga,  Akwenze into engento ukuthetha kwam?
18_25_1_Wasusela uBhiledadi wakwaShuwa, wathi,
18_25_2_Ulawulo nonkwantyiso lunaye; Wenza uxolo ezindaweni zakhe eziphezulu.
18_25_3_Inokubalwa na imikhosi yakhe? Ngubani na ongaphunyelwayo kukukhanya kwakhe?
18_25_4_Angathini na umntu ukuba lilungisa kuThixo? Angathini na ukuba ngoqaqambileyo ozelwe ngumfazi?
18_25_5_Yabona, nenyanga ayimhlophe, Neenkwenkwezi aziqaqambile,  emehlweni akhe.
18_25_6_Ubeke phi na ke umntu, impethu le, Nonyana ka-Adam, umbungu lo?
18_26_1_Waphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_26_2_Utheni na wena ukumnceda ongenamandla, Nokuyisindisa ingalo engenamandla?
18_26_3_Utheni na ukumcebisa ongenabulumko, Ukumazisa kunene into eyiyo?
18_26_4_Uxelele bani na ukuthetha? Kukuphefumla kukabani na okuphume kuwe?
18_26_5_Abangasekhoyo bayazibhijabhija Ngaphantsi kwamanzi, nabemi bawo.
18_26_6_Lize elabafileyo phambi kwakhe, Ayinasigubungelo inzonzobila.
18_26_7_Ulaneka izulu langasentla enyanyeni, Axhome ihlabathi phezu kokungeni.
18_26_8_Ubopha amanzi emafini akhe, Lingagqabhuki ilifu ngaphantsi kwawo.
18_26_9_Uvingca umphambili wetrone, Aneke ilifu lakhe phezu kwayo.
18_26_10_Uzunguleza ubuso bamanzi ngomda, Kuse ekupheleni kokukhanya nobumnyama.
18_26_11_Iintsika zamazulu ziyanyenganyenga, Zingakhulumi kukukhalima kwakhe.
18_26_12_Ngamandla akhe ugxobhagxobha ulwandle, Ngengqondo yakhe uqoba uRahabhi.
18_26_13_Ngomoya wakhe wenza ukuba lise izulu; Isandla sakhe sayihlaba inyoka enyebelezayo.
18_26_14_Yabona, ngamancam eendlela zakhe lawo; Iyini na ke intsebezo yelizwi esiyivayo ngaye? Ke yona indudumo yemisebenzi yobugorha bakhe ingaqondwa ngubani na?
18_27_1_Wahambisa uYobhi, waphakamisa umzekeliso wakhe, wathi,
18_27_2_Ehleli nje uThixo, olisusileyo ibango lam, USomandla,  owenze krakra umphefumlo wam
18_27_3_(Kuba kusekum ukuphefumla kwam konke, Nomoya kaThixo usemathatheni am),
18_27_4_Umlomo wam awuthethi bugqwetha, Nolwimi lwam aluxeli nkohliso.
18_27_5_Makube lee kum ukuthi, niyalungisa; Ndoda ndiphume umphefumlo, ndingayisusi kum ingqibelelo yam.
18_27_6_Ndobambelela ebulungiseni bam, andiyi kubuyeka; Intliziyo yam ayiyi kungcikiva mini eziminini zam.
18_27_7_Malube njengongendawo utshaba lwam, Nosukela phezulu kum abe njengogqwethayo.
18_27_8_Kuba liyintoni na ithemba lentshembenxa, xa athe wawunqumla, Xa athe wawurhola uThixo umphefumlo wayo?
18_27_9_Wokuva na uThixo ukululahlamba kwayo, Xa ifikelwe yimbandezelo?
18_27_10_Khona inokuziyolisa na ngoSomandla? Ingamnqula na uThixo ngamaxesha onke?
18_27_11_Ndiya kuniyala ngokusingisele esandleni sikaThixo;  OkunoSomandla andiyi kukukhanyela.
18_27_12_Yabonani, nonke niphela ngokwenu nikubonile; Yini na ke ukuba nithethe into engento yakonto?
18_27_13_Siso esi isabelo somntu ongendawo kuThixo, Nelifa labaziingqwangangqwili, abalamkelayo kuSomandla.
18_27_14_Ukuba bathe banda oonyana bakhe, bandiselwa ikrele;  Nabaphume embilinini wakhe abahluthi kukutya.
18_27_15_Amaqongqolo akhe aya kungcwatywa kukufa, Abahlolokazi bakhe bangalili.
18_27_16_Ukuba uthe wafumba isilivere njengothuli, Wazilungisela izambatho njengodaka:
18_27_17_Angazilungisa, koko ziya kwambathwa lilungisa, Nesilivere leyo babelane ngayo abamsulwa.
18_27_18_Uyakha indlu yakhe njengenundu, Njengephempe elenziwe yimboniseli.
18_27_19_Ulala phantsi esisityebi, akaphindi; Uvula amehlo akhe,  angabikho.
18_27_20_Kumthabatha njengamanzi ukukhwankqa, Simbe ebusuku isaqhwithi.
18_27_21_Luyamfukula ulophu lwasempumalanga, emke, Lumqweqwedise endaweni yakhe.
18_27_22_UThixo umgibisela angamcongi; Usibaleka asibaleke isandla sakhe.
18_27_23_Bamtyhwakrazela izandla, Bamenzele umsondlo, emke endaweni yakhe.
18_28_1_Kuba kukho apho iphuma khona isilivere, Nendawo yegolide abayihluzayo.
18_28_2_Isinyithi sithatyathwa eluthulini, Banyibilikisa amatye abe lubhedu.
18_28_3_Baphelisa ubumnyama, Bebhekisa eziphelweni zonke,  Begocagocela amatye asesithokothokweni nawasebumnyameni obuthe shinyi.
18_28_4_Bemba umngxuma kude kwabemiyo, Belityelwe lunyawo lwabahambi; Baxhomekile bekude nabantu, bayajinga.
18_28_5_Umhlaba-kuphuma ukutya kuwo; Umzantsi wawo ubhukuqwa ngathi ngumlilo.
18_28_6_Indawo yesafire ngamatye awo, Amagada egolide akuyo;
18_28_7_Yingqushu engaziwa xhalanga, Engathiwanga nzo liso lantloyiya,
18_28_8_Enganyathelwanga thole lanyamakazi inyalasayo,  Engahanjwanga nayingonyama.
18_28_9_Usa isandla sakhe nakwiqhwitha, Uzibhukuqa ezingcanjini iintaba.
18_28_10_Ugqobhoza imijelo emaweni; Libona zonke izinto ezinqabileyo iliso lakhe.
18_28_11_Uvingca imilambo ingavuzi, Okufihlakeleyo akukhuphele emhlotsheni.
18_28_12_Ke bona ubulumko bufunyanwa phi na? Iphi na indawo yengqondo?
18_28_13_Akalazi umntu ixabiso labo; Abufunyanwa ezweni labahleliyo.
18_28_14_Amanzi enzonzobila athi, Abukum; Ulwandle luthi, Abunam.
18_28_15_Akurholwa golide ithe shinyi esikhundleni sabo;  Akulinganiswa silivere ibe yintengo yabo.
18_28_16_Abumelwa yigolide ecikizekileyo yakwaOfire, Nesardonisi enqabileyo, nesafire.
18_28_17_Azinakulingana nabo igolide negilas; Abunakwananana neempahla zegolide engcwengiweyo.
18_28_18_Zingasakhunjulwa iikorale neekristale, Ukuzuzwa kobulumko kuphezu kweeperile.
18_28_19_Ayinakulingana nabo itopazi yakwaKushi; Abumelwa yigolide ecikizekileyo, ecocekileyo.
18_28_20_Ubulumko buvela phi na ke, Yiyiphi na indawo yengqondo?
18_28_21_Bufihlakele emehlweni eento zonke eziphilileyo;  Busithakele nasezintakeni zasezulwini.
18_28_22_Inzonzobila nokufa kuthi, Sibuvile ukubuva ngendlebe.
18_28_23_NguThixo oyiqondayo indlela yabo, Nguye oyaziyo indawo yabo.
18_28_24_Kuba yena ubheka eziphelweni zehlabathi, Ubona phantsi kwamazulu onke;
18_28_25_Ngokuwenzela umoya ubunzima bawo, Namanzi awalinganise ngomlinganiso;
18_28_26_Ekuyenzeleni kwakhe imvula ummiselo, Nombane wendudumo indlela:
18_28_27_Waza wabubona, wabubala; Wabumisa, wabugocagoca nokubugocagoca;
18_28_28_Wathi emntwini: Yabona, ukoyika iNkosi, bubulumko obo,  Nokutyeka ebubini kuyingqondo.
18_29_1_Wahambisa uYobhi ukuphakamisa umzekeliso wakhe, wathi,
18_29_2_Yoo! Andaba bendineenyanga ezinjengezaphambili, Njengemihla abendigcinile uThixo;
18_29_3_Xa ukukhanya kwesibane sakhe bekuphezu kwentloko yam, Xa ngokukhanya kwakhe bendibuhamba ubumnyama;
18_29_4_Njengoko bendinjalo ngemihla yam yokwindla, Oko ukucweya kukaThixo bekuphezu kwentente yam;
18_29_5_Oko uSomandla ebesenam, Bengeenxa zonke kum abantwana bam;
18_29_6_Oko ebehlanjwa amabanga am ngamasi, Iliwa lindithululela imijelo yeoli.
18_29_7_Xa ekuphumeni ngesango bendinyuka ukuya kuwo umzi, Ndimise isihlalo sam endaweni yembutho,
18_29_8_Andibona amadodana, azimela, Asuka amaxhego, ema.
18_29_9_Abathetheli bakuyeka ukukhuluma, Babeka isandla emlonyeni.
18_29_10_Ilizwi leenganga lazimela, Nolwimi lwazo lwanamathela ekhuhlangubeni azo,
18_29_11_Kuba indlebe yeva, yathi ndinoyolo; Iliso labona,  landingqinela.
18_29_12_Kuba bendisiza iintsizana ezizibikayo, Neenkedama, noswele umncedi.
18_29_13_Intsikelelo yabadakayo ibindizela, Nentliziyo yomhlolokazi bendiyimemelelisa.
18_29_14_Ubulungisa bendibambatha bundambathe; Lwaba njengengubo yokwaleka nonkontsho ugwebo lwam.
18_29_15_Bendingamehlo kwimfama, Bendiziinyawo kwisiqhwala;
18_29_16_Bendinguyise kumahlwempu, Netyala lendingabaziyo bendiligocagoca.
18_29_17_Bendiwaphula amabamba ogqwethayo, Bendilikhupha emazinyweni akhe ixhoba.
18_29_18_Ndathi ke, Ndiya kuphuma umphefumlo kunye nendlu yam,  Ndiyandise imihla yam njengentaka engafiyo.
18_29_19_Ingcambu yam iya kuvulelwa amanzi, Ulale umbethe emasebeni am.
18_29_20_Uzuko lwam luya kuhlala lulutsha kum, Sihlaziyeke isaphetha sam esandleni sam.
18_29_21_Babendiphulaphula, balindele, Bathi tu ecebeni lam.
18_29_22_Emva kwelizwi lam babengaphindi bathethe, Kubachaphazele ukukhuluma kwam.
18_29_23_Babendilinda njengemvula, Imilomo yabo bayakhamisele eyasekwindla.
18_29_24_Bendibancumela, bencamile; Ukukhanya kobuso bam bangakusanganisi.
18_29_25_Bendibanyulela indlela, ndihlale ndiyintloko; Bendihlala njengokumkani phakathi komkhosi, Njengothuthuzela abenza isijwili.
18_30_1_Kungoku bayandihleka abancinane kunam ngemihla, Abayise babo ndibe ndicekisa nokubabeka nezinja zomhlambi wam.
18_30_2_Khona abengaba ngawantoni na kum amandla ezandla zabo,  Abaphelelwe ngamandla?
18_30_3_Bathe ngokuswela nokulamba banqina, Abo banqabi bomqwebedu,  Bobumnyama bentshabalala yakwantshabalala;
18_30_4_Abo baqhawula imbuwa ematyholweni, Abasonka siyingcambu yonwele.
18_30_5_Bayagxothwa phakathi kwabantu; Bahlatyelwa umkhosi ngathi ngamasela;
18_30_6_Bahlale ezihlanjeni ezingcangcazelisayo, Emingxunyeni yomhlaba nasemaweni.
18_30_7_Babhomboloza phakathi kwamatyholo, Bafumbalala phantsi kwamarhawu,
18_30_8_Bengoonyana bezidenge kwanoonyana babangenagama, Ababethwa bemke ezweni.
18_30_9_Kungoku ndiyingoma yabo. Ndaba kukukhuluma kwabo.
18_30_10_Ndilisikizi kubo, bakude nam; Abawanqandi amathe ebusweni bam.
18_30_11_Kuba ulucombulule uthambo lwam, wandicinezela, Bawuyeka umkhala phambi kwam.
18_30_12_Ngasekunene kuphakama ubuvuvana; Batyhala iinyawo zam,  Bandifumbele umendo wabo wokusindeka.
18_30_13_Bayenza amagqagala indlela yam, Bancedisa ukweyela kwam,  Abangenamncedi.
18_30_14_Ukuza kwabo ngathi bagqobhoza ithuba elibanzi eludongeni,  Bagaleleka kum nokuthi golokongqo kwalo.
18_30_15_Kuguqukele kum ukukhwankqisa, Kubusukela ubunene bam njengomoya; Kudlule njengelifu ukusindiswa kwam.
18_30_16_Kungoku uziphalazela phakathi kwam umphefumlo wam;  Indibambile imihla yeentsizi.
18_30_17_Ubusuku buphehla amathambo am, aqhiwuke kum; Iintlungu ezindidlayo azipheli.
18_30_18_Ngobukhulu bamandla sizenze sasisimbi isambatho sam, Sithe nca kum njengomqala wengubo yam yangaphantsi.
18_30_19_Undijulele eludakeni, Ndafana nothuli nothuthu.
18_30_20_Ndiyazibika kuwe, ungasabeli; Ndisuka ndime, undijonge.
18_30_21_Uzenza isijorha kum; Unditshutshisa ngamandla esandla sakho.
18_30_22_Undifukulela emoyeni, undikhwelisa kuwo, Undibhangise nokuzongoma kwawo.
18_30_23_Kuba ndiyazi ukuba uya kundibuyisela ekufeni, Endlwini yokuhlangana kwabaphilileyo bonke.
18_30_24_Kodwa ekuthini bhuma, umntu akoluli sandla na, Azibike ngenxa yoko elishweni lakhe?
18_30_25_Khona andimlilelanga yini na omini zinobubi?  Ubungenalusizi na umphefumlo wam ngenxa yehlwempu?
18_30_26_Kuba ndathemba okulungileyo, kweza okubi; Ndalinda ukukhanya, kweza isithokothoko.
18_30_27_Amathumbu am abila, akayeka; Yandihlangabeza imihla yeentsizi.
18_30_28_Ndahamba ndinezimnyama zokuzila, akwabakho langa;  Ndaphakama ebandleni, ndazibika.
18_30_29_Ndingumzalwana weempungutye, Nomlingane weenciniba.
18_30_30_Ulusu lwam luyadlubhuka kum, lumnyama. Namathambo am atshile kukoma.
18_30_31_Uhadi lwam lwaba sisijwili, Ugwali lwam lwaba lilizwi labalilayo.
18_31_1_Ndiwamisele amehlo am umnqophiso; Ndingathini na ukuqwalasela entombini?
18_31_2_Besiya kuba yini na isahlulelo sikaThixo esivela phezulu,  Nelifa loSomandla elivela ezindaweni eziphakamileyo?
18_31_3_Ukusindeka asikokogqwethayo yini na, Neshwangusha asilelabenzi bobutshinga yini na?
18_31_4_Akaziboni na yena iindlela zam, Awabale onke amabanga am?
18_31_5_Ukuba ndibe ndihamba nokhohlakeleyo, Lwangxamela inkohliso unyawo lwam,
18_31_6_Makandilinganise esikalini sobulungisa, Akwazi uThixo ukugqibelela kwam.
18_31_7_Ukuba ebethe gu bucala amabanga am endleleni, Yalandela amehlo am intliziyo yam, Sanamathela isisihla ezandleni zam:
18_31_8_Mandihlwayele, kudle omnye, Iingcambu zabaphume kum zincothulwe.
18_31_9_Ukuba ibihendekile intliziyo yam ngenxa yomkamntu,  Ndalalela esangweni lommelwane wam,
18_31_10_Umkam makasilele omnye umntu, Kuguqe abanye phezu kwakhe.
18_31_11_Kuba loo nto bubugqwirha, Loo nto bubugwenxa phambi kwabagwebi.
18_31_12_Inene, loo nto ngumlilo odla use enzonzobileni; Ibiya kuncothula iingcambu zongeniselo lwam lonke.
18_31_13_Ukuba ndibe ndilahle ilungelo lomkhonzi wam nelomkhonzazana wam, Bakubambana nam,
18_31_14_Bendingathini na ukwenza, xa athe uThixo wesuka waphakama?  Xa athe wavela, bendingathini na ukuphendula?
18_31_15_Owandenzayo ezibilinini akamenzanga na naye? Owasimilisa esizalweni akamnye na?
18_31_16_Ukuba ndibe ndisala nabakungxameleyo abasweleyo,  Ndawaphelisa amehlo omhlolokazi,
18_31_17_Ndawudla ndedwa umthamo wam, Ayadla inkedama kuwo:
18_31_18_Hayi bo! Kwasebuncinaneni bam inkedama yakhulela kum,  ngathi ikuyise, Ndamalathisa umhlolokazi nasesizalweni sikama.
18_31_19_Ukuba ndibe ndimbona otshabalalayo engenanto yokwambatha,  Ihlwempu lingenanto yokuzigubungela;
18_31_20_Ukuba abengandisikeleli amanqe akhe, Akazifudumeza ngoboya beemvana zam;
18_31_21_Ukuba bendilingisile ngesandla sam kwinkedama, Ngokuba bendibone uncedo lwam esangweni:
18_31_22_Igxalaba lam maliwe esixhantini salo, Nomkhono wam waphuke ethanjeni lawo.
18_31_23_Bekuya kuba kum ukunkwantya, ukusindeka nguThixo,  Ndikhohlwe phambi kokuphakama kwakhe.
18_31_24_Ukuba bendenze igolide inqolonci yam, Ndathi kwecikizekileyo, Nkoloseko yam;
18_31_25_Ukuba bendikuvuyela ukuba buninzi kobutyebi bam,  Nokufumana kakhulu kwesandla sam;
18_31_26_Ukuba bendilibona ilanga likhupha imitha, Nenyanga ihamba indilekile,
18_31_27_Yahendeka ngasese intliziyo yam, Ndasangela ngomlomo wam isandla sam:
18_31_28_Nako oko ngekuba bubugwenxa phambi kwabagwebi; Kuba ngendiba ndimkhanyele uThixo waphezulu.
18_31_29_Ukuba ndibe ndivuyela ilishwa londithiyayo, Ndaxhumela ukuba efunyenwe bububi
18_31_30_(Ke andilivumelanga ikhuhlangubo lam, ukuba lone,  Ndiwucele ngentshwabulo umphefumlo wakhe);
18_31_31_Ukuba babengatsho abantu bentente yam, ukuthi, Angaba ngubani na ongahluthanga yinyama yakhe?
18_31_32_Ubengalali phandle umphambukeli, Iingcango zam bendizivulela endleleni;
18_31_33_Ukuba bendilugubungela ukreqo lwam, njengoAdam,  Ngokuqhusheka ubugwenxa bam esifubeni sam,
18_31_34_Ngakuba bendingcangcazela phambi kwengxokolo eninzi,  Ndaqhiphuka umbilini kukudelwa yimizalwane, Ndathi cwaka,  andaphuma emnyango
18_31_35_Andaba bendinondiphulaphulayo! Nangu umqondiso wam,  uSomandla makandiphendule; Nantsi incwadi ayibhalileyo obambene nam.
18_31_36_Inene, ndoyithwala ngesixhanti nam, Ndoyithi jize kum njengesithsaba.
18_31_37_Inani lamabanga am ndomxelela, Ndimsondele njengenganga.
18_31_38_Ukuba umhlaba wam ubukhala ndim, Nemiqela yawo yalila kunye nawo;
18_31_39_Ukuba bendiwadla amandla awo kungekho mali, Ndabanga ukuba uphume umphefumlo womniniwo:
18_31_40_Makuphume amakhakakhaka esikhundleni sengqolowa, Nokhula esikhundleni serhasi. Agqityiwe amazwi kaYobhi.
18_32_1_Ayeka loo madoda omathathu ukumphendula uYobhi; kuba ubelilungisa emehlweni akhe.
18_32_2_Wavutha umsindo kaElihu unyana kaBharakeli, wakwaBhuzi,  owemizalwane yakwaRam; wavutha kuYobhi umsindo wakhe, ngenxa yokuzigwebela ngokwakhe kunoThixo.
18_32_3_Wavutha kubahlobo bakhe abathathu umsindo wakhe, ngenxa enokuba bengafumananga kumphendula, phofu bemgwebile uYobhi.
18_32_4_Ke kaloku uElihu ubesalindisile kuYobhi ngamazwi, ngokuba babebadala kunaye ngemihla.
18_32_5_Wabona uElihu, ukuba akukho mpendulo emlonyeni waloo madoda mathathu, wavutha ke umsindo wakhe.
18_32_6_Wasusela uElihu unyana kaBharakeli, wakwaBhuzi, wathi,  Ndimncinane mna ngemihla, Ke nina niziingwevu; Ngenxa yoko ndakhwelela phaya, ndoyika ukunityela ukwazi kwam.
18_32_7_Ndathi, Imihla mayithethe, Iminyaka emininzi yazise ubulumko.
18_32_8_Noko ngumoya osemntwini, Nokuphefumla kukaSomandla okubaqondisayo.
18_32_9_Ukulumka akunabakhulu, Ukuqonda okufaneleyo akunamadoda makhulu odwa.
18_32_10_Ngako oko ndithi, Phulaphula kum, Ndokutyela ukwazi kwam nam.
18_32_11_Yabonani, bendiwalindile amazwi enu, Ndakubekela indlebe ukuqonda kwenu, Nada nagocagoca ukuthetha.
18_32_12_Ndanigqala kakuhle; Yabonani, akukho namnye kuni umohlwayileyo uYobhi, Wawaphendula amazwi akhe.
18_32_13_Hleze nibe nithi, Sibufumene ubulumko; UThixo uyamphephetha, asingumntu.
18_32_14_Ke akakubhekisanga kum ukuthetha; Andiyi kumphendula ngamazwi enu.
18_32_15_Baqhiphuke umbilini, abasaphenduli; Baphelelwe kukuthetha.
18_32_16_Khe ndenze kuhle na, ngokuba bengathethi, Ngokuba bemi bengasaphenduli?
18_32_17_Ndiya kuphendula nam okwam, Ndixele ukwazi kwam nam.
18_32_18_Kuba ndizele kukuthetha; Undicuthile umoya wembilini yam.
18_32_19_Niyabona, imbilini yam injengewayini engavulelwanga;  Njengeentsuba ezintsha, iza kugqabhuka.
18_32_20_Ndiya kuthetha, ukuze ndiphefumle; Ndiya kuwuvula umlomo wam, ndiphendule.
18_32_21_Mandingakhe ndinonelele mntu; Ndingakhe nditeketise mntu.
18_32_22_Kuba andikwazi ukuteketisa; Ubeya kundisusa kalula uMenzi wam.
18_33_1_Kodwa khawukuve, Yobhi, ukuthetha kwam, Uwabekele indlebe amazwi am onke.
18_33_2_Khawubone, ndiwuvulile umlomo wam, Luyathetha ulwimi lwam ekhuhlangubeni lam.
18_33_3_Akukuthi tye kwentliziyo yam amazwi am; Ukwazi komlomo wam akuthetha kanyulu.
18_33_4_UMoya kaThixo wandenza, Nokuphefumla kukaSomandla kundidlise ubomi.
18_33_5_Ukuba unako, ndiphendule; Yakha uluhlu amazwi phambi kwam;  misa.
18_33_6_Uyabona, njengawe ndingokaThixo; Ndacatshulwa eludongweni nam.
18_33_7_Yabona, ukothusa kwam akuyi kukudandathekisa; Nokushicilela kwam akuyi kuba nzima phezu kwakho.
18_33_8_Okunene, uthethe ezindlebeni zam, Ndaliva ilizwi lokukhuluma, lisithi,
18_33_9_Ndiqaqambile, andinalukreqo; Ndiguxiwe, andinabugwenxa.
18_33_10_Yabona, ufuna izizekabani zokuthibana nam, Uthi ndilutshaba lwakhe.
18_33_11_Uzifaka iinyawo zam esitokisini, Uwulinga wonke umendo wam.
18_33_12_Yabona akulungisi ngaloo nto; ndokuphendula; Kuba uThixo yena mkhulu kunomntu.
18_33_13_Yini na ukuba ubambane naye, Kuba engaphenduli ngeendawo zakhe zonke?
18_33_14_Kanti, hayi, ngendlela enye uThixo uyathetha,  Nangezimbini, ke akukhathalwa.
18_33_15_Ephupheni, embonweni wasebusuku, Bakuwelwa bubuthongo obukhulu abantu, Ekozeleni elukhukweni;
18_33_16_Uzityhila oko iindlebe zabantu, Akutywine akuvingce ukuthethiswa kwabo,
18_33_17_Ukuze amthinte umntu ekwenzeni into, Agubungele uqhankqalazo lomfo;
18_33_18_Awunqande umphefumlo wakhe esihogweni, Nobomi bakhe bungagqitheli emkhontweni.
18_33_19_Wohlwaywa umntu ngumvandedwa esililini sakhe, Nayimfazwe esimakade emathanjeni akhe;
18_33_20_Ubomi bakhe bukwale ukudla, Nomphefumlo wakhe wale ukudla okunqwenelekayo.
18_33_21_Iyadleka inyama yakhe, ingabonakali, Avele amathambo akhe abengabonakali.
18_33_22_Uyasondela ke esihogweni umphefumlo wakhe, Nobomi bakhe kubabulali.
18_33_23_Ukuba ke kuthe kwakho isithunywa sezulu Esimlamlelayo,  noko sisinye ewakeni, Sokumxelela umntu okumfaneleyo:
18_33_24_Wombabala, athi, Mkhulule, angehli aye esihogweni, Kuba ndilufumene ucamagusho.
18_33_25_Isuka ibe nentlahla inyama yakhe; Ubuyela emihleni yobudodana bakhe;
18_33_26_Uthandaza kuThixo, akholiswe yena nguye; Abubone ubuso bakhe eduma; Yena ambuyekeze ke umntu ubulungisa bakhe.
18_33_27_Lo uvuma ebantwini, athi, Bendonile, ndakugwenxa okuthe tye, Akwalinganiselwa kum njengoko noko.
18_33_28_Uwukhulule umphefumlo wam, ukuba ungagqitheli esihogweni,  Nobomi bam bokubona ukukhanya.
18_33_29_Yabona, oko konke uyakwenza uThixo Izihlando ezibini nezithathu kumfo,
18_33_30_Ukuba abuyise umphefumlo wakhe esihogweni, Ukhanye ngokukhanya kobomi.
18_33_31_Baza indlebe, Yobhi, phulaphula kum; Yithi tu, ndithethe mna.
18_33_32_Ke ukuba unokuthetha, ndiphendule; Thetha, kuba ndifuna ukukugwebela.
18_33_33_Ukuba akukho, phulaphula kum wena; Yithi tu, ndikufundise ubulumko.
18_34_1_Wasusela uElihu, wathi,
18_34_2_Yivani, nina zilumko, ukuthetha kwam; Nina zazi,  ndibekeleni indlebe.
18_34_3_Ngokuba indlebe iyakucikida ukuthetha, Ikhuhlangubo liyakuva ukudla.
18_34_4_Masizinyulele okusesikweni, Sikwazi phakathi kwethu okulungileyo.
18_34_5_Ngokuba uthe uYobhi, Ndililungisa, UThixo ulisusile ibango lam.
18_34_6_Kuthiwa ndiyaxoka, noko likhoyo ibango lam; Liyabulala inxeba lam lotolo, noko ndingenalukreqo.
18_34_7_Uphi na umfo onjengoYobhi, Yena ukuselayo ukugcula njengamanzi?
18_34_8_Athelele kubenzi bobutshinga, Ahambe namadoda angendawo?
18_34_9_Kuba esithi, Akancedeki umfo Ngokukholana noThixo.
18_34_10_Ngako oko, nina madoda okuqonda, phulaphulani kum; Makube lee kuThixo ukuba ngongendawo; KuSomandla, ukuba abe nobugqwetha,
18_34_11_Ke ukwenza komntu ukubuyekeza kuye, Amfumanise umfo ngokwehambo yakhe.
18_34_12_Hayi bo! UThixo akenzi ngokungendawo, USomandla akakugwenxi okusesikweni.
18_34_13_Ngubani na omphathise ihlabathi? Ngubani na omise elimiweyo lonke?
18_34_14_Ukuba ubebhekise kuye ngokwakhe yedwa, Wawuhlanganisela kuye umoya wakhe, nokuphefumla kwakhe,
18_34_15_Ibiya kuphuma umphefumlo inyama yonke kunye, Umntu abuyele eluthulini.
18_34_16_Wanga ungakuqonda, ungakuva oku, Ulibekele indlebe izwi lokuthetha kwam!
18_34_17_Kanene, othiye okusesikweni ubengaphatha ngobukhosi, yini na? Khona uSobulungisa womgweba na?
18_34_18_Kungathiwa na kukumkani, Tshijolondini? Nakumanene,  Zintondini zingendawo?
18_34_19_Kangakanani na ke kongabanoneleliyo abathetheli,  Onganoneleli zinongonongo ngaphezu kwabasweleyo? Kuba bangumsebenzi wezandla zakhe bona bonke.
18_34_20_Bafa ngephanyazo, phakathi kobusuku; Bayahexiswa abantu,  badlule, Zisuswe iimbalasane kungengasandla.
18_34_21_Kuba amehlo akhe aphezu kweendlela zomntu, Uyawabona onke amabanga akhe.
18_34_22_Akukho bumnyama, akukho thunzi lakufa, Ukuba basithele kulo abenzi bobutshinga.
18_34_23_Ngokuba akazekeleli ukumngqinga umntu, Ukuze eze ematyaleni noThixo.
18_34_24_Uyabashwaqa abaziinyathi engagocagocanga, Amise ke abanye esikhundleni sabo.
18_34_25_Ngako oko uyazazi izenzo zabo, Ababhukuqe ebusuku,  batyumke.
18_34_26_Uyabamonxoza ngokwabangendawo Endaweni yababoneli.
18_34_27_Ekungenxa yokuze kubekho oko, le nto batyekayo ekumlandeleni, Abaziqiqa zonke iindlela zakhe;
18_34_28_Ukuze bakufikise kuye ukukhala kosweleyo, Akuve ukukhala kweentsizana.
18_34_29_Akuzolisa, ngubani na oya kuxhalisa? Akusithelisa ubuso,  ngubani na ongambonayo? Esenjenjalo, nokuba kungenxa yohlanga,  nokuba kungenxa yomntu emnye,
18_34_30_Ukuze angabi ngukumkani umntu oyintshembenxa, Angabi zizirhintyelo zabantu.
18_34_31_Ngokuba ubani angatsho na kuThixo ukuthi,  Ndiziphakamisile, andisayi kuba sona;
18_34_32_Endingakuboniyo, ndiyale ngako; Ukuba ndithe ndenza ngobugqwetha, andiyi kuphinda?
18_34_33_Uya kuphindezela ngokwakho na yena, ngokuba usolile wena?  Ukuba unyule wena, kunganyuli mna. Into oyaziyo yithethe.
18_34_34_Aya kuthi kum amadoda aziingqondi, Nomfo osisilumko ondiphulaphulayo,
18_34_35_UYobhi uthetha engenakwazi, Namazwi akhe akanangqiqo.
18_34_36_Tarhuni, makacikidwe uTobhi kuse ekupheleni, Ngenxa yokuphendula kwakhe ngokwamadoda anobutshinga.
18_34_37_Kuba elongeza ukreqo kwisono sakhe; Utyhwakraza izandla phakathi kwethu, Awenze maninzi amazwi akhe ngoThixo.
18_35_1_Wasusela uElihu, wathi,
18_35_2_Uba oku kusesikweni na, Ukuthi, ubulungisa bakho bungaphezu kobukaThixo;
18_35_3_Ukuba uthi nje, Bundinceda ntoni na, Bundinyusa ngantoni na phezu kokundinyusa kwesono sam?
18_35_4_Ndiya kukuphendula mna ngokuthetha, Nabahlobo bakho abanawe.
18_35_5_Bheka ezulwini ubone; Ukhangele isibhakabhaka, siphezulu kuwe.
18_35_6_Ukuba uthi wone, usebenza ntoni na ngakuye? Khona zakuba zininzi izikreqo zakho, umenze ntoni na?
18_35_7_Ukuba uthe walungisa wena, umpha ntoni na ngaloo nto?  Wamkela ntoni na yena esandleni sakho?
18_35_8_Kuyinto kwindoda enjengawe ukungabi ndawo kwakho; Buyinto kuwe, nyana womntu, ubulungisa bakho.
18_35_9_Ngenxa yobuninzi bokucudisa, bayakhala abantu; Bayazibika ngenxa yengalo yabakhulu.
18_35_10_Ke abatsho ukuthi, Uphi na uThixo uMenzi wam, Osinika ingoma ebusuku,
18_35_11_Osifundisa ngaphezu kweenkomo zehlabathi, Asiphe ubulumko ngaphezu kweentaka zezulu?
18_35_12_Bandula bakhale, angaphenduli, Ngenxa yekratshi labanobubi.
18_35_13_Hayi, yona into ekhohlakeleyo akayiva uThixo, USomandla akayikhathalele.
18_35_14_Noko utshoyo ukuthi akumkhathalele, Ityala liphambi kwakhe, lindela kuye ke!
18_35_15_Ke ngoko xa ungekaveleli umsindo wakhe, Akazani na kunene nesikhukhumali?
18_35_16_Ke uYobhi ufumana awuvule umlomo wakhe, Akwandise ukuthetha engenakwazi.
18_36_1_Waqokela uElihu, wathi,
18_36_2_Khawenze kuhle, ndikutyele; Kuba kusekho ukuthetha okusingisele kuThixo.
18_36_3_Ndiya kukuphakamisela entweni ekude ukwazi kwam, Ndimnike ubulungisa uMenzi wam.
18_36_4_Okwenene, akubuxoki ukuthetha kwam; Ogqibeleleyo ngokwazi uphambi kwakho.
18_36_5_Yabona, uThixo unamandla, akacekisi bani; Unamandla ngokuqina kwengqondo.
18_36_6_Akamlondolozeli ebomini ongendawo; Iintsizana uzinika ibango lazo.
18_36_7_Akawasusi amehlo akhe kwabangamalungisa; Ubahlalisa kunye nookumkani etroneni Ngonaphakade, baphakame ke.
18_36_8_Ukuba bakhonkxiwe ngemixokelelwane, Bebanjiwe ngezintya zeentsizi,
18_36_9_Ubaxelela izenzo zabo Nezikreqo zabo; ngokuba bezenza amagorha.
18_36_10_Uzityhilela intethiso iindlebe zabo; Uthi mababuye ebutshingeni.
18_36_11_Ukuba bathe beva, bamkhonza, Boyigqiba imihla yabo ekulungeni, Neminyaka yabo ebumnandini.
18_36_12_Ukuba bathe abeva, bogqithela emkhontweni, Baphume umphefumlo bengenakwazi.
18_36_13_Ke abaziintshembenxa ngentliziyo babamba umsindo;  Abazibiki xa abakhonkxayo;
18_36_14_Ufe ke ebuncinaneni umphefumlo wabo, Nobomi babo bube bobengawu kwindawo engcwele.
18_36_15_Uyamhlangula olusizana ngeentsizi zakhe, Ayityhile indlebe yakhe ngokuxinwa kwabo.
18_36_16_Nawe ubengakukhululayo yena emlonyeni wembandezelo, Akuse endaweni ebanzi, emzantsi ungacuthekileyo; Nokubekwa etafileni yakho kuzale kukutyeba.
18_36_17_Ke wena uzele kukugweba kwabangendawo; Ukugweba nokugwetywa kunako ukukubamba.
18_36_18_Kuba ubushushu mabungakuxhokonxeli ekutyhwakrazeni izandla, Nobukhulu bocamagusho mabungathi gu bucala.
18_36_19_Ukuzibika kwakho kokubeka ngaphandle kwembandezelo na,  Nemigushanxa yonke yamandla?
18_36_20_Musa ukuzonda ubusuku Bokususa izizwe esikhundleni sazo.
18_36_21_Lumka, ungaguqukeli konobutshinga; Kuba unyule loo nto kuneentsizi.
18_36_22_Yabona, uThixo uphakamise ukwenza ngamandla akhe; Ngubani na umyali onjengaye?
18_36_23_Ngubani na omphathise indlela yakhe; Ngubani na ongathi,  Wenze ngobugqwetha?
18_36_24_Khumbula ukuba uwukhulise ngendumiso umsebenzi wakhe,  Awuhlabele ingoma amadoda.
18_36_25_Bonke abantu bayawubona; Umntu uwukhangela emgama.
18_36_26_Yabona, uThixo mkhulu, asimazi; Inani leminyaka yakhe aligocagoceki.
18_36_27_Kuba utsalela phantsi amathontsi amanzi, Achaphaze eyimvula enkungwini yakhe,
18_36_28_Esiyinisayo isibhakabhaka, Ivuze phezu kwabantu abaninzi.
18_36_29_Kanene baya kuqonda na ukwanekwa kwamafu, Nokuzongoma komnquba wakhe?
18_36_30_Yabona, waneka phezu kwakhe ukukhanya kwakhe, Azigubungele ngamazantsi olwandle.
18_36_31_Kuba ngezo nto ugqweba izizwe, Unika ukudla ngento eninzi.
18_36_32_Izandla zozibini uzigubungela ngombane, Awuwisele umthetho ngokochanayo.
18_36_33_Ukugquma kwakhe kuyamxela, Kwaneenkomo, ukuba uza kunyuka.
18_37_1_Inene, ngale nto iyagubha intliziyo yam, Ixhume endaweni yayo.
18_37_2_Phulaphulani, phulaphulani ukuguguma kwelizwi lakhe,  Nokudumzela okuphumayo emlonyeni wakhe.
18_37_3_Ukusingisa ngaphantsi kwezulu lonke, Nombane wakhe uye emasondweni ehlabathi.
18_37_4_Emva kwawo kubhonga ilizwi; Ududuma ngezwi lobungangamsha bakhe; Akawulibazisi, xa livakalayo izwi lakhe.
18_37_5_UThixo ududuma ngezwi lakhe ngokubalulekileyo, Esenza izinto ezinkulu esingenakuzazi.
18_37_6_Kuba uthi kwikhephu, Yiwa uwele emhlabeni; Nakwisiphango semvula, Nakwisiphango seemvula ezinkulu zakhe.
18_37_7_Isandla soluntu lonke uyasitywina asivingcele, Ukuba babe nokwazi bonke abantu abenzileyo.
18_37_8_Amarhamncwa angena emlaleleni, Ahlale ezikhundleni zawo.
18_37_9_Engontsini yasentla kuvela isaqhwithi; Kumphephethi wasentla kuvela ukubanda.
18_37_10_Ngokuphefumla kukaThixo kuza umkhenkce, Ububanzi bamanzi bucutheke.
18_37_11_Kananjalo usindanisa ilifu ngamanzi amaninzi;  Uphangalalisa amafu akhe abanekayo.
18_37_12_Wona ajikajika ngeenxa zonke ngokwalathiswa nguye, Ukuze enze konke awawamisela khona Ebusweni behlabathi elimiweyo;
18_37_13_Nokuba kungenxa yokubetha, nokuba kungenxa yehlabathi lakhe, Nokuba kungenxa yenceba, uyawafikisa.
18_37_14_Oko kubekele indlebe, Yobhi; Yima, uyigqale imisebenzi ebalulekileyo kaThixo.
18_37_15_Uyazi na ukuwathwesa kukaThixo amafu akhe, Nokubengezelisa kwakhe ukubaneka kwawo?
18_37_16_Uyazi na ukulinganiselwa kwamafu, Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo yoSokwazi?
18_37_17_Wena ungubo zifudumeleyo, Lakuzola ilizwe lulophu lwasezantsi;
18_37_18_Usikhanda usolule naye na isibhakabhaka, Esiqinileyo njengesipili esityhidiweyo?
18_37_19_Sazise esingakuthethayo thina kuye; Asinakucacisa nto ngenxa yobumnyama.
18_37_20_Wobikelwa na ukuthi ndiyathetha? Umntu uthi makaginywe na?
18_37_21_Ke ngoku akubonwa kukhanya Kukhazimlayo,  kusesibhakabhakeni; Kudlula umoya, lise.
18_37_22_Entla kuziwa negolide; Phezu koThixo yindili eyoyikekayo.
18_37_23_USomandla asinakumfumana, mkhulu ngamandla; Akagwenxi siko nabuninzi bobulungisa.
18_37_24_Ngako oko bayamoyika abantu; Akabakhathalele bonke abalumke ngokwabo.
18_38_1_Waza uYehova wamphendula uYobhi, esemoyeni ovuthuzayo,  wathi,
18_38_2_Ngubani na lo usitha icebo Ngokuthetha okungenakwazi?
18_38_3_Khawuwabhinqise njengomfo amanqe akho, Ndikubuze, undazise.
18_38_4_Ubuphi na wena ukuseka kwam ihlabathi? Xela, ukuba uyazi,  uyaqonda.
18_38_5_Ngubani na omise imilinganiso yalo, ukuba uyazi? Ngubani na ololulele ulutya lokulinganisa?
18_38_6_Zifakwe ntwenini na izikhondo zeentsika zalo? Ngubani na owabeka ilitye lalo lembombo,
18_38_7_Ekumemeleleni kunye kwamakhwezi okusa, Beduma bonke oonyana bakaThixo?
18_38_8_Ngubani na owaluvingcelayo ulwandle ngeengcango Ekutyhobozeni kwalo, luphuma esizalweni;
18_38_9_Ekulwambathiseni kwam ngamafu, Ekulusongeleni ngesithokothoko;
18_38_10_Ndakulusikelela umda wam, Ndakumisa imivalo neengcango;
18_38_11_Ndathi, Fika apha, ungegqithi; Eme apha amaza akho akratshayo?
18_38_12_Ngemihla yakho wakha wayiwisela umthetho na intsasa,  Wasazisa isifingo indawo yaso;
18_38_13_Ukuba sibambe amasondo ehlabathi, Bavuthululwe kulo abangendawo?
18_38_14_Liguquka njengodongwe lomsesane wokutywina, Zizimise ngokwazo izinto njengasesambathweni;
18_38_15_Abangendawo bavinjwe ukukhanya kwabo, Nengalo ephakamileyo yaphulwe.
18_38_16_Uye wafika na emithonjeni yolwandle? Wahambahamba ezingontsingontsini zenzonzobila?
18_38_17_Uwatyhilelwe na amasango okufa? Namasango ethunzi lokufa wawabona?
18_38_18_Ubugqalile na ububanzi behlabathi? Xela, ukuba uyakwazi oko konke.
18_38_19_Iphi na indlela esa ekhayeni lokukhanya, Nobumnyama iphi na indawo yabo,
18_38_20_Ukuba ubuse emdeni wabo, Ukuba uqonde iindlela zendlu yabo?
18_38_21_Uyazi kambe, ngokuba wawusewuzelwe oko Lilikhulu nenani lemihla yakho!
18_38_22_Ufikelele na ebuncwaneni bekhephu? Ubuncwane besichotho wabubona,
18_38_23_Endabuqwebela ixesha lembandezelo, Imini yokudibana nemfazwe?
18_38_24_Iphi na indlela yalapho kwabiwa khona ukukhanya? Yalapho luphangalaliswa khona ulophu lwasempumalanga ehlabathini?
18_38_25_Ngubani na ogqobhozela isiphango umjelo, Ogqobhozela umbane weendudumo indlela;
18_38_26_Ukuba ine ezweni elingenamntu, Entlango, apho kungekho mntu;
18_38_27_Ihluthise intshabalala yakwantshabalala, Intshulise uhlaza oluphumayo?
18_38_28_Inoyise na imvula? Ngubani na ozala amathontsi ombethe?
18_38_29_Uphuma umkhenkce esizalweni sikabani na? Neqabaka yasezulwini izalwa ngubani na?
18_38_30_Amanzi ayaqina njengelitye, Nobuso bamanzi anzongonzongo bubambene.
18_38_31_Unokuwabopha na amaqhina esiLimela, Uzicombulule izintya zamaKroza?
18_38_32_Unokuyivelisa na imilindo yeenyanga ngexesha layo,  Uzalathise iinkwenkwezi zeBhere nabantwana bayo?
18_38_33_Uyayazi na imimiselo yezulu? Umise ulawulo lwalo ehlabathini?
18_38_34_Unokuliphakamisela emafini na izwi lakho, Ukuze ubuninzi bamanzi bukugubungele?
18_38_35_Unokuyithuma na imibane, ihambe ithi kuwe, Sikho?
18_38_36_Ngubani na omise ubulumko ezintsweni? Ngubani na onike imboniseli ingqondo?
18_38_37_Ngubani na obala iingqimba zamafu ngobulumko? Ngubani na othulula iintsuba zezulu.
18_38_38_Emelelweni wothuli, lube lutyhido, Amagada anamathelane?
18_38_39_Ingonyamakazi unokuyizingelela inyamakazi na, Uzalise iphango leengonyama ezintsha,
18_38_40_Xa zincathamayo ezikhundleni zazo, Zihlale ezindadeni,  zilalele?
18_38_41_Ngubani na olungisela ihlungulu umfunzelo walo, Xa amathole alo azibika kuThixo, Ebhadu-bhadula, engenakudla?
18_39_1_Uyalazi na ixesha lokuzala kwamagogo asemaweni, Ugqale ukuzuza kwamaxhamakazi?
18_39_2_Uyazibala na iinyanga azizalisayo, Ulazi na ixesha lokuzala kwawo?
18_39_3_Uyaguqa, azale, Akhuphe inkonyana.
18_39_4_Ayomelela amankonyana awo, akhula emathafeni, Aphuma,  angabi sabuya.
18_39_5_Ngubani na olindululeyo iesile lasendle likhululekile?  Iimbophelelo ze-esile elindwebileyo, ngubani na ozithukululeyo,
18_39_6_Endilimisele inkqantosi ukuba ibe yindlu yalo, Neendawo ezinetyuwa zibe likhaya lalo?
18_39_7_Liyayihleka ingxokolo yomzi, Aliyiva ingxolo yomqhubi.
18_39_8_Umfuno weentaba bubutyani balo, Lilanda lonke uhlaza.
18_39_9_Yovuma na inqu ukukukhonza, Ilale esitalini sakho?
18_39_10_Unokuyibopha na inqu emqeleni ngomqokozo wayo, Iqwakanise iintili ikulandela?
18_39_11_Wokholosa na ngayo, ngokuba emakhulu amandla ayo, Ukushiye nayo ukuxelenga kwakho?
18_39_12_Unokukholwa na kuyo, ukuba yoyigodusa imbewu yakho,  Ibuthele esandeni sakho?
18_39_13_Iphiko lencinibakazi liyaphapha: Lunenceba yengwamza na ke usiba lwayo, noboya bayo?
18_39_14_Hayi bo! Iwashiya emhlabeni amaqanda ayo, Ifukamele eluthulini;
18_39_15_Ilibale ukuba unyawo lowatyumza, Nerhamncwa lasendle lowanyathela.
18_39_16_Iyawabukula amathole ayo ngathi asingawayo, Kuphalale ukuxelenga kwayo, ingaxhali.
18_39_17_Ngokuba uThixo wenze yabulibala ubulumko, Akayabela ingqondo.
18_39_18_Xesha limbi izibetha iphakame, Ilihleke ihashe nomkhweli walo.
18_39_19_Linikwa nguwe na ihashe ubukroti? Uyambathise intamo yalo ngobuyakayaka?
18_39_20_Nguwe na oliqakathisa njengenkumbi? Isandi somfutho walo siyothusa.
18_39_21_Liyagquba entilini ngamanqina, lenze amagqasi ngamandla;  Liphuma likhawulele umkhosi onesikrweqe.
18_39_22_Liyakuhleka ukunkwantya; aliqhiphuki mbilini; Alijiki phambi kwekrele.
18_39_23_Urhashaza phezu kwalo umphongolo, Nentshuntshe ebengezelayo, nenkcula.
18_39_24_Ngentshakavu nangengcwangu liginya ilizwe; Alimi kwakuvuthelwa isigodlo.
18_39_25_Okuvuthela sivuthelwayo isigodlo, lisuka ngathi lithi,  Ngxatsho ke! Lisezela imfazwe kwakude, Nokududuma kwabathetheli, nokufunza.
18_39_26_Intambanane iphaphazela ngengqondo yakho na, Yolule amaphiko ayo, ibheke ezantsi?
18_39_27_Kungomthetho wakho na, ukuba ixhalanga linyuke,  Liyiphakamise indlu yalo,
18_39_28_Lihlale engxondorheni, lilale Etsolweni lengxondorha,  nasemboniselweni?
18_39_29_Lilapho lihlola ukudla; Amehlo alo ondele kude.
18_39_30_Amathole alo afunxa igazi; Nalapho bakhona abangxwelerhiweyo, likhona nalo.
18_40_1_UYehova wamphendula uYobhi, wathi,
18_40_2_Wobambana noSomandla na ke umthethiswa? Umohlwayi kaThixo makakuphendule oko.
18_40_3_UYobhi wamphendula uYehova, wathi,
18_40_4_Yabona, ndiphantsi. Ndothini na ukuphendula? Ndibeka isandla sam emlonyeni wam.
18_40_5_Ndithethile kwakanye, andiyi kuphinda ndiphendule;  Ndithethile kwakabini, andiyi kuphinda ndibuye ndiqhube.
18_40_6_UYehova wamphendula uYobhi, esemoyeni ovuthuzayo, wathi,
18_40_7_Khawuzibhinqise amanqe akho njengomfo; Ndiya kukubuza,  undazise.
18_40_8_Kanene uya kwaphula nogwebo lwam na, Undigwebe, ukuze ube lilungisa?
18_40_9_Unengalo enjengekaThixo na, Ududume ngezwi njengaye?
18_40_10_Khawuzihombise ke ngobungangamsha nokuphakama kwakho,  Wambathe indili nobungangamela.
18_40_11_Makuphalale ukuphuphuma komsindo wakho, Ulibone lonke ikratshi, uligungxule.
18_40_12_Libone lonke ikratshi, ulithobe, Ubangqule abangendawo ezindaweni zabo.
18_40_13_Baqhusheke eluthulini kunye, Ububophe ubuso babo emfihlekweni.
18_40_14_Nam ndokudumisa, Ukuba sikusindisile isandla sakho sokunene.
18_40_15_Khawuyibone imvubu endayenza yanawe: Idla utyani njengenkomo.
18_40_16_Khawubone, amandla ayo asemanqeni ayo, Nokuqina kwayo kusezinyameni zesisu sayo.
18_40_17_Igoba umsila wayo njengomsedare, Imisipha yamathanga ayo ibhijelene.
18_40_18_Amathambo ayo anjengemibholompo yobhedu, Amathambo ayo anjengemivalo yesinyithi.
18_40_19_Iyintlahlela yeendlela zikaThixo; UMenzi wayo wayinika ikrele layo.
18_40_20_Ngokuba iintaba ziyithwalela ukudla, Onke amarhamncwa asendle adlala khona.
18_40_21_Ibutha phantsi kwemitholo, Engcotyeni yeengcongolo nomgxobhozo.
18_40_22_Imitholo iyigubungela ngomthunzi wayo; Imingculuba yesihlambo iyayijikeleza.
18_40_23_Yabona, uhamba phandle umlambo, ayiphakuzeli; Ikholosile,  xa kutyhobozela neYordan emlonyeni wayo.
18_40_24_Inokubanjwa na, inamehlo nje, Igqojozwe impumlo ngentsimbi yokuthiyela?
18_41_1_Unokuyirhola na ingwenya ngegwegwe, Ulutshonise elutyeni ulwimi lwayo?
18_41_2_Unokuyifaka intambo yomzi empumlweni yayo na, Ugqobhoze izidlele zayo ngentola?
18_41_3_Ingatarhuzisa kunene na kuwe, Ithethe amazwi athambileyo kuwe?
18_41_4_Ingenza umnqophiso na nawe, Wokuba uyithabathe ibe ngumkhonzi waphakade?
18_41_5_Ungadlala na nayo njengentaka, Uyikhulekele amantombazana akho?
18_41_6_Angarhweba ngayo na amahlulelana abambisayo, Ayabe phakathi kwabarhwebi?
18_41_7_Unokusizalisa na isikhumba sayo ngeenyembe, Nentloko yayo ngezikhali zeentlanzi?
18_41_8_Beka isandla sakho kuyo; Khumbula imfazwe, ungaphindi.
18_41_9_Yabona, ukulinda kobambisayo ngamanga; Inene, uqethuka kwaesayibona.
18_41_10_Akukho sijorha sokuyixhokonxa; Ngubani na ke ongazimisa phambi kwam?
18_41_11_Ngubani na ondiphangeleyo, wandinika ukuba ndibuyekeze?  Okuphantsi kwamazulu onke kokwam.
18_41_12_Andiyi kuthi tu ngamalungu ayo, Neendawo zobugorha bayo,  nezimbo zezintlu zayo.
18_41_13_Ngubani na onokuwutyhila umphambili wesambatho sayo?  Ezintlwini ezimbini zemihlathi yayo, ngubani na onokuya?
18_41_14_Iingcango zobuso bayo, ngubani na onokuzivula? Ngeenxa zonke emazinyweni ayo sisothuso.
18_41_15_Iliqhayiya imiqela yeengweletshetshe zayo, Zivalwe ngetywina eliqinileyo.
18_41_16_Zisondelene enye nenye, Akungeni moya phakathi kwazo.
18_41_17_Zinamathelene enye kwenye, Zibambene, zingabi nakwahlukana.
18_41_18_Ukuthimla kwayo kukhupha imitha, Namehlo ayo anjengeenkophe zesifingo.
18_41_19_Emlonyeni wayo kuphuma izikhuni zomlilo ezitshangazayo,  Kuthaphuke iintlantsi zomlilo.
18_41_20_Emathatheni ayo kuphuma umsi, Njengowongxawu okhwezelwa ngemizi.
18_41_21_Umphefumlo wayo uvuthisa amalahle, Kuphuma amalangatye emlonyeni wayo.
18_41_22_Entanyeni yayo kuphuma amandla, Ebusweni bayo kuxhina ukuncama.
18_41_23_Imihlubulo yenyama yayo inamathelene, Iqinile kuyo,  ayishukumi.
18_41_24_Intliziyo yayo iqine njengelitye, Iqine njengelokusila langaphantsi.
18_41_25_Ekuphakameni kwayo, ziyanxunguphala iinjengele, Zithi makatha ngokuqhiphuka umbilini.
18_41_26_Lifike kuyo ikrele, alimi; Nantshuntshe, namkhonto,  nankonjane.
18_41_27_Ithi singumququ isinyithi, Livithi ubhedu.
18_41_28_Utolo lwesaphetha aluyibalekisi; Ajika abe ngumququ amatye okusawula kuyo.
18_41_29_Ithi imivinqi ziindiza, Ikuhleke ukutyityimba kwenkcula.
18_41_30_Ngaphantsi kwayo ziinkamba ezitsolo; Yaneka impahla yokusizila eludakeni.
18_41_31_Iyibiliza inzulu njengembiza, Ulwandle ilwenza njengehlala loqholo.
18_41_32_Emva kwayo kukhanya indlela; Anga amanzi anzongonzongo zizimvi.
18_41_33_Ehlabathini akukho nto ifana nayo, Le yenziwayo ayaba nakuqhiphuka umbilini.
18_41_34_Ibona konke okuphakamileyo; Ingukumkani yona kwizilo zonke ezinyalasayo.
18_42_1_UYobhi wamphendula uYehova, wathi,
18_42_2_Ndiyazi ukuba unako ukufeza konke, Akunqatyelwa nto uyicingileyo.
18_42_3_Ngubani na lo usithe icebo engenakwazi? Ngoko ke ndithethe ndingaziqondi Izinto ezibalulekileyo kum, ndingazazi.
18_42_4_Khawuphulaphule, ndithethe mna; Ndiya kubuza kuwe,  undazise.
18_42_5_Bendikuva ukukuva ngendlebe, Kungoku iliso lam likubonile.
18_42_6_Ngenxa yoko ndiyazicekisa, ndizohlwaye, Ndiseluthulini naseluthuthwini.
18_42_7_Ke kaloku kwathi, emva kokuba uYehova ewathethile la mazwi kuYobhi, wathi uYehova kuElifazi wakwaTeman, Umsindo wam uyavutha kuwe, nakubamelwane bakho bobabini; kuba anithethanga nto iyiyo ngam, njengomkhonzi wam uYobhi.
18_42_8_Ngoku ke zithabatheleni iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo zibe sixhenxe, neenkunzi zeegusha zibe sixhenxe, niye kumkhonzi wam uYobhi, nizinyusele idini elinyukayo, uYobhi umkhonzi wam anithandazele. Ndomnonelela yena yedwa, ukuze ndingenzi kuni ngokobudenge benu; kuba ningathethanga nto iyiyo ngam,  njengomkhonzi wam uYobhi.
18_42_9_Baya ke ooElifazi wakwaTeman, noBhiledadi wakwaShuwa,  noTsofare waseNahama, benza njengoko wakuthethayo kubo uYehova.  Waza uYehova wamnonelela ke uYobhi.
18_42_10_UYehova wakubuyisa ukuthinjwa kukaYobhi, akubon ukuba ubathandazele oowabo. Wakongeza uYehova konke awayenako uYobhi,  kwada kwaphindwa kabini.
18_42_11_Beza kuye bonke abazalwana bakhe, noodade babo bonke, nabo bonke ababesazana naye ngenxa engaphambili, badla naye ukutya endlwini yakhe, bamkhuza, bamthuthuzela ngenxa yobubi bonke,  abemfikisele bona uYehova; bamnika elowo ikhulu lemali, elowo ijikazi legolide.
18_42_12_UYehova wakusikelela ukuphela kukaYobhi ngaphezu kokuqala kwakhe; waba neshumi elinesine lamawaka empahla emfutshane,  nesithandathu samawaka eenkamela, newaka lezibini zeenkomo,  newaka leemazi zamaesile.
18_42_13_Waba noonyana abasixhenxe, neentombi ezintathu. Igama leyokuqala kwathiwa nguJemima,
18_42_14_igama leyesibini nguKetsiya, igama leyesithathu nguKeren-hapuki.
18_42_15_Akwafumaneka mankazana mahle njengeentombi zikaYobhi ezweni lonke. Uyise wazinika amafa phakathi kwabanakwazo.
18_42_16_Emveni koko, uYobhi wadla ubomi iminyaka elikhulu elinamanci mane, wabona oonyana bakhe, noonyana boonyana bakhe,  izizukulwana zazine.
18_42_17_Wafa ke uYehobi, eyindoda enkulu, ephelele ebudaleni.
19_1_1_Hayi, uyolo lomntu ongahambiyo ngecebo labangendawo,  Ongemiyo endleleni yaboni, Ongahlaliyo embuthweni yabagxeki!
19_1_2_Yena unonelela umyalelo kaYehova; Ucamanga ngomyalelo wakhe imini nobusuku:
19_1_3_Unjengomthi omiliselwe phezu kwemijelo yamanzi, Onika isiqhamo sawo ngexesha lawo, Ogqabi lawo lingabuniyo; Konke akwenzayo kophumelela.
19_1_4_Abanjalo abangendawo; Bona banjengomququ ophetshethwa ngumoya.
19_1_5_Ngenxa yoko abangendawo abanakuma emgwebeni, Naboni ebandleni lamalungisa.
19_1_6_Ngokuba uYehova uyayazi indlela yamalungisa; Ke yona indlela yabangendawo iya kudaka.
19_2_1_Yini na ukuba iintlanga zenze imbuthumbuthu, Izizwe zicamange into engeyakonto?
19_2_2_Ookumkani behlabathi bazimisile, Izidwangube zabhunga NgoYehova nangoMthanjiswa wakhe;
19_2_3_Besithi, Masiziqhawule iimbophelelo zabo, Sizilahle izintya zabo kuthi.
19_2_4_Ohleli emazulwini uyahleka, INkosi iyabagculela.
19_2_5_Iya kwandula ithethe kubo ngomsindo wayo, Ibakhwankqise ngokuvutha kwayo.
19_2_6_Ithi, Mna ke ndimmisile ukumkani wam Phezu kweZiyon, intaba yam engcwele.
19_2_7_Athi yena, Ndiya kuwuvakalisa ummiselo: UYehova uthe kum,  UnguNyana wam wena; Mna namhla ndikuzele.
19_2_8_Cela kum, ndikunike iintlanga zibe lilifa lakho, Iziphelo zehlabathi zibe zezakho.
19_2_9_Uya kuzivikiva ngentonga yentsimbi, Uzihlekeze, zinge zizitya zodongwe.
19_2_10_Ngoko ke, nina bokumkani, qiqani; Bagwebi basehlabathini,  yalekani.
19_2_11_Mkhonzeni uYehova nisoyika, Gcobani nithuthumela.
19_2_12_Mangeni uNyana, hleze aqumbe, nitshabalale endleleni,  Ngokuba ungahle uvuthe umsindo wakhe. Hayi, uyolo lwabo bonke abazimela ngaye!
19_3_1_Umhobe kaDavide, ekubalekeni kwakhe kuAbhisalom unyana wakhe. Yehova, hayi, ukuba baninzi kwabandibandezelayo!  Baninzi abasukela phezulu kum.
19_3_2_Baninzi abathi kumphefumlo wam, Akunalusindiso kuThixo.  (Phakamisani.)
19_3_3_Ke wena, Yehova, uyingweletshetshe kum, Uluzuko lwam,  umphakamisi wentloko yam.
19_3_4_Ndidanduluka kuYehova ngezwi lam, Andiphendule entabeni yakhe engcwele. (Phakamisani.)
19_3_5_Ndalala phantsi, ndalala ubuthongo; Ndavuka, ngokuba uYehova endixhasa.
19_3_6_Andizoyiki izigidi zabantu Abakhe uluhlu lokulwa ngeenxa zonke kum.
19_3_7_Khawusuk ume, Yehova; ndisindise, Thixo wam; Ngokuba uzibetha zonke iintshaba zam emhlathini; Amazinyo abangendawo uyawaphula.
19_3_8_Usindiso lolukaYehova: Mayibe phezu kwabantu bakho intsikelelo yakho. (Phakamisani.)
19_4_1_Kumongameli wokubethelwa izinto ezineentambo. Umhobe kaDavide. Ekudandulukeni kwam ndiphendule, Thixo wobulungisa bam; Embandezelweni yam wandenzela indawo ebanzi; Ndibabale,  uwuve umthandazo wam.
19_4_2_Nina, nyana babantu, kunini na uzuko lwam niluhlazisa,  Ningxamele into engeyakonto, nithanda amanga? (Phakamisani.)
19_4_3_Yazini ke ukuba uYehova uzibalulele owenceba; UYehova uyaphulaphula ndakudanduluka kuye.
19_4_4_Qumbani, ningoni; Thethani neentliziyo zenu ezinkukweni zenu, nithi cwaka. (Phakamisani.)
19_4_5_Bingelelani imibingelelo yobulungisa, Nikholose ngoYehova.
19_4_6_Baninzi abathi, Ngubani na owosibonisa okulungileyo?  Siphakamisele ukukhanya kobuso bakho, Yehova.
19_4_7_Uyivuyisile intliziyo yam, Kunexesha lobuninzi bengqolowa yabo, newayini yabo entsha.
19_4_8_Ndiya kulala phantsi, ndilale ubuthongo kwangoku, ndixolile,  Ngokuba wena, Yehova, undihlalisa ndikholosile, noko ndindedwa.
19_5_1_Kumongameli: ngogwali. Umhobe kaDavide. Wabekele indlebe amazwi am, Yehova, Kuqonde ukucamanga kwam.
19_5_2_Libazele indlebe izwi lokuzibika kwam, Kumkani wam, Thixo wam; Ngokuba ndithandaza kuwe.
19_5_3_Yehova, uya kuliva izwi lam kwakusasa, Kwakusasa ndiya kuwusingisa kuwe umthandazo wam, ndibonisele.
19_5_4_Ngokuba wena akunguThixo onanze okungendawo,  Akanakuphambukela kuwe onobubi.
19_5_5_Abanakuma abaqhayisi phambi kwamehlo akho; Uyabathiya bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.
19_5_6_Uyabatshabalalisa abathetha amanga; Indoda enegazi nenkohliso ilisikizi kuYehova.
19_5_7_Ke mna, ndinokungena endlwini yakho ngenceba yakho eninzi,  Ndiqubude, ndibhekise etempileni yakho engcwele ngokukoyika.
19_5_8_Yehova, ndikhaphe ngobulungisa bakho ngenxa yabandilaleleyo;  Yilungelelanise indlela yakho phambi kwam.
19_5_9_Ngokuba emlonyeni wabo akukho nto imiyo, Umbilini wabo ngumeyeliselo; Lingcwaba elivuliweyo umqala wabo; Bathetha okugudileyo ngolwimi lwabo.
19_5_10_Bathwalise ityala, Thixo; Makatshitshe amaqhinga abo;  Elukreqweni lwabo oluninzi batyhale, Ngokuba bakuphikisile.
19_5_11_Mabavuye bonke abazimela ngawe, Bamemelele ngonaphakade,  ubakhusele; Badlamke ngawe abalithandayo igama lakho.
19_5_12_Ngokuba wena uyalisikelela ilungisa, Yehova,  Ulihlanganisele ngenkoliseko njengekhaka.
19_6_1_Kumongameli wokubethelwa izinto ezineentambo: ngelamadoda ilizwi. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, musa ukundohlwaya unomsindo,  Ungandithethisi unobushushu.
19_6_2_Ndibabale, Yehova, ngokuba ndintshwenyile; Ndiphilise,  Yehova, ngokuba ekhwankqisiwe amathambo am.
19_6_3_Umphefumlo wam ukhwankqiswe kakhulu; Ke wena, Yehova, koda kube nini na?
19_6_4_Buya, Yehova, uwuhlangule umphefumlo wam; Ndisindise ngenxa yenceba yakho.
19_6_5_Ngokuba ekufeni akusekho kukukhumbula; Kwelabafileyo ngubani na osenokubulela kuwe?
19_6_6_Ndidiniwe kukugcuma kwam; Ndiludadisa ubusuku bonke ukhuko lwam, Ndiwenza manzi umandlalo wam ngeenyembezi zam.
19_6_7_Lonakele kukukhathazeka iliso lam; Laluphele ngenxa yababandezeli bam bonke.
19_6_8_Sukani kum, nina nonke basebenzi bobutshinga; Ngokuba uYehova ulivile ilizwi lokulila kwam.
19_6_9_Ukuvile uYehova ukutarhuzisa kwam; UYehova umthandazo wam uyawamkela.
19_6_10_Ziya kudana, zikhwankqe kakhulu, zonke iintshaba zam; Ziya kubuyiswa zidanile ngephanyazo.
19_7_1_Ishigayon kaDavide, awayivumayo kuYehova ngenxa yamazwi kaKushi, umBhenjamin. Yehova, Thixo wam, ndizimela ngawe;  Ndisindise kubo bonke abandisukelayo, undihlangule,
19_7_2_Hleze bawuqwenge njengengonyama umphefumlo wam, Bawudlavule,  kungekho mhlanguli.
19_7_3_Yehova, Thixo wam, ukuba ndithe ndenza oku, Ukuba kukho ubugqwetha ezandleni zam,
19_7_4_Ukuba ndimphethe kakubi obexolelene nam, Ndambhunyula ondibandezele kungekho sizathu:
19_7_5_Maluwusukele utshaba umphefumlo wam, luwufumane,  Lubunyashele phantsi ubomi bam, Uzuko lwam lululalise eluthulini. (Phakamisani.)
19_7_6_Khawusuk ume, Yehova, unomsindo, Kuphakamele ukuphuphuma komsindo wabandibandezelayo; Uvuke, undikhawulele; wena umise umgwebo.
19_7_7_Ibandla lezizwe malikungqonge; Ubuyele phezulu phezu kwalo.
19_7_8_UYehova uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe. Lithethe ityala lam,  Yehova, ngobulungisa bam, nangokugqibelela kwam okukum.
19_7_9_Mabuphele ububi babangendawo, ulizimase ilungisa;  Ungumcikidi weentliziyo nezintso, Thixo wobulungisa.
19_7_10_Ingweletshetshe yam inoThixo, Umsindisi wabantliziyo zithe tye.
19_7_11_UThixo ngumgwebi olilungisa; UnguThixo obhavuma yonke imihla.
19_7_12_Ukuba ongendawo uthe akabuya, ulilolile ikrele lakhe;  Usityedile isaphetha sakhe, wasilungisa.
19_7_13_Uzibhekise kuye izixhobo zokufa, Uzenze zanomlilo iintolo zakhe.
19_7_14_Yabona, yena unenimba yobutshinga; Ukhawule ububi, wazala ubuxoki;
19_7_15_Umbe umhadi, wawugomba; Weyela esihogweni awasisebenzayo.
19_7_16_Ububi bakhe bobuyela entlokweni yakhe, Naselukakayini lwakhe kufike ukugonyamela kwakhe.
19_7_17_Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngokobulungisa bakhe, Ndivume ngendumiso kwigama likaYehova ophezu konke.
19_8_1_Kumongameli: ngolwaseGati. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, Nkosi yethu, Hayi, ubungangamsha begama lakho ehlabathini lonke! Wena uwambathise amazulu ngendili yakho.
19_8_2_Emlonyeni wabantwana nabanyayo useke amandla, Ngenxa yababandezeli bakho, Ukuze udambise utshaba nophindezelayo.
19_8_3_Xa ndilikhangelayo izulu lakho, umsebenzi weminwe yakho,  Inyanga neenkwenkwezi ozimisileyo:
19_8_4_Uyintoni na umntu lo, le nto umkhumbulelayo? Unyana womntu,  le nto umvelelayo?
19_8_5_Umsilelise kancinane ebuThixweni, Wamthi jize ngobuqaqawuli nangobungangamela.
19_8_6_Umphathise ubukhosi phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho, Zonke izinto uzibeke phantsi kweenyawo zakhe:
19_8_7_Impahla emfutshane, neenkomo zonke ziphelele,  Kwaneenyamakazi zonke;
19_8_8_Iintaka zezulu, neentlanzi zolwandle, Into ehamba ngeendlela zolwandle.
19_8_9_Yehova, Nkosi yethu, Hayi, ubungangamsha begama lakho ehlabathini lonke!
19_9_1_Kumongameli: ngemute-labhen, Umhobe kaDavide. Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngentliziyo yam yonke; Ndiya kuyibalisa yonke imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.
19_9_2_Ndiya kuvuya ndidlamke ngawe; Ndiya kulibethela uhadi igama lakho, Wena usenyangweni.
19_9_3_Ekubuyeni kweentshaba zam umva, Ziyawa, zibhubhe ebusweni bakho.
19_9_4_Ngokuba ulifezile ityala lam nebango lam: Uhleli etroneni ungumgwebi olilungisa.
19_9_5_Uzikhalimele iintlanga, wabatshabalalisa abangendawo; Igama lazo ulicimile ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_9_6_Iintshaba zona zigqibele, yangamanxuwa kwaphela; Imizi uyinyothule, Yadaka inkumbulo yayo yona.
19_9_7_Ke yena uYehova uhleli ngonaphakade, Uyizinzisele ugwebo itrone yakhe.
19_9_8_Uya kugweba yena kwelimiweyo ngobulungisa, Agwebe phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye.
19_9_9_UYehova makabe yingxonde kotyunyuziweyo, Ingxonde ngamaxesha engxingongo;
19_9_10_Bakholose ngawe abalaziyo igama lakho; Ngokuba akubashiyanga abakuquqelayo wena, Yehova.
19_9_11_Vumani ngendumiso kuYehova ohlala eZiyon; Xelani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezincamisileyo;
19_9_12_Ukuba umphindezeli wamagazi ubakhumbule, Akakulibalanga ukukhala kwabalulamileyo.
19_9_13_Ndibabale, Yehova; Zibone iintsizi zam ezikhoyo ngabandithiyayo, Mphakamisi wam emasangweni okufa;
19_9_14_Ukuze ndibalise yonke indumiso yakho, Emasangweni entombi uZiyon, Ndigcobe ngosindiso lwakho.
19_9_15_Iintlanga zitshone esihogweni ezasenzayo, Emnatheni ezawugqumelayo kubanjiswe kwaolwazo unyawo.
19_9_16_Uzazisile uYehova; wenza umgwebo, Emthiyela ngomsebenzi wezandla zakhe ongendawo. (Bethani uhadi ngofefe. Phakamisani.)
19_9_17_Baya kubuyela kwelabafileyo abangendawo, Kwaiintlanga zonke ezimlibalayo uThixo;
19_9_18_Ngokuba aliyi kuhlala lilityalwa ihlwempu, Ithemba leentsizana aliyi kudaka ngonaphakade.
19_9_19_Khawusuk ume, Yehova; malungangcwangushi uluntu,  Mazigwetywe iintlanga phambi kwakho,
19_9_20_Zimisele ukoyika, Yehova, Zazi iintlanga ukuba ziluluntu kuphela. (Phakamisani.)
19_10_1_Yini na ukuba umele mgama, Yehova, Uzifihle ngamaxesha engxingongo?
19_10_2_Ngokukratsha kwabangendawo bayatsha abaziintsizana;  Babanjiswa ngamayelenqe abawacingileyo.
19_10_3_Ngokuba ongendawo uyaqhayisa ngeminqweno yomphefumlo wakhe.  Nolibawa wahlukene noYehova, wamgiba.
19_10_4_Ongendawo ngobuchi bakhe uthi, Akasayi kubuza. Yonke iminkqangiyelo yakhe ithi, Akukho Thixo.
19_10_5_Ziqinile iindlela zakhe ngamaxesha onke; Ziphakamile izigwebo zakho, zikude kuye; Bonke ababandezeli bakhe uyabafuthela.
19_10_6_Uthi entliziyweni yakhe, Andisayi kushukunyiswa;  Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana, ndingongayi kuba sebubini.
19_10_7_Umlomo wakhe uzele kukushwabula nokukhohlisa nokuxinezela.  Ngaphantsi kolwimi lwakhe bububi nobutshinga.
19_10_8_Uhlala emilaleleni yeengqili, Agwinte omsulwa entsithelweni; Amehlo akhe azonda oludwayi.
19_10_9_Ulalela entsithelweni njengengonyama eludadeni wayo;  Ulalela ukuba axwile emke nosizana; Uxwila emke nolusizana,  elutsala ngomnatha wakhe.
19_10_10_Uyabuthuma, uyabunguzela, Bawele ezinzitsheni zakhe abaziindwayi.
19_10_11_Uthi entliziyweni yakhe, UThixo ulibele, Ubusithelisile ubuso bakhe, akabonanga nento.
19_10_12_Khawusuk ume, Yehova, phakamisa isandla sakho, Thixo.  Musa ukubalibala abalulamileyo.
19_10_13_Kungenxa yani na ukuba ongendawo amgibe uThixo, Athi entliziyweni yakhe, Akuyi kubuza?
19_10_14_Ubonile wena; ngokuba uyabubona ububi nenkathazo, ububeke esandleni sakho; Uzinikela kuwe oludwayi; Ungumncedi weenkedama wena.
19_10_15_Yaphula ingalo yongendawo; Onobubi, mbuze okungendawo kwakhe, kungasali nento.
19_10_16_UYehova nguKumkani ngonaphakade kanaphakade; Zitshabalele iintlanga, azabakho ehlabathini lakhe.
19_10_17_Umnqweno wabalulamileyo uwuvile, Yehova; Wazizimasa iintliziyo zabo, wayibaza indlebe yakho,
19_10_18_Ukuba ugwebe ityala lenkedama noxinzelelweyo, Angabi sabangcangcazelisa umntu wasehlabathini.
19_11_1_Kumongameli. EkaDavide. Ndizimela ngoYehova; Ningathini na ukuthi kumphefumlo wam, Balekela entabeni yakho njengentaka?
19_11_2_Ngokuba nabo abangendawo begoba isaphetha, Bezilungisile iintolo zabo entanjeni, Ukuba batole besithele kwabantliziyo zithe tye.
19_11_3_Xa iziseko zithe zagungxulwa, Ilungisa linokuthini na?
19_11_4_UYehova, ulotempile yakhe iyingcwele, UYehova, ulotrone yakhe isemazulwini, Amehlo akhe ayababona, iinkophe zakhe ziyabacikida oonyana babantu.
19_11_5_UYehova uyalicikida ilungisa; Ke yena ongendawo nothanda ukugonyamela, umthiyile umphefumlo wakhe.
19_11_6_Uya kubanisela abangendawo imigibe; Umlilo, nesulfure,  nomoya olulophu, yindebe yabo abayabelweyo;
19_11_7_Ngokuba lilungisa uYehova; uthanda imisebenzi yobulungisa;  Othe tye uya kububona ubuso bakhe.
19_12_1_Kumongameli: ngelamadoda ilizwi. Umhobe kaDavide.  Sindisa, Yehova, ngokuba uphelile owenceba, Ngokuba bathe shwaka abanyanisileyo koonyana babantu.
19_12_2_Bathetha inkohlakalo omnye nomnye; Bathetha ngomlomo ogudileyo, nangentliziyo embaxa.
19_12_3_Ngamana uYehova angayinqumla yonke imilebe yomlomo ogudileyo, Ulwimi oluthetha izinto ezinkulu;
19_12_4_Abathe, Ulwimi lwethu siyalupheza; Imilomo yethu yeyethu;  ngubani na oyinkosi kuthi?
19_12_5_Ngenxa yokubhuqwa kweentsizana, ngenxa yokuncwina kwamahlwempu, Ndiya kusuka ndime ngoku, utsho uYehova; Ndiya kumbeka elusindisweni lowo ululangazelelayo.
19_12_6_Amazwi kaYehova ngamazwi acocekileyo, Yisilivere enyibilikiselwe eziko, yela emhlabeni, Ehluzwe kasixhenxe.
19_12_7_Wena, Yehova, uya kubagcina, Uya kubalondoloza kwesi sizukulwana ngonaphakade.
19_12_8_Abangendawo bahambahamba ngeenxa zonke, Xa kuphakanyiswe abangeni phakathi koonyana babantu.
19_13_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Kunini na, Yehova,  undilibele kwaphela? Kunini na ubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum?
19_13_2_Kunini na ndicebacebisana nomphefumlo wam, Ndinesingqala entliziyweni yam imini le? Kunini na lundiphakamele utshaba lwam?
19_13_3_Bheka undiphendule, Yehova, Thixo wam; Khanyisa amehlo am,  hleze ndilale ukufa;
19_13_4_Hleze utshaba lwam luthi, Ndimeyisile; Bagcobe abandibandezelayo, xa ndithe ndashukunyiswa.
19_13_5_Mna ndikholose ngenceba yakho, Mayigcobe intliziyo yam ngosindiso lwakho.
19_13_6_Ndiya kuvuma kuYehova, Ngokuba endiphethe kakuhle.
19_14_1_Kumongameli. EkaDavide. Sithi isidenge entliziyweni yaso,  Akukho Thixo. Bonakalisile, balisikizi ngeentlondi zabo; Akukho wenza okulungileyo.
19_14_2_UYehova esemazulwini uqondele koonyana babantu, Ukubona ukuba ukho na oqiqayo, Oquqela kuThixo.
19_14_3_Bonke batyekile, bayimbozisa bephelele; Akukho wenza okulungileyo, Akukho nokuba abe mnye.
19_14_4_Abanakwazi na bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga, Abathi, bebadla abantu bam, bathi badla isonka, Bangamnquli uYehova?
19_14_5_Apho bankwantya benkwantyile; Ngokuba uThixo usesizukulwaneni samalungisa.
19_14_6_Icebo losizana ningalidanisa, Kodwa uYehova ulihlathi lalo.
19_14_7_Akwaba bekuvela eZiyon ukusindiswa kwamaSirayeli!  Ekubabuyiseni kukaYehova abantu bakhe ekuthinjweni, Wogcoba uYakobi, avuye uSirayeli.
19_15_1_Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, ngubani na owophambukela ententeni yakho? Ngubani na owohlala entabeni yakho engcwele?
19_15_2_Ngohamba ngokugqibeleleyo, esenza ubulungisa, Othetha inyaniso ngentliziyo yakhe.
19_15_3_Ngongahlebiyo ngolwimi lwakhe, Ongamenziyo into embi uwabo,  Ongamngcikiviyo ummelwane wakhe;
