19_15_4_Odelekileyo, ecekiseka, kwawakhe amehlo, Obazukisayo ke bona abamoyikayo uYehova; Ofunga, angajiki, nokuba kubi kuye,
19_15_5_Ongayinikeliyo imali yakhe ukuba adle abantu ngayo,  Ongenakugaqelwa ngaye omsulwa. Okwenzayo oko akayi kuza ashukunyiswe naphakade.
19_16_1_Eyona iligugu likaDavide. Ndigcine, Thixo, ngokuba ndizimela ngawe.
19_16_2_Ndithe kuYehova, UyiNkosi yam, Andinanto indilungeleyo ngaphezu kwakho.
19_16_3_Ndithe kwabangcwele abasehlabathini, Bona bazizinhanha apho, kukhona konke endikunanzileyo.
19_16_4_Ziya kwanda iimbulaleko zabo bamananisa ngathixo wumbi uYehova. Andiyi kuyithulula iminikelo yabo ethululwayo yegazi;  Andiyi kuwaphatha amagama abo ngomlomo wam.
19_16_5_NguYehova isahlulo endasabelwayo, nendebe endayabelwayo;  Ulenze banzi ilifa lam.
19_16_6_Amacandelo andiwele ezindaweni ezimnandi; Hee! Ndide ndaba nelifa elihle.
19_16_7_Ndiya kumbonga uYehova ondinike icebo; Nasebusuku ziyandithethisa izintso zam.
19_16_8_Ndimmisile uYehova phambi kwam amaxesha onke; Ngokuba esekunene kum nje, andiyi kushukunyiswa.
19_16_9_Ngako oko iyavuya intliziyo yam, luyagcoba uzuko lwam:  Nenyama yam iya kuhlala ikholosile.
19_16_10_Ngokuba akuyi kuwushiya umphefumlo wam kwelabafileyo;  Akuyi kumyekela owakho wenceba ukuba abonane nesihogo.
19_16_11_Uya kundazisa umendo wobomi; Ebusweni bakho yinzaliseko yemivuyo; Ekunene kwakho yimihlali ngonaphakade.
19_17_1_Umthandazo kaDavide. Buve, Yehova, ubulungisa; kubazele indlebe ukuhlahlamba kwam; Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam,  ongengamlomo ukhohlisayo.
19_17_2_Ibango lam malivele ebusweni bakho, Amehlo akho akhangele ngokuthe tye.
19_17_3_Uyicikidile intliziyo yam; undivelele ebusuku;  Undinyibilikisile, akwafumana nto; Ndiyinkqangiyele into embi,  ayiyi kuwugqitha umlomo wam.
19_17_4_Malunga nemisebenzi yabantu, ngelizwi lomlomo wakho, Mna ndizigcinile, andangena kwiindlela zamanyangaza.
19_17_5_Imikhondo yam ibambe iindlela zakho, Azashukuma iinyawo zam.
19_17_6_Mna ndinqula wena, ngokuba undiphendula, Thixo; Ndithobele indlebe yakho, kuve ukuthetha kwam.
19_17_7_Zibalule iinceba zakho, wena wabasindisayo abazimela ngawe,  Ngesandla sakho sokunene, ngenxa yabasukela phezulu kubo.
19_17_8_Ndigcine njengeliso, njengokhozo lwalo, Ndisithelise ngesithunzi samaphiko akho,
19_17_9_Phambi kwabangendawo abandibhuqayo, Phambi kweentshaba zam ngokwasemphefumlweni ezindingungelayo.
19_17_10_Zithe fithi kukutyeba; Ngomlomo wazo zithetha ngekratshi.
19_17_11_Zindijikelezile ngoku ekuhambeni kwam; Amehlo azo ziwamisele ukundinqumela emhlabeni.
19_17_12_Ukufana kwazo kunjengengonyama engxamele ukuqwenga,  Kunjengengonyama entsha ihleli entsithelweni.
19_17_13_Khawusuk ume, Yehova, Uyihlangabeze, uyiwise yona;  Wusindise umphefumlo wam kongendawo ngekrele lakho;
19_17_14_Kubafo, ngesandla sakho, Yehova, Kubafo beli phakade,  abasahlulo sikobu bomi; Osizalisileyo isisu sabo ngeengqwebo zakho; Bakholisile ngoonyana, Ukuphuphuma kwabo bakushiya neentsapho zabo.
19_17_15_Mna ndiya kububona ubuso bakho ndisebulungiseni; Ndiya kwaneliswa sisithomo sakho ekuvukeni kwam.
19_18_1_Kumongameli. Eyomkhonzi kaYehova. EkaDavide, owawathethayo kuYehova amazwi ale ngoma, mhlenikweni uYehova wamhlangulayo esandleni seentshaba zakhe zonke nasesandleni sikaSawule;  wathi: Ndikuthanda ngembilini yam, Yehova, lomelelo lwam.
19_18_2_Yehova, ngxondorha yam, mboniselo yam, msindisi wam, Thixo wam, liwa lam endizimela ngalo, Ngweletshetshe yam, luphondo losindiso lwam, ngxonde yam!
19_18_3_Ndinqula uYehova ongowokudunyiswa, Ndiyasindiswa ezintshabeni zam.
19_18_4_Izintya zokufa zandijikela; Imilambo yobutshijolo yandidandathekisa.
19_18_5_Izintya zelabafileyo zandibhijela; Izirhintyelo zokufa zabetha kum.
19_18_6_Ekubandezelekeni kwam ndanqula uYehova, Ndazibika kuThixo wam; Waliva etempileni yakhe izwi lam, Ukuzibika kwam kwafika phambi kwakhe ezindlebeni zakhe.
19_18_7_Lahexa ke lanyikima ihlabathi, Iziseko zeentaba zagungqa,  Zahexa, ngokuba enomsindo.
19_18_8_Kwathi thaphu umsi emathatheni akhe, Wadla umlilo, uphuma emlonyeni wakhe, Kwavutha amalahle ephuma kuwo.
19_18_9_Wawathoba amazulu, wehla, Yangamafu amnyama phantsi kweenyawo zakhe.
19_18_10_Wakhwela ekerubhini, waphaphazela, Wee tshwebelele ngamaphiko omoya.
19_18_11_Wamisa ubumnyama baba lisithe lakhe, umnquba wakhe ngeenxa zonke kuye; Ubumnyama bamanzi, iingqimba zamafu.
19_18_12_Ekukhanyeni okuphambi kwakhe, kwatyhoboza emafini akhe Isiphango samatye, namalahle omlilo.
19_18_13_Wadudumisa ezulwini uYehova, Ophezu konke walikhupha ilizwi lakhe. Yasisiphango samatye namalahle omlilo.
19_18_14_Wathuma iintolo zakhe, wabaphangalalisa; Yamininzi imibane, wabadubaduba.
19_18_15_Imiphantsi yamanzi yabonakala, Kwatyhileka iziseko zelimiweyo Ngokukhalima kwakho, Yehova, Ngokufutha komoya womsindo wakho.
19_18_16_Wolula isandla ephezulu, wandibamba, Wandirhola emanzini amaninzi.
19_18_17_Wandihlangula elutshabeni lwam olunamandla,  Kwabandithiyileyo, ngokuba bebomelele kunam.
19_18_18_Bandifikela ngemini yokusindeka kwam, UYehova wandixhasa.
19_18_19_Wandikhuphela endaweni ebanzi, Wandihlangula, ngokuba endithandile.
19_18_20_UYehova wandiphatha kakuhle ngokobulungisa bam,  Wandibuyisela ngokobunyulu bezandla zam.
19_18_21_Ngokuba ndizigcina iindlela zikaYehova, Andemka ngokungendawo kuThixo wam.
19_18_22_Ngokuba onke amasiko akhe aphambi kwam, Nemimiselo yakhe andiyisusi kum;
19_18_23_Ndaye ndingogqibeleleyo kuye, Ndazigcina, andaba nabugwenxa,
19_18_24_Wandibuyisela ke uYehova ngokobulungisa bam, Ngokobunyulu bezandla zam phambi kwamehlo akhe.
19_18_25_Kowenceba uzenza owenceba, Kwigorha eligqibeleleyo uzenza ogqibeleleyo;
19_18_26_Kozenze nyulu uzenza onyulu, Kojibilizayo uzenza onobuqhokolo.
19_18_27_Ngokuba wena uyabasindisa abantu ababandezelekileyo,  Uwathobe amehlo aqwayingileyo.
19_18_28_Ngokuba uyasilumeka isibane sam wena; UYehova uThixo wam uyabukhanyisela ubumnyama bam.
19_18_29_Ngokuba ngawe ndigila amajarha, NgoThixo wam ndiqabela ezindongeni.
19_18_30_UThixo yena, igqibelele indlela yakhe; Ilizwi likaYehova linyibilikisiwe, Uyingweletshetshe kubo bonke abazimela ngaye.
19_18_31_Ngokuba ngubani na onguThixo, ingenguye uYehova? Ngubani na oliliwa, ingenguThixo wethu?
19_18_32_UloThixo undibhinqise ubukroti, Uyigqibelelisileyo indlela yam;
19_18_33_Uzifanisayo iinyawo zam nezamaxhamakazi, Undimisayo emimangweni yam:
19_18_34_Uzifundisayo ukulwa izandla zam, Zityede isaphetha sobhedu iingalo zam.
19_18_35_Undinikileyo ingweletshetshe yosindiso lwakho: Sandixhasa isandla sakho sokunene; Ululamo lwakho lwandikhulisa.
19_18_36_Wawenzela indawo ebanzi amanyathela am phantsi kwam,  Amaxhwele am akahexa.
19_18_37_Ndazisukela iintshaba zam, ndazifumana; Andabuya zada zaphela.
19_18_38_Ndaziqoba; azaba nakuvuka, Zawa phantsi kweenyawo zam.
19_18_39_Wandibhinqisa ubukroti ekulweni, Wabaguqisa phantsi kwam abasukela phezulu kum;
19_18_40_Wandinika ikhosi leentshaba zam, Abandithiyayo ndababhangisa.
19_18_41_Bazibika, akwabakho msindisi; Bazibika kuYehova,  akabaphendula.
19_18_42_Ndabacola, banjengothuli phambi komoya, Ndabaphalaza njengodaka lwezitrato.
19_18_43_Wandisiza ekubambaneni kwabantu, Wandimisa ndayintloko yeentlanga; Abantu ebe ndingabazi bandikhonza.
19_18_44_Besave ngeendlebe, bandithobela, Oonyana bolunye uhlanga bahanahanisa kum;
19_18_45_Oonyana bolunye uhlanga bantshwenya, Baphuma bengcangcazela ekuvingcelweni kwabo.
19_18_46_UYehova uhleli; lelokubongwa iliwa lam, Aphakanyiswe uThixo ondisindisayo.
19_18_47_UloThixo wandinika impindezelo, Uzikhandaniselayo izizwe phantsi kwam;
19_18_48_Undisiza ezintshabeni zam; Ewe, wena undiphakamisayo kwabasukela phezulu kum, Undihlangule kumfo ogonyamelayo.
19_18_49_Ngenxa yoko ndiya kubulela kuwe, Yehova, phakathi kweentlanga, Ndivume kwigama lakho.
19_18_50_Ulokhulisa iintsindiso zokumkani wakhe: Wenzayo inceba kumthanjiswa wakhe, KuDavide, nakwimbewu yakhe kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_19_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Izulu libalisa uzuko lukaThixo, Saye isibhakabhaka sixela umsebenzi wezandla zakhe.
19_19_2_Imini impompozelela imini intetho, Ubusuku buxelela ubusuku ukwazi.
19_19_3_Akukho ntetho, akukho mazwi, Apho singavakaliyo isandi sawo.
19_19_4_Intambo yawo yokulinganisa iphume yaya ehlabathini lonke,  Kwaba seziphelweni zelimiweyo ukukhuluma kwawo. Ilanga ulimisele intente kuwo,
19_19_5_Lona linjengomyeni ke ephuma egumbini lakhe; Linemihlali njengegorha, ukugidima ngomendo walo.
19_19_6_Kusesiphelweni sezulu ukuphuma kwalo, Ukujikeleza kwalo kusa eziphelweni zalo; Akukho nto inokusithela ebushushwini balo.
19_19_7_Umyalelo kaYehova ugqibelele, ubuyisa umphefumlo; Isingqino sikaYehova sinyanisekile, sinika isiyatha ubulumko.
19_19_8_Izimiselo zikaYehova zithe tye, zivuyisa intliziyo;  Umthetho kaYehova unyulu, ukhanyisela amehlo.
19_19_9_Ukoyika uYehova kucocekile, kumi ngonaphakade; Izigwebo zikaYehova ziyinyaniso, zibubulungisa kwaphela.
19_19_10_Zinokunqweneleka kunegolide zona, nakunengcwengiweyo eninzi; Zimnandi kunobusi, kunencindi yobusi.
19_19_11_Zikwamkhanyisela umkhonzi wakho; Ekuzigcineni mkhulu umvuzo.
19_19_12_Ukulahleka, ngubani na okuqondayo? Ndenze msulwa kokusitheleyo.
19_19_13_Kwanasekukhukhumaleni mnqande umkhonzi wakho;  Makungandilawuli; ukuze ndandule ukuba ngogqibeleleyo, Ndibe msulwa ekukreqeni okukhulu.
19_19_14_Makakholeke amazwi omlomo wam, nezicamango zentliziyo yam,  Phambi kwakho, Yehova, liwa lam, mkhululi wam.
19_20_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ngamana wakuphendula uYehova ngemini yembandezelo, Ngamana lakusa engxondeni igama likaThixo kaYakobi!
19_20_2_Wakuthumela uncedo lwasengcweleni, Wakuxhasa eseZiyon!
19_20_3_Wayikhumbula yonke iminikelo yakho yokudla, Wawafumana etyebile amadini akho anyukayo! (Phakamisani.)
19_20_4_Wakunika ngokwentliziyo yakho, Walizalisa lonke icebo lakho!
19_20_5_Singamemelela ngosindiso lwakho, Siphakamise iibhanile zethu egameni loThixo wethu; Azizalise uYehova zonke izicelo zakho.
19_20_6_Ndiyazi ngoku ukuba uYehova ngumsindisi womthanjiswa wakhe;  Uya kumphendula emazulwini akhe angcwele Ngobugorha obusindisayo besandla sakhe sokunene.
19_20_7_Abanye bakhankanya iinqwelo zokulwa, abanye bakhankanye amahashe, Ke thina sikhankanya igama likaYehova uThixo wethu.
19_20_8_Bona baguqile bawa; Thina siphakamile sema.
19_20_9_Yehova, sindisa; Ukumkani asiphendule ngemini yokubiza kwethu.
19_21_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, uvuyile ngamandla akho ukumkani, Asikuko nokuba uyagcoba ngosindiso lwakho!
19_21_2_Umnike umnqweno wentliziyo yakhe Akwasilandula isicelo somlomo wakhe. (Phakamisani.)
19_21_3_Ngokuba umkhawulela ngeentsikelelo zokulungileyo, Umthwesa isithsaba segolide engcwengekileyo.
19_21_4_Wacela ubomi kuwe, wampha, Wamnika imihla emide ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_21_5_Lukhulu uzuko lwakhe ngosindiso lwakho; Ubeka phezu kwakhe indili nobungangamela.
19_21_6_Ngokuba umenze waba yintsikelelo ngonaphakade, Umvuyisa ngovuyo ebusweni bakho.
19_21_7_Ngokuba ukumkani ukholose ngoYehova, Ngenceba yOsenyangweni akayi kushukunyiswa.
19_21_8_Isandla sakho siya kuzifumana zonke iintshaba zakho,  Esokunene sakho siya kubafumana abakuthiyayo.
19_21_9_Uya kubenza babe njengeziko lomlilo, wakubonakala. UYehova uya kubaginya ngomsindo wakhe, Nomlilo ubadle.
19_21_10_Uya kusitshabalalisa isiqhamo sabo emhlabeni, Imbewu yabo koonyana babantu.
19_21_11_Ngokuba bakuthobela ububi, Bacinga iyelenqe; abayi kufeza nto.
19_21_12_Ngokuba uya kubenza bakunikele umhlana; Ngesaphetha sakho uya kuxuna iintolo zakho ebusweni babo.
19_21_13_Phakama, Yehova, ngamandla akho; Siya kuvuma sibethe uhadi ngobugorha bakho.
19_22_1_Kumongameli: ngeyelexhama lesifingo. Umhobe kaDavide.  Thixo wam, Thixo wam, undilahleleni na? Ukude ngani na ekusindisweni kwam, nasemazwini okubonga kwam?
19_22_2_Thixo wam, ndiyabiza emini, ungaphenduli; Nasebusuku ndiyabiza, andithozanyiswa noko.
19_22_3_Ungcwele ke wena, Ungulohlala ezindumisweni zakwaSirayeli.
19_22_4_Oobawo bakholosa ngawe, Bakholosa, wabasiza;
19_22_5_Bakhala kuwe, basinda; Bakholosa ngawe, abadana.
19_22_6_Ke mna ndingumbungu, andimntu; Ndisisingcikivo soluntu,  into edelekileyo ebantwini.
19_22_7_Bonke abandibonayo bayandigculela; Bayasineka, bahlunguzela intloko;
19_22_8_Bathi, Makazilahlele kuYehova, amsize, Amhlangule kaloku,  ngokuba emthandile.
19_22_9_Ewe, nguwe umtyhobozisi wam esizalweni, Inkolosisi yam ndisemabeleni kama.
19_22_10_Ndalahlelwa kuwe kwasesizalweni; Kwasembilinini kama ubunguThixo wam.
19_22_11_Musa ukuba kude nam, ngokuba isondele imbandezelo, Ngokuba akukho mncedi.
19_22_12_Ndingqongwe ziinkunzi ezininzi, Ndihlanganyelwe zeziziimbalasane zaseBhashan.
19_22_13_Zindakhamele umlomo wazo, Njengengonyama eqwengayo,  egqumayo.
19_22_14_Ndiphalele njengamanzi, Ahlukene onke amathambo am;  Yanjengomthwebeba intliziyo yam, Inyibilikile phakathi kwezibilini zam.
19_22_15_Omile njengegophe amandla am, Ulwimi lwam lunamathele ekhuhlangubeni lam; Undibeka eluthulini lokufa.
19_22_16_Ngokuba izinja zindirhawule, Ibandla labenzi bokubi lindingungele; Bagqobhoza izandla zam neenyawo zam.
19_22_17_Ndinokuwabala onke amathambo am; Bona bayandijonga,  bayandibonela,
19_22_18_Babelana ngeengubo zam, Isambatho sam basenzela amaqashiso.
19_22_19_Ke wena, Yehova, musa ukuba kude; Mandla am, khawuleza undincede.
19_22_20_Wuhlangule ekreleni umphefumlo wam, Okuphela kwawo,  ethupheni lenja.
19_22_21_Ndisindise emlonyeni wengonyama, Nasezimpondweni zenqu uya kundiphendula.
19_22_22_Ndiya kulazisa igama lakho kubazalwana bam, Ndikudumise phakathi kwebandla, ndithi,
19_22_23_Nina nimoyikayo uYehova, mdumiseni; Nonke, mbewu kaYakobi,  mzukiseni, Nimhlonele nina, mbewu yonke kaSirayeli.
19_22_24_Kuba azidelekanga, azibanga nazothe kuye iintsizi zolusizana; Akabusithelisanga ubuso bakhe kuye; Ekuzibikeni kwakhe kuye waphulaphula.
19_22_25_Ivela kuwe indumiso yam ebandleni elikhulu;  Nezibhambathiso zam ndiya kuzizalisa phambi kwabamoyikayo.
19_22_26_Baya kudla abalulamileyo, bahluthe; Baya kudumisa uYehova abamngxamelayo. Ngamana yaphila intliziyo yenu ngonaphakade!
19_22_27_Ziya kukhumbula zibuyele kuYehova zonke iziphelo zehlabathi, Iqubude phambi kwakhe yonke imizalwane yeentlanga:
19_22_28_Ngokuba bobukaYehova ubukumkani, Nguye umlawuli ezintlangeni.
19_22_29_Baya kudla, baqubude, bonke abatyebileyo behlabathi; Baya kuguqa phambi kwakhe bonke abatshona eluthulini,  Abangawugciniyo umphefumlo wabo.
19_22_30_Imbewu iya kumkhonza; Kuya kubaliselwa isizukulwana ngayo iNkosi.
19_22_31_Baya kuza baxele ubulungisa bayo Kubantu abaza kuzalwa,  ukuba oko ukwenzile.
19_23_1_Umhobe kaDavide. UYehova ngumalusi wam, andisweli lutho.
19_23_2_Wenza ukuba mandibuthe emakriweni aluhlaza; Undithundezela emanzini angawokuphumla.
19_23_3_Uyawubuyisa umphefumlo wam; Undikhaphela ezindleleni zobulungisa ngenxa yegama lakhe.
19_23_4_Nokuba ndihamba emfuleni wethunzi lokufa, Andiyi koyika bubi, ngokuba unam wena; Intonga yakho, umsimelelo wakho,  uyandithuthuzela.
19_23_5_Undilungisela isithebe phambi kwababandezeli bam,  Uyithambisa ngeoli intloko yam, Indebe yam iyaphalala.
19_23_6_Inene, ndiya kulandelwa kokulungileyo nenceba Yonke imihla yobomi bam, Ndihlale endlwini kaYehova Imihla emide.
19_24_1_Umhobe kaDavide. LelikaYehova ihlabathi nenzaliseko yalo,  Elimiweyo, nabahleli kulo;
19_24_2_Ngokuba yena waliseka phezu kweelwandle, Walizinzisa phezu kwemilambo.
19_24_3_Ngubani na onokunyuka aye entabeni kaYehova? Ngubani na onokuma endaweni yakhe engcwele?
19_24_4_Ngozandla zimsulwa, ontliziyo inyulu, Ongawuphakamiseli kwinkohlakalo umphefumlo wakhe, Ongafungiyo ngenkohliso.
19_24_5_Uya kwamkela intsikelelo kuYehova, Nobulungisa kuThixo ongumsindisi wakhe.
19_24_6_Siso eso isizukulwana sabamngxameleyo, Sababufunayo ubuso bakho, Thixo kaYakobi.(phakamisani.)
19_24_7_Phakamisani iintloko zenu, masango; Niziphakamise, minyango yaphakade, Angene uKumkani wozuko.
19_24_8_Ngubani na ke lo Kumkani wozuko? NguYehova onamandla,  oligorha; NguYehova, igorha emfazweni.
19_24_9_Phakamisani iintloko zenu, masango, Niziphakamise, minyango yaphakade, Angene lo Kumkani wozuko.
19_24_10_Ngubani na ke yena uKumkani wozuko? NguYehova wemikhosi,  Nguye lo Kumkani wozuko. (Phakamisani.)
19_25_1_EkaDavide. Ndiwuphakamisela kuwe, Yehova, umphefumlo wam.
19_25_2_Thixo wam, ndikholose ngawe, Mandingadani;  Mazingandivuyeleli iintshaba zam.
19_25_3_Ewe, bonke abo bakuthembayo abayi kudana; Kuya kudana abo banginiza ngelize.
19_25_4_Ndazise iindlela zakho, Yehova, Ndifundise umendo wakho.
19_25_5_Ndinyathelise enyanisweni yakho, undifundise; Ngokuba unguThixo ongumsindisi wam; Ndithembe wena yonke imihla.
19_25_6_Khumbula iimfesane zakho, Yehova, neenceba zakho; Ngokuba kususela kwaphakade zikho.
19_25_7_Musa ukuzikhumbula izono zobutsha bam, nokreqo lwam;  Ndikhumbule ngokwenceba yakho wena, Ngenxa yokulunga kwakho,  Yehova.
19_25_8_Ulungile, uthe tye uYehova; Ngenxa yoko uyabayalela indlela aboni.
19_25_9_Uyabanyathelisa abalulamileyo emasikweni akhe, Abafundise abalulamileyo indlela yakhe.
19_25_10_Zonke iindlela zikaYehova ziyinceba nenyaniso, Kwabagcina umnqophiso wakhe nezingqino zakhe.
19_25_11_Ngenxa yegama lakho, Yehova, xolela ubugwenxa bam, Ngokuba bukhulu bona.
19_25_12_Ngubani na ke umntu omoyikayo uYehova? Womyalela indlela aya kuyinyula.
19_25_13_Umphefumlo wakhe wohlala wonwabile, Imbewu yakhe ilidle ilifa ilizwe.
19_25_14_Ukucweya kukaYehova kunabamoyikayo; Ubazisa umnqophiso wakhe.
19_25_15_Amehlo am ahlala emi kuYehova, Ngokuba nguye ozirholayo eluthanjeni iinyawo zam.
19_25_16_Ndibheke, undibabale, Ngokuba ndindodwa, ndibandezelekile.
19_25_17_Iimbandezelo zentliziyo yam ziphangalalisiwe; Ndikhuphe ekucuthekeni kwam.
19_25_18_Khangela ukucinezeleka kwam nokwaphuka kwam, Uxolele zonke izono zam.
19_25_19_Zikhangele iintshaba zam, ngokuba zininzi; Zindithiye ngentiyo egonyamelayo.
19_25_20_Wugcine umphefumlo wam, undihlangule; Mandingadani,  ngokuba ndizimela ngawe.
19_25_21_Ukugqibelela nokuthi tye makundilondoloze, Ngokuba ndithembele kuwe.
19_25_22_Khulula uSirayeli, Thixo, Ezimbandezelweni zakhe zonke.
19_26_1_EkaDavide. Lithethe ityala lam, Yehova, ngokuba mna ndihambe engqibelelweni yam, Ndakholosa ngoYehova, andahexa.
19_26_2_Ndicikide, Yehova, undilinge; Nyibilikisa izintso zam nentliziyo yam.
19_26_3_Ngokuba inceba yakho iphambi kwamehlo am, Ndihamba enyanisweni yakho.
19_26_4_Andihlali namadoda akhohlakeleyo, Andihambi nabanyhwalazi.
19_26_5_Ndilithiyile ibandla labenzi bobubi, Andihlali nabangendawo.
19_26_6_Ndizihlamba kokumsulwa izandla zam, Ndisiphahle isibingelelo sakho, Yehova,
19_26_7_Ukuba ndivakalise izwi lokubulela, Ndibalise ngayo yonke imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.
19_26_8_Yehova, ndiyalithanda ikhaya eliyindlu yakho, Nendawo yokuhlala kozuko lwakho.
19_26_9_Musa ukuwubuthela umphefumlo wam ndawonye naboni, Ubomi bam ndawonye namadoda anamagazi;
19_26_10_Wona azandla zinamanyala, Wona ezokunene zawo zizeleyo zizicengo.
19_26_11_Mna ke okwam ndihamba engqibelelweni yam; Ndikhulule,  undibabale.
19_26_12_Unyawo lwam lumi endaweni ebanzi; Ndimbonga uYehova ndisemabandleni.
19_27_1_EkaDavide. NguYehova umkhanyiseli wam nomsindisi wam,  ndiya koyika bani na? NguYehova inqaba yobomi bam, ndiya kunkwantya ngabani na?
19_27_2_Bakusondela kum abenzi bobubi ukuba badle inyama yam,  Bakuza ababandezeli bam neentshaba zam kum, bakhubeka bawa bona.
19_27_3_Bendingafanelana ndirhawulwe ngumkhosi isuka ingoyiki intliziyo yam; Bendingafanelana ndiphakanyelwe yimfazwe,  ndisuka ndithembe noko.
19_27_4_Ndicele nto-nye kuYehova, ndifuna yona: Ukuba ndihlale endlwini kaYehova yonke imihla yobomi bam, Ndibone ubuhle bukaYehova, ndiphicothe etempileni yakhe.
19_27_5_Ngokuba undigusha emnqubeni wakhe ngemini yobubi,  Undisithelisa esitheni lentente yakhe, Undimisa eweni.
19_27_6_Ngoku ke iya kuphakama intloko yam phezu kweentshaba zam ezindijikelezayo, Ndibingelele ententeni yakhe imibingelelo yokuduma, Ndivume, ndibethe uhadi kuYehova.
19_27_7_Yiva, Yehova, ndakubiza ngezwi lam; Ndibabale,  undiphendule.
19_27_8_Intliziyo yam ithi kuwe, kweli uthi, Funani ubuso bam,  Ubuso bakho, Yehova, ndiya kubufuna.
19_27_9_Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum; Musa ukumgila umkhonzi wakho ngomsindo; Uluncedo lwam, musa ukundilahla; Musa ukundishiya, Thixo ondisindisayo.
19_27_10_Ngokuba ubawo noma bandishiyile, Wesuka uYehova wandichola.
19_27_11_Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yakho, Ndikhaphe emendweni othe tye, ngenxa yabandilaleleyo.
19_27_12_Musa ukundinikela elitheni labandibandezelayo, Ngokuba ndiphakanyelwe ngamangqina axokayo, nabafutha ukugonyamela.
19_27_13_Ndinge ndiphelelwe, koko bendikholwa kukuba ndokubona ukulunga kukaYehova Ezweni lobu bomi.
19_27_14_Thembela kuYehova; Yomelela, ikhaliphe intliziyo yakho,  Uthembele kuYehova.
19_28_1_EkaDavide. Ndidanduluka kuwe, Yehova; Liwa lam, musa ukuzenza isithulu; Hleze, wakuthi cwaka kum, Ndifane nabahla baye emhadini.
19_28_2_Yiva izwi lokukhunga kwam ekuzibikeni kwam kuwe,  Ekuziphakamiseleni kwam izandla zam kwingcwele kangcwele.
19_28_3_Musa ukundiqweqwedisa nabangendawo, Nabenzi bobutshinga;  Abathetha uxolo kummelwane wabo, Benobubi ezintliziyweni zabo.
19_28_4_Banike ngokwemisebenzi yabo, ngokobubi beentlondi zabo;  Banike ngokwezenzo zezandla zabo; Babuyisele ngokwempatho yabo.
19_28_5_Ekubeni bengayiqondi imisebenzi kaYehova, Nezenzo zezandla zakhe, Uya kubagungxula, angabakhi.
19_28_6_Makabongwe uYehova, Kuba elivile ilizwi lokukhunga kwam.
19_28_7_NguYehova amandla am nengweletshetshe yam; Yakholosa ngaye intliziyo yam, ndancedeka. Iyadlamka ke intliziyo yam,  Ndiyamdumisa ngengoma yam.
19_28_8_UYehova ungamandla kubo; Uligwiba losindiso kumthanjiswa wakhe yena.
19_28_9_Sindisa abantu bakho, Usikelele ilifa lakho, Ubaluse,  ubathwale kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_29_1_Umhobe kaDavide. Mnikeni uYehova, nina nyana bakaThixo,  Mnikeni uYehova uzuko namandla.
19_29_2_Mnikeni uYehova uzuko lwegama lakhe; Qubudani kuYehova nivethe ezingcwele.
19_29_3_Izwi likaYehova liphezu kwamanzi; UThixo wozuko uyadudumisa, KwauYehova phezu kwamanzi amaninzi.
19_29_4_Izwi likaYehova linamandla, Izwi likaYehova linobungangamela;
19_29_5_Izwi likaYehova laphula imisedare, UYehova waphula imisedare yaseLebhanon.
19_29_6_Uyidlobisa njengenkonyana, ILebhanon neSiriyon njengethole lenqu.
19_29_7_Izwi likaYehova lilenyise okwamalangatye omlilo,
19_29_8_Izwi likaYehova liyenza isaqhwithi intlango, UYehova uyenza isaqhwithi intlango yaseKadeshe.
19_29_9_Izwi likaYehova lizuzisa amaxhamakazi, Lihlube amahlathi;  Etempileni yakhe into yonke iphela ithi, Luzuko!
19_29_10_UYehova wahlala kunogumbe, UYehova uhleli enguKumkani ngonaphakade.
19_29_11_UYehova uya kubanika abantu bakhe amandla; UYehova uya kubasikelela abantu bakhe ngoxolo.
19_30_1_Umhobe: ingoma yokusungulwa kwayo indlu. EkaDavide. Ndiya kukuphakamisa, Yehova, kuba undirholile wandinyusa,  Akwazivuyisa iintshaba zam ngam.
19_30_2_Yehova, Thixo wam, Ndazibika kuwe, wandiphilisa;
19_30_3_Yehova, uwunyusile kwelabafileyo umphefumlo wam, Wandidlisa ubomi, ukuba ndingehli ndiye emhadini.
19_30_4_Mbetheleni uhadi uYehova, nina bakhe benceba, Nibulele isikhumbuzo sakhe esingcwele,
19_30_5_Ngokuba yinto yephanyazo umsindo wakhe, Itarhu lakhe liyinto yobomi; Ngokuhlwa kulalisa ukulila, Kusasa kubakho ukumemelela.
19_30_6_Ke mna ndathi ebunqobeni bam, Andiyi kushukunyiswa naphakade.
19_30_7_Yehova, enkolosekweni yakho ubuyiqinisile intaba yam;  Ubusithelisile ubuso bakho, ndakhwankqiswa.
19_30_8_Ndadanduluka kuwe, Yehova, Ndakhunga kuYehova:
19_30_9_Ndathi, Kukho nzuzo yani na egazini lam, ekuhleni kwam ndiye esihogweni? Lokudumisa na uthuli? loyixela na inyaniso yakho?
19_30_10_Yiva, Yehova, undibabale; Yehova, yiba ngumncedi wam.
19_30_11_Wakuguqula ukulila kwam, kwaba kukuqamba; Wandikhulula ezirhwexayo, wandibhinqisa uvuyo,
19_30_12_Ukuze uzuko lwam luvume ngawe, lungathi cwaka. Yehova,  Thixo wam, ndiya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade.
19_31_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndizimela ngawe, Yehova,  mandingaze ndidaniswe; Ndisize ngobulungisa bakho.
19_31_2_Ndithobele indlebe yakho, ungxame undihlangule; Yiba liliwa eliligwiba kum, Indlu yemboniselo yokundisindisa.
19_31_3_Ngokuba ingxondorha yam nemboniselo yam nguwe; Ngenxa yegama lakho uya kundikhapha undithundeze.
19_31_4_Uya kundirhola esibatheni ababesigqumele mna, Ngokuba uyinqaba yam.
19_31_5_Ndiwuyaleza umoya wam esandleni sakho; Uyandikhulula,  Yehova, Thixo wenyaniso.
19_31_6_Ndibathiyile abagcine amampunge angento yanto. Ndikholose ngoYehova mna.
19_31_7_Ndiya kugcoba ndivuye ngenceba yakho, Ngenxa enokuba uzibonile iintsizi zam, Wazazi iingxingongo zomphefumlo wam;
19_31_8_Akwandivingcela ngesandla seentshaba, Wazimisa endaweni ebanzi iinyawo zam.
19_31_9_Ndibabale, Yehova, ngokuba ndibandezelekile; Lonakele kukukhathazeka iliso lam, nomphefumlo wam, nesisu sam;
19_31_10_Ngokuba buphelile sisingqala ubomi bam, Neminyaka yam kukuncwina; Ayagexa amandla am ngobugwenxa bam, Namathambo am aluphele.
19_31_11_Ngenxa yababandezeli bam bonke ndaba sisingcikivo,  Ngokukodwa kubamelwane bam; ndaba yinto yokunkwantyisa kwabandaziyo; Abandibonayo ngaphandle baya ndibaleka.
19_31_12_Ndilityelwe njengomfi ongasakhunjulwayo; Ndinjengesitya esiza kulahlwa.
19_31_13_Ngokuba ndive intlebendwane yabaninzi, Ukunxunguphala ngeenxa zonke. Ekugquguleni kwabo ngam, Bankqangiyela ukuthabatha umphefumlo wam.
19_31_14_Ke mna ndikholose ngawe, Yehova; Ndithi, UnguThixo wam wena.
19_31_15_Asesandleni sakho amaxesha am; Ndihlangule esandleni seentshaba zam nakwabandisukelayo.
19_31_16_Khanyisa ubuso bakho phezu komkhonzi wakho; Ndisindise ngenceba yakho.
19_31_17_Yehova, andiyi kudana, ngokuba ndinqula wena; Makudane abangendawo, bathi cwaka kwelabafileyo.
19_31_18_Mawubotshwe umlomo wobuxoki, Othetha ngelungisa ngokusa,  Unekratshi, udela.
19_31_19_Hayi, ubukhulu bokulunga kwakho, obuqwebele abakoyikayo,  Obenzela abazimela ngawe, ebusweni boonyana babantu!
19_31_20_Ubasithelisa esitheni lobuso bakho kumayelenqe abantu;  Uyabagusha emnqubeni ekubambaneni kweelwimi.
19_31_21_Makabongwe uYehova, Ngokuba endenzele inceba ebalulekileyo emzini onqabileyo.
19_31_22_Ke mna ndathi ekuphakuzeleni kwam, Ndinqanyulwe andabakho emehlweni akho. Waliva noko izwi lokukhunga kwam ekuzibikeni kwam kuwe.
19_31_23_Thandani uYehova, nonke nina bakhe benceba; NguYehova umlondolozi wabanyanisileyo, Umphindezeli ngokukhulu kowenza ngekratshi.
19_31_24_Yomelelani, ikhaliphe intliziyo yenu Nonke nina nithembele kuYehova.
19_32_1_EkaDavide. Eyokuqiqa. Hayi, uyolo lwakhe olukreqo luxolelweyo, osono siselelweyo!
19_32_2_Hayi, uyolo lomntu angabubaleliyo uYehova kuye ubugwenxa,  Ekungekho kukhohlisa emoyeni wakhe!
19_32_3_Ndithi ndakuthi cwaka, aluphale amathambo am Ngokubhonga kwam imihla yonke.
19_32_4_Ngokuba imini nobusuku, besinzima phezu kwam isandla sakho,  Baguquka ubumanzi bam, baba kukubalela kwasehlotyeni.  (Phakamisani.)
19_32_5_Ndikwazisile isono sam, ubugwenxa bam andabugquma; Ndathi,  Ndoluvuma ukreqo lwam kuYehova; Wabuxolela ke wena ubugwenxa besono sam. (Phakamisani.)
19_32_6_Ngenxa yoko mabathandaze kuwe bonke abenceba ngexesha lokukufumana; Inene, ekukhukuleni kwamanzi amaninzi Akayi kufika kubo.
19_32_7_Wena uyindawo yokuzimela kwam; uyandilondoloza embandezelweni, Undingqonge ngomemelelo lokusiza.  (Phakamisani.)
19_32_8_Ndiya kukuqiqisa ndikuyalele indlela owohamba ngayo: Ndiya kukucebisa, iliso lam likuwe.
19_32_9_Musani ukuba njengamahashe, njengoondlebende, ukungabi nangqondo; Abazivatho zingumkhala, neentambo zokubabopha umlomo; Bengenazo abasayi kusondela kuwe.
19_32_10_Mkhulu umvandedwa wongendawo; Ke okholosa ngoYehova, yena uya kumjikela ngenceba.
19_32_11_Vuyani kuYehova, nigcobe, nina malungisa, Nimemelele, nina nonke bantliziyo zithe tye.
19_33_1_Memelelani kuYehova, nina malungisa; Ibafanele abathe tye indumiso.
19_33_2_Bulelani kuYehova ngohadi, Mbetheleni umrhubhe ontambo zilishumi.
19_33_3_Mvumeleni ingoma entsha, Nilungise ukubetha ngelokuduma;
19_33_4_Nokuba lithe tye ilizwi likaYehova, Konke akwenzayo kuthembekile.
19_33_5_Ngumthandi wobulungisa nokusesikweni, Lizele ihlabathi yinceba kaYehova.
19_33_6_Lenzeka ngelizwi likaYehova izulu, Umkhosi walo lonke ngomoya womlomo wakhe.
19_33_7_Ulobutha njengemfumba amanzi olwandle, Ulobeka koovimba amanzi enzonzobila.
19_33_8_Malimoyike uYehova lonke ihlabathi, Bamhlonele bonke abemi belimiweyo;
19_33_9_Ngokuba wathetha, kwabakho; Wawisa umthetho yena, kwema.
19_33_10_UYehova ulitshitshisile icebo leentlanga; Uzalele iingcinga zezizwe.
19_33_11_Icebo likaYehova limi ngonaphakade, Iingcinga zentliziyo yakhe kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_33_12_Hayi, uyolo lohlanga oluThixo walo unguYehova; Lwabantu abanyulileyo, baba lilifa kuye.
19_33_13_Uqondele esemazulwini uYehova; Uyababona bonke oonyana babantu;
19_33_14_Esendaweni yakhe yokuhlala, wondele Kubemi bonke behlabathi:
19_33_15_Ulobumba ngakunye intliziyo yabo, Uloqonda zonke izenzo zabo.
19_33_16_Akukho kumkani osindiswa yimpi enkulu; Igorha alihlangulwa ngamandla alo amakhulu.
19_33_17_Liyaxoka ihashe ukuba lingasindisa, Nangamandla alo amakhulu alinakusiza.
19_33_18_Yabona, iliso likaYehova likubo abamoyikayo, Abalindele inceba yakhe,
19_33_19_Ukuba awuhlangule ekufeni umphefumlo wabo, Abagcine ngexesha lendlala.
19_33_20_Umphefumlo wethu ulindele kuYehova; Nguye uncedo lwethu,  nengweletshetshe yethu.
19_33_21_Ngokuba iya kuvuya ngaye intliziyo yethu, Sikholosile nje ngegama lakhe elingcwele.
19_33_22_Inceba yakho mayibe phezu kwethu, Yehova, Njengoko sikulindeleyo kuwe.
19_34_1_EkaDavide; oko wazenza ophambene ingqondo phambi koAbhimeleki, waza yena wamgxotha, wahamba. Ndiya kumbonga uYehova ngamaxesha onke, Ihlale isemlonyeni wam indumiso yakhe.
19_34_2_Uya kuqhayisa umphefumlo wam ngoYehova; Bova abalulamileyo,  bavuye.
19_34_3_Menzeni mkhulu kunye nam uYehova, Siliphakamise kunye igama lakhe.
19_34_4_Ndamfuna uYehova, wandiphendula; Wandihlangula kwiinto zonke endinxunguphala zizo.
19_34_5_Babheka kuye, bakhazimla; Ubuso babo ababa nazintloni.
19_34_6_Usizana lwadanduluka, weva uYehova, Walusindisa ezimbandezelweni zalo zonke.
19_34_7_Isithunywa sikaYehova sibangqinga ngeenxa zonke abamoyikayo, Sibahlangule.
19_34_8_Yivani, nibone ukuba ulungile uYehova. Hayi, uyolo lomfo ozimela ngaye!
19_34_9_Moyikeni uYehova, nina bangcwele bakhe, Ngokuba abanakuswela abamoyikayo.
19_34_10_Iingonyama ezintsha ziyaswela, zilambe; Ke bona abamfunayo uYehova abasweli nanye into elungileyo.
19_34_11_Yizani, bonyana, phulaphulani kum; Ndonifundisa ukoyika uYehova.
19_34_12_Ngubani na umntu obungxameleyo ubomi, Othanda imihla yokubona okulungileyo?
19_34_13_Gcina ulwimi lwakho ebubini, Umlomo wakho ungathethi nkohliso.
19_34_14_Suka ebubini, wenze okulungileyo; Funa uxolo, uluphuthume.
19_34_15_Amehlo kaYehova akumalungisa, Iindlebe zakhe zisekuzibikeni kwawo.
19_34_16_Ubuso bukaYehova bujonge abenzi bokubi, Ukuba akunqumle ehlabathini ukukhunjulwa kwabo.
19_34_17_Akhala, weva uYehova; Wawahlangula ezimbandezelweni zawo zonke.
19_34_18_Usondele uYehova kwabantliziyo zaphukileyo, Abasindise abamoya utyumkileyo.
19_34_19_Buninzi ububi obulihlelayo ilungisa, Ke uYehova ulihlangula kubo bonke.
19_34_20_Uyawagcina onke amathambo alo, Akwaphuki nalinye kuwo.
19_34_21_Ububi buyambulala ongendawo; Abathiyi belungisa bayalithwala ityala.
19_34_22_UYehova uyawukhulula umphefumlo wabakhonzi bakhe,  Bangathwali tyala bonke abazimela ngaye.
19_35_1_EkaDavide. Bambana, Yehova, nababambana nam. Yilwa nabalwa nam.
19_35_2_Qubula ikhaka nengweletshetshe, Usukume undincede.
19_35_3_Rhola umkhonto, uvingce indlela yabandisukelayo; Yithi kumphefumlo wam, Ndilusindiso lwakho.
19_35_4_Mabadane, bahlazeke, abazungula umphefumlo wam; Mababuye umva babe neentloni abacinga ububi ngam.
19_35_5_Mababe njengomququ phambi komoya, Sibatyhale isithunywa sikaYehova, bawe.
19_35_6_Indlela yabo mayibe mnyama, ibe buthelezi, Sibasukele isithunywa sikaYehova.
19_35_7_Ngokuba basigqumele mna isibatha sabo ngelize; Bawumbela isihogo umphefumlo wam ngelize.
19_35_8_Mayimfikele intshabalalo engazi; Sibambise yena isibatha sakhe awasigqumayo, Eyele kuso ngesithonga.
19_35_9_Wogcoba ke umphefumlo wam kuYehova, Ube nemihlali ngosindiso lwakhe.
19_35_10_Onke amathambo am aya kuthi, Yehova, ngubani na onjengawe,  Mhlanguli wosizana kowomeleleyo kunalo, Kwausizana nehlwempu kumxhakamfuli walo?
19_35_11_Kusuke kwema amangqina angenakulungisa, Andibuza into endingayaziyo,
19_35_12_Bandibuyekeza ngobubi esikhundleni sokulungileyo;  Uxhwalekile umphefumlo wam.
19_35_13_Ke mna, xa babesifa, iingubo zam bezizezirhwexayo;  Ndawucinezela umphefumlo wam ngokuzila ukudla; Umthandazo wam wabuyela esifubeni sam.
19_35_14_Ndaziphatha njengokungathi unguwethu, njengokungathi ungumzalwana kum, ukuhamba-hamba kwam; Ndanga ndingombambazelela unina, ukuthobeka kwam, ndinezimnyama zokuzila.
19_35_15_Ke ekuqhwaleleni kwam avuya, ahlangana, Ahlangana ngam amagxidolo, nendingabaziyo, Bandihlalela ngentlamba, abayeka.
19_35_16_Ngokweentshembenxa ezizihiba ngenxa yesonka,  Banditshixizela amazinyo.
19_35_17_Nkosi, kunini na ubonela? Buyisa umphefumlo wam kwiintshabalaliso zabo, Okuphela kwawo ezingonyameni.
19_35_18_Ndiya kubulela kuwe ebandleni elikhulu, Ebantwini abaninzi ndiya kukudumisa.
19_35_19_Mazingandivuyeleli iintshaba zam ngobuxoki,  Bangatyandelani ngoshiyi abandithiyayo ngelize:
19_35_20_Ngokuba abathethi luxolo; Bacinga amazwi enkohliso ngabanyhamnyhekileyo belizwe.
19_35_21_Bayandisinekela, Bathi, Tshotsho! Tshotsho! Abonile amehlo ethu.
19_35_22_Ubonile, Yehova; musa ukuba sisithulu; Nkosi, musa ukuba kude kum.
19_35_23_Zivuse, uphaphe ngenxa yebango lam, Thixo wam, Nkosi yam,  ngenxa yento esibambene ngayo.
19_35_24_Lithethe ityala lam ngokobulungisa bakho, Yehova Thixo wam; Mabangandivuyeleli;
19_35_25_Mabangathi entliziyweni yabo, Tshotsho! Nantso into ebe siyfuna! Mabangathi, Simginyile.
19_35_26_Mabadane, babe neentloni kunye Abavuyela ububi bam;  Bambathe ukudana nehlazo Abazikhulisayo kunam.
19_35_27_Mabamemelele, bavuye, abananze ubulungisa bam, Bahlale besithi, Makabe mkhulu uYehova, Ulonanze uxolo lomkhonzi wakhe.
19_35_28_Ulwimi lwam luya kuxela ubulungisa bakho Nendumiso yakho,  imihla yonke.
19_36_1_Kumongameli. Eyomkhonzi kaYehova. EkaDavide. Ongendawo unezihlabo zokreqo entliziyweni yakhe ngaphakathi, ezithi,  Akukho koyika Thixo emehlweni akhe,
19_36_2_Ngokuba zithetha kuye ngokugudileyo emehlweni akhe, Zide zimfumanise ubugwenxa bakhe, zimthiye.
19_36_3_Amazwi omlomo wakhe abubutshinga nenkohliso; Uyekile ukwenza ngokuqiqa nangokulungisa.
19_36_4_Ucinga ubutshinga elukhukweni lwakhe; Uzimisa endleleni engalungileyo; Akabucekisi ububi.
19_36_5_Yehova, inceba yakho ifikelela ezulwini, Ukuthembeka kwakho esibhakabhakeni.
19_36_6_Ubulungisa bakho bunjengeentaba zikaThixo; Izigwebo zakho zingamanzi enzonzobila; Usindisa umntu neenkomo, Yehova.
19_36_7_Hayi, ixabiso lenceba yakho, Thixo! Oonyana babantu bazimela ngethunzi lamaphiko akho.
19_36_8_Bayahluthiswa kukutyeba kwendlu yakho; Ubaseza emlanjeni weziyolo zakho.
19_36_9_Ngokuba likuwe ithende lobomi; Ekukhanyeni kwakho sibona ukukhanya.
19_36_10_Bolulele inceba yakho abakwaziyo, Ubolulele ubulungisa bakho abantliziyo zithe tye.
19_36_11_Malungandinyatheli unyawo lonekratshi. Singandiphekuzi isandla sabangendawo.
19_36_12_Nabo bewile abasebenzi bobutshinga; Batyhalwe bawa, ababa nakuvuka.
19_37_1_EkaDavide. Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo ngabenzi bobubi;  Musa ukubamonela abenzi bobugqwetha.
19_37_2_Ngokuba baya kusikwa kamsinyane njengengca, Babune njengohlaza oluphumayo.
19_37_3_Kholosa ngoYehova, wenze okulungileyo; Lime ilizwe,  ulandelane nokuthembeka.
19_37_4_Ziyolise ngoYehova; Wokunika okunqwenelwa yintliziyo yakho.
19_37_5_Yiyekele kuYehova indlela yakho, Ukholose ngaye;  wokwenzela,
19_37_6_Abuvelise njengokukhanya ubulungisa bakho, Nebango lakho njengemini enkulu.
19_37_7_Yithi cwaka kuYehova, ulindele kuye; Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo ngonempumelelo ngendlela yakhe, Ngomntu ofeza amayelenqe.
19_37_8_Lahla umsindo, ushiye ubushushu; Musa ukuzivuthisa ngomsindo, kuba oko kusingisa ekwenzeni ububi kuphela.
19_37_9_Ngokuba abenzi bobubi baya kunqunyulwa; Ke bona abamthembayo uYehova, baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe.
19_37_10_Kusaya kuba mzuzwana, angabikho ongendawo; Uthi wakuyikhangela indawo yakhe, angabikho.
19_37_11_Ke bona abalulamileyo baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe,  Baziyolise ngobuninzi boxolo.
19_37_12_Ongendawo ulenzela amayelenqe ilungisa, Ulitshixizela amazinyo akhe.
19_37_13_INkosi iyamhleka, Ngokuba ibona ukuba iyeza imini yakhe.
19_37_14_Barhole ikrele abangendawo, bagobe isaphetha sabo, Ukuba bawise usizana nehlwempu, Basike abandlela zithe tye.
19_37_15_Ikrele labo liya kungena kwakweyabo intliziyo, Zaphuke izaphetha zabo.
19_37_16_Ilungile intwana elinayo ilungisa, Kunentabalala abanayo abangendawo abaninzi:
19_37_17_Ngokuba iingalo zabangendawo ziya kwaphulwa; NguYehova umxhasi wamalungisa.
19_37_18_NguYehova umazi wemihla yabagqibeleleyo, Nelifa labo liya kuba ngunaphakade.
19_37_19_Abayi kudana ngexesha lobubi; Baya kuhlutha ngeemini zendlala:
19_37_20_Ngokuba abangendawo bayatshabalala; Iintshaba zikaYehova zinjengobuhle bamadlelo; Ziya kuphela njengomsi, ziphele.
19_37_21_Uyaboleka ongendawo, angabuyisi; Ke lona ilungisa liyababala, liphe.
19_37_22_Ngokuba abasikelelweyo nguye baya kulidla ilifa ilizwe,  Banqanyulwe abatshabhisiweyo nguye.
19_37_23_Amanyathela omfo aqiniswa nguYehova, Ayithande indlela yakhe.
19_37_24_Ewile, akayi kuqungquluza, Ngokuba nguYehova umxhasi wesandla sakhe.
19_37_25_Ndaka ndamtsha, kungokunje ndimdala; Ukanti andizanga ndilibone ilungisa lishiywa, Nembewu yalo ivukela ukutya.
19_37_26_Imihla yonke liyababala, liboleke abanye; Nembewu yalo iyintsikelelo.
19_37_27_Suka ebubini, wenze okulungileyo, Uhlale ngonaphakade.
19_37_28_Ngokuba uYehova uthanda okusesikweni, Angabashiyi abenceba bakhe; Bagciniwe ngonaphakade: Ke yona imbewu yongendawo iyanqanyulwa.
19_37_29_Amalungisa aya kulidla ilifa ilizwe, Ahlale kulo ngonaphakade.
19_37_30_Umlomo welungisa uxela ubulumko, Nolwimi lwalo luthetha okusesikweni.
19_37_31_Umyalelo woThixo walo usentliziyweni yalo; Akayi kuhexa amanyathela alo.
19_37_32_Ongendawo uyalilalela ilungisa, Ufuna ukulibulala.
19_37_33_UYehova akalinikeli esandleni sakhe, Angaligwebi ekuthethweni kwetyala lalo.
19_37_34_Thembela kuYehova, ugcine indlela yakhe; Wokuphakamisa,  ulidle ilifa ilizwe; Ekunqanyulweni kongendawo wobonela.
19_37_35_Ndimbonile ongendawo, oyingqwangangqwili, Exanda njengomthi omilileyo, uluhlaza;
19_37_36_Kwadlula umntu, nanko engasekho; Ndamfuna, akafumaneka.
19_37_37_Gcina ogqibeleleyo, ukhangele othe tye; Ngokuba izivela-mva zezomntu woxolo.
19_37_38_Ke bona abangendawo batshatyalaliswa kuphele; Izivela-mva zongendawo ziyanqanyulwa.
19_37_39_Usindiso lwamalungisa luphuma kuYehova; Uligwiba lawo ngexesha lembandezelo.
19_37_40_UYehova uyawanceda, awasindise, Awasindise kongendawo,  awasindise, Ngokuba azimela ngaye.
19_38_1_Umhobe kaDavide: eyokukhumbuza. Yehova, musa ukundohlwaya unoburhalarhume, Ungandithethisi unobushushu:
19_38_2_Ngokuba iintolo zakho zitshone kum, Sehla kanzima kum isandla sakho.
19_38_3_Akukho ndawo iphilileyo enyameni yam, ngenxa yokubhavuma kwakho; Akukho kuphila emathanjeni am, ngenxa yezono zam.
19_38_4_Ngokuba ubugwenxa bam bugqithile entlokweni yam, Bundisinda njengomthwalo onzima.
19_38_5_Iyanuka, iyabhiqiza imivumbo yam, Ngenxa yokumatha kwam.
19_38_6_Ndiyapenapena, ndisibekeke kakhulu; Yonke imini ndihamba-hamba ngezimnyama zokuzila.
19_38_7_Ngokuba kuyatshisa emihlubulweni yam, Akukho ndawo iphilileyo enyameni yam.
19_38_8_Ndiqobekile, ndityumkile kakhulu; Ndibhongiswa kukugcuma kwentliziyo yam.
19_38_9_Nkosi yam, uphambi kwakho wonke umnqweno wam, Nokuncwina kwam akusithele kuwe.
19_38_10_Iphaphu lam liyabetha, ndiphelelwe ngamandla; Ukukhanya kwamehlo am, nako oko, akukho kum.
19_38_11_Abandithandayo nowethu bamele mgama ekubethweni kwam,  Nezalamane zam zimi kude.
19_38_12_Bandithiyele abafuna umphefumlo wam; Abangxamele ukuba ndihlelwe bububi bathetha izinto zokweyelisela, Bacamanga inkohliso imini yonke.
19_38_13_Ke mna ndinjengesithulu, andiva; Njengesidenge esingawuvuliyo umlomo waso.
19_38_14_Ndinjengomntu ongeva nto, Omlomo ungenakuthethisa.
19_38_15_Ngokuba ndilindele kuwe, Yehova; Kuya kuphendula wena,  Nkosi yam, Thixo wam,
19_38_16_Ngokuba ndithi, Hleze bandivuyelele Bona abo bangazikhulisayo kum ekutyibilikeni konyawo lwam.
19_38_17_Ngokuba ndihlalele ukujingxela, Umvandedwa wam uphambi kwam amaxesha onke.
19_38_18_Ngokuba ndiya kubuxela ubugwenxa bam; Ndinesithukuthezi ngenxa yesono sam.
19_38_19_Ke zona iintshaba zam ziphilile, ziziimfidi; Baninzi abandithiyileyo bexoka;
19_38_20_Abandibuyekeza ngobubi esikhundleni sokulungileyo Bayandichasa, ngenxa yokuphuthuma kwam okulungileyo.
19_38_21_Musa ukundishiya, Yehova; Thixo wam, musa ukuba kude nam.
19_38_22_Khawuleza undincede, Nkosi yam, Msindisi wam.
19_39_1_Kumongameli, kuYedutun. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndathi, Ndiya kuzigcina iindlela zam, Ndingoni ngolwimi lwam; Ndiya kuwugcina ngokuwubopha umlomo wam, Xa ongendawo asephambi kwam.
19_39_2_Ndaba sisidenge, ndathozama, Ndazisulungisa nakokulungileyo; Wagxobha-gxobheka umvandedwa wam.
19_39_3_Yaba nobushushu intliziyo yam phakathi kwam, Ekucamangeni kwam wavutha umlilo. Ndathetha ke ngolwimi lwam,
19_39_4_Ndathi, Ndazise, Yehova, isiphelo sam, Nomlinganiso wemihla yam, into oyiyo; Mandikwazi ukunqamka kwam, into okuyiyo.
19_39_5_Yabona, uyenze imihla yam yangangobubanzi besandla; Nobomi bam bunjengento engento phambi kwakho; Ngumphunga nje bonke abantu, nakuba bemi. (Phakamisani.)
19_39_6_Uhamba-hamba umntu enjengesithunzi nje kodwa; Baxokozela ngomphunga nje kodwa; Bafumba, bengazi ukuba ngubani na oya kukuhlanganisa.
19_39_7_Ngoku ndiya kuthembela kwintoni na, Nkosi yam? Ukulinda kwam kukuwe.
19_39_8_Ndihlangule elukreqweni lwam lonke; Musa ukundimisela ingcikivo yesidenge.
19_39_9_Ndisisidenge, umlomo wam andiwuvuli, Ngokuba oko kwenziwe nguwe.
19_39_10_Sisuse kum isibetho sakho; Mna ndiyaphela kukutyundyutha kwesandla sakho.
19_39_11_Wakumthethisa umntu ngezohlwayo ngenxa yobugwenxa,  Uyasonakalisa njengenundu isoya sakhe; Bangumphunga nje kodwa bonke abantu. (Phakamisani.)
19_39_12_Yiva umthandazo wam, Yehova, Kubekele indlebe ukuzibika kwam. Musa ukuthi tu ezinyembezini zam; Ngokuba ndingumphambukeli kuwe, Undwendwe, njengoobawo bonke.
19_39_13_Bheka phaya, ungandikhangeli, khendincumeze, Ndingekemki ndingabi sabakho.
19_40_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndathembela, ndithembele kuYehova, Wathoba, wakuva ukuzibika kwam.
19_40_2_Wandirhola emhadini wentshabalalo, naseludakeni lomgxobhozo, Wazimisa eliweni iinyawo zam, wakuqinisa ukunyathela kwam.
19_40_3_Wabeka emlonyeni wam ingoma entsha, indumiso kuThixo wethu;  Abaninzi bayabona, boyike, Bakholose ngoYehova.
19_40_4_Hayi, uyolo lwendoda emenze uYehova inkoloseko yayo,  Ingabheki kwabagwagwisayo, nakubanxaxhi abanamanga!
19_40_5_Yehova, Thixo wam, wena wenze okuninzi ngemisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo, Nangeengcinga zakho kuthi; Akukho nto inokulinganiswa nawe; Okanye bendiya kuyixela, ndithethe ngayo;  Ke ziyinkohla engenakubalwa.
19_40_6_Akunanze mbingelelo namnikelo wakudla; Iindlebe zam uzivulile; Akubizi dini linyukayo nadini lasono.
19_40_7_Ndaza ndathi, Yabona, Ndiyeza; encwadini esongwayo kubhaliwe ngam.
19_40_8_Ukwenza okulikholo kuwe, Thixo wam, ndikunanzile; Nomyalelo wakho usezibilinini zam ngaphakathi.
19_40_9_Ndashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobulungisa ebandleni elikhulu; Yabona, andiwuthintelanga umlomo wam; Yehova, wena uyazi.
19_40_10_Ubulungisa bakho andibugqumanga phakathi kwentliziyo yam;  Ndakukhankanya ukuthembeka kwakho nosindiso lwakho;  Andiyikhanyelanga inceba yakho nenyaniso yakho ebandleni elikhulu.
19_40_11_Wena, Yehova, akuyi kuzithintela iimfesane zakho kum;  Inceba yakho nenyaniso yakho iya kuhlala indilondoloza.
19_40_12_Ngokuba zindijikele izinto ezimbi, ezide azaba nakubalwa;  Bundifikele ubugwenxa bam, andinakubukhangela; Buninzi kuneenwele zentloko yam; Ndimkelwe yintliziyo.
19_40_13_Ngamana, Yehova, wandihlangula; Yehova, wakhawuleza wandinceda!
19_40_14_Mabadane babe neentloni kuphele Abazungula umphefumlo wam ukuze bawuphephethe; Mababuye muva bahlazeke
19_40_15_Mabamangaliswe ngumvuzo wehlazo labo Abathi kum, Tshotsho!  Tshotsho!
19_40_16_Mababe nemihlali bavuye ngawe bonke abakufunayo,  Abaluthandayo usindiso lwakho bahlale besithi, Makenziwe mkhulu uYehova.
19_40_17_Mna ke ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu; INkosi iya kundikhumbulela. Umncedi wam nomsindisi wam nguwe; Thixo wam,  musa ukulibala.
19_41_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Hayi, uyolo lwalowo unyamekela ihlwempu! Ngomhla wobubi uYehova uya kumhlangula.
19_41_2_UYehova uya kumlondoloza amgcine, aphile. Kuya kuthiwa unoyolo yena ehlabathini; Ungamnikeli elitheni leentshaba zakhe.
19_41_3_UYehova uya kumxhasa elukhukweni lobulwelwe; Uya kuluguqula ukhuko lwakhe lonke esifeni sakhe.
19_41_4_Ndithi mna, Yehova, tarhu; Philisa umphefumlo wam, ngokuba ndonile kuwe.
19_41_5_Iintshaba zam zithetha kakubi ngam; Zithi, Uya kufa nini na, lidake igama lakhe?
19_41_6_Nothe weza kundilunguza, uthetha into ekhohlakeleyo;  Intliziyo yakhe ibutha ubutshinga; Uphuma phandle, abuthethe.
19_41_7_Basebezelana ngam bonke abandithiyayo; Bacinga ububi ngam.
19_41_8_Bathi, Unanyekwe bubutshijolo, Engoleleyo nje, akayi kubuya avuke.
19_41_9_Kwanendoda ebixolelene nam, ebe ndikholose ngayo, Ebisidla isonka sam, indiphakamisele isithende sayo.
19_41_10_Wena Yehova, ndibabale, undiphakamise, Ndibabuyekeze.
19_41_11_Ndazi ngale nto, ukuba undinonelele, Yokokuba lungenakundidumela utshaba lwam.
19_41_12_Mna ekugqibeleleni kwam uyandixhasa, Undimisa phambi kwakho ngonaphakade.
19_41_13_Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni. Amen, amen.
19_42_1_Kumongameli: eyokuqiqa; eyoonyana bakaKora. Njengexhama elitsalela emifuleni yamanzi, Wenjenjalo ukutsalela kuwe,  Thixo, umphefumlo wam.
19_42_2_Umphefumlo wam unxanela uThixo, uThixo ophilileyo; Ndiya kufika nini na, ndibonakale ebusweni bukaThixo?
19_42_3_Iinyembezi zam zaba kukudla kwam imini nobusuku, Bakuthi kum imihla yonke, Uphi na uThixo wakho?
19_42_4_Ndikhumbula oku, ndiwuphalazela kum umphefumlo wam,  Ukuhamba kwam nezihlwele ndisiya endlwini kaThixo, Sinezwi lokumemelela nokubulela, siyingxokolo evuyayo.
19_42_5_Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam; Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.
19_42_6_Thixo wam, umphefumlo wam usibekekile kum; ngenxa yoko ndikhumbula wena Ezweni laseYordan, nakweleHermon, entabeni yeMitsare.
19_42_7_Amanzi anzongonzongo abiza amanzi anzongonzongo ngesandi seengxangxasi zakho; Onke amaza akho alwayo, amaza akho agugumayo, adlule phezu kwam.
19_42_8_Emini uYehova uya kuyiwisela umthetho inceba yakhe,  Nasebusuku ukuvuma ngaye kunam, Ukuthandaza kuThixo wobomi bam.
19_42_9_Ndithi ke kuThixo oyingxondorha yam, Undilibele ngani na?  Ndihambelani na ngezimnyama zokuzila ngokuxina kotshaba?
19_42_10_Ngento ephehlayo emathanjeni am, bayandingcikiva abandibandezelayo, Ngokuthi kwabo kum imihla yonke, Uphi na uThixo wakho?
19_42_11_Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam; Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.
19_43_1_Lithethe ityala lam, Thixo, ubambane ngenxa yam nohlanga olungenanceba; Ndisindise endodeni ekhohlisayo, enobugqwetha.
19_43_2_Ngokuba unguThixo oyinqaba yam; undihlambelani na?  Ndihambelani na ngezimnyama zokuzila, ngokuxina kotshaba?
19_43_3_Thuma ukukhanya kwakho nenyaniso yakho, zindikhaphe,  Zindise entabeni yakho engcwele, Naseminqubeni yakho.
19_43_4_Ndoya ke esibingelelweni sikaThixo, KuThixo wovuyo lwam olugcobayo, Ndibulele kuwe ngohadi, Thixo onguThixo wam.
19_43_5_Kungani na ukuba usibekeke, mphefumlo wam? Kungani na ukuba ugule ngaphakathi kwam? Lindela kuThixo, ngokuba ndisaya kubuya ndibulele kuye, Olusindiso lobuso bam, noThixo wam.
19_44_1_Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora: eyokuqiqa. Thixo, sivile ngeendlebe zethu, oobawo basibalisela, Ngomsebenzi owawenza ngemihla yabo, ngemihla yamandulo:
19_44_2_Okokuba isandla sakho sagqogqa iintlanga, sabatyala bona;  Saviva izizwe, sabanabisa bona.
19_44_3_Ngokuba abalihluthanga ilizwe ngekrele labo,  Abazisindisanga ngengalo yabo; Sisandla sakho sokunene, nengalo yakho, nokukhanya kobuso bakho; Ngokuba wawunesisa kubo.
19_44_4_Wena unguKumkani wam, Thixo; Yitsho lubekho usindiso kuYakobi.
19_44_5_Ngawe sobangqula abasibandezelayo; Egameni lakho sobagqusha abasukela phezulu kuthi.
19_44_6_Ngokuba andikholose ngasaphetha sam; Andisindiswa ngakrele lam.
19_44_7_Hayi! Nguwe osisindisayo kwabasibandezelayo, Ubadanise abasithiyileyo.
19_44_8_NgoThixo sidumisa imihla yonke, Sibulele kwigama lakho ngonaphakade. (Phakamisani.)
19_44_9_Noko ke usihlambile, usihlazile, Akwaphuma nemikhosi yethu.
19_44_10_Usibuyise umva phambi kombandezeli; Abasithiyileyo basiphangile okwabo.
19_44_11_Wasinikela njengeegusha ezidliwayo; Wasichitha-chitha ezintlangeni;
19_44_12_Wathengisa ngabantu bakho, akwazuza, Akwalinyusa ixabiso labo.
19_44_13_Wasenza isingcikivo kubamelwane bethu, Isigculelo nesicukucezo kwabasijikelezileyo.
19_44_14_Wasenza umzekelo ezintlangeni, Abokuhlunguzelelwa intloko ezizweni.
19_44_15_Yonke imihla ihlazo lam liphambi kwam, Nokudana kobuso bam kundigubungele,
19_44_16_Ngenxa yezwi lomngcikivi nomnyelisi, Ngenxa yokukhangela kotshaba nomphindezeli.
19_44_17_Oko konke kusifikele, asikulibalanga wena, Asixokanga emnqophisweni wakho;
19_44_18_Ayibuyanga umva intliziyo yethu, Ukunyathela kwethu akuthanga gu bucala emendweni wakho;
19_44_19_Ukuba usityumze endaweni yeempungutye, Usigubungele ngethunzi lokufa.
19_44_20_Ukuba besililibele igama loThixo wethu, Sazolulela kuthixo wasemzini izandla zethu,
19_44_21_Ubengayi kuyigoca-goca na uThixo loo nto, Ngokuba ezazi iindawo ezifihlakeleyo zentliziyo?
19_44_22_Hayi, Ngenxa yakho sibulawa imihla yonke; Kuthiwa siziigusha zokuxhelwa.
19_44_23_Vuka, ulaleleni na, Nkosi yam? Qabuka, ungasihlambi kuphele.
19_44_24_Ubusitheliselani na ubuso bakho, Ukulibale ukucinezelwa kwethu, nokuxinwa kwethu?
19_44_25_Ngokuba usibekeke eluthulini umphefumlo wethu, Sanamathela emhlabeni isisu sethu.
19_44_26_Khawusuk ume usincede, Usikhulule ngenxa yenceba yakho.
19_45_1_Kumongameli: ngeyeenyibiba. Eyoonyana bakaKora; eyokuqiqa.  Ingoma yeentanda. Intliziyo yam iphuphuma ilizwi elihle,  Ndisithi, Into endiyenzayo isingise kukumkani; Ulwimi lwam lusiba lombhali okhawulezayo.
19_45_2_Umhle wamhle ngaphezu koonyana babantu; Kugalelwe ubumnandi emlonyeni wakho; Ngenxa yoko ukusikelele uThixo wakho ngonaphakade.
19_45_3_Bhinqa ikrele lakho ethangeni, gorha, Bhinqa indili yakho nobungangamela bakho.
19_45_4_Tyhudisa, ukhwele uhambe, unobungangamela bakho, Ngenxa yenyaniso, nolulamo olunobulungisa. Sikuyale ngezinto ezoyikekayo isandla sakho sokunene.
19_45_5_Iintolo zakho zitsolile; Kuya kuwa izizwe phantsi kwakho;  Zitsolile entliziyweni yeentshaba zokumkani.
19_45_6_Itrone yakho, itrone kaThixo, ingunaphakade kanaphakade;  Yintonga ethe tye intonga yobukumkani bakho.
19_45_7_Uthanda ubulungisa, uthiye okungendawo; Ngenxa yoko ukuthambisile uThixo, uThixo wakho, Ngeoli yemihlali ngaphezu kwabalingane bakho.
19_45_8_Ziyimore nehaloti nekasiya iingubo zakho zonke; Emabhotweni eempondo zeendlovu uhadi lukuvuyisile.
19_45_9_Kukho iintombi zokumkani phakathi kwabathandekayo bakho;  Ukumkanikazi umi ngasekunene kwakho, Enxibe igolide ecikizekileyo yakwaOfire.
19_45_10_Yiva, ntombi, ubone, uthobe indlebe yakho, Ubalibale abantu bakowenu, nendlu kayihlo;
19_45_11_Akubunqwenela ubunzwakazi bakho ukumkani, Woqubuda kuye,  ngokuba eyinkosi yakho.
19_45_12_Intombi enguTire, izityebi zabantu, Ziya kukuncekelela ngomnikelo.
19_45_13_Bubuyokoyoko bodwa intombi yokumkani kweliphakathi igumbi.  Isambatho sayo sesilukwe igolide.
19_45_14_Isiwa kukumkani ineengubo ezimfakamfele; Ziyilandela iintombi ezingowayo, Zisiwa kuwe,
19_45_15_Zisiwa ngovuyo nangomgcobo, Zingene ebhotweni lokumkani.
19_45_16_Endaweni yooyihlo iya kuba ngoonyana bakho; Uya kubamisa babe ngabathetheli ehlabathini lonke.
19_45_17_Ndiya kulikhankanya igama lakho kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana zonke; Ngenxa yoko izizwe ziya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_46_1_Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora; ngeyeentombi. Ingoma.  UThixo ulihlathi, uligwiba kuthi; Ezimbandezelweni ufumaneke eluncedo kunene.
19_46_2_Ngenxa yoko asoyiki ekuphendukeni kwehlabathi,  Ekudilikeleni kweentaba esazulwini solwandle.
19_46_3_Makagqume alephuze amanzi alo, Iintaba zinyikime ngokukratsha kwalo. (Phakamisani.)
19_46_4_Kukho umlambo ozibhaxa zivuyisa umzi kaThixo, Ingcwele yeminquba yOsenyangweni.
19_46_5_UThixo uphakathi kwawo, awushukunyiswa; UThixo uyawunceda kwasekuzeni kokusa.
19_46_6_Ziyaxokozela iintlanga, ziyashukuma izikumkani: Ukhupha izwi lakhe, linyibilike ihlabathi.
19_46_7_UYehova wemikhosi unathi, Ingxonde yethu nguThixo kaYakobi.  (Phakamisani.)
19_46_8_Yizani nikhangele imisebenzi kaYehova: Owenze iziphanziso ehlabathini;
19_46_9_Ulophelisa iimfazwe kude kuse eziphelweni zehlabathi;  Waphula isaphetha, angqumze umkhonto, Atshise iinqwelo zokulwa ngomlilo.
19_46_10_Yekani, nazi ukuba ndinguThixo mna. Ndiya kuphakanyiswa ezintlangeni, ndiya kuphakanyiswa ehlabathini.
19_46_11_UYehova wemikhosi unathi, Ingxonde yethu nguThixo kaYakobi. (Phakamisani.)
19_47_1_Kumongameli; eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Nonke zizwe,  bethani izandla, Dumani kuThixo ngezwi lokumemelela.
19_47_2_Ngokuba uYehova Osenyangweni uyoyikeka; Ngukumkani omkhulu ehlabathini lonke.
19_47_3_Uzikhandanisela phantsi kwethu izizwe, Izizwe phantsi kweenyawo zethu.
19_47_4_Usinyulela ilifa lethu, Iqhayiya likaYakobi awamthandayo.  (Phakamisani.)
19_47_5_UThixo unyukile, kudunywa; Unyukile uYehova, kuhlokoma isigodlo.
19_47_6_Mbetheleni uhadi uThixo, mbetheleni, Mbetheleni uhadi uKumkani wethu, mbetheleni!
19_47_7_Ngokuba uKumkani wehlabathi lonke nguThixo; Mbetheleni ngeyokuqiqa.
19_47_8_UThixo nguKumkani weentlanga; UThixo uhleli etroneni yakhe engcwele.
19_47_9_Amanene ezizwe ahlanganisene, Abantu boThixo ka-Abraham;  Ngokuba iingweletshetshe zehlabathi zezikaThixo; Unyusiwe kakhulu yena.
19_48_1_Ingoma. Umhobe. Eyoonyana babaKora. Mkhulu uYehova,  engowokudunyiswa kunene Emzini kaThixo wethu, entabeni yakhe engcwele.
19_48_2_Intle ukuphakama kwayo, yimihlali yehla bathi lonke Intaba yaseZiyon, intlomo yasentla, Umzi woKumkani omkhulu.
19_48_3_UThixo, ezingxandeni zawo ezinde, Wazelwa ukuba yingxonde.
19_48_4_Kuba nabo ookumkani babenqophisene, Bawela beza kunye;
19_48_5_Bakuthi ukubona, abakhuluma; Bakhwankqa, babaleka buphuthuphuthu;
19_48_6_Babanjwa khona kukuthuthumela, Kukuzibhijabhija njengozalayo.
19_48_7_Ngomoya wasempumalanga Uyazivitha iinqanawa zaseTarshishe.
19_48_8_Njengoko sikuvileyo, sibone kunjalo Emzini kaYehova wemikhosi, emzini kaThixo wethu: UThixo uyawuzinzisa ngonaphakade. (Phakamisani.)
19_48_9_Sayikhumbula, Thixo, inceba yakho Phakathi kwetempile yakho.
19_48_10_Njengoko linjalo igama lakho, Thixo, Lunjalo udumiso lwakho, Kwesa eziphelweni zehlabathi; Isandla sakho sokunene sizele bubulungisa.
19_48_11_Mayivuye intaba yaseZiyon, Agcobe amagxamesi akwaYuda,  Ngenxa yezigwebo zakho.
19_48_12_Yijikelezeni iZiyon, niyizunguleze; Zibaleni iinqaba zayo ezinde.
19_48_13_Gqalani ungqameko lomsele wayo; Candani ezingxandeni zayo ezinde; Ukuze nibalisele isizukulwana esizayo,
19_48_14_Ukuba lo Thixo nguThixo wethu ngonaphakade kanaphakade,  Yena uya kusikhapha kude kuse ekufeni.
19_49_1_Kumongameli: eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Yivani oku, nina nonke zizwe; Bekani indlebe, nina nonke, bemi beli phakade,
19_49_2_Nina nyana boluntu, nani nyana bamadoda, Nina zityebi, nani mahlwempu kunye.
19_49_3_Umlomo wam uza kuthetha ubulumko; Nokucamanga kwentliziyo yam kukuqonda.
19_49_4_Ndiya kuyithobela emzekelisweni indlebe yam, Ndiya kuyivulela ngohadi intsonkotha yam.
19_49_5_Ndoyikelani na emihleni yobubi, Xa ubugwenxa babandibambisayo bundijikelayo?
19_49_6_Abo bakholose ngemfuyo yabo, Baqhayisa ngobuninzi bobutyebi babo.
19_49_7_Akukho bani unokukhulula umzalwana; Akanakumnika uThixo isicamagusho ngaye
19_49_8_(Sinqabile isikhululo somphefumlo wabo, Masincanywe ngonaphakade),
19_49_9_Sokuba ahlale esidla ubomi ngamaxesha onke, Angasiboni isihogo.
19_49_10_Ngokuba ubona izilumko zibhubha, Bedaka kunye abanyabileyo nezityhakala, Bayishiye nabanye imfuyo yabo.
19_49_11_Imbilini yabo ithi izindlu zabo zingunaphakade. Iminquba yabo ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana; Bayithiya imihlaba yabo ngamagama abo.
19_49_12_Ke umntu enobuhandiba akanakuhlala, Ufana neenkomo ezi zitshabalalayo.
19_49_13_Yiyo le indlela yabanyabileyo, Neyabo babalandelayo,  bekholiswa ngumlomo wabo. (Phakamisani.)
19_49_14_Babuthe ngokweegusha kwelabafileyo; Ukufa kuyabalusa;  Abathe tye bayabanyathela kwakusa; Isithomo sabo abo siyonakala kwelabafileyo, singabi nandawo yakuhlala.
19_49_15_Kodwa uThixo uya kuwukhulula umphefumlo wam esandleni selabafileyo, Ngokuba eya kundithabatha. (Phakamisani.)
19_49_16_Musa ukoyika, yakuba sisityebi indoda, Bakwanda ubuqaqawuli bendlu yayo:
19_49_17_Ngokuba ekufeni kwayo ayiyi kuthabatha nento, Aluyi kuhla emva kwayo uzuko lwayo.
19_49_18_Nakuba umntu ekudleni kwakhe ubomi ebewusikelela umphefumlo wakhe, Bekudumisa ngokuzichwayithisa kwakho,
19_49_19_Uya kuya noko esizukulwaneni sooyise; Abayikukubona ukukhanya naphakade.
19_49_20_Ke umntu onobuhandiba, abe engaqondi, Ufana neenkomo ezi zitshabalalayo.
19_50_1_Umhobe ka-Asafu. UThixo, uThixo uYehova uyathetha;  Uyalibiza ihlabathi, ethabathela ekuphumeni kwelanga esisa ekutshoneni kwalo.
19_50_2_EZiyon, ukuphela kweenzwana, Uyakhazimla uThixo.
19_50_3_Uyeza uThixo wethu, akayi kuthi cwaka. Kudla umlilo phambi kwakhe, Ngeenxa zonke kuye sisaqhwithi esikhulu.
19_50_4_Ubiza izulu phezulu, Nehlabathi, ukuba agwebe phakathi kwabantu bakhe.
19_50_5_Uthi, Bahlanganiseleni kum abam benceba, Abenze umnqophiso nam ngombingelelo.
19_50_6_Izulu lixela ubulungisa bakhe, Ngokuba uThixo eza kugweba yena. (Phakamisani.)
19_50_7_Yivani, bantu bam, ndithethe; Sirayeli, ndiqononondise kuwe; NdinguThixo, uThixo wakho.
19_50_8_Andikohlwayi ngenxa yemibingelelo yakho, Namadini akho anyukayo aphambi kwam amaxesha onke.
19_50_9_Andiyi kuthabatha zinkunzi zankomo endlwini yakho,  Nazinkunzi zabhokhwe esibayeni sakho.
19_50_10_Ngokuba zezam zonke iinyamakazi zehlathi, Neenkomo ezisezintabeni eziliwaka.
19_50_11_Iintaka zonke zasezintabeni ndiyazazi, Nento edakasa endle inam.
19_50_12_Ukuba bendilambile, ndibe ndingayi kukuxelela; Ngokuba lelam elimiweyo nenzaliseko yalo.
19_50_13_Ndidle inyama yeenkunzi eziziimbalasane na? Ndisele igazi leenkunzi zeebhokhwe na?
19_50_14_Bingelela kuYehova umbulelo, Uzizalise kOsenyangweni izibhambathiso zakho;
19_50_15_Ubize mna ngemini yembandezelo, Ndikuhlangule, undizukise.
19_50_16_Ke kongendawo uthi uThixo, Useke phi na wena ukuxela ummiselo wam, Uwuphathe ngomlomo wakho umnqophiso wam,
19_50_17_Uyithiyile nje intethiso wena, Uwaphose nje amazwi am emva kwakho?
19_50_18_Xa ubona isela, ukholana nalo, Wabelane nabakrexezi.
19_50_19_Umlomo wakho uwuyekela ebubini; Ulwimi lwakho luthungela inkohliso;
19_50_20_Uthi uhlale uthethe ngomzalwana wakho, Uhlaze umntwana kanyoko.
19_50_21_Uzenzile ezo nto, ndathi tu, Waba ndinjengawe. Ndiya kukohlwaya ndizicwangcise emehlweni akho.
19_50_22_Khaniqonde ke oko, nina bamlibalayo uThixo, Hleze ndiqwenge, kungabikho uhlangulayo.
19_50_23_Obingelela umbulelo uyandizukisa, Alungise indlela,  Endombonisa kuyo usindiso lukaThixo.
19_51_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide: ekuzeni kukaNatan umprofeti kuye, emveni kokuba ebengene uBhatshebha. Tarhu, Thixo,  ngokwenceba yakho! Ngokobuninzi benceba yakho, cima ukreqo lwam!
19_51_2_Ndixovule kunene, busuke ubugwenxa bam, Undihlambulule esonweni sam.
19_51_3_Ngokuba ndiyalwazi mna ukreqo lwam, Nesono sam siphambi kwam ngamaxesha onke.
19_51_4_Ndonile kuwe, kuwe wedwa, Ndenza okubi emehlweni akho;  Ukuze ube lilungisa ekuthetheni kwakho, Ucace ekugwebeni kwakho.
19_51_5_Uyabona, ndizalelwe ebugwenxeni, Ndakhawulwa nguma esonweni.
19_51_6_Uyabona, ufuna inyaniso ezintsweni, Esitheni undazisa ubulumko.
19_51_7_Ndihlambulule isono ngehisope, ndihlambuluke; Ndixovule,  ndibe mhlophe kunekhephu;
19_51_8_Ndivise imihlali nemivuyo, Agcobe amathambo owacolileyo.
19_51_9_Sithelisa ubuso bakho ezonweni zam, Ubucime bonke ubugwenxa bam.
19_51_10_Dala phakathi kwam, Thixo, intliziyo ehlambulukileyo,  Uhlaziye umoya oqinisekileyo phakathi kwam.
19_51_11_Musa ukundilahla ebusweni bakho, UMoya wakho oyiNgcwele ungamsusi kum.
19_51_12_Buyisela kum imihlali yosindiso lwakho, Undixhase ngomoya wentumekelelo.
19_51_13_Ndobafundisa abangendawo iindlela zakho, Babuyele kuwe aboni.
19_51_14_Ndihlangule emagazini, Thixo, Thixo ondisindisayo;  Lomemelela ngobulungisa bakho ulwimi lwam.
19_51_15_Nkosi yam, vula imilebe yomlomo wam, Uyixele indumiso yakho umlomo wam.
19_51_16_Ngokuba akunanze mibingelelo, bendiya kukunika; Akalikholo kuwe amadini anyukayo.
19_51_17_Imibingelelo kaThixo ngumoya owaphukileyo, Intliziyo eyaphukileyo, etyumkileyo, Thixo, akuyi kuyidela.
19_51_18_Yenzele okulungileyo iZiyon ngokukholekileyo kuwe; Yakha iindonga zeYerusalem.
19_51_19_Kuya kwandula ukuba mnandi kuwe imibingelelo yobulungisa,  amadini apheleleyo; Ziya kwandula ukunyuswa iinkunzi ezintsha zeenkomo esibingelelweni sakho.
19_52_1_Kumongameli. Eyokuqiqa: ekaDavide: oko uDowegi umEdom waya waxelela uSawule, wathi kuye, UDavide ungene endlwini ka-Ahimeleki. Uqhayiselani na ngobubi, wena gorha? Inceba kaThixo ikho imihla yonke.
19_52_2_Ulwimi lwakho lucinga ukweyelisela, Njengesitshetshe sokuguya iindevu esiloliweyo, wena mkhohlisi.
19_52_3_Uthanda okubi kunokulungileyo; Ubuxoki, kunokuthetha ubulungisa. (Phakamisani.)
19_52_4_Uthanda onke amazwi aginyayo, Lulwimindini lukhohlisayo.
19_52_5_Naye uThixo uya kukudiliza kuphele; Uva kukuxwila,  akuncothule ententeni, Akudonyule ezweni labaphilileyo.  (Phakamisani.)
19_52_6_Obona amalungisa, oyike, Amhleke, athi,
19_52_7_Nanko umfo ongamenzanga igwiba lakhe uThixo, Owakholosa ngobuninzi bobutyebi bakhe, Waba nengcwangu ekweyeliseleni kwakhe.
19_52_8_Ke mna ndinjengomnquma oluhlaza endlwini kaThixo;  Ndikholose ngenceba kaThixo ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_52_9_Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade, kuba ukwenzile oku; Ndiya kuthemba igama lakho, ngokuba lilungile, phambi kwabenceba bakho.
19_53_1_Kumongameli: ngeyokhuzo. Eyokuqiqa; ekaDavide. Sithi isidenge entliziyweni yaso, Akukho Thixo. Bonakalisile,  balisikizi ngobugqwetha babo; Akukho wenza okulungileyo.
19_53_2_UThixo esemazulwini uqondele koonyana babantu, Ukubona ukuba ukho na oqiqayo, Ofuna uThixo.
19_53_3_Bonke babuye umva, bayimbozisa bephelele; Akukho wenza okulungileyo, Akukho nokuba abe mnye.
19_53_4_Abanakwazi na abasebenzi bobutshinga, Abathi, bebadla abantu bam, bathi badla isonka, Bangamnquli uThixo?
19_53_5_Apho bankwantya benkwantyile, phofu kungekho nto inkwantyisayo; Ngokuba uThixo wawathi saa amathambo omngqingi wakho; Wabadanisa, ngokuba uThixo ebebacekisile.
19_53_6_Akwaba bekuvela eZiyon ukusindiswa kwamaSirayeli!  Ekubuyiseni kukaThixo abantu bakhe ekuthinjweni, Wogcoba uYakobi, avuye uSirayeli.
19_54_1_Eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Kumongameli.  Eyokuqiqa. EkaDavide: ekufikeni kwabaseZifi, bathi kuSawule,  UDavide akazimele phakathi kwethu na? Thixo, ndisindise ngegama lakho, Uligwebe ityala lam ngobugorha bakho.
19_54_2_Thixo, yiva umthandazo wam; Wabekele indlebe amazwi omlomo wam.
19_54_3_Ngokuba abasemzini basukela phezulu kum,  Nabanobungqwangangqwili bafuna umphefumlo wam; Abammisi uThixo phambi kwabo. (Phakamisani.)
19_54_4_Yabona, uThixo ngumncedi wam; INkosi yam ikwabasekela umphefumlo wam.
19_54_5_Uya kubuyisela ububi kwabandilalelayo; Ngenyaniso yakho babhangise.
19_54_6_Ndiya kubingelela kuwe ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo; Ndiya kubulela kwigama lakho, Yehova, kuba lilungile.
19_54_7_Ngokuba lindihlangule embandezelweni yonke; Iliso lam libonela iintshaba zam.
19_55_1_Kumongameli. Eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo.  Eyokuqiqa: ekaDavide. Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam, Thixo,  Musa ukuzifihla esikhungweni sam.
19_55_2_Ndibazele indlebe undiphendule. Ndiyaphaphatheka ekucamngceni kwam, ndincwine,
19_55_3_Ngenxa yelizwi lotshaba, Ngenxa yokuxinzelelwa phantsi ngabangendawo; Ngokuba zindiqengqela ubutshinga, Ziyandisukela ngomsindo.
19_55_4_Intliziyo yam iyazibhija-bhija phakathi kwam; Izothuso zokufa zindiwele.
19_55_5_Ukoyika nokuthuthumela kundingene; Ndigutyungelwe kukududuzela.
19_55_6_Ndathi, Andaba bendinamaphiko njengehobe! Bendiya kubaleka ndiye ndihlale!
19_55_7_Nanko ndibalekela kude, Ndilalise entlango. (Phakamisani.)
19_55_8_Bendiya kukhawuleza, ndisinde Emoyeni ovuthuzayo naseluqhwitheleni.
19_55_9_Tshabalalisa, Nkosi yam, yahlula ulwimi lwazo; Ngokuba ndibone ukugonyamela nokubambana phakathi komzi.
19_55_10_Imini nobusuku bajikeleza ezindongeni zawo; Ubutshinga nokwaphula kuphakathi kwawo;
19_55_11_Ukweyelisela kuphakathi kwawo; Endaweni yembutho yawo akusuki ukuxinezela nokukhohlisa.
19_55_12_Ngokuba asilutshaba olu lundingcikivayo; Bendiya kukuthwala oko. Asingondithiyileyo lo uzikhulisayo kum; Bendiya kusithela kuye.
19_55_13_Nguwe, mntu ubungumlingane wam, Ikholwane lam endazana nalo,
19_55_14_Ebesicweya kamnandi, Siye endlwini kaThixo silihlokondiba eligcobayo.
19_55_15_Ukufa makubaqubule, Mabehle baye kwelabafileyo besaphilile; Ngokuba ububi busemizini yabo phakathi kwabo.
19_55_16_Mna ndinqula uThixo; UYehova uya kundisindisa.
19_55_17_Ngokuhlwa, nakusasa, nasemini enkulu ndiya kucamngca,  ndincwine; Uya kuliva izwi lam.
19_55_18_Uwukhulula umphefumlo wam unoxolo, ukuze bangasondeli kum,  Ngokuba baninzi abandichasayo.
19_55_19_UThixo uya kuva, abaphendule, Uselokwamandulo ehleli,  (Phakamisani.) Abo bangenanguquko, Bangamoyikiyo uThixo.
19_55_20_Babasa isandla abaxolelene nabo; Bahlambela umnqophiso wabo;
19_55_21_Ubuthelezi njengamasi umlomo wabo, Ke yimfazwe intliziyo yabo. Athambile amazwi abongaphezu kweoli, Kanti aziintlangothi zekrele.
19_55_22_Umthwalo wakho wulahlele kuYehova; yena wokuzimasa; Akayi kuliyekela ilungisa lishukunyiswe naphakade.
19_55_23_Wena ke, Thixo, uya kubahlisela emngxunyeni wesihogo.  Abantu bamagazi nenkohliso abayi kuyiqingathisa imihla yabo; Ke mna ndikholose ngawe.
19_56_1_Kumongameli; ngeyehobe elithe cwaka phakathi kwabakude.  EkaDavide. Eliligugu. Ukubanjwa kwakhe ngamaFilisti eGati.  Ndibabale, Thixo, ngokuba abantu bendizonda; Bandixinile,  besilwa yonke imini;
19_56_2_Abandilalelayo bandizonda yonke imini, Ngokuba baninzi abalwa nam beziphakamisile.
19_56_3_Mhlana ndinxunguphalayo mna, Ndokholosa ngawe.
19_56_4_Ndiya kulidumisa ngoThixo ilizwi lakhe, Ndikholose ngoThixo, ndingoyiki; Inokundenza ntoni na inyama?
19_56_5_Yonke imini bayawaphambanisa amazwi am; Zingam zonke iingcinga zabo zobubi.
19_56_6_Baqukene, babonisele, Bona bagcine izithende zam, Ngokokuba belinde umphefumlo wam.
19_56_7_Bengamatshinga nje, bosinda na? Zihlise ngomsindo izizwe,  Thixo.
19_56_8_Ukuphalaphala kwam ukubhalile wena; Yitha iinyembezi zam entsubeni yakho; Azisencwadini yakho na?
19_56_9_Ziya kubuya umva ke iintshaba zam, mhlana ndibizayo;  Ndiyakwazi oku, ukuba uThixo unam.
19_56_10_Ndilidumisa ngoThixo ilizwi, Ndilidumisa ngoYehova ilizwi.
19_56_11_Ndikholose ngoThixo, ndingoyiki; Unokundenza ntoni na umntu?
19_56_12_Ziphezu kwam, Thixo, izibhambathiso zakho; Ndiya kuyizalisa kuwe imibingelelo yombulelo.
19_56_13_Ngokuba uwuhlangule ekufeni umphefumlo wam, Iinyawo zam ekukhubekeni, Ukuba ndihambe phambi koThixo Ekukhanyeni kobomi.
19_57_1_Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu:  ekumbalekeni kwakhe uSawule emqolombeni. Ndibabale, Thixo,  ndibabale; Ngokuba uzimela ngawe umphefumlo wam; Ndizimela esithunzini samaphiko akho, Kude kudlule inkxwaleko.
19_57_2_Ndinqula uThixo Osenyangweni, UThixo ondifezelayo.
19_57_3_Uya kuthuma esemazulwini andisindise, Emngcikiva nje ondizondayo; (Phakamisani.) UThixo uya kuthuma inceba yakhe nenyaniso yakhe.
19_57_4_Umphefumlo wam uphakathi kweengonyama; Ndiya kulala phantsi nabafutha umlilo, Oonyana babantu abamazinyo aziintshuntshe neentolo, Ulwimi lwabo lulikrele elibukhali.
19_57_5_Ziphakamisele ngaphezu kwamazulu, Thixo, Lube phezu kwehlabathi lonke uzuko lwakho.
19_57_6_Isibatha basilungisele iinyawo zam; Bawugobile umphefumlo wam; Bandimbela isihogo, Beyela kuso ngokwabo. (Phakamisani.)
19_57_7_Izimasekile intliziyo yam, Thixo, izimasekile intliziyo yam; Ndiya kuvuma, ndiya kubetha uhadi.
19_57_8_Vuka, luzuko lwam! Vukani, mrhubhe nohadi! Ndiya kusiphangela isifingo.
19_57_9_Ndiya kubulela kuwe phakathi kwezizwe, Nkosi yam; Ndiya kukubethela uhadi phakathi kwezizwe.
19_57_10_Ngokuba inkulu, yada yaya ezulwini, inceba yakho; Yada yesa esibhakabhakeni inyaniso yakho.
19_57_11_Ziphakamisele ngaphezu kwezulu, Thixo, Lube phezu kwehlabathi lonke uzuko lwakho.
19_58_1_Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu.  Yinene na kodwa ukuba nithetha ubulungisa, nina bothixo?  Nigweba oonyana babantu ngokuthe tye?
19_58_2_Hayi, entliziyweni nenza ngobugqwetha; Ezweni nilinganisela ukugonyamela kwezandla zenu.
19_58_3_Abangendawo baphambukile kwasesizalweni; Bandwendwile kwasesiswini abathethi bamanga.
19_58_4_Banobuhlungu obunjengobuhlungu benyoka, Njengephimpi elizenza isithulu, elivingca indlebe yalo;
19_58_5_Ukuze lingaliva izwi labanyangi, Lababopha ngomabophe,  beziingcibi.
19_58_6_Thixo, yaphula amazinyo abo emlonyeni wabo; Amabamba eengonyama ezintsha wavithe, Yehova.
19_58_7_Mabaphalale njengamanzi equkuqela; Akuxuna iintolo zakhe,  mazinge zicutshiwe.
19_58_8_Mababe njengenkumba ehamba inyibilika, Njengemva-mbilini yomfazi, engalibonanga ilanga.
19_58_9_Zingekaziva iintsasa iimbiza zenu, Nokuba ikrwada inyama,  nokuba iza kuvuthwa, uyayiqweqwedisa.
19_58_10_Liya kuvuya ilungisa, lakuyibona impindezelo; Liya kuzihlamba iinyawo zalo egazini longendawo,
19_58_11_Athi umntu, Inene, ilungisa linesiqhamo; Inene, ukho uThixo ogwebayo ehlabathini.
19_59_1_Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. EkaDavide. Eliligugu:  ekuthumeleni kukaSawule, bayilinda indlu ukuba bambulale.  Ndihlangule ezintshabeni zam, Thixo wam, Ndise engxondeni kwabasukela phezulu kum.
19_59_2_Ndihlangule kubasebenzi bobutshinga; Ndisindise ebantwini abanamagazi.
19_59_3_Ngokuba nabo bewulalela umphefumlo wam; Baqukana ngam abanamandla, Kungekho lukreqo kum, kungekho sono kum, Yehova.
19_59_4_Ndingenabugwenxa nje, bagidime baxhoba. Vuka,  undikhawulele, ubone.
19_59_5_Wena Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Thixo kaSirayeli, Phapha,  uzivelele zonke iintlanga; Musa ukubayeka bonke abanginizayo bengabagqithi. (Phakamisani.)
19_59_6_Bayabuya ngokuhlwa, bayavungama njengezinja,  Bawuhamba-hambe umzi.
19_59_7_Nabo belephuza amagwebu ngomlomo; Ngamakrele emlonyeni wabo; Ngokuba bathi, Kuva bani na?
19_59_8_Wena, Yehova, uyabahleka, Uyazigculela zonke iintlanga.
19_59_9_Mandla am, ndiva kulindela kuwe; Ngokuba uThixo uyingxonde yam.
19_59_10_UThixo wam uya kundikhawulela ngenceba yakhe; UThixo uya kundibonisa abandilaleleyo.
19_59_11_Musa ukubabulala, hleze balibale abantu bakowethu;  Babhadulise ngamandla akho, ubawise, Ngweletshetshe yethu,  Nkosi yethu.
19_59_12_Isono somlomo wabo lilizwi lemilebe yomlomo wabo;  Mababanjiswe likratshi labo, Nangenxa yokushwabula nokuhanahanisa abakuthethayo.
19_59_13_Bagqibe ngobushushu; gqiba, bangabi sabakho; Baqonde ukuba uThixo ngumlawuli kwaYakobi, Wesa eziphelweni zehlabathi.  (Phakamisani.)
19_59_14_Bayabuya ngokuhlwa, bayavungama njengezinja,  Bawuhamba-hambe umzi.
19_59_15_Bona babhadulela ukudla; Ukuba bathe abahlutha, balala apho.
19_59_16_Ke mna, ndiya kuvuma ngamandla akho, Ndimemelele kwakusasa ngenceba yakho, Kuba ubuyingxonde kum, Nendawo endisabela kuyo ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam.
19_59_17_Mandla am, ndiya kukubethela uhadi; Ngokuba uThixo yingxonde yam, nguThixo wam onenceba.
19_60_1_Kumongameli; ngeyenyibiba yesingqino. Eliligugu.  EkaDavide. Eyokufundisa: ekulweni kwakhe nama-Aram phakathi kweMilambo nama-Aram aseTsobha; wabuya uYowabhi, wawabulala amaEdom emfuleni wetyuwa, amawaka alishumi elinamabini.  Thixo,  usihlambile, wasichitha, Waqumba; ngamana wasibuyisa.
19_60_2_Ulinyikimisile ilizwe, ulikrazule; Philisa iintanda zalo ngokuba lishukuma.
19_60_3_Ubabonisile abantu bakho into elukhuni, Usiseze iwayini ehexisayo.
19_60_4_Ubanike ibhanile abakoyikayo, Ukuba bayiphakamise ngenxa yenyaniso. (Phakamisani.)
19_60_5_Ukuze zihlangulwe iintanda zakho, Sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, undiphendule.
19_60_6_UThixo uthethe engcwele: mandivuyelele, Ndimabe uShekem,  ndiyilinganisele intili yaseSukoti.
19_60_7_Ngowam uGiliyadi, ngowam uManase, UEfrayim sisigcina-ntloko sam, UYuda yintonga yam yommiselo;
19_60_8_UMowabhi sisitya sam sokuhlambela, Ndiyiphosa kuEdom imbadada yam; Filisti, nkqangaza wena ngam.
19_60_9_Ngubani na owondisa emzini wamandla? Ngubani na owondikhaphela kwaEdom?
19_60_10_Asinguwe na, kwawena Thixo, osihlambileyo? Akwaphuma,  Thixo, nemikhosi yethu.
19_60_11_Sincede kumbandezeli wethu; Alunto yanto usindiso lomntu.
19_60_12_NgoThixo siya kweyisa, Wobagqusha yena ababandezeli bethu.
19_61_1_Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo.  EkaDavide. Kuve, Thixo, ukuhlahlamba kwam; Wubazele indlebe umthandazo wam.
19_61_2_Ndidanduluka kuwe ndisesiphelweni sehlabathi, ekutyhafeni kwentliziyo yam; Ndikhaphele eweni elisemalengalengeni kum.
19_61_3_Ngokuba ulihlathi lam, Uyinqaba ende eliqele phambi kotshaba.
19_61_4_Ndiya kuphambukela ententeni yakho ngonaphakade, Ndiya kuzimela ngesithe lamaphiko akho. (Phakamisani.)
19_61_5_Ngokuba wena, Thixo, uzivile izibhambathiso zam; Ubanike ilifa abaloyikayo igama lakho.
19_61_6_Uya kongeza imihla emihleni yokumkani; Iminyaka yakhe iya kuba njengezizukulwana ngezizukulwana;
19_61_7_Uya kuhlala ngonaphakade phambi koThixo; Mmisele inceba nenyaniso, ukuba zimlondoloze.
19_61_8_Kukhona ndiya kulibethela uhadi igama lakho ngonaphakade,  Ndizizalise izibhambathiso zam imihla ngemihla.
19_62_1_Kumongameli. KuYedutun. Umhobe kaDavide. Uthozamele kuThixo kwaphela umphefumlo wam; Kuvela kuye ukusindiswa kwam.
19_62_2_Nguye kwaphela iliwa lam, umsindisi wam, Ingxonde yam;  andiyi kushukunyiswa kakhulu.
19_62_3_Kunini na nisuka indulumbane emntwini? Kunini na nimncinitha nonke niphela, enjengodonga oluzimkayo,  enjengothango oluwayo?
19_62_4_Bagqibe kwelokuba bamtyhale bamsuse ekuphakameni kwakhe kuphele; Bakholene namanga; Basikelela elowo ngomlomo,  embilinini yabo bayatshabhisa. (Phakamisani.)
19_62_5_Thozamela kuThixo yedwa, mphefumlo wam, Ngokuba livela kuye ithemba lam.
19_62_6_Nguye kwaphela iliwa lam, umsindisi wam, Ingxonde yam;  andiyi kushukunyiswa.
19_62_7_KunoThixo ukusindiswa kwam nozuko lwam; Iliwa lokunqaba kwam nehlathi lam likuThixo.
19_62_8_Kholosani ngaye ngamaxesha onke, nina bantu; Phalazani intliziyo yenu phambi kwakhe. UThixo ulihlathi kuthi.  (Phakamisani.)
19_62_9_Bangumphunga kwaphela onyana boluntu, ngamanga oonyana bamadoda; Esikalini bangenyuka, Bangumphunga bephelele.
19_62_10_Musani ukukholosa ngokudla abantu, Ningazenzi into engeyanto ngento exhakamfuliweyo. Yakwanda imfuyo, musani ukuyinyamekela.
19_62_11_Uthethe nto-nye uThixo, Ezi zinto zimbini ndizivile: Ukuba amandla ngakaThixo,
19_62_12_Nenceba yeyakho, Nkosi yam; Ngokuba uyababuyekeza, elowo ngokwezenzo zakhe.
19_63_1_Umhobe kaDavide: oko ebesentlango yakwaYuda. Thixo,  unguThixo wam, ndiya kukuquqela kwakusasa, Umphefumlo wam unxanele wena; inyama yam iyakulangazelela Ezweni elingumqwebedu, elibharhileyo, eligenamanzi.
19_63_2_Ndenjenjalo ukukhangela kuwe engcweleni, Ukuba ndibone amandla akho nobuqaqawuli bakho.
19_63_3_Ngokuba inceba yakho ilungile ngaphezu kobomi, Umlomo wam uya kukuncoma.
19_63_4_Ndiya kwenjenjalo ukukubonga lo gama ndihleliyo,  Ndiphakamise izandla zam egameni lakho.
19_63_5_Umphefumlo wam uhluthi umongo namanqatha; Ngemilebe yomlomo wam omemelelayo uya kukudumisa umlomo wam,
19_63_6_Ndakukukhumbula emandlalweni wam, Emilindweni yobusuku ndicamanga ngawe.
19_63_7_Ngokuba uluncedo kum, Ndinokumemelela esithunzini samaphiko akho.
19_63_8_Umphefumlo wam uthene mbende nawe; Isandla sakho sokunene sindibambile.
19_63_9_Ke bona bafuna umphefumlo wam ukuze batshabalale, Baya kutshona kwezisezantsi iindawo zehlabathi.
19_63_10_Baphalazelwa emandleni ekrele; Baba sisabelo seempungutye.
19_63_11_Ke yena ukumkani uya kuvuya ngoThixo; Baya kuqhayisa abo bonke bafunga yena; Ngokuba uya kuvingcwa umlomo wabathetha ubuxoki.
19_64_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Live, Thixo, izwi lam ekukhalazeni kwam; Ekunkwantyiseni kotshaba bulondoloze ubomi bam.
19_64_2_Ndisithelise egquguleni labanobubi, Ehlokondibeni labasebenzi bobutshinga;
19_64_3_Abalulola njengekrele ulwimi lwabo, Abaxuna iintolo zabo,  amazwi akrakra,
19_64_4_Bamtole ogqibeleleyo besentsithelweni; Bamtola ngesiquphe,  bangoyiki.
19_64_5_Bazomelezela ilizwi elibi, Bagqiba kwelokuba bafihle izirhintyelo, Bathi, Singabonwa ngubani na?
19_64_6_Baceba ubugqwetha; Baligqibile icebo abalicebileyo;  Imbilini yendoda nentliziyo yayo yinzulu.
19_64_7_Ke uThixo uyabatola ngotolo; Amanxeba abo abakho ngesiquphe.
19_64_8_Baya kukhutyekiswa, lufikele kwabona ulwimi lwabo;  Bayahlunguzela intloko bonke abababonayo.
19_64_9_Basuka boyike bonke abantu, Bawuxele umsebenzi kaThixo,  Basiqiqe isenzo sakhe.
19_64_10_Liya kuvuya ilungisa ngoYehova, lizimele ngaye, Baqhayise bonke abantliziyo zithe tye.
19_65_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ingoma. Ukuthozama kuyindumiso kuwe, Thixo, eZiyon; Sizaliswa kuwe isibhambathiso.
19_65_2_Wena mphulaphuli wemithandazo, Iza kuwe inyama yonke.
19_65_3_Zindoyisile nje iindawo zobugwenxa, Ukreqo lwethu uyaluxolela wena ngocamagushelo.
19_65_4_Hayi, uyolo lomnyulayo, umsondeze Ukuba ahlale ezintendelezweni zakho! Siya kuzihluthisa ngokulunga kwendlu yakho, Kwetempile yakho engcwele.
19_65_5_Usiphendula ngezenzo ezoyikekayo zobulungisa, Thixo osisindisayo; Nkoloseko yeziphelo zonke zehlabathi, neyolwandle olukude;
19_65_6_Ulozinzisa iintaba ngamandla akhe, Ebhinqe ubugorha;
19_65_7_Ulodambisa ukugquma kweelwandle, ukugquma kwamaza azo,  Nokuxokozela kwezizwe.
19_65_8_Bayayoyika imiqondiso yakho abemi beziphelo zehlabathi.  Umemelelisa ukuvela kokusa nokuhlwa.
19_65_9_Uwuvelele umhlaba, wawunyela, Wawutyebisa kakhulu. Umjelo kaThixo uzele ngamanzi: Walungisa ingqolowa yabo, ngokuba uwenjenje ukuwulungisa.
19_65_10_Useza ihluthe imisele yawo; Unyakamisa imiqela yawo.  Uthambisa ngeziphango; Usikelela izilimo zawo.
19_65_11_Uwuthwesile umnyaka wokulunga kwakho, Imikhondo yakho itsitsa ukutyeba.
19_65_12_Ayatsitsa amakriwa entlango, Iinduli zizibhinqise umgcobo.
19_65_13_Amadlelo anxibe imihlambi yeenkomo; Iintili zambethe ingqolowa. Yonke into iyaduma, yonke into iyavuma.
19_66_1_Kumongameli. Ingoma. Umhobe. Dumani kuThixo, nonke hlabathi,
19_66_2_Lubetheleni uhadi uzuko lwegama lakhe, Mzukiseni,  mdumiseni.
19_66_3_Yithini kuThixo, Hayi, ukoyikeka kwemisebenzi yakho! Ngenxa yobuninzi bamandla akho ziya kuhanahanisa kuwe iintshaba zakho.
19_66_4_Lonke ihlabathi liya kukunqula, Bakubethele uhadi;  Balibethele uhadi igama lakho. (Phakamisani.)
19_66_5_Yizani, nibone imisebenzi emikhulu kaThixo, Engowoyikekayo ekwenzeni kwakhe koonyana babantu.
19_66_6_Waluguqula ulwandle lwayinto eyomileyo; Bawuwela umlambo ngeenyawo; Apho savuya ngaye.
19_66_7_Ulolawula ngobugorha bakhe ngonaphakade; Amehlo akhe ayabonisela ezintlangeni; Abaziinjubaqa mabangaziphakamisi.  (Phakamisani.)
19_66_8_Mbongeni, zizwe, uThixo wethu, Nivakalise ilizwi lendumiso yakhe.
19_66_9_Ulomisa umphefumlo wethu ebomini, Akalunikela unyawo lwethu ekutyibilikeni.
19_66_10_Ngokuba usicikidile, Thixo; Usinyibilikisile njengokunyibilikiswa kwesilivere;
19_66_11_Usingenise emboniselweni; Ubeke uxinzelelo esinqeni sethu;
19_66_12_Ukhwelise abantu entlokweni yethu; Singene emlilweni nasemanzini; Waza wasikhuphela endaweni enendyebo.
19_66_13_Ndiya kungena endlwini yakho ndinamadini anyukayo; Ndiya kuzizalisa kuwe izibhambathiso zam,
19_66_14_Eyazivulelayo imilebe yomlomo wam, Owazithethayo umlomo wam ekubandezelweni kwam.
