19_66_15_Ndiya kunyusela kuwe amadini anyukayo eemvana ezityebileyo, Ndawonye nesiqhumiso seenkunzi zeegusha; Ndiya kwenza aweenkomo ndawonye naweenkunzi zeebhokhwe.  (Phakamisani.)
19_66_16_Yizani, nive, ndinixelele, nonke nina bamoyikayo uThixo,  Oko akwenzele umphefumlo wam.
19_66_17_Ndadanduluka kuye ngomlomo wam; Kwaye ukubonga kuphantsi kolwimi lwam.
19_66_18_Ukuba bendisekeleze ubutshinga ngentliziyo yam, INkosi yam ibingayi kuphulaphula.
19_66_19_Hayi ke, uThixo uphulaphule, Ulibazele indlebe ilizwi lomthandazo wam.
19_66_20_Makabongwe uThixo, Yena ungawugxothanga umthandazo wam,  Nobubele bakhe kum.
19_67_1_Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Umhobe.  Ingoma. Ngamana uThixo wasibabala, wasisikelela, Wabukhanyisa ubuso bakhe kuthi; (Phakamisani.)
19_67_2_Ukuze yaziwe ehlabathini indlela yakho, Usindiso lwakho ezintlangeni zonke.
19_67_3_Ngamana zabulela izizwe kuwe, Thixo, Zabulela izizwe kuwe zonke ziphela;
19_67_4_Zavuya zamemelela izizwe: Ngokuba uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye, Uzikhaphe izizwe ehlabathini.  (Phakamisani.)
19_67_5_Ngamana zabulela izizwe kuwe, Thixo, Zabulela izizwe kuwe zonke ziphela.
19_67_6_Umhlaba uyivelisile indyebo yawo; Uya kusisikelela uThixo,  uThixo wethu;
19_67_7_Uya kusisikelela uThixo, Zimoyike zonke iziphelo zehlabathi.
19_68_1_Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Ingoma. Makasuk eme uThixo, zibe ziintsali iintshaba zakhe, Basabe ebusweni bakhe abamthiyayo.
19_68_2_Njengokuphetshethwa komsi, baphephethe; Njengokunyibilika komthwebeba phambi komlilo, Mabadake ngokunjalo abangendawo ebusweni bukaThixo.
19_68_3_Ke wona amalungisa makavuye, adlamke phambi koThixo, Abe nemihlali, enemivuyo.
19_68_4_Vumani kuThixo, libetheleni uhadi igama lakhe; Menzeleni umendo ophakamileyo, ulokhwela ecanda ezinkqantosini, Ogama lakhe linguYehova; nidlamke phambi kwakhe.
19_68_5_Uyise weenkedama, umthetheleli wabahlolokazi, NguThixo ekhayeni lakhe elingcwele.
19_68_6_UThixo nguhlalisa endlwini ababebodwa, Ngukhuphela enywebeni ababanjiweyo; Ngabaziinjubaqa bodwa abahlala kwelibalelelweyo.
19_68_7_Thixo, ekuphumeni kwakho uphambi kwabantu bakho,  Ekunyatheleni kwakho enkangala, (Phakamisani.)
19_68_8_Lanyikima ihlabathi, Lavuza izulu ebusweni bukaThixo,  ISinayi leya ebusweni bukaThixo, uThixo kaSirayeli.
19_68_9_Walitshiza ngemvula eninzi yesisa sakho, Thixo, ilifa lakho; Lakubharha, walizimasa wena.
19_68_10_Wahlala khona umhlambi wakho, Wamlungisela olusizana ngokulunga kwakho, Thixo.
19_68_11_INkosi iya kukhupha izwi elinamandla, Ube mkhulu umkhosi weentokazi ezishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo.
19_68_12_Ookumkani bemikhosi baya kusaba besabile; Intokazi esele ekhaya iya kuwaba amaxhoba.
19_68_13_Nakulala phantsi phakathi kweentlanti, Noxelisa amaphiko evukuthu alekwe ngesilivere, Neentsiba zalo ezalekwe ngegolide ebengezelayo.
19_68_14_Ekubadubadubeni kukaSomandla ookumkani kulo, Koba mhlophe ngowekhephu eTsalimon.
19_68_15_Yintaba kaThixo intaba yaseBhashan, Yintaba encopho zininzi intaba yaseBhashan.
19_68_16_Niyigxeleshelani na, zintaba zincopho zininzi, Intaba ayinqweneleyo uThixo ukuba ahlale kuyo? Ewe, uYehova uya kuhlala kuyo ngonaphakade.
19_68_17_Iinqwelo zokulwa zikaThixo zizigidi, ngamawaka-waka;  INkosi ikuzo; yiSinayi ebungcweleni,
19_68_18_Unyuke waya phezulu, uthimbe abathinjwa, Uthabathe izipho phakathi kwabantu, Naphakathi kwabaziinjubaqa, ukuba ahlale uYehova uThixo khona.
19_68_19_Mayibongwe iNkosi; Ithwala imithwalo yethu imihla ngemihla; NguThixo umsindisi wethu. (Phakamisani.
19_68_20_Yena uThixo kuthi nguThixo wosindiso, KokukaYehova, iNkosi yethu, ukukhupha ekufeni.
19_68_21_Kodwa uThixo uya kuyiphalusa intloko yeentshaba zakhe,  Nentloko enesihlwitha yohambayo kwizigqitho zakhe.
19_68_22_Yathi iNkosi, Ndiya kuzibuyisa eBhashan, Ndiya kuzibuyisa iintshaba zakho ezinzulwini zolwandle;
19_68_23_Ukuze uziphaluse, unyawo lwakho lusegazini, Nolwimi lwezinja zakho lube nesabelo salo ezintshabeni.
19_68_24_Bakubona ukunyathela kwakho, Thixo, Ukunyathela koThixo wam, koKumkani wam, esebungcweleni.
19_68_25_Phambili ziimvumi, ngasemva ngababethi bohadi, Emacaleni ziintombi ezibetha iingqongqo.
19_68_26_Emabandleni bongani uThixo, INkosi, nina basemthonjeni wakwaSirayeli.
19_68_27_Balapho ooBhenjamin, inci yabo, umphathi wabo, Abathetheli bakwaYuda, ihlokondiba labo; Abathetheli bakwaZebhulon,  abathetheli bakwaNafetali.
19_68_28_UThixo wakho wakuwisela umthetho wokuba uqine; Kuqinise,  Thixo, oko usenzeleyo.
19_68_29_Bevela etempileni yakho eyongamele iYerusalem, Ookumkani mabeze nezithabathaba kuwe.
19_68_30_Khalimela amarhamncwa asengcongolweni, Umhlambi weenkunzi eziziimbalasane, kunye namathole ezizwe, Ukuze baziwise benezijungqe zesilivere. Wazibhangisa izizwe eziyithandayo imfazwe.
19_68_31_Kovela amanono eYiputa; UKushi wozolulela msinya izandla zakhe kuThixo.
19_68_32_Zikumkani zehlabathi, vumani kuThixo, Niyibethele uhadi iNkosi; (Phakamisani.)
19_68_33_Ekhwela ecanda emazulwini awo amazulu amandulo; Nanko elikhupha ilizwi lakhe, ilizwi elinamandla.
19_68_34_Mnikeni amandla uThixo; Buphezu koSirayeli ubungangamsha bakhe; Asesibhakabhakeni amandla akhe.
19_68_35_UloThixo woyikekayo ezingcweleni zakho. UloThixo kaSirayeli, ubanikayo amandla nokomelela abantu. Makabongwe uThixo.
19_69_1_Kumongameli; ngeyeenyibiba. EkaDavide. Ndisindise, Thixo;  Ngokuba amanzi andifikele, ada eza emphefumlweni.
19_69_2_Nditshonile eludakeni olunzulu, akukho kuma; Ndingene emmbithini onamanzi, umsinga uyandintywilisela.
19_69_3_Ndidiniwe kukudanduluka; womile umqala wam; Aphelile amehlo am; mna ndilindele kuThixo.
19_69_4_Abandithiyayo ngelize baninzi ngaphezu kweenwele zentloko yam; Baninzi abandibangisayo, abaziintshaba zam bexoka; Into endingayiphanganga bathi mandiyibuyise.
19_69_5_Thixo, wena uyakwazi ukumatha kwam; Namatyala am akanakugushwa kuwe.
19_69_6_Mabangadani ngam abakuthembayo, Nkosi yam, Yehova wemikhosi; Mabangangcikivwa ngam abakufunayo, Thixo kaSirayeli.
19_69_7_Ngokuba ndithwele ingcikivo ngenxa yakho; Ihlazo libugqubuthele ubuso bam;
19_69_8_Ndingowasemzini kubazalwana bam; Ndingowolunye uhlanga kubantwana bakama:
19_69_9_Ngokuba lindidlile ikhwele ngenxa yendlu yakho: Iingcikivo zabakungcikivayo ziwe phezu kwam.
19_69_10_Mna, umphefumlo wam walila, uzila ukudla; Oko kwaba yingcikivo kum.
19_69_11_Iingubo zam zaba zezirhwexayo, Ndaba yinto yokuzekelisa kubo.
19_69_12_Bathetha ngam abahleli esangweni; Ndiyingoma yamanxila.
19_69_13_Ke mna ndithandaza kuwe, Yehova, ngexesha elikholekileyo:  Thixo, ngobuninzi benceba yakho, Ndiphendule ngenyaniso yosindiso lwakho.
19_69_14_Ndihlangule eludakeni, ndingatshoni; Mandihlangulwe kwabandithiyayo nasemimbithini enamanzi.
19_69_15_Mawungandintywiliseli umsinga wamanzi; Ingandiginyi inzulu; Iqula malingandivingceli ngomlomo walo
19_69_16_Ndiphendule, Yehova, ngokuba ilungile inceba yakho,  Ngangobuninzi bemfesane yakho ndibheke.
19_69_17_Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kumkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba ndibandezelekile; khawuleza undiphendule.
19_69_18_Sondela emphefumlweni wam, uwukhulule; Ngenxa yeentshaba zam ndikhulule.
19_69_19_Wena uyakwazi ukungcikivwa kwam, nokudaniswa kwam,  nokuhlazwa kwam; Baphambi kwakho bonke abandibandezelayo.
19_69_20_Ingcikivo yaphula intliziyo yam, ndaphantsa ukufa;  Ndathemba ukukhuzwa, akwabakho; Nokuthuthuzelwa, andakufumana.
19_69_21_Ukudla bandinika inyongo; Ekunxanweni kwam bandiseza iviniga.
19_69_22_Isithebe sabo phambi kwabo masibe ngumgibe; Sibe sisirhintyelo kwabanemasi.
19_69_23_Makabe mnyama amehlo abo, bangaboni, Usigxadazelise isinqe sabo amaxesha onke.
19_69_24_Baphalazele ngobhavumo lwakho, Kubafikele ukuvutha komsindo wakho.
19_69_25_Ingqili yabo mayibe senkangala, Ezintenteni zabo kungahlali mntu;
19_69_26_Ngokuba bayamsukela obethwe nguwe, Bancokole ngomvandedwa wobahlabileyo wena.
19_69_27_Yongeza ubugwenxa ebugwenxeni babo, Bangangeni ebulungi senibakho.
19_69_28_Mabacinywe encwadini yobomi, Bangabhalwa namalungisa.
19_69_29_Ke mna ndilusizana, ndinomvandedwa; Usindiso lwakho,  Thixo, malundise engxondeni.
19_69_30_Ndiya kulidumisa igama likaThixo ngokuvuma, Ndilenze likhulu ngokubulela.
19_69_31_Oko kuya kukholeka kuYehova ngaphezu kweenkunzi ezintsha,  Ezineempondo neempuphu.
19_69_32_Bebona abalulamileyo, bovuya; Nina bamquqelayo uThixo,  intliziyo yenu mayiphile.
19_69_33_Ngokuba uYehova uyaweva amahlwempu, Akabadeli ababanjiweyo bakhe.
19_69_34_Malimdumise izulu nomhlaba, Ulwandle nento yonke enambuzelayo kulo.
19_69_35_Ngokuba uThixo uya kuyisindisa iZiyon, ayakhe imizi yakwaYuda, Bahlale khona, bayime;
19_69_36_Ilidle ilifa imbewu yabakhonzi bakhe; Bahlale kuyo abalithandayo igama lakhe.
19_70_1_Kumongameli; ekaDavide; eyokukhumbuza. Thixo, khawuleza undihlangule; Yehova, khawuleza undincede.
19_70_2_Mabadane babe neentloni abawufunayo umphefumlo wam;  Mababuye umva bahlazeke abananze ukuba ndihlelwe bububi;
19_70_3_Mababuye ngenxa yomvuzo wedano labo Abathi, Tshotsho!  Tshotsho!
19_70_4_Mababe nemihlali bavuye ngawe bonke abakuquqelayo;  Abaluthandayo usindiso lwakho Mabahlale besithi, Makenziwe mkhulu uThixo.
19_70_5_Ke mna ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu; Thixo, khawuleza uze kum.  Umncedi wam nomsindisi wam nguwe; Yehova, musa ukulibala.
19_71_1_Ndizimela ngawe, Yehova, Mandingaze ndidane naphakade:
19_71_2_Ngobulungisa bakho ndihlangule, ndisize; Ndithobele indlebe yakho, undisindise.
19_71_3_Yiba liliwa elilikhaya kum, ndize kulo ngamaxesha onke.  Uwise umthetho wokuba ndisindiswe, Ngokuba ingxondorha yam nemboniselo yam nguwe.
19_71_4_Thixo wam, ndisize esandleni songendawo, Esandleni sogqwethayo nosisibhovubhovu.
19_71_5_Ngokuba ulithemba lam, Nkosi yam, Yehova, Inkoloseko yam kwasebuncinaneni bam.
19_71_6_Ndixhaswe nguwe kwasesizalweni; Nguwe owandityhobozisayo ezibilinini zikama. Indumiso yam ingawe ngamaxesha onke.
19_71_7_Ndinjengesimanga kwabaninzi; Ke wena ulihlathi lam elinqabileyo.
19_71_8_Umlomo wam uya kuzala yindumiso yakho, Sisihombo sakho imini yonke.
19_71_9_Musa ukundilahla ngexesha lobuxhego; Musa ukundishiya akuphela amandla am.
19_71_10_Ngokuba zithetha ngam iintshaba zam; Abawulindayo umphefumlo wam bayacebisana,
19_71_11_Besithi, UThixo umlahlile; Msukeleni nimbambe, ngokuba akukho mhlanguli.
19_71_12_Thixo, musa ukuba kude kum; Thixo wam, khawuleza undincede.
19_71_13_Mabadane, bagqitywe, abawuchasayo umphefumlo wam, Bathiwe wambu yingcikivo nehlazo abafuna ukuba ndihlelwe bububi.
19_71_14_Ke mna ndiya kuhlala ndilindile, Ndongeze endumisweni yakho yonke.
19_71_15_Umlomo wam uya kubalisa ngemisebenzi yobulungisa bakho,  Neyosindiso lwakho imini yonke, ngokuba ndingawazi amanani ayo.
19_71_16_Ndiya kuza nemisebenzi yobugorha beNkosi uYehova; Ndiya kukhankanya ubulungisa bakho, bakho wedwa.
19_71_17_Thixo, undifundisile kwasebuncinaneni bam; Unangoku ndiyayixela imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.
19_71_18_Thixo, musa ukundishiya kude kuye ebuxhegweni nasezimvini;  Ndide ndiyixele ingalo yakho kwisizukulwana esitsha, Nobugorha bakho kubo bonke abaya kuza.
19_71_19_Thixo, ubulungisa bakho buye bafika phezulu; Wena uzenzayo izinto ezinkulu, Thixo, ngubani na onjengawe?
19_71_20_Wena, usibonisileyo iimbandezelo ezininzi ezinobubi, Uya kubuya usiphilise, Ubuye usirhole ezinzonzobileni zamanzi ehlabathi;
19_71_21_Uya kubandisa ubukhulu bam, Ubuye wena undithuthuzele.
19_71_22_Ndiya kuyibulela nokuyibulela kuwe ngomrhubhe Inyaniso yakho, Thixo wam; Ndiya kukubethela uhadi, Ngcwele kaSirayeli.
19_71_23_Uya kumemelela umlomo wam, ndakukubethela uhadi,  Nomphefumlo wam owukhululeyo;
19_71_24_Nolwimi lwam luya kuxela ubulungisa bakho imini yonke,  Ngokuba bedanile beneentloni abafuna ukuba ndihlelwe bububi.
19_72_1_EkaSolomon. Thixo, mnike ukumkani imigwebo yakho, Mnike unyana wokumkani ubulungisa bakho.
19_72_2_Makagwebe ebantwini bakho ngobulungisa, Nakwabaziintsizana zakho ngokwesiko.
19_72_3_Iintaba mazibathwalele uxolo abantu, Kwaneenduli zibathwalele ebulungiseni.
19_72_4_Makagwebe ityala labaziintsizana ebantwini, Asindise oonyana bamahlwempu, Abatyumze abacudisi.
19_72_5_Mabakoyike, ukuhlala elihleliyo ilanga Kwanenyanga,  izizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_72_6_Makehle njengemvula ehla phezu kotyani obusikwayo,  Njengeziphango, njengemvula emathontsi makhulu, emhlabeni.
19_72_7_Malityatyambe ngemihla yakhe ilungisa, Nobuninzi boxolo,  ide ingabi sabakho inyanga.
19_72_8_Makaphathe ubukhosi ethabathela elwandle ase elwandle,  Ethabathela kuwo uMlambo ase eziphelweni zehlabathi.
19_72_9_Baya kuguqa phambi kwakhe abemi bomqwebedu, Zikhothe uthuli iintshaba zakhe.
19_72_10_Ookumkani baseTarshishe nabeziqithi baya kunika iminikelo;  Ookumkani bakwaShebha nabakwaSebha baya kusondeza isithabathaba;
19_72_11_Baqubude kuye bonke ookumkani, Zimkhonze sonke iintlanga.
19_72_12_Ngokuba uya kulihlangula ihlwempu elizibikayo,  Nabaziintsizana abangenaluncedo;
19_72_13_Abenzele inceba abasweleyo nabangamahlwempu; Asindise imiphefumlo yamahlwempu;
19_72_14_Akhulule imiphefumlo yawo ekuxinezelweni nasekugonyamelweni; Linqabile emehlweni akhe igazi lawo.
19_72_15_Uya kuphila anikwe igolide yakwaShebha, Bahlale bemthandazela, Bamsikelele imini yonke.
19_72_16_Makubekho intabalala yengqolowa ezweni, ise encotsheni yeentaba; Ukuqhama kwayo makurhashaze njengeLebhanon;  Mabatyatyambe emizini yabo njengemifuno yomhlaba.
19_72_17_Malibe ngunaphakade igama lakhe; Malivelise amagatya igama lakhe phambi kwelanga, Bazisikelele ngaye; Mazithi zonke iintlanga ungonoyolo.
19_72_18_Makabongwe uYehova uThixo, uThixo kaSirayeli. Ulomenzi wemisebenzi ebalulekileyo yena yedwa.
19_72_19_Malisikelelwe igama lakhe elizukileyo ngonaphakade, Lizale lonke ihlabathi luzuko lwakhe. Amen, amen.
19_72_20_Iphelile imithandazo kaDavide unyana kaYese.
19_73_1_Umhobe ka-Asafu. Ulungile kwaphela uThixo kuSirayeli,  Kwabantliziyo zinyulu.
19_73_2_Ke mna, beziphantse ukumka iinyawo zam; Gcwizi ukutyibilika ukunyathela kwam;
19_73_3_Ngokuba bendibamonela abaqhayisayo, Ndakukubona ukuphumelela kwabangendawo.
19_73_4_Ngokuba abanazintlungu ekufeni kwabo; Baphilile, batyebile umzimba wabo;
19_73_5_Ebubini babantu abakho bona; Abakhathazwa njengabanye abantu.
19_73_6_Ngako oko intamo yabo inxitywe ikratshi; Ukugonyamela kubathe wambu ngokwengubo.
19_73_7_Amehlo abo avelile kukutyeba; Amabhongo eentliziyo zabo aphumela phandle.
19_73_8_Bahlalela ngentlamba, bathetha ngokubandezela, benobubi;  Bathetha iindumbisa zamazwi.
19_73_9_Bawubeka ezulwini umlomo wabo, Ulwimi lwabo luhamba emhlabeni wonke.
19_73_10_Ngako oko abantu babo babuyela apha; Bafinca amanzi amaninzi.
19_73_11_Bathi, Unokuthini na ukwazi uThixo? Kukho ukwazi na kOsenyangweni?
19_73_12_Yabona abangendawo abaya Banokuchulumacha ngonaphakade,  bandile ngokutyeba.
19_73_13_Sifumane sayiqaqambisa intliziyo yethu kanti, Sazihlamba izandla zethu ngokuba msulwa;
19_73_14_Ndakhathazeka imini yonke, Ukohlwaywa kwethu kwaba kokwemiso yonke.
19_73_15_Ukuba bendithe, Ndiya kwenjenjalo ukuthetha, Yabona,  ngendinginizile kwisizukulwana soonyana bakho.
19_73_16_Ndathi ke ndakucinga ukuba ndikwazi oko, Kwayinkohla emehlweni am;
19_73_17_Ndada ndaya kungena ezingcweleni zikaThixo, Ndakugqala ke ukuphela kwabo.
19_73_18_Inene, ubamise ezindaweni ezibuthelezi, Wabawisa baba yintshabalala.
19_73_19_Hayi, ukuphanziswa kwabo ngephanyazo; Baphelile,  bagqityiwe kukukhwankqa.
19_73_20_Njengephupha ekuqabukeni komntu, Ekuvukeni kwakho, Nkosi,  wowudela umfanekiso wabo.
19_73_21_Ukuba ndithe ndabindeka intliziyo, Ndahlabeka ezintsweni,
19_73_22_Ndoba ke ndisisityhakala, ndingenakwazi; Ndoba ke ndisisilo kuwe.
19_73_23_Mna ke ndihlala ndinawe; Undibambile ngesandla sam sokunene;
19_73_24_Uya kundikhapha ngecebo lakho. Undithabathe emveni koku,  ndibe nozuko.
19_73_25_Ndinabani na emazulwini? Ukuba wena ungowam, andilinanze nganto ihlabathi.
19_73_26_Ingaphela inyama yam nentliziyo yam: Iliwa lentliziyo yam,  nesabelo sam, nguThixo ngonaphakade.
19_73_27_Ngokuba, yabona, abanyawukileyo kuwe baya kudaka;  Uyababhangisa bonke abahenyuzayo, bemke kuwe.
19_73_28_Mna ke, ukusondela kuThixo kulungile kum, Ndiyenza ihlathi lam iNkosi uYehova, Ukuze ndiyibalise yonke imisebenzi yakhe.
19_74_1_Eyokuqiqa; eka-Asafu. Yini na Thixo, ukuba uhlale usihlambile, Uqhume umsindo wakho kwizimvu zedlelo lakho?
19_74_2_Likhumbule ibandla lakho olithengileyo kwakudala,  Olikhululeyo, laba sisizwe selifa lakho; Intaba yaseZiyon,  ohleli kuyo.
19_74_3_Phakamisa ukunyathela kwakho, ukuya kumanxuwa ahlala ehleli: Utshaba luvive into yonke engcweleni.
19_74_4_Babharhula ababandezeli bakho endaweni yokuhlangana phakathi; Bamisa eyabo imiqondiso, yaba yiyo eyimiqondiso.
19_74_5_Kwanga kungenelwe Intshinyela yemithi ngezixengxe.
19_74_6_Kungoku, uqoqo lwayo lonke Balucanda ngamazembe neengxobonga.
19_74_7_Bayifaka umlilo ingcwele yakho; Bawuhlambela ngokuwuwisela emhlabeni umnquba wegama lakho.
19_74_8_Bathi ezintliziyweni zabo, Siya kubanyanzelela phantsi kuphele; Bazitshisile zonke iindawo zikaThixo zokuhlangana ezweni apha.
19_74_9_Imiqondiso yethu asiyiboni, Akusekho mprofeti; Kuthi akukho waziyo ukuba koda kuse phi na kunjalo.
19_74_10_Kunini na, Thixo, umbandezeli engcikiva? Utshaba luhleli luligiba igama lakho?
19_74_11_Usifinyezeleni na isandla sakho, nesokunene sakho? Sirhole esifubeni sakho, ulugqibe.
19_74_12_Ke uThixo nguKumkani wam kwakumandulo, Ulosebenza usindiso phakathi kwehlabathi lonke.
19_74_13_Nguwe owahlula ulwandle ngamandla akho, Owaphula iintloko zeengwenya emanzini.
19_74_14_Nguwe owaxhaxha iintloko zeleviyatan, Wazinika zakukudla kubantu, kubemi bomqwebedu.
19_74_15_Nguwe owagqobhoza yayimithombo, yayimilanjana; Nguwe owomisa imilambo engomiyo.
19_74_16_Yeyakho imini, bobakho nobusuku; Nguwe owalungisa ukukhanya nelanga.
19_74_17_Nguwe owamisa yonke imida yehlabathi; Ihlobo, nobusika,  nguwe owazibumbayo ezo zinto.
19_74_18_Khumbula oku; utshaba lungcikiva uYehova, Abantu abanobudenge baligibile igama lakho.
19_74_19_Musa ukuwunikela erhamncweni umphefumlo wehobe lakho;  Ungahlali uwulibele umhlambi wakho oziintsizana.
19_74_20_Bheka emnqophisweni, Ngokuba iindawo ezimnyama zelizwe zizele zizindlu zogonyamelo.
19_74_21_Makangabuyi otyumkileyo ehlazisiwe; Makalidumise igama lakho olusizana nolihlwempu.
19_74_22_Khawusuk ume, Thixo, ubambane nababambene nawe; Khumbula ukukungcikiva kwesidenge yonke imini.
19_74_23_Musa ukulilibala izwi lababandezeli bakho, Ukungxola kwabasukela phezulu kuwe, okuhlala kunyuka.
19_75_1_Kumongameli; ngethi, Ungonakalisi. Umhobe ka-Asafu.  Ingoma. Siyabulela kuwe, Thixo, siyabulela; Lisondele igama lakho; Babalisa imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.
19_75_2_Ngokuba uthi, Ndiya kwenza ngexesha elimisiweyo, Mna ndiya kugweba ngokuthe tye.
19_75_3_Liyetha amandla ihlabathi, nabemi balo; Ke mna,  ndizizinzisile iintsika zalo. (Phakamisani.)
19_75_4_Ndithi kubaqhayisi, Musani ukuqhayisa; Nakwabangendawo,  Musani ukuphakamisa uphondo;
19_75_5_Musani ukuluphakamisela phezulu uphondo lwenu, Ningathethi ngokusa, nolule intamo.
19_75_6_Ngokuba ugwebo aluveli empumalanga nasentshonalanga,  Nasentlango yeentaba.
19_75_7_Hayi, nguThixo ogwebayo; Uyamthoba lo, amphakamise lowa.
19_75_8_Ngokuba indebe isesandleni sikaYehova, Iphuphuma igwebu lewayini, izele yephithikeziweyo. Uthulula kuyo; ewe, iintlenga zayo Ziya kuselwa zifincwe ngabangendawo bonke behlabathi.
19_75_9_Ke mna ndiya kushumayela ngonaphakade, Ndiya kuvuma kuThixo kaYakobi;
19_75_10_Zonke iimpondo zabangendawo ndiya kuzixakaxa, Iimpondo zelungisa ziya kuphakanyiswa.
19_76_1_Kumongameli; eyokubethelwa ngezinto ezineentambo. Umhobe ka-Asafu. Ingoma. Waziwa kwaYuda uThixo, Likhulu kwaSirayeli igama lakhe.
19_76_2_Umnquba wakhe waba seSalem, Nekhaya lakhe eZiyon.
19_76_3_Wayaphula apho imibane yesaphetha, Ingweletshetshe,  nekrele, nezixhobo zemfazwe. (Phakamisani.)
19_76_4_Ukhanyile, uyingangamsha ngaphezu kweentaba zokuqwenga.
19_76_5_Babhunyulwe abantliziyo iyimbalasane, Balala umlala kanye,  Akazifumana izandla zawo onke amakroti.
19_76_6_Ekukhalimeni kwakho, Thixo kaYakobi, Kwasindwa bubuthongo iinqwelo zokulwa namahashe.
19_76_7_Unguwena wena woyikekayo; Ngubani na onokuma phambi kwakho,  wakuba nomsindo?
19_76_8_Emazulwini usivakalisile isigwebo; Loyika ihlabathi,  lazola,
19_76_9_Ekusukeni kukaThixo ukuba agwebe, Abasindise bonke abalulamileyo behlabathi. (Phakamisani.)
19_76_10_Ngokuba ubushushu bomntu buya kuba ngumbulelo kuwe; Uya kuwabhinqa amasalela obushushu.
19_76_11_Bhambathisani, nisizalise isibhambathiso kuYehova uThixo wenu; Bonke abamngqongileyo mabeze nezithabathaba kofanele kukoyikwa.
19_76_12_Uya kunqumla ukufutha kweenganga, Uyoyikeka kookumkani behlabathi.
19_77_1_Kumongameli. KuYedutun. Eka-Asafu. Umhobe. Izwi lam lisingisa kuThixo, ndikhala; Izwi lam lisingisa kuThixo, ukuba andibekele indlebe.
19_77_2_Ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam ndiquqela eNkosini yam; Isandla sam solukile ebusuku, asaqoba; Awavuma ukuthuthuzeleka umphefumlo wam.
19_77_3_Ndikhumbula uThixo, ndincwine; Ndithelekelele, utyhafe umoya wam. (Phakamisani.)
19_77_4_Uzibambile iinkophe zamehlo am, Ndikhandiwe, andaba nakuthetha.
19_77_5_Ndicinga ngemihla yamandulo, Iminyaka yasephakadeni;
19_77_6_Ndiya kukhumbula ebusuku ukubetha kwam uhadi; Ndithetha nentliziyo yam, uphengulula umoya wam.
19_77_7_Ndithi, Iya kundihlamba ngonaphakade na iNkosi yam, Ingabi saphinda iphathe ngetarhu na?
19_77_8_Iphele yaphela na inceba yayo? Sigqibele na isithembiso sayo kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana?
19_77_9_UThixo ukulibele na ukubabala? Uyivingcele ngomsindo kusini na imfesane yakhe? (Phakamisani.)
19_77_10_Ndide ndithi ke, Sisifo sam esi; Yiminyaka yesandla sokunene sOsenyangweni.
19_77_11_Ndikhankanya izenzo ezincamisayo zikaYehova; Ngokuba ndikhumbula imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo yamandulo.
19_77_12_Ndicamanga ngako konke ukusebenza kwakho, Ndithelekelele ngezenzo zakho zonke ezincamisayo.
19_77_13_Thixo, isebungcweleni indlela yakho; Ngubani na onguthixo omkhulu njengoThixo wethu?
19_77_14_UnguloThixo, wenza ngokubalulekileyo; Wawazisa amandla akho ezizweni,
19_77_15_Wabakhulula ngengalo abantu bakho, Oonyana bakaYakobi noYosefu. (Phakamisani.)
19_77_16_Akubona amanzi, Thixo, Akubona amanzi, azibhija-bhija,  Ewe, agungqa amanzi enzonzobila;
19_77_17_Amafu engqingqwa aphalaza amanzi, Isibhakabhaka savakalisa isandi; Ewe, iintolo zakho zahamba-hamba.
19_77_18_Izwi lendudumo yakho laba sesaqhwithini, Imibane yalikhanyisa elimiweyo, Lagungqa lanyikima ihlabathi.
19_77_19_Yaba selwandle indlela yakho, Nomendo wakho waba semanzini amaninzi; Awaziwa umkhondo wakho.
19_77_20_Wabakhokela njengezimvu abantu bakho, Ngesandla sooMoses noAron.
19_78_1_Eyokuqiqa ka-Asafu. Wubekeleni indlebe umyalelo wam,  bantu bakowethu, Wathobeleni indlebe amazwi omlomo wam.
19_78_2_Ndiya kuwuvula umlomo wam ngomzekeliso; Ndiya kumpompozisa iintsonkotha zamandulo;
19_78_3_Esakuvayo sakwazi, Abasibaliselayo oobawo.
19_78_4_Asiyi kukugusha koonyana babo; Sobalisela isizukulwana esizayo iindumiso zikaYehova, Namandla akhe, nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo awayenzayo.
19_78_5_Wamisa isingqiniso kwaYakobi, Wabeka umyalelo kwaSirayeli,  Awawumisela oobawo, Ukuba bawazise oonyana babo;
19_78_6_Ukuze siwazi isizukulwana esizayo, oonyana abaza kuzalwa,  Basuke babalisele ababo oonyana;
19_78_7_Bayame ngoThixo, Bangazilibali izenzo ezincamisayo zikaThixo, Bayilondoloze imithetho yakhe:
19_78_8_Bangabi njengooyise, Isizukulwana esiyinjubaqa,  esineenkani, Isizukulwana esingayilungisanga intliziyo yaso,  Esimoya unganyanisanga kuThixo.
19_78_9_Oonyana bakaEfrayim, bexhobile, beziintoli ezinezaphetha,  Bajika ngemini yemfazwe.
19_78_10_Abawugcinanga umnqophiso kaThixo, Abavumanga ukuhamba ngomyalelo wakhe;
19_78_11_Bazilibala izenzo zakhe ezincamisayo, Nezibalulekileyo zakhe awababonisayo.
19_78_12_Phambi kooyise wenza ngokubalulekileyo Ezweni lamaYiputa,  emhlabeni waseTsohan.
19_78_13_Waludabula ulwandle, wabaweza, Wawamisa amanzi njengemfumba.
19_78_14_Wabakhapha ngelifu emini, Ngokukhanya komlilo ubusuku bonke,
19_78_15_Walicanda iliwa entlango, Wabaseza amanzi anzongonzongo kakhulu;
19_78_16_Wavelisa imiqukuqela yamanzi engxondorheni, Wahlisa amanzi njengemilambo.
19_78_17_Baqokela noko ukona kuye, Nokumphikisa Osenyangweni emqwebedwini.
19_78_18_Bamlinga uThixo ngentliziyo yabo, Ngokuwubizela umphefumlo wabo ukudla.
19_78_19_Bathetha ngoThixo, bathi, Unako na uThixo ukulungisa isithebe entlango?
19_78_20_Yabona, walibetha iliwa, abaleka amanzi, Yakhukula nemilanjana; Woba nako na nokubanika ukutya, Nokubalungiselela inyama abantu bakhe?
19_78_21_Weva ke uThixo, waphuphuma umsindo wakhe, Watsha umlilo kwaYakobi, Kwenyuka kwaya umsindo kwaSirayeli;
19_78_22_Ngokuba bengakholwanga kuThixo, Bengakholosanga ngosindiso lwakhe.
19_78_23_Waziwisela ke umthetho iingqimba zamafu ngaphezulu,  Wazivula iingcango zezulu;
19_78_24_Wabanisela ngemana ukuze badle, Wabanika ingqolowa yasezulwini.
19_78_25_Umntu wadla isonka sOnamandla; Wabathumela umphako bada badikwa.
19_78_26_Wandulula umoya wasempumalanga ezulwini, Wawuqhuba ngamandla akhe umoya wasezantsi;
19_78_27_Wabanisela inyama njengothuli, Neentaka ezinamaphiko njengentlabathi yolwandle;
19_78_28_Yawa phakathi kweminquba yabo, Ngeenxa zonke emakhayeni abo.
19_78_29_Badla, bahlutha kakhulu, Wabazisela ke inkanuko yabo.
19_78_30_Bengekashenxi enkanukweni yabo, Kusekho ukudla kwabo emlonyeni wabo:
19_78_31_Kwenyuka umsindo kaThixo waya kubo, Wabulala phakathi kwabatyebileyo babo, Wawawisa amadodana akwaSirayeli.
19_78_32_Kuyo yonke loo nto bahambisa ngokona, Abakholwa yimisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo.
19_78_33_Wayiphelisa ke imihla yabo njengomphunga, Neminyaka yabo ngokukhwankqisa.
19_78_34_Xa wathi wababulala, bamquqela; Babuya bamquqela uThixo ngenyameko,
19_78_35_Bakhumbula ukuba uThixo uliliwa labo, UThixo Osenyangweni ungumkhululi wabo.
19_78_36_Ke bamthomalalisa ngomlomo wabo, Bamxokisa ngolwimi lwabo;
19_78_37_Intliziyo yabo ayaqina kuye, Abanyaniseka emnqophisweni wakhe.
19_78_38_Ke yena unemfesane, Uxolela ubugwenxa ngocamagushelo,  akonakalisi; Wawubuyisa futhi umsindo wakhe, Akabuxhoxha bonke ubushushu bakhe.
19_78_39_Wakhumbula ukuba bayinyama, Bangumoya omkayo, ongabuyiyo.
19_78_40_Kukangaphi bemphikisa entlango, Bemenza buhlungu enkangala!
19_78_41_Babuya bamlinga uThixo, Bamenzakalisa oyiNgcwele wakwaSirayeli.
19_78_42_Abasikhumbula isandla sakhe, Imini awabakhulula ngayo embandezelweni;
19_78_43_Awamisa ngayo imiqondiso yakhe eYiputa, Nezimanga zakhe emhlabeni waseTsohan.
19_78_44_Wayiguqula imijelo yabo, yaba ligazi, Ababa nakuyisela imiqukuqela yabo yamanzi.
19_78_45_Wathumela kubo iingcongconi, zabadla; Namasele,  abatshabalalisa.
19_78_46_Izilimo zabo wazinika iinkumbi ezinqunquthayo, Ukuxelenga kwabo wakunika iinkumbi ezandayo.
19_78_47_Wawubulala ngesichotho umdiliya wabo, Nemithombe yabo ngomkhenkce.
19_78_48_Wayinikela kwisichotho imfuyo yabo, Nemihlambi yabo ngemibane.
19_78_49_Wathumela kubo ukuvutha komsindo wakhe, Ukuphuphuma kwawo,  nokubhavuma, nembandezelo, Ibutho lezithunywa zobubi.
19_78_50_Wawulungelelanisela umendo umsindo wakhe, Akawunqanda ekufeni umphefumlo wabo, Wabunikela ubomi babo kwindyikitya yokufa.
19_78_51_Wababulala bonke abamazibulo eYiputa, Iintlahlela zamandla obudoda ezintenteni zakwaHam.
19_78_52_Abantu bakhe wabafudusa njengezimvu, Wabaqhuba njengomhlambi entlango;
19_78_53_Wabakhapha bekholosile, bengankwantyi; Ke zona iintshaba zabo lwazigubungela ulwandle
19_78_54_Wabazisa emdeni wakhe ongcwele, Kule ntaba sayizuzayo isandla sakhe sokunene.
19_78_55_Wagxotha iintlanga ebusweni babo, Wazenzela amaqashiso zalilifa elicandiweyo; Izizwe zakwaSirayeli wazihlalisa ezintenteni zazo.
19_78_56_Kodwa bamlinga, bamphikisa uThixo Osenyangweni, Abazigcina izingqiniso zakhe,
19_78_57_Babuya unuva, banginiza njengooyise. Bajika njengesaphetha esikhohlisayo.
19_78_58_Bamqumbisa ngeziganga zabo, Bamkhweletisa ngemifanekiso yabo eqingqiweyo.
19_78_59_Weva uThixo, waphuphuma umsindo, Wawacekisa kakhulu amaSirayeli;
19_78_60_Wawulahla umnquba waseShilo, Intente abeyimise esintwini;
19_78_61_Wawanikela ekuthinjweni amandla akhe, Isihombo sakhe esandleni sombandezeli.
19_78_62_Wabanikela abantu bakhe kwikrele, Umsindo wakhe waphuphumela ilifa lakhe.
19_78_63_Amadodana abo adliwa ngumlilo, Iintombi zabo azagcotyelwa.
19_78_64_Ababingeleli babo bawa likrele, Abahlolokazi babo abalila.
19_78_65_Yaza yavuka njengobelele iNkosi, Njengegorha elimemeleliswa yiwayini.
19_78_66_Yababetha ngasemva ababandezeli bayo, Yabenza ingcikivo engunaphakade.
19_78_67_Yayicekisa intente yakwaYosefu, Ayasinyula isizwe sakwaEfrayim.
19_78_68_Yanyula isizwe sakwaYuda, Intaba yaseZiyon eyayithandayo.
19_78_69_Yayakha njengokuphakama kwezulu ingcwele yakhe,  Njengomhlaba lo awusekileyo ngonaphakade.
19_78_70_Yanyula uDavide umkhonzi wayo, Yamthabatha ezibayeni zezimvu;
19_78_71_Yamthabatha elandela izimvu ezanyisayo, Yamzisa ukuba aluse kwaYakobi abantu bayo, KwaSirayeli ilifa layo.
19_78_72_Wabalusa ke ngengqibelelo yentliziyo yakhe, Wabakhapha ngokwazi kwezandla zakhe.
19_79_1_Umhobe ka-Asafu. Thixo, iintlanga zingene elifeni lakho,  Ziyenze inqambi itempile yakho engcwele; Ziyenze yayimiwewe iYerusalem.
19_79_2_Izidumbu zabakhonzi bakho zizinike iintaka zezulu ukuba zizidle, Nenyama yabakho benceba ziyinike amarhamncwa elizwe.
19_79_3_Ziliphalazile igazi labo njengamanzi ngeenxa zonke eYerusalem; Akwabakho mngcwabi.
19_79_4_Senziwe ingcikivo kubamelwane bethu, Isigculelo nesicukucezo kwabasingqongileyo.
19_79_5_Kunini na, Yehova, uhleli uqumbile? Liya kuvutha njengomlilo na ikhwele lakho?
19_79_6_Phalaza ubushushu bakho ezintlangeni ezingakwaziyo,  Ezikumkanini ezingalinquliyo igama lakho.
19_79_7_Ngokuba zimdlile uYakobi, Zalenza inxuwa ikhaya lakhe.
19_79_8_Musa ukubukhumbula kuthi ubugwenxa bamanyange ethu,  Mayingxame isikhawulele imfesane yakho: Ngokuba siswele kakhulu.
19_79_9_Sincede, Thixo ongumsindisi wethu, ngenxa yozuko lwegama lakho, Usihlangule, uzixolele ngocamagushelo izono zethu ngenxa yegama lakho.
19_79_10_Yini na ukuba iintlanga zithi kuthi, Uphi na uThixo wabo?  Makwazeke ezintlangeni, emehlweni ethu, Ukuphindezelwa kwegazi labakhonzi bakho eliphalaziweyo.
19_79_11_Makuze phambi kwakho ukugcuma kwamakhonkxwa; Ngokobukhulu bengalo yakho basalise oonyana bokufa.
19_79_12_Yibuyisele kubamelwane bethu kasixhenxe esondweni lengubo yabo Ingcikivo yabo, abakungcikive ngayo, Nkosi.
19_79_13_Ke thina bantu bakho, zimvu zaluswa nguwe, Siya kubulela kuwe ngonaphakade, Sibalise ngendumiso yakho kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_80_1_Kumongameli; ngeyeenyibiba ezingqinisayo. Ka-Asafu.  Umhobe. Ulomalusi kaSirayeli, beka indlebe! Uloqhuba uYosefu njengezimvu, Ulohlala ezikerubhini, bengezela!
19_80_2_Phambi koEfrayim noBhenjamin noManase, Vusa ubugorha bakho,  Uze kusisindisa.
19_80_3_Thixo, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho, sisindiswe.
19_80_4_Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Kunini na uqhuma umsindo wakho ekuthandazeni kwabantu bakho?
19_80_5_Ubadlisa isonka seenyembezi, Wabaseza iinyembezi ngemilinganiso.
19_80_6_Usenze into abaxabana ngayo abamelwane bethu; Iintshaba zethu ziyasigculela.
19_80_7_Thixo wemikhosi, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho,  sisindiswe.
19_80_8_Wanyothula umdiliya eYiputa, Wagxotha iintlanga, wawutyala;
19_80_9_Wahlahla phambi kwawo, Wendelisa iingcambu, wazalisa ilizwe.
19_80_10_Zagutyungelwa iintaba ngumthunzi wawo, Nemisedare kaThixo ngamasebe awo.
19_80_11_Wasa amasebe awo elwandle, Namagatya awo kuwo uMlambo.
19_80_12_Uzityhobozeleni na iintango zawo, Ukuze bawukhe bonke abadlula ngendlela?
19_80_13_Ingulube yasehlathini iyawubhuqa, Nento edakasa endle iyawudla.
19_80_14_Thixo wemikhosi, khawubuye, Uqondele usemazulwini, ubone,  Uwuvelele lo mdiliya.
19_80_15_Yikhusele into esiyityeleyo isandla sakho sokunene, Unyana lo uzizimaseleyo ngokwakho.
19_80_16_Utshisiwe ngumlilo, uhlahliwe; Bayadaka ngokusongela kobuso bakho.
19_80_17_Isandla sakho masibe phezu komfo wesandla sakho sokunene,  Phezu koonyana babantu, ozizimaseleyo ngokwakho.
19_80_18_Asiyi kumka kuwe; Siphilise, silinqule igama lakho.
19_80_19_Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, sibuyise, Ukhanyise ubuso bakho,  sisindiswe.
19_81_1_Kumongameli; ngolwaseGati. Ka-Asafu. Memelelani kuThixo,  igwiba lethu, Dumani kuThixo kaYakobi.
19_81_2_Hlabani ingoma, nibethe ingqongqo, Uhadi olumnandi, kunye nomrhubhe.
19_81_3_Vuthelani isigodlo ukuthwasa kwenyanga, Nokuhlangana kwenyanga, ngemini yomthendeleko wethu.
19_81_4_Ngokuba ngummiselo lowo kuSirayeli, Lisiko likaThixo kaYakobi.
19_81_5_Sisingqiniso awasimisayo kwaYosefu, Ekucandeni kwakhe ezweni laseYiputa; Ndeva intetho endingayaziyo.
19_81_6_Ndawususa umthwalo egxalabeni lakhe; Izandla zakhe zasuka ezingobozini zokuthwala.
19_81_7_Embandezelweni wadanduluka wena, ndakuhlangula;  Ndakuphendula esitheni leendudumo, Ndakuvavanya emanzini aseMeribha. (Phakamisani.)
19_81_8_Ndathi, Yivani, bantu bam, ndiqononondise kuni; Sirayeli,  ukuba unokuphulaphula kum!
19_81_9_Makungabikho thixo wasemzini kuwe; Unganquli thixo wolunye uhlanga.
19_81_10_Ndim uYehova uThixo wakho, Okunyusileyo elizweni laseYiputa. Yakhamisa, ndiwuzalise umlomo wakho.
19_81_11_Ke abantu bam abaliva izwi lam, USirayeli akandivumanga.
19_81_12_Ndabanikela ebungqoleni beentliziyo zabo; Bahamba ngawabo amaqhinga.
19_81_13_Akwaba abantu bam bebendiva, Akwaba uSirayeli ubehamba ngendlela yam!
19_81_14_Bendiya kuzithoba kamsinya iintshaba zabo, Ndisibuyisele phezu kwababandezeli babo isandla sam.
19_81_15_Abamthiyayo uYehova bebeya kuhanahanisa kuye, Libe ngunaphakade ixesha labo.
19_81_16_Bendiya kubadlisa ingqolowa etyebileyo, Ndibahluthise ngobusi etsilini.
19_82_1_Umhobe ka-Asafu. UThixo umi ebandleni likaThixo, Ugweba phakathi koothixo; uthi,
19_82_2_Kunini na nigweba ngobugqwetha, Nibanonelela abangendawo?  (Phakamisani.)
19_82_3_Thethani ityala losweleyo nelenkedama, Gwebelani olusizana nolihlwempu.
19_82_4_Sizani osweleyo nolihlwempu, Bahlanguleni esandleni sabangendawo.
19_82_5_Abazi, abaqondi, Bahamba-hamba emnyameni; Ziyashukuma zonke iziseko zehlabathi.
19_82_6_Ndithe mna, Ningoothixo, Ningoonyana bOsenyangweni nonke niphela.
19_82_7_Noko niya kufa njengomntu, Niwe njengomnye kubathetheli.
19_82_8_Khawusuk ume, Thixo, gweba ehlabathini; Ngokuba uya kuzidla ilifa wena zonke iintlanga.
19_83_1_Ingoma. Umhobe ka-Asafu. Thixo, musa ukuthi cwaka, Musa ukuthi tu, musa ukuzola, Thixo.
19_83_2_Ngokuba nanzo iintshaba zakho zixokozela; Abakuthiyayo baphakamisa intloko.
19_83_3_Bagqugula igqugula elinobuqhophololo ngabantu bakho,  Bacebisane ngabagushiweyo nguwe.
19_83_4_Bathi, Yizani sibethe bee shwaka, bangabi luhlanga, Lingabi sakhunjulwa igama likaSirayeli.
19_83_5_Ngokuba bacebisana ngantliziyo-nye, Benza umnqophiso ngawe:
19_83_6_Iintente zakwaEdom nezakwaIshmayeli, AmaMowabhi namaHagari,
19_83_7_AmaGebhali nama-Amon nama-Amaleki, AmaFilisti kunye nabemi baseTire;
19_83_8_Nama-Asiriya athelele kubo, Baba yingalo koonyana bakaLote.  (Phakamisani.)
19_83_9_Yenza kubo njengoko wenza ngako kumaMidiyan, NakuSisera,  nakuYabhin esihlanjeni seKishon.
19_83_10_Batshabalala e-Endore, Baba ngumgquba wokugalelwa emhlabeni.
19_83_11_Benze bona, amanene abo ke, babe njengo-Orebhe nanjengoZebhe; Zonke iinkosi zabo zibe njengoZebha nanjengoTsalimuna;
19_83_12_Bona bathi, Masiwahluthe abe ngawethu amakhaya kaThixo.
19_83_13_Thixo wam, benze babe njengesaqhwithi, Njengomququ phambi komoya.
19_83_14_Njengomlilo odla ihlathi, Njengedangatye lilenya intaba,
19_83_15_Yenjenjalo ukubasukela ngoqhwithela lwakho, Ubakhwankqise ngomoya wakho ovuthuzayo.
19_83_16_Buzalise ubuso babo ngehlazo, Balifune igama lakho,  Yehova.
19_83_17_Mabadane bakhwankqiswe ngonaphakade, Babe neentloni,  badake;
19_83_18_Bazi ukuba wena, ugama linguYehova, unguwe wedwa Osenyangweni phezu kwehlabathi lonke.
19_84_1_Kumongameli; ngolwaseGati. Eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe.  Hayi, ukuthandeka kweminquba yakho, Yehova wemikhosi!
19_84_2_Umphefumlo wam ulangazelela, uyaphela kukuzilangazelela,  iintendelezo zikaYehova; Intliziyo yam nenyama yam imemelela kuThixo ophilileyo.
19_84_3_Intakana le ifumene ikhaya; Inkonjane izifumanele indlu,  Apho izalela khona amathole ayo: Izibingelelo zakho, Yehova wemikhosi, Kumkani wam, Thixo wam.
19_84_4_Hayi, uyolo lwabahlala endlwini yakho! Basaya kukudumisa.  (Phakamisani.)
19_84_5_Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abamandla akuwe, Abakhumbula umendo oya eZiyon!
19_84_6_Bephumela entilini yemithi yeBhaka, Bayenza ibe nemithombo;  Ewe, imvula iyithi wambu ngentsikelelo.
19_84_7_Baya besomelela ngokomelela; Babonakala phambi koThixo eZiyon, bathi,
19_84_8_Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Wuve umthandazo wam, Wubekele indlebe, Thixo kaYakobi. (Phakamisani.)
19_84_9_Khangela, Thixo, ngweletshetshe yethu, Ubukhangele ubuso bomthanjiswa wakho.
19_84_10_Ngokuba imini enye ezintendelezweni zakho ilungile kunewaka; Ndinyule ukuba semnyango endlwini kaThixo wam,  Kunokuhlala ngaphakathi kweentente zokungendawo.
19_84_11_Ngokuba ulilanga, uyingweletshetshe uYehova uThixo,  UYehova uyababala azukise; Abahamba ngokugqibeleleyo akabavimbi nto ilungileyo.
19_84_12_Yehova wemikhosi, Hayi, uyolo lomntu okholose ngawe!
19_85_1_Kumongameli; eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Yehova, wabe unetarhu kwilizwe lakho. Ububabuyisa abathinjwa bakaYakobi;
19_85_2_Ububuxolela ubugwenxa babantu bakho, Ubuziselela zonke izono zabo. (Phakamisani.)
19_85_3_Ubuwufinyeza umsindo wakho ophuphumayo, Ububuya ekuvutheni komsindo wakho.
19_85_4_Sibuyise, Thixo ongumsindisi wethu, Uyisuse ingqumbo yakho kuthi.
19_85_5_Uya kusiqumbela ngonaphakade na? Umsindo wakho uya kuwolulela kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana na?
19_85_6_Akuyi kubuya usiphilise na, Abantu bakho bavuye ngawe?
19_85_7_Sibonise inceba yakho, Yehova, Siphe usindiso lwakho.
19_85_8_Mandive oko aya kukuthetha uThixo, uYehova; Hayi, uthetha uxolo kubantu bakhe nakwabakhe benceba; Mabangabuyeli ke ekunyabeni kwabo.
19_85_9_Inene, usindiso lwakhe lusondele kwabamoyikayo, Ukuze luhlale uzuko ezweni lakowethu.
19_85_10_Kuya kuqubisana inceba nenyaniso, Kuya kwangana ubulungisa noxolo.
19_85_11_Inyaniso iya kuntshula emhlabeni, Ubulungisa buqondele busemazulwini.
19_85_12_Kananjalo uYehova uya kusinika okulungileyo, Ilizwe lethu lisinike indyebo yalo.
19_85_13_Ubulungisa buya kuhamba phambi kwakhe, Buyigqale ngentliziyo indlela yokunyathela kwakhe.
19_86_1_Umthandazo kaDavide. Thoba indlebe yakho, Yehova,  ndiphendule, Ngokuba ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu.
19_86_2_Wugcine umphefumlo wam, ngokuba ndingowenceba; Msindise,  wena Thixo wam, umkhonzi wakho, Lo ukholose ngawe.
19_86_3_Ndibabale, Nkosi yam, Ngokuba ndidanduluka kuwe yonke imini.
19_86_4_Wuvuyise umphefumlo womkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba umphefumlo wam ndiwuphakamisela kuwe, Nkosi yam;
19_86_5_Ngokuba ulungile wena, Nkosi yam, uxolela; Umkhulu ngenceba kubo bonke abakunqulayo.
19_86_6_Wubekele indlebe umthandazo wam, Yehova, Ulibazele indlebe izwi lokutarhuzisa kwam.
19_86_7_Ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam ndinqula wena, Ngokuba uya kundiphendula.
19_86_8_Akukho unjengawe, Nkosi yam, phakathi koothixo; Akukho zenzo zinjengezakho.
19_86_9_Zonke iintlanga owazenzayo ziya kuza ziqubude phambi kwakho, Nkosi yam, Zizukise igama lakho.
19_86_10_Ngokuba umkhulu, wenza imisebenzi ebalulekileyo, UnguThixo wena wedwa.
19_86_11_Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yakho, Ndihambe ngenyaniso yakho; Yibandakanye intliziyo yam ukuba ndiloyike igama lakho.
19_86_12_Ndiya kubulela kuwe, Nkosi yam, Thixo wam, ngentliziyo yonke, Ndilizukise igama lakho ngonaphakade:
19_86_13_Ngokuba inceba yakho ibe inkulu kum; Wawuhlangula umphefumlo wam kwelingaphantsi labafileyo.
19_86_14_Thixo, abakhukhumali basukele phezulu kum; Ibandla labanobungqwangangqwili lifuna umphefumlo wam; Abakumisi wena phambi kwabo.
19_86_15_Ke wena, Nkosi yam, unguThixo onemfesane, onobabalo, Ozeka kade umsindo, omkhulu ngenceba nenyaniso.
19_86_16_Ndibheke, undibabale; Mphe amandla akho umkhonzi wakho,  Umsindise unyana womkhonzazana wakho.
19_86_17_Ndenzele umqondiso wokulungileyo, Bawubone abandithiyayo,  badane, Kuba wena, Yehova, undincedile, wandithuthuzela.
19_87_1_Eyoonyana bakaKora. Umhobe. Ingoma. Useko alusekileyo lusezintabeni ezingcwele;
19_87_2_Amasango eZiyon uYehova uwathanda Ngaphezu kweminquba yonke kaYakobi.
19_87_3_Kuthethwa iinto ezizukileyo ngawe, Mzi kaThixo.  (Phakamisani.)
19_87_4_ORahabhi noBhabheli ndiya kubakhankanyela kwabandaziyo;  Nalo elamaFilisti nelaseTire, kunye nelakwaKushi, Aba bazalelwe khona.
19_87_5_Ngokusingisele kwiZiyon, kuya kuthiwa, Lo, nalo, uzalelwe kuyo, Abe yena Osenyangweni eyizinzisa.
19_87_6_UYehova uya kubala, ekuzibhaleni izizwi, athi, Abaya bazalelwe khona: (Phakamisani.)
19_87_7_Baze, bevuma beqamba, bathi, Yonke imithombo yam ikuwe.
19_88_1_Ingoma; umhobe woonyana bakaKora; kumongameli; ngosizi,  ngelidambileyo. Owokuqiqa kaHeman umEzra. Yehova, Thixo ongumsindisi wam, Mhlenikweni ndikhalayo ebusuku phambi kwakho,
19_88_2_Mawuze phambi kwakho umthandazo wam; Thoba indlebe yakho ekuhlahlambeni kwam.
19_88_3_Ngokuba umphefumlo wam uhluthi zizinto ezimbi, Ubomi bam bufike kwelabafileyo.
19_88_4_Ndibalelwe kwabahla baye emhadini, Ndisuke ndanjengomfo ongenamandla
19_88_5_Ndingumkhululwa phakathi kwabafileyo, Njengababuleweyo,  belele engcwabeni, Ongasabakhumbuliyo; Bona banqunyulweyo esandleni sakho.
19_88_6_Undibeke emhadini ongaphantsi, Ezindaweni ezimnyama,  ezinzulwini.
19_88_7_Ubushushu bakho bundishicilele, Undithobele onke amaza akho alwayo. (Phakamisani.)
19_88_8_Ubashenxisele kude kum abo ndazana nabo, Undenze isikizi kubo; Ndivalelwe, andinakuphuma.
19_88_9_Iliso lam liyaphela yingcinezelo. Ndidanduluka kuwe,  Yehova, yonke imini, Ndizolulela kuwe izandla zam.
19_88_10_Uya kuyenzela abafileyo na imisebenzi ebalulekileyo? Kuya kuvuka abangasekhoyo, kusini na, babulele kuwe? (Phakamisani.)
19_88_11_Ibaliswa engcwabeni na inceba yakho? Enzonzobileni na,  ukunyanisa kwakho?
19_88_12_Yaziswa emnyameni na imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo?  Baziswa ezweni lokulibala na ubulungisa bakho?
19_88_13_Ke mna, Yehova, ndizibika kuwe, Kwakusasa umthandazo wam wokuhlangabeza.
19_88_14_Uwuhlambelani na, Yehova, umphefumlo wam? Ubusitheliselani na ubuso bakho kum?
19_88_15_Ndilusizana, ndiyinto efayo kwasebuncinaneni bam,  Ndithwele izothuso zakho, lindikhohlile.
19_88_16_Kugqithe phezu kwamukuvutha kwakho, Izidandathekiso zakho zindibhangisile;
19_88_17_Zindijikelezile njengamanzi imini yonke, Zindizungulezile kwaphela.
19_88_18_Umsusile kum ondithandayo nonguwethu; Abo ndazana nabo babubumnyama.
19_89_1_Eyokuqiqa kaEtan, umEzra. Iinceba zikaYehova ndiya kuvuma ngazo ngonaphakade, Kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana ndiya kwazisa ukuthembeka kwakho ngomlomo wam.
19_89_2_Ngokuba ndithi, Yakheka ngonaphakade inceba; Amazulu, uya kukuzinzisa kuwo ukuthembeka kwakho.
19_89_3_Wathi, Ndenze umnqophiso nomnyulwa wam, Ndifungile kuDavide umkhonzi wam:
19_89_4_Ndiya kuyizimasa ngonaphakade imbewu yakho, Ndiyakhe itrone yakho kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana. (Phakamisani.)
19_89_5_Amazulu abulela imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo, Yehova,  Nokuthembeka kwakho ebandleni labangcwele.
19_89_6_Ngokuba ngubani na esibhakabhakeni olingana noYehova?  Ngubani na ofana noYehova phakathi koonyana bakaThixo.
19_89_7_UThixo ongowokungcangcazelelwa ebhungeni elikhulu labangcwele, Ongofanelwe kukoyikwa ngaphezu kwabo bonke abamngqongileyo?
19_89_8_Yehova, Thixo wemikhosi, Ngubani na onjengawe, oluqilima,  Yehova? Ukuthembeka kwakho kukungqongile.
19_89_9_Nguwena mlawuli wekratshi lolwandle; Ekuphakameni kwamaza alo uyawadambisa.
19_89_10_Nguwena mtyumzi kaRahabhi njengongxwelerhiweyo, Wazithi saa iintshaba zakho ngengalo yakho eqinileyo.
19_89_11_Lelakho izulu, likwalelakho ihlabathi; Elimiweyo nenzaliseko yalo lasekwa nguwe.
19_89_12_Umntla nomzantsi wadalwa nguwe; ITabhore neHermon zimemelela ngegama lakho.
19_89_13_Yeyakho ingalo enobugorha; Sithe nkqi isandla sakho,  siphakamile esokunene sakho.
19_89_14_Ummiso wetrone yakho bubulungisa nokusesikweni; Inceba nenyaniso ilungiselela phambi kwakho.
19_89_15_Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abakwaziyo ukuduma! Baya kuhamba ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho, Yehova.
19_89_16_Baya kugcoba egameni lakho imini yonke, Baphakame ngobulungisa bakho.
19_89_17_Ngokuba isihombo samandla abo nguwe; Ekuthandeni kwakho,  uphondo lwethu luphakamile.
19_89_18_Ngokuba ikuYehova ingweletshetshe yethu, UkoyiNgcwele kaSirayeli ukumkani wethu.
19_89_19_Wakha wathetha ngombono kowenceba wakho, wathi, Ndibeke uncedo egorheni, Ndiphakamise indodana ebantwini.
19_89_20_Ndifumene uDavide umkhonzi wam; Ndimthambisile ngeoli yam engcwele,
19_89_21_Esiya kuqinisela kuye isandla sam, Nengalo yam imkhaliphise.
19_89_22_Utshaba aluyi kumqubula; Nonyana wobugqwetha akayi kumcinezela.
19_89_23_Ndiya kubaqoba phambi kwakhe ababandezeli bakhe,  Ndibaxabele abamthiyayo.
19_89_24_Inyaniso yam nenceba yam inaye; Luya kuphakama uphondo lwakhe egameni lam.
19_89_25_Ndiya kusisa elwandle isandla sakhe, EMilanjeni esokunene sakhe.
19_89_26_Yena ukundibiza wothi, UnguBawo, UnguThixo wam, neliwa lokundisindisa.
19_89_27_Kananjalo mna ndiya kumenza owamazibulo, Osenyangweni kookumkani behlabathi.
19_89_28_Ndiya kumgcinela inceba yam ngonaphakade, Umnqophiso wam unyanise kuye;
19_89_29_Ndiyimise ngonaphakade imbewu yakhe, Netrone yakhe ibe njengemihla yamazulu.
19_89_30_Ukuba bathe oonyana bakhe bawulahla umyalelo wam, Abahamba ngamasiko am;
19_89_31_Ukuba bathe bayihlambela imimiselo yam, Abayigcina imithetho yam:
19_89_32_Ndoluvelela ukreqo lwabo ngentonga, Nobugwenxa babo ngemivumbo.
19_89_33_Ke yona inceba yam andiyi kuyaphula kuye, Ndingaxoki ekuthembekeni kwam.
19_89_34_Andiyi kuwuhlambela umnqophiso wam, Ndiyijike into ephume emlonyeni wam.
19_89_35_Ndibufunge kwakanye ubungcwele bam, ndathi, Inene, andiyi kumxokisa uDavide;
19_89_36_Imbewu yakhe iya kubakho ngonaphakade, Netrone yakhe njengelanga phambi kwam.
19_89_37_Iya kuqiniseka njengenyanga ngonaphakade; Ingqina lasesibhakabhakeni lithembekile. (Phakamisani.)
19_89_38_Kwawena umhlambile, umcekisile, Umphuphumele ngomsindo umthanjiswa wakho;
19_89_39_Uthe nethe ngumnqophiso womkhonzi wakho; Usidyobhile emhlabeni isithsaba sakhe.
19_89_40_Uzityhobozile zonke iintango zakhe, Uzenze inxuwa iinqaba zakhe.
19_89_41_Bayamphanga bonke abadlula ngendlela, Waba yingcikivo kubamelwane bakhe.
19_89_42_Usiphakamisile isandla sokunene sabambandezelayo,  Uzivuyisile zonke iintshaba zakhe.
19_89_43_Wabuyisa nokubuyisa uhlangothi lwekrele lakhe, Akwammisa emfazweni.
19_89_44_Umsusile enkazimlweni yakhe, Uyikhahlele emhlabeni itrone yakhe,
19_89_45_Uyinqumle imihla yobutsha bakhe, Wamthi wambu ngokudana.  (Phakamisani.)
19_89_46_Kunini na, Yehova, uhleli uzisithelisile, Busitsha njengomlilo ubushushu bakho?
19_89_47_Khumbula ukunqamka kwam, into okuyiyo! Ubadaleleni na,  baba yinto engento bonke oonyana babantu?
19_89_48_Yiyiphi na indoda ehleliyo, engayi kukubona ukufa,  Enokuwusindisa umphefumlo wayo esandleni selabafileyo?  (Phakamisani.)
19_89_49_Ziphi na iinceba zakho zangaphambili, Nkosi yam,  Owamfungela zona uDavide ngokuthembeka kwakho?
19_89_50_Khumbula, Nkosi yam, ukungcikiveka kwabakhonzi bakho;  Ndithwele esifubeni sam zonke izizwe ezininzi,
19_89_51_Ezingcikivayo, ziziintshaba zakho, Yehova; Ezingcikiva amanyathela omthanjiswa wakho.
19_89_52_Makabongwe uYehova ngonaphakade. Amen, amen.
19_90_1_Umthandazo kaMoses, umfo wakwaThixo. Nkosi yam, ulikhaya wena kuthi, Isizukulwana ngesizukulwana.
19_90_2_Kungekazalwa zintaba, Ungekavelisi mhlaba, nazwe limiweyo,  Kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni, wena unguThixo.
19_90_3_Umbuyisela umntu eluthulini, Uthi, Buyani, nyana babantu.
19_90_4_Ngokuba iwaka leminyaka emehlweni akho Linjengemini yezolo,  xa idluleyo, Linjengomlindo wasebusuku.
19_90_5_Uyabakhukulisa, balale; Ngengomso babuya bahlume njengotyani.
19_90_6_Ngomso butyatyamba, bubuye buhlume; Ngokuhlwa buyasikwa bome.
19_90_7_Ngokuba siyaphela ngumsindo wakho, Sikhwankqiswe bubushushu bakho.
19_90_8_Ububeke ubugwenxa bethu phambi kwakho, Nesibufihlileyo ububeka ekukhanyiseleni kobuso bakho.
19_90_9_Ngokuba yonke imihla yethu isangene ngokuphuphuma komsindo wakho, Siyiphelisile iminyaka yethu njengentsebezo.
19_90_10_Imihla yeminyaka yethu iseminyakeni engamashumi asixhenxe;  Ukuba ithe yaba mininzi kakhulu, iba yiminyaka emashumi asibhozo, Libe ke iqhayiya layo likukwaphuka nokungabi nto yanto, Ngokuba ithe phe yakhawuleza, saphaphazela semka.
19_90_11_Ngubani na owaziyo amandla omsindo wakho, Nokuphuphuma kwawo, ngoko ufanele ukoyikwa ngako?
19_90_12_Sazise kanye ukuyibala imihla yethu, Ukuze sizuze intliziyo elumkileyo.
19_90_13_Buya, Yehova, kunini na? Uzohlwaye ngenxa yabakhonzi bakho.
19_90_14_Sihluthise kwakusasa ngenceba yakho, Simemelele, sivuye yonke imihla yethu.
19_90_15_Sivuyise ngangemihla owasicinezela ngayo. Ngangeminyaka esabona ububi ngayo.
19_90_16_Mayibonakale kubakhonzi bakho imisebenzi yakho,  Nobungangamela bakho koonyana babo.
19_90_17_Ubumnandi bukaYehova mabube phezu kwethu. Zimasa isenzo sezandla zethu phezu kwethu, Isenzo sezandla zethu usizimase sona.
19_91_1_Ohleli esitheni lOsenyangweni, Azilalise emthunzini kaSomandla,
19_91_2_Uthi kuYehova, Hlathi lam, Mboniselo yam, Thixo wam,  endikholose ngaye!
19_91_3_Ngokuba ngokwakhe uya kukuhlangula emgibeni womthiyeli,  Endyikityeni yokufa eyeyelisayo.
19_91_4_Wokugubungela ngeentsiba zakhe, Uzimele phantsi kwamaphiko akhe. Likhaka, yingweletshetshe inyaniso yakhe.
19_91_5_Akuyi koyikiswa zizothuso ebusuku, Nalutolo lubaleka emini;
19_91_6_Nandyikitya yakufa ihamba esithokothokweni, Nasifo sibhubhisayo, sibhuqa emini enkulu.
19_91_7_Kungawa iwaka ecaleni kwakho, Isigidi ngasekunene kwakho,  Kodwa kungasondeli nto kuwe.
19_91_8_Wokhangela ngamehlo akho odwa, Ukubonele ukubuyekezwa kwabangendawo.
19_91_9_Ngokuba nguwe, Yehova, ihlathi lam. Umenze Osenyangweni ikhaya lakho.
19_91_10_Akuyi kuqubisana bubi nawe. Kungafiki sibetho ententeni yakho.
19_91_11_Ngokuba izithunywa zakhe uziwisele umthetho ngawe, Ukuba zikugcine ezindleleni zakho zonke.
19_91_12_Zokuthwala wena ngezandla zozibini, Hleze ubetheke ngonyawo lwakho etyeni.
19_91_13_Wonyathela phezu kwengonyama nephimpi, Uyinyashe ingonyama entsha nenamba ngeenyawo.
19_91_14_Ngokuba enamathele kum, ndomsiza; Ndimse engxondeni,  ngokuba elazi igama lam.
19_91_15_Wondibiza, ndiphendule, Ndoba naye embandezelweni;  Ndomhlangula, ndimzukise;
19_91_16_Ndimanelise ngemihla emide, Ndimbonise ukusindisa kwam.
19_92_1_Umhobe; ingoma, ngemini yesabatha. Kulungile ukubulela kuYehova, Nokulibethela uhadi igama lakho, Wena usenyangweni;
19_92_2_Ukuyixela kwakusasa inceba yakho, Nokunyanisa kwakho ebusuku,
19_92_3_Ngoweentambo ezilishumi nangomrhubhe, Ngokulubetha uhadi ngofefe.
19_92_4_Ngokuba uyandivuyisa, Yehova, ngomsebenzi wakho, Ngezenzo zezandla zakho ndinokumemelela.
19_92_5_Azizikhulu izenzo zakho, Yehova! Zinzulu kakhulu iingcinga zakho.
19_92_6_Isityhakala asinakwazi; Isinyabi asikuqondi oko.
19_92_7_Ekudubuleni kongendawo njengomfuno, Ekutyatyambeni kwabasebenzi bonke bobutshinga, Kukuze batshabalale ngonaphakade.
19_92_8_Ke wena, Yehova, ungophezulu ngonaphakade.
19_92_9_Ngokuba uyabona, iintshaba zakho, Yehova, Ngokuba uyabona,  iintshaba zakho ziva kutshabalala; Baya kuchithwa-chithwa bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.
19_92_10_Uyaluphakamisa uphondo lwam njengolwenqu; Ndigalelwe ioli entsha.
19_92_11_Iliso lam liyababonela abandilalelayo, Indlebe yam iyabeva abasukela phezulu kum benobubi.
19_92_12_Amalungisa aya kudubula njengesundu, Aya kukhula njengomsedare weLebhanon.
19_92_13_Etyelwe nje endlwini kaYehova, Aya kutyatyamba ezintendelezweni zoThixo wethu.
19_92_14_Aya kuhluma eselenezimvi, Aya kuba etyebile, eluhlaza;
19_92_15_Ukuze axele ukuba uthe tye uYehova, Uliwa lam, kungekho bugqwetha kuye.
19_93_1_UYehova ungukumkani, uzambathise ubungangamsha; UYehova uzambathise, ubhinqe, amandla; Lizinzile ke elimiweyo,  alinakushukunyiswa.
19_93_2_Kususela koko, izinzile itrone yakho; Kususela kwaphakade,  ukho wena.
19_93_3_Imilambo iphakamisile, Yehova, Imilambo iphakamise isandi sayo, Imilambo iphakamise ingxolo yayo.
19_93_4_Ngaphezu kwezandi zamanzi amaninzi Angangamsha, ngaphezu kwamaza alwayo olwandle, Unobungangamsha phezulu uYehova.
19_93_5_Izingqiniso zakho zinyanise kunene, Ubungcwele buyifanele indlu yakho, Yehova, imihla emide.
19_94_1_Thixo wempindezelo, Yehova, Thixo wempindezelo, bengezela!
19_94_2_Phakama, Mgwebi wehlabathi! Babuyisele impatho yabo abanekratshi.
19_94_3_Kunini na abangendawo, Yehova, Kunini na abangendawo bevuyelela?
19_94_4_Balephuza amagwebu, bathetha ngokusa, Bayandolosa bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.
19_94_5_Batyumza abantu bakho, Yehova, Bacinezela ilifa lakho.
19_94_6_Babulala umhlolokazi nowasemzini, Bancinitha inkedama.
19_94_7_Bathi ke, Akaboni uYehova, Akagqali uThixo kaYakobi.
19_94_8_Qondani, nina bazizityhakala ebantwini; Nina zinyabi, niya kuqiqa nini na?
19_94_9_Omilisele indlebe, akayi kuva na? Obumbe iliso, akayi kukhangela na?
19_94_10_Umthethisi weentlanga akayi kohlwaya na, Ulofundisa abantu ukwazi?
19_94_11_UYehova ngumazi weengcinga zabantu, Ukuba zingumphunga.
19_94_12_Hayi, uyolo lwendoda oyithethisayo, Yehova, Oyifundisayo ngomyalelo wakho;
19_94_13_Ukuba uyizolise eziminini zobubi, Ade ambelwe isihogo ongendawo.
19_94_14_Ngokuba uYehova akabalahli abantu bakhe, Akalishiyi ilifa lakhe.
19_94_15_Ngokuba isiko liya kubuyela ebulungiseni, Balilandele bonke abantliziyo zithe tye.
19_94_16_Ngubani na oya kusukela phezulu kubo abanobubi, ngenxa yam? Ngubani na oya kumelana nabasebenzi bobutshinga, ngenxa yam?
19_94_17_Koko uYehova abe luncedo lwam, Umphefumlo wam unge uhle msinya, waya apho kuthiwa cwaka khona.
19_94_18_Ukuba ndithi, Lwatyibilika unyawo lwam, Isuka inceba yakho, Yehova, indixhase.
19_94_19_Ebuninzini beengcinga-ngcinga zam ngaphakathi kwam,  Iintuthuzelo zakho ziyawuyolisa umphefumlo wam.
19_94_20_Ingaqhelana nawe na itrone yolweyeliselo, Ebumba ububi ngommiselo?
19_94_21_Bahlanganyela umphefumlo welungisa, Baligwebe igazi elimsulwa.
19_94_22_Kanti ke uYehova uyingxonde kum, UThixo wam liliwa endizimela ngalo.
19_94_23_Ububuyisela phezu kwabo ubutshinga babo, Uba bhangisa ngobubi babo; Uya kubabhangisa uYehova, uThixo wethu.
19_95_1_Yizani simemelele kuYehova, Sidume kwiliwa lokusindiswa kwethu.
19_95_2_Masize phambi kobuso bakhe sinombulelo, Masidume kuye ngeengoma.
19_95_3_Ngokuba uThixo omkhulu nguYehova, NguKumkani omkhulu ngaphezu koothixo bonke.
19_95_4_Uzisesandleni sakhe iingontsingontsi zehlabathi, Neencopho zeentaba zezakhe.
19_95_5_Ulolwakhe ulwandle, nguyena walwenzayo; Nomhlaba owomileyo zawubumba izandla zakhe.
19_95_6_Yizani, masiqubude, siguqe, Sithobe phambi koYehova umenzi wethu.
19_95_7_Ngokuba nguThixo wethu yena, Thina ke singabantu bokwaluswa nguye, nezimvu zesandla sakhe. Namhla, ukuba ninokuliva izwi lakhe,
19_95_8_Musani ukuyenza lukhuni intliziyo yenu, njengaseMeribha,  Njengemini yaseMasa entlango;
19_95_9_Oko bandilingayo ooyihlo. Bandicikida, bewubona umsebenzi wam.
19_95_10_Iminyaka yaba ngamashumi amane ndikruqukile sesi sizukulwana, Ndathi, Ngabantu abantliziyo zindwendwayo, Abazazi iindlela zam bona;
19_95_11_Endada ndafunga ndinomsindo, ukuthi, Inene, abasayi kungena ekuphumleni kwam.
19_96_1_Vumani kuYehova ingoma entsha, Vumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi.
19_96_2_Vumani kuYehova, bongani igama lakhe, Shumayelani iimini ngeemini iindaba ezilungileyo zosindiso lwakhe.
19_96_3_Balisani ezintlangeni uzuko lwakhe, Balisani ezizweni zonke imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo;
19_96_4_Ngokuba mkhulu uYehova, engowokudunyiswa kunene; Uyoyikeka yena ngaphezu koothixo bonke.
19_96_5_Ngokuba bonke oothixo bezizwe abanto zanto; UYehova yena wenza amazulu.
19_96_6_Yindili nobungangamela phambi kwakhe, Ngamandla nokuhomba engcweleni yakhe.
19_96_7_Mnikeni uYehova, nina mizalwane yezizwe, Mnikeni uYehova uzuko namandla;
19_96_8_Mnikeni uYehova uzuko lwegama lakhe; Thwalani umnikelo,  nize ezintendelezweni zakhe.
19_96_9_Mnquleni uYehova, nivethe ezingcwele, Thuthumelani phambi kwakhe, nonke hlabathi.
19_96_10_Yithini ezintlangeni, UYehova ngukumkani, Liya kuzinza ngoko elimiweyo, lingashukumi, Uya kugweba phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthe tye.
19_96_11_Liya kuvuya izulu, Ligcobe ihlabathi; Luya kugquma ulwandle, nenzaliseko yalo.
19_96_12_Liya kudlamka ilizwe, nento yonke ekulo, Ize imemelele yonke imithi yehlathi
19_96_13_Phambi koYehova, ngokuba esiza, Ngokuba esiza kugweba ihlabathi. Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Nezizwe ngokunyanisa kwakhe.
19_97_1_UYehova ngukumkani; liyagcoba ihlabathi, Ziyavuya iziqithi ezininzi.
19_97_2_Ngamafu nesithokothoko ngeenxa zonke kuye, Bubulungisa nokusesikweni ummiso wetrone yakhe.
19_97_3_Kuhamba umlilo phambi kwakhe; Ulenya ababandezeli bakhe ngeenxa zonke.
19_97_4_Ikhanyisa elimiweyo imibane yakhe; Uyabona umhlaba,  uzibhija-bhije.
19_97_5_Iintaba zinyibilika njengomthwebeba phambi koYehova, Phambi kweNkosi yehlabathi lonke.
19_97_6_Izulu lixela ubulungisa bakhe, Zilubone uzuko lwakhe zonke izizwe.
19_97_7_Badanile bonke abakhonza umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, Abaqhayisa ngeento ezingento; Bayamnqula bonke oothixo.
19_97_8_Iyeva, iyavuya iZiyon, Ziyagcoba iintombi zakwaYuda, Ngenxa yemigwebo yakho, Yehova.
19_97_9_Ngokuba nguwe, Yehova, Osenyangweni phezu kwehlabathi lonke; Unyukile kunene ngaphezu koothixo bonke.
19_97_10_Bathandi bakaYehova, kuthiyeni okubi. Umgcini wemiphefumlo yabenceba bakhe Uya kubahlangula esandleni sabangendawo.
19_97_11_Ukukhanya likuhlwayelelwe ilungisa, Novuyo baluhlwayelelwe abantliziyo zithe tye.
19_97_12_Vuyani ngoYehova, malungisa, Nibulele isikhumbuzo sakhe esingcwele.
19_98_1_Umhobe. Vumani kuYehova ingoma entsha, Ngokuba wenze imisebenzi ebalulekileyo; Simzuzele uloyiso isandla sakhe sokunene, nengalo yakhe engcwele.
19_98_2_Ulwazisile uYehova usindiso lwakhe, Ubutyhilile emehlweni eentlanga ubulungisa bakhe.
19_98_3_Ukhumbule inceba yakhe nokunyanisa kwakhe kwindlu kaSirayeli; Zilubonile zonke iziphelo zehlabathi usindiso loThixo wethu.
19_98_4_Dumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi, Gqobhokelani ekumemeleleni, nibethe uhadi.
19_98_5_Mbetheleni uhadi uYehova, Uhadi nelizwi lengoma;
19_98_6_Ngamaxilongo nezwi lesigodlo Dumani phambi koKumkani uYehova.
19_98_7_Malugqume ulwandle nenzaliseko yalo, Elimiweyo nabemi balo.
19_98_8_Imilambo mayibethe izandla, Zimemelele kunye iintaba
19_98_9_Phambi koYehova, ngokuba esiza kugweba ihlabathi. Uya kuligweba elimiweyo ngobulungisa, Izizwe ngokuthe tye.
19_99_1_UYehova nguKumkani, ziyagungqa izizwe; Ulohlala ekerubhini,  liyashukuma ihlabathi.
19_99_2_UYehova mkhulu eZiyon; Uphakamile ngaphezu kwezizwe zonke.
19_99_3_Baya kulibulela igama lakho elikhulu eloyikekayo; Ngokuba ungcwele yena.
19_99_4_Amandla okumkani athanda okusesikweni; Uwazimasile wena ngokuthe tye; Wenze okusesikweni nobulungisa kwaYakobi wena.
19_99_5_Mphakamiseni uYehova, uThixo wethu, Niqubude esitulweni seenyawo zakhe; Ngokuba ungcwele yena.
19_99_6_OoMoses noAron phakathi kwababingeleli bakhe, NoSamuweli phakathi kwabalinqulayo igama lakhe, Baye bebiza kuYehova,  wabaphendula yena.
19_99_7_Wathetha kubo esemqulwini welifu; Bazigcina izingqino zakhe, Nommiselo awabanika wona.
19_99_8_Yehova, Thixo wethu, wabaphendula wena, Waba nguThixo oxolelayo kubo, Ongoziphindezelayo iintlondi zabo.
19_99_9_Mphakamiseni uYehova, uThixo wethu, Niqubude entabeni yakhe engcwele; Ngokuba ungcwele uYehova uThixo wethu.
19_100_1_Umhobe wombingelelo wokubulela. Dumani kuYehova, nonke hlabathi.
19_100_2_Mkhonzeni uYehova nivuya; Yizani phambi kwakhe nimemelela.
19_100_3_Yazini ukuba uYehova nguThixo yena; Wasenza yena,  asisithi; Singabantu bakhe nezimvu ezaluswa nguye.
19_100_4_Ngenani emasangweni akhe nibulela, Ezintendelezweni zakhe nidumisa; Bulelani kuye, bongani igama lakhe.
19_100_5_Ngokuba uYehova ulungile, Inceba yakhe ingunaphakade,  Ukunyaniseka kwakhe kukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_101_1_EkaDavide. Umhobe. Ndiya kuvuma ngenceba nangomgwebo;  Ndiya kukubethela uhadi, Yehova.
19_101_2_Ndiya kuqiqa indlela yengqibelelo; Uya kuza nini na kum?  Ndiya kuhamba ngengqibelelo yentliziyo yam Phakathi kwendlu yam.
19_101_3_Andiyi kubeka phambi kwamehlo am Nto inobutshijolo.  Ukwenza ngokunxaxha ndikuthiyile, Akuyi kunamathela kum.
19_101_4_Intliziyo ejibilizayo iya kukhwelela kude kum; Into embi andiyi kuyazi.
19_101_5_Omhlebayo ummelwane wakhe ngasese, Lowo ndiya kumbhangisa.  Omehlo aqwayingileyo, ontliziyo igungubeleyo, Lowo andinakumthwala.
19_101_6_Amehlo am akwabanyanisayo ezweni, Ukuba bandiphahle;  Ohamba ngendlela yengqibelelo, Lowo makandilungiselele.
19_101_7_Akayi kuhlala phakathi kwendlu yam Owenza inkohliso;  Othetha ubuxoki akayi kuqina Phambi kwamehlo am.
19_101_8_Imiso ngemiso, ndiya kubabhangisa Bonke abangendawo belizwe, Ukuze ndibanqumle emzini kaYehova Bonke abasebenzi bobutshinga.
19_102_1_Umthandazo wolusizana xa atyhafileyo, ephalaza iinkalazo zakhe phambi koYehova. Yehova, wuve umthandazo wam, Kufike kuwe ukuzibika kwam.
19_102_2_Musa ukubusithelisa ubuso bakho kum ngemini yokubandezelwa kwam, Ndithobele indlebe yakho; Ngemini endidanduluka ngayo khawuleza undiphendule.
19_102_3_Ngokuba iyaphela imihla yam njengomsi; Amathambo am avutha njengeziko.
19_102_4_Ibethwe yoma njengomfuno intliziyo yam, Ngokuba ndilibele nokudla ukudla kwam.
19_102_5_Ngenxa yezwi lokugcuma kwam Amathambo am atshele enyameni yam.
19_102_6_Ndifana nengcwangube yentlango, Ndinjengesikhova sasemanxoweni.
19_102_7_Andilali; Ndinjengentaka eyodwa phezu kwendlu.
19_102_8_Imini yonke ziyandingcikiva iintshaba zam, Abandigezelayo bathuka ngam.
19_102_9_Ngokuba ndidle uthuthu njengesonka, Into endiyiselayo ndiyiphithikeze nezililo,
19_102_10_Ngenxa yokubhabhama kwakho noburhalarhume bakho; Ngokuba undifunqule wandilahla.
19_102_11_Imihla yam injengokoluka kwamathunzi; Mna ndomile njengomfuno.
19_102_12_Ke wena, Yehova, uhleli ngonaphakade, Inkumbuzo yakho ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_102_13_Uya kusuk ume, uyiphathe iZiyon ngemfesane; Ngokuba lixesha lokuyibabala eli, ngokuba lifikile ixesha elimisiweyo.
19_102_14_Ngokuba abakhonzi bakho bakholiswe ngamatye ayo, Uthuli lwayo banofefe ngalo.
19_102_15_Ziya kuloyika iintlanga igama likaYehova, Nookumkani bonke behlabathi ubuqaqawuli bakho;
19_102_16_Ngokuba eyakhile iZiyon uYehova, Wabonakala ebuqaqawulini bakhe.
19_102_17_Uwubhekile umthandazo wabachushuluzayo, Akawudela umthandazo wabo.
19_102_18_Oko kuya kubhalelwa isizukulwana esizayo, Abantu abaza kudalwa badumise uYehova.
19_102_19_Ngokuba uqondele, esendaweni yakhe ephezulu engcwele;  Wondela ehlabathini esemazulwini uYehova,
19_102_20_Ukuba akuve ukugcuma kwabakhonkxiweyo, Abakhulule oonyana bokufa;
19_102_21_Bancokole eZiyon ngegama likaYehova, Ngendumiso yakhe eYerusalem;
19_102_22_Ekubuthelaneni kwezizwe ndawonye, Nezikumkani, ukuba zikhonze uYehova.
19_102_23_Uwathobile endleleni amandla am, Uyinqamle imihla yam.
19_102_24_Ndithi, Thixo wam, musa ukundisusa phakathi kwemihla yam.  Ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana iminyaka yakho.
19_102_25_Waliseka kudala ihlabathi; Lisisenzo sezandla zakho izulu.
19_102_26_Ezo zinto ziya kudaka, wena ke ume; Zona zonke ziya konakala njengengubo, Wozigugisa njengesambatho, ziguge;
19_102_27_Ke wena uhleli unguwe, Iminyaka yakho ayinakuphela.
19_102_28_Oonyana babakhonzi bakho baya kuhlala, Imbewu yabo izimaseke phambi kwakho.
19_103_1_EkaDavide. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Ilibonge igama lakhe elingcwele into yonke engaphakathi kwam.
19_103_2_Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Ungayilibali yonke impatho yakhe entle:
19_103_3_Uloxolela bonke ubugwenxa bakho; Ulophilisa zonke izifo zakho;
19_103_4_Ulokhulula ubomi bakho esihogweni, Akuthi jize ngenceba nemfesane;
19_103_5_Lo uwuzalisayo umlomo wakho ngento elungileyo, Buhlaziyeke ubutsha bakho njengobokhozi.
19_103_6_NguYehova umenzi wemisebenzi yobulungisa, Nezigwebo ngenxa yabacudisiweyo bonke;
19_103_7_Umazisi weendlela zakhe kuMoses, Wezenzo zakhe ezincamisayo koonyana bakaSirayeli.
19_103_8_Unemfesane enobabalo uYehova, Uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ngenceba.
19_103_9_Akaphiki kuphele, Akawugcini umsindo ngonaphakade.
19_103_10_Akenzi kuthi ngokwezono zethu, Akasiphathi ngokobugwenxa bethu;
19_103_11_Ngokuba injengokuphakama kwezulu phezu komhlaba, Ukuba namandla, inceba yakhe kwabamoyikayo;
19_103_12_Kunjengokuba kude kwempumalanga entshonalanga,  Ukulukhwelelisa kwakhe kuthi ukreqo lwethu;
19_103_13_Kunjengokusikwa yimfesane koyise kubantwana, Ukusikwa yimfesane kukaYehova kwabamoyikayo.
19_103_14_Ngokuba uyakwazi yena ukubunjwa kwethu, Ekhumbula ukuba siluthuli.
19_103_15_Hayi, umntu! Injengotyani imihla yakhe; Njengentyantyambo yasendle, kunjalo ukutyatyamba kwakhe.
19_103_16_Xa uthe umoya wadlula kuyo, ayibikho, Ingabi sazana nayo indawo yayo.
19_103_17_Ke yona inceba kaYehova ikwabamoyikayo, kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni, Nobulungisa bakhe bukoonyana boonyana;
19_103_18_Kwabawugcinileyo umnqophiso wakhe, Kwabazikhumbulayo iziyalezo zakhe ukuba bazenze.
19_103_19_UYehova uyizinzisile emazulwini itrone yakhe, Ubukumkani bakhe bulawula into yonke.
19_103_20_Mbongeni uYehova, nina zithunywa zakhe, Magorha omeleleyo, alenzayo ilizwi lakhe, Ephulaphula isandi selizwi lakhe.
19_103_21_Mbongeni uYehova, nonke mikhosi yakhe, Balungiseleli bakhe, benzi bokuthanda kwakhe.
19_103_22_Mbongeni uYehova, nonke zenzo zakhe, Ezindaweni zonke zobukumkani bakhe. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam.
19_104_1_Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam. Yehova, Thixo wam, umkhulu kakhulu; Wambethe indili nobungangamela.
19_104_2_Ulothi wambu ukukhanya njengengubo. Ulolaneka izulu njengelengalenga lentente;
19_104_3_Ulohlanganisa emanzini imiqadi yamagumbi akhe aphezulu;  Ulowenza amafu inqwelo yakhe, Ulohamba ngamaphiko omoya;
19_104_4_Ulowenza izithunywa zakhe imimoya, Abalungiseleli bakhe umlilo olenyayo.
19_104_5_Waliseka ihlabathi phezu kwemimiso yalo, Ukuba lingashukunyiswa naphakade kanaphakade.
19_104_6_Waligubungela ngamanzi anzongonzongo njengesambatho, Ema amanzi phezu kweentaba.
19_104_7_Ekukhalimeni kwakho asaba, Ezwini lendudumo yakho abaleka buphuthuphuthu;
19_104_8_Kwenyuka iintaba, kwehla izihlambo, Aya kuloo ndawo ubuwasekele yona.
19_104_9_Wamisa umda ukuba angegqithi, Angabuye awugubungele umhlaba.
19_104_10_Ulothuma imithombo iye ezihlanjeni; Ihamba phakathi kweentaba;
19_104_11_Iseza zonke iinyamakazi zasendle; Amaesile asendle aqabula inxano lawo.
19_104_12_Kuhlala phezu kwayo iintaka zezulu, Zitsholoza phakathi kwamasebe;
19_104_13_Uloseza iintaba kumagumbi akhe aphezulu; Uyahlutha umhlaba ziziqhamo zezenzo zakho.
19_104_14_Ulontshulisela iinkomo utyani, Nomfuno wokunceda umntu;  Ukuze kuphume isonka emhlabeni.
19_104_15_Iwayini iyivuyise intliziyo yomntu; Bukhazimle ubuso ngeoli, Isonka siyixhase intliziyo yomntu.
19_104_16_Iyahlutha imithi kaYehova, Imisedare yaseLebhanon awayityalayo,
19_104_17_Apho zakhela khona iintaka; Ingwamza, isemisipresini indlu yayo.
19_104_18_Iintaba zona ezo ziphakamileyo zezamagogo, Amawa azimela iimbila.
19_104_19_Inyanga wayenzela amaxesha ayo, Ilanga liyakwazi ukutshona kwalo.
19_104_20_Wenza ubumnyama wena, kube sebusuku, Ashukume ngabo onke amarhamncwa ehlathi.
19_104_21_Iingonyama ezintsha zigqumela ukuqwenga, Zifuna ukudla kwazo kuThixo.
19_104_22_Lakuthi chapha ilanga, ziyahlanganisana, Zibuthume ezikhundleni zazo.
19_104_23_Uyaphuma umntu aye emsebenzini wakhe Nasenkonzweni yakhe,  ahlwise.
19_104_24_Hayi, ukuba zininzi izenzo zakho, Yehova! Zonke ziphela uzenze ngobululumko; Uzele umhlaba zizidalwa zakho.
19_104_25_Nalo ulwandle lulukhulu, lubanzi ngeenxa zombini; Kulapho kuzinambuzane zingenakubalwa, Ezincinane kwanezikhulu izinto eziphilileyo.
19_104_26_Kulapho kuhamba iinqanawa; Nango umnenga owawubumbela ukudlala kulo.
19_104_27_Zonke ezo nto ziphela zikhangele kuwe, Ukuba uzinike ukudla kwazo ngexesha elililo.
19_104_28_Uyazinika, ziyachola; Uyasivula isandla sakho, ziyahlutha kokulungileyo.
19_104_29_Uyabusithelisa ubuso bakho, ziyakhwankqiswa;  Uyawuhlanganisa umoya wazo, ziphume umphefumlo, Zibuyele eluthulini lwazo.
19_104_30_Uthuma umoya wakho, ziyadalwa, Ubuhlaziye ubuso bomhlaba.
19_104_31_Ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova mabube ngunaphakade; UYehova makavuye ngezenzo zakhe;
19_104_32_Ulobheka emhlabeni, uzamazame; Uchukumisa iintaba,  ziqhume.
19_104_33_Ndiya kuvuma kuYehova lo gama ndidla ubomi, Ndiya kumbethela uhadi uThixo wam ekubeni ndingokhoyo.
19_104_34_Makube nencasa kuye ukucamngca kwam; Mna ndiya kuvuya ngoYehova.
19_104_35_Mabagqitywe ehlabathini aboni, Bangabi sabakho abangendawo. Mbonge uYehova, mphefumlo wam, Haleluya!
19_105_1_Bulelani kuYehova, nqulani igama lakhe; Yazisani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezincamisileyo.
19_105_2_Vumani kuye, mbetheleni uhadi; Xoxani ngemisebenzi yakhe yonke ebalulekileyo.
19_105_3_Qhayisani ngegama lakhe elingcwele; Mayivuye intliziyo yabamquqelayo uYehova.
19_105_4_Ngxamelani uYehova namandla akhe; Funani ubuso bakhe ngamaxesha onke.
19_105_5_Khumbulani imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo awayenzayo,  Izimanga zakhe, nezigwebo zomlomo wakhe,
19_105_6_Mbewu ka-Abraham, yomkhonzi wakhe, Nyana bakaYakobi,  banyulwa bakhe.
19_105_7_NguYehova uThixo wethu yena; Zisehlabathini lonke izigwebo zakhe.
19_105_8_Uwukhumbula ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe, Ilizwi awalimisela iwaka lezizukulwana;
19_105_9_Awanqophisana ngalo noAbraham, Awalifungela uIsake;
19_105_10_Awalimisayo ukuba libe ngummiselo kuYakobi, Libe ngumnqophiso ongunaphakade kuSirayeli;
19_105_11_Esithi, Ndikunika ilizwe lakwaKanan, Libe licandelo lelifa lenu;
19_105_12_Besengamadoda ambalwa, Bebancinane, bengabaphambukeli kulo.
19_105_13_Babehamba besuka kolunye uhlanga, baye kolunye uhlanga,  Besuka kobunye ubukumkani, baye kwabanye abantu.
19_105_14_Akavumelanga mntu ukuba abacudise, Wohlwaya ookumkani ngenxa yabo;
19_105_15_Esithi, Musani ukubachukumisa abathanjiswa bam, Musani ukubaphatha kakubi abaprofeti bam.
19_105_16_Wabiza indlala, yeza phezu kwelizwe, Wawaphula wonke umsimelelo osisonka.
19_105_17_Wathuma indoda phambi kwabo; Kwathengiswa ngoYosefu, waba likhoboka.
19_105_18_Bazicinezela iinyawo zakhe ngamakhamandela, Wafika umphefumlo wakhe esinyithini;
19_105_19_Kwada kwalixesha lokufika kwelizwi lakhe, Intetho kaYehova yamnyibilikisa.
19_105_20_Ukumkani wathuma, wamkhulula, Umlawuli wezizwe wamvulela;
19_105_21_Wamenza inkosi yendlu yakhe, Umlawuli wemfuyo yakhe yonke,
19_105_22_Ukuba abakhonkxe abathetheli bakhe ngokuzithandela kwakhe, Amadoda akhe amakhulu awafundise ubulumko.
19_105_23_Waza uSirayeli waya eYiputa, UYakobi waphambukela ezweni lakwaHam.
19_105_24_Wabaqhamisa kakhulu abantu bakhe, Wabomeleza ngaphezu kwababandezeli babo.
19_105_25_Wazijika iintliziyo zabo, ukuba babathiye abantu bakhe,  Babaqhathanisele abakhonzi bakhe.
19_105_26_Wathuma uMoses, umkhonzi wakhe, NoAron awamnyulayo.
19_105_27_Bazenza kubo iindawo zemiqondiso yakhe, Nezimanga zakhe ezweni lakwaHam.
19_105_28_Wathumela ubumnyama, kwaba mnyama; Ababa nakuwaphikisa amazwi akhe.
19_105_29_Wawaguqula amanzi abo, aba ligazi, Wazibulala iintlanzi zabo.
19_105_30_Ilizwe labo lanyakazela amasele Ezingontsini zookumkani babo.
19_105_31_Wathetha, zafika izibawu, Iingcongconi, emideni yabo yonke.
19_105_32_Wabanika isichotho, saba yimvula; Umlilo walenya ezweni labo.
19_105_33_Wayibetha imidiliya yabo nemikhiwane yabo, Wayishwaqa imithi yemida yabo.
19_105_34_Wathetha, kwafika iinkumbi ezandayo, Nezikhothululayo,  into engenakubalwa;
19_105_35_Zayidla imifuno yonke ezweni labo, Zazidla iziqhamo zomhlaba wabo.
19_105_36_Waza wababulala bonke abamazibulo ezweni labo, Intlahlela yamandla abo onke.
19_105_37_Wabakhupha ke abakhe benesilivere negolide, Akwabakho ukhubekayo ezizweni zakhe.
19_105_38_Lavuya iYiputa ekuphumeni kwabo, Ngokuba lifikelwe kukunkwantyisa kwabo.
19_105_39_Waneka ilifu lokubasitha, Nomlilo wokukhanyisa ebusuku.
19_105_40_Babiza, wazisa izagwityi, Wabahluthisa nangesonka sasezulwini.
19_105_41_Wavula iliwa, abaleka amanzi, Ahamba engumlambo emqwebedwini.
19_105_42_Ngokuba wakhumbula ilizwi lakhe elingcwele, Wakhumbula uAbraham umkhonzi wakhe.
19_105_43_Wabakhupha abantu bakhe benemihlali, Abanyulwa bakhe bememelela.
19_105_44_Wabanika amazwe eentlanga, Bayihlutha inzuzo yokwaphuka kwezizwe,
19_105_45_Ukuze bayigcine imimiselo yakhe, Bayibambe imiyalelo yakhe. Haleluya!
19_106_1_Haleluya! Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_106_2_Ngubani na onokuzixela izenzo zobugorha bukaYehova,  Onokuyivakalisa yonke indumiso yakhe?
19_106_3_Hayi, uyolo lwabaligcinayo isiko, Lwabenza ubulungisa ngamaxesha onke!
19_106_4_Ndikhumbule, Yehova, ekwenzeni kwakho isisa kubantu bakho;  Ndiyelele ngosindiso lwakho,
19_106_5_Ukuze ndibone inyhweba yabanyulwa bakho, Ndivuye ekuvuyeni kohlanga lwakho, Ndiqhayise kunye nelifa lakho.
19_106_6_Sonile, thina noobawo; Senze ubugwenxa, senze okungendawo.
19_106_7_Oobawo abayiqiqanga eYiputa imisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo; Ababukhumbulanga ubuninzi beenceba zakho;  Baphika elwandle, eLwandle oluBomvu.
19_106_8_Wabasindisa ngenxa yegama lakhe, Ukuze abazise ubugorha bakhe.
19_106_9_Walukhalimela uLwandle oluBomvu, loma, Wabahambisa emanzini anzongonzongo kwanga kusentlango.
19_106_10_Wabasindisa esandleni sobathiyayo, Wabakhulula esandleni sotshaba.
19_106_11_Amanzi abagubungela ababandezeli babo, Akwasala namnye kubo.
19_106_12_Bakholwa ke ngamazwi akhe, Bayivuma indumiso yakhe.
19_106_13_Kanti bahle bazilibala izenzo zakhe, Abalilinda icebo lakhe.
19_106_14_Bakhanukile entlango, Bamlinga uThixo enkangala.
19_106_15_Wabanika abakubizayo; Wathumela ukungcumbeka emphefumlweni wabo.
19_106_16_Bamenzela umona uMoses eminqubeni, NoAron ongcwele kaYehova.
19_106_17_Wavuleka umhlaba, wamginya uDatan, Waliselela ibandla lika-Abhiram;
19_106_18_Umlilo walitshisa ibandla labo, Amalangatye abalenya abangendawo.
19_106_19_Benza ithole eHorebhe, Baqubuda emfanekisweni otyhidiweyo.
19_106_20_Balwananisa uzuko lwabo Ngento emilise okwenkomo edla utyani.
19_106_21_Bamlibala uThixo, umsindisi wabo, Owenza imisebenzi emikhulu eYiputa;
19_106_22_Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo ezweni lakwaHam, Imisebenzi eyoyikekayo eLwandle oluBomvu.
19_106_23_Wathi uya kubatshabalalisa, Koko wesukayo uMoses,  umnyulwa wakhe, Wema ethubeni phambi kwakhe, Ebuyisa ubushushu bakhe, ukuba angatshabalalisi.
19_106_24_Balicekisa ilizwe elinqwenelekayo, Abakholwa lilizwi lakhe,
19_106_25_Bakrokra ezintenteni zabo, Abaliphulaphula izwi likaYehova.
19_106_26_Wabaphakamisela isandla sakhe, Wafungela ukuba abawise entlango;
19_106_27_Ayiwise imbewu yabo phakathi kweentlanga, Abachithachithe emazweni.
19_106_28_Bazibandakanya noBhahali-pehore, Badla imibingelelo yabafileyo,
19_106_29_Bamqumbisa ngeentlondi zabo; Sagaleleka phakathi kwabo isibetho.
19_106_30_Wesuka wema uPinehasi, walamla; Sathintelwa isibetho.
19_106_31_Oko kwabalelwa kuye ekuthini bubulungisa Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_106_32_Bamqumbisa emanzini aseMeribha, Kwehla ububi kuMoses ngenxa yabo;
19_106_33_Ngokuba bawuphikisa umoya wakhe, Waphololoza ke ngomlomo wakhe.
19_106_34_Abazitshabalalisa izizwe, Awayethethe ngazo kubo uYehova;
19_106_35_Baxubana neentlanga ezo, Bafunda izenzo zazo;
19_106_36_Bakhonza izithixo zazo, Yaba sisirhintyelo kubo.
19_106_37_Babingelela ngoonyana babo nangeentombi zabo kwiidemon;
19_106_38_Baphalaza igazi elimsulwa, Igazi loonyana babo neleentombi zabo, Ababingelela ngabo kwizithixo zakwaKanan;  Lahlanjelwa ilizwe ngamagazi.
19_106_39_Baba ziinqambi ngezenzo zabo, Bahenyuza ngeentlondi zabo.
19_106_40_Wavutha ke umsindo kaYehova kubantu bakhe, Laba lisikizi kuye ilifa lakhe.
19_106_41_Wabanikela ezandleni zeentlanga, Balawulwa ngababathiyileyo.
19_106_42_Zabaxina iintshaba zabo, Bathotyelwa phantsi kwezandla zazo.
19_106_43_Zibe zininzi izihlandlo ebahlangula; Ke bona bamphikisa ngamaqhinga abo, Bonakala bubugwenxa babo.
19_106_44_Noko ke wakunonelela ukubandezelwa kwabo, Akuva ukuhlahlamba kwabo.
19_106_45_Wawukhumbula ngenxa yabo umnqophiso wakhe, Wazohlwaya ngenxa yobuninzi beenceba zakhe.
19_106_46_Wabafumanisa imfesane Phambi kwabo bonke abaye bebathimbile.
19_106_47_Sisindise, Yehova, Thixo wethu, Sibuthe ezintlangeni,  Ukuze sibulele kwigama lakho elingcwele, Sizingce ngendumiso yakho.
19_106_48_Makabongwe uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, Kususela kwaphakade kude kuse ephakadeni. Mabathi bonke abantu, Amen.  Haleluya!
19_107_1_Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_107_2_Mabatsho abakhululwa bakaYehova, Awabakhululayo esandleni sombandezeli;
19_107_3_Wababutha emazweni, Empumalanga nasentshonalanga, Entla naselwandle.
19_107_4_Badinga entlango, endleleni esenkanga, la, Abafumana mzi wakuhlala.
19_107_5_Belambile, benxaniwe, Watyhafa phakathi kwabo umphefumlo wabo.
19_107_6_Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo, Wabahlangula ekucuthekeni kwabo;
19_107_7_Wabanyathelisa endleleni ethe tye, Ukuba baye kumzi wokuhlala.
19_107_8_Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!
19_107_9_Kuba ewuhluthisile umphefumlo otshobayo, Wawuzalisa ngokulungileyo umphefumlo olambileyo.
19_107_10_Behleli emnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, Bekhonkxwe yimbandezelo nasisinyithi,
19_107_11_Ngokuba bephikise amazwi kaThixo, Belitshitshisa icebo lOsenyangweni:
19_107_12_Wayithoba intliziyo yabo ngokubasebenzisa kanzima;  Bakhubeka, akwabakho mncedi.
19_107_13_Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo; Wabasindisa ekucuthekeni kwabo.
19_107_14_Wabakhupha emnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, Waziqhawula iimbophelelo zabo.
19_107_15_Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!
19_107_16_Kuba ezaphule iingcango zobhedu, Wayixakaxa imivalo yesinyithi.
19_107_17_Abamathileyo, ngenxa yendlela yokukreqa kwabo, Nangenxa yobugwenxa babo, bacinezelwa;
19_107_18_Konke ukudla kwaba lisikizi kumphefumlo wabo, Bafika emasangweni okufa.
19_107_19_Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo, Wabasindisa ekucuthekeni kwabo.
19_107_20_Wathumela ilizwi lakhe, wabaphilisa, Wabasiza ezihogweni zabo.
19_107_21_Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!
19_107_22_Mababingelele imibingelelo yombulelo, Bancokole ngezenzo zakhe bememelela.
19_107_23_Abaya elwandle ngeenqanawa, Benze ishishini emanzini amaninzi,
19_107_24_Bazibona bona izenzo zikaYehova, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo enzulwini.
19_107_25_Watsho, wavusa umoya ovuthuzayo, Waphakamisa amaza ayo.
19_107_26_Banyuka basinga ezulwini, behla basinga emanzini enzonzobila; Umphefumlo wabo uthe amandla bububi.
19_107_27_Bathendeleka, bahexa njengenxila, Butshone bonke ubulumko babo.
19_107_28_Bakhala ke kuYehova embandezelweni yabo Wabakhupha ekucuthekeni kwabo.
19_107_29_Ukumisile ukuvuthuza, kwathi cwaka, Amaza ayo azola;
19_107_30_Bavuya ke, kuba edambile; Wabafikisa echwebeni abalilangazelelayo.
19_107_31_Mabayibulele kuYehova inceba yakhe, Nemisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo koonyana babantu!
19_107_32_Mabamphakamise ebandleni labantu, Bamdumise embuthweni yamadoda amakhulu.
19_107_33_Uyenze imilambo yaba yintlango, Namathende amanzi aba ngumhlaba onxaniweyo;
19_107_34_Ilizwe elineziqhamo laba leletyuwa, Ngenxa yezinto ezimbi zabemi balo.
19_107_35_Uyenze intlango yaba lidike elinamanzi, Ilizwe elingumqwebedu laba ngamathende amanzi.
19_107_36_Wabahlalisa khona abalambileyo, Bamisa umzi wokuhlala.
19_107_37_Bahlwayela amasimi, batyala izidiliya, Bavelisa iziqhamo,  baba nongeniselo.
19_107_38_Wabasikelela, banda kunene, Iinkomo zabo akazinciphisa.
19_107_39_Bancipha, basibekeka Ngokukhanyangwa bububi nesingqala.
19_107_40_Uwagalele ngendelo amanene, Wawadingisa enyanyeni,  kungekho ndlela.
19_107_41_Walisa engxondeni ihlwempu, kude nengcinezelo, Walenzela imizalwana yanjengomhlambi.
19_107_42_Baya kubona abathe tye, bavuye, Bonke ubugqwetha buvale umlomo.
19_107_43_Lowo ulumkileyo makazigcine ezi ndawo, Azigqale iinceba zikaYehova.
19_108_1_Ingoma. Umhobe kaDavide. Izimasekile intliziyo yam,  Thixo, Ndiya kuvuma, ndibethe uhadi, Kwanozuko lwam.
19_108_2_Vukani, mrhubhe nohadi; Ndiya kusiphangela isifingo.
19_108_3_Ndiya kubulela kuwe phakathi kwezizwe, Yehova,  Ndikubethele uhadi phakathi kwezizwe.
19_108_4_Ngokuba inkulu ngaphezu kwezulu inceba yakho, Yada yesa esibhakabhakeni inyaniso yakho.
19_108_5_Ziphakamise ngaphezu kwezulu, Thixo, Bube phezu kwehlabathi lonke ubuqaqawuli bakho.
19_108_6_Ukuze zihlangulwe iintanda zakho, Sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, undiphendule.
