19_108_7_UThixo uthethe engcwele; mandivuyelele, Ndimabe uShekem,  ndiyilinganisele intili yaseSukoti.
19_108_8_Ngowam uGiliyadi, ngowam uManase, UEfrayim sisigcina-ntloko sam, UYuda yintonga yam yommiselo;
19_108_9_UMowabhi sisitya sam sokuhlambela, Ndiyiphosa kuEdom imbadada yam; Ndiduma ngelamaFilisti.
19_108_10_Ngubani na owondisa emzini onqatyisiweyo, Ngubani na owondikhaphela kwaEdom?
19_108_11_Asinguwe na, Thixo, lo usihlambileyo? Akwaphuma, Thixo,  nemikhosi yethu.
19_108_12_Sincede kumbandezeli wethu; Alunto yanto usindiso lomntu.
19_108_13_NgoThixo siya kweyisa, Abagqushe yena ababandezeli bethu.
19_109_1_Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Thixo wendumiso yam,  musa ukuthi tu;
19_109_2_Ngokuba bandakhamisele umlomo ongendawo, nomlomo onenkohliso; Bathetha ngam ngolwimi lobuxoki.
19_109_3_Bandijikele ngeentetho zentiyo; Balwa nam ngelize.
19_109_4_Ekubeni mna ndibathanda, bona bayandichasa, Ndibe mna ndithandaza.
19_109_5_Endaweni yobulungisa bandibuyekeza ngobubi; Ekubeni mna ndibathanda, bona bayandithiya.
19_109_6_Misa ongendawo, abe ngumveleli wakhe, Eme uSathana ngasekunene kwakhe.
19_109_7_Ekuthethweni kwetyala makaphume engongendawo, Nomthandazo wakhe ube sisono.
19_109_8_Imihla yakhe mayibe mbalwa, Mabuthatyathwe ngomnye ubuveleli bakhe.
19_109_9_Oonyana bakhe mababe ziinkedama, Nomkakhe abe ngumhlolokazi;
19_109_10_Babhadule bebhadula oonyana bakhe, becela, Bengqiba,  bekude namanxuwa akowabo.
19_109_11_Umboleki-mali makakushwankathele konke anako, Abasemzini baphange ukuxelenga kwakhe.
19_109_12_Makungabikho wolulela nceba kuye, Kungabikho uzibabalayo iinkedama zakhe.
19_109_13_Izivela-mva zakhe mazibe zezokunqunyulwa, Igama lazo licinywe esizukulwaneni esizayo.
19_109_14_Mabukhunjulwe nguYehova ubugwenxa booyise, Singacinywa isono sonina.
19_109_15_Masibe phambi koYehova ngamaxesha onke, Akunqumle ehlabathini ukukhunjulwa kwabo;
19_109_16_Ngenxa enokuba engakukhumbulanga ukwenza inceba,  Etshutshise indoda elusizana, Elihlwempu, enentliziyo eyothukileyo, ukuba ayibulale.
19_109_17_Ewe, wathanda ukuqalekisa, kwamfikela; Akakufuna ukusikelela, kwakhwelela kude kuye.
19_109_18_Wambatha ukuqalekisa kwanga yingubo yakhe, Kwangena embilinini wakhe njengamanzi, Nanjengeoli emathanjeni akhe.
19_109_19_Makube njengengubo kuye, azithe wambu ngayo, Kube luqhwemesha, alunxibe amaxesha onke.
19_109_20_Nguwo lowo umvuzo wabandichasayo, ophuma kuYehova,  Wabathetha okubi ngomphefumlo wam.
19_109_21_Ke wena Yehova, Nkosi, ndenzele ngenxa yegama lakho;  Ngokokuba ilungile inceba yakho; ndihlangule.
19_109_22_Ngokuba ndilusizana, ndilihlwempu, Intliziyo yam ihlatyiwe phakathi kwam.
19_109_23_Ndinjengethunzi xa lolukayo, ndiyemka; Ndiphetshethwa njengenkumbi.
19_109_24_Amadolo am ayagexa kukuzila ukudla, Nenyama yam ibhityile, tu ukutyeba.
19_109_25_Ndithe ndasisingcikivo kubo; Bendibona, bahlunguzela intloko.
19_109_26_Ndincede, Yehova, Thixo wam, Ndisindise ngokwenceba yakho;
19_109_27_Bazi ukuba sisandla sakho eso, Ukuba kukwenza kwakho,  Yehova.
19_109_28_Bayaqalekisa aba, uyasikelela wena; Besukile bema, baya kudana; uya kubuya yena umkhonzi wakho.
19_109_29_Abandichasayo baya kwambatha ihlazo, Bazithi wambu ukudana njengengubo yokwaleka.
19_109_30_Ndiya kubulela kakhulu kuYehova ngomlomo wam, Ndimdumise phakathi kwabaninzi;
19_109_31_Kuba emi ekunene kolihlwempu, Ukuba amsindise kwabawugwebayo umphefumlo wakhe.
19_110_1_EkaDavide. Umhobe. Utsho uYehova eNkosini yam ukuthi,  Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze Isitulo seenyawo zakho.
19_110_2_Intonga yamandla akho uya kuyithumela uYehova, ivela eZiyon, esithi, Yiba nobukhosi phakathi kweentshaba zakho.
19_110_3_Abantu bakho baya kuzinikela ngeentliziyo, ngemini yakho yokuphuma umkhosi; Bebethe ezingcwele, ekuphumeni kwesifingo,  Uza kuwe umbethe womlisela wakho.
19_110_4_Ufungile uYehova, akayi kuzohlwaya; uthe, Ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade wena Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.
19_110_5_INkosi ngasekunene kwakho Iya kuphalusa ookumkani ngemini yomsindo wayo.
19_110_6_Iya kugweba phakathi kweentlanga, kuzale zizidumbu;  Iphaluse intloko ezweni elibanzi.
19_110_7_Endleleni iya kusela emlanjaneni; Ngenxa yoko iya kuphakamisa intloko.
19_111_1_Haleluya! Ndiya kubulela kuYehova ngentliziyo yonke,  Elucweyweni lwabathe tye nasebandleni.
19_111_2_Zikhulu izenzo zikaYehova, Zezokungxokwa iintsingiselo zazo zonke.
19_111_3_Unendili nobungangamela umsebenzi wakhe, Ubulungisa bakhe bumi ngonaphakade.
19_111_4_Uyenzele ukuze ikhunjulwe imisebenzi yakhe ebalulekileyo;  Unobabalo nemfesane uYehova.
19_111_5_Ubaphe ukudla abamoyikayo; Uwukhumbule ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe.
19_111_6_Ubabonise abantu bakhe amandla ezenzo zakhe, Ebanika ilifa leentlanga.
19_111_7_Izenzo zezandla zakhe ziyinyaniso nesiko; Zithembekile zonke iziyalezo zakhe.
19_111_8_Zizimasekile nanini nangonaphakade; Zenziwe ngenyaniso,  zithe tye.
19_111_9_Ubathumele abantu bakhe inkululeko; Uwumisele ngonaphakade umnqophiso wakhe; Lingcwele, liyoyikeka, igama lakhe.
19_111_10_Ingqalo yobulumko kukoyika uYehova, Banengqiqo elungileyo bonke abenza ngako; Indumiso yakhe ihlala imi.
19_112_1_Haleluya! Hayi, uyolo lomntu omoyikayo uYehova,  Oyinoneleleyo kunene imithetho yakhe!
19_112_2_Iya kuba nobugorha ehlabathini imbewu yakhe; Isizukulwana sabathe tye sisikelelwe.
19_112_3_Bubuncwane nobutyebi endlwini yakhe; Ubulungisa bakhe buhlala bumi.
19_112_4_Baphunyelwa kukukhanya ebumnyameni abathe tye, Benobabalo,  nemfesane, nobulungisa.
19_112_5_Unoyolo umntu obabalayo, aboleke; Uya kuyimisa intetho yakhe ematyaleni.
19_112_6_Ngokuba akayi kushukunyiswa naphakade; Uya kuba lilungisa elikhunjulwa ngonaphakade.
19_112_7_Akoyikiswa ziindaba ezimbi; Iqinisekile intliziyo yakhe,  ikholose ngoYehova.
19_112_8_Izimasekile intliziyo yakhe, akoyiki; Uya kuda ababonele ababandezeli bakhe.
19_112_9_Uyahlakaza, upha amahlwempu; Ubulungisa bakhe buhlala bumi, Uphondo lwakhe luphakamile, lunozuko.
19_112_10_Ongendawo yena uya kukubona, aqumbe, Atshixize amazinyo,  anyibilike; Umnqweno wongendawo uyadaka.
19_113_1_Haleluya! Dumisani, bakhonzi bakaYehova, Dumisani igama likaYehova.
19_113_2_Malibongwe igama likaYehova, Kususela ngokunje, kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_113_3_Kwasekuphumeni kwelanga kuse ekutshoneni kwalo,  Malidunyiswe igama likaYehova.
19_113_4_Uphakamile ngaphezu kweentlanga zonke uYehova,  Bungaphezulu kwamazulu ubuqaqawuli bakhe.
19_113_5_Ngubani na onjengoYehova, uThixo wethu? Ulohlala phezulu;
19_113_6_Uloqondela phantsi; Ezulwini nasemhlabeni?
19_113_7_Ulomvusa eluthulini osweleyo, Ulomphakamisa ezaleni olihlwempu,
19_113_8_Ukuba amhlalise namanene, Amanene abantu bakhe;
19_113_9_Ulohlalisa endlwini umfazi ongazaliyo, Abe ngunobantwana ovuyayo. Haleluya!
19_114_1_Ekuphumeni kukaSirayeli eYiputa, Kwendlu kaYakobi ebantwini abantetho ingaziwayo,
19_114_2_UYuda waba yingcwele yakhe, USirayeli waba sisikumkani sakhe.
19_114_3_Ulwandle lwabona, lwasaba, IYordan yabuya umva.
19_114_4_Iintaba zadloba njengeenkunzi zeegusha; Iinduli,  njengamatakane omhlambi.
19_114_5_Ubunani na, lulwandlendini, ukuba usabe? Wena Yordan,  ukuba ubuye umva?
19_114_6_Nina zintaba, ukuba nidlobe njengeenkunzi zeegusha? Nina zinduli, njengamatakane omhlambi?
19_114_7_Wena hlabathi, zibhijabhije ebusweni beNkosi, Ebusweni boThixo kaYakobi;
19_114_8_Uloguqula iliwa libe lidike lamanzi, Iqhwitha libe yimithombo yamanzi.
19_115_1_Ungazukisi thina, Yehova, ungazukisi thina; Zukisa igama lakho, Ngenxa yenceba yakho, ngenxa yenyaniso yakho.
19_115_2_Yini na ukuba zithi iintlanga, Uphi na kaloku uThixo wabo?
19_115_3_UThixo wethu ke usemazulwini, Konke akuthandileyo uyakwenza.
19_115_4_Izithixo zazo yisilivere negolide, Zizenzo zezandla zabantu.
19_115_5_Zinomlomo nje, azithethi; Zinamehlo nje aziboni;
19_115_6_Zineendlebe nje, aziva; Zineempumlo nje, azisezeli.
19_115_7_Izandla zazo aziphathi, Iinyawo zazo azihambi; Azidumzeli ngomqala wazo.
19_115_8_Boba njengazo abenzi bazo, Bonke abasukuba bekholose ngazo.
19_115_9_Wena Sirayeli, kholosa ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.
19_115_10_Nani bendlu ka-Aron, kholosani ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.
19_115_11_Nina boyiki bakaYehova, kholosani ngoYehova; Uncedo lwabo nengweletshetshe yabo nguye.
19_115_12_UYehova usikhumbule, wosisikelela; Woyisikelela indlu kaSirayeli, Woyisikelela indlu ka-Aron;
19_115_13_Wobasikelela aboyiki bakaYehova, Abancinane kwanabakhulu.
19_115_14_UYehova wonandisa nina ngakumbi nangakumbi, Abandise oonyana benu.
19_115_15_Nisikelelekile kuYehova, UMenzi wamazulu nowehlabathi.
19_115_16_Amazulu ngamazulu kaYehova, Ihlabathi ulinike oonyana babantu.
19_115_17_Asingabafileyo abamdumisayo uYehova, Asingabo bonke abehlayo baye kwelokuzola.
19_115_18_Thina ke siya kumbonga uYehova, Kususela koku kude kuse ephakadeni. Haleluya!
19_116_1_Ndiyamthanda, ngokuba uYehova eliva Ilizwi lam,  ukutarhuzisa kwam.
19_116_2_Ngokuba endithobele indlebe yakhe, Ndiya kumnqula ngemihla yam yonke.
19_116_3_Izintya zokufa zandijikela, Iingxingongo zelabafileyo zandifumana, Ndafunyanwa ziimbandezelo nesingqa la.
19_116_4_Ndanqula ke igama likaYehova, ndathi, Yehova, ndiya kukhunga, siza umphefumlo wam.
19_116_5_UYehova unobabalo, ulilungisa, UThixo wethu unemfesane.
19_116_6_Ngumgcini wabazizidenge uYehova; Ndandiswele,  wandisindisa.
19_116_7_Buyela ekuphumleni kwakho, mphefumlo wam, Ngokuba uYehova ukuphatha kakuhle;
19_116_8_Ngokuba ewuhlangule umphefumlo wam ekufeni, Iliso lam ezinyembezini, Unyawo lwam ekungqulekeni.
19_116_9_Ndiya kuhamba-hamba phambi koYehova Emazweni abaphilileyo.
19_116_10_Ndiyakholwa, xa ndithethayo; Mna ndicinezelekile kunene.
19_116_11_Ndathi mna ekuphakuzeleni kwam, Bonke abantu ngamaxoki.
19_116_12_Ndingambuyisela ngantoni na uYehova Konke ukundiphatha kwakhe kakuhle?
19_116_13_Ndophakamisa indebe yosindiso, Ndinqule igama likaYehova.
19_116_14_Ewe, ndozizalisa izibhambathiso zam kuYehova, Phambi kwabantu bakhe bonke kalokunje.
19_116_15_Kunqabile emehlweni kaYehova Ukufa kwakhakhe benceba.
19_116_16_Okunene, Yehova, ndingumkhonzi wakho, Ndingumkhonzi wakho, unyana womkhonzazana wakho; Uzicombulule iimbophelelo zam.
19_116_17_Ndiya kubingelela kuwe umbingelelo wombulelo, Ndinqule igama likaYehova.
19_116_18_Ewe, ndiya kuzizalisa izibhambathiso zam kuYehova, Phambi kwabantu bakhe bonke,
19_116_19_Ezintendelezweni zendlu kaYehova, Esazulwini sakho,  Yerusalem. Haleluya!
19_117_1_Mdumiseni uYehova, nonke zintlanga, Mncomeni, nonke zizwe.
19_117_2_Ngokuba inamandla kuthi inceba yakhe, Inyaniso kaYehova ingunaphakade. Haleluya!
19_118_1_Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_118_2_Makathi uSirayeli, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_118_3_Mayithi indlu ka-Aron, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_118_4_Mabathi abamoyikayo uYehova, Ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_118_5_Ndabiza uYehova ndisengxingongweni; Wandiphendula uYehova,  wandibeka endaweni ebanzi.
19_118_6_UYehova ungakum, andoyiki; Angandenza ntoni na umntu?
19_118_7_UYehova ungakum ngokundinceda; Ndiya kubona mna kwabandithiyayo.
19_118_8_Kulungile ukuzimela ngoYehova, Ngaphezu kokukholosa ngomntu.
19_118_9_Kulungile ukuzimela ngoYehova Ngaphezu kokukholosa ngamanene.
19_118_10_Zingafanelana zonke iintlanga zindirhawule: Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.
19_118_11_Zingafanelana zindirhawule zandirhawula: Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.
19_118_12_Zingafanelana zindirhawule njengeenyosi: Zocinywa njengomlilo weentsasa; Egameni likaYehova inene ndozinqumla.
19_118_13_Undityhale ngamandla wena ukuba ndiwe; Kodwa uYehova wandinceda.
19_118_14_Iqhayiya lam nengoma yam nguYehova, Waba lusindiso kum.
19_118_15_Izwi lokumemelela nelosindiso lisezintenteni zamalungisa,  lisithi, Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siyeyisa;
19_118_16_Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siphakamile; Isandla sokunene sikaYehova siyeyisa.
19_118_17_Andiyi kufa, ndiya kudla ubomi, Ndibalise ngezenzo zikaYehova.
19_118_18_UYehova undithethise kakhulu, Ke akandinikela ekufeni.
19_118_19_Ndivuleleni amasango obulungisa; Ndiya kungena ngawo,  ndiya kubulela kuYehova.
19_118_20_Nali isango likaYehova, Amalungisa angena ngalo.
19_118_21_Ndiyabulela kuwe kuba undiphendule, Waba lusindiso kum.
19_118_22_Ilitye abalilahlayo abakhi Laba yintloko yembombo.
19_118_23_Kuvele kuYehova oku, Kungumsebenzi obalulekileyo emehlweni ethu.
19_118_24_Le yimini ayenzileyo uYehova, Masigcobe sivuye ngayo.
19_118_25_Yehova, camagu, khawusindise, Yehova, camagu,  khawuhlangule.
19_118_26_Makabongwe lo uzayo esegameni likaYehova, Siyanisikelela nina basendlwini kaYehova.
19_118_27_UYehova nguThixo, usikhanyisela; Bophelelani umbingelelo womthendeleko ngeentambo, Kude kuye ezimpondweni zesibingelelo.
19_118_28_UnguThixo wam, ndiya kubulela kuwe; UnguThixo wam, ndiya kukuphakamisa.
19_118_29_Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile, Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_119_1_Hayi, uyolo lwabandlela igqibeleleyo, Bona bahambayo ngomyalelo kaYehova!
19_119_2_Hayi, uyolo lwababambe izingqiniso zakhe, Abamquqelayo ngentliziyo epheleleyo!
19_119_3_Abasebenzi nokusebenza bugqwetha, Bayahamba ngeendlela zakhe.
19_119_4_Uzimisile iziyalezo zakho, Ukuba zigcinwe kunene.
19_119_5_Azaba iindlela zam bezibhekiselwe Ukugcina imimiselo yakho!
19_119_6_Bendingayi kudana ke Ekubhekeni kwam kwimithetho yakho yonke.
19_119_7_Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngentliziyo ethe tye, Ekuzifundeni kwam izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.
19_119_8_Ndiya kuyigcina imimiselo yakho, Musa ukundishiya kuphele.
19_119_9_Umfana uya kuwuqaqambisa ngantoni na umendo wakhe?  Ngokuzigcina ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_10_Ndiya kuquqela kuwe ngentliziyo yam yonke; Musa ukundilahlekanisa nemithetho yakho.
19_119_11_Ndiyibeke intetho yakho entliziyweni yam, Ukuze ndingoni kuwe.
19_119_12_Ungowokubongwa, Yehova; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.
19_119_13_Ndiyawabalisa ngemilebe yomlomo wam Onke amasiko omlomo wakho.
19_119_14_Ndinemihlali endleleni yezingqiniso zakho, Ngathi kusebuncwaneni bonke.
19_119_15_Ndiya kucamngca ngeziyalezo zakho, Ndibheke kumendo wakho.
19_119_16_Ndiyaziyolisa ngemimiselo yakho; Andiyi kulilibala ilizwi lakho.
19_119_17_Mphathe kakuhle umkhonzi wakho, ndidle ubomi, Ndigcine ilizwi lakho.
19_119_18_Vula amehlo am, ukuba ndiyibone Imisebenzi ebalulekileyo yasemyalelweni wakho.
19_119_19_Ndingumphambukeli ehlabathini, Musa ukuyisithelisa kum imithetho yakho.
19_119_20_Umphefumlo wam ucumkile ngokulangazelela Amasiko akho ngamaxesha onke.
19_119_21_Ubakhalimele abakhukhumali, Abaqalekiswa abo,  balahlekeneyo nemithetho yakho.
19_119_22_Shenxisa imke kum ingcikivo nendelo, Ngokuba ndizibambile izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_23_Nangona abathetheli behlala bathethe ngam, Umkhonzi wakho yena ucamngca ngemimiselo yakho.
19_119_24_Izingqiniso zakho ziziyoliso zam noko, Zingamaphakathi am.
19_119_25_Umphefumlo wam unamathele eluthulini: Ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_26_Ndizicacisile iindlela zam, wandiphendula; Ndifundise imimisela yakho.
19_119_27_Ndiqondise iindlela zeziyalezo zakho, Ndicamngce ngemisebenzi yakho ebalulekileyo.
19_119_28_Umphefumlo wam uvuza iinyembezi sisingqala, Ndimise ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_29_Indlela yobuxoki yisuse kum; Ndibabale umyalelo wakho.
19_119_30_Ndiyinyule indlela yokuthembeka; Amasiko akho ndijolise kuwo.
19_119_31_Ndinamathele ezingqinisweni zakho; Musa ukundidanisa,  Yehova.
19_119_32_Ndigidima ngendlela yemithetho yakho, Ngokuba uyenze banzi intliziyo yam.
19_119_33_Ndiyalele, Yehova, indlela yemimiselo yakho, Ndiyibambe kuphele.
19_119_34_Ndiqondise, ndibambe umyalelo wakho, Ndiwugcine ngentliziyo yonke.
19_119_35_Ndinyathelise endleleni yemithetho yakho, Ngokuba ndiyithandile.
19_119_36_Intliziyo yam yithobele ezingqinisweni zakho,  Ungayithobeli ekubaweni.
19_119_37_Dlulisa amehlo am angakhangeli inkohlakalo, Ndiphilise ngeendlela zakho.
19_119_38_Zalisa kumkhonzi wakho intetho yakho, Eyokuba bakoyike.
19_119_39_Yidlulise ingcikivo yam endinxunguphala yiyo, Ngokuba amasiko akho alungile.
19_119_40_Nanku ndilangazelela iziyalezo zakho, Ndiphilise ngobulungisa bakho.
19_119_41_Mazize kum iinceba zakho, Yehova, Nosindiso lwakho ngokwentetho yakho;
19_119_42_Ndimphendule ngelizwi ondingcikivayo, Ngokuba ndikholose ngelizwi lakho.
19_119_43_Musa ukuda ulihluthe emlonyeni wam ilizwi lenyaniso,  Ngokuba ndilindele izigwebo zakho;
19_119_44_Ndowugcina umyalelo wakho ngamaxesha onke, Ngonaphakade kanaphakade;
19_119_45_Ndihamba-hambe endaweni ebanzi, Ngokuba ndifuna iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_46_Ndothetha ngezingqiniso zakho phambi kokumkani, Ndingabi nakudana.
19_119_47_Ndoziyolisa ngemithetho yakho Endiyithandayo;
19_119_48_Ndiziphakamise izandla zam emithethweni yakho endiyithandayo, Ndicamngce ngemimiselo yakho.
19_119_49_Khumbula ilizwi lakho kumkhonzi wakho, Ngenxa enokuba undithembise lona.
19_119_50_Yiyo le intuthuzelo yam ekucinezelekeni kwam, Yokuba intetho yakho indiphilisile.
19_119_51_Abakhukhumali bada bandigxeka kakhulu; Kanti andithi gu bucala emyalelweni wakho.
19_119_52_Ndawakhumbula amasiko akho kususela kwanaphakade, Yehova,  Ndathuthuzeleka.
19_119_53_Ndingenwe ngumsindo oshushu, Ndisenziwa ngabangendawo abalahla umyalelo wakho.
19_119_54_Iziingoma kum imimiselo yakho, Endlwini yokuphambukela kwam.
19_119_55_Ndilikhumbule ebusuku igama lakho, Yehova, Ndawugcina umyalelo wakho.
19_119_56_Ndinikwe oku, Ukuba ndibambe iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_57_Isabelo sam, Yehova, ndithi, Sesokuba ndigcine amazwi akho.
19_119_58_Ndiya kubongoza ngentliziyo yonke, Ndibabale ngokwentetho yakho.
19_119_59_Ndazicingela iindlela zam, Ndazibuyisela iinyawo zam ezingqinisweni zakho.
19_119_60_Ndikhawulezile andazila-zila Ukugcina imithetho yakho.
19_119_61_Izintya zabangendawo zindithandele, Andiwulibele umyalelo wakhe noko.
19_119_62_Ndivuka phakathi kobusuku, ndibulele kuwe, Ngenxa yezigwebo zobulungisa bakho.
19_119_63_Ndilidlelane labo bonke abakoyikayo, Nelabazigcinayo iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_64_Inceba yakho, Yehova, izalise ihlabathi; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.
19_119_65_Umenzele okulungileyo umkhonzi wakho, Yehova, ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_66_Ndifundise, ndibe nemvo nokwazi okulungileyo, Ngokuba ndikholwa yimithetho yakho.
19_119_67_Ndingekacinezelwa, ndaye ndilahleka; Kungoku ndiyigcinile intetho yakho.
19_119_68_Ulungile wena, ulungisa; Ndifundise imimiselo yakho.
19_119_69_Abakhukhumali bathungele ubuxoki ngam; Mna ndizibamba ngentliziyo yonke iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_70_Ithe fithi kukutyeba intliziyo yabo; Ke mna ndiziyolisa ngomyalelo wakho.
19_119_71_Kundilungele okokuba ndacinezelwayo, Ukuze ndiyifunde imimiselo yakho.
19_119_72_Ulungile kum umyalelo womlomo wakho, Ngaphezu kwamawaka egolide nesilivere.
19_119_73_Izandla zakho zindenzile, zandilungisa; Ndiqondise,  ndifunde imithetho yakho.
19_119_74_Abakoyikayo bondibona, bavuye, Ngokuba ndilindele elizwini lakho.
19_119_75_Ndiyazi, Yehova, ukuba zinobulungisa izigwebo zakho;  Undicinezele, phofu uthembekile.
19_119_76_Ngamana inceba yakho yaba yeyokundithuthuzela,  Njengokwentetho yakho kumkhonzi wakho.
19_119_77_Mazize kum iimfesane zakho, ndiphile, Ngokuba umyalelo wakho undiyolisa.
19_119_78_Mabadane abakhukhumali, ngokuba bendigobele phantsi ngobuxoki, Mna ndicamngca ngeziyalezo zakho.
19_119_79_Mabandibuyele abakoyikayo, Nabazaziyo izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_80_Mayigqibelele intliziyo yam emimiselweni yakho, Ukuze ndingadani.
19_119_81_Umphefumlo wam uyaphela kukululangazelela usindiso lwakho, Ndilindele elizwini lakho.
19_119_82_Amehlo am ayaphela kukulangazelela intetho yakho,  Ndisithi, Uya kundithuthuzela nini na?
19_119_83_Noko ndithe ndaba njengentsuba emsini; Andiyilibali imimiselo yakho.
19_119_84_Zingaphi na iintsuku zomkhonzi wakho? Uya kuda ubagwebe nini na abandisukelayo?
19_119_85_Abakhukhumali bandimbele izihogo, Abangenamyalelo wakho.
19_119_86_Yonke imithetho yakho ithembekile: Bandisukela ngobuxoki;  ndincede.
19_119_87_Baphantse ukundigqibela emhlabeni, Ke mna andizilahli iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_88_Ndiphilise ngokwenceba yakho, Ndizigcine izingqiniso zomlomo wakho.
19_119_89_Lingunaphakade, Yehova, Limi emazulwini ilizwi lakho.
19_119_90_Ukuthembeka kwakho kukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana;  Ulizinzisile ihlabathi, lema.
19_119_91_Ezo zinto zimele izigwebo zakho nanamhla, Ngokuba iinto zonke zingabakhonzi bakho.
19_119_92_Koko umyalelo wakho wandiyolisayo, Ndinge ndaphelayo ekucinezelekeni kwam.
19_119_93_Andiyi kuzilibala naphakade iziyalezo zakho, Ngokuba undiphilisile ngazo.
19_119_94_Ndingowakho mna, ndisindise, Kuba ndicamanga ngeziyalezo zakho.
19_119_95_Abangendawo bandilindile ukuze banditshabalalise; Mna ndigqale izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_96_Yonke inzaliseko ndiyibonile apho iphela khona; Ke wona umthetho wakho ngumphangalala omkhulu.
19_119_97_Hayi, ukuwuthanda kwam umyalelo wakho! Imini le yonke ndiyacamngca ngawo.
19_119_98_Indifundisa ubulumko ngaphezu kweentshaba zam imithetho yakho, Ngokuba yeyam ngonaphakade.
19_119_99_Ndinokuqiqa ngaphezu kwabafundisi bam bonke, Ngokuba ngezingqiniso zakho ndiyacamngca.
19_119_100_Ndinokuqonda ngaphezu kwamadoda amakhulu, Ngokuba ndizibamba iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_101_Ndizinqandile iinyawo zam kwiindlela zonke ezimbi, Ukuze ndiligcine ilizwi lakho.
19_119_102_Andisuki emasikweni akho, Ngokuba undiyalile wena.
19_119_103_Hayi, ukuba mnandi kwentetho yakho ekhuhlangubeni lam!  Igqithe nobusi emlonyeni wam.
19_119_104_Ngeziyalezo zakho ndinokuqonda, Ngenxa yoko ndiwuthiyile wonke umendo wobuxoki.
19_119_105_Lisisibane seenyawo zam ilizwi lakho, Likukukhanya emendweni wam.
19_119_106_Ndikufungele, ndikumisile, Ukuzigcina izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.
19_119_107_Ndide ndacinezeleka kakhulu; Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_108_Ngamana wakholeka kuwe, Yehova, umbingelelo wesisa womlomo wam; Ndifundise amasiko akho.
19_119_109_Umphefumlo wam uhlala usesandleni sam, Ndingawulibali umyalelo wakho.
19_119_110_Abangendawo bandenzele umgibe, Andiphambukanga eziyalezweni zakho.
19_119_111_Ndizidle ilifa izingqiniso zakho ngonaphakade, Ngokuba ziyimihlali yentliziyo yam;
19_119_112_Intliziyo yam ndiyithobele ekwenzeni imimiselo yakho Ngonaphakade, kuphele.
19_119_113_Abambaxa ndiyabathiya, Wona umyalelo wakho ndiyawuthanda.
19_119_114_Isithe lam nengweletshetshe yam nguwe, Ndilindele elizwini lakho.
19_119_115_Sukani kum, nina benzi beento ezimbi, Ndibambe imithetho yoThixo wam.
19_119_116_Ndizimase ngokwelizwi lakho, ndiphile, Ungandidanisi ekulindeni kwam.
19_119_117_Ndixhase ndisinde, Ndihlale ndibheke emimiselweni yakho.
19_119_118_Ubacukucezile bonke abalahlekana nemimiselo yakho,  Ngokuba inkohliso yabo ibubuxoki.
19_119_119_Wena ususa bonke abangendawo behlabathi njengentlenga,  Ngoko ndiyazithanda izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_120_Inyama yam isuka ihambe kukunkwantyiswa nguwe, Ndizoyike izigwebo zakho.
19_119_121_Ndenza ngesiko nangobulungisa, Ungandinikeli kwabandicudisayo.
19_119_122_Mmele umkhonzi wakho, kulunge; Mabangandicudisi abakhukhumali.
19_119_123_Amehlo am ayaphela kukululangazelela usindiso lwakho,  Nentetho yobulungisa bakho.
19_119_124_Umkhonzi wakho menzele ngokwenceba yakho Undifundise imimiselo yakho.
19_119_125_Ndingumkhonzi wakho, ndiqondise, Ndizazi izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_126_Lilixa lokuba uYehova enze, Kuba bawaphule umyalelo wakho.
19_119_127_Ngenxa yoko ndiyithanda imithetho yakho Ngaphezu kwegolide, nakwengcwengiweyo.
19_119_128_Ngenxa yoko ndithi, Zonke iziyalezo zakho zithe tye ngezinto zonke; Wonke umendo wobuxoki ndiwuthiyile.
19_119_129_Ziyimisebenzi ebalulekileyo izingqiniso zakho, Ngenxa yoko uzibambile umphefumlo wam.
19_119_130_Ukutyhila kwamazwi akho kuyakhanyisa, Kuqondisa abazizidenge.
19_119_131_Ndakhamisa umlomo wam, ndakhefuza, Ngokuba ndiyilangazelela imithetho yakho.
19_119_132_Ndibheke, undibabale, Ngokwesiko lakho kubathandi begama lakho.
19_119_133_Qinisa ukunyathela kwam ngentetho yakho, Mabungabi nagunya kum ubutshinga, nabuphi na.
19_119_134_Ndikhulule ekucudiseni komntu, Ndizigcine iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_135_Khanyisa ubuso bakho kumkhonzi wakho, Undifundise imimiselo yakho.
19_119_136_Ahla imijelo yamanzi amehlo am, Ngenxa yokuba bengawugcini umyalelo wakho.
19_119_137_Ulilungisa wena, Yehova, Zithe tye izigwebo zakho.
19_119_138_Uzimisile izingqiniso zakho, zanobulungisa, Zaba nokuthembeka kakhulu.
19_119_139_Ikhwele lam lindibhangisile, Ngokuba abandibandezelayo bewalibele amazwi akho.
19_119_140_Ilizwi lakho linyibilikisiwe njengegolide kunene,  Umkhonzi wakho uyalithanda.
19_119_141_Ndimncinane, ndideliwe, Noko andizilibali iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_142_Ubulungisa bakho bubulungisa obungunaphakade, Umyalelo wakho uyinyaniso.
19_119_143_Imbandezelo nengcutheko indifumene, Imithetho yakho iyandiyolisa.
19_119_144_Zinobulungisa ngonaphakade izingqiniso zakho,  Ndiqondise, ndiphile.
19_119_145_Ndikhala ngentliziyo yonke, ndiphendule; Yehova,  imimiselo yakho ndiya kuyibamba.
19_119_146_Ndikhala kuwe, ndisindise, Ndigcine izingqiniso zakho.
19_119_147_Ndakuphangela ukusa, ndazibika, Ndalindela emazwini akho.
19_119_148_Amehlo am aphengela imilindo yasebusuku, Ukuze ndicamngce ngentetho yakho.
19_119_149_Live ilizwi lam ngokwenceba yakho, Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwamasiko akho.
19_119_150_Bayasondela abaphuthuma amanyala, Banyawuka emyalelweni wakho;
19_119_151_Usondele wena, Yehova, Yonke imithetho yakho iyinyaniso.
19_119_152_Kudala ndisazi ngokwezingqiniso zakho, Ukuba uzisekile ngonaphakade.
19_119_153_Khangela ukucinezeleka kwam, undihlangule, Ngokuba ndingawulibali umyalelo wakho.
19_119_154_Bambana nobambene nam, undikhulule, Ndiphilise ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_155_Lunyawukile kwabangendawo usindiso, Ngokuba abayifuni imimiselo yakho.
19_119_156_Iimfesane zakho zininzi, Yehova; Ndiphilise ngokwamasiko akho.
19_119_157_Baninzi abandisukelayo nabandibandezelayo; Andithi gu bucala ezingqinisweni zakho.
19_119_158_Ndababona abatshinizi, ndakruquka, Abo bangayigciniyo intetho yakho.
19_119_159_Bona ukuthanda kwam iziyalezo zakho, Yehova, ndiphilise ngokwenceba yakho.
19_119_160_Isimbuku selizwi lakho siyinyaniso iphela,  Zingunaphakade zonke izigwebo zobulungisa bakho.
19_119_161_Abathetheli bandisukela ngelize, Intliziyo yam iyankwantyiswa ngamazwi akho.
19_119_162_Ndinemihlali ngentetho yakho, Njengofumene ixhoba elininzi.
19_119_163_Ndikuthiyile ukuxoka, lisikizi kum; Ndiyawuthanda umyalelo wakho.
19_119_164_Ndikudumisa kasixhenxe ngemini, Ngenxa yezigwebo zobulungisa bakho.
19_119_165_Banoxolo olukhulu abawuthandayo umyalelo wakho; Akukho sikhubekiso kubo.
19_119_166_Ndikhangela usindiso lwakho, Yehova; Ndenza imithetho yakho.
19_119_167_Umphefumlo wam uyazigcina izingqiniso zakho, Ndizithanda kunene.
19_119_168_Ndiyazigcina iziyalezo zakho nezingqiniso zakho, Ngokuba zonke iindlela zam ziphambi kwakho.
19_119_169_Makusondele phambi kwakho ukuhlahlamba kwam; Yehova,  ndiqondise ngokwelizwi lakho.
19_119_170_Masifike isikhungo sam phambi kwakho; Ndihlangule ngokwentetho yakho.
19_119_171_Umlomo wam mawumpompoze indumiso, Kuba undifundisile imimiselo yakho.
19_119_172_Ulwimi lwam luya kuyiphendula intetho yakho, Ngokuba yonke imithetho yakho inobulungisa.
19_119_173_Isandla sakho masibe sesokundinceda, Ngokuba ndizinyulele iziyalezo zakho.
19_119_174_Ndilangazelela usindiso lwakho, Yehova; Umyalelo wakho uyandiyolisa.
19_119_175_Mawuphile umphefumlo wam, ukudumise, Andincede amasiko akho.
19_119_176_Ndiya ndimka njengemvu elahlekileyo; mfune umkhonzi wakho, Ngokuba andiyilibali imithetho yakho.
19_120_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Engxingongweni yam ndakhala kuYehova,  Wandiphendula.
19_120_2_Ndathi, Wuhlangule, Yehova, umphefumlo wam emlonyeni oxokayo, Elulwimini olunenkohliso.
19_120_3_Makakunike ntoni na, akongeze ntoni na, Lulwimindini lunenkohliso?
19_120_4_Iintolo zegorha ezitsolo, Kunye namalahle avuthayo onwele.
19_120_5_Athi ke mna! Kuba ndingumphambukeli kwaMesheki, Ndihleli ngasezintenteni zakwaKedare.
19_120_6_Umphefumlo wam kade uhleli Nabaluthiyileyo uxolo.
19_120_7_Mna ndingowoxolo; Ke ndithi ndakuthetha, bona babe yimfazwe.
19_121_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Ndiwaphakamisele ezintabeni na amehlo am? Luya kuvela phi na uncedo lwam?
19_121_2_Uncedo lwam luvela kuYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.
19_121_3_Akayi kukha alunikele unyawo lwakho ekutyibilikeni; Akayi kukha ozele umgcini wakho.
19_121_4_Uyabona, akozeli, akalali, UMgcini kaSirayeli.
19_121_5_NguYehova umgcini wakho, NguYehova umthunzi wakho ekunene kwakho.
19_121_6_Emini ilanga aliyi kukwenzakalisa, Nenyanga ebusuku.
19_121_7_UYehova uya kukugcina ebubini bonke, Uya kuwugcina umphefumlo wakho.
19_121_8_UYehova uya kukugcina ukuphuma kwakho nokungena kwakho,  Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_122_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. KaDavide. Ndavuya bakuthi kum, Masiye endlwini kaYehova.
19_122_2_Iinyawo zethu zifike zema Emasangweni akho, Yerusalem;
19_122_3_Yerusalem, wena wakhiweyo Ngokomzi ohlangeneyo wamnye;
19_122_4_Apho zinyuka ziye khona izizwe, Izizwe zikaYehova;  Ibubungqina ke loo nto kwaSirayeli, Ukuba kubulelwe kwigama likaYehova.
19_122_5_Kuba khona apho kumiswe iitrone zokugweba, Iitrone zendlu kaDavide.
19_122_6_Celelani iYerusalem uxolo; Mababe nokuchulumacha abakuthandayo,
19_122_7_Malube luxolo eludongeni lwakho olurhaqileyo,  Nokuchulumacha ezingxandeni zakho ezinde.
19_122_8_Ngenxa yabazalwana bam nowethu, Makhe ndithethe uxolo ngawe.
19_122_9_Ngenxa yendlu kaYehova, uThixo wethu, Ndiya kufuna okukulungeleyo.
19_123_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Ulohlala emazulwini, Ndiwaphakamisela kuwe amehlo am.
19_123_2_Uyabona, njengokuba amehlo abakhonzi Emi kwisandla seenkosi zabo; Njengokuba amehlo omkhonzazana Emi kwisandla senkosikazi yakhe: Ngokunjalo amehlo ethu akuYehova, uThixo wethu, Ade asibabale.
19_123_3_Sibabale, Yehova, sibabale, Ngokuba sanele kakhulu kukudelwa.
19_123_4_Umphefumlo wethu wanele kakhulu Kukugculela kwabangakhathalele bani, Nokudela kwabanekratshi.
19_124_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. KaDavide. Koko uYehova ebengakuthi,  Makatsho uSirayeli,
19_124_2_Koko uYehova ebengakuthi Ekusukeleni kwabantu phezulu kuthi,
19_124_3_Bange beba basiginya sihleli, Ekuvutheni komsindo wabo kuthi;
19_124_4_Ange esintywilisele amanzi, Wadlula phezu komphefumlo wethu umsinga;
19_124_5_Ange edlule phezu komphefumlo wethu Amanzi akhukumeleyo.
19_124_6_Ungowokubongwa uYehova, Ongasinikelanga emazinyweni abo,  ukuba siqwengwe.
19_124_7_Umphefumlo wethu usindile, njengentaka emgibeni wababambisi; Umgibe uqhawukile, sasinda ke thina.
19_124_8_Uncedo lwethu lusegameni likaYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.
19_125_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Abo bakholosa ngoYehova banjengentaba yaseZiyon: Ayishukumi, ihleli ngonaphakade.
19_125_2_IYerusalem ijikelezwe ziintaba; Ke uYehova ubajikelezile naye abantu bakhe, Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_125_3_Ngokuba ayiyi kuhlala intonga yokungendawo elifeni lamalungisa, Ukuze amalungisa angazisi ebugqwetheni izandla zawo.
19_125_4_Yehova, yenza okulungileyo kwabalungileyo, Kwabathe tye ezintliziyweni zabo.
19_125_5_Ke bona abathi gu bucala ngeendlela zabo ezimagoso-goso,  UYehova makabemkise, kunye nabasebenzi bobutshinga. Malube luxolo kuSirayeli.
19_126_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Ekubabuyiseni kukaYehova ababuyayo baseZiyon, Saba njengabaphuphayo;
19_126_2_Waza wazala kukuhleka umlomo wethu, Lwazala kukumemelela ulwimi lwethu. Baza bathi phakathi kweentlanga, UYehova ubenzele izinto ezinkulu aba.
19_126_3_UYehova usenzele izinto ezinkulu, Saba ngabavuyayo.
19_126_4_Buyisa, Yehova, abathinjiweyo bakuthi, Njengemilambo yamanzi yelasezantsi.
19_126_5_Abahlwayelayo beneenyembezi Baya kuvuna benokumemelela.
19_126_6_Ohamba ahambe elila, Ephethe intlwayelelo, Uyabuya eze ememelela, Ethwele izithungu zakhe.
19_127_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. KaSolomon. Ukuba akayakhi uYehova indlu, Bafumana besaphuka yiyo abakhi bayo. Ukuba umzi akawugcini uYehova, Ufumana ephaphama owugcinayo.
19_127_2_Nifumana nivuka kusasa, Nihlale nisebenza kude kube sebusuku, Nikudla ukudla kokubulaleka; Uyipha intanda yakhe,  ilele ubuthongo.
19_127_3_Uyabona, ilifa likaYehova ngoonyana, Umvuzo sisiqhamo sesizalo.
19_127_4_Njengeentolo esandleni segorha, Banjalo oonyana bobutsha.
19_127_5_Hayi, uyolo lomfo ozalise umphongolo wakhe ngabo! Abayi kudana, Xa bathetha neentshaba esangweni.
19_128_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Hayi, uyolo lwabantu bonke abamoyikayo uYehova, Abahamba ngeendlela zakhe!
19_128_2_Ukuxelenga kwezandla zakho inene uya kukudla, Uya kuba noyolo wena, kulunge kuwe.
19_128_3_Umkakho woba njengomdiliya oqhamayo Endlwini yakho ngaphakathi; Oonyana bakho babe njengezithole zomnquma Ngeenxa zonke esithebeni sakho.
19_128_4_Yabona, unjalo ukusikelelwa umfo Omoyikayo uYehova.
19_128_5_Makakusikelele uYehova eZiyon. Uyibone iYerusalem inenyhweba Yonke imihla yobomi bakho;
19_128_6_Ubone abantwana babantwana bakho. Malube luxolo kuSirayeli.
19_129_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Kukaninzi bendibandezela kwasebuncinaneni bam, Makatsho uSirayeli;
19_129_2_Kukaninzi bendibandezela kwasebuncinaneni bam: Ababanga nakundithini noko.
19_129_3_Abalimi balima emhlana kum, Bayolula indima yabo.
19_129_4_UYehova ulilungisa, Uzinqumle izintya zabangendawo.
19_129_5_Mabadane babuye umva Bonke abayithiyayo iZiyon.
19_129_6_Mababe njengengca ephuma phezu kwezindlu, Eyomayo ingekahlumi,
19_129_7_Engekasizalisi nesandla sakhe umvuni, Engekalizalisi nesondo lengubo yakhe umbophi wezithungu;
19_129_8_Bengekathi nabadlulayo, Intsikelelo kaYehova mayibe kuni;  Siyanisikelela egameni likaYehova.
19_130_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Ezinzulwini ndinqula wena, Yehova,
19_130_2_Nkosi, yiva ilizwi lam. Iindlebe zakho mazilibazele Ilizwi lokutarhuzisa kwam.
19_130_3_Ukuba uthe wabunqala ubugwenxa, Yehova, Ngubani na ongaba nokuma, Nkosi?
19_130_4_Ngokuba kunawe ukuxolela, Ukuze woyikwe.
19_130_5_Ndithembele kuYehova, uthembile umphefumlo wam; Ndilinde ilizwi lakhe.
19_130_6_Umphefumlo wam ulindele eNkosini Ngaphezu kwabalinde ukusa, Ewe, abalinde ukusa.
19_130_7_Lindela kuYehova, Sirayeli, Ngokuba inceba ikuYehova;  Ikuye inkululeko eninzi.
19_130_8_Yena ke wowakhulula amaSirayeli Ebugwenxeni bawo bonke.
19_131_1_Ingoma yezinyuko; kaDavide. Yehova, intliziyo yam ayiphakamile, amehlo am akaqwayingile; Andihambi ezintweni ezinkulu, Eziyimisebenzi ebalulekileyo kum.
19_131_2_Inene, ndiwuzolise ndawuthozamisa umphefumlo wam;  Unjengomntwana olunyulweyo, ehleli kunina; Unjengomntwana olunyulweyo umphefumlo wam kum.
19_131_3_Wena Sirayeli, lindela kuYehova Kususela ngoku kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_132_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Yehova, mkhumbulele uDavide Ukucinezeleka kwakhe konke;
19_132_2_Yena wamfungelayo uYehova, Wabhambathisa kwimbalasane enguThixo kaYakobi,
19_132_3_Esithi, Andiyi kungena ententeni eyindlu yam, Andiyi kunyuka ndiye esililini, emandlalweni wam;
19_132_4_Andiyi kuwanika amehlo am ubuthongo, Neenkophe zam ukozela:
19_132_5_Ndide ndimfumanele indawo uYehova, Ndiyifumanele umnquba imbalasane kaYakobi.
19_132_6_Khangela, sawuva e-Efrata, Sawufumana ezintilini zaseKiriyati-yeharim.
19_132_7_Masingene emnqubeni wakhe, Siqubude esihlalweni seenyawo zakhe.
19_132_8_Khawusuk ume, Yehova, uze ekuphumleni kwakho, Wena netyeya yamandla akho.
19_132_9_Ababingeleli bakho mabambathe ubulungisa, Bamemelele abakho benceba.
19_132_10_Ngenxa kaDavide umkhonzi wakho, Musa ukubutyhala ubuso bomthanjiswa wakho.
19_132_11_UYehova wamfungela uDavide; Inyaniso, akayi kubuya kuloo nto, Esithi, Esiqhameni sezibilini zakho Ndimisa oya kuba setroneni yakho.
19_132_12_Ukuba bathe oonyana bakho bawugcina umnqophiso wam,  Nesingqiniso sam endibafundisayo: Oonyana babo bothi nabo bahlale Etroneni yakho nanini.
19_132_13_Ngokuba uYehova uyinyule iZiyon, Uyinqwenele ukuba ibe likhaya lakhe;
19_132_14_Esithi, Nantsi indawo yam yokuphumla kwam nanini; Ndiya kuhlala apha, ngokuba oko ndikunqwenele.
19_132_15_Umphako wayo ndiya kuwusikelela kunene; Amahlwempu ayo ndiya kuwahluthisa ngesonka,
19_132_16_Ndibambathise ngosindiso ababingeleli bayo, Abenceba bayo bamemelele bememelela.
19_132_17_Apho ndiya kumhlumisela uphondo uDavide, Ndiya kumlungisela isibane umthanjiswa wam.
19_132_18_Iintshaba zakhe ndiya kuzambathisa udano; Ke phezu kwakhe yena siya kutyatyamba isithsaba sakhe.
19_133_1_Ingoma yezinyuko; kaDavide. Yabonani, ukuba kuhle, ukuba mnandi, Ukuthi abazalwana bahlale bemxhelo mnye!
19_133_2_Kunjengeoli elungileyo entloko, Isihla ezindevini,  Ezindevini zika-Aron, Isihla iye emqukumbelweni weengubo zakhe.
19_133_3_Kunjengombethe waseHermon, Ohla phezu kweentaba zaseZiyon;  Ngokuba uYehova wayimisela khona apho intsikelelo, Ubomi, kude kuse ephakadeni.
19_134_1_Ingoma yezinyuko. Yabonani, mbongeni uYehova, nonke bakhonzi bakaYehova, Nimiyo endlwini kaYehova ebusuku.
19_134_2_Phakamiselani engcweleni izandla zenu, Nimbonge uYehova.
19_134_3_Makakusikelele eZiyon uYehova, UMenzi wezulu nehlabathi.
19_135_1_Haleluya. Dumisani igama likaYehova; Dumisani, nina bakhonzi bakaYehova,
19_135_2_Nimiyo endlwini kaYehova, Ezintendelezweni zendlu yoThixo wethu.
19_135_3_Dumisani uYehova, ngokuba elungile uYehova; Libetheleni uhadi igama lakhe, ngokuba kumnandi.
19_135_4_Ngokuba uYehova unyule uYakobi ukuba abe ngowakhe, Wanyula uSirayeli ukuba abe yinqobo kuye.
19_135_5_Ngokuba ndiyazi mna ukuba mkhulu uYehova, INkosi yethu ingaphezu koothixo bonke.
19_135_6_Konke akuthandileyo uYehova uya kwenza, Ezulwini nasemhlabeni, Ezilwandle nasemanzini onke enzonzobila.
19_135_7_Ulonyusa amafu eziphelweni zehlabathi, Imvula wayenzela imibane; Ulorhola umoya koovimba bakhe.
19_135_8_Owawabulalayo amazibulo aseYiputa, Ethabathele ebantwini wesa ezinkomeni;
19_135_9_Wathumela imiqondiso nezimanga Phakathi kwakho, Yiputa,  KuFaro nakubakhonzi bakhe bonke;
19_135_10_Owabulala iintlanga ezinkulu, Wabulala ookumkani abanamandla;
19_135_11_OoSihon, ukumkani wama-Amori, No-Ogi, ukumkani waseBhashan, Nezikumkani zonke zakwaKanan;
19_135_12_Walinikela ilizwe labo lalilifa, Lalilifa kumaSirayeli,  abantu bakhe,
19_135_13_Yehova, igama lakho lingunaphakade, Inkumbuzo yakho,  Yehova, ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_135_14_Ngokuba uYehova uya kugweba phakathi kwabantu bakhe,  Azohlwaye ngenxa yabakhonzi bakhe.
19_135_15_Izithixo zeentlanga yisilivere negolide, Umsebenzi wezandla zabantu.
19_135_16_Zinomlomo nje, azithethi; Zinamehlo nje, aziboni;
19_135_17_Zineendlebe nje, aziva; Akukho nento engumoya emlonyeni wazo.
19_135_18_Baya kuba njengazo abenzi bazo, Bonke abasukuba bekholose ngazo.
19_135_19_Nina ndlu kaSirayeli, bongani uYehova; Nani ndlu ka-Aron,  bongani uYehova.
19_135_20_Nina ndlu kaLevi, bongani uYehova; Nani boyika uYehova,  bongani uYehova.
19_135_21_Ngowokubongwa uYehova eZiyon, Ulohlala eYerusalem.  Haleluya!
19_136_1_Bulelani kuYehova, ngokuba elungile: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_2_Bulelani kuThixo woothixo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_3_Bulelani kuNkosi kankosi: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_4_KuloMenzi wemisebenzi ebalulekileyo emikhulu yedwa:  Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_5_KuloMenzi wezulu ngengqondo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_6_KuloMtwabululi wehlabathi phezu kwamanzi: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_7_KuloMenzi wezikhanyiso ezikhulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;
19_136_8_Ilanga lilawule emini: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;
19_136_9_Inyanga neenkwenkwezi zilawule ebusuku: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_10_Kulowabulala amaYiputa kumazibulo awo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_11_Wawakhupha amaSirayeli phakathi kwawo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_12_Ngesandla esithe nkqi, nangengalo eyolukileyo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_13_KuloMgabuli woLwandle oluBomvu, lwagabuka: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_14_Wawaweza amaSirayeli esazulwini salo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_15_Wamvuthululela uFaro nempi yakhe eLwandle oluBomvu:  Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_16_Kulohambisa abantu bakhe entlango: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_17_Kulowaxabela ookumkani abakhulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_18_Wabulala ookumkani abaziingangamsha: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;
19_136_19_USihon, ukumkani wama-Amori: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe;
19_136_20_No-Ogi, ukumkani waseBhashan: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_21_Walinikela ilizwe labo laba lilifa: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe,
19_136_22_Laba lilifa kuSirayeli umkhonzi wakhe: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_23_Owasikhumbulayo ebuphantsini bethu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_24_Wasihlangula kwabasibandezelayo: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_25_Ulonika into yonke ephilileyo ukudla: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_136_26_Bulelani kuThixo wamazulu: Ngokuba ingunaphakade inceba yakhe.
19_137_1_NgaseMilanjeni yaseBhabheli Sahlala phantsi khona, salila,  Sakuyikhumbula iZiyon.
19_137_2_Emingculubeni phakathi kwayo Sazixhoma khona iihadi zethu.
19_137_3_Ngokuba khona apho abathimbi bethu basibiza Izango zengoma; Abathuthumbisi bethu basibiza uvuyo, Besithi,  Sivumeleni ingoma yaseZiyon.
19_137_4_Singathini na ukuvuma ingoma kaYehova Emhlabeni wolunye uhlanga?
19_137_5_Ukuba ndithe ndakulibala, Yerusalem, Masinyele isandla sam sokunene.
19_137_6_Ulwimi lwam malunamathele ekhuhlangubeni lam, Ukuba andithanga ndikukhumbule; Ukuba andithanga ndiyinyuse iYerusalem Ngaphezu kwemivuyo yam yonke.
19_137_7_Bakhumbule, Yehova, oonyana bakaEdom, Umhla weYerusalem,  Abo bathi, Yidilizeni, yidilizeni Kuse elusekweni lwayo.
19_137_8_Ntombi inguBhabheli, wena unyashiweyo; Hayi, uyolo lwalowo ukubuyekezayo ukuphatha kwakho Osiphethe ngako!
19_137_9_Hayi, uyolo lwalowo ubabambayo abahlekeze abantwana bakho Engxondorheni!
19_138_1_EkaDavide. Ndiya kubulela kuwe ngentliziyo yam yonke;  Phambi koothixo ndiya kukubethela uhadi.
19_138_2_Ndiya kuqubuda ndibhekise etempileni yakho engcwele,  Ndibulele kwigama lakho, ngenxa yenceba yakho, nangenxa yenyaniso yakho; Kuba ulikhulisile ilizwi lakho ngaphezu kwegama lakho lonke.
19_138_3_Ngomhla wokubiza kwam wandiphendula, Wandikhaliphisa,  yangamandla emphefumlweni wam.
19_138_4_Baya kubulela kuwe, Yehova, bonke ookumkani behlabathi,  Bakuweva amazwi omlomo wakho;
19_138_5_Bavume ngeendlela zikaYehova, Ukuba lukhulu uzuko lukaYehova:
19_138_6_Ngokuba noko uYehova aphakamileyo, uyambona othobekileyo;  Ke yena oziphakamisayo umazi nakude.
19_138_7_Ukuba ndithe ndahamba-hamba phakathi kweembandezelo,  uyandiphilisa; Wosolulela emsindweni weentshaba zam isandla sakho, Sindisindise isandla sakho sokunene.
19_138_8_UYehova uya kundifezela. Yehova, inceba yakho ingunaphakade, Izenzo zezandla zakho musa ukuziyekela.
19_139_1_Kumongameli; ekaDavide. Umhobe. Yehova, undigocagocile,  wandazi.
19_139_2_Wena uyakwazi ukuhlala kwam nokusuka kwam; Uyaziqonda izicamango zam nakude.
19_139_3_Ukuhamba kwam nokulala kwam, uyakwela; Uqhelene neendlela zam zonke.
19_139_4_Ngokuba akukho lizwi elulwimini lwam Ongalaziyo ke,  Yehova, kanye.
19_139_5_Ngasemva nangaphambili undingqingile, Wasibeka phezu kwam isandla sakho.
19_139_6_Kubalulekile kum oko kwazi, Kuphezulu, kundinqabele.
19_139_7_Ndingahambela phi na ukumka emoyeni wakho? Ndingabalekela phi na ukumka ebusweni bakho?
19_139_8_Ukuba ndithe ndenyuka ndaya emazulwini, ulapho wena; Ukuba ndithe ndazandlalela kwelabafileyo, nanko ukho.
19_139_9_Ukuba ndithe ndaphakamisa amaphiko esifingo, Ndaya ndahlala ekupheleni kolwandle,
19_139_10_Besingandikhaphayo kwanalapho isandla sakho, Sindibambe isandla sakho sokunene.
19_139_11_Ukuba ndithe, Mabundisongele ubumnyama bona bodwa,  Nokukhanya kube bubusuku ngeenxa zonke kum:
19_139_12_Kwanobumnyama obo abungebi bubumnyama kuwe; Ubusuku bungaba mhlophe njengemini, Ubumnyama bungaba njengokukhanya
19_139_13_Ngokuba wena wazibumba izintso zam, Wandibiyela esizalweni sikama.
19_139_14_Ndiyabulela kuwe ngenxa enokuba ndenziwe ngokoyikekayo,  ngokubalulekileyo; Zibalulekile izenzo zakho, Umphefumlo wam uyazi kakuhle.
19_139_15_Ayengagushekile kuwe amathambo am, Mna ndenzelwayo entsithelweni, Ndalukwa ndayimfakamfele ezinzulwini zomhlaba.
19_139_16_Amehlo akho andibona ndiseyimbumba, Zazibhalwe encwadini yakho iimini zonke ziphela; Ziyiliwe ngenxa engaphambili,  Kungekabikho ke nanye kuzo.
19_139_17_Kum ke zinjani na ukunqaba izicamango zakho, Thixo!  Asingangani isimbuku sazo!
19_139_18_Zingathi, ndizibalile, zibe ninzi ngaphezu kwentlabathi;  Ndakuvuka ndoba ndisenawe.
19_139_19_Ngamana wambulala ongendawo, Thixo! Nina madoda amagazi,  sukani kum.
19_139_20_Abo bakukhankanyela amayelenqe, Balibizela inkohlakalo igama lakho abazondi bakho.
19_139_21_Andinakubathiya na abakuthiyayo, Yehova, Ndikruquke ngabasukela phezulu kuwe?
19_139_22_Ndibathiya ngentiyo ephelelisileyo, Kum mna baziintshaba.
19_139_23_Ndigocagoce, Thixo, uyazi intliziyo yam; Ndicikide, uzazi iingcinga-ngcinga zam;
19_139_24_Ubone ukuba kukho ndlela yobubi na kum, Undikhaphele kwindlela engunaphakade.
19_140_1_Kumongameli. Umhobe kaDavide. Ndihlangule, Yehova,  esintwini esinobubi, Ndilondoloze emntwini ogonyamelayo,
19_140_2_Abacinga okubi entliziyweni. Imihla yonke baxhaya imfazwe.
19_140_3_Balola ulwimi lwabo njengenyoka; Ubuhlungu berhamba busemlonyeni wabo (Phakamisani.)
19_140_4_Ndigcine, Yehova, ezandleni zongendawo, Ndilondoloze emntwini ogonyamelayo, Abacinga ukuzikhubekisa iinyawo zam.
19_140_5_Abanekratshi bandiqhushekele isibatha nezintya, Baneke umnatha ecaleni kwendlela, Bandithiyele ngemigibe.  (Phakamisani.)
19_140_6_Ndithi kuYehova, UnguThixo wam; Beka indlebe, Yehova,  elizwini lesikhungo sam.
19_140_7_Yehova, Nkosi yam, nqaba endisindisayo, Uyigqubuthele intloko yam ngemini yeduli.
19_140_8_Musa ukumnika, Yehova, ongendawo iminqweno yakhe; Musa ukuwuphumelelisa umnkqangiyelo wakhe, Hleze aziphakamise.  (Phakamisani.)
19_140_9_Yona intloko yabandingqingayo, Ububi bomlomo wabo mabubagubungele.
19_140_10_Mabathotyelwe amalahle avuthayo; Makabawise emlilweni,  emimbithini, bangabi saphuma.
19_140_11_Indoda enolwimi mayingazinzi ehlabathini; Indoda enokugonyamela, ububi mabuyizingele ngembembetshane.
19_140_12_Ndiyazi ukuba uYehova uya kulifeza Ityala losizana,  ibango lamahlwempu.
19_140_13_Inene, amalungisa aya kubulela kwigama lakho; Baya kuhlala ebusweni bakho abathe tye.
19_141_1_Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, ndiyakunqula, khawuleza uze kum; Libekele indlebe izwi lam ekudandulukeni kwam kuwe.
19_141_2_Umthandazo wam mawuhlale uhleli phambi kwakho usisiqhumiso, Nokuphakamisa kwam izandla kube ngumnikelo wangokuhlwa.
19_141_3_Umlomo wam wumisele umlindi, Yehova; Misa umgcini emnyango womlomo wam.
19_141_4_Intliziyo yam musa ukuyithobela entweni embi, Ukuba isebenze intlondi yokungendawo Namadoda asebenza ubutshinga;  Mandingazidli izimnandi zawo.
19_141_5_Malindibethe ilungisa linenceba, lindohlwaye; Ioli enjalo yentloko ayingeyali intloko yam: Ngokuba usekho nomthandazo wam ebubini bawo.
19_141_6_Bakhahlelwa emacaleni engxondorha abagwebi bawo, Beve amazwi am ukuba amnandi.
19_141_7_Njengolimayo enqika umhlaba, Anjalo ukuthi saa amathambo ethu emlonyeni wengcwaba.
19_141_8_Ngokuba akuwe, Yehova, Nkosi yam, amehlo am; Ndizimela ngawe; musa ukuwuphalaza umphefumlo wam.
19_141_9_Ndigcine esangweni lomgibe wabandithiyelayo,  Nasezirhintyelweni zabasebenza ubutshinga.
19_141_10_Mabeyele ezintanjeni zabo abangendawo, Ndide ndidlule mna okukanye.
19_142_1_Eyokuqiqa kaDavide; oko ebesemqolombeni. Umthandazo.  Ndikhala kuYehova ngezwi lam, Ndikhunga uYehova ngezwi lam,
19_142_2_Ndiphalaza inkalazo yam phambi kwakhe, Ndixela imbandezelo yam phambi kwakhe.
19_142_3_Ekutyhafeni komoya phakathi kwam, Uyayazi wena ingqushu yam. Emendweni endihamba ngawo Bandiqhushekela isibatha.
19_142_4_Bheka ngasekunene ubone, Akukho undibukayo; Andinandawo ndingasabela kuyo, Akukho uwukhathaleleyo umphefumlo wam.
19_142_5_Ndikhala kuwe, Yehova, Ndithi, Nguwe ihlathi lam, Isabelo sam ezweni labahleliyo.
19_142_6_Kubazele indlebe ukuhlahlamba kwam, Ngokuba ndiswele kakhulu: Ndihlangule kwabandisukelayo, Ngokuba bomelele kunam.
19_142_7_Wukhuphe entolongweni umphefumlo wam, Ndibulele kwigama lakho. Amalungisa aya kuzithi jize ngesithsaba ngenxa yam,  Ngokuba undiphethe kakuhle.
19_143_1_Umhobe kaDavide. Yehova, yiva umthandazo wam, kubekele indlebe ukutarhuzisa kwam; Ndiphendule ngokunyaniseka kwakho,  ngobulungisa bakho.
19_143_2_Musa ukumsa ematyaleni umkhonzi wakho: Ngokuba phambi kwakho akukho namnye uhleliyo olilungisa.
19_143_3_Ngokuba utshaba luwusukele umphefumlo wam, Lubutyumzele emhlabeni ubomi bam; Lundihlalise ezindaweni ezimnyama,  njengabafe ngonaphakade.
19_143_4_Utyhafile phakathi kwam umoya wam; Imangalisiwe phakathi kwam intliziyo yam.
19_143_5_Ndikhumbula imihla yamandulo; Ndicamngca ngemisebenzi yakho yonke, Ndicamngca ngesenzo sezandla zakho.
19_143_6_Ndizolulela kuwe izandla zam, Umphefumlo wam ukungxamele njengelizwe elibharhileyo. (Phakamisani.)
19_143_7_Khawuleza undiphendule, Yehova; uyaphela umoya wam. Musa ukubusithelisa kum ubuso bakho, Ndifane nabahla baye emhadini.
19_143_8_Ndivise kwakusasa inceba yakho, Ngokuba ndikholose ngawe.  Ndazise indlela endiya kuhamba ngayo: Ngokuba ndiwuphakamisela kuwe umphefumlo wam.
19_143_9_Ndihlangule ezintshabeni zam, Yehova. Ndizimela ngawe.
19_143_10_Ndifundise ukwenza ikholo lakho, ngokuba unguThixo wam.  UMoya wakho olungileyo makandikhaphele ezweni elisithabazi.
19_143_11_Ngenxa yegama lakho, Yehova, ndiphilise; Wukhuphe embandezelweni umphefumlo wam ngobulungisa bakho.
19_143_12_Ngenceba yakho zibhangise iintshaba zam, Ubatshabalalise bonke abawubandezelayo umphefumlo wam, Ngokuba ndingumkhonzi wakho.
19_144_1_EkaDavide. Makabongwe uYehova, uliwa lam, Ulofundisa izandla zam ukulwa, Iminwe yam imfazwe.
19_144_2_Unceba yam, umboniselo yam, Ungxonde yam, umsindisi wam,  mna lo; Ungweletshetshe yam, undizimela ngaye; Ulonyathelela abantu bam phantsi kwam.
19_144_3_Yehova, uyintoni na umntu, le nto umaziyo? Unyana womfo,  le nto umnyamekelayo?
19_144_4_Umntu lo ufana nomphunga, Imihla yakhe injengethunzi elidlulayo.
19_144_5_Yehova, thoba amazulu akho, uhle; Phatha ezintabeni,  ziqhume.
19_144_6_Banekisa imibane, uziphangalalise; Thuma iintolo zakho,  uziduba-dube.
19_144_7_Thuma izandla zakho, zivele phezulu; Ndirhole, ndihlangule emanzini amakhulu. Esandleni soonyana bolunye uhlanga;
19_144_8_Abamlomo uthetha inkohlakalo, Abasandla sokunene sisesokunene sobuxoki.
19_144_9_Thixo, ndokuvumela ingoma entsha, Ndikubethele umrhubhe ontambo zilishumi;
19_144_10_Ulonika ookumkani usindiso, Ulohlangula uDavide umkhonzi wakhe ekreleni elinobubi.
19_144_11_Ndirhole, ndihlangule esandleni soonyana bolunye uhlanga,  Abamlomo uthetha inkohlakalo, Abasandla sokunene sisesokunene sobuxoki;
19_144_12_Baze oonyana bethu babe njengezityalo ezikhulileyo ebutsheni babo; Iintombi zethu zibe njengeembombo ezivathisiweyo ngeemfakamfele ngokokwakhiwa kwebhotwe;
19_144_13_Oovimba bethu bazale, bavelise iintlobo ngeentlobo;  Iigusha zethu zizale amawaka, zande ngezigidi emaphandleni ethu;
19_144_14_Iinkomo zethu zizale, Kungabikho kungenelwa, kungabikho kuthinjwa, Kungabikho kuhlahlamba ezitratweni zethu.
19_144_15_Hayi, uyolo lwabantu ekunjalo kubo! Hayi, uyolo lwabantu abaThixo unguYehova!
19_145_1_Eyokudumisa kaDavide. Ndiya kukuphakamisa, Thixo wam,  wena Kumkani, Ndilibonge igama lakho ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_145_2_Imihla yonke ndiya kukubonga, Ndilidumise igama lakho ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_145_3_Mkhulu uYehova, ngowokudunyiswa kakhulu; Ubukhulu bakhe abunakugocwagocwa.
19_145_4_Izizukulwana ngezizukulwana, kunconywa izenzo zakho,  Kuxelwe ubugorha bakho.
19_145_5_Bunobungangamela ubuqaqawuli bendili yakho; Ngeendawo zakho ezibalulekileyo ndiya kucamngca.
19_145_6_Bothetha ngamandla ezenzo zakho ezoyikekayo, Ndibalise ngobukhulu bakho.
19_145_7_Bompompoza isikhumbuzo sokulunga kwakho okukhulu,  Bamemelele ngobulungisa bakho.
19_145_8_Unobabalo nemfesane uYehova, Uzeka kade umsindo, mkhulu ngenceba.
19_145_9_Ulungile uYehova kubo bonke, Imfesane yakhe ikuzo zonke izenzo zakhe.
19_145_10_Ziyabulela kuwe, Yehova, zonke izenzo zakho, Bakubonge abakho benceba;
19_145_11_Uzuko lobukumkani bakho balutsho, Bathethe ngobugorha bakho.
19_145_12_Ukuba babazise oonyana babantu ubugorha bakhe,  Ubuqaqawuli obuhle bobukumkani bakhe.
19_145_13_Ubukumkani bakho bubukumkani bamaphakade onke, Nolawulo lwakho lukwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
19_145_14_UYehova ungumxhasi wabo bonke abawayo, Ngumphakamisi wabo bonke abagobileyo.
19_145_15_Amehlo eento zonke akhangele kuwe, Wena ke uzinika ukudla kwazo ngexesha elililo;
19_145_16_Uyasivula isandla sakho, Uzihluthise iinto zonke eziphilileyo ngeento ezikholekileyo.
19_145_17_Ulilungisa uYehova ngeendlela zakhe zonke, Unenceba ngezenzo zakhe zonke.
19_145_18_Usondele uYehova kubo bonke abamnqulayo, Kubo bonke abamnqulayo ngenyaniso.
19_145_19_Uyayenza into ekholekileyo kwabamoyikayo, Akuve ukuzibika kwabo, abasindise.
19_145_20_UYehova ungumgcini wabo bonke abamthandayo,  Abatshabalalise bonke abangendawo.
19_145_21_Umlomo wam mawuthethe indumiso kaYehova, Inyama yonke ilibonge igama lakhe elingcwele ngonaphakade kanaphakade.
19_146_1_Haleluya! Mdumise uYehova, mphefumlo wam.
19_146_2_Ndiya kumdumisa uYehova lo gama ndidla ubomi; Ndiya kumbethela uhadi uThixo wam ekubeni ndingosekhoyo.
19_146_3_Musani ukukholosa ngamanene, Ngonyana womntu, yena ungenalo usindiso.
19_146_4_Uyaphuma umoya wakhe, abuyele yena emhlabeni wakhe; Ngaloo mini ayatshitsha amabhongo akhe.
19_146_5_Hayi, uyolo lwalowo uluncedo lunguThixo kaYakobi, Lwalowo ulinde kuYehova uThixo wakhe:
19_146_6_KuMenzi wezulu nomhlaba, Nolwandle neento zonke ezikulo;  Kulogcina inyaniso ngonaphakade;
19_146_7_Kogweba ityala labacudiswayo; Kopha abalambileyo ukudla;  KuYehova okhulula ababanjwa;
19_146_8_KuYehova ovula amehlo eemfama; KuYehova ophakamisa abagobileyo; KuYehova othanda amalungisa;
19_146_9_KuYehova ogcina abaphambukeli; Kulophakamisa inkedama nomhlolokazi, Ayiphethule indlela yabangendawo.
19_146_10_UYehova ungukumkani ngonaphakade, UThixo wakho, Ziyon,  kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana. Haleluya!
19_147_1_Haleluya! Ngokuba kulungile ukuvuma ngoThixo wethu;  Ngokuba kumnandi, ifanelekile indumiso.
19_147_2_Umakhi weYerusalem nguYehova; Abagxothwa bakwaSirayeli ubabuthela khona.
19_147_3_Ulophilisa abaphuke intliziyo, Abophe amanxeba abo;
19_147_4_Ulobala inani leenkwenkwezi, Ezibiza zonke ngamagama.
19_147_5_Inkulu iNkosi yethu, inamandla amakhulu; Ingqondo yayo ayiphele ndawo.
19_147_6_Ulophakamisa abalulamileyo nguYehova, Uthobela abangendawo emhlabeni.
19_147_7_Hlabelani kuYehova eyokubulela, Mbetheleni uhadi uThixo wethu.
19_147_8_Ulosibekelisa izulu ngamafu, Ulolungisela umhlaba imvula;  Ulontshulisa utyani ezintabeni;
19_147_9_Ulonika inkomo ukudla, Namathole ehlungulu alilayo.
19_147_10_Akabunanze nganto ubugorha behashe, Akakholiswa zizitho zendoda;
19_147_11_UYehova ukholiswa ngabamoyikayo, Abalinde inceba yakhe.
19_147_12_Mncome uYehova, Yerusalem. Mdumise uThixo wakho, Ziyon:
19_147_13_Ngokuba eyomelezile imivalo yamasango akho, Ebasikelele abantwana bakho phakathi kwakho.
19_147_14_Ngulomisa uxolo emideni yakho, Wakuhluthisa ngengqolowa etyebileyo.
19_147_15_Ulothumela intetho yakhe ehlabathini, Ilizwi lakhe ligidima ngokukhawuleza;
19_147_16_Ulonika ikhephu njengoboya bezimvu, Ugcwayela iqabaka njengothuthu,
19_147_17_Ephosa umkhenkce wakhe njengamaqhekeza; Ngubani na onokuma phambi kwengqele yakhe?
19_147_18_Uthumela ilizwi lakhe, ezo nto azinyibilikise; Uvuthuzisa umoya wakhe, aqukuqele amanzi.
19_147_19_Uloxelela uYakobi ilizwi lakhe, USirayeli imimiselo yakhe namasiko akhe.
19_147_20_Akenjanga ngalo kolunye uhlanga, Namasiko aluwazi.  Haleluya!
19_148_1_Haleluya! Dumisani uYehova emazulwini; Mdumiseni ezindaweni eziphezulu.
19_148_2_Mdumiseni, nonke zithunywa zakhe; Mdumiseni, nonke mikhosi yakhe;
19_148_3_Mdumiseni, wena langa, nawe nyanga; Mdumiseni, nonke zinkwenkwezi zinokukhanya;
19_148_4_Mdumiseni, mazulu awo amazulu, Nani, manzi angaphezu kwezulu.
19_148_5_Mazilidumise ezo nto igama likaYehova; Ngokuba wawisa umthetho, zadalwa.
19_148_6_Wazimisa ngonaphakade kanaphakade, Wazimisela ummiselo ezingayi kuwugqitha.
19_148_7_Dumisani uYehova ehlabathini, Nina bominenga, nani nonke,  manzi enzonzobila:
19_148_8_Wena mlilo, nawe sichotho; wena khephu, nawe msi; Moya uvuthuzayo, ulenzayo ilizwi lakhe;
19_148_9_Nina zintaba, nani zinduli nonke, Nina mithi eneziqhamo,  nani misedare nonke;
19_148_10_Nina marhamncwa, nani zinkomo nonke, Nina zinambuzane,  nani zintaka zinamaphiko;
19_148_11_Ookumkani behlabathi, nezizwe zonke, Abathetheli nabagwebi behlabathi lonke;
19_148_12_Umlisela kwanomthinjana, Amadoda amakhulu kunye nabafana:
19_148_13_Mabalidumise igama likaYehova, Ngokuba liyingxonde igama lakhe yena yedwa; Indili yakhe ingaphezu komhlaba nezulu.
19_148_14_Wabaphakamisela abantu bakhe uphondo, Lwayindumiso kwabakhe benceba bonke, Koonyana bakaSirayeli, abantu abasondeleyo kuye. Haleluya!
19_149_1_Haleluya! Mvumeleni uYehova ingoma entsha, Indumiso yakhe ebandleni labenceba.
19_149_2_USirayeli makavuye ngoMenzi wakhe; Usapho lwaseZiyon malugcobe ngoKumkani walo.
19_149_3_Mabalidumise igama lakhe beqamba, Bembethela ingqongqo nohadi.
19_149_4_Ngokuba uYehova uyakholiswa ngabantu bakhe, Uyabahombisa abalulamileyo ngoloyiso.
19_149_5_Mabadlamke benozuko abenceba, Mabamemelele besezililini zabo.
19_149_6_Yimibongo kaThixo emqaleni wabo, Likrele elintlangothi mbini esandleni sabo;
19_149_7_Ukuze benze impindezelo ezintlangeni, Izohlwayo ezizweni;
19_149_8_Bakhonkxe ookumkani bazo ngemixokelelwane, Nabazukileyo kuzo ngamakhamandela esinyithi;
19_149_9_Benze kubo isiko elibhaliweyo. Luzuko olo lwabakhe benceba bonke. Haleluya!
19_150_1_Haleluya! Dumisani uThixo engcweleni yakhe, Mdumiseni esibhakabhakeni samandla akhe.
19_150_2_Mdumiseni ngenxa yobugorha bakhe, Mdumiseni ngokobuninzi bobukhulu bakhe.
19_150_3_Mdumiseni ngokuvuthela isigodlo, Mdumiseni ngomrhubhe nohadi.
19_150_4_Mdumiseni ngengqongqo nengqungqo, Mdumiseni ngeento ezineentambo nogwali.
19_150_5_Mdumiseni ngamacangci akhenkcezayo, Mdumiseni ngamacangci adumayo.
19_150_6_Yonke into ephefumlayo mayimdumise uYehova. Haleluya!
20_1_1_Imizekeliso kaSolomon unyana kaDavide, ukumkani wamaSirayeli, Yokuba kwaziwe ubulumko noqeqesho;
20_1_2_Yokuba kuqondwe iintetho zengqondo;
20_1_3_Yokuba kwamkelwe uqeqesho lwengqiqo, Ubulungisa, nesiko,  nokuthe tye;
20_1_4_Yokuba izidenge zinikwe ubuqili, Ulutsha lunikwe ukwazi nokunkqangiyela;
20_1_5_Ukuze eve osisilumko, aqokele afunde, Oqondayo azuze amacebo obulumko;
20_1_6_Yokuba kuqondwe umzekeliso nezafobe zokuthetha, Amazwi ezilumko nezintsonkotha zazo.
20_1_7_Ukoyika uYehova kukuqala kokwazi; Ubulumko noqeqesho izimathane ziludelile.
20_1_8_Nyana wam, yiva uqeqesho lukayihlo, Ungawulahli umyalo kanyoko.
20_1_9_Kuba ezo zinto zisisangqawe esihle entlokweni yakho,  Nezambalo emqaleni wakho.
20_1_10_Nyana wam, ukuba aboni bathe bakuhenda, Uze ungavumi ke.
20_1_11_Ukuba bathe, Hamba nathi, Masilalele igazi, Masibalalele abamsulwa bengenatyala;
20_1_12_Masibaginye njengelabafileyo behleli, Begqibelele,  njengabehla baye emhadini;
20_1_13_Sofumana ubuncwane obunqabileyo, Sozizalisa izindlu zethu ngamaxhoba;
20_1_14_Wena ke woliphosa phakathi kwethu iqashiso lakho, Yoba nye ingxowa yethu sonke:
20_1_15_Nyana wam, musa ukuhamba ngendlela nabo; Lunqande unyawo lwakho emendweni wabo.
20_1_16_Kuba iinyawo zabo zigidimela ububi, Zikhawulezela ukuphalaza igazi;
20_1_17_Kuba ufumana usanekwa umnatha Emehlweni eentaka ezi zonke;
20_1_18_Ke bona balalela elabo igazi, Bazonda owabo umphefumlo.
20_1_19_Unjalo umendo wabo bonke abangxamele inzuzo embi; Imka nomphefumlo womniniyo.
20_1_20_Ubulumko bumemeza ngaphandle, Buvakalisa izwi labo ezitratweni.
20_1_21_Bumemeza emantloko eendawo zembutho; Ekungeneni kwamasango,  Phakathi komzi, buthetha iintetho zabo, busithi:
20_1_22_Kunini na, ziyathandini, nithanda ubuyatha, Abagxeki befuna ukugxeka, Izinyabi zithiya ukwazi?
20_1_23_Nithe nabuyela ekohlwayeni kwam, Niyabona,  ndowumpompozisela kuni umoya wam, Ndonazisa amazwi am.
20_1_24_Ngokokuba ndinibizile, anavuma, Ndolule isandla sam,  akwabakho ukhathalayo;
20_1_25_Nesuka naliyeka necebo lam lonke, Anavuma ndakunohlwaya.
20_1_26_Nam ke ndonihleka ekusindekeni kwenu; Ndogculela ekufikeni kokunkwantyiswa kwenu;
20_1_27_Ekufikeni kokunkwantyiswa kwenu njengesithonga, Ekuzeni kokusindeka kwenu njengesaqhwithi, Ekufikelweni kwenu yimbandezelo nenkcutheko.
20_1_28_Baya kwandula bandibize, ndingaphenduli, Bandifune kwakusasa, bangandifumani;
20_1_29_Ngethuba lokuba bakuthiyile ukwazi, Abakunyula ukoyika uYehova;
20_1_30_Abalivuma icebo lam, Basigiba sonke isohlwayo sam:
20_1_31_Baya kudla ke isiqhamo sendlela yabo, Bahluthe ngamacebo abo.
20_1_32_Kuba ukuphamba kweziyatha kuyazi bulala, Nobunqobo bezinyabi buyazitshabala lisa.
20_1_33_Ke yena ondivayo uhleli ekholosile, Wonwabile ekunkwantyiseni kobubi.
20_2_1_Nyana wam, ukuba uthe wazamkela iintetho zam, Wayiqwebela kuwe imithetho yam,
20_2_2_Ukuze uyibazele ubulumko indlebe yakho, Uyithobele ukuqonda intliziyo yakho;
20_2_3_Ewe, ukuba uthe wayibiza ingqondo, Walisa ekuqondeni ilizwi lakho;
20_2_4_Ukuba uthe wabufuna njengesilivere, Wabumba njengobutyebi obuselelweyo:
20_2_5_Uya kwandula ukukuqonda ukoyika uYehova, Ukufumane ukumazi uThixo,
20_2_6_Ngokuba uYehova upha ubulumko; Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma ukwazi nokuqonda.
20_2_7_Ubaqwebela uzimaso abathe tye, Uyingweletshetshe kwabahamba ngengqibelelo,
20_2_8_Ukuze alondoloze umendo wesiko, Agcine nendlela yabakhe benceba.
20_2_9_Uya kwandula uqonde ubulungisa, Nesiko, nokuthe tye, nayo yonke imikhondo yokulungileyo;
20_2_10_Kuba ubulumko buya kungena entliziyweni yakho, Ukwazi kwenze mnandi umphefumlo wakho.
20_2_11_Ukunkqangiyela kokugcina, Ukuqonda kokulondoloza;
20_2_12_Ukuba kukuhlangule endleleni embi, Kubantu abathetha impenduka;
20_2_13_Kwabashiya umendo wokuthe tye, Ukuze bahambe ngeendlela zobumnyama;
20_2_14_Kwabavuyela ukwenza ububi, Bagcobe ngeempenduka zabenza ububi;
20_2_15_Abamendo ujibilizayo, Abathi gu bucala ngemikhondo yabo;
20_2_16_Ukuze uhlangulwe kumkamntu, Kowolunye uhlanga, ontetho yakhe igudileyo;
20_2_17_Lowo ushiya ikholwane lobutsha bakhe, Awulibale umnqophiso woThixo wakhe.
20_2_18_Kuba utshona ekufeni nendlu yakhe, Nemikhondo yakhe itshonela kwabangasekhoyo;
20_2_19_Bonke abangenayo kuye ababuyi, Abafiki kumendo wobomi:
20_2_20_Ukuze uhambe ngendlela yabalungileyo, Ugcine umendo wamalungisa.
20_2_21_Ngokuba abathe tye baya kulima ilizwe, Basale kulo abagqibeleleyo,
20_2_22_Banqunyulwe ezweni abangendawo, Abanginizayo bancothulwe kulo.
20_3_1_Nyana wam, musa ukuwulibala umyalelo wam; Intliziyo yakho mayiyibambe imithetho yam;
20_3_2_Kuba iya kukongeza imihla emide, Neminyaka yobomi, noxolo.
20_3_3_Inceba nenyaniso mayingakushiyi; Zinxibe kuwe emqaleni;  Zibhale elucwecweni lwentliziyo yakho,
20_3_4_Ubabalwe ube nengqiqo entle Emehlweni kaThixo nawabantu.
20_3_5_Kholosa ngoYehova ngentliziyo yakho yonke, Ungayami okwakho ukuqonda.
20_3_6_Uze umazi yena ezindleleni zakho zonke; Wowulungelelanisa umendo wakho.
20_3_7_Musa ukuba sisilumko kwawakho amehlo; Yoyika uYehova usuke entweni embi.
20_3_8_Ukuphila kobakho enkabeni yakho, Nokuqina emathanjeni akho.
20_3_9_Mzukise uYehova ngobuncwane bakho, Nangentlahlela yongeniselo lwakho lonke:
20_3_10_Ozala amaqonga akho bubuninzi, Nemikhombe yakho yokukhongozela iphuphume iwayini entsha.
20_3_11_Uqeqesho lukaYehova, nyana wam, musa ukulucekisa,  Ungakruquki sisohlwayo sakhe;
20_3_12_Kuba lo amthandayo uYehova uyamohlwaya, Njengoyise esohlwaya unyana akholwayo nguye.
20_3_13_Hayi, uyolo lomntu ofumene ubulumko, Lomntu ozuze ingqondo!
20_3_14_Kuba lulungile urhwebo lwabo ngaphezu korhwebo lwesilivere,  Nongeniselo lwabo ngaphezu kwegolide embiweyo.
20_3_15_Bunqabile bona ngaphezu kwekorale, Nezinto zakho zonke ezinqwenelekayo azilingani nabo.
20_3_16_Imihla emide isesandleni sabo sokunene, Kwesokhohlo sabo bubutyebi nozuko.
20_3_17_Iindlela zabo ziindlela ezimnandi, Wonke umendo wabo uluxolo.
20_3_18_Bungumthi wobomi kwababambelela kubo, Unoyolo obubambayo.
20_3_19_UYehova waliseka ihlabathi ngobulumko, Walizinzisa izulu ngengqondo.
20_3_20_Agqobhoka amanzi anzongonzongo ngokwazi kwakhe, Savuza umbethe isibhakabhaka.
20_3_21_Nyana wam, ezi nto mazingemki emehlweni akho: Londoloza uzimaso nomnkqangiyelo.
20_3_22_Zoba bubomi emphefumlweni, Nento entle emqaleni wakho.
20_3_23_Uya kwandula uhambe ngendlela yakho ukholosile.  Lungabetheki unyawo lwakho.
20_3_24_Ukuba uthe walala, akuyi kunkwantya; Wolala, bube mnandi ubuthongo bakho.
20_3_25_Musa ukoyika lunkwantyiso luzayo ngesiquphe, Nasithonga sabangendawo, sakufika.
20_3_26_Kuba uYehova uya kuba yinqolonci yakho, Alugcine unyawo lwakho lungabanjiswa.
20_3_27_Musa ukwala nento elungileyo kolunge nayo, Kwakuba kusemandleni esandla sakho ukuyenza.
20_3_28_Musa ukuthi kummelwane wakho, Hamba, wobuya uze, Ndokunika ngomso; Kanti unayo.
20_3_29_Musa ukuyila ububi ngommelwane wakho, Ehleli nawe yena ekholosile.
20_3_30_Musa ukubambana nomntu kungekho nto, Engakuphathanga kakubi nje.
20_3_31_Musa ukuyimonela indoda egonyamelayo, Unganyuli nanye kwiindlela zayo.
20_3_32_Kuba othi gu bucala ulisikizi kuYehova; Ke lunabathe tye ucweyo lwakhe.
20_3_33_Ingqalekiso kaYehova isendlwini yongendawo; Ke isithili samalungisa uyasisikelela.
20_3_34_Ngokubhekisele kubagxeki, uyabagxeka; Ke abalulamileyo uyabababala.
20_3_35_Izilumko ziya kuludla ilifa uzuko; Ke izinyabi zamkela umrhumo wokucukucezwa.
20_4_1_Luveni, bonyana, uqeqesho lukayihlo, Nizibaze iindlebe ukuze nikwazi ukuqonda.
20_4_2_Kuba ndininika imfundiso elungileyo; Musani ukuwushiya umyalelo wam.
20_4_3_Kuba ndandingunyana kubawo, Ndithambile, ndimnye phambi koma.
20_4_4_Wandiyala ke, wathi kum, Intliziyo yakho mayiwabambe amazwi am; Gcina imithetho yam, uphile,
20_4_5_Rhweba ubulumko, rhweba ingqondo; Musa ukulibala, ungathi gu bucala entethweni yomlomo wam.
20_4_6_Musa ukubushiya, bokugcina; Buthande, bokulondoloza.
20_4_7_Ingqalo yobulumko ithi, Rhweba ubulumko, Ngako konke ukurhweba kwakho urhwebe ingqondo.
20_4_8_Bunonelele, bokuphakamisa; Bokuzukisa, xa uthe wabuwola.
20_4_9_Boyinika intloko yakho isangqawe esihle, Bokupha isithsaba sokuhomba.
20_4_10_Yiva, nyana wam, uyamkele intetho yam, Iba mininzi kuwe iminyaka yobomi.
20_4_11_Ndikuyalele indlela yobulumko, Ndikunyathelise emkhondweni wokuthe tye.
20_4_12_Ekuhambeni kwakho akayi kuxinana amabanga akho; Nokuba uthe wagidima, akuyi kukhubeka.
20_4_13_Bambelela eluqeqeshweni, musa ukuluyeka; Lulondoloze,  ngokuba lububomi bakho.
20_4_14_Musa ukungena emendweni wabangendawo, Unganyatheli endleleni yabanobubi.
20_4_15_Yiyeke; musa ukuya kugqitha kuyo; Yicezele, ugqithe.
20_4_16_Kuba abalali, ukuba abathanga benze ububi; Bemkelwa bubuthongo ukuba abathanga bakhubekise abanye.
20_4_17_Kuba badla isonka sokungendawo, Basele iwayini yogonyamelo.
20_4_18_Ke wona umendo wamalungisa unjengokukhanya komso, Okuya kuba mhlophe ngokuba mhlophe, kude kube semini enkulu.
20_4_19_Indlela yabangendawo injengesithokothoko; Abayazi into abakhubeka kuyo.
20_4_20_Nyana wam, wabazele indlebe amazwi am; Intetho yam yithobele indlebe yakho.
20_4_21_Mayingemki emehlweni akho; Yigcine entliziyweni yakho ngaphakathi.
20_4_22_Kuba ibubomi kwabayifumanayo, Nempiliso enyameni yabo yonke.
20_4_23_Nazintweni zonke zigcinwayo, londoloza intliziyo yakho;  Kuba aphuma kuyo amathende obomi.
20_4_24_Kususe kuwe ukujibiliza komlomo, Nokuthi gu bucala komlomo kudedise kuwe.
20_4_25_Amehlo akho makakhangele athi gca, Neenkophe zakho zithi nzo kokuphambi kwakho.
20_4_26_Lungelelanisa umkhondo wonyawo lwakho, Zonke iindlela zakho zizimaseke.
20_4_27_Musa ukuthi gu bucala ngasekunene nangasekhohlo; Susa unyawo lwakho entweni embi.
20_5_1_Nyana wam, bubazele indlebe ubulumko bam, Ingqondo yam uyithobele indlebe yakho;
20_5_2_Ukuze ugcine iminkqangiyelo, Ulondoloze ukwazi umlomo wakho.
20_5_3_Ngokuba ivuza incindi yobusi imilebe yomlomo womkamntu,  Libuthelezi ngaphezu kweoli ikhuhlangubo lakhe;
20_5_4_Ke ukuphela kwakhe kukrakra njengomhlonyane, Kubukhali njengekrele elintlangothi mbini.
20_5_5_Iinyawo zakhe zihla ziye ekufeni, Amabanga akhe abambelele kwelabafileyo.
20_5_6_Akangeze wahamba ngomendo wobomi; Imikhondo yakhe iyajikajika, engazi.
20_5_7_Ke ngoku, bonyana, ndiveni, Ningemki entethweni yomlomo wam.
20_5_8_Mayibe kude kuye indlela yakho, Ungasondeli emnyango wendlu yakhe;
20_5_9_Hleze uyinike abanye intlahla yakho, Uyinike isijorha iminyaka yakho;
20_5_10_Hleze kuhluthe abasemzini ngamandla akho, Kungene endlwini yowolunye uhlanga ukubulaleka kwakho;
20_5_11_Ugcume ekupheleni kwakho, Ekudlekeni kwenyama yakho nezihlunu zakho;
20_5_12_Uthi, Bendiluthiyeleni na uqeqesho, Yasigiba isohlwayo intliziyo yam?
20_5_13_Andaliphulaphula izwi labayali bam; Andayithobela indlebe yam kubafundisi bam!
20_5_14_Ndaphantsa ukuba sebubini bonke Esazulwini sesikhungu nebandla.
20_5_15_Sela amanzi kwelakho iqula, Nemiqukuqela yamanzi ephuma emthonjeni wakho.
20_5_16_Mayiphalale phandle imithombo yakho, Ibe yimijelo yamanzi ezitratweni.
20_5_17_Mayibe yeyakho, yeyakho wedwa, Ingabi yeyabangengabo abakowenu kunye nawe.
20_5_18_Malisikelelwe ithende lakho, Uvuye ngumfazi wobutsha bakho;
20_5_19_Makabe yimazi yexhama elithandekayo, neyegogo elihle;  Amabele akhe akukholise ngamaxesha onke, Uyotywe luthando lwakhe kuphele.
20_5_20_Yini na, nyana wam, ukuba uyotywe ngumkamntu, Uwole isifuba sowolunye uhlanga?
20_5_21_Kuba iindlela zomntu ziphambi kwamehlo kaYehova,  Ayilungelelanise imikhondo yakhe.
20_5_22_Ubugwenxa bakhe bumthi hlasi ongendawo, Abanjwe ziimbophelelo zesono sakhe.
20_5_23_Yena ufa kukuswela uqeqesho, Ayobe ebuninzini bokumatha kwakhe.
20_6_1_Nyana wam, ukuba uthe wammela ummelwane wakho, Wabambana nomnye ngesandla:
20_6_2_Urhintyelwe ngentetho yomlomo wakho, Uthiwe hlasi ngentetho yomlomo wakho.
20_6_3_Yenza le nto ngoku, nyana wam, uzihlangule; Kuba uzifake esandleni sommelwane wakho; Yiya, ziwise phantsi, umzame ummelwane wakho.
20_6_4_Musa ukuwanika ubuthongo amehlo akho, Ungaziniki kozela iinkophe zakho;
20_6_5_Zihlangule esandleni njengebhadi, Njengentaka esandleni somthiyeli.
20_6_6_Yiya embovaneni, vilandini; Khangela iindlela zayo, ulumke:
20_6_7_Yona ithi, ingenamphathi, Namongameli, namlawuli,
20_6_8_Isuke isilungise isonka sayo ehlotyeni, Ikubuthe ukudla kwayo ngexa lokuvuna.
20_6_9_Kunini na ulele, vilandini? Uya kuvuka nini na ebuthongweni bakho?
20_6_10_Xa uthe, Intwana yobuthongo, intwana yokozela, Intwana yokukhwabusha izandla ukuba ndilale:
20_6_11_Boza ubuhlwempu bakho njengomhambi, Nokuswela kwakho njengendoda enengweletshetshe.
20_6_12_Ngumntu olitshijolo, ngumntu okhohlakeleyo, Lowo uhamba ngokujibiliza komlomo wakhe;
20_6_13_Utyanda ngoshiyi, uqhubukusha ngeenyawo, Walatha ngophakathi wakhe.
20_6_14_Yimpenduka entliziyweni yakhe, uyila ububi ixesha lonke,  Ungenisa ingxabano.
20_6_15_Ngenxa yoko kuya kufika ngesiquphe ukusindeka kwakhe; Uya kwaphuka ngephanyazo, angabi nakunyangwa.
20_6_16_Izinto ezintandathu uzithiyile uYehova, Ezisixhenxe zingamasikizi emphefumlweni wakhe:
20_6_17_Ngamehlo aqwayingayo; lulwimi oluxokayo; Zizandla eziphalaza igazi elimsulwa;
20_6_18_Yintliziyo eyila iingcinga zobutshinga; Ziinyawo ezikhawulezayo ukugidimela ebubini;
20_6_19_Lingqina elixokayo, elifutha amanga; Nongenisa ingxabano phakathi kwabangabazalwana.
20_6_20_Nyana wam, bamba umthetho kayihlo, Ungasilahli isiyalo sikanyoko.
20_6_21_Sibophe entliziyweni yakho okukanye, Usinxibe emqaleni wakho.
20_6_22_Ekuhambeni kwakho sokukhapha; Ekulaleni kwakho sokugcina;  Ekuvukeni kwakho soncokola nawe.
20_6_23_Ngokuba usisibane umthetho, silukhanyiso isiyalo;  Zinyindlela yobomi izohlwayo eziqeqeshayo;
20_6_24_Ukuba ugcinwe kumfazi onobubi, Ekugudeni kolwimi lowolunye uhlanga.
20_6_25_Musa ukubukhanuka ubunzwakazi bakhe ngentliziyo yakho,  Angakubambisi ngeenkophe zakhe;
20_6_26_Kuba ngenxa yehenyukazi umntu uda adle kuphela intendana yesonka; Umkamntu uzingela umphefumlo onqabileyo.
20_6_27_Umntu unokuwuthabatha na umlilo ase esifubeni sakhe,  Zingatshi na iingubo zakhe?
20_6_28_Unokuhamba na umntu phezu kwamalahle avuthayo, Zingatyabuki na iinyawo zakhe?
20_6_29_Unjalo ongena emfazini wommelwane wakhe; Akukho namnye umchukumisayo, oya kuba msulwa.
20_6_30_Alidelwa isela, xa lithe labela Ukwanelisa umphefumlo walo,  xa lithe lalamba;
20_6_31_Lifunyenwe, lihlawula kasixhenxe, Lirhola bonke ubuncwane bendlu yalo.
20_6_32_Okrexeza umfazi ke uswele intliziyo; Owenza loo nto ngumonakalisi womphefumlo wakhe.
20_6_33_Ufumanana nobetho nocukucezo, Ungcikivo lwakhe alucimi.
20_6_34_Kuba ikhwele libubushushu bendoda, Ayiyi kuyeka ngemini yempindezelo.
20_6_35_Ayiyi kulubeka ucamagusho, nokuba luluphi na; Ayiyi kuvuma,  naxa uthe wayicenga ngeento ezininzi.
20_7_1_Nyana wam, gcina intetho yam, Uyiqwebele kuwe imithetho yam.
20_7_2_Gcina imithetho yam, udle ubomi; Nesiyalo sam, njengokhozo lweliso lakho.
20_7_3_Yibophe eminweni yakho, Yibhale emacwecweni entliziyo yakho.
20_7_4_Yithi kubulumko, Ungudade wethu; Uthi, Ingqondo sisihlobo;
20_7_5_Ukuze ugcinwe kumkamntu, Kowolunye uhlanga, ontetho igudileyo.
20_7_6_Kuba ngefestile yendlu yam, Ndingasemva kwenqwanqwa,  ndalunguza;
20_7_7_Ndabona phakathi kweziyatha, Ndaqonda phakathi kwamadodana,  Umfana oswele intliziyo;
20_7_8_Ehambahamba esesitratweni, kufuphi nekhumbi lendlu yomkamntu, Enyathela ngendlela ngasendlwini yakhe;
20_7_9_Ngongcwalazi, ukumka komhla, Naphakathi kobusuku esithokothokweni.
20_7_10_Nanko umfazi emkhawulela, Enengubo yehenyukazi, enentliziyo enobuqhetseba.
20_7_11_Uyaphithizela, uyinjubaqa; Azihlali endlwini yakhe iinyawo zakhe.
20_7_12_Uthi ephandle, abe esezitratweni, Alale kufuphi neembombo zonke.
20_7_13_Wambamba ke, wamanga, Wayingwanyalala ubuso; wathi kuye,
20_7_14_Imibingelelo yoxolo ibiphezu kwam, Namhla ndizizalisile izibhambathiso zam.
20_7_15_Ngenxa yoko ndiphume ndeza kukukhawulela, Ndihle ndakufuna ubuso bakho; ndikufumene ke.
20_7_16_Umandlalo wam ndiwandlele ngemiqamelo, Ngeengubo ezimfakamfele zoluko lwaseYiputa;
20_7_17_Ndisifefe isilili sam Ngemore, nehaloti, nesinamon.
20_7_18_Yize ke sizikholise ngezincokoliso kude kuse, Sizidlamkise ngothando.
20_7_19_Kuba indoda ayikho ekhaya, Ihambe uhambo olude;
20_7_20_Iphethe ingxowa yemali; Yobuya ngosuku lokuhlangana kwenyanga ukuza ekhaya.
20_7_21_Wamthi gu bucala ngobuninzi bobuciko bakhe, Wamwexula ngokumcenga kwakhe.
20_7_22_Wamlandela ke ngesiquphe, Njengenkomo isiya ekuxhelweni,  Njengesimathane sisiya kuqinwa ngamakhamandela,
20_7_23_Njengentaka ikhawulezela esibatheni; Ingazi ukuba oko kuyingozi kumphefumlo wayo, Lude utolo lusicande isibindi sakhe.
20_7_24_Ke ngoko, bonyana, ndiphulaphuleni, Niyibazele indlebe intetho yomlomo wam.
20_7_25_Intliziyo yakho mayinganxaxheli ezindleleni zakhe,  Ungandwendweli emendweni wakhe.
20_7_26_Kuba zininzi iingxwelerha aziwisileyo; Linani elikhulu alibuleleyo.
20_7_27_Iziindlela zelabafileyo indlu yakhe, Zihla ziye ezingontsini zokufa.
20_8_1_Abumemezi na ubulumko? Nengqondo ayilikhuphi na ilizwi layo?
20_8_2_Emantloko eendawo eziphezulu ngasendleleni, Ekuhlanganeni kweendlela, buzimisile.
20_8_3_Ngasemasangweni, ekuphumeni kuso isixeko, Ekungeneni eminyango, buyamemelela, buthi:
20_8_4_Ndimemeza kuni, madoda; Izwi lam ndilisingisa koonyana babantu.
20_8_5_Buqondeni ubuqili, ziyatha; Yiqondeni intliziyo, zinyabi.
20_8_6_Yivani, kuba ndithetha izinto zobuhlalu, Nokuvula imilebe yomlomo wam kuthe tye.
20_8_7_Ngokuba umlomo wam uxela inyaniso; Okungendawo kulisikizi emilebeni yomlomo wam.
20_8_8_Yonke intetho yomlomo wam isebulungiseni; Kuyo akukho kubhijeneyo nokujibilizayo.
20_8_9_Yonke iphela ithe gca konengqondo, Ithe tye kwabafumene ukwazi.
20_8_10_Yamkelani uqeqesho lwam, ningamkeli silivere; Yamkelani ukwazi ngaphezu kwegolide embiweyo, enyuliweyo.
20_8_11_Kuba ubulumko bulungile ngaphezu kwekorale, Neento zonke ezinqwenelwayo azilingani nabo.
20_8_12_Mna, bulumko, ndakhele ebuqilini; Ndinokukufumana ukuyazi iminkqangiyelo.
20_8_13_Ukoyika uYehova kukuthiya into embi: Ikratshi nokukratsha,  nendlela embi, Nomlomo onempenduka, ndiwuthiyile.
20_8_14_Likum icebo nozimaso; Ndiyingqondo, bobam ubugorha.
20_8_15_Ookumkani banobukumkani ngam; Nezidwangube zimisa ubulungisa ngam.
20_8_16_Bathethela ngam abathetheli, Namanene, nabagwebi bonke behlabathi.
20_8_17_Abandithandayo ndiyabathanda nam; Nabandifunayo kwakusasa bayandifumana.
20_8_18_Bunam ubutyebi nozuko, Ubuncwane obusisimakade nobulungisa.
20_8_19_Silungile isiqhamo sam ngaphezu kwegolide embiweyo,  nakwengcwengekileyo; Lulungile ungeniselo lwam ngaphezu kwesilivere enyuliweyo.
20_8_20_Ndihamba ngomendo wobulungisa, Phakathi kweendlela ezisesikweni;
20_8_21_Ukuze abandithandayo ndibadlise ilifa elililo, Ndizizalise izindlu zabo zobuncwane.
20_8_22_UYehova wandivelisa ndaba yintlahlela yendlela yakhe, Ndaba ngowamandulo emisebenzini yakhe yakudala.
20_8_23_Ndamiswa kwasephakadeni, kwasentloko, Kwasemandulweni ehlabathi.
20_8_24_Ndazalwa kungekabikho manzi anzongonzongo, Kungekabikho mithombo inzima ngamanzi.
20_8_25_Ndazalwa kungekafakwa ntaba, Naphambi kweenduli;
20_8_26_Engekawenzi umhlaba namaphandle, Nothuli lonke lwelimiweyo.
20_8_27_Ekulilungiseni kwakhe izulu, ndandikho apho;  Ekubuzungulezeni kwakhe ngomda ubuso bamanzi anzongonzongo;
20_8_28_Ekusiqiniseni kwakhe isibhakabhaka phezulu; Ekugalelekeni kwemithombo yamanzi anzongonzongo;
20_8_29_Ekulumiseleni kwakhe ulwandle umda walo, Ukuba amanzi angawugqithi umthetho wakhe; Ekuzimiseni kwakhe iziseko zehlabathi:
20_8_30_Ndaye ndinaye, ndiyingcibi yomsebenzi, Ndiziyolisa ngokwam iimini ngeemini;
20_8_31_Ndidlala phambi kwakhe ixesha lonke, Ndidlala kwelimiweyo ihlabathi lakhe; Nokuziyolisa kwam kukoonyana babantu.
20_8_32_Ke ngoko, bonyana, ndiveni; Hayi, uyolo lwabazigcinayo iindlela zam!
20_8_33_Yivani uqeqesho, nibe nobulumko, Ningaluyeki.
20_8_34_Hayi, utolo lomntu ondivayo, Elinde ezingcangweni zam iimini ngeemini, Egcine emigubasini yeminyango yam!
20_8_35_Kuba ofumana mna, ufumene ubomi; Uzuze okukholekileyo kuYehova.
20_8_36_Ophosana nam wona owakhe umphefumlo; Bonke abandithiyayo bathanda ukufa.
20_9_1_Ubulumko buyakhile indlu yabo, Buzixholile iintsika zabo zosixhenxe;
20_9_2_Buzixhelile iinkomo zabo, buyiphithikezile iwayini yabo;  Busilungisile nesithebe sabo;
20_9_3_Buthume umthinjana wabo, buyamema Ezingqolweni zeenduli zesixeko, buthi,
20_9_4_Ngubani na osisiyatha? Makaphambukele apha. Oswele intliziyo, buthi kuye,
20_9_5_Yizani nidle isonka sam, Nisele iwayini endiyiphithikezileyo.
20_9_6_Yekani ukuba ziziyatha, niphile, Ninyathele endleleni yengqondo.
20_9_7_Othethisa umgxeki uzizekela ucukucezo; Owohlwaya ongendawo uzizekela isiphako.
20_9_8_Musa ukumohlwaya umgxeki, hleze akuthiye; Yohlwaya isilumko,  sokuthanda.
20_9_9_Siluleke isilumko, solumka okunye; Lazise ilungisa,  lokongeza ukufunda.
20_9_10_Yingqalo yokulumka ukoyika uYehova; Ukumazi oyiNgcwele kwaphela yingqondo.
20_9_11_Kuba yoba mininzi imihla yakho, Wongezwe iminyaka yobomi.
20_9_12_Ukuba uthe walumka, uzilumkela okwakho; Ukuba uthe wagxeka,  oko wokuthwala wedwa.
20_9_13_Umfazi onguNonyabi uyaxokozela, Unobuyatha, akazi nto;
20_9_14_Uhleli emnyango endlwini yakhe esihlalweni, Ezindaweni eziphezulu zesixeko,
20_9_15_Ukuba ameme abadlula ngendlela, Abalungelelanisa umendo wabo, esithi,
20_9_16_Ngubani na osisiyatha? Makaphambukele apha. Koswele intliziyo, uthi yena,
20_9_17_Amanzi abiweyo anencasa, Nesonka esityiwa ngasese simnandi kunene.
20_9_18_Akazi ukuba abafileyo bakhona; Basezinzulwini zelabafileyo abamenywa bakhe. Imizekeliso kaSolomon.
20_10_1_Unyana olumkileyo uyamvuyisa uyise; Ke unyana osisiyatha usisingqala sonina.
20_10_2_Ubuncwane bokungendawo abunyusi; Ke bona ubulungisa buhlangula ekufeni.
20_10_3_UYehova akawuyeki ulambe umphefumlo welungisa; Ke imbimbithelo yabangendawo uyayisunduza.
20_10_4_Uba lihlwempu osebenza ngesandla esidangeleyo; Ke sona isandla sabakhutheleyo siyatyebisa.
20_10_5_Obutha ehlotyeni ngunyana onengqiqo; Owozela ngexa lokuvuna ngunyana odanisayo.
20_10_6_Ziintsikelelo entlokweni yelungisa; Ke wona umlomo wabangendawo ugubungela ugonyamelo.
20_10_7_Ukukhunjulwa kwelungisa kuhleli kunentsikelelo; Igama labangendawo liba livithi.
20_10_8_Ontliziyo ilumkileyo uyayamkela imithetho; Omlomo ufumana uthethe ukhahleleka phantsi.
