20_10_9_Ohamba ngengqibelelo uhamba ngenkoloseko; Ke yena ojibilizayo ngeendlela zakhe uyaziwa.
20_10_10_Otyanda ngoshiyi ubanga imbulaleko; Omlomo ufumana uthethe ukhahleleka phantsi.
20_10_11_Lithende lobomi umlomo welungisa; Ke wona umlomo wabangendawo ugubungela ugonyamelo.
20_10_12_Intiyo ixhokonxa ingxabano; Uthando lugubungela zonke izono.
20_10_13_Ubulumko bufumaneka emlonyeni wonengqondo; Intonga yeyomhlana woswele intliziyo.
20_10_14_Izilumko ziya kuqhusheka ukwazi, Ke wona umlomo wesimathane yintshabalalo ekwalapha ukusondela.
20_10_15_Ubuncwane besityebi ngumzi waso oliqele; Iintshabalalo yabasweleyo bubuhlwempu babo.
20_10_16_Umvuzo welungisa usingisa ebomini; Ungeniselo longendawo lusingisa esonweni.
20_10_17_Umendo osa ebomini kukugcina uqeqesho: Olahla isohlwayo uyandwendwa.
20_10_18_Oyifihlayo intiyo ungumlomo wexoki; Ohambisa intlebendwane usisidenge.
20_10_19_Ebuninzini bamazwi akusweleki sono; Owubambayo umlomo wakhe unengqiqo.
20_10_20_Yisilivere enyuliweyo ulwimi lwelungisa; Intliziyo yabangendawo yintwana engeyakonto.
20_10_21_Umlomo welungisa udlisa abaninzi; Izimathane zifa ngokuswela intliziyo.
20_10_22_Intsikelelo kaYehova, yiyo etyebisayo, Imbulaleko ayongezi nento kuyo.
20_10_23_Ukwenza amanyala kunjengokudlala kwisidenge; Ubulumko bunjengokudlala, kwindoda enengqondo.
20_10_24_Into anxunguphala yiyo ongendawo, yiyo emfikelayo;  Akunqwenelayo amalungisa aya kunikwa.
20_10_25_Kwakugqitha isaqhwithi, akabikho ongendawo; Ke lona ilungisa luseko lwaphakade.
20_10_26_Njengeviniga emazinyweni, njengomsi emehlweni, Linjalo ivila kwabalithumayo.
20_10_27_Ukoyika uYehova kongeza imihla; Ke yona iminyaka yabangendawo iyanqanyulwa.
20_10_28_Ukulinda kwamalungisa luvuyo; Ithemba labangendawo liyadaka.
20_10_29_Iyinqaba yabagqibeleleyo indlela kaYehova; Yintshabalalo kubasebenzi bobutshinga.
20_10_30_Ilungisa alishukunyiswa naphakade; Ke bona abangendawo abalihlali ilizwe.
20_10_31_Umlomo welungisa umila ubulumko; Ulwimi lwempenduka luyanqanyulwa.
20_10_32_Imilebe yomlomo welungisa iyakwazi okwamkelekileyo; Umlomo wabangendawo uyimpenduka.
20_11_1_Isikali esikhohlisayo singamasikizi kuYehova; Ilitye elizeleyo lilikholo kuye.
20_11_2_Kwafika ukukhukhumala, kofika ukucukucezwa;  Bunabathozamileyo ubulumko.
20_11_3_Ingqibelelo yabathe tye iyabakhapha; Ukuphenula kwamanginingini kuyawabhuqa.
20_11_4_Abunyusi ubuncwane ngemini yokuphuphuma komsindo;  Ubulungisa buyahlangula ekufeni.
20_11_5_Ubulungisa bogqibeleleyo bulungelelanisa indlela yakhe;  Ongendawo uwa kwangokungendawo kwakhe.
20_11_6_Ubulungisa babathe tye buyabahlangula; Amanginingini athiwa hlasi kwayimbimbithelo yawo.
20_11_7_Ekufeni komntu ongendawo liyaphela ithemba lakhe; Ukulinda kwabanamandla obudoda kutshabalele.
20_11_8_Ilungisa liyahlangulwa embandezelweni, Kufike ongendawo esikhundleni salo.
20_11_9_Intshembenxa iyamonakalisa ummelwane wayo ngomlomo; Ke ayahlangulwa amalungisa ngokwazi.
20_11_10_Isixeko siyadlamka ngokuhlala kakuhle kwamalungisa;  Ekutshoneni kwabangendawo kuyamemelelwa.
20_11_11_Ngentsikelelo yabathe tye siyaphaka nyiswa isixeko;  Ngomlomo wabangendawo siyahleleleka.
20_11_12_Odela ummelwane wakhe uswele intliziyo: Ke indoda enengqondo ihlala ithi tu.
20_11_13_Ohamba ehleba uhlakaza ucweyo; Ke yena omoya unyanisileyo uyayigubungela into.
20_11_14_Kwakuba kungekho mbonisi, bayawa abantu; Usindiso lusebuninzini bamaphakathi.
20_11_15_Kubi kakhulu komele omnye; Ke yena okuthiyayo ukumela omnye ukholosile.
20_11_16_Umfazi osimilo silungileyo uzizekela uzuko;  Abanobungqwangangqwili bazizekela ubutyebi.
20_11_17_Uwuphethe kakuhle umphefumlo wakhe umtu onenceba; Isijorha siyihlisele ishwangusha inyama yaso.
20_11_18_Ongendawo usebenzela umvuzo oyinkohliso; Ke yena ohlwayela ubulungisa unomvuzo oyinyaniso.
20_11_19_Ubulungisa obububo busingisa ebomini; Ophuthuma ububi usingisa ekuzibulaleni kwakhe.
20_11_20_Ngamasikizi kuYehova abantliziyo zijibilizayo; Ukholwa ngabo bandlela zigqibeleleyo.
20_11_21_Ukakade onobubi akabi msulwa; Ke yona imbewu yamalungisa iyasinda.
20_11_22_Likhonkco legolide ethatheni lehagu Inzwakazi eswele izimvo.
20_11_23_Umnqweno wamalungisa yinto elungileyo yodwa; Ithemba labangendawo kukuphuphuma nje komsindo.
20_11_24_Kukho ohlakazayo, aye esanda ngokwanda; Kukho nozinqandayo kokumfaneleyo, oko kube yintswelo yodwa.
20_11_25_Umphefumlo osikelelayo uyatyetyiswa; Oseza ahluthise abanye, uyasezwa ahluthe naye.
20_11_26_Omangala nengqolowa, luyamqalekisa uluntu; Intsikelelo isentlokweni yothengisa ngayo.
20_11_27_Ozondelele okulungileyo ufuna okwamkelekileyo; Ongxamele ububi, buya kumfikela.
20_11_28_Okholosa ngobutyebi bakhe uya kuwa yena; Ke amalungisa aya kuhluma njengamagqabi.
20_11_29_Ogxugxisa indlu yakhe uya kudla ilifa elingumoya;  Isimathane soba ngumkhonzi kontliziyo ilumkileyo.
20_11_30_Isiqhamo selungisa ngumthi wobomi; Umbambisi wemiphefumlo sisilumko.
20_11_31_Yabona, ilungisa liyavuzwa ehlabathini; Wobeka phi na ke ongendawo nomoni!
20_12_1_Uthanda uqeqesho othanda ukwazi; Uthiya isohlwayo osisityhakala.
20_12_2_Olungileyo uyamkeleka kuYehova; Indoda enamayelenqe uyifumana inetyala.
20_12_3_Akuzimaseki mntu, enokungendawo; Ke yona ingcambu yamalungisa ayishukunyiswa.
20_12_4_Umfazi onesidima usisithsaba endodeni yakhe; Owenza okuziintloni unjengempehla emathanjeni ayo.
20_12_5_Iingcinga zamalungisa zisesikweni; Amacebo abangendawo yinkohliso.
20_12_6_Amazwi abangendawo ngawokulalela igazi; Umlomo wabathe tye uyabahlangula.
20_12_7_Bakuba bebhukuqiwe abangendawo, ababikho; Indlu yamalungisa iyema.
20_12_8_Indoda idunyiswa ngokwengqiqo yayo, Entliziyo igwenxa iba ngodelekileyo.
20_12_9_Ulungile ophantsi enesicaka, Ngaphezu kozizukisayo eswele ukudla.
20_12_10_Ilungisa liyawazalelela umphefumlo wenkomo yalo; Iimfesane zabangendawo zibubujorha.
20_12_11_Owusebenzayo umhlaba wakhe uhlutha kukudla; Osukelana nento engento uswele intliziyo.
20_12_12_Ongendawo ukhanuka okuzingelwa ngabanobubi; Ingcambu yamalungisa iyanika.
20_12_13_Ekuphosiseni komlomo kukho isirhintyelo esinobubi; Ke lona ilungisa liyaphuma embandezelweni.
20_12_14_Ngesiqhamo somlomo wayo indoda iyahlutha kokulungileyo,  Nempatho yezandla zomntu ibuyela kuye.
20_12_15_Indlela yesimathane ithe tye kwawaso amehlo; Ophulaphula ukucetyiswa usisilumko.
20_12_16_Isimathane sikwazisa kwangaloo mini ukuqumba kwaso; Ke yena onobuqili uyakugubungela ukucukucezwa.
20_12_17_Ophefumla inyaniso uxela ubulungisa; Ingqina elixokayo lixela inkohliso.
20_12_18_Kukho ophololoza njengokuhlaba kwekrele; Ke lona ulwimi lwezilumko luyaphilisa.
20_12_19_Umlomo wenyaniso uzimasekile kwaphela; Ke lona ulwimi oluxokayo lolwephanyazo.
20_12_20_Inkohliso isentliziyweni yabayila ububi; Ke bona abacebi boxolo bayabuyisa.
20_12_21_Ilungisa aliqubisani nobubi; Ke bona abangendawo bazele yinkxwaleko.
20_12_22_Ungamasikizi kuYehova umlomo oxokayo; Abenza inyaniso ukholisiwe ngabo.
20_12_23_Umntu onobuqili uyakugubungela ukwazi; Intliziyo yesinyabi ivakalisa ukumatha.
20_12_24_Isandla sabakhutheleyo siyalawula; Ukudangala kufakwa uviko.
20_12_25_Isithukuthezi esisentliziyweni yendoda siyenza igobe;  Liyayivuyisa ilizwi elihle.
20_12_26_Ilungisa lingumkhokeli kuwalo; Indlela yabangendawo iyabandwendwisa.
20_12_27_Odangeleyo akayibhulisi inyamakazi yakhe; Ke ubuncwane obunqabileyo bomntu kukukhuthala.
20_12_28_Busemendweni wobulungisa ubomi; Ukuyinyathela indlela yabo kukungafi.
20_13_1_Unyana osisilumko uva uqeqesho lukayise; Ke yena umgxeki akeva kukhalinyelwa.
20_13_2_Ngesiqhamo somlomo wayo indoda idla okulungileyo. Ke wona umnqweno wamanginingini kukugonyamela.
20_13_3_Obambe umlomo wakhe ugcine umphefumlo wakhe; Owuthe qheke umlomo wakhe, yintshabalalo kuye leyo.
20_13_4_Umphefumlo wevila uyanqwena, ungazuzi; Umphefumlo wabakhutheleyo uyatyetyiswa.
20_13_5_Ilungisa liyithiyile into ebubuxoki; Yena ongendawo uyanukisa, enze okuziintloni.
20_13_6_Ubulungisa bulondoloza ihambo egqibeleleyo; Okungendawo kuyamphenula umoni.
20_13_7_Kukho ozenza isityebi, engenayo nento; Kukho ozenza isisweli, enobuncwane obuninzi.
20_13_8_Ucamagusho lomphefumlo wendoda bubutyebi bayo; Isisweli asiva kusongelwa.
20_13_9_Isikhanyiso samalungisa siyavuya; Ke sona isibane sabangendawo siyacima.
20_13_10_Ngokukhukhumala kuvuka ukulwa kuphela; Ubulumko bunabavuma ukucetyiswa.
20_13_11_Ubuncwane basebubhedengwini buya kuncipha; Ke yena obutha ngezipha, uyandisa.
20_13_12_Ukulindela okubanjezelweyo kubulala intliziyo; Ungumthi wobomi umnqweno ofezekileyo.
20_13_13_Odela ilizwi ubanjwa lilo; Owojika umthetho uyavuzwa.
20_13_14_Umyalelo wesilumko lithende lobomi, Ukuze kumkiwe ezirhintyelweni zokufa.
20_13_15_Ingqiqo entle ibanga ubukholwane; Indlela yamanginingini inzima.
20_13_16_Bonke abanobuqili benza ngokwazi; Isinyabi siya kwaneka ukumatha.
20_13_17_Umthunywa ongendawo weyela ebubini; Isigidimi esinyanisileyo siyaphilisa.
20_13_18_Unobuhlwempu nocukucezo ophulukene noqeqesho; Osigcinileyo isohlwayo uyazukiswa.
20_13_19_Umnqweno ofeziweyo unencasa emphefumlweni; Kulisikizi kwisinyabi ukumka ebubini.
20_13_20_Ohamba nezilumko uba sisilumko naye; Ke olikholwane lesidenge uya konakaliswa.
20_13_21_Aboni basukelwa bububi; Ke wona amalungisa ayavuzwa kokulungileyo.
20_13_22_Olungileyo ushiya ilifa kubazukulwana bakhe; Ubutyebi bomoni buqwetyelwe ilungisa.
20_13_23_Umkhubelo wamahlwempu unokudla okuninzi; Kukho ophetshethwa kukungabi nabulungisa.
20_13_24_Oyiyekileyo intonga yakhe umthiyile unyana wakhe; Ke omthandayo umqeqesha esemncina ne.
20_13_25_Ilungisa lidla ukuba kuhluthe umphefumlo walo; Ke sona isisu sabangendawo siyalamba.
20_14_1_Ubulumko bomfazi buyayakha indlu yakhe; Ukumatha kuyayichitha ngezakhe izandla.
20_14_2_Uhamba ngokuthe tye owoyika uYehova; Uthi gu bucala ngeendlela zakhe omdelayo.
20_14_3_Lusemlonyeni wesimathane uswazi lwekratshi; Umlomo wezilumko uyazigcina.
20_14_4_Apho kungekho nkomo, umkhombe wesitali uba ze; Indyebo eninzi iza ngamandla enkomo.
20_14_5_Ingqina elinyanisileyo aliwathethi amanga; Ke lifutha amanga ingqina elixokayo.
20_14_6_Umgxeki ufuna ubulumko, angabuzuzi; Ukwazi kulula konengqondo.
20_14_7_Suka ebusweni bendoda esisinyabi; Akuyi kuza wafumana mlomo wokwazi kuyo.
20_14_8_Ubulumko bonobuqili bukukuyiqonda indlela yakhe; Ukumatha kwezinyabi yinkohliso.
20_14_9_Idini letyala liyazigxeka izimathane; Phakathi kwabathe tye yimvisiswano.
20_14_10_Intliziyo iyabazi ubukrakra bayo ngokwayo; Omnye umntu akanakuzingenisa eluvuyweni lwayo.
20_14_11_Indlu yabangendawo iyatshatyalaliswa; Ke intente yabathe tye iyatyatyamba.
20_14_12_Kukho indlela ethe tye phambi komntu, Ukanti ukuphela kwayo ziindlela zokufa.
20_14_13_Nasekuhlekeni intliziyo inomvandedwa; Nokuphela kwalo uvuyo sisingqala.
20_14_14_Uhlutha ziindlela zakhe ontliziyo ishenxileyo: Umntu olungileyo uhlutha zizenzo zakhe ngokwakhe.
20_14_15_Isiyatha sikholwa ngamazwi onke; Onobuqili uyakuqonda ukunyathela kwakhe.
20_14_16_Isilumko siyoyika, sisuke entweni embi; Isinyabi siphuphuma umsindo, sizithembile.
20_14_17_Ozekanekayo wenza ukumatha; Indoda yamayelenqe ithiyekile.
20_14_18_Ilifa leziyatha kukumatha; Abanobuqili banxiba isithsaba sokwazi.
20_14_19_Abenzi bobubi basibekeka phambi kwabalungileyo;  Abangendawo bema emasangweni amalungisa.
20_14_20_Ihlwempu lithiywa nangummelwane walo; Ke bona abathanda isityebi baninzi.
20_14_21_Omdelayo ummelwane wakhe uyona; Obabala abaziintsizana,  hayi, uyolo lwakhe!
20_14_22_Abayi kulahleka yini na abayila ububi? Inceba nenyaniso iba nabayila okulungileyo.
20_14_23_Ekubulalekeni konke kubakho ungeniselo; Ke ukuthetha komlomo kubanga ukuswela kodwa.
20_14_24_Busisithsaba sezilumko ubutyebi bazo; Ukumatha kwezinyabi kukumatha.
20_14_25_Ingqina lenyaniso lihlangula imiphefumlo; Ke elifutha amanga liyinkohliso.
20_14_26_Ekoyikeni uYehova kukho inkoloseko eliqele, Abantwana bakhe baba nendawo yokuzimela.
20_14_27_Ukoyika uYehova lithende lobomi, Ukuze kusukwe ezirhintyelweni zokufa.
20_14_28_Busebuninzini babantu ubungangamela bokumkani;  Kusekupheleni koluntu ukutshabalala kwesidwangube.
20_14_29_Ozeka kade umsindo unengqondo eninzi; Ke yena ozekanekayo ucaphula ukumatha.
20_14_30_Bubomi benyama intliziyo epholileyo; Ke lona ikhwele yimpehla emathanjeni.
20_14_31_Ocudisa isisweli ungcikiva uMenzi waso; Olibabalayo ihlwempu uyamzukisa.
20_14_32_Ongendawo uyangqulwa bububi bakhe; Ke ilungisa linehlathi ekufeni kwalo.
20_14_33_Entliziyweni yonengqondo buyaphumla ubulumko; Ke embilinini wesinyabi buyazazisa.
20_14_34_Ubulungisa buyaluphakamisa uhlanga; Isono lihlazo lezizwe.
20_14_35_Inkolelo yokumkani ikumkhonzi oqiqayo; Ukuphuphuma kwakhe umsindo kukowenza okuziintloni.
20_15_1_Impendulo ethambileyo ibuyisa ubushushu; Ilizwi elidubulayo linyusa umsindo.
20_15_2_Ulwimi lwezilumko lulungisa ukwazi; Umlomo wezinyabi umpompoza ukumatha.
20_15_3_Asezindaweni zonke amehlo kaYehova, Ebonisela abanobubi nabalungileyo.
20_15_4_Ukuphola kolwimi ngumthi wobomi; Ke ukuphenula kwalo kwaphula umoya.
20_15_5_Isimathane sigiba uqeqesho lukayise; Osigcinileyo isohlwayo uba nobuqili.
20_15_6_Indlu yelungisa nguvimba omkhulu; Ke ngongeniselo longendawo kukho ukuhlisa ishwangusha.
20_15_7_Umlomo wezilumko uhlwayela ukwazi: Ke yona intliziyo yezinyabi ayindawo.
20_15_8_Umbingelelo wabangendawo lisikizi kuYehova; Umthandazo wabathe tye ngowona akholwa nguwo.
20_15_9_Ilisikizi kuYehova indlela yongendawo; Ke ophuthuma ubulungisa uyathandwa nguye.
20_15_10_Uqeqesho olubi lolowushiyayo umendo; Othiya isohlwayo uya kufa.
20_15_11_Elabafileyo nenzonzobila ziphambi koYehova; Zibeke phi na ke iintliziyo zoonyana babantu!
20_15_12_Umgxeki akakuthandi ukohlwaywa kwakhe, Akayi kwizilumko.
20_15_13_Intliziyo evuyileyo iyabuchwayithisa ubuso; Ekubulalekeni kwentliziyo umoya uthi dakumba.
20_15_14_Intliziyo enengqondo ifuna ukwazi; Umlomo wesinyabi usukelana nokumatha.
20_15_15_Yonke imihla yosizana mibi; Intliziyo echwayithileyo inesidlo ngamaxesha onke.
20_15_16_Ilungile intwana encinane kunye nokoyika uYehova, Ngaphezu kwendyebo eninzi kunye nokuxhalaba.
20_15_17_Ulungile umxhesho womfuno kunye nothando, Ngaphezu kwenkomo etyetyisiweyo kunye nentiyo.
20_15_18_Indoda enobushushu ixhaya ingxabano; Ezeka kade umsindo idambisa imbambano.
20_15_19_Indlela yevila ngathi ibiyelwe ngemitholo; Ke umendo wabathe tye ubekelelwe.
20_15_20_Unyana olumkileyo uyamvuyisa uyise; Umntu osisinyabi udela unina.
20_15_21_Ukumatha luvuyo koswele intliziyo; Ke indoda enengqondo ithi tye ukuhamba.
20_15_22_Iingcinga ziyatshitsha ngokungabikho kokucweya; Ke zona zima ngamaphakathi amaninzi.
20_15_23_Indoda inovuyo ngempendulo yomlomo wayo; Ilizwi elithethwe ngexa elililo, azi lihle!
20_15_24_Koqiqayo umendo wobomi usinga phezulu, Ukuze emke kwelabafileyo elingaphantsi.
20_15_25_UYehova uyayincothula indlu yabanekratshi, Amise umlimandlela womhlolokazi.
20_15_26_Zingamasikizi kuYehova iingcinga ezimbi; Ke ahlambulukile amazwi amnandi.
20_15_27_Uyihlisela ishwangusha indlu yakhe obawela inzuzo embi; Ke yena othiya isicengo, uya kuphila.
20_15_28_Intliziyo yelungisa iya kucamanga ukuphendula; Ke wona umlomo wabangendawo umpompoza ububi.
20_15_29_UYehova ukude nabangendawo; Ke wona umthandazo wamalungisa uyawuva.
20_15_30_Ukukhanya kwamehlo kuvuyisa intliziyo; Iindaba ezimnandi zityebisa amathambo.
20_15_31_Indlebe esivayo isohlwayo sobomi Ihlala phakathi kwezilumko.
20_15_32_Ophulukene noqeqesho ucekisa umphefumlo wakhe; Osivayo isohlwayo urhweba ukuqonda.
20_15_33_Ukoyika uYehova luqeqesho lobulumko; Ngaphambi kozuko lululamo.
20_16_1_Zezomntu izicwangciso zentliziyo; Ke yona impendulo yolwimi ivela kuYehova.
20_16_2_Zonke iindlela zendoda ziqaqambile kwawayo amehlo; Ke yena umlinganisi womoya nguYehova.
20_16_3_Qengqela kuYehova izenzo zakho, Zizimaseke iingcinga zakho.
20_16_4_Zonke izinto uYehova uzenzele intsingiselo yakhe,  Kwanongendawo umenzele imini yobubi.
20_16_5_Balisikizi kuYehova bonke abantliziyo izidlayo; Kakade ke,  ababi msulwa.
20_16_6_Ngenceba nenyaniso buyacanyagushelwa ubugwenxa; Ngokoyika uYehova umntu uyatyeka ebubini.
20_16_7_Ekukholisweni kukaYehova ziindlela zendoda, Uyixolelanisa neentshaba zayo nayo.
20_16_8_Ilungile intwana encinane enobulungisa, Ngaphezu kolungiselo oluninzi olukunye nokungesesikweni.
20_16_9_Intliziyo yomntu icinga indlela yakhe; NguYehova oyalela ukunyathela kwakhe.
20_16_10_Izihlabo zisemilebeni yomlomo wokumkani: Mawungamenezi esikweni umlomo wakhe.
20_16_11_Isilinganiso nesikali esisesikweni sesika Yehova; Asisenzo sakhe onke amatye asengxoweni.
20_16_12_Lisikizi kubo ookumkani ukwenza okungendawo, Kuba itrone izinziswa bubulungisa.
20_16_13_Ukumkani uyakholiswa ngumlomo wobulungisa; Othetha okuthe tye uyathandwa.
20_16_14_Ubushushu bokumkani buzizithunywa zokufa; Ke indoda elumkileyo iyamcamagusha.
20_16_15_Ekukhanyeni kobuso bokumkani bubomi; Okuthandwa nguye kunjengelifu lemvula yasekwindla.
20_16_16_Ukurhweba ubulumko kungakanani na ukulunga kwako, ngaphezu kwegolide embiweyo! Nokurhweba ingqondo kungakanani na ukunyuleka kwako, ngaphezu kwesilivere!
20_16_17_Umendo wabathe tye kukutyeka ebubini; Ulondoloza umphefumlo wakhe ogcina indlela yakhe.
20_16_18_Ikratshi likhokela intshabalalo; Ukuzidla kukhokela ukukhubeka.
20_16_19_Kulungile ukuba nomoya othobekileyo phakathi kwabalulamileyo, Ngaphezu kokwaba amaxhoba nabanekratshi.
20_16_20_Oliqiqayo ilizwi uya kufumana okulungileyo; Okholose ngoYehova, hayi, uyolo lwakhe!
20_16_21_Ontliziyo ilumkileyo kuthiwa unengqondo; Nobumnandi bomlomo bongeza imfundiso.
20_16_22_Lithende lobomi ingqiqo kumniniyo; Ke lona uqeqesho lwezimathane kukumatha kwazo.
20_16_23_Intliziyo yesilumko iyawuqiqisa umlomo waso, Yongeze imfundiso emilebeni yomlomo waso.
20_16_24_Linqatha lobusi amazwi amnandi, Ayincasa emphefumlweni,  ayimpiliso emathanjeni.
20_16_25_Kukho indlela ethe tye phambi komntu, Ukanti ukuphela kwayo ziindlela zokufa.
20_16_26_Ukulamba komxelengi kuyamxelengela, Ngokuba umlomo wakhe uyamqhuba.
20_16_27_Umntu olitshijolo umba ububi: Emlonyeni wakhe ngathi ngumlilo otshisayo.
20_16_28_Indoda ephendukayo ingenisa ingxabano; Nentlebi yahlula amakholwane.
20_16_29_Indoda egonyamelayo ihenda ummelwane wayo, Imhambise ngendlela engalungileyo.
20_16_30_Ocima amehlo akhe, kukuba acinge impenduka; Oluma umlomo wakhe ugqibe ububi.
20_16_31_Isithsaba sokuhomba zizimvi, Sifunyanwa endleleni yobulungisa.
20_16_32_Ozeka kade umsindo ulunge ngaphezu kwegorha; Okulawulayo ukufutha kwakhe ulunge ngaphezu kothimba umzi.
20_16_33_Umntu uphosa iqashiso esondweni lengubo, Ke ukugqitywa kwalo konke kunoYehova.
20_17_1_Iqhekeza elomileyo lesonka, kunye nokuchulumacha, lilungile Ngaphezu kwendlu ezele yimibingelelo, enembambano.
20_17_2_Umkhonzi onengqiqo uya kumlawula unyana owenza okuziintloni, Ahlule ilifa phakathi kwabazalwana.
20_17_3_Ukhamba lolokunyibilikisa isilivere; iziko lelokunyibilikisa igolide; Umcikidi weentliziyo nguYehova.
20_17_4_Onobubi uwubazela indlebe umlomo onenkohliso, Uphulaphula ubuxoki obuselulwimini olweyeliselayo.
20_17_5_Ogculela ihlwempu ungcikiva uMenzi walo; Ovuyela inkxwaleko akabi msulwa.
20_17_6_Isithsaba samadoda amakhulu ngoonyana boonyana; Isihombo soonyana ngooyise.
20_17_7_Ayisifanele isidenge intetho ekhukhumeleyo; Yobeka phi na ke ukungalifaneli inene intetho ebubuxoki.
20_17_8_Sililitye elinqabileyo emehlweni omninilo isicengo, Apho asukuba ebheka khona, wenza ngengqiqo.
20_17_9_Ugubungela isikreqo ofuna uthando; Ophinda ayithethe into wahlula amakholwane.
20_17_10_Ukukhalinyelwa kuyangena konengqondo Ngaphezu kwemivumbo elikhulu kosisinyabi.
20_17_11_Oneenkani ufuna ububi bodwa; Ngoko ke uthunyelwa umthunywa osisijorha.
20_17_12_Kanye qubisana nebhere ehluthwe amathole ayo, Ungaqubisani nesinyabi ekumatheni kwaso.
20_17_13_Obuyekeza okubi esikhundleni sokulungileyo, Abuyi kusuka ububi endlwini yakhe.
20_17_14_Kukuvulela amanzi ukuqala kwengxabano; Yiyeke imbambano kungekavunganyewana.
20_17_15_Omgwebelayo ongendawo, kwanoligwebayo ilungisa,  Bangamasikizi kuYehova bobabini.
20_17_16_Lelokwenzani na inani elisesandleni sesinyabi, lokurhweba ubulumko, Singenantliziyo nje?
20_17_17_Umhlobo uthanda ngamaxesha onke; Umzalwana uzalelwe imbandezelo.
20_17_18_Umntu oswele intliziyo ngobambana nomnye ngesandla,  Ngomela umelo phambi kowabo.
20_17_19_Uthanda ukreqo othanda ukulwa; Owuphakamisayo umnyango wakhe ufuna ukuqhekeka.
20_17_20_Ontliziyo ijibilizayo akayi kukufumana okulungileyo;  Ophenduka ngolwimi lwakhe weyela ebubini.
20_17_21_Ozala isinyabi uzizalela isingqala; Akanaluvuyo uyise wesidenge.
20_17_22_Intliziyo evuyileyo iyalungisa, ichachise; Umoya odakumbileyo uyawomisa amathambo.
20_17_23_Ongendawo wamkela isicengo esivela esondweni lengubo,  Ukuze agqwethe indlela esesikweni.
20_17_24_Ubuso bonengqondo bubheke ebulumkweni; Ke amehlo esinyabi asekupheleni kwehlabathi.
20_17_25_Ububuhlungu bukayise unyana osisinyabi; Ububukrakra kumzalikazi wakhe.
20_17_26_Akulungile ukuhlawulisa nelungisa, Nokubetha amanene ngenxa yokuthe tye.
20_17_27_Owanqandayo amazwi akhe unokwazi: Omoya upholileyo yindoda enengqondo.
20_17_28_Kwanesimathane, ukuba sihleli sathi tu, kuthiwa sisilumko;  Singawuvingca umlomo waso, kuthiwa sinengqondo.
20_18_1_Ozahlulayo ufuna umnqweno wakhe; Into yonke ezimasayo uyayivungamela.
20_18_2_Isinyabi asikunanzile ukuqonda; Ke sinanze ukuzityhila kwentliziyo yaso.
20_18_3_Ekuzeni kongendawo kuza ukudela, Ukungcikiva, nokucukuceza.
20_18_4_Ngamanzi anzulu amazwi omlomo wendoda, Ngumlanjana obalekayo, lithende lobulumko.
20_18_5_Ukukhetha ubuso bongendawo akulungile; Nokugqwetha ilungisa ekuthetheni ityala.
20_18_6_Imilebe yomlomo wesinyabi ingena ekubambaneni, Nomlomo waso ubiza amanqindi.
20_18_7_Umlomo wesinyabi uyasitshabalalisa, Nemilebe yomlomo waso sisirhintyelo somphefumlo waso.
20_18_8_Amazwi entlebi yimithamo emnandi; Yona ihla iye ezingontsini zombilini.
20_18_9_Nohilizayo eshishinini lakhe Ngumninawa kaSokonakalisa.
20_18_10_Yinqaba ende eliqele igama likaYehova; Ilungisa ligidimela kulo, libe sengxondeni.
20_18_11_Ubuncwane besityebi sisixeko saso esiliqele; Bunjengodonga oluphakamileyo emabhongweni aso.
20_18_12_Phambi kwentshabalalo iyazidla intliziyo yendoda; Phambi kozuko lululamo.
20_18_13_Ophendula ilizwi engekeva, Kukumatha oko kuye, nehlazo.
20_18_14_Umoya wendoda uyasinyamezela isifo sayo; Ke umoya odakumbileyo, ngubani na ongawuthwalayo?
20_18_15_Intliziyo yonengqondo irhweba ukwazi; Nendlebe yezilumko ifuna ukwazi.
20_18_16_Isipho somntu siyamgabulela, Simse phambi kwabakhulu.
20_18_17_Unga ulilungisa oqalelayo etyaleni lakhe: Uza ummelwane wakhe, amgocagoce.
20_18_18_Liphelisa ingxabano iqashiso, Libahlule abanamandla.
20_18_19_Umzalwana ekukreqiweyo kuye ulukhuni ngaphezu kwesixeko esiliqele, Neengxabano zinjengomvalo woxande olude.
20_18_20_Ngesiqhamo somlomo wendoda uyahlutha umbilini wayo;  Iyahlutha ngongeniselo lomlomo wayo.
20_18_21_Ukufa nokuphila kusemandleni olwimi; Abaluthandayo baya kudla isiqhamo salo.
20_18_22_Othe wafumana umfazi, ufumene okulungileyo; Uzuze okulikholo kuYehova.
20_18_23_Ihlwempu lithetha ngezibongozo; Isityebi siphendula ngokulukhuni.
20_18_24_Indoda enezihlobo iyachithwa; Kukho sithandwa sinamathelayo kunomzalwana.
20_19_1_Lilungile ihlwempu elihamba ngengqibelelo yalo, Ngaphezu komlomo ojibilizayo, esisinyabi yena.
20_19_2_Kananjalo ukuthi umphefumlo ungabi nakwazi akulungile;  Onyawo zingxamileyo uyayiphosa indlela.
20_19_3_Ukumatha komntu kuphenula indlela yakhe; Ijalele uYehova intliziyo yakhe.
20_19_4_Ukutyeba kongeza izihlobo ezininzi; Ke osweleyo, nesihlobo sakhe siyahlukana naye.
20_19_5_Ingqina elixokayo alibi msulwa; Ofutha amanga akasindi.
20_19_6_Baninzi abacenga amanene; Yonke into isisihlobo kwindoda ephayo.
20_19_7_Bonke abazalwana behlwempu balithiyile; Zibeka phi na izihlobo ukuya kude kulo! Lisukela amazwi angento.
20_19_8_Orhweba ubulumko uthanda umphefumlo wakhe; Ogcina ingqondo uya kufumana okulungileyo.
20_19_9_Ingqina elixokayo alibi msulwa; Ofutha amanga uyatshabalala.
20_19_10_Akusifanele isinyabi ukudla ubuncwane; Kobeka phi na ke ukungamfaneli umkhonzi ukulawula abathetheli!
20_19_11_Ingqiqo yomntu imenza azeke kade umsindo; Sisihombo sakhe ukulugqitha ukreqo.
20_19_12_Kukugquma kwengonyama entsha ukujala kokumkani;  Sinjengombethe emfunweni isisa sakhe.
20_19_13_Ngumeyeliselo kuyise unyana osisinyabi; Luqhoqhozo oluxikileyo ingxabano yomfazi.
20_19_14_Indlu nobutyebi lilifa looyise; Ke yena umfazi onengqondo uvela kuYehova.
20_19_15_Ubuvila buwisela ebuthongweni obukhulu; Umphefumlo odangeleyo uyalamba.
20_19_16_Ogcine umthetho ugcine umphefumlo wakhe; Ozidelayo iindlela zakhe uya kufa.
20_19_17_Uboleka uYehova obabala isisweli; Umbuyekeza ukuphatha kwakhe okuhle.
20_19_18_Mqeqeshe unyana wakho, xa kusekho ithemba; Kodwa ungangxameli kumbulala.
20_19_19_Onomsindo omkhulu umelwe kukuhlawula; Kuba xa uthe wamhlangula, woba mandundu.
20_19_20_Live icebo, ulwamkele uqeqesho, Ukuze ulumke ngexesha elizayo.
20_19_21_Zininzi iingcinga entliziyweni yomntu; Noko ke licebo likaYehova eliya kuma.
20_19_22_Umnqweno womntu yinceba yakhe; Ke lilungile ihlwempu ngaphezu kwendoda enamanga.
20_19_23_Ukoyika uYehova kusa ebomini; Onako uya kuhlala ehluthi.
20_19_24_Ivila lisifake isandla salo esityeni, Alibi sasibuyisela emlonyeni walo.
20_19_25_Umbethile umgxeki, siba nobuqili isiyatha; Umohlwayile onengqondo, woqonda azi.
20_19_26_Ombhuqayo uyise, omgxothayo unina, Ngunyana owenza okuziintloni, ongcikivayo.
20_19_27_Yeka, nyana wam, ukuthi uve uqeqesho, Kanti uya kusuka ulahlekane nentetho yokwazi.
20_19_28_Ingqina elilitshijolo ligxeka isiko; Umlomo wongendawo uginya ubutshinga.
20_19_29_Izigwebo zilungiselwe abagxeki; Imivumbo ilungiselwe umhlana wesinyabi.
20_20_1_Ingumgxeki iwayini, singumxokozeli isiselo esinxilisayo;  Bonke abayotywe yiyo abalumkile.
20_20_2_Ngumgqumo onjengowengonyama entsha umothuso wokumkani;  Omqumbisayo wona umphefumlo wakhe.
20_20_3_Kuluzuko endodeni ukuhlalela kude nengxabano; Ke zona izimathane zonke ziyavungama.
20_20_4_Ebusika ivila alilimi; Liyafuna ngexa lokuvuna, kungabikho nto.
20_20_5_Ngamanzi anzulu icebo entliziyweni yendoda, Kanti indoda enengqondo iyalirhola.
20_20_6_Uninzi lwesintu luyayihlangabeza indoda enenceba kulo; Ke yona indoda enyanisileyo, ngubani na ongayifumanayo?
20_20_7_Ohamba ngengqibelelo yakhe elilungisa, Hayi, uyolo loonyana bakhe emva kwakhe!
20_20_8_Ukumkani, ehleli esihlalweni sokugweba, Uchithachitha ububi bonke ngamehlo akhe.
20_20_9_Ngubani na ongathi, Ndiyiqaqambisile intliziyo yam,  Ndihlambulukile esonweni sam?
20_20_10_Amatye ngamatye, iiefa ngee-efa, Ngamasikizi kuYehova ezo nto zombini.
20_20_11_Nenkwenkwe iyazazisisa ngeentlondi zayo, Nokuba kuqaqambile na, nokuba kuthe tye na, ukwenza kwayo.
20_20_12_Indlebe evayo, neliso elibonayo, UYehova uzenzile ezo zinto zombini.
20_20_13_Musa ukuthanda ubuthongo, hleze uhlwempuzeke; Vula amehlo akho, uhluthe kukudla.
20_20_14_Imbi, imbi! utsho othengayo; Emke, andule aqhayise.
20_20_15_Kukho igolide, neekorale ezininzi; Ke yona impahla enqabileyo ngumlomo onokwazi.
20_20_16_Thabatha ingubo yakhe omele omnye; Menze isibambiso ngenxa yabasemzini.
20_20_17_Sinencasa endodeni isonka sobuxoki; Ke emveni koko umlomo wayo uzala luhlalu.
20_20_18_Iingcinga zizinyaswa yingcebiswano; Yilwa imfazwe unecebo elilungileyo.
20_20_19_Ohamba ehleba uhlakaza ucweyo; Ungadibani nepholopholo.
20_20_20_Otshabhisa uyise nonina, Isibane sakhe sicima ebumnyameni phakathi.
20_20_21_Ilifa elizuzwe buphuthuphuthu ekuqaleni, Ukuphela kwalo akunantsikelelo.
20_20_22_Musa ukuthi, Ndiya kubuphindezela ububi; Thembela kuYehova, wokusindisa.
20_20_23_Ngamasikizi kuYehova amatye ngamatye; Nesikali esikhohlisayo asilungile.
20_20_24_Kuvela kuYehova ukunyathela kwendoda; Umntu angathini na ukuyiqonda indlela yakhe?
20_20_25_Sisirhintyelo emntwini ukufumana athi, Ingcwele, Aze aqale emva kwesibhambathiso, aphicothe.
20_20_26_Uchithachitha abangendawo ukumkani olumkileyo, Aguqulele phezu kwabo umlenze wenqwelo.
20_20_27_Sisibane sikaYehova umphefumlo womntu, Siphengulula zonke iingontsi zombilini.
20_20_28_Inceba nenyaniso ilondoloza ukumkani; Uyixhasa itrone yakhe ngenceba.
20_20_29_Isihombo samadodana ngamandla awo; Ubuhle bamadoda amakhulu zizimvi.
20_20_30_Imivumbo etyabulayo iguxa ububi; Izibetho ziguxa iingontsi zombilini.
20_21_1_Yimijelo yamanzi intliziyo yokumkani esandleni sikaYehova;  Uyibhekisa apho asukuba ethande khona.
20_21_2_Zonke iindlela zendoda zithe tye kwawayo amehlo;  Umlinganisi weentliziyo nguYehova.
20_21_3_Ukwenza ubulungisa nokusesikweni Kunyulekile kuYehova ngaphezu kombingelelo.
20_21_4_Ukuqwayinga kwamehlo, nokugungubala kwentliziyo,  Kwanokukhubela kwabangendawo, kusisono.
20_21_5_Iingcinga zabakhutheleyo zisingisa elungeniselweni lodwa;  Konke ukungxama kusingisa entswelweni yodwa.
20_21_6_Ukuzuza ubuncwane ngolwimi oluxokayo Ngumphunga ophephethekayo wabafuna ukufa.
20_21_7_Ukubhuqa kwabangendawo kuyabaqweqwedisa; Ngokuba abavumi ukwenza okusesikweni.
20_21_8_Iligoso-goso indlela yendoda enetyala; Ke yena ohlambulukileyo, umsebenzi wakhe uthe tye.
20_21_9_Kulungile ukuhlala elungqamekweni oluphezu kwendlu,  Kunokuhlala ndlwini-nye nomfazi onengxabano.
20_21_10_Umphefumlo wongendawo unqwenela ububi; Amehlo akhe akambabali ummelwane wakhe.
20_21_11_Ekuhlawulisweni komgxeki siyalumka isiyatha; Ekuqiqisweni kwaso, isilumko samkela ukwazi.
20_21_12_Ilungisa liyayiqiqa indlu yongendawo. Libaphenulela ebubini abangendawo.
20_21_13_Ovingca iindlebe zakhe ekukhaleni kwesisweli, Naye uya kubiza, angaviwa.
20_21_14_Isipho entsithelweni sinqanda umsindo, Isicengo esondweni lengubo sinqanda umsindo onamandla.
20_21_15_Kuluvuyo kwilungisa ukwenza okusesikweni; Kuqhiphula umbilini kubasebenzi bobutshinga.
20_21_16_Umntu ondwendwayo, emke endleleni yengqiqo, Uya kuhlala esikhungwini sabafileyo.
20_21_17_Othanda imigcobo uba yindoda esweleyo; Othanda iwayini neoli akabi sisityebi.
20_21_18_Ongendawo lucamagusho ngenxa yelungisa; Inginingini lisesikhundleni sabathe tye.
20_21_19_Kulungile ukuhlala ezweni eliyintlango, Kunokuhlala nomfazi onengxabano neengqumbo.
20_21_20_Ubuncwane obunqwenelekayo neoli zisekhayeni lesilumko; Ke umntu osisinyabi uyaziginya azigqibe.
20_21_21_Ophuthuma ubulungisa nenceba Wofumana ubomi nobulungisa nozuko.
20_21_22_Isilumko siyaqabela emzini wamagorha, Siyiwise inqaba ekukholoswe ngayo.
20_21_23_Ogcine umlomo wakhe nolwimi lwakhe Ugcina umphefumlo wakhe ezingxingongweni.
20_21_24_Umkhukhumali oligagadele, ngumgxeki igama lakhe; Ngowenza ngokukhukhumala okuphuphumayo.
20_21_25_Umnqweno wevila uyalibulala, Kuba izandla zalo azivumi kusebenza.
20_21_26_Imini yonke linqwena linqwenile, Ke lona ilungisa liyapha lingavimbi.
20_21_27_Umbingelelo wabangendawo lisikizi; Kobeka phi na ke bakuwuzisa ngenxa yamanyala!
20_21_28_Ingqina elinamanga liyatshabalala; Ke yona indoda evayo ithetha kuphele.
20_21_29_Indoda engendawo iyingwanyalala ubuso; Ngothe tye oyiqondayo indlela yakhe.
20_21_30_Akukho bulumko, akukho ngqondo, Akukho cebo malungana noYehova.
20_21_31_Ihashe lilungiselwa imini yokulwa, Ke usindiso lona lunoYehova.
20_22_1_Igama elilungileyo linokunyulwa ngaphezu kobutyebi obuninzi; Isimilo esilungileyo silunge ngaphezu kwesilivere negolide.
20_22_2_Ziyaqubisana izityebi namahlwempu; Umenzi wabo bonke nguYehova.
20_22_3_Onobuqili ubona into embi, azifihle; Ke zona iziyatha ziya kugqitha kuyo, zihlawuliswe.
20_22_4_Umvuzo wolulamo kukoyika uThixo, Bubutyebi, nozuko, nobomi.
20_22_5_Ngameva nezibatha, endleleni yojibilizayo; Ogcine umphefumlo wakhe makadede kuzo.
20_22_6_Mfundise umntwana ngendlela efanele umntwana; Naxa athe wamkhulu, akasayi kumka kuyo.
20_22_7_Isityebi siya kuwalawula amahlwempu; Nobolekayo ngumkhonzi endodeni embolekayo.
20_22_8_Ohlwayela ubugqwetha, wovuna ubutshinga, Nentonga yokuphuphuma kwakhe umsindo yophela.
20_22_9_Oliso linobubele nguye osikelelekayo; Kuba kwisonka sakhe upha isisweli.
20_22_10_Gxotha umgxeki, iphume ingxabano, Kuthi bembe amaphike nokucukuceza.
20_22_11_Othanda ukuhlambuluka kwentliziyo, Omlomo unobabalo,  umhlobo wakhe ngukumkani.
20_22_12_Amehlo kaYehova alondoloza ukwazi, Aphenule intetho yenginingini.
20_22_13_Ivila lithi, Kukho ingonyama phandle, Ndoncinithwa ezitratweni.
20_22_14_Sisihogo esinzulu umlomo wabafazi abangengabo;  Obhavunyelwa nguYehova weyela khona.
20_22_15_Ukumatha kubotshiwe entliziyweni yomntwana; Intonga yokuqeqesha yokumkisa kuye.
20_22_16_Ocudisa isisweli, ukuba andise okwakhe, Nonika isityebi,  uhlelwa yintswelo kuphela.
20_22_17_Thoba indlebe yakho, uve amazwi ezilumko, Uyibhekise intliziyo yakho ekwazini kwam.
20_22_18_Ngokuba kumnandi, xa uthe wawagcina embilinini; Makeme onke ephelele emlonyeni wakho.
20_22_19_Ukuze ukholose ngoYehova, Ndikwazisile namhla wena lo.
20_22_20_Andikubhalelanga na iintetho eziyintloko, Ezineengcebiso nokwazi,
20_22_21_Ukuze ndikwazise isilinganiselo samazwi enyaniso, Ukuze ubuye kwabakuthumileyo, uze namazwi ayinyaniso?
20_22_22_Musa ukusihlutha isisweli ngakuba sisisweli, Ungamtyumzi olusizana esangweni;
20_22_23_Kuba uYehova eya kubambana nababambene nabo, Awonakalise umphefumlo wabonakalisa bona.
20_22_24_Musa ukuqhelana nomntu onomsindo, Ungahambi nendoda enobushushu,
20_22_25_Hleze ufunde iindlela zayo, Urhintyelise umphefumlo wakho.
20_22_26_Musa ukuba phakathi kwababambana nomnye ngesandla,  Phakathi kwabamela into ebolekiweyo.
20_22_27_Ukuba uthe akwaba nanto yakuhlawula, Yini na ukuba athabathe ukhuko lwakho phantsi kwakho?
20_22_28_Musa ukuwushenxisa umlimandlela wakudala, Abawenzayo ooyihlo.
20_22_29_Uyayibona indoda eyinkunkqele eshishinini layo? Inokuma phambi kokumkani; Ayinakuma phambi kwabantu abangenagama.
20_23_1_Xa uthe wahlala phantsi, ukuba udle nomlawuli, Qonda uqonde lowo uphambi kwakho;
20_23_2_Ubeke isitshetshe emqaleni wakho, Ukuba ungumntu onombilini.
20_23_3_Musa ukuzinqwenela izidlo zakhe ezinencasa; Kukudla kwenkohliso.
20_23_4_Musa ukuzidinisa ngokufuna ubutyebi; Yeka okwakho ukuqonda.
20_23_5_Amehlo akho uya kuwasukelisa ubutyebi na, bungekho nje?  Kuba bona buzenzela amaphiko, Buphaphazela njengexhalanga elisinge ezulwini.
20_23_6_Musa ukudla ukudla koliso libi, Ungazinqweneli izidlo zakhe ezinencasa;
20_23_7_Kuba njengoko anjalo ocinga yedwa unjalo yena; Uthi kuwe,  Yidla usele, Ukanti intliziyo yakhe ayinawe;
20_23_8_Umthamo wakho owudlileyo uya kuwuhlanza, Ulahlekwe ngamazwi akho amnandi.
20_23_9_Musa ukuthetha ezindlebeni zesinyabi; Ngokuba siya kuyidela ingqiqo yokukhuluma kwakho.
20_23_10_Musa ukuwushenxisa umlimandlela wakudala; Ungangeni emasimini eenkedama;
20_23_11_Kuba umkhululi wazo womelele; Wobambana nawe yena ngobambano lwazo.
20_23_12_Yinikele intliziyo yakho eluqeqeshweni, Neendlebe zakho entethweni yokwazi.
20_23_13_Musa ukuluyeka uqeqesho emntwaneni; Ukuba uthe wambetha ngentonga akayi kufa.
20_23_14_Wombetha ngentonga, Uhlangule umphefumlo wakhe kwelabafileyo.
20_23_15_Nyana wam, ukuba ithe yalumka intliziyo yakho. Yovuya intliziyo yam, kwaeyam lo,
20_23_16_Zidlamke izintso zam Ekuthetheni komlomo wakho okuthe tye.
20_23_17_Intliziyo yakho mayingabamoneli aboni; Ke mayizonde ukoyika uYehova imini yonke;
20_23_18_Inene, kukho ikamva, Nethemba lakho aliyi kunqunyulwa.
20_23_19_Yiva, wena nyana wam, ulumke, Uyinyathelise intliziyo yakho ithi gca endleleni.
20_23_20_Musa ukuba phakathi kwamasela-wayini, Naphakathi kwamadla-kudla;
20_23_21_Kuba isela-wayini nedla-kudla liyahlwempuzeka; Kona ukozela kwambesa amajacu.
20_23_22_Mphulaphule uyihlo, lowo wakuzalayo, Ungamdeli unyoko akuba mkhulu.
20_23_23_Thenga inyaniso, ungathengisi ngayo; Nobulumko, noqeqesho,  nengqondo.
20_23_24_Ugcoba kakhulu uyise welungisa; Ozele isilumko uyavuya ngaso.
20_23_25_Makavuye uyihlo nonyoko, Agcobe umfazi owakuzalayo.
20_23_26_Ndinike intliziyo yakho, nyana wam, Amehlo akho akholiswe ziindlela zam.
20_23_27_Kuba sisihogo esinzulu ihenyukazi, Liqula elimxinwa umfazi wolunye uhlanga.
20_23_28_Ude alale njengesihange, Awandise amanginingini eluntwini.
20_23_29_Ungokabani na uYeha? Ungokabani na uYoo? Zinabani na iingxabano? Inabani na inkalazo? Anabani na amanxeba angenasizathu? Anabani na amehlo anozizi?
20_23_30_Anabo balibala ewayinini, Abangena bayiminyele iwayini ephithikeziweyo.
20_23_31_Musa ukuyikhangela iwayini, xa izenza ingqombela, Xa ibengezelayo endebeni, Xa ihla kamnandi;
20_23_32_Ukuphela kwayo iluma njengenyoka, Iluma njengerhamba.
20_23_33_Amehlo akho aya kubona izinto zasemzini, Intliziyo yakho ithethe impenduka;
20_23_34_Ube njengolele esazulwini solwandle, Nanjengolele encotsheni yemasti;
20_23_35_Uthi, Bandibetha, andeva ntlungu; Bandintlitha, andaba nanto ndiyaziyo; Ndiya kuvuka nini na? Ndiya kuphinda ke, ndiya kubuya ndiyifune.
20_24_1_Musa ukubamonela abantu abanobubi; Ungakunqweneli ukuba uhlale nabo.
20_24_2_Kuba intliziyo yabo icamanga ukubhuqa, Nomlomo wabo uthetha ngokwaphula.
20_24_3_Indlu yona yakhiwa ngobulumko; Izinziswe ngengqondo;
20_24_4_Ngokwazi kuzaliswa amaqonga Bubuncwane bonke obunqabileyo nobumnandi.
20_24_5_Umfo osisilumko unamandla, Nendoda enokwazi ibonakalisa amandla amakhulu;
20_24_6_Ngokuba, ukhokelwe bubulumko, woba nako ukuzilwa iimfazwe zakho; Nosindiso lusebuninzini bamaphakathi.
20_24_7_Ubulumko bunqabile kwisimathane; Asiwuvuli umlomo waso esangweni.
20_24_8_Ocinga ngokwenza ububi, Lowo bathi ukumbiza nguMayelenqe.
20_24_9_Iyelenqe lesimathane sisono; Ulisikizi ebantwini umgxeki.
20_24_10_Uthe waphelelwa ngemini yembandezelo, Oba ebandezelwe amandla akho.
20_24_11_Hlangula abasiwa ekufeni; Nabajingxela baye ekubulaweni,  khawubanqande.
20_24_12_Nokuba uthi, Yabona besingakwazi oko: Umlinganiseli weentliziyo yena akakuqondi na? Umgcini womphefumlo akakwazi na? Akayi kumbuyisela umntu ngokomsebenzi wakhe, yini na?
20_24_13_Yidla ubusi, nyana wam, kuba bulungile; Nencindi imnandi ekhuhlangubeni lakho.
20_24_14_Bazi ke ubulumko emphefumlweni wakho; Ukuba uthe wabufumana, kobakho ikamva, Linganqunyulwa ithemba lakho.
20_24_15_Wena ungendawo, musa ukulilalela ikhaya lelungisa,  Ungasibhuqi isikhundla salo;
20_24_16_Kuba ilungisa liwa kasixhenxe, livuke; Ke abangendawo bakhubeka phantsi kwenkxwaleko.
20_24_17_Musa ukuvuya ekuweni kotshaba lwakho, Ingagcobi intliziyo yakho ekukhubekeni kwalo;
20_24_18_Hleze akubone uYehova, kube kubi emehlweni akhe, Awubuyise umsindo wakhe kulo.
20_24_19_Musa ukuvutha ngumsindo ngabenzi bobubi, Ungabamoneli abangendawo;
20_24_20_Kuba umenzi wobubi akayi kuba nakamva; Isibane sabangendawo siya kucinywa.
20_24_21_Nyana wam, moyike uYehova nokumkani, Ungazibandakanyi nabanokumbi;
20_24_22_Kuba kofika ngesiquphe ukusindeka kwabo; Ilishwa leminyaka yabo, ngubani na olaziyo?
20_24_23_Nala mazwi ngawezilumko: Ukukhetha ubuso ekugwebeni akulungile.
20_24_24_Othi kongendawo, Ulilungisa wena, Ziya kumqalekisa izizwe;  ziya kumbhavumela iintlanga.
20_24_25_Kuya kuba mnandi kwabamohlwayayo; Kubo koza intsikelelo enokulungileyo.
20_24_26_Wanga imilebe yomlomo Ophendula ngamazwi athe gca.
20_24_27_Lilungise ishishini lakho phandle, Uzisebenzele entsimini yakho; Emveni koko wakhe indlu yakho.
20_24_28_Musa ukuba lingqina ngommelwane wakho ngaphandle kwesizathu; Ungasuka uthomalalise na nangomlomo wakho?
20_24_29_Musa ukuthi, Njengoko enze ngako kum, ndiya kwenjenjalo nam kuye, Ndiya kubuyisela indoda ngokomsebenzi wayo.
20_24_30_Ndagqitha entsimini yendoda elivila, Nasesidiliyeni somntu oswele ingqondo,
20_24_31_Ndafika simile imithuma sonke siphela; Ngaphezulu senile ngamarhawu, Nodonga lwaso lwamatye ludilikile.
20_24_32_Ndakhangela, ndasigqala ngentliziyo, Ndabona, ndamkela uqeqesho.
20_24_33_Ithi, Intwana yobuthongo, intwana yokozela, Intwana yokukhwabusha izandla ukuba ndilale:
20_24_34_Boza ubuhlwempu bakho njengomphangi; Nokuswela kwakho njengendoda enengweletshetshe.
20_25_1_Nale yimizekeliso kaSolomon, awayihlanganisayo amadoda kaHezekiya, ukumkani wakwaYuda.
20_25_2_Luzuko lukaThixo ukuyisithelisa into; Luzuko lokumkani ukuyigocagoca.
20_25_3_Izulu ngokuphakama, umhlaba ngobunzulu, Nentliziyo yokumkani asinto inokugocwagocwa.
20_25_4_Longule igwebu esilivereni, Kuvele isitya somnyibilikisi;
20_25_5_Shenxisa abangendawo ebusweni bokumkani, Yozinza itrone yakhe ngobulungisa.
20_25_6_Musa ukudokozelisa ilizwi phambi kokumkani, Ungazimisi endaweni yabakhulu.
20_25_7_Kuba kulungile ukuba kuthiwe kuwe, Nyukela apha, Kunokuba uthotywe phambi kwenene, Alibonileyo amehlo akho.
20_25_8_Musa ukuphuma ungxamile, ukuya ekubambaneni nomnye, Hleze kuthiwe, Wothini na emveni koko? Xa kaloku akuhlazileyo ummelwane wakho.
20_25_9_Ubambene nommelwane wakho, bambana naye; Ke ucweyo lomnye musa ukuluhlakaza,
20_25_10_Hleze akuhlaze oluvayo, Lungabi sabuya lusuke udaba lwakho olubi.
20_25_11_Ziilamuni zegolide kwizitya zesilivere ezimakhazikhazi Ilizwi elithethwe latyapha.
20_25_12_Ulijikazi legolide, nezidanga zegolide ezicikizekileyo Umohlwayi olumkileyo ezindlebeni ezinokuva.
20_25_13_Sinjengokuphozisa kwekhephu ngemini yokuvuna Isigidimi esinyanisileyo kwabasithumileyo: Siyawubuyisa umphefumlo wenkosi yaso.
20_25_14_Ungamafu anomoya, angenamvula, Umntu oqhayisa ngesipho esikhohlisayo.
20_25_15_Umlawuli uyarhwebesheka ngokuzeka kade umsindo; Ulwimi oluthambileyo lwaphula ithambo.
20_25_16_Ufumene ubusi, yidla obukulingeneyo, Hleze udikwe,  ubuhlanze.
20_25_17_Malungayi futhi unyawo lwakho endlwini yommelwane wakho,  Hleze adikwe nguwe, akuthiye.
20_25_18_Sisando, likrele, lutolo olutsolileyo, Indoda engqina ubungqina obubuxoki ugommelwane wayo.
20_25_19_Lizinyo eliqhuzukileyo, lunyawo olukrunekileyo, Ukukholosa ngenginingini ngemini yembandezelo.
20_25_20_Olahla ingubo yokwaleka ngemini yengqele, nqwa kwaneviniga egalelwe kwisoda, Kwanovuma iingoma kontliziyo imbi.
20_25_21_Ukuba okuthiyileyo uthe walamba, mphe ukudla adle; Ukuba uthe wanxanwa, mseze amanzi;
20_25_22_Kuba ufumba wena amalahle avuthayo entlokweni yakhe;  UYehova wokuvuza.
20_25_23_Umoya ovela ngasentla uvelisa isiphango; Ulwimi oluhlebayo luvelisa ubuso obujalileyo.
20_25_24_Kulungile ukuhlala elungqamekweni oluphezu kwendlu,  Kunokuhlala ndlwini-nye nomfazi onengxabano.
20_25_25_Ngamanzi abandayo emphefumlweni otyhafileyo Iindaba ezilungileyo, ezivela ezweni elikude.
20_25_26_Liqula eligxojiweyo, ngumthombo owonakeleyo, Ilungisa elikhwelelayo phambi kongendawo.
20_25_27_Ukudla ubusi obuninzi akulungile; Ke ukugocagoca izinto ezinzima luzuko.
20_25_28_Ngumzi otyhoboziweyo, ongenaludonga, Indoda engenakuzibamba umoya wayo.
20_26_1_Njengekhephu ehlotyeni, njengemvula ngexa lokuvuna, Lunjalo ukungasifaneli isinyabi uzuko.
20_26_2_Njengondlunkulu ekuphapha-phaphazeleni kwakhe,  njengenkonjane ekubalekeni kwayo, Kunjalo ukutshabhisa ngaphandle kwesizathu; akuyi kuphumelela ntweni.
20_26_3_Iziniya yeyehashe, umkhala ngowe-esile, Intonga yeyomhlana wesinyabi.
20_26_4_Musa ukusiphendula isinyabi ngokokumatha kwaso, Hleze usifuze.
20_26_5_Siphendule isinyabi ngokokumatha kwaso, Hleze sibe sisilumko kwawaso amehlo.
20_26_6_Unqumla iinyawo, usela ugonyamelo, Osithuma imicimbi yakhe isinyabi.
20_26_7_Nqwa nokulengalenga kwemilenze yesiqhwala, Umzekeliso emlonyeni wesinyabi.
20_26_8_Njengokubopha ilitye esisawulweni, Unjalo osinika uzuko isinyabi.
20_26_9_Ngameva angene esandleni senxila Umzekeliso ongene emlonyeni wesinyabi.
20_26_10_Okuninzi kuzala into yonke; Ke wona umvuzo wesinyabi,  kwanomvuzi waso, bayadlula.
20_26_11_Njengenja ibuyela emhlanzweni wayo, Sinjalo isinyabi ukuphinda ukumatha kwaso.
20_26_12_Uyayibona indoda ilumkile kwawayo amehlo, Kukho ithemba ngesinyabi kunayo.
20_26_13_Ivila lithi, Kukho ingonyama endleleni, Kukho ingonyama ezitratweni.
20_26_14_Ucango lujinga ezihinjizini zalo, Linjalo ivila elukhukweni lwalo.
20_26_15_Ivila lifaka isandla salo esityeni, Yindiniso ukusibuyisela kwasemlonyeni walo.
20_26_16_Ivila lilumkile kwawalo amehlo Kunabasixhenxe abaphendula ngemvo.
20_26_17_Ubamba ngendlebe inja igqitha, Ophuphuma umsindo ngembambano angephambi kwayo.
20_26_18_Njengedwadwasi elijula izikhuni Neentolo zokufa,
20_26_19_Injalo indoda ekhohlisa ummelwane wayo, Ibe isithi,  Andidlali na?
20_26_20_Zakuphela iinkuni, uyacima umlilo; Kwakuba kungekho ntlebi, iyadamba ingxabano.
20_26_21_Nqwa namalahle amnyama kumalahle avuthayo, Nqwa neenkuni kumlilo, indoda enengxabano ukuphemba imbambano.
20_26_22_Amazwi entlebi anjengemithamo imnandi; Yona ihla iye ezingontsini zombilini.
20_26_23_Ligwebu lesilivere, lalekwe empahleni yodongwe, Umlomo ovuthayo unentliziyo enobubi.
20_26_24_Ngemilebe yomlomo wakhe uyanyhwalaza umthiyi; Embilinini yakhe umisa inkohliso.
20_26_25_Xa athe walimnandisa ilizwi lakhe, musa ukukholwa nguye;  Kuba ngamasikizi asixhenxe entliziyweni yakhe.
20_26_26_Intiyo izifihla ngenkohliso; Ububi bayo bozityhila esikhungwini.
20_26_27_Omba isihogo weyela kuso; Oqengqa ilitye, libuyela kuye.
20_26_28_Ulwimi oluxokayo luyabathiya abatyunyuzwa lulo; Nomlomo ocengacengayo usebenza ububi.
20_27_1_Musa ukuqhayisa ngemini yangomso; Kuba akukwazi okuya kuzalwa yimini.
20_27_2_Mawudunyiswe ngomnye, ingabi ngowakho umlomo; Mayibe nguwumbi, ingabi yeyakho imilebe yomlomo.
20_27_3_Linzima ilitye, ingumthwalo intlabathi; Ke yona ingqumbo yesimathane inzima kunezo nto zombini.
20_27_4_Ubujorha bunobushushu, umsindo sisiphango; Nekhwele,  ngubani na onokuma phambi kwalo?
20_27_5_Kulungile ukohlwaywa ekuhleni Ngaphezu kothando olusitheleyo.
20_27_6_Akholekile amanxeba omhlobo; Kodwa yingxungxu ukwanga kotshaba.
20_27_7_Umphefumlo ohluthiyo ugqusha incindi yobusi; Umphefumlo olambileyo, yonke into ekrakra imnandi kuwo.
20_27_8_Njengentaka ephekuziweyo endlwini yayo, Injalo indoda ephekuziweyo ekhayeni layo.
20_27_9_Ioli nesiqhumiso sivuyisa intliziyo, Kwanobumnandi bomhlobo obuphuma ekucebiseni komphefumlo.
20_27_10_Musa ukumlahla umhlobo wakho nomhlobo kayihlo; Ungangeni endlwini yomzalwana wakho ngemini yokusindeka kwakho; Ulungile ummelwane okufuphi, kunomzalwana okude.
20_27_11_Yiba nobulumko, nyana wam, uyivuyise intliziyo yam; Ukuze ndimphendule ngezwi ondingcikivayo.
20_27_12_Onobuqili uyabubona ububi, azimele; Ke zona iziyatha zigqitha kubo, zohlwaywe.
20_27_13_Thabatha ingubo yakhe omele omnye; Menze isibambiso ngenxa yezinto zasemzini.
20_27_14_Osikelela ummelwane wakhe ngezwi elikhulu, evuka kwakusasa, Kubalelwa ekuthini uyamtshabhisa.
20_27_15_Uqhoqhozo oluxikileyo mini ngemvula, Nomfazi onengxabano,  kuyafana;
20_27_16_Omnqandayo, unqanda umoya; Isandla sakhe sokunene sihlangabezene neoli.
20_27_17_Isinyithi silola isinyithi, Indoda ilola ubuso bowayo.
20_27_18_Olondoloza umkhiwane wodla isiqhamo sawo; Ogcine inkosi yakhe wozukiswa.
20_27_19_Emanzini, ubuso buyelelene nobuso; Injalo intliziyo yomntu kumntu.
20_27_20_Elabafileyo nenzonzobila azinakuhlutha, Namehlo omntu akanakuhlutha.
20_27_21_Ukhamba lolokunyibilikisa isilivere, iziko lelokunyibilikisa igolide. Nendoda iya ngokokudunyiswa kwayo.
20_27_22_Nokuba uthe wasingqusha isimathane esingqushweni phakathi komngqusho ngentonga yokungqusha, Akuyi kusuka kuso ukumatha kwaso.
20_27_23_Khuthalela ukubazi ubume bempahla yakho emfutshane,  Yibhekise intliziyo yakho emihlambini yakho.
20_27_24_Ngokuba ayingonaphakade ingqwebo; Nesithsaba sesezizukulwana ngezizukulwana, yini na?
20_27_25_Sithe tshabalala nje isikhotha, kuvela uhlaza,  Ihlanganisiwe imifuno yeentaba:
20_27_26_Amatakane ngawokukwambesa, Ixabiso lentsimi ziinkunzi zeebhokhwe;
20_27_27_Amasi eebhokhwe alingene ukudla kwakho, nokudla kwendlu yakho, Nokuphila komthinjana wakho.
20_28_1_Basaba bengasukelwa nto abangendawo; Ke wona amalungisa akholosa njengengonyama.
20_28_2_Ngokreqo lwelizwe baba baninzi abathetheli balo; Ngomntu onengqondo, onokwazi, ukuzinza kwalo kuyoluka.
20_28_3_Umfo oyintloko ekucudiseni izisweli Yimwula etshayelayo,  ingasalisi kudla.
20_28_4_Abashiya umyalelo badumisa abangendawo; Ke abawugcinayo umyalelo bayazixhokonxa ngabo.
20_28_5_Abantu abanobubi abakuqondi okusesikweni; Ke bona abamquqelayo uYehova baqonda izinto zonke.
20_28_6_Lilungile ihlwempu elihamba ngengqibelelo yalo, Ngaphezu komjibilizi ondlela mbini, nakuba esisityebi.
20_28_7_Obamba umyalelo ngunyana onengqondo; Ke olikholwane labachithi uhlaza uyise.
20_28_8_Owongeza ubuncwane bakhe ngokudla abanye, nangolwandiso,  Ubuthela obabala izisweli.
20_28_9_Osusa indlebe yakhe ekusiphulaphuleni isiyalo,  Kwanomthandazo wakhe ulisikizi.
20_28_10_Obalahlekisayo abathe tye ngendlela enobubi, Kuya kweyela yena esihogweni sakhe, Bona abagqibeleleyo bakudle ilifa okulungileyo.
20_28_11_Ilumkile indoda esisityebi kwawayo amehlo; Ke isisweli esinengqondo siyayigocagoca.
20_28_12_Ekudlamkeni kwamalungisa kwanda uzuko; Ekuphakameni kwabangendawo, abaveli nokuvela abantu.
20_28_13_Osigubungelayo isono sakhe akayi kuba nampumelelo; Ke yena osivumayo, asishiye, uya kufumana inceba.
20_28_14_Hayi, uyolo lomntu ohlala enkwantya; Ke yena ontliziyo ilukhuni uya kweyela ebubini.
20_28_15_Uyingonyama egqumayo, uyibhere ebhaduliswa kukulamba,  Umlawuli ongendawo kubantu abazizisweli.
20_28_16_Hayi, inganga iswele ukuqonda, enokucudisa okuninzi!  Othiye inzuzo embi wolula imihla yakhe.
20_28_17_Umntu onovalo ngegazi lomphefumlo Usabela nasemhadini makangabanjezelwa.
20_28_18_Ohamba ngengqibelelo uya kusindiswa, Ke umjibilizi ondlela mbini weyela okukanye.
20_28_19_Owusebenzayo umhlaba wakhe uya kuhlutha sisonka; Osukela izinto ezingento uya kuhlutha bubuhlwempu.
20_28_20_Indoda enyanisekileyo ineentsikelelo ezininzi; Ke yena ongxamayo ukuba sisityebi, akabi msulwa.
20_28_21_Ukukhetha ubuso akulungile; Ngenxa yeqhekeza lesonka umntu angade aphosise.
20_28_22_Indoda eliso libi ikhawulezela ukutyeba; Ayazi ukuba ukuswela kuya kuyifikela.
20_28_23_Omohlwayayo umntu wothi kamva afumane ubabalo, Ngaphezu kocengacengayo ngolwimi.
20_28_24_Ophanga uyise nonina, athi, Asilukreqo, Ulidlelane lendoda engumonakalisi.
20_28_25_Omphefumlo ubawayo uxhaya ingxabano; Ke yena okholose ngoYehova uyatyetyiswa.
20_28_26_Okholose ngeyakhe intliziyo usisidenge; Ke yena ohamba ngobulumko uya kusinda.
20_28_27_Opha ihlwempu akasweli; Ke yena ofihla amehlo akhe uneengqalekiso ezininzi.
20_28_28_Ekuphakameni kwabangendawo bayasithela abantu;  Ekutshabalaleni kwabo ayanda amalungisa.
20_29_1_Indoda eyohlwaywa futhi, iyenze lukhuni intamo yayo, Iya kuchithakala ngephanyazo, kungabikho kuncedwa.
20_29_2_Ekwandeni kwamalungisa bayavuya abantu; Ekulawuleni kongendawo bayagcuma abantu.
20_29_3_Indoda ethanda ubulumko ivuyisa uyise; Olikholwane lamahenyukazi uchitha impahla yakhe.
20_29_4_Ukumkani ulimisa ilizwe ngesiko; Ke yona indoda erhunywayo iyalibhukuqa.
20_29_5_Umfo ocengacenga ummelwane wakhe Uthiyela iinyawo zakhe ngomnatha.
20_29_6_Elukreqweni lwendoda enobubi kubakho isirhintyelo; Ke lona ilungisa limemelela livuye.
20_29_7_Ilungisa liyalazi ibango lesisweli; Ke yena ongendawo akanangqondo yakulazi.
20_29_8_Amadoda agxekayo aphembelela isixeko; Ke zona izilumko ziyawudambisa umsindo.
20_29_9_Yakumangalelana indoda elumkileyo nesimathane, Soguguma sihleke, kungabikho kuthozama.
20_29_10_Amadoda amagazi ayabathiya abagqibeleleyo; Nabathe tye,  afuna umphefumlo wabo,
20_29_11_Isinyabi siya kukhupha konke ukufutha kwaso, Ke sona isilumko sikudambisela embilinini yaso.
20_29_12_Umlawuli olibazela indlebe ilizwi lobuxoki, Bonke abalungiseleli bakhe bangabangendawo.
20_29_13_Ihlwempu nendoda engumxinezeli bayaqubisana; Umkhanyiseli wamehlo abo bobabini nguYehova.
20_29_14_Ukumkani ogweba ityala lezisweli ngenyaniso, Itrone yakhe iya kuzinza ngonaphakade.
20_29_15_Intonga nesohlwayo sinika ubulumko; Ke yena umntwana oyekelelweyo udanisa unina.
20_29_16_Ekwandeni kwabangendawo luyanda ukreqo; Ke wona amalungisa aya kukubona ukuwa kwabo.
20_29_17_Mqeqeshe unyana wakho, wokuphefumlisa, Awuyolise umphefumlo wakho.
20_29_18_Apho kungekho mbono baba yimiqhathu abantu; Bakuwugcina umyalelo, hayi, uyolo lwabo!
20_29_19_Isicaka asiqeqeshwa ngamazwi; Kuba siyaqonda,  singakhathali.
20_29_20_Uyayibona indoda engxamileyo ngamazwi ayo? Kukho ithemba ngesinyabi kunayo.
20_29_21_Osifekethisayo kwasebuncinaneni isicaka sakhe Uya kwenelwa lukhula ekupheleni.
20_29_22_Indoda enomsindo ixhaya ingxabano; Umntu onobushushu uzele lukreqo.
20_29_23_Ikratshi lomntu liya kumthoba; Ke yena omoya uthobekileyo ufumana uzuko.
20_29_24_Owahlulelana nesela uthiya umphefumlo wakhe; Uyasiva isishwabulo, angaxeli.
20_29_25_Ukugubha ngumntu kunesirhintyelo; Ke yena okholose ngoYehova uya kuphakanyiselwa phezulu.
20_29_26_Baninzi abafuna ubuso bomlawuli; Ke lona ibango lendoda livela kuYehova.
20_29_27_Indoda enobugqwetha lisikizi kumalungisa; Ondlela ithe tye lisikizi kongendawo.
20_30_1_Amazwi ka-Agure unyana kaYakhe, waseMasa. Itsho indoda leyo, ithi, Ndizidinisile, ndizidinisile ndaphela,
20_30_2_Kuba ndisisityhakala, andimntu; Ingqondo yomntu ayikho kum.
20_30_3_Andifundanga bulumko, Ukuba ndazi ukwaziwa koyiNgcwele.
20_30_4_Ngubani na owenyuka waya emazulwini, waza wehla? Ngubani na ofumbethe umoya ngezandla zakhe? Ngubani na obophe amanzi engutyeni? Ngubani na omise zonke iziphelo zehlabathi?  Lingubani na igama lakhe, lingubani na igama lonyana wakhe,  ukuba uyalazi?
20_30_5_Yonke intetho kaThixo inyibilikisiwe. Uyingweletshetshe kwabazimela ngaye.
20_30_6_Musa ukongeza emazwini akhe, Hleze akohlwaye, ube ngothetha amanga.
20_30_7_Ndicele kuwe izinto ezimbini; Musa ukundivimba zona ndingekafi:
20_30_8_Khwelelisa kum inkohlakalo nelizwi lamanga; Musa ukundinika ubuhlwempu nobutyebi; Ndihlafunise isonka endisimiselweyo;
20_30_9_Hleze ndihluthe, ndikhanyele, ndithi, Ngubani na uYehova?  Hleze ndihlwempuzeke, ndibe, Ndilicukuceze igama likaThixo wam.
20_30_10_Musa ukusihleba isicaka enkosini yaso, Hleze sikutshabhise, uthwale ityala.
20_30_11_Kukho isizukulwana esiishabhisa uyise, Singamsikeleli unina;
20_30_12_Kukho isizukulwana esihlambulukileyo kwawaso amelulo,  Esingahlanjwanga ekungcoleni kwaso;
20_30_13_Kukho isizukulwana, hayi, ukuqwayinga kwamehlo aso,  Ukuziphakamisa kweenkophe zaso!
20_30_14_Kukho isizukulwana esimazinyo angamakrele, simabamba azizitshetshe Zokudla iintsizana ehlabathini, namahlwempu phakathi kwesintu.
20_30_15_Isimungunyi-gazi sineentombi ezimbini, ezithi, Ethe, ethe!  Zintathu izinto ezingenakuhlutha; Zine ezingatshoyo ukuthi,  Kwanele:
20_30_16_Lelabafileyo; kukungazali; Ngumhlaba ongahluthiyo ngamanzi; Ngumlilo ongatshoyo ukuthi, Kwanele.
20_30_17_Iliso eligculela uyise, Lidele ukumlulamela unina, Aya kulikrukra amahlungulu asemlanjeni, Alidle amathole exhalanga.
20_30_18_Izinto zintathu ezibalulekileyo kum; Hayi, zine endingenakuzazi:
20_30_19_Yindlela yexhalanga esibhakabhakeni, Yindlela yenyoka etyeni, Yindlela yenqanawa esazulwini solwandle, Yindlela yomfo nentombi.
20_30_20_Injalo indlela yomfazi okrexezayo: Uyadla, asule umlomo,  Athi, Andenzanga bubi.
20_30_21_Ngaphantsi kwezinto ezintathu umhlaba uyanyikima,  Ngaphantsi kwezine ukhohliwe kukuthwala:
20_30_22_Ngaphantsi kwesicaka, xa sithe sangukumkani; Nesidenge, xa sithe sahlutha sisonka;
20_30_23_Ngaphantsi kwesigele sentombi, xa sithe senda;  Nesicakakazi xa sithe sadla ilifa lenkosikazi yaso.
20_30_24_Izinto zine ezincinane emhlabeni, Kanti zilumke kakhulu:
20_30_25_Iimbovane ngabantu abangenamandla Kanti zilungisa ukudla kwazo ehlotyeni;
20_30_26_Iimbila ngabantu abangomeleleyo, Kanti zimisa izindlu zazo emaweni;
20_30_27_Iinkumbi azinakumkani, Kanti ziphuma zingamaqela ngamaqela zonke;
20_30_28_Icilitshe unako ukulibamba ngezandla, Kanti lisemabhotweni ookumkani.
20_30_29_Izinto zintathu ezihamba ngokunyalasa, Hayi, zine ezilungisayo ukuhamba:
20_30_30_Yingonyama, igorha phakathi kwezinto ezizitho zine,  Elingabuyi umva phambi kweento zonke;
20_30_31_Yinja elingesi nokuba yinkunzi yebhokhwe; Ngukumkani enomkhosi wakhe.
20_30_32_Ukuba uthe wenza ngobudenge ngokuziphakamisa, Nokuba uthe wankqangiyela, Beka isandla emlonyeni.
20_30_33_Kuba ukucofa ubisi kuvelisa amasi, Ukucofa impumlo kuvelisa igazi, Ukucofa umsindo kuvelisa imbambano.
20_31_1_Amazwi kaLemuweli, ukumkani waseMasa, awamqeqesha ngawo unina.
20_31_2_Yini, nyana wam? yini, nyana wesizalo sam? Yini, nyana wezibhambathiso zam?
20_31_3_Amandla akho musa ukuwanika amankazana, Iindlela zakho uzinike abo batshabalalisa ookumkani.
20_31_4_Asiyindawo yokumkani, Lemuweli, asiyindawo yokumkani ukusela iwayini; Asiyindawo yezidwangube ukuthi, Siphi na isiselo esinxilisayo?
20_31_5_Hleze basele bakulibale okumiselweyo, Balijike ityala loonyana bonke beentsizi.
20_31_6_Isiselo esinxilisayo sinikeni abatshabalalayo, Newayini yinikeni abamphefumlo ukrakra.
20_31_7_Mabasele abo, babulibale ubuhlwempu babo, Bangabi sabukhumbula ububi babo.
20_31_8_Wuvule umlomo wakho ngenxa yosisidenge, Ngenxa yetyala labo bonke abadlulayo.
20_31_9_Vula umlomo wakho, gweba ngobulungisa, Ugwebe ityala lolusizana nolihlwempu.
20_31_10_Umfazi onesidima ngubani na ongamfumanayo? Lingaphezulu nakwikorale ixabiso lakhe.
20_31_11_Ikholose ngaye intliziyo yendoda yakhe, Ayisayi kuswela nto.
20_31_12_Uyiphatha kakuhle, kungabi kakubi, Yonke imihla yobomi bakhe.
20_31_13_Ufuna uboya begusha neflakisi, Asebenze ethumekelele ngezandla zakhe.
20_31_14_Unjengeenqanawa zabarhwebi, Ukuya kuthabatha kude ukudla kwakhe.
20_31_15_Uvuka kwasebusuku, Ayinike into edliwayo indlu yakhe,  Awunike umsebenzi wawo umthinjana wakhe.
20_31_16_Unkqangiyela intsimi ayizuze; Ngeziqhamo zezandla zakhe utyala isidiliya.
20_31_17_Ubhinqa amandla emanqeni akhe, Ayomeleze imikhono yakhe.
20_31_18_Uyakuva ukuba kulungile ukurhweba kwakhe; Isibane sakhe asicimi ebusuku.
20_31_19_Uzibeka izandla zakhe entongeni yokuluka, Neminwe yakhe ibamba isikhanda sento yokuluka.
20_31_20_Isandla sakhe usitwabululela olusizana, Azolulele izandla zakhe kumahlwempu.
20_31_21_Indlu yakhe akayoyikeli, mhlana ngekhephu, Kuba yonke indlu yakhe yambethe ezisithileyo.
20_31_22_Uzenzela imiqamelo; Yilinen ecikizekileyo kwanemfusa isambatho sakhe.
20_31_23_Iyaziwa indoda yakhe emasangweni, Ekubutheni kwayo namadoda amakhulu elizwe.
20_31_24_Wenza iingubo zelinen entle, Athengise ngazo, athengise ngemibhinqo kumaKanan.
20_31_25_Ngamandla nobungangamela isambatho sakhe; Usuka ahleke ngemini ezayo.
20_31_26_Umlomo wakhe uwuvula ngobulumko; Umyalelo onenceba uselulwimini lwakhe.
20_31_27_Uyayondela ihambo yendlu yakhe, Angasidli isonka sobuvila.
20_31_28_Bayasuka oonyana bakhe, bathi unoyolo; Iyasuka indoda yakhe imdumise;
20_31_29_Ithi, Zininzi iintombi ezenza ngokunesidima; Ke wena uzidlule zonke ziphela.
20_31_30_Bubuxoki ubuhle, ngamampunge ubunzwakazi; Ngumfazi owoyika uYehova yedwa oya kudunyiswa.
20_31_31_Mnikeni kwiziqhamo zezandla zakhe, Zimdumise emasangweni izenzo zakhe.
21_1_1_Amazwi eNtshumayeli, unyana kaDavide, ukumkani waseYerusalem.
21_1_2_Amampunge awo amampunge, itsho iNtshumayeli; amampunge awo amampunge, yonke into ingamampunge.
21_1_3_Unalungelo lini umntu emigudwini yakhe yonke, ayenzayo phantsi kwelanga?
21_1_4_Kumka esinye isizukulwana, kulandele esinye isizukulwana; ke lona ihlabathi limi ngonaphakade.
21_1_5_Ilanga liyaphuma, ilanga libuya litshone, liphikele endaweni yalo apho liphuma khona.
21_1_6_Umoya uya ezantsi, ujikeleze usinge entla, uhamba ujikajikeleza, ubuye ubuya umoya ekujikelezeni kwawo.
21_1_7_Yonke imilambo iya elwandle, ukanti ulwandle aluzali;  endaweni eya kuyo imilambo, ibuya iye kwakhona.
21_1_8_Zonke izinto ziyazixhamla; umntu akanako ukuzithetha;  alihluthi iliso kukubona, ayizali indlebe kukuva.
21_1_9_Into eyayikho yeya kubuya ibekho; into eyenzekayo yeya kubuya yenzeke yona. Akukho nto intsha phantsi kwelanga.
21_1_10_Ukuba kukho into ekuthiwa, Yabona, le intsha! ibiselikho kade, emaphakadeni abekho ngaphambi kwethu.
21_1_11_Akukho kukhumbula abokuqala; nabasemva abaya kubakho, abayi kukhunjulwa ngabaya kuza emva kwabo.
21_1_12_Mna, Ntshumayeli, ndibe ndingukumkani kwaSirayeli eYerusalem.
21_1_13_Intliziyo yam ndayinikela ukuba ingxoke, isingasinge ngobulumko, yonke into eyenzekayo phantsi kwezulu; ngumzamo ombi uThixo awunike oonyana babantu, ukuba bawuzame.
21_1_14_Ndazikhangela zonke izenzo ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga;  yabona, zonke zingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.
21_1_15_Into egoso ayinakolulwa; into engekhoyo ayinakubalwa.
21_1_16_Ndathetha mna nentliziyo yam, ndisithi, Yabona, mna ndikhulise ndandisa ubulumko, ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababephethe iYerusalem phambi kwam; nentliziyo yam ibone kakhulu ubulumko nokwazi.
21_1_17_Intliziyo yam ndayinikela ekwazini ubulumko, nasekwazini ubugeza nobuyatha; kwanaloo nto ndayiqonda ukuba kukusukelana nomoya.
21_1_18_Ngokuba ebuninzini bobulumko kukho ukuhlelwa sisiyengelezane esininzi; owongeza ukwazi, wongeza umvandedwa.
21_2_1_Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Khawuze khe ndikulinge ngovuyo,  ubone okulungileyo. Yabona, kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_2_2_Ndathi kohlekayo, Uyageza; nakovuyayo, Wenza ntoni na lo?
21_2_3_Ndasingasinga entliziyweni yam ukuba nditsale inyama yam ngewayini, ekubeni intliziyo yam iziqhuba ngobulumko: ukuba ndazane nobuyatha, ndide ndibone ukuba yiyiphi na into ebalungeleyo oonyana babantu, ukuze bayenze phantsi kwezulu,  ngemihla embalwa yobomi babo.
21_2_4_Ndazenzela imisebenzi emikhulu, ndazakhela izindlu:  ndazityalela izidiliya,
21_2_5_ndazenzela amasimi nemiyezo, ndatyala kuyo imithi eneziqhamo zonke;
21_2_6_ndazenzela amachibi amanzi okunyela ihlathi elihluma imithi;
21_2_7_ndathenga amakhoboka namakhobokazana, ndaba nawo nazalelwe endlwini yam. Kananjalo imfuyo yeenkomo neyempahla emfutshane yaba ninzi kum, ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababengaphambi kwam eYerusalem.
21_2_8_Ndaziqwebela nesilivere, negolide, nezinto eziziinqobo zookumkani ngookumkani, nezamazwe ngamazwe; ndazenzela iimvumi neemvumikazi, neziyolo zoonyana babantu, inkosikazi namakhosikazi.
21_2_9_Ndaba mkhulu ke, ndanda ngaphezu kwabo bonke ababeseYerusalem ngaphambi kwam; bathi nobulumko bam bandinceda.
21_2_10_Andiwabandezanga into yonke ayibizayo amehlo am;  andiyivimbanga intliziyo yam namnye umvuyo; ngokuba intliziyo yam yayivuya emigudwini yam yonke, saba sesi ke isabelo sam emigudwini yam yonke.
21_2_11_Ndabheka mna ezenzweni zam zonke, ezazenzayo izandla zam,  nasemigudwini yam endaphuka yiyo ukuyenza; ndayibona ukuba yonke loo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya; akukho lungelo phantsi kwelanga.
21_2_12_Ndazijika mna, ndakhangela ubulumko, nobugeza, nobuyatha:  ngokuba ngumntu oyini na, lowo uya kuza emva kokumkani? lo ubeselenziwe kade?
21_2_13_Ndabona ukuba ubulumko buyabugqitha ubuyatha, njengokuba ukukhanya kubugqitha ubumnyama.
21_2_14_Isilumko, amehlo aso asentlokweni yaso; ke sona isinyabi sihamba emnyameni. Ndaqonda ke mna ukuba bonke bephela bahlelwa sihlo sinye.
21_2_15_Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Njengoko sihlelwa kuko isinyabi, ndiya kuhlelwa kuko nam lo: ibiyini na ke ukuba ndisidlule mna ngokulumka? Ndathi entliziyweni yam, Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_2_16_Ngokuba isilumko kunye nesinyabi asinakukhunjulwa kungunaphakade, ekubeni kusiza iimini ezoba sezilityelwe zonke ezo nto. Kutheni na, ukuba zife izilumko kunye nezinyabi?
21_2_17_Ndabuthiya ke ubomi; ngokuba mibi kum imisebenzi eyenzeka phantsi kwelanga; ngokuba yonke loo nto ingamampunge,  nokusukelana nomoya.
21_2_18_Ndayithiya yonke imigudu yam, endaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga, ekubeni ndiya kuyishiya nomntu oya kubakho emva kwam.
21_2_19_Waziwa ngubani na, ukuba woba sisilumko, nokuba woba sisiyatha, kusini na? Ukanti uya kugunyazela emigudwini yam yonke endaphuka yiyo, endalumkayo kuyo phantsi kwelanga;  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_2_20_Ndajika ke mna, ndayincamisisa intliziyo yam ngemigudu yonke endaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga.
21_2_21_Ngokuba kubakho umntu omigudu yakhe inobulumko, inokwazi,  inempumelelo; ukanti uya kuyinika umntu ongenzanga migudu, ibe sisabelo sakhe; kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nobubi obukhulu.
21_2_22_Ngokuba umntu uba nantoni na ngemigudu yakhe yonke,  nangenzondelelo yentliziyo yakhe, aphuka yiyo yena phantsi kwelanga?
21_2_23_Ngokuba imihla yakhe yonke inomvandedwa, nasekuzameni kwakhe ukhathazekile, nasebusuku ayiphumli intliziyo yakhe;  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_2_24_Akukho nto ilungileyo ebantwini kunokuba badle, basele,  bawubonise umphefumlo wabo okulungileyo emigudwini yabo.  Kwanaloo nto ndiyibonile, ukuba ivela esandleni sikaThixo.
21_2_25_Ngokuba ngubani na ongadlayo, ngubani na ongavayo ubumnandi, engenaye?
21_2_26_Ngokuba umntu olungileyo phambi kwakhe umnika ubulumko nokwazi novuyo; ke yena umoni umnika umzamo wokuhlanganisa nokuqweba, ukuze loo nto ayinike olungileyo phambi koThixo.  Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.
21_3_1_Into yonke inexesha elimisiweyo, nomcimbi wonke unexesha lawo phantsi kwezulu:
21_3_2_ukuzala kunexesha lako, ukufa kunexesha lako; ukutyala kunexesha lako, ukunyothula okutyelweyo kunexesha lako;
21_3_3_ukubulala kunexesha lako, ukuphilisa kunexesha lako;  ukuchitha kunexesha lako, ukwakha kunexesha lako;
21_3_4_ukulila kunexesha lako; ukuhleka kunexesha lako; kukho ixesha lokulila umbambazelo, kukho nexesha lokudloba;
21_3_5_kukho ixesha lokuchithachitha amatye, kukho nexesha lokufumba amatye; ukuwola kunexesha lako, ukuyeka ukuwola kunexesha lako;
21_3_6_ukufuna kunexesha lako, ukulahlekelwa kunexesha lako;  ukugcina kunexesha lako, ukulahla kunexesha lako;
21_3_7_ukukrazula kunexesha lako, ukuthunga kunexesha lako; ukuthi cwaka kunexesha lako, ukuthetha kunexesha lako;
21_3_8_ukuthanda kunexesha lako, ukuthiya kunexesha lako; kukho ixesha lemfazwe, kukho nexesha loxolo.
21_3_9_Unalungelo lini na lowo usebenzayo, kuloo nto ayenzela imigudu?
21_3_10_Ndiwubonile umzamo, awunike oonyana babantu uThixo, ukuba bawuzame.
21_3_11_Zonke izinto uzenze zantle ngexesha lazo; kwanephakade ulinikele ezintliziyweni zabo ngohlobo lokuba umntu angasifumani isenzo asenzayo uThixo, athabathele ekuqaleni ade ase ekupheleni.
21_3_12_Ndiyazi ke ukuba akukho nto ilungileyo phakathi kwabo,  ingekukuvuya nokuzizuzela okulungileyo ebomini babo.
21_3_13_Kwanokuba wonke umntu adle, asele, abone okulungileyo emigudwini yakhe yonke: sisipho sikaThixo eso.
21_3_14_Ndiyazi ke ukuba yonke into aya kuyenza uThixo, yiyo eya kuba ngonaphakade; kungongezwa nto kuyo, kungacatshulwa nto kuyo: uThixo ukwenzela ukuba koyikwe ebusweni bakhe.
21_3_15_Le nto ikhoyo ibiselikho kade; nento eya kubakho ibiselikho kade. UThixo ke ubuya ayifune into egxothiweyo.
21_3_16_Ndabuya ndabona phantsi kwelanga indawo yokugweba, ukuba okungendawo kukhona; nendawo yobulungisa, ukuba okungendawo kukhona.
21_3_17_Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Nolilungisa nongendawo, uThixo uya kulithetha ityala labo; ngokuba umise ixesha layo yonke imicimbi, nazo zonke izenzo.
21_3_18_Ndathi mna entliziyweni yam, Kungenxa yoonyana babantu,  ukuze uThixo abahlele, nokuze bazibone benjengeenkomo bona ngokwabo.
21_3_19_Ngokuba bayahlelwa oonyana babantu, ziyahlelwa neenkomo,  sinye isihlo kubo nakuzo; njengoko kunjalo ukufa kwabo, kunjalo ukufa kwazo; mnye umoya kubo bonke nakuzo zonke; akukho kuyigqitha komntu inkomo; ngokuba zonke ezo nto zingamampunge.
21_3_20_Zonke ezo nto ziya ndaweni-nye; zonke ezo nto zavela eluthulini, zonke ezo nto zibuyela eluthulini.
21_3_21_Ngubani na owaziyo umoya woonyana babantu, ukuba uyenyuka na uye phezulu; nomoya wenkomo, ukuba uyehla na uye phantsi emhlabeni?
21_3_22_Ndaqonda ke ukuba akukho nto ilunge ngaphezu kokuba umntu avuye ezenzweni zakhe; ngokuba kusisabelo sakhe oko. Ngokuba uya kungeniswa ngubani na, ukuba akubone okuya kubakho emveni kwakhe?
21_4_1_Ndabuya ke mna, ndakubona konke ukucudisa okwenziwayo phantsi kwelanga. Ndazibona iinyembezi zabacudisiweyo,  bengenamthuthuzeli; esandleni sabacudisi babo kuphuma ububhovubhovu, bengenamthuthuzeli bona.
21_4_2_Ndabancoma ke mna abafileyo, abasebefe kade, kunabahleliyo abasahleliyo ngoku.
21_4_3_Ke ulungile kunabo bobabini lowo ungekabikho, ungakubonanga ukwenza okubi okwenziwa phantsi kwelanga.
21_4_4_Kananjalo ndayiqonda ke mna yonke imigudu, nayo yonke impumelelo yomsebenzi, ukuba ingumona wokwanyelana. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge, nokusukelana nomoya.
21_4_5_Isinyabi sikhwabusha izandla, sidle kwaeyaso inyama.
21_4_6_Kulungile ukuzalisa sandla sinye ngokuphumla, kunokuzalisa zozibini izandla ngemigudu nokusukelana nomoya.
21_4_7_Ndabuya mna, ndabona amampunge phantsi kwelanga.
21_4_8_Kukho oba yedwa, ongenaye owesibini, ongenanyana namzalwana;  ingena siphelo imigudu yakhe yonke, angahluthiyo noko bubutyebi amehlo akhe. Akatsho ukuthi, Ndaphukela bani na, ndiwuhlutha nje umphefumlo wam okulungileyo? Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge,  ingumzamo ombi yona.
21_4_9_Kulungile ukuba babe ngababini kunokuba abe mnye, kuba banomvuzo olungileyo ngemigudu yabo.
21_4_10_Ngokuba xa bathe bawa, omnye unokumphakamisa uwabo; yeha ke, yena oyedwa, othe wawa! kuba akukho wesibini wokumphakamisa.
21_4_11_Kananjalo ababini, bathe balala, baya kuva ukusitha;  angathini na ukuva ukusitha olele yedwa?
21_4_12_Ukuba umntu uthe wamgagamela oyedwa, bona ababini baya kumisa phambi kwakhe; umsonto ontluntathu awuhle uqhawulwe.
21_4_13_Ulungile umntwana olihlwempu elumkile, ngaphezu kokumkani oselemkhulu, esisidenge, ongasakuvayo ukuyalwa.
21_4_14_Ngokuba uphuma endlwini yamakhonkxwa ukuba abe ngukumkani;  ukanti uzalelwe ebukumkanini balowo ulihlwempu.
21_4_15_Ndababona bonke abadla ubomi, behamba phantsi kwelanga kunye naye umntwana, lo ungowesibini, uza kuma esikhundleni salowo.
21_4_16_Akukho kuphela kwabantu bonke, kwabo bonke angaphambi kwabo; ukanti amavela-mva akayi kuvuya ngaye. Ngokuba kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.
21_5_1_Gcina unyawo lwakho xeshikweni uya endlwini kaThixo;  ukusondela ukuba uve, kungaphezu kokunikela kwezidenge imibingelelo; ngokuba ukungazi kwazo kwenza izinto ezimbi.
21_5_2_Musa ukungxama ngomlomo wakho, intliziyo yakho ingaphangi ikhuphe ilizwi phambi koThixo; ngokuba uThixo usemazulwini, ke wena usehlabathini; ngenxa yoko amazwi akho makabe mancinane.
21_5_3_Ngokuba ukuphupha kuza ngobuninzi bemicimbi, nezwi lesidenge liza ngobuninzi bentetho.
21_5_4_Xeshikweni uthe wabhambathisa isibhambathiso kuThixo, musa ukuzekelela ukusizalisa; ngokuba azinanzwa izidenge; loo nto uyibhambathisileyo yizalise.
21_5_5_Kulungile ukuba ungabhambathisi, kunokuba ubhambathise ungazalisi.
21_5_6_Musa ukuwuvumela umlomo wakho, ukuba uyonise inyama yakho;  ungatsho phambi komthunywa kaThixo ukuthi ibikukulahleka. Yini na ukuba uThixo abe noburhalarhume ngezwi lakho asonakalise isenzo sezandla zakho?
21_5_7_Ngokuba ebuninzini bamaphupha namazwi, maninzi amampunge; ke yoyika uThixo.
21_5_8_Ukuba uthe wakubona ukucudiswa kwehlwempu, nokuhluthwa kokusesikweni nobulungisa elizweni, musa ukumangaliswa yiloo nto; ngokuba oyena uphakamileyo ukhangele phezu kophakamileyo;  kukho abaphakamileyo naphezu kwabo.
21_5_9_Ilungelo lelizwe entweni yonke ngukumkani onyamekela umhlaba.
21_5_10_Othanda isilivere akaneliswa yisilivere; nalowo uthanda intabalala, akangenelwa nto. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_5_11_Ekwandeni kwezinto ezilungileyo bayanda abazidlayo zona,  abe umninizo enempumelelo eyini na, ingekuko ukwanela ukuzibona ngamehlo?
21_5_12_Bumnandi ubuthongo bosebenzayo, nokuba incinane, nokuba ininzi into ayidlayo; ke intabalala yesityebi ayisivumeli ukuba silale buthongo.
21_5_13_Kukho ububi obusisifo, endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga;  ukuthi ubutyebi obugcinelwe umninibo, bube nobubi kuye;
21_5_14_obo butyebi butshabalala ngento embi; uzala unyana,  engenayo nento esandleni sakhe.
21_5_15_Njengokuba waphuma esizalweni sonina eze, uya kubuya emke njengoko weza enjalo, angathabathi nento ngemigudu yakhe,  angayiphathayo ngesandla sakhe.
21_5_16_Kwanale nto bububi obusisifo, ukuba eya kumka kanye kwanjengoko weza ngako: unalungelo lini na ke owaphukela umoya?
21_5_17_Kananjalo iimini zakhe zonke uzidlela emnyameni, enengqumbo enkulu, nesifo, noburhalarhume.
21_5_18_Nantsi into endiyibonileyo mna, ilungile, intle: into yokuthi umntu adle, asele, abone okulungileyo ngemigudu yakhe yonke aphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga, ngokwenani lemihla yobomi bakhe amnikileyo uThixo; ngokuba kusisabelo sakhe oko.
21_5_19_Kananjalo wonke umntu, athe uThixo wamnika ubutyebi nokuqweba, wamnika negunya lokudla kubo, athabathe isabelo sakhe, avuye emigudwini yakhe: sisipho sikaThixo eso.
21_5_20_Ngokuba akayikhumbuli kakhulu imihla yobomi bakhe; ngokuba uThixo eluphendula uvuyo lwentliziyo yakhe.
21_6_1_Kukho ububi endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga, buninzi ke phezu komntu:
21_6_2_yindoda uThixo ayinike ubutyebi, nokuqweba, nozuko,  ungasweli umphefumlo wayo nanye into engayinqwenelayo, aze uThixo angayiphi amandla okuyidla; ngokuba idliwa yenye indoda.  Ngamampunge lawo, sisifo esibi eso.
21_6_3_Ukuba umntu uthe wazala ikhulu labantwana, wadla ubomi iminyaka emininzi, yamininzi imihla yeminyaka yakhe, umphefumlo wakhe awahlutha zizinto ezilungileyo, kananjalo akaba nangcwaba: ndithi mna, imvambilini ilungile kunaye.
21_6_4_Ngokuba ifike ingamampunge, imka kumnyama, igama layo ligutyungelwe bubumnyama;
21_6_5_kananjalo ayilibonanga ilanga, ayilazanga; le yona ilungile kunomntu lowo.
21_6_6_Nokuba ebeya kudla ubomi iwaka leminyaka kude kube kabini,  angakuboni okulungileyo, ayiyi ndaweni-nye na yonke loo nto?
21_6_7_Yonke imigudu yomntu uyenzela umlomo wakhe: ukanti umphefumlo awuzali.
21_6_8_Ngokuba isilumko sisigqitha ngantoni na isidenge? Usigqitha ngantoni na olusizana, okwaziyo ukuhamba phambi kwabaphilileyo?
21_6_9_Kulungile ukubona kwamehlo ngaphezu kokuhambahamba komphefumlo. Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge nokusukelana nomoya.
21_6_10_Loo nto iselikho, yabe iselithiywe kade igama layo; yaziwa into aya kuba yiyo umntu; akanakumelana nalowo unokumeyisa.
21_6_11_Ngokuba kukho amazwi amaninzi nje, andisa amampunge; umntu unalungelo lini na ngaloo nto?
21_6_12_Ngokuba ngubani na owaziyo okumlungeleyo umntu ebomini,  ngangenani lemihla yobomi bakhe obungamampunge, ayigqiba njengesithunzi? Ngokuba ngubani na onokumxelela umntu into eya kubakho emva kwakhe phantsi kwelanga?
21_7_1_Igama elilungileyo lingaphezulu nakwioli elungileyo;  ulungile umhla wokufa ngaphezu komhla wokuzalwa komntu.
21_7_2_Kulungile ukuya endlwini yesijwili kunokuya endlwini yemigidi; kuba oko kukuphela kwabantu bonke, aze ophilileyo akunyamekele ngentliziyo oko.
21_7_3_Kulungile ukuba nosizi ngaphezu kokuhleka; ngokuba intliziyo iyalunga bububi bobuso.
21_7_4_Intliziyo yezilumko isendlwini yesijwili; ke intliziyo yezidenge isendlwini yovuyo.
21_7_5_Kulungile ukuva ukukhalimela kwesilumko, kunokuba umntu eve ingoma yezidenge.
21_7_6_Ngokuba njengokuqhuqhumba kwevaba ngaphantsi kwembiza,  kunjalo ukuhleka kwesidenge; naloo nto ingamampunge.
21_7_7_Ngokuba ukucudisa kugezisa isilumko, siyitshabalalise intliziyo isicengo.
21_7_8_Kulungile ukugqitywa kwendawo, ngaphezu kokuqalwa kwayo;  ulungile umoya ozeka kade umsindo, kunomoya ozidlayo.
21_7_9_Musa ukukungxamela ukuqumba ngomoya wakho, ngokuba ingqumbo ilala esifubeni sezidenge.
21_7_10_Musa ukuthi, Ibiyini na, le nto imihla yamandulo ibilungile ngaphezu kwale? ngokuba akuthabatheli ebulumkweni ukuyibuza loo nto.
21_7_11_Bulungile ubulumko, bunelifa, bulilungelo kwabalibonayo ilanga.
21_7_12_Ngokuba ubulumko bungumthunzi, imali ingumthunzi; ke ukugqithisela kokwazi, kukuba ubulumko buyabasindisa abo banabo.
21_7_13_Wukhangele umsebenzi kaThixo; ngokuba ngubani na onokolula into ayenze yagoso?
21_7_14_Ngomhla wentsikelelo chwayitha, nangomhla wobubi qonda kakuhle, ukuba nalo, kwanjengalowa, wenziwe nguThixo, ngenxa enokuba umntu engafumani nto emva kwakhe.
21_7_15_Le nto yonke ndiyibonile ngemihla yam engamampunge: kubakho ilungisa elitshabalalayo noko linobulungisa, kubekho ongendawo ophila ixesha elide, noko angendawo.
21_7_16_Musa ukuba lilungisa ngokukhulu, ungabi sisilumko ngokugqithiseleyo; yini na ukuba uziphanzise?
21_7_17_Musa ukuba ngongendawo ngokukhulu, ungazenzi isidenge; yini na ukuba ufe lingekabi lixesha lakho?
21_7_18_Kulungile ukuba ubambelele kule nto nakuleya, ungasiphumzi isandla sakho; ngokuba owoyika uThixo uphumelela kuzo zonke ziphela.
21_7_19_Ubulumko buyasiqinisa isilumko, ngaphezu kweshumi labanegunya abakulo mzi.
21_7_20_Ngokuba akukho mntu ulilungisa ehlabathini, wenza okulungileyo, angoni.
21_7_21_Kananjalo musa ukuyinikela intliziyo yakho kumazwi onke athethwayo, ukuze ungevi umkhonzi wakho, eselekutshabhisa;
21_7_22_ngokuba intliziyo yakho nayo iyazi izihlandlo ezininzi,  ukuba uyabatshabhisa abanye nawe.
21_7_23_Ezo zinto zonke ndizilingile ngobulumko; ndathi ndiya kulumka; ke bona baba kude kum.
21_7_24_Hayi, ukuba kude kwezinto ezikhoyo, zinzulu kakhulu;  ngubani na oya kuzifumana?
21_7_25_Ndajika ke mna, ndanentliziyo enga ingazi, ingasingasinga,  ifume ubulumko nesigqibo seengcinga; enga ingakwazi okungendawo ukuba kukunyaba, nokumatha ukuba kukugeza.
21_7_26_Ndayifumana ikrakra ngaphezu kokufa, inkazana eyiyimigibe iphela, ezizibatha intliziyo yayo, ezandla zingamakhamandela olungileyo phambi koThixo uya kusinda kuyo, ke yena umoni uya kubanjiswa yiyo.
21_7_27_Yabona into endiyifumeneyo, itsho iNtshumayeli, ndihloma enye kwenye, ukuba ndifumane isigqibo seengcinga;
21_7_28_obumana ukuyifuna umphefumlo wam, ndingayifumani, nantsi:  indoda enye ewakeni ndiyifumene, ke yona inkazana kulo lonke andiyifumananga.
21_7_29_Yabona, le nto yodwa ndiyifumene, yokuba uThixo wamenza umntu wathi tye; ke bona bafune ubuqili obuninzi.
21_8_1_Ngubani na onjengesilumko esi? Ngubani na okwaziyo ukuconjululwa kwendawo? Ubulumko bomntu bukhanyisa ubuso bakhe, buguqulwe ubungwanyalala bobuso bakhe.
21_8_2_Mna ndithi, Umthetho wokumkani wugcine, ngenxa yesifungo sikaThixo.
21_8_3_Musa ukukungxamela ukumka ebusweni bakhe; ungangeni kwiyelenqe; ngokuba into yonke ayinanzileyo uyayenza.
21_8_4_Ekubeni ilizwi lokumkani linegunya, ngubani na onokuthi kuye, Wenza ntoni na?
21_8_5_Ogcina umthetho akazi nto imbi; intliziyo yesilumko iyalazi ixesha nesi gwebo;
21_8_6_ngokuba yonke imicimbi inexesha nesigwebo; ngokuba ububi bomntu buba buninzi phezu kwakhe;
21_8_7_ngokuba engayazi into eya kubakho. Ngokuba ngubani na onokumxelela njengoko kuya kuba njalo?
21_8_8_Akukho mntu unokuwugunyazela umoya, awuthintele umoya;  akukho unokuyigunyazela imini yokufa; akukho kukhululeka kuloo mfazwe; okungendawo akunakubasiza abaniniko.
21_8_9_Le nto yonke ndiyibonile, ndayinikela intliziyo yam kwizenzo zonke ezenziwayo phantsi kwelanga, ngexesha athi umntu agunyazele umntu, kube kubi kuye.
21_8_10_Ekubeni kunjalo, ndibone abangendawo bengcwatywa, begoduka;  besithi endaweni engcwele bemke abo benze okulungileyo,  balityalwe kuloo mzi.
21_8_11_Kwanaloo nto ingamampunge. Ekubeni isigwebo singawiswa kamsinyane emsebenzini ombi, ngenxa yoko intliziyo yoonyana babantu izele ngaphakathi kwabo kukwenza okubi.
21_8_12_Nakubeni umoni esenza okubi izihlandlo ezilikhulu, ayolule imihla yakhe, noko ndiyazi ukuba kuya kulunga kwabamoyikayo uThixo, kwaboyikayo ebusweni bakhe;
21_8_13_kungalungi kongendawo, angayoluli imihla yakhe,  njengethunzi; ekubeni engoyiki ebusweni bukaThixo.
21_8_14_Kukho amampunge enzekayo ehlabathini: ukuba kukho amalungisa ahlelwa ngokokwenza kwabangendawo; kukho nabangendawo abahlelwa ngokokwenza kwamalungisa; ndathi,  kwanaloo nto ingamampunge.
21_8_15_Ndaluncoma ke mna uvuyo, ngokuba kungekho nto imlungeleyo umntu phantsi kwelanga, ngaphezu kokuba adle, asele, avuye; loo nto ithane mbende naye emigudwini yakhe, ngemihla yobomi bakhe amnikayo uThixo phantsi kwelanga.
21_8_16_Xeshikweni ndayinikelayo intliziyo yam ukuba ndibazi ubulumko, ndiwubone umzamo owenzekayo ehlabathini (ngokuba nasemini nasebusuku ababoni buthongo ngamehlo abo),
21_8_17_ndasibona ke sonke isenzo sikaThixo, ukuba akanako umntu ukusifumana isenzo eso senzekayo phantsi kwelanga; nakubeni umntu esaphuka ukusifuna, akasifumani. Nokuba sithe isilumko safuna ukwazi, asinakufumana.
21_9_1_Ngokuba yonke le nto ndayinyamekela ngentliziyo yam,  ndayihlela yonke le nto, yokuba amalungisa, nezilumko,  nemisebenzi yabo, isesandleni sikaThixo; nokuthanda nokuthiya,  akukhona ekwazini kwabantu; le nto yonke basebeyimiselwe.
21_9_2_Izinto zonke zibahlela ngokufanayo bonke: sinye isihlo kwilungisa nakongendawo; kolungileyo, kohlambulukileyo,  nakoyinqambi; kobingelelayo nakongabingeleliyo; njengoko anjalo olungileyo, unjalo nomoni; ofungayo unjengalowo ukoyikayo ukufunga.
