21_9_3_Le yinto embi phakathi kwezinto zonke ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga, ukuthi sibe sinye isihlo kubo bonke; ibe nentliziyo yoonyana babantu izele bububi; ibubugeza entliziyweni yabo besadla ubomi; emveni kwabo kuyiwa kwabafileyo.
21_9_4_Ngokuba kosukuba ehlonyelwa kwabasadla ubomi, kusekho ithemba; ngokuba inja esaphilileyo ilunge ngaphezu kwengonyama efileyo.
21_9_5_Ngokuba abadla ubomi bayazi ukuba baya kufa; ke bona abafileyo abazi lutho, abasabi namvuzo; ngokuba balityelwe,  abasakhunjulwa nganto.
21_9_6_Seluphelile kade uthando lwabo, nentiyo yabo, nekhwele labo;  abasenasabelo naphakade ezintweni zonke ezenzekayo phantsi kwelanga.
21_9_7_Yiya udle isonka sakho unovuyo, usele iwayini yakho unentliziyo echwayithileyo; ngokuba sekukade ekholisiwe uThixo zizenzo zakho.
21_9_8_Iingubo zakho mazibe mhlophe ngamaxesha onke, neoli mayingasweleki entlokweni yakho.
21_9_9_Hlala kakuhle nomfazi omthandileyo ngemihla yonke yobomi bakho obungamampunge, akunikileyo phantsi kwelanga, ngemihla yakho yonke engamampunge; ngokuba sisabelo sakho eso ebomini,  nasemigudwini yakho owaphuka yiyo phantsi kwelanga.
21_9_10_Yonke into esiyifumanayo isandla sakho ukuba siyenze, yenze ngamandla akho; ngokuba akukho kwenza, nakucinga, nakwazi,  nakulumka kwelabafileyo, apho uya khona wena.
21_9_11_Ndabuya ndabona phantsi kwelanga, ukuba ukugidima asikokwabanamendu, imfazwe asiyeyamagorha; kananjalo isonka asisesezilumko; kananjalo ubutyebi asibobabanenqiqo; kananjalo ubabalo asilolwabanokwazi; ngokuba bonke bephela bafikelwa lixesha nasisihlo.
21_9_12_Ngokuba umntu akalazi nexesha lakhe; njengeentlanzi ezibanjiswe ngomnatha ombi, nanjengeentaka ezibanjiswe ngomgibe, banjalo ukurhintyelwa kwabo oonyana babantu ngexesha elibi, xa libawele ngesiquphe.
21_9_13_Nale nto ndiyibone ibubulumko phantsi kwelanga, babukhulu kum:
21_9_14_umzi omncinane unamadoda ambalwa; kweza kuwo ukumkani omkhulu, wawungqinga, wawakhela iimboniselo ezinkulu.
21_9_15_Wafumana kuwo indoda elihlwempu inobulumko; yona yawusiza umzi ngobulumko bayo; ke akubangakho mntu ubuya ayikhumbule le ndoda ilihlwempu.
21_9_16_Ndathi ke mna, Bulunge ubulumko ngaphezu kobugorha; kodwa ubulumko beli hlwempu budelekile, namazwi alo akaviwa.
21_9_17_Amazwi ezilumko, eviwe ngokuthozama, angaphezu kokunkqangaza kolawula phakathi kwezidenge.
21_9_18_Bulunge ubulumko ngaphezu kweempahla zokulwa; ke yena umoni emnye utshabalalisa okulungileyo okuninzi.
21_10_1_Iimpukane ezifileyo zinukisa zibilise amafutha omqholi;  ubudenge obuncinane bunzima kunobulumko nozuko.
21_10_2_Intliziyo yesilumko ingasekunene kwaso: intliziyo yesidenge ingasekhohlo kwaso.
21_10_3_Ewe, nasendleleni, xa sithe isidenge sahamba ngayo,  siyayiswela intliziyo, sihambe sisithi kubantu bonke,  Ndisisidenge.
21_10_4_Ukuba ukufutha komlawuli kuthe kwenyuka kwakuchasa, musa ukuyishiya indawo yakho; ngokuba ubulali buleleza izono ezikhulu.
21_10_5_Kukho ububi endibubonileyo phantsi kwelanga,  obunjengokulahleka okuphuma konegunya:
21_10_6_ubudenge bunikwa iindawo eziphezulu ezinkulu, zibe izityebi zihleli kwiindawo eziphantsi.
21_10_7_Ke ndizibone izicaka zikhwele emahasheni, namatshawe ehamba phantsi ngeenyawo njengezicaka.
21_10_8_Omba isigingqi, angeyela kuso; ochitha uthango, inyoka ingamluma.
21_10_9_Omba amatye, angenzakala; ocanda iinkuni angaba semngciphekweni.
21_10_10_Ukuba intsimbi ithe yaba buthuntu, akalulola uhlangothi lwayo, wogonyela ngoko ngamandla; ke ubulumko buyanceda bulungise.
21_10_11_Ukuba inyoka ithe yaluma kungekho kukhafula, akabi nanzuzo umnyangi.
21_10_12_Amazwi omlomo wesilumko anokubabala; ke yona imilebe yomlomo wesidenge iginya kwasona.
21_10_13_Ingqalo, yamazwi omlomo waso bubudenge, nengqibo yomlomo waso bubugeza obubi.
21_10_14_Isidenge sandisa amazwi, engakwazi umntu okuya kubakho nokuya kubakho emva kwakhe, ngubani na onokumxelela?
21_10_15_Imigudu yezidenge iyazixhamla, ezingakwaziyo ukuya emzini.
21_10_16_Yeha, wena lizwe likumkani ungumntwana, limatshawe adla kwakusasa!
21_10_17_Hayi, uyolo lwakho, lizwe likumkani ungunyana wabanumzana,  limatshawe adlayo ngexesha elililo, enobugorha, engenamithayi!
21_10_18_Ngobuvila iyabhena imiqadi; ngokuthamba kwezandla iyanetha indlu.
21_10_19_Benza isidlo ukuba bahleke, iwayini ivuyise ubomi; imali ilungele iinto zonke.
21_10_20_Musa ukumtshabhisa ukumkani, nasesazeleni sakho,  ungasitshabhisi nesityebi ezingontsini zakho zokulala; ngokuba intaka yasendle yolihambisa elo zwi, nento enamaphiko iyixele loo ntetho.
21_11_1_Siphose isonka sakho phezu kwamanzi, ngokuba wosifumana kwakuba ziintsuku ezininzi.
21_11_2_Yahlula izahlulo zibe sixhenxe, zibe sibhozo, ngokuba akuyazi into embi eya kubakho ehlabathini.
21_11_3_Ukuba amafu athe azala yimvula, ayithululela emhlabeni;  ukuba umthi uthe wawa, wabheka ezantsi, nokuba uthe wabheka entla, kuloo ndawo uwe kuyo umthi lowo, wolala khona.
21_11_4_Ogqala umoya akayi kuhlwayela; okhangela amafu akayi kuvuna.
21_11_5_Njengokuba ungayazi ukuba yiyiphi na indlela yomoya,  kwanjengokuyilwa kwamathambo esiswini somithiyo; ngokunjalo akusazi isenzo sikaThixo owenza izinto zonke.
21_11_6_Kusasa hlwayela imbewu yakho, nangokuhlwa ungasiphumzi isandla sakho; ngokuba ungazi ukuba kolunga yiphi na, nokuba yile nokuba yileya, kusini na, nokuba zolunga ngakunye zombini na.
21_11_7_Kumnandi ukukhanya, kulungile emehlweni ukulibona ilanga.
21_11_8_Ngokuba umntu, ukuba uthe wadla ubomi iminyaka emininzi,  makavuye ngayo yonke iphela, noko ke akhumbule imihla yobumnyama, ukuba iya kuba mininzi. Yonke into ezayo ingamampunge.
21_11_9_Vuya, ndodana, ebutsheni bakho, ikuchwayithise intliziyo yakho ngemihla yobudodana bakho, uhambe ngeendlela zentliziyo yakho, nangokukhangela kwamehlo akho; kodwa yazi ukuba ngenxa yezo zinto zonke uThixo uya kukusa ematyaleni.
21_11_10_Yisuse ke ingqumbo entliziyweni yakho, ubudlulise ububi enyameni yakho; ngokuba ubutsha nobudoda bungamampunge.
21_12_1_Uze umkhumbule ke uMdali wakho ngemihla yobutsha bakho,  ingekezi imihla yobubi, ingekafiki iminyaka owothi ngayo,  Ayindiyolele;
21_12_2_lingekabi mnyama ilanga, nokukhanya, nenyanga,  neenkwenkwezi, engekabuyi amafu emva kwemvula;
21_12_3_loo mini baya kungevezela abagcini bendlu, agobe amadoda anobukroti, ziyeke iintokazi ezisilayo ngokuba zimbalwa, kube mnyama kwabakhangela ngeefestile;
21_12_4_zivalwe iingcango ngasesitratweni, kwakubon ukuba sidambile isandi sokusila, evuka kwazisathetha iintaka,  zinqwilile zonke iintombi zengoma;
21_12_5_naxeshikweni baya kuzoyika iindawo eziphakamileyo, neento eziqhiphula umbilini zibe sendleleni; utyatyambe umamangile,  uchabachabase umqhathu, utshitshe umnqweno; ngokuba umntu esiya ekhayeni lakhe laphakade, bajikajike ezitratweni abambambazeli;
21_12_6_ingekaqhawuki intambo yesilivere, lityumke iselwa legolide,  uqhekeke umphanda emthonjeni, yaphuke ivili iwe equleni;
21_12_7_lungekabuyeli emhlabeni uthuli, njengoko belunjalo, umoya ubuyele kuThixo owawunikayo.
21_12_8_Amampunge awo amampunge, itsho iNtshumayeli; into yonke ingamampunge.
21_12_9_Phezu koko, ngokuba iNtshumayeli ibisisilumko, yamana ibafundisa abantu ukwazi, yalinganisela, yabagocagoca, yayila imizekeliso emininzi.
21_12_10_INtshumayeli yafuna, inga ingafumana amazwi anandiphekayo,  kuthi nokubhalwayo kulunge, ibe ngamazwi enyaniso.
21_12_11_Amazwi ezilumko anjengeemviko; anjengezikhonkwane ezitshonisiweyo asezintlanganiseleni, anikwe ngumalusi emnye.
21_12_12_Nangaphezu koko, nyana wam, vuseleleka; ukwenza iincwadi ezininzi akunakuphela, nokuphikela ukufunda okuninzi kudinisa inyama.
21_12_13_Ukuhlanganiswa kwentetho, yakuba ivakele into yonke,  nanku: Yoyika uThixo, ugcine imithetho yakhe; ngokuba indawo leyo yimfanelo yoluntu lonke.
21_12_14_Ngokuba izenzo zonke uThixo uya kuzizisa ekugwetyweni,  izinto zonke ezifihlakeleyo, nokuba zilungile nokuba zimbi.
22_1_1_Ingoma yazo iingoma, eyekaSolomon.
22_1_2_Makandange ngokwanga komlomo wakhe; Ngokuba izincokoliso zakho zimnandi ngaphezu kwewayini.
22_1_3_Amafutha akho anevumba elimnandi; Liyioli ethululwayo igama lakho; Ngenxa yoko iintombi ziyakuthanda.
22_1_4_Nditsale, sogidima emva kwakho; Ukuba ukumkani undingenise ezingontsini zakhe, Sogcoba, sivuye ngawe. Sozikhankanya izincokoliso zakho ngaphezu kwewayini; Zikuthanda zinyanisile.
22_1_5_Ndimnyama, ndinomkhitha noko, Zintombi zaseYerusalem,  Njengeentente zakwaKedare, Njengamalengalenga kaSolomon.
22_1_6_Musani ukundikhangela ngakuba ndife mnyama, Ngakuba nditshe lilanga. Oonyana bakama bandivuthela ngomsindo, Bandenza umlindi wezidiliya; Ke esisesam isidiliya andisilindanga.
22_1_7_Khawundixilele, wena uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam, Walusela phi na? Uyibuthisa phi na imihlambi emini enkulu? Ngokuba kungani na ukuba ndibe njengogqubutheleyo Ngasemihlambini yamakholwane akho?
22_1_8_Ukuba akwazi, nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi, Phuma,  uhambe ngemikhondo yomhlambi, Uwaluse amatakane akho ngaseminqubeni yabalusi.
22_1_9_Ndikufanekise, wethu, Nehashe kwaweenqwelo zikaFaro!
22_1_10_Zinomkhitha izidlele zakho ziingcaca, Umqala wakho zizidanga.
22_1_11_Sokwenzela iingcaca zegolide Ezinamaqhula esilivere.
22_1_12_Xa ukumkani asesetafileni yakhe, Inadusi yam isuka ilikhuphe ivumba layo.
22_1_13_Sisiqhuma semore intanda yam kum, Esihleli phakathi kwamabele am.
22_1_14_Sisihloko sekofere intanda yam kum Ezidiliyeni zase-Engedi.
22_1_15_Yabona, uyinzwakazi, wethu! Yabona, uyinzwakazi! Amehlo akho anjengawamavukuthu.
22_1_16_Yabona, uyinzwakazi, ntanda yam; ewe, umnandi; Umandlalo wethu uluhlaza.
22_1_17_Imiqadi yendlu yethu yimisedare, Iipanele zethu yimisipres.
22_2_1_Ndingumfiyo waseSharon, Ndiyinyibiba yasezintlangeni.
22_2_2_Njengenyibiba phakathi kweminga, Unjalo uwethu phakathi kweentombi.
22_2_3_Njengomapile phakathi kwemithi yehlathi, Injalo intanda yam phakathi koonyana. Ndanqwena, ndahlala phantsi emthunzini wawo,  Nesiqhamo sawo sanencasa ekhuhlangubeni lam.
22_2_4_Indingenise endlwini yewayini, Nebhanile yayo phezu kwam luthando.
22_2_5_Ndixhaseni ngezicumba zeerasintyisi, Ndisekeleni ngeeapile;  ngokuba ndisifa luthando.
22_2_6_Isandla sayo sokhohlo siphantsi kwentloko yam; Esokunene siyandiwola.
22_2_7_Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndinifungisa Amabhadikazi namaxhamakazi asendle, Ukuba ningaluvusi, ukuba ningaluvuseleli uthando, Lude luthande.
22_2_8_Phulaphulani! Intanda yam, nantso isiza, Itsiba ezintabeni,  isuka imitsi ezindulini.
22_2_9_Intanda yam ifana nebhadi, nenkonyana yexhama. Nantso imi emva kodonga lwakokwethu, Ithe nzo ngeefestile, Inyondla ngekroba.
22_2_10_Intanda yam yasusela, yathi kum, Suk ume, wethu, nzwakazi yam, uze;
22_2_11_Ngokuba uyabona, ubusika budlule, Imvula igqithile yemka;
22_2_12_Iintyantyambo zibonakele ezweni; Ixesha lokuntyiloza kweentaka lifikile; Izwi lehobe ivakele ezweni lethu;
22_2_13_Umkhiwane ukrwala amakhiwane awo, Imidiliya ityatyambile,  Itsho ngevumba elimnandi. Suk ume, wethu, nzwakazi yam, uze.
22_2_14_Vukuthu lam elisemxawukeni wengxondorha, entsithelweni yemiba, Ndibonise ubuso bakho, ndivise ilizwi lakho; Ngokuba izwi lakho limnandi, ubuso bakho bunomkhitha.
22_2_15_Sibambeleni iimpungutye, iimpungutye ezincinane ezonakalisa izidiliya; Izidiliya zethu zityatyambile.
22_2_16_Intanda yam yeyam, mna ke ndingowayo Yalusela ezinyibibeni.
22_2_17_Ide iphole imini, oluke amathunzi, Jika, ntanda yam,  uxelise ibhadi, uxelise inkonyana yexhama, Ezintabeni ezibugqagala.
22_3_1_Esililini sam ebusuku ndamfuna lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam; Ndamfuna andamfumana.
22_3_2_Ndathi, Ndokha ndivuke, ndijikajike phakathi komzi,  Ezindaweni zembutho nasezitratweni; Ndiya kumfuna lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam. Ndamfuna andamfumana.
22_3_3_Abalindi abajikajika phakathi komzi bandifumana; Ndathi kubo, Khe nambona na lowo uthandwa ngumphefumlo wam?
22_3_4_Ndithe ndisandula ukudlula kancinane kubo, Ndamlumana lowo uthandwayo ngumphefumlo wam; Ndambamba, andamyeka, Ndada ndamzisa endlwini kama, Engontsini yowandikhawulayo.
22_3_5_Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndinifungisa Amabhadikazi namaxhamakazi asendle, Ukuba ningaluvusi, ukuba ningaluvuseleli uthando, Lude luthande.
22_3_6_Ngubani na lo, unyuka evela entlango njengemiqulu yomsi,  Eqhunyiselwa ngemore nentlaka emhlophe, Ithatyathwe emigutyeni yonke yomrhwebi?
22_3_7_Yabona, sisingqengqelo sikaSolomon, Siphahlwe ngamagorha angamashumi amathandathu Kumagorha akwaSirayeli.
22_3_8_Onke aphethe amakrele, afundiswe ukulwa, Lilelo linekrele ethangeni lalo Ngenxa yokoyika ebusuku.
22_3_9_Ukumkani uSolomon uzenzele ithala Ngemithi yaseLebhanon.
22_3_10_Iintsika zalo uzenze ngesilivere, Isayamo salo ngegolide,  umqamelo walo ngento emfusa, Umphakathi walo ubekelelwe ngothando, Luvela ezintombini zaseYerusalem.
22_3_11_Phumani, zintombi zaseZiyon, nimkhangele ukumkani uSolomon,  Enesithsaba, awasinxitywa ngunina ngemini yokuzeka kwakhe,  Nangemini yokuvuya kwentliziyo yakhe.
22_4_1_Yabona, uyinzwakazi, wethu; yabona, uyinzwakazi. Amehlo akho anjengawamavukuthu ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho; Iinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi weebhokhwe Osemathambekeni eentaba zaseGiliyadi.
22_4_2_Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi weegusha ezichetyiweyo,  Ezinyukayo zivela ekuhlanjweni, Zinamawele zonke, Kungekho ifelweyo kuzo.
22_4_3_Unjengosinga olubomvu umlomo wakho; Ukuthetha kwakho kumnandi. Zinjengothanda lwerharnate iintlafuno zakho Ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho.
22_4_4_Intamo yakho injengenqaba kaDavide, eyakhiwe ngokweendidi,  Ekuxhonywe kuyo iwaka leengweletshetshe, Onke amakhaka amagorha.
22_4_5_Amabele akho omabini anjengamankonyana amabini angamawele ebhadi, Esidla phakathi kweenyibiba.
22_4_6_Ide iphole imini, oluke amathunzi, Ndiya kuhamba ndiye entabeni yemore, Nasendulini yentlaka emhlophe.
22_4_7_Uyinzwakazi kwaphela, wethu; Akukho siphako kuwe.
22_4_8_Yiza sihle eLebhanon, mtshakazi, Yiza sihle eLebhanon; Ufike ubonisele encotsheni yeAmana, Encotsheni yeSenire neHermon,  Ezikhundleni zeengonyama, ezintabeni zezingwe.
22_4_9_Uyingxwelerhile intliziyo yam, dade wethu, mtshakazi;  Uyingxwelerhile intliziyo yam ngomjezulo omnye, Ngamrhukane mnye wesambalo sakho.
22_4_10_Azi kuhle ukuncokolisa kwakho, dade wethu mtshakazi! Azi kumnandi ukuncokolisa kwakho ngaphezu kwewayini, Nevumba lamafutha akho ngaphezu kobulawu buphelele!
22_4_11_Umlomo wakho uvuza incindi, mtshakazi; Bubusi namasi ngaphantsi kolwimi lwakho. Ivumba leengubo zakho linjengevumba leLebhanon.
22_4_12_Ngumyezo obiyelweyo udade wethu, umtshakazi; Ngumgogogo ovaliweyo, liliso lomthombo elitywiniweyo.
22_4_13_Amahlumelo akho ngumyezo wemirharnate, kunye neziqhamo ezimnandi kakhulu, Ikofere kunye nenadusi;
22_4_14_Inadusi nesafron, Ikalamo nesinamon, kunye nemithi yonke yentlaka emhlophe, Imore nehaloti, kunye nobulawu bonke obuyintloko.
22_4_15_Uliliso lomthombo lasemiyezweni, Iqula lamanzi aphilileyo,  Nemiqukuqela yamanzi yaseLebhanon.
22_4_16_Vuka, moya wasentla, uze nawe wasezantsi: Phephezela emyezweni wam, buqukuqele ubulawu bawo. Mayingene intanda yam emyezweni wayo, Idle isiqhamo esimnandi kakhulu.
22_5_1_Ndingenile emyezweni wam, dade wethu, mtshakazi wam;  Ndiyikhile imore yam kunye netyeleba lam; Ndiyidlile intlango yam kunye nencindi yam; Ndiyisele iwayini yam kunye namasi am.  Yidlani bethu, Selani nibe mnandi, zintanda.
22_5_2_Ndilele, yona intliziyo yam iphaphamile. Yiva, nantso intanda yam inkqonkqoza, isithi, Ndivulele, dade wethu, vukuthu lam, ngqibeleli yam, Ngokuba intloko yam izele ngumbethe,  Isihlwitha sam sizele ngamathontsi obusuku.
22_5_3_Ndathi, Sendikhulule nengubo yam yangaphantsi; ndothini na ukubuya ndinxibe? Sendizihlambile iinyawo zam, ndothini na ukubuya ndizidyobhe?
22_5_4_Intanda yam yasolula isandla sayo ngekroba; Kwasika esiswini ngenxa yayo.
22_5_5_Ndavuka ndaya kuyivulela intanda yam, Nezandla zam zavuza imore; Neminwe yam, imore eyivuzelayo Esiphathweni sesitshixo.
22_5_6_Ndayivulela mna intanda yam; Ke yona intanda yam ibijike yemka. Ndemkelwa ngumbilini yakuthetha; Ndayifuna,  andayifumana; Ndayibiza, ayasabela.
22_5_7_Bandifumana abalindi abajikajika phakathi komzi, Bandibetha,  bandilimaza; Abalindi beendonga bandilulutha ingubo yam yokwaleka ekrelekrele.
22_5_8_Ndiyanifungisa, zintombi zaseYerusalem, ukuba nithe nayifumana intanda yam, Into enoyixelela yona, nothi, ndiyafa luthando.
22_5_9_Iyintoni na intanda yakho kunezinye iintanda, Wena nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi? Iyintoni na intanda yakho kunezinye, Ukuba wenjenje ukusifungisa?
22_5_10_Intanda yam iqaqambile, iyingqombela, Iyeyongamileyo ngaphezu kwamawaka alishumi.
22_5_11_Intloko yayo iyigolide engcwengiweyo, ecikizekileyo;  Isihlwitha sayo siziinduli ngeenduli, simnyama njengehlungulu.
22_5_12_Amehlo ayo anjengawamavukuthu, engasemifuleni yamanzi,  Ezihlamba ngamasi, ehleli njengamatye afakwe kakuhle.
22_5_13_Izidlele zayo zinjengemityino yetyeleba, njengeziganga zezityalo zokuqhola; Umlomo wayo unjengeenyibiba, uvuza imore ezivuzelayo.
22_5_14_Izandla zayo ziintonga zegolide, zifakwe amatye aseTarshishe, Isibili sayo siluphondo lwendlovu, lukrwilwe ngesafire.
22_5_15_Imilenze yayo ziintsika zemarmore emhlophe, zifakwe ezisekweni zegolide engcwengiweyo. Isithomo sayo sinjengeLebhanon, sisihle njengemisedare.
22_5_16_Ikhuhlangubo layo linobumnandi; inqwenelekile yona iphela.  Yiyo leyo intanda yam; nguye lowo uwethu, Zintombi zaseYerusalem.
22_6_1_Iye phi na intanda yakho, Wena nzwakazindini phakathi kweentokazi? Ibheke ngaphi na intanda yakho, Ukuze sikufunise?
22_6_2_Intanda yam ihle yaya emyezweni wayo, emityinweni yetyeleba,  Ukuba yalusele emyezweni, ukuba ikhe iinyibiba.
22_6_3_Mna ndingowentanda yam, nentanda yam yeyam yona; Yalusela ezinyibibeni.
22_6_4_Uyinzwakazi, wethu, njengeTirtsa, Unomkhitha njengeYerusalem; Woyikeka njengemikhosi eneebhanile.
22_6_5_Wasuse amehlo akho kum, Ngokuba andiqwelile. Iinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi weebhokhwe Ezisemathambekeni aseGiliyadi.
22_6_6_Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi weemazi zeegusha Ezinyukayo,  zivela ekuhlanjweni, Zonke zizele amawele, Kungekho ifelweyo kuzo.
22_6_7_Zinjengothanda lwerharnate iintlafuno zakho, Ngaphaya kwesigqubuthelo sakho.
22_6_8_Bangamashumi amathandathu ookumkanikazi, angamashumi asibhozo amashweshwe, Neentombi ezingenakubalwa.
22_6_9_Mnye yena olivukuthu lam oyingqibeleli yam; Mnye yena kunina, Umnyulwa walowo wamzalayo. Zambona iintombi, zathi unoyolo, Bamdumisa ookumkanikazi namashweshwe.
22_6_10_Ngubani na lo uthi gqi njengesifingo, Mhle njengenyanga,  Unyulu njengelanga, Woyikeka njengemikhosi eneebhanile?
22_6_11_Bendihle ndaya emyezweni weminoti, Ukuba ndikhangele uhlaza lwesihlambo, Ndikhangele ukuba umdiliya unamathupha na,  Imirharnate ityatyambile na.
22_6_12_Bendingazi ukuba umphefumlo wam undibeke Ezinqwelweni zabantu bam, zamanene.
22_6_13_Buya, buya, mShulamikazi; Buya, buya, sikubone. Nibona ntoni na kumShulamikazi, Njengokungathi kukuqamba kwabaMahanayim?
22_7_1_Azi kuhle ukunyathela kwakho ngeembadada, ntombi yenene!  Izimbo zamanqe akho zinjengezidanga, Umsebenzi wezandla zengcibi.
22_7_2_Inkaba yakho sisidendeleko esiyinqila; Masingasweli iwayini ephithikeziweyo; Isisu sakho sisidimbilili sengqolowa,  Sibiyelwe ngeenyibiba.
22_7_3_Amabele akho omabini anjengamankonyana ebhadi, Amankonyana amabini ebhadi, angamawele.
22_7_4_Intamo yakho injengenqaba yophondo lwendlovu; Amehlo akho ngamachibi aseHeshbhon, Ngasesangweni layo, inabantu abaninzi;  Impumlo yakho injengenqaba yaseLebhanon Ebheke eDamasko.
22_7_5_Intloko yakho phezu kwakho injengeKarmele, Ubuyakayaka bentloko yakho bunjengosinga olumfusa; Ukumkani ukhonkxwe ngeenjiko zabo.
22_7_6_Azi umhle, azi umnandi, Luthando, eziyolweni!
22_7_7_Iwonga lakho eli lifana nomthi wesundu; Amabele akho afana nezihloko zomdiliya.
22_7_8_Ndathi, Ndiya kuminya emthini wesundu; Ndiya kubambelela emagqabini awo; Amabele akho makabe njengezihloko zomdiliya,  Nevumba lempumlo yakho libe njengeeapile;
22_7_9_Nekhuhlangubo lakho libe njengewayini le ilungileyo, Ihla kamnandi kwintanda yam, Ibanga ukuba uthethe umlomo wabaleleyo.
22_7_10_Mna ndingowentanda yam, Kukum ukungxamela kwayo.
22_7_11_Hamba, ntanda yam, siphume siye emaphandleni, Silale emizaneni.
22_7_12_Masivuke kusasa, siye ezidiliyeni, Sibone ukuba umdiliya unamathupha na, iintyantyambo zawo zibhenqekile na, Imirharnate ityatyambile na. Ndokunika apho izincokoliso zam.
22_7_13_Amathuma apha anevumba; Phezu kweminyango yethu ziziqhamo ngeziqhamo ezimnandi kakhulu, ezitsha kwanezidala,  Endiziqwebele wena, ntanda yam.
22_8_1_Akwaba ubunjengomnakwethu Obesanya amabele kama!  Bendingathi, ndikufumene phandle, ndikwange, Bangandideli noko.
22_8_2_Bendiya kukuqhuba, bendiya kukusa endlwini kama; Ubuya kundifundisa. Bendiya kukuseza iwayini eqholiweyo, Nencindi yomrharnate wam.
22_8_3_Isandla sayo sokhohlo besiya kuba phantsi kwentloko yam,  Esokunene sayo sindiwole.
22_8_4_Zintombi zaseYerusalem, ndiyanifungisa, Ningathini na ukuluvusa, ningathini na ukuluvuselela uthando, Lude luthande?
22_8_5_Ngubani na lo unyuka evela entlango, Esayama intanda yakhe?  Ngaphantsi komapile lo ndakuvusa wena. Khona apha waba nenimba ngawe unyoko, Khona apha waba nenimba owakuzalayo.
22_8_6_Ndibeke njengomsesane wokutywina entliziyweni yakho,  njengomsesane wokutywina engalweni yakho. Ngokuba uthando lunjengokufa, ukuba nengcwangu, Ubukhwele bunjengelabafileyo,  ukuba lukhuni: Amalangatye abo ngamalangatye omlilo,  Ngamadangatye kaYehova.
22_8_7_Amanzi amaninzi akanakulucima uthando; Imilambo ayinakuluntywilisela. Ingafanelana indoda irhole bonke ubuncwane bendlu yayo ngenxa yothando, Ingadelwa ideliwe.
22_8_8_Sinomsakwethu omncinane, Akakabi namabele. Siya kuthini na ngomsakwethu, Mini aganelweyo?
22_8_9_Ukuba uludonga yena, Siya kwakha phezu kwalo uqoqo lwesilivere; Ukuba ungumnyango, Somrhaqa ngamaceba omsedare.
22_8_10_Ndaba ludonga mna, namabele am anjengenqaba; Ndaza emehlweni ayo ndaba njengo fumene uxolo.
22_8_11_USolomon ubenesidiliya eBhahali-amon, Isidiliya wasinikela kubagcini, Ukuze elowo azise iwaka lesilivere ngesiqhamo saso.
22_8_12_Isidiliya sam, esisesam, sona siselulawulweni lwam; Iwaka elo lelakho, Solomon; Amakhulu amabini ngawabagcini besiqhamo saso.
22_8_13_Wena uhleliyo emiyezweni, Amakholwane alibazela indlebe izwi lakho, Ndivise.
22_8_14_Dloba, ntanda yam, Uxelise ibhadi namankonyana amaxhama Ezintabeni zobulawu.
23_1_1_Umbono kaIsaya unyana ka-Amotsi, awawubonayo ngokusingisele kuYuda neYerusalem, ngemihla yoUziya, noYotam, noAhazi,  noHezekiya, ookumkani bakwaYuda.
23_1_2_Yivani, mazulu; bekani indlebe, hlabathi, ngokuba kuthetha uYehova. Uthi, Ndikhulise abantwana ndabondla, besuka bakreqa kum.
23_1_3_Inkomo iyamazi umniniyo, ne-esile liyawazi umkhombe wesitali senkosi yalo; ke yena uSirayeli akazi, abantu bam abaqiqi.
23_1_4_Hayi, luhlanga lonayo, bantu banobugwenxa, mbewu yabenza ububi, nyana bonakalisayo! Bamshiyile uYehova, bamgibile oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli, babuyela emva.
23_1_5_Yini na ukuba nimane ukubethwa, nimane ukukwandisa ukutyeka?  Yonke intloko iyafa, yonke intliziyo inobulwelwe;
23_1_6_kuthabathele enkwalini yonyawo, kwesa entloko, akukho ndawo iphilileyo; ziinduma, nemivumbo, namanxeba amatsha:  akacudiswanga, akabotshwanga, akathanjiswanga ngaoli.
23_1_7_Kusenkangala elizweni lenu, imizi yenu itshiswe ngomlilo,  umhlaba wenu udliwa ngabasemzini phambi kwenu, uyinkangala njengokubhukuqwa kwabasemzini.
23_1_8_Isele ke intombi enguZiyon, njengexhobongo esidiliyeni,  njengephempe entsimini yemixoxozi, njengomzi ongqingiweyo.
23_1_9_Koko uYehova wemikhosi wasisalisela intwana esindileyo,  singe saba njengeSodom, singe safana neGomora.
23_1_10_Liveni ilizwi likaYehova, baphathi baseSodom; wubekeleni indlebe umyalelo kaThixo wethu, bantu baseGomora.
23_1_11_Yeyani na kum le mibingelelo yenu mininzi kangaka? utsho uYehova. Ndidikiwe ngamadini anyukayo eenkunzi zeegusha,  namanqatha amathole atyetyisiweyo; negazi leenkunzi ezintsha,  neleemvana, neleebhokhwe, andilinanzile.
23_1_12_Xa niza kubonakala ebusweni bam, ngubani na okufunileyo oko esandleni senu, ukugqusha iintendelezo zam?
23_1_13_Nize ningaphindi nizise mnikelo wakudla ukhohlakeleyo;  isiqhumiso silisikizi kum; ukuthwasa kwenyanga, nesabatha,  nokumema intlanganiso, ubutshinga kunye nengqungquthela,  andinakubuthwala.
23_1_14_Ukuthwasa kweenyanga zenu, namaxesha enu amisiweyo,  umphefumlo wam uwathiyile; asuka aba bubunzima kum; ndidiniwe kukuwathwala.
23_1_15_Ekoluleni kwenu izandla zenu, ndiya kuwafihla amehlo am kuni; nokuba nandise ukuthandaza, andiyi kuva; izandla zenu zizele ngamagazi.
23_1_16_Zihlambeni, ziqaqambiseni; susani ububi beentlondi zenu phambi kwamehlo am;
23_1_17_yekani ukwenza ububi; fundani ukwenza okulungileyo;  khathalelani ukugweba; lulekani isibhovubhovu; gwebani ityala lenkedama; lithetheni ityala lomhlolokazi.
23_1_18_Khanize sibonisane, utsho uYehova; nokuba izono zenu zide zavela zanjengengubo ebomvu, zoba mhlophe njengekhephu; nokuba zide zayingqombela njengebala elibomvu, zovela zinjengoboya begusha.
23_1_19_Ukuba nithe navuma naphulaphula, nodla izinto ezilungileyo zelizwe;
23_1_20_ukuba nithe anavuma, naba neenkani, nodliwa likrele; kuba umlomo kaYehova uthethile.
23_1_21_Yoo! Utheni na ukuba lihenyukazi umzi lo, ubunyanisile;  ubuzele kokusesikweni; ubulungisa bebulala kuwo; ke ngoku ngabancinithi!
23_1_22_Isilivere yakho isuke yaba ligwebu; iwayini yakho entle ingxengelelwe ngamanzi.
23_1_23_Abathetheli bakho baziinjubaqa, ngamadlelana namasela;  bathanda izicengo bonke bephela, basukela imivuzo; ityala lenkedama abaligwebi, netyala lomhlolokazi alinakufika kubo.
23_1_24_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, imbalasane yakwaSirayeli, ukuthi, Yeha! Ndiya kuzithuthuzela kubabandezeli bam, ndiziphindezelele ezintshabeni zam.
23_1_25_Ndosibuyisela phezu kwakho isandla sam, ndikunyibilikise ngokufezekileyo njengegolide, likhutshwe igwebu lakho, ndisuse yonke intsila yakho.
23_1_26_Ndobabuyisa abagwebi bakho njengokwasekuqaleni,  namaphakathi akho njengokwamatanci. Emveni koko kuya kuthiwa,  Wena ungumzi wobulungisa, uyinqaba enyanisileyo.
23_1_27_IZiyon iya kukhululwa ngokusesikweni, nabaguquki bayo ngobulungisa;
23_1_28_ukwaphulwa kwabakreqi naboni kube kunye, bapheliswe abamshiyayo uYehova.
23_1_29_Ngokuba baya kudana yimiterebhinti ebeniyinqwenela, nibe neentloni yimiyezo ebeniyinyula;
23_1_30_kuba niya kuba njengomterebhinti omagqabi omayo,  nanjengomyezo ongenamanzi;
23_1_31_nenjengele ibe yingxubuwa, nomsebenzi wayo ube yintlantsi,  kutshe kuphele kokubini kunye, kungabikho ucimayo.
23_2_1_Ilizwi awalibonayo uIsaya unyana ka-Amotsi, ngokusingisele kuYuda neYerusalem.
23_2_2_Ke kaloku kuya kuthi ekupheleni kwemihla, intaba yendlu kaYehova ivelele ezincotsheni zazo iintaba, izongamele iinduli,  zibe ngumsinga ukuya kuyo zonke iintlanga.
23_2_3_Kuya kuhamba izizwe ezininzi, zithi, Yizani, sinyuke siye entabeni kaYehova, endlwini kaThixo kaYakobi; asiyalele iindlela zakhe, sihambe ngomendo wakhe. Kuba kuya kuphuma umyalelo eZiyon, nelizwi likaYehova eYerusalem.
23_2_4_Uya kugweba phakathi kweentlanga, ohlwaye izizwe ezininzi;  ziwakhande amakrele azo abe ngamakhuba, nezikhali zazo zibe zizitshetshe zeediliya; uhlanga lungaphakamiseli uhlanga ikrele, nezizwe zingaphindi zifunde ukulwa.
23_2_5_Ndlu kaYakobi, yizani, sihambe ekukhanyeni kukaYehova.
23_2_6_Kuba ubalahlile abantu bakho, indlu kaYakobi; ngokuba bezele zizinto zasempumalanga, bengamatola njengamaFilisti, bebambene ngezandla nabantwana bezinye iintlanga.
23_2_7_Ilizwe labo lizele yisilivere negolide; abunakuphela ubuncwane babo. Ilizwe labo lizele ngamahashe; azinakuphela iinqwelo zabo zokulwa.
23_2_8_Ilizwe labo lizele zizithixo ezingeni; baqubuda kumsebenzi wezandla zabo, kwinto eyenziwe yiminwe yabo.
23_2_9_Ophantsi uyagoba, nendoda ephakamileyo ithotyelwe phantsi,  ungabaxoleli ke.
23_2_10_Ngena eweni, uziselele eluthulini, ngenxa yokoyika uYehova,  nangenxa yozuko lobungangamsha bakhe.
23_2_11_Amehlo aqwayingileyo esintu othotywa, noqhankqalazo lwamadoda lusibekeke; nguYehova yedwa owoba yingxonde ngaloo mini.
23_2_12_Kuba uYehova wemikhosi unemini eyozongamela izinto zonke ezinekratshi, ezinoqhankqalazo; nezinto zonke ezizinyusileyo zithotywe nezinto zonke ezisinyusileyo zithotywe ke.
23_2_13_Woyongamela imisedare yonke yaseLebhanon, emide,  ezinyusileyo,
23_2_14_nezonke ezinde, neenduli zonke ezizinyusileyo;
23_2_15_neenqaba zonke eziphakamileyo, neendonga zonke ezinqatyisiweyo;
23_2_16_neenqanawa zonke zaseTarshishe, nezinto zonke ezibonakala zinqweneleka.
23_2_17_Kosibekeka ukuzidla kwaba baphantsi, kuthotywe ukuqhankqalaza kwamadoda aphakamileyo. NguYehova yedwa owoba yingxonde ngaloo mini;
23_2_18_izithixo ezingeni zothi shwaka zonke ziphela.
23_2_19_Bongena emiqolombeni yamawa nasemingxunyeni yomhlaba ngenxa yokoyika uYehova, nangenxa yozuko lobungangamsha bakhe,  ekuphakameni kwakhe ukuba angcangcazelise ilizwe.
23_2_20_Ngaloo mini umntu uya kuziphosa ezintukwini nasemalulwaneni izithixo zakhe ezingeni zesilivere, nezithixo zakhe ezingeni zegolide, abamenzelayo ukuze aqubude kuzo;
23_2_21_ukuze angene ezimfanteni zamawa nasemiqhokrweni yeengxondorha, ngenxa yokoyika uYehova, nangenxa yozuko lobungangamsha bakhe, ekuphakameni kwakhe ukuba angcangcazelise ilizwe.
23_2_22_Khanimyeke umntu omphefumlo usemathatheni akhe; ngokuba kuthiwa, Uyintoni na?
23_3_1_Ngokuba uyabona, iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, isusa eYerusalem nakwaYuda isixhaso nenkxaso, sonke isixhaso sesonka kwanesixhaso samanzi:
23_3_2_igorha nendoda yokulwa, umgwebi nomprofeti, umvumisi nendoda enkulu,
23_3_3_umthetheli wamashumi amahlanu, nobekekileyo, nomphakathi,  nesilumko esinobungcibi, nengqondi yokukhwitsa.
23_3_4_Ndobanika abathetheli abangabantwana, nabafekethi babalawule;
23_3_5_bakhandanisane abantu ulowo nalowo, ulowo nalowa. Baya kusunduzana umntwana nendoda enkulu, ubuvuvu nabazukileyo.
23_3_6_Xa umntu aya kuthi abambelele kumzalwana wakhe endlwini kayise, athi, Unengubo wena, masiphathwe nguwe, oku kukhahleleka kube sesandleni sakho:
23_3_7_wophimisela ngaloo mini athi, Andingebi mphilisi, endlwini yam kungekho sonka, kungekho ngubo; aninakundenza umphathi wabantu.
23_3_8_Ngokuba ikhahlelekile iYerusalem, awile amaYuda; ngokuba iilwimi zabo neentlondi zabo zichase uYehova, ukuba bawaphikise amehlo obuqaqawuli bakhe.
23_3_9_Imbonakalo yobuso babo iyangqina ngabo, bayaxixela izono zabo njengeSodom, abakhanyeli. Yeha umphefumlo wabo, ngokuba beziphethe kakubi kwabona!
23_3_10_Yithi kumalungisa, kuya kulunga kuwo; ngokuba isiqhamo sezenzo zawo aya kusidla.
23_3_11_Yeha ongendawo! Kuya kuba kubi kuye; ngokuba ukuphatha kwezandla zakhe kuya kwenziwa kuye.
23_3_12_Abantu bam bakhandaniswa ngabantwana, balawulwa ngabafazi.  Bantu bam, abakhokeli benu ngabandwendwisi, bayigqukile indlela yomendo wenu.
23_3_13_Usukile wema uYehova ukuba athethe ityala; umi ukuba agwebe ebantwini.
23_3_14_UYehova uya kungena ematyaleni namadoda amakhulu abantu bakhe, nabathetheli babo; esithi, Ke nina nisigqibile isidiliya; okuphangwe kusizana kusezindlwini zenu.
23_3_15_Ninani na, ukuba nibatyumze nje abantu bam, nibusile ubuso beentsizana? itsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi.
23_3_16_Kananjalo uthi ke uYehova, Ngenxa enokuba zizidla iintombi zaseZiyon, zihamba zolule iintamo, zitshawula ngamehlo, zihamba zicothoza ukuhamba kwazo, zisenza isigampe esisezinyaweni zazo:
23_3_17_ngako oko iNkosi yolujaduka ukakayi lweentombi zaseZiyon,  uYehova azihlube ubunkazana bazo.
23_3_18_Ngaloo mini iNkosi yozisusa izihombo zemixokelelwane,  nesangqawe, nentsimbi yomqala,
23_3_19_namajikazi, neewatsha, nezigqubuthelo,
23_3_20_neembasa, neenxaxhazo, neenqwemesha, namahlala okujoja,  namakhubalo,
23_3_21_nemisesane, namakhonkco empumlo,
23_3_22_nezambatho ezinqabileyo, neengubo zokwaleka ezingaphezulu,  neetyali, neengxowa zemali,
23_3_23_nezipili, neeqhiya zelinen entle, neenkontsho, neengubo zokwaleka ezikrelekrele.
23_3_24_Kothi esikhundleni sobulawu ibe kukuvunda, esikhundleni sombhinqo ibe yintambo; esikhundleni seempothe ibe yimpempethe,  esikhundleni sengubo engwabungwabu ibe sisikhaka esirhwexayo;  ibe ngumtshiso esikhundleni sobunzwakazi.
23_3_25_Amadoda akho aya kuwa likrele, namagorha akho yimfazwe;
23_3_26_ancwine enze isijwili amasango ayo, ithi yona ikhutshululwe, ihlale phantsi emhlabeni.
23_4_1_Abafazi abasixhenxe bobambelela ndodeni-nye ngaloo mini,  besithi, Sodla esethu isonka, sambathe ezethu iingubo; kodwa masibizwe ngegama lakho, ukususe ukungcikiveka kwethu.
23_4_2_Ngaloo mini isithole sikaYehova siya kuba yinto enobukhazikhazi enobuqaqawuli, isiqhamo selizwe sibe yingangamsha nesihombo kwabasindileyo bakwaSirayeli.
23_4_3_Wothi oshiyekileyo eZiyon, noseleyo eYerusalem, kuthiwe ungcwele, bonke ababhalelwe ebomini eYerusalem;
23_4_4_yakuba ithe iNkosi yakuhlamba ukungcola kweentombi zaseZiyon, yawahlanza amagazi aseYerusalem phakathi kwayo ngomoya ogwebayo, nangomoya olulophu.
23_4_5_Wodala ke uYehova phezu kweendawo zonke zeentaba zeZiyon,  naphezu kweentlanganiso zayo, ilifu elingumsi emini,  nokudangazela komlilo ebusuku. Kuba phezu kobuqaqawuli obo bonke, kuya kubakho isigubungelo;
23_4_6_sibe ngumnquba ongumthunzi emini, ekubaleleni, sibe yindawo yokuzimela nokusithela esiphangweni nasemvuleni.
23_5_1_Intanda yam makhe ndiyivumele ingoma yentanda yam,  ngesidiliya sayo. Intanda yam ibe inesidiliya endulini echumayo;
23_5_2_yasigaba, yawemba amatye, yasityala imidiliya yohlobo, yakha inyango phakathi kwaso, yaxhola kuso umkhombe wokukhongozela iwayini. Yalinda ukuba sivelise iidiliya ezizizo; ke sona savelisa iidiliya ezingezizo.
23_5_3_Kaloku ke, bemi baseYerusalem, nani madoda akwaYuda,  khanahlule phakathi kwam nesidiliya sam.
23_5_4_Kube kusekho ntoni na eyenziwayo esidiliyeni sam,  endingayenzanga ke kuso? Kube kungani na ukuba ndikulinde ukuba sivelise iidiliya ezizizo, sisuke sivelise ezingezizo?
23_5_5_Kaloku ke makhe ndinazise into endiya kusenza yona isidiliya sam. Ndiza kususa uthango lwaso, sibe lidlelo; ndiya kuluchitha udonga lwaso, sibe yingqushu; ndisijece kuphele.
23_5_6_Asiyi kuthenwa, asiyi kuhlakulwa; siya kumila ubobo namakhakakhaka; ndiwawisele umthetho amafu, ukuba angani mvula phezu kwaso.
23_5_7_Kuba isidiliya sikaYehova wemikhosi yindlu kaSirayeli;  namadoda akwaYuda sisityalo sokumyolisa. Walinda ukuba kubekho okusesikweni, nanku ikukudywida; walinda ukuba kubekho ubulungisa, nanko ikukukhalisa.
23_5_8_Yeha, abahlomela indlu kwindlu, abasondeza intsimi kwintsimi, kude kungabikho ndawo, nihlale nedwa phakathi kwelizwe!
23_5_9_Ezindlebeni zam uthi uYehova wemikhosi, Inyaniso, izindlu ezininzi ziya kuba ngamanxuwa, ezinkulu, ezintle zingabi namhlali.
23_5_10_Kuba ishumi leendima zesidiliya liya kwenza ibhate ibe nye,  nehomere yembewu yenze iefa yodwa.
23_5_11_Yeha, abavuka kusasa, besukela isiselo esinxilisayo;  balibale kude kube lungcwalazi, ide ibatshise iwayini!
23_5_12_Ibe luhadi nomrhubhe, ingqongqo nogwali, newayini, emgidini wabo; ke wona umsebenzi kaYehova abawubeki, nezenzo zezandla zakhe abaziboni.
23_5_13_Ngako oko abantu bam bayafuduswa bengazi, nabazukileyo kubo baba ngabafo bendlala, ingxokolo yabo itshiswa linxano.
23_5_14_Ngako oko elabafileyo lizandisile, lakhame ngokungenamlinganiso; buhlile ubungangamela babo, nengxokozelo yabo, nengxolo yabo, nabadlamkileyo kubo.
23_5_15_Bayasibekeka abantu abaphantsi, athotywe amadoda aphakamileyo, athotywe amehlo abazidlayo;
23_5_16_ke yena uYehova wemikhosi uyaziphakamisa ngogwebo,  azingcwalise uThixo oyiNgcwele ngobulungisa.
23_5_17_Kodla iimvana apho, kunge kusedlelweni lazo; abasemathanga badlise emanxuweni ezityebi.
23_5_18_Yeha, abatsala ubugwenxa ngeentambo zenkohlakalo, nesono bange basitsala ngomqokozo wenqwelo;
23_5_19_abathi, Makasingxamise asikhawulezise isenzo sakhe, ukuze sibone; malisondele lize icebo loyiNgcwele kaSirayeli, ukuze sazi!
23_5_20_Yeha, abathi okubi kulungile, okulungileyo kubi; abamisa ubumnyama endaweni yokukhanya, ukukhanya endaweni yobumnyama;  abamisa ubukrakra endaweni yobumnandi, ubumnandi endaweni yobukrakra!
23_5_21_Yeha, abalumkileyo kwawabo amehlo, abanengqondo kokwabo ukubona!
23_5_22_Yeha, abangamagorha okusela iwayini; abangamadoda akrotele ukuphithikeza isiselo esinxilisayo; abagwebela abangendawo,  besekeleze isicengo;
23_5_23_ubulungisa bamalungisa babususe kuwo!
23_5_24_Ngako oko, njengokuba ulwimi lomlilo luzidla iindiza,  nesikhotha esomileyo sibohla edangatyeni: kwangokunjalo ingcambu yabo iya kuba njengento evundileyo, nentyantyambo yabo inyuke njengothuli; kuba besilahlile isiyalo sikaYehova wemikhosi, bayigiba intetho yoyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_5_25_Ngenxa yoko uyavutha umsindo kaYehova kubantu bakhe;  usolule phezu kwabo isandla sakhe, uyababetha; zagungqa iintaba, izidumbu zabo zanjengenkunkuma phakathi kwezitrato.  Kuko konke oko, awubuyi umsindo wakhe, isandla sakhe sisolukile.
23_5_26_Uzinyusela ibhanile iintlanga zakude, azenzele ikhwelo eziphelweni zehlabathi; nanzo zisiza zikhawuleza ngamendu.
23_5_27_Akukho utyhafileyo, akukho ukhubekayo kuzo; azozeli,  azilali, umbhinqo wamanqe azo awuthukululeki, umtya weembadada zazo awuqhawuki.
23_5_28_Iintolo zazo zitsolile, nezaphetha zazo zonke zityediwe;  amanqina amahashe azo kuthiwa anjengeqhwitha, neevili zazo zinjengesaqhwithi. Ukubharhula kwazo kunjengengonyamakazi;
23_5_29_zibharhula njengeengonyama ezintsha, zigqume, ziyibambe inyamakazi, zimke nayo, kungabikho uhlangulayo.
23_5_30_Zogquma phezu kwabo ngaloo mini, ngathi kukugquma kolwandle; babheke emhlabeni, nanko kumnyama yimbandezelo,  nokukhanya kumnyama emafini phezu kwabo.
23_6_1_Ngomnyaka wokufa kokumkani u-Uziya, ndayibona iNkosi ihleli etroneni ende enyukileyo; amasondo eengubo zayo ezirholayo azalisa itempile.
23_6_2_Kumi iiserafi ngaphezu kwayo, iyileyo inamaphiko amathandathu, ngamabini ifihle ubuso bayo, ngamabini ifihle iinyawo zayo, ngamabini iphaphazela.
23_6_3_Iyileyo idanduluke kuleyo isithi. Uyingcwele, uyingcwele,  uyingcwele uYehova wemikhosi; buzalise ihlabathi lonke ubuqaqawuli bakhe.
23_6_4_Yadidizela imigubasi yeminyango lilizwi lowadandulukayo;  yaye indlu izele ngumsi.
23_6_5_Ndathi, Athi ke mna! Ngokuba ndithe shwaka, ngokuba ndiyindoda emlomo uyinqambi; ndihleli phakathi kwabantu abamilomo iyinqambi; ngokuba amehlo am abone ukumkani, uYehova wemikhosi.
23_6_6_Yaphaphazela yeza kum enye yeeserafi, iphethe ilahle elivuthayo, elithabathe ngesithabatho esibingelelweni;
23_6_7_yalifikisa emlonyeni wam, yathi, Yabona, eli lahle lifikile nje emlonyeni wakho, bususiwe ubugwenxa bakho, nesono sakho sicanyagushelwe.
23_6_8_Ndeva izwi leNkosi, lisithi, Ndothuma bani na? Ngubani na owosiyela?
23_6_9_Ndathi, Ndikho, thuma mna. Yathi, Yiya, uthi kubo aba bantu,  Yivani, ukuva oku niya kuva, ningaqondi; qiqani, ukubona oku niya kubona, ningaqiqi.
23_6_10_Yityebise intliziyo yaba bantu, neendlebe zabo zenze zithi nkqi, namehlo abo uwavingce; hleze babone ngamehlo abo, beve ngeendlebe zabo, baqonde ngentliziyo yabo, babuye, baze baphiliswe.
23_6_11_Ndathi, Kube mzuzu ungakanani na, Nkosi? Yathi, Kude kuye kuchithwa imizi, ingabi nabemi, nezindlu zingabi namntu,  utshabalale umhlaba kube senkangala;
23_6_12_uYehova amse kude umntu, abe maninzi amanxuwa phakathi kwelizwe.
23_6_13_Kuya kuthi, ukuba kusekho isahlulo seshumi khona, sibuye naso sibe yinto yokutshayelwa; njengomterebhinti nanjengomoki,  othi ekuwisweni kwawo kushiyeke isiphunzi; yimbewu engcwele ke isiphunzi eso.
23_7_1_Ke kaloku kwathi, ngemihla ka-Ahazi unyana kaYotam, unyana kaUziya, ukumkani wakwaYuda, wenyuka uRetsin ukumkani wama-Aram, enoPeka unyana kaRemaliya, ukumkani wakwaSirayeli,  weza eYerusalem, ukuba alwe nayo; akaba nako ke ukulwa nayo.
23_7_2_Kwaxelwa kwindlu kaDavide, kwathiwa, Ama-Aram athelele kwabelakwaEfrayim. Yadidizela intliziyo yakhe nentliziyo yabantu bakhe, njengokudidizela kwemithi yehlathi phambi komoya.
23_7_3_Wathi uYehova kuIsaya, Khawuphume uye umkhawulele uAhazi,  wena noMasalela-obuya unyana wakho, ekupheleni komjelo wechibi lasentla, emendweni ongasentsimini yomxovuli weengubo;
23_7_4_uthi kuye, Gcinisa, uzole, ungoyiki, ingathambi intliziyo yakho ngenxa yezo zikhondo zibini zezikhuni eziqhumayo,  ekuvutheni komsindo kaRetsin nama-Aram, nonyana kaRemaliya;
23_7_5_ngenxa enokuba ama-Aram namaEfrayim nonyana kaRemaliya becebile ububi ngawe, besithi,
23_7_6_Masinyuke siye kwelakwaYuda, silikruqule, silinqike libe lelethu, simise ukumkani phakathi kwalo, unyana kaTabhele;
23_7_7_itsho iNkosi uYehova, ukuthi, Loo nto ayiyi kuma, ayiyi kubakho.
23_7_8_Ngokuba intloko yama-Aram yiDamasko, intloko yeDamasko nguRetsin; kuya kuthi iseyiminyaka emashumi mathandathu anamihlanu, aqotywe amaEfrayim, angabi bantu.
23_7_9_Intloko yamaEfrayim kukwaSamari, intloko yakwaSamari ngunyana kaRemaliya. Ukuba nithe anakholwa, inene, aniyi kuqiniseka.
23_7_10_Waqokela uYehova, wathetha kuAhazi, esithi,
23_7_11_Zicelele umqondiso kuYehova uThixo wakho; cela ubhekise enzulwini kwelabafileyo, mhlawumbi ubhekise enyangweni phezulu.
23_7_12_Wathi uAhazi, Andiyi kucela, andiyi kumlinga uYehova.
23_7_13_Wathi yena, Khanive, ndlu kaDavide; kuyinto encinane na kuni ukudinisa abantu, ukuda oku nidinise noThixo wam?
23_7_14_Ngako oko iya kuninika umqondiso ngokwayo iNkosi: uyabona,  intombi le iya kumitha, izale unyana, imthiye igama elinguImanuweli.
23_7_15_Uya kudla amasi nobusi, ade akwazi ukulahla okubi, anyule okulungileyo.
23_7_16_Kuba, engekakwazi umntwana lowo ukulahla okubi, anyule okulungileyo, woba selushiyiwe loo mhlaba, ukumkani bawo babini bakukruqulayo.
23_7_17_UYehova uya kukuzisela wena nabantu bakho, nendlu kayihlo,  imihla ekungazanga kubekho ingangayo, kususela kwimini wemka ngayo uEfrayim kwaYuda; ngukumkani waseAsiriya ke lowo.
23_7_18_Kothi ngaloo mini uYehova ayenzele ikhwelo impukane esekupheleni kwemijelo yoMnayile waseYiputa, nenyosi esezweni laseAsiriya;
23_7_19_zize, ziphumle zonke ziphela ezihlanjeni eziphakathi kwamaxandeka, nasezimfanteni zeengxondorha, nasezintangweni zonke zemiqaqoba, nasemadlelweni onke.
23_7_20_Ngaloo mini iNkosi iya kuguya ngesitshetshe esiqeshiweyo selasezinxwemeni zoMlambo, ngokumkani waseAsiriya, intloko noboya beenyawo; siphephethe neendevu.
23_7_21_Kothi ngaloo mini umntu aphilise ithokazi lenkomo neemazi zezimvu zibe mbini;
23_7_22_kuthi ngokwehlisa kwazo kakhulu adle amasi; ngokuba baya kudla amasi nobusi bonke abo baseleyo phakathi kwelizwe.
23_7_23_Kothi ngaloo mini zonke iindawo ezazinewaka lemidiliya elimelwe liwaka leesilivere, zibe zezobobo namakhakakhaka.
23_7_24_Kuya kuyiwa khona neentolo nezaphetha; ngokuba lonke ilizwe liya kuba lubobo namakhakakhaka.
23_7_25_Zonke iintaba ebezigatywa ngamagaba, akuyi kuya kuzo,  ngokoyika ubobo namakhakakhaka; loba lelokugxothela iinkomo,  nokunyashwa ziigusha.
23_8_1_Wathi uYehova kum, Thabatha icwecwe elikhulu, ubhale kulo ngenkxola yabantu, uthi, NgoMaxhoba ayakhawuleza iinto eziphangiweyo zingxamile,
23_8_2_Ndathabathela amangqina anyanisileyo, ooUriya umbingeleli,  noZekariya unyana kaYebherekiya.
23_8_3_Ndasondela kumprofetikazi, wamitha, wazala unyana. Wathi uYehova kum, Yithi igama lakhe nguMaxhoba ayakhawuleza iinto eziphangiweyo zingxamile.
23_8_4_Ngokuba, engekakwazi umntwana lo ukuthi, Bawo, nokuthi, Ma,  ubutyebi baseDamasko namaxhoba akwaSamari aya kuthwalelwa phambi kokumkani waseAsiriya.
23_8_5_Waqokela uYehova, wabuya wathetha kum, esithi,
23_8_6_Ngenxa enokuba abo bantu bewacekisa amanzi aseShilowa, la ahamba kuhle, benze imihlali noRetsin nonyana kaRemaliya:
23_8_7_ngako oko, yabona, iNkosi inyusela phezu kwakho amanzi oMlambo, lawo anamandla amakhulu, kwaukumkani waseAsiriya nobunzima bakhe bonke. Wonyuka wona ube ngaphezu kwemisele yawo yonke, uhambe ngaphandle kweendonga zawo zonke,
23_8_8_utyhudisele kwelakwaYuda, ukhukule, udlule, ubethe emqaleni;  kuthi ukunaba kwamahlelo awo kuzalise ububanzi belizwe lakho,  Imanuweli.
23_8_9_Bhavumani, zizwe, niqotywe; bekani indlebe, nonke mimandla ikude yehlabathi; bhinqani, niqotywe; bhinqani, niqotywe.
23_8_10_Cebani icebo, lotshitsha; thethani ilizwi, aliyi kuma;  ngokuba uThixo unathi.
23_8_11_Kuba utshilo uYehova kum, eseyisa ngamandla, endithethisa ukuba ndingahambi ngendlela yabo bantu, ukuthi,
23_8_12_Ize ningathi, Ikukucetywa into yonke abathi abo bantu,  Ikukucetywa; nento eyoyikwa ngabo ningayoyiki,  ningangcangcazeliswa yiyo.
23_8_13_UYehova wemikhosi, ngcwalisani yena nina, abe nguye enimoyikayo, abe nguye oningcangcazelisayo.
23_8_14_Woba yingcwele kuni; ke yena uya kuba lilitye lokubetheka,  neliwa lokukhubeka, kuzo zombini izindlu zakwaSirayeli, abe sisibatha nomgibe kubemi baseYerusalem.
23_8_15_Abaninzi kubo baya kukhubeka apho, bawe, baphuke,  barhintyeleke, babanjiswe.
23_8_16_Bopha isingqino, tywina uqinise isiyalo kubafundi bam.
23_8_17_Ndiya kulindela kuYehova, lo ubusithelisayo ubuso bakhe kwindlu kaYakobi, ndithembele kuye.
23_8_18_Yabona, mna nabantwana andinikileyo uYehova,  singabemiqondiso nezimanga kwaSirayeli, ezivela kuYehova wemikhosi, ulohlala entabeni yaseZiyon.
23_8_19_Xa bathe kuni, Quqelani kwabaneshologu nakoosiyazi,  abalozayo, abadumzelayo, yithini, Abantu mabangaquqeli kuThixo wabo, yini na? Ngenxa yabaphilileyo mabaquqele kwabafileyo na?
23_8_20_Bhekani esiyalweni, esingqinweni! Ukuba bathe abathetha ngokwelo lizwi, boba abanasifingo.
23_8_21_Baya kucanda kulo ilizwe begogotyelwe, belambile; kuthi ke,  xa bathe balamba, babe noburhalarhume, batshabhise ukumkani wabo noThixo wabo, babheke phezulu;
23_8_22_babheke emhlabeni, nanko kuyimbandezelo nobumnyama, bethiwe ncithi yingcutheko, begxothelwe esithokothokweni.
23_9_1_Ngokuba akuyi kuhlala kuthe ncithi kwelinengcutheko.  Ngexesha lokuqala walicukuceza ilizwe lakwaZebhulon nelizwe lakwaNafetali; ngelakamva uya kuyizukisa indlela yaselwandle,  phesheya kweYordan, ummandla weentlanga.
23_9_2_Abantu abo babamba emnyameni babone ukukhanya okukhulu;  abemi basezweni lethunzi lokufa, ukukhanya kubengezele phezu kwabo.
23_9_3_Uyalwandisa uhlanga, ulukhulisela uvuyo; bayavuya phambi kwakho, njengokuvuya kwexa lokuvuna, njengokuvuyelela kwabo ekwabeni kwabo amaxhoba.
23_9_4_Kuba idyokhwe yomthwalo wabo noswazi lwamagxa abo, intonga yomqhubi wabo, uyaphule njengemini yakwaMidiyan.
23_9_5_Ngokuba zonke izihlangu zabanyathela ngezihlangu ekungxoleni kokulwa, neengubo ezityikitywe emagazini, ezo ziya kutshiswa,  zibe kukudla komlilo.
23_9_6_Ngokuba sizalelwe umntwana, sinikwe unyana; ukuthethela kusesixhantini sakhe; igama lakhe kuthiwa nguMmangaliso,  nguMcebisi, nguThixo oligorha, nguSonini-nanini, nguMthetheli woxolo,
23_9_7_ukuba kwande ukuthethela oko, kubekho uxolo olungenakuphela etroneni kaDavide, nasebukumkanini bakhe, ukuba bumiswe buxhaswe ngokusesikweni nangobulungisa, kususela koko kude kuse ephakadeni. Ikhwele likaYehova wemikhosi liya kukwenza oko.
23_9_8_INkosi ithumela ilizwi kwaYakobi, liwa ke kwaSirayeli.
23_9_9_Bonke ke abantu bephela baya kwazi, amaEfrayim nabemi belakwaSamari: abathi ngekratshi nangobukhulu bentliziyo,
23_9_10_Izitena ziwile, siya kwakha ngamatye aqingqiweyo; imithombe ixakaxiwe, siya kuyimisela ngemisedare.
23_9_11_UYehova ubaphakamisile ababandezeli bakaRetsin phezu kwakhe, uzixhoxhile iintshaba zakhe.
23_9_12_Ama-Aram ngasempumalanga, namaFilisti ngasentshonalanga,  awadlile amaSirayeli ngomlomo wonke. Kuko konke oko, awubuyi umsindo wakhe; isandla sakhe sisolukile.
23_9_13_Aba bantu ke ababuyeli kulowo ubabethileyo; abamngxamele uYehova wemikhosi.
23_9_14_Ngoko ke usuke uYehova wanqumla kuSirayeli intloko nomsila,  isebe lomthi wesundu nomzi, ngamini-nye.
23_9_15_Amadoda amakhulu nabafo ababekekileyo, yintloko ke leyo;  abaprofeti abayala ngobuxoki, ngumsila ke lowo.
23_9_16_Abakhokeli baba bantu basuke baba ngaba bandwendwisayo,  nabakhokelwa ngabo basuke baba ngabaginyiweyo.
23_9_17_Ngenxa yoko iNkosi ayiyi kuvuya ngamadodana abo, ingabi namfesane ngeenkedama zabo nabahlolokazi babo; ngokuba bonke bephela baziintshembenxa, nabenzi bobubi; yonke imilomo ithetha ngobudenge. Kuko konke oko, awubuyi umsindo wakhe; isandla sakhe sisolukile.
23_9_18_Kuba okungendawo kutsha njengomlilo, kudla ubobo namakhakakhaka, kufaka isikhuni ezintshinyeleni zehlathi,  kunyuka njengomqulu womsi.
23_9_19_Ngokuphuphuma komsindo kaYehova wemikhosi ilizwe liyatsha;  abantu banjengokudla komlilo; umntu akamcongi umzalwana wakhe.
23_9_20_Basika ngasekunene, balambe noko; badle ngasekhohlo,  bangahluthi noko; umntu adle inyama yengalo yakhe;
23_9_21_uManase adle uEfrayim, uEfrayim adle uManase; bona bachasane noYuda. Kuko konke oko, awubuyi umsindo wakhe;  sisolukile isandla sakhe.
23_10_1_Yeha, abamisi bemimiselo yobutshinga, ababhali ababhala uxhamlo;
23_10_2_ukuze bazisunduze izisweli, zingafiki ematyaleni,  bazihluthe ibango lazo iintsizana zabantu bam, ukuba abahlolokazi babe lixhoba labo, baphange iinkedama!
23_10_3_Niya kuthini na ke ngemini yovelelo, nasesithongeni esivela kude? Niya kusabela kubani na ukuba anincede, nilushiye phi na uzuko lwenu?
23_10_4_Akukho kumbi, sekukukuguqa phakathi kwabakhonkwixeyo, bawe phakathi kwababuleweyo. Kuko konke oko, awubuyi umsindo wakhe,  sisolukile isandla sakhe.
23_10_5_Yeha, uAsiriya, ntonga yomsindo wam: luswazi olusesandleni sabo ukubhavuma kwam!
23_10_6_Ndiya kumthumela kuhlanga oluyintshembenxa, ndimwisele umthetho ngabantu bokuphuphuma komsindo wam, ukuba athimbe amaxhoba, aphange okuphangiweyo, abenze into yokunyathelwa njengodaka lwezitrato.
23_10_7_Ke yena akabi kunjalo; intliziyo yakhe ayiyicingi loo nto;  ngokuba okusentliziyweni yakhe kukutshabalalisa nokunqumla iintlanga ezingembalwa.
23_10_8_Kuba uthi, Abathetheli bam asingookumkani bonke na? IKaleno ayinjengeKarkemishe na,
23_10_9_iHamati ayinjengeArpadi na, owakwaSamari awunjengeDamasko na?
23_10_10_Njengokuba isandla sam sazifumanayo izikumkani zezithixo ezingeni; ukanti imifanekiso yazo eqingqiweyo ingaphezulu kweyaseYerusalem neyakwaSamari:
23_10_11_andiyi kuthi na, njengoko ndenza ngako kowakwaSamari nezithixo zawo ezingeni, ndenjenjalo kwiYerusalem nezithixo zayo?
23_10_12_Kuya kuthi, xa ithe iNkosi yazifeza izenzo zayo zonke entabeni yaseZiyon naseYerusalem, ndizivelele iziqhamo zobukhulu bentliziyo yokumkani waseAsiriya, nokuqhayisa ngokuqwayinga kwamehlo akhe.
23_10_13_Kuba uthe, Ndenze ngamandla esandla sam nangobulumko bam;  ngokuba ndinengqondo, ndayishenxisa imida yezizwe, ndaziphanga iimpahla zazo, ndabahlisa njengenkunzi eyimbalasane abahleli ezitroneni;
23_10_14_isandla sam sabufumana ubutyebi bezizwe njengendlu yentaka, ndalibutha mna lonke ihlabathi, njengokubutha amaqanda; akwabakho nanye ishukumisa iphiko, neyakhamayo,  netswinayo.
23_10_15_Izembe lingamqhayisela na ogawula ngalo? isarha ingazikhulisa na ngaphezu koyitsalayo? ngathi intonga ingabajingisa abaphakamisi bayo, ngathi uswazi lungamphakamisa ongenguwo umthi!
23_10_16_Ngako oko iNkosi, iNkosi yemikhosi, iya kubathumela ukungcumbeka kwabatyebileyo bakhe, nangaphantsi kobuqaqawuli baseAsiriya kutshe ukutsha, njengokutsha komlilo.
23_10_17_Ukhanyiso lukaSirayeli luya kuba ngumlilo, oyiNgcwele wakhe abe lilangatye, litshise lidle amakhakakhaka akhe nobobo lwakhe ngamini-nye.
23_10_18_Uya kubuphelisa ubuqaqawuli behlathi lakhe, nobentsimi yakhe echumayo, ethabathela emphefumlweni ase enyameni, kube njengokungcungcutheka komntu ofayo;
23_10_19_abe mbalwa amasalela emithi yehlathi lakhe, ibhalwe nangumntwana.
23_10_20_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, angabi saphinda amasalela akwaSirayeli, nabasindileyo bendlu kaYakobi, bayame ngobabethayo; baya kwayama ngoYehova oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli,  benyanisile.
23_10_21_Amasalela aya kubuya, amasalela akwaYakobi, eze kuThixo oligorha.
23_10_22_Kuba nangona bathe baba ngangentlabathi yaselwandle abantu bakho, Sirayeli, kobuya amasalela odwa kubo; ukupheliswa kumisiwe kwagqitywa, kukhukula ubulungisa.
23_10_23_Ngokuba iNkosi uYehova wemikhosi iza kwenza phakathi kwehlabathi lonke impeliso, iyemisiweyo ke yagqitywa.
23_10_24_Ngako oko, itsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, ukuthi, Musani ukumoyika uAsiriya, bantu bam bahleliyo eZiyon, akunibetha ngentonga, aniphakamisele uswazi lwakhe ngohlobo lwamaYiputa.
23_10_25_Kuba kusaya kuba mzuzwana mncinane, kuphele ukubhavuma kwam, nomsindo wam uye kumonakalisa;
23_10_26_ajiwule phezu kwakhe uYehova wemikhosi iziniya, njengoko wabetha amaMidiyan eweni likaOrebhe; intonga yakhe ibe phezu kolwandle, ayiphakamise ngohlobo lwamaYiputa.
23_10_27_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, usuke umthwalo wakhe esixhantini sakho, nedyokhwe yakhe entanyeni yakho, idyokhwe yonakale kukutyeba.
23_10_28_Ufikile eAyati, ucande eMigron, uyibeke eMikimashe impahla yakhe.
23_10_29_Baqabele enkalweni, bathi, Masilalise eGebha. Iyagubha iRama, isabile iGibheha yakwaSawule.
23_10_30_Khala ngezwi lakho, ntombi yaseGalim! Baza iindlebe,  Layisha! Uha, Anatoti!
23_10_31_IMadema ibalekile; abemi baseGebhim bazisabisile iintsapho zabo.
23_10_32_Umisa eNobhi kwanamhlanje, ulingisa ngesandla sakhe entabeni yentombi enguZiyon, endulini yaseYerusalem.
23_10_33_Yabona, iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, iyawathi tyhobotyhobo amahlamvu ngokungcangcazelisayo, namade aphezulu axakaxwe,  naphakamileyo athotywe;
23_10_34_ihlahla neentshinyela zehlathi ngesixengxe, iwiswe iLebhanon ngonamandla.
23_11_1_Kophuma igatya esiphunzini sikaYese, kuqhame ihlumelo ezingcanjini zakhe;
23_11_2_ahle ahlale phezu kwalo uMoya kaYehova, umoya wobulumko nowengqondo, umoya wecebo nowobugorha, umoya wokwazi nowokoyika uYehova.
23_11_3_Ivumba elithozamisayo kuye likukoyika uYehova, angagwebi ngokokubona kwamehlo akhe, angohlwayi ngokokuva kweendlebe zakhe.
23_11_4_Uya kuligweba ityala lezisweli ngobulungisa, abalungiselele abalulamileyo behlabathi ngokuthe tye, alibethe ihlabathi ngentonga yomlomo wakhe, ambulale ongendawo ngomoya wemilebe yomlomo wakhe.
23_11_5_Yoba bubulungisa iqamesi lesinqe sakhe, ibe yintembeko iqamesi lamanqe akhe.
23_11_6_Ingcuka iya kuhlala nemvana, ingwe ibuthe netakane lebhokhwe; kubuthe ndawonye ithole lenkomo, nengonyama entsha,  nenkomo etyetyisiweyo; nomntwana aziqhube ezo zinto.
23_11_7_Ithokazi lenkomo nemazi yebhere ziya kudla utyani ndawonye,  amankonyana azo abuthe ndaweni-nye; ingonyama idle umququ njengenkomo;
23_11_8_adlale umntwana owanyayo emngxunyeni wephimpi, olunyulweyo ase isandla sakhe elukhozweni lweliso lerhamba.
23_11_9_Ezo zinto aziyi kwenza bubi, aziyi konakalisa ezintabeni zam zonke ezingcwele; ngokuba ilizwe liya kuzala kukwazi uYehova, njengamanzi egubungele ulwandle.
23_11_10_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, ihlumelo likaYese, elimele ukuba yibhanile yezizwe, iintlanga ziquqele kulo; nendafo yokuphumla kwalo ibe bubuqaqawuli.
23_11_11_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, iNkosi isiphindise okwesibini isandla sayo sokuwathenga siwakhulule amasalela abantu bayo,  aya kusala eAsiriya, naseYiputa, nasePatros, nakwaKushi,  nakwaElam, naseShinare, naseHamati, naseziqithini zolwandle:
23_11_12_izinyusele ibhanile iintlanga, ibahlanganise abagxothiweyo bakwaSirayeli, izibuthe iintsali zakwaYuda emasondweni omane ehlabathi.
23_11_13_Losuka ikhwele likaEfrayim, banqunyulwe ababandezeli bakaYuda. UEfrayim akayi kumkhweletela uYuda, uYuda angambandezeli uEfrayim.
23_11_14_Bophaphazela egxalabeni lamaFilisti, babheke ngasentshonalanga. Baya kudibana baphange oonyana basempumalanga, base isandla kooEdom noMowabhi; oonyana baka-Amon babeve.
23_11_15_UYehova wosisingela phantsi isibhaxa solwandle lwaseYiputa, alingise ngesandla sakhe kuwo uMlambo ekuvutheni komoya wakhe, awubethe ube yimilanjana esixhenxe, abaweze beneembadada.
23_11_16_Kuya kubakho umendo wamasalela abantu bakhe, abaya kusala eAsiriya, njengoko kwaba njalo kumaSirayeli, mini anyuka ephuma ezweni leYiputa.
23_12_1_Uya kuthi wena ngaloo mini, Ndiyabulela kuwe, Yehova,  ngokokuba ubundiqumbele, waza wabuya umsindo wakho,  wandithuthuzela wena.
23_12_2_Yabona, uThixo ukukusindiswa kwam; ndikholosile,  andikwantyi; ngokokuba iqhayiya lam nengoma yam nguYa,  nguYehova obuye waba lusindiso kum.
23_12_3_Ngoko ke niya kukha amanzi ninemihlali emithonjeni yosindiso;
23_12_4_nithi ngaloo mini, Bulelani kuYehova, nqulani igama lakhe,  zaziseni ezizweni izenzo zakhe, izenzo zakhe ezincamisayo;  likhankanyeni igama lakhe ukuba liyingxonde.
23_12_5_Mbetheleni uhadi uYehova; ngokuba enze ngobungangamsha;  makwazeke oko ehlabathini lonke.
23_12_6_Tsholoza umemelele, wena mmi waseZiyon; ngokuba mkhulu phakathi kwakho oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_13_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kwiBhabheli, awasibonayo uIsaya,  unyana ka-Amotsi.
23_13_2_Nyusani ibhanile phezu kwentaba eluqayi, baphakamiseleni ilizwi; khobani ngesandla, bangene emasangweni amanene.
23_13_3_Mna ndibawisele umthetho abangcwalisiweyo bam, ndiwabizele umsindo wam amagorha am, abadlamkileyo bam abanekratshi.
23_13_4_Yiveni ingxokolo ezintabeni, ngathi yeyabantu abaninzi.  Yiveni ingxokolo yezikumkani zeentlanga, zihlanganisene;  uYehova wemikhosi uhlanganisa umkhosi wemfazwe.
23_13_5_Bavela ezweni elikude, ekupheleni kwamazulu-nguYehova nezixhobo zengqumbo yakhe, ukuba alonakalise ilizwe lonke.
23_13_6_Bhombolozani, kuba isondele imini kaYehova, ivela ngokwembuqo kuSomandla.
23_13_7_Ngenxa yoko ziwile iingalo zonke, zonke iintliziyo zabantu zinyibilikile.
23_13_8_Bakhwankqile, bafikelwe kukupenapena nayinimba;  bayazibhijabhija njengozalayo, bakhwankqiswe ulowo nguwabo;  ubuso babo bubuso bamalangatye.
23_13_9_Yabona, imini kaYehova iyeza, inobujorha, iphuphuma umsindo, ishushu, ukuba ilenze libe senkangala ilizwe,  ibatshabalalise aboni balo kulo.
23_13_10_Kuba iinkwenkwezi zezulu namakroza alo akayi kukhanyisa kukhanya kwawo; liya kuba mnyama ilanga ekuphumeni kwalo,  inyanga ingabi mhlophe ukukhanya kwayo.
23_13_11_Ndolivelela elimiweyo ngenxa yobubi balo, nabangendawo ngenxa yobugwenxa babo, ndiliphelise ikratshi labakhukhumeleyo,  ndilithobele phantsi ikratshi labangcangcazelisi;
23_13_12_ndiwenze amadoda anqabe ngaphezu kwegolide engcwengiweyo,  noluntu lunqabe ngaphezu kwegolide ecikizekileyo yakwaOfire.
23_13_13_Ngenxa yoko ndiya kuligungqisa izulu, nehlabathi linyikime, lishenxe endaweni yalo ngokuphuphuma komsindo kaYehova wemikhosi, ngemini yokuvutha komsindo wakhe;
23_13_14_bathi ke, njengebhadikazi elisukeliswayo, nanjengomhlambi ongenamhlanganisi, babheke elowo kubantu bakowabo, basabele elowo ezweni lakowabo.
23_13_15_Bonke abo bafunyenweyo baya kuhlatywa amahlanza, bonke abo babanjiweyo bawe likrele.
23_13_16_Zocunyuzwa iintsana zabo phambi kwamehlo abo, ziphangwe izindlu zabo, balalwe abafazi babo.
23_13_17_Yabona, ndibaxhoxhela amaMedi angayibekiyo isilivere,  angayinanzileyo negolide.
23_13_18_Izaphetha zawo ziya kukhahlela amadodana, nesiqhamo sesizalo angabi namfesane siso; iliso lawo lingabi nanceba kubo abantwana.
23_13_19_IBhabheli, ikhazikhazi lezikumkani, isihombo sekratshi lamaKaledi, iya kuba njengokubhukuqa kukaThixo iSodom neGomora.
23_13_20_Ayi kumiwa naphakade, ayi kuza ihlalwe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwana, angagxumeki ntente khona nomArabhi, nabalusi bangakhi khona buhlanti.
23_13_21_Obutha khona amarhamncwa omqwebedu, zizale izindlu zabo zizihuluhulu, kuhlale iinciniba khona, kuqakathe izinto ezimaxhonti khona;
23_13_22_kulile amaxhwili ezingxandeni zabo ezinde, neempungutye emabhotweni okuxhamla ubuncwane; kusondele ukuza kwexesha layo,  nemini yayo ingalibali.
23_14_1_Ngokuba uYehova uya kuba nemfesane kuYakobi, abuye awanyule amaSirayeli, awahlalise emhlabeni wakowawo, bathelele kuwo abasemzini, bahlomele endlwini kaYakobi.
23_14_2_Ziya kuwathabatha izizwe, ziwazise endaweni yawo: bazifuye zona abendlu kaSirayeli emhlabeni kaYehova, zibe ngamakhoboka namakhobokazana, babe ngabathimbi babathimbi babo, babe nobukhosi kubaqhubi babo.
23_14_3_Kuya kuthi, mini uYehova aniphumzayo ekwaphukeni kwenu,  nasekugungqeni kwenu, nasekukhonzeni okunzima, enakhonziswa ngako,
23_14_4_nihlabe lo mzekeliso ngokumkani waseBhabheli, nithi, Utheni na ukupheza umqhubi! ukupheza umzi othisayo!
23_14_5_UYehova ulwaphule uswazi lwabangendawo, intonga yabalawuli,
23_14_6_ebizibetha izizwe ngokuphuphuma komsindo, ngokubetha okungenakupheza; ebizinyathela ngomsindo iintlanga ngokusukelwa okungenakubanjezelwa.
23_14_7_Liphumle, lizolile ihlabathi lonke; bayagqabhuka bamemelele.
23_14_8_Nayo imisipres ikuvuyele, imisedare yaseLebhanon ithi,  Kuseloko walalayo, akunyuki mgawuli usigawulayo.
23_14_9_Elabafileyo ngaphantsi liyagungqa nguwe, ngokubona ukuza kwakho; likuxhoxhela abafileyo, zonke iinkunzi ezikhokelayo zehlabathi; liphakamisa ezitroneni zabo bonke ookumkani beentlanga.
23_14_10_Zonke ziphela zasusela ngelithi kuwe, Nawe wenziwe ofayo njengathi na? usuke wafana nathi na?
23_14_11_Buhliselwe kwelabafileyo ubungangamsha bakho, isandi semirhubhe yakho; kwandlelwe iimpethu ngaphantsi kwakho,  akugubungele amanundu.
23_14_12_Utheni na ukuwa emazulwini, Khwezi, nyana wesifingo!  ukunqunyulwa uwe emhlabeni, mngquli weentlanga!
23_14_13_Wena ke wathi entliziyweni yakho, Ndiyakunyukela emazulwini, ndiyinyuse itrone yam ibe ngaphezu kweenkwenkwezi zikaThixo; ndihlale entabeni yentlanganiso, engontsini yasentla.
23_14_14_Ndiya kunyuka ngaphezu kweziganga zamafu, ndizifanise nOsenyangweni;
23_14_15_kanti uya kuhliselwa kwelabafileyo, engontsini yomhadi.
23_14_16_Abakubonayo baya kukuthi nzo ngamehlo, bakugqale, bathi,  Yiyo na le indoda ebiligungqisa ihlabathi, ebizinyikimisa izikumkani?
23_14_17_eyalenza intlango elimiweyo, yayigungxula imizi yalo;  ayabavulela ababanjwa balo ukuba bagoduke?
23_14_18_Bonke ookumkani beentlanga, bonke bephela, balele benozuko, elowo endlwini yakhe;
23_14_19_ke wena ulahlelwe kude nengcwaba lakho, njengegatya elilisikizi; wambethe ababuleweyo, abahlatywe ngekrele, abahle baya ematyeni omhadi; njengesidumbu esinyashwe ngeenyawo.
23_14_20_Akuyi kubandakanywa nabo engcwabeni, ngokokuba walonakalisayo ilizwe lakho, wababulala abantu bakho; ayiyi kuba nagama naphakade imbewu yabenzi bobubi.
23_14_21_Oonyana bakhe balungiseleni ukusikwa, ngenxa yobugwenxa booyise, Mabangesuki balidle ilifa ihlabathi, bazalise elimiweyo ngemizi,
23_14_22_Ndiya kusukela phezulu kubo, utsho uYehova wemikhosi,  iBhabheli ndiyinqumle ingabi nagama namasalela, nanyana nanzalo, utsho uYehova;
23_14_23_ndiyenze ibe lilifa lokhwalimanzi nezadunge zamanzi,  ndiyitshayele ngomtshayelo wentshabalalo; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
23_14_24_Ufungile uYehova wemikhosi wathi, Inyaniso, njengoko ndicinge ngako, koba njalo; njengoko ndicebe ngako, koma ngolo hlobo;
23_14_25_ukuba ndimaphule uAsiriya ezweni lam, ndimnyashe ngeenyawo ezintabeni zam, isuke kubo idyokhwe yakhe, usuke umthwalo wakhe esixhantini sabo.
23_14_26_Lilo elo icebo elicetyiweyo ngehlabathi lonke; siso eso isandla esolukileyo phezu kweentlanga zonke.
23_14_27_Kuba uYehova wemikhosi ucebile, ngubani na onokutshitshisa? nesandla sakhe eso solukile, ngubani na onokusibuyisa?
23_14_28_Ngomnyaka wokufa kokumkani onguAhazi kwabakho esi sihlabo sithi:
23_14_29_Musa ukuvuyelela, wena Filisti uphela, ngakuba yaphukile intonga ebikubetha; kuba engcanjini yenyoka kuphuma irhamba,  isiqhamo sayo sibe yinyoka etshisayo, ephaphazelayo.
23_14_30_Baya kudla abazizisweli, abuthe ekholosile amahlwempu;  ndibulale ingcambu yakho ngendlala, abulawe amasalela akho.
23_14_31_Bhomboloza, sango! Khala, mzi! Yitha amandla, wena Filisti uphela, ngokuba entla kuphuma umsi; akukho wahlukayo ebuthweni lakhe.
23_14_32_Bathini na ukuphendula abathunywa beentlanga? Bathi,  UYehova uyisekile iZiyon, zozimela ngayo iintsizana zabantu bakhe.
23_15_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kuMowabhi. Kuba ngobusuku iAri yakwaMowabhi ibhuqiwe, yadaka; kuba ngobusuku ibhuqiwe iKire yakwaMowabhi, yathi shwaka.
23_15_2_Banyuke baya endlwini naseDibhon, ezigangeni, besiya kulila; phezu kweNebho naphezu kweMedebha uMowabhi uyabhomboloza; zonke iintloko zichetyiwe, zonke iindevu ziguyiwe.
23_15_3_Ezitratweni zakhe babhinqa ezirhwexayo; phezu kwezindlu zakhona, nasezindaweni zeembutho zakhona, bonke bephela bayabhomboloza, besithi ngxa iinyembezi.
23_15_4_Iyakhala iHeshbhon ne-Elale, lide laya kuvakala naseYahazi izwi labo; ngenxa yoko abaxhobileyo bakwaMowabhi benza isijwili, umphefumlo wabo uyajijitheka kubo.
23_15_5_Intliziyo yam iyakhala ngokubona uMowabhi, omivalo ide yesa eTsohare, elithokazi elilizibulokazi; kuba banyuka eqhineni laseLuhiti belila; kuba endleleni yaseHoronayim bakhaliswa kukwaphulwa kwabo;
23_15_6_kuba amanzi aseNimrim athe qoko; kuba bubunile utyani,  luphelile uhlaza, awukho umfuno.
23_15_7_Ngenxa yoko intwana ebisele, ababeyenzile, ababeyiqwebile,  bayayithwala bayiweze esihlanjeni semingculuba.
23_15_8_Kuba isikhalo siwuzungulezile umda wakwaMowabhi;  ukubhomboloza kwakhe kwesa e-Eglayim, kwesa naseBhere-elim ukubhomboloza kwakhe.
23_15_9_Kuba amanzi aseDimon azele ligazi; ngokuba iDimon ndiyimisela ezinye izinto ezimbi; abasindileyo bakwaMowabhi nabaseleyo emhlabeni ndibamisela ingonyama.
23_16_1_Thumelani iimvana kumlawuli welizwe, zivela eSela, zibheke entlango, ziye entabeni yentombi uZiyon.
23_16_2_Kuba njengeentaka eziphekuziweyo, njengendlu yentaka esuselweyo, aya kuba njalo amagxamesi akwaMowabhi emazibukweni aseArnon, esithi,
23_16_3_Siphe iqhinga, yahlula; misa isithunzi sakho sibe njengobusuku emini enkulu; fihla abagxothiweyo, musa ukumncetheza obhadubhadulayo.
23_16_4_Mabaphambukele kuwe abagxothiweyo bam; ube lisithe kuye uMowabhi phambi kombhuqi; ngokuba umkhamangi ugqibele, umbhuqi uphelile, abanyashi batshatyalalisiwe ezweni.
23_16_5_Kuya kuzinziswa itrone ngenceba, kuhlale phezu kwayo onenyaniso, ententeni kaDavide: umgwebi okhathalele okusesikweni, okhawulezayo ukulungisa.
23_16_6_Silivile ikratshi likaMowabhi, ikratshi elikhulu. Hayi,  ukukratsha kwakhe! Hayi, ikratshi lakhe nokuphuphuma komsindo wakhe, ukuphololoza kwakhe into engeyiyo!
23_16_7_Ngako oko uMowabhi uya kubhomboloza ngenxa kaMowabhi; bonke bephela baya kubhomboloza; niya kunkwinizela izicumba zeerasintyisi zaseKir-hareshete, nithe dakumba kanye.
23_16_8_Kuba amasimi aseHeshbhon antshwenyile, nomdiliya waseSibhema. Abantu beentlanga bayivithile imidiliya yawo yohlobo; ibide yaya kufika eYazere, yanabela entlango, amasebe ayo anaba ada awela ulwandle.
23_16_9_Ngenxa yoko ndiyawulilela ngokulila kweYazere umdiliya waseSibhema; ndikunyakamisa ngeenyembezi zam, Heshbhon, nawe Elale, ngokuba ukuvunwa kweziqhamo zakho nokuvunwa kweediliya zakho kufikelwe ngamayeyeye.
23_16_10_Isukile imivuyo nemigcobo entsimini echumayo;  akusamemelelwa ezidiliyeni, akusadunywa nokudunywa; umxovuli akasaxovuli newayini emkhombeni; ndiwaphelisile amayeyeye.
23_16_11_Ngenxa yoko izibilini zam ziyahlokoma njengohadi ngoMowabhi, nento ephakathi kwam ngeKir-beres.
23_16_12_Kuya kuthi, xa athe wabonakala, xa athe wazidinisa uMowabhi esigangeni, wangena engcweleni yakhe ukuba athandaze,  asuke angabi nakuthini.
23_16_13_Lilo elo ilizwi, awalithethayo uYehova ngoMowabhi kwanini.
23_16_14_Kaloku ke uYehova uthetha esithi, Ngeminyaka emithathu,  njengeminyaka yomqeshwa, buya kucukucezwa ubuqaqawuli bukaMowabhi, naloo ngxokolo yonke eninzi, amasalela abe mancinane, abe mbalwa, angabi makhulu.
23_17_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kwiDamasko. Yabona, iDamasko iya kususwa ekubeni ngumzi, ibe ngumwewe owileyo.
23_17_2_Ishiyiwe imizi yaseArohere; iya kuba yeyemihlambi, ibuthe khona, kungabikho uyothusayo;
23_17_3_ipheliswe inqaba kwaEfrayim nobukumkani kwiDamasko,  amasalela ama-Aram abe njengobuqaqawuli boonyana bakaSirayeli;  utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
23_17_4_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, busweleke ubuqaqawuli bukaYakobi,  ingcumbeke inyama yakhe etyebileyo.
23_17_5_Kuya kuba njengomvuni ehlanganisa ingqolowa emiyo, ingalo yakhe isika izikhwebu, kube njengokubhikica izikhwebu esihlanjeni samaRafa;
23_17_6_kusale okubhikicwayo khona, njengasekuvuthululweni komnquma; amabhumbulu abe mabini namathathu emancamini phezulu,  abe mane namahlanu ezimbaxeni zawo umthi oneziqhamo; utsho uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli.
23_17_7_Ngaloo mini umntu uya kondela kuMenzi wakhe, amehlo akhe akhangele koyiNgcwele kaSirayeli;
23_17_8_anganoneleli izibingelelo, izenzo zezandla zakhe,  angayikhangeli into eyenziwa yiminwe yakhe, noAshera, nezithixo zelanga.
23_17_9_Ngaloo mini imizi yakhe enqabileyo iya kuba ngamanxuwa asezintshinyeleni zehlathi, nawasezincotsheni zeentaba,  abawashiyayo phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli; koba senkangala.
23_17_10_Ngokokuba umlibele uThixo, umsindisi wakho, akwalikhumbula neliwa lokunqaba kwakho; ngenxa yoko watyala izityalo ezimnandi, wamilisela kuzo iintswazi zomdiliya wasemzini.
23_17_11_Ngemini yokutyala kwakho wawubiyela, kusasa wayityatyambisa imbewu yakhosisitha sokwindla eso ngemini yesifo, nomvandedwa obulalayo.
23_17_12_Yeha, ukuguguma kwezizwe ezininzi, ziguguma njengokuguguma kweelwandle! Yeha, ukungxola kwezizwe, zingxola njengokungxola kwamanzi anamandla!
23_17_13_Izizwe zingxola njengokungxola kwamanzi amaninzi; ke uThixo wozikhalimela, zisabe ziye kude, zisukelwe njengomququ weentaba phambi komoya, njengefukufuku lothuli phambi kwesaqhwithi.
23_17_14_Ngexa langokuhlwa, nanko zikhwankqile; kungekasi, azikho.  Siso eso isahlulo sabasidywidayo, nelifa labasiphangayo.
23_18_1_Yeha ke, ilizwe lenzwinini yamaphiko, eliphesheya kwemilambo yakwaKushi:
23_18_2_elithuma izigidimi ngolwandle ngemikhombe yemikhanzi phezu kwamanzi! Ndithi, Hambani, bathunywa banamendu, niye kuhlanga olude, olugudileyo, kubantu aboyikekayo ngapha nangapha,  kuhlanga olumithetho inzima, olugqushayo, olulizwe licandwacandwe yimilambo!
23_18_3_Nonke bemi belimiweyo, nani bahleli ehlabathini, xa kuthe kwenyuka ibhanile ezintabeni, khangelani; xa kuthe kwavuthelwa isigodlo, yivani.
23_18_4_Ngokuba utshilo uYehova kum ukuthi, Ndiya kuzola, ndibonele ndisendaweni yam; kufudumele, lisile, likho ilanga, kukho ilifu lombethe ekufudumaleni ngexa lokuvuna.
23_18_5_Kuba phambi kokuvuna, akugqibela ukuphuma amathupha,  intyantyambo yakuba yidiliya emuncu: uya kuwanqumla amasebe ngesitshetshe, awasuse awavikive anabayo.
23_18_6_Onke aya kushiywa abe ngawamaxhalanga eentaba, abe ngawamarhamncwa elizwe; amaxhalanga adlulise ihlobo phezu kwawo, onke amarhamncwa elizwe adlulise ubusika phezu kwawo.
23_18_7_Ngelo xesha kuya kusiwa kuYehova wemikhosi isithabathaba,  esingabantu abade, abagudileyo, bephuma kubantu aboyikekayo abangapha nangapha; kuhlanga olumithetho inzima, olugqushayo,  olulizwe licandwacandwe yimilambo; sisiwe endaweni yegama likaYehova wemikhosi, entabeni yaseZiyon.
23_19_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kwiYiputa. Bona ke uYehova ekhwele efini elinamendu, uza eYiputa. Ziya kudidizela izithixo ezingento zaseYiputa phambi kwakhe, intliziyo yeYiputa inyibilika phakathi kwayo.
23_19_2_AmaYiputa ndiya kuwaxhokonxela kwa-amaYiputa, alwe elowo nomzalwana wakhe, elowo nommelwane wakhe, umzi nomzi,  ubukumkani nobukumkani.
23_19_3_Wothiwa qongqololo umoya wamaYiputa phakathi kwawo;  ndiliginye icebo lawo, aquqele kwizithixo ezingento,  nakwabadumze layo, nakwabaneshologu, nakoosiyazi;
23_19_4_ndiwavingcele amaYiputa ngesandla senkosi esilukhuni,  alawulwe ngukumkani onengcwangu; itsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi.
23_19_5_Aya kuthi qoko amanzi aselwandle, utshe wome umlambo;
23_19_6_zinuke izibhaxa zawo, iwuthe itshe imijelo yoMnayile waseYiputa, zishwabane iingcongolo nemikhanzi.
23_19_7_Iintili ezingakuMnayile, ngasechwebeni loMnayile, nento yonke ehlwayelweyo, iya koma, iphetshethwe ingabikho.
23_19_8_Baya kuncwina ababambisi beentlanzi, bambambazele bonke abaphosa iqherhu eMnayileni, bathi matshamatsha abaneka umnatha phezu kwamanzi.
23_19_9_Baya kudana abasebenzi beflakisi echazwayo, nabaluki belinen emhlophe;
23_19_10_zithiwe vithivithi iintsika zalo, ube buhlungu umphefumlo wabo bonke abasebenzela umvuzo.
23_19_11_Bazizimathane zodwa abathetheli baseTsohan; amaphakathi alumkileyo kaFaro, icebo labo libubutyhakala. Ningathini na ukuthi kuFaro, Ndingunyana wezilumko, ndingunyana wookumkani bamandulo?
23_19_12_Ziphi na, ziphi na ke izilumko zakho? Mazikuxelele kaloku,  ziyazi into ayicebileyo uYehova wemikhosi ngeYiputa.
23_19_13_Bazizimathane abathetheli baseTsohan, balukuhliwe abathetheli baseNofu; bayilahlekisile iYiputa abayimbombo yezizwe zayo.
23_19_14_UYehova uthululele embilinini wayo umoya wobugwenxa, ukuba bayilahlekise iYiputa ekwenzeni kwayo konke, njengokugxadazela kwenxila emhlanzweni walo.
23_19_15_IYiputa ayiyi kuba nasenzo isenzayo intloko kwanomsila,  isebe lesundu nomzi womlambo,
23_19_16_Ngaloo mini amaYiputa aya kuba njengabafazi, agubhe,  ankwantye phambi kokulingisa ngesandla kukaYehova wemikhosi,  alingisa ngaso kuwo.
23_19_17_Umhlaba wakwaYuda woyixhalabisa iYiputa; athi othe wawukhankanya kuyo, ankwantye, ngenxa yecebo likaYehova wemikhosi, alicebileyo ngayo.
23_19_18_Ngaloo mini imizi emihlanu ezweni lamaYiputa iya kuthetha intetho yelakwaKanan, ifunge uYehova wemikhosi; omnye kuya kuthiwa yi-Ir-heres.
23_19_19_Ngaloo mini kuya kubakho isibingelelo kuYehova phakathi kwelizwe lamaYiputa, nelitye elimisiweyo kuYehova ngasemdeni walo.
23_19_20_Oko koba ngumqondiso nobungqina kuYehova wemikhosi ezweni lamaYiputa; xa athe akhala kuYehova ngenxa yabaxinezeli bawo,  wowathumela umsindisi nomthetheleli, awahlangule.
23_19_21_UYehova uya kuzazisa kumaYiputa, amazi uYehova amaYiputa ngaloo mini, amkhonze ngemibingelelo nangeminikelo yokudla;  abhambathise ngezibhambathiso kuYehova, azizalise.
23_19_22_UYehova uya kuwabetha ke amaYiputa, ebetha ephilisa;  abuyele kuYehova, yena athandazeke ngawo, awaphilise.
23_19_23_Ngaloo mini kuya kubakho umendo ophuma eYiputa, oya eAsiriya; eze ama-Asiriya eYiputa, amaYiputa aye eAsiriya,  akhonze uYehova amaYiputa kunye nama-Asiriya.
23_19_24_Ngaloo mini amaSirayeli aya kuba sisahlulo sesithathu kumaYiputa nakuma-Asiriya, eyintsikelelo phakathi kwehlabathi;
23_19_25_ewasikelela uYehova wemikhosi, esithi, Nisikelelwe,  maYiputa, bantu bam; ma-Asiriya, msebenzi wezandla zam;  maSirayeli, lifa lam.
23_20_1_Ngomnyaka wokuza kukaTartan eAshdode, ethunywe nguSargon,  ukumkani waseAsiriya (walwa neAshdode, wayithimba), ngelo xesha,
23_20_2_wathetha uYehova ngoIsaya unyana ka-Amotsi, esithi, Yiya ukhulule ingubo erhwexayo emanqeni akho, uzikhulule iimbadada ezinyaweni zakho. Wenjenjalo ke, wahamba ze, engenazo neembadada.
23_20_3_Wathi ke uYehova, Njengokuba umkhonzi wam uIsaya ehambe ze,  engenambadada, iminyaka emithathu, waba ngumqondiso nesimanga kwiYiputa nakwaKushi:
23_20_4_uya kwenjenjalo ukumkani waseAsiriya ukubaqhuba abathinjiweyo baseYiputa, nabafudusiweyo bakwaKushi, abantwana namadoda amakhulu, beze, bengenambadada, behamba ngeempundu,  intoleyo eziintloni kwiYiputa.
23_20_5_Baya kuqhiphuka umbilini badane nguKushi, inqolonci yabo,  nayiYiputa, iqhayiya labo;
23_20_6_bathi ke abemi bolo nxweme ngaloo mini, Yabonani, inje inqolonci yethu, esasabela kuyo ukuba sincedwe, sihlangulwe kukumkani waseAsiriya; singathini na ke ukusinda thina?
23_21_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kwintlango yaselwandle.  Njengezaqhwithi zasezantsi zikhukula, kuphuma into entlango,  ezweni eloyikekayo.
23_21_2_Ndiboniswe umbono olukhuni: inginingini linginiza, umbhuqi ebhuqa. Nyuka, Elam; ngqinga, Madayi; ukuncwina kwabo konke ndiya kuphelisa.
23_21_3_Ngenxa yoko azele amanqe am kukuzibhijabhija, inimba indifikele njengenimba yozalayo; ndiyapenapena, andiva;  ndikhwankqile, andiboni.
23_21_4_Intliziyo yam iyadinga, ukududuzela kundidandathekisile;  ungcwalazi, into endiyilangazelelayo, ulwenze into endigubhisayo.
23_21_5_Kulungiswa isithebe, kuboniselwa umboniselo, kuyadliwa,  kuyaselwavukani, bathetheli, thambisani iingweletshetshe.
23_21_6_Ngokuba itsho kum iNkosi, ukuthi, Yiya umise umboniseli,  athi akubona into aze kuyixela.
23_21_7_Wabona umkhoko wabakhweli, abamahashe bengababini,  nabakhweli bamaesile, nabakhweli beenkamela; wabaza iindlebe,  wazibaza kakhulu kunene.
23_21_8_Wadanduluka ngelengonyama, esithi, Nkosi, kususela koko ndimi emboniselweni emini, ndizimisile esigxineni sam ubusuku ngobusuku.
23_21_9_Ke, yabona, kweza umkhoko wamadoda, abamahashe bengababini.  Wasusela wathi, Iwile, iwile iBhabheli; yonke imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yoothixo bayo uyaphulele emhlabeni.
23_21_10_Wena, nto yam ibhuliweyo, ngqolowa yesanda sam,  endikuvileyo kuYehova wemikhosi, uThixo kaSirayeli, ndikuxelile kuni.
23_21_11_Isihlabo esisingisele kothe cwaka. Omemeza kum ekwelakwaSehire, uthi, Mlindi, kuxa liphi na ebusuku? mlindi,  kuxa liphi na ebusuku?
23_21_12_Uthi umlindi, Kuyeza ukusa, kwanobusuku. Ukuba niyabuza,  buzani; buyani, yizani.
23_21_13_Isihlabo esisingisele kwelaseArabhi. KwelaseArabhi niya kulalisa emxawukeni, nina mikhoko yamaDedan.
23_21_14_Baziseleni amanzi abanxaniweyo; nina, bemi bakwaTema,  nibakhawulele ngesonka abaphalaphalayo.
23_21_15_Ngokuba baphalaphaliswa ngamakrele, amakrele athiwe kruthu, nasisaphetha esityhidiweyo, nayimfazwe enzima.
23_21_16_Ngokuba iNkosi itshilo kum ukuthi, Kwakulo mnyaka,  njengeminyaka yomqeshwa, buya kuphela ubuqaqawuli bonke bakwaKedare;
23_21_17_abe mbalwa amasalela enani lezaphetha zamagorha, oonyana bakaKedare; ngokuba uYehova uThixo kaSirayeli uthethile.
23_22_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kumfula wombono. Ukholose ngantoni na kaloku, le nto unyukileyo waya phezu kwezindlu wonke uphela?
23_22_2_Wena uzeleyo kukungxola, wena mzi uxokozelayo, wena nqaba ivuyelelayo; ababuleweyo bakho ababulawanga likrele, abafanga yimfazwe.
23_22_3_Bonke abaphathi bakho babaleka kunye, bakhonkxwe kungabangakho saphetha; bonke abafunyanwa kuwe bakhonkxwa kunye ekubalekeleni kwabo kude.
23_22_4_Ngenxa yoko ndathi, Susani amehlo kum, ndikwenze kube krakra ukulila kwam; musani ukundizama ngokundithuthuzela ngenxa yokubhuqwa kwentombi yabantu bakowethu.
23_22_5_Ngokuba ifikelwe ngumhla wokudungwadungwa, wokugqushwa,  wokuqungwaqungwa, okuvela kwiNkosi uYehova wemikhosi, emfuleni wombono; umhla wokuwiselwa phantsi iindonga, wokuzibika ezintabeni.
23_22_6_AmaElam aqubule umphongolo, eneenqwelo zokulwa ezinamadoda na bamahashe; amaKiri ahlube iingweletshetshe.
23_22_7_Zathi ke iintili zakho ezintle zazala ziinqwelo zokulwa,  bathi abamahashe bamisa bemisile esangweni.
23_22_8_Wasibhenqa isigqubuthelo sakwaYuda; waza wena ngaloo mini wabheka esikrweqeni sendlu yehlathi.
23_22_9_Nazibona iintanda zomzi kaDavide ukuba ninzi, nahlanganisa amanzi echibi lasezantsi;
23_22_10_izindlu zaseYerusalem nazibala; nazidiliza izindlu, ukuze ninqabise udonga.
23_22_11_Nenza isigingqi samanzi echibi elidala phakathi kweendonga zombini, anakhangela kumenzi wale nto, anambeka owayibumbayo kwakudala.
23_22_12_INkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, ngaloo mini yabizela ekulileni,  nasekumbambazeleni, nasekuchebeni intloko, nasekubhinqeni iingubo ezirhwexayo;
23_22_13_kanti kusuke kwaba yimihlali nemivuyo, kusoselwa iinkomo,  kuxhelwa iigusha, kudliwa inyama, kuselwa iwayini; kudliwa,  kuselwa, kuba kusithiwa, Ngomso soba sesifile.
23_22_14_UYehova wemikhosi wazityhila ngokwakhe ezindlebeni zam,  wathi, Nento, ukuba nokha nicanyagushelwe obo bugwenxa, nide nife! itsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi.
23_22_15_Yatsho iNkosi, uYehova wemikhosi, ukuthi, Hamba uye kwelaa gosa, kuShebhena umphathi wendlu, uthi,
23_22_16_Unantoni na apha, unabani na apha, ukuba nje uzixholele ingcwaba apha, njengoxhola ingcwaba lakhe phezulu, ezikrolela ikhaya engxondorheni?
23_22_17_Yabona, uYehova uya kukudandalazisa ngokudandalazisa kwendoda, akuxhakamfule, akuqinise.
23_22_18_Uya kukuthandela akuthandele, ube yinto yokunqakulisa,  imbumbulu esinga ezweni elibanzi ngeenxa zombini. Uya kufela apho, zibe lapho iinqwelo zobuqaqawuli bakho, wena, hlazo lendlu yenkosi yakho.
23_22_19_Ndokuguzula usuke ebugoseni bakho, akugungxule ebumeni bakho.
23_22_20_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, ndibize umkhonzi wam, uEliyakim unyana kaHilekiya;
23_22_21_ndimambathise iingubo zakho zangaphantsi, ndimbophe ngombhinqo wakho, ndimnikele esandleni ulawulo lwakho, abe nguyise wabemi baseYerusalem nowabendlu kaYuda.
23_22_22_Ndiya kusibeka isitshixo sendlu kaDavide esixhantini sakhe, avule kungabikho uvalayo, avale kungabikho uvulayo;
23_22_23_ndimbethelele abe sisikhonkwane endaweni eqinileyo; abe yitrone yozuko kwindlu kayise.
23_22_24_Baya kubuxhoma kuye bonke ubunzima bendlu kayise, amagatya neempakatha, yonke impahla encinane, kuthabathele empahleni ezizidendeleko, kuse empahleni yonke eyimiphanda.
23_22_25_Ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, siya kususwa isikhonkwane, eso sibethelelwe endaweni eqinileyo, sixakaxwe,  siwe, unqanyulwe umthwalo ophezu kwaso; ngokuba uYehova ethethile.
23_23_1_Isihlabo esisingisele kwiTire. Bhombolozani, nina zinqanawa zaseTarshishe, ngokuba ibhuqiwe, akwabakho ndlu, akwabakho kungena.
