23_23_2_Bakutyhilelwe ezweni lamaKiti. Yithini cwaka, bemi bonxweme; wena uzaliswe ngabarhwebi baseTsidon, abawela ulwandle.
23_23_3_Yayisemanzini amakhulu imbewu yaseSihore, ukuvuna koMnayile kwaba lungeniselo kuyo; yaba yindawo yokurhweba kweentlanga.
23_23_4_Dana, Tsidon; kuba luthethile ulwandle, inqaba yolwandle,  lwathi, Andizibhijabhijanga, andizalanga, andikhulisanga mlisela, andondlanga mthinjana.
23_23_5_Lothi lwakuthi ukuthi ukufika olu daba eYiputa, basuke bazibhijabhije ngodaba olungeTire.
23_23_6_Welelani niye eTarshishe; bhombolozani, bemi bonxwene.
23_23_7_Kunje na kuwe, wena mvuyeleli, ukuvela kwakho kukho kwasemihleni yamandulo, iinyawo zakho zakusa kude, ukuba uye kuthi vu?
23_23_8_Ngubani na lo ucebe le nto ngeTire, ngomzi othwesa ngezithsaba, obarhwebi bawo bangabathetheli, obathengeli bawo bangabazukileyo behlabathi?
23_23_9_Icetywe nguYehova wemikhosi, ukuba angcolise ubungangamsha bamakhazikhazi onke, ukuba acukuceze bonke abazukileyo behlabathi.
23_23_10_Canda kulo ilizwe lakowenu njengoMnayile, ntombi inguTarshishe; akusekho luqhwemesha lukuxinileyo.
23_23_11_Isandla sakhe usolulele phezu kolwandle, ugungqise izikumkani. UYehova uwise umthetho ngelakwaKanan wokutshabalalisa iinqaba zalo.
23_23_12_Wathi, Akuyi kuba sabuya udlamke, nkazana idlwengulweyo,  ntombi inguTsidon. Suk ume, welela kumaKiti; nalapho akuyi kuba nakuphumla.
23_23_13_Yabona, ilizwe lamaKaledi, ngabantu ababengekho;  ama-Asiriya abamisela ukuba babe ngabomqwebedu; bamisa iimboniselo zabo, bezinqika iingxande zalo ezinde, bezenza umwewe.
23_23_14_Bhombolozani, zinqanawa zaseTarshishe, ngokuba ibhuqiwe inqaba yenu.
23_23_15_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, ilityalwe iTire iminyaka engamashumi asixhenxe, njengemihla yokumkani omnye. Ekupheleni kweminyaka engamashumi asixhenxe kuya kwenzeka kwiTire ngokwengoma yehenyukazi, ethi,
23_23_16_Thabatha uhadi uwujikajike umzi, henyukazi lilityelweyo;  betha kamnandi; vuma iingoma ezininzi, ukuze ukhunjulwe.
23_23_17_Kuya kuthi ekupheleni kweminyaka emashumi asixhenxe,  ayivelele iTire uYehova, ibuyele elutsheqweni lwayo, ihenyuzane nezikumkani zonke zehlabathi eziphezu komhlaba;
23_23_18_lube ngcwele kuYehova urhwebo lwayo notsheqo lwayo; aluyi kubekwa, aluyi kuqwetywa; kuba urhwebo lwayo luya kuba lolwabahleli phambi koYehova, ukuze badle bahluthe, nokuze bambathe ngokobunene.
23_24_1_Yabona uYehova ulithi qongqololo ihlabathi, ulenza amagqagala, uyabuphethula ubuso balo, uyabachithachitha abemi balo;
23_24_2_kube mfani-nye abantu nababingeleli, kube mfani-nye ikhoboka nenkosi yalo, kube mfani-nye ikhobokazana nenkosikazi yalo, kube mfani-nye othengayo nothengisayo, kube mfani-nye obolekayo nobolekwayo,
23_24_3_kube mfani-nye umnikimali nomamkelimali. Ihlabathi lithiwe qongqololo ngakunye, liphangwe liphangiwe; kuba uYehova elithethile elo lizwi.
23_24_4_Ihlabathi lenza isijwili, libunile; lintshwenyile, libunile elimiweyo; bathe matshamatsha abaphakamileyo ebantwini behlabathi.
23_24_5_Ihlabathi lihlanjelwe ngaphantsi kwabemi balo; ngokokuba beyigqithile imiyalelo, badlula emimiselweni, bawaphula umnqophiso ongunaphakade.
23_24_6_Ngenxa yoko lidliwe ihlabathi kukuqalekiswa, bathwele ityala abemiyo kulo; ngenxa yoko baphanzile abemi behlabathi,  kwasala abantu abambalwa.
23_24_7_Iwayini entsha yenza isijwili, untshwenyile umdiliya,  bayancwina bonke abantliziyo inemivuyo.
23_24_8_Iphelile imihlali yengqongqo; iyekile ingxokozelo yabadlamkileyo; iphelile imihlali yohadi.
23_24_9_Abayi kusela wayini benengoma; sikrakra isiselo esinxilisayo kwabasiselayo.
23_24_10_Uqhekekile umzi osenyanyeni, zivalekile zonke izindlu ukuba zingangenwa mntu.
23_24_11_Bakhala ngewayini phandle; itshonile yonke imivuyo; iphele kwathi tu imihlali yehlabathi.
23_24_12_Umzi usele walinxuwa, laqotywa isango layimvithi.
23_24_13_Kuba kuya kuba nje esazulwini sehlabathi lonke phakathi kwezizwe, kube njengasekuvuthululweni komnquma,  njengasekubhikiceni ukuphela kokuvuna iidiliya.
23_24_14_Bona aba baya kuphakamisa ilizwi, bamemelele; baya kutsholoza ngobungangamsha bukaYehova, beselwandle, bathi,
23_24_15_Ngenxa yoko, zukisani uYehova emimandleni yokukhanya:  igama likaYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli, eziqithini zolwandle.
23_24_16_Esondweni lehlabathi siva iingoma ezithi, Udumo malube kwilungisa. Ndaza ndathi, Hayi, ukungcungcutheka kwam!  ukungcungcutheka kwam! Athi ke mna! Amanginingini ayanginiza,  amanginingini ayanginiza ngonginizo lwawo.
23_24_17_Ufikelwe lunkwantyo nomgongxo nesibatha, wena mmi wehlabathi.
23_24_18_Kuya kuthi, othe walibaleka ilizwi elinkwantyisayo, eyele emgongxweni; othe wenyuka waphuma emgongxweni, abanjiswe sisibatha; ngokuba iingcango zaphezulu zivulekile, zanyikima iziseko zehlabathi.
23_24_19_Liyavikiveka livikiveke ihlabathi; liyacandeka licandeke ihlabathi; liyashukuma lishukume ihlabathi; liyatalasa ihlabathi njengenxila;
23_24_20_liyajinga njengomandlalo oxhonyiweyo; ukreqo lwalo lunzima phezu kwalo; liyawa, lingabuyi livuke.
23_24_21_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, awuvulele uYehova umkhosi wabaphezulu, nokumkani behlabathi ehlabathini;
23_24_22_bahlanganiswe behlanganiswa njengamakhonkxwa emhadini,  bavalelwe entolongweni, bavelelwe kwakuba yimihla emininzi.
23_24_23_Iya kuba neentloni inyanga, lidane ilanga, xa uYehova wemikhosi angukumkani entabeni yeZiyon, naseYerusalem, naphambi kwamadoda akhe amakhulu, ngobuqaqawuli.
23_25_1_Yehova, unguThixo wam; ndiya kukuphakamisa, ndiya kubulela kwigama lakho; ngokuba wenze imisebenzi ebalulekileyo, amacebo akho kwakude, ukunyaniseka, inyaniso.
23_25_2_Ngokuba umzi uwenze walinxuwa; inqaba enqatyisiweyo yangumwewe; uxande olude lwabasemzini alwaba mzi, ungakhiwa naphakade.
23_25_3_Ngenxa yoko baya kukuzukisa abantu abanengcwangu, ikoyike imizi yeentlanga ezingcangcazelisayo.
23_25_4_Ngokuba waba ligwiba kwisisweli, igwiba kwihlwempu ekubandezelweni kwalo, ihlathi esiphangweni, umthunzi lakubalela, xa ukufutha kwabangcangcazelisayo kwaba njengesiphango eludongeni.
23_25_5_Njengokubalela emqwebedwini, udambise ingxolo yabasemzini;  njengokudanjiswa kokubalela lithunzi lelifu, yathotywa ngokunjalo ingoma yabangcangcazelisayo.
23_25_6_UYehova wemikhosi uya kuzenzela zonke izizwe isidlo sezinto ezityebileyo kule ntaba, isidlo sewayini egcinwe ngeentsipho,  sezinto ezityebileyo ezinomongo, sewayini egcinwe ngeentsipho,  yaza yahluzwa;
23_25_7_aginye kule ntaba umphambili wesigqubuthelo esizigqubutheleyo izizwe zonke, nesigubungelo esizigubungeleyo zonke iintlanga.
23_25_8_Iya kuginya ukufa kuphele, izisule iNkosi uYehova iinyembezi ebusweni bonke, ingcikivo yabantu bayo iyisuse ehlabathini lonke, kuba uYehova ethethile.
23_25_9_Kuya kuthiwa ngaloo mini, Yabona, lo nguThixo wethu;  besithembele kuye, ukuba asisindise; nguYehova lo besithembele kuye; masigcobe, sivuye ngosindiso lwakhe.
23_25_10_Ngokuba isandla sikaYehova siya kuhlala phezu kwale ntaba,  anyathelwe amaMowabhi endaweni yawo, njengokunyathelwa komququ emanzini omgquba.
23_25_11_Aya kuzaneka izandla zawo emthonyameni wawo, njengokuba indadi izaneka izandla ukuba idade; ke uYehova uya kulithoba ikratshi lawo, kunye nezigcaliselo zezandla zawo.
23_25_12_Wozisibekekisa iindonga zakho ezinqabileyo eziphakamileyo,  azigungxule, ade azifikise emhlabeni, eluthulini.
23_26_1_Ngaloo mini kuya kuvunywa le ngoma ezweni lakwaYuda, ithi,  Yinqaba umzi wethu thina; umisa iidonga nongqameko zibe lusindiso.
23_26_2_Vulani amasango, lungene uhlanga olunobulungisa, olugcine ukuthembeka.
23_26_3_Intliziyo ezimasekileyo uyayilondoloza, ixole ixolile;  ngokuba ikholose ngawe.
23_26_4_Kholosani ngoYehova ngonaphakade; kuba uYa, uYehova,  uliliwa elingunaphakade.
23_26_5_Ngokuba uthulele phantsi abahleli phezulu; umzi oyingxonde uwugungxule wawugungxulela emhlabeni, wawufikisa eluthulini.
23_26_6_Ziyawunyasha iinyawo, iinyawo zeentsizana, amanyathelo ezisweli.
23_26_7_Umendo wamalungisa ulungelelene; wena uyawulinganisela umkhondo wamalungisa, ulungelelane.
23_26_8_Kakade, Yehova, sibe sikulindile, ukuba uze emendweni wemigwebo yakho; umnqweno womphefumlo wethu wasinga egameni lakho, nasekukukhumbuleni.
23_26_9_Nangomphefumlo wam ndakunqwenela ebusuku; inene, ngomoya wam phakathi kwam ndakufuna kwakusasa; ngokuba xenikweni imigwebo yakho ibhekiswe ehlabathini, baya kufunda ubulungisa abemi belimiweyo.
23_26_10_Nokuba uthe wababalwa ongendawo, akafundi bulungisa;  nasezweni labathe gca uyagqwetha; akabuboni ubungangamsha bukaYehova.
23_26_11_Yehova, sibe siphakamile isandla sakho, ababona; ke baya kulibona ikhwele lakho ngenxa yabantu, badane; ewe, umlilo mawubadle ababandezeli bakho.
23_26_12_Yehova, uya kusimisela uxolo; ngokuba nezenzo zethu zonke usisebenzele.
23_26_13_Yehova Thixo wethu, iinkosi ezingenguwe bezinobukhosi phezu kwethu; kodwa sikhankanya igama lakho ngawe wedwa.
23_26_14_Abafileyo abo abasayi kuba saphila; abangasekhoyo abo abasayi kuba savuka; ngoko ke ubavelele wabatshabalalisa,  wakwenza kwadaka konke ukukhunjulwa kwabo.
23_26_15_Ulwandisile uhlanga, Yehova, ulwandisile uhlanga;  uzizukisile; uzikhwelelisele kude iziphelo zelizwe.
23_26_16_Yehova, embandezelweni baquqela kuwe, bathulula umthandazo ngelizwi eliphantsi ekubathethiseni kwakho.
23_26_17_Njengomithiyo eza kuzala, ezibhijabhija, ekhaliswa yinimba, saba njalo phambi kwakho, Yehova.
23_26_18_Sibe simithi, sibe sizibhijabhija, sanga sizele umoya.  Asilenzelanga sindiso ilizwe, abaphumanga abemi belimiweyo.
23_26_19_Abafileyo bakho baya kuphila; izidumbu zakowethu ziya kuvuka. Vukani, nimemelele, nina bahleli eluthulini; kuba ngumbethe wezikhanyiso umbethe wakho, nehlabathi liya kubakhupha abangasekhoyo.
23_26_20_Hambani, bantu bam, ningene ezingontsini zenu, nivale iingcango zenu ngasemva kwenu, nizimele umzuzwana, kude kudlule ukubhavuma.
23_26_21_Kuba, yabona, uYehova uphuma endaweni yakhe, ukuze abuvelele kubo ubugwenxa babemi behlabathi; ihlabathi lowatyhila amagazi alo, lingabi sabaselela ababuleweyo balo.
23_27_1_Ngaloo mini uYehova uya kuyivelela ngekrele lakhe, elo lilukhuni, elo likhulu, elo lomeleleyo, ileviyatan inyoka ebalekayo, neleviyatan inyoka ephinyaphinyelayo; ayibulale ingwenya eselwandle.
23_27_2_Ngaloo mini kuya kuthiwa, Isidiliya esinqwenelekayo,  hlabelani ngaso.
23_27_3_Mna Yehova ndingumlondolozi waso; ndiya kusinyela ngamaxesha onke, ndiya kusilondoloza ubusuku nemini, hleze sivelelwe yinto.
23_27_4_Ubushushu abukho kum; akwaba bekukho ubobo namakhakakhaka phambi kwam! Bendiya kugaleleka kuwo ngokulwa, bendiya kuwatshisa kanye.
23_27_5_Okanye mababambelele egwibeni lam, baxolelane nam, ewe,  baxolelane nam.
23_27_6_Ngezayo imihla uYakobi uya kwendelisela iingcambu,  atyatyambe adubule uSirayeli, balizalise lonke elimiweyo ngeziqhamo.
23_27_7_Umbethe ngokubetha kwababethi bakhe na? Mhlawumbi ubulewe ngokubulawa kwababulewe nguye na?
23_27_8_Ekumaleni wabambana naye, walinganisela, wakha uluhlu,  wamgxotha ngomoya wakhe owomeleleyo ngemini yomoya wasempumalanga.
23_27_9_Ngako oko ubugwenxa bukaYakobi buya kucanyagushelwa ngale nto; isiqhamo sonke sokususa isono sakhe soba sesi sokuthi,  awenze onke amatye esibingelelo abe njengamatye ekalika ankumenkume, bangavuki ooAshera nezithixo zelanga.
23_27_10_Ngokuba umzi onqatyisiweyo uwodwa, usisithili esilahliweyo, esishiyiweyo njengentlango. Aya kudla khona amathole, abuthe khona, awadle awagqibe khona amahlamvu aso.
23_27_11_Othi akoma amasebe aso, aphulwe; beze abafazi, bawabase;  kuba asibantu banangqondo aba; ngako oko umenzi wabo akayi kuba namfesane kubo, umbumbi wabo akayi kubababala.
23_27_12_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, abhulise uYehova, athabathele emsingeni woMlambo, ase esihlanjeni saseYiputa, nihlanganiselwe omnye komnye, nina nyana bakaSirayeli.
23_27_13_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, kuvuthelwe isigodlo esikhulu, beze ababelahlekele ezweni laseAsiriya, nababegxothelwe ezweni lamaYiputa, baqubude kuYehova entabeni engcwele eseYerusalem.
23_28_1_Yaha ke, isithsaba sekratshi samanxila akwaEfrayim,  nentyantyambo ebunayo yamakhazikhazi esihombo sakhe,  esemantloko omfula ochumayo wababuleweyo yiwayini!
23_28_2_Yabona, iNkosi inento eyomeleleyo, ekhaliphileyo,  njengesiphango sesichotho, isaqhwithi esibhubhisayo;  njengesiphango esimanzi anamandla akhukulayo, iya kunqumela emhlabeni ngesandla.
23_28_3_Siya kunyashwa ngeenyawo isithsaba sekratshi samanxila akwaEfrayim.
23_28_4_Intyantyambo ebunayo yamakhazikhazi esihombo sakhe,  esemantloko omfula ochumayo, yoba njengekhiwane elilikhikhizela, kungekabi sehlotyeni; athi olibonileyo alibone, aliginye esaliphethe ngesandla.
23_28_5_Ngaloo mini uYehova wemikhosi uya kuba sisithsaba esimakhazikhazi, nesangqawe sokuhomba kumasalela abantu bakhe;
23_28_6_abe ngumoya wesiko kwabahleli esihlalweni sokugweba,  nobugorha kwababuyisela imfazwe esangweni.
23_28_7_Kwanaba ke bayotywe yiwayini, bayahexa sisiselo esinxilisayo; umbingeleli nomprofeti bayotywe sisiselo esinxilisayo, baginywe yiwayini, bayahexa sisiselo esinxilisayo; bayotyiwe bebona imibono, bayagexa begweba ityala.
23_28_8_Kuba zonke izithebe zizele ngumhlanzo oyintshontsho; akukho ndawo ingenawo.
23_28_9_Bathi, Uya kuyala bani na ukuba azi? aqondise bani na udaba? Abalunyulweyo emasini? abancothulweyo ebeleni?
23_28_10_Kuba umthetho uza phezu komthetho, umthetho phezu komthetho; ummiselo phezu kommiselo, ummiselo phezu kommiselo;  intwana apha, intwana phaya.
23_28_11_Inene, uya kuthetha ngentetho ethintithayo nangalulwimi lumbi kwaba bantu;
23_28_12_watshoyo kubo ukuthi, Nantsi indawo yokuphumla, phumzani abatyhafileyo; nantsi indawo yokunyhamnyheka; basuka abavuma ukuva.
23_28_13_Ngoko ke ilizwi likaYehova loba ngumthetho phezu komthetho kubo, umthetho phezu komthetho; ngummiselo phezu kommiselo,  ummiselo phezu kommiselo; intwana apha, intwana phaya: ukuze baye bakhubeke, bawe ngomva, baphuke, barhintyelwe, babanjiswe.
23_28_14_Ngako oko liveni ilizwi likaYehova, madoda agxekayo,  balawuli baba bantu baseYerusalem.
23_28_15_Ngokuba nisithi, Sinqophisene nokufa, sivumelene nelabafileyo; isibetho esingumkhukula, xa singenelayo, asiyi kufika kuthi, kuba amanga siwenze ihlathi lethu, sasithela ngobuxoki.
23_28_16_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Yabona, ndiseke eZiyon ilitye, ilitye locikido, ilitye elinqabileyo lembombo,  loseko olusekiweyo. Okholiweyo akayi kungxama.
23_28_17_Isiko ndolenza intambo yokulinganisa, ubulungisa ndibenze ilothe yokulungelelanisa; isichotho siya kumka nalo ihlathi lamanga, amanzi ayikhukulise indawo yokusithela.
23_28_18_Kuya kucinywa ukunqophisana kwenu nokufa, kungemi ukuvumelana kwenu nelabafileyo; isibetho esingumkhukula, xa singenelayo, sonenza nibe yinto egqushiweyo.
23_28_19_Oku kungenela singenelayo, siya kunisusa; ngokuba imiso ngemiso siya kuningenela, imini nobusuku; kuthi ukuqonda udaba kube kukuhlasimla kodwa.
23_28_20_Inene, umandlalo mfutshane, akukho kunaba; nesigubungelo sincinane, ukuba azisongele kuso.
23_28_21_Ngokuba uya kusuk eme uYehova, njengasentabeni yePeratsim; uya kuguguma, njengasentilini yeGibheyon; ukuba enze isenzo sakhe, isenzo sakhe esisodwa, ukuba asebenze umsebenzi wakhe, umsebenzi wakhe ongaqhelekileyo.
23_28_22_Kaloku ke musani ukugxeka, hleze kuqiniselwe ukubotshelelwa kwenu; ngokokuba isiphelo esiya kulifikela ilizwe lonke sisesimisiweyo ke sagqitywa; ndisivile eNkosini,  uYehova wemikhosi.
23_28_23_Libekeleni indlebe nilive ilizwi lam; yibazeleni indlebe niyive intetho yam.
23_28_24_Umlimi ulima iimini ezi zonke na, ukuba ahlwayele? anqike aqwakanise umhlaba wakhe na?
23_28_25_Akathi na, akuba ebulungelelanisile ubuso bawo, asasaze idile, agcwayele ikumin, akrozise ingqolowa, nerhasi endaweni ephawuliweyo, nespelete ngasemdeni wayo?
23_28_26_Umqeqeshile ngokwesiko uThixo wakhe, wamyala.
23_28_27_Kuba idile ayisizilwa ngempahla yokusizila, ayiqengqelwa ngevili yenqwelo ikumin; itsinwa ngoswazi idile, nekumin ngentonga.
23_28_28_Ingqolowa ikhe ityunyuzwe na? Hayi, akahlali eyisizila,  agoqozise ivili yenqwelo yakhe namahashe akhe phezu kwayo;  akayityumzi.
23_28_29_Nale nto iphuma kuYehova wemikhosi; omacebo angummangaliso, obulumko butshatsheleyo.
23_29_1_Yeha, Ariyeli, Ariyeli, mzi awamisa intente kuwo uDavide!  Yongezelelani umnyaka kumnyaka; mayizunguleze imithendeleko.
23_29_2_Ndiya kuyicutha ke iAriyeli, kubekho ukuncwina noncwino,  ibe njengeAriyeli ke leyo kum.
23_29_3_Ndiya kukurhawula, ndikungqinge ngenqaba, ndikumisele iintango zokukungqinga;
23_29_4_uya kugungxulelwa phantsi, uthethe usemhlabeni, ukuthetha kwakho kudambe, kuvela eluthulini; izwi lakho liphume emhlabeni njengeloneshologu, ukuthetha kwakho kudumzele eluthulini.
23_29_5_Ingxokolo yabakungenelayo iya kuba njengothuli olucolekileyo, ingxokolo yabakungcangcazelisayo ibe njengomququ ophephukayo; ibekho le nto ngephanyazo nangesiquphe.
23_29_6_Kuphuma kuYehova wemikhosi ukuvelelwa kwayo ngeendudumo nangonyikimo lwehlabathi, nesandi esikhulu; ngesaqhwithi nomoya ovuthuzayo, nokulenya komlilo otshisayo.
23_29_7_Yoba njengephupha, njengombono wasebusuku, ingxokolo yeentlanga zonke eziyiphumela umkhosi iAriyeli; zonke eziyiphumela umkhosi, yona nemboniselo yayo, eziyicuthayo.
23_29_8_Koba njengokuthi olambileyo aphuphe, abone esidla, avuke ulambatha umphefumlo wakhe; njengokuthi onxaniweyo aphuphe,  abone esela, avuke, nanko etyhafile, utshoba umphefumlo wakhe;  iya kuba njalo ingxokolo yeentlanga eziyiphumele umkhosi intaba yeZiyon.
23_29_9_Zilazilani ningakhulumi; zimfamekiseni nibe ziimfama.  Bayanxila kungengawayini, bayatalasa kungengasiselo sinxilisayo.
23_29_10_Ngokuba uYehova uthulule phezu kwenu umoya wobuthongo obukhulu, wawabopha amehlo enu, abaprofeti; nabaziintloko benu,  iimboni zenu, uzigubungele.
23_29_11_Kuni umbono weento zonke ube njengamazwi encwadi etywiniweyo, abathi bayinike okwaziyo ukuyifunda, besithi,  Khawulese apha; athi, Ndikhohliwe, kuba itywiniwe;
23_29_12_incwadi inikwe ongakwaziyo ukuyifunda, kuthiwe, Khawulese apha; athi, Andikwazi ukuyifunda incwadi.
23_29_13_Yathi iNkosi, Ngenxa enokuba aba bantu besondela kum ngomlomo wabo, bendizukisa ngemilebe yomlomo wabo, intliziyo yabo beyikhwelelisele kude kum, nokundoyika kwabo kungumthetho wabantu abawufunda nje kodwa:
23_29_14_ngako oko, yabona, ndiya kuphinda ndibaphathe aba bantu ngokubalulekileyo, kubaluleke, kumangaliseke; butshone ubulumko bezilumko zabo, isithele ingqondo yeengqondi zabo.
23_29_15_Yeha ke abangxokayo, besithelisa iqhinga labo kuYehova,  zibe semnyameni izenzo zabo: bathi, Ngubani na osibonayo?  ngubani na osaziyo?
23_29_16_Hayi, ukuphenduka kwenu! Kuya kuthiwa umbumbi unjengodongwe na? into eyenziweyo ithi na kumenzi wayo,  Akandenzanga? into ebunjiweyo ithi na kumbumbi wayo, Akaqondi?
23_29_17_Awusemncinane na umzuzwana, ukuze iLebhanon ibuye ibe yintsimi echumayo, intsimi echumayo kuthiwe lihlathi?
23_29_18_Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini izithulu ziweve amazwi encwadi,  amehlo eemfama abone esithokothokweni nasemnyameni.
23_29_19_Abalulamileyo baya kukwandisa ukuvuya ngoYehova,  abangamahlwempu eluntwini bagcobe ngoyiNgcwele kaSirayeli;
23_29_20_ngokuba esusiwe umngcangcazelisi, ephelile umgxeki,  benqunyulwe bonke abaphaphela ubutshinga;
23_29_21_abamenza umoni umntu ngenxa yelizwi eli, bamthiyele owohlwayayo esangweni, balisunduze ilungisa ngochuku.
23_29_22_Ngako oko utsho uYehova kwindlu kaYakobi, lowo wamkhululayo uAbraham, ukuthi, Ngoku uYakobi akayi kudana,  ngoku ubuso bakhe abuyi kuba luthuthu.
23_29_23_Ngokuba ekuboneni kwakhe, ekuboneni kwabantwana bakhe,  isenzo sezandla zam phakathi kwabo, baya kulingcwalisa igama lam, bamngcwalise oyiNgcwele kaYakobi, bangcangcazele phambi koThixo kaSirayeli.
23_29_24_Baya kukwazi ukuqonda abamoya undwendwayo, bayamkele imfundo abakrokrayo.
23_30_1_Yeha ke, abantwana abaziinjubaqa, utsho uYehova; abenza iqhinga elingaphumi kum, bathelelane ngothelelwano kungengaMoya wam, ukuze bongeze isono kwisono;
23_30_2_abahamba bahle baye eYiputa, bengabuzanga emlonyeni wam,  basabele egwibeni likaFaro, bazimele ngomthunzi weYiputa!
23_30_3_Ngoko ke liya kuthi igwiba likaFaro libe lidano kuni,  nokuzimela ngomthunzi weYiputa kube lihlazo.
23_30_4_Ngokuba abathetheli babo baseTsohan, nabathunywa babo bafike eHanes.
23_30_5_Bonke baya kudana ngabantu abangabanyusiyo,  abangengabokunceda, nabangengabokunyusa; abangabokudanisa,  abangabokuhlazisa kananjalo.
23_30_6_Isihlabo esisingisele kwimvubu yelasezantsi. Ezweni leembandezelo nengcutheko, lengonyamakazi nengonyama, lephimpi,  lenyushu enobuhlungu ephaphazelayo, babethwele ubutyebi babo ngemihlana yamankonyana amaesile, nobuncwane babo ngamalunda eenkamela, besiya kubantu abangenakubanyusa.
23_30_7_AmaYiputa ke aya kunceda ngokungekwanto nangokulambathayo;  ngako oko ndithe ngawo angabagwagwisayo, behleli phantsi bethe tu.
23_30_8_Yiya ngoku, ukrole oko elucwecweni unabo, ukubhale encwadini, kube yinto yemihla ezayo, yanini, yaphakade.
23_30_9_Ngokuba ngabantu abaneenkani, ngoonyana abaxokayo,  ngoonyana abangavumiyo ukusiva isiyalo sikaYehova;
23_30_10_abathi kwiimboni, Ze ningaboni; nakwiinkangeli, Ze ningasikhangeleli izinto ezithe gca; sithetheleni izinto ezigudileyo; khangelani izinto eziyinkohliso;
23_30_11_tyekani endleleni, yithini gu bucala emendweni; menzeni aphele ebusweni bethu oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_30_12_Ngako oko utsho oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli ukuthi, Ngokokuba nilicekisile elo lizwi, nakholosa ngokucudisa nangobugwenxa,  nayama khona:
23_30_13_ngako oko, obo bugwenxa kuni buya kuba njengendawo ekrazukileyo, ewayo, ezimkayo eludongeni olude, ekuqhekeka kwayo kuza ngesiquphe nangephanyazo;
23_30_14_uya kuyiqhekeza njengokuqhekeka komphanda wombumbi,  wakuqotywa ungayekwa, kungafumaneki ekuqotyweni kwawo negophe lokuthabatha umlilo eziko, nelokukha amanzi equleni.
23_30_15_Ngokuba itsho iNkosi, uYehova oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Beniya kusindiswa kukubuya nakukuphumla; ebengabakhoyo amandla enu ngokuzola nangokukholosa; nasuka anavuma.
23_30_16_Ke nathi, Hayi, siya kubaleka ngamahashe; niya kubaleka kambe. Nathi, Siya kukhwela kwiimbaleki; ngenxa yoko baya kuba namendu abanisukelayo.
23_30_17_Niya kubaleka niliwaka, ekhalime emnye; bekhalime bebahlanu, nibaleke nide nisale njengomtshanyane encotsheni yentaba, nanjengebhanile endulini.
23_30_18_Ngako oko uYehova uya kukha alinde, ukuze anibabale; ngako oko uya kukha akhwelele phezulu, ukuze abe nemfesane kuni;  ngokuba nguThixo wogwebo uYehova; hayi, uyolo lwabo bonke abalindele kuye!
23_30_19_Ngokuba abantu aba baya kuhlala eZiyon, eYerusalem; aniyi kuba sabuya nilile; uya kunibabala ngenene ekuvakaleni kokukhala kwenu; akukuva, uya kusabela.
23_30_20_INkosi iya kuninika isonka sobandezelweyo namanzi oxiniweyo, bangabi sazimela abayali bakho, amehlo akho esababona abayali bakho;
23_30_21_iindlebe zakho zive ilizwi ngasemva kwakho, lisithi,  Nantsi indlela; hambani ngayo, nokuba nisinga ekunene, nokuba nisinga ekhohlo.
23_30_22_Nowenza inqambi umaleko wemifanekiso yenu eqingqiweyo yesilivere, nesingxobo semifanekiso yenu etyhidiweyo yegolide;  niya kuyichithachitha njengesishuba; uya kuthi kuyo, Khwelela umke apha.
23_30_23_INkosi yoyinika imvula imbewu yakho, owuhlwayela ngayo umhlaba; nesonka songeniselo lomhlaba sityebe, sibe namafutha;  imfuyo yakho iya kudla ngaloo mini emadlelweni abanzi.
23_30_24_Iinkomo namaesile amatsha asebenza umhlaba, aya kudla umtywakaniselo onetyuwa, oweliweyo ngomnyazi nefolokhwe yokwela.
23_30_25_Phezu kweentaba zonke ezinde naphezu kweenduli zonke eziphakamileyo yoba yimijelo, yimisinga yamanzi, ngemini yembulalo enkulu, ekuweni kweenqaba ezinde.
23_30_26_Ukukhanya kwenyanga kuya kuba njengokukhanya kwelanga,  nokukhanya kwelanga kube kasixhenxe njengokukhanya kweemini ezisixhenxe, ngemini yokubopha kukaYehova ukwaphuka kwabantu bakhe, apholise ukuphalusa kokubetha kwakhe.
23_30_27_Yabona, igama likaYehova liyeza, livela kude, uvutha umsindo wakhe, kuthe shinyi umsi: umlomo wakhe ulephuza amagwebu, ulwimi lwakhe lunjengomlilo otshisayo.
23_30_28_Ukufutha kwakhe kunjengomlambo okhukulayo, obetha emqaleni, ukuze azihluze iintlanga ngentluzo yokuziphanzisa,  umkhala olahlekisayo ube semihlathini yezizwe.
23_30_29_Niya kuba nengoma enjengeyobusuku bokungcwaliswa komthendeleko, novuyo lwentliziyo lube njengabahamba bebetha ugwali, ukuya entabeni kaYehova, eliweni likaSirayeli.
23_30_30_Uya kulivakalisa uYehova izwi lakhe elinendili,  akubonakalise ukuhla kwengalo yakhe kunokujala ngumsindo,  nokulenya komlilo otshisayo, nokuphalazeka kwelifu, nesiphango,  namatye esichotho.
23_30_31_Kuba uAsiriya uya kuqhiphuka umbilini lilizwi likaYehova,  ekubetheni kwakhe ngentonga.
23_30_32_Kuya kuthi konke ukuhamba koswazi lommiselo, aluhlisayo uYehova phezu kwakhe, kube neengqongqo neehadi, kusiliwa naye imfazwe, kujinga ingalo.
23_30_33_Kuba kukade icangcisiwe, ilungisiwe iTofete, ibe ke ilungiselwe ukumkani; yenziwa yanzulu, yabanzi; igoqo layo linomlilo neenkuni ezininzi; ukuphefumla kukaYehova kuliphemba njengomlambo wesulfure.
23_31_1_Yeha, abehla baye eYiputa ukuba bancedwe, abayama ngamahashe, abakholosa ngeenqwelo zokulwa, kuba zininzi,  nangabamahashe, kuba beqine kunene; abangamnoneleli oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli, abangamquqeliyo uYehova!
23_31_2_Ulumkile ke naye; uya kuzisa ububi, angawabeki nxamnye amazwi akhe; uya kusukela phezulu kwindlu yabenzi bobubi,  nakuncedo lwabasebenza ubutshinga.
23_31_3_AmaYiputa angabantu, akaThixo; amahashe awo ayinyama,  akamoya; ukuba uYehova angasolula isandla sakhe, wokhubeka umncedi, awe umncedwa, baphele kunye bonke.
23_31_4_Ngokuba uYehova utshilo kum ukuthi, Njengokuba ingonyama,  nengonyama entsha, isuka igqume phezu kwento eyibambileyo,  yakubizelwa ihlokondiba labalusi, ingaloyiki ilizwi labo,  ingayilahli ngokuxokozela kwabo: kwangokunjalo uya kuhla uYehova wemikhosi, ukuba ayikhuphele umkhosi intaba yeZiyon nenduli yayo.
23_31_5_Njengeentaka zindanda, uya kwenjenjalo uYehova wemikhosi ukuyikhusela iYerusalem, eyikhusela, eyihlangula, eyiconga,  eyisiza.
23_31_6_Buyelani kulowo nimkileyo kuye ngokunzulu, nyana bakaSirayeli.
23_31_7_Ngokuba ngaloo mini baya kucekisa elowo izithixo zakhe zesilivere ezingeni, nezegolide ezingeni, ezinenzele zona izandla zenu, ukuba none ngazo.
23_31_8_Wowa uAsiriya likrele elingelelandoda, limdle ikrele elingelelamntu, asabe phambi kwekrele, amadodana akhe afakwe uviko.
23_31_9_Ingxondorha yakhe yodlula imke ngokunxunguphala, baqhiphuke umbilini abathetheli bakhe, bemke kwibhanile; utsho uYehova,  omlilo useZiyon, oziko liseYerusalem.
23_32_1_Yabona, ukumkani uya kulawula ngokobulungisa, abathetheli bathethele ngokwesiko;
23_32_2_umntu abe njengendawo yokuzimela umoya, neyokusithela esiphangweni; abe njengemijelo yamanzi emqwebedwini,  njengomthunzi wengxondorha enkulu ezweni elibharhileyo.
23_32_3_Akayi kuvingcwa amehlo ababonayo; zibazeke iindlebe zabevayo.
23_32_4_Yoqonda ukwazi intliziyo yabangxamayo, ulwimi lwabathintithayo lungxamise ukuthetha ngokuthe tyhatyhasini.
23_32_5_Isidenge akuyi kuba sathiwa silinene, itshivela akuyi kuthiwa lilinono;
23_32_6_kuba isidenge sithetha ubudenge, intliziyo yaso yenza ubutshinga, ukuze senze ububi; sithetha into yokubhuda ngoYehova, silambathise umphefumlo wolambileyo, simswelise onxaniweyo into eselwayo.
23_32_7_Ubutshivela betshivela bubi; liceba amayelenqe okonakalisa iintsizana ngamazwi obuxoki, naxa ihlwempu lithetha ngokusesikweni.
23_32_8_Inene lona liceba izinto zobunene; lona limi ngezinto zobunene.
23_32_9_Bafazi batyeshileyo, sukani nime; liveni ilizwi lam,  zintombi zingakhathaliyo; yibekeleni indlebe intetho yam.
23_32_10_Iya kuba ziintsuku nokuba ngumnyaka, nigungqe, zintokazi zingakhathaliyo; kuba kuphelile ukuvuna izidiliya; ukubutha iziqhamo akuyi kubakho nakanye.
23_32_11_Gubhani, zintokazi zityeshileyo; gungqani, zintokazi zingakhathaliyo; hlubani nichushuluze, nibhinqe ezirhwexayo emanqeni.
23_32_12_Baya kubetha emabeleni ngenxa yamasimi anqwenelekayo,  nangenxa yemidiliya eneziqhamo.
23_32_13_Kuya kuphuma imithi enameva namakhakakhaka emhlabeni wabantu bakowethu; ewe, naphezu kwezindlu zonke zemihlali kumzi odlamkileyo.
23_32_14_Kuba iingxande ezinde zilahliwe, ingxokolo yomzi ishiyiwe;  iOfele nemboniselo ziza kuba yimiqolomba ngonaphakade, zibe ziindawo zokudlamkela kwamaesile asendle, zibe lidlelo lemihlambi;
23_32_15_ade agalelwe phezu kwethu uMoya ophuma phezulu, isuke intlango ibe yintsimi echumayo, intsimi echumayo kuthiwe lihlathi.
23_32_16_Entlango ke kuya kuma okusesikweni, buhlale ubulungisa entsimini echumayo.
23_32_17_Wothi umsebenzi wobulungisa ube luxolo, nokwenza kobulungisa kube kukuzola nokukholosa ngonaphakade;
23_32_18_abantu bakowethu baya kuhlala esithilini esinoxolo,  eminqubeni yenkoloseko, ezindaweni zokuphumla ezinokonwaba.
23_32_19_Kuya kuphalala izichotho ekuweni kwehlathi, ugungxulelwe umzi endaweni ephantsi.
23_32_20_Hayi, uyolo lwenu bahlwayela ngasemanzini onke, bayekele amanqina enkomo nawe-esile.
23_33_1_Yeha ke, mbhuqi, wena ke ungabhuqwanga; nginingini, wena ke ungatshinizelwanga! Wakugqiba ukubhuqa, uya kubhuqwa;  wakukufeza ukunginiza, uya kunginizelwa.
23_33_2_Yehova, sibabale, sithembele kuwe; yiba yingalo yabo imiso ngemiso; yiba lusindiso kuthi ngexesha lembandezelo.
23_33_3_Ziyaphalaphaliswa izizwe lilizwi lengxokolo,  ziyaphangalaliswa iintlanga kukuphakama kwakho.
23_33_4_Ohlanganiswa emke amaxhoba enu njengokuhlanganisa kweenkumbi ezinqunquthayo, bawaququzelele njengokuququzela komqikela.
23_33_5_UYehova uphakamile, ngokuba ehleli phezulu; uyizalisile iZiyon ngokusesikweni nangobulungisa.
23_33_6_Kuya kubakho ukuzimaseka kwamaxesha akho, nobutyebi bosindiso, nobulumko, nokwazi; ukoyika uYehova bubuncwane bakhe.
23_33_7_Yabona, iinjengele zabo ziyakhala ngaphandle; abathunywa boxolo balila ngokukrakra.
23_33_8_Iindlela azihanjwa; umhambi uphelile; uwaphule umnqophiso,  ucekise imizi, akakhathalela mntu.
23_33_9_Ilizwe lenza isijwili, lintshwenyile; ineentloni iLebhanon,  ishwabene; iSharon isuke yaba njengenkqantosi; ivuthulula amagqabi iBhashan neKarmele.
23_33_10_Kungokunje ndiya kusuka ndime, utsho uYehova; kungokunje ndiya kuphakama; kungokunje ndiya kuzinyusa.
23_33_11_Niya kumitha isikhotha, nizale iindiza; ukufutha kwenu ngumlilo oya kunidla.
23_33_12_Izizwe zoba yimitshiso yekalika, zoba yimithi enameva ehlahliweyo, ibaswe umlilo.
23_33_13_Yivani, nina bakude, endikwenzileyo: nibazi ubugorha bam,  nina basondeleyo.
23_33_14_Bayankwantya eZiyon aboni, abaziintshembenxa babanjwe kukuthuthumela; bathi, Ngubani na ke kuthi onokuphambukela emlilweni odlayo? ngubani na ke kuthi onokuphambukela emalangatyeni angunaphakade?
23_33_15_Ohamba ngobulungisa, othetha okuthe tye, ocekisa inzuzo yokucudisa, ovuthulula isandla sakhe singaphathi sicengo,  ovingca iindlebe zakhe zingevi ngegazi, ocima amehlo akhe angakhangeli entweni embi:
23_33_16_nguye oya kuhlala ezindaweni eziphezulu. Iimboniselo zeengxondorha yingxonde yakhe; isonka sakhe usinikiwe, amanzi akhe ahleli ekho.
23_33_17_Amehlo akho aya kumkhangela ukumkani ebuhleni bakhe; aya kulibona ilizwe elisingise kude.
23_33_18_Intliziyo yakho iya kucamanga ngesothuso, ithi, Uphi na umbali? uphi na umlinganiseli? uphi na umbali weenqaba ezinde?
23_33_19_Abantu abaziingwanyalala akuyi kubabona: abantu abantetho inzulu, ingavakaliyo, abalulwimi luthintithayo lungenakuqondeka.
23_33_20_Khangela iZiyon, umzi wemithendeleko yethu. Amehlo akho aya kuyibona iYerusalem, isithili esinokonwaba, iyintente engafuduswayo, ezikhonkwane zingancothulwayo naphakade,  ezintambo zonke zingaqhawukiyo.
23_33_21_Ewe, ngenxa yethu ikhona ingangamsha uYehova; yindawo enemilambo, enemijelo ebanzi ngeenxa zombini; akuyi kuhamba sinqanawa sibheqwayo apho, kungaweli khona nqanawa iyingangamsha.
23_33_22_Kuba umgwebi wethu nguYehova, ummisimthetho wethu nguYehova, ukumkani wethu nguYehova; uya kusisindisa yena.
23_33_23_Zityeketyeke iintambo zakho, azilubambi useko lwemasti yazo, aziyitwabululi iseyile; kuya kwandula kwabiwe amaxhoba amaninzi athinjiweyo, neziqhwala ziphange okuphangiweyo.
23_33_24_Akayi kuthi ummi wakhona, Ndiyafa; abantu abahleliyo khona babuxolelwe ubugwenxa babo.
23_34_1_Sondelani, zintlanga, nive; nibaze iindlebe, zizwe; malive ihlabathi nenzaliseko yalo; elimiweyo, neziveliso zonke eziveliswa lilo.
23_34_2_Ngokuba uburhalarhume bukaYehova buphezu kweentlanga zonke,  nobushushu bakhe buphezu komkhosi wazo wonke; uzisingele phantsi, uzinikele ekusikweni.
23_34_3_Baya kulahlwa ababuleweyo bazo, nezidumbu zabo kunyuke ukunuka kwazo, kunyibilike iintaba ligazi lazo.
23_34_4_Uya kuvunda wonke umkhosi wezulu, lisongwe izulu njengencwadi, wonke umkhosi walo ubune njengokubuna kwegqabi emdiliyeni, njengokubuna kwegqabi emkhiwaneni.
23_34_5_Ngokuba lisele lahlutha ezulwini ikrele lam; yabona, lihla phezu koEdom, naphezu kwabantu endibasingele phantsi, ibe ngumgwebo.
23_34_6_Ikrele likaYehova lizele ligazi, lityetyiswe ngamanqatha,  ligazi leemvana neleebhokhwe, ngamanqatha ezintso zeenkunzi zeegusha; ngokuba uYehova unombingelelo eBhotsera, nokuxhela okukhulu ezweni lakwaEdom.
23_34_7_Kuya kuhla inqu kunye nazo, iinkunzi ezintsha kunye neenkabi, lisele lihluthe ilizwe labo ligazi, lutyetyiswe uthuli lwabo ngamanqatha.
23_34_8_Kuba uYehova unomhla wempindezelo, unomnyaka wembuyekezo,  wokuthethelela iZiyon.
23_34_9_Yoguquka imilambo yabo ibe yitela, uthuli lwabo lube yisulfure, ilizwe labo libe yitela etshayo.
23_34_10_Aliyi kucinywa ubusuku nemini; umsi walo uya kunyuka ngonaphakade; liya kuchithakala kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana;  liya kuhlala lihleli lodwa, kungabikho ucanda kulo.
23_34_11_Loba lilifa lengcwangube nokhwalimanzi, kuhlale kulo ifubesi nehlungulu, olule phezu kwalo ulutya lokulinganisa lwakwanyanyeni, nelothe yokulungelelanisa yakwalubala.
23_34_12_Abanumzana baloakuyi kuba sabakho babiza bukumkani kubo, bonke abathetheli balo babe yinto engekhoyo.
23_34_13_Iingxande zalo ezinde ziya kumila into enameva, amarhawu namakhakakhaka ezinqabeni zalo ezinkulu, libe sisikhundla seempungutye nedlelo leenciniba.
23_34_14_Kohlangabezana amarhamncwa omqwebedu neempungutye, into elixhonti ikhawulelane nowayo; ewe, into yasebusuku iya konwaba khona, izifumanele ukuphumla.
23_34_15_Kulapho iya kwenzela khona indlu inyoka ejubayo, izale amaqanda, ifukame emthunzini khona; ewe, khona apho baya kubutha oontloyiya, elowo nowabo.
23_34_16_Funani encwadini kaYehova, nilese. Akukho nanye kuzo ezo zinto iya kusala, eya kusilela kuwayo; ngokuba ngumlomo wam oziwisele umthetho, ngumoya wawo ozibuthileyo.
23_34_17_Nguye ozirholele iqashiso, isandla sakhe sazabela lona ngolutya lokulinganisa; ziya kulidla ilifa kudekuse ephakadeni,  zihlale kulo kwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana.
23_35_1_Inemihlali intlango nomqwebedu; iyagcoba inkqantosi,  iyadubula njengomfiyo.
23_35_2_Iyatyatyamba, ithi rhoqo; iyagcoba, ewe, iyagcoba,  imemelele, inikwe ubuqaqawuli beLebhanon, ubungangamela beKarmele neSharon; ezo ndawo ziya kububona ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, ubungangamela boThixo wethu.
23_35_3_Yomelezani izandla eziwileyo, niwaqinise amadolo agexayo.
23_35_4_Yithini kwabantliziyo zingxamayo, Yomelelani, ningoyiki.  Yabonani, uThixo wenu uyeza enempindezelo, enembuyekezo kaThixo; uya kuza yena anisindise.
23_35_5_Aya kuvulwa amehlo eemfama, zivulwe iindlebe zezithulu;
23_35_6_size sitsibe njengexhama isiqhwala, lumemelele ulwimi lwesidenge; ngokuba kuya kugqobhoka amanzi entlango, nemilambo enkqantosini;
23_35_7_isanga sibe lidike, neendawo ezinxaniweyo zimpompoze amanzi. Esikhundleni sempungutye, apho ibuthuma khona, kuya kuba butyani neengcongolo nemikhanzi.
23_35_8_Kuya kubakho umendo khona, kubekho indlela, kuthiwe ukubizwa kwayo, yindlela engcwele le. Akuyi kudlula nto iyinqambi ngayo; yeyabo yona: abahamba loo ndlela nabazizihula abayi kulahleka kuyo.
23_35_9_Akuyi kubakho ngonyama khona, aliyi kuqabela khona irhamncwa eliqwengayo; aliyi kufunyanwa khona; kuya kuhamba khona abakhululwe ngokuhlawulelwa;
23_35_10_abakhululwa bakaYehova babuye beze eZiyon bememelela;  benovuyo olungunaphakade phezu kweentloko zabo; baya kufumana imihlali nemivuyo, sisabe isingqala nosizi.
23_36_1_Kwathi ngomnyaka weshumi elinesine wokumkani uHezekiya,  kwenyuka uSaneribhe ukumkani waseAsiriya, waya kuyo yonke imizi yakwaYuda enqatyisiweyo, wayithimba.
23_36_2_Ukumkani waseAsiriya wasusa uRabheshake eLakishe, ukuba aye eYerusalem kukumkani uHezekiya, enempi enzima. Wafika wema emjelweni wechibi lasentla, ongasemendweni wentsimi yomsuki weengubo.
23_36_3_Kwaphuma kwaya kuye uEliyakim unyana kaHilekiya, umphathi wendlu, noShebhena umbhali, noYowa unyana ka-Asafu, umkhumbuzi wezinto zakomkhulu.
23_36_4_Wathi kubo uRabheshake, Khanithi kuHezekiya, Utsho ukumkani omkhulu, ukumkani waseAsiriya, ukuthi, Yeyani na le nkoloseko ukholose ngayo?
23_36_5_Ndithi mna, lilizwi lomlomo wodwa iqhinga lakho nobugorha bakho bemfazwe; okungoku ke ukholose ngabani na, ugwilike kum nje?
23_36_6_Uyabona, ukholose ngaloo msimelelo wengcongolo evikivekileyo, iYiputa, ethi, othe wayama ngayo, ingene esandleni sakhe, imhlabe; unjalo uFaro ukumkani weYiputa kubo bonke abakholose ngaye.
23_36_7_Ke ukuba uthi kum, Sikholose ngoYehova uThixo wethu,  ndithi, Asinguye na lo uziganga nezibingelelo azisusileyo uHezekiya, wathi kumaYuda nakwiYerusalem, Ize niqubude phambi kwesi sibingelelo sodwa?
23_36_8_Khawubekelane kaloku nenkosi yam, ukumkani waseAsiriya;  ndokunika amawaka amabini amahashe, ukuba unako ngecala lakho ukukhupha abakhweli bokukhwela kuwo.
23_36_9_Wothini na ukubujika ubuso benkosana enye, yakubo abancinane babakhonzi benkosi yam, ukholose ngeYiputa,  ngeenqwelo zokulwa nangabamahashe?
23_36_10_Ngokunje ndinyuke ndeza kulonakalisa eli lizwe, ndingenaye uYehova, yini na? UYehova uthe kum, Nyuka uye kweli lizwe,  ulonakalise.
23_36_11_Bathi ooEliyakim noShebhena noYowa kuRabheshake,  Khawuthethe kubakhonzi bakho ngesiAram, kuba sisiva sona; musa ukuthetha kuthi ngesiYuda ezindlebeni zabantu abaseludongeni.
23_36_12_Wathi uRabheshake, Inkosi yam indithume ukuba ndiwathethe la mazwi enkosini yakho nakuwe, yini na? Asikula madoda ahleli eludongeni yini na, ukuze adle ilindle lawo, asele umchamo wawo nani?
23_36_13_Wema uRabheshake, wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu ngesiYuda,  wathi, Waveni amazwi okumkani omkhulu, okumkani waseAsiriya.
23_36_14_Uthi ukumkani, Makanganilukuhli uHezekiya, ngokuba akayi kuba nako ukunihlangula.
23_36_15_Makanganikholosisi ngoYehova uHezekiya, esithi, Inene, uya kusihlangula uYehova; lo mzi awusayi kunikelwa esandleni sokumkani waseAsiriya.
23_36_16_Musani ukumphulaphula uHezekiya, ngokuba utsho ukumkani waseAsiriya ukuthi, Xolisanani nam, niphume nize kum, nidle elowo umdiliya wakhe, elowo umkhiwane wakhe, nisele elowo amanzi equla lakhe;
23_36_17_ndide ndize ndinise ezweni elinjengelizwe lenu, ilizwe lengqolowa newayini entsha, ilizwe lesonka nezidiliya.
23_36_18_Ize nilumke hleze aninyange uHezekiya, esithi, UYehova uya kusihlangula. Oothixo beentlanga balihlangule na elowo ilizwe lakhe esandleni sokumkani waseAsiriya?
23_36_19_Baphi na oothixo baseHamati neArpadi? baphi na oothixo baseSefarvayim, ukuba bangabi balihlangule elakwaSamari esandleni sam?
23_36_20_Nguwuphi na koothixo bonke bala mazwe olihlanguleyo ilizwe lakhe esandleni sam, ukuba ade uYehova ayihlangule iYerusalem esandleni sam?
23_36_21_Bathi tu, abamphendula nazwi; ngokuba umthetho wokumkani wona ubusithi, Nize ningamphenduli.
23_36_22_Weza ke uEliyakim unyana kaHilekiya, umphathi wendlu,  noShebhena umbhali, noYowa unyana ka-Asafu, umkhumbuzi wezinto zakomkhulu, kuHezekiya, bezikrazule iingubo zabo, bamxelela amazwi kaRabheshake.
23_37_1_Kwathi, akukuva okukumkani uHezekiya, wazikrazula iingubo zakhe wazigquma ngezirhwexayo, wangena endlwini kaYehova.
23_37_2_Wathuma uEliyakim umphathi wendlu, noShebhena umbhali,  namadoda amakhulu ababingeleli, bezigqume ngezirhwexayo,  kuIsaya umprofeti, unyana ka-Amotsi.
23_37_3_Bathi kuye, Utsho uHezekiya ukuthi, Le mini yimini yembandezelo neyokohlwaya neyogibo; ngokuba abantwana baze kufika emlonyeni wesizalo, tu ke amandla okuzala.
23_37_4_Mhlawumbi uYehova uThixo wakho angaweva amazwi kaRabheshake, othunyiweyo ngukumkani waseAsiriya inkosi yakhe,  ukungcikiva uThixo ophilileyo; amohlwaye ngenxa yamazwi lawo awavileyo uYehova uThixo wakho; wena uphakamise umthandazo ngenxa yamasalela asekhoyo.
23_37_5_Baya ke abakhonzi bokumkani uHezekiya kuIsaya.
23_37_6_Wathi uIsaya kubo, Nothi kwinkosi yenu, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Musa ukoyikiswa ngamazwi owavileyo, abandinyelise ngawo abafana bakwakumkani waseAsiriya.
23_37_7_Yabona, ndimfaka umoya, ukuba eve udaba olubi, abuye ke aye ezweni lakhe, ndimwise ngekrele ezweni lakhe.
23_37_8_Wabuya ke uRabheshake, wamfumana ukumkani waseAsiriya esilwa neLibhena; ngokuba ebevile ukuba undulukile eLakishe.
23_37_9_Weva kusithiwa ngoTiraka ukumkani wakwaKushi, Uphumile esiza kulwa nawe. Weva ke, wathumela abathunywa kuHezekiya esithi,
23_37_10_Notsho kuHezekiya ukumkani wakwaYuda ukuthi,  Makangakulukuhli uThixo wakho, okholose ngaye wena, usithi,  Ayisayi kunikelwa iYerusalem esandleni sokumkani waseAsiriya.
23_37_11_Uyabona, ukuvile wena abakwenzileyo ookumkani baseAsiriya kumazwe onke, ukuba bawaphanzisa; uya kuhlangulwa na ke wena?
23_37_12_Oothixo beentlanga ke bazihlangula na ezo,  bazitshabalalisayo oobawo, iGozan, neHaran, neRetsefe, noonyana bakaEden ababeseTelasare?
23_37_13_Uphi na ukumkani weHamati, nokumkani weArpadi, nokumkani womzi waseSefarvayim, neHena, neIva?
23_37_14_Wawathabatha uHezekiya amaphepha encwadi esandleni sabathunywa, wawafunda; wenyuka waya endlwini kaYehova,  wayaneka uHezekiya phambi koYehova.
23_37_15_Wathandaza uHezekiya kuYehova esithi,
23_37_16_Yehova wemikhosi, Thixo wakwaSirayeli, wena uhleli phakathi kweekerubhi, unguye uThixo wena wedwa kwizikumkani zonke zehlabathi; wena ulenzile izulu nehlabathi.
23_37_17_Thoba indlebe yakho, Yehova, uve; vula amehlo akho,  Yehova, ubone; uweve onke amazwi kaSaneribhe, awathumele ukungcikiva uThixo ophilileyo.
23_37_18_Okunene, Yehova, ookumkani baseAsiriya baziphanzisile zonke iintlanga namazwe azo;
23_37_19_babanikela oothixo bazo emlilweni, kuba bebengethixo,  bebengumsebenzi wezandla zomntu, umthi nelitye;  babatshabalalisa ke.
23_37_20_Ke ngoko, Yehova Thixo wethu, sisindise esandleni sakhe,  zazi zonke izikumkani zehlabathi, ukuba wena unguYehova wedwa.
23_37_21_Wathumela ke uIsaya unyana ka-Amotsi kuHezekiya, esithi,  Utsho uYehova, uThixo wakwaSirayeli, ukuthi, Okuthandazeleyo kum, ngokubhekisele kuSaneribhe ukumkani waseAsiriya,  ndikuvile.
23_37_22_Lilo eli ilizwi alithethayo uYehova ngaye, Intombi eyintombi uZiyon iyakudela, iyakugculela; intombi uYerusalem ihlunguzela intloko emva kwakho.
23_37_23_Ngubani na lo umngcikivileyo, umnyelisileyo? Ngubani na lo umphakamisele ilizwi lakho, ukude uwaphakamisele amehlo akho phezulu nje? NgoyiNgcwele wakwaSirayeli.
23_37_24_Uyingcikivile iNkosi ngabakhonzi bakho, wathi, Ngobuninzi beenqwelo zam zokulwa ndiqabele mna ezintlomeni zeentaba,  emathambekeni eLebhanon; ndiyigawule imisedare yayo emide kakhulu nemisipres yayo enyuliweyo; ndifike kweyokuphela indawo yayo ephezulu, ehlathini lentsimi yayo echumayo.
23_37_25_Ndimbe, ndasela amanzi mna; ndiya kuyomisa ngentende yeenyawo zam yonke imijelo yoMnayile oseYiputa.
23_37_26_Akuvanga na? Kwakude ndakwenza oku, kwangemihla yamandulo ndakubumba; ndikufikisile, kwenzeka ngoku ukuba uyikhahlele phantsi imizi enqatyisiweyo, ibe yingxakangxaka yemiwewe.
23_37_27_Abemi bayo banqumka izandla, baqhiphuka umbilini, badana,  baba ngumfuno wasendle, nohlaza, utyani obuphezu kwendlu,  nentsimi yengqolowa engekabi mvila.
23_37_28_Ke ukuhlala kwakho, nokuphuma kwakho, nokungena kwakho,  ndiyakwazi, nokuguguma kwakho ngam.
23_37_29_Ngenxa yokuguguma kwakho ngam, nangenxa yokutyesha kwakho okunyuke kweza ezindlebeni zam, ndiya kufaka ikhonkco lam empumlweni yakho, nomkhala wam emlonyeni wakho, ndikubuyise ngendlela oweza ngayo.
23_37_30_Ke kaloku nguwo lo umqondiso kuwe: lo mnyaka kodliwa ummilela, ngomnyaka wesibini kodliwa isihlabane; ngomnyaka wesithathu nohlwayela nivune, nityale izidiliya, nidle iziqhamo zazo.
23_37_31_Abasindileyo bendlu yakwaYuda, abo baseleyo, baya kubuya bendelisele iingcambu phantsi, benze iziqhamo phezulu.
23_37_32_Ngokuba kuya kuphuma eYerusalem abaseleyo nabasindileyo entabeni yeZiyon. Ubukhwele bukaYehova wemikhosi buya kukwenza oko.
23_37_33_Ngako oko utsho uYehova ngokubhekisele kukumkani waseAsiriya, ukuthi, Akayi kungena kulo mzi, akayi kutola notolo kuwo, akayi kuwuzela enengweletshetshe, akayi kuwufumbela ludonga lakungqinga.
23_37_34_Uya kubuya ngendlela aweza ngayo; akasayi kungena kulo mzi; utsho uYehova.
23_37_35_Ndiya kuwukhusela lo mzi, ndiwusindise ngenxa yam,  nangenxa kaDavide, umkhonzi wam.
23_37_36_Kwaphuma ke isithunywa sikaYehova, saxabela emkhosini wama-Asiriya ikhulu elinamanci asibhozo anesihlanu amawaka.  Bavuka kusasa, nango ezizidumbu ezifileyo onke.
23_37_37_Wanduluka, wahamba; wabuya uSaneribhe ukumkani waseAsiriya, wahlala eNineve.
23_37_38_Kwathi, enqula endlwini kaNiseroki uthixo wakhe, bamxabela ngekrele ooAdrameleki noSharetsere, oonyana bakhe. Baza basabela ezweni laseArarati. UEsar-hadon, unyana wakhe, waba ngukumkani esikhundleni sakhe.
23_38_1_Ngaloo mihla wayesifa UHezekiya, eza kufa. Waya umprofeti kuye, uIsaya unyana ka-Amotsi; wathi kuye, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Yolela indlu yakho, ngokuba uya kufa wena, akuyi kuphila.
23_38_2_UHezekiya wabubhekisa eludongeni ubuso bakhe, wathandaza kuYehova, wathi,
23_38_3_Khawukhumbule, ndiyakukhunga, Yehova, okokuba ndihambe phambi kwakho ngokunyaniseka nangentliziyo ephelelisileyo,  ndakwenza okulungileyo emehlweni akho. Watsho uHezekiya isililo esikhulu.
23_38_4_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuIsaya, lisithi,
23_38_5_Yiya uthi kuHezekiya, Utsho uYehova, uThixo kaDavide uyihlo, ukuthi, Ndiwuvile umthandazo wakho, ndizibonile iinyembezi zakho. Uyabona, ndiya kongezelela kwimihla yakho ishumi elinesihlanu leminyaka.
23_38_6_Ndiya kukuhlangula wena nalo mzi esandleni sokumkani waseAsiriya, ndiwukhusele lo mzi.
23_38_7_Nangu ke umqondiso kuwe, uphuma kuYehova, ukuba uya kulenza uYehova elo lizwi alithethileyo.
23_38_8_Uyabona, ndiyasibuyisa isithunzi sezinyuko, esehlayo esinyukweni sika-Ahazi ngelanga, ndisibuyisa umva izinyuko ezilishumi. Labuya ke ilanga izinyuko ezilishumi ezinyukweni elibe lihlile ngazo.
23_38_9_Umbhalo kaHezekiya ukumkani wakwaYuda, oko ebesifa, waza waphila:
23_38_10_Ndathi mna, yakubon ukuba ithe cwaka imihla yam, mandimke ndiye emasangweni elabafileyo; Ndivelelwe, ndayihluthwa eseleyo iminyaka yam.
23_38_11_Ndathi, Andiyi kumbona uYa, uYa ezweni labaphilileyo;  Andiyi kuba samkhangela umntu, ndikubemi belabangasekhoyo.
23_38_12_Umnquba wam uza kuncothulwa, ufuduswe umke kum,  njengentente yomalusi; Ndibusongile njengomluki ubomi bam;  unditsheca ezintsingeni. Uya kundigqibela ngosuku olunye.
23_38_13_Ndazizolisa kwada kwasa; njengengonyama, wenjenjalo ukuwaphula onke amathambo am. Uya kundigqibela ngosuku olunye.
23_38_14_Njengehlankomo, njengendwe, ndenjenjalo ukukrikriza,  Ndalila njengevukuthu; aphela amehlo am kukubheka phezulu:  Yehova, ndifingekile, ndimele.
23_38_15_Ndothini na ukubulela, ethethile nje kum, wenza nokwenza?  Mandicothoze yonke iminyaka yam eya kuza phezu kobukrakra bomphefumlo wam.
23_38_16_Nkosi yam, babuya baphile zezo zinto abantu, Bukuzo kanye ubomi bomoya wam: Wondiphilisa ke, ndidlise ubomi.
23_38_17_Yabona, baba lusindiso kum ubukrakra obukhulu. Wena ke ngokundithanda, wawurhola umphefumlo wam esihogweni sokonakala;  Ngokuba izono zam uzilahlile emva komhlana wakho.
23_38_18_Kuba elabafileyo alinakukuncoma, ukufa akunakukudumisa;  Abahla baye emhadini abakulindele ukunyanisa kwakho.
23_38_19_Ophilileyo, ophilileyo nguye owokuncoma, njengam nje namhla. Uyise uya kukwazisa ukunyanisa kwakho koonyana.
23_38_20_UYehova uza kundisindisa; Ngoko ke sozibetha iihadi zethu Yonke imihla yobomi bethu, endlwini kaYehova.
23_38_21_Wathi uIsaya, mabathabathe isicumba samakhiwane, basibeke ethumbeni, ukuze aphile.
23_38_22_Wathi uHezekiya, Uyintoni na umqondiso wokuba ndiya kunyuka ndiye endlwini kaYehova?
23_39_1_Ngelo xesha uMerodaki-bhaladan, unyana kaBhaladan, ukumkani waseBhabheli, wathumela incwadi nomnikelo kuHezekiya; kuba wayevile ukuba ubesifa, wabuya wachacha.
23_39_2_Wavuya uHezekiya ngabo, wababonisa indlu yakhe yezinto aziqwebileyo: isilivere, negolide, nobulawu, neoli entle,  nendlu yonke yezixhobo zakhe, nento yonke ebikho ebuncwaneni bakhe. Akwabakho nto endlwini yakhe nasekulawuleni kwakhe konke, angababonisanga yona uHezekiya.
23_39_3_Waya uIsaya umprofeti kukumkani uHezekiya, wathi kuye,  Atheni na la madoda? avele ngaphi na ukuza kuwe? Wathi uHezekiya, Avele ezweni elikude eBhabheli, esiza kum.
23_39_4_Wathi ke, Abone ntoni na endlwini yakho? Wathi uHezekiya,  Abone into yonke esendlwini yam; akubangakho nto ndingababonisanga yona ebuncwaneni bam.
23_39_5_Wathi uIsaya kuHezekiya, Live ke ilizwi likaYehova wemikhosi.
23_39_6_Uyabona, kuza imihla, eya kuthi yonke into esendlwini yakho, nento abayiqwebayo ooyihlo, kwada kwayile mini,  ithwalelwe eBhabheli, kungasali nto; utsho uYehova.
23_39_7_Baya kuthabatha nakoonyana bakho abaya kuphuma kuwe, oya kubazala, babe ngababusi ebhotweni lokumkani waseBhabheli.
23_39_8_Wathi uHezekiya kuIsaya, Lilungile ilizwi likaYehova,  olithethileyo. Wathi, Inene, kuya kubakho uxolo nozingiso ngeyam imihla.
23_40_1_Thuthuzelani, bathuthuzeleni abantu bam, utsho uThixo wenu.
23_40_2_Thethani kakuhle neYerusalem, nimemeze kuyo, nithi kuzalisekile ukuphuma kwayo umkhosi; nithi, buhlawulelwe ubugwenxa bayo; nithi, yamkeliswe esandleni sikaYehova okuphindwe kabini kwizono zayo zonke.
23_40_3_Yivani omemezayo, esithi, Yigeceni entlango indlela kaYehova; tyenenezelani uThixo wethu umendo enkqantosini.
23_40_4_Yonke imifula mayinyuswe, zonke iintaba neenduli zigungxulwe; iindawo ezimagqagala zibe zithabazi, nemixawuka ibe ziintili;
23_40_5_butyhileke ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, ibubone inyama yonke kunye; ngokuba uthethile umlomo kaYehova.
23_40_6_Ilizwi lothile lathi, Memeza. Wathi yena, Ndimemeze ntoni na? Yithi, Yonke inyama ibutyani, bonke ubuhle bayo bunjengentyantyambo yasendle.
23_40_7_Buyoma utyani, iyabuna intyantyambo; ngokuba umoya kaYehova uvuthuza kuyo; inene, abantu babutyani.
23_40_8_Buyoma utyani, iyabuna intyantyambo; ke lona ilizwi likaThixo wethu liya kuma ngonaphakade.
23_40_9_Wena Ziyon, mshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo, nyuka uye entabeni ephakamileyo; wena Yerusalem, mshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo, liphakamise ngamandla ilizwi lakho, phakamisa ungoyiki. Yithi kwimizi yakwaYuda, Nanko uThixo wenu!
23_40_10_Uyabona, iNkosi uYehova iya kuza, ingowomeleleyo, ingalo yayo iyilawulela. Uyabona, umvuzo wayo inawo, nomsebenzi wayo uphambi kwayo.
23_40_11_Iya kuwalusa umhlambi wayo njengomalusi; iya kuwabutha ngeengalo zayo amatakane, iwathwale ngesifuba sayo, izithundeze ezanyisayo.
23_40_12_Ngubani na olinganise amanzi la entendeni yesandla sakhe,  walilungisa izulu ngomoluko weminwe, walukhongozela uthuli lomhlaba ngomlinganiselo, wazilinganisa iintaba ngesilinganiso,  neenduli ngesikali?
23_40_13_Ngubani na owalungisa uMoya kaYehova, waba yindoda emcebisayo, wamazisa?
23_40_14_Wacebisana nabani na owamqondisayo, wamfundisa umendo wesiko, wamfundisa ukwazi, wamazisa indlela yokuqonda?
23_40_15_Yabona, iintlanga zibalelwa ekubeni zinjengethontsi emphandeni, njengesuntswana esikalini. Yabona, iziqithi zinjengothuli oluqhaphukayo.
23_40_16_ILebhanon ayilingene kubaswa, neenyamakazi zayo azilingene kubalidini elinyukayo.
23_40_17_Zonke iintlanga zinjengento engento phambi kwakhe; kuye zibalelwa ekuthini asizanto, ziluchuku.
23_40_18_Ningamfanekisa ke nabani na uThixo, ninxulumise mfanekiselo mni na naye?
23_40_19_Umfanekiso oqingqiweyo utyhidwa yingcibi, awaleke ngegolide umnyibilikisi, awunyibilikisele imixokelelwane yesilivere.
23_40_20_Okhohliweyo ngumrhumo ukhetha umthi ongenakubola;  uzifunela ingcibi eyaziyo, ukuba imlungisele umfanekiso oqingqiweyo ongayi kushukuma.
23_40_21_Anazi na? aniva na? anixelelwanga na kwasentloko?  aniqondanga na kwasekusekweni kwehlabathi?
23_40_22_Ngulo uhlala phezu kwesazinge sehlabathi, abemi balo ke benjengemicikwane; ulowaneka izulu njengeqhiya eliyasuyasu,  walitwabulula njengentente yokuhlala;
23_40_23_ulozenza izidwangube ukuba zingabi nto, abagwebi behlabathi abenze babe luchuku.
23_40_24_Bengekathi ukutyalwa, bengekathi ukuhlwayelwa, singekathi ukwendelisela iingcambu emhlabeni isiphunzi sabo,  uselebafuthela bome, ubathabathe umoya ovuthuzayo njengomququ.
23_40_25_Niya kundifanisa nabani na, ndilingane naye? utsho oyiNgcwele.
23_40_26_Phakamiselani amehlo enu phezulu, nibone: ngubani na owadala ezi zinto? Ngulokhupha umkhosi wazo ngamaqela, uzibiza zonke ziphela ngamagama, ngenxa yobukhu bokomelela, ekhaliphile ngamandla; akusali nanye.
23_40_27_Yini na ukuba uthi, Yakobiuthethe uthi, Sirayeli Indlela yam isithele kuYehova, nebango lam lidlule kuThixo wam?
23_40_28_Akwazi na? akuvanga na, ukuba uThixo ongunaphakade nguYehova, tyhafi, akadinwa; ayinakugocwagocwa ingqondo yakhe.
23_40_29_Umnika otyhafileyo amandla, ongenakomelela amandisele ukuqina.
23_40_30_Namadodana angatyhafa adinwe, nabafana bakhubeke bawe;
23_40_31_ke bona abathembele kuYehova baya kuhlaziyeka emandleni;  banyuke ngamaphiko njengeenkozi. Baya kugidima bangadinwa,  bahambe bangatyhafi.
23_41_1_Yithini tu phambi kwam, ziqithi; izizwe mazihlaziye amandla; mazize zisondele, zandule zithethe; masiqubisane ematyaleni.
23_41_2_Ngubani na ovuse empumalanga lowo ukhawulelwa bubulungisa ezinyaweni zakhe? Unikela iintlanga phambi kwakhe, unyathela ookumkani, ubanikela ekreleni lakhe njengothuli, esaphetheni sakhe njengomququ ophetshethwayo.
23_41_3_Uyabasukela, udlula enoxolo ngomendo abengawuhambanga ngeenyawo zakhe.
23_41_4_Ngubani na okusebenzileyo wakwenza oko, obiza izizukulwana kwasentloko? Ndim, mna Yehova, ndingowokuqala; nakwabangasemva ndikwanguye.
23_41_5_Iziqithi zabona zoyika, iziphelo zehlabathi zagubha,  zasondela, zeza.
23_41_6_Umntu wamnceda ummelwane wakhe, wathi kumzalwana wakhe,  Yomelela.
23_41_7_Ingcibi yomeleza umnyibilikisi; ogudisayo ngesando womeleza obetha esikhandelweni, esithi, Kulungile; wasiqinisa ngezikhonkwane, ukuba singashukumi isithixo.
23_41_8_Ke wena Sirayeli, mkhonzi wam Yakobi, wena ndakunyulayo,  mbewu ka-Abraham umthandi wam;
23_41_9_endakubambayo kwaseziphelweni zehlabathi, endakubizayo kwasemacaleni alo; endathi kuwe, Ungumkhonzi wam wena,  ndikunyule, andikucekisile;
23_41_10_musa ukoyika, kuba ndinawe mna; musa ukubhekabheka, kuba ndinguThixo wakho; ndikukhaliphisile, ewe, ndikuncedile,  ndikuxhasile ngesandla sam sokunene sobulungisa bam.
23_41_11_Yabona, baya kudana bahlazeke bonke abavutha umsindo ngawe; aya kuba yinto engento, adake amadoda abambana nawe.
23_41_12_Uya kuwafuna, ungawafumani, amadoda aphikisana nawe; aya kuba yinto engento, engekhoyo, amadoda alwa nawe.
23_41_13_Ngokuba mna, Yehova Thixo wakho, ndiya kusibamba isandla sakho sokunene; ndingothi kuwe, Musa ukoyika, ndiya kukunceda mna.
23_41_14_Musa ukoyika, mbungu Yakobi, bantu bambalwa bakwaSirayeli;  ndiya kukunceda mna; utsho uYehova, uMkhululi wakho oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_41_15_Yabona, ndikwenze isisizilo esibukhali esitsha,  esintlangothi mbini; uya kuzi bhula iintaba uzicole, iinduli uzixelise umququ.
23_41_16_Uya kuzela, umoya uzitha bathe, umoya ovuthuzayo uziphangalalise; ke wena ugcobe ngoYehova, uqhayise ngoyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_41_17_Ke abaziintsizana nabangamahlwempu baya kufuna amanzi,  angabikho, ulwimi lwabo lome linxano; mna Yehova ndiya kubaphendula; mna, Thixo kaSirayeli, andiyi kubashiya.
23_41_18_Ndiya kuyivula imilambo eluqayini, nemithombo phakathi kweentili, ndenze intlango ibe lidike elinamanzi, nomhlaba ongumqwebedu ube ziindawo eziphuma amanzi.
23_41_19_Ndiya kutyala entlango imisedare, nemingampunzi,  nemimirtile, neminquma yasendle, ndimise enkqantosini imisipres, nemipleyini, nemigalagala, ndawonye;
23_41_20_ukuze babone, bazi, bagqale ngentliziyo, baqiqe kunye,  ukuba isandla sikaYehova sikwenzile oko, oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli ukudalile oko.
23_41_21_Sondezani iindawo enibambene ngazo, utsho uYehova;  zimiseni iziganeko zenu, utsho uKumkani kaYakobi.
23_41_22_Mabazizise, basixelele okuza kuhla; mabaxele izinto zangaphambili, ubunjani bazo, sizigqale ngeentliziyo, silazi ikamva lazo; nokuba zezizayo siviseni.
23_41_23_Xelani izinto ezizayo ngasemva, ukuze sazi ukuba ningoothixo; ewe, yenzani okulungileyo, nokuba kokubi,  sikhwankqiswe, sibonisane ngako.
23_41_24_Yabonani, ningabento engento, nomsebenzi wenu awuni yani;  ulisikizi oninyulayo.
23_41_25_Ndivuse owasentla, weza; owasempumalanga, onqula igama lam; uzifikela iirhuluneli njengodaka, njengombumbi exovula udongwe.
23_41_26_Ngubani na owakuxelayo oko kwasekuqaleni? makavele sazi;  owakuxelayo ngenxa engaphambili makavele, sithi, Ulungisile.  Hayi, akukho waxelayo; hayi, akukho wavakalisayo; hayi, akukho wazivayo iintetho zenu.
23_41_27_Ndim endaqala ndathi kwiZiyon, Yabona, nanzo; ndayinika iYerusalem umshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo.
23_41_28_Kuba ndakhangela, akwabakho bani; nakwaba akwabakho bacebisi ndingababuzayo, baphendule ngelizwi.
23_41_29_Yabona, bonke bephela bayinto engento, ziyinto engekhoyo izenzo zabo, imifanekiso yabo etyhidiweyo ingumoya nochuku.
23_42_1_Mboneni ke umkhonzi wam endimxhasayo; umnyulwa wam, okholwa nguye umphefumlo wam. Ndibeke uMoya wam phezu kwakhe; uya kukuphumelelisa okusesikweni ezintlangeni.
23_42_2_Akayi kunkqangaza, aliphakamise, alivakalise ezitratweni ilizwi lakhe.
23_42_3_Ingcongolo evikivekileyo akayi kuyaphula, umsonto oqhumayo akayi kuwucima; uya kukuphumelelisa okusesikweni ngokwenyaniso.
23_42_4_Akayi kuba nakucinywa, akayi kuvikiveka, ade akumise okusesikweni ehlabathini, zilindele isiyalo sakhe iziqithi.
23_42_5_Utsho uThixo yena, uYehova, udala izulu, alaneke;  utwabulula umhlaba neziveliso zawo; unika abantu abaphezu kwawo ukuphefumla, unika abahamba kuwo umoya:
23_42_6_ukuthi, Mna, Yehova, ndikubizile ngokobulungisa, ndakubamba ngesandla; ndiya kukulondoloza, ndikwenze umnqophiso wabantu,  isikhanyiselo seentlanga;
23_42_7_ukuba uvule amehlo eemfama, ukuba ukhuphe abakhonkxiweyo ekuvalelweni, abahleli ebumnyameni ubakhuphe entolongweni.
23_42_8_NdinguYehova, lilo elo igama lam; andiluniki omnye uzuko lwam, nendumiso yam andiyiniki imifanekiso eqingqiweyo.
23_42_9_Izinto zokuqala, yabona, zifikile; ndixela izinto ezintsha,  ke zingekantshuli ndiyanivisa.
23_42_10_Vumani kuYehova ingoma entsha, indumiso yakhe kwaseziphelweni zehlabathi, nina bahla baye elwandle,  nenzaliseko yalo, nina ziqhithi nabemi bazo.
23_42_11_Mayiphakamise izwi intlango, nemizi yayo, nemizana ehleli amaKedare; mabamemelele abemi bengxondorha, batsholoze ezincotsheni zeentaba.
23_42_12_Mabamzukise uYehova, baxele indumiso yakhe eziqithini.
23_42_13_UYehova uya kuphuma njengegorha, uya kuxhoxha ikhwele njengendoda yokulwa; uya kuduma, ewe, uya kunkqangaza; uya kuba ligorha ezintshabeni zakhe.
23_42_14_Kususela kwakude ndithe quthu, ndathi tu, ndazibamba;  ngoku ndiya kubefuza njengozalayo, ndibe nephika, ndifuthe nokufutha.
23_42_15_Ndobharhisa iintaba neenduli, ndiyitshise yonke imifuno yazo, imilambo ndiyenze iziqithi, ndiwatshise amadike.
23_42_16_Ndozihambisa iimfama ngendlela ezingayaziyo,  ndizinyathelise kwiingqushu ezingazaziyo; ubumnyama ndibenza ukukhanya phambi kwazo, iindawo ezimagqagala zibe zithabazi.  Zizo ezo izinto endiya kuzenza, ndingazishiyi.
23_42_17_Baya kubuya umva, badane bedanile, abakholosa ngemifanekiso eqingqiweyo, abathi kwetyhidiweyo, Ningoothixo bethu.
23_42_18_Yivani, zithulu; bhekani nibone, zimfama.
23_42_19_Ngubani na oyimfama, ingenguye umkhonzi wam? osisithulu njengomthunywa wam endimthumayo? Ngubani na oyimfama njengenqogu, oyimfama njengomkhonzi kaYehova?
23_42_20_Ubona izinto ezininzi, akazigcini noko; uvula iindlebe,  akeva noko.
23_42_21_UYehova uthande ngenxa yobulungisa bakhe ukuwukhulisa umyalo, wawenza wanobungangamsha.
23_42_22_Ke bona ngabantu abaphangiweyo, abahluthiweyo,  ababotshelelwe emingxunyeni bonke bephela, abafakwe ezintolongweni, baba lixhoba, akwabakho mhlanguli; baba ngabahluthiweyo, akwabakho uthi, Buyisa.
23_42_23_Ngubani na kuni oya kukubekela indlebe oko, abaze indlebe,  eve emveni koku?
23_42_24_Ngubani na owamnikela uYakobi ekuhluthweni, owamnikela uSirayeli kubaphangi? AsinguYehova nalowo sonayo kuye, lowo bangavumanga ukuhamba ngeendlela zakhe, abawuphulaphula umyalo wakhe?
23_42_25_Wamphalazela ngobushushu bomsindo wakhe, nangamandla emfazwe; wamlenya ngomlilo ngeenxa zonke, akakwazi noko;  wamtshisa, noko akakunyamekela oko ngentliziyo.
23_43_1_Kaloku ke utsho uYehova, uMdali wakho, Yakobi, uMbumbi wakho, Sirayeli, ukuthi, Musa ukoyika; ngokuba ndikukhulule ngokukuhlawulela; ndikubizile ngegama lakho, ungowam.
23_43_2_Xa uthi uwele emanzini, ndoba nawe: nasemilanjeni, ayisayi kukuntywilisela; xa uthi uhambe emlilweni, akuyi kurhawuka,  nelangatye lingakutshisi.
23_43_3_Ngokuba mna, Yehova, ndinguThixo wakho, mna, Ngcwele kaSirayeli, ndingumsindisi wakho; ndirhole iYiputa yakucamagushela, iKushi neSebha zaba sesikhundleni sakho.
23_43_4_Ngenxa yokuba unqabile emehlweni am, uzukile, mna ke ndikuthandile; ndirhola abantu esikhundleni sakho, nezizwe esikhundleni sobomi bakho.
23_43_5_Musa ukoyika, ngokuba ndinawe: ndiya kuyizisa imbewu yakho ivela empumalanga, ndikubuthe nasentshonalanga.
23_43_6_Ndiya kuthi kumntla, Ethe; nakumzantsi, Musa ukuthintela;  nazise oonyana bam bevela kude, neentombi zam zivela eziphelweni zehlabathi:
23_43_7_yonke into ebizwe ngegama lam, endiyidalele uzuko lwam,  endiyibumbileyo, endiyenzileyo.
23_43_8_Khupha abantu abaziimfama benamehlo, nabazizithulu beneendlebe.
23_43_9_Nonke zintlanga, buthelanani ndawonye, zihlangane izizwe.  Ngubani na kuni onokukuxela oko? Mabasivise izinto zangaphambili, mabamise amangqina abo, bagwetyelwe; mabeve ke abantu, bathi, Yinyaniso.
23_43_10_Ningamangqina am, utsho uYehova, nina ningumkhonzi wam endimnyulileyo; ukuze nazi, nikholwe ndim, niqonde ukuba ndim;  phambi kwam akubunjwanga thixo, nasemva kwam akuyi kubakho namnye.
23_43_11_Mna ke, mna ndinguYehova, akukho msindisi ingendim.
23_43_12_Mna ndixelile, ndasindisa, ndabonisa, kungekho thixo wumbi kuni; ningamangqina am, utsho uYehova, ukuba ndinguThixo.
23_43_13_Unanamhla ndinguye, akukho unokuhlangula esandleni sam;  ndisebenza, ngubani na ke onokukubuyisa oko umva?
23_43_14_Utsho uYehova, umkhululi wenu, oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Ngenxa yenu ndithumele eBhabheli, ukuba ndibahlise abasabayo bonke bephela, namaKaledi, ngeenqanawa zokumemelela kwabo.
23_43_15_Mna, Yehova, ndingoyiNgcwele wenu, uMdali kaSirayeli,  uKumkani wenu.
23_43_16_Utsho uYehova, umenzi wendlela elwandle, womendo emanzini anamandla;
23_43_17_umkhuphi wenqwelo nehashe, wempi nentshatshela; baya kulala bangavuki, bethile, becimile njengomsonto wesibane:
23_43_18_utsho ukuthi, Musani ukukhumbula izinto zangaphambili,  ningazikhathaleli nezamandulo.
23_43_19_Yabonani, ndiya kwenza into entsha, intshule ngoku; aniyi kuyazi na? Inene, ndiya kwenza indlela entlango, nemilambo enkangala.
23_43_20_Izilo zasendle ziya kundizukisa, iimpungutye neenciniba;  ngokuba ndenza amanzi entlango, nemilambo enkangala, ukuze ndiseze abantu bam, abanyulwa bam.
23_43_21_Abantu endizibumbeleyo baya kubalisa indumiso yam.
23_43_22_Akundinqulanga ke mna, Yakobi, ngokude uzixhamle ngam,  Sirayeli.
23_43_23_Akundiziselanga mpahla imfutshane yamadini akho anyukayo;  akundizukisanga ngamibingelelo yakho. Andikukhonzisanga ngaminikelo yakudla, andikudinisanga ngantlaka imhlophe.
23_43_24_Akundithengelanga kalamo ngemali, akundihluthisanga ngamanqatha emibingelelo yakho; hayi, undikhonzise ngezono zakho, undidinisile ngobugwenxa bakho.
23_43_25_Mna ndinguye ocima izikreqo zakho ngenxa yam,  ndingazikhumbuli izono zakho.
23_43_26_Ndikhumbuze, masimangalelane; misa intetho yakho, ukuze ugwetyelwe.
23_43_27_Uyihlo wokuqala wona, nabalamleli bakho bakreqa kum.
23_43_28_Ngako oko ndabangcolisa ke abathetheli abangcwele,  ndamnikela uYakobi ukuba asingelwe phantsi, uSirayeli ukuba anyeliswe.
23_44_1_Kaloku ke yiva, Yakobi mkhonzi wam, Sirayeli endikunyulileyo.
23_44_2_Utsho uYehova uMenzi wakho, uMbumbi wakho kwasesizalweni,  uMncedi wakho, ukuthi, Musa ukoyika, mkhonzi wam Yakobi,  Yeshurun endimnyulileyo.
23_44_3_Ngokuba ndiya kugalela amanzi phezu kwabanxaniweyo,  nemiqukuqela yamanzi phezu kwelizwe elomileyo. Ndiya kugalela uMoya wam phezu kwembewu yakho, nentsikelelo yam phezu kwenzala yakho.
23_44_4_Baya kuhluma phakathi kotyani, njengemingculuba engasemisingeni yamanzi.
23_44_5_Omnye uya kuthi, NdingokaYehova; nomnye uya kunqula igama likaYakobi; kwanomnye uya kuzibhala ngesandla sakhe kuYehova,  alihloniphe igama likaSirayeli.
23_44_6_Utsho uYehova, uKumkani wakwaSirayeli, uMkhululi wakhe,  uYehova wemikhosi, ukuthi, Ndingowokuqala, ndingowokugqibela;  akukho Thixo ingendim.
23_44_7_Ngubani na oshumayela njengam-makaxele andicacisele-ethabathela ekumiseni kwam abantu basendaleni?  Izinto ezizayo, neziza kubakho, mabazixele.
23_44_8_Musani ukunkwantya, ningajijitheki; andikuvisanga na kwanini, ndanixelela? Ningamangqina am. Kukho Thixo na,  ingendim? Akukho liwa, andilazi mna.
23_44_9_Abayili bemifanekiso eqingqiweyo bonke bephela baluchuku,  neento zabo ezinqwenelekayo azincedi nto; bona bangamangqina azo; ababoni, abazi, ukuze badane.
23_44_10_Ngubani na oyile uthixo, watyhida umfanekiso ongenakunceda nto?
23_44_11_Yabona, onke amadlelane awo aya kudana, neengcibi ezo zezasebantwini; mababuthelane bonke bephela, beme, bankwantye,  badane kunye.
23_44_12_Ingcibi yesinyithi ilola inkxola, isebenza ngamalahle avuthayo, isiyila isithixo ngezando, isibenza ngengalo yayo enamandla; kanjalo iyalamba, ingabi namandla; ayiseli manzi,  ityhafe.
23_44_13_Ingcibi yemithi yolula ulutya lokulinganisa, isibabula isiqu saso ngechitywa; isilungisa ngezinto zokuchwela;  isibabula isiqu saso ngekompas, isenze ngemfano yendoda,  ngokobuhle bomntu, ukuba sihlale endlwini.
23_44_14_Ugawula imisedare, uthabatha umholem nomoki, akhethe emithini yehlathi; utyala umpayine, imvula iwukhulise.
23_44_15_Woba ke yinto yokuba umntu aphembe umlilo; athabathe kuwo,  othe; uphatha kuthi abase umlilo, ose isonka; uphatha kuthi enze uthixo, aqubude kuye, enze umfanekiso oqingqiweyo,  asibekeke kuwo.
23_44_16_Inxalenye yawo uyitshisa emlilweni; inxalenye yawo uyidla inyama ngayo; wosa ose ahluthe; ewe, uyotha, athi, Hee ke!  ndiyotha, ndiva umlilo!
23_44_17_Oseleyo kuwo uwenza uthixo, umfanekiso wakhe oqingqiweyo,  asibekeke kuwo, aqubude kuwo, athandaze kuwo, athi,  Ndihlangule; ngokuba, unguthixo wam.
23_44_18_Ahazi, abaqondi; ngokuba avingciwe amehlo abo ukuba angaboni, ukuba iintliziyo zabo zingaqiqi;
23_44_19_banganyamekeli ngeentliziyo zabo, kungabikho kwazi,  kungabikho kuqonda, ukuba bathi, Inxalenye yawo ndiyitshisile emlilweni; ewe, ndosa isonka emalahleni awo; ndosa inyama,  ndadla; oseleyo kuwo ndiya kuwenza amasikizi na? ndisibekeke na kwinto evele emthini?
23_44_20_Esukelana nothuthu nje, intliziyo edetshiselweyo imtyekisile kangangokuba angawuhlanguli umphefumlo wakhe, athi,  Akukho buxoki na esandleni sam sokunene?
23_44_21_Khumbula ezo zinto, Yakobi, Sirayeli, ngokuba ungumkhonzi wam; ndikubumbile, ungumkhonzi kum; Sirayeli, akuyi kulityalwa ndim.
23_44_22_Ndilucimile njengelifu elingqingqwa ukreqo lwakho, nezono zakho njengelifu elisibekeleyo; buyela kum, ngokuba ndikukhulule ngokukuhlawulela.
23_44_23_Memelelani, mazulu, ngokuba uYehova ekwenzile; dumani,  zinzulu zehlabathi; gqabhukani nimemelele, zintaba, hlathi,  nani nonke mithi ekulo; ngokuba uYehova emhlawulele wamkhulula uYakobi, ezihombisile ngoSirayeli..
23_44_24_Utsho uYehova, uMkhululi wakho, uMbumbi wakho kwasesizalweni, ukuthi, Mna Yehova ndinguMenzi weento zonke;  uManeki wezulu ndedwa; uMtwabululi wehlabathi ndingenabani;
23_44_25_uMtshitshisi wemiqondiso yabaphololoza into engeyiyo;  uMgezisi wabavumisayo; uMbuyisi wezilumko umva; uMzulisi wokwazi kwazo;
23_44_26_uMmisi welizwi lomkhonzi wakhe; uMzalisi wecebo labathunywa bakhe; uNdithi kwiYerusalem, Iya kumiwa; nakwimizi yakwaYuda, Iya kwakhiwa, ndiwamise amanxuwa ayo;
23_44_27_uNdithi kumanzi enzonzobila, Yitshani, ndiyomise imilambo yakho;
23_44_28_uNdithi kuKoreshi, Ngumalusi wam, oya kukuzalisa konke ukuthanda kwam; athi kwiYerusalem, Mayakhiwe; nakwitempile,  Mayisekwe.
23_45_1_Utsho uYehova kumthanjiswa wakhe, kuKoreshi, endimbambe ngesandla sokunene, ukuba ndizinyathele iintlanga phambi kwakhe; ndikhulule amanqe ookumkani, ukuba ndizivule iingcango ezingambini, namasango angabi nakuvalwa:
23_45_2_ukuthi, Ndiya kuhamba phambi kwakho, ndilungelelanise iindawo ezimaqhubu, ndiqhekeze iingcango zobhedu, ndixakaxe nemivalo yesinyithi;
23_45_3_ndikunike ubuncwane obusemnyameni, neengqwebo ezisezintsithelweni; ukuze wazi, ukuba mna Yehova ndingulo ukubize ngegama, uThixo kaSirayeli.
23_45_4_Ngenxa yomkhonzi wam uYakobi, uSirayeli umnyulwa wam,  ndakubiza ngegama lakho, ndakuthiya namanye amagama, ungandazi.
23_45_5_NdinguYehova; akukho wumbi, akukho Thixo ingendim.
23_45_6_Ndakubhinqa ungandazi, ukuze bazi, bethabathela ekuphumeni kwelanga bese nasekutshoneni kwalo, ukuba akukho namnye ingendim; ndinguYehova, akukho wumbi.
23_45_7_NdinguMenzi wokukhanya, uMdali wobumnyama, uMenzi woxolo,  uMdali wobubi: mna Yehova ndinguMenzi wezo zinto zonke.
23_45_8_Vuzisani, mazulu phezulu, sikhumezele ubulungisa isibhakabhaka; mawuvuleke umhlaba, uqhame usindiso, uhlumise ubulungisa kunye: mna Yehova ndikudalile oko.
23_45_9_Yeha ke, obambana noMenzi wakhe! Ligophe emagopheni ezitya zomdongwe! Udongwe lunokuthi na kumbumbi walo, Wenza ntoni na?  nomsebenzi wakho unokuthi na, Akunazandla?
23_45_10_Yeha ke, othi kuyise, Uzaleleni na? nakumfazi, Unanimba ngani na?
23_45_11_Utsho uYehova, oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli, uMenzi wakhe,  ukuthi, buzani kum izinto ezizayo; oonyana bam nomsebenzi wezandla zam wuyalezeni kum.
23_45_12_Mna ndenza ihlabathi, ndadala abantu phezu kwalo; izandla zam, mna lo zaneka izulu, nomkhosi walo wonke ndawuwisela umthetho.
23_45_13_Mna ndimvelisile ngobulungisa, ndiya kuzilungelelanisa iindlela zakhe zonke. Yena uya kuwakha umzi wam, abakhulule abafuduswa bam, kungarholwanga nani, kungarholwanga sicengo;  utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
23_45_14_Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Ukuxelenga kweYiputa nokurhweba kukaKushi nokwamaSebha, abafo abanewonga, kuya kuwelela kuwe kube kokwakho. Baya kuhamba emva kwakho, baya kuwela benemixokelelwane, baqubude kuwe; baya kuthandaza kuwe,  besithi, Inene, ukuwe uThixo; akusekho thixo, akukho nokuba abe mnye.
23_45_15_Inyaniso, unguThixo ozisithelisayo, Thixo kaSirayeli,  Msindisi.
23_45_16_Baya kudana, kananjalo bahlazeke bonke bephela; baya kuhamba behlazekile kunye abaziingcibi zezithixo.
23_45_17_USirayeli uya kusindiswa nguYehova ngosindiso olungunaphakade; aniyi kudaniswa, aniyi kuhlazeka, kude kuse emaphakadeni asephakadeni.
23_45_18_Ngokuba utsho uYehova, uMdali wezulu (nguye uThixo),  uMenzi wehlabathi, uMseki walo, yena walizinzisayo (akalidalelanga ukuba kube senyanyeni, walibumba ukuba limiwe),  ukuthi, NdinguYehova, akukho wumbi.
23_45_19_Andithethanga entsithelweni, endaweni emnyama yelizwe;  anditshongo embewini kaYakobi ukuthi, Ndiquqeleni enyanyeni.  Mna Yehova ndithetha ubulungisa, ndixela into ethe tye.
23_45_20_Buthani nize, sondelani kunye, nina basindileyo basezintlangeni: abanakwazi abathwali bomthi womfanekiso wabo oqinqiweyo, abathandazi bothixo ongasindisiyo.
23_45_21_Xelani, nifikise; ewe, mabacebisane kunye, ukuthi, Ngubani na owavisa oko kwabamandulo, owakuxelayo kwanini? Asindim na Yehova, ekungekho Thixo wumbi ingendim? UThixo onobulungisa,  osindisayo, akakho ingendim.
23_45_22_Bhekani kum, nisindiswe, nonke ziphelo zehlabathi; ngokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi.
23_45_23_Ndizifungile, ilizwi liphume emlonyeni ngobulungisa, aliyi kuguqulwa; lithe, Aya kuguqa kum onke amadolo, zifunge mna zonke iilwimi;
23_45_24_kuthiwe ngokubhekisele kum, KuYehova yedwa bubulungisa namandla, kuyiwa kuye; baya kudana bonke abavutha ngomsindo ngaye.
23_45_25_NgoYehova iya kugwetyelwa iqhayise yonke imbewu kaSirayeli.
23_46_1_UBhele uyaguqa, uNebho uya bhanyalaza; izithixo zabo zibekwe emaqegwini nasezinkomeni ezitsalayo; ezi nibe nizithwala zibotshiwe, zingumthwalo kwizinto ezityhafileyo.
23_46_2_Izithixo zabhanyalaza, zaguqa kunye, azaba nakuzisiza ekuthwaleni, ke inkqu yazo yaya ekuthinjweni.
23_46_3_Phulaphulani kum, ndlu kaYakobi, nonke masalela endlu kaSirayeli, nina nabekwayo phezu kwam kwasesiswini, nina nathwalwayo ndim kwasesizalweni;
23_46_4_kude kuse ebudaleni ikwandim, kude kuse ezimvini ndiya kunityatha emagxeni mna. Ndikwenzile mna; ndiya kunithwala mna,  ndiya kunityatha emagxeni mna, ndinisize.
23_46_5_Ninokundifanisa, nindilinganise, nindinxulumise nabani na,  ukuba sifane?
23_46_6_Bona bawohloza igolide engxoweni, balinganise isilivere ngesikali; baqesha umnyibilikisi, ayenze isithixo; basibekeke,  ewe, baqubude.
23_46_7_Bayasithwala, basityathe emagxeni, basibeke phantsi endaweni yaso, sime; asibuyi sisuke kuloo ndawo yaso; ewe,  bayakhala kuso, singaphenduli; asisindisi bani embandezelweni yakhe.
23_46_8_Khumbulani oko, nibe ngamadoda; kunyamekeleni ngentliziyo,  nina bakreqileyo.
23_46_9_Khumbulani izinto zangaphambili, zasephakadeni, okokuba ndinguThixo, akukho wumbi; ndinguThixo, akukho namnye unjengam;
23_46_10_ukuxelayo kwasekuqaleni okungasemva, nakwabamandulo okungekenzeki, ndisithi, Icebo lam liya kuma, ndikwenze konke ukuthanda kwam;
23_46_11_ndibiza ukhozi empumalanga, indoda yecebo lam ezweni elikude; nditshilo, ewe, ndiya kukufeza; ndiyilile, ewe, ndiya kukwenza.
23_46_12_Phulaphulani kum, nina bantliziyo ilukhuni, bakude nobulungisa.
23_46_13_Ndisondeza ubulungisa bam, abuyi kuba kude; nosindiso lwam aluyi kulibala; ndinika usindiso eZiyon, uzuko lwam kuSirayeli.
23_47_1_Yihla, uhlale eluthulini, nkazanandini, ntombi inguBhabheli; hlala phantsi emhlabeni ungenatrone, ntombi ingamaKaledi; ngokuba akuyi kuba sathiwa uyimvoco, noxhamla ubuncwane.
23_47_2_Thabatha amatye, usile umgubo; bhenqa isigqubuthelo sakho,  finyezela phezulu, tyhila umlenze, wela imilambo.
23_47_3_Mabutyhileke ubuze bakho, kubonakale nokungcikiveka kwakho;  ndiya kuphindezela, andiyi kubuka mntu.
23_47_4_Umkhululi wethu, igama lakhe nguYehova wemikhosi,  oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
23_47_5_Hlala uthi cwaka, ungeneemnyameni, ntombi ingamaKaledi;  ngokuba akuyi kuba sabizwa ngokuba uyinkosikazi yezikumkani.
23_47_6_Ndaba noburhalarhume kubantu bam, ndalingcolisa ilifa lam,  ndabanikela ezandleni zakho; akwaba namfesane kubo; naphezu kwamadoda amakhulu wayenza yanzima kakhulu idyokhwe yakho.
23_47_7_Ubusithi, Ndiya kuba yinkosikazi ngonaphakade; wada akwakunyamekela oko ngentliziyo, akwalikhumbula ikamva lakho oko.
23_47_8_Kaloku ke yiva oku, wena mxhamli weziyolo, uhleliyo ukholosile, wena uthi entliziyweni yakho, Ndim kwaphela, akukho wumbi; andiyi kuhlala ndingumhlolokazi, andiyi kukwazi ukungabi nabantwana.
23_47_9_Ziya kukuzela ezo zinto zombini ngephanyazo, ngamini-nye,  ukungabi nabantwana nobuhlolokazi; ziya kukuzela ngokugqibelela kwazo ebuninzini bokukhafula kwakho, enkitheni eninzi yomabophe bakho.
23_47_10_Ngokuba ukholose ngezinto zakho ezimbi, wathi, Akukho undibonayo; ubulumko bakho nokwazi kwakho kuko okukuphambanisileyo; wathi entliziyweni yakho, Ndim kwaphela,  akukho wumbi.
23_47_11_Bokuzela ke ububi, ungakwazi ukubunyanga; ikuwele inkohlakalo, ungabi nako ukuyicamagushela; ikuzele ngesiquphe intshabalala ongayaziyo.
23_47_12_Khawumise ngomabophe bakho, nangokukhafula kwakho okuninzi, ozixhamle ngako kwasebuncinaneni bakho; mhlawumbi ungaba nokunceda, mhlawumbi ungaba nokweyisa.
23_47_13_Udiniwe bubuninzi bamaqhinga akho; mabamise kaloku,  bakusindise oonocanda bezulu, oojongiinkwenkwezi, abakwazisayo ekuthwaseni kwenyanga ngenyanga izinto ezikuzelayo.
23_47_14_Yabona, basuke baba njengeendiza; umlilo ubatshisile;  abanakuwuhlangula umphefumlo wabo emandleni elangatye; akukho lahle lakuzifudumeza, akukho mlilo kungahlalwa phambi kwawo.
23_47_15_Boba njalo kuwe abo uzixhamle ngabo, ababerhwebelana nawe kwasebuncinaneni bakho; elowo uya kundwendwela ecaleni lakhe,  kungabikho ukusindisayo.
23_48_1_Yivani oko, ndlu kaYakobi, nibizwayo ngegama likaSirayeli,  naphumayo emanzini kaYuda; nina nilifungayo igama likaYehova,  nimkhankanye uThixo kaSirayeli, kungenganyaniso,  kungengabulungisa.
23_48_2_Ngokuba bazibiza ngokuthi ngabomzi ongcwele, bazixhase ngoThixo kaSirayeli, ogama lakhe linguYehova wemikhosi.
23_48_3_Izinto zangaphambili ndazixela kwanini; zaphuma emlonyeni wam, ndazibonakalalisa; ndazenza ngesiquphe, zabakho.
23_48_4_Ngokukwazi kwam ukuba ulukhuni, nentamo yakho ingumsipha wesinyithi, nebunzi lakho lilubhedu,
23_48_5_ndakuxelela ezo zinto kwanini; zingekafiki ndakuvisa, hleze uthi, Isithixo sam sizenzile, umfanekiso wam oqingqiweyo notyhidiweyo uzimisile.
23_48_6_Uvile; sikhangele zonke ziphela; wena ke akunakuzixela na?  Ndiya kukuvisa izinto ezintsha, ezifihlakeleyo, obungazazi.
23_48_7_Zidalwa ngoku, azidalwanga kwanini; ingekabikho le mini,  ubungaziva; hleze uthi, Yabona, bendizazi.
23_48_8_Ubungaziva; ubungazazi; ibingavulekile indlebe yakho kwanini. Kuba bendisazi ukuba unginiza unginizile; ukubizwa kwakho kuthiwa ungumkreqi kwasesizalwani.
23_48_9_Ngenxa yegama lam ndizeka kade ukuba nomsindo, nangenxa yendumiso yam ndiyawubamba ngakuwe, ukuze ndingakunqumli.
23_48_10_Uyabona, ndikunyibilikisile, akwaba ngokwesilivere;  ndakucikida ezikweni leentsizi.
23_48_11_Ndikwenza oko ngenxa yam, ngenxa yam (hayi, ukuhlanjelwa kwegama lam!); andiluniki wumbi uzuko lwam.
23_48_12_Phulaphula kum, Yakobi, Sirayeli, mbizwa wam; ndim,  ndingowokuqala, ewe, ndingowokugqibela.
23_48_13_Ewe, isandla sam siseke ihlabathi, esokunene sam saneke izulu; ndithi ndakuzibiza ezo zinto, zime kunye.
23_48_14_Zihlanganiseni, nonke niphela, nive; ngubani na phakathi kwezithixo owazixelayo ezo zinto? Umthandwa kaYehova uya kukwenza ukuthanda kwakhe kwiBhabheli, nengalo yakhe ikwenze kumaKaledi.
23_48_15_Mna nditshilo, ewe, ndimbizile, ndimzisile; inempumelelo indlela yakhe.
23_48_16_Sondelani kum, nive oku. Kwasekuqaleni andithethanga entsithelweni; kususela kwixesha lokwenzeka kwako oko,  ndilapha; nangoku iNkosi uYehova indithumile, mna noMoya wayo.
23_48_17_Utsho uYehova, umkhululi wakho, oyiNgcwele kaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Mna Yehova, Thixo wakho, ndingokufundisa okungakuncedayo, ndikunyathelise ngendlela oya kuhamba ngayo.
23_48_18_Akwaba imithetho yam ubuyibazele indlebe! Beluya kuba njengomlambo uxolo lwakho, nobulungisa bakho bube njengamaza olwandle;
23_48_19_ibiya kuba njengentlabathi imbewu yakho, abaphuma ezibilinini zakho babe njengamasuntsu ayo belingayi kunqunyulwa litshabalale igama labo ebusweni bam.
23_48_20_Phumani eBhabheli, sabani kwelamaKaledi; kuxeleni ninelizwi lokumemelela, kuvakaliseni oku, kuhlabeleni kuye naseziphelweni zehlabathi; yithini, UYehova umkhulule ngokumhlawulela umkhonzi wakhe uYakobi.
23_48_21_Abanxanwanga, ebahambisa engqaqasini; wabatsitsisela amanzi eweni, wacanda iliwa, atsaza amanzi.
23_48_22_Akukho luxolo kwabangendawo, utsho uYehova.
23_49_1_Phulaphulani kum, ziqithi; bazani indlebe, zizwe zikude;  uYehova undibize kwasesizalweni, ulikhankanye kwasezibilinini zikama igama lam.
23_49_2_Wawenza umlomo wam wanjengekrele elibukhali, wandizimeza esithunzini sesandla sakhe, wandenza utolo olubaziweyo,  wandisithelisa emphongolweni;
23_49_3_wathi kum, Ungumkhonzi wam, wena Sirayeli, endiya kuhomba ngaye.
23_49_4_Ndathi mna, Ndifumane ndazixhamla, ndawaphelisa amandla am ngochuku, nangento engento; noko ibango lam likuYehova, nomvuzo wam unoThixo wam.
23_49_5_Kaloku ke uthi uYehova, owandibumba kwasesizalweni, ukuba ndibe ngumkhonzi kuye wokubuyisela uYakobi kuye, uSirayeli ahlanganiselwe kuye (ndizukile emehlweni kaYehova, uThixo wam waba ngamandla am);
23_49_6_uthi ke, Kuyinto elula ukuba ube ngumkhonzi kum wokumisa izizwe zakwaYakobi, ubuyise abalondolozwa bakaSirayeli;  kananjalo ndiya kukwenza isikhanyiso seentlanga, ukuba ube lusindiso lwam, ude uze eziphelweni zehlabathi.
