24_50_21_Ilizwe lakwaNkani-ziphindwe-kabini, nyuka uye kulo kanye,  kubemi belakwaKohlwaywa; bharhisa usingele phantsi emva kwabo,  utsho uYehova; wenze ngako konke endakuwisela umthetho ngako.
24_50_22_Isithonga semfazwe siselizweni, nokwaphuka okukhulu.
24_50_23_Hayi, ukuxakaxwa, ukwaphulwa kwesando sehlabathi lonke!  Hayi, ukwenziwa kweBhabheli ummangaliso phakathi kweentlanga!
24_50_24_Ndikuthiyele, wabanjiswa nokubanjiswa, Bhabheli, ungazi ke wena; ufunyenwe, wathinjwa nokuthinjwa, ngokuba ulwe noYehova.
24_50_25_UYehova uyivulile indlu yezixhobo zakhe, wazikhupha iimpahla zokubhavuma kwakhe; ngokuba inomsebenzi iNkosi,  uYehova wemikhosi, ezweni lamaKaledi.
24_50_26_Yizani kulo, nivale ngeenxa zonke; vulani amaqonga alo;  lifumbeni ngokwezidimbilili, nilisingele phantsi, kungasali nento kulo.
24_50_27_Hlabani zonke iinkunzi zalo ezintsha zeenkomo;  mazithotyelwe ekuxhelweni, Yeha ke bona! Ngokuba iyeza imini yabo, ixesha lokuvelelwa kwabo.
24_50_28_Phulaphulani! Nabo abasabayo, abasindayo ezweni laseBhabheli, ukuba baxele eZiyon impindezelo kaYehova uThixo wethu, impindezelo yetempile yakhe.
24_50_29_Bahlabeleni umkhosi abatoli, beze eBhabheli, bonke abatyedi besaphetha; yingqingeni ngeenxa zonke. Makungabikho usindayo; yivuzeni ngokomsebenzi wayo; ngako konke eyakwenzayo,  yenzani ngako kuyo; ngokuba ikhukhumele kuYehova, koyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
24_50_30_Ngako oko aya kuwa ezitratweni zayo amadodana ayo, athi shwaka ngaloo mini onke amadoda ayo okulwa; utsho uYehova.
24_50_31_Yabona, ndikuchasile, wena ukhukhumeleyo, itsho iNkosi uYehova wemikhosi; ngokuba ifikile imini yakho, ixesha lokukuvelela kwam.
24_50_32_Wokhubeka okhukhumeleyo, awe, kungabikho umvusayo;  ndiphembe umlilo emizini yakhe, utshe ngeenxa zonke kuye.
24_50_33_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Babecudiswa oonyana bakaSirayeli noonyana bakaYuda kunye; bonke ababathimbayo bayagcinisa ukubabamba, abavumi ukubandulula.
24_50_34_UMkhululi wabo obamiselayo womelele, ugama lakhe linguYehova wemikhosi; uya kubambana abambane nobambana nabo,  ukuze aliphumze ihlabathi, agungqise abemi baseBhabheli.
24_50_35_Ikrele maliwafikele amaKaledi, nabemi baseBhabheli,  nabathetheli bayo, nezilumko zayo; utsho uYehova.
24_50_36_Ikrele malibafikele abaphololozi bento engeyiyo, babe zizimathane; ikrele maliwafikele amagorha, aqhiphuke umbilini.
24_50_37_Ikrele maliwafikele amahashe ayo, neenqwelo zayo zokulwa,  nomxukuxela wonke ophakathi kwayo, babe ngabafazi; ikrele malibufikele ubuncwane bayo, ukuba buphangwe.
24_50_38_Ukubalela makuwafikele amanzi ayo, ukuba atshe. Ngokuba lilizwe lemifanekiso eqingqiweyo; bazigezise ngezinto ezothusayo.
24_50_39_Ngako oko kuya kuhlala khona amarhamncwa omqwebedu neempungutye, kuhlale iinciniba khona, lingabi samiwa naphakade, lingabi sahlalwa izizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
24_50_40_Njengoko wayibhukuqayo uThixo iSodom neGomora, nemimelwane yayo, utsho uYehova, akuyi kuhlala bani khona, akuyi kuphambukela nyana womntu khona.
24_50_41_Yabonani, kuza abantu, bevela entla, uhlanga ke olukhulu;  nookumkani abaninzi bayaxhoxhwa, bevela eziphelweni zehlabathi.
24_50_42_Baphethe isaphetha nenkcula, bazizijorha, abanamfesane;  ilizwi labo liguguma njengolwandle, bakhwele emahasheni,  bekuxhobele njengendoda yokulwa, ntombi iyiBhabheli.
24_50_43_Uve iindaba zabo ukumkani waseBhabheli, zasuka zawa izandla zakhe; imbandezelo imbambile, uyazibhijabhija njengozalayo.
24_50_44_Yabonani, utshaba luya kunyuka njengengonyama, luphume ekweneni kweYordan, luye ekhayeni eliyingxondorha; ngokuba ndiya kumgxotha ngephanyazo kulo, osukuba enyulwe, ndimenzele umveleli walo; ngokuba ngubani na onjengam? ngubani na oya kundimema? ngubani na loo malusi uya kuma phambi kwam?
24_50_45_Ngako oko, liveni icebo likaYehova, alicebileyo ngeBhabheli, neengcinga zakhe, azicingileyo ngelizwe lamaKaledi; esithi, Inene, baya kuzikrwiqiliza ezincinane zomhlambi; inene, liya kumangaliswa zizo ikriwa lazo.
24_50_46_Ngenxa yelizwi elithi, Ibanjiwe iBhabheli, liyanyikima ihlabathi; kuvakala isikhalo ezintlangeni.
24_51_1_Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Yabonani, ndixhoxhela iBhabheli,  nabahleli ngaphakathi kwabasukela phezulu kum, umoya womonakalisi.
24_51_2_Ndiya kuthumela eBhabheli abasemzini, abaya kuyela; balithi qongqololo ilizwe layo; ngokuba boyifikela ngeenxa zonke ngemini yobubi.
24_51_3_Umtyedi wesaphetha makagobele kogobayo, nakozinyusayo,  enengubo yentsimbi, ningawayeki amadodana ayo; singelani phantsi wonke umkhosi wayo;
24_51_4_bawe ababuleweyo ezweni lamaKaledi, nabahlatywe amahlanza ezitratweni zayo.
24_51_5_Ngokuba uSirayeli, kwanoYuda, akashiywanga wangumhlolokazi nguThixo wakhe, nguYehova wemikhosi; kuba ilizwe labo lizele lityala koyiNgcwele kaSirayeli.
24_51_6_Sabani niphume eBhabheli, nisize elowo umphefumlo wakhe;  maningadaki ngenxa yobugwenxa bayo; ngokuba eli lixesha lempindezelo kuYehova; uya kubuyekeza kuyo kwaimpatho yayo.
24_51_7_IBhabheli ibe iyindebe yegolide esandleni sikaYehova,  ilinxilisa lonke ihlabathi; zasela iintlanga ewayinini yayo.  Ngako oko ziyageza iintlanga.
24_51_8_Iwile iBhabheli ngesiquphe, yaphuka; bhombolozani ngenxa yayo; intlungu yayo yithabatheleni amafutha aqholiweyo,  mhlawumbi ingapholiswa.
24_51_9_Bathi, Siba ngayinyanga iBhabheli, ayiphili; yishiyeni,  sihambe siye elowo ezweni lakowabo; ngokuba ityala layo lifike emazulwini, liphakamele esibhakabhakeni.
24_51_10_UYehova ubuvelisile ubulungisa bethu; yizani sibalise eZiyon isenzo sikaYehova uThixo wethu.
24_51_11_Khazimlisani iintolo, qubulani amakhaka; uYehova uxhoxhe umoya wokumkani bamaKaledi. Ngokuba umnkqangiyelo wakhe ukwiBhabheli, ukuba ayonakalise: ngokuba yimpindezelo kaYehova,  yimpindezelo yetempile yakhe.
24_51_12_Ziphakamiseleni ibhanile iindonga zaseBhabheli. Qinisani ukulinda, misani abalindi, lungisani imilalela; ngokuba njengoko uYehova wankqangiyelayo, ukwenzile awakuthethayo ngabemi baseBhabheli.
24_51_13_Wena uhleliyo phezu kwamanzi amaninzi, ubuncwane bakho buninzi; kufikile ukuphela kwakho, isilinganiselo senzuzo yakho embi.
24_51_14_UYehova wemikhosi ufunge umphefumlo wakhe, esithi, Noko ndikuzalisileyo ngabantu, banga ziinkumbi ezinqunquthayo, kuya kususelwa ngawe ukwenziwa amayeyeye.
24_51_15_Ngulowenza ihlabathi ngamandla akhe, ngulozinzisa elimiweyo ngobulumko bakhe, waneka izulu ngengqondo yakhe.
24_51_16_Kwakubon ukuba kukho isithonga sokwenza kwakhe ingxolo yamanzi ezulwini, unyusa amafu esiphelweni sehlabathi; imvula uyenzela imibane, arhole umoya koovimba bakhe.
24_51_17_Uba sisityhakala wonke umntu engenakwazi, udaniswa wonke umnyibilikisi wegolide, ngenxa yomfanekiso oqingqiweyo; ngokuba umfanekiso wakhe otyhidiweyo bubuxoki, awunamoya.
24_51_18_Zingamampunge ezo zinto, sisenzo sokugxekwa; ngexesha lokuvelelwa kwazo ziya kutshabalala.
24_51_19_Akanjalo yena uSahlulelo sikaYakobi; ngokuba nguMbumbi wezinto zonke yena, nowesizwe selifa lakhe yena; nguYehova wemikhosi, igama lakhe.
24_51_20_Wena usisixengxe sam, usisikrweqe sam sokulwa. Ndiya kuzihlekeza ngawe iintlanga, ndizonakalise ngawe izikumkani;
24_51_21_ndihlekeze ngawe ihashe nomkhweli walo; ndihlekeze inqwelo yokulwa nomkhweli wayo;
24_51_22_ndihlekeze ngawe indoda nomfazi, ndihlekeze ngawe indoda enkulu nomfana, ndihlekeze ngawe amadodana nomthinjana;
24_51_23_ndihlekeze ngawe umalusi nomhlambi wakhe; ndihlekeze ngawe umlimi nesipani sakhe; ndihlekeze ngawe amabamba neerhuluneli.
24_51_24_Ndobuyekekeza kwiBhabheli, nakubeni bonke belamaKaledi,  bonke ububi babo, ababenze kwiZiyon emehlweni enu; utsho uYehova.
24_51_25_Yabona, ndikuchasile, ntaba yokonakalisa, utsho uYehova,  elonakalisileyo lonke ihlabathi; ndiya kolula isandla sam phezu kwakho, ndikuqengqe uhle ezingxondorheni, ndikwenze intaba etshisiweyo;
24_51_26_kungathatyathwa litye lambombo kuwe, nalitye laziseko; ke uya kwenziwa kube senkangala ngonaphakade; utsho uYehova.
24_51_27_Phakamisani ibhanile elizweni, vuthelani isigodlo ezintlangeni; zingcwaliseni iintlanga kuyo, zihlabeleni umkhosi, zize kuyo izikumkani zeArarati neMini neAshkenazi;  yalelani kuyo abathetheli; nyusani amahashe, eze njengeenkumbi ezinqunquthayo, ezibetha ube namanwele.
24_51_28_Zingcwaliseni iintlanga kuyo, ookumkani bamaMedi,  namabamba awo, neerhuluneli zawo zonke, nelizwe lonke lolawulo lwawo.
24_51_29_Ihlabathi liyanyikima, liyazibhijabhija; ngokuba zenzeka kwiBhabheli iingcinga zikaYehova, zokulenza ilizwe leBhabheli kube senkangala, lingamiwa.
24_51_30_Amagorha aseBhabheli ayekile ukulwa, ahleli ezimboniselweni; ubugorha bawo buthe qoko, asuka aba ngabafazi.  Iminquba yayo ifakwe isikhuni, yaphukile imivalo yayo.
24_51_31_Isigidimi siyagidima, siqubisana nesigidimi; umbiki uqubisana nombiki, abike kukumkani waseBhabheli ukuba umzi wakhe uthinjwe kwaphela.
24_51_32_Amazibuko avingciwe, amadike atshe ngumlilo, amadoda okulwa akhwankqisiwe.
24_51_33_Ngokuba utsho uYehova wemikhosi, uThixo kaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Intombi eyiBhabheli injengesanda ngexesha lokugangathwa kwaso; kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana, lifike ixesha lokuvuna kuyo.
24_51_34_Wasibhubhisa thina, wasincinitha uNebhukadenetsare ukumkani waseBhabheli, wasibeka saba sisitya esize; wasiginya njengengwenya, wahluthisa isisu sakhe ngokudla kwethu okumnandi, wasigxotha.
24_51_35_Ukugonyamelwa kwam nenyama yam makube phezu kweBhabheli,  makatsho ummi waseZiyon; igazi lam malibe phezu kwabemi belamaKaledi, mayitsho iYerusalem.
24_51_36_Ngako oko utsho uYehova ukuthi, Yabona, ndiyalithetha ityala lakho, ndiphindezele impindezelo yakho, ndilutshise ulwandle lwayo, ndilomise ithende layo;
24_51_37_iBhabheli iya kuba ngumwewe, isikhundla seempungutye,  ummangaliso nomsondlo, ingabi nammi.
24_51_38_Bonke bephela bangabharhula njengeengonyama ezintsha,  bangavungama njengamathole engonyamakazi.
24_51_39_Kanti ke ebushushwini babo ndiya kubenzela umgidi wabo,  ndibanxilise, ukuze badlamke, balale ubuthongo obungunaphakade,  bangavuki; utsho uYehova.
24_51_40_Ndiya kubathobela ekuxhelweni njengamatakane,  njengeenkunzi zeegusha nezeebhokhwe.
24_51_41_Hayi, ukuthinjwa kweSheshaki, ukubanjwa kweqhayiya lehlabathi lonke! Hayi, ukwenziwa ummangaliso kweBhabheli phakathi kweentlanga!
24_51_42_Ulwandle lunyukile, lwayizela iBhabheli; igutyungelwe kukuguguma kwamaza alo.
24_51_43_Imizi yayo yaba ngamanxuwa, yaba lilizwe lomqwebedu nenkqantosi, lilizwe elingamiwe mntu, ekungadluli nyana womntu kulo.
24_51_44_Ndiya kumvelela uBhele eBhabheli, ndikurhole emlonyeni wakhe akuginyileyo; zingabi sasinga kuye iintlanga; nodonga lweBhabheli luya kuwa.
24_51_45_Phumani phakathi kwayo, bantu bam; sizani elowo umphefumlo wakhe, ngenxa yokuvutha komsindo kaYehova;
24_51_46_hleze ithambe intliziyo yenu, noyike iindaba ezivakalayo ezweni. Ziya kuza nomnyaka iindaba ezo, emveni koko ngomnye umnyaka kuze iindaba ezo, kuze ugonyamelo ezweni, umlawuli ebambene nomlawuli.
24_51_47_Ngako oko, uyabona, kuza imihla endiya kuyivelela imifanekiso eqingqiweyo yaseBhabheli, libharhe ilizwe layo lonke, bawe phakathi kwayo ababuleweyo kuyo.
24_51_48_Liya kumemelela ngenxa yeBhabheli izulu nomhlaba, nento yonke ekhona; ngokuba ababhuqi baphume entla, beza kuyo; utsho uYehova.
24_51_49_Njengokuba iBhabheli yaphikela ukuwisa ababuleweyo bakwaSirayeli, ngokunjalo baya kuwa ngenxa yeBhabheli ababuleweyo behlabathi lonke.
24_51_50_Nina nisindileyo ekreleni, bambani, musani ukuma.  Mkhumbuleni uYehova nisekude, ithi qatha ezintliziyweni zenu iYerusalem.
24_51_51_Sidanile, ngokuba sive isingcikivo; ihlazo lagubungela ubuso bethu; ngokuba abasemzini bazingene iingcwele zendlu kaYehova.
24_51_52_Ngako oko, yabonani, kuza imihla, utsho uYehova, endiya kuyivelela imifanekiso eqingqiweyo elizweni layo, bancwine abahlatyiweyo.
24_51_53_Nokuba iBhabheli ithe yenyuka yaya ezulwini, nokuba ithe yayinqabisa indawo ephezulu, inqaba yayo, ababhuqi bayo baya kuphuma kum; utsho uYehova.
24_51_54_Phulaphulani! Nako ukukhala kuphuma eBhabheli, nomaphulo omkhulu uphuma ezweni lamaKaledi.
24_51_55_Ngokuba uYehova uyayibhuqa iBhabheli, alitshabalalise kuyo izwi elikhulu; aguguma amaza ayo njengamanzi amaninzi, kuvakala ingxolo yesandi sawo.
24_51_56_Ngokuba umbhuqi uya kuyifikela iBhabheli, athinjwe amagorha ayo, ziqhawuke izaphetha zayo; ngokuba nguThixo wembuyekezo uYehova, uya kuvuza evuzile.
24_51_57_Ndiyabanxilisa abathetheli bayo nezilumko zayo, amabamba ayo neerhuluneli zayo, namagorha ayo; aya kulala ubuthongo obungunaphakade, angavuki: utsho uKumkani, ogama lakhe linguYehova wemikhosi.
24_51_58_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Iindonga ezibanzi zeBhabheli ziya kunqikwa kube kanye, amasango ayo aphakamileyo atshiswe ngomlilo; izizwe zizixhamlele okulambathayo,  neentlanga zizixhamlele umlilo, zityhafe ke.
24_51_59_Ilizwi awathi uYeremiya umprofeti wamwisela umthetho ngalo uSeraya, unyana kaNeriya, unyana kaMaseya, ekuyeni kwakhe noZedekiya ukumkani wakwaYuda eBhabheli, ngomnyaka wesine wobukumkani bakhe; uSeraya lo engumtshayeleli.
24_51_60_UYeremiya wabubhala encwadini bonke ububi obuya kuyifikela iBhabheli, onke la mazwi abhaliweyo ngeBhabheli.
24_51_61_Wathi ke uYeremiya kuSeraya, Wakufika eBhabheli, khangela onke lamazwi, uwalese.
24_51_62_Uze uthi, Yehova, wena uthethile ngale ndawo ukuyinqumla,  ingamiwa, kuthabathele kumntu kuse nakwinkomo; ke yona iya kuba ngamanxuwa angunaphakade.
24_51_63_Kothi, wakugqiba ukuyilesa le ncwadi, ubophe ilitye kuyo,  uyinzulumbele esazulwini somEfrati;
24_51_64_uthi, Iya kwenjenje iBhabheli ukuthi xumbu kwayo,  ingaphumi, ngenxa yobubi endiya kuyizisela bona, batyhafe. Aze ema apha amazwi kaYeremiya.
24_52_1_UZedekiya ubeminyaka imashumi mabini anamnye ezelwe, ukuba ngukumkani kwakhe; waba neminyaka elishumi elinamnye engukumkani eYerusalem; igama lonina belinguHamutali, intombi kaYeremiya waseLibhena.
24_52_2_Wenza okubi emehlweni kaYehova, njengako konke awakwenzayo uYehoyakim.
24_52_3_Ngokuba ngenxa yomsindo kaYehova kwenzeka oko eYerusalem nakwaYuda, wada wabalahla ebusweni bakhe. UZedekiya wamana egwilika kukumkani waseBhabheli.
24_52_4_Kwathi ngomnyaka wesithoba wobukumkani bakhe, ngenyanga yeshumi, ngosuku lweshumi enyangeni leyo, wayifikela iYerusalem uNebhukadenetsare ukumkani waseBhabheli, yena nempi yakhe yonke, wayirhawula, wayakhela inqaba yokubonisela ngeenxa zonke.
24_52_5_Wangqingwa ke umzi, kwada kwaba ngumnyaka weshumi elinamnye wokumkani uZedekiya.
24_52_6_Ngosuku lwesithoba lwenyanga yesine, yaqina indlala phakathi komzi, ababa nasonka abantu belizwe.
24_52_7_Wagqojozwa umzi; asaba onke amadoda okulwa, aphuma phakathi komzi ebusuku ngendlela yesango eliphakathi kweendonga zombini,  elisemyezweni wokumkani (aye ke amaKaledi ewujikelezile umzi);  abamba ngendlela yaseArabha.
24_52_8_Impi yamaKaledi yamsukela ukumkani, yamfumana uZedekiya ezinkqantosini zaseYeriko; yonke impi yakhe yamphalala, yemka kuye.
24_52_9_Ambamba ukumkani, anyuka naye, amsa kukumkani waseBhabheli eRibhela ezweni leHamati; wawathetha apho amatyala akhe.
24_52_10_Ukumkani waseBhabheli wabasikela oonyana bakaZedekiya emehlweni akhe; nabathetheli bonke bakwaYuda wabasikela eRibhela.
24_52_11_Wamtyhaphaza amehlo uZedekiya, wamkhonkxa ngamakhamandela obhedu; ukumkani waseBhabheli wamsa eBhabheli, wamfaka entolongweni kwada kwayimini yokufa kwakhe.
24_52_12_Ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngosuku lweshumi enyangeni leyo (lo mnyaka ke ngoweshumi elineminyaka esithoba kakumkani uNebhukadenetsare ukumkani waseBhabheli), wangena eYerusalem uNebhuzaradan, umthetheli wabasiki, owema phambi kokumkani waseBhabheli.
24_52_13_Wayitshisa indlu kaYehova, nendlu yokumkani, nezindlu zonke zaseYerusalem; izindlu zonke zezikhulu wazitshisa ngomlilo.
24_52_14_Iindonga zonke zaseYerusalem ngeenxa zonke yazidiliza yonke impi yamaKaledi, ebinomthetheli wabasiki.
24_52_15_Kwizisweli zabantu, namasalela abantu ababesele phakathi komzi, namaphamba awaphambelayo kukumkani waseBhabheli,  namasalela engxokolo, wawafudusa uNebhuzaradan, umthetheli wabasiki.
24_52_16_Ke uNebhuzaradan, umthetheli wabasiki, wasalisa kwizisweli zelizwe, ukuze zibe ngabasebenzi bemidiliya nabalimi.
24_52_17_Iintsika zobhedu ezibe zisendlwini kaYehova, neenqwelwana,  nolwandle lobhedu obelusendlwini kaYehova, ezo zinto aziqhekeza amaKaledi, aluthwalela eBhabheli lonke ubhedu lwazo.
24_52_18_Athabatha neembiza, nemihlakulwana, nezitshetshe, nezitya zokutshiza, neenkamba, neempahla zonke zobhedu ebekulungiselelwa ngazo.
24_52_19_Umthetheli wabasiki wathabatha izidendeleko, neengcedevu,  nezitya zokutshisa, neembiza, neziphatho zezibane, neenkamba,  namathunga, igolide kwezegolide, isilivere kwezesilivere.
24_52_20_Neentsika zombini, ulwandle olunye, neenkomo ezilishumi elinambini zobhedu ezibe ziphantsi kwalo, neenqwelwana awazenzela indlu kaYehova uSolomon ukumkani, alwaba nakulinganiswa ubhedu lwezo mpahla zonke.
24_52_21_Neentsika ezo, ukuphakama kwenye intsika kube kuziikubhite ezilishumi elinesibhozo; umtya oziikubhite ezilishumi elinambini ubuyithandela, nezinyuko zayo beziyiminwe emine;  ibiholoholo.
24_52_22_Ingqukuva yayo ibiyeyobhedu, ukuphakama kwengqukuva bekuziikubhite ezintlanu; umnatha neerharnate bezisengqukuveni ngeenxa zonke; yonke loo nto yabe ilubhedu. Intsika yesibini yabe ikwanjalo, kunye neerharnate.
24_52_23_Iirharnate bezingamashumi asithoba anantandathu, zibheke emoyeni; iirharnate zonke bezilikhulu phezu komnatha ngeenxa zonke.
24_52_24_Umthetheli wabasiki wamthabatha uSeraya umbingeleli oyintloko, noZefaniya umbingeleli weyesibini intlantlu,  nabagcini-mnyango bobathathu.
24_52_25_Kuwo umzi wathabatha umbusi wamnye, owayengumveleli wamadoda okulwa, namadoda asixhenxe kuwo abebona ubuso bokumkani, awafunyanwa phakathi komzi; nombhali womthetheli womkhosi, obehlaba umkhosi kubantu belizwe, namadoda amashumi mathandathu kubantu belizwe, awafunyanwayo phakathi komzi.
24_52_26_Wabathabatha abo uNebhuzaradan, umthetheli wabasiki,  wabasa eRibhela, kukumkani waseBhabheli.
24_52_27_Wabaxabela ukumkani waseBhabheli, wababulala eRibhela ezweni laseHamati. Afuduswa ke amaYuda emhlabeni wawo.
24_52_28_Ngabo aba abantu awabafudusayo uNebhukadenetsare:  ngomnyaka wesixhenxe, amaYuda angamawaka amathathu, anamanci mabini anamathathu;
24_52_29_ngomnyaka weshumi elinesibhozo kaNebhukadenetsare kwafuduswa eYerusalem imiphefumlo yaba makhulu asibhozo,  anamanci mathathu anamibini;
24_52_30_ngomnyaka wamashumi amabini anamithathu kaNebhukadenetsare, uNebhuzaradan, umthetheli wabasiki,  wafudusa amaYuda ayimiphefumlo emakhulu asixhenxe, anamanci mane anamihlanu. Yonke imiphefumlo yaba ngamawaka amane anamakhulu amathandathu.
24_52_31_Kwathi ngomnyaka wamashumi omathathu anesixhenxe wokufuduswa kukaYehoyakim ukumkani wakwaYuda, ngenyanga yeshumi elinesibini, ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesihlanu enyangeni leyo, uEvili-merodaki ukumkani waseBhabheli, ngomnyaka wokwenziwa kwakhe ukumkani, wayiphakamisa intloko kaYehoyakim ukumkani wakwaYuda, wamkhupha entolongweni.
24_52_32_Wathetha naye kakuhle, wayimisa itrone yakhe, yaba ngaphezu kweetrone zabanye ookumkani ababenaye eBhabheli.
24_52_33_Wazikhulula iingubo zakhe zobubanjwa; wamana ukudla isonka ebusweni bakhe yonke imihla yokuphila kwakhe.
24_52_34_Umxhesho wakhe, umxhesho wamaxesha onke, wawunikwa, uvela kukumkani waseBhabheli, into yemini ngangemini yayo, kwada kwayimini yokufa kwakhe, yonke imihla yokuphila kwakhe.
25_1_1_Yoo! Uhleli wodwa, umzi obantu baye bebaninzi; Obe umkhulu ezintlangeni Usuke waba njengomhlolokazi; umthethelikazi emazweni Usuke waba ngofakwa uviko.
25_1_2_Ulila elilile ebusuku, iinyembezi zakhe zisezidleleni zakhe;  Akanamthuthuzeli kuzo zonke izithandane zakhe; Onke amakholwane akhe ammenezelele, Aba lutshaba kuye.
25_1_3_UYuda uye ekuthinjweni, ephuma ezintsizini nasezinkonzweni ezininzi; Yena uhleli ezintlangeni, akafumani kuphumla; Bonke abamsukelayo bamfikele ezingxingongweni.
25_1_4_Iindlela zaseZiyon zenza isijwili, ngokungabikho kwabaya emithendelekweni; Onke amasango ayo akanamntu, ababingeleli bayo bayancwina; Iintombi zayo zinosizi, yona ke kukrakra kuyo.
25_1_5_Ababandezeli bayo basuka bayintloko; iintshaba zayo zinobunqobo; Ngokuba uYehova uyenze yanosizi ngenxa yokreqo lwayo oluninzi; Abantwana bayo bemkile, bathinjiwe, baqhutywa ngumbandezeli.
25_1_6_Buphumile entombini enguZiyon bonke ubungangamsha bayo;  Abathetheli bayo baba njengamaxhama angafumani dlelo, Ahamba engenamandla phambi komsukeli.
25_1_7_IYerusalem iyazikhumbula, ngemini yeentsizi zayo neyokudinga kwayo, Zonke izinto zayo ezinqwenelekayo ebinazo kwakwiimini zamandulo, Ekuweni kwabantu bayo esandleni sombandezeli,  ingenamncedi; Ababandezeli bayo bayibona, bakuhleka ukucinywa kwayo.
25_1_8_IYerusalem asikuko nokuba yonile yona; ngenxa yoko yaba lubhorha; Bonke ababeyizukisa bayayicukuceza, ngokuba babone ubuze bayo; Nayo ngokwayo iyancwina, ibuye umva.
25_1_9_Ubunqambi bayo busezingutyeni zayo ezirhuqayo,  ayilikhumbulelanga ikamva layo; Yehla ke ngokubalulekileyo;  ayinamthuthuzeli; Ithi, Zikhangele, Yehova, iintsizi zam;  ngokuba utshaba luzikhulisile.
25_1_10_Umbandezeli usolule isandla sakhe phezu kwezinto zayo zonke ezinqwenelekayo; Kuba ibona iintlanga zingene engcweleni yayo,  Owawuwise umthetho wena, ukuba zingangeni ebandleni lakho.
25_1_11_Bonke abantu bayo bayancwina, befuna isonka; Barhole izinto zabo ezinqwenelekayo ngenxa yesonka, ukuze bawubuyise umphefumlo; Bona, Yehova, ukhangele, ukuba ndisuke ndacukucezeka.
25_1_12_Akunto na oku kuni nonke, nina nidlula ngendlela? Bhekani nibone, ukuba kukho na umvandedwa onjengomvandedwa wam,  endiwenziweyo, Athe uYehova wandenza lusizi ngemini yokuvutha komsindo wakhe.
25_1_13_Engaphezulu, uthume umlilo emathanjeni am, wawanyathela;  Uzanekele umnatha iinyawo zam, wandibuyisa umva; Undenze inxuwa, yonke imini ndityhafile.
25_1_14_Idyokhwe yezikreqo zam ibotshwe sisandla sakhe;  Zibhijelene, zenyuka zaba semqaleni wam, zawakhubekisa amandla am; INkosi yam indinikele ezandleni zabo ndingenakumisa kubo.
25_1_15_INkosi yam izitshitshisile zonke iimbalasane zam eziphakathi kwam; Indimemele umthendeleko, ukuba yaphule amadodana am. INkosi yam ixovule inkazana enguYuda, ngokungathi kusesixovulweni sewayini.
25_1_16_Ngenxa yezo zinto ndiyalila; iliso lam, iliso lam lihla amanzi, Ngokuba ekude kum umthuthuzeli, umbuyisi womphefumlo wam; Baziimpanza abantwana bam, ngokuba utshaba lwam lundoyisile.
25_1_17_IZiyon iyazolula izandla zayo, ayinamthuthuzeli; UYehova ubawisele umthetho ngoYakobhi, ukuba ababandezeli bakhe bamngqonge: IYerusalem iyinto elubhorha phakathi kwabo.
25_1_18_Ulilungisa uYehova; ngokuba bendiphikise umlomo wakhe.  Khanive, nonke zizwe, niwubone umvandedwa wam; Umthinjana wam namadodana am emke nokuthinjwa.
25_1_19_Ndibize izithandane zam, zandikhohlisa zona; Ababingeleli bam, namadoda amakhulu akwam, aphume umphefumlo phakathi komzi,  Xa abezifunela ukudla, ukuba abuyise imiphefumlo yawo.
25_1_20_Khangela, Yehova, ngokuba ndibandezelekile; izibilini zam ziyabila; Intliziyo yam iphendukile phakathi kwam; ngokuba ndasuka ndaba ziinkani kuphela; Ngaphandle ikrele landihlutha abantwana, ngaphakathi kwakukufa kodwa.
25_1_21_Bandivile ukuba ndiyancwina; ndathi, Andinamthuthuzeli;  Zonke iintshaba zam zibuvile ububi bam; zinemihlali, ngokuba oko kwenziwe nguwe. Uyayizisa imini oyimemileyo, ziya kuba njengam ke.
25_1_22_Mabufike phambi kwakho bonke ububi bazo, Uziphathe njengoko wandiphatha ngako ngenxa yezikreqo zam zonke; Ngokuba kuninzi ukuncwina kwam, nentliziyo yam ityhafile.
25_2_1_Yoo! Itheni na iNkosi yam ukuyisibekela kangaka ngomsindo wayo intombi enguZiyon? Isikhuphile ezulwini, yasikhahlela ehlabathini, isihombo sikaSirayeli, Ayasikhumbula isihlalo seenyawo zayo ngemini yomsindo wayo.
25_2_2_INkosi yam iwaginyile, ayawaconga, onke amakriwa akwaYakobi;  Izigungxule ngokuphuphuma komsindo wayo iinqaba ezinkulu zentombi enguYuda; Yazizisa emhlabeni; Ibungcolisile ubukumkani nabathetheli babo.
25_2_3_Izixakazile ngokuvutha komsindo wayo zonke iimpondo zikaSirayeli; Isibuyise umva isandla sayo sokunene ebusweni botshaba; Yatshisa kwaYakobi njengomlilo olenyayo, odlayo ngeenxa zonke.
25_2_4_Isityedile isaphetha sayo njengotshaba; imise isandla sayo sokunene, saxelisa esombandezeli, Yazibulala zonke izinto ezinqwenelekayo emehlweni; Ententeni yentombi enguZiyon,  ibuphalazile ubushushu bayo njengomlilo.
25_2_5_INkosi yam isuke yaba njengotshaba; imginyile uSirayeli,  Iziginyile zonke iingxande zayo ezinde, izonakalisile iinqaba zayo ezinkulu; Yandisa entombini enguYuda uncwino nokukhala.
25_2_6_Iyichithile indawo yayo ebiyiweyo njengomyezo;  Iyitshabalalisile indawo yayo yentlangano; UYehova wenze walityalwa eZiyon umthendeleko nesabatha; Wabagiba ekubhavumeni komsindo wakhe ukumkani nombingeleli.
25_2_7_INkosi yam isihlambele isibingelelo sayo, ithe nethe kuyo ingcwele yayo, Izivingcelele esandleni sotshaba iindonga zeengxande zayo ezinde; Baxokozela endlwini kaYehova njengemini yomthendeleko.
25_2_8_UYehova ucinge ukonakalisa udonga lwentombi enguZiyon;  Wolule ulutya lokulinganisela, akasibuyisa isandla sakhe ekuginyeni; Wenza ungqameko lomsele lwaba nesijwili,  kwanodonga; zithokombisile kunye ezo zinto.
25_2_9_Amasango ayo atshonile emhlabeni; uyitshabalalisile,  uyaphule imivalo yayo; Ukumkani wayo nabathetheli bayo basezintlangeni, akukho myalelo; Abaprofeti bayo abafumani mbono kuYehova.
25_2_10_Ahleli emhlabeni ethe cwaka amadoda amakhulu entombi enguZiyon; Azigalele ngomhlaba entloko, abhinqe ezirhwexayo;  Uzithobele emhlabeni iintloko zawo umthinjana waseYerusalem.
25_2_11_Amehlo am aphela ziinyembezi, ziyabila izibilini zam,  Isibindi sam siphalalele emhlabeni, ngenxa yokwaphuka kwentombi yabantu bakowethu, Ngokutyhafa kwabantwana, nabasemabeleni,  ezitratweni zomzi.
25_2_12_Bamana ukuthi koonina, Iphi na ingqolowa newayini?  Ekutyhafeni kwabo njengabangxwelerhiweyo ezitratweni zomzi,  Ekuziphalazeni kwemiphefumlo yabo esifubeni sonina.
25_2_13_Ndikungqinele, ngantoni na? Ndikufanekise nantoni na,  ntombi yaseYerusalem? Ndikulinganise nantoni na, ukuze ndikuthuthuzele, ntombindini iyintombi, inguZiyon? Ngokuba kukhulu ngangolwandle ukwaphuka kwakho; ngubani na onokukuphilisa?
25_2_14_Abaprofeti bakho bakubonele imibono yento engento nejavujavu; Ababutyhila ubugwenxa bakho, ukuba kubuyiswe ukuthinjwa kwakho; Bakubonele imibono ezizihlabo ezingezizo,  nezokugxothwa.
25_2_15_Babetha izandla ngawe bonke abadlula ngendlela; Benza umsondlo, bahlunguzele iintloko ngentombi enguYerusalem,  besithi, Ngulo mzi na, lo kuthiwa kuphela kwenzwakazi,  yimihlali yehlabathi lonke?
25_2_16_Zonke iintshaba zakho zikwakhamisela umlomo; Zenza umsondlo, zitshixizela amazinyo; zithi, Siyiginyile; Inene,  yiyo le imini ebe siyithembile; siyifumene, siyibonile.
25_2_17_Ukwenzile uYehova abekunkqangiyele; Ulizalisile ilizwi lakhe, abeliwisele umthetho kususela kwiimini zamandulo;  Ugungxule, akaconga; Wenze lwakuvuyelela utshaba lwakho,  Uphakamise uphondo lwababandezeli bakho.
25_2_18_Intliziyo yabo ikhala eNkosini yam; Ludonga lwentombi enguZiyon, mazihle iinyembezi njengomlambo imini nobusuku; Musa ukuyeka, malungaphezi ukhozo lweliso lakho.
25_2_19_Vuka, uhlahlambe ebusuku, ekuqalekeni kwemilindo; Yiphalaze njengamanzi intliziyo yakho ebusweni beNkosi; Ziphakamisele kuyo izandla zakho, ngenxa yomphefumlo wabantwana bakho,  Abatyhafileyo kukulamba ekujikeni kwezitrato zonke.
25_2_20_Bona, Yehova, ukhangele, ngubani na lo wenjenje ukumphatha kakubi? Abafazi bangadla isiqhamo somzimba wabo na? Badle abantwana ababathantamisayo na? Angabulawelwa engcweleni yeNkosi na umbingeleli nomprofeti?
25_2_21_Balele emhlabeni phandle oyinkwenkwe noyindoda enkulu;  Umthinjana wam namadodana am awile likrele; Ubulele ngemini yomsindo wakho, usikile, akwaconga.
25_2_22_Ukumemile ngokwemini yomthendeleko ukunxunguphala kwam ngeenxa zonke, Akwabakho usindayo, usalayo, ngemini yomsindo kaYehova. Endibathantamisileyo ndabakhulisa, utshaba lwam lubagqibele.
25_3_1_Ndim indoda ebone iintsizi, ngentonga yokuphuphuma komsindo wakhe.
25_3_2_Undikhokele wandihambisa ebumnyameni, akwaba sekukhanyeni.
25_3_3_Ubuye wasiguqulela kum ndedwa isandla sakho imini yonke.
25_3_4_Uyonakalisile inyama yam nolusu lwam; uwaphule amathambo am.
25_3_5_Undakhele wandirhaqa ngenyongo nendiniso.
25_3_6_Undibele ezindaweni ezimnyama, njengabafe ngonaphakade.
25_3_7_Undibiyele ngeenxa zonke, andinakuphuma; uwenze aba nzima amakhamandela am obhedu.
25_3_8_Noko ndikhalayo, ndizibikayo, uyawuvingcela umthandazo wam.
25_3_9_Uzibiyele iindlela zam ngamatye aqingqiweyo, uzenze goso iingqushu zam.
25_3_10_Kum uyibhere elalelayo, uyingonyama esezintsithelweni.
25_3_11_Uzityekisile iindlela zam, wandidlavula; undenze inxuwa.
25_3_12_Usigobile isaphetha sakhe, wandimisa ndaba yitekeni yotolo lwakhe.
25_3_13_Uzise ezintsweni zam iintolo zomphongolo wakhe.
25_3_14_Ndisuke ndayintlekisa kubantu bonke bakowethu; ndiyingoma yabo imini yonke.
25_3_15_Undihluthise ngeento ezikrakra, wandiseza ndahlutha umhlonyane.
25_3_16_Uwaphule ngohlalu amazinyo am; undixinzelele phantsi eluthuthwini.
25_3_17_Uwuhlambile umphefumlo wam, awaba naluxolo; ndiyilibele into elungileyo.
25_3_18_Ndathi, aphelile amandla am, nokulinda kwam kuYehova.
25_3_19_Zikhumbule iintsizi zam, nokutshutshiswa kwam, umhlonyane nenyongo.
25_3_20_Umphefumlo wam uyazikhumbula unangoku ezo zinto,  usibekekile kum.
25_3_21_Oko ndikunyamekele ngentliziyo: ngenxa yoko ndilindile.
25_3_22_Kungeenceba zikaYehova le nto singagqityelwanga, ngokuba azipheli iimfesane zakhe.
25_3_23_Zintsha imiso ngemiso; kukhulu ukuthembeka kwakhe.
25_3_24_Isabelo sam nguYehova, utsho umphefumlo wam; ngenxa yoko ndilindele kuye.
25_3_25_UYehova ulungile kwabathembele kuye, kumphefumlo omquqelayo.
25_3_26_Kulungile ukuba umntu alulindele, ethe cwaka, usindiso lukaYehova.
25_3_27_Kuyilungele indoda ukuba iyithwale idyokhwe kwasebutsheni bayo.
25_3_28_Mayihlale yodwa ithe cwaka, xa iyithwalisiweyo.
25_3_29_Mayiwubeke eluthulini umlomo wayo; kungabakho ithemba mhlawumbi.
25_3_30_Mayisinikele isidlele sayo koyibethayo; mayihluthe yingcikivo.
25_3_31_Ngokuba iNkosi yam ayiyi kumhlamba umntu ngonaphakade,
25_3_32_Ngokuba naxa imhlisele usizi, noko yoba nemfesane ngokobuninzi benceba yayo.
25_3_33_Ngokuba ayibacinezeli ngokuphuma entliziyweni yayo, ibenze babe nosizi oonyana babantu.
25_3_34_Ekutyunyuzweni kwababanjiweyo bonke behlabathi phantsi kweenyawo;
25_3_35_Ekulijikeni ityala lomfo phambi kobuso bOsenyangweni;
25_3_36_Ekuphenulweni komntu ekubambaneni kwakhe nomnye: iNkosi yam ayiboni na?
25_3_37_Ngubani na okhe wathetha, kwenzeka, iNkosi yam ingawisanga mthetho?
25_3_38_Akuphumi okubi nokulungileyo emlonyeni wOsenyangweni na?
25_3_39_Yini na ukuba umntu akhalaze ephilile? Umfo makakhalaze ngenxa yezono zakhe.
25_3_40_Masiziphengulule iindlela zethu, sizigocagoce, sibuyele kuYehova.
25_3_41_Masizinyuse iintliziyo zethu kunye nezandla zethu, sizise kuThixo emazulwini.
25_3_42_Thina sikreqile saba neenkani; wena akuxolelanga.
25_3_43_Uzigqubuthele ngomsindo, wasisukela; ubulele akwaconga.
25_3_44_Uzigqubuthele ngelifu, ukuze ungaphumeli umthandazo wethu.
25_3_45_Usenze inkunkuma, imvuthuluka esazulwini sezizwe.
25_3_46_Zisakhamisele umlomo wazo zonke iintshaba zethu.
25_3_47_Kokwethu ukunkwantya, nomgongxo, nesibatha, nokutshabalala,  nokwaphuka.
25_3_48_Iliso lam lihla imijelo yamanzi, ngenxa yokwaphuka kwentombi yabantu bakowethu.
25_3_49_Iliso lam liyatyityizela, aliyeki, alinqamki,
25_3_50_Ade aqondele abone uYehova, esemazulwini.
25_3_51_Iliso lam liyawubulala umphefumlo wam, ngenxa yeentombi zonke zomzi wakowethu.
25_3_52_Zindizingele zandizingela njengentaka iintshaba zam ngelize.
25_3_53_Zibubhangisile ubomi bam ngokundeyelisela emhadini,  zandigibisela ngamatye.
25_3_54_Amanzi ahambe phezu kwentloko yam, ndathi, Ndinqanyulwe.
25_3_55_Ndinqule igama lakho, Yehova, kongaphantsi umhadi.
25_3_56_Izwi lam waliva; musa ukuyifihla indlebe yakho ekubefuzeni kwam, ekuzibikeni kwam.
25_3_57_Wasondela ngemini yokukunqula kwam, wathi, Musa ukoyika.
25_3_58_Uwathethile amatyala omphefumlo wam, Nkosi yam; ubukhulule ubomi bam ngokubumisela.
25_3_59_Ukubonile, Yehova, ukuphenulwa kwam; ligwebe ityala lam.
25_3_60_Uyibonile yonke impindezelo yabo, uzivile zonke iingcinga zabo ngam.
25_3_61_Ukuvile ukungcikiva kwabo, Yehova, uzivile zonke iingcinga zabo ngam,
25_3_62_Umlomo wabo basukela phezulu kum, nezicamango zabo ngam yonke imini.
25_3_63_Ukuhlala kwabo nokusuka kwabo kubheke; ndiyingoma yabo.
25_3_64_Babuyisele imbuyekezo, Yehova, ngokwezenzo zezandla zabo.
25_3_65_Banike ubumfama bentliziyo; intshwabulo yakho mayibe kubo.
25_3_66_Basukele ngomsindo, ubatshabalalise, bangabikho phantsi kwamazulu kaYehova.
25_4_1_Yoo! Isuke igolide yaba mncumevu; isuke ecikizekileyo,  elungileyo, yaba yeyimbi; Asuke aphalazwa amatye engcwele ekujikeni kwezitrato zonke.
25_4_2_AbeZiyon abanqabileyo, abamelwe yigolide engcwengiweyo, Yoo!  Babalelwa ekubeni yimiphanda yodongwe, umsebenzi wezandla zombumbi.
25_4_3_Kanti neempungutye ziyalirhola ibele, zanyise amathole azo;  Ke yona intombi yabantu bakowethu isuke yaba sisijorha,  njengenciniba entlango.
25_4_4_Ulwimi losebeleni lunamathela ekhuhlangubeni lakhe linxano;  Abantwana bacela isonka, akukho ubaphulelayo.
25_4_5_Ababesidla ubuncwane baphanzile ezitratweni; Ababephathwa ngeengubo ezibomvu bawola amazala.
25_4_6_Bukhulile ubugwenxa bentombi yakowethu ngaphezu kwesono seSodom, Yona yabhukuqwayo ngephanyazo, kungasiwanga sandla kuyo.
25_4_7_Babeqaqambile ababalulekileyo bayo ngaphezu kwekhephu; baye bemhlophe ngaphezu kwamasi; Babeyingqombela imizimba ngaphezu kwekorale, isibili sabo besinjengesafire;
25_4_8_Imbonakalo yabo imnyama ngaphezu kocolothi; Abanakaneki ezitratweni; ulusu lwabo lutshele emathanjeni abo; lomile,  lwanjengokhuni.
25_4_9_Baneyhweba ababulewe ngekrele kunababulewe yindlala, Bona baphelayo ngokubulawa kukungabikho kweziqhamo zamasimi.
25_4_10_Izandla zabafazi abanemfesane zipheke abantwanana babo,  Baba kukudla kwabo ekwaphukeni kwentombi yabantu bakowethu.
25_4_11_Ubuphelelisile ubushushu bakhe uYehova, ukuphalazile ukuvutha komsindo wakhe; Wafaka umlilo eZiyon, wazitshisa iziseko zayo.
25_4_12_Bebengenakukholwa ookumkani behlabathi, nabemi bonke belimiweyo, Ukuba ubengangenayo umbandezeli notshaba emasangweni aseYerusalem.
25_4_13_Kungenxa yezono zabaprofeti bayo, nobugwenxa bababingeleli bayo, Abaphalaze igazi lamalungisa phakathi kwayo.
25_4_14_Baphamzela beziimfama ezitratweni, bedyobhekile ligazi,  Bada abantu ababa nakuchukumisa nezambatho zabo.
25_4_15_Sukani, nantso inqambi! Kwatshiwo ukumenyezwa kubo. Sukani,  sukani, musani ukuphatha! Bakusaba, baphamzela nalapho,  kwathiwa phakathi kweentlanga, Mabangaphindi baphambukele khona.
25_4_16_Ubuso bukaYehova bubachithachithile, akasayi kubabheka;  Ubuso bababingeleli ababubhekanga, amadoda amakhulu abawababalanga.
25_4_17_Thina, amehlo ethu ayaphela, ekhangele uncedo olungamampunge; Ekuboniseleni kwethu sibonisela uhlanga olungayi kusisindisa.
25_4_18_Bazingela amanyathela ethu, ukuze singabi nakuhamba ezitratweni zethu; Kusondele ukuphela kwethu, izalisekile imihla yethu; ewe, kufikile ukuphela kwethu.
25_4_19_Abasisukelayo banamendu ngaphezu kwamaxhalanga asezulwini;  Basisukela ezintabeni ngokushushu, basilalela entlango.
25_4_20_Umoya wamathatha ethu, umthanjiswa kaYehova, ubanjisiwe emihadini yabo: Lowo besisithi, Siya kuhlala phantsi komthunzi wakhe ezintlangeni.
25_4_21_Yiba nemihlali uvuye kambe, ntombi yakwaEdom, ihleliyo ezweni lakwaUtse; Iya kudlulela nakuwe indebe; uya kunxila,  uzihlube.
25_4_22_Bugqityiwe ubugwenxa bakho, ntombi inguZiyon; Akayi kuphinda akufuduse; Uya kubuvelela ubugwenxa bakho, ntombi yakwaEdom. Uya kuzityhila izono zakho.
25_5_1_Kukhumbule, Yehova, okusihleleyo; Bheka, uyibone ingcikivo yethu.
25_5_2_Ilifa lethu lisuke lenziwa elabasemzini, Izindlu zethu zalunga kwabolunye uhlanga.
25_5_3_Siziinkedama, asinabawo; Oma banjengabahlolokazi.
25_5_4_Amanzi ethu siwasela ngesilivere; Iinkuni zethu ziza kuthi ngexabiso.
25_5_5_Intshutshiso iphezu kwentamo yethu; Sidiniwe, asinakuphumla.
25_5_6_Isandla sisinika amaYiputa, Nama-Asiriya, ukuba sihluthe sisonka.
25_5_7_Oobawo bonile, abasekho; Thina sithwele ubugwenxa babo.
25_5_8_Silawulwa ngabakhonzi; Akukho usiqhiwulayo ezandleni zabo.
25_5_9_Isonka sethu sisizuza ngomphefumlo wethu usisichenge. Ngenxa yekrele lasentlango.
25_5_10_Ulusu lwethu luyavutha njengeziko Ngenxa yolophu lwendlala.
25_5_11_Badlwengule abafazi eZiyon, Iintombi emizini yakwaYuda.
25_5_12_Baxhome abathetheli ngezandla; Ubuso bamadoda amakhulu abubekwa.
25_5_13_Amadodana athwala amatye okusila, Amakhwenkwe akhubeka phantsi kweenkuni.
25_5_14_Amadoda amakhulu aphezile ukuya esangweni; Amadodana,  ekubetheni uhadi.
25_5_15_Iphelile imihlali yentliziyo yethu, Ukuqamba kwethu kujike kwaba kukumbambazela.
25_5_16_Siwile isithsaba entlokweni yethu; Yeha ke thina! kuba sonile.
25_5_17_Ngenxa yoko ityhafile intliziyo yethu; Ngenxa yezo zinto amnyama amehlo ethu;
25_5_18_Ngenxa yentaba yaseZiyon, kuba ibharhile, Kuhamba iimpungutye phezu kwayo.
25_5_19_Wena, Yehova, uhleli ngonaphakade; Itrone yakho ikwisizukulwana ngesizukulwana.
25_5_20_Yini na ukuba usilibale ngonaphakade, Usilahle imihla emide?
25_5_21_Sibuyisele kuwe, Yehova; sobuya; Hlaziya imihla yethu njengokwamandulo.
25_5_22_Ungaba usicekise mpela na, Wanoburhalarhume kuthi ngokukhulukazi na?
26_1_1_Ke kaloku, ngomnyaka wamashumi omathathu, ngenyanga yesine,  ngolwesihlanu usuku enyangeni leyo, ndakubon ukuba ndiphakathi kwabathinjiweyo ngasemlanjeni oyiKebhare, avuleka amazulu,  ndabona imibono kaThixo.
26_1_2_Ngolwesihlanu enyangeni leyo (ingumnyaka ke wesihlanu wokuthinjwa kokumkani uYehoyakin lowo),
26_1_3_kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuHezekile unyana kaBhuzi,  umbingeleli, ezweni lamaKaledi, ngasemlanjeni oyiKebhare; saba phezu kwakhe apho isandla sikaYehova.
26_1_4_Ndabona ke, nanko kusiza umoya ovuthuzayo, uvela ngasentla,  unelifu elikhulu nomlilo obumbeneyo njengembumbulu, nobumhlophe obungeenxa zonke kulo, obuphuma ngaphakathi kwawo, bubonakala ngathi yigolide evuthiweyo emlilweni phakathi.
26_1_5_Ngaphakathi kwawo yimfano yezinto eziphilileyo ezine. Nantsi ke imbonakalo yazo: zibe zinemfano yomntu;
26_1_6_inye ibinobuso obune, inye kuzo apho ibinamaphiko amane.
26_1_7_Imilenze yazo ibiyimilenze ethe nkqo; umphantsi weenyawo ubunjengomphantsi wenqina lethole; zidangazela zibonakala ngathi lubhedu olubengezelisiweyo.
26_1_8_Zazinezandla zomntu ngaphantsi kwamaphiko azo emacaleni azo omane; zone ke zinobuso namaphiko;
26_1_9_amaphiko azo abehlangene, elaleyo nelaleyo; bezingajiki ekuhambeni kwazo, bezihamba, iyileyo iye kwicala elikhangelene nobuso bayo.
26_1_10_Imfano yobuso bazo ibe ibubuso bomntu; zinobuso bengonyama zone ngasekunene; zinobuso benkomo zone ngasekhohlo, zinobuso bokhozi zone;
26_1_11_ubuso bazo namaphiko azo abe ahlukene ngaphezulu; iyileyo inamabini ehlangene nawaleyo, namaphiko amabini ke egubungele imizimba yazo.
26_1_12_Zahamba ke, iyileyo yaya kwicala elikhangelene nobuso bayo;  apho sukuba ubusiya khona umoya, zaya khona; azajika ekuhambeni kwazo.
26_1_13_Imfano yezinto eziphilileyo ezo, imbonakalo yazo, ibingathi ngamalahle omlilo abasiweyo; ibingathi yimbonakalo yezikhuni ezitshangazayo; wona wahambahamba phakathi kwezinto eziphilileyo ezo; umhlophe ke umlilo lowo, emlilweni kuphuma imibane.
26_1_14_Izinto eziphilileyo bezigidima zibuye, ngokokubonakala kokuphambaphamba kombane.
26_1_15_Ndazibona izinto eziphilileyo; nanko ke, kukho iivili emhlabeni, ecaleni kwezinto eziphilileyo, zinganye iivili kubuso ngobuso bazo obune.
26_1_16_Ukubonakala kweevili nokusetyenzwa kwazo kwakunjengembonakalo yekrizolite, zimfani-nye zone; ukubonakala kwazo nokusetyenzwa kwazo kungathi ivili ingaphakathi kwevili.
26_1_17_Ekuhambeni kwazo zaphambela kumacala azo omane; azajika ekuhambeni kwazo.
26_1_18_Iifeleni zazo beziphakamile, bezisoyikeka; iifeleni zazo bezizele ngamehlo ngeenxa zonke kuzo zone.
26_1_19_Zakuhamba izinto eziphilileyo, zahamba nazo iivili ecaleni lazo; zakusuka izinto eziphilileyo emhlabeni, zasuka nazo iivili.
26_1_20_Apho sukuba usiya khona umoya, zaya apho sukuba umoya ubusiya khona; zasuka iivili kunye nazo; ngokokuba umoya wezinto eziphilileyo ubukho ezivilini ezo.
26_1_21_Zakuhamba, zahamba nazo; zakuma, zema nazo; zakusuka emhlabeni, zasuka iivili kunye nazo; ngokokuba umoya wezinto eziphilileyo ubukho ezivilini ezo.
26_1_22_Naphezu kweentloko zezinto eziphilileyo bekukho into efana nesibhakabhaka, ngathi ngembonakalo yikristale eyoyikekayo,  sanekiwe phezu kwentloko yazo ngaphezulu.
26_1_23_Ngaphantsi kwesibhakabhaka amaphiko ayethe tye, elo lasinga kwelo; iyileyo inamabini ayigubungeleyo, iyileyo inamabini ayigubungeleyo emzimbeni.
26_1_24_Ndeva ke isandi samaphiko azo, sinjengesandi samanzi amaninzi, ngathi lilizwi loSomandla, ekuhambeni kwazo; izwi elinengxolo ngathi sisandi somkhosi; zakuma, zawayeka ehla amaphiko azo.
26_1_25_Kwabakho ke izwi liphuma ngaphaya kwesibhakabhaka, esibe siphezu kweentloko zazo; zakuma, zawayeka ehla amaphiko azo.
26_1_26_Ngaphezu kwesibhakabhaka esibe siphezu kweentloko zazo,  kwabonakala umfanekiselo wetrone, wanga lilitye lesafire;  ngaphezu komfanekiselo wetrone kwabakho umfanekiselo ongathi yimbonakalo yomntu phezu kwayo ngaphezulu.
26_1_27_Ndabona ke, ngathi yimbonakalo yegolide evuthiweyo, ngathi yimbonakalo yomlilo, ngaphakathi kwayo nangeenxa zonke kuyo,  kwathabathela embonakalweni yesinqe kwenyusa; kwathabathela embonakalweni yesinqe kwehlisa, ndabona ke ngathi yimbonakalo yomlilo, kumhlophe ke ngeenxa zonke.
26_1_28_Ngathi yimbonakalo yomnyama obakhoyo efini mini ngemvula,  yabe injalo imbonakalo yobumhlophe ngeenxa zonke. Leyo yimbonakalo yomfanekiselo wobuqaqawuli bukaYehova. Ndabona ke,  ndawa ngobuso, ndaliva izwi lothethayo.
26_2_1_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, yima ngeenyawo zakho, ndithethe nawe.
26_2_2_Kwangena ke uMoya kum, xa abethetha nam, wandimisa ngeenyawo zam, ndamva othetha kum.
26_2_3_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, ndikuthuma koonyana bakaSirayeli,  kwiintlanga ezingabagwiliki, abagwilikileyo kum; bona nooyise babo bakreqile kum, kwada kwayile mini.
26_2_4_Oonyana baziingwanyalala ubuso, balukhuni intliziyo.  Ndikuthuma kubo; uze uthi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_2_5_Ke bona (nokuba bathe beva, nokuba bathe bala, kuba beyindlu eneenkani) baya kwazi ukuba bekukho umprofeti phakathi kwabo.
26_2_6_Wena ke, nyana womntu, musa ukuboyika, ungawoyiki amazwi abo; nangani usemarhawini nasemeveni, uhleli phezu koonomadudwane, musa ukuwoyika amazwi abo, ungaqhiphuki umbilini bubuso babo, kuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_2_7_Wathethe ke kubo amazwi am, nokuba bathe beva, nokuba bathe bala; ngokuba baneenkani.
26_2_8_Wena ke, nyana womntu, yiva endikuthethayo kuwe; ungabi nankani, njengale ndlu ineenkani; yakhamisa, udle endikunikayo.
26_2_9_Ndabona, naso isandla solulelwe kum; nantso kuso incwadi esongwayo.
26_2_10_Wayitwabulula phambi kwam; yaye ke ibhaliwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle, kubhalwe kuyo izimbonono, nezikhwino, nezimema.
26_3_1_Wathi ke kum, Nyana womtu, kudle okufumanayo yidle le ncwadi isongwayo, uye uthethe kwindlu kaSirayeli.
26_3_2_Ndawuvula ke umlomo wam, wandidlisa loo ncwadi isongwayo;
26_3_3_wathi kum, Nyana womntu, dlisa isisu sakho, uzalise umbilini wakho ngaloo ncwadi isongwayo ndikunikayo. Ndayidla ke, yaba nencasa emlonyeni wam, njengobusi.
26_3_4_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, hamba uye kwindlu kaSirayeli,  uthethe kubo ngamazwi am.
26_3_5_Ngokuba akuthunyelwa kubantu abantetho inzulu, abalulwimi lunzima; uthunyelwa kwindlu kaSirayeli.
26_3_6_Andikuthumeli kwizizwe ezininzi, ezintetho inzulu,  ezilulwimi lunzima, ezimazwi ungaweviyo; ndikuthumele kuzo ezi zinokukuphulaphula zona.
26_3_7_Ke indlu kaSirayeli ayiyi kuvuma ukukuphulaphula; ngokokuba abavumi ukundiphulaphula nam; kuba yonke indlu kaSirayeli ilukhuni ibunzi, igogotyile ngentliziyo.
26_3_8_Yabona, ndibenza lukhuni ubuso bakho, kwanjengobuso babo;  ibunzi lakho libe lukhuni, Kwanjengebunzi labo;
26_3_9_ndilenza libe njengedayiman, elukhuni ngaphezu kweqhwitha,  ibunzi lakho. Uze ungaboyiki, ungaqhiphuki umbilini phambi kwabo; ngokuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_3_10_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, onke amazwi am endiya kuwathetha kuwe, wamkelele entliziyweni yakho, uweve ngeendlebe zakho;
26_3_11_uhambe uye kubathinjwa, koonyana babantu bakowenu, uthethe kubo uthi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova; nokuba bathe beva, nokuba bathe bala.
26_3_12_Wandifunqula uMoya, ndeva ngasemva kwam isandi sendudumo enkulu, sisithi, Mabubongwe ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, endaweni yabo.
26_3_13_Kananjalo ndeva nesandi samaphiko ezinto eziphililileyo,  elo lifikelela kwelo, nesandi seevili ngakuzo, nesandi sendudumo enkulu.
26_3_14_Wandifunqula uMoya, wandisusa; ndahamba ndikrakra bubushushu bomoya wam. Saye ke isandla sikaYehova siphezu kwam,  siqinile.
26_3_15_Ndafika ke eTelabhibhi, kubathinjwa ababehleli emlanjeni oyiKebhare, apho babehleli khona; ndahlala phantsi khona iintsuku zasixhenxe, ndimangalisiwe, phakathi kwabo.
26_3_16_Kwathi ekupheleni kweentsuku ezisixhenxe, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_3_17_Nyana womntu, ndikwenze umboniseli kwindlu kaSirayeli; live ke ilizwi emlonyeni wam, ubavuselele ngokuvela kum.
26_3_18_Xa ndithi kongendawo, Inene, uya kufa; usuke wena ungamvuseleli, ungathethi ukuze umvuselele ongendawo, ukuze aphume endleleni yakhe engendawo, aphile; wofa ongendawo lowo ngobugwenxa bakhe, kodwa lona igazi lakhe ndolibiza esandleni sakho.
26_3_19_Wena ke, xa uthe wamvuselela ongendawo, akabuya endleleni yakhe, endleleni yakhe engendawo: wofa ngobugwenxa bakhe, kodwa wena uwuhlangule umphefumlo wakho.
26_3_20_Ke, lakubuya ebulungiseni balo ilungisa, lenze ngobugqwetha, ndibeke isikhubekiso phambi kwalo; lofa lona; xa uthe akwalivuselela, lofa ngenxa yesono salo, bungakhunjulwa ubulungisa balo elabenzayo; kodwa lona igazi lalo ndolibiza esandleni sakho.
26_3_21_Wena ke, xa uthe walivuselela ilungisa, ukuba lingoni ilungisa, alona ke: lophila ngokuba livuselelwe, ke wena uwuhlangule umphefumlo wakho.
26_3_22_Sabakho apho isandla sikaYehova phezu kwam, wathi kum, Suk  ume, phuma uye entilini, ndithethe nawe khona.
26_3_23_Ndesuka ndema, ndaphuma ndaya entilini; nanko ke, kumi khona ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova obunjengobuqaqawuli obuya ndabubonayo ngasemlanjeni oyiKebhare; ndawa ngobuso.
26_3_24_Kwafika uMoya kum, wandimisa ngeenyawo zam, wathetha nam,  wathi, Yiya uzivalele endlwini yakho.
26_3_25_Wena ke, nyana womntu, yabona, baya kukufaka izintya,  bakubophe ngazo, ukuze ungaphumi uye phakathi kwabo.
26_3_26_Ndiya kulunamathelisa ulwimi lwakho ekhuhlangubeni lakho,  ube sisidenge, ungabi yindoda eyohlwayayo kubo; ngokuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_3_27_Ndakuthetha nawe, ndowuvula umlomo wakho, uthi ke kubo,  Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ovayo makeve, owalayo makale;  ngokuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_4_1_Wena ke, nyana womntu, thabatha isitena, usibeke phambi kwakho, ukrole umzi kuso, iYerusalem;
26_4_2_uwungqinge, uwakhele iinqaba zokubonisela, uwufumbele udonga lokungqinga; uwenzele iminquba, umisele izinto zokutyhomfa iindonga ngeenxa zonke.
26_4_3_Wena ke, thabatha ipani yesinyithi, uyimise ibe ludonga lwesinyithi phakathi kwakho nomzi lowo; ububhekise ubuso bakho kuwo, ube selungqingweni wona, uwungqinge wena. Ngumqondiso lo kwindlu kaSirayeli.
26_4_4_Wena ke, lala ngecala lakho lasekhohlo, ububeke ubugwenxa bendlu kaSirayeli phezu kwalo: ngangenani leentsuku oya kulala ngalo, uya kubuthwala ubugwenxa babo.
26_4_5_Kuba iminyaka yobugwenxa babo ndiyenza ukuba kuwe ibe ngangenani leentsuku, iintsuku ezimakhulu mathathu anamanci asithoba; uya kubuthwala ubugwenxa bendlu kaSirayeli.
26_4_6_Uya kuthi, wakuba uzifezile ezo, ulale okwesibini ngecala lakho lasekunene, ubuthwale ubugwenxa bendlu kaYuda iintsuku ezimashumi mane; ndikwenzela usuku lube ngumnyaka, usuku lube ngumnyaka.
26_4_7_Uze ke ububhekise ubuso bakho elungqingweni lweYerusalem,  ingalo yakho ihlutyiwe, uprofetele kuyo.
26_4_8_Yabona, ndikufaka izintya, ukuze ungaguqukeli kwelinye icala, ude uzigqibe iintsuku zokungqinga kwakho.
26_4_9_Wena ke, thabatha ingqolowa, nerhasi, neembotyi,  neentlumayo, namazimba, nespelete, uzigalele ezo zinto sityeni sinye, uzenzele wena isonka; ngokwenani leentsuku olala ngecala lakho, uya kusidla iintsuku ezimakhulu mathathu anamanci asithoba.
26_4_10_Ukudla kwakho oya kukudla koba ngokomlinganiselo, iishekele ezimashumi mabini ngosuku; uya kusidla amaxesha ngamaxesha.
26_4_11_Namanzi wowasela ngomlinganiselo, isahlulo sesithandathu sehin; uya kusisela amaxesha ngamaxesha.
26_4_12_Uya kusidla ngokwesonka esiliqebengwana serhasi, usoje emehlweni abo ngeengqatha eziphuma emntwini.
26_4_13_Wathi uYehova, Oonyana bakaSirayeli baya kwenjenjalo ukusidla siyinqambi ezintlangeni, endiya kubagxothela kuzo.
26_4_14_Ndathi, Awu! Nkosi Yehova! Yabona, umphefumlo wam awuzanga wenziwe inqambi; into ezifeleyo neqwengiweyo andizanga ndiyidle, kwasebuncinaneni bam unanamhla; akufikanga nyama iyimbozisa emlonyeni wam.
26_4_15_Wathi kum, Uyabona, ndikunika amalongo enkomo esikhundleni seengqatha zomntu; soje kuwo isonka sakho.
26_4_16_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, yabona, ndiya kuwaphula umsimelelo osisonka eYerusalem, basidle isonka ngomlinganiselo,  benesithukuthezi; bawasele amanzi ngomlinganiselo,  bemangalisiwe;
26_4_17_ukuze baswele isonka namanzi, bamangalisane,  bangcungcutheke ebugwenxeni babo.
26_5_1_Wena ke, nyana womntu, thabatha ikrele elibukhali, libe sisitshetshe sokuguya, ulihambise entlokweni yakho nasesilevini sakho, uthabathe isikali sokulinganisela, uzahlule iinwele.
26_5_2_Esinye isahlulo sesithathu uze usitshise ngomlilo esazulwini somzi, zakuzaliseka iintsuku zongqingo; uthabathe nesinye isahlulo sesithathu, uxabele ngekrele ngeenxa zonke kuso;  nesinye isahlulo sesithathu usichithachithe emoyeni, ndirhole ikrele emva kwazo.
26_5_3_Uze uthabathe kuzo zibe mbalwa, uzibophe esondweni lengubo yakho;
26_5_4_ubuye uthabathe kuzo, uziphose emlilweni, uzitshise ngomlilo. Khona apho kuyo kuphuma umlilo, uye kuyo yonke indlu kaSirayeli.
26_5_5_Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Le Yerusalem ndiyimise esazulwini seentlanga, amazwe angeenxa zonke kuyo.
26_5_6_Ke iwaphikisile ngokungendawo amasiko am ngaphezu kweentlanga, nemimiselo yam ngaphezu kwamazwe angeenxa zonke kuyo; ngokuba bawacekisile amasiko am, abahamba ngemimiselo yam.
26_5_7_Ngako oko, itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ngenxa enokuba nangxola ngaphezu kweentlanga ebezingeenxa zonke kuni, anahamba ngemimiselo yam, anawenza amasiko am, anenza nangolwamasiko eentlanga ebezingeenxa zonke kuni:
26_5_8_ngako oko, itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Yabona, mna, ewe mna, ndikuchasile; ndiya kwenza izigwebo esazulwini sakho emehlweni eentlanga;
26_5_9_ndenze kuwe endingazanga ndikwenze, endingayi kubuya ndikwenze okunjalo, ngenxa yamasikizi akho onke.
26_5_10_Ngako oko ooyise baya kudla oonyana esazulwini sakho,  oonyana badle ooyise; ndenze izigwebo, ndiwachithachithe onke amasalela akho emimoyeni yonke.
26_5_11_Ngako oko, itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ndihleli nje,  inyaniso, ngenxa enokuba ingcwele yam uyenze inqambi ngeento zakho zonke ezinezothe, nangamasikizi akho onke, nam ndiya kulisusa iliso lam, lingabi nanceba, ndingacongi nam.
26_5_12_Isahlulo sesithathu kuwe siya kufa yindyikitya yokufa,  siphele nayindlala esazulwini sakho; esinye isahlulo sesithathu siwe likrele ngeenxa zonke kuwe; esinye isahlulo sesithathu ndisichithachithe emimoyeni yonke, ndirhole ikrele emva kwabo.
26_5_13_Wophelela ke kubo umsindo wam, ndibupholisele kubo ubushushu bam, ndithuthuzeleke; bazi ukuba mna Yehova ndithethe ndinekhwele, ekubuphleleliseleni ubushushu bam kubo.
26_5_14_Phezu koko ndokwenza ube linxuwa nesingcikivo ezintlangeni ezingeenxa zonke kuwe, emehlweni abo bonke abadlulayo.
26_5_15_Uya kuba sisingcikivo nesinyeliso, ube sisithethiso nommangaliso kwiintlanga ezingeenxa zonke kuwe, ekwenzeni kwam izigwebo kuwe ngomsindo nangobushushu, nangezohlwayo zobushushu; mna Yehova ndithethile:
26_5_16_nasekuzithumeni kwam kuwe iintolo ezimbi zendlala,  ezizezolonakaliso, endiya kuzithuma ukuze zinonakalise. Ndiya kuyandisa indlala phezu kwenu, ndiwaphule umsimelelo asisonka kuni;
26_5_17_ndithume phezu kwenu indlala namarhamncwa, akuhluthe abantwana, ifikelele kuwe indyikitya yokufa negazi, ndikuzisele ikrele; mna Yehova ndithethile.
26_6_1_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_6_2_Nyana womntu, bhekisa ubuso bakho ezintabeni zakwaSirayeli,  uprofetele kuzo,
26_6_3_uthi, Yivani, nina zintaba zakwaSirayeli, ilizwi leNkosi uYehova. Itsho iNkosi uYehova kwiintaba nakwiinduli,  kwizihlambo nakwimifula, ukuthi, Yabonani, ndinizisela ikrele,  ndizidilize iziganga zenu.
26_6_4_Ziya kuba ngamanxuwa izibingelelo zenu, zaphulwe izithixo zenu zelanga; ndibakhahlele ababuleweyo benu phambi kwezigogo zenu.
26_6_5_Ndozibeka izidumbu zoonyana bakaSirayeli phambi kwezigodo zabo, ndiwachithachithe amathambo enu ngeenxa zonke ezibingelelweni zenu.
26_6_6_Imizi yoba ngamanxuwa ezindaweni zonke zokuhlala kwenu,  zichithakale iziganga; ukuze zichithakale zibe ngamanxuwa izibingelelo zenu, zaphulwe ziphele izigodo zenu, zigawulwe izithixo zenu zelanga, icinywe imisebenzi yenu.
26_6_7_Uya kuwa obuleweyo esazulwini senu; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_6_8_Ndiya kushiya amasalela, ngokuthi kubekho kuni abasindileyo ekreleni phakathi kweentlanga, ekuchithwachithweni kwenu emazweni.
26_6_9_Abasindileyo benu baya kundikhumbula phakathi kweentlanga abathinjelwe kuzo, xa ndithe ndayaphula intliziyo yabo ehenyuzayo, eyemkayo kum, namehlo abo abehenyuza ngokulandela izigodo zabo; bakruquke bububi ababenzileyo ngokusingisele emasikizini abo onke.
26_6_10_Baya kwazi ukuba ndinguYehova; andifumane ndathetha ndathi,  Ndiya kubenza obu bubi kubo.
26_6_11_Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Betha esandleni sakho,  ungqishe ngonyawo lwakho, uthi, Yeha! ngenxa yawo onke amasikizi amabi endlu kaSirayeli; kuba baya kuwa likrele,  nayindlala, nayindyikitya yokufa.
26_6_12_Okude uya kufa yindyikitya yokufa, okufuphi awe likrele,  nosale walondolozwa afe yindlala; ndibuphelelisele kubo ubushushu bam.
26_6_13_Niya kwazi ukuba ndinguYehova, bakuba ababuleweyo benu bephakathi kwezigodo zenu ngeenxa zonke ezibingelelweni zenu,  ezindulini zonke eziphakamileyo, ezincotsheni zonke zeentaba,  naphantsi kwemithi yonke eluhlaza, naphantsi kwemiterebhinti ethe shinyi, ezindaweni ababenikela kuzo ivumba elithozamisayo kwizigodo zabo zonke.
26_6_14_Ndosolula isandla sam phezu kwabo; ndilenze ilizwe kube senkangala yakwankangala, ngaphezu kwentlango yakwaDibhelata,  ezindaweni zonke zokuhlala kwabo; bazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_7_1_Kananjalo kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_7_2_Wena, wena ke nyana womntu, itsho iNkosi uYehova kumhlaba wakwaSirayeli ukuthi, Isiphelo, isiphelo siwafikele amasondo omane elizwe.
26_7_3_Kaloku isiphelo sikufikele; ndiya kuwukhuphela umsindo wam kuwe, ndikugwebe ngokweendlela zakho, ndiwabeke phezu kwakho amasikizi akho onke.
26_7_4_Aliyi kuba nanceba kuwe iliso lam, ndingakucongi; ke ndiya kukuzisela iindlela zakho, abe sesazulwini sakho amasikizi akho; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_7_5_Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ububi, ububi obubodwa;  yabonani, buyeza.
26_7_6_Kuza isiphelo, isiphelo sona siyeza, sikuvukele wena; yabona siyeza.
26_7_7_Uyakuzela umjojo, mmi welizwe eli; liyeza ixesha, isondele imini; kusisaqunge, akungamayeyeye emihlali ezintabeni.
26_7_8_Ngoku kwakufuphi nje ndiya kuthulula phezu kwakho ubushushu bam, ndiwuphelelisele kuwe umsindo wam, ndikugwebe ngokweendlela zakho, ndiwabeke phezu kwakho onke amasikizi akho.
26_7_9_Aliyi kuba nanceba kuwe iliso lam, ndingakucongi; ke ndiya kuwabeka phezu kwakho ngokweendlela zakho amasikizi akho phakathi kwakho; nazi ukuba mna Yehova ndingobethayo.
26_7_10_Nantso imini! Nantso, ifikile! Uphuma umjojo, luphuma amathupha uswazi, kuyatyatyamba ukukhukhumala.
26_7_11_Ugonyamelo luphakame lwaba luswazi lokungendawo; akuyi kubakho namnye kubo osalayo, kungabikho nto kwingxokolo yabo,  kungabikho nto kwintabalala yabo; kungabikho njuze isalayo kubo.
26_7_12_Lifikile ixesha, isondele imini; othengayo makangavuyi,  othengisayo makangenzi sijwili; ngokuba ukuvutha komsindo kuyayizela yonke ingxokolo yakhona.
26_7_13_Ngokuba othengisayo akayi kubuyela entweni abethengise ngayo, nokuba ubesadla ubomi phakathi kwabadla ubomi; ngokuba umbono ongengxokolo yonke yakhona awuyi kubuya umva; kungabikho bani ubomelezayo ubomi bakhe ebugwenxeni bakhe.
26_7_14_Bavuthela isigodlo, balungisa konke; kodwa akukho namnye oya ekulweni; ngokuba ubushushu bam buyizele ingxokolo yabo yonke.
26_7_15_Ngekrele ngaphandle, ngendyikitya yokufa nangendlala ngaphakathi: osendle uya kufa likrele, ophakathi komzi adliwe yindlala nayindyikitya yokufa.
26_7_16_Ke abasindileyo kubo bosinda, babe sezintabeni njengamavukuthu asemifuleni, bedumzela bonke bephela, elowo edumzela ngobugwenxa bakhe.
26_7_17_Zonke izandla ziya kuwa, onke amadolo aye angabi namandla;
26_7_18_babhinqe ezirhwexayo, bagutyungelwe kukududuzela, ebusweni bonke ibe kukudana, iintloko zabo zonke zibe ziinkqayi.
26_7_19_Isilivere yabo baya kuyiphosa ezitratweni, negolide yabo ibe yinto engcolileyo kubo. Isilivere yabo negolide yabo ayiyi kuba nako ukubahlangula ngemini yokuphuphuma komsindo kaYehova;  abayi kuwuhluthisa ngayo umphefumlo wabo, nombilini wabo bangawuzalisi ngayo; ngokuba yaba sisikhubekiso sokuba babe gwenxa.
26_7_20_Isivatho sabo esinobukhazikhazi basimisela ikratshi, benza ngaso imifanekiso yabo engamasikizi, enezothe; ngenxa yoko ndiyenze yayinto engcolileyo kubo.
26_7_21_Ndiya kuyinikela esandleni sabasemzini ukuba iphangwe,  nakwabangendawo behlabathi ibe lixhoba, bayihlambele;
26_7_22_ndibususe ubuso bam kubo, bayihlambele ingqwebo yam; bafike abatyhobozi, bayihlambele.
26_7_23_Yenza umxokelelwane, ngokuba ilizwe liliphalaza igazi elimsulwa, nomzi uzele lugonyamelo.
26_7_24_Ndozisa abanobubi basezintlangeni, bazihluthe izindlu zabo,  ndiliphelise ikratshi labanamandla, zihlanjelwe iingcwele zabo.
26_7_25_Kuyafika ukuxhalaba; bafuna uxolo, alukho.
26_7_26_Kuza umeyeliselo phezu komeyeliselo, kubekho udaba phezu kodaba, bafune umbono kumprofeti, ke umyalelo utshabalale ungabikho kumbingeleli, neqhinga kumadoda amakhulu.
26_7_27_Ukumkani uya kwenza isijwili, nesikhulu sambathe ummangaliso, ziyekelele izandla zabantu belizwe eli. Ndiya kwenza kubo ngokwendlela yabo, ndibagwebe ngokwezigwebo zabo;  bazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_8_1_Ke kaloku kwathi ngomnyaka wesithandathu, ngenyanga yesithandathu, ngolwesihlanu enyangeni leyo, ndihleli endlwini yam, namadoda amakhulu akwaYuda ehleli phambi kwam, sawa phezu kwam khona isandla seNkosi uYehova.
26_8_2_Ndabona, nantso into efana nendoda ukubonakala kwayo;  kuthabathele esinqeni sayo kwehlisa, kubonakala ingumlilo;  kuthabathele esinqeni sayo kunyuse, ngathi kukubonakala kokukhazimla, ngathi yimbonakalo yegolide evuthiweyo.
26_8_3_Wolula into emilise okwesandla, wandibamba ngesihlwitha sentloko yam; umoya wandifunqula ndaba phakathi komhlaba nezulu. Wandisa eYerusalem ngemibono kaThixo, ekungeneni kwesango lentendelezo ephakathi, elibheke ngasentla, apho bekuhleli khona umfanekiso wobukhwele okhweletisayo.
26_8_4_Nabo ke bukhona ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo kaSirayeli,  bunjengombono endawubonayo entilini leyo.
26_8_5_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, khawuphakamise amehlo akho,  ukhangele ngasentla. Ndawaphakamisa ke amehlo am, ndakhangela ngasentla: nanko ngasentla kwesango lesibingelelo kukho loo mfanekiso wobukhwele usekungeneni kwalo.
26_8_6_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, uyakubona na abakwenzayo?  Ngamasikizi amakhulu la, iwenzayo apha indlu kaSirayeli, ukuze ndikhwelele kude nengcwele yam; usaya kubuya ubone amasikizi amakhulu kunala.
26_8_7_Wandisa ke ekungeneni kwentendelezo; ndabona, nango umngxuma eludongeni.
26_8_8_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, khawugqobhoze eludongeni.  Ndagqobhoza ke eludongeni, nanko kukho umnyango.
26_8_9_Wathi kum, Yiza, ubone amasikizi amabi abawenzayo apha.
26_8_10_Ndangena, ndabona: nanzo zonke izinto ezimilise okwesinambuzane nenkomo, izinto ezinezothe, nezigodo zonke zendlu kaSirayeli, zikroliwe eludongeni ngeenxa zonke.
26_8_11_Kumi phambi kwazo amadoda angamashumi asixhenxe kumadoda amakhulu endlu kaSirayeli, noYazaniya unyana kaShafan emi phakathi kwawo, iyileyo iphethe ngesandla isiqhumiselo, kunyuka ivumba lelifu lokuqhumisela.
26_8_12_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, ukubonile na akwenzayo emnyameni amadoda amakhulu endlu kaSirayeli, iyileyo ezingontsini zayo ezinemifanekiso? ngokuba esithi, uYehova akasiboni, uYehova ulilahlile ilizwe.
26_8_13_Wathi kum, Usaya kubuya ubone amasikizi awenzayo amakhulu kunala.
26_8_14_Wandisa ekungeneni kwesango lendlu kaYehova elingasentla;  nanko kuhleli abafazi apho, belilela uTamuzi.
26_8_15_Wathi kum, Ubonile na, nyana womntu? Usaya kubuya ubone amasikizi awenzayo amakhulu kunala.
26_8_16_Wandisa entendelezweni ephakathi yendlu kaYehova: nanko,  ekungeneni etempileni kaYehova, phakathi kwevaranda nesibingelelo, kukho amadoda angathi angamashumi amabini anamahlanu, eyinikele umva itempile kaYehova, ubuso bawo bubheke empumalanga; aqubuda kwilanga, ebheke empumalanga.
26_8_17_Wathi kum, Ubonile na, nyana womntu? Kuncinane na kwindlu kaYuda ukuwenza la masikizi bawenzayo apha, ukuba ke balizalise ilizwe nangogonyamelo, babuye bandiqumbise? Nabo, besisa isebe lomdiliya emathatheni abo.
26_8_18_Nam ndiya kwenza ngobushushu; aliyi kuba nanceba iliso lam,  ndibaconge; nokuba badanduluke ezindlebeni zam ngezwi elikhulu,  andiyi kubeva.
26_9_1_Wabiza ngelizwi elikhulu ezindlebeni zam, esithi, Sondelani,  baveleli bomzi, elowo ephethe ngesandla izixhobo zakhe zokutshabalalisa.
26_9_2_Nanko ke, kusiza amadoda amathandathu ngendlela yesango eliphezulu, elikhangele entla, iyileyo iphethe ngesandla izixhobo zayo zokuhlekeza; kukho indoda phakathi kwawo eyambethe ilinen emhlophe, inezinto zokubhala ethangeni layo;  eza ke ema ecaleni kwesibingelelo sobhedu.
26_9_3_Ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo kaSirayeli baye bunyuka, busuka ekerubhini obebuphezu kwayo, baya emnyango wendlu. Wamemeza endodeni eyambethe ilinen emhlophe, enezinto zokubhala ethangeni layo.
26_9_4_Wathi uYehova kuyo, Canda esazulwini somzi, esazulwini seYerusalem, ubeke uphawu emabunzini amadoda agcunayo,  ancwinayo ngenxa yamasikizi onke awenzekayo esazulwini sayo.
26_9_5_Wathi kwamanye ezindlebeni zam, Candani esazulwini somzi emva kwayo, nixabele; malingabi nanceba iliso lenu,  ningabacongi.
26_9_6_Amaxhego, amadodana nomthinjana, abantwana nabafazi,  babulaleni, ukuze batshabalale; ke bonke abantu abanophawu olo,  musani ukufika kubo; nize niqalele ke engcweleni yam. Aqala ke ngamadoda amakhulu abephambi kwendlu.
26_9_7_Wathi ke kuwo, Yenzeni inqambi indlu le, nizizalise iintendelezo ngababuleweyo; phumani niye. Aphuma ke abulala kuwo umzi.
26_9_8_Kwathi, xa ababulalayo, ndisele mna, ndawa ngobuso,  ndakhala, ndathi, Awu! Nkosi Yehova, uya kuwatshabalalisa onke na amasalela amaSirayeli ngokubuthulula ubushushu bakho phezu kweYerusalem?
26_9_9_Wathi kum, Ubugwenxa bendlu kaSirayeli nobendlu kaYuda bukhulu kakhulu kunene, nelizwe lizele ligazi, nomzi uzele bubugqwetha; ngokuba besithi, UYehova ulilahlile ilizwe,  uYehova akaboni.
26_9_10_Ke nam aliyi kuba nanceba iliso lam, ndibaconge; ndiya kubanika ngokwendlela yabo entlokweni yabo.
26_9_11_Nantso indoda eyayambethe ilinen emhlophe, ebinezinto zokubhala ethangeni layo, ibuya nelizwi elithi, Ndenze njengoko ubundiwisele umthetho ngako.
26_10_1_Ndabona, nanko, phezu kwesibhakabhaka esibe siphezu kwentloko yeekerubhi, kunjengelitye lesafire, kubonakala ngathi ngumfanekiso wetrone; wabonakala phezu kwazo uYehova.
26_10_2_Wathetha kwindoda eyambethe ilinen emhlophe, wathi, Yiya phakathi kweevili ezijikelezayo ngaphantsi kwekerubhi, uzalise izandla zakho ngamalahle omlilo, uwathabathe phakathi kweekerubhi, uwasasaze phezu kwawo umzi. Yangena ndiyibona.
26_10_3_Ke iikerubhi bezimi ngasekunene kwendlu, ekungeneni kwendoda leyo; ilifu layizalisa intendelezo ephakathi.
26_10_4_Benyuka ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, besuka ezikerubhini, baya emnyango wendlu. Yazala indlu lilifu, nentendelezo yazala bubumhlophe bobuqaqawuli bukaYehova.
26_10_5_Savakala isandi samaphiko eekerubhi, sada saya entendelezweni engaphandle, sinjengezwi loSomandla akuthetha.
26_10_6_Kwathi, akuyiwisela umthetho indoda eyambethe ilinen emhlophe, esithi, Thabatha umlilo phakathi kweevili ezijikelezayo, phakathi kweekerubhi, yasuka yangena yema ecaleni kweevili.
26_10_7_Ibe isuka ke ikerubhi, isolule isandla sayo phakathi kweekerubhi, isise emlilweni ophakathi kweekerubhi,  iwuthabathe, iwunikele esandleni sowambethe ilinen emhlophe;  ebewuthabatha ke aphume.
26_10_8_Kwabonakala ke ezikerubhini into efana nesandla somntu,  phantsi kwamaphiko azo.
26_10_9_Ndabona, nanzo iivili ezine zisecaleni leekerubhi, ivili enye isecaleni lekerubhi enye, ivili enye isecaleni lekerubhi enye, ukubonakala kweevili ngathi yimbonakalo yelitye lekrizolite.
26_10_10_Ngokubonakala kwazo zone bezimfani-nye, kwanga kukho ivili ngaphakathi kwevili.
26_10_11_Ekuhambeni kwazo zahamba zaya kumacala azo omane;  azajikeleza ekuhambeni kwazo; ngokuba apho sukuba leyo iphambili ibe ibheka khona, zibe ziyilandela, zingajikelezi ekuhambeni kwazo.
26_10_12_Ke umzimba wazo wonke, nomhlana wazo, nezandla zazo,  namaphiko azo, neevili, zibe zizele ngamehlo ngeenxa zonke;  zone bezineevili zazo.
26_10_13_Iivili ezo zabizwa ezindlebeni zam, kwathiwa, ziivili ezijikelezayo.
26_10_14_Inye ibe inobuso obune: ubuso bokuqala ibubuso bekerubhi,  ubuso besibini ibubuso bomntu, obesithathu ibubuso bengonyama,  obesine ibubuso bokhozi.
26_10_15_Zenyuka iikerubhi; yilaa nto iphilileyo, ndayibonayo emlanjeni oyiKebhare.
26_10_16_Ekuhambeni kweekerubhi zahamba iivili ecaleni lazo;  nasekuwaphakamiseni kweekerubhi amaphiko azo, ukuba zisuke emhlabeni, azijikanga neevili zazo zimke ecaleni lazo.
26_10_17_Ekumeni kwazo zema nazo; ekusukeni kwazo ukuba ziphaphazele, zesuka nazo; ngokuba umoya wento ephilileyo ube ukho kuzo.
26_10_18_Baphuma ke ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, bemka emnyango wendlu,  beza kuma phezu kweekerubhi.
26_10_19_Iikerubhi zawaphakamisa amaphiko azo, zasuka emhlabeni emehlweni am; ekuphumeni kwazo iivili zazingakuzo. Zema ekungeneni kwesango lendlu kaYehova elisempumalanga,  ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo kaSirayeli buphezu kwazo ngaphezulu.
26_10_20_Yilaa nto iiphilileyo, ndayibonayo phantsi koThixo kaSirayeli emlanjeni oyiKebhare; ndazi ke ukuba ziziikerubhi.
26_10_21_Inye ibe inobuso obune inye ibe inamaphiko amane, imfano yezandla zomntu ingaphantsi kwamaphiko azo.
26_10_22_Ke imfano yobuso bazo, ibe ibobaa buso ndabubonayo imlanjeni oyiKebhare, nokubonakala kwazo nazo ngokwazo; zibe zihamba iyileyo iye kwicala elikhangelene nobuso bayo.
26_11_1_Wandifunqula uMoya, wandisa esangweni lendlu kaYehova langasempumalanga, elibheke empumalanga; nanko, ekungeneni kwesango, kukho amadoda engamashumi amabini anamahlanu. Ndabona phakathi kwawo uYazaniya unyana ka-Azure, noPelatiya unyana kaBhenaya, abathetheli babantu.
26_11_2_Wathi kum, Nyana womntu, ngawo la amadoda acinga inkohlakalo, aceba amacebo amabi kulo mzi;
26_11_3_atshoyo ukuthi, Alikasondeli ixesha lokwakha izindlu; lo mzi yimbiza, thina ke siyinyama.
26_11_4_Ngako oko profetela kuwo, profeta, nyana womntu.
26_11_5_Wandiwela ke uMoya kaYehova, wathi kum, Yithi, Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Nitshilo nina, ndlu kaSirayeli; nezinto ezithe qatha emoyeni wenu ndiyazazi mna.
26_11_6_Ndibandisile ababuleweyo benu kulo mzi, nazizalisa izitrato zawo ngababuleweyo.
26_11_7_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ababuleweyo benu,  ebe nibabeka phantsi phakathi kwawo umzi, bayinyama, wona ke uyimbiza; nina niya kukhutshwa phakathi kwawo.
26_11_8_Niyaloyika ikrele; ndiya kunizisela ikrele, itsho iNkosi;
26_11_9_ndinikhuphe phakathi kwawo, ndininikele esandleni sabasemzini, ndizenze izigwebo kuni.
26_11_10_Niya kuwa likrele; ndiya kunigweba emdeni wakwaSirayeli;  nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_11_11_Wona lo mzi awuyi kuba yimbiza kuni, aniyi kuba yinyama nina phakathi kwawo; ndiya kunigweba emdeni wakwaSirayeli,
26_11_12_nazi ukuba ndinguYehova; imimiselo yam anihambanga ngayo,  namasiko am anawenza; nesuka nenza ngokwamasiko eentlanga ezingeenxa zonke kuni.
26_11_13_Kwathi ke ndakuprofeta, wafa uPelatiya unyana kaBhenaya.  Ndawa ngobuso bam, ndakhala ngelizwi elikhulu, ndathi, Awu!  Nkosi Yehova! Uyawagqibela kuphele na wena amasalela akwaSirayeli?
26_11_14_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_11_15_Nyana womntu, abazalwana bakho, abazalwana bakho ngamadoda akowenu, nendlu yonke yakwaSirayeli yonke iphela, yona leyo bathi ngayo abemi baseYerusalem, Bakude kuYehova; linikwe thina ilizwe ukuze sime kulo.
26_11_16_Ngako oko yithi, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ekubeni ndibakhwelelisele ezintlangeni, ndabaphangalalisa emazweni, ke ndoba yingcwele kubo umzuzwana omncinane kuloo mazwe baye kuwo.
26_11_17_Ngako oko yithi, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ndiya kunibutha ezizweni, ndinihlanganise emazweni enilusali kuwo,  ndininike umhlaba wakwaSirayeli.
26_11_18_Baya kufika kuwo, bazisuse kuwo zonke izinto zawo ezinezothe, namasikizi awo onke.
26_11_19_Ndobanika ntliziyo yimbi, ndibeke umoya omtsha ngaphakathi kwenu; ndiyisuse intliziyo yelitye enyameni yabo, ndibanike intliziyo yenyama;
26_11_20_ukuze bahambe ngemimiselo yam, bagcine amasiko am bawenze,  babe ngabantu bam, mna ndibe nguThixo wabo.
26_11_21_Ke bona abantliziyo ihamba ngokwentliziyo yezinto zabo ezinezothe, nezingamasikizi abo, ndiya kubanika ngokwendlela yabo entlokweni yabo; utsho uYehova.
26_11_22_Iikerubhi zawaphakamisa amaphiko azo, kwaneevili ezingakuzo; ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo kaSirayeli baba phezu kwazo ngaphezulu.
26_11_23_Benyuka ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova, besuka phakathi komzi,  bema entabeni engasempumalanga kuwo umzi.
26_11_24_UMoya wandifunqula, wandisa kwelamaKaledi kubathinjwa,  ndisembonweni ngoMoya kaThixo. Wenyuka wemka kum umbono ebendiwubona.
26_11_25_Ndathetha kubathinjwa onke amazwi kaYehova,  abendibonisile.
26_12_1_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_12_2_Nyana womntu, uhleli phakathi kwendlu eneenkani; banamehlo okubona, ababoni; baneendlebe zokuva, abeva; ngokuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_12_3_Wena ke, nyana womntu, zilungiselele iimpahla zemfuduka,  ufuduke emini emehlweni abo, ufuduke endaweni yakho, uye ndaweni yimbi emehlweni abo, mhlawumbi bobona; ngokuba bayindlu eneenkani.
26_12_4_Uze uyikhuphe impahla yakho ngokwempahla yemfuduka emini,  emehlweni abo; ke wena uphume ngokuhlwa emehlweni abo,  njengokuphuma kwabathinjwa.
26_12_5_Gqobhoza eludongeni emehlweni abo, uyikhuphe ngakhona.
26_12_6_Yithwale ngamagxa emehlweni abo, yikhuphe kwakuba mnyama;  bugqubuthele ubuso bakho, ungalikhangeli ilizwe; ngokuba ndikwenze isimanga kwindlu kaSirayeli.
26_12_7_Ndenjenjalo, njengoko ndawiselwa umthetho ngako;  ndayikhupha emini impahla yam ngokwempahla yemfuduka; ngokuhlwa ndazigqobhozela eludongeni ngesandla, ndayikhupha kwakuba mnyama, ndayithwala ngamagxa eme hlweni abo.
26_12_8_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum kusasa, lisithi,
26_12_9_Nyana womntu, indlu kaSirayeli, indlu eneenkani, ayitshongo na kuwe ukuthi, Wenza ntoni na?
26_12_10_Yithi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Esi sihlabo sisingisele kwisikhulu esiseYerusalem, nakwindlu yonke kaSirayeli, abaphakathi kwayo abathinjiweyo.
26_12_11_Yithi, Ndisisimanga kuni; njengoko ndenze ngako, kuya kwenzeka ngokunjalo kubo; baya kufuduswa, bathinjwe.
26_12_12_Isikhulu esiphakathi kwabo siya kuyithwala ngamagxa kuthe thsu mnyama, siphume; baya kugqobhoza eludongeni ukuba bayikhuphe ngakhona; siya kugqubuthela ubuso baso sona, kuba singayi kulikhangela ilizwe ngamehlo.
26_12_13_Ndiya kuwutwabulula umnatha wam phezu kwaso, sibanjiswe ngumgibe wam, ndisise eBhabheli, ezweni lamaKaledi; ke asiyi kulibona, noko siya kufela khona.
26_12_14_Ndiya kukuchithachitha emimoyeni yonke konke esiphahlwe kuko, abancedisi baso namahlelo aso onke, ndirhole ikrele emva kwabo;
26_12_15_bazi ukuba ndinguYehova, ekubaphangalaliseni kwam ezintlangeni, ndibachithachithe emazweni.
26_12_16_Ndoshiya kubo amadoda ambalwa, asinde ekreleni,  nasendlaleni, nasendyikityeni yokufa; ukuze bawabalise amasikizi abo onke ezintlangeni abaye kuzo; bazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_12_17_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_12_18_Nyana womntu, wosidla isonka sakho ungcangcazela, uwasele amanzi akho ugungqa, unesithukuthezi.
26_12_19_Wothi ke kubantu belizwe, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ngokusingisele kubemi baseYerusalem, emhlabeni wakwaSirayeli,  ukuthi, Isonka sabo bosidla benesithukuthezi, bawasele amanzi abo bemangalisiwe; ukuze ezweni labo kube senkangala, ingabikho inzaliseko yalo ngenxa yogonyamelo lwabo bonke abahleli kulo.
26_12_20_Yoba ngamanxuwa imizi emiweyo, kube senkangala elizweni;  nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_12_21_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_12_22_Nyana womntu, uyintoni na lo mzekeliso ninawo emhlabeni wakwaSirayeli, wokuthi, Imihla iyoluka, iyadaka imibono yonke?
26_12_23_Ngako oko yithi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ndiya kuwenza uphele lo mzekeliso, bangabi sazekelisa ngawo kwaSirayeli; ke, yithi kubo, Isondele imihla, nesiphelo semibono yonke.
26_12_24_Ngokuba akuyi kuba sabakho namnye umbono okhohlakeleyo,  nokuvumisa okucengacengayo, phakathi kwendlu kaSirayeli.
26_12_25_Ngokuba ndinguYehova, ndiya kuthetha; ilizwi endisukuba ndilithetha liya kwenzeka, lingayi kulibala; ngokuba ngemihla yenu, ndlundini ineenkani, ndithetha ilizwi, ndilenze; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_12_26_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_12_27_Nyana womntu, yabona, indlu kaSirayeli ithi, Umbono awubonayo yena lo, ngowemihla emininzi; uprofetele amaxesha akude.
26_12_28_Ngako oko yithi kubo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Akayi kuba salityaziswa onke amazwi am; ilizwi endisukuba ndilithetha liya kwenzeka; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_13_1_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_13_2_Nyana womntu, profeta uchase abaprofeti bakwaSirayeli abaprofetayo, uthi kwabaprofeta okwentliziyo yabo, Liveni ilizwi likaYehova.
26_13_3_Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Yeha ke, abaprofeti abanobudenge, abalandela owabo umoya, nento abangayibonanga!
26_13_4_Baba njengeempungutye emanxuweni abaprofeti bakho,  Sirayeli.
26_13_5_Aninyukanga niye emathutyeni, niyibiyele ngodonga indlu kaSirayeli, ukuze nakhe uluhlu lokulwa ngomhla kaYehova.
26_13_6_Babona into ekhohlakeleyo nokuvumisa okungamanga, abo bathi, Utsho uYehova; uYehova engabathumanga, ukanti balinda ukuqiniswa kwelo lizwi.
26_13_7_Anibonanga mbono wankohlakalo na, nakuvumisa okungamanga na, nisithi nje, Utsho uYehova; ndingathethanga mna?
26_13_8_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ngenxa yokuba nithethe into ekhohlakeleyo, nibona amanga, ngako oko,  yabonani, ndinichasile; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_13_9_Isandla sam sichasa abaprofeti ababona into ekhohlakeleyo,  bavumise amanga. Abayi kubakho ekucweyweni kwabantu bam,  bangabhalwa encwadini yomlibo wendlu kaSirayeli, bangangeni emhlabeni wakwaSirayeli; nazi ukuba ndiyiNkosi uYehova.
26_13_10_Ngenxa yokuba, ewe, ngenxa yokuba bebandwendwisile abantu bam, besithi, Luxolo, kungekho luxolo; bathi, bakwakha udonga bona, yabona, abaya balutyabeka ngodaka oluhlephukayo:
26_13_11_yithi kwabatyabeka ngodaka oluhlephukayo, Luya kuwa; kuza isiphango esikhukulayo; nina ke, matye esichotho, yiwani; wena moya usisaqhwithi, ovuthuvuthuzayo, qhutha.
26_13_12_Xa ke luthe lwawa udonga, akuyi kuthiwa na kuni, Kuphi na ukutyabeka enatyabeka ngako?
26_13_13_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Ndiya kuqhuthisa umoya ovuthuvuthuzayo ngobushushu bam; kuze nesiphango esikhukulayo ngomsindo wam, namatye ezichotho ngobushushu,  ukuze kugqityelwe kuphele.
26_13_14_Ndiya kulugungxula udonga enalutyabeka ngodaka oluhlephukayo, ndiluwise emhlabeni, sityhilekile isiseko salo,  luwe, niphelele kweso sithuba salo; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_13_15_Ndobuphelelisela eludongeni ubushushu bam, nakwabatyabeka ngodaka oluhlephukayo, ndithi kuni, Alusekho udonga, abasekho abatyabeki balo,
26_13_16_abaprofeti bakwaSirayeli ababeprofeta ngeYerusalem,  ababebona umbono woxolo, kungekho luxolo; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_13_17_Wena ke, nyana womntu, bhekisa ubuso bakho kwiintombi zabantu bakowenu, eziprofeta okweentliziyo zazo.
26_13_18_Uze uprofete ngazo, uthi, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi,  Yeha ke, abo bathunga izibophelelo ezihlahleni zezandla zonke,  benze izigubungelo ezilingene iintloko zonke, ukuze bathiyele imiphefumlo! Nithiyele imiphefumlo yabantu bam, nasindisa eyenu imiphefumlo.
26_13_19_Nindihlambele kubantu bam ngenxa yerhasi esutywe ngezandla, nangenxa yamaqhekeza esonka, ukuze nibulale imiphefumlo ebingeyakufa, nisindise imiphefumlo ebingeyakusindiswa, ngamanga enu ebantwini bam abava amanga.
26_13_20_Ngako oko itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Yabonani,  ndizichasile izibophelelo zenu, enithiyela ngazo imiphefumlo njengeentaka. Ndiya kuziqhawula ezingalweni zenu, ndiyindulule imiphefumlo, kwaimiphefumlo eniyithiyeleyo njengeentaka.
26_13_21_Ndozikrazula izigubungelo zenu, ndibahlangule abantu bam esandleni senu, bangabi saba yinto ethiyelwayo esandleni senu;  nazi ukubandinguYehova.
26_13_22_Ngenxa enokuba niyenze buhlungu ngobuxoki intliziyo yelungisa, endingalenzanga buhlungu mna; nazomeleza izandla zongendawo, ukuze angabuyi endleleni yakhe embi, asindiswe:
26_13_23_ngako oko aniyi kuyibona into ekhohlakeleyo ningabi savumisa nokuvumisa; ngokuba ndiya kubahlangula abantu bam esandleni senu; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_14_1_Kwafika kum amadoda akumadoda amakhulu akwaSirayeli, ahlala phantsi phambi kwam.
26_14_2_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
26_14_3_Nyana womntu, la madoda anyuse izigogo zawo ezintliziyweni zawo, amisa isikhubekiso sokuba abe gwenxa phambi kobuso bawo;  ndingaquqelwa ndiquqelwe ngawo na?
26_14_4_Ngako oko thetha nawo, uthi kuwo, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Elowo nalowo wasendlwini kaSirayeli, othe wanyusa izigodo zakhe entliziyweni yakhe, wamisa isikhubekiso sokuba abe gwenxa phambi kobuso bakhe, weza kubaprofeti: mna Yehova ndoba ngomphendulayo ngokwam, ngokobuninzi bezigodo zakhe;
26_14_5_ukuze ndiyixhakamfule indlu kaSirayeli ngentliziyo yabo,  ekubeni beshenxile kum bonke bephela ngezigodo zabo.
26_14_6_Ngako oko yithi kwindlu kaSirayeli, Itsho iNkosi uYehova ukuthi, Buyani nizibuyise ezigodweni zenu, nibubuyise ubuso benu kumasikizi enu onke.
26_14_7_Ngokuba elowo nalowo wasendlwini kaSirayeli, nowasemzini ophambukele kwaSirayeli, othe wazahlula ekundilandeleni kwakhe,  wanyusa izigodo zakhe entliziyweni yakhe, wamisa isikhubekiso sokuba abe gwenxa phambi kobuso bakhe, weza kumprofeti ukuze aquqele kum ngenxa yakhe: mna Yehova ndomphendula ngokwam.
26_14_8_Ndoyichasa loo ndoda, ndiyiphanzise ibe ngumqondiso nomzekeliso, ndimnqumle ebantwini bam; nazi ukuba ndinguYehova.
26_14_9_Umprofeti, xa athe warhwebeshwa, wathetha ilizwi, mna Yehova ndimrhwebeshile loo mprofeti: ndosolula isandla sam phezu kwakhe, ndimtshabalalise phakathi kwabantu bam amaSirayeli.
26_14_10_Baya kubuthwala ubugwenxa babo; njengoko bunjalo ubugwenxa boquqela kuye, buya kuba njalo ubugwenxa bomprofeti lowo;
26_14_11_ukuze indlu kaSirayeli ingabi sandwendwa imke ekundilandeleni kwayo; bangabi sazenza iinqambi ngezikreqo zabo zonke; babe ngabantu bam, ndibe nguThixo wabo; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_14_12_Kwafika kum ilizwi likaYehova, lisithi,
26_14_13_Nyana womntu, xa ilizwe lithe lona kum lameneza ngobumenemene, ndasolula isandla sam phezu kwalo, ndawaphula kulo umsimelelo osisonka, ndathumela kulo indlala, ndanqumla kulo umntu nenkomo;
26_14_14_ekho phakathi kwalo la madoda omathathu, ooNowa noDaniyeli noYobhi, wona abeya kuhlangula owawo umphefumlo kuphela ngobawo ubulungisa; itsho iNkosi uYehova.
26_14_15_Ndingafanelana ndicandisa amarhamncwa ezweni, alihlutha abantwana, kwaba senkangala kulo, akwabakho unokucanda kulo ngenxa yamarhamncwa lawo;
26_14_16_ekho phakathi kwalo loo madoda omathathu: ndihleli nje,  itsho iNkosi, ebengayi kuhlangula nanyana nantombi; ebeya kuhlanguleka odwa; ke bekuya kuba senkangala ezweni elo.
26_14_17_Nokuba ndithe ndalizisela ikrele elo lizwe, ndathi ikrele malicande kwelo lizwe, ndanqamla kulo umntu nenkomo;
26_14_18_ekho phakathi kwalo loo madoda omathathu: ndihleli nje,  itsho iNkosi uYehova, ebengayi kuhlangula nyana nantombi;  ngokuba ebeya kuhlanguleka wona odwa.
