37_1_12_Baliphulaphula ke ooZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli,  noYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu, namasalela onke abantu, ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wabo, ngokwamazwi kaHagayi umprofeti, njengoko wayemthumile uYehova uThixo wabo;  boyika abantu ebusweni bukaYehova.
37_1_13_Wakuthetha uHagayi umthunywa kaYehova ukuthunywa kwakhe nguYehova ebantwini, wathi, Ndinani, utsho uYehova.
37_1_14_UYehova wawuvuselela umoya kaZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli, ibamba lakwaYuda, nomoya kaYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu, nomoya wamasalela onke abantu. Beza ke, bawenza umsebenzi endlwini kaYehova wemikhosi,  uThixo wabo,
37_1_15_ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithandathu,  ngomnyaka wesibini kakumkani uDariyo.
37_2_1_Ngenyanga yesixhenxe, ngosuku lwamashumi amabini analunye enyangeni leyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti,  lisithi,
37_2_2_Khawuthethe kuZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli, ibamba lakwaYuda, nakuYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu,  nakumasalela abantu, uthi,
37_2_3_Ngubani na kuni apha oseleyo, owayibonayo le ndlu isesebuqaqawulini bayo bokuqala? Niyibona iyintoni na ke ngoku?  Ayinjengento engento na emehlweni enu?
37_2_4_Noko ke ngoku yomelela, Zerubhabheli, utsho uYehova;  womelele, Yoshuwa nyana kaYotsadaki, mbingeleli mkhulu;  nomelele, nonke bantu belizwe, utsho uYehova, nisebenze;  ngokuba ndinani, utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
37_2_5_Ilizwi elo, ndanqophisana nani ngalo ekuphumeni kwenu eYiputa, ndisaligcinile, noMoya wam umi phakathi kwenu; musani ukoyika.
37_2_6_Ngokuba uYehova wemikhosi utsho ukuthi, Kusaya kuba kanye,  umzuzwana ke, ndinyikimise izulu, nehlabathi, nolwandle,  nomhlaba owomileyo;
37_2_7_ndizinyikimise zonke iintlanga, zifike izinto ezinqwenelekayo zeentlanga zonke, ndiyizalise le ndlu ngobuqaqawuli; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
37_2_8_Isilivere yeyam, igolide yeyam; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
37_2_9_Buya kuba bukhulu ubuqaqawuli bamva bale ndlu, ngaphezu kobokuqala, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; kuyo ke le ndawo ndiya kunika uxolo; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
37_2_10_Ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithoba,  ngomnyaka wesibini kaDariyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti, lisithi,
37_2_11_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Khawubuze umyalelo kubabingeleli, uthi,
37_2_12_Yabonani, umntu ephethe inyama engcwele ngesondo lengubo yakhe, afike ngesondo lakhe esonkeni, nasentweni ephekiweyo,  nasewayinini, naseolini, nasentweni nokuba yiyiphi edliwayo,  yongcwaliseka na? Baphendula ababingeleli bathi, Hayi.
37_2_13_Wathi ke uHagayi, Ukuba uthe wafika oyinqambi ngenxa yomfi,  kwezo zinto zonke, zoba ziinqambi na? Baphendula ababingeleli bathi, Zoba ziinqambi.
37_2_14_Waphendula uHagayi wathi, Banjalo ke aba bantu, lunjalo ke olu hlanga ebusweni bam; utsho uYehova; unjalo ke wonke umsebenzi wezandla zabo, nento abayisondezayo khona apho iyinqambi.
37_2_15_Kaloku ke khanigqale, nithabathele kule mini, nibhekise emva, kungekabekwa litye lityeni etempileni kaYehova;
37_2_16_nithabathele kwelo xesha, xa umntu ebefike esitheni esimilinganiso imashumi mabini, asuke afumane libe linye ishumi; xa ebefika emkhumbini wokukhongozela iwayini, eza kukha imilinganiso emashumi mahlanu, asuke afumane amashumi amabini.
37_2_17_Ndanibetha ngembabala, nangexoshomba, nangesichotho, kuyo yonke imisebenzi yezandla zenu; noko ke akubangakho namnye kuni ubuyela kum; utsho uYehova.
37_2_18_Khanigqale, nithabathele kule mini, nibhekise emva,  nithabathele kusuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithoba kususela kuloo mini yokusekwa kwetempile kaYehova;  gqalani ke.
37_2_19_Isekho yinina imbewu eqongeni? Hayi, akuxakathanga nto,  kude kwesa kumdiliya, nomkhiwane, nomrharnate, nomnquma.  Ndithabathele kule mini, ndiya kusikelela.
37_2_20_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngokwesibini kuHagayi, ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine enyangeni leyo, lisithi,
37_2_21_Thetha kuZerubhabheli ibamba lakwaYuda, uthi, Ndiya kulinyikimisa izulu nehlabathi,
37_2_22_ndiyibhukuqe itrone yezikumkani, ndikutshabalalise ukomelela kwezikumkani zeentlanga; ndizibhukuqe iinqwelo zokulwa nabakhweli bazo, kuwe amahashe nabakhweli bawo; elowo awiswe likrele lowabo.
37_2_23_Ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ndiya kukuthabatha,  Zerubhabheli nyana kaShalatiyeli, mkhonzi wam, utsho uYehova,  ndikumise ngokomsesane wokutywina; kuba ndikunyule; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
38_1_1_Ngenyanga yesibhozo, ngomnyaka wesibini kaDariyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuZekariya unyana kaBherekiya, unyana kaIdo,  umprofeti, lisithi:
38_1_2_UYehova waye enoburhalarhume obukhulu kooyihlo.
38_1_3_Yithi ke kubo, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Buyelani kum,  utsho uYehova wemikhosi; ndobuyela kuni, utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
38_1_4_Musani ukuba njengooyihlo, ababebizwa bona ngabaprofeti bangaphambili, besithi, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi,  Khanibuye ngoku ezindleleni zenu ezimbi nasezintlondini zenu ezimbi; ke abaphulaphula, abandibazela ndlebe; utsho uYehova.
38_1_5_Ooyihlo baphi na? nabaprofeti baya kudla ubomi ngonaphakade na?
38_1_6_Kodwa amazwi am, nemimiselo yam, endayimisela abakhonzi bam abaprofeti, ayibafumananga na ooyihlo? ukuze babuye bathi,  Njengoko wakunkqangiyelayo uYehova ukuba akwenze kuthi,  ngokweendlela zethu nangokweentlondi zethu, wenjenjalo kuthi.
38_1_7_Ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yeshumi elinanye, inyanga enguShebhati, ngomnyaka wesibini kaDariyo,  kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuZekariya unyana kaBherekiya, unyana kaIdo, umprofeti, lisithi,
38_1_8_Ndibone ebusuku, nanko umntu ekhwele ehasheni elibomvu; waye ke emi phakathi kwemimirtile ebisenyobeni, ngasemva kwakhe ingamahashe, abomvu, nangwevu, namhlophe.
38_1_9_Ndathi, Ngoobani na aba, nkosi yam? Sathi kum isithunywa ebesithetha nam, Ndokubonisa ukuba ngoobani na aba.
38_1_10_Waphendula umntu obemi phakathi kwemimirtile wathi, Aba ngabathunywe nguYehova, ukuba balihambahambe ihlabathi.
38_1_11_Basiphendula isithunywa sikaYehova ebesimi phakathi kwemimirtile, bathi, Silihambahambile ihlabathi, nalo lonke ihlabathi lihleli lizolile.
38_1_12_Saphendula ke isithunywa sikaYehova, sathi, Yehova wemikhosi, koba nini na ungasikwa yimfesane wena, ngenxa yeYerusalem nemizi yakwaYuda, owayibhavumelayo le minyaka imashumi asixhenxe?
38_1_13_UYehova wasiphendula isithunywa esibe sithetha nam,  ngamazwi alungileyo, ngamazwi athuthuzelayo.
38_1_14_Sathi kum isithunywa esibe sithetha nam, Memeza uthi, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Ndinekhwele, ikhwele elikhulu,  ngeYerusalem nangeZiyon.
38_1_15_Ndinoburhalarhume obukhulu kuzo iintlanga ezihleli ngokonwaba; ngokokuba bendinoburhalarhume mna umzuzwana, ke zona zongezelelela ububi.
38_1_16_Ngako oko, utsho uYehova ukuthi, Ndiyibuyele iYerusalem ngemfesane; indlu yam iya kwakhelwa khona, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; ulutya lokulinganisa luya kolulwa phezu kweYerusalem.
38_1_17_Buya umemeze, uthi, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Imizi yam isaya kuphalala okulungileyo; uYehova usaya kuyithuthuzela iZiyon, ayinyule iYerusalem.
38_1_18_Ndaphakamisa amehlo am, ndakhangela, nanzo iimpondo, zine.
38_1_19_Ndathi kwisithunywa esibe sithetha nam, Ziyintoni na ezi?  Sathi kum, Ezi ziimpondo ezichithachithe uYuda, uSirayeli,  neYerusalem.
38_1_20_UYehova wandibonisa iingcibi zokukhanda, zine.
38_1_21_Ndathi, Aba baze kwenza ntoni na? Sathetha sathi, Ezi ziimpondo ezichithachithe uYuda, ngokokude kungabikho bani uphakamisa intloko yakhe: aba ke baze kuzothusa, baziwise phantsi iimpondo zeentlanga, eziphakamise uphondo ezweni lakwaYuda, ukuba zilichithachithe.
38_2_1_Ndaphakamisa amehlo am, ndakhangela, Nanko umntu ephethe ngesandla ulutya lokulinganisa.
38_2_2_Ndathi ke, Uya ngaphi na? Wathi kum, Ndiya kulinganisa iYerusalem, ndibone ukuba bungakanani na ububanzi bayo,  bungakanani na ubude bayo.
38_2_3_Naso ke isithunywa esibe sithetha nam siphuma, kuphuma nesinye isithunywa, sisiya kusikhawulela.
38_2_4_Sathi kuso, Gidima, uthethe nalaa ndodana, uthi, IYerusalem iya kuhlala ngokwamaphandle, ngenxa yobuninzi babantu neenkomo eziphakathi kwayo.
38_2_5_Ndiya kuba ludonga lomlilo kuyo mna ngeenxa zonke, utsho uYehova; ndibe bubuqaqawuli phakathi kwayo.
38_2_6_Wenani! wenani! Sabani ezweni langasentla, utsho uYehova;  ngokuba ndiniphangalalisa njengemimoya yomine yezulu; utsho uYehova.
38_2_7_Wa, Ziyon! Zisindise, wena uhleli nentombi enguBhabheli.
38_2_8_Ngokuba utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Undithume ukuphuthuma uzuko ezintlangeni ezanibhunyulayo; ngokuba onichukumisayo, uchukumisa ukhozo lweliso lakhe.
38_2_9_Ngokuba, uyabona, ndiya kulingisa ngesandla sam kuzo, zibe ngamaxhoba kwababezikhonza; nazi ukuba uYehova wemikhosi undithumile.
38_2_10_Memelela uvuye, ntombi inguZiyon; ngokuba, uyabona,  ndiyeza, ndihlale phakathi kwakho; utsho uYehova.
38_2_11_Kuya kuthelela kuYehova iintlanga ezininzi ngaloo mini,  zibe ngabantu bam, ndihlale phakathi kwakho; wazi ukuba uYehova wemikhosi undithumele kuwe.
38_2_12_UYehova uya kumdla ilifa uYuda, isahlulo sakhe emhlabeni ongcwele, abuye ayinyule iYerusalem.
38_2_13_Mayithi tu yonke inyama phambi koYehova; ngokuba esukile ekhayeni lakhe elingcwele.
38_3_1_Wandibonisa uYoshuwa umbingeleli omkhulu, emi phambi kwesithunywa sikaYehova, uSathana emi ngasekunene kwakhe, ukuze amchase.
38_3_2_Wathi uYehova kuSathana, UYehova makakukhalimele, Sathana;  akukhalimele uYehova oyinyulileyo iYerusalem; lo akasikhuni esirholwe emlilweni na?
38_3_3_UYoshuwa ke ebambethe iingubo ezingcolileyo; wema ke phambi kwesithunywa.
38_3_4_Saphendula sathetha nabemiyo phambi kwaso, sathi, Zisuseni iingubo ezingcolileyo kuye. Sathi ke kuye, Yabona, ndibususile ubugwenxa bakho kuwe, ndikwambese ngezinqabileyo.
38_3_5_Ndathi ke, Mabambeke unkontsho oluhlambulukileyo entloko.  Bambeka ke unkontsho oluhlambulukileyo entlokweni yakhe,  bamambesa ngeengubo; saye isithunywa sikaYehova simi.
38_3_6_Isithunywa sikaYehova saqononondisa kuYoshuwa, sathi,
38_3_7_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Ukuba uthe wahamba ngeendlela zam, ukuba uthe wasigcina isigxina sam, woyilawula wena indlu yam, wozigcina neentendelezo zam, ndikunike ukuhamba phakathi kwaba bemiyo apha.
38_3_8_Khawuphulaphule ke Yoshuwa, mbingeleli mkhulu, wena nabalingane bakho abahlala phambi kwakho; ngokuba ngamadoda asisimanga. Ngokuba, uyabona, ndiya kuzisa umkhonzi wam onguHlumelo.
38_3_9_Ngokuba nalo ilitye endalibeka phambi koYoshuwa; lityeni linye kobakho amehlo asixhenxe; yabona, ndikrola ukrolo lwalo,  utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ndisuse ubugwenxa beli lizwe ngamini-nye.
38_3_10_Ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, niya kubizelana phantsi komdiliya naphantsi komkhiwane.
38_4_1_Sabuya isithunywa esibe sithetha nam, sandivusa njengomntu ovuswa ebuthongweni bakhe.
38_4_2_Sathi kum, Ubona ntoni na? Ndathi ke, Ndibona, nanko kukho isiphatho sesibane segolide sonke siphela, sineselwa laso phezu kwentloko yaso, sinezibane zaso ezisixhenxe phezu kwaso,  zinamajelo asixhenxe ngasixhenxe ezibane eziphezu kwentloko yaso;
38_4_3_neminquma emibini kuso, omnye ungasekunene kweselwa, omnye ungasekhohlo kwalo.
38_4_4_Ndaphendula ndathi kwisithunywa esibe sithetha nam,  Ziyintoni na ezi zinto, nkosi yam?
38_4_5_Saphendula isithunywa esibe sithetha nam, sathi kum, Akuzazi na ukuba ziyintoni na ezi zinto? Ndathi, Hayi, nkosi yam.
38_4_6_Saphendula sathi kum, Nali ilizwi likaYehova kuZerubhabheli,  lisithi, Akungabukroti, akungamandla; kungoMoya wam; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
38_4_7_Ungubani na wena, ntaba inkulu, phambi koZerubhabheli? Yiba sisithabazi; yena uya kulivelisa ilitye lochochoyi,  kunkqangazwa kusithiwa, Ubabalo, ubabalo malube kulo.
38_4_8_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
38_4_9_Izandla zikaZerubhabheli ziyisekile le ndlu; izandla zakhe ziya kuyigqiba; wazi ukuba uYehova wemikhosi undithumele kuni.
38_4_10_Ngokuba ngubani na owoyidela imini yezinto ezincinane? Aya kuyibona ngovuyo ilothe yokulungelelanisa esandleni sikaZerubhabheli, kwawona osixhenxe amehlo kaYehova;  ayawutyhutyha umhlaba wonke.
38_4_11_Ndaphendula ndathi kuso, Iyintoni na le minquma mibini,  ngasekunene kwesiphatho sesibane nangasekhohlo kuso?
38_4_12_Ndaphendula okwesibini, ndathi kuso, Ziyintoni na ezi mbaxa zimbini zeminquma, zikufuphi nemiboko emibini yegolide,  ethulula ioli ebugolide kuzo?
38_4_13_Sandiphendula, sathi, Akuzazi na ukuba ziyintoni na ezi zinto? Ndathi, Hayi, nkosi yam.
38_4_14_Sathi kum, Aba babini ngabeoli, abema ngakwiNkosi yehlabathi lonke.
38_5_1_Ndabuya ndawaphakamisa amehlo am, ndakhangela, nantso incwadi esongwayo, iphaphazela.
38_5_2_Sathi kum, Ubona ntoni na? Ndathi, Ndibona incwadi esongwayo iphaphazela; ubude bayo buziikubhite ezimashumi mabini,  nobubanzi bayo buziikubhite ezishumi-nye.
38_5_3_Sathi kum, Eso ke sisishwabulo esiphuma sihambe phezu kwelizwe lonke; ngokuba bonke abebayo baya kutshayelwa apha ngokokwayo; bonke abafungayo baya kutshayelwa ngaphaya ngokokwayo.
38_5_4_Ndisikhuphile, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; siya kungena endlwini yesela, nasendlwini yolifungayo ngobuxoki igama lam,  silalise endlwini yakhe, siyigqibe nemithi yayo namatye ayo.
38_5_5_Saphuma isithunywa esibe sithetha nam, sathi kum,  Khawuwaphakamise amehlo akho, ukhangele ukuba iyintoni na leyo iphumayo.
38_5_6_Ndathi ke, Yintoni na? Sathi, Yiefa leya iphumayo. Sathi,  Yimbonakalo yabo leya ezweni lonke.
38_5_7_Nanko, kuphakama isiciko selothe, kuhleli umfazi phakathi kwe-efa.
38_5_8_Sathi, NguNgendawo lowo; samphosa phakathi kwe-efa,  saliphosa ilitye lelothe emlonyeni wayo.
38_5_9_Ndawaphakamisa ke amehlo am, ndakhangela, nanko kuphuma abafazi ababini, umoya usemaphikweni abo; amaphiko abo abenjengamaphiko engwamza, bayithwala iefa phakathi komhlaba nezulu.
38_5_10_Ndathi kwisithunywa esibe sithetha nam, Bayisa phi na iefa abaya?
38_5_11_Sathi kum, Baya kumakhela indlu ezweni leShinare; ithi yakugqitywa, bambeke khona esizeni sakhe.
38_6_1_Ndabuya ndawaphakamisa amehlo am, ndakhangela, nanzo iinqwelo zokulwa zine, ziphuma phakathi kweentaba zombini;  iintaba ke iziintaba zobhedu.
38_6_2_Enqwelweni yokuqala ibingamahashe abomvu; enqwelweni yesibini ibingamahashe amnyama;
38_6_3_enqwelweni yesithathu ibingamahashe amhlophe; enqwelweni yesine ibingamahashe aziingwevu ezibomvu.
38_6_4_Ndaphendula ndathi kwisithunywa esibe sithetha nam,  Ziyintoni na ezi zinto, nkosi yam?
38_6_5_Saphendula ke isithunywa, sathi kum, Le yimimoya emine esezulwini, ephuma yakuba ibizimisile ngakwiNkosi yehlabathi lonke.
38_6_6_Le inamahashe amnyama iphuma isiya ezweni langasentla;  amhlophe aphume elandela wona; aziingwevu ezibomvu aphume esiya ezweni langasezantsi;
38_6_7_abomvu aphuma, efuna ukulihambahamba ihlabathi. Sathi,  Hambani, nilihambahambe ihlabathi. Alihambahamba ke ihlabathi.
38_6_8_Sadanduluka kum, sathetha kum, sathi, Yabona, la aphuma aya ezweni langasentla, awuzolise umoya wam ezweni langasentla.
38_6_9_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kum, lisithi,
38_6_10_Thabatha kwabasekuthinjweni, abaze khona bevela eBhabheli,  kooHeledayi, nakooTobhiya, nakooYedaya, uye wena ngaloo mini endlwini kaYosiya unyana kaZefaniya;
38_6_11_uthabathe isilivere negolide, wenze izithsaba, ubeke entloko kuYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu.
38_6_12_Uze uthethe kuye uthi, Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi,  Nantso indoda enguHlumelo, igama layo; iya kuhluma endaweni yayo, iyakhe itempile kaYehova.
38_6_13_Iya kuyakha ke yona itempile kaYehova, ithweswe uzuko,  ihlale ilawule etroneni yayo, ibe ngumbingeleli etroneni yayo,  icebo loxolo libe phakathi kwabo bobabini.
38_6_14_Izithsaba zoba kooHelem, nakooTobhiya, nakooYedaya, zibe sisikhumbuzo sobubele bonyana kaZefaniya, etempileni kaYehova.
38_6_15_Baya kuza abakude bakhe etempileni kaYehova; nazi ukuba uYehova wemikhosi undithumele kuni; kuya kwenzeka ke, ukuba nithe naliphulaphula ngenyameko ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wenu.
38_7_1_Kwathi ngomnyaka wesine kaDariyo ukumkani, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuZekariya ngosuku lwesine lwenyanga yesithoba,  enguKisilevu.
38_7_2_IBheteli ke yathuma ooSharetsere noRegem-meleki nabantu bakhe, ukuba bambongoze uYehova,
38_7_3_bathethe kubabingeleli ababesendlwini kaYehova wemikhosi,  nakubaprofeti, bathi, Ndilile na, ndizile na ngenyanga yesihlanu, njengoko ndisendenze ngako le minyaka ingaka?
38_7_4_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova wemikhosi kum, lisithi,
38_7_5_Thetha kubantu bonke belizwe eli, nakubabingeleli, uthi, Oko benizila ukudla, nilila, ngenyanga yesihlanu nangeyesixhenxe,  iminyaka ke engamashumi asixhenxe, ukuzila oko benizilela mna na?
38_7_6_Xa benisidla naxa benisela, bekungadli nina na, bekungaseli nina na?
38_7_7_Beningafanele kuwenza yini na amazwi, abewamemeza uYehova ngabaprofeti bamandulo, oko ibimiwe ichulumachile iYerusalem,  kwanemizi yayo engeenxa zonke kuyo, naoko belimiwe elasezantsi nelasesithabazi?
38_7_8_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova kuZekariya, lisithi,
38_7_9_Utshilo uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Gwebani ngesigwebo senyaniso, nenze inceba nemfesane elowo kumzalwana wakhe.
38_7_10_Musani ukubacudisa abahlolokazi, neenkedama, nabasemzini,  namahlwempu; musani ukucinga bubi entliziyweni yenu ngendoda engumzalwana wenu.
38_7_11_Abavumanga ke ukubaza indlebe; balirhola igxalaba elinjubaqa, bazithi nkqi iindlebe zabo, abeva.
38_7_12_Intliziyo yabo bayenza idayiman, ukuba bangawuvi umyalelo namazwi, abewathumela uYehova wemikhosi ngomoya wakhe,  ngabaprofeti bamandulo; kwabakho ke uburhalarhume obukhulu obuvela kuYehova wemikhosi.
38_7_13_Kuya kuthi ke, njengoko ebememeza bengeva, benjenjalo ukumemeza, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ndingevi.
38_7_14_Ndiya kubachithachithela ezintlangeni zonke ababengazazi;  kube senkangala elizweni emva kwabo, kungacandi mntu, kungabuyi mntu; balenze ke ilizwe elinqwenelekayo kube senkangala kulo.
38_8_1_Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova wemikhosi, lisithi,
38_8_2_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Ndinekhwele, ikhwele elikhulu, ngeZiyon; ndinekhwele, ndinobushushu obukhulu ngayo.
38_8_3_Utsho uYehova ukuthi, Ndiyibuyele iZiyon; ndiya kuhlala ke phakathi kweYerusalem, kuthiwe iYerusalem ngumzi wenyaniso;  nentaba kaYehova wemikhosi kuthiwe yintaba engcwele.
38_8_4_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Kusaya kuhlala amadoda amakhulu neentokazi ezinkulu ezitratweni zaseYerusalem, elowo ephethe umsimelelo wakhe ngesandla, ngenxa yobudala babo;
38_8_5_zizale izitrato zomzi ngamakhwenkwe namantombazana, edlala ezitratweni zawo.
38_8_6_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Ukuba kuyinto engummangaliso emehlweni amasalela aba bantu ngaloo mihla, kuya kuba yinto engummangaliso yini na nasemehlweni am? utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
38_8_7_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Yabonani, ndiya kubasindisa abantu bam elizweni lokuphuma kwelanga, naselizweni lokutshona kwalo.
38_8_8_Ndobazisa, bahlale phakathi kweYerusalem, babe ngabantu bam,  ndibe nguThixo wabo, ngenyaniso nangobulungisa.
38_8_9_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Izandla zenu mazomelele,  nina bawevayo la mazwi ngale mihla, ephuma emlonyeni wabaprofeti, ababekho mhlenikweni yasekwayo indlu kaYehova wemikosi, itempile, ukuze yakhiwe.
38_8_10_Ngokuba phambi kwaloo mihla bekungekho mvuzo wabantu,  nomvuzo weenkomo ubungekho; nophumayo nongenayo ebengenaluxolo,  ngenxa yombandezeli. Ndabenza bonke ukuba umntu achasane nommelwane wakhe.
38_8_11_Ngoku ke andiyi kuba njengokwemihla yamandulo kumasalela aba bantu; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
38_8_12_Kobakho imbewu yoxolo; umdiliya wonika isiqhamo sawo,  nelizwe linike indyebo yalo, nezulu linike umbethe walo; zonke ezo zinto ndizidlise ilifa amasalela abantu.
38_8_13_Kothi, njengoko benilutshabhiso ezintlangeni, ndlu kaYuda,  nani ndlu kaSirayeli, ndenjenjalo ukunisindisa, nibe yintsikelelo; musani ukoyika, mazomelele izandla zenu.
38_8_14_Ngokuba utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Njengoko ndankqangiyelayo ukwenza ububi kuni, oko ooyihlo bandenza ndaba noburhalarhume, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, andazohlwaya ke:
38_8_15_ngokunjalo ndibuye ndankqangiyela ngale mihla ukwenza okulungileyo kwiYerusalem, nakwindlu kaYuda; musani ukoyika.
38_8_16_Nanzi iindawo enothi nizenze zona: Thethani inyaniso elowo kummelwane wakhe; gwebani ngenyaniso nangesigwebo soxolo emasangweni enu.
38_8_17_Musani ukucinga okubi, elowo ngommelwane wakhe entliziyweni yakhe; ningathandi ukufunga ngobuxoki; ngokuba konke oko; koko ndikuthiyileyo; utsho uYehova.
38_8_18_Ezinye iintlanga ziya kumfuna uYehova Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova wemikhosi kum, lisithi,
38_8_19_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Uzilo lweyesine inyanga,  nozilo lweyesihlanu, nozilo lweyesixhenxe, nozilo lweyeshumi,  luya kuba yimihlali, nemivuyo, namaxesha emisiweyo okuchwayitha, kwindlu kaYuda; ke thandani inyaniso noxolo.
38_8_20_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Kusaya kuza izizwe, nabemi bemizi emininzi.
38_8_21_Baya kuhamba abemi bomnye baye komnye, bathi, Masihambe siye kumbongoza uYehova, simquqele uYehova wemikhosi; bathi abo, Siya kuhamba nathi.
38_8_22_Izizwe ezininzi neentlanga ezinamandla ziya kuza kumquqela uYehova wemikhosi eYerusalem, zimbongoze uYehova.
38_8_23_Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Ngezo mini aya kuthi abambe amadoda alishumi asezilwimini zonke zeentlanga, abambe esondweni lengubo yendoda engumYuda, athi, Siya kuhamba nani,  ngokuba sivile ukuba uThixo unani.
38_9_1_Isihlabo selizwi likaYehova esisingisele elizweni laseHadraki; yiDamasko indawo yokuphumla kwaso; ngokuba uYehova usingise iliso ebantwini, nasezizweni zonke zakwaSirayeli;
38_9_2_kwaneHamati ehlangene nayo ngomda; iTire neTsidon, nakuba zilumkile kakhulu.
38_9_3_ITire yazakhela inqaba, yafumba isilivere njengothuli,  negolide njengodaka lwezitrato.
38_9_4_Yabona, iNkosi iya kuyihlutha, ibubethe ubuhandiba bayo elwandle, yona itshiswe ngumlilo.
38_9_5_IAshkelon iya kukubona, yoyike; neGaza iya kukubona,  ithuthumele kakhulu; kwane-Ekron, kuba inqolonci yayo iya kudaniswa, adake ukumkani, angabikho eGaza, neAshkelon ingemiwa.
38_9_6_Kuya kuhlala imigqakhwe eAshdode, ndinqumle iqhayiya lamaFilisti.
38_9_7_Ndolisusa igazi lemibingelelo yawo emlonyeni wawo, nezinto zawo ezinezothe emazinyweni awo; kwanawo aya kusalela uThixo wethu, abe njengenkosana kwaYuda, ne-Ekron ibe njengomYebhusi.
38_9_8_Ndoyinqabisa indlu yam kumkhosi, kodlulayo nakobuyayo,  kungabi sacanda mkhandanisi kubo; ngokuba ngoku ndibonile ngamehlo am.
38_9_9_Gcoba kunene, ntombi inguZiyon; duma, ntombi inguYerusalem;  yabona, uKumkani wakho uza kuwe, elilungisa, enosindiso,  enentobeko, ekhwele e-esileni, exhamxweni, etholeni lemazi ye-esile.
38_9_10_Ndozinqumla iinqwelo zokulwa kwaEfrayim namahashe eYerusalem, sinqunyulwe isaphetha sokulwa; athethe uxolo kwiintlanga; ulawulo lwakhe luthabathele elwandle luse elwandle, luthabathele kuwo uMlambo luse eziphelweni zehlabathi.
38_9_11_Nawe, ngenxa yegazi lomnqophiso wakho, ndiyabandulula ababanjiweyo bakho, baphume emhadini ongenamanzi.
38_9_12_Buyelani enqabeni, babanjwandini banethemba; nanamhla ndiyaxela, ndithi, Ndiya kukubuyisela ngokuphindiweyo.
38_9_13_Ngokuba ndimgobile uYuda, isaphetha sam; ndimfakile uEfrayim, utolo lwam; ndiya kubaxhokonxa oonyana bakho, Ziyon,  koonyana bakho, Yavan, ndikwenze ube njengekrele legorha.
38_9_14_UYehova uya kubonakala phezu kwabo, luphume njengombane utolo lwakhe; iNkosi uYehova iya kuvuthela isigodlo, ihambe ngemimoya evuthuzayo yasezantsi.
38_9_15_UYehova wemikhosi uya kubakhusela ngaphezulu, badle,  banyathele amatye okusawula, basele, baxokozele ngokwasewayinini; bazale ngokweengqayi, ngokweembombo zesibingelelo.
38_9_16_Wobasindisa abantu bakhe uYehova uThixo wabo ngaloo mini,  njengomhlambi ngokuba bengamatye esithsaba, abengezela emhlabeni wakhe.
38_9_17_Kuba kungakanani na ukulunga kwabo, bungakanani na ubuhle babo! Ingqolowa iya konwabisa umlisela, iwayini entsha iwonwabise umthinjana.
38_10_1_Celani imvula kuYehova ngexesha lemvula evuthisayo. UYehova wenza imibane, abanike imvula eziziphango, elowo amnike umfuno wasendle.
38_10_2_Ngokuba imilonde-khaya ithethe into ebubutshinga,  nabavumisi babone ubuxoki, balawula amaphupha enkohlakalo,  bathuthuzela kwangamampunge; ngenxa yoko bakhokile njengomhlambi, bacinezeleka, kuba kungekho malusi.
38_10_3_Umsindo wam uvuthela abalusi; ndozivelela ngawo iinkunzi ezikhokelayo; kuba uYehova wemikhosi uyawuvelela umhlambi wakhe, indlu kaYuda, abenze babe njengogcadalala lwakhe lwehashe emfazweni.
38_10_4_Kuya kuphuma kuye ilitye lembombo; kuya kuphuma kuye ibhaxa; kuya kuvela kuye isaphetha sokulwa; kuya kuvela kuye bonke abakhandanisi ngakunye.
38_10_5_Baya kuba njengamagorha, enyathelela iintshaba zawo eludakeni lwezitrato, kusiliwa; balwe, ngokuba uYehova enabo;  badane abakhweli bamahashe.
38_10_6_Ndiya kuyomeleza indlu kaYuda, ndiyisindise indlu kaYosefu,  ndibahlalise; kuba ndisikwa yimfesane ngenxa yabo; boba ngangabo ndingabahlambanga, ngokuba ndinguYehova uThixo wabo ndobaphendula.
38_10_7_Woba njengegorha uEfrayim, ivuye intliziyo yabo ngokwasewayinini; oonyana babo babone, bavuye; iya kugcoba intliziyo yabo kuYehova.
38_10_8_Ndiya kubenzela ikhwelo, ndibabuthe; ngokuba ndibakhulule ngokubahlawulela; baya kwanda, njengoko babesanda ngako.
38_10_9_Ndobahlwayela ezizweni, bandikhumbule emazweni akude,  baphile noonyana babo, babuye.
38_10_10_Ndobabuyisa ezweni laseYiputa, ndibabuthe eAsiriya,  ndibazise ezweni laseGiliyadi nelaseLebhanon, kungafumaneki ndawo ibalingeneyo.
38_10_11_UYehova uya kucanda kulwandle lwembandezelo, abethe emazeni olwandle, zitshe zonke iziziba zoMnayile; lithotywe iqhayiya laseAsiriya, imke intonga yaseYiputa.
38_10_12_Ndobomeleza ngoYehova, bahambahambe egameni lakhe; utsho uYehova.
38_11_1_Vula amasango akho, Lebhanon, uyitshise ngomlilo imisedare yakho.
38_11_2_Bhomboloza, msipres, ngokuba kuwe umsedare, ngenxa yokuba iingangamsha zibhuqiwe. Bhombolozani, mioki yaseBhashan,  ngokuba lihlahliwe ihlathi elinwabileyo.
38_11_3_Yivani ukubhomboloza kwabalusi, ngokuba bubhuqiwe ubungangamsha babo! Yivani ukubharhula kweengonyama ezintsha,  ngokuba libhuqiwe iqhayiya laseYordan!
38_11_4_Watsho uYehova uThixo wam, ukuthi, Yalusa umhlambi wezixhelwayo;
38_11_5_obathengi bawo bawubulalayo, bathi abanatyala; nabathengisa ngawo bathi, Makabongwe uYehova, ndinobutyebi; nabalusi bawo abawucongi.
38_11_6_Ngokuba andiyi kubuya ndibaconge abemi behlabathi; utsho uYehova. Yabona, abantu ndibanikela, elowo esandleni sommelwane wakhe, nasesandleni sokumkani wakhe, baliqobe ilizwe,  ndingabahlanguli esandleni sabo.
38_11_7_Ndawalusa ke umhlambi wezixhelwayo, kunye nezinqinileyo zomhlambi. Ndathabatha iintonga zambini, enye ndathi nguMnandi,  enye ndathi nguZintya; ndawalusa ke umhlambi.
38_11_8_Ndabetha bathishwaka abalusi abathathu nganyanga-nye;  ndazekaneka ngabo, ndanezothe kubo.
38_11_9_Ndathi, Andiyi kunalusa; efayo mayife; nethi shwaka mayithi shwaka, neziseleyo mazidlane inyama.
38_11_10_Ndathabatha intonga yam, uMnandi, ndayaphula, ukuze ndiwaphule umnqophiso wam endanqophisana ngawo nezizwe zonke.
38_11_11_Waphulwa ke ngaloo mini; zazi ngokunjalo ezinqinileyo zomhlambi, ebe zindiphulaphule, ukuba lilizwi likaYehova eli.
38_11_12_Ndathi kuwo, Ukuba kulungile emehlweni enu, etheni umvuzo wam; ukuba akulungile, yekani. Bandilinganisela ke umvuzo wam,  amashumi amathathu esilivere.
38_11_13_Wathi uYehova kum, Yiphose kumbumbi, ixabiso elingengangani, abandimisela lona. Ndawathabatha ke amashumi amathathu esilivere, ndawaphosa kumbumbi endlwini kaYehova.
38_11_14_Ndayaphula intonga yam yesibini, uZintya, ukuze ndibutshitshise ubuzalwana phakathi koYuda noSirayeli.
38_11_15_Wathi uYehova kum, Phinda uthabathe impahla yomalusi osisimathane.
38_11_16_Ngokuba, yabona, ndivelisa umalusi elizweni apha, ongayi kuzivelela eziza kuthi shwaka; akayi kuzifuna ezilusali; akayi kuziphilisa ezaphukileyo; akayi kuzondla ezimiyo; inyama yezityebileyo uya kuyidla, awalimaze amanqina azo.
38_11_17_Yeha, umalusi ongento, owulahlayo umhlambi! Ikrele malibe phezu kwengalo yakhe, neliso lakhe lasekunene! Ingalo yakhe iya koma kanye, neliso lakhe lasekunene licime okukanye.
38_12_1_Isihlabo selizwe likaYehova, esisingisele kuSirayeli. Utsho uYehova, umaneki wezulu, umseki wehlabathi, umenzi womoya womntu phakathi kwakhe, ukuthi,
38_12_2_Yabona, iYerusalem ndiyenza ibe yindebe enombilini,  yokuhexisa zonke izizwe ngeenxa zonke, imfikele noYuda ekungqingweni kweYerusalem.
38_12_3_Kothi ngaloo mini, ndiyenze iYerusalem ibe lilitye elingumthwalo ezizweni zonke; bonke abalifunqulayo baya kuzisikisa, bazilimazise, ziyihlanganyele zonke iintlanga zehlabathi.
38_12_4_Ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova, ndiya kuwabetha othuke amahashe onke, ndibabethe babe nomgada abakhweli bawo, ndiwavule amehlo am phezu kwendlu kaYuda, onke amahashe ezizwe ndiwabethe abe ziimfama.
38_12_5_Zothi iinkosana zakwaYuda ezintliziyweni zazo, Bangamandla am abemi baseYerusalem, ngoYehova wemikhosi, uThixo wabo.
38_12_6_Ngaloo mini ndiya kuzenza iinkosana zakwaYuda zibe njengokhamba lomlilo ezinkunini, nanjengezikhuni ezitshangaziswayo ezithungwini, zizitshise ngasekunene nangasekhohlo izizwe zonke ngeenxa zonke; iYerusalem ibuye imiwe esikhundleni sayo eYerusalem.
38_12_7_UYehova uya kusindisa iintente zakwaYuda kuqala, ukuze isihombo sendlu kaDavide, nesihombo sabemi baseYerusalem,  singazikhulisi ngaphezu koYuda.
38_12_8_Ngaloo mini uYehova uya kubakhusela ubemi baseYerusalem;  athi okhubekayo phakathi kwabo abe njengoDavide ngaloo mini;  indlu kaDavide ibe njengoThixo, njengesithunywa sikaYehova phambi kwabo.
38_12_9_Kothi ngaloo mini, ndifune ukuzitshabalalisa zonke iintlanga eziyingenelayo iYerusalem.
38_12_10_Ndothululela phezu kwendlu kaDavide, naphezu kwabemi baseYerusalem, uMoya wokubabala nowokutarhuzisa, babheke kum mna bamhlabileyo amahlanza; bammbambazelele njengokumbambazelelwa kozelwe wamnye, babe krakra ngenxa yakhe,  njengokrakra ngenxa yamazibulo akhe.
38_12_11_Ngaloo mini siya kuba sikhulu isililo eYerusalem, sibe njengesililo saseHadade-rimon esihlanjeni seMegido.
38_12_12_Liya kulila ilizwe, imizalwane ngemizalwane iyodwa;  umzalwane wendlu kaDavide uwodwa, abafazi babo bebodwa;  umzalwane wendlu kaNatan uwodwa, abafazi babo bebodwa;
38_12_13_umzalwane wendlu kaLevi uwodwa, abafazi babo bebodwa;  umzalwane wamaShimehi uwodwa, abafazi bawo bebodwa;
38_12_14_yonke imizalwane eseleyo, imizalwane ngemizalwane iyodwa,  nabafazi babo bebodwa.
38_13_1_Ngaloo mini kuya kubakho ithende elivulelwe indlu kaDavide nabemi baseYerusalem, ngenxa yesono nangenxa yokungcola.
38_13_2_Kothi ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ndiwanqumle amagama ezithixo elizweni, zingabi sakhunjulwa; nabaprofeti nomoya wobunqambi ndibagqithise, bangabikho ezweni apha.
38_13_3_Kothi xa athe wabuya waprofeta ubani, bathi kuye uyise nonina abamzalayo. Akuyi kuphila, kuba uthethe ubuxoki egameni likaYehova. Uyise nonina abamzalayo bomhlaba amahlanza ngenxa yokuprofeta kwakhe.
38_13_4_Kothi ngaloo mini, badane abaprofeti, elowo ngumbono wakhe,  ekuprofeteni kwakhe, bangambathi ngubo ixhonti yokuze bakhohlise.
38_13_5_Wothi, Andimprofeti, ndingumntu olima umhlaba; kuba wandithenga umntu ndisemncinane.
38_13_6_Kothiwa kuye, Ayini na la manxeba asezandleni zakho? athi,  Ngandangxwelerhwa ngawo endlwini yabazizihlobo zam.
38_13_7_Krele, vuka usukele phezulu kumalusi wam, kumfo ongummelwane, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; betha kumalusi, umhlambi ube lusali; ndisibuyisele isandla sam phezu kwezincinane.
38_13_8_Kothi ezweni lonke, utsho uYehova, izahlulo ezibini kulo zinqanyulwe zife, esesithathu sihlale kulo.
38_13_9_Ndosizisa emlilweni esesithathu, ndibanyibilikise njengokunyibilikiswa kwesilivere, ndibacikide njengokucikidwa kwegolide. Bona baya kunqula igama lam, ndibaphendule mna;  ndiya kuthi, Ngabantu bam bona; bathi bona, Yehova, unguThixo wethu.
38_14_1_Yabonani, kuza imini eyekaYehova, kwabiwe amaxhoba akho esazulwini sakho.
38_14_2_Ndozihlanganisela eYerusalem zonke iintlanga ukuba zilwe;  umzi uthinjwe, ziphangwe izindlu, badlwengulwe abafazi; siphume isiqingatha somzi sithinjwe; ke amasalela abantu anganqunyulwa wona kuwo umzi.
38_14_3_Uya kuphuma ke uYehova, alwe nezo ntlanga, njengemini yokulwa kwakhe, ngemini yomdibaniso.
38_14_4_Ziya kuma iinyawo zakhe ngaloo mini phezu kweNtaba yemiNquma, ephambi kweYerusalem ngasempumalanga, icandeke iNtaba yemiNquma phakathi, ithabathele empumalanga ise entshonalanga, ibe sisihlambo esikhulu kakhulu; sisunduzeke isiqingatha sentaba sisinge entla, esinye isiqingatha sayo sisinge ezantsi.
38_14_5_Nosabela esihlanjeni seentaba zam, kuba isihlambo seentaba ezo siya kufika naseAtsele; nisabe njengoko nasabayo ngenxa yenyikima emihleni kaUziya ukumkani wakwaYuda, eze uYehova uThixo wam, eneengcwele zakhe zonke.
38_14_6_Kothi ngaloo mini kungabi mhlophe, iinkwenkwezi ezinendili zibe luzizi.
38_14_7_Kuya kuba yimini eyodwa; yona iya kwazeka kuYehova;  ayimini, ayibusuku; kuthi ngexa langokuhlwa kube mhlophe.
38_14_8_Kothi ke ngaloo mini, kuphume eYerusalem amanzi aphilileyo:  esinye isiqingatha sawo siye kulwandle lwasempumalanga, esinye isiqingatha sawo siye kulwandle lwasentshonalanga; kube njalo ehlotyeni nasebusika.
38_14_9_UYehova woba ngukumkani phezu kwehlabathi lonke; ngaloo mini iya kuba nguYehova yedwa, negama lakhe lodwa.
38_14_10_Ilizwe lonke liya kujika libe njengeArabha, lithabathele eGebha lise eRimon, ezantsi kweYerusalem; liphakame, lihlale esikhundleni salo, lithabathele esangweni lakwaBhenjamin, lise endaweni yesango lokuqala, lise esangweni lembombo;  lithabathele enqabeni ende yakwaHananeli, lise ezixovulelweni zokumkani.
38_14_11_Bohlala kulo, kungabi sabakho kusingela phantsi; ihlale iYerusalem ikholosile.
38_14_12_Siso esi isibetho aya kuzibetha ngaso uYehova zonke izizwe eziyiphumele umkhosi iYerusalem: uya kuyingcungcuthekisa inyama yomntu, emi ngeenyawo zakhe, aphelele amehlo akhe emakrolomeni awo, luphelele ulwimi wakhe emlonyeni wakhe.
38_14_13_Kothi ngaloo mini, sibe sikhulu isaqunge phakathi kwazo,  siphuma kuYehova; babambe elowo isandla sommelwane wakhe,  isandla sakhe siphakamele isandla sommelwane wakhe.
38_14_14_Naye uYuda uya kulwa nazo eYerusalem; buhlanganiswe ubutyebi beentlanga zonke ezingeenxa zonke, igolide,  nesilivere, neengubo, into eninzi kakhulu.
38_14_15_Soba njalo isibetho kumahashe, nakoondlebende,  nakwiinkamela, nakunaesile, nakwiinkomo zonke eziya kuba seminqubeni leyo, sibe njengeso sibetho.
38_14_16_Othi onke amaqongqolo eentlanga zonke ezibe ziyingenele iYerusalem, enyuke iminyaka ngeminyaka, aye kumnqula uKumkani,  uYehova wemikhosi, enze umthendeleko weminquba.
38_14_17_Kothi emizalwaneni yehlabathi, osukuba engenyuki aye kumnqula eYerusalem uKumkani, uYehova wemikhosi, anganelwa mvula.
38_14_18_Uya kuthi umzalwane wamaYiputa ongathanga unyuke uze,  anganelwa mvula; yoba sisibetho, aya kubetha ngaso uYehova zonke iintlanga ezingenyukiyo ziye kwenza umthendeleko weminquba.
38_14_19_Siya kuba seso isohlwayo sesono seYiputa, nesohlwayo sesono seentlanga zonke ezingenyukiyo ziye kwenza umthendeleko weminquba.
38_14_20_Ngaloo mini kuya kubhalwa emankentezeni amahashe, kuthiwe,  bubungcwele kuYehova; neembiza endlwini kaYehova zoba njengezitya zokutshiza eziphambi kwesibingelelo.
38_14_21_Zothi zonke iimbiza eYerusalem nakwaYuda zibe ngcwele kuYehova wemikhosi; beze bonke ababingelelayo, bathabathe kuzo,  baphekele kuzo; ngaloo mini kungabi sabakho mKanan endlwini kaYehova wemikhosi.
39_1_1_Isihlabo selizwi likaYehova, esisingisele kuSirayeli,  ngoMalaki.
39_1_2_Uthi uYehova, Ndinithandile; ke nina nithi, Usithande ngokuthini na? UEsawu asingumkhuluwa kaYakobi na? utsho uYehova; ukanti ndathanda ke uYakobi;
39_1_3_ndamthiya uEsawu; iintaba zakhe ndazenza kwaba senkangala,  nelifa lakhe laba leleempungutye entlango.
39_1_4_Ekubeni ke uEdom esithi, Sivikivekile, siya kubuya siwakhe amanxuwa; utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Baya kwakha bona,  kodwa mna ndiya kugungxula; kothiwa, Bangumda wokungendawo,  ngabantu ababhavumelayo uYehova kude kuse ephakadeni.
39_1_5_Amehlo enu aya kubona, nithi ke nina, Mkhulu uYehova phezu komda wakwaSirayeli.
39_1_6_Unyana uyambeka uyise, umkhonzi uyayihlonela inkosi yakhe;  ukuba ndinguyihlo, kuphi na ke ukubekwa kwam? ukuba ndiyinkosi,  kuphi na ukoyikwa kwam? utsho uYehova wemikhosi kuni,  babingeleli, nina balidelileyo igama lam. Nibe ke nisithi,  Silidele ngokuthini na igama lakho?
39_1_7_Nina nizisa esibingelelweni sam isonka esingcolileyo, nibe ke nisithi, Sikungcolise ngokuthini na? Ngokuthi oku kwenu,  Isithebe sikaYehova sidelekile sona.
39_1_8_Ukuba nizisa into eyimfama ukuba ibingelelwe, akunto imbi oko? Ukuba nizisa into esisiqhwala nento efayo, akunto imbi oko? Khawuyisondeze loo nto kwinkosi yakho, ukuba yokholiswa na nguwe; yokunonelela na? utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_1_9_Kaloku ke, khanimbongoze uThixo, ukuba asibabale; kuvele esandleni senu oku; womnonelela ke umntu ngenxa yenu na? utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_1_10_Akwaba bekukho umntu kuni ozivalileyo iingcango,  anasibanekela ilize isibingelelo sam! Andininanze nganto, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, andikholiswa nangumnikelo ophuma esandleni senu.
39_1_11_Ngokuba kuthabathela ekuphumeni kwelanga, kude kuse ekutshoneni kwalo, likhulu igama lam phakathi kweentlanga;  nasezindaweni zonke kuqhunyiselwa, kunikelwe igama lam umnikelo ohlambulukileyo; ngokuba likhulu igama lam phakathi kweentlanga; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_1_12_Ke nina niyalihlambela ngokuthi oku kwenu, Isithebe sikaYehova singcolile, neziveliso zaso, ukutya kwaso kudelekile.
39_1_13_Nabuya nathi ke, Yabonani, yindinisa yani na le!  nasivuthela; utsho uYehova wemikhosi; nazisa izinto eziphangiweyo, neziziqhwala, nezifayo; nenjenje ukuzisa umnikelo ke; ndikholiswe na ke zezo zinto ziphuma esandleni senu? utsho uYehova.
39_1_14_Uqalekisiwe ke oqhathaniselayo, ukanti kukho emhlambini wakhe iduna; nobhambathisa, abingelele eNkosini into eyonakeleyo; ngokuba ndingukumkani omkhulu, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, negama lam liyoyikeka phakathi kweentlanga.
39_2_1_Ngoku ke lo mthetho ubhekiswa kuni, babingeleli.
39_2_2_Ukuba anithanga niphulaphule, ukuba anithanga nikunyamekele ngentliziyo ukulizukisa igama lam, utsho uYehova wemikhosi ndonithumela isiqalekiso, ndiziqalekise iintsikelelo zenu; ewe,  sendiziqalekisile, kuba ningakunyamekeli ngentliziyo,
39_2_3_Yabonani, ndiyayikhalimela ingalo yenu, nditshize ngomswane ebusweni benu, umswane wemithendeleko yenu, banithwale banisuse nawo;
39_2_4_nazi ukuba ndinithumele lo mthetho, ukuba ube ngumnqophiso wam noLevi; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_2_5_Umnqophiso wam ubunaye uLevi, ububomi noxolo; ndamnika ezo zinto ukuba oyike. Wandoyika ke, waqhiphuka umbilini ngenxa yegama lam.
39_2_6_Umyalelo wenyaniso waba semlonyeni wakhe, akwafumaneka bugqwetha emilebeni yomlomo wakhe; wahamba nam exolile, ethe tye, wabuyisa abaninzi ebugwenxeni.
39_2_7_Kuba umlomo wombingeleli ngowokugcina ukwazi, umyalelo bawufune emlonyeni wakhe; ngokuba ungumthunywa kaYehova wemikhosi.
39_2_8_Ke nina nimkile endleleni, nabakhubekisa abaninzi kuwo umyalelo, nawonakalisa umnqophiso kaLevi; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_2_9_Nam ndinenza abadelekileyo nabathobekileyo ebantwini bonke,  ngokokuba ningazigcinanga iindlela zam, nesuka nanonelela umntu emyalelweni.
39_2_10_Akamnye na ubawo wethu sonke siphela? Asidalwe Thixo mnye na? Yini na ukuba singinizelane, siwuhlambele umnqophiso woobawo bethu?
39_2_11_Unginizile uYuda, kwenzeka amasikizi kwaSirayeli naseYerusalem; ngokuba uYuda uyihlambele ingcwele kaYehova ayithandayo, wazeka intombi yothixo wolunye uhlanga.
39_2_12_Akwaba uYehova angamnqamla, kwindoda ekwenzayo oko, lowo ulindayo nalo usabelayo ezintenteni zakwaYakobi, nozisa iminikelo kuYehova wemikhosi.
39_2_13_Oku ke nikwenza okwesibini: ukugubungela isibingelelo sikaYehova ngeenyembezi, ngokulila, nangokuncwina, ade angabi sawubheka umnikelo, angabi samkela nto ikholekayo ezandleni zenu.
39_2_14_Nithi ke, Ngani na? Ngenxa yokuba uYehova ebelingqina phakathi kwakho nomfazi wobutsha bakho, lowo umnginizeleyo wena; kanti ke lidlelane lakho, ngumfazi womnqophiso wakho.
39_2_15_Akubangakho namnye ukwenzayo oku, obenamasalela omoya. Ke wenza ntoni na omnye lowo? Wafuna imbewu yakwaThixo. Wugcineni ngoko umoya wenu, ungamnginizeli umfazi wobutsha bakho;
39_2_16_kuba ndikuthiyile ukwala, utsho uYehova, uThixo kaSirayeli;  ndimthiyile nogubungela ingubo yakhe ngogonyamelo, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; wugcineni ke umoya wenu, ninganginizi.
39_2_17_Nimdinisile uYehova ngamazwi enu. Nithi ke, Simdinise ngokuthini na? Ngokuthi oku kwenu, Bonke abenza okubi balungile emehlweni kaYehova, ubananzile yena; okanye nithi, Uphi na uThixo wokugweba?
39_3_1_Yabona, ndiya kuthuma umthunywa wam, agece indlela phambi kwam. Iya kuza ke ngesiquphe etempileni yayo iNkosi leyo niyifunayo; kwaumthunywa womnqophiso enimlangazelelayo, yabona,  uyeza; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_3_2_Ngubani na ke onokuyinyamezela imini yakuza kwakhe? Ngubani na ke onokuma ekubonakaleni kwakhe? Ngokuba unjengomlilo womnyibilikisi, unjengesoda yabaxovuli beengubo.
39_3_3_Uya kuhlala ke engumnyibilikisi, engumcoci wesilivere,  abacoce oonyana bakaLevi, abahluze njengegolide,  nanjengesilivere; babe ngabazisa umnikelo kaYehova benobulungisa.
39_3_4_Woba mnandi ke kuYehova umnikelo wakwaYuda nowaseYerusalem,  ngokweemini zasephakadeni, ngokweminyaka yamandulo.
39_3_5_Ndiya kusondela kuni ukuba ndigwebe, ndibe lingqina elikhawulezayo kubakhafuli, nakubakrexezi, nakubafungi bobuxoki; nakwabacudisa umqeshwa ekumvuzeni, nomhlolokazi,  nenkedama; nakwabathoba owasemzini, bangandoyiki mna; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_3_6_Ngokuba mna, Yehova, andiguquguquki; ukuze ningagqitywa nje niphele, nina nyana bakaYakobi.
39_3_7_Kususela kwimihla yoyihlo, nimkile emimiselweni yam,  anayigcina. Buyelani kum, ndibuyele kuni; utsho uYehova wemikhosi. Nithi ke, Sibuye ngokuthini na?
39_3_8_Umntu angamqhatha na uThixo, ukuba nindiqhathe nje? Nithi ke, Sitheni na ukukuqhatha? Kwizishumi nemirhumo.
39_3_9_Niqalekisiwe ngesiqalekiso; noko ke niphikele ukundiqhatha,  nina luhlangandini nonke niphelu.
39_3_10_Ziziseni zonke izishumi endlwini yobuncwane bam, ize ke kubekho ukudla endlwini yam; ngoku nindicikide ngale nto, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ukuba andisayi kunivulela na iingcango zezulu, ndinithululele iintsikelelo, kude kungasweleki lutho.
39_3_11_Ndoyikhalimela inkumbi edlayo ngenxa yenu, ingazonakalisi iziqhamo zomhlaba wenu, ungaphunzi umdiliya wenu entsimini;  utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_3_12_Zonke iintlanga ziya kuthi ninoyolo, ngokuba niya kuba lilizwe elinanziweyo; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_3_13_Amazwi enu andigixile, utsho uYehova. Nithi ke, Sithethe ntoni na ngawe?
39_3_14_Nithi, Akunto yanto ukumkhonza uThixo; sizuze ntoni na ngakuba sigcine isigxina sakhe, sahamba ngezimnyama zokuzila ngenxa kaYehova wemikhosi?
39_3_15_Kaloku ke sithi banoyolo abakhukhumeleyo; abaneli kwakheka abenzi bokungendawo; basuka bamcikide uThixo, basinde.
39_3_16_Ke kaloku abamoyikayo uYehova bathetha elowo nowabo;  uYehova wazibaza iindlebe, weva; incwadi yokukhumbuza phambi kwakhe yabhalelwa abamoyikayo uYehova, abacinga ngegama akhe.
39_3_17_Uthi ke uYehova wemikhosi, Baya kuba yinqobo kum ngemini endenza oku, ndibaconge, njengomntu oconga unyana wakhe omkhonzayo.
39_3_18_Nobuya ke niwubone umahluko phakathi kwelungisa nongendawo,  phakathi komkhonzayo uThixo nongamkhonziyo.
39_4_1_Ngokuba, yabonani, iyeza imini evutha njengeziko; baya kuba ziindiza bonke abakhukhumali, nabenzi bonke bokungendawo,  ibalenye loo mini izayo, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ingabashiyeli ngcambu nasebe.
39_4_2_Ke kuni, nina baloyikayo igama lam, ilanga lobulungisa liya kuphuma, linophiliso emaphikweni alo. Niya kuphuma nidlobe,  njengamankonyana asesitalini, nibaxovule abangendawo;
39_4_3_ngokuba baya kuba luthuthu phantsi kweentende zeenyawo zenu ngemini endikwenzayo oku; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
39_4_4_Khumbulani umyalelo kaMoses, umkhonzi wam, endamwiselayo eHorebhe, ngokusingisele kumaSirayeli onke, imimiselo namasiko.
39_4_5_Yabonani, ndiya kuthumela kuni uEliya umprofeti, ingekafiki imini enkulu eyoyikekayo kaYehova.
39_4_6_Wobuyisela iintliziyo zooyise kubantwana, neentliziyo zabantwana kooyise, hleze ndize ndilichithe ilizwe ngokuliphanzisa.
40_1_1_Incwadi yomlibo wokuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu, unyana kaDavide,  unyana ka-Abraham.
40_1_2_UAbraham wazala uIsake; uIsake ke wazala uYakobi; uYakobi wazala uYuda nabazalwana bakhe;
40_1_3_uYuda wazala uPeretse noZera ngoTamare; uPeretse wazala uHetseron; uHetseron wazala uAram;
40_1_4_uAram wazala uAminadabhi; uAminadabhi wazala uNashon;  uNashon wazala uSalemon;
40_1_5_uSalemon wazala uBhohazi ngoRahabhi; uBhohazi wazala uObhede ngoRute; uObhede wazala uYese;
40_1_6_uYese wazala uDavide ukumkani. UDavide ke ukumkani wazala uSolomon ngobengumkaUriya;
40_1_7_uSolomon wazala uRehabheham; uRehabheham wazala uAbhiya;  uAbhiya wazala uAsa;
40_1_8_uAsa wazala uYoshafati; uYoshafati wazala uYoram; uYoram wazala u-Uziya;
40_1_9_u-Uziya wazala uYotam; uYotam wazala uAhazi; uAhazi wazala uHezekiya;
40_1_10_uHezekiya wazala uManase; uManase wazala uAmon; uAmon wazala uYosiya;
40_1_11_uYosiya wazala uYekoniya nabazalwana bakhe ngexesha lokufuduselwa kwabo eBhabhilon.
40_1_12_Emveni ke kokufuduselwa kwabo eBhabhilon, uYekoniya wazala uSalatiyeli; uSalatiyeli wazala uZerubhabheli;
40_1_13_uZerubhabheli wazala uAbhihudi; uAbhihudi wazala uEliyakim;  uEliyakim wazala uAzore;
40_1_14_uAzore wazala uTsadoki; uTsadoki wazala uYakin; uYakin wazala uElihudi;
40_1_15_uElihudi wazala uElazare; uElazare wazala uMatan; uMatan wazala uYakobi;
40_1_16_uYakobi ke wazala uYosefu, indoda kaMariya, ekuthe ngaye kwazalwa uYesu, okuthiwa nguKristu.
40_1_17_Zonke izizukulwana ngoko, ezithabathela kuAbraham zizise kuDavide, zizizukulwana ezilishumi elinazine; nezithabathela kuDavide zizise ekufuduselweni kwabo eBhabhilon, zizizukulwana ezilishumi elinazine; nezithabathela ekufuduselweni kwabo eBhabhilon zizise kuKristu, zizizukulwana ezilishumi elinazine.
40_1_18_Ke kaloku ukuzalwa kukaYesu Kristu kwaye kungolu hlobo:  Kwathi, akubon ukuba unina uMariya useleganelwe uYosefu,  bengekahlangani, wafunyanwa emithi ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
40_1_19_Wathi ke uYosefu indoda yakhe, engolilungisa, engathandi ukumhlaza ekuhleni, wanga angamala ngasese.
40_1_20_Akubon ukuba uyazicinga ezi zinto, naso isithunywa seNkosi sibonakala kuye ephupheni, sisithi, Yosefu, nyana kaDavide,  musa ukoyika ukumthabathela kuwe uMariya, umfazi wakho; kuba oko kukhawulweyo phakathi kwakhe kungoMoya oyiNgcwele.
40_1_21_Uya kuzala unyana ke, umbize ngegama elinguYesu; kuba yena eya kubasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo.
40_1_22_Ke kaloku oku konke kwenzeke, ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo yiNkosi ngomprofeti, isithi,
40_1_23_Yabonani, intombi le iya kumitha izale unyana, Bambize ngegama elinguImanuweli, oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo,  uThixo unathi.
40_1_24_Wathi ke uYosefu, evukile ebuthongweni, wenza ngoko besimmisele ngako isithunywa seNkosi, wamthabathela kuye umfazi wakhe;
40_1_25_waza ke akamazi, wada wazala unyana wakhe wamazibulo;  wambiza ke ngegama elinguYesu.
40_2_1_Kuthe ke, akubon ukuba uYesu uzelwe eBhetelehem yelakwaYuda, emihleni kaHerode ukumkani, kwabonakala kufika eYerusalem izazi zivela empumalanga, zisithi,
40_2_2_Uphi na lo uzelweyo, ukumkani wamaYuda? Kuba sibone inkwenkwezi yakhe empumalanga; size kumnqula.
40_2_3_Uthe ke uHerode ukumkani, akuva, wakhathazeka, yena nayo yonke iYerusalem naye.
40_2_4_Wahlanganisa ke bonke ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali babantu, wababuza ukuba ubeya kuzalelwa phi na uKristu.
40_2_5_Bathe ke kuye, EBhetelehem yelakwaYuda; kuba kubhaliwe ngomprofeti kwathiwa,
40_2_6_Nawe Bhetelehem, mhlaba wakwaYuda, Akunguye nakanye omncinanana phakathi kwabalawuli bakwaYuda: Kuba kuwe apha kuya kuphuma uMlawuli, Onguyena uya kubalusa abantu bam amaSirayeli.
40_2_7_Kwakuba njalo, uHerode, ezibize ngasese izazi ezo,  waqondisisa kakuhle kuzo ixesha lokubonakala kwenkwenkwezi leyo;
40_2_8_wazithuma ke eBhetelehem, wathi, Hambani niye nicokise ukubuzisa ngomntwana lowo; xa ke nithe namfumana, ze nindibikele, ukuze nam ndiye kumnqula.
40_2_9_Zimvile ke zona ukumkani, zahamba; nantso inkwenkwezi leyo zayibonayo empumalanga izandulela, yada yaya kuma phezu kwendawo abekuyo umntwana lowo.
40_2_10_Zathi ke, zakuyibona inkwenkwezi, zavuya ngovuyo olukhulu kakhulu.
40_2_11_Zingenile endlwini, zambona umntwana enoMariya unina, zawa phantsi, zaqubuda kuye; zathi, zinqike impahla yazo, zanikela kuye iminikelo, igolide, nentlaka emhlophe, nemore.
40_2_12_Zathi, kuba zihlatyelwe nguThixo ephupheni ukuba zingabuyi ziye kuHerode, zemka ngayimbi indlela ukuya ezweni lakowazo.
40_2_13_Zithe zakubon ukuba zimkile ke zona, naso isithunywa seNkosi sibonakala kuYosefu ephupheni, sisithi, Vuka,  umthabathe umntwana nonina, usabele eYiputa, uze ube khona apho ndide ndikuxelele; kuba uHerode uhlalele ukumfuna umntwana lowo, ukuba amtshabalalise.
40_2_14_Evukile ke yena, wamthabatha umntwana nonina ebusuku, wemka waya eYiputa.
40_2_15_Waba khona apho wada wabhubha uHerode; ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo yiNkosi ngomprofeti isithi, Ndambiza unyana wam ukuba aphume eYiputa.
40_2_16_Ke kaloku uHerode, akubona ukuba izazi zidlale ngaye, waba nomsindo kunene, waza wathumela, wababulala bonke abantwana abaseBhetelehem, nakuyo yonke imida yayo, abaminyaka mibini bezelwe, nangaphantsi, elungelelanisa nexesha abeliqondisise kakuhle kuzo izazi.
40_2_17_Kwandula ukuzaliseka okwathethwayo ngoYeremiya umprofeti esithi,
40_2_18_Kwavakala izwi eRama, Isimema nesililo nesijwili esikhulu,  URakeli elilela abantwana bakhe, Engavumi ukuthuthuzeleka,  ngokuba bengasekho.
40_2_19_Akubon ukuba ubhubhile ke uHerode, sabonakala isithunywa seNkosi sibonakala ephupheni kuYosefu eYiputa sisithi,
40_2_20_Vuka, umthabathe umntwana nonina, uye ezweni lakwaSirayeli;  kuba bafile abo babezonda ubomi bomntwana.
40_2_21_Wavuka ke, wamthabatha umntwana nonina, weza ezweni lakwaSirayeli.
40_2_22_Ke kaloku, akuva ukuba uArkelawo ungukumkani kwelakwaYuda esikhundleni sikaHerode uyise, woyika ukuhamba asinge khona;  wathi ke, ehlatyelwe nguThixo ephupheni, wemka waya kumacala elaseGalili.
40_2_23_Ufike wema emzini ekuthiwa yiNazarete; ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngabaprofeti, okokuba wobizwa ngokuthi ungowase Nazarete.
40_3_1_Ke kaloku, kuthi ngaloo mihla kufike uYohane umbhaptizi,  ememeza entlango yelakwaYuda, esithi,
40_3_2_Guqukani, kuba ubukumkani bamazulu busondele.
40_3_3_Kuba lo nguye awayethetha yena uIsaya umprofeti, esithi,  Izwi lodandulukayo entlango, lisithi, Yilungiseni indlela yeNkosi, Wutyenenezeni umendo wayo.
40_3_4_Ke uYohane lowo ingubo yakhe ibiyeyoboya benkamela,  enombhinqo wentlonze esinqeni sakhe; kwaye ke ukudla kwakhe kuziinkumbi nobusi basendle.
40_3_5_Babephuma oko besiya kuye abaseYerusalem, nabelakwaYuda bonke, nabommandla wonke waseYordan.
40_3_6_Babhaptizwa nguye eYordan apho, bezixela izono zabo.
40_3_7_Ke kaloku, akubona into eninzi yabaFarisi nabaSadusi besiza ekubhaptizeni kwakhe, wathi kubo, Nzalandini yamarhamba,  ngubani na onibonisileyo ukuba niyibaleke ingqumbo ezayo?
40_3_8_Velisani ngoko iziqhamo eziyifaneleyo inguquko; ize ningabi nithi phakathi kwenu,
40_3_9_Thina sinobawo uAbraham; kuba ndithi kuni, Unako uThixo kuwo la matye ukumvelisela abantwana uAbraham.
40_3_10_Kananjalo izembe selibekiwe engcanjini yemithi; ngoko yonke imithi engavelisi siqhamo sihle, iyagawulwa iphoswe emlilweni.
40_3_11_Mna okunene ndinibhaptizela enguqukweni ngamanzi; kodwa lowo uzayo emva kwam unamandla kunam, ozimbadada ndingakulingeneyo ukuziphatha; yena ke uya kunibhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele nangomlilo:
40_3_12_omnyazi wokwela usesandleni sakhe; uya kusicokisa kuthi tu isanda sakhe, ayibuthele kuvimba ingqolowa yakhe, kodwa wona umququ uya kuwutshisa ngomlilo ongacimekiyo.
40_3_13_Kuthi ngelo xa afike uYesu eYordan kuYohane, evela kwelaseGalili, ukuba abhaptizwe nguye.
40_3_14_Ke kaloku uYohane wayemalela, esithi, Mna kufuneka ndibhaptizwe nguwe nje, uza kum na wena?
40_3_15_Uphendule ke uYesu wathi kuye, Vuma okwakaloku; kuba kusifanele thina ukwenjenjalo ukuzalisa bonke ubulungisa.  Andule ke ukumvumela.
40_3_16_Ebhaptiziwe ke uYesu, wenyuka kwaoko emanzini; asuka amazulu avuleka kuye, wambona uMoya kaThixo esihla njengehobe,  esiza phezu kwakhe.
40_3_17_Nalo izwi liphuma ezulwini, lisithi, Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye.
40_4_1_Waza uYesu wenyuswa nguMoya, wasiwa entlango, ukuba ahendwe nguMtyholi.
40_4_2_Uthe akuba ezile ukudla iimini ezimashumi mane nobusuku obumashumi mane, ekupheleni kwazo walamba.
40_4_3_Efikile ke umhendi kuye, uthe, Ukuba unguNyana kaThixo,  yitsho la matye abe zizonka.
40_4_4_Waphendula ke yena wathi, Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Akaphili ngasonka sodwa umntu, uphila ngamazwi onke aphuma emlonyeni kaThixo.
40_4_5_Eze uMtyholi, amthabathe amse kuwo umzi ongcwele, ammise eluchochoyini lwetempile, athi ke kuye,
40_4_6_Ukuba unguNyana kaThixo, ziphose ezantsi; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uya kuziwisela umthetho ngawe izithunywa zakhe zasemazulwini, Zikufukule ngezandla, Hleze ubetheke ngonyawo lwakho etyeni.
40_4_7_Wathi uYesu kuye, Kubhaliwe kanjalo kwathiwa, Uze ungayihendahendi iNkosi uThixo wakho.
40_4_8_Ubuya uMtyholi amthabathe amse entabeni ephakame kakhulu,  ambonise zonke izikumkani zehlabathi, nozuko lwazo;
40_4_9_athi kuye, Zonke ezi zinto ndokunika, ukuba uthe wawa phantsi, waqubuda kum.
40_4_10_Aze athi uYesu kuye, Suka umke, Sathana; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, YiNkosi uThixo wakho oya kuqubuda kuyo, ukhonze yona yodwa.
40_4_11_Andule ke uMtyholi ukumyeka; nanko kufika izithunywa zezulu zimlungiselela.
40_4_12_Ke kaloku, akuva uYesu ukuba uYohane unikelwe entolongweni,  wemka waya kwelaseGalili.
40_4_13_Wathi esukile eNazarete, weza wahlala eKapernahum engaselwandle, emideni yakwaZebhulon neyakwaNafetali;
40_4_14_ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngoIsaya umprofeti, esithi,
40_4_15_Umhlaba wakwaZebhulon nomhlaba wakwaNafetali, Wendlela yaselwandle, phesheya kweYordan, WaseGalili yeentlanga,
40_4_16_Abantu abo bahleli ebumnyameni Babone ukukhanya okukhulu;  Nabo bahleli ezweni nasethunzini lokufa Bavelelwe kukukhanya.
40_4_17_Waqala oko uYesu ukumemeza, esithi, Guqukani, kuba ubukumkani bamazulu busondele.
40_4_18_Uthe ke uYesu, ehamba ngaselwandle lwaseGalili wabona abazalwana ababini, uSimon ekuthiwa nguPetros noAndreya,  umzalwana wakhe, bephosa umnatha elwandle; kuba babengababambisi beentlanzi.
40_4_19_Athi ke kubo, Yizani apha nindilandele; ndonenza nibe ngababambisi babantu.
40_4_20_Bayishiya kwaoko iminatha, bamlandela ke.
40_4_21_Uhambele phambili esuka apho, wabona abanye abazalwana ababini, uYakobi lo kaZebhedi, noYohane umzalwana wakhe,  besemkhombeni noZebhedi uyise, belungisa iminatha yabo;  wababiza ke.
40_4_22_Bawushiya kwaoko umkhombe noyise, bamlandela ke.
40_4_23_Waye uYesu elihamba lonke elaseGalili, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, evakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani,  ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke ebantwini.
40_4_24_Lwaphuma ke udumo lwakhe lwaya kulo lonke elaseSiriya,  babazisa kuye bonke abafayo, bebanjwe zizifo ngezifo naziintuthumbo ngeentuthumbo, nabaphethwe ziidemon,  nabanesathuthwane, nabanedumbe, wabaphilisa ke.
40_4_25_Walandelwa zizihlwele ezininzi zivela kwelaseGalili,  naseDekapoli, naseYerusalem, nakwelakwaYuda, naphesheya kweYordan.
40_5_1_Uthe ke, akuzibona izihlwele ezo, wenyuka intaba; waza akuhlala phantsi, beza kuye abafundi bakhe.
40_5_2_Wawuvula umlomo wakhe, wabafundisa, esithi,
40_5_3_Banoyolo abangamahlwempu ngomoya; ngokuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo.
40_5_4_Banoyolo abakhedamileyo; ngokuba baya konwatyiswa bona.
40_5_5_Banoyolo abanobulali; ngokuba umhlaba baya kuwudla ilifa bona.
40_5_6_Banoyolo abalambela banxanelwe ubulungisa; ngokuba baya kuhluthiswa bona.
40_5_7_Banoyolo abanenceba; ngokuba baya kwenzelwa inceba bona.
40_5_8_Banoyolo abahlambulukileyo intliziyo; ngokuba baya kumbona uThixo bona.
40_5_9_Banoyolo abaxolisi; ngokuba baya kubizwa ngokuthi bangoonyana bakaThixo bona.
40_5_10_Banoyolo abatshutshiswa ngenxa yobulungisa; ngokuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo.
40_5_11_Ninoyolo nina, xa bathe abantu baningcikiva,  banitshutshisa, bathetha zonke izinto ezikhohlakeleyo ngani bexoka, ngenxa yam.
40_5_12_Vuyani nigcobe kunene; ngokuba umvuzo wenu mkhulu emazulwini; kuba benjenjalo ukubatshutshisa abaprofeti ababekho phambi kwenu.
40_5_13_Niyityuwa yehlabathi nina; ke ukuba ityuwa ithe ayaba nasongo, yothiwani na ukuvakaliswa? Ayisalungele nto,  kukulahlwa phandle kuphela, inyathelwe ngabantu.
40_5_14_Nina nilukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; umzi omi phezu kwentaba awunakufihlakala;
40_5_15_kananjalo abasibaneki isibane basibeke phantsi kwesitya;  basibeka esiphathweni saso, sikhanyisele bonke abasendlwini.
40_5_16_Malukhanye ngokunjalo ukhanyiselo lwenu phambi kwabantu;  ukuze bayibone imisebenzi yenu emihle, bamzukise uYihlo osemazulwini.
40_5_17_Ningabi ndize kuchitha umthetho, nokuba ngabaprofeti;  andize kuchitha, ndize kuzalisekisa.
40_5_18_Kuba inene ndithi kuni, Koda kudlule izulu nehlabathi,  kungakhanga kudlule nalinye iganyana nokuba lisuntswana emthethweni, kude kwenzeke konke.
40_5_19_Othe ngoko wachitha noko umnye kule mithetho mincinanana,  wabafundisa abantu ngokunjalo, kothiwa ungomncinanana ebukumkanini bamazulu; othe wenza wafundisa ngayo, kothiwa ngomkhulu ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_5_20_Kuba ndithi kuni, Ukuba ubulungisa benu abuthanga bugqithe kakhulu kobababhali nabaFarisi, anisayi kuza ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_5_21_Nivile ukuba kwathiwa kumanyange, Uze ungabulali; wothi othe wabulala, abe sisisulu somgwebo.
40_5_22_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu ofumana amqumbele umzalwana wakhe, woba sisisulu somgwebo; othe ke kumzalwana wakhe, Ntw  ingento, woba sisisulu sentlanganiso yamatyala; othe ke,  Siyathandini, woba sisisulu sesihogo somlilo.
40_5_23_Ngoko xa sukuba uwusondeza umnikelo wakho esibingelelweni,  wathi ulapho wakhumbula ukuba umzalwana wakho unendawo ngakuwe,
40_5_24_wushiye apho umnikelo wakho phambi kwesibingelelo, uhambe uye uxolelane nomzalwana wakho kuqala, wandule ukuza uwusondeze umnikelo wakho.
40_5_25_Lungisana kamsinya nokumangaleleyo, usesendleleni naye;  hleze ummangaleli lowo akunikele emgwebini, aze umgwebi akunikele kumsila, uze uphoswe entolongweni.
40_5_26_Inene ndithi kuwe, Akusayi kukha uphume khona apho, ude uhlawule nemalanana yokugqibela.
40_5_27_Nivile ukuba kwathiwa kumanyange, Uze ungakrexezi.
40_5_28_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu okhangela umntu oyinkazana,  ukuba amkhanuke, uselemkrexezile entliziyweni yakhe.
40_5_29_Ukuba ke iliso lakho lokunene liyakukhubekisa, linyothule ulilahle kuwe; kuba kukulungele kanye ukuba kutshabalale libe linye emalungwini akho, kunokuba umzimba wakho uphela uphoswe esihogweni.
40_5_30_Nokuba isandla sakho sokunene siyakukhubekisa, sinqamle usilahle kuwe; kuba kukulungele kanye ukuba kutshabalale libe linye emalungwini akho, kunokuba umzimba wakho uphela uphoswe esihogweni.
40_5_31_Kwathiwa ke, Othe wamala umfazi wakhe, makamnike incwadi yokwahlukana.
40_5_32_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Othe wamala umfazi wakhe ngaphandle kwendawo yombulo, uyamkrexezisa; nothe wazeka owaliweyo,  uyakrexeza.
40_5_33_Kanjalo nivile ukuba kwathiwa kumanyange, Uze ungafungi buxoki; wakuthi uzifeze eNkosini izifungo zakho.
40_5_34_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Maningakhe nifunge nto; nokuba lizulu,  ngokuba yitrone kaThixo;
40_5_35_nokuba lihlabathi eli, ngokuba sisihlalo seenyawo zakhe;  nokuba yiYerusalem, ngokuba ngumzi woKumkani omkhulu.
40_5_36_Uze ungayifungi nentloko yakho, ngokuba ungenamandla okwenza nalunye unwele lube mhlophe, nokuba lube mnyama.
40_5_37_Ilizwi lenu ke malibe nguewe, ewe; nguhayi, hayi. Okugqithe koko ke kuvela kokungendawo.
40_5_38_Nivile ukuba kwathiwa, Iliso maliphindezelwe ngeliso,  nezinyo ngezinyo.
40_5_39_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Maningasunduzani nokungendawo; yithi osukuba ekutywakraza esidleleni sakho sokunene, umguqulele nesinye eso.
40_5_40_Nalowo ufuna ukukumangalela, akuhluthe ingubo yangaphantsi,  myekele neyokwaleka.
40_5_41_Nosukuba ekunyanzelela imayile enye, hamba naye zibe mbini.
40_5_42_Mphe lowo ukucelayo, nalowo ufuna ukuboleka kuwe ungamnikeli umva.
40_5_43_Nivile ukuba kwathiwa, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho,  uluthiye utshaba lwakho.
40_5_44_Ke mna ndithi kuni, Zithandeni iintshaba zenu, basikeleleni abo baniqalekisayo, benzeleni okulungileyo abo banithiyayo,  nibathandazele abo banigxekayo banitshutshise;
40_5_45_ukuze nibe ngabantwana boYihlo osemazulwini; ngokuba ilanga lakhe elenza liphume phezu kwabakhohlakeleyo nabalungileyo;  nemvula eyinisa phezu kwabalungisayo nabangalungisiyo.
40_5_46_Kuba xa nithe nathanda abo banithandayo, ninamvuzo mni na?  Abenzi kwaloo nto yini na nababuthi berhafu?
40_5_47_Naxa nithe nabulisa abazalwana benu bodwa, yintoni na egqithiseleyo eniyenzayo? Abenjenjalo yini na nababuthi berhafu?
40_5_48_Ngoko yibani ngabafezekileyo, njengokuba uYihlo osemazulwini efezekile.
40_6_1_Lumkani, ubulungisa benu ningabenzeli ebusweni babantu,  ngokunga ningabonwa ngabo; okanye, aninamvuzo kuYihlo osemazulwini.
40_6_2_Ngoko, xa sukuba uliza abantu, ungahlokomisi xilongo phambi kwakho, njengoko benza ngako abahanahanisi ezindlwini zesikhungu, nasezitratweni, ukuze bazukiswe ngabantu. Inene ndithi kuni, Bawufincile umvuzo wabo.
40_6_3_Ke wena, xa uliza abantu, masingazi isandla sakho sokhohlo into eyenziwa sisandla sakho sokunene,
40_6_4_ukuze amalizo akho abe semfihlekweni; aze uYihlo obona emfihlekweni akubuyisele ekuhleni yena.
40_6_5_Naxa sukuba uthandaza, uze ungabi njengabahanahanisi;  ngokuba bethanda ukuthandaza bemi ezindlwini zesikhungu nasezimbombeni zezitrato, ngokokuze babe nokubonwa ngabantu.  Inene ndithi kuni, Bawufincile umvuzo wabo.
40_6_6_Ke wena, xa sukuba uthandaza, ngena egumbini lakho, uthi,  uluvalile ucango lwakho, uthandaze kuYihlo osemfihlekweni; aze noYihlo obona emfihlekweni akubuyisele ekuhleni.
40_6_7_Nithandaza njalo ke, maningenzi milembelele ingeyanto,  njengabeentlanga; kuba beba boviwa ngenxa yamazwi abo amaninzi.
40_6_8_Ngoko maningafani nabo; kuba ekwazi uYihlo enikusweleyo,  ningekamceli.
40_6_9_Thandazani ngoko nina nenjenje: Bawo wethu osemazulwini,  malingcwaliswe igama lakho.
40_6_10_Mabufike ubukumkani bakho. Makwenziwe ukuthanda kwakho nasemhlabeni, njengokuba kusenziwa emazulwini.
40_6_11_Siphe namhla isonka sethu semihla ngemihla.
40_6_12_Usixolele amatyala ethu, njengokuba nathi sibaxolela abo banamatyala kuthi.
40_6_13_Ungasingenisi ekulingweni, sihlangule enkohlakalweni.  Ngokuba bubobakho ubukumkani, namandla, nozuko, kuse kuwo amaphakade. Amen.
40_6_14_Kuba xa nithi nibaxolele abantu iziphoso zabo, uYihlo osemazulwini wonixolela nani.
40_6_15_Xa nithi ningabaxoleli abantu iziphoso zabo, noYihlo ke akayi kunixolela iziphoso zenu.
40_6_16_Xa sukuba ke nizila ukudla, maningabi njengabahanahanisi,  bona bamatshekileyo; kuba babenza bubi ubuso babo, ukuze babonakale ebantwini ukuba bazilile. Inene ndithi kuni,  Bawufincile umvuzo wabo.
40_6_17_Ke wena, wakuzila, yithambise intloko yakho, ubuhlambe ubuso bakho,
40_6_18_ukuze ungabonakali ebantwini ukuba uzilile, ubonakale kuYihlo osemfihlekweni; aze uYihlo obona emfihlekweni akubuyisele ekuhleni.
40_6_19_Ningaziqwebeli ubutyebi emhlabeni, apho konakalisa inundu nomhlwa, nalapho amasela agqobhozayo ebe;
40_6_20_ziqwebeleni ke ubutyebi emazulwini, apho kungonakalisi nundu namhlwa, nalapho amasela angagqobhoziyo ebe;
40_6_21_kuba apho bukhona ubutyebi benu, yoba lapho nentliziyo yenu.
40_6_22_Isibane somzimba liliso; xa sukuba iliso lakho ngoko lingenakumbi, umzimba wakho uphela wokhanyiseleka.
40_6_23_Kodwa xa sukuba iliso lakho likhohlakele, umzimba wakho uphela woba bubumnyama. Ukuba ngoko ukukhanya okukuwe kububumnyama, bungakanani na ubumnyama obo!
40_6_24_Akukho mntu unako ukukhonza nkosi mbini; kuba eya kuyithiya le ayithande leya, athi mhlawumbi abambelele kule ayidele leya.  Aninako ukukhonza uThixo nobutyebi.
40_6_25_Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuni, Musani ukubuxhalela ubomi benu,  nisithi nodla ntoni na; nosela ntoni na; kwanomzimba wenu,  nisithi niya kwambatha ntoni na. Ubomi abungaphezulu na kuko ukudla, nomzimba awungaphezulu na kwinto yokwambatha?
40_6_26_Yondelani ezintakeni zasezulwini; ngokuba azihlwayeli,  azivuni, azibutheli koovimba; ukanti ke uYihlo osemazulwini uyazondla. Nina anizidlule kakhulu na?
40_6_27_Nguwuphi na ke kuni onokuthi ngokuxhala ongeze ebukhulwini bakhe ikubhite ibe nye?
40_6_28_Kanjalo yini na ukuba nixhalele into yokwambatha? Gqalani iinyibiba zasendle, ukuhluma kwazo; azibulaleki, azisonti nokusonta;
40_6_29_ke ndithi kuni, noSolomon kubo bonke ubunewunewu bakhe,  wayengavathiswanga nanjenganye kuzo ezi.
40_6_30_Ukuba ke ingca leyo yasendle, ethi namhla ibekho, ize ngomso iphoswe eziko, wenjenjalo uThixo ukuyambathisa, akayi kunambathisa kakhulu ngakumbi na, bantundini balukholo luncinane?
40_6_31_Musani ukuxhala ngoko, nisithi, Sodla ntoni na, sosela ntoni na, siya kwambatha ntoni na?
40_6_32_Kuba zonke ezo zinto zingxanyelwe ziintlanga; kuba uYihlo wasemazulwini uyazi ukuba ezo zinto zonke ziyafuneka kuni.
40_6_33_Funani ke tanci ubukumkani bukaThixo nobulungisa bakhe,  zaye zonke ezo zinto ziya kongezelelwa kuni.
40_6_34_Ngoko musani ukuxhalela ingomso; kuba ingomso liya kuxhalela okwalo. Buyanele imini leyo obayo ububi.
40_7_1_Musani ukugweba, ukuze ningagwetywa.
40_7_2_Kuba ngogwebo enigweba ngalo, niya kugwetywa kwangalo nani;  nangomlinganiselo enilinganisela abanye ngawo, niya kulinganiselwa kwangawo nani.
40_7_3_Yini na ke ukuba usibone isibi esisesweni lomzalwana wakho,  kanti akuwuqiqi wona umqadi okwelakho iliso?
40_7_4_Okanye ungathini na ukuthi kumzalwana wakho, Yeka ndisikhuphe isibi eso esweni lakho, kanti nango umqadi kwelakho iliso?
40_7_5_Mhanahanisindini, wukhuphe kuqala umqadi lowo esweni lakho,  wandule ukubona kakuhle ukusikhupha isibi esisesweni lomzalwana wakho.
40_7_6_Musani ukukunika izinja okungcwele, kanjalo ningaziphosi iiperile zenu phambi kweehagu, hleze zizinyathele ngamanqina azo, zijike ziniqwenge.
40_7_7_Celani, nophiwa; funani, nofumana; nkqonkqozani, novulelwa;
40_7_8_kuba wonke umntu ocelayo uyazuza, nalowo ufunayo uyafumana,  nalowo unkqonkqozayo uya kuvulelwa.
40_7_9_Nguwuphi na umntu kuni ongathi, ukuba unyana wakhe uthe wacela isonka, amnike ilitye?
40_7_10_Athi, ukuba uthe wacela intlanzi, amnike inyoka?
40_7_11_Ukuba ngoko nina, nikhohlakele nje, niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezilungileyo, wobeka phi na yena uYihlo osemazulwini ukugqithisela ngokubapha okulungileyo abo bamcelayo?
40_7_12_Zonke izinto ngoko enisukuba ninga bangazenza abantu kuni,  yenzani ezikwanjalo nani kubo; kuba oko kungumthetho nabaprofeti.
40_7_13_Ngenani ngesango elimxinwa; ngokuba libanzi isango,  iphangalele nendlela, esa entshabalalweni; baninzi ke abangena ngalo.
40_7_14_Ngokuba limxinwa isango, icuthene nendlela, esa ebomini;  bambalwa ke abalifumanayo.
40_7_15_Ke kaloku balumkeleni abaprofeti ababuxoki, abeza kuni ngezambatho zeegusha, ngaphakathi ke beziingcuka eziqwengayo.
40_7_16_Nobaqonda ngeziqhamo zabo. Kukha kukhiwe iidiliya emithaneni enameva, namakhiwane ezinkunzaneni, yini na?
40_7_17_Ngokunjalo yonke imithi elungileyo ivelisa iziqhamo ezihle,  ke wona umthi ongenguwo uvelisa iziqhamo ezibi.
40_7_18_umthi olungileyo awunakuvelisa ziqhamo zibi, nomthi ongenguwo awunakuvelisa ziqhamo zihle.
40_7_19_Wonke umthi ongavelisi ziqhamo zihle uyagawulwa, uphoswe emlilweni.
40_7_20_Ngoko ke nobaqonda ngeziqhamo zabo.
40_7_21_Asingabo bonke abathi kum, Nkosi, Nkosi, abaya kungena ebukumkanini bamazulu; ngokwenzayo ukuthanda kukaBawo osemazulwini.
40_7_22_Baninzi abaya kuthi kum ngaloo mini, Nkosi, Nkosi,  sasingathe na egameni lakho saprofeta, sathi egameni lakho sakhupha iidemon, sathi egameni lakho senza imisebenzi yamandla emininzi?
40_7_23_Ndandule ndibaxelele, ndithi, Andizanga ndinazi; mkani kum,  nina nenza okuchasene nomthetho.
40_7_24_Wonke umntu osukuba ngoko eweva la mazwi am, awenze,  ndomfanekisa nendoda eyingqondi, yona yayakhelayo elulwalweni indlu yayo.
40_7_25_Yehla imvula, yeza imilambo, yavuthuza imimoya, yagaleleka kuloo ndlu; ayawa, kuba ibisekelwe elulwalweni.
40_7_26_Nomntu wonke owevayo la mazwi am, angawenzi, wofanekiswa nendoda esisiyatha, yona yayakhelayo entlabathini indlu yayo.
40_7_27_Yehla imvula, yeza imilambo, yavuthuza imimoya, yabetha kuloo ndlu; yawa; saba sikhulu ke isiwo sayo.
40_7_28_Kuthe ke, xenikweni uYesu ebewagqibile la mazwi,  zakhwankqiswa iindimbane kukufundisa kwakhe;
40_7_29_kuba ebezifundisa njengonegunya, engafundisi njengabo ababhali.
40_8_1_Ke kaloku, akuhla entabeni apho, walandelwa ngabantu abaninzi.
40_8_2_Nanko kusiza oneqhenqa, waqubuda kuye, esithi, Nkosi, ukuba uyathanda, unako ukundihlambulula.
40_8_3_Wasolula isandla uYesu, wamchukumisa, esithi, Ndiyathanda,  hlambuluka. Lahlambuluka kwaoko iqhenqa lakhe.
40_8_4_Athi uYesu kuye, Lumka angaxeleli bani; hamba uye kuzibonisa kumbingeleli, usondeze umnikelo awamisa wona uMoses, ube bubungqina kubo.
40_8_5_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uYesu ungene eKapernahum, kweza kuye umthetheli-khulu embongoza,
40_8_6_esithi, Nkosi, isicaka sam silele ngendlu, sinedumbe,  sithuthunjelwa ngokoyikekayo.
40_8_7_Athi uYesu kuye, Ndoza ndisiphilise mna.
40_8_8_Waphendula umthetheli-khulu, wathi, Nkosi, andikulingene ukuba ude ungene phantsi kophahla lwam; thetha ilizwi lodwa,  sophiliswa isicaka sam.
40_8_9_Kuba nam ndingumntu ophantsi kwegunya labanye,  ndinamasoldati phantsi kwam; ndithi kweli, Yiya, liye; kweliya,  Yiza, lize; kwisicaka sam, Yenza oku, sikwenze.
40_8_10_Evile ke uYesu wamangaliswa, wathi kwabalandelayo, Inene ndithi kuni, andifumananga lukholo lungaka nakwaSirayeli.
40_8_11_Ndithi ke kuni, Baninzi abaya kufika bevela empumalanga nasentshonalanga, bangqengqe ndawonye noAbraham noIsake noYakobi ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_8_12_Kodwa bona abantwana bobukumkani baya kukhutshelwa emnyameni ongaphandle; khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_8_13_Waza wathi uYesu kumthetheli-khulu, Hamba ke, makwenzeke kuwe ngokokholo lwakho. Saphiliswa kwangalo elo lixa isicaka sakhe.
40_8_14_Ke kaloku uYesu wangena endlwini kaPetros, wabona umkhwekazi wakhe elele, esifa yicesina.
40_8_15_Waza wachukumisa isandla sakhe, yamyeka icesina; wavuka ke,  wabalungiselela.
40_8_16_Kuthe ke kwakuhlwa, kwaziswa kuye into eninzi yabaphethwe ziidemon; wabakhupha oomoya abo ngelizwi, wathi nabo bonke abafayo wabaphilisa;
40_8_17_ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngoIsaya umprofeti, esithi,  Yena ngokwakhe wabuthabatha ubulwelwe bethu, wazithwala izifo zethu.
40_8_18_Uthe ke uYesu, akubona abantu abaninzi bemphahlile, wathi makumkiwe kuyiwe ngaphesheya.
40_8_19_Kweza mbhali uthile, wathi kuye, Mfundisi, ndiya kukulandela apho ungaya khona.
40_8_20_Athi uYesu kuye, Iimpungutye zinemingxuma, neentaka zezulu zineendawo zokuhlala; yena uNyana woMntu akanandawo apho angalalisa khona intloko.
40_8_21_Uthe ke omnye wabafundi bakhe kuye, Nkosi, ndivumele ndiye kungcwaba ubawo kuqala.
40_8_22_Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Landela mna, ubayeke abafileyo bangcwabe abafileyo babo.
40_8_23_Engenile ke emkhombeni, bamlandela abafundi bakhe.
40_8_24_Kwasuka kwabakho uqhwithela olukhulu elwandle, ngokokude umkhombe ugutyungelwe ngamaza; waye ke yena elele ubuthongo.
40_8_25_Beza abafundi bakhe bamvusa, besithi, Nkosi, sisindise,  satshabalala!
40_8_26_Athi kubo, Yini na ukuba nibe ngamagwala, bantundini balukholo luncinane? Waza wavuka, wayikhalimela imimoya nolwandle; kwabakho ukuzola okukhulu.
40_8_27_Bamangaliswa ke abantu abo, besithi, Ngumntu mni na lo, le nto alulanyelwayo nayimimoya nalulwandle?
40_8_28_Kuthe akufika ngaphesheya, ezweni lamaGergasi, kwaqubisana naye abantu ababini abaphethwe ziidemon, bephuma emangcwabeni,  belugcalagcala, kwada kwayinkohla ukuba kudlule umntu ngaloo ndlela.
40_8_29_Basuka bakhala besithi, Yintoni na enathi nawe, Yesu, Nyana kaThixo? Apha uze kusithuthumbisa na phambi kwelona xesha?
40_8_30_Bekukho ke mgama kubo ugxuba olukhulu lweehagu lusidla.
40_8_31_Zaye ke iidemon zimbongoza, zisithi, Ukuba uyasikhupha,  sivumele siye kungena elugxubeni lweehagu oluya.
40_8_32_Wathi kuzo, Yiyani. Zaphuma ke, zaya kungena elugxubeni lweehagu; lwasuka lonke ugxuba lweehagu lwaphaphatheka, lwehla eweni, lwela elwandle; zatshabalala emanzini.
40_8_33_Bathe ke abo babezalusa basaba, baya ekhaya, babika into yonke, kwanendawo yababephethwe ziidemon.
40_8_34_Wasuka wonke umzi waphuma, waya kumhlangabeza uYesu; bathi bakumbona, bambongoza ukuba agqithe kuloo mida yabo.
40_9_1_Engenile ke emkhombeni, wawela, Weza kufika emzini wakowabo.
40_9_2_Ke kaloku bazisa kuye umntu onedumbe, elele elukhukweni.  UYesu, elubona ukholo lwabo, wathi kuye onedumbe, Mntwana wam,  yomelela; zixolelwe izono zakho.
40_9_3_Besuka ababhali abathile, bathi phakathi kwabo, Lo uyanyelisa.
40_9_4_UYesu, ezibona iingcingane zabo, wathi, Yini na ukuba nicinge izinto ezikhohlakeleyo ezintliziyweni zenu?
40_9_5_Kuba okukhona kulula kukuphi na, kukho ukuthi, Zixolelwe izono zakho; kukho nokuthi, Vuka uhambe?
40_9_6_Kodwa ukuze nazi ukuba unalo igunya emhlabeni uNyana woMntu lokuxolela izono (selesithi konedumbe), Vuka, uthabathe ukhuko lwakho, uye endlwini yakho.
40_9_7_Wavuka ke, wemka waya endlwini yakhe.
40_9_8_Zikubonile ke oko izihlwele, zamangaliswa, zamzukisa uThixo,  obanike abantu igunya elingaka.
40_9_9_Edlula apho, uYesu wabona umntu ehleli endaweni yerhafu,  okuthiwa nguMateyu; athi kuye, Ndilandele, Wesuka ke,  wamlandela.
40_9_10_Kwathi, akubon ukuba uhleli ngasesithebeni endlwini,  kwabonakala into eninzi yababuthi berhafu naboni, yeza yahlala ndawonye noYesu nabafundi bakhe.
40_9_11_Bakukubona oko abaFarisi, bathi kubafundi bakhe, Kungani na ukuba umfundisi wenu adle nababuthi berhafu naboni?
40_9_12_Ekuvile ke uYesu oko, wathi kubo, Akufuneki gqirha kwabaphilileyo, lifuneka kwabafayo.
40_9_13_Khaniye nifunde ukuba kukuthini na ukuthi, Ndithanda inceba, andithandi mbingelelo; kuba andize kubiza malungisa,  ndize kubiza aboni ukuba baguquke.
40_9_14_Baza bafika kuye abafundi bakaYohane, besithi, Kungani na ukuba sizile ukudla kaninzi, thina nabaFarisi, kanti bona abafundi bakho abakuzili?
40_9_15_Wathi uYesu kubo, Banako yini na abegumbi lomtshakazi ukukhedama, lo gama umyeni asenabo? Kodwa kuya kufika mihla awothi asuswe kubo umyeni, bandule ke ukuzila.
40_9_16_Akukho ke ubeka isiziba somchako omtsha engutyeni endala;  kuba eso sifakiweyo siyakrazula engutyeni, sibe sibi ngokunye isikroba.
40_9_17_Kanjalo ayithiwa iwayini entsha ezintsubeni ezindala;  kwenjiwe njalo, zingagqabhuka iintsuba, iphalale iwayini,  zitshabalale iintsuba; yona iwayini entsha ithiwa ezintsubeni ezintsha, zigcinakale ezo nto zombini.
40_9_18_Akubon ukuba uyazithetha ezi zinto kubo, nanko kusiza umphathi, waqubuda kuye, esithi, Intombi yam ibhubhe ngoku;  yiza ubeke isandla sakho phezu kwayo, yophila.
40_9_19_Wesuka uYesu wamlandela, kwanabafundi bakhe.
40_9_20_Nanko kusiza ntokazi ithile, eyayinethombo legazi iminyaka elishumi elinamibini; yafika ngasemva yachukumisa umqukumbelo wengubo yakhe;
40_9_21_kuba ibisithi ngaphakathi kwayo, Ukuba ndithe ndachukumisa ingubo yakhe nje kodwa, ndophiliswa.
40_9_22_Wajika uYesu, wayibona, wathi, Ntombi yam, yomelela, ukholo lwakho lukusindisile. Yasindiswa loo ntokazi kwangelo lixa.
40_9_23_Uthe akufika uYesu endlwini yomphathi, wazibona iingwali nabantu abaninzi bephithizela;
40_9_24_athi kubo, Khwelelani; kuba intombazana ayifile, ilele.  Basuka bamwa ngentsini.
40_9_25_Uthe ke bakukhutshelwa phandle abantu, wangena, wayibamba ngesandla, yaza yavuka intombazana leyo.
40_9_26_Lwaza lwaphuma udumo lwale nto, lwaya kuwo wonke loo mhlaba.
40_9_27_Kuthe ke akuba edlula apho uYesu, walandelwa ziimfama ezimbini, zidanduluka, zisithi, Senzele inceba, nyana kaDavide.
40_9_28_Zithe, akungena ke endlwini, zeza kufika kuye iimfama; athi kuzo uYesu, Niyakholwa na ukuba ndinako ukukwenza oko? Zithe kuye, Ewe, Nkosi.
40_9_29_Wandula ukuwachukumisa amehlo azo, esithi, Ngokokholo lwenu makwenzeke kuni.
40_9_30_Avuleka ke amehlo azo. Waza uYesu waziyala kalukhuni,  esithi, Lumkani ingaziwa mntu le nto.
40_9_31_Kodwa zona zaphuma, zalubhengeza udumo lwakhe kuwo wonke loo mhlaba.
40_9_32_Ke kaloku zakubon ukuba ziyaphuma, kwabonakala kuziswa kuye umntu osisidenge, ophethwe yidemon.
40_9_33_Kwathi, yakukhutshwa idemon, sathetha isidenge;  zamangaliswa izihlwele, zisithi, Akuzanga kubonwe okunje kwaSirayeli.
40_9_34_Ke bona abaFarisi babesithi, Iidemon ezi uzikhupha ngaye umphathi weedemon.
40_9_35_Waye uYesu eyihamba yonke imizi nemizana, efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, evakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani, ephilisa izifo zonke nezikhuhlane zonke ebantwini.
40_9_36_Wathi, akuzibona izihlwele, wasikwa yimfesane zizo, ngokuba zibe zityhafile, zichithakele ngokwezimvu ezingenamalusi.
40_9_37_Aze athi kubafundi bakhe, Ukuvuna okunene kuninzi, kodwa bona abasebenzi bambalwa.
40_9_38_Khungani ngoko eNkosini yokuvuna, ikhuphe abasebenzi, baye ekuvuneni kwayo.
40_10_1_Waza wababizela kuye abafundi bakhe abalishumi elinababini,  wabanika igunya koomoya abangcolileyo, ukuze babakhuphe,  nelokuphilisa izifo nezikhuhlane zonke.
40_10_2_Amagama ke abapostile abo balishumi elinababini ngawo la:  owokuqala, uSimon ekuthiwa nguPetros, noAndreya umzalwana wakhe; uYakobi kaZebhedi, noYohane umzalwana wakhe; uFilipu noBhartolomeyu;
40_10_3_uTomas noMateyu, umbuthi werhafu; uYakobi ka-Alifeyu,  noLebheyu, ogama limbi linguTadeyu;
40_10_4_uSimon umKanan noYuda Sikariyoti, lowo wamngcatshayo.
40_10_5_Abo bashumi linababini wabathuma uYesu, akuba ebayalile,  wathi, Ze ningasingi endleleni yeentlanga, ningangeni nasemzini wamaSamariya;
40_10_6_yiyani ke kanye kwizimvu ezilahlekileyo zendlu kaSirayeli.
40_10_7_Ekuhambeni kwenu ke vakalisani, nisithi, Ubukumkani bamazulu busondele.
40_10_8_Philisani imilwelwe, hlambululani abaneqhenqa, vusani abafileyo, khuphani iidemon; namkele ngesisa, yiphani ngesisa.
40_10_9_Ningaziqwebeli golide nasilivere nalubhedu emibhinqweni yenu;
40_10_10_nangxowa yandlela, nangubo zangaphantsi ngambini,  nambadada, namsimelelo; kuba umsebenzi ufanelwe kukudla kwakhe.
40_10_11_Emzini ke enithe nangena kuwo, nokuba kusemzaneni, ize nibuzise ukuba ngubani na kuwo ofanelekileyo; nihlale ke khona apho nide nimke.
40_10_12_Ekungeneni kwenu ke endlwini, ize niyibulise.
40_10_13_Ukuba ke ifanelekile indlu leyo, malube phezu kwayo uxolo lwenu; ukuba ayifanelekile, uxolo lwenu malubuyele kwakuni.
40_10_14_Nothe akawamkela, akaweva amazwi enu, nakuphuma kuloo ndlu nakuloo mzi, vuthululani uthuli lweenyawo zenu.
40_10_15_Inene ndithi kuni, Koba nokunyamezeleka okomhlaba waseSodom nowaseGomora ngomhla womgwebo, kunokwaloo mzi.
40_10_16_Yabonani, mna ndinithuma njengezimvu phakathi kweengcuka;  ngoko yibani nobulumko njengeenyoka, nibe njengamahobe ukungabi nabuqhinga.
40_10_17_Balumkeleni ke abantu; kuba baya kuninikela ezintlanganisweni zamatyala, banityakatye ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu;
40_10_18_naye ke niya kusiwa phambi kwabalawuli nookumkani ngenxa yam, ze kube bubungqina kubo, nakuzo iintlanga.
40_10_19_Xa sukuba ke beninikela, ize ningaxhaleli ukuba nothetha ngakuphi na, nokuba nothetha ntoni na; kuba niya kunikwa ngelo lixa oko nothetha khona.
40_10_20_Kuba asinini abathethayo, nguMoya kaYihlo othethayo ngaphakathi kwenu.
40_10_21_Ke kaloku umzalwana uya kunikela umzalwana ekufeni, aze uyise anikele umntwana; bathi nabantwana basuke phezu kwabazali bababulalisise;
40_10_22_niya kuthiywa ngabantu bonke ngenxa yegama lam; ke onyamezelayo kwada kwaba kwasekupheleni, uya kusindiswa yena.
40_10_23_Xa sukuba ke benitshutshisa kuloo mzi, sabelani kuwumbi;  kuba inene ndithi kuni, Aniyi kukha niyigqibe imizi yakwaSirayeli, engekafiki uNyana woMntu.
40_10_24_Akukho mfundi mkhulu kunomfundisi wakhe, akukho mkhonzi mkhulu kunenkosi yakhe.
40_10_25_Kumanele umfundi ukuba abe njengomfundisi wakhe, nomkhonzi ukuba abe njengenkosi yakhe. Ukuba umninindlu bambize ngoBhelezebhule, akukhona bobabiza ngaye yini na abo bendlu yakhe?
40_10_26_Musani ukuboyika ngoko; kuba akukho nto igutyungelweyo ingayi kutyhilwa, nefihlakeleyo ingayi kwaziwa.
40_10_27_Oko ndikuthetha kuni emnyameni, kuxeleni emhlotsheni; noko nikuvayo endlebeni, kumemezeni phezu kwezindlu.
40_10_28_Ningaboyiki abo babulala umzimba, kodwa bengenako ukuwubulala wona umphefumlo; yoyikani ke kanye lowo unako ukutshabalalisa umphefumlo kwanomzimba esihogweni somlilo.
