40_10_29_Abathengiswa ngepeni na oongqatyana ababini? Kanti akuyi kuwa namnye kubo emhlabeni ngaphandle koYihlo.
40_10_30_Nina ke, kwaneenwele ezi zentloko yenu zibaliwe zonke.
40_10_31_Musani ukoyika ngoko; nibagqithile oongqatyana abaninzi nina.
40_10_32_Wonke umntu ngoko oya kundivuma phambi kwabantu, ndiya kumvuma nam phambi koBawo osemazulwini.
40_10_33_Osukuba ke eya kundikhanyela phambi kwabantu, ndiya kumkhanyela nam phambi koBawo osemazulwini.
40_10_34_Ningabi ndize kungenisa uxolo emhlabeni; andize kungenisa luxolo, ndize kungenisa ikrele.
40_10_35_Kuba ndize kubambanisa umntu noyise, intombi nonina,  umolokazana noninazala.
40_10_36_Zaye iintshaba zomntu ziya kuba ngabendlu yakhe.
40_10_37_Lowo uthanda uyise nokuba ngunina kunam, akandifanele mna;  nalowo uthanda unyana wakhe nokuba yintombi yakhe kunam,  akandifanele mna.
40_10_38_Nongawuthabathiyo umnqamlezo wakhe, alandele emva kwam,  akandifanele mna.
40_10_39_Lowo uwufumeneyo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekwa nguwo;  nalowo uwulahlileyo umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, uya kuwufumana.
40_10_40_Lowo wamkela nina, wamkela mna; nalowo wamkela mna,  wamkela owandithumayo.
40_10_41_Lowo wamkela umprofeti egameni lomprofeti, uya kwamkela umvuzo womprofeti; nalowo wamkela ilungisa egameni lelungisa,  uya kwamkela umvuzo welungisa.
40_10_42_Nothe waseza noko amnye waba bangabona bancinane indebe yodwa yamanzi abandayo egameni lomfundi, inene ndithi kuni,  akayi kukha alahlekelwe ngumvuzo wakhe.
40_11_1_Kwathi, xeshikweni uYesu ebegqibile ukubamisela abafundi bakhe abalishumi elinababini, wesuka apho waya kufundisa nokushumayela emizini yabo.
40_11_2_Ke kaloku uYohane, eyive esentolongweni imisebenzi kaKristu, wesusa bababini kubafundi bakhe,
40_11_3_wathi kuye, Wena ungulowo uzayo na, silinde wumbi, kusini na?
40_11_4_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Hambani niye kumbikela uYohane izinto enizivayo nenizibonileyo:
40_11_5_iimfama zibuya zibone, neziqhwala ziyahamba; abaneqhenqa bayahlanjululwa, nezithulu ziyeva; abafileyo bayavuswa,  namahlwempu aya zishunyayezwa iindaba ezilungileyo.
40_11_6_Unoyolo othe akakhutyekiswa ndim.
40_11_7_Bakubon ukuba bayemka abo, waqala uYesu wathi kwizihlwele ngaye uYohane, Naye niphuma nisiya kubona ntoni na entlango?  Yabe iyingcongolo na, izanyazanyiswa ngumoya?
40_11_8_Naye niphuma nisiya kubona ntoni na kodwa? Yabe ingumntu ovethe iingubo ezitofotofo na? Yabonani, abo bambatha ezitofotofo baba sezindlwini zookumkani bona.
40_11_9_Naye niphuma nisiya kubona ntoni na kodwa? Yabe ingumprofeti na? Ewe, ndithi kuni, node wagqithisa kumprofeti.
40_11_10_Kuba lo ngulowo kubhaliweyo ngaye, kwathiwa, Yabona, mna ndiyasithuma isithunywa sam ngaphambi kobuso bakho, Esiya kuyilungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.
40_11_11_Inene ndithi kuni, Phakathi kwabo bazelweyo ngabafazi,  akuvelanga mkhulu kunoYohane umbhaptizi; kanti ke nomncinane kwabanye ebukumkanini bamazulu mkhulu kunaye.
40_11_12_Kususela ke kwimihla kaYohane umbhaptizi kude kube kalokunje, ubukumkani bamazulu buyagonyamelwa, bathi abagonyameli babuthimbe.
40_11_13_Kuba bonke abaprofeti nomthetho baprofeta kwada kwakho uYohane.
40_11_14_Kananjalo ukuba niyavuma ukukwamkela oko, yena nguEliya,  lo bekuthiwa uza kufika.
40_11_15_Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
40_11_16_Ke kaloku ndiya kusifanisa nantoni na esi sizukulwana?  Sifana namakhwenkwana ehleli ezindaweni zembutho, ekhwaza abalingane bawo,
40_11_17_esithi, Sanigwalela, naza nina anaduda; sanihlabela isililo, naza nina anambambazela.
40_11_18_Kuba uYohane weza engadli, engaseli, basuka bathi,  Unedemon.
40_11_19_UNyana woMntu yena weza esidla, esela, basuka bathi,  Khanibone umntu olidla-kudla, olisela-wayini, umhlobo wababuthi berhafu naboni. Ubulumko bugwetyelwe kokuvela ebantwaneni babo.
40_11_20_Waza waqala ukuyidubula loo mizi yayenzeke kuyo inkoliso yemisebenzi yakhe yamandla, ngokuba ingaguqukanga, esithi,
40_11_21_Yeha, wena Korazin! Yeha, wena Bhetesayida! Ngokuba imisebenzi yamandla eyenzeke kuni, ukuba yayenzeke eTire naseTsidon, inge yaguquka kudala loo mizi ngeengubo ezirhwexayo nangothuthu.
40_11_22_Ke ndithi kuni, Kuya kuba nokunyamezeleka kwiTire nakwiTsidon ngomhla womgwebo kunani.
40_11_23_Nawe Kapernahum, uphakanyiselweyo ezulwini, uya kuphoselwa phantsi kwelabafileyo; ngokuba imisebenzi yamandla eyenzeke kuwe, ukuba yayenzeke eSodom, inge ihleli kwada kwaba namhla.
40_11_24_Ke ndithi kuni, Kuya kuba nokunyamezeleka okomhlaba waseSodom ngomhla womgwebo kunawe.
40_11_25_Ngelo xesha waphendula uYesu wathi, Ndiyabulela kuwe,  Bawo, Nkosi yamazulu nehlabathi, ngokuba ezi zinto wazifihlayo kwizilumko nakwiingqondi, wazityhilela iintsana;
40_11_26_ewe, Bawo, ngokuba kwakholeka phambi kwakho ukuba kube njalo.
40_11_27_Zonke izinto zinikelwe kum nguBawo; kanjalo akukho umaziyo uNyana, kuphela nguYise; akukho umaziyo uYise, kuphela nguNyana, nalowo athi uNyana athande ukumtyhilela.
40_11_28_Yizani kum nonke nina nibulalekayo, nisindwayo ngumthwalo,  ndoninika ukuphumla.
40_11_29_Thabathani idyokhwe yam niyithwale, nifunde kum; ngokuba ndinobulali, ndithobekile ngentliziyo; noyifumanela ukuphumla imiphefumlo yenu.
40_11_30_Kuba idyokhwe yam imnandi, nomthwalo wam ulula.
40_12_1_Ngelo xesha uYesu wacanda emasimini ngesabatha; baye ke abafundi bakhe belambile, baqala ukukha izikhwebu, badla.
40_12_2_Ke kaloku abaFarisi, bakukubona oko, bathi kuye, Yabona,  abafundi bakho benza oko kungavumelekileyo ukwenziwa ngesabatha.
40_12_3_Wathi ke kubo, Aniyilesanga na into awayenzayo uDavide, xa walambayo, yena nabo babenaye;
40_12_4_okokuba wangena endlwini kaThixo, wazidla izonka ezibekwa phambi koThixo, ekube kungavumelekile ukuba azidle yena,  kwanabo babenaye, kuvumelekele ababingeleli bodwa?
40_12_5_Anilesanga na emthethweni, ukuba ngesabatha ababingeleli etempileni bayayingcolisa isabatha, bangazeki tyala noko?
40_12_6_Ndithi ke kuni, omkhulu kunayo itempile ukho apha.
40_12_7_Ukuba ke nibe nikwazile ukuba kuthini na ukuthi, Ndithanda inceba, andithandi mbingelelo, ninge ningabagwebanga abangenatyala.
40_12_8_Kuba uNyana woMntu uyiNkosi yayo nesabatha.
40_12_9_Esukile ke apho, waya kungena endlwini yabo yesikhungu.
40_12_10_Kwabonakala kukho umntu owome isandla; baza bambuza,  besithi, Kuvumelekile na ukuphilisa ngesabatha? ukuze bammangalele.
40_12_11_Wathi ke kubo, Kuni apha nguwuphi na umntu ongethi, enemvu inye, yaza yona yeyela emhadini ngesabatha, angayibambi ayirhole?
40_12_12_Ubeke phi na ke umntu ukuyigqitha imvu? Ngoko ke kuvumelekile ukwenza okulungileyo ngesabetha.
40_12_13_Aze athi kumntu lowo, Solule isandla sakho. Wasolula,  sabuya saphila ke, saba kwanjengesinye.
40_12_14_Bathi ke abaFarisi babhunga ngaye bakuphuma, ukuze bamtshabalalise.
40_12_15_Uthe ke uYesu, ekwazi oko, wemka, apho; walandelwa ngabantu abaninzi; wabaphilisa bonke.
40_12_16_Wabakhalimela ukuba bangamtyhili;
40_12_17_ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngoIsaya umprofeti, esithi,
40_12_18_Yabonani, umkhonzi wam endimnyulileyo; Intanda yam okholisiweyo yiyo umphefumlo wam; Ndiya kumbeka uMoya wam phezu kwakhe, Waye eya kuzibikela iintlanga umgwebo.
40_12_19_Akayi kuphika, akayi kunkqangaza, Akukho mntu uya kuliva izwi lakhe ezitratweni.
40_12_20_Ingcongolo etyumkileyo akayi kuyaphula, Nomsonto oqhumayo akayi kuwucima, Ade awuphumelelisele ekoyiseni umgwebo;
40_12_21_Kanjalo ziya kuthembela egameni lakhe iintlanga.
40_12_22_Kwaza kwaziswa kuye ophethwe yidemon, eyimfama,  esisidenge; wamphilisa, wada lowo uyimfama usisidenge wathetha,  wabona nokubona.
40_12_23_Zathi nqa ke zonke izihlwele, zathi, Ngunyana kaDavide kanti na lo?
40_12_24_Kodwa bona abaFarisi, bakuva, bathi, Lo yena akazikhuphi iidemon, kuphela kungoBhelezebhule, umphathi weedemon.
40_12_25_Uthe ke uYesu, ezazi iingcingane zabo, wathi kubo,  Ubukumkani bonke obahlulelene bodwa buyaphanza, nomzi wonke nendlu yonke eyahlulelene yodwa ayisayi kuma.
40_12_26_Ukuba ke uSathana ukhupha uSathana, wahlulelene yedwa;  bothini na ngoko ukuma ubukumkani bakhe?
40_12_27_Ukuba mna ndizikhupha iidemon ngoBhelezebhule, bazikhupha ngabani na onyana benu? Ngenxa yoko baya kuba ngabagwebi benu bona.
40_12_28_Kodwa ukuba ndizikhupha iidemon ngoMoya kaThixo mna, ngoko bunifikele kanti ubukumkani bukaThixo.
40_12_29_Angathini na umntu ukuba nako ukungena endlwini yegorha elo, ayiphange impahla yalo, ukuba akathanga tanci alibophe igorha, andule ke ukuyiphanga indlu yalo?
40_12_30_Lowo kum uchasene nam, nalowo ungandibuthisiyo uyachithachitha.
40_12_31_Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuni, Konke ukona nokunyelisa bokuxolelwa abantu; kodwa khona ukumnyelisa uMoya oyiNgcwele abasayi kukuxolelwa abantu.
40_12_32_Nothe wathetha ilizwi elichasene noNyana woMntu uya kuxolelwa; kodwa othe wathetha elichasene noMoya oyiNgcwele,  akasayi kuxolelwa yena, nakweli phakade, nakwelo lizayo.
40_12_33_Wenzeni mhle umthi, nesiqhama sawo sibe sihle; nithi mhlawumbi niwenze mbi umthi, nesiqhamo sawo sibe sibi; kuba umthi waziwa ngesiqhamo sawo.
40_12_34_Nzalandini yamarhamba, ningathini na ukuba nako ukuthetha izinto ezilungileyo, nikhohlakele nje? Kuba umlomo uthetha ngokuphuphuma kwentliziyo.
40_12_35_Umntu olungileyo, ebuncwaneni obulungileyo bentliziyo yakhe, ukhupha izinto ezilungileyo; nomntu okhohlakeleyo,  ebuncwaneni obukhohlakeleyo, ukhupha izinto ezikhohlakeleyo.
40_12_36_Ndithi ke kuni, Onke amazwi angewani abathe bawathetha abantu, baya kuphendula ngawo ngomhla womgwebo;
40_12_37_kuba ngawo amazwi akho uya kugwetyelwa, nangawo amazwi akho uya kugwetywa.
40_12_38_Kwaza kwaphendula abathile bakubabhali nabaFarisi,  besithi, Mfundisi, singa singabona umqondiso uvela kuwe.
40_12_39_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Isizukulwana esingendawo,  esikrexezayo, singxamele umqondiso; ke asiyi kunikwa mqondiso,  ungenguwo umqondiso kaYona umprofeti.
40_12_40_Kuba, njengokuba uYona ebemini ntathu nabusuku buthathu esiswini sentlanzi enkulu, kwangokunjalo, uNyana woMntu woba mini ntathu nabusuku buthathu embilinini womhlaba.
40_12_41_Amadoda aseNineve aya kusuka eme ngomgwebo nesi sizukulwana, asigwebe; ngokuba aguquka wona ngomemezo lukaYona;  ke omkhulu kunoYona nanku apha.
40_12_42_Ukumkanikazi welasezantsi uya kusuka eme ngomgwebo nesi sizukulwana, asigwebe; ngokuba wavela eziphelweni zomhlaba,  esiza kuva ubulumko bukaSolomon; kanti ke omkhulu kunoSolomon nanku apha.
40_12_43_Xa uthe ke waphuma umoya ongcolileyo emntwini, ucanda ezindaweni ezingenamanzi, ufuna ukuphumla, ungakufumani.
40_12_44_Uze uthi, Ndiya kubuyela kwasendlwini yam endaphuma kuyo;  uthi ke wakufika uyifumane ize, itshayelwe, ivathisiwe.
40_12_45_Wandule ke ukuya uthabathe uze nabanye oomoya, abasixhenxe abakhohlakeleyo kunawo, bangene beme khona; lize ikamva laloo mntu libe libi kunesiqaleko sakhe; kuya kuba njalo nakwesi sizukulwana singendawo.
40_12_46_Akubon ukuba usathetha neendimbane ezo, kwathi thaphu unina nabazalwana bakhe, bema ngaphandle, befuna ukuthetha naye.
40_12_47_Wathi ke othile kuye, Nanku unyoko nabazalwana bakho, bemi ngaphandle, befuna ukuthetha nawe.
40_12_48_Uphendule ke wathi kulowo ubemxelele, Ngubani na uma?  Kanjalo ngoobani na abazalwana bam?
40_12_49_Esolule isandla sakhe phezu kwabafundi bakhe, uthe, Nanku uma nabazalwana bam;
40_12_50_kuba osukuba ekwenza ukuthanda kukaBawo osemazulwini, yena lowo ngumzalwana wam, nodade wethu, noma.
40_13_1_Ke kaloku, kwangaloo mini waphuma uYesu endlwini, waya wahlala ngaselwandle.
40_13_2_Kwahlanganisana kuye abantu abaninzi, wada yena wangena emkhombeni, wahlala phantsi; zathi zonke izihlwele zema elunxwemeni.
40_13_3_Wathetha kubo iindawo ezininzi ngemizekeliso, esithi,  Yabonani, umhlwayeli waphuma waya kuhlwayela.
40_13_4_Ekuhlwayeleni kwakhe inxalenye yeenkozo yawa ngasendleleni,  zeza iintaka zayidla zayigqiba.
40_13_5_Ezinye ke zawa ezindaweni ezilulwalwa, apho bezingenamhlaba mninzi; zaphuma ke kwaoko, ngenxa yokuba bezingenabunzulu bamhlaba;
40_13_6_zathi ke lakuphuma ilanga zatsha, zaza ngenxa yokuba zingenangcambu zoma kwaphela.
40_13_7_Ezinye ke zawa emithaneni enameva, yaza imithana enameva yakhula yaziminxa.
40_13_8_Ezinye ke zawa kuwo wona umhlaba omhle, zanika iziqhamo,  olunye lwanika ikhulu, olunye amashumi amathandathu, nolunye amashumi amathathu.
40_13_9_Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
40_13_10_Beza abafundi bathi kuye, Kungani na ukuba uthethe kubo ngemizekeliso?
40_13_11_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Kungokuba nikuphiwe nina ukuzazi iimfihlelo zobukumkani bamazulu, babe ke bona bengakuphiwanga.
40_13_12_Kuba osukuba enako, yena uya kuphiwa, aze abe nako ngokugqithiseleyo; kodwa osukuba engenako, uya kuhluthwa kwanoko anako.
40_13_13_Ngenxa yoko ndithetha nabo ngemizekeliso; ngokuba bebona nje bengaboni, besiva nje bengeva, bengaqondi nokuqonda.
40_13_14_Sizalisekele kubo ke isiprofeto sikaIsaya esithi, Ukuva niya kuva, ningakhe niqonde; Nithi nibona nje nibone, ningakhe niqiqe;
40_13_15_Kuba intliziyo yaba bantu ithe fithi kukutyeba, Beva ngeendlebe ezithe nkqi, Bayawacima namehlo abo; Hleze babone ngamehlo, Beve ngeendlebe, Baqonde ngentliziyo, Bajike,  Ndibaphilise.
40_13_16_Kodwa nina, anethamsanqa amehlo enu, ngokuba ebona;  neendlebe zenu, ngokuba zisiva.
40_13_17_Kuba ndithi kuni, Inene, baninzi abaprofeti nabantu abangamalungisa, abanqwenelayo ukuzibona izinto enizibonayo abazibona; nokuziva izinto enizivayo, abaziva.
40_13_18_Nina ngoko wuveni umzekeliso womhlwayeli:
40_13_19_akubon ukuba ubani uyaliva ilizwi lobukumkani,  engaliqondi, uyafika ongendawo, akuhluthe okuhlwayelwe entliziyweni yakhe; lo nguye lowo wahlwayelwa ngasendleleni.
40_13_20_Lowo ke uhlwayelwa ezindaweni ezilulwalwa, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi, alamkele kwaoko ngovuyo;
40_13_21_abe ke engenangcambu ngaphakathi kwakhe, eme umzuzwana kodwa; uthi ke kwakuhla imbandezelo nokuba yintshutshiso ngenxa yelizwi, akhutyekiswe kwaoko.
40_13_22_Lowo ke uhlwayelwe emithaneni enameva, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi, lithi ke ixhala leli phakade, nokulukuhla kobutyebi,  kuliminxe ilizwi, lisuke lingabi nasiqhamo.
40_13_23_Lowo ke uhlwayelwe kuwo umhlaba omhle, ngulo ulivayo ilizwi aliqonde; othi yena okunene axakathe iziqhamo; omnye ke enze ikhulu, omnye amashumi amathandathu, nomnye amashumi amathathu.
40_13_24_Wababekela omnye umzekeliso, esithi, Ubukumkani bamazulu bufanekiswa nomntu owahlwayela imbewu entle entsimini yakhe.
40_13_25_Kuthe ke, xa baleleyo abantu, lwafika utshaba lwakhe,  lwahlwayela umdiza phakathi kwengqolowa, lwemka.
40_13_26_Ithe ke yakudubula, yakuba neenkozo, wandula ukubonakala nomdiza.
40_13_27_Bezile ke abakhonzi bomninindlu, bathi kuye, Nkosi,  ubungahlwayelanga imbewu entle yini na entsimini yakho? Phofu iwuzuze phi na umdiza?
40_13_28_Wathi ke kubo, Ngumntu olutshaba owenze le nto. Bathi ke abakhonzi kuye, Uyathanda na ke ukuba siye siwubuthe?
40_13_29_Uthe ke, Hayi; hleze nithi, xa niwubuthayo umdiza,  nincothule nengqolowa kunye nawo.
40_13_30_Yekani kukhule ndawonye kokubini, kude kube sekuvuneni;  ngexa ke lokuvuna ndothi kubavuni, Buthani kuqala umdiza,  niwubophe ube zizithungu, utshiswe, kodwa yona ingqolowa yihlanganiseleni kuvimba wam.
40_13_31_Wababekela omnye umzekeliso, esithi, Ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nokhozo lwemostade, awaluthabathayo umntu, waluhlwayela entsimini yakhe;
40_13_32_lona loluncinane okunene kuzo zonke iimbewu; kodwa xa luthe lwahluma, luyayidlula imifuno ngobukhulu, lube ngumthi,  ngokokude iintaka zezulu zize zihlale emasebeni awo.
40_13_33_Wathetha omnye umzekeliso kubo, esithi, Ubukumkani bamazulu bufana negwele, awalithabathayo umfazi, walifihla ezilinganisweni zozithathu zomgubo, wada wabiliswa uphela.
40_13_34_Ezi ndawo zonke uYesu wazithetha ngemizekeliso kuzo izihlwele; akathethanga kungengamzekeliso kuzo;
40_13_35_ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngomprofeti, esithi, Ndiya kuwuvula ngemizekeliso umlomo wam, Ndiya kukhupha izinto ezazifihliwe kwasekusekweni kwehlabathi.
40_13_36_Waza uYesu akuzindulula izihlwele wangena endlwini. Beza kuye abafundi bakhe, besithi, Sixelele umzekeliso womdiza wentsimi.
40_13_37_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Lo uhlwayela imbewu entle nguNyana woMntu;
40_13_38_intsimi ke lihlabathi; imbewu ke entle ngoonyana bobukumkani abo; umdiza ke ngoonyana bongendawo;
40_13_39_utshaba ke olwawuhlwayelayo wona nguMtyholi; ukuvuna ke kukupheliswa kwephakade eli; abavuni ke zizithunywa zezulu.
40_13_40_Njengokuba ngoko ubuthwa umdiza, utshiswe ngomlilo, kuya kuba njalo ekuphelisweni kweli phakade.
40_13_41_UNyana woMntu uya kuthuma izithunywa zakhe, zize zibuthe,  zikhuphe ebukumkanini bakhe, zonke izikhubekiso, nabo benza okuchasene nomthetho;
40_13_42_zibaphose ezikweni lomlilo; khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_13_43_Aya kwandula ke amalungisa ukubengezela njengelanga ebukumkanini boYise wawo. Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
40_13_44_Kanjalo ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nobutyebi obufihlwe entsimini, athe umntu akubufumana wabufihla; aze ngenxa yovuyo lwakhe aye athengise ngeento zonke anazo, ayithenge loo ntsimi.
40_13_45_Kanjalo ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nomrhwebi, efuna iiperile ezintle;
40_13_46_owathi ke akuyifumana iperile inye, exabiso likhulu, wemka waya wananisa ngeento zonke abenazo, wayithenga.
40_13_47_Kanjalo ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nomnatha, owaphoswa elwandle, wahlanganisa kwiintlobo zonke;
40_13_48_abathe wakuzala bawurholela elunxwemeni; ke bakuhlala phantsi, bazibuthela ezintle ezityeni, bazilahla ke ezimbi.
40_13_49_Kuya kuba njalo ekuphelisweni kwephakade eli: ziya kuphuma izithunywa zezulu, zibakhethe abangendawo phakathi kwamalungisa,
40_13_50_zibaphose ezikweni lomlilo; khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_13_51_Athi kubo uYesu, Niziqondile na zonke ezi ndawo? Bathi kuye, Ewe, Nkosi.
40_13_52_wathi ke kubo, Ngenxa yoko, umbhali wonke ofundiselwe ebukumkanini bamazulu ufa na nomntu ongumninindlu, orhola ebuncwaneni bakhe izinto ezintsha kwanezindala.
40_13_53_Kwathi, akuyigqiba uYesu le mizekeliso, wanduluka khona apho.
40_13_54_Akufika kwelakowabo, wabafundisa endlwini yabo yesikhungu,  ngokokude bakhwankqiswe bathi, Lo ubuzuze phi na obu bulumko,  nale misebenzi yamandla?
40_13_55_Lo asinguye na unyana wengcibi yokwakha? Unina akuthiwa na nguMariya? Nabazalwana bakhe asingooYakobi, noYose, noSimon,  noYuda, yini na?
40_13_56_Noodade bakhe abakuthi apha bonke na? Uzizuze phi na phofu lo zonke ezi zinto?
40_13_57_Baye bekhubeka kuye. Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Umprofeti akaswele mbeko, kungekhona kowabo, nakokwabo.
40_13_58_Akenza misebenzi mininzi yamandla khona apho, ngenxa yokungakholwa kwabo.
40_14_1_Ngelo xesha uHerode, umphathi wesahlulo sesine selizwe,  waluva udaba lukaYesu,
40_14_2_wathi kubakhonzi bakhe, Lo nguYohane umbhaptizi. Yena uvukile kwabafileyo; ngenxa yoko le misebenzi yamandla iyasebenza kuye.
40_14_3_Kuba uHerode wambamba uYohane, wambopha, wamfaka entolongweni ngenxa kaHerodiya, umfazi kaFilipu, umninawa wakhe.
40_14_4_Kuba wayethe uYohane kuye, Akuvumelekile ukuba ube naye.
40_14_5_Wathi efuna ukumbulala, woyika abantu; ngokuba babebambe ukuthi ungumprofeti.
40_14_6_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba kwenziwa isikhumbuzo sokuzalwa kukaHerode, yathi intombi kaHerodiya yangqungqa esazulwini,  yamkholisa uHerode.
40_14_7_Ekuthe ke koko wayithembisa ngesifungo ukuba woyinika oko ingakucelayo.
40_14_8_Ke yona, iqhutywe ngunina, yathi, Ndinike apha ngesitya intloko kaYohane umbhaptizi.
40_14_9_Wesuka ukumkani waba buhlungu; ke, ngenxa yezifungo ezo nangenxa yabo babehleli ngasesithebeni naye, watsho ukuthi mayiyinikwe.
40_14_10_Wasusa umntu, wamnqumla uYohane intloko entolongweni apho.
40_14_11_Yaziswa intloko yakhe ngesitya, yanikwa intombazana leyo,  yathi yona yayisa kunina.
40_14_12_Bafika abafundi bakhe, basithabatha isidumbu, basingcwaba;  baya babikela uYesu.
40_14_13_Evile ke uYesu, wemka apho ngomkhombe, waya endaweni eyintlango eyedwa. Zivile ke izihlwele, zamlandela ngeenyawo,  zivela emizini.
40_14_14_Ephumile ke uYesu, wabona into eninzi yabantu, wasikwa yimfesane ngabo, wayiphilisa imilwelwe yabo.
40_14_15_Kuthe ke kwakuhlwa, beza kuye abafundi bakhe, besithi, Le ndawo iyintlango, kanjalo ilixa lise lidlule; zindulule izihlwele, zimke ziye emizaneni, zizithengele ukudla.
40_14_16_Uthe ke kubo uYesu, Akufuneki ukuba zimke; zipheni nina zitye.
40_14_17_Bathi ke bona kuye, Asinanto apha, ingezizo izonka ezihlanu neentlanzi ezimbini.
40_14_18_Wathi ke yena, Ziziseni kum apha.
40_14_19_Wathi izihlwele mazingqengqe phantsi engceni; wazithabatha izonka zozihlanu neentlanzi zombini, wathi, ekhangele ezulwini,  wasikelela; waqhekeza, wazinika abafundi izonka ezo; ke abafundi banika izihlwele.
40_14_20_Badla bonke bahlutha; basusa amaqhekeza aseleyo, zalishumi elinazibini izitya zizele.
40_14_21_Ke kaloku abo babesidla babengamadoda akumawaka amahlanu,  ngaphandle kwabafazi nabantwana.
40_14_22_Waza uYesu wabanyanzela kwaoko abafundi bakhe ukuba bangene emkhombeni, bamandulele baye phesheya, lo gama azindululayo izihlwele yena.
40_14_23_Ezindulule ke izihlwele, wenyuka intaba ngasese, ukuba athandaze. Kwahlwa ke ekhona apho yedwa.
40_14_24_Ke kaloku umkhombe ubuseluphakathi kolwandle, untsilwa ngamaza; kuba umoya ubuvela ngaphambili.
40_14_25_Kuthe ke ngowesine umlindo wobusuku, wesuka waya kubo uYesu, ehamba phezu kolwandle.
40_14_26_Bathe bakumbona abafundi ehamba phezu kolwandle,  bakhathazeka, besithi, Ngumshologu; bakhaliswa kukoyika.
40_14_27_Wathetha ke kwaoko uYesu kubo, esithi, Yomelelani; ndim,  musani ukoyika.
40_14_28_UPetros wamphendula ke wathi, Nkosi, ukuba nguwe, yitsho ndize kuwe ndihamba phezu kwamanzi.
40_14_29_Wathi ke yena, Yiza. Ehlile uPetros emkhombeni, wahamba phezu kwamanzi, esiya kuYesu.
40_14_30_Ke kaloku, ebona umoya unamandla, woyika; waza eqala ukutshona wakhala, esithi, Nkosi, ndisindise.
40_14_31_Wasolula kwaoko ke isandla uYesu, wambamba, wathi kuye,  Ehla wena ulukholo luncinane, uthandabuzelani na?
40_14_32_Bakungena emkhombeni, wadamba umoya.
40_14_33_Bazile ke abo basemkhombeni, baqubuda kuye, besithi,  Inyaniso, unguNyana kaThixo.
40_14_34_Bakuwela, bafika emhlabeni waseGenesarete.
40_14_35_Emazile amadoda aloo ndawo, athumela kuwo wonke loo mmandla.
40_14_36_Bazisa kuye bonke abafayo, bambongoza ukuba bachukumise nje kodwa intshinga yengubo yakhe; baza bonke abayichukumisayo baphiliswa kanye.
40_15_1_Bafike oko kuYesu abaseYerusalem ababhali nabaFarisi,  besithi,
40_15_2_Kungani na ukuba abafundi bakho basigqithe isithethe samanyange? Kuba abazihlambi izandla zabo, xa badla isonka.
40_15_3_Waphendula ke yena wathi kubo, Nani, kungani na ukuba niwugqithe umthetho kaThixo ngenxa yesithethe senu?
40_15_4_Kuba uThixo wawisa umthetho, esithi, Mbeke uyihlo nonyoko;  wathi kanjalo, Omthethela okubi uyise nokuba ingunina, makafe ukufa.
40_15_5_Ke nina nithi, Othe kuyise nokuba kukunina, Iselingumnikelo kuThixo, into onge uba uncedwa ngayo ndim, ukholisile: akasayi kuba sambeka uyise nokuba ngunina.
40_15_6_Niwuphangile ke igunya umthetho kaThixo ngenxa yesithethe senu.
40_15_7_Bahanahanisindini, watyapha ukuprofeta ngani uIsaya,  esithi,
40_15_8_Aba bantu basondela kum ngomlomo wabo, Bandibeke ngemilebe yomlomo wabo; Kanti intliziyo yabo ikude lee kum;
40_15_9_Bafumana ke bendihlonela, Befundisa iimfundiso eziyimithetho yabantu.
40_15_10_Wayibizela kuye indimbane, wathi kubo, Phulaphulani,  niqonde.
40_15_11_Asikokungena emlonyeni okumenza inqambi umntu; ke okuphuma emlonyeni, kuko oko okumenza inqambi umntu.
40_15_12_Beza abafundi bakhe bathi kuye, Uyazi na ukuba abaFarisi bathe bakuliva elo zwi bakhubeka?
40_15_13_Waphendula ke wathi, Zonke izityalo ezingatyalwanga nguBawo wasemazulwini ziya kuncothulwa.
40_15_14_Bayekeni; ngabakhokeli beemfama abakwaziimfama; ke kaloku,  xa sukuba imfama ikhokela imfama, zombini ziya kweyela emhadini.
40_15_15_Waphendula ke uPetros wathi kuye, Sixelele lo mzekeliso.
40_15_16_Wathi ke yena uYesu, Anikabi nakuqonda na nani nangoku?
40_15_17_Anikaqiqi na, ukuba konke okungena emlonyeni kusinga esiswini, ize kulahlelwe endaweni esese?
40_15_18_Ke zona izinto eziphuma emlonyeni, ziphuma kuyo intliziyo;  zizo ezo ezimenza inqambi umntu.
40_15_19_Kuba kuyo intliziyo kuphuma izicamango ezingendawo,  ookubulala, ookukrexeza, oomibulo, oobusela, ookungqina ubuxoki, ookunyelisa.
40_15_20_Zizo ezo izinto ezimenza inqambi umntu; kodwa kona ukudla ngezandla ezingahlanjwanga akumenzi nqambi umntu.
40_15_21_Ephumile khona apho, uYesu wasinga kwimida yaseTire neTsidon.
40_15_22_Kwathi thu umKananekazi evela kuloo mida, ekhala esithi,  Ndenzele inceba, Nkosi, nyana kaDavide; intombi yam iphethwe yidemon kakubi. Akamphendula ke nelizwi eli.
40_15_23_Beza abafundi bakhe, bamcela besithi, Mndulule, ngokuba usilandela ekhala.
40_15_24_Waphendula ke yena wathi, Ndithunywe kwizimvu ezilahlekileyo zendlu kaSirayeli zodwa.
40_15_25_Weza ke waqubuda kuye, esithi, Nkosi, ndisize.
40_15_26_Uphendule ke wathi, Asinto intle ukusithabatha isonka sabantwana, siphoswe ezinjaneni.
40_15_27_Wathi ke yena, Ewe, Nkosi; kuba neenjana zidla kwiimvuthuluka eziwa etafileni yabaninizo.
40_15_28_Waza ke waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Mfazi, lukhulu ukholo lwakho; makwenzeke kuwe njengokuthanda kwakho. Yaphiliswa intombi yakhe kwangelo lixa.
40_15_29_Esukile apho, uYesu weza ngaselwandle lwaseGalili, wenyuka intaba, wahlala phantsi khona.
40_15_30_Kweza kuye izihlwele ezininzi, zinazo iziqhwala, iimfama,  izidenge, izilima, nabanye abaninzi, zababeka phantsi ezinyaweni zikaYesu; wabaphilisa;
40_15_31_zada zamangaliswa izihlwele ezo, zakubona izidenge zithetha, izilima ziphilile, iziqhwala zihamba, neemfama zibona; zamzukisa uThixo kaSirayeli.
40_15_32_Ebabizele ke kuye uYesu abafundi bakhe, wathi, Ndisikwa yimfesane ngenxa yezihlwele, ngokuba sekuntsuku ntathu behleli nam, bengenanto bangayidlayo; ukuthi ke ndibandulule bengadlanga andikuthandi, hleze batyhafe endleleni.
40_15_33_Bathi kuye abafundi bakhe, Sozizuza phi na entlango apha izonka ezingade zihluthise izihlwele ezingakanana?
40_15_34_Athi kubo uYesu, Zingaphi na izonka eninazo? Bathi ke bona, Zisixhenxe, neentlanzana ezimbalwa.
40_15_35_Wathi kwizihlwele mazihlale phantsi emhlabeni.
40_15_36_Wazithabatha ke izonka zosixhenxe neentlanzi, wabulela,  waqhekeza, wanika abafundi bakhe, abafundi ke banika izihlwele.
40_15_37_Badla bonke bahlutha; basusa amaqhekeza aseleyo, iingobozi zasixhenxe zizele.
40_15_38_Ke kaloku abo babesidla babengamawaka amane amadoda,  ngaphandle kwabafazi nabantwana.
40_15_39_Ezindulule izihlwele, wangena emkhombeni, weza emacaleni aseMagadala.
40_16_1_Baza bafika abaFarisi nabaSadusi, bathi, bemlinga, bacela ukuba ababonise umqondiso ophuma emazulwini.
40_16_2_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Ngokuhlwa nithi, Liya kusa; kuba izulu limlilo ukuba bomvu.
40_16_3_Kanjalo kusasa nithi, Namhla luqhwithela; kuba izulu limlilo ukuba bomvu, lisibekele. Bahanahanisindini, nikwazi nje ukubucalula ubuso bezulu, ke yona imiqondiso yamaxesha aninako na ukuyicalula?
40_16_4_Isizukulwana esingendawo, esikrexezayo, singxamele umqondiso; kanti asiyi kunikwa mqondiso, ingenguwo umqondiso kaYona umprofeti. Wabashiya wemka.
40_16_5_Bakufika ke abafundi bakhe ngaphesheya, bathi kanti bakulibele ukuphatha izonka.
40_16_6_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Ligqaleni nililumkele igwele labaFarisi nabaSadusi.
40_16_7_Baye ke bona becamanga phakathi kwabo, besithi, Utsho ngokuba singaphathanga zonka.
40_16_8_Ekwazi ke oko uYesu, wathi kubo, Ehlani, nina balukholo luncinane! Yini na ukuba nicamange phakathi kwenu, ngokuba ningaphathanga zonka?
40_16_9_Anikaqiqi na, anizikhumbuli na izonka ezihlanu zamawaka amahlanu, nokuba zazingaphi na izitya enazithabathayo?
40_16_10_Kwanezonka ezisixhenxe zamawaka amane, nokuba zazingaphi na iingobozi enazithabathayo?
40_16_11_Yini na le nto ningaqiqiyo, ukuba bendingatsho ngasonka,  ukuthi kuni, manililumkele igwele labaFarisi nabaSadusi?
40_16_12_Bandula ukuqonda, ukuba ubengatsho ukuthi mabalumkele igwele lesonka; ubesithi mabalumkele imfundiso yabaFarisi nabaSadusi.
40_16_13_Akufika uYesu emacaleni aseKesareya yakwaFilipu, wababuza abafundi bakhe, esithi, Bathi abantu ndingubani na mna, Nyana woMntu?
40_16_14_Bathi ke bona, Inxenye ithi, unguYohane umbhaptizi; abanye bathi, UnguEliya; bambi bathi, UnguYeremiya, mhlawumbi ungomnye wakubaprofeti.
40_16_15_Athi kubo, Ke nina nithi ndingubani na?
40_16_16_Waphendula ke uSimon Petros wathi, Wena unguye uKristu,  unyana kaThixo ophilileyo.
40_16_17_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Unoyolo, Simon kaYona,  ngokuba akukutyhilelwanga oku yinyama negazi, ukutyhilelwe nguBawo osemazulwini.
40_16_18_Nam ke, ndithi kuwe, UnguPetros wena; ndiya kulakhela phezu kolu lwalwa ibandla lam, namasango elabafileyo akayi kuloyisa.
40_16_19_Ndiya kukunika izitshixo zobukumkani bamazulu; kuthi ke othe wakubopha emhlabeni, kubopheke emazulwini; kuthi othe wakukhulula emhlabeni, kukhululeke emazulwini.
40_16_20_Wabayala abafundi bakhe, ukuba bangaxeleli bani ukuba yena unguYesu uKristu.
40_16_21_Waqalela kwelo xa uYesu ukubabonisa abafundi bakhe,  okokuba umelwe kukuba aye eYerusalem, eve ubunzima obukhulu kuwo amadoda amakhulu nababingeleli abakhulu, nababhali,  abulawe, athi ngomhla wesithathu avuke.
40_16_22_Wathi uPetros emthabathele kuye, waqala ukumkhalimela,  esithi, Makube camagu kuwe Nkosi; oko akuyi kukha kubekho kuwe.
40_16_23_Wajika ke wathi kuPetros, Suka uye emva kwam, Sathana,  usisikhubekiso kum; ngokuba ungazinyamekeli ezikaThixo izinto,  unyamekela ezabantu.
40_16_24_Wandula wathi uYesu kubafundi bakhe, Ukuba kukho othanda ukundilandela, makazincame ngokwakhe, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele.
40_16_25_Kuba othe wathanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe,  wolahlekelwa nguwo; ke othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, wowufumana.
40_16_26_Kuba, kumnceda ntoni na umntu, ukuba uthe wazuza ihlabathi liphela, waza wonakalelwa ke ngumphefumlo wakhe? Okanye worhola ntoni na umntu, ibe sisananelo somphefumlo wakhe?
40_16_27_Kuba uNyana woMntu uza kuza esebuqaqawulini boYise,  enezithunywa zakhe, andule ukubavuza bonke ngabanye ngokokwenza kwabo.
40_16_28_Inene, ndithi kuni, Kwabemiyo apha kukho abangayi kukha beve kufa, bade bambone uNyana woMntu esiza, esebukumkanini bakhe.
40_17_1_Uthi uYesu emveni kweentsuku ezintandathu, athabathe uPetros, noYakobi, noYohane umzalwana wakhe, abanyuse baye entabeni ephakamileyo bebodwa.
40_17_2_Wenziwa waba kumila kumbi phambi kwabo, bathi ubuso bakhe bakhazimla njengelanga, zasuka ke iingubo zakhe zamhlophe njengokukhanya.
40_17_3_Nanko kubonakala kubo uMoses noEliya, bethetha naye.
40_17_4_Waphendula ke uPetros, wathi kuYesu, Nkosi, kulungile ukuba sibe lapha; ukuba uyathanda, masenze apha iminquba ibe mithathu, omnye ube ngowakho, omnye ube ngokaMoses, omnye ube ngokaEliya.
40_17_5_Kuthe esathetha, kwathi gqi ilifu elikhanyayo, labenzela ithinzi; nalo izwi liphuma efini apho, lisithi, Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye; mveni yena.
40_17_6_Bathi abafundi, bakukuva oko, bawa ngobuso babo, boyika kakhulu.
40_17_7_Akufika uYesu wabachukumisa, wathi, Vukani ningoyiki.
40_17_8_Bathe ke bakuphakamisa amehlo abo, ababona mntu, yanguYesu yedwa.
40_17_9_Bakubon ukuba bayehla entabeni apho, wabawisela umthetho uYesu esithi, Ize ningawuxeleli bani umbono lo, ade avuke kwabafileyo uNyana woMntu.
40_17_10_Bambuza abafundi bakhe, besithi, Yini na phofu ukuba ababhali bathi, uEliya umelwe kukufika tanci?
40_17_11_Uphendule ke uYesu, wathi kubo, Okunene kufika uEliya tanci, abuye azimise zonke izinto.
40_17_12_Ke ndithi kuni, uEliya uselefikile. Abamazanga, basuka benza kuye konke abakuthandayo; kwangokunjalo uNyana woMntu uza kuva ubunzima ngabo.
40_17_13_Bandula ukuqonda abafundi ukuba ubethetha kubo ngaye uYohane umbhaptizi.
40_17_14_Bakubon ukuba bafikile esihlweleni, kweza kuye umntu,  esiwa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, esithi,
40_17_15_Nkosi, menzele inceba unyana wam; ngokuba unesathuthwane,  esiva ubunzima obukhulu; kuba esiwa futhi emlilweni,  nasemanzini futhi.
40_17_16_Ndithe ndamzisa kubafundi bakho, ababa nako ukumphilisa.
40_17_17_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi, Sizukulwanandini singakholwayo,  sigwenxa, koda kube nini na ndinani? Koda kube nini na ndininyamezele? Mziseni kum apha.
40_17_18_Waza uYesu wayikhalimela, yaphuma kuye idemon; waphiliswa umntwana kwangelo lixa.
40_17_19_Bandula beza abafundi kuYesu bebodwa, bathi, Bekungani na ukuba singabi nako ukuyikhupha thina?
40_17_20_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Bekungenxa yokungakholwa kwenu; kuba inene ndithi kuni, Beningathi, ninokholo olunjengokhozo lwemostade, nithi kule ntaba, Suka apha uye phaya, isuke,  kungabikho nto iya kuninqabela.
40_17_21_Olu ke lona uhlobo aluphumi, kungengako ukuthandaza nokuzila ukudla.
40_17_22_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bahleli kwelaseGalili, wathi uYesu kubo, UNyana woMntu uza kunikelwa ezandleni zabantu;
40_17_23_baya kumbulala, athi ngomhla wesithathu avuke. Baba buhlungu kakhulu.
40_17_24_Ke, bakubon ukuba bafikile eKapernahum, kweza kuPetros abo bamkela imali yetempile, bathi, Umfundisi wenu akayirholi na imali yetempile?
40_17_25_Athi, Ewe, uyayirhola. Akungena endlwini, uYesu wamphangela, esithi, Uthini na wena, Simon? Ookumkani behlabathi bamkela kubaphi na irhafu nomnikelo? koonyana babo,  kwabasemzini, kusini na?
40_17_26_Athi uPetros kuye, Kwabasemzini. Wathi uYesu kuye,  Bakhululekile ngoko ke bona oonyana.
40_17_27_Kodwa ukuze singabakhubekisi, hamba uye elwandle, uphose umlobothi wakho, uthabathe loo ntlanzi ithe yavela tanci. Wothi wakuwunqika umlomo wayo, ufumane ishekele; thabatha yona leyo ubanike, usenzelelela mna nawe.
40_18_1_Ngelo lixa beza abafundi kuYesu, besithi, Ngubani na ke omkhulu kunabanye, ebukumkanini bamazulu?
40_18_2_UYesu wabizela kuye umntwana, wammisa phakathi kwabo.
40_18_3_Wathi, Inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niguquke, nibe njengabantwana aba, aniyi kukha ningene ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_18_4_Osukuba ngoko ethe wazithoba njengalo mntwana nguye omkhulu kunabanye ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_18_5_Kanjalo othe wamkela umntwana onje, noko amnye, egameni lam, wamkela mna.
40_18_6_Ke othe wakhubekisa noko amnye waba bancinane bakholwayo kum, ebelungelwe kanye kukuba anxitywe ilitye lokusila entanyeni, antywiliselwe enzulwini yolwandle.
40_18_7_Yeha ihlabathi ngezikhubekiso! kuba azinakuba zingezi izikhubekiso; kodwa yeha loo mntu siza ngaye isikhubekiso!
40_18_8_Ukuba ke isandla sakho, nokuba lunyawo lwakho, luya kukhubekisa, lunqamle, ululahle: kukulungele ukuba ungene ebomini usisiqhwala, mhlawumbi usisilima, kunokuba uthi,  unezandla ezibini, mhlawumbi uneenyawo ezimbini, uphoswe emlilweni ongunaphakade.
40_18_9_Nokuba iliso lakho liya kukhubekisa, lincothule, ulilahle;  kukulungele ukuba ungene ebomini unaliso linye, kunokuba uthi,  unamehlo amabini, uphoswe esihogweni somlilo.
40_18_10_Lumkani, ningadeli namnye waba bancinane; kuba ndithi kuni, Izithunywa zabo emazulwini zihlala zibubona ubuso bukaBawo osemazulwini.
40_18_11_Kuba uNyana woMntu weza kusindisa oko kulahlekileyo.
40_18_12_Nithini na nina? Ukuba umntu uthe wanekhulu lezimvu, ize kulahleke enye kuzo, akazishiyi na ezimashumi asithoba anesithoba ezintabeni, aye afune leyo ilahlekileyo?
40_18_13_Ukuba uthe wayifumana, inene ndithi kuni, uyayivuyela leyo ngaphezu kokuvuyela ezo zimashumi asithoba anesithoba,  zingalahlekanga.
40_18_14_Kwangokunjalo asikukuthanda kukaYihlo osemazulwini, ukuba kulahleke namnye waba bancinane.
40_18_15_Ukuba ke umzalwana wakho uthe wakona, yiya umohlwaye inguwe naye ninedwa; ukuba uthe wakuva, woba umzuzile umzalwana wakho.
40_18_16_Ke ukuba uthe akeva buya uthabathe nawe abe mnye nokuba babini, ukuze onke amazwi amiswe ngomlomo wamangqina amabini,  nokuba ngamathathu.
40_18_17_Ukuba ke uthe akabeva, xelela ibandla; ukuba ke uthe akaliva nebandla, kuwe makabe njengoweentlanga nombuthi werhafu.
40_18_18_Inene, ndithi kuni, Konke enithe nakubopha emhlabeni,  kobotshwa emazulwini; nako konke enithe nakukhulula emhlabeni,  kokhululwa emazulwini.
40_18_19_Kanjalo ndithi kuni, Ukuba ababini kuni bathe bavumelana emhlabeni apha ngeendawo zonke abangazicelayo, bozenzelwa nguBawo osemazulwini.
40_18_20_Kuba apho bahlanganisene khona egameni lam, nokuba babini nokuba bathathu, ndikho mna apho phakathi kwabo.
40_18_21_Kwandula kweza uPetros kuye wathi, Nkosi, koba futhi kangaphi na umzalwana wam endona, ndimxolela? Koda kube kasixhenxe na?
40_18_22_Athi uYesu kuye, Andithi kuwe, koda kube kasixhenxe;  ndithi, koda kube kamashumi asixhenxe aphindiweyo kasixhenxe.
40_18_23_Ngenxa yoko ubukumkani bamazulu bufanekiswa nomntu ongukumkani, owafuna ukubalelana nabakhonzi bakhe.
40_18_24_Kuthe ke akuqala ukubalelana nabo, kwaziswa kuye omnye onetyala leetalente ezingamawaka alishumi.
40_18_25_Kuthe ke ekubeni engenanto yakuhlawula, yathi inkosi yakhe, makuthengiswe ngaye, nangomfazi wakhe, nangabantwana bakhe, nangeento zonke anazo, kuhlawulwe.
40_18_26_Wawa phantsi ngoko umkhonzi lowo, waqubuda kuyo, esithi,  Nkosi, khawundenze kuhle, ndokuhlawula lonke.
40_18_27_Yasikwa ke yimfesane inkosi yaloo mkhonzi, yamkhulula,  yamxolela ityala elo.
40_18_28_Uphumile ke loo mkhonzi, wafumanana nomnye wabakhonza kunye naye obenetyala kuye leedenariyo ezilikhulu; wambamba,  wamkrwitsha, esithi, Ndihlawule ityala onalo.
40_18_29_Wawa phantsi ngoko ezinyaweni zakhe lo ubekhonza kunye naye, wamana embongoza, esithi, Khawundenze kuhle, ndokuhlawula lonke.
40_18_30_Akavumanga ke; waya wamphosa entolongweni, ade alihlawule ityala elo.
40_18_31_Bathi ke abo babekhonza kunye naye, bakubona oko kwenzekileyo, baba buhlungu kakhulu, beza bayityela inkosi yabo konke oko kwenzekileyo.
40_18_32_Yaza inkosi yakhe, imbizele kuyo, yathi kuye, Mkhonzindini ungendawo, ndakuxolela lonke elaa tyala, ekubeni wandibongo zayo;
40_18_33_ubungamelwe na kukuba ube nenceba nawe kokhonza kunye nawe, njengokuba nam bendinenceba kuwe?
40_18_34_Yaqumba inkosi yakhe, yamnikela kubathuthumbisi, ade alihlawule lonke ityala lakhe kuyo.
40_18_35_Wothi noBawo wasemazulwini enjenjalo kuni, ukuba anithanga nonke ngabanye nabaxolela abazalwana benu iziphoso zabo ngeentliziyo zenu.
40_19_1_Kwathi, xeshikweni uYesu ebewagqibile la mazwi, wanduluka kwelaseGalili, weza emideni yelakwaYuda, phesheya kweYordan.
40_19_2_Zamlandela izihlwele ezininzi, waziphilisa apho.
40_19_3_Kweza kuye abaFarisi bemlinga, besithi kuye, Kuvumelekile na ukuba umntu amale umfazi wakhe nangasiphi na isizathu?
40_19_4_Uphendule ke wathi kubo, Anilesanga na ukuba owadalayo kwasekuqalekeni wabadala bayindoda nenkazana,
40_19_5_wathi, Ngenxa yoko umntu womshiya uyise nonina, anamathele emfazini wakhe, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye?
40_19_6_Ngako oko abasebabini, banyama-nye; oko ke ngoko uThixo akumanyileyo, makungahlulwa mntu.
40_19_7_Bathi kuye, Phofu ibiyini na ukuba uMoses awise umthetho wokuthi, makamnike incwadi yokwahlukana, amale?
40_19_8_Athi kubo, UMoses ngenxa yobulukhuni beentliziyo zenu wanivumela ukuba nibale abafazi benu; ke ekuqalekeni bekungenjalo.
40_19_9_Ndithi ke kuni, Othe wamala umfazi wakhe,  kungengaluhenyuzo, wazeka omnye, uyakrexeza; nalowo uzeka owaliweyo uyakrexeza.
40_19_10_Bathi kuye abafundi bakhe, Ukuba unjalo umcimbi womntu nomfazi, akulungile ukuzeka.
40_19_11_Wathi ke yena kubo, Asibantu bonke abaliqondayo elo lizwi;  ngabo banikiweyo bodwa.
40_19_12_Kuba kukho amathenwa azelwe enjalo kwasesizalweni sonina;  kukho namathenwa athenwa ngabantu; kukho namathenwa azithenileyo ngenxa yobukumkani bamazulu. Lowo unokukuqonda oku makakuqonde.
40_19_13_Kwaza kwaziswa kuye abantwana, ukuze abeke izandla phezu kwabo, athandaze; basuka abafundi babakhalimela.
40_19_14_Wathi ke uYesu, Bayekeni abantwana, ningabaleli ukuza kum;  kuba ubukumkani bamazulu bobabo banjalo.
40_19_15_Wazibeka izandla phezu kwabo, wemka apho.
40_19_16_Kwabonakala kusiza othile, wathi kuye, Mfundisi ulungileyo, yiyiphi na into elungileyo endingenza yona, ukuze ndibe nabo ubomi?
40_19_17_Uthe ke kuye, Yini na ukuba uthi ndilungile? Akukho ulungileyo, mnye kwaphela, nguThixo. Ukuba ke uthanda ukungena ebomini, yigcine imithetho.
40_19_18_Athi kuye, Yiphi na? Wathi ke uYesu, Yona le: uze ungabulali, uze ungakrexezi, uze ungebi, uze ungangqini buxoki,
40_19_19_beka uyihlo nonyoko; nawo lo: uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako.
40_19_20_Ithi kuye indodana leyo, Zonke ezo zinto ndazigcina kwasebuncinaneni bam; ndisaswele ntoni na?
40_19_21_Wathi uYesu kuyo, Ukuba unga ungafezeka, hamba uye kuthengisa ngeempahla zakho, uphe amahlwempu, woba nobutyebi emazulwini; uze ke undilandele.
40_19_22_Ilivile ke indodana ilizwi elo, yemka ibuhlungu; kuba ibinemfuyo eninzi.
40_19_23_Wathi ke uYesu kubafundi bakhe, Inene, ndithi kuni, Koba ngenkankulu ukuba isityebi singene ebukumkanini bamazulu.
40_19_24_Kananjalo ke ndithi kuni, Kulula ukuba inkamela iphumele entunjeni yenaliti, kunokuba isityebi singene ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
40_19_25_Bakuva ke abafundi bakhe, bakhwankqiswa kakhulu, besithi,  Ngubani na ke ongasindiswayo?
40_19_26_Ondele ke uYesu, wathi kubo, Kubantu le nto ayinakwenzeka;  ke kuye uThixo zonke izinto zinako ukwenzeka.
40_19_27_Waphendula uPetros wathi kuye, Uyabona, thina sishiye iinto zonke sakulandela; siya kuba nantoni na ke?
40_19_28_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Inene, ndithi kuni, Nina nindilandeleyo, ekuzalweni okutsha, xa athe wahlala uNyana woMntu phezu kwetrone yozuko lwakhe, niya kuhlala nani phezu kweetrone ezilishumi elinambini, nigweba ezizweni ezilishumi elinazibini zakwaSirayeli.
40_19_29_Umntu wonke oshiye izindlu, nokuba ngabazalwana, nokuba ngoodade, nokuba nguyise, nokuba ngunina, nokuba ngumfazi,  nokuba ngabantwana, nokuba ngamasimi, ngenxa yegama lam, uya kwamkela kalikhulu, abudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade.
40_19_30_Ke baninzi abokuqala abaya kuba ngabokugqibela,  nabokugqibela abaya kuba ngabokuqala.
40_20_1_Kuba ubukumkani bamazulu bufana nomntu ongumninindlu,  owaphuma ekuseni, waya kuqesha abasebenzi bokuya esidiliyeni sakhe.
40_20_2_Akuvumelana nabasebenzi ngedenariyo ngemini, wabathuma esidiliyeni sakhe.
40_20_3_Ephume malunga nelixa lesithathu wabona abanye bemi endaweni yembutho bengasebenzi.
40_20_4_Wathi nakwabo, Hambani nani niye esidiliyeni, ndoninika okusukuba kufanelekile. Bahamba ke baya.
40_20_5_Wabuya waphuma malunga nelixa lesithandathu nelesithoba,  wenza kwangokunjalo.
40_20_6_Ephumile ke malunga nelixa leshumi elinanye, wafumana abanye bemi bengasebenzi; athi kubo, Yini na ukuba nime apha imini iphela ningasebenzi?
40_20_7_Bathi kuye, Akukho bani usiqeshileyo. Athi kubo, Hambani nani niye esidiliyeni; niya kwamkela okusukuba kufanelekile.
40_20_8_Kwakuhlwa, uthi umninisidiliya egoseni lakhe, Babize abasebenzi, ubamkelise, uqala kwabokugqibela ude uye kwabokuqala.
40_20_9_Bezile abo bebeqeshwe malunga nelixa leshumi elinanye,  bamkela elowo idenariyo.
40_20_10_Ke kaloku bakuza abokuqala, baba baya kwamkela into engaphezulu; nabo bamkela elowo idenariyo.
40_20_11_Beyamkele ke, bamrokrela umninindlu,
40_20_12_besithi, Aba bokugqibela basebenze ilixa lalinye, usuke wabalinganisa nathi, thina sithwele ubunzima nobushushu bemini.
40_20_13_Waphendula ke yena wathi komnye wabo, Wethu, andikoni;  ubungavumelananga nam ngedenariyo yini na?
40_20_14_Thabatha okwakho uhambe; ndithanda ukumnika lowo wokugqibela kwanjengoko ndikunike ngako.
40_20_15_Akuvumelekile na ukuba ndenze endikuthandayo ngokukokwam?  Iliso lakho likhohlakele na, ngokuba ndilungile mna?
40_20_16_Ngokunjalo abokugqibela baya kuba ngabokuqala, nabokuqala,  baya kuba ngabokugqibela; kuba baninzi ababiziweyo, ke bambalwa abanyuliweyo.
40_20_17_Ke kaloku enyuka uYesu esiya eYerusalem, wabathabatha abafundi abalishumi elinababini babodwa endleleni, wathi kubo,
40_20_18_Niyabona, siyenyuka siya eYerusalem, waye uNyana woMntu eya kunikelwa kubo ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali. Baya kumgweba ukuba afe,
40_20_19_bamnikele kuzo iintlanga ukuba zidlale ngaye, zimtyakatye,  zimbethelele emnqamlezweni, athi ngomhla wesithathu abuye avuke.
40_20_20_Ngelo xesha kweza kuye unina woonyana bakaZebhedi,  enoonyana bakhe, equbuda, ecela into kuye.
40_20_21_Wathi ke yena kuye, Uthanda ntoni na? Athi kuye, Yitsho baze aba nyana bam bobabini bahlale, omnye ngasekunene kwakho,  omnye ngasekhohlo, ebukumkanini bakho.
40_20_22_Uphendule ke uYesu wathi, Aniyazi into eniyicelayo. Ninako na ukuyisela indebe endiza kuyisela mna, nibhaptizwe ngobhaptizo endibhaptizwa ngalo mna? Bathi kuye, Sinako.
40_20_23_Athi kubo. Okunene indebe yam niya kuyisela, nobhaptizo endibhaptizwa ngalo mna niya kubhaptizwa kwangalo; kodwa kona ukuhlala ngasekunene kum, nangasekhohlo kum, asikwam ukupha ngako; kophiwa abo kulungiselwe bona nguBawo.
40_20_24_Bekuvile ke oko abalishumi, babacaphukela abo bazalwana bobabini.
40_20_25_Ke kaloku uYesu, ebabizele kuye, wathi, Niyazi ukuba abaphathi beentlanga bayazigagamela, nabo bazizikhulu benza ngegunya kuzo.
40_20_26_Ze kungabi njalo ke phakathi kwenu nina; osukuba enga angaba mkhulu phakathi kwenu, makabe ngumlungiseleli wenu;
40_20_27_nosukuba enga angaba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu, makabe ngumkonzi wenu;
40_20_28_kwanjengokuba uNyana woMntu engezanga kulungiselelwa; weza kulungiselela, nokuncama ubomi bakhe, bube yintlawulelo yokukhulula abaninzi.
40_20_29_Bakubon ukuba bayaphuma eYeriko, walandelwa yindimbane enkulu.
40_20_30_Nanko kuhleli iimfama zimbini ngasendleleni; zathi, zakuva ukuba kudlula uYesu, zadanduluka, zisithi, Senzele inceba,  Nkosi, nyana kaDavide.
40_20_31_Ke kaloku indimbane yazikhalimela ukuba zithi tu; kwaba kukhona ke zidandulukayo, zisithi, Senzele inceba, Nkosi, nyana kaDavide.
40_20_32_Wema uYesu, wazibiza wathi, Ninga ndinganenzela ntoni na?
40_20_33_Zithi kuye, Nkosi, ukuba kuvulwe amehlo ethu.
40_20_34_Wasikwa ke yimfesane uYesu, wawachukumisa amehlo azo; zaba nokubona kwaoko ngamehlo azo, zamlandela.
40_21_1_Kuthe, xa babesondele eYerusalem, befikile eBhetefage,  kwiNtaba yemiNquma, uYesu wesusa abafundi bababini,
40_21_2_esithi kubo, Yiyani emzaneni lo ukhangelene nani; kwaoko nofumana iesile libotshelelwe linethole, likhululeni nilizise kum.
40_21_3_Nokuba kukho othe wathetha into kuni, nothi, Ayafuneka eNkosini; wothi ke awathumele kwaoko.
40_21_4_Ke kaloku oku konke kwenzeke, ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwayo ngomprofeti, esithi,
40_21_5_Yithini kwintombi uZiyon, Yabona, uKumkani wakho uza kuwe,  Enobulali, ekhwele e-esileni, ilithole ke, Inkonyana yento ebotshwayo.
40_21_6_Baya ke abafundi, benza ngoko wayebamisele ngako uYesu,
40_21_7_balizisa iesile nethole, babeka iingubo zabo phezu kwawo,  bamhlalisa phezu kwazo.
40_21_8_Yathi ke inkoliso yezihlwele yazandlala iingubo zayo endleleni; baye abanye bexhuzula amasebe emithini, bewandlala endleleni.
40_21_9_Zaye ke izihlwele, ebezihamba ngaphambili nebezilandela,  zidanduluka, zisithi, Hosana kuye unyana kaDavide! Makabongwe lo uzayo egameni leNkosi! Hosana enyangweni!
40_21_10_Akungena eYerusalem, wonke umzi wazamazama, usithi,  Ngubani na lo?
40_21_11_Bathi ke abantu, Lo nguYesu, umprofeti ongowaseNazarete yelaseGalili.
40_21_12_Wangena uYesu etempileni kaThixo, wabakhupha bonke ababethengisa nababethenga etempileni, wazibhukuqa iitafile zabananisi bemali, nezihlalo zabathengisa ngamahobe;
40_21_13_athi kubo, Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Indlu yam iya kubizwa ngokuba yindlu yokuthandaza; ke nina niyenze umqolomba wezihange.
40_21_14_Kweza kuye iimfama neziqhwala, etempileni apho,  waziphilisa.
40_21_15_Bathe ke ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali, bakuyibona imimangaliso awayenzayo, kwanabantwana bedanduluka etempileni,  besithi, Hosana kuye unyana kaDavide: basuka bacaphuka,
40_21_16_bathi kuye, Uyayiva na into abayithethayo aba? Athi ke uYesu kubo, Ewe; anizanga nikulese na ukuthi, Emlonyeni weentsana nabanyayo ulungiselele udumiso?
40_21_17_Wabashiya, waphumela ngaphandle komzi, waya eBhetani,  walala khona.
40_21_18_Uthe ke kwakusa, xa abuyela kuwo umzi, walamba.
40_21_19_Wathi, ebone mkhiwane uthile ngasendleleni, waya kuwo,  akafumana nto kuwo, yangamagqabi odwa; athi kuwo, Makungaze kuvele siqhamo kuwe naphakade. Wasuka woma kwaoko umkhiwane lowo.
40_21_20_Bakukubona oko abafundi, bamangaliswa, besithi, Utheni na ukoma msinya kangakanana umkhiwane?
40_21_21_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi kubo, Inene, ndithi kuni, ukuba nithe nanokholo, anathandabuza, anisayi kwenza le nto yomkhiwane yodwa; kosuka, nokuba nithe kule ntaba, Thabatheka uphoseke elwandle, kwenzeke.
40_21_22_Neento zonke enithe nazicela ekuthandazeni nikholwa,  nozamkela.
40_21_23_Kuthe akungena etempileni, xa afundisayo, beza kuye ababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu abantu, besithi, Ezi zinto uzenza ngagunya lini na? Kananjalo ngubani na okunike eli gunya?
40_21_24_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi kubo, Nam ndiya kubuza kuni zwi-nye; endothi, ukuba nithe nandixelela lona, ndinixelele nam ukuba ndizenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto:
40_21_25_Ubhaptizo lukaYohane lwaluphuma phi na, emazulwini,  ebantwini, sini na? Bacamanga ke bodwa, besithi, Ukuba sithe,  Lwaphuma emazulwini, wothi kuthi, Ibiyini na phofu ukuba ningakholwa nguye?
40_21_26_Ukuba ke sithe, Lwaphuma ebantwini, soyika abantu; kuba bonke bebambe ukuthi uYohane ungumprofeti.
40_21_27_Bamphendula uYesu bathi, Asazi. Wathi naye kubo, Nam ke andinixeleli ukuba ndizenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto.
40_21_28_Nithini na ke nina? Umntu wayenabantwana ababini; weza kowokuqala wathi, Mntwana wam, yiya kusebenza namhla esidiliyeni sam.
40_21_29_Waphendula ke yena wathi, Andiyi; ke wabuya wazohlwaya,  waya.
40_21_30_Weza nakowesibini, wathetha kwangokunjalo. Waphendula ke yena wathi, Ndiyaya, nkosi; akaya.
40_21_31_Nguwuphi na kwabo bobabini owenza ukuthanda kukayise?  Bathi kuye, Ngowokuqala. Athi kubo uYesu, Inene ndithi kuni,  Bayaniphangela ke ukungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo ababuthi berhafu namahenyukazi.
40_21_32_Ngokuba uYohane weza kuni ngendlela yobulungisa, anakholwa nguye; kodwa bakholwa nguye bona ababuthi berhafu namahenyukazi; ke nina, nakukubona oko, anibuyanga nizohlwaye,  ukuze nikholwe nguye.
40_21_33_Yivani omnye umzekeliso. Bekukho umninindlu othile owatyala isidiliya, wasibiyela ngothango, wemba kuso isixovulelo seediliya, wakha inyango, waqeshisa ngaso kubalimi,  wahambela kwelinye.
40_21_34_Kuthe ke lakusondela ixesha leziqhamo, wathuma abakhonzi bakhe kubalimi abo, ukuya kwamkela iziqhamo zaso.
40_21_35_Besuka abalimi babathabatha abakhonzi bakhe, bathi omnye bamtyabula, omnye bambulala, nomnye bamgibisela ngamatye.
40_21_36_Wabuya wathuma abanye abakhonzi, bebaninzi kunabokuqala,  benjenjalo nakubo.
40_21_37_Uthe ke kamva wathuma kubo unyana wakhe, esithi, Baya kumhlonela yena unyana wam.
40_21_38_Bathe ke bakumbona unyana abalimi, batshono ukuthi, Lo yindlalifa; yizani simbulale, sihlale nelifa lakhe.
40_21_39_Bamthabatha, bamkhuphela ngaphandle kwesidiliya,  bambulala.
40_21_40_Xa athe weza ngoko umninisidiliya, uya kwenza ntoni na kwabo balimi?
40_21_41_Bathi kuye, uya kubatshabalalisa kakubi abangendawo abo,  aze isidiliya eso aqeshise ngaso kubalimi bambi, abomamkelisa iziqhamo ngamaxesha azo.
40_21_42_Athi kubo uYesu, Anizanga nilese na ezibhalweni ukuthi,  Ilitye abalicekisayo abakhi, Lelona laba yintloko yembombo;  Kwavela eNkosini oku, Kungummangaliso emehlweni ethu?
40_21_43_Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuni, Ubukumkani bukaThixo buya kususwa kuni, bunikwe uhlanga oluzivelisayo iziqhamo zabo.
40_21_44_Kanjalo lowo uwe phezu kweli litye uya kutyumka, ke lowo lithe lamwela liya kumcola.
40_21_45_Bathi ababingeleli abakhulu nabaFarisi, bakuyiva imizekeliso yakhe, baqonda ukuba uthetha ngabo.
40_21_46_Bathi befuna ukumbamba, boyika abantu, ekubeni ke babebambe ukuthi ungumprofeti.
40_22_1_Waphendula uYesu, wabuya wathetha kubo ngemizekeliso,  esithi,
40_22_2_Ubukumkani bamazulu bufanekiswa nomntu ongukumkani,  owamenzela umsitho unyana wakhe.
40_22_3_Wesusa abakhonzi bakhe ukuba baye kubabiza abamenyiweyo,  beze emsithweni; basuka abavuma ukuza.
40_22_4_Wabuya wesusa abanye abakhonzi, esithi, Yitshoni kwabamenyiweyo ukuthi, Yabonani, isidlo sam sendisilungisile;  iinkomo zam neento zam ezityetyisiweyo zixheliwe, konke sekulungile; yizani emsithweni.
40_22_5_Abakhathalanga ke bona; basuka bemka, omnye waya kweyakhe intsimi, omnye waya ekurhwebeni kwakhe.
40_22_6_Bathi ke abaseleyo bababamba abakhonzi bakhe, babaphatha kakubi, bababulala.
40_22_7_Evile ke ukumkani, waqumba, wayikhupha imikhosi yakhe,  wabatshabalalisa abo babulali, wawutshisa nomzi wabo.
40_22_8_Aze athi kubakhonzi bakhe, Umsitho okunene sewulungile wona, kodwa abamenyiweyo bebengafanelekile.
40_22_9_Yiyani ngoko ezintlanganweni zeendlela, nithi abo nithe nabafumana, nibabize beze emsithweni.
40_22_10_Baphuma abo bakhonzi baya ezindleleni, bahlanganisa bonke ababafumanayo, abakhohlakeleyo kwanabalungileyo; wazala umsitho ngabamenyiweyo.
40_22_11_Ke kaloku akungena ukumkani, eza kukhangela abamenyiweyo,  wabona apho umntu ongambethe ngubo yamsitho.
40_22_12_Athi kuye, Wethu, utheni na ukungena apha, ungenayo ingubo yomsitho? Lamkhohla ke.
40_22_13_Wathi ukumkani kubalungiseleli, Mbopheni iinyawo nezandla,  nimthabathe, nimkhuphele ebumnyameni bangaphandle; khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_22_14_Kuba baninzi ababiziweyo, ke bambalwa abanyuliweyo.
40_22_15_Baza abaFarisi baya benza ibhunga lokuba bamthiyele ekuthetheni kwakhe.
40_22_16_Bathumela kuye abafundi babo benamaHerode, besithi,  Mfundisi, siyazi ukuba uyinyaniso, uyifundisa indlela kaThixo ngenyaniso; kananjalo akukhathali nangubani, kuba akukhethi buso bamntu.
40_22_17_Sixelele ngoko, uthini na wena? Kuvumelekile na ukumnika irhafu uKesare, akuvumelekile, sini na?
40_22_18_Ke kaloku, eyazi uYesu inkohlakalo yabo, wathi,  Nindilingelani na, bahanahanisindini?
40_22_19_Ndiboniseni iqhosha lerhafu. Bamzisela ke idenariyo.
40_22_20_Athi kubo, Ngokabani na lo mfanekiso nombhalo?
40_22_21_Bathi kuye, NgokaKesare. Andule ukuthi kubo, Nikelani kaloku izinto zikaKesare kuKesare, neento zikaThixo kuThixo.
40_22_22_Bakuva bamangaliswa, basuka bamshiya, bemka.
40_22_23_Kwangaloo mini kweza kuye abaSadusi, abathi akukho luvuko;  bambuza,
40_22_24_besithi, Mfundisi, uMoses wathi, Ukuba ubani uthe wafa engenabantwana, wothi umzalwana wakhe amngene umfazi wakhe,  amvelisele imbewu umzalwana wakhe.
40_22_25_Ke kaloku kwaye kukho kuthi abazalwana abasixhenxe; waza owokuqala akubon ukuba uzekile wabhubha, wathi, kuba engenambewu, wamshiya kumzalwana wakhe umfazi wakhe.
40_22_26_Wenjenjalo nowesibini, nowesithathu, kwada kwaya kowesixhenxe.
40_22_27_Emveni ke kwabo bonke, wafa naye umfazi.
40_22_28_Ngoko eluvukweni uya kuba ngumfazi wawuphi na kweso sixhenxe? Kuba babenaye bonke.
40_22_29_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi kubo, Niyalahleka, kuba ningazazi izibhalo kwanamandla kaThixo.
40_22_30_Kuba eluvukweni abazeki, abendiswa; banjengazo izithunywa zikaThixo emazulwini.
40_22_31_Ngalo ke uvuko lwabafileyo, anikulesanga na okwathethwayo kuni nguThixo, esithi,
40_22_32_Mna ndinguThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake, uThixo kaYakobi? UThixo akaThixo wabafileyo, ungowabaphilileyo.
40_22_33_Zathi izihlwele zakukuva, zakhwankqiswa yimfundiso yakhe.
40_22_34_Ke kaloku bathe abaFarisi, bakuva ukuba ubethe labakhohla abaSadusi, bahlanganiselana ndawonye.
40_22_35_Omnye kubo ongumqondisi-mthetho wambuza emlinga, wathi,
40_22_36_Mfundisi, owona myalelo mkhulu emthethweni nguwuphi na?
40_22_37_Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho uphela,  nangengqondo yakho iphela.
40_22_38_Nguwo lowo owokuqala nomkhulu umthetho.
40_22_39_Owesibini ke ufana nawo: Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako.
40_22_40_Kule mithetho yomibini kuxhomekeke umyalelo uphela nabaprofeti.
40_22_41_Bakubon ukuba bahlanganisene ke abaFarisi, uYesu wabuza kubo,
40_22_42_esithi, Nithini na nina ngaye uKristu? Ungunyana kabani na? Bathi kuye, KaDavide.
40_22_43_Athi kubo, Yini na phofu ukuba uDavide ngoMoya ambize ngokuthi, Nkosi, esithi,
40_22_44_Yathi iNkosi eNkosini yam, Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho?
40_22_45_Ukuba uDavide ngoko umbiza ngokuba Nkosi, ungunyana wakhe ngani na?
40_22_46_Akubangakho namnye ubenako ukumphendula nezwi eli;  kananjalo kususela kuloo mini, akubanga sabakho mntu waba nabuganga bakumbuza nto.
40_23_1_Waza uYesu wathetha kwisihlwele nakubafundi bakhe,
40_23_2_esithi, Ababhali nabaFarisi bahleli esihlalweni sikaMoses.
40_23_3_Konke ngoko abasukuba besithi kuni kugcineni, ze nikugcine nikwenze; kodwa ze ningenzi ngokwemisebenzi yabo; kuba bathetha baze bangenzi.
40_23_4_Kuba babopha imithwalo enzima, esindayo, bayibeke emagxeni abantu, babe ke bona bengathandi kuyishukumisa nangomnwe lo wabo.
40_23_5_Yonke imisebenzi yabo ke bayenza ngokunga bangabonwa ngabantu; bawenze banzi amaqhaga abo ezikhumbuzo, bayandise imiqukumbelo yeengubo zabo.
40_23_6_Kananjalo bathanda izilili zobukhulu ezidlweni,  kwanezihlalo zobukhulu ezindlwini zesikhungu,
40_23_7_nemibuliso ezindaweni zembutho, nokubizwa ngabantu kuthiwe,  Rabhi, Rabhi.
40_23_8_Ke nina maningabizwa kuthiwe Rabhi; kuba mnye uMkhokeli wenu, uKristu; nina ke nonke ningabazalwana.
40_23_9_Ningabizi mntu ngokuba nguyihlo emhlabeni apha; kuba mnye uYihlo wenu, lowo usemazulwini.
40_23_10_Kananjalo maningabizwa ngokuba ningabakhokeli; kuba mnye uMkhokeli wenu, uKristu.
40_23_11_Omkhulu ke kuni makabe ngumlungiseleli wenu.
40_23_12_Osukuba ke eziphakamisa uya kuthotywa; nosukuba ezithoba uya kuphakanyiswa.
40_23_13_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba nibuvala ubukumkani bamazulu phambi kwabantu; kuba aningeni nina, nabangenayo anibavumeli ukuba bangene.
40_23_14_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba nisidla izindlu zabahlolokazi, nize ngokunyhwalaza nithandaze uzungu; ngenxa yoko niya kwamkela ugwebo olugqithiseleyo.
40_23_15_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba nijikajika ulwandle nomhlaba ukuze nenze nokuba mnye ongena ebuYudeni; nithi, xa athe wazuzeka, nimenze abe ngumntwana wesihogo ngokuphindiweyo kunani.
40_23_16_Yeha, nina bakhokelindini baziimfama! Nina nithi, Othe wafunga itempile, akunto oko; ke othe wafunga igolide yetempile, unetyala.
40_23_17_Ziyatha, zimfama, kanene yiyiphi na enkulu? Yigolide,  yitempile eyingcwalisayo igolide, kusini na?
40_23_18_Kanjalo nina nithi, Othe wafunga isibingelelo, akunto oko;  ke othe wafunga umnikelo ophezu kwaso, unetyala.
40_23_19_Ziyatha, zimfama, kanene yiyiphi na enkulu? Ngumnikelo,  sisibingelelo esiwungcwalisayo umnikelo, kusini na?
40_23_20_Lowo usifungayo ngoko isibingelelo ufunga sona neento zonke eziphezu kwaso.
40_23_21_Nalowo uyifungayo itempile, ufunga yona nomiyo kuyo.
40_23_22_Nalowo uwafungayo amazulu, ufunga itrone kaThixo nohleli phezu kwayo.
40_23_23_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba ninikela izishumi zetyeleba nedile nekumin, kanti nizishiyile ezona ndawo zinzima zomthetho, umgwebo nenceba nokholo; ezi benimelwe kukuba nizenze, nithi neziya ningazishiyi.
40_23_24_Bakhokelindini baziimfama, abahluza imbuzane, ke baginye inkamela.
40_23_25_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba nihlambulula umphandle wendebe nesitya, kanti ke ngaphakathi kuzele kukuphanga nokungazeyisi.
40_23_26_MFarisindini uyimfama, hlambulula tanci okungaphakathi kwendebe nesitya, ukuze kuthi okungaphandle kwazo kuhlambuluke nako.
40_23_27_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba nifana namangcwaba aqatywe ifutha, athi abonakale emahle okunene ngaphandle, kanti ngaphakathi azele ngamathambo abafileyo nokungcola konke.
40_23_28_Ngokukwanjalo nani ngaphandle okunene nibonakala kubantu ningamalungisa, kanti ngaphakathi nizele luhanahaniso nokuchasene nomthetho.
40_23_29_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba niwakha amangcwaba abaprofeti, nivathise amangcwaba amalungisa,
40_23_30_nithi, Ukuba sasikho thina ngemihla yoobawo, singe singabanga nabudlelane nabo ngegazi labaprofeti.
40_23_31_Ngoko niyangqina kwanina, ukuba ningoonyana babo babulala abaprofeti.
40_23_32_Wuzaliseni kambe nani umlinganisela wooyihlo.
40_23_33_Zinyokandini, nzalandini yamarhamba, ningathini na ukuwusaba umgwebo wesihogo?
40_23_34_Ngenxa yoko, niyabona, mna ndinithumela abaprofeti nezilumko nababhali; niya kuthi inxenye kubo niyibulale,  niyibethelele eminqamlezweni, nithi inxenye kubo niyityakatye ezindlwini zenu zesikhungu, niyitshutshise kwimizi ngemizi;
40_23_35_ukuze linifikele lonke igazi elinobulungisa, elaphalazwayo emhlabeni apha, lithabathela egazini lika-Abheli ilungisa,  lizise egazini likaZekariya, unyana kaBherekiya, enambulalela phakathi kwendawo engcwele nesibingelelo.
40_23_36_Inene, ndithi kuni, Zonke ezo zinto ziya kusihlela esi sizukulwana.
40_23_37_Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wena ubabulalayo abaprofeti,  ubagibisele ngamatye abo bathunywe kuwe, kufuthi kangakanani na ndithande ukubabuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho, ngohlobo esithi isikhukukazi siwabuthele ndawonye amathole aso ngaphantsi kwamaphiko, anavuma!
40_23_38_Yabonani, indlu yenu ishiywa nani ize.
40_23_39_Kuba ndithi kuni, Aniyi kuba sandibona emveni koku, nide nithi, Makabongwe lowo uzayo egameni leNkosi.
40_24_1_Ephumile uYesu, wemka etempileni; bathe abafundi bakhe beza kumbonisa izakhiwo zetempile.
40_24_2_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Niyazibona na zonke ezi zinto? Inene,  ndithi kuni, Akusayi kusala apha ilitye phezu kwelitye,  elingayi kuchithwa.
40_24_3_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uhleli eNtabeni yemiNquma, beza kuye abafundi bebodwa, bathi, Sixelele ukuba ziya kubakho nini na ezo zinto; uya kuba yini na umqondiso wokufika kwakho,  nowokupheliswa kwephakade eli?
40_24_4_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Lumkani ningalahlekiswa mntu.
40_24_5_Kuba baninzi abaya kuza egameni lam, besithi banguKristu,  balahlekise into eninzi.
40_24_6_Niya kuthi ke nive iimfazwe namarhe eemfazwe; lumkani ningabi navuso, kuba zonke ezo zinto zimele ukuhla; kanti kona ukuphela akukabikho.
40_24_7_Kuba uhlanga luya kuvukelana nohlanga, nobukumkani buvukelane nobukumkani; kuya kubakho iindlala, neendyikitya zokufa, nezinyikimo zomhlaba kwiindawo ngeendawo.
40_24_8_Zonke ke ezo zinto zikukuqaleka kwenimba.
40_24_9_Ngelo xesha baya kuninikela ekubandezelweni, banibulale;  niya kuthiywa ziintlanga zonke ngenxa yegama lam.
40_24_10_Ngelo xesha baninzi abaya kukhutyekiswa, banikelane,  bathiyane.
40_24_11_Kwaye kuya kuvela abaprofeti ababuxoki babe baninzi,  balahlekise abantu abaninzi.
40_24_12_Nangenxa yokwanda kokuchasa umthetho, luya kuphola uthando lwabaninzi.
40_24_13_Ke onyamezeleyo kwada kwaba sekupheleni, lowo uya kusindiswa.
40_24_14_Zaye ezi ndaba zilungileyo zobukumkani ziya kuvakaliswa kulo elimiweyo liphela, zibe bubungqina kuzo zonke iintlanga;  kwandule ke ukufika ukuphela.
40_24_15_Xa ke ngoko nithe nalibona isikizi lesiphanziso,  ekwakuthethwa lona ngoDaniyeli umprofeti, limi endaweni engcwele (olesayo makaqiqe),
40_24_16_ngelo xesha mabathi abakwelakwaYuda basabele ezintabeni.
40_24_17_Ophezu kwendlu makangehli aye kuthabatha into endlwini yakhe;
40_24_18_nosentsimini makangabuyeli emva aye kuthabatha iingubo zakhe.
40_24_19_Yeha ke, abamithiyo nabanyisayo ngaloo mihla!
40_24_20_Thandazani ke, ukuba intsabo yenu ingabi khona ebusika nangesabatha.
40_24_21_Kuba ngelo xesha kuya kubakho imbandezelo enkulu,  ekungazanga kubekho injalo kwasekuqalekeni kwehlabathi, kwada kwaba kalokunje, ekungasayi kubuye kubekho injalo.
40_24_22_Kanjalo ukuba ibingayi kuthi loo mihla inqanyulelwe,  bekungayi kubakho nyama isindayo; ngenxa ke yabanyuliweyo, loo mihla iya kunqanyulelwa.
40_24_23_Ngelo xesha, ukuba ubani uthe kuni, Nanku apha uKristu,  nokuba uthe, Nankuya phaya, musani ukuholwa.
40_24_24_Kuba kuya kuvela ooKristu ababuxoki, nabaprofeti ababuxoki, benze imiqondiso emikhulu nezimanga, ngokokude bathi, ukuba bekunokwenzeka, balahlekise nabanyuliweyo.
40_24_25_Yabonani, ndinixelele ngenxa engaphambili.
40_24_26_Ukuba ngoko bathi kuni, Nanko entlango, musani ukuphuma niye. Nokuba bathi, Nanko emagumbini, musani ukukholwa.
40_24_27_Kuba kwanjengokuba umbane uthi uphume empumalanga,  ubonakale kude kuse entshonalanga, kuya kuba njalo nokufika koNyana woMntu.
40_24_28_Kuba apho sukuba sikhona isidumbu, aya kuhlanganisana khona amaxhalanga.
40_24_29_Kwaoko ke, emveni kwembandezelo yaloo mihla, ilanga liya kwenziwa mnyama, ithi nenyanga ifiphale, zithi neenkwenkwezi ziwe ezulwini, athi namandla amazulu azanyazanyiswe.
40_24_30_Uya kubonakala ngelo xesha umqondiso woNyana woMntu ezulwini; zimbambazele ngelo xesha zonke izizwe zomhlaba,  zimbone uNyana woMntu esiza phezu kwamafu ezulu, enamandla,  nobuqaqawuli obukhulu.
40_24_31_Wozithuma izithunywa zakhe zasemazulwini, zinexilongo elisandi sikhulu, zihlanganisele ndawonye abanyulwa bakhe,  baphume kumacala omane omoya, kuthabathela esiphelweni sezulu,  kude kuse kwesinye isiphelo salo.
40_24_32_Wufundeni ke umzekeliso kuwo umkhiwane: xa selithe lathamba isebe lawo, lahluma amagqabi, niyazi ukuba likufuphi ihlobo.
40_24_33_Ngokukwanjalo nani, xa nithe nazibona zonke ezo zinto,  yazini ukuba kukufuphi, sekusemnyango.
40_24_34_Inene ndithi kuni, Asisayi kudlula esi sizukulwana,  zingadanga zonke ezo zinto zibekho.
40_24_35_Liya kudlula izulu nomhlaba, ke wona amazwi am akasayi kudlula.
40_24_36_Kodwa akukho bani uwaziyo loo mhla nelo lixa; azazi nezithunywa zamazulu, nguBawo yedwa.
40_24_37_Ke kaloku, njengokuba ibinjalo imihla kaNowa, koba njalo nokufika koNyana woMntu.
40_24_38_Kuba njengokuba babesithi, ngemihla ebingaphambi konogumbe, badle, basele, bazeke, bendise, kwada kwayimini awangena ngayo emkhombeni uNowa, bengaqondanga,
40_24_39_wada wafika unogumbe, wabakhukulisa bonke: koba njalo nokufika koNyana woMntu.
40_24_40_Ngelo xesha ababini boba sentsimini, athi omnye amkelwe,  omnye ashiywe.
40_24_41_Abafazi ababini boba besila etyeni lokusila, athi omnye amkelwe, omnye ashiywe.
40_24_42_Phaphani ngoko; ngokuba ningazi ukuba lilixa liphi na eza ngalo iNkosi yenu.
40_24_43_Yazini ke oku, ukuba ebesazi umninindlu ukuba isela liza ngawuphi na umlindo wobusuku, ange elindile, akavuma ukuba indlu yakhe igqojozwe.
40_24_44_Ngenxa yoko yibani nilungile nani, ngokuba uNyana woMntu uza ngelixa eningalikhumbuleliyo.
40_24_45_Ngubani na ke loo mkhonzi uthembekileyo, uqondayo, eyathi inkosi yakhe yammisa phezu kwabendlu yayo, ukuze abanike ukudla ngexesha elifanelekileyo?
40_24_46_Unoyolo loo mkhonzi, iya kuthi yakufika inkosi yakhe imfumane esenjenjalo.
40_24_47_Inene ndithi kuni, iya kummisa phezu kwayo yonke impahla yayo.
40_24_48_Ukuba ke umkhonzi lowa ukhohlakeleyo uthe entliziyweni yakhe, Inkosi yam ilibele,
40_24_49_ayizi, aqale ababethe abakhonza kunye naye, adle ke, asele nabanxilayo,
40_24_50_iya kufika inkosi yaloo mkhonzi ngemini angayikhangeleyo,  nangelixa angalaziyo,
40_24_51_imsike kubini, immisele isabelo sakhe nabahanahanisi;  khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_25_1_Ngelo xesha ubukumkani bamazulu buya kufanekiswa neentombi ezilishumi, ezazithabathayo izibane zazo, zaphuma zaya kumkhawulela umyeni.
40_25_2_Ezintlanu ke kuzo zaye ziziingqondi, ezintlanu ziziziyatha.
40_25_3_Ezo ziziziyatha zaphatha izibane zazo, azaphatha oli nazo;
40_25_4_kodwa eziziingqondi zaphatha ioli ezityeni zazo,  kwanezibane zazo.
40_25_5_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba ulibele umyeni, zozela zonke zalala.
40_25_6_Phakathi kobusuku ke kwabakho umemezo oluthi, Nanko umyeni esiza; phumani niye kumkhawulela.
40_25_7_Zaza zavuka zonke ezo ntombi, zalungisa izibane zazo.
40_25_8_Zathi ke eziziziyatha kweziziingqondi, Sipheni kwioli yenu leyo, ngokuba izibane zethu zicima.
40_25_9_Zaphendula ke eziziingqondi, zathi, Hayi, hleze inganeli kuthi nakuni; yiyani kanye kwabathengisayo, nizithengele.
40_25_10_Kuthe ke, zisaya kuthenga, wafika umyeni; zaza ezo bezisezilungile zangena naye emsithweni, lwavalwa ke ucango.
40_25_11_Zithi ke kamva zifike nezinye iintombi ezo, zisithi,  Nkosi, nkosi, sivulele.
40_25_12_Yaphendula ke yona yathi, Inene ndithi kuni, andinazi nina.
40_25_13_Phaphani ngoko, ngokuba ningayazi imini kwanalo ilixa.
40_25_14_Kuba kunjengomntu owathi, eza kuhambela kwelinye, wabiza abakhe abakhonzi, wayinikela kubo impahla yakhe.
40_25_15_Wathi omnye wamnika iitalente zantlanu, omnye zambini,  nomnye yaba nye, walowo wanikwa ngokwawakhe amandla; wahambela kwelinye kwaoko.
40_25_16_Lowo ke wamkela iitalente ezintlanu, waya wasebenza ngazo,  wenza esinye isihlanu seetalente.
40_25_17_Kwangokunjalo nalowo wamkela ezimbini, naye wazuza esinye isibini.
40_25_18_Ke naye lowo wamkela yanye, waya wemba emhlabeni,  wayifihla imali yenkosi yakhe.
40_25_19_Ithi ke emveni kwexesha elikhulu, ifike inkosi yabo bakhonzi, ibalelane nabo.
40_25_20_Weza lowo wamkela iitalente ezintlanu, wazisa esinye isihlanu seetalente, esithi, Nkosi, wandinika iitalente zantlanu; khangela, ndizuze esinye isihlanu seetalente phezu kwazo.
40_25_21_Yathi ke kuye inkosi yakhe, Hee ke, mkhonzi ulungileyo,  uthembekileyo! Ubuthembekile kwiinto ezimbalwa; ndiya kukumisa phezu kweento ezininzi, ngena eluvuyweni lwenkosi yakho.
40_25_22_Weza ke nalowo wamkela iitalente ezimbini, wathi, Nkosi,  wandinika iitalente zambini; khangela, ndizuze esinye isibini seetalente phezu kwazo.
40_25_23_Yathi kuye inkosi yakhe, Hee ke, mkhonzi ulungileyo,  uthembekileyo! Ubuthembekile kwiinto ezimbalwa; ndiya kukumisa phezu kweento ezininzi; ngena eluvuyweni lwenkosi yakho.
40_25_24_Weza ke nalowo wamkela italente yanye, wathi, Nkosi,  bendikwazi wena ukuba ungumntu olukhuni, uvuna apho ubungahlwayelanga khona, ubuthe apho ungelelanga khona;
40_25_25_ndasuka ndoyika, ndaya ndayiselela italente yakho ngomhlaba; nanku unako okwakho.
40_25_26_Yaphendula ke inkosi yakhe yathi kuye, Mkhonzindini ukhohlakeleyo, ulivila, ubusazi nje ukuba ndivuna apho ndingahlwayelanga khona, ndibuthe apho ndingelelanga khona,
40_25_27_ubumelwe kukuthi ngoko ube ubuyibeke imali yam kubananisi,  ndaza ndakufika mna, ndabuya ndakuzuza okwam kunenzala.
40_25_28_Mhlutheni ngoko italente leyo, niyinike lowo uneetalente ezilishumi.
40_25_29_Kuba wonke umntu onako Uya kunikwa, abe nako ngokugqithiseleyo; ke ongenako, uya kuhluthwa kwanoko anako.
40_25_30_Naye umkhonzi ongancedi lutho, mkhupheleni ebumnyameni obungaphandle; khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo.
40_25_31_Xa ke athe wafika uNyana woMntu esebuqaqawulini bakhe,  enazo zonke izithunywa ezingcwele, ngelo xa uya kuhlala phezu kwetrone yobuqaqawuli bakhe;
40_25_32_zihlanganiswe phambi kwakhe zonke iintlanga, abahlule abanye kwabanye, njengokuba umalusi ezahlula izimvu ezibhokhweni;
40_25_33_athi zona izimvu azimise ngasekunene kwakhe, athi kodwa zona iibhokhwe azimise ngasekhohlo.
40_25_34_Uya kuthi ke ukumkani kwabangasekunene kwakhe, Yizani,  nina nisikelelweyo nguBawo, nibudle ilifa ubukumkani obalungiselwa nina kwasekusekweni kwehlabathi;
40_25_35_kuba ndalamba, nandipha ukudla; ndanxanwa, nandiseza;  ndandingowasemzini, nandingenisa endlwini;
40_25_36_ndandize, nandambesa; ndandisifa, nandivelela;  ndandisentolongweni, neza kum.
40_25_37_Oza amphendule ke amalungisa, esithi, Nkosi, sakubona nini na ulambile, sakonga; unxaniwe, sakuseza?
40_25_38_Sakubona nini na ke ungowasemzini, sakungenisa endlwini,  uze, sakwambesa?
40_25_39_Sakubona nini na ke usifa, okanye usentolongweni, seza kuwe?
40_25_40_Aze aphendule ukumkani athi kuwo, Inene ndithi kuni,  Ekubeni nenjenjalo nakumnye waba bazalwana bam bangabona bancinane, nenjenjalo nakum.
40_25_41_Uya kuthi nakwabangasekhohlo, Mkani kum, nina baqalekiswa,  niye emlilweni ongunaphakade, owalungiselwa uMtyholi nezithunywa zakhe.
40_25_42_Kuba ndalamba, anandipha kudla; ndanxanwa, anandiseza;
40_25_43_ndandingowasemzini, anandingenisa ndlwini; ndandize,  anandambesa; ndandisifa, ndandisentolongweni, anandivelela.
40_25_44_Boza ke bamphendule nabo, besithi, Nkosi, sakubona nini na ulambile, okanye unxaniwe, okanye ungowasemzini, okanye uze,  okanye usifa, okanye usentolongweni, asakulungiselela?
40_25_45_Aze abaphendule, esithi, Inene ndithi kuni, Ekubeni ningenjanga njalo nakumnye waba bangabona bancinane, anenjanga njalo nakum.
40_25_46_Baya kumka aba baye elubethweni olungunaphakade; ke wona amalungisa aya kuya ebomini obungunaphakade.
40_26_1_Kwathi, xa ebewagqibile uYesu onke la mazwi, wathi kubafundi bakhe,
40_26_2_Niyazi ukuba emveni kweentsuku ezimbini kukho ipasika, aze uNyana woMntu anikelwe ukuba abethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
40_26_3_Bathi ngelo xa ababingeleli abakhulu, nababhali, namadoda amakhulu abantu, bahlanganisana endlwini yombingeleli omkhulu okuthiwa nguKayafa;
40_26_4_babhunga ukuba bambambe uYesu ngenkohliso, bambulale.
40_26_5_Ke babesithi, Makungabi khona ngomthendeleko, ukuze kungehli saqunge phakathi kwabantu.
40_26_6_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uYesu useBhetani, endlwini kaSimon owayeneqhenqa,
40_26_7_kweza kuye umfazi enehlala lelabhastile, linamafutha aqholiweyo axabiso likhulu, wawagalela phezu kwentloko yakhe,  akubon ukuba uhleli ngasesithebeni.
40_26_8_Bekubonile ke oko abafundi bakhe, bacaphuka, besithi,  Yeyani na le nkcitho?
40_26_9_Kuba la mafutha ngekuthengiswe lukhulu ngawo, kwaza kwaphiwa amahlwempu.
40_26_10_Ekwazi ke oko, uYesu wathi kubo, Umfazi lo nimaphulelani na? Kuba usebenze kum umsebenzi omhle.
40_26_11_Kuba amahlwempu lawo nihleli ninawo; kodwa mna anihleli ninam.
40_26_12_Kuba la mafutha aqholiweyo, yena ewathululele emzimbeni wam nje, wenzele ukungcwatywa kwam.
40_26_13_Inene ndithi kuni, Apho zithe zavakaliswa khona ezi ndaba zilungileyo kulo lonke ihlabathi, iya kuxelwa nayo le nto ayenzileyo yena, ibe sisikhumbuzo ngaye.
40_26_14_Ngelo xesha kwaphuma omnye weshumi elinababini, ekuthiwa nguYuda Sikariyoti, waya kubabingeleli abakhulu,
40_26_15_wathi, Ningandinika ntoni na, ndimnikele kuni? Bammisela ke amaqhosha esilivere amashumi mathathu.
40_26_16_Waza kwalapho wafuna ithuba elilungileyo lokuze amnikele kubo.
40_26_17_Ke kaloku, ngowokuqala umhla wezonka ezingenagwele, beza abafundi kuYesu, besithi kuye, Ufuna ukuba sikulungisele phi na ukuyidla ipasika?
40_26_18_Wathi ke yena, Hambani niye kuwo umzi, kuthile, nithi kuye, Uthi uMfundisi, ixesha lam likufuphi; ndiya kuyenzela kuwe ipasika nabafundi bam.
40_26_19_Abafundi benza ke ngoko uYesu abebayaleze ngako,  bayilungisa ipasika.
40_26_20_Kwakuhlwa ke, wahlala ngasesithebeni nabalishumi elinababini.
40_26_21_Xa badlayo, wathi, Inene ndithi kuni, Omnye kuni aba uya kundingcatsha.
40_26_22_Baza, bebuhlungu kakhulu, baqala ukuthi kuye bonke ngabanye, Ingaba ndim yini na, Nkosi?
40_26_23_Waphendula ke yena wathi, Osithe nkxu nam isandla esityeni, nguye lowo uya kundingcatsha.
40_26_24_UNyana woMntu uyemka okunene, njengoko kubhaliweyo ngaye.  Kodwa ke, yeha, loo mntu uNyana woMntu angcatshwa nguye!  Ngekumlungele ukuba ebengazalwanga loo mntu.
40_26_25_Waphendula ke uYuda, lowo wamngcatshayo, wathi, Ingaba ndim yini na, Rabhi? Athi yena kuye, Uselutshilo nawe.
40_26_26_Bakubon ukuba bayadla ke, uYesu wasithabatha isonka,  wathi akusikelela waqhekeza, wanika abafundi, wathi, Thabathani nidle; ngumzimba wam lo.
40_26_27_Wayithabatha nendebe, wabulela, wabanika, esithi, Selani kuyo nonke;
40_26_28_kuba ligazi lam eli lomnqophiso omtsha, eliphalala ngenxa yabaninzi, ukuze kuxolelwe izono.
40_26_29_Ndithi ke kuni, Andisayi kusela kwesi siqhamo somdiliya,  kuthabathela kweli xesha, kude kube yiloo mini sukuba ndisisela nani sisitsha ebukumka nini bukaBawo.
40_26_30_Bakuba bevume ingoma yokudumisa, baphuma baya eNtabeni yemiNquma.
40_26_31_Ngelo xesha uthi uYesu kubo, Nina nonke niya kukhubeka ngam ngobu busuku; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndiya kumbetha umalusi, zichithwachithwe izimvu zomhlambi.
40_26_32_Kodwa emveni kokuvuka kwam, ndiya kunandulela ndiye kwelaseGalili.
40_26_33_Waphendula ke uPetros wathi kuye, Nokuba bonke baya kukhubeka ngawe, andisayi kukha ndikhubeke mna.
40_26_34_Wathi uYesu kuye, Inene ndithi kuwe, Kwangobu busuku,  ingekalili inkuku, uya kundikhanyela kathathu.
40_26_35_Athi uPetros kuye, Ndingafanelana ndimelwe kukuba ndife nawe, andingekhe ndikukhanyele. Batsho nabo bonke abafundi.
40_26_36_Ngelo xesha, ufika uYesu nabo kumhlatyana ekuthiwa yiGetsemane; athi kubafundi, Hlalani phantsi apha, ndikhe ndiye kuthandaza phaya.
40_26_37_Wathabatha uPetros noonyana bobabini bakaZebhedi, waqala ukuba buhlungu nokudandatheka kakhulu.
40_26_38_Aze athi kubo, Umphefumlo wam ubuhlungu kakhulu, ngokokude ube sekufeni; hlalani apha nilinde nam.
40_26_39_Waza, ehambele phambili umganyana, wawa ngobuso bakhe,  wathandaza, esithi, Bawo, ukuba kunokwenzeka, mayidlule kum le ndebe; noko makungabi njengokuthanda kwam, makube njengokuthanda kwakho.
40_26_40_Uyeza kubafundi, abafumane belele, athi kuPetros, Ninje na ukungabi nako ukulinda nam nexa elinye?
40_26_41_Lindani nithandaze, ukuze ningangeni ekuhendweni; umoya wona okunene unentumekelelo, ke yona inyama ithambile.
40_26_42_Wabuya wemka okwesibini, wathandaza, esithi, Bawo, ukuba ayinako le ndebe ukudlula kum ndingathanga ndiyisele,  makwenzeke ukuthanda kwakho.
40_26_43_Afike abafumane bebuye balala, kuba amehlo abo ayenzima bubuthongo.
40_26_44_Wabashiya, wabuya wemka, wathandaza okwesithathu, ethetha kwalona elo lizwi.
40_26_45_Andule ukuza kubafundi bakhe, athi kubo, Lalani ngoku,  niphumle; yabonani, lisondele ilixa lokuba uNyana woMntu anikelwe ezandleni zaboni.
40_26_46_Vukani, sihambe; yabonani, usondele lowo undinikelayo.
40_26_47_Kuthe, esathetha, kwathi gqi uYuda, omnye wabalishumi elinababini; weza enendimbane enkulu inamakrele neentonga,  ivela kubabingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu abantu.
40_26_48_Ke kaloku, wayethe lowo umnikelayo wabanika umqondiso,  esithi, Endithe ndamanga, nguye lowo; mbambeni.
40_26_49_Wafika ke kwaoko kuYesu, wathi, Aa, Rabhi! Wamanga nokumanga.
40_26_50_Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Wethu! Ukho ngani na? Bandula ukuza,  bamsa izandla uYesu, bambamba.
40_26_51_Wesuka omnye wabo babenoYesu, wolula isandla, warhola ikrele lakhe, wamxabela umkhonzi wombingeleli omkhulu,  wamnqumla indlebe.
40_26_52_Aze athi uYesu kuye, Libuyisele endaweni yalo ikrele lakho; kuba bonke abathabatha ikrele baya kutshabalala likrele.
40_26_53_Uba andinako na ngoku ukumbongoza uBawo, andikhuphele imikhosi yezithunywa zezulu engaphezu kweshumi elinamibini?
40_26_54_Bezingathini na ke oko ukuzaliseka izibhalo ezithi, kumele ukuba kube nje?
40_26_55_Ngalo elo lixa wathi uYesu kwindimbane, Niphumele ukuza kubamba mna na, ninamakrele neentonga nje, ngathi niphumele isihange? Bendihleli nani imihla ngemihla, ndifundisa etempileni, anandibamba.
40_26_56_Oku ke konke kwenzeke, ukuze zizaliseke izibhalo zabaprofeti. Basuka bonke abafundi bamshiya, babaleka.
40_26_57_Abo ke bambambayo uYesu, bamrholela kuKayafa, umbingeleli omkhulu, apho babehlanganisene khona ababhali namadoda amakhulu.
40_26_58_Ke kaloku uPetros wayemlandela, ebekele kude, kwada kwaya entendelezweni yendlu yombingeleli omkhulu. Engene ngaphakathi,  wahlala phantsi namadindala, ukuba abone isiphelo.
40_26_59_Ke kaloku, baye ababingeleli abakhulu, namadoda amakhulu,  nentlanganiso yamatyala iphelele, befuna ubungqina obubuxoki ngoYesu, ukuze bambulale; ababufumananga;
40_26_60_nangona afikayo amangqina abuxoki aba maninzi,  ababufumananga. Ada ke afika amangqina abuxoki emabini,
40_26_61_athi, Lo wathi, Ndinako ukuyichitha itempile kaThixo,  ndibuye ndiyakhe ngeentsuku ezintathu.
40_26_62_Wesuka wema umbingeleli omkhulu, wathi kuye, Akuphenduli nto na? Bangqina ntoni na aba ngawe?
40_26_63_Wahlala yena uYesu wathi tu. Waphendula umbingeleli omkhulu wathi kuye, Ndikufungisa uThixo ophilileyo, ukuba usixelele ukuba unguye na uKristu, unyana kaThixo.
40_26_64_Athi uYesu kuye, Uselutshilo nawe. Ke ndithi kuni, Emveni koku niya kumbona uNyana woMntu, ehleli ngasekunene kwamandla,  esiza esemafini ezulu.
40_26_65_Waza umbingeleli omkhulu wazikrazula iingubo zakhe,  esithi, Unyelisile; sisawafunelani na amangqina? Yabonani,  ngoku nikuvile ukunyelisa kwakhe; nithini na nina?
40_26_66_Baphendula ke bona bathi, Unetyala lokuba afe.
40_26_67_Baza bamtshicela ebusweni, bamntlitha, abanye bammonxoza,
40_26_68_besithi, Siprofetele, wena Kristu; ubethwe ngubani na?
40_26_69_Ke kaloku uPetros wayehleli ngaphandle entendelezweni;  kweza kuye sicakazana sithile, sisithi, Nawe ubunaye uYesu lo waseGalili.
40_26_70_Wakhanyela ke yena phambi kwabo bonke, esithi, Andiyazi into oyithethayo.
40_26_71_Kuthe ke, ephume waya esangweni, sambona esinye; sithi kwababekhona, Naye lo ebenaye uYesu waseNazarete.
40_26_72_Waphinda wakhanyela efunga, esithi, Andimazi loo mntu.
