40_26_73_Kwathi ke kwakuba mzuzwana, beza abo babemi khona, bathi kuPetros, Inyaniso, nawe ungowabo; kuba nokuthetha kwakho kuyakudiza.
40_26_74_Waza waqala ukushwabula nokufunga, esithi, Andimazi loo mntu. Yasuka yalila kwaoko inkuku.
40_26_75_Walikhumbula uPetros ilizwi likaYesu, abelithethile kuye,  esithi, Ingekalili inkuku, uya kundikhanyela kathathu. Ephume phandle, walila ngokukrakra.
40_27_1_Kuthe ke kwakusa, babhunga bonke ababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu abantu ngaye uYesu, ukuba bambulale.
40_27_2_Bathi bakumbopha, bamrhola, bamnikela kuPontiyo Pilato,  irhuluneli.
40_27_3_Waza uYuda, lowo wamngcatshayo, ebone ukuba ugwetyiwe,  wazohlwaya, wawabuyisela kwakubabingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu loo maqhosha esilivere amashumi mathathu,
40_27_4_esithi, Ndonile, kuba ndingcatshe igazi elingenatyala.  Bathi ke bona, Iyini na kuthi loo nto? Zibonele wena.
40_27_5_Wawaphosa phantsi etempileni apho loo maqhosha esilivere,  wemka, waya wazixhoma.
40_27_6_Ke kaloku ababingeleli abakhulu bawathabatha loo maqhosha esilivere, bathi, Akuvumelekile ukuwagalela emkhombeni weminikelo, ngokokuba elinani legazi.
40_27_7_Babhunga ke, bathenga ngawo umhlaba wombumbi, ukuze ube yindawo yokungcwabela abasemzini.
40_27_8_Kungoko wabizwayo loo mhlaba ngokuba ngumhlaba wegazi,  kwada kwanamhlanje.
40_27_9_Kwazaliseka ke okwathethwayo ngoYeremiya umprofeti, esithi,  Bawathabatha loo maqhosha esilivere amashumi mathathu, inani lalowo wamiselwa inani, abammisela inani aboonyana bakaSirayeli,
40_27_10_bawarholela umhlaba wombumbi, njengoko yandiyalelayo iNkosi.
40_27_11_Wema ke uYesu phambi kwerhuluneli, yambuza irhuluneli isithi, Unguye na uKumkani wamaYuda? Wathi ke uYesu kuyo, Nawe utsho.
40_27_12_Ke kaloku ekumangalelweni kwakhe ngababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu, akaphendulanga nto.
40_27_13_Aze athi uPilato kuye, Akuziva na ukuba zininzi kwazo iindawo abazingqinayo ngawe?
40_27_14_Akaphendula zwi, noko lilinye, yada yamangaliswa kakhulu irhuluneli leyo.
40_27_15_Ke kaloku imithendeleko ngemithendeleko irhuluneli ibiqhele ukuzikhululela izihlwele umbanjwa abe mnye, lowo babesithi bamfune.
40_27_16_Baye ke ngelo xesha benombanjwa obesazeka, ekuthiwa nguBharabhas.
40_27_17_Bakubon ukuba ngoko bahlanganisene, wathi kubo uPilato,  Nithanda ukuba ndinikhululele wuphi na, uBharabhas, uYesu ekuthiwa nguKristu, kusini na?
40_27_18_Kuba ebesazi ukuba bamnikele ngomona.
40_27_19_Akubon ukuba uhleli esihlalweni sokugweba, umfazi wakhe wathumela kuye, esithi, Uze ungabi nakuthini kuloo mntu ulilungisa, kuba namhlanje ndive izinto ezininzi ezinzima ephupheni, ngenxa yakhe.
40_27_20_Kodwa ababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu bazeyisela izihlwele ekuthini zicele uBharabhas, zimtshabalalise uYesu.
40_27_21_Yaphendula ke irhuluneli yathi kubo, Nguwuphi na kwaba bobabini enithanda ukuba ndinikhululele yena? Bathe ke bona,  NguBharabhas.
40_27_22_Athi uPilato kubo, Ndimenzeni na ke uYesu ekuthiwa nguKristu? Bathi kuye bonke, Makabethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
40_27_23_Yathi ke irhuluneli, Kuba enze bubi buni na? Kwaba kukhona ke bancamisayo ukunkqangaza, besithi, Makabethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
40_27_24_Uthe ke uPilato, akubona ukuba akancedi lutho, ebona ukuba sisuke sangakumbi isiphithiphithi, wathabatha amanzi, wahlamba izandla phambi kwezihlwele, esithi, Andinatyala egazini lalo mntu ulilungisa; ziboneleni nina.
40_27_25_Baphendula bonke abantu bathi, Igazi lakhe malibe phezu kwethu, naphezu kwabantwana bethu.
40_27_26_Waza wabakhululela uBharabhas; wathi ke, emtyakatyile uYesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
40_27_27_Aza amasoldati erhuluneli amthabatha uYesu, amsa endlwini yerhuluneli, alihlanganisela phezu kwakhe ibutho lawo liphela.
40_27_28_Amhluba, amnxiba ingubo ebomvu.
40_27_29_Aluka isithsaba ngameva, amthi jize ngaso entloko; abeka nengcongolo esandleni sakhe sokunene, awa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, adlala ngaye, esithi, Aa! Kumkani wamaYuda!
40_27_30_Amtshicela, ayithabatha ingcongolo, ambetha entloko.
40_27_31_Athi, akuba edlale ngaye, amhluba ingubo leyo, amambathisa kwaezakhe iingubo; amrhola, aya kumbethelela emnqamlezweni.
40_27_32_Athe ke ekuphumeni, afumana umntu waseKirene, ogama linguSimon; anyanzela lowo ukuba awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe.
40_27_33_Athi akufika ndaweni kuthiwa yiGologota, oko kukuthi,  yindawo yokakayi,
40_27_34_amnika iviniga iphithikezwe nenyongo, ukuba asele; wathi akuyiva, akavuma ukuyisela.
40_27_35_Athi ke, akumbethelela emnqamlezweni, abelana ngeengubo zakhe, esenza amaqashiso, ukuze kuzaliseke okwathethwa ngumprofeti, esithi, Babelana ngeengubo zam, benza amaqashiso ngesambatho sam.
40_27_36_Ahlala phantsi, amlinda khona apho.
40_27_37_Babeka ngaphezu kwentloko yakhe ityala lakhe libhaliwe,  kwathiwa, lo nguYesu uKumkani wamaYuda.
40_27_38_Kwaza kwabethelelwa naye eminqamlezweni izihange ezibini,  esinye ngasekunene, nesinye ngasekhohlo.
40_27_39_Bamnyelisa ke bona abadlulayo, behlunguzela iintloko zabo,
40_27_40_besitsho ukuthi, Wena uchitha itempile, uyakhe ngeentsuku ezintathu, zisindise; ukuba unguNyana kaThixo, yihla emnqamlezweni.
40_27_41_Ngokukwanjalo ke nababingeleli abakhulu, bedlala ngaye,  benabo ababhali namadoda amakhulu, bathi,
40_27_42_Abanye wabasindisa; yena ngokwakhe akanakuzisindisa. Ukuba unguKumkani kaSirayeli, makehle kalokunje emnqamlezweni;  sokholwa nguye;
40_27_43_ukholose ngoThixo, makamhlangule kalokunje, ukuba uyamthanda; kuba wathi, NdinguNyana kaThixo.
40_27_44_Zaye ke nezihange, ezibe zibethelelwe eminqamlezweni naye,  zimngcikiva kwangokunjalo.
40_27_45_Kuthe ke, kuthabathele kwilixa lesithandathu, kwada kwesa kwilixa lesithoba, kwehla ubumnyama phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba.
40_27_46_Ke kaloku, malunga nelixa lesithoba, wadanduluka uYesu ngezwi elikhulu, esithi, Eli! Eli! Lama sabhaktani! Oko kukuthi, Thixo wam! Thixo wam! Undishiye ngani na?
40_27_47_Inxenye ke yababemi khona, yakuva, yathi, Lo mntu ubiza uEliya.
40_27_48_Wesuka wagidima kwaoko omnye kubo, wathabatha imfunxa,  wayizalisa ngeviniga, wayifaka engcongolweni, wamseza.
40_27_49_Bathe ke bona abanye, Khawuyeke, sibone ukuba uEliya uza kumsindisa na.
40_27_50_Uthe ke uYesu, ephinde wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu,  wawukhupha umoya wakhe.
40_27_51_Lasuka ikhuselo lengcwele lakrazuka kubini, lithabathele phezulu lada lesa phantsi; umhlaba wanyikima, namawa acandeka,
40_27_52_namangcwaba avuleka, zathi izidumbu ezininzi zabangcwele ababelele zavuka;
40_27_53_baphuma emangcwabeni emveni kokuvuka kwakhe, bangena kuwo umzi ongcwele, babonakala kuninzi.
40_27_54_Ke kaloku umthetheli-khulu, nabo babelinda uYesu naye,  bakubona ukunyikima oko, nezo zinto zenzekileyo, boyika kakhulu, besithi, Inyaniso, lo ebenguNyana kaThixo.
40_27_55_Kwaye kukho ke khona abafazi abaninzi, bekhangele bemgama,  bona babemlandele uYesu kwakwelaseGalili, bemlungiselela;
40_27_56_ekwakukho phakathi kwabo uMariya waseMagadala, noMariya unina wooYakobi noYose, kwanonina woonyana bakaZebhedi.
40_27_57_Kwathi ke kwakuhlwa, kweza umntu osisityebi waseArimati,  ogama linguYosefu, owayengumfundi kaYesu naye.
40_27_58_Yena lowo waya kuPilato, wacela umzimba kaYesu. Waza uPilato wathi makawunikelwe umzimba.
40_27_59_Ewuthabathile ke umzimba uYosefu, wawusongela kwilinen entle emhlophe.
40_27_60_Wawubeka kwelakhe ingcwaba elitsha, abelixhole eweni;  waqengqela ilitye elikhulu emnyango wengcwaba elo, wemka.
40_27_61_Baye ke bekhona apho uMariya waseMagadala nomnye uMariya,  behleli phantsi malunga nengcwaba.
40_27_62_Ke kaloku ngengomso, eliyimini esemva kwaleyo yokulungiselela, bahlanganisana ababingeleli abakhulu nabaFarisi kuPilato,
40_27_63_besithi, Nkosi, sikhumbule ukuba umlahlekisi lowa wathi esahleli, Emveni kweentsuku ezintathu, ndiya kuvuka.
40_27_64_Yitsho ngoko linqatyiswe ingcwaba, kude kube lusuku lwesithathu, hleze abafundi bakhe beze ebusuku, bambe, bathi ke ebantwini, Uvukile kwabafileyo; luze olokugqibela ulahlekiso lube lubi kunolokuqala.
40_27_65_Wathi ke uPilato kubo, Ninabo abalindi; hambani niye kunqabisa ngoko nazi ngako.
40_27_66_Baya ke bona balinqabisa ingcwaba, ngokulitywina ilitye,  bekunye nabalindi.
40_28_1_Ke kaloku, ekupheleni kwesabatha, ekuseni ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, kweza uMariya waseMagadala nomnye uMariya, beza kulikhangela ingcwaba.
40_28_2_Kwasuka kwabakho unyikimo olukhulu; kuba kwakuhle isithunywa seNkosi emazulwini, seza saliqengqa ilitye lesuka emnyango, sahlala phezu kwalo.
40_28_3_Ukubonakala kwaso ke kwaye kunjengombane, nesambatho saso saye simhlophe njengekhephu.
40_28_4_Ngokoyika sona ke bangcangcazela abalindi, baba njengabafileyo.
40_28_5_Saphendula ke isithunywa sathi kubafazi abo, Musani ukoyika nina; kuba ndiyazi ukuba nifuna uYesu, lowo ubebethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
40_28_6_Akakho apha; kuba uvukile, njengoko watshoyo; yizani niyibone indawo apho ibilele khona iNkosi.
40_28_7_Yiyani ngokukhawuleza, nibaxelele abafundi bakhe ukuthi uvukile kwabafileyo; niyabona, uyanandulela ukuya kwelaseGalili; nombona khona apho. Yabonani, ndinixelele.
40_28_8_Bephume kamsinya engcwabeni, benokoyika nokuvuya okukhulu,  bagidima baya kubabikela abafundi bakhe.
40_28_9_Ke kaloku, xa baya kubabikela abafundi bakhe, wathi thu uYesu, wabahlangabeza, esithi, Vuyani. Beza ke bambamba ngeenyawo, baqubuda kuye.
40_28_10_Aze athi uYesu kubo, Musani ukoyika; yiyani kubatyela abazalwana bam ukuba baye eGalili; bondibona khona apho.
40_28_11_Bakubon ukuba bayaya ke, kwesuka kwafika abathile babalindi kuwo umzi, bababikela ababingeleli abakhulu zonke izinto ezenzekileyo.
40_28_12_Bathe bona, bakuhlanganisana namadoda amakhulu,  bakubhunga, bawanika imali eninzi amasoldati lawo,
40_28_13_besithi, Ze nithi, Abafundi bakhe beza ngobusuku, bamba silele.
40_28_14_Nokuba ithe yavakala le nto kwirhuluneli, thina soyithomalalisa, senze ningabi naxhala nina.
40_28_15_Ayithabatha ke imali leyo, enza njengoko abexelelwe ngako.  Laza elo zwi laduma kumaYuda, kwada kwanamhlanje.
40_28_16_Bahamba ke abafundi abalishumi eli namnye, baya kwelaseGalili, kuloo ntaba wayebayalele yona uYesu.
40_28_17_Baza bakumbona baqubuda kuye; ke inxenye yathandabuza.
40_28_18_Weza uYesu wathetha kubo, esithi, Linikwe mna lonke igunya emazulwini nasehlabathini.
40_28_19_Hambani ngoko niye kuzenza abafundi zonke iintlanga,  nibabhaptizela egameni loYise, loNyana, loMoya oyiNgcwele;
40_28_20_nibafundisa ukuba bazigcine zonke izinto endiniwisele umthetho ngazo. Niyabona, mna ndinani yonke imihla, kude kube sekuphelisweni kwephakade eli. Amen.
41_1_1_Ukuqaleka kwayo ivangeli kaYesu Kristu, uNyana kaThixo.
41_1_2_Njengoko kubhaliweyo ebaprofetini, kwathiwa, Yabona, mna ndithuma umthunywa wam ngaphambi kobuso bakho, Oya kuyilungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.
41_1_3_Izwi lodandulukayo entlango, lisithi, Wulungiseni umendo weNkosi; Zityenenezeni iindlela zayo!
41_1_4_Kwaye kukho uYohane, ebhaptiza entlango, evakalisa ubhaptizo lwenguquko, ukuze kuxolelwe izono.
41_1_5_Laye liphuma lisiya kuye lonke ilizwe lakwaYuda nabaseYerusalem; baye bonke bebhaptizwa nguye eYordan emlanjeni, bezixela izono zabo.
41_1_6_Waye ke kaloku uYohane ambethe uboya benkamela, enombhinqo wentlonze esinqeni sakhe, abe ke esidla iinkumbi nobusi basendle.
41_1_7_Wayememeza esithi, Emva kwam kuza lowo unamandla kunam,  endingafanelekileyo ukuba ndithobe phantsi, ndiwuthukulule nomtya weembadada zakhe.
41_1_8_Mna okunene ndanibhaptiza ngamanzi, ke yena uya kunibhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
41_1_9_Kwathi ngaloo mihla kweza uYesu, evela eNazarete yelaseGalili, wabhaptizwa nguYohane eYordan apho.
41_1_10_Uthe kwaoko, akuba enyuka ephuma emanzini, walibona izulu likrazulwe, noMoya enjengehobe, esihla phezu kwakhe.
41_1_11_Kwabakho nezwi eliphuma ezulwini, lisithi, Wena unguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguye.
41_1_12_Uthi kwaoko uMoya amkhuphele entlango.
41_1_13_Waye esentlango apho iintsuku ezimashumi mane, ehendwa nguSathana; waye endawonye namarhamncwa; zaye izithunywa zezulu zimlungiselela.
41_1_14_Ke kaloku emveni kokufakwa kukaYohane entolongweni, weza uYesu kwelaseGalili, evakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bukaThixo,
41_1_15_esithi, Lizalisekile ixesha, nobukumkani bukaThixo busondele; guqukani, nikholwe kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi.
41_1_16_Uthe ke, ehamba ngaselwandle lwaseGalili, wabona uSimon,  noAndreya umzalwana wakhe, bephosa umnatha elwandle; ngokuba babengababambisi beentlanzi.
41_1_17_Wathi kubo uYesu, Yizani apha nindilandele; ndonenza nibe ngababambisi babantu.
41_1_18_Bayishiya kwaoko iminatha yabo, bamlandela.
41_1_19_Uhambele phambili kancinane esuka apho, wabona uYakobi, lo kaZebhedi, noYohane, umzalwana wakhe, besemkhombeni wabo,  beyilungisa iminatha yabo.
41_1_20_Wababiza kwaoko; bamshiya uyise uZebhedi emkhombeni enabaqeshwa, besuka bamlandela.
41_1_21_Bangena eKapernahum. Engene kwaoko ngesabatha endlwini yesikhungu, wafundisa.
41_1_22_Bakhwankqiswa kukufundisa kwakhe; ngokuba ebebafundisa njengonegunya, engafundisi njengabo ababhali.
41_1_23_Kwaye kukho endlwini yabo yesikhungu umntu onomoya ongcolileyo; wakhala,
41_1_24_esithi, Yoo! Yini na enathi nawe, Yesu waseNazarete? Uze kusitshabalalisa na? Ndiyakwazi wena, lowo unguye;  ungoyiNgcwele kaThixo.
41_1_25_Wawukhalimela uYesu, esithi, Yithi tu, uphume kuye.
41_1_26_Uthe umoya ongcolileyo wambetha wee xhwenene; wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, waphuma kuye.
41_1_27_Baqhiphuka umbilini bonke, ngokokude babuzisane, besithi,  Yintoni na le nto? Le mfundiso intsha yiyiphi na, le nto noomoya abangcolileyo aba abathethela ngegunya, bamlulamele?
41_1_28_Lwaphuma ke kwaoko udumo lwakhe; lwaya kuwo wonke ummandla welaseGalili.
41_1_29_Kwaoko, bakuphuma endlwini yesikhungu, bangena endlwini kaSimon noAndreya, benoYakobi noYohane.
41_1_30_Ke kaloku umkhwekazi kaSimon wayelele, esifa yicesina;  bamxelela ngaye kwaoko.
41_1_31_Weza ke kuye, wamvusa embambe ngesandla; yamyeka kwaoko icesina, wabalungiselela.
41_1_32_Ke kaloku, kwakuhlwa, xa litshonayo ilanga, bazisa kuye bonke ababesifa, nababephethwe ziidemon.
41_1_33_Waye umzi wonke uhlanganisene ndawonye emnyango apho.
41_1_34_Waphilisa babaninzi ababesifa zizifo ngezifo; wakhupha needemon ezininzi; waye engazivumeli iidemon ukuba zithethe,  kuba bezimazi.
41_1_35_Uthe kusasa, kusemnyama kakhulu, wavuka, waphuma waya endaweni eyintlango, wathandaza khona apho.
41_1_36_Bamphuthuma ooSimon nabo babenaye.
41_1_37_Bemfumene bathi kuye, Bonke bayakufuna.
41_1_38_Athi kubo, Masihambe siye emizini ekufuphi, ukuze nakhona ndivakalise iindaba ezilungileyo, kuba ndiphumele oko.
41_1_39_Wayevakalisa ke ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu kulo lonke elaseGalili, ezikhupha needemon.
41_1_40_Kweza kuye oneqhenqa, embongoza, esiwa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, esithi kuye, Ukuba uyathanda, unako ukundihlambulula.
41_1_41_UYesu, esikwe yimfesane ke, wasolula isandla, wamchukumisa,  wathi kuye, Ndiyathanda; hlambuluka.
41_1_42_Akutsho, lemka kwaoko kuye iqhenqa, wahlambuluka.
41_1_43_Akuba emyalile kalukhuni, wamkhupha kwaoko.
41_1_44_Athi kuye, Lumka ungaxeleli bani nento le; hamba uye kuzibonisa kumbingeleli, usondeze ngenxa yokuhlanjululwa kwakho ezo zinto wamisa zona uMoses, zibe bubungqina kubo.
41_1_45_Ke yena, akuphuma, waqala ukuyivakalisa kakhulu nokuyibhengeza loo ndawo, ngokokude angabi saba nako uYesu ukungena mzini ekuhleni; waba ngaphandle ezindaweni eziziintlango; babesithi beze kuye bevela ngeenxa zonke.
41_2_1_Kwakuba ntsuku, wabuya wangena eKapernahum; kwavakala ukuba usekhaya,
41_2_2_Kwaoko kwahlanganisana into eninzi yabantu, ngokokude kungabi sabakho kukhwelelana, nakule mimandla isemnyango;  wayelithetha ke kubo ilizwi.
41_2_3_Kuthi kufike kuye abantu bezisa onedumbe, ethwelwe ngabane.
41_2_4_Bakuba bengenakusondela kuye ngenxa yendimbane, banqika entungo apho abekhona; bakuba begqobhozile, baluhlisa ukhuko abelele kulo lowo unedumbe.
41_2_5_Akulubona ke uYesu ukholo lwabo, wathi konedumbe, Mntwana wam, uzixolelwe izono zakho.
41_2_6_Kwaye ke kukho apho ababhali abathile behleli, becamanga ezintliziyweni zabo, besithi,
41_2_7_Yini na ukuba lo enjenje ukuthetha izinyeliso? Ngubani na onako ukuxolela izono, mnye kwaphela, nguThixo?
41_2_8_Eqiqe kwaoko uYesu ngomoya wakhe, ukuba benjenjalo ukucamanga ngaphakathi kwabo, wathi kubo, Yini na ukuba nicamange ezi zinto ezintliziyweni zenu?
41_2_9_Okhona kulula kukuphi na: kukho ukuthi konedumbe, Uzixolelwe izono; kukho nokuthi, Vuka, uthabathe ukhuko lwakho, uhambe?
41_2_10_Ke ukuze nazi ukuba unalo igunya uNyana woMntu lokuxolela izono emhlabeni apha (uthi konedumbe),
41_2_11_Ndithi kuwe, Vuka, uthabathe ukhuko lwakho, uye endlwini yakho.
41_2_12_Wavuka kwaoko, waluthabatha ukhuko, waphuma phambi kwabo bonke, ngokokude bathi nqa bonke, bamzukise uThixo, besithi,  Asizanga sikubone okunje.
41_2_13_Wabuya waphuma waya ngaselwandle, saye sonke isihlwele sisiza kuye; wayebafundisa.
41_2_14_Wathi edlula, wabona uLevi, lo ka-Alifeyu, ehleli endaweni yerhafu; athi kuye, Ndilandele. Wesuka wamlandela.
41_2_15_Kwathi ekuhlaleni kwakhe ngasesithebeni endlwini yakhe,  kwahlala nento eninzi yababuthi berhafu naboni ndawonye noYesu nabafundi bakhe; kuba babebaninzi, baye ke bemlandela.
41_2_16_Baye ababhali kwanabaFarisi, bakumbona esidla ndawonye nababuthi berhafu naboni, besithi kubafundi bakhe. Yini na ukuba adle asele nababuthi berhafu naboni?
41_2_17_Ekuvile ke oko uYesu, wathi kubo, Akufuneki gqirha kwabaphili leyo lifuneka kwabafayo. Andize kubiza malungisa,  ndize kubiza aboni, ukuba baguquke.
41_2_18_Baye abafundi bakaYohane nababaFarisi bezila ukudla; beze bathi kuye, Kungani na ukuba abafundi bakaYohane nababaFarisi bazile ukudla, kanti ke abakho abafundi abakuzili bona?
41_2_19_Wathi uYesu kubo, Banako yini na abegumbi lomtshakazi ukuzila ukudla, xa anabo umyeni? Lo gama wonke asekubo umyeni,  abanako ukuzila ukudla.
41_2_20_Ke kofika mihla awoza asuswe kubo umyeni; baya kwandula ke ukuzila ngaloo mihla.
41_2_21_Akukho uthungela isiziba somchako omtsha engutyeni endala;  okanye ke eso sifakiweyo, sitsha, sokrazula kuyo endala, sibe sibi ngokunye isikroba.
41_2_22_Kanjalo akukho utha iwayini entsha ezintsubeni ezindala;  okanye iwayini, leyo intsha, yozigqabhuza iintsuba, iphalale iwayini, zitshabalale neentsuba; yona iwayini entsha imelwe kukuthiwa ezintsubeni ezintsha.
41_2_23_Kwathi ehamba ecanda emasimini ngesabatha, baqala abafundi bakhe ukuhamba besikha izikhwebu.
41_2_24_Baye besithi kuye abaFarisi, Khangela, yini na ukuba benze ngemini yesabatha oko kungavumelekileyo?
41_2_25_Wathi yena kubo; Anizanga niyilese na into awayenzayo uDavide, oko wayeswele, elambile nokulamba, yena nabo babenaye?
41_2_26_Okokuba wangena endlwini kaThixo ngexesha lika-Abhiyatare umbingeleli omkhulu, wazidla izonka ezibekwe phambi koThixo,  ezo kungavumelekileyo ukuba zidliwe ngabo bangebabingeleli,  wanika nabo babenaye?
41_2_27_Wayesithi kubo, Isabatha le yabakho ngenxa yomntu,  asingumntu owabakhoyo ngenxa yesabatha.
41_2_28_Ngoko ke uNyana woMntu lo uyiNkosi yayo nesabatha.
41_3_1_Wabuya wangena endlwini yesikhungu. Kwaye kukho apho umntu onesandla esomileyo.
41_3_2_Baye bemlalele, ukuba womphilisa na ngesabatha, ukuze bammangalele.
41_3_3_Athi kuloo mntu unesandla esomileyo, Phakama uze phakathi.
41_3_4_Athi kubo, Okuvumelekileyo ngesabatha kukwenza okulungileyo,  kukwenza okubi, kusini na? Kukusindisa, kukubulala, kusini na?  Ke bahlala bathi tu.
41_3_5_Akuba ebasingasingile ngengqumbo, ebuhlungu ngenxa yokuqaqadeka kwentliziyo yabo, uthi kumntu lowo, Solule isandla sakho. Wasolula, sabuya saphila ke isandla sakhe, saba kwanjengesinye.
41_3_6_Baphuma abaFarisi, benza kwaoko ibhunga namaHerode ngaye,  lokuba bamtshabalalise.
41_3_7_Wemka uYesu nabafundi bakhe, waya elwandle; yamlandela inkitha eninzi, ivela kwelaseGalili, nakwelakwaYuda,
41_3_8_naseYerusalem, nakwelakwaIdume, naphesheya kweYordan; nabo bangaseTire nabaseTsidon, inkitha eninzi; bathi, bakuva izinto ezinkulu abezenza, beza kuye.
41_3_9_Wathi kubafundi bakhe, umkhonjana mawuhlale umlindile ngenxa yezihlwele, ukuze bangamxini.
41_3_10_Kuba waphilisa babaninzi, ngokokude bathi ngunga phezu kwakhe, ukuze bamchukumise bonke ababenezibetho;
41_3_11_nabo oomoya abangcolileyo babesithi, xa sukuba bembona,  bawe phantsi kuye, bakhale, besithi, Unguye wena uNyana kaThixo.
41_3_12_Wayebakhalimela kakhulu ukuba bangamtyhili.
41_3_13_Uthi ke anyuke intaba, abizele kuye abo abethanda ukubabiza yena ngokwakhe; besuka beza kuye.
41_3_14_Wadala balishumi elinababini, ukuze babe naye, nokuze abathume baye kuvakalisa ubukumkani bukaThixo,
41_3_15_babe negunya lokuziphilisa izifo, nelokuzikhupha iidemon.
41_3_16_YanguSimon, awamthiya igama elinguPetros;
41_3_17_yanguYakobi lo kaZebhedi, noYohane umzalwana kaYakobi,  awathi bona wabathiya amagama okuba ngooBhowanerges, oko kukuthi, ngabeendudumo;
41_3_18_yanguAndreya, noFilipu, noBhartolomeyu, noMateyu, noTomas,  noYakobi, lo ka-Alifeyu, noTadeyu, noSimon Kanan,
41_3_19_noYuda Sikariyoti, owamngcatshayo nokumngcatsha.
41_3_20_Bathi beze ekhaya; kubuye kubuthelane izihlwele, ngokokude bangabi nako nokudla isonka.
41_3_21_Bevile abakowabo, baphuma beya kumbamba; kuba babesithi,  Uyageza.
41_3_22_Baye bona ababhali, ababehle bevela eYerusalem, besithi,  UnoBhelezebhule; besithi, Iidemon ezi uzikhupha ngaye umphathi weedemon.
41_3_23_Uthe ebabizele kuye, wathetha nabo ngemizekeliso, esithi,  Angathini na uSathana ukukhupha uSathana?
41_3_24_Nobukumkani, ukuba buthe bahlulelana bodwa, abunako ukuma obo bukumkani;
41_3_25_nendlu, ukuba ithe yahlulelana yodwa, ayinako ukuma loo ndlu;
41_3_26_noSathana, ukuba uthe wazichasa ngokwakhe, wahlulelana yedwa, akanako ukuma, uphelile.
41_3_27_Akukho unako ukuthi impahla yegorha angene endlwini yalo ayiphange, ukuba akathanga tanci alibophe igorha elo, andule ukuyiphanga indlu yalo.
41_3_28_Inene ndithi kuni, Zonke izono baya kuzixolelwa oonyana babantu, kwanezinyeliso abasukuba benyelisa ngazo;
41_3_29_ke yena othe wanyelisa uMoya oyiNgcwele, akanako ukuxolelwa naphakade; unetyala lokugwetywa okungunaphakade.
41_3_30_Watsho kuba besithi, Unomoya ongcolileyo.
41_3_31_Bafika ke kaloku abazalwana bakhe nonina; bathi, bemi ngaphandle, bathumela kuye bembiza.
41_3_32_Zaye izihlwele zihleli zimphahlile; bathi kuye, Nanku unyoko nabazalwana bakho ngaphandle, bekufuna.
41_3_33_Wabaphendula esithi, Ngubani na uma? Ngoobani na nabazalwana bam?
41_3_34_Akuba ebasingasingile ngeenxa zonke ababehleli bemphahlile,  uthi, Nanku uma nabazalwana bam.
41_3_35_Kuba othe wakwenza ukuthanda kukaThixo, lowo ngumzalwana wam, nodade wethu, noma.
41_4_1_Wabuya waqala ukufundisa ngaselwandle. Kwahlanganisana kuye isihlwele esikhulu, ngokokude aye kungena emkhombeni, ahlale elwandle yena; sabe sonke isihlwele sisemhlabeni, sibheke elwandle apho.
41_4_2_Wayebafundisa iindawo ezininzi ngemizekeliso. Ubesithi kubo ekubafundiseni kwakhe,
41_4_3_Phulaphulani; yabonani, umhlwayeli waphuma waya kuhlwayela;
41_4_4_kwathi ekuhlwayeleni kwakhe, inxalenye yembewu yawa ngasendleleni, zeza iintaka zezulu zayidla zayigqiba.
41_4_5_Enye yawa endaweni elulwalwa, apho ibingenamhlaba mninzi;  yantshula ke kwaoko, ngenxa yokuba ibingenabunzulu bamhlaba;
41_4_6_ithe ke, lakuphuma ilanga, yatsha, yathi ngenxa yokuba ingenangcambu, yoma kwaphela.
41_4_7_Yimbi yawa emithaneni enameva; yakhula imithana enameva yayiminxa; ayanika siqhamo.
41_4_8_Yimbi yawa kuwo wona umhlaba omhle, yanika isiqhamo esakhulayo sachuma; yathwala amashumi amathathu enye, namashumi amathandathu enye, nekhulu enye.
41_4_9_Wathi kubo, Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
41_4_10_Ke kaloku, xa abeyedwa, abo babemphahlile, ndawonye nabalishumi elinababini, bambuza umzekeliso lowo.
41_4_11_Wathi kubo, Nikuphiwe nina ukuyazi imfihlelo yobukumkani bukaThixo; ke kwabo bangaphandle zonke izinto ezi zibakho ngemizekeliso;
41_4_12_ukuze bebona nje, babone bangaqiqi; besiva nje, beve bangaqondi; hleze babuye, zebaxolelwe izono zabo.
41_4_13_Athi kubo, Aniwazi na lo mzekeliso? Nothini na ke ukuyazi imizekeliso yonke?
41_4_14_Umhlwayeli lo uhlwayela ilizwi.
41_4_15_Abo ke bangasendleni, apho ilizwi lihlwayelwa khona, ngaba kuthi, xa bathe beva, afike kwaoko uSathana, alithabathe ilizwi elihlwayelweyo ezintliziyweni zabo.
41_4_16_Ngokunjalo abo bahlwayelwayo ezindaweni ezilulwalwa ngabathi, xa bathe baliva ilizwi, balamkele kwaoko bevuya;
41_4_17_babe bengenangcambu ngaphakathi kwabo, beme umzuzwana kodwa; bathi kamva, kwakuhla imbandezelo, nokuba yintshutshiso,  ngenxa yelizwi, bakhutyekiswe kwaoko.
41_4_18_Abo bahlwayelwayo emithaneni enameva ngaba, bathi balive ilizwi;
41_4_19_aze amaxhala eli phakade, nokulukuhla kobutyebi, neenkanuko zezinye izinto, zingene ziliminxe ilizwi, lisuke lingabi nasiqhamo.
41_4_20_Abo bahlwayelweyo kuwo umhlaba omhle ngaba, basakuthi balive ilizwi, balamkele, baxakathe isiqhamo, omnye amashumi amathathu, omnye amashumi amathandathu, nomnye ikhulu.
41_4_21_Wayesithi kubo, Isibane esi sikha siziswe ukuze sibekwe ngaphantsi kwesitya yini na, nokuba kuphantsi kwesingqengqelo?  Asiziswa na ukuze sibekwe esiphathweni saso?
41_4_22_Kuba akukho nto ifihlakeleyo ingayi kubonakaliswa;  kananjalo akubangakho nto ifihliweyo ingafihlelwa ukuba ize ekuhleni.
41_4_23_Ukuba ubani uneendlebe zokuva, makeve.
41_4_24_Wayesithi kubo, Yilumkeleni into eniyivayo; umlinganiselo enilinganisela ngawo, niya kulinganiselwa ngawo nani, kongezwe kuni nina nivayo.
41_4_25_Kuba osukuba enako uya kunikwa, nongenako uya kuhluthwa kwanoko anako.
41_4_26_Wayesithi, Ubukumkani bukaThixo bunjengokuba abengathi umntu aphose imbewu emhlabeni;
41_4_27_aze alale, avuke, ubusuku nemini, ibe imbewu intshula ikhula ngohlobo angalwaziyo.
41_4_28_Kuba umhlaba uvelisa iziqhamo ngokwawo, kuqala ibe likhaba,  ize ibe sisikhwebu, ize ibe yingqolowa ezalisekileyo esikhwebini;
41_4_29_athi ke, xa sithe savuthwa isiqhamo, alifake kwaoko irhengqa, ngokuba kusekusondele ukuvuna.
41_4_30_Wayesithi, Siya kubufanekisa nantoni na ubukumkani bukaThixo? Siya kubuzekelisa ngamzekeliso mni na?
41_4_31_Bunjengokhozo lwemostade; lona luthi, xa sukuba luhlwayelwa emhlabeni, lube luloluncinane kuzo zonke iimbewu ezisemhlabeni;
41_4_32_luthi ke, xa luthe lwahlwayelwa, lukhule lube lukhulu kuyo yonke imifuno, lwenze amasebe amakhulu, ngokokude iintaka zezulu zibe nako ukuhlala phantsi komthunzi walo.
41_4_33_Wayelithetha kubo ilizwi ngemizekeliso emininzi enjalo,  njengoko baye benako ukuva.
41_4_34_Ubengathethi ke kubo kungengamzekeliso; ke ubesithi, bakuba bodwa, abacombululele iindawo zonke abafundi bakhe.
41_4_35_Athi kubo kwangaloo mini, kwakuhlwa, Masiwele siye ngaphesheya.
41_4_36_Besindulule isihlwele, bamthabatha esemkhombeni njalo;  kwaye ke kukho eminye imikhonjana inaye.
41_4_37_Kwabakho uqhwithela olukhulu lomoya; aye ke amaza ephoseka emkhombeni, abetha wafuna ukuzala kwangoku.
41_4_38_Waye yena esesinqeni somkhombe, elele ubuthongo phezu komqamelo; bamvuse, bathi kuye, Mfundisi, akukhathali na,  sitshabalala nje?
41_4_39_Wavuka, wawukhalimela umoya, wathi kulo ulwandle, Hlala uthi tu, uthi cwaka! Wadamba umoya, kwabakho ukuzola okukhulu.
41_4_40_Wathi kubo, Yini na ukuba nibe nje, ukuba ngamagwala?  Kutheni na, le nto ningenalukholo?
41_4_41_Boyika ngoloyiko olukhulu, batshono ukuthi, Ngubani na ke lo, le nto alulanyelwa nangumoya nalulwandle?
41_5_1_Bafika phesheya kolwandle kummandla wabaseGadara.
41_5_2_Akuba ephumile emkhombeni, wahlangatyezwa kwaoko ngumntu onomoya ongcolileyo, ephuma emangcwabeni,
41_5_3_obehlala emangcwabeni apho. Kwaye kungekho bani unako ukumbopha nangemixokelelwane;
41_5_4_ngenxa yokuba wayebotshwe futhi ngamakhamandela nangemixokelelwane, asuke ayijace yena imixokelelwane,  awakroboze namakhamandela; kwaye kungekho bani unamandla okumdambisa.
41_5_5_Ube ehlala ubusuku nemini esezintabeni nasemangcwabeni,  ekhala, ezijeca ngamatye.
41_5_6_Uthe ke akumbona UYesu ekude, wagidima, waya waqubuda kuye,
41_5_7_wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, wathi, Yini na enam nawe, Yesu,  Nyana kaThixo Osenyangweni? Ndiya kufungisa uThixo ukuba ungandithuthumbisi.
41_5_8_Kuba ebethe kuye, Phuma emntwini apho, moyandini ungcolileyo.
41_5_9_Wayembuza esithi, Ungubani na wena igama? Waphendula esithi,  NguMkhosi igama lam; kuba sibaninzi.
41_5_10_Waye ke embongoza kakhulu ukuba angabandululi bemke kwelo zwe.
41_5_11_Bekukho ke apho ngasezintabeni ugxuba olukhulu lweehagu lusidla.
41_5_12_Zambongoza zonke iidemon, zisithi, Sithumele ezihagwini,  ukuze singene kuzo.
41_5_13_Wazivumela kwaoko uYesu. Baphuma ke oomoya abangcolileyo,  baya kungena ezihagwini; lwaza ugxuba lwaphaphatheka, lwehla eweni, lwela elwandle; zaye ke iihagu ezo ngathi zimawaka mabini; zarhaxwa elwandle apho.
41_5_14_Bathe ke abo babezalusa iihagu basaba, babika ekhaya nasemaphandleni. Baphuma ke baya kuyibona loo nto ihlileyo,  ukuba iyintoni na.
41_5_15_Bafike kuYesu, bambone obephethwe ziidemon, lowo ke wayenomkhosi, ehleli, ambathisiwe, enengqondo ephilileyo; baza boyika.
41_5_16_Abo babeyibonile le nto babacokisela, ukuba kuthekeni na kobephethwe ziidemon; kwanokweehagu.
41_5_17_Baqala ukumbongoza ukuba emke emideni yabo.
41_5_18_Akubon ukuba ungene emkhombeni, wathi lowo ubephethwe ziidemon wambongoza ukuba abe naye.
41_5_19_Kodwa uYesu akamvumelanga. Usuke wathi kuye, Hamba, uye endlwini yakho kwabakowenu, ubabikele oko zingako ukuba zinkulu izinto ekwenzele zona iNkosi, yaba nenceba engaka kuwe.
41_5_20_Wemka, waqala ukuzivakalisa eDekapoli oko zingako ukuba zinkulu izinto uYesu abemenzele zona; bamangaliswa bonke.
41_5_21_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uYesu uwelile ngomkhombe, wabuya weza kwelinye icala, kwahlanganisana kuye isihlwele esikhulu;  waye engaselwandle apho.
41_5_22_Kubonakele kusiza omnye wakubaphathi bendlu yesikhungu,  ogama linguYayiro; athi akumbona, awe ezinyaweni zakhe,
41_5_23_ambongoze kunene, esithi, Intombazana yam isindekile;  khawuze uzibeke izandla phezu kwayo, ukuze isindiswe; yophila.
41_5_24_Wesuka wahamba naye; yaye indimbane enkulu imlandela,  imxinile.
41_5_25_Intokazi ethile, eyayinethombo legazi iminyaka elishumi elinamibini,
41_5_26_eyayive ubunzima obuninzi kumagqirha amaninzi, eyayidleke konke ebinako, ingasizakali lutho, imana ukuba mandundu:
41_5_27_yathi yakuva ngaye uYesu, yeza phakathi kwesihlwele ngasemva, yayichukumisa ingubo yakhe;
41_5_28_kuba ibisithi, Ukuba ndithe ndachukumisa neengubo zakhe ezi, ndosindiswa.
41_5_29_Watsha kwaoko umthombo wegazi layo; yeva emzimbeni wayo ukuba iphilisiwe kweso sibetho.
41_5_30_UYesu, ethe kwaoko wawazi ngaphakathi kwakhe amandla aphume kuye, wajika esendimbaneni, wathi, Ngubani na ochukumise iingubo zam?
41_5_31_Bathi kuye abafundi bakhe, Ubona nje ukuba isihlwele sikuxinile, utsho na ukuthi, Ngubani na ondichukumisileyo?
41_5_32_Wasingasinga, ukuba ambone lowo uyenzileyo le nto.
41_5_33_Ithe ke intokazi leyo, isoyika, igubha, ikwazi oko kwenzekileyo kuyo, yeza yawa phantsi kuye, yamxelela inyaniso yonke.
41_5_34_Wathi ke kuyo, Ntombi yam, ukholo lwakho lukusindisile;  hamba unoxolo, phila kweso sibetho sakho.
41_5_35_Kuthi esathetha yena, kufike abakulomphathi wendlu yesikhungu, besithi, Intombi yakho ifile; usamkhathazelani na uMfundisi?
41_5_36_Aze kwaoko uYesu, elivile elo zwi lithethwa, athi kumphathi wendlu yesikhungu, Musa ukoyika, kholwa kodwa wena.
41_5_37_Akavumela mntu ukuba alandelane naye, kwakuphela nguPetros noYakobi noYohane, umzalwana kaYakobi.
41_5_38_Afike endlwini yomphathi wendlu yesikhungu, abone isiphithiphithi, abalilayo nabenza isijwili esikhulu.
41_5_39_Akungena uthi kubo, Yini na ukuba niphithizele nilile?  Akafile umntwana, ulele.
41_5_40_Basuka bamwa ngentsini. Athi akubakhupha bona bonke,  amthabathe uyise womntwana nonina, nabo babenaye, angene apho wayelele khona umntwana.
41_5_41_Ambambe ngesandla umntwana, athi kuye, Talita, kumi; oko kukuthi, ngentetho evakalayo, Ntombazana, ndithi kuwe, Vuka!
41_5_42_Yavuka kwaoko intombazana leyo, yahambahamba; kuba ibiminyaka ilishumi elinamibini izelwe. Bathi nqa ngokuthi nqa okukhulu.
41_5_43_Wabayala kakhulu ukuba kungaziwa mntu oku; watsho nokuthi,  mayiphiwe idle.
41_6_1_Waphuma apho ke weza kwelakowabo; bamlandela abafundi bakhe.
41_6_2_Uthe kwakubakho isabatha, waqala ukufundisa endlwini yesikhungu; baza abaninzi, bakuva, bakhwankqiswa, besithi, Lo uzizuze phi na ezi zinto? Bubulumko buni na obu abunikiweyo, le nto nemisebenzi yamandla enjengale yenzekayo ngezandla zakhe?
41_6_3_Lo akayiyo na ingcibi yokwakha, unyana kaMariya, umzalwana ke kaYakobi noYose noYuda noSimon? Noodade babo abakuthi apha na? Baye bekhubeka kuye.
41_6_4_Wayesithi ke uYesu kubo, Umprofeti akasweli mbeko, kungaba kukowabo, nakwizizalwana zakhe, nakokwabo.
41_6_5_Wayengenako ukwenza na mnye umsebenzi wamandla khona apho,  kwakuphela ukubeka izandla phezu kwemilwelwe embalwa,  wayiphilisa.
41_6_6_Wamangaliswa kukungakholwa kwabo. Wayeyihambahamba imizana ejikeleza, efundisa.
41_6_7_Ubabizele kuye abalishumi elinababini, waqala ukubathuma ngababini, ngababini; wayebanika igunya koomoya abangcolileyo;
41_6_8_wabathethela ngelithi, mabangaphathi nto yandlela, ibe ngumsimelelo wodwa; bangaphathi ngxowa, nasonka, namali embhinqweni;
41_6_9_bathi kodwa banxibe izixathula; bangambathi neengubo zangaphantsi ngambini.
41_6_10_Wayesithi kubo, Apho nithe nangena endlwini, hlalani khona nide nimke kuloo ndawo.
41_6_11_Abo sukuba benganamkeli, benganiva nokuniva, nakuphuma kuloo ndawo, vuthululani uthuli oluphantsi kweenyawo zenu, kube bubungqina oko kubo. Inene ndithi kuni, Koba nokunyamezeleka okweSodom nokweGomora ngomhla womgwebo, kunokwaloo mzi.
41_6_12_Baphuma bavakalisa ukuba mabaguquke abantu.
41_6_13_Bakhupha needemon ezininzi, bayithambisa ngeoli imilwelwe emininzi, beyiphilisa.
41_6_14_Ke kaloku wakuva oko ukumkani uHerode (kuba igama lakhe lalithe laduma); wayesithi, Uvukile kwabafileyo uYohane umbhaptizi; ngenxa yoko le misebenzi yamandla iyenzeka ngaye.
41_6_15_Baye abanye besithi, NguEliya; baye ke abanye besithi,  Ngumprofeti, nokuba ufana nomnye wakubaprofeti.
41_6_16_Ekuvile ke oko uHerode, wathi, Lo nguYohane, lowa ndamnqamla intloko mna; uvukile kwabafileyo.
41_6_17_Kuba uHerode ngokwakhe wabethe wathuma, wambamba uYohane,  wambopha entolongweni, ngenxa kaHerodiya, umfazi kaFilipu umzalwana wakhe; kuba ebemzekile.
41_6_18_Kuba wayesithi uYohane kuHerode, Akuvumelekile ukuba ube nomfazi womzalwana wakho.
41_6_19_Ke kaloku uHerodiya waba nenqala ngakuye, wafuna ukumbulala; kodwa akabanga nako;
41_6_20_kuba uHerode wayemoyika uYohane, emazi ukuba uyindoda elilungisa, engcwele, wayemgcinile; wayesithi ke akumva, enze iindawo ezininzi, amve kamnandi.
41_6_21_Kwathi, kwakufika umhla owamlungelayo uHerodiya, xeshikweni uHerode ngemini yokuzalwa kwakhe wayezenzela isidlo izidwangube zakhe, nabathetheli-waka, namanene elaseGalili,
41_6_22_yakubon ukuba ingene intombi kaHerodiya lowo, yangqungqa,  yamkholisa uHerode nabo babehleli ndawonye naye. Wathi ukumkani kwintombazana leyo, Ndicele into osukuba uyithanda; ndokupha.
41_6_23_Wayifungela ngelithi, Into othe wayicela kum ndokupha, kude kube kwisiqingatha sobukumkani bam.
41_6_24_Iphumile ke yathi kunina, Ndicele ntoni na? Wathi ke yena,  Intloko kaYohane umbhaptizi.
41_6_25_Yeza kungena kwaoko ngokungxama kuye ukumkani, yacela,  isithi, Ndithanda ukuba undinike kalokunje ngesitya intloko kaYohane umbhaptizi.
41_6_26_Waba buhlungu kakhulu ukumkani; noko, ngenxa yezifungo zakhe, nangenxa yabo babehleli ndawonye naye, akathandanga kuyilandulela.
41_6_27_Uthe kwaoko ukumkani wasusa umsiki, wamthethela ngelithi,  mayiziswe intloko yakhe. Wesuka waya ke lowo, wamnqumla intloko entolongweni.
41_6_28_Wayizisa intloko yakhe ngesitya, wayinika intombazana leyo;  yaza intombazana yayinika unina.
41_6_29_Bekuvile oko abafundi bakhe, beza basithabatha isidumbu sakhe, basibeka engcwabeni.
41_6_30_Bathi bahlanganisana abapostile kuYesu, bambikela iinto zonke, ezo babezenzile, kwanezo babezifundisile.
41_6_31_Wathi kubo, Yizani nina ngasese kwindawo eyintlango,  niphumle kancinane; kuba bebaninzi abezayo nabemkayo;  babengenalo ke nethutyana lokuba badle.
41_6_32_Bemka ngomkhombe ngasese, baya kwindawo eyintlango.
41_6_33_Isihlwele sababona bemka bathi abaninzi bamazi, babalekela khona ngeenyawo, bevela kuyo yonke imizi; babaphangela,  bathuthelana kuye.
41_6_34_Uthe ke akuphuma uYesu, wabona isihlwele esikhulu; wasikwa yimfesane ngabo, ngokuba babenjengezimvu ezingenamalusi; waqala ukubafundisa iindawo ezininzi.
41_6_35_Kuthi kwakubon ukuba seyihambile kakhulu imini, beze kuye abafundi bakhe, bathi, Le ndawo iyintlango, nemini seyihambile kakhulu;
41_6_36_bandulule bemke, baye emaphandleni ajikelezileyo nasemizaneni, bazithengele izonka; kuba bengenanto bangayidlayo.
41_6_37_Waphendula wathi kubo, Bapheni nina badle. Bathi kuye,  Simke na siye kuthenga izonka ngeedenariyo ezimakhulu mabini,  sibaphe badle?
41_6_38_Uthi ke yena kubo, Izonka eninazo zingaphi na? Hambani niye kukhangela. Besazi, bathi, Zihlanu, neentlanzi ezimbini.
41_6_39_Wabathethela ngelithi, mababangqengqise bonke, babe ziziqhu ngeziqhu engceni eluhlaza.
41_6_40_Bahlala phantsi beziingcamba ngeengcamba ngamakhulu,  nangamashumi ngamahlanu.
41_6_41_Wazithabatha izonka zozihlanu neentlanzi zombini, wathi ekhangele ezulwini wasikelela, waziqhekeza izonka, wanika abafundi bakhe, ukuba babeke phambi kwabo; wathi neentlanzi zombini wazabela bona bonke.
41_6_42_Badla ke bonke bahlutha.
41_6_43_Baza basusa izitya zizele ngamaqhekeza zalishumi elinazibini, basusa nakwiintlanzi.
41_6_44_Baye abo babezidla izonka ezo bekumawaka omahlanu amadoda.
41_6_45_Wabanyanzela kwaoko abafundi bakhe ukuba bangene emkhombeni, bamandulele baye ngaphesheya eBhetesayida, lo gama asindululayo isihlwele yena.
41_6_46_Akuba ebulisene nabo, wemka waya kuthandaza entabeni.
41_6_47_Ke kaloku, kwakuhlwa, umkhombe ubuphakathi elwandle, waye yena eyedwa emhlabeni.
41_6_48_Wababona bebulaleka ekuqhubeni; kuba umoya ububavele ngaphambili. Athi ngolwesine ulindo lobusuku eze kubo, ehamba phezu kolwandle; wanga uza kugqitha kubo.
41_6_49_Bathi ke, bakumbona ehamba phezu kolwandle, baba ngumshologu, bakhala;
41_6_50_kuba bonke bambona, bakhathazeka. Wathetha kwaoko nabo,  wathi kubo, Yomelelani; ndim; musani ukoyika.
41_6_51_Wenyuka waya kubo emkhombeni, wadamba umoya. Bathi nqa ngaphakathi kwabo ngokuncamisileyo kunene, bamangaliswa;
41_6_52_kuba bengakuqondanga okwezonka; kuba intliziyo yabo yabe iqaqadekile.
41_6_53_Bakuphumela, bafika ezweni laseGenesarete, batsalela elunxwemeni.
41_6_54_Bakuphuma emkhombeni, bamazi kwaoko abantu;
41_6_55_bawubaleka wonke loo mmandla, baqala ukubathwala ngeenkuko abafayo, bebasa apho babemva ukuba ukhona.
41_6_56_Nalapho sukuba ebengena khona, nokuba kusemzaneni, nokuba kusemzini, nokuba kusemaphandleni, babesithi, bababeke abafayo ezindaweni zembutho, bambongoze ukuba khe bachukumise intshinga yengubo yakhe. Baye ke besindiswa abasukuba bemchukumisa.
41_7_1_Kwahlanganisana kuye abaFarisi, nabathile kubabhali, bevela eYerusalem;
41_7_2_bathi, bakubona abathile kubafundi bakhe besidla isonka ngezandla eziziinqambi, oko kukuthi ngezingahlanjwanga, basuka basola.
41_7_3_Kuba abaFarisi namaYuda onke abadli, ukuba abakhanga bazihlambe izandla kunene, bebambe isithethe samanyange.
41_7_4_Nokuba bavela endaweni yembutho, abadli bengakhanga bahlambe; zikho nezinye izinto ezininzi, abazamkele ukuba bazibambe, ezinjengeentlambo zeendebe, neebhekile, nezitya zobhedu, nezingqengqelo.
41_7_5_Bandula bambuza abaFarisi nababhali, besithi, Kungani na ukuba abafundi bakho bangahambi ngokwesithethe samanyange, le nto badla isonka ngezandla ezingahlanjwanga?
41_7_6_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Watyapha uIsaya ukuprofeta ngani,  bahanahanisi, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Aba bantu bandibeka ngomlomo, Kanti yona intliziyo yabo ikude lee kum.
41_7_7_Bafumana ke bendihlonela, Befundisa iimfundiso eziyimithetho yabantu.
41_7_8_Kuba nithi, niwuyeka okaThixo umthetho, nibambe isithethe sabantu esinjengeentlambo zeebhekile neendebe; naye nizenza nezinye izinto ezininzi ezinjengezo.
41_7_9_Wayesithi kubo, Natyapha kambe niwutshitshise umthetho kaThixo, ukuze nisigcine isithethe senu.
41_7_10_Kuba uMoses wathi, Beka uyihlo nonyoko; wathi kanjalo,  Omthethela kakubi uyise, nokuba ngunina, makafe ukufa;
41_7_11_ke nina nithi, Ukuba umntu uthe kuyise nokuba kukunina,  Ingumsondezo, oko kukuthi, ingumnikelo kuThixo into ongewuba uncedwa ngayo ndim, ukholisile;
41_7_12_ningabi samvumela ukuba amenzele nto, nokuba nguyise nokuba ngunina;
41_7_13_niliphanga igunya ilizwi likaThixo ngesithethe senu enasinikelayo, naye nizenza izinto ezininzi ezinjengezo.
41_7_14_Wayibizela kuye yonke indimbane, wathi kubo, Phulaphulani kum nonke, niqonde:
41_7_15_akukho nto ingaphandle komntu ethi ingena kuye ibe nako ukumenza inqambi; zizinto eziphumayo kuye ezimenza inqambi umntu.
41_7_16_Ukuba ubani uneendlebe zokuva, makeve.
41_7_17_Baye ke, xa ebengene endlwini, evela kuyo indimbane,  bembuza abafundi bakhe umzekeliso lowo.
41_7_18_Athi kubo, Nikwanje nani na ukuswela ingqondo? Aniqiqi na,  ukuba konke okungaphandle, okuthi kungene emntwini, akunako ukumenza inqambi?
41_7_19_Ngokuba akungeni khona entliziyweni yakhe; kungena esiswini; ize kuphume kuye endaweni esese, ezihlambululayo zonke izidlo.
41_7_20_Wayesithi ke, Into ephumayo emntwini, yiyo leyo emenza inqambi umntu;
41_7_21_kuba ngaphakathi, kuyo intliziyo yomntu, kuphuma izicamango ezibi, ookukrexeza, oomibulo, ookubulala,
41_7_22_oobusela, ookubawa, okungendawo, iinkohliso, uburheletyo,  umona, ukunyelisa, ukukratsha, ukuswela kuqonda;
41_7_23_zonke ezi zinto zingendawo ziphuma ngaphakathi, zimenze inqambi umntu.
41_7_24_Esukile apho ke, waya emideni yaseTire neyaseTsidon.  Wangena endlwini, wanga akungaziwa mntu; akaba nako ukufihlakala noko.
41_7_25_Kuba yathi yakumva intokazi entombazana ibinomoya ongcolileyo, yafika yawa ezinyaweni zakhe;
41_7_26_yaye ke kaloku intokazi leyo ingumGrikekazi,  umSirofenikikazi ngokuzalwa. Yacela kuye ukuba ayikhuphe idemon entombini yayo.
41_7_27_Uthe ke uYesu kuyo, Khawuyeke kuhluthe abantwana kuqala;  kuba akukuhle ukusithabatha isonka sabantwana, siphoswe ezinjaneni.
41_7_28_Yaphendula ke yathi kuye, Ewe, Nkosi; kuba nazo iinjana phantsi kwetafile zidla kwiimvuthuluka zabantwana.
41_7_29_Wathi kuyo, Ngenxa yelo zwi, hamba; idemon iphumile entombini yakho.
41_7_30_Yesuka yaya endlwini yayo, yafumana iphumile idemon,  intombi ilele phezu kwesi ngqengqelo.
41_7_31_Uthe wabuya waphuma emideni yaseTire neyaseTsidon, weza kulwandle lwaseGalili, ecanda phakathi kwemida yaseDekapoli.
41_7_32_Bazisa ke isithulu esithintithayo, bambongoza ukuba abeke isandla phezu kwaso.
41_7_33_Wasishenxisa esihlweleni sasodwa, wafaka iminwe yakhe ezindlebeni zaso, wathi etshicile, wachukumisa ulwimi lwaso,
41_7_34_wakhangela ezulwini, wancwina, wathi kuso, Efata, oko kukuthi, Vuleka.
41_7_35_Zavuleka kwaoko iindlebe zaso, zacombuluka iingqambu zolwimi lwaso, sathetha salungisa.
41_7_36_Wabayala ukuba mabangaxeleli bani; kodwa okukhona wabayalayo, kwaba kukhona bakuvakalisa ngakumbi.
41_7_37_Bakhwankqiswa ngokuncamisileyo kanye, besithi, Uzenze iinto zonke kakuhle; uzenza nezithulu zive, nabangenakuthetha bathethe.
41_8_1_Ngaloo mihla, sakuba sikhulu kakhulu isihlwele, singenanto singayidlayo, wababizela kuye abafundi bakhe uYesu, athi kubo,
41_8_2_Ndisikwa yimfesane ngenxa yesihlwele; ngokuba sekuntsuku ntathu behleli nam, bengenanto bangayidlayo;
41_8_3_ukuba ndithe ndabandulula baya emakhayeni abo bengadlanga,  botyhafa endleleni; kuba inxenye yabo ivela kude.
41_8_4_Bamphendula abafundi bakhe, besithi, Wokuzuza phi na umntu ukuba nako ukubahluthisa aba ngezonka, entlango apha?
41_8_5_Wayebabuza esithi, Zingaphi na izonka eninazo? Bathi ke bona, Zisixhenxe.
41_8_6_Wasithethela isihlwele ukuba sihlale phantsi emhlabeni.  Wazithabatha izonka zosixhenxe, wabulela, waqhekeza, wanika abafundi bakhe, ukuze babeke phambi kwabo; babeka ke phambi kwaso isihlwele.
41_8_7_Baye beneentlanzana ezimbalwa; akuba esikelele, wathi mazibekwe phambi kwabo nazo.
41_8_8_Badla ke bahlutha; basusa amaqhekeza aseleyo, iingobozi zasixhenxe.
41_8_9_Ke kaloku abo babesidla ngathi babemawaka mane; wabandulula.
41_8_10_Wangena kwaoko emkhombeni, nabafundi bakhe, weza emacaleni aseDalmanuta.
41_8_11_Baphuma abaFarisi baqala ukubuzana naye, befuna kuye umqondiso ovela emazulwini, bemlinga.
41_8_12_Encwinile kanzulu ngomoya wakhe, athi, Yini na ukuba esi sizukulwana singxamele umqondiso? Inene ndithi kuni, Unakanye ukuba sinikwe umqondiso esi sizukulwana singxamele umqondiso?  Inene ndithi kuni, Unakanye ukuba sinikwe umqondiso esi sizukulwana.
41_8_13_Wabashiya, wabuya wangena emkhombeni, wemka waya ngaphesheya.
41_8_14_Baye belibele ukuphatha izonka; babengenanto banayo emkhombeni, ngaphandle kwesonka esinye.
41_8_15_Wabayala esithi, Ligqaleni, nililumkele, igwele labaFarisi,  negwele likaHerode.
41_8_16_Baye becamanga besitshono ukuthi, Kungokuba singenazonka.
41_8_17_Ekwazi oko uYesu, athi kubo, Yini na ukuba nicamange,  ngokuba ningenazonka? Anikaqiqi na, anikaqondi na?  Isaqaqadekile na intliziyo yenu?
41_8_18_Ninamehlo nje, aniboni na? Nineendlebe nje, aniva na?  Anikhumbuli na?
41_8_19_Okuya ndaqhekezela amawaka amahlanu izonka ezihlanu, zaye zingaphi na izitya ezizele ngamaqhekeza enazisusayo? Bathi kuye, Zazilishumi elinazibini.
41_8_20_Okuya ke ezisixhenxe ndaziqhekezela amawaka amane,  zazingaphi na iingobozi zizele ngamaqhekeza enazisusayo? Bathi ke, Zazisixhenxe.
41_8_21_Wayesithi kubo, Phofu yini na ukuba ningaqondi?
41_8_22_Uthi aze kufika eBhetesayida; bazise imfama kuye,  bambongoze ukuba ayichukumise.
41_8_23_Uthe, eyibambe ngesandla imfama, wayirholela ngaphandle komzi; watshica emehlweni ayo, wabeka izandla phezu kwayo,  wayibuza ukuba ibona nto na?
41_8_24_Yaza yakhangela phezulu yathi, Ndiyababona abantu; kuba ndibanakana behamba, ngathi yimithi.
41_8_25_Wabuya wazibeka izandla phezu kwamehlo ayo, wayikhangelisa phezulu; yabuya yaphila, yababona bonke kakuhle.
41_8_26_Uthi ayithumele endlwini yayo, esithi, Uze ungangeni kuwo umzi, ungathethi nakubani kuwo umzi.
41_8_27_Waphuma uYesu nabafundi bakhe, waya emizini yaseKesareya kaFilipu; waye endleleni ebabuza abafundi bakhe, esithi kubo,  Kuthiwa ngabantu ndingubani na mna?
41_8_28_Baphendula ke bona ngokuthi, Bathi unguYohane umbhaptizi;  abanye bathi unguEliya; bambi ke bathi ungomnye wabaprofeti.
41_8_29_Athi yena kubo, Ke nina nithi ndingubani na? Aphendule ke uPetros athi kuye, Wena unguye uKristu.
41_8_30_Wabakhalimela ukuba bangaxeleli bani ngaye.
41_8_31_Waqala ukubafundisa, okokuba uNyana woMntu umelwe kukuba eve ubunzima obukhulu, alahlwe ngawo amadoda amakhulu nababingeleli abakhulu nababhali, abulawe, athi emveni kweentsuku ezintathu abuye avuke.
41_8_32_Elo zwi wayelithetha ngokungafihlisiyo. UPetros wamthabathela kuye, waqala ukumkhalimela.
41_8_33_Uthe ke yena, ejikile, wabakhangela abafundi bakhe,  wamkhalimela uPetros, esithi, Suka uye emva kwam, Sathana;  ngokuba ungazinyamekeli ezikaThixo izinto, unyamekele ezabantu.
41_8_34_Esibizele kuye isihlwele, kwanabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo,  Osukuba ethanda ukundilandela, makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele ke.
41_8_35_Kuba othe wathanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe,  wolahlekelwa nguwo; ke yena othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi, wowusindisa.
41_8_36_Kuba komnceda ntoni na umntu, ukuba uthe walizuza ihlabathi liphela, waza wonakalelwa ngumphefumlo wakhe?
41_8_37_Okanye worhola ntoni na umntu, ibe sisananelo somphefumlo wakhe?
41_8_38_Kuba othe waneentloni ngam nangamazwi am, kwesi sizukulwana sikrexezayo, sonayo, naye uNyana woMntu woba neentloni ngaye,  xa athe weza esebuqaqawulini boYise, enezithunywa ezingcwele.
41_9_1_Wayesithi kubo, Inene ndithi kuni, Kukho abathile kwabemiyo apha, abangayi kukha beve kufa bona, bade babubone ubukumkani bukaThixo busiza ngamandla.
41_9_2_Uthi uYesu, emveni kweentsuku ezintandathu, athabathe uPetros noYakobi noYohane, abanyuse baye entabeni ende ngasese,  bebodwa. Waza wenziwa wakumila kumbi phambi kwabo.
41_9_3_Zasuka neengubo zakhe zabengezela, zamhlophe kunene njengekhephu, ekungekho mchazi wangubo emhlabeni apha unako ukuzenza mhlophe kangako.
41_9_4_Kwabonakala kubo uEliya enoMoses; baye bethetha noYesu.
41_9_5_Uthi aphendule uPetros athi kuYesu, Rabhi, kuhle ukuba sibe lapha; masenze iminquba ibe mithathu, omnye ube ngowakho, omnye ube ngokaMoses, omnye ube ngokaEliya.
41_9_6_Kuba ubengayazi into abengayithethayo; kuba bebesoyika kakhulu.
41_9_7_Kwabakho ilifu elibenzela ithinzi; kweza nezwi liphuma efini apho, lisithi, Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda; mveni yena.
41_9_8_Bakuthi ukusingasinga, ababa sabona mntu, babona selinguYesu yedwa onabo.
41_9_9_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayehla entabeni apho, wabayala ukuba bangazityeli bani ezo zinto bazibonileyo, kungaba kude kube kuxa athe wavuka kwabafileyo uNyana woMntu.
41_9_10_Elo zwi balibamba lakubo bodwa bebuzana ukuba ukuvuka kubo abafileyo kukuthini na.
41_9_11_Baye bembuza besithi, Bathini na ababhali, ukuthi uEliya umelwe kukufika tanci?
41_9_12_Uphendule ke wathi kubo, UEliya okunene, efike tanci,  wobuya azimise zonke izinto; wabaxelela nokokuba kuthiweni na ukubhalwa ngaye uNyana woMntu, ukuba ufanele ukuva ubunzima obukhulu, enziwe into engento yanto.
41_9_13_Ke ndithi kuni, Ufikile uEliya, baza benza kuye konke abakuthandayo, kwanjengoko kubhaliweyo ngaye.
41_9_14_Akufika kubafundi, wabona isihlwele esikhulu sibaphahlile,  nababhali bebuzana nabo.
41_9_15_Sathi kwaoko sonke isihlwele sakumbona saqhiphuka umbilini;  beza kuye ngokubaleka, bambulisa.
41_9_16_Wababuza ababhali, esithi, Nibuzana ntoni na nabo?
41_9_17_Waphendula omnye wasesihlweleni wathi, Mfundisi, bendizise unyana wam kuwe, enomoya ongathethiyo;
41_9_18_apho uthe wamqubula khona, uyamntlala, aze alephuze amagwebu, atshixize amazinyo akhe, asuke ome; ndithethe kubafundi bakho ukuba bawukhuphe; bakhohlwa.
41_9_19_Amphendule ke yena athi, Sizukulwanandini singakholwayo,  koda kube nini na ndikuni? Koda kube nini na ndininyamezele?  Mziseni kum.
41_9_20_Bamzisa kuye. Akumbona, wesuka kwaoko umoya, wambetha wee xhwenene; wawa emhlabeni, wamana eqikaqikeka, elephuza amagwebu.
41_9_21_Wabuza kuyise, ukuba kumgama ungakanani na imhlile le nto.  Wathi ke yena, Kwaesengumntwana;
41_9_22_umphose futhi emlilweni, kwanasemanzini, ukuba umtshabalalise; ukuba unako ukwenza into, sisize, usikwe yimfesane sithi.
41_9_23_Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Ewe, ukuba unokukholwa! Zonke izinto zinokwenzeka kuye okholwayo.
41_9_24_Wakhala kwaoko uyise womntwana lowo, wathi eneenyembezi,  Ndiyakholwa, Nkosi; siza, ususe ukungakholwa kwam.
41_9_25_Uthe ke uYesu, ebone ukuba isihlwele sibalekela ndaweni-nye, wawukhalimela umoya ongcolileyo, esithi kuwo,  Moyandini ungathethiyo usithulu, mna ndiyakuthethela, phuma kuye, ungabi sangena kuye.
41_9_26_Wakhala wona, wambetha wee xhwenene kunene, waphuma; waba njengofileyo, bada abaninzi bathi, Ufile.
41_9_27_Uthe ke uYesu wambamba ngesandla, wamvusa; wesuka wema.
41_9_28_Eye kungena endlwini, bambuza abafundi bakhe ngasese,  besithi, Yayiyini na ukuba singabi nako ukuwukhupha thina?
41_9_29_Wathi kubo, Olu lona uhlobo alunako ukuphuma nganto,  kungengako ukuthandaza nokuzila ukudla.
41_9_30_Bephumile apho, babehamba becanda kwelaseGalili;  wayengathandi ukuba kwazi bani;
41_9_31_kuba wayebafundisa abafundi bakhe, esithi kubo, UNyana woMntu unikelwa ezandleni zabantu; baya kumbulala; uya kuthi ebulewe, abuye avuke ngomhla wesithathu.
41_9_32_Baye bengakuqondi oko kuthetha; baye besoyika nokumbuza.
41_9_33_Weza kufika eKapernahum. Akuba esekhaya, wayebabuza esithi,  Nibe nicamanga ntoni na phakathi kwenu endleleni?
41_9_34_Bahlala ke bathi tu; kuba endleleni babephikisene ngokuthi,  Ngubani na omkhulu kunabanye?
41_9_35_Akuba ehleli phantsi, wababiza abalishumi elinababini,  wathi kubo, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukuba ngowokuqala, woba ngowokugqibela kwabo bonke, nomlungiseleli wabo bonke.
41_9_36_Uthabathe umntwana, wammisa phakathi kwabo; emwolile, wathi kubo,
41_9_37_Othe wamkela noko amnye wabantwana abanje, egameni lam,  wamkela mna; nothe wamkela mna, akamkeli mna, wamkela lowo wandithumayo.
41_9_38_Ke kaloku uYohane wamphendula, esithi, Mfundisi, sabona umntu ekhupha iidemon egameni lakho, ongasilandeliyo thina;  samalela ke, ngokuba engasilandeli thina.
41_9_39_Wathi ke uYesu, Musani ukumalela; kuba akukho namnye uya kwenza umsebenzi wamandla egameni lam, aze ahle abe nako ukuthetha kakubi ngam.
41_9_40_Kuba ongachaseneyo nathi, ungecala lethu.
41_9_41_Kuba othe waniseza nendebe le yamanzi egameni lam, ngokuba ningabakaKristu, inene ndithi kuni, akasayi kuphulukana nomvuzo wakhe.
41_9_42_Nothe wakhubekisa noko amnye wabancinane abakholwayo kum,  ngekumlungele kanye ukuba ubegangxwe ilitye lokusila entanyeni yakhe, waphoswa elwandle.
41_9_43_Nokuba ke isandla sakho sithe sakukhubekisa, sinqamle sona;  kukulungele kanye ukuba ungene ebomini usisilima, kunokuba uthi, unezandla zozibini, umke uye esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo,
41_9_44_apho kumpethu ingafiyo, kumlilo ungacinywayo.
41_9_45_Nokuba unyawo lwakho luthe lwakukhubekisa, lunqamle lona;  kukulungele kanye ukuba ungene ebomini usisiqhwala, kunokuba uthi, uneenyawo zombini, uphoswe esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo,
41_9_46_apho kumpethu ingafiyo, kumlilo ungacinywayo.
41_9_47_Nokuba iliso lakho lithe lakukhubekisa, likhuphe lona;  kukulungele kanye ukungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo unaliso linye, kunokuba uthi, unamehlo amabini, uphoswe esihogweni somlilo,
41_9_48_apho kumpethu ingafiyo, kumlilo ungacinywayo.
41_9_49_Kuba bonke baya kugalelwa ityuwa ngomlilo, athi onke amadini agalelwe ityuwa ngetyuwa.
41_9_50_Ityuwa ilungile yona; ke ukuba ithe ityuwa ayaba nabutyuwa,  noyivakalisa ngantoni na? Yibani netyuwa phakathi kwenu,  nihlale ninoxolo omnye komnye.
41_10_1_Esukile apho, uze kungena emideni yakwaYuda, ecanda kweliphesheya kweYordan. Kubuya kuhlanganiselane izihlwele kuye; ubesithi ke, njengoko ebeqhele ngako, abuye azifundise.
41_10_2_Bafika abaFarisi, bambuza ukuba kuvumelekile na ukuba indoda imale umfazi wayo; batsho bemlinga.
41_10_3_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, UMoses waniwisela mthetho mni na?
41_10_4_Bathi bona, UMoses wakuvumela ukubhala incwadi yokwahlukana, nokumala.
41_10_5_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Ngokuba lukhuni kwentliziyo yenu, wanibhalela loo mthetho;
41_10_6_kodwa kwasekuqalekeni kokudalwa, uThixo wabenza bayindoda nenkazana.
41_10_7_Ngenxa yoko umntu uyakushiya uyise nonina, anamathele emfazini wakhe;
41_10_8_baze abo babini babe nyama-nye. Ngako oko, abasebabini,  banyama-nye.
41_10_9_Oko ke ngoko uThixo akumanyileyo, makungahlulwa mntu.
41_10_10_Endlwini abafundi bakhe babuya bambuza ngayo loo nto.
41_10_11_Athi kubo, Othe wamala umfazi wakhe, wazeka omnye,  uyakrexeza kulowa.
41_10_12_Nokuba umfazi uthe wayala indoda yakhe, wendela kwenye,  uyakrexeza.
41_10_13_Baye bezisa abantwana kuye ukuze abachukumise; basuka abafundi babakhalimela abo babazisayo.
41_10_14_Ke kaloku ekubonile oku uYesu, wacaphuka, wathi kubo,  Bavumeleni abantwana beze kum, ningabaleli: ngokuba ubukumkani bukaThixo bubobabo banjalo.
41_10_15_Inene ndithi kuni, Othe akabamkela ubukumkani bukaThixo njengomntwana, akayi kukha angene kubo.
41_10_16_Waza wabawola, wazibeka izandla phezu kwabo, wamana ebasikelela.
41_10_17_Akubon ukuba uyaphuma, uya endleleni, kweza othile ngokubaleka, wawa ngamadolo kuye, wambuza esithi, Mfundisi ulungileyo, ndenze ntoni na, ukuze ndibudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade?
41_10_18_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Yini na ukuba uthi ndilungile? Akukho ulungileyo, mnye kwaphela-nguThixo.
41_10_19_Uyayazi imithetho: Musa ukukrexeza, musa ukubulala, musa ukuba, musa ukungqinela ubuxoki, musa ukulumkisa, beka uyihlo nonyoko.
41_10_20_Uphendule ke yena wathi kuye, Mfundisi, zonke ezo zinto ndazigcina, kwasebuncinaneni bam.
41_10_21_Uthe ke uYesu, ondele kuye, wamthanda, wathi kuye, Kukho nto-nye uyisweleyo: hamba uye kuthengisa ngeento zonke onazo,  uphe amahlwempu, woba nobutyebi ke emazulwini; yiza ke undilandele, uwuthwele umnqamlezo.
41_10_22_Wathi ke khunubembe ngelo zwi, wemka ebuhlungu; kuba ebenemfuyo eninzi.
41_10_23_UYesu esingasingile, wathi kubafundi bakhe, Hayi, ukuba ngenkankulu ukuya kungena kwabo banobutyebi ebukumkanini bukaThixo!
41_10_24_Ke bathi qhiphu umbilini abafundi ngamazwi akhe. Aphinde ke uYesu, aphendule athi kubo, Bantwana, hayi, ukuba ngenkankulu ukuthi abo bakholose ngobutyebi bangene ebukumkanini bukaThixo!
41_10_25_Kulula ukuba inkamela iphumele entunjeni yenaliti,  kunokuba isityebi singene ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
41_10_26_Baye bekhwankqiswa ke ngokuncamisileyo, besitshono ukuthi,  Ngubani na ongasindiswayo?
41_10_27_Ondele ke kubo uYesu, uthi, Kubantu akunakwenzeka; kuye yena uThixo akunakuba kungenzeki; kuba zonke izinto zinako ukwenzeka kuye uThixo.
41_10_28_Waqala uPetros ukuthi kuye, Uyabona, thina sishiye iinto zonke, sakulandela.
41_10_29_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Inene ndithi kuni, akukho namnye ushiye indlu, nokuba ngabazalwana, nokuba ngoodade, nokuba nguyise, nokuba ngunina, nokuba ngumfazi, nokuba ngabantwana,  nokuba ngamasimi, ngenxa yam nangenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi,
41_10_30_ongayi kuthi amkeliswe kalikhulu: ngoku ngeli xesha,  izindlu, nabazalwana, noodade, noonina, nabantwana, namasimi,  ndawonye neentshutshiso; nakwelizayo iphakade, ubomi obungunaphakade.
41_10_31_Ke baninzi abokuqala abaya kuba ngabokugqibela,  nabokugqibela abaya kuba ngabokuqala.
41_10_32_Ke kaloku babesendleleni, benyuka besiya eYerusalem; waye uYesu ehamba phambi kwabo; baye bethe qhiphu umbilini,  balandela besoyika. Wabuya wabathabatha abalishumi elinababini waqala ukubaxelela izinto eziza kumhlela, esithi,
41_10_33_Niyabona, siyenyuka siya eYerusalem; waye uNyana woMntu eya kunikelwa kubabingeleli abakhulu, nakubabhali; baya kumgweba ukuba afe, bamnikele kuzo iintlanga.
41_10_34_Ziya kudlala ngaye, zimtyakatye, zimtshicele, zimbulale;  aze athi ngomhla wesithathu abuye avuke.
41_10_35_Kuthi kuze kuye uYakobi noYohane, oonyana bakaZebhedi,  besithi, Mfundisi, sithanda ukuba usenzele into esothi siyicele.
41_10_36_Wathi ke yena kubo, Nithanda ukuba ndinenzele ntoni na?
41_10_37_Bathi ke bona kuye, Siphe ukuhlala, omnye ngasekunene kwakho, nomnye ngasekhohlo kwakho, ebuqaqawulini bakho.
41_10_38_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Aniyazi into eniyicelayo: ninako na ukuyisela indebe endiyiselayo mna, nibhaptizwe ngobhaptizo endibhaptizwa ngalo mna? Bathi ke bona kuye, Sinako.
41_10_39_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Okunene indebe endiyiselayo mna, niya kuyisela; nobhaptizo endibhaptizwa ngalo mna, niya kubhaptizwa kwangalo;
41_10_40_kodwa kona ukuhlala ngasekunene kwam nangasekhohlo kwam,  asikwam ukupha ngako, ngaphandle kokupha abo kulungiselwe bona.
41_10_41_Bevile abalishumi, baqala ukubacaphukela ooYakobi noYohane.
41_10_42_Ke kaloku, uYesu ebabizele kuye, uthi kubo, Niyazi ukuba abo kuthiwa balawula iintlanga, bayazigagamela; nabo bazizikhulu zazo benza ngegunya kuzo.
41_10_43_Ze kungabi njalo ke phakathi kwenu nina; osukuba efuna ukuba mkhulu phakathi kwenu, makabe ngumlungiseleli wenu;
41_10_44_nosukuba efuna ukuba ngowokuqala, makabe ngumkhonzi wabo bonke;
41_10_45_kuba noNyana woMntu engezanga kulungiselelwa; weza kulungiselela, nokuncama ubomi bakhe, bube yintlawulelo yokukhulula abaninzi.
41_10_46_Baza kufika eYeriko. Ekuphumeni kwakhe eYeriko apho,  nabafundi bakhe nendimbane elingeneyo, unyana kaTimeyu,  uBhartimeyu, imfama, waye ehleli ngasendleleni engqiba.
41_10_47_Wathi akuva ukuba nguYesu waseNazarete, waqala ukudanduluka wathi, Yesu nyana kaDavide, ndenzele inceba.
41_10_48_Baye abaninzi bemkhalimela ukuba athi tu; kwaba kokukhona ke wadandulukayo ngakumbi, esithi, Nyana kaDavide, ndenzele inceba.
41_10_49_Wema uYesu wathi, Makabizwe. Bayibiza ke imfama, besithi kuyo, Yomelela, suk ume; uyakubiza.
41_10_50_Ithe ke yona, ilahle ingubo yayo, yesuka yeza kuYesu.
41_10_51_Aphendule athi kuyo uYesu, Uthanda ukuba ndikwenzele ntoni na? Yathi ke imfama kuye, Rabhoni, ndithanda ukuba ndibone.
41_10_52_Wathi ke uYesu kuyo, Hamba uhambe; ukholo lwakho lukusindisile. Yabona kwaoko, yamlandela uYesu endleleni apho.
41_11_1_Ke kaloku, xa basondelayo eYerusalem, eBhetefage naseBhetani, besingisa eNtabeni yemiNquma, ususa babe babini kubafundi bakhe,
41_11_2_athi kubo, Hambani niye emzaneni lo ukhangelene nani; nothi ningena kuwo, nibe senifumana ithole le-esile libotshelelwe,  ekungazanga kuhlale namnye umntu phezu kwalo; likhululeni nilizise.
41_11_3_Nokuba ubani uthe kuni, Yini na ukuba nikwenze oko? nothi,  Liyafuneka eNkosini; wothi kwaoko ke alithumele apha.
41_11_4_Basuka ke baya, balifumana ithole libotshelelwe ngasemnyango ngaphandle, ekuhlanganeni kweendlela; balikhulula.
41_11_5_Baye abathile kwababemi khona besithi kubo, Nenza ntoni na,  nilikhulula nje ithole?
41_11_6_Bathetha ke kubo njengoko uYesu ebebawisele umthetho ngako;  baza babayeka.
41_11_7_Balizisa ithole kuYesu; baziphosa iingubo zabo phezu kwalo;  wahlala phezu kwalo.
41_11_8_Ke kaloku abaninzi bazandlala iingubo zabo endleleni; baye ke abanye bexhuzula amahlamvu emithini, bewandlala endleleni.
41_11_9_Baye abo babehamba ngaphambili, nabo babelandela,  bedanduluka, besithi, Hosana; makabongwe lo uzayo egameni leNkosi.
41_11_10_Mabubongwe ubukumkani bobawo wethu uDavide, obo buzayo egameni leNkosi! Hosana enyangweni!
41_11_11_Uthe ke uYesu wangena eYerusalem nasetempileni;  ezisingasingile izinto zonke, wathi, kuba bekusekuhlwile,  waphuma waya eBhetani, enabalishumi elinababini.
41_11_12_Uthe ngengomso, bakubon ukuba baphumile eBhetani,  walamba.
41_11_13_Wathi, ebone umkhiwane ukude, unamagqabi, waya kukhangela ukuba angafumana nto na kuwo; akufika kuwo, akafumana nto,  kwakuphela ngamagqabi; kuba belingelilo ixesha lamakhiwane.
41_11_14_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuwo, Makungaze kudle mntu siqhamo kuwe naphakade. Baye besiva ke abafundi bakhe.
41_11_15_Bafika eYerusalem. Waza uYesu, eye kungena etempileni,  waqala wabakhupha ababethengisa nababethenga etempileni; wathi neetafile zabanani bemali nezihlalo zabathengisa ngamahobe wazibhukuqa.
41_11_16_Wayengavumi ukuba kubekho ucanda etempileni ethwele isitya.
41_11_17_Wayefundisa, esithi kubo, Akubhaliwe na kwathiwa, Indlu yam iya kubizwa ngokuba yindlu yokuthandaza iintlanga zonke? Ke nina niyenze umqolomba wezihange.
41_11_18_Beva ababhali nababingeleli abakhulu; baye befuna ukuba bangathini na ukumtshabalalisa; kuba babemoyika yena, ngokuba indimbane yonke ibikhwankqisiwe yimfundiso yakhe.
41_11_19_Uthe ke kwakuhlwa waphuma, waya ngaphandle komzi.
41_11_20_Bathi bedlula kusasa, bawubona umkhiwane lowo womile,  uthabathele kwasezingcanjini.
41_11_21_Ekhumbule uPetros, uthi kuye, Rabhi, khangela umkhiwane obuwuqalekisile womile.
41_11_22_Uphendule uYesu wathi kubo, Yibani nokukholwa kuThixo.
41_11_23_Kuba inene ndithi kuni, Othe kule ntaba, Funquleka,  uphoseke elwandle, angathandabuzi entliziyweni yakhe, asuke akholwe ukuba ezo zinto azithethayo zinokwenzeka, wokuzuza oko athe wakuthetha.
41_11_24_Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuni izinto enisukuba nizicela,  nithandaza, kholwani ukuba ninokuzamkela; noba nazo.
41_11_25_Naxa sukuba nimi nithandaza, ukuba ninendawo ngakothile,  mxoleleni, ukuze noYihlo osemazulwini anixolele iziphoso zenu.
41_11_26_Ke, ukuba anixoleli nina, naye uYihlo osemazulwini akasayi kunixolela iziphoso zenu.
41_11_27_Babuya beza eYerusalem; kuthi, akubon ukuba uyahamba etempileni, kuze kuye ababingeleli abakhulu, nababhali,  namadoda amakhulu;
41_11_28_bathi kuye, Uzenza ezi zinto ngagunya lini na? Kanjalo ngubani na okunike eli gunya lokuze ezi zinto uzenze?
41_11_29_Waphendula ke uYesu, wathi kubo, Nam ndiya kunibuza zwi-nye, ze nindiphendule; ndonixelela ke, ukuba ndizenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto.
41_11_30_Ubhaptizo lukaYohane lwaluphuma emazulwini, lwaluphuma ebantwini, sini na? Ndiphenduleni.
41_11_31_Baye becamanga phakathi kwabo, besithi, Ukuba sithe,  Lwaluphuma emazulwini, wothi, Ibiyini na phofu ukuba ningakholwa nguye?
41_11_32_Kodwa ukuba sithe, Lwaluphuma ebantwinibabesoyika abantu; kuba bonke babebambe ukuthi uYohane ubengumprofeti inene.
41_11_33_Baphendula bathi kuYesu, Asazi. Aphendule uYesu athi kubo,  Nam andinixeleli ukuba ndizenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto.
41_12_1_Waqala ukuthi kubo ngemizekeliso, Umntu watyala isidiliya,  wasibiyela ngothango, wemba isixovulelo seediliya, wakha inyango, waqeshisa ngaso kubalimi, wahambela kwelinye.
41_12_2_Wathi ngelona xesha, wathuma umkhonzi kubalimi abo, ukuba amkele kubalimi esiqhameni sesidiliya eso.
41_12_3_Basuka bona bambamba, bamtyabula, bamndulula elambatha.
41_12_4_Wabuya wathuma kubo omnye umkhonzi; lowo bamgibisela ngamatye, bamngxwelerha entloko, bamndulula bemhlazisile.
41_12_5_Wabuya wathuma omnye; lowo bambulala. Wathuma nabanye babaninzi, inxenye beyityabula, inxenye beyibulala.
41_12_6_Uthe ngoko, esenaye unyana emnye, intanda yakhe, wamthuma naye kubo ukugqibela, esithi, Baya kumhlonela yena unyana wam.
41_12_7_Ke bona abo balimi bathi phakathi kwabo, Yindlalifa lo;  yizani simbulale, ilifa libe lelethu.
41_12_8_Bamthabatha ke, bambulala, bamphosa ngaphandle kwesidiliya.
41_12_9_Uya kwenza ntoni na ke ngoko umninisidiliya? Wofika abatshabalalise abo balimi, asinikele kubambi isidiliya eso.
41_12_10_Anisilesanga na esi sibhalo sithi, Ilitye abalicekisayo abakhi, Lelona laba yintloko yembombo;
41_12_11_Kwavela eNkosini oku, Kungummangaliso emehlweni ethu?
41_12_12_Baya befuna ukumbamba, basuka boyika izihlwele, kuba baqonda ukuba uwuthethe ngabo lo mzekeliso. Bamshiya bemka.
41_12_13_Bathi bathumela kuye abathile bakubaFarisi bakumaHerode,  ukuze bambambise ngokuthetha.
41_12_14_Befikile ke bona, bathi kuye, Mfundisi, siyazi ukuba uyinene, kanjalo akukhathali nangubani; kuba akukhethi buso bamntu, indlela kaThixo uyifundisa ngenene. Kuvumelekile na ukumnika irhafu uKesare, akuvumelekile, kusini na? Sinikele,  singanikeli, kusini na?
41_12_15_Ke kaloku yena, ekwazi ukuhanahanisa kwabo, wathi kubo,  Nindilingelani na? Ndiziseleni idenariyo, ndiyibone.
41_12_16_Bayizisa ke. Athi kubo, Ngokabani na lo mfanekiso nombhalo?
41_12_17_Bathi ke kuye, NgokaKesare. Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo,  Nikelani izinto zikaKesare kuKesare, nezinto zikaThixo kuThixo.  Bamangaliswa nguye.
41_12_18_Kweza kuye nabaSadusi, bona abo bathi akukho luvuko;  babuza kuye besithi,
41_12_19_Mfundisi, uMoses wasibhalela, wathi, Ukuba umzalwana kathile uthe wafa, washiya umfazi, akashiya bantwana, makathi umzalwana wakhe amzeke umfazi wakhe, amvelisele imbewu umzalwana wakhe.
41_12_20_Ke kaloku bekukho abazalwana abasixhenxe. Wathi owokuqala wazeka umfazi; waza akufa akashiya mbewu.
41_12_21_Uthe owesibini wamzeka, wafa, akashiya mbewu. Wenjenjalo nowesithathu.
41_12_22_Bamzeka ke bosixhenxe; abashiya mbewu. Ekugqibeleni kwabo bonke, wafa naye umfazi.
41_12_23_Ngoko eluvukweni, uya kuba ngumfazi wawuphi na kubo? kuba babenaye bosixhenxe engumfazi.
41_12_24_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Anilahleki na, ngenxa yale ndawo yokuba ningazazi izibhalo kwanamandla kaThixo?
41_12_25_Kuba, xa bathe babuya bavuka kwabafileyo, abazeki,  abendiswa; banjengazo izithunywa ezisemazulwini.
41_12_26_Ngokusingisele kwabafileyo ke, ukuba bayavuka, anilesanga na encwadini kaMoses, endaweni ethetha ngetyholo, okokuba uThixo wathetha kuye esithi, Mna ndinguThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake, uThixo kaYakobi?
41_12_27_AkaThixo wabafileyo, unguThixo wabaphilileyo. Nina ke ngoko niyalahleka kakhulu.
41_12_28_Kwafika omnye wakubabhali; wabeva bebuzana; waqonda ukuba ubaphendule kakuhle. Wambuza esithi, Owona mthetho uphambili kuyo yonke nguwuphi na?
41_12_29_UYesu wamphendula ke esithi, Owona ungaphambili kuyo yonke imithetho ngulo: Yiva, Sirayeli, iNkosi uThixo wethu yiNkosi inye;
41_12_30_uze uyithande ke iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, na ngomphefumlo wakho uphela, nangengqondo yakho iphela, nangamandla akho ephela. Nguwo lo ongaphambili umthetho.
41_12_31_Nowesibini ufana nawo; nangu: Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako. Akukho mthetho wumbi mkhulu kunale.
41_12_32_Wathi umbhali kuye, Ngxatsho ke, Mfundisi, uthethe inyaniso; ngokuba mnye uThixo, akukho wumbi ngaphandle kwakhe;
41_12_33_nokuthi umthande yena ngentliziyo iphela, nangengqiqo iphela, nangomphefumlo uphela, nangamandla ephela, nokuthi umthande ummelwane wakho njengoko uzithanda ngako, kungaphezu kwawo onke amadini atshiswayo kuphele, nemibingelelo.
41_12_34_UYesu embonile ukuba uphendule ngengqiqo, wathi kuye,  Akukude wena ebukumkanini bukaThixo. Akwaba sabakho mntu ubenobuganga bakumbuza nto.
41_12_35_Waphendula uYesu, wathi, efundisa etempileni, Batsho ngani na ababhali ukuthi, UKristu ungunyana kaDavide?
41_12_36_Kuba uDavide ngokwakhe wathi ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, Yathi iNkosi eNkosini yam, Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho.
41_12_37_UDavide ngoko ngokwakhe uthi, UyiNkosi. Kuvela phi na ke ukuba ngunyana wakhe? Lwaye ke uninzi lwabantu lumva kamnandi.
41_12_38_Wayesithi kubo, ekufundiseni kwakhe, Balumkeleni ababhali,  abathanda ukuhamba ngeengubo ezinde, nemibuliso ezindaweni zembutho,
41_12_39_nezihlalo zobukhulu ezindlwini zesikhungu, nezilili zobukhulu ezidlweni;
41_12_40_abazidla bazigqibe izindlu zabahlolokazi, baze benyhwalaza bathandaze uzungu. Aba baya kwamkela ugwebo olugqithisileyo.
41_12_41_Waye uYesu ehleli malungana nomkhumbi wokulondoloza imali,  ekhangela ukuba sithini na isihlwele ukuphosa imali yobhedu emkhumbini wokulondoloza imali; zaye izityebi ezininzi ziphosa kakhulu.
41_12_42_Kwafika mhlolokazi uthile ulihlwempu, waphosa iimalanana zambini eziyikodrante.
41_12_43_Ebabizele kuye abafundi bakhe, uthi kubo, Inene ndithi kuni, Lo mhlolokazi ulihlwempu uphose ngaphezu kwabo bonke abaphosileyo emkhumbini wokulondoloza imali;
41_12_44_kuba bonke abo baphose bethabatha kwikhupha labo; ke yena ekusweleni kwakhe uphose konke abenako, impilo yakhe iphela.
41_13_1_Kwakubon ukuba uyaphuma etempileni, uthi omnye umfundi wakhe kuye, Mfundisi, uyawabona na la matye angaka, nezi zakhiwo zingaka?
41_13_2_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Uyazibona na ezi zakhiwo zikhulu? Akusayi kusala litye phezu kwelitye, elingayi kuchithwa.
41_13_3_Baye, akubon ukuba uhleli eNtabeni yemiNquma malungana netempile, bembuza ngasese ooPetros noYakobi noYohane noAndreya, besithi,
41_13_4_Sixelele ukuba ziya kubakho nini na ezo zinto, nokuba uya kuba yini na umqondiso, xa zonke ezo zinto ziza kupheliswa.
41_13_5_Wabaphendula ke uYesu waqala ukuthi, Lumkani ningalahlekiswa bani;
41_13_6_kuba baninzi abaya kuza egameni lam, besithi banguye uKristu, balahlekise into eninzi.
41_13_7_Xa nithe neva iimfazwe namarhe eemfazwe, musani kuba navuso; kuba ezo zinto zimelwe kukuhla, ukanti kona ukuphela akukabikho;
41_13_8_kuba uhlanga luya kuvukelana nohlanga, nobukumkani buvukelane nobukumkani; kuya kubakho iinyikima zomhlaba kwiindawo ngeendawo; kuya kubakho neendlala neenkathazeko;  ziingqaleko ke zenimba ezo.
41_13_9_Zilumkeleni ke okwenu; kuba baya kuninikela ezintlanganisweni zamatyala, nityatyulwe ezindlwini zesikhungu,  nimiswe phambi kwabalawuli nookumkani ngenxa yam, kube bubungqina kubo.
41_13_10_Kumele ukuthi ke ukuqala kuvakaliswe iindaba ezilungileyo ezi kuzo zonke iintlanga.
41_13_11_Xa sukuba ke benirhola beya kuninikela, musani ukuyixhalela kwangaphambili into eniya kuyithetha, ningacamangi nokucamanga nto. Into enithe nayinikwa ngelo xa, thethani yona;  kuba asinini enithethayo, nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
41_13_12_Ke kaloku, umzalwana uya kunikela umzalwana ekufeni, aze uyise anikele umntwana, bathi nabantwana bavukelane nabazali,  bababulalise;
41_13_13_nithiywe ngabantu bonke, ngenxa yegama lam. Ke onyamezelayo kude kube sekupheleni, lowo wosindiswa.
41_13_14_Ke kaloku, xa nithe nalibona isikizi lesiphanziso,  ekwakuthethwa lona ngoDaniyeli umprofeti, limi apho lingamele kuba khona (olesayo makaqiqe), mabathi ngelo xa abo bakwaYuda basabele ezintabeni.
41_13_15_Ophezu kwendlu ke makangehli aye endlwini, angangeni aye kuthabatha into endlwini yakhe.
41_13_16_Nalowo usentsimini makangabuyeli emva, aye kuthabatha ingubo yakhe.
41_13_17_Yeha ke, abamithiyo nabanyisayo ngaloo mihla!
41_13_18_Thandazani ke, ukuze intsabo yenu ingabi khona ebusika.
41_13_19_Kuba yona loo mihla iya kuba yimbandezelo, engazanga ibekho enjalo kwasekuqalekeni kwendalo awayidalayo uThixo,  kwada kwakalokunje; engasayi kubuya ibekho.
41_13_20_Kanjalo ukuba iNkosi ibingayinqamlelanga loo mihla,  bekungayi kubakho mntu usindayo; koko ithe ngenxa yabanyulwa ebanyulileyo, yayinqamlela imihla leyo.
41_13_21_Ngelo xa ke, ukuba ubani uthe kuni, Nanku apha uKristu,  nokuba uthe, Nankuya phaya, musani ukukholwa nguye;
41_13_22_kuba kuya kuvela ooKristu ababuxoki, nabaprofeti ababuxoki, benze imiqondiso nemimangaliso yokulahlekisa nabanyuliweyo, ukuba bekunokwenzeka.
41_13_23_Lumkani ke nina; yabonani, ndinixelele izinto zonke ngenxa engaphambili.
41_13_24_Ngaloo mihla, emveni kwayo loo mbandezelo, liya kusuka ilanga lenziwe mnyama, ithi nenyanga ingabukhuphi ubumhlophe bayo;
41_13_25_zithi neenkwenkwezi zezulu zivuthuluke; athi mamandla asemazulwini azanyazanyiswe.
41_13_26_Baya kumbona ke ngelo xesha uNyana woMntu esiza esemafini,  enamandla amakhulu nobuqaqawuli.
41_13_27_Uya kuzithuma ngelo xesha izithunywa zakhe,  abahlanganisele ndawonye abanyulwa bakhe, baphume kumacala omane omoya, kuthabathela esiphelweni sehlabathi kuse esiphelweni sezulu.
41_13_28_Wufundeni ke kuwo umkhiwane umzekeliso; xa selithe lathamba isebe lawo, lahluma amagqabi, niyazi ukuba likufuphi ihlobo.
41_13_29_Ngokukwanjalo nani, xa nithe nazibona ezo zinto zisihla,  yazini ukuba kukufuphi, sekusemnyango.
41_13_30_Inene ndithi kuni, Asisayi kudlula esi sizukulwana,  zingadanga zonke ezo zinto zibekho.
41_13_31_Liya kudlula izulu nehlabathi, ke wona amazwi am akasayi kudlula.
41_13_32_Kodwa akukho bani uwaziyo loo mhla nelo lixa, azazi nezithunywa ezisemazulwini, akazi noNyana lo, kuphela nguYise.
41_13_33_Lumkani, musani ukulala, thandazani. Kuba anilazi ukuba linini na ixesha elo;
41_13_34_njengokuba wathi umntu ehambela kwelinye, eshiya indlu yakhe, wabanika igunya abakhonzi bakhe, elowo wamnika umsebenzi wakhe, waza umgcini-mnyango wamwisela umthetho ukuba alinde.
41_13_35_Lindani ngoko, ngokuba ningakwazi ukuba kunini na ukuza komninindlu: kuko ngokuhlwa, kuko phakathi kobusuku, kuko ekulileni kweenkuku, kuko kusasa;
41_13_36_hleze afike ngebhaqo, anifumane nilele.
41_13_37_Oko ndikutsho kuni, ndikutsho kubo bonke, Lindani.
41_14_1_Ke kaloku bekuza kubakho ipasika, izonka ezingenagwele,  emveni kweentsuku ezimbini; baye ke ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali befuna ukuba bangathini na ukumbamba ngenkohliso,  bambulale.
41_14_2_Babesithi ke, Makungabi khona ngomthendeleko, hleze kubekho isaqunge sabantu.
41_14_3_Kuthe eseBhetani, endlwini kaSimon owayeneqhenqa, akubon  ukuba uhleli, kweza umfazi enehlala lelabhastile, linamafutha enadusi engangxengelelweyo, exabiso likhulu; walityumza ihlala elo lelabhastile, wamgalela ngawo entloko.
41_14_4_Kwaye ke kukho abathile abacaphukayo phakathi kwabo,  besithi, Yenzelweni na le nkcitho yamafutha aqholiweyo?
41_14_5_Kuba la mafutha bekungathengiswayo ngawo ngenani elingaphezu kweedenariyo ezimakhulu mathathu, kuphiwe amahlwempu; basuka bamfuthela.
41_14_6_Uthe ke uYesu, Myekeni; nimaphulelani na? Usebenze umsebenzi omhle kum;
41_14_7_kuba amahlwempu lawo nihleli ninawo, nize xa sukuba nithanda, nibe nako ukuwenzela okulungileyo; ke mna anihleli ninam.
41_14_8_Yena ukwenzile abenako; uphange weza wawuthambisela ukungcwatywa umzimba wam.
41_14_9_Inene ndithi kuni, Apho zithe zavakaliswa khona ezi ndaba zilungileyo kulo lonke ihlabathi, iya kuxelwa nayo le nto ayenzileyo yena, ibe sisikhumbuzo ngaye.
41_14_10_UYuda Sikariyoti, omnye kwabeshumi elinababini, wesuka waya kubabingeleli abakhulu, ukuba amnikele kubo.
41_14_11_Bathi ke bona bakuva bavuya; bambeka ngedinga lokumnika imali. Wayefuna ukuba angathini na ukumnikela ngexesha elimlungeleyo.
41_14_12_Ke kaloku, ngowokuqala umhla wezonka ezingenagwele, xa bekubingelelwa imvana yepasika, bathi kuye abafundi bakhe, Unga singaya kulungisa phi na, ukuze uyidle ipasika?
41_14_13_Ususa babini kubafundi bakhe, athi kubo, Hambani niye kuwo umzi; nohlangatyezwa ngumntu ethwele umphanda wamanzi;  mlandeleni.
41_14_14_Apho athe wangena khona, nothi kumninindlu, Uthi uMfundisi, Iphi na indlu yabahambi, apho ndingayidlela khona ipasika nabafundi bam?
41_14_15_Yena wonibonisa igumbi eliphezulu, elikhulu, landlelwe lalungiswa; silungiseleleni apho.
41_14_16_Baphuma abafundi bakhe abo, baya kungena kuwo umzi,  bafumana kunjengoko wayebaxelele, bayilungisa ipasika.
41_14_17_Uthi kwakuhlwa, eze nabalishumi elinababini.
41_14_18_Bakubon ukuba bahleli, bayadla, wathi uYesu, Inene,  ndithi kuni, omnye kuni aba uya kundingcatsha, lowo ke udla nam.
41_14_19_Baqala ke ukuba buhlungu, nokuthi kuye ngabanye, Ingaba ndim, yini na? Nomnye wathi, Ingaba ndim, yini na?
41_14_20_Uphendule ke wathi kubo, Ngomnye kwabeshumi elinababini,  lowo ke uthi nkxu nam esityeni.
41_14_21_UNyana woMntu uyemka okunene, njengoko kubhalwe ngaye;  yeha ke, loo mntu uNyana woMntu angcatshwa nguye! Ngekumlungele ukuba ebengazalwanga loo mntu.
41_14_22_Bakubon ukuba bayadla, uYesu wathabatha isonka,  wasikelela, waqhekeza, wabanika, wathi, Thabathani nidle;  ngumzimba wam lo.
41_14_23_Wayithabatha nendebe, wabulela, wabanika; basela kuyo bonke.
41_14_24_Wathi kubo, Ligazi lam eli lomnqophiso omtsha, eliphalala ngenxa yabaninzi.
41_14_25_Inene ndithi kuni, Andisayi kubuya ndisele esiqhameni somdiliya, kude kube yiloo mini sukuba ndisisela sisitsha ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
41_14_26_Bakuba bevume ingoma yokubonga, baphuma baya eNtabeni yemiNquma.
41_14_27_Athi kubo uYesu, Nonke niya kukhubeka kum ngobu busuku;  ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndiya kubetha kumalusi,  zichithwachithwe izimvu.
41_14_28_Ke emveni kokuvuka kwam, ndiya kunandulela, ndiye kwelaseGalili.
41_14_29_Wathi ke uPetros kuye, Nokuba baya kukhubeka bonke, mna nakanye.
41_14_30_Athi uYesu kuye, Inene ndithi kuwe, namhlanje, kwangobu busuku, ingekalili kabini inkuku, uya kundikhanyela kathathu.
41_14_31_Kwaba kukhona wathetha wancamisa, esithi, Ndingafanelana ndimelwe kukufa nawe, andingekhe ndikukhanyele. Batsho ke bonke.
41_14_32_Bafika kumhlatyana ogama liyiGetsemane. Athi kubafundi bakhe, Hlalani phantsi apha, ndikhe ndithandaze;
41_14_33_athabathe naye uPetros noYakobi noYohane. Waqala ukuqhiphuka umbilini, nokudandatheka kakhulu.
41_14_34_Athi kubo, Umphefumlo wam ubuhlungu kakhulu, ngokokude ube sekufeni; hlalani apha nilinde.
41_14_35_Ehambele phambili umganyana, wawa emhlabeni, wathandazela,  ukuba kunokwenzeka, lidlule kuye ilixa elo.
41_14_36_Wayesithi, Abha, Bawo, zonke izinto zinokwenzeka kuwe;  yigqithise kum le ndebe; noko ke makungabi kokuthandwa ndim,  makube kokuthandwa nguwe.
41_14_37_Uyeza, abafumane belele; athi kuPetros, Simon, ulele na?  Ubungenakulinda noko lilinye na ilixa?
41_14_38_Lindani nithandaze, ukuze ningangeni ekuhendweni; umoya okunene unentumekelelo, ke yona inyama ithambile.
41_14_39_Wabuya wemka wathandaza, ethetha kwalona elo lizwi.
41_14_40_Uthe akubuya, wabafumana bebuye balala; kuba amehlo abo ayenzima bubuthongo; baye bengazi into abangamphendula yona.
41_14_41_Afike okwesithathu, athi kubo, Lalani ngoku niphumle;  kwanele; lifikile ilixa; yabonani, uNyana woMntu uyanikelwa ezandleni zaboni.
41_14_42_Vukani sihambe; yabonani, lowo undinikelayo usondele.
41_14_43_Kwaoko, esathetha, uthi qatha uYuda, owayengoweshumi elinababini, enendimbane enkulu, inamakrele neentonga, isuka kubo ababingeleli abakhulu, nakubabhali, nakuwo amadoda amakhulu.
41_14_44_Ke kaloku, lowo umnikelayo waye ebanike umqondiso, esithi,  Lowo ndithe ndamanga, nguye; mbambeni, nimrhole nimnqabisile.
41_14_45_Efikile, uye kuye kwaoko, athi, Rabhi, Rabhi; wamanga.
41_14_46_Bamsa ke isandla, bambamba.
41_14_47_Uthe ke omnye wabo babemi khona, warhola ikrele, wamxabela umkhonzi wombingeleli omkhulu, wamnqumla indlebe.
41_14_48_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Niphumele ukuza kubamba mna na, ninamakrele neentonga nje, nanga niphumele isihange?
41_14_49_Bendikuni imihla ngemihla etempileni ndifundisa,  anandibamba; kodwa kunje, ukuze zizaliseke izibhalo.
41_14_50_Bamshiya bonke, babaleka.
