41_14_51_Wayelandelwa yindodana ethile, ithe wambu ilinen entle emzimbeni; asuka ayibamba ke amadodana.
41_14_52_Ithe yayilahla ilinen entle leyo, yabaleka kubo ize.
41_14_53_Bamrholela uYesu kumbingeleli omkhulu, babuthelana kuye bonke ababingeleli abakhulu, namadoda amakhulu, nababhali.
41_14_54_Waza uPetros wamlandela, ebekele kude, wada waya ngaphakathi entendelezweni yendlu yombingeleli omkhulu; waye ehleli phantsi ndawonye namadindala, esotha umlilo.
41_14_55_Baye ke ababingeleli abakhulu, nayo intlanganiso yamatyala iphelele, befuna ubungqina ngaye uYesu bokuze bambulalise;  bengabufumani.
41_14_56_Kuba babebaninzi ababengqina ubuxoki ngaye, baye ubungqina babo bungayelelani.
41_14_57_Basuka abathile bangqina ubuxoki ngaye, besithi,
41_14_58_Thina samva yena esithi, Mna ndiya kuyichitha le tempile yenziweyo ngezandla, ndize ngeentsuku ezintathu ndakhe enye engenziwe ngazandla.
41_14_59_Baye bungayelelani kwangokunjalo nobabo ubungqina.
41_14_60_Wesuka wema phakathi umbingeleli omkhulu, wambuza uYesu,  esithi, Akuphenduli nento le na? bangqina ntoni na aba ngawe?
41_14_61_Wahlala ke yena wathi tu, akaphendula nento. Wabuya umbingeleli omkhulu wambuza, wathi kuye, Unguye na uKristu,  uNyana waLowo ungowokubongwa?
41_14_62_Uthe ke uYesu, Ndinguye; niya kumbona nokumbona uNyana woMntu, ehleli ngasekunene kwamandla, esiza namafu ezulu.
41_14_63_Usuka ke umbingeleli omkhulu azikrazule iingubo zakhe,  athi, Sisawafunelani na amangqina?
41_14_64_Nikuvile ukunyelisa; kunjani kuni nina? Bamgweba ke bonke ukuba unetyala lokuba afe.
41_14_65_Yaqala inxenye ukumtshicela, nokumgqubuthela ubuso,  nokumntlitha, nokuthi kuye, Profeta; aye amadindala emtywakraza.
41_14_66_Kuthi ke, akubon ukuba uPetros usentendelezweni ngezantsi, kuze omnye umkhonzazana wombingeleli omkhulu,
41_14_67_ambone uPetros esotha, ondele kuye, athi, Nawe ubunaye uYesu waseNazarete.
41_14_68_Wakhanyela ke esithi, Andiyazi, andiyiqondi kanye into oyithethayo wena. Waphuma waya phandle kwengaphambili intendelezo; yalila ke inkuku.
41_14_69_Umkhonzazana ubuye wambona, waqala ukuthi kwabo babemi khona, Lo ngowakubo.
41_14_70_Waphinda ke wakhanyela. Kuthe, kwakuba mzuzwana, babuya abo babemi khona, bathi kuPetros. Inyaniso, ungowakubo; kuba ungowaseGalili, nokuthetha kwakho kuyafana nokwabo.
41_14_71_Waqala ke ukushwabula nokufunga, esithi, Andimazi loo mntu nimthethayo.
41_14_72_Yalila okwesibini inkuku. Walikhumbula ke uPetros ilizwi,  abelithethile uYesu kuye, lokuthi, Ingekalili inkuku kabini,  uya kundikhanyela kathathu. Wathi akucinga, walila.
41_15_1_Bathi, kwaoko kwakusa, ababingeleli abakhulu benza ibhunga,  ndawonye namadoda amakhulu, nababhali, nentlanganiso yamatyala iphelele; bambopha uYesu bemka naye, bamnikela kuPilato.
41_15_2_UPilato wambuza esithi, Unguye na ukumkani wamaYuda?  Waphendula ke yena wathi kuye, Nawe utsho.
41_15_3_Baye bemmangalela ke ngeendawo ezininzi ababingeleli abakhulu.
41_15_4_Wabuya ke uPilato wambuza, esithi, Akuphenduli nento na?  Khangela ukuba zininzi kwazo iindawo abazingqina ngawe.
41_15_5_Noko ke uYesu akabanga saphendula nto yena, ngokokude amangaliswe uPilato.
41_15_6_Ke kaloku imithendeleko ngemithendeleko ubeqhele ukubakhululela umbanjwa abe mnye, abasukuba bemcela.
41_15_7_Kwaye kukho ke obekuthiwa nguBharabhas, ebotshwe ndawonye nabanye abenzi besaqunge, ababulalayo nokubulala esaqungeni apho.
41_15_8_Sankqangaza isihlwele, saqala ukucela, ukuba enze ngoko abehlala esenza ngako kubo.
41_15_9_Wabaphendula ke uPilato, esithi, Nithanda ukuba ndinikhululele ukumkani wamaYuda na?
41_15_10_Kuba ebesazi ukuba ababingeleli abakhulu abo bamnikele ngomona.
41_15_11_Ke bona ababingeleli abakhulu bayixhokonxa indimbane,  ukuba icele ukuba kanye abakhululele uBharabhas.
41_15_12_Wabuya waphendula ke uPilato, wathi kubo, Ninga ndingamenzani na ngoko lowo nithi nguKumkani wamaYuda?
41_15_13_Babuya ke bankqangaza bathi, Mbethelele emnqamlezweni!
41_15_14_Wathi ke uPilato kubo, Kuba enze bubi buni na? Kwaba kukhona ke bancamisayo ukunkqangaza, besithi, Mbethelele emnqamlezweni!
41_15_15_Ke kaloku uPilato, ngokunga angasithomalalisa isihlwele,  wabakhululela uBharabhas. Emtyakatyile ke uYesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
41_15_16_Athi amasoldati amrholele ngaphakathi kwentendelezo, oko kukuthi endlwini yerhuluneli; alibizele ndawonye ibutho lawo liphela;
41_15_17_amambathise ngebomvu; aluke isithsaba sameva, amthi jize ngaso,
41_15_18_aqale ukumbulisa, athi, Aa! Kumkani wamaYuda!
41_15_19_Ayembetha entloko ngengcongolo; ayemtshicela; ayeguqa ngamadolo, aqubude kuye.
41_15_20_Athi akuba edlale ngaye, amhluba ebomvu, amambathisa kwaezakhe iingubo; amrholela phandle, ukuze ambethelele emnqamlezweni.
41_15_21_Anyanzela umhambi othile, uSimon waseKirene, evela ephandleni, lowo nguyise ka-Alesandire noRufo, ukuba awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe.
41_15_22_Amzisa endaweni yeGologota, oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, yindawo yokakayi.
41_15_23_Ayemnika iwayini enemore, ukuba ayisele; kodwa akayamkelanga.
41_15_24_Athi akumbethelela emnqamlezweni, abelana ngeengubo zakhe,  esenza amaqashiso ngazo, ukuze uthile athabathe ethile.
41_15_25_Ke kaloku, laye ililixa lesithathu, abambethelela ngalo emnqamlezweni.
41_15_26_Waye umbhalo wetyala lakhe ubhalwe ngaphezulu, kwathiwa,  uKumkani wamaYuda.
41_15_27_Kwaye kubethelelwe naye eminqamlezweni izihange zizibini,  esinye ngasekunene, esinye ngasekhohlo kwakhe.
41_15_28_Sazaliseka ke eso sibhalo sithi, Wabalelwa kwabachasene nomthetho.
41_15_29_Baye abadlulayo bemnyelisa, behlunguzela iintloko zabo,  besithi, Uha! Wena uchitha itempile, uyakhe ngeentsuku ezintathu,
41_15_30_zisindise, uhle emnqamlezweni.
41_15_31_Ngokukwanjalo nababingeleli abakhulu, bedlala ngaye phakathi kwabo, benababhali, babesithi, Abanye wabasindisa;  yena ngokwakhe akanakuzisindisa.
41_15_32_UKristu, uKumkani wakwaSirayeli, makehle kalokunje emnqamlezweni, ukuze sibone, sikholwe. Baye nabo babebethelelwe eminqamlezweni kunye naye bemngcikiva.
41_15_33_Ke kaloku lakuba lilixa lesithandathu, kwehla ubumnyama phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba, kwada kwalilixa lesithoba.
41_15_34_Ngalo ilixa lesithoba, wadanduluka uYesu ngezwi elikhulu,  esithi, Eloyi! Eloyi! Lama sabhaktani? Oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, Thixo wam! Thixo wam! undishiyeleni na?
41_15_35_Inxenye yababemi khona yakuva yathi, Yabonani, ubiza uEliya.
41_15_36_Wagidima ke omnye, wazalisa imfunxa ngeviniga, wayifaka engcongolweni, wamseza, esithi, Khanenze kuhle, khe sibone ukuba uEliya woza kumthula na.
41_15_37_Wathi ke uYesu, ekhuphe izwi elikhulu, waphuma umphefumlo.
41_15_38_Lathi ikhuselo lengcwele lakrazuka kubini, lithabathela phezulu lada lesa phantsi.
41_15_39_Ebonile ke umthetheli-khulu obemi malunga naye, ukuba wenjenjalo ukudanduluka waphuma umphefumlo, uthe, Inyaniso, lo mntu ubenguNyana kaThixo.
41_15_40_Kwaye ke kukho nabafazi, bekhangele bemgama; kubo apho wayenguMariya waseMagadala, noMariya unina wooYakobi omnci nokaYose, kwanoSalome;
41_15_41_ababesithi, oko ebeba kwelaseGalili, bamlandele,  bamlungiselele; nabanye abaninzi, ababenyuke naye ukuya eYerusalem.
41_15_42_Kuthe sekuhlwile, ekubeni ibiyimini yokulungiselela, oko kukuthi ngumhla ophambi kwesabatha,
41_15_43_kweza uYosefu, owaseArimati, umphakathi obekekileyo,  owayebulindile naye ubukumkani bukaThixo; waya kungena ngobuganga kuPilato, wacela umzimba kaYesu.
41_15_44_Wamangaliswa ke uPilato kukuba selefile. Ebizele kuye umthetheli-khulu, wambuza ukuba uselenexesha na efile.
41_15_45_Wathi akuqonda kumthetheli-khulu lowo, wamnika uYosefu umzimba.
41_15_46_Yena, ethenge ilinen entle, wamthula; wamsongela kuyo ilinen entle; wamlalisa engcwabeni elalixholwe eweni;  waqengqela ilitye emnyango wengcwaba.
41_15_47_Baye ke ooMariya waseMagadala, noMariya unina kaYose,  bebona apho wayebekwe khona.
41_16_1_Yakubon ukuba idlule isabatha, ooMariya waseMagadala,  noMariya unina kaYakobi, noSalome, bathenga ubulawu, ukuba beze bamthambise.
41_16_2_Bathi kwakusasa kakhulu, ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, beza engcwabeni, liphumile ilanga.
41_16_3_Baye bethetha bodwa, besithi, Ngubani na oya kusiqengqela ilitye, lisuke emnyango wengcwaba?
41_16_4_Bathi bakukhangela, babona ukuba liqengqiwe lesuka ilitye;  kuba belilikhulu kakhulu.
41_16_5_Bakungena engcwabeni, babona indodana ihleli ngasekunene,  izithe wambu ngengubo ende, emhlophe; baqhiphuka umbilini.
41_16_6_Ithi ke yona kubo, Musani ukuqhiphuka umbilini; nifuna uYesu waseNazarete, obebethelelwe emnqamlezweni. Uvukile,  akakho apha; nantsi indawo ababembeke kuyo.
41_16_7_Hambani ke niye, nibaxelele abafundi bakhe noPetros ukuthi,  uyanandulela ukuya kwelaseGalili; nombona khona apho,  njengokuba wayetshilo kuni.
41_16_8_Baphuma ke kamsinya, babaleka engcwabeni. Baye ke bephethwe lungcangcazelo nokuthi nqa; abathetha nto nakubani, kuba babesoyika.
41_16_9_Ke kaloku wathi uYesu, evuke ekufeni kusasa ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, wabonakala kuqala kuMariya waseMagadala,  awayekhuphe kuye iidemon zasixhenxe.
41_16_10_Waya yena wabikela ababenaye, bakubon ukuba bakhedamile,  bayalila.
41_16_11_Basuka nabo, bakuva ukuba uhleli, nokuba ukhe wabonwa nguye, abakholwa.
41_16_12_Emveni koko ke, wabonakaliswa ngesinye isimo kwababini bakubo, behamba besinga emaphandleni.
41_16_13_Nabo baya babikela abanye; abakholwa nangabo.
41_16_14_Kamva wabonakalaliswa kwabalishumi elinamnye, behleli ngasesithebeni; wakungcikiva ukungakholwa kwabo, nobulukhuni beentliziyo zabo; ngokuba bengakholwanga ngabo babembonile evukile.
41_16_15_Wathi kubo, Hambani niye kulo lonke ihlabathi,  nizivakalise iindaba ezilungileyo kuyo yonke indalo.
41_16_16_Lowo ukholiweyo wabhaptizwa, wosindiswa; ke yena ongakholwanga, wogwetywa.
41_16_17_Imiqondiso ke eya kulandelana nabo bakholiweyo nantsi:  egameni lam baya kukhupha iidemon; baya kuthetha ngeelwimi ezintsha;
41_16_18_baya kuphatha iinyoka; nokuba bathe basela into ebulalayo,  ayikukha ibenzakalise bona; baya kubeka izandla phezu kwemilwelwe, iphile.
41_16_19_Yathi okunene ngoko yona iNkosi, emveni kokuthetha kubo,  yanyuselwa emazulwini, yahlala ngasekunene kukaThixo.
41_16_20_Ke bona baphuma, bavakalisa ezindaweni zonke, iNkosi isebenza nabo, iliqinisela ilizwi ngayo imiqondiso ephelekana nalo. Amen.
42_1_1_Bethe nje ke abaninzi bazamela ukucacisa ibali lezo zinto ziziziganeko phakathi kwethu,
42_1_2_njengoko basinikelayo abo, bathi kwasekuqaleni baba ngababoneli nabakhonzi balo ilizwi:
42_1_3_kwabonakala kulungile nakum, ndizilandile nje ngokucokisekileyo zonke, ndizekela kwasentloko, ukuba ndikubhalele ngokucacileyo, Tiyofilo odume kunene,
42_1_4_ukuze uyazi kakuhle ingqiniseko yamazwi owafundisiweyo ngomlomo.
42_1_5_Ngemihla kaHerode ukumkani wakwaYuda, kwaye kukho umbingeleli othile, ogama linguZekariya, engoweqela lika-Abhiya, nomfazi wakhe engowasezintombini zika-Aron, igama lakhe linguElizabhete.
42_1_6_Bebengamalungisa ke bobabini emehlweni kaThixo, behamba ngayo yonke imithetho nemimiselo yeNkosi, bengenakusoleka.
42_1_7_Baye bengenamntwana, ngokokuba uElizabhete ebengazali,  kanjalo bobabini babesebekhulile.
42_1_8_Kwathi ke kaloku, ekubuphatheni ububingeleli bakhe ngexesha leqela lakhe phambi koThixo,
42_1_9_ngokwesiko lobubingeleli, kwaba liqashiso lakhe ukuba aqhumise ubulawu, akuba engene endaweni engcwele yeNkosi.
42_1_10_Yaye yonke inkitha yabantu ithandaza ngaphandle ngelixa lesiqhumiso.
42_1_11_Kwabonakala ke kuye isithunywa seNkosi, simi ngasekunene kwesibingelelo sesiqhumiso.
42_1_12_Wakhathazeka uZekariya, akusibona, wangenelwa kukoyika.
42_1_13_Sathi ke isithunywa eso kuye, Musa ukoyika, Zekariya,  ngokokuba isikhungo sakho siviwe; wothi ke umfazi wakho uElizabhete akuzalele unyana, umthiye igama elinguYohane.
42_1_14_Uya kuba nokuvuya nokugcoba, bathi nabaninzi bakuvuyele ukuzalwa kwakhe.
42_1_15_Kuba uya kuba mkhulu emehlweni eNkosi, angakhe asele wayini nasiselo sinxilisayo; uya kuzaliswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele kwasekuzalweni kwakhe.
42_1_16_Nento eninzi ke yoonyana bakaSirayeli uya kuyibuyisela eNkosini uThixo wabo.
42_1_17_Yena uya kuhamba phambi kobuso bayo, enomoya enamandla kaEliya, ukuba azibuyisele iintliziyo zooyise kubantwana,  nabangevayo kuko ukuqonda kwamalungisa, alungisele iNkosi abantu abalungisiweyo.
42_1_18_Wathi uZekariya kuso isithunywa, Ndiya kukwazi ngani na oko? Kuba mna ndimdala, waye nomfazi wam selekhulile.
42_1_19_Saphendula ke isithunywa, sathi kuye, Mna ndinguGabriyeli,  oma phambi koThixo. Ndithunyiwe ukuba ndithethe kuwe,  ndikushumayeze ezi ndaba zilungileyo.
42_1_20_Uyabona, uya kuba sisidenge, ungabi nako ukuthetha, kude kube yimini eziya kuthi zenzeke ngayo ezi zinto, ngenxa enokuba ungakholwanga ngamazwi am; aya kuzalisekiswa wona ngexesha lawo.
42_1_21_Baye abantu bemlindile uZekariya, bemangalisiwe kukulibala kwakhe endaweni engcwele leyo.
42_1_22_Uthe ke akuphuma, akaba nako ukuthetha kubo; baqonda ukuba ubone umbono endaweni engcwele apho, waye yena emana ukunqwala kubo, wahlala engathethi.
42_1_23_Kwathi yakuzaliseka imihla yombuso wakhe, wemka waya endlwini yakhe.
42_1_24_Emveni kwayo loo mihla ke, uElizabhete umfazi wakhe wathabatha, wazizimeza iinyanga zantlanu, esithi,
42_1_25_Yenjenje iNkosi kum ngemihla eyandikhangelayo, ukuba ikususe ukungcikiveka kwam phakathi kwabantu.
42_1_26_Ke kaloku ngenyanga yesithandathu, isithunywa esinguGabriyeli sathunyelwa nguThixo emzini welaseGalili, ogama liyiNazarete,
42_1_27_kwintombi, eganelwe indoda egama linguYosefu, yendlu kaDavide; laye igama lentombi leyo linguMariya.
42_1_28_Sangena isithunywa kuye, sathi, Vuya, wena ubabalweyo!  INkosi inawe; usikelelwe wena phakathi kwabafazi.
42_1_29_Uthe ke akusibona, wee qhiphu umbilini ngenxa yelizwi laso;  wayecamanga ukuba ungaba mbuliso mni na lo.
42_1_30_Sathi ke isithunywa kuye, Musa ukoyika, Mariya; kuba ubabalwe nguThixo.
42_1_31_Uyabona, uya kuthabatha esizalweni, uzale unyana, umthiye igama elinguYesu.
42_1_32_Yena uya kuba mkhulu, abizwe ngokuba nguNyana wOsenyangweni; iNkosi uThixo iya kumnika itrone kaDavide,
42_1_33_uyise, abe ngukumkani phezu kwendlu kaYakobi kude kube ngunaphakade, nobukumkani bakhe bungabi nasiphelo.
42_1_34_Wathi ke uMariya kuso isithunywa, Kuya kuthini na ukubakho oku, ndingazani nandoda nje?
42_1_35_Saphendula isithunywa sathi kuye, UMoya oyiNgcwele uya kuza phezu kwakho, athi namandla Osenyangweni akusibekele; kungoko loo nto ingcwele izalwa nguwe iya kubizwa ngokuba nguNyana kaThixo.
42_1_36_Uyabona, uElizabhete, ozalana nawe, naye umithe unyana ebudaleni bakhe; nale yinyanga yesithandathu kuye, lowo bekuthiwa ngongazaliyo;
42_1_37_ngokuba akukho nanye into eya kumnqabela yena uThixo.
42_1_38_Wathi ke uMariya, Nanko umkhonzazana weNkosi; makwenzeke kum ngokwelizwi lakho. Saza isithunywa semka kuye.
42_1_39_Ke kaloku, wesuka uMariya ngaloo mihla, wasinga kweleentaba ngobungxamo, emzini wakwaYuda;
42_1_40_wangena endlwini kaZekariya, wambulisa uElizabhete.
42_1_41_Kwathi, akuwuva uElizabhete umbuliso kaMariya, lwasuka lwaxhuma usana esizalweni sakhe, wesuka wazala nguMoya oyiNgcwele uElizabhete.
42_1_42_Wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, wathi, Unentsikelelo wena phakathi kwabafazi; sinentsikelelo nesiqhamo sesizalo sakho.
42_1_43_Kuhle ngani na kum, ukuthi unina weNkosi yam eze kum?
42_1_44_Kuba uyabona, kuthe lakubakho izwi lombuliso wakho ezindlebeni zam, lwasuka lwaxhuma usana ngokugcoba esizalweni sam.
42_1_45_Unoyolo lowo wakholwayo koko; ngokuba kuya kubakho inzaliseko yezo zinto zithethiweyo kuye yiNkosi.
42_1_46_Wathi uMariya: Umphefumlo wam uyenza nkulu iNkosi,
42_1_47_Nomoya wam ugcobile ngoThixo uMsindisi wam;
42_1_48_Ngokuba wakukhangela ukuthobeka komkhonzazana wakhe; Kuba,  uyabona, ziya kuqala kwangoku ukuthi ndingonoyolo zonke izizukulwana;
42_1_49_Ngokuba wandenzela izinto ezinkulu uSomandla; Lingcwele igama lakhe.
42_1_50_Yaye inceba yakhe ikwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana Kwabo bamoyikayo.
42_1_51_Wenze amandla ngengalo yakhe, Wabachithachitha abanekratshi ekucingeni kweentliziyo zabo.
42_1_52_Wabawisa abanamandla ezitroneni zabo, Wabaphakamisa abathobekileyo.
42_1_53_Wahluthisa abalambileyo ngezinto ezilungileyo; Wabandulula abazizityebi belambatha.
42_1_54_Wasiza uSirayeli, umkhonzi wakhe, Ngokukhumbula inceba yakhe;
42_1_55_Njengoko wathethayo koobawo bethu, KuAbraham nakwimbewu yakhe ngonaphakade.
42_1_56_Wahlala ke uMariya naye iinyanga ngathi zaba ntathu, waza wabuyela ekhaya.
42_1_57_Ke kaloku, ixesha likaElizabhete lazaliseka lokuba azale;  wazala unyana.
42_1_58_Beva abamelwane nemizalwane yakhe, ukuba iNkosi iyenze nkulu inceba yayo kuye, baye ke bevuyisana naye.
42_1_59_Kwathi ngomhla wesibhozo, beza kumalusa umntwana; baye bemthiya igama likayise, besithi nguZekariya;
42_1_60_koko waphendulayo unina, wathi, Hayi; uya kubizwa ngokuba nguYohane.
42_1_61_Bathi kuye, Akukho namnye ubizwa ngelo gama kwimizalwane yakho.
42_1_62_Baye ke benqwala kuyise besithi, angathanda ukuba athiweni na ukubizwa.
42_1_63_Wabiza icwecwana, wabhala esithi, Igama lakhe nguYohane.  Bamangaliswa bonke.
42_1_64_Wavuleka ke kwaoko umlomo wakhe, lwathukululeka nolwimi lwakhe, wamana ethetha, ebonga uThixo.
42_1_65_Kwehla ukoyika phezu kwalo lonke umelwane lwabo; kwaye kulo lonke eleentaba lakwaYuda kuxoxwa ngazo zonke ezi zinto.
42_1_66_Bathi bonke abazivayo, bazibeka entliziyweni yabo, besithi,  Azi uya kuba yintoni na lo mntwana? Saye isandla seNkosi sinaye.
42_1_67_UZekariya uyise wazala nguMoya oyiNgcwele, waprofeta esithi:
42_1_68_Mayibongwe iNkosi, uThixo kaSirayeli, Ngokuba ibavelele yabakhulula ngentlawulelo abantu bayo.
42_1_69_Yasiphakamisela uphondo losindiso Endlwini kaDavide,  umkhonzi wayo,
42_1_70_Njengoko yathethayo ngomlomo wabangcwele, ababengabaprofeti bayo kwasephakadeni;
42_1_71_Usindiso lokusisindisa ezintshabeni zethu, nasesandleni sabo bonke abo basithiyayo;
42_1_72_Ukubenzela inceba oobawo bethu, Nokukhumbula umnqophiso wayo ongcwele,
42_1_73_Isifungo eyasifungela uAbraham ubawo wethu,
42_1_74_Sokusinika ukuba sithi, sihlangulwe esandleni seentshaba zethu, Siyikhonze singenakoyika,
42_1_75_Ngobungcwele nangobulungisa emehlweni ayo, yonke imihla yobomi bethu.
42_1_76_Nawe, mntwana, uya kubizwa ngokuba ungumprofeti wOsenyangweni, Kuba uya kuhamba phambi kobuso beNkosi, ulungise iindlela zayo,
42_1_77_Ukuze ubanike abantu bayo ukwaziwa kosindiso Ngoxolelo lwezono zabo,
42_1_78_Ngenxa yenceba nemfesane yoThixo wethu, Othe ngaye wasivelela umso wasenyangweni,
42_1_79_Ukuba ukhanye kwabo bahleliyo emnyameni, nasethunzi nilokufa, Ukuba uzingenise iinyawo zethu endleleni yoxolo.
42_1_80_Wakhula umntwana, waya esomelela ngomoya; waye esentlango,  kwada kwayimini yokubonakalaliswa kwakhe kuSirayeli.
42_2_1_Ke kaloku kwathi ngaloo mihla, kwaphuma ummiselo kuKesare Awugusto othi, malibhalwe encwadini yomlibo wokuzalwa lonke elimiweyo.
42_2_2_Olo lubhalo lwaba lolokuqala, akubon ukuba uKireniyo uyirhuluneli yeSiriya.
42_2_3_Babesithi bonke baye kubhalwa, athi elowo aye kowakowabo umzi.
42_2_4_Wenyuka ke noYosefu, evela kwelaseGalili, kumzi oyiNazarete,  waya kwelakwaYuda, emzini kaDavide, ekuthiwa yiBhetelehem,  ngenxa yokuba ebengowendlu kaDavide, engowemizalwane yakhe;
42_2_5_esiya kubhalwa, enoMariya, umfazi lowo wayemganelwe,  selekhulelwe.
42_2_6_Ke kaloku kwathi, xa bakhona, yazaliseka imihla yokuba azale.
42_2_7_Wamzala unyana wakhe wamazibulo, wamsongela eziqhiyeni,  wamlalisa emkhumbini wesitali, ngenxa enokuba babengenandawo endlwini yabahambi.
42_2_8_Kwaye kukho abalusi kwakwelo lizwe, behlala ezindle, belinda ebusuku imihlambi yabo.
42_2_9_Babona ngesithunywa seNkosi simi phezu kwabo, bathi nobuqaqawuli beNkosi bababengezelela ngeenxa zonke; besuka boyika ngokoyika okukhulu.
42_2_10_Isithunywa eso sathi kubo, Musani ukoyika; kuba, yabonani,  ndinishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zovuyo olukhulu, oluya kuba kubo bonke bantu;
42_2_11_ngokuba nizalelwe namhlanje emzini kaDavide uMsindisi,  onguKristu iNkosi.
42_2_12_Nantsi ke into eyoba ngumqondiso kuni: nofumana lusana lusongelweyo eziqhiyeni, lulele emkhumbini wesitali.
42_2_13_Kwabakho ngesiquphe, ndawonye nesithunywa eso, inkitha yomkhosi wasemazulwini, idumisa uThixo, isithi,
42_2_14_Uzuko kuThixo enyangweni, Uxolo emhlabeni, Inkolelo ebantwini.
42_2_15_Kwathi ke, zakumka kubo izithunywa zisiya emazulwini,  abantu abo abalusi bathi omnye komnye, Masesihamba sisiya eBhetelehem apho, siyibone le nto ihlileyo, esiyazisiweyo yiNkosi.
42_2_16_Beza ngobungxamo, bamfumana uMariya, kwanoYosefu, nalo usana lulele emkhumbini wesitali.
42_2_17_Bathi ke, bakubona, balibhengeza ilizwi elabe lithethwe kubo ngaye lo mntwana.
42_2_18_Bathi bonke abo bevayo, bamangaliswa zezo zinto zabe zithethwe kubo ngabalusi.
42_2_19_Waye ke uMariya ezigcina zonke ezi zinto eziguquguqula entliziyweni yakhe.
42_2_20_Babuya abalusi, bemzukisa bemdumisa uThixo, ngenxa yazo zonke izinto ababezivile nababezibonile, njengoko kwabe kuthethiwe kubo.
42_2_21_Xeshikweni ke zazizalisekile iintsuku ezisibhozo zokuba umntwana aluswe, wathiywa igama elinguYesu, elo wabelithiyiwe sisithunywa sezulu, engekamithwa nokumithwa.
42_2_22_Xeshikweni ke zazizalisekile iintsuku zokuhlanjululwa kwabo ngokomthetho kaMoses, benyuka naye baya eYerusalem, ukuba bammise phambi kweNkosi,
42_2_23_njengoko kubhaliweyo emthethweni weNkosi, kwathiwa, Yonke into eliduna, evula isizalo, ize kuthiwe ingcwele eNkosini;
42_2_24_nokuba benze idini njengoko kutshiwoyo emthethweni weNkosi ukuthi, Isibini samahobe, nokuba ngamagobo amabini amavukuthu.
42_2_25_Kwaye ke kukho umntu eYerusalem, ogama linguSimon; waye loo mntu elilungisa, emoyika uThixo, elinde intuthuzelo kaSirayeli;  waye noMoya oyiNgcwele ephezu kwakhe.
42_2_26_Wayehlatyelwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele, ukuba akayi kubona kufa,  engekamboni uKristu weNkosi.
42_2_27_Weza ngaye uMoya etempileni; kwathi, ekumngeniseni kwabo abazali umntwana uYesu, ukuba bamenze ngokwesiko lomthetho,
42_2_28_yena wamamkelela ezingalweni zakhe, wabonga uThixo, wathi:
42_2_29_Uyamndulula ngoku umkhonzi wakho enoxolo, Mnini-nto-zonke,  ngokwelizwi lakho;
42_2_30_Ngokuba amehlo am alubonile usindiso lwakho,
42_2_31_Olulungisileyo ebusweni bazo zonke izizwe,
42_2_32_Isikhanyiso sokutyhilela iintlanga, Uzuko lwabantu bakho,  amaSirayeli.
42_2_33_Babemangaliswa ooYosefu nonina zezo zinto zithethwayo ngaye.
42_2_34_USimon wabasikelela, wathi kuMariya unina, Uyabona, lo umiselwe ukuwa nokuvuka kwabaninzi kwaSirayeli, nokuba abe ngumqondiso ochasiweyo;
42_2_35_ngokokuze zibe nokutyhilwa izicamango eziphuma ezintliziyweni ezininzi; ewe ke, nowakho umphefumlo ikrele liya kuwutyhutyha.
42_2_36_Kwaye kukho noAna umprofetikazi, intombi kaFanuweli,  wesizwe sika-Ashere. Yena waye eselekhulile kakhulu; waye ke ebehleli nendoda iminyaka esixhenxe, ethabathela ebuntombini bakhe.
42_2_37_Waye yena engumhlolokazi ominyaka ngathi imashumi asibhozo anamine, obengemki etempileni, ekhonza uThixo ngokuzila ukudla nangokukhunga ubusuku nemini.
42_2_38_Yena wayemele kufuphi ngelo lixa, wathelela ekuyidumiseni iNkosi; wayethetha ngayo kubo bonke abo babelinde ukukhululwa ngentlawulelo, eYerusalem.
42_2_39_Bakuba bezigqibile zonke izinto ngokomthetho weNkosi,  babuyela kwelaseGalili, emzini wabo iNazarete.
42_2_40_Ke kaloku wakhula umntwana, waya esomelela emoyeni, ezele bubulumko; lwaye nobabalo lukaThixo luphezu kwakhe.
42_2_41_Baye ke abazali bakhe behambela eYerusalem, iminyaka ngeminyaka, emthendelekweni wepasika.
42_2_42_Kuthe, xa abe eminyaka ilishumi elinamibini ezelwe,  bakubon ukuba banyuke baya eYerusalem ngokwesiko lomthendeleko lowo,
42_2_43_bakubon ukuba bazigqibile ke iintsuku ezo, ekubuyeni kwabo, umntwana uYesu wasalela eYerusalem. Babengazi ke uYosefu nonina.
42_2_44_Babeba ke bona usemkhokweni wabahambi, bahamba uhambo lwamini-nye; bamana bemfuna phakathi kwemizalwana, naphakathi kwabazana nabo.
42_2_45_Bathe bakuba bengamfumani, babuyela eYerusalem, bemfuna.
42_2_46_Kwathi, emveni kwemihla emithathu, bamfumana etempileni,  ehleli phakathi kwabafundisi, ebaphulaphula, ebuya ebabuza.
42_2_47_Basuka bonke ababemphulaphula bathi nqa yingqondo yakhe na ziimpendulo zakhe.
42_2_48_Bakumbona bakhwankqiswa. Unina wathi kuye, Mntwana wam,  yini na ukuba usenjenje? Uyabona, uyihlo nam sibe sikufuna,  sibuhlungu kakhulu.
42_2_49_Wathi kubo, Benindifunela ntoni na? Beningazi na ukuba ndimelwe kukuba ndibe semicimbini kaBawo?
42_2_50_Ke bona abayiqondanga into awayeyithetha kubo.
42_2_51_Wehla nabo, waya kufika eNazarete, wabalulamela. Wamana ukuzigcina ke unina zonke ezo ndawo entliziyweni yakhe.
42_2_52_Waye UYesu ehambela phambili ebulumkweni nasebukhulwini,  nasekuthandweni nguThixo nangabantu.
42_3_1_Ke kaloku, ngomnyaka weshumi elinantlanu wokulawula kukaTibheriyo Kesare, inguPontiyo Pilato irhuluneli kwelakwaYuda, inguHerode umphathi wesahlulo sesine esilelaseGalili, inguFilipu ke umzalwana wakhe umphathi wesahlulo sesine esilelaseYitureya nelizwe leTrakoniti,  inguLisaniyo umphathi wesahlulo sesine esilelaseAbhilene,
42_3_2_ngexa lababingeleli abakhulu ooAnas noKayafa, lafika ilizwi likaThixo kuYohane, unyana kaZekariya, entlango.
42_3_3_Weza kuwo wonke ummandla waseYordan, evakalisa ubhaptizo lwenguquko ukuze kuxolelwe izono;
42_3_4_njengoko kubhaliweyo encwadini yamazwi kaIsaya umprofeti,  esithi, Izwi lodandulukayo entlango, lisithi, Yilungiseni indlela yeNkosi, Wutyenenezeni umendo wayo.
42_3_5_Yonke imifula iya kudityelelwa, Nazo zonke iintaba neenduli ziya kuthotywa, Neendawo ezigoso ziya kuthi tye, Nezibugqagala ziya kuba ziindlela ezigudileyo;
42_3_6_Bonke abantu baya kulubona usindiso lukaThixo.
42_3_7_Wayesithi ngoko kuzo izihlwele ezaziphuma zisiza kubhaptizwa nguye, Nzalandini yamarhamba, ngubani na owanibonisayo, ukuba niyibaleke ingqumbo ezayo?
42_3_8_Velisani ngoko iziqhamo eziyifaneleyo inguquko; ize ningaqali nithi ngaphakathi kwenu, Thina sinobawo uAbraham:  kuba ndithi kuni, Unako uThixo kuwo la matye ukumvelisela abantwana uAbraham.
42_3_9_Kananjalo izembe selibekiwe engcanjini yemithi; ngoko umthi wonke ongavelisi siqhamo sihle, uyagawulwa, uphoswe emlilweni.
42_3_10_Zaye izihlwele zibuza kuye, zisithi, Masenze ntoni na ke?
42_3_11_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Lowo uneengubo zangaphantsi ezimbini, makabele ongenayo: nalowo unokudla, makenjenjalo.
42_3_12_Kweza ke nababuthi berhafu ukuba babhaptizwe, bathi kuye,  Mfundisi, masenze ntoni na?
42_3_13_Wathi ke kubo, Ningabizi okungaphezu kwenikumiselweyo.
42_3_14_Ayebuza kuye ke namasoldati, esithi, Masenze ntoni na ke thina? Wathi kuwo, Ningaphangi mntu ngokumoyikisa, ningadli mntu ngokumtyhola; yanelani yimivuzo yenu.
42_3_15_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba abantu balindile, becamanga bonke ezintliziyweni zabo ngaye uYohane, ukuba akangebi nguye na uKristu,
42_3_16_waphendula uYohane kubo bonke esithi, Mna okunene ndinibhaptiza ngamanzi; kodwa uyeza lowo unamandla kunam,  endingafanelekileyo ukuba ndiwuthukulule nomtya weembadada zakhe; uya kunibhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele nangomlilo yena;
42_3_17_omnyazi wokwela usesandleni sakhe. Uya kusicokisa kuthi tu isanda sakhe, ayibuthele kuvimba wakhe ingqolowa; ke wona umququ uya kuwutshisa ngomlilo ongacimekiyo.
42_3_18_Waye ke ngoko evuselela nangezinye izinto ezininzi,  eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo ebantwini.
42_3_19_Ke kaloku uHerode, umphathi wesahlulo sesine selizwe,  ohlwayiwe nguye ngenxa kaHerodiya, umfazi kaFilipu umninawa wakhe, nangenxa yezinto zonke ezingendawo abezenzile uHerode,
42_3_20_wongezelela nale kuzo zonke, yokuba amvalele entolongweni uYohane.
42_3_21_Ke kaloku kwathi, ekubeni bebhaptiziwe abantu bonke,  ebhaptiziwe naye uYesu, ethandaza nokuthandaza, lasuka lavuleka izulu,
42_3_22_wehla phezu kwakhe uMoya oyiNgcwele, enembonakalo yomzimba onjengehobe. Kweza nezwi eliphuma ezulwini lisithi, Wena unguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo nguwe.
42_3_23_Waye uYesu eminyaka ngathi imashumi mathathu ezelwe,  ukuqala kwakhe ukufundisa, engobe kusithiwa ngunyana kaYosefu,  kaHeli,
42_3_24_kaMatati, kaLevi, kaMeleki, kaYana, kaYosefu,
42_3_25_kaMatatiya, ka-Amos, kaNahum, kaEsli, kaNagayi,
42_3_26_kaMahati, kaMatatiya, kaShimehi, kaYosefu, kaYuda,
42_3_27_kaYohanan, kaResha, kaZerubhabheli, kaShalatiyeli, kaNeri,
42_3_28_kaMeleki, ka-Adi, kaKosam, kaElmodam, kaEre,
42_3_29_kaYose, kaEliyezere, kaYoram, kaMatati, kaLevi,
42_3_30_kaSimon, kaYuda, kaYosefu, kaYonan, kaEliyakim,
42_3_31_kaMaleya, kaMina, kaMatata, kaNatan, kaDavide,
42_3_32_kaYese, kaObhede, kaBhohazi, kaSalemon kaNashon,
42_3_33_ka-Aminadabhi, ka-Aram, kaHetseron, kaPeretse, kaYuda,
42_3_34_kaYakobi, kaIsake, ka-Abraham, kaTera, kaNahore,
42_3_35_kaSerugi, kaRehu, kaPelege, kaHebhere, kaShela,
42_3_36_kaKenan, ka-Arpakishadi, kaShem, kaNowa, kaLameki,
42_3_37_kaMetusela, kaEnoki, kaYerede, kaMahalaleli, kaKenan,
42_3_38_kaEnos, kaSete, ka-Adam, kaThixo.
42_4_1_Ke kaloku, wathi uYesu, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele, wabuya eYordan, wesiwa nguMoya entlango.
42_4_2_Wantsuku zimashumi mane ehendwa nguMtyholi. Akadla nto ngezo ntsuku; zakuphela ke, walamba.
42_4_3_Wathi uMtyholi kuye, Ukuba unguNyana kaThixo, yitsho kweli litye libe sisonka.
42_4_4_UYesu wamphendula esithi, Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Akungasonka sodwa aya kuphila umntu; kungamazwi onke kaThixo.
42_4_5_UMtyholi, emnyuse entabeni ephakamileyo, wambonisa zonke izikumkani zelimiweyo, ngesiquphe sexesha.
42_4_6_Wathi ke uMtyholi kuye, Ndokunika bonke obu bukhosi bazo nozuko lwazo; ngokuba bunikelwe kum; nosukuba ndithanda ndiyamnika bona.
42_4_7_Ukuba ngoko uthe wena waqubuda phambi kwam, konke oko koba kokwakho.
42_4_8_UYesu wamphendula wathi, Suka umke, uye emva kwam, Sathana,  ngokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uze uqubude eNkosini uThixo wakho,  ukhonze yena yedwa.
42_4_9_Wamsa eYerusalem, wammisa eluchochoyini lwetempile, wathi kuye, Ukuba unguye uNyana kaThixo, ziphose ezantsi phaya.
42_4_10_Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uya kuziwisela umthetho ngawe izithunywa zakhe, ukuba zikugcine;
42_4_11_kwathiwa, Ziya kukufukula ngezandla, Hleze ubetheke etyeni ngonyawo lwakho.
42_4_12_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Kuthiwe, Uze ungayihendi iNkosi uThixo wakho.
42_4_13_Waza uMtyholi, ekugqibile konke ukuhenda, wesuka kuye umzuzu.
42_4_14_Wabuya uYesu enamandla oMoya, weza kwelaseGalili; kwaphuma udaba ngaye, lwaya kuloo mmandla wonke.
42_4_15_Wabe yena efundisa ezindlwini zabo zesikhungu, ezukiswa ngabo bonke.
42_4_16_Wafika eNazarete, apho waye ondlelwe khona, wangena ngokwesiko lakhe ngomhla wesabatha endlwini yesikhungu, wesuka wema ukuba alese.
42_4_17_Wanikelwa incwadi kaIsaya umprofeti, wathi, akuba eyitwabulule incwadi leyo, wafumana indawo le kubhalwe kuyo kwathiwa,
42_4_18_UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwam, Ethe ngenxa yoko yandithambisela ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo kumahlwempu. Indithume ukuba ndiphilise abantliziyo ityumkileyo, ndivakalise inkululeko kubathinjwa, Nokubuyiselwa kokubona kwabaziimfama, Ndindulule abaqobekileyo bekhululekile,
42_4_19_Ndivakalise umnyaka owamkelekileyo weNkosi.
42_4_20_Eyisongile ke incwadi, wayibuyisela kwisicaka, wahlala phantsi. Aye amehlo abo bonke abasendlwini yesikhungu enamathele kuye.
42_4_21_Waqala ke ukuthi kubo, Namhlanje esi sibhalo sizalisekile ezindlebeni zenu.
42_4_22_Baye bonke bemngqinela, bemangaliswa ngamazwi amnandi aphuma emlonyeni wakhe; babesithi, Lo asinguye na unyana kaYosefu?
42_4_23_Wathi kubo, Kakade niya kuwuthetha kum lo mzekeliso uthi,  Gqirha, ziphilise; okungangoko sikuve kwenzeke eKapernahum,  kwenze nakowenu apha.
42_4_24_Wathi ke, Inene, ndithi kuni, Akukho mprofeti wamkelekileyo kowabo.
42_4_25_Kodwa inene ndithi kuni, Babebaninzi abahlolokazi kwaSirayeli ngemihla kaEliya, oko lalivingcekile izulu iminyaka emithathu eneenyanga ezintandathu, xeshikweni kwakukho indlala enkulu kulo lonke ilizwe;
42_4_26_kanti uEliya akathunywanga nakumnye kubo; wathunywa eTsarfati yakwaTsidon kumhlolokazi, kwakuphela.
42_4_27_Kanjalo babebaninzi abaneqhenqa kwaSirayeli ngexesha likaElisha umprofeti; kanti ke akuhlanjululwanga namnye kubo,  yaba nguNahaman umSiriya kwaba kuphela.
42_4_28_Bazala ngumsindo bonke ababesendlwini yesikhungu, bakuziva ezo zinto.
42_4_29_Besuka bamkhuphela ngaphandle komzi, bamrholela elungqamekweni lwentaba, owakhelwe kuyo umzi wabo, ukuze bamphose ezantsi eweni.
42_4_30_Usuke yena wacanda phakathi kwabo, wemka.
42_4_31_Wehla waya eKapernahum, umzi welaseGalili; wayebafundisa ngesabatha.
42_4_32_Baye ke bekhwankqiswa kukufundisa kwakhe; ngokuba ilizwi lakhe libe linegunya.
42_4_33_Kwaye kukho endlwini yesikhungu apho umntu onomoya wedemon engcolileyo;
42_4_34_wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, esithi, Yoo! yini na enathi nawe,  Yesu waseNazarete? Uze kusitshabalalisa na? Ndiyakwazi wena,  lowo unguye; ungoyiNgcwele kaThixo.
42_4_35_Wawukhalimela uYesu, esithi, Yithi tu, uphume kuye. Yasuka idemon yamjulela esazulwini, yaphuma kuye ingamenzakalisanga.
42_4_36_Besuka bathi qhiphu umbilini bonke, baye bethetha bodwa besithi, Lilizwi lini na eli, le nto abathethela ngegunya nangamandla oomoya abangcolileyo aba, baze baphume?
42_4_37_Lwaye luphuma udaba lwakhe, lusiya kuzo zonke iindawo zaloo mmandla.
42_4_38_Esukile endlwini yesikhungu, wangena endlwini kaSimon. Waye ke umkhwekazi kaSimon ebanjwe yicesina enkulu; bambika kuye.
42_4_39_Wema phezu kwakhe, wayikhalimela icesina, yamyeka; evukile ke kwangoko, wamana ebalungiselela.
42_4_40_Kuthe ke bakubon ukuba liyatshona ilanga, bonke abo babenabafayo zizifo ngezifo, babazisa kuye; wazibeka izandla phezu kwabo bonke ngabanye, wabaphilisa.
42_4_41_Zaye ke needemon ziphuma kwabaninzi, zikhala zisithi, Wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo. Uthe ezikhalimela, akazivumela ukuba zithethe; ngokuba bezimazi ukuba unguye uKristu.
42_4_42_Kwakusa, waphuma waya endaweni eyintlango; zaye izihlwele zimfuna, zada zaza kufika kuye; zazimbambezela ukuba angemki kuzo.
42_4_43_Uthe ke kuzo, Ndimelwe kukuba ndizishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bukaThixo nakweminye imizi, ngokuba ndithunywe oko.
42_4_44_Waye ezivakalisa ke ezindlwini zesikhungu zelaseGalili.
42_5_1_Ke kaloku kuthe, ekubeni zimxinile izihlwele, ziza kuva ilizwi likaThixo, wesuka wema ngasedikeni laseGenesarete.
42_5_2_Wabona imikhombe emibini imi ngasedikeni apho; babe ke ababambisi beentlanzi bephumile kuyo, behlamba iminatha yabo.
42_5_3_Wathi ke, engene komnye umkhombe, owawungokaSimon, wamcela ukuba akhe akhwelelise kancinane emhlabeni; waza, ehleli phantsi, wamana ezifundisa izihlwele esemkhombeni apho.
42_5_4_Akupheza ke ukuthetha, wathi kuSimon, Khwelelisela enzulwini, nihlise iminatha yenu, kubanjiswe.
42_5_5_Waphendula uSimon wathi kuye, Mongameli, sibulaleke ubusuku buphela, asabamba nento; kodwa ngelakho ilizwi ndiya kuwuhlisa umnatha.
42_5_6_Bathi, bakukwenza oko, bavingcela inkitha enkulu yeentlanzi;  wawuqhaqheka ke umnatha wabo.
42_5_7_Bakhoba amahlulelana abo, abekomnye umkhombe, ukuba eze kuncedisana nabo. Beza, bayizalisa imikhombe yomibini, yada yafuna ukutshona.
42_5_8_Uthe ke akukubona oko uSimon Petros, wawa emadolweni kaYesu,  esithi, Mka kum, ngokuba ndiyindoda engumoni, Nkosi.
42_5_9_Kuba wathi makatha, kwanabo bonke ababenaye, ngobanjiso lweentlanzi ezo bazibambisayo.
42_5_10_Baba kwanjalo ke noYakobi noYohane, oonyana bakaZebhedi,  ababengamadlelane noSimon. UYesu wathi kuSimon, Musa ukoyika;  uya kuthabathela kweli xesha ubambisa abantu.
42_5_11_Bakuyifikisa imikhombe emhlabeni, bashiya into yonke,  bamlandela.
42_5_12_Kwathi ekomnye umzi, babona ngendoda ezele liqhenqa; yathi yakumbona uYesu, yawa ngobuso, yamkhunga, isithi, Nkosi, ukuba uyathanda, unako ukundihlambulula.
42_5_13_Wasolula isandla, wayichukumisa, esithi, Ndiyathanda,  hlambuluka. Lathi kwaoko iqhenqa lemka kuyo.
42_5_14_Wayithethela yena ngelithi, mayingaxeleli bani. Wathi, Yiya kuzibonisa kumbingeleli, usondeze idini, ngenxa yokuhlanjululwa kwakho, njengoko wamisayo uMoses, kube bubungqina kubo.
42_5_15_Kwaba kukhona ke luhlakazekayo udaba ngaye; kwaye kubuthelana izihlwele ezikhulu ukuza kuphulaphula, nokuphiliswa nguye ebulwelweni bazo.
42_5_16_Waye ke yena emana ukuzisithelisa ezindaweni eziziintlango,  athandaze.
42_5_17_Kwathi ke ngamini ithile wafundisa. Kwaye kuhleli abaFarisi nabafundisi-mthetho, ababephume kuyo yonke imizana yelaseGalili, neyelakwaYuda, naseYerusalem; aye ekho amandla eNkosi ukuba abaphilise.
42_5_18_Kwabonakala amadoda ethwele ngokhuko umntu onedumbe;  ayefuna ukumngenisa, ambeke phambi kwakhe.
42_5_19_Athi, akuba engafumani ndawo angamngenisa ngayo ngenxa yesihlwele, akhwela phezu kwendlu, agqobhoza ezifulelweni,  amhlisa ndawonye nokhuko, ambeka phakathi, phambi koYesu.
42_5_20_Akulubona ke ukholo lwawo, wathi kuye, Mntundini,  uzixolelwe izono zakho.
42_5_21_Baqala ukucamanga ababhali nabaFarisi, besithi, Ngubani na lo uthetha izinyeliso? Ngubani na onako ukuxolela izono,  ingenguye uThixo yedwa?
42_5_22_Eziqiqile ke uYesu izicamango zabo, waphendula wathi kubo,  Nicamanga ntoni na ezintliziyweni zenu?
42_5_23_Okhona kulula kukuphi na: kukho ukuthi, Uzixolelwe izono zakho; kukho nokuthi, Vuka uhambe?
42_5_24_Ke ukuze nazi, ukuba unalo igunya uNyana woMntu lokuxolela izono emhlabeni apha (selesithi konedumbe), ndithi kuwe, Vuka,  uthabathe ukhuko lwakho, uye endlwini yakho.
42_5_25_Usuke wema kwangoko phambi kwabo, wayithabatha loo nto abelele kuyo, wemka waya endlwini yakhe, ezukisa uThixo.
42_5_26_Besuka bathi nqa bonke, bamzukisa uThixo, bazala kukoyika,  besithi, Sibone izanga namhlanje.
42_5_27_Ke kaloku, emveni kwezi zinto waphuma, wabona umbuthi werhafu, ogama linguLevi, ehleli endaweni yerhafu, wathi kuye,  Ndilandele.
42_5_28_Washiya konke, wesuka wamlandela.
42_5_29_Waza uLevi wamenzela isidlo esikhulu endlwini yakhe. Kwaye kukho iqela elikhulu lababuthi berhafu nelabanye, ababehleli ngasesithebeni nabo.
42_5_30_Baye ababhali babo nabaFarisi bebakrokrela abafundi bakhe,  besithi, Kungani na ukuba nidle nisele nababuthi berhafu naboni?
42_5_31_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Akufuneki gqirha kwabaphilileyo, lifuneka kwabafayo.
42_5_32_Andize kubiza malungisa, ndize kubiza aboni, ukuba baguquke.
42_5_33_Ke kaloku bathi kuye, Kungani na ukuba abafundi bakaYohane bazile ukudla futhi, benze nezikhungo; benjenjalo nababaFarisi;  kanti ke bona abakho bayadla basele?
42_5_34_Wathi ke kubo, Ninako yini na ukubazilisa ukudla abegumbi lomtshakazi, xa asenabo umyeni?
42_5_35_Kodwa kofika mihla awoza asuswe kubo umyeni, bandule ke ukuzila ngaloo mihla.
42_5_36_Ke kaloku wabethetha nomzekeliso kubo esithi, Akukho ubeka isiziba sengubo entsha engutyeni endala; okanye woba ukrazula leyo intsha, sithi nesiziba eso sentsha singavumani nendala.
42_5_37_Kanjalo akukho utha iwayini entsha ezintsubeni ezindala;  okanye yozigqabhuza iintsuba iwayini entsha, iphalale yona,  zitshabalale neentsuba.
42_5_38_Yona iwayini entsha ifanele ukuthiwa ezintsubeni ezintsha zigcinakale ezo zinto zombini.
42_5_39_Kanjalo akukho uthi, ebesele endala, athande entsha kwaoko;  ngokuba uthi, Endala yeyona inencasa.
42_6_1_Kwathi ngesabatha ethile, wacanda emasi mini; baye abafundi bakhe besikha izikhwebu, bazidla, bezihlikihla ngezandla.
42_6_2_Bathe ke abathile babaFarisi kubo, Yini na ukuba nenze oko kungavumelekileyo ngesabatha?
42_6_3_Wabaphendula uYesu wathi, Anikhanga nikulese na oko wakwenzayo uDavide, mhlenikweni walambayo, yena nabo babenaye?
42_6_4_Okokuba wangena endlwini kaThixo, wazithabatha izonka ezibekwe phambi koThixo, wazidla, wanika nabo babenaye, ezo ke kungavumelekileyo ukuba zidliwe bantu, ingengabo ababingeleli bodwa?
42_6_5_Wayesithi kubo, uNyana woMntu lo uyiNkosi yayo nesabatha.
42_6_6_Kwathi ke kaloku, nangenye isabatha wangena endlwini yesikhungu, wafundisa. Kwaye kukho apho umntu owome isandla sokunene.
42_6_7_Baye ke bemlalele ababhali nabaFarisi, ukuba wophilisa na ngesabatha; ukuze bafumane indawo yokummangalela.
42_6_8_Kodwa yena ebezazi izicamango zabo, wathi kuloo mntu usandla somileyo, Phakama, umele phakathi. Usukile ke wema.
42_6_9_Uthe ngoko uYesu kubo, Ndiya kunibuza into: okuvumelekileyo ngesabatha kukwenza okulungileyo, kukwenza okubi, kusini na?  Kukusindisa ubomi, kukubulala, kusini na?
42_6_10_Akuba ebasingasingile bonke, wathi kumntu lowo, Solule isandla sakho. Wenjenjalo ke; sabuya saphila ke isandla sakhe,  saba kwanjengesinye.
42_6_11_Basuka ke bona baphambana ngumsindo; babethethana bodwa,  ukuba bangamenza ntoni na uYesu.
42_6_12_Kwathi ke ngaloo mihla, waphuma wasinga entabeni, esiya kuthandaza. Wayebudlulisa ubusuku bonke ngokuthandaza kuThixo.
42_6_13_Kwathi kwakusa, wababizela kuye abafundi bakhe, wanyula kubo balishumi elinababini, awathi kananjalo wabathiya elokuba ngabapostile:
42_6_14_uSimon, awamthiya nelokuba nguPetros, noAndreya, umzalwana wakhe; uYakobi noYohane; uFilipu noBhartolomeyu;
42_6_15_uMateyu noTomas; uYakobi, lo ka-Alifeyu, noSimon, ekuthiwa ngumZeloti;
42_6_16_uYuda kaYakobi, noYuda Sikariyoti, owaba ngumngcatshi.
42_6_17_Wehla nabo, wema endaweni ethe tyaba, neqela labafundi bakhe, nenkitha enkulu yabantu, bevela kulo lonke elakwaYuda,  naseYerusalem, nakulo ilizwe elingaselwandle laseTire neTsidon,  ababeza kumva, nokuba baphiliswe kuzo izifo zabo;
42_6_18_nabo babekhathazwa ngoomoya abangcolileyo, baye bephiliswa.
42_6_19_Zaye izihlwele zonke zifuna ukumchukumisa; ngokuba kube kuphuma amandla kuye, abaphilise bonke.
42_6_20_Waza yena wawaphakamisela amehlo akhe kubo abafundi bakhe,  wathi, Ninoyolo, nina mahlwempu; ngokuba bobenu ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_6_21_Ninoyolo, nina nilambayo kalokunje; ngokuba niya kuhluthiswa. Ninoyolo, nina nililayo kalokunje; ngokuba niya kuhleka.
42_6_22_Ninoyolo nina, xa bathe abantu banithiya, naxa bathe banigxotha kubo, baningcikiva, balilahlela phandle igama lenu ngokungathi likhohlakele, ngenxa yakhe uNyana woMntu.
42_6_23_Vuyani ngaloo mini, nisuke imitsi; kuba, niyabona, umvuzo wenu mkhulu emazulwini; babesenjenjalo ooyise kubo abaprofeti.
42_6_24_Kodwa yeha, nina zityebi! ngokuba niyifincile intuthuzelo yenu.
42_6_25_Yeha, nina nihluthiyo! ngokuba niya kulamba. Yeha, nina nihlekayo kalokunje! ngokuba niya kukhedama nilile.
42_6_26_Yeha nina, xa bathe bathetha kakuhle ngani bonke abantu!  kuba ooyise babo babesenjenjalo kubaprofeti ababuxoki.
42_6_27_Kodwa ke mna ndithi kuni nivayo, Zithandeni iintshaba zenu;  yenzani okulungileyo kwabo banithiyayo.
42_6_28_Basikeleleni abo baniqalekisayo, nibathandazele abo banigxekayo.
42_6_29_Lowo ukubetha esidleleni, mnikele nesinye; nothabatha ingubo yakho yokwaleka, ungali neyangaphantsi.
42_6_30_Bonke ke abacela kuwe, baphe; kothabatha izinto zakho,  ungabuye uzibize.
42_6_31_Enithanda ukuba abantu benze ngako kuni, yenzani nani kwangokunjalo kubo.
42_6_32_Ukuba nithanda abo banithandayo, ninambulelo mni na?  Ngokuba naboni bayabathanda abo babathandayo.
42_6_33_Xa nithi nenze okulungileyo kwabanenzela okulungileyo,  ninambulelo mni na? Ngokuba naboni benza kwaloo nto.
42_6_34_Xa nithi niboleke abo nithembe ukubuya nizuze kubo,  ninambulelo mni na? Kuba naboni bayababoleka aboni, ukuze babuye bazuze kwangangoko.
42_6_35_Ke nina, zithandeni iintshaba zenu, nenze okulungileyo;  niboleke ningathembe lutho. Woba mkhulu ke umvuzo wenu, nize nibe ngoonyana bOsenyangweni; ngokuba yena enobubele kwabangabuleliyo nabangendawo.
42_6_36_Ngoko ke yibani nenceba, njengokuba naye uYihlo enenceba.
42_6_37_Musani ukugweba, naye ningasayi kugwetywa; musani ukusingela phantsi, naye ningasayi kusingelwa phantsi;  khululani, naniya kukhululwa.
42_6_38_Yiphani, naniya kuphiwa nani; umlinganiselo omhle,  ohlohliweyo, ohlunguzelweyo, ophalalayo, nowuphiwa esondweni lengubo yenu; kuba umlinganiselo enilinganisela ngawo, niya kulinganiselwa kwangawo nani.
42_6_39_Ke kaloku wathetha umzekeliso kubo, esithi, ingakhe ibe nako na imfama ukukhokela imfama? Aziyi kuthi na zombini zeyele emhadini?
42_6_40_Akukho mfundi mkhulu kunomfundisi wakhe; ke wonke olungiswe kwaphela, uya kuba njengomfundisi wakhe.
42_6_41_Yini na ke ukuba usibone isibi esisesweni lomzalwana wakho,  kanti ke wona umqadi okwelakho iliso akuwuqiqi?
42_6_42_Ungathini na ukuba nako ukuthi kumzalwana wakho, Mzalwana,  yeka ndisikhuphe isibi esisesweni lakho, ungawuboni nje wena umqadi okwelakho iliso? Mhanahanisindini, wukhuphe kuqala umqadi lowo esweni lakho, wandule ukubona kakuhle ukusikhupha isibi esisesweni lomzalwana wakho.
42_6_43_Kuba akukho mthi mhle uvelisa isiqhamo esibi; kanjalo akukho mthi mbi uvelisa isiqhamo esihle.
42_6_44_Kuba umthi wonke waziwa ngesiqhamo sawo; kuba kungakhiwa makhiwane emithaneni enameva, kanjalo kungabuthwa diliya equnubeni.
42_6_45_Umntu olungileyo, ebuncwaneni obulungileyo bentliziyo yakhe, uvelisa oko kulungileyo; nomntu okhohlakeleyo,  ebuncwaneni obukhohlakeleyo bentliziyo yakhe, uvelisa oko kukhohlakeleyo; kuba umlomo wakhe uthetha ngokuphuphuma kwentliziyo.
42_6_46_Yini na ke ukuba nindibize ngokuthi, Nkosi, Nkosi, nibe ningazenzi izinto endizithethayo?
42_6_47_Wonke ke umntu ozayo kum, aweve amazwi am awenze,  ndonibonisa lowo afana naye.
42_6_48_Ufana nomntu owakha indlu, wemba wangxoka isiseko, wasibeka phezu kolwalwa. Kwathi, kwakubakho umkhukula, wagaleleka kuloo ndlu umlambo, awaba nako ukuyishukumisa; kuba ibisekwe phezu kolwalwa olo.
42_6_49_Kodwa lo uwevileyo akawenza, ufana nomntu owakhe indlu phezu komhlaba, kungekho siseko; wagaleleka kuyo umlambo, yawa kwaoko; kwathi ukuwa kwaloo ndlu kwakukhulu.
42_7_1_Ke kaloku, emveni kokuba ebewagqibile onke amazwi akhe,  besiva abantu, wangena eKapernahum.
42_7_2_Waye ke umkhonzi womthetheli-khulu othile, owabethandwa nguye, esifa, eza kubhubha.
42_7_3_Uthe ke akuva ngaye uYesu, wathuma kuye amadoda amakhulu amaYuda, emcela ukuba eze kumsindisa umkhonzi wakhe.
42_7_4_Akufika ke kuYesu, ambongoza enyamekile, esithi, Ukufanele oko lowo ungamenzelayo oko;
42_7_5_kuba uyaluthanda uhlanga lwethu, wasakhela nendlu yesikhungu yena.
42_7_6_Wahamba ke uYesu nabo. Akubon ukuba ke akasekude endlwini,  umthetheli-khulu wathuma izihlobo kuye, esithi kuye, Nkosi,  ungazikhathazi, kuba andikulingene ukuba ungade ungene phantsi kophahla lwam;
42_7_7_kungoko nam ndingakufanelanga ukuda ndize; thetha ngezwi lodwa, wophiliswa umkhonzi wam;
42_7_8_kuba nam ndingumntu omiswe phantsi kwegunya labanye,  ndinamasoldati aphantsi kwam; ndithi kweli, Yiya, liye;  kweliya, Yiza, lize; kumkhonzi wam, Yenza oku, akwenze.
42_7_9_Ezivile ke uYesu ezi zinto, wamangaliswa nguye, waguqukela kwindimbane ebimlandela, wathi, Ndithi kuni, andifumananga lukholo lungaka nakwaSirayeli.
42_7_10_Abo babethunyiwe babuyela endlwini, bamfumana umkhonzi obengumlwelwe ephilile.
42_7_11_Kwathi ngomhla olandelayo, waya emzini ekuthiwa yiNayin.  Kwaye kuhamba naye iqela labafundi bakhe, nendimbane enkulu.
42_7_12_Ke kaloku, akusondela esangweni lomzi lowo, kwabonakala kuthwalelwa phandle umntu ofileyo, ekuphela konyana ozalwa ngunina; waye yena engumhlolokazi. Yaye nendimbane elingeneyo yomzi inaye.
42_7_13_Ithe ke iNkosi yakumbona, yasikwa yimfesane ngenxa yakhe,  yathi kuye, Musa ukulila.
42_7_14_Yafika ke yalichukumisa ithala, bema ke ababethwele. Yathi,  Ndodana, ndithi kuwe, Vuka.
42_7_15_Wavuka wahlala umfi lowo, waza ke wathetha. Yamnikela ke kunina.
42_7_16_Bangenwa ke kukoyika bonke. Babemzukisa uThixo, besithi,  Kuvele umprofeti omkhulu phakathi kwethu; besithi, Ubavelele uThixo abantu bakhe.
42_7_17_Lwaphuma ke olo ludaba lungaye, lwahamba kwelakwaYuda liphela, nakuloo mmandla wonke.
42_7_18_Bazibika kuYohane abafundi bakhe zonke ezi zinto.
42_7_19_Ebizele kuye babini bathile kubafundi bakhe, uYohane wabathuma kuYesu esithi, Wena ungulowo uzayo na, silinde omnye,  sini na?
42_7_20_Efikile ke kuye amadoda lawo, athi, UYohane umbhaptizi usithume kuwe esithi, Wena ungulowo uzayo na, silinde omnye,  sini na?
42_7_21_Ke kaloku, kwangelo lixa, waphilisa abaninzi kuzo izifo,  nakuzo izibetho, nakoomoya abakhohlakeleyo, wathi iimfama ezininzi wazibabala ukubona.
42_7_22_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuwo, Hambani niye kumbikela uYohane izinto enizibonileyo nenizivileyo; okokuba iimfama zibuya zibone, iziqhwala ziyahamba, abaneqhenqa bayahlanjululwa,  izithulu ziyeva, abafileyo bayavuswa, amahlwempu ayazishunyayezwa iindaba ezilungileyo.
42_7_23_Unoyolo othe akakhutyekiswa ndim.
42_7_24_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bemkile abathunywa bakaYohane,  waqala wathi kwisihlwele ngaye uYohane, Naye niphume naya kubona ntoni na entlango? Yaye iyingcongolo na, izanyazanyiswa ngumoya?
42_7_25_Naye niphume naya kubona ntoni na kodwa? Yaye ingumntu ovethe iingubo ezitofotofo na? Yabonani, abo banxiba iingubo eziqaqambileyo, badle ubuncwane, ngabasezindlwini zookumkani.
42_7_26_Naye niphume naya kubona ntoni na kodwa? Yaye igumprofeti na? Ewe, ndithi kuni, node wagqithisa kumprofeti.
42_7_27_Lo ngulowo kubhaliweyo ngaye kwathiwa, Niyabona, mna ndiyamthuma umthunywa wam ngaphambi kobuso bakho, Oya kuyilungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.
42_7_28_Kuba ndithi kuni, Akukho namnye, kwabazelweyo ngabafazi,  umprofeti omkhulu kunoYohane umbhaptizi; kanti ke nomncinanana kwabanye ebukumkanini bukaThixo, mkhulu kunaye.
42_7_29_Bathi bonke abantu, bakuva, nababuthi berhafu, bagwebela uThixo, bebhaptiziwe ngobhaptizo lukaYohane.
42_7_30_Ke bona abaFarisi nabaqondisi-mthetho bazitshitshisela icebo likaThixo, kuba bengabhaptizwanga nguye.
42_7_31_Ithe ke iNkosi, Ndiya kubafanisa nantoni na ke ngoko abantu besi sizukulwana? Bafana nantoni na?
42_7_32_Bafana nabantwana abahleli endaweni yembutho, bekhwazana besithi, Sanigwalela, naza nina anaduda; sanihlabela isililo,  naza nina analila.
42_7_33_Kuba uzile uYohane umbhaptizi engadli sonka, engaseli wayini; nithi ke, Unedemon.
42_7_34_Uzile uNyana woMntu esidla, esela; nithi, Khanibone umntu olidla-kudla, olisela-wayini, umhlobo wababuthi berhafu nowaboni!
42_7_35_Noko ke ubulumko bugwetyelwe kokuphuma ebantwaneni babo bonke.
42_7_36_Ke kaloku omnye umFarisi ubemcela ukuba adle naye; waza wangena endlwini yomFarisi lowo, wangqengqa.
42_7_37_Kwabonakala kukho mfazi emzini apho, obengumoni; wathi,  akwazi ukuba uhleli endlwini yomFarisi, wazisa ihlala lelabhastile, linamafutha aqholiweyo.
42_7_38_Wema ezinyaweni zakhe ngasemva, elila; waqala ukuzinyela iinyawo zakhe ngeenyembezi, ezisula ngeenwele zentloko yakhe,  ezanga kakhulu iinyawo zakhe, ezithambisa ngamafutha lawo.
42_7_39_Akukubona ke oko umFarisi lowo ubembizile, wathetha ngaphakathi kwakhe, esithi, Lo mntu, ukuba ube engumprofeti,  ange esazi ukuba ngumfazi ongubani na, oluhlobo luni na, lo umchukumisayo; ngokuba ungumoni.
42_7_40_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Hina, Simon, ndinendawo yokuthetha kuwe. (Athi ke yena, Thetha, Mfundisi.)
42_7_41_Kwaye kukho mboleki-mali uthile, enabantu ababini abanamatyala kuye; omnye wayenetyala leedenariyo ezimakhulu mahlanu, omnye ke zimashumi mahlanu.
42_7_42_Bakuba ke bengenanto yokuhlawula, usuke wabaxolela bobabini. Khawutsho ke, nguwuphi na kubo oya kumthanda ngokungaphezulu?
42_7_43_Waphendula uSimon wathi, Ndiba ngulowo uxolelwe ngokungaphezulu. Wathi ke yena kuye, Wahlule walungisa.
42_7_44_Wajika wakhangela kumfazi, wathi kuSimon, Uyambona na lo mfazi? Ndingene endlwini yakho, akundinikanga manzi eenyawo zam; ke yena uzinyele iinyawo zam ngeenyembezi, wazisula ngeenwele zentloko yakhe.
42_7_45_Akundanganga wena; ke yena, kuseloko ndangenayo, akayekanga ukuzanga kakhulu iinyawo zam.
42_7_46_Intloko yam akuyithambisanga ngaoli; ke yena iinyawo zam uzithambise ngamafutha aqholiweyo.
42_7_47_Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuwe, Izono zakhe uzixolelwe,  bezizininzi; ngokuba uthande kakhulu; ke yena oxolelwe kancinane, uthanda kancinane.
42_7_48_Wathi ke kuye, Zixolelwe izono zakho.
42_7_49_Baqala abo babehleli naye esithebeni ukuthi ngaphakathi kwabo, Ngubani na lo uxolela nezono?
42_7_50_Uthe ke kumfazi, Ukholo lwakho lukusindisile, hamba ngoxolo.
42_8_1_Kwathi emva koko, wayihamba imizi ngemizi, nemizana ngemizana, ezivakalisa ezishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zobukumkani bukaThixo; babenaye abalishumi elinababini.
42_8_2_Nabafazi abathile ababephiliswe koomoya abangendawo nasebulwelweni, uMariya okuthiwa ngowaseMagadala, ekwakuphume kuye iidemon zosixhenxe,
42_8_3_noYohana, umfazi kaKuza, igosa likaHerode, noSusana, nabanye abaninzi; bona babemlungiselela ngeempahla zabo.
42_8_4_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba kuntontelene isihlwele esikhulu,  bathi nabemizi ngemizi bawomela kuye. Wathi ngomzekeliso,
42_8_5_Umhlwayeli waphuma waya kuyihlwayela imbewu yakhe.  Ekuhlwayeleni kwakhe yawa enye ngasendleleni, yanyathelwa,  zathi iintaka zezulu zayidla zayigqiba.
42_8_6_Yimbi yawa elulwalweni, yathi isahluma, yatsha ngenxa yokuba ibingenakunyakama.
42_8_7_Yimbi yawa phakathi kwemithana enameva, yasuka imithana enameva yahluma kunye nayo, yayiminxa.
42_8_8_Yimbi yawa kuwo wona umhlaba olungileyo, yahluma, yavelisa isiqhamo kalikhulu. Uthe ezithetha ezi zinto, waye edanduluka esithi, Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
42_8_9_Baye ke abafundi bakhe bembuza besithi, Ungaba uyintoni na lo mzekeliso?
42_8_10_Uthe ke yena, Nikuphiwe nina ukuzazi iimfihlelo zobukumkani bukaThixo; ke kwabanye bona kungemizekeliso, ukuze bebona nje bangaboni, besiva nje bangaqondi.
42_8_11_Ke kaloku umzekeliso nguwo lo:
42_8_12_Imbewu le lilizwi likaThixo. Abo ke bangasendleleni ngabo bevayo, andule afike uMtyholi, alisuse ilizwi entliziyweni yabo, ukuze bangakholwa basindiswe.
42_8_13_Abo ke baselulwalweni ngabasakuthi, bakuliva, balamkele ngovuyo ilizwi; aba ke abanangcambu; bona bakholwa umzuzwana,  ze bathi ngexa lokuhendwa balahle.
42_8_14_Leyo ke yawayo emithaneni enameva, ngabo bathi, belivile,  bahambe benamaxhala nobutyebi neziyolo zobu bomi, baminxwe,  baze bangavelisi siqhamo.
42_8_15_Ke leyo isemhlabeni omhle, ngabo bona bathi ngentliziyo entle, elungileyo, bakuliva ilizwi, balibambe, bavelise iziqhamo benomonde.
42_8_16_Akukho ke uthi, esilumekile isibane, asisibeke ngesitya,  athi mhlawumbi asibeke ngaphantsi kwesingqengqelo; usibeka esiphathweni saso, ukuze abo bangenayo bakubone ukukhanya.
42_8_17_Kuba akukho nto ifihlakeleyo ingayi kubonakala; kanjalo akukho ifihlakeleyo ingayi kwazeka, ize ekuhleni.
42_8_18_Lumkani ngoko ukuva eniva ngako., kuba osukuba enako, uya kunikwa; nosukuba engenako, uya kuhluthwa noko ngathi unako.
42_8_19_Ke kaloku kwafika kuye unina nabazalwana bakhe, baza ababa nako ukufikelela kuye ngenxa yesihlwele.
42_8_20_Wabikelwa ke, kusithiwa, Unyoko nabazalwana bakho bemi ngaphandle, befuna ukukubona.
42_8_21_Waphendula ke yena wathi kubo, Uma nabazalwana bam ngaba bona balivayo ilizwi likaThixo, balenze.
42_8_22_Kwathi ngamhla uthile, waya kungena emkhombeni kwanabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Masiwele, siye ngaphesheya kwedike;  banduluka ke.
42_8_23_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayahamba ngomkhombe, walala ubuthongo. Kwehla uqhwithela lomoya edikeni apho, waye uzala ngamanzi usengozini.
42_8_24_Beza ke bamvusa, besithi, Mongameli, Mongameli,  satshabalala. Wavuka ke yena, wawukhalimela umoya nokulatyuza kwamaza; zapheza ezo zinto, kwabakho ukuzola.
42_8_25_Wathi ke kubo, Luphi na ukholo lwenu? Bathe, kuba besoyika,  bamangaliswa, besitshono ukuthi, Ngubani na ke lo, le nto ayithethela imimoya kwanamanzi, zimlulamele ezo zinto?
42_8_26_Bahambela ngomkhombe ezweni laseGadara, elikhangelene nelaseGalili.
42_8_27_Ke kaloku, akuphumela emhlabeni, kwaqubisana naye indoda ethile iphuma emzini, esekukade ineedemon. Yayingambathi ngubo,  ingahlali ndlwini, isuka ihlale emangcwabeni.
42_8_28_Ithe ke yakumbona uYesu, yakhala kunene, yawa phambi kwakhe, yathi ngezwi elikhulu, Yini na enam nawe, Yesu, Nyana kaThixo Osenyangweni? Ndiya kukhunga ukuba ungandithuthumbisi.
42_8_29_Kuba ebewuthethele umoya ongcolileyo ukuba uphume emntwini lowo. Kuba bekuba futhi umthi hlasi; wayebotshwa ngemixokelelwane nangamakhamandela, egciniwe; asuke azijace izibophelelo aqhutyelwe yidemon entlango.
42_8_30_UYesu wambuza ke esithi, Ungubani na igama lakho? Uthe ke yena, NdinguMkhosi; kuba kwakungene kuye iidemon ezininzi.
42_8_31_Wayembongoza ukuba angazithetheli ziye kungena enzonzobileni.
42_8_32_Bekukho ke apho ugxuba lweehagu ezininzi, lusidla entabeni;  zaye zimbongoza, ukuba azivumele ziye kungena kuzo. Wazivumela ke.
42_8_33_Ziphumile ke iidemon emtwini lowo, zangena ezihagwini;  lwaza ugxuba olo lwaphaphatheka, lwehla eweni, lwela edikeni,  lwarhaxwa.
42_8_34_Bakukubona ke okuhlileyo abo babezalusa, basaba, baya babika ekhaya nasemaphandleni.
42_8_35_Baphuma ke abantu, baya kukubona okuhlileyo; beza kuYesu,  bamfumana ehleli umntu lowo, beziphume kuye iidemon,  ambathisiwe, enengqondo ephilileyo, engasezinyaweni zikaYesu;  baza boyika.
42_8_36_Bathi ke nabo babonileyo, bababikela ukuba uthiweni na ukuphiliswa obephethwe ziidemon.
42_8_37_Yamcela yonke inkitha yommandla wabaseGadara, ukuba emke kubo; ngokuba babebanjwe kukoyika okukhulu. Uthe ke yena,  engene emkhombeni, wabuya.
42_8_38_Ke kaloku indoda leyo, zaye ziphume kuyo iidemon,  yayimkhunga ukuba ibe naye. Ke yena uYesu wayindulula, esithi,
42_8_39_Buyela endlwini yakho, ubacacisele oko zingako izinto uThixo akwenzele zona. Yemka, yavakalisa kuwo wonke umzi oko zingako izinto uYesu ayenzele zona.
42_8_40_Kwathi ke kaloku, ekubuyeni kukaYesu, zamamkela izihlwele;  kuba bonke babemlindile.
42_8_41_Kwabonakala kusiza indoda egama linguYayiro; yaye yona ingumphathi wendlu yesikhungu. Yawa ezinyaweni zikaYesu,  yayimbongoza ukuba eze endlwini yayo.
42_8_42_Kuba yabe inentombi, iyizala inye, eminyaka ngathi ilishumi linamibini izelwe; yaye yona iqhawuka. Ke kaloku, ekuyeni kwakhe apho, izihlwele bezimxinile.
42_8_43_Nentokazi eyayinethombo legazi iminyaka elishumi linamibini, eyayithe yona phezu koko yadleka impahla yayo iphela ngamagqirha, ayaba nako ukuphiliswa bani,
42_8_44_yeza ngasemva, yachukumisa umqukumbelo wengubo yakhe, lee qoko kwangoko ithombo legazi layo.
42_8_45_Wathi uYesu, Ngubani na lo undichukumisileyo? Bakuba bekhanyela bonke, wathi uPetros nabo babenaye, Mongameli,  izihlwele zikuxina, zikukhandanisa nje, uthi na, Ngubani na lo undichukumisileyo?
42_8_46_Uthe ke uYesu, Ukho ondichukumisileyo; kuba mna ndiyawazi amandla aphumileyo kum.
42_8_47_Ithe ke intokazi leyo, yakubona ukuba ayifihlakele, yeza igubha, yawa phambi kwakhe, yaxela emehlweni abo bonke abantu,  ukuba bekungasizathu sini na ebimchukumisile, nokuphiliswa kwayo kwangoko.
42_8_48_Uthe ke yena kuyo, Yomelela, ntombi yam, ukholo lwakho lukuphilisile; hamba ngoxolo.
42_8_49_Kuthi, esathetha, kufike othile, evela kwamphathi-ndlu yesikhungu, esithi kuye, Ibhubhile intombi yakho; musa ukumkhathaza uMfundisi.
42_8_50_Ekuvile ke oko uYesu, umphendule wathi, Musa ukoyika;  kholwa wena kuphela, yosindiswa.
42_8_51_Ke kaloku, engenile endlwini, akavumelanga mntu ukuba angene naye, kwaba kuphela nguPetros, noYohane, noYakobi,  noyise wentombi, nonina.
42_8_52_Baye ke bonke belila, beyimbambazelela. Wathi ke yena,  Musani ukulila; ayifile, ilele nje kodwa.
42_8_53_Basuka bamwa ngeentsini, besazi ukuba ifile.
42_8_54_Uthe ke yena, wabakhuphela phandle bonke, wayibamba ngesandla, wabiza esithi, Ntombi, vuka.
42_8_55_Wabuya umoya wayo, yesuka yema kwangoko; wamisa ukuthi mayinikwe into, idle.
42_8_56_Besuka abazali bayo bathi nqa; wabathethela ukuba bangakuxeleli bani okuhlileyo.
42_9_1_Ke kaloku, ebabizele ndawonye abafundi bakhe abalishumi elinababini, wabanika amandla negunya kuzo zonke iidemon,  nokuphilisa izifo.
42_9_2_Wabathuma ukuba babuvakalise ubukumkani bukaThixo,  bayiphilise imilwelwe.
42_9_3_Wathi kubo, Ningaphathi nto yandlela, namisimelelo, nangxowa yamphako, nasonka, namali, ningabi nangubo zangaphantsi ngambini;
42_9_4_nasendlwini enithe nangena kuyo, hlalani khona, ukumka nisuke khona.
42_9_5_Abo sukuba benganamkeli, yithini nakuphuma kuloo mzi,  niluvuthulule nothuli ezinyaweni zenu, kube bubungqina oko kubo.
42_9_6_Bephumile ke, bayihambahamba imizana, bezishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, bephilisa ezindaweni zonke.
42_9_7_Ke kaloku uHerode, umphathi wesahlulo sesine selizwe, waziva zonke izinto ezenziwayo nguye; wesuka wathingaza, ngenxa yokuba bekusithiwa ngabanye, Kuvuke uYohane kwabafileyo;
42_9_8_kuthiwe ke ngabanye, Kubonakale uEliya; kuthiwe ngabanye,  Kubuye kwavuka umprofeti wakuwo amanyange.
42_9_9_Wathi uHerode, UYohane mna ndamnqamla intloko; lo ke ngubani na, ndiva kuthethwa izinto ezinje ngaye. Wayefuna ke ukumbona.
42_9_10_Bebuyile abapostile, bamcacisela ukuba zinkulu kwezinto ababezenzile. Wabathabatha, wasithela endaweni eyintlango yomzi okuthiwa yiBhetesayida.
42_9_11_Zithe ke zakwazi izihlwele, zamlandela. Wazamkela ke;  wayethetha kuzo ngabo ubukumkani bukaThixo; wayebaphilisa ababeswele impilo.
42_9_12_Ke kaloku yaqala ukumka imini. Beza ke abalishumi elinababini, bathi kuye, Zindulule izihlwele, ukuze bemke, baye emizini ejikelezileyo, nasemaphandleni, balale, ze bafumane into edliwayo; ngokuba apha sikwindawo eyintlango.
42_9_13_Uthe ke kubo, Bapheni nina badle. Bathi ke bona, Akukho nto sinayo ingaphezu kwezonka ezihlanu neentlanzi ezimbini; singaba kambe siya kuya sibathengele izinto ezidliwayo bonke aba bantu.
42_9_14_Kuba amadoda ngathi ayemawaka mahlanu. Wathi ke kubafundi bakhe, Bangqengqiseni, babe yimityino emashumi ngamahlanu.
42_9_15_Benjenjalo, babangqengqisa bonke.
42_9_16_Ezithabathile ke izonka zozihlanu neentlanzi zombini,  wakhangela ezulwini, wazisikelela, waqhekeza; wamana enika abafundi, ukuba babeke ezihlweleni.
42_9_17_Badla bahlutha bonke; kwasuswa okuseleyo kubo izitya zamaqhekeza zalishumi elinazibini.
42_9_18_Ke kaloku kwathi, ekubeni ethandaza eyedwa, bantontelana kuye abafundi, wabuza kubo, esithi, Izihlwele ezi zithi ndingubani na?
42_9_19_Baphendula ke bona, bathi, Zithi unguYohane umbhaptizi;  abanye ke bathi unguEliya; abanye ke bathi, kubuye kwavuka mprofeti uthile kumanyange.
42_9_20_Uthe ke kubo, Ke nina nithi ndingubani na? Waphendula ke uPetros wathi, Unguye uKristu kaThixo.
42_9_21_Wabakhalimela ke, ebathethela ngelithi, le nto mabangayithethi nakubani; esithi,
42_9_22_UNyana woMntu umelwe kukuthi eve ubunzima obukhulu, alahlwe ngawo amadoda amakhulu nababingeleli abakhulu nababhali,  abulawe, athi ngomhla wesithathu, avuke.
42_9_23_Wayesithi ke kubo bonke, Ukuba ubani uthanda ukundilandela,  makazincame, awuthwale umnqamlezo wakhe imihla ngemihla,  andilandele ke.
42_9_24_Ngokuba osukuba ethanda ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe,  wolahlekelwa nguwo; ke othe wawulahla umphefumlo wakhe ngenxa yam, wowusindisa lowo.
42_9_25_Kuba kumnceda ntoni na umntu ukuthi azuze ihlabathi liphela, abe ke ezilahlile, mhlawumbi ezonakalisile?
42_9_26_Kuba othe waneentloni ngam, nangawo amazwi am, uNyana woMntu woba neentloni ngaye lowo, xa athe weza esebuqaqawulini bakhe, nobukaYise, nobezithunywa ezingcwele.
42_9_27_Ndithi ke kuni, Inyaniso, kukho abathile kwabemiyo apha,  abangayi kukha beve kufa, bade babubone ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_9_28_Ke kaloku kuthe, emveni kwezi zinto, malunga neentsuku ezisibhozo, wathabatha uPetros noYohane noYakobi; wenyuka wava entabeni, esiya kuthandaza.
42_9_29_Kwathi, ekuthandazeni kwakhe, ubuso bakhe babonakala bububumbi, nengubo yakhe yamhlophe yabengezela.
42_9_30_Kwabonakala amadoda amabini ethetha naye, engooMoses noEliya,
42_9_31_ababonakalayo besebuqaqawulini; babethetha ngophumo lwakhe,  abeza kulufeza eYerusalem.
42_9_32_Ke kaloku uPetros, nabo babenaye, babesindwa bubuthongo;  baza ke bakuthi balulu, babubona ubuqaqawuli bakhe, naloo madoda mabini abemi naye.
42_9_33_Ekwahlukaneni kwawo kuye, wathi uPetros kuye uYesu,  Mongameli, kuhle ukuba sibe lapha. Masenze ke iminquba ibe mithathu, omnye ube ngowakho, omnye ube ngokaMoses, omnye ube ngokaEliya; watsho engayazi into ayithethayo.
42_9_34_Kuthe ke, akubon ukuba uthethe ezo zinto, kwabakho ilifu,  labenzela ithinzi. Boyika ke ekungeneni kwabo efini apho.
42_9_35_Kwabakho nezwi liphuma efini, lisithi, Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda; mveni yena.
42_9_36_Lakuba libekho izwi elo, wafunyanwa uYesu eyedwa. Bahlala bathi cwaka bona, ababikela mntu ngaloo mihla kwizinto ababezibonile.
42_9_37_Ke kaloku kuthe ngomhla olandelayo, bakubon ukuba bahlile entabeni, wahlangatyezwa sisihlwele esikhulu.
42_9_38_Kwabonakala kuvela indoda esihlweleni apho, yankqangaza isithi, Mfundisi, ndiyakukhunga, mbone unyana wam; kuba ndimzele wamnye.
42_9_39_Uyabona, uthatyathwa ngumoya, akhale kwangesiquphe, umbethe athi xhwenene, ade alephuze amagwebu; Uze uthi, umqobile, umke kuye ngenkankulu.
42_9_40_Ndabakhunga ke abafundi bakho ukuba bawukhuphe; ababa nako.
42_9_41_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Sizukulwanandini singakholwayo,  sigwenxa, koda kube nini na ndikuni, ndininyamezele? Mzise apha unyana wakho.
42_9_42_Akubon ukuba useza ke, isuke idemon yamntlala, yambetha,  wathi xhwenene kunene. Wawukhalimela ke uYesu umoya ongcolileyo, waphilisa umntwana, wambuyisela kuyise.
42_9_43_Bakhwankqiswa ke bonke bubungangamela bukaThixo. Bakubon  ukuba bamangalisiwe bonke zizinto zonke awazenzayo uYesu, wathi kubafundi bakhe,
42_9_44_Wabekeleni nina iindlebe la mazwi; kuba uNyana woMntu uza kunikelwa ezandleni zabantu.
42_9_45_Kodwa bona babengaliqondi eli, lizwi; laye lifihliwe kubo,  ukuze bangaliboni. Babesoyika nokumbuza ngalo eli lizwi.
42_9_46_Ke kaloku kwangena ukucamanga phakathi kwabo kokuthi,  angaba ngubani na omkhulu phakathi kwabo.
42_9_47_Ekubonile ke uYesu ukucamanga kwentliziyo yabo, uthabathe umntwanana, wammisa ngakuye.
42_9_48_Wathi kubo, Othe wamamkela lo mntwanana egameni lam,  wamkela mna; nothe wamkela mna, wamkela lowo wandithumayo. Kuba lowo umncinane phakathi kwenu nonke, ngoyena mkhulu.
42_9_49_Waphendula uYohane wathi, Mongameli, sabona othile ekhupha iidemon egameni lakho; samalela, ngokuba engalandelani nathi.
42_9_50_Wathi uYesu kuye, Musani ukumalela; kuba ongachasene nathi,  ungecala lethu.
42_9_51_Ke kaloku kwathi, yakuzaliseka imihla yokunyuselwa kwakhe phezulu, wazimisela ngokuqinileyo ukuya eYerusalem.
42_9_52_Wathuma abathunywa phambi kobuso bakhe; behambile ke,  bangena emzaneni wamaSamariya ukuba bamlungiselele.
42_9_53_Akamamkela, ngokuba ubuso bakhe bebubheke eYerusalem.
42_9_54_Bekubonile ke oko abafundi bakhe, ooYakobi noYohane bathe,  Nkosi, uyafuna na ukuba sitsho, kuhle umlilo ezulwini,  ubatshise kuphele, njengoko noEliya wenjenjalo?
42_9_55_Wathi guququ, wabakhalimela wathi, Anazi ukuba ningabomoya onjani na;
42_9_56_kuba uNyana woMntu engaze kutshabalalisa miphefumlo yabantu, uze kusindisa. Baza baya mzaneni wumbi.
42_9_57_Kwathi ke, bakubon ukuba bayahamba ngendlela, wathi othile kuye, Ndiya kukulandela, apho uthe waya khona, Nkosi.
42_9_58_Waza uYesu wathi kuye, Iimpungutye zinemingxuma, neentaka zezulu zineendawo zokuhlala; ke yena uNyana woMntu akanayo nendawo angalalisa kuyo intloko yakhe.
42_9_59_Wathi ke kuwumbi, Ndilandele. Uthe ke yena, Nkosi,  ndivumele khe ndimke, ndiye kungcwaba ubawo kuqala.
42_9_60_Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Bayeke abafileyo, bangcwabe abafileyo babo; ke wena hamba uye kushumayela ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_9_61_Wathi ke nomnye, Ndiya kukulandela, Nkosi; kodwa ndivumele kuqala, khe ndiye kubulisa abo basendlwini yam.
42_9_62_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Akukho namnye usibekileyo isandla sakhe epuluweni, abe emana ekhangela kokusemva, ubulungeleyo ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_10_1_Ke kaloku, emveni kwezi zinto, iNkosi yabalula yamisela abanye kanjalo, bemashumi asixhenxe; yabathuma ngababini phambi kobuso bayo, kuyo yonke imizi neendawo ebiza kuya kuzo yona.
42_10_2_Yayisithi ngoko kubo, Ukuvuna okunene kuninzi, kodwa bona abasebenzi bambalwa; khungani ngoko eNkosini yokuvuna, ikhuphe abasebenzi, baye ekuvuneni kwayo.
42_10_3_Hambani; niyabona, mna ndinithuma njengeemvana phakathi kweengcuka.
42_10_4_Musani ukuphatha ngxowa yamali, nangxowa yamphako,  nazimbadada; ningabulisi mntu endleleni.
42_10_5_Nendlu enisukuba ningene kuyo, yithini kuqala, Uxolo malube kule ndlu.
42_10_6_Ukuba angaba ulapho owoxolo, uxolo lwenu lohlala phezu kwakhe; ukuba ke akunjalo, lobuyela kwakuni.
42_10_7_Hlalani ke kuloo ndlu, nisidla nisela izinto abanazo; kuba umsebenzi uwufanele umvuzo wakhe. Musani ukuphuma ningena zindlwini.
42_10_8_Emzini ke enisukuba ningena kuwo, banamkele, yidlani izinto abazibeka phambi kwenu;
42_10_9_niyiphilise imilwelwe ekhona, nithi kubo, Busondele kuni ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_10_10_Emzini enisukuba ningena kuwo, baneli, phumani niye ezitratweni zawo, nithi,
42_10_11_Nothuli lomzi wenu olunamathele kuthi, siluvuthululela kuni; kodwa ke kwazini khona oku, ukuba busondele kuni ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_10_12_Ndithi ke kuni, Koba nokunyamezeleka okweSodom ngaloo mini, kunokwaloo mzi.
42_10_13_Yeha, wena Korazin! Yeha, wena Bhetesayida! Ngokuba imisebenzi yamandla eyenzeke kuni, ukuba yayenzeke eTire naseTsidon, ingeyaguqukayo kwakudala loo mizi, ihleli ngeengubo ezirhwexayo naseluthuthwini.
42_10_14_Ewe, koba nokunyamezeleka okweTire nokweTsidon ngomgwebo kunokwenu.
42_10_15_Nawe Kapernahum, uphakanyiselweyo ezulwini, uya kuphoswa phantsi kwelabafileyo.
42_10_16_Lowo univayo nina, uva mna; nalowo unigibayo nina, ugiba mna; lowo ke ugiba mna, ugiba lowo wandithumayo.
42_10_17_Ke kaloku babuya abamashumi asixhenxe bevuyile, besithi,  Nkosi, needemon ezi zisithobele egameni lakho.
42_10_18_Uthe ke kubo, Bendimbona uSathana njengombane esiwa ezulwini.
42_10_19_Niyabona, ndininika igunya lokunyathela phezu kweenyoka noonomadudwane, naphezu kwawo onke amandla alo utshaba; kanjalo akukho nto ingakhe inenzakalise.
42_10_20_Noko ke maningakuvuyeli oku, kokuba oomoya benithobele;  vuyelani ke kanye okokuba amagama enu ebhaliwe emazulwini.
42_10_21_Ngelo lixa wagcoba uYesu ngomoya, wathi, Ndiyabulela kuwe,  Bawo, Nkosi yezulu nomhlaba; ngokuba ezi zinto uzifihlile kwizilumko neengqondi, wazityhilela iintsana; ewe, Bawo,  ngokuba kwakholeka kuwe ukuba kube njalo.
42_10_22_Zonke izinto zinikelwe kum nguBawo; kanjalo akukho waziyo ukuba ungubani na uNyana, nguYise yedwa; nokuba ungubani na uYise, nguNyana yedwa, nalowo asukuba uNyana ethanda ukumtyhilela.
42_10_23_Wathi guququ kubafundi bakhe, wathi ngasese, Anethamsanqa wona amehlo abona izinto enizibonayo.
42_10_24_Kuba ndithi kuni, Baninzi abaprofeti nookumkani ababethande ukubona izinto enizibonayo nina, abazibona; nokuva izinto enizivayo, abaziva.
42_10_25_Kwabonakala kusuka umqondisi-mthetho othile, emlinga nokumlinga, esithi, Mfundisi, ndenze ntoni na ukuze ndibudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade?
42_10_26_Uthe ke yena kuye, Emthethweni kubhalwe ntoni na? Ulesa njani na?
42_10_27_Waphendula ke wathi, Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, nangomphefumlo wakho uphela,  nangamandla akho ephela, nangengqondo yakho iphela, nommelwane wakho, njengoko uzithanda ngako.
42_10_28_Uthe ke kuye, Uphendule walungisa; yenza oko, wobudla ubomi.
42_10_29_Ke kaloku yena, ethanda ukuzigwebela, wathi kuYesu,  Ngubani na ongummelwane wam?
42_10_30_Uphendule ke uYesu, wathi, Umntu othile wayesihla evela eYerusalem, esiya eYeriko. Wagaxeleka ezihangeni, ezambhunyula iingubo, zamngxwelerha, zemka, zimshiya engathi uza kufa.
42_10_31_Ke kaloku kwathi, kwehla mbingeleli uthile ngaloo ndlela;  akumbona, wacezela phaya.
42_10_32_Kwangokunjalo ke nomLevi, akufika kuloo ndawo, weza wambona, wacezela phaya.
42_10_33_Uthe ke umSamariya othile, eseluhambeni, waya kuye; wathi,  akumbona, wasikwa yimfesane.
42_10_34_Wafika, wawabopha amanxeba akhe, egalela ioli newayini,  wamkhwelisa eqegwini lakhe, wamsa endlwini yabahambi, wamonga.
42_10_35_Akumka ngengomso, warhola iidenariyo zambini wanika umninindlu, wathi kuye. Uze umonge; nento ongathi ubuye udleke yona, ndokuhlawulela mna ekubuyeni kwam.
42_10_36_Nguwuphi na kwabo bathathu ngoko, othi wena, waba ngummelwane walowo wagaxeleka ezihangeni?
42_10_37_Uthe ke yena, Ngulowo wamenzela inceba. Wathi ngoko uYesu kuye, Hamba, uye kwenjenjalo nawe.
42_10_38_Ke kaloku kwathi, ekuhambeni kwabo, yena wangena mzini uthile, yathi ke intokazi ethile egama linguMarta, yamamkela ngobubele endlwini yayo.
42_10_39_Yaye ke inomsakwayo obe kuthiwa nguMariya, owathi yena wahlala ngasezinyaweni zikaYesu, emana ukuliphulaphula ilizwi lakhe.
42_10_40_UMarta ke yena wakruthakrutheka kukulungiselela okuninzi.  Wema ke kufuphi wathi, Nkosi, akukhathali na, kukuba umsakwethu andiyekele ndilungiselele ndedwa? Yitsho ke kuye, andincede.
42_10_41_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi kuye, Marta, Marta, uxhaliswa uphithizeliswa zizinto ezininzi.
42_10_42_Inye yona into efunekayo; uMariya ke unyule eso sabelo silungileyo, singayi kususwa kuye.
42_11_1_Kwathi, esendaweni ethile ethandaza, akupheza, wathi othile wakubafundi bakhe kuye, Nkosi, sifundise ukuthandaza,  kwanjengoko uYohane wabafundisayo abafundi bakhe.
42_11_2_Uthe ke yena kubo, Xa sukuba nithandaza, yithini, Bawo wethu osemazulwini, malingcwaliswe igama lakho. Mabufike ubukumkani bakho. Makwenziwe ukuthanda kwakho nasemhlabeni,  njengokuba kusenziwa emazulwini.
42_11_3_Siphe imihla yonke isonka sethu semihla ngemihla, usixolele izono zethu;
42_11_4_kuba nathi sibaxolela bonke abanamatyala kuthi.  Ungasingenisi ekulingweni; sihlangule enkohlakalweni.
42_11_5_Wathi kubo, Nguwuphi na kuni ongathi, enomhlobo, aze aye kuye phakathi kobusuku, athi kuye, Sihlobo, ndiboleke izonka zibe zithathu;
42_11_6_kuba ke umhlobo wam uphambukele kum eseluhambeni, ndaye ndingenanto ke ndingayibeka phambi kwakhe;
42_11_7_aze asuke lowo ungaphakathi aphendule athi, Musa ukundaphula; seluvaliwe ucango, nabantwana bam basesililini nam; andinako ukuvuka ndikunike?
42_11_8_Ndithi kuni, Nokuba akayi kuvuka amnike, ngakuba engumhlobo wakhe, noko ngenxa yozingiso lwakhe olungenantloni wovuka,  amnike inani alisweleyo.
42_11_9_Nam ndithi kuni, Celani, nophiwa; funani, nofumana;  nkqonkqozani, novulelwa.
42_11_10_Kuba wonke umntu ocelayo, uyazuza; nalowo ufunayo,  uyafumana; nalowo unkqonkqozayo, uya kuvulelwa.
42_11_11_Nguwuphi na ke uyise kuni oya kuthi, unyana akucela isonka, amnike ilitye; athi akucela intlanzi, amnike inyoka endaweni yentlanzi?
42_11_12_Athi, ukuba uthe wacela iqanda, amnike unomadudwane?
42_11_13_Ukuba ke ngoko nina, ningendawo nje, niyakwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezilungileyo, wobeka phi na ke yena uYihlo wasemazulwini, ukugqithisela ukubapha uMoya oyiNgcwele abo bamcelayo?
42_11_14_Wayekhupha idemon, yaye ke isisidenge. Kwathi ke yakuphuma idemon, sathetha isidenge, zamangaliswa izihlwele.
42_11_15_Kodwa abathile kubo bathi, Uzikhupha iidemon ngoBhelezebhule, umphathi weedemon.
42_11_16_Baye ke bambi bemlinga, befuna kuye umqondiso ophuma emazulwini.
42_11_17_Ke kaloku yena, ezazi izicamango zabo, wathi kubo, Bonke ubukumkani obahlulelene bodwa, buyaphanza; nendlu eyahlulelene nendlu, iyawa.
42_11_18_Ukuba ke noSathana wahlulelene yedwa, bothini na ukuma ubukumkani bakhe? Ngokuba nithi, ndizikhupha iidemon ngoBhelezebhule.
42_11_19_Ke ukuba mna ndizikhupha iidemon ngoBhelezebhule,  bazikhupha ngabani na oonyana benu? Baya kuba ngabagwebi benu bona ngenxa yoko.
42_11_20_Ke ukuba ndizikhupha iidemon ngomnwe kaThixo, ngoko bunifikele kanti ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_11_21_Xa lithi igorha lixhobe tu, lilinde ibhotwe lalo, impahla yalo ihlala inqabile;
42_11_22_kodwa xa lithe elinamandla kunalo lalifikela, laleyisa,  lilihlutha sonke isikrweqe salo elabe likholose ngaso, liwabe amaxhoba alo.
42_11_23_Lowo ungengakum, uchasene nam; nalowo ungandibuthisiyo,  uyachithachitha.
42_11_24_Xa umoya ongcolileyo uthe waphuma emntwini, ucanda ezindaweni ezingenamanzi, ufuna ukuphumla; uze wakuba ungakufumani, usuke uthi, Ndiya kubuyela endlwini yam,  endaphuma kuyo.
42_11_25_Uthi wakufika, uyifumane itshayelwe, ivathisiwe.
42_11_26_Wandule ukuya kuthabatha abanye oomoya abasixhenxe abangendawo kunawo, bangene ke bahlale khona; lize ikamva laloo mntu libe libi kunesiqalo.
42_11_27_Ke kaloku kwathi, ekuzithetheni kwakhe ezi zinto, intokazi ethile yaliphakamisa izwi layo esihlweleni eso, yathi kuye,  Sinoyolo isizalo esakubambayo, nambele owawanyayo.
42_11_28_Uthe ke yena, Yithi kanye, Banoyolo abo balivayo ilizwi likaThixo baligcine.
42_11_29_Ke kaloku, zakubon ukuba ziqukene iindimbane, waqala ukuthi, Esi sizukulwana singendawo, singxamele umqondiso;  ukanti asiyi kunikwa mqondiso, ingenguwo umqondiso kaYona umprofeti.
42_11_30_Kuba, njengokuba uYona waba ngumqondiso kwabaseNineve, uya kuba kwanjalo uNyana woMntu kwesi sizukulwana.
42_11_31_Ukumkanikazi waseZantsi uya kusuka eme ngomgwebo namadoda esi sizukulwana, awagwebe; ngokuba wavela eziphelweni zomhlaba,  esiza kuva ubulumko bukaSolomon; ukanti ke omkhulu kunoSolomon nanku apha.
42_11_32_Amadoda aseNineve aya kusuka eme ngomgwebo nesi sizukulwana, asigwebe; kuba aguquka wona ngomemezo lukaYona;  ukanti ke omkhulu kunoYona nanku apha.
42_11_33_Akukho ke uthi, esibanekile isibane, asibeke endaweni efihlakeleyo, nokuba kuphantsi kwesitya; usibeka esiphathweni saso, ukuze abo bangenayo bakubone ukukhanya.
42_11_34_Isibane somzimba liliso. Xa sukuba iliso lakho lingenakumbi, umzimba wakho uphela uyakhanyiseleka; xa lithe lakhohlakala, nomzimba wakho ububumnyama.
42_11_35_Ngoko xunela ekuthini ukukhanya okukuwe kungabi bubumnyama.
42_11_36_Ukuba ngoko umzimba wakho uphela ukhanyiselekile,  ungenandawo imnyama, uya kukhanyiseleka uphela, njengaxenikweni sithe isibane sakukhanyisela ngokudangazela kwaso.
42_11_37_Ke kaloku, akuba ethethile, umFarisi othile wayemcela ukuba aye komulela kuye. Ungenile ke wahlala phantsi.
42_11_38_Uthe ke akubona oku, umFarisi wamangaliswa kukuba engathanga kuqala ahlambe, phambi kokuba adle.
42_11_39_Yathi ke iNkosi kuye, Kaloku nina baFarisi nihlambulula umphandle wendebe nesitya, ukanti wona umbilini wenu uzele kukuphanga nokungendawo.
42_11_40_Basweli-kuqonda, owakwenzayo okungaphandle akakwenzanga na nokungaphakathi?
42_11_41_Kanye ke izinto ezingaphakathi, lizani ngazo; niyabona,  zosuka zonke izinto zihlambuluke kuni.
42_11_42_Yeha, nina baFarisi! Ngokuba ninikela izishumi zetyeleba nezenxina nezemifuno yonke, nize nidlule kuwo umgwebo nokuthanda uThixo; ezi ndawo ke benimelwe kukuthi nizenze,  nithi neziya ningazishiyi.
42_11_43_Yeha, nina baFarisi! Ngokuba nithanda isihlalo sobukhulu ezindlwini zesikhungu, nemibuliso ezindaweni zembutho.
42_11_44_Yeha, nina babhali, baFarisi, bahanahanisindini! Ngokuba ninjengamangcwaba angabonakaliyo, abathi nabantu abahamba phezu kwawo, bangawazi.
42_11_45_Waphendula ke othile wakubaqondisi-mthetho, wathi kuye,  Mfundisi, uzithetha nje ezo zinto, usiphatha kakubi nathi.
42_11_46_Uthe ke yena, Yeha, nani baqondisimthetho! Ngokuba abantu nibathwalisa imithwalo enzima, nibe nina ngokwenu ningayichukumisi imithwalo leyo nangamnye umnwe wenu.
42_11_47_Yeha, nina! Ngokuba niyawakha amangcwaba abaprofeti, babe ke ooyihlo bebabulele.
42_11_48_Kambe niyayingqinela niyithakazela imisebenzi yooyihlo;  ngokuba bona okunene bababulala, niyawakha ke nina amangcwaba abo.
42_11_49_Ngenxa yoko nobulumko bukaThixo bathi, Ndiya kubathumela abaprofeti nabapostile; kubo abo ke baya kuyibulala inxenye,  bayitshutshise inxenye;
42_11_50_ukuze limenywe kwesi sizukulwana igazi labo bonke abaprofeti elaphalazwayo, kuseloko lasekwayo ihlabathi;
42_11_51_lithabathela egazini lika-Abheli, lide lizise egazini likaZekariya, owatshabalalela phakathi kwesibingelelo nendawo eyingcwele. Ewe, ndithi kuni, liya kumenywa kwesi sizukulwana.
42_11_52_Yeha nina, baqondisi-mthetho! Ngokuba nasisusa isitshixo sokwazi; nina anangena, nabangenayo nabalela.
42_11_53_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uyazithetha ezi zinto kubo,  baqala ababhali nabaFarisi ukuba nenqala enkulu, nokumcofa ngemibuzo emininzi,
42_11_54_bemlalele, befuna ukunqakula into ephuma emlonyeni wakhe,  ukuze bammangalele.
42_12_1_Phakathi koko, kuthe akubon ukuba ahlanganisene ndawonye amawaka-waka abantu, ngokokude banyathelane, waqala ukuthi kubafundi bakhe, Phambi kwako konke, lilumkeleni igwele labaFarisi, eliluhanahaniso.
42_12_2_Akukho nto ke igqunyiweyo, engasayi kutyhilwa;  nefihlakeleyo, engasayi kwaziwa.
42_12_3_Ngenxa enokuba konke enikuthethe emnyameni, kuya kuviwa emhlotsheni; nenikuthethe endlebeni emagumbini, kuya kumenyezwa phezu kwezindlu.
42_12_4_Ndithi ke kuni, zihlobo zam, Musani ukuboyika abo babulala umzimba, baze emva koko bangabi nanto yimbi bangayenzayo.
42_12_5_Ndiya kunibonisa ke enomoyika; yoyikani lowo uthi emva kokubulala, abe negunya lokuphosa esihogweni. Ewe, ndithi kuni,  Yoyikani yena lowo.
42_12_6_Abathengiswa ngeepeni ezimbini na oongqatyana abahlanu?  Ukanti akukho namnye kubo olityelweyo emehlweni kaThixo.
42_12_7_Kwaneenwele ezi zentloko yenu zibaliwe zonke; musani ukoyika ngoko, nibagqithile oongqatyana abaninzi nina.
