42_12_8_Ndithi ke kuni, Wonke umntu othe wandivuma phambi kwabantu,  kwanoNyana woMntu uya kumvuma phambi kwezithunywa zikaThixo.
42_12_9_Ondikhanyeleyo ke emehlweni abantu, wokhanyelwa emehlweni ezithunywa zikaThixo.
42_12_10_Nomntu wonke oya kuthetha ilizwi elibi ngoNyana woMntu,  woxolelwa; kodwa lowo unyelise uMoya oyiNgcwele, akasayi kuxolelwa.
42_12_11_Xa sukuba ke benizisa ezindlwini zesikhungu,  nakwizilawuli, nakwabanegunya, ize ningaxhaleli ukuba ningaziphendulela ngokunjani na, nangantoni na, nokuba ningathethani na.
42_12_12_Kuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uya kunifundisa ngalo elo lixa izinto enimelwe kukuthi nithethe zona.
42_12_13_Ke kaloku uthe ubani kuye endimbaneni, Mfundisi, yitsho kumzalwana wam, ahlulelane nam ilifa.
42_12_14_Uthe ke yena kuye, Mntundini, ndimiswe ngubani na ukuba ndibe ngumahluli nomabi phakathi kwenu?
42_12_15_Wathi ke kubo, Lumkani, nizilinde ngasekubaweni; ngokuba ubomi bomntu abumi ngabuninzi bempahla yakhe.
42_12_16_Wathetha ke umzekeliso kubo, esithi, Umhlaba womntu othile osisityebi wachuma kakhulu;
42_12_17_wayecamanga phakathi kwakhe, esithi, Ndiya kuthini na;  ngokuba andinandawo ndiya kuzihlanganisela kuyo iziqhamo zam?
42_12_18_Wathi, Nantsi into endiya kuyenza; ndiya kubawisa phantsi oovimba bam, ndakhe abangaphezulu kwabo; ndizihlanganisele khona zonke izilimo zam, nezinto zam ezilungileyo;
42_12_19_ndithi kuwo umphefumlo wam, Mphefumlo, unezinto ezininzi ezilungileyo, ezibekelwe iminyaka emininzi; phumla, yidla,  sela, yiba nemihlali.
42_12_20_Uthe ke uThixo kuye, Msweli-kuqonda, ngobu busuku umphefumlo wakho uya kubizwa kuwe; ziya kuba zezikabani na ke ezo zinto uzilungisileyo?
42_12_21_Unjalo lowo uziqwebela ubutyebi, engenabutyebi kuThixo.
42_12_22_Wathi ke kubo abafundi bakhe, Ngenxa yoko ndithi kuni,  Musani ukubuxhalela ubomi benu, ngokuthi ningadla ntoni na;  kwanomzimba, ngokuthi ningambatha ntoni na.
42_12_23_Ubomi bukhulu kunokudla, nomzimba kunento yokwambatha.
42_12_24_Qondani ngamahlungulu la, ngokuba akahlwayeli, akavuni;  kuwo akukho qonga navimba, kanti noko uThixo uyawondla; nina nibeke phi na ke, ukuzigqitha iintaka!
42_12_25_Nguwuphi na ke kuni onokuthi ngokuxhala ongeze ebukhulwini bakhe ikubhite ibe nye?
42_12_26_Ukuba ngoko aninako ukwenza neyona nto incinane, yini na ukuba nizixhalele ezinye?
42_12_27_Qondani ngeenyibiba, ukuhluma kwazo; azibulaleki, azisonti nokusonta; ndithi ke kuni, Naye uSolomon, kubo bonke ubunewunewu bakhe, wayengavathanga nanjenganye yazo ezi.
42_12_28_Ukuba ke ingca, leyo isendle, ethi namhla ibekho, ize ngomso iphoswe eziko, wenjenjalo uThixo ukuyambesa, wobeka phi na ke kuni, bantundini balukholo luncinane?
42_12_29_Nani nize ningafuni ukuthi ningadla ntoni na, nisele ntoni na; kanjalo nize ningathingazi;
42_12_30_ngokuba zonke ezo nto zingxanyelwe ziintlanga zehlabathi;  uYihlo ke uyazi ukuba niziswele ezo zinto.
42_12_31_Funani ubukumkani bukaThixo nina, zaye zonke ezo zinto ziya kongezelelwa kuni.
42_12_32_Musani ukoyika, mhlambi mncinane; ngokuba kukholekile kuYihlo ukuninika ubukumkani.
42_12_33_Thengisani ngeempahla zenu, nilize ngazo; zenzeleni iingxowa zemali ezingagugiyo, ubutyebi obungapheliyo emazulwini, apho kungasondeliyo sela, kungonakalisiyo nanundu;
42_12_34_kuba apho bukhona ubutyebi benu, yoba lapho nentliziyo yenu.
42_12_35_Mazibe zibhinqiwe izinqe zenu, nezibane zenu zivutha;
42_12_36_nani nibe njengabantu abayilindileyo inkosi yabo,  xeshikweni iya kubuya emsithweni; ukuze bathi, yakufika inkqonkqoze, bayivulele kwaoko.
42_12_37_Banoyolo abo bakhonzi, eyothi yakufika inkosi, ibafumane belindile. Inene ndithi kuni, iya kubhinqa, ibangqengqise bona,  ize isondele ibalungiselele.
42_12_38_Nokuba ithe yeza ngowesibini umlindo wobusuku, nokuba ithe yeza ngowesithathu umlindo, yafika kunjalo, banoyolo abo bakhonzi.
42_12_39_Kwazini ke oku, ukuba umninindlu ebesazi ukuba isela liza ngaliphi na ilixa, ange elindile, akayiyekela indlu yakhe igqojozwe.
42_12_40_Nani ngoko yibani nilungile; ngokuba uNyana woMntu uza ngelixa eningalikhumbuleliyo.
42_12_41_Wathi ke uPetros kuye, Nkosi, lo mzekeliso uwuthetha kuthi, uwuthetha kubo bonke, kusini na?
42_12_42_Ithe ke iNkosi, Ngubani na ke elo gosa lithembekileyo,  liqondileyo, eyothi inkosi ilimise phezu kwabendlu yayo, ukuze libanike umamkelo wabo wokudla ngexesha elifanelekileyo?
42_12_43_Unoyolo loo mkhonzi eyothi, yakufika inkosi yakhe,  imfumane esenjenjalo.
42_12_44_Inene ndithi kuni, iya kummisa phezu kwayo yonke impahla yayo.
42_12_45_Ukuba ke loo mkhonzi uthe entliziyweni yakhe, Inkosi yam iyalibala ukuza; aze aqale azibethe izicaka nezicakakazi, adle,  asele, anxile:
42_12_46_yofika inkosi yaloo mkhonzi ngemini angayilindeleyo,  nangelixa angalaziyo, ize imnqumle kubini, immisele isabelo sakhe nabangathembekileyo.
42_12_47_Yena ke loo mkhonzi, ubekwazi ukuthanda kwenkosi yakhe,  akalungisa, akenza ngokuthanda kwayo, uya kutyatyulwa ngemivumbo emininzi;
42_12_48_ke yena obengazi, wenza ke okufanele imivumbo, uya kutyatyulwa ibe mbalwa. Kubo bonke abanikwe okukhulu, kuya kufunwa okukhulu kubo; nakulowo kubekwe okukhulu kuye, kuya kubizwa okungaphezulu.
42_12_49_Ndize kuphosa umlilo ehlabathini; hayi, ukufuna kwam,  ukunga unge useluphenjiwe!
42_12_50_Kukho ke lubhaptizo ndifanele ukubhaptizwa ngalo; asikuko nokuba ndicinezelekile lude lufezeke.
42_12_51_Niba ndize kungenisa uxolo na ehlabathini? Ndithi kuni,  Hayi, kanye ndize kungenisa imbambano.
42_12_52_Kuba kuya kuthi, kuthabathela kwalapha, kubekho abahlanu ndlwini-nye bebambene, abathathu bebambene nababini, nababini bebambene nabathathu.
42_12_53_Kuya kubambana uyise nonyana, unyana noyise; unina nentombi, intombi nonina; uninazala nomolokazana, umolokazana noninazala.
42_12_54_Wayesithi ke nakuzo izihlwele, Xa nithe nalibona ilifu liphuma entshonalanga, nithi kwaoko, Kuza isiphango; kusuke kube njalo.
42_12_55_Naxa sukuba nibona umoya wasezantsi uvuthuza, nithi, Kuya kubakho ulophu; lusuke lubekho.
42_12_56_Bahanahanisindini, niyakwazi ukuyicalula imbonakalo yomhlaba neyezulu; kungani na ke ukuba ningalicaluli lona eli xesha?
42_12_57_Yini na ke ukuba nina ngokwenu ningakwahluli okububulungisa?
42_12_58_Kuba xa uya nommangaleli wakho phambi komlawuli, yithi endleleni apho usebenze ukuthi uzikhulule kuye; hleze akurholele kumgwebi, aze umgwebi akunikele kumsila, umsila ukuphose entolongweni.
42_12_59_Ndithi kuwe, Akusayi kukha uphume khona apho, ude uhlawule nemalanana yokugqibela.
42_13_1_Ke kaloku kwaye kukho abathile ngelo xesha, ababembikela amaGalili, agazi uPilato waliphithikeza namadini awo.
42_13_2_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Niba na loo maGalili ebengaboni ngaphezu kwawo onke amaGalili, ngokuba eve ubunzima obunjalo?
42_13_3_Ndithi kuni, Hayi; nothi xa sukuba ningaguquki,  nitshabalale kwangokunjalo nonke.
42_13_4_Hi, bona abo balishumi elinesibhozo, bawelwa yinqaba eseSilowa, yababulala; niba na babenetyala ngaphezu kwabo bonke abantu abemiyo eYerusalem?
42_13_5_Ndithi kuni, Hayi; nothi, xa sukuba ningaguquki,  nitshabalale kwangokunjalo nonke.
42_13_6_Wabethetha ke lo mzekeliso: Ubani wayenomkhiwane, utyelwe esidiliyeni sakhe; weza efuna isiqhamo kuwo, akafumana nto.
42_13_7_Wathi ke kumsebenzi-sidiliya, Uyabona, ndiminyaka mithathu ndiza ndifuna isiqhamo kulo mkhiwane, ndingafumani nto;  wugawule; yini na ukuba ude uphuthise nomhlaba.
42_13_8_Aphendule ke yena athi kuye, Nkosi, wuyeke nangalo mnyaka,  ndide khendimbe ndiwurhaqe, ndigalele umgquba.
42_13_9_Ukuba ke uthe wavelisa isiqhamo, wowuyeka; ke ukuba akubanga njalo, wobuya uwugawule.
42_13_10_Ke kaloku wayefundisa kwenye yezindlu zesikhungu ngayo isabatha.
42_13_11_Kwabonakala kukho ntokazi ibinomoya Wobulwelwe iminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo; yaye igobile, ingenako kanye ukuziphakamisa.
42_13_12_Eyibonile ke uYesu, wayibiza wathi kuyo, Ntokazindini,  khululeka ebulwelweni bakho.
42_13_13_Wayibeka ke izandla; yoluka kwangoko, yazukisa uThixo.
42_13_14_Ke kaloku waphendula umphathi wendlu yesikhungu, ecaphuka kuba uYesu waphilisa ngesabatha, wathi kwizihlwele, Mithandathu imihla ekufanele ukusetyenzwa ngayo; yizani ngayo ngoko niphiliswe, kungabi ngawo umhla wesabatha.
42_13_15_Yamphendula ngoko iNkosi, yathi, Mhanahanisindini, akathi na elowo kuni ayikhulule ngesabatha inkomo yakhe, nokuba liesile lakhe, emkhumbini wesitali, alirhole aye kuliseza?
42_13_16_Lo ke, eyintombi ka-Abraham nje, ayibophileyo uSathana,  khangela, le minyaka ilishumi elinesibhozo, ubengamele ukukhululwa na kulo mabophe ngomhla wesabatha?
42_13_17_Akubon ukuba uyazithetha ezo ndawo, badaniswa bonke abachasene naye; zathi zonke izihlwele zavuya ngazo zonke izinto ezizukileyo ezenziwa nguye.
42_13_18_Wayesithi ke, Bufana nantoni na ubukumkani bukaThixo?  Ndiya kubufanisa nantoni na?
42_13_19_Bufana nokhozo lwemostade, awaluthabathayo umntu,  waluphosa emyezweni wakhe; lwahluma lwaba ngumthi omkhulu,  zathi iintaka zezulu zahlala emasebeni awo.
42_13_20_Wabuya wathi, Ndiya kubufanisa nantoni na ubukumkani bukaThixo?
42_13_21_Bufana negwele, awalithabathayo umfazi, walifihla ezilinganisweni zozithathu zomgubo, wada wabiliswa uphela.
42_13_22_Waye ecanda kwimizi ngemizi, nemizana ngemizana, efundisa,  esinga eYerusalem.
42_13_23_Ke kaloku wathi othile kuye, Nkosi, bambalwa na abo basindiswayo?
42_13_24_Uthe ke yena kubo, Zamani ukungena ngesango elimxinwa;  ngokuba ndithi kuni, baninzi abaya kufuna ukungena, bakhohlwe.
42_13_25_Xa selethe wavuka umninindlu, waluvala ucango, naza naqala ukuma ngaphandle, nokunkqonkqoza elucangweni, nisithi, Nkosi,  nkosi, sivulele: uya kuza aphendule athi kuni, Andinazi apho nivela khona.
42_13_26_Niya kwandula niqale ukuthi, Sadla, sasela, emehlweni akho; nawe wafundisa ezitratweni zethu.
42_13_27_Athi, Ndithi kuni, andinazi apho nivela khona; mkani kum,  nina nonke basebenzi bokungalungileyo.
42_13_28_Khona apho kuya kubakho ukulila nokutshixiza kwamazinyo,  xa nithe nabona uAbraham, noIsake, noYakobi, nabo bonke abaprofeti, ebukumkanini bukaThixo; nibe ke nina nikhutshelwe phandle.
42_13_29_Babeya kuza bevela empumalanga nasentshonalanga, nasentla,  nasezantsi, bangqengqe ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
42_13_30_Yabonani, bakho abokugqibela abaya kuba ngabokuqala; bakho nabokuqala abaya kuba ngabokugqibela.
42_13_31_Kwangaloo mini kweza abaFarisi abathile, besithi kuye,  Phuma umke apha; ngokuba uHerode ufuna ukukubulala.
42_13_32_Wathi kubo, Yiyani nithi kuloo mpungutye, Uyabona,  ndikhupha iidemon, ndifinyeze iimpiliso, namhla nangomso;  ndithi ngowesithathu umhla ndifeze.
42_13_33_Kodwa ndimelwe kukuthi ndihambe namhla nangomso nangolandelayo; ngokuba akangekhe umprofeti atshabalalele ngaphandle kweYerusalem.
42_13_34_Yerusalem, Yerusalem, ebabulalayo abaprofeti, ibagibisele ngamatye abo bathunywe kuyo! Kufuthi kangakanani na ndathandayo ukubabuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho, ngohlobo esithi isikhukukazi siwabuthele ndawonye amantshontsho aso ngaphantsi kwamaphiko aso, anavuma!
42_13_35_Yabonani, indlu yenu ishiywa nani ize. Inene, ndithi ke kuni. Aniyi kuba sandibona, kude kufike ixesha eniya kuthi,  Makabongwe lowo uzayo egameni leNkosi.
42_14_1_Kwathi, akuba engene ngesabatha endlwini yomnye wakubaphathi babaFarisi, ukuba adle isonka, bahlala bemlalele bona.
42_14_2_Kwabonakala kukho phambi kwakhe mntu uthile unegalimoya.
42_14_3_Waphendula uYesu wathetha kubo abaqondisi-mthetho nabaFarisi, esithi, Kuvumelekile na ukuphilisa ngesabatha?  Bathi quthu ke bona.
42_14_4_Wamthabatha, wamphilisa, wamndulula.
42_14_5_Wabaphendula wathi, Lelikabani na kuni apha iesile, nokuba yinkomo, eya kweyela equleni, aze angayirholi kwaoko ngomhla wesabatha?
42_14_6_Bakhohlwa ukumphendula kwezo zinto.
42_14_7_Ke kaloku wathetha umzekeliso kwababemenyiwe, akugqala ukunyula kwabo izilili zobukhulu; wathi kubo,
42_14_8_Xa uthe wamenyelwa emsithweni ngubani, musa ukungqengqa esililini sobukhulu; hleze obekekileyo kunawe abe ubemenyiwe nguye,
42_14_9_eze lowo ubenimemile, athi kuwe, Khwelela lo mntu; uze uqale ukuthabatha indawo esekugqibeleni udanile.
42_14_10_Yithi xa uthe wamenywa, uye uhlale endaweni esekugqibeleni, ukuze, xa athe weza lowo ukumemileyo, athi kuwe, Sihlobo, nyukela ngasentla., wandule ke ukuba nozuko emehlweni abo bahleli ndawonye nawe.
42_14_11_Ngokuba wonke umntu oziphakamisayo, uya kuthotywa;  nozithobayo uya kuphakanyiswa.
42_14_12_Wayesithi ke nakulowo ummemileyo, Xa sukuba usenza isidlo sasemini, nokuba sesangokuhlwa, musa ukubiza izihlobo zakho,  nabazalwana bakho, nemizalwane yakho, nabamelwane abazizityebi;  hleze nabo babuye bakumeme, ize oko kube yimbuyekezo kuwe.
42_14_13_Yithi xa sukuba usenza isidlo, umeme amahlwempu, izilima,  iziqhwala, iimfama;
42_14_14_woba nentsikelelo; ngokuba abanako ukubuyekeza kuwe; kuba uya kubuyekezwa wena eluvukweni lwamalungisa.
42_14_15_Ke kaloku, akuziva ezo zinto omnye kwabo babehleli naye,  wathi kuye, Unoyolo oya kudla isonka ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
42_14_16_Uthe ke yena kuye, Umntu othile wenza isidlo esikhulu,  wamema abaninzi.
42_14_17_Wasusa umkhonzi wakhe ngelixa lesidlo, ukuba aye kuthi kwabamenyiweyo, Yizani; ngokuba konke sekulungisiwe.
42_14_18_Baqala bonke ngakunye ukuzilanduleka; owokuqala wathi kuye, Ndithenge intsimi, kufuneka ukuba ndiphume ndiye kuyibona; ndiyakucela, mandibe ngowabalandulelwayo.
42_14_19_Wathi omnye, Ndithenge iinkomo zeedyokhwe ezintlanu, ndiya kuziva; ndiyakucela mandibe ngowabalandulelwayo.
42_14_20_Wathi omnye, Ndizeke umfazi, ngenxa yoko andinakuza.
42_14_21_Efikile loo mkhonzi, wayibikela ke inkosi yakhe ezo ndawo.  Wandula waqumba umninindlu, wathi kumkhonzi wakhe, Phuma kamsinya, uye ezitratweni nakwizitratwana zomzi, uqukele apha amahlwempu nezilima neziqhwala neemfama.
42_14_22_Wathi umkhonzi, Nkosi, kwenzeke njengoko ubuyalele, ukanti kusekho indawo.
42_14_23_Yathi inkosi kumkhonzi lowo, Phuma uye ezindleleni,  nasezintangweni, ubanyanzele bangene, ukuze indlu yam izale.
42_14_24_Kuba ndithi kuni, akukho nanye kuloo madoda abemenyiwe,  eya kusiva isidlo sam.
42_14_25_Ke kaloku kwaye kuhamba naye izihlwele ezikhulu; wajika,  wathi kuzo,
42_14_26_Ukuba ubani uza kum, angamthiyi uyise, nonina, nomfazi,  nabantwana, nabazalwana, nodade, ewe, nobakhe ubomi, akanakuba ngumfundi wam.
42_14_27_Nosukuba engawuthwali umnqamlezo wakhe, andilandele,  akanakuba ngumfundi wam.
42_14_28_Kuba nguwuphi na kuni othi, ethanda ukwakha inqaba,  angakhe ahlale phantsi kuqala, abale indleko, ukuba unazo na izinto zokuyigqiba?
42_14_29_Hleze, akubon ukuba usibekile isiseko, angabi nakugqiba,  bathi bonke ababonelayo baqale ukuhlekisa ngaye,
42_14_30_besithi, Lo mntu waqala ukwakha, wakhohlwa ukugqiba.
42_14_31_Kananjalo nguwuphi na ukumkani othi, esiya kuhlangana nomnye ukumkani emfazweni, angakhe ahlale phantsi kuqala,  acinge ukuba unako na, enashumi-nye lamawaka, ukuhlangabeza omzelayo enamashumi amabini amawaka?
42_14_32_Ukuba ke akanako, uthi esekude, athume isigidimi, acele iindawo zoxolo.
42_14_33_Ngokukwanjalo ngoko, wonke umntu kuni ongazishiyiyo zonke iimpahla zakhe, akanakuba ngumfundi wam.
42_14_34_Ilungile ityuwa; ke ukuba ityuwa ithe ayaba nasongo,  yothiwani na ukuvakaliswa?
42_14_35_Ayiwulungele nomhlaba, ayiwulungele nomgquba; ilahlelwa phandle. Lowo uneendlebe zokuva makeve.
42_15_1_Ke kaloku, babesondela kuye bonke ababuthi berhafu naboni,  ukuba bamve.
42_15_2_Babekrokra ke abaFarisi nababhali, besithi, Lo wamkela aboni, adle nabo.
42_15_3_Wathetha ke kubo lo mzekeliso, esithi,
42_15_4_Nguwuphi na umntu kuni othi, enekhulu lezimvu, ize kulahleke enye kuzo, angazishiyi ezingamashumi asithoba anesithoba entlango, asinge kuleyo ilahlekileyo, ade ayifumane?
42_15_5_Athi ke akuyifumana, ayibeke emagxeni akhe, evuya.
42_15_6_Athi akufika ekhaya, ababizele ndawonye abahlobo nabamelwane, esithi kubo, Vuyisanani nam, ngokuba ndiyifumene imvu yam ebilahlekile.
42_15_7_Ndithi kuni, ngokukwanjalo kuya kubakho uvuyo emazulwini ngomoni eba mnye oguqukayo, kunamashumi asithoba anesithoba amalungisa, angaswele nguquko.
42_15_8_Kanjalo nguwuphi na umfazi eneedrarhima zilishumi, ongethi,  ukuba ithe yalahleka enye idrarhima, alumeke isibane,  ayitshayele indlu, afune enyamekile, ade ayifumane?
42_15_9_Athi akuyifumana, ababizele ndawonye abahlobo nabamelwane,  esithi, Vuyisanani nam, ngokuba ndiyifumene idrarhima ebindilahlekile.
42_15_10_Ngokukwanjalo ndithi kuni, kubakho uvuyo emehlweni ezithunywa zikaThixo ngomoni eba mnye oguqukayo.
42_15_11_Ke kaloku wathi, Umntu othile ube enoonyana ababini.
42_15_12_Wathi omnci wabo kuyise, Bawo, ndinike isahlulo sempahla esilunge nam. Wababela imfuyo leyo.
42_15_13_Kuthe kungekabi ntsuku zininzi, wahlanganisa into yonke unyana omnci, wesuka kwelakowabo, waya ezweni elikude; wathi khona apho wayichitha impahla yakhe ngentlalo yokuzibhubhisa.
42_15_14_Akubon ukuba udle konke, kwabakho indlala enzima kwelo zwe, waqala ukuswela naye.
42_15_15_Waya wanamathela komnye kubemi belo zwe; wathi yena wamthumela emihlabeni yakhe, ukuba aye kwalusa iihagu.
42_15_16_Ubenqwenela ke ukusizalisa isisu sakhe ngeengxam ezabe zidliwa ziihagu; bekungekho mntu umphayo.
42_15_17_Ke kaloku, akuba nokuziqonda, wathi, Kanene bangakanani na abaqeshwa bakabawo, abadikwa zizonka; nanku ke mna ndiphela yindlala?
42_15_18_Ndiya kusuka ndiye kubawo, ndithi kuye, Bawo, ndonile kuwo amazulu, nasemehlweni akho.
42_15_19_Andisafanele kubizwa ngonyana wakho; ndenze ndibe njengomnye kubaqeshwa bakho.
42_15_20_Wesuka weza kuyise. Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba usekude lee,  uyise wambona, wasikwa yimfesane, wagidima, wawa entanyeni yakhe, wamanga.
42_15_21_Wathi ke unyana kuye, Bawo, ndonile kuwo amazulu,  nasemehlweni akho; andisafanele kubizwa ngonyana wakho.
42_15_22_Uthe ke uyise kubakhonzi bakhe, Rholani ingubo ende, eyona intle, nimambathise, nifake umsesane esandleni sakhe,  neembadada ezinyaweni zakhe.
42_15_23_Nizise ithole, eliya lityetyisiweyo, nixhele; sidle, sibe nemihlali.
42_15_24_Ngokuba lo nyana wam ubefile, wabuya waphila;  ubelahlekile, wafunyanwa. Baqala ke ukuba nemihlali.
42_15_25_Ke kaloku unyana wakhe omkhulu ebesentsimini; wathi xa azayo, wasondela endlwini, weva ukugwala nokududa.
42_15_26_Wabizela kuye omnye kubakhonzi, wambuza ukuba zingaba ziyini na ezi zinto.
42_15_27_Uthe ke yena kuye, Umninawa wakho ufikile; uyihlo ke uxhele ithole, eliya lityetyisiweyo; ngokuba ebuye wamzuzu ephilile.
42_15_28_Waqumba ke, akavuma nokungena. Uphumile ke uyise wambongoza.
42_15_29_Waphendula ke yena wathi kuyise, Uyabona, le minyaka ingakanana ndiyakukhonza, andizanga ndigqithe mthetho wakho;  ukanti akuzanga undinike netakane eli, ukuze ndenze imihlali nezam izihlobo;
42_15_30_kodwa xenikweni afikileyo lo nyana wakho, wayidlayo wayigqiba impilo yakho namahenyukazi, umxhelele ithole eliya lityetyisiweyo.
42_15_31_Uthe ke yena kuye, Mntwana wam, wena uhleli unam, nazo zonke izinto zam zezakho.
42_15_32_Besimelwe kukuthi senze imihlali ke, sivuye; ngokuba umninawa wakho lo ubefile, wabuya waphila; ubelahlekile,  wafunyanwa.
42_16_1_Ke kaloku, wayesithi nakubafundi bakhe, Kwaye kukho umntu othile osisityebi, obenegosa; laza lona lancethezwa kuye, ukuba lingoyichithayo impahla yakhe.
42_16_2_Elibizile ke, wathi kulo, Yintoni na le ndiyivayo ngawe?  Khawenze ingxelo yobugosa bakho; kuba akusayi kuba saba ligosa.
42_16_3_Lathi ke igosa ngaphakathi kwalo, Ndiya kuthini na? Ngokuba inkosi yam iyabuhlutha ubugosa kum; ukumba kundikhohlile;  ukungqiba, ndineentloni.
42_16_4_O! ndiyayazi into endiya kuyenza, ukuze xa ndithe ndakhutshwa ebugoseni, bandamkele ezindlwini zabo.
42_16_5_Libabizele kulo ngabanye abanetyala enkosini yalo, lathi kowokuqala, Unatyala lingakanani na enkosini yam?
42_16_6_Uthe ke yena, Likhulu leebhate zeoli. Lathi kuye, Thabatha iphetshana lakho, uhlale phantsi msinya, ubhale amashumi amahlanu.
42_16_7_Emva koko lathi komnye, Wena ke unatyala lingakanani na?  Uthe ke yena, Likhulu leekore zengqolowa. Lathi kuye, Thabatha iphetshana lakho, ubhale amashumi asibhozo.
42_16_8_Yaza inkosi leyo yalincoma igosa elingalungisiyo, ngokuba lenza ngokuqonda; ngokuba bona abeli phakade kwesabo isizukulwana banokuqonda, ngaphezu kwabo abokukhanya.
42_16_9_Nam ndithi kuni, Zenzeleni izihlobo ngabo ubutyebi bokungalungisi, ukuze xa nithe naphelelwa, namkelwe eminqubeni engunaphakade.
42_16_10_Othembekileyo kokuncinane, uthembekile nakokukhulu;  nongalungisiyo kokuncinane, akalungisi nakokukhulu.
42_16_11_Ukuba ngoko anibanga nakuthembeka ebutyebini bokungalungisi, ngubani na owonithemba kobo buyinyaniso?
42_16_12_Nokuba anibanga nakuthembeka koko komnye, ngubani na oya kuninika okukokwenu?
42_16_13_Akukho mkhonzi unako ukukhonza nkosi mbini; kuba eya kuyithiya le, athande leya; athi mhlawumbi abambelele kule,  ayidele leya; aninako ukukhonza uThixo nobutyebi.
42_16_14_Ke kaloku baye beziva ezo ndawo zonke nabo abaFarisi,  amathanda-mali; baye bemsinekela ke.
42_16_15_Wathi kubo, Nina ningabazigwebelayo emehlweni abantu;  kodwa uThixo uyazazi iintliziyo zenu; ngokuba oko kuphakanyisiweyo phakathi kwabantu, kulisikizi emehlweni kaThixo.
42_16_16_Yayingumthetho nabaprofeti kwada kwakuYohane; kuselokoko,  ubukumkani bukaThixo buyashunyayelwa, bonke bayangena kubo ngokugonyamela.
42_16_17_Ke kulula ukuba lidlule izulu nomhlaba, kunokuba kuwe nalinye isuntswana lomthetho.
42_16_18_Wonke umntu omalayo umfazi wakhe, azeke wumbi, uyakrexeza;  nomntu wonke ozeka owalene nendoda, uyakrexeza.
42_16_19_Ke bekukho umntu othile osisityebi, obevatha ezibomvu nezelinen ecikizekileyo, esenza imihlali yokuzuka kwakhe imihla yonke.
42_16_20_Bekukho ke hlwempu lithile, ligama linguLazaro,  elalikhahlelwe esangweni lakhe, lizele zizilonda,
42_16_21_linqwenela ukuhluthiswa ngeemvuthuluka eziwa etafileni yesityebi eso; zibe zisithi izinja, zize zikhothe izilonda zalo.
42_16_22_Ke kaloku lathi lafa ihlwempu elo, lasiwa zizithunywa zezulu esifubeni sika-Abraham; safa ke nesityebi, sangcwatywa.
42_16_23_Size, sikwelabafileyo, siphakamise amehlo aso sisentuthumbeni, simbone uAbraham ekude, ulazaro esesifubeni sakhe.
42_16_24_Samemeza sona sathi, Bawo, Abraham, ndenzele inceba,  uthume uLazaro, ukuba athi nkxu incam yomnwe wakhe emanzini,  aphozise ulwimi lwam; ngokuba ndiyathuthunjelwa kweli langatye.
42_16_25_Uthe ke uAbraham, Mntwana wam, khumbula ukuba wena wazifincelela ebomini bakho izinto zakho ezilungileyo, noLazaro ngokukwanjalo izinto ezimbi; ngoku ke yena uyathuthuzelwa, wena ke uyathuthunjelwa.
42_16_26_Kananjalo ngaphandle kwale nto yonke, phakathi kwethu nani kuthiwe zinzi umsantsa omkhulu, ukuze aba bathanda ukuphumela,  besuka apha besiya kuni, bangabi nako; bathi nabalapho, bangabi nakuwelela kuthi.
42_16_27_Sathi, Ndiyakucela ngoko, bawo, ukuba umthume endlwini kabawo; kuba ndinabazalwana abahlanu;
42_16_28_ukuba abaqononondise, ukuze bangathi nabo beze kule ndawo yentuthumbo.
42_16_29_Athi uAbraham kuso, BanoMoses nabaprofeti, mabeve bona.
42_16_30_Sithe ke sona, Hayi, bawo Abraham; ukuba kuthe kwaya kubo ovela kwabafileyo, boguquka.
42_16_31_Uthe ke kuso, Ukuba uMoses nabaprofeti ababeva, abayi koyiseka, nokuba kuthe kwavuka bani kwabafileyo.
42_17_1_Wathi ke kubo abafundi, Azinakuba zingezi izikhubekiso;  yeha ke, loo mntu ziza ngaye!
42_17_2_Angasizakala kanye, ethe wagangxwa ilitye lokusila entanyeni yakhe, wajulelwa elwandle, kunokuba akhubekise noko amnye kwaba bancinane.
42_17_3_Zilumkeleni; ukuba ke umzalwana wakho uthe wakona,  mkhalimele; ukuba uthe waguquka, mxolele.
42_17_4_Nokuba uthe wakona kasixhenxe ngemini, waza wabuyela kuwe kasixhenxe ngemini, esithi, Ndiyaguquka, wothi umxolele.
42_17_5_Abapostile bathi eNkosini, Songezelele ukholo.
42_17_6_Ithe ke iNkosi, Ukuba beninokholo olunjengokhozo lwemostade, beningathi kulo mthombe, Ncothuka, utyaleke phakathi elwandle; uze unive.
42_17_7_Ngubani na ke kuni, enomkhonzi elima, mhlawumbi esalusa,  oya kuthi, akungena evela entsimini, athi kwaoko kuye, Yiza uhlale phantsi;
42_17_8_ongayi kuthi kanye kuye, Lungisa into endiya kuyidla, uze ubhinqe, undilungiselele, ndide ndidle ndisele; wothi emva koko udle usele nawe?
42_17_9_Anganombulelo kuloo mkhonzi yini na, ngokuba enze izinto azimiselweyo? Anditsho mna.
42_17_10_Ngokukwanjalo nani, xa nithe nazenza zonke izinto enazimiselwayo, Yithini, Singabakhonzi abangancedi lutho;  ngokuba sanele ukwenza oko besimelwe kukuthi sikwenze.
42_17_11_Kwathi ekuhambeni kwakhe ukuya eYerusalem, wacanda phakathi kwelamaSamariya nelaseGalili yena.
42_17_12_Akubon ukuba ungena mzini uthile, amhlangabeza amadoda alishumi eneqhenqa, amela mgama.
42_17_13_Wona aphakamisa ilizwi, esithi, Yesu, Mongameli, senzele inceba.
42_17_14_Ewabonile ke, wathi kuwo, Hambani niye kuzibonakalalisa kubabingeleli. Kwathi ekuyeni kwawo, ahlanjululwa.
42_17_15_Ithe ke enye kuwo apho, yakubona ukuba iphilisiwe, yabuya imzukisa uThixo ngezwi elikhulu.
42_17_16_Yawa ngobuso ezinyaweni zakhe, ibulela kuye; yaye yona ingumSamariya.
42_17_17_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi, Babengahlanjululwanga belishumi na? Baphi na ke abasithoba?
42_17_18_Akufumanekanga na babuyileyo, besiza kuzukisa uThixo,  ngulo wolunye uhlanga yedwa na?
42_17_19_Wathi kuye, Vuka, uhambe; ukholo lwakho lukusindisile.
42_17_20_Ke kaloku, akubuzwa ngabaFarisi ukuba ubukumkani bukaThixo buya kufika nini na, wabaphendula wathi, Ubukumkani bukaThixo abufiki bunokulolongeka.
42_17_21_Kanjalo akuyi kuthiwa, Nabu apha! Nabuya phaya! Kuba,  yabonani, ubukumkani bukaThixo bungaphakathi kwenu.
42_17_22_Wathi ke kubo abafundi, Kuya kufika mihla, niya kunqwenela ngayo ukuwubona noko umnye umhla woNyana woMntu, ningawuboni;
42_17_23_baya kuthi ke kuni, Nanku apha! Nankuya phaya! Musani ukuya, ningaphuthumi nokuphuthuma.
42_17_24_Kuba kwanjengokuba umbane ubaneka, uphuma kwelinye icala eliphantsi kwezulu, ukhanye usingise kwelinye eliphantsi kwezulu, uya kuba njalo noNyana woMntu ngomhla wakhe.
42_17_25_Kodwa kuqala umelwe kukuthi eve ubunzima obuninzi, alahlwe sesi sizukulwana.
42_17_26_Njengoko kwaye kuhle ngemihla kaNowa, koba njalo nangemihla yoNyana woMntu.
42_17_27_Babesidla, babesela, babezeka, babesendisa, kwada kwayimini awangena ngayo uNowa emkhombeni; wafika unogumbe,  wabatshabalalisa bonke.
42_17_28_Njengoko kwaye kunjalo nangemihla kaLote; babesidla,  babesela, babethenga, babethengisa, babetyala, babesakha;
42_17_29_kodwa ngemini awaphuma ngayo uLote eSodom, kwana umlilo nesulfure ezulwini, batshatyalaliswa bonke.
42_17_30_Kuya kuba kwanjengoko ngemini atyhileka ngayo uNyana woMntu.
42_17_31_Ngaloo mini, oya kuba phezu kwendlu, zibe iimpahla zakhe zisendlwini, makangehli aye kuzithabatha. Kwangokunjalo,  nosentsimini makangabuyeli kwezisemva.
42_17_32_Khumbulani umkaLote.
42_17_33_Othe wafuna ukuwusindisa umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo; othe wawulahla, uya kuwulondoloza.
42_17_34_Ndithi kuni, Ngobo busuku ababini boba sililini sinye;  omnye amkelwe, omnye ashiywe.
42_17_35_Amankazana amabini oba esila ndawonye; enye yamkelwe, enye ishiywe.
42_17_36_Abantu ababini boba sentsimini; omnye amkelwe, omnye ashiywe.
42_17_37_Baphendula bathi kuye, Phi na, Nkosi? Ithe ke yona kubo,  Apho sikhona isidumbu, aya kuhlanganisana khona amaxhalanga.
42_18_1_Ke kaloku, wayethetha nomzekeliso kubo, wokuba bamelwe kukuhlala bethandaza, bangethi amandla;
42_18_2_esithi, Kwaye kukho umgwebi emzini othile, ongamoyikiyo uThixo, ongamhloneleyo nomntu.
42_18_3_Bekukho ke umhlolokazi othile kuloo mzi, obemana ukuza kuye, esithi, Ndikhulule kummangaleli wam.
42_18_4_Kwaba mzuzu engavumi; kodwa kamva wathi ngaphakathi kwakhe,  Nakuba ndingamoyiki uThixo, ndingamhlonele nomntu:
42_18_5_noko, ngenxa yokuba lo mhlolokazi endibulala, ndomlungisa,  ndimkhulule, hleze ade eze andaphule.
42_18_6_Ithe ke iNkosi, Kuveni okuthethwa ngumgwebi ongalungisiyo.
42_18_7_Ke yena uThixo akayi kukha abalungise na abanyulwa bakhe,  abakhala kuye imini nobusuku, noko azeka kade umsindo ngabo?
42_18_8_Ndithi kuni, Uya kubalungisa, abakhulule kamsinya. Kodwa ke akufika uNyana woMntu, wolufumana na ke ukholo ehlabathini apha?
42_18_9_Ke kaloku wathetha lo mzekeliso nakwabathile, ababekholose ngokuthi ngaphakathi kwabo bangamalungisa, bengabenze nto abanye:
42_18_10_Amadoda amabini enyuka aya etempileni, esiya kuthandaza;  enye ingumFarisi, enye ingumbuthi werhafu.
42_18_11_UmFarisi, ezimise yedwa, wayethandaza esithi, Thixo,  ndiyabulela kuwe, ukuba ndingenjengabanye abantu, abaphangi,  abangemalungisa, abakrexezi; ndingenjengaye nalo mbuthi werhafu.
42_18_12_Ndizila ukudla kabini ngeveki, ndinikela izishumi zako konke endikuzuzayo.
42_18_13_Waye umbuthi werhafu emi kude, engathandi nokuphakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini; wamana ukubetha esifubeni sakhe, esithi,  Thixo, yiba netarhu kum, mna moni.
42_18_14_Ndithi kuni, Wehla lo waya endlwini yakhe, egwetyelwe yena kunalowa; ngokuba wonke umntu oziphakamisayo uva kuthotywa;  nozithobayo ke uya kuphakanyiswa.
42_18_15_Ke kaloku baye bezisa kuye neentsana zabo, ukuze azichukumise; bebonile ke abafundi, babakhalimela.
42_18_16_Ke yena uYesu wazibizela kuye, wathi, Bavumeleni abantwana beze kum, ningabaleli; kuba ubukumkani bukaThixo bubobabo banjalo.
42_18_17_Inene, ndithi kuni, Othe akabamkela ubukumkani bukaThixo njengomntwana, akasayi kukha angene kubo.
42_18_18_Umphathi othile wambuza, esithi, Mfundisi ulungileyo,  mandenze ntoni na, ukuze ndibudle ilifa ubomi obungunaphakade?
42_18_19_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Yini na ukuba uthi ndilungile? Akukho ulungileyo, mnye kwaphela, nguThixo.
42_18_20_Uyayazi imithetho: musa ukukrexeza, musa ukubulala, musa ukuba, musa ukungqina ubuxoki, beka uyihlo nonyoko.
42_18_21_Uthe ke yena, Zonke ezo zinto ndazigcina kwasebuncinaneni bam.
42_18_22_Ekuvile ke oko uYesu, wathi kuye, Kusekho nto-nye uyisweleyo; zonke izinto onazo thengisa ngazo, wabele amahlwempu; woba nobutyebi ke emazulwini; uze undilandele.
42_18_23_Ezivile ke ezo ndawo, waba buhlungu kakhulu; kuba ube esisityebi kunene.
42_18_24_UYesu akumbona ke ebuhlungu kakhulu, wathi, Hayi, ukuba ngenkankulu, ukuthi abo banobutyebi bangene ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
42_18_25_Kuba kulula ukuba inkamela iphumele entunjeni yenaliti,  kunokuba isityebi singene ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
42_18_26_Bathi ke abo bevayo, Ngubani na ke ongasindiswayo?
42_18_27_Uthe ke yena, Izinto ezingenakwenzeka kubantu,  zinokwenzeka kuye uThixo.
42_18_28_Uthe ke uPetros, Uyabona, thina sishiye izinto zonke,  sakulandela.
42_18_29_Uthe ke yena kubo, Inene, ndithi kuni, Akukho namnye ushiye indlu, nokuba ngabazali, nokuba ngabazalwana, nokuba ngumfazi, nokuba ngabantwana, ngenxa yobukumkani bukaThixo,
42_18_30_ongasayi kwamkela izinto eziphindaphindiweyo ngalo eli xesha, aze ngelo lizayo iphakade amkele ubomi obungunaphakade.
42_18_31_Ke kaloku ubathabathile abalishumi elinababini, wathi kubo, Niyabona, siyenyuka, siya eYerusalem; zaye ziya kuphelela zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngabaprofeti, kuye uNyana woMntu.
42_18_32_Kuba uya kunikelwa kuzo iintlanga, kudlalwe ngaye,  aphathwe kakubi, atshicelwe;
42_18_33_zimtyakatye, zimbulale; athi ngomhla wesithathu abuye avuke.
42_18_34_Bona abaqondanga nento kwezi zinto; laye neli lizwi lifihlakele kubo, babengazazi izinto ezithethwayo.
42_18_35_Kwaye ke kaloku, ekusondeleni kwakhe eYeriko, kuhleli imfama ethile ngasendleleni, ingqiba.
42_18_36_Ithe yakuva kudlula isihlwele, yamana ibuza ukuba ingaba yintoni na le.
42_18_37_Bayixelela ke ukuba kudlula uYesu waseNazarete.
42_18_38_Yabhomboloza isithi, Yesu, nyana kaDavide, ndenzele inceba.
42_18_39_Baye abo babehamba ngaphambili beyikhalimela, ukuba ithi tu; kwaba kukhona ke yona ikhalayo ngakumbi, isithi, Nyana kaDavide, ndenzele inceba.
42_18_40_Wema ke uYesu, wathi mayiziswe kuye. Yakusondela ke wayibuza,
42_18_41_esithi, Ufuna ukuba ndikwenzele ntoni na? Ithe ke yona,  Nkosi, ukuba ndibuye ndibone.
42_18_42_UYesu wathi kuyo, Buya ubone; ukholo lwakho lukusindisile.
42_18_43_Kwangoko yabuya yabona, yamlandela imzukisa uThixo; bathi bonke abantu, bakukubona oko, badumisa uThixo.
42_19_1_Waye engene uYesu, ecanda eYeriko.
42_19_2_Kwakho ndoda ibizwa ngegama elinguZakeyu; yaye yona iyintloko yababuthi berhafu; yaye isisityebi yona.
42_19_3_Yayifuna ukumbona uYesu, ukuba ngubani na; ayaba nako ngenxa yendimbane, ngokuba ngesithomo yayimfutshane.
42_19_4_Yagidima ngaphambili, yakhwela kumthombe ukuze imbone;  ngokuba ebeza kudlula ngapho.
42_19_5_Akufika kuloo ndawo, wakhangela phezulu uYesu, wayibona,  wathi kuyo, Zakeyu, khawuleza uhle; kuba namhlanje ndimelwe kukuhlala endlwini yakho.
42_19_6_Wakhawuleza ke, wehla, wamamkela ngobubele, evuya.
42_19_7_Baye bonke, bakuyibona loo nto, bekrokra, besithi, Ungene waya kulala kwindoda engumoni.
42_19_8_Wema ke uZakeyu, wathi kuyo iNkosi, Uyabona, isiqingatha sempahla yam, Nkosi, ndisinika amahlwempu; nokuba ndidle into kabani ngokumtyhola, ndimbuyisela kane.
42_19_9_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Namhlanje kufike usindiso kule ndlu,  ngokokuba naye engunyana ka-Abraham;
42_19_10_kuba uNyana woMntu weza kufuna nokusindisa oko kulahlekileyo.
42_19_11_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayaziva ezi zinto, uqokele wathetha umzekeliso, ngenxa yokuba ebekufuphi eYerusalem,  nangokuba babesiba ubukumkani bukaThixo buza kubonakala kwangoko.
42_19_12_Wathi ngoko, Umntu othile olinene wahambela ezweni elikude, eya kuzamkelela ubukumkani, aze abuye.
42_19_13_Ubabizile ke abakhonzi bakhe abalishumi, wabanika iimina zalishumi, wathi kubo, Rhwebani, ndide ndifike.
42_19_14_Ke abemi bomzi wakhe babemthiyile, bathuma izigidimi emva kwakhe, besithi, Asithandi ukuba lo abe ngukumkani phezu kwethu.
42_19_15_Kwathi, akuba ebuyile, ebamkele ubukumkani, wathi,  mababizelwe kuye abo bakhonzi abebanike imali leyo, ukuze azi ukuba unantsi urhwebe ntoni na.
42_19_16_Wavela ke owokuqala esithi, Nkosi, imina yakho izele iimina zalishumi.
42_19_17_Uthe kuye, Hee ke, mkhonzi ulungileyo; ngokuba waba nokuthembeka entweni encinanana, yiba negunya kwimizi elishumi.
42_19_18_Weza nowesibini, esithi, Nkosi, imina yakho yenze iimina zantlanu.
42_19_19_Uthe ke nakulowo, Nawe yiba phezu kwemizi emihlanu
42_19_20_Weza nomnye esithi, Nkosi, nantsi imina yakho endibe ndinayo, ndiyibeke eqhiyeni;
42_19_21_kuba ndibe ndikoyika wena, ngokuba ungumntu obungqabangqaba, uthabatha into ongayibekanga, uvune into ongayihlwayelanga.
42_19_22_Athi ke kuye, Ndiya kukugweba ngokuphuma emlonyeni wakho,  mkhonzindini ungendawo; ubusazi nje ukuba mna ndingumntu obungqabangqaba, othabatha into angayibekanga, avune into angayihlwayelanga;
42_19_23_ibiyini na phofu, ukuba ungayibeki imali yam ebhankini,  ndaza mna ekufikeni ndaba ndiyibize inenzala?
42_19_24_Wathi kwababemi ngakhona, Mhlutheni imina leyo, niyinike lowo uneemina ezilishumi.
42_19_25_Bathi ke kuye, Nkosi, uneemina ezilishumi.
42_19_26_Kuba ndithi kuni, Wonke umntu onako uya kunikwa; ongenako ke, uya kuhluthwa kwanoko anako.
42_19_27_Ke zona ezo ntshaba zam zazingathandanga ukuba ndibe ngukumkani phezu kwazo, ziziseni apha, nizincinithe phambi kwam.
42_19_28_Waye, akuba ezithethile ezi zinto, ehamba ngaphambili,  enyuka esiya eYerusalem.
42_19_29_Kwathi, akusondela eBhetefage naseBhetani, esingise entabeni ekuthiwa yeyemiNquma, wesusa bababini kubafundi bakhe,
42_19_30_wathi, Hambani niye emzaneni lo ukhangelene nani; nothi,  nakungena kuwo, nifumane ithole le-esile libotshelelwe,  ekungazanga kuhlale namnye umntu phezu kwalo; likhululeni nilizise.
42_19_31_Nokuba ubani uyanibuza, esithi, Yini na ukuba nilikhulule?  nothi ukuthetha kuye, Liyafuneka eNkosini.
42_19_32_Basuka ke baya abo babethunyiwe, bafumana kunjengoko abekutshilo kubo.
42_19_33_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayalikhulula ithole, bathi abaninilo kubo, Nilikhululelani na ithole?
42_19_34_Bathi ke bona, Liyafuneka eNkosini.
42_19_35_Balizisa kuYesu, baphosa iingubo zabo phezu kwethole elo,  bamkhwelisa uYesu.
42_19_36_Akubon ukuba uyahamba ke, bamana bezandlala iingubo zabo endleleni.
42_19_37_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba selesondele ekuhleni kwayo iNtaba yemiNquma, yaqala yonke inkitha yabafundi yavuya, yadumisa uThixo ngezwi elikhulu, ngayo yonke imisebenzi yamandla abayibonayo;
42_19_38_besithi, Makabongwe lo Kumkani uzayo egameni leNkosi;  uxolo emazulwini, uzuko enyangweni.
42_19_39_Abathile kubaFarisi esihlweleni apho bathi kuye, Mfundisi,  bakhalimele abafundi bakho.
42_19_40_Waphendula wathi kubo, Ndithi kuni, kungathi kuthe cwaka aba, kunkqangaze amatye la.
42_19_41_Akusondela, wawubona umzi, wawulilela,
42_19_42_esithi, Akwaba ubusazi nawe lo kwangayo yona le mini yakho, izinto ezizezoxolo lwakho! Ke kungoku zifihliwe emehlweni akho.
42_19_43_Ngokuba uya kufikelwa yimihla, eziya kuthi iintshaba zakho zikubiyele ngodonga, zikungqinge, zikuxine ngeenxa zonke,
42_19_44_zikukhahlele phantsi wena, nabantwana bakho phakathi,  kwakho; zingashiyi nelitye phezu kwelitye phakathi kwakho,  ngenxa enokuba ungalazanga ixesha lokuvelelwa kwakho.
42_19_45_Waza, eye kungena etempileni, waqala ukubakhupha abo babethengisa kuyo, nababethenga;
42_19_46_esithi kubo, Kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Indlu yam yindlu yokuthandaza; ke nina niyenze umqolomba wezihange.
42_19_47_Wayefundisa imihla ngemihla etempileni apho. Baye ke ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali, kwanabaziintloko zabantu,  befuna ukumtshabalalisa.
42_19_48_Baye ke bengafumani nto bangayenzayo; kuba bonke abantu babenamathele kuye, bemphulaphula.
42_20_1_Kwathi ngenye imini, akubon ukuba uyabafundisa abantu etempileni, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, wafikelwa ngababingeleli abakhulu nababhali, kunye namadoda amakhulu.
42_20_2_Bathetha kuye besithi, Sixelele; uzenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto? Kanjalo ngubani na okunike eli gunya?
42_20_3_Waphendula ke wathi kubo, Nam ndiya kubuza kuni zwi-nye,  ize nindixelele ke.
42_20_4_Ubhaptizo lukaYohane lwaluphuma emazulwini, lwaluphuma ebantwini, sini na?
42_20_5_Bacamanga ke bona bodwa, besithi, Ukuba sithe, Lwaphuma emazulwini, wothi, Ibiyini na phofu ukuba ningakholwa nguye?
42_20_6_Ukuba ke sithe, Lwaphuma ebantwini, bonke abantu bosigibisela ngamatye; kuba beyisekile ukuba uYohane ungumprofeti.
42_20_7_Baphendula ngokuthi, abazi ukuba lwaphuma phi na.
42_20_8_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Nam ke andinixeleli ukuba ndizenza ngagunya lini na ezi zinto.
42_20_9_Ke kaloku waqala wathetha ebantwini lo mzekeliso: Umntu othile watyala isidiliya, waqeshisa ngaso kubalimi, wahambela kwelinye ilizwe umzuzu owaneleyo.
42_20_10_Wathi ngalo ixesha elifanelekileyo, wathuma umkhonzi kubalimi, ukuba bamnike esiqhameni sesidiliya. Basuka ke bona abalimi bamtyabula, bamndulula elambatha.
42_20_11_Waphinda wathuma omnye umkhonzi. Bamtyabula ke nalowo,  bamhlazisa, bamndulula elambatha.
42_20_12_Waphinda wathuma nowesithathu. Bathi ke bona bamngxwelerha nalowo, bamkhupha.
42_20_13_Uthe ke umninisidiliya, Ndiya kuthini na? Ndiya kuthuma unyana wam oyintanda; mhlawumbi, bakumbona, bangamhlonela yena.
42_20_14_Bathe ke abalimi, bakumbona, bacamanga bodwa, besithi,  Yindlalifa le; yizani siyibulale, ukuze ilifa libe lelethu.
42_20_15_Bamkhuphela ngaphandle kwesidiliya, bambulala. Uya kuthini na ke ngoko kubo umninisidiliya?
42_20_16_Uya kufika abatshabalalise abo balimi, asinikele bambi isidiliya eso. Bathe ke bakukuva oko, Mayingabikho loo nto!
42_20_17_Wondela ke kubo, wathi, Yintoni na phofu le ibhaliweyo:  Ilitye abalicekisayo abakhi, Lelona laba yintloko yembombo?
42_20_18_Bonke abathe bawa phezu kweli litye, botyumka; ke bona elithe labawela, lobabetha bathi saa.
42_20_19_Baza ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali bafuna ukumsa izandla ngelo lixa; boyika abantu, kuba babesazi ukuba uwuthethe esingisele kubo lo mzekeliso.
42_20_20_Bamlalela, bathuma iintlola ezizenza amalungisa, ukuba zimbambise ngokuthetha, ukuze bamnikele elulawulweni nasegunyeni lerhuluneli.
42_20_21_Zambuza ke zisithi, Mfundisi, siyazi ukuba uthetha ufundise ngobulungisa, ungakhethi buso bamntu; usuka ufundise indlela kaThixo ngenene.
42_20_22_Kuvumelekile na ukuba simnike irhafu uKesare,  akuvumelekile, sini na?
42_20_23_Ebuqondile kakuhle ubuqhetseba bazo, wathi kuzo,  Nindilingelani na?
42_20_24_Ndiboniseni idenariyo. Inomfanekiso nombhalo kabani na?  Ziphendule ke zathi, KaKesare.
42_20_25_Uthe ke yena kuzo, Nikelani kaloku izinto zikaKesare kuKesare; nezinto zikaThixo kuThixo.
42_20_26_Zakhohlwa ukumbambisa ngamazwi phambi kwabantu,  zamangaliswa yimpendulo yakhe, zathi cwaka.
42_20_27_Kwafika ke kuye abathile bakubaSadusi, bona abo bakuphikayo ukuba kukho uvuko; bambuza,
42_20_28_besithi, Mfundisi, uMoses wasibhalela wathi, Ukuba ozalana nothile uthe wafa enomfazi, wafa ke lowo engenabantwana, maze ozalana naye amzeke umfazi lowo, amvelisele imbewu ozalana naye.
42_20_29_Ke bekukho abantu abasixhenxe bezalana; waza owokuqala wazeka umfazi, wafa engenabantwana.
42_20_30_Nowesibini wamzeka umfazi lowo, wafa naye engenabantwana.
42_20_31_Nowesithathu wamzeka; benjenjalo ke bosixhenxe, bafa bengashiyanga bantwana.
42_20_32_Emveni ke kwabo bonke, wafa naye umfazi lowo.
42_20_33_Eluvukweni ngoko, ungumfazi wawuphi na kubo? Kuba bosixhenxe bebenaye engumfazi.
42_20_34_Waphendula ke wathi kubo uYesu, Abeli phakade bayazeka,  bayendiswa;
42_20_35_ke bona abo kuthiwe bafanele ukufika kwelo phakade,  nakukuvuka kwabafileyo, abazeki, abendiswa;
42_20_36_kuba abasenakubuya bafe; kuba bengangezithunywa zezulu;  kanjalo bangoonyana bakaThixo, bengabovuko njalo.
42_20_37_Ke kaloku, le ndawo yokuba abafileyo bayavuka, noMoses wayithi thupha kwindawo ethetha ngetyholo, xenikweni athi,  INkosi inguThixo ka-Abraham, inguThixo kaIsake, inguThixo kaYakobi.
42_20_38_AkaThixo ke wabafileyo, ungowabaphilileyo; kuba bonke baphile ngaye.
42_20_39_Baphendula ke abathile bakubabhali, bathi, Mfundisi,  utyaphile ukutsho.
42_20_40_Baye ke bengasenabuganga bakumbuza nento le.
42_20_41_Wathi ke kubo, Batsho ngani na ukuthi, uKristu ungunyana kaDavide?
42_20_42_Kanti noDavide yena ngokwakhe uthi encwadini yeeNdumiso,  Yathi iNkosi eNkosini yam, Hlala ngasekunene kwam,
42_20_43_Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho.
42_20_44_UDavide ngoko umbiza ngokuthi, Nkosi; aze abe ke ngunyana wakhe ngani na?
42_20_45_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayeva bonke abantu, wathi kubafundi bakhe,
42_20_46_Balumkeleni ababhali, abathandayo ukuhamba ngeengubo ezinde, bathande imibuliso ezindaweni zembutho, nezihlalo zobukhulu ezindlwini zesikhungu, nezilili zobukhulu ezidlweni;
42_20_47_abadla izindlu zabahlolokazi, baze ngokunyhwalaza bathandaze uzungu. Abo baya kwamkela ugwebo olugqithiseleyo.
42_21_1_Ke kaloku akubheka, wazibona izityebi, ziphosa iminikelo yazo emkhumbini wokulondoloza imali.
42_21_2_Wabona ke mhlolokazi uthile ulihlwempu, ephosa apho iimalanana ezimbini.
42_21_3_Wathi, Inyaniso ndithi kuni, Lo mhlolokazi usweleyo uphose ngaphezu kwabo bonke;
42_21_4_kuba bonke aba baphose eminikelweni kaThixo, bethabatha kwintabalala yabo; ukanti lo, ekusweleni kwakhe, uphose yonke impilo abenayo.
42_21_5_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba abathile bayathetha ngayo itempile, ukuba ihonjiswe ngamatye amahle nangeminikelo, wathi,
42_21_6_Ezi zinto nizibona nje, kuya kufika imihla ekungayi kusala litye phezu kwelitye, elingayi kuchithwa.
42_21_7_Bambuza ke besithi, Mfundisi, ziya kubakho nini na ke ezi zinto? Uya kuba yintoni na nomqondiso, xa ngaba ezi zinto ziza kubakho?
42_21_8_Wathi ke yena, Lumkani ningalahlekiswa; kuba baninzi abaya kuza egameni lam, besithi, banguye uKristu; ewe, ixesha lisondele; ngoko musani ukubalandela.
42_21_9_Xa nithe neva iimfazwe neziphithiphithi, musani ukunkwantya; kuba ezo zinto zimele ukuthi zihle kuqala; sona ke isiphelo asiyi kuba kwaoko.
42_21_10_Wandula wathi kubo, Uhlanga luya kuvukelana nohlanga,  nobukumkani buvukelane nobukumkani.
42_21_11_Kuya kubakho iinyikima zomhlaba ezinkulu kwiindawo ngeendawo, neendlala, neendyikitya zokufa; kuya kubakho izinto ezoyikekayo, kwanemiqondiso emikhulu evela ezulwini.
42_21_12_Ngaphambili ke kwazo zonke ezo zinto, baya kunisa izandla,  banitshutshise, beninikela ezindlwini zesikhungu nasezintolongweni, nisiwe phambi kookumkani neerhuluneli ngenxa yegama lam.
42_21_13_Oko ke kuya kuthi kube bubungqina kuni.
42_21_14_Kumiseni ngoko ezintliziyweni zenu, ukuba ningakucingi ngaphambili ukuziphendulela.
42_21_15_Kuba mna ndiya kuninika umlomo nobulumko, abangayi kuba nako ukubuphikisa nokumelana nabo, bonke abanichasileyo.
42_21_16_Ke kaloku niya kunikelwa nangabazali, nangabazalwana,  nayimizalwane, nazizihlobo, kubekho nabababulalayo kuni;
42_21_17_nithiywe ngabantu bonke ngenxa yegama lam.
42_21_18_Akusayi kutshabalala nonwele olu entlokweni yenu.
42_21_19_Ekunyamezeleni kwenu, noyizuza imiphefumlo yenu.
42_21_20_Xa nithe nayibona iYerusalem irhawulwe yimikhosi, yazini oko ukuba kusondele ukuphanza kwayo.
42_21_21_Ngelo xa mabathi abakwelakwaYuda basabele ezintabeni, nabo baphakathi kwayo mabaphume bemke, nabo basemaphandleni mabangangeni kuyo.
42_21_22_Ngokuba yimihla yempindezelo leyo, ukuze kuzaliseke konke okubhaliweyo.
42_21_23_Yeha ke, abamithiyo nabanyisayo ngaloo mihla; kuba kuya kubakho ingxakeko enkulu phezu kwawo umhlaba, nengqumbo kwaba bantu;
42_21_24_bawe ngohlangothi lwekrele, bathinjwe, basiwe kuzo zonke iintlanga, neYerusalem inyathelelwe phantsi ziintlanga, ade azaliseke amaxesha eentlanga.
42_21_25_Kuya kubakho imiqondiso elangeni nasenyangeni nasezinkwenkwezini; nasemhlabeni kubekho ukuxinezeleka kweentlanga, zithingaza; lugquma ulwandle namaza;
42_21_26_abantu besifa kukoyika nakukulindela izinto ezilizelayo elimiweyo; kuba amandla ezulu aya kuzanyazanyiswa.
42_21_27_Baya kwandula ke ukumbona uNyana woMntu, esiza ngelifu,  enamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu.
42_21_28_Ke kaloku, zakubon ukuba ezi zinto ziyaqala ukuhla,  sukani nime, niziphakamise iintloko zenu, ngenxa yokuba iyasondela inkululeko yenu.
42_21_29_Wathetha umzekeliso kubo, wathi, Wukhangeleni umkhiwane nemithi yonke;
42_21_30_xa iselithe yavelisa amagqabi, niyabona nazi ngokwenu ukuba ihlobo selikufuphi.
42_21_31_Kwangokunjalo nani, xa nithe nazibona ezi zinto zisihla,  yazini ukuba bukufuphi ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_21_32_Inene ndithi kuni, Asiyi kukha sidlule esi sizukulwana,  zide zihle zonke ezi zinto.
42_21_33_Liya kudlula izulu nehlabathi; ke wona amazwi am akasayi kudlula.
42_21_34_Zilumkeleni ke, hleze zisindwe iintliziyo zenu kukuzingxala, nakukunxila, nangamaxhala obu bomi, ize loo mini inifikele ngebhaqo.
42_21_35_Kuba iya kubazela njengomgibe bonke abahleliyo phezu kwehlabathi lonke.
42_21_36_Phaphani ngoko, amaxesha onke nikhunga, ukuze kuthiwe nikufanele ukuzisaba zonke ezo zinto ziza kuhla, nokumiswa phambi koNyana woMntu.
42_21_37_Ke kaloku, emini ebefundisa etempileni; athi ngobusuku aphume, ayekulala entabeni ekuthiwa yeyemiNquma.
42_21_38_Bonke ke abantu babesiza kuye kwakusasa etempileni, ukuba beve ukuthetha kwakhe.
42_22_1_Ke kaloku, wawusondela umthendeleko wezonka ezingenagwele,  ekuthiwa yipasika.
42_22_2_Baye ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali befuna ukuba bangathini na ukumbulala, kuba bebesoyika abantu.
42_22_3_Wangena ke uSathana kuYuda, ogama limbi linguSikariyoti,  ongowenani labalishumi elinababini.
42_22_4_Wemka, waya wathetha nababingeleli abakhulu nabaphathi betempile, ukuba angathini na ukumnikela kubo.
42_22_5_Bavuya, banqophisana naye ukumnika imali,
42_22_6_wabavumela, wamana efuna ithuba elimlungeleyo lokumnikela kubo, kungekho siphendu.
42_22_7_Wafika ke umhla wezonka ezingenagwele, ekwakumele ukuthi ngawo kubingwe imvana yepasika.
42_22_8_Wesusa uPetros noYohane, wathi, Hambani niye kusilungisela ipasika, ukuze sidle.
42_22_9_Bathe ke bona kuye, Ufuna ukuba siyilungise phi na?
42_22_10_Uthe ke yena kubo, Yabonani, nakungena kuwo umzi lo,  nohlangatyezwa ngumntu ethwele umphanda wamanzi; mlandeleni,  niye endlwini angena kuyo.
42_22_11_Nothi kumninindlu, Uthi uMfundisi kuwe, Liphi na igumbi labahambi, apho ndingadlela khona ipasika nabafundi bam?
42_22_12_Kwayena wonibonisa igumbi eliphezulu elikhulu, landlelwe;  lungisani apho ke.
42_22_13_Bemka ke, bafumana kunjengoko ebetshilo kubo, bayilungisa ipasika.
42_22_14_Uthe ke lakufika ilixa, wahlala phantsi, nabapostile abalishumi elinababini kunye naye.
42_22_15_Wathi kubo, Asikuko nokuba ndinqwenile ukuyidla nani le pasika, ndingekabuva ubunzima.
42_22_16_Kuba ndithi kuni, Andiyi kubuya ndibe sadla kuyo, ide izaliseke ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
42_22_17_Wamkela indebe, wabulela, wathi, Yithabatheni, nabelane ngayo.
42_22_18_Kuba ndithi kuni, Andisayi kusela kwisiqhamo somdiliya,  bude bufike ubukumkani bukaThixo.
42_22_19_Wathabatha isonka, wathi akubulela waqhekeza, wabanika,  esithi, Ngumzimba wam lo, onikelwa ngenxa yenu; oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula.
42_22_20_Kwangokunjalo nayo indebe wayithabatha, kwakukhovwa ukudliwa, esithi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam,  eliphalalela nina.
42_22_21_Kodwa niyabona, isandla sondingcatshayo sinam etafileni apha.
42_22_22_UNyana woMntu okunene uyemka, njengoko kumisiweyo; kodwa ke, yeha, loo mntu angcatshwa nguye!
42_22_23_Baqala bona ukubuzana phakathi kwabo, ukuba ingaba ke nguwuphi na kubo, oza kuyenza le nto.
42_22_24_Ke kaloku kwabakho nokubangisana phakathi kwabo, kokuthi,  nguwuphi na kubo ekungathiwa ngomkhulu.
42_22_25_Uthe ke yena kubo, Ookumkani beentlanga bayazigagamela;  kwanabo benza ngegunya kuzo, kuthiwa ngabancedi.
42_22_26_Ke nina ze ningabi njalo: omkhulu kuni, makabe njengomnci;  nongumphathi makabe njengomlungiseleli.
42_22_27_Kuba nguwuphi na omkhulu: ngulowo uhleli esithebeni,  ngulowo ulungiselelayo, kusini na? Asingulowo uhleli esithebeni na? Ke mna phakathi kwenu ndinjengomlungiseleli.
42_22_28_Nina ke ningabo basoloko behleli nam ekulingweni kwam.
42_22_29_Nam ndinimisela ubukumkani, njengokuba uBawo endimisele mna,
42_22_30_ukuze nidle, nisele, esithebeni sam ebukumkanini bam,  nihlale ezitroneni, nigweba izizwe ezilishumi elinazibini zakwaSirayeli.
42_22_31_Ithe ke iNkosi, Simon, Simon, uyabona, uSathana ubenibanga, ukuba anele njengengqolowa.
42_22_32_Ke mna ndikhungile ngawe, ukuba ukholo lwakho lungapheli;  nawe ke, xa ubuye wabuya, uze ubazimase abazalwana bakho.
42_22_33_Wathi ke yena kuyo, Nkosi, sendikulungele ukuya nawe nasentolongweni, nasekufeni.
42_22_34_Ithe ke yona, Ndithi kuwe, Petros, ayisayi kulila namhlanje inkuku, ungekakhanyeli kathathu ukuba uyandazi.
42_22_35_Yathi kubo, Okuya ndanithuma ningenangxowa yamali,  nangxowa yamphako, nazimbadada, khe naswela nto na? Bathi ke bona, Nento le.
42_22_36_Ithe ke kubo, Kungokunje, lowo unengxowa yemali makayithabathe, enjenjalo nonengxowa yomphako; nalowo usweleyo,  makathengise ngengubo yakhe, athenge ikrele.
42_22_37_Kuba ndithi kuni, Oku kubhaliweyo kusamele ukufezeka kum,  khona oku: Wabalwa nabachasi-mthetho; kuba kananjalo izinto ezingam zinemfezeko.
42_22_38_Bathi ke bona, Nkosi, uyabona, nanga amakrele emabini.  Ithe ke yona kubo, Kwanele.
42_22_39_Uphumile ke, waya ngokwesiko lakhe eNtabeni yemiNquma,  bamlandela ke nabafundi bakhe.
42_22_40_Efikile ke kuloo ndawo, wathi kubo, Thandazani, ningangeni ekulingweni.
42_22_41_Waziqhiwula yena kubo umgama ongangokugibisela ilitye,  waguqa ngamadolo wathandaza,
42_22_42_esithi, Bawo, ukuba uyavuma, mayidlule le ndebe, kum;  kodwa makungabi kukuthanda kwam, makube kokwakho okwenzekayo.
42_22_43_Kwabonakala ke kuye isithunywa, sivela ezulwini,  simomeleza.
42_22_44_Uthe ke, eneminzunzu, kwaba kukhona athandaza enyamekile.  Kwathi ke ukubila kwakhe kwanga kungamathontsi amakhulu egazi,  esiwa emhlabeni.
42_22_45_Wavuka ekuthandazeni, weza kubafundi bakhe, wabafumana belele ngokuba buhlungu kwentliziyo.
42_22_46_Wathi kubo, Yini na ukuba nilale? Vukani, nithandaze,  ukuze ningangeni ekulingweni.
42_22_47_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba usathetha, kwathi gqi indimbane,  waye nalowo kuthiwa nguYuda, omnye weshumi elinababini, ehamba phambi kwabo; wasondela kuYesu eza kumanga.
42_22_48_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Yuda, umngcatsha uNyana woMntu ngokumanga na?
42_22_49_Ke kaloku abo babemphahlile, bakukubona okuza kuhla, bathi kuye, Nkosi, sixabele na ngekrele?
42_22_50_Omnye kubo abo wamxabela umkhonzi wombingeleli omkhulu,  wamnqamla indlebe yokunene.
42_22_51_Waphendula ke uYesu wathi, Yekani, kwanele. Wayichukumisa indlebe yakhe, wamphilisa.
42_22_52_Uthe ke uYesu kwabo babemfikele, ababingeleli abakhulu,  nabaphathi betempile, namadoda amakhulu, Niphume ninamakrele neentonga na, nanga nize esihangeni?
42_22_53_Bendinani imihla ngemihla etempileni, anolula zandla ngakum; kambe eli lilixa lenu, negunya lobumnyama.
42_22_54_Bambambile ke, bamrhola, bamsa endlwini yombingeleli omkhulu; waye ke uPetros elandela ekude.
42_22_55_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba babase umlilo phakathi kwentendelezo, behleli phantsi ndawonye, uthe wahlala uPetros phakathi kwabo.
42_22_56_Ke umkhonzazana othile umbonile ehleli ebandezini,  wamjonga wathi, Nalo ube enaye.
42_22_57_Wamkhanyela ke yena, esithi, Nkazanandini, andimazi.
42_22_58_Kwakuba mzuzwana, omnye wambona wathi, Nawe ungowabo.  Wathi ke uPetros, Mntundini, andinguye.
42_22_59_Kwakuba kuhambe ilixa ngathi linye, omnye uqinisele wathi,  Inyaniso, nalo ubenaye; kuba ukwangowaseGalili.
42_22_60_Uthe ke uPetros, Mntundini, andiyazi into oyithethayo.  Kuthe kwangoko, esathetha, yalila inkuku.
42_22_61_Yajika iNkosi, yondela kuPetros. Walikhumbula ke uPetros ilizwi leNkosi, njengoko ibithe kuye, Ingekalili inkuku, uya kundikhanyela kathathu.
42_22_62_Waza uPetros, ephume phandle, walila ngokukrakra.
42_22_63_Aye amadoda ambambileyo uYesu edlala ngaye, emtyakatya.
42_22_64_Athe akuba emgqubuthele, ambetha ebusweni, ambuza esithi,  Profeta; ngubani na lo ukubethileyo?
42_22_65_Aye emthethela nezinye izinto ezininzi, enyelisa.
42_22_66_Kuthe kwakusa, yahlanganisana intlanganiso yamadoda amakhulu abantu, nababingeleli abakhulu, kwanababhali,  bamrholela entlanganisweni yabo yamatyala, besithi,
42_22_67_Ukuba unguye uKristu wena, sixelele. Uthe ke yena kubo,  Ukuba ndithe ndanixelela, anisayi kukholwa;
42_22_68_nokuba ke ndithe ndanibuza, anisayi kundiphendula, anisayi kundikhulula.
42_22_69_Ethabathela kweli xa, uNyana woMntu uya kuba ehleli ekunene kwamandla kaThixo.
42_22_70_Bathi ke bonke, Unguye na ke wena uNyana kaThixo? Uthe ke yena kubo, Nani nithi ndinguye.
42_22_71_Bathi ke bona, Sisabufunelani na ubungqina, kuba thina ngokwethu sivile ngomlomo wakhe.
42_23_1_Yesuka yonke inkitha yabo, yamrholela kuPilato.
42_23_2_Baqala ke ukummangalela, besithi, Simfumene lo elulahlekisa uhlanga, engavumi ukuba kunikelwe irhafu kuKesare, esithi,  unguKristu uKumkani yena ngokwakhe.
42_23_3_UPilato wambuza ke, esithi, Unguye na uKumkani wamaYuda?  Umphendule ke yena wathi, Nawe utsho.
42_23_4_Uthe ke uPilato kubabingeleli abakhulu nakwizihlwele,  Andifumani tyala kulo mntu.
42_23_5_Kwaba kukhona ke bajokisayo, besithi, Uxhokonxa abantu,  efundisa kulo lonke elakwaYuda, eqalele kwelaseGalili, wada wezisa apha.
42_23_6_Ke kaloku uPilato, akuva elaseGalili, wabuza ukuba umntu lo ngowaseGalili na.
42_23_7_Wathi, akuqonda ukuba ngowasebukhosini bukaHerode,  wamthumela kuHerode, obe eseYerusalem naye ngaloo mihla.
42_23_8_Ke kaloku uHerode, akumbona uYesu, wavuya kunene; kuba bekumzuzu ethanda ukumbona, ngenxa yokuba ebeve kuthethwa izinto ezininzi ngaye; kanjalo wayethembe ukubona umqondiso usenziwa nguye.
42_23_9_Wayembuza ke amazwi amaninzi; ke yena akamphendulanga nento.
42_23_10_Bema ke ababingeleli abakhulu nababhali, bemmangalela kabukhali.
42_23_11_UHerode ke, kwanempi yakhe, wamenza into engento, wadlala ngaye, wamthi wambu ngengubo eqaqambileyo, wamthumela kuPilato.
42_23_12_Ngaloo mini baba zizihlobo ke uPilato noHerode; kuba ngenxa engaphambili babenobutshaba phakathi kwabo.
42_23_13_Ke kaloku uPilato, ebabizele ndawonye ababingeleli abakhulu, nabaphathi bamaYuda, nabantu,
42_23_14_wathi kubo, Nizise kum lo mntu, ngathi ngophambukisa abantu; niyabona ke, ndimncinile mna emehlweni enu, andafumana tyala kulo mntu, kwezo zinto nimmangalele ngazo;
42_23_15_kwanoHerode, kuba ndanithumela kuye. Nanku ke kungekho nto ifanelwe kukufa, yenziwe nguye.
42_23_16_Ndothi ke ngoko, ndakumbetha, ndimkhulule.
42_23_17_Ke kaloku, ubemelwe kukuthi abakhululele umbanjwa abe mnye, imithendeleko ngemithendeleko.
42_23_18_Bankqangaza ke ngokuphela kwabo, besithi, Msuse lo,  usikhululele uBharabhas,
42_23_19_owayethe, ngenxa yesaqunge esithile, esibe senziwe phakathi komzi, kwanokubulala, waphoswa entolongweni.
42_23_20_Waphinda ngoko uPilato wathetha nabo, efuna ukumkhulula uYesu.
42_23_21_Ke bona bamana benkqangaza, besithi, Bethelela emnqamlezweni; mbethelele emnqamlezweni.
42_23_22_Uthe ke yena okwesithathu kubo, Kuba enze bubi buni na lo?  Andifumananga tyala lakufa kuye; ndothi ngoko, ndakumbetha,  ndimkhulule.
42_23_23_Bamxina ke bona ngezandi ezikhulu zamazwi, becela ukuba abethelelwe emnqamlezweni; aza ke eyisa amazwi abo,  nawababingeleli abakhulu.
42_23_24_Usuke ke uPilato wagweba ngelithi, masenziwe isicelo sabo.
42_23_25_Wabakhululela ke owayethe ngenxa yesaqunge nokubulala waphoswa entolongweni, lowo babecela yena; wamnikela ekuthandeni kwabo uYesu.
42_23_26_Kuthe ke xa bamrholayo, babamba Simon uthile, waseKirene,  obevela emaphandleni; bawubeka phezu kwakhe umnqamlezo, ukuba awuthwale emva koYesu.
42_23_27_Wayelandelwa ke yinkitha eninzi yabantu, neyabafazi ababemmbambazelela, bemlilela.
42_23_28_Wabaguqukela ke uYesu, wathi, Zintombi zaseYerusalem,  musani ukundililela mna; kanye zilileleni nina, nabantwana benu;
42_23_29_ngokuba, yabonani, kuza imihla abaya kuthi ngayo, Banoyolo abaziindlolo, nezizalo ezingazalanga, namabele anganyisanga.
42_23_30_Oko baya kuqala bathi ezintabeni, Siweleni; nasezindulini,  Sigubungeleni.
42_23_31_Ngokuba ukuba benza ezi zinto komanzi umthi, kuya kuba njani na kowomileyo?
42_23_32_Ke kaloku baberhola nabanye abangabambi, bebabini,  bengabenzi bobubi, beya kubulawa kunye naye.
42_23_33_Bathi ke bakufika kwindawo le kuthiwa luKakayi,  bambethelela emnqamlezweni khona apho, kwanabenzi bobubi abo,  omnye ngasekunene, nomnye ngasekhohlo.
42_23_34_Wathi ke uYesu, Bawo, baxolele; kuba abayazi into abayenzayo. Bathi ke, besabelana ngeengubo zakhe, benza amaqashiso.
42_23_35_Baye bemi abantu bebonela. Babemsinekela ke nabaphathi bamaYuda kunye nabo, besithi, Wabasindisa abanye;  makazisindise, ukuba lo unguye uKristu, umnyulwa kaThixo.
42_23_36_Ayedlala ngaye ke namasoldati, esiza asondeze iviniga kuye,
42_23_37_esithi, Ukuba wena unguye uKumkani wamaYuda, zisindise.
42_23_38_Kwaye ke kubhalwe nombhalo ngaphezu kwakhe, ngamagama esiGrike, nawesiRoma, nawesiHebhere, kwathiwa, lo nguKumkani wamaYuda.
42_23_39_Ke kaloku, omnye wabenzi bobubi ababexhonyiwe wayemnyelisa, esithi, Ukuba wena unguye uKristu, zisindise,  nathi usisindise.
42_23_40_Waphendula ke omnye wamkhalimela, esithi, Akumoyiki na wena uThixo, ukwakoku kugwetywa nje?
42_23_41_Thina ke okunene sigwetywe ngobulungisa, kuba samkela okufanele esakwenzayo; kodwa yena lo akenzanga nto ingendawo.
42_23_42_Wathi kuYesu, Uze undikhumbule, Nkosi, xa uthe weza usebukumkanini bakho.
42_23_43_UYesu wathi kuye, Inene, ndithi kuwe, Namhlanje uya kuba nam eParadisi.
42_23_44_Ke kaloku, kwakumalunga nelixa lesithandathu, kwaza kwakho ubumnyama phezu kwawo umhlaba uphela, kwada kwaba lilixa lesithoba.
42_23_45_Lenziwa mnyama ilanga; isikhuselo sendawo eyingcwele sakrazuka phakathi.
42_23_46_Wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu uYesu, wathi, Bawo,  ndiyawunikela ezandleni zakho umoya wam. Uthe akuba etshilo,  waphuma umphefumlo.
42_23_47_Ke kaloku umthetheli-khulu, akukubona okuhlileyo, wazukisa uThixo, esithi, Inene, lo mntu ubelilungisa.
42_23_48_Zathi zonke izihlwele ezabe zibuthelene kuloo mbonelo,  zakukubona okuhlileyo, zabuya zibetha izifuba zazo.
42_23_49_Baye ke bonke abazana naye bemi kude, nabafazi ababelandelene naye, bevela kwelaseGalili, bezikhangela ezi zinto.
42_23_50_Kwaye ke kukho indoda egama linguYosefu, engumphakathi,  indoda elungileyo, elilungisa
42_23_51_(yona yayingavumelananga necebo labo, nesenzo sabo),  eyaseArimatiya, umzi wamaYuda, eyayibulindile nayo ubukumkani bukaThixo;
42_23_52_eyathi yona yeza kuPilato, yawucela umzimba kaYesu.
42_23_53_Yawuthula, yawusongela kwilinen entle; yawubeka engcwabeni elixholwe etyeni, ekungazanga kulale bani kulo.
42_23_54_Loo mhla wawungowokulungiselela, nesabatha ibisondele.
42_23_55_Ke kaloku nabafazi abalandelayo, abeza naye bephuma kwelaseGalili, balikhangela ingcwaba, nokubekwa komzimba wakhe.
42_23_56_Babuya ke, balungisa ubulawu namafutha aqholiweyo. Bathi ngesabatha baphumla ngokomthetho.
42_24_1_Ke kaloku, ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, ngesifingo sokusa,  beza engcwabeni, bephethe ubulawu ababebulungisile, kukho nabanye abafazi nabo.
42_24_2_Balifumana ke ilitye liqengqiwe, lesuka engcwabeni.
42_24_3_Bakuba bengenile, abawufumananga umzimba weNkosi uYesu.
42_24_4_Kwathi, ekukhohlweni kwabo yile nto, kwabonakala amadoda amabini, ebafikela, eneengubo ezibengezelayo.
42_24_5_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bangenelwe kukoyika, beqondele emhlabeni, athi kubo, Yini na ukuba ophilileyo nimfune phakathi kwabafileyo?
42_24_6_Akakho apha, uvukile; khumbulani ukuthetha kwakhe kuni, oko ebesekwelaseGalili,
42_24_7_esithi, UNyana woMntu umelwe kukuthi anikelwe ezandleni zabantu abangaboni, abethelelwe emnqamlezweni, athi ngomhla wesithathu abuye avuke.
42_24_8_Bawakhumbula ke amazwi akhe;
42_24_9_bebuyile engcwabeni, bazibika zonke ezo zinto kwabalishumi elinamnye, nakubo bonke abanye.
42_24_10_Baye ke bengooMariya waseMagadala, noYohana, noMariya kaYakobi, nabanye ababenabo, abazixelayo ezo zinto kubapostile.
42_24_11_Amazwi abo abonakala emehlweni abo engathi kukulavuza;  abakholwa ngabo.
42_24_12_Esukile ke uPetros, wagidima waya engcwabeni; athi eqondele, azibone iilinen abesongelwe kuzo, zilele zodwa;  wagoduka, emangalisiwe koko kuhlileyo.
42_24_13_Kwabonakala kusiya babini bakubo, kwangaloo mini, kumzana ozitadiya zimashumi mathandathu, umgama wawo neYerusalem, ogama liyiEmawusi.
42_24_14_Baye bona bexoxa bodwa ngazo zonke izinto ezibe zihlile.
42_24_15_Kwathi, ekuxoxeni kwabo, nasekubuzaneni kwabo, uYesu ngokwakhe wasondela wahamba nabo.
42_24_16_Kuloko amehlo abo ayebanjiwe, ukuba bangamazi.
42_24_17_Wathi ke kubo, Ziindawo zini na ezi nincokola ngazo,  nihamba nibe nithe matshamatsha?
42_24_18_Uphendule ke omnye, lo ugama linguKleyopa, wathi kuye,  Umhambi eYerusalem apha nguwe wedwa na, ukuba ungazazi nje izinto ezihle khona ngazo ezi mini?
42_24_19_Wathi kubo, Ziphi na? Bathi ke bona kuye, EzingoYesu waseNazarete, obeyindoda engumprofeti, enobunkunkqele ekwenzeni nasekuthetheni, phambi koThixo nabo bonke abantu;
42_24_20_ukuba bathini na ababingeleli abakhulu nabaphathi bethu ukumnikela ukuba agwetywe afe, bambethelela nasemnqamlezweni.
42_24_21_Ke kaloku, thina besithembe ukuba nguye oza kukhulula uSirayeli ngentlawulelo; kunjalonje ke, namhla lusuku lwesithathu zenzekile ezo zinto.
42_24_22_Kananjalo abafazi abathile bethu, ababesengcwabeni kwakusasa, babethe sathi nqa.
42_24_23_Bathe bengawufumani umzimba wakhe, beza besithi, babone nombono wezithunywa zezulu, ezithi zona, uhleli.
42_24_24_Basuka nabathile ababenathi, baya engcwabeni, bafika kunjengoko babetshilo abafazi; ke yena abambonanga.
42_24_25_Waza yena wathi kubo, Oyi! basweli-kuqonda, bantliziyo zizeka kade ukukholwa kuko konke abakuthethayo abaprofeti!
42_24_26_UKristu ubengamelwe na kukuthi abuve obu bunzima, aze angene eluzukweni lwakhe?
42_24_27_Uqalele ke kuMoses nakubo bonke abaprofeti, wabachazela kuzo zonke izibhalo iindawo ezingaye.
42_24_28_Basondela kuloo mzana babesiya kuwo; wanga yena uyegqitha.
42_24_29_Besuka bamzama, besithi, Hlala nathi; ngokuba kuza kuhlwa,  nemini iseyisangene. Wangena ukuba ahlale nabo.
42_24_30_Kwathi, ekungqengqeni kwakhe ngasesithebeni ndawonye nabo,  wasithabatha isonka, wasikelela, waqhekeza, wabanika.
42_24_31_Avulwa ke amehlo abo, bamazi; wathi shwaka yena kubo.
42_24_32_Batshono ukuthi, Intliziyo yethu ibingavuthi na ngaphakathi kwethu, xa ebethetha nathi endleleni, naxa ebesityhilela izibhalo?
42_24_33_Besuka kwangelo lixa, babuyela eYerusalem, babafumana abalishumi elinamnye, bequkene ndawonye nabo babenabo,
42_24_34_besithi, INkosi inene ivukile, yabonakala kuSimon.
42_24_35_Baye nabo bezichankcisa izinto zendlela, nokwazeka kwayo kubo ekuqhekezeni isonka.
42_24_36_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayazithetha ezo zinto, uYesu ngokwakhe wema phakathi kwabo, wathi kubo, Uxolo malube nani.
42_24_37_Besuka ke bankwantya, bangenelwa kukoyika, beba babone umshologu.
42_24_38_Wathi kubo, Yini na ukuba nikhathazeke? Kungani na ke ukuba kunyuke izicamango ezintliziyweni zenu?
42_24_39_Khangelani izandla zam neenyawo zam, ngokuba ndim kanye;  ndicofeni, nikhangele; ngokuba umshologu awunanyama namathambo,  njengokuba nindibona ndinawo mna.
42_24_40_Utshilo, wababonisa izandla neenyawo zakhe.
42_24_41_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba abakakholwa, ngenxa yovuyo,  bemangalisiwe, wathi kubo, Ninanto na idliwayo apha?
42_24_42_Bamnika ke intwana yentlanzi eyosiweyo, neyenqatha lobusi;
42_24_43_wathabatha, wadla emehlweni abo.
42_24_44_Uthe ke kubo, Ngawo la amazwi endawathethayo kuni ndisenani, okokuba zimelwe kukuzaliseka zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam emthethweni kaMoses, nasebaprofetini,  nasezindumisweni.
42_24_45_Wandula wayivula ingqiqo yabo, ukuze baziqonde izibhalo;
42_24_46_wathi kubo, Kubhaliwe ngokunjalo, umelwe ngokunjalo uKristu kukuthi eve ubunzima, abuye avuke kwabafileyo ngomhla wesithathu;
42_24_47_nokuba kuvakaliswe egameni lakhe inguquko noxolelo lwezono kuzo zonke iintlanga, kuqalelwa eYerusalem.
42_24_48_Nina ke ningamangqina ezi zinto.
42_24_49_Yabonani, mna ndilithumela kuni idinga likaBawo; ke nina hlalani kuwo umzi oyiYerusalem, nide nambathiswe amandla aphuma enyangweni.
42_24_50_Ke kaloku wabarholela ngaphandle, kwada kwaya eBhetani;  waziphakamisa izandla zakhe, wabasikelela.
42_24_51_Kwathi, ekubasikeleleni kwakhe, wahluka kubo, wenyuswa wasiwa emazulwini.
42_24_52_Baza bona, bakuba bequbudile kuye, babuyela eYerusalem benovuyo olukhulu.
42_24_53_Bamana behleli etempileni, bedumisa, bebonga uThixo. Amen.
43_1_1_Ekuqalekeni ube ekho uLizwi, waye uLizwi ekuye uThixo, waye uLizwi enguThixo.
43_1_2_Yena lowo ebekho ekuqalekeni kuThixo.
43_1_3_Izinto zonke zabakho ngaye; engekho yena, akubangakho nanye into ethe yabakho.
43_1_4_Kuye kwakukho ubomi, baye ubomi obo bulukhanyiselo lwabantu.
43_1_5_Ukhanyiso ke olo lwabonakala ebumnyameni, basuka ubumnyama abaluqiqa.
43_1_6_Kwakho mntu uthunyiweyo evela kuThixo, ugama linguYohane.
43_1_7_Lowo weza kuba lingqina, ukuze angqine ngalo ukhanyiso,  ukuze bonke bakholwe ngaye.
43_1_8_Yena lowo ubengelulo ukhanyiso; weza kungqina ngalo ukhanyiso.
43_1_9_Waye ke yena elukhanyiso oluyinyaniso, olubakhanyiselayo abantu bonke, esiza ehlabathini.
43_1_10_Ube esehlabathini ke; ihlabathi labakho ngaye, ihlabathi alimazanga.
43_1_11_Weza kokwakhe, baza abakhe abamvuma.
43_1_12_Ke bonke abamamkelayo wabanika igunya lokuba babe ngabantwana bakaThixo, abo ke bakholwayo kwigama lakhe;
43_1_13_abangazalwanga ngagazi, nangakuthanda kwanyama,  nangakuthanda kwandoda; bazalwa nguThixo.
43_1_14_ULizwi waba yinyama, wahlala phakathi kwethu, sabubona ubuqaqawuli bakhe, ubuqaqawuli kanye bowokuphela kwamzeleyo uYise, ezele lubabalo nayinyaniso.
43_1_15_Uthi uYohane angqine ngaye, adanduluke esithi, Ubenguye lo bendithetha yena, ndisithi, Lowo uzayo emva kwam, usuke waba phambi kwam, ngokuba waye etanci kum.
43_1_16_Enzalisekweni yakhe thina sonke samkela kwaubabalo phezu kobabalo.
43_1_17_Ngokuba umthetho wawiswa ngoMoses, lwabakho lona ubabalo nenyaniso ngoYesu Kristu.
43_1_18_Akukho namnye wakha wambona uThixo; uNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo, lowo usesifubeni sikaYise, nguye ocacise oko.
43_1_19_Nabu ke ubungqina bukaYohane, oko amaYuda athuma ababingeleli nabaLevi, bephuma eYerusalem, ukuze bambuze besithi, Wena ungubani na?
43_1_20_Wavuma akakhanyela, wavuma esithi, Andinguye mna uKristu.
43_1_21_Bambuza, besithi, Untoni na ke? UnguEliya na? Athi,  Andinguye. Unguye na umprofeti lowo? Wathi ukuphendula, Hayi.
43_1_22_Bathi ngoko kuye, Ungubani na ke? ukuze sibaphendule abo basithumileyo. Uthini na wena ngawe ngokwakho?
43_1_23_Wathi, Mna ndililizwi lodandulukayo entlango, lisithi,  Yityenenezeni indlela yeNkosi, njengoko watshoyo uIsaya umprofeti.
43_1_24_Baye abo babethunyiwe bengabakubo abaFarisi.
43_1_25_Bambuza bathi kuye, Ubhaptizelani na phofu, ukuba wena akunguye uKristu, noEliya, nomprofeti lowo?
43_1_26_Wabaphendula uYohane, esithi, Mna ndibhaptiza ngamanzi; ke phakathi kwenu kumi eningamaziyo nina.
43_1_27_Yena ngothe, esiza emva kwam nje, wesuka waba phambi kwam,  endingafanelekileyo mna ukuba ndinyobulule umtya wembadada yakhe.
43_1_28_Ezi zinto zenzeka eBhetabhara, phesheya kweYordan, apho uYohane wayebhaptiza khona.
43_1_29_Ngengomso uYohane umbona uYesu esiza kuye, athi, Nantso iMvana kaThixo, ethwala isuse isono sehlabathi.
43_1_30_Nguye lo ndathi ngaye mna, Emva kwam kuza indoda, esuke yaba phambi, kwam; ngokuba yayitanci kum.
43_1_31_Bendingayazi nam; le nto ndeza mna, ndibhaptiza ngamanzi,  kukuze ibonakalaliswe kuSirayeli.
43_1_32_Wangqina uYohane, esithi, Ndimbonile uMoya, esihla njengehobe, ephuma ezulwini, wahlala phezu kwakhe.
43_1_33_Bendingamazi nam; owandithumayo ukubhaptiza ngamanzi, nguye owathi kum, Othe wambona uMoya esihla ahlale phezu kwakhe,  nguye lowo ubhaptiza ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
43_1_34_Nam ndibonile, ndingqinile, ukuba lo nguye uNyana kaThixo.
43_1_35_Ngengomso ubuye wema uYohane nababini kubafundi bakhe;
43_1_36_ondele kuYesu ehamba, uthi, Nantso iMvana kaThixo.
43_1_37_Bamva ethetha abafundi ababini, bamlandela uYesu.
43_1_38_Ke kaloku ujikile uYesu, ababone belandela, athi kubo,  Nifuna ntoni na? Bathi ke bona kuye, Rabhi (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, mfundisi), uhlala phi na?
43_1_39_Athi kubo, Yizani nibone. Beza, babona ke apho ahlala khona; bahlala naye loo mini; laye ke ilixa lingathi leleshumi.
43_1_40_YayinguAndreya, umzalwana kaSimon Petros, omnye wabo babini, babeve kuYohane, bamlandela.
43_1_41_Yena ufumana kuqala owakhe umzalwana, uSimon, athi kuye,  Simfumene uMesiya (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, uKristu).
43_1_42_Wamsa kuYesu; uthe ke uYesu wondela kuye, wathi, Wena unguSimon, unyana kaYona; kuya kuthiwa unguKefas (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, unguPetros).
43_1_43_Ngengomso uYesu wafuna ukuphuma aye kwelaseGalili; ufumana uFilipu, athi kuye, Ndilandele.
43_1_44_Ke kaloku uFilipu ebengowaseBhetesayida, womzi wakuloAndreya noPetros.
43_1_45_UFilipu ufumana uNataniyeli, athi kuye, Lowo uMoses wabhala ngaye emthethweni, kwanabaprofeti, simfumene, uYesu unyana kaYosefu, lowo waseNazarete.
43_1_46_Wathi uNataniyeli kuye, Inako na into elungileyo ukuphuma eNazarete? Athi uFilipu kuye, Yiza ubone.
43_1_47_UYesu wambona uNataniyeli esiza kuye, athi ngaye, Nanko umSirayeli inyaniso, ekungekho nkohliso kuye.
43_1_48_Athi uNataniyeli kuye, Undazi ngani na? Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Phambi kokuba uFilipu akubize, uphantsi komkhiwane,  ndandikubona.
43_1_49_Aphendule uNataniyeli athi kuye, Rabhi, wena unguye uNyana kaThixo, wena unguye uKumkani kaSirayeli.
43_1_50_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Ngokuba ndithe kuwe,  Ndandikubona uphantsi komkhiwane, uyakholwa na? Uya kubona izinto ezingaphezulu kwezo.
43_1_51_Athi kuye, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Emveni koku niya kulibona izulu livulekile, nezithunywa zikaThixo zinyuka zisihla phezu koNyana woMntu.
43_2_1_Kuthe ngomhla wesithathu, kwabakho umsitho eKana yelaseGalili; waye unina kaYesu ekhona.
43_2_2_Wamenyelwa ke noYesu kwanabafundi bakhe emsithweni lowo.
43_2_3_Kuthe ke, bakuphelelwa yiwayini, wathi unina kaYesu kuye,  Abanawayini.
43_2_4_Uthi uYesu kuye, Yintoni na enam nawe, mfazi? Alikafiki ilixa lam.
43_2_5_Athi unina kubalungiseleli, Asukuba ekuthetha kuni,  kwenzeni.
43_2_6_Kwakumi khona ke imiphanda yamatye imithandathu,  ngokwentlambululo yamaYuda, engena ngaminye iibhate ezimbini nantathu.
43_2_7_Athi kubo uYesu, Yizaliseni imiphanda ngamanzi. Bayizalisa ke, yada yee cike.
43_2_8_Athi kubo, Yikhani ngoku, nise kwinjoli. Besa ke.
43_2_9_Ke kaloku, yakuweva injoli amanzi abenziwe iwayini (yayingayazi apho ivela khona; kodwa abalungiseleli ababewakhile amanzi babesazi), yasuka injoli yabiza umyeni.
43_2_10_Yathi kuye, Wonke umntu ubeka kuqala iwayini emnandi, aze xa bathe basela bakholisa, andule ukubeka enganeno kwaleyo;  wena uyibandezile iwayini emnandi, kwada kwangoku.
43_2_11_Oku kuqaleka kwemiqondiso wakwenza uYesu eKana yelaseGalili, walubonakalalisa Uzuko lwakhe; bakholwa kuye abafundi bakhe.
43_2_12_Emveni koko wehla waya eKapernahum, yena nonina,  nabazalwana bakhe, nabafundi bakhe; bahlala khona iintsuku ezingeninzi.
43_2_13_Yayikufuphi ke ipasika yamaYuda; wenyuka uYesu waya eYerusalem.
43_2_14_Wabafumana etempileni ababethengisa ngeenkomo nezimvu namahobe, nabananisa ngemali behleli.
43_2_15_Wenza iziniya ngemizi, wabakhupha bonke etempileni,  kwanezimvu neenkomo; wayiphalaza imali yabananisi, wazibhukuqa neetafile;
43_2_16_wathi nakwabo bathengisa ngamahobe, Ezi zinto zisuseni apha; musani ukuyenza indlu kaBawo indlu yokuthengisela.
43_2_17_Bakhumbula ke abafundi bakhe, ukuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,  Ukuzondelela indlu yakho kundidlile kanye.
43_2_18_Aphendula ke ngoko amaYuda, athi kuye, Usibonisa mqondiso mni na, uzenza nje ezi zinto?
43_2_19_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Yichitheni le tempile, mna ke ndiya kuyivusa ngeentsuku ezintathu.
43_2_20_Athi ke ngoko amaYuda, Yayiminyaka imashumi mane anesithandathu nje isakhiwa le tempile, ke wena woyivusa ngeentsuku ezintathu na?
43_2_21_Yena ke wayethetha ngetempile yomzimba wakhe.
43_2_22_Ke ngoko, xenikweni wavukayo kwabafileyo, bakhumbula abafundi bakhe, ukuba ebekuthethile oku kubo, bakholwa sisibhalo nalilizwi awalithethayo uYesu.
43_2_23_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba useYerusalem epasikeni,  emthendelekweni, into eninzi yakholwa kulo igama lakhe, ibona imiqondiso yakhe abeyenza.
43_2_24_Ke yena uYesu akaziyekelanga kubo, ngenxa yokuba ebazi bonke;
43_2_25_nangokuba bekungafuneki kuye, ukuba kungqine bani ngaye umntu, kuba ubekwazi yena okungaphakathi komntu.
43_3_1_Kwaye kukho ke umntu wakubaFarisi, ogama linguNikodemo,  umphathi wamaYuda.
43_3_2_Lowo weza kuYesu ebusuku, wathi kuye, Rabhi, siyazi ukuba ungumfundisi ovela kuThixo; kuba akukho namnye unako ukuyenza le miqondiso uyenzayo wena, ukuba uThixo akanaye.
43_3_3_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe,  Ukuba akathanga umntu azalwe ngokutsha, akanakububona ubukumkani bukaThixo.
43_3_4_Uthi uNikodemo kuye, Angathini na umntu ukuzalwa emdala?  Angaba nako yini na ukungena okwesibini esizalweni sonina azalwe?
43_3_5_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ukuba umntu akathanga azalwe ngamanzi nanguMoya, akanakungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
43_3_6_Okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, nokuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya.
43_3_7_Musa ukumangaliswa kukuba ndithe kuwe, Nimelwe kukuthi nizalwe ngokutsha.
43_3_8_Umoya uphepheza apho uthanda khona, uze usive isandi sawo,  kodwa ungawazi apho uvela khona, nalapho usinga khona:  bakwanjalo bonke abazelwe nguMoya.
43_3_9_Waphendula uNikodemo wathi kuye, Zingathini na ezi zinto ukuba nokubakho?
43_3_10_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Wena, ungumfundisi nje wakwaSirayeli, akuzazi na ezi zinto?
43_3_11_Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Sithetha esikwaziyo, singqine esikubonileyo; nisuke ningabamkeli ubungqina bethu.
43_3_12_Ukuba ndinixelele izinto ezisemhlabeni, naza anakholwa,  nothini na ukukholwa, ukuba ndithe ndanixelela izinto ezisemazulwini?
43_3_13_Akukho namnye unyukileyo waya emazulwini, ngulowo yedwa wehla ephuma emazulwini, uNyana woMntu, lowo usemazulwini.
43_3_14_Njengokuba ke uMoses wayiphakamisayo inyoka entlango,  umelwe kukuphakanyiswa ngokunjalo uNyana woMntu;
43_3_15_ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade.
43_3_16_Kuba wenjenje uThixo ukulithanda kwakhe ihlabathi, ude wancama uNyana wakhe okuphela kwamzeleyo, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kuye bangatshabalali, koko babe nobomi obungunaphakade.
43_3_17_Kuba uThixo akamthumanga uNyana wakhe ehlabathini, ukuze aligwebe ihlabathi; wamthuma ukuze ihlabathi lisindiswe ngaye.
43_3_18_Lowo ukholwayo kuye, akagwetywa; ke lowo ungakholwayo,  uselegwetyiwe, ngokuba engakholwanga kwigana loNyana okuphela kwamzeleyo uThixo.
43_3_19_Ke kaloku, umgwebo nguwo lo, ukuba ukhanyiso lufikile ehlabathini, baza abantu bathanda ubumnyama ngaphezu kokhanyiso; kuba imisebenzi yabo ingendawo.
43_3_20_Kuba bonke abenza okubi, bayaluthiya ukhanyiso, bangezi elukhanyisweni, ukuze imisebenzi yabo ingohlwaywa.
43_3_21_Ke lowo uyenzayo inyaniso uyeza elukhanyisweni, ukuze imisebenzi yakhe ibonakalaliswe; ngokuba isetyenzelwe kuThixo.
43_3_22_Emveni kwezi zinto, weza uYesu nabafundi bakhe emhlabeni wakwaYuda; wakha walibala khona apho nabo; wabhaptiza.
43_3_23_Waye ke noYohane ebhaptiza e-Enon, kufuphi neSalem, ngokuba amanzi abemaninzi khona apho; babesiza ke babhaptizwe.
43_3_24_Kuba ebengekaphoswa entolongweni uYohane.
43_3_25_Kwabakho ke imbuzwano kubafundi bakaYohane namaYuda ngokuhlanjululwa.
43_3_26_Beza kuYohane, bathi kuye, Rabhi, lowa wayenawe phesheya kweYordan, umngqinela, yabona, yena uyabhaptiza; beza kuye ke bonke.
43_3_27_Waphendula uYohane wathi, Akanakwamkela nto umntu,  engayinikwanga ivela emazulwini.
43_3_28_Nani ngokwenu niyandingqinela ukuba ndathi, Andinguye uKristu mna; ndathi, Ndithunyiwe phambi kwakhe.
43_3_29_Lowo unomtshakazi ngumyeni; isihlobo ke somyeni, esimiyo simve, sivuya kunene ngenxa yezwi lomyeni; ngoko olu luvuyo lwam luzalisekile.
43_3_30_Yena umelwe kukuthi ande, ndinciphe ke mna.
43_3_31_Lowo uvela phezulu ungaphezu kwabo bonke; lowo uphuma emhlabeni ungowasemhlabeni, ethetha okwasemhlabeni. Lowo ungowasemazulwini ungaphezu kwabo bonke;
43_3_32_akubonileyo ke wakuva, uyakungqina oko; akukho bani ubamkelayo ubungqina bakhe.
43_3_33_Lowo ubamkeleyo ubungqina bakhe, utywine waqinisela ukuthi,  uThixo uyinyaniso;
43_3_34_kuba lowo uthunywe nguThixo, uthetha amazwi kaThixo; kuba uThixo akamniki uMoya ngomlinganiselo.
43_3_35_UYise uyamthanda uNyana; uzinikele zonke izinto esandleni sakhe.
43_3_36_Lowo ukholwayo kuNyana, unobomi obungunaphakade; ke lowo ungamviyo uNyana, akayi kubona bomi; ingqumbo kaThixo ihleli phezu kwakhe.
43_4_1_Ithe ngoko iNkosi, yakwazi ukuba abaFarisi bavile ukuba uYesu ugqithisile kuYohane ngokwenza nokubhaptiza abafundi
43_4_2_(nakubeni ke uYesu ngokwakhe ebengabhaptizi, bekubhaptiza abafundi bakhe),
43_4_3_yalishiya yona elakwaYuda, yabuya yaya kwelaseGalili.
43_4_4_Ibimelwe ke kukuthi icande kwela maSamariya.
43_4_5_Ifike ke emzini welamaSamariya ekuthiwa yiSikare, kufuphi nomhlaba awathi uYakobi wawunika uYosefu unyana wakhe.
43_4_6_Ke kaloku umthombo kaYakobi ubukhona. Uthe ke ngoko uYesu,  ebulalekile kukuhamba, wahlala enjalo phezu komthombo; ilixa ngathi belilelesithandathu.
43_4_7_Kufika intokazi yelamaSamariya, isiza kukha amanzi, athi uYesu kuyo, Ndiphe ndisele.
43_4_8_(Kuba abafundi bakhe bebemke baya kuthenga ukudla emzini apho.)
43_4_9_Ithi ngoko intokazi engumSamariyakazi kuye, Uthini na wena,  ungumYuda nje, ukucela kum into eselwayo, ndingumSamariyakazi nje? Kuba akanabudlelane amaYuda namaSamariya.
43_4_10_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuyo, Ukuba ubusazi isipho sikaThixo, nokuba ngubani na lo uthi kuwe, Ndiphe ndisele: unge ucele kuye wena, wakupha amanzi aphilileyo.
43_4_11_Ithi intokazi kuye, Nkosi, akunanto yakukha, nequla linzulu; uwazuza phi na ke amanzi aphilileyo lawo?
43_4_12_Wena umkhulu yini na kunobawo wethu uYakobi, owasinikayo iqula eli, wayesela kulo yena, nabantwana bakhe, nemfuyo yakhe?
43_4_13_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuyo, Bonke abasela kula manzi, baya kubuya banxanwe;
43_4_14_ke yena othe wasela kuwo amanzi, endiya kumpha wona mna,  akasayi kuza anxanwe naphakade; aya kusuka amanzi, endiya kumpha wona, abe ngumthombo kuye wamanzi ampompozela ebomini obungunaphakade.
43_4_15_Ithi intokazi kuye, Nkosi, ndiphe loo manzi, ukuze ndinganxanwa, ndingezi nokuza kukha apha.
43_4_16_Athi uYesu kuyo, Hamba uye kubiza indoda yakho, uze apha.
43_4_17_Yaphendula intokazi yathi, Andinandoda. Athi uYesu kuyo,  Ulungisile ukuthi, Andinandoda;
43_4_18_kuba ubunamadoda amahlanu; onayo ngoku asindoda yakho,  unyanisile ukutsho.
43_4_19_Ithi intokazi kuye, Nkosi, ndiyabona ukuba ungumprofeti wena.
43_4_20_Oobawo bethu babenqula kule ntaba; nina ke nithi iseYerusalem indawo apho abantu bamelwe kukunqula khona.
43_4_21_Athi uYesu kuyo, Ntokazindini, kholwa ndim, ukuba kuza ilixa, eningasayi kuthi nakule ntaba, naseYerusalem, nimnqule uBawo.
