43_4_22_Nina ninqula eningakwaziyo; thina sinqula esikwaziyo;  ngokuba usindiso luphuma kumaYuda.
43_4_23_Kodwa kuza ilixa, nangoku selikho, xa abanquli abayinyaniso baya kumnqula uBawo ngoMoya nangenyaniso; kuba uBawo ufuna abanjalo ukumnqula.
43_4_24_UThixo unguMoya; abo ke bamnqulayo bamelwe kukumnqula ngoMoya nangenyaniso.
43_4_25_Ithi intokazi kuye, Ndiyazi ukuba uMesiya uyeza, ekuthiwa nguKristu; xa athe weza yena, uya kusityela izinto zonke.
43_4_26_Athi uYesu kuyo, Mna ndithethayo nawe ndinguye.
43_4_27_Kwathi kwangoko bafika abafundi bakhe, bamangaliswa kukuba athethe nomntu oyinkazana; noko ke akubangakho namnye owathi.  Ufuna ntoni na? nowathi, Yini na ukuba uthethe nayo?
43_4_28_Yawushiya ngoko umphanda wayo intokazi, yemka yaya ekhaya;  ithi ebantwini,
43_4_29_Yizani, nibone umntu ondixelele izinto zonke endakha ndazenza; lo akangebi nguye uKristu yini na?
43_4_30_Baphuma ke ekhaya, baye besiza kuye.
43_4_31_Ke kaloku, kweso sithuba abafundi babemthandaza, besithi,  Rabhi, yidla.
43_4_32_Uthe ke yena kubo, Mna ndinokudla endikudlayo,  eningakwaziyo nina.
43_4_33_Babethetha bodwa ngoko abafundi, besithi, Ingaba kukho omziseleyo na ukudla?
43_4_34_Athi uYesu kubo, Okwam ukudla kukuba ndenze ukuthanda kowandithumayo, ndiwufeze umsebenzi wakhe.
43_4_35_Anitsho na nina ukuthi, Iinyanga zisene, kuze kufike ukuvuna? Yabonani, ndithi kuni, Waphakamiseni amehlo enu,  niwakhangele amasimi; ngokuba aselemhlophe ukuba kuvunwe.
43_4_36_Novunayo wamkela umvuzo, abuthele iziqhamo ebomini obungunaphakade, ukuze nalowo uhlwayelayo avuye, kunye nalowo uvunayo.
43_4_37_Kuba likule nto ilizwi eliyinyaniso, eli lithi, Omnye uyahlwayela, nomnye avune.
43_4_38_Mna ndanithuma ukuvuna oko ningabulalekanga kuko nina;  abanye babulalekile, naza nangena nina ekubulalekeni kwabo.
43_4_39_Ke kaloku, kwakholwa kuye into eninzi yamaSamariya kuloo mzi, ngenxa yelizwi lentokazi leyo, yangqinayo yathi, Undityele izinto zonke endakha ndazenza.
43_4_40_Akufika ngoko kuye amaSamariya, amcela ukuba ahlale nawo;  wahlala khona ke imihla emibini.
43_4_41_Into eninzi yakholwa ngakumbi ngenxa yelizwi lakhe.
43_4_42_Kanjalo babesithi kwintokazi leyo, Asisakholwa ngenxa yokuthetha kwakho, kuba sizivele thina ngokwethu, sazi ukuba,  inyaniso, lo unguye uMsindisi wehlabathi, uKristu.
43_4_43_Ke kaloku, emveni kwemihla emibini leyo, waphuma khona,  wemka waya kwelaseGalili.
43_4_44_Kuba uYesu ngokwakhe wangqina, ukuba umprofeti akanambeko kowabo.
43_4_45_Xenikweni ngoko wafikayo kwelaseGalili, bamamkela abaseGalili ababezibonile zonke izinto awazenzayo eYerusalem emthendelekweni; kuba babeyile nabo emthendelekweni.
43_4_46_Wabuya ngoko weza uYesu eKana yelaseGalili, apho amanzi ebewenze iwayini. Kwaye kukho igosa lakomkhulu elithile,  elinyana wayesifa eKapernahum.
43_4_47_Lithe lakuva lona ukuba uYesu uphumile kwaYuda, wafika kwelaseGalili, laya kuye, lamcela ukuba ehle amphilise unyana walo, kuba ebeza kubhubha.
43_4_48_Wathi ngoko uYesu kulo, Ukuba anithanga nibone imiqondiso nemimangaliso, anisayi kukha nikholwe.
43_4_49_Lithi kuye igosa lakomkhulu, Nkosi, yihla, engekabhubhi umntwana wam.
43_4_50_Athi uYesu kulo, Hamba uhambe; unyana wakho uhleli.  Wakholwa umntu lowo lilizwi awalithethayo uYesu kuye, wahamba ke.
43_4_51_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uselesihla, izicaka zakhe zamhlangabeza, zambikela zisithi, Umntwana wakho uhleli.
43_4_52_Wabuza ngoko kuzo ilixa aqale ukuchacha ngalo; zathi kuye,  Izolo, ngelixa lesixhenxe, yamyeka icesina.
43_4_53_Wazi ngoko uyise, ukuba bekukwangelo lixa abethe ngalo uYesu kuye, Unyana wakho uhleli; wakholwa, yena nendlu yakhe iphela.
43_4_54_Lo mqondiso ke wesibini wawenza uYesu, eselephumile kwelakwaYuda, weza kwelaseGalili.
43_5_1_Emveni kwezi zinto, kwaye kukho umthendeleko wamaYuda,  wenyuka uYesu waya eYerusalem.
43_5_2_Ke kaloku kukho eYerusalem apho, ngakwelezimvu isango,  ichibi, ekuthiwa ukubizwa yiBhetesda ngesiHebhere, lineevaranda ezintlanu.
43_5_3_Kwakulele kuzo inkitha eninzi yemilwelwe: iimfama,  iziqhwala, abome umzimba, belinde ukuzanyazanyiswa kwamanzi.
43_5_4_Kuba isithunywa sezulu ngaxesha lithile besisihla, singene echibini, siwagxobhagxobhe amanzi; lowo ngoko ubethe angene tanci emva kokugxojwagxojwa kwamanzi, ubephila nakusiphi na isifo abebanjwe siso.
43_5_5_Ke kaloku, bekukho mntu uthile apho, ubeminyaka imashumi mathathu anesibhozo engumlwelwe.
43_5_6_UYesu embona lowo elele, esazi ukuba uselenexesha elikhulu enjalo, uthi kuye, Uyafuna na ukuba uphile?
43_5_7_Waphendula umlwelwe wathi, Nkosi, andinamntu wokuthi, xa athe agxojwagxojwa amanzi, andiphose echibini. Kuthi ke,  ndakubon ukuba mna ndiyaya, ndiphangelwe ngomnye ukuhla.
43_5_8_Athi uYesu kuye, Vuka, uthabathe ukhuko lwakho, uhambe.
43_5_9_Usuke kwaoko waphila umntu, waluthabatha ukhuko lwakhe,  wahamba. Ke kaloku kwakuyisabatha loo mini.
43_5_10_Ayesithi ke amaYuda kophilisiweyo, Yisabatha; akuvumelekile ukuba uthwale ukhuko lwakho.
43_5_11_Wawaphendula wathi, Owandiphilisayo, nguye owathi kum,  Thabatha ukhuko lwakho, uhambe.
43_5_12_Ambuza ngoko athi, Ngubani na yena loo mntu uthe kuwe,  Thabatha ukhuko lwakho, uhambe?
43_5_13_Ke kaloku, owaphiliswayo ebengazi ukuba ngubani na; kuba uYesu wathi shwaka, kwakubon ukuba kukho izihlwele kuloo ndawo.
43_5_14_Emveni kwezi zinto, uYesu umfumana etempileni, athi kuye,  Uyabona, uphilile; musa ukuba sona, ukuze ungahlelwa yinto embi kunaleyo.
43_5_15_Wemka umntu lowo, waxela kumaYuda, ukuba nguYesu omenze waphila.
43_5_16_Ngenxa yoko ayemtshutshisa uYesu amaYuda, afuna ukumbulala;  ngokuba wayesenza ezo zinto ngesabatha.
43_5_17_Wawaphendula ke uYesu wathi, UBawo uyasebenza kude kube ngoku, nam ndiyasebenza.
43_5_18_Ngenxa yoko ke ayefuna ngakumbi amaYuda ukumbulala; ngokuba ubengaphule sabatha yodwa, wayetshilo nokuthi, uThixo ngowakhe uYise, ezenza alingane noThixo.
43_5_19_Waphendula ngoko uYesu, wathi kuwo, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, UNyana akanakwenza nto ngokwakhe, engathanga abone uYise eyenza; kuba izinto asukuba ezenza yena, ezo uyazenza uNyana kwangokunjalo;
43_5_20_kuba uYise uyamthanda uNyana, ambonise izinto zonke azenzayo yena; uya kumbonisa nemisebenzi emikhulu kunale, ukuze nina nimangaliswe.
43_5_21_Kuba, njengoko uYise abavusayo abafileyo, abadlise ubomi,  kwangokunjalo noNyana ubadlisa ubomi abo athandayo.
43_5_22_Kuba kananjalo uYise akagwebi namnye; uthe umgwebo wonke wawunikela kuNyana;
43_5_23_ukuze bonke bambeke uNyana, kwanjengoko bambekayo uYise.  Lowo ungambekiyo uNyana, akambeki uYise owamthumayo.
43_5_24_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Lowo ulivayo ilizwi lam, akholwe ngulowo wandithumayo, unobomi obungunaphakade; akezi ekugwetyweni; uphume ekufeni, wangena ebomini.
43_5_25_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Kuza ilixa, nangoku liselikho,  xa abafileyo baya kuliva izwi loNyana kaThixo, bathi abalivileyo badle ubomi.
43_5_26_Kuba njengokuba uYise enabo ubomi kuye ngokwakhe,  ngokunjalo wamnika noNyana ukuba abe nobomi kuye ngokwakhe.
43_5_27_Wamnika negunya lokugweba; ngokuba enguNyana woMntu.
43_5_28_Musani ukumangaliswa kuko oko; ngokuba kuza ilixa abaya kuthi ngalo bonke abasemangcwabeni balive ilizwi lakhe;
43_5_29_baphume ke: abo benza izinto ezilungileyo beze eluvukweni lobomi; nabo ke benza izinto ezimbi, beze eluvukweni lokugwetywa.
43_5_30_Mna ngokwam andinakwenza nto; njengoko ndivayo, ndigweba ngako, nomgwebo wam ububulungisa; ngokuba andifuni kuthanda kwam, ndifuna ukuthanda kukaBawo owandithumayo.
43_5_31_Ukuba mna ndisuka ndizingqinele, ubungqina bam abungebi yiyo inene.
43_5_32_Kukho omnye ongqinayo ngam; ndiyazi ke, ukuba buyinene ubungqina abungqinayo ngam.
43_5_33_Nina nithumele kuYohane; uyingqinele ke inyaniso.
43_5_34_Mna ke andamkeli bungqina mntwini; ndizithetha ezi zinto,  ukuze nina nisindiswe.
43_5_35_Yena lowo ebesiso isibane esivuthayo, esikhanyayo; ke nina nathanda ukugcoba umzuzwana elukhanyweni lwakhe.
43_5_36_Mna ke ndinabo ubungqina obungaphezu kobukaYohane; kuba imisebenzi awandinikayo uBawo ukuba ndiyifeze, yona le misebenzi ndiyenzayo mna, iyangqina ngam, ukuba uBawo undithumile.
43_5_37_NoBawo owandithumayo, yena ungqinile ngam. Anizanga nilive izwi lakhe nakanye, niyibone nembonakalo yakhe.
43_5_38_Nezwi lakhe aninalo lihleli, kuni; ngokuba lowo uthunywe nguye, ningakholwa nguye nina.
43_5_39_Ziphengululeni izibhalo, ngokuba nina niba ninobomi obungunaphakade kuzo; zaye zona zingqina ngam.
43_5_40_Nibe ke nina ningathandi ukuza kum, ukuze nibe nobomi.
43_5_41_Andamkeli luzuko bantwini.
43_5_42_Ndiyanazi nina, ukuba uthando lukaThixo aninalo ngaphakathi kwenu.
43_5_43_Mna ndize egameni likaBawo, anindamkeli; ukuba omnye uthe weza ngelilelakhe igama, nomamkela yena.
43_5_44_Ningathini na ukuba nako ukukholwa, nisamkelela uzuko omnye komnye nje nina, nibe uzuko lona oluvela kuThixo yedwa ningalufuni?
43_5_45_Ningabi ndiya kunimangalela kuBawo mna; ukho onimangalelayo, uMoses, lowo nimthembileyo nina.
43_5_46_Kuba, ukuba benikholiwe nguMoses, ninge nikholiwe ndim;  kuba yena wabhala ngam.
43_5_47_Ke ukuba anikholwa zizibhalo zakhe yena, ningathini na ukukholwa ngawam amazwi?
43_6_1_Emveni kwezi zinto, wemka uYesu, waya phesheya kolwandle lwaseGalili, lwaseTibheriya.
43_6_2_Wayelandelwa ke sisihlwele esikhulu, ngokuba babebona imiqondiso yakhe, abeyenza kwababesifa.
43_6_3_Ke kaloku, wenyuka uYesu waya entabeni, wahlala phantsi khona nabafundi bakhe.
43_6_4_Yaye ke ikufuphi ipasika, umthendeleko wamaYuda.
43_6_5_Ewaphakamisile ngoko uYesu amehlo akhe, ebone isihlwele esikhulu sisiza kuye, wathi kuFilipu, Sozithenga phi na izonka,  ukuze badle aba?
43_6_6_Ubesitsho ke emlinga; kuba ubeyazi yena into abeza kuyenza.
43_6_7_UFilipu wamphendula wathi, Izonka zeedenariyo ezimakhulu mabini azibanele, ukuze elowo athabathe intwana.
43_6_8_Athi kuye omnye kubafundi bakhe, uAndreya, umzalwana kaSimon Petros,
43_6_9_Kukho nkwenkwana apha, inezonka ezihlanu zerhasi neentlanzi ezimbini; kodwa ke ziyintoni na ezo kwabangakanana?
43_6_10_Uthe ke uYesu, Bahlaliseni phantsi abantu. Kwaye ke kukho utyani obuninzi kuloo ndawo. Ahlala phantsi ngoko amadoda,  engathi amawaka mahlanu inani.
43_6_11_Wazithabatha ke izonka uYesu, wathi akubulela wababela abafundi, bathi ke abafundi babela abo babehleli phantsi, kwaba kwanjalo nakwiintlanzi, ngangokuthanda kwabo.
43_6_12_Bakuhlutha ke, uthi kubafundi bakhe, Buthani amaqhekeza aseleyo, ukuze kungonakali nto.
43_6_13_Babutha ngoko, bazalisa izitya zalishumi elinazibini ngamaqhekeza abesele kubo ababedlile, ezonkeni ezihlanu zerhasi.
43_6_14_Ngoko abantu aba, bakuwubona umqondiso awawenzayo uYesu,  bathi, Lo nguye inyaniso umprofeti lowo uzayo ehlabathini.
43_6_15_Uthe ngoko uYesu, esazi ukuba bahlalele ukuza kumbamba ngamandla, bamenze ukumkani, wabuya wemka, waya entabeni Yena yedwa.
43_6_16_Ke kaloku, kuthe kwakuhlwa, behla abafundi bakhe, baya elwandle.
43_6_17_Bengenile ke emkhombeni, baluwela ulwandle, besiya eKapernahum; kwakusekumnyama, waye uYesu engafikanga kubo.
43_6_18_Lwaye nolwandle lusilwa, kananjalo kuvuthuza umoya omkhulu.
43_6_19_Bakuba ngoko begweqile izitadiya ezingathi zimashumi mabini anazihlanu, nokuba mathathu, bambona uYesu ehamba phezu kolwandle, esiza kubo kufuphi nomkhombe; basuka boyika.
43_6_20_Athi ke yena kubo, Ndim; musani ukoyika.
43_6_21_Babethanda ngoko ukumamkelela emkhombeni; waza kwaoko umkhombe waba semhlabeni lowo babesiya kuwo.
43_6_22_Ngengomso indimbane leyo, ibimi phesheya kolwandle, yakuba ibonile ukuba akukho mkhonjana wumbi khona, ngulowo mnye wodwa babengene kuwo abafundi bakhe; nokuba uYesu akangenanga nabafundi bakhe emkhonjaneni lowo, bemke bodwa abafundi bakhe;
43_6_23_nokuba kuze eminye imikhonjana ivela eTibheriya, kufuphi nendawo apho babedle isonka khona, yakuba ibulele iNkosi:
43_6_24_xeshikweni ke indimbane yabonayo ukuba uYesu akakho apho nabafundi bakhe, besuka bangena nabo emikhombeni, beza eKapernahum, bemfuna uYesu.
43_6_25_Bathe bakumfumana phesheya kolwandle, bathi kuye, Rabhi,  ufike nini na apha?
43_6_26_Wabaphendula uYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni,  Anindifuni ngakuba nabona imiqondiso; nindifuna ngokuba nadla kwezaa zonka, nahlutha.
43_6_27_Musani ukusebenzela ukudla okutshabalalayo; sebenzelani ukudla okuhlala kuse ebomini obungunaphakade, aya kunipha kona uNyana woMntu; kuba uYise uThixo utywine waqinisela yena lowo.
43_6_28_Bathe ngoko kuye, Masenze ntoni na, ukuze sisebenze imisebenzi kaThixo?
43_6_29_Waphendula uYesu, wathi kubo, Umsebenzi kaThixo nguwo lo,  ukuba nikholwe kuye othunyiweyo nguye.
43_6_30_Bathi ngoko kuye, Wenza mqondiso mni na wena, ukuze sibone,  sikholwe nguwe? Usebenza ntoni na?
43_6_31_Oobawo bethu bona badla imana entlango, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Wabanika isonka siphuma ezulwini, ukuba badle sona.
43_6_32_Uthe ngoko uYesu kubo, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni,  AsinguMoses oninike isonka esiphuma ezulwini; nguBawo oninika isonka esiphuma ezulwini, esiyinyaniso.
43_6_33_Kuba isonka sikaThixo sesi sehlayo ezulwini, silinike ubomi ihlabathi.
43_6_34_Bathi ke ngoko kuye, Nkosi, sinike eso sonka ngamaxa onke.
43_6_35_Wathi ke uYesu kubo, Isonka sobomi esi ndim; lowo uzayo kum, akasayi kulamba; lowo ukholwayo kum, akasayi kunxanwa naphakade.
43_6_36_Senditshilo kuni ukuthi, Nindibonile nokundibona, anikholwa noko.
43_6_37_Konke andinikayo uBawo, kuya kuza kum; nozayo kum, andisayi kukha ndimlahlele phandle;
43_6_38_ngokuba ndihle emazulwini, ndingaze kwenza ukuthanda kwam;  ndize kwenza ukuthanda kwalowo wandithumayo.
43_6_39_Kuko ke oku ukuthanda kowandithumayo, kukaBawo: ukuba konke awandinikayo, ndingalahli nento kuko, ndikuvuse ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_6_40_Kuko ke oku ukuthanda kowandithumayo, ukuthi babe nobomi obungunaphakade bonke abambonayo uNyana, bakholwe kuye;  ndandiya kubavusa mna ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_6_41_Ayemkrokrela ngoko amaYuda, ngokuba wathi, Ndim isonka, esi sehlayo emazulwini.
43_6_42_Ayesithi ke, Lo asinguye na kanene uYesu, unyana kaYosefu,  esimaziyo thina uyise nonina? Angathini na ke ngoko yena ukuthi, Ndihle emazulwini?
43_6_43_Waphendula ngoko UYesu wathi kubo, Musani ukukrokra ngaphakathi kwenu.
43_6_44_Akukho namnye unako ukuza kum, engathanga uBawo owandithumayo amtsale; ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_6_45_Kubhaliwe ebaprofetini kwathiwa, Baye bonke beya kuba ngabafundiswa bakaThixo; bonke ngoko abathe beva kuBawo,  bafunda kuye, bayeza kum.
43_6_46_Kungekuba kukho bani umbonileyo uBawo, ingenguye ovela kuThixo; nguye yedwa ombonileyo uBawo.
43_6_47_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Lowo ukholwayo kum unobomi obungunaphakade.
43_6_48_Ndim isonka sobomi.
43_6_49_Ooyihlo bayidla imana leyo entlango, bafile noko.
43_6_50_Isonka sona esihla emazulwini sesi, athi ubani akusidla,  angafi.
43_6_51_Ndim isonka esiphilileyo, esi sehlayo emazulwini. Ukuba ubani uthe wasidla esi sonka, wodla ubomi ngonaphakade; ke isonka endiya kumnika sona mna, siyinyama yam, endiya kuyinikela ubomi behlabathi.
43_6_52_Ngoko amaYuda ayesilwa phakathi kwawo, esithi, Angathini na lo ukusinika inyama yakhe siyidle?
43_6_53_Wathi ngoko uYesu kuwo, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba anithanga niyidle inyama yoNyana woMntu, nilisele igazi lakhe,  aninabo ubomi kuni.
43_6_54_Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, unobomi obungunaphakade; ndaye mna ndiya kumvusa ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_6_55_Kuba inyama yam ikukudla, inyaniso; negazi lam liluselo,  inyaniso.
43_6_56_Lowo uyidlayo eyam inyama, alisele elam igazi, uhleli kum,  nam ndihleli kuye.
43_6_57_Njengoko uBawo ophilileyo wandithumayo, ndibe nam ndiphilile ngenxa enoBawo, lowo undidlayo, kwayena uya kuphila ngam.
43_6_58_Siso eso isonka esehla emazulwini; kungenjengokuba ooyihlo bayidlayo imana, bafa noko. Lowo usidlayo esi sonka, uya kuphila ngonaphakade.
43_6_59_Ezi zinto wazithetha endlwini yesikhungu, efundisa eKapernahum.
43_6_60_Into eninzi ngoko kubafundi bakhe yakuva yathi, Lilizwi elinqabileyo eli; ngubani na onako ukuliva?
43_6_61_Ke kaloku, esazi uYesu ngaphakathi kwakhe, ukuba bayakrokra lilo abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo, Kuyanikhubekisa na oku?
43_6_62_Hi na ke, ukuba nithe nambona uNyana woMntu enyukela apho ebefudula ekhona?
43_6_63_Ngumoya odlisa ubomi; inyama yona ayincedi lutho. Amazwi la ndiwathethayo kuni mna angumoya, abubomi.
43_6_64_Kukho abathile kuni abangakholwayo. Kuba ebesazi kwasekuqalekeni uYesu, ukuba ngoobani na ababengakholwa, nokuba ngubani na oya kumnikela.
43_6_65_Wayesithi, Kungenxa yoku ndatshoyo kuni ukuthi, Akukho namnye unako ukuza kum, ukuba akathanga akunikwe nguBawo.
43_6_66_Ngenxa yoko into eninzi yabafundi bakhe yabuya umva, ayaba sahamba naye.
43_6_67_Wathi ngoko uYesu kwabalishumi elinababini, Nani nifuna ukumka, yini na?
43_6_68_Wamphendula ngoko uSimon Petros wathi, Nkosi, sosuka siye kubani na? Nguwe onamazwi obomi obungunaphakade.
43_6_69_Nathi sikholiwe, sazile, ukuba wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo.
43_6_70_Wabaphendula uYesu wathi, Andininyulanga na mna, nina shumi linababini? Ukanti omnye kuni ungumtyholi.
43_6_71_Wayethetha ke ngoYuda Sikariyoti kaSimon, kuba lowo ibinguye obeza kumngcatsha, engomnye weshumi elinababini.
43_7_1_Emveni kwezi zinto, wayehamba uYesu kwelaseGalili; kuba ebengathandi ukuhamba kwelakwaYuda; ngokuba amaYuda ebefuna ukumbulala.
43_7_2_Ke kaloku, wawukufuphi umthendeleko wamaYuda weminquba.
43_7_3_Bathi ngoko kuye abazalwana bakhe, Gqitha apha, uye kwelakwaYuda, ukuze nabafundi bakho bayibone imisebenzi yakho oyenzayo.
43_7_4_Kuba akukho namnye wenza into emfihlekweni, abe yena ngokwakhe efuna ukuba sekuhleni. Ukuba uyazenza ezi zinto,  zibonakalise ngokwakho kwihlabathi.
43_7_5_Kuba nabazalwana bakhe bebengakholwa kuye.
43_7_6_Wathi ngoko uYesu kubo, Ixesha lam alikabikho, ke elenu ixesha lihlala lilungile.
43_7_7_Ihlabathi alinakunithiya nina; mna ke liyandithiya, ngokuba mna ndingqina ngalo, ukuba imisebenzi yalo ayindawo.
43_7_8_Nyukani nina, niye kulo mthendeleko; mna andikanyuki, ndiye kulo mthendeleko; ngokuba ixesha lam alikazaliseki.
43_7_9_Akuba ke ezithethile ezi zinto kubo, wahlala kwelaseGalili.
43_7_10_Ke, bakuba benyukile abazalwana bakhe, wenyuka naye, waya emthendelekweni, kungekhona ekuhleni, kubusithela.
43_7_11_Ayemfuna ngoko amaYuda emthendelekweni, esithi, Uphi na yena?
43_7_12_Kwaye kukho ukukrokra okukhulu ngaye ebantwini; inxenye ibisithi, Ulungile; abanye ke besithi, Hayi, yena ulahlekisa uluntu olu.
43_7_13_Noko ke bekungekho namnye ubethetha ngaye ngokusekuhleni,  ngenxa yokoyika amaYuda.
43_7_14_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba sekuphakathi komthendeleko,  wenyuka uYesu waya etempileni, wafundisa.
43_7_15_Ayemangaliswa amaYuda, esithi, Lo uyazi ngani na imfundo,  engafundanga nje?
43_7_16_Waphendula uYesu, wathi, Eyam imfundiso asiyam, yeyalowo wandithumayo.
43_7_17_Ukuba kukho othi afune ukukwenza ukuthanda kwakhe, woyazi imfundiso le: ukuba iphuma kuThixo, nokuba mna ndithetha okukokwam, kusini na.
43_7_18_Lowo uthetha okwakhe, ufuna olulolwakhe uzuko; ke lowo ufuna uzuko lowamthumayo, uyinene yena, akukho kungalungisi kuye.
43_7_19_Umthetho aniwunikelwanga na nguMoses? Kanti ke akukho namnye kuni uwugcinayo umthetho; yini na ukuba nifune ukundibulala?
43_7_20_Saphendula isihlwele sathi, Unedemon; ngubani na ofuna ukukubulala?
43_7_21_Wapendula uYesu wathi kubo. Ndenze umsebenzi wamnye,  namangaliswa ke nonke.
43_7_22_UMoses uninike ulwaluko ngenxa yoku, kungengenxa yokuba luphume kuMoses, kungenxa yokuba luphume kooyihlo. Niyamalusa ke umntu nangesabatha.
43_7_23_Ukuba umntu uyaluswa ngesabatha, ukuze ungaphulwa umthetho kaMoses, nindijalele na ngokuba ndiphilise umntu, waphila kwaphela, ngesabatha?
43_7_24_Musani ukugweba ngokwembonakalo; gwebani ngomgwebo olungisayo.
43_7_25_Babesithi ngoko abathile kwabaseYerusalem, Asinguye na lo bafuna ukumbulala?
43_7_26_Niyabona, uthetha ngokuphandle, abathethi nto kuye; bangaba kanti na ke bayazi okwenyaniso abaphathi, ukuba lo nguye uKristu okwenyaniso?
43_7_27_Thina siyamazi lo apho avela khona; xa sukuba ke uKristu esiza, akukho namnye uya kumazi apho avela khona.
43_7_28_Wadanduluka ke ngoko uYesu, efundisa etempileni, wathi,  Nina niyandazi, nikwazi nalapho ndivela khona; andizanga ngokwam; uyinyaniso owandithumayo, eningamaziyo nina.
43_7_29_Mna ke ndiyamazi; ngokuba ndivela kuye, waye yena endithumile.
43_7_30_Babefuna ngoko ukumbamba; kodwa akubangakho namnye umsa isandla, ngokuba ilixa lakhe belingekafiki.
43_7_31_Ke kaloku, into eninzi esihlweleni yakholwa kuye;  yayisithi, UKristu, xa athe wafika, angaba uya kwenza imiqondiso emininzi na kunale ayenzileyo lo?
43_7_32_AbaFarisi beva abantu bezikrokrela ezi zinto ngaye; baza abaFarisi nababingeleli abakhulu bathuma amadindala, ukuba ambambe.
43_7_33_Wathi ngoko uYesu kuwo, Liselixesha elifutshane endinani,  ndize ndiye kowandithumayo.
43_7_34_Niya kundifuna, ningandifumani; nithi apho ndikhona mna,  ningabi nakufika nina.
43_7_35_Athi ngoko amaYuda phakathi kwawo, Uza kuya phi na lo, le nto singayi kumfumana thina? Angaba uza kuya kwiintsali ezikumaGrike, afundise amaGrike, yini na?
43_7_36_Liyintoni na eli lizwi alithethileyo, lithi, Niya kundifuna, ningandifumani; nithi apho ndikhona mna, ningabi nakufika nina?
43_7_37_Ke kaloku, ngomhla wokugqibela, ongowona mkhulu womthendeleko, wema uYesu, wadanduluka esithi, Ukuba kukho othi anxanwe, makeze kum asele.
43_7_38_Lowo ukholwayo kum, njengoko satshoyo isibhalo, kuya kumpompoza imilambo yamanzi aphilileyo, iphuma embilinini wakhe.
43_7_39_Oku wakutsho ke ngaye uMoya, ababeza kumamkeliswa abo bakholwayo kuye; kuba ebengekamkelwa uMoya oyiNgcwele; ngokuba uYesu ebengekazukiswa.
43_7_40_Yaye ngoko into eninzi esihlweleni, yakuliva ilizwi elo,  isithi, Lo nguye umprofeti, inyaniso. Babesithi abanye, Lo nguye uKristu.
43_7_41_Babesithi abanye, uKristu angavela kwelaseGalili yini na?
43_7_42_Asitshongo na isibhalo ukuthi, uKristu uphuma embewini kaDavide, naseBhetelehem, umzana abekuwo uDavide?
43_7_43_Ke ngoko sathi qheke kubini isihlwele ngenxa yakhe.
43_7_44_Inxenye ke kubo yayithanda ukumbamba, kodwa akubangakho namnye umsa izandla.
43_7_45_Afika ngoko amadindala kubabingeleli abakhulu nakubaFarisi;  baza bona bathi kuwo, Kungani na ukuba ningezi naye?
43_7_46_Aphendula amadindala athi, Akuzanga kuthethe mntu njengoko athetha ngako lo mntu.
43_7_47_Bawaphendula ngoko abaFarisi, bathi, Ningaba nilahlekisiwe nani na?
43_7_48_Kubaphathi nakubaFarisi kungaba kukho mntu ukholiweyo kuye yini na?
43_7_49_Olu luntu lungawaziyo umthetho luqalekisiwe.
43_7_50_Uthe uNikodemo kubo (lowo wezayo kuye ebusuku, engomnye kwabo),
43_7_51_Umthetho wethu uyamgweba yini na umntu, ukuba awuthanga uve kuye kuqala, uqonde into ayenzayo?
43_7_52_Baphendula bathi kuye, Ungaba ungowelaseGalili nawe na?  Phengulula ubone, ukuba akuveli mprofeti kwelaseGalili.
43_7_53_Walowo ke waya kweyakhe indlu.
43_8_1_UYesu ke yena waya eNtabeni yemiNquma.
43_8_2_Uthe ke ngesifingo wabuya wafika etempileni; baye bonke abantu besiza kuye; wahlala phantsi, wabafundisa.
43_8_3_Ababhali nabaFarisi bazisa ke kuye umfazi obanjwe ekrexeza;  baza, bemmise phakathi,
43_8_4_bathi kuye, Mfundisi, lo mfazi wabanjwa ekrexeza, kanye kuloo ntlondi.
43_8_5_Ke kaloku, emthethweni uMoses wasimisela ukuthi, abanjalo mabagityiselwe ngamatye; uthini na ke wena?
43_8_6_Babesitsho ke bemhenda, ukuze babe nokummangalela; kodwa uYesu, ethobe phantsi, wabhala ngomnwe emhlabeni.
43_8_7_Uthe ke bakumana bembuza, waphakama, wathi kubo, Ongenasono kuni makaqale amgibisele ngelitye.
43_8_8_Wabuya wathoba phantsi, wabhala emhlabeni.
43_8_9_Bathe ke bona bakuva, besohlwaywa naluvalo lwabo, baphuma ngabanye, beqalela kwabakhulu, kwada kwaba kwabokugqibela.  Wasala yedwa uYesu, waye umfazi emi phakathi.
43_8_10_Ephakamile ke uYesu, akabona mntu kwakuphela ngumfazi lowo;  wathi kuye, Mfazindini, baphi na abo bamangaleli bakho? Akukho ukugwebileyo na?
43_8_11_Wathi ke yena, Noko amnye, Nkosi. Wathi ke uYesu kuye, Nam andikugwebi; hamba, ungabuye wone.
43_8_12_Wabuya ngoko uYesu wathetha kubo, esithi, Ndim ukhanyiselo lwehlabathi; lowo undilandelayo akasayi kuhamba ebumnyameni;  yena uya kuba nalo ukhanyiso lobomi.
43_8_13_Bathe ngoko abaFarisi kuye, Wena uyazingqinela, ubungqina bakho abunene.
43_8_14_Waphendula uYesu wathi kubo, Nokuba ndithi ndizingqinele mna ngokwam, buyinene ubungqina bam; ngokuba ndiyazi apho ndavela khona, nalapho ndiya khona; ke nina anazi apho ndivela khona, nalapho ndiya khona.
43_8_15_Nina nigweba ngokwenyama; mna andigwebi namnye.
43_8_16_Nokuba ndithi ndigwebe mna, umgwebo wam uyinene; ngokuba andindedwa, ndim noBawo owandithumayo.
43_8_17_Nasemthethweni wenu ke kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ubungqina babantu ababini buyinene.
43_8_18_Mna ndingulowo uzingqinelayo; uyandingqinela nalowo wandithumayo, uBawo.
43_8_19_Bathi ngoko kuye, Uphi na uYihlo? Waphendula uYesu, wathi,  Anindazi mna; animazi noBawo. Ukuba benindazi mna, ninge nimazi noBawo.
43_8_20_Loo mazwi wawathetha uYesu ngasemkhumbini wokulondoloza imali, efundisa etempileni; akwabakho namnye umbambayo; ngokuba belingekafiki ilixa lakhe.
43_8_21_Wabuya ngoko uYesu wathi kubo, Ndiyemka mna; niya kundifuna, nifele esonweni senu; apho ndiya khona mna, aninako ukufika nina.
43_8_22_Abesithi ngoko amaYuda, Angaba uya kuzibulala na, le nto athi, Apho ndiya khona mna, aninako ukufika nina?
43_8_23_Wathi kuwo, Nina ningabangaphantsi, mna ndingowangaphezulu;  nina ningabeli hlabathi, mna andingoweli hlabathi.
43_8_24_Ndatsho ngoko kuni ukuthi, Niya kufela ezonweni zenu; kuba ekubeni nithe anakholwa ukuba ndinguye, niya kufela ezonweni zenu.
43_8_25_Abesithi ngoko kuye, Ungubani wena? Wathi kuwo uYesu,  Ndiyiloo nto ndayixelayo kuni kwasekuqaleni.
43_8_26_Ndineendawo ezininzi zokuthetha nokugweba ngani; lowo wandithumayo uyinene; ndithi ke mna, izinto endazivayo kuye,  ndithethe zona ezo kwihlabathi.
43_8_27_Akaqondanga ukuba ebethetha ngoYise kuwo.
43_8_28_Wathi ngoko uYesu kuwo, Xa nithe namphakamisa uNyana woMntu, noqonda oko ukuba ndinguye, nokuba andenzi nto ngokwam;  ndisuka ndizithethe ezi zinto njengoko wandifundisayo uBawo.
43_8_29_Lowo wandithumayo unam; uBawo akandishiyanga ndedwa;  ngokuba mna ndihleli ndizenza izinto ezikholekileyo kuye.
43_8_30_Akubon ukuba uyazithetha ezi zinto, bakholwa kuye, baba baninzi.
43_8_31_Ubesithi ngoko uYesu kuloo maYuda akholiweyo kuye, Ukuba nina nithe nahlala elizwini lam, noba ningabafundi bam,  inyaniso.
43_8_32_Naniya kuyazi inyaniso, yaye inyaniso iya kunikhulula.
43_8_33_Amphendula, athi, Thina siyimbewu ka-Abraham; asizanga sibe sebukhobokeni nakubani; utsho ngani na wena ukuthi, Noba ngabakhululekileyo?
43_8_34_Uwaphendule uYesu wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Bonke abenza isono bangamakhoboka esono.
43_8_35_Ikhoboka ke alihlali endlwini ngonaphakade; ngunyana ohlala ngonaphakade.
43_8_36_Ngoko ukuba uNyana uthe wanikhulula, noba nikhululekile inene.
43_8_37_Ndiyazi ukuba niyimbewu ka-Abraham; ke nifuna ukundibulala,  ngokuba ilizwi lam lingenakuhamba kuni.
43_8_38_Mna ndithetha endikubonileyo kuBawo; nani ke nenza enikubonileyo kuyihlo.
43_8_39_Aphendula athi kuye, Ubawo thina nguAbraham. Athi kuwo uYesu, Ukuba nibe ningabantwana baka-Abraham, ninge niyenza imisebenzi ka-Abraham.
43_8_40_Kaloku ke, nifuna ukubulala mna, mntu unixelele inyaniso endayiva kuThixo; akakwenzanga oko uAbraham.
43_8_41_Nina nenza imisebenzi yooyihlo. Athi ngoko kuye, Thina asizelwe ngabuhenyu, sinaBawo mnye, uThixo.
43_8_42_Uthe ke uYesu kuwo, Ukuba uThixo ebenguYihlo, ninge nindithanda; kuba mna ndaphuma kuThixo, ndifikile ke; kuba andizanga ngokwam, nguye owandithumayo.
43_8_43_Kungani na ukuba ningayiqondi intetho yam? Kungokuba ningenakuliva ilizwi lam.
43_8_44_Nina ningaboyihlo uMtyholi, neenkanuko zoyihlo niyathanda ukuzenza. Yena waye esisibulala-mntu kwasekuqaleni; akemi enyanisweni, ngokuba akukho nyaniso kuye. Xa sukuba ethetha ubuxoki, uthetha okukokwakhe; ngokuba ulixoki, noyise wawo.
43_8_45_Mna ke, ngokuba ndithetha inyaniso, anikholwa ndim.
43_8_46_Ngubani na kuni ondohlwayayo ngenxa yesono? Ukuba ke ndithetha inyaniso, kungani na ukuba ningakholwa ndim?
43_8_47_Lowo ungokaThixo, uyaweva amazwi kaThixo; ngenxa yoko aniweva nina, ngokuba ningengabakaThixo.
43_8_48_Aphendula ngoko amaYuda, athi kuye, Asilungisi na thina ukuthi ungumSamariya wena, nokuthi unedemon?
43_8_49_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Andinademon mna; ndibeka uBawo;  nina ke nibe nindihlaza.
43_8_50_Mna ke andifuni luzuko lwam; ukho lowo ufunayo, ugwebayo.
43_8_51_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba umntu uthe waligcina ilizwi lam, akasayi kuza abone kufa naphakade.
43_8_52_Athi ngoko amaYuda kuye, Kukalokunje, siyazi ukuba unedemon. UAbraham wafa, nabo abaprofeti bafa, ube wena usithi,  Ukuba umntu uthe waligcina ilizwi lam, akasayi kuza eve kufa naphakade.
43_8_53_Wena ungaba umkhulu yini na kunobawo wethu uAbraham, yena wafayo? Nabaprofeti bafa; uzenza bani na wena?
43_8_54_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Ukuba mna ndithi ndizizukise, uzuko lwam alungebi nto; nguBawo ondizukisayo; enithi nina nguThixo wenu.
43_8_55_Kanti ke animazanga, mna ke ndiyamazi. Ukuba ke ndithe andimazi, ndoba ndilixoki njengani; ndiyamazi, ndiligcinile nelizwi lakhe.
43_8_56_UAbraham, uyihlo, wagcobela ukuwubona umhla wam; wawubona,  wavuya.
43_8_57_Athi ngoko amaYuda kuye, Ungekabi naminyaka imashumi mahlanu nje, umbonile na uAbraham?
43_8_58_Wathi kuwo uYesu, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Engekabikho uAbraham, mna ndikho kade.
43_8_59_Ngoko achola amatye, ukuze amgibisele; wazimela ke uYesu,  waphuma etempileni, wacanda phakathi kwawo; wenjenjalo ukudlula.
43_9_1_Uthe ke edlula, wabona umntu obe eyimfama kwasekuzalweni kwakhe.
43_9_2_Bambuza ke abafundi bakhe, besithi, Rabhi, ngubani na owonayo, ngulo, ngabazali bakhe, sini na, ukuze azalwe eyimfama nje?
43_9_3_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Akone lo, akone bazali bakhe; uzelwe eyimfama ukuze ibonakalaliselwe kuye imisebenzi kaThixo.
43_9_4_Ndimelwe kukuyisebenza imisebenzi yowandithumayo,  kusesemini; kuza ubusuku, xa kungekho namnye unako ukusebenza.
43_9_5_Xa ndisesehlabathini, ndilukhanyiselo lwehlabathi.
43_9_6_Akuba etshilo, watshica emhlabeni, wenza udaka ngamathe,  wawaqaba amehlo emfama ngodaka olo.
43_9_7_Wathi kuyo, Yiya kuhlamba echibini leSilowa (oko kukuthi ngentetho evakalayo, Thunyiwe). Yemka ngoko, yaya yahlamba,  yeza ibona.
43_9_8_Baye ngoko abamelwane, nababembona ngaphambili ukuba uyimfama, besithi, Lo asinguye na obehleli engqiba?
43_9_9_Abanye babesithi, Nguye lo; bambi ke bathi, ufana naye; yena ke wayesithi, Ndinguye.
43_9_10_Babesithi ngoko kuye, Atheni na ukuvuleka amehlo akho?
43_9_11_Waphendula yena wathi, Umntu ekuthiwa nguYesu wenze udaka,  waqaba amehlo am, wathi kum, Yiya echibini leSilowa, uhlambe;  ndiyile ke ndahlamba, ndabuya ndibona.
43_9_12_Bathi ngoko kuye, Uphi na yena? Athi, Andazi.
43_9_13_Bamzisa kubaFarisi lowo ubefudula eyimfama.
43_9_14_Ke kaloku yaye iyisabatha, oko uYesu wenza udaka, wawavula amehlo akhe.
43_9_15_Babuya ngoko ke bambuza nabaFarisi, ukuba utheni na ukuba abuye abone. Wathi ke yena kubo, Ubeke udaka emehlweni am,  ndaza ndahlamba; ndiyabona ke.
43_9_16_Babesithi ngoko abathile bakubaFarisi, Lo mntu asingowakwaThixo, ngokuba isabatha akayigcini. Babesithi abanye, Angathini na umntu ongumoni ukwenza imiqondiso engakanana? Bathi qheke kubini.
43_9_17_Babuya bathi kwimfama, Uthini na wena ngaye, ewavulile nje amehlo akho? Uthe ke yena, Ungumprofeti.
43_9_18_Akakholwa ngoko amaYuda ngaye, ukuba ebeyimfama, wabuye wabona, ada abiza abazali balowo ubuye wabona.
43_9_19_Aza ababuza esithi, Lo ngunyana wenu na, enithi nina wazalwa eyimfama? Phofu ubona ngani na ngoku?
43_9_20_Abazali bakhe bawaphendula bathi, Siyazi ukuba lo ngunyana wethu, kwanokuba ke wazalwa eyimfama;
43_9_21_le nto ke abonayo ngoku asazi, novule amehlo akhe, asimazi thina; uselemkhulu yena, buzani kuye, wozithethela.
43_9_22_Batsho abazali bakhe, ngokuba babesoyika amaYuda; kuba amaYuda abeselenqophisene ngokuthi, Ukuba uthe umntu wamvuma ukuba nguKristu, aze akhutshwe esikhungwini.
43_9_23_Kungenxa yoko abazali bakhe bathi, Uselemkhulu, buzani kuye.
43_9_24_Ambiza ngoko okwesibini umntu obeyimfama, athi kuye, Zukisa uThixo; siyazi thina ukuba lo mntu ungumoni.
43_9_25_Uphendule ngoko yena, wathi, Ukuba ungumoni, andazi; ndazi nto-nye, eyokuba ndibe ndiyimfama nje, ngoku ndiyabona.
43_9_26_Abuye ke athi kuye, Wenze ntoni na kuwe? utheni na ukuwavula amehlo akho?
43_9_27_Wawaphendula wathi, Sendinixelele, naza aneva; nithandelani na ukubuya nive? Nani ningaba nithanda ukuba ngabafundi bakhe na?
43_9_28_Amtshabhisa ngoko athi, Nguwe umfundi wakhe; ke thina singabafundi bakaMoses.
43_9_29_Siyazi thina, ukuba uThixo uthethile kuMoses; lo yena asimazi apho avela khona.
43_9_30_Waphendula umntu lowo, wathi kuwo, Nasi apha isimanga,  ukuthi nina ningazi apho avela khona; ukanti uwavulile amehlo am.
43_9_31_Siyazi ke ukuba uThixo akabeva aboni; kodwa ukuba umntu uthi amhlonele uThixo, akwenze ukuthanda kwakhe, uyamva lowo.
43_9_32_Kwasephakadeni akuzanga kuviwe ukuba umntu wakha wavula amehlo ozelwe eyimfama.
43_9_33_Ukuba lo ebengenguye owakwaThixo, ebengenakwenza nto.
43_9_34_Aphendula athi kuye, Wena wazalelwa ezonweni kanye;  ufundisa thina na wena? Amkhuphela ngaphandle.
43_9_35_Weva uYesu ukuba amkhuphele ngaphandle. Uthe akumfumana wathi kuye, Wena uyakholwa na kuNyana kaThixo?
43_9_36_Uphendule yena wathi, Ongubani na, Nkosi, ukuze ndikholwe kuye?
43_9_37_Uthe ke uYesu kuye, Umbonile; nguye lo uthetha nawe.
43_9_38_Wathi ke yena, Ndiyakholwa, Nkosi. Waza waqubuda kuye.
43_9_39_Wathi uYesu, Mna ndizele ugwebo kweli hlabathi, ukuze abangaboniyo babone, bathi ababonayo babe ziimfama.
43_9_40_Baziva ezo nto abakubaFarisi ababenaye, bathi kuye, Singaba siziimfama nathi na?
43_9_41_Uthe ke kubo uYesu, Ukuba beniziimfama, ngeningenasono;  kungoku nithi, Siyabona; ke ngoko isono senu sihleli.
43_10_1_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ongangeniyo ngalo isango ebuhlantini bezimvu, osuka akhwele ngandawo yimbi, lowo ulisela nesihange.
43_10_2_Ke yena ongena ngalo isango ngumalusi wezimvu.
43_10_3_Umgcini-sango uyamvulela lowo; zithi nezimvu zilive izwi lakhe azibize ezakhe izimvu ngamagama, azikhokelele phandle zona.
43_10_4_Xa athe wazikhupha ezakhe izimvu, uhamba phambi kwazo,  zithi nezimvu zimlandele; ngokuba zilazi izwi lakhe.
43_10_5_Ke owasemzini azingemlandeli; zosuka zimbaleke, ngokuba zingalazi izwi labasemzini.
43_10_6_Lo mzekeliso wawuthetha kubo uYesu; ke bona abaziqondanga ukuba zizinto zini na ezo abezithetha kubo.
43_10_7_Wabuya wathi ngoko kubo uYesu, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni,  Ndim isango lezimvu.
43_10_8_Bonke abezayo ngaphambi kwam bangamasela nezihange; ke zona izimvu azibevanga.
43_10_9_Ndim isango; ukuba umntu uthe wangena ngam, wosindiswa; uya kungena ephuma, afumane utyani.
43_10_10_Isela alizi lingazele ukuze libe, lixhele, litshabalalise.  Mna ndizele ukuze babe nobomi, babe nabo ke ngokugqithiseleyo.
43_10_11_Ndim umalusi olungileyo; umalusi olungileyo, ubomi bakhe ubuncamela izimvu.
43_10_12_Ke yena ongumqeshwa, engengumalusi, ezingezizo ezakhe izimvu, uyibona ingcuka isiza, azishiye izimvu, abaleke, ize ingcuka izibambe, izichithachithe izimvu.
43_10_13_Umqeshwa lo ke ubaleka ngokuba engumqeshwa,  engazikhathalele izimvu.
43_10_14_Ndim umalusi olungileyo; ndiyazazi ezam, ndiyaziwa zezam.
43_10_15_Njengokuba endazi uBawo, nam ndiyamazi uBawo, nobomi bam ndibuncamela izimvu.
43_10_16_Ndinazo nezinye izimvu, ezingezizo ezobu buhlanti; nazo ezo ndimelwe kukuza nazo; zaye ziya kuliva izwi lam, zibe mhlambi mnye, nomalusi abe mnye.
43_10_17_Ngenxa yoku uBawo uyandithanda; ngokuba mna ndibuncama ubomi bam, ukuze ndibuye ndibuthabathe.
43_10_18_Akukho namnye ubuhluthayo kum, ndiyabuncama mna ngokwam;  ndinegunya lokubuncama, ndinegunya lokubuya ndibuthabathe; lo mthetho ndawamkela kuBawo.
43_10_19_Abuya ngoko amaYuda athi qheke kubini ngenxa yala mazwi.
43_10_20_Yayisithi ke into eninzi kuwo, Unedemon, uyageza; yini na ukuba nimphulaphule?
43_10_21_Abanye babesithi, La mazwi asingawo awophethwe yidemon:  idemon ingaba inako yini na ukuvula amehlo emfama?
43_10_22_Ke kaloku, kwabakho umthendeleko wokuhlaziywa kwetempile eYerusalem; kwaye kusebusika.
43_10_23_Waye ehambahamba uYesu etempileni, evarandeni kaSolomon.
43_10_24_Amngqonga ngoko amaYuda, athi kuye, Koda kube nini na usiphongomisile? Ukuba unguye uKristu, sixelele ngokuphandle.
43_10_25_Wawaphendula uYesu wathi, Ndinixelele, noko anikholwa;  imisebenzi endiyenzayo mna egameni likaBawo, yona iyangqina ngam.
43_10_26_Nina anikholwa; kuba aningabo abezimvu zam; njengoko ndanixelelayo.
43_10_27_Ezam izimvu ziyaliva ilizwi lam, ndibe nam ndizazi,  zindilandela;
43_10_28_mna ndizinika ubomi obungunaphakade; azisayi kutshabalala naphakade; akukho namnye uya kuzihlutha esandleni sam.
43_10_29_UBawo, ondinike zona, ungaphezu kwabo bonke; akukho bani unako ukuzihlutha esandleni sikaBawo.
43_10_30_Mna noBawo sibanye.
43_10_31_Abuya ngoko amaYuda achola amatye ukuba amxulube.
43_10_32_Wawaphendula uYesu wathi, Mininzi imisebenzi emihle endanibonisayo, ivela kuBawo; nindixuluba ngenxa yawuphi na umsebenzi kuyo?
43_10_33_Amphendula amaYuda esithi, Asikuxulu beli msebenzi mhle,  sikuxuluba ngokuba unyelisa; nangokuba wena usithi, ungumntu nje, usuke uzenze uThixo.
43_10_34_Uwaphendule uYesu wathi, Akubhaliwe na emthethweni wenu,  kwathiwa, Mna ndithe ningoothixo?
43_10_35_Ukuba uthe bona bangoothixo, eleza kubo ilizwi likaThixo (sibe isibhalo singenakwaphulwa),
43_10_36_nitsho na nina ngaye lowo uYise wamngcwalisayo, wamthuma ehlabathini, ukuthi, Uyanyelisa; ngokuba ndithe, NdinguNyana kaThixo?
43_10_37_Ukuba andiyenzi imisebenzi kaBawo, musani ukukholwa ndim.
43_10_38_Ke ukuba ndiyayenza, nokuba anikholwa ndim, kholwani yiyo yona imisebenzi; ukuze nazi, nikholwe, ukuba uBawo ukum, nam ndikuye.
43_10_39_Abuya ngoko afuna ukumbamba; waphuluka ezandleni zawo.
43_10_40_Wabuya wemka, waya phesheya kweYordan, kwindawo abebhaptizela kuyo uYohane kuqala; wahlala khona.
43_10_41_Kweza babaninzi kuye, bathi, UYohane okunene akenzanga namnye umqondiso; kodwa ke zonke izinto, awazithethayo uYohane ngaye lo, zaziyinene.
43_10_42_Bathi abaninzi bakholwa kuye khona apho.
43_11_1_Ke kaloku, kwaye kusifa umntu othile, uLazaro waseBhetani,  umzi wakulooMariya, noMarta udade wabo.
43_11_2_Yaye ke inguloo Mariya, wayithambisayo iNkosi ngamafutha aqholiweyo, wazisulayo iinyawo zayo ngeenwele zakhe, omnakwabo uLazaro wayesifa.
43_11_3_Bathumela ngoko oodade babo kuye, besithi, Nkosi, uyabona,  lowo umthandayo uyafa.
43_11_4_Evile ke uYesu wathi, Esi sifo asiyelele kufeni; singenxa yozuko lukaThixo, ukuze uNyana kaThixo azukiswe ngaso.
43_11_5_Ke uYesu wayebathanda ooMarta nomsakwabo noLazaro.
43_11_6_Uthe ngoko akuva ukuba uyafa, wakha okunene wahlala kuloo ndawo abekuyo iintsuku ezimbini.
43_11_7_Waza emveni koko wathi kubo abafundi, Masibuye siye kwelakwaYuda.
43_11_8_Bathi abafundi kuye, Rabhi, amaYuda ebefuna ngoku ukukuxuluba ngamatye nje, ubuya uye khona na?
43_11_9_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Akalishumi elinamabini na amaxa emini? Ukuba umntu uthi ahambe emini, akakhubeki; ngokuba elubona ukhanyiselo lweli hlabathi.
43_11_10_Ke ukuba umntu uthi ahambe ebusuku, uyakhubeka; ngokuba ukukhanya kungekho kuye.
43_11_11_Wazithetha ezi zinto; aze emveni koko athi kubo, ULazaro,  umhlobo wethu, ulele; ndiyaya ukuba ndimvuse.
43_11_12_Bathi ngoko abafundi bakhe, Nkosi, ukuba ulele, wosinda.
43_11_13_Ke yena uYesu ubethetha ukufa kwakhe. Bona ke bebeba uthetha ngokulala ubuthongo.
43_11_14_Wandula ngoku uYesu wathi kubo ngokungafihilisiyo, ULazaro ufile.
43_11_15_Ndiyavuya ke ngenxa yenu, ukuba ndibe ndingekho khona,  ukuze nikholwe. Noko ke masiye kuye.
43_11_16_Uthe ngoko uTomas, okuthiwa nguDidimo, kubafundi kunye naye, Masiye nathi, ukuze sife naye.
43_11_17_Efikile ngoko uYesu, wafika eselesengcwabeni iintsuku zone.
43_11_18_(Ke kaloku iBhetani ibikufuphi neYerusalem, umgama wayo uzizitadiya ezingathi zilishumi elinazihlanu.)
43_11_19_Kwakufike abaninzi bakumaYuda, kwabo babenoMarta noMariya,  ukuze babakhuze ngaye umnakwabo.
43_11_20_Akuva ngoko uMarta ukuba uYesu uyeza, wamhlangabeza; ke yena uMariya wahlala endlwini.
43_11_21_Wathi ngoko uMarta kuYesu, Nkosi, ukuba ubulapha,  umnakwethu ange engafanga.
43_11_22_Nangoku ndiyazi ukuba, ongathi ukucele kuThixo, oko wokunika uThixo.
43_11_23_Athi kuye uYesu, Umnakwenu uya kubuya avuke.
43_11_24_Athi uMarta kuye, Ndiyazi ukuba uya kubuya avuke eluvukweni, ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_11_25_Wathi uYesu kuye, Ndim uvuko, ndim ubomi; lowo ukholwayo kum, nokuba ubethe wafa, wodla ubomi.
43_11_26_Bonke abadla ubomi bekholwa kum, abasayi kufa naphakade;  uyakholwa na koko?
43_11_27_Athi kuye, Ewe, Nkosi, mna ndiyakholwa ukuba wena unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo, lowo uzayo ehlabathini.
43_11_28_Waza etshilo wemka, waya wabiza uMariya umsakwabo ngasese,  wathi, UMfundisi ukho, uyakubiza.
43_11_29_Uthi yena, akuva oko, asuke kamsinya eze kuye.
43_11_30_(Ke kaloku, uYesu ebengekangeni phakathi komzi;  wayesekuloo ndawo uMarta wamhlangabeza ekuyo.)
43_11_31_Athe ngoko amaYuda abenaye endlwini emkhuza, akumbona uMariya, ukuba usuke kamsinya waphuma, amlandela esithi, Uya engcwabeni, ukuya kulila khona.
43_11_32_UMariya ngoko, akufika apho uYesu ebekhona, akumbona, wawa ezinyaweni zakhe, esithi kuye, Nkosi, ukuba ubulapha, ange engafanga umnakwethu.
43_11_33_Uthe ngoko uYesu, akumbona elila, namaYuda abeze naye elila, wafutheka, wakhathazeka.
43_11_34_Wathi, Nimbeke phi na? Bathi kuye, Nkosi, yiza ubone.
43_11_35_UYesu walila.
43_11_36_Ayesithi ngoko amaYuda, Yabonani ke ukumthanda kwakhe!
43_11_37_Ke abathile kuwo bathi, Ubengenako na lo, wawavulayo amehlo emfama, ukwenza ukuba nalo angafi?
43_11_38_Abuye ke uYesu afutheke ngaphakathi kwakhe, eze engcwabeni. Laye ke lingumqolomba, kubekwe ilitye kuwo.
43_11_39_Athi uYesu, Lisuseni ilitye. Athi kuye uMarta, udade wofileyo, Nkosi, uselenuka, kuba untsuku-ne efile.
43_11_40_Athi uYesu kuye, Anditshongo na kuwe ukuthi, Ukuba uthe wakholwa, wolubona uzuko lukaThixo?
43_11_41_Balisusa ngoko ilitye apho abelele khona ofileyo.  Wawaphakamisa ke amehlo uYesu, wakhangela phezulu, wathi, Bawo,  ndiyabulela kuwe kuba undivile.
43_11_42_Mna ke bendisazi ukuba uhleli undiva; ke nditsho ngenxa yesihlwele esixhonteleyo, ukuze bakholwe ukuba wena wandithuma.
43_11_43_Etshilo ke, wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, wathi, Lazaro,  phuma.
43_11_44_Waphuma ofileyo, ebotshiwe iinyawo nezandla ngezithandelo,  nobuso bakhe bujikelwe ngeqhiya. Athi kubo uYesu, Mkhululeni,  nimyeke ahambe.
43_11_45_Ithe ngoko into eninzi kumaYuda, ebize kuMariya,  yakuzibona izinto azenzileyo uYesu, yakholwa kuye.
43_11_46_Ke abathile kuwo bemka baya kubaFarisi, babaxelela izinto azenzileyo uYesu.
43_11_47_Bahlanganisa ngoko ababingeleli abakhulu nabaFarisi intlanganiso yamatyala, bathi, Senza ntoni na? Ngokuba lo mntu wenza imiqondiso emininzi.
43_11_48_Ukuba sithe samyeka ngokunje, bonke baya kukholwa kuye;  athi ke amaRoma eze, athimbe indawo yethu, kwanohlanga lwethu.
43_11_49_Ke kaloku omnye wabo, uKayafa, engumbingeleli omkhulu ngaloo mnyaka, wathi kubo, Anazi nto nina;
43_11_50_kananjalo aniqondi ukuba kusilungele, ukuba kufe umntu abe mnye ngenza yabantu, ukuze lungatshabalali uhlanga luphela.
43_11_51_Oku ke akakuthethanga kuphuma kuye; wathi, kuba ebengumbingeleli omkhulu ngaloo mnyaka, waprofeta ukuba uYesu uza kulufela uhlanga;
43_11_52_kungabi ngenxa yohlanga olo lodwa, kube ngenxa yabantwana bakaThixo abalusali, ukuba abahlanganisele ndawonye.
43_11_53_Kususela kuloo mini ngoko babhunga ukuba bambulale.
43_11_54_Ngoko uYesu akabanga sahamba ekuhleni phakathi kwamaYuda;  wasuka wemka apho, waya ezweni elikufuphi nentlango, emzini ekuthiwa kukwaEfrayim; walibala khona apho nabafundi bakhe.
43_11_55_Ke kaloku yayikufuphi ipasika yamaYuda; kwenyuka into eninzi iphuma kwelo zwe, yaya eYerusalem phambi kwayo ipasika,  ukuze izenze nyulu.
43_11_56_Ayemfuna ngoko uYesu, ethetha odwa, emi etempileni,  esithi, Nithini na? akasayi kuza na emthendelekweni?
43_11_57_Ke kaloku ababingeleli abakhulu nabaFarisi babewise umthetho wokuthi, ukuba umntu uthe wazi apho akhona, maze axele, ukuze bambambe.
43_12_1_UYesu ngoko, kwiintsuku ezintandathu eziphambi kwayo ipasika, weza eBhetani, apho ebekhona uLazaro owayefile,  awamvusayo kwabafileyo.
43_12_2_Ngoko bamenzela isidlo khona, waye uMarta elungiselela;  uLazaro ke ebengomnye wabo babehleli naye besidla.
43_12_3_Wathabatha ke uMariya iponti yamafutha aqholiweyo enadusi engangxengelelweyo, exabiso, likhulu; wathambisa iinyawo zikaYesu, wazisula iinyawo zakhe ngeenwele zakhe; yazala ke indlu livumba lamafutha lawo aqholiweyo.
43_12_4_Uthi ngoko omnye umfundi wakhe, uYuda Sikariyoti, okaSimon,  lowo ubeza kumngcatsha,
43_12_5_Bekungani na ukuba la mafutha aqholiweyo angathengiswa ngeedenariyo ezimakhulu mathathu, kuphiwe amahlwempu?
43_12_6_Watsho ke, kungengakuba ebekhathalele mahlwempu; watsho kuba ebelisela, inaye ingxowa, ziphathwa nguye izinto ezifakwa kuyo.
43_12_7_Uthe ngoko uYesu, Myeke; uwalondolozele imini yokungcwatywa kwam.
43_12_8_Kuba amahlwempu la nihleli ninawo; mna ke anihleli ninam.
43_12_9_Yathi ngoko indimbane enkulu yakumaYuda yakwazi ukuba ulapho; yeza kungengenxa kaYesu yedwa, yeza ukuze ibone noLazaro, lowo wamvusayo kwabafileyo.
43_12_10_Ke kaloku ababingeleli abakhulu babhunga ukuze bambulale noLazaro;
43_12_11_ngokuba ngenxa yakhe abaninzi bamaYuda bemka, bakholwa kuye uYesu.
43_12_12_Ngengomso indimbane enkulu, eyabe ize emthendelekweni,  yakuva ukuba uYesu uyeza eYerusalem,
43_12_13_yathabatha amasebe esundu, yaphuma, yaya kumhlangabeza;  yadanduluka isithi, Hosana! makabongwe lowo uzayo egameni leNkosi, uKumkani kaSirayeli!
43_12_14_UYesu, efumene ke iesilana, wahlala phezu kwalo,  njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,
43_12_15_Musa ukoyika, ntombi Ziyon; nanko ukumkani wakho esiza,  ehleli phezu kwethole le-esile.
43_12_16_Ezi zinto ke abaziqondanga abafundi bakhe ukuqala; bathi kodwa, akuba ezukisiwe uYesu, bandula ukukhumbula ukuba ezi zinto zaye zibhaliwe ngaye, nokuba bazenza ezi zinto kuye.
43_12_17_Yaye ingqina ngoko indimbane leyo, ibe inaye oko wambizayo uLazaro ukuba aphume engcwabeni, wamvusa kwabafileyo.
43_12_18_Ngenxa yoko indimbane yamhlangabeza; ngokuba yayivile ukuba uwenzile lo mqondiso.
43_12_19_Bathe ngoko abaFarisi phakathi kwabo, Niyabona na kodwa ukuba anincedi lutho? Yabonani, ulandelwa lilizwe lonke.
43_12_20_Ke kaloku, kwakukho amaGrike athile kwababenyukile, beze kunqula emthendelekweni.
43_12_21_Wona ngoko eza kuFilipu waseBhetesayida yelaseGalili,  acela kuye, esithi, Nkosi, singa singabona uYesu.
43_12_22_Ufika uFilipu axelele uAndreya; bathi kanjalo ooAndreya noFilipu baxelele uYesu.
43_12_23_Wabaphendula ke uYesu esithi, Lifikile ilixa lokuba uNyana woMntu azukiswe.
43_12_24_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Ukuba ukhozo lwengqolowa oluwe emhlabeni aluthanga lufe, lona luhlala lungabi nto; ke ukuba luthe lwafa, luthwala isiqhamo esininzi.
43_12_25_Lowo uwuthandayo umphefumlo wakhe, wolahlekelwa nguwo;  lowo uwuthiyayo umphefumlo wakhe kweli hlabathi,  wowulondolozela ubomi obungunaphakade.
43_12_26_Ukuba ubani uthi andikhonze, makandilandele; apho ndikhona mna, woba khona apho nondikhonzayo; ukuba umntu uthi andikhonze, uBawo wombeka.
43_12_27_Kukalokunje umphefumlo wam ukhathazekile, mandithini na?  Bawo, ndisindise kweli lixa. Hayi, ndizele khona oku kweli lixa.
43_12_28_Bawo, lizukise igama lakho. Kweza ngoko izwi liphuma ezulwini, lisithi, Ndilizukisile, ndiya kubuya ndilizukise.
43_12_29_Isihlwele ngoko esasimi seva, sathi, Liyaduduma. Abanye bathi, Kuthethe isithunywa sezulu kuye.
43_12_30_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Eli lizwi alibangakho ngenxa yam;  libekho ngenxa yenu.
43_12_31_Kungoku ukugwetywa kwalo eli hlabathi; kungoku umphathi walo eli hlabathi aya kukhutshelwa phandle.
43_12_32_Mna ke, ukuba ndithe ndaphakanyiswa emhlabeni, ndiya kubatsalela bonke kum.
43_12_33_(Wayesitsho ke, eqondisa ukuba kukufa kuni na abeza kufa ngako.)
43_12_34_Samphendula isihlwele sathi, Thina sivile emthethweni,  ukuba uKristu yena uhlala ngonaphakade; utsho ngani na wena ukuthi, UNyana woMntu umelwe kukuthi aphakanyiswe? Ungubani na lo Nyana woMntu?
43_12_35_Uthe ngoko uYesu kubo, Liselilifutshane ixesha lokuba ukhanyiso lube nani. Hambani, nisenalo nje ukhanyiso, ukuze ubumnyama bunganiqubuli; lowo uhamba ebumnyameni, akazi apho aya khona.
43_12_36_Nisenalo nje ukhanyiso, kholwani kulo ukhanyiso, ukuze nibe ngabokhanyiso. Wazithetha uYesu ezi zinto, wemka,  wabazimela.
43_12_37_Ke kaloku, nakuba wayenze imiqondiso engaka phambi kwabo,  abakholwanga kuye;
43_12_38_ukuze ilizwi likaIsaya umprofeti lizaliseke, awalithethayo esithi, Nkosi, ngubani na okholiweyo ludaba lwethu? Nengalo yeNkosi ityhileke kubani na?
43_12_39_Ngenxa yoku babengenako ukukholwa, ngokuba uIsaya ubuya athi,
43_12_40_Uwamfamekisile amehlo abo, Uyiqaqadekisile nentliziyo yabo, Hleze babone ngamehlo, baqiqe ngentliziyo, Bajike,  Ndibaphilise.
43_12_41_Ezi zinto wazithetha uIsaya, oko wabubonayo ubuqaqawuli bakhe, wathetha ngaye.
43_12_42_Noko ke nakubo abaphathi into eninzi yakholwa kuye; kodwa ngenxa yabaFarisi yayingavumi ngamlomo, hleze ikhutshwe esikhungwini;
43_12_43_kuba babethanda uzuko oluvela ebantwini, ngaphezu kozuko oluvela kuThixo.
43_12_44_Ke yena uYesu wadanduluka wathi, Lowo ukholwayo kum,  akakholwa kum, ukholwa kulowo wandithumayo.
43_12_45_Lowo undibonayo, ubona owandithumayo.
43_12_46_Mna, lukhanyiso, ndifikile ehlabathini, ukuze bonke abakholwayo kum bangahlali ebumnyameni.
43_12_47_Nokuba umntu uthe weva amazwi la am, akakholwa, mna andimgwebi; kuba andize kuligweba ihlabathi, ndize kulisindisa ihlabathi.
43_12_48_Lowo undigibayo, angawamkeli amazwi am, unaye omgwebayo;  ilizwi endilithethileyo, lilo eliya kumgweba ngomhla wokugqibela.
43_12_49_Ngokuba mna andithethanga okuphuma kum; owandithumayo,  uBawo ngokwakhe, nguye owandiwisela umthetho wokuba ndithini na, nokuba ndithethe ntoni na.
43_12_50_Ndiyazi nokwazi ukuba umthetho wakhe lowo bubomi obungunaphakade. Ngoko izinto endizithethayo mna, njengoko uBawo andixeleleyo, ndenjenjalo ukuzithetha.
43_13_1_Ke kaloku, phambi komthendeleko wepasika, esazi uYesu ukuba lifikile ilixa lokuba anduluke kweli hlabathi, aye kuYise,  ebathandile abakhe abasehlabathini, wabathanda kwada kwasekupheleni.
43_13_2_Kwakubakho isidlo sangokuhlwa (akubon ukuba uMtyholi selekufakile entliziyweni kaYuda Sikariyoti, okaSimon, ukuba amngcatshe),
43_13_3_esazi uYesu ukuba uYise uzinikele zonke izinto ezandleni zakhe, nokuba waphuma kuThixo, esiya kuThixo:
43_13_4_usuka esidlweni, azibeke phantsi iingubo zakhe, athabathe itawuli abhinqe;
43_13_5_aze agalele amanzi esityeni sokuhlambela, aqale ukuzihlamba iinyawo zabafundi, nokuzisula ngetawuli abeyibhinqile.
43_13_6_Uza ke kuSimon Petros; athi yena kuye, Nkosi, zihlanjwe nguwe na iinyawo zam?
43_13_7_Waphendula uYesu, wathi kuye, Endikwenzayo mna akukwazi wena okwangoku; kodwa wokuqonda kamva.
43_13_8_Athi uPetros kuye, Akusayi kuzihlamba iinyawo zam,  naphakade. Umphendule UYesu, wathi, Ukuba andithanga ndikuhlambe, akunasabelo nam.
43_13_9_Athi uSimon Petros kuye, Nkosi, mazingabi ziinyawo zam zodwa, mazibe zizandla nentloko.
43_13_10_Uthi uYesu kuye, Kulowo uhlanjiweyo akusafuneki nto,  selikukuhlanjwa kweenyawo zodwa; uhlambulukile kwaphela; nani ke nihlambulukile, kodwa aninjalo nonke.
43_13_11_Kuba ebemazi lowo umnikelayo; ngenxa yoko wathi,  Anihlambulukile nonke.
43_13_12_Ngoko, xeshikweni ebezihlambile iinyawo zabo, wazithabatha iingubo zakhe, wabuya wahlala phantsi, wathi kubo, Niyayazi na into endiyenzileyo kuni?
43_13_13_Nina ukundibiza nithi ndinguMfundisi, nithi ndiyiNkosi;  niyalungisa ukutsho, kuba kunjalo.
43_13_14_Ngoko ke, ukuba ndizihlambile iinyawo zenu mna,  ndiyiNkosi, ndinguMfundisi, nani nifanele ukuhlambana iinyawo.
43_13_15_Kuba ndininike umzekelo, ukuze nani nenze, njengoko ndenze ngako mna kuni.
43_13_16_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Akukho mkhonzi umkhulu kunenkosi yakhe, namthunywa umkhulu kunalowo umthumileyo.
43_13_17_Ukuba niyazazi ezi zinto, ninoyolo ukuba nithi nizenze.
43_13_18_Andithethi ngani, nonke; ndiyabazi abo mna ndibanyulileyo;  oko kwenzeke ukuze isibhalo sizaliseke, esithi, Lowo udla isonka nam, undiphakamisele isithende sakhe.
43_13_19_Ndiqala kwangoku ukunixelela kungekehli, ukuze, xa kuthe kwehla, nikholwe ukuba ndinguye.
43_13_20_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Lowo wamkela endithe ndamthuma,  wamkela mna; lowo wamkela mna ke, wamkela owandithumayo.
43_13_21_Ezithethile uYesu ezi zinto, wakhathazeka emoyeni wakhe,  wangqina wathi, Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, omnye kuni aba uya kundingcatsha.
43_13_22_Baye ngoko abafundi bekhangelana, bethingaza ukuba uthetha bani na.
43_13_23_Ke kaloku, bekwayame esifubeni sikaYesu omnye umfundi wakhe, obethandwa nguYesu.
43_13_24_Unqwala ngoko uSimon Petros kulowo, ukuba abuze ukuba angaba uthetha bani na.
43_13_25_Ayamile ke yena esifubeni sikaYesu, uthi kuye, Nkosi,  nguwuphi na?
43_13_26_Uphendule uYesu wathi, Ngulowo ndiya kumnika mna iqhekeza,  ndakuba ndilithe nkxu. Akulithi nkxu iqhekeza, walinika uYuda Sikariyoti, okaSimon.
43_13_27_Waza emveni kweqhekeza elo, wangena uSathana kuye lowo.  Uthi ngoko uYesu kuye, Okwenzayo, kwenze kamsinya.
43_13_28_Ke kaloku, bekungekho namnye, kwababehleli naye esithebeni, ubesazi ukuba utsho ngani na kuye.
43_13_29_Kuba abathile, ekubeni ingxowa ibikuYuda, bebeba uYesu uthi kuye, Thenga ezo zinto sizifunela umthendeleko; mhlawumbi uthi makawanike into amahlwempu.
43_13_30_Elithabathile ngoko yena iqhekeza, waphuma kwaoko; kwaye ke kusebusuku.
43_13_31_Xeshikweni ngoko aphumileyo, uthi uYesu, Kukalokunje,  uNyana woMntu uzukisiwe, naye uThixo uzukisiwe kuye.
43_13_32_Ukuba ke uThixo uzukisiwe kuye, noThixo uya kumzukisa kuye ngokwakhe, waye eya kumzukisa kwangoku.
43_13_33_Bantwana bam, liselilifutshane ixesha lokuba ndibe nani.  Niya kundifuna; njengoko sendithe kumaYuda, Apho ndiya khona mna, aninako ukufika nina: nditsho nakuni ngoku.
43_13_34_Ndiniwisela umthetho omtsha, wokuba nithandane, njengoko ndinithandileyo nina, ukuze nani nithandane.
43_13_35_Ngayo le nto baya kwazi bonke, ukuba ningabafundi bam,  ukuba nithe nathandana.
43_13_36_Wathi uSimon Petros kuye, Nkosi, uya ngaphi na wena?  Umphendule uYesu wathi, Apho ndiya khona, akunakundilandela kalokunje; wondilandela ke kamva.
43_13_37_Uthi uPetros kuye, Nkosi, kungani na ukuba ndingabi nako ukukulandela ngoku? Ndiya kuwuncamela wena umphefumlo wam.
43_13_38_Wamphendula uYesu wathi, Wowuncamela mna na umphefumlo wakho? Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Ayisayi kulila inkuku,  ungathanga undikhanyele kathathu.
43_14_1_Intliziyo yenu mayingakhathazeki; kholwani kuThixo,  nikholwe nakum.
43_14_2_Endlwini kaBawo zininzi iindawo zokuhlala; ukuba bekungenjalo, ngendanixelelayo. Ndiyemka, ndiya kunilungisela indawo;
43_14_3_ukuba ke ndimkile ndaya kunilungisela indawo, ndiya kubuya ndize, ndinamkelele kum ngokwam; ukuze apho ndikhona mna, nibe khona nani.
43_14_4_Apho ke ndiya khona mna niyakwazi, nendlela niyayazi.
43_14_5_Uthi uTomas kuye, Nkosi, asazi apho uya khona; singathini na ke ukuyazi indlela?
43_14_6_Uthi uYesu kuye, Ndim indlela, ndim inyaniso, ndim ubomi;  akukho namnye uzayo kuBawo, engezi ngam.
43_14_7_Ukuba benindazile mna, ninge nimazile noBawo; ngoku ke niyamazi, nimbonile nokumbona.
43_14_8_Athi uFilipu kuye, Nkosi, sibonise uYihlo, kosanelisa.
43_14_9_Uthi uYesu kuye, Ndinaxesha lingakanana ndinani nje,  akukandazi na, Filipu? Lowo undibonileyo mna umbonile uBawo;  utsho ngani na ke wena ukuthi, Sibonise uYihlo?
43_14_10_Akukholwa na ukuba mna ndikuye uBawo, abe ke uBawo ekum?  Amazwi endiwathethayo mna kuni, andiwathethi ephuma kum; uBawo ke ohleli kum, nguye oyenzayo imisebenzi le.
43_14_11_Kholwani ndim, ukuba mna ndikuye uBawo, nokuba uBawo ukum;  okanye ke, kholwani ndim ngenxa yayo imisebenzi leyo.
43_14_12_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Lowo ukholwayo kum, imisebenzi endiyenzayo mna, uya kuyenza naye yena; nemikhulu kunale uya kuyenza, ngokuba mna ndisiya kuye uBawo.
43_14_13_Nento enithe nayicela egameni lam, ndoyenza yona, ukuze uYise azukiswe ngoNyana.
43_14_14_Ukuba nithe nacela into ngegama lam, ndoyenza mna.
43_14_15_Ukuba niyandithanda, yigcineni imithetho yam.
43_14_16_Mna ndiya kucela kuBawo, aze aninike omnye uMthetheleli,  ukuze ahlale nani ngonaphakade:
43_14_17_uMoya wenyaniso, lowo lingenako ihlabathi ukumamkela,  ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi nokumazi. Nina ke niyamazi;  ngokuba uhleli nani, kanjalo uya kuba kuni.
43_14_18_Andiyi kunishiya niziinkedama, ndiyeza kuni.
43_14_19_Liselilifutshane ixesha, ukuze ihlabathi lingabi sandibona; ke nina niyandibona; ngokuba ndisidla ubomi mna,  nani niya kudla ubomi.
43_14_20_Ngaloo mini niya kwazi nina ukuba ndikuye uBawo, nani nikum, nam ndikuni.
43_14_21_Lowo unayo imithetho yam ayigcine, nguye ondithandayo;  lowo ke undithandayo, uya kuthandwa nguBawo; nam ndiya kumthanda, ndizibonakalalise kuye.
43_14_22_Athi kuye uYuda (ingenguye uSikariyoti), Nkosi, kutheni na, le nto uza kuzibonakalalisa kuthi, ungazibonakalalisi kulo ihlabathi?
43_14_23_Waphendula uYesu wathi kuye, Ukuba umntu uyandithanda,  woligcina ilizwi lam; wothi uBawo amthande, size kuye, sihlale naye.
43_14_24_Lowo ungandithandiyo akawagcini amazwi am; ilizwi enilivayo asililo elam, lelikaBawo owandithumayo.
43_14_25_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni ndisahleli nani.
43_14_26_Ke uMthetheleli, uMoya oyiNgcwele, aya kumthuma uBawo egameni lam, yena uya kunifundisa zonke izinto, anikhumbuze zonke izinto endizithethe kuni.
43_14_27_Ndishiya uxolo kuni; ndininika uxolo lwam; andininiki njengokunika kwehlabathi. Mayingakhathazeki intliziyo yenu,  mayingabi nabugwala.
43_14_28_Nivile ukuba ndithe mna kuni, Ndiyemka, ndibuye ndize kuni. Ukuba benindithanda, ngenavuyayo kuba ndathi, Ndiya kuBawo; ngokuba uBawo mkhulu kunam.
43_14_29_Ngoku ke ndinixelele kungekehli, ukuze, xa kuthe kwehla,  nikholwe.
43_14_30_Andisayi kuba sathetha zinto zininzi nani; kuba esiza umphathi weli hlabathi, engenanto nam.
43_14_31_Ke, ukuze liqonde ihlabathi ukuba ndiyamthanda uBawo,  ndenza njengoko uBawo andiwisele umthetho. Vukani, simke apha.
43_15_1_Mna ndingumdiliya wenyaniso, umlimi wawo ke nguBawo.
43_15_2_Amasebe onke akum angathwali siqhamo, uyawasusa; onke athwala isiqhamo uyawathena, ukuze athwale isiqhamo ngakumbi.
43_15_3_Nina nisenihlambulukile, ngenxa yelizwi endilithethileyo kuni.
43_15_4_Hlalani kum, mna ndihlale kuni. Njengokuba isebe lingenako ukuthwala isiqhamo ngokwalo, lingahlalanga emdiliyeni,  ngokunjalo aninako nani, ningahlalanga kum.
43_15_5_Umdiliya ndim, nina ningamasebe; lowo uhleli kum, ndibe mna ndihleli kuye, yena uthwala isiqhamo esininzi; ngokuba,  ningekum, aninakwenza nto.
43_15_6_Ukuba umntu uthe akahlala kum, ulahlelwa phandle njengesebe, ome; baze abantu bawabuthe, bawaphose emlilweni,  atshiswe.
43_15_7_Ukuba nithe nahlala kum, namazwi am ahlala kuni, nocela into enisukuba niyithanda, niyenzelwe..
43_15_8_Uzukiswa uBawo ngale nto, yokuba nithwale isiqhamo esininzi; niya kuba ngabam abafundi ke.
43_15_9_Njengoko uBawo wandithandayo, nam ndanithanda; hlalani ke eluthandweni lwam.
43_15_10_Ukuba nithi niyigcine imithetho yam, hlalani eluthandweni lwam; njengokuba mna ndayigcinayo imithetho kaBawo, ndahlala eluthandweni lwakhe.
43_15_11_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni, ukuze uvuyo lwam luhlale kuni, luthi novuyo lwenu luzaliseke.
43_15_12_Nguwo lo umthetho wam, wokuba nithandane, njengoko ndanithandayo nina.
43_15_13_Akukho namnye unalo uthando olungaphezu kolu, lokuba ubomi bakhe abuncamele izihlobo zakhe.
43_15_14_Nizizihlobo zam nina, ukuba nithi nikwenze konke endinimisela khona mna.
43_15_15_Andisatsho ukuthi ningabakhonzi; ngokuba umkhonzi akakwazi okwenziwa yinkosi yakhe; mna ke ndithe nizizihlobo; ngokuba zonke izinto endaziva kuBawo, ndanazisa zona.
43_15_16_Asinini enanyula mna; ndim owanyula nina, ndanimisela,  ukuze niye nithwale isiqhamo, nokuze isiqhamo senu sihlale;  ukuze oko enithe nakucela kuBawo egameni lam, nikunikwe.
43_15_17_Ndiniwisela lo mthetho wokuba nithandane.
43_15_18_Ukuba ihlabathi linithiyile, yazini ukuba lindithiye kuqala kunani.
43_15_19_Ukuba beningabehlabathi, ihlabathi linge likuthanda okwalo; ke ngokuba ningengabehlabathi, ndaninyulayo mna kulo ihlabathi, ngenxa yoko linithiyile ihlabathi.
43_15_20_Likhumbuleni ilizwi endalithethayo mna kuni, elithi,  Akukho mkhonzi umkhulu kunenkosi yakhe. Ukuba banditshutshisa mna, bonitshutshisa nani; ukuba ilizwi lam baligcina, nelenu boligcina.
43_15_21_Ke ezi zinto zonke baya kuzenza kuni ngenxa yegama lam,  ngokuba bengamazi owandithumayo.
43_15_22_Ukuba bendingezanga ndathetha kubo, ngebengabanga nasono;  ngoku abanasikhuselo sesono sabo.
43_15_23_Lowo uthiye mna, uthiye noBawo.
43_15_24_Ukuba bendingenzanga phakathi kwabo imisebenzi engenziwanga mntu wumbi, ngebengabanga nasono; kaloku ke babonile; noko bandithiyile mna noBawo.
43_15_25_Kwenzeke ukuze lizaliseke ilizwi elibhaliweyo emthethweni wabo, elithi, Bandithiya kungekho sizathu.
43_15_26_Kodwa xa athe wafika uMthetheleli, endiya kumthuma mna kuni evela kuBawo, uMoya wenyaniso ophuma kuBawo, yena wongqina ngam.
43_15_27_Nani ke niyangqina, ngokuba beninam kwasekuqaleni.
43_16_1_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni, ukuze ningakhutyekiswa.
43_16_2_Baya kunigxotha esikhungwini; ewe, kuza ilixa lokuba bonke abanibulalayo, babe bona bakhonza uThixo.
43_16_3_Ezo zinto baya kuzenza kuni, ngokuba bengamazanga uBawo kwanam.
43_16_4_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni, ukuze, xa lithe lafika ilixa,  nizikhumbule ukuba mna ndandinixelele. Ezi zinto ke andinixelelanga kwasekuqaleni, ngokuba bendinani.
43_16_5_Ngoku ke ndiyemka, ndiya kowandithumayo; akukho namnye kuni undibuzayo, athi, Uya phi na?
43_16_6_Ngokuba ke ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni, iintlungu ziyizalisile intliziyo yenu.
43_16_7_Noko ke mna ndinixelela inyaniso; kunilungele ukuba ndimke;  kuba, ndingemkanga, uMthetheleli akayi kuza kuni; ke, ndithe ndemka, ndiya kumthumela kuni.
43_16_8_Efikile ke, uya kulohlwaya ihlabathi lidane, ngenxa yesono,  nangenxa yobulungisa, nangenxa yomgwebo;
43_16_9_ngenxa yesono, ngokokuba bengakholwa kum;
43_16_10_ngenxa yobulungisa, ngokokuba ndisiya kuBawo, ize ningabi sandibona;
43_16_11_ngenxa yomgwebo, ngokokuba umphathi weli hlabathi egwetyiwe.
43_16_12_Ndisenezinto ezininzi zokuthetha kuni, kodwa aninako ukuzithwala ngoku.
43_16_13_Xa ke athe wafika yena uMoya wenyaniso, uya kunikhokelela kuyo yonke inyaniso; kuba engayi kuthetha okuphuma kuye, uya kuthetha izinto athe waziva, anibikele izinto ezizayo.
43_16_14_Yena uya kundizukisa; ngokuba eya kwamkela kokukokwam, aze anibikele ke.
43_16_15_Zonke ezo zinto anazo uBawo zezam; ngenxa yoko ndathi, uya kwamkela kokukokwam, aze anibikele.
43_16_16_Selilixesha elifutshane, ize ningandiboni; kubuye kube lixesha elifutshane, nibuye nindibone, ngokuba mna ndiya kuBawo.
43_16_17_Ithe ngoko inxenye yakubafundi bakhe phakathi kwayo,  Yintoni na le ayithethayo kuthi, athi, Liselilixesha elifutshane, nibuye ningandiboni; kubuye kube lixesha elifutshane, nize nindibone; nokuthi, Mna ndiya kuBawo?
43_16_18_Babesithi ngoko, Yintoni na le ayithethayo, athi, Lixesha elifutshane? Asiyazi into ayithethayo.
43_16_19_Wazi ngoko uYesu ukuba babethanda ukumbuza, wathi kubo,  Nibuzana ngale nto na, yokuba ndithe, Selilixesha elifutshane,  nize ningandiboni; kubuye kube lixesha elifutshane, nibuye nindibone?
43_16_20_Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, niya kulila nihlahlambe, ke lona ihla bathi liya kuvuya; niya kuxhalaba nina, ke ukuxhalaba kwenu kuya kuba luvuyo.
43_16_21_Umfazi xa aza kuzala, uyaxhalaba, ngokuba ilixa lakhe lifikile; xa athe ke wazala umntwana, akabi sayikhumbula loo mbandezelo, ngenxa yovuyo lokuba kuzelwe umntu ehlabathini.
43_16_22_Nani ke ngoko nixhalabile ngokunje; kodwa ndobuya ndinibone; yaye iya kuvuya intliziyo yenu, novuyo lwenu akukho namnye uya kuluhlutha kuni.
43_16_23_Nangaloo mini aniyi kundibuza nto. Inene, inene, ndithi kuni, Zonke izinto enithe nazicela kuBawo egameni lam,  woninika.
43_16_24_Kude kwaba ngokunje, anikaceli nto egameni lam; celani,  niya kwamkela, ukuze uvuyo lwenu luzaliseke.
43_16_25_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni ngokuntsonkotha; kuza ilixa endingasayi kuba sathetha kuni ngokuntsonkotha; ndiya kunibikela ngokusekuhleni ngaye uBawo.
43_16_26_Ngaloo mini niya kucela egameni lam; anditsho kuni ukuthi,  ndiya kunicelela kuBawo;
43_16_27_kuba uBawo ngokwakhe uyanithanda; ngokuba nina nindithandile, nakholwa ukuba mna ndaphuma kuThixo.
43_16_28_Ndaphuma kuBawo, ndeza ehlabathini; ndibuya ndilishiye ihlabathi, ndiye kuBawo.
43_16_29_Bathi kuye abafundi bakhe, Uyabona, ngoku uthetha ngokusekuhleni, akuthethi nto ngakuntsonkotha.
43_16_30_Ngoku siyazi, ukuba uyazazi zonke izinto, akusafuneki kuwe ukuba ubani akubuze nto; ngaloo nto siyakholwa ukuba waphuma kuThixo.
43_16_31_Wabaphendula uYesu wathi, Niyakholwa na ngoku?
43_16_32_Yabonani, kuza ilixa, nakaloku lifikile, lokuba nichithwe,  elowo aye kowabo, nindishiye ndedwa; ukanti andindedwa, ngokuba uBawo unam.
43_16_33_Ezi zinto ndizithethile kuni, ukuze nibe noxolo kum.  Ehlabathini niya kuba nembandezelo; yomelelani, mna ndiloyisile ihlabathi.
43_17_1_Ezi zinto wazithetha uYesu, wawaphakamisa amehlo akhe wakhangela ezulwini, wathi, Bawo, lifikile ilixa; mzukise uNyana wakho, ukuze noNyana wakho akuzukise;
43_17_2_njengokuba wamnika igunya kubantu bonke, ukuze bonke omnike bona, abanike ubomi obungunaphakade.
43_17_3_Bubo ke obu ubomi obungunaphakade, ukuba mabakwazi, wena ukuphela koThixo oyinyaniso, naye uYesu Kristu omthumileyo.
43_17_4_Mna ndikuzukisile emhlabeni, ndiwufezile umsebenzi obundinikile ukuba ndiwenze.
43_17_5_Ndizukise ke ngoku, wena Bawo, kuwe ngokwakho, ngozuko ebendinalo kuwe, lingekabikho ihlabathi.
43_17_6_Ndilibonakalisile igama lakho kubo abantu obundinike bona,  bephuma ehlabathini; babengabakho, wabanika mna; ilizwi lakho balibambile ke.
43_17_7_Ngoku baqondile, ukuba zonke izinto ondinike zona zivela kuwe.
43_17_8_Ngokuba amazwi ondinike wona, ndiwanike bona; bona bawathabatha, baqonda ngokwenyaniso ukuba ndaphuma kuwe;  bakholwa ukuba wena wandithuma.
43_17_9_Mna ndicelela bona; andiceleli lona ihlabathi, ndicelela abo undinike bona; ngokuba bengabakho.
43_17_10_Izinto zonke ezizezam zezakho, zibe ezakho zizezam;  ndizukisekile ke kubo.
43_17_11_Andisekhona ehlabathini, ke bona basesehlabathini; mna ndiza kuwe. Bawo oyingcwele, balondolozele egameni lakho abo undinike bona, ukuze babe banye njengathi.
43_17_12_Oko bendinabo ehlabathini mna, bendibalondolozele egameni lakho; owandinika bona ndibagcinile; akukho namnye kubo utshabaleleyo, ingenguye lowo wentshabalalo, ukuze isibhalo sizaliseke.
43_17_13_Ngoku ke ndiza kuwe; nezi zinto ndizithetha ehlabathini,  ukuze babe nalo uvuyo lwam luzalisekile kubo.
43_17_14_Mna ndibanike ilizwi lakho; laza ihlabathi labathiya,  ngokuba bengengabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi.
43_17_15_Andiceli ukuba ubasuse ehlabathini; ndicela ukuba ubagcine kuyo inkohlakalo.
43_17_16_Abangabo abehlabathi, njengokuba nam ndingenguye owehlabathi.
43_17_17_Bangcwalise ngayo inyaniso yakho; ilizwi lakho liyinyaniso.
43_17_18_Njengokuba wandithuma ehlabathini, nam ndibathume bona ehlabathini.
43_17_19_Ngenxa yabo ke ndiyazingcwalisa mna, ukuze nabo babe ngabangcwalisiweyo yinyaniso.
43_17_20_Andiceleli ke aba bodwa, ndicelela nabo baya kukholwa kum ngelizwi labo;
43_17_21_ukuze bonke babe banye; njengokuba wena, Bawo, ukum, mna ndikuwe, ukuze nabo babe banye kuthi; ukuze ihlabathi likholwe ukuba wena wandithuma.
43_17_22_Uzuko owandinika lona, ndilunike bona; ukuze babe banye,  njengokuba thina sibanye;
43_17_23_mna ndikubo, wena ukum, ukuze babe ngabazalisekileyo ntweni-nye; ukuze liqonde ihlabathi ukuba wena undithumile,  wabathanda, njengokuba wandithandayo nam.
43_17_24_Bawo, ndithanda ukuba nabo abo undinike bona, babe nam,  apho ndikhona mna; ukuze balubone uzuko lwam owandinika lona;  ngokuba wandithanda kwaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi.
43_17_25_Bawo olilungisa, ihlabathi lona alikwazanga, ke mna ndikwazile; naba bathe bazi ukuba wena undithumile;
43_17_26_ndabazisa igama lakho, ndandiya kubazisa; ukuze uthando ondithande ngalo lube kubo, nam ndibe kubo.
43_18_1_Akuzithetha uYesu ezi zinto, waphuma nabafundi bakhe, waya phesheya komlanjana oyiKidron, apho kwakukho umyezo, awangena kuwo yena nabafundi bakhe.
43_18_2_NoYuda ke, lowo umngcatshayo, ubeyazi indawo leyo; kuba uYesu ubesakubutha futhi khona apho nabafundi bakhe.
43_18_3_Athi ngoko uYuda, ethabathe ibutho lamasoldati namadindala kubabingeleli abakhulu nabaFarisi, eze khona enezikhanyiso nezibane neentonga.
43_18_4_Ezazi ngoko uYesu zonke izinto ezimzelayo, waphuma, wathi kubo, Nifuna bani na?
43_18_5_Bamphendula bathi, UYesu umNazarete. Athi kubo uYesu,  Ndinguye. Wabemi ke nabo uYuda, lowo umngcatshayo.
43_18_6_Akutsho ngoko kubo ukuthi, Ndinguye, bahlehla, bawa emhlabeni.
43_18_7_Wabuya ke wababuza esithi, Nifuna bani na? Bathi ke bona,  UYesu umNazarete.
43_18_8_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Ndinixelele ukuba ndinguye; ukuba ngoko nifuna mna, bayekeni aba bemke;
43_18_9_ukuze lizaliseke ilizwi awalithethayo elithi, Kwabo undinike bona, andilahlekwanga namnye.
43_18_10_Uthe ngoko uSimon Petros, enekrele, walirhola, wamxabela umkhonzi wombingeleli omkhulu, wamnqamla indlebe yokunene; laye igama lomkhonzi lowo linguMalko.
43_18_11_Uthe ngoko uYesu kuPetros, Lifake ikrele lakho esingxotyeni salo; indebe andinikileyo uBawo andisayi kuyisela na?
43_18_12_Ibutho ngoko lamasoldati, nomthetheli-waka, namadindala amaYuda, bambamba uYesu, bambopha,
43_18_13_bamrholela kuAnas kuqala; kuba wayengusomfazi kuKayafa,  obengumbingeleli omkhulu ngaloo mnyaka.
43_18_14_Ke kaloku uKayafa wayengulowo wabhunga namaYuda ngokuthi,  Kuyinto elungileyo, ukuba umntu omnye atshabalale ngenxa yabantu.
43_18_15_Ke kaloku uSimon Petros wayemlandela uYesu, naye omnye umfundi. Loo mfundi ke wayesazeka kumbingeleli omkhulu, wangena noYesu entendelezweni yombingeleli omkhulu.
43_18_16_UPetros ke ubemi ngasesangweni ngaphandle. Waphuma ke omnye umfundi, lowo ubesazeka kumbingeleli omkhulu, wathetha nomgcini-sango, wamngenisa uPetros.
43_18_17_Sithi ngoko isicakazana esingumgcini-sango kuPetros,  Ingaba nawe ungowabafundi balo mntu yini na? Athi yena,  Andinguye.
43_18_18_Ke kaloku kwakumi khona abakhonzi namadindala bebase umlilo wamalahle, ngokuba bekubanda; bamana besotha, waye ke uPetros emi nabo esotha.
43_18_19_Umbingeleli omkhulu ngoko wambuza uYesu ngabafundi bakhe,  nangayo imfundiso yakhe.
43_18_20_Wamphendula uYesu wathi, Mna ndathetha ngokungafihlisiyo kulo ihlabathi; mna bendihleli ndifundisa endlwini yesikhungu nasetempileni, apho amaYuda ebesakubuthelana khona, evela kumacala onke; emfihlekweni andithethanga nto.
43_18_21_Yini na ukuba ubuze kum? Buza kwabo bayivileyo into endayithetha kubo; uyabona, aba bayakwazi oko ndakuthethayo.
43_18_22_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba utshilo, elinye lamadindala,  elalimi khona, lammonxoza uYesu, lathi, Wenjenje na ukumphendula umbingeleli omkhulu?
43_18_23_Waliphendula uYesu wathi, Ukuba ndithethe kakubi, ngqinela ububi obo; kodwa ukuba ndithethe kakuhle, undibethelani na?
43_18_24_UAnas wamthumela ebotshiwe kuKayafa umbingeleli omkhulu.
43_18_25_Ke kaloku uSimon Petros wayemi esotha; bathi ngoko kuye,  Ingaba nawe ungowabafundi bakhe yini na? Wakhanyela yena wathi,  Andinguye.
43_18_26_Athi omnye umkhonzi wombingeleli omkhulu, osisalamane salowo uPetros wamnqamla indlebe, Andikubonanga mna Yini na emyezweni unaye?
43_18_27_Wabuya ke wakhanyela uPetros. Yasuka yalila kwaoko inkuku.
43_18_28_Bamsusa ngoko uYesu kuKayafa, bamsa kwindlu yerhuluneli;  bekukusasa ke oko; bona abangenanga endlwini yerhuluneli, ukuze bangadyobheki, ukuze bayidle ipasika.
43_18_29_Waphuma ke uPilato waya kubo, wathi, Nimisa tyala lini na kuye lo mntu?
43_18_30_Baphendula bathi kuye, Ukuba ebengenguye umenzi wobubi yena, singe singamnikelanga kuwe.
43_18_31_Wathi ngoko uPilato kubo, Mthabatheni nina, nimgwebe ngesiko lenu. Athi ngoko amaYuda kuye, Akuvumelekile kuthi ukuba sibulale umntu;
43_18_32_ukuze ilizwi likaYesu lizaliseke awalithethayo, eqondisa ukuba kukufa kuni na abeza kufa ngako.
43_18_33_Wabuya ngoko wangena uPilato endlwini yerhuluneli, wambiza uYesu, wathi kuye, Wena unguye na uKumkani wamaYuda?
43_18_34_Umphendule uYesu, wathi, Uyithetha le nto iphuma kuwe,  wayixelelwa ngabanye ngam, sini na?
43_18_35_Waphendula uPilato wathi, Kanene, mna ndingumYuda na?  Luhlanga lwakowenu nababingeleli abakhulu abakunikeleyo kum;  wenze ntoni na?
43_18_36_Waphendula uYesu wathi, Ubukumkani bam asibubo obeli hlabathi; ukuba bebububo obeli hlabathi ubukumkani bam,  amakhonza am ange ezama, ukuze ndinganikelwa kumaYuda; ngoku ke ubukumkani bam asibobalapha.
43_18_37_Wathi ke uPilato kuye, Hina ke, ungukumkani na wena?  Waphendula uYesu wathi, Nawe uthi ndingukumkani Mna ndizalelwe oku; ndizele oku ehlabathini, ukuze ndiyingqinele inyaniso.  Bonke abangabenyaniso bayaliva ilizwi lam.
43_18_38_Athi uPilato kuye, Yintoni na yona inyaniso? Akuba etshilo, wabuya waphuma waya kumaYuda, athi kuwo, Mna andifumani nalinye ityala kuye.
43_18_39_Ke kaloku ninesiko lokuba ndinikhululele abe mnye ngepasika; ninga ke ndinganikhululela uKumkani wamaYuda na?
43_18_40_Babuya ngoko bonke bankqangaza, besithi, Mayingabi ngulo,  mayibe nguBharabhas. Waye ke uBharabhas lo esisihange.
43_19_1_Waza ngoko uPilato wamthabatha uYesu, wamtyakatya.
43_19_2_Amasoldati, eluke isithsaba ngameva, asibeka phezu kwentloko yakhe, amthi wambu ngengubo ebomvu,
43_19_3_amana esithi, Aa! Kumkani wamaYuda! ammonxoza.
43_19_4_Wabuya ngoko waphuma phandle uPilato; athi kubo, Yabonani,  ndimzisa phandle kuni, ukuze nazi ukuba andifumani nalinye ityala kuye.
43_19_5_Waphuma phandle ngoko uYesu, enxibe isithsaba sameva nengubo ebomvu; athi uPilato kubo, Nanko umntu.
43_19_6_Bathe ngoko, bakumbona ababingeleli abakhulu namadindala,  bankqangaza, besithi, Mbethelele emnqamlezweni! Mbethelele emnqamlezweni! Athi kubo uPilato, Mthabatheni nina,  nimbethelele emnqamlezweni; kuba mna andifumani tyala kuye.
43_19_7_Amphendula amaYuda athi, Thina sinomthetho; ngomthetho wethu ke ufanele ukufa, ngokuba ezenze uNyana kaThixo.
43_19_8_Uthe ngoko uPilato, akuliva elo lizwi, woyika ngakumbi.
43_19_9_Wabuya wangena endlwini yerhuluneli, wathi kuYesu,  Ungowaphi na wena? Ke uYesu akamphendulanga.
43_19_10_Athi ngoko uPilato kuye, Akuthethi na kum? Akwazi na ukuba ndinegunya lokukubethelela emnqamlezweni, nokuba ndinegunya lokukukhulula?
43_19_11_Uphendule uYesu wathi, Unge ungenagunya nakanye kum, ukuba ubungalinikwanga livela phezulu; ngenxa yoko, ondinikeleyo kuwe unesono esikhulu ngakumbi.
43_19_12_Ngenxa yoko wayefuna uPilato ukumkhulula; kodwa amaYuda ayenkqangaza esithi, Ukuba uthe wamkhulula lo, akusihlobo sikaKesare; bonke abazenza ukumkani bachasa uKesare.
43_19_13_Elivile ngoko uPilato eli lizwi, wamzisa phandle uYesu,  wahlala esihlalweni sokugweba kwindawo ekuthiwa, siSandlalo saMatye; ke ngesiHebhere yiGabhata.
43_19_14_Ke kaloku kwakuyimini yokulungiselela ipasika, ilixa ke ngathi lilelesithandathu; athi kumaYuda, Nanko uKumkani wenu!
43_19_15_Ke wona ankqangaza esithi, Susa, susa, mbethelele emnqamlezweni! Athi uPilato kuwo, Ndimbethelele emnqamlezweni na uKumkani wenu? Baphendula ababingeleli abakhulu bathi, Thina asinakumkani ungenguye uKesare.
43_19_16_Wandula ngoko ukumnikela kubo, ukuze abethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
43_19_17_Bamthabatha ke uYesu, bemka naye. Ethwele umnqamlezo wakhe, waphuma waya endaweni ekuthiwa, yeyokakayi, ekuthiwa ngesiHebhere yiGologota,
43_19_18_apho bambethelela khona emnqamlezweni, nabanye naye abangabambi bebabini, ngeenxa zombini, uYesu ke ephakathi.
43_19_19_Ke kaloku uPilato wabhala nombhalo, wawubeka phezu komnqamlezo. Kwaye ke kubhaliwe kwathiwa: uYesu waseNazarete,  uKumkani wamaYuda.
43_19_20_Loo mbhalo ngoko into eninzi yamaYuda yawulesa; ngokuba indawo, uYesu awayebethelelwe kuyo emnqamlezweni, yayikufuphi nomzi; kwaye ke kubhaliwe ngesiHebhere, nangesiGrike,  nangesiRoma.
43_19_21_Babesithi ngoko kuPilato ababingeleli abakhulu bamaYuda,  Musa ukubhala uthi, UKumkani wamaYuda; bhala uthi, Wathi yena,  NdinguKumkani wamaYuda.
43_19_22_Waphendula uPilato wathi, Endikubhalileyo ndikubhalile.
43_19_23_Athe ngoko amasoldati, xa abembethelele emnqamlezweni uYesu, azithabatha iingubo zakhe, enza izabelo ezine, laelo isoldati lanesabelo; kwanengubo yangaphantsi. Ke kaloku, ingubo yangaphantsi yabe ingenamthungo; yayilukiwe iphela, ithabathele phezulu.
43_19_24_Atshono ngoko ukuthi, Masingayikrazuli, masiqashise ngayo ukuba yoba yekabani na; ukuze isibhalo sizaliseke esithi,  Babelana ngeengubo zam, Benza amaqashiso ngesambatho sam.  Amasoldati ke ngoko azenza ezi zinto.
43_19_25_Kwakumi ke ngasemnqamlezweni kaYesu unina, nomsakwabo bonina, uMariya umkaKleyopa, noMariya waseMagadala.
43_19_26_UYesu ngoko, akumbona unina, naye umfundi abemthanda emi khona, uthi kuye unina, Mfazi, nanko unyana wakho!
43_19_27_Andule athi kumfundi lowo, Nanko unyoko! Wathi kwakwelo lixa, umfundi lowo wamthabatha, wamsa kwikhaya lakhe.
43_19_28_Emveni koko, uYesu, esazi ukuba zonke izinto sezifezekile,  ukuze sifezeke isibhalo, wathi, Ndinxaniwe.
43_19_29_Bekumi ke isitya sizele yiviniga; bazalisa ke bona imfunxa ngeviniga; bayibeka phezu kwehisope, bayisa emlonyeni wakhe.
43_19_30_Xa ngoko uYesu wabeyamkele iviniga, wathi, Kugqityiwe!  Wathoba intloko, wawunikela umoya wakhe.
43_19_31_AmaYuda ngoko, ukuze imizimba ingahlali emnqamlezweni ngesabatha, ekubeni yayiyimini yokulungiselela isabatha (kuba loo sabatha ibingumhla omkhulu), acela kuPilato ukuba imilenze yabo yaphulwe, basuswe.
43_19_32_Eza ngoko amasoldati, ayaphula okunene imilenze yowokuqala, neyomnye obebethelelwe emnqamlezweni naye.
43_19_33_Kodwa akufika kuYesu, akubona ukuba uselefile, akayaphula imilenze yakhe.
43_19_34_Lesuka elinye isoldati lamhlaba ngomkhonto ecaleni; kwaoko kwaphuma igazi namanzi.
43_19_35_Nalowo ubonileyo ungqinile, nobungqina bakhe buyinyaniso;  naye yena uyazi ukuba uthetha inyaniso, ukuze nani nikholwe.
43_19_36_Kuba zenzeka ezi zinto, ukuze isibhalo sizaliseke esithi,  Akuyi kutyunyuzwa thambo lakhe.
43_19_37_Kanjalo nesinye isibhalo sithi, Baya kukhangela kulowo bamhlabileyo.
43_19_38_Ke kaloku emveni koko, uYosefu waseArimati (engumfundi kaYesu, ke enguye ngokufihlakeleyo ngenxa yokoyika amaYuda),  wacela kuPilato, ukuba awususe umzimba kaYesu. Waza uPilato wavuma; weza ke wawususa umzimba kaYesu.
43_19_39_Kwafika ke noNikodemo (lowo wezayo kuYesu ebusuku ekuqaleni), ephethe impithikezo yemore nekhala, ngathi iziiponti ezilikhulu ngobunzima.
43_19_40_Bawuthabatha ke umzimba kaYesu, bawubopha ngezisongelo zelinen, ndawonye nobulawu, njengoko kulisiko lokungcwaba kumaYuda.
43_19_41_Ke kaloku, bekukho kuloo ndawo abebethelelwe kuyo emnqamlezweni umyezo; nasemyezweni apho bekukho ingcwaba elitsha, ekungazanga kubekwe mntu kulo.
43_19_42_UYesu ngoko bambeka khona apho, ngenxa yemini yokulungiselela kwamaYuda; ngokuba ingcwaba belikufuphi.
43_20_1_Ke kaloku, ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, kuza engcwabeni uMariya waseMagadala kusasa, kusentsundu, alibone ilitye lisusiwe engcwabeni.
43_20_2_Agidime ngoko, eze kuSimon Petros nakomnye umfundi, lowo ubethandwa nguYesu, athi kubo, Bayisusile iNkosi engcwabeni;  asazi nalapho bayibeke khona.
43_20_3_Waphuma ngoko uPetros nomnye umfundi lowo, besiya engcwabeni.
43_20_4_Ke kaloku baye begidima bona bobabini kunye; waza omnye umfundi lowo wamshiya ngamendu uPetros, wafika kuqala engcwabeni.
43_20_5_Uthi akuqondela, azibone izisongelo zelinen abesongelwe kuzo zizodwa; akangenanga ke noko.
43_20_6_Afike ngoko uSimon Petros emlandela, angene engcwabeni,  azibone izisongelo zelinen abesongelwe kuzo zizodwa;
43_20_7_neqhiya ebisentlokweni yakhe, ingadibene neelinen abesongelwe kuzo, isongiwe yodwa ndaweni ithile.
43_20_8_Wandula ngoko wangena nomnye umfundi, lowo ubefike kuqala engcwabeni, wabona, wakholwa;
43_20_9_kuba babengekasazi isibhalo esithi, umelwe kukuthi avuke kwabafileyo.
43_20_10_Babuya ngoko abafundi bagoduka.
43_20_11_Ke kaloku uMariya ebemi ngaphandle ngasengcwabeni, elila;  xa ke ebelila, waqondela engcwabeni.
43_20_12_Wabona izithunywa zezulu ezibini, zam bethe ezimhlophe,  zihleli; esinye ngasentloko, esinye ngasezinyaweni, apho wawulele khona umzimba kaYesu.
