43_20_13_Zithi zona kuye, Mfazi, ulilelani na? Athi kuzo;  Bayisusile iNkosi yam; andazi apho bayibeke khona.
43_20_14_Akutsho wajika, wambona uYesu emi; wayengazi ke ukuba nguYesu.
43_20_15_Athi uYesu kuye, Mfazi, ulilelani na? ufuna bani na? Yena,  esiba ngumgcini-myezo, uthi kuye, Nkosi, ukuba umsusile apha,  ndixelele apho umbeke khona; mna ndiye kumthabatha.
43_20_16_Athi uYesu kuye, Mariya! Wajika yena wathi kuye, Rabhoni!  (oku kukuthi, Mfundisi).
43_20_17_Uthi uYesu kuye, Ungandichukumisi; kuba andikanyuki ndiye kuBawo; ke yiya kubazalwana bam, uthi kubo, Ndiyenyuka, ndiya kuBawo, kuYihlo; kuThixo wam, kuThixo wenu.
43_20_18_Afike uMariya waseMagadala, ababikele abafundi ukuba uyibonile iNkosi; yathetha ezi zinto kuye.
43_20_19_Kwakuhlwa ngoko, ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, zakubon ukuba iingcango zivaliwe, apho babehlanganisene khona abafundi,  ngenxa yokoyika amaYuda, wafika uYesu wema phakathi, wathi kubo, Uxolo malube nani. Akutsho, wababonisa izandla necala lakhe.
43_20_20_Bavuya ngoko abafundi bakuyibona iNkosi.
43_20_21_Waphinda ngoko uYesu wathi kubo, Uxolo malube nani;  njengokuba uBawo endithumile mna, nam ndiyanithuma nina.
43_20_22_Akutsho wabaphefumlela, wathi kubo, Yamkelani uMoya oyiNgcwele;
43_20_23_abazono nithe nazixolela, bazixolelwe; nabazono nithe nazibamba, zibambekile.
43_20_24_Ke kaloku uTomas, omnye kwabalishumi elinababini, okuthiwa nguDidimo, wayengenabo oko wafikayo uYesu.
43_20_25_Babesithi ngoko kuye abanye abafundi, Siyibonile iNkosi.  Wathi ke yena kubo, Ukuba andithanga ndilibone inxeba lezikhonkwane ezandleni zayo, ndiwufake umnwe wam enxebeni lezikhonkwane, ndisifake isandla sam ecaleni layo, andisayi kukholwa.
43_20_26_Baye emveni kweentsuku ezisibhozo bekwangaphakathi abafundi bakhe; wayenabo noTomas. Afike uYesu, zakubon ukuba zivaliwe iingcango, eme phakathi, athi, Uxolo malube nani.
43_20_27_Andule athi kuTomas, Ethe apha umnwe wakho, uzibone izandla zam; ethe isandla sakho, usifake ecaleni lam; musa ukuba ngongakholwayo, yiba ngokholwayo.
43_20_28_Uphendule uTomas, wathi kuye, Nkosi yam, Thixo wam!
43_20_29_Athi uYesu kuye, Ngokuba undibonile, Tomas, ukholiwe.  Banoyolo abo bangabonanga, bakholwa noko.
43_20_30_Mininzi ke okunene neminye imiqondiso awayenzayo uYesu emehlweni abafundi bakhe, engabhalwanga kuyo le ncwadi;
43_20_31_kodwa le ibhalelwe ukuze nikholwe ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu, uNyana kaThixo, nokuze nithi, nikholwa, nibe nabo ubomi egameni lakhe.
43_21_1_Emva koko waphinda uYesu wazibonakalalisa kubafundi ngaselwandle lwaseTibheriya. Wenjenje ke ukuzibonakalalisa.
43_21_2_Babendawonye uSimon Petros, noTomas okuthiwa nguDidimo,  noNataniyeli waseKana yelaseGalili, nabakaZebhedi, nabanye kubafundi bakhe bebabini.
43_21_3_Athi uSimon Petros kubo, Ndiya kubambisa iintlanzi. Bathi kuye, Nathi siyaya nawe. Baphuma bangena emkhombeni kwaoko.  Ngobo busuku ababamba nto.
43_21_4_Ke kaloku, kwakuba sekusile, wema uYesu elunxwemeni; noko abafundi bebengazi ukuba nguYesu.
43_21_5_Athi ngoko uYesu kubo, Bantwana, aninanto idliwayo na?  Bamphendula bathi, Hayi.
43_21_6_Wathi ke yena kubo, Wuphoseni umnatha ngecala lasekunene lomkhombe, nofumana. Baphosa ke; ababa saba nako ukuwutsala,  ngenxa yenkitha yeentlanzi.
43_21_7_Athi ngoko loo mfundi ubethandwa nguYesu kuPetros, YiNkosi.  Uthe ngoko uSimon Petros, akuva ukuba yiNkosi, wabhinqa ingubo yokwaleka (kuba ebeze), waziphosa elwandle.
43_21_8_Ke kaloku abanye abafundi beza ngomkhonjana (kuba bebengemgama emhlabeni, ngathi bebekubhite zimakhulu mabini),  bewuzizilizisa umnatha weentlanzi.
43_21_9_Bathi ngoko, bakuwelela emhlabeni, babona umlilo wamalahle ukhona, nentlanzi ikuwo, nesonka.
43_21_10_Athi uYesu kubo, Zisani kwezo ntlanzi nizibambise ngokunje.
43_21_11_Wangena emkhombeni uSimon Petros, wawutsalela emhlabeni umnatha, uzele ziintlanzi ezinkulu, zilikhulu elinamanci mahlanu anantathu; nakuba bezingako njalo, awujacekanga umnatha.
43_21_12_Athi uYesu kubo, Yizani nomule. Akubangakho namnye ke kubafundi waba nabuganga bakumbuza esithi, Ungubani na? besazi nje ukuba yiyo iNkosi.
43_21_13_Uza ke uYesu, asithabathe isonka, abanike, ayenjenjalo nentlanzi.
43_21_14_Oku sekukokwesithathu ezibonakalalisa uYesu kubafundi bakhe, evukile kwabafileyo.
43_21_15_Bathi ke bakomula, athi uYesu kuSimon Petros, Simon kaYona, uyandithanda na ngaphezu kwaba? Athi kuye, Ewe, Nkosi,  uyazi wena ukuba ndiyakuthanda. Athi kuye, Dlisa amatakane am.
43_21_16_Aphinde athi kuye okwesibini, Simon kaYona, uyandithanda na? Athi kuye, Ewe, Nkosi, uyazi wena ukuba ndiyakuthanda. Athi kuye, Yalusa izimvu zam.
43_21_17_Athi kuye okwesithathu, Simon kaYona, uyandithanda na?  Waba buhlungu uPetros, kuba ethe kuye okwesithathu,  Uyandithanda na? Wathi kuye, Nkosi, uyazazi izinto zonke wena;  uyaqonda wena ukuba ndiyakuthanda. Athi uYesu kuye, Dlisa izimvu zam.
43_21_18_Inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, Oko ubusemtsha ubuzibhinqisa ngokwakho, uhambe apho uthanda khona; kodwa xa uthe waluphala,  uya kuzolula izandla zakho, ubhinqiswe ngomnye, akuse apho ungathandiyo.
43_21_19_Wakutsho ke oku, eqondisa ukuba kukufa kuni na abeya kuzukisa uThixo ngako. Akutsho wathi kuye, Ndilandele.
43_21_20_Ejikile ke uPetros, ubone umfundi obethandwa nguYesu elandela: lowo wayayame esifubeni sakhe esidlweni, wathi,  Nkosi, ngubani na okunikelayo?
43_21_21_UPetros akumbona lowo, uthi kuYesu, Nkosi, lo woba yini na?
43_21_22_Athi uYesu kuye, Ukuba ndithi ndithande ukuba yena ahlale ndide ndifike, iyini na loo nto kuwe? Landela mna wena.
43_21_23_Laphuma ngoko eli lizwi, laya kubazalwana, ukuba loo mfundi akayi kufa. Waye uYesu engatshongo kuye ukuthi, Akayi kufa; wathi, Ukuba ndithi ndithande ukuba yena ahlale ndide ndifike, iyini na loo nto kuwe?
43_21_24_Nguye lo umfundi ongqinayo ngezi zinto, wazibhala ezi zinto; kanjalo siyazi ukuba ubungqina bakhe buyinene.
43_21_25_Kukho ke nezinye izinto ezininzi awazenzayo uYesu;  ezingathi zithe zabhalwa ngazinye, ndithi nehlabathi eli alingezibambi iincwadi ezo zingabhalwayo. Amen.
44_1_1_Eyokuqala imbali, Tiyofilo, ndayenza kambe ndibalisa ngezinto zonke awaqala ngazo uYesu ukuzenza kwanokuzifundisa,
44_1_2_kwada kwayimini awanyuswa ngayo, akuba ebawisele umthetho ngoMoya oyiNgcwele abapostile awayebanyule;
44_1_3_awathi kanjalo, emveni kokuva kwakhe ubunzima, wazimisa ephilile phambi kwabo, ngeziganeko ezininzi, ezibonakalalisa ngokwakhe kubo kwiintsuku ezimashumi mane, ethetha izinto ezingabo ubukumkani bukaThixo.
44_1_4_Uthe, ehlanganisene nabo, wabathethela ngelithi,  mabangahlukani neYerusalem; mabalinde idinga loYise, awathi ukuthetha, Naliva kum;
44_1_5_ngokuba uYohane okunene wabhaptiza ngamanzi; kodwa nina niya kubhaptizwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, kungekabi kade emva kwezi ntsuku.
44_1_6_Bona ke ngoko, bebuthelene, babembuza besithi, Nkosi,  wobubuyisela ngeli xesha na ubukumkani kuSirayeli?
44_1_7_Uthe ke kubo, Asikokwenu ukwazi amaxesha nokuba ngamathuba,  awamise ngelakhe igunya uBawo.
44_1_8_Niya kwamkela ke amandla, akubon ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uhlile phezu kwenu; nibe ngamangqina am eYerusalem, kwanakulo lonke elakwaYuda nelaseSamariya, kude kuse nasekupheleni komhlaba.
44_1_9_Waza etshilo, bakubon ukuba bakhangele, wafukulwa; lathi ilifu lemka naye emehlweni abo.
44_1_10_Bakuba beqwalasele ezulwini, akubon ukuba uyemka,  kwabonakala kumi ngakubo amadoda amabini eneengubo ezimhlophe,
44_1_11_awatshoyo ukuthi, Madoda, maGalili, nimeleni na nondele ezulwini? Kwayena lo Yesu unyusiweyo kuni, wasiwa emazulwini,  uya kuza ngolu hlobo nimbone esiya ngalo emazulwini.
44_1_12_Baza babuyela eYerusalem, bevela entabeni ekuthiwa yeyemiNquma, ekufuphi kwiYerusalem, uhambo lwesabatha.
44_1_13_Bathe ke bakungena, banyukela egumbini eliphezulu ababehlala kulo, inguPetros, noYakobi, noYohane, noAndreya,  uFilipu, noTomas, uBhartolomeyu, noMateyu, noYakobi ka-Alifeyu,  noSimon umZeloti, noYuda umzalwana kaYakobi.
44_1_14_Aba bonke babezingisa ngamxhelo mnye ekuthandazeni nasekukhungeni, ndawonye nabafazi, noMariya unina kaYesu,  kwandawonye naba zalwana bakhe.
44_1_15_Ngaloo mihla wesuka wema uPetros phakathi kwabo abazalwana (laye inani lamagama ndawonye lingathi lilikhulu elinamanci amabini), wathi,
44_1_16_Madoda, bazalwana, esi sibhalo simelwe kukuba sizaliseke,  sathethwayo ngaphambili nguMoya oyiNgcwele ngomlomo kaDavide ngaye uYuda, owaba ngumkhokeli kwabo bambambayo uYesu;
44_1_17_ngokuba wayebalelwe kuthi, wasizuza isabelo solu lungiselelo.
44_1_18_Lowo ke ngoko wazuza umhlaba ngomvuzo wokungalungisi; wathi ekhahleleke phantsi ngobuso, wagqabhuka phakathi, zaphalala zonke izibilini zakhe.
44_1_19_Kwazeka oko kubo bonke abemiyo eYerusalem, wada loo mhlaba ngeyabo intetho kwathiwa yiAkeldama, oko kukuthi, ngumhlaba wegazi.
44_1_20_Kuba kubhaliwe encwadini yeeNdumiso kwathiwa, Umzi wakhe mawube yintlango, Kungabikho umiyo kuwo; Buthi nobuveleli bakhe buthatyathwe ngomnye.
44_1_21_Ngoko, kuwo amadoda abehamba nathi, ngalo lonke ixesha ebingena iphuma phakathi kwethu iNkosi uYesu,
44_1_22_iqalele elubhaptizweni lukaYohane, yada yayimini eyanyuswa ngayo kuthi, kumele ukuba kubekho enye kuwo eba lingqina lokuvuka kwayo, kunye nathi.
44_1_23_Bamisa mabini, uYosefu, okuthiwa nguBharsabhas, ogama limbi linguYusto, noMatiya.
44_1_24_Bathandaza bathi, Wena, Nkosi, Mazi weentliziyo zabo bonke,  yalatha kwaba babini oyena umnyulileyo,
44_1_25_ukuba asithabathe isabelo solu lungiselelo nobupostile,  awaphambukayo kubo uYuda, ukuze aye kweyakhe indawo.
44_1_26_Bawisa amaqashiso abo; lathi iqashiso laphuma noMatiya;  wabalelwa ndawonye nabapostile abalishumi elinamnye.
44_2_1_Ke kaloku, ekuzalisekeni kwawo umhla wepentekoste, baye bonke bemxhelo mnye ndaweni-nye.
44_2_2_Kwaza ngequbuliso kwaphuma ezulwini isandi esinjengesomoya ovuthuza ngamandla, sayizalisa indlu yonke ababehleli kuyo.
44_2_3_Kwabonakala kubo iilwimi ezabekayo, ngathi zezomlilo, lwaolo lwahlala phezu kwabo bonke ngabanye.
44_2_4_Bazaliswa bonke nguMoya oyiNgcwele, baqala ukuthetha ngalwimi zimbi, njengoko uMoya wayebanika ukuba bathethe baphimisele.
44_2_5_Ke kaloku kwakumi eYerusalem apho amaYuda, amadoda awoyika uThixo, evela kuzo zonke iintlanga eziphantsi kwezulu.
44_2_6_Sithe ke sakubakho esi sandi, yabuthelana inkitha,  yadubadubeka, ngokuba bonke ngabanye babebeva bona bethetha ngezakomawabo iintetho.
44_2_7_Bathi nqa ke bonke, bamangaliswa, wathi omnye komnye, Kanene aba bonke bathethayo asingamaGalili na?
44_2_8_Kutheni na ke ukuba sibeve nje sonke ngabanye bethetha ngezakomawethu iintetho, esazalelwa kuzo?
44_2_9_Thina maParti, namaMedi, namaElam, nathi simiyo kwelaseMesopotami, kwelakwaYuda kwanakwelaseKapadoki,  kwelasePonto nakwelaseAsiya,
44_2_10_kwelaseFrigi kwanakwelasePamfili, kwelaseYiputa,  nasemacaleni elaseLibhi ngaseKirene, nathi bahambi baseRoma,  singamaYuda kwanabangeni ebuYudeni,
44_2_11_thina maKrete nama-Arabhi, sibeva bona bezithetha ngezakomawethu iilwimi izinto ezinkulu zikaThixo.
44_2_12_Bathi nqa ke bonke, bakhohlwa, omnye esithi komnye, Azi,  ingaba ifuna ukuba yintoni na le nto?
44_2_13_Abanye ke babehlekisa ngabo, besithi, Bahluthi yiwayini enencasa.
44_2_14_Ke kaloku uPetros, esuke wema nabalishumi elinamnye,  waliphakamisa izwi lakhe, waphimisela ukuthetha, wathi kubo:  Madoda, maYuda, nani nonke nimiyo eYerusalem, makwazeke oku kuni, niwabekele iindlebe amazwi am.
44_2_15_Aba abanxilile, njengoko nina niba kunjalo, kuba kuselilixa lesithathu lemini.
44_2_16_Oku khona koko kuthethiweyo ngomprofeti uYoweli, kwathiwa,
44_2_17_Kuya kuthi ngayo imihla yokugqibela, utsho uThixo,  Ndimthulule uMoya wam phezu kwayo yonke inyama, Baprofete oonyana benu neentombi zenu, Athi amadodana enu abone imibono,  Namadoda enu amakhulu aphuphe amaphupha;
44_2_18_Ewe, ndaye, phezu kwabakhonzi bam, naphezu kwabakhonzazana bam, ngaloo mihla Ndiya kumthulula uMoya wam, baprofete;
44_2_19_Ndenze izimanga ezulwini phezulu, Nemiqondiso emhlabeni phantsi, Igazi, nomlilo, nentshinyela yomsi.
44_2_20_Ilanga liya kusuka libe mnyama, Ithi inyanga ibe ligazi;  Phambi kokuba ize imini yeNkosi, Leyo inkulu ibalulekileyo.
44_2_21_Baya kuthi bonke abasukuba belinqula igama leNkosi basindiswe.
44_2_22_Madoda, maSirayeli, waveni la mazwi: UYesu waseNazarete,  indoda eqondakalisiweyo nguThixo kuni ngemisebenzi yamandla,  nangezimanga, nangemiqondiso, awayenzayo uThixo ngayo phakathi kwenu, njengokuba nisazi nani ngokwenu:
44_2_23_yena lowo, ekhutshwe ngecebo elimisiweyo likaThixo nangokwazi kwakhe kwenxa engaphambili, namthabatha ngezandla zabachasene nomthetho, nambethelela emnqamlezweni, namsika;
44_2_24_athe uThixo wamvusa, eyikhulule inimba yokufa; ngokokuba ebengenako ukubanjwa kuko.
44_2_25_Kuba uDavide uthi, esingisele kuye, Ndahlala ndiyibona iNkosi phambi kwamehlo am, Ngokuba ingasekunene kwam, ukuze ndingashukunyiswa.
44_2_26_Ngenxa yoko intliziyo yam yaba nemihlali, lwagcoba ulwimi lwam; Ngaphezu koko ke nenyama yam iya kuphumla inethemba;  Ngokuba akuyi kuwushiya umphefumlo wam kwelabafileyo.
44_2_27_Kananjalo akuyi kumnikela oyiNgcwele wakho ekuboneni ukubola.
44_2_28_Wandazisa iindlela zobomi; Uya kundizalisa ngemihlali ngokubona ubuso bakho.
44_2_29_Madoda, bazalwana, mandivunyelwe ndithethe kuni ngokuphandle ngomawokhulu uDavide, ukuba wafa wangcwatywa;  nengcwaba lakhe likho phakathi kwethu unanamhla.
44_2_30_Ngoko, kuba engumprofeti, esazi nokwazi ukuba uThixo wamfungela isifungo sokuba esiqhameni sesinqe sakhe ngokwenyama uya kuvelisa uKristu, ukuba ahlale phezu kwetrone yakhe:
44_2_31_uthe ebona ngenxa engaphambili, wathetha ngako ukuvuka kukaKristu, ukuba umphefumlo wakhe ungashiywanga kwelabafileyo nenyama yakhe ingabonanga kubola.
44_2_32_UThixo wamvusa lo Yesu, esingamangqina ako oko thina sonke.
44_2_33_Ephakanyisiwe ngoko sisandla sokunene sikaThixo, elamkele kanjalo idinga loMoya oyiNgcwele kuYise, uthulule oku nikubonayo, nikuvayo, kalokunje nina.
44_2_34_Kuba uDavide, enganyukanga waya emazulwini, ke uthi ngokwakhe, Yathi iNkosi eNkosini yam, Hlala ngasekunene kwam,
44_2_35_Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho.
44_2_36_Ngoko mayazi ngokuqinisekileyo yonke indlu kaSirayeli,  ukuba uThixo wamenza iNkosi noKristu, kwayena lo Yesu nambethelelayo emnqamlezweni nina.
44_2_37_Ke kaloku bathe, bakukuva oko, bahlabeka entliziyweni,  bathi kuPetros nakwabanye abapostile, Madoda, bazalwana,  sithini na?
44_2_38_Uthe ke uPetros kubo, Guqukani nibhaptizwe nonke ngabanye egameni likaYesu Kristu, ukuze nixolelwe izono, namkele isipho soMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_2_39_Kuba idinga likuni, nakubantwana benu, nakubo bonke abakude, esukuba iNkosi uThixo wethu iya kubabiza.
44_2_40_Nangamanye amazwi amaninzi wayeqononondisa, evuselela esithi, Zisindiseni kwesi sizukulwana sigoso.
44_2_41_Bathe ke ngoko, abalamkele ilizwi lakhe ngovuyo,  babhaptizwa; kongezelelwa ngaloo mini imiphefumlo engathi imawaka mathathu.
44_2_42_Baye ke bezingisa ukuhlala emfundisweni yabapostile,  nasebudlelaneni, nasekuqhekezeni isonka, nasemithandazweni.
44_2_43_Ke kaloku kwabakho ukoyika kwimiphefumlo yonke; kwenzeka izimanga ezininzi kwanemiqondiso ngabapostile.
44_2_44_Bonke ke ababekholwa babendawonye, benobudlelane ngeento zonke.
44_2_45_Baye bethengisa nangemihlaba nangempahla yabo, babele bonke, njengoko ebethi ubani aswele ngako.
44_2_46_Babezingisa ukuhlala bemxhelo mnye etempileni imihla ngemihla, beqhekeza isonka kwizindlu ngezindlu, besidla ukudla benemigcobo, benolungelelwano lwentliziyo,
44_2_47_bemdumisa uThixo, benonelelwe ngabantu bonke. Yaye iNkosi isongeza abasiNdiswayo imihla ngemihla kulo ibandla.
44_3_1_Ke kaloku, uPetros, noYohane babenyuka bendawonye, besiya etempileni ngexesha lomthandazo, ililixa lesithoba.
44_3_2_Kwaye ke kuthwelwe ndoda ithile, ibisisiqhwala kwasekuzalweni kwayo, ababeyibeka imihla ngemihla emnyango wetempile, lowo kuthiwa Mhle, ukuba icele amalizo kwabangenayo etempileni;
44_3_3_eyathi, yakubona uPetros noYohane beza kungena etempileni,  yacela ukuba bayilize.
44_3_4_Uthe ke uPetros, enoYohane, eqwalasele kuyo wathi, Khangela kuthi apha.
44_3_5_Yabagqala ke, ilinde ukwamkela into kubo.
44_3_6_Wathi ke uPetros, Isilivere negolide andinayo, kodwa endinako ndikunika khona: egameni likaYesu Kristu umNazarete,  vuka uhambe.
44_3_7_Wayibamba ngesandla sokunene, wayivusa; zomelezeka ke kwalapho iinyawo zayo namaqatha ayo.
44_3_8_Yesuka umtsi, yema, yahambahamba, yangena nabo etempileni,  ihambahamba itsiba, imdumisa uThixo.
44_3_9_Baza bonke abantu bayibona ihambahamba, idumisa uThixo;
44_3_10_bayazi nokuyazi, ukuba ingulowa ubehlalela amalizo eMnyango oMhle wetempile, bathi qhiphu umbilini, bathi nqa yiloo nto ihlileyo kuyo.
44_3_11_Ke kaloku, sakubon ukuba isiqhwala esiphilisiweyo sibabambe ngesandla ooPetros noYohane, bonke abantu babalekela kubo evarandeni ekuthiwa yekaSolomon, beqhiphuke umbilini kakubi.
44_3_12_Akukubona ke oko uPetros, waphendula wathi kubo abantu,  Madoda, maSirayeli, yini na ukuba nimangaliswe yile nto?  Kanjalo yini na ukuba nisijonge, ngathi simenze wahamba ngawethu amandla, nangokwethu ukuhlonela uThixo?
44_3_13_UThixo wooAbraham noIsake noYakobi, uThixo woobawo bethu,  umzukisile umkhonzi wakhe uYesu, enamnikelayo, namkhanyela ebusweni bukaPilato nina, akubon ukuba yena ugwebe ngelithi,  makakhululwe.
44_3_14_Ke nina namkhanyela oyiNgcwele, oliLungisa, nacela ukuba ninikwe indoda engumbulali.
44_3_15_Ke yona iMbangi yobomi nayibulala; awayivusayo uThixo kwabafileyo, esingamangqina ako oko thina.
44_3_16_Nangenxa yokukholwa kwigama layo, lo nimbonayo, nimaziyo,  limomelezile igama layo; lwathi ukholo olungayo lwamnika oku kuphila kupheleleyo phambi kwenu nonke.
44_3_17_Nangoku, bazalwana, ndiyazi ukuba nenze ngokungazi,  njengabo nabo abaphathi benu.
44_3_18_Ke uThixo, izinto awazixela ngenxa engaphambili ngomlomo wabo bonke abaprofeti bakhe, zokuba uKristu eve ubunzima,  uzizalisile wenjenje.
44_3_19_Guqukani ke ngoko, nibuye, ukuze zicinywe izono zenu;  ngokokuze afike amathuba okuphumza, evela ebusweni beNkosi;
44_3_20_ithume uYesu Kristu, owayevakalisiwe kuni ngenxa engaphambili;
44_3_21_lowo kumele okunene ukuba amazulu amamkele, kude kufike amaxesha okubuyiswa kweento zonke, awawathethayo uThixo ngomlomo wabo bonke abaprofeti bakhe abangcwele, kususela kunaphakade.
44_3_22_Kuba uMoses okunene wathi koobawo, INkosi uThixo wenu iya kunivelisela umprofeti kubazalwana benu, onjengam nje; ze nimve yena kuzo zonke izinto asukuba eya kuzithetha kuni.
44_3_23_Yothi ke yonke imiphefumlo engathanga imve loo mprofeti,  ibhujiswe kuphele phakathi kwabantu.
44_3_24_Nabo ke bonke abaprofeti, bethabathela kuSamuweli nakwabalandelayo, bonke abathethileyo, bayixela loo mihla ngenxa engaphambili.
44_3_25_Nina ningoonyana babo abaprofeti, nabomnqophiso awanqophisana ngawo noobawo bethu uThixo, esithi kuAbraham,  Yaye ke iya kusikeleleka embewini yakho yonke imizalwane yehlabathi.
44_3_26_Uthe uThixo, akuba emvusile umkhonzi wakhe uYesu, wamthuma kuni kuqala, ukuba anisikelele ngokuniguqula nonke ngabanye kwiinkohlakalo zenu.
44_4_1_Bakubon ukuba bayathetha kubo abantu, ababingeleli,  nomphathi wetempile, nabaSadusi, bathi gaga phezu kwabo,
44_4_2_bebindekile ngenxa yokuba befundisa abantu, bekuxela ukuvuka kubo abafileyo ngoku kukaYesu ukuvuka.
44_4_3_Babesa izandla, babafaka entolongweni, kwada kwaba lingomso;  kuba bekuse kuhlwile.
44_4_4_Ke kaloku into eninzi yabo babelivile ilizwi, yakholwa;  lathi inani lamadoda langa limawaka mahlanu.
44_4_5_Kwathi ke ngengomso, kwahlanganiselana eYerusalem abaphathi babo, namadoda amakhulu, nababhali,
44_4_6_noAnas umbingeleli omkhulu, noKayafa, noYohane,  noAlesandire, nabo bonke abomlibo wombingeleli omkhulu.
44_4_7_Bathe bakuba bebamise phakathi, bababuza besithi, Le nto nina niyenze ngamandla mani na, nangagama lini na?
44_4_8_Wandula uPetros, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele, wathi kubo, Nina baphathi babantu, nani madoda makhulu akwaSirayeli,
44_4_9_ukuba thina namhlanje sincinwa ngomsebenzi wokumsiza umntu ongumlwelwe, ukuba uthiweni na ukusindiswa:
44_4_10_makwazeke kuni nonke, nakubo bonke abantu bakwaSirayeli,  ukuba kusegameni likaYesu Kristu waseNazarete, enambethelelayo emnqamlezweni nina, athe uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo; kungaye lowo, ukuba lo mntu eme apha phambi kwenu ephilile.
44_4_11_Nguye lo ilitye elenziwa into engento nini bakhi, elisuke laba yintloko yembombo.
44_4_12_Kananjalo usindiso alukho kuwumbi; kuba akukho gama limbi phantsi kwezulu, linikiweyo phakathi kwabantu, esimele ukusindiswa ngalo.
44_4_13_Ke kaloku, bakubona ukungafihlisikuthetha koPetros noYohane, beqiqa nokuba ngabantu abangenamfundo, abangenakwazi,  bamangaliswa; babaqonda ukuba babenaye uYesu.
44_4_14_Bakumbona ke umntu emi nabo, yena lowo uphilisiweyo,  ababanga nandawo yakuphika.
44_4_15_Bakuba bethe mabaphume entlanganisweni yamatyala,  bacebisana bodwa, besithi, Siya kubathini na aba bantu?
44_4_16_Kuba okunene, ukuba kuhle ngabo umqondiso owazekayo, oyinto ebonakalayo kubo bonke abemi eYerusalem, nathi asinakuyikhanyela loo nto.
44_4_17_Ukuze ke loo nto ingahlakazeki ngakumbi ebantwini, masise sibasongela ngelokuba bangabi sathetha mntwini ngeli gama.
44_4_18_Bebabizile, babathethela ngelithi, mabangabi sakhankanya nakanye, bangafundisi nokufundisa ngegama likaYesu.
44_4_19_Ke kaloku uPetros noYohane baphendula, bathi kubo,  Yahlulani nina, ukuba bubulungisa na emehlweni kaThixo ukuva nina, kunokuva uThixo;
44_4_20_kuba singenako thina ukuthi singazithethi izinto esazibonayo, esazivayo.
44_4_21_Bathe ke bona, beqokele ngokubasongela, babandulula;  bengafumani sizathu bangababetha ngaso, ngenxa yabantu; ngokuba bonke babemzukisa uThixo ngoko kwakuhlile.
44_4_22_Kuba wayedlule emashumini amane eminyaka umntu lowo,  wawuhle kuye lo mqondiso wokuphiliswa.
44_4_23_Ke kaloku, bakundululwa, baya kwababo, babika oko zingako izinto abazithethayo kubo ababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu.
44_4_24_Bona ke, bekuvile oko, baphakamisa izwi kuThixo ngamxhelo mnye, bathi, Mnini-nto-zonke, wena unguThixo owalenzayo izulu nomhlaba nolwandle, neento zonke ezikwezo nto;
44_4_25_owathi ngomlomo kaDavide umkhonzi wakho, Zazibhavumelani na iintlanga, Zaza izizwe zacamanga izinto ezingento?
44_4_26_Bazimisa ookumkani behlabathi, Nabaphathi bahlanganisana ndawonye Ngokuyichasa iNkosi, naye uKristu wayo.
44_4_27_Kuba, inyaniso, ngaye uMkhonzi wakho oyingcwele onguYesu,  owamthambisayo, kwahlanganisana uHerode, kwanoPontiyo Pilato,  ndawonye neentlanga nabantu bakwaSirayeli,
44_4_28_ukuba benze izinto zonke ezamiswayo ngenxa engaphambili sisandla sakho nalicebo lakho, ukuba zibekho.
44_4_29_Okwangoku ke, Nkosi, zikhangele izisongelo zabo, ubanike abakhonzi bakho ukuba balithethe ilizwi lakho ngako konke ukungafihlisi,
44_4_30_ekusoluleni isandla sakho ukuba uphilise, nokuba kubekho imiqondiso nezimanga ngegama loMkhonzi wakho oyingcwele, uYesu.
44_4_31_Bakubon ukuba bakhungile, yazanyazanyiswa indawo ababehlanganisene kuyo, bazaliswa bonke nguMoya oyiNgcwele,  balithetha ilizwi likaThixo ngokungafihlisiyo.
44_4_32_Ke kaloku inkitha yababekholiwe yayintliziyo-nye,  imphefumlo mnye; kwaye kungekho namnye ubesithi kukho nto iyeyakhe empahleni yakhe; zonke izinto zaye zizezobudlelane kubo.
44_4_33_Baye abapostile bekungqinela ngamandla amakhulu ukuvuka kweNkosi uYesu; kwaye kukho ukubabalwa okukhulu kubo bonke.
44_4_34_Kuba kwakungekho namnye phakathi kwabo, wayeswele; kuba bonke ababenemihlaba, nokuba zizindlu, babesithi bathengise ngazo, bawazise amaxabiso ezo zinto kuthengisiweyo ngazo,
44_4_35_bawabeke ezinyaweni zabapostile; waye ke elowo esabelwa njengoko ebesukuba eswele ngako.
44_4_36_Ke kaloku uYose, owathiywa ngabapostile elinye igama lokuba nguBharnabhas (elithi, lakuthethwa ngentetho evakalayo, ngumfo wovuselelo), umLevi waseSipro ngokuzalwa,
44_4_37_wathi enomhlaba wathengisa ngawo, wayizisa imali, wayibeka ezinyaweni zabapostile.
44_5_1_Ke kaloku indoda ethile, uHananiya ngegama, inoSafira umkayo, yathengisa ngemfuyo yayo.
44_5_2_Yashinta kulo ixabiso layo, esazi naye umkayo; yazisa nxenye ithile, yayibeka ezinyaweni zabapostile.
44_5_3_Wathi ke uPetros, Hananiya, kungani na ukuba uSathana azalise intliziyo yakho, ukuba umxokise uMoya oyiNgcwele,  ushinte kulo ixabiso lomhlaba?
44_5_4_Oko ube uhleli, ubungahleli kuwe na? Kanjalo uthengisiwe,  ubungekhona na egunyeni lakho? Yini na ukuba uyibeke le nto entliziyweni yakho? Akuxoke kubantu, uxoke kuThixo.
44_5_5_Ewavile ke uHananiya la mazwi, wawa, waphuma umphefumlo;  kwabakho ukoyika okukhulu kubo bonke ababezivile ezi zinto.
44_5_6_Asuka ke amadodana amsonga, amthwalela phandle, amngcwaba.
44_5_7_Kwaba mzuzwana ke, ngathi ngowamaxa amathathu, wathi umkakhe, engayazi loo nto ihlileyo, wangena.
44_5_8_Umphendule ke uPetros wathi, Ndixelele, umhlaba lo wakhutshelwa inani elingaka na? Wathi ke yena, Ewe, elingako.
44_5_9_Uthe ke uPetros kuye, Yini na ukuba nivumelane ngokumlinga uMoya weNkosi? Uyabona, iinyawo zabo bangcwabe indoda yakho sezisemnyango; baya kukuthwalela phandle.
44_5_10_Wawa ke kwalapho ezinyaweni zakhe, waphuma umphefumlo;  bangena ke abafana, bamfumana efile, bamthwalela phandle,  bamngcwabela ngasendodeni yakhe.
44_5_11_Kwabakho ukoyika kulo lonke ibandla, nakubo bonke abazivayo ezi zinto.
44_5_12_Ke kaloku, ngazo izandla zabapostile kwabakho imiqondiso nezimanga ezininzi phakathi kwabantu; baye bonke bemxhelo mnye evarandeni kaSolomon.
44_5_13_Ke kaloku, kwabanye akubangakho namnye waba nabuganga bakusinamathelisa kubo; baye abantu bebenze bakhulu.
44_5_14_Kwaba kukhona bekongezwayo abakholwayo kwiNkosi, into eninzi yamadoda neyabafazi;
44_5_15_bada bayithwalela phandle imilwelwe ezitratweni, bayibeka ezingqengqelweni nasezinkukweni, ukuze kuthi, akubon ukuba uPetros uyeza, kubekho kuyo ethi isityekelwe sisithunzi sakhe.
44_5_16_Yaye ke ibuthelana eYerusalem nenkitha yabemizi ejikelezileyo, ithwele imilwelwe nabakhathazwa ngoomoya abangcolileyo, ababesithi bona baphiliswe bonke.
44_5_17_Ke kaloku wesuka umbingeleli omkhulu, nabo bonke ababenaye (abangabehlelo labaSadusi), bazala ngumsindo;
44_5_18_babesa izandla abapostile, babafaka entolongweni yabantu bonke.
44_5_19_Ke kaloku isithunywa seNkosi sazivula iingcango zentolongo ebusuku, sabakhupha, sathi,
44_5_20_Hambani, niye kuma nithethe etempileni kubo abantu onke amazwi obu bomi.
44_5_21_Bevile ke, bangena kwangesifingo etempileni, bafundisa.  Wafika ke umbingeleli omkhulu nabo babenaye, wayibizela ndawonye intlanganiso yamatyala, nawo onke amadoda amakhulu akoonyana bakaSirayeli; bathumela endlwini yamakhonkxwa ukuba beziswe.
44_5_22_Ke kaloku, akufika amadindala, akabafumananga entolongweni;  abuya ke abika, esithi,
44_5_23_Indlu yamakhonkxwa siyifumene okunene ivalwe ngokuqinileyo kanye, nabalindi bemi ngaphandle phambi kweminyango. Sivulile ke, asifumananga mntu ngaphakathi.
44_5_24_Bathe ke bakuweva la mazwi umbingeleli kwanomphathi wetempile, nababingeleli abakhulu, labakhohla, bathi,
44_5_25_Azi, ingaba yintoni na le nto? Wafika ke othile, wababikela esithi, Yabonani, amadoda lawa beniwafake entolongweni, nangaya etempileni, emi efundisa abantu.
44_5_26_Wesuka umphathi enamadindala, wabazisa kungengamandla; kuba babesoyika abantu, hleze baxulutywe ngamatye.
44_5_27_Bebazisile ke, babamisa entlanganisweni yamatyala; wababuza umbingeleli omkhulu, esithi,
44_5_28_Besinganithethelanga na kunene ngelithi, maningafundisi ngeli gama? Niyabona, niyizalisile iYerusalem ngemfundiso yenu;  nifuna ukulizisa phezu kwethu igazi lalo mntu.
44_5_29_Waphendula ke uPetros nabapostile, bathi, Simelwe kukuthi sive uThixo kunokuba sive abantu.
44_5_30_UThixo woobawo bethu wamvusa uYesu, enambulalayo nina ngokumxhoma emthini.
44_5_31_Yena lowo uThixo wamphakamisa ngesandla sakhe sokunene,  wanguMthetheli noMsindisi, ukuze amnike uSirayeli inguquko noxolelo lwezono.
44_5_32_Saye singamangqina akhe ezo ndawo thina, kwanoMoya oyiNgcwele, awamnika abo bamvayo yena uThixo.
44_5_33_Bathe ke bona bakukuva oko, bahlabeka entliziyweni,  babhunga ukuba babasike.
44_5_34_Ke kaloku kwesuka kwema othile entlanganisweni yamatyala,  umFarisi ogama linguGamaliyeli, umfundisi womthetho,  obekekileyo kubantu bonke, wathi makhe bakhutshelwe phandle kancinane abapostile;
44_5_35_wathi kubo, Madoda, maSirayeli, zilumkeleni ngento eniza kuyenza kwaba bantu.
44_5_36_Kuba ngaphambi kwale mihla, kwesuka uTuda, esithi yena ngokwakhe unguthile; ekwanamathela kuye inani lamadoda angathi amakhulu mane; ngowasikwayo lowo; bathi bonke ababemthambele babhangazeka, ababa nto.
44_5_37_Emva kwalowo kwesuka uYuda welaseGalili, ngemihla yobhalo lomlibo wokuzalwa, wakhukulisa abantu banela; naye lowo watshabalala; baza bonke ababemthambele bachithwachithwa.
44_5_38_Kungoku ke ndithi kuni, Khwelelani kwaba bantu nibayeke;  ngokuba eli cebo, nalo msebenzi, ukuba lingaba lelabantu,  lotshitsha:
44_5_39_ukuba ke lelikaThixo, aninakulitshitshisa; hleze nifunyanwe ningabalwa kwanoThixo.
44_5_40_Bamthambela ke; bebabizile abapostile, babatyabula,  babathethela ngelithi, mabangathethi ngegama likaYesu;  babandulula ke.
44_5_41_Bemka ke ngoko bona ebusweni bentlanganiso yamatyala,  bevuya, ngokuba kuthiwe bakufanele ukuhlaziswa ngenxa yegama lakhe.
44_5_42_Kananjalo imihla yonke etempileni, nasemakhaya, babengayeki ukufundisa nokushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zokuba uYesu unguye uKristu.
44_6_1_Ke kaloku ngaloo mihla, bakubon ukuba bayanda abafundi,  kwabakho ukukrokra kwawesiGrike amaYuda ngakwawesiHebhere,  ngokuba abahlolokazi bawo babesilela ekulungiselelweni kwemihla ngemihla.
44_6_2_Bathe ke abalishumi elinababini bawubizela kubo umhlambi wabafundi, bathi, Akukholekile ukuba thina silishiye ilizwi likaThixo, silungiselele ezitafileni.
44_6_3_Khangelani ngoko, bazalwana, amadoda kuni abe sixhenxe,  angqinelwe ukulunga, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele nabubulumko,  esiya kuwamisela lo msebenzi;
44_6_4_ke thina siya kuzingisa ekuthandazeni nasekulungiseleleni ilizwi.
44_6_5_Lakholeka ilizwi elo emehlweni omhlambi lowo wonke; banyula uStefano, indoda ezele lukholo nanguMoya oyiNgcwele, noFilipu,  noProkoro, noNikanore, noTimon, noParmena, noNikolawo wakwa-Antiyokwe owa bengene ebuYudeni:
44_6_6_ababamisayo emehlweni abapostile; bathi bakuthandaza,  bazibeka izandla phezu kwabo.
44_6_7_Laye liya likhula ilizwi likaThixo, liya lisanda kakhulu inani labafundi eYerusalem; laye neqela elikhulu lababingeleli lilululamela ukholo.
44_6_8_Ke kaloku uStefano, ezele lukholo nangamandla, wayesenza izimanga nemiqondiso emikhulu phakathi kwabantu.
44_6_9_Kwesuka ke abathile basesikhungwini ekuthiwa sesabaKhululwa,  nabaseKirene, nabakwa-Alesandire, nabathile belaseKiliki,  nabelaseAsiya, bephikisana noStefano;
44_6_10_ababa namandla akumelana nabo ubulumko noMoya, awayethetha ngaye.
44_6_11_Kwakuba njalo, banyebelezisa amadoda awathi, Simve ethetha amazwi okunyelisa uMoses noThixo.
44_6_12_Kanjalo babahlokohla abantu, kwanamadoda amakhulu nababhali; baza bemfikele bamthi hlasi, bamsa ematyaleni amakhulu.
44_6_13_Bamisa namangqina obuxoki, awathi, Lo mntu akayeki ukuthetha amazwi okunyelisa indawo engcwele nomthetho;
44_6_14_kuba simve esithi, UYesu waseNazarete lo uya kuyichitha le ndawo, awenze wambi amasiko awawanikela kuthi uMoses.
44_6_15_Bonke ababehleli entlanganisweni yamatyala, beqwalasele kuye, babubona ubuso bakhe, ngathi bubuso besithunywa sezulu.
44_7_1_Wathi ke umbingeleli omkhulu, Zinjalo na ke ezi ndawo?
44_7_2_Uthe ke yena: Madoda, bazalwana, nani bobawo, phulaphulani.  UThixo wozuko wabonakala kubawo wethu uAbraham,  ekwelaseMesopotami, phambi kokuma kwakhe kwelakwaHaran,
44_7_3_wathi kuye, Phuma kuwo umhlaba wakowenu nasemizalwaneni yakho, uze emhlabeni endingakubonisa wona.
44_7_4_Waza waphuma ke emhlabeni wamaKaledi, wema kwelakwaHaran.  Emveni kokufa kukayise, wamsusa apho, wamfudusela kulo mhlaba nimiyo kuwo nina ngoku.
44_7_5_Akamnika lifa kuwo, kwanendawo engangonyawo; kodwa wambeka ngedinga lokuba uya kumnika ube ngowakhe, nembewu yakhe emva kwakhe, phofu engekabi namntwana.
44_7_6_Ke kaloku wenjenje uThixo ukuthetha, wathi, imbewu yakhe iya kuba ngabaphambukeli emhla beni wabasemzini; baya kuyenza amakhoboka, bayiphathe kakubi iminyaka engamakhulu omane.
44_7_7_Nohlanga olo, ethe yangamakhoboka kulo, ndiya kulugweba mna,  watsho uThixo; yaye, emveni kwezi zinto, iya kuphuma indikhonze kule ndawo.
44_7_8_Waza wamnika umnqophiso wolwaluko; wathi yena ekuwo, wazala uIsake, wamalusa ngomhla wesibhozo, waza uIsake wamenjenjalo uYakobi, waza noYakobi wabenjenjalo oomawokhulu abalishumi elinababini.
44_7_9_Bathi oomawokhulu, bemmonele uYosefu, bathengisa ngaye,  bamsingisa eYiputa; kodwa uThixo waba naye,
44_7_10_wamncothula kuzo zonke iimbandezelo zakhe, wambabala ngobulumko phambi koFaro, ukumkani waseYiputa; wammisa ukuba abe yirhuluneli phezu kweYiputa nendlu yakhe iphela.
44_7_11_Ke kaloku kwafika indlala kuwo umhlaba waseYiputa uphela,  nowakwaKanan, nembandezelo enkulu; baye oobawo bethu bengafumani kudla.
44_7_12_Akuva ke uYakobi ukuba kukho ingqolowa eYiputa, wesusa oobawo bethu okokuqala.
44_7_13_Wathi ngokwesibini, uYosefu wabuya waziwa ngabazalwana bakhe, saza isizalwane sikaYosefu saveliswa kuFaro.
44_7_14_Wathumela ke uYosefu wambiza uyise uYakobi, nabo bonke abazalana naye, bayimiphefumlo engamashumi osixhenxe anesihlanu.
44_7_15_Wehla ke uYakobi, waya eYiputa, wabhubha yena noobawo bethu;
44_7_16_baza bathwalwa basiwa kwaShekem, babekwa engcwabeni awalithengayo uAbraham ngexabiso lemali koonyana bakaHamore,  usoShekem.
44_7_17_Lithe ke, lakuba lisondele ixesha ledinga, awalifungayo uThixo kuAbraham, bakhula abantu, banda eYiputa,
44_7_18_kwada kwavela kumkani wumbi, ubengamazi uYosefu.
44_7_19_Lowo wabalumkisa abakowethu, wabaphatha kakubi oobawo bethu, ngokokuze bazilahle iintsana zabo, ukuze zingabudli ubomi.
44_7_20_Ekuthe ke kwelo xesha, kwazalwa uMoses; waye emhle kuThixo,  wondliwa iinyanga zantathu endlwini kayise.
44_7_21_Elahliwe ke, yamchola intombi kaFaro, yazondlela ukuba abe ngunyana wayo.
44_7_22_Waqeqeshwa ke uMoses kubo bonke ubulumko bamaYiputa; waye ke eyinkunkqele ngamazwi nangemisebenzi.
44_7_23_Kuthe ke, kwakuzaliseka kuye ixesha leminyaka engamashumi amane, kwathi qatha entliziyweni yakhe ukukha aye kuvelela abazalwana bakhe, oonyana bakaSirayeli.
44_7_24_Waza, akubona othile esoniwa, wamhlanganisela,  wamphindezelela lowo ucinezelweyo ngokumthi qwaka umYiputa:
44_7_25_wayeba ke yena boqonda abazalwana bakhe ukuba uThixo ebeya kubasindisa ngesandla sakhe; abaqondanga ke bona.
44_7_26_Kananjalo ngengomso wabonakala kubo besilwa, wabanyanzela ukuba baxolisane, esithi, Madoda, niyazalana nina; yini na ukuba nonane?
44_7_27_Uthe ke yena owayemonile uwabo wamgiba, esithi, Umiswe ngubani na ukuba ube ngumphathi nomahluli phakathi kwethu?
44_7_28_Ungaba wena ufuna ukundisika na, ngohlobo omsike ngalo umYiputa izolo?
44_7_29_Wasaba ke uMoses ngelo lizwi, wangumphambukeli emhlabeni wakwaMidiyan, apho wazalela khona oonyana bababini.
44_7_30_Kuthe ke kwakuzaliseka iminyaka emashumi mane, kwabonakala kuye kwintlango yentaba yeSinayi isithunywa seNkosi,  elangatyeni lomlilo etyholweni.
44_7_31_Ke kaloku, akukubona oko uMoses, wamangaliswa ngumbono lowo. Kuthe ke, akusondela ukuba awuqiqe, kwafika izwi leNkosi kuye lisithi,
44_7_32_Mna ndinguThixo wabo ooyihlo, uThixo ka-Abraham, uThixo kaIsake, uThixo kaYakobi. Wesuka ke wagubha uMoses, akaba nabuganga bakuwuqiqa.
44_7_33_Ithe ke kuye iNkosi, Zithukulule iimbadada ezinyaweni zakho; kuba indawo leyo umi kuyo ingumhlaba ongcwele.
44_7_34_Ndikubonile ndakubona ukuphathwa kakubi kwabantu bam abaseYiputa, ndakuva nokuncwina kwabo; ndihlile, ukuze ndibahlangule. Yiza ngoku, ndikuthume eYiputa.
44_7_35_Lo Moses bamkhanyelayo, besithi, Umiswe ngubani na, ukuba ube ngumphathi nomahluli? uThixo wathuma yena, ukuba abe ngumphathi nomhlanguli ngesandla sesithunywa esabonakalayo kuye etyholweni.
44_7_36_Yena lowo wabakhupha, akubon ukuba wenze izimanga nemiqondiso emhlabeni waseYiputa, naseLwandle oluBomvu,  nasentlango, iminyaka engamashumi omane.
44_7_37_Lowo nguloo Moses wathi koonyana bakaSirayeli, INkosi,  uThixo wenu, iya kunivelisela umprofeti kubazalwana benu,  onjengam nje; nize nimve yena.
44_7_38_Nguye lowo owayephakathi kwalo ibandla entlango, ndawonye nesithunywa sezulu, ebesithetha naye entabeni yeSinayi, noobawo bethu; owamkelayo izihlabo zobomi, ukuze azinikele kuthi;
44_7_39_abangathandanga kumlulamela oobawo bethu, besuka bamgiba,  babuyela eYiputa ngeentliziyo zabo,
44_7_40_besithi kuAron, Senzele oothixo abaya kuhamba phambi kwethu; kuba lo Moses wasikhuphayo emhlabeni waseYiputa,  asiyazi into emhleleyo.
44_7_41_Benza ithole ngaloo mihla, benyusa amadini, bawasa esithixweni eso, baba nemihlali yimisebenzi yezabo izandla.
44_7_42_Wajika ke uThixo, wabanikela ukuba bakhonze umkhosi wezulu;  njengoko kubhaliweyo encwadini yabaprofeti kwathiwa, Ningaba nisondeze kum imibingelelo neminikelo yini na Iminyaka emashumi mane entlango, ndlu kaSirayeli?
44_7_43_Nathwala umnquba kaMoleki, Nenkwenkwezi yothixo wenu uRemfan, Imifanekiso ke leyo enayenzayo ukuba niqubude kuyo;  Ndaye ke ndiya kunifudusela ngaphaya kweBhabheli.
44_7_44_Umnquba wesingqino wawukoobawo bethu entlango, njengoko wayemisele ngako owayethetha noMoses, ukuba awenze ngokomfanekiso abewubonile;
44_7_45_lo kanjalo bawungenisayo, benikelana ngawo oobawo bethu,  benoYoshuwa ekuthinjweni kweentlanga, ezo wazigxothayo uThixo ebusweni boobawo bethu, kwada kwayimihla kaDavide;
44_7_46_owababalwayo nguThixo, wacela ukuba amfumanele uThixo kaYakobi umnquba.
44_7_47_NguSolomon ke owamakhela indlu.
44_7_48_Noko Osenyangweni yena akemi zitempileni zenziwe ngazandla;  njengokuba esitsho umprofeti ukuthi,
44_7_49_Izulu liyitrone yam, Ke ihlabathi sisihlalo seenyawo zam;  Yindlu enjani na eniya kuyakhela mna? itsho iNkosi; Yiyiphi na yona indawo yokuphumla kwam?
44_7_50_Asisisandla sam na, esenza zonke ezo zinto?
44_7_51_Nina bantamo zilukhuni, bangalukileyo ngentliziyo,  nangendlebe, nihleli nibambene noMoya oyiNgcwele; njengabo ooyihlo, nani ninjalo.
44_7_52_Kubo abaprofeti nguwuphi na ongatshutshiswanga ngooyihlo?  Bababulala ababexela ngenxa engaphambili ukuza koliLungisa;  enithe kalokunje naba ngabanikeli nababulali, bakhe.
44_7_53_nina nawamkelayo umthetho, niwumiselwa zizithunywa zezulu,  anawugcina.
44_7_54_Ke kaloku, bathi bakuziva ezi zinto, bahlabeka ezintliziyweni zabo, bamtshixizela amazinyo.
44_7_55_Ke yena, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele, waqwalasela ezulwini,  wabona ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo, noYesu emi ngasekunene kukaThixo.
44_7_56_Wathi, Yabonani, ndiwabona amazulu evulekile, ndimbona uNyana woMntu emi ngasekunene kukaThixo.
44_7_57_Badanduluka ke ngezwi elikhulu, bazivingca iindlebe zabo,  besuka indulumbane phezu kwakhe ngamxhelo mnye,
44_7_58_bamkhuphela ngaphandle komzi, bamgibisela ngamatye.  Amangqina azibeka iingubo zawo ezinyaweni zendodana ekuthiwa nguSawule.
44_7_59_Ayemgibisela ngamatye uStefano, yena ebiza esithi, Nkosi Yesu, wamkele umoya wam.
44_7_60_Uguqile ke ngamadolo, wadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, wathi,  Nkosi, ungabamiseli esi sono. Akutsho, walala ubuthongo.
44_8_1_Waye ke uSawule ekuthakazela ukusikwa kwakhe. Ke kaloku kwehla ngaloo mhla intshutshiso enkulu phezu kwalo ibandla eliseYerusalem; kanjalo bonke baba ziintsali emazweni akwaYuda naseSamariya, kwasala abapostile bodwa.
44_8_2_Amthwala ke uStefano amadoda amoyikayo uThixo, aya kumngcwaba, amenzela isililo esikhulu.
44_8_3_Waye ke uSawule elidlavula ibandla, engena kwizindlu ngezindlu, erhola amadoda kwanabafazi, ebafaka entolongweni.
44_8_4_Bona ke ngoko ababeziintsali batyhutyha ilizwe, beshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zelizwi.
44_8_5_Wehla ke uFilipu, waya emzini welaseSamariya, wamvakalisa uKristu kubo.
44_8_6_Zaye kanjalo izihlwele zizinyamekela ngamxhelo mnye izinto ezibe zithethwa nguFilipu, ekuyiveni nasekuyiboneni kwazo imiqondiso abeyenza.
44_8_7_Kuba oomoya abangcolileyo babephuma kwinto eninzi ebinabo,  bebhomboloza ngezwi elikhulu; yathi ke into eninzi enedumbe neziziqhwala yaphiliswa.
44_8_8_Kwabakho uvuyo olukhulu kuloo mzi.
44_8_9_Ke kaloku bekukho ndoda ithile, igama linguSimon,  kwangaphambili kuloo mzi, ebinyanga, ibethe luthi nqa uhlanga lwaseSamariya, isithi yona ngokwayo inguthile omkhulu;
44_8_10_ababeyiphulaphula bonke, bethabathela komncinane base komkhulu, besithi, Lo ungamandla kaThixo amakhulu.
44_8_11_Baye ke bemphulaphula, ngenxa yokuba ixesha elide wabetha bee nqa ngobunyangi bakhe.
44_8_12_Xenikweni ke bakholwayo nguFilipu, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zezinto zobukumkani bukaThixo, nezegama likaYesu Kristu, babhaptizwa amadoda kwanabafazi.
44_8_13_Wakholwa ke kwanaye uSimon; wathi akubhaptizwa, wazingisa ukuhlala noFilipu, ebona imiqondiso kwanemisebenzi emikhulu yamandla isenzeka, wathi nqa.
44_8_14_Ke kaloku, bakuva abapostile aba beseYerusalem, ukuba abaseSamariya balamkele ilizwi likaThixo, bathuma uPetros noYohane kubo;
44_8_15_abathi bona bakuhla, babathandazela, ukuba bamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele;
44_8_16_kuba ebengekaweli namnye kubo; babebhaptizelwe nje kodwa egameni leNkosi uYesu.
44_8_17_Bandula ukubeka izandla phezu kwabo, bamamkela ke uMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_8_18_Ke kaloku uSimon, akubona ukuba ngokubekwa kwezandla zabapostile uyanikwa uMoya oyiNgcwele, wezisa kubo imali,
44_8_19_esithi, Ndinikeni nam eli gunya, ukuze lowo, ndithe ndazibeka izandla phezu kwakhe, amkele uMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_8_20_Uthe ke uPetros kuye, Isilivere yakho mayiye kutshabalala nawe; ngokuba ububa isipho sikaThixo singazuzwa ngemali.
44_8_21_Akunasahlulo nasabelo kule nto; kuba intliziyo yakho ayithe tye emehlweni kaThixo.
44_8_22_Guquka ngoko kobo bubi bakho, ukhunge kuThixo, ukuba ingathi mhlawumbi ixolelwe ingcingane yentliziyo yakho.
44_8_23_Kuba ndiyabona ukuba usenyongweni yobukrakra, nasentanjeni yentswela-bulungisa.
44_8_24_Waphendula ke uSimon wathi, Ndikhungeleni nina eNkosini,  ukuze ndingahlelwa nanye yezo zinto nizithethileyo.
44_8_25_Bona ke ngoko, bakuba beqononondisile, belithetha ilizwi leNkosi, babuya beza eYerusalem; kanjalo imizi emininzi yelaseSamariya bayishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo.
44_8_26_Ke kaloku kwathetha isithunywa seNkosi kuFilipu, sisithi,  Suka usinge ezantsi, ngendlela ehla ivela eYerusalem, eya eGaza, yona iyintlango.
44_8_27_Usukile ke waya. Kwavela indoda engumTiyopiya, ithenwa,  isikhulu sikaKandase, ukumkanikazi wamaTiyopiya, ebiphethe bonke ubutyebi bakhe, eyayize kunqula uThixo eYerusalem.
44_8_28_Yayibuya, ihleli enqwelweni yayo, ilesa incwadi yomprofeti uIsaya.
44_8_29_Uthe ke uMoya kuFilipu, Yiya ukhwele kule nqwelo.
44_8_30_Wabaleka ke uFilipu, waya kuyo, wayiva ilesa incwadi yomprofeti uIsaya; wathi, Uyaziqonda na kodwa izinto ozilesayo?
44_8_31_Ithe ke yona, Ndingaba nako ngani na, kungekho undikhokelayo nje? Kanjalo yambongoza uFilipu ukuba akhwele ahlale nayo.
44_8_32_Ke kaloku indawo yesibhalo eyayilesa yona ibiyile ithi,  Njengemvu esiwa ekuxhelweni, Njengemvana esisimumu phambi komchebi wayo, Wenjenjalo yena ukungawuvuli umlomo wakhe.
44_8_33_Ekuthobekeni kwakhe umgwebo wakhe wasuswa; Ngubani na ke owosicacisa ukusixela isizukulwana sakhe? Ngokuba buyasuswa ubomi bakhe emhlabeni.
44_8_34_Laphendula ke ithenwa lathi kuFilipu, Ndiyakukhunga,  umprofeti lo uyithetha ngabani na le nto; uzithetha yena na,  uthetha mntu wumbi, kusini na?
44_8_35_Wawuvula ke uFilipu umlomo wakhe, waqalela kweso sibhalo,  walishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu.
44_8_36_Ke kaloku, xa bahambayo ngendlela, bafika manzini athile;  lathi ithenwa, Nanga amanzi; kwala ntoni na ukuba ndingabhaptizwa?
44_8_37_Uthe ke uFilipu, Ukuba uyakholwa ngentliziyo yakho iphela,  kuvumelekile. Laphendula ke lathi, Ndiyakholwa ukuba uYesu Kristu unguNyana kaThixo.
44_8_38_Lathi mayime inqwelo; behla bobabini, baya emanzini,  uFilipu kwanethenwa; walibhaptiza.
44_8_39_Xeshikweni ke babenyukile, baphuma emanzini, uMoya weNkosi wamthi xwi uFilipu; alaba sambona ithenwa, kuba lalihamba ngeyalo indlela livuya.
44_8_40_UFilipu ke wafunyanwa eAzoto; watyhutyha ilizwe,  eyishumayeza imizi yonke iindaba ezilungileyo, wada weza eKesareya.
44_9_1_Ke kaloku uSawule, esabafuthela ngeentsongelo neembulalo abafundi beNkosi, waya kumbingeleli omkhulu;
44_9_2_wacela kuye iincwadi zokuya eDamasko ezindlwini zesikhungu,  ukuze athi, ethe wafumana abathile bale Ndlela, amadoda kwanabafazi, abazise bekhonkxiwe eYerusalem.
44_9_3_Kuthe ke ekuhambeni kwakhe, wasondela eDamasko; waza ngesiquphe wabanekelwa ngeenxa zonke lukhanyiso oluvela ezulwini;
44_9_4_wawa emhlabeni, weva izwi lisithi kuye, Sawule, Sawule,  unditshutshiselani na?
44_9_5_Wathi ke yena, Ungubani na, Nkosi? Ithe ke iNkosi, Mna ndinguye uYesu omtshutshisayo wena; wenzakala, ukhaba iimviko nje.
44_9_6_Waza egubha, eqhiphuke umbilini, wathi, Nkosi, ufuna ukuba ndenze ntoni na? Yathi iNkosi kuye, Vuka, uye kungena emzini lowo; woyixelelwa into omelwe kukuyenza.
44_9_7_Ke kaloku amadoda abehamba naye ema engenakuthetha, eliva okunene lona izwi, kodwa engaboni mntu.
44_9_8_Wavuka ke uSawule emhlabeni; wathi akuvulwa amehlo akhe,  akabona mntu; bamrhola ke ngesandla, baza kumngenisa eDamasko.
44_9_9_Waye emihla mithathu engaboni, engadli, engaseli nokusela.
44_9_10_Ke kaloku bekukho mfundi uthile eDamasko, ugama linguHananiya; yathi iNkosi kuye embonweni, Hananiya. Uthe ke yena, Ndilapha, Nkosi.
44_9_11_Ithe ke iNkosi kuye, Phakama, uye esitratweni ekuthiwa sesithe Tye, ubuzise endlwini kaYuda umntu ogama linguSawule waseTarso; kuba nanko ethandaza;
44_9_12_waye ebone embonweni indoda egama linguHananiya ingena,  ibeka isandla phezu kwakhe, ukuze abuye abone.
44_9_13_Uphendule ke uHananiya wathi, Nkosi, ndivile kwabaninzi ngale ndoda, ukuba zinkulu kwazo izinto ezimbi ezenze kwabangcwele bakho eYerusalem;
44_9_14_nalapha, ikho nje, inegunya kubabingeleli abakhulu lokukhonkxa bonke abo balinqulayo igama lakho.
44_9_15_Yathi ke kuye iNkosi, Yiya; ngokuba lowo usisitya esinyuliweyo ndim, sokuphatha igama lam emehlweni eentlanga,  nookumkani, kwanoonyana bakaSirayeli;
44_9_16_kuba mna ndiya kumbonisa ukuba zinkulu kwezinto ezinzima,  amelwe kukuziva ngenxa yegama lam.
44_9_17_Wemka ke uHananiya, waya kungena endlwini; ebeke izandla phezu kwakhe, wathi, Sawule, mzalwana, indithumile iNkosi uYesu, ebonakele kuwe endleleni oze ngayo, ukuze ubuye ubone,  uzaliswe nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_9_18_Kwaoko kwawa emehlweni akhe izinto ezingathi ziinkwethu;  wabuya wabona kwaoko, wavuka, wabhaptizwa;
44_9_19_wathi akuba edlile, womelezeka. Ke kaloku uSawule waba nemihla ethile kubafundi abaseDamasko.
44_9_20_Waye kwaoko, ezindlwini zesikungu, emvakalisa uYesu, ukuba lowo unguye uNyana kaThixo.
44_9_21_Bathi nqa ke bonke abamvayo, bathi, Lo kanene asinguye na owababhuqa eYerusalem abo babelinqula eli gama? Waye nalapha ezele le nto, ukuba abase bekhonkxiwe kubabingeleli abakhulu.
44_9_22_Kwaba kukhona ke womelelayo uSawule; wabetha adubadubeka amaYuda abemi eDamasko, ebonakalalisa ukuba lo nguye uKristu.  Ke kaloku, kwakuzaliseka imihla eyaneleyo, abhunga amaYuda ukuba amsike.
44_9_23_Laziwa ke nguSawule iyelenqe lawo elo.
44_9_24_Awagcina ke namasango imini nobusuku, ukuba amsike.
44_9_25_Bamthabatha ke abafundi ebusuku, bamhlisa ngodonga,  bemthoba ngengobozi.
44_9_26_Ke kaloku, akufika uSawule eYerusalem, wamana elinga ukuzibandakanya nabafundi; kodwa bamoyika bonke, bengakholwa ukuba ungumfundi.
44_9_27_UBharnabhas ke wamthabatha wamsa kubapostile, wabacacisela ukuyibona kwakhe iNkosi endleleni, nokuba yathetha naye,  nokuthetha kwakhe ngokungafihlisiyo eDamasko egameni likaYesu.
44_9_28_Waye enabo ke, engena ephuma eYerusalem, ethetha ngokungafihlisiyo egameni leNkosi uYesu.
44_9_29_Wamana ethetha ephikisana namaYuda esiGrike; ayezamela ke wona ukumsika.
44_9_30_Bekwazile ke oko abazalwana, bamhlisela eKesareya,  bamthumela eTarso.
44_9_31_Laye ke ngoko ibandla kulo lonke elakwaYuda, nelaseGalili,  nelaseSamariya, linoxolo, lisakheka, lihamba liyoyika iNkosi;  laye lisanda ngentuthuzelo yoMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_9_32_Ke kaloku, akuba uPetros etyhutyha iindawo zonke, wehla weza nakwabangcwele ababemi eLida.
44_9_33_Wafumana ke khona umntu othile, ogama linguEneya, eminyaka isibhozo elele elukhukweni enedumbe.
44_9_34_Wathi uPetros kuye, Eneya, uyakuphilisa uYesu Kristu; vuka,  wandlule. Wavuka kwaoko.
44_9_35_Bambona bonke ababemi eLida naseSharon, babuyela eNkosini.
44_9_36_Ke kaloku, eYopa kwakukho mfundikazi uthile, ugama linguTabhita, ekuthiwa ngentetho evakalayo nguDorkas; yena lowo wayezele yimisebenzi elungileyo, nasisisa abenaso.
44_9_37_Wathi ke ngaloo mihla, wahliwa sisifo, wafa; bathe ke bakuba bemhlambile, bambeka egumbini eliphezulu.
44_9_38_Ke kaloku iLida ibikufuphi nje neYopa; bathi abafundi,  bevile ukuba uPetros ukhona, bathuma amadoda amabini kuye,  bembongoza ukuba eze kubo, angalibali.
44_9_39_Wesuka ke uPetros, wahamba nawo. Efikile, bamsa egumbini eliphezulu; bema ngakuye bonke abahlolokazi, belila, bembonisa ukuba zininzi kwazo iingubo zangaphantsi nezokwaleka abezenza uDorkas oko ebenabo.
44_9_40_Wabakhuphela phandle ke bonke uPetros, waguqa ngamadolo,  wathandaza; waza eguqukele esidumbini wathi, Tabhita, vuka.  Wawavula ke amehlo akhe; wathi akubona uPetros, wesuka wahlala.
44_9_41_Wamnika ke isandla sakhe, wamphakamisa; wababiza abangcwele nabahlolokazi abo, wammisa phambi kwabo ephilile.
44_9_42_Kwesuka ke oko kwazeka kuyo yonke iYopa; baba baninzi abakholwayo eNkosini.
44_9_43_Wathi ke wahlala imihla emininzi eYopa naSimon uthile,  ungumsuki wezikhumba.
44_10_1_Ke kaloku, kwaye kukho eKesareya ndoda ithile, igama linguKorneli, umthetheli-khulu wasebuthweni lamasoldati ekuthiwa lelaseItali, emhlonelayo,
44_10_2_emoyikayo uThixo, kunye nayo yonke indlu yayo; ibaliza abantu kunene; kanjalo yayimana ikhunga kuThixo.
44_10_3_Yabona embonweni kakuhle, malunga nelixa lesithoba lenini,  kufika kuyo isithunywa sikaThixo, sisithi kuyo, Hina, Korneli!
44_10_4_Eqwalasele ke kuso, wangenelwa kukoyika, wathi, Yintoni na,  Nkosi? Sithe ke kuye, Imithandazo yakho namalizo akho anyukile,  aba sisikhumbuzo emehlweni kaThixo.
44_10_5_Susa kwangoku amadoda, aye eYopa, ubize eze uSimon, ogama limbi linguPetros;
44_10_6_yena ulundwendwe lukaSimon, umsuki wezikhumba, ondlu ingaselwandle; yena lowo uya kukuxelela into omelwe kukuyenza.
44_10_7_Ke kaloku, sakuba simkile isithunywa eso besithetha noKorneli, wabiza zazibini kwizicaka zakhe zasendlwini,  nesoldati elimhlonelayo uThixo kwabehlala ehleli naye;
44_10_8_waza, ebacacisele zonke iindawo, wabathuma eYopa.
44_10_9_Ke kaloku ngengomso, bakubon ukuba basendleleni bona,  besondela kuwo umzi, wenyuka uPetros, waya phezu kwendlu,  malunga nelixa lesithandathu, ukuba athandaze.
44_10_10_Wesuka ke walamba kakhulu, wanga angakhe afumane into edliwayo; kuthe ke, bakubon ukuba ke bayamlungisela, wawelwa lithongo:
44_10_11_wabona izulu livulekile, kusihla phezu kwakhe sitya sithile, ngathi yilinen enkulu ebotshwe kumasondo omane,  sithotyelwa emhlabeni;
44_10_12_ekwaye kukho kuso zonke izinto zomhlaba ezizitho zine,  namarhamncwa, nezinambuzane, neentaka zezulu.
44_10_13_Kwabakho izwi lisithi kuye, Vuka, Petros, xhela udle.
44_10_14_Uthe ke uPetros, Nakanye, Nkosi; ngokuba yonke into eyinqambi, nokuba yengcolileyo, andizanga ndiyidle.
44_10_15_Laphinda izwi okwesibini lathi kuye, Izinto uThixo azihlambululeyo, musa ukuzenza inqambi wena.
44_10_16_Kwabakho ke oku kathathu; sabuya isitya eso senyuswa,  sasiwa ezulwini.
44_10_17_Ke kaloku, xa uPetros wayethingaza ngaphakathi kwakhe,  ukuba ungaba uyintoni na umbono lo awubonileyo, kwasuka kwathi gqi amadoda abethunyiwe evela kuKorneli, ebuza indlu kaSimon,  emi esangweni;
44_10_18_akhwaza, ebuza ukuba uSimon, ogama limbi linguPetros,  ulundwendwe apha na.
44_10_19_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uPetros uyacinga ngawo umbono lowo, wathi uMoya kuye, Nanga amadoda amathathu ekufuna;
44_10_20_suka uhle, uhambe nawo, ungathandabuzi nento, ngokokuba athunywe ndim.
44_10_21_Wehla ke uPetros, waya kuwo amadoda abethunyiwe kuye evela kuKorneli, wathi, Niyabona, ndingulowo nimfunayo; ngumcimbi mni na enize ngawo?
44_10_22_Athe ke wona, UKorneli umthetheli-khulu, indoda elilungisa, emoyikayo uThixo, kanjalo engqinelwe ukulunga lulo lonke uhlanga lwamaYuda, uhlatyelwe sisithunywa esingcwele ukuba akubize, uze endlwini yakhe, eve amazwi kuwe.
44_10_23_Wawabizela phakathi ngoko, aba lundwendwe lwakhe. Ke kaloku ngengomso, uPetros wemka nawo, nabazalwana abathile baseYopa bahamba naye.
44_10_24_Baza ngengomsomnye bangena eKesareya. Waye ke uKorneli ebalindile; wayebizele ndawonye imizalwane yakhe, nezihlobo zakhe ezibuhlungu.
44_10_25_Kwathi ke, xa angenayo uPetros, uKorneli wamhlangabeza,  wawa ezinyaweni zakhe, waqubuda kuye.
44_10_26_Uthe ke uPetros wamvusa, esithi, Phakama; nam ngokwam ndingumntu.
44_10_27_Wangena encokola naye, wabafumana bebuthelene bebaninzi.
44_10_28_Kananjalo wathi kubo, Niyazi kakuhle nina, ukuba akusesikweni ukuthi indoda engumYuda inamathele isondele kowolunye uhlanga; mna ke uThixo undibonisile, ukuba ndingabizi mntu ngokuthi uyinqambi, ungongcolileyo.
44_10_29_Kungoko ke ndizileyo ndingaphikanga ndakubizwa. Ndizile ke; ndiyabuza ngoko, ukuba nindibize ngandawoni na?
44_10_30_UKorneli wathi, Kuse kuntsuku ne ndizila ukudla, kwada kwaleli lixa lemini. Ngelixa lesithoba ke bendithandaza endlwini yam, kwesuka kwathi gqi indoda, yema phambi kwam,  inengubo eqaqambileyo;
44_10_31_yathi, Korneli, umthandazo wakho uviwe, namalizo akho akhunjulwe phambi koThixo;
44_10_32_thumela ngoko eYopa, ubize eze uSimon, ogama limbi linguPetros; lowo ulundwendwe endlwini kaSimon, umsuki wezikhumba, ngaselwandle; oya kuthi akufika athethe nawe.
44_10_33_Ndathumela ngoko kuwe kwaoko; nawe utyaphile ufike. Kaloku ngoko sikho thina sonke emehlweni kaThixo, ukuze sizive zonke izinto ozimiselweyo nguThixo.
44_10_34_Ke kaloku uPetros wawuvula umlomo wakhe wathi, Ndiyaqiqa okwenyaniso ukuba uThixo akamkhethi wabuso bamntu;
44_10_35_kwiintlanga zonke, lowo umoyikayo, asebenze ubulungisa,  wamkelekile kuye.
44_10_36_Ilizwi elo walithumelayo koonyana bakaSirayeli, eshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo ngoYesu Kristu (nguye iNkosi yabo bonke),
44_10_37_nina niyalazi ilizwi elenzekayo kulo lonke elakwaYuda,  liqalela kwelaseGalili, emva kobhaptizo awaluvakalisayo uYohane:
44_10_38_okokuba uThixo wamthambisa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele nangamandla uYesu waseNazarete, owagqiba ilizwe esiza, ephilisa bonke abaxinzelelweyo nguye uMtyholi; ngokuba uThixo ubenaye.
44_10_39_Thina singamangqina ezinto zonke awazenzayo ezweni lamaYuda, kwanaseYerusalem; abamsikayo ngokumxhoma emthini.
44_10_40_Yena lowo uThixo wamvusa ngomhla wesithathu, wenza ukuba abonakale,
44_10_41_kungekubo abantu bonke, kukumangqina abenyuliwe ngenxa engaphambili nguThixo: kuthi thina, sadlayo saselayo naye emveni kokuvuka kwakhe kwabafileyo.
44_10_42_Wasithethela ngelithi, masivakalise ebantwini,  siqononondise ukuba yena nguye omisiweyo nguThixo, ukuba abe ngumgwebi wabaphilileyo nabafileyo.
44_10_43_Bonke abaprofeti bayamngqinela yena lo, ukuba, ngegama lakhe, bamkeliswa uxolelo lwezono bonke abakholwayo kuye.
44_10_44_Uthe akubon ukuba usawathetha uPetros la mazwi, wasuka wabawela uMoya oyiNgcwele bonke ababeliva ilizwi.
44_10_45_Amangaliswa amakholwa olwaluko onke abeze noPetros;  ngokuba isipho soMoya oyiNgcwele sathululwa naphezu kweentlanga;
44_10_46_kuba aziva zithetha ngalwimi zimbi, zimenza mkhulu uThixo.  Wandula waphendula uPetros wathi,
44_10_47_Kukho unako yini na ukuthintela amanzi, ukuba bangabhaptizwa aba bamamkeleyo uMoya oyiNgcwele, kwanjengathi nje?
44_10_48_Wamisa ukuthi mababhaptizwe egameni leNkosi. Baza bamcela ukuba akhe ahlale iintsuku ezithile.
44_11_1_Ke kaloku, abapostile nabazalwana ababekwelakwaYuda beva ukuba nazo iintlanga zilamkele ilizwi likaThixo.
44_11_2_Uthe ke uPetros akuba enyuke waya eYerusalem, babambana naye abolwaluko,
44_11_3_besithi, Uye wangena kumadoda angalukileyo, wadla nawo.
44_11_4_Waqala ke uPetros wabatyhilela ngokucacileyo, esithi,
44_11_5_Mna ndandisemzini oyiYopa ndithandaza; ndabona ethongweni umbono, kusihla isitya esithile, ngathi yilinen enkulu,  ithotywa ezulwini ngamasondo omane, yada yaza kufika kum;
44_11_6_endithe ndakuqwalasela kuyo, ndaqiqa, ndabona izinto zomhlaba ezizitho zine, namarhamncwa, nezinambuzane, neentaka zezulu.
44_11_7_Ndeva ke izwi lisithi kum, Vuka, Petros, xhela udle.
44_11_8_Ndithe ke mna, Nakanye, Nkosi; ngokuba yonke into eyinqambi, nokuba yengcolileyo, ayizanga ingene emlonyeni wam.
44_11_9_Landiphendula ke ilizwi okwesibini, liphuma ezulwini,  lathi, Izinto azihlambululeyo uThixo, musa ukuzenza iinqambi wena.
44_11_10_Oku ke kwabakho kathathu; zaza zonke ezo zinto zabuya zarholelwa ezulwini.
44_11_11_Gqi! kwaoko amadoda amathathu, ema ngasendlwini ebendikuyo, esuswe eKesareya ukuba eze kum.
44_11_12_Wathi ke uMoya kum, mandihambe nawo, ndingathandabuzi nto.  Bahamba ke nam, naba bazalwana bobathandathu; sangena endlwini yendoda leyo;
44_11_13_yasibikela kananjalo ukubona kwayo isithunywa sezulu endlwini yayo, esemayo sathi kuyo, Thuma amadoda eYopa, ubize eze uSimon, ogama limbi linguPetros,
44_11_14_oya kuthetha kuwe amazwi, owosindiswa ngawo wena, nayo yonke indlu yakho.
44_11_15_Ke kaloku, ekuqaleni kwam ukuthetha, uMoya oyiNgcwele wabawela, njengoko wasiwelayo nathi ekuqaleni.
44_11_16_Ndakhumbula ke izwi leNkosi lokokuba ibithe, UYohane okunene wabhaptiza ngamanzi, kodwa nina niya kubhaptizwa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_11_17_Ukuba ngoko uThixo wabapha isipho esingangeso wasiphayo nathi thina sakholwayo eNkosini uYesu Kristu, mna ke bendingubani na, ukuba ndide ndibe nako ukumthintela uThixo?
44_11_18_Bakuziva ke ezo zinto, bathi cwaka, bamzukisa uThixo,  besithi, Kanti na ke neentlanga ezi uThixo uziphe ukuguqukela ebomini.
44_11_19_Abaya ke ngoko, babeziintsali ngembandezelo eyabakho ngoStefano, batyhutyha ilizwe, bada beza kwelaseFenike,  naseSipro, nakwa-Antiyokwe, bengalithethi bantwini bambi,  belithetha kumaYuda odwa.
44_11_20_Yaye ke inxenye kubo ingamadoda aseSipro naseKirene;  eyathi yona yakufika kwa-Antiyokwe, yathetha kwawesiGrike amaYuda, ishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zeNkosi uYesu.
44_11_21_Saye ke isandla seNkosi sinawo, kanjalo kwakholwa inani elikhulu, labuyela eNkosini.
44_11_22_Lwavakala ke udaba lwabo ezindlebeni zebandla laseYerusalem; bakhupha uBharnabhas, ukuba ahambe, ade aye kufika kwa-Antiyokwe;
44_11_23_othe akufika, walubona ubabalo lukaThixo, wavuya,  wabavuselela bonke, ukuba bathi ngengqibo yentliziyo bahlale bethe nca eNkosini.
44_11_24_Ngokuba ebeyindoda elungileyo, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele nalukholo. Kongezelelwa eNkosini inani elaneleyo.
44_11_25_Wemka ke uBharnabhas, waya eTarso, esiya kufuna uSawule;
44_11_26_wathi akuba emfumene, wamsa kwa-Antiyokwe. Kwathi ke,  umnyaka uphela, bahlangana nebandla, bafundisa inani elaneleyo.  Kananjalo abafundi baqala ukubizwa ukuba ngamaKristu kwa-Antiyokwe.
44_11_27_Ke kaloku ngaloo mihla, kwehla abaprofeti, besuka eYerusalem, beza kwa-Antiyokwe.
44_11_28_Kwesuka ke omnye wabo, ogama linguAgabho, waqondisa ngaye uMoya ukuba kuza kubakho indlala enkulu kulo lonke elimiweyo;  eyabakho ke ngemihla kaKlawudiyo Kesare.
44_11_29_Kubo ke abafundi, njengoko uthile ebenabo ubutyebi, wathi elowo kubo wagqiba ukuthumela into yokubanceda abazalwana ababemi kwelamaYuda;
44_11_30_abathe bakwenza nokukwenza, bathumela kuwo amadoda amakhulu ngesandla sikaBharnabhas noSawule.
44_12_1_Ke kaloku, ngelo xesha uHerode ukumkani wabesa izandla abathile balo ibandla, ukuba abaphathe kakubi;
44_12_2_wambulala ke uYakobi, umzalwana kaYohane, ngekrele.
44_12_3_Wathi, akubona ukuba oko kuwakholisile amaYuda, waqokela ngokubamba noPetros (yaye ke iyimihla yezonka ezingenagwele leyo).
44_12_4_Akuba ke embambile, wamfaka entolongweni, wamnikela kumaqela amane amasoldati angamane, ukuba amgcine; engxamele ukuze emveni kwepasika amkhuphe, amse ebantwini.
44_12_5_Wagcinwa ngoko okunene uPetros entolongweni; ke kwathandazwa libandla ngenyameko kuThixo ngenxa yakhe.
44_12_6_Xa ke uHerode wayeza kumkhupha, uPetros ngobo busuku wayelele phakathi kwamasoldati amabini, ekhonkxiwe ngemixokelelwane emibini; baye nabalindi beyigcinile intolongo phambi kwesango.
44_12_7_Yabona, naso isithunywa seNkosi, sisithi gaga phezu kwakhe,  kwakhanya nokukhanya kwelo gumbi lentolongo; sambetha ecaleni uPetros, samvusa, sisithi, Phakama msinya. Yawa imixokelelwane yakhe ezandleni.
44_12_8_Sathi kanjalo isithunywa eso kuye, Bhinqa, ubophe izixathula zakho. Wenjenjalo ke. Sithi kuye, Yithi wambu ingubo yakho, undilandele.
44_12_9_Waphuma, wasilandela; wayengazi ukuba iyinene le nto yenziweyo ngesithunywa eso; ebeba ke ubone umbono.
44_12_10_Begqithile ke kwelokuqala nakwelesibini iqela labalindi,  bafika esangweni lentsimbi elibhekisa kuwo umzi, elathi lavuleka kubo ngokwalo; bakuphuma, bahamba isitrato sasinye;  sathi kwaoko semka isithunywa eso kuye.
44_12_11_Waza uPetros akuziqonda wathi, Kaloku ndiyazi okwenyaniso,  ukuba iNkosi ithume isithunywa sayo, yandihlutha esandleni sikaHerode, nakuko konke ukulindela kwabantu bamaYuda.
44_12_12_Uthe ke akuyiqonda loo nto, weza endlwini kaMariya, unina kaYohane ogama limbi linguMarko, apho bekuqukene khona into eyaneleyo ithandaza.
44_12_13_Akubon ukuba ke unkqonkqozile uPetros elucangweni lwesango, kweza kuphulaphula isicakazana esigama linguRoda.
44_12_14_Silazile ke izwi likaPetros, asilivulanga isango, ngenxa yokuvuya; sabalekela ke phakathi, saxela ukuba uPetros umi phambi kwesango.
44_12_15_Bathe ke bona kuso, Uyageza. Saqinisela ke sathi, Hayi,  kunjalo. Babesithi ke bona, Sisithunywa sakhe.
44_12_16_Uthe ke uPetros wamana enkqonkqoza; bathi ke bakuvula bambona, bathi nqa.
44_12_17_Uwangawangisile ke ngesandla kubo, ukuba bathi cwaka,  wabacacisela ukumkhupha kwayo iNkosi entolongweni. Wathi ke,  Babikeleni ooYakobi nabazalwana ezi zinto. Waphuma waya kwenye indawo.
44_12_18_Ke kaloku, kwakusa, ayibanga ncinane inkathazeko phakathi kwamasoldati, yokuba angaba utheni na uPetros.
44_12_19_Uthe ke uHerode, akuba emfuna engamfumani, wabancina abalindi, wathi makumkiwe nabo, baye kubulawa. Waza uPetros wehla kwelakwaYuda, waya eKesareya, walibala khona.
44_12_20_Ke kaloku uHerode wayebaqumbele kakhulu abaseTire nabaseTsidon. Beza ke kuye bemxhelo mnye; bathi,  bemthomalalisile uBlasto, obephethe igumbi lokulala ukumkani,  bazicelela uxolo, ngenxa yokuba ilizwe labo belisondliwa lelokumkani.
44_12_21_Ke kaloku uHerode, ngemini emisiweyo, ambethe ingubo yobukumkani, wahlala etroneni yakhe, wawisa ukuthetha kwakhe kubo.
44_12_22_Baduma ke abantu, besithi, Lilizwi lothixo elo, asilamntu.
44_12_23_Samthi qwaka ke kwalapho isithunywa seNkosi, ngenxa enokuba engamzukisanga uThixo; wadliwa ziimpethu, waphuma umphefumlo.
44_12_24_Laye ke likhula, lisanda ilizwi likaThixo.
44_12_25_Ke kaloku uBharnabhas noSawule babuya eYerusalem,  belufezile ulungiselelo olo, bethabathe nabo uYohane, ogama limbi linguMarko.
44_13_1_Ke kaloku, kwaye kukho kwa-Antiyokwe, ebandleni ebelikhona,  abaprofeti nabafundisi abathile, abangooBharnabhas, noSimon ekuthiwa nguNigere, noLukiyo waseKirene, kwanoManayen owondliwa noHerode umphathi wesahlulo sesine, noSawule.
44_13_2_Bakubon ukuba ke bayabusa eNkosini, bezila ukudla, wathi uMoya oyiNgcwele, Ndahluleleni ke uBharnabhas kwanoSawule, baye emsebenzini endibabizele kuwo.
44_13_3_Bathe ke, bakuba bezile ukudla, bathandaza, babeka nezandla phezu kwabo, babandulula.
44_13_4_Bona ke ngoko, bakuthunywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele, behla baya kwaSeluki; kanjalo besuka apho ngomkhombe, baya eSipro.
44_13_5_Bathe bakufika eSalamis, balishumayela ilizwi likaThixo ezindlwini zesikhungu zamaYuda. Baye ke benoYohane, ebancedisa.
44_13_6_Besigqibile ke isiqhithi ngokuhamba, bada bafika ePafo;  bafumana siyazi uthile, ungumprofeti wobuxoki, umYuda ogama linguBhar-yesu,
44_13_7_owayehlala kwibamba uSergiyo Pawulos, indoda enokuqonda;  eyababizela kuyo ooBharnabhas noSawule, yangxamela ukuliva ilizwi likaThixo.
44_13_8_Wamelana nabo ke uElima, usiyazi lowo (kuba litsho igama lakhe lakuthethwa ngentetho evakalayo), efuna ukulijika ibamba elo elukholweni.
44_13_9_Ke kaloku uSawule, okwanguPawulos, ezele nguMoya oyiNgcwele, wamjonga,
44_13_10_wathi, Wena uzeleyo yiyo yonke inkohliso, nabubo bonke ubutshijolo, nyanandini woMtyholi, lutshabandini lobulungisa bonke, akuyi kupheza na ukuzijika iindlela ezithe tye zeNkosi?
44_13_11_Uyabona, nangoku isandla seNkosi siphezu kwakho; uya kuba yimfama, kube mzuzu ungaliboni ilanga. Kwalapho ke wawelwa lurhatyazo nobumnyama; wayephamzela, efuna abangamrhola ngesandla.
44_13_12_Lithe ke ibamba, lakukubona oko kwenzekileyo, lakholwa,  likhwankqisiwe yiyo imfundiso yeNkosi.
44_13_13_Ke kaloku, bakunduluka ngomkhombe ePafo abo babenoPawulos,  beza ePerga yelasePamfili. Wahlukana ke nabo uYohane, wabuyela eYerusalem.
44_13_14_Bendulukile ke bona ePerga, batyhutyha beza kufika kwa-Antiyokwe kwelasePisidi. Bangena endlwini yesikhungu ngomhla wesabatha, bahlala phantsi.
44_13_15_Ke kaloku, emva kokuleswa komthetho nabaprofeti, abaphathi bendlu yesikhungu bathumela kubo besithi, Madoda, bazalwana,  ukuba ninelizwi lokuvuselela abantu, thethani.
44_13_16_Usukile ke uPawulos, wawangawangisa ngesandla, wathi:  Madoda, maSirayeli, nani nimoyikayo uThixo, phulaphulani.
44_13_17_UThixo waba bantu amaSirayeli wabanyula oobawo bethu,  wabaphakamisa abantu ekuphambukeleni kwabo emhlabeni waseYiputa, wabakhupha kuwo ngengalo ephakamileyo.
44_13_18_Wathi ngexesha eliyiminyaka engathi imashumi mane,  wayithwala imikhwa yabo entlango;
44_13_19_wathi akuwisa iintlanga ezisixhenxe emhlabeni wakwaKanan,  wababela umhlaba wazo ngeqashiso.
44_13_20_Emva koko, iminyaka engathi imakhulu mane anamanci mahlanu, wabanika abagwebi, kwada kwakuSamuweli umprofeti.
44_13_21_Emva koko bacela ukumkani, uThixo wabanika uSawule, unyana kaKishe, indoda yesizwe sakwaBhenjamin, iminyaka emashumi mane.
44_13_22_Akumkhupha yena, wabavelisela uDavide, wangukumkani;  awamngqinelayo kanjalo, wathi, Ndimfumene uDavide okaYese,  indoda engantliziyo yam, eya kukwenza konke ukuthanda kwam.
44_13_23_Embewini yalowo, uthe uThixo ngokwedinga wavelisa uYesu,  ukuba abe nguMsindisi kuSirayeli;
44_13_24_kwakubon ukuba uYohane uvakalise tanci, phambi kokungena kwakhe, ubhaptizo loguquko kubo bonke abantu bakwaSirayeli.
44_13_25_Xa ke uYohane ebesekulufezeni uhambo lwakhe, ubesithi,  Nithi nina ndingubani na? Andinguye. Yabonani, kuza emva kwam endingafanelekileyo ukuba ndizithukulule iimbadada ezinyaweni zakhe.
44_13_26_Madoda, bazalwana, nyana bomlibo wakwa-Abraham, nabo phakathi kwenu bamoyikayo uThixo, ilizwi lolu lusindiso lathunyelwa kuni.
44_13_27_Kuba abo bemiyo eYerusalem, nabaphathi babo, bengamazanga lowo, kwanamazwi abaprofeti aleswayo iisabatha ngeesabatha zonke, bawazalisa ngokumgweba;
44_13_28_bathi, bengafumananga nalinye ityala lokufa, bacela kuPilato ukuba asikwe.
44_13_29_Xa ke babezifezile zonke izinto ezibhaliweyo ngaye,  bamthula emthini, bambeka engcwabeni.
44_13_30_Uthe ke uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo,
44_13_31_Yena lowo wabonwa imihla emininzi ngabo babenyuke naye,  bevela kwelaseGalili besiya eYerusalem; ngabo ke abangamangqina akhe ebantwini.
44_13_32_Nathi sinishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zedinga elo labakho koobawo bethu,
44_13_33_zokokuba uThixo ulizalisile lona kuthi, bantwana babo,  ngokumvusa uYesu; njengokuba nakwiNdumiso yesibini kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Wena unguNyana wam, ndikuzele mna namhla.
44_13_34_Malunga ke nokumvusa kwakhe kwabafileyo, angabi sabuyela ekuboleni, uselethe ukuthetha, Ndiya kuninika iinceba eziqinisekileyo zikaDavide.
44_13_35_Kungoko athi nakwenye iNdumiso, Akuyi kumyekela oyiNgcwele wakho ukuba abone ukubola.
44_13_36_Kuba uDavide okunene, akuba elisebenzele kwesakhe isizukulwana icebo likaThixo, walala ubuthongo, wabekwa kooyise, wakubona ukubola;
44_13_37_ke yena owavuswayo nguThixo, akabonanga kubola.
44_13_38_Makwazeke ngoko kuni, madoda, bazalwana, ukuba ngaye lowo kuxelwa kuni uxolelo lwezono;
44_13_39_nakuzo zonke izinto ebeningenako ukugwetyelwa nikhululeke kuzo ngomthetho kaMoses, bonke abakholwayo bayagwetyelwa ngaye yena lowo.
44_13_40_Lumkani ke ngoko, ningafikelwa koko kuthethiweyo ebaprofetini, kusithiwa,
44_13_41_Bonani, nina badeli, nimangaliswe, nithi shwaka; Ngokuba mna ndisebenza umsebenzi ngemihla yenu, Umsebenzi eningasayi kukholwa kuwo, nokuba kukho othi anicacisele.
44_13_42_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba ayaphuma amaYuda endlwini yesikhungu, babongoza abeentlanga, ukuba la mazwi athethwe kubo ngesabatha ezayo.
44_13_43_Sakubon ukuba ke sichithakele isikhungu, into eninzi yamaYuda neyabangene ebuYudeni, abamhlonelayo uThixo,  yabalandela ooPawulos noBharnabhas; abathi bona, bethetha kubo,  babeyisela ekuthini, mabahlale behleli elubabalweni lukaThixo.
44_13_44_Kuthe ke ngelandelayo isabatha, waphantsa ukuhlanganisana umzi wonke, ukuba ulive ilizwi likaThixo.
44_13_45_Ke kaloku amaYuda, akuzibona izihlwele, azala ngumona,  aziphika izinto ezibe zithethwa nguPawulos, aphika enyelisa.
44_13_46_Bathetha ke ngokungafihlisiyo uPawulos noBharnabhas,  bathi, Bekufuneka ukuba lithethwe kuni kuqala ilizwi likaThixo;  ekubeni ke niligibile, nazigweba ukuba anibufanele ubomi obungunaphakade, niyabona, sibheka kuzo iintlanga.
44_13_47_Kuba isiwisele umthetho ngokunjalo iNkosi, yathi,  Ndikubekile ukuba ube lukhanyiselo lweentlanga, Ukuze ube ngowosindiso, kude kuse ekupheleni kwehlabathi.
44_13_48_Bakuva ke oko abeentlanga, bavuya, balizukisa ilizwi leNkosi, bakholwa bonke ababemiselwe ubomi obungunaphakade.
44_13_49_Laye ke ilizwi leNkosi lihanjiswa kulo lonke ilizwe elo.
44_13_50_Ke kaloku amaYuda abaxhokonxa abafazi ababehlonela uThixo,  ababekekileyo, nabaninimzi; abaxhoxhela intshutshiso ooPawulos noBharnabhas, abakhupha emideni yawo.
44_13_51_Bathe ke bona bawavuthululela uthuli lweenyawo zabo, beza eIkoniyo.
44_13_52_Baye ke abafundi bezaliswe luvuyo nanguMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_14_1_Kwathi ke eIkoniyo, bangena kunye endlwini yesikhungu yamaYuda, bathetha ngokokude kukholwe inkitha enkulu yamaYuda kwanamaGrike.
44_14_2_Asuka ke wona amaYuda angavumiyo ukuva, ayenza yamibi imiphefumlo yabeentlanga ngakubo abazalwana.
44_14_3_Balibala ke ngoko ixesha elaneleyo, bethetha ngokungafihlisiyo ngeNkosi, eyalingqinelayo ilizwi lobabalo lwayo, inika nokuba kwenzeke imiqondiso nezimanga ngezandla zabo.
44_14_4_Yahlulelana ke inkoliso yomzi; inxenye yangakumaYuda,  inxenye yangakubapostile.
44_14_5_Bathe ke, bakubon ukuba abeentlanga nabangamaYuda, kunye nabaphathi bawo, bangxamele ukubaphatha kakubi, babagibisele ngamatye:
44_14_6_bakuqiqa oko bona, basabela emizini yelaseLikawoni, iListra neDerbhe, nakuloo mimandla;
44_14_7_baye bezishumayela nalapho iindaba ezilungileyo.
44_14_8_Kwakuhleli ke ndoda ithile eListra, ife iinyawo,  isisiqhwala kwasesizalweni sonina, ingazanga ihambe.
44_14_9_Yona leyo yayimva uPawulos ethetha; owathi, eqwalasele kuyo, ebona ukuba inokholo lokusindiswa,
44_14_10_wathi ngezwi elikhulu, Suka, ume ngeenyawo zakho, uthi nkqo; yesuka umtsi, yahambahamba.
44_14_11_Ke kaloku iindimbane, zakukubona oko akwenzileyo uPawulos,  zaphakamisa izwi lazo ngokwesiLikawoni, zisithi, Oothixo bahlile beza kuthi, befana nabantu.
44_14_12_Kanjalo zazimbiza uBharnabhas ngokuthi nguZeyus, noPawulos ngokuthi nguHermes, ekubeni ke ibinguye obesisithethi.
44_14_13_Kuthe ke umbingeleli kaZeyus, obephambi komzi wabo, wazisa iinkunzi zeenkomo nezidanga zeentyantyambo emasangweni, wafuna ukubingelela, kunye neendimbane.
44_14_14_Bekuvile ke oko abapostile, ooBharnabhas noPawulos,  bazikrazula iingubo zabo, batsiba phakathi kwendimbane,  bedanduluka,
44_14_15_besithi, Madoda, yini na ukuba nenjenje? Nathi singabantu abeva enikuvayo nina; sinishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zokuba nibuye kwaba thixo bangento, nibuyele kuThixo ophilileyo,  owenza izulu nomhlaba nolwandle, neento zonke ezikwezo zinto;
44_14_16_owathi ezizukulwaneni ezadlulayo waziyeka zonke iintlanga,  ukuba zihambe ngezazo iindlela;
44_14_17_kanti ke noko akayekanga ukuzingqinela, esenza okulungileyo, esinika imvula evela ezulwini, namaxesha aneendyebo, ezanelisa iintliziyo zethu ngokudla nangemihlali.
44_14_18_Besitsho, kwaba ngenkankulu ukuzidambisa iindimbane, ukuba zingabingeleli kubo.
44_14_19_Ke kaloku kwafika amaYuda evela kwa-Antiyokwe naseIkoniyo,  azixhokonxa iindimbane, amxuluba ngamatye uPawulos, amrholela ngaphandle komzi, eba ufile.
44_14_20_Uthe, bakubon ukuba bamngqongile ke abafundi, wavuka waya kungena kuwo umzi. Ngengomso waphuma enoBharnabhas, waya eDerbhe.
44_14_21_Bewushumayezile loo mzi iindaba ezilungileyo, benze nabafundi abaneleyo, babuya beza eListra, naseIkoniyo,  nakwa-Antiyokwe,
44_14_22_besomeleza imiphefumlo yabafundi, bebavuselela ukuba bahlale behleli elukholweni; besithi, Simelwe kukuphumela ezimbandezelweni ezininzi, ukungena ebukumkanini bukaThixo.
44_14_23_Bathe ke bakuba benyule amadoda amakhulu kwibandla ngebandla, bethandazile kunye nokuzila ukudla, bawayaleza eNkosini awayekholwe kuyo.
44_14_24_Betyhutyhe elasePisidi, bafika kwelasePamfili.
44_14_25_Bathi, belithethile ilizwi ePerga; behla baya kwa-Atali.
44_14_26_Besuka khona apho ngomkhombe, baya kwa-Antiyokwe, apho babenikelwe khona elubabalweni lukaThixo, ukuba baye emsebenzini, lo ke bawufezileyo.
44_14_27_Befikile ke, balihlanganisa ibandla, balibikela oko zingako izinto awazenzayo uThixo enabo, nokokuba iintlanga wazivulela ucango lokholo.
44_14_28_Balibala ke khona apho ixesha elingelincinane, ndawonye nabafundi.
44_15_1_Kwehla abathile bevela kwelakwaYuda, babafundisa abazalwana, besithi, Ukuba anithanga naluswe ngokwesiko likaMoses, aninako ukusindiswa.
44_15_2_Kuthe ngoko, kwakubon ukuba uPawulos noBharnabhas baba nempikiswano nembuzwano engencinane nabo, kwagqitywa kwelokuba uPawulos noBharnabhas, nabanye abathile kubo, mabenyuke baye kubapostile namadoda amakhulu eYerusalem, ngawo lo mbuzo.
44_15_3_Bathi ke ngoko, bephelekelelwe libandla, balityhutyha elaseFenike nelaseSamariya, bexela ukuguquka kwazo iintlanga;  babanga uvuyo olukhulu kubo bonke abazalwana.
44_15_4_Befikile ke eYerusalem, bamkelwa libandla nangabapostile nangamadoda amakhulu; kananjalo babika ukuba zinkulu kwazo izinto awazenzayo uThixo enabo.
44_15_5_Kwasuka kwema ke abathile abakholiweyo behlelo labaFarisi,  besithi, Bamelwe kukuba baluke, nokuthi bathethelwe ngelithi,  mabawugcine umthetho kaMoses.
44_15_6_Bahlanganisana ke abapostile namadoda amakhulu, ukuba bayikhangele loo ndawo.
44_15_7_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba kubekho imbuzwano enkulu, wesuka uPetros wathi kubo, Madoda, bazalwana, niyazi kakuhle nina,  ukuba uThixo kwangemihla yakudala wanyula phakathi kwethu,  ukuba iintlanga zilive ngawo umlomo wam ilizwi leendaba ezilungileyo, zikholwe.
44_15_8_UThixo, umazi-ntliziyo, wazingqinela, ezinika uMoya oyiNgcwele kwanjengathi;
44_15_9_akacalula phakathi kwethu nazo, ezihlambulule iintliziyo zazo ngokholo.
44_15_10_Phofu ke nimlingelani na uThixo, ngokubeka idyokhwe entanyeni yabafundi, esibe singenamandla okuyithwala, thina kwanoobawo bethu?
44_15_11_Ke ngalo ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, siyakholwa ukuba sosindiswa kwangohlobo ezisindiswa ngalo nazo.
44_15_12_Yathi cwaka ke yonke inkitha yabantu, yaphulaphula ooBharnabhas noPawulos, becacisa oko yayingako imiqondiso nezimanga, awazenzayo uThixo phakathi kwazo iintlanga ngabo.
44_15_13_Ke kaloku, emva kokuthi cwaka kwabo, waphendula uYakobi esithi, Madoda, bazalwana, ndiphulaphuleni.
44_15_14_USimon lo ukucacisile ukuba wathini na ekuqaleni uThixo ukuzivelela iintlanga, ukuba kuzo alinyulele abantu elakhe igama.
44_15_15_Ayavumelana nako oko amazwi abaprofeti, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,
44_15_16_Emveni koku ndiya kubuya, Ndize ndibuye ndiwakhe umnquba owileyo kaDavide, Amanxuwa awo ndibuye ndiwakhe kanjalo,  Ndibuye ndiwumise;
44_15_17_Okokuze amaqongqolo abantu ayifune iNkosi, Zifune zonke iintlanga ezibizwe ngalo igama lam; Itsho iNkosi, leyo izenzayo zonke ezi zinto.
44_15_18_Iyaziwa ke nguThixo kuselokwaphakade yonke imisebenzi yakhe.
44_15_19_Kungoko mna ndigqiba kwelithi, masingabakhathazi abo beentlanga babuyelayo kuThixo;
44_15_20_kodwa masibabhalele ukuba bazikhwebule kwizingcoliso zezithixo, nombulo, nento ekrwitshiweyo, negazi.
44_15_21_Kuba uMoses kwakwizizukulwana zakudala unabamvakalisayo kwimizi ngemizi, eleswa ezindlwini zesikhungu ezi iisabatha ngeesabatha.
44_15_22_Kwaza kwabonakala kulungile kubapostile nakumadoda amakhulu, ndawonye nalo ibandla liphela, ukuba banyule amadoda kwakubo, bawathume kwa-Antiyokwe ndawonye noPawulos noBharnabhas; angooYuda ogama limbi linguBharsabhas, noSilas,  amadoda angabakhokeli kubazalwana.
44_15_23_Babhala incwadi ngesandla sawo, besithi: Abapostile namadoda amakhulu nabazalwana bayabulisa kubo abazalwana basezintlangeni, abakwa-Antiyokwe nakwelaseSiriya nakwelaseKiliki.
44_15_24_Ekubeni ke sivile ukuba abathile kuthi baphuma baya banikhathaza ngamazwi, beyikhukulisa imiphefumlo yenu, besithi,  makwalukwe, kugcinwe umthetho, esingabayalelanga wona:
44_15_25_kwabonakala kulungile kuthi, simxhelo mnye, ukuba sinyule amadoda ukuba siwathume kuni, ndawonye neentanda zethu,  uBharnabhas noPawulos,
44_15_26_abantu ababuncamileyo ubomi babo ngenxa yegama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
44_15_27_Sibathumile ngoko ooYuda noSilas, abothi nabo banibikele ezi ndawo ngomlomo.
44_15_28_Kuba kwabonakala kulungile kuye uMoya oyiNgcwele, nakuthi,  ukuba kungabekwa phezu kwenu mthwalo ungaphezu kwezi ndawo zifunekayo:
44_15_29_zokuba nizile izinto ezibingelelwe kwizithixo, negazi,  nento ekrwitshiweyo, nombulo; enothi nakuzigcina kuzo, nibe niyalungisa. Hlalani kakuhle.
44_15_30_Bathe ke ngoko, bakunduluka, beza kwa-Antiyokwe;  bawuhlanganisa umhlambi wabazalwana, bayinikela incwadi leyo.
44_15_31_Beyilesile ke bona, baluvuyela uthuthuzelo olu.
44_15_32_Ke kaloku ooYuda noSilas, kuba bengabaprofeti nabo,  babathuthuzela abazalwana ngokuthetha okukhulu, babomeleza.
44_15_33_Bakuba ke benze ixesha, banduluka bexolile kubazalwana,  baya kubapostile.
44_15_34_Kodwa kuSilas kwabonakala kulungile ukuba akhe ahlale khona.
44_15_35_Balibala ke ooPawulos noBharnabhas kwa-Antiyokwe,  befundisa, beshumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zelizwi leNkosi,  kwanabanye abaninzi.
44_15_36_Ke kaloku, emva kwemihla ethile, wathi uPawulos kuBharnabhas, Makhe sibuye siye kuvelela abazalwana bethu, kuyo yonke imizi ngemizi esalazisayo kuyo ilizwi leNkosi, sibone ukuba banjani na.
44_15_37_Ke kaloku uBharnabhas wangxamela ukuba bathabathe nabo uYohane, ekuthiwa nguMarko;
44_15_38_kodwa uPawulos wathi akufanelekile ukumthabatha, ahambe nabo, lowo wemkayo kubo kwelasePamfili, akaya nabo emsebenzini.
44_15_39_Kwabakho ngoko amazwi abukhali phakathi kwabo, ngokokude bahlukane; athi uBharnabhas amthabathe uMarko, anduluke ngomkhombe aye eSipro;
44_15_40_kodwa uPawulos wanyula uSilas, wemka, enikelwe kubabalo lukaThixo ngabazalwana.
44_15_41_Walityhutyha ke elaseSiriya nelaseKiliki, ewomeleza amabandla.
44_16_1_Ke kaloku wafika eDerbhe naseListra. Kwabonakala kukho mfundi uthile apho, ugama linguTimoti, unyana wentokazi ethile engumYudakazi okholiweyo, kodwa uyise engumGrike;
44_16_2_obengqinelwe kakuhle ngabazalwana baseListra naseIkoniyo.
44_16_3_Lowo uPawulos wathanda ukuba aphume naye; wamthabatha wamalusa, ngenxa yamaYuda abekwezo ndawo; kuba bonke babemazi uyise ukuba ungumGrike.
44_16_4_Ke kaloku, xa babeyihamba imizi, babanikela imimiselo ukuba bayigcine, leyo ibimiswe ngabapostile namadoda amakhulu aseYerusalem.
44_16_5_Ayezimaseka ke ngoko amabandla elukholweni, esanda ngenani imihla ngemihla.
44_16_6_Ke kaloku, bakulityhutyha ilizwe laseFrigi nelaseGalati,  balelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele ukulithetha ilizwi kwelaseAsiya.
44_16_7_Befikile kwelaseMisi, balinga ukuya nakwelaseBhitini, kodwa akabavumelanga uMoya lowo;
44_16_8_badlula ke kwelaseMisi, behla baya eTrowa.
44_16_9_Kwabonakala umbono kuPawulos ebusuku. Kwema ndoda ithile yelaseMakedoni, imbongoza isithi, Wela uze kwelaseMakedoni,  usisize.
44_16_10_Ke kaloku, akuwubona umbono lowo, safuna thina kwaoko ukuphuma siye kwelaseMakedoni, sigqibe kwelithi, iNkosi isibizele ukuba sibashumayeze iindaba ezilungileyo.
44_16_11_Sindulukile ngoko ngomkhombe eTrowa, sathi ngqo ukuya eSamotraki, sathi ngengomso seza eNeyapoli;
44_16_12_ukusuka apho, seza eFilipi, owona mzi wokuqala wecala elo lilelaseMakedoni, uyikoloni. Salibala ke kuloo mzi imihla ethile.
