44_16_13_Sathi ngomhla wesabatha, saphuma saya ngaphandle komzi ngasemlanjeni, apho umthandazo ubusakwenziwa khona; sahlala phantsi, samana sithetha kubafazi ababebuthelene khona.
44_16_14_Kwaye kuphulaphula intokazi ethile egama linguLidiya,  umthengisi weengubo ezibomvu, womzi weTiyatira, emhlonelayo uThixo, entliziyo yayivulayo iNkosi ukuba izinyamekele izinto ezazithethwa nguPawulos.
44_16_15_Ke kaloku, yakuba ibhaptiziwe nendlu yayo, yasibongoza isithi, Ukuba nithi ndikholiwe eNkosini, ngenani endlwini yam,  nihlale. Yasizama.
44_16_16_Ke kaloku kwathi, kwakubon ukuba siyaya endaweni yokuthandaza, sahlangatyezwa sisicakazana esithile, sinomoya wemilozi; sona besizizuzisa iinkosi zaso inzuzo enkulu ngokuvumisa.
44_16_17_Sona eso sithene mbende noPawulos nathi, samana sidanduluka sisithi, Aba bantu bangabakhonzi bakaThixo Osenyangweni, bona basazisayo indlela yosindiso.
44_16_18_Oko ke sakwenza sona imihla emininzi. Ebindekile ke uPawulos, wathi guququ, wathi kuwo umoya, Ndiyakuthethela egameni likaYesu Kristu ukuba uphume kuso. Waphuma ke kwangelo lixa.
44_16_19_Ke kaloku, zakubona iinkosi zaso ukuba liphumile ithemba lenzuzo yazo, zababamba ooPawulos noSilas, zabarholela endaweni yembutho, kubaphathi:
44_16_20_zabazisa kubo abathetheli, zathi, Aba bantu bayawukhathaza kakhulu umzi wethu, bengamaYuda;
44_16_21_basifundisa amasiko ekungavumelekileyo ukuba siwamkele,  nokuba siwenze, singamaRoma.
44_16_22_Isihlwele sabahlanganyela; nabathetheli bazithi qwengeqwenge iingubo zabo, bathi mababethwe ngeentswazi.
44_16_23_Bathi, bakuba bebabethe imivumbo emininzi, babaphosa entolongweni, bamthethela umgcini wababanjwa ukuba abagcine ngokunqabileyo;
44_16_24_owathi, amkele umyalelo onjalo, wabaphosa kwengaphakathi intolongo, waziqinisa iinyawo zabo emithini.
44_16_25_Ke kaloku, malunga phakathi kobusuku, ooPawulos noSilas babethandaza, bevuma elokudumisa uThixo; babephulaphula ke ababanjwa.
44_16_26_Kwabakho ke ngequbuliso unyikimo olukhulu lomhlaba,  ngokokude zizanyazanyiswe iziseko zentolongo; zavuleka kwaoko iingcango zonke, athukululeka amakhamandela abo bonke.
44_16_27_Ethe tyithi ke ebuthongweni umgcini wababanjwa, ebona iingcango zentolongo zivulekile, warhola ikrele, eza kuzibulala, eba ababanjwa babalekile.
44_16_28_UPawulos wabiza ke ngezwi elikhulu wathi, Ungazenzakalisi;  kuba sikho sonke apha.
44_16_29_Ebize ke izibane, watsiba phakathi, waza egubha, wawa phantsi phambi koPawulos noSilas.
44_16_30_Wabazisa phandle, wathi, Zinkosi, ndimelwe kukuthini na,  ukuze ndisindiswe?
44_16_31_Bathi ke bona, Kholwa kuyo iNkosi uYesu Kristu, wosindiswa wena nendlu yakho.
44_16_32_Balithetha kuye ilizwi leNkosi, nakubo bonke ababesendlwini yakhe.
44_16_33_Wabathabatha ngelo lixa lobusuku, wayihlamba imivumbo yabo; wabhaptizwa yena kwalapho, nabo bonke abakhe.
44_16_34_Kananjalo, ebanyuse wabasa endlwini yakhe, wabeka ukudla phambi kwabo, wagcoba nendlu yakhe yonke, kuba ekholwa kuThixo.
44_16_35_Kwakusa, abathetheli bathuma amadindala, besithi,  Bakhulule abo bantu.
44_16_36_Uwaxelile ke umgcini wababanjwa la mazwi kuPawulos, wathi,  Abathetheli bathumele ukuba nikhululwe; ke ngoko phumani,  nihambe ngoxolo.
44_16_37_Uthe ke uPawulos kuwo, Basityabule ekuhleni singagwetywanga, sibantu bangamaRoma; basiphosa entolongweni;  ngoku basikhupha ngasese na? Nakanye; mabeze bona ngokwabo,  basikhuphe.
44_16_38_Awaxela ke la mazwi amadindala kubathetheli; boyika,  bakuva ukuba bangamaRoma.
44_16_39_Beza bababongoza, babakhupha, babacela ukuba baphume kuwo umzi.
44_16_40_Bephumile ke entolongweni, baya kungena kwaLidiya; bathi,  bebabonile abazalwana, babayala, bemka.
44_17_1_Ke kaloku, bakuba beyihambile iAmfipoli neApoloni, beza eTesalonika, apho yayikhona indlu yesikhungu yamaYuda.
44_17_2_Ngokwesiko ke likaPawulos wangena kuwo; waye iisabatha ezintathu exoxa nawo, ethabatha ezibhalweni,
44_17_3_etyhila, ebeka phambi kwawo ukuba uKristu ubemelwe kukuva ubunzima, aze avuke kwabafileyo; nokuthi, Nguye ke uKristu, lo Yesu ndinazisa yena mna.
44_17_4_Inxenye kuwo yoyiseka, yazibandakanya noPawulos noSilas,  kwanenkitha enkulu yamaGrike amhlonelayo uThixo; nakubafazi abaziintloko ababa mbalwa.
44_17_5_Ke kaloku amaYuda angoyisekileyo, enomsindo, azithabathela amadoda athile angendawo, angamahilihili, enza ibubu,  awuphithizelisa umzi, ayifikela nendlu kaYason, efuna ukubarholela eluntwini.
44_17_6_Akuba engabafumananga ke, amrholela uYason nabazalwana abathile kubaphathi bomzi, ebhomboloza esithi, Aba baliqungaqungileyo elimiweyo, bona bafikile nalapha;
44_17_7_athe uYason wabamkela ngobubele; baye bonke aba besenza okuchasene nemimiselo kaKesare, besithi, Kukho kumkani wumbi unguYesu.
44_17_8_Asikhathaza ke isihlwele nabaphathi bomzi, bakuziva ezi zinto.
44_17_9_Bethabathe isibambiso kuYason nakwabanye, babakhulula.
44_17_10_Ke kaloku bathi abazalwana kwaoko bamndulula uPawulos noSilas ngobusuku, ukuba baye eBhereya; abathi bona bakufika,  baya endlwini yesikhungu yamaYuda.
44_17_11_La ke aye enobuntu kunawaseTesalonika; la wona alamkela ilizwi ngentumekelelo yonke, ezincina izibhalo imihla ngemihla,  ukuba zingaba zinjalo na ezi zinto.
44_17_12_Kwakholwa ke ngoko into eninzi kuwo, nakumaGrikekazi abekekileyo, nakumadoda, ababa mbalwa.
44_17_13_Akuqonda ke awaseTesalonika amaYuda, ukuba ilizwi likaThixo lazisiwe nguPawulos naseBhereya, eza azizamazamisa nalapho izihlwele.
44_17_14_Bandula ke kwaoko abazalwana, bamsusa uPawulos ukuba abheke ngaselwandle; kwasala uSilas kwanoTimoti khona.
44_17_15_Bathe ke bona abamkhaphayo uPawulos, bamsa eAtene; bakuba bamkele umthetho oya kooSilas noTimoti, wokuba beze kuye kwakamsinya, bemka.
44_17_16_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uPawulos ubalindile eAtene,  wacaphuka, akuwubona umzi uzizithixo kuphela.
44_17_17_Wayexoxa ke ngoko endlwini yesikhungu namaYuda,  nabamhlonelayo uThixo; nasendaweni yembutho imihla ngemihla,  nabasukuba bekhona.
44_17_18_Ke kaloku izithanda-bulumko ezithile zamaEpikure nezamaStoyike zamhlanganyela; yayisithi inxenye, Azi lifuna ukuthini na eli pholopholo? Abanye ke bathi, Ngathi ngumazisi wezithixo zasemzini; ngokuba wayebashumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zikaYesu, novuko lwabafileyo.
44_17_19_Bamthabatha ke bamsa eAreyopago, besithi, Singakhe siyive na le mfundiso intsha ithethwa nguwe, ukuba iyini na?
44_17_20_Kuba uzisa izinto ezithile zasemzini ezindlebeni zethu;  singa singazi ngoko, ukuba zingaba zifuna ukuba yintoni na ezi zinto.
44_17_21_Ke kaloku abaseAtene bonke, nabasemzini abangabahambi,  babengazilibazisi nganto yimbi, ngaphandle kokuxela nokuva olona daba lutsha.
44_17_22_Wema ke uPawulos esazulwini seAreyopago, wathi: Madoda aseAtene, ndiyabona ukuba ezintweni zonke nincamisile ukuhlonela izithixo.
44_17_23_Kuba ndithe, ndihamba ndisingasinga izinto enizihlonelayo,  ndafumana nesibingelelo ekubhalwe kuso, kwathiwa, kongaziwayo uThixo. Lowo ngoko nimhlonelayo ningamazi, ndinazisa yena mna.
44_17_24_UThixo yena, owenza ihlabathi neento zonke ezikulo, lowo,  eyiNkosi nje yezulu nomhlaba, akahlali zitempileni zenziwe ngazandla.
44_17_25_Kananjalo akaphiliswa zizandla zabantu, ngokoswele into,  inguye nje obanika bonke ubomi, nomphefumlo, nazo zonke izinto.
44_17_26_Kanjalo wazenza ngagazi-nye zonke iintlanga zabantu, ukuba zime phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba, emisa amaxesha abekwe ngenxa engaphambili, nemida yokuma kwazo;
44_17_27_ukuze bayifune iNkosi, ukuba kambe bangaphuthaphutha bayifumane, nakuba ingekude kuthi sonke ngabanye.
44_17_28_Kuba kuyo sihleli, siyashukuma, sikho; njengokuba neembongi ezithile zenu zitshilo ukuthi, Kuba nathi siyinzala yakhe.
44_17_29_Siyinzala kaThixo nje ke, akusifanele ukuba sibe ubuthixo obu bufana negolide nesilivere nelitye, into eqingqwe ngobungcibi nangengcinga yomntu.
44_17_30_Loo maxesha ke ngoko okungazi, uThixo wawayeka ngabomi;  kungoku uyala abantu bonke ezindaweni zonke ukuba baguquke;
44_17_31_ngokokuba emise umhla, aza kuligweba ngawo elimiweyo ngobulungisa, ngendoda awayimisayo, ebanike bonke ukholo ngokuyivusa kwabafileyo.
44_17_32_Ke kaloku, bakuva ngokuvuka kwabafileyo, inxenye yayihlekisa ngaloo nto, abanye bathi, Sobuya sikuve wena ngale nto.
44_17_33_Waphuma njalo ke uPawulos phakathi kwabo.
44_17_34_Kodwa amadoda athile anamathele kuye, akholwa,  anoDiyonisiyo waseAreyopago, nomfazi ogama linguDamari, nabanye ndawonye nabo.
44_18_1_Ke kaloku, emva kwezi zinto, wahlukana uPawulos neAtene,  weza eKorinte.
44_18_2_Wafumana umYuda othile wasePonto ngokuzalwa, ogama linguAkwila, esandula ukuvela eItali, noPrisila umkakhe, weza kubo (ngenxa yokuba uKlawudiyo ebemise ukuthi, makahlukane neRoma onke amaYuda).
44_18_3_Kuthe ke, ngenxa yokuba belilinye ishishini labo,  waselehlala nabo esebenza; kuba babengabenzi beentente,  ishishini labo.
44_18_4_Wayexoxa ke endlwini yesikhungu iisabatha ngeesabatha zonke, ezamela ukweyisa amaYuda namaGrike.
44_18_5_Ke kaloku, bakuhla bevela kwelaseMakedoni ooSilas noTimoti,  uPawulos waxinwa ngumoya, waqononondisa kumaYuda ukuba uYesu lo nguye uKristu.
44_18_6_Uthe ke, akuchasa, akunyelisa, wavuthulula iingubo zakhe,  wathi kuwo, Igazi lenu malibe phezu kwentloko yenu;  ndihlambulukile mna; kuthabathela kweli xesha, ndiya kuya kwiintlanga.
44_18_7_Esuka khona, weza endlwini yothile ogama linguYusto,  omhlonelayo uThixo, ondlu yayamene nendlu yesikhungu.
44_18_8_Uthe ke uKrispo, umphathi wendlu yesikhungu, wakholwa yiNkosi, nendlu yakhe iphela; nento eninzi yamaKorinte yakuva yakholwa, yabhaptizwa.
44_18_9_Yathi ke iNkosi ngombono ebusuku kuPawulos, Musa ukoyika,  thetha ungathi tu;
44_18_10_ngokokuba mna ndinawe, kanjalo akukho namnye uya kukusa sandla, akuphathe kakubi; ngokokuba ndinabantu abaninzi kulo mzi.
44_18_11_Wahlala khona ke umnyaka oneenyanga ezintandathu, efundisa ilizwi likaThixo phakathi kwabo.
44_18_12_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uGaliyo ulibamba kwelaseAkaya,  amwela uPawulos amaYuda ngamxhelo mnye, amsa esihlalweni sokugweba,
44_18_13_esithi, Lo uzamela ukweyisa abantu ukuba bamhlonele uThixo ngokunxamnye nomthetho.
44_18_14_Uthe ke xa uPawulos aza kuvula umlomo, wathi uGaliyo kumaYuda, Ukuba ke ngoko ibiyinto yentswela-bulungisa, nokuba ibiyeyobutshijolo obungendawo, maYuda, ngekufanelekile ukuba ndininyamezele;
44_18_15_kodwa ukuba yimbuzwano ngelizwi, namagama, nomthetho ongowenu, zikhangeleleni nina; kuba mna andingi ndingaba ngumgwebi wezo zinto.
44_18_16_Wawagxotha esihlalweni sokugweba.
44_18_17_Ambamba ke onke amaGrike uSostene, umphathi wendlu yesikhungu, ambetha phambi kwesihlalo sokugweba. Akwabakho nanye yezo zinto ayikhathalelayo uGaliyo.
44_18_18_Ke kaloku uPawulos ukhe wahlala imihla eyaneleyo. Waza,  ebabulisile abazalwana, wemka ngomkhombe waya kwelaseSiriya,  enoPrisila noAkwila; eyichebile intloko eKenkreya, kuba waye enesibambiso.
44_18_19_Wehla ke wafika e-Efese, wabashiya bona apho; ke yena wangena endlwini yesikhungu, waxoxa namaYuda.
44_18_20_Uthe ke, akumcela ukuba akhe ahlale umzuzu kuwo, akavuma;
44_18_21_wawabulisa ke esithi, Nokuba kutheni, ndimelwe kukuwenzela eYerusalem umthendeleko ozayo; kodwa ndobuya ndize kuni, ukuba uThixo uyavuma. Waza wemka ngomkhombe e-Efese.
44_18_22_Uthe, ehle weza eKesareya, wenyuka walibulisa ibandla,  wehla waya kwa-Antiyokwe.
44_18_23_Enze ixesha elithile khona, wemka, walityhutyha ilizwe laseGalati, nelaseFrigi, ebomeleza bonke abafundi.
44_18_24_Ke kaloku wathi umYuda othile, ogama linguApolo,  wakwa-Alesandire ngokuzalwa, umfo oliciko, wehla waya e-Efese,  enobunkunkqele ezibhalweni.
44_18_25_Lowo ke wayeyifundisiwe ngomlomo indlela yeNkosi; waza evutha ngumoya wathetha, wafundisa ngokucokisekileyo izinto ezingayo iNkosi, esazi kakuhle ubhaptizo lukaYohane lodwa.
44_18_26_Yena kanjalo waqala ukuthetha ngokungafihlisiyo endlwini yesikhungu. Bathe ke bakumva ooAkwila noPrisila, bamthabathela kubo, bamtyhilela ngokucokisekileyo ngakumbi indlela kaThixo.
44_18_27_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba unga angadlula aye kwelaseAkaya,  abazalwana babhala bebayala abafundi ukuba bamamkele; owathi akufika, wabanceda kakhulu abakholiweyo ngalo ubabalo;
44_18_28_kuba waweyisa, wawancamisa ekuhleni amaYuda, ebonakalalisa ngazo izibhalo ukuba uYesu lo unguye uKristu.
44_19_1_Ke kaloku kwathi, xa uApolo aseKorinte, uPawulos,  ewatyhutyhile amacala asentla, weza e-Efese;
44_19_2_wafumana bafundi bathile, wathi kubo, UMoya oyiNgcwele namamkela na, nakholwayo nje? Bathi ke bona kuye, Asizanga sive nokuva ukuba kukho uMoya oyiNgcwele.
44_19_3_Wathi kubo, Nanibhaptizelwe enini na phofu? Bathe ke bona,  Elubhaptizweni lukaYohane.
44_19_4_Wathi ke uPawulos, UYohane okunene wabhaptiza ubhaptizo lwenguquko, esithi ebantwini, mabakholwe kulowo uzayo emva kwakhe, oko kukuthi, kuKristu Yesu.
44_19_5_Bevile ke, babhaptizelwa egameni leNkosi uYesu.
44_19_6_Uthe uPawulos akubeka izandla phezu kwabo, wehla uMoya oyiNgcwele phezu kwabo, baye bethetha ngeelwimi, beprofeta.
44_19_7_Aye ke amadoda lawo ewonke engathi alishumi elinamabini.
44_19_8_Ke kaloku, wangena endlwini yesikhungu, wathetha ngokungafihlisiyo iinyanga zantathu, exoxa nabantu, ebeyisela kwizinto ezingabo ubukumkani bukaThixo.
44_19_9_Ke bakuba abathile belukhuni, bengaphulaphuli, bethetha okubi ngayo iNdlela leyo phambi komhlambi, wesuka kubo,  wabahlula abafundi, exoxa imihla ngemihla esikolweni sikaTirano.
44_19_10_Oku ke kwenzeka iminyaka emibini, ngokokude bonke abemiyo kwelaseAsiya balive ilizwi leNkosi uYesu, amaYuda kwanamaGrike.
44_19_11_Waye noThixo esenze ngezandla zikaPawulos imisebenzi yamandla engahlali isihla;
44_19_12_ngokokude kusiwe nakwimilwelwe iiqhiya nemibhinqo, ivela emzimbeni wakhe, zisuke kubo izifo, bathi noomoya abakhohlakeleyo baphume kubo.
44_19_13_Ke kaloku bathi abathile bakumaYuda abhadulayo,  angabafungisi, bazamela ukulibiza igama leNkosi uYesu phezu kwabanoomoya abakhohlakeleyo, besithi, Sinifungisa uYesu lowo uvakaliswayo nguPawulos.
44_19_14_Kwaye kukho ke nyana bathile basixhenxe bakaSkeva, umYuda,  umbingeleli omkhulu, ababekwenza oko.
44_19_15_Waphendula ke umoya okhohlakeleyo, wathi. UYesu ndiyamazi,  noPawulos ndiyamazi kakuhle; ke nina ningoobani na?
44_19_16_Wesuka umntu obukuye umoya okhohlakeleyo, wabatsibela,  wabagagamela wabeyisa, ngokokude babaleke baphume kuloo ndlu bengxwelerhiwe, beze.
44_19_17_Kwathi ke oko kwazeka kuwo onke amaYuda, kwanakumaGrike amiyo e-Efese; angenwa kukoyika onke, lenziwa likhulu igama leNkosi uYesu.
44_19_18_Yaye nento eninzi yabakholiweyo isiza, izivuma izixela izenzo zabo.
44_19_19_Yathi ke nento eyaneleyo yabasebenza izenzo zobugqi,  yazizisa ndaweni-nye iincwadi zayo, bawayazitshisa phambi kwabo bonke; bawabala amaxabiso azo, bafumana engamawaka amashumi mahlanu esilivere.
44_19_20_Lenjenjalo ke ilizwi leNkosi ukwanda ngamandla nokweyisa.
44_19_21_Ke kaloku, zakuzaliseka ezi zinto, wamisa emoyeni wakhe uPawulos ukuba athi, elityhutyhile elaseMakedoni nelaseAkaya,  aye eYerusalem, esithi, Emveni kokuba ndithe ndakhona, ndimelwe kukuba ndibone neRoma.
44_19_22_Wathuma ke kwelaseMakedoni bababini kwabamlungiselelayo,  uTimoti noErasto; yena ke wakha walibala umzuzu kwelaseAsiya.
44_19_23_Ke kaloku kwabakho ngelo xesha inkathazeko engencinane ngayo iNdlela le.
44_19_24_Kuba uthile, ogama linguDemetriyo, umkhandi wesilivere,  obesenza iitempile zesilivere zika-Artemis, wayezizuzisa iingcibi inzuzo engencinane.
44_19_25_Waziqukela ndawonye, kwanabasebenzi bezinto ezinjalo,  wathi, Madoda, niyazi kakuhle ukuba buphuma kule nzuzo ubutyebi bethu;
44_19_26_kananjalo niyabona, niyeva, ukuba akuse-Efese kodwa,  kuphantse ukuba kulo lonke elaseAsiya, athe lo Pawulos waphambukisa isihlwele esaneleyo, ngokusoyisa ngamazwi athi,  asingoothixo abo benziwa ngesandla.
44_19_27_Asisiso ke esi sabelo sethu sodwa esisichenge sokudelwa;  kwanetempile yothixokazi omkhulu uArtemis iza kubalelwa ekuthini yinto engento, butshabalale ke nobungangamela bakhe,  ohlonelwa lelaseAsiya liphela nelimiweyo.
44_19_28_Bakukuva ke oko, bazala ngumsindo, bankqangaza, besithi,  Mkhulu uArtemis wabase-Efese!
44_19_29_Wazala umzi uphela sisidubedube; besuka indulumbane ngamxhelo mnye endaweni yokubonela, bamthi hlasi uGayo noAristarko, abelaseMakedoni, ababehamba noPawulos.
44_19_30_Uthe ke uPawulos, enga angangena entlanganisweni yabantu,  abamvumela abafundi.
44_19_31_Abathile ke bakubaphathi belaseAsiya, benobuhlobo kuye,  bathumela kuye, bambongoza ukuba angazinikeli endaweni yokubonela.
44_19_32_Abanye ke ngoko babenkqangaza enye into, abanye yimbi,  kuba ibandla labe lidubadubekile; baye abaninzi bengazi ukuba babuthelene ngenxa yantoni na.
44_19_33_Bamrhola ke esihlweleni uAlesandire, akubon ukuba amaYuda amtyhalela phambili; uwangawangisile ke uAlesandire ngesandla,  wafuna ukuziphendulela eluntwini.
44_19_34_Kodwa bakuqonda ukuba ungumYuda, benza inzwinini enye bonke bephela, benkqangaza umzuzu omaxa mabini, besithi, Mkhulu uArtemis wabase-Efese!
44_19_35_Esizolisile ke umbhali isihlwele, uthe, Madoda ase-Efese,  kanene nguwuphi na umntu ongaziyo, ukuba umzi wase-Efese ungumgcini-tempile wothixokazi omkhulu uArtemis,  nowomfanekiselo owawa kuZeyus.
44_19_36_Zingenakuphikwa nje ke ezo zinto, nimelwe kukuthi nizole,  ningenzi nanye into ngobutyhuthu-tyhuthu,
44_19_37_Kuba niwazise apha la madoda, engebaphangi batempile,  nabanyelisi bothixokazi wenu.
44_19_38_Ukuba ke ngoko uDemetriyo neengcibi ezinaye banendawo emntwini, zikho iimini zamatyala, akho namabamba;  mabamangalelane.
44_19_39_Ke ukuba nifuna into nganto zimbi, yoconjululwa kwesesikweni intlanganiso.
44_19_40_Kuba sizizichenge zokumangalelwa ngesaqunge sanamhla,  kungekho nasinye isizathu nje, esingaba nako ngaso ukwenza ilizwi ngale mbuthumbuthu.
44_19_41_Akutsho, wayindulula intlanganiso.
44_20_1_Ke kaloku, emva kokuphela kwesiphithiphithi eso, uPawulos wababizela kuye abafundi, wababulisa, waphuma waya kwelaseMakedoni.
44_20_2_Ewatyhutyhile ke loo macala, ebayalile ngokuthetha okukhulu, weza kwelamaGrike.
44_20_3_Wenza apho iinyanga zantathu. Uthe ke, kwakwenziwa iyelenqe ngaye ngamaYuda, xa aza kuya ngomkhombe kwelaseSiriya, wagqiba kwelokuba acande kwelaseMakedoni ngokubuya.
44_20_4_Waphelekelelwa ke, kwada kweza kwelaseAsiya, nguSopatro waseBhereya; kumaTesalonika ke yanguAristarko noSekundo; noGayo waseDerbhe, noTimoti; kwabelaseAsiya yanguTikiko noTrofimo;
44_20_5_abo basandulela, basilinda eTrowa.
44_20_6_Semka ke thina ngomkhombe eFilipi, emva kwemihla yezonka ezingenagwele, seza kubo eTrowa ngeentsuku ezintlanu; salibala khona iintsuku zasixhenxe.
44_20_7_Ke kaloku, ngolokuqala usuku lweveki, bakubon ukuba abafundi bahlanganisene ukuba baqhekeze isonka, uPawulos wayexoxa nabo, eza kumka ngengomso; wayolula intetho yakhe kwada kwaphakathi kobusuku.
44_20_8_Zaye ke izibane zanele egumbini eliphezulu, apho babehlanganisene khona.
44_20_9_Kwakuhleli ke efestileni ndodana ithile ingama linguYutiko,  isindwa bubuthongo obukhulu. Akubon ukuba ke uPawulos kukade exoxa, yoyiswa bubuthongo, yawa phantsi isuka kolwesithathu udidi, yafunqulwa ifile.
44_20_10_Ehlile ke uPawulos, waziphosa phezu kwayo; eyiwolile wathi, Musani ukwenza isiphithiphithi; kuba umphefumlo wayo ukuyo.
44_20_11_Wenyuka ke, waqhekeza isonka, wadla; kananjalo waxoxa ngokwaneleyo kwada kwasa, wemka njalo.
44_20_12_Bamzisa ke umfana lowo ehleli, bathuthuzeleka ngokungenamlinganiselo.
44_20_13_Ke kaloku thina sandulela saya emkhombeni, sasinga eAso,  apho besiza kumthabatha khona uPawulos; kuba ebemisele ngokunjalo, yena eza kuhamba ngeenyawo.
44_20_14_Sithe ke, akuhlangana nathi eAso, samthabatha seza eMitilene.
44_20_15_Sesuka apho ngomkhombe, ngengomso safika malungana neKiyo;  sathi ke ngengomsomnye sagaleleka eSamo, sahlala eTrogiliyo;  ngolandelayo seza eMileto.
44_20_16_Kuba uPawulos wagqiba kwelokuba kudlulwe ngomkhombe e-Efese, ukuze angabi nakwenza xesha lide kwelaseAsiya; kuba wayekhawulezele ukuthi, ukuba unako, awenze umhla wepentekoste eYerusalem.
44_20_17_Ke kaloku eMileto apho wathumela e-Efese, wawabizela khona amadoda amakhulu alo ibandla.
44_20_18_Akufika ke kuye, wathi kuwo: Niyazi kakuhle nina, kususela kwimini yokuqala endathi qatha ngayo kwelaseAsiya, ukuba ndathini na ukuhlala kwam nani lonke ixesha,
44_20_19_ndikhonza eNkosini, ndinako konke ukuthobeka kwentliziyo,  neenyembezi ezininzi, nokulingwa okwandihlelayo ngamayelenqe amaYuda:
44_20_20_okokuba andinifihlelanga nto, ndanityela onke amalungelo;  ndanifundisa ekuhleni nakwizindlu ngezindlu,
44_20_21_ndiqononondisa kuma Yuda nakumaGrike ukuguqukela kuThixo,  nokukholwa kuyo iNkosi yethu, uYesu Kristu.
44_20_22_Nangoku, yabonani, ndiya mna eYerusalem, ndibotshiwe nguMoya, ndingazazi izinto eziya kundihlela khona;
44_20_23_ndanele ukwazi ukuba uMoya oyiNgcwele uqononondisa kwimizi ngemizi, esithi ndilindwe ngamakhamandela naziimbandezelo.
44_20_24_Andikhathalele nanye yezi zinto; kanjalo nobomi bam obu andinqabe nabo, ukuze ndilufeze uhambo lwam ngovuyo,  nolungiselelo endalwamkelayo eNkosini uYesu, lokuqononondisa iindaba ezilungileyo zobabalo lukaThixo.
44_20_25_Nangoku, yabonani, ndiyazi mna, ukuba nina nonke ndahambayo phakathi kwenu, ndibuvakalisa ubukumkani bukaThixo,  anisayi kuba sabubona ubuso bam.
44_20_26_Kungoko ndingqinayo kuni ngayo le mini yanamhla, ukuba mna ndimsulwa egazini labo bonke; kuba andinifihlelanga nto;
44_20_27_ndanityela lonke icebo likaThixo.
44_20_28_Zilumkeleni ngoko, nawo wonke umhlambi, athe uMoya oyiNgcwele wanimisa ukuba ngabaveleli bawo, ukuba nilaluse ibandla likaThixo, awazizuzelayo ngelilelakhe igazi.
44_20_29_Kuba mna ndiyakwazi oku, ukuba emva kokumka kwam, kuya kungena phakathi kwenu iingcuka ezibawayo, zingawucongi umhlambi.
44_20_30_Nakuni ngokwenu kuya kuvela amadoda athetha izinto ezigwenxa, ukuba abarhole abafundi emva kwawo.
44_20_31_Kungoko ndithi, Phaphani, nikhumbula ukuba iminyaka emithathu, ubusuku nemini, andiyekanga ukululeka bonke ngabanye, ndineenyembezi.
44_20_32_Kungoku, bazalwana, ndiyaniyaleza kuThixo nakwilizwi lobabalo lwakhe, onako ukunakha, aninike ilifa phakathi kwabo bonke abangcwalisiweyo.
44_20_33_Andinqwenelanga silivere nagolide nangubo kabani.
44_20_34_Nina ke ngokwenu niyazi ukuba ezi zandla zazisebenzela iintswelo zam, nezababenam.
44_20_35_Ndanibonisa zonke izinto, ukuba ngokwenjenjalo ukubulaleka nimelwe kukuthi niyisize imilwelwe, nikhumbule namazwi eNkosi uYesu; ngokuba yena wathi, Ukupha kunoyolo ngaphezu kokuphiwa.
44_20_36_Akutsho, waguqa ngamadolo, wathandaza nabo bonke.
44_20_37_Basitsho ke isililo esikhulu bonke, bawa phezu kwentamo kaPawulos, bamanga kakhulu,
44_20_38_bebuhlungu kakhulu, ngokukodwa lilizwi alithethileyo lokuthi, abasayi kubuya babubone ubuso bakhe. Bamphelekelela ke, baya emkhombeni.
44_21_1_Ke kaloku kwathi, sakunduluka ngomkhombe, siziqhawule kubo,  see ngqo seza eKos; ngomhla olandelayo ke seza eRodo, sesuka apho seza ePatara.
44_21_2_Sathi, sifumene umkhombe uwelela kwelaseFenike, sangena kuwo sanduluka.
44_21_3_Sithe sakuthi thu ke eSipro, sayishiya ngasekhohlo, saya ngomkhombe kwelaseSiriya, saphuma eTire; kuba umkhombe ubuya kuyithula apho impahla.
44_21_4_Sathi sibafumene abafundi, sahlala khona iintsuku zasixhenxe; bona babesithi kuPawulos ngoMoya, makangenyuki aye eYerusalem.
44_21_5_Ke kaloku sithe, xa sizigqibileyo iintsuku ezo, saphuma sahamba; besiphelekelela bonke, ndawonye nabafazi nabantwana,  sada sangaphandle komzi; saguqa ngamadolo elunxwemeni,  sathandaza.
44_21_6_Sathi sibulisene nabo, sangena emkhombeni thina, bona ke babuyela emakhaya.
44_21_7_Sathi ke thina, sakulufeza uhambo ngomkhombe sivela eTire,  safika eTolimayi, sababulisa abazalwana, sahlala nabo usuku lwalunye.
44_21_8_Ke kaloku ngengomso, thina besinoPawulos, semka seza eKesareya; sangena endlwini kaFilipu, umshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo, obengowabaya basixhenxe, sahlala kuye.
44_21_9_Lowo ke wayeneentombi ezine, ziseziintombi, ziprofeta.
44_21_10_Sakubon ukuba ke sihleli khona iintsuku ezininzi, kwehla kwelakwaYuda mprofeti uthile, ugama linguAgabho.
44_21_11_Wathi akufika kuthi, wathabatha umbhinqo kaPawulos,  wazibopha izandla neenyawo, wathi, Utsho ke uMoya oyiNgcwele ukuthi, Indoda ongowayo lo mbhinqo, aya kwenjenje amaYuda ukuyibopha eYerusalem, ayinikele ezandleni zeentlanga.
44_21_12_Ke kaloku, sakukuva oku, sambongoza thina, kwanabakuloo ndawo, ukuba angenyuki aye eYerusalem.
44_21_13_Waphendula ke uPawulos, wathi, Nenzani na ukulila niyityumze intliziyo yam? kuba mna ndingalungele kubotshwa kodwa; ndilungele nokufa eYerusalem, ngenxa yegama leNkosi uYesu.
44_21_14_Akuba ke engoyiseki, sathi cwaka, sisithi, Makwenzeke ukuthanda kweNkosi.
44_21_15_Ke kaloku emva kwezo ntsuku, sabopha impahla, senyuka saya eYerusalem.
44_21_16_Kwahamba ke nathi abathile nakubafundi abavela eKesareya,  besisa thina kuMnaso waseSipro, obengumfundi kwakudala, esaba lundwendwe lwakhe.
44_21_17_Ke kaloku, sakufika eYerusalem, basamkela ngovuyo abazalwana.
44_21_18_Ngengomso ke, uPawulos wangena kunye nathi kuYakobi;  ayekho namadoda amakhulu onke.
44_21_19_Ubabulisile, wamana ebacacisela zonke ngazinye izinto awazenzayo uThixo phakathi kweentlanga, ngalo ulungiselelo lwakhe.
44_21_20_Bathe ke bona bakukuva oko, bayizukisa iNkosi, batsho nokuthi kuye, Uyabona, mzalwana, oko angako amawakawaka amaYuda akholiweyo; abe ke onke ewuzondelele umthetho.
44_21_21_Atyelwe ke ngawe, ukuba uyawafundisa onke amaYuda aphakathi kweentlanga, ukuba ahlukane noMoses, usithi,  makangabalusi abantwana bawo, angahambi ngawo amasiko.
44_21_22_Kuthiweni na ke? Kakade kuya kuhlanganisana inkitha; kuba aya kuva ukuba ufikile.
44_21_23_Ngoko yenza le nto sikuxelela yona: kukho kuthi apha amadoda amane, anesibambiso azibophe ngaso;
44_21_24_wathabathe ke, uzenze nyulu kunye nawo, ube nokudleka ngenxa yawo, ukuze agugule iintloko; bazi bonke ukuba ezo nto bazityelweyo ngawe azilutho, nawe ngokwakho uhambe uwugcinile umthetho.
44_21_25_Kodwa ngazo iintlanga ezikholiweyo, sabhala sagqiba kwelokuba zingabambi nto injalo; kuphela ibe kukuzigcina entweni ebingelelwe izithixo, nasegazini, nasentweni ekrwitshiweyo, nasembulweni.
44_21_26_Wandula uPawulos wawathabatha ke amadoda lawo, wathi ngengomso, ezenze nyulu kunye nawo, wangena etempileni,  eqondisisa inzaliseko yeentsuku zokwenza nyulu, ude usondezwe umnikelo ngenxa yabo bonke ngabanye.
44_21_27_Ke kaloku, xa iintsuku ezisixhenxe ezo beziza kuphela,  athi amaYuda avela kwelaseAsiya, akumbona etempileni,  asidubaduba sonke isihlwele, amsa izandla,
44_21_28_enkqangaza esithi, Madoda, maSirayeli, sizani. Nanku lo mntu ufundisa bonke ezindaweni zonke okuchasene nabantu,  nomthetho, nale ndawo; othe ngaphezu koko wawangenisa amaGrike etempileni, wayenza inqambi le ndawo ingcwele.
44_21_29_Kuba abebone ngeenxa engaphambili uTrofimo wase-Efese,  ndawonye naye phakathi komzi; abeba uPawulos umngenise etempileni.
44_21_30_Washukuma umzi uphela, babalekela ndawonye abantu;  bamthabatha uPawulos, bamrholela ngaphandle kwetempile; zavalwa kwaoko iingcango.
44_21_31_Ke kaloku, xa babeza kumbulala, lwafika udaba kumthetheli-waka webutho, lokuba iYerusalem iphela idubadubekile;
44_21_32_owathi kwangelo lixa wathabatha amasoldati nabathetheli-khulu, wabaleka, wehla waya kubo. Bakumbona ke umthetheli-waka namasoldati, bayeka ukumbetha uPawulos.
44_21_33_Waza wasondela umthetheli-waka, wambamba, wathi makakhonkxwe ngemixokelelwane emibini; wayebuza ukuba angaba ungubani na, nokuthi wenze ntoni na.
44_21_34_Abanye ke phakathi kwesihlwele babhomboloza enye into,  abanye enye. Akuba engenako ke ukuyazi inyaniso ngenxa yesiphithiphithi, wathi makasiwe enqabeni yomkhosi.
44_21_35_Xeshikweni wafikayo ke kumatye okunyuka, usuke wathwalwa ngamasoldati, ngenxa yamandla esihlwele;
44_21_36_kuba yayilandela inkitha yabantu, inkqangaza isithi,  Msuseni.
44_21_37_Xa ke wayeza kungeniswa enqabeni yomkhosi, wathi uPawulos kumthetheli-waka, Kuvumelekile na ukuba ndithethe into kuwe?  Wathi ke yena, Uyasazi na isiGrike?
44_21_38_Akunguye na kanene laa mYiputa, wathi phambi kwale mihla wenza isaqunge, wakhukulisela entlango laa madoda angamawaka amane azizigebenga?
44_21_39_Uthe ke yena uPawulos, Mna ndingumntu ongumYuda waseTarso,  umntu okowabo lingumzi ongadume ngako welaseKiliki; ndiyakucela ke, ndivumele ndikhe ndithethe kubo abantu.
44_21_40_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba umvumele, wema uPawulos ematyeni okunyuka, wawangawangisa ngesandla kubo abantu. Kwakuthiwa cwaka kakhulu, wadanduluka ngentetho yesiHebhere, esithi:
44_22_1_Madoda, bazalwana, nani bobawo, kuphulaphuleni ukuziphendulela kwam kuni ngoku.
44_22_2_Bakuva ke ukuba udanduluka ngentetho yesiHebhere kubo,  bazola okunye. Waza wathi:
44_22_3_Mna ndiyindoda engumYuda; ndizalelwe okunene eTarso yelaseKiliki, kodwa ndondlelwe kulo mzi ezinyaweni zikaGamaliyeli; ndiqeqeshwe ngohlobo olucokisekileyo lomthetho woobawo, ndizondelela uThixo, njengokuba ninjalo nani nonke namhlanje.
44_22_4_Ndingowayitshutshisayo yona le Ndlela, ndada ndesa ekufeni,  ndibopha, ndifaka ezintolongweni amadoda kwanabafazi;
44_22_5_njengokuba nombingeleli omkhulu endingqinela, nayo yonke intlanganiso yamadoda amakhulu; endamkela kubo iincwadi zokuya kubazalwana, ndahambela eDamasko, ndiya kuzisa nababekhona bebotshiwe eYerusalem, ukuze babethwe.
44_22_6_Ke kaloku kwathi, ndihamba, ndisondela eDamasko, malunga emini enkulu, ngesiquphe ndabanekelwa ngeenxa zonke lukhanyiselo olukhulu luphuma ezulwini.
44_22_7_Ndawa emhlabeni, ndeva ilizwi lisithi kum, Sawule, Sawule,  unditshutshiselani na?
44_22_8_Ndaphendula ke mna ndathi, Ungubani na, Nkosi? Yathi kum,  Mna ndinguYesu waseNazarete, omtshutshisayo wena.
44_22_9_Bona ke ababenam balubona okunene ukhanyiselo olo, besuka boyika; kodwa abalivanga ilizwi lalowo wayethetha nam.
44_22_10_Ndathi ke, Ndithini na, Nkosi? Yathi ke iNkosi kum, Vuka,  uye eDamasko; woxelelwa khona ngazo zonke izinto ozimiselweyo ukuba uzenze.
44_22_11_Ndakuba ke ndingenakondela ngenxa yobuqaqawuli bolo lukhanyiselo, ndarholwa ngesandla ngabo babenam, ndafika eDamasko.
44_22_12_Ke kaloku, Hananiya uthile, indoda emhlonelayo uThixo ngokomthetho, engqinelwe kakuhle ngawo onke amaYuda amiyo khona,
44_22_13_weza kum, wema kufuphi, wathi kum, Sawule, mzalwana, buya ubone. Ndaza mna kwangelo lixa ndabheka phezulu kuye.
44_22_14_Wathi ke yena, UThixo woobawo bethu ukumisile wena ukuba ukwazi ukuthanda kwakhe, umbone lowo uliLungisa, uve ilizwi eliphuma emlonyeni wakhe;
44_22_15_ngokuba uya kuba lingqina lakhe kubo bonke abantu, lezinto ozibonileyo nozivileyo.
44_22_16_Nakaloku usalibele yini na? Suk ume, ubhaptizwe,  uhlambulule izono zakho, unqula igama leNkosi.
44_22_17_Ke kaloku kwathi, ndakuba ndibuyele eYerusalem, ndakubon  ukuba ndiyathandaza etempileni, ndaba sethongweni;
44_22_18_ndayibona isithi kum, Ngxama, uphume kamsinya eYerusalem;  ngokokuba bengayi kubamkela ubungqina bakho ngam.
44_22_19_Ndathi mna, Nkosi, bayazi kakuhle bona ukuba mna ndandibafaka entolongweni, ndibatyabula kuzo zonke izindlu zesikhungu abo bakholwayo kuwe;
44_22_20_naxeshikweni laphalazwayo igazi likaStefano, ingqina lakho, ndaye ndimi kufuphi nam, ndikuthakazela ukusikwa kwakhe,  ndizigcinile iingubo zabo babemsika.
44_22_21_Yathi kum, Hamba; ngokuba mna ndiya kukuthuma kude kwiintlanga.
44_22_22_Bamphulaphula ke, wada wafika kwelo lizwi, baza baphakamisa izwi labo besithi, Msuseni emhlabeni umntu onje;  kuba akufanelekile ukuba adle ubomi.
44_22_23_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba bayankqangaza, belahla iingubo zabo, bephosa uthuli esibhakabhakeni,
44_22_24_wathi umthetheli-waka, makangeniswe enqabeni yomkhosi;  wathi makancinwe ngekatsi, ukuze azi ukuba kungathuba lini na ukuba benjenje ukunkqangaza ngaye.
44_22_25_Ke kaloku, xa bamolulayo ngeentambo, wathi uPawulos kumthetheli-khulu obemi khona, Kuvumelekile na, ukuba nimtyakatye umntu ongumRoma, engagwetywanga nokugwetywa?
44_22_26_Evile ke umthetheli-khulu, waya wabika kumthetheli-waka,  esithi, Yilumkele into oza kuyenza; kuba lo mntu ungumRoma.
44_22_27_Weza ke umthetheli-waka wathi kuye, Ndixelele, ungumRoma na? Wathi ke yena, Ewe.
44_22_28_Waphendula umthetheli-waka wathi, Mna ukungeniswa kwam kulo mzi waseRoma, ndakuzuza ngenani elikhulu. Wathi ke uPawulos. Ke mna ndizelwe ndinako.
44_22_29_Basuka kuye kwaoko ngoko abo babeza kumncina; woyika ke nomthetheli-waka akuqonda ukuba ungumRoma, nangenxa yokuba ebembophile.
44_22_30_Ke kaloku ngengomso, enga angayazi inyaniso yento amangalelwe ngayo ngamaYuda, wamkhulula ezintanjeni, wathi,  mabeze ababingeleli abakhulu, nayo yonke intlanganiso yabo yamatyala; waza wamhlisa uPawulos, wammisa phakathi kwabo.
44_23_1_Waqwalasela ke uPawulos entlanganisweni yamatyala, wathi,  Madoda, bazalwana, mna ndahlala ngokwalowo ungowakwaThixo,  ndinesazela esilungileyo, kwada kwayile mini.
44_23_2_Ke kaloku umbingeleli omkhulu, uHananiya, wathi kwabo babemi ngakuye, mabambethe emlonyeni.
44_23_3_Waza wathi uPawulos kuye, Uza kukubetha uThixo,  ludongandini luqatyiweyo. Wena uthi uhlalele ukuba uthethe ityala lam ngokomthetho, ubuye waphule umthetho, uthi mandibethwe?
44_23_4_Bona ke ababemi khona bathi, Uyamthuka na umbingeleli omkhulu kaThixo?
44_23_5_Wathi uPawulos, Bendingazi, bazalwana, ukuba ungumbingeleli omkhulu; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uze ungathethi kakubi ngomphathi wabantu bakowenu.
44_23_6_Ke kaloku uPawulos, esazi ukuba elinye icala lelabaSadusi,  elinye ke lelabaFarisi, wadanduluka entlanganisweni yamatyala esithi, Madoda, bazalwana, mna ndingumFarisi, ndingowomFarisi;  ndimangalelwe mna ngalo ithemba nangovuko lwabafileyo.
44_23_7_Uthe ke akukuthetha oko, kwabakho impambano phakathi kwabaFarisi nabaSadusi, yahlulelana inkitha leyo;
44_23_8_kuba okunene abaSadusi babesithi, akukho luvuko,  nasithunywa sazulu, namoya; kodwa abaFarisi bazivuma zombini ezo ndawo.
44_23_9_Kwabakho ke unkqangazo olukhulu; besuka ababhali becala labaFarisi balwa kakhulu, besithi, Asifumani nanye into embi kulo mntu; ke ukuba kuthethe umoya kuye, nokuba sisithunywa sezulu, masingalwi noThixo thina.
44_23_10_Kuthe ke, yakuba nkulu impambano, wathi umthetheli-waka,  esoyikela ukuba uPawulos angaqwengwa ngabo, wathi mawuhle umkhosi, umxwile phakathi kwabo, umzise enqabeni yawo.
44_23_11_Ke kaloku ngobo busuku iNkosi yema ngakuye, yathi,  Yomelela, Pawulos; kuba njengokuba waqononondisa izinto ngam eYerusalem, kwangokunjalo umelwe kukuthi ungqine naseRoma.
44_23_12_Ke kaloku kwakusa, abathile kumaYuda bathuthelana bazibopha ngesiqalekiso, besithi abayi kudla, abayi kusela nokusela, bade bambulale uPawulos.
44_23_13_Baye ke bengaphezu kwamashumi omane ababefungele ukuyenza loo nto;
44_23_14_abathi bona beza kubabingeleli abakhulu nakumadoda amakhulu, bathi, Sizibophile ngesiqalekiso esikhulu, ukuba singafaki nto emlonyeni, side simbulale uPawulos;
44_23_15_ke ngoku nina bhekisani kumthetheli-waka kunye nentlanganiso yamatyala, ukuba amhlise, eze naye kuni ngomso,  ngokungathi niza kuziqiqa ngokukhona kucokisekileyo iindawo ezithethwa ngaye; sibe ke thina, engekasondeli, sesilungiselele ukumbulala.
44_23_16_Ke kaloku, akukuva unyana wodade boPawulos ukumlalela kwabo, wafika wangena enqabeni yomkhosi, wambikela uPawulos.
44_23_17_UPawulos ubizele ke kuye omnye wakubathetheli-khulu,  wathi, Yisa le ndodana kumthetheli-waka; kuba inento eza kuyibika kuye.
44_23_18_Uyithabathile ke yena, wayizisa kumthetheli-waka, wathi,  UPawulos, umbanjwa undibizele kuye, wacela ukuba ndizise le ndodana kuwe; inento eza kuyithetha kuwe.
44_23_19_Wayibamba ke ngesandla umthetheli-waka, waya nayo ngasese,  wayibuza wathi, Unantoni na oza kuyibika kum?
44_23_20_Yathi ke, AmaYuda avumelene ukukucela ukuba umhlise uPawulos, umse ngomso entlanganisweni yamatyala, ngokungathi aza kubuza ngokukhona kucokisekileyo into ngaye.
44_23_21_Ke wena uze ungoyisakali ngawo; kuba kuwo apho ulalelwe ngamadoda angaphezu kwamashumi amane, azibophileyo ngeziqalekiso, ukuba angadli angaseli ade ambulale; nangoku aselelungile, elinde idinga elivela kuwe.
44_23_22_Umthetheli-waka wayindulula ke indodana leyo, akuba eyithethele ngelithi, mayingaxeleli bani, ukuba izibonakalalisile kuye ezo ndawo.
44_23_23_Ebizele kuye abathetheli-khulu abathile ababini, wathi,  Lungisani amasoldati abe makhulu mabini, ukuba aye eKesareya,  nabamahashe babe mashumi asixhenxe, nababinzi babe makhulu mabini, ngelesithathu ilixa lobusuku;
44_23_24_nilungise namaqegu, ukuze bamkhwelise uPawulos, bamse kuFelikis irhuluneli, asinde.
44_23_25_Wabhala incwadi ethi:
44_23_26_UKlawudiyo Lisiya uyabulisa kuFelikis, irhuluneli edume kunene.
44_23_27_Le ndoda yayibanjwe ngamaYuda, iza kubulawa ngawo; koko ndathi gaxa kuwo ndinomkhosi, ndayihlangula, ndakuqonda ukuba ingumRoma.
44_23_28_Ndakuba ke ndingalazi ityala abeyimangalela ngalo,  ndayihlisa, ndayisa entlanganisweni yawo yamatyala;
44_23_29_ndayifumana imangalelwe ngeembuzwano zomthetho wawo, kodwa ingenalo nalinye ityala elilingene ukufa, nokufakwa iintambo.
44_23_30_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba ndilihletyelwe iyelenqe ebeliza kwenziwa ngayo le ndoda ngamaYuda, ndithumele kuwe kwangelo lixa, ndathi nakubamangaleli bayo, mabazithethe kuwe iindawo abanazo ngakuyo. Hlala kakuhle.
44_23_31_Amasoldati ke amthabatha uPawulos, njengoko amiselwe ngako, amsa kwa-Antipatri ebusuku.
44_23_32_Kuthe ke ngengomso abashiya abamahashe, ukuba bahambe naye, wona abuyela enqabeni yomkhosi;
44_23_33_bathi bona, bakufika eKesareya, bayinikela incwadi kwirhuluneli, bammisa noPawulos phambi kwayo.
44_23_34_Iyilesile ke irhuluneli, yabuza nokuba ungowabuphi na uburhulumente; ithe yakuqonda ukuba ungowelaseKiliki,
44_23_35_yathi, Ndokuva kakuhle, xa bathe bafika nabamangaleli bakho; yatsho yathi, makagcinwe endlwini yerhuluneli ebiyekaHerode.
44_24_1_Ke kaloku, emva kweentsuku ezintlanu, wehla umbingeleli omkhulu, uHananiya, enamadoda amakhulu, neciko elithile elinguTertulo, bona bengabamangaleli bakaPawulos kwirhuluneli.
44_24_2_Uthe ke akubizwa, waqala uTertulo ukummangalela, esithi:
44_24_3_Sisiva uxolo olukhulu ngawe nje, zikho nje nezenzo eziluncedo ezenzelwe olu hlanga ngokwazalela kwakho, sikwamkela oko sibulela ngako konke, amaxesha onke, nasezindaweni zonke,  Felikis odume kunene.
44_24_4_Ke ukuze ndingabi sakubambezela ngakumbi, ndiyakubongoza ukuba ukhe usive kancinane ngokuthantamisa kwakho.
44_24_5_Kuba siyifumene le ndoda isisifo, umphambanisi kuwo onke amaYuda akwelimiweyo, ingumkhokeli walo ihlelo lamaNazarete;
44_24_6_eyathi yalinga ukuyihlambela netempile: esathi sayibamba,  safuna ukuyigweba ngowethu umthetho;
44_24_7_usuke uLisiya, umthetheli-waka, wafika, wayihlutha ngamandla amakhulu ezandleni zethu;
44_24_8_wathi, mabeze kuwe abamangaleli bayo, ongathi wena ngokwakho, wakuzincina zonke iindawo, ube nako ukuziqonda kuye ezo siyimangalela ngazo thina.
44_24_9_NamaYuda ke avumelana naye, athi kunjalo kanye.
44_24_10_Ke kaloku waphendula uPawulos, yakunqwala kuye irhuluneli ukuba athethe, wathi: Ndisazi kakuhle nje, ukuba sekuyiminyaka emininzi ungumgwebi kolu hlanga, kokukhona ndiziphendulela ngomxhelo owonwabileyo ngazo iindawo ezingam.
44_24_11_Kuba unganokuqonda, ukuba akuntsuku zingaphezu kweshumi elinambini, ndenyukayo ndaya kunqula eYerusalem;
44_24_12_nasetempileni abandifumananga ndixoxa namntu, ndisenza nasiphendu, nasezindlwini zesikhungu, naphi phakathi komzi.
44_24_13_Kananjalo abanako ukuzimisa izinto abandimangalela ngazo ngoku.
44_24_14_Ke ndiyakuvuma oku kuwe, ukuba ngeNdlela abathi bona sisiphambusa, ndenjenjalo ukumkhonza uThixo wakowethu,  ndikholwa zizinto zonke ezibhaliweyo emthethweni nasebaprofetini;
44_24_15_ndinethemba kuThixo, into ke abayilindileyo nabo ngokwabo,  ukuba kuza kubakho uvuko lwabafileyo, lwamalungisa kwanolwabangemalungisa.
44_24_16_Ke kaloku, kule nto nam ngokwam ndiyazama, ukuba ngamaxesha onke ndingabi nasazela sikhubekisa nganto ngakuThixo nangakubantu.
44_24_17_Emva kweminyaka emininzi, ndafika ndizisa amalizo neminikelo kuhlanga lwakowethu.
44_24_18_Kwezo nto andifumana etempileni ndenziwe nyulu, ndingenzi siphendu, ndingenzi nasiphithiphithi, amaYuda athile elaseAsiya;
44_24_19_abemelwe kukubakho apha phambi kwakho, andimangalele,  ukuba angaba anendawo ngakum;
44_24_20_okanye mabathi bona aba, ukuba kukho nto yokungalungisi bayifumeneyo kum, bayixele, ndakubon ukuba ndimi apha entlanganisweni yamatyala;
44_24_21_ingelilo elo lizwi linye, ndadandulukayo ngalo ndimi phakathi kwabo, lokuthi, Kungalo uvuko lwabafileyo endimangalelwayo mna nini namhla.
44_24_22_Ke kaloku, akuziva ezi zinto uFelikis, uthe, ezazi ngokhona kucokisekileyo iindawo zale Ndlela, wabalibazisa,  wathi, Xa athe wehla uLisiya umthetheli-waka, ndoziqiqa kakuhle iindawo zenu.
44_24_23_Kanjalo wammisela umthetheli-khulu, ukuba agcinwe uPawulos, abe nokuyekelelwa, kungalelwa nabani wakowabo ukumnceda, nokuba eze kuye.
44_24_24_Ke kaloku, emva kwemihla ethile, wafika uFelikis enoDrusila umkakhe, umYudakazi, wathumela wambiza uPawulos,  wamva ethetha ngako ukukholwa kuKristu.
44_24_25_Akubon ukuba ke uthetha ngobulungisa, nokuzeyisa,  nangogwebo oluza kubakho, wangenwa kukoyika uFelikis,  waphendula wathi, Hamba okwakalokunje: ke ndakuzuza ithuba,  ndokubiza uze.
44_24_26_Kunye ke noko, wayethembe ukuba wonikwa imali nguPawulos,  ukuze amkhulule; ngako oko kwaba kukhona ambiza futhi, ukuba eze axoxe naye.
44_24_27_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba kudlule iminyaka emibini,  uFelikis wakhululana noPorkiyo Festo; kanjalo wathi uFelikis,  efuna ukuzithandisa kumaYuda, wamshiya uPawulos ekhonkxiwe.
44_25_1_Uthe ngoko uFesto, akuba engene eburhulumenteni, wathi emva kwemihla emithathu, wenyuka waya eYerusalem, esuka eKesareya.
44_25_2_Ke kaloku, umbingeleli omkhulu nabaziintloko kumaYuda bammangalela uPawulos kuye, bambongoza,
44_25_3_becela ukuba abababale ngokumbiza eze eYerusalem; bemlalele ukuze bambulale endleleni.
44_25_4_Waphendula ke ngoko uFesto, wathi, ugcinwe eKesareya uPawulos; naye ke ngokwakhe uza kuya kamsinya.
44_25_5_Wathi, Mabathi ngoko abanako phakathi kwenu, behle kunye nam, bayimangalele, ukuba kukho into kule ndoda.
44_25_6_Akuba ke elibele kubo imihla engaphezu kweshumi, wehla waya eKesareya; ngengomso, akuba ehleli esihlalweni sokugweba, wathi makaziswe uPawulos.
44_25_7_Uthe ke akufika, amaYuda abehle evela eYerusalem,  amngqonga, emtyhola ngamatyala amaninzi anzima uPawulos,  awayengenako ukuwamisa;
44_25_8_esithi yena ukuziphendulela, Nasemthethweni wamaYuda,  nasetempileni, nakuKesare, andonanga nto.
44_25_9_Ke uFesto, efuna ukuzithandisa kumaYuda, umphendule uPawulos wathi, Uyathanda na ukunyuka uye eYerusalem, lithethwe khona ityala lezi zinto phambi kwam?
44_25_10_Uthe ke uPawulos, Ndimi esihlalweni sokugweba sikaKesare,  apho limele ukuthethwa khona ityala lam. AmaYuda andiwonanga nganto, njengokuba nawe usazi kakuhle.
44_25_11_Kuba okunene ukuba ndonile, ndenza into elingene ukufa,  andali kufa; kodwa ukuba akukho nanye yezo zinto bandimangalela ngazo aba, akukho namnye unako ukundinikela kubo. Ndibhenele kuKesare.
44_25_12_Waza uFesto, akuba ethethe nephakathi, waphendula wathi,  Ubhenele kuKesare; uya kuya kuKesare.
44_25_13_Ke kaloku, kwakubon ukuba kudlule imihla ethile, uAgripa,  ukumkani, noBhernike bafika eKesareya, besiza kubulisa uFesto.
44_25_14_Bakulibala khona ke imihla emininzi, uFesto wazandlala phambi kokumkani lowo izinto ezingaye uPawulos, esithi, Kukho ndoda ithile ishiyiweyo nguFelikis,
44_25_15_ikhonkxiwe, abathe ababingeleli abakhulu namadoda amakhulu amaYuda, oko ndibe ndiseYerusalem, bayimangalela, becela ukuba igwetywe.
44_25_16_Endathi ukubaphendula, Asilosiko lamaRoma ukubabala ngomntu abulawe, phambi kokuba lowo umangalelweyo akhangelane nabamangaleli bakhe, azuze nethuba lokuziphendulela ngalo ityala lakhe.
44_25_17_Bakuba ngoko bebuthelene apha, andilibazisanga; ngomhla olandelayo ndahlala esihlalweni sokugweba, ndathi mayiziswe indoda leyo.
44_25_18_Abamangaleli bayo, bakuvela, abamisanga nalinye ityala lezo zinto bendizindlela kuzo mna;
44_25_19_ke baye beneembuzwano ezithile nayo ngokuhlonela kwabo izithixo, nangaYesu uthile ufileyo, abesithi yena uPawulos uhleli.
44_25_20_Ndakuthingaza ke mna ngawo umbuzo wale ndawo, ndathi, Unga ungaya eYerusalem na, lithethwe khona ityala lezi zinto?
44_25_21_Akubon ukuba ke uPawulos ubhenele ukuba agcinelwe isigwebo soMhlekazi, ndathi makagcinwe, ndide ndimthumele kuKesare.
44_25_22_Wathi ke uAgripa kuFesto, Bendinga nam ndingakhe ndimve umntu lowo. Wathi ke yena, Uya kumva ngomso.
44_25_23_Uthe ke akufika ngengomso uAgripa enoBhernike, benendili enkulu, bengene nasendaweni yokuphulaphulela amatyala,  benabathetheli-waka namadoda amakhulu omzi, waziswa uPawulos ngezwi likaFesto.
44_25_24_Wathi uFesto, Agripa kumkani, nani nonke madoda akhoyo nathi, niyambona lo mntu, ethe yonke inkitha yamaYuda yasingisa kum ngaye, naseYerusalem nalapha, ibhomboloza kakhulu isithi,  akasafanele kudla ubomi;
44_25_25_mna ke ndithe ndakuqonda ukuba akenzanga nto ilingene ukufa, akubon ukuba naye ngokwakhe ubhenele kuMhlekazi,  ndagqiba kwelokuba ndimthumele kuye,
44_25_26_endingenanto iyinyaniso ndingayibhalayo ngaye enkosini yam. Ngako oko ndimzise phambi kwenu, ngokukodwa phambi kwakho,  kumkani Agripa, ukuze, kwakubon ukuba kunciniwe, ndibe nento endingayibhalayo;
44_25_27_kuba kum kubonakala ibubudenge, ukuba kuthunyelwe ikhonkxwa, lingaqondakaliswa netyala elinalo.
44_26_1_Wathi ke uAgripa kuPawulos, Uvunyelwe ukuba uziphendulele.  Wandula uPawulos waziphendulela, esolule isandla, wathi:
44_26_2_Ndiva kamnandi, kumkani Agripa, ndiza kuziphendulela nje phambi kwakho namhla, ngazo zonke izinto endimangalelwa ngazo ngamaYuda;
44_26_3_ngokukodwa ekubeni usazana nawo onke amasiko neembuzwano zamaYuda. Kungoko ndiyakuthandaza ukuba undive, undinyamezele.
44_26_4_Ukuhlala kwam ke kwasebuncinaneni bam, okwabakho kwasekuqalekeni phakathi kohlanga lwakowethu eYerusalem,  ayakwazi onke amaYuda;
44_26_5_endazi ngenxa engaphambili (ukuba athe athanda ukungqina),  okokuba, ngelona licokisekileyo ihlelo lonqulo lwakowethu,  ndahlala ndingumFarisi.
44_26_6_Nangoku ndimi ndimangalelwa ngenxa yethemba ledinga elabekwa nguThixo kobawo;
44_26_7_ezithembe ukufika kulo izizwe zakowethu ezilishumi elinazibini, zimkhonza nje uThixo ngenyameko ubusuku nemini;  ekungenxa yelo themba endimangalelwayo ngamaYuda, kumkani Agripa.
44_26_8_Yini na ukuba nithi, yinto eningenakukholwa yiyo, ukuba uThixo uyabavusa abafileyo?
44_26_9_Mna okunene ke bendiba ngelam, ndimelwe kukwenza izinto ezininzi ezichasene negama likaYesu waseNazarete.
44_26_10_Endakwenzayo ke oko eYerusalem; nento eninzi yabangcwele ndayitshixela ezintolongweni, ndakuba ndamkele igunya kubabingeleli abakhulu; ndaza, bakuba besikwa, ndavuma.
44_26_11_Nakuzo zonke izindlu zesikhungu ndibe ndibohlwaya futhi,  ndibanyanzela ukuba banyelise; ndathi, ndibagezela ngokuncamisileyo, ndabatshutshisa, ndada ndesa kwimizi engaphandle.
44_26_12_Kunjalonje ke, kwathi, xa ndiyayo eDamasko, ndinegunya nemvume kubabingeleli abakhulu,
44_26_13_emini enkulu endleleni, kumkani, ndabona ukukhanya kuvela ezulwini, okungaphezu kokuqaqamba kwelanga, kundibanekela ngeenxa zonke, nabo babehamba nam.
44_26_14_Sithe ke sakubon ukuba siwile sonke emhlabeni, ndeva izwi lithetha nam ngentetho yesiHebhere, lisithi, Sawule, Sawule,  unditshutshiselani na? wenzakala, ukhaba iimviko nje.
44_26_15_Ndathi ke mna, Ungubani na, Nkosi? Yathi ke yona, Mna ndinguYesu omtshutshisayo.
44_26_16_Vuka, ume ngeenyawo; kuba ndibonakele kuwe ngenxa yoku,  ukuba ndikumise ube ngumkhonzi nengqina lezi zinto uzibonileyo,  nendiya kubonakala kuwe ngazo;
44_26_17_ndikunyothula ebantwini nasezintlangeni, endikuthuma kuzo ngokunje;
44_26_18_ukuba uvule amehlo abo, ukuze babuye ebumnyameni, beze ebumhlotsheni; babuye egunyeni likaSathana, beze kuThixo; ukuze bamkele uxolelo lwezono, nelifa phakathi kwabangcwalisiweyo,  ngokukholwa kum.
44_26_19_Ekuthe koko, kumkani Agripa, andaba nguye ongawululameliyo umbono wasemazulwini;
44_26_20_ndesuka ndababikela abaseDamasko kuqala, nabaseYerusalem,  nakulo lonke ilizwe lakwaYuda, nakuzo iintlanga, ukuba baguquke babuyele kuThixo, benze imisebenzi efanele inguquko.
44_26_21_Ngenxa yezi zinto amaYuda andibamba etempileni, azamela ukundibulala.
44_26_22_Ngoko ndizuze uncedo kuThixo nje, ndimisile kude kube yile mini, ndingqina komncinane nakomkhulu, ndingathethi nanye into ngaphandle kwezo, bathi abaprofeti noMoses ziza kubakho;
44_26_23_zokuba uKristu ubeza kuva iintlungu, nokuba ubeza kuthi,  engowokuqala eluvukweni lwabafileyo, azise ukukhanya ebantwini nasezintlangeni.
44_26_24_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uyaziphendulela ngokunjalo,  uFesto wathi ngezwi elikhulu, Uyageza, Pawulos; imfundo eninzi iyakugezisa.
44_26_25_Wathi ke yena, Andigezi, Festo odume kunene; ndiphimisela amazwi enyaniso nawengqondo ephilileyo.
44_26_26_Kuba ezo ndawo uyazazi kakuhle ukumkani, endithetha kuye ngokungafihlisiyo; kuba ndikholosekile kukuba akukho nanye yezi zinto ifihlakeleyo kuye; kuba le nto ibingenzelwanga egumbini.
44_26_27_Uyakholwa na, kumkani Agripa, ngabaprofeti? Ndiyazi ukuba uyakholwa.
44_26_28_Wathi ke uAgripa kuPawulos, Ngokuncinane undeyisela ukuba ndibe ngumKristu.
44_26_29_Wathi ke uPawulos, Ndithandaza kuThixo, ukuba ingabi nguwe wedwa, ibe ngabo bonke abandivayo namhlanje, abaya kuthi,  nangokuncinane nangokukhulu, babe njengam nje, ngaphandle kwezi ntambo.
44_26_30_Akuba etshilo, besuka ukumkani, nerhuluneli, noBhernike,  kwanababehleli nabo;
44_26_31_beshenxile, bathetha bodwa bathi, Lo mntu akenze nanye into elingene ukufa neentambo.
44_26_32_Wathi ke uAgripa kuFesto, Lo mntu ange enokukhululwa,  ukuba ubengabhenele kuKesare.
44_27_1_Ke kaloku, kwakugqitywa kwelokuba sisuke ngomkhombe siye kwelaseItali, bamnikela uPawulos kwanabanye ababanjwa abathile kumthetheli-khulu, ogama linguYuliyo, webutho loMhlekazi.
44_27_2_Singenile ke emkhombeni waseAdramita, sisiza kudlula ngakwimimandla yelaseAsiya, sanduluka, kwakubon ukuba uAristarko, umMakedoni waseTesalonika, unathi.
44_27_3_Sathi ngengomso safika eTsidon; waza uYuliyo wamphatha uPawulos ngobubele, wamvumela ukuba aye ezihlotyeni zakhe,  ongiwe.
44_27_4_Sanduluka nalapho, sahamba ngomkhombe, sabetha ezantsi kweSipro, ngenxa yokuba imimoya ibivela ngaphambili.
44_27_5_Sakulucanda nolwandle olungakwelaseKiliki nelasePamfili,  safika eMira yelaseLiki.
44_27_6_Apho ke umthetheli-khulu wafumana umkhombe wakwa-Alesandire, usiya kwelaseItali, wasikhwelisa kuwo.
44_27_7_Ke kaloku iintsuku zanela sihamba kancinane, kwaba ngenkankulu ukuba sifike ngaseKinido. Uthe wakuba umoya ungasivumeli ukuba sisondele, sabetha ezantsi kweKrete ngaseSalimone.
44_27_8_Saza sadlula kuyo ngenkankulu, safika ndaweni ithile kuthiwa ngamaChweba aMahle, obukufuphi kuyo umzi waseLaseya.
44_27_9_Lithe ke lakudlula ixesha elaneleyo, nokuhamba ngomkhombe kunengozi, ngenxa yokuba nozilo beluse ludlule, uPawulos wamana ebaluleka,
44_27_10_esithi kubo, Madoda, ndiyabona ukuba uhambo olu luza kuba nenkxwaleko nokonakala okukhulu, kungekwamthwalo namkhombe wodwa, kukokobomi bethu nabo.
44_27_11_Kodwa umthetheli-khulu wayethambele okomqhubi nokomninimkhombe ukuthetha, kunokukaPawulos.
44_27_12_Ke kaloku, ichweba lingakulungele nje ukuba kudluliswe busika kulo, abona baninzi kubo baceba ukuba kundulukwe khona,  ukuba mhlawumbi banganokufikelela badlulise ubusika eFinikis,  elichweba laseKrete; elibheke kwintshonalanga engasezantsi,  nakwintshonalanga engasentla.
44_27_13_Kuthe ke, wakubetha impepho umoya wasezantsi, beba bakuzuzile ababekungxamele, banduluka, badlula kufuphi neKrete.
44_27_14_Kodwa kungekabi mzuzu, kwagaleleka khona umoya osisaqhwithi, ekuthiwa yiYuroklidon.
44_27_15_Kuthe ke kwakubon ukuba uthiwe hlasi umkhombe, awaba nako ukumelana nomoya, sasesiwuyeka; saqhutywa.
44_27_16_Sathi sakubaleka ke, sibetha ngaphantsi kwesiqithana esithile, ekuthiwa yiKlawuda, kwaba ngenkankulu ukuba sibe nako ukuwubamba umkhonjana;
44_27_17_abathe bakuwufunqula, basebenza ngezinto zokunceda,  bewubhinqisa umkhombe; kananjalo bathi, besoyika ukuba bangeyela esihlabeni, bazifinyeza iiseyile, baqhutywa benjalo.
44_27_18_Sithe ke, sakubon ukuba ke sibandezelwe kakubi liliqhwa,  ngomhla olandelayo bawuphungula umthwalo;
44_27_19_nangowesithathu sayilahla ngezandla zethu impahla yomkhombe.
44_27_20_Kuthe ke, kwakubon ukuba akubonakali langa nankwenkwezi iintsuku ezininzi, kucinezele neliqhwa elingelincinane, laphela kwathi tu lonke ithemba lokuba singasindiswa.
44_27_21_Emva kokuzila ukudla ixesha elide, wesuka wema uPawulos phakathi kwabo, wathi, Hina madoda, ninge naniphulaphule kum,  ananduluka eKrete, nizuzane nale nkxwaleko noku konakala.
44_27_22_Nangoku ndiyaniluleka ukuba nibe nomxhelo owonwabileyo;  kuba kuni aba, akukho uya kulahlekelwa bubomi bakhe, yoba ngumkhombe wodwa.
44_27_23_Kuba ngobu busuku bekumi ngakumisithunywa sikaThixo,  endingowakhe, endimkhonzayo,
44_27_24_sisithi, Musa ukoyika, Pawulos, umelwe kukuma phambi koKesare; uyabona, uThixo ukubabale ngabo bonke abasemkhombeni nawe.
44_27_25_Kungoko ndithi, Yibani nomxhelo owonwabileyo, madoda; kuba ndiyakholwa nguThixo, ukuba kuya kuba njalo ngolo hlobo athethe ngalo kum.
44_27_26_Kodwa simelwe kukuphoseka siqithini sithile.
44_27_27_Ke kaloku, kwakufika ubusuku beshumi elinesine, sakubon  ukuba siqhutywaqhutywa ngumoya eAdriya, mayela phakathi kobusuku, oomatrose bazindla ukuba kukho mhlaba uthile basondelayo kuwo.
44_27_28_Baza bakuba beyiphosile ilothe, bafumana ukuba ziifatom ezimashumi mabini; bethe tyi ke kancinane, baphinda bayiphosa ilothe, bafumana ukuba ziifatom ezilishumi elinantlanu.
44_27_29_Baza, besoyika ukuthi bangaphoseka ezindaweni ezibungqagala, baphosa iiankile zane esinqeni somkhombe, banga kungasa.
44_27_30_Ke kaloku, bakubon ukuba oomatrose bangxamele ukubaleka baphume emkhombeni, bewuhlisele elwandle umkhonjana, bengathi baza kuyekelela iankile ngaphambili,
44_27_31_wathi uPawulos kumthetheli-khulu nakumasoldati, Ukuba aba abathanga bahlale emkhombeni, aninakusindiswa nina.
44_27_32_Andula amasoldati azinqamla iintsontelo zomkhonjana,  awuyeka wawa, wemka.
44_27_33_Ke kaloku kwada kwaza kusa, uPawulos ebabongoza bonke ukuba badle ukudla, esithi, Namhla ngumhla weshumi elinesine nilinda, nimana nizila ukudla, ningafaki nto emlonyeni;
44_27_34_ke ngoko ndiyanibongoza ukuba nidle ukudla; kuba oko kuyelelene nokusindiswa kwenu; kuba akuyi kuwa nalunwele lwentloko kabani kuni.
44_27_35_Ke kaloku, akuba etshilo, wathabatha isonka, wabulela kuThixo emehlweni abo bonke; waqhekeza, waqala wadla.
44_27_36_Bonke ke baba nomxhelo owonwabileyo, bathabatha ukudla nabo.
44_27_37_Saye ke emkhombeni apho sonke siyimiphefumlo emakhulu mabini anamanci asixhenxe anamithandathu.
44_27_38_Bathe ke, bakuhlutha, bawenza khaphukhaphu umkhombe,  beyiphosa elwandle ingqolowa.
44_27_39_Kwakusa ke, abawazanga loo mhlaba; ke babona ichwetyana elithile linonxweme, babhunga ukuwutyhalela kulo umkhombe,  ukuba bangaba nako.
44_27_40_Baza, bezinqumla zonke iiankile, baziyekela elwandle,  bezikhulule kunye nezibophelelo zemithi yokujika; bayitwabulula iseyilana ngasemoyeni, babhekisa elunxwemeni.
44_27_41_Bakuba ke begaxeleke endaweni enolwandle ngeenxa zombini,  wangqubeka khona umkhombe; umphambili wagxumekeka khona,  wahlala awashukuma; ke sona isinqe saqhekeka ngamandla amaza.
44_27_42_Ke kaloku icebo lamasoldati laba lelokuba babulawe ababanjwa, hleze kubekho obaleka ngokudada, aphume.
44_27_43_Kodwa umthetheli-khulu, enga angamsindisa uPawulos,  wawalela kwicebo lawo; kananjalo wathi, abo banako ukudada mabaziphose kuqala baphumele emhlabeni;
44_27_44_bathi abaseleyo, inxenye ikhwele eziplangeni, inxenye ikhwele kwezinye izinto zomkhombe. Kwaza kwathi ngokunjalo bafika emhlabeni, basinda bonke.
44_28_1_Bakuba besindile, baqala ukuqonda ukuba isiqhithi eso kuthiwa yiMelita.
44_28_2_Amabharbhari ke lawo asenzela ububele obungahlali busihla;  kuba aphemba umlilo, asamkela sonke ngenxa yemvula esifikeleyo,  nangenxa yokubanda.
44_28_3_Ke kaloku, akubon ukuba uPawulos utheze inyanda yeentsasa,  wayibeka phezu komlilo, kwaphuma inyoka ebushushwini obo,  yanamathela esandleni sakhe.
44_28_4_Athe ke amabharbhari, akusibona isilo eso silengalenga esandleni sakhe, athetha odwa athi, Okwenene lo mntu ungumbulali; nakuba esindile elwandle, impindezelo ayivumi ukuba adle ubomi.
44_28_5_Yena ngoko wasivuthululela emlilweni isilo eso, akeva buhlungu noko.
44_28_6_Ke bona babelinde ukuba uza kudumba, mhlawumbi athi qwaka,  afe; bakulinda futhi ke, bakubona engahliwa nto imbi, bajika bathi unguthixo.
44_28_7_Ke kaloku, kuloo mmandla bekukho imihlaba yomntu omkhulu wesiqithi, ogama linguPubliyo; owasamkela ngobubele, wasenza undwendwe lwakhe iintsuku zantathu.
44_28_8_Kwathi ke, uyise kaPubliyo walala phantsi, ebanjwe yicesina nokuxaxaza igazi; awathi uPawulos, engene kuye, wathandaza;  wabeka izandla phezu kwakhe, wamphilisa.
44_28_9_Kuthe ke kwakwenzeka oko, bathi nabanye ababenezifo esiqithini apho, beza baphiliswa; bathi bona basenzela iimbeko ezininzi;
44_28_10_bathi, xa sindulukayo, basithwesa ngezinto esizisweleyo.
44_28_11_Ke kaloku, emva kweenyanga ezintathu, sanduluka ngomkhombe wakwa-Alesandire, obudlulise ubusika esiqithini eso, onembasa yamaWele.
44_28_12_Sathi sakufika eSirakusi, sahlala khona iintsuku zantathu.
44_28_13_Sisuka khona, sajikeleza safika eRegiyo; emva kosuku olunye, kwakubon ukuba umoya wasezantsi uvukile, safika ngowesibini umhla ePotiyoli;
44_28_14_safumana abazalwana apho, basibongoza ukuba sihlale nabo iintsuku zibe sixhenxe; seza ngokunjalo eRoma.
44_28_15_Bathi abazalwana, bakusiva, baphuma khona apho, beza kusihlangabeza, bada beza eApiyoforo, naseTritabherne; athe uPawulos, akubabona, wabulela kuThixo, womelezeka.
44_28_16_Ke kaloku, xeshikweni sifikileyo eRoma, umthetheli-khulu wabanikela ababanjwa kumthetheli-mkhosi; ke yena uPawulos wavunyelwa ukuba ahlale yedwa, nesoldati elimgcinayo.
44_28_17_Kwathi ke, emva kweentsuku ezintathu, uPawulos wabizela ndawonye abaziintloko bamaYuda; abathe bakubon ukuba ke babuthelene, wathi kubo, Madoda, bazalwana, mna ndithe,  ndingenzanga nto ichasene nabantu namasiko akowethu, ndesuka eYerusalem ndingumbanjwa, ndanikelwa ezandleni zamaRoma.
44_28_18_Athe wona akundincina, afuna ukundikhulula, ngenxa yokuba kungekho tyala lakufa ndinalo.
44_28_19_Athe ke amaYuda akuphika, ndanyanzeleka ukuba ndibhenele kuKesare; kungengakuba ndibe ndinento yokulumangalela ngayo uhlanga lwakowethu.
44_28_20_Ndinibongoze ke ngenxa yeso sizathu ukuba nize, ndinibone,  ndithethe nani; kuba kungenxa yethemba lakwaSirayeli endinxitywe lo mxokelelwane.
44_28_21_Wona ke athi kuye, Thina asizuzanga zincwadi zithetha ngawe, zivele kwelakwaYuda; kananjalo akufikanga bani wakubazalwana, owabika, wathetha nto ikhohlakeleyo ngawe.
44_28_22_Singa ke singeva kuwe izinto ozicingayo; kuba okunene ngalo elo hlelo kuyazeka kuthi, ukuba lichasiwe ezindaweni zonke.
44_28_23_Ke kaloku, bakummisela imini, kweza kuye into eninzi endlwini abehlala kuyo, wabatyhilela, ebaqononondisa kunene,  ubukumkani bukaThixo; kananjalo ebebeyisela kokungoYesu,  ethabatha emthethweni kaMoses kwanakubaprofeti, eqala kusasa ahlwise.
44_28_24_Yaye inxenye iseyiseka ngaloo mazwi athethwa nguye, yaye inxenye ingakholwa.
44_28_25_Bakuba ke bengavumelani, banduluka, akubon ukuba uPawulos uthethe zwi-nye, wathi, Watyapha uMoya oyiNgcwele ukuthetha ngoIsaya umprofeti koobawo bethu,
44_28_26_esithi, Hamba uye kwaba bantu, uthi, Ukuva oku niya kuva,  ningakhe niqonde; Nithi nibona nje, nibone, ningakhe niqiqe.
44_28_27_Kuba intliziyo yaba bantu ithe fithi kukutyeba; Beva nzima ngeendlebe, Bewacima namehlo abo; Hleze babone ngamehlo, Beve ngeendlebe, Baqonde ngeentliziyo, Bajike, ndibaphilise.
44_28_28_Makwazeke ngoko kuni, ukuba usindiso lukaThixo luthunyelwe kuzo iintlanga; ziya kuluva zona.
44_28_29_Akuba etshilo, emka amaYuda, enembuzwano enkulu phakathi kwawo.
44_28_30_Ke kaloku, uPawulos wahlala iminyaka emibini iphela kweyakhe indlu ayiqeshileyo, wabamkela bonke ababesiza kuye,
44_28_31_ebuvakalisa ubukumkani bukaThixo, efundisa iindawo ezingeNkosi uYesu Kristu ngako konke ukungafihlisi, engalelwa bani.
45_1_1_UPawulos, umkhonzi kaYesu Kristu, umpostile owabizwayo,  wahlulelwa ukuvakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo,
45_1_2_awazidingayo ngenxa engaphambili ngabo abaprofeti bakhe ezibhalweni ezingcwele,
45_1_3_ebhekisele kuNyana wakhe, owazalwa engowembewu kaDavide ngokwenyama,
45_1_4_owamiswayo ukuba unguNyana kaThixo, enamandla, ngokomoya wobungcwele, ngokuvuka kwabafileyo, uYesu Kristu ke, iNkosi yethu;
45_1_5_esathi ngaye samkela ubabalo nobupostile, ukuze ngenxa yegama lakhe kubekho ukulululamela ukholo phakathi kwazo zonke iintlanga;
45_1_6_eniphakathi kwazo nani, babiziweyo bakaYesu Kristu:
45_1_7_ubhalela bonke abaseRoma, abaziintanda zikaThixo, abangcwele ababiziweyo, esithi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi uYesu Kristu.
45_1_8_Kuqala ke, ndiyabulela kuThixo wam ngoYesu Kristu ngenxa yenu nonke, kuba ukholo lwenu luxelwa ehlabathini liphela.
45_1_9_Kuba ulingqina lam uThixo, endimkhonzayo ngomoya wam kwiindaba ezilungileyo zoNyana wakhe, okokuba andiyeki ukunikhankanya;
45_1_10_ndihlala ndikhunga emithandazweni yam, ukuba ndingade ngoku ndibe nempumelelo, ndize kuni nangakuphi, ngako ukuthanda kukaThixo.
45_1_11_Kuba ndilangazelela ukunibona, ukuze ndinabele sibabalo sithile sisesomoya, ukuze nizimaseke;
45_1_12_oko ke kukuze ndivuseleleke nam phakathi kwenu, ngalo ukholo olukuthi sobabini, ngolwenu kwanangolwam.
45_1_13_Andithandi ke ukuba ningazi, bazalwana, ukuba kufuthi ndizimisela entliziyweni yam ukuza kuni (ndathintelwa kwada kwanamhla), ukuze ndibe nasiqhamo sithile naphakathi kwenu,  kwanjengaphakathi kwezinye iintlanga.
45_1_14_KumaGrike kwanakumabharbhari, kwizilumko kwanakwabaswele ukuqonda, ndimelwe kukushumayela.
45_1_15_Ngokunjalo okukokwam ndingxamele ukuzishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo nakuni baseRoma.
45_1_16_Kuba andinazintloni ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu;  kuba zingamandla kaThixo okusindisa bonke abakholwayo, umYuda kuqala, kwanomGrike.
45_1_17_Kuba ngazo kutyhilwa ubulungisa bukaThixo, buphuma elukholweni buse elukholweni, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,  Olilungisa ke uya kudla ubomi ngokokholo.
45_1_18_Kuba ityhilekile ingqumbo kaThixo ivela emazulwini, ichase konke ukungahloneli Thixo, nentswela-bulungisa yabantu,  abayithintelayo inyaniso ngokuswela ukulungisa.
45_1_19_Ngokokuba oko kwazekayo ngoThixo kuyabonakala ngaphakathi kwabo; kuba uThixo wakubonakalalisa kubo.
45_1_20_Kuba kwasekudalweni kwehlabathi, iindawo zakhe ezibe zingenakubonwa zibonwa kakuhle, ziqondeke, ngezinto ezenziweyo,  kwa-amandla akhe angunaphakade, nobuThixo bakhe, ukuze bangabi nakuziphendulela.
45_1_21_Ngokokuba bathe, bemazi uThixo, abamzukisa ngokoThixo,  ababulela kuye; basuka bazizinto ezingento ezicamangweni zabo,  yaza intliziyo yabo engenakuqonda yenziwa yamnyama;
45_1_22_bathi besiba bazizilumko, besuka baba ziziyatha;
45_1_23_baza ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo ongenakonakala babananisela intsobi yomfanekiselo womntu onokonakala, noweentaka, nowezinto ezizitho zine, nowezinambuzane.
45_1_24_Kungoko athe, besezinkanukweni zeentliziyo zabo, uThixo wabanikela nokubanikela ekungcoleni, ukuba bahlazisane ngemizimba, yabo.
45_1_25_bona bananisele ubuxoki inyaniso kaThixo, basihlonela basikhonza isidalwa, begqitha kuMdali, ongowokubongwa kuse kuwo amaphakade. Amen.
45_1_26_Ngenxa yoko, uThixo wabanikela ekuthabathekeni okulihlazo;  kuba namankazana abo umsebenzi wasemvelweni awananisela okunxamnye nemvelo;
45_1_27_kwaza kwangokunjalo ke namadoda, ewushiya umsebenzi wenkazana wasemvelweni, avutha ngokukhanukana kwawo, amadoda esenza kumadoda okuziintloni, ezamkelela umbuyekezo wokulahleka kwawo, abemelwe ke nguwo.
45_1_28_Njengokuba ke bekumangele ukuhlala bemazi kakuhle uThixo,  uThixo wabanikela engqiqweni engacikidekileyo, ukuba benze izinto ezingafanelekileyo;
45_1_29_bezele yiyo yonke intswela-bulungisa, okungendawo, ukubawa,  ulunya; bezele ngumona, kukubulala, ziinkani, yinkohliso,  bubumenemene;
45_1_30_abasebezi, abahlebi, abathiyekileyo kuThixo, abasileyo,  abanekratshi, abaqhankqalazi, abacebi bezinto ezimbi,  abangabevayo abazali,
45_1_31_abangenakuqonda, abaphuli beminqophiso, abangenabubele,  abangenatarhu, abangenanceba;
45_1_32_bona bathi, besazi kakuhle isimiselo sikaThixo, sokuba abo bazenzayo izinto ezinjalo bafanelwe kukufa, banganeli kukuzenza, basuka bathakazelele nabo bazenzayo.
45_2_1_Kungoko ndithi, Akunakuziphendulela, mntundini ugwebayo,  nokuba ungubani; kuba ngokugweba omnye, uzigweba kwawena; kuba wena ugwebayo wenza kwaezo zinto.
45_2_2_Siyazi ke ukuba isigwebo sikaThixo siwa ngokwenyaniso phezu kwabo bazenzayo izinto ezinjalo.
45_2_3_Ucinga na ke, mntundini ugweba abo bazenzayo izinto ezinjalo, ube usenza kwazona nawe, ukuthi, uya kusisaba na wena isigwebo sikaThixo?
45_2_4_Okanye uyabudela na ubutyebi bobubele bakhe, nonyamezelo,  nokuzeka kade umsindo; ungazi ukuba ububele bukaThixo bukusa enguqukweni?
45_2_5_Ke uthi, ngokuba lukhuni kwakho, nentliziyo yakho engenanguquko, uziqwebele ingqumbo, ngemini yengqumbo nokutyhilwa komgwebo onobulungisa kaThixo;
45_2_6_oya kuvuza ulowo nalowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe:
45_2_7_abo bathi ngokomonde emsebenzini olungileyo bafune uzuko nembeko nokungonakali, abavuze ngobomi obungunaphakade;
45_2_8_ke kwabo beyelenqe, bangayithambeliyo inyaniso, basuke bathambele intswela-bulungisa, kuya kubakho umsindo nengqumbo,
45_2_9_imbandezelo noxinaniso emphefumlweni wabantu bonke abasebenza okubi, kowomYuda ukuqala, kwanakowomGrike;
45_2_10_kubekho uzuko ke, nembeko, noxolo, kubantu bonke abasebenza okulungileyo, kumYuda ukuqala, kwanakumGrike.
45_2_11_Kuba kuThixo akukho kukhetha buso.
45_2_12_Kuba bonke abonileyo bengenamthetho, baya kutshabalala ngokunjalo bengenamthetho; nabo bonke abonileyo benomthetho,  baya kugwetywa ngomthetho;
45_2_13_kuba asingabanela ukuba ngabaphulaphuli bawo umthetho,  abangamalungisa kuThixo; ngabenzi bawo umthetho abaya kugwetyelwa.
45_2_14_Kuba xa abeentlanga bathi, bengenamthetho, benze ngemvelo okomthetho, abo, bengenamthetho nje, bangumthetho kubo ngokwabo:
45_2_15_bona bawubonakalalisayo umsebenzi womthetho, ubhalwe ezintliziyweni zabo, sibe isazela sabo singqinelana nawo, zibe izicamango zabo zimangalelana, ziphathe kuziphendulela.
45_2_16_Kuya kuba njalo mhlenikweni uThixo aya kuzigweba izinto ezifihlakeleyo zabantu, ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo ngoYesu Kristu.
45_2_17_Uyabona, wena unegama lokuba ungumYuda, wayame ngomthetho;  uqhayisa ngoThixo;
45_2_18_uyakwazi ukuthanda kwakhe; uzicikida izinto ezahlukeneyo,  uwutyelwe umthetho;
45_2_19_kananjalo wena ukholose ngokuthi uNokeli weemfama,  ulukhanyiselo lwabo basebumnyameni,
45_2_20_umluleki wabaswele ukuqonda, umfundisi weentsana, onesimilo sokwazi nesenyaniso emthethweni.
45_2_21_Ndithi, wena ke umfundisayo omnye, akuzifundisi? Wena ke uvakalisa ukuthi, makungebiwa, uyeba?
45_2_22_Wena ke uthi, makungakrexezwa, uyakrexeza? Wena ke ukruqukileyo zizithixo, uphanga iitempile?
45_2_23_Wena ke uqhayisa ngomthetho, uyamhlazisa uThixo ngokugqitha umthetho?
45_2_24_Kuba igama likaThixo linyeliswa ngenxa yenu phakathi kwazo iintlanga, njengoko kubhaliweyo.
45_2_25_Kuba ulwaluko luyanceda okunene, ukuba uyawenza umthetho;  kodwa ukuba ungumgqithi womthetho, ulwaluko lwakho lusuke lwaba kukungaluki.
45_2_26_Ngoko ke, ukuba ongalukileyo uthi azigcine izimiselo zomthetho, akuyi kuthi na ukungaluki kwakhe kubalelwe ekuthini kukwaluka?
45_2_27_Kuthi ukungaluki, oko kwasemvelweni, ngokuwuzalisa umthetho, kukugwebe wena ungumgqithi-mthetho, noko unesibhalo nolwaluko?
45_2_28_Kuba umYuda asingulowo unguye ngokwangaphandle, nolwaluko asilulo olo lwangaphandle enyameni;
45_2_29_umYuda ngulowo wasemfihlekweni, nolwaluko lolwentliziyo ngomoya, kungengantetho: yena ukudunyiswa kwakhe kungaphumi bantwini, kuphuma kuThixo.
45_3_1_Ugqithisele ngantoni na ngoko umYuda kwabanye? Kunceda ntoni na ukwaluka?
45_3_2_Kukhulu, ngeendlela zonke. Kuba ke, ukuqala, baphathiswa izihlabo zikaThixo.
45_3_3_Kuyini na khona, ukuba abathile abakholwanga? Ukungakholwa kwabo kokuphuthisa na ukuthembeka kukaThixo?
45_3_4_Nakanye! UThixo yena makabe nenyaniso, bonke abantu ke babe ngamaxoki; njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ukuze ube nokugwetyelwa emazwini akho, Weyise ekumangalelweni kwakho.
45_3_5_Ke ukuba ukuswela-kulungisa kwethu kuqondakalisa ubulungisa bukaThixo, sothini na? Uswele ukulungisa na uThixo, lo uhlisa umsindo wakhe? (Ndithetha ngokomntu.)
45_3_6_Nakanye! Oko ubengathini na uThixo ukuligweba ihlabathi?
45_3_7_Ke ukuba inyaniso kaThixo iphuphumele ekuthini azukiswe ngobuxoki bam, ndisagwetywa ngani na mna ngokomoni?
45_3_8_Yini na ukuba singabi sesisithi (ngoko ke sinyeliswayo,  ngoko ke abathile bathi, sithi thina), Masenze okubi, ukuze kuvele okulungileyo? abakugwetywa kuyeleleyo.
45_3_9_Kuthiweni na ke? Sinomkhusane na? Hayi, unakanye! Kuba besesiwamisele ityala amaYuda kwanamaGrike, lokuba baphantsi kwesono bonke;
45_3_10_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Akukho lungisa, hayi,  nalinye;
45_3_11_Akukho uqondayo; Akukho umfunisisayo uThixo!
45_3_12_Bonke baphambukile; bephelele, abancedi lutho; Akukho wenza okulungileyo; akukho nokude abe mnye.
45_3_13_Lingcwaba elivulekileyo umqala wabo, Ngeelwimi zabo bamana ukukhohlisa. Ubuhlungu bamaphimpi buphantsi kwemilebe yomlomo wabo.
45_3_14_Abamlomo uzele kukuqalekisa nobukrakra.
45_3_15_Iinyawo zabo zinamendu okuphalaza igazi;
45_3_16_Lityumtyum neentsizi ezindleleni zabo;
45_3_17_Nendlela yoxolo abayazanga.
45_3_18_Akukho koyika Thixo phambi kwamehlo abo.
45_3_19_Siyazi ke ukuba izinto zonke ozithethayo umthetho,  uzithetha kwabaphantsi komthetho; ukuze imilomo yonke ivingcwe,  nehlabathi lonke libe netyala kuThixo.
45_3_20_Ngokokuba, ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, akuyi kugwetyelwa nyama emehlweni akhe; kuba isono saziwe ngokubakho komthetho.
45_3_21_Ngoku ke kubonakaliswe ubulungisa bukaThixo, kungekho mthetho, bungqinelwa nguwo umthetho nabaprofeti;
45_3_22_ubulungisa ke bukaThixo, obungokukholwa kuYesu Kristu, bube bobabo bonke, buphezu kwabo bonke abakholwayo;
45_3_23_kuba akukho kwahluka; kuba bonile bonke, basilelela eluzukweni lukaThixo;
45_3_24_begwetyelwe ngesisa lubabalo lwakhe ngako ukukhululwa ngentlawulelo ekuYesu Kristu;
45_3_25_athe uThixo wammisa, ukuba abe sisicamagushelo ngegazi lakhe, ngako ukukholwa, ukuze bubonakalaliswe ubulungisa bakhe ngenxa yokuyekelelwa kwezono ezibe zenziwe ngenxa engaphambili,  ekunyamezeleni kukaThixo;
45_3_26_ukuze bubonakalaliswe ubulungisa bakhe ngeli xesha lakalokunje, ukuze abe lilungisa, kwanomgwebeli walowo waselukholweni lukaYesu.
45_3_27_Luphi na ngoko uqhayiso? Luvalelwe ngaphandle. Ngamthetho mni na? Ngowemisebenzi na? Hayi! Ngomthetho wokholo.
45_3_28_Ngoko ke sigqiba kwelithi, umntu ugwetyelwa ngokholo,  kungekho misebenzi yamthetho.
45_3_29_Kanene uThixo ungowamaYuda odwa na? Akanguye na noweentlanga? Ewe, ngoweentlanga nazo;
45_3_30_ekubeni emnye uThixo, oya kugwebela abolwaluko ngokwaselukholweni, nabangengabolwaluko ngalo ukholo.
45_3_31_Umthetho ngoko siyawuphuthisa na ngalo ukholo? Nakanye!  Siyawumisa wona umthetho.
45_4_1_Yintoni na ngoko esiya kuthi, uAbraham, ubawo wethu, ufumene yona ngokwenyama?
45_4_2_Kuba uAbraham, ukuba wayegwetyelwe ngokwasemisebenzini, ange eneqhayiya; akanalo ke phambi koThixo.
45_4_3_Kuba sithini na isibhalo? Sithi ke, Wakholwa uAbraham kuThixo, kwaza oko kwabalelwa kuye ebulungiseni.
45_4_4_Ke kaloku, kulowo usebenzayo, umvuzo awubalelwa ngokwaselubabalweni; ubalelwa ngokwasekubangweni.
45_4_5_Ke kulowo ungasebenziyo, uthi akholwe kuye omgwebelayo lowo ungahloneli Thixo, ukholo lwakhe lubalelwa ebulungiseni;
45_4_6_kwanjengokuba noDavide eluncoma uyolo lwaloo mntu, uThixo ambalela ubulungisa kungekho misebenzi,
45_4_7_esithi, Banoyolo abazigqitho zixolelweyo, Abazono zigutyungelweyo;
45_4_8_Inoyolo indoda eya kuthi iNkosi ingakhe ibalele sono kuyo.
45_4_9_Olo luyolo ngoko lunconywayo lulolwabolwaluko bodwa na?  Asilulo olwabo bangebolwaluko nabo na? Kuba sithi, kuAbraham ukholo lwabalelwa ebulungiseni.
45_4_10_Lwathiwani na ke ngoko ukubalelwa kuye? Esekwalukeni,  esekungalukini, sini na? Engekhona ekwalukeni; esekungalukini.
45_4_11_Waza wamkela umqondiso wolwaluko, waba litywina lokuqinisa ubulungisa bokholo abenalo esekungalukini: ukuba abe nguyise wabo bonke abakholwayo besekungalukini, ukuze ubulungisa bubalelwe nakubo;
45_4_12_nokuthi abe nguyise wabalukileyo, abanganele ukuba ngabalukileyo nje kodwa; abathi phezu koko bahambe emkhondweni wokholo lobawo wethu uAbraham, abenalo esekungalukini.
45_4_13_Kuba ukumbeka ngedinga uAbraham, nokuba yimbewu yakhe,  lokuba yindlalifa yalo ihlabathi, bekungengamthetho;  bekungobulungisa bokholo.
45_4_14_Kuba abo basemthethweni, ukuba ngabo iindlalifa, ukholo lungaba lwenziwe into engento, nedinga lingaba liphuthisiwe;
45_4_15_kuba umthetho usebenza ingqumbo. Ke apho kungekho mthetho,  akukho sigqitho.
45_4_16_Ngenxa yoku, ilifa lelaselukholweni; ukuze libe ngokobabalo; ukuze idinga liqiniseke kuyo yonke imbewu; lingabi kweyasemthethweni yodwa, libe nakweyaselukholweni luka-Abraham,  ongubawo wethu sonke
45_4_17_(njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndikumisile ukuba ube nguyise weentlanga ezininzi), phambi koThixo awakholwayo kuye,  obadlisa ubomi abafileyo, azibize izinto ezingekhoyo, zinge zikho.
45_4_18_Owakholwayo ngethemba, kungekho nethemba eli, ukuze abe nguyise weentlanga ezininzi, ngokoko kwathethwayo: Iya kuba njalo imbewu yakho.
45_4_19_Wathi, engebuthathaka nje ngokholo, akondela emzimbeni wakhe, obuselufile (emayela ekhulwini leminyaka ezelwe),  kwanokufa kwesizalo sikaSara;
45_4_20_owathi, ngokusingisele kwidinga likaThixo, akathandabuza ngokungakholwa; wesuka womelela ngokholo, ezukisa uThixo,
45_4_21_eqinisekile ukuba oko akumise ngedinga, unako nokukwenza.
45_4_22_Kungoko kwabalelwa nokubalelwa ebulungiseni kuye.
45_4_23_Ke kaloku, ukuba kwabalelwa kuye, akubhalwanga ngenxa yakhe yedwa;
45_4_24_kwabhalwa nangenxa yethu, thina kwakuza kubalelwa kuthi,  thina bakholwayo kulowo wamvusayo uYesu iNkosi yethu kwabafileyo;
45_4_25_owanikelwa ngenxa yeziphoso zethu, waza wabuya wavuswa ngenxa yokugwetyelwa kwethu.
45_5_1_Ngoko, sigwetyelwe nje ngokwaselukholweni, sinoxolo kuThixo ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
45_5_2_esaba nako ngaye ukuthi singene ngokholo kolu lubabalo simiyo kulo, siqhayise ngokuthemba uzuko lukaThixo.
45_5_3_Asikukuphela ke oko; sizingca nangeembandezelo ezi, sisazi ukuba imbandezelo isebenza unyamezelo;
45_5_4_unyamezelo ke lusebenza ukucikideka; ukucikideka ke kusebenza ithemba;
45_5_5_ithemba ke alidanisi, ngokuba uthando lukaThixo luthululelwe ezintliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oyiNgcwele, esamnikwayo.
45_5_6_Kuba uKristu uthe, sakubon ukuba sisengama-athalala,  wabafela ngexesha elimisiweyo abangahloneli Thixo.
45_5_7_Kuba kungangenkankulu ukuthi ubani afele ilungisa; kuba uthi mhlawumbi ubani abe nobuganga bokumfela olungileyo;
45_5_8_ke yena uThixo uqondakalisa okwakhe ukusithanda ngokuthi,  sakubon ukuba sisengaboni, uKristu asifele.
45_5_9_Kokukhona sigwetyelwe nje ngegazi lakhe, siya kusindiswa ngaye kuyo ingqumbo.
45_5_10_Kuba xa sithe, besiziintshaba nje, saxolelaniswa noThixo ngako ukufa koNyana wakhe: kokhona, sixolelanisiwe nje, siya kusindiswa ngobomi bakhe.
45_5_11_Asikukuphela ke oko; singabazingca nokuzingca nangaye uThixo, ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, esamkele ngayo kalokunje uxolelaniso olo.
45_5_12_Ngenxa yoko, njengokuba isono sangena ngamntu mnye ehlabathini, kwangena ke ukufa ngaso isono; kwaza ngokunjalo ukufa kwabatyhutyha abantu bonke, ekubeni bonke bonayo;
45_5_13_kuba kude kwakho umthetho, kukho isono ehlabathini, sibe ke isono singabalelwa mntwini kungekho mthetho.
45_5_14_Ukufa ke kwalawula, kuthabathela kuAdam kwezisa kuMoses,  nakwabo bangonanga ngokufana nesigqitho sika-Adam, oyintsobi yalowo ubeza kubakho.
45_5_15_Sisuke isiphoso asaba njengoko sinjalo sona isibabalo.  Kuba, xa abaninzi aba bafa sisiphoso salowo mnye, kokukhona ubabalo lukaThixo, nesipho esingobabalo olu lwalo mntu mnye,  uYesu Kristu, saphuphumela kubo abaninzi aba.
45_5_16_Kanjalo sona isipho asinjengokuba kwaba njalo ngalowo mnye wonayo. Kuba okunene isigwebo seza ngenxa yalowo mnye, sesa ekugwetyweni; ke sona isibabalo seza ngenxa yeziphoso ezininzi,  sesa ekugwetyelweni.
45_5_17_Kuba, xa kwathi ngesiphoso salowo mnye ukufa kwalawula ngalowo mnye, kokukhona baya kuthi aba bakwamkelayo ukuphuphuma kobabalo, noko kuphiwa ubulungisa, babe nokulawula ebomini ngaye lo umnye, uYesu Kristu.
45_5_18_Ngoko ke, njengokuba kwathi ngasiphoso sinye kwabakho ukugwetywa kwabo bonke abantu, ngokunjalo kothi nangesenzo esinye sobulungisa, kubekho ukugwetyelwa ubomi kubo bonke abantu.
45_5_19_Kuba njengokuba kwathi, ngokungeva komntu omnye lowo,  abaninzi benziwa aboni, ngokunjalo kuya kuthi, nangokuva komnye lo, abaninzi benziwe amalungisa.
45_5_20_Ke kaloku umthetho wangena nawo, ukuze isiphoso sande; ke apho sandayo isono, lwaphuphuma ngakumbi ubabalo;
45_5_21_ukuze, njengokuba isono saba nokulawula ngokufa, ngokunjalo nobabalo lube nokulawula ngobulungisa, luse ebomini obungunaphakade, ngaye uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu.
45_6_1_Masithini na ngoko? Masihlale sihleli na esonweni, ukuze ubabalo lwande?
45_6_2_Nakanye! Thina safayo nje kwisono, singathini na ukuba sahlala kuso?
45_6_3_Anazi na ukuba thina sonke, sabhaptizelwayo kuKristu Yesu,  sabhaptizelwa ekufeni kwakhe?
45_6_4_Ngoko ke sangcwatywa naye ngokubhaptizelwa ekufeni; ukuze,  njengokuba uKristu wavuswayo kwabafileyo ngalo uzuko loYise,  sithi ngokunjalo nathi sihambe sinobomi obutsha.
45_6_5_Kuba xa similiselwe kuye ngentsobi yokufa kwakhe,  somiliselwa kuye nangeyokuvuka kwakhe;
45_6_6_sikwazi nje oku, ukuba umntu wethu omdala wabethelelwa emnqamlezweni kunye naye, ukuze umzimba wesono uphuthiswe, size singabi sasikhonza isono;
45_6_7_kuba owafayo ugwetyelwe, wakhululwa kuso isono.
45_6_8_Ukuba ke safa kunye noKristu, siyakholwa ukuba sodla ubomi kwakunye naye;
45_6_9_sisazi ukuba uKristu, evusiwe nje kwabafileyo, akabi safa;  ukufa akusamphathi ngabukhosi.
45_6_10_Kuba ukufa awakufayo, wakufa kwisono kwaba kanye; ubomi ke abudlayo, ubudlela kuThixo.
45_6_11_Ngokunjalo nani zibaleleni ekuthini, ningabafileyo okunene kwisono; kodwa ningabadla ubomi kuThixo, nikuKristu Yesu,  iNkosi yethu.
45_6_12_Ngoko isono masingalawuli emzimbeni wenu onokufa, ukuze nisilulamele ngokwenza iinkanuko zawo.
45_6_13_Kanjalo amalungu enu maningawanikeli kuso isono, ukuba abe ziintonga zentswela-bulungisa; manizinikele ngokwenu kuThixo,  ngokwabaphile babengabafileyo, niwanikele kuThixo amalungu enu,  ukuba abe ziintonga zobulungisa.
45_6_14_Kuba isono asiyi kuniphatha ngabukhosi; kuba aniphantsi komthetho, niphantsi kobabalo.
45_6_15_Kuthiweni na ngoko? Sone na, kuba singephantsi kwamthetho,  siphantsi kobabalo? Nakanye!
45_6_16_Anazi na ukuba lowo nizinikela kuye ukuba ngabakhonzi bokumlulamela, ningabakhonzi ngoku kulowo nimlulamelayo:  nokokuba ningabesono, nisingise ekufeni, nokokuba ningabolulamo, nisingise ebulungiseni?
45_6_17_Makubulelwe ke kuThixo, ukuba nithe, beningabakhonzi besono, nawululamela ngokwentliziyo umfuziselo wemfundiso enanikelwayo kuwo;
45_6_18_nathi, nakuba nikhululwe ke kuso isono, nakhonziswa kubo ubulungisa.
45_6_19_Ndithetha ngokwabantu, ngenxa yobulwelwe benyama yenu;  kuba, njengoko nawanikelayo amalungu enu ukuba abe ngabakhonzi bako ukungcola nokuchasa umthetho, ukuba nichase umthetho:  ngokunjalo kalokunje, wanikeleni amalungu enu ukuba abe ngabakhonzi kubo ubulungisa, ukuba ningcwaliseke.
45_6_20_Kuba, oko nibe ningabakhonzi besono, beningabakhululekileyo kubo ubulungisa.
45_6_21_Naye ninasiqhamo sini na ke ngelo xesha, ngezi zinto nineentloni ngazo ngoku? Kuba isiphelo sazo kukufa.
45_6_22_Kaloku ke, nikhululwe nje kuso isono, naza nakhonziswa kuThixo, ninaso isiqhamo senu sokuba ningcwaliseke; isiphelo ke sibe bubomi obungunaphakade.
45_6_23_Kuba umvuzo wesono kukufa; ke sona isibabalo sikaThixo bubomi obungunaphakade, kuKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.
45_7_1_Anazi na, bazalwana (kuba ndithetha kwabawaziyo umthetho),  ukuba umthetho umphatha ngobukhosi umntu ngexesha lonke adla ubomi ngalo?
45_7_2_Kuba umfazi owendileyo, ubotshiwe ngumthetho kwindoda yakhe,  lo gama idla ubomi; ukuba ke ithe yafa indoda, ukhululekile kuwo umthetho ombophe endodeni.
