45_7_3_Ngoko ke, ukuba uthe waba kuyimbi indoda, yakubon ukuba indoda yakhe isadla ubomi, kothiwa ngumkrexezikazi. Ke ukuba ithe yafa indoda yakhe, woba ukhululekile kuwo umthetho, ukuba angabi mkrexezikazi, ethe waba kuyimbi indoda.
45_7_4_Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam, nani nabulawa nafa kuwo umthetho ngawo umzimba kaKristu, ukuba nibe kuwumbi, kulowo ke wavuswa kwabafileyo, ukuze sixakathe isiqhamo kuThixo thina.
45_7_5_Kuba oko besikwinyama, ukuthabatheka zizono, okube kuxhokonxwa ngawo umthetho, kwakusebenza emalungwini ethu ekuxakatha isiqhamo esisa ekufeni.
45_7_6_Ke ngoku sikhululwe thina kuwo umthetho, safayo nje kwesasibanjwe kuko, ngokokude sikhonze sinobutsha bomoya,  singakhonzi sinobudala bomthetho obhaliweyo.
45_7_7_Sithini na ke? Umthetho usisono na? Nakanye! Ke ngendingasazanga isono, ukuba bekungengamthetho; kuba nenkanuko ngendingayazanga, ukuba umthetho ubungatshongo ukuthi, Uze ungakhanuki.
45_7_8_Isono ke sizuze ithuba ngawo umthetho, sasebenza ngaphakathi kwam yonke inkanuko; kuba, kungekho mthetho, isono sifile.
45_7_9_Mna ke bendifudula ndiphilile, ungekho umthetho; uthe ke wakufika umthetho, sabuya saphila isono, ndafa ke mna;
45_7_10_waza umthetho obumiselwe ubomi, wafumaneka kum inguwona usingisa ekufeni.
45_7_11_Kuba isono sithe, sizuze ithuba ngawo umthetho,  sandilukuhla, saza ngawo sandibulala.
45_7_12_Ngoko ke umyalelo okunene ungcwele; nomthetho ungcwele,  unobulungisa, ulungile.
45_7_13_Oko ke kulungileyo kwaba kukufa na ke kum? Nakanye! Saye sisisono; ukuze sibonakale sisisono, sisebenza ukufa kum ngoko kulungileyo; ukuze isono ngawo umthetho sibe sisono ngokuncamisileyo.
45_7_14_Kuba siyazi ukuba umthetho ungowomoya; ke mna ndingowenyama; kuthengiswe ngam, ndaba phantsi kwesono.
45_7_15_Kuba oko ndikwenzayo andikwazi mna; kuba endikuthandayo,  oko andikwenzi; endikuthiyayo, oko ndiyakwenza;
45_7_16_ukuba ke endingakuthandiyo ndenza khona oko, ndivumelana nomthetho ukuba mhle.
45_7_17_Ngoko ke ayisendim osebenza oko, seyisisono esi simiyo ngaphakathi kwam.
45_7_18_Kuba ndiyazi ukuba ngaphakathi kwam, oko kukuthi enyameni yam, akumi okulungileyo; kuba ukuthanda kukho ukubakho oku kum;  ke kona ukukusebenza okuhle andikufumani.
45_7_19_Kuba okulungileyo endikuthandayo, andikwenzi; khona okubi,  endingakuthandiyo, oko ndiyakwenza.
45_7_20_Ukuba ke endingakuthandiyo mna, ndenza khona oko, ayisendim okusebenzayo
45_7_21_oko, seyisisono esi simiyo ngaphakathi kwam.
45_7_22_Ndifumana ngoko lo mthetho kum, ukuba kuthi, ndifuna ukukwenza okuhle, kusuke kubekho okubi kum.
45_7_23_Kuba ndikholene nomthetho kaThixo ngokomntu ongaphakathi;  kodwa ndibona mthetho wumbi, emalungwini am, usilwa nomthetho wengqiqo yam, undithimbela emthethweni wesono, lowo usemalungwini am.
45_7_24_Athi ke mna, mntu uludwayi! Azi, ngubani na oya kundihlangula kulo mzimba woku kufa?
45_7_25_Ndiyabulela kuThixo ngoYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu. Ngoko ke mna ngokwam ngayo ingqiqo okunene ndikhonza umthetho kaThixo;  kodwa ngayo inyama ndikhonza umthetho wesono.
45_8_1_Ngoko ke, ngoku akukho kugwetywa kwabakuKristu Yesu;  abangahambiyo ngokwenyama, abahamba ngokoMoya.
45_8_2_Kuba umthetho woMoya wobomi, ndakuba kuKristu Yesu,  wandikhulula emthethweni wesono nokufa.
45_8_3_Kuba ekukhohlweni komthetho, ekubeni uswele amandla ngayo inyama, uthe uThixo, ethume owakhe uNyana, efana nenyama elawulwa sisono, emthume ngenxa yesono, wasigweba isono esenyameni leyo;
45_8_4_ukuze ibango lomthetho lizaliseke kuthi, thina singahambiyo ngokwenyama; sihambayo ngokoMoya.
45_8_5_Kuba abo bangokwenyama banyamekela izinto zasenyameni; abo ke bangokoMoya banyamekela izinto zaseMoyeni.
45_8_6_Kuba ukunyameka kwenyama ikukufa; ukunyameka ke koMoya bubomi noxolo.
45_8_7_Ngokokuba ukunyameka kwenyama kububutshaba kuThixo; kuba umthetho kaThixo kungawululameli, kuba kungenako nokuba nako ukwenjenjalo.
45_8_8_Abo ke bakwinyama, abanakumkholisa uThixo.
45_8_9_Ke nina anikwinyama; nikuMoya, ukuba kumi okunene uMoya kaThixo ngaphakathi kwenu. Ukuba ke umntu akanaye uMoya kaKristu, akangowakhe lowo.
45_8_10_Ukuba ke uKristu ungaphakathi kwenu, umzimba okunene ufile ngenxa yesono; kodwa uMoya ububomi ngenxa yobulungisa.
45_8_11_Ukuba ke uMoya walowo wamvusayo uYesu kwabafileyo, umi ngaphakathi kwenu, yena owamvusayo uKristu kwabafileyo uya kuyenza iphile nemizimba yenu enokufa, ngaye uMoya wakhe omiyo ngaphakathi kwenu.
45_8_12_Ngoko ke, bazalwana, singabanetyala; kodwa kungekuyo inyama ukuze siphile ngokwenyama.
45_8_13_Kuba xa niphila ngokwenyama, niza kufa; ke ukuba niyazibulala ngoMoya, zife iintlondi zomzimba, nophila.
45_8_14_Kuba bonke abakhokelwa nguMoya kaThixo, bangoonyana bakaThixo abo.
45_8_15_Kuba anamkelanga moya wabukhoboka, ukuba nibuye noyike;  namkele umoya wokwenziwa oonyana, esidanduluka ngawo sithi,  Abha, Bawo.
45_8_16_UMoya ngokwakhe ungqinelana nomoya wethu, ukuba singabantwana bakaThixo.
45_8_17_Ukuba ke singabantwana, sikwaziindlalifa; iindlalifa zikaThixo, iindlalifa ke kunye noKristu; ukuba okunene siva ubunzima kunye naye, ukuze sizukiswe nokuzukiswa kunye naye.
45_8_18_Kuba ndigqiba kwelithi, iintlungu zeli xesha lakalokunje azinakulinganiswa nobuqaqawuli obu buza kutyhilwa kuthi.
45_8_19_Kuba ukulangazelela kwendalo kulinde ukutyhileka koonyana bakaThixo.
45_8_20_Kuba indalo yalulanyiselwa kokungelutho, kungengakuvuma kwayo, kungenxa yowayilulamisayo,
45_8_21_inethemba lokuba nendalo ngokwayo iya kukhululwa ebukhobokeni bokonakala, isingiswe enkululekweni yozuko lwabantwana bakaThixo.
45_8_22_Kuba siyazi ukuba yonke indalo iyancwina, inenimba kunye,  unangoku.
45_8_23_Asiyiyo ke yodwa; sisuka nathi, banayo intlahlela yoMoya,  thina aba ke ngokwethu, sincwine ngaphakathi kwethu, silinde ukwenziwa oonyana; inkululeko yomzimba wethu ke leyo.
45_8_24_Kuba sasindiselwa ethembeni; ke ithemba elise libonwa asithemba; kuba oko akubonayo umntu, angaba usakuthembeleni na?
45_8_25_Ukuba ke sithembe ukuzuza oko singakuboniyo, sikulinda kakhulu, sinomonde.
45_8_26_Ngokukwanjalo ke noMoya uncedisana nokuswela kwethu amandla; kuba esingakuthandazelayo ngokoko simelwe kukuthandaza ngako, asikwazi; uthi ke uMoya ngokwakhe asithethelele ngezincwino ezingathethekiyo.
45_8_27_Ke oziphengululayo iintliziyo uyakwazi into okuyiyo ukunyameka koMoya; ngokuba ubathethelela abangcwele ngokukaThixo.
45_8_28_Siyazi ke ukuba zonke izinto zisebenziselana okulungileyo kwabo bamthandayo uThixo, kwababiziweyo ngokwengqibo yakhe.
45_8_29_Ngokuba abo wabaziyo ngenxa engaphambili, wabamisela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba bafane nomfanekiselo woNyana wakhe, ukuze abe ngowamazibulo kubazalwana abaninzi.
45_8_30_Abo ke wabamisayo ngenxa engaphambili, wabuya wababiza bona; waza abo wababizayo, wabuya wabagwebela bona; abo ke wabagwebelayo, wabuya wabazukisa nokubazukisa bona.
45_8_31_Sithini na ke ngoko kwezi zinto? Ukuba uThixo ungakuthi,  ngubani na ongasichasayo?
45_8_32_Lowo, gxebe, ungamconganga owakhe uNyana, wesuka wamnikela ngenxa yethu sonke, angathini na ukuba angasibabali ngazo zonke ezo zinto, ndawonye naye?
45_8_33_Ngubani na oya kumangalela abanyulwa bakaThixo, inguThixo nje obagwebelayo?
45_8_34_Ngubani na ogwebayo, inguKristu nje owafayo? ngaphezu koko ke, wabuya wavuka; ongasekunene kukaThixo, osithethelelayo?
45_8_35_Ngubani na oya kusahlula eluthandweni lukaKristu?  Yimbandezelo na, luxinaniso na, yintshutshiso na, yindlala na,  bubuze na, yingozi na, likrele na?
45_8_36_Njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ngenxa yakho sibulawa imini yonke; Sibalelwe ekuthini sizizimvu zokuxhelwa.
45_8_37_Kanti ke kwezo zinto zonke, sisuka soyise sigqithisele,  ngaye owasithandayo.
45_8_38_Kuba ndeyisekile kukuba nakufa, nabomi, nazithunywa zezulu,  nazilawuli, naziphathamandla, nanto zikhoyo, nanto zizayo,
45_8_39_nabuphakamo, nabunzulu, nasinye isidalwa esisimbi, asiyi kuba nako ukusahlula thina eluthandweni lukaThixo, olukuye uKristu Yesu, iNkosi yethu.
45_9_1_Ndithetha inyaniso ndikuKristu, andixoki, sibe nesazela sam sindingqinela ndiseMoyeni oyiNgcwele,
45_9_2_ukuba ndineentlungu kakhulu, nentuthumbo enkulu engapheliyo,  entliziyweni yam.
45_9_3_Kuba bendingade ndinqwenele ukusingelwa phantsi mna ngokwam,  ndahlukaniswe naye uKristu, ngenxa yabazalwana bam,  abayimizalwane yam ngokwenyama,
45_9_4_abangamaSirayeli bona; ekukokwabo ukwenziwa oonyana,  nokuzukiswa, nokuphiwa iminqoqhiso, nokuwiswa komthetho,  nenkonzo kaThixo, namadinga;
45_9_5_abangababo ooyise; awaphuma kubo uKristu ngokwenyama, uThixo ongophezu konke, engowokubongwa kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
45_9_6_Ke, xa nditshoyo, andithethi nto nje, ngokungathi ilizwi likaThixo liphalele. Kuba asingabo bonke abaphuma kuSirayeli abangamaSirayeli;
45_9_7_kananjalo abathe, ngakuba beyimbewu ka-Abraham, baba ngabantwana bonke; kusuke kwathiwa, Imbewu yakho iya kubizwa ngoIsake;
45_9_8_oko kukuthi, asingabantwana benyama abangabantwana bakaThixo; ngabantwana bedinga ababalelwa ekuthini bayimbewu.
45_9_9_Kuba lilo eli ilizwi ledinga, Ngeli xesha nyakenye ndiya kuza, waye uSara eya kuba nonyana.
45_9_10_Alipheli apho ke; kwathi nakuRebheka, akubon ukuba ukhawule ngamnye, ngoIsake ubawo wethu,
45_9_11_nakuba abantwana babengekazalwa, bengekenzi nto nelungileyo nembi, ukuze ingqibo kaThixo ngokonyulo ihlale ihleli,  ingengokwasemisebenzini, ingokwalowo ubizayo:
45_9_12_kwathiwa kuye, Omkhulu uya kukhonza komnci;
45_9_13_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, UYakobi ndamthanda, ke uEsawu ndamthiya.
45_9_14_Sithini na ke ngoko? Kukho ukuswela kulungisa kusini na kuye uThixo? Nakanye!
45_9_15_Kuba esithi kuMoses, Ndiya kuba nenceba kosukuba ndinenceba kuye, ndibe netarhu kosukuba ndinetarhu kuye.
45_9_16_Ngoko ke asikokothandayo, kanjalo asikokobalekayo;  kokukaThixo onenceba.
45_9_17_Kuba isibhalo sithi kuFaro, Ndakuvelisela yona le nto,  yokuba ndiwabonakalalisele kuwe amandla am, nokuthi laziswe igama lam kulo lonke ihlabathi.
45_9_18_Ngoko ke unenceba kwathanda ukumenzela inceba, athi ke athandayo amenze lukhuni.
45_9_19_Uya kuthi kum ngoko, Usasolelani na ke? Kuba ngubani na omelana necebo lakhe?
45_9_20_Ehla ke, mntundini! Ungubani na wena, ukuba uphendulane noThixo? Into exonxiweyo ingatsho na kumxonxi Wayo ukuthi, Yini na ukuba undenjenje ukundenza?
45_9_21_Khona akanagunya na umbumbi wodongwe ukwenza, ngadongwe lwambumba-nye, esinye isitya sibe sesembeko, nesinye sibe sesingesambeko?
45_9_22_Hi, ukuba ke uThixo, ethanda ukubonakalalisa ingqumbo yakhe, nokwazisa amandla akhe, wathwala enokuzeka kade okukhulu izitya zengqumbo, zilungiselwe intshabalalo;
45_9_23_ukuze abazise ubutyebi bozuko lwakhe ezityeni zenceba,  abezilungisele uzuko ngenxa engaphambili;
45_9_24_ezi wazibizayo, kwathina aba, kungekuwo amaYuda odwa,  kukwiintlanga nazo?
45_9_25_Njengokuba esithi nakwekaHoseya, Ndiya kubabiza abangebantu bam ngokuba ngabantu bam; Nongathandiweyo, ngokuba ngothandiweyo.
45_9_26_Kwakuya kuthi, apho kwabe kusithiwa kubo, Aningabantu bam nina, Babizwe apho ngokuthi, Ningoonyana bakaThixo ophilileyo.
45_9_27_Ke uIsaya udanduluka ngoSirayeli, esithi, Nangona inani loonyana bakaSirayeli lingangentlabathi yaselwandle,  ngamasalela odwa aya kusindiswa;
45_9_28_kuba elifeza ilizwi, aligqibe ngobulungisa; ngokuba iNkosi iya kwenza ilizwi layo phezu komhlaba, ilifinyeze.
45_9_29_Kwanjengokuba uIsaya ebetshilo ngenxa engaphambili ukuthi,  Ukuba iNkosi yemikhosi ibingasishiyelanga mbewu, Ngesibe saba njengeSodom, ngesibe senziwa safana neGomora.
45_9_30_Sithini na ke ngoko? Sithi, iintlanga ebezingasukeli bulungisa, zabubamba ubulungisa, ubulungisa ke baselukholweni;
45_9_31_kodwa yena uSirayeli, obesukela umthetho wobulungisa,  akafikelelanga emthethweni wobulungisa.
45_9_32_Ngani na? Ngokuba ukusukela kwakhe kwaye kungengokwaselukholweni; kwaye kungathi kungokwasemisebenzini yomthetho. Kuba babetheka elityeni eli lokubetheka,
45_9_33_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Yabona, ndibeka eZiyon ilitye lokubetheka, Iliwa lesikhubekiso; bonke abakholwayo kuye abayi kudaniswa.
45_10_1_Bazalwana, inkolelo yeyam intliziyo, nesikhungo sam kuye uThixo, ngenxa yamaSirayeli, sesokuba asindiswe.
45_10_2_Kuba ndiyabangqinela ukuba banokumzondelela uThixo, koko bengamzondeleli ngokokwazi okukuko.
45_10_3_Kuba bathe, bengabazi ubulungisa bukaThixo, befuna nokumisa obabo ubulungisa, ababululamela ubulungisa bukaThixo.
45_10_4_Kuba intsingiselo yomthetho nguKristu, ukuze abe bubulungisa kubo bonke abakholwayo.
45_10_5_Kuba uMoses ubulungisa basemthethweni uthi ukububhala,  Umntu ozenzileyo ezi zinto uya kuphila zizo.
45_10_6_Ke bona obaselukholweni ubulungisa buthetha ngolu hlobo,  Musa ukuthi entliziyweni yakho, Ngubani na oya kunyuka aye emazulwini ukuba ahlise uKristu?
45_10_7_nokuthi, Ngubani na oya kuhla aye enzonzobileni, ukuba anyuse uKristu kwabafileyo?
45_10_8_Buthini na ke? Buthi, Ilizwi eli likufuphi kuwe, emlonyeni wakho nasentliziyweni yakho: elo ke lilizwi lokholo, eli sivakalisa lona.
45_10_9_Ngokuba, xa uthe wamvuma ngomlomo wakho ukuba uyiNkosi uYesu, wakholwa ngentliziyo yakho ukuba uThixo wamvusa kwabafileyo, wosindiswa.
45_10_10_Kuba umntu ukholwa ngentliziyo, ukuze abe nobulungisa;  avume ke ngomlomo, ukuze asindiswe.
45_10_11_Kuba isibhalo sithi, Bonke abakholwayo kuye abayi kudaniswa.
45_10_12_Kuba akukho kwahluka kwamYuda namGrike; kuba ikwayiloo Nkosi eyiNkosi yabo bonke, ibubutyebi kubo bonke abayinqulayo.
45_10_13_Kuba bonke abasukuba belinqula igama leNkosi bosindiswa.
45_10_14_Bothini na ke ukumnqula lowo bangakholwanga kuye? Bothini na ke ukukholwa kulowo bangamvanga?
45_10_15_Bothini na ke ukuva, kungekho mshumayeli? Bothini na ke ukushumayela, bengathunywanga? Njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,  Hayi, ukuba zintle kwazo iinyawo zabashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo, zabashumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zezinto ezilungileyo!
45_10_16_Abazilulamelanga ke bonke iindaba ezilungileyo, kuba uIsaya uthi, Nkosi, ngubani na owakholwayo ludaba lwethu?
45_10_17_Ngoko ke ukholo luphuma eludabeni, udaba ke lukho ngelizwi likaThixo.
45_10_18_Ingaba kodwa, abevanga na? Ehla wena! Intlokoma yabo yaphuma, yaya kulo lonke ihlabathi, Namazwi abo aya eziphelweni zelimiweyo.
45_10_19_Ndithi, Kodwa ubengazi na uSirayeli? Ukuqala, uMoses uthi,  Mna ndiya kunikhweletisa ngabangeluhlanga, Ndiya kunicaphukisa ngohlanga olungenangqondo.
45_10_20_Ke yena uIsaya akanqwanqwi; uthi, Ndifunyenwe ngababengandifuni, Ndaba nokubonakala kwababengandibuzi.
45_10_21_Ke ngokubhekisele kuSirayeli uthi, Imini yonke izandla zam ndizolulele kubantu abangevayo, abaphikayo.
45_11_1_Ngoko ke ndithi, UThixo ubagibile na abantu bakhe? Nakanye!  Kuba nam lo ndingumSirayeli wasembewini ka-Abraham, wesizwe sikaBhenjamin.
45_11_2_UThixo akabagibanga bona abantu bakhe, abebazi ngenxa engaphambili. Okanye aniyazi na indawo ethetha ngoEliya esibhalweni, ukumangalela kwakhe amaSirayeli kuThixo, esithi,
45_11_3_Nkosi, abaprofeti bakho ababulele, nezibingelelo zakho azichithile; mna ndisele ndedwa; afuna ke ubomi bam?
45_11_4_Sisuka esikaThixo isihlabo sithini na kuye? Sithi,  Ndizishiyele amadoda angamawaka asixhenxe, angagobanga dolo kuBhahali wona.
45_11_5_Ngokunjalo ke ngoko, nakweli xesha lakalokunje, kukho amasalela ngokonyulo lobabalo.
45_11_6_Ukuba ke kungobabalo, akusengamisebenzi; okanye ubabalo alungebi saba lubabalo.
45_11_7_Kuthiweni na ngoko? Kuthiwe, Khona oko akungxameleyo amaSirayeli akakufumananga; ke abanyuliweyo bakufumana, bathi ke abanye baqaqadekiswa;
45_11_8_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, UThixo ubanike umoya wokuqoba, amehlo okuba bangaboni, neendlebe zokuba bangeva,  kwada kwaba yimini yanamhla.
45_11_9_Kanjalo uDavide uthi, Isithebe sabo masibe sisibatha,  nesihogo sokubambisa, Nesikhubekiso, nesiphindezelo kubo:
45_11_10_Makenziwe abe mnyama amehlo abo, ukuba bangaboni; Nomhlana wabo wugobe amaxa onke.
45_11_11_Ndithi ngoko, Bakhubeka ukuze bawe na? Nakanye! Kuthe ngesiphoso sabo, usindiso lwafika kuzo iintlanga, ukuze zibakhweletise.
45_11_12_Ukuba ke isiphoso sabo siba bubutyebi behlabathi,  nokuncipha kwabo kuba bubutyebi beentlanga, yobeka phi na inzaliseko yabo?
45_11_13_Kuba ndithetha kuni, zintlanga. Ekubeni okunene mna ndingumpostile weentlanga, ndiyaluzukisa ulungiselelo lwam;
45_11_14_ukuba ndingade ndibakhweletise abenyama yam, ndisindise inxenye yabo.
45_11_15_Kuba xa ukulahlwa kwabo kuluxolelaniso lwehlabathi, koba yintoni na ukwamkelwa kwabo? Akububomi obuphuma kwabafileyo,  yini na?
45_11_16_Ukuba ke intlahlela ingcwele, ikwanjalo nentlama; ukuba ke ingcambu ingcwele, akwanjalo namasebe.
45_11_17_Ke ukuba inxenye yamasebe yaxhuzulwa, wathi ke wena,  ungumnquma wasendle nje, wamiliselwa phakathi kwawo, waba lidlelane nengcambu nokutyeba komnquma:
45_11_18_musa ukuwaqhayisela amasebe; ke ukuba uyawaqhayisela, yazi ukuba asinguwe oyithweleyo ingcambu; yingcambu ethwele wena.
45_11_19_Uya kuthi ngoko, Axhuzulwa amasebe, ukuze mna ndimiliselwe.
45_11_20_Utyaphile; axhuzulwa ngokungakholwa, ke wena umi ngokholo;  musa ukukratsha, yoyika.
45_11_21_Kuba, xa uThixo angawaconganga awasemvelweni amasebe,  lumka hleze angakucongi nawe lo.
45_11_22_Khawububone ke ububele nobukhali bukaThixo; ubukhali okunene kwabo bawayo; kodwa kuwe, ububele, ukuba uthe wahlala kobo bubele; okanye wogawulwa nawe lo.
45_11_23_Nabo ke, ukuba abathanga bahlale ekungakholweni,  bomiliselwa; kuba uThixo unako ukubuya abamilisele.
45_11_24_Kuba wena, xa wagawulwa kumnquma ongowasendle ngokwemvelo,  waza wamiliselwa ngokunxamnye nemvelo komhle umnquma: bobeka phi na aba bangamasebe ngokwemvelo, ukumiliselwa kwabo kowabo umnquma?
45_11_25_Kuba andithandi, bazalwana, ukuba ningayazi le mfihlelo,  ukuze ningabi ziingqondi ngokwenu: le yokuba ukuqaqadeka kuwahlele amaSirayeli ngenxenye, ide ingene inzaliseko yazo iintlanga;
45_11_26_aze ngokunjalo ke wonke uSirayeli asindiswe, njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uya kuvela eZiyon uMhlanguli, Akusonge kumke kwaYakobi ukungahloneli Thixo.
45_11_27_Nguwo ke lo umnqophiso wam nabo, Xa ndithe ndazisusa izono zabo.
45_11_28_Okunene ngokweendaba ezilungileyo, baziintshaba ngenxa yenu; kodwa ngokonyulo, ngabaziintanda ngenxa yoobawo.
45_11_29_Kuba azinabuyambo izibabalo ezi, nobizo olu lukaThixo.
45_11_30_Kuba, njengokuba nani benifudula ningamvi uThixo, ngoku ke nenzelwe inceba kukungeva kwabo abo;
45_11_31_kwangokunjalo, nabo ababanga namvo ngoku, ukuze ngokwenzelwa kwenu inceba, benzelwe nabo inceba.
45_11_32_Kuba uThixo ubavalele ndawonye entsweleni-kuva bonke,  ukuze abenzele inceba bonke.
45_11_33_Hayi, ubunzulu bobutyebi nobobulumko nobokwazi kukaThixo!  Asikuko nokuba ayiphengululeki imigwebo yakhe, azilandeki iindlela zakhe!
45_11_34_Kuba ngubani na oyazileyo ingqiqo yeNkosi? Ngubani na khona othe waba ngumcebisi wayo?
45_11_35_Ngubani na khona owayinikayo ngenxa engaphambili, kwaza kwabuyekezwa kuye?
45_11_36_Ngokuba ziphuma kuyo ke, zikho ngayo, zikholo yona, zonke ezo zinto. Malube kuyo uzuko, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
45_12_1_Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, bazalwana, ngeemfefe zikaThixo,  ukuba niyinikele imizimba yenu ibe lidini eliphilileyo,  elingcwele, elikholekileyo kuThixo: inkonzo yenu ke leyo yasengqondweni.
45_12_2_Kanjalo ningamilisi okweli phakade; manibe kumila kumbi ngokuhlaziyeka kwengqiqo yenu, ukuze nikucikide into okuyiyo ukuthanda kukaThixo okulungileyo, okukholekileyo,  okuzalisekileyo.
45_12_3_Kuba ngalo ubabalo endababalwa ngalo, ndithi kubo bonke abaphakathi kwenu, mabangazicingeli ngaphezu koko bamelwe kukuzicingela ngako; mabazicingele ingcinga ephilileyo,  njengoko uThixo abele ulowo nalowo umlinganiso wokholo.
45_12_4_Kuba, kwanjengokuba sinamalungu amaninzi mzimbeni mnye, abe ke onke amalungu la engenamsebenzi mnye, ngokunjalo thina aba,  sibaninzi nje, simzimba mnye kuKristu, sonke ke ngabanye singamalungu omnye elomnye.
45_12_5_Sinezibabalo nje ke ezahlukahlukileyo, ngokobabalo esababalwa ngalo,
45_12_6_nokuba sinokuprofeta, masiprofete ngokomlinganiselo wokholo;
45_12_7_nokuba sinobulungiseleli, masihlale ebulungiselelini obo;  nokuba ngofundisayo, makahlale emfundisweni leyo;
45_12_8_nokuba ngovuselelayo, makahlale ekuvuseleleni oko; owabayo makabe engenakumbi; owongamelayo, makongame enyamekile; owenza inceba makayenze inceba echwayithile.
45_12_9_Uthando malungabi naluhanahaniso; kuthiyeni okungendawo,  namathelani kokulungileyo.
45_12_10_Mayela nothando olu lobuzalwana, ndithi, yenzelanani ububele; mayela nembeko leyo, phangelanani;
45_12_11_mayela nokunyameka oko, musani ukunqena; mayela nomoya lo,  vuthani;
45_12_12_mayela neNkosi le, khonzani; mayela nethemba, vuyani;  mayela nembandezelo, nyamezelani; mayela nomthandazo,  zingisani;
45_12_13_mayela neentswelo zabangcwele, yibani nobudlelane; ukubuka iindwendwe kusukeleni.
45_12_14_Basikeleleni abanitshutshisayo; sikelelani, ningaqalekisi.
45_12_15_Vuyani nabavuyayo, nilile nabalilayo.
45_12_16_Cingelanani nto-nye; musani ukucinga izinto eziphakamileyo, tsalelani kwezithobekileyo. Musani ukuba ziingqondi ngokwenu.
45_12_17_Ningabuyekezi ububi ngobubi nakubani. Khathalelani okuhle emehlweni abantu bonke.
45_12_18_Ukuba kunokwenzeka, okukokwenu nina, hlalani ninoxolo nabantu bonke.
45_12_19_Musani ukuziphindezelela, zintanda; yikhweleleni ingqumbo; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Impindezelo yeyam, kuya kubuyekeza mna, itsho iNkosi.
45_12_20_Ngoko ke, ukuba utshaba lwakho lulambile, luphe ludle;  ukuba lunxaniwe, luseze; kuba ngokwenjenjalo ke, woba ufumba amalahle omlilo phezu kwentloko yalo.
45_12_21_Musa ukweyiswa bububi; boyise ububi ngokulungileyo.
45_13_1_Yonke imiphefumlo mayiwalulamele amagunya awongamileyo.  Kuba akukho gunya lingelilo elivela kuThixo; amagunya ke akhoyo amiswe nguThixo.
45_13_2_Ngoko ke olichasayo igunya, umelene nommiselo kaThixo; abo ke bameleneyo nawo, baya kuziguqulela ukugwetywa.
45_13_3_Kuba abaphathi aba asingabokoyikwa kwimisebenzi elungileyo,  ngabokoyikwa kwemibi. Unga akungeloyiki na ke igunya? Yenza okulungileyo, wodunyiswa kwalilo;
45_13_4_kuba lingumlungiseleli kaThixo, wokuba kulungele wena. Ke,  ukuba usuka wenze okubi, yoyika; kuba alifumane laliphatha ikrele, kuba lingumlungiseleli kaThixo, umphindezeli ngengqumbo kowenza okubi.
45_13_5_Kungoko ndithi, kufuneka ukulilulamela, ningakwenzi oko ngenxa yengqumbo yodwa, nikwenze nangenxa yesazela.
45_13_6_Kuba kukwangenxa yoko eninikela irhafu; kuba ngababusi bakaThixo, bezingisa ukusebenza loo nto.
45_13_7_Ngoko bonke banikeni okubafaneleyo; mnikeni irhafu ofanelwe yirhafu, unikelo ofanelwe lunikelo, ukoyika ofanelwe kukoyikwa,  imbeko ofanelwe yimbeko.
45_13_8_Musani ukuba natyala lanto mntwini, lingelilo elokuthandana; kuba omthandayo omnye uzalise umthetho.
45_13_9_Kuba oku kuthi, Uze ungakrexezi, uze ungabulali, uze ungebi, uze ungangqini buxoki, uze ungakhanuki, nokuba kukho wumbi umthetho, uhlanganiselwe kweli lizwi lokuthi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako.
45_13_10_Uthando alusebenzi bubi kuye ummelwane; ngoko uthando luyinzaliseko yomthetho.
45_13_11_Ke oko masikwenze, silazi nje ixesha eli, ukuba lilixa lokuba ngoku sivuke ebuthongweni; kuba ngoku usindiso lukufuphi kuthi, kunokuya saqalayo ukukholwa.
45_13_12_Ubusuku buhambile, ukusa ke kusondele. Masiyilahle ngoko imisebenzi yobumnyama, sixhobe iintonga zokukhanya.
45_13_13_Masihambe sizibekile ngokwasemini; kungabi sezindywaleni nasekunxileni; kungabi sekuphimiseni naseburheletyweni; kungabi sezinkanini nasemoneni.
45_13_14_Yambathani ke iNkosi uYesu Kristu; ize ukwazalelela inyama ningakwenzeli ukukhwezelela iinkanuko zayo.
45_14_1_Lowo ke uswele amandla elukholweni, mamkeleni, kodwa ke kungabi ngokucalula zicamango.
45_14_2_Omnye okunene uyakholwa ukuba angazidla izinto zonke; kodwa yena oswele amandla udla imifuno yodwa.
45_14_3_Lowo udlayo, makangamenzi into engeyakonto ongadliyo;  nalowo ungadliyo, makangamgwebi odlayo; kuba uThixo umamkele.
45_14_4_Ungubani na wena ugweba isicaka somnye? Ukuma kwaso, nokuba kukuwa kwaso, kusenkosini yaso. Siya kuma ke; kuba uThixo unako ukusimisa.
45_14_5_Omnye okunene ubeka umhla othile kunomnye umhla, wumbi ke ubeka imihla yonke. Elowo nalowo makaqiniseke kweyakhe ingqiqo.
45_14_6_Lowo uwunyamekelayo umhla, uwunyamekelela iNkosi; nalowo ungawunyamekeliyo umhla, engawunyamekeli nje, wenzela iNkosi;  lowo udlayo, udlela iNkosi, kuba ebulela kuThixo; nalowo ungadliyo, engadli nje, wenzela iNkosi, abe ebulela kuThixo.
45_14_7_Kuba akukho namnye kuthi uzidlelayo ubomi, akukho namnye uzifelayo.
45_14_8_Kuba nokuba sithi sidle ubomi, sibudlela iNkosi; nokuba sithi sife, sifela iNkosi. Ngoko ke, nokuba sithi sidle ubomi,  nokuba sithi sife, singabeNkosi.
45_14_9_Kuba uKristu wafa, wabuya wavuka, wabuya wadla ubomi,  ngenxa yoku, ukuze aphathe ubukhosi kwabafileyo,  kwanakwabaphilileyo.
45_14_10_Ke wena, yini na ukuba umgwebe umzalwana wakho? Hi wena,  yini na ukuba umenze into engeyakonto umzalwana wakho? Kuba thina siya kuma sonke phambi kwesihlalo sokugweba sikaKristu.
45_14_11_Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndihleli nje mna, itsho iNkosi,  aya kugoba kum onke amadolo, Zidumise uThixo zonke iilwimi.
45_14_12_Ngoko ke elowo kuthi uya kuziphendulela kuThixo.
45_14_13_Masingabi sagwebana ngoko; kanye yithini ukugweba,  makungabekwa siwiso, nasikhubekiso, phambi komzalwana.
45_14_14_Ndiyazi, ndeyisekile, ndiseNkosini uYesu nje, ukuba akukho nto iyinqambi ngokwayo; kodwa ke kuye obalela into ekuthini iyinqambi, kulowo iyinqambi.
45_14_15_Ukuba ke umzalwana wakho wenziwa buhlungu ngenxa yokusuka udle, akusahambi ngokothando. Musa ukumtshabalalisa ngokudla kwakho, yena lowo uKristu wamfelayo.
45_14_16_Ngoko okulungileyo kwenu makunganyeliswa.
45_14_17_Kuba ubukumkani bukaThixo abukukudla nakusela; bubulungisa noxolo novuyo kuMoya oyiNgcwele.
45_14_18_Kuba omkhonzayo uKristu kwezo zinto, ukholekile kakuhle kuye uThixo; ucikidekile nakubo abantu.
45_14_19_Ngoko ke masisukele izinto zoxolo, nezinto zokwakhana.
45_14_20_Musa ukuthi, ngenxa yokudla, uwuchithe umsebenzi kaThixo.  Okunene, konke kuhlambulukile; kodwa ke kubi kuloo mntu uthi ngokudla akhubekise.
45_14_21_Kuhle ukuba ungadli nyama, ungaseli wayini, ungenzi nto angabetheka kuyo umzalwana wakho, akhubeke kuyo, aswele amandla okuzigcina.
45_14_22_Wena unokholo na? Hlala nalo emehlweni kaThixo. Unoyolo lowo ungazigwebiyo kuloo nto ayicikidileyo.
45_14_23_Ke lowo uthandabuzayo, ukuba uthe wadla, uselegwetyiwe,  kuba engadli ngokwaselukholweni; konke ke okungekokwaselukholweni kusisono.
45_15_1_Thina ke bomeleleyo sifanele ukukuthwala ukuswela amandla kwabangomeleleyo, singazikholisi.
45_15_2_Masithi sonke ngabanye simkholise ummelwane kokumlungeleyo,  ukuze akheke.
45_15_3_Kuba naye uKristu akazikholisanga; wathi, njengokuba kubhaliwe, Iingcikivo zabakungcikivayo zawa phezu kwam.
45_15_4_Kuba izinto zonke ezabhalwayo ngenxa engaphambili, zaye zibhalelwa okwethu ukufundiswa, ukuze sithi ngalo unyamezelo novuselelo lwezibhalo sibe nalo ithemba.
45_15_5_Wanga ke uThixo wonyamezelo novuselelo anganinika ukucinga nto-nye phakathi kwenu, ngokukaKristu Yesu;
45_15_6_ukuze nithi, nimxhelo mnye, engamlomo mnye uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
45_15_7_Kungoko ndithi, Yamkelanani, njengokuba naye uKristu wasamkelayo, ukuba kuzukiswe uThixo.
45_15_8_Ke kaloku ndithi, uYesu Kristu waba ngumlungiseleli wolwaluko ngenxa yenyaniso kaThixo, ukuze aqiniseke amadinga akhe koobawo;
45_15_9_zithi ke iintlanga zimzukise uThixo ngenxa yenceba yakhe,  njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ngenxa yoko, ndiya kukudumisa phakathi kweentlanga, Ndilibethele uhadi igama lakho.
45_15_10_Kananjalo athi, Yibani nemihlali, zintlanga, ndawonye nabantu bakhe.
45_15_11_Kananjalo, Yidumiseni iNkosi, nonke nina zintlanga,  Niyibonge, nonke nina bantu.
45_15_12_Kananjalo uIsaya uthi, Liya kubakho iHlumelo likaYese; Uya kuvela oya kulawula iintlanga; Ziya kuthembela kuye iintlanga.
45_15_13_Wanga ke uThixo wethemba elo anganizalisa ngalo lonke uvuyo noxolo ekukholweni, ukuze niphuphume ithemba ngamandla oMoya oyiNgcwele.
45_15_14_Ke kaloku, bazalwana bam, ndeyisekile nam ngokwam,  mayelana nani, kukuba nani ngokwenu nizele nazaliswa kukulunga,  nizele kuko konke ukwazi, ninako nokululekana.
45_15_15_Kodwa ke ndibhalile kuni ngobuganga obukhulu kwezinye iindawo, bazalwana, ngokophindayo ukunikhumbuza ngenxa yobabalo awandibabala ngalo uThixo,
45_15_16_ukuze ndibe ngobusela iintlanga kuYesu Kristu, osebenza ububingeleli ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo, ukuze ukusondezwa kweentlanga kwamkeleke kakuhle, kungcwalisiwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele.
45_15_17_Ngoko ndiyazingca, ndikuKristu Yesu, ngezinto ezilunge kuThixo.
45_15_18_Kuba mna andiyi kuba nabuganga bakuthetha nto ngezinto angazisebenzanga uKristu ngam, ukuze zimlulamele iintlanga,  ngelizwi ke nangomsebenzi, ngamandla emiqondiso nezimanga,
45_15_19_ngamandla oMoya kaThixo; endide ndathi, ndithabathela eYerusalem, ndajikelezisa, ndezisa kwelaseIliriko, ndazizalisa iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu.
45_15_20_Ndenjenjalo ke ukuzondelela ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo; kungekhona apho uKristu wakhankanywayo, ukuze ndingakhi phezu kwesiseko somnye;
45_15_21_kube njengokuba kubhaliwe, kwathiwa, Abo bangabikelwanga nto ngaye, baya kubona; Nabo bangevanga nto, baya kuqonda.
45_15_22_Kungoko ndabanjezelwayo nokubanjezelwa futhi, ukuba ndingafiki kuni.
45_15_23_Ngoku ke ndingasenandawo nje kule mimandla, ndineminyaka ke emininzi ndilangazelela ukuza kuni,
45_15_24_xa ndihambela kwelaseSpani, ndoza kuni; kuba ndithemba ukunibona xa ndicandayo kuni, nokuphelekelelwa nini ukuya khona, ukuba ndithe kuqala ndakha ndadlelana nani ngokwaneleyo.
45_15_25_Kalokunje ke ndisinga eYerusalem, ndisiya kulungiselela abangcwele.
45_15_26_Kuba kwakholeka kwabelaseMakedoni nabelaseAkaya, ukuba badlelane namahlwempu abo bangcwele baseYerusalem ngokuwupha okuthile.
45_15_27_Ndithi kwakholeka kubo, kuba kakade banetyala kubo. Kuba iintlanga, xa zadlelanayo nabo ngezinto zabo ezizezomoya,  zifanele ukubabusela ngezizezenyama.
45_15_28_Ngoko, ndakuba ndikufinyezile oko, ndasinqabisela kubo eso siqhamo, ndobuya ngani ukuya kwelaseSpani.
45_15_29_Ndiyazi ke ukuba ndothi, ndakuza kuni, ndize ndinentsikelelo ezalisekileyo yeendaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu.
45_15_30_Ke kaloku ndiyanivuselela, bazalwana, ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nangalo uthando loMoya, ukuba nizame kunye nam ekundithandazeleni kuye uThixo,
45_15_31_ukuze ndihlangulwe kwabaziingqola kwelakwaYuda, nokuze ulungiselelo lwam olusinga eYerusalem lube nokwamkeleka kakuhle kubo abangcwele,
45_15_32_ukuze ndize kuni ndinovuyo, ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  siphumzane.
45_15_33_UThixo ke woxolo makabe nani nonke. Amen.
45_16_1_Ke kaloku ndimyaleza kuni uFibhi, udade wethu,  ongumlungiseleli webandla eliseKenkreya;
45_16_2_ukuze nimamkele ngokwaseNkosini, ngokufanele abangcwele,  nimncede emcimbini asukuba enifunela wona; kuba naye ubengumongi wabaninzi, nowam lo.
45_16_3_Bulisani kuPrisila noAkwila, abasebenzisi bam abakuKristu Yesu;
45_16_4_bona bathi, ngenxa yobomi bam, bazibeka emgoqweni ezabo iintamo, ekungabuleli mna ndedwa kubo, ekubulela nawo onke amabandla azo iintlanga.
45_16_5_Bulisani nakwibandla elisendlwini yabo. Bulisani kuPeneto intanda yam, oyintlahlela yelaseAkaya kuKristu.
45_16_6_Bulisani kuMariya, yena wabulalekayo kakhulu ngenxa yenu.
45_16_7_Bulisani kuAndroniko noYuniya, imizalwane yam nabathinjwa ndawonye nam, bona badumileyo phakathi kwabapostile, kanjalo baba kuKristu ngaphambi kwam.
45_16_8_Bulisani kuAmpliya, intanda yam ngokwaseNkosini.
45_16_9_Bulisani ku-Urbhano, umncedisi wethu kuKristu, noStaki intanda yam.
45_16_10_Bulisani kuApele ocikidekileyo kuKristu. Bulisani kwabakwa-Aristobhulo.
45_16_11_Bulisani kuHerodiyo, umzalwane wam. Bulisani kwabakwaNarkiso abaseNkosini.
45_16_12_Bulisani kuTrifena noTrifosa, abo babulalekayo emsebenzini weNkosi. Bulisani kuPersi, intanda, yena wabulalekayo kakhulu emsebenzini weNkosi.
45_16_13_Bulisani kuRufo onyuliweyo waseNkosini, nonina, uma.
45_16_14_Bulisani kuAsinkrito, kuFilego, kuHerme, kuPatrobha,  kuHerma, nabazalwana abanabo.
45_16_15_Bulisani kuFilologo, noYuliya, kuNere, nodade wabo,  no-Olimpa, nabo bonke abo bangcwele banabo.
45_16_16_Bulisanani ngolwango olungcwele. Ayanibulisa amabandla kaKristu.
45_16_17_Ke kaloku ndiyaniyala, bazalwana, balumkeleni abo benza iimbambaniso nezikhubekiso, ezinxamnye nemfundiso enayifundayo nina, niphambuke kubo.
45_16_18_Kuba abanjalo abakhonzi yona iNkosi yethu uKristu,  bakhonza esabo isisu; baze, ngamazwi anencasa nalalanisayo,  balukuhle iintliziyo zabangazani nabubi.
45_16_19_Kuba ukululama kwenu kuye kwafika kubo bonke. Ndiyavuya ngoko ngani; ndinga ke ningaba ngabalumkileyo okunene kokulungileyo; kodwa nibe ngabangenabuqhinga kokubi.
45_16_20_UThixo ke woxolo uya kumtyumza uSathana kamsinya phantsi kweenyawo zenu. Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani.
45_16_21_Bayanibulisa ooTimoti, osebenza nam, noLukiyo, noYason,  noSosipatro, imizalwane yam.
45_16_22_Ndiyanibulisa ngokwaseNkosini, mna Tertiyo, uyibhalileyo le ncwadi.
45_16_23_Uyanibulisa uGayo, esilundwendwe lwakhe, mna nebandla liphela. Uyanibulisa uErasto, igosa lomzi, noKwarto umzalwana.
45_16_24_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani nonke.  Amen.
45_16_25_Ke kaloku, kuye onako ukunizimasa ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo, novakaliso lukaYesu Kristu, ngokokutyhilwa kwemfihlelo ebifihliwe kwasephakadeni, ebonakalalisiweyo ke ngoku,
45_16_26_eyaziswayo kanjalo ngezibhalo zabaprofeti ngokommiselo kaThixo ongunaphakade, ukuba kubekho ukulululamela ukholo, kuzo zonke iintlanga:
45_16_27_kuThixo olumke yedwa, ngaye uYesu Kristu, malubekho uzuko kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
46_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu, obizwe ngokuthanda kukaThixo, noSostenes umzalwana,
46_1_2_ubhalela ibandla likaThixo eliseKorinte, abangcwaliselwe kuKristu Yesu, ababizwe ukuba babe ngcwele, kunye nabo bonke abalinqulayo igama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ezindaweni zonke,  ezabo kwanezethu:
46_1_3_uthi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
46_1_4_Ndihlala ndibulela kuye uThixo wam ngani, ngenxa yobabalo lukaThixo, awanibabala ngalo nikuKristu Yesu;
46_1_5_kuba natyetyiswa kuye ngezinto zonke, ngokuthetha konke,  nangokwazi konke;
46_1_6_njengokuba ubungqina bukaKristu baqiniswayo kuni;
46_1_7_ngokokude ningasileli nakwesinye isipho enisibabalweyo;  nilinde kakhulu ukutyhileka kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
46_1_8_oya kuniqinisa nokuniqinisa ase ekupheleni, ukuze ningabi nakumangaleleka ngemini yeNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
46_1_9_Uthembekile uThixo, enabizelwa nguye ebudlelaneni boNyana wakhe, uYesu Kristu iNkosi yethu.
46_1_10_Ke kaloku, ndiyaniyala, bazalwana, ngalo igama leNkosi yethu, uYesu Kristu, ukuba nithethe nto-nye nonke, nokuba kungabikho zahlukahlukano kuni; ke nibe ngabalungisiweyo,  nigqibelele ngqiqweni-nye, nasicamangweni sinye.
46_1_11_Kuba ndazisiwe ngani, bazalwana bam, ngabakuloKlowe, ukuba kukho iimpikiswano phakathi kwenu.
46_1_12_Ukutsho ke ndithi kuthiwa, ulowo kuni uthi, Mna ndingokaPawulos; omnye ke athi, Mna ndingoka-Apolo; omnye ke athi, Mna ndingokaKefas; omnye ke athi, Mna ndingokaKristu.
46_1_13_Wahlukahlukene na uKristu? Kwabethelelwa uPawulos yini na emnqamlezweni ngenxa yenu? Nabhaptizelwa egameni likaPawulos,  kusini na?
46_1_14_Ndiyabulela kuThixo, ukuba ndingabhaptizanga namnye kuni,  ingenguKrispo noGayo;
46_1_15_ukuze kungabikho mntu uthi, ndabhaptizela egameni lam.
46_1_16_Ndabhaptiza ke nendlu kaStefana; ngaphandle kwabo, andazi ukuba ndabhaptiza wumbi.
46_1_17_Kuba uKristu akandithumanga kubhaptiza; wandithuma ukushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, kungabi ngabulumko bakuthetha, ukuze umnqamlezo kaKristu ungalanjathiswa.
46_1_18_Kuba ilizwi lomnqamlezo libubudenge okunene kwabatshabalalayo; kodwa ke kwabasindiswayo, thina aba,  lingamandla kaThixo.
46_1_19_Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndiya kubutshabalalisa ubulumko bezilumko, Ingqondo yeengqondi ndiyitshitshise.
46_1_20_Siphi na ke isilumko? Uphi na ke umbhali? Uphi na ke umphiki weli phakade? UThixo akabenzanga baba bubudenge na ubulumko beli hlabathi?
46_1_21_Ekubeni ke kuthe, ebulumkweni bukaThixo, ihlabathi alamazi uThixo ngobulumko balo, kwakholeka kuThixo ukusindisa abo bakholwayo, ngabo ubudenge bokuvakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo.
46_1_22_Ekubeni ke amaYuda ecela umqondiso, amaGrike efuna ubulumko, thina okwethu sivakalisa uKristu,
46_1_23_ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni; isikhubekiso ke eso kumaYuda,  ubudenge kumaGrike;
46_1_24_ke kwabo babiziweyo, amaYuda kwanamaGrike, sivakalisa uKristu ongamandla kaThixo, nobulumko bukaThixo.
46_1_25_Ngokuba into kaThixo ebubudenge ilumkile kunabantu, nento kaThixo engenamandla yomelele kunabantu.
46_1_26_Kuba luboneni ubizo lwenu, bazalwana, ukuba azizininzi izilumko ngokwenyama, ababaninzi abanamandla, akamaninzi amanene.
46_1_27_UThixo usuke wanyula izinto ezibubudenge zehlabathi, ukuze azidanise izilumko; nezinto ezingenamandla zehlabathi usuke uThixo wazinyula, ukuze azidanise izinto ezomeleleyo;
46_1_28_nezinto zehlabathi ezingenabuntu, nezingento yanto,  wazinyula uThixo, nezingathi azikho, ukuze aziphuthise izinto ezikhoyo;
46_1_29_ukuze kungaqhayisi namnye umntu emehlweni akhe.
46_1_30_Ke niphuma kuye, nina bakuKristu Yesu, owathi ngenxa yethu waba bubulumko obuvela kuThixo, nobulungisa kwanobungcwalisa nentlawulelo;
46_1_31_ukuze, njengoko kubhaliweyo, Oqhayisayo aqhayise ngeNkosi.
46_2_1_Mna ke, ndakuba ndizile kuni, bazalwana, andizanga ngabugcisa bakuthetha nabulumko, ndinazisa ubungqina bukaThixo.
46_2_2_Kuba ndagqiba kwelokuba ndingazi nto phakathi kwenu,  ingenguYesu Kristu, naye ke ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni.
46_2_3_Mna kuni ndafika ndaba ngothambileyo, onokoyika, onokugubha okukhulu.
46_2_4_Nokuthetha kwam, nokuvakalisa kwam uKristu kube kungengamazwi oyisa ngabulumko babantu; bekungokuqondakalisa koMoya nokwamandla,
46_2_5_ukuze ukholo lwenu lungabi sebulumkweni babantu, lube semandleni kaThixo.
46_2_6_Ke sithetha ubulumko phakathi kwabagqibeleleyo, ubulumko ke obungebubo obeli phakade, nobabaphathi beli phakade ababhangayo.
46_2_7_Sithetha ubulumko bukaThixo obusemfihlekweni, obo ke bufihlakeleyo, awathi uThixo ngenxa engaphambili, kwangaphambi kwawo amaphakade, wabumisela uzuko lwethu;
46_2_8_ekungabangakho namnye wabaphathi beli phakade ubaziyo (kuba,  ukuba babebazi, ngebengayibethelelanga emnqamlezweni iNkosi yozuko),
46_2_9_njengoko ke kubhaliweyo, kwathiwa, Izinto ezingabonwanga liso, nezingaviwanga ndlebe, Nezingathanga qatha entliziyweni yomntu, Zizo uThixo awazilungisela abo bamthandayo.
46_2_10_UThixo wazityhila kuthi ke ngoMoya wakhe; kuba uMoya uphengulula zonke izinto, neenzulu zikaThixo.
46_2_11_Kuba nguwuphi na kubantu ozaziyo izinto zomntu, ingenguwo umoya womntu okuye? Ngokunjalo nezinto zikaThixo akukho namnye uzaziyo, ingenguye uMoya kaThixo.
46_2_12_Ke thina asamkelanga moya wehlabathi; samkele uMoya ophuma kuye uThixo, ukuze sizazi izinto esazibabalwa nguThixo;
46_2_13_esizithethayo nokuzithetha, kungengamazwi anokufundiswa bubulumko babantu, kungawo anokufundiswa nguMoya oyiNgcwele:  izinto ezizezomoya sizilungelelanisa namazwi la angawomoya.
46_2_14_Owemvelo ke umntu akazamkeli izinto zoMoya kaThixo; kuba zibubudenge kuye; kanjalo akanakuzazi, ngokuba ziphicothwa ngokoMoya.
46_2_15_Ke ongowoMoya okunene uphicotha zonke izinto, kodwa yena ngokwakhe akaphicothwa mntu.
46_2_16_Kuba ngubani na oyaziyo ingqiqo yeNkosi, oya kuthi ayifundise? Thina ke sinengqiqo kaKristu.
46_3_1_Nam ke, bazalwana, bendingenakuthetha kuni njengakwaboMoya;  bendinokuthetha njengakwabenyama, njengakwabaziintsana kuKristu.
46_3_2_Ndaniseza amasi, andaninika kudla kuqinileyo; kuba nibe ningekabi nakomelela, unangoku anikabi nako.
46_3_3_Kuba nisengabenyama; oku nje kukhoyo phakathi kwenu umona,  neenkani, neembambaniso, aningabenyama na? Anihambi ngokwabantu na?
46_3_4_Kuba xa uthile athi, Mna ndingokaPawulos, athi wumbi, Mna ndingoka-Apolo, aningabenyama na ke?
46_3_5_Ungubani na yena uPawulos? engubani na yena uApolo?  Ingabalungiseleli nje kuphela, enakholwa ngabo, njengokuba iNkosi yamnikayo ulowo nalowo.
46_3_6_Mna ndatyala, uApolo wankcenkcesha, ke nguThixo owahlumisayo.
46_3_7_Ngoko ke lowo utyalayo akalutho, nalowo unkcenkceshayo akalutho; oyinto nguThixo lo uhlumisayo.
46_3_8_Lowo utyalayo ke, nalowo unkcenkceshayo, banto-nye; kodwa elowo uya kwamkela owakhe umvuzo ngokukokwakhe ukubulaleka.
46_3_9_Kuba thina singabasebenzisi bakaThixo; nina niyintsimi kaThixo, nisisakhiwo sikaThixo.
46_3_10_Ngokobabalo lukaThixo endababalwa ngalo, ndithi, ngokomakhi osisilumko, ndibeke ilitye lesiseko, athi ke omnye akhe phezu kwalo; ke elowo makakhangele ukuba uthini na ukwakha kwakhe phezu kwalo.
46_3_11_Kuba akukho namnye unako ukubeka litye limbi lesiseko,  nxamnye nelo libekwe kade, linguYesu onguKristu.
46_3_12_Ukuba ke umntu ukhe wakha phezu kweli litye lesiseko igolide, isilivere, amatye anqabileyo, imithi, ingca, iindiza,
46_3_13_umsebenzi walowo nalowo wobonakalaliswa; kuba loo mini iya kuwazisa, ngokuba iya kuvela inomlilo; nomsebenzi walowo nalowo, umlilo uya kuwucikida ubunjani bawo.
46_3_14_Ukuba umsebenzi awawakhayo umntu phezu kwalo, uthe wahlala uhleli, wowamkela umvuzo.
46_3_15_Ukuba umsebenzi womntu uthe watshiswa, wolahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe; ke yena okwakhe wosindiswa, kodwa ke ange ucande emlilweni.
46_3_16_Anazi na ukuba niyitempile kaThixo? Anazi na ukuba uMoya kaThixo umi ngaphakathi kwenu?
46_3_17_Ukuba umntu uyayonakalisa itempile kaThixo, uThixo womonakalisa lowo; kuba itempile kaThixo ingcwele; ninjalo ke.
46_3_18_Makungabikho namnye uzikhohlisayo. Ukuba umntu uba usisilumko phakathi kwenu kweli phakade, makabe sisidenge,  ukuze abe sisilumko.
46_3_19_Kuba ubulumko beli hlabathi bubudenge kuye uThixo; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Yena uyazibambisa izilumko kubuqhetseba bazo;
46_3_20_kwathiwa kananjalo, INkosi iyazazi izicamango zezilumko,  ukuba azinto.
46_3_21_Ngoko ke makungabikho namnye uqhayisa ngabantu: kuba izinto zonke zezenu;
46_3_22_nokuba nguPawulos, nokuba nguApolo, nokuba nguKefas, nokuba lihlabathi, nokuba bubomi, nokuba kukufa, nokuba zizinto ezingeneyo, nokuba zezizayo: zonke zezenu.
46_3_23_Nina ke ningabakaKristu, uKristu ke ngokaThixo.
46_4_1_Makenjenjalo ke umntu ukucinga ngathi, athi singabakhonzi bakaKristu, athi singamagosa eemfihlelo zikaThixo.
46_4_2_Ke kaloku ke, kufuneka kuwo amagosa, ukuba ulowo kuwo afumaneke ethembekile.
46_4_3_Kum ke yeyona nto incinanana, ukuba ndincinwe nini, nayimini yamatyala yabantu; ke andizincini nam ngokwam,
46_4_4_kuba andizazeleli, nto; noko andigwetyelwe, koko;  ondincinayo ke yiNkosi.
46_4_5_Ngoko ke, musani ukugweba nto phambi kwelona xesha, ide ifike iNkosi, eya kuthi izikhanyise nokuzikhanyisa izinto ezifihlakeleyo zobumnyama, iwabonakalalise amacebo entliziyo;  andule ke ulowo nalowo abe nodumo oluvela kuThixo.
46_4_6_Ezi zinto ke, bazalwana, ndizilinganisele ngam noApolo,  ngenxa yenu; ukuze nifunde kuthi aba, ukuba ningazicingeli ngaphezu koko kubhaliweyo, ukuze kungabikho namnye uzikhukhumalisa ngakomnye ngenxa yomnye.
46_4_7_Kuba ngubani na okubalulayo kwabanye? Yintoni na ke onayo ongayamkeliswanga? Phofu ke, ukuba wamkelisiwe, uqhayiselani na, ngathi akwamkeliswanga?
46_4_8_Senihluthi, senizizityebi, nalawula ningenathi; akwaba ke kambe beningabalawuli, ukuze nathi silawule kunye nani.
46_4_9_Kuba ngathi mna, uThixo thina bapostile usivelise mva, sanga singabamiselwe ukufa; kuba sanekwe senziwa intlekisa kulo ihlabathi, nakwizithunywa zezulu, nakubantu.
46_4_10_Thina siziziyatha ngenxa kaKristu, ke nina niziingqondi kuKristu; thina siswele amandla, ke nina nomelele; nina nizukile, ke thina siswele imbeko.
46_4_11_Kude kwaleli lixa langoku silamba, sinxanwa, sihamba ze,  sintlithwa, singenasikhundla, sibulaleka,
46_4_12_sisebenza ngezethu izandla; sithi, sitshabhiswa, sibe sisikelela; sithi sitshutshiwa, sibe sinyamezela;
46_4_13_sithi sinyeliswa, sibe siyala; sixeliswa inkunkuma yehlabathi, inkuthu yezinto zonke, kude kube ngoku.
46_4_14_Ezo nto andizibhaleli ukuba nidane; ndiyaniluleka njengabantwana bam abathandekayo.
46_4_15_Kuba ningafanelana ninabakhaphi bemawaka alishumi kuKristu,  ababaninzi bona ooyihlo; kuba kuKristu Yesu nizelwe ndim lo,  ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo.
46_4_16_Ndiyaniyala ngoko, yibani ngabaxelisa mna.
46_4_17_Ngenxa yoko ndinithumele uTimoti, ongumntwana wam oyintanda, othembekileyo, waseNkosini, oya kunikhumbuza iindlela zam ezikuKristu, njengoko ndifundisayo ezindaweni zonke, kuwo onke amabandla.
46_4_18_Ke kaloku inxenye ithe yakhukhumala, ngathi andiyi kuza kuni.
46_4_19_Ndiya kuza ke kuni kamsinya, ukuba iNkosi ithe yavuma,  ukuze ndinganeli kukwazi ukuthetha kwabakhukhumeleyo, ndazi amandla abo.
46_4_20_Kuba ubukumkani bukaThixo abusekuthetheni, busemandleni.
46_4_21_Nithanda kuphi na, kuko ukuza kuni ndinoswazi, kuko ukuza ndinothando, nomoya wobulali?
46_5_1_Kwandile ukuvakala ukuba kukho umbulo phakathi kwenu;  ngumbulo ke lowo ongazanga ukhankanywe naphakathi kweentlanga,  owokuba uthile abe nomfazi kayise.
46_5_2_Nibe ke nikhukhumele; ningabi kanye nikhedamile, ukuze anyothulwe phakathi kwenu lowo wenze loo ntlondi.
46_5_3_Kuba mna, ndingekho nje okunene ngesiqu, ndikho ngomoya;  sendide ndamgweba oyenzileyo loo nto, njengokungathi ndikho;
46_5_4_ndathi, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu (nakubon ukuba nihlanganisene nomoya wam, kunye nawo amandla eNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu),
46_5_5_makanikelwe onjalo kuSathana, ukuba inyama itshatyalaliswe,  ukuze wona umoya usindiswe ngomhla weNkosi uYesu.
46_5_6_Iqhayiya lenu alilihle! Anazi na ukuba igwele elincinane libilisa intlama iphela?
46_5_7_Likhupheni ngoko kuthi tu igwele elidala, ukuze nibe yintlama entsha, ekubeni ningabangenagwele. Kuba nathi siyibingelelwe neyethu ipasika, enguKristu.
46_5_8_Ngoko ke ukwenza umthendeleko, masingawenzi sinegwele elidala, negwele lobubi, nelokungendawo; masiwenze sinezonka ezingenagwele, ezingenasibhidi, ezinenyaniso.
46_5_9_Ndanibhalela encwadini apho ukuthi, maningazidibanisi nabenza umbulo;
46_5_10_kodwa ningasenizahlula kanye kwabeli hlabathi abenza umbulo, nakumabawa, nabaphangi, nabakhonzi bezithixo; okanye beniya kumelwa kukuphuma ehlabathini.
46_5_11_Kungoku ke, ndinibhalela ukuba maningazidibanisi nosukuba enegama lokuba ngumzalwana, ukanti wenza umbulo, nokuba ulibawa, nokuba ungumkhonzi wezithixo, nokuba ungumtshabhisi,  nokuba ulinxila, nokuba ungumphangi; ningakhe nidle nokudla nonjalo.
46_5_12_Ndinamsebenzi mni na ukuba ndigwebe nabangaphandle?  Anigwebi abangaphakathi bodwa, yini na, nina?
46_5_13_Ke abangaphandle bagwetywa nguThixo. Ize nimnyothule kuni nina lowo ungendawo.
46_6_1_Kukho na umntu kuni, enendawo ngakomnye, onobuganga bokummangalela phambi kwabangemalungisa, angammangaleli phambi kwabangcwele?
46_6_2_Anazi na, ukuba abangcwele aba baya kuligweba ihlabathi?  Ukuba ke ihlabathi ligwetywa phambi kwenu, anikufanele na ukuwathetha awona mancinanana amatyala?
46_6_3_Anazi na, ukuba siya kugweba izithunywa zezulu? Kobeka phi na ke kwizinto zobu bomi?
46_6_4_Xa sukuba ke ngoko nisiya ematyaleni ngezinto zobu bomi,  nimisa abo bangento kulo ibandla, ukuba kugwebe bona na?
46_6_5_Nditsho ukuze nidane. Kude akwabakho noko sisinye na isilumko phakathi kwenu, esingaba nako ukulamla phakathi kwabo abazalwana?
46_6_6_Usuka umzalwana amangalelane nomzalwana, athi noko akwenze phambi kwabangakholiweyo.
46_6_7_Seninciphile ke kanye ngokokuthi nimangalelane. Yini na ukuba ningathi kanye nivume ukoniwa? Yini na ukuba ningathi kanye nivume ukulunyukiswa?
46_6_8_Nisuka nina none abanye, nilumkise, nako oko nibe nikwenza kubazalwana.
46_6_9_Anazi na, ukuba abangemalungisa abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo? Musani ukulahlekiswa; abenza umbulo,  nabakhonzi bezithixo, nabakrexezi, nezifebe, namadoda alalanayo,
46_6_10_namasela, namabawa, namanxila, nabatshabhisi, nabaphangi,  abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo.
46_6_11_Naye ninjalo ke inxenye yenu; kuloko nahlanjululwayo,  kuloko nangcwaliswayo, kuloko nagwetyelwayo egameni leNkosi uYesu, nangoMoya kaThixo wethu.
46_6_12_Zonke izinto zivumelekile kum, noko azindilungele zonke.  Zonke izinto zivumelekile kum, noko asindim oya kubekwa phantsi kwagunya lelayiphi;
46_6_13_izidlo zezesisu, nesisu sesezidlo; kodwa uThixo uya kubhangisa kokubini, sona nazo. Ke wona umzimba asingowombulo,  ngoweNkosi; nayo iNkosi yeyomzimba.
46_6_14_UThixo ke wayivusa iNkosi leyo; uya kusivusa nathi ngamandla akhe.
46_6_15_Anazi na ukuba imizimba yenu ngamalungu kaKristu? Ndiya kuthi na ke, ndiwathabathe amalungu kaKristu lowo, ndiwenze amalungu ehenyukazi? Nakanye!
46_6_16_Anazi na, ukuba onamathele kulo ihenyukazi, umzimba mnye nalo? Kuba kuthiwa, Abo babini boba nyama-nye.
46_6_17_Ke onamathele eNkosini, umoya mnye nayo.
46_6_18_Wubalekeni umbulo. Zonke izono athe umntu wazenza,  zingaphandle komzimba; ke lowo wenza umbulo, wona owakhe umzimba.
46_6_19_Anazi na, ukuba umzimba wenu uyitempile yoMoya oyiNgcwele ongaphakathi kwenu, eninaye evela kuThixo; nokuba ke aningabenu?
46_6_20_Kuba nathengwa ngexabiso. Mzukiseni ke uThixo ngomzimba wenu nangomoya wenu, izinto ezizezikaThixo ezo.
46_7_1_Ke kaloku, ngokubhekisele kwiindawo enandibhalela ngazo,  ndithi, Kumlungele umntu ukuba angamchukumisi umntu oyinkazana.
46_7_2_Kodwa ke, ngenxa yoomibulo, elowo makabe nowakhe umfazi,  athi elowo abe neyakhe indoda.
46_7_3_Indoda mayimenzele okumfaneleyo umfazi wayo; enjenjalo ke nomfazi endodeni yakhe.
46_7_4_Umfazi akanagunya kowakhe umzimba, yindoda enalo;  kwangokunjalo ke, nendoda ayinagunya kowayo umzimba, ngumfazi onalo.
46_7_5_Musani ukwala ukuhlangana, ningathanga nibe nivumelene okomzuzwana, ukuze ke nibe nethuba lokuzila ukudla nelokuthandaza; nibuye nihlangane ndawonye, ukuze anganihendi uSathana ngenxa yentswela-kuzeyisa kwenu.
46_7_6_Ndisitsho nje, ndiyabonisa; anidithumi mntu.
46_7_7_Kuba ndinga bonke abantu bangaba njengam nje; kodwa ke elowo unesakhe isipho, asibabalwe nguThixo; omnye uba naso ngokunje,  omnye abe naso ngokunjeya.
46_7_8_Ndithi ke kwabangazekanga nabangendanga, nakubahlolokazi,  kubalungele ukuba bathe bahlala njengam nje.
46_7_9_Kodwa ke, ukuba abanakuzeyisa, mabazeke, mabende, kuba kukhona kulungileyo ukuba kuzekwe, kwendiwe, kunokutshiseka.
46_7_10_Ke kaloku abazekileyo nabendileyo ndiyabathethela, phofu ingendim, iyiNkosi; ndithi, Umfazi makangahlukani nendoda
46_7_11_(ke ukuba uthe wahlukana nayo, makahlale angendi, okanye makaxolelaniswe nendoda yakhe); indoda mayingamali umfazi wayo.
46_7_12_Ke kaloku kwabanye ndithi mna, akutsho iNkosi, Ukuba kukho mzalwana uthile unomfazi ongakholiweyo, aze umfazi lowo athande ukuhlala naye, makangamali.
46_7_13_Nomfazi onendoda engakholiweyo, ize yona ithande ukuhlala naye, makangayali.
46_7_14_Kuba indoda leyo ingakholiweyo ingcwalisiwe nguye umfazi,  nomfazi lowo ungakholiweyo ungcwalisiwe yiyo indoda; okanye abantwana benu ngebeba baziinqambi; kungoku ke bangcwele.
46_7_15_Kodwa ke ukuba lowo ungakholiweyo uyahluka, makahluke;  umzalwana nokuba ngudade akabotshelelwe, xa kunjalo; ke uThixo usibizele eluxolweni.
46_7_16_Kuba, wazi ngani na, mfazi, ukuba woyisindisa indoda yakho?  Wazi ngani na, ndoda, ukuba womsindisa umfazi wakho?
46_7_17_Ke, njengoko uThixo wamabelayo ulowo, njengoko iNkosi imbizileyo ulowo, makahambe ngokunjalo. Ndimisa ngokunjalo ke kuwo onke amabandla.
46_7_18_Kukho mntu wabizwa engowalukileyo na? Makangazenzi ongalukileyo. Kukho mntu wabizwa engalukanga na? Makangaluki.
46_7_19_Ukwaluka oku akunto, nokungaluki oku akunto; okuyinto kukubamba imithetho kaThixo.
46_7_20_Elowo makahlale elubizweni abizwe ekulo.
46_7_21_Wabizwa ulikhoboka na? Ungakhathali koko; nokuba ke unokukhululeka, nyula kanye oko.
46_7_22_Ukuba lowo wabizwayo waba seNkosini elikhoboka,  ungumkhululwa weNkosi; ngokunjalo nalowo wabizwayo engokhululekileyo, ulikhoboka likaKristu.
46_7_23_Nathengwa ngexabiso; musani ukuba ngamakhoboka abantu.
46_7_24_Bazalwana, elowo ekubizweni awabizwa ekuko, makahlale kuko ekuThixo.
46_7_25_Ke kaloku, ngazo iintombi andinammiselo weNkosi; ndibona oku mna, njengowenzelwe inceba yiNkosi ukuba athembeke.
46_7_26_Ndiba ngoko, kulungile oku ngenxa yengxakeko engeneyo,  kulungile emntwini ukuthi aselehlala njengoko anjalo.
46_7_27_Ubotshelelwe na emfazini? Musa ukufuna ukukhululwa kuye.  Ukhululekile na emfazini? Musa ukufuna umfazi.
46_7_28_Kodwa ke ukuba uthe wazeka, akonanga; nokuba intombi ithe yenda, ayonanga. Ke abanjalo boba nembandezelo enyameni. Ke mna, ngokwenjenje, ndiconga nina.
46_7_29_Nditsho ke, bazalwana, ukuthi, ixesha lifinyele, ukuze kwelisaseleyo bathi nabo banabafazi, babe njengabangenabo;
46_7_30_bathi abalilayo, babe njengabangaliliyo; bathi abavuyayo,  babe njengabangavuyiyo; bathi abathengayo, babe njengabangenanto;
46_7_31_bathi abasebenzayo ngeli hlabathi, babe njengabangalixhamliyo; kuba ukumila kweli hlabathi kuyadlula.
46_7_32_Ndithanda ukuba ningabi naxhala. Ongazekileyo uxhalela izinto zeNkosi, ukuba angathini na ukuyikholisa iNkosi.
46_7_33_Ozekileyo ke uxhalela izinto zehlabathi, ukuba angathini na ukumkholisa umkakhe.
46_7_34_Umfazi nentombi akufani. Ongendileyo uxhalela izinto zeNkosi, ukuze abe ngcwele ngomzimba nangomoya; owendileyo ke uxhalela izinto zehlabathi, ukuba angathini na ukuyikholisa indoda yakhe.
46_7_35_Oku ke ndikuthetha ndisingisele kokunilungeleyo,  ndingenzeli kunirhintyela; ndikuthethela ukuba nizibeke,  nihlale nihleli kakuhle eNkosini, ningakruthakrutheki.
46_7_36_Kodwa ke ukuba umntu uba uhlaza intombi yakhe, xa ithe yegqitha entlahleni yayo, emelwe kukwenjenjalo, makenze akuthandayo; akoni; makuzekwe.
46_7_37_Noko ke omiyo eqinile entliziyweni, engaxakwe nto, enegunya ke lokwenza ngokuthanda kwakhe, kananjalo egqibile entliziyweni yakhe kwelokuba ayigcine intombi yakhe, uyatyapha ukwenjenjalo.
46_7_38_Ngoko ke lowo wendisayo uyatyapha, kodwa ke lowo ungendisiyo nguyena ukholisayo.
46_7_39_Umfazi ubotshiwe ngumthetho ngalo lonke ixesha isaphilileyo indoda yakhe; ke ukuba indoda yakhe ithe yafa, ukhululekile,  angendiselwa kwayithandayo, kodwa ke ngokwaseNkosini.
46_7_40_Noko ke unoyolo ngakumbi, ukuba uthe wahlala enjengoko anjalo, ngokwam mna ukubona; ndiba ke ndinaye nam uMoya kaThixo.
46_8_1_Ke kaloku, ngeendawo zamadini enziwa kwizithixo, ndithi,  Siyazi ukuba sinokwazi sonke. Ukwazi oku kuyakhukhumalisa, ke lona uthando luyakha.
46_8_2_Ukuba ke umntu uba wazi nto, akakazi nento ngoko amelwe kukwazi ngako.
46_8_3_Ukuba ke umntu uyamthanda uThixo, lowo uyaziwa nguye.
46_8_4_Ngako ke ukudliwa kwamadini enziwa kwizithixo, siyazi ukuba akukho nto isisithixo ehlabathini; siyazi ukuba mnye kwaphela uThixo, akukho wumbi.
46_8_5_Kuba kambe, nokuba kukho ekuthiwa bangoothixo, nokuba kusezulwini, nokuba kuphezu komhlaba (kwanjengokuba kukho oothixo abaninzi, neenkosi ezininzi),
46_8_6_kuthi thina mnye uThixo, uYise, eziphuma kuye izinto zonke;  nathi sikholo yena. Inye iNkosi, uYesu Kristu, ezingayo zonke izinto; nathi singaye.
46_8_7_Ke ukwazi oko akubantwini bonke. Inxenye ke ithi,  isenesazela ngesithixo unangoku, idle ngokudliwa kwedini elenziwe kwisithixo, size isazela sabo, siswele amandla nje,  sidyobheke.
46_8_8_Ukudla akusithandisi kuye uThixo; kuba nokuba sithe sadla,  asigqithe nganto; nokuba asithanga sidle, asisilele nganto.
46_8_9_Lumkani ke, hleze elo gunya lenu libe sisiwiso kwabaswele amandla.
46_8_10_Kuba xa athe ubani wakubona, wena ungonokwazi, uhleli esithebeni etempileni yezithixo, asisayi kuthi na isazela sakhe, eswele amandla nje, somelezelwe ukudla amadini enzelwe izithixo?
46_8_11_Aze ngokwazi kwakho oko atshabalale umzalwana oswele amandla, awathi uKristu wamfela.
46_8_12_Nisenjenjalonje ke ukona kubo abazalwana, nisidubule nje isazela sabo esiswele amandla, nona kuKristu.
46_8_13_Ngenxa yoko ndithi, Ukuba ukudla kuyamkhubekisa umzalwana wam, andisayi kudla nyama naphakade, ukuze ndingamkhubekisi umzalwana wam.
46_9_1_Andingumpostile na? Andingokhululekileyo na? Andimbonanga na uYesu Kristu, iNkosi yethu? Aninguwo na nina umsebenzi wam eNkosini?
46_9_2_Ukuba andimpostile kwabanye, kuni nina ndinguye; kuba itywina lokuqinisa obam ubupostile linini aba baseNkosini.
46_9_3_Okwam ukuziphendulela kwabandincinayo kuko oku.
46_9_4_Asinagunya na lokudla nokusela?
46_9_5_Asinagunya na, njengabanye abapostile, nabazalwana beNkosi,  noKefas, ukuba siphelekwe ngabafazi bethu bengamakholwa?
46_9_6_Sithi sedwa noBharnabhas lo na, abangenagunya lokuba bangasebenzi?
46_9_7_Ngubani na okha aphume umkhosi ngeyakhe indleko? Ngubani na otyala isidiliya, aze angadli siqhamo saso? Khona ngubani na owalusa umhlambi, aze angawadli amasi omhlambi lowo?
46_9_8_Ndizithetha ngokomntu yini na ezo zinto? Awuthethi kwaezo zinto nawo na umthetho?
46_9_9_Emthethweni kaMoses kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Uze ungayibophi umlomo inkomo ibhula. Ziinkomo yini na into ayikhathaleleyo uThixo?
46_9_10_Kanene akatsho ngenxa yethu na? Kakade kwabhalwa ngenxa yethu; ngokuba lowo ulimayo ufanele ukulima ethembile; lowo ubhulayo ufanele ukubhula enethemba lokuyaba loo nto athembe yona.
46_9_11_Ukuba ke thina sanihlwayelela izinto ezizezoMoya, yinto enkulu na, ukuba siya kuvuna izinto zenu ezizezenyama?
46_9_12_Ukuba abanye babelana ngokwenza ngeli gunya kuni,  asikukhona singenjenjalo na thina ngakumbi? Asilisebenzisanga ke elo gunya; sisuka sithwale izinto zonke, ukuze singazibambezeli ngani iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu.
46_9_13_Anazi na ukuba abo bazisebenzayo izinto ezingcwele badla okwetempile, abo bahlala behleli esibingelelweni bahlulelana nesibingelelo eso?
46_9_14_Ngokunjalo neNkosi le yabamisela abazazisayo iindaba ezilungileyo, ukuba baphile ngeendaba ezilungileyo ezi.
46_9_15_Ke mna andiphathanga nanye kwezo zinto. Ezi ndawo andizibhaleli ukuze kwenjiwe njalo kum; kuba bekungandilungelayo kanye ukuba ndife, kunokuba ubani alilambathise iqhayiya lam.
46_9_16_Kuba xa ndithi ndizishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo,  andinaqhayiya; kuba ndimelwe kukuzishumayela. Yeha ke mna,  ukuba ndisuka ndingazishumayeli iindaba ezilungileyo!
46_9_17_Kuba xa ndikwenzayo oko ndinokuzithandela, ndoba ndinomvuzo; ke xa ndikwenza ndingenakuzithandela, ndoba ndingophathiswe ubugosa nje.
46_9_18_Uyintoni na ke ngoko umvuzo wam? Ukukuthi, ndakuzishumayela iindaba ezilungileyo, ndizenze zingabi nandleko iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, ukuba ndingalisebenzisi igunya lam ezindabeni ezilungileyo ezi.
46_9_19_Kuba ndikhululekile nje kubo bonke, ndizikhonzisile kubo bonke, ukuze ndibazuze abona baninzi.
46_9_20_KumaYuda ndaba njengomYuda, ukuze ndiwazuze amaYuda; kwabo baphantsi komthetho ndaba njengophantsi komthetho, ukuze ndibazuze abaphantsi komthetho;
46_9_21_kwabo bangenamthetho, ndaba njengongenamthetho (ndingenguye phofu ongenamthetho kuThixo, ndingosemthethweni kuKristu),  ukuze ndibazuze abangenamthetho;
46_9_22_kwabo bangenamandla, ndaba njengongenamandla, ukuze ndibazuze abangenamandla; kubo bonke ndesuka ndaba ziinto zonke, ukuze ngeendlela zonke ndisindise inxenye.
46_9_23_Oko ke ndakwenza ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo, ukuze ndibe lidlelane nabo ngazo.
46_9_24_Anazi na, ukuba abo babalekayo elugqatsweni, babaleka bonke okunene, kodwa ke mnye owamkelayo umvuzo? Balekani ngokunjalo ke, ukuze nizuze.
46_9_25_Bonke ke abantu abazamayo, baba ziingcathu ezintweni zonke.  Bona abo ke okunene benzela ukuze bazuze isithsaba esinokonakala; kodwa thina, esingenakonakala.
46_9_26_Mna ke ngoko ndenjenjalo ukubaleka, ndingangi andiqondi;  ndenjenjalo ukugalela ngenqindi, ndingangi ndibetha umoya;
46_9_27_ndisuka ndiwuqobe umzimba wam, ndiwuxinzelele phantsi,  hleze ndithi, ndakuba ndizivakalisile iindaba ezilungileyo kwabanye, ndibe mna ndingumlahlelwa phandle.
46_10_1_Ke andithandi ukuba ningazi, bazalwana, ukuba oobawo babephantsi kwalo ilifu bonke; balucanda ulwandle bonke;
46_10_2_babhaptizelwa bonke kuye uMoses efini elo naselwandle;
46_10_3_badla bonke oko kudla kunye kukokomoya;
46_10_4_basela bonke olo luselo lunye lulolomoya (kuba babesela kwiliwa elilelomoya elibe libalandela, iliwa elo ke lalinguye uKristu).
46_10_5_Kanti noko uThixo akakholiswanga ngabona baninzi; kuba bathiwa waca entlango apho.
46_10_6_Ezo zinto ke zabe ziyimizekelo kuthi, ukuze singabi ngabakhanuki bezinto ezimbi, njengokuba bakhanukayo bona abo.
46_10_7_Kanjalo musani ukuba ngababusi bezithixo, njengenxenye yabo; njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Abantu bahlala phantsi ukuba badle, basele, baza besuka bema ukuba badlale.
46_10_8_Kanjalo masingenzi mbulo, njengokuba inxenye yabo yenza umbulo, kwawa ngamini-nye amawaka amashumi mabini anamathathu.
46_10_9_Kanjalo masingamhendi uKristu, njengokuba inxenye yabo yahendayo, yaza yatshabalala ziinyoka.
46_10_10_Kanjalo musani ukukrokra, njengokuba inxenye yabo yakrokrayo, yaza yatshabalala ngumtshabalalisi.
46_10_11_Zonke ke ezo zinto, zabahlelayo bona, beziyimifuziselo;  zabhalelwa ke ukululeka thina aba, bafikelweyo ziziphelo zawo amaphakade.
46_10_12_Ngoko ke lowo uba umi, makalumke angawi.
46_10_13_Anibanjwanga silingo singesesabantu. Uthembekile ke uThixo, ongayi kuvumela ukuba nilingwe ngaphezu kweninako;  owothi, kunye nesilingo eso, avelise ithuba lokuphuma kuso,  ukuba nibe nako ukuthwala.
46_10_14_Kungoko ndithi, zintanda zam, kubalekeni ukubusa izithixo.
46_10_15_Ndithetha njengakwiingqondi; kucaluleni nina endikuthethayo.
46_10_16_Indebe yentsikelelo le siyisikelelayo, asibubudlelane na begazi likaKristu? Isonka esi sisiqhekezayo, asibubudlelane na bomzimba kaKristu?
46_10_17_Ngokuba thina, sibaninzi nje, sisonka sinye, simzimba mnye, kuba sonke sabelana ngeso sonka sinye.
46_10_18_Khangelani abangamaSirayeli ngokwenyama. Abo bawadlayo amadini, abadlelani nesibingelelo eso, yini na?
46_10_19_Ndithini na ke ngoko? Ndithi, isithixo siyinto na? Ndithi,  amadini enzelwa izithixo ayinto na?
46_10_20_Anditsho! Ndithi, Amadini eziwenzayo iintlanga, ziwenzela iidemon, aziwenzeli uThixo. Andithandi ke ukuba nibe ngamadlelane needemon nina.
46_10_21_Aninako ukusela indebe yeNkosi nendebe yeedemon; aninako ukwabelana ngesithebe seNkosi nesithebe seedemon.
46_10_22_Siyayikhweletisa na iNkosi? Sinamandla kunayo, yini na?
46_10_23_Zonke izinto zivumelekile kum, noko azindilungele zonke;  zonke izinto zivumelekile kum, noko azakhi zonke.
46_10_24_Makungabikho namnye ufuna okukokwakhe ukulungelwa; elowo makafune nokomnye.
46_10_25_Yonke into ethengelwa endaweni yokuthenga inyama, yidleni,  ningaphicothi nto ngenxa yesazela;
46_10_26_kuba umhlaba lo ngoweNkosi, nenzaliseko yawo.
46_10_27_Ukuba ke ubani wakubo abangakholwayo uthi animeme,  nithande ukuya, yonke into ebekwa phambi kwenu yidleni,  ningaphicothi nto ngenxa yesazela.
46_10_28_Kodwa ke ukuba ubani uthe kuni, Le nto ilidini elenzelwe izithixo, musani ukudla, ngenxa ke yalowo uyithe thupha loo ndawo, nangenxa yesazela; kuba umhlaba lo ngoweNkosi,  nenzaliseko yawo.
46_10_29_Ndithi, isazela ke, singesiso esakho wena; sisesomnye lowo. Kuba yini na ukuba inkululeko yam igwetywe sesinye isazela?
46_10_30_Ke ukuba mna ndidla ndibulela, yini na ukuba ndinyeliswe ngenxa yoko ndikubulelayo mna?
46_10_31_Ke ngoko nokuba niyadla, nokuba niyasela, nokuba nenza yiphi na into, zenzeleni uzuko lukaThixo izinto zonke.
46_10_32_Yibani ngabangebawisi nakumaYuda, nakumaGrike, nakulo ibandla likaThixo;
46_10_33_njengokuba nam ndikholisa bonke ezintweni zonke,  ndingafuni okwam ukulungelwa, ndifuna okwabaninzi, ukuze basindiswe.
46_11_1_Yibani ngabaxelisa mna, njengokuba nam ndixelisa uKristu.
46_11_2_Ke kaloku ndiyanidumisa, bazalwana, kuba nindikhumbula ngeendawo zonke, nizibambile izithethe, njengoko ndaninikelayo.
46_11_3_Kodwa ke ndithanda ukuba nazi, ukuba intloko yomntu wonke oyindoda nguKristu, intloko ke yomfazi yindoda, intloko ke kaKristu nguThixo.
46_11_4_Umntu wonke oyindoda, ethandaza, mhlawumbi eprofeta, enento entloko, uya intloko yakhe.
46_11_5_Umntu wonke ke ongumfazi, ethandaza, mhlawumbi eprofeta,  engenasigqubuthelo entloko, uyayihlaza eyakhe intloko; kuba oko kunto-nye nokuba uchetyiwe.
46_11_6_Kuba umfazi, ukuba akagqubuthele, makaselenquthulwa nokunquthulwa. Ke ukuba kulihlazo kumfazi ukuba anquthulwe,  mhlawumbi achetywe, makabe nesigqubuthelo.
46_11_7_Kuba indoda okunene ayifanele ukuba nesigqubuthelo entloko,  ekubeni ingumfanekiselo nozuko lukaThixo; ke yena umfazi luzuko lwendoda.
46_11_8_Kuba indoda ayiphume emfazini, ngumfazi ophume endodeni;
46_11_9_kuba indoda ayidalwanga ngenxa yomfazi, kwadalwa umfazi ngenxa yendoda.
46_11_10_Ngenxa yoko umfazi ufanele ukuba abe nomqondiso wegunya phezu kwentloko, ngenxa yezithunywa zezulu.
46_11_11_Kodwa eNkosini apha indoda ayingaphandle komfazi, nomfazi akangaphandle kwendoda;
46_11_12_kuba, njengokuba umfazi ephume kwindoda, ngokunjalo nayo indoda ingaye umfazi; konke ke oko kuphume kuThixo.
46_11_13_Yahlulani nina ngaphakathi kwenu; kumfanele na umfazi ukuthandaza kuThixo, engagqubuthele?
46_11_14_Kananjalo imvelo ngokwayo ayinifundisi na, ukuba indoda okunene ethi ibe neenwele ezinde, kulihlazo oko kuyo?
46_11_15_Ke yena umfazi, ukuba uthi abe neenwele ezinde, kuluzuko oko kuye; ngokuba wazinikwa iinwele ezinde endaweni yesigqubuthelo.
46_11_16_Ke ukuba ubani ubonakala ethanda ukuphika, thina asinasiko linjalo, kwanawo amabandla kaThixo.
46_11_17_Ke kaloku, ndinithethela le ndawo nje, andinincomi, ukuba ukuhlangana kwenu ndawonye akusingisi kokhona kulungileyo;  kusingisa kokhona kubi.
46_11_18_Kuba kuqalake, nakuhlangana ebandleni, ndiyeva ukuba kubakho izahlukahlukano phakathi kwenu; ndithi ke kufanele ukuba zikho.
46_11_19_Kuba kumele ukuba kubekho nezahlukano phakathi kwenu,  ukuze abacikidekileyo babonakale phakathi kwenu.
46_11_20_Xenikweni ngoko nithe nahlangana ndawonye, asikuko ukuba nidle isidlo seNkosi;
46_11_21_kuba ekudleni kwenu elowo udla okwakhe ukudla; uqala adle,  bengekafiki abanye, aze omnye alambe, omnye anxile.
46_11_22_Kanene aninazindlu na zokudlela nokusela? Okanye nidela ibandla likaThixo na, nibadanisa nje abangenanto? Ndithini na kuni? Ndinidumise na kule nto? Andinidumisi.
46_11_23_Kuba mna ndakwamkela kuyo iNkosi oko ndikunikeleyo nokukunikela kuni: Okokuba iNkosi uYesu, ngobusuku eyanikelwa ngabo, yathabatha isonka;
46_11_24_yaza yakuba ibulele, yasiqhekeza, yathi, Thabathani,  nidle, ngumzimba wam lo, owaphulelwa nina; oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula.
46_11_25_Kwangokunjalo yathabatha nayo indebe, emva kokuba kudliwe,  isithi, Le ndebe ingumnqophiso omtsha osegazini lam; ngamaxesha onke enisukuba niyisela, oku kwenzeleni ukundikhumbula.
46_11_26_Kuba ngamaxesha onke enisukuba nisidla eso sonka, niyisele loo ndebe, niyakwazisa ukufa kweNkosi, ide ifike.
46_11_27_Ngoko ke, osukuba esidla eso sonka, ayisele indebe yeNkosi, ngokungafanelekileyo, woba netyala lomzimba negazi leNkosi.
46_11_28_Makazicikide ke ngokwakhe umntu, aze ngokunjalo adle kwisonka eso, asele kwindebe leyo;
46_11_29_kuba lowo udlayo, uselayo, ngokungafanelekileyo, uzidlela aziselele ukugwetywa, engawucaluli nje umzimba weNkosi.
46_11_30_Ngenxa yoku baninzi phakathi kwenu abaswele amandla,  nabayimilwelwe, banele nabalele ukufa.
46_11_31_Kuba xa besizicalula, ngesiba asigwetywa.
46_11_32_Sigwetywa nje ke, siyaqeqeshwa yiNkosi, ukuze singasingelwa phantsi ndawonye nehlabathi.
46_11_33_Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam, xa nihlangene ndawonye ukuba nidle, lindanani.
46_11_34_Ukuba ke ubani ulambile, makadle ekhaya, ukuze ningahlanganeli ukugwetywa. Eziseleyo ke iindawo ndozilungisa,  xa ndithe ndafika.
46_12_1_Ke ngezipho ezizezoMoya, bazalwana, andithandi ukuba ningazi.
46_12_2_Niyazi ukuba nibe ningabeentlanga, nikhukuliselwe ezithixweni ezingenakuthetha, njengoko nisakuthi nikhokelwe ngako.
46_12_3_Kungoko ndinazisayo, okokuba akukho namnye, ethetha ekuMoya kaThixo, unokuthi ungosingelwe phantsi uYesu; kanjalo akukho namnye unako ukuthi uyiNkosi uYesu, engekuye uMoya oyiNgcwele.
46_12_4_Ke kaloku kukho izabelo ngezabelo zezibabalo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Moya mnye.
46_12_5_Kukho nezabelo ngezabelo zezilungiselelo, phofu ikwayiloo Nkosi inye.
46_12_6_Kukho nezabelo ngezabelo zeentsebenzo, kodwa ke ikwanguloo Thixo mnye uzisebenzayo izinto zonke kubo bonke.
46_12_7_Elowo ke uphiwa ukubonakalalisa uMoya, kuze kubekho okulungele bonke;
46_12_8_kuba omnye okunene uphiwa ngaye uMoya ilizwi lobulumko;  kodwa ke omnye, ilizwi lokwazi kwangokwaloo Moya;
46_12_9_wumbi ke uphiwa ukholo kwangaloo Moya; omnye ke, izibabalo zeziphiliso kwangaloo Moya;
46_12_10_omnye ke uphiwa iintsebenzo zemisebenzi yamandla; omnye ke iziprofeto; omnye ke, ukucalula oomoya; wumbi ke, iintlobo zeelwimi; omnye ke, ukucaciswa kweelwimi.
46_12_11_Zonke ke ezo zinto zisetyenzwa kwangaloo Moya mnye;  umabela elowo ngokwakhe njengoko athandayo.
46_12_12_Kuba, kwanjengokuba umzimba umnye, unamalungu amaninzi,  abe ke onke amalungu aloo mzimba mnye, emaninzi nje, emzimba mnye, ukwanjalo ke noKristu lo.
46_12_13_Kuba thina sonke sabhaptizelwa mzimbeni mnye ngaMoya mnye,  nokuba singamaYuda, nokuba singamaGrike; nokuba singamakhoboka,  nokuba singabakhululekileyo; sonke sasezwa Moyeni mnye;
46_12_14_kuba nomzimba lo ungelungu linye, ungamaninzi.
46_12_15_Ukuba luthe unyawo, Ngokuba ndingesiso isandla,  andingowasemzimbeni, luthi, ngenxa yoko, lungabi lolwasemzimbeni na?
46_12_16_Nokuba ithe indlebe, Ngokuba ndingelilo iliso,  andingowasemzimbeni, ithi, ngenxa yoko, ingabi yeyasemzimbeni na?
46_12_17_Ukuba umzimba lo uphela ubuliliso, bekuya kuba phi na ukuva? Ukuba ubukukuva uphela, bekuya kuba phi na ukusezela?
46_12_18_Kungoku ke uThixo wawamisa amalungu, lalelo nelo emzimbeni, njengoko wathandayo.
46_12_19_Ukuba ke onke ebelungu linye, ubuya kuba phi na umzimba?
46_12_20_Kungoku ke maninzi okunene amalungu, kodwa mnye wona umzimba.
46_12_21_Alinako ke iliso ukuthi kwisandla, Akufuneki kum; kanjalo intloko ayinakuthi kwiinyawo, Anifuneki kum.
46_12_22_Asuka amalungu omzimba angathi ngaswele amandla kwamanye,  abe ngawona afunekayo.
46_12_23_Namalungu omzimba esiba ngaswele imbeko kunamanye, lawo ngawona siwabeka embekweni; aze amalungu ethu ahloniphekayo,  abe ngawona abekekileyo.
46_12_24_Amalungu ethu ke abekekileyo akufuneki nto kuwo. Usuke uThixo wawumanya umzimba, wathi ilungu elingento walibeka kweyona mbeko inkulu;
46_12_25_ukuze kungabikho kwahlukahlukana emzimbeni, kubekho ukunyamekelana kwamalungu ngakunye;
46_12_26_kuthi, nokuba lilungu elinye eliva ubunzima, avelane amalungu onke; nokuba lilungu elinye elizukiswayo, avuyisane amalungu onke.
46_12_27_Nina ke ningumzimba kaKristu, ningamalungu ngokwabelwa izabelo.
46_12_28_Wathi inxenye uThixo wayimisa ebandleni, kuqala yangabapostile, okwesibini abaprofeti, okwesithathu abafundisi;  kwaza kwaba yimisebenzi yamandla, kwaba zizibabalo zeziphiliso,  iintsizo, izilawulo, iintlobo zeelwimi.
46_12_29_Bangabapostile bonke yini na? Bangabaprofeti bonke yini na? Bangabafundisi bonke yini na? Bangabenzi bemisebenzi yamandla bonke yini na?
46_12_30_Banezibabalo zeziphiliso bonke yini na? Bathetha ngalwimi zimbi bonke yini na? Bacacisa intetho bonke yini na?
46_12_31_Zondelelani ke ezona zibabalo zilungileyo; kanti ke ndisanibonisa eyona ndlela incamisileyo.
46_13_1_Ndingafanelana ndithetha ngeelwimi zabantu nezezithunywa zezulu; uthando ke ndingenalo, ndisuke ndaba yixina ehlokomayo,  necangci elikhenkcezayo.
46_13_2_Ndingafanelana ndinabo nobuprofeto, ndizazi iimfihlelo zonke, ndinako konke ukwazi; ndingafanelana ndinalo lonke ukholo, ngokokude ndisuse iintaba, uthando ke ndingenalo,  andinto yanto.
46_13_3_Ndingafanelana ndisamkelisa amahlwempu ngempahla yam yonke,  nokuba ndithe umzimba wam ndawunikela ukuba utshiswe, uthando ke ndingenalo, akundincedi lutho.
46_13_4_Uthando luzeka kade umsindo, lunobubele; uthando alunamona;  uthando alugwagwisi; alukhukhumali;
46_13_5_alwenzi okuziintloni; alufuni okukokwalo kodwa; alucaphuki;  alunanzondo;
46_13_6_aluvuyeli kungalungisi; luvuyisana nenyaniso.
46_13_7_Luthwala iinto zonke; lukholwa ziinto zonke; luthemba iinto zonke; lunyamezela iinto zonke.
46_13_8_Uthando aluze lutshitshe; nokuba ke ziziprofeto, ziya kubhangiswa; nokuba ziilwimi, ziya kupheza; nokuba kukwazi,  kuya kuphuthiswa.
46_13_9_Kuba siyazi ngokuyinxenye, siprofeta ngokuyinxenye.
46_13_10_Xa kuthe ke kwafika okuzalisekileyo, kuya kwandula ukuphuthiswa okuyinxenye.
46_13_11_Oko bendingumntwana, bendithetha ngokomntwana, bendiqonda ngokomntwana, bendicamanga ngokomntwana; ndithe ke, ndakuba yindoda, ndazibhangisa izinto zobuntwana.
46_13_12_Kuba ngoku sikhangela esipilini ngokwamanakanibe; oko ke,  siya kukhangelana ebusweni. Ngoku ndazi ngokuyinxenye; oko ke ndiya kwazi kakuhle, njengoko ndaziwayo nokwaziwa nam.
46_13_13_Kungoku ke kuhleli ukholo, ithemba, uthando, ezo zinto zontathu; eyona inkulu ke kuzo apho luthando.
46_14_1_Phuthumani uthando olo, nibe kodwa nizizondelela izipho ezizezoMoya, ngokukodwa ke ukuba niprofete.
46_14_2_Kuba lowo uthetha ngalulwimi lumbi akathethi bantwini,  uthetha kuThixo; kuba akukho namnye umvayo, kodwa ke ngomoya uthetha iimfihlelo.
46_14_3_Ke yena oprofetayo uthetha ebantwini ulwakheko, noyalo,  nokhuzo.
46_14_4_Lowo uthetha ngalulwimi lumbi uzakha yena; ke lowo uprofetayo wakha ibandla.
46_14_5_Ndiyathanda ke ukuba nithethe ngalwimi zimbi nonke, noko ke ndithanda ngokukodwa ukuba niprofete. Kuba yena oprofetayo mkhulu kunalowo uthetha ngalwimi zimbi, xa lo angayicacisiyo intetho, ukuze ibandla libe nokwakheka.
46_14_6_Kunjalonje ke, bazalwana, ukuba ndithe ndeza kuni,  ndithetha ngalwimi zimbi, bendiya kuninceda ntoni na, xa ndingathanga ndithethe kuni ndinesityhilelo, ndinokwazi,  ndinesiprofeto, ndinemfundiso?
46_14_7_Khona kwizinto ezihlokomayo ezingenamphefumlo,  ezinjengembande, nohadi, ukuba azithanga zahlule ukuhlokoma kwazo, bekungathiwani na ukwaziwa oko kubethwayo ngembande,  noko kubethwayo ngohadi?
46_14_8_Kuba kanjalo, xa ixilongo lithe lalila ngezwi elingaqondakaliyo, ngubani na owoyixhobela imfazwe?
46_14_9_Ngokunjalo nani, ukuba anithanga nithethe ngalo ulwimi intetho eqondeka kakuhle, yothiwani na ukwaziwa into enithetha yona? Kuba noba nithethela emoyeni.
46_14_10_Nokuba zingaba sezingakanani na ukuba zininzi kwazo iintlobo zeentetho ehlabathini, akukho nalunye kuzo olungenanto luthetha yona.
46_14_11_Ukuba ngoko andithanga ndiyazi intsingiselo yentetho,  ndoba ngumbharbhari kothethayo, nothethayo woba ngumbharbhari kum.
46_14_12_Ngokunjalo nani, ekubeni kaloku nizondelela izipho ezizezoMoya, zifuneleni ukuba nibe nazo ngokugqithiseleyo,  ukuze lakheke ibandla.
46_14_13_Ngenxa yoko ndithi, othethayo ngalwimi zimbi,  makathandazele ukuba icace intetho yakhe.
46_14_14_Kuba xa ndithandaza ngalulwimi lumbi, umoya wam uyathandaza okunene wona, ke yona ingqiqo yam ayinasiqhamo.
46_14_15_Kuthini na ke ngoko? Ndiya kuthandaza ngomoya, ndithandaze nangengqiqo; ndiya kuvuma ngomoya, ndivume nangengqiqo.
46_14_16_Okanye, ukuba uthe wasikelela ngomoya wodwa, wothini na lowo uhleliyo endaweni yongenakwazi ukuthi, Amen, ekubuleleni kwakho, ekubeni kaloku into oyithethayo engayazi?
46_14_17_Kuba okunene wena uyatyapha ukubulela, kodwa onguwumbi akakheki.
46_14_18_Ndiyabulela kuThixo wam, kuba ndithetha ngalwimi zimbi ngaphezu kwenu nonke;
46_14_19_kodwa ke ebandleni ndithanda ukuthetha amazwi abe mahlanu ngayo ingqiqo yam, ukuze ndibafundise nabanye, kunokuba ndithethe amazwi angamawaka alishumi, ngalulwimi lumbi.
46_14_20_Bazalwana, musani ukuba ngabantwana engqondweni; ebubini yibani ziintsana, engqondweni ke yibani ngabantu abakhulu.
46_14_21_Emthethweni kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Ndiya kuthetha kwaba bantu ngalwimi zimbi nangamlomo wumbi; noko ndiya kwenjenjalo, abayi kundiva, itsho iNkosi.
46_14_22_Ngoko ke iilwimi ezi zikho ukuba zibe ngumqondiso kwabo bangakholwayo, kungekubo abakholwayo: ke sona isiprofeto asisesabangakholwayo, sesabakholwayo.
46_14_23_Ukuba ngoko lithe lahlangana ndawonye ibandla liphela,  bathetha bonke ngalwimi zimbi, kwaza kwangena abangenakwazi,  nokuba ngabangakholwayo, abasayi kuthi na, niyageza?
46_14_24_Ke ukuba bathi bonke baprofete, kuze ke kungene umntu ongakholwayo, nokuba ngongenakwazi, uyohlwaywa ngabo bonke,  adane; uyaphicothwa ngabo bonke;
46_14_25_zize ngokunjalo izinto ezifihlakeleyo zentliziyo yakhe zibonakalaliswe; wothi ngokunjalo, esiwa ngobuso, amnqule uThixo, exela ukuba uThixo uphakathi kwenu okwenyaniso.
46_14_26_Kuthini na ke ngoko, bazalwana? Xa sukuba nihlangene, uthi elowo kuni abe nengoma, abe nemfundiso, abe nalulwimi lumbi,  abe nesityhilelo, abe nokuchaza intetho. Mazithi zonke izinto zenzelwe ukuba lakheke ibandla.
46_14_27_Kanjalo ukuba umntu uthetha ngalulwimi lumbi, makuthethe babini, mhlawumbi bathathu, bangegqithi, kube ngokulandelelana,  aze omnye acacise intetho.
46_14_28_Ke xa kungekho mchazi-ntetho, makathi cwaka ebandleni;  makathethe kuye ngokwakhe nakuThixo.
46_14_29_Abaprofeti ke, makuthethe babini, mhlawumbi bathathu,  abanye bacalule.
46_14_30_Ukuba ke kuthe watyhilelwa into omnye ehleli khona,  owokuqala makathi cwaka.
46_14_31_Kuba ninako ukuprofeta ngabanye nonke, ukuze bafunde bonke, bavuselelwe bonke.
46_14_32_Kanjalo oomoya babaprofeti bayabalulamela abaprofeti;
46_14_33_kuba uThixo akangowesiphithiphithi, ngowoxolo; njengokuba kunjalo kuwo onke amabandla abangcwele.
46_14_34_Abafazi benu mabathi tu emabandleni; kuba abavunyelwa bona ukuba bathethe. Kuthiwa mabalulame, njengokuba usitsho nomthetho.
46_14_35_Ukuba ke banga bangaqonda into, mabayibuze ekhaya kwawabo amadoda; kuba lihlazo kubafazi ukuthetha ebandleni.
46_14_36_Kanene ilizwi likaThixo laphuma livela kuni na? lafika kuni nedwa, kusini na?
46_14_37_Ukuba umntu uba ungumprofeti, nokuba uba ungowoMoya,  makazazi kakuhle izinto endinibhalela zona, ukuba yimithetho yeNkosi.
46_14_38_Ke ukuba umntu akazi, makangazi.
46_14_39_Ngoko ke, bazalwana, kuzondeleleni ukuprofeta,  ningakwaleli ukuthetha ngalwimi zimbi.
46_14_40_Zonke izinto mazenziwe ngokubekekileyo, nangolungelelwano.
46_15_1_Ke kaloku, bazalwana, ndiyanazisa iindaba ezilungileyo, ezo ndazishumayela kuni, nazamkelayo nokuzamkela, nimiyo nokuma kuzo,
46_15_2_nisindiswayo nokusindiswa ngazo, ukuba nizibambile ngelizwi endazishumayela ngalo kuni; ukuba anithe nafumana nakholwa.
46_15_3_Kuba ndaninikela kweziyintloko izinto oko ndakwamkelayo nokukwamkela: okokuba uKristu wazifela izono zethu ngokwezibhalo,
46_15_4_nokokuba wangcwatywa, nokokuba uvukile ngomhla wesithathu ngokwezibhalo;
46_15_5_nokokuba wabonwa nguKefas, emva koko ngabalishumi elinababini.
46_15_6_Emveni kuko wabonwa ngaxesha linye ngabazalwana abangaphezu kwamakhulu amahlanu, abasahleliyo nangoku abona baninzi kubo;  inxenye ke yalala ukufa.
46_15_7_Emva koko wabonwa nguYakobi, kamva ngabo bonke abapostile.
46_15_8_Ekugqibeleni ke kwabo bonke, kwanga kukwinto ezelwe lingekabi lilixa layo, wabonwa nandim.
46_15_9_Kuba mna ndingoyena mncinanana kubapostile, endingafanele kubizwa ngokuba ngumpostile, ngenxa enokuba ndalitshutshisa ibandla likaThixo.
46_15_10_Ke ngobabalo lukaThixo ndiyinto endiyiyo, nobabalo lwakhe kum alubanga nakulambatha; ndesuka ndabagqitha bonke ngokubulaleka; ingendim ke, ilubabalo lukaThixo olunam.
46_15_11_Ke ngoko, nokuba ndim, nokuba ngabo, senjenjalo thina ukushumayela; nenjenjalo ke nina ukukholwa.
46_15_12_Ke, ukuba uKristu uyashunyayelwa ukuba uvukile kwabafileyo, batsho ngani na abathile phakathi kwenu ukuthi,  akukho luvuko lwabafileyo?
46_15_13_Ke, ukuba akukho luvuko lwabafileyo, woba akavukanga noKristu;
46_15_14_ukuba ke uKristu akavukanga, koba akunto ukushumayela kwethu, loba luyalambatha nokholo lwenu.
46_15_15_Sofunyanwa ke singawo namangqina amxokayo uThixo, ngokuba sangqinayo ngoThixo ukuba wamvusa uKristu: angamvusanga, ukuba ke kanti abafileyo abavuki.
46_15_16_Kuba, ukuba abafileyo abavuki, noKristu woba akavukanga.
46_15_17_Ukuba ke uKristu akavukanga, loba luyinto engeyanto ukholo lwenu, noba nisesezonweni zenu;
46_15_18_ngoko nabalele ukufa bekuKristu, boba batshabalele.
46_15_19_Ukuba singabathembele kuKristu kobu bomi bodwa, soba sizezona ntsizana kubantu bonke.
46_15_20_UKristu yena kunje uvukile kwabafileyo, waba yintlahlela yabalele ukufa.
46_15_21_Kuba ekubeni kaloku kungomntu ukufa, kukwangomntu ukuvuka kwabafileyo.
46_15_22_Kuba, njengokuba kuye uAdam bafa bonke, ngokunjalo nakuye uKristu baya kudliswa ubomi bonke:
46_15_23_elowo ke kolwakhe uluhlu; intlahlela inguKristu, kamva abakaKristu ekufikeni kwakhe;
46_15_24_kwandule ke ukubakho isiphelo, xa athe wabunikela ubukumkani kuye uThixo uYise, xa athe wabubhangisa bonke ubulawuli, nalo lonke igunya, namandla.
