46_15_25_Kuba umelwe yena kukuthi alawule, ade azibeke phantsi kweenyawo zakhe zonke iintshaba.
46_15_26_Olokugqibela utshaba oluya kubhangiswa kukufa;
46_15_27_kuba izinto zonke wazithobela phantsi kweenyawo zakhe. Ke xa athi, Izinto zonke zithotyiwe, kuyabonakala ukuba akabalwa lowo wazithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.
46_15_28_Xa ke zithe zathotyelwa phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto, uya kwandula noNyana ngokwakhe athotyelwe phantsi kwalowo wazithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto, ukuze uThixo abe zizinto zonke kubo bonke.
46_15_29_Okanye baya kwenza ntoni na abo babhaptizelwa abafileyo,  ukuba abafileyo abaze bavuke? Yini na ukuba babhaptizelwe nokubhaptizelwa abafileyo?
46_15_30_Nathi, yini na ukuba sibe semngciphekweni amaxa onke?
46_15_31_Ndisekufeni imihla ngemihla; qondani ngokuzingca kwam ngani, endinako ndikuKristu Yesu, iNkosi yethu.
46_15_32_Ukuba ndithe ngokwabantu ndalwa namarhamncwa e-Efese,  kundinceda ntoni na? Ukuba abafileyo abavuki, masesisidla,  sisela, kuba ngomso siya kufa.
46_15_33_Musani ukulahlekiswa. Incoko embi yonakalisa izimilo ezilungileyo.
46_15_34_Qabukani kakuhle, ningoni; kuba inxenye inentswela-kumazi uThixo; nditsho kuni ukuba nidane.
46_15_35_Wosuka ubani athi, Bathini na ukuvuka abafileyo? Beza benamzimba unjani na?
46_15_36_Msweli-kuqonda wena, into oyihlwayelayo ayenziwa iphile,  ukuba ayikhanga ife.
46_15_37_Kanjalo loo nto uyihlwayelayo, akuhlwayeli sona isiqu sento esiya kubakho; uhlwayela ukhozo nje, lungathi lube lolwengqolowa, nokuba lolwezinye iintlobo;
46_15_38_uThixo ke ulunika isiqu, njengoko athandileyo; iyileyo imbewu uyinika esisesayo isiqu.
46_15_39_Yonke inyama ayinyama-nye; enye yinyama yabantu, enye yinyama yeenkomo, enye yeyeentlanzi, enye yeyeentaka.
46_15_40_Kukho iziqu ezisezulwini, neziqu ezisemhlabeni; bubodwa ubuqaqawuli bezasezulwini, bubodwa obezasemhlabeni.
46_15_41_Bubodwa ubuqaqawuli belanga, bubodwa ubuqaqawuli benyanga,  bubodwa ubuqaqawuli beenkwenkwezi; kuba inkwenkwezi iyahluka kwenye inkwenkwezi ngobuqaqawuli.
46_15_42_Lunjalo ke kanye novuko lwabafileyo. Umzimba uhlwayelwa unokonakala, uvuka ungenakonakala.
46_15_43_Uhlwayelwa uswele imbeko, uvuka unobuqaqawuli; uhlwayelwa uswele amandla, uvuka unamandla;
46_15_44_kuhlwayelwa umzimba ongowemvelo, kuvuka umzimba ongowomoya. Kukho umzimba ongowemvelo, kukho nomzimba ongowomoya.
46_15_45_Ngokunjalo kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Owokuqala umntu uAdam waba ngumphefumlo odla ubomi; owokugqibela uAdam waba ngumoya odlisa ubomi.
46_15_46_Ke akuqali okomoya; kuqala okwemvelo, kwandule ukuza okomoya.
46_15_47_Owokuqala umntu uphume emhlabeni, ungowomhlaba; owesibini umntu, iNkosi, uphume emazulwini.
46_15_48_Into ayiyo owomhlaba, bakwayiyo abomhlaba; kanjalo nento ayiyo osemazulwini, bakwayiyo abasemazulwini;
46_15_49_njengokuba sawambathayo umfanekiselo wowomhlaba, siya kuwambatha nomfanekiselo wosemazulwini.
46_15_50_Ke, bazalwana, nditsho ukuthi, inyama negazi azinako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo; nokonakala akunakukudla ilifa ukungonakali.
46_15_51_Yabonani, ndinixelela imfihlelo: Okunene asiyi kulala ukufa sonke; kodwa siya kwenziwa ngakumbi sonke,
46_15_52_ngesiquphe, ngephanyazo, ngexilongo lokugqibela. Kuba liya kulila ixilongo, bavuke abafileyo bengenakonakala, senziwe ngakumbi ke thina.
46_15_53_Kuba kumele oku konakalayo ukwambatha ukungonakali, noku kufayo ukwambatha ukungafi.
46_15_54_Xa ke oku konakalayo kuthe kwambatha ukungonakali, noku kufayo kuthe kwambatha ukungafi, liya kwandula ukwenzeka ilizwi elibhaliweyo lokuthi, Ukufa kufincelwe eloyisweni.
46_15_55_Luphi na, kufa, ulwamvila lwakho? Luphi na, Hadesi,  uloyiso lwakho?
46_15_56_Ulwamvila lokufa sisono; amandla esono ngumthetho.
46_15_57_Makubulelwe ke kuThixo osinikayo uloyiso olo, ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
46_15_58_Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam abaziintanda, qinani, ningabi nakushukuma; nihlale niphuphuma umsebenzi weNkosi, nisazi nje ukuba ukubulaleka kwenu akulambathi eNkosini.
46_16_1_Ke kaloku, ngokubuthwa kwemali yokusiza abangcwele,  njengokuba ndawamiselayo amabandla kaThixo akwelaseGalati,  yenzani ngokunjalo nani.
46_16_2_Ngolokuqala usuku, iiveki ngeeveki, elowo kuni makabeke ekhaya, eqweba, into asukuba esikelelwe ngayo; ukuze kungathi,  ndakuba ndifikile, kwandule ukubuthwa imali.
46_16_3_Ke ndakuba ndifikile, enisukuba nibacikidile nakholwa ngabo, ndobathuma bona benencwadi, base isipho senu esi eYerusalem.
46_16_4_Ke ukuba kuthe kwabonakala ukuba nam ndiye, bohamba kunye nam.
46_16_5_Ndiya kuza ke kuni, xa ndithe ndacanda kwelaseMakedoni,  kuba ndiya kwanela ukucanda nje kwelaseMakedoni.
46_16_6_Ke kuni mhlawumbi ndingathi ndihlale ndidlulise nobusika,  ukuze nina nindiphelekelele apho ndisukuba ndisiya khona.
46_16_7_Kuba andithandi ukuba ndinibone ngoku ndidlulayo; kodwa ndithemba ukuba ndokha ndihlale kuni ixesha elithile, ukuba iNkosi ithe yavuma.
46_16_8_Ndiya kuhlala ke e-Efese kude kubekho ipentekoste;
46_16_9_kuba ndivulelwe umnyango omkhulu onamandla, bebaninzi nabachasi.
46_16_10_Ke kaloku, ukuba uTimoti uthe wafika, ize nikhangele ukuba angabi nakoyika phakathi kwenu; kuba uyawusebenza umsebenzi weNkosi, kwanjengam,
46_16_11_Ize kungabikho bani ngoko umenza into engento.  Mphelekeleleni ke nixolile, ukuze eze kum; kuba ndimlindile kunye nabazalwana.
46_16_12_Ke kaloku, ngaye nApolo umzalwana, ndamvuselela kakhulu,  ukuba eze kuni kunye nabazalwana. Kuye akubangakho kanye ukuthanda ukuza okwakalokunje; woza ke, xa athe wanethuba elilungileyo.
46_16_13_Phaphani, elukholweni; yibani ngamadoda; yomelelani.
46_16_14_Zonke izinto zenu mazenziwe ninothando.
46_16_15_Ke kaloku ndiyanivuselela, bazalwana (niyayazi indlu kaStefana, ukuba iyintlahlela yelaseAkaya, nokuba bazimisele ukulungiselela abangcwele),
46_16_16_ukuze nani nibalulamele abanjalo, nabo bonke abasebenzisana nathi emsebenzini, nababulalekayo.
46_16_17_Ndiyavuya ke ngokufika kukaStefana noFortunato noAkayiko;  ngokuba bakwenzelelele bona ukungabikho kwenu;
46_16_18_kuba bawuphumzile umoya wam nowenu. Bazini kakuhle ngoko abanjalo.
46_16_19_Ayanibulisa amabandla kaThixo akwelaseAsiya. Bayanibulisa kunene eNkosini uAkwila noPrisila, kunye nebandla elisendlwini yabo.
46_16_20_Bayanibulisa abazalwana bonke. Bulisanani ngolwango olungcwele.
46_16_21_Umbuliso ungesam isandla, mna Pawulos.
46_16_22_Ukuba ubani akayithandi iNkosi uYesu Kristu, makasingelwe phantsi. INkosi iyeza.
46_16_23_Ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu malube nani.
46_16_24_Uthando lwam malube nani nonke bakuKristu Yesu. Amen.
47_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  noTimoti umzalwana, ubhalela ibandla likaThixo eliseKorinte,  kunye nabo bonke abangcwele abakwelaseAkaya liphela:
47_1_2_uthi, makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo, uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
47_1_3_Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu,  uSozimfefe, uThixo onako konke ukuthuthuzela,
47_1_4_osithuthuzelayo kuyo yonke imbandezelo yethu, ukuze sibe nako ukubathuthuzela abakwinto yonke eyimbandezelo, ngayo intuthuzelo esithuthuzelwa ngayo nathi nguye uThixo.
47_1_5_Ngokuba, njengokuba iintlungu zikaKristu ziphuphumela kuthi,  ngokunjalo ithi nentuthuzelo yethu iphuphume ngoKristu.
47_1_6_Nokuba na ke siyabandezelwa, oko kwenzelwa ukuthuthuzela nokusindisa nina, ukusindisa ke okusebenzayo ngokunyamezela kwenu kwa-ezo ntlungu sizivayo nathi; nokuba na ke siyathuthuzelwa, oko kwenzelwa ukuthuthuzela nokusindisa nina.
47_1_7_Kanjalo ithemba lethu ngani liqinisekile; sisazi ukuba,  njengokuba ningamadlelane nathi ngazo iintlungu, ngokunjalo niyakuba ngawo nangentuthuzelo.
47_1_8_Kuba asithandi ukuba ningayazi, bazalwana, imbandezelo yethu eyasihlelayo kwelaseAsiya: ukuba saxineka ngokuncamisileyo,  ngaphezu kwamandla ethu, ngokokude sibuncame kanye nobomi.
47_1_9_Sasuka ngokwethu saba nesigwebo sokufa ngaphakathi kwethu,  ukuze singabi ngabasazithembayo, sithembele kuThixo lo ubavusayo abafileyo;
47_1_10_owasihlangulayo ekufeni okungako, osihlangulayo nangoku;  esithembele kuye ukuba usaya kusihlangula:
47_1_11_nakubon ukuba niyancedisa nani ngokusikhungela, ukuze isipho esingokubabalwa, esenzelwe sona thina ngabantu abaninzi,  sibulelwe ngabaninzi ngenxa yethu.
47_1_12_Kuba oko kuqhayisa kwethu kukungqina kwesazela sethu, ukuba sithe ehlabathini apha, ngokukodwa ke kuni, sahlala singabangenakumbi, sinokungcwengeka okuvela kuThixo,  singenabulumko bubobenyama, sinobabalo lukaThixo.
47_1_13_Kuba asinibhaleli zimbi izinto, ikwazezo nizilesayo,  nizaziyo kakuhle. Ndiyathemba ke ukuba niya kuzazi kakuhle,  kude kuse nasekupheleni,
47_1_14_njengokuba nasaziyo kakuhle ngokuyinxenye, ukuba siliqhayiya lenu, kwanjengokuba nani nilelethu ngemini yeNkosi uYesu.
47_1_15_Ndinaloo nkoloseko ke, ndanqwenela ukunga ndingeza kuni kuqala, ukuze nibabalwe okwesibini;
47_1_16_ndize ndicande kuni ukuya kwelaseMakedoni; ndibuye, ndivela kwelaseMakedoni, ndize kuni, ndiphelekelelwe nini ukuya kwelakwaYuda.
47_1_17_Xa ngoko ndandifuna oko, ndandifeketha na kanti? Okanye izinto endizicebayo, ndiziceba ngokwenyama yini na ukuze nje kubekho kum uewe, ewe; nohayi, hayi?
47_1_18_Ethembekile nje ke uThixo, ilizwi lethu kuni alibanga nguewe nohayi.
47_1_19_Kuba yena okaThixo uNyana, uYesu Kristu, owavakaliswayo phakathi kwenu sithi (ndim ke noSilvano noTimoti), akabanga nguewe nohayi; kuye nguewe kwakanye;
47_1_20_kuba ngangoko angako amadinga kaThixo, uewe ukuye, noamen ukuye, ukuze kuzukiswe uThixo ngathi.
47_1_21_Osiqiniselayo ke ndawonye nani kuKristu, osithambisayo ke,  nguThixo;
47_1_22_ositywine wasiqinisa, wasinika isinyaniso soMoya, saba sezintliziyweni zethu.
47_1_23_Mna ke ndibiza uThixo, ukuba abe lingqina emphefumlweni wam, ukuba kungokunivela, endithe ndaba andikezi eKorinte.
47_1_24_Anditsho ngakulugagamela ukholo lwenu; nditsho ngokuba singabasebenza nani uvuyo lwenu; kuba nimi ngokholo.
47_2_1_Mna ke okwam, ndagqiba kweli lokuba ndingabuyi ndize kuni ndibuhlungu.
47_2_2_Kuba mna ukuba ndinenza buhlungu, kusekho bani na ke ondenza ndibe nemihlali, ongenguye lowo wenziwe wabuhlungu kwandim?
47_2_3_Ndanibhalela ke kwakona oku, ukuze ndakufika ndingabi buhlungu ngabo bendimelwe kukuvuya ngabo; ndikholosile ngani nonke, ukuba uvuyo lwam ikwalolwenu nonke.
47_2_4_Kuba ndanibhalela ekubandezelekeni nasekuxinezelekeni okukhulu kwentliziyo yam, ndineenyembezi ezininzi; ndingenzeli ukuze nenziwe buhlungu, ndisenzela ukuze nilwazi uthando endinithanda ngalo ngokugqithiseleyo.
47_2_5_Ke ukuba ubani wenze kwabuhlungu, akenze kwabuhlungu mna,  wenze ngenxenye nina nonke; nditsho ukuze ndingamcinezeli.
47_2_6_Kumanele lowo unjalo oko kumkhalimela kwabona baninzi kuni;
47_2_7_ngokokude nithi kanye senimxolela, nimthuthuzele, hleze lowo unjalo aselesuka edliwa kukuba buhlungu ngokugqithiseleyo.
47_2_8_Kungoko ndiniyalayo, ndithi, luzinziseni uthando kuye;
47_2_9_kuba ndabhalela kona oku, ukuze ndikwazi ukucikideka kwenu,  ukuba ningabevayo na ezintweni zonke.
47_2_10_Enimxolelayo ke into, ndiyamxolela nam; kuba nam, ukuba ndixolele into endiyixoleleyo, ndenze ngenxa yenu, phambi kukaKristu;
47_2_11_ukuze singabonelelwa nguye uSathana; kuba amaqhinga akhe siyawazi.
47_2_12_Ke kaloku, ndathi ndakufika eTrowa ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, ndakuba ndiwuvulelwe nomnyango eNkosini,
47_2_13_andibanga nakonwaba emoyeni wam, ngokungamfumani uTito,  umzalwana wam; ndesuka ndababulisa, ndanduluka ndava kwelaseMakedoni.
47_2_14_Makubulelwe ke kuThixo, ohlala eduma ngathi sikuKristu,  elibonakalalisa ngathi ivumba lokwaziwa kwakhe ezindaweni zonke.
47_2_15_Ngokuba kuye uThixo silivumba elimnandi likaKristu,  phakathi kwabasindiswayo naphakathi kwabatshabalalayo.
47_2_16_Kwabanye silivumba lokufa elisa ekufeni; kwabanye silivumba lobomi elisa ebomini. Ngubani na ke ozilingeneyo ezo zinto?
47_2_17_Kuba asithi, njengabaninzi abo, silingxengelele ilizwi likaThixo; sisuka ngokwabokungcwengeka, sisuka ngokwabakwaThixo, sithethe phambi kwamehlo kaThixo, sikuKristu.
47_3_1_Xa sitshoyo, singaba siyawaqala siziyaleze na? Okanye sifuna, njengabathile, kusini na, iincwadi zokuyalezwa kuni,  nokuba zezokuyalezwa nini?
47_3_2_Incwadi yethu thina, ebhalwe ezintliziyweni zethu, nini;  iyaziwa, ileswa ngabantu bonke;
47_3_3_nibonakalalisiwe nje ukuba niyincwadi kaKristu,  eyalungiselelwa sithi, engabhalwanga ngainki, ebhalwe ngoMoya kaThixo ophilileyo; kungekhona emacwecweni amatye,  kusemacwecweni angawenyama entliziyo.
47_3_4_Sinenkoloseko enjalo ke kuThixo ngaye uKristu.
47_3_5_Ukutsho andithi, sikulingene ngokwethu ukucamanga nto engathi iphuma kuthi ngokwethu; ukukulingana kwethu oko kuphuma kuThixo,
47_3_6_osenze nokusenza sakulingana ukuba ngabalungiseleli bomnqophiso omtsha; singabi ngabobhalo nje kodwa, sibe singabomoya; kuba ubhalo luyabulala, umoya ke udlisa ubomi.
47_3_7_Ke kaloku, ukuba ulungiselelo olo lubulalayo, lukroliweyo ematyeni ngobhalo, lweza lunobuqaqawuli, ngokude oonyana bakaSirayeli bangabi nakuqwalasela ebusweni bukaMoses, ngenxa yobuqaqawuli bobuso bakhe, ubuqaqawuli ke obebuza kubhanga:
47_3_8_lungathini na ulungiselelo lwakhe uMoya, ukungabi nobuqaqawuli ngokugqithiseleyo?
47_3_9_Kuba, ukuba ulungiselelo olugwebayo lunobuqaqawuli,  kokukhona luya kugqithisela ngobuqaqawuli ulungiselelo lobulungisa.
47_3_10_Kuba kwanoko kwenziwe kwaba nobuqaqawuli, akwenziwanga kwaba nobuqaqawuli ngale ndawo, ngenxa ke yobuqaqawuli obu bona bubalaselayo.
47_3_11_Kuba xa oko bekuza kubhanga kunobuqaqawuli, kokukhona oku kuhleliyo kunobuqaqawuli.
47_3_12_Sinethemba elinjalo nje ke ngoko, kokukhona singafihlisiyo ukuthetha;
47_3_13_singaxelisi uMoses, yena wabeka isigqubuthelo ebusweni bakhe, ukuze oonyana bakaSirayeli bangaqwalaseli esiphelweni soko bekuza kubhanga.
47_3_14_Zesuka noko zaqaqadekiswa iingqiqo zabo; kuba nanamhla sisahleli kwaeso sigqubuthelo ekulesweni kwawo umnqophiso omdala, singabhenqwanga, nto leyo ke ibhangayo kuKristu.
47_3_15_Kusuke kwada kwaba namhlanje, kusithi, xenikweni kuleswa uMoses, kusuke kubekho isigqubuthelo entliziyweni yabo.
47_3_16_Ke xenikweni ithe ke yona yabuyela eNkosini sosuswa kuphele isigqubuthelo eso.
47_3_17_INkosi ke inguye uMoya; apho ke akhoyo uMoya weNkosi,  kubakho inkululeko.
47_3_18_Thina ke sonke, sinobuso nje obubhenqwe isigqubuthelo,  sibukhangela njengokwasesipilini ubuqaqawuli beNkosi, senziwa similise okwaloo mfanekiselo, sivela ebuqaqawulini sisinge ebuqaqawulini, kwanjengokuvela eNkosini enguMoya.
47_4_1_Ngenxa yoko, sinalo nje olu lungiselelo, sithi, njengoko senzelwe inceba, singethi mandla;
47_4_2_sisuke sazilahla izinto ezifihlakeleyo eziziintloni,  singahambi ngobuqhetseba, singalikhohlakalisi ilizwi likaThixo;  sisuka ngokuyibonakalalisa inyaniso siziyaleze kuso sonke isazela sabantu emehlweni kaThixo.
47_4_3_Ukuba ke zigqutyuthelwe iindaba ezilungileyo zethu,  zigqutyuthelwe kwabo batshabalalayo;
47_4_4_athe uthixo weli phakade wazimfamekisa ngaphakathi kwabo iingqiqo zabangakholwayo, ukuze singabengezeli kubo isikhanyiso seendaba ezilungileyo zobuqaqawuli bukaKristu, ongumfanekiselo kaThixo.
47_4_5_Kuba asizivakalisi thina, sivakalisa uKristu Yesu ukuba uyiNkosi; sibe ke thina sizivakalisa ukuba singabakhonzi benu ngenxa kaYesu.
47_4_6_Ngokuba nguThixo, yena wathi ukhanyiso malukhanye ebumnyameni, okhanyisele iintliziyo zethu, ukuze kukhanye ukwaziwa kobuqaqawuli bukaThixo ebusweni bukaYesu Kristu.
47_4_7_Ke kaloku obu butyebi sibuphethe ngezitya zodongwe, ukuze incamisa yamandla ibe yekaThixo, ingaphumi kuthi.
47_4_8_Siyabandezelwa ngeenxa zonke, singaxineki; siyathingaza,  singancami; sitshutshiswa, asiyekelwa;
47_4_9_sikhahlelwa phantsi, asitshatyalaliswa;
47_4_10_sihlala sikuthwele ngomzimba ukufa kweNkosi uYesu ukuze nobomi bukaYesu bubonakalaliselwe emzimbeni wethu.
47_4_11_Kuba thina badla ubomi simana sinikelwa ekufeni ngenxa kaYesu, ukuze nobomi bukaYesu bubonakalaliselwe enyameni yethu enokufa.
47_4_12_Ngoko ke kusebenza ukufa kuthi, ke kuni kusebenza ubomi.
47_4_13_Sinawo nje ke kwaloo moya wokholo, ngokoko kubhaliweyo kwathiwa, Ndakholwa, kungoko ndathethayo: nathi ke siyakholwa,  kungoko sithethayo nokuthetha;
47_4_14_sisazi ukuba lowo wayivusayo iNkosi uYesu, uya kusivusa nathi ngoYesu, asimise phambi kwakhe, ndawonye nani.
47_4_15_Kuba konke oko kungenxa yenu, ukuze luthi ubabalo, lwakuba lwandile ngabona baninzi, luwuphuphumise umbulelo, use ekuzukiseni uThixo.
47_4_16_Kungoko singethi mandla; kuba nokuba umntu wethu wangaphandle uya esonakala, usuka yena owangaphakathi aye ehlaziyeka imihla ngemihla.
47_4_17_Kuba ubukhaphukhaphu bembandezelo yethu eyeyomzuzwana busisebenzela ngokuncamise kwaphela ubuqaqawuli obukhulukazi obungunaphakade
47_4_18_sakubon ukuba asixuneli ezintweni ezibonwayo, sixunela kwezingabonwayo. Kuba ezibonwayo zezomzuzwana, ke zona ezingabonwayo zezonaphakade.
47_5_1_Kuba siyazi ukuba, xa ithe yachithwa indlu yethu esemhlabeni, engulo mnquba, sinesakhiwo esiphuma kuThixo, indlu yona emazulwini, engenakwenziwa ngazandla, engunaphakade.
47_5_2_Kuba kulo siyancwina, silangazelela ukwambatha, saleke indlu yethu yasemazulwini;
47_5_3_ukuba siya kufunyanwa sambethe okunene, singeze.
47_5_4_Kuba kwathina aba bakulo mnquba siyancwina sisindwa,  kungengakuba sithanda ukuhlutywa; kungokuba sithanda ukwambathiswa saleke, ukuze okunokufa kufincwe bubomi.
47_5_5_Ke kaloku lo usisebenzele kwaloo nto nguThixo, osinike nokusinika isinyaniso sakhe uMoya.
47_5_6_Ngoko ke sihlala somelele, sisazi ukuba, sikowethu nje emzimbeni, sikude kowethu eNkosini
47_5_7_(kuba sihamba ngokholo, asihambi ngakubona);
47_5_8_somelele ke, sikholisiwe nokukholiswa kanye kukuba kude nekhaya lethu elisemzimbeni, sibekho kwikhaya lethu eliseNkosini.
47_5_9_Kungoko sizondelela ukuthi, nokuba sisekhaya, nokuba sikude nekhaya, sibe ngabakholekileyo kuyo.
47_5_10_Kuba thina aba sonke simelwe kukuthi sibonakalaliswe phambi kwesihlalo sokugweba sikaKristu, ukuze elowo azuziswe okwenziwe ngomzimba, ngoko akwenzileyo, nokuba kokulungileyo, nokuba kokubi.
47_5_11_Sikwazi njalo ke ukoyikeka kweNkosi, sizamela ukuba beyiseke abantu; sibonakalalisiwe ke kuThixo, ndiyathemba ke ukuba nakuzo izazela zenu sibonakalalisiwe.
47_5_12_Kuba asibuyi siziyaleze kuni; sininika ithuba lokuzingca ngathi; ukuze nibe nalo ilizwi ngakwabo bazingcayo ngobuso,  bengazingci ngantliziyo.
47_5_13_Kuba, nokuba siyageza, kungenxa kaThixo; nokuba sinengqondo ephilileyo, kungenxa yenu.
47_5_14_Kuba lusifingile nje uthando lukaKristu, sigqibe kwelokuthi, ukuba ufele bonke emnye, ngoko bafile bonke abo;
47_5_15_wabafela ke bonke, ukuze abo badla ubomi bangabi sazidlela ubomi, babudlele owafayo wavuka ngenxa yabo.
47_5_16_Ngoko ke thina, sisusela kweli xesha, asisazi namnye ngokwenyama; nokuba ke besimazi uKristu ngokwenyama, kungoku asisamazi ngokwenyama.
47_5_17_Ngoko ke, ukuba ubani ukuKristu, usisidalwa esitsha; izinto ezindala zidlule; bonani ke, zisuke zaba ntsha izinto zonke zakhe.
47_5_18_Zonke izinto ke ziphuma kuThixo, owasixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ngoYesu Kristu, wasinika ulungiselelo loxolelaniso;
47_5_19_olu ke lokokuba uThixo waye ekuKristu, elixolelanisa naye ngokwakhe ihlabathi, engazibaleli kubo iziphoso zabo, walimisa kuthi ilizwi loxolelaniso.
47_5_20_Sizizigidimi ke ngoko ngenxa kaKristu, ngokungathi uThixo uniyala ngathi; siyanikhunga ngenxa kaKristu, manixolelaniswe naye uThixo;
47_5_21_kuba lowo ungazani nasono, wamenza isono ngenxa yethu,  ukuze thina sibe bubulungisa bukaThixo kuye.
47_6_1_Sisebenzisana naye nje ke, siyaniyala, ukuba ubabalo lukaThixo ningafumane nilwamkele;
47_6_2_kuba uthi, Ndakuva ngexesha elamkelekileyo, Ndakusiza ngomhla wosindiso. Yabonani, lingoku ixesha elamkeleke kakuhle;  yabonani, ungoku umhla wosindiso:
47_6_3_kungabikho namnye esimmisela isikhubekiso, nokuba kukuwuphi na umcimbi, ukuze ulungiselelo lwethu lungabi nakubekwa bala;
47_6_4_sisuka sithi emicimbini yonke siziqondakalise ngokwabalungiseleli bakaThixo, ngokunyamezela okukhulu,  sisezimbandezelweni, sisezingxakekweni, sisezingxinanweni,
47_6_5_sinemivumbo, sisezintolongweni, siseziphithiphithini,  sibulaleka, singalali, sizila ukudla,
47_6_6_sinobunyulu, sinokwazi, sinokuzeka kade umsindo, sinobubele,  sinoMoya oyiNgcwele, sinothando olungahanahanisiyo,
47_6_7_sinelizwi lenyaniso, sinamandla kaThixo, sineentonga zobulungisa zasekunene nezasekhohlo,
47_6_8_sikuzuko nakwintswela-mbeko, sikudumo olubi nakudumo oluhle;
47_6_9_ngathi singabalahlekisi, ukanti singabenyaniso; ngathi singabangaziwayo, ukanti singabaziwayo; ngathi singabafileyo,  nanku Sisidla ubomi; ngathi singababethwayo, singabulawa noko;
47_6_10_ngathi sibuhlungu, ukanti singabahlala bevuya; ngathi singamahlwempu, ukanti singabatyebisa abaninzi ke; ngathi singabangenanto, ukanti singabahlala benezinto zonke.
47_6_11_Umlomo wethu uvulekile kuni, baseKorinte; intliziyo yethu yenziwe yabanzi.
47_6_12_Anixinene kuthi, nixinene ezimfesaneni zenu.
47_6_13_Umbuyekezo ke onjalo (ndithetha njengakubantwana bam),  ndithi yibani banzi nani.
47_6_14_Musani ukunxulumana nabolunye uhlobo, abangakholwayo ke;  kuba kunakwabelana kuni na ubulungisa nokuchasa umthetho?  Kunabudlelane buni na ke ukukhanya nobumnyama?
47_6_15_Unakuvumelana kuni na ke uKristu noBheliyali?  Unasahlulelwano sini na okholwayo nongakholwayo?
47_6_16_Inakudibana kuni na ke itempile kaThixo nezithixo? Kuba nina niyitempile kaThixo ophilileyo; njengokuba watshoyo uThixo ukuthi, Ndiya kuhlala phakathi kwabo, ndihambe phakathi kwabo;  ndibe nguThixo wabo, babe ngabantu bam bona.
47_6_17_Kungoko ndithi, Phumani phakathi kwabo, nizahlule, itsho iNkosi, Nento engcolileyo ningayichukumisi; Ndandiya kunamkela,
47_6_18_Ndibe nguyihlo, Nina nibe ngoonyana neentombi kum; Itsho iNkosi uSomandla.
47_7_1_Sinawo nje ngoko la madinga, zintanda, masizihlambulule kuko konke ukudyobheka kwenyama nokomoya sibufeza ubungcwele,  sisoyika uThixo.
47_7_2_Samkeleni ngeentliziyo zenu; asonanga mntu, asonakalisanga mntu, asiphanganga mntu.
47_7_3_Anditsho ngakunigweba; kuba sendithe ngaphambili,  nisezintliziyweni zethu ukuba sife nani, sidle ubomi nani.
47_7_4_Ndinokungafihlisi okukhulu kuni, ndizingca kakhulu ngani;  ndizele yintuthuzelo, ndiphuphuma uvuyo kakhulu kuyo yonke imbandezelo yethu.
47_7_5_Kuba sithe sakufika kwelaseMakedoni, ayaba nakuphumla nakanye inyama yethu; sabandezelwa ngeenxa zonke, ngaphandle ikukulwa, ngaphakathi ikukoyika.
47_7_6_Ke lowo ubathuthuzelayo abathobekileyo, uThixo ke,  wasithuthuzela ngokufika kukaTito;
47_7_7_akwaba ngakufika kwakhe ke kuphela, kwaba ngayo intuthuzelo awathuthuzeleka ngayo kuni, esityela ulangazelelo lwenu,  isijwili senu, nokundizondelela kwenu, ngokokude ndivuye ngakumbi.
47_7_8_Kuba nakuba ndikhe ndanenza nabuhlungu ngencwadi leyo,  andizohlwayi, nakuba ndikhe ndazohlwaya; kuba ndiyabona ukuba loo ncwadi yanenza buhlungu, nakuba kwaba ngumzuzwana.
47_7_9_Ngoku ke ndiyavuya, ndingavuyeli kuba neenziwa buhlungu,  ndivuyela ukuba nenziwa buhlungu ngokwasinga enguqukweni; kuba nenziwa buhlungu ngokokukaThixo, ukuze ningalahlekwa nto ngathi.
47_7_10_Kuba ubuhlungu obungokukaThixo busebenza inguquko esingisa elusindisweni, ekungekho kuzohlwaya ngayo; ke kona okwehlabathi ukuba buhlungu kusebenza ukufa.
47_7_11_Kuba, yabonani, kwaoko kwenziwa kwenu buhlungu ngokukaThixo, kwanisebenzela ukunyameka okungakanana; nasuka naziphendulela, nasuka nacaphuka, nasuka noyika, nasuka nalangazelela, nasuka nazondelela, nasuka naphindezela!  Ngeendawo zonke niziqondakalisile, ukuba kulo mcimbi nimsulwa nina okwenu.
47_7_12_Ngoko ke, noko ndanibhalelayo, andikwenzanga oko ngenxa yalowo wamonayo omnye, kanjalo andikwenzanga ngenxa yalowo woniwayo; ndakwenzela ukuze kubonakalaliswe kuni ukuninyamekela kwethu emehlweni kaThixo.
47_7_13_Ngenxa yoko, sithuthuzelekile ngenxa yokuthuthuzeleka kwenu; sakuvuyela ke ngokugqithiseleyo ngakumbi ukuvuya kukaTito; ngokuba waphunyuzwayo umoya wakhe nini nonke.
47_7_14_Ngokuba ukuqhayisa endaqhayisa ngako ngani, andidaniswanga ngako; njengokuba sazithetha kuni izinto zonke sinyanisile,  ngokunjalo nokuqhayisa kwethu oko phambi koTito kwaba yinyaniso.
47_7_15_Imfesane yakhe isenkulu ngakuni ngokugqithiseleyo,  akukhumbula ukumva kwenu nonke nokokuba namamkelayo ninokoyika nokugubha.
47_7_16_Ndiyavuya ngoko, kuba ndomelezekile kuni ezintweni zonke.
47_8_1_Ke kaloku, bazalwana, siyanazisa ubabalo lukaThixo oluhlakaziweyo phakathi kwamabandla akwelaseMakedoni;
47_8_2_okokuba ekucikidweni kwawo okukhulu yimbandezelo, kuthe ukuphuphuma kovuyo lwawo, nobuhlwempu bawo obendeleyo,  kwaphuphumela ekutyebiseni ukunyanisa kwawo.
47_8_3_Ngokuba ndiyangqina ukuba bathe, ngokwamandla abo, ewe nangaphezu kwamandla, banikela ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo,
47_8_4_besikhunga, besibongoza kakhulu, ukuba silwamkele ubabalo olo, ubudlelane ke obo bokulungiselela abangcwele.
47_8_5_Abanelanga kwenza njengoko sathemba ngako; bathi kuqala bazinikela eNkosini, baza kamva bazinikela nakuthi ngokuthanda kukaThixo;
47_8_6_ngokokude simyale uTito, ukuze athi, njengokuba ebeqalile,  alufezele kuni ngokunjalo nolo lubabalo.
47_8_7_Ke, kwanjengokuba niphuphuma iinto zonke, ukholo,  nokuthetha, nokwazi, nokunyameka konke, nokusithanda kwenu,  maniphuphume nakulo olu lubabalo.
47_8_8_Anditsho ngakwammiselo; ukutsho, ndenziwa kukunyameka kwabanye, ndicikida nenyaniso yolwenu uthando;
47_8_9_kuba niyalwazi ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, okokuba yathi, ibisisityebi nje, yaba lihlwempu ngenxa yenu, ukuze nina nibe zizityebi ngobuhlwempu bayo obo.
47_8_10_Ngale ndawo ke ndinipha okwam ukubona; kuba oko kunilungele nina aba nayiqalayo kwanyakenye le nto; ananela kuyenza,  nayithanda nokuyithanda.
47_8_11_Ngoku ke yenzeni niyifeze loo nto, ukuze, kwanjengokuba bekukho intumekelelo yokuthanda, kwangokunjalo kubekho nokuyifeza ngeninako.
47_8_12_Kuba intumekelelo, ukuba selikho, yamkeleka kakuhle ngokoko asukuba enako umntu, kungabi ngokoko angenako.
47_8_13_Kuba andithi mabaphumle abanye, nibandezeleke nina;
47_8_14_ndithi, ukuze kubekho ukulingana ngexesha lakalokunje,  ukuphuphuma kwenu makufikelele ekusileleni kwabo; ukuze nokuphuphuma kwabo kufikelele ekusileleni kwenu, ukuze ke kubekho ukulingana;
47_8_15_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Owabutha kakhulu akabanga nakusalelayo; nowabutha kancinane akabanga nakusilela.
47_8_16_Makubulelwe ke kuThixo, ongenise kwaoko kuninyamekela entliziyweni kaTito.
47_8_17_Ngokuba wasamkela okunene isiyalo; ke uthe, enyameke okunye, waphuma ngokuqhutywa yintliziyo, waya kuni.
47_8_18_Sathuma ke kunye naye umzalwana odume phakathi kwawo onke amabandla, ngokuvakalisa iindaba ezilungileyo.
47_8_19_Asikuphela ke oko; wanyulwa nokunyulwa ngawo amabandla,  ukuba abe ngohamba nathi, nalo olu lubabalo lulungiselelwayo sithi, ukuze izukiswe iNkosi, nibe nokuthumekelela nina:
47_8_20_silumkele oku, ukuba kungabikho mntu usibeka bala kule nyambalala yeminikelo ilungiselelwayo sithi;
47_8_21_sikhathalele izinto ezintle, kungekhona emehlweni eNkosi yodwa, kukwanasemehlweni abantu.
47_8_22_Sithume ke kunye nabo umzalwana wethu, esimcikide futhi ngeendawo ezininzi, samfumana ekhuthele; kokukhona akhuthele kakhulu, ekholose kakhulu ngani.
47_8_23_Nokuba kuthethwa ntoni ngoTito, yazini ukuba ulidlelane nam, nomsebenzisi wam kuni; nokuba kuthethwa ngabazalwana bethu, yazini ukuba bangabathunywa bamabandla kaThixo, baluzuko lukaKristu.
47_8_24_Lo mbonakalaliso ngoko wothando lwenu, nowokuzingca kwethu ngani, wubonakalaliseni kubo, naphambi kwamabandla.
47_9_1_Kuba okunene ngako ukulungiselela abangcwele, akufuneki kona ukuba ndinibhalele.
47_9_2_Kuba ndiyakwazi ukuthumekelela kwenu, endiqhayisa ngako ngani kwabelaseMakedoni, ndisithi elaseAkaya beliselilunge kwanyakenye; nokuzondelela kwenu kwaxhokonxa abona baninzi.
47_9_3_Ke kaloku ndithume abazalwana, ukuze iqhayiya lethu elingani lingalanjathiswa ngale ndawo; ukuze nithi, njengokuba benditshilo, nibe senilungile;
47_9_4_hleze kuthi, ukuba bathe bafika nam abelaseMakedoni,  banifumana ningekalungi, sidaniswe thina (ukuba asingethi,  kudane nina) koko kukholosa kokuqhayisa.
47_9_5_Ngoko ndaba kuyafuneka ukubavuselela abazalwana, ukuba basandulele ukuya kuni, bayilungise ngaphambili intsikelelo yenu ebiselixeliwe ngaphambili; ilunge yona ngohlobo lwentsikelelo, ingangi yeyokuvimba.
47_9_6_Qondani ke le nto: Lowo uhlwayela ngokuvimba wovuna kwangokuvimba; nalowo uhlwayela ngesisa wovuna kwangesisa.
47_9_7_Elowo makanike njengoko agqibe ngako entliziyweni; makungabi kokuphuma kabuhlungu, nangokunyanzelwa; kuba uThixo uthanda umphi ochwayithileyo.
47_9_8_Unako ke uThixo ukuphuphumisela kuni ubabalo lonke, ukuze nithi, nihlala ninako nje ukwanela konke ngeendawo zonke,  niphuphumele emsebenzini wonke olungileyo;
47_9_9_njengokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Wasasaza, wapha abasweleyo;  Ubulungisa bakhe buhleli ngonaphakade.
47_9_10_Wanga ke angathi, ompha imbewu umhlwayeli, nesonka sokudliwa, aniphe ayandise imbewu yenu, ahlumise isiqhamo sobulungisa benu;
47_9_11_nithi ngeendawo zonke nityetyiselwe ekunyaniseni konke,  kona kusebenzayo ngathi umbulelo kuThixo.
47_9_12_Ngokuba ulungiselelo lwalo mbuso alwaneli kuzalisela iintsilelo zabangcwele; lusuka kananjalo luphuphume imibulelo emininzi kuye uThixo;
47_9_13_besithi nje, ngako ukucikideka kolo lulungiselelo,  bamzukise uThixo ngenxa yokulululamela kwenu uvumo lwenu ngokusingisele kwiindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, nangenxa yokunyanisa kokudlelana kwenu ngokusingisele kubo nakubantu bonke;
47_9_14_bakubon ukuba nabo bayanilangazelela, benikhungela ngenxa yobabalo lukaThixo oluncamisileyo kuni aba.
47_9_15_Makubulelwe ke kuThixo ngenxa yesipho sakhe singenambali.
47_10_1_Ke kaloku ndiyaniyala ngabo ubulali nokuthantamisa kukaKristu, mna Pawulos ngokwam, ndingothobekileyo kambe ngembonakalo, xa ndiphakathi kwenu, kodwa ndakuba ndingekho ndiba nobugagu kuni:
47_10_2_ndiyakhunga ke, ukuze ndingathi, ndakuba ndikho, ndibe nobugagu ngoko kukholosa, ndiba ndoba nobuganga ngako kubo abathile, ababa sihamba ngokwenyama.
47_10_3_Kuba noko sihamba sisenyameni, asiphumi mkhosi ngokwenyama;
47_10_4_kuba zona iintonga esiphuma ngazo umkhosi, azizezenyama;  kuye uThixo zinamandla okuwisa iinqaba;
47_10_5_siwisa ngazo nje amabhongo, nayo yonke into ephakamileyo,  eziphakamisayo ngokuchasa ukwazi uThixo; iingqiqo zonke sizithimbela ekumlulameleni uKristu;
47_10_6_sizilungisele ukuphindezela konke ukungamlulameli, xa kuthe kwazaliseka okwenu ukumlulamela.
47_10_7_Izinto nizikhangela ngokwembonakalo na? Ukuba umntu ukholose ngokuthi ungokaKristu, makabuye acinge oku ngokwakhe,  ukuba njengokuba engokaKristu yena, ngokunjalo singabakaKristu nathi.
47_10_8_Kuba, naxa bendingathi ndigqithisele ukuqhayisa ngalo igunya lethu, esalinikwayo yiNkosi ukuba sinakhe,  singanichithi, bendingedaniyo;
47_10_9_nditsho ukuze ndingangi ndifuna ukunoyikisa ngazo iincwadi ezi;
47_10_10_ngokuba kuthiwa, Iincwadi ezi zakhe okunene zinzima,  zinamandla; kodwa ke akubakho ngenkqu akanamandla, nokuthetha kwakhe akunto yanto.
47_10_11_Onjalo ke makacinge le nto: njengoko sinjalo ngako ukuthetha ngeencwadi, sakuba singekho, sikwanjalo ngawo umsebenzi, sakuba sikho.
47_10_12_Kuba asinabuganga bakuzibalela nakuzifanisa nabo abathile abaziyalezayo; bona abanangqondo, bezilinganisela nje kwakubo ngokwabo, bezifanisa nje nabo ngokwabo.
47_10_13_Ke thina asisayi kuqhayisa sigqithise emlinganiselweni;  soqhayisa ngokomlingani selo womda esiwabelwe nguThixo, ukuba ube ngumlinganiselo oya kufikelela nakuni.
47_10_14_Kuba asizoluli ngokugqithiseleyo, ngathi asifikeleli kuni;  kuba sesafikelelayo nakuni sineendaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu.
47_10_15_Asiqhayisi sigqithise emlinganiselweni ngokubulaleka kwabanye; ke sinethemba, ukuba lwakukhula ukholo lwenu, siya kwenziwa bakhulu phakathi kwenu ngokomda wethu, sigqithisele,
47_10_16_side sizishumayele iindaba ezilungileyo ezindaweni ezingaphaya kwenu; singaqhayisi ngesilinganiselo somnye,  ngezinto ke esezilungisiwe.
47_10_17_Oqhayisayo ke, makaqhayise ngeNkosi.
47_10_18_Kuba oyena ucikidekileyo asingoziyalezayo, ngoyalezwa yiNkosi.
47_11_1_Akwaba ningandi nyamezela kancinane ekusweleni kuqonda kwam! Kodwa noko niyandinyamezela.
47_11_2_Kuba ndiyanikhweletela ngekhwele likaThixo; kuba ndanendisa ndodeni-nye, ukuze ndinimise phambi koKristu niyintombi enyulu.
47_11_3_Ndiyoyika ke, hleze kuthi, njengokuba inyoka yamlukuhlayo uEva ngobuqhetseba bayo, zonakaliswe ngokunjalo nani iingqiqo zenu, zimke ekunyaniseni kuye uKristu.
47_11_4_Kuba kaloku, xa lowo uzayo avakalisa omnye uYesu,  esingamvakalisanga thina, nokuba namkela moya wumbi enaningamkelanga wona, nokuba ziindaba ezilungileyo ezizimbi enaningamkelanga zona, beningaba kambe niyatyapha ukumnyamezela.
47_11_5_Kuba ndiba andisilele nganto kwabona bapostile baziincamisa.
47_11_6_Nakuba ke ndiliyilo ngentetho, andinjalo ngokwazi;  sabonakala kuni phakathi kwabo bonke ngeendawo zonke.
47_11_7_Ndenza isono na ngokuzithoba, ukuze niphakanyiswe nina,  ngokuba ndanishumayezayo ngesisa iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo?
47_11_8_Amanye amabandla kaThixo ndawabhunyula, ndisamkela umvuzo ukuze ndilungiselele nina.
47_11_9_Kanjalo xa ndandikho kuni, ndiswele, andibanga mthwalo mntwini; kuba ukuswela kwam bakwenzelela abazalwana, bakuvela kwelaseMakedoni; ndathi ngeendawo zonke ndazigcina, andaba bunzima kuni, ndisaya kuzigcina nangoku.
47_11_10_Ikum nje inyaniso kaKristu, ndithi olo luqhayiso aluyi kuvingcwa mlomo mayela nam, mna, kwimimandla yelaseAkaya.
47_11_11_Ngani na ke? Ngokuba ndinganithandi na? Hayi, uThixo uyazi.
47_11_12_Endikwenzayo ke ndiya kukwenza, ukuze ndibahluthe ithuba lokujinda abafuna ithuba; ukuze entweni abaqhayisa ngayo,  bafunyanwe bekwanjengathi.
47_11_13_Kuba abo banjalo ngabapostile ababuxoki, ngabasebenzi abakhohlisayo, bezimilisa okwabapostile bakaKristu.
47_11_14_Ke akummangaliso oko, kuba noSathana ngokwakhe uzimilisa okwesithunywa sokukhanya.
47_11_15_Akunto inkulu ke ngoko, ukuba abalungiseleli bakhe bazimilise okwabalungiseleli bobulungisa; abasiphelo siya kuba ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
47_11_16_Ndibuya ndithi, Makungabikho mntu uba ndingoswele ukuqonda; okanye ke kambe, ndamkeleni njengoswele ukuqonda,  ukuze ke ndiqhayise kancinane nam.
47_11_17_Oku ndikuthethayo, andikuthethi ngokweNkosi; ndikuthetha ngokoswele ukuqonda, ndinoko kukholosa koqhayiso.
47_11_18_Ekubeni bebaninzi ke abaqhayisa ngokwenyama, ndoqhayisa nam.
47_11_19_Kuba niyabanyamezela ngovuyo abaswele ukuqonda,  niziingqondi nje nina.
47_11_20_Kuba kaloku niyanyamezela, ukuba umntu unenza amakhoboka,  ukuba umntu uyanidla, ukuba umntu uyanibambisa, ukuba umntu uyaziphakamisa, ukuba umntu uyanibetha ebusweni.
47_11_21_Ndithi, ndizihlaza, ngathi sasiswele amandla thina.  Entweni ke asukuba umntu enobuganga (ndithetha ndinokuswela ukuqonda), ndinobuganga nam.
47_11_22_BangamaHebhere na? Ndinguye nam. BangamaSirayeli na?  Ndinguye nam. Bayimbewu ka-Abraham na? Ndiyiyo nam.
47_11_23_Bangabalungiseleli bakaKristu na? (Ndithetha nxamnye nengqondo.) Ndithi ndingongaphezulu mna, ngokubulaleka okugqithiseleyo, ngemivumbo egqithe emgceni, ngokuba sezintolongweni ngokugqithiseleyo, ngokuba sekufeni futhi.
47_11_24_KumaYuda ndazuza kahlanu imivumbo emashumi mane kwaphuke mnye.
47_11_25_Kukathathu ndibethwa ngeentswazi, okunye ndaxulutywa ngamatye, ndaphukelwa ngumkhombe kathathu, ndenze ubusuku nemini enzulwini;
47_11_26_ndithi ndingongaphezulu ngokuhamba okufuthi, ngeengozi zemilambo, ngeengozi zezihange, ngeengozi zamakowethu,  ngeengozi zeentlanga, ngeengozi phakathi komzi, ngeengozi entlango, ngeengozi elwandle, ngeengozi phakathi kwabazalwana ababuxoki;
47_11_27_ngokubulaleka nangemigu, ngokungabi nakulala okufuthi,  ngokulamba nokunxanwa, ngokuzila ukudla okufuthi, ngengqele nobuze.
47_11_28_Ndingasazibali zona izinto ezingaphandle kwezo,  ndingungelwe imihla ngemihla kukuwaxhalela onke amabandla kaThixo.
47_11_29_Ngubani na okha aswele amandla, ndingasweli mandla nam?  Ngubani na okha akhutyekiswe, ndingatshiseki mna?
47_11_30_Ukuba ndimelwe kukuqhayisa, ndoqhayisa ngezinto zokuswela amandla kwam.
47_11_31_UThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, ongowokubongwa ngonaphakade, uyazi ukuba andixoki.
47_11_32_EDamasko umphathi-luhlanga ka-Areta, ukumkani, wayewulinda umzi waseDamasko, efuna ukundibamba;
47_11_33_ndaza ngekroba ndathotywa ngomnyazi eludongeni, ndasinda ezandleni zakhe.
47_12_1_Ukuqhayisa okunene akundilungele; kuba ndiza kuza kwimibono nezityhilelo zeNkosi.
47_12_2_Ndazi umntu okuKristu, ekusekuyiminyaka elishumi elinamine (nokuba ubesemzimbeni na andazi, nokuba ubengekho na emzimbeni,  andazi; kwaziwa nguThixo), ethe lowo waxwilwa, wada wasiwa nakwelesithathu izulu.
47_12_3_Ndiyamazi ke umntu onjalo (nokuba ubesemzimbeni na, nokuba ubengekho na emzimbeni, andazi; kwaziwa nguThixo),
47_12_4_okokuba waxwilwa wasiwa eParadisi, weva amazwi angenakuthethwa, ekungavumelekileyo ukuba umntu awathethe.
47_12_5_Onjalo ke ndiya kuqhayisa ngaye, kodwa andiyi kuqhayisa ngokwam nganto ikum; ingaba kungokuswela kwam amandla kodwa.
47_12_6_Kuba xa bendingathi ndithande ukuqhayisa, bendingayi kuba ndiswele ukuqonda, kuba bendiya kuba ndithetha inyaniso; kodwa ndiyayeka, ukuze kungabikho bani ucinga ngam ngaphezu koko abona ndikuko, athi mhlawumbi akuve kum.
47_12_7_Kwathi, ukuze ndingaziphakamisi ngokungaphezulu ngenxa yezityhilelo eziyincamisa, ndanikwa uviko enyameni, isithunywa sikaSathana, ukuze sindintlithe, ukuze ndingaziphakamisi ngokungaphezulu.
47_12_8_Ndayibongoza kathathu iNkosi ngaso isithunywa eso, ukuba sisuke kum.
47_12_9_Ithe yona kum, Ubabalo lwam lukwanele; kuba amandla am azalisekiswa ekuswelekeni kwamandla. Ngoko kokukhona sendiya kuqhayisa kamnandi kakhulu ngokuswela kwam amandla, ukuze ahlale phezu kwam amandla kaKristu.
47_12_10_Kungoko ndikholisiweyo kukuswela amandla, kukuphathwa kakubi, ziingxakeko, ziintshutshiso, ziingxinano, ngenxa kaKristu; kuba xa sukuba ndiswele amandla, kuxa ndinamandla.
47_12_11_Sendisuke ndaba ngoswele ukuqonda ngokuqhayisa;  ndinyanzelwe nini. Kuba mna ndibe ndifanele ukuyalezwa nini;  kuba andisilelanga nganto kubapostile abo baziincamisa, nakuba ndingento yanto.
47_12_12_Imiqondiso yokuba ngumpostile, inene, yasetyenzwa phakathi kwenu ngokunyamezela konke, ngemiqondiso, nezimanga,  nemisebenzi yamandla.
47_12_13_Kuba yintoni na enasilela ngayo kwamanye amabandla kaThixo, ingekukuba mna ngokwam ndingabanga mthwalo kuni?  Ndixoleleni oko kungalungisi.
47_12_14_Yabonani, sendilungele ukuza kuni okwesithathu; ndaye ndingayi kuba mthwalo kuni; kuba andifuni zinto zenu, ndifuna nina. Kuba asingabantwana abafanele ukuqwebela abazali,  ngabazali abafanele ukuqwebela abantwana.
47_12_15_Mna ke, kuya kuba mnandi kakhulu ukuba ndichithe, ndidleke kuphele, ngenxa yemiphefumlo yenu; nakuba okukhona ndinithandayo kakhulu, kokukhona ndithandwa kancinane.
47_12_16_Kungade kube kunjalo, mna kambe andibanga mthwalo kuni;  mandibe, ndinobuqhetseba nje, ndisuke ndanibambisa ngenkohliso.
47_12_17_Kukho mntu na ke kwabo ndabathumayo kuni, endanidlayo ngaye?
47_12_18_Ndamyala uTito, ndathuma umzalwana lowo kunye naye.  Wanidla na ke uTito? Asihambanga moyeni mnye, yini na?  Asihambanga mkhondo mnye, yini na?
47_12_19_Niyawaseniba siyaziphendulela kusini na kuni? Sithetha phambi kukaThixo, sikuKristu; sizithetha zonke ke izinto ezo,  zintanda, ngenxa yokwakheka kwenu.
47_12_20_Kuba ndiyoyika, hleze ndithi ndakufika, ndinifumane ningenjengendikuthandayo, nam ndifunyanwe nini ndingenjengenikuthandayo; hleze kubekho iinkani, amakhwele,  imisindo, amayelenqe, iintlebendwane, iintsebezo, iinkukhumalo,  iziphithiphithi;
47_12_21_hleze ndithi, ndakufika kunjalo, andithobe uThixo wam phakathi kwenu, ndize ndikhedame ngenxa yabaninzi ababesebonile, abaguquka ekungcoleni, nasembulweni,  naseburheletyweni ababenzayo.
47_13_1_Oku kokwesithathu ndisiza kuni. Onke amazwi aya kumiswa ngomlomo wamangqina amabini, nokuba mathathu.
47_13_2_Sendixele kade, ndixela ngenxa engaphambili, njengoko ndandikho okwesibini, nanjengoku ndingekhoyo ngoku, ndibaxelela abo bone kade, nabanye bonke, okokuba xa ndithe ndabuya ndafika, andiyi kubaconga;
47_13_3_ekubeni nifuna isiganeko sokuthetha kukaKristu phakathi kwam, ongaswele amandla ngokusingisele kuni, onamandla phakathi kwenu.
47_13_4_Kuba, nakuba wabethelelwayo emnqamlezweni ngokwasekusweleni amandla, udla ubomi ngokwasemandleni kaThixo. Kuba nathi siswele amandla kuye, noko siya kudla ubomi naye ngokwasemandleni kaThixo, ngokubhekisele kuni.
47_13_5_Zilingeni, ukuba niselukholweni olu na; zicikideni ngokwenu. Okanye anizazi na ukuba uYesu Kristu ungaphakathi kwenu? ukuba okunene aningabo abo bangenakucikideka.
47_13_6_Ndiyathemba ke ukuba niyakwazi, ukuba asingabo abo bangenakucikideka thina.
47_13_7_Ndithandaza ke kuye uThixo, ukuba ningenzi nanye into embi;  kungekuko ukuze sibonakale sicikidekile thina, ikukuze nenze into entle nina, ke thina sibe njengabangenakucikideka.
47_13_8_Kuba asinakwenza nto ngokuchasa inyaniso; sinokwenzela inyaniso.
47_13_9_Kuba siyavuya, xa sukuba singenamandla thina, nibe nina ninamandla; sithandazela nokuthandazela oku ke, ukuba nigqibelele ukulunga.
47_13_10_Ngenxa yoko ndibhala ezi zinto ndingekho, ukuze ndingathi,  ndakuba ndikho, ndenze kabukhali ngokwegunya, endalinikwa yiNkosi ukuba libe lelokwakha, lingabi lelokuchitha.
47_13_11_Elokugqiba, bazalwana, ndithi, Vuyani, zilungiseni nigqibelele, thuthuzelekani, cingani nto-nye, zolani; wothi ke uThixo wothando noxolo abe nani.
47_13_12_Bulisanani ngolwango olungcwele.
47_13_13_Bayanibulisa bonke abangcwele aba.
47_13_14_Ubabalo lweNkosi uYesu Kristu, nothando lukaThixo,  nodlelano loMoya oyiNgcwele, malube nani nonke. Amen.
48_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile (ongavele bantwini, kanjalo kungengamntu; kungaye uYesu Kristu, noThixo uYise, owamvusayo kwabafileyo),
48_1_2_kwanabazalwana aba bonke banam, uthi kuwo amabandla kaThixo akwelaseGalati:
48_1_3_Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
48_1_4_owazinikelayo ngenxa yezono zethu, ukuze asinyothule kwiphakade eli langoku lingendawo, ngokokuthanda kukaThixo uBawo wethu.
48_1_5_Kuye makubekho uzuko, kude kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.  Amen.
48_1_6_Ndimangalisiwe kukuba niphambuke kamsinya kangaka kulowo wanibizayo ngobabalo lukaKristu, niye kwiindaba ezilungileyo ezizimbi;
48_1_7_ezingezizo nokuba zizo ezinye; koko kukho bathile banikhathazayo, bathandayo ukuzigqwetha iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu.
48_1_8_Ke, nokokuba sisuke thina aba, nokokuba sisuke isithunywa sasezulwini sanishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo ezinxamnye nezo sanishumayezayo, masisingelwe phantsi.
48_1_9_Njengokuba besesitshilo, ndiyaphinda, ndithi nangoku, Ukuba ubani unishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo ezinxamnye nezo nazamkelayo, makasingelwe phantsi.
48_1_10_Kuba ngoku ndithomalalisa abantu, ndithomalalisa uThixo,  kusini na? Ndifuna ukukholisa abantu na? Ukuba ndingaba ndisakholisa abantu, ndingaba andingumkhonzi kaKristu.
48_1_11_Ke kaloku, ndiyanazisa, bazalwana, ukuba azingokomntu iindaba ezilungileyo ezi, zashunyayelwayo ndim;
48_1_12_kuba nam lo andizamkelanga mntwini, andizifundiswanga nokuzifundiswa; ndazamkela ngokutyhilelwa nguYesu Kristu.
48_1_13_Kuba nayiva eyam ihambo eyayifudula isebuYudeni, ukuba ndaye ndilitshutshisa ndilibhuqa ibandla likaThixo ngokuncamisileyo;
48_1_14_ndaye ndihambela phambili ebuYudeni, ngaphezu kwabaninzi ababeziintanga zam eluhlangeni lwakowethu, ndizizondelele ngokugqithiseleyo izithethe zoomawokhulu.
48_1_15_Ke, xenikweni kwakholekayo kuThixo, owandahlulayo kwasesizalweni sikama, wandibiza ngalo ubabalo lwakhe,
48_1_16_ukuba amtyhile uNyana wakhe ngaphakathi kwam, ukuze ndimshumayele ngeendaba ezilungileyo phakathi kweentlanga:  kwaoko andibhekisanga nto kwinyama negazi.
48_1_17_Andinyukanga nokunyuka ndiye eYerusalem, kubo ababengabapostile ngaphambi kwam; ndesuka ndaya kwelaseArabhi,  ndaza ndabuyela eDamasko.
48_1_18_Ndandula ndathi, emva kweminyaka emithathu, ndenyuka ndaya eYerusalem, ukuba ndazane noPetros; ndahlala naye iintsuku ezilishumi elinantlanu.
48_1_19_Andibonanga wumbi ke kubapostile, yaba nguYakobi, umzalwana weNkosi, yedwa.
48_1_20_Izinto ke endinibhalela zona, yabonani, ndithetha emehlweni kaThixo, andixoki.
48_1_21_Emva koko ndeza kwimimandla yelaseSiriya nelaseKilikiya;
48_1_22_ndaye ke ndingaziwa ngesiqu ngawo amabandla akwelamaYuda,  akuKristu;
48_1_23_banela ukuva kwakuphela ukuba, Lowo wayefudula esitshutshisa, ngoku ushumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zokholo abefudula elubhuqa.
48_1_24_Bamzukisa uThixo ngam.
48_2_1_Ndaza emva kweminyaka elishumi elinamine, ndabuya ndenyuka ndaya eYerusalem ndinoBharnabhas, ndathabatha noTito.
48_2_2_Ndenyuka ke ngokwesityhilelo, ndazandlala phambi kwabo iindaba ezilungileyo endizivakalisayo phakathi kweentlanga;  ndazandlala ke phambi kwabo badumileyo bebodwa, hleze ndibe ndifumana ndibaleka, mhlawumbi ndibe ndafumana ndabaleka.
48_2_3_NoTito lo, ubenam, nangona ebengumGrike, akanyanzelwanga ukuba aluke:
48_2_4_ngenxa ke yabazalwana ababuxoki, abangeniswayo bucala, bona bangena ngokunyebeleza, besiza kuhlola inkululeko yethu esinayo kuKristu Yesu, ukuze basithobele ebukhobokeni.
48_2_5_Esathi abo asabavumela ngolulamo nokwexa elinye, ukuze inyaniso yeendaba ezilungileyo ihlale ihleli kuni.
48_2_6_Ke aba badumele ukuba bayinto, nokuba babefudula benjani,  akunto oko kum; uThixo akakhethi buso bamntu. Kuba aba babedume ngobunto ababhekisanga nto kum.
48_2_7_Basuka bathi kanye, bakubona ukuba ndiziphathisiwe iindaba ezilungileyo kwabangalukileyo, njengokuba uPetros ebeziphathisiwe kwabolwaluko
48_2_8_(kuba kwalowo wamsebenzelayo uPetros ngokusingisele kubo ubupostile babolwaluko, wandisebenzela nam ngokusingisele kwiintlanga);
48_2_9_kananjalo bakulwazi ubabalo endababalwa ngalo: bathi ooYakobi noKefas noYohane, abo ke babedume ukuba baziintsika,  basinika thina noBharnabhas izandla zokunene zobudlelane, ukuze siye thina kwiintlanga; bona ke baye kwabolwaluko;
48_2_10_bathi, maze siwakhumbule amahlwempu; into ke leyo endandiyikhuthalela ukuyenza.
48_2_11_Ke kaloku, xenikweni uPetros wafikayo kwa-Antiyokwe,  ndamelana naye ngokusekuhleni, ngokuba ube engogwetyiweyo.
48_2_12_Kuba phambi kokuba kufike abathile bevela kuYakobi, wadla ndawonye nabeentlanga; ke wathi bakufika, wesuka wanqwanqwa,  wazahlula kubo, esoyika abo bolwaluko.
48_2_13_Ke ahanahanisa njengaye namanye amaYuda; wada noBharnabhas wakhukuliswa luhanahaniso lwawo.
48_2_14_Xenikweni ke ndabonayo ukuba abathe ngqo ukuhamba enyanisweni yeendaba ezilungileyo, ndathi kuPetros phambi kwabo bonke, Ukuba wena, ungumYuda nje, uhleli ngokwabeentlanga,  ungahlali ngokobuYuda, yini na ukuba ubanyanzele abeentlanga ukuba bahlale ngokobuYuda?
48_2_15_Thina, singamaYuda ngemvelo, asingaboni abavela kwiintlanga,
48_2_16_sisazi nje ukuba akagwetyelwa umntu ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, kuphela kungokukholwa kuYesu Kristu: sithe ke nathi aba sakholwa kuKristu Yesu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwasekukholweni kuKristu, kungabi ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho; ngokokuba akuyi kugwetyelwa mntu ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho.
48_2_17_Ke ukuba, sifuna nje ukugwetyelwa ngoKristu, sifunyanwa singaboni nathi ngokwethu, ndiyabuza ndithi, uKristu ungumlungiseleli wesono na ke ngoko? Nakanye!
48_2_18_Kuba, ukuba izinto endazichithayo, ndibuya ndakhe zona,  ndiyaziqondakalisa ngokwam ukuba ndingumgqithi.
48_2_19_Kuba mna ngomthetho ndafa kumthetho, ukuze ubomi ndibudlele kuThixo.
48_2_20_Ndibethelelwe emnqamlezweni noKristu; ayisendim ke odla ubomi, nguKristu ke oselesidla ubomi kum. Ubomi ke endibudlayo ngoku, ndisenyameni, ndibudlela ekukholweni kuNyana kaThixo,  owandithandayo, wazinikela ngenxa yam.
48_2_21_Andilutshitshisi ubabalo lukaThixo; kuba, ukuba bungomthetho ubulungisa, oko uKristu angaba wafumana wafa.
48_3_1_Ehlani, maGalati aswele ukuqonda! Ngubani na oninyangileyo,  ukuba ningayithambeli nje inyaniso, ebethe nje phambi kwamehlo enu uYesu Kristu wabhalwa, wabhegezwa phakathi kwenu,  ebethelelwe emnqamlezweni?
48_3_2_Ndithanda ukukha ndiqonde kuni le ndawo yodwa: Namamkela uMoya emisebenzini yomthetho, namamkela ezindabeni zokholo,  kusini na?
48_3_3_Ninje na ukuswela ukuqonda? Nakuba niqale kuMoya, ngoku nigqibela kwinyama na?
48_3_4_Izinto ezinzima kangaka nafumana naziva na? ukuba kanti benifumana nisenza.
48_3_5_Lowo ngoko uniphayo uMoya, usebenza imisebenzi yamandla kuni, ukwenza oko ngokwasemisebenzini yomthetho, ukwenza ngokwasezindabeni zokholo, kusini na?
48_3_6_njengokuba uAbraham wakholwayo nguThixo, kwaza oko kwabalelwa ebulungiseni kuye.
48_3_7_Yazini ngoko ukuba abaselukholweni, ngabo abo abangoonyana baka-Abraham.
48_3_8_Isibhalo, sibona ke ngenxa engaphambili ukuba uThixo uyazigwebela iintlanga ngokwaselukholweni, sazishumayela ngenxa engaphambili iindaba ezilungileyo kuAbraham, sisithi, Ziya kusikelelelwa kuwe zonke iintlanga.
48_3_9_Ngoko ke abaselukholweni bayasikelelwa ndawonye noAbraham okholwayo.
48_3_10_Kuba bonke abangabasemisebenzini yomthetho, baphantsi kwesiqalekiso; kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Baqalekisiwe bonke abangahlaliyo ezintweni zonke ezibhaliweyo encwadini yomthetho,  ukuba bazenze.
48_3_11_Okokuba ke akukho namnye ugwetyelwayo ngomthetho kuye uThixo, kuyabonakala; ngokuba lowo ulilungisa, uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni.
48_3_12_Wona ke umthetho asingowaselukholweni; uthi, umntu owazenzayo ezo zinto uya kudla ubomi ngazo.
48_3_13_UKristu wasithenga, wasikhulula esiqalekisweni somthetho,  ngokwenziwa isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu (kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa,  Uqalekisiwe wonke umntu oxhonywe emthini);
48_3_14_ukuze intsikelelo ka-Abraham ibe sezintlangeni ngoKristu Yesu, ukuze idinga loMoya silamkele ngalo ukholo.
48_3_15_Bazalwana, ndithetha ngokwabantu: kwanowomntu umnqophiso ozinzisiweyo, akukho namnye uwutshitshisayo, athi mhlawumbi ongeze kuwo.
48_3_16_Enziwa ke kuye uAbraham amadinga, nakuyo imbewu yakhe.  Akathi, nakuzo iimbewu, ngathi uthetha ezininzi; usuka ngathi uthetha nye, athi, Nakuyo imbewu yakho: nguKristu ke lowo.
48_3_17_Ukutsho ke ndithi, Umnqophiso ozinzisiweyo ngenxa engaphambili nguThixo, usingisele kuKristu, awunakuphangwa igunya ngumthetho, owabakhoyo emva kweminyaka engamakhulu omane anamanci mathathu, ukuze ulibhangise idinga elo.
48_3_18_Kuba ilifa elo, ukuba liphuma emthethweni, loba alisaphumi edingeni; ke yena uThixo umbabale uAbraham ngedinga.
48_3_19_Uyintoni na ngoko umthetho? Walekelwa ngenxa yezigqitho,  ukude ifike imbewu leyo yayibekwe ngedinga; wamiswa ngezithunywa zezulu, sisandla somlamleli.
48_3_20_Ke umlamleli akamnye; uThixo ke yena mnye.
48_3_21_Umthetho ngoko uchasene na namadinga kaThixo? Nakanye!  Kuba, ukuba bekuwiswe umthetho onako ukudlisa ubomi, kuhleliwe nje, ngebuphume emthethweni lowo ubulungisa.
48_3_22_Ke sona isibhalo sisuke sazivalela ndawonye izinto zonke phantsi kwesono, ukuze idinga eliphuma ekukholweni kuYesu Kristu linikwe abakholwayo.
48_3_23_Ngaphambi ke kokufika kokholo, sasilindwa, siphantsi komthetho, sivalelwe ndawonye kude kufike ukholo olu, lube luza kutyhilwa.
48_3_24_Ngoko ke umthetho waba ngosikhaphela kuKristu, ukuze sigwetyelwe ngokwaselukholweni.
48_3_25_Lwakuba lufikile ke ukholo, asibi saba phantsi kwamkhapheli.
48_3_26_Kuba nina nonke ningoonyana bakaThixo ngako ukukholwa,  nikuKristu Yesu;
48_3_27_kuba nina nonke, nabhaptizelwayo kuKristu, namambatha uKristu.
48_3_28_Akusekho mYuda namGrike; akusekho khoboka nakhululekileyo;  akusekho ndoda nankazana; kuba nina nonke nimntu mnye,  nikuKristu Yesu.
48_3_29_Ukuba ke nina ningabakaKristu, niyimbewu ka-Abraham ngoko,  neendlalifa ngokwedinga.
48_4_1_Ndithi ke, indlalifa, ngexesha lonke engumntwana, ayahluke nganto kumkhonzi, nakuba iyinkosi yeento zonke;
48_4_2_iphantsi kwabagcini namagosa, kude kufike ixesha elimiswe ngaphambili nguyise.
48_4_3_Ngokunjalo nathi, xenikweni besingabantwana,  besingamakhoboka aphantsi kweziqalelo zehlabathi.
48_4_4_Lithe ke lakuzaliseka ixesha, uThixo wamkhupha weza uNyana wakhe, othe wazalwa ngumntu oyinkazana; ethe wazalelwa phantsi komthetho,
48_4_5_ukuze abakhulule ngokubathenga abaphantsi komthetho, ukuze sikuzuze ukwenziwa oonyana.
48_4_6_Ngokuba ke ningoonyana, uThixo wamkhupha uMoya woNyana wakhe, weza ezintliziyweni zenu, edanduluka esithi, Abha, Bawo.
48_4_7_Ngoko ke akusengumkhonzi, ungunyana; ukuba ke ungunyana,  ukwayindlalifa kaThixo ngoKristu.
48_4_8_Kanti okunene, oko naningamazi uThixo, nanikhonza kwabo ngemvelo bangethixo;
48_4_9_ngoku ke, nakuba nimazile uThixo, hayi kanye mandithi,  nakuba naziwe nguThixo, nenza ntoni na ukubuya niguqukele kwiziqalelo ezingenamandla, ezingenaluncedo, enithanda ukubuya nikhonze zona ngokutsha?
48_4_10_Nimana nigcina imihla, neenyanga, namaxesha, neminyaka.
48_4_11_Ndiyanoyikela, hleze ndibe ndifumane ndabulaleka ngenxa yenu.
48_4_12_Ndiyanikhunga, bazalwana, yibani njengam, ngokuba nam ndaba njengani; anindonanga nganto.
48_4_13_Niyazi ke ukuba bekungenxa yokuswela amandla kwenyama yam,  ukunishumayeza kwam iindaba ezilungileyo ngokokuqala.
48_4_14_Ukulingwa kwam okwakusenyameni yam, anikwenzanga into engento, anikucekisanga nina nokukucekisa; nesuka nandamkela njengesithunywa sikaThixo, njengoKristu Yesu ngokwakhe.
48_4_15_Kwabe kuyintoni na ngoko ukuziyolisa kwenu? Kuba ndiyaningqinela, ukuba bekunokwenzeka, ninge nawakrukrayo amehlo enu, nandinika.
48_4_16_Ndisuke ndaba lutshaba lwenu na ke, ngokuthetha inyaniso kuni?
48_4_17_Bayanincekelela ngokungekuhle; basuka bathande ukunivalela phandle, ukuze nibancekelele nani.
48_4_18_Kuhle ke ukuba kuncekelelwe ngamaxesha onke entweni entle,  kunganeli ukuba njalo ndakuba ndikho kuni.
48_4_19_Bantwana bam, endibuye ndanenimba ngabo, ade uKristu amiliswe ngaphakathi kwenu,
48_4_20_bendithanda ke ukubakho kuni ngoku, ndilenze libe lilimbi ilizwi lam; ngokuba ndiyathingaza ngani.
48_4_21_Ndixeleleni, nina nithandayo ukuba phantsi komthetho,  aniwuva na umthetho?
48_4_22_Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, uAbraham wayenoonyana ababini:  omnye engowekhobokazana, omnye engowomfazi okhululekileyo.
48_4_23_Waye okunene lowo wekhobokazana ezelwe ngokwenyama; kodwa lowo womfazi okhululekileyo wayezelwe ngalo idinga.
48_4_24_Eziyintsonkotha zona ezo zinto; kuba aba bayiyo iminqophiso emibini. Omnye uvela entabeni yeSinayi, uzalela ebukhobokeni,  onguHagare ke wona lowo;
48_4_25_kuba loo nto inguHagare yiSinayi, intaba ekwelama-Arabhi,  elungelelene neYerusalem yakalokunje, esebukhobokeni ke nabantwana bayo.
48_4_26_Ke yona ephezulu iYerusalem ikhululekile, enguma wethu leyo.
48_4_27_Kuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Yiba nemihlali, ludlolo lungazaliyo; Gqabhuka umemelele, wena ungenanimba; Ngokuba baninzi abantwana besishiywa, ngaphezu kwabonendoda.
48_4_28_Thina ke, bazalwana, ngokokukaIsake, singabantwana bedinga.
48_4_29_Kusuke, kwanjengokuba wayesithi oko owazalwa ngokwenyama amtshutshise owazalwa ngokoMoya, kwaba njalo nakaloku.
48_4_30_Sithini na ke sona isibhalo? Sithi, Likhuphele phandle ikhobokazana nonyana walo; kuba unyana wekhobokazana akasayi kuba ndlalifa kunye nonyana wokhululekileyo.
48_4_31_Ngoko, bazalwana, asingabantwana bekhobokazana thina;  singabowokhululekileyo.
48_5_1_Yimani ngoko enkululekweni, athe uKristu wasikhululela kuyo;  nize ningabuyi nibanjwe yidyokhwe yobukhoboka.
48_5_2_Niyabona, mna, Pawulos, ndithi kuni, ukuba nithe naluka,  uKristu akasayi kuninceda lutho.
48_5_3_Ndiphinda ndingqina ke kumntu wonke owalukileyo, ukuba ungonetyala lokuwenza umthetho uphela.
48_5_4_Nibhangile, nahlukana noKristu, nina aba nigwetyelwayo emthethweni, naphalala elubabalweni.
48_5_5_Kuba thina ngoMoya silinde kakhulu ithemba lobulungisa ngokwaselukholweni.
48_5_6_Kuba kwabakuKristu Yesu akunamandla anto ukwaluka,  kwanokungaluki; into enamandla lukholo olusebenza ngothando.
48_5_7_Nibe nibaleka kakuhle; ngubani na osuke wanithintela ukuba ningayithambeli inyaniso?
48_5_8_Olo loyiseko lwenu aluphumi konibizayo.
48_5_9_Igwele elincinane liyayibilisa intlama iphela.
48_5_10_Mna ndikholosekile malunga nani eNkosini, ukuba aniyi kucinga nto yimbi; ke onikhathazayo uya kuluthwala ugwebo,  nokuba ngongubani.
48_5_11_Mna ke, bazalwana, ukuba ndingaba ndisavakalisa ulwaluko,  ndisatshutshiselwani na? singaba sibhangisiwe njengoko isikhubekiso eso somnqamlezo.
48_5_12_Akwaba bangazinqumla nokuzinqumla abaniqungaqungayo.
48_5_13_Kuba nina nabizelwa enkululekweni, bazalwana; kodwa ke musani ukuthi, ukuyiphatha inkululeko leyo, nivulele inyama ithuba; manisuke ngalo uthando nikhonzane.
48_5_14_Kuba wonke umthetho uzaliswe ngazwi linye, ngeli lithi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako.
48_5_15_Ukuba ke niyagrenyana, nidlane, lumkani ukuba ningagqitywa omnye ngomnye.
48_5_16_Ke kaloku ndithi, Hambani ngokoMoya, naningasayi kuthi ke niyizalise inkanuko yenyama.
48_5_17_Kuba inyama ikhanuka ngokuchasene noMoya, uMoya ke ukhanuka ngokuchasene nenyama; ezo zinto ke ziphambene, ukuze ningazenzi izinto enisukuba nizithanda.
48_5_18_Ukuba ke nikhokelwa nguMoya, aningaphantsi komthetho.
48_5_19_Iyabonakala ke yona imisebenzi yenyama, eyile: ukrexezo,  umbulo, ukungcola, uburheletyo,
48_5_20_ukubusa kwizithixo, ukukhafula, intiyo, iinkani, amakhwele,  imisindo, amayelenqe, iimbambaniso, izahlukano,
48_5_21_oomona, ookubulala, ookunxila, iindywala, nezinto ezinjengezo; endinixelelayo ngenxa engaphambili, njengokuba besendinixelele kade, ukuba abazenzayo izinto ezinjalo abayi kubudla ilifa ubukumkani bukaThixo.
48_5_22_Ke sona esoMoya isiqhamo luthando, uvuyo, uxolo, ukuzeka kade umsindo, ububele, ukulunga, intembeko, ubulali, ukuzeyisa;
48_5_23_akukho mthetho uchasene nezinto ezinjalo.
48_5_24_Ke kaloku abo ke bakaKristu, inyama bayibethelele emnqamlezweni, kunye neminqweno neenkanuko zayo.
48_5_25_Ukuba sidla ubomi ngokoMoya, masihambe nokuhamba kwangokoMoya.
48_5_26_Masingabi ngabozuko olulambathayo, sithelekisana,  simonelana.
48_6_1_Bazalwana, ukuba umntu uthe waqutyulwa nokuqutyulwa sisiphoso esithile, nina bangaboMoya, mlulekeni onjalo ninomoya wobulali; uzilumkela ukuba ungahendwa nawe.
48_6_2_Thwalisanani ubunzima, ize ngokunjalo niwuzalise umthetho kaKristu;
48_6_3_kuba umntu, ukuba uba uyinto, engento, uyazikhohlisa.
48_6_4_Elowo ke makawucikide owakhe umsebenzi, wayeya kwandula ukuba neqhayiya ngokwakhe yedwa, angabi nalo ngomnye;
48_6_5_kuba elowo uya kuwuthwala owakhe umthwalo.
48_6_6_Makathi ke lowo ufundiswayo ilizwi, abelane nalowo ufundisayo ngeento zonke ezilungileyo.
48_6_7_Musani ukulahlekiswa; uThixo yena asingowokuhlekisa. Kuba into athe wahlwayela yona umntu, wovuna kwayona;
48_6_8_ngokuba lowo uhlwayelela eyakhe inyama, wovuna ukonakala ngokwasenyameni; lowo uhlwayelela uMoya ke, wovuna ubomi obungunaphakade ngokwaseMoyeni.
48_6_9_Ke ekwenzeni okulungileyo masingethi amandla; kuba sovuna ngexesha elililo, ukuba asityhafi.
48_6_10_Njengoko singathi sibe nethuba, masisebenze okulungileyo kubo bonke, ngokukodwa ke kwabendlu yokholo.
48_6_11_Bonani ukuba kukhulu kokubhala endinibhalele ngako ngesam isandla.
48_6_12_Bonke abathanda ukuba babe nesimilo esihle ngokwangaphandle, abo ke baninyanzela ukuba naluswe; benzela nje kodwa ukuze bangatshutshiswa ngawo umnqamlezo kaKristu.
48_6_13_Kuba kwanabo balukayo, bengawubambi umthetho, bathanda ukuba naluswe, ukuze baqhayise ngeyiyeyenu inyama.
48_6_14_Mna ke mandingakhe ndiqhayise nganto, ingenguwo umnqamlezo weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, ekuthe ngaye ihlabathi kum labethelelwa emnqamlezweni, ndathi nam kwihlabathi ndabethelelwa emnqamlezweni.
48_6_15_Kuba kwabakuKristu Yesu, akunamandla anto ukwaluka nokungaluki; into enamandla sisidalwa esitsha.
48_6_16_Bonke ke abahamba ngalo mgca, makube luxolo nenceba kubo ke, nakwabangamaSirayeli kaThixo.
48_6_17_Elokugqiba ndithi, Makungabikho namnye undixhamlayo; kuba mna, iimpawu zeNkosi uYesu ndiziphethe ngomzimba wam.
48_6_18_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nomoya wenu,  bazalwana. Amen.
49_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  ubhalela abangcwele abase-Efese, abakholwayo kuKristu Yesu;
49_1_2_athi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
49_1_3_Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, lowo wasisikelelayo ngeentsikelelo zonke zoMoya kwezasemazulwini iindawo, sikuKristu;
49_1_4_njengokuba wathi, ngaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi,  wasinyulela kuye, ukuba sibe ngcwele, singabi nasiphako phambi kwakhe;
49_1_5_othe ngokusithanda wasimisela ngenxa engaphambili, ukuba senziwe oonyana kuye ngokwakhe ngoYesu Kristu, ngokwenkolelo yokuthanda kwakhe,
49_1_6_ukuze kudunyiswe uzuko lobabalo lwakhe, awasibabala ngalo sikuye Othandiweyo;
49_1_7_esinayo sikuye inkululeko ngokuhlawulelwa ngegazi lakhe,  ukuxolelwa ke kweziphoso zethu, ngokobutyebi bobabalo lwakhe;
49_1_8_awaluphuphumisela kuthi, lunabo bonke ubulumko nokuqonda;
49_1_9_esazisile imfihlelo yokuthanda kwakhe ngokwenkolelo yakhe,  awayimisayo ngokwakhe,
49_1_10_ebhekise ekuhleleni aya kuhlela ngako, akuzaliseka amaxesha, ukuba azihlanganisele zonke izinto kuye uKristu,  ezisemazulwini kwanezisemhlabeni;
49_1_11_ewe, kuye lo sithe sikuye sadla ilifa; simisiwe ngenxa engaphambili ngokwengqibo yozisebenzayo zonke ezo nto ngokwecebo lokuthanda kwakhe;
49_1_12_ukuze sibe ngabokudumisa uzuko lwakhe, thina aba sathi ngenxa engaphambili sathembela kuye uKristu;
49_1_13_enithe, nikuye nani, nakuliva ilizwi lenyaniso, iindaba ezi zilungileyo zokusindiswa kwenu-enithe, nakukholwa nokukholwa kuye, natywinwa naqiniselwa ngaye uMoya oyiNgcwele wedinga,
49_1_14_osisinyaniso selifa lethu, ukude kugqibelele ukukhululeka ngentlawulelo kwabo baziinqobo kuye, ukuba kudunyiswe uzuko lwakhe.
49_1_15_Ngenxa yoko nam, ndakuba ndikuvile okwenu ukukholwa yiNkosi uYesu, nokubathanda kwenu bonke abangcwele,
49_1_16_andiphezi ukubulela ngenxa yenu, ndinikhumbula emithandazweni yam,
49_1_17_ukuba uThixo weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, uYise wozuko,  aninike umoya wobulumko wokunityhilela, nimazi kakuhle;
49_1_18_nikhanyiselwe amehlo engqondo, ukuze nilazi into eliyiyo ithemba lobizo lwakhe, nento obuyiyo ubutyebi bobuqaqawuli belifa lakhe phakathi kwabo abangcwele;
49_1_19_nento obuyiyo ubukhulu obuncamisileyo bamandla akhe abhekisele kuthi, thina bakholwayo, angokokusebenza kokuqinisela kokomelela kwakhe,
49_1_20_awakusebenza kuye uKristu, ekumvuseni kwakhe kwabafileyo;  waza wamhlalisa ngasekunene kwakhe kwezasemazulwini iindawo,
49_1_21_ngaphezu kwalo lonke ulawulo, negunya, namandla, nobukhosi,  nalo lonke igama elikhankanywayo, kungekhona kweli phakade lodwa, kunakwelo lizayo.
49_1_22_Waza izinto zonke wazithobela phantsi kweenyawo zakhe,  wammisa ukuba abe yintloko phezu kweento zonke kulo ibandla,
49_1_23_lona lingumzimba wakhe, ukuzala ke oko kozizalisayo izinto zonke ngako konke.
49_2_1_Nani unidlise ubomi, nifile nje ziziphoso na zizono;
49_2_2_enanifudula nihamba kuzo ngokwesimo seli hlabathi,  ngokomphathi wegunya lesibhakabhaka, womoya lo usebenzayo ngoku kubo abangevayo;
49_2_3_esasifudula nathi sonke sihleli phakathi kwabo ezinkanukweni zenyama yethu, sisenza ukuthanda kwenyama nokwengcinga, saye ngemvelo sikwangabantwana bengqumbo, njengabanye abo.
49_2_4_Ke uThixo, esisityebi nje ngenceba, uthe ngenxa yothando lwakhe olukhulu, awasithanda ngalo,
49_2_5_thina sifile nje ziziphoso, wasidlisa ubomi ndawonye noKristu (nisindiswe ngokubabalwa),
49_2_6_wasivusa naye, wasihlalisa naye kwezasemazulwini iindawo,  sikuKristu Yesu;
49_2_7_ukuze ubutyebi obuncamisileyo bobabalo lwakhe abubonakalalise emaphakadeni azayo, ngokusenzela ububele ngoKristu Yesu.
49_2_8_Kuba nisindiswe ngokubabalwa nangalo ukholo; nako oko kungaphumi kuni, kusisipho sikaThixo;
49_2_9_akuphumi misebenzini, hleze kubekho bani uqhayisayo.
49_2_10_Kuba thina singumsebenzi wakhe, sidalelwe kuKristu Yesu,  ukuze senze imisebenzi elungileyo, awayilungisayo uThixo ngenxa engaphambili, ukuze sihambe kuyo.
49_2_11_Ngoko ndithi, Khumbulani ukuba nina, enibe nifudule niziintlanga ngokwenyama, kusithiwa ningabangalukileyo, ngabo kuthiwa ngabolwaluko olwenziwe ngezandla enyameni:
49_2_12_okokuba ngelo xesha nibe ningenaKristu, ningazani nawo umzi wakwaSirayeli, ningabasemzini kuyo iminqophiso yalo idinga,  ningenathemba, ningenaThixo ehlabathini.
49_2_13_Ke ngoku ngoKristu Yesu, nina, enibe nifudula nikude, nithe naba kufuphi ngalo igazi likaKristu.
49_2_14_Kuba nguye oluxolo lwethu, yena uthe izinto zombini wazenza zaba nye, waluchitha ke udonga lothango oluphakathi, ubumpi ke obo,
49_2_15_akuba ewubhangisile, esenyameni yakhe, umyalelo wemithetho esemimiselweni; ukuze abo babini abadalele kuye ngokwakhe, babe mntu mnye, mtsha, esenza ke uxolo;
49_2_16_nokuze abaxolelanise noThixo abo babini, babe mzimba mnye ngawo umnqamlezo, ebubulalele kuwo ubumpi obo.
49_2_17_Weza ke washumayela iindaba ezilungileyo zoxolo kuni abo bakude, nakwabakufuphi;
49_2_18_ngokuba kungaye ukungeniswa kwethu sobabini, siMoya mnye kuye uYise.
49_2_19_Ngoko ke anisengabasemzini nabaphambukeli; ningamakhaya kubo abangcwele, ningabendlu kaThixo,
49_2_20_nakhelwe phezu kwelitye lesiseko sabapostile nabaprofeti,  inguYesu Kristu ngokwakhe ilitye lembombo;
49_2_21_esithi kuye sonke isakhiwo, sihlangene kakuhle, sikhule,  sibe yitempile engcwele eNkosini;
49_2_22_enithi nani nakhelwe ndawonye kuye, ukuze nibe yindawo yokuhlala kaThixo ngaye uMoya.
49_3_1_Ngenxa yoko, mna Pawulos, mbanjwa kaKristu Yesu ngenxa yenu zintlanga
49_3_2_ukuba ke nikuvile ukugosisa kobabalo lukaThixo endanibabalelwa ngalo;
49_3_3_okokuba wandazisa imfihlelo leyo ngokotyhilelo, njengoko sendibhale kade ngokufutshane;
49_3_4_enothi ngoko, nakulesa, nibe nokuqiqa okwam ukuyiqonda imfihlelo kaKristu;
49_3_5_ababengathanga kuzimbi izizukulwana bayaziswe oonyana babantu, njengoko bayityhilelweyo ngoku abapostile bakhe abangcwele, nabaprofeti bakhe, ngaye uMoya;
49_3_6_eyokuba iintlanga ziziindlalifa nathi, zikwamzimba mnye nathi, zingamahlulelana nathi ngedinga lakhe, sikuye nje uKristu ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo,
49_3_7_endaba ngumlungiseleli wazo ngokwesipho sobabalo lukaThixo,  endababalwa ngaso ngokokusebenza kwamandla akhe.
49_3_8_Mna lo, unguyena mncinanana kubo bonke abangcwele,  ndababalwa ngolo lubabalo, lokuba ndishumayele phakathi kweentlanga iindaba ezilungileyo zobutyebi obungalandekiyo bukaKristu;
49_3_9_ndibakhanyisele bonke, bayibone into obuyiyo ubudlelane bemfihlelo ebifihliwe kwasemaphakadeni, ikuye uThixo owazidalayo zonke izinto ngoYesu Kristu;
49_3_10_ukuze ngoku oozilawuli noomagunya, abakwezasemazulwini iindawo, babaziswe ngalo ibandla ubulumko bukaThixo,  obuziintlobo ezininzi,
49_3_11_ngokokwengqibo yakhe yasemaphakadeni, awayenzayo kuKristu Yesu, iNkosi yethu;
49_3_12_esinako sikuye ukungafihlisi kwethu, nokungeniswa kuye sikholosile, ngokukholwa kuye.
49_3_13_Kungoko ndicelayo ukuba ningethi amandla ziimbandezelo zam,  ezingenxa yenu, zona ezi ziluzuko lwenu.
49_3_14_Ngenxa yoko ndiyawagoba amadolo am kuye uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu,
49_3_15_ebizwe ngaye yonke imizalwane esemazulwini nesemhlabeni,
49_3_16_ukuba aninike, ngokobutyebi bozuko lwakhe, ukomelezwa ngamandla ngaye uMoya wakhe, ngokusingisele emntwini ongaphakathi;
49_3_17_ukuba uKristu ahlale ngalo ukholo ezintliziyweni zenu,  nendele nisekelwe eluthandweni,
49_3_18_ukuze nithi, ndawonye nabo bonke abangcwele, nibe nako kanye ukubuqiqa into obuyiyo ububanzi, nobude, nobunzulu,  nokuphakama kwalo,
49_3_19_kwanokulwazi uthando lukaKristu oluncamise ukwazi; ukuze niye nizala ngako konke ukuzala kukaThixo.
49_3_20_Kuye ke onako ukwenza okungaphezu kweento zonke ngokugqithiseleyo kakhulu, ngaphezu kwesikucelayo nesinokukuqiqa, ngokokwamandla asebenzayo ngaphakathi kwethu,
49_3_21_kuye malubekho uzuko ebandleni elikuKristu Yesu, kuse kuzo zonke izizukulwana zalo iphakade lasemaphakadeni. Amen.
49_4_1_Ndiyanivuselela ngoko, mna mbanjwa waseNkosini, ukuba nihambe ngokulufaneleyo ubizo enabizwa ngalo,
49_4_2_ninako konke ukuthobeka kwentliziyo nobulali, ninokuzeka kade umsindo, ninyamezelana, nisenziwa luthando,
49_4_3_nikhuthalele ukubugcina ubunye boMoya ngentambo yoxolo.
49_4_4_Mnye umzimba, mnye noMoya, njengokuba nabizwayo nokubizwa,  naba nathemba linye lobizo lwenu.
49_4_5_Inye iNkosi, lunye ukholo, lunye ubhaptizo,
49_4_6_mnye uThixo, uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, ophakathi kwenu nonke.
49_4_7_Ke elowo kuthi wababalwa ngokomlinganiso wokupha kukaKristu.
49_4_8_Kungoko athi, Enyuke waya enyangweni, wathimba intimbo,  Wabapha izipho abantu.
49_4_9_Oko ke kuthi, wenyuka, kuyintoni na, kungekwakukuthi, wehla nokuhla kuqala, waya kwezona ziseza ntsi iindawo zomhlaba?
49_4_10_Owehlayo ikwangulowo wenyukayo, waya ngaphezu kwawo onke amazulu, ukuze azalise zonke izinto.
49_4_11_Waza kwayena wabapha abanye ukuba babe ngabapostile, abanye babe ngabaprofeti, abanye babe ngabashumayeli beendaba ezilungileyo, abanye babe ngabalusi nabafundisi,
49_4_12_ukuze abangcwele basulungekiselwe umsebenzi wolungiselelo,  ukwakhiwa ke komzimba kaKristu;
49_4_13_side thina sonke sifike kubo ubunye benkolo, nobokumazi okuzeleyo uNyana kaThixo, ebudodeni obupheleleyo,  emlinganisweni wobukhulu bokuzala kukaKristu;
49_4_14_ukuze singabi saba ziintsana, silatyuzwa, siphetshethwa ngumoya wonke wemfundiso, ngokunyanga kwabantu, ngobuqhetseba obusemaqhingeni olahlekiso;
49_4_15_sithi ke, sinyanisekile eluthandweni, sikhulele, ngeendawo zonke, kuye lo uyintloko, uKristu;
49_4_16_ekuphuma kuye ukuthi, umzimba wonke uhlangane kakuhle,  ubandakanywe ngako konke ukuxhomekelelana kwamalungu okuluncedo, okusebenza ngomlinganiso weendawo zonke ngazinye,  ukhulise umzimba, use ekuzakheni ngothando.
49_4_17_Ke ngoko, oku ndiyakuthetha ndikungqine ndiseNkosini,  ukuthi, maningabi sahamba njengoko zihamba ngako nezinye iintlanga, ngamampunge engqiqo yazo,
49_4_18_zenziwe mnyama iingqondo, zingazani nobomi bukaThixo ngenxa yokungazi okukuzo, ngenxa yokuqaqadeka kwentliziyo yazo;
49_4_19_abathe bona, bengasaziva, bazinikela eburheletyweni, ukuze basebenze ukungcola konke, bebawa.
49_4_20_Ke nina animfundanga ngokunjalo uKristu,
49_4_21_ukuba kambe ningaba nimvile, nafundiswa nikuye, njengoko inyaniso ikuye uYesu;
49_4_22_yokuba nithi ngakwihambo yangaphambili nimlahle umntu omdala, owonakaliswayo ngokokweenkanuko zokulukuhla;
49_4_23_nihlaziywe ke kuwo umoya wengqiqo yenu,
49_4_24_nimambathe umntu omtsha, othe ngokukaThixo wadalelwa ebulungiseni, nasebungcweleni benyaniso.
49_4_25_Kungoko ke ndithi, lahlani ubuxoki, thethani inyaniso elowo nommelwane wakhe; ngokuba singamalungu, omnye elelomnye.
49_4_26_Qumbani, ningoni; ilanga malingade litshone nicaphukile;
49_4_27_kananjalo musani ukumkhwelela indawo uMtyholi lo.
49_4_28_Lowo ubayo makangabi seba; kanye ke makabulaleke esebenza okulungileyo ngezandla zakhe, ukuze abe nako ukwabela osweleyo.
49_4_29_Makungaphumi nanye intetho ebolileyo emlonyeni wenu; mayibe yesukuba ilungele ukuxuma oko kuluncedo, ukuze ibabale abevayo.
49_4_30_Kanjalo musani ukumenza buhlungu uMoya oyiNgcwele kaThixo,  enathi kuye natywinwa, naqiniselelwa imini yentlawulelo.
49_4_31_Mabukhweleliswe kuni bonke ubukrakra, nomsindo, nengqumbo,  nengcolo, nonyeliso, ndawonye nolunya lonke.
49_4_32_Ke nina yibani nobubele omnye komnye, nibe nemfesane kakhulu, nixolelane, njengokuba naye uThixo wanixolelayo ekuKristu.
49_5_1_Ngoko yibani ngabaxelisa uThixo, ngokwabantwana abaziintanda;
49_5_2_nihambe eluthandweni, kwanjengokuba naye uKristu wasithandayo, wazinikela ngenxa yethu, ukuba abe ngumnikelo nedini kuye uThixo, ukuba abe livumba elimnandi.
49_5_3_Ke umbulo, nako konke ukungcola, nokubawa, makungakhe kukhankanywe phakathi kwenu, njengoko kubafaneleyo abangcwele;
49_5_4_kwanamanyala, nentetho yobuyatha, nobuhiba, izinto ezo ezingafanelekileyo. Makube kokukhona ninemibulelo.
49_5_5_Kuba oku nikwazi, ukuba wonke umenzi wombulo, nomntu ongcolileyo, nolibawa, engumkhonzi wezithixo, akanalifa ebukumkanini bukaKristu noThixo.
49_5_6_Makungabikho namnye unilukuhlayo ngamazwi alambathayo; kuba iza ngenxa yezo zinto ingqumbo kaThixo phezu kwabangevayo.
49_5_7_Ngoko musani ukuba ngamahlulelana nabo.
49_5_8_Kuba nina naye nifudula nibubumnyama, ke ngoku nikukukhanya,  niseNkosini nje; hambani ke ngokwabantwana bokukhanya.
49_5_9_Kuba sona isiqhamo soMoya sikuko konke ukulunga,  nobulungisa, nenyaniso;
49_5_10_nicikida ukuba yintoni na ekholekileyo kakuhle kwiNkosi.
49_5_11_Kanjalo musani ukuba nabudlelane ngemisebenzi yobumnyama engenasiqhamo; makube kukhona niyohlwayayo.
49_5_12_Kuba izinto ezenziwa ngabo emfihlekweni kulihlazo nokuzithetha.
49_5_13_Ke zonke ezi zinto, zakohlwaywa, ziyabonakalaliswa kukukhanya; kuba konke okubonakalaliswayo kukukhanya.
49_5_14_Kungoko athi, Vuka wena uleleyo, uvuke kwabafileyo; uKristu wokukhanyisela.
49_5_15_Khangelani ngoko, ukuba ningathini na, ukuze kucokiseke ukuhamba kwenu; ningabi njengabaswele ubulumko, yibani njengezilumko;
49_5_16_nizongela ixesha eli, ngokuba le mihla ayindawo.
49_5_17_Ngenxa yoko musani ukuba ziintsweli-kuqonda; yibani ngabakuqondayo into okuyiyo ukuthanda kweNkosi.
49_5_18_Kanjalo musani ukunxila yiwayini, ekukhoyo kuloo nto ukuzibhubhisa; manizaliswe nguMoya;
49_5_19_nithetha omnye nomnye ngeendumiso, neengoma, nezango ezizezomoya, nivuma, nibetha uhadi entliziyweni yenu kuyo iNkosi,
49_5_20_nimana nibulela ngenxa yeento zonke, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kuye uThixo uYise;
49_5_21_nilulamelana ngokoyika uThixo.
49_5_22_Nina bafazi, walulameleni awenu amadoda, ngokokululamela iNkosi;
49_5_23_ngokuba indoda le iyintloko yomfazi, njengokuba naye uKristu eyintloko yebandla, eli; waye yena ngokwakhe enguMsindisi wawo umzimba.
49_5_24_Ke, kwanjengokuba ibandla eli limlulamela uKristu, mabathi ngokunjalo nabafazi bawalulamele awabo amadoda ezintweni zonke.
49_5_25_Nina madoda, bathandeni abafazi benu, njengokuba naye uKristu walithandayo ibandla, wazinikela ngenxa yalo;
49_5_26_ukuze alingcwalise, elihlambulule ngokuhlamba kwamanzi ngelizwi;
49_5_27_ukuze alimise phambi kwakhe linobuqaqawuli, lilibandla elingenabala, elingenamibimbi nanye into enjalo, ukuze libe ngcwele, lingabi nasiphako.
49_5_28_Ngoko amelwe amadoda ukubathanda abawo abafazi, njengokuba beyimizimba yawo. Lowo umthandayo umkakhe, uyazithanda;
49_5_29_kuba akukho namnye wakha wayithiya eyakhe inyama; usuka ayondle, ayigcine, njengokuba nayo iNkosi ilenjenjalo ibandla.
49_5_30_Ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wayo, singabenyama yayo,  singabamathambo ayo.
49_5_31_Ngenxa yoko ke, umntu womshiya uyise nonina, anamathele kuye umkakhe, baze abo babini babe nyama-nye.
49_5_32_Loo mfihlelo inkulu; ke mna ndithetha ndisingisele kuKristu, ndisingisele nakulo ibandla.
49_5_33_Kodwa ke manithi nani ngabanye, elowo amthande umkakhe,  njengoko azithanda ngako; umfazi ke makayoyike indoda.
49_6_1_Nina bantwana, baveni abazali benu ngokwabaseNkosini; kuba oko kububulungisa.
49_6_2_Beka uyihlo nonyoko; wona lowo ngumthetho wokuqala onedinga;
49_6_3_ukuze kulunge kuwe, ube nexesha elide emhlabeni.
49_6_4_Nani boyise, musani ukubacaphukisa abantwana benu;  bondleleni ekuqeqesheni nasekululekeni kweNkosi.
49_6_5_Nina bakhonzi, baveni abaziinkosi zenu ngokwenyama,  ninokuzoyikela nokugubha, ningenakumbi ezintliziyweni zenu,  ninge niva uKristu ngokwakhe.
49_6_6_Ukukhonza kwenu makungabi ngokweliso, ngathi nithomalalisa abantu; makube ngokwabakhonzi bakaKristu, nikwenza ukuthanda kukaThixo ngokwasemphefumlweni,
49_6_7_nikhonza ngentumekelelo, kukuyo iNkosi, kungekubo abantu;
49_6_8_nisazi nje ukuba into esukuba ilungile, athe ulowo wayenza,  uya kwamkeliswa kwayona yiNkosi, nokuba uNonzi nokuba ungokhululekileyo.
49_6_9_Nani baziinkosi zabo, yenzani kwaezo zinto kubo, nikuyeke ukusongela; nisazi nje ukuba kwaeyabo neyenu iNkosi isemazulwini, nokuba akukho kukhetha buso kuyo.
49_6_10_Elokugqiba, bazalwana bam, ndithi, Yomelelani eNkosini,  nasekuqineni kokomelela kwayo.
49_6_11_Xhobani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo, ukuze nibe nako ukumisa nibuchase ubuqhinga boMtyholi.
49_6_12_Ngokuba umzamo wethu asingowokuzamana negazi nenyama;  ngowokuzamana nazo izilawuli, nawo amagunya, nazo iziphatha-hlabathi zobumnyama balo eli phakade, nayo imikhosi yomoya abakhohlakeleyo kwezasezulwini iindawo.
49_6_13_Ngenxa yoko, qubulani sonke isikrweqe sikaThixo; ukuze nibe nako ukuchasa ngomhla ombi, nithi nikufezile konke, nime nimi.
49_6_14_Misani ke ngoko, nibhinqe inyaniso esinqeni senu, ninxibe isigcina-sifuba sobulungisa,
49_6_15_nibophe ezinyaweni zenu ulungiselelo lweendaba ezilungileyo zoxolo.
49_6_16_Ngaphezu kwezo zinto zonke, qubulani ikhaka lokholo, lona nothi ngalo nibe nako ukuzicima zonke iintolo ezinomlilo zakhe ongendawo.
49_6_17_Yamkelani isigcina-ntloko sosindiso, nalo ikrele loMoya,  elililizwi likaThixo;
49_6_18_ngako konke ukuthandaza nokukhunga, nithandaza amaxesha onke nikuye uMoya; niyiphaphamele loo nto ngako konke ukuzingisa nokukhunga, ngenxa yabo bonke abangcwele;
49_6_19_nangenxa yam, ukuba ndiphiwe ilizwi ekuwuvuleni umlomo wam,  ndize ndazise ngokungafihlisiyo imfihlelo yeendaba ezi zilungileyo,
49_6_20_ekungenxa yazo endisisigidimi esisezintanjeni; ukuze ndingafihlisi ukuthetha kuzo, njengoko ndimelwe kukuthetha ngako.
49_6_21_Ke kaloku, ukuze nani nikwazi okukokwam, ukuba ndinjani na,  wonazisa konke uTikiko, umzalwana oyintanda, umlungiseleli othembekileyo ngokwaseNkosini;
49_6_22_endimthume le nto kuni, ukuze nizazi iindaba zethu, nokuze azithuthuzele iintliziyo zenu.
49_6_23_Makube luxolo kubo abazalwana, nothando, ndawonye nokholo oluvela kuThixo uYise, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
49_6_24_Ubabalo malube nabo bonke abayithandayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ngokungenakonakala. Amen.
50_1_1_UPawulos noTimoti, abakhonzi bakaYesu Kristu, babhalela bonke abangcwele abakuKristu Yesu, abaseFilipi, ndawonye nabaveleli nabalungiseleli;
50_1_2_bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo, oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
50_1_3_Ndihlala ndibulela kuye uThixo wam, ekunikhumbuleni kwam konke
50_1_4_(ekukhungeni kwam konke ndikhunga ngenxa yenu nonke,  ndivuyile),
50_1_5_ngenxa yobudlelane benu obubhekisele kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo, kususela kwimini yokuqala kude kube ngoku;
50_1_6_ekubeni ndikholose ngayo le nto, yokuba lowo wawuqalayo ngaphakathi kwenu umsebenzi olungileyo, wowufeza, ide ibe yiloo mini kaYesu Kristu;
50_1_7_njengokuba ndilungisa ukucinga oko ngani nonke, ngenxa yokuba nikum entliziyweni, nithe, nasezintanjeni zam,  nasekuziphenduleleni kwam, nasekuziqiniseni kwam iindaba ezilungileyo, naba ngamadlelana nam ngobabalo olu, nina nonke.
50_1_8_Kuba uThixo ulingqina lam lokuba kukhulu ukunilangazelela kwam nonke, ndineemfesane zikaYesu Kristu.
50_1_9_Nako oku ndiya kuthandazela, ukuba uthando lwenu lube kukhona luphuphuma ngokuphuphuma ukwazi okukhulu, nako konke ukuqonda,
50_1_10_ukuze nizicikide izinto eziziincamisa, ukuze nibe nokusulungeka, ningabi nasiwo, nide nise kwimini kaKristu;
50_1_11_nizele ziziqhamo zobulungisa ezingoYesu Kristu,  nikhangelise ekuzukiseni nasekudumiseni uThixo.
50_1_12_Ke kaloku ndinga ningazi, bazalwana, ukuba izinto ezindihleleyo, zibethe kwakukhona zihambayo iindaba ezilungileyo;
50_1_13_ngokokude iintambo zam ezi zibonakale kuyo yonke indlu yomkhosi nakwabanye bonke, ukuba zikuKristu;
50_1_14_baze abona bazalwana baninzi bathi, beseNkosini, bekholose ngeentambo zam ezi, babe kukhona benobuganga bokulithetha ilizwi, bengenakoyika.
50_1_15_Okunene abathile bamvakalisa uKristu ngomona neenkani,  abanye ke bamvakalisa ngokokuzithandela.
50_1_16_Abeyelenqe abo bamazisa uKristu ngokungenyulu, beba baya kongezelela imbandezelo kwiintambo zam;
50_1_17_ke aba, benziwa luthando, bamazisa wKristu besazi ukuba ndimiselwe ukuziphendulela iindaba ezilungileyo.
50_1_18_Ibe yini ke? Noko kunjalo, ngeendlela zonke, nokuba kungokunyhwalaza, nokuba kungenyaniso, kwaziswa uKristu.  Ndiyavuya kuko oko, ndaye ndisaya kuvuya.
50_1_19_Kuba ndiyazi ukuba oku kuya kuphumelela ekusindisweni kwam,  ngako ukundikhungela kwenu, nangoncedo loMoya kaYesu Kristu;
50_1_20_kuye ngokulangazelela nangokuthemba kwam, ukuba andiyi kudaniswa nganto; uya kusuka ngako konke ukungafihlisi,  njengokwamaxesha onke, athi nangoku enziwe mkhulu uKristu emzimbeni wam, nokuba na kungobomi, nokuba kungokufa.
50_1_21_Kuba kum mna, ukudla ubomi kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo.
50_1_22_Ke ukuba ukudla ubomi ndisenyameni kusisiqhamo somsebenzi kum oko, into ke endonyula yona andiyazi.
50_1_23_Kuba ndixinekile phakathi kwezinto ezimbini; ndinawo umnqweno wokunga ndinganduluka, ndiye kuba noKristu; kuba kokona kulungileyo kakhulu oko;
