50_1_24_kodwa ukuhlala ndihleli ndisenyameni, yeyona nto ifunekayo ngenxa yenu.
50_1_25_Kananjalo, ndikholose ngoko nje, ndiyazi ukuba ndiya kuhlala ndihlale, ndihleli nani nonke, ukuze nihambele phambili, nivuyiswe lukholo;
50_1_26_ukuze iqhayiya lenu kuKristu Yesu ngam liye lisanda ngokwanda, ngako ukubuya ndibekho kuni.
50_1_27_Kodwa ke ukuhlala kwenu makube kokuzifaneleyo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaKristu, ukuze, nokuba ndifikile ndanibona,  nokuba andifikanga, ndizive iindaba zenu, ukuba nimi moyeni mnye, ngamphefumlo mnye, nilwela inkolo yeendaba ezilungileyo,
50_1_28_ningothuswa nantweni-nye ngabo bachasayo; into ke leyo engumbonakalaliso wentshabalalo okunene kubo, kodwa ingumbonakalaliso wosindiso kuni, kube ke oko kuvela kuThixo.
50_1_29_Ngokuba nababalwa ukuthi, ngenxa kaKristu, ninganeli kukholwa kuye; nababalwa nokuva ubunzima ngenxa yakhe,
50_1_30_ninawo umzamo onjengalowo nawubonayo kum, nangoku niwuvayo ukuba ukho kum.
50_2_1_Ukuba ke ngoko kukho usizo kuKristu, ukuba kukho ukhuzo lothando, ukuba kukho ubudlelane boMoya,
50_2_2_ukuba kukho imfesane neemfefe, luzaliseni uvuyo lwam, ukuze nicinge nto-nye, ninaluthando lunye, ninamphefumlo mnye,  nicinga nto-nye;
50_2_3_ningenzi nanye into ngokweyelenqe, nangokozuko olulambathayo. Yithini ngokuthobeka kwentliziyo omnye ambalele omnye ekuthini nguyena wongamileyo kunaye.
50_2_4_Makangathi elowo axunele kwezakhe izinto zodwa, elowo makaxunele nakwezabanye.
50_2_5_Yibani nale ngcinga kuni, wayenayo kuye uKristu Yesu:
50_2_6_yena wathi, esebumeni bukaThixo, akathi ukulingana kwakhe oku noThixo kulixhoba;
50_2_7_usuke wazihluba, wathabatha ubume bomkhonzi, enziwe wafana nabantu;
50_2_8_wathi ngemo efunyenwe enjengomntu, wazithoba, waba ngolulamileyo, wada wesa ekufeni, ukufa ke kwasemnqamlezweni.
50_2_9_Kungoko athe uThixo wamphakamisa kakhulu, wamnika igama elingaphezu kwawo onke amagama;
50_2_10_ukuze ngegama likaYesu onke amadolo agobe,  awabasemazulwini, nawabasemhlabeni, nawabaphantsi komhlaba;
50_2_11_zithi zonke iilwimi zixele ukuba uYesu Kristu uyiNkosi,  kuze kuzukiswe uThixo uYise.
50_2_12_Ngoko ke, zintanda zam, njengokuba nahlala ninokuva,  lusebenzeni nilufeze olwenu usindiso, ninokuzoyikela nokungcangcazela; ningangi nenjenjalo xa ndikhoyo kodwa, manibe kukhona nenjenjalo Xa ndingekhoyo.
50_2_13_Kuba nguThixo okusebenzayo Ngaphakathi kwenu ukuthanda oko,  kwanokusebenza oko, ngenxa yenkolelo yakhe.
50_2_14_Izinto zonke zenzeni ningenakukrokra, ningenakuthandabuza,
50_2_15_ukuze nibe ngabangenakusoleka, abangenabuqhinga; nibe ngabantwana bakaThixo abangenakubekwa bala esazulwini sesizukulwana esigoso, esigwenxa; enithi phakathi kwabo nibonakale ninjengezikhanyiso ehlabathini, nibambelele elizwini lobomi;
50_2_16_nibe liqhayiya lam, nide nise kwimini kaKristu, ukuba andifumananga ndabaleka, kanjalo andifumananga ndabulaleka.
50_2_17_Ewe, nokuba ndiyathululwa ngokomnikelo phezu kombingelelo nombuso wokholo lwenu, ndiyavuya, ndivuyisana nani nonke.
50_2_18_Yithini ke ngokoko nani nivuye, nivuyisane nam.
50_2_19_Ke kaloku ndithembele eNkosini uYesu, ukuba ndonithumela uTimoti kamsinya, ukuze nam ndonwabe, ndakuzazi iindawo ezingani.
50_2_20_Kuba andinamntu wumbi, umphefumlo uvana nowam, owothi ayikhathalele ngokwenyaniso imicimbi engani.
50_2_21_Kuba bonke bafuna ezabo izinto, zingezizo ezikaYesu Kristu.
50_2_22_Ukucikideka ke kwakhe niyakwazi: ukuba wathi, njengomntwana kuyise, wakhonza kunye nam kuzo iindaba ezilungileyo.
50_2_23_Lowo ke ngoko ndithembe ukumthuma kwaoko, xa ndithe ndayiqonda imicimbi engam.
50_2_24_Ke ndikholose ngeNkosi, ukuba nam ngokwam ndoza kamsinya.
50_2_25_Kodwa ke ndibe kuyafuneka ukuba ndinithumele uEpafrodito,  umzalwana wam osebenza nam, umphumi-mkhosi nam, umthunywa wenu ke, umlungiseleli wam kwiintswelo zam;
50_2_26_ekubeni ke ebenilangazelela nina nonke, edandatheka, ngenxa enokuba nevayo ukuba wayesifa.
50_2_27_Kuba okunene wayesifa, ephantse ukufa. Ke uThixo wamenzela inceba; akenzela yena yedwa, wenzela nam lo, ukuze ndingabi buhlungu, ndibuhlungu kade.
50_2_28_Kukhona ngoko ndimthuma ngokukhawuleza, ukuze nithi nakumbona nibuye nivuye, kuthi nokwam ukuba buhlungu kudambe.
50_2_29_Mamkeleni ke ngokwaseNkosini, ninovuyo lonke; nibabeke abo banjalo;
50_2_30_ngokuba, ngenxa yomsebenzi kaKristu, wada waphantsa ukufa,  ebenza isichenge ubomi bakhe, ukuze enzelelele ukusilela kwenu ekundilungiseleleni.
50_3_1_Elokugqiba, bazalwana bam, vuyani niseNkosini. Ukunibhalela kwaezo zinto akunqenekile okunene kum, ke nina kuyaninqabisa.
50_3_2_Zilumkeleni izinja, balumkeleni abasebenzi beento ezimbi,  balumkeleni aborhunulo.
50_3_3_Kuba abolwaluko sithi, thina bakhonza uThixo ngomoya,  siqhayise ngoKristu Yesu, singakholosi ngenyama;
50_3_4_nakuba mna ndibe ndingakholosayo ngenyama; ukuba kukho bani uba unokukholosa ngenyama, bendingaba ngakumbi mna:
50_3_5_ndalukayo ngomhla wesibhozo, ndingowenzala kaSirayeli,  ndingowesizwe sikaBhenjamin, umHebhere wamaHebhere,  ngokomthetho ndingumFarisi,
50_3_6_ngokwenzondelelo ndilitshutshisa ibandla, ngokobulungisa obo basemthethweni ndingongenakusoleka.
50_3_7_Ndisuke, zona ezo zinto zabe ziyinzuzo kum, zona ezo ndazibalela ekuthini ziyinkxwaleko ngenxa kaKristu.
50_3_8_Ewe, okunene, ndisuka izinto zonke ndizibalele ekuthini ziyinkxwaleko, ngenxa yokongama kokumazi uKristu Yesu iNkosi yam; endithe ngenxa yakhe ndonakalelwa zezi zinto zonke,  ndizibalela ekuthini ziyinkunkuma, ukuze ndimzuze uKristu,
50_3_9_ndifunyanwe ndikuye, ndingenabo obam ubulungisa, obo basemthethweni; ndinobo bungokukholwa kuKristu, ubulungisa ke obuphuma kuThixo ngalo ukholo;
50_3_10_ukuba ndimazi, kwanamandla ovuko lwakhe, nokuba ndibe nobudlelane naye ngeentlungu zakhe, ndifaniswe noko kufa kwakhe;
50_3_11_ukuba ndingade ndifikelele ekuvukeni kwabafileyo.
50_3_12_Kungekuko ukuthi sendamkele, nokuthi sendigqibelele; ke ndiphuthuma ukuba ndingakuganga na nokukuganga oko, ndathi nam ndagangelwa khona nguye uKristu Yesu.
50_3_13_Bazalwana, mna andizibaleli ekuthini ndigangile; ke ndenza nto-nye: ndithi, ndizilibala izinto ezisemva, ndisolulela kweziphambili,
50_3_14_ndiphuthume ngokoxunele umvuzo wobizo lwaphezulu lukaThixo kuKristu Yesu.
50_3_15_Ngoko masithi, ngangoko singako thina bagqibeleleyo,  sicinge oko; kanjalo ukuba nicinga into ngokukumbi, uThixo wonityhilela naleyo.
50_3_16_Noko ke, apho sifikelele khona, masihambe ngamgca mnye,  masicinge nto-nye.
50_3_17_Yibani ngabaxelisa mna, bazalwana, nixunele kubo abahamba ngokunjalo, njengokuba ninomfuziselo, thina aba ke.
50_3_18_Kuba baninzi abahambayo, endathetha futhi kuni ngabo, ngoku ke ndithetha ndilila nokulila, ndisithi, bazizo iintshaba zomnqamlezo kaKristu;
50_3_19_abasiphelo siyintshabalalo, abaThixo usisisu sabo,  abaluzuko lulihlazo labo, abanyamekela izinto zomhlaba.
50_3_20_Kuba thina ikowethu lisemazulwini, apho kananjalo silinde khona kwauMsindisi, iNkosi uYesu Kristu;
50_3_21_eya kuwenza kumila kumbi umzimba wokuthobeka kwethu, ukuze wona wenziwe ufane nawo umzimba wozuko lwakhe, ngokokusebenza kwalowo unako ukuzithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.
50_4_1_Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam abaziintanda, balangazelelwayo,  luvuyo lwam, sithsaba sam, yimani ngokunjalo eNkosini,  zintanda.
50_4_2_UWodiya ndiyamyala, noSintike ndiyamyala, ukuba bacinge nto-nye beseNkosini.
50_4_3_Ndiyakucela nawe, sinxulumana senyaniso, bambisana nabo bafazi bazama nam ezindabeni ezilungileyo, kwanoKlemente,  nabanye abasebenzisi bam, abamagama asencwadini yobomi.
50_4_4_Vuyani eNkosini amaxesha onke; ndiyaphinda ndithi, Vuyani.
50_4_5_Ukuthantamisa kwenu makwazeke kubantu bonke. INkosi ikufuphi.
50_4_6_Ningaxhaleli nto; mazithi iingcelo zenu ezintweni zonke,  ngako ukuthandaza nokukhunga, ndawonye nokubulela, zaziswe kuye uThixo.
50_4_7_Lwaye uxolo lukaThixo, olugqithisele kuko konke ukuqonda,  luya kuzigcina iintliziyo zenu neengqiqo zenu kuKristu Yesu.
50_4_8_Elokugqiba, bazalwana, ndithi, iinto zonke eziyinene, iinto zonke ezindilekileyo, iinto zonke ezibubulungisa, iinto zonke ezinyulu, iinto zonke ezithandekayo, iinto zonke eziludumo lulungileyo, ukuba kukho sidima, ukuba kukho ndumiso,  zithelekeleleni ezo zinto.
50_4_9_Kwa-ezo zinto nazifundayo, nazamkela, naziva, nazibona kum,  yenzani zona ezo; waye uThixo woxolo eya kuba nani.
50_4_10_Ke kaloku ndaye ndivuya eNkosini kakhulu, ukuba ngoku kokugqibela kude kwathi ukukunyamekela kwenu okwam, kwabuya kwatyatyamba: enaye nikunyamekele okunene, koko ke naniswele ithuba.
50_4_11_Kungekuko ukuba ndithetha ngokuswela; kuba mna ndafunda ukuthi entlalweni endikuyo ndanele.
50_4_12_Ndiyazana nobuhlwempu, ndiyazana nobutyebi; kuko konke,  nasezintweni zonke, ndiqhelanisiwe nokuhlutha kwanokulamba,  nokutyeba kwanokuswela.
50_4_13_Ndinokuzenza izinto zonke, ndikulowo undomelezayo, uKristu.
50_4_14_Noko ke natyapha ukuba nobudlelane nam ngembandezelo.
50_4_15_Nani ke baseFilipi, niyazi ukuba, ekuqalekeni kweendaba ezilungileyo ezi, xenikweni ndaphumayo kwelaseMakedoni,  akubangakho nalinye ibandla eladlelana nam, ngokusingisele emcimbini wokunikela nowokwamkela, yaba nini nedwa.
50_4_16_Ngokuba, naseTesalonika, kwaba kanye nakabini nithumela,  nindinceda ekusweleni kwam.
50_4_17_Ingekuko ukuba ndibe ndifuna ukuphiwa; ikukuba ndibe ndifuna isiqhamo esandela emcimbini wenu.
50_4_18_Ke ndinezinto zonke nje, ndityebile, ndihluthi, ndizamkele nje kuEpafrodito izinto ezavela kuni: ivumba elimnandi,  umbingelelo owamkelekileyo, okholekileyo kakuhle kuye uThixo.
50_4_19_Ke uThixo wam wokwenzelelela konke ukuswela kwenu ngokobutyebi bakhe, ngokozuko olukuKristu Yesu.
50_4_20_Kuye ke uThixo, uBawo wethu, malubekho uzuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
50_4_21_Bulisani bonke abangcwele abakuKristu Yesu. Bayanibulisa abazalwana abanam.
50_4_22_Bayanibulisa bonke abangcwele, ngokukodwa ke aba bendlu kaKesare.
50_4_23_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani nonke.  Amen.
51_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  noTimoti umzalwana,
51_1_2_ubhalela abaseKolose, abazalwana abangcwele abakholwayo kuKristu; uthi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
51_1_3_Sihlala sibulela kuye uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, xa sinithandazelayo,
51_1_4_sivile nje ngokukholwa kwenu kuKristu Yesu, nokubathanda kwenu bonke abangcwele,
51_1_5_ngenxa yethemba eli nalibekelwayo emazulwini; nalivayo ngenxa engaphambili ngalo ilizwi lenyaniso leendaba ezi zilungileyo;
51_1_6_zikhoyo kuni, njengoko zikhoyo nakulo lonke ihlabathi,  zixakatha neziqhamo, kwanjengoko zixakathayo ngaphakathi kwenu,  kususela kwimini enaluvayo, nalwazi, ubabalo lukaThixo ngenya,  niso.
51_1_7_njengoko nafundayo nokufunda kuEpafra, ongumkhonzi oyintanda kunye nathi, engumlungiseleli othembekileyo kaKristu ngenxa yenu;
51_1_8_owasazisayo nokusazisa uthando lwenu lwaseMoyeni.
51_1_9_Ngenxa yoku, kususela kwimini esevayo, nathi asiphezi ukunithandazela nokunicelela, ukuze nizaliswe kukukwazi kakuhle ukuthanda kwakhe, ninokulumka nokuqonda konke okukokomoya;
51_1_10_ukuze nihambe ngokuyifaneleyo iNkosi, nise kuko konke ukukholisa, nixakathe isiqhamo kuwo wonke umsebenzi olungileyo,  nikhulela ekumazini uThixo;
51_1_11_nisomelezwa ngokomelela konke, ngokokuqina kozuko lwakhe,  nide nise kuko konke ukunyamezela, nokuzeka kade umsindo, kunye novuyo;
51_1_12_nibulela kuye uYise, owasenza sakulingana ukwahlulelwa ilifa labangcwele ekukhanyeni;
51_1_13_owasihlangulayo egunyeni lobumnyama, wasifudusela ebukumkanini boNyana wothando lwakhe,
51_1_14_esinayo kuye inkululeko ngokuhlawulelwa ngegazi lakhe,  ukuxolelwa kwezono ke oko.
51_1_15_Ungumfanekiselo kaThixo ongenakubonwa, owamazibulo kwindalo yonke.
51_1_16_Ngokuba zadalelwa kuye zonke izinto, ezisemazulwini nezisemhlabeni, ezinokubonwa nezingenakubonwa, nokuba ziitrone,  nokuba zibubukhosi, nokuba zizilawuli, nokuba ngamagunya; zonke izinto zidalwe nguye, zidalelwe yena.
51_1_17_Yena ke ungaphambi kweento zonke, nazo zonke izinto zima zimi kuye.
51_1_18_Yena ke uyintloko yomzimba, yebandla; oyingqalo,  owamazibulo ukuvuka kwabafileyo, ukuze yena abe ngomkhulu ezintweni zonke.
51_1_19_Ngokuba kwakholeka ukuthi ukuzaliseka konke kuhlale kuye,
51_1_20_nokuthi ngaye azixolelanise naye zonke izinto, elwenzile uxolo ngalo igazi lomnqamlezo wakhe; ewe, ngaye, nokuba zizinto ezisemhlabeni, nokuba zezisemazulwini.
51_1_21_Nani, enibe nifudula ningazani noThixo, niziintshaba ngengqondo yenu emisebenzini yenu engendawo, kukalokunje unixolelanisile ngako ukufa emzimbeni wenyama yakhe,
51_1_22_ukuze animise ningcwele, ningenakubekwa bala,  ningenakumangalelwa phambi kwakhe;
51_1_23_ukuba kaloku nihlala nihleli elukholweni, nisekelwe niqinile, ningashukunyiswa nimke ethembeni leendaba ezilungileyo ezi nazivayo, zona zashunyayelwayo kwindalo yonke ephantsi kwezulu; endaba ngumlungiseleli wazo, mna Pawulos.
51_1_24_Ngoku ndiyavuya ezintlungwini zam ngenxa yenu, ndikuzalisa kanye okusileleyo kwiimbandezelo zikaKristu, enyameni yam,  ngenxa yomzimba wakhe olilo ibandla;
51_1_25_endaba ngumlungiseleli walo mna ngokokugosisa kukaThixo,  awandigosisa ngako kuni, ukuba ndilizalise ilizwi likaThixo,
51_1_26_kwaimfihlelo, leyo ke ibifihliwe kwasemaphakadeni nasezizukulwaneni; kukalokunje ibonakalalisiweyo kubo abangcwele bakhe,
51_1_27_awathandayo uThixo ukubazisa bona into obuyiyo ubutyebi bozuko lwaloo mfihlelo phakathi kwazo iintlanga, obunguKristu phakathi kwenu, ithemba lozuko.
51_1_28_Sazisa yena ke thina, siluleka wonke umntu, sifundisa wonke umntu ngabo bonke ubulumko, ukuze simise wonke umntu egqibelele ekuKristu Yesu;
51_1_29_endibulalekela kona oko, ndizama ngokokusebenza kwakhe okusebenzayo kum ngamandla.
51_2_1_Kuba ndithanda ukuba nikwazi ukuba kukhulu kwako ukuzama endikuzamayo ngenxa yenu, nabo baseLawodike, nabo bonke abangabubonanga ubuso bam ngokwenyama;
51_2_2_ukuze zithuthuzelwe iintliziyo zabo, bebandakanyiwe ngothando, kusingise kuyo yonke indyebo yokuqonda okuqinisekileyo, kusingise ekwazini imfihlelo kaThixo uYise,  nekaKristu,
51_2_3_ekufihlwe kuye bonke ubutyebi bobulumko nobokwazi.
51_2_4_Nditsho ke, ukuze kungabikho bani unilukuhlayo ngentetho egudileyo.
51_2_5_Kuba nangona ndingekhoyo ngenyama, khona ngomoya ndinani,  ndivuya, ndibona ulungelelwano lwenu, nokuzimaseka kokukholwa kwenu kuKristu.
51_2_6_Njengokuba ngoko namamkelayo uKristu Yesu iNkosi, hambani kuye, nendele nakhelwe kuye,
51_2_7_naqiniswa ngokholo, njengoko nafundiswayo nafezeka kulo,  ninombulelo.
51_2_8_Lumkani, kungabikho bani unithimbayo ngayo intanda-bulumko,  nangokulukuhla okungento yanto, ngokwesithethe sabantu,  ngokweziqalelo zehlabathi, kungengokukaKristu.
51_2_9_Ngokuba kuhleli kuye konke ukuzaliseka kobuThixo ngokomzimba;
51_2_10_kanjalo nigqibelele kuye, oyintloko yabo bonke ubulawuli negunya;
51_2_11_enathi kuye naluswa nokwaluswa ngolwaluko olungenakwenziwa ngazandla, ngako ukuhluba umzimba wenyama, ngalo ulwaluko lukaKristu;
51_2_12_ningcwatywe naye elubhaptizweni; enathi nikuye, navuswa nokuvuswa naye, ngokukholwa kwenu kukusebenza kukaThixo,  owamvusa kubo abafileyo.
51_2_13_Nani, nifile nje ziziphoso nakukungaluki kwenyama yenu,  unidlise ubomi ndawonye naye, enixolele zonke iziphoso.
51_2_14_Ewucimile umbhalo wesandla owalana nathi, owawumelene nathi ngayo imimiselo, uwususile ke kanye, ngokuwubethelela emnqamlezweni;
51_2_15_ebabhunyule obalawuli nomagunya, wabenza isibonelo ekuhleni, ememelela ngabo ekuwo umnqamlezo.
51_2_16_Makungabikho mntu ngoko unigwebayo ngento edliwayo,  nangento eselwayo, nangendawo yomthendeleko, nangenyanga ethwasileyo, nangeesabatha;
51_2_17_ezisisithunzi sezinto eziza kuza; ke sona isiqu sesikaKristu.
51_2_18_Makungabikho namnye unilahlekanisa nomvuzo wenu, ethanda ukwenjenjalo ngokuthobeka kwentliziyo, nangokunqula izithunywa zezulu, engena ezintweni angazibonanga, efumana wakhukhumaliswa yiyo ingqiqo yenyama yakhe,
51_2_19_engabambe yona iNtloko, ekuphuma kuyo ukuthi umzimba wonke ukhule ngokukhulisa kukaThixo, uncedwa, ubandakanywa ngako konke ukuxhomekelelana kwamalungu nemisipha.
51_2_20_Ukuba ngoko nafa noKristu, nakhululeka kuzo iziqalelo zehlabathi, yini na ukuba ninge nisadla ubomi ngokwabehlabathi,  nimiselwe imimiselo
51_2_21_(eyokuthi, Musa ukuphatha, musa ukungcamla, musa ukuchukumisa,
51_2_22_kanti zonke ezi zinto zezonakaliswa kukudliwa), nenze ngokwemithetho neemfundiso zabantu?
51_2_23_Okunene zizinto ezo ezidunyelwe bubulumko ngokunqula okuzithandelayo, nangokuthobeka kwentliziyo, nangokubandezela umzimba, kodwa kungengambeko yanelisa inyama.
51_3_1_Ukuba ngoko navuswa kunye noKristu, funani izinto zaphezulu,  apho akhona uKristu, ehleli ngasekunene kukaThixo.
51_3_2_Nyamekelani izinto zaphezulu, zingabi zezasemhlabeni.
51_3_3_Kuba nafayo, baye ubomi benu bufihlakele ndawonye noKristu kuye uThixo.
51_3_4_Xa athe wabonakalaliswa uKristu, obubomi bethu, ngelo xesha niya kubonakalaliswa nani, ninaye ebuqaqawulini.
51_3_5_Bhubhisani ngoko amalungu enu asemhlabeni: umbulo,  ukungcola, ukuthabatheka okuhlazisayo, inkanuko embi, nokubawa,  okuyinkonzo yezithixo kona oko;
51_3_6_eza ngenxa yezo zinto ingqumbo kaThixo phezu kwabangevayo;
51_3_7_enanifudula nihamba phakathi kwazo nani, okuya nibe nisidla ubomi nikuzo.
51_3_8_Ke ngoku, nani aba, kulahleni oku konke: ingqumbo, umsindo,  ulunya, ukunyelisa; ukuthetha amanyala kungabikho emlonyeni wenu.
51_3_9_Musani ukuxokisana, nizihlubile nje umntu omdala, kunye nezenzo zakhe,
51_3_10_nambatha lowo umtsha, uhlaziyelwa ekwazini okuhle,  ngokomfanekiselo walowo wamdalayo;
51_3_11_apho kungekho mGrike namYuda, kwaluka nokungaluki,  mbharbhari namSkitiya, khoboka namkhululeki; usuke uKristu waba zizinto zonke, waba kubo bonke.
51_3_12_Yambathani ngoko, njengabanyulwa bakaThixo, abangcwele,  abathandiweyo, iimfesane zeemfefe, ububele, ukuthobeka kwentliziyo, ubulali, ukuzeka kade umsindo,
51_3_13_ninyamezelana, nixolelana, ukuba ubani uthi abe nokusola ngakubani; njengokuba naye uKristu wanixolelayo, yenjani njalo nani.
51_3_14_Ke, phezu kwazo zonke ezo zinto, yalekani uthando,  oluyintambo yogqibelelo.
51_3_15_Uxolo lukaThixo, enabizelwa kwakulo mzimbeni mnye,  malulawule ezintliziyweni zenu, nibe nokubulela.
51_3_16_Ilizwi likaKristu malihlale ngaphakathi kwenu ngokobutyebi;  nifundisana, nilulekana ngabo bonke ubulumko; nithi,  ngeendumiso neengoma nezango ezizezomoya, nivume kamnandi entliziyweni yenu kuyo iNkosi.
51_3_17_Nako konke enisukuba nikwenza ngelizwi, nokuba kungomsebenzi, yenzani izinto zonke egameni leNkosi uYesu,  nibulela ngayo kuye uThixo uYise.
51_3_18_Nina bafazi, walulameleni awenu amadoda, njengoko kufanele abaseNkosini.
51_3_19_Nina madoda, bathandeni abafazi benu, ningabi bukhali kubo.
51_3_20_Nina bantwana, balulameleni abazali benu ezintweni zonke;  kuba oko kukholekile kuyo iNkosi.
51_3_21_Nina boyise, musani ukubacaphukisa abantwana benu, ukuze bangafi iintliziyo.
51_3_22_Nina bakhonzi, balulameleni ezintweni zonke abaziinkosi zenu ngokwenyama; kungabi ngankonzo yamehlo, ngathi ningabakholisi-bantu; makube ngokwentliziyo engenakumbi,  nisoyika uThixo.
51_3_23_Nako konke enisukuba nikwenza, kusebenzeni ngokwasemphefumlweni, kunge kukwiNkosi, akukhona kubantu;
51_3_24_nisazi nje ukuba niya kuyamkela eNkosini imbuyekezo yelifa;  kuba nikhonza iNkosi uKristu.
51_3_25_Lowo umonayo omnye uya kukuthwala oko kona one ngako;  kanjalo akukho kukhetha buso bamntu.
51_4_1_Nina baziinkosi, baphatheni ngokufanelekileyo nangokulungeleleneyo abanikhonzayo; nisazi nje ukuba nani ngokwenu nineNkosi emazulwini.
51_4_2_Zingisani ukuthandaza, niphaphamile kuko, ninombulelo;
51_4_3_kunye noko nisithandazela, ukuze uThixo asivulele umnyango welizwi, ukuba siyithethe imfihlelo kaKristu, endikhonkxwe ngenxa yayo;
51_4_4_ukuze ndiyibonakalalise, njengoko ndimelwe kukuthetha ngako.
51_4_5_Hambani ngobulumko ngakwabo bangaphandle, nilonga ixesha eli.
51_4_6_Ukuthetha kwenu makuhlale kumnandi, kuvakalisiwe ngetyuwa,  ukuze nazi ukuba nimelwe kukuthini na ukuphendula bonke ngabanye.
51_4_7_Izinto zonke ezilunge nam wonazisa uTikiko, umzalwana oyintanda, umlungiseleli othembekileyo, ongumkhonzi kunye nam eNkosini;
51_4_8_endimthumele khona oku kuni, ukuze azazi iindawo ezingani,  azithuthuzele iintliziyo zenu;
51_4_9_kunye no-Onesimo, umzalwana othembekileyo, oyintanda,  ongomnye wenu. Bonazisa izinto zonke zalapha.
51_4_10_Uyanibulisa uAristarko, ongumbanjwa ndawonye nam, noMarko umtshana kaBharnabhas, enamkela imithetho ngaye; ukuba uthe weza kuni, mamkeleni;
51_4_11_noYesu, ekuthiwa nguYusto, kwabolwaluko; ngabo bodwa abasebenzisana nam ngenxa yobukumkani bukaThixo, abathe bona baba sisonwabiso kum.
51_4_12_Uyanibulisa uEpafra ongomnye wenu, umkhonzi kaKristu,  ehlala ezama ngenxa yenu emithandazweni, ukuze nime nigqibelele, nizalisekile kuko konke ukuthanda kukaThixo.
51_4_13_Kuba ndiyamngqinela ukuba unenzondelelo enkulu ngenxa yenu,  nabo baseLawodike, nabo baseHirapoli.
51_4_14_Uyanibulisa uLuka, igqirha eliyintanda, noDemas.
51_4_15_Bulisani kubazalwana abaseLawodike, nakuNimfa, nakulo ibandla elisendlwini yakhe.
51_4_16_Xa ke le ncwadi ithe yaleswa kuni, ize nenze ukuba ileswe nasebandleni eliseLawodike; nani niyilese leyo iphuma eLawodike.
51_4_17_Yithini kuArkipo, Lukhangele ulungiselelo owalwamkelayo lwaseNkosini, ukuze uluzalise.
51_4_18_Umbuliso lo ungesam isandla, mna Pawulos. Yikhumbuleni imixokelelwane yam. Ubabalo malube nani. Amen.
52_1_1_UPawulos noSilvano noTimoti babhalela ibandla labaseTesalonika elikuThixo uYise, neNkosi yethu uYesu, Kristu;  bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
52_1_2_Sihlala sibulela kuye uThixo ngenxa yenu nonke; sinikhumbula emithandazweni yethu;
52_1_3_singayeki ukuwukhumbula umsebenzi wenu wokholo, nokubulaleka kwenu kothando, nokunyamezela kwenu kokuthemba iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, phambi koThixo uBawo wethu;
52_1_4_sikwazi, bazalwana bathandiweyo nguThixo, ukunyulwa kwenu.
52_1_5_Ngokuba iindaba ezilungileyo zethu azibangakho kuni ngantetho yodwa; zabakho nangamandla, nangoMoya oyiNgcwele,  nangenkoloseko enkulu, njengoko naziyo ukuba saba ngabanjani na phakathi kwenu ngenxa yenu.
52_1_6_Nani naba ngabaxelisa thina nayo iNkosi, nalamkelayo nje ilizwi nisembandezelweni eninzi, ninovuyo loMoya oyiNgcwele;
52_1_7_nada naba yimifuziselo kubo bonke abakholwayo,  abakwelaseMakedoni nelaseAkaya.
52_1_8_Kuba lahlokoma livela kuni ilizwi leNkosi, akwaba khona kwelaseMakedoni nelaseAkaya lodwa; kusuke ezindaweni zonke ukukholwa kwenu kuThixo kwaduma, ngokokude kungabi safuneka ukuba sithethe nto.
52_1_9_Kuba bona ngokwabo baxela ngathi, ukuba kwakunjani na ukungena kwethu kuni, nokokuba nathini na ukuguqukela kuThixo,  niphuma kuzo izithixo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo oyinyaniso,
52_1_10_nilinde uNyana wakhe evela emazulwini, awamvusayo kwabafileyo, kwauYesu, osihlangulayo kuyo ingqumbo ezayo.
52_2_1_Kuba nikwazi ngokwenu, bazalwana, ukuba ukungena kwethu kuni akulambathanga;
52_2_2_sesuka, nakuba besive ubunzima ngenxa engaphambili,  siphethwe kakubi eFilipi, njengoko naziyo, asafihlisa, sikuye uThixo wethu, ukuzithetha kuni iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo,  sinomzamo omkhulu.
52_2_3_Kuba uvuselelo lwethu aluphumi kulahlekiseni, lungaphumi nasekungcoleni, lungekhona nasenkohlisweni.
52_2_4_Sithi, njengoko sicikidiweyo nguThixo, ukuba siphathiswe iindaba ezilungileyo, senjenjalo ukuthetha; singangi sikholisa abantu, kuba sikholisa uThixo ozicikidayo iintliziyo zethu.
52_2_5_Kuba kananjalo, njengoko naziyo, asizanga sibe nantetho yakucengacenga, namkhusane wakubawa, uThixo ulingqina;
52_2_6_singafuni nokufuna luzuko bantwini, nokuba kukuni, nokuba kukwabanye; nakuba besinokuba ngumthwalo ngokwabapostile bakaKristu.
52_2_7_Thina ke sisuke sathantamisa phakathi kwenu njengomdlezana osukuba ebagcinile abakhe abantwana;
52_2_8_ngokunjalo sinilangazelela nje, kwakholeka kuthi ukuba singaneli kunabela iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo nje kodwa,  sinabele nobomi bethu, ngenxa enokuba naba ziintanda kuthi.
52_2_9_Kuba niyakukhumbula, bazalwana, ukubulaleka kwethu nemigu yethu; kuba sazivakalisa kuni iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo,  sisebenza ubusuku nemini, ukuze singabi mthwalo nakubani kuni.
52_2_10_Ningamangqina nina kwanoThixo, ukuba saba njani na ukuba ngcwele, nokuba nobulungisa, nokungabi nakusoleka kuni bakholwayo;
52_2_11_kwanjengoko naziyo nonke ngabanye, ukuba besixelisa uyise kubantwana bakhe, siniyala, sinikhuza, siniqononondisa,
52_2_12_ukuba nihambe ngokumfaneleyo uThixo, onibizelayo kobakhe ubukumkani nobuqaqawuli.
52_2_13_Ngenxa yoko, nathi siyabulela kuye uThixo singayeki,  okokuba nathi, ukulamkela ilizwi likaThixo lodaba kuthi,  analamkela lililizwi labantu; nalamkela, njengokuba kunjalo okwenyaniso, lililizwi likaThixo elisebenzayo nokusebenza kuni bakholwayo.
52_2_14_Kuba nina, bazalwana, naba ngabaxelisa amabandla kaThixo akwelakwaYuda, akuKristu Yesu; ngokuba neva kwaobo bunzima nani ngabesizwe sakowenu, babuvayo nabo ngokwabo kuwe amaYuda;
52_2_15_wona ayibulalayo iNkosi uYesu kwanabawo abaprofeti,  asitshutshisa nathi, engamkholosi uThixo, echasene nabantu bonke;
52_2_16_esalela thina ukuba sithethe kuzo iintlanga, ukuze zisindiswe, esenzela ukuba azalise izono zawo ngamaxesha onke.  Iwafikele ke ingqumbo, kwada kwasekupheleni.
52_2_17_Thina ke, bazalwana, sanihluthwayo nje ixesha elifutshane ngesiqu, kungengantliziyo, sakhuthalela ngokugqithiseleyo ukububona ubuso benu, sinqwena kakhulu.
52_2_18_Kungoko sathandayo ukuza kuni, mna Pawulos lo, kwakanye nakabini; wesuka uSathana wasibambezela.
52_2_19_Kuba liyintoni na ithemba lethu, novuyo lwethu, nesithsaba sethu soqhayiso? Asinini aba na, phambi kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ekufikeni kwayo?
52_2_20_Inene, nini uzuko novuyo lwethu.
52_3_1_Kungoko kwathi, singasenakuzibamba, kwakholeka kuthi ukuba sisale eAtene sedwa.
52_3_2_Sathuma uTimoti, umzalwana wethu, umlungiseleli kaThixo,  osebenza nathi ezindabeni ezilungileyo zikaKristu, ukuze anizimase, anivuselele ngenxa yokholo lwenu,
52_3_3_kungabikho namnye ushukunyiswayo zezi mbandezelo; kuba nisazi ngokwenu ukuba simiselwe zona.
52_3_4_Kuba xenikweni besikuni, sanixelela ngenxa engaphambili ukuba siza kubandezelwa; njengokuba kwaba njalo, nani niyazi.
52_3_5_Ngenxa yoko nam ndithe, ndingasenakuzibamba, ndathumela ukuba ndilwazi ukholo lwenu, hleze abe unihendile uMhendi, saba sifuma ne sabulaleka.
52_3_6_Ngoku ke uTimoti, efikile nje kuthi evela kuni,  wasishumayeza iindaba ezilungileyo zokholo nezothando lwenu;  nokuba nihlala ninokusikhumbula okuhle, nilangazelela ukusibona, kwanjengokuba nathi silangazelela ukunibona.
52_3_7_Ngenxa yoko sithuthuzelekile, bazalwana, nini, kuyo yonke imbandezelo nengxakeko yethu ngalo ukholo lwenu;
52_3_8_ngokuba ngoku siphilile, ukuba nina nithi nime eNkosini.
52_3_9_Kuba singambuyekeza ngambulelo mni na uThixo ngani, kulo lonke uvuyo esivuya ngalo ngenxa yenu phambi koThixo wethu,
52_3_10_ubusuku nemini sikhunga ngokugqithiseleyo kakhulu, ukuba sibubone ubuso benu, sikuzalise ukusilela kokholo lwenu?
52_3_11_Wanga ke uThixo ngokwakhe, uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, angayilungisa indlela yethu yokuza kuni.
52_3_12_Yanga ke iNkosi inganandisa, inityebise eluthandweni, omnye komnye nakubo bonke, kwanjengokuba nathi sisenjenjalo kuni;
52_3_13_ukuze izizimase iintliziyo zenu, zingabi nakusoleka, zibe ngcwele phambi koThixo uBawo wethu, ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu nabo bonke abangcwele bayo.
52_4_1_Elokugqiba ngoko, bazalwana, siyanicela siniyala siseNkosini uYesu, ukuba nithi, njengokuba nakwamkelayo kuthi, okokuba nimelwe kukuthini na ukuhamba nokumkholisa uThixo, nikhule kuko ngakumbi.
52_4_2_Kuba niyazi ukuba zaba ziziyalo zini na, esaniyala ngazo ngeNkosi uYesu.
52_4_3_Kuba oku kukuthanda kukaThixo, ukungcwaliswa kwenu, ukuba nikhumke kulo uhenyuzo;
52_4_4_ukuba elowo kuni akwazi ukusizuza asiphathe esakhe isitya enobungcwalisa, enembeko;
52_4_5_angathabatheki yinkanuko, njengeentlanga ezingamaziyo uThixo;
52_4_6_ukuba kungabikho ugqithisayo, amlumkise umzalwana wakhe emcimbini lowo; ngenxa enokuba iNkosi ngumphindezeli wazo zonke ezi zinto, njengoko sasinixelele ngenxa engaphambili,  saniqononondisa.
52_4_7_Kuba uThixo akasibizelanga ekungcoleni; usibizele ebungcwaliseni.
52_4_8_Ngako oko ke lowo ugibayo, akagibi mntu, ugiba uThixo,  owasinikayo nokusinika uMoya wakhe oyiNgcwele.
52_4_9_Ke kaloku, ngalo uthando lobuzalwana, akufuneki ukuba ndinibhalele; kuba nina ngokwenu ningabafundiswe nguThixo ukuba nithandane;
52_4_10_kuba okunene niyakwenza oko kubo bonke abazalwana abakwelaseMakedoni liphela. Siyanivuselela ke, bazalwana, ukuba nikhule kuko oko ngakumbi;
52_4_11_nokuba nizondelele ukuba nizole, nenze ezenu izinto,  nisebenze ngezenu izandla, njengoko saniyalayo;
52_4_12_ukuze nihambe ngokuzibekileyo ngakwabo bangaphandle,  ningasweli nto.
52_4_13_Ke kaloku andithandi ukuba ningazi, bazalwana, mayela nabalele ukufa, ukuze ningabi buhlungu njengabanye abangenathemba bona.
52_4_14_Kuba xa sikholwa ukuba uYesu wafa, wabuya wavuka,  kwangokunjalo naye uThixo woza nabo abalele ukufa ngaye uYesu,  kunye naye.
52_4_15_Kuba oku siyakutsho kuni ngelizwi leNkosi ukuthi, thina babudlayo ubomi, baya kuba besekho ekufikeni kweNkosi, asisayi kubaphangela abalele ukufa.
52_4_16_Ngokuba iNkosi ngokwayo iya kuhla emazulwini inendanduluko,  inelizwi lesiphatha-zithunywa, inexilongo likaThixo, baze abafele kuKristu bavuke kuqala;
52_4_17_sandule thina babudlayo ubomi, basaseleyo, sixwilelwe emafini kwakunye nabo, siye kuyikhawulela iNkosi esibhakabhakeni; size ngokunjalo sihlale sihleli, sindawonye neNkosi.
52_4_18_Ngoko ke thuthuzelanani ngala mazwi.
52_5_1_Ke kaloku ngawo amaxesha namathuba, bazalwana, akufuneki nganto ukuba ndinibhalele;
52_5_2_kuba nani ngokwenu niyazi ngokucacileyo, ukuba imini yeNkosi, njengesela ebusuku, yenjenjalo ukuza kwayo.
52_5_3_Kuba xenikweni baya kuthi, Luxolo nokunqaba, oko baya kufikelwa yintshabalaliso ngebhaqo, kwanjengenimba komithiyo;  baye bengayi kukha basinde.
52_5_4_Ke nina, bazalwana, anisebumnyameni, ukuba imini leyo iniqubule njengesela.
52_5_5_Nonke nina ningabokukhanya, abemini; asingabobusuku,  asingabobumnyama.
52_5_6_Ngoko ke masingalali, njengabanye aba; masiphaphe sibe ziingcathu.
52_5_7_Kuba abaleleyo balala ebusuku; nabanxilayo banxila ebusuku.
52_5_8_Ke thina bangabemini masibe ziingcathu; masinxibe isigcina-sifuba sokholo nothando, nesigcina-ntloko esilithemba losindiso.
52_5_9_Ngokuba uThixo akasimiselanga ngqumbo; usimisele ukuzuza usindiso ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
52_5_10_owasifelayo, ukuze nokuba sihleli, nokuba silele, sidle ubomi kwakunye naye.
52_5_11_Kungoko ndithi, Thuthuzelanani, nakhane, kwanjengokuba nisenjenjalo.
52_5_12_Ke kaloku siyanicela, bazalwana, ukuba nibazi ababulalekayo phakathi kwenu, abanongamelayo eNkosini, abanilulekayo,
52_5_13_nibabeke ngokugqithiseleyo kakhulu ukubathanda, ngenxa yomsebenzi wabo. Hlalani ninoxolo phakathi kwenu.
52_5_14_Siyanivuselela ke, bazalwana, balulekeni abanxaxhayo;  bakhuzeni abamxhelo mncinane; basekeleni abathambileyo; yibani nokuzeka kade umsindo kubantu bonke.
52_5_15_Lumkani, kungabikho bani ubuyekeza ububi ngobubi nakubani;  hlalani niphuthuma okulungileyo omnye komnye, nakubantu bonke.
52_5_16_Hlalani nivuya.
52_5_17_Thandazani ningayeki.
52_5_18_Ezintweni zonke bulelani; kuba oko kukuthanda kukaThixo kuKristu Yesu ngani.
52_5_19_UMoya musani ukumcima.
52_5_20_Iziprofeto musani ukuzenza into engento.
52_5_21_Izinto zonke zicikideni, nibambe leyo intle.
52_5_22_Khumkani kuzo zonke iintlobo zenkohlakalo.
52_5_23_Wanga ke uThixo woxolo ngokwakhe anganingcwalisa niphelelisekile; uthi, ugqibelele owenu umoya nomphefumlo nomzimba, ugcinwe ngokungenakusoleka ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
52_5_24_Uthembekile onibizayo, oya kukwenza nokukwenza oko.
52_5_25_Bazalwana, sithandazeleni.
52_5_26_Babuliseni abazalwana bonke ngolwango olungcwele.
52_5_27_Ndiyanifungisa iNkosi ukuba le ncwadi ileswe kubo bonke abazalwana abangcwele.
52_5_28_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani. Amen.
53_1_1_UPawulos noSilvano noTimoti babhalela ibandla labaseTesalonika, elikuThixo uBawo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
53_1_2_bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo,  neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
53_1_3_Simelwe kukuhlala sibulela kuThixo ngenxa yenu, bazalwana,  njengokuba kufanelekile, ngokuba lukhula ngokugqithiseleyo ukholo lwenu, lusanda uthandano lwenu nonke ngabanye;
53_1_4_ngokokude thina ngokwethu siqhayise ngani emabandleni kaThixo, ngenxa yonyamezelo lwenu, nokholo lwenu,  ezintshutshisweni zenu zonke, nasezimbandezelweni enizinyamezelayo;
53_1_5_umbonakaliso ke lowo womgwebo onobulungisa kaThixo, ukuze nibalelwe ekuthini nibufanele ubukumkani bukaThixo, enithi ngenxa yabo nive nokuva ubunzima;
53_1_6_ukuba kanti yinto ebubulungisa kuThixo ukubabuyekeza ngembandezelo abanibandezelayo;
53_1_7_athi, nina babandezelwayo, anibuyekeze ngokuniphumza kunye nathi, ekutyhilekeni kweNkosi uYesu, ivela emazulwini inezithunywa zamandla ayo;
53_1_8_inomlilo odangazelayo, ibaphindezela abangamaziyo uThixo,  nabangazilulameliyo iindaba ezilungileyo zeNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu;
53_1_9_bona abo baya kuva ukubethwa, intshabalalo engunaphakade ke leyo, bemke ebusweni beNkosi, nasebuqaqawulini bokomelela kwayo;
53_1_10_xa ithe yeza kuzukiswa kubangcwele bayo, imangaliseke kubo bonke abakholwayo (ngokuba nakholwa bubungqina bethu kuni),  ngaloo mini.
53_1_11_Ngoko ke sihlala sithandaza nokuthandaza ngenxa yenu, ukuba uThixo wethu anibalele ekuthini nilufanele ubizo lwenu, azalise ngokunamandla konke ukukholiswa kukulunga, nomsebenzi wokholo;
53_1_12_ukuze lizukiswe igama leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu kuni, nani nizukiswe kuye, ngokobabalo lukaThixo wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
53_2_1_Ke kaloku siyanicela, bazalwana, ngenxa yokufika kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nokuhlanganiselwa kwethu kuyo,
53_2_2_ukuba ningazanyazanyiswa kwakamsinya, nahlukane nengqiqo;  ukuba ningabi navuso ngamoya, ngalizwi, ngancwadi ingathi,  ivela kuthi, ngokungathi iselingene imini leyo kaKristu.
53_2_3_Makungabikho bani unilukuhlayo nangalunye uhlobo; ngokuba ayinakufika yona, lungakhanga lufike ulahlo kuqala, atyhileke umntu wesono, unyana wotshabalalo;
53_2_4_lowo uchasayo, uziphakamisayo ngaphezu kwento yonke ekuthiwa nguThixo, nehlonelwayo, ngokokude azihlalise etempileni kaThixo, ezenza uThixo, ezibonisa ukuba unguThixo.
53_2_5_Anikhumbuli na, ukuba oko bendisekuni ndanixelela ezi zinto?
53_2_6_Nangoku niyakwazi okubambezelayo, ukuze atyhileke ngelakhe ixesha.
53_2_7_Kuba imfihlelo yokuchasana nomthetho iselisebenza; kodwa kulindwe ukuba ade lowo ubambezelayo ngoku asuswe kanye.
53_2_8_Andule ukutyhileka ongenamthetho; lowo iya kumtshisa iNkosi ngomoya womlomo wayo, imbangise ngokubonakala kokufika kwayo:
53_2_9_kwalowo, ukufika kungokokusebenza kukaSathana, ngayo imisebenzi yonke yamandla, nemiqondiso, nezimanga zobuxoki,
53_2_10_nangako ukulukuhla konke kokungalungisi kwabo batshabalalayo; ngenxa enokuba bengakwamkelanga ukuyithanda inyaniso, ukuze basindiswe.
53_2_11_Nangenxa yoko, uThixo uya kubathumela ulahlekiso olusebenza ngamandla, ukuze bakholwe bubuxoki;
53_2_12_ukuze bagwetywe bonke abangakholwanga yiyo inyaniso, basuka bakholiswa kuko ukungalungisi.
53_2_13_Ke thina simelwe kukuhlala sibulela kuye uThixo ngenxa yenu, bazalwana bathandiweyo yiNkosi, ukuba uThixo kwasekuqalekeni waninyulela ukusindiswa, ngokungcwalisa koMoya nokukholwa yinyaniso;
53_2_14_awanibizela kuko oko ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo zethu,  ukuba nizuze uzuko lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
53_2_15_Ngoko ke, bazalwana, yimani, nizibambe izithethe enazifundiswayo, nokuba kungelizwi, nokuba kungencwadi yethu.
53_2_16_Ke kaloku, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu ngokwayo, noThixo uBawo wethu owasithandayo, wasinika intuthuzelo engunaphakade,  nethemba elilungileyo ngobabalo,
53_2_17_wanga angazithuthuzela iintliziyo zenu, anizimase kuwo onke amazwi nemisebenzi elungileyo.
53_3_1_Elokugqiba, sithandazeleni, bazalwana, ukuba ilizwi leNkosi likhawuleze, lizukiswe, njengoko lenjenjalo nakuni;
53_3_2_nokuba sihlangulwe ebantwini abangendawo, abakhohlakeleyo;  kuba ukholo alubantwini bonke.
53_3_3_Ithembekile ke yona iNkosi, eya kunizimasa, inigcine kuyo inkohlakalo.
53_3_4_Sikholose ngani ke ngokwaseNkosini, ukuba izinto esinithethela zona niyazenza, nabe nisaya kuzenza.
53_3_5_Yanga ke iNkosi ingathi iintliziyo zenu izikhokelele eluthandweni lukaThixo, naselunyamezelweni lukaKristu.
53_3_6_Ke kaloku siyanithethela, bazalwana, egameni leNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, ukuba nikhwebuke kubo bonke abazalwana abahamba ngokunxaxha, bengahambi ngokwesithethe abasamkelayo kuthi.
53_3_7_Kuba niyazi ngokwenu, ukuba nimelwe kukuthini na ukusilinganisa; ngokuba asinxaxhanga phakathi kwenu.
53_3_8_Asidlanga sonka samntu ngesisa; sidle ngokubulaleka nangemigu, sisebenza ubusuku nemini, ukuze singabi bunzima nakubani kuni;
53_3_9_kungengakuba sasingenagunya; senzela ukuze sizinikele sibe ngumfuziselo kuni, nize nina nixelise thina.
53_3_10_Kuba naxenikweni besikuni, sanithethela ngelithi, Ukuba umntu akathandi kusebenza, makangadli nokudla.
53_3_11_Kuba siyeva ukuba inxenye phakathi kwenu ihamba ngokunxaxha, ingasebenzi nento, izifaka kwizinto zabanye.
53_3_12_Abanjalo ke siyabathethela, sibavuselela ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, ukuba bathi, besebenza ngokuzola, badle esisesabo isonka.
53_3_13_Ke nina, bazalwana, musani ukutha amandla ekwenzeni okulungileyo.
53_3_14_Ukuba ke kukho bani ungalilulameliyo ilizwi lethu ngencwadi le, mqondeni lowo, ningazidibanisi naye, ukuze adane.
53_3_15_Noko ke ze ningambaleli ekuthini ulutshaba; manimluleke njengomzalwana.
53_3_16_Yanga ke iNkosi yoxolo ngokwayo inganinika uxolo ngamaxa onke, ngeendlela zonke. INkosi mayibe nani nonke.
53_3_17_Umbuliso ngesam isandla, mna Pawulos. Nguwo lowo umqondiso kuzo zonke iincwadi; ndenjenjalo ukubhala.
53_3_18_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani nonke.  Amen.
54_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu, ngokommiselo kaThixo uMsindisi wethu, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, iThemba lethu,
54_1_2_ubhalela uTimoti, umntwana wakhe kanye ngokwaselukholweni;  uthi, Makube lubabalo, inceba, uxolo, oluvela kuThixo uBawo,  noKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.
54_1_3_Njengoko ndakuyalayo ukuba uhlale e-Efese, ndakuba mna ndisiya kwelaseMakedoni, ndenjenjalo ukukuyala nangoku, ukuze ubathethele abanye, bangafundisi mfundiso yimbi;
54_1_4_kananjalo banganyamekeli zintsomi namilibo yakuzalwa engaphele ndawo, izinto ezo ezibanga iimbuzwano, zingahambisi lona ulwakho lukaThixo olungokholo.
54_1_5_Ke intsingiselo yoyalo iluthando oluphuma entliziyweni ehlambulukileyo, nasesazeleni esilungileyo, naselukholweni olungahanahanisiyo;
54_1_6_abathe abathile, beziphosile ezo nto, baphambukela ekuthetheni okungento yanto;
54_1_7_bethanda ukuba ngabafundisi bomthetho, phofu bengaziqiqi izinto abazithethayo, kwanezo bazingqinayo.
54_1_8_Siyazi ke ukuba umthetho mhle, ukuba umntu uthi awuphathe ngokomthetho;
54_1_9_ngokwazi oku, ukuba umthetho lo awuwiselwe lungisa, uwiselwe ke abachasene nomthetho, nabangenakululama, abangahloneli Thixo, nabangaboni, abangengcwele, nabahlambeli, ababethiyise nababethi-nina, izigwinta,
54_1_10_abenzi bombulo, amadoda alalanayo, amasela abantu, amaxoki,  amafunga-buxoki, nokuba kukho nto yimbi ichasene nemfundiso ephilileyo;
54_1_11_ngokweendaba ezilungileyo zozuko lukaThixo osikelelekileyo,  endaphathiswa zona mna.
54_1_12_Kananjalo ndinombulelo kowandomelezayo, uKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu, kuba wandibalela ekuthini ndithembekile, endimisela ebulungiselelini;
54_1_13_nakuba ngaphambili ndandingumnyelisi, nomtshutshisi,  nomphathi kakubi; ndesuka ndenzelwa inceba, ngokuba ndakwenza oko ndingazi, ndisekungakholweni;
54_1_14_ke lwanda ngokuncamisileyo ubabalo lweNkosi yethu,  lunokholo nothando olukuKristu Yesu.
54_1_15_Lithembekile ilizwi eli, lifanelwe kukwamkelwa konke, eli lokuba uKristu Yesu weza ehlabathini ukuba asindise aboni;  endingomkhulu kubo mna;
54_1_16_noko ke ndesuka ndenzelwa inceba ngenxa yoku, ukuze uYesu Kristu akubonakalalisele kum, mna ungomkhulu, konke ukuzeka kade umsindo, ndibe ngumzekelo kwabo baza kukholwa kuye, base ebomini obungunaphakade.
54_1_17_Ke kaloku, kuye uKumkani wawo amaphakade, ongenakonakala,  ongenakubonakala, kuThixo olumkileyo yedwa, makubekho imbeko nozuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
54_1_18_Olu yalo ndilubeka phambi kwakho, mntwana wam Timoti,  ngokweziprofeto ezandulelayo ngawe, ukuze ulwe ngazo ukulwa okuhle,
54_1_19_unokholo nesazela esilungileyo, ethe inxenye, isigibile,  yaphukelwa ngumkhombe mayelana nokholo;
54_1_20_inoHimenayo noAlesandire, endabanikelayo kuSathana, ukuze baqeqeshwe ukuba banganyelisi.
54_2_1_Ndiyavuselela ngoko kuqala kwiinto zonke, ukuba kwenziwe izikhungo, imithandazo, izibongozo, imibulelo, ngenxa yabantu bonke;
54_2_2_ngenxa yookumkani nabo bonke abasekongameni, ukuze sihlale ngokonwaba nangokuzola, sinokuhlonela uThixo, nokundileka konke.
54_2_3_Kuba oku kuhle, kwamkelekile emehlweni oMsindisi wethu uThixo;
54_2_4_onga yena bangasindiswa bonke abantu, bafikelele ekuyazini inyaniso.
54_2_5_Kuba mnye uThixo; mnye nomlamli phakathi koThixo nabantu,  umntu uKristu Yesu,
54_2_6_lowo wazinikelayo ukuba abe yintlawulelo yokukhulula abantu bonke; ubungqina ke obo bokungqinwa ngamaxesha angawabo;
54_2_7_endithe ndamiselwa bona mna, ukuba ndibe ngumshumayeli nompostile (ndithetha inyaniso ndikuKristu, andixoki),  umfundisi weentlanga elukholweni nasenyanisweni.
54_2_8_Ngoko ndinga angathandaza amadoda kuzo zonke iindawo,  ephakamisa izandla ezingcwele, engenangqumbo, engenantandabuzo.
54_2_9_Kwangokunjalo mabathi nabafazi banxibe iingubo ezifanelekileyo, beneentloni, benesidima, ingabi kukuphotha iinwele, nokunxitywa kwegolide neeperile, nesambatho esixabiso likhulu;
54_2_10_mabathi (ngokufanele abafazi abathi bahlonela uThixo),  bavathe imisebenzi elungileyo.
54_2_11_Umfazi, ezolile, makafunde ethobele konke.
54_2_12_Umfazi ke andimvumeli ukuba afundise, nokuba ayilawule indoda; makazole.
54_2_13_Kuba kwabunjwa uAdam kuqala, kwandula ke ukubunjwa uEva.
54_2_14_Kanjalo akulukuhlwanga Adam; kulukuhlwe umfazi, waba sekugqitheni.
54_2_15_Noko ke wosindiswa ngokuzala, ukuba bathe bema elukholweni,  naseluthandweni, nasebungcwaliseni, benesidima.
54_3_1_Lithembekile ilizwi eli lithi, Ukuba ubani ungxamele ubuveleli, unqwenela umsebenzi omhle.
54_3_2_Umveleli ngoko umelwe kukuthi abe ngongenakukhalazelwa,  eyindoda yamfazi mnye, eyingcathu, enesidima, ezibekile, ebuka iindwendwe, enokufundisa;
54_3_3_engageziswa yiwayini, engembethi, engemngxameli wanzuzo imbi. Makabe ngothantamisayo, engalwi, engemthandi wamali;
54_3_4_eyongamele kakuhle eyakhe indlu, abantwana bakhe bemthobele,  benokundileka konke
54_3_5_(kuba ukuba umntu akakwazi ukuyongamela eyakhe indlu,  angathini na ukuphatha ibandla likaThixo?);
54_3_6_angabi ngosandula ukungeniswa, ukuze angathiwa lwale likratshi, eyele ekugwetyweni koMtyholi.
54_3_7_Kanjalo ke umelwe kukuthi abe nobungqina obuhle obuvela kwabangaphandle, ukuze angeyeli engcikivweni nasesibatheni soMtyholi.
54_3_8_Kwangokunjalo abalungiseleli bamelwe kukuba nokundileka,  bangabi ntlolela yombini, bangazinikeli kwiwayini eninzi,  bangangxameli nzuzo imbi;
54_3_9_mababe nemfihlo yokholo esazeleni esihlambulukileyo.
54_3_10_Nabo aba ke mabacikidwe ukuqala; bandule ke ukulungiselela,  bengabangenakumangaleleka.
54_3_11_Kwangokunjalo abafazi bamelwe kukuba nokundileka, bangabi ngabahlebi; mababe ziingcathu, bathembeke ezintweni zonke.
54_3_12_Abalungiseleli mababe ngamadoda abafazi ngabanye,  besongamela kakuhle abantwana nezindlu ezizezabo.
54_3_13_Kuba abo balungiselele kakuhle, bazizuzela isimo esihle,  nokungafihlisi okukhulu ekukholweni, okukuKristu Yesu.
54_3_14_Ezi zinto ndizibhala kuwe, ndithembe ukuba ndiya kuza kuwe kamsinya.
54_3_15_Ukuba ke ndithe ndalibala, ndikubhalela ukuze wazi, ukuba kumelwe kukuthiwani na ukuhanjwa endlwini kaThixo, yona ilibandla likaThixo ophilileyo, intsika nesiseko sayo inyaniso.
54_3_16_Kananjalo, ngokuvunyiweyo, inkulu imfihlelo yona leyo yokuhlonela uThixo: lowo wabonakalaliswa esenyameni,  wagwetyelwa esemoyeni, wabonakala kwizithunywa zezulu,  wavakaliswa phakathi kweentlanga, kwakholwa kuye ehlabathini,  wenyuswa waba sebuqaqawulini.
54_4_1_Ke kaloku uMoya uthi ngokucacileyo inxenye iya kumka elukholweni, ngamaxesha asemva, inyamekele oomoya abalahlekisayo, neemfundiso zeedemon;
54_4_2_imka nohanahaniso lwabathetha ubuxoki, betshiswe isazela sabo ngentsimbi;
54_4_3_bengavumi ukuba kuzekwe, nokuba kudliwe izinto ezadalwa nguThixo, ukuze zamkelwe ngombulelo ngabo bakholwayo, bayaziyo inyaniso.
54_4_4_Ngokuba sonke isidalwa sikaThixo sihle; asiyonto yakulahlwa,  ukuba samkelwe ngombulelo;
54_4_5_kuba singcwaliswa ngalo ilizwi likaThixo nangezibongozo.
54_4_6_Ukuba uthe ezi zinto wazibeka phambi kwabazalwana, woba ngumlungiseleli omhle kaYesu Kristu, wondliwe ngamazwi okholo,  nawemfundiso entle oyilandelayo.
54_4_7_Ke zona iintsomi ezihlambelayo zamaxhegokazi zimangale.  Ziqhelise ukuhlonela uThixo.
54_4_8_Kuba eyeyomzimba ingqeqesho inceda kancinane; ke kona ukuhlonela uThixo kunceda ngako konke, kunedinga lobomi bakalokunje, nobobo buza kubakho.
54_4_9_Lithembekile ilizwi elo, lifanelwe kukwamkelwa konke.
54_4_10_Kuba sibulalekela, singcikivelwe oko; ngokuba sithembele kuThixo ophilileyo, onguMsindisi wabantu bonke, ngokukodwa owabakholwayo.
54_4_11_Bathethele ezi zinto, ufundise zona.
54_4_12_Makungabikho namnye ubudelayo ubuncinane bakho; suka ube ngumzekelo wabakholwayo ngentetho, ngehambo, ngothando,  ngokholo, ngobunyulu.
54_4_13_Nyamekela imfundo, uvuselelo, imfundiso, ndide ndifike.
54_4_14_Ungasihilizeli isipho esingokubabalwa, esikuwe;  owasinikwayo ngesiprofeto, kunye nokubekwa izandla yintlanganiso yamadoda amakhulu.
54_4_15_Zinyamekele ezo zinto, hlala kwezo zinto, ukuze ukuhambela kwakho phambili kubonakale kwinto yonke.
54_4_16_Zilumkele wena nemfundiso yakho; hlala uhleli kwezo zinto;  kuba ngokwenza oko, wozisindisa wena, ubasindise nabo bakuvayo.
54_5_1_Indoda enkulu musa ukuyithethisa kabukhali, yiyale njengoyihlo; amancinane, njengabazalwana;
54_5_2_abafazi abakhulu, njengoonyoko; abancinane, njengoodade,  unobunyulu bonke.
54_5_3_Babeke abahlolokazi abangabahlolokazi ngenene.
54_5_4_Ke ukuba kukho mhlolokazi uthile unabantwana, nokuba ngabazukulwana, ukuqala mabafunde ukuhlonela elabo ikhaya,  bababuyekezele umbuyekezo ooninakhulu; kuba oko kuhle,  kwamkelekile emehlweni kaThixo.
54_5_5_Ke yena ongumhlolokazi ngenene, eshiywe yedwa, uthembela kuThixo; uhlala ehleli ekukhungeni nasemithandazweni ubusuku nemini.
54_5_6_Kodwa yena oxhamla iziyolo ufile, nakuba ngathi udla ubomi.
54_5_7_Bathethele ezi zinto, ukuze bangabi nakukhalazeleka.
54_5_8_Ukuba ke umntu akabakhathalele abakhe, ngokukodwa abendlu yakhe, ulukhanyele ukholo, unobubi ngaphezu kongakholwayo.
54_5_9_Makangabalelwa enanini labahlolokazi umhlolokazi ongaphantsi kweminyaka emashumi mathandathu; owayengumfazi wandoda-nye,
54_5_10_engqinelwe ngemisebenzi emihle, ukuba wondle abantwana,  ukuba wamkele iindwendwe, ukuba uzihlambile iinyawo zabangcwele, ukuba ubasizile ababandezelweyo, ukuba usukelene nemisebenzi yonke elungileyo.
54_5_11_Ke bona abahlolokazi abatsha bamangale; kuba xa bathe badimala nguKristu, bothanda ukwenda;
54_5_12_benesigwebo sokuba balutshitshisile ukholo lokuqala.
54_5_13_Kunye noko ke bafunda ukungasebenzi nto, bethungelana nezindlu; banganeli kungasebenzi nto kodwa, basuka kananjalo babe ngamapholopholo, bazifake kwizinto zabanye, bathethe izinto ezingafanelekileyo.
54_5_14_Ngoko ndinga abahlolokazi abatsha bangenda, bazale, babe ngabanikazi-mizi, bangamniki ochasayo nalinye ithuba lokutshabhisa.
54_5_15_Kuba inxenye iseyiphambukele emva koSathana.
54_5_16_Ukuba kukho ikholwa, nokuba likholwakazi, elinabahlolokazi,  malibasize, lize ibandla lingasindwa, ukuze lona lisize abangabahlolokazi ngenene.
54_5_17_Amadoda amakhulu, awongamela kakuhle, makabalelwe ekuthini afanelwe yimbeko ephindwe kabini, ngokukodwa lawo abulalekayo elizwini nasemfundisweni.
54_5_18_Kuba sitsho isibhalo ukuthi, Uze ungayibophi umlomo inkomo ibhula; nokuthi, Umsebenzi uwufanele umvuzo wakhe.
54_5_19_Ukumangalelwa kwendoda enkulu musa ukukwamkela,  kungabangakho mangqina mabini nokuba mathathu.
54_5_20_Abo bonayo, bohlwaye emehlweni abantu bonke, ukuze nabanye aba babe nokoyika.
54_5_21_Ndiyakuqononondisa emehlweni kaThixo, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nezithunywa zezulu ezinyuliweyo, ukuba uzigcine ezi zinto ungaqali ugwebe, ungenzi nto ngokwayama bani.
54_5_22_Ungangxami ubeke izandla phezu kukabani, kanjalo ungadlelani nabanye ngezono zabo; zigcine nyulu.
54_5_23_Musa ukuba sasela manzi; sela intwana yewayini, ngenxa yesisu sakho, nobulwelwe bakho obufuthi.
54_5_24_Izono zabanye abantu zisekuhleni kanye, ziyandulela ukuya emgwebeni; abanye ke ziyabalandela nokubalandela.
54_5_25_Kwangokunjalo nemisebenzi emihle isekuhleni kanye, naleyo ingenjalo ayinako ukufihlakala.
54_6_1_Onke ke amakhoboka aphantsi kwedyokhwe, ndinga ke angababalela abaniniwo ekuthini, bafanelwe yimbeko yonke, ukuze igama likaThixo nemfundiso inganyeliswa.
54_6_2_Lawo ke ankosi zikholiweyo, makangazideli ngakuba zingabazalwana; makube kukhona azikhonzayo, ngokuba zingamakholwa, ziziintanda ezingamadlelana ngomsebenzi wokusiza. Bafundise ezi zinto, ubavuselele.
54_6_3_Ukuba umntu ufundisa mfundiso yimbi, angavumani namazwi aphilileyo angaweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, nemfundiso engokokuhlonela uThixo:
54_6_4_uthiwe lwale likratshi, engazi lutho kakuhle; ufa kukukhanuka iimbuzwano namaphike amazwi, ekuthi kwezo nto kuphume umona, iinkani, izinyeliso, izirhano ezingendawo,
54_6_5_iimpikiswano zochuku lwabantu abonakele iingqiqo, abahluthwe inyaniso, beba ukuhlonela uThixo kukusekeleza inzuzo.
54_6_6_Ke kona ukuhlonela uThixo, kundawonye nokwanela, kusekeleze inzuzo enkulu.
54_6_7_Kuba sibe singangenanga nanto ehlabathini; kuyabonakala kananjalo ukuba asinakuphuma nanto.
54_6_8_Sinento ke edliwayo neyambathwayo, masanele zezo zinto.
54_6_9_Ke abo banga bangaba zizityebi, beyela ekuhendweni,  nasesibatheni, nasezinkanukweni ezininzi ezibubudenge ezenzakalisayo; zona zibatshonisayo abantu ekonakaleni,  nasekutshabalaleni.
54_6_10_Kuba ukuthanda imali yingcambu yeento zonke ezimbi: abathe abathile, ngokuzolulela kuko, balahlekana nokholo, bazibhodloza ngobuhlungu obuninzi.
54_6_11_Ke wena, mntu kaThixo, zibaleke ezo zinto; phuthuma ke ubulungisa, ukuhlonela uThixo, ukholo, uthando, unyamezelo,  ubulali.
54_6_12_Wuzame umzamo omhle wokholo; bubambe ubomi obungunaphakade,  owabizelwa nokubizelwa kubo, waza waluvuma uvumo oluhle emehlweni amangqina amaninzi.
54_6_13_Ndiyakuthethela emehlweni kaThixo, ozidlisa ubomi zonke izinto, nasemehlweni kaKristu Yesu, owangqina wavuma uvumo oluhle phambi koPontiyo Pilato,
54_6_14_ukuba uwugcine umthetho lo, ungabi nabala, ungabi nakukhalazelwa, kude kufike ukubonakala kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu,
54_6_15_aya kukubonakalisa ngawakhe amaxesha; lowo usikelelekileyo,  ukuphela konamandla, uKumkani kakumkani, uNkosi kankosi;
54_6_16_okuphela konokungafi, ehleli ekukhanyeni okungenakusondelwa; ekungekho namnye kubantu owakha wambona,  nonako ukumbona; kuye makubekho imbeko namandla angunaphakade.  Amen.
54_6_17_Abazizityebi kweli phakade langoku bathethele bangakratshi,  bangathembeli butyebini bungagqalekiyo; mabathembele kuThixo ophilileyo, obeka phambi kwethu izinto zonke ngokobutyebi,  ukuba zidliwe;
54_6_18_benze okulungileyo, babe zizityebi zemisebenzi emihle, babe nokwaba kakuhle, babe nobudlelane;
54_6_19_baziqwebele isiseko esihle, base exesheni eliza kuza, ukuze babubambe ubomi obungunaphakade.
54_6_20_Wa, Timoti, loo nto uyiphathisiweyo yigcine, uphambuke ezintethweni ezingezizo, ezihlambelayo, nakwiinkcaso zokwazi,  okubizwa njalo kuxokwa;
54_6_21_abasuke abathile, bethe banako oku kwazi, baluphosa ukholo.  Ubabalo malube nawe. Amen.
55_1_1_UPawulos, umpostile kaYesu Kristu ngokuthanda kukaThixo,  ngokwedinga lobomi obukuKristu Yesu,
55_1_2_ubhalela uTimoti, umntwana wakhe oyintanda; uthi, Makube lubabalo, nenceba, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, noKristu Yesu iNkosi yethu.
55_1_3_Ndinokubulela kuye uThixo, endamkhonzayo kwakoomawokhulu ndinesazela esihlambulukileyo, ndikukhumbula njengokungapheliyo, ekukhungeni kwam ubusuku nemini;
55_1_4_ndilangazelela ukunga ndingakubona, ndizikhumbula nje iinyembezi zakho, ukuze ndizaliswe luvuyo;
55_1_5_ndikhunjuzwa nje ukholo olukuwe olungenakuhanahanisa, lona lwahlalayo kuqala kunyokokhulu uLoyisi, nakunyoko uYunike,  endinyanisileyo ke ukuthi luhleli nakuwe.
55_1_6_Endithi ngenxa yelo thuba ndikukhumbuze, ukuba usikhwezele isipho sokubabalwa kwakho nguThixo, esikhoyo kuwe ngokubekwa kwezandla zam phezu kwakho.
55_1_7_Kuba uThixo akasinikanga moya wabugwala; wasinika owamandla,  nowothando, nowesidima.
55_1_8_Ngoko ke musa ukuba nazintloni ngabo ubungqina beNkosi yethu, nangam, mna mbanjwa wayo; suka uve ububi kunye nam ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo, ngokwamandla kaThixo;
55_1_9_owasisindisayo, wasibiza ngobizo olungcwele, engenzi ngokwemisebenzi yethu, esenza ngokweyakhe ingqibo, nobabalo,  esababalwa ngalo ngoKristu Yesu phambi kwamaxesha aphakade;
55_1_10_lwabonakaliswa ke ngoku ngako ukubonakala koMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu, owakubhangisayo okunene ukufa, kodwa wabukhanyisa ubomi nokungonakali, ngazo iindaba ezilungileyo ezi;
55_1_11_endamiselwa zona mna, ndaba ngumvakalisi nompostile nomfundisi weentlanga;
55_1_12_endithi kananjalo ngenxa yeli thuba ndive obu bunzima. Noko ke andinazintloni; kuba ndiyamazi endikholiweyo nguye; kanjalo ndithi, ndeyisekile ukuba unako ukuyigcina into endimphathisileyo, ese kuloo mini.
55_1_13_Umzekelo wamazwi aphilileyo owawevayo kum, wubambe elukholweni naseluthandweni olukuKristu Yesu.
55_1_14_Loo nto intle uyiphathisiweyo, yigcine ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ohleliyo ngaphakathi kwethu.
55_1_15_Oku uyakwazi, ukuba bandinikele umva bonke abaseAsiya;  abanoFigelo noHermogene.
55_1_16_Yanga iNkosi ingayenzela inceba indlu kaOnesiforo; ngokuba kwaba futhi endiphumza, akaba nazintloni nguwo umxokelelwane wam.
55_1_17_Wathi akuba eseRoma, wandifuna ngokukhuthala okukhulu,  wandifumana.
55_1_18_Yanga iNkosi ingamfumanisa inceba eNkosini ngaloo mini.  Nguwena waziyo kakuhle oko zingako izinto awalungiselela ngazo e-Efese.
55_2_1_Wena ngoko, mntwana wam, yomelela elubabalweni olukuKristu Yesu;
55_2_2_uthi nezinto owazivayo kum ngamangqina amaninzi, ezo uzibeke phambi kwabantu abathembekileyo, bona baya kukulingana ukufundisa nabanye.
55_2_3_Wena ngoko bunyamezele ububi, njengomphumi-mkhosi olungileyo kaKristu Yesu.
55_2_4_Akukho namnye uthi, ephuma umkhosi, azibhijele ngemicimbi yobu bomi; ukuze amkholise lowo umnyulele ukuphuma umkhosi.
55_2_5_Nakuba ke ubani esithi azame emdlalweni, akathweswa sithsaba, ukuba akathanga azame ngokomthetho.
55_2_6_Umlimi lowo ubulalekayo, umelwe kukwamkela kuqala kwiziqhamo.
55_2_7_Ziqiqe izinto endizithethayo; iNkosi yokupha ke ingqondo ezintweni zonke.
55_2_8_Mkhumbule uYesu Kristu, engovukileyo kwabafileyo,  engowembewu kaDavide, ngokweendaba zam ezilungileyo;
55_2_9_endiva ububi ngenxa yazo, kude kuse ezintanjeni, njengomenzi wobubi; ke lona ilizwi likaThixo alibotshiwe.
55_2_10_Ngenxa yoko izinto zonke ndiyazinyamezela ngenxa yabo abanyulwa, ukuze nabo bamkele usindiso olukuKristu Yesu,  ndawonye nozuko olungunaphakade.
55_2_11_Lithembekile ilizwi eli: Kuba xa safa naye, sodla ubomi kwandawonye naye;
55_2_12_ukuba siyanyamezela, solawula kwandawonye naye; ukuba siyamkhanyela, naye wosikhanyela;
55_2_13_ukuba asithembekile, yena uhlala ethembekile; akanako ukuzikhanyeza.
55_2_14_Bakhumbuze ezo zinto, uqononondise emehlweni eNkosi, ukuba kungenziwa mfazwe yamazwi angancedi lutho, kuze kubhukuqeke abaphulaphuli.
55_2_15_Kukhuthalele ukuzimisa phambi koThixo ucikidekile,  ungumsebenzi ongenazintloni, ulungisa ukulahlula ilizwi lenyaniso.
55_2_16_Ke zona iintetho ezingento, ezihlambelayo, zinxweme; kuba ziya kuhambela phambili kokukhona kungahloneli Thixo.
55_2_17_Nelizwi labo liya kudla njengesilonda esiqhenqethayo;  abanoHimenayo noFileto,
55_2_18_abathe bona bayiphosa inyaniso, besithi uvuko seluthe lwakho, kananjalo belubhukuqa ukholo lwenxenye.
55_2_19_Noko ke limi, lithe nkqi, ilitye lesiseko likaThixo,  linambhalo uthi, INkosi iyabazi abangabayo; nothi, Mabasuke kuko ukungalungisi, bonke abalibizayo igama likaKristu.
55_2_20_Ke endlwini enkulu akubikho zitya zagolide nazasilivere zodwa; kubakho nezomthi nezomdongwe. Inxenye ke zezembeko,  inxenye azizambeko.
55_2_21_Ukuba ngoko umntu uthe wazikhuphulula kwezo zinto, woba sisitya sembeko, singcwalisiwe, simlungele kakuhle umninindlu,  silungiselwe wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.
55_2_22_Ke zibaleke iinkanuko zobutsha; phuthuma ke ubulungisa,  ukholo, uthando, uxolo nabo bayinqulayo iNkosi ngokwasentliziyweni ehlambulukileyo.
55_2_23_Yinxweme imibuzwana yobudenge engenangqeqesho, usazi ukuba izala imfazwe.
55_2_24_Ke umkhonzi weNkosi akamele kulwa; umele ukuba nokuthantamisa kubantu bonke, enokufundisa, enyamezela ububi,
55_2_25_ebaqeqesha ngobulali abo baphikayo; ukuba akangethi na kanti uThixo abaphe inguquko esa ekuyazini inyaniso,
55_2_26_babuye baqabuke, baphume esibatheni sakhe uMtyholi,  ababanjiselwe ukuthanda kwakhe nguye.
55_3_1_Ke, kwazi oku, ukuba ngemihla yokugqibela kuya kufika amaxesha anomngcipheko.
55_3_2_Kuba abantu baya kuba ngabazithandayo, abathandi bemali,  abaqhankqalazi, abakratshi, abanyelisi, abangeva bazali,
55_3_3_abangabuleliyo, abangengcwele, abangenabubele,  abangenatarhu, abatyholi, abangenakuzeyisa, izibhoja,  abangenakuthanda kulunga,
55_3_4_abancethezi, izityhuthutyhuthu, abathiwe lwale likratshi,  abathandi beziyolo kunokuba bathande uThixo;
55_3_5_benokumila kokuhlonela uThixo, ukanti bayawakhanyela amandla ako. Kwabo ke khwebuka.
55_3_6_Kuba baphuma kwaba, abo banyebelezela ezindlwini, bathimbe abafazazana abazono ziziimfumba, bephethwe ziinkanuko ngeenkanuko,
55_3_7_behlala befunda, bangaze phofu babe nako ukufika ekuyazini inyaniso.
55_3_8_Kwangolo hlobo ke, bathi ooYanes noYambres bamchasa uMoses,  ngokunjalo nabo aba bayayichasa inyaniso. Bangabantu abonakele iingqiqo, abangenakucikideka ngakulo ukholo.
55_3_9_Abayi kuhambela phambili ngakumbi; kuba ukungabi nangqiqo kwabo kuya kubonakala kubantu bonke, njengokuba kwaba njalo okwabaya.
55_3_10_Ke wena uyilandile eyam imfundiso, ihambo, ingqibo, ukholo,  ukuzeka kade umsindo, uthando, unyamezelo,
55_3_11_iintshutshiso, iintlungu ezinjengezo zandihlelayo kwa-Antiyokwe, eIkoniyo, eListra; ukutshutshiswa okunjengoko ndakuthwalayo, yaza iNkosi yandihlangula kuko konke.
55_3_12_Nabo bonke ke abathanda ukuhlala ngokuhlonela uThixo kuKristu Yesu baya kutshutshiswa.
55_3_13_Ke bona abantu abangendawo noosiyazi, kukhona baya kuhambela phambili ebubini, belahlekisa, belahlekiswa.
55_3_14_Ke wena yima ezintweni owazifundayo, waqiniselwa kuzo,  umazi owazifunda kuye;
55_3_15_nokuba uzaze kwasebuntwaneni izibhalo ezingcwele, ezinako ukukulumkisela elusindisweni ngokukholwa kuKristu Yesu.
55_3_16_Sonke isibhalo, siphefumlelwe nguThixo nje, sikwancedela ukufundisa, ukohlwaya, ukululeka, ukuqeqesha okusebulungiseni,
55_3_17_ukuze umntu kaThixo afaneleke, exhobele wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.
55_4_1_Ndiyaqononondisa mna ngoko emehlweni kaThixo, neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, oza kugweba abaphilileyo nabafileyo,  kwanangokubonakala kwakhe nobukumkani bakhe:
55_4_2_livakalise ilizwi; zingisa ukwenjenjalo ngamathuba alungileyo naxakileyo; yohlwaya, khalimela, vuselela, unako konke ukuzeka kade umsindo, nokufundisa.
55_4_3_Kuba kuya kubakho ixesha abangayi kuyinyamezela imfundiso ephilileyo; baya kusuka ngokweenkanuko zabo bazifumbele abafundisi, bebaba iindlebe;
55_4_4_babeya kuzisonga zimke iindlebe kuyo inyaniso, baphambukele ke kuzo iintsomi.
55_4_5_Ke wena yiba yingcathu ezintweni zonke, nyamezela ububi,  umsebenzi womshumayeli weendaba ezilungileyo wenze, buzalise ubulungiseleli bakho.
55_4_6_Kuba mna sendithululwa ngokomnikelo; nalo ixesha lokunduluka kwam likufuphi.
55_4_7_Umzamo omhle ndiwuzamile, ugqatso ndilufezile, ukholo ndilugcinile.
55_4_8_Okokugqibela ndibekelwe isithsaba sobulungisa, eya kundibuyisela ngaso ngaloo mini iNkosi, umgwebi olilungisa;  ingabi ndim ndedwa ke, ibe ngabo bonke abakuthandayo ukubonakala kwayo.
55_4_9_Khawuleza uze kum kamsinya;
55_4_10_kuba uDemasi wandishiya ngokuthanda iphakade langoku, waya eTesalonika; uKreske uye kwelaseGalati; uTito uye kwelaseDalmati.
55_4_11_NguLuka yedwa onam. Thabatha uMarko uze naye; kuba unokundinceda kakuhle kumsebenzi wokulungiselela.
55_4_12_Ke uTikiko ndamthumela e-Efese.
55_4_13_Ingubo endayishiya eTrowa kuKarpo, uze uyiphathe ekuzeni kwakho, neencwadi ezo, ngokukodwa ezezintsu.
55_4_14_UAlesandire, umkhandi wobhedu, wandenza izinto ezininzi ezimbi; iNkosi iya kumbuyekeza ngokwemisebenzi yakhe.
55_4_15_Mlumkele nawe; kuba wawachasa kunene amazwi ethu.
55_4_16_Kokokuqala ukuziphendulela kwam, akubangakho namnye unam,  basuka bonke bandishiya; kwanga akungebalelwe kubo oko.
55_4_17_Noko ke iNkosi yandinceda, yandomeleza; ukuze ngam uvakaliso lweendaba ezilungileyo luzaliseke, neentlanga zonke zive; ndaza ndahlangulwa emlonyeni wengonyama.
55_4_18_Isaya kundihlangula yona iNkosi kuwo wonke umsebenzi ongendawo, indisindisele ebukumkanini bayo obusemazulwini; kuyo makubekho uzuko, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
55_4_19_Bulisa kuPriska noAkwila, nakwindlu kaOnesiforo.
55_4_20_UErasto wasala eKorinte. Ke uTrofimo ndamshiya eMileto esifa.
55_4_21_Khawuleza uze, kungekabi sebusika. Uya kubulisa uYubhulo,  noPudens, noLino, noKlawudiya, nabo abazalwana bonke.
55_4_22_INkosi uYesu Kristu mayibe nomoya wakho. Ubabalo malube nani. Amen.
56_1_1_UPawulos, umkhonzi kathixo, umpostile ke kaYesu Kristu,  ngokokholo lwabanyulwa bakaThixo, nokuyazi inyaniso engokokuhlonela uThixo;
56_1_2_ngethemba lobomi obungunaphakade, awathi uThixo,  ongenakuxoka, wabubeka idinga ngaphambi kwamaxesha angunaphakade,
56_1_3_walibonakalisa ke ilizwi lakhe ngamaxesha angawalo,  ngokuvakalisa endakuphathiswayo mna, ngokommiselo woMsindisi wethu uThixo:
56_1_4_kuTito, umntwana wam wenene ngokwaselukholweni,  esinobudlelane ngalo: Makube lubabalo, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, nakuYesu Kristu, uMsindisi wethu.
56_1_5_Ndakushiya eKrete ngenxa yoku, ukuze uhambise ukuzilungisa izinto eziseleyo, umise amadoda amakhulu kwimizi ngemizi,  njengoko ndakumisela ngako mna:
56_1_6_ukuba umntu ungongenakumangaleleka, eyindoda yamfazi mnye enabantwana abakholiweyo, abangamiselwa tyala lakuzibhubhisa,  abangaswele kuthobela mntu.
56_1_7_Kuba umveleli umelwe kukuba ngongenakumangaleleka,  njengegosa likaThixo; angabi ngowenza ukuzithandela kwakhe;  angabi ngoqumba msinya; angabi ngogeziswa yiwayini; angabi ngumbethi; angabi ngongxamela nzuzo imbi.
56_1_8_Umelwe kukuthi abe ngobuka iindwendwe, umthandi wokulungileyo, onesidima, olilungisa, ongcwele, onokuzeyisa;
56_1_9_ebambelele ezwini elithembekileyo ngokwemfundiso, ukuze abe nako ukuvuselela ngayo imfundiso ephilileyo, nokubohlwaya badane abaphikayo.
56_1_10_Kuba baninzi abathethi bezinto ezingento nabakhohlisi,  abaswele intobeko, ngokukodwa abo bolwaluko,
56_1_11_abamelwe kukuvingcwa imilomo; abathi izindlu ziphela bazibhukuqe, befundisa izinto ezingafanelekileyo ngenxa yenzuzo embi.
56_1_12_Wathi omnye wabo, kwaumprofeti wakowabo, AmaKrete ahlala engamaxoki, amarhamncwa amabi, amadla-kudla angasebenziyo.
56_1_13_Obo bungqina buyinene. Ngenxa yeli thuba bohlwaye kabukhali, badane, ukuze baphile elukholweni;
56_1_14_banganyamekeli zintsomi zabuYuda, namithetho yabantu abayinikela umva inyaniso.
56_1_15_Izinto zonke zihlambulukile kwabahlambulukileyo;  kwabadyobhekileyo nabangakholwayo, akukho nto ihlambulukileyo;  kusuke kwadyobheka nengqiqo nesazela sabo.
56_1_16_Bayavuma ukuba bayamazi uThixo; kanti ngayo imisebenzi bayamkhanyela, bengamasikizi, bengabangevayo, nakumsebenzi wonke olungileyo bengenakucikideka.
56_2_1_Ke wena, thetha izinto eziyifaneleyo imfundiso ephilileyo;
56_2_2_ukuba amadoda amakhulu abe ziingcathu, andileke, abe nesidima, aphile elukholweni, eluthandweni, elunyamezelweni;
56_2_3_ukuba abafazi abakhulu kwangokunjalo babe nesimilo esibafaneleyo, bangabi ngabatyholi; bangazilahleli kwiwayini eninzi; bafundise okuhle;
56_2_4_ukuze bayale abafazana ukuba babe nesidima, bawathande amadoda abo, babathande abantwana babo,
56_2_5_babe nesidima, babe nyulu, basebenze ezindlwini zabo, babe nokulunga, bawathobele awabo amadoda, ukuze ilizwi likaThixo linganyeliswa.
56_2_6_Kwangokunjalo amadoda amatsha wayale ukuba abe nesidima.
56_2_7_Ezintweni zonke zenze umzekelo wemisebenzi emihle;
56_2_8_emfundisweni ube ngomsulwa, ngondilekileyo, ngolizwi liphilileyo, lingenakugwetywa; ukuze ochasayo abe neentloni,  engenanto imbi yakuthetha ngani.
56_2_9_Amakhoboka wathethele ukuba azithobele iinkosi zawo, abe ngakholekileyo kakuhle ezintweni zonke, engaphiki; angashinti;
56_2_10_asuke abonakalalise konke ukuthembeka okulungileyo, ukuze ayivathise imfundiso yoMsindisi wethu uThixo ezintweni zonke.
56_2_11_Kuba lubonakele kubantu bonke ubabalo lukaThixo,  lulolusindisayo;
56_2_12_lusiqeqesha ukuze sithi, sikuncama ukungahloneli Thixo nokukhanuka okukokwehlabathi, sihlale ngokunesidima,  nangokubulungisa, nangokuhlonela uThixo, kweli phakade langoku;
56_2_13_silinde ithemba elinoyolo, nembonakalo yobuqaqawuli boThixo omkhulu, uMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu,
56_2_14_owazinikela ngenxa yethu, ukuze asikhulule ngokusihlawulela kuko konke ukuchasa umthetho, azihlambululele abantu abangabakhe, abazondelela imisebenzi emihle.
56_2_15_Ezi zinto zithethe, uvuselele, wohlwaye ngawo wonke ummiselo. Makungabikho namnye ukudelayo.
56_3_1_Bakhumbuze ukuba bathobele oozilawuli noomagunya,  baphulaphule abaphathi, bawulungele wonke umsebenzi olungileyo.
56_3_2_Mabanganyelisi namnye umntu, bangabi nakulwa, babe nokuthantamisa, bebonakala benobulali bonke kubantu bonke.
56_3_3_Kuba nathi sibe sifudula singabasweli-kuqonda, singeva,  silahleka, sikhonza iinkanuko neziyolo ngeziyolo, sihleli ngolunya nomona, sinezothe, sithiyana.
56_3_4_Kodwa kuthe kwakubonakala ububele bukaThixo, uMsindisi wethu, nokuthanda kwakhe abantu,
56_3_5_kungengamisebenzi esebulungiseni esayenzayo thina,  kungokwenceba yakhe, wasisindisa ngentlambululo yokuzalwa ngokutsha, nangokuhlaziya koMoya oyiNgcwele;
56_3_6_awamthululayo phezu kwethu ngokobutyebi, ngoYesu Kristu uMsindisi wethu;
56_3_7_ukuze sithi, sigwetyelwe ngobabalo lwalowo, sibe ziindlalifa zobomi obungunaphakade ngokwethemba.
56_3_8_Lithembekile ilizwi elo; nezo zinto ndinga ungaziqinisela,  ukuze banyameke, benze imisebenzi emihle, abo bakholiweyo kuThixo. Ezo zinto zintle, zinokubanceda abantu.
56_3_9_Ke yona imibuzo yobudenge, nemilibo yokuzalwa, neenkani,  nokulwa ngawo umthetho, zinxweme, kuba azincedi lutho, asinto zanto.
56_3_10_Umntu ongumahlukanisi, akuba elulekwe kanye nokuba kukabini, mmangale;
56_3_11_usazi ukuba onjalo ugwenxeke kwaphela; uyona, ezigwebile ngokwakhe.
56_3_12_Xenikweni ndithe ndathuma kuwe uArtemas, nokuba nguTikiko,  khawuleza uze kum eNikopolis; kuba ndigqibe kwelokuba ndobudlulisa ubusika khona apho.
56_3_13_UZenas, umqondisi-mthetho, noApolos, baxhobisele indlela ngokunyameka, ukuze bangasweli nto.
56_3_14_Abethu mabafunde ke ukwenza imisebenzi emihle yokunceda abaswele kanzima, ukuze bangabi ngabangenasiqhamo.
56_3_15_Bayakubulisa bonke abanam. Babulise abo basithandayo ngokwaselukholweni. Ubabalo malube nani nonke. Amen.
57_1_1_UPawulos, umbanjwa kaKristu Yesu, noTimoti umzalwana,  babhalela uFilemon oyintanda, osebenzisana nathi,
57_1_2_noApiya isithandanekazi sethu, noArkipo umphumi-mkhosi nathi, nebandla elisendlwini yakho;
57_1_3_bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo,  neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
57_1_4_Ndihlala ndibulela kuye uThixo wam, ndikukhumbula emithandazweni yam,
57_1_5_ndiluva nje olwakho uthando, nokholo onalo kuyo iNkosi uYesu, nakubo bonke abangcwele,
57_1_6_ukuze ubudlelane bokholo lwakho bube nokusebenza ngokwazi konke okulungileyo okukuni, kuse kuKristu Yesu.
57_1_7_Kuba sinovuyo nothuthuzeleko olukhulu ngalo uthando lwakho,  ngokuba izibilini zabangcwele ziphunyuziwe ngawe, mzalwana.
57_1_8_Kungoko endithi, nakuba ndinako ukungafihlisi okukhulu kuKristu, kokuba ndikuthethele okufanelekileyo,
57_1_9_noko ngenxa yothando ndisuka kanye ndikubongoze,  ndingonjengoPawulos ixhego, ngoku ke ndikwangumbanjwa kaYesu Kristu.
57_1_10_Ndikubongoza ngenxa yomntwana wam, uOnesimo, endimzeleyo ndisezintanjeni;
57_1_11_obefudula engeluncedo lwanto kuwe, kodwa ngoku kuwe nakum unoncedo oluhle.
57_1_12_Lowo ndimbuyisele kuwe; wena ke mamkele, oko kukuthi,  yamkela izibilini zam;
57_1_13_ebendinga mna ndingasendihlala naye apha, ukuze athi endaweni yakho andilungiselele, ndisezintanjeni ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi;
57_1_14_kodwa andithandanga kwenza nto, ungatshongo wena, ukuze ukulunga kwakho kungangi kokokunyanzelwa, kube kokokuvuma.
57_1_15_Kuba mhlawumbi wahlukaniswa umzuzwana nawe ngenxa yoku,  ukuze umzuze ngokwaphakade;
57_1_16_engasenjengekhoboka, esuke wangaphezu kwekhoboka,  engumzalwana oyintanda, ngokukodwa kum; kubeke phi na ke kuwe,  ngokwenyama nangokweNkosi?
57_1_17_Ngoko ke, ukuba unobudlelane nam, mamkele njengam.
57_1_18_Ukuba wakona, nokuba unetyala kuwe, oko kubalele kum.
57_1_19_Mna Pawulos ndikubhale ngesam isandla ukuthi, mna ndokuhlawula; endingatshoyo kuwe ukuthi, kum unetyala elingaphezulu, elinguwe ngokwakho.
57_1_20_Ewe, mzalwana, mandincedeke ngawe mna ngokwaseNkosini;  ziphumze izibilini zam ngokwaseNkosini.
57_1_21_Ndikubhalele ndeyisekile kukundilulamela kwakho, ndisazi ukuba uya kwenza nangaphezulu koko ndikuthethayo.
57_1_22_Kunye ke noko, ndilungisele indawo yokuhlala; kuba ndithembile ukuba ngayo imithandazo yenu nondiphiwa.
57_1_23_Uyakubulisa uEpafras, umbanjwa ndawonye nam wakwaKristu Yesu,
57_1_24_kwanoMarko, noAristarko, noDemasi, noLuka, abasebenzisana nam.
57_1_25_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nomoya wenu.  Amen.
58_1_1_UThixo wayethethile nje kudala ngeendawo ezininzi,  nangeendlela ezininzi, koobawo ngabo abaprofeti, uthethe ngale mihla yokugqibela kuthi ngoNyana;
58_1_2_awammisayo wayindlalifa yeento zonke, awathi kwangaye wayenza indalo yonke;
58_1_3_othe, elubengezelo lobuqaqawuli bakhe, nombhalo wenkqu yakhe, ezithwele nokuzithwala zonke izinto ngalo ilizwi lamandla akhe, wesuka, akuba eyenzile ngokwakhe intlambululo yokusihlambulula ezonweni, wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kobuKhulu, enyangweni;
58_1_4_ethe waba ngonamandla ngaphezu kwezithunywa zezulu, ngangoko azuze ilifa legama eligqithiseleyo kunelazo.
58_1_5_Kuba sisiphi na isithunywa, awakha wathi kuso, UnguNyana wam wena, Mna ndikuzele namhla? Nokuthi, Mna ndiya kuba nguYise wakhe, Yena abe nguNyana wam?
58_1_6_Nangexa athi amngenise owamazibulo kwelimiweyo, uthi,  Maziqubude kuye zonke izithunywa zikaThixo.
58_1_7_Okunene ngazo izithunywa zezulu uthi, Ulozenza izithunywa zakhe oomoya, Nababusi bakhe ilangatye lomlilo;
58_1_8_kodwa ngaye yena uNyana uthi, Itrone yakho, Thixo, isa ephakadeni lasephakadeni; Yintonga ethe tye intonga yobukumkani bakho.
58_1_9_Wathanda ubulungisa, wathiya okungendawo; Ngenxa yoko,  uThixo, uThixo wakho, ukuthambise Ngeoli yomgcobo ngaphezu kowenu.
58_1_10_Abuye athi, Ekuqalekeni, wena Nkosi, waliseka ihlabathi,  Nalo izulu lingumsebenzi wezandla zakho;
58_1_11_Wona aya kutshabalala, ke wena uhlala uhleli; Aye onke njengengubo eya konakala,
58_1_12_Nanjengesambatho uya kuwasonga, Asuke abe ngawambi; Ke wena ukwanguwe, Nayo iminyaka yakho ayiyi kuphela.
58_1_13_Sisiphi na ke isithunywa, awakha wathi kuso, Hlala ngasekunene kwam, Ndide iintshaba zakho ndizenze isihlalo seenyawo zakho?
58_1_14_Azingomoya ababusayo zonke na, zithunywe ukuba zilungiselele abo baza kuba ziindlalifa zalo usindiso?
58_2_1_Ngenxa yoko, simelwe kukuzinyamekela ngokugqithiseleyo izinto esazivayo, hleze sikhukuliswe simke kuzo.
58_2_2_Kuba, ukuba ilizwi elathethwa ngezithunywa zezulu laqina,  kwathi konke ukugqitha nokungeva kwamkela umvuzo oyeleleyo;
58_2_3_sothini na thina ukusinda, sakuba siluhilizele usindiso olungakanana, lona lwaqalwa ukuthethwa yiyo iNkosi, lwaza lwaqiniselwa kuthi ngabo baluvayo;
58_2_4_uThixo engqinelana nabo ngemiqondiso kwanezimanga,  nemisebenzi ngemisebenzi yamandla, nezabelo zoMoya oyiNgcwele,  ngokokuthanda kwakhe?
58_2_5_Kuba akalithobelanga phantsi kwezithunywa zezulu elimiweyo eliza kubakho, eli sithetha ngalo.
58_2_6_Ke, wakha wangqina ubani, esithi, Uyintoni na umntu, le nto umkhumbulelayo? Unyana womntu, le nto umvelelayo?
58_2_7_Wamnciphisa kancina ne kunezithunywa zezulu, Wamthwesa uzuko nembeko. Wammisa phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho;
58_2_8_Zonke izinto wazithobela phantsi kweenyawo zakhe. Kuba,  ekubeni wazithobela phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto ezo,  akashiyanga nto ingathotyelwanga phantsi kwakhe. Kukaloku ke asikaziboni zithotyelwe phantsi kwakhe zonke izinto.
58_2_9_Ke sibona lo uncitshiswe kancinane kunezithunywa zezulu,  uYesu ke, ethe ngenxa yeentlungu zokufa wathweswa uzuko nembeko, ukuze ngobabalo lukaThixo eve ukufa ngenxa yabo bonke.
58_2_10_Kuba bekumfanele lowo, ezingenxa yakhe zonke izinto ezo,  nezingaye zonke izinto ezo, ekubeni ezise oonyana abaninzi eluzukweni, ukuthi ayenze ngeentlungu igqibelele imbangi yosindiso lwabo.
58_2_11_Kuba lowo ungcwalisayo, kwanabo bangcwaliswayo, baphuma kumnye bonke; ekungenxa yeli thuba angenazintloni ukubabiza ngokuthi ngabazalwana,
58_2_12_esithi, Ndiya kulixela igama lakho kubo abazalwana bam.  Ndivume phakathi kwebandla elokudumisa wena.
58_2_13_Abuye athi, Ndiya kukholosa ngaye. Abuye athi, Yabona, mna nabantwana andinike bona uThixo.
58_2_14_Ekubeni ngoko abantwana abo bengamadlelane naye ngenyama negazi, wathi naye ngokwakhe ngokukwanjalo wabelana nabo ngezo zinto, ukuze ngako ukufa ambhangise lowo unamandla okufa, oko kukuthi, uMtyholi lo;
58_2_15_abakhulule ebukhobokeni bonke abo babethe ngalo lonke ixesha lokudla kwabo ubomi bazizisulu zokoyika ukufa.
58_2_16_Kuba ndithi, akathabatheli kuye zithunywa; uthabathela kuye imbewu ka-Abraham.
58_2_17_Ekuthe ngoko wafanelwa kukuba afane nabazalwana bakhe ngezinto zonke, ukuze abe ngonenceba, kwanombingeleli othembekileyo omkhulu ezintweni ezilunge kuThixo, ukuze azicamagushele izono zabantu.
58_2_18_Kuba ekubeni eve ubunzima, ehendiwe naye ngokwakhe, unako ukubasiza abahendwayo.
58_3_1_Ndithi ngoko, bazalwana bangcwele, mabelana ngobizo lwasemazulwini, mondeleni uMpostile, uMbingeleli oMkhulu wovumo lwethu, uKristu Yesu;
58_3_2_ethembekile kulowo wamenzayo, kwanjengoMoses endlwini yakhe iphela.
58_3_3_Kuba lo ubalelwe ekuthini ufanelwe luzuko olungaphezu kolukaMoses; ngangokuba lowo wayakhayo indlu, enembeko engaphezu kwayo indlu.
58_3_4_Kuba yonke into eyindlu inoyakhayo; ke lowo wazakhayo zonke izinto nguThixo.
58_3_5_Okunene noMoses ebethembekile endlwini yakhe iphela ngokomkhonzi, ukuze bube bubungqina obo bezinto eziya kuthethwa.
58_3_6_Ke yena uKristu uthembeke ngokonyana phezu kwendlu yakhe;  esiyindlu yakhe ke thina, ukuba singaba sithe sakubamba ngokuthe nkqi ukungafihlisi kwethu, neqhayiya lethemba lethu,  sada sesa ekupheleni.
58_3_7_Endithi ke, njengoko atshoyo uMoya oyiNgcwele, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe,
58_3_8_Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu,  Njengasengcaphukisweni, ngomhla wolingo entlango;
58_3_9_Apho bandilingayo ooyihlo, bandicikida, Bayibona imisebenzi yam iminyaka emashumi mane.
58_3_10_Kungoko ndakruqukayo seso sizukulwana, Ndathi, Bahlala belahleka ngeentliziyo, Abazazi ke bona iindlela zam;
58_3_11_Njengoko ndafungayo, ndinengqumbo, Ndathi, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam!
58_3_12_Lumkani, bazalwana, hleze kubekho kubani wenu intliziyo engendawo, engakholwayo, enokumka kuThixo ophilileyo;
58_3_13_manivuselelane imihla ngemihla, xa kusathiwa kunamhla,  ukuze kungabikho mntu kuni wenziwa lukhuni kukulukuhla kwesono.
58_3_14_Kuba siba ngamabelana ngoKristu, ukuba sithe ingqalo yokukholosa kwethu sayibamba ngokuthe nkqi, sada sesa ekupheleni;
58_3_15_ekubeni kusithiwa, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe,  Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu,  njengasengcaphukisweni.
58_3_16_Kuba bathe abathile, bevile, bacaphukisa, phofu ingengabo bonke abo baphumayo eYiputa ngoMoses.
58_3_17_Yayingoobani na ke awakruquka ngabo iminyaka emashumi mane?  Yabingengabo na abo bonayo, bazidumbu zawayo entlango?
58_3_18_Wafungela oobani na ke, ukuba abayi kungena ekuphumleni kwakhe, ingengabo abo bangevanga?
58_3_19_Siyabona ke, ukuba babengenakungena, ngenxa yokungakholwa.
58_4_1_Masoyike ngoko, hleze kuthi ekubeni kusasele idinga lokungena ekuphumleni kwakhe, kubekho bani kuni ungathi asilele.
58_4_2_Kuba sizishunyayeziwe iindaba ezilungileyo kwanjengabo;  lathi kodwa ilizwi lodaba, lingadibananga nje nokholo kwabo balivayo, alabanceda nto.
58_4_3_Kuba thina sakholwayo, siyangena ekuphumleni, ngokoko athe,  Njengoko ndafungayo, ndinengqumbo, Ndathi, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam! nakubeni imisebenzi yenziwayo kususela ekusekweni kwehlabathi.
58_4_4_Kuba wakha wathetha ngawo umhla wesixhenxe, ukuthi, Waza waphumla uThixo ngawo umhla wesixhenxe kuyo yonke imisebenzi yakhe;
58_4_5_athi kule kananjalo, Unakanye ukuba bokha bangene ekuphumleni kwam.
58_4_6_Ekubeni ngoko kusalindele ke ukuthi kubekho bathile bangenayo kuko, baye abo, bashunyayezwayo iindaba ezilungileyo kuqala, bengangenanga ngenxa yokungeva:
58_4_7_ubuya amise mini ithile, esithi ngoDavide, Namhlanje, emveni kwexesha elingakanana; njengokuba kuthiwe, Namhla, ukuba nithe naliva ilizwi lakhe, Musani ukuzenza lukhuni iintliziyo zenu.
58_4_8_Kuba uYoshuwa, ukuba ubebaphumzile, ange engabuyanga athethe ngawo omnye umhla.
58_4_9_Ngoko ke abantu bakaThixo balindwe luphumlo olunjengolwesabatha.
58_4_10_Kuba lowo ungeneyo ekuphumleni kwakhe, naye ngokwakhe uphumle kuyo imisebenzi yakhe, njengoThixo kweyeyakhe.
58_4_11_Masikhuthalele ngoko ukungena koko kuphumla, ukuze kungabikho namnye ubuya eyele kwakuloo mzekelo wokungeva.
58_4_12_Kuba ilizwi likaThixo liphilile, lisebenza, libukhali ngaphezu kwamakrele onke antlangothi mbini; lihlaba liphumele,  lide lahlule umphefumlo kwanomoya, amalungu kwanomongo;  linokugweba iingcingane nezicamango zentliziyo.
58_4_13_Kanjalo akukho sidalwa singabonakaliyo emehlweni akhe;  izinto zonke ke zize, zityhilekile, emehlweni alowo esinokuthana ni naye.
58_4_14_Ngoko, sinombingeleli omkhulu nje ocande emazulwini, UYesu ke, uNyana kaThixo, masilubambe uvumo lwethu.
58_4_15_Kuba asinambingeleli mkhulu ungenako ukuvelana nezilwelwe zethu; ke, sinowahendwayo ngeento zonke, ngokokufana nathi,  engenasono.
58_4_16_Masisondlele ke ngoko sinokungafihlisi kuyo itrone yobabalo, ukuze samkeliswe inceba, sifumane ubabalo lokusiza ngexesha elililo.
58_5_1_Kuba wonke umbingeleli omkhulu, engovele ebantwini nje,  umiselwa abantu ezintweni ezilunge kuThixo, ukuze asondeze iminikelo kwanamadini ngenxa yezono;
58_5_2_enokuthantamisa kwabangazi nto nabalahlekayo, ekubeni naye ngokwakhe enxitywe ubulwelwe.
58_5_3_Ngenxa yabo ke ufanelwe kukuthi, njengokuba esondezela abantu, kwangokunjalo azisondezele amadini ngenxa yezono.
58_5_4_Kanjalo akukho mntu uzithabathela ngokwakhe imbeko leyo;  oyithabathayo ngobizwe nguThixo, kwanjengoAron.
58_5_5_Ngokunjalo naye uKristu akazizukisanga ngokwakhe, ukuba abe ngumbingeleli omkhulu; wazukiswa ngowathethayo kuye, wathi,  UnguNyana wam wena, Mna ndikuzele namhla;
58_5_6_njengokuba esithi nakwenye indawo, Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade, Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.
58_5_7_Owathi ngemihla yenyama yakhe, xa wayesondeze izikhungo kwanezibongozo kulowo unako ukumsindisa ekufeni, kunye nodanduluko olunamandla, neenyembezi, waviwa ngenxa yokumhlonela kwakhe uThixo.
58_5_8_Nakuba ebenguNyana, wafunda ukululama ngobunzima awabuvayo;
58_5_9_waza, egqibelele, waba yimbangi yosindiso olungunaphakade kubo bonke abamlulamelayo,
58_5_10_ebizwe nguThixo, ukuba abe ngumbingeleli omkhulu ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.
58_5_11_Esineendawo ezininzi zokuthetha ngaye, ezilukhuni ukuchazwa, ekubeni nina naba buthuntu iindlebe.
