58_5_12_Kuba, nakuba benifanele ukuba ngabafundisi, ngenxa yokuba sekumzuzu nakholwayo, nibuye naswela umntu wokunifundisa iziqalelo zokuqala zezihlabo zikaThixo; nesuka naba ngabafanele ukusezwa amasi, anaba ngabafanele ukudla okuqinileyo.
58_5_13_Kuba bonke abasasezwa amasi abanamava elizwi lobulungisa,  kuba beziintsana.
58_5_14_Kokwabakhulileyo ke ukudla okuqinileyo, abo bathi, ngenxa yobugcisa, babe nezimvo eziqheliselwe ukucalula okuhle kwanokubi.
58_6_1_Endithi ngoko, masithi, siyeka elengqalo ilizwi elithetha ngoKristu, siqhubele kwelokukhula; singabuyi siseke ngeloguquko emisebenzini efileyo, nokukholwa kuThixo,
58_6_2_ngelemfundiso yeembhaptizo, neyokubekwa izandla, neyovuko lwabafileyo, neyogwebo olungunaphakade.
58_6_3_Oko ke sokwenza, ukuba angaba uthe uThixo wavuma.
58_6_4_Kuba abo bakha bakhanyiselwa, basiva isipho sasemazulwini,  baba ngamadlelana ngoMoya oyiNgcwele,
58_6_5_bayiva incasa yelizwi elihle likaThixo, kwanamandla ephakade eliza kubakho,
58_6_6_baza babuya bakreqa: akunakwenzeka ukuba babuye bahlaziyelwe enguqukweni; ekubeni bephinda ukuzibethelelela emnqamlezweni uNyana kaThixo, bamhlaze ekuhleni.
58_6_7_Kuba umhlaba lo, uyiselayo imvula eza futhi phezu kwawo,  uvelise imifuno elungele bona abo ulinywa nokulinywa ngenxa yabo, wamkela intsikelelo kuThixo;
58_6_8_ke, othi uvelise imithana enameva neenkunzane, awunto yanto,  ukufuphi nengqalekiso; esiphelo sisa ekutshisweni.
58_6_9_Ke ngani nina, zintanda, sikholose ngelokuthi, nineendawo ezilungileyo kunezo, iindawo eziyelelene nosindiso, nakuba sisenjenje ukuthetha;
58_6_10_kuba akanantswela-bulungisa uThixo, ukude awulibale umsebenzi wenu, nomzamo wothando enalubonakalalisa kulo igama lakhe, nabalungiselelayo nje abangcwele, nisamana nibalungiselela.
58_6_11_Sinqwenela ke, ukuba ulowo kuni alubonakalalise kwaolo lukhuthalo, asingise kwinzaliseko yethemba, ade ase ekupheleni,  ukuze ningabi ngababuthuntu;
58_6_12_ke nibe ngabaxelisa abo bathi, ngokholo nangokunyamezela,  bawadla ilifa amadinga.
58_6_13_Kuba wathi uThixo, akumbeka ngedinga uAbraham, ekubeni bekungekho namnye umkhulu kunaye angamfungayo, wazifunga yena,
58_6_14_esithi, Inene, ndiya kuthi, ndisikelela, ndikusikelele;  ndithi, ndisandisa, ndikwandise.
58_6_15_Waza ngokunjalo, enokunyamezela, walifumanisa idinga.
58_6_16_Kuba abantu okunene bafunga lowo umkhulu kubo, sithi kubo isifungo siphelise yonke impikiswano, sise engqinisekweni.
58_6_17_Uthe ngoko uThixo, enga angathi ngokukhona kugqithiseleyo akubonakalalise kwiindlalifa zedinga ukungaguquleki kwecebo lakhe, wasuka walamla ngesifungo;
58_6_18_ukuze kuthi, ngezinto ezimbini ezingenakuguquleka, angenako ukuxoka ngazo uThixo, sithi thina, basindileyo, sabamba ithemba elibekwe phambi kwethu, sibe novuselelo olunamandla;
58_6_19_ithemba ke esinalo ngokweankile yomphefumlo, linqabile,  likwaqinile, lingena liye ngaphaya kwesikhuselo;
58_6_20_apho umanduleli uYesu wangena khona ngenxa yethu, ethe,  ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke, waba ngumbingeleli omkhulu osa ephakadeni.
58_7_1_Kuba lo Melkitsedeke, kumkani weSalem, mbingeleli kaThixo Osenyangweni, wahlangabezanayo noAbraham, ebuya evela ekubulaleni ookumkani, wamsikelela;
58_7_2_awathi uAbraham wamabela nesishumi sezinto zonke (esithi okunene, ukuqala ukuthetha ngentetho evakalayo, ngukumkani wobulungisa, kodwa kamva abe nangukumkani weSalem, oko kukuthi,  ngukumkani woxolo;
58_7_3_engenayise, engenanina, engenamlibo wakuzalwa, engenasiqalo samihla, engenasiphelo sabomi, enziwe wafana naye uNyana kaThixo): lo uhleli engumbingeleli ngokungapheliyo.
58_7_4_Bonani ke ukuba mkhulu kwalowo, wathi uAbraham umawokhulu wamnika nesishumi emaxhobeni, awona alinqatha.
58_7_5_Abo okunene bakoonyana bakaLevi, babamkelayo ububingeleli,  banomthetho wokubanga isishumi kubo abantu ngokomthetho; oko kukuthi, kubo abazalwana babo, nakuba bephume esinqeni sika-Abraham.
58_7_6_Kodwa yena, ongenamlibo wakuzalwa uphumayo kubo, ubange isishumi kuAbraham, wasikelela lowo unamadinga.
58_7_7_Ke ngokungenakuphikwa, encinane into isikelelwa yeyona inkulu.
58_7_8_Kananjalo apha okunene ngabantu abanokufa, abathabatha isishumi; kodwa khona apho ngongqinelweyo ukuba udla ubomi.
58_7_9_Ukutsho ke ndithi, kubangwe ngoAbraham isishumi nakuLevi, lo wamkelayo izishumi;
58_7_10_kuba ubesesinqeni sikayise, oko uMelkitsedeke wamhlangabezayo.
58_7_11_Ke ngoko, ukuba okunene inzaliseko ibingabakho ngobubingeleli bakwaLevi (kuba abantu bewiselwe owobubingeleli umthetho), bekusafuneka ngantoni na ke, ukuba kubuye kuvele mbingeleli wumbi ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke, angabizwa ngokohlobo luka-Aron?
58_7_12_Kuba, ububingeleli baguqulwa nje, kufuneka ukuba kuguqulwe nomthetho.
58_7_13_Kuba lowo, zithethwa ngaye ezi zinto, waye engowasizwe simbi, ebekungekho namnye kuso ubesinyamekele isibingelelo.
58_7_14_Kuba kusekuhleni kanye, ukuba iNkosi yethu iphume kwesikaYuda isizwe, eso angathethanga nto ngaso uMoses ngobubingeleli.
58_7_15_Kwaza kwasekuhleni ngakumbi, ukuba kuvela mbingeleli wumbi,  ngokokufana noMelkitsedeke,
58_7_16_ongathanga amiswe ngokomyalelo womthetho ongowenyama;  wamiswa ngokwamandla obomi obungenakupheliswa.
58_7_17_Kuba ungqina ngokuthi, Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade,  Ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke.
58_7_18_Kuba okunene kutshitshiswa umthetho owandulelayo, ngenxa yokuswela amandla, nokungancedi lutho kwawo
58_7_19_(kuba umthetho lowo awuzalisanga nto); ke kungeniswe phezu kwawo elona themba lilungileyo; esisondela ngalo kuye uThixo.
58_7_20_Kanjalo, ngangokuba engamiswanga, kungabangakho sifungo (kuba bona aba okunene benziwe ababingeleli kungafungwanga;
58_7_21_kodwa yena umiswe ngokufunga kwalowo wathi kuye, Yafunga iNkosi, ayiyi kuzohlwaya: Wena ungumbingeleli ngonaphakade,  ngokohlobo lukaMelkitsedeke):
58_7_22_ngangoko ke uYesu waba ngummeli wowona ulungileyo umnqophiso.
58_7_23_Bathe bona ababingeleli baba baninzi, ngenxa yokuba ukufa kwakungavumi ukuba bahlale behleli;
58_7_24_ke yena, ngenxa yokuba ehleli ngonaphakade,  unobubingeleleli obungenakudlula.
58_7_25_Ngoko unako nokubasindisa kanye abo bezayo ngaye kuThixo,  ehlala ehleli nje ukuba abathethelele.
58_7_26_Kuba ubesifanele umbingeleli omkhulu onjalo, ongcwele,  ongenabubi, ongenabala, owahlukileyo kubo aboni, othe waba ngaphezu kwalo izulu;
58_7_27_ekungafunekiyo ukuba athi imihla ngemihla,  njengababingeleli abakhulu abaya, anyuse kuqala amadini ngenxa yezono ezizezakhe, andule ukunyusa ngenxa yezabantu; kuba oko wakwenza kwaba kanye, ekuzinyuseni ngokwakhe ngokwedini.
58_7_28_Kuba umthetho umisa abantu benobulwelwe, babe ngababingeleli abakhulu; ke lona ilizwi lesifungo, esingasemva komthetho, limise uNyana, egqibelele ngonaphakade.
58_8_1_Ke kaloku, eyona nto iyintloko kwezi zinto zithethwayo yile:  Sinombingeleli omkhulu onje, othe wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kwetrone yobuKhulu emazulwini,
58_8_2_ongumbusi wengcwele, nowomnquba wenyaniso owamiswayo yiNkosi, awamiswa ngumntu.
58_8_3_Kuba wonke umbingeleli omkhulu umiselwa ukuba asondeze iminikelo kwanamadini; ekuthe ngenxa yoko kwafuneka ukuba naye lo abe nento ayisondezayo.
58_8_4_Kuba okunene, ukuba ebesemhlabeni, ubengayi kukha abe mbingeleli, bekho nje ababingeleli abayisondezayo iminikelo ngokomthetho:
58_8_5_bona bathi bakhonze umzekelo nesithunzi sezinto zasemazulwini, kwanjengokuba uMoses wayehlatyelwe nguThixo, xa abeza kuwufeza umnquba; kuba wathi, Khangela ukuba uzenze zonke izinto ngokomfuziselo owawuboniswayo entabeni.
58_8_6_Kodwa kungoku, uzuze umbuso ogqithiseleyo kulowo,  kangangokuba engumlamleli womnqophiso olungileyo ngakumbi, wona usekwe phezu kwawona madinga alungileyo.
58_8_7_Kuba, ukuba ubungenakusoleka lowo wokuqala, ubungayi kufunelwa ndawo owesibini.
58_8_8_Kuba uthi kubo, esola, Yabona, kuza imihla, itsho iNkosi,  Endiya kuzalisekisa phezu kwendlu kaSirayeli, naphezu kwendlu kaYuda, umnqophiso omtsha;
58_8_9_Ungahambi ngokomnqophiso endawenzela ooyise, Mini ndababamba ngesandla, ukuba ndibakhuphe emhlabeni waseYiputa; Ngokuba bengahlalanga emnqophisweni wam bona, Ndaza nam andabakhathalela; itsho iNkosi;
58_8_10_Ngokuba nangu wona umnqophiso, endiya kuwenzela indlu kaSirayeli Emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi: Ndiya kuthi,  ndiyibeke imithetho yam engqondweni yabo, Ndiyibhale ezintliziyweni zabo, Ndibe nguThixo kubo, Nabo babe ngabantu kum.
58_8_11_Kanjalo abayi kukha bafundise elowo ummelwane wakhe, Elowo umzalwana wakhe, esithi, Yazi iNkosi; Ngokuba baya kundazi bonke, Bethabathela komncinane wabo, base komkhulu wabo.
58_8_12_Ngokuba ndiya kukuxolela ukungalungisi kwabo, Nezono zabo,  nokuchasa kwabo umthetho, ndingabi sakukhumbula.
58_8_13_Ngokuthi oku, Omtsha, uwaluphalisile owokuqala. Ke loo nto yalupheleyo, yalixhego, iseyisondele ekuthini shwaka.
58_9_1_Ke ngoko nowokuqala umnqophiso wawunezimiselo zombuso,  kwanendawo engcwele yehlabathi.
58_9_2_Kuba kwakhiwa umnquba lowo. Igumbi lokuqala lalinesiphatho sezibane, kwanetafile, nesiboniso sezonka; lona kuthiwa yingcwele.
58_9_3_Emva ke kwesesibini isikhuselo, kwabakho umnquba lo kuthiwa yingcwele kangcwele;
58_9_4_unesibingelelo segolide sokuqhumisa; nayo ityeya yomnqophiso, yalekwe ngegolide ngeenxa zonke, inesitya segolide ngaphakathi esinemana, inentonga ka-Aron eyadubulayo, inawo amacwecwe omnqophiso.
58_9_5_Ke ngaphezu kwayo kwema iikerubhi zobuqaqawuli, zisibekele isicamagushelo; izinto ezo esingenakuthetha ngazo ngazinye ngoku.
58_9_6_Ke kaloku, zakubon ukuba zenziwe ngokunjalo ezo zinto,  ababingeleli bangena okunene amaxa onke kowokuqala umnquba,  beyifeza imibuso kaThixo.
58_9_7_Kodwa kowesibini kungena kube kanye ngomnyaka umbingeleli omkhulu yedwa, engangeni engenagazi, alisondezayo ngenxa yakhe,  nangenxa yokungazi kwabantu.
58_9_8_Abe ngoku uMoya oyiNgcwele esazisa ukuthi, indlela eya kweyona ngcwele ayikabonakalaliswa, umnquba wokuqala usemi;
58_9_9_wona lo ungumzekeliso ozise exesheni elingeneyo, ekuthi ngalo kusondezwe iminikelo kwanamadini, izinto ezo ezingenako ngokwesazela ukumenza agqibelele lowo ukhonzayo;
58_9_10_ezithe, ndawonye nezinto ezidliwayo neziselwayo,  neentlambululo ngeentlambululo, ezizizimiselo zenyama kuphela,  zamiselwa ukuba kude kufike ixesha lolungiso.
58_9_11_Ke yena uKristu, efike wangumbingeleli omkhulu wazo izinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, uthe ngowona mkhulu ugqibeleleyo umnquba, ongenakwenziwa ngazandla, oko kukuthi, ongengowale ndalo,
58_9_12_wangena kwaba kanye kweyona ngcwele, kungengalo negazi leebhokhwe nelamathole, kungegazi elilelakhe; wafumana inkululo engunaphakade ngokusihlawulela.
58_9_13_Kuba, ukuba igazi leenkomo neleebhokhwe, nothuthu lwethokazi olufefa abaziinqambi, lungcwalisela ekuhlambululeni inyama:
58_9_14_lobeka phi na ukugqithisela lona igazi likaKristu,  owazisondeza ngoMoya ongunaphakade, engenasiphako, kuye uThixo,  ukusihlambulula isazela senu emisebenzini efileyo, ukuze nikhonze uThixo ophilileyo?
58_9_15_Nangenxa ke yoko, ungumlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, ukuze bathi abo babiziweyo (kwakubon,ukuba kubekho ukufa okuhlawulela izigqitho, ezibe ziphantsi kwawo umnqophiso wokuqala), balamkele idinga lelifa elingunaphakade.
58_9_16_Kuba apho kukhoyo umnqophiso womyoleli, kufuneka ukuba kucace ukufa kwalowo unqophisileyo.
58_9_17_Kuba umnqophiso uqiniseka bakuba befile, ekubeni ungaze ube namandla xenikweni asadla ubomi lowo unqophisileyo.
58_9_18_Ekuthe ngoko nowokuqala awasungulwa kungekho gazi.
58_9_19_Kuba kuthe, kwakubon ukuba umthetho wonke uxeliwe nguMoses ebantwini bonke ngokomyalelo, walithabatha igazi lamathole neleebhokhwe, ndawonye namanzi, noboya obubomvu, nehisope,  wafefa incwadi ngokwayo, kwanabantu bonke;
58_9_20_esithi, Eli ligazi lawo umnqophiso, aniwisele umthetho ngawo uThixo.
58_9_21_Nomnquba ke, nazo zonke iimpahla zombuso, wazifefa ngokunjalo ngegazi.
58_9_22_Kananjalo ngokomthetho ndingade ndithi, zonke izinto ziphantse ukuba zihlanjululwe ngegazi; kungaphalalanga gazi,  akubikho kuxolelwa.
58_9_23_Kwafuneka ngoko, ukuba okunene izizekelo zezinto ezisemazulwini zihlanjululwe ngezinto ezinjalo, kodwa zona iziqu zazo ezasemazulwini zihlanjululwe ngamadini alungileyo kunalawo.
58_9_24_Kuba uKristu akangenanga kweyona ngcwele inokwenziwa ngezandla, engumfuziselo weyenyaniso; ungene kuwo amazulu ngokwawo, ukuba abonakale ngoku ebusweni bukaThixo ngenxa yethu.
58_9_25_Kananjalo akangenanga ukuze azisondeze futhi, njengokuba umbingeleli omkhulu ebengena kweyona ngcwele iminyaka ngeminyaka, enegazi lenye into;
58_9_26_okanye ange emelwe kukuba abe ebeve ubunzima futhi,  kuseloko lasekwayo ihlabathi. Ke uthe ngoku, ekufinyezweni kwawo amaphakade, wabonakalaliswa kwaba kanye, ukuba atshitshise isono ngelilelakhe idini.
58_9_27_Ke kwanjengokuba ke abantu bemiselwe ukuba bafe kube kanye,  ize ke emveni koko ibe ngumgwebo:
58_9_28_ngokunjalo uKristu, esondezwe kwaba kanye, ukuba asithwale asisuse isono sabaninzi, uya kuthi okwesibini, ngaphandle kwesono, abonakale kwabo bamlindileyo, ezisa usindiso.
58_10_1_Kuba umthetho, unesithunzi nje sodwa sezinto ezilungileyo eziza kubakho, ungenaso sona isimilo sazo izinto, awuze ube nako, iminyaka ngeminyaka, ngaloo madini bawasondeza ngokungapheliyo, ukubenza bagqibelele abo basondelayo.
58_10_2_Okanye ange engayekwanga na ukusondezwa, ngenxa yokuba abo bakhonzayo, behlanjululwe nje kwaba kanye, bengasenasazela sazono?
58_10_3_Kusuke kuwo apho kubekho ukukhunjuzwa kwezono iminyaka ngeminyaka.
58_10_4_Kuba akunakwenzeka ukuthi igazi leenkomo neleebhokhwe lisuse izono.
58_10_5_Kungoko, akungena ehlabathini, athi, Akuthandanga mbingelelo, namnikelo wakudla, Ke undilungisele umzimba;
58_10_6_Amadini atshiswayo kuphele, nangawesono, akukholiswanga ngawo.
58_10_7_Ndaza ndathi, Yabona, ndiyeza (Encwadini esongwayo kubhalwe ngam), Ndiza kwenza ukuthanda kwakho, Thixo.
58_10_8_Esithi nje ngentla, Imibingelelo, neminikelo yokudla,  namadini atshiswayo kuphele, nangawesono, akuwathandanga,  akukholiswanga ngawo (wona lawo asondezwayo ngokomthetho),
58_10_9_ubuye athi, Yabona, ndiza kwenza ukuthanda kwakho, Thixo.  Ususa okokuqala, ukuze amise okwesibini.
58_10_10_Esithe, ngokokuthanda kwakhe, sangcwaliswa ngokusondezwa komzimba kaYesu Kristu, kwaba kanye.
58_10_11_Wonke ke ongumbingeleli uma okunene imihla ngemihla ebusa,  ewasondeza futhi kwawona loo madini, angenako nakanye ukususa isono.
58_10_12_Kodwa yena lo, esondeze idini lalinye ngenxa yezono, usuke wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kukaThixo ngokungapheliyo;
58_10_13_okokugqibela elinde ukuba zide iintshaba zakhe zenziwe isihlalo seenyawo zakhe.
58_10_14_Kuba ngamnikelo mnye ubenze bagqibelela ngokungapheliyo abo bangcwaliswayo.
58_10_15_Uyasingqinela ke naye uMoya oyiNgcwele; kuba, emveni kokuba etshilo ngenxa engaphambili ukuthi,
58_10_16_Nangu wona umnqophiso, endiya kuwenza nabo Emva kwaloo mihla, itsho iNkosi, Ndiya kuyibeka imithetho yam ezintliziyweni zabo, Ndiya kuyibhala ezingqondweni zabo, ubuya athi,
58_10_17_Izono zabo nokuchasa umthetho kwabo ndingabi sakukhumbula.
58_10_18_Ke apho uxolelo lwezo zinto lukhona, akusekho mnikelo ngenxa yesono.
58_10_19_Ngoko, bazalwana, sinokungafihlisi nje ukungena kweyona ngcwele ngalo igazi likaYesu,
58_10_20_ngendlela entsha, ephilileyo, awayisungulela thina,  iphumela esikhuselweni, oku kukuthi, enyameni yakhe;
58_10_21_sinombingeleli omkhulu nje phezu kwendlu kaThixo:
58_10_22_masisondele sinentliziyo eyinyaniso, sinenzaliseko yokholo, sifefiwe iintliziyo zethu, sisusiwe isazela esingendawo. Masithi, sihlanjiwe nje umzimba ngamanzi amhlophe,
58_10_23_silubambe uvumo lwethu lwethemba, lungabi nakuxengaxenga;  kuba uthembekile lowo wabeka ngedinga.
58_10_24_Kanjalo masinyamekelane, ukuba silolane eluthandweni nasemisebenzini emihle;
58_10_25_singakuhilizeli ukuhlanganisana kwethu, njengesiko labanye. Masivuselelane kube kokukhona, niyibona nje ukuba imini leyo iyasondela.
58_10_26_Kuba, xa sithi sone ngabomi, emveni kokuba sakwamkelayo ukwazi inyaniso, akusasele dini ngenxa yezono;
58_10_27_sekusele ke ukulinda okoyikekayo kakhulu, umgwebo nomsindo womlilo, oza kudla abo bachasileyo.
58_10_28_Umntu obegiba okaMoses umthetho, ubebulawa kungekho tarhu,  ngezwi lamangqina amabini, nokuba mathathu.
58_10_29_Niba wobeka phi na ke ukufanelwa kukubethwa okubi ngakumbi, lo umnyathelele phantsi uNyana kaThixo, walibalela ekuthini liyinqambi igazi lomnqophiso athe wangcwaliswa ngalo,  wamgxeka uMoya wobabalo?
58_10_30_Kuba siyamazi lowo watshoyo ukuthi, Impindezelo yeyam,  kuya kubuyekeza mna, itsho iNkosi. Kananjalo wathi, INkosi iya kubagweba abantu bayo.
58_10_31_Kuyoyikeka ke ukweyela ezandleni zoThixo ophilileyo.
58_10_32_Zikhumbuzeni ke imihla yangaphambili, enakhanyiselwa ngayo, nanyamezela umzamo omkhulu weentlungu;
58_10_33_enaphatha ukuthi nenziwe isibonelo ngeengcikivo kwaneembandezelo, naphatha ukuthi nibe ngamadlelana nabo bahamba ngokunjalo.
58_10_34_Kuba navelana nam ndisezintanjeni; kananjalo nakwamkela ngovuyo ukuphangwa kweempahla zenu, nisazi ukuba ninayo kuni ngokwenu emazulwini eyona mpahla ilungileyo, ihlala ihleli.
58_10_35_Musani ukukulahla ngoko ukungafihlisi kwenu, kona kunokwamkela umvuzo omkhulu.
58_10_36_Kuba kufuneka ukuba nibe nomonde, ukuze nithi, nakuba nikwenzile ukuthanda kukaThixo, nizuzane nalo idinga.
58_10_37_Kuba kusaya kuba mzuzwana mncinanana, Athi lowo uzayo afike, angalibali.
58_10_38_Ke lowo ulilungisa uya kudla ubomi obuphuma elukholweni;  Ukuba ke uthe wahlehla, awuyi kukholiswa nguye umphefumlo wam.
58_10_39_Ke thina asingabahlehla baye entshabalalweni; singabokholo olusa ekuzuzeni umphefumlo.
58_11_1_Ukholo ke kukukholosa ngezinto ezithenjiweyo; kukweyiseka bubukho bezinto ezingabonwayo.
58_11_2_Kuba amanyange angqinelwa ngokuba nalo olo.
58_11_3_Ngokholo siyaqonda ukuba indalo le yonke yenziwe yabakho ngelizwi likaThixo, ukuze izinto ezi zibonwayo zibe aziphume kwezibonakalayo.
58_11_4_Ngokholo uAbheli wasondeza kuye uThixo umbingelelo ogqithileyo kunokaKayin, awangqinelwa ngawo ukuba ulilungisa,  uThixo wayingqinelayo nje iminikelo yakhe; ngalo ke, efile nje,  usathetha.
58_11_5_Ngokholo uEnoki wafuduselwa emazulwini ukuba angaboni kufa;  akaba nakufunyanwa ke, ngenxa enokuba uThixo wamfudusayo; kuba ngaphambi kokufuduswa kwakhe, wangqinelwa ukuba umkholise kakuhle uThixo.
58_11_6_Ke, lungekho ukholo, akunakubakho ukumkholisa kakuhle; kuba lowo uzayo kuThixo, umelwe kukukholwa ukuba ukho, nokuba ungumvuzi wabo bamfunayo.
58_11_7_Ngokholo uNowa, ehlatyelwe nguThixo ngazo izinto ebezingekabonwa, wathi ngokoyika uThixo wawakha umkhombe wokusindisa indlu yakhe, awathi ngalo waligweba ihlabathi, waba yindlalifa yobulungisa obungokokholo.
58_11_8_Ngokholo uAbraham wathi, akubizwa, Wakululamela ukuba aphume, aye kuloo ndawo abeza kuyamkela ukuba ibe lilifa;  waphuma ke, engazi kakuhle nalapho aya khona.
58_11_9_Ngokholo waba ngumphambukeli emhlabeni wedinga, wanga ukowasemzini, ehleli eminqubeni, ndawonye noIsake noYakobi,  beziindlalifa zalo elo dinga ndawonye naye;
58_11_10_kuba wayewulindele umzi lo uneziseko, ungcibi, umbangi wawo, inguThixo.
58_11_11_Ngokholo noSara ngokwakhe wamkela amandla okumisa umzi,  waza wazala, liseligqithile ixesha lokuba amithe, ekubeni wambalela ekuthini uthembekile lowo wabekayo ngedinga.
58_11_12_Kungoko kwazalwayo ngamnye, engofileyo ke lowo, into engangeenkwenkwezi zezulu ukuba yintabalala, nanjengentlabathi eselunxwemeni lolwandle, engenakubalwa.
58_11_13_Aba bonke bafa ngokokholo, bengawafumananga amadinga;  besuka bawabona kude, bakholosa, bathakazela, bavuma ukuba bangabasemzini, balundwendwe emhla beni.
58_11_14_Kuba abo bathetha izinto ezinjalo, babonakalalisa ukuba bangxamele ikowabo.
58_11_15_Ke, ukuba okunene babekhumbula elo babephuma kulo, ngebaba nethuba lokubuyela kulo.
58_11_16_Kodwa ngoku bazolulela kwelona lilungileyo, oko kukuthi,  kwelasemazulwini. Kungoko uThixo angenazintloni ngabo, ukuba kuthiwe unguThixo wabo, kuba ebalungisele umzi.
58_11_17_Ngokholo uAbraham wamnikela uIsake, akulingwa; waye,  owawamkelayo ngovuyo amadinga lawo, enikela okuphela kwawamzalayo;
58_11_18_ekwakuthethwe kuye kwathiwa, Iya kubizwa ngoIsake imbewu yakho;
58_11_19_ecamanga ngokuthi, uThixo unako ukuvusa nakwabafileyo;  apho athe ngoko Wamzuza ngokomzekeliso.
58_11_20_Ngokholo uIsake wabasikelela uYakobi noEsawu, ngazo izinto eziza kubakho.
58_11_21_Ngokholo uYakobi uthe, xa aqhawukayo, wabasikelela oonyana bakaYosefu ngabanye, waqubuda esimelele ngentonga yakhe.
58_11_22_Ngokholo uYosefu uthe, xa abhubhayo, wakukhankanya ukuphuma koonyana bakaSirayeli, wawisa umthetho ngawo amathambo akhe.
58_11_23_Ngokholo uMoses uthe, akuba ezelwe, wafihlwa iinyanga zantathu ngabazali bakhe, ngenxa enokuba bambona ukuba ungumntwana omhle, abasoyika isimiselo sokumkani.
58_11_24_Ngokholo uMoses uthe, akuba mkhulu, akavuma ukubizwa ngokuthi ungunyana wentombi kaFaro;
58_11_25_enyula kanye ukuba aphathwe kakubi, ndawonye nabantu bakaThixo, kunokuba axhamle izono okomzuzwana;
58_11_26_ekubalele ukungcikivwa kukaKristu kububutyebi obungaphezu kobutyebi baseYiputa, kuba wayekhangele ukwamkela umvuzo.
58_11_27_Ngokholo wayishiya iYiputa, akawoyika umsindo wokumkani;  kuba wakrota, wanga uyambona lowo ungenakubonwa.
58_11_28_Ngokholo uyenzile ipasika nokutshizwa kwegazi, ukuze lowo wayewatshabalalisa amazibulo angawachukumisi.
58_11_29_Ngokholo baluwela uLwandle oluBomvu, kwanga kusemhlabeni owomileyo; athe amaYiputa, akukulinga oko, antywiliselwa.
58_11_30_Ngokholo zawa iindonga zaseYeriko, zakuba zijikeleziwe iimini ezisixhenxe.
58_11_31_Ngokholo uRahabhi ihenyukazi akatshabalalanga nabo bangevayo, akuba ezamkele iintlola ngoxolo.
58_11_32_Ndisathetha ntoni na? Kuba ndingaphelelwa lixesha ndibalisa ngoGidiyon, kwanoBharaki, noSamson, noYifeta,  kwanoDavide, noSamuweli, nangabo abaprofeti;
58_11_33_abathe ngokholo beyisa izikumkani, basebenza ubulungisa,  bazuzana namadinga, bavingca imilomo yeengonyama,
58_11_34_bacima amandla omlilo, basinda kwiintlangothi zekrele,  bomelela ekubeni bebeswele amandla, baba ngamagorha emfazweni,  bagxotha imikhosi yabasemzini.
58_11_35_Abafazi babazuza abafileyo babo bevukile; abanye ke batyakatywa, bengalwamkelanga ukhululo, ukuze bazuzane nolona luvuko lululo.
58_11_36_Bambi ke benziwa intlekisa, batyakatywa; phezu koko ke baviswa imixokelelwane nentolongo;
58_11_37_baxulutywa ngamatye; basarhwa; bahendwa; bafa kukubulawa ngekrele; bahamba ngeengubo zeegusha nangeengaga zeebhokhwe,  beswele, bebandezelwe, bephathwa kakubi
58_11_38_(elalingabafanele ihlabathi), bedinga koozintlango,  noozintaba, noomiqolomba, nakwimingxuma yomhlaba.
58_11_39_Aba ke bonke bathi, nakuba babengqinelwe ngalo ukholo,  abazuzana nalo idinga,
58_11_40_uThixo esazalelele thina ngeyona nto ilungileyo, ukuze bangenziwa bagqibelele ngaphandle kwethu.
58_12_1_Ngako oko ke, sinelifu elingakanana nje elisingqongileyo lamangqina, masithi nathi, siwubekile nxamnye wonke umthwalo,  naso isono esinokusirhawula ngokusisulu, silubaleke ngomonde ugqatso olubekwe phambi kwethu;
58_12_2_sise amehlo kuyo iMbangi noMgqibelelisi wokholo lwethu,  uYesu, owathi, ngenxa yovuyo olwalubekwe phambi kwakhe,  wawunyamezela umnqamlezo, elidelile ihlazo, waza wahlala phantsi ngasekunene kwetrone kaThixo.
58_12_3_Ewe, mqondeni lowo ukunyamezeleyo ukumphikisa okungaka kwaboni, ukuze ningadinwa, ingatyhafi imiphefumlo yenu.
58_12_4_Anikachasi kude kube segazini, nizamana naso isono.
58_12_5_Kananjalo senilulibele uvuselelo olu, luthetha kuni ngathi kukoonyana, lusithi, Nyana wam, musa ukukucekisa ukuqeqesha kweNkosi, Kananjalo ungatyhafi wakohlwaywa yiyo;
58_12_6_Kuba lowo imthandayo iNkosi iyamqeqesha, Ibatyakatye ke bonke oonyana ebamkelayo.
58_12_7_Ukuba ninyamezela uqeqesho, uThixo woba uniphethe njengoonyana; kuba nguwuphi na unyana ongaqeqeshwayo nguyise?
58_12_8_Ukuba ke aniqeqeshwa, abathe baba ngamadlelane ngalo bonke,  noba nina niyimigqakhwe ngoko, aningoonyana.
58_12_9_Kananjalo sibe sinabo oobawo benyama okunene besiqeqesha,  sabahlonela; asiyi kuthi ngakumbi na sithobele uYise woomoya bonke, sidle ubomi?
58_12_10_Kuba bona okunene basiqeqesha imihla embalwa,  ngokokuzithandela kwabo, kodwa yena usiqeqeshela okusilungeleyo, ukuze sahlulelane ngobungcwele bakhe.
58_12_11_Lonke ke uqeqesho okunene ngokwakalokunje alubonakali luluvuyo, lubonakala luyintlungu; kodwa kamva lubanika isiqhamo esiluxolo, oko kukuthi sobulungisa, abo baqhelisiweyo lulo.
58_12_12_Kungoko endithi, Zimiseni izandla eziwileyo, namadolo anedumbe;
58_12_13_iinyawo zenu nizenzele imizila ethe tye, ukuze into eqhwalelayo ingaphambuki endleleni, kanye ke iphiliswe.
58_12_14_Phuthumani uxolo nabo bonke, nobungcwele, ekungekho namnye uya kuyibona iNkosi, engenabo;
58_12_15_nivelela, ukuze kungabikho bani usilelayo elubabalweni lukaThixo, kungabikho ngcambu yabukrakra, ithi ivele ihlume,  inikhathaze, bathi abaninzi badyojwe yiyo;
58_12_16_kungabikho bani ulihenyu, nokuba ngumhlambeli,  njengoEsawu, owathi ngenxa yentwana yokudla wananisa ngobuzibulo bakhe.
58_12_17_Kuba niyazi ukuba wathi kamva, ethanda ukuyidla ilifa intsikelelo, walahlwa; kuba akafumananga thuba languquko, noko wayingxamelayo ngeenyembezi.
58_12_18_Kuba anisondelanga ntabeni iphathwayo, itshayo ngumlilo,  nasithokothokweni, na bumnyameni, naluqhwitheleni,
58_12_19_nasandini saxilongo, nasithongeni samazwi, abathe abo basivayo bacela kabukhali, ukuba kungabi sathethwa lizwi kubo.
58_12_20_Kuba babengenakukuthwala oko babeyalwa ngako; nokuba ithe inkomo yayichukumisa intaba, ibiya kuxulutywa ngamatye, ithi mhlawumbi ibinzwe ngomkhonto;
58_12_21_yaza loo nto yabonakalayo yoyikeka, kangangokuba uMoses athi, Ndiyoyika kakhulu, ndiyagubha.
58_12_22_Nisuke nina nafika eZiyon, entabeni nasemzini woThixo ophilileyo, kwiYerusalem yasemazulwini, nakumawakawaka ezithunywa zezulu,
58_12_23_kwingqungquthela, nakwibandla lamazibulo abhaliweyo emazulwini, nakuThixo, uMgwebi wabo bonke, nakoomoya bamalungisa agqibeleleyo,
58_12_24_nakuMlamleli womnqophiso omtsha, uYesu, nakwigazi lokufefa, elithetha ezona zinto zilungileyo kunelika-Abheli.
58_12_25_Lumkani, ningamali lowo uthethayo. Ukuba ke abo, bamalayo lowo wahlabayo izihlabo emhlabeni, abasindanga, kobeka phi na ke ukugqithisela kokungasindi kwethu, thina bamnikela umva lowo uhlaba esemazulwini;
58_12_26_olizwi oko lawuzamazamisayo umhlaba; ngoku ke ubeke ngedinga, esithi, Kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana endiya kuthi mna ndinganyikimisi mhlaba wodwa, ndinyikimise nalo izulu.
58_12_27_Oku kuthi ke, Kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana, kubonakalalisa ukuguqulwa kwezinto ezizanyazanyiswayo, ngathi kokwezenziweyo,  ukuze zihlale zona ezingenakuzanyazanyiswa.
58_12_28_Masithi ngoko, sisamkela ubukumkani obungenakuzanyazanyiswa nje, sibe nombulelo, simkhonze ngawo uThixo ngokukholekileyo, sinokuhlonela nokoyika;
58_12_29_kuba uThixo wethu ungumlilo odlayo.
58_13_1_Uthando lobuzalwana maluhlale luhleli.
58_13_2_Musani ukukulibala ukubuka iindwendwe; kuba ngokwenjenjalo inxenye ibuke izithunywa zezulu, ingazi.
58_13_3_Bakhumbuleleni abakhonkxiweyo, ninge nikhonkxiwe nani; nabo ke baphathwa kakubi, njengokuba nisemzimbeni nani.
58_13_4_Umtshato mawubekeke ngeendlela zonke, nesilili masingadyojwa; ke abenza umbulo nabakrexezi, uThixo uya kubagweba.
58_13_5_Isimilo senu masibe sesingathandi mali, yanelani zizinto eninazo; kuba etshilo yena ukuthi, Andiyi kukha ndikuyekele;  wabuya wathi, Andiyi kukha ndikushiye;
58_13_6_ngokokude somelele sithi, INkosi ilusizo lwam, andiyi koyika; Wondenza ntoni na umntu?
58_13_7_Bakhumbuleleni abakhokeli benu, abalithethayo kuni ilizwi likaThixo; nisingasinga impumelelo yehambo yabo, nixelise bona elukholweni lwabo.
58_13_8_UYesu Kristu ukwanguye izolo, nanamhla, ase nakuwo amaphakade.
58_13_9_Musani ukuphetshethwa ziimfundiso ngeemfundiso nezingezizo;  kuba kuhle ukuba intliziyo iqine lubabalo; kungabi ngeento ezidliwayo, abangancedekanga zizo abo bahamba kuzo.
58_13_10_Sinesibingelelo thina, abangenagunya lakudla kuso abo bakhonza umnquba.
58_13_11_Kuba ezo zinto ziphilileyo, zigazi lazo lingeniswa ngenxa yesono kweyona ngcwele nguye umbingeleli omkhulu, imizimba yazo itshiselwa ngaphandle kweminquba.
58_13_12_Kungoko athe noYesu, ukuze abangcwalise abantu ngelilelakhe igazi, weva ubunzima ngaphandle kwesango.
58_13_13_Masiphume ke ngoko siye kuye ngaphandle kweminquba,  sithwele ingcikivo yakhe.
58_13_14_Kuba apha asinamzi uhleliyo, singxamele lowo uza kuza.
58_13_15_Ngoko masithi ngaye sinyuse ngamaxesha onke kuye uThixo umbingelelo wendumiso, oko kukuthi, isiqhamo somlomo olivumayo igama lakhe.
58_13_16_Ke ukwenza okuhle nobudlelane, musani ukukulibala; kuba imibingelelo enjalo uyakholiswa kakuhle yiyo uThixo.
58_13_17_Bathambeleni abakhokeli benu, nibathobele; kuba bona abalali, ngenxa yemiphefumlo yenu, ngokwabaya kuphendula, ukuze bakwenze oko bevuyile, bengancwini; kuba anisizakali kuko oko.
58_13_18_Sithandazeleni; kuba sikholosekile kukuthi sinesazela esilungileyo, singa ezintweni zonke singahamba kakuhle.
58_13_19_Ndiyavuselela ke ngokugqithiseleyo, ukuba nikwenze oko,  ukuze ndibuyiselwe kuni kamsinyane.
58_13_20_Ke kaloku uThixo woxolo, lowo wamvusayo kwabafileyo uMalusi oMkhulu wezimvu, ngegazi lomnqophiso ongunaphakade,
58_13_21_iNkosi yethu uYesu, wanga anganilungisa, nigqibelele emisebenzini yonke elungileyo, ukuze nikwenze ukuthanda kwakhe,  esenza ngaphakathi kwenu oko kukholekileyo emehlweni akhe,  ngoYesu Kristu. Kuye makubekho uzuko, luse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
58_13_22_Ndiyanivuselela ke nina, bazalwana, linyamezeleni ilizwi lovuselelo olu; kuba ke ndinibhalele ngokufutshane.
58_13_23_Yazini ukuba umzalwana wethu uTimoti ukhululwe; endothi,  xa angaba uthe wafika kamsinya, ndinibone ndinaye.
58_13_24_Babuliseni bonke abakhokeli benu, nabo bonke abangcwele.  Bayanibulisa abavela eItaliya.
58_13_25_Ubabalo malube nani nonke. Amen.
59_1_1_UYakobi, umkhonzi kaThixo neNkosi uYesu Kristu, ubhalela izizwe ezilishumi elinazibini eziziintsali, ebulisa.
59_1_2_Kubaleleni ekuthini kuluvuyo olukhulu, bazalwana bam, xa nithe nagaxeleka ezilingweni ngezilingo,
59_1_3_nisazi nje ukuba ucikido lokholo lwenu lusebenza umonde.
59_1_4_Umonde ke mawube nomsebenzi ozalisekileyo, ukuze nibe ngabazalisekileyo, abagqibeleleyo, ningaswele nto.
59_1_5_Ukuba ke ubani kuni uswele ubulumko, makacele kuThixo, onika bonke engenakumbi, engangcikivi; wobunikwa.
59_1_6_Ke makacele ekholwa, engathandabuzi; kuba lowo uthandabuzayo ufana nokulatyuza kolwandle, luqhutywa ngumoya, luntsileka.
59_1_7_Kuba loo mntu makangabi uya kwamkela nto kuyo iNkosi.
59_1_8_Indoda emphefumlo umbaxa iyahlozinga kuzo zonke iindlela zayo.
59_1_9_Ke umzalwana othobekileyo makaqhayise ngako ukuphakama kwakhe;
59_1_10_osisityebi ke makaqhayise ngako ukuthobeka kwakhe; ngokuba uya kudlula njengentyantyambo yengca.
59_1_11_Kuba lithi lakuphuma ilanga, kunye nolophu, liyitshise ingca, ize ke intyantyambo yayo ivuthuluke, buthi nobuhle bembonakalo yayo butshabalale; siya kwenjenjalo nesityebi ukungcumbeka eluhambeni lwaso.
59_1_12_Inoyolo indoda ekunyamezelayo ukulingwa; ngokuba yothi,  yakuba icikidekile, isamkele isithsaba sobomi, ebabeke ngedinga iNkosi abo bayithandayo.
59_1_13_Makungabikho namnye utshoyo akuhendwa ukuthi, Ndihendwa kwaThixo; kuba uThixo akanakuhendeka kokubi, akahendi namnye ke yena.
59_1_14_Elowo ke uhendwa akutsalwa, abanjiswe, yeyakhe inkanuko.
59_1_15_Ithi inkanuko, yakuba ithabathile, izale isono; sithi ke isono, sakuba sikhulelwe, sizale ukufa.
59_1_16_Musani ukulahlekiswa, bazalwana bam baziintanda.
59_1_17_Sonke isipho esilungileyo, naso sonke isipho esigqibeleleyo, sesaphezulu; sihla sivela kuye uYise wezikhanyiso, ongenabuyambo nasithunzi sakujika.
59_1_18_Uthandile, wasizala ngelizwi lenyaniso, ukuze sibe yintlahlela yazo izidalwa zakhe.
59_1_19_Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam baziintanda, makathi umntu wonke enze msinya ukuva, enze kade ukuthetha, enze kade ukuqumba;
59_1_20_kuba ingqumbo yendoda ayisebenzi bulungisa bukaThixo.
59_1_21_Kungoko endithi, yithini, nibubekile nxamnye bonke ubunyhukunyhuku nokuphuphuma ulunya, namkele ninobulali ilizwi elimiselweyo kuni, elinako ukuyisindisa imiphefumlo yenu.
59_1_22_Yibani ke ngabenzi belizwi, ningabi ngabaphulaphuli kodwa,  nizidephisela.
59_1_23_Ngokuba umntu, ukuba ungumphulaphuli nje welizwi, engemenzi walo, lowo ufana nendoda eqiqa ubuso bayo bobuntu esipilini;
59_1_24_kuba iyaziqiqa, imke, ilibale kwaoko ukuba ibinjani na.
59_1_25_Ke yena oqondela emthethweni ogqibeleleyo wayo inkululeko,  ahlale ehleli kuwo, lowo, ethe nje akaba ngumphulaphuli olibalayo, esuke waba ngumenzi womsebenzi: yena uya kuba noyolo ekwenzeni kwakhe.
59_1_26_Ukuba ubani kuni uba ungonqulayo, abe engalubambi ngomkhala ulwimi lwakhe, elukuhla intliziyo yakhe, unqulo lwalowo alunto yanto.
59_1_27_Unqulo lona oluhlambulukileyo, olu ngadyobhekileyo phambi koThixo uBawo, lulo olu: kukuvelela iinkedama nabahlolokazi embandezelweni, yabo: kukuzigcina engenabala kulo ihlabathi.
59_2_1_Bazalwana bam, musani ukukuphatha ngokukhetha buso bamntu,  ukukholwa yiNkosi yethu yozuko, uYesu Kristu.
59_2_2_Kuba, xa kuthe kwangena endlwini yenu yesikhungu indoda enemisesane yegolide, inengubo eqaqambileyo; kwaza ke kwangena ihlwempu, lineengubo ezimdaka;
59_2_3_naza nakhangela kulowo uvethe ingubo eqaqambileyo, nathi kuye, Hlala apha kakuhle wena; nathi kulo ihlwempu, Yima phaya wena; mhlawumbi, Hlala phantsi apha ngasesihlalweni seenyawo zam:
59_2_4_anicalulanga na ke phakathi kwenu, naba ngabagwebi abanezicamango ezingendawo?
59_2_5_Yivani, bazalwana bam baziintanda: uThixo akawanyulanga na amahlwempu eli hlabathi, ukuba abe zizityebi zokholo,  neendlalifa zobukumkani, awababeka ngedinga abo bamthandayo?
59_2_6_Ke nina nilihlazisile ihlwempu. Izityebi azinishicileli na?  Zona azinirholeli ematyaleni na?
59_2_7_Zona azilinyelisi na igama elihle elo, nabizwa ngalo?
59_2_8_Ukuba okunene niyawuzalisa umthetho wakomkhulu,  ngokwesibhalo esithi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako, nityaphile;
59_2_9_kodwa ukuba nikhetha ubuso bomntu, nisebenza isono,  niyohlwaywa ngumthetho ngokwabagqithi.
59_2_10_Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, akhubeke mthethweni mnye, unetyala layo yonke.
59_2_11_Kuba lowo wathi, Musa ukukrexeza, ubuye wathi, Musa ukubulala. Ke, ukuba akukrexezi, kodwa ubulala, usewuthe waba ngumgqithi-mthetho.
59_2_12_Yithini ukuthetha, yithini ukwenza, nenze njengabaza kugwetywa ngomthetho wenkululeko.
59_2_13_Kuba umgwebo awuyi kuba natarhu kulowo ungenzanga nceba;  kananjalo inceba iyawuqhayisela umgwebo.
59_2_14_Kunceda ntoni na, bazalwana bam, ukuba umntu uthi unokholo,  abe imisebenzi ke engenayo? Lunako yini na ukumsindisa ukholo lwakhe?
59_2_15_Ukuba ke umzalwana, nokuba ngudade, bathi bahambe ze,  beswele ukudla imihla ngemihla,
59_2_16_athi ke omnye wenu kubo, Hambani ninoxolo, yothani,  hluthani; nibe ke ningabaniki izinto ezo ziwufaneleyo umzimba:  kunceda ntoni na?
59_2_17_Ngokunjalo nalo ukholo, ukuba luthi lungabi namisebenzi,  lufile ngokukokwalo.
59_2_18_Wosuka omnye, athi, Wena unokholo, ke mna ndinemisebenzi;  ndibonise ukholo lwakho olungenamisebenzi yakho; nam ndokubonisa ngokwasemisebenzini yam ukholo lwam.
59_2_19_Wena uyakholwa ukuba uThixo mnye; uyatyapha; nazo iidemon ziyakholwa, zibe namanwele.
59_2_20_Uyathanda na ke ukwazi, mntundini ungento, ukuba ukholo olu, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile?
59_2_21_UAbraham, ubawo wethu, akagwetyelwanga na ngokwasemisebenzini, akumnikela uIsake, unyana wakhe, phezu kwesibingelelo?
59_2_22_Uyabona ukuba ukholo lwalusebenzisana nemisebenzi yakhe,  lwenziwa wagqibelela ukholo ngokwasemisebenzini?
59_2_23_Saza sazaliseka isibhalo esithi, Wakholwa ke uAbraham nguye uThixo; kwaza oko kwabalelwa ebulungiseni kuye, wabizwa ngokuba sisihlobo sikaThixo.
59_2_24_Niyabona ke ngoko, ukuba umntu uyagwetyelwa ngokwasemisebenzini; kungabi ngokwaselukholweni lodwa.
59_2_25_Ngokunjalo ke, noRahabhi, ihenyukazi, akagwetyelwanga na ngokwasemisebenzini, akubamkela ngobubele abathunywa,  abakhuphele phandle ngayimbi indlela?
59_2_26_Kuba, kwanjengokuba umzimba, ungekho umoya, ufile,  ngokunjalo ukholo, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile nalo.
59_3_1_Musani ukuba ngabafundisi abaninzi, bazalwana bam, nisazi nje ukuba siya kwamkela olona lukhulu ugwebo.
59_3_2_Kuba siyakhubeka kaninzi sonke. Ukuba umntu akakhubeki zwini, lowo uyindoda egqibeleleyo, enako ukuwubamba ngomkhala nawo umzimba uphela.
59_3_3_Yabona, sifaka imikhala emilonyeni yamahashe, ukuba asithambele, siwajike umzimba wawo uphela.
59_3_4_Yabona, nayo imikhombe, imikhulu kangaka nje, iqhutywa nje yimimoya enamandla, ijikwa ngomthi wokujika omncinanana, iye apho sukuba umlawuli angxamele ukuba ingaya ngakhona.
59_3_5_Ngokunjalo nalo ulwimi, lulilungu elincinanana nje,  luyagwagwisa kakhulu. Yabona ke, umlilo omncinane utshisa ihlathi elikhulu.
59_3_6_Nolwimi olu ngumlilo, lihlabathi elizele kukungalungisi;  lunjalo ulwimi ukuhlala phakathi kwamalungu ethu. Lona luyawudyobha umzimba uphela, luvuthisa intenda yobomi; lona ke luvuthiswa sisihogo somlilo.
59_3_7_Kuba zonke iimvelo zezinto ezizitho zine, kwanezeentaka,  nezezinambuzane, kwanezezinto eziselwandle, ziyadanjiswa,  kanjalo sezikhe zadanjiswa yimvelo eyiyeyabantu;
59_3_8_ke lona ulwimi alunaye noko amnye ebantwini, unokuludambisa;  lubububi obungenakubanjwa, luzele bubuhlungu obubulalayo.
59_3_9_Ngalo siyambonga uThixo uYise, nangalo siyabaqalekisa abantu abenziwe ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo.
59_3_10_Kwakulo mlomo mnye kuphuma intsikelelo nengqalekiso.  Akufanelekile, bazalwana bam, ukuba ezi zinto zibe nje.
59_3_11_Umthombo umpompoza amnandi nakrakra kwangelo liso linye,  yini na?
59_3_12_Unako yini na, bazalwana bam, umkhiwane ukuvelisa iinkozo zomnquma, uthi umdiliya uvelise amakhiwane? Ngokunjalo akukho namnye umthombo ongavelisa amanzi amtyuba namnandi.
59_3_13_Ngubani na olumkileyo, owaziyo kakuhle phakathi kwenu?  Makayibonise imisebenzi yakhe ngehambo entle, enobulali bobulumko.
59_3_14_Ke, ukuba ninomona okrakra neyelenqe entliziyweni yenu,  musani ukuyiqhayisela nokuyixoka inyaniso.
59_3_15_Obo bulumko asibubo obuhla phezulu; bobasemhlabeni,  bobemvelo, bobeedemon.
59_3_16_Kuba apho kukhoyo umona neyelenqe, kubakho isiphithiphithi nemicimbi emibi yonke.
59_3_17_Ke bona ubulumko baphezulu ukuqala bunyulu, buze bube boboxolo; buyancendezela, buthozame kakuhle, buzele yinceba neziqhamo ezilungileyo; abunankani, abunaluhanahaniso.
59_3_18_Isiqhamo ke sobulungisa sihlwayelwa ngoxolo ngabo benza uxolo.
59_4_1_Zivela phi na iimfazwe nokulwa phakathi kwenu? Aziveli na apha eziyolweni zenu, eziwaphumela umkhosi amalungu enu?
59_4_2_Niyakhanuka, ningabi nakuzuza nto noko; niyabulala, nizonde,  ningabi nakufumana nto noko; niyalwa, nenze imfazwe, ningabi nakuzuza nto ke, ngenxa yokuba ningaceli.
59_4_3_Niyacela, ningamkeli noko, ngenxa enokuba nicela kakubi,  ukuze oko nikuchithele iziyolo zenu.
59_4_4_Bakrexezindini, bakrexezikazindini, anazi na ukuba ubuhlobo balo ihlabathi bubutshaba kuye uThixo? Othe ngoko wanga angaba sisihlobo salo ihlabathi, uzenza utshaba lukaThixo.
59_4_5_Okanye niba isibhalo esi sifumana sisitsho na, ukuthi, Umoya owahlala ngaphakathi kwethu ulangazelela ukukhweleta?
59_4_6_Ke ubabala kakhulu ngakumbi. Kungoko sithi, UThixo uyabachasa abanekratshi, abababale abazithobileyo.
59_4_7_Mthobeleni ngoko uThixo. Mchaseni ke uMtyholi, wonibaleka.
59_4_8_Sondelani kuye uThixo, wosondela kuni. Hlambululani izandla,  boni, nenze nyulu iintliziyo, nina bamphefumlo umbaxa.
59_4_9_Yibani ziindwayi, nikhedame, nilile; ukuhleka kwenu makujike kube kukukhedama, nalo uvuyo lwenu lube kukuthi dakumba.
59_4_10_Zithobeni emehlweni eNkosi, yoniphakamisa.
59_4_11_Musani ukuthetha okubi omnye ngomnye, bazalwana. Lowo uthetha okubi ngomzalwana, amgwebe umzalwana wakhe, uthetha okubi ngomthetho, agwebe umthetho; ke, ukuba uyawugweba umthetho, akumenzi wamthetho, ungumgwebi.
59_4_12_Mnye uMmisi-mthetho, lowo unako ukusindisa nokutshabalalisa; ungubani na wena, umgwebayo omnye?
59_4_13_Wenani kaloku, nina nitshoyo ukuthi, Namhla, nokuba kungomso, siya kuya kulaa mzi, senze khona umnyaka ube mnye,  sirhwebe, sizuze;
59_4_14_kanti nina aba anikwazi kakuhle okwangomso. Kuba buyintoni na ubomi benu? Bungumphunga obonakala ixesha elincinane, uze ke uthi shwaka.
59_4_15_Endaweni yokuba nithi, Ukuba iNkosi ithe yathanda, saphila,  siya kwenza le nto, nalaa nto.
59_4_16_Ngoku ke niqhayisa ngokuqhankqalaza kwenu; konke ukuqhayisa okunjalo akundawo.
59_4_17_Ngoko kowaziyo ukwenza okuhle, angakwenzi, kulowo kusisono.
59_5_1_Wenani kaloku, zityebi, lilani nenze isijwili ngeenkxwaleko zenu ezizayo.
59_5_2_Ubutyebi benu bubolile, neengubo zenu zidliwe ngamanundu.
59_5_3_Igolide nesilivere yenu idliwe ngumhlwa; umhlwa wazo uya kuba lingqina ngakuni, uyidle inyama yenu njengomlilo.  Niziqwebele ubutyebi ngeemini zokugqibela.
59_5_4_Yabonani, umvuzo wabasebenzi, abavune amasimi enu, lowo ubandeziweyo nini, uyakhala; kwaye ukubhomboloza kwabavuni abo kungenile ezindlebeni zeNkosi yemikhosi.
59_5_5_Nadla ubuncwane emhlabeni apha, naxhamla iziyolo, nazondla iintliziyo zenu njengamhla kuxheliweyo.
59_5_6_Namgweba, nambulala olilungisa; yena akanichasi.
59_5_7_Nyamezelani ngoko, bazalwana, ide ifike iNkosi. Niyabona,  umlimi uyasilinda isiqhamo sawo umhlaba esinexabiso elikhulu,  anyamezele ngaso, side samkele eyaphambili neyasemva imvula.
59_5_8_Nyamezelani nani, zizimaseni iintliziyo zenu, ngokuba ukufika kweNkosi kusondele.
59_5_9_Musani ukukrokrelana omnye nomnye, bazalwana, ukuze ningagwetywa; yabonani, uMgwebi umi phambi komnyango.
59_5_10_Bathabatheni, bazalwana bam, abaprofeti ababethetha egameni leNkosi, babe ngumzekelo wokuva ubunzima, nowokunyamezela.
59_5_11_Yabonani, sithi, banoyolo abo banyamezelayo. Unyamezelo lukaYobhi naluva, nesigqibo seNkosi nasibona, ngokuba iNkosi inemfesane enkulu, inenceba.
59_5_12_Ke kaloku, ngaphezu kweento zonke, bazalwana bam, musani ukufunga, nokuba lizulu, nokuba ngumhlaba, nokuba sesinye isifungo esiyini; makathi ke uewe wenu abe nguewe, nohayi abe nguhayi, ukuze ningeyeli ekugwetyweni.
59_5_13_Kukho mntu na phakathi kwenu uva ububi? Makathandaze. Kukho mntu na unomxhelo owonwabileyo? Makenze indumiso.
59_5_14_Kukho mntu na ufayo phakathi kwenu? Makabizele kuye amadoda amakhulu alo ibandla, athandaze wona phezu kwakhe, akuba emthambisile ngeoli, egameni leNkosi;
59_5_15_wothi umthandazo wokholo umsindise lowo uleleyo, iNkosi imvuse; nokuba ubethe wenza izono, wozixolelwa.
59_5_16_Xelelanani iziphoso, nithandazelane, ukuze niphiliswe.  Sinamandla kakhulu isikhungo selungisa, siyeyisa.
59_5_17_UEliya wayengumntu oluvo lunjengolwethu, wathandaza umthandazo ukuba ingani; ayana emhlabeni iminyaka emithathu eneenyanga ezintandathu.
59_5_18_Wabuya wathandaza, laza izulu lanika imvula, umhlaba wavelisa isiqhamo sawo.
59_5_19_Bazalwana, ukuba uthe omnye phakathi kwenu walahleka enyanisweni, wathi ubani wamguqula,
59_5_20_makazi ukuba lowo wamguqulayo umoni ekulahlekeni kwakhe,  woba usindise umphefumlo ekufeni, wagubungela inkitha yezono.
60_1_1_UPetros, umpostile kaYesu Kristu, ubhalela abanyuliweyo abangabaphambukeli kwiintsali ezikwelasePonto, kwelaseGalati,  kwelaseKapadoki, kwelaseAsiya, nakwelaseBhitini,
60_1_2_abanyuliweyo ngokokwazi kwenxa engaphambili kukaThixo uYise,  ebungcweleni boMoya, kuse ekululameleni nasekufefweni kwegazi likaYesu Kristu: uthi, Makwandiswe kuni ubabalo noxolo.
60_1_3_Makabongwe uThixo, uYise weNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, othe ngokobuninzi benceba yakhe, wasizala ngokutsha, ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu kwabafileyo;
60_1_4_sibe nelifa elingenakonakala, elingenakudyobheka,  elingenakuguga, eniligcinelweyo emazulwini,
60_1_5_nina bathe ngamandla kaThixo ngokholo balondolozelwa elusindisweni, olulungiselwe ukutyhilwa ngexesha lokugqibela.
60_1_6_Enigcoba ngalo, nokuba nithe naba buhlungu umzuzwana ngoku,  ukuba nimelwe kuko, phakathi kwezilingo ngezilingo;
60_1_7_ukuze ukucikideka kokholo lwenu kufunyanwe kunqabile kakhulu, ngaphezu kwegolide le itshabalalayo, noko icikidwa ngomlilo; kuse kuyo indumiso nembeko nozuko ekutyhilekeni kukaYesu Kristu.
60_1_8_Enithe, ningambonanga nje, namthanda; enithi ke nikholwa kuye, noko ngoku ningamboniyo, nigcobe ngovuyo olungathethekiyo, oluzukisiweyo;
60_1_9_nisamkela isiphelo sokholo lwenu, usindiso ke lwemiphefumlo yenu.
60_1_10_Usindiso abathe babuzisa, baphengulula kunene ngalo abaprofeti, ababeprofeta ngalo ubabalo olwamiselwa nina;
60_1_11_bephengulula ukuba wayesalatha xesha lini na, linjani na,  uMoya kaKristu, awayezingqinela kubo ngenxa engaphambili iintlungu ezamiselwa uKristu, nozuko oluya kuzilandela.
60_1_12_Abatyhilelwayo ukuba abazilungiseleli bona ngokwabo;  bazilungiselela thina ke, izinto enizityelweyo ngoku ngabo banishumayezayo iindaba ezilungileyo ngoMoya oyiNgcwele,  owathunywa evela emazulwini; izinto ke ezo ezizinqwenelayo izithunywa zezulu ukuqondela kuzo.
60_1_13_Ngoko, bhinqani izinqe zengqondo yenu, ninobungcathu,  niluthembe ngokugqibeleleyo ubabalo oluziswa kuni ekutyhilekeni kukaYesu Kristu;
60_1_14_ngokwabantwana bolulamo, ningamilisi okweenkanuko zangaphambili ekungazini kwenu;
60_1_15_nithi ke, ngokokwalowo ungcwele wanibizayo, nibe ngcwele nani ngokwenu kuyo yonke ihambo.
60_1_16_Ngenxa enokuba kubhaliwe kwathiwa, Yibani ngcwele, ngokuba ndingcwele mna.
60_1_17_Kanjalo, ukuba nimnqula ngokoYihlo, lowo ugweba ngokowalowo umsebenzi, engakhethi buso, lihlaleni ixesha lokuphambukela kwenu apha nizoyikela;
60_1_18_nisazi nje ukuba anihlawulelwanga nikhululwe ngazinto zinakonakala, oozisilivere noozigolide, kuyo ihambo yenu engento, enayinikelwayo ngooyihlo.
60_1_19_Kwakungegazi elinqabileyo likaKristu, njengelemvana engenasiphako, engenabala;
60_1_20_owaziwayo ngenxa engaphambili okunene, ngaphambi kokusekwa kwehlabathi, kodwa wabonakalaliswa ekugqibeleni kwamaxesha la ngenxa yenu, nina nikholwayo ngaye kuThixo,
60_1_21_owamvusayo kwabafileyo, wamzukisa, ngokokuze ukholo lwenu nethemba lenu libe kuThixo.
60_1_22_Niyenze nyulu nje imiphefumlo yenu ngokuyilulamela inyaniso ngoMoya, kuse ekuthandeni abazalwana okungenaluhanahaniso,  thandanani ngenyameko, ngokwasentliziyweni ehlambulukileyo;
60_1_23_nizelwe nje ngokutsha, kungengokwasembewini enokonakala,  kungokwasembewini engenakonakala, ngelizwi likaThixo eliphilileyo, elihleliyo ngonaphakade.
60_1_24_Ngenxa enokuba Yonke inyama injengengca, Nabo bonke ubuqaqawuli bomntu bunjengentyantyambo yengca. Ingca iyoma,  ivuthuluke nentyantyambo yayo;
60_1_25_Ke lona ilizwi leNkosi lihleli ngonaphakade. Elo ke leli lizwi lashunyayelwayo kuni ngeendaba ezilungileyo.
60_2_1_Ngoko, nilulahlile nje lonke ulunya, nayo yonke inkohliso,  nokuhanahanisa, nomona, nako konke ukuthetha okubi,  walangazeleleni,
60_2_2_ngokweentsana ezisandula ukuzalwa, amasi angawelizwi,  angenankohliso, ukuze nikhule ngawo;
60_2_3_ukuba okunene nikuvile, ukuba iNkosi inobubele.
60_2_4_Nisiza nje kuyo, ililitye eliphilileyo, licekisiwe okunene ngabantu, kodwa linyuliwe nguThixo, linqabile:
60_2_5_nani ngokwenu, njengamatye aphilileyo, yakhekani nibe yindlu eyiyeyomoya, isibingeleli esingcwele sokunyusa imibingelelo eyiyeyomoya, eyamkeleka kakuhle kuye uThixo ngoYesu Kristu.
60_2_6_Kungoko ikhoyo nokubakho esibhalweni indawo ethi, Yabona,  ndibeka eZiyon ilitye lembombo, elinyuliweyo, elinqabileyo;  Lowo ukholwayo kuye akayi kukha adaniswe.
60_2_7_Kuni ngoko bakholwayo, liyimbeko; ke kwabangevayo, Ilitye abalicekisayo abakhi, Lelona laba yintloko yembombo,
60_2_8_Ilitye ke lokuwisa, iliwa ke lokukhubekisa, kwabo bakhubekayo, bengaliva ilizwi; into ke leyo abamiselwe nokumiselwa yona.
60_2_9_Ke nina nisisizukulwana esinyuliweyo, isibingeleli esibukumkani, uhlanga olungcwele, abantu abayinqobo, ukuze nivakalise isidima salowo wanibizayo ukuba niphume ebumnyameni,  ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okungummangaliso;
60_2_10_enanifudula ningebantu, ke ngoku ningabantu bakaThixo;  enaningenzelwanga nceba, ke ngoku nenzelwe inceba.
60_2_11_Zintanda, ndiyanivuselela njengabaphambukeli nabasemzini,  ukuba nikhumke ezinkanukweni ezizezenyama, zona ziwuphumele umkhosi umphefumlo.
60_2_12_Ihambo yenu mayibe ntle phakathi kweentlanga; ukuze kulo nto bathetha okubi ngani, ngathi ningabenzi bokubi, bathi ngokubona imisebenzi yenu emihle, bamzukise uThixo ngomhla wokuvelelwa.
60_2_13_Wuthobeleni ngoko wonke ummiso ongowomntu, ngenxa yayo iNkosi; nokuba ngukumkani, njengowongamileyo;
60_2_14_nokuba ngabalawuli, njengabathunyiweyo nguye, ukuze baphindezele okunene kubenzi bokubi, badumise abenzi bokulungileyo.
60_2_15_Ngokuba ukuthanda kukaThixo kukuba nithi, ngokwenza okulungileyo, nibethe ithi cwaka intswela-kwazi yabantu abaziintsweli-kuqonda;
60_2_16_nithi ningabakhululekileyo nje, ningabi ngabayenza inkululeko ibe sisigqubuthelo sobubi; nibe ngabakhonzi bakathixo.
60_2_17_Bekani abantu bonke. Thandani isizalwana. UThixo moyikeni.  Ukumkani mbekeni.
60_2_18_Nina zicaka, bathobeleni ninako konke ukoyika abanikhonzisayo, ingabi ngabalungileyo nabathantamisayo bodwa,  ibe kwanabagwenxa.
60_2_19_Kuba oku kuyabuleleka, ukuba umntu uthwala iintsizi, ngenxa yokumazi uThixo, eve ubunzima esoniwa.
60_2_20_Kuba kuya kuba ludumo luni na, ukuba ninyamezele nakuntlithwa nisona? Ke ukuba nithi, nisenza okulungileyo, nive ubunzima, nize ninyamezele, oko kuyabuleleka kuThixo.
60_2_21_Kuba nabizelwa oko; ngokuba noKristu weva ubunzima ngenxa yethu, esishiya nomzekelo, ukuze silandele emkhondweni wakhe:
60_2_22_ongenzanga sono, ekungafunyanwanga nkohliso emlonyeni wakhe;
60_2_23_obesithi, etshabhiswa, angaphindezeli atshabhise, athi esiva ubunzima, angaphindezeli asongele; ke ubeyekele kulowo ugwebayo ngokobulungisa;
60_2_24_owathi ngokwakhe, izono zethu wazithwala ngomzimba wakhe emthini, ukuze sithi, sifile ngakwizono, siphilele ebulungiseni; omivumbo yakhe naphiliswa ngayo.
60_2_25_Kuba beninjengezimvu zilahlekile, koko nisuke ngoku nabuyela kuye uMalusi noMveleli wemiphefumlo yenu.
60_3_1_Ngokunjalo, nina bafazi, wathobeleni awenu amadoda, ukuze kuthi, nokuba kukho kuwo angalivayo ilizwi, athi ngehambo yabafazi, lingekho ilizwi, azuzeke;
60_3_2_ebonela ihambo yenu enyulu, enoloyiko.
60_3_3_Ukuhomba kwenu makungabi kokwangaphandle, kokulukwa kweenwele, nokunxitywa kwegolide, nokwambathwa kweengubo;
60_3_4_makube kokomntu ofihlakeleyo wentliziyo, ovethe ukungonakali, umoya onobulali, ozolileyo, oxabiso likhulu emehlweni kaThixo.
60_3_5_Kuba babefudula besenjenjalo abafazi abangcwele, abo babemthembile uThixo, ukuhomba kwabo, bewathobele awabo amadoda;
60_3_6_njengokuba uSara wamlulamelayo uAbraham, embiza ngokuthi yinkosi; eningabantwana bakhe nina, nakuba nisenza okulungileyo, ningoyiki nto yethusayo.
60_3_7_Ngokunjalo, nina madoda, hlalani nabo ngokokwazi, nimbeka umfazi, njengesona sitya siethe-ethe, njengeendlalifa kunye nani zobabalo lobomi, ukuze imithandazo yenu ingathinteleki.
60_3_8_Elokugqiba, cingani nto-nye nonke, velanani, thandanani njengabazalwana, yibani nemfesane kakhulu, yibani nobubele.
60_3_9_Ningabuyekezi ububi ngobubi, nokutshabhisa ngokutshabhisa;  kanye ke sikelelani, nisazi ukuba nabizelwa oku, ukuze niyidle ilifa intsikelelo.
60_3_10_Kuba Lowo unga angathanda ubomi, Ayibone imihla elungileyo,  Makaluphezise ulwimi lwakhe ebubini, Nomlomo wakhe ungathethi inkohliso;
60_3_11_Makaphambuke ebubini, enze okulungileyo; Makafune uxolo,  aluphuthume.
60_3_12_Ngokuba amehlo eNkosi aphezu kwamalungisa, Neendlebe zayo zisingisele esikhungweni sawo; Ke ubuso beNkosi buphezu kwabenza okubi.
60_3_13_Kananjalo ngubani na yena owonona, ukuba nithe naba ngabalandeli bokulungileyo?
60_3_14_Nokuba nithe neva ubunzima ngenxa yobulungisa, ninoyolo;  musani ukoyika ngokoyikisa kwabo, ningakhathazeki nokukhathazeka.
60_3_15_INkosi ke uThixo yingcwaliseni ezintliziyweni zenu, nihlale ke nikulungele ukuziphendulela kumntu wonke obuzayo kuni ilizwi, ngalo ithemba elingaphakathi kwenu, ninobulali noloyiko;
60_3_16_ninesazela esilungileyo, ukuze kuloo nto banithethela okubi, ngathi ningabenzi bokubi, badane abo bayigxekayo ihambo yenu elungileyo kuKristu.
60_3_17_Ukuba ke kungaba kukuthanda kukaThixo ukuba nive ubunzima,  okona kunilungeleyo kukubuva nisenza okulungileyo, kunokubuva nisenza okubi.
60_3_18_Ngokuba noKristu wabuva kwakanye ubunzima ngenxa yezono,  ilungisa lisiva ubunzima ngenxa yabangemalungisa, ukuze asisondeze kuye uThixo; ebulewe okunene esenyameni, kodwa edliswe ubomi ekuwo umoya.
60_3_19_Awathi ekuwo, waya washumayela koomoya abasekukhonkxweni,
60_3_20_ababefudula bengeva, xenikweni ukuzeka kade umsindo kukaThixo kwakulindile ngemihla kaNowa, kwakubon ukuba kulungiswa umkhombe, ekwasindiselwa kuwo imiphefumlo embalwa,  oko kukuthi esibhozo, ngamanzi.
60_3_21_Olusisindisayo ngawo nathi ngoku ubhaptizo ngokomfuziselo;  olungekuko ukulahla ubunyhukunyhuku benyama; olukukubuzisa kuThixo kwesazela esilungileyo, ngokuvuka kukaYesu Kristu;
60_3_22_osekunene kukaThixo, eye emazulwini, kwakubon ukuba kuthotyelwe phantsi kwakhe izithunywa zezulu, noomagunya,  namandla.
60_4_1_Ekubeni ngoko uKristu eve ubunzima ngenxa yethu esenyameni,  xhobani nani kwaloo ngcingane; ngokuba lowo uve ubunzima esenyameni, ukhunyulwe ekoneni;
60_4_2_ukuze ixesha eliseleyo enyameni ningabi saliphilela ezinkanukweni zabantu, niliphilele ekuthandeni kukaThixo.
60_4_3_Kuba lisanele ixesha elidluleyo lokuphila kwethu, esasisenza ukuthanda kweentlanga, sasihamba nje eburheletyweni,  ezinkanukweni, ekutshisweni yiwayini, ezindywaleni, emithayini,  nasekukhonzeni izithixo, okungekhona esikweni;
60_4_4_abathe nqa ngako ukuba ningabaleki kunye nabo, ukuya kwakuwo loo melelo wokuzibhubhisa, benyelisa;
60_4_5_abaya kuphendula kulowo ulungele ukugweba abaphilileyo nabafileyo.
60_4_6_Kuba ngenxa yoku zashunyayelwa iindaba ezilungileyo nakwabafileyo, ukuze bagwetywe okunene ngokwabantu besenyameni,  kodwa badle ubomi ngokukaThixo, bekuwo umoya.
60_4_7_Ke kaloku ukuphela kwezinto zonke kusondele. Yibani nesidima ngoko, nibe nobungcathu, ukuba nithandaze.
60_4_8_Ngaphezu kweento zonke ke, yibani nothandano olunyamekileyo,  ngokuba uthando luya kugubungela inkitha yezono.
60_4_9_Bukanani, ningenakukrokra.
60_4_10_Yithini elowo, njengoko wasamkelayo isipho sokubabalwa,  nilungiselelane ngaso, njengamagosa amahle obabalo ngobabalo lukaThixo.
60_4_11_Ukuba umntu uyathetha, makathethe ngokwezihlabo zikaThixo;  ukuba umntu uyalungiselela, makalungiselele ngokwasekomeleleni akuphiwa nguThixo, ukuze ezintweni zonke azukiswe uThixo ngoYesu Kristu, elulolwakhe uzuko namandla, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
60_4_12_Zintanda, musani ukuwuthela nqa umlilo okhoyo phakathi kwenu wokunilinga, ngathi nihlelwa yinto yokuthelwa nqa.
60_4_13_Yithini, njengoko ningamadlelane ngeentlungu zikaKristu,  nivuye; ukuze, nasekutyhilekeni kobuqaqawuli bakhe, nivuye nigcoba.
60_4_14_Ukuba niyangcikivwa ngenxa yegama likaKristu, ninoyolo;  ngokuba uMoya wozuko nokaThixo uphumle phezu kwenu;  ngokukokwabo okunene uyanyeliswa, kodwa ngokukokwenu uyazukiswa.
60_4_15_Makungabikho ke bani kuni uva ubunzima ngokombulali,  nangokwesela, nangokomenzi wobubi, nangokovelela izinto angatheni nazo.
60_4_16_Ukuba ke ubani uva ubunzima ngokuba engumKristu,  makangadani; makamzukise ke uThixo ngaloo ndawo.
60_4_17_Ngokuba lixesha lokuba ugwebo luqale ngendlu kaThixo. Ukuba ke luqala ngathi, koba yintoni na ukuphela kwabo bangazivayo iindaba ezilungileyo zikaThixo?
60_4_18_Kanjalo ukuba nelungisa eli lisindiswa ngenkankulu,  ongahloneli Thixo nongumoni woba phi na?
60_4_19_Ngoko ke abo babuvayo ubunzima ngokokuthanda kukaThixo,  mabayiyaleze kuye imiphefumlo yabo, enguMdali othembekileyo ekwenzeni okulungileyo.
60_5_1_Amadoda amakhulu la aphakathi kwenu ndiyawavuselela,  ndikwayindoda enkulu kunye nawo, nengqina leentlungu zikaKristu, nedlelane nawo ngobuqaqawuli obuza kutyhileka.
60_5_2_Waluseni umhlambi kaThixo ophakathi kwenu, niwuvelela,  kungengakunyanzelwa, makube ngokokuzithandela; kungengenxa yenzuzo embi, makube ngokuthumekelela;
60_5_3_kungabi njengabazigagamelayo izahlulo zawo, yibani yimizekelo kumhlambi.
60_5_4_Nothi, akubonakala uMalusi oyintloko, nisifumane isithsaba salo uzuko esingabuniyo.
60_5_5_Ngokunjalo, nina manci, wathobeleni amadoda amakhulu.  Thobelanani nonke ke, ninxibe ukuthobeka kwentliziyo; ngokuba uThixo uyabachasa abanekratshi, abababale ke abazithobileyo.
60_5_6_Zithobeni ngoko ngaphantsi kwesandla esinamandla sikaThixo,  ukuze aniphakamise ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
60_5_7_Lonke ixhala lenu liphoseni phezu kwakhe, ngokuba yena enikhathalele.
60_5_8_Yibani nobungcathu, phaphani; ngokuba ummangaleli wenu,  uMtyholi, uhamba njengengonyama egqumayo, efuna ubani angamginyayo;
60_5_9_mchaseni lowo, nizimasekile elukholweni, nisazi ukuba kwaezo ntlungu ziyenzeka kubo abazalwana benu abasehlabathini.
60_5_10_Ke kaloku uThixo walo lonke ubabalo, owasibizelayo eluzukweni lwakhe olungunaphakade, sikuKristu Yesu, wanga angathi ngokwakhe, nakuba nive ubunzima umzuzwana, anilungise nigqibelele, anizimase, anomeleze, anisekele.
60_5_11_Kuye makubekho uzuko namandla, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen.
60_5_12_NgoSilvano, umzalwana othembekileyo, njengoko ndicinga ngako, ndibhale kuni ngokufutshane, ndivuselela, ndingqina ukuba olu lubabalo oluyinene lukaThixo, nimiyo kulo.
60_5_13_Liyanibulisa ibandla eliseBhabheli, elinyuliweyo kunye nani; noMarko unyana wam uyabulisa.
60_5_14_Bulisanani ngolwango lothando. Uxolo malube kuni nonke enikuKristu. Amen.
61_1_1_USimon Petros, umkhonzi nompostile kaYesu Kristu, ubhalela abo baluzuzileyo ukholo oluxabiso lunye nolwethu, ebulungiseni bukaThixo wethu, uMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu:
61_1_2_uthi, Makwandiswe kuni ubabalo noxolo, ngokumazi uThixo,  noYesu, iNkosi yethu.
61_1_3_Nibona nje, ukuba amandla akhe obuThixo asiphile zonke izinto ezisingise ebomini nasekuhloneleni uThixo, ngako ukumazi lowo wasibizayo ngozuko nesidima.
61_1_4_Esithe ngezo zinto, saphiwa amadinga amakhulukazi,  anqabileyo, ukuze ngawo nibe ngamadlelane ngemvelo yobuThixo,  nisinde ekonakaleni okukhoyo ehlabathini ngenkanuko.
61_1_5_Ewe, ngenxa yoko, nakuba niqokele ukukhuthala konke, yithini elukholweni lwenu nongezelele isidima; esidimeni ke, ukwazi;
61_1_6_ekwazini ke, ukuzeyisa; ekuzeyiseni ke, umonde; emondeni ke,  ukuhlonela uThixo;
61_1_7_ekuhloneleni ke uThixo, ukuthanda abazalwana; ekuthandeni ke abazalwana, ukuthanda abantu bonke.
61_1_8_Kuba xa zikhoyo ezo zinto kuni, zisanda, zinenza ukuba ninganqeni, ningabi ngabaswele isiqhamo ekuyazini iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
61_1_9_Kuba lowo zingekhoyo kuye ezo zinto, uyimfama; ubona luzizi,  ekulibele ukuhlanjululwa kwezono zakhe zakudala.
61_1_10_Endithi ngoko, bazalwana, makube kukhona nikhuthalele ukulwenza luqine ubizo nonyulo lwenu; kuba, nakuzenza ezo zinto, anisayi kukha nikhubeke.
61_1_11_Kuba ngokunjalo nophiwa ngokobutyebi ukungena ebukumkanini obungunaphakade beNkosi yethu, uMsindisi uYesu Kristu.
61_1_12_Kungoko ndingakuyekiyo ukuhlala ndinikhumbuza ngezo zinto,  noko nizaziyo, nizimasekileyo enyanisweni leyo ikhoyo kuni.
61_1_13_Ndiba ke kububulungisa, ukuba ngalo gama ndikulo mnquba,  ndinivuse ngokunikhumbuza;
61_1_14_ndisazi nje ukuba kukufuphi ukubekwa nxamnye kwalo mnquba wam, njengokuba nayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu yandazisayo.
61_1_15_Kananjalo ndiya kukhuthalela ke ukuba nibe nako, amaxa onke emva kokumka kwam, ukuzikhunjuzwa ezo zinto.
61_1_16_Kuba sithe, singalandelanga zintsomi zabuqhinga, sanazisa amandla nokufika kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu; sithe saba ngababoneli bobungangamsha bakhe.
61_1_17_Kuba wamkela kuThixo uYise imbeko nozuko, ekuzisweni kuye,  bubuqaqawuli obubalaseleyo, izwi elinjengeli: Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo mna nguye.
61_1_18_Nelo zwi ke saliva thina, lisiza liphuma ezulwini, sinaye entabeni leyo ingcwele.
61_1_19_Kanjalo sinalo nelona lizwi liqinisekileyo elilelobuprofeti, enityaphayo ukulinyamekela, linjengesibane esikhanyisa endaweni emnyama, kude kuse, liphume ikhwezi ezintliziyweni zenu;
61_1_20_nisazi oku kuqala, ukuba sonke isiprofeto sesibhalo asibikho ngokuzicombululela.
61_1_21_Kuba akukhanga kubekho siprofeto ngokuthanda komntu; bathi abantu abangcwele bakaThixo bathetha beqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
61_2_1_Ke kaloku, kwakukho nabaprofeti ababuxoki phakathi kwabantu;  njengokuba naphakathi kwenu kuya kubakho abafundisi ababuxoki,  bona baya kungenisa bucala amahlelo entshabalalo, bemkhanyela uMnini-nto-zonke owabathengayo, bezizisela intshabalalo emsinya.
61_2_2_Baninzi abaya kulandela intshabalalo yabo; eya kunyeliswa ngenxa yabo indlela yenyaniso.
61_2_3_Bathi benokubawa, banibonelele ngamazwi alalanisayo;  abakugwetywa kungaphumliyo kwakudala, nayo intshabalalo yabo ayozeli.
61_2_4_Kuba, xa uThixo angaziconganga izithunywa zezulu ezonayo,  wesuka wathi, ezikhahlele enzonzobileni, wazinikela emixokelelwaneni yesithokothoko, zigcinelwe umgwebo;
61_2_5_naxa angaliconganga ihlabathi lakudala, wesuka walondoloza uNowa, umvakalisi wobulungisa, enabasixhenxe, akuba elihlisele unogumbe ihlabathi labangahloneli Thixo;
61_2_6_xa athe nemizi yaseSodom neGomora wayitshisa yaluthuthu,  wayigweba ukuba ibhukuqeke, wayenza umzekelo wabaza kuba ngabangahloneli Thixo;
61_2_7_wamhlangula uLote olilungisa, owacatshukiswa kukuhamba eburheletyweni kwabangenammiselo;
61_2_8_kuba laye, ngokubona nangokuva, ilungisa elo lihleli phakathi kwabo imihla ngemihla, liwuthuthumbisa umphefumlo walo olungisayo, ngemisebenzi yabo echasene nomthetho;
61_2_9_iyakwazi iNkosi ukubahlangula ekuhendweni abahlonela uThixo;  ke abangemalungisa ibagcinele imini yomgwebo, ukuba babethwe;
61_2_10_ngokukodwa ke abo balandela inyama ngokukhanuka ukuzidyobha, abadela ubukhosi. Ngabasileyo, abenza ngokuzithandela, abangoyikiyo ukunyelisa izikhakhamela.
61_2_11_Ukanti izithunywa zezulu, zingaphezulu nje ngokomelela namandla, azizigwebi ngamgwebo unyelisayo phambi kweNkosi.
61_2_12_Ke aba, njengezinto eziphilileyo, ezingenangqondo,  ezizezemvelo, ezizalelwe ukubanjwa nokonakala, benyelisa izinto abangazaziyo, baya konakala kanye ekonakaleni kwabo, bazuzane nomvuzo wokungalungisi;
61_2_13_njengababa bubuyolo ukudla ubuncwane okwemini enye;  bengamabala neziphako, bexhamla ubuncwane ngokulukuhla kwabo,  bezingxala ukudla ezidlweni nani;
61_2_14_benamehlo azele lukrexezo, angenakuphunyuzwa esonweni,  bebambisa imiphefumlo engenakuzimaseka, benentliziyo eqheliswe ukubawa; abantwana bengqalekiso.
61_2_15_Beyishiyile indlela ethe tye, balahleka, belandela indlela kaBhileham okaBhehore, owathanda umvuzo wokungalungisi;
61_2_16_wohlwaywa ke ngokugqitha kwakhe umthetho; lathi iesile,  lingenakuthetha nje, lathetha ngezwi lomntu, lamalela umprofeti lowo, ukuba angabi nxamnye nengqondo.
61_2_17_Aba bayimithombo engenamanzi, amafu aqhutywa luqhwithela,  besigcinelwe bona isithokothoko sobumnyama ngonaphakade.
61_2_18_Kuba, bevakalisa nje iindumbisa zamazwi angento yanto,  babambisa ngeenkanuko zenyama, ngoburheletyo, abo babesindile,  kanye kwabo bahambayo ekulahlekisweni.
61_2_19_Bebathembisa nje inkululeko, bona ngokwabo bangabakhonzi bokonakala; kuba lowo athi ubani eyiswe nguye, ukhonzisiwe nokukhonziswa kuye.
61_2_20_Kuba xa bathi, besindile nje kuzo izidyobho zehlabathi ngokuyazi iNkosi, uMsindisi uYesu Kristu, babuye ke bazibhijele ngazo, boyiswe zizo, zisuke iziphelo zabo zaba mandundu kuneziqalo zabo.
61_2_21_Kuba ngekubalungele kanye, ukuba bebengayazanga indlela yobulungisa, kunokuba bathi beyazile, babuye umva, baphume kuwo umthetho ongcwele abawuwiselwayo.
61_2_22_Bahlelwe ke ngokomlinganiselo oyinene, othi, Inja ibuyele emhlanzweni wayo, nehagukazi eyahlanjwayo iye ekuzityikatyikeni eludakeni.
61_3_1_Ngoku ndinibhalela, zintanda, le ncwadi iyeyesibini, endithi kuzo zombini ndiyivuselele ingqondo yenu engcwengekileyo ngokunikhumbuza;
61_3_2_ukuba niwakhumbule amazwi abethethiwe ngenxa engaphambili ngabaprofeti abangcwele, nawo umthetho wabapostile bethu beNkosi uMsindisi;
61_3_3_nikwazi nje oku kuqala, ukuba kuya kuza ngemihla yokugqibela abagxeki, behamba ngokwezabo iinkanuko,
61_3_4_besithi, Liphi na kaloku idinga lokufika kwakhe? Kuba kuseloko oobawo balalayo ukufa, izinto zonke zahlala zihleli zinjengokwasekuqalekeni kwendalo.
61_3_5_Kuba oku kufihlakele kubo ngokuthanda kwabo, ukuba izulu laye likho kwakudala, nomhlaba uvele emanzini, umi ngamanzi,  ngalo ilizwi likaThixo;
61_3_6_elathi ngezo zinto ihlabathi langoko lantywiliselwa ngamanzi, latshabalala.
61_3_7_Ke lona izulu langoku, nawo umhlaba lo, kwangelo lizwi ezo zinto ziqwetyelwe, zigcinelwe, umlilo, kuse kwimini yomgwebo nentshabalalo yabantu abangahloneli Thixo.
61_3_8_Le nto ke inye mayingafihlakali kuni, zintanda, ukuba phambi kweNkosi imini enye injengeminyaka eliwaka, neminyaka eliwaka injengemini enye.
61_3_9_INkosi ayilibali dinga, njengoko abathile baba iyalibala;  isuka izeke kade umsindo kuthi, ingangi kungatshabalala nabani;  inga bonke bangasinga enguqukweni.
61_3_10_Iya kufika ke imini yeNkosi njengesela ebusuku, eliya kuthi ngayo izulu lidlule liqhuqhumba, zithi ke iziqalelo zitshe,  zichithakale, nomhlaba nayo imisebenzi ekuwo itshiswe kuthi tu.
61_3_11_Ezo zinto zonke ngoku zichithakala nje, nimele ukuba ngabanjani na ngeehambo ezingcwele nokuhlonela uThixo;
61_3_12_nikulindela, nikukhawulezela, ukufika kwayo imini kaThixo,  eliya kuthi ngenxa yayo izulu lifakwe isikhuni, lichithakale,  zithi neziqalelo zitshe zinyibilike?
61_3_13_Thina ke ngokwedinga lakhe silinde elitsha izulu, nomtsha umhlaba, apho kumi ubulungisa.
61_3_14_Kungoko, zintanda, nilindele ezo zinto nje, khuthalelani ukuba nifunyanwe kuye niseluxolweni, ningenabala,  ningenasiphako.
61_3_15_Ukuzeka kade umsindo kweNkosi yethu kubaleleni ekuthini lusindiso, njengoko wanibhalelayo nomzalwana wethu oyintanda,  uPawulos, ngokobulumko awabunikwayo;
61_3_16_njengokuba, nasezincwadini zakhe zonke, ethetha kuzo ngezo ndawo; ekukhoyo kuzo zithile ziqiqeka nzima, abathi abangafundileyo, nabangazimasekileyo, bazigqwethele kokwabo ukutshabalala, njengokuba bezenjenjalo nezinye izibhalo.
61_3_17_Nina ngoko, zintanda, nizazi nje ngenxa engaphambili ezo zinto, zigcineni okwenu, ukuze ningathi, nikhukuliswe lulahlekiso lwabangenammiselo, niphalale kokukokwenu ukuqina.
61_3_18_Khulani ke elubabalweni na sekuyazini iNkosi yethu,  uMsindisi uYesu Kristu. Kuye malubekho uzuko nangoku, kuse nakwimini engunaphakade. Amen.
62_1_1_Oko kwakukho kwasekuqalekeni, oko sikuvileyo, oko sikubonileyo ngawethu amehlo, oko sakukhangelayo, zakuphatha izandla zethu, okwelizwi labo ubomi
62_1_2_(obu bomi ke babonakaliswa; sibubonile, siyabungqinela,  siyabuxela kuni, ubomi obo bungunaphakade, bona obo bebukuye uYise, baza babonakaliswa kuthi):
62_1_3_oko ke sikubonileyo, sikuvileyo, siyakuxela kuni, ukuze nani nibe nobudlelane nathi. Baye ke ubudlelane bethu bunaye uYise,  bunaye uNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu.
62_1_4_Ezo zinto sinibhalela ukuze uvuyo lwenu luzaliseke.
62_1_5_Lulo olu ke udaba esiluvileyo kuye, esinityela lona, lokuba uThixo ukukukhanya, akukho bumnyama kuye nakanye.
62_1_6_Ukuba sithi sinobudlelane naye, sibe sihamba ebumnyameni,  soba siyaxoka, asiyenzi inyaniso;
62_1_7_ke, ukuba sihamba ekukhanyeni, njengokuba yena esekukhanyeni, soba sinobudlelane omnye nomnye, lithi negazi likaYesu Kristu, uNyana Wakhe, lisihlambulule kuso sonke isono.
62_1_8_Ukuba sithi asinasono, siyazikhohlisa, inyaniso ayikho kuthi.
62_1_9_Ukuba sithi sizivume izono zethu, uthembekile, ulilungisa,  ukuba asixolele izono zethu, asihlambulule kuko konke ukungalungisi.
62_1_10_Ukuba sithi asonanga, simenza ixoki; ilizwi lakhe alikho kuthi.
62_2_1_Bantwanana bam, ndinibhalela ezi zinto, ukuze ningoni. Ukuba kukho othe wona, sinoMthetheleli kuye uYise, uYesu Kristu ilungisa.
62_2_2_Yena usisicamagushelo sezono zethu; engesazethu zodwa, usiso nesehlabathi liphela.
62_2_3_Sazi ngale nto ukuba siyamazi, ngokuthi siyigcine imithetho yakhe.
62_2_4_Lowo uthi, Ndimazile, abe engayigcini imithetho yakhe,  ulixoki, kulowo ayikho inyaniso.
62_2_5_Ke othi aligcine ilizwi lakhe, okwenyaniso uthando lukaThixo lugqibelele kulowo; sazi ngaloo nto ukuba sikuye.
62_2_6_Lowo uthi uhleli kuye, ufanele ukuthi, njengoko wahambayo yena, enjenjalo ukuhamba naye.
62_2_7_Bazalwana, andinibhaleli mthetho mtsha; ngumthetho omdala,  ebeninawo kwasekuqalekeni. Umthetho omdala ke lilizwi enalivayo kwasekuqalekeni.
62_2_8_Ndibuya ndinibhalele umthetho omtsha, okuyinene oko kuye nakuni; ngokuba ubumnyama buyadlula, kwaye ukukhanya okuyinyaniso sekubonakala.
62_2_9_Lowo uthi usekukhanyeni, abe emthiyile umzalwana wakhe,  usebumnyameni unangoku.
62_2_10_Lowo umthandayo umzalwana wakhe uhleli ekukhanyeni,  akanasikhubekiso.
62_2_11_Ke lowo umthiyileyo umzalwana wakhe usebumnyameni, uhamba ebumnyameni. Akazi apho aya khona, ngokuba ubumnyama buwamfamekisile amehlo akhe.
62_2_12_Ndiyanibhalela, bantwanana, ngokuba nizixolelwe izono zenu ngenxa yegama lakhe.
62_2_13_Ndiyanibhalela, boyise, ngokuba nimazile owasekuqalekeni.  Ndiyanibhalela, madodana, ngokuba nimeyisile ongendawo.  Ndiyanibhalela, bantwana, ngokuba nimazile uYise.
62_2_14_Ndanibhalela, boyise, ngokuba nimazile owasekuqalekeni.  Ndanibhalela, madodana, ngokuba nomelele, laye ilizwi likaThixo lihleli kuni, nimoyisile ke ongendawo.
62_2_15_Musani ukulithanda ihlabathi, kwanezinto ezisehlabathini.  Ukuba kukho othi alithande ihlabathi, uthando lukaYise alukho kuye.
62_2_16_Ngokuba konke okusehlabathini, inkanuko yenyama, nenkanuko yamehlo, noqhankqalazo lobu bomi, asikokuphuma kuye uYise,  kokuphuma ehlabathini.
62_2_17_Ihlabathi ke liyadlula, nenkanuko yalo; ke yena owenza ukuthanda kukaThixo uhleli ngonaphakade.
62_2_18_Bantwana, lilixa lokugqibela eli; njengoko nevayo ukuba umchasi-Kristu uyeza, nangoku kuthe kwabakho abachasi-Kristu abaninzi, ekuthe ngoko sazi ukuba lilixa lokugqibela.
62_2_19_Baphuma kuthi, babengengabo abethu; kuba, ukuba babengabethu, ngebahlalayo nathi. Baphuma ukuze babonakale,  ukuba bonke babengengabo abethu.
62_2_20_Nina ninentambiso evela koyiNgcwele, niyazazi ke izinto zonke.
62_2_21_Andinibhalelanga ngakuba ningayazi inyaniso; ndinibhalele ngokuba niyazi, nangokuba kungekho buxoki buphuma enyanisweni.
62_2_22_Ngubani na ixoki, ingenguye okhanyelayo ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu? Lowo ungumchasi-Kristu, omkhanyelayo uYise noNyana.
62_2_23_Bonke abamkhanyelayo uNyana, abanaye noYise.
62_2_24_Nina ngoko, oko nakuvayo kwasekuqalekeni makuhlale kuni.  Ukuba kuthi kuhlale kuni oko nakuvayo kwasekuqalekeni, nani niya kuhlala kuye uNyana, nakuye uYise.
62_2_25_Lilo eli idinga, awalibekayo ngokwakhe kuthi, ubomi obungunaphakade.
62_2_26_Ezo zinto ndinibhalele ngabo banilahlekisayo.
62_2_27_Nina intambiso enayamkelayo kuye ihleli kuni, aniswele kwakuba nifundiswe ngubani; kunjengokuba kwaloo ntambiso inifundisa ngeento zonke, iyinene, ingebuxoki; njengokuba ke yanifundisayo, hlalani kuye.
62_2_28_Ngoku ke, bantwanana, hlalani kuye, ukuze xa athe wabonakalaliswa, sibe nokungafihlisi singadani, simbaleke ekufikeni kwakhe.
62_2_29_Ukuba niyazi ukuba ulilungisa, yazini ukuba bonke abenza ubulungisa bazelwe nguye.
62_3_1_Bonani uthando olungaka asenzele lona uYise, olu lokuba sibizwe ngokuba singabantwana bakaThixo. Ngenxa yoko ihlabathi alisazi thina, ngokuba lingamazanga yena.
62_3_2_Zintanda, ngoku singabantwana bakaThixo. Akukabonakali ke into esiya kuba yiyo; ke siyazi ukuba, xa athe wabonakala,  sofana naye; ngokuba siya kumbona njengoko anjalo.
62_3_3_Bonke abanalo eli themba kuye, bazenza nyulu, njengokuba yena enyulu.
62_3_4_Bonke abasenzayo isono benza okuchasene nomthetho; sona isono sikukuchasana nomthetho.
62_3_5_Niyazi ke ukuba yena wabonakaliswa, ukuze azithwale azisuse izono zethu; kananjalo akukho sono kuye.
62_3_6_Bonke abahlala kuye aboni; bonke abonayo abambonanga,  abamazanga nokumazi.
62_3_7_Bantwanana, makungabikho namnye unikhohlisayo; lowo ubenzayo ubulungisa lilungisa, njengokuba yena elilungisa.
62_3_8_Lowo usenzayo isono ungokaMtyholi; ngokuba uMtyholi wone kwasekuqalekeni. Wabonakaliselwa oku uNyana kaThixo, ukuze ayichithe imisebenzi kaMtyholi.
62_3_9_Bonke abazelwe nguThixo abenzi sono, ngokuba imbewu yakhe ihleli kubo; kananjalo abanakona, ngokuba bezelwe nguThixo.
62_3_10_Babonakala ngaloo nto abantwana bakaThixo, nabantwana bakaMtyholi. Bonke abangenzi bulungisa abangabakaThixo, nalowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe.
62_3_11_Ngokuba le yintshumayelo enayivayo kwasekuqalekeni, ukuba sithandane;
62_3_12_singabi njengoKayin, obengowongendawo, wambulala umninawa wakhe. Wambulalelani na? Ngokuba imisebenzi yakhe ibingendawo,  ke yona eyomninawa wakhe ibinobulungisa.
62_3_13_Musani ukumangaliswa, bazalwana bam, ukuba ihlabathi linithiyile.
62_3_14_Thina siyazi ukuba sidlule ekufeni, sangena ebomini,  ngokuba sibathanda abazalwana. Lowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana uhleli ekufeni.
62_3_15_Lowo umthiyileyo umzalwana wakhe usisibulala-mntu; niyazi ukuba akukho sibulala-mntu sinobomi bungunaphakade buhleliyo kuso.
62_3_16_Ngale nto silwazile uthando, kuba yena wasincamela ubomi bakhe; nathi ke sifanele ukubancamela abazalwana ubomi bethu.
62_3_17_Osukuba ke enayo impilo yeli hlabathi, aze ambone umzalwana wakhe eswele, azivalele iimfesane zakhe kuye, luthini na ukuhlala uthando lukaThixo ngaphakathi kwakhe?
62_3_18_Bantwanana bam, masingathandi ngazwi nangamlomo; masithande ngezenzo nangenyaniso.
62_3_19_Siyazi ngale nto ke ukuba singabenyaniso; siya kuzileleza iintliziyo zethu phambi kwakhe.
62_3_20_Ngokuba ukuba intliziyo yethu iyasigweba, uThixo mkhulu kunentliziyo yethu, ezazi izinto zonke.
62_3_21_Zintanda, ukuba intliziyo yethu ayisigwebi,  sinokungafihlisi kuye uThixo;
62_3_22_nesithi sikucele siyakwamkela kuye, ngokuba imithetho yakhe siyigcina, sizenze izinto ezikholekileyo emehlweni akhe.
62_3_23_Nguwo lo umthetho wakhe, ukuba sikholwe ligama lonyana wakhe, uYesu Kristu, sithandane njengoko wasiwiselayo umthetho.
62_3_24_Lowo uyigcinayo imithetho yakhe uhleli kuye, naye uhleli kulowo. Sazi ngale nto ke, ukuba uhleli kuthi ngoMoya lo wasinikayo.
62_4_1_Zintanda, musani ukukholwa ngoomoya bonke, bacikideni oomoya ukuba ngabakaThixo na; ngokuba baninzi abaprofeti ababuxoki,  abaphume bangena ehlabathini.
62_4_2_Mazini ngale nto uMoya kaThixo: umoya wonke omvumayo uYesu Kristu eze esenyameni, ungokaThixo;
62_4_3_nomoya wonke ongamvumiyo uYesu Kristu eze esenyameni,  asingokaThixo; lo ngokamchasi-Kristu, lowo niwuvileyo ukuba uyeza; nangoku uselukho ehlabathini.
62_4_4_Nina ningabakaThixo, bantwanana, nibeyisile bona; ngokuba lowo ukuni nguyena mkhulu kunalowo usehlabathini.
62_4_5_Bona ngabehlabathi; ngenxa yoko bathetha okwehlabathi,  ihlabathi liyabeva ke.
62_4_6_Thina singabakaThixo, lowo umaziyo uThixo uyasiva thina;  ongengokaThixo akasiva. Siwazi ngaloo nto umoya wayo inyaniso,  nomoya walo ulahlekiso.
62_4_7_Zintanda, masithandane; ngokuba uthando lwaphuma kuThixo.  Bonke abanothando bazelwe nguThixo, bayamazi uThixo.
62_4_8_Lowo ungenaluthando akazanga amazi uThixo, ngokuba uThixo uluthando.
62_4_9_Kwabonakaliswa ngale nto ukusithanda kukaThixo, ngokuthi uThixo amthume ehlabathini uNyana wakhe, ekuphela kwamzeleyo,  ukuze sidle ubomi naye.
62_4_10_Uthando lulapha, ingekukuba samthandayo uThixo thina,  ikukuba wasithandayo yena, wamthuma uNyana wakhe ukuba abe sisicamagushelo sezono zethu.
62_4_11_Zintanda, ukuba wenjenjalo uThixo ukusithanda, nathi sifanele ukuthandana.
62_4_12_Akukho namnye owakha wambona uThixo; ukuba sithi sithandane, uThixo uhleli kuthi, nothando lwakhe lugqibelele ngaphakathi kwethu.
62_4_13_Sazi ngale nto ukuba sihleli kuye, naye uhleli kuthi;  ngokuba usinike okoMoya wakhe.
62_4_14_Sibonile thina, siyangqina, ukuba uYise umthumile uNyana ukuba nguMsindisi wehlabathi.
62_4_15_Othe wavuma ukuba uYesu unguye uNyana kaThixo, uThixo uhleli kuye, naye uhleli kuye uThixo.
62_4_16_Sikwazile thina, sakholwa kukusithanda kukaThixo. UThixo uluthando; lowo uhleli eluthandweni uhleli kuye uThixo, noThixo uhleli kuye.
62_4_17_Lugqibelele ngale nto uthando olukuthi, ukuze sibe nokungafihlisi ngomhla womgwebo; ngokuba, njengoko anjalo yena,  sinjalo nathi kweli hlabathi.
62_4_18_Akukho loyiko eluthandweni; lusuka uthando olugqibeleleyo luluphose phandle uloyiko; ngokuba uloyiko lunexhala; lowo ke woyikayo akagqibelele eluthandweni.
62_4_19_Thina siyamthanda, ngokuba yena wasithanda kuqala.
62_4_20_Ukuba umntu uthe, Ndiyamthanda uThixo, wamthiya umzalwana wakhe, ulixoki; kuba lowo ungamthandiyo umzalwana wakhe ambonileyo, angathini na ukumthanda uThixo angambonanga?
62_4_21_Nguwo lo umthetho esinawo uvela kuye: ukuba athi lowo umthandayo uThixo, amthande nomzalwana wakhe.
62_5_1_Bonke abakholwayo ukuba uYesu unguye uKristu, bazelwe nguThixo; bonke abamthandayo lowo wazalayo, bayamthanda nalowo uzelweyo nguye.
62_5_2_Sazi ngale nto ukuba siyabathanda abantwana bakaThixo, xa sukuba simthanda uThixo, siyigcina imithetho yakhe.
62_5_3_Kuba ukumthanda uThixo kuko ukuthi, siyigcine imithetho yakhe; ayinzima ke imithetho yakhe.
62_5_4_Ngokuba konke okuzelweyo nguThixo kuyaleyisa ihlabathi; lulo ke olu uloyiso oluleyisayo ihlabathi, ukholo lwethu.
62_5_5_Ngubani na lowo uleyisayo ihlabathi, ingenguye okholwayo ukuba uYesu unguye uNyana kaThixo?
62_5_6_Lowo ngulo wezayo ngamanzi negazi, uYesu Kristu; engenawo amanzi odwa, enawo amanzi, enalo igazi. UMoya ke ungulo ungqinayo, ngokuba uMoya uyiyo inyaniso.
62_5_7_Ngokuba bathathu abo bangqinayo emazulwini: uYise, noLizwi,  noMoya oyiNgcwele; abo bathathu banye.
62_5_8_Bathathu abo bangqinayo emhlabeni : uMoya, namanzi, negazi;  aba bathathu basingise ntweni-nye.
62_5_9_Ukuba ubungqina babantu siyabamkela, ubungqina bukaThixo bungaphezulu; ngokuba bubo obu ubungqina bukaThixo, angqinele uNyana wakhe ngabo.
62_5_10_Lowo ukholwayo kuye uNyana kaThixo unabo ubungqina ngaphakathi kwakhe; lowo ungakholwayo nguye uThixo umenze ixoki, ngokuba engakholwanga bubo ubungqina abungqinele uNyana wakhe uThixo.
62_5_11_Bubo obu ke ubungqina: ukuba uThixo usinike ubomi obungunaphakade; baye obo bomi bukuye uNyana wakhe.
62_5_12_Lowo unaye uNyana, unabo ubomi; lowo ungenaye uNyana kaThixo, akanabo ubomi.
62_5_13_Ndinibhalele ezi zinto, nina nikholwayo kwigama loNyana kaThixo, ukuze nazi ukuba ninobomi obungunaphakade, nokuze nikholwe kwigama loNyana kaThixo.
62_5_14_Kuko oku ukungafihlisi esinako kuye: ukuba sithi sicele into ngokokuthanda kwakhe, uyasiva.
62_5_15_Ukuba siyazi okokuba uyasiva esisukuba sikucela, siyazi ukuba sinazo izinto ezicelwayo, esizicelileyo kuye.
62_5_16_Ukuba umntu uthe wambona umzalwana wakhe esona isono esingasingisi kufeni, wocela, uThixo amnike ubomi, enika abo bonayo ngokungasingisi kufeni. Kukho sona sisingisa ekufeni;  anditsho ukuthi makacelele sona.
62_5_17_Konke ukungalungisi sisono; kukho sono singasingisi khona ekufeni.
62_5_18_Siyazi ukuba bonke abazelwe nguThixo aboni; usuke athi lowo wazalwayo nguThixo azigcine, aze ongendawo angamchukumisi.
62_5_19_Siyazi ukuba singabakaThixo, nokuba ihlabathi liphela lilele kongendawo.
62_5_20_Ke siyazi ukuba uNyana kaThixo ufikile, wasinika ingqondo,  ukuze simazi oyinyaniso. Sikuye ke oyinyaniso, kuye uNyana wakhe uYesu Kristu. Nguye lo uThixo oyinyaniso, nobomi obungunaphakade.
62_5_21_Bantwanana, zigcineni kuzo izithixo. Amen.
63_1_1_Indoda enkulu ibhalela inkosikazi enyuliweyo nabantwana bayo, endibathandayo mna ngenyaniso; ingendim ndedwa, ingabo bonke abayazileyo inyaniso;
63_1_2_ngenxa yenyaniso ehleliyo kuthi, eya kuba nathi ngonaphakade:
63_1_3_ithi, Makubekho kuni ubabalo, nenceba, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uYise, nakwiNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, uNyana kaYise,  kuni basenyanisweni naseluthandweni.
63_1_4_Ndavuya kunene kuba ndifumene kubantwana bakho kukho abahamba enyanisweni, njengoko samkelayo umthetho kuye uYise.
63_1_5_Nangoku ndiyakucela, nkosikazi, kungengakuba ndikubhalela umthetho omtsha; ndikubhalela lowo sasinawo kwasekuqalekeni:  ukuba sithandane.
63_1_6_Lulo ke olu uthando, ukuba sihambe ngokwemithetho yakhe.  Nguwo lo umthetho, njengokuba nevayo kwasekuqalekeni, ukuba nihambe kuwo.
63_1_7_Ngokuba kungene abalahlekisi abaninzi ehlabathini,  abangamvumiyo uYesu Kristu esiza esenyameni. Lowo ngumkhohlisi nomchasi-Kristu.
63_1_8_Zilumkeleni, ukuba singalahlekani nezinto esizisebenzileyo;  masamkele umvuzo ozalisekileyo.
63_1_9_Bonke abagqithayo, abangahlaliyo emfundisweni kaKristu,  abanaThixo; ohleliyo emfundisweni kaKristu, lowo unaye uYise noNyana.
63_1_10_Ukuba umntu uza kuni, engazisi yona le mfundiso, musani ukumamkela endlwini yenu, ningambulisi nokumbulisa;
