63_1_11_kuba lowo umbulisayo unobudlelane naye ngemisebenzi yakhe engendawo.
63_1_12_Ndinezinto ezininzi nje zokunibhalela, andingi ndingazibhala ngaphepha nangainki; ndithembe ukuza kuni,  sithethe ngomlomo, ukuze uvuyo lwethu luzaliseke.
63_1_13_Bayakubulisa abantwana bodade wenu onyuliweyo. Amen.
64_1_1_Indoda enkulu ibhalela uGayo oyintanda, endimthandayo mna ngenyaniso: ithi,
64_1_2_Ntanda, ndinga ungathi ngezinto zonke usikeleleke uphile,  njengokuba usikelelekile umphefumlo wakho.
64_1_3_Kuba ndavuya kunene, bakufika abazalwana, bangqina ngenyaniso ekuwe, njengokuba wena uhamba enyanisweni.
64_1_4_Andinaluvuyo lungaphezu kolu, lokuba ndive ukuba abantwana bam bahamba enyanisweni.
64_1_5_Ntanda, wenza okuthembekileyo, oko sukuba ukwenzela abazalwana nabasemzini,
64_1_6_abalungqineleyo uthando lwakho phambi kwebandla; owothi ukuba ubaxhobisele indlela ngokufanele uThixo, ube uyatyapha;
64_1_7_kuba baphuma ngenxa yegama lakhe, bengathabathanga nto kuzo iintlanga.
64_1_8_Thina ngoko sifanele ukubaxhasa abanjalo, ukuze sibe ngabasebenzisana nabo kuyo inyaniso.
64_1_9_Ndalibhalela ibandla; ke usuke lowo uthanda ukuzenza mkhulu kubo, uDiyotrefe, angasamkeli.
64_1_10_Ngenxa yoko, ukuba ndithe ndafika, ndomkhumbuza imisebenzi yakhe ayenzayo, ephololoza ngathi ngamazwi angendawo; enganeli koko, usuka angabamkeli abazalwana ngokwakhe, abalele abanga bangenjenjalo, abakhuphe ebandleni.
64_1_11_Ntanda, musa ukulandela okubi, landela okulungileyo. Lowo wenza okulungileyo ungokaThixo; ke lowo wenza okubi akambonanga uThixo.
64_1_12_UDemetriyo ungqinelwe ngabo bonke, nayiyo inyaniso; nathi ke siyangqina; niyazi ukuba ubungqina bethu buyinene.
64_1_13_Ndandinezinto ezininzi endingazibhalayo, kodwa andithandanga kuzibhala ngainki nangalusiba;
64_1_14_ndiyathemba ke ukuba ndokubona kwakufuphi nje, sithethe ngomlomo. Uxolo malube kuwe. Ziyakubulisa izihlobo. Zibulise izihlobo ngegama. Amen.
65_1_1_UYuda, umkhonzi kaYesu Kristu, umzalwana ke kaYakobi,  ubhalela abangcwalisiweyo bekuThixo uYise, begcinelwe uYesu Kristu, bengababiziweyo:
65_1_2_uthi, Makwandiswe kuni inceba noxolo nothando.
65_1_3_Zintanda, ndikukhuthalele ngenyameko yonke nje ukunibhalela ngalo usindiso esidlelana ngalo, kwafuneka ukuba ndinibhalele,  ndinivuselele, ukuba niluzamele ukholo abalunikelwayo kwakanye abangcwele.
65_1_4_Kuba kuthwethwe bantu bathile; abo babebalulelwe ngenxa engaphambili kolo lugwebo, abangahloneli Thixo, belujikela eburheletyweni ubabalo lukaThixo wethu, bemkhanyela okuphela koMnini-nto-zonke, uThixo wethu, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
65_1_5_Ndinga ke ndinganikhumbuza, nangona nikwazi oku kakade,  ukuba iNkosi, yakuba ibasindisile abantu emhlabeni waseYiputa,  yathi ngokwesibini yabatshabalalisa abo bangakholwanga.
65_1_6_Kananjalo izithunywa zezulu, ezo zazingalugcinanga ulawulo lwazo, zesuka zalishiya ikhaya lazo, izigcinele umgwebo womhla omkhulu ngemixokelelwane engunaphakade, phantsi kwesithokothoko.
65_1_7_Njengokuba iSodom neGomora, nayo imizi engakuyo, yenza kakhulu umbulo ngohlobo olufana nolwazo ezo, imka ilandela nyama yimbi, ibekwe ekuhleni ukuba ibe ngumqondiso, iviswa ubetho lomlilo ongunaphakade.
65_1_8_Kwangokunjalo nabo aba baphuphayo badyobha inyama,  batshitshise ubukhosi, banyelise izikhakhamela.
65_1_9_Kanti yena uMikayeli, isiphatha-zithunywa zezulu, oko wayebambene naye uMtyholi, bebangisana ngawo umzimba kaMoses,  akabanga nabuganga bakumzisela mgwebo wakunyelisa; wesuka wathi, INkosi mayikukhalimele.
65_1_10_Ke bona aba okunene izinto zonke abangazaziyo bayazinyelisa; kodwa izinto zonke abazaziyo kakuhle ngemvelo,  njengezinto eziphilileyo ezingenangqondo, bayazonakalisa ngazo ezo.
65_1_11_Yeha ke bona! Ngokuba bahamba ngendlela kaKayin;  bakhukuliswa lulahlekiso lukaBhileham ngenxa yomvuzo;  batshabalala ephikeni likaKora.
65_1_12_Aba zizixhobo zamatye aselwandle ezidlweni zenu zothando,  bezingxala ukudla nani, bezidlisa okwabo ngokungenakoyika.  Bangamafu angenamanzi, aqhutywaqhutywa yimimoya; bayimithi evuthulukileyo, engenaziqhamo, efe kabini, enyothulwe iingcambu;
65_1_13_bangamaza alwayo olwandle, elephuza awawo amahlazo;  baziinkwenkwezi eziphalaphalayo, begcinelwe isithokothoko sobumnyama ngonaphakade.
65_1_14_Waprofeta ke nangabo uEnoki, owesixhenxe ukususela kuAdam,  esithi, Yabonani, yeza iNkosi namawakawaka abangcwele bayo,
65_1_15_ukuba ibagwebe bonke, ibohlwaye bonke abangahloneli Thixo kubo, ngenxa yemisebenzi yabo yonke yokungahloneli Thixo,  abayenze bengahloneli Thixo, nangenxa yazo zonke izinto ezilukhuni, ababezithethile ngayo aboni abangahloneli Thixo.
65_1_16_Aba ngabakrokri abasolayo, behamba ngokweenkanuko zabo,  umlomo wabo uthetha iindumbisa zamazwi, bencoma ubuso bomntu ngenxa yenzuzo.
65_1_17_Ke nina, zintanda, wakhumbuleni amazwi abethethwe ngenxa engaphambili ngabo abapostile beNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.
65_1_18_Ngokuba babesithi kuni, Kuya kubakho abagxeki ngexesha lokugqibela, behamba ngokwezabo iinkanuko zokungahloneli Thixo.
65_1_19_Aba ngabazahlukanisayo, bengabemvelo, uMoya bengenaye.
65_1_20_Ke nina, zintanda, zakheni elukholweni lwenu olungcwele kanye, nithandaza nikuMoya oyiNgcwele.
65_1_21_Hlalani nihleli eluthandweni lukaThixo, niyilinde inceba yeNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kuse ebomini obungunaphakade.
65_1_22_Inxenye okunene yenzeleni inceba, nicalula;
65_1_23_kodwa inxenye yisindiseni nizoyikela, nibaphanga emlilweni,  niyithiya nengubo edyojiweyo yinyama.
65_1_24_Kulowo ke unako ukunilondoloza ningabi nakukhubeka,  nokunimisa phambi kobuqaqawuli bakhe ningenabala, nigcoba:
65_1_25_kuThixo olumkileyo yedwa, uMsindisi wethu, makubekho uzuko nobukhulu, amandla negunya, nangoku, kude kuse nasemaphakadeni onke. Amen.
66_1_1_Isityhilelo sikaYesu Kristu, awamnika sona uThixo, ukuba ababonise abakhonzi bakhe izinto ezimele ukubakho kamsinya;  waqondisa wathumela ngaso isithunywa sakhe sasemazulwini kumkhonzi wakhe uYohane,
66_1_2_owalingqinelayo ilizwi likaThixo nobungqina bukaYesu Kristu,  kwaneento zonke awazibonayo.
66_1_3_Unoyolo lowo uwalesayo, kwanabo bawevayo amazwi aso isiprofeto esi, bazigcine izinto ezibhaliweyo kuso; kuba ixesha likufuphi.
66_1_4_UYohane ubhalela amabandla asixhenxe akwelaseAsiya; uthi,  Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kulowo ukhoyo, wayekho,  uzayo; nakubo ooMoya abasixhenxe abaphambi kwetrone yakhe;
66_1_5_nakuYesu Kristu, oliNgqina elithembekileyo, Owamazibulo kubo abafileyo, uMphathi wookumkani bomhlaba. Kulowo wasithandayo,  wasikhulula ezonweni zethu ngelilelakhe igazi,
66_1_6_wasenza ookumkani nababingeleli kuye uThixo uYise: kuye makubekho uzuko namandla, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.  Amen.
66_1_7_Yabonani, uza namafu; aye eya kumbona amehlo onke, kwanabo bamhlabayo; zaye ziya kummbambazelela zonke izizwe zomhlaba.  Ewe, amen.
66_1_8_Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo; itsho iNkosi,  leyo ikhoyo, yayikho, izayo, uSomandla.
66_1_9_Mna Yohane, endikwangumzalwana wenu, nedlelane nani ngayo imbandezelo, nangabo ubukumkani, nangonyamezelo lukaYesu Kristu, ndaye ndisesiqithini ekuthiwa yiPatmos, ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo, nangenxa yobungqina bukaYesu Kristu.
66_1_10_Ndaye ndikuMoya ngemini eyeyeNkosi; ndeva emva kwam izwi elikhulu, ngathi lelexilongo,
66_1_11_lisithi, Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, owokuqala nowokugqibela.  Okubonayo kubhale encwadini ukuthumele kuwo amabandla asixhenxe aseAsiya: e-Efese, eSmirna, ePergamo, eTiyatira, eSardesi,  eFiladelfi, eLawodike.
66_1_12_Ndaza ndee guququ, ukuba ndilibone ilizwi elo belithetha nam. Ndithe guququ ke, ndabona iziphatho zezibane zegolide zisixhenxe;
66_1_13_naphakathi kweziphatho zosixhenxe ezo, ofana noNyana woMntu, ambethe ingubo efike ezinyaweni, ebhinqe emabeleni umbhinqo wegolide.
66_1_14_Intloko yakhe ke neenwele zimhlophe, njengoboya bezimvu obumhlophe njengekhephu; amehlo akhe enjengelangatye lomlilo;
66_1_15_iinyawo zakhe zifana nobhedu olubengezelayo, zingathi zivuthiswe eziko; izwi lakhe ngathi sisandi samanzi amaninzi.
66_1_16_Waye eneenkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe esandleni sakhe sokunene;  emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma ikrele elibukhali, elintlangothi mbini;  ubuso bakhe bunjengelanga, likhanya ngamandla alo.
66_1_17_Ndithe ndakumbona, ndasuka ndawa ezinyaweni zakhe, ndaba njengofileyo. Waza wabeka isandla sakhe sokunene phezu kwam,  esithi kum, Musa ukoyika; mna ndingowokuqala nowokugqibela,  ndinguye odla ubomi;
66_1_18_ndaye ndifile; yabona, ndingobudlayo ubomi kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni. Amen. Ndinazo nezitshixo zelabafileyo nezokufa.
66_1_19_Zibhale izinto ozibonileyo, nezikhoyo, kwaneziya kubakho emva kwezo.
66_1_20_Imfihlakalo yeenkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe ozibonileyo esandleni sam sokunene, neziphatho zezibane zosixhenxe zegolide, yile:  Iinkwenkwezi ezo zisixhenxe zizithunywa zawo amabandla asixhenxe; neziphatho ezo zisixhenxe uzibonileyo ngamabandla osixhenxe.
66_2_1_Isithunywa sebandla elise-Efese, sibhalele uthi: Utsho lowo uzibambileyo iinkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe ngesokunene sakhe, lowo uhambayo phakathi kweziphatho zezibane zosixhenxe zegolide,  ukuthi:
66_2_2_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, nokubulaleka kwakho, nomonde wakho, nokuba ungenako ukubathwala abanobubi; nokuba wabalinga abathi bangabapostile, bengengabo, wabafumana bengamaxoki.
66_2_3_Uthwele, unomonde; uthe ngenxa yegama lam wabulaleka,  akwadinwa.
66_2_4_Noko ke ndinale nto ngakuwe, yokuba uthando lwakho lokuqala walushiyayo.
66_2_5_Khumbula ngoko apho uwe usuka khona, uguquke, wenze imisebenzi yokuqala; okanye ndoza kuwe kamsinya, ndisishenxise isiphatho sesibane sakho endaweni yaso, ukuba akuthanga uguquke.
66_2_6_Kodwa unale ndawo, yokuba uyithiyile imisebenzi yamaNikolawo, endiyithiyileyo nam.
66_2_7_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika ukuthi adle kumthi wobomi, ophakathi kweParadisi kaThixo.
66_2_8_Isithunywa sebandla eliseSmirna, sibhalele uthi: Utsho lowo ungowokuqala, ungowokugqibela, owayefile, waza wabuya wadla ubomi, ukuthi:
66_2_9_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, nembandezelo, nobuhlwempu (noko usisityebi), nonyeliso lwabo bathi bangamaYuda bona,  bengengawo, besisikhungu sikaSathana.
66_2_10_Musa ukoyika nabunye ubunzima oza kubuva. Yabona, uMtyholi uza kuyiphosa inxenye yenu entolongweni, ukuze nilingwe: niya kuba nembandezelo imihla elishumi; thembeka kude kube sekufeni,  ndokunika isithsaba sobomi.
66_2_11_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo akayi kukha oniwe kukufa kwesibini.
66_2_12_Isithunywa sebandla elisePergamo, sibhalele uthi: Utsho lowo unalo ikrele elintlangothi mbini, elibukhali, ukuthi:
66_2_13_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, nalapho uhleli khona, apho ikhona itrone kaSathana; nokuba ulibambe waliqinisa igama lam,  akwakukhanyela ukukholwa kum, nasemihleni uAntipasi,  owabulawelwa kuni, apho ahleli khona uSathana, wayelingqina lam elithembekileyo.
66_2_14_Noko ke ndineendawana ngakuwe: ezi zokuba unabo apho abayibambe bayiqinisa imfundiso kaBhileham, owamfundisayo uBhalaki ukuphosa isikhubekiso phambi koonyana bakaSirayeli,  ukuba badle izinto ezibingelelwe izithixo, benze nombulo.
66_2_15_Ngokunjalo nawe unabayibambe bayiqinisa imfundiso yamaNikolawo, into leyo endiyithiyileyo.
66_2_16_Guquka, okanye ndoza kuwe kamsinya, ndenze imfazwe nabo ngalo ikrele lomlomo wam.
66_2_17_Lowo unendlebe makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla. Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumnika ukuba adle kuyo imana efihlakeleyo, ndimnike ilitye elimhlophe; elityeni apho ke igama elitsha libhaliwe, lingaziwa bani ingenguye olamkelayo.
66_2_18_Isithunywa sebandla eliseTiyatira, sibhalele uthi: Utsho uNyana kaThixo, omehlo akhe anjengelangatye lomlilo, onyawo zakhe zifana nobhedu olubengezelayo, ukuthi:
66_2_19_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, nothando, nolungiselelo,  nokholo, nomonde wakho, nokuba imisebenzi yakho yokugqibela imininzi kuneyokuqala.
66_2_20_Noko ke ndineendawana ngakuwe: ezi zokuba umvumela umfazi lowo uIzebhele, othi yena ungumprofetikazi, ukuba abafundise abalahlekise abakhonzi bam, ukuba benze umbulo, badle izinto ezibingelelwe izithixo.
66_2_21_Ndamnika ixesha lokuba aguquke kuwo umbulo wakhe,  akaguquka.
66_2_22_Yabona, mna ndiya kumphosa elukhukweni, nabo bakrexeza kunye naye, embandezelweni enkulu, ukuba abathanga baguquke emisebenzini yabo;
66_2_23_nabantwana bakhe ndibabulale ngokufa; azi onke amabandla ukuba mna ndingulowo uphengulula izintso neentliziyo, ndininike elowo ngokwemisebenzi yenu.
66_2_24_Ndithi ke kuni, nakwabanye abaseTiyatira, abo bonke bangenayo loo mfundiso, nabo abo bangazazanga iinzulu zikaSathana (njengoko batshovo): andiyi kuphosa phezu kwenu mthwalo wumbi.
66_2_25_Noko ke oko ninako kubambeni nikuqinise, ndide ndifike.
66_2_26_Lowo weyisayo, lowo uyigcinayo imisebenzi yam, ade ase ekupheleni, ndomnika igunya phezu kwazo iintlanga.
66_2_27_Uya kuzalusa ngentonga yentsimbi, njengokuba izitya zomdongwe zityunyuzwa, njengokuba nam ndamkele kuye uBawo;
66_2_28_ndiya kumnika ikhwezi lokusa.
66_2_29_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla.
66_3_1_Isithunywa sebandla eliseSardesi, sibhalele uthi: Utsho lowo unabo ooMoya abasixhenxe bakaThixo, nazo iinkwenkwezi ezisixhenxe, ukuthi: Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, ukuba unalo igama lokuba uphilile, ukanti ufile.
66_3_2_Phapha, uzizimase izinto eziseleyo eziza kufa; kuba andiyifumananga izalisekile imisebenzi yakho phambi koThixo.
66_3_3_Khumbula ngoko ukuba utheni na ukwamkela kwakho, nokuva,  ugcine, uguquke. Ukuba ngoko akuthanga ulinde, ndokufikela njengesela; akusayi kulazi ilixa endokufikela ngalo.
66_3_4_Unamagama ambalwa naseSardesi apho, angazidyobhanga wona iingubo zawo; baya kuhamba nam benezimhlophe; ngokuba befanelekile.
66_3_5_Lowo weyisayo uya kuthiwa wambu ngeengubo ezimhlophe.  Andisayi kulicima igama lakhe encwadini yobomi; ndiya kulivuma igama lakhe emehlweni kaBawo, naphambi kwezithunywa zakhe zasemazulwini.
66_3_6_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla.
66_3_7_Isithunywa sebandla eliseFiladelfi, sibhalele uthi: Utsho oyiNgcwele, oyiNyaniso, lowo unaso isitshixo sikaDavide; lowo uvulayo kungavali namnye, avale kungavuli namnye, ukuthi:
66_3_8_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho. Yabona, ndimise phambi kwakho ucango oluvulekileyo, akukho namnye unako ukuluvala; kuba uthe,  unamandla amancinane, waligcina ilizwi lam, akwalikhanyela igama lam.
66_3_9_Yabona, ndinika abesikhungu sikaSathana, abathi bangamaYuda bona, bengengawo, bexoka; yabona, ndiya kubenza beze baqubude phambi kweenyawo zakho, bazi ukuba mna ndikuthandile.
66_3_10_Ngokuba waligcina ilizwi lomonde wam, nam ndiya kukugcina,  ndikusindise kwilixa lokulingwa, eliza kuza phezu kwelimiweyo liphela, ukulinga abo bemiyo phezu kwehlabathi.
66_3_11_Yabona, ndiza kamsinya; kubambe ukuqinise onako, ukuze kungabikho namnye usithabathayo isithsaba sakho.
66_3_12_Lowo weyisayo ndiya kumenza intsika etempileni yoThixo wam.  Akayi kuba saphuma phandle; ndaye ndiya kulibhalela phezu kwakhe igama loThixo wam, negama lomzi woThixo wam, iYerusalem entsha, ehla emazulwini ivela kuThixo wam, negama lam elitsha.
66_3_13_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla.
66_3_14_Isithunywa sebandla eliseLawodike, sibhalele uthi: Utsho uAmen, ingqina elithembekileyo, eliyinyaniso, ingqalo yayo indalo kaThixo, ukuthi:
66_3_15_Ndiyayazi imisebenzi yakho, ukuba akubandi, akushushu;  akwaba ububanda, akwaba ubushushu.
66_3_16_Ngenxa enokuba ke udikidiki, ungabandi, ungeshushu, ndiza kukuhlanza uphume emlonyeni wam.
66_3_17_Ngokuba uthi, Ndisisityebi, ndizityebisile, andiswele nto;  ube ungazi ukuba uludwayinge, ulusizana, ulihlwempu, uyimfama,  uhamba ze;
66_3_18_ndiyakucebisa, ukuba uthenge kum igolide evuthiswe emlilweni, ukuze ube nobutyebi; neengubo ezimhlophe, ukuze wambeswe, lingabonakali ihlazo lobuze bakho; nentambiso yamehlo, uthambise amehlo akho, ukuze ubone.
66_3_19_Mna, bonke endibathandayo ndiyabohlwaya, ndibaqeqeshe;  zondelela ngoko uguquke.
66_3_20_Yabona, ndimi emnyango ndinkqonkqoza; ukuba uthe umntu waliva izwi lam, waluvula ucango, ndongena kuye, ndidle naye,  naye adle nam.
66_3_21_Lowo weyisayo, ndiya kumvumela ukuba ahlale nam etroneni yam, njengokuba nam ndeyisayo, ndaza ndahlala phantsi noBawo etroneni yakhe.
66_3_22_Lowo unendlebe, makayive into ayithethayo uMoya kuwo amabandla.
66_4_1_Emva koko ndabona, nango umnyango uvulekile emazulwini;  ilizwi lokuqala endalivayo lalinjengexilongo, lithetha nam,  lisithi, Nyukela apha, ndokubonisa iinto ezimele ukubakho emva kwezi.
66_4_2_Ndithe kwaoko ke ndaba kuMoya; nanko kumi itrone emazulwini,  phezu kwetrone kukho ohleliyo.
66_4_3_Waye lowo uhleliyo, ukubonakala kwakhe, efana nelitye leyaspisi nelesardiyo; waye umnyama wenze isangqa etroneni apho, ufana nelesmarado ukubonakala kwawo.
66_4_4_Kwaye kwenze isangqa etroneni apho iitrone ezimashumi mabini anane; phezu kweetrone ezo ndabona amadoda amakhulu amashumi mabini anamane, ehleli, ethiwe wambu ngeengubo ezimhlophe,  enezithsaba zegolide entloko.
66_4_5_Nasetroneni apho kuphuma imibane, neendudumo, nezandi;  kuvutha izibane zomlilo ezisixhenxe phambi kwetrone, ezingabo ooMoya abasixhenxe bakaThixo.
66_4_6_Phambi kwetrone kukho ulwandle lwegilasi, lufana nomkhenkce.  Esazulwini setrone apho, nasesangqeni setrone, kukho izinto eziphilileyo ezine, zizele ngamehlo ngaphambili nangasemva.
66_4_7_Eyokuqala into ephilileyo ifana nengonyama; eyesibini into ephilileyo ifana nethole; eyesithathu into ephilileyo inobuso obungathi bobomntu; eyesine into ephilileyo ifana nokhozi luphaphazela.
66_4_8_Zaye zone izinto eziphilileyo ezo, iyileyo naleyo,  zinamaphiko ngamathandathu ngeenxa zonke, nangaphakathi zizele ngamehlo; zingaphumli imini nobusuku, zisithi: Ingcwele,  ingcwele, ingcwele INkosi uThixo uSomandla, Leyo yayikho,  ikhoyo, izayo.
66_4_9_Xa zithi izinto eziphilileyo zibe zimnika uzuko nembeko nombulelo lowo uhleli etroneni, lowo udla ubomi kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni,
66_4_10_asuka awe amadoda amakhulu, amashumi mabini anamane, phambi kwalowo uhleli etroneni, aqubude kulowo udla ubomi kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni, aphose izithsaba zawo phambi kwetrone, esithi:
66_4_11_Ufanele, Nkosi, ukwamkela uzuko, nembeko, namandla; Ngokuba inguwe owadala zonke izinto, Nangenxa yokuthanda kwakho zikho,  zadalelwa oko.
66_5_1_Ndabona, esandleni sokunene salowo uhleli etroneni, incwadi ibhalwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle, itywinwe ngamatywina asixhenxe.
66_5_2_Ndabona isithunywa sezulu esomeleleyo, sivakalisa ngezwi elikhulu, sisithi, Ngubani na ofanele ukuyivula incwadi,  nokuwanqika amatywina ayo?
66_5_3_Akabakho namnye ezulwini, naphezu komhlaba, nangaphantsi komhlaba, unako ukuyivula incwadi, nokuyikhangela oku.
66_5_4_Ndandilila kakhulu mna, ngokuba kungafunyanwanga namnye ufanele ukuyivula nokuyilesa incwadi, nokuyikhangela oku.
66_5_5_Yathi enye indoda enkulu kum, Musa ukulila; yabona,  iNgonyama yesizwe sakwaYuda, iNgcambu kaDavide, ikweyisile ukuyivula incwadi, nokuwanqika amatywina ayo asixhenxe.
66_5_6_Ndabona, nantso, esazulwini setrone nesezinto eziphilileyo zone, nasesazulwini samadoda amakhulu, iMvana engathi ixheliwe,  imi ineempondo ezisixhenxe, namehlo asixhenxe angooMoya bosixhenxe bakaThixo, abathunyelwe emhlabeni wonke.
66_5_7_Yeza, yayithabatha incwadi esandleni sokunene salowo uhleli etroneni.
66_5_8_Yathi yakuyithabatha incwadi, izinto eziphilileyo zone,  namadoda amakhulu angamashumi mabini anamane, awa phambi kweMvana, iyileyo inohadi, nengqayi yegolide izele ziziqhumiso,  eziyiyo imithandazo yabangcwele.
66_5_9_Avuma ingoma entsha, esithi: Ufanele ukuyithabatha incwadi,  nokuwavula amatywina ayo; Ngokuba wena waxhelwa, wasithenga ukuba sibe ngabakaThixo ngalo igazi lakho, Siphuma kuzo zonke izizwe, neelwimi, nabantu, neentlanga;
66_5_10_Wasenza ookumkani nababingeleli kuye uThixo wethu; Sasiya kuba ngookumkani phezu komhlaba.
66_5_11_Ndabona, ndeva izwi lezithunywa zezulu ezininzi, zenze isangqa etroneni, nezinto eziphilileyo, nawo amadoda amakhulu:  laye inani lawo lizizigidi zezigidi;
66_5_12_besithi ngezwi elikhulu: Kuyifanele iMvana eyaxhelwayo ukwamkela amandla, Nobutyebi, nobulumko, nokomelela, nembeko,  nozuko, nokubongwa.
66_5_13_Kananjalo zonke izidalwa ezisezulwini, naphezu komhlaba,  naphantsi komhlaba, naphezu kolwandle, neento zonke ezikwezo zinto, ndaziva zisithi: Kulowo uhleli etroneni, nakuyo iMvana,  Makubekho ukubongwa, nembeko, nozuko, namandla, Kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.
66_5_14_Izinto eziphilileyo zone zathi, Amen. Aza amadoda amakhulu aqubuda.
66_6_1_Ndabona, xa iMvana yalivulayo elinye lamatywina, ndeva enye kuzo izinto eziphilileyo zone, isithi, ngathi kungesandi sokududuma, Yiza ubone.
66_6_2_Ndabona, nalo ihashe elimhlophe; lowo ke wayehleli phezu kwalo enesaphetha; wanikwa isithsaba, waphuma eseyisa, nokuze eyise.
66_6_3_Xa yalivulayo elesibini itywina, ndeva eyesibini into ephilileyo isithi, Yiza ubone.
66_6_4_Kwaphuma elinye ihashe, libomvu; lowo ke wayehleli phezu kwalo wanikwa igunya lokulususa uxolo emhlabeni, nokuze basikane, wanikwa ikrele elikhulu.
66_6_5_Xa yalivulayo elesithathu itywina, ndeva eyesithathu into ephilileyo isithi, Yiza ubone. Ndabona, nalo ihashe elimnyama;  lowo ke wayehleli phezu kwalo ubenesikali sokulinganisa esandleni sakhe.
66_6_6_Ndeva izwi esazulwini sezinto eziphilileyo zone, lisithi,  Ibhekile yengqolowa iya kudla idenariyo, neebhekile ezintathu zerhasi zidle idenariyo, ioli newayini uze ungayoni.
66_6_7_Xa yalivulayo elesine itywina, ndeva izwi lento ephilileyo yesine lisithi, Yiza ubone.
66_6_8_Ndabona, nalo ihashe eliluthuthu; lowo ke wayehleli phezu kwalo enguKufa igama lakhe, nelabafileyo lilandelelana naye.  Banikwa igunya lokubulala kwisahlulo sesine somhlaba ngekrele,  nangendlala, nangokufa, nangawo amarhamncwa omhlaba.
66_6_9_Xa yalivulayo elesihlanu itywina, ndayibona ngaphantsi kwesibingelelo imiphefumlo yabo babesikwe ngenxa yelizwi likaThixo, nangenxa yobungqina ababenabo.
66_6_10_Baye bedanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, besithi, Koda kube nini na, Mnini-nto-zonke oyingcwele, oyinyaniso, ungagwebi,  ungaliphindezeleli igazi lethu kubo abemiyo phezu komhlaba?
66_6_11_Banikwa bonke ngabanye iingubo ezinde ezimhlophe; kwathiwa kubo, basaya kuphumla ixesha elincinane, bade bazaliseke nabangabakhonzi nabo, nabazalwana babo, abaza kubulawa kwanjengabo.
66_6_12_Ndabona, xa yalivulayo elesithandathu itywina, nanko,  kubakho unyikimo lomhlaba olukhulu, lathi ilanga laba mnyama,  njengengubo erhwexayo yoboya; yathi inyanga yaba njengegazi;
66_6_13_zathi iinkwenkwezi zezulu zawela emhlabeni, njengokuba umkhiwane uvuthulula amakhiwane awo atshazileyo,  wakuzanyazanyiswa ngumoya omkhulu.
66_6_14_Lathi izulu lafingeka, njengencwadi esongiweyo; zathi iintaba zonke neziqithi zasuswa ezindaweni zazo.
66_6_15_Bathi ookumkani bomhlaba, namanene, nezityebi,  nabathetheli-waka, nabanamandla, namakhoboka onke,  nabakhululekileyo bonke, bazifihla emiqolombeni nasemaweni eentaba.
66_6_16_Bathi kwiintaba nakumawa, Siweleni, nisifihle ebusweni balowo uhleli phezu kwetrone, nasengqumbeni yeMvana;
66_6_17_ngokuba ufikile umhla omkhulu wengqumbo yayo; ngubani na ke onako ukuma?
66_7_1_Emva koko ndabona izithunywa zezulu zizine, zimi ezimbombeni zone zomhlaba, zibambe imimoya yomine yomhlaba, ukuze kungavuthuzi moya phezu komhlaba, naphezu kolwandle, naphezu kwemithi yonke.
66_7_2_Ndabona esinye isithunywa sezulu, sinyuka sivela empumalanga, sinetywina likaThixo ophilileyo. Sadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu: kuzo izithunywa zezulu zozine, ezanikwa igunya lokuwonakalisa umhlaba nolwandle,
66_7_3_sisithi, Musani ukuwona umhlaba, nolwandle, nemithi, side sibatywine abakhonzi boThixo wethu emabunzini abo.
66_7_4_Ndaliva inani labo babetywiniwe: kwatywinwa ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, kuzo zonke izizwe zoonyana bakaSirayeli.
66_7_5_Esizweni sakwaYuda kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaRubhen kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaGadi kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.
66_7_6_Esizweni sakwa-Ashere kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaNafetali kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaManase kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.
66_7_7_Esizweni sakwaSimon kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaLevi kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.  Esizweni sakwaIsakare kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.
66_7_8_Esizweni sakwaZebhulon kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka. Esizweni sakwaYosefu kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka. Esizweni sakwaBhenjamin kwatywinwa ishumi elinambini lamawaka.
66_7_9_Emva koko ndabona, naso isihlwele esikhulu, ebekungekho namnye unako ukusibala, siphuma kuzo zonke iintlanga, nezizwe,  nabantu, neelwimi, simi phambi kwetrone naphambi kweMvana,  bethiwe wambu ngeengubo ezinde ezimhlophe, benamasundu ezandleni zabo,
66_7_10_bedanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, besithi: Usindiso kuye uThixo wethu, Lowo uhleli phezu kwetrone, Nakuyo iMvana!
66_7_11_Zaye zonke izithunywa zezulu zimi, zenze isangqa etroneni,  nakuwo amadoda amakhulu, nakuzo izinto eziphilileyo zone, zawa phambi kwetrone ngobuso bazo, zaqubuda kuye uThixo,
66_7_12_zisithi: Amen, Ukubongwa, nozuko, nobulumko, Nombulelo,  nembeko, namandla, nokomelela, Makube kuye uThixo wethu, Kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni! Amen.
66_7_13_Yaphendula enye indoda enkulu, isithi kum, Aba bathiwe wambu ngeengubo ezinde ezimhlophe bangoobani na? bevela phi na?
66_7_14_Ndithi kuyo, Nkosi, nguwe owaziyo. Yathi kum, Aba ngabaphumayo embandezelweni enkulu, bazihlamba iingubo zabo ezinde, bazenza mhlophe egazini leMvana.
66_7_15_Ngenxa yoko baphambi kwetrone kaThixo, bemkhonza imini nobusuku etempileni yakhe; nalowo uhleli phezu kwetrone uya kuba ngumnquba phezu kwabo.
66_7_16_Abayi kuba salamba, abayi kuba sanxanwa; aliyi kubawela nelanga, nabunye ubushushu;
66_7_17_ngokuba iMvana esesazulwini setrone iya kubalusa,  ibakhokelele emithonjeni ephilileyo yamanzi; waye uThixo eya kuzisula iinyembezi zonke emehlweni abo.
66_8_1_Xa yalivulayo elesixhenxe itywina, kwabakho ukuzola ezulwini, kwangathi sisiqingatha seyure.
66_8_2_Ndazibona izithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe, ezimayo phambi koThixo; zaza zanikwa amaxilongo asixhenxe.
66_8_3_Seza esinye isithunywa, sema esibingelelweni,  sinesiqhumiselo segolide, sanikwa iziqhumiso zazininzi, ukuze sizinikele, kunye nemithandazo yabangcwele bonke, phezu kwesibingelelo segolide esiphambi kwetrone.
66_8_4_Wenyuka ke umsi weziqhumiso, kunye nemithandazo yabangcwele,  ephuma esandleni sesithunywa sezulu, waya emehlweni kaThixo.
66_8_5_Sathi isithunywa sasithabatha isiqhumiselo eso, sasizalisa ngomlilo wesibingelelo, sawuphosa emhlabeni; kwabakho izandi,  neendudumo, nemibane, nenyikima.
66_8_6_Zaza izithunywa ezisixhenxe ezinamaxilongo osixhenxe,  zazilungiselela ukuba zivuthele amaxilongo.
66_8_7_Sathi esokuqala isithunywa savuthela ixilongo, kwabakho isichotho nomlilo, ziphithikezwe negazi, zaphoswa emhlabeni;  saza isahlulo sesithathu semithi satshiswa, nabo bonke utyani obuluhlaza batshiswa.
66_8_8_Sathi esesibini isithunywa savuthela ixilongo, kwanga kuphoswa intaba enkulu, isitsha ngumlilo, elwandle; saza isahlulo sesithathu solwandle saba ligazi;
66_8_9_safa isahlulo sesithathu sezidalwa eziphilileyo eziselwandle; nesahlulo sesithathu semikhombe sonakaliswa.
66_8_10_Sathi esesithathu isithunywa savuthela ixilongo, kwawa ezulwini inkwenkwezi enkulu, ivutha njengesibane, yawa phezu kwesahlulo sesithathu semilambo, naphezu kwemithombo yamanzi.
66_8_11_Igama lenkwenkwezi leyo kuthiwa nguMhlonyane; saza isahlulo sesithathu samanzi saba ngumhlonyane; yathi into eninzi yabantu yafa ngawo amanzi, ngokuba aba krakra.
66_8_12_Sathi esesine isithunywa savuthela ixilongo, saza sabethwa isahlulo sesithathu selanga, nesahlulo sesithathu senyanga,  nesahlulo sesithathu seenkwenkwezi, ukuze isahlulo sesithathu sazo sibe mnyama, sithi isahlulo sesithathu sayo imini singakhanyi, bube njalo nobusuku.
66_8_13_Ndabona, ndeva olunye ukhozi luphaphazela esazulwini samazulu, lusithi ngezwi elikhulu, Yeha! yeha! yeha! abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, ngawo amazwi aseleyo exilongo lezithunywa ezithathu, ezisaza kuvuthela amaxilongo.
66_9_1_Sathi esesihlanu isithunywa savuthela ixilongo; ndabona inkwenkwezi iphuma ezulwini, yawela emhlabeni; sanikwa isitshixo sequla lenzonzobila.
66_9_2_Salivula iqula lenzonzobila. Kwenyuka umsi uphuma equleni apho, njengomsi weziko elikhulu, lamnyama ilanga nesibhakabhaka ngumsi wequla elo.
66_9_3_Emsini apho kwaphuma iinkumbi, ezeza emhlabeni, zanikwa igunya, njengokuba benegunya oonomadudwane bomhlaba.
66_9_4_Kwathiwa kuzo, ize utyani bomhlaba zingaboni, nanye into eluhlaza, nanye into engumthi; ibe ngabantu bodwa, bona abo bangenalo itywina likaThixo emabunzini abo.
66_9_5_Zanikwa igunya lokungababulali, bathuthunjelwe nje kodwa iinyanga ezintlanu; intuthumbo yazo yayinjengentuthumbo yoonomadudwane, xa athe wamhlaba umntu.
66_9_6_Ngaloo mihla abantu baya kukufuna ukufa, bangakufumani; baya kukunqwenela ukufa, kusuke ukufa kusabe kubo.
66_9_7_Iimfano zeenkumbi ezo, zibe zifana namahashe, elungiselwe imfazwe, ezintloko izizithsaba ezifana negolide, nobuso bazo bunjengobuso babantu.
66_9_8_Zaye zineenwele ezingathi ziinwele zamankazana, namazinyo azo engathi ngawengonyama.
66_9_9_Zaye zinezigcina-zifuba ezingathi zizigcina-zifuba zentsimbi, isandi samaphiko azo singathi sisandi seenqwelo zamahashe amaninzi, ebaleka esiya emfazweni.
66_9_10_Zinemisila efana neyoonomadudwane, kukho nezamvila emisileni yazo; igunya lazo lilelokona abantu iinyanga ezintlanu.
66_9_11_Zinokumkani phezu kwazo, usisithunywa senzonzobila, ogama lakhe ngesiHebhere linguAbhadon, ngesiGrike unegama elinguApoliyon.
66_9_12_Owokuqala uyeha udlule; yabona, kuza ooyeha ababini emva koko.
66_9_13_Sathi esesithandathu isithunywa savuthela ixilongo, ndeva izwi liphuma ezimpondweni zone zesibingelelo segolide esisemehlweni kaThixo,
66_9_14_lisithi kwisithunywa sesithandathu esasinexilongo,  Zikhulule izithunywa ezine ezikhonkxwe emlanjeni omkhulu ongumEfrati.
66_9_15_Zaza zakhululwa izithunywa zozine, ezazilungiselwe ilixa nemini nenyanga nomnyaka, ukuze zibulale isahlulo sesithathu sabantu.
66_9_16_Laye inani lemikhosi yamahashe lizizigidi zezigidi eziphindeke kabini; ndaliva inani layo.
66_9_17_Ndawabona ngokunjalo amahashe embonweni lowo, nabo babehleli phezu kwawo, benezigcina-zifuba ezimlilo, nezimsi,  nezisulfure; iintloko zamahashe zingathi ziintloko zeengonyama,  emlonyeni wawo kuphuma umlilo, nomsi, nesulfure.
66_9_18_Ngezo nto zontathu sabulawa isahlulo sesithathu sabantu ngomlilo, nangomsi, nangesulfure, ezaphumayo emlonyeni wawo.
66_9_19_Kuba amagunya awo asemlonyeni wawo nasemisileni yawo; kuba imisila yawo ifana neenyoka, ineentloko; ngayo ayonakalisa.
66_9_20_Amasalela abantu, abangabulawanga ngazo ezo zibetho,  akaguqukanga emisebenzini yezandla zawo, ukuze angaqubudi kuzo iidemon, nezithixo zegolide, nezesilivere, nezobhedu,  nezamatye, nezemithi, ezingenako nokubona, nokuva, nokuhamba;
66_9_21_akaguqukanga nasekubulaleni kwawo, nasekukhafuleni kwawo,  nasembulweni wawo, nasebuseleni bawo.
66_10_1_Ndabona esinye isithunywa sezulu esinamandla, sisihla ezulwini, sithiwe wambu ngelifu; kukho umnyama entloko, ubuso baso bungathi lilanga, iinyawo zaso zingathi ziintsika zomlilo.
66_10_2_Esandleni saso saye sinencwadana ivulekile. Salumisa unyawo lwaso lokunene phezu kolwandle, ke olokhohlo phezu komhlaba;
66_10_3_sadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, ngathi yingonyama igquma.  Sathi sakudanduluka, iindudumo ezisixhenxe zazivakalisa izandi zazo.
66_10_4_Xa iindudumo ezisixhenxe zazivakalisayo izandi zazo,  ndandiza kubhala; ndaza ndeva izwi liphuma emazulwini, lisithi kum, Zitywine izinto ezizivakalisileyo iindudumo ezisixhenxe,  ungazibhali zona.
66_10_5_Saza isithunywa sezulu, endasibonayo simi phezu kolwandle na phezu komhlaba, sasiphakamisela ezulwini isandla saso,
66_10_6_safunga lowo udla ubomi, ase emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni,  owadala izulu nezinto ezikulo, nomhlaba nezinto ezikuwo,  nolwandle nezinto ezikulo, ukuthi, Akuyi kuba sabakho xesha.
66_10_7_Ke ngemihla yezwi lesesixhenxe isithunywa sezulu, xa sukuba siza kuvuthela ixilongo, iya kuzaliseka imfihlakalo kaThixo,  njengoko wazishumayelayo iindaba ezilungileyo kwabangabakhe abakhonzi, abaprofeti.
66_10_8_Lathi izwi endalivayo liphuma emazulwini, labuya lathetha nam, lisithi, Hamba uye uyithabathe incwadana evulekileyo,  esesandleni sesithunywa esimiyo phezu kolwandle naphezu komhlaba.
66_10_9_Ndesuka ke ndaya kwisithunywa eso, ndathi kuso, Ndinike incwadana leyo. Sathi kum, Yithabathe, uyidle uyigqibe; yosenza sibe krakra isisu sakho, kodwa emlonyeni wakho yoba nencasa enjengeyobusi.
66_10_10_Ndayithabatha ke incwadana esesandleni sesithunywa eso,  ndayidla ndayigqiba; yaye emlonyeni wam inencasa enjengeyobusi;  xa ndayidlayo, saba krakra isisu sam.
66_10_11_Sathi kum, Umele ukuba ubuye uprofete ngabantu,  neentlanga, neelwimi, nookumkani, abaninzi.
66_11_1_Ndaza ndanikwa ingcongolo, ifana nentonga; saye isithunywa eso simi, sisithi, Suka uyilinganise itempile kaThixo,  nesibingelelo, nabo banqulayo bekuyo.
66_11_2_Intendelezo engaphandle kwetempile yiphose phandle,  ungayilinganisi yona; ngokuba inikwe iintlanga; umzi ongcwele ziya kuwunyathelela phantsi iinyanga ezimashumi mane anambini.
66_11_3_Ndiya kuwanika amangqina am amabini, aprofete imihla eliwaka elinamakhulu mabini anamanci mathandathu, ethiwe wambu ngeengubo ezirhwexayo.
66_11_4_Lawo yile minquma mibini, nezi ziphatho zezibane zibini,  zimiyo phambi koThixo womhlaba.
66_11_5_Ukuba kukho bani unga angawonakalisa, kophuma umlilo emlonyeni wawo, uzidle uzigqibe iintshaba zawo; nokuba kukho bani unga angawonakalisa, umelwe kukubulawa ngokunjalo.
66_11_6_Wona la anegunya lokulivala izulu, ukuze kungani mvula ngemihla yokuprofeta kwawo. Kananjalo anegunya phezu kwamanzi ukuwaguqula abe ligazi, nokuwubetha umhlaba ngezibetho zonke,  ngamaxa onke asukuba ethanda ngawo.
66_11_7_Xa athe abufeza ubungqina bawo, irhamncwa elinyuka liphuma enzonzobileni liya kwenza imfazwe nawo, liweyise, liwabulale.
66_11_8_Izidumbu zawo ziya kuba sesitratweni somzi omkhulu,  okuthiwa ngokomoya yiSodom neYiputa, apho kananjalo yabethelelwa khona emnqamlezweni iNkosi yawo.
66_11_9_Abakubo abantu, nezizwe, neelwimi, neentlanga, baya kuzibona izidumbu zawo imihla emithathu enesiqingatha somhla,  bangavumi ukuba izidumbu zawo zibekwe emangcwabeni.
66_11_10_Abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba baya kuwavuyelela, babe nemihlali; bathumelane izipho; ngokuba abo baprofeti babini babathuthumbisa abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba.
66_11_11_Emva kwemihla leyo mithathu inesiqingatha somhla, umoya wobomi ophume kuThixo wangena kuwo, ema ngeenyawo zawo; baza bawelwa luloyiko olukhulu abo bawabonayo.
66_11_12_Eva izwi elikhulu liphuma ezulwini, lisithi kuwo,  Nyukelani apha! Enyuka, aya ezulwini esefini; zawabona iintshaba zawo.
66_11_13_Ngelo lixa kwabakho unyikimo lomhlaba olukhulu, isahlulo seshumi somzi sawa, kwabulawa kolo lunyikimo abantu abangamawaka asixhenxe; abo baseleyo bangenelwa luloyiko,  bamzukisa uThixo wezulu.
66_11_14_Uyeha wesibini udlule; yabona uyeha wesithathu uyeza kamsinya.
66_11_15_Sathi esesixhenxe isithunywa savuthela ixilongo; kwabakho amazwi amakhulu emazulwini, esithi: Izikumkani zehlabathi zithe zaba zezeNkosi yethu nezikaKristu wayo. Wayeya kuba nguKumkani kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.
66_11_16_Aza amadoda amakhulu, angamashumi mabini anamane, ahleli phambi koThixo phezu kweetrone zawo, awa ngobuso bawo, aqubuda kuye uThixo,
66_11_17_esithi: Siyabulela kuwe, Nkosi, Thixo, Somandla, Wena ukhoyo, wawukho, uzayo, Kuba uwathabathile amandla akho amakhulu, waba nguKumkani.
66_11_18_Iintlanga zaqumba, Yeza ingqumbo yakho, Leza nexesha labo bafileyo ukuba bagwetywe, Nelokubanika umvuzo wabo abakhonzi bakho abaprofeti, nabo bangcwele, Nabo baloyikayo igama lakho,  abancinane nabakhulu, Nelokonakalisa abo bawonakalisayo umhlaba.
66_11_19_Yavulwa itempile kaThixo emazulwini, yabonakala ityeya yomnqophiso wakhe etempileni yakhe; kwabakho imibane, nezandi,  neendudumo, nonyikimo lomhlaba, nesichotho esikhulu.
66_12_1_Kwabonakala umqondiso omkhulu emazulwini: umfazi ethiwe wambu ngelanga, inyanga ingaphantsi kweenyawo zakhe, entloko kuye isisithsaba seenkwenkwezi ezilishumi elinambini.
66_12_2_Uthi emithi akhale, enenimba, ethuthunjelwa ekuzaleni.
66_12_3_Kwabonakala omnye umqondiso emazulwini: nantso, inamba enkulu ebomvu, ineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi,  kwiintloko zayo izizithsaba ezisixhenxe.
66_12_4_Umsila wayo wawurhola isahlulo sesithathu seenkwenkwezi zezulu, waziphosa emhlabeni. Yathi inamba leyo yema phambi komfazi owayeza kuzala, ukuze, xa athe wazala, imdle imgqibe umntwana wakhe.
66_12_5_Wazala umntwana oyinkwenkwe, oza kuzalusa zonke iintlanga ngentonga yentsimbi; umntwana wakhe lowo wathiwa xwi, wasiwa kuye uThixo, nakuyo itrone yakhe.
66_12_6_Wathi umfazi wasabela entlango, apho ikhona indawo ayilungiselwe nguThixo, ukuze bamnqake khona imihla eliwaka elinamakhulu mabini anamanci mathandathu.
66_12_7_Kwaza kwabakho imfazwe emazulwini, uMikayeli nezithunywa zakhe besilwa nenamba, inamba nezithunywa zayo zisilwa;
66_12_8_azaba nakweyisa, kanjalo ayaba safunyanwa indawo yazo emazulwini.
66_12_9_Yaphoswa phantsi inamba enkulu, inyoka yakudala, leyo kuthiwa nguMtyholi, uSathana ke, lowo ulilahlekisayo elimiweyo liphela; yaphoswa emhlabeni, nezithunywa zayo zaphoswa kunye nayo.
66_12_10_Ndaza ndeva izwi elikhulu emazulwini lisithi, Ngoku luthe usindiso, namandla, nobukumkani, lwaba lolukaThixo wethu,  negunya laba lelikaKristu wakhe; ngokuba ukhahlelwe phantsi ummangaleli wabazalwana bethu, lowo ubamangalelayo emehlweni kaThixo wethu imini nobusuku.
66_12_11_Bameyisile bona ngenxa yegazi leMvana, nangenxa yelizwi lobungqina babo; abawuthandanga umphefumlo wabo, kwada kwasekufeni.
66_12_12_Ngenxa yoko yibani nemihlali, nina mazulu, nani ninomnquba kuwo. Yeha, abo bawumiyo umhlaba nolwandle! ngokuba uhlile weza kuni uMtyholi, enomsindo omkhulu, esazi nje ukuba ixesha analo lincinane.
66_12_13_Yaza yathi inamba, yakubona ukuba iphoswe emhlabeni,  yamtshutshisa umfazi ozele umntwana oyinkwenkwe.
66_12_14_Umfazi wanikwa amaphiko amabini okhozi olukhulu, ukuze aphaphazele aye entlango, endaweni yakhe, apho anqakwa khona ixesha, namaxesha, nesiqingatha sexesha, kude nobuso benyoka.
66_12_15_Inyoka yakhupha emva komfazi ngomlomo wayo amanzi anjengomlambo, ukuze imkhukulise nomlambo.
66_12_16_Umhlaba wamsiza umfazi, wathi umhlaba wawuvula umlomo wawo, wawufinca umlambo eyawukhuphayo inamba ngomlomo wayo.
66_12_17_Yamqumbela umfazi inamba, yemka yaya kulwa nabaseleyo bembewu yakhe, abo bayigcinayo imithetho kaThixo, abanobungqina bukaYesu Kristu.
66_13_1_Ndaza ndema phezu kwentlabathi yolwandle. Ndabona kunyuka,  kuphuma elwandle, irhamncwa, lineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi, ezimpondweni zalo izizithsaba ezilishumi,  kwiintloko zalo iligama lonyeliso.
66_13_2_Laye irhamncwa elo ndalibonayo lifana nengwe, iinyawo zalo zinjengezebhere, umlomo walo unjengomlomo wengonyama. Inamba yalinika amandla ayo, netrone yayo, negunya elikhulu.
66_13_3_Ndabona enye yazo iintloko zalo, ingathi ixatyelwe yafa;  inxeba lalo elibanga ukufa laphiliswa. Wamangaliswa umhlaba uphela, walilandela irhamncwa elo.
66_13_4_Bayinqula inamba eyalinika igunya irhamncwa, balinqula irhamncwa, besithi, Ngubani na ofana nerhamncwa elo? ngubani na onako ukulwa nalo?
66_13_5_Lanikwa umlomo othetha izinto ezinkulu, nezinyeliso;  kanjalo lanikwa igunya lokulwa iinyanga ezimashumi mane anesibini.
66_13_6_Lawuvulela umlomo walo ekumnyeliseni uThixo, ukuba lilinyelise igama lakhe, nomnquba wakhe, nabo bahleli emazulwini.
66_13_7_Lanikwa igunya lokulwa nabangcwele, libeyise; lanikwa igunya kuzo zonke izizwe, neelwimi, neentlanga.
66_13_8_Baya kulinqula bonke abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, abamagama angabhalwanga encwadini yobomi yayo iMvana, exheliweyo kususela ekusekweni kwehlabathi.
66_13_9_Ukuba ubani unendlebe, makeve.
66_13_10_Ukuba ubani uhlanganisela abanye ekuthinjweni, naye uya kusiwa ekuthinjweni; ukuba ubani ubulala ngekrele, umelwe kukubulawa naye ngekrele. Nalu unyamezelo nokholo lwabangcwele.
66_13_11_Ndabona elinye irhamncwa linyuka liphuma emhlabeni; laye lineempondo ezimbini zifana nezemvana, laye lithetha njengenamba.
66_13_12_Lenza lonke igunya lelokuqala irhamncwa, elalingaphambi kwalo; lenza umhlaba, nabo bawumiyo, ukuba balinqule irhamncwa lokuqala, elaphiliswayo inxeba lalo elibanga ukufa.
66_13_13_Lenza imiqondiso emikhulu, ukuze lihlise nomlilo ezulwini,  uze emhlabeni phambi kwabantu,
66_13_14_libalahlekise abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, ngemiqondiso elayinikwayo ukuba liyenze emehlweni erhamncwa elo; lisithi kwabo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, mabalenzele umfanekiselo irhamncwa, elibe linenxeba lalo ikrele, laphila.
66_13_15_Lanikwa igunya lokuwunika umfanekiselo werhamncwa umoya,  ukuze umfanekiselo werhamncwa elo uthethe nokuthetha, wenze ukuba babulawe abasukuba bengaqubudi kuwo umfanekiselo werhamncwa.
66_13_16_Lenza bonke, abancinane nabakhulu, abazizityebi nabangamahlwempu, abakhululekileyo nabangamakhoboka, ukuba baphawulwe lilo esandleni sabo sokunene, nokuba kusemabunzini,  abo.
66_13_17_nokuze kungabikho mntu unako ukuthenga nokuthengisa,  ingenguye lowo unophawu, nokuba ligama lerhamncwa, nokuba linani legama lalo.
66_13_18_Nabu ubulumko. Lowo unengqiqo makalibale inani lerhamncwa;  kuba linani lomntu; inani lalo ke lingamakhulu omathandathu anamanci mathandathu anesithandathu.
66_14_1_Ndabona, nantso iMvana imi phezu kwentaba yeZiyon, kumi nayo ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, benalo igama loYise libhaliwe emabunzini abo.
66_14_2_Ndeva izwi liphuma ezulwini, lingathi sisandi samanzi amaninzi, lingathi sisandi sendudumo enkulu.
66_14_3_Ndeva nezwi lababethi beehadi, bebetha iihadi zabo; bevuma ingoma engathi intsha, phambi kwetrone, naphambi kwezinto eziphilileyo zone, namadoda amakhulu; kwaye kungekho namnye unako ukuyifunda ingoma leyo, lingelilo ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine lamawaka, ababethengiwe emhlabeni.
66_14_4_Aba ngabo bangadyobhekanga ngabafazi, kuba benyulu. Aba ngabo bayilandelayo iMvana apho isukuba isiya khona. Aba bathengwa bephuma ebantwini, baziintlahlela kuye uThixo nakuyo iMvana.
66_14_5_Emlonyeni wabo akufunyanwanga nkohliso, kuba bengenakubekwa bala.
66_14_6_Ndabona esinye isithunywa sezulu, siphaphazela esazulwini samazulu, sineendaba ezilungileyo ezingunaphakade, ukuba sizishumayele kwabo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, nakwiintlanga zonke,  nezizwe, neelwimi, nabantu;
66_14_7_sisithi ngezwi elikhulu, Moyikeni uThixo, nimzukise;  ngokuba lifikile ixa lokugweba kwakhe; nimnqule lowo wenza izulu, nomhlaba, nolwandle, nemithombo yamanzi.
66_14_8_Kwaza kwalandela esinye isithunywa sezulu, sisithi, Iwile,  iwile iBhabheli, loo mzi mkhulu! ngokuba iseze zonke iintlanga ngewayini yomsindo wobuhenyu bayo.
66_14_9_Saza esesithathu isithunywa sezulu sazilandela zona,  sisithi ngezwi elikhulu, Ukuba umntu uyalinqula irhamncwa nomfanekiselo walo, amkele uphawu lwalo ebunzini lakhe, nokuba kusesandleni sakhe:
66_14_10_yena wosela iwayini yomsindo kaThixo, egalelwe ingaphithikeziwe endebeni yengqumbo yakhe, athuthunjiswe ngomlilo nesulfure phambi kwezithunywa ezingcwele, naphambi kweMvana.
66_14_11_Umsi wokuthuthunjelwa kwabo unyuka use emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni; abanakuphumla imini nobusuku abo banqula irhamncwa nomfanekiselo walo, nomntu ukuba uthi alwamkele uphawu lwegama lalo.
66_14_12_Nalu unyamezelo lwabangcwele; naba abayigcinayo imithetho kaThixo nokukholwa kuYesu.
66_14_13_Ndeva izwi liphuma emazulwini, lisithi kum, Bhala, uthi,  Banoyolo abafi, abo bafela eNkosini, kuthabathela apha; ewe,  utsho uMoya, ukuba baphumle ekubulalekeni kwabo; imisebenzi yabo ke ilandelana nabo.
66_14_14_Ndabona, nalo ilifu elimhlophe; elifini apho kuhleli ofana noNyana woMntu, enesithsaba segolide entloko, esandleni sakhe enerhengqa elibukhali.
66_14_15_Kwaphuma esinye isithunywa sezulu etempileni, sidanduluka ngezwi elikhulu kulo uhleli efini, sisithi, Lifake irhengqa lakho, uvune; ngokuba lifikile kuwe ilixa lokuvuna; ngokuba ukudla komhlaba kuvuthiwe.
66_14_16_Lowo uhleli efini waliphosa irhengqa lakhe emhlabeni;  wavunwa ke umhlaba.
66_14_17_Kwaza kwaphuma esinye isithunywa sezulu etempileni esemazulwini, naso sikwanerhengqa elibukhali.
66_14_18_Kwaphuma esinye isithunywa sezulu esibingelelweni,  sinegunya kuwo umlilo; sabiza ngonkqangazo olukhulu kweso sinerhengqa elibukhali, sisithi, Lifake irhengqa lakho elibukhali, ubuthe izihloko zomdiliya womhlaba, ngokuba iidiliya zawo zigqibele ukuvuthwa.
66_14_19_Isithunywa saliphosa irhengqa laso emhlabeni, sawubutha umdiliya womhlaba, sawuphosa esixovulelweni esikhulu somsindo kaThixo.
66_14_20_Isixovulelo eso sanyathelwa ngaphandle komzi lowo;  kwaphuma igazi esixovulelweni eso, lada lafika emikhaleni yamahashe, umgama wezitadiya eziliwaka elinamakhulu amathandathu.
66_15_1_Ndabona ezulwini omnye umqondiso omkhulu, ongummangaliso;  izithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe zinazo izibetho ezisixhenxe zokugqibela; ngokuba wazaliseka umsindo kaThixo ngazo.
66_15_2_Ndabona ngathi lulwandle lwegilasi, luphithikezene nomlilo;  nabo bavela beloyisile irhamncwa, nomfanekiselo walo, nophawu lwalo, nenani legama lalo, bemi ngaselwandle lwegilasi,  beneehadi zikaThixo.
66_15_3_Bayivuma ingoma kaMoses, umkhonzi kaThixo, nengoma yeMvana,  besithi: Mikhulu, ingummangaliso imisebenzi yakho, Nkosi, Thixo Somandla; Zinobulungisa, ziyinyaniso iindlela zakho, Kumkani weentlanga.
66_15_4_Ngubani na ongekhe akoyike wena, Nkosi, Angalizukisi igama lakho? Ngokuba inguwe wedwa ongcwele; Ngokuba zonke iintlanga ziya kuza ziqubude phambi kwakho, Ngokuba imisebenzi yakho yobulungisa ibonakalalisiwe.
66_15_5_Ndaza emva koko ndabona, nantso ivuliwe itempile yomnquba wobungqina emazulwini.
66_15_6_Zaphuma ke etempileni izithunywa zosixhenxe, zinezibetho ezisixhenxe, zambethe ilinen emhlophe eqaqambileyo,  ziyibhinqele ezifubeni imibhinqo yegolide.
66_15_7_Yathi enye kuzo izinto eziphilileyo zone, yazinika izithunywa ezisixhenxe iingqayi zegolide ezisixhenxe, zizele ngumsindo kaThixo, odla ubomi kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.
66_15_8_Yazala itempile ngumsi ophuma ebuqaqawulini bukaThixo,  nasemandleni akhe; kwaye kungekho namnye unako ukungena etempileni, zada zazaliseka izibetho zosixhenxe zezithunywa zosixhenxe.
66_16_1_Ndeva izwi elikhulu liphuma etempileni, lisithi kuzo izithunywa zezulu zosixhenxe, Hambani, niye kuziphalaza iingqayi zomsindo kaThixo emhlabeni.
66_16_2_Semka ke esokuqala, sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso emhlabeni;  kwabakho isilonda esibi esinobuhlungu ebantwini, abo banophawu lwerhamncwa, abo baqubudayo kuwo umfanekiselo walo.
66_16_3_Saza esesibini isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso elwandle; lwaba ligazi elinjengelofileyo, yaza yonke imiphefumlo edla ubomi yafa elwandle.
66_16_4_Saza esesithathu isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso emilanjeni nasemithonjeni yamanzi; yaba ligazi.
66_16_5_Ndeva isithunywa samanzi, sisithi: Unobulungisa, Nkosi,  wena ukhoyo, wawukho, uyingcwele, ngokuba ugwebile wenjenje;
66_16_6_Ngokuba baliphalazile igazi labangcwele nelabaprofeti;  Wabanika igazi ukuba balisele, ngokuba belifanele.
66_16_7_Ndeva esinye siphuma esibingelelweni, sisithi: Ewe, Nkosi,  Thixo Somandla, Iyinyaniso, inobulungisa imigwebo yakho.
66_16_8_Saza esesine isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso elangeni;  sanikwa igunya lokutshisa abantu ngomlilo.
66_16_9_Batsha abantu bubushushu obukhulu; balinyelisa igama likaThixo, onalo igunya kwezo zibetho; abaguquka bamzukise.
66_16_10_Saza esesihlanu isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso etroneni yerhamncwa; baba mnyama ubukumkani balo; bamana beziluma iilwimi ngenxa yeentlungu;
66_16_11_bamnyelisa uThixo wamazulu ngenxa yeentlungu zabo,  nangenxa yezilonda zabo: abaguquka emisebenzini yabo.
66_16_12_Saza esesithandathu isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso emlanjeni omkhulu ongumEfrati; atsha amanzi awo, ukuze ilungiswe indlela yookumkani abo bavela empumalanga.
66_16_13_Ndabona kuphuma emlonyeni wenamba, nasemlonyeni werhamncwa, nasemlonyeni womprofeti wobuxoki, oomoya abathathu abangcolileyo, befana namasele.
66_16_14_Kuba bangoomoya beedemon, besenza imiqondiso; abaphuma baye kubo ookumkani bomhlaba, nabelimiweyo liphela,  ukubahlanganisela emfazweni yaloo mini inkulu kaThixo,  uSomandla.
66_16_15_Yabona, ndiza njengesela. Unoyolo lowo uphaphileyo,  uzigcinayo iingubo zakhe, ukuze angahambi ze, balibone ihlazo lakhe.
66_16_16_Babahlanganisela endaweni ekuthiwa ngesiHebhere yiArmagedon.
66_16_17_Saza esesixhenxe isithunywa sayiphalaza ingqayi yaso esibhakabhakeni; kwaphuma izwi elikhulu, livela etempileni yamazulu, livela etroneni, lisithi, Kwenzekile.
66_16_18_Kwabakho imibane, nezandi, neendudumo; kwabakho nonyikimo lomhlaba olukhulu, ekungazanga kubekho lunjalo unyikimo ukuha lukhulu, kuseloko kwabakhoyo abantu emhlabeni.
66_16_19_Umzi omkhulu lowo waba zahlulo zithathu; yathi imizi yeentlanga yawa; iBhabheli enkulu yakhunjulwa emehlweni kaThixo, ukuba inikwe indebe yewayini yomsindo wengqumbo yakhe.
66_16_20_Into yonke eziziqithi yabaleka, neentaba zafunyanwa.
66_16_21_Kwesuka kwehla ezulwini phezu kwabantu isichotho esikhulu,  esimatye ngathi ubunzima bawo yitalente ngalinye; baza abantu bamnyelisa uThixo ngenxa yesibetho sesichotho eso, ngokuba sisikhulu kakhulu isibetho saso.
66_17_1_Saza seza esinye sazo izithunywa zezulu zosixhenxe,  ezineengqayi zosixhenxe, sathetha nam, sisithi kum, Yiza apha,  ndikubonise ukugwetywa kwalo ihenyukazi elikhulu, elihleli phezu kwawo amanzi amaninzi;
66_17_2_abahenyuze nalo ookumkani bomhlaba, abo bawumiyo umhlaba,  banxiliswa yiwayini yobuhenyu balo.
66_17_3_Sandisa entlango ndikuMoya; ndabona inkazana ihleli phezu kwerhamncwa elimfusa, lizele ngamagama onyeliso, lineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi.
66_17_4_Yaye inkazana leyo ithiwe wambu ngengubo ebomvu nemfusa,  ihonjiswe ngegolide, nelitye elinqabileyo, neeperile, inendebe yegolide esandleni sayo, izele ngamasikizi nezingcoliso zobuhenyu bayo.
66_17_5_Ebunzi kubhalwe igama elithi, imfihlelo, iBhabheli enkulu,  unina wamahenyukazi nowamasikizi omhlaba.
66_17_6_Ndayibona inkazana leyo inxila ligazi labangcwele, naligazi lamangqina kaYesu. Ndamangaliswa ngokumangaliswa okukhulu ndakuyibona.
66_17_7_Sathi kum isithunywa sezulu, Umangaliswe yini na?  Ndokuxelela mna imfihlelo yenkazana le, neyerhamncwa eli liyithweleyo, lineentloko ezisixhenxe neempondo ezilishumi.
66_17_8_Irhamncwa owalibonayo laye likho, alikho; liza kunyuka liphume enzonzobileni, limke liye entshabalalweni. Baya kumangaliswa abo bemiyo phezu komhlaba, abamagama angabhaliweyo encwadini yobomi kuseloko kwaba sekusekweni kwehlabathi,  belibona nje irhamncwa elaye likho, elingekhoyo, likho noko.
66_17_9_Nantsi ingqiqo enobulumko. Iintloko ezisixhenxe ezi ziintaba ezisixhenxe, ehleli phezu kwazo inkazana leyo.
66_17_10_Kananjalo zona zingookumkani abasixhenxe. Abahlanu bawa,  omnye ukho, omnye akakafiki; xa athe wafika, umelwe kukuhlala umzuzwana.
66_17_11_Irhamncwa elaye likho, elingekhoyo, lona lingowesibhozo okwangowabasixhenxe; umka aye entshabalalweni.
66_17_12_Iimpondo ezilishumi owazibonayo zingookumkani abalishumi,  bona abo bangekamkeli bukumkani, basuka bamkele,  njengookumkani, igunya lelixa elinye kunye nerhamncwa.
66_17_13_Aba banasicamango sinye, babeya kunikela amandla negunya labo kulo irhamncwa.
66_17_14_Aba baya kwenza imfazwe neMvana. IMvana iya kubeyisa,  ngokuba inguNkosi kankosi, inguKumkani kakumkani; baya kweyisa nabo banayo, babiziweyo, banyuliweyo, bathembekileyo.
66_17_15_Sithi kum, Amanzi owawabonayo, apho lihleli khona ihenyukazi, ngabantu, nezihlwele, neentlanga, neelwimi;
66_17_16_iimpondo ezilishumi owazibonayo ziserhamncweni, ngabo baya kulithiya ihenyukazi, baliphanzise, balihlube, bayidle inyama yalo, balitshise ngomlilo.
66_17_17_Kuba uThixo ubeke ezintliziyweni zabo ukwenza ingcinga yakhe, benze ngcinga-nye, babunike irhamncwa ubukumkani babo,  ade azaliseke amazwi kaThixo.
66_17_18_Inkazana owayibonayo nguloo mzi mkhulu, ulawula ookumkani bomhlaba.
66_18_1_Ndaza emva koko ndabona isithunywa sezulu sisihla, siphuma ezulwini, sinegunya elikhulu; umhlaba wakhanyiselwa bubuqaqawuli baso.
66_18_2_Sadanduluka ngamandla, ngezwi elikhulu, sisithi: Iwile,  iwile iBhabheli enkulu, Yaba likhaya leedemon, nentolongo yoomoya bonke abangcolileyo, Nentolongo yeentaka zonke ezingcolileyo, ezithiyekileyo.
66_18_3_Ngokuba zonke iintlanga zisele kuyo iwayini yomsindo wobuhenyu bayo, Nookumkani bomhlaba bahenyuza nayo, Nabarhwebi bomhlaba baba zizityebi, ngamandla okuxhamla kwabo iziyolo zayo.
66_18_4_Ndeva elinye izwi liphuma emazulwini lisithi: Phumani kuyo,  bantu bam, Ukuze ningadlelani nayo ngezono zayo, Nokuze ningamkeliswa kwizibetho zayo.
66_18_5_Ngokuba izono zayo ziye zafikelela emazulwini, Nezinto zayo zokungalungisi uzikhumbule uThixo.
66_18_6_Yibuyekezeni, njengoko nayo yanibuyekezayo, Niyiphinde impinda ngokwemisebenzi yayo; Indebe eyaniphithikezela yona,  yiphithikezeleni impinda nani.
66_18_7_Yinikeni intuthumbo nesijwili, ngangoko yazizukisayo,  yaxhamla iziyolo. Ngokuba ithi entliziyweni yayo, Ndihleli ndingukumkanikazi, Andimhlolokazi, andisayi kubona sijwili.
66_18_8_Ngenxa yoko ziya kufika ngamini-nye izibetho zayo, Ukufa,  nesijwili, nendlala. Iya kutsha ngumlilo, Ngokuba ligorha iNkosi uThixo, lowo uyigwebayo.
66_18_9_Ookumkani bomhlaba, abo bahenyuza nayo, baxhamla iziyolo nayo, baya kuyililela, Bayimbambazelele, bakuwubona umsi wokutsha kwayo;
66_18_10_Bemi kude, ngenxa yokoyika intuthumbo yayo, Besithi, Yeha,  yeha, mzi mkhulu Bhabheli, mzi unamandla! Ngokuba kufike ngaxa linye ukugwetywa kwakho.
66_18_11_Nabarhwebi bomhlaba baya kulila, benze isijwili ngenxa yayo, Ngokuba ingasathengwa bani impahla yabo yomkhombe:
66_18_12_Impahla yegolide, neyesilivere, neyelitye elinqabileyo,  neyeeperile, Neyelinen ecikizekileyo, neyeengubo ezibomvu,  neyesilika, neyeengubo ezimfusa, Nomthi wonke ongumsedare,  Nezitya zonke zeempondo zeendlovu, Nezitya zonke zomthi onqabileyo kakhulu, Nezobhedu, nezentsimbi, nezemarmore,
66_18_13_Nesinamon, neziqhumiso, namafutha aqholiweyo, nentlaka emhlophe, Newayini, neoli, nomgubo ocoliweyo, nengqolowa,  Namaqegu, nezimvu, namahashe, neenqwelo, Nemizimba nemiphefumlo yabantu.
66_18_14_Neziqhamo ezikhanukwa ngumphefumlo wakho zimkile kuwe,  Nazo zonke izinto ezityebileyo neziqaqambileyo zimkile kuwe;  Akusayi kuba sazifumana zona.
66_18_15_Abarhwebi bezo zinto, abo batyeba ngayo, Baya kuma kude,  ngenxa yokoyika intuthumbo yayo,
66_18_16_Belila, besenza isijwili, besithi, Yeha, yeha, mzi mkhulu Owawuthiwe wambu ngelinen ecikizekileyo, nengubo ebomvu,  nengubo emfusa, Uhonjiswe ngegolide, namatye anqabileyo,  neeperile! Ngokuba buphanziswe ngalixa linye ubutyebi obungaka.
66_18_17_Bonke abaqhubi-mikhombe, nayo yonke indibandiba esezinqanaweni, Noomateloshe, nabo bonke abasebenza elwandle,
66_18_18_Bema kude, bamana bedanduluka, bakuwubona umsi wokutsha kwayo, Besithi, Nguwuphi na ofana nalo mzi mkhulu?
66_18_19_Bagalela uthuli entloko, Bamana bedanduluka, belila,  besenza isijwili, Besithi, Yeha, yeha, mzimkhulu, Apho baba nobutyebi khona bonke aba baneenqanawa elwandle, ngeento ezinqabileyo zawo! Ngokuba ngalixa linye uphanzisiwe.
66_18_20_Wenzele imihlali, nina mazulu, Nani bapostile bangcwele,  nani baprofeti; Ngokuba uThixo eniphindezelele kuwo.
66_18_21_Saza isithunywa esithile esinamandla safunqula ilitye,  langa lilitye lokusila, ukuba likhulu kwalo; saliphosa elwandle, sisithi: Iya kwenjiwa nje ke ukugadlelwa kwayo iBhabheli, umzi omkhulu, ingabi saba safunyanwa.
66_18_22_Isandi sababethi beehadi, neseemvumi, nesabagwali,  nesabavutheli-maxilongo, asisayi kuba saviwa kuwe; Neengcibi zonke zobungcibi bonke azisayi kuba safunyanwa kuwe; Nesandi selitye lokusila asisayi kuba saviwa kuwe;
66_18_23_Nokukhanya kwesibane akusayi kuba sakhanya kuwe; Nezwi lomyeni nelomtshakazi alisayi kuba saviwa kuwe; Ngokuba abarhwebi bakho bebengamanene omhlaba; Ngokuba zonke iintlanga zalahlekiswa kukukhafula kwakho.
66_18_24_Kuwo kwafunyanwa igazi labaprofeti, nelabangcwele, Nelabo bonke abasikiweyo emhlabeni.
66_19_1_Ndaza emva koko ndeva sanga sisandi esikhulu sesihlwele esikhulu emazulwini, sisithi: Haleluya! Usindiso, nozuko,  nembeko, namandla NgaweNkosi uThixo wethu!
66_19_2_Ngokuba iyinyaniso, inobulungisa, imigwebo yayo;
66_19_3_Ngokuba ihenyukazi elikhulu, elo laliwonakalisa umhlaba ngobuhenyu balo, iligwebile, Igazi labakhonzi bayo yaliphindezelela esandleni salo. Bathi okwesibini: Haleluya!  Umsi walo unyuka use emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.
66_19_4_Awa amadoda amakhulu, angamashumi amabini anamane, nezinto eziphilileyo zone, zaqubuda kuye uThixo ohleli phezu kwetrone,  zisithi: Amen!
66_19_5_Haleluya! Kwaphuma izwi etroneni, lisithi: Mdumiseni uThixo wethu, nonke nina bakhonzi bakhe, Nani bamoyikayo, abancinane kwanabakhulu.
66_19_6_Ndeva sanga sisandi sesihlwele esikhulu, sanga sisandi samanzi amaninzi, sanga sisandi seendudumo ezinkulu, sisithi:  Haleluya! Ngokuba iNkosi uThixo uSomandla inguKumkani.
66_19_7_Masivuye sigcobe, siyizukise; Ngokuba ufikile umsitho weMvana, Umfazi wayo uzilungisile.
66_19_8_Wanikwa ukuba athiwe wambu ngelinen ecikizekileyo,  emhlophe, eqaqambileyo; kuba ilinen ecikizekileyo yimisebenzi yobulungisa yabangcwele.
66_19_9_Sithi kum, Bhala, uthi, Banoyolo abo bamenyelwe esidlweni somsitho weMvana. Sithi kum, Lawo ngamazwi ayinyaniso kaThixo.
66_19_10_Ndawa ezinyaweni zaso, ukuba ndiqubude kuso. Sithi kum,  Lumka, ungenjenjalo; ndingumkhonzi kunye nawe, nabazalwana bakho abanobungqina bukaYesu; qubuda kuThixo; kuba ubungqina bukaYesu bungumoya wesiprofeto.
66_19_11_Ndalibona izulu livulekile, nalo ihashe elimhlophe; lowo uhleli phezu kwalo kusithiwa, nguThembekile, nguNyaniso;  ugweba, enze imfazwe, ngobulungisa.
66_19_12_Amehlo akhe ke aye enjengelangatye lomlilo, entloko izizithsaba ezininzi; enegama libhaliwe, elingaziwa namnye ungenguye.
66_19_13_Yena wayethiwe wambu ngengubo ethiwe nkxu egazini; igama lakhe kuthiwa nguLizwi likaThixo.
66_19_14_Yaye imikhosi esemazulwini imlandela, ikumahashe amhlophe,  bambethe ilinen ecikizekileyo, eqaqambileyo, emhlophe.
66_19_15_Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma ikrele elibukhali, ukuze azithi qwaka ngalo iintlanga. Yena uya kuzalusa ngentonga yentsimbi;  yena unyathela isixovulelo sewayini yomsindo neyengqumbo kaThixo uSomandla.
66_19_16_Engutyeni yakhe nasethangeni lakhe wayenegama libhaliwe kwathiwa, uKumkani kaKumkani, uNkosi kaNkosi.
66_19_17_Ndabona sithunywa sithile sasezulwini, simi elangeni;  sadanduluka ngezwi elikhulu, sisithi kuzo zonke iintaka eziphaphazelayo esazulwini sezulu, Yizani nizihlanganisele esidlweni sikaThixo omkhulu;
66_19_18_ukuze nidle inyama yookumkani, nenyama yabathetheli-waka,  nenyama yamagorha, nenyama yamahashe, neyabakhweli bawo,  nenyama yabo bonke abakhululekileyo nabangamakhoboka,  neyabancinane neyabakhulu.
66_19_19_Ndalibona irhamncwa, nookumkani bomhlaba, nemikhosi yabo,  ihlanganisene ukwenza imfazwe nalowo uhleli ehasheni, nomkhosi wakhe.
66_19_20_Labanjwa ke irhamncwa; kunye nalo kwabanjwa umprofeti obuxoki, lowo wayenzayo imiqondiso emehlweni alo, wabalahlekisa ngayo abo balwamkelayo uphawu lwerhamncwa, nabo baqubuda kuwo umfanekiselo walo; baphoswa behleli abo bobabini edikeni lomlilo elivutha isulfure.
66_19_21_Abaseleyo babulawa ngekrele lalowo uhleli ehasheni, ikrele elo luphumayo emlonyeni wakhe; zathi zonke iintaka zahlutha yinyama yabo.
66_20_1_Ndabona isithunywa sezulu, sisihla siphuma emazulwini,  sinesitshixo senzonzobila, nomxokelelwane omkhulu esandleni saso.
66_20_2_Sayibamba inamba, loo nyoka yakudala enguMtyholi, uSathana ke, sayikhonkxa iminyaka eliwaka.
66_20_3_Sayiphosa enzonzobileni, sayivalela, satywina ngaphezu kwayo, ukuze ingabi sazilahlekisa iintlanga, ide izaliseke iminyaka eliwaka; emva koko imelwe kukukhululwa ixeshana elincinane.
66_20_4_Ndabona iitrone, nabahleli phezu kwazo, banikwa ugwebo.  Ndayibona imiphefumlo yababenqunyulwe iintloko ngezembe, ngenxa yobungqina bukaYesu, nangenxa yelizwi likaThixo, abasukuba bengalinqulanga irhamncwa nomfanekiselo walo, abangalwamkelanga uphawu lwalo ebunzini nasesandleni sabo; badla ubomi, baba ngookumkani kunye noKristu iminyaka eliwaka.
66_20_5_Ke abafileyo abaseleyo ababuyanga badle bomi, yada yazaliseka iminyaka eliwaka. Olo luvuko lokuqala.
66_20_6_Unoyolo, ungcwele, lowo unesabelo eluvukweni lokuqala;  ukufa kwesibini akunagunya kubo abanjalo; baya kusuka babe ngababingeleli bakaThixo nabakaKristu, babe ngookumkani kunye naye iminyaka eliwaka.
66_20_7_Xa ithe yazaliseka iminyaka eliwaka, uSathana wokhululwa entolongweni yakhe;
66_20_8_aphume, aye kuzilahlekisa iintlanga ezisezimbombeni ezine zehlabathi, uGogi noMagogi, ukubahlanganisela emfazweni,  abanani labo lingangentlabathi yaselwandle.
66_20_9_Banyuka, baya kububanzi behlabathi, bayirhawula inqaba yomkhosi wabangcwele, nomzi othandiweyo; kwehla umlilo uvela kuThixo, uphuma ezulwini, wabadla wabagqiba.
66_20_10_UMtyholi lowo ubalahlekisayo waphoswa edikeni lomlilo nesulfure, apho likhona irhamncwa nomprofeti obuxoki; baya kuthuthunjelwa imini nobusuku, kuse emaphakadeni asemaphakadeni.
66_20_11_Ndabona itrone emhlophe enkulu, nalowo uhleli phezu kwayo,  owathi umhlaba nezulu wasaba ebusweni bakhe, azafunyanelwa ndawo ezo zinto.
66_20_12_Ndababona abafileyo, abancinane nabakhulu, bemi phambi koThixo. Zavulwa iincwadi; kwavulwa nenye incwadi, eyeyobomi;  bagwetywa abafileyo ngokubhaliweyo ezincwadini ezo,  ngokwemisebenzi yabo.
66_20_13_Lwathi ulwandle lwabakhupha abafileyo abakulo, kwathi ukufa nelabafileyo kwabakhupha abafileyo abakhona; bagwetywa elowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe.
66_20_14_Kwaza ukufa nelabafileyo kwaphoswa edikeni lomlilo. Oko kukufa kwesibini.
66_20_15_Wathi ongafunyanwanga ebhaliwe encwadini yobomi, waphoswa edikeni lomlilo.
66_21_1_Ndabona izulu elitsha, nomhlaba omtsha; kuba elokuqala izulu nowokuqala umhlaba udlule, nolwandle alusekho.
66_21_2_Ndaza mna, Yohane, ndawubona umzi ongcwele, iYerusalem entsha, usihla uvela kuThixo, uphuma emazulwini, ulungisiwe njengomtshakazi ehonjiselwe indoda yakhe.
66_21_3_Ndeva izwi elikhulu liphuma emazulwini, lisithi: Yabona,  umnquba lo kaThixo unabantu; Uya kuhlala nabo emnqubeni, Bona babe ngabantu bakhe, Yena uThixo abe nabo, enguThixo wabo;
66_21_4_Azisule uThixo zonke iinyembezi emehlweni abo, Kungabi sabakho kufa, Kungabi sabakho nasijwili, nakukhala, nantlungu;  Ngokuba izinto zokuqala zigqithile.
66_21_5_Waza lowo uhleli phezu kwetrone wathi, Uyabona, izinto zonke ndizenza ntsha. Athi kum, Bhala; ngokuba lawo ngamazwi ayinyaniso, athembekileyo.
66_21_6_Wathi kum, Kwenzekile; mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo; mna ndomnika lowo unxaniweyo emthonjeni wamanzi obomi, ngesisa.
66_21_7_Lowo weyisayo uya kuzidla ilifa izinto zonke; ndiya kuba nguThixo wakhe, yena abe ngunyana wam.
66_21_8_Ke wona amagwala, nabangakholwayo, nabangamasikizi,  nababulali, nabenzi bombulo, nabakhafuli, nabakhonzi bezithixo,  nawo onke amaxoki, isabelo sawo siya kuba sedikeni elivutha umlilo nesulfure. Oko kukufa kwesibini.
66_21_9_Kwaza kweza kum esinye sezithunywa zezulu ezisixhenxe,  ezineengqayi ezisixhenxe, ezizele zizibetho zosixhenxe zokugqibela, sathetha nam sisithi, Yiza apha, ndikubonise umtshakazi, umfazi wayo iMvana.
66_21_10_Sandisa ndikuMoya entabeni enkulu, ephakamileyo,  sandibonisa umzi omkhulu, iYerusalem engcwele, usihla uphuma emazulwini, uvela kuThixo,
66_21_11_unobuqaqawuli bukaThixo; isikhanyiso sawo sifana nelitye elinqabileyo kakhulu, langa lilitye leyaspisi ebengezela njengekristale.
66_21_12_Kananjalo unodonga olukhulu oluphakamileyo. Unamasango alishumi elinamabini, phezu kwamasango unezithunywa zezulu ezilishumi elinazibini; kubhalwe kuwo amagama angawezizwe ezilishumi elinazibini zoonyana bakaSirayeli;
66_21_13_ngasempumalanga ingamasango mathathu, ngasentla ingamasango mathathu, ngasezantsi ingamasango mathathu,  ngasentshonalanga ingamasango mathathu.
66_21_14_Udonga lomzi lunamatye eziseko alishumi elinamabini, kuwo ingamagama abapostile abalishumi elinababini bayo iMvana.
66_21_15_Lowo ubethetha nam wayenengcongolo yegolide, ukuba awulinganise umzi lowo, namasango awo, nodonga lwawo.
66_21_16_Umzi lowo umbombo-ne ukuma kwawo; ubude bawo bungangobubanzi bawo. Wawulinganisa umzi lowo ngengcongolo,  wazitadiya ezilishumi linazibini lamawaka; ubude nobubanzi nokuphakama kwawo kuyalingana.
66_21_17_Walulinganisa nodonga lwawo, ikhulu elinamanci mane anesine leekubhite, ngokomlinganiso womntu, oko kukuthi,  wesithunywa sezulu.
66_21_18_Isakhiwo sodonga lwawo yiyaspisi; Umzi yigolide engcwengekileyo, efana negilasi ebonakalelayo,
66_21_19_Namatye eziseko zodonga lomzi ayevathiswe ngamatye onke anqabileyo. Elokuqala ilitye lesiseko yiyaspisi, elesibini yisafire, elesithathu yikalikedo, elesine yismarado,
66_21_20_elesihlanu yisardonisi, elesithandathu yisardiyo,  elesixhenxe yikrizolite, elesibhozo yibherilo, elesithoba yitopazi, eleshumi yikrizoprazi, eleshumi elinalinye yihakinto,  eleshumi elinambini yiametiste.
66_21_21_Namasango lawo alishumi elinamabini aziiperile ezilishumi elinambini, lalelo isango ngalinye lenziwe ngaperile-nye;  nesitrato somzi yigolide engcwengekileyo, njengegilasi ebonakalelayo.
66_21_22_Andibonanga tempile kuwo, kuba iNkosi uThixo uSomandla nayo iMvana yitempile yawo.
66_21_23_Umzi lowo awufuni langa, kwanayo inyanga, kuba ubuqaqawuli bukaThixo buwukhanyisela, nayo iMvana isisibane sawo.
66_21_24_Iintlanga zabo basindiswayo ziya kuhamba ekukhanyeni kwawo; ookumkani bomhlaba bazise kuwo uzuko nembeko yabo.
66_21_25_Amasango awo akasayi kuvalwa mini (kuba ubusuku abuyi kubakho khona).
66_21_26_Baya kuzisa uzuko nembeko yeentlanga ezo kuwo.
66_21_27_Akusayi kungena kuwo nanye into eyenza inqambi, eyenza isikizi, nobuxoki; abaya kungena ngabo bodwa babhalwe encwadini yobomi yeMvana.
66_22_1_Saza sandibonisa umlambo wamanzi obomi, uqaqambile, ngathi ngumkhenkce, uphuma etroneni kaThixo neyeMvana.
66_22_2_Phakathi kwesitrato sawo, ngapha nangapha komlambo, ngumthi wobomi, ovelisa iintlobo zeziqhamo ezilishumi elinambini, unika iinyanga ngeenyanga zonke isiqhamo sawo; aye amagqabi omthi lowo engawokuphilisa iintlanga.
66_22_3_Akusayi kuba sabakho nasinye isiqalekiso; yaye itrone kaThixo neyeMvana iya kubakho kuwo; abakhonzi bakhe bamkhonze,
66_22_4_babubone ubuso bakhe, negama lakhe libe semabunzini abo.
66_22_5_Akuyi kubakho busuku khona; abafuni sibane, nakukhanya kwelanga, ngokuba iNkosi uThixo ibakhanyisela; baya kuba ngookumkani, kuse emaphakadeni asema phakadeni.
66_22_6_Saza sathi kum, La mazwi athembekile, ayinyaniso; iNkosi,  uThixo wabaprofeti abangcwele, yathuma isithunywa sayo sasemazulwini ukubabonisa abakhonzi bayo izinto ezimele ukubakho kamsinya.
66_22_7_Yabona, ndiyeza kamsinya; unoyolo lowo uwagcinayo amazwi esiprofeto sayo le ncwadi.
66_22_8_Mna, Yohane, ndingulowo ubezibona ezi zinto, eziva; ndathi ndakuva, ndakubona, ndawa ndaqubuda phambi kweenyawo zesithunywa sezulu esandibonisa ezi zinto.
66_22_9_Sithi kum, Lumka, ungenjenjalo; kuba ndingumkhonzi kunye nawe, nabazalwana bakho abaprofeti, nabo bawagcinayo amazwi ale ncwadi; qubuda kuThixo.
66_22_10_Sithi kum, Musa ukuwatywina amazwi esiprofeto sale ncwadi;  ngokuba ixesha likufuphi.
66_22_11_Lowo ungalungisiyo, makaselehlala engalungisi; lowo uyinyhukunyhuku, makaselehlala eyinyhukunyhuku; nolilungisa makaselehlala elungisa; nongcwele makaselehlala ezingcwalisile.
66_22_12_Yabona, ndiyeza kamsinya; umvuzo wam unam, ukuba ndivuze elowo njengoko umsebenzi wakhe uya kuba njalo.
66_22_13_Mna ndinguAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo, owokuqala nowokugqibela.
66_22_14_Banoyolo abo bayenzayo imithetho yakhe, ukuze igunya labo libe semthini wobomi, bangene ngamasango kuwo umzi.
66_22_15_Ngaphandle ke zizinja, nabakhafuli, nabenzi bombulo,  nababulali, nabakhonzi bezithixo, nabo bonke ababuthandayo,  ababenzayo ubuxoki.
66_22_16_Mna, Yesu, ndasithuma isithunywa sam sasemazulwini, ukuba ndizingqine kuni ezi zinto ngawo amabandla. Mna ndiyingcambu nenzala kaDavide, ikhwezi eliqaqambileyo lokusa.
66_22_17_UMoya nomtshakazi bathi, Yiza. Lowo uvayo makathi, Yiza.  Lowo unxaniweyo makeze; lowo uthandayo, makawathabathe amanzi obomi ngesisa.
66_22_18_Kuba ndiyangqina kubantu bonke abawevayo amazwi esiprofeto sale ncwadi, ukuba, Xa athe umntu wongeza kwezo zinto, uThixo uya kongeza kuye izibetho ezibhaliweyo kule ncwadi;
66_22_19_ukuba ke uthe umntu wasusa kuwo amazwi encwadi yesi siprofeto, uThixo uya kusisusa isabelo sakhe encwadini yobomi,  nakuwo umzi ongcwele, nakuzo izinto ezibhaliweyo kule ncwadi.
66_22_20_Uthi lowo uzingqinayo ezi zinto, Ewe, ndiyeza kamsinya.  Amen. Ewe, yiza, Nkosi Yesu.
66_22_21_Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nani nonke.  Amen.
